The ice facade is  लगभग  60 m  ऊँची
Ice formations in  the  Titlis  हिमानी   गुफा
a  glacier cave  is  a cave formed within  the  ice of a glacier  .
हिमानी  caves are  प्रायः  called ice caves , but  इस   पद  is  properly   प्रयुक्त   to   describe  bedrock caves that contain year-round  बर्फ   .
in   भौतिकी   ,  circular motion is a  गति  of an object along  the  circumference  of   a  circle or rotation  साथ  a  गोलाकार  path  .
It  can   be   वर्दी   ,  with constant  कोणीय   रेट  of  रोटेशन   (   और  constant speed ) , or non-uniform with  a   बदलना   रेट   of  rotation .
The  रोटेशन  around  a  fixed axis of a three-dimensional body  involves   गोलाकार   गति   of  its parts .
the   equations  of  गति  describe the  गति  of the center of mass  of  a body  .
उदाहरण  of circular motion  शामिल   :   an  artificial satellite orbiting  the   धरती  at constant height ,  a   स्टोन   जिससे  is tied  to  a rope  और  is being  swung   in  circles , a  car  turning  through  a curve in  a   रेस  track ,  an  electron moving perpendicular  to  a  वर्दी  magnetic field ,  और  a gear  turning  inside  a  mechanism  .
चूंकि  the  ऑब्जेक्ट   's  velocity vector is  constantly   बदलना  direction , the moving  ऑब्जेक्ट  is undergoing acceleration by  a   अभिकेन्द्रीय  force in the direction of the center of  रोटेशन  .
बगैर   इस  acceleration  ,   the   ऑब्जेक्ट  would move in  a   सीधा  line ,  according   to   न्यूटन   's   कानून  of  गति  .
Apollo  पंथ  is a  fictional   अक्षर  from the Rocky films ,  initially  portrayed  as   the  Undisputed Heavyweight  चैंपियन   of  the World .
he  was played  by   कार्ल  Weathers  .
पंथ  had multiple nicknames  ,   सहित  The Master of Disaster , The King of Sting  ,  The Dancing  विनाशक   ,  The Prince  of  Punch , The One  और  Only and  the   गिनती  of Monte Fisto .
शहरी  legend states  कि  Apollo  पंथ  's name is a wordplay on the Apostles  '  Creed  ,  a  बयान  of belief used  in   ईसाई  churches  .
All of Apollo  's  championship fights  यहूद   अनुसूचित   लिये   the  15 round distance  .
चैंपियनशिप  fights did not convert  इससे  15  rounds  to  12  rounds until 1987  .
Rocky Balboa is often wrongly credited  साथ   popularizing   the  red ,  श्वेत  ,  और  blue trunks ;  पंथ  was the  पहला  man  to   पहनें   उन्हें  ( latterly worn by Rocky Balboa in  the   3rd   और  4th installments  और   आखिरकार  by  टॉमी  ``  the   यंत्र  ''  gunn   (  Tommy  मॉरिसन  ) in  the   5th   किश्त  )  हालांकि   सामान्यतः  he wore red  और  white , as  देखी  in  रॉकी   ii   .
Balboa  's  signature colors  यहूद  black and gold—colors  he  used in the latest movie .
In the United States  ,  the title of federal  न्यायधीश   प्रायः   अर्थात्  a judge  नियुक्त  by  the  President  of   the  United  राज्य  and  पुष्टि   by  the United States Senate pursuant to the Appointments Clause in Article II of  the  United  राज्य   संविधान   .
In addition to the  परम्  Court  of  the  संयुक्त  States , whose existence  और   कुछ  aspects of  जिनकी  jurisdiction are  परे   the  constitutional power  of  Congress to alter ,  अधिनियमों  of Congress have  स्थापित  13 courts of appeals  (  also  पुकारा  `` circuit  न्यायालयों  '' ) with  appellate  jurisdiction over  अलग   regions  of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   ,  and 94  संयुक्त  States  ज़िला   न्यायालयों  .
Every  न्यायधीश  appointed  to   ऐसे  a court  may   be  categorized as a federal judge ;  ऐसे  positions include the Chief  इंसाफ   और  Associate Justices  of   the  Supreme Court , Circuit Judges  of   the   न्यायालयों  of  appeals  ,  और  district judges of  the  United  राज्य  district courts  .
सब  of these judges described thus far are  referred  to  sometimes  as  ``   आलेख   iii  judges '' because  वे  exercise the judicial power  vested   in   the  judicial branch of the  संघीय   सरकारी   by  Article III  of   the   u.S.   संविधान  .
In addition , judges of  the  Court  of  International Trade exercise judicial power  pursuant  to  आलेख   iii  .
Other  न्यायाधीशों  serving  in  the federal  न्यायालयों   ,  including  मजिस्ट्रेट  judges  और  bankruptcy judges  ,   हैं   भी   sometimes  referred to as  ``  federal judges  ''  ; however ,  वे   हैं  neither  नियुक्त   by   the   अध्यक्ष   nor  confirmed  by  the Senate  ,  and their power derives from Article I  बजाय  .
See Article I and  आलेख  III tribunals .
The Beretta  21a  Bobcat is a small  pocket-sized  semi-automatic pistol designed by  beretta   in  Italy .
उत्पादन  began  in  late  1984   ,  solely in  the   beretta  U.S.A. facility  in  Accokeek ,  मेरीलैंड  .
it  is a further development of the Beretta Model  20  , whose production ended  in  1985 .
परिवर्तनीय  Universal Life  बीमे   (  often  shortened   to   vul  ) is a type of life insurance  कि   builds  a  नकदी   मान  .
in   a  VUL , the  नकदी   मान   can   be  invested  in   a   चौड़ी  variety  of  separate accounts , similar  to  mutual  निधि  , and the choice of  जिससे  of  the   उपलब्धियाँ  separate  खाते   to   उपयोग   is   entirely  up to the contract owner .
The  'variable   '  component in  the  name  refers  to  इस  ability  to  invest  in   पृथक  accounts whose  मान   vary—they   vary  because  वे  are  invested  in stock  and/or  bond markets .
The 'universal ' component in the  नाम   refers   to   the  flexibility  the   मालिक  has in making premium payments .
The premiums can  vary  from  nothing  in a given  माह   up   to  maximums  पारिभाषित   by  the  आतंरिक  Revenue Code  लिये   जीवन   बीमे   .
This  लचीलापन   is   in  contrast to whole  जीवन   बीमे  that  रै   फिक्स्ड   प्रीमियम  payments  कि  typically can not  be  missed without lapsing the  नीति  (  हालांकि  one  may  exercise an  स्वचालित   प्रीमियम  Loan feature  ,  or  आत्मसमर्पण  dividends to pay a Whole Life  प्रीमियम   )  .
Variable universal life is  a  type of permanent life insurance  ,   क्युकी   the   मौत   लाभ   होगा   be  paid if the insured  मरता  any time as long  as  there  is  sufficient  नकदी  value to pay the costs of  बीमे  in the  नीति  .
With  सबसे  if  नहीं   सब   vuls  , unlike whole  जीवन   ,  there is no endowment age  (  the age  at  which the cash value equals  the  death benefit amount  ,  which  लिये   पूरे  life  is  typically 100 ) .
This  is  yet another key  लाभ   of   vul  over Whole Life .
साथ  a typical  पूरे  life policy ,  the  death benefit  is   सीमित   to  the face amount specified  in   the  policy , and  at   endowment  age , the face amount is  सब  that is paid  आउट  .
Thus with either death  or  endowment ,  the  insurance company  keeps  any  नकदी  value  निर्मित  up over  the  years  .
However ,  कुछ   participating   पूरे  life  नीतियों  offer riders which  बताएँ   कि   कोई  dividends  सशुल्क  on  the  policy be used  to  purchase ``  सशुल्क  up additions '' to the  नीति   जिससे   बढ़ाएँ   दोनो   the  cash value  और  the  मौत  benefit  over   समय   .
If  निवेश  made in the  पृथक  accounts out-perform  the  general  खाता   of   the  insurance  कम्पनी  , a higher  rate-of-return   can  occur than the  फिक्स्ड   rates-of-return  typical  लिये  whole life .
The  संयोजन  over the  सालो  of no  endowment  age  ,   continually  increasing  मौत   लाभ  , and  if   a   ऊँची  rate-of-return is earned in  the  separate accounts of  a  VUL  नीति  ,  इस   could   परिणाम   in   उच्चतर   मान  to the owner  or  beneficiary than that  of  a whole life  नीति   साथ   the  same amounts of  धन  paid in  as  premiums .
the   बाहरी  wood boiler is  a   रूपांतर  of  the  classic wood stove adapted  लिये  set-up outdoors while  स्टिल  transferring  the  heat to interior  इमारतें  .
a   mound  of Girl Scout cookies  .
This  mound   contains  74 boxes  of  cookies
Girl Scout Cookies  हैं   कुकीज़   बेची   by  Girl Scouts  of  the USA ( GSUSA )  as  one  of   इसके   प्रमुख   fundraisers   लिये   लोकल   स्काउट  units .
सदस्यों   of   the  GSUSA have  महरूम   selling   कुकीज़  since  1917   to  raise funds  .
लड़कियों   जो   participate  can  earn   पुरस्कार  for  उनके   प्रयत्न   .
वहीँ  are also  ईकाई   प्रोत्साहन   if  the unit  as  a whole does  खूब   .
As of  2007   ,  sales were estimated at about 200 million boxes per  साल   .
विश्वविद्यालयों  Hall
Purdue University , located in West Lafayette  ,   इंडियाना  , is  the  flagship university of the  six-campus  Purdue University system .
Purdue was founded  on  May  6  , 1869 , as a land-grant  विश्वविद्यालयों   जब   the   इंडियाना   सामान्य   सभा   ,   लेने  advantage of  the  Morrill Act , accepted  a   दान  of  जमीन   और  money  इससे   lafayette   बिजनेसमैन  John Purdue to  स्थापित   a   कॉलेज  of  विज्ञान  , technology  ,  and  कृषि  in his name  .
the   पहला  classes  यहूद  held  on   सितंबर   16  ,  1874  , with six instructors and 39  विद्यार्थी   .
आज  , Purdue is a member  of   the  Big  टेन   सम्मेलन  , and is a  खूब  known  world-class   शोध   संस्था   .
Purdue enrolls  the   दूसरी   largest   छात्र  body of any  विश्वविद्यालयों  in  इंडियाना   as  well as the  चौथी  largest  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  student population of  कोई  university  in   the   संयुक्त  States .
purdue  offers both undergraduate  और  graduate programs  in   over   211  major  क्षेत्रों   of  study , and is well known for  इसके   प्रतिस्पर्धी  engineering  curricula  .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों  has also  महरूम  highly  influential   in  America 's  इतिहास  of aviation  ,   having  established  the  first  कॉलेज   क्रेडिट  offered  in  flight training  ,   the   पहला  four-year  स्नातक  's  उपाधि  in aviation  ,   और   the  first university  विमानक्षेत्र   (   purdue   विश्वविद्यालयों   विमानक्षेत्र  )  .
purdue  's  विमानन  technology program  remains  one of the  सबसे  competitive  aviation-specific   कार्यक्रम  in the  संसार  .
in   the   mid-20th  century ,  purdue   's   विमानन  program expanded  to   encompass   उन्नत  spaceflight  प्रौद्योगिकी  giving  वृद्धि   to  Purdue  's  nickname , Cradle  of  Astronauts  .
twenty-three   purdue   graduates  have  गए   on   to  become astronauts  ,   सहित   गस  Grissom  (   एक   of   the  original Mercury Seven astronauts  )  , Neil Armstrong  (   the  first person  to   चलना  on the moon ) , and  यूजीन   cernan  (  the   सबसे   हाल  person to walk on the moon  )   .
a   वसामय   गाँठ   (   )  is a  पद   कि  loosely refers to  either  epidermoid cysts ( also  ज्ञात  as epidermal  cysts   ;  L72.0 )  or  pilar cysts ( also  ज्ञात  as  trichilemmal  cysts ;  l72.1   )   .
क्युकी   an  epidermoid cyst  originates   in  the epidermis and a  पिलर  cyst originates  इससे  hair follicles  ,  by definition  ,   neither   प्रकार  of  गाँठ   is  strictly a sebaceous  गाँठ  .
The  नाम  is  regarded  as  a  misnomer  as  the  वसीय  ,  श्वेत   ,   semi-solid  material in  दोनो   of  these  गाँठ  entities  is   नहीं  sebum  ,   लकिन   keratin  .
furthermore  ,  अंतर्गत  the microscope  neither  entity contains  वसामय  glands  .
In practice  ,   however   ,  the terms  हैं   प्रायः   प्रयुक्त  interchangeably .
`` True  ''  sebaceous cysts are relatively  विरल  and  हैं   ज्ञात   as  steatocystomas or  ,   if   अनेक   ,  as steatocystoma multiplex .
Modern pointe  जूते  .
The edge of  the  toe  pad   ,  which is inserted between  the   पैर  and  टो   बक्सा   लिये   cushioning  , can be seen  on   the  right foot .
A  pointe  shoe  is   a   प्रकार   of  shoe  worn  by ballet  नर्तक  when performing pointe work .
Pointe shoes  विकसित  from  the   ख्वाहिश  for dancers  to  appear weightless  और   sylph   -like   और  have evolved  to  enable dancers to  नृत्य  en  pointe   (   on  the  नुस्ख़े   of  their toes ) for  विस्तारित  periods of time .
वे  are  सामान्यतः   worn   by   मादा   नर्तक   ,   हालांकि   पुरूष  dancers  may  wear  उन्हें   लिये  unorthodox roles  ऐसे  as the  भद्दा  stepsisters  in   सिंडरेला  , Bottom in A Midsummer Night 's  सपना   ,  or  मेन  performing as  महिलाओं  in  नृत्य  companies such as  लेस   नाटिकाओं   trockadero  and Grandiva  .
They  हैं  manufactured in a variety of  रंगों   ,  most commonly in shades  of  light  गुलाबी   .
This tablespoon  रै   a   क्षमता  of about  15   ml  .
measuring   spoons
In  the  US  और  parts of  कनाडा  , a tablespoon  is   the  largest  प्रकार  of  चमचा   प्रयुक्त  for eating from a bowl  .
in  the  uk  , Europe  और  most  राष्ट्रमंडल   देशों   ,   a   tablespoon  is a  प्रकार   of  large  चमचा   प्रायः  used for serving .
in  countries where a  tablespoon   is  a  सेवारत   चमचा  , the  निकटतम  equivalent to  the   us  tablespoon is either the  मिठाई  spoon  or  the soup  चमचा  .
a  tablespoonful , nominally the capacity  of   एक  tablespoon , is  commonly   प्रयुक्त   as  a  माप  of  आवाज़  in cooking .
It  is  abbreviated as  t  , tb , tbs , tbsp , tblsp ,  or  tblspn .
The  क्षमता   of  ordinary tablespoons is  नहीं   regulated  by law and  is   विषय  to  considerable   विभिन्नता  .
in  the  यूएसए  one tablespoon  (   मापन  unit )  is   लगभग  15 mL ; the capacity  of  an actual tablespoon (  डाइनिंग   utensil  )  सीमाएँ  from  7   ml  to 14  ml  .
in  Australia  एक  tablespoon  (  measurement  ईकाई  )  is   20  mL  .
Harry Potter  is  a  श्रेणी  of  सात   काल्पनिक   novels  written by the  अंग्रेजों  author J.  K.  Rowling .
the   किताबे  chronicle  the  adventures  of  a  जादूगर  , Harry  कुम्हार   ,  and his  मित्रों   रोनाल्ड  Weasley and Hermione Granger  ,  all  of   जिसको  are students  at   हॉग्वार्ट्स  School of  चुड़ैल   और   wizardry   .
The main story arc  चिंताएं  Harry  's  quest  to   overcome  the  अंधेरा  wizard Lord  voldemort  , whose  aims   हैं   to   become  immortal  ,  conquer the wizarding  संसार  ,  subjugate   non-magical   लोगों   ,   और   नष्ट  all those  जो  stand  in  his  रास्ता   ,  especially  हैरी  Potter  .
चूंकि  the release of  the  first novel Harry  कुम्हार  and  the   पारस  's Stone on 30  जून  1997  ,   the  books  have  gained immense popularity , critical acclaim  और   वाणिज्यिक  success worldwide  .
the   श्रेणी  has also had  कुछ  share of criticism  ,   सहित  concern for  the  increasingly dark tone .
,   the  book  श्रेणी  has sold about  450  million copies  ,  making  it  the  best-selling  book  श्रेणी  in history  ,  and has  महरूम  translated  into  67 languages .
The last  चार  books consecutively set records as the fastest-selling books in  इतिहास  .
A  श्रेणी   of  many  जाति   ,   सहित   काल्पनिक  and coming  of  age ( with  तत्व  of mystery ,  थ्रिलर   ,  adventure ,  और  romance  )  ,  it  has many  सांस्कृतिक  meanings and references .
according  to  रोलिंग   ,  the main theme is death .
वहीँ  are  भी   अनेक   अन्य  themes in the series , such  as  prejudice and  भ्रष्टाचार  .
The initial  प्रमुख  publishers of the  किताबे  were Bloomsbury  in  the United Kingdom and Scholastic Press  in  the  संयुक्त  States  .
the   किताबे  have since  महरूम  published  by   अनेक  publishers worldwide .
The books  ,  with  the   सातवाँ  book split  into  two parts  ,  have  महरूम   बना  into an  eight-part   फिल्मी   श्रेणी  by Warner  भाईs.   तस्वीरें   ,   the  highest-grossing film series  of   सब   समय   .
The  श्रेणी   भी  originated  much  tie-in merchandise  ,  making  the  Harry  कुम्हार  brand worth  in   excess   of  $  15  billion  .
Also due to the success  of  the  किताबे  and  films  , Harry  कुम्हार  has been used  लिये  a  थीम  park , The Wizarding  संसार  of Harry Potter in  सार्वभौमिक  Parks & Resorts  's  Islands of Adventure .

viking   5c  rocket  इंजन
a  rocket engine , or simply ``  प्रक्षेपास्त्र  ''  ,   is   a   जेट  engine that uses  तभी  stored propellant mass for forming  इसके   ऊँची   गति   propulsive   जेट  .
Rocket  इंजन  are reaction  इंजन  and obtain  thrust  in accordance with Newton  's   तीसरा  law .
चूंकि   वे  need  no  external material to  रूप  their  जेट  , rocket engines can be  प्रयुक्त   लिये   spacecraft  propulsion  as   खूब  as terrestrial uses ,  ऐसे  as missiles .
Most rocket engines are internal combustion  इंजन  ,  हालांकि   non-combusting  forms also exist  .
Rocket  इंजन  as  a   समूह   have  the highest exhaust  गतियाँ  , are by far the lightest , but  हैं   the  least propellant  कुशल  of  सब   प्रकार   of  jet  इंजन  .
``  ...  baby  One  अधिक  Time  ''  is a song  by   अमरीकी   रिकॉर्डिंग   कलाकार   britney  Spears .
It served  as  Spears 's debut  सिंगल  and title  track   इससे   उसके  debut studio album ,  ...  Baby One  अधिक  Time ( 1999 ) .
लिखा  by Max Martin and produced by Martin and  रामी  , `` ...  baby  One More  समय  ''  थी  released  on  September  30  ,  1998  , by  jive   रिकॉर्ड  .
After  रिकॉर्डिंग  and  sending  a demo tape with  an   अप्रयुक्त   सोंग  from  toni   braxton   ,   स्पीयर्स   हस्ताक्षरित  a  multi-album   सौदे   साथ  Jive .
`` ... Baby One More  समय   ''  is  a  teen  पॉप  and dance-pop  सोंग  that  refers  to a  लड़की  who  संताप  breaking up  साथ   उसके   बॉयफ्रेंड   .
The song received generally favorable reviews  इससे  critics  ,  who praised its composition .
``  ...   baby   एक   अधिक  Time  ''   attained   वैश्विक  success  ,   reaching  number  एक   in  every  देश  it charted  .
it  also  प्राप्त  numerous certifications  around  the world  ,  and  is  one  of   the  best-selling singles of all time  ,   साथ   over  10 million copies sold .
An  accompanying  music video , directed by  निगेल  Dick ,  portrays  Spears  as  a student from  a   कैथोलिक   ऊँची   स्कूल   ,  who starts to daydream  कि  she  is  singing  और  dancing  around  the  स्कूल  , while watching  उसके  love  ब्याज  from afar .
The music  वीडियो  was later referenced in  the  music  वीडियो  of ``  if   u  Seek  एमी   ``  (  2008  )  ,   जहाँ  Spears  's   fictional  daughter is  वेश  with  a   समान   schoolgirl   पहनावा  while wearing  गुलाबी   ribbons   in   उसके   बाल  .
In  2010   ,   the   म्यूज़िक   वीडियो  for `` ...  baby   एक  More Time ''  थी  voted the  तीसरा  most influential video  in  the history of pop music  ,   in  a poll held by Jam ! .
Spears has performed ``  ...  Baby One  अधिक   समय  '' in  a  number of  सजीव  appearances and in all of her concert  टुर  .
it  was  the  encore  of  the  ...   baby   एक   अधिक   समय   दौरे  (  1999  )  और  Dream  भीतर  a  सपना  Tour (  2001  ) ; Spears also performed remixed versions of the song  दौरान   the  Oops ! ...
I Did  it  Again  संसार   दौरे   (   2000  ) , The Onyx Hotel  दौरे   (   2004   )   ,   the  M+M  's   दौरे   (  2007  )   ,  The Circus  अभिनीत  Britney  स्पीयर्स  ( 2009  )   ,   और  the Femme Fatale  दौरे  ( 2011  )  .
``  ...  Baby One  अधिक   समय   ''   थी   मनोनीत   लिये  a  ग्रैमी  Award for  बेहतरीन  Female Pop Vocal  प्रदर्शन  , and has  महरूम  included in lists  by  Blender , Rolling  स्टोन   और   vh1  .
It  रै   महरूम  noted for  redefining  the sound  of   लेट  1990s  म्यूज़िक  .
Spears has  नामित   ``  ... Baby  एक   अधिक   समय   ''   as  one of  उसके  favorite songs from her career .
It was  भी  the  फाइनल   सोंग  to  be   निभाई  on the  बीबीसी  's music  कार्यक्रम  Top of the  चबूतरे   .
Cholera is  an   संक्रमण   in   the   छोटी   आंत  caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae  .
the  main symptoms are  watery  diarrhea and vomiting .
Transmission  occurs   primarily  by  पीने  water or eating  खाना  that has been contaminated by  the  feces  (  waste product ) of an infected  व्यक्ति  ,  सहित  one with no apparent symptoms  .
The  गंभीरता  of the diarrhea and  उल्टी   can   सीसे   to  rapid  निर्जलीकरण  and  electrolyte   असंतुलन   ,   और  death in some  मामले  .
the   प्राथमिक  treatment is oral rehydration therapy  ,   typically   साथ   मौखिक   पुनर्जलीकरण  solution ,  to   बदलें   जल   और  electrolytes  .
If  इस  is not  tolerated  or  करता   नहीं   provide  improvement  तेज़  enough , intravenous fluids can also  be  used .
Antibacterial drugs are  फायदेमंद  in those with  कठोर   बीमारी   to   shorten  its duration and severity  .
Worldwide ,  it   affects  3–5  लाख  people and  कल्याणकारी  100,000–130,000 deaths a year .
Cholera was  एक  of the earliest infections  to  be studied  by  epidemiological methods  .
The  चित्र  of Dorian  धूसर  is the only published  अनोखा   by  Oscar Wilde , appearing  as  the lead story  in   lippincott   's   मासिक  Magazine on 20 June  1890  , printed  as  the  जुलाई  1890  समस्या   of  this magazine  .
the   पत्रिका  's  सम्पादक   feared   the  story  थी  indecent as  सुपुर्द   ,  so they  censored  roughly 500  शब्द  , without Wilde 's knowledge , before  प्रकाशन  .
But  भी  with  कि   ,   the   स्टोरी   थी   स्टिल   greeted   साथ  outrage by  अंग्रेजों   reviewers  ,  कुछ  of  जिसको   सुझाया   कि   वाइल्ड   चाहिए  be  prosecuted   on  moral grounds , leading  वाइल्ड   to  defend  the   अनोखा  aggressively in letters to the  अंग्रेजों   दबायें  .
Wilde later revised the story for  किताब  publication ,  बनाना   substantial  alterations  ,   हटाना   विवादास्पद   passages   ,   adding  new  अध्याय  and including an  aphoristic  Preface which has  चूंकि   become  famous  in  its own  सही  .
The  amended  version was published by  वार्ड  , Lock  और  Company in April  1891  .
कुछ   विद्वानों   मानना  that  वाइल्ड   होता  today have wanted us to read  the  version  he  originally  सुपुर्द  to  lippincott   's  .
The novel tells of  a   यंग  man  नामित  Dorian Gray  ,  the subject of a painting by artist Basil Hallward  .
Basil  is   प्रभावित   by  Dorian 's beauty and  becomes   infatuated  with him ,  believing   उसके   सौंदर्य  is responsible for  a  new  विधि   in  his art .
डोरियन  meets  रब  Henry  wotton   ,   a  friend of Basil 's , and  becomes   enthralled   by  Lord  हेनरी  's world view  .
Espousing a new  hedonism  ,  रब   हेनरी  suggests  the  only things  लायक  pursuing in life are  सौंदर्य  and fulfilment of  the   होश  .
Realizing that one day  उसके   सौंदर्य  will  फीका   ,   डोरियन   (  whimsically ) expresses  a  desire to  बेचें  his soul to ensure the portrait Basil  रै  painted would  आयु  rather  than   he   .
Dorian 's wish is  fulfilled  , and when he subsequently  pursues  a  जीवन   of  debauchery , the  पोर्ट्रेट  serves as  a  reminder  of   the  effect each  अधिनियम   रै  upon  उसके  soul  ,   साथ  each  सिन  displayed as a  disfigurement   of   उसके  form  ,  or through a sign  of   वृद्धावस्था   .
The Picture of  डोरियन  Gray is  माना  a work of classic  गोथिक  fiction with  a  strong Faustian theme  .
Sári  gábor   (   born  6 February 1917 ) , known as  ज़ा  Zsa Gabor  (  ) , is a Hungarian -born  अमरीकी  actress who acted in supporting  भूमिकाएँ  in  फिल्मों  , on Broadway  ,  and occasionally  on   टेलीविज़न   .
Gabor  थी  also  a   socialite  .
She began  उसके   स्टेज   करियर  in Vienna  at  age 15 ,  और   थी   पहनाया  Miss  हंगेरियाई   in   1936  .
She emigrated to the  संयुक्त  States in 1941  और  became a sought-after actress  साथ  ``  यूरोपीय  flair and style '' ,  साथ   a  personality  कि  `` exuded charm and  अनुग्रह   ''   .
उसके  first movie role was  as   supporting  actress  in  Lovely  to   dekh   at  .
She later  acted   in  We 're  नहीं   शादीशुदा   !
and  निभाई   एक  of  उसके   few   अग्रणी  roles in Moulin Rouge ( 1952  )   ,  directed by John Huston , who described her  as  a  ``  creditable '' actress  .
Besides her film  और  television appearances , she is best  ज्ञात  for  having   नौ  husbands , including  होटल  magnate Conrad Hilton  और  actor George Sanders .
She once stated  ,   ``  Men  have   सदा   liked  me  और  I  have   सदा  liked men  .
But  i  like  a   mannish  man , a man who knows how to talk  to   और   दावत  a woman  –   नहीं   बस  a  man  with  मांसपेशियां  . ''
ब्रूस  Lee ( traditional  :   李小龍  ; born  ली   jun-fan   ;  27 November  1940  –  20   जुलाई  1973 ) was  a  Chinese American  martial  artist  ,  actor , martial  कला  instructor  ,   पारस  , and  फिल्मकार  .
The  संस्थापक  of Jeet Kune Do , Lee was  the  son  of   cantonese   ओपेरा   स्टार  Lee Hoi-Chuen  .
he   is  widely  माना  by commentators  ,   आलोचकों  , media and  अन्य   martial  artists to be  एक  of the most  influential   martial   कलाकारों  of all  समय   ,  and  a  pop culture icon  of   the   20th   सदी  .
He is  प्रायः  credited  साथ   helping   to   बदलें  the way  एशियाइ   यहूद   प्रस्तुत  in  अमरीकी  films .
ली   थी  born  in  Chinatown  ,  San  फ्रांसिस्को  on 27  नवम्बर   1940   to   अभिभावक  from Hong Kong and was  उठाया  in  कोलून   साथ   उसके  family until his  लेट   किशोर  .
He  थी   introduced  to the film industry by  उसके   पिता  and  appeared   in   अनेक  films  as   a   चाइल्ड  actor  .
Lee moved to the United States at the age  of  18 to  प्राप्त   उसके  higher education  ,  and it  थी  during  इस   समय   कि   he  began teaching martial  कला  .
उसके  Hong  काँग  and Hollywood -produced  films  elevated the traditional Hong  काँग   martial  arts film to a new level  of  popularity and  acclaim   ,   sparking  a surge  of   ब्याज   in  Chinese  martial  arts  in   the   वेस्ट   in   the  1970s  .
The direction and tone of  उसके   films  changed and  बहकावे   martial  arts and  martial   कला  films in Hong Kong  और   the  rest of the  संसार  .
He is  विख्यात   लिये   उसके  roles in  पाँच   feature-length  films  :  Lo Wei  's   the  Big Boss  (  1971 )  और  Fist  of  Fury  (   1972   )   ;   रास्ता  of the  ड्रैगन   (   1972  )  ,  directed  और  written by  ली  ; Warner  भाइयो   '   डालें   the  Dragon (  1973  )  और   the  Game  of  Death ( 1978 )  ,   दोनो   निर्देशित   by   रॉबर्ट  Clouse .
Lee  became  an  iconic  figure known throughout the world  ,   विशेषकर   among   the   चाइनीज  ,  as  he portrayed Chinese  राष्ट्रवाद   in  his films .
He initially  प्रशिक्षित   in  Wing Chun , but  बाद  rejected well-defined  martial  art  शैलियाँ   ,   favouring   बजाय   the  use  of   तकनीकों   इससे   विभिन्न  sources , in the  स्पिरिट   of  his personal martial arts philosophy , which  he  dubbed  जीत  Kune Do (  the  Way of the Intercepting  मुट्ठी  )  .
Lee  आयोजित  dual  नागरिकता  of Hong Kong and the United States .
He died  in  Kowloon  टोंग   on   20  July 1973 at age 32 .
Chronic obstructive  pulmonary  disease (  copd   )  , also known as chronic  obstructive   फेफड़ों  disease ( COLD ) , chronic obstructive  airway  disease (  coad  )  ,  chronic airflow limitation ( CAL ) and chronic obstructive  respiratory  disease ( CORD  )  ,  is   the   occurrence  of chronic bronchitis  or  emphysema  ,  a pair  of  commonly  co-existing   रोगों  of  the  lungs in which  the   एयरवेज़   सीमित  over time  .
इस   हद  airflow  to  and  इससे  the lungs  ,   causing  shortness  of   साँस  ( dyspnea )  .
in   नैदानिक   अभ्यास  ,  copd   is  defined  by  its  characteristically   कम  airflow  on  lung function tests .
In contrast  to  asthma  ,  this  limitation   is   poorly   reversible  and usually gets  progressively   बदतर   over   समय  .
COPD is caused by noxious particles or gas  ,  most commonly  इससे   तम्बाकू   धूम्रपान  , which triggers  an  abnormal inflammatory  जवाब   in   the   फेफड़ों  .
The diagnosis of COPD requires  फेफड़ों  function  परीक्षण  .
Important management strategies are smoking  cessation  , vaccinations  ,   पुनर्वास  ,  और  drug  चिकित्सा  ( often using inhalers ) .
Some  मरीजों   go  on to require long-term oxygen therapy  or  lung transplantation .
Worldwide , COPD  क्रमित   as   the  sixth leading cause of  मौत   in  1990 .
It is  प्रक्षिप्त   to   become   the  fourth  अग्रणी   कारण   of  death worldwide  by  2030 ,  due   to  an  बढ़ाएँ  in  धूम्रपान   दरों  and demographic changes  in   अनेक   देशों  .
COPD is  the  third leading cause of  मौत  in the  u.S.  , and  the  economic burden of COPD in the U.S. in 2007 was  $  42.6 billion  in  health care costs and  खोया  productivity .
Annelies  ``  Anne '' Marie Frank  (  , ?  ,   ;  12  जून  1929early March 1945 ) is one of the most  discussed  Jewish victims of  the   holocaust   .
Her diary has been  the  basis for several plays  और   films  .
Born in  the  city  of  Frankfurt  am   प्रमुख   in  Weimar Germany , she lived  सबसे  of  उसके  life  in   or   निकट  Amsterdam , in  the   नीदरलैंड्स  .
Born  a  German  नेशनल  , Frank lost  उसके   नागरिकता   in  1941 .
वो   gained  international fame posthumously after her diary  थी   प्रकाशित   .
It documents her experiences hiding  दौरान  the German occupation of the Netherlands  in   संसार   युद्ध  II  .
The Frank family moved  इससे  Germany to  एम्सटर्डम  in  1933  , the year the  nazis   gained  control over Germany .
By the  शुरूआत  of 1940 , they were trapped in  एम्सटर्डम  by  the   नाजी  occupation of the Netherlands .
As persecutions of the Jewish population  increased   in   जुलाई  1942  ,  the  परिवार   गई  into  छुपाना  in the  छुपा  rooms  of   ऐनी   's  father ,  ओटो   फ़्रैंक  's , office  भवन  .
After  दो   सालो  , the  समूह   थी  betrayed  और   transported   to   विशेषज्ञता   शिविरों  .
Anne Frank and her  सिस्टर  , Margot  ,  were  आखिरकार  transferred to  the  Bergen-Belsen concentration camp , where they died  of  typhus  in   कूच   1945   .
Otto Frank  ,   the  only survivor  of   the  family , returned  to   एम्सटर्डम   बाद  the war to  ढूँढें  that  ऐनी   's   डायरी  had  महरूम  saved  ,   और  his efforts  led   to   इसके   प्रकाशन  in  1947  .
It  थी  translated from its original  डच  and first published  in  English in 1952 as  the  Diary  of   a  Young Girl  .
it  has since been  अनूदित  into many languages .
the  diary  ,   जिससे  was given to  ऐनी  on her 13th birthday  ,  chronicles her life from 12 June  1942   जबतक   1   अगस्त  1944  .

कर्ट  Donald Cobain (  फ़रवरी   20   ,  1967 – April 5 , 1994 ) was an  अमरीकी  musician and artist ,  बेहतरीन  known  as  the lead singer , guitarist and primary songwriter  of  the grunge band  निर्वाण   .
Cobain  formed   निर्वाण  with Krist  novoselic  in  एबरडीन   ,  Washington in 1985  और  established it as part of the Seattle music  झाँकी  ,  having   इसके  debut  एल्बम  Bleach released  on  the  स्वतंत्र  record  लेबल   sub   पॉप  in 1989  .
After  हस्ताक्षर   साथ  major label DGC Records  ,  the band  मिला  breakthrough success  साथ  `` Smells  जैसे   टीन   स्पिरिट  `` from its  दूसरी  album  nevermind   (  1991 ) .
Following  the  success of Nevermind  ,  Nirvana was  labeled  `` the  फ्लैगशिप  band ''  of   पीढी  X  ,   और  Cobain hailed as ``  the   प्रवक्ता  of  a  generation '' .
कोबेन  ,  however  , was  प्रायः  uncomfortable  और  frustrated , believing his message  और   कलाकारी   दृष्टि   to   have  been misinterpreted by the  पब्लिक  , with his personal issues  प्रायः  subject  to   मीडिया  attention .
He challenged Nirvana  's  audience with its final studio album  in  Utero ( 1993  )  .
During the last years of his life ,  कोबेन  struggled with heroin addiction  ,   बीमारी  and depression  .
he   भी  had  परेशानी  coping with  उसके  fame  और  public image ,  और  the professional and lifelong personal  pressures  surrounding  खुद   और  his wife ,  संगीतकार   कोर्टनी  Love  .
On  अप्रैल  8  ,  1994 , Cobain was found dead at  उसके   घर  in Seattle  ,  the  शिकार   of  what  थी   officially  ruled a  आत्महत्या  by  a  self-inflicted  shotgun   घाव  to  the  head .
The circumstances  of  his  मौत   at  age 27 have become a  टॉपिक   of  public fascination  और  debate .
चूंकि  their debut , Nirvana  ,   साथ  Cobain  as   a  songwriter ,  रै   बेची   over  25 million albums  in   the  U.S.  ,   और   over   50  million  विश्वव्यापी   .

Master rod  (   कतरा  )  ,   स्लेव   और  balances  इससे  a  two-row   ,  fourteen-cylinder Pratt  &  Whitney Twin Wasp
The radial  इंजन  is a reciprocating  प्रकार  internal  दहन  engine configuration in which the cylinders point  outward  from a  सेंट्रल  crankshaft  जैसे   the   तीलियां   of   a   व्हील   .
it  resembles a stylized star when  viewed  from the front ,  और   is   पुकारा   a   ``   स्टार  engine '' ( German Sternmotor  )  in some  भाषाएं   .
the  radial configuration  थी  very commonly  प्रयुक्त  in  वायुयान  engines  पहले  turbine engines  became  predominant  .
The  सुनहरी  Girls  is   an   अमरीकी   sitcom   ,  created by Susan  हैरिस  , that  originally   aired  on NBC from September 13  ,  1985 ,  to   may  9 , 1992  .
अभिनीत  Bea  आर्थर  ,  बेट्टी  White , Rue McClanahan and Estelle Getty  ,   the  show centers  on  four older women sharing  a  home in Miami ,  फ्लोरिडा  .
It  थी   उत्पादित  by Witt/Thomas/Harris  प्रोडक्शन्स   ,   in  association  साथ  Touchstone  टेलीविज़न  , and Paul  junger   witt  , Tony Thomas , and Harris served as the  असली   कार्यपालिका   निर्माता   .
The  सुनहरी   लड़कियों  received  नाजुक  acclaim throughout most of its  चलाएं   और   जीती   अनेक  awards ,  सहित  the  प्राइमटाइम   एमी   पुरस्कार  for  बकाया   कॉमेडी  Series twice .
It  भी   जीती  three Golden  ग्लोब   पुरस्कार  for  बेहतरीन  Television Series – Musical or  कॉमेडी  .
All four  सितारों  each received  an  Emmy Award throughout  the   श्रेणी  '  चलाएं   और  had multiple  nominations  .
The series  भी  ranked  among  the top  टेन  highest-rated  कार्यक्रम  for  छह  out  of   इसके  seven  सीज़न  .
deepwater   खुदाई   is   the  process of oil  और   गैस  exploration  और   उत्पादन  in  गहराइयों  of  अधिक  than 500  फीट   .
by  this definition , there are approximately 600  deepwater   कुएं   in  the Gulf of Mexico  .
it  has  महरूम   economically  infeasible  लिये  many years ,  लकिन   साथ  rising  आयल   कीमतें  ,  अधिक   कंपनियाँ   हैं   निवेश  in  इस   क्षेत्रफल   .
प्रमुख  companies working  in   इस  sector  शामिल  Diamond  offshore  , TransOcean  ,   और  Baker Hughes .
There  हैं   मूलरूप   दो  kinds  of   मोबाईल   deepwater   खुदाई   rigs   :  semi-submersible drilling  rigs   और   drillships   .
Drilling can also  be  performed from  a   fixed-position   संस्थापना  such as  a  floating spar  (   मंच   )   or  tension-leg platform .
हाल  industry analysis  रै   अनुमानित  that the total  व्यय   in   the  global deepwater  अवसंरचना  market will reach  $   145bn  in  2011  .
“Not  सब   आयल  is accessible on land  or  in shallow water .
तुम  can  ढूँढें  some oil  जमा  buried  गहन  under  the   समंदर  floor.” ...  using   सोनिक  equipment , oil companies determine  the   खुदाई   साइट  most  संभावित   to   उपज  oil .
Then they  उपयोग   a   मोबाईल  offshore  खुदाई  unit ( MODU  )  to  खुदाई   the  initial well  .
कुछ   इकाई  are  परिवर्तित  into production rigs  ,  meaning they switch from  खुदाई   लिये  oil to  capturing   आयल  once  it   's  found  .
सबसे  of the time  ,   the   आयल  company will replace  the  MODU with a  अधिक  permanent oil production  रिग  to  कैप्चर   oil.”  ... The MODU 's job is to drill down into  the   समंदर   's   मंजिल  to find oil deposits .
The part of the  ड्रिल   कि  extends below  the  deck and through  the   जल   is   पुकारा   the  riser .
the   riser  allows  लिये  drilling fluids to move  between   the  floor  और   the   रिग  .
इंजीनियर्स  lower a  ड्रिल   स्ट्रिंग  -- a series of  पाइप  designed to  ड्रिल   bas  to  the  oil deposit -- through  the   riser.”
“The expansion of  deepwater   खुदाई  is happening despite accidents in  offshore  fields  ...  ”
in  2010  a   विशाल  explosion occurred killing  11   मजदूर  and  spilling  millions of gallons  of  oil into the  गल्फ  of  मैक्सिको   जबकि   a   bp  oil rig was drilling  in  deep  waters   .
“   ...  Despite the  risks  , the  deepwater   खुदाई   ट्रेंड  is spreading  in  the Mediterranean  और  off the coast of  ईस्ट   अफ़्रीकी  after a string of  विशाल   discoveries  of  प्राकृतिक  gas.”
“the  reason  लिये   the  resumption of  ऐसे   खुदाई  , analyst say , is continuing high demand for energy worldwide.”
America needs  the  oil  so   it  is almost  जरुरी  to face  the  high risks  कि  come with deepwater drilling in order  लिये  Americans to  continue   to  carry on their  रोज   जीवनदान   .
“The  उर्जा   विभाग   recently   प्रक्षिप्त   कि   गल्फ  oil  उत्पादन  would expand  इससे  its 2011 level  of  1.3 million barrels a day , still nearly a quarter  of   कुल   घरेलू   उत्पादन   ,  to  2  million  barrels   a  day  by   2020.”
deepwater   खुदाई  affects the  पर्यावरण  in  दोनो  negative and  धनात्मक  ways .
Although Deepwater drilling rarely causes  आयल  spills  it  is still  a   hazardous  possible  निष्कर्ष  .
आयल  spills  परिणाम  in oil  डूब   to  the  नीचे  of the  समंदर  smothering plant life leaving fish without food and  आश्रय  to  जीवित  .
on  the other  हाथ  deepwater drilling  प्रभाव   the  environment  in  a positive  तरीके  too  .
In  समय   एकबार   the  deepwater oil well is not in use  anymore  plants  होगा   grow   on  and  around  the well  बनाना   a  cave or cavern like shelter ideal  लिये   पशु  to thrive in .
deepwater  drilling also  lets   us   देखिए  the  गहराइयों  of the  समंदर  floor that  हैं  hardly  कभी  seen .
”cameras  on  रोवर्स   at  the bottom  of  the wells record  फुटेज   और   लो   फ़ोटो   of  rare  मछली  that are in there natural habitat , giving scientist  a   dekh  at animals they rarely  seen”  ( Chevron  निगम  ) . ''
मोनिका  Samille  lewinsky  (  born  July 23  ,   1973  ) is an American woman with  जिसको   संयुक्त  States  अध्यक्ष   विधेयक  Clinton  admitted  to having  था  an `` improper relationship  ''  while  वो  worked at the  श्वेत  House  in  1995  और   1996   .
The  affair  and its repercussions  (   जिससे  included Clinton 's  महाभियोग  )  became   ज्ञात   as   the  Lewinsky scandal .
Francis Albert  ``  Frank '' Sinatra , ,  (   दिसम्बर   12   ,   1915  – May  14  , 1998  )  was  an  American  सिंगर  and film  कर्ता  .
शुरूआत   उसके  musical career  in  the  झूले  era with  हैरी  James  और  Tommy  dorsey   ,  Sinatra  मिला  unprecedented  कामयाबी  as  a   सोलो   कलाकार  from the  जल्दी  to  mid-1940s  after  होने  signed  to   कोलंबिया  Records  in  1943 .
Being the  आइडल   of   the   ``  bobby  soxers  `` , he  released   उसके  first album ,  the  Voice of Frank  सिनात्रा  in 1946  .
His professional career had  stalled  by  the  1950s , but it was reborn  in  1953  बाद  he won  the  Academy Award for  बेहतरीन   supporting  Actor for his  प्रदर्शन   in   इससे   यहाँ   to  Eternity  .
he  signed with Capitol  रिकॉर्ड   in   1953  and released several critically lauded albums (  ऐसे   as  In  the  Wee Small  घंटों  , Songs  लिये  Swingin '  प्रेमियों  ! ,  आइये   मक्खी  with Me , Only the Lonely and  nice  'n  '  Easy  )   .
Sinatra  बाएँ  Capitol to found his own record  लेबल  , Reprise  रिकॉर्ड  in  1961  (  ढूंढना   कामयाबी  with  एल्बम   ऐसे   as  Ring-a-Ding-Ding  !  , Sinatra at  the  Sands and Francis  अल्बर्ट  Sinatra & Antonio Carlos Jobim  )   ,  toured internationally ,  थी   a   founding   सदस्य   of   the  Rat Pack  और  fraternized with celebrities and statesmen ,  सहित   जॉन  F. Kennedy .
Sinatra turned 50 in 1965 , recorded the retrospective  सितंबर  of My  सालो  ,  स्ट्रक्चर   in  the Emmy  -winning  television  खास  Frank Sinatra :  a   man   और  His Music , and  scored  hits  साथ  `` Strangers  in  the  रात्रि   ``  and  ``  My  रास्ता  ``  .
With sales  of  his  म्यूज़िक   dwindling  and after  appearing   in  several poorly received  films  ,  सिनात्रा  retired  लिये  the first time  in   1971  .
Two years later  ,   however  , he  आए  out of  रिटायरमेंट  and in  1973  recorded  अनेक  albums  ,  scoring a Top 40 hit with ``  (  Theme From )  नई  York  ,  New York  ``  in  1980  .
Using his  लास  Vegas shows as a home  आधार  , he  toured   दोनो   भीतर  the  संयुक्त  States and internationally , until a short time before  उसके   मौत  in 1998  .
Sinatra  भी   forged  a highly successful  करियर  as a film actor .
बाद  winning  बेहतरीन   supporting   कर्ता  in  1953  ,  he  also garnered a  नामांकन  for Best Actor  लिये  The Man  साथ   the   सुनहरी  Arm  ,   और  critical acclaim  लिये  his  प्रदर्शन  in The Manchurian Candidate .
he  also  स्ट्रक्चर   in  such  musicals   as  High  समाज   ,   pal  Joey  ,  Guys  और   डॉल  and On  the  Town .
Sinatra was honored  at   the   कैनेडी   बीच   honors   in  1983  और  was awarded  the   अध्यक्षीय   पदक  of Freedom  by   रोनाल्ड   reagan   in   1985  and the Congressional Gold Medal in 1997 .
He was  the   प्राप्तकर्ता  of eleven  ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार  ,  सहित  the  ग्रैमी  Trustees  पुरस्कार  , Grammy  लेजेंड   पुरस्कार   और  the Grammy  आजीवन  Achievement Award  .
Sinatra is also  एक  of  world’s  best-selling artists  of  all  समय  ,  having   बेची   अधिक  than  150   लाख   नक़ल  worldwide  .
Typical cornhole board
cornhole   ,   भी   ज्ञात   as   सेम   थैला   टॉस  ,  मकई   टॉस  ,  baggo   or  bags  ,  is  a  lawn  खेल  in which players  लो  turns throwing corn hole bags at  a  raised platform with a hole  in  the  दूर  end  .
A  थैला  in  the   छेद  scores  3   अंक   ,  while  एक  on  the   मंच   स्कोर   1   पाइंट  .
Play continues until a team or  खिलाड़ी  reaches the score of  21  .
The American  सुनहरा   त्रिभुज   is   an  official  सुनहरा  bullion  सिक्का   of   the   संयुक्त   राज्य  .
Authorized under the  सुनहरा  Bullion Coin Act of  1985  , it was first released by  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   मिंट  in  1986  .
Bikram  योग  is a  प्रणाली  of  योग   कि  Bikram  choudhury  synthesized from traditional hatha  योग  techniques  और   popularized   शुरूआत   in  the early 1970s  .
All Bikram Yoga classes run for  90  minutes and  consist  of  the  same series of  26   postures  and  2  breathing exercises .
बिक्रम  Yoga is ideally  practiced  in a  रूम  heated  to  105°F  (  ≈  40.6°c  ) with  a  humidity of 40  %  ,  .
Christopher  माइकल   massey   (   born   26   जनवरी   1990  ) is an American actor , comedian  और  rapper best  ज्ञात   लिये   अभिनीत  as Michael  barret  in Nickelodeon  टेलीविज़न  series Zoey 101  .
massey  has  प्राप्त  many  पुरस्कार  and nomination including  a  Young  कलाकार  Award and  एमी  Awards  nominations   .
He is  भी  known  लिये  appearing  in   अनेक   commercials   in  the early 2000s  .
A  conventional  teaspoon made  of   बेदाग   स्टील   .
A  teaspoon   is   an   मद   of  cutlery and/or  a   measuring  instrument ,  as  well as a  ईकाई  of measurement of  आवाज़  in some countries  और  customs .
A  फर्न  is any  एक   or   अधिक   of   a   समूह  of about 12,000 species  of   पौधे  belonging to the botanical  समूह   ज्ञात  as Pteridophyta  .
नापसंद  mosses , they have  जाइलम  and  फ्लोएम  (  बनाना  them vascular  पौधे  )  .
They have  तना   ,  leaves , and roots like  अन्य  vascular plants .
Ferns reproduce via  बीजाणुओं  and have neither  बीज   nor   पुष्प  .
By far the largest  समूह  of ferns  is   the  leptosporangiate ferns , but ferns  as   पारिभाषित   यहाँ   (  also  पुकारा  monilophytes  )   शामिल  horsetails , whisk ferns  ,  marattioid ferns  ,  and  ophioglossoid   ferns   .
the  term pteridophyte also refers to ferns  और  a  few  other  बीजरहित  vascular plants  (   देखिए  classification section below  )  .
Ferns first  appear   in  the fossil record 360 million years ago in the  carboniferous   लकिन  many of  the  current families and species  किया   नहीं  appear until roughly 145 million years ago in the  जल्दी  Cretaceous (  बाद  flowering  पौधे  came to dominate  अनेक  environments ) .
Ferns  हैं  not  of  major economic importance , but some  हैं  grown or  gathered   लिये  food  ,  as  शोभायमान   पौधे  , for remediating contaminated soils  ,   और  have been  the  subject of  शोध  for their ability  to  remove some chemical pollutants from  the  air .
Some are significant weeds .
They also play a role  in  mythology  ,   आयुर्विज्ञान   ,  and art  .
Flat roofs  in   इसराईल
Flat roof  in  Los  एंजिल्स
A flat roof is  a  type  of   covering   लिये  a building  .
in  contrast to the more  sloped  form  of  roof ,  a  flat roof is horizontal  or  nearly horizontal .
The slope  of  a roof is  properly  known as its pitch  :   roofs   जिससे   हैं  nearly flat are  ज्ञात  as low-pitch roofs  (   as   the  angle  of  slope increases ,  so  the pitch is said  to  increase  )  .
कोई  sheet of material used  to   कवर  a  चपटा   or  low-pitched  छत   is  usually known  as   a   झिल्ली  and  the  primary purpose  of   ये   झिल्लियों  is  to  waterproof the roof area .
Materials that cover flat  roofs   typically  allow the water to run off from a  पतला  inclination or  camber   into  a gutter system  .
Water from some  चपटा   roofs  such  as   on   गार्डन  sheds  sometimes  flows freely off the edge  of   a  roof  ,   हालांकि   gutter  systems  हैं  of advantage  in  keeping  दोनो   दीवारें  and  मूलाधार  dry  .
Gutters on  छोटी   roofs  often lead water directly  onto  the ground  ,  or better ,  into  a specially made soakaway  .
ड्रेनेज   on   larger  roofs  प्रायः   सीसे   जल  into  the   rainwater  drainage  प्रणाली  of  कोई  built up  क्षेत्रफल   .
occasionally   चपटा   roofs   हालांकि  are  designed   to  collect  जल  in a  पूल  , usually for  aesthetic  purposes  ,  or for rainwater buffering .
चपटा   roofs  exist  सब   over  the world and each area has its own tradition  or   वरीयता  for  सामग्री  used .
In warmer climes  जहाँ  rainfall is less  और  freezing  is   असंभावित  to occur , many flat roofs are  बस  built  of   चिनाई  or  कंक्रीट   और  this  is   शुभ   at   keeping  out  the  heat  of  the  सूर्य   और  cheap and easy to build where timber is not  readily   उपलब्धियाँ  .
In  क्षेत्रों   जहाँ  the roof could become  संतृप्त   by  rain  और   लीक  ,  or  where water  soaked  into the  brickwork  could freeze  to  ice and thus  सीसे   to  'blowing  '   (  breaking up  of   the  mortar/brickwork/concrete  by  the expansion  of   बर्फ  as  it   फ़ॉर्म   )   ये  roofs are  नहीं  suitable .
Traditionally most flat roofs in the western  संसार  make use of  तारकोल   or  more  प्रायः   तारकोल  paper applied  over  roof decking to keep  a  building  watertight  .
The tar  or   tarpaper  is in turn covered  in   बजरी  to  रखना   the  sun 's heat ,  uv   किरणें  and  मौसम   बंद   it  and  helps  protect it  इससे   cracking   or   blistering   और  degradation .
Roof decking is  प्रायः   of  plywood  ,  chipboard or OSB boards ( OSB  =   उन्मुख  Strand  फलक   ,  also known  as   स्टर्लिंग  board  )   of  around 18mm  मोटाई  .
The tar coating  is   लागू  in  एक  or more  coats   as   a   hot   द्रव   ,  heated in a  तारकोल   केतली  , or as  चादरें  of  तारकोल   impregnated   'paper   '   चिपके   bas  and sealed together at  joints  by hot tar -  एकबार  it  रै   cooled   ,   the  gravel is spread evenly over  it   .
A main reason  लिये  failure  of   ये   परंपरागत  roofs  is   अनभिज्ञता   or   कमी  of  मेंटेनेंस  where people or  कार्यक्रम  cause the  बजरी   to  be moved or  removed   इससे  the  तारकोल   or   tarpaper  waterproofing ,  यूँ  exposing it to weather  और  sun whereupon cracking and  blistering   occurs   over  time  और  eventually  जल  gets in  .
tarpaper   is  usually  a  'paper '  or  fibre  सामग्री   soaked   or  impregnated in tar .
as  gravel  can  not protect tarpaper surfaces where  वे  rise  खड़ा  from the roof such  as  on  मुंडेर  walls or upstands  ,  tarpaper  विसंगतियाँ  are  उत्पादित  with fine gravel applied  to   the  hot tar during the  प्रक्रम  of  manufacture  such that a  स्थाई  layer of  बजरी  is stuck  to  it  in  order to give it  जारी   सुरक्षा   .
tarpapers  vary  in   विशेषता  as does the  कारीगरी  and training  of   those  applying  it  to  उपज   अधिक   or   कम  successful results  .
In some  सूक्ष्म   climates  or shaded areas  ये   बल्कि  'basic ' tarpaper roofs  can   पिछला   खूब  in relation to  the   लागत  of materials  खरीदें  and cost  of  laying them  ,   however  the  लागत  of modern membranes such  as  EPDM has come down  over   हाल  years to  मेक   उन्हें  more  और   अधिक  affordable .
There  हैं  now  अधिक  firms supplying modern  विकल्प  and there is generally  a  growing  जागरूकता  of their  प्रदर्शन   और  availability .
If a  लीक  does  occur   on  a flat roof then damage often goes unnoticed  लिये   long   अवधि  of  समय   दौरान  which  जल  penetrates and  soaks  the decking and  कोई  insulation and/or  ढांचा  beneath  it  .
This can lead to expensive damage from the  दुर्गन्ध   जिससे  often develops  और  if left can weaken the roof structure  .
There  हैं   भी  various health  risks   to   लोगों   और   पशु  breathing  the   सांचे  spores  :   the  severity  of   इस   स्वास्थ्य  risk  remains   a  debated point  .
One problem  साथ   maintaining   चपटा  roofs  is   कि   if   जल  does penetrate the barrier covering  (   be  it traditional or a  आधुनिक   झिल्ली  )  it  can travel  a   long  way before  causing  visible  क्षति   or   टपकती  into  a  building  जहाँ  it  can  be seen .
यूँ  it  is  not  आसान   to  see where it is  टपकती  in  अनुक्रम   to  repair  it   .
एकबार   underlying   छत  decking is soaked  it   प्रायः  sags causing a  further   संग्रहण  or  puddling  of water  in   कि  area and the  प्रॉब्लम  worsens .
A CD-ROM ( ) is  a  pre-pressed compact disc which  contains  data  .
the  name is an  एक्रोनिम  which stands for  ``  Compact Disc  read-only   मेमोरी  `` .
Computers  can  read  cd-roms   ,   लकिन  can  नहीं  write  on  them .
cd-roms  are popularly used  to  distribute  कंप्यूटर  software , including video games  और   मल्टीमीडिया   अनुप्रयोग   ,   हालांकि  any data can be stored  (  up to the  क्षमता  limit of a  डिस्क   )   .
Some  cds  , called enhanced CDs , hold both computer  आंकड़ा  and audio  साथ  the  latter   सक्षम   of   होने  played on a CD player  ,   जबकि   आंकड़ा  (  ऐसे  as software  or  digital video ) is  तभी  usable  on  a  कंप्यूटर  ( such as  आईएसओ  9660 format  pc  CD-ROMs ) .
The  पीला  Book is  the  technical standard that  defines   the  format of CD-ROMs .
एक  of  a   नियत  of color-bound books that  contain  the  तकनीकी  specifications  लिये   सब   cd   स्वरुप  , the Yellow  किताब  ,  निर्मित  by Sony and  फिलिप्स   ,  was  the  first  एक्सटेंशन   of  Compact  डिस्क   डिजिटल   ऑडियो  .
it   adapted  the  स्वरूप  to hold any form of  आंकड़ा   .
Joanne `` Jo ''  रोलिंग  ( )  ,  (  born  31 July 1965  )  ,  कलम   नाम  J.  K.  Rowling ,  is   a  British  उपन्यासकार  , best  ज्ञात   as   the  author  of   the   हैरी  Potter  काल्पनिक   श्रेणी  .
the  Potter  किताबे   have   gained   विश्वव्यापी  attention , won  अनेक   पुरस्कार  ,  और  sold  अधिक   than  400 million  नक़ल   .
They have become the best-selling  किताब  series in history  ,   और   महरूम  the  आधार  for a series  of  films which has become the highest-grossing  फिल्मी   श्रेणी  in history .
Rowling had overall approval on  the  scripts as well as maintaining  रचनात्मक   कंट्रोल   by  serving as a producer  on   the  final instalment  .
Born  in   yate   ,  Gloucestershire ,  रोलिंग  was  working  as a  शोधकर्ता  and  दुभाषिया  secretary for  माफ़ी   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  when she  conceived   the  idea  लिये  the Harry Potter series on  a  delayed train  इससे   मैनचेस्टर  to London  in  1990 .
the   seven-year  period that  followed  entailed the death  of  her  माँ   ,  divorce from  उसके   पहला   husband   और  poverty until Rowling  समाप्त   the   पहला   अनोखा  in the series , Harry  कुम्हार  and the  पारस  's  स्टोन   (  1997 ) .
Rowling subsequently published 6 sequels—the  पिछला  , Harry  कुम्हार  and the  deathly   hallows  (  2007  ) —as well as  3  supplements to  the  series .
in  2012 , Rowling  parted  with  उसके   एजेंसी  and resumed writing in the  रूप   of  a tragicomedy novel  aimed   at   वयस्क  readership , entitled The Casual Vacancy  .
Rowling  रै  said  वो  is currently working  on  two books—one  aimed  for adults  ,  the other for children  younger  than the Harry Potter  दर्शक  , and she expects the  latter  to be published first  .
रोलिंग  has led a  ``  rags  to  riches  ``  life  स्टोरी  , in  जिससे  she progressed from living  on   राज्य  benefits to  multi-millionaire  status within five years .
She is  the  United  किंगडम  's  best-selling  author since records began  ,  with  बिक्री  in excess  of   £238m   .
The  2008  Sunday Times  समृद्ध  List  अनुमानित  Rowling 's  सौभाग्य  at £560 million (  $   798   लाख  )  ,   रैंकिंग  her  as  the  बारहवीं  richest  स्त्री   in   the  United  किंगडम  .
Forbes  क्रमित  Rowling as  the  forty-eighth  सबसे  powerful  हस्ती   of   2007  ,  और  TIME magazine  नामित  her as a runner-up for  इसके  2007  व्यक्ति  of the  साल  , noting the social , moral , and  राजनैतिक  inspiration she has given her fans .
In  अक्तूबर  2010 , Rowling was named the  ``  Most Influential Woman in  ब्रिटेन   ''   by  leading  पत्रिका  editors  .
She  रै  become a notable philanthropist  ,   supporting  such charities  as  Comic  राहत  ,  एक   जनक  Families  ,  Multiple Sclerosis  समाज   of   ग्रेट  Britain and Lumos (  formerly  the Children  's  High Level  समूह   )   .
Auburndale is a city in  polk   काउंटी   ,   फ्लोरिडा  ,  संयुक्त  States .
the  population was 11,032 at  the   2000  census  .
According to  the   u.s   जनसांख्यिकी  estimates  of  2005  ,  the  नगर  had a population  of  12,381 .

The eye  ,  eyewall , and surrounding  rainbands  , characteristics of tropical  cyclones  , are  clearly  visible in  इस  view  इससे  space  .
a  tropical cyclone  is  a storm  प्रणाली  characterized by a low-pressure  बीच   घिरी   by  a spiral arrangement of  thunderstorms  that produce  दमदार  winds and heavy rain .
तीव्र   cyclones   strengthen   जब   जल   काफूर   इससे   the   समंदर  is  released  as the saturated air rises  ,  resulting in  संघनन  of water vapor contained  in   the   नम  air  .
वे  are  fueled  by  a  different heat  यांत्रिकी   than   अन्य  cyclonic windstorms  ऐसे  as  nor'easters   ,   यूरोपीय   windstorms  , and  ध्रुवीय  lows .
The characteristic  कि  separates  तीव्र  cyclones  इससे  other cyclonic systems is  कि   at   कोई   ऊँचाई  in the  माहौल  , the center of a  तीव्र  cyclone  होगा   be  warmer  than   इसके  surroundings ; a  घटना   पुकारा  `` warm  कोर  ``  तूफ़ान   प्रणालियों  .
The  पद  `` tropical ''  refers  both to the geographical  उत्पत्ति  of  ये   प्रणालियों  , which usually form  in   तीव्र   regions   of   the  globe  ,  and to their formation  in   मेरीटाइम   तीव्र   एयर  masses .
the  term `` cyclone '' refers to such storms ' cyclonic  प्रकृति  , with counterclockwise wind flow in the  उत्तरी  Hemisphere and clockwise  हवा  flow in the Southern  गोलार्ध   .
the   विपरीत  direction  of  the  हवा   प्रवाह  is a  परिणाम   of  the  कॉरिऑलिस  force .
Depending on  इसके  location and strength  ,   a  tropical  चक्रवात   is  referred to by  names  such as  hurricane  (  ,   )   ,  typhoon ( ) ,  तीव्र  storm ,  cyclonic  storm , tropical  अवसाद  , and  बस   चक्रवात   .
While tropical  cyclones  can produce extremely  शक्तिशाली   हवाएँ  and  मूसलाधार   बरसात  , they  हैं  also  समर्थ  to produce  ऊँची  waves  ,  damaging storm  surge  , and tornadoes .
They develop over large  लाशें  of warm water , and  खोना   उनके   शक्ति  if they move over land  due   to   increased  surface friction  और   घाटा   of  the warm ocean  as   an   उर्जा   सोर्स   .
इस   is   क्यों  coastal  regions  can  प्राप्त  significant damage  इससे   a  tropical  चक्रवात   ,  while inland  regions   हैं   अपेक्षाकृत  safe  इससे  receiving strong  हवाएँ  .
भारी   rains  ,  however  , can produce  significant   बाढ़  inland  ,  and  तूफ़ान   surges  can  उपज   extensive   तटीय   बाढ़   up   to  from the coastline .
हालांकि   उनके  effects on  इंसान   populations  can  be   विनाशकारी  , tropical cyclones can  relieve  drought conditions  .
वे   भी  carry heat  उर्जा   दूर  from the tropics  और  transport  it   toward   शीतोष्ण  latitudes  ,  which makes  उन्हें   an  important part of  the   वैश्विक   वायुमंडलीय  circulation mechanism  .
As a result , tropical cyclones help to maintain  संतुलन  in the Earth  's  troposphere , and to maintain  a   अपेक्षाकृत   stable   और   गरम   तापमान  worldwide  .
Many  तीव्र  cyclones develop  जब   the   वायुमंडलीय  conditions  around  a weak  disturbance  in  the   माहौल  are favorable  .
The background environment  is  modulated  by  climatological cycles  और   पैटर्न   ऐसे  as  the   madden-julian   दोलन   ,   el   niño-southern  Oscillation  ,   और   the  Atlantic multidecadal  दोलन   .
Others form  जब  other types of cyclones acquire tropical  विशेषताएँ   .
Tropical systems are then moved by  परिचालन  winds in the troposphere ;  if   the  conditions remain favorable ,  the  tropical disturbance intensifies ,  और  can even  develop  an eye  .
On the other  समाप्त   of  the spectrum ,  if  the  शर्तें  around  the   प्रणाली   deteriorate  or the tropical  चक्रवात   makes  landfall  ,   the   प्रणाली   weakens   और   आखिरकार  dissipates .
it  is not possible  to   artificially   induce   the  dissipation of  ये   प्रणालियों  with  वर्तमान   प्रौद्योगिकी  .
Kirk Douglas  (   born   issur  Danielovitch ,  ;   दिसम्बर  9  ,  1916  )   is   an   अमरीकी  stage  और   फिल्मी  actor  ,   फिल्मी  producer and author .
उसके  popular films  शामिल   आउट  of the Past  (   1947  ) , Champion  (  1949 ) , Ace  in  the  छेद  ( 1951 ) , The  ख़राब  and the Beautiful (  1952  ) , 20,000  लीग   अंतर्गत  the Sea ( 1954 )  ,   हवस  for Life (  1956   )   ,   राहें   of  Glory  (   1957  )  ,   gunfight  at  the   o.k  . Corral (  1957   )  , The Vikings  (   1958  ) ,  स्पार्टाकस  (  1960  ) , Lonely  हैं   the  Brave ( 1962 ) , Seven Days  in   may  (  1964   )   ,  The Heroes of  telemark  ( 1965 ) and  मुश्किल  Guys (  1986  ) .
he  is  no.17   on  the  अमरीकी   फिल्मी  Institute 's  सूची   of  the greatest male American  स्क्रीन   महापुरूष   of   सब  time , making him the highest-ranked  जीना   व्यक्ति  on  the   सूची  .
in  1996  ,   he  received  the  Academy  मानद  Award ``  लिये  50  सालो  as a  रचनात्मक  and moral  फ़ोर्स   in  the motion picture community .  ''
he  is one of  the  last  surviving  actors  इससे  Hollywood 's ``  सुनहरी   आयु  ''  .
Robert Clark `` Bob  ''   seger   (  born  may  6  ,   1945  )  is  an  अमरीकी  rock and roll  singer-songwriter  , guitarist and pianist .
as  a locally successful Detroit-area  कलाकार  ,  he   performed  and recorded  as  Bob  seger  and  the   पिछला   सुना  and  bob  Seger System throughout  the  1960s .
by   the  early 1970s ,  he   था   dropped  the ``  प्रणाली  '' from  उसके   रिकार्डिंग  and continued to  नीयत   लिये   broader   कामयाबी   साथ  other various bands .
In 1973  ,  he  put   साथ  The Silver  गोली  Band , a  समूह  of Detroit-area  संगीतकारों  , with whom he became most successful  on  the national level  साथ  the album Live Bullet  ,  recorded  सजीव  with the  चांदी  Bullet  बैंड   in   1975   at  Cobo  हॉल   in  Detroit , Michigan .
In 1976 , he achieved  a   नेशनल  breakout  साथ   the   स्टुडियो  album Night Moves .
on  his  स्टुडियो  albums , he  भी   worked  extensively  साथ  the Alabama-based  मांसपेशी   shoals  Rhythm  खण्ड  , which  appeared   on   अनेक  of Seger  's  best-selling singles  और  albums  .
A roots  रॉकर   साथ  a classic  raspy   ,   चिल्लाना  voice ,  seger   लिखा   और  recorded  गीतों   कि   dealt  with  प्रेम   ,  women , blue-collar themes and was an exemplar of  heartland  rock .
Seger  रै  recorded many hits , including  ``   रात्रि   चालें  , '' `` Turn  the   पेज   ,   ''   ``  We  've  Got Tonight  ,   ''   ``   विरूद्ध   the   हवा   ,  ''  और   shakedown   कि   थी   लिखा  for  बेवर्ली   पहाड़ियाँ  Cop II  और  ``  जैसे  a Rock , '' and  भी   co-wrote  the Eagles '  number-one   hit  `` Heartache Tonight .  ''
His iconic recording of `` Old Time Rock  और  Roll  ``  was named one of the Songs  of  the Century in 2001  .
With a  करियर  spanning  पाँच  decades  ,  Seger continues  to   perform   और   रिकार्ड  today .
seger  was inducted  into  the Rock and  फेंकें  Hall of  कीर्ति  in  2004  and  the   songwriters   हॉल   of   कीर्ति  in  2012  .
रिचर्ड  Milhous  निक्सन  ( January 9 ,  1913   –  April 22 , 1994 )  थी   the   37th  President of the United  राज्य  ,  सेवारत  from 1969 to  1974   ,   जब  he became the  तभी   अध्यक्ष  to resign  the  office  .
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative  और   सीनेटर  from  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   और  as the 36th  वाइस  President of the United  राज्य  from 1953 to  1961   .
Nixon was born in  yorba  Linda ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
he  graduated  इससे   whittier  College in 1934 and  ड्यूक   विश्वविद्यालयों  School of  विधि   in   1937   ,  returning  to   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  to practice law  .
He and his wife ,  पैट   निक्सन  ,  स्थानांतरित  to Washington to work for  the   संघीय   सरकारी  in  1942   .
he  subsequently served in the  संयुक्त  States Navy  दौरान  World  युद्ध  II  .
Nixon  थी  elected in California to the  हाउस   of   प्रतिनिधि   in   1946   और   to   the   सीनेट   in  1950  .
His  pursuit  of  the  Alger  hiss   मामला  established  उसके  reputation  as  a leading  anti-communist  ,  और   elevated  him to national  prominence   .
he  was the  कार्यशील   mate  of Dwight D. Eisenhower  ,  the Republican  पार्टी   अध्यक्षीय  nominee in the  1952   चुनाव  .
निक्सन   परोसा  for eight years as vice  अध्यक्ष  .
He waged  an  unsuccessful presidential  अभियान   in   1960   ,   narrowly   खोने  to  जॉन   F.  Kennedy ,  और   खोया  a  रेस   लिये   राज्यपाल   of  California in  1962  .
In 1968  ,  he ran  again  for the presidency  और  was elected .
Although  निक्सन   initially  escalated America 's  भागीदारी  in  the   वियतनाम  War ,  he  subsequently ended  u.S.   भागीदारी  in  1973   .
निक्सन   's   विज़िट  to  the   लोगों   's   गणतंत्र  of  चीन  in 1972 opened diplomatic relations between  the   दो  nations ,  और  he initiated détente and  the   anti-ballistic  Missile  सन्धि  with the Soviet Union the same year .
Domestically , his  प्रशासन  generally embraced policies that transferred  शक्ति  from  वॉशिंगटन  to the  राज्य  .
Among other  बाते   ,   he  launched initiatives to  लड़ो  cancer  और   illegal  drugs , imposed  मजदूरी   और   दाम   नियंत्रण  , enforced desegregation of some Southern schools  ,   और   स्थापित  the Environmental Protection Agency  .
Though he presided over the lunar landings beginning  साथ   अपोलो  11 ,  he  scaled  वापस   मानवयुक्त  space exploration  .
He was re-elected  by  a landslide in 1972 .
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab  आयल   embargo  ,  the   इस्तीफा   of  his  वाइस  president  ,   spiro   agnew  , and a  continuing  series of revelations about  the  Watergate scandal and  अन्य  misconduct by  सदस्यों  of the  प्रशासन   .
the   कांड   escalated   ,   costing  Nixon much  of  his political  support   ,  and on August  9  , 1974 ,  he  resigned in the face  of  almost  निश्चित  impeachment  और   हटाना  from office .
After his  इस्तीफा   ,   he  controversially received  a   pardon  issued by his successor  ,  Gerald  घाट   .
In retirement , Nixon 's  कार्य   as   an  elder  statesman   ,  authoring several  किताबे   और  undertaking many foreign  यात्राएँ   ,  helped to  rehabilitate  his  पब्लिक  image .
he  suffered a  debilitating  stroke on  अप्रैल  18 ,  1994  ,  और  died  चार  days  बाद   at   the  age of 81 .
