the  Dominican Republic annexation  सन्धि  caused bitter  contention  between President Grant  और  Sen. Sumner .
Brady 1869  ]  ]
sen.  Sumner , opposed to American imperialism  in   the  Caribbean and  fearful  that  annexation  would lead to  the  conquest of the  neighboring  black republic  of   हैती   ,  became convinced  कि   भ्रष्टाचार  lay behind  the   सन्धि   ,  and that  मेन  close to  the  president  साझा   in  the corruption .
As chairman  of  the Senate  विदेशी  Relations Committee , Sen.  sumner   initially   withheld   उसके  opinion on  the  treaty on  जनवरी  18 , 1870  .
Sen.  sumner  had  महरूम  leaked  सूचना   इससे  Assistant Secretary  of   राज्य  , Bancroft Davis ,  कि   u.s   .  Naval ships  यहूद   होने   प्रयुक्त  to  protect  President  báez  .
sen.  Sumner 's committee  voted   विरूद्ध   annexation  and at Sen.  sumner’s  suggestion  और  quite  संभवतः   to  save the  पार्टी   इससे  an  भद्दा  fight or  the  president from  शर्मिंदगी  ,  the  Senate  आयोजित  its debate of the  सन्धि  behind  बंद  doors  in   कार्यपालिका   सत्र  .
President Grant persisted  और  sent  संदेश  to  कॉंग्रेस  in favor  of  annexation on March 14 ,  1870  ,  और  May  31  , 1870  .
In closed session  ,  Sen. Sumner spoke out  विरूद्ध   the   सन्धि   ;  warnng that  वहीँ  would  be  difficulty with the  विदेशी   नागरिकों   ,  noting the  दीर्घकालिक  rebellion that took place on  the  island ,  और   the  risk that  the  independence of  हैती   ,  recognized by  the  United States in 1862 , would  be   खोया  .
Sumner stated  कि  Grant 's use  of   the   u.S.  Navy as a protectorate was  a  violation of  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  law  और  unconstitutional .
Finally ,  on  June  30   ,  1870 the treaty was  voted  on by  the  Senate and failed to gain the  जरूरी  2/3  बहुमत  for treaty passage  .
The following  दिन  , President  ग्रान्ट  , feeling betrayed  by   sen.   sumner   ,   retaliated  by ordering the  dismissal   of  Sumner’s close  dost   J.  Lothrop Motley ,  दूत  to Britain  .
By  पतझड़   ,  Sumner  's  personal hostility to  the  president was  पब्लिक  knowledge , and he blamed the  सचिव  of State for failing  to  have resigned , rather  than  let Grant  have   उसके  way  .
The  दो   मेन  ,  मित्रों  until then  ,  cooled into bitter enemies .
in  December , 1870  ,  still fearful that Grant meant to acquire Santo Domingo  somehow   ,   sumner   दिया  a fiercely critical  वाक   accusing  the president  of   usurpation   और  Babcock of  unethical   conduct   .
Already  ,  President Grant  ,   समर्थित  by his  सचिव   of  State Hamilton Fish ,  था   initiated   a  campaign to depose  sumner   इससे  the chairmanship  of   the   सीनेट  Foreign Relations  कमेटी   .
Although Sumner stated he was  an  `` Administration  man   ''  ,  in  addition to  having   रोका   ग्रान्ट  's Dominican  गणतंत्र  treaty attempt ,  sumner   था  defeated Grant  's  full repeal  of  the  कार्यकाल   of  Office  अधिनियम   ,  blocked  ग्रान्ट  's  नामांकन  of  सिकंदर   स्टीवर्ट  to U.S.  सचिव  of Treasury  ,  and  महरूम   a   निरंतर   harassing  force pushing  पुनर्निर्माण  policies faster than Grant  था   महरूम  willing to  go   .
Grant  resented   sumner   's   बड़प्पन  of manner , as well  .
Told  एकबार  that Sumner did not believe in the  बाइबल  ,  the   अध्यक्ष  is  supposed  to have  कहा  that  he   थी  not  चकित   :  `` he did  n't   लिखें   it   .   ''
As  the   दरार   between  Grant and Sumner increased , Sumner’s health began to decline .
जब  the 42nd  u.S.  Congress  convened   on   कूच  4 , 1871 ,  सीनेटरों  affiliated  साथ  President  ग्रान्ट  , known  as   ‘’new  Radicals’’ voted  to  oust Sen. Sumner from the Senate Foreign Relations  कमेटी  chairmanship .
कारोबार  ethics ( also corporate  आचार   )  is  a  form  of  applied ethics  or   पेशेवर   आचार  that examines ethical principles  और   moral  or ethical problems  कि  arise in a business environment .
it   applies   to  all aspects  of   कारोबार  conduct and  is  relevant to  the   conduct   of  individuals and entire organizations .
कारोबार  ethics has  दोनो  normative  और   वर्णनात्मक  dimensions  .
As a corporate practice and  a   करियर  specialization ,  the  field  is  primarily normative .
Academics attempting to understand  कारोबार  behavior employ  वर्णनात्मक   विधि  .
The  दायरा  and  मात्रा  of business ethical issues reflects the interaction of profit-maximizing  बर्ताव  with non-economic concerns  .
Interest in business  आचार  accelerated dramatically during the  1980s  and 1990s  ,   दोनो   भीतर  major  corporations  and  भीतर  academia .
For example , today most  प्रमुख  corporations promote their  प्रतिबद्धता   to  non-economic  मान  under  headings   ऐसे   as  ethics  कोड  and  सोशल   जिम्मेदारी  charters  .
आदम  Smith said  ,  ``  लोगों   of  the  वही  trade seldom  मिलें   साथ  , even for  merriment  and diversion , but  the  conversation ends  in   a   षड्यंत्र   विरूद्ध  the  पब्लिक   ,  or in  कुछ  contrivance to raise prices  .  ''
सरकारें   उपयोग   कानून  and  regulations  to point business behavior in what they perceive to be beneficial  दिशानिर्देश   .
Ethics  implicitly  regulates  क्षेत्रों  and details  of  behavior that lie  परे   सरकारी   कंट्रोल   .
The emergence  of  large  corporations  with  सीमित   संबंध  and  संवेदनशीलता  to  the  communities  in   जिससे   वे  operate  त्वरित   the   विकास   of  formal ethics regimes .
A burn  is  a type  of  injury  to  flesh or skin caused by heat  ,  electricity  ,   रसायन  , friction , or  विकिरण   .
सबसे  burns  affect  only  the  superficial skin ( known as  सतही   or   पहला   उपाधि   )  or extend  into  the  deeper   स्किन  but do not  involve   the   पूरा  thickness of the skin  (   ज्ञात  as  आंशिक   मोटाई   or  second degree ) .
rarely   सब  layers of the skin  or   deeper   ऊतकों   ,  such as muscle  or   अस्थि   can  be injured  in  which case the burn  is  either full thickness  (   तीसरा   उपाधि  ) or  चौथी  degree  .
The  उपचार   जरूरी  depends  on   the   गंभीरता  of  the  burn .
Superficial burns maybe managed with little more than  सरल  pain killers  जबकि  major  burns   may   आवश्यकता   prolonged  treatment  in   specialized   बर्न   centers  .
Cooling  साथ  tap water may  सहायता   पीड़ा  and decrease  क्षति   however  if  एक्सपोज़र  is prolonged it  may  result  in  low  देह  temperature .
आंशिक  thickness  burns  may  आवश्यकता   सफ़ाई   साथ   साबुन   और   जल  followed  by   dressings  .
Blisters should  typically   be   बाएँ  unbroken .
पूरा  thickness  burns  usually require  सर्जिकल   उपचार   ऐसे  as skin  कलम   और   extensive  burns  प्रायः  require  विशाल  amount  of  intravenous fluids  .
the  most common complications of burns are  सम्बन्धित  to  संक्रमण   .
While large burns  can  be fatal ,  आधुनिक  treatments developed  in  the  पिछला  50 years  have  significantly  improved  the  outcomes  , especially  in   children   और  young adults  .
Globally about 11 million people  तलाश  medical  उपचार  and 300,000 people die  इससे   burns  .
In  the  United States  ,  of those  admitted   to  a burn center , approximately 4 %  die  from their injuries .
The long term  निष्कर्ष   is   primarily  related  to   the  size of  बर्न   और   the  age of the person effected  .
The  अटलांटिक  Ocean , not including  आर्कटिक   और  Antarctic regions
इस  video was taken by the crew  of   expedition  29 on board the ISS  .
the  pass starts from just north-east  of  the Island  of   न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  over  the   उत्तर  Atlantic Ocean to central  अफ़्रीकी   ,  over South Sudan .
The  अटलांटिक  Ocean is the second-largest of the world  's  oceanic  विभाजन  .
With  a  total  क्षेत्रफल   of   परिचय  , it  कवर  approximately 20 percent of the Earth 's surface and about 29 percent of its water  सतह   क्षेत्रफल   .
The first part of its name refers to Atlas of Greek  mythology  ,  बनाना  the Atlantic the  ``  Sea  of  Atlas  ''   .
The  oldest  known mention of `` Atlantic  ''   is  in The Histories of Herodotus around  450   bc  (  hdt   .  1.202.4 ) :  अटलांटिस  thalassa  (  Greek :  ἀτλαντὶς   θάλασσα   ;  English : Sea  of   एटलस  ) .
the   पद   ethiopic   समंदर  ,  निकला  from  इथियोपिया  , was applied to the southern  अटलांटिक  as late  as   the  mid-19th  सदी   .
पहले  Europeans discovered  अन्य  oceans ,  the   पद   ``  ocean  ''   itself   थी   synonymous  with  the  waters  परे   the   जलसन्धि   of   जिब्राल्टर   कि   we  now know  as   the  Atlantic .
The  जल्दी   यूनानियों  believed this  समंदर  to be  a  gigantic river  encircling  the world  .
the  Atlantic Ocean  occupies   an   elongated   ,   s-shaped   जलाशय   extending   longitudinally   between  Eurasia  और  Africa  to   the  east , and  the  Americas to the west .
as   एक   घटक   of   the  interconnected  वैश्विक   समंदर  ,  it  is connected  in  the  उत्तर  to the Arctic  समंदर  ( which is sometimes considered a sea of the Atlantic  )   ,   to  the Pacific Ocean in the  दक्षिणपश्चिम   ,  the  भारतीय   समंदर  in the southeast  ,  and  the   दक्षिणी   समंदर  in  the  south  .
( Other  परिभाषाएं  describe the Atlantic  as  extending southward to Antarctica . )
the  equator subdivides  it  into the North Atlantic Ocean and  दक्षिण  Atlantic Ocean .
Due to their  long-term  persistence  ,   और  the need for a unique identifier in issuing  forecasts   और  warnings ,  तीव्र  cyclones  और   उपोष्ण  cyclones are given  names  according  to  policy (  देखिए  Tropical  चक्रवात   नामकरण   )  .
The following  हैं  lists  इससे  which  ये  tropical and  उपोष्ण   चक्रवात  names are  निकला  .
White  लाइट   is  dispersed  by   a  prism  into  the colors of the optical spectrum  .
The visible spectrum is  the  portion of the electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम  that is  दृश्य   to  ( can  be  detected by )  the   इंसान   नजर   .
इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation in  इस  range  of  wavelengths  is   पुकारा   दृश्य  light or  बस  light .
A typical  इंसान   नजर   होगा   respond   to   wavelengths  from  परिचय  390 to 700 nm  .
In  शर्तें  of  आवृत्ति  ,  इस   corresponds  to  a  band in the  vicinity  of  430–790  THz .
a  light-adapted eye generally has  इसके   अधिकतम   संवेदनशीलता   at  around 555 nm ( 540  thz   )  , in  the  green region of the  ऑप्टिकल  spectrum  (  see : luminosity  फलन   )  .
the   वर्णक्रम   करता  not  ,  however ,  contain  all the colors that the human eyes  और   दिमाग   can   फर्क   .
Unsaturated colors such as  गुलाबी   ,  or purple variations  ऐसे   as  magenta  ,   हैं  absent , for  उदाहरण  , because they can  be  made  तभी  by a mix  of  multiple wavelengths  .
रंगों   containing   तभी   एक   wavelength   हैं  also  पुकारा  pure  रंगों  .
Visible  wavelengths  pass through  the  `` optical window `` , the region  of   the  electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम  which allows wavelengths  to  pass  largely  unattenuated  through  the Earth  's   माहौल  .
An example  of  this phenomenon is  कि   साफ   एयर   scatters   ब्लू   लाइट   अधिक   than  red wavelengths , and  so   the   midday   आसमान  appears  ब्लू  .
the  optical window is also  पुकारा   the  visible window  क्युकी  it  overlaps   the  human visible  जवाब  spectrum .
the  near infrared (  nir   )  window lies  बस  out  of  the human  दृष्टि  ,  as  well as  the   मीडियम  Wavelength  ir  (  mwir   )  window and the Long  wavelength   or  Far  इन्फ्रारेड  ( LWIR  or  FIR  )   खिड़की  though  अन्य   पशु  may  अनुभव  them .
Many species  can  see  लाइट  with  बारंबारता   बाहर   the  ``  दृश्य   वर्णक्रम   ,  ''  जिससे   is  defined in  शर्तें   of   इंसान   दृष्टि   .
Bees and many  अन्य   कीट  can  detect  ultraviolet light  ,  which helps  उन्हें   ढूँढें  nectar in flowers  .
संयंत्र   प्रजाति   कि   निर्भर  on  कीट  pollination  may   owe  reproductive  कामयाबी  to  उनके  appearance  in  ultraviolet light , rather  than  how colorful they appear to  इंसानो  .
Birds , too  ,   can  see into  the  ultraviolet  (  300–400 nm  )  , and some  have  sex-dependent  markings   on  their  plumage  that  हैं   दृश्य  only  in  the  पराबैंगनी  range .
Many  पशु  that can see  into  the ultraviolet  दायरा  , however , can not  देखिए  red light or any  अन्य   reddish  wavelengths .
मधुमक्खियों   '  visible  वर्णक्रम  ends at about  590nm  , just  पहले  the orange wavelengths start .
Birds ,  however   ,  can  देखिए  some red  wavelengths   ,  but not as many  as  humans  .
zebras   (  or )  हैं  several species of African  equids  (  घोड़ा   परिवार  ) united  by  their distinctive  ब्लैक   और  white stripes .
उनके  stripes come in different patterns ,  अद्वितीय   to   प्रत्येक   व्यक्तिगत   .
They are  generally  social  पशु   कि  live in  छोटी  harems  to  large herds  .
नापसंद   उनके  closest  रिश्तेदारों  ,  घोड़े  and  asses   ,   zebras   have   never  been truly domesticated .
वहीँ  are three  प्रजाति   of   zebras   :   the   मैदान   जेब्रा  , the Grévy  's  zebra  और  the mountain  जेब्रा   .
the   मैदान  zebra and  the   पहाड़  zebra belong to the subgenus Hippotigris , but  grévy   's  zebra is  the  sole species  of  subgenus  dolichohippus  .
the  latter  resembles  an  गधा  , to  जिससे  it is  closely  related ,  जबकि  the former  दो  are more  horse-like  .
All  तीन  belong to the genus  equus  , along  साथ  other living equids  .
the   अद्वितीय   धारियाँ  of zebras make  उन्हें   एक  of  the   पशु   सबसे   परिचित   to   लोगों  .
वे  occur in a  किस्में  of habitats  ,  such as  grasslands  ,  savannas   ,   वुडलैंड्स   ,  thorny  scrublands  , mountains ,  और   तटीय  hills .
however   ,  various  anthropogenic   कारकों  have had a  कठोर  impact on zebra populations ,  in   particular  hunting for skins and habitat destruction  .
Grévy 's zebra and  the  mountain zebra are endangered .
While plains zebras are  much  more plentiful ,  एक  subspecies  ,  the quagga , became extinct in  the   लेट  19th  सदी  –  हालांकि   वहीँ   is  currently a plan  ,  called  the  Quagga Project , that  aims   to  breed  zebras   कि  are phenotypically similar to the quagga  in   a   प्रक्रम   पुकारा  breeding back .
बैरी  White ,  born   बैरी  Eugene Carter  (  – ) , was  an   अमरीकी   composer  and  singer-songwriter   .
A  two-time  Grammy  पुरस्कार  -winner  ज्ञात  for  उसके   distinctive   बास  voice  और   रोमांटिक   चित्र   ,  White  's  greatest  कामयाबी   आए   in  the 1970s as  a  solo singer and with  the   प्रेम  Unlimited Orchestra  ,   crafting   अनेक   enduring  soul ,  दुर्गंध  ,  और   डिस्को  songs such  as  his two  biggest  hits , `` You 're  the  First  ,  the Last  ,  My  सबकुछ  ``  और   ``   ca  n't Get  पर्याप्त  of  अपना  Love , Babe  .  ''
साथ  with Isaac Hayes  ,  White  is   माना  by Allmusic.com as  a   पायोनियर   of  disco  म्यूज़िक   in   the  early  1970s  .
During  the   कोर्स  of his career in the music business ,  श्वेत   हासिल   106   सुनहरा  albums  विश्वव्यापी  , 41 of  जिससे   भी   attained   प्लेटिनम  status .
श्वेत  had 20  सुनहरा   और  10 platinum  singles   ,   साथ   विश्वव्यापी  sales in excess  of   100  million  ,  according  to  critics  ed  Hogan and  वेड   kergan  .
His influences  शामिल   रेव  . James Cleveland , Ray Charles , Aretha Franklin plus Motown  कलाकारों   the  Supremes  ,  The  चार  Tops and  मारविन   gaye  .
Angelina Jolie (  ,  born  एंजेलीना   जोली   वोइट  ;  जून  4  ,  1975 ) is  an  American actress  ,   फिल्मी  director  ,   और   screenwriter  .
वो  has received an Academy Award , two Screen  अभिनेताओं  Guild  पुरस्कार   ,   और   तीन   सुनहरी  Globe Awards  ,  and was  नामित   हॉलीवुड   's  highest-paid  अभिनेत्री  by  फोर्ब्स  in 2009 and  2011   .
जोली  promotes  humanitarian   कल्याणकारी   ,  and  is  noted for her  कार्य  with  शरणार्थियों  as  a   खास  Envoy  और   पूर्व   साख  Ambassador for the  संयुक्त   राष्ट्र   ऊँची  Commissioner  लिये   शरणार्थियों  ( UNHCR ) .
She  रै  often  महरूम  cited as  the   संसार  's  ``   सबसे  beautiful  ''  woman  ,   a   शीर्षक   लिये  which she has received  substantial  media  ध्यान   .
जोली  made  उसके  screen debut as a  चाइल्ड   alongside   उसके  father Jon Voight in Lookin  '  to  मिलेंगी  Out (  1982   )  , but  उसके  film career began  in  earnest a decade  बाद  with the  low-budget   उत्पादन  Cyborg  2  ( 1993  )  .
Her first leading  भूमिका   in  a  प्रमुख   फिल्मी   थी  in the cyber-thriller Hackers  (  1995 )  .
She starred  in  the critically acclaimed biographical television films George Wallace  (  1997 ) and  gia  ( 1998 ) ,  और  won  an  Academy  पुरस्कार  for  बेहतरीन   supporting  Actress for  उसके   प्रदर्शन  in the drama Girl  ,   बाधित   (   1999   )   .
जोली  achieved  चौड़ी   कीर्ति   बाद  her  portrayal   of  video  खेल   नायिका  Lara Croft  in  Lara Croft  :  Tomb Raider (  2001  )  ,   और  established herself among the highest-paid  अभिनेत्रियों   in   हॉलीवुड   साथ   the  sequel The Cradle  of  Life ( 2003  )  .
She  जारी   उसके  action star career with Mr.  &   mrs.  Smith (  2005  )  और   चाही   (  2008 ) —her  biggest   non-animated   वाणिज्यिक  successes to  date—and  received further  नाजुक  acclaim  लिये   उसके  performances in the dramas  a   mighty   दिल  (  2007  ) and  changeling  (  2008   )  , which earned  उसके   a  nomination for an Academy  पुरस्कार   लिये  Best  अभिनेत्री   .
Jolie made her directorial debut with  the  wartime drama In the Land of Blood  और  Honey ( 2011 ) .
तलाक  from actors  जॉनी  Lee  मिलर   और  Billy  bob  Thornton , Jolie now  जीवनदान   साथ  actor  ब्रैड  Pitt  ,  in  a  relationship notable for  fervent  media attention .
जोली  and Pitt  have  three biological children and  तीन  adopted children  .
a  natural  मेहराब   उत्पादित  by  the  erosion of  differentially  weathered rock in Jebel Kharaz  ,  Jordan
अपरदन   is   the   प्रक्रम   by   जिससे   मृदा  and  चट्टान  are  removed  from the Earth 's surface by exogenetic processes  ऐसे  as  हवा  or water flow , and then  transported   और  deposited  in  other locations  .
जबकि  erosion is a natural  प्रक्रम   ,  human activities have  increased  by 10-40  टाइम्स   the   रेट  at  जिससे  erosion  is  occurring  globally  .
excessive   अपरदन   कल्याणकारी  problems  ऐसे   as  desertification ,  decreases  in agricultural productivity due  to  land degradation , sedimentation  of   जलमार्गों   ,  and ecological  पतन  due  to  loss of  the  nutrient rich  अपर  soil layers .
जल  and wind erosion  हैं  now the two primary causes of land degradation  ;  combined , they  हैं  responsible for 84 % of degraded acreage , making excessive erosion  एक   of   the   सबसे  significant global environmental  समस्याएं   .
औद्योगिक   कृषि  , deforestation  ,   सड़कें  , anthropogenic  जलवायु  change  और  urban sprawl are  amongst   the  most significant human activities in  लिहाज़  to  उनके  effect on  stimulating  erosion  .
However , there  हैं  many  उपलब्धियाँ  alternative land use  practices  that can  काटना   or  limit erosion , such as  छत   -building  ,  no-till  agriculture , and  revegetation   of  denuded soils  .
Jersey  shore  is an American  वास्तविकता   टेलीविज़न  series which  भागा  on MTV  इससे  December 3  ,  2009 to December 20  ,   2012  in  the  United States .
The  श्रेणी   फ़ॉलो  the lives of eight housemates spending their  गर्मियाँ  at  the   जर्सी  Shore  in  the U.S.  राज्य   of   नई   जर्सी   .
Season 2  followed  the  डाल  escaping  the  cold northeast  शीत   to  Miami Beach  ,  with  ऋतु  3 returning to the Jersey Shore  .
the  fourth  ऋतु   ,  filmed in Italy  ,   premiered  on  अगस्त   4   ,  2011  .
The show returned  लिये  a fifth season  ,   at   seaside  Heights  on   जनवरी  5 , 2012  .
The fifth season finale  aired   on   कूच  15 , 2012  .
On March 19 ,  2012   ,  MTV  पुष्टि  that  the   श्रेणी   होता  return for their sixth  ऋतु   .
On August 30  ,  2012 ,  एमटीवी  announced that  the  series  होगा  end after the  छठे   ऋतु  , which  premiered  on October 4 .
The  श्रेणी  finale aired on  दिसम्बर   20   ,  2012 .
The show debuted amid large amounts  of   विवाद   regarding  the use  of   the  words  ``   guido  / Guidette  ,   ''  portrayals  of   italian-american  stereotypes ,  और  scrutiny from  स्थानीय   क्युकी   the  cast members were not residents of the area .
The series garnered record ratings for MTV ,  बनाना   it  the network 's most viewed series telecast ever  .
the  series  '  cast have also  महरूम  credited with  introducing  unique lexicon and  वाक्यांश  into  अमरीकी  popular  संस्कृति  .
The University of Chicago and the  विश्वविद्यालयों   of   ओक्लाहोमा   हैं  among  the  educational institutions that have had  वर्ग  or conferences  परिचय  the show .
In 2010  ,  the cast  of  Jersey Shore  थी   नामित  on Barbara  walters  ' 10 Most  fascinating   लोगों  list  ,   और  the series has since been  exported  to  दर्जनों   of  countries  विश्वव्यापी  .
वहीँ   हैं  several remakes  of  the  दिखाएँ  in other  देशों  ,  साथ  two set in the  संयुक्त  Kingdom ;  the  well  ज्ञात  Geordie Shore  ,   नियत   in   न्यूकैसल   upon  Tyne  ,   इंग्लैण्ड   .
The  अन्य  is  the   घाटियों  ,  the   वेल्श  equivalent , which  is   फिल्माया  and  नियत  in  कार्डिफ   .
the  only other  आधिकारिक  remake of  the  show is  gandía   shore  , set in  gandía  , Spain  .
सही
संयुक्त   राज्य   territory  is any  extent  of  प्रदेश   अंतर्गत  the jurisdiction  of   the  federal  सरकारी   of  the  संयुक्त  States  ,  including  सब  waters (  around  islands  or  continental tracts ) and  सब   u.s   .  Naval vessels .
the  United States has traditionally  proclaimed   the  sovereign rights  लिये  exploring , exploiting  ,  conserving  ,  and managing its  territory  .
This  extent  of territory  is   सब   the  area belonging  to  ,  और  under the dominion of  ,  the United  राज्य  federal  सरकारी  (  जिससे   शामिल  tracts lying  at  a  अलहदा  from  the   देश  )  लिये   प्रशासनिक  and  अन्य  purposes .
The United States  कुल   territory   शामिल   a  subset of  राजनैतिक  divisions  .
The U.S.  सरकारी   is   a   सरकारी   साथ  delegated powers under the  संयुक्त   राज्य  Constitution  .
``  the   शक्तियां   नहीं  delegated  to  the United  राज्य  by  the   संविधान   ,  nor  निषिद्ध  by  it  to  the   राज्य  ,  हैं   सुरक्षित  to the  राज्य   क्रमशः  ,  or  to  the   लोगों  ''  by  the Tenth  amendment  .
टर्मिनेटर  3 : Rise  of  the Machines  (  commonly  abbreviated  as T3  )  is a  2003   विज्ञान   fiction   कार्रवाई  film  निर्देशित  by  जोनाथन   mostow  and starring  अर्नाल्ड  Schwarzenegger  ,  Nick Stahl , Claire  danes  and Kristanna Loken .
It  is   the  second  sequel  to The Terminator (  1984  )  .
After Skynet fails to  मार  Sarah Connor before  उसके  son is  born  and to kill John himself as  a   चाइल्ड   ,   it   भेजना  back  another   टर्मिनेटर   ,  the T-X ,  in   an  attempt to  wipe   आउट  as many  प्रतिरोध  officers as possible .
This includes John 's  भविष्य   बीवी  ,  लकिन  not John himself  as   उसके   whereabouts   हैं   अनजान  to Skynet  .
John 's life is placed in danger when the T-X accidentally  पाता  him .
A cord of wood
the   cord  is a unit of measure  of  dry  आवाज़  used in  कनाडा  and the United  राज्य  to measure firewood and  pulpwood  .
a   cord  is  the   राशि   of  wood  कि  , when ``  क्रमित   और   खूब  stowed '' (  arranged   so   टुकड़े  are aligned ,  समानांतर   ,  touching  और  compact )  ,   occupies  a volume of  .
This corresponds to a  खूब  stacked woodpile high ,  long   ,  and deep ;  or  any other  व्यवस्था   of   रैखिक   माप  that yields  the  same  आवाज़   .
The name  cord  probably comes from  the  use  of   a  cord  or   स्ट्रिंग  to measure  it   .
The  ,  is an 8-bit  हैंडहेल्ड  video game  यंत्र  developed  और   manufactured   by   निन्टेंडो  .
It was  released   in   जापानी  on ,  in   उत्तर   अमेरिका   in  ,  और  in  यूरोपीय   on   .
it   is  the  पहला  handheld console  in  the  खेल  Boy line ,  और  was created  by  Gunpei  yokoi   और   निन्टेंडो   शोध  & Development 1 —the same staff  जो   था  designed  the  Game & Watch series  as  well as  अनेक   लोकप्रिय  games  लिये  the  निन्टेंडो   entertainment  System .
redesigned  versions  यहूद  released  in   1996  and  1998   ,  in the form of Game Boy Pocket ,  और  Game Boy Light  (  Japan  तभी  )  ,   क्रमशः  .
The Game Boy  is   निन्टेंडो  's  दूसरी  handheld system  following  the Game &  देखें   श्रेणी   introduced  in  ,   और   it   संयुक्त  features  इससे  both the Nintendo Entertainment System  और  Game & Watch .
It was originally bundled  साथ   the   पहेली  game  टेट्रिस  .
As  भाग  of  the  fourth generation of  गेमिंग  , the  खेल  Boy competed with  the  Sega Game Gear  ,   atari  Lynx  ,   और   the  TurboExpress  .
despite  these other technologically superior  हैंडहेल्ड  consoles  ,  the Game Boy was a tremendous success .
The Game  लड़के   और  its successor  ,  the Game  लड़के  Color  ,   have  both  संयुक्त  sold  118.69  million units worldwide .
Upon its release  in  the United States  ,  it sold its entire shipment of one million  इकाई   भीतर  weeks .
the  World Trade Center is  a   जटिल   of   इमारतें  under construction in  निम्नतर   मैनहटन  ,  नई   यॉर्क  City , United States  ,  replacing an  पहले   जटिल  of seven buildings with the same  नाम   on  the same site  .
The original World Trade  बीच  featured  लैंडमार्क   जुड़वा  towers  ,  which opened  on  April 4  ,   1973   और  were destroyed  in   the  September 11  हमले  of 2001 , along  साथ  7 World Trade  बीच  .
The other  इमारतें  in the complex  यहूद   क्षतिग्रस्त   in  the  हमले   ,   और   उनके  ruins were  आखिरकार   demolished   .
The  साईट  is  होने  rebuilt  साथ   पाँच   नई  skyscrapers and a memorial to those killed  in  the  हमले   .
, only one skyscraper  रै  been  समाप्त   ;   the   अन्य  four  हैं   अपेक्षित  to  be   समाप्त  before  2020   .
एक  World  व्यापार   बीच  will be the lead building for  the   नई  complex , reaching  अधिक  than 100 stories  at  its completion .
it   became  the  tallest   भवन  in  नई  York  नगर  on  अप्रैल   30  , 2012 , and is expected  to  be finished by 2013 .
a  sixth tower is awaiting  पुष्टि  .
At the time of their completion  ,  the  असली  1  संसार  Trade Center (  the   उत्तर  Tower )  और  2 World  व्यापार  Center ( the  दक्षिण   मीनार   )   ,   ज्ञात  collectively as  the   ``  Twin  मीनारें   ''   ,  were the  tallest  buildings in  the   संसार  .
the  other buildings included 3 WTC ( the Marriott  संसार  Trade Center ) ,  4  WTC , 5 WTC  ,  6 WTC  ,   और  7 WTC .
सब  of  ये  buildings were built between 1975  और   1985   .
The cost for  the  construction  थी  $  400  million  (  $ in  डॉलर   )   .
The complex was located in  the  heart  of   नई  York  नगर  's  शहर  financial district and contained 13.4 million square feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of office  स्पेस  .
the  World Trade Center experienced a fire  on  ,  1975   ,  a bombing on ,  1993   और  a robbery  on  , 1998  .
In 1998 , the Port  प्राधिकार   decided  to privatize  the  World  व्यापार  Center , leasing the buildings to  a   निजी  company to  मैनेज  ,  और  awarded  the  lease  to  Silverstein  गुण   in   .
On  the   morning   of  September 11  ,   2001   ,  Al-Qaeda -affiliated  hijackers   उड़ाया  two Boeing 767 jets into  the  complex , one into each tower  ,  in a  समन्वित  terrorist attack  .
बाद  burning for 56 minutes , the South Tower ( 2  )  collapsed  ,   followed  a half-hour later  by  the North  मीनार   (  1 )  ,  with the attacks on the World  व्यापार  Center resulting in 2,753 deaths .
Falling debris from the  मीनारें  , combined  साथ   फ़ायर  that  the   मलबा  initiated in several surrounding buildings  ,   led  to the partial or complete collapse of  सब  the other  इमारतें   in   the  complex and caused catastrophic damage to ten other  विशाल  structures in the  surrounding   क्षेत्रफल   .
The process of cleanup and recovery at the World  व्यापार  Center  साईट  took eight  महीने  .
over  the  following   सालो   ,   योजनाएँ  for a rebuilt World  व्यापार  Center  took  form .
The first new building  at  the site  थी   7   संसार  Trade Center  ,  which opened in  .
the   निम्नतर   मैनहटन   विकास   निगम   (   lmdc   )   ,   स्थापित   in  to oversee the rebuilding process  ,   व्यवस्थित  competitions to  चुनें  a site  योजना   और  memorial design .
Memory Foundations  ,  designed by  डेनियल  Libeskind  ,   थी  selected as  the   निपुण  plan  ,   लकिन   इस  went through substantial  परिवर्तन   in   डिज़ाइन  .
The new  संसार  Trade  बीच   जटिल   होगा  include  एक  World  व्यापार   बीच  , three other high-rise office towers , and the National September 11  मेमोरियल   &   संग्रहालय  .
San  जिबरील   kyu
San Bernardino Mountains , with  mt   .   सैन  Gorgonio  in  the foreground and  बिग  Bear Lake  in   the  background .
The Transverse Ranges are a  समूह   of  mountain  सीमाएँ  of  दक्षिणी  California  ,  in the Pacific  coast  Ranges physiographic region  in  North America  .
The Transverse Ranges  शुरू  at  the  southern end  of  the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  Coast  सीमाएँ   और   झूठ  between Santa Barbara and  सैन   डिएगो  counties  .
They  derive   the  name  अनुप्रस्थ  Ranges  due  to their East-West orientation  ,   बनाना  them  अनुप्रस्थ   to   the  general North-South orientation of most of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   's   तटीय   kyu   .
Periodic  तालिका  with electron  शेल
an  electron  शेल  may be thought  of   as   an   कक्षा   followed   by   electrons  around an  अणु  's nucleus  .
The closest  शेल  to the nucleus  is   पुकारा   the  `` 1 shell '' (  भी   पुकारा  `` K  शेल  ''  )  , followed by the ``  2   शेल  ''  (   or  ``  l   शेल  '' ) ,  तब   the  ``  3  shell  ''  ( or ``  m   शेल   ''  ) ,  और  so on farther and  दूर  from the  केंद्रक  .
The  शेल  letters K ,  l  ,  m  ,  ...   ,  used in  the  X-ray notation  ,  are  वर्णमाला   .
प्रत्येक   शेल   can   contain  only a fixed number of electrons  :  The  1st  shell can hold  up  to two  electrons   ,  the  2nd   शेल  can hold  up  to eight electrons  ,  the  3rd  shell can hold  up   to  18 , and  4th   शेल   can  hold up to  32   और   so  on  .
चूंकि  electrons are  electrically  attracted to  the  nucleus , an  अणु  's  electrons   होगा   generally  occupy outer shells only if the more  भीतरी  shells  have   already   महरूम   completely  filled  by  other electrons .
however  , this  is   नहीं   a   सख्त   आवश्यकता  : Atoms may have  दो   or  even three incomplete  बाहरी   शेल  .
(  देखिए  Madelung  नियम   लिये  more  विवरण  .  )
लिये  an explanation of  क्यों  electrons  मौजूद  in these  शेल  see electron  विन्यास  .
the   electrons   in  the outermost  occupied  shell (  or   शेल  ) determine the chemical  गुण   of   the  atom  ;  it  is  called  the   valence   शेल  .
Each shell  consists   of  one  or  more subshells  ,   और  each subshell consists of one or more atomic orbitals  .
Vickie  lynn  Marshall ( née  होगन  ; November  28   ,   1967   –   फ़रवरी  8 , 2007 ) ,  ज्ञात  by her moniker Anna  निकोल   स्मिथ  ,  थी  an American  मॉडल  ,  अभिनेत्री   ,  and  टेलीविज़न   व्यक्तित्व  .
Smith first gained popularity in Playboy ,  बनने   the  1993 Playmate of the  साल   .
She  modeled  for clothing companies  ,  including  अंदाज़ा   जीन्स   और   लेन  Bryant  .
Smith  dropped  out  of   ऊँची  school  और  was  शादीशुदा  in 1985 .
Her  अत्यधिक  publicized  दूसरी  marriage to  आयल  business mogul ,  J.  Howard Marshall ,  62   सालो  her senior ,  resulted   in   अटकलें  that she  शादीशुदा   the  octogenarian  लिये   उसके  money ,  जिससे  she  अस्वीकृत   .
following  Marshall 's  मौत   ,   स्मिथ   began   a   lengthy  legal  बैटल   over  a share  of  his estate  .
उसके  case  ,  Marshall  v.   मार्शल  , reached the U.S. Supreme Court on a  सवाल  of federal jurisdiction , and again on a question of bankruptcy  अदालत   प्राधिकार   (  now  पुकारा   stern  v. Marshall ) .
Smith  died   on  February 8 , 2007 in  a  Hollywood , Florida  होटल  room  as   a  result  of   an   overdose  of  नुस्खा  drugs  .
भीतर   the   फाइनल   छह   महीने   of   उसके  life ,  स्मिथ   थी  the  फ़ोकस  of a  नवीनीकृत   दबायें  coverage  surrounding   the  death of  उसके  son ,  डेनियल  , and the paternity and custody battle  over  her  नवजात   बेटी  , Dannielynn .
The  is  one denomination of Japanese yen  .
The current design  थी   पहला  minted in  1959  using Japanese characters known  as   the  ``  नई  script `` ,  और   यहूद   भी  minted  इससे   1949-1958  using `` old-script ''  जापानी  characters  .
Five-yen coins  तिथि  to  1870   (  when , due to the much  उच्चतर   मान   of   the  yen  ,   वे  were  minted  in gold  )  .
the  front of  the  coin depicts a rice  संयंत्र  growing  आउट  of  the   जल  , with  ``   पाँच  yen  ''  written in kanji ; the back  is  stamped with `` Japan ''  और  the year of issue , also  in  kanji ,  अलग  by  sprouts   of   a   पेड़   .
The  तीन   ग्राफिक   तत्व  of  the  coin represent  कृषि   और   fisheries  , the key elements of  the  Japanese first-sector  अर्थव्यवस्था  .
Around a  छेद   ,  there is  a   गियर  that represents industry  .
it  is  the   तभी  Japanese coin in circulation  to  lack  अरबी  numerals  on  either face  .
tlc   is  an American girl group  जिनकी   रंगमंडल  spanned  r  & B , hip hop ,  आत्मा   ,  funk  ,  and new jack  झूले   .
Originally consisting  of  singer Tionne ``  t-boz   ''   वाटकिंस  , rapper  लिसा  `` Left Eye  ''  Lopes  और   सिंगर  Rozonda ``  chilli   ''   थामस   ,  the  समूह  found unprecedented success  in  the 1990s while also enduring  a   श्रेणी   of   spats  with the  विधि  , each other  ,   और  the group 's record  लेबल  .
initially   ,  TLC  हासिल  commercial  कामयाबी  following the  रिलीज  of their debut album Ooooooohhh ...
On the TLC Tip ,  जिससे  sold 6 million  नक़ल  worldwide .
however  , it was  उनके   दूसरी  album , CrazySexyCool  ,  that catapulted the group to superstar status  .
crazysexycool  went on to be certified diamond  by   the   riaa   —   a   पहला  for a  मादा  group  ,  and eventually sold 23 million copies worldwide  .
Five years  बाद  ,  the   समूह  released their third  एल्बम  FanMail ,  जिससे   became   the  group  's  first album to debut at number one and  बेची  more  than   11   लाख   नक़ल   विश्वव्यापी  .
The subsequent tour  following   fanmails  release  became  the  उच्चतम   grossing  tour of  सब  time by a  मादा  band .
in   2002  ,  लिसा  ``  बाएँ   नजर  '' Lopes died in  a  car accident  in   होंडुरास  .
सात   महीने   बाद  , T-Boz and Chilli released the  समूह  's fourth album  3d  , which sold  2  million  नक़ल  worldwide ,  it  featured unreleased  vocals  from  बाएँ  Eye .
Billboard magazine ranked TLC  as  one of  the  greatest  musical  trios  .
between  1992 and 2003 ,  the  band  संचित   टेन   शीर्ष  ten  singles   ,   चार   क्रमांक   एक   singles   ,  four  multi-platinum  albums , and four  ग्रैमी  Awards .
At  the   समाप्त   of  1999 ,  tlc   थी   क्रमित   as   the  seventh  सबसे  successful act of the  1990s  by  बिलबोर्ड  .
In  2008  ,  the   समूह   थी  inducted into the All Time Hot 100 Artist Hall  of  Fame  by  the same magazine , at 56th place  .
कि  year  it   थी   भी   सूचीबद्ध  as  the  # 25  r  & B/hip-hop artist  of  the preceding 25  सालो  .
TLC  रै  sold more than  65  million records  विश्वव्यापी  and they are  क्रमित  as  the   दूसरी   बेहतरीन  selling female group of  सब  time , and the  बेहतरीन   selling  female  r  & B  समूह  of all  समय   .
In 2012 ,  tlc   क्रमित   12th   on  VH1  's  100 Greatest  महिलाओं  in Music  ,  being  क्रमित  the  क्रमांक   एक  all girl  समूह  on  कि  list .
टार्ज़न   is  a 1999  अमरीकी   एनिमेटेड  adventure film produced by Walt Disney  विशेषता   एनिमेशन  and distributed  by  Walt Disney  तस्वीरें  .
The 37th film in  the  Walt  डिज़्नी  Animated Classics  ,  it is  आधारित   on   the  story  टार्ज़न   of  the Apes  by  Edgar  राइस  Burroughs ,  और   is   the   तभी  major motion  चित्र  version of the story  टार्ज़न   प्रॉपर्टी  to  be   एनिमेटेड  .
निर्देशित  by  क्रिस  Buck and Kevin Lima  साथ   a  screenplay by Tab Murphy ,  bob  Tzudiker ,  और   नोनी  White ,  टार्ज़न   सुविधाएँ  the  आवाज़ें   of  Tony  goldwyn   ,   minnie  Driver , Glenn Close , and  रोजी   o'donnell  with Brian Blessed , Lance  henriksen  , Wayne  नाईट  ,  और  Nigel  hawthorne  .
it  was the last  bona  fide hit before the Disney  slump   of   the  early  2000s   grossing   $   171,091,819  domestically and $  448,191,819  worldwide ,  outgrossing  its  पूर्ववर्तियों  Hercules  (  1997  )  and Mulan ( 1998  )   .
At the time of its  रिलीज  ,  इसके   उत्पादन   बजट  of $  130  million made it the  सबसे  expensive animated film ever made  ,  until topped by Disney  's   अपना  $ 140 million Treasure  ग्रह  in  2002  .
It  थी   भी  the first Disney  एनिमेटेड   विशेषता   to  open  at   #  1 since  pocahontas  .
इस  was  the  last major box  दफ्तर  success of the Disney Renaissance  .
Oil Platform P-51 off  the  Brazilian  coast  is  a  semi-submersible  मंच  .
आयल   मंच  Mittelplate in  the  North  समुद्र
An oil platform , (  offshore   मंच   or  colloquially oil rig  )  is  a  large  ढांचा   साथ  facilities to drill wells , to  निकालें  and process  आयल  and  प्राकृतिक   गैस   ,  and  to   temporarily  store product until it can be brought to  shore  for refining  और   विपणन   .
In  अनेक  cases , the platform contains facilities  to  house  the  workforce as well .
Depending on the circumstances  ,   the   मंच  may  be   फिक्स्ड  to the  समंदर   मंजिल   ,   may   consist   of  an  कृत्रिम  island  ,  or  may  float  .
रिमोट   subsea  wells may also be connected to a  मंच  by flow lines  और   by  umbilical connections .
ये  subsea  समाधान   may  consist of  एक  or more  subsea   कुएं   ,   or  of one or more manifold  केंद्रों  for multiple wells .
Slaughter is the killing  of   पशु   ,  usually that  of   घरेलू  livestock for  खाना  .
the  animals  सबसे  commonly slaughtered  लिये  food are  चौपायों   ,   जल   भैंस  (  लिये   बीफ   और  veal  )  , sheep , goats  (  for lamb and  मटन  ) ,  सूअर  ( for  पोर्क  )  ,  horses (  लिये  horse meat ) , and  fowl   ,   largely  chickens ,  turkeys  , and  बतखों   और  increasingly  मछली  from the aquaculture  उद्योग   (  fish farming )  .
The  श्वेत   हाउस   ,   the  president  's  official residence and center  of  the administration
अंतर्गत   the   संयुक्त   राज्य  Constitution  ,   the  President  of   the  United  राज्य   is  the  सिर  of state and head  of  government  of  the United States  .
As chief of  the   कार्यपालिका  branch and head  of  the  संघीय   सरकारी  as a  पूरे  , the presidency is the highest political office in  the  United States by influence and recognition .
The  अध्यक्ष  is also  the  commander-in-chief of  the   संयुक्त  States  हथियारबंद  Forces .
The  अध्यक्ष  is indirectly  निर्वाचित   to  a  four-year  term by  an   चुनावी   कॉलेज  (  or  by  the  House of Representatives should the Electoral College fail to award an absolute  बहुमत  of  मत  to any person ) .
Since  the  ratification of the Twenty-second  amendment  to  the  United States Constitution in  1951   ,   no  person may  be  elected  अध्यक्ष  more than twice ,  और  no one  जो   रै  served more than  दो  years of  a  term  to   जिससे   किसी   else  was elected may be elected more than once  .
upon  the  मौत  , resignation , or  हटाना   इससे  office of an incumbent President ,  the  Vice President assumes the  दफ्तर  .
The President  जरूर  be  at  least  35   सालो   of  age and a `` natural born ''  नागरिक   of   the  United  राज्य  .
इस  list includes only  those   व्यक्तियों  who  यहूद  sworn into office  as   अध्यक्ष   following  the  अनुसमर्थन   of  the  संयुक्त  States Constitution , which  took   प्रभाव   on  March 4 , 1789  .
लिये  American  नेताओ  before  इस   अनुसमर्थन   ,  see President  of  the Continental Congress .
The list does not  शामिल  any Acting Presidents under  the  Twenty-fifth  amendment  to the United States  संविधान  .
There have  महरूम  43 people  sworn  into office  ,   और  44 presidencies  ,  as Grover Cleveland  परोसा   दो  non-consecutive terms and  is  counted  क्रमबद्धता  as both the  22nd  and 24th president .
Of the  individuals  elected  as  president ,  चार  died in office of natural  कल्याणकारी   (  William Henry  हैरिसन  ,  zachary  Taylor  ,  Warren  G.   हार्डिंग  , and  फ्रैंकलिन  D.  रूज़वेल्ट   )   ,   चार   यहूद   assassinated   (  Abraham Lincoln  ,   जेम्स  A. Garfield , William  mckinley   ,   और   जॉन  F. Kennedy )  और   एक  resigned  (   रिचर्ड  Nixon  )   .
जार्ज  Washington  ,  the first  अध्यक्ष   ,   थी  inaugurated in 1789 after  a   सर्वसम्मत   vote   of  the Electoral College  .
William Henry Harrison spent  the  shortest time in  दफ्तर   साथ  32 days  in  1841 , and Franklin  D.   रूज़वेल्ट   खर्च  the  longest   साथ  over twelve  सालो  , but  died   shortly  into  उसके  fourth term in 1945  .
He is  the  only president to  serve  more  than   दो   शर्तें  ,  और  a  संवैधानिक   amendment   ,  affecting presidents  बाद   हैरी  Truman  ,  was passed  to   सीमा  the  क्रमांक   of   टाइम्स  an individual can  be  elected president .
एंड्रयू  Jackson , the seventh  अध्यक्ष  ,  थी  the first to be  निर्वाचित  by  मेन   of  all classes in 1828  बाद  most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed .
वारेन   हार्डिंग   थी  the  पहला  elected after  महिलाओं  gained voting rights  in  1920 .
इतिहास   रिकॉर्ड   चार  presidents –  जॉन  Q Adams ,  रदरफोर्ड  B. Hayes , Benjamin  हैरिसन   और  George  W.   बुश  –  जो  lost  the   लोकप्रिय  vote but assumed  दफ्तर  .
John  F.  Kennedy  रै  been the only president  of   रोमन  Catholic faith ,  और  the  वर्तमान   अध्यक्ष   ,  Barack Obama  ,  is  the   पहला  president of African  descent   .
अनेक  firearms  साथ  detachable suppressors  ,  from  शीर्ष  to bottom :  an  Uzi  ,   an  AR-15 , A Heckler  &  Koch USP Tactical  ,  A Beretta 92FS , and  a   sig  Mosquito  .

a  suppressor  ,   ध्वनि  suppressor , or  ध्वनि  moderator , is  a  device  संलग्न  to  or   भाग  of  the   बैरल   of   a  firearm which reduces  the  amount of noise  ,  and  प्रायः  the  राशि  of muzzle flash , generated  by  firing the  हथियार  .
A suppressor can  be   प्रयुक्त   दोनो   साथ   a   firearm  and with  संपीडित  air gun .
हालांकि  it is  sometimes  referred  to  as a silencer , this  पद  is  a   misnomer   popularized   by  cinematic  fiction   :   the  sound  of  a  प्रक्षेप्य   ,  especially one  चलती  faster than the speed of sound  ,  through the air  can  not be eliminated  .
Using a  suppressor   in  long  अलहदा  shooting  (  i.e  .  greater than 300 meters ) can lessen ,  or   retard   ,  the report at  the  moment  of   प्रभाव   ,  and create the impression  of   खामोशी  near  the   निशाना   .
The noise heard  निकट  the  muzzle   as   a  projectile leaves  the   बैरल  ,  हालांकि  subdued , is  नहीं  silent at all .
A  suppressor  is usually a metal  बेलन   साथ   आतंरिक   mechanisms  to reduce  the  sound of  फायरिंग  by  slowing  the  escaping   propellant  gas  और   sometimes   by  reducing the velocity  of  the bullet  .
जल्दी  suppressors  यहूद  created  around   the  beginning  of  the 20th century by  अनेक  inventors .
American  आविष्कारक   hiram  Percy Maxim (  नहीं   to   be   उलझन   साथ  Hiram Stevens Maxim ,  hiram   पर्सी  's father ,  और  the  आविष्कारक  of  the   कहावत   यंत्र  Gun ) ,  is   credited  with  inventing   और   selling  the first  commercially   कामयाब   मॉडल   circa  1902  (  patented 30  कूच  1909 ) .
कहावत  gave his  यंत्र  the  trademarked  name Maxim  silencer   .
the  muffler  लिये  internal combustion  इंजन  was  विकसित  in  समानांतर   साथ   the  firearm suppressor  by  Maxim in the early  20th  century , using  अनेक  of the same techniques to provide quieter-running engines  (  in many European countries automobile mufflers are  स्टिल   पुकारा   silencers  )  .
the  word  silencer   in  reference to  गन  suppressor  remains  in  फैली   उपयोग  , although  it  has since fallen out of favor  साथ   कुछ   ,  especially  among  the  firearms  industry  ,  being  replaced  with the  अधिक  literally accurate term  ध्वनि   suppressor   or   बस  suppressor ,  क्युकी  a  ``  sound suppressor  ''  does not `` silence '' any weapon ,  बल्कि  it  eliminates   muzzle  flash and reduces  the  sonic pressure  of   a   firearm  discharging .
आम   उपयोग   और  U.S. legislative language favor  the  historically earlier term ,  silencer  .
In U.S.  विधि   ,  the terms `` firearm muffler '' and  ``   firearm   silencer   ''  are  synonymous  .
Suppressors were regularly used  by  agents  of   the   संयुक्त   राज्य  Office of Strategic Services , who favored  the   newly  designed High Standard HDM  .22  Long  राइफल   पिस्टल   दौरान  World War II .
OSS  निदेशक  William Joseph ``  जंगली  Bill  ''   डोनोवन  demonstrated  the   पिस्टल   लिये  President Franklin  D.  Roosevelt at  the   श्वेत  House .
According to OSS research  मुख्य  Stanley Lovell  ,   डोनोवन  (  an   बूढ़ा   और   विश्वसनीय   dost   of  the  अध्यक्ष  )  थी  waved into the Oval Office  ,  where Roosevelt  थी  dictating  a  letter  .
जबकि   रूज़वेल्ट  finished his  संदेश  , Donovan turned his back  और  fired ten  गोलियाँ   into  a sandbag he had  brought   साथ  him  ,  announced  कया  he had  किया  and  हात   the   धूम्रपान   गन  to the  astonished   अध्यक्ष   .
The British  soe   (  Special Operations  कार्यपालिका  ) Welrod assassination pistol  साथ   an   अभिन्न  suppressor was also used  by  the American OSS  on   clandestine  operations  in  Nazi occupied  यूरोपीय   दौरान   the  Second  संसार   युद्ध  .
Beatrice `` Bea '' Arthur (  may  13 , 1922 – April 25 , 2009  )  was  an  American actress ,  comedienne   ,   और   सिंगर   जिनकी  career spanned  सात   दशकों   .
Arthur  हासिल   कीर्ति   as  the  अक्षर  Maude  findlay   on   the   1970s  sitcoms All in  the   परिवार  and Maude , and  as  Dorothy  zbornak  on the 1980s sitcom The  सुनहरी   लड़कियों  , winning  एमी  Awards  लिये  both roles .
A stage actress  दोनो  before  और   बाद  her  टेलीविज़न  success ,  वो  won the  टोनी  Award for Best Featured  अभिनेत्री  in  a  Musical for her  प्रदर्शन   as   वीरा  Charles in the original cast  of   mame  ( 1966 )  .
is   a  2011 Japanese 3D  computer-animated   फिल्मी   आधारित   on  the Tekken  वीडियो  game  श्रेणी  , produced by Digital  frontier   और  distributed by Asmik Ace Entertainment  in   संघ  with  बंदाई  Entertainment .
The film premiered in  उत्तर  America  by  Bandai  entertainment   on  July 26 , 2011 , and  in  Australia  on  July 27 ,  2011   in   a  special exclusive one-off screening .
it   थी   released  on  सितंबर  3 , 2011 in  जापानी  .
The  फिल्मी   थी  released on  blu-ray   डिस्क   on   नवम्बर   22  ,  2011   लिये  USA  ,  and December 1 , 2011  लिये  Japan .
इस  film was also released on DVD on November 22  ,  2011 ( 2D Version  तभी   )  .
The  फिल्मी   थी  additionally  शामिल  with  the  PlayStation  3  game , Tekken Hybrid , and  the   निन्टेंडो  3DS title , Tekken 3D : Prime Edition .
For  a   चर्चा   of  nonprofit , voluntary neighborhood  वकालत   समूह   ,  see  पड़ोस  association .
In the United States  ,  a  homeowner  association  is  a  निगम  formed by a real estate developer for the purpose  of  marketing , managing , and  selling   of  homes and lots  in  a  आवासीय  subdivision  .
it  grants  the  developer privileged voting rights in governing the  संघ   ,   जबकि  allowing  the  developer to  निकास  financial and legal  जिम्मेदारी  of the  संगठन  , typically by  transferring  ownership  of   the  association  to  the homeowners  बाद   selling   बंद  a  predetermined  number  of   लोट   .
सदस्यता  in  the  homeowners association  by  a residential buyer is typically  a  condition of purchase ; a buyer is  n't  given an  विकल्प   to   अस्वीकृत  it .
Most  homeowner  associations  हैं  incorporated , and are subject  to  state  statutes  that  govern   non-profit   corporations  and  homeowner  associations .
राज्य  oversight of homeowner associations is  minimal   ,  and mainly takes the  रूप  of laws which  हैं  inconsistent  इससे   राज्य  to state  .
कुछ  states ,  ऐसे   as  Florida and  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ,  have   a   विशाल  body of homeowner association law , and some states ,  ऐसे   as  Massachusetts  ,   have  virtually  no  homeowner association law .
The fastest  growing  form of  आवास   in  the United States today  is  common-interest developments  (   cids  ) ,  a  category  कि  includes planned-unit developments of  single-family   घरों  ,  condominiums  , and  सहकारी  apartments  .
Since 1964  ,  homeowner associations  have   become  increasingly common  in  the USA .
The Community Associations Institute trade association  अनुमानित  that HOAs governed 24.8 million American homes  और   62   लाख   निवासियों  in 2010 .
