वहीँ   हैं  many breeds of  गिनी   सुअर   जिससे   have   महरूम  developed since its domestication  ca   .  5000  bc   .
Breeds  vary   widely   in   रूप   और  purpose ,  ranging  from show  breeds  with  long  , flowing  बाल  to  those  in  उपयोग   as   मॉडल   जीवों   by  science .
इससे  ca . 1200 AD  to   the  Spanish conquest  of  the Inca  साम्राज्य  in 1532 , selective breeding by indigenous  दक्षिण  American  peoples  resulted in many varieties of  घरेलू  Guinea  सूअर   ,  which  रूप  the  आधार   लिये  some  of   the  modern  घरेलू  breeds .
जल्दी  Andean breeds  यहूद  primarily  रखा  as agricultural  भण्डार  for  खाना   ,  and efforts  at  improving the  गिनी   सुअर  as  a   खाना   सोर्स  continue  to  the modern era  .
With the export  of   गिनी  pigs  to  Europe in the 15th century , the goal  in  breeding  shifted   to  focus on the  विकास  of appealing pets .
to  this end  ,  various competitive breeding  संगठन   यहूद   संस्थापित  by fanciers  .
The American  cavy  Breeders Association ,  an   adjunct  to  the  American Rabbit Breeders  संघ   ,  is the  शासी  body in the  संयुक्त  States  और   कनाडा  .
the  British  cavy   परिषद  governs cavy clubs  in  the  संयुक्त  Kingdom .
समान  organizations  मौजूद  in Australia ( Australian National Cavy  परिषद  ) and New Zealand  (  New  जीलैंड  Cavy  क्लबों   )   .
Each  क्लबों  publishes its own Standard  of  Perfection  और  determines  जिससे   breeds   हैं  eligible  लिये  showing .
New  breeds  continue to emerge  in  the 21st  सदी  .
हालांकि  there are many breeds of  गिनी   सुअर   ,   तभी  a  few  breeds are commonly found on the  दिखाएँ  table as  पालतु  .
Most Guinea pigs  मिला   as   पालतु  were  either  found undesirable  by   प्रजनक   or  were bred to be pleasant pets  regardless   of  how well they meet the  नस्ल   मानक  of  पूर्णता   .
the  short  बाल  ,  abyssinian   ,  Peruvian and Sheltie ( aka  silkie   )  breeds  हैं   those   सबसे   अक्सर  seen as pets , and the  पूर्व  three are  the  core breeds  in  the history of  the  competitive showing  of   गिनी  pigs .
in   जोड   to  their standard  रूप   ,   nearly   सब  breeds come in a Satin variant  .
Satins  ,  due to their hollow  बाल  shafts  ,   possess   coats  of a special gloss and  चमक  .
however  , there is  growing  evidence  कि   the  genes responsible  लिये  the Satin coat also  can  cause severe  अस्थि   समस्याएं   ,   सहित  Osteodystrophy and Paget 's  बीमारी  .
Showing Satin variations is  निषिद्ध  by  कुछ   cavy  breeders  '   एसोसिएशन  because of animal welfare reasons  .
All cavy breeds have some  साझा   सामान्य  standards  :   the  head  प्रोफ़ाइल   चाहिए   be  rounded  ,  with large eyes and large , smooth  कानों   .
The body should be strong and of compact  निर्माण  .
कोट  colour should in all variations be clearly defined  और   thorough   इससे  root  to  tip .
ये   मानकों  are best  मिले  by  long   स्थापित  ,  commonly   करवाया  breeds  ,   as  their  प्रजनक  have had enough time  और   पशु   to  effectively breed  लिये   ये  qualities  .
the  coat  रंग   आदर्श  of good  परिभाषा  and  thoroughness  is rarely met  by  other than  the  smooth coated  breeds  , which have had  खूब   स्थापित  , separate breeding lines  लिये  different colours .
State schools ( also known  as   पब्लिक  schools or  सरकारी   स्कूलों   )  generally refer to  प्राथमिक  or  द्वितीयक  schools mandated  लिये   or   offered   to  all children  बगैर   चार्ज  paid  लिये  ,  in   पूरे  or in  भाग  ,  by  taxation .
The term may also refer to  संस्थानों  of  post-secondary   शिक्षा   वित्तपोषित  ,  in   पूरे   or  in  भाग  ,  और  overseen by government .
The ribosome assembles polymeric  प्रोटीन  molecules whose sequence is controlled by  the  sequence of messenger RNA molecules  .
इस   is   जरूरी  by all living  कोशिकाएं   और  associated viruses  .
The ribosome  (   इससे   ribonucleic  acid  और   the   यूनानी  soma ,  अर्थ   ``  body ''  )  is a large and complex  आणविक   यंत्र   ,  found within all  जीना   कोशिकाएं   ,  that serves as the  प्राथमिक  site of  biological  protein synthesis  (  translation  )   .
Ribosomes  कड़ी  amino acids together  in  the order  निर्दिष्ट   by   मेसेंजर  RNA (  mrna  )  अणुओं  .
Ribosomes consist of  दो  major subunits—the small ribosomal  subunit  reads  the   mrna  ,  जबकि  the large subunit  joins  amino  acids  to form a polypeptide  कड़ी  .
Each  subunit  is composed  of  one or more  ribosomal  RNA ( rRNA ) molecules  और  a variety  of  proteins .
The sequence of  डीएनए   एन्कोडिंग   लिये   a   प्रोटीन   may  be  कॉपी  many times into messenger RNA  (   mrna  ) chains of a  समान  sequence  .
ribosomes  can  bind   to  an  mrna  chain  और  use  it  as  a  template for  determining   the  correct sequence of  अमीनो  acids in a  particular  protein  .
अमीनो  acids are  चयनित  ,  एकत्रित   और  carried to the ribosome by  ट्रांसफ़र   rna   (   trna   अणुओं  )  ,  which enter  एक  part  of   the   राइबोसोम  and bind to  the   मेसेंजर   rna   कड़ी   .
the   संलग्न  amino  acids  are  तब   linked  together by  another  part of the ribosome .
Once  the  protein is produced , it  can  then 'fold  '  to produce  a  specific functional  three-dimensional  structure .
A ribosome  is   बना  from complexes of RNAs and proteins and is therefore a ribonucleoprotein  .
Each ribosome is  विभाजित  into two  subunits  : the  छोटी   subunit   बांधता   to   the   mrna  pattern ,  जबकि  the larger subunit  बांधता  to the tRNA  और  the  अमीनो  acids .
जब  a ribosome finishes reading  an  mRNA  अणु  ,  ये  two subunits  विभाजित  apart  .
Ribosomes are  ribozymes  , because the  catalytic  peptidyl transferase activity  कि  links amino  acids  together is performed  by  the  ribosomal   rna  .
Ribosomes  इससे   जीवाणु   ,   आर्किया  and eukaryotes  (  the three  डोमेन   of  life on  धरती   )  differ  in  their  आकार  ,  अनुक्रम  ,  ढांचा   ,  and the  अनुपात   of  protein to  rna  .
the  differences in structure allow some antibiotics  to  kill bacteria  by  inhibiting their  ribosomes   ,  while  leaving  human  ribosomes  unaffected .
In bacteria  और  archaea , more than one  राइबोसोम  may move along  a   सिंगल   mrna  chain at one  समय   ,   प्रत्येक  ``  पढना   ''  its sequence  और   producing   a  corresponding  प्रोटीन  molecule .
The ribosomes in  the  mitochondria  of  eukaryotic cells  functionally  resemble  अनेक   सुविधाएँ  of those in bacteria  ,   reflecting   the  likely evolutionary  उत्पत्ति   of  mitochondria .
अल्बर्ट  Claude  ,  Christian de  duve  ,  और  George Emil Palade  यहूद  jointly  awarded   the   नोबेल   पुरस्कार   in   physiology  or Medicine , in  1974  ,  लिये  the discovery of the ribosomes .
the  Nobel Prize in Chemistry  2009  was awarded  to   venkatraman   रामकृष्णन  , Thomas A. Steitz and Ada E. Yonath for  determining  the  विस्तृत   ढांचा   और  mechanism  of  the  राइबोसोम   .
The simplified internal structure of  a   हरितलवक
अवलोकन   of   the   calvin  cycle and carbon fixation
the   light-independent  reactions  of  photosynthesis  हैं  chemical reactions  कि  convert carbon  डाइऑक्साइड  and other compounds into  ग्लूकोज  .
These  प्रतिक्रियाएँ  occur  in   the   stroma   ,  the  fluid-filled  area of a  हरितलवक   बाहर   of  the thylakoid  झिल्लियों  .
These reactions  लो  the light-dependent  प्रतिक्रियाएँ  and perform further chemical  प्रक्रियाओं  on them  .
वहीँ  are  तीन  phases  to  the light-independent reactions  ,   collectively   पुकारा  the Calvin  साईकिल   :  carbon  fixation  ,  कटौती   प्रतिक्रियाएँ   ,  and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP  )   regeneration   .
Despite  इसके   नाम   ,  this process occurs  तभी   जब   लाइट  is  उपलब्धियाँ  .
Plants  do  not carry out the Calvin  साईकिल   by  night .
वे  ,  बजाय  , release sucrose into the phloem  इससे  their  मंड   reserves  .
This  प्रक्रम   happens  when light  is  available  स्वतंत्र   of   the  kind of  photosynthesis   (  C3  कार्बन   fixation   ,   c4  carbon  fixation  ,  और   crassulacean   एसिड  Metabolism )  ;  CAM plants  स्टोर  malic acid  in  their vacuoles every night  और  release  it  by day in  अनुक्रम  to make  इस  process  कार्य  .
In mathematics , a square  क्रमांक  or  पूर्ण   वर्गाकार   is  an integer that  is  the square  of   an   पूर्णांक  ; in other words  ,  it is the  उत्पाद  of some integer  साथ  itself .
For example , 9  is   a   वर्गाकार  number  ,  since it  can   be  written as  .
The usual  संकेतन  for the formula  लिये   the   वर्गाकार  of a  क्रमांक  is not the  उत्पाद  , but  the   समतुल्य  exponentiation , usually pronounced as  ``   वर्गाकार  '' .
the   नाम   वर्गाकार   क्रमांक  comes  इससे  the name of the shape  ;  see below .
वर्गाकार  numbers  हैं   non-negative  .
Another  रास्ता   of   saying  that a (  non-negative  ) number  is  a  वर्गाकार  number  ,   is  that its square  जड़ें  are  again  integers .
लिये   उदाहरण   ,  = ±3  ,  so 9 is a square  क्रमांक  .
A positive integer that  रै   no   पूर्ण   वर्गाकार   divisors  except 1 is called square-free .
For a  non-negative  integer  ,  the  th   वर्गाकार  number is , with being the zeroth square  .
The  अवधारणा   of  square  can  be  विस्तारित   to   कुछ  other number systems .
If rational  संख्याएँ  are included ,  तब  a square  is  the ratio of  दो   वर्गाकार  integers , and  ,   conversely   ,  the ratio of two  वर्गाकार  integers is a square ( e.g.  ,  4/9  =  (  2/3  )  2  ) .
Starting with 1 , there are square numbers  up  to  और  including , where  the  expression represents  the   मंजिल  of the  क्रमांक   .
The Era  of   शुभ   जज्बात   चिह्नित   a  period  in   the  political history  of  the United States that reflected  a   भाव   of  national purpose and  a  desire for  एकता  among Americans in  the   aftermath   of   the  Napoleonic  युद्धों  .
The  era  saw the collapse of  the  Federalist  पार्टी  and an  समाप्त  to the bitter partisan disputes between it and the  प्रबल   democratic-republican  party  दौरान   the   पहला   पार्टी   प्रणाली  .
President  जेम्स  Monroe endeavored to downplay partisan  संबद्ध   in   बनाना  his  nominations   ,  with  the   परम  goal of national  एकता   और   eliminating  parties altogether  इससे   नेशनल   राजनीती   .
the  period is so closely associated  साथ   मुनरो  's presidency (  1817–1825   )  and his administrative goals that his  नाम  and  the  era are  वस्तुतः  synonymous  .
The  era   of   शुभ  Feelings marked  a  transition  in  American politics with  the  end of  the  Federalist  पार्टी  as America  began  to develop  बाद   the  War of  1812  .
जबकि  America  थी  experiencing growth  और  prosperity after  the  war  साथ  Britain ,  इस   era  also marks the first  उदाहरण  of  आर्थिक  troubles in the growing  संयुक्त  States  .
Mirroring the  अमरीकी  System proposed  by  Henry  मिट्टी   ,  protective tariffs and the chartering  of  the Second Bank of  the  United States complicated the tension between  the   उत्तर  and South  साथ   the  coming  of  the  पहला  financial  संकट   .
जबकि  the  पद  “Era  of  Good Feelings” is usually  viewed   साथ   विडंबना  because  of  the  राजनैतिक   turmoil   ,  economic  कारकों  caused  animosity   between   the  North and South  .
The designation of  the  period by historians  as  one  of  “good feelings”  is   प्रायः   conveyed  with irony  or   skepticism  , as  the  history of  the  era was one  in   जिससे  the political  माहौल  was strained and divisive , especially among factions within the Monroe administration  और  the Republican Party  .
the   phrase   “era  of Good  feelings”  was coined by  बेंजामिन  Russell  ,  in the Boston Federalist newspaper  ,  Columbian  centinel  , on  जुलाई  12 , 1817 , following  मुनरो  's  विज़िट  to Boston , Massachusetts as part of his good  होगा   दौरे  of America .
mariel   मार्गरेट  `` Mia  ''  Hamm ( born March 17 , 1972 )  is   a   रिटायर्ड  American professional  सॉकर  player .
Hamm played many years as a forward for  the  United States women 's national soccer team and was a founding member  of  the  वॉशिंगटन  Freedom .
hamm   scored  158  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  goals  ,  more than  कोई  other player  ,  male  or   मादा   ,  in the  इतिहास  of soccer  और  is the  तीसरा  most capped female  खिलाड़ी  in soccer history behind Kristine Lilly  और   क्रिस्टी   rampone  ,  appearing  in 275 international  मिलान  .
hamm  was  नामित  the women  's  FIFA World Player  of   the  Year the  पहला  two times  कि   पुरस्कार   थी   दिए   (  in 2001  और   2002  ) , and  is  listed as one  of   फीफा   's   125  best  जीना   खिलाड़ी   (  as chosen  by  Pelé  )   .
वो   थी   inducted  into the National Soccer  हॉल   of  Fame as well  as  the Alabama Sports Hall  of   कीर्ति  and  टेक्सास  Sports Hall of Fame  .
She  is  the  लेखक   of  Go  लिये  the Goal :  a   चैंपियन   's  Guide to  जीतना   in  Soccer  और   जीवन  and appeared  in   the  HBO  वृत्तचित्र   हिम्मत  to Dream : The Story of  the   u.S.   महिलाओं  's  सॉकर  Team .
वॉशिंगटन  Post columnist Michael Wilbon called Hamm ,  ``  Perhaps the most  महत्वपूर्ण   खिलाड़ी  of the  पिछला   15  years . ''
hamm  takes a corner  लात  .
The  नई  York Red Bulls is  an  American professional  सॉकर   टोली   आधारित  in Harrison  ,  New Jersey , representing the New York metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  .
The team  competes   in   the  Eastern  सम्मेलन   of  Major League  सॉकर   (  MLS  )   .
It  is  one of  the  ten  चार्टर  clubs  of   mls  ,  having   competed  in the  लीग  since  इसके   inception  .
the   टोली   थी  a founding member  of   mls  ( 1996  )  , but  रै   गए   through  several name changes  .
The team  थी   originally  known  as  the  नई  York/New Jersey  metrostars   through   1997  .
इससे  the 1998  ऋतु   through   the  2005  ऋतु  , the  टोली   थी   ज्ञात  as the  metrostars  .
on  March 9  ,  2006 , the team was sold to  रेड  Bull GmbH  ,   अग्रणी   to   the   टोली  's current name .
वे  are the only  असली   mls   मताधिकार   नहीं  to  have  won  कोई   significant  trophy ( including  नियमित   ऋतु  ,  playoffs   ,  and  नॉकआउट  competition ) since  inception  .
the  team 's  बेहतरीन  result in  the   mls  was the  mls  Cup final  in   2008   .
In  the  US  खोलें  Cup  ,  the  metrostars  reached  तीन  semifinals ( 1997 , 1998 ,  2000   )  , before reaching their first  फाइनल   in  2003  ,   खोने   1–0  to the Chicago  आग  .
on  August 26 ,  2000  , the Metros '  क्लिंट   mathis  set an  mls  record by scoring  पाँच  goals  in   a  game against  the  Dallas  बर्न  .
कुछ  well-known players that have played for  the  team include  giovanni  Savarese  ,   टिम   हावर्ड  ,  टोनी   meola  ,  tab  Ramos  ,  Alexi  lalas  ,  क्लिंट   mathis   ,   jozy   altidore  ,  माइकल  Bradley , Claudio Reyna , Eddie  पोप   ,   रॉबर्टो  Donadoni  ,  Lothar Matthäus ,  एडोल्फो  Valencia  ,   youri  Djorkaeff  ,  Amado Guevara , Juan  पाब्लो   ángel   ,   thierry  Henry , Juninho Pernambucano  ,   जन   गुन्नार   solli  , Rafael  मार्ख़ेस  , and Tim  काहिल   .
The team  रै   भी   था  well-known  कोच  , including Carlos Queiroz ,  कार्लोस  Alberto Parreira ,  बोरा  Milutinović  ,  Bob Bradley  ,  Mo  johnston   ,  Bruce Arena and  hans   backe  .
confucianism  ,  taoism   ,   और   buddhism  are one , a painting in the litang style portraying  तीन   मेन   हँस  by a river  स्ट्रीम   ,   12th   सदी   ,  Song Dynasty  .
estimating   the   क्रमांक  of Buddhists in  the  world  ,  or  in  many countries  ,   is   मुश्किल  due  to  definitional issues as  खूब  as  व्यावहारिक  problems of  enumeration  .
to  begin  साथ  , the religious  मान्यताओं   ,  practices  ,   और  identities of East Asians ( who  comprise  the majority  of  the world 's  बौद्धों  by any  माप  )  प्रायः   मिश्रण  Buddhism with  अन्य   परंपराओं   सहित  Confucianism ,  the  Chinese folk religion , Daoism , Shinto , and Korean  shamanism  .
सबसे  followers  of  Buddhism do not belong  to  structured congregations ,  or  observe a definite ritual of  adherence  such as taking Refuge , making it difficult  to  accurately estimate the number of practitioners .
an  additional  चुनौती  is  the  hostility of  अनेक   नेशनल   सरकारें  (  प्रायः  Communist ones  ऐसे   as  China or North  कोरियाई   )  to religion generally  or  to  buddhism  specifically .
सरकारी   नीतियों  in these  देशों   may  encourage the  under-reporting  or non-reporting  of   धार्मिक   adherence  , resulting in  आधिकारिक  totals that may  drastically  underestimate the number of religious practitioners in these  देशों   .
अनुमान  of the  विश्वव्यापी   बौद्ध  population range from 350  लाख   to  over one  अरब   ,  but cluster  nearer  to the first  फिगर  .
adherents.com   (   as  of 2012  )  suggests a figure  of   397  million  .
By major branches , the  संख्याएँ  are  as  follows:
(  1 ) Mahayana  buddhism   ,   सहित  East  एशियाई  Buddhism  ,  with no  कम   than  185  लाख  adherents , and possibly  अनेक   टाइम्स  that  अनेक   (  again , depending on definitional issues )  .
This is  the   predominant   रूप  of Buddhism  practiced  in  चीन  , South Korea , Japan  ,  Taiwan , Singapore , and Vietnam .
( 2 ) Theravada Buddhism , with no fewer  than  125 million adherents  .
इस  is the predominant form of  buddhism   practiced   in   कंबोडिया   ,   थाईलैंड  , Laos , Sri Lanka , and  बर्मा   .
(  3 ) Vajrayana Buddhism , with approximately 20  लाख   adherents  .
This form  predominates  in  the  greater Tibetan  और  Mongolian regions  ,  as  खूब  as  in  the  हिमालय  .
Besides  the   स्वतंत्र  countries of Mongolia and Bhutan  ,  and various territories  भीतर  what  is   अभी  western  चीन   ,   वज्रयान  is  परंपरागत   to   निश्चित  regions  of  Russia  (   e.g  . Kalmykia  ,  Buryatia  )  , India ( e.g .  लद्दाख  ,  सिक्किम   )  , and Nepal  (  e.g . Khumbu  )   .
वज्रयान   ,  also known as  तिब्बती  Buddhism , is often conflated  साथ   तांत्रिक  Buddhism , but  इस  is imprecise  ,   as  Shingon and other forms of  ईस्ट  Asian  buddhism  also practice tantra .
At  तनिक   7   देशों   (  Sri Lanka  ,   थाईलैंड   ,   कंबोडिया  ,  लाओस  ,  बर्मा  , Bhutan  ,   और  Mongolia  )  have  unambiguous  Buddhist  majorities  .
Depending  on  how one  calculates  Chinese  और  other East  एशियाई  adherents  ,  this  फिगर  might expand to include  अनेक  more countries .
in  addition ,  buddhism  is  the   राज्य  religion of  कंबोडिया  and  भूटान  , and receives  prominent  mention in the  constitutions  of Thailand and Sri  लंका  .
In northern India and  नेपाल  , the land where Buddhism was born ,  the  religion severely declined during  the   पहला  millennium .
Whether  इस   मनाही  was due to the Islamic conquest of  उत्तरी  India , or  to  other  कारकों   ,   remains  controversial .
देखिए  the article Decline of  buddhism   in  India .
जेम्स   बटलर  Hickok ( May 27  ,   1837  – August  2   ,   1876  ) , better known as  जंगली  Bill  hickok   ,  was a  लोक  hero of  the   अमरीकी  Old West .
उसके  skills  as  a  gunfighter   और  scout , along  साथ  his reputation  as  a lawman ,  provided  the basis for his fame ,  हालांकि  some  of   उसके  reported  कारनामे   हैं   fictionalized  .
Born  और  raised  on   a  farm  in   ग्रामीण  Illinois , Hickok went west at age 18  as   a  fugitive from justice  ,   पहला   working   as   a   stagecoach  driver  ,  before he became a  lawman  in the frontier  territories  of  कान्सास  and  नेब्रास्का   .
He  लड़ा  for the Union Army during the American Civil  युद्ध  , and  gained   publicity  after the war  as  a  स्काउट  , marksman ,  कर्ता  ,  और  professional gambler .
between  his law-enforcement duties and  जुए  ,  जिससे  easily  overlapped  , Hickok  थी  involved in  अनेक   notable   shootouts  .
He  थी   शॉट   और   मारे  while playing poker in the  nuttal   &   मन   's  Saloon in Deadwood  ,  Dakota Territory  (  now South  डकोटा   )  .
Artist 's  धारणा   of   the  Curiosity rover vaporizing rock  on   मंगल   .
The rover  उतरा  on  मंगल  in  अगस्त  2012  .
A Mars  रोवर  is an automated  मोटर  vehicle which  propels  itself  आरपार  the surface  of  the planet  मंगल  after landing .
Rovers have  अनेक  advantages over stationary  landers  :  वे  examine  अधिक  territory  ,  they can  be   निर्देशित  to  दिलचस्प  features , they can place themselves in  सनी   स्थितियाँ  to  मौसम  winter  महीने  and  वे   can  advance  the   ज्ञान  of how  to  perform  बहुत   रिमोट   रोबोटिक   गाडी  control .
There  have  been  चार  successful robotically  संचालित  Mars rovers .
The  जेट   नोदन  Laboratory managed  the   मंगल  Pathfinder mission  और  its  अभी  inactive  sojourner  rover .
it   फिलहाल   manages  the Mars Exploration Rover  मिशन   's  active Opportunity rover and  निष्क्रिय   स्पिरिट  , and , as  भाग  of  the   मंगल   विज्ञान  Laboratory  मिशन   ,   the  Curiosity  रोवर  .
a  financial audit  ,   or   अधिक   accurately  , an audit of financial statements ,  is  the  सत्यापन   of  the  वित्तीय   कथन   of  a legal  एंटिटी   ,   साथ  a  दृश्य   to  express  an  audit  राय  .
The audit  राय   is   intended  to provide reasonable  परख  ,  लकिन  not absolute  परख  , that the  वित्तीय  statements are presented fairly ,  in  all  सामग्री  respects ,  and/or  give  a  true and fair  दृश्य   in  accordance  साथ  the financial  रिपोर्टिंग  framework  .
The  purpose  of an  ऑडिट   is  provide and objective  स्वतंत्र   परिक्षा  of  the  financial statements  ,  which increases the  मान   और  credibility of  the   वित्तीय  statements produced  by  management  ,  thus increase user confidence in  the   वित्तीय  statement ,  reduce  investor  रिस्क  and  नतीजतन   reduce  the cost of  पूंजी  of  the   preparer  of  the  financial statements  .
Financial audits  हैं   typically  performed by firms  of  practicing accountants who are  विशेषज्ञ  in  वित्तीय  reporting  .
the  financial  ऑडिट   is  one  of   अनेक   परख   कृत्यों   provided   by  accounting firms .
Many organizations  separately  employ  or  hire internal auditors , who do  नहीं  attest to  वित्तीय   रिपोर्ट्स  but focus  मुख्यतः   on   the   आतंरिक  controls of the organization .
External  auditors   may  choose  to  place  सीमित  reliance  on  the  कार्य   of   आतंरिक  auditors .
Auditing promotes  पारदर्शिता   और  accuracy  in   the  financial disclosures made by  an  organization ,  इसलिए  would likely  to   reduce  of  ऐसे  corporations to  छिपाते   unscrupulous  dealings  .
internationally   ,   the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   मानकों  on Auditing ( ISA ) issued by the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   auditing  and Assurance Standards  फलक  ( IAASB )  is  considered as the benchmark  लिये  audit process .
Almost all jurisdictions  आवश्यकता  auditors to follow  the  ISA  or   a  local variation of  the   isa   .
Dollar coins  have  been minted in the United  राज्य   in   सुनहरा  , silver  ,   और   आधार  metal versions  .
The term silver dollar is often used  लिये   कोई  large white metal coin  जारी   by   the  United States with  a   फेस   मान   of  one dollar  ,   हालांकि   purists   जिद  that a  डालर  is not silver unless it contains  कुछ  of that metal  .
Silver dollars  ,  the first dollar coin issue  ,  were minted beginning  in   1794   .
Gold  डॉलर  and gold-colored dollars  have  also  महरूम   उत्पादित  by the  संयुक्त  States .
the  Sacagawea  और  Presidential dollars are  प्रायः  referred to as `` golden dollars  ''  .
In  आधुनिक   टाइम्स   ,  dollar coins have  नहीं  been very popular in the  संयुक्त   राज्य   .
despite  efforts by the  सरकारी  to  प्रचार  their use ,  सबसे   अमेरिकी  currently use the  एक  dollar  विधेयक  rather than dollar  सिक्के   .
In straight  और  level  उड़ान  lift ( L  )   बराबरी   वज़न   (  W )  .
In a banked  फेरे  of 60°  ,  lift equals double  the  weight ( L=2W )  .
the   पायलट  experiences  2g  and a doubled weight .
The steeper  the  bank , the greater  the  g-forces  .
This  top-fuel  dragster  can   accelerate  from zero to  in  0.86 seconds  .
इस  is a horizontal  त्वरण  of 5.3 g.  संयुक्त   साथ  the vertical  g-force  in the  stationary   मामला   the  Pythagorean theorem yields  a  g  फ़ोर्स  of 5.4  g  .
g-force ( with  g   इससे  gravitational ) is  a  term for  accelerations  felt  as  weight  और  measurable by accelerometers  .
it   is  not  a  force ,  प्रति   se   ,   लकिन   a   फ़ोर्स  per unit  द्रव्यमान  .
Since such  a   फ़ोर्स   is   आभास   as  a weight , any g-force  can  be  वर्णित  as a  ``  weight per unit mass ''  (  see the  पर्याय   विशिष्ट   वज़न   )  .
The  g-force  acceleration  अधिनियमों   as   a   गुणक  of weight-like forces for every  ईकाई   of   an  object 's  द्रव्यमान  ,  और   (   सहेजें   लिये   निश्चित   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  force  प्रभाव  ) is  the   कारण  of an object 's  त्वरण  in  संबंध  to  free-fall   .
This acceleration experienced by an object is due to  the  vector sum  of  non-gravitational  शक्तियां  acting on  an  object free to  मूव  .
The accelerations that  हैं  not produced by gravity  हैं  termed  उचित  accelerations ,  और  it is only  ये  that are measured in g-force units .
वे  cause  तनावों   और  strains on objects .
क्युकी   of  these strains  ,  large  g-forces  may be destructive .
gravitation  acting alone  करता  not produce a g-force , even though  g-forces   हैं  expressed  in   multiples   of   the   त्वरण  of a standard gravity  .
Thus  ,  the  मानक   गुरुत्वाकर्षक  acceleration  at  the  धरती   's  surface produces  g-force  only indirectly , as  a  result of resistance to  it  by mechanical  शक्तियां   .
The 1 g-force on an object sitting  on  the  धरती  's surface  is  caused by mechanical force  exerted   in  the  upward   दिशा   by   the  ground  ,   keeping   the   ऑब्जेक्ट  from  going  into  free-fall  .
The upward  फ़ोर्स  from  the   मैदान   ensures  that an object at rest  on  the Earth 's surface  is  accelerating relative to the free-fall condition  ,  which is the  पाथ   कि  the  ऑब्जेक्ट   होता   follow   जब  falling freely toward  the  Earth 's center .
Objects allowed  to  free-fall in an  inertial  trajectory under the  influence  of gravitation-only ,  महसूस  no g-force .
This  is   demonstrated  by the `` zero-g '' conditions  अंदर   a  freely  गिरना   लिफ्ट  falling toward the Earth 's  बीच  ( in vacuum ) ,  or  (  to  good approximation )  शर्तें  inside  a  spacecraft  in   धरती   कक्षा   .
These are examples of coordinate acceleration  (  a  बदलें   in   गति  )  बगैर  a  सनसनी  of weight .
The  अनुभव  of  no   g-force  (  zero-g   )  , however it is  उत्पादित  ,  is  synonymous  साथ  weightlessness  .
in  the  अनुपस्थिति   of  gravitational fields  ,   or  in directions  at  right angles to them , proper and  निर्देशांक  accelerations  हैं   the  same  ,  and  कोई  coordinate acceleration must be produced by  a   सम्बन्धित   g-force   त्वरण   .
an   उदाहरण  here  is  a rocket  in  free space  ,   in   जिससे   सरल  changes in velocity are produced by  the   इंजन  , and produce g-forces on  the  rocket  और  passengers  .
An augur holding  a  lituus ,  the  curved wand often used  as  a  प्रतीक  of augury on  रोमन  coins
the  augur  थी   a   पुजारी  and official in the classical world  ,   विशेषकर  ancient  रोम  and  etruria   .
उसके  main role was to  interpret   the   होगा   of  the  देवताओं   by   अध्ययन   the  flight of  पक्षियों   :  whether they  हैं  flying in  समूह   or  alone  ,   कया   noises  they make as  वे  fly  ,  direction  of   उड़ान  and what kind of birds they are .
इस  was known as `` taking  the  auspices . ''
The ceremony and function of the  augur  was  सेंट्रल  to  कोई  major undertaking in Roman society—public or private—including matters  of   युद्ध  , commerce  ,   और  religion .
The Roman historian  livy  stresses the importance of the  augurs  : `` Who does not know that  इस   नगर   थी  founded  तभी  after taking the auspices , that  सबकुछ   in  war and in peace  ,  at home and abroad  ,  was done  तभी   बाद  taking  the   auspices  ?  ''
farmington   पहाड़ियाँ  is an affluent community in  southeastern   मिशिगन   .
It is the  दूसरी  largest city in  ओकलैंड  County  in  the U.S. state of Michigan .
इसके  population was 79,740 at the  2010   जनसांख्यिकी  .
it  is part of  the   upscale   northwestern  suburbs  of  Metropolitan  डेट्रॉयट  and is also  पूर्वोत्तर  of downtown Ann  arbor  .
Farmington  पहाड़ियाँ  consistently ranks as one of the safest cities  in  the United  राज्य  , as well as in  the  state of  मिशिगन  .
in  2010  ,  the area ranked as the  30th   safest   नगर   in  America .
Although the two cities  have   पृथक  services and  पता  , Farmington and  farmington  Hills  हैं  often  विचार  of  as  the same  जातियाँ  .
सुविधाएँ  of the  जातियाँ  include  a   recently  renovated downtown , boutiques ,  a   विंटेज   सिनेमा  , numerous restaurants  ,  exotic car  dealerships  ,  आर्ट   गैलरी  ,  और  public parks including  विरासत  Park .
There are several historical sites  सहित  the  longacre  House  और  the Governor Warner Mansion  .
दोनो   शहरों  are  परोसा   by  Farmington  पब्लिक   स्कूलों  .
Farmington  पहाड़ियाँ  serves  as  a major  कारोबार  center  लिये  the greater  डेट्रॉयट  area  .
Present-day  छाप  of a Late  कांस्य  Age seal
Town seal (  मेट्रिक्स  )  of  Náchod from  1570
A seal is  a  device for  बनाना  an impression in wax , clay  ,  paper , or some other  मीडियम  , including an embossment on paper  ,  and is also the impression thus made  .
The original purpose  थी  to authenticate  a  document ,  a   wrapper  for  एक  such as  a   आधुनिक  envelope ,  or  the cover of a  संग्राहक  or package holding valuables or other  वस्तुएँ  .
The sealing process  is   essentially   कि   of   a  mould  ,   साथ  the final image represented  on  the  यंत्र   लिये  making the impression by a mirror-image design ,  incised  in sunken-  (  or counter- )  राहत   or   intaglio   .
the  seal-making device is also referred to  as   the  seal matrix  or  die  ;   the  imprint  it  creates  as   the  seal impression ( or ,  अधिक  rarely  ,   the  sealing  )  .
If  the   छाप   is  made  purely   as  a relief resulting from the greater pressure  on  the paper where the  ऊँची   भाग  of the matrix  टच   ,  the seal  is  known as  a   शुष्क  seal ; in  सब   अन्य  cases a  द्रव   or  liquified  मीडियम  ( such as ink or wax ) is  प्रयुक्त  ,  प्रायः  in  another  color  than   the  paper .
लिये   विधिक  purposes , the definition of a seal may be extended to  शामिल   रबर  stamps  ,  or writing specified words  (   ``  seal ''  or   ``   l.s  . `` ) .
In the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  the   शब्द  `` seal  ''  is sometimes assigned to a facsimile of  the  seal  डिज़ाइन   (  in monochrome or  रंग  )  ,  which  may  be used  in   a  variety of  contexts  including architectural  जमावट  , on flags  ,  or on official  letterheads   .
Thus  ,  for example ,  the  Great Seal of the United  राज्य  ,  among  other  उपयोग  , appears on  the   रिवर्स  of the one-dollar  विधेयक   ;   और  several of the  seals  of the  u.S.  states appear on their  संबंधित  state flags  .
In Europe  ,   हालांकि   coats  of  बाहें  and heraldic badges may well feature in  ऐसे   contexts  as  खूब  as  on  seals , the  मुहर  design in  इसके  entirety rarely appears as an emblem  .
The  पढ़ाई  of  seals   is  known as  sigillography  or sphragistics .
Groundhog Day ( Pennsylvania German  :   grundsaudaag   ,   murmeltiertag   )  is  a  day celebrated on February  2   .
according   to   लोकगीत   ,   if  it  is   cloudy   जब  a groundhog emerges from its burrow  on  this day , then spring will come  जल्दी   ;  if  it  is sunny  ,  the groundhog  होगा  supposedly see  इसके   छाया  and retreat back into its  burrow   ,  and the winter  मौसम   होगा   continue  for six  अधिक   सप्ताह   .
Modern customs of  the  holiday involve celebrations where  जल्दी  morning  त्यौहार  are  आयोजित  to  देखें   the  groundhog emerging from its burrow .
in  southeastern Pennsylvania  ,  Groundhog  lodges   (   grundsow  Lodges )  celebrate   the  holiday  साथ   fersommlinge   ,  social events  in   जिससे  food is  परोसा   ,  speeches are  बना  , and one or more g'spiel  (   plays  or skits ) are performed  लिये   entertainment   .
the  Pennsylvania  जर्मनी  dialect is the only  भाषा  spoken  at   the  event ,  और  those who  बोलो   अंग्रेज़ी   अदा   a  penalty  ,   प्रायः   in  the form of  a  nickel ,  dime  , or  क्वार्टर   प्रति  word spoken  ,   साथ  the money put  into   a   कटोरी  in the  बीच  of the table  .
The  largest  Groundhog Day celebration is held in  punxsutawney  ,  पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
Groundhog Day , already a widely recognized and popular  परंपरा  , received widespread attention as a result  of   the  1993 film Groundhog  दिन  ,  जिससे   थी  set  in  Punxsutawney  ,  PA  (   हालांकि  filmed primarily in Woodstock ,  il  )  और   portrayed  Punxsutawney  फिल  .
High resolution  चित्र  of  tampa  Bay  प्रदेश
The Tampa  खाड़ी  area has a humid subtropical climate  (   koppen  Cfa  )  , with warm  और  humid summers with frequent thunderstorms and drier winters with freezing temperatures occurring every 2–3  सालो   .
The area  अनुभवों  a significant  गर्मियाँ   गीला   ऋतु   ,  as nearly  two-thirds   of  the  सालाना  precipitation  जलप्रपात  in  the  months  of   जून  through  सितंबर  .
the  area  is   सूचीबद्ध  by  the   संयुक्त  States Department of Agriculture ( USDA  )   as  being  in  hardiness zone  10  , which is  परिचय  the  उत्तरी   सीमा   of   जहाँ  coconut  हथेलियां  and royal  हथेलियां  can  be  grown  .
highs   प्रायः   दायरा  between  65  and 95 °F  (  18  और  35 °C ) year  गोलाकार  .
Though  ज्ञात   लिये  hot  ग्रीष्म  , Tampa  's  official high has never  पहुँचे  100 °F  (  38 °C ) –  the  city 's all-time record  तापमान  is  99   °f   (   37  °C  )  .
St. Petersburg  's   all-time  record  ऊँची  is exactly  100  °F  (  38  °c  ) .
Pinellas County lies  on  a peninsula between  tampa   खाड़ी  and  the  Gulf  of  Mexico , and  much   of   the  city of  tampa  lies  on  a smaller peninsula  jutting  out into  tampa  Bay .
इस   निकटता  to large bodies  of  water both moderates temperatures and introduces large amounts of  आर्द्रता  into  the   माहौल   .
In general  ,  the local communities  farthest   इससे  the  coast   have  larger temperature  सीमाएँ  ,  दोनो   दौरान   a  single day  और  throughout the seasons of the  साल  .
A diagram of  the   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक   वर्णक्रम   ,   प्रर्दशित  various properties  आरपार   the  range  of  frequencies  और  wavelengths
The  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक   वर्णक्रम  is the  दायरा   of  all possible frequencies  of  electromagnetic radiation  .
The `` electromagnetic spectrum  ''  of an  ऑब्जेक्ट  has a  अलग  meaning ,  और   is   बजाय   the  characteristic  वितरण  of electromagnetic radiation emitted  or  absorbed by that  particular  object .
the  electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम   extends   इससे  below  the  low frequencies used for  आधुनिक   रेडियो  communication  to  gamma  विकिरण   at  the short- wavelength (  high-frequency  ) end  ,   thereby   covering  wavelengths  इससे  thousands of kilometers  bas   to  a  भिन्न  of  the  size of an  अणु   .
the  limit  लिये  long wavelengths is the size of the universe  itself   ,   जबकि   it   is  thought that the short wavelength limit is in  the  vicinity of the  प्लांक   लंबाई   ,   हालांकि   in  principle the spectrum is  अनन्त   और   निरन्तर  .
Most parts  of  the electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम  are used in science for spectroscopic and other probing  interactions   ,  as  तरीके  to  पढ़ाई   और  characterize matter .
In  जोड   ,  radiation from various parts of  the  spectrum has  मिला  many  अन्य   उपयोग  for communications and manufacturing ( see electromagnetic  विकिरण  for more applications  )  .
लेजेंड
Franklin Delano Roosevelt (  or   ;   जनवरी  30 ,  1882   –   अप्रैल   12  , 1945 ) ,  भी  known by his initials ,  fdr  , was the 32nd President of  the   संयुक्त  States  (  1933–1945 ) and a  सेंट्रल   फिगर  in world events  दौरान  the mid-20th century , leading  the  United  राज्य  during a time of  विश्वव्यापी   आर्थिक   अवसाद   और  total war .
A  प्रबल   नेता   of   the  Democratic  पार्टी  and the only American president elected to  अधिक  than  दो   शर्तें   ,  he  निर्मित  a New  सौदे   गठबन्धन  that  realigned  American politics after 1932 ,  as  his domestic policies  पारिभाषित  American liberalism for  the   मध्य  third of the  20th   सदी   .
With  the  bouncy popular  सोंग  ``  प्रसन्न  Days Are Here Again `` as his  अभियान  theme  ,  FDR  पराजित   लाज़िम  Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932  ,  at  the   गहराई  of  the  Great Depression  .
सक्रिय  by  उसके  personal victory over polio  ,   fdr  's unfailing optimism and  सक्रियता  contributed to  a  renewal of the national spirit .
he  worked closely with  अंग्रेजों  Prime  मंत्री  Winston  चर्चिल   और  Soviet  सामान्य  Secretary Joseph  स्टालिन   in  leading  the  Allies against Germany  और  Japan  in  World  युद्ध  II  ,   और   restoring  prosperity  to   the   स्वदेश  's  अर्थव्यवस्था  .
In his first hundred days in  दफ्तर  , which began March 4  ,   1933  ,  रूज़वेल्ट  spearheaded  प्रमुख  legislation and  जारी  a  profusion   of  executive orders that instituted  the   नई   सौदे  —a  किस्में  of programs designed  to  produce relief (  सरकारी   कार्य  for the unemployed  )  , recovery ( economic  विकास   )  , and  सुधार   (  through  विनियमन   of   वॉल  Street ,  बैंको  and transportation  )   .
The  अर्थव्यवस्था  improved  rapidly   इससे   1933  to  1937  , but  तब  relapsed into a deep recession .
The bipartisan  रूढ़िवादी  Coalition  कि   formed  in  1937  prevented  उसके  packing the Supreme Court  or   गुजर  any  considerable  legislation ; it  abolished  many  of  the  राहत  programs  जब  unemployment  diminished   दौरान  World  युद्ध   ii  .
Most of  the  regulations on  कारोबार  were ended about  1975–85   ,  except for the regulation  of  Wall  गली   by   the   प्रतिभूति  and Exchange Commission , which still exists .
साथ   साथ   अनेक  smaller programs  ,   प्रमुख   surviving   कार्यक्रम   शामिल  the  संघीय  Deposit  बीमे   निगम   ,   जिससे   थी  created in 1933 ,  और  Social Security , which  कॉंग्रेस  passed in 1935  .
as  World  युद्ध  II loomed after 1938 ,  साथ  the Japanese  आक्रमण   of  China and  the  aggression of Nazi Germany , FDR  दिया  strong  राजनयिक  and financial support  to   चीन   और  Great Britain  ,   जबकि  remaining officially neutral .
His goal was to make  अमेरिका  the `` Arsenal  of   लोकतंत्र  ``  जिससे  would supply munitions to  the  Allies  .
In March 1941 ,  रूज़वेल्ट  , with Congressional approval ,  provided  Lend-Lease  सहायता  to the  देशों   लड़  against  नाजी  Germany with Britain  .
With  बहुत  strong national  support   ,   he   बना   युद्ध  on Japan and  जर्मनी  after the  जापानी   आक्रमण  on  पर्ल  Harbor on  दिसम्बर  7 ,  1941  , calling it a `` date  जिससे  will live  in   infamy   ``  .
he   पर्यवेक्षित  the mobilization  of   the  U.S. economy  to  support  the  Allied  युद्ध  effort .
As an  क्रियाशील  military leader  ,  Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on two fronts  कि  ended in  the  defeat of the  अक्ष  Powers and the development  of   the  world 's  पहला  atom bomb  .
In  1942   रूज़वेल्ट  ordered  the   internment   of  100,000 Japanese American civilians .
Unemployment dropped  to   2   %  ,  राहत  programs  largely  ended , and  the  industrial  अर्थव्यवस्था  grew  rapidly   to  new  हाइट्स   as  millions of  लोगों  moved to  नई   कार्य  in war  centers   ,   और   16  million men  और  300,000  महिलाओं   यहूद  drafted or  volunteered   लिये  military service  .
Roosevelt dominated  the  American  राजनैतिक   झाँकी   नहीं  only during the twelve  सालो   of  his  प्रेसिडेंसी  , but  भी  for  दशकों  afterward .
He  orchestrated  the  realignment  of  मतदाता  that  निर्मित   the  Fifth Party System .
fdr  's New  सौदे   गठबन्धन  united labor unions , big city  मशीने   ,  white  ethnics   ,   अफ़्रीकी   अमेरिकी   और   ग्रामीण   श्वेत  Southerners  .
He  भी  influenced the later creation of the United Nations and  bretton   वुड्स   .
रूज़वेल्ट  is  consistently   रेटेड   by  scholars  as  one of the top three U.S. Presidents , along with Abraham  lincoln   और   जार्ज  Washington .
A liberal  डेमोक्रेट   ,   रूज़वेल्ट  defined  उसके  ideological  स्थिति  as ``  a  little left of  बीच  . ''
a  Joint Committee is a term  in   राजनीती  that is used to refer to a  कमेटी   बना  up of members of  दोनो   कक्षों  of  a  bicameral  विधानमंडल   .
In other contexts ,  it   refers  to a committee  साथ   सदस्यों  from  अधिक   than   एक  organization .
the   विनियमन   of   वेश्यावृति   in   the   संयुक्त   राज्य   is  not among the enumerated powers of  the  federal  सरकारी  ; Under the Tenth  amendment  to the  संयुक्त   राज्य  Constitution  ,  it is  इसलिए  exclusively the domain of the states  to   परमिट  , prohibit , or  वरना   विनियमित  commercial  sex  ,  मगर   insofar  as Congress may regulate it  as   भाग  of  अंतरराज्यीय   कॉमर्स   साथ   कानून  like the Mann  अधिनियम   .
In  सबसे  states ,  वेश्यावृति   is   माना  a  misdemeanor  in the category of  पब्लिक   अनुक्रम  crime , a crime that disrupts the order  of   a  community .
it  was  at  one time  माना   to   be   a  vagrancy crime  .
Currently ,  नेवाडा  is  the  only state  to   allow  brothel  वेश्यावृति  ,  the   शर्तें  of  जिससे  are stipulated  in  the  नेवाडा  Revised  statutes  .
तभी   8  counties  फिलहाल  contain active brothels  .
All forms  of  prostitution  हैं   illegal  in  क्लार्क  County (  जिससे  contains the  लास  Vegas–Paradise metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल   )  , Washoe County  (  which  contains   रेनो  )  ,  Carson City ,  डगलस  County ,  और   lincoln   काउंटी   .
The other  काउंटी   theoretically  allow brothel prostitution  ,   लकिन   कुछ  of these counties  फिलहाल   have   no   क्रियाशील  brothels .
Street  वेश्यावृति   ,   ``   pandering  , ''  और   जीना   बंद   of  the  proceeds   of  a  वेश्या  remain  illegal   अंतर्गत  Nevada  विधि  ,  as  elsewhere in  the  country .
as  with other  देशों   ,  prostitution in the United States can be divided  into  three  व्यापक  categories  :  street prostitution  ,  brothel prostitution ,  और  escort  वेश्यावृति  .
the  national  ध्वज   of   the  United  राज्य   of  America , often simply referred to  as   the  American flag , consists  of  thirteen  बराबर  horizontal stripes  of   रेड  ( top  और   नीचे  ) alternating  साथ  white ,  साथ   a   ब्लू  rectangle  in   the  canton  (   referred  to specifically  as   the  ``  संघ   ''   )  bearing  पचास  small , white , five-pointed stars  arranged   in  nine  ऑफसेट   आड़ा  rows of  छह  stars (  शीर्ष  and bottom ) alternating  साथ   पंक्ति  of  पाँच  stars .
The 50 stars on  the   ध्वज  represent the 50 states  of  the United  राज्य  of  अमेरिका   और   the  13 stripes represent  the   तेरह  British  colonies   कि   घोषित  independence from the Kingdom of  ग्रेट   ब्रिटेन   और  became the  पहला  states  in   the  Union .
Nicknames for the  ध्वज  include the ``  सितारों  and Stripes ''  ,  ``  बूढ़ा  Glory  ``  , and `` The Star-Spangled Banner . ''
India is a  संघीय   संघ  of states comprising twenty-eight  राज्य   और   सात  union  territories  .
the  states and  territories  are further subdivided  into  districts  और   so   on  .
Congressional districts for  the  113th United States Congress
2010  जनसांख्यिकी  change:
Change in apportionment of  congressional   जिले  , starting  in  2013  ,   as  a  परिणाम   of  the  2010  census .
2000  जनसांख्यिकी  change:
Change  in   apportionment  of congressional districts  ,   इससे  2003 to 2013  ,  as  a  result  of   the   2000  census  .
इस   is   a   पूरा  list of congressional  जिले   लिये  representation  in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  House of  प्रतिनिधि  .
the  quantity ( apportionment  )  and boundaries ( redistricting  )  of  जिले  are determined  बाद   प्रत्येक  census , although in some cases  राज्य  have  बदला  the  सीमाएँ   अधिक  than once per census  .
This list includes the  435   वर्तमान   और   over  200 obsolete districts .
लिये   उदाहरण  , since the 2000  जनसांख्यिकी   ,  Nebraska has  था  three districts  ,  but  it  used  to   have   as  many as six .
in  the  पहला   दशक   of  the twenty-first century ,  टेक्सास  had 32 districts  ,  but has since added  चार   due  to reapportionment  as   a  result of  the   2010  census .
अन्य  states have lost  जिले  since  the   क्रमांक   of  congressional seats has been  नियत   at  435 by statute .
Also included  यहाँ   हैं   non-voting  delegations :  छह  current and four obsolete .
The  सीमाएँ  of districts often shift  साथ   प्रत्येक   redistricting  .
over   समय   ,  the region  और  demographics represented in  a  district can change  substantially   .
Furthermore  ,  districts sometimes  retain   the  same boundaries  जबकि   बदलना  their district numbers .
mariah   कैरी  (  born  March 27 ,  1970   )  is an American singer ,  songwriter  , record  निर्माता  ,  अभिनेत्री   ,  and  लोकसेवक   .
Under  the  guidance of Columbia Records executive  टॉमी  Mottola ,  कैरी  released  उसके  self-titled debut  स्टुडियो  album  mariah   कैरी  in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum  और  spawned four  लगातार  number  एक   singles  on the U.S  .  Billboard Hot  100  chart  .
Following her marriage to Mottola in  1993  and success with hit  रिकॉर्ड   भाव   (  1991 ) ,  म्यूज़िक   बक्सा  (  1993   )  , and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ) , Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act .
Daydream ( 1995 )  बना   म्यूज़िक  history when its  दूसरी  single ``  एक  Sweet  दिन   ``   ,  a  duet  with Boyz II Men  ,  spent a  रिकार्ड   सोलह  weeks on  शीर्ष  of  the  Billboard Hot 100 , and  remains  the  longest-running   number-one  song in U.S. chart history .
During the recording of the album , Carey began  to   deviate  from her R &  b   और   पॉप  beginnings and slowly traversed into  हिप  hop .
इस  musical  बदलें  became evident with  the   रिलीज  of Butterfly  (  1997  )   ,   at  which  समय  Carey had separated from Mottola .
कैरी  left Columbia in 2000 , and signed  a  record-breaking $ 100 million recording contract with Virgin Records  .
Before the release of her first feature film  glitter  ( 2001  )  , she  suffered  a  शारीरिक  and  emotional   विश्लेषण   और   थी  hospitalized for  कठोर   थकावट   .
Following the  फिल्मी  's  ग़रीब  reception  ,   वो   थी  bought out of her  रिकॉर्डिंग   अनुबंध  for  $  50 million  ,  which  led  to a decline in her career .
वो   हस्ताक्षरित   a  multi-million  डालर   अनुबंध  deal  साथ  Island Records in 2002 ,  और   बाद  an  unsuccessful   काल  ,  लौटे  to the top of  म्यूज़िक  charts with The Emancipation of  मिमी  ( 2005  )  .
Its second single `` We Belong  साथ   ``   became   उसके  most  कामयाब  single of  the  2000s , and  थी   बाद  named `` Song of the  दशक  ''  by   बिलबोर्ड  .
Carey  एकबार   again  ventured  into   फिल्मी   साथ  a well-received starring  भूमिका  in ( 2009  )  ; she was awarded  the  `` Breakthrough Performance Award '' at  the  Palm Springs  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Film  पर्व   ,  and Black  रील  and NAACP  चित्र   पुरस्कार  nominations  .
in  a career  spanning   over  two decades  ,  Carey  रै   बेची   अधिक  than  200  million  रिकॉर्ड  worldwide ,  बनाना  her one  of  the best-selling  म्यूज़िक  artists of all time .
In 1998  ,  she  थी  honored  as  the world  's  best-selling recording  कलाकार  of the 1990s at the World Music Awards .
कैरी  was  भी  named  the  best-selling  मादा   कलाकार   of  the  मिलेनियम  in 2000  .
According to  the  Recording  उद्योग  Association  of   अमेरिका  ,  वो  is  the  third best-selling female artist in  the  United States ,  साथ  63.5  लाख  certified albums  .
साथ   the  release of  ``  Touch My Body  ``  ( 2008  )  , Carey  gained  her eighteenth  क्रमांक  one  सिंगल   in   the   संयुक्त  States  ,  more than any  अन्य  solo artist .
In 2012  ,  Carey  थी  ranked second on VH1  's   सूची  of the `` 100 Greatest Women in Music '' .
Aside from  उसके  commercial  accomplishments  , Carey has  जीती   पाँच   ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार   ,  17 World  म्यूज़िक  Awards  ,  11  अमरीकी   म्यूज़िक  Awards  ,   और  31  बिलबोर्ड  Music Awards .
referred   to  as the ``  songbird   परम्   ''   by  the  गिनीज  World Records  ,   वो  is famed for her five-octave vocal range ,  शक्ति   ,   melismatic   स्टाइल   और  signature use  of  the whistle  पंजीकरण   .
stratocumulus   stratiformis   cumulogenitus
in  meteorology , a cloud is a  दृश्य  mass of  द्रव   droplets  or frozen  crystals   बना  of water or various chemicals  निलंबित  in  the   माहौल   ऊपर  the surface of a planetary  देह  .
ये  suspended particles are also known as aerosols .
Clouds in  धरती  's atmosphere are studied in the cloud  भौतिकी   शाखा  of meteorology .
दो  processes  ,  possibly  एक्टिंग  together ,  can  lead  to   एयर   बनने  saturated ;  कूलिंग  the air  or   adding   जल  vapor to the air .
In general  ,   वर्षण  will fall  to   the   सतह   ;   an   एक्सेप्शन  is  virga   ,  which evaporates  पहले  reaching  the   सतह   .
The international  बादल  classification system  is   आधारित   on  the fact clouds in their most basic forms  can  show  free-convective  upward  विकास   जैसे  cumulus  ,   appear   in  non-convective layered  चादरें   ऐसे   as   स्ट्रेट्स  ,  or  take the form of thin  तंतुमय   wisps  ,  as  in the case  of  cirrus  .
prefixes   हैं  used  in  connection with clouds  to  express variations or complexities in these basic  फ़ॉर्म   or  to specify middle  or  high  ऊँचाई  ranges .
These include strato-  लिये   कम   बादल  with limited  संवहन  that form  ज़्यादातर  in uneven layers ,  cumulo-  for complex highly-convective storm  बादल  , nimbo- for thick  परतदार   बादल   of  some  जटिलता   कि   can  produce moderate to  भारी  precipitation , alto- for  मध्य  clouds  ,  and cirro-  लिये  high clouds ;  the  latter two of which may  be   of   सरल   or  moderately complex structure  .
Whether  or  not a  बादल  is  कम   ,  middle , or high  स्तर   depends   on  how far above the  मैदान   इसके   आधार  forms .
Cloud types with significant vertical  extent   can  form in  the  low or middle  ऊँचाई  ranges depending on the moisture  सामग्री  of  the  air .
Clouds  in  the troposphere have  लैटिन  names  due   to   the   लोकप्रिय  adaptation  of   ल्यूक  Howard 's cloud categorization system , which began  to  spread  in  popularity during December  1802  .
synoptic   सतह   मौसम  observations use code numbers to  रिकार्ड  and  रपट  the types of  tropospheric   बादल  visible  at  each scheduled observation time based on the  ऊँचाई   और   शारीरिक  appearance of  the  clouds .
While  a  majority of clouds form in  धरती   's  troposphere , there are  अवसरों  when clouds in  the   stratosphere  and  mesosphere  can  be   observed   .
These  तीन  main layers  of  the atmosphere where  बादल  may  be  seen are collectively known  as  the homosphere .
ऊपर  this lies  the  thermosphere  और  exosphere  ,  which together make  up   the   heterosphere  that  marks  the  परिवर्तन  to  बाहरी  space .
बादल   have  been observed on other  ग्रह   और   moons   भीतर  the Solar System ,  लकिन   ,   due   to   उनके  different temperature characteristics , they are  रचित  of other substances  ऐसे   as  methane  ,  ammonia , and  sulfuric  acid .
Galveston County is a county located  in   the  U.S. state  of   टेक्सास  within the  houston–sugar  Land–Baytown metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  .
as  of the 2010 census ,  the   जनसांख्यिकी  was 291,309 .
Its county seat is Galveston  .
League City is  the  largest city in  galveston   काउंटी  in terms  of  population  ;   url_http   between  2000  और  2005 it surpassed  galveston  as  the  county 's  largest  city .
galveston  County was  संस्थापित   in   1838  .

Freeport ,  बहामा
This  is  a list  of   शहरों  in the Bahamas  .
The  following  table  सूचियाँ   the   नगर  or town name , the  भौगोलिक   निर्देशांक  ,  the  population as of the 1990  जनसांख्यिकी  ,  an  estimate  of   the   जनसांख्यिकी  as  of  2009  ,   और  the  द्वीप  name  .
The Big Ten  सम्मेलन   ,  formerly Western Conference and  बिग  Nine Conference  ,   is   the  oldest  प्रभाग  I college  एथलेटिक   सम्मेलन   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   .
इसके   बारह  member institutions  (  which  हैं  primarily  फ्लैगशिप   शोध   विश्वविद्यालयों  in their respective  राज्य   ,   well-regarded  academically  ,   और  with  अपेक्षाकृत  large student enrollment ) are located primarily  in   the   मिडवेस्ट  , stretching from  नेब्रास्का  in the  वेस्ट  to Penn  राज्य   in   the  east .
the  conference  competes  in the NCAA 's Division I ; its football teams compete  in  the  फ़ुटबॉल  Bowl  subdivision  (  fbs   )   ,   formerly  known  as  Division I-A  ,  the highest  स्तर   of   ncaa  competition in  कि   खेल   .
Member schools of  the   बिग  Ten (  or  , in two cases , their parent university  प्रणालियों  ) also are members of the  कमेटी  on Institutional Cooperation , a leading educational and  शोध  consortium  .
despite  the conference  's   नाम   ,   the  Big  टेन   दरअसल  consists of 12 schools , following  the  addition  of  The Pennsylvania State University  in  1993  और   the   विश्वविद्यालयों  of Nebraska–Lincoln in 2011 .
in  2014 ,  the   सम्मेलन  will expand to  14  members  साथ   the  additions  of  the University  of  Maryland  ,   कॉलेज   पार्क  and Rutgers  ,  The  राज्य   विश्वविद्यालयों   of  New Jersey  .
it   is  not to be confused with the Big 12 Conference  ,   जिससे  has only  टेन   स्कूलों  and represents  a   अलग  region of the  देश  .
Single Malt  स्कॉच   is   सिंगल  malt whisky made  in   स्कॉटलैंड  using a  घट   स्टिल  distillation process at a single distillery , with  malted  barley  as  the  तभी  grain  संघटक  .
As  साथ  any Scotch  व्हिस्की  , a  सिंगल  malt Scotch must be distilled  in   स्कॉटलैंड  and  matured  in  ओक   casks  in  स्कॉटलैंड  for  at  least three years  (  most single  malts  are  matured  longer )  .
``  malt  ''  indicates   कि  the whisky is distilled from  a   ``  malted '' grain .
Several  प्रकार   of  grains can be malted  (   लिये  example , barley , rye  और  wheat are  सब   दाने  which  can   be  malted  )   ;  however ,  in  the case of  सिंगल  malt Scotch  ,  barley is  सदा  the only  अनाज  used  .
``  Single  ''   indicates  that all  the  malts  in  the  बोतल  come from  a  single distillery .
Bottlings containing malt whisky from  अनेक   distilleries   हैं   पुकारा  ``  blended  malt `` .
जबतक  the  स्कॉच   व्हिस्की   regulations  2009 ( SWR  2009  )  ,  the word `` blended  ''   तभी  appeared (  in   the   कॉन्टेक्स्ट  of Scotch  व्हिस्की   )   on   बोतलों   of   व्हिस्की  that  contained  a  मिश्रण  of  दोनो   जौ   और  non-barley  अनाज   व्हिस्की   ,  but this is no longer  the  case  .
Under  the   शब्दावली   स्थापित  by the SWR 2009 , a ``  blended  malt Scotch whisky '' is  a   मिश्रण  of  सिंगल  malt  स्कॉच   whiskies   ,   नहीं  a mixture of  malted   जौ   व्हिस्की  and non-barley whisky  ;  those are  पुकारा  ``  blended  Scotch whisky  ''  , without  the  word ``  malt  '' .
the  term  ``   blended  malt '' replaced  ``   vatted   malt  '' used under the  prior  labelling conventions .
the  age  बयान   on  a  बोतल  of  सिंगल  malt  स्कॉच  is the number  of   सालो  the whisky spent  maturing  in  cask   .
As  बहुत  few whiskies  हैं  bottled  इससे   a   सिंगल  cask  the  age statement  reflects  the age  of  the youngest  malt   in  the mix .
a  texture may be  arranged  so as to  ,  `` closely  दृष्टिकोण   the  single-object  औकात  of  fused-ensemble  timbres , for example  ,  the beautiful 'northern  लाइट्स   '   कॉर्ड   ...  ,  in   a  very  दिलचस्प  distribution  of  pitches  ,  produces a fused sound supported  by  a  निलंबित   झांझ   फेंकें   ``  (  एरिक्सन   (  1975  )  , p.166 &  168   )   .
In contrast to more  परंपरागत  musical textures , sound  द्रव्यमान  composition `` minimizes  the  importance  of  individual pitches in preference for texture  ,   timbre   ,  and  डायनामिक्स  as  प्राथमिक  shapers of  भाव   और   प्रभाव   .   ''
विकसित  from  the  modernist  टोन   क्लस्टर  and  स्प्रेड   to  orchestral  लिखने  by  the  late 1950s  और  1960s , sound-mass `` obscures  the  boundary between sound and noise  ``  (  एडवर्ड्स   2001  , pp . 326–27 ) .
Techniques  जिससे  may create or be used with  ध्वनि  mass  शामिल   विस्तारित  techniques such  as  muted brass or strings , flutter  tonguing  , wide  vibrato  , extreme ranges , and  glissandos   .
composers   और  works include Barbara Kolb ,  pauline  Oliveros  '   ध्वनि  Patterns for  कोरस  (  1961  ) , Norma  beecroft  's  इससे  Dreams  of   पीतल   लिये  chorus  (  1963–1964  )  ,  और  Nancy Van  de  Vate .
Beecroft  ``   टुकड़ा   व्यक्तिगत  pitches in  एहसान   of   a   सामूहिक  timbre  through  the use of vocal  और  instrumental clusters ,  choral   वाक   ,  narrator , and a  धो  of sounds from an  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  tape  .  ''
( ibid  )
A  बहुत  early example is  the   खोलने  of  jean-féry  Rebel 's  बैले   लेस  Elémens  (   1737–38   )  ,  जहाँ  chaos is  represented  by  a  gradually cumulating orchestral  क्लस्टर  of all seven  टीप  of the D minor scale (  henck  2004 ,  pp   .  52–54  )   .
A  बाद   उदाहरण  is the  तीसरा  movement of  रुथ   क्रॉफर्ड   seeger  's String  quartet  1931 ( Nonesuch H-71280 ) while more recently  phill   niblock  's  अनेक  drone based music  serves   as   an   उदाहरण   .
The  उपयोग  of ``  मदारी  approaching timbres ''  begins   साथ   debussy   और   edgard  Varèse often carefully  scored   व्यक्तिगत   इंस्ट्रूमेंटल   भाग  so that  वे  would fuse into  एक   ensemble   timbre  or  ध्वनि   द्रव्यमान  (  एरिक्सन   1975  , pp . 18 and 21 ) .
Other examples  शामिल  European ``  textural  '' compositions of  the  fifties and  sixties   ऐसे   as   krzysztof  Penderecki 's Threnody  to   the  Victims  of  Hiroshima ( 1959 ) and  györgy  Ligeti 's works  featuring   micropolyphony  in works  जैसे  Atmosphères ( 1961  )  and  उसके   requiem  (  1963-65  )  .
अन्य  composers with works  using   इस   तकनीक   शामिल  Henryk Górecki  ,  Karel Husa ,  witold   lutosławski  ,  kazimierz  Serocki  ,  and  स्टीवन   stucky   .
Sound mass techniques  भी   appear  in the music  of  George  crumb  (  anon   .   n.d.  )  .
