The Jewish tradition and use of kosher wine is  डेटिंग  back  to   biblical  times .
The long  इतिहास   of   the   उपयोग   और   उत्पादन   of  wine throughout ancient Israel  is  backed up  by  archeological  प्रमाण   .
Within  the  Jewish diaspora communities all around the globe , the  परंपरागत  and  धार्मिक   उपयोग  of  कोषेर  wine continued to this  दिन   .
वाइन   ,  linked  in   मिथक  to Dionysus / Bacchus , was  आम   in  ancient Greece  और   रोम  , and many of today 's major wine-producing  regions  of  पश्चिमी  Europe were established with Phoenician  और  , later  ,  Roman plantations .
Winemaking technology  improved   considerably  during the  समय  of the Roman  साम्राज्य   :  many  अंगूर   किस्में   और  cultivation techniques  यहूद  known ; the  डिज़ाइन  of the  वाइन  press  उन्नत   ;   और   barrels   यहूद   विकसित   लिये  storing  और  shipping  वाइन  .
rashi  , a medieval French rabbi and called  the   ``  father '' of all commentaries  कि   followed   on  the  talmud  and the  tanakh   ,  earned  उसके   जीना   as  a vintner .
Following  the  decline of Rome  और  its industrial-scale wine production for export  ,   the  Christian Church in medieval Europe also became a firm supporter of  वाइन  , necessary  लिये  celebration  of  the Catholic  द्रव्यमान  . Whereas  वाइन   थी  forbidden  in  medieval  इस्लामी   संस्कृतियों   ,   इसके  use in Christian libation was  widely  tolerated  .
geber  and other Muslim chemists pioneered the distillation of wine  लिये  Islamic medicinal and industrial  उद्देश्य   ऐसे  as  परफ्यूम   .
Wine production gradually increased ,  साथ  consumption burgeoning from the  15th  century onwards .
Wine  उत्पादन   बच  the devastating Phylloxera louse of 1887 and eventually spread  to  numerous regions throughout the world  .
Districts  of   वेस्ट  Bengal
The  भारतीय  state of West  बंगाल   सीमायें   साथ   नेपाल  ,  भूटान   ,   बांग्लादेश   और  the  भारतीय  states of Bihar  ,   झारखण्ड  , Odisha ,  असम   और  Sikkim  .
the  Himalayas  झूठ  in  the  north of the state and the Bay  of   बंगाल   is   at  the south .
in  between them ,  the  river  गंगा  flows eastwards and its main distributary  ,   the  Hooghly River  ,  flows south  to  reach  the  Bay of  बंगाल  .
The  सिलीगुड़ी  Corridor , which  connects  North-East  इण्डिया  with rest  of  the  इण्डिया   ,  lies  in   the   उत्तर   बंगाल  region  of  the  राज्य   .
geographically  , West Bengal  is  divided into  a  variety of  regions—  Darjeeling  हिमालयी  hill region  ,  Terai and Doors  प्रदेश   ,   उत्तर  Bengal  मैदान  ,  rarh  region , Western plateau and  ऊँची  lands ,  तटीय   मैदान   ,   sunderbans  and  the  Ganges Delta .
in   1947  ,  जब  India gained independence ,  the   राज्य   of  West  बंगाल  was formed with  14  districts  ,  as  प्रति  partition plan of  the   तब  Bengal province of British India  .
the  former princely state Koch Bihar  joined   as   a  district in  1950  , and the former French enclave Chandannagore joined as part of  the   हुगली  district in 1954 .
the  States  पुनर्गठन   अधिनियम  of  1956   led   to  addition  of   पुरुलिया  district to  the   राज्य   और  to enlargement  of  West  दिनाजपुर  district .
बाद   ,  larger districts such as  वेस्ट   दिनाजपुर   ,  24 Parganas and  मिदनापुर  were  bifurcated   .
वेस्ट  Bengal is  अभी  divided  into  nineteen districts under three divisions  .
Districts are  administered  by District Magistrates , and  विभाजन   हैं  administered by Divisional Commissioners  .
Kolkata  ,  the capital  of  the  राज्य   ,  constitutes the  कोलकाता  district  .
अन्य  districts  हैं  further divided into administrative units such as subdivisions  और  blocks  ,  administered by SDO  और  BDO , respectively .
The  पंचायती   राज  has a three-tier structure in the state  .
The  परमाणु  unit is called  a   ग्राम   पंचायत   ,  which  is   the   पंचायत   संगठन  for a  संग्रहण   of  villages  .
The block-level organizations  हैं  called Panchayat  samiti   ,   और   the  district-level organizations are named Zilla Parishad .
the  Caribbean  (   or   ;   ;   ;  or more commonly  antilles   )  is  a   प्रदेश  that  consists   of   the  Caribbean Sea , its islands ( some surrounded by the  caribbean   समुद्र  and some  bordering  both  the  Caribbean Sea  और   the  North Atlantic Ocean  )   ,  and the surrounding  coasts  .
The region  is   southeast   of  the  गल्फ  of Mexico  और  the North  अमरीकी   मेनलैंड   ,   ईस्ट  of Central  अमेरिका  , and  उत्तर   of  South America  .
situated  largely on  the   caribbean  Plate , the  प्रदेश  comprises more than 700 islands , islets , reefs ,  और  cays .
( See the  सूची  . )
These  आइलैंड्स   generally   रूप   द्वीप   arcs  that delineate the  पूर्वी   और   उत्तरी   किनारे   of   the  Caribbean  समुद्र  .
the   caribbean  islands  ,  consisting  of   the  Greater Antilles on  the  north  और  the  lesser  Antilles on  the   दक्षिण  and east ( including the  leeward   antilles  )  ,  are part  of  the  somewhat   larger   वेस्ट  Indies  समूहीकरण  , which  भी  includes the  lucayan  Archipelago  (  comprising  the  Bahamas  और  Turks and Caicos  आइलैंड्स   )  north  of   the  Greater Antilles  और  Caribbean  समुद्र  .
in  a  wider  sense , the mainland countries  of  Belize  और  Guyana –  historically   और   culturally  part of  the  British West Indies  –  may be  शामिल  .
Geopolitically ,  the  Caribbean islands  हैं  usually regarded as a  subregion  of North America and are  व्यवस्थित   into  30  territories  including sovereign states ,  विदेशी  departments ,  और   dependencies  .
From  जनवरी  3  ,  1958  ,  to  may  31  ,   1962  ,  वहीँ   थी   a  short-lived country called the Federation of the West Indies composed  of   टेन   english-speaking   caribbean   territories   ,  all of  जिससे  were then UK  dependencies   .
The  वेस्ट   इंडीज  cricket  टोली  continues  to  represent many of  those  nations .
इस  is a list of the  221  towns  और   13   शहरों   in   the   u.S.  state of New  हैम्पशायर   .
For  प्रत्येक  town/city , the table  सूचियाँ   the   काउंटी  to which it  belongs  ,  इसके  date of  incorporation  , its population  according   to  the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी   ,  its form of government  ,  and  इसके  principal  गांवों  .
शहरों  are indicated  in   boldface  .
Cities  और   कस्बों   हैं  treated  identically  under  राज्य   विधि   .
Cities are  बस  towns  जिनकी   रूप   of   सरकारी  was changed  by  a special act of the New  हैम्पशायर  legislature .
However , towns currently are  समर्थ   to  change  उनके  form of government by  सरल   वोटर   स्वीकृति  of a new municipal charter , with several of the more  populous  towns having already done  so  .
The  प्रमुख  slave  रूट  in medieval  अफ़्रीकी  .
This article discusses systems , history  ,   और  effects  of   गुलामी  within Africa .
देखिए   अरब  slave trade , Atlantic  स्लेव  trade , Maafa , and  गुलामी   in   समकालीन  Africa for other discussions  .
``  Slave transport in Africa '' .
Europeans usually did  नहीं   डालें  the interior  regions  .
गुलामी   in  Africa has  existed  throughout the  महाद्वीप  for many  सदियां   ,  and continues  in  the current day .
Systems of servitude and  गुलामी  were  आम  in  अनेक  parts  of  the continent  ,   as  they  यहूद   in  much of the ancient world  .
in   सबसे  African societies where  गुलामी  was prevalent  ,  the enslaved people  यहूद   largely  treated as indentured servants and  नहीं   treated   as   chattel   स्लेव  .
जब  the Arab  स्लेव  trade and  अटलांटिक  slave trade began ,  अनेक   of  the  लोकल   स्लेव   प्रणालियों  changed and began supplying  captives  for slave markets outside of Africa  .
Slavery  in  historical  अफ़्रीकी  was  practiced  in  अनेक  different forms  और  some of these do  नहीं  clearly  अनुरूप   the   परिभाषाएं  of  गुलामी  elsewhere in the world .
कर्ज़  slavery , enslavement  of  war captives ,  सैन्य  slavery , and  दण्ड  slavery were all  practiced   in   विभिन्न  parts of  अफ़्रीकी   .
हालांकि   वहीँ   था  been  कुछ   trans-saharan  trade  इससे   the   आंतरिक  of  sub-saharan  Africa to  अन्य  regions  ,   गुलामी   थी   a  small part of the  आर्थिक  life  of  many  समाजों  in Africa  जबतक  the  परिचय  of  transcontinental  slave trades  (   अरब   और   अटलांटिक  ) .
Slave  practices   यहूद  again transformed with European colonization  of   अफ़्रीकी   और  the formal  abolition   of  slavery in  the  early  1900s  .
Brett Lorenzo  favre  (  born  October  10  , 1969  )  is  a  former American football quarterback  जो  spent  the   बहुमत   of  his career with the  ग्रीन  Bay  पैकर्स  of  the  National Football League  (  NFL ) .
He  थी  a 20-year veteran of the  एनएफएल  , having played quarterback  लिये  the Atlanta Falcons  (   1991  ) , Green Bay  पैकर्स   (  1992 – 2007  )   ,   नई   यॉर्क   jets  ( 2008  )  and  मिनेसोटा  Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 )  .
Favre is the only quarterback  in  NFL history  to   throw   लिये  over 70,000 yards ,  over  500 touchdowns ,  over   300  interceptions  ,   over   6,000  completions  ,   और  over  10,000  pass attempts .
Favre  प्रारंभ   at  the quarterback position for  the   विश्वविद्यालयों   of  Southern  मिसिसिपी  for four  सालो  before being  चयनित   in  the  दूसरी  round  of   the   1991  NFL Draft by Atlanta ( 33rd  overall   )   .
He was  traded   to  Green  खाड़ी  on February 10 , 1992  ,  for the 19th pick  in  the 1992 NFL Draft .
favre  became the  पैकर्स  ' starting quarterback in the fourth  खेल   of   the   1992   ऋतु   ,  stepping in for injured  क्वार्टरबैक  Don Majkowski ,  और   प्रारंभ  every  खेल  through the 2007  ऋतु   .
He  थी   traded   to   the   नई   यॉर्क  Jets and started at  क्वार्टरबैक   लिये  the  2008  season before  हस्ताक्षर  with  the  Vikings on August 18 , 2009  as  their  starting  quarterback .
he   बना   an  NFL record  297   लगातार  starts ( 321 including  playoffs   )   .
He is  the   तभी   खिलाड़ी   to   जीत  the AP  सबसे  Valuable  खिलाड़ी  three consecutive times  (  1995–97  )   .
He  रै  led  टीमों  to  आठ   प्रभाग  championships ( 1995  ,   1996  , 1997 ,  2002   ,  2003  ,  2004  ,  2007 , 2009 ) , five NFC  चैंपियनशिप  Games  (  1995 , 1996 , 1997  ,  2007 , 2009 ) , and  दो  Super Bowl  दिखावे  (  सुपर  Bowl XXXI  ,  Super Bowl  xxxii   )  , winning one (  सुपर  Bowl XXXI  )  .
He  holds   अनेक   एनएफएल  records  ,  including most career touchdown passes , most career passing  गज   ,   सबसे   करियर  pass completions  ,   सबसे   करियर  pass attempts  ,  most career  interceptions   thrown  , most  लगातार  starts by a  खिलाड़ी  ,  सबसे  consecutive starts  by   a  quarterback ,  सबसे  career victories  as   a   starting   क्वार्टरबैक   ,   सबसे   बर्खास्त   ,  and  सबसे   fumbles   .
He  is  also referred  to   by  his  उपनाम   ``   the   gunslinger  ''  .
Salesforce.com Inc.  is   a  global  एंटरप्राइज़  software company  headquartered  in San Francisco , California  .
हालांकि   बेहतरीन  known  लिये  its  ग्राहक   संबंध  management  (  CRM )  उत्पाद   ,  Salesforce  रै  also expanded into  the  ``  सोशल   एंटरप्राइज़  arena '' through acquisitions .
it  is currently ranked the most innovative  कम्पनी   in   अमेरिका  by  फोर्ब्स   पत्रिका   ,   as  well as number 27  in  Fortunes magazine 's 100 Best Companies to  कार्य  For in 2012  .
as   of  April  2013   ,  the  कम्पनी   is  ranked sixth in  providing  services in marketing and customer service  स्वचालन   .
It is listed  on   the  New  यॉर्क   भण्डार   एक्सचेंज  and  is   a  constituent of the S  &   p  500  अनुक्रमणिका  .
seahorse  is the title  दिए  to  54  species of marine  मछली   in  the genus Hippocampus .
`` Hippocampus  ''  comes from  the  Ancient  यूनानी   hippos  meaning `` horse  ''   और  kampos  अर्थ   ``  sea  दानव   ''   .
Earth  is  the third  ग्रह  from  the  Sun , and the  densest  and fifth-largest  of   the  eight  ग्रह   in  the Solar  प्रणाली  .
It is  भी   the   largest  of the Solar  प्रणाली   's   चार  terrestrial planets  .
it   is   sometimes  referred to  as   the  world  or   the   ब्लू   ग्रह  .
धरती  formed approximately 4.54  अरब   सालो  ago , and  जीवन  appeared on its surface  भीतर  its first  अरब   सालो  .
Earth 's  जीवमंडल  then significantly  altered  the atmospheric  और  other basic physical  शर्तें  ,  जिससे   सक्रिय   the  proliferation  of   जीवों  as  खूब  as the formation of  the   ओज़ोन   परत  , which together with  धरती   's  magnetic field blocked  नुकसानदेह   सौर  radiation  ,  and  permitted  formerly  ocean-confined  life to move safely to land  .
The  शारीरिक  properties of the  धरती  ,  as   खूब  as its  geological   इतिहास   और  orbit  ,   have  allowed life to persist .
Estimates  on  how  much  longer the  ग्रह  will  be   समर्थ  to continue to  support  life  दायरा  from  ,   to  as long as .
Earth  's  lithosphere  is   विभाजित   into   अनेक   rigid  segments , or tectonic  प्लेटों   ,  that migrate across  the  surface over  अवधि   of   अनेक  millions  of   सालो  .
About 71 % of  the  surface is  covered  by salt water  महासागर  , with  the  remainder consisting  of   महाद्वीपों  and islands which  साथ   have  many  झीलों   और  other sources  of  water that  योगदान  to  the   जलमंडल   .
Earth 's poles are mostly covered with ice  कि   is  the  ठोस  ice of the  अंटार्कटिक   बर्फ  sheet  और   the   समुद्र   बर्फ   कि   is  the  ध्रुवीय   बर्फ   पैक  .
the  planet 's interior  remains   क्रियाशील   ,   साथ   a  solid  आयरन  inner  कोर   ,   a   द्रव   बाहरी   कोर   कि   generates  the  चुम्बकीय  field , and  a  thick layer of relatively  ठोस  mantle  .
Earth gravitationally  interacts  with other  वस्तुएँ  in space ,  विशेषकर   the   सूर्य   और   the  Moon  .
दौरान  one orbit  around   the  Sun , the Earth rotates about  इसके  own  अक्ष  366.26 times  ,   बनाना  365.26 solar  दिनों  ,  or   एक   sidereal  year  .
The  धरती  's  अक्ष  of rotation is tilted 23.4°  दूर  from the perpendicular  of  its  कक्षीय  plane , producing seasonal variations on  the   ग्रह   's  surface with a  काल   of   एक  tropical year  (  365.24  सौर  days )  .
the  Moon is Earth 's  तभी  natural satellite .
It began  orbiting   the  Earth  परिचय  .
The Moon 's gravitational  बातचीत   साथ  Earth stimulates ocean  tides   ,  stabilizes the  अक्षीय  tilt ,  और  gradually slows the  ग्रह  's  रोटेशन  .
The  ग्रह  is home  to  millions  of   प्रजाति  of  जीवन  , including humans .
Both  the  mineral  संसाधन  of the  ग्रह   और   the  products  of   the  biosphere  योगदान  resources  कि  are  प्रयुक्त   to   support  a global human population .
ये  inhabitants are  grouped  into about 200  स्वतंत्र   sovereign   राज्य   ,   जिससे  interact through  कूटनीति  ,  सफर  , trade  ,   और  military action  .
Human cultures have developed many views  of  the planet ,  सहित   इसके   personification  as  a  planetary deity  ,   इसके   आकार  as flat , its  स्थिति  as  the  center  of   the  universe , and in  the   आधुनिक   gaia   principle  , as a  सिंगल   ,   self-regulating  organism  in  its own right .
the   जादूगर   इससे   the   waite-smith  tarot , who  is   चित्रित  using  the  same tools that modern Wiccans  उपयोग  .
In  the   neopagan   धर्म  of  wicca   ,   a  range of  जादुई   टूल्स  are used in ritual practice  .
Each of  ये  tools has different  उपयोग  and  एसोसिएशन   ,   और   हैं   प्रयुक्त   primarily  to direct  जादुई  energies .
वे   हैं  used  at  an altar ,  अंदर  a magic circle .
in  traditional  gardnerian   wicca   ,  the tools are  प्रायः  divided into  निजी   टूल्स  , which are  लिये  use  by   ,  and owned by , an individual Wiccan , and coven tools  ,  used collectively by the coven .
इस   अभ्यास  may  derive  partly  इससे   masonic  traditions  (   ऐसे  as  the   उपयोग  of  the  Square  और   compasses  )  ,  from which  wicca  draws  कुछ  material  ,   और  partly from the rituals of the Hermetic  अनुक्रम  of  the  Golden Dawn .
the  latter made  much  use  of   सामग्री  from medieval grimoires such as  the  Key  of  Solomon  ,   जिससे  has many illustrations of magical  टूल्स  and  निर्देश  for their  तैयारी  .
Typical eukaryotic cell .
सेल्यूलर   श्वसन  is  the  set  of   the  metabolic  प्रतिक्रियाएँ   और  processes that  लो  place in  the   कोशिकाएं   of  organisms to convert biochemical energy  इससे  nutrients into adenosine triphosphate  (  ATP  )  , and  तब  release waste products  .
The reactions  शामिल  in respiration are catabolic reactions , which  ब्रेक  large  अणुओं   into   छोटी  ones ,  releasing  energy in the process  as  weak so-called `` high-energy  ''  bonds  हैं  replaced by stronger bonds  in  the products  .
Respiration is  एक  of the key ways a cell  gains   उपयोगी  energy to fuel cellular activity .
Cellular respiration is  माना  an exothermic redox reaction .
the  overall  प्रतिक्रिया  is broken  into   अनेक  smaller ones  जब   it  occurs  in   the  body  ,  most of which  हैं  redox  प्रतिक्रियाएँ   themselves  .
हालांकि   technically  , cellular respiration  is  a combustion reaction  ,  it  clearly  does  नहीं   resemble   एक  when it occurs in a living cell  .
This  अंतर   is  because it occurs in  अनेक   पृथक   कदम  .
While the  overall  reaction is a combustion reaction  ,   no  single reaction that comprises it  is  a  दहन  reaction  .
Nutrients that are  commonly  used  by  animal and  संयंत्र   कोशिकाएं  in  श्वसन   शामिल  sugar , amino acids and  वसीय  acids , and a common  oxidizing  agent ( electron acceptor  )  is molecular oxygen  (  O2 )  .
The  उर्जा  stored in ATP  (  its  तीसरा  phosphate  समूह  is  weakly   बंधुआ  to  the   बाकी   of  the molecule and  is   cheaply   टूटा  allowing stronger  bonds  to form ,  thereby   transferring  energy for use by  the  cell )  can   तब  be used  to  drive  प्रक्रियाओं  requiring energy  ,  including biosynthesis , locomotion  or   परिवहन  of  अणुओं   आरपार  cell  झिल्लियों  .
A  stored-pressure  fire extinguisher made by Amerex
A British fire  extinguisher   साथ  ID sign  ,  call  पाइंट  and fire  कार्रवाई  sign
a  fire  extinguisher   ,  flame extinguisher ,  or  simply an  extinguisher  , is  an   क्रियाशील  fire protection device used to extinguish  or   कंट्रोल   छोटी  fires  ,  often in emergency  परिस्थितियों   .
it   is  not intended  लिये   उपयोग  on  an   out-of-control  fire ,  ऐसे  as one  जिससे  has reached the ceiling , endangers the  उपयोक्ता   (  i.e. ,  no  escape  रूट  ,  धुँआ   ,   विस्फोट   जोखिम  , etc . ) , or  वरना   requires   the   विशेषज्ञता   of  a  आग  department .
Typically , a  आग  extinguisher consists of  a   hand-held  cylindrical  दबाव  vessel  containing   an   एजेंट  which can be discharged  to  extinguish a fire .
In the United States , fire extinguishers , in  सब  buildings  अन्य  than houses  ,   हैं   generally  required  to  be  सर्विस   और   inspected  by  a   आग   सुरक्षा  service  कम्पनी  at  तनिक  annually  .
Some jurisdictions  आवश्यकता  more frequent service  लिये  fire extinguishers .
The servicer places  a  tag on the extinguisher  to  indicate the type of service  performed  ( annual  निरीक्षण   ,  recharge , new  आग  extinguisher ) and  जब  .
वहीँ  are two  प्रमुख  types  of   आग   extinguishers   :  stored  दबाव  and cartridge-operated .
In  भंडारित  pressure units , the expellant  is  stored in the  वही   कक्ष  as  the   firefighting  agent itself  .
depending   on   the  agent  प्रयुक्त  , different  propellants  are used  .
साथ  dry chemical  extinguishers  ,  नाइट्रोजन  is  typically  used ;  जल  and  झाग   extinguishers  typically use  एयर  .
Stored pressure  आग  extinguishers are the most common  प्रकार  .
cartridge-operated   extinguishers  contain  the   expellant   गैस  in a  पृथक  cartridge  कि   is  punctured prior  to   निर्वहन   ,   exposing   the  propellant to the  extinguishing  agent .
इस  type  is  not as  आम  , used primarily in areas such  as   औद्योगिक   सुविधाएं  ,  जहाँ  they  प्राप्त   higher-than-average  use .
They  have  the  लाभ  of simple and  संकेत  recharge ,  allowing   an  operator  to  discharge  the  extinguisher , recharge  it  , and return to  the   आग  in  a  reasonable  राशि   of   समय   .
Unlike  भंडारित   दबाव  types  ,  these  extinguishers   उपयोग  compressed  कार्बन  dioxide instead  of   नाइट्रोजन   ,   हालांकि   नाइट्रोजन  cartridges are  प्रयुक्त   on  low temperature  (  -60 rated ) models  .
कार्ट्रिज  operated  extinguishers  are  उपलब्धियाँ  in dry  रासायनिक  and  शुष्क  powder types in the U.S. and in  जल   ,  wetting agent , foam ,  शुष्क  chemical  (  classes ABC and  b.c  . )  ,  and  शुष्क  powder (  क्लास  D  )  types in the  बाकी   of  the world .
आग  extinguishers are  further  divided  into  handheld and  cart-mounted  ,  भी  called  wheeled  extinguishers  .
हैंडहेल्ड  extinguishers weigh  इससे   0.5  to 14  गामा  (  1   to  30  पाउंड  ) ,  और   हैं   hence  , easily portable by  हाथ  .
Cart-mounted units typically weigh 23+  गामा   (  50+ pounds )  .
These wheeled models are most  commonly   मिला   at   निर्माण   साइट  , airport runways , heliports , as well as  docks  and marinas .
देशी  Americans  in  the  संयुक्त  States  हैं  the  स्वदेशी  peoples in  उत्तर  America within the  सीमाएँ   of   the  present-day  महाद्वीपीय   संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  अलास्का   ,  and the island state of Hawaii .
They are composed  of  numerous  ,  distinct  देशी   अमरीकी   जनजातियों  and ethnic  समूह   ,  many of  जिससे  survive as intact  राजनैतिक   समुदायों   .
The terms used  to   refer  to Native Americans  have   महरूम   विवादास्पद  .
according  to  a   1995   u.S.  Census Census_Bureau Bureau Census_Bureau  नियत  of home interviews  ,  most of  the  respondents with an  expressed  preference refer  to   themselves   as  American Indians (  or   बस  Indians  )   ,   और  this term has been adopted  by  major  अखबारों   और   कुछ  academic  समूह  ; however ,  इस  term does  नहीं   typically  include Native Hawaiians or certain  अलास्कन  Natives ,  ऐसे  as  aleut  , Yup'ik  ,  or Inuit peoples .
Since the end of  the  15th century , the  माइग्रेशन  of  europeans   to  the  americas   ,  and their importation  of   africans  as slaves  ,   रै  led  to  centuries of conflict  और  adjustment  between   बूढ़ा  and  नई   संसार  societies .
Europeans created  सबसे   of  the  जल्दी  written  ऐतिहासिक  record about  देशी  Americans  बाद   the   colonists  ' immigration to  the  Americas .
अनेक   देशी  Americans lived as  hunter-gatherer  societies  और   बताई  their histories by  मौखिक   परंपराओं   .
in  many groups  ,  women carried  आउट  sophisticated cultivation  of   numerous  varieties of staple  फसलों  : maize  ,  beans and squash .
The indigenous cultures were  काफी   अलग  from  those  of the  कृषिक  ,  proto-industrial   ,  mostly Christian  आप्रवासियों  from western  यूरेशिया   .
Many Native cultures  यहूद   matrilineal  ;  the  people occupied  lands  for  उपयोग  of  the  entire  जातियाँ  ,  लिये  hunting or agriculture  .
Europeans  at  that time had patriarchal cultures  और   था   विकसित  concepts of  व्यक्तिगत   प्रॉपर्टी  rights  साथ   आदर  to  जमीन   कि  were  अत्यधिक  different .
The differences  in  cultures between the  स्थापित  Native Americans  और   अप्रवासी   europeans  ,  as  well as  shifting  alliances  among  different  राष्ट्र  of each  संस्कृति  through  the  centuries  ,   caused   extensive  political tension , ethnic violence  और   सोशल  disruption .
The  देशी  Americans  suffered   ऊँची  fatalities from the  सम्पर्क  with infectious  यूरेशियाई  diseases , to which they had no  acquired   प्रतिरक्षण   .
Epidemics  बाद  European  सम्पर्क  caused  the   महानतम   घाटा  of life for indigenous populations .
Estimates of  the  pre-Columbian population of  कया   आज   constitutes  the  u.S.  vary significantly , ranging from 1  लाख   to  18 million  .
बाद   the   colonies   revolted  against  ग्रेट  Britain and established the United States of America  ,  President George Washington and  हेनरी   नॉक्स  conceived of the  विचार   of  `` civilizing '' Native Americans  in   तैयारी  for  सम्मिलन   as  U.S. citizens .
सम्मिलन  ( whether  voluntary  as with the Choctaw , or forced )  became  a  सतत   नीति  through American administrations  .
During the 19th  सदी  ,  the   विचारधारा   of   manifest  destiny  became  integral to the American  राष्ट्रवादी  movement .
विस्तार   of   european-american  populations  to   the  west after the American Revolution resulted in  increasing  pressure  on   देशी   अमरीकी  lands , warfare  between  the groups , and rising  तनाव   .
In  1830   ,   the   u.S.   कॉंग्रेस  passed the  भारतीय  Removal Act  ,   authorizing  the  सरकारी   to   relocate   देशी  Americans  इससे  their homelands  भीतर  established states  to  lands  वेस्ट   of  the Mississippi River ,  accommodating  European-American expansion  .
the   पहला  European  अमेरिकी  to encounter  the  western  आंतरिक   जनजातियों   यहूद  generally  फर   व्यापारियों   और  trappers  .
There were  भी  Jesuit  प्रचारकों   क्रियाशील  in  the  Northern  टियर  .
As United States expansion reached  into  the  अमरीकी   वेस्ट   ,  settler  और   खनिक   प्रवासियों   आए  into increasing  विरोध  with  the  Great Basin ,  ग्रेट   मैदान  ,  और  other Western tribes .
ये  were complex  nomadic  cultures based  on   घोड़ा  culture and seasonal bison hunting .
They  carried  out  दमदार  resistance  to  United States  incursions   in  the  दशकों  after the American Civil  युद्ध  , in a series  of  Indian  युद्धों   ,   जिससे  were  बारंबार  up until  the   1890s  ,  लकिन  continued into the  20th  century  .
the  transcontinental railroad brought more non-Natives into  जनजातीय  land in the  वेस्ट  .
Over  समय  ,  the  U.S.  मजबूर   a   श्रेणी  of treaties and land cessions  by  the tribes , and  स्थापित   रिज़र्वेशन   लिये  them in many  पश्चिमी  states .
U.S.  एजेंटों  encouraged Native Americans to adopt European-style farming and similar pursuits  ,  but  european-american  agricultural technology of the  समय  was inadequate  लिये   प्रायः   शुष्क  reservation lands .
In 1924  ,  Native  अमेरिकी  who were  नहीं  already U.S. citizens  यहूद  granted  नागरिकता   by   कॉंग्रेस  .
समकालीन   देशी  Americans  have  a  अद्वितीय  relationship with the United  राज्य  because they may be members of nations  ,  tribes , or  bands  with sovereignty and treaty rights  .
सेंट्रल  America  (   )  is the central geographic  प्रदेश  of  the  Americas .
it   is   the   southernmost   ,  isthmian portion of the North American  महाद्वीप   ,  which connects with  दक्षिण   अमेरिका  on  the   southeast  .
जब  considered  भाग  of  the   एकीकृत   महाद्वीपीय  model , it is  माना  a subcontinent .
Central America  consists   of   सात   देशों  : Belize  ,  Costa Rica , El  साल्वाडोर  ,  ग्वाटेमाला   ,  Honduras  ,  Nicaragua  ,  and Panama  .
सेंट्रल  America is part of the  mesoamerican  biodiversity hotspot  ,  which extends  इससे  northern Guatemala through  सेंट्रल   पनामा   .
It is bordered by Mexico to  the  north  ,  the Caribbean  समुद्र   to  the  ईस्ट  ,  the  North Pacific Ocean to the west  ,  and  कोलंबिया  to the south-east  .
Central  अमेरिका   is  an area of  ,  or almost 0.1 %  of   the  Earth 's  सतह   .
As of 2009 , its population  थी  estimated at  41,739,000   .
It  रै  a  घनत्व  of 77 people per square kilometer .
scrubs  is an  अमरीकी   चिकित्सा  comedy-drama  टेलीविज़न   श्रेणी  created  by   विधेयक  Lawrence  कि  aired  इससे  October  2  , 2001 to  कूच  17 ,  2010  on  एनबीसी  and later  एबीसी  .
The series follows the lives of employees at  the  fictional  पवित्र   दिल   शिक्षण  hospital .
the  title is  a   खेल  on surgical  scrubs   और  a term  लिये  a low-ranking  व्यक्ति   क्युकी  at the beginning of  the   श्रेणी   ,  most  of  the  प्रमुख  characters were medical  interns   .
The  श्रेणी   सुविधाएँ  fast-paced screenplay , slapstick  ,  and surreal vignettes presented mostly  as  the daydreams of the  सेंट्रल   अक्षर  ,  dr.   जॉन   ``  J.D .  ''
Dorian  ,   जो   is   निभाई   by   zach  Braff .
अभिनेताओं  starring alongside  braff   in  the  पहला  eight  सीज़न  included  सारा   chalke  , Donald  faison  , Neil Flynn , Ken  जेनकींस   ,  John C.  mcginley  and Judy Reyes .
The series  रै   भी  featured multiple guest appearances  by   फिल्मी  actors , such as Brendan Fraser  ,  Heather Graham ,  और  Colin  farrell  .
In  the  ninth season ,  अनेक   नई   डाल   सदस्यों   यहूद   introduced  and  the  show setting  स्थानांतरित   इससे   a   हॉस्पिटल  to  a  medical school .
आउट   of   the  original  डाल  , only Braff , Faison  और  McGinley  became  regular cast members , while the  अन्य  with the exception of  रेयेस  , made guest  दिखावे   .
braff   appeared  in  छह  episodes  of  the ninth  ऋतु  before departing  .
केरी   bishé  ,  eliza   कूप   ,   डेव  Franco  और  Michael Mosley became series regulars with Bishé  बनने   the  show 's new  narrator  .
scrubs   premiered  on  अक्तूबर   2   ,  2001 on NBC .
The series received  a  Peabody  पुरस्कार   in  2006 .
During  the  seventh  ऋतु   ,  NBC announced  कि  it  होता   नहीं   नवीनीकृत  the show .
shortly   बाद  the seventh  ऋतु   finale  ,  एबीसी  announced it had  उठाई   up  the eighth  ऋतु  of  the   श्रेणी   ,  which  began  January 6  ,   2009   .
the  ninth  ऋतु   premiered  on December 1 ,  2009  .
on  May 14  ,   2010   ,  ABC  घोषित  it had officially  रद्द  Scrubs .

A  भाप  engine is a heat engine that performs mechanical  कार्य  using steam as its  working   द्रव  .
Using boiling water  to  produce mechanical  गति  goes  वापस  about  2,000   सालो   ,  but  जल्दी  devices  यहूद   नहीं  practical  .
Since  the  late 1700s steam engines  have   become  a  प्रमुख  source of  mechanical   शक्ति  .
the  first applications were  निकालना   जल  from  खानों  .
in  1781 James Watt  patented   a   भाप  engine that produced continuous  rotative   गति   .
These  10  hp  इंजन   सक्रिय   a   चौड़ी   दायरा   of  manufacturing machinery  to  be powered .
the  engines could  be  sited  anywhere   कि   जल  and  कोयले  or  लकडी   ईंधन  could be obtained .
By 1883 , engines that could provide  10,000  hp  था  become  feasible  .
Steam engines  could  also  be  applied to vehicles such as traction  इंजन   और  the railway  इंजनों  which are commonly just  पुकारा  steam  इंजन  outside America .
The stationary  भाप  engine was  a  key  घटक  of the  औद्योगिक  Revolution  ,   allowing   कारखानों   to   locate   जहाँ  water power  थी  unavailable  .
Today steam  turbines   generate  about 90 % of the electric  शक्ति   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  using  a   किस्में   of   ऊष्मा   स्त्रोत  .
भाप  engines  हैं  external combustion engines  ,  where the  working  fluid is separate  इससे  the combustion  उत्पाद   .
Non-combustion  ऊष्मा  sources  ऐसे  as  सौर   शक्ति  , nuclear power  or   geothermal  energy may be used .
The  आदर्श   ऊष्मागतिक   साईकिल  used to  analyze  this process is called the  rankine   साईकिल  .
in  the  साईकिल   ,  water is  heated  into steam in  a  boiler until  it  reaches  a  high pressure .
When expanded through  पिस्टन्स  or turbines ,  mechanical   कार्य  is done  .
the   reduced-pressure  steam is  तब   सघन   और   उत्तेजित  back  into  the boiler  .
In  सामान्य  usage ,  the  term  भाप   इंजन   can  refer to either the  एकीकृत  steam  पौधे   (  including boilers etc  .   )  such  as  railway steam  इंजनों  and  पोर्टेबल   इंजन  , or  may   refer   to  the piston  or   टर्बाइन   मशीनरी  alone , as  in   the  beam  इंजन   और  stationary steam  इंजन   .
Specialized devices such as  भाप  hammers and  भाप   pile  drivers are dependent  on  steam  supplied  from a  पृथक   बॉयलर   .
A mill engine  इससे   stott  Park  bobbin  Mill , Cumbria  ,   इंग्लैण्ड
A steam locomotive in Germany .This  क्लास  of engine was  निर्मित  in  1942  – 1950 and operated commercially  जबतक  1988 .
``  Move  कुतिया  ''  (  edited version titled `` Move B***h '' or simply ``  मूव   ''  ) is the third official single from rapper Ludacris  '   एल्बम  Word of  mouf   .
the  single features  mystikal  and  i-20  .

Puerto Rican  reggaeton  duo  maicol  &  मैनुएल  sampled the song  on  `` Hoy Me  levanté  '' on their 2002 release Yakaleo .

It was also used  लिये  April  शिकारी  in  विभिन्न  Independent  circuits   .
it  was  प्रदर्शित  in  the  movie  atl  starring T.I  .  , and  '   hancock  , '  हालांकि   in  the  latter  ,  the  clean  संस्करण  was used .

Elizabeth  ii  ( Elizabeth  एलेक्जेंड्रा   मरियम  ;  born  21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of  16  sovereign states  ,  known  as  the Commonwealth  realms  ,  और   उनके  territories  और  dependencies  ,  and head  of  the  54-member  Commonwealth of  राष्ट्र  .
She is  परम्   राज्यपाल  of  the   गिरिजाघर  of  इंग्लैण्ड  and , in  कुछ  of her  realms  ,  carries   the  title  of  Defender of  the   आस्था  as part  of   उसके  full title  .
on  her accession  on  6  फ़रवरी   1952  ,  एलिज़ाबेथ   became   सिर   of   the  Commonwealth and  महारानी  regnant  of   सात  independent Commonwealth  देशों  : the  संयुक्त   किंगडम   ,   कनाडा   ,   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , New Zealand  ,  South Africa , Pakistan and  ceylon   .
इससे   1956  to  1992  , the  क्रमांक  of  उसके   realms   varied  as territories gained  स्वतंत्रता  and some realms became republics  .
at  present , in addition to  the   पहला  four aforementioned countries , Elizabeth is Queen of  जमैका  , Barbados  ,  the  बहामा  , Grenada , Papua New Guinea ,  the   सुलेमान  Islands ,  तुवालू  , Saint  लूसिया   ,   संत  Vincent and the  grenadines   ,  Belize  ,   अण्टीगुआ  and Barbuda  और   संत   किट्स   और   नेविस   .
उसके   शासनकाल   of   सालो  is  फिलहाल  the  दूसरी   longest  for  a  British monarch ; only  महारानी  Victoria  रै   reigned  longer  at  over 63 years .
Elizabeth  थी   born  in  लंदन   और   शिक्षित  privately at  घर   .
Her father acceded to the  सिंहासन   as   जार्ज  VI  in  1936 on the  abdication  of his brother Edward VIII , from which time she  थी  the heir  presumptive  .
She  began   to   undertake  public duties during the Second World  युद्ध  ,  in  which she served  in   the  Auxiliary Territorial Service .
in  1947 , she married Prince  फिलिप  , Duke of Edinburgh  ,   साथ   जिसको   वो   रै  four  children   :  Charles  ,  Anne ,  एंड्रयू   ,  and Edward .
Her  राजतिलक  service  took  place  in   1953   और  was the  पहला  to be  televised  .
The Queen  's  many  ऐतिहासिक  visits and meetings  शामिल  a  राज्य   विज़िट  to the Republic of Ireland and  reciprocal   विज़िट   to  and  इससे  the Pope  .
The  महारानी  has seen major  संवैधानिक  changes in her realms  ,  such as  devolution   in  the United Kingdom  और   the  patriation  of  the Canadian constitution .
टाइम्स  of  निजी  significance  have  included  the  births and marriages  of  her children  ,  the  births  of  उसके  grandchildren  ,   the  investiture of the  प्रिंस  of Wales , and the celebration  of  milestones  ऐसे  as her Silver  ,  Golden  ,  and  डायमंड  Jubilees in  1977   ,  2002 ,  और  2012 , respectively .
प्रमुख  events  in  the  महारानी  's reign  have  included  the   परेशानियों   in  Northern Ireland ,  the  Falklands War  ,  wars with Iraq and the  युद्ध  in Afghanistan .
There  have   महरूम   टाइम्स   of  personal  विषाद   लिये  her  जिससे  include  the  death of her  पिता  at 56 ,  the  assassination of  प्रिंस  Philip  's   ताऊ  ,  रब   माउंटबेटन   ,  the breakdown of  उसके   children  's marriages  in   1992  ( a year deemed  उसके   annus   horribilis  ) , the  मौत  in 1997 of  उसके  former  daughter-in-law  ,  डायना  , Princess of  वेल्स  , and the deaths  of  her mother  और   सिस्टर  in 2002 .
The  महारानी  has occasionally faced severe press criticism  of   the   royal   परिवार   और   रिपब्लिकन   sentiments   ,   लकिन   support   लिये  the  साम्राज्य   और  her  निजी   लोकप्रियता  remain high  .
Christianity is  the  largest religion listed  by   australians  in the  नेशनल  census .
In the 2011  जनसांख्यिकी   ,   61.1   %   of  Australians were listed as Christian  .
Australia has no official  राज्य  religion  और  the Australian Constitution protects freedom  of  religion .
the   उपस्थिति  of Christianity in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   began   साथ   the   आगमन   of   the  First Fleet of British convicts  in  1788 .
The religion grew to account for  96.1  % of the national  जनसांख्यिकी  at the  समय   of   the  Federation  of  Australia in  1901  .
The Anglican Church of  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   (   formerly  known  as  the Church  of   इंग्लैण्ड  in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   )   remained  the  largest  denomination  जबतक  1986 ,  जब   it  was surpassed  by  the  रोमन  Catholic  गिरिजाघर  in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
post-war  multiculturalism and a decline in religious observance  among   कुछ  sections  of  the population  have   diversified  the demographics of religion in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   .
of  the  roughly  61 %  identifying  as Christian in  2011   ,  the largest denominations  यहूद   either  Roman Catholic  (  25 % )  or  Anglican  (   17  % ) ,  साथ  the  तीसरा   largest  denomination being  the  5 % affiliated with the Uniting  गिरिजाघर  in Australia  .
post-war  immigration has  grown  the  संख्याएँ   belonging   to   चर्च  like the Greek Orthodox Archdiocese  of  Australia  और   वहीँ   हैं  large and  growing  Pentecostal  समूह  ,  ऐसे   as  Sydney  's  Hillsong  गिरिजाघर  .
The  त्यौहार  of Easter and  क्रिसमस   हैं  public  छुट्टियाँ  in Australia  .
around  a quarter  of   विद्यार्थी  attend church  स्कूलों  and Christian organisations are leading non-government providers of health and  welfare  services  through  organisations like  कैथोलिक   स्वास्थ्य  Australia , Anglicare , UnitingCare  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   ,  the  मोक्ष  Army and St Vincent de  पॉल  Society  .
Historically  significant   ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  Christians have included Rev  dr  John Dunmore  लैंग  , Saint  मरियम  MacKillop ,  कैथरीन  Helen  spence  ,  पादरी  David Unaipon  ,  the  रेवरेंड   जॉन  Flynn and  पादरी  Sir Doug Nicholls  .
High  प्रोफ़ाइल  contemporary  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  Christians include :  टिम  Costello Baptist minister  और  current  सीईओ   of  World Vision  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   ,  Frank Brennan  ,   जेसुइट  human  अधिकारों  lawyer  ,  Cardinal  जार्ज  Pell ,  कैथोलिक  Archbishop of  सिडनी  , Phillip Aspinall the current Anglican Primate  और   archbishop  of  ब्रिसबेन  , Kevin Rudd  ,   पूर्व  Labor Prime Minister  ,  and Tony Abbott , leader  लिये   the  Federal  विपक्ष  Liberal  पार्टी   .
Charter  बनाना   कॉलेजिएट  School ,  जिससे  became Yale  कॉलेज  , October  9  , 1701
Yale University  is  a private Ivy League research  विश्वविद्यालयों   स्तिथ   in   नई   हेवन  ,  कनेक्टिकट  .
संस्थापित  in 1701 in  the   उपनिवेश  of  कनेक्टिकट   ,   the  university is the third-oldest  संस्था  of  उच्चतर  education  in  the United  राज्य   .
Originally chartered  as  the `` Collegiate  स्कूल   ''   ,  the  संस्था  traces its roots to 17th-century clergymen  जो  sought to establish a college  to  train clergy and political leaders for  the  colony .
in   1718  ,  the  College  थी  renamed `` Yale College ''  to  honor a  तोहफा  from Elihu  yale   ,  a governor  of   the  British  ईस्ट   इण्डिया   कम्पनी   .
in   1861  , the Graduate  स्कूल  of Arts  और   sciences   became  the first U.S. institution  to  award the PhD  .   yale   became   a  founding  सदस्य  of the  संघ  of  अमरीकी   विश्वविद्यालयों  in  1900  .
yale   कॉलेज   थी  transformed ,  शुरूआत  in the  1930s  ,  through  the establishment of residential colleges : 12 now exist  और  two  अधिक   हैं  planned .
yale   employs   over  1,100 faculty to teach  और   सलाह  about  5,300   undergraduate  and 6,100 graduate and professional students  .
Almost all tenured professors  सिखा   undergraduate  courses , more than  2,000   of   जिससे  are offered  annually   .
The University 's assets  शामिल   an   endowment  valued  at   $  19.4 billion  ,  the  second-largest   of   कोई   अकादमिक  institution in the  संसार  .
Yale  's   प्रणाली   of   अधिक   than   दो   दर्जन  libraries holds  12.5  million volumes .
49  Nobel Laureates have  महरूम  affiliated with the University as students , faculty ,  और   स्टाफ  .
Yale has produced many notable alumni  ,  including five U.S.  राष्ट्रपतियों  ,  19  U.S.  परम्  Court Justices  ,  and several foreign heads of state .
At the graduate level ,  yale  Law School , Yale School of  आर्ट  ,  और  Yale School of Drama are consistently  क्रमित  the  शीर्ष  programs  in  their field .
yale   विधि  School  is  the  सबसे  selective law school in the United States .
Yale students compete  intercollegiately   as   the   yale   bulldogs   in   the  NCAA Division I  आइवी  League .
the  oldest intercollegiate  एथलेटिक   इवेंट   in   the   संयुक्त   राज्य  is the Yale-Harvard regatta .
Artemisia  tridentata   (  `` big sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush ''  )  is an aromatic shrub from the family  asteraceae  ,  जिससे   grows  in  arid  and semi-arid conditions  ,  throughout a range of cold  मरुस्थल   ,  steppe ,  और   पहाड़   habitats   in  the  intermountain   वेस्ट   of  North America  .
The vernacular  नाम   ``   sagebrush  '' is also used  लिये  several  सम्बन्धित   सदस्यों  of the genus  artemisia   ,  such as California  sagebrush   (  Artemisia californica  )  .
Big Sagebrush  और  other Artemisia species are the  प्रबल  plants across large  portions  of the Great Basin , covering some  422,000  square miles in  11  western U.S.  &   कनाडाई  states  .
It  is  the  राज्य  flower  of   नेवाडा  .
Sagebrush provides  खाना   और  habitat for  a  variety of  प्रजाति  , such  as  sage grouse  ,  pronghorn antelope , gray  vireo   ,   सानो  rabbit , and mule  हिरण   .
बिग   sagebrush   थी  used as an  हर्बल   आयुर्विज्ञान  by Native Americans throughout  the   intermountain  West of North America—especially  लिये  preventing infection  in  wounds , stopping internal bleeding  ,  and treating  headaches  and colds .
chemically   ,  the active  औषधीय  constituents  शामिल   camphor  ,  terpenoids  ,  और   tannins  .
Several major threats exist to  ऋषि  brush ecosystems ,  सहित   इंसान  settlements ,  परिवर्तन  to  agricultural   जमीन  ,  पशुधन  grazing , invasive  संयंत्र   प्रजाति  ,  wildfires  , and  जलवायु  change  .
Yahoo ! Mail is a free email service  offered  by the  अमरीकी   ढूंढें   इंजन  company  याहू  !
It  थी  launched  in  1997  ,  and , according to comScore  ,  Yahoo !  मेल  is the third-largest web-based  ईमेल   सेवा  with 281 million users  as   of  December 2012  .
फिलहाल  , Yahoo  !  offers three  संस्करण  of  याहू   !  Mail .
The traditional ``  याहू  !  मेल  Classic ''  continues   the  availability of  the   असली  interface introduced in 1997  .
a  version  introduced  in 2005  शामिल  a new Ajax interface  ,   drag-and-drop   सुविधाएँ   ,  improved  ढूंढें  functionality  ,  keyboard  शॉर्टकट  , address  auto-complete   ,  tabs , and  अन्य  updated  सुविधाएँ  .
in  October 2010  ,   याहू  ! released a  बीटा  version  of  Yahoo  !  Mail ,  जिससे  included improvements to the  डिज़ाइन  , performance , search functionality  ,  and Facebook integration .
In  may   2011   ,  beta  परीक्षण  for  the   नई   संस्करण  stopped ,  और  it became the  डिफॉल्ट   इंटरफ़ेस  for Yahoo !  मेल  .
In early 2008 , Yahoo  !  began  offering   असीमित  mail  भंडार  to its users in response to heated  प्रतियोगिता  in the free web-mail market segment  .
On June 27  ,  2009 ,  याहू   !  Messenger was integrated with  याहू  ! Mail  .
Tacoma  (  , ) is  a  mid-sized urban port city and the  काउंटी   सीट   of  Pierce County  ,   वॉशिंगटन  , United  राज्य  .
The city is on Washington  's   puget  Sound , southwest of Seattle  ,  northeast of  the   राज्य   पूंजी   ,  Olympia ,  और  northwest of Mount Rainier  नेशनल   पार्क  .
the  population was  198,397   ,  according  to  the  2010  census .
टकोमा   is  the second-largest city  in   the  Puget Sound  क्षेत्रफल  and the third largest in  the  state .
Tacoma also serves  as  the center  of   कारोबार  activity  लिये   the  South  ध्वनि   प्रदेश  , which has  a   जनसांख्यिकी   of  around 1  लाख   लोगों  .
टकोमा   अपनाया   इसके   नाम  after the  आसपास   माउंट   rainier   ,   originally  called  माउंट   tahoma   .
It  is  known as  the  `` City of  नियति  '' because  the  area was chosen to  be   the  western terminus  of  the Northern Pacific Railroad in  the  late 19th  सदी   .
The decision of the railroad was influenced by Tacoma 's neighboring deep-water  हार्बर   ,   शुरुआत   खाड़ी  .
By connecting  the  bay  साथ   the  railroad  टकोमा  's motto  became   ``  When rails  मिलें  sails . ''
Today  शुरुआत   खाड़ी  serves  the  Port of Tacoma  ,   a   बीच  of  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   व्यापार   on   the   प्रशांत  Coast  और   वॉशिंगटन  state 's  largest   बंदरगाहों   .
Like most central cities ,  टकोमा  suffered  a   prolonged   मनाही   in  the mid-20th century as  a  result  of   suburbanization  and divestment .
Since  the   1990s   ,   developments   in  the downtown core include the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of  वॉशिंगटन   टकोमा  ;  टकोमा  Link  ,  the first modern electric  लाइट   रेल   सेवा   in   the   राज्य   ;   the  state  's  highest density  of   आर्ट  and  इतिहास   संग्रहालय   ;  and a  लौटी  urban waterfront , the  thea  Foss Waterway .
With a long history of  blue-collar  labor politics  —   इससे   the  railroad workers  of  the 19th  सदी   ,  to  the  longshoremen  of  the  20th   सदी   ,  to the  मजदूर  Ready workers  of  today  —   टकोमा   रै  long been known for its  अशिष्ट  , gritty  चित्र  .
A song about Tacoma ,  ``  Thrice  सब  American '' ,  by  American  singer-songwriter   और  former resident Neko  मामला   ,  describes  it  as `` a dusty  बूढ़ा   गहना  in the South  puget  Sound  /  where  the  factories churn / and  the  timber  's   सब  cut down ''  .
tacoma-pierce  County has been named  एक   of  the  सबसे  livable  क्षेत्रों  in  the  country  .
Tacoma  थी   भी   recently   सूचीबद्ध   as  the 19th  सबसे   walkable   नगर  in the  देश  .
In contrast , the  नगर  is also ranked as  the  most stressed-out city in the  देश  in a  2004   सर्वेक्षण  .
in  2006  ,  women  's  magazine  स्वः  named Tacoma the  ``   सबसे  Sexually  स्वस्थ   नगर  ''  in  the United States .
In  2012   ,   the  Advocate gave Tacoma the title of `` Gayest  नगर  in America  ''   ,   in   भाग   क्युकी  of  the  large  विविधता  of public  कार्यालयों   आयोजित  ,  और  Washington  राज्य  passing a  विधेयक  in 2012 allowing LGBT couples  to   निकाह   .
टकोमा   is  famous for  the   1940   पतन   of  the  टकोमा  Narrows  सेतु  .
Chula  विस्टा  ( ;  )   is  the second  largest  city  in  the  सैन   डिएगो   महानगर  area , the seventh largest  नगर  in  दक्षिणी  California , the  fourteenth  largest  नगर  in the State of California  ,   और  the 77th-largest city in the United  राज्य   .
the   जनसांख्यिकी   थी  243,916 as  of   the  2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
स्तिथ   बस  from downtown San Diego and from the Mexican border in  the   दक्षिण  Bay region  of   the   महानगर   क्षेत्रफल   ,   the  city is at the center of one of  the  richest  आर्थिक  and  culturally   विविध  zones in the United  राज्य   .
Chula Vista is so named  क्युकी  of its scenic location between  the   सैन   डिएगो  Bay  और   तटीय  mountain  foothills  .
Founded  in   the  early 19th century ,  तेज़  population growth has  recently  been observed in  the   नगर   .
As the second largest city  in  San  डिएगो  County ,  chula  Vista has quickly  become   a   गंतव्य  popular to many tourists  .
स्तिथ   in  the city is one  of  America  's   few   year-round  United States Olympic  प्रशिक्षण  centers  और   लोकप्रिय   पर्यटक   गंतव्यों   शामिल   क्रिकेट   बेतार  Amphitheater  ,  the  chula   विस्टा  marina  ,  and  the  Chula  विस्टा   प्रकृति   बीच   .
metes   और   bounds   is  a system  or  method  of  describing  जमीन  ,  रियल  property (  in  contrast to  निजी  property ) or  रियल  estate  .
The system has been used in England  लिये   अनेक   सदियां   ,  and is  स्टिल  used there in  the  definition  of  general  सीमाएँ  .
By  कस्टम   ,  it was  लागू  in the  असली   तेरह   colonies   कि   became  the  संयुक्त  States ,  और  in  अनेक  other  जमीन  jurisdictions  आधारित   on   अंग्रेज़ी  common  विधि   .
Typically  the   प्रणाली   उपयोग   शारीरिक   सुविधाएँ   of  the  लोकल  geography , along  साथ  directions  और  distances ,  to  define  और   describe  the boundaries  of  a  पार्सल   of  land .
The  सीमाएँ  are  वर्णित   in  a  कार्यशील  prose  स्टाइल   ,   working  around the  पार्सल  in  अनुक्रम  , from  a  point of beginning  ,   returning  back  to  the same point ; compare with the oral ritual  of   धड़कन   the  bounds .
It may  शामिल   सन्दर्भ   to  other adjoining  parcels  (  और   उनके   स्वामी   )   ,  and it ,  in   फेरे   ,   could   भी   be   referred  to  in  later  सर्वेक्षण   .
at  the time the  वर्णन  is compiled  ,   it  may have  महरूम  marked  on   the  ground with permanent monuments placed  जहाँ   वहीँ   यहूद  no  उपयुक्त  natural monuments  .
The term `` metes '' refers to  a  boundary  पारिभाषित   by  the measurement of each  सीधा   चलाएं  , specified by a  अलहदा  between  the  terminal points  ,   और   an   अभिविन्यास  or  दिशा  .
A  दिशा   may  be a simple compass  bearing  , or a precise orientation determined by  सटीक  survey  विधि  .
The term `` bounds  ''   refers  to a more general boundary description  ,  such as along a certain watercourse  ,   a  stone wall  ,   an   adjoining  public  सड़क  way  ,  or  an  existing building  .
the  system is  प्रायः  used to define larger  टुकड़े  of property (  e.g  . farms ) , and  राजनैतिक   subdivisions  (  e.g  .  कस्बा   सीमाएँ  ) where  precise  definition  is  not  जरूरी  or would be far  too   महंगी  ,  or   previously   designated   सीमाएँ   can  be incorporated into the description .
सर  Isaac Newton ( 25  दिसम्बर   164220  March 1727 )  थी   an  English physicist and  गणितज्ञ   जो   is   widely  regarded as one of the  सबसे   influential   वैज्ञानिकों   of  all  समय  and as a key figure in  the  scientific revolution .
उसके  book  philosophiæ  Naturalis  प्रिन्सिपिया   mathematica  ( `` Mathematical Principles of  प्राकृतिक  Philosophy '' )  ,   पहला  published in 1687  ,  laid the  मूलाधार  for  सबसे   of  classical  यांत्रिकी  .
न्यूटन   भी   बना   seminal   योगदान  to optics and  साझा   क्रेडिट   साथ   गॉटफ्राइड   लैबनिट्ज़  for the invention  of  the infinitesimal  कलन  .
Newton 's Principia formulated the laws of  गति  and  सार्वभौमिक   gravitation  that dominated scientists  '  view  of  the physical  ब्रह्मांड  for  the  next  तीन   सदियां   .
It also  demonstrated  that  the   गति   of   वस्तुएँ   on   the  Earth  और  that  of  celestial bodies could be  वर्णित  by the same principles .
by  deriving Kepler  's  laws of  ग्रहीय  motion from his mathematical description of  गम्भीरता  , Newton  removed   the   पिछला  doubts about the validity of  the   heliocentric   मॉडल  of the  ब्रह्मांड   .
Newton built the  पहला  practical reflecting telescope  और   विकसित   a  theory of colour  आधारित   on  the observation that a prism decomposes  श्वेत  light  into  the  अनेक  colours of the  दृश्य   वर्णक्रम  .
He  भी   प्रतिपादित  an  अनुभवजन्य   विधि   of  cooling and  पढ़ाई   the  speed of sound  .
In addition  to  his  कार्य  on the calculus , as  a  mathematician Newton contributed to  the  study  of  power series  ,   generalised   the  binomial  प्रमेय  to  non-integer  exponents  ,  and  विकसित  Newton 's method  लिये  approximating  the   जड़ें   of  a function  .
Newton was a fellow of Trinity  कॉलेज  and the  दूसरी   lucasian  Professor of Mathematics  at  the University of Cambridge  .
He was a devout  लकिन  unorthodox  ईसाई   और  , unusually  लिये   a   सदस्य  of the  कैम्ब्रिज   संकाय  ,  he  refused  to   लो   पावन  orders in the  गिरिजाघर  of England , perhaps  क्युकी  he privately  अस्वीकृत   the   doctrine   of  trinitarianism  .
in  addition  to  his work on  the   गणितीय  sciences  ,  Newton also  समर्पित  much of his  समय   to  the study  of  alchemy and  biblical  chronology , but most  of  his work in  those  areas remained  अप्रकाशित  until long after  उसके  death  .
In  उसके  later  जीवन   ,   न्यूटन  became president  of   the   royal  Society .
He  भी  served  the   अंग्रेजों  government  as  Warden  और   निपुण  of the  royal   मिंट  .
Prof.  वाल्टर  Lewin explains Newton 's law of gravitation  in   एमआईटी   कोर्स  8.01
Satellites  और  projectiles all obey Newton 's  विधि  of gravitation
Newton 's  विधि   of  universal gravitation states that  प्रत्येक   पाइंट  mass  in  the  ब्रह्मांड  attracts every other point mass with a force that is directly  आंशिक  to  the   उत्पाद  of their masses and inversely  आंशिक   to   the   वर्गाकार   of  the distance  between   उन्हें  .
(  Separately it was  दिखाया  that  विशाल  spherically symmetrical  masses   आकर्षित   और  are  आकर्षित  as  if  all  उनके  mass were  concentrated  at their centers  .  )
इस  is  a  general  शारीरिक  law derived  इससे  empirical observations  by  what  न्यूटन  called induction .
It is a part  of  classical  यांत्रिकी   और   थी   प्रतिपादित   in  Newton 's work Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia  mathematica  ( ``  the  Principia  ''  ) , first published on  5   जुलाई   1687   .
( When Newton 's book was presented in  1686   to  the Royal Society  ,   रॉबर्ट  Hooke made  a  claim that  न्यूटन  had  प्राप्त  the inverse square law from  उसे  – see History  खण्ड   नीचे  .  )
In modern language , the  विधि  states  the  following:
assuming  SI units , F  is  measured in newtons ( N ) , m1 and m2  in  kilograms  (   kg  )  ,  r in  मीटर  (  m   )   ,   और   the  constant G is approximately equal to  .
The value of  the   निरंतर  G was first  accurately  determined  इससे   the  results  of  the Cavendish experiment conducted by  the   अंग्रेजों   वैज्ञानिक  Henry  कैवेंडिश  in 1798  ,   हालांकि  Cavendish did not himself  गणना  a  numerical  value for G  .
This  प्रयोग   थी  also the  पहला   परीक्षण  of  न्यूटन  's theory  of   gravitation   between   masses  in the laboratory  .
It took  प्लेस  111  सालो  after the publication of Newton  's  Principia  और  71 years after  न्यूटन  's death , so  none  of Newton 's calculations could use  the   मान  of G ; instead he could  तभी   गणना  a  फ़ोर्स  relative  to   another  force  .
Newton  's   विधि   of  gravitation resembles Coulomb  's  law  of  electrical forces ,  जिससे  is used  to  calculate  the  magnitude  of  electrical force between  दो   चार्ज  bodies  .
Both are inverse-square  कानून   ,  in  जिससे  force is inversely proportional to the square of  the   अलहदा   between   the  bodies .
Coulomb 's Law has  the  product of two charges in  प्लेस  of the  उत्पाद   of  the masses ,  और   the  electrostatic  निरंतर  in  प्लेस   of  the  गुरुत्वाकर्षक   निरंतर  .
Newton 's law has  चूंकि  been superseded by Einstein 's  सिद्धान्त  of  सामान्य  relativity  ,  but it  continues  to be used  as  an excellent approximation of  the  effects  of  gravity  .
Relativity is  जरूरी  only  जब   वहीँ   is   a  need  लिये  extreme  परिशुद्धता  , or when dealing  साथ  gravitation  लिये   अत्यधिक  massive  और  dense objects .
श्वेत   और  red  ध्वज  , representing  इराकी  and American deaths , sit in the grass  चतुष्कोण   of   the   घाटी  Library on the Corvallis , Oregon  ,  campus of Oregon State  विश्वविद्यालयों   .
As part of  the   traveling  Iraq Body  गिनती  exhibit from 2008 to 2009 ( not related to  इराकी  Body  गिनती   प्रोजेक्ट  ) ,  the  flags aim to `` raise awareness of the  इंसान  cost of the Iraq  युद्ध  .  ''
(  May 2008 )
Casualties of  the  conflict  in  Iraq  चूंकि  2003  (  beginning with the 2003  आक्रमण  of  इराकी   ,   और  continuing with  the   ensuing   occupation   of  Iraq , as  खूब  as the activities of  the  various armed groups operating in the country  )  have come  in   अनेक  forms , and the accuracy  of  the information available on  अलग   प्रकार  of  इराकी  War casualties varies greatly .
the   तालिका   नीचे  summarizes  विभिन्न  estimates  of   the  Iraqi casualty  आंकड़े   .
लिये  troops  in   the  U.S.-led multinational coalition , the death  टोल  is carefully tracked and updated daily , and the names  और  photographs  of   those  killed  in   कार्रवाई  as well  as  in accidents  have  been published  widely  .
a   कुल  of  4,486  U.S. soldiers were  मारे   in   इराकी  between 2003 and 2012 .
Regarding  the  Iraqis ,  however  , information  on  both military and  civilian  casualties  is   दोनो   कम  precise and  कम  consistent .
Estimates  of   casualty   स्तर  are available from  पत्रकारों   on  the scene ,  इससे   officials   of  involved organizations , and from  समूह  that  summarize  information  on  incidents  reported   in   the  news media  .
The  शब्द  `` casualties `` in its most  सामान्य   भाव  includes  the   घायल  as  खूब   as   the   मुर्दे   .
Accounts of the  क्रमांक  of coalition  wounded  vary widely  ,   partly  because  it   is   नहीं   स्पष्ट   कया  should be counted  :   चाहिए  only those injuries  गंभीर  enough  to   put   a   सिपाही  out  of  commission be included ?
Do  बीमारियों  or injuries  caused   by  accidents count ,  or  should the focus  be   प्रतिबंधित  to  wounds  caused  by  hostile engagement ?
Sources  using  different definitions may  arrive   at  very  अलग   संख्याएँ  , and  sometimes  the precise  परिभाषा  is  नहीं   clearly   निर्दिष्ट   .
Asalto al coche (  डकैती  of the coach  )  , by Francisco  de   गोया
A  highwayman  was  a   चोर  and brigand  जो   preyed   on   travellers  .
This  प्रकार   of  outlaw usually travelled and  robbed  by  घोड़ा  ,  as   compared   to  a footpad who travelled  और  robbed  on   पैर   .
Mounted robbers  यहूद  widely  माना  to be socially superior to  footpads  .
ऐसे   लुटेरों   संचालित  in Great Britain  और   आयरलैंड   इससे  the  elizabethan  era  जबतक  the  जल्दी  19th century .
The word highwayman is  पहला   ज्ञात  to be  प्रयुक्त  in  the  year 1617 ; other  euphemisms  included  ``   शूरवीरों   of   the  road  ''  and  ``   सज्जनों   of   the  road .  ''
Two terms applied  to  19th-century  उत्तर  American highwaymen were road  एजेंटों   in  some  उदाहरण  for mountain  डाकुओं   जबकि  in  अन्य  cases the term is  rlallaala  for mountain-based  ruffians  .
In  the  same  समय   काल   in  Australia , they  यहूद   ज्ञात  as bushrangers .
Earvin `` Magic  ''  Johnson ,  jr.   (  born August 14  ,   1959   )   is  a  रिटायर्ड   अमरीकी   पेशेवर   बास्केट  player  जो  played point guard for  the   लॉस  Angeles Lakers of  the   नेशनल  Basketball Association (  एनबीए   )  .
बाद  winning championships in high school  और  college  ,   जॉनसन  was selected first  overall  in  the   1979  NBA  ड्राफ्ट  by the Lakers .
he   जीती  a championship  और   an  NBA Finals Most  मूल्यवान   खिलाड़ी  Award in  उसके  rookie season ,  और  won four more championships  साथ   the  Lakers during  the  1980s .
Johnson retired  abruptly  in  1991   बाद   announcing   कि   he   था   contracted   hiv  , but  लौटे  to play  in   the  1992 All-Star  खेल  , winning the All-Star MVP Award  .
After protests from  उसके   fellow  players  ,   he  retired  again   लिये   चार  years  ,  but returned in  1996  , at  आयु   36   ,   to   खेल   32  games for the  लेकर्स  before  retiring  for  the  third and final time .
जॉनसन   's  career achievements  शामिल   तीन  NBA MVP Awards , nine  एनबीए  Finals appearances , twelve All-Star games  ,   और  ten All-NBA First  और  Second  टोली   nominations   .
He led the  लीग  in regular-season  assists  four  टाइम्स  , and is the  एनबीए   's   all-time   नेता   in  average  assists  per  खेल  , at  11.2  .
Johnson  थी  a member  of  the `` Dream  टोली  `` ,  the   u.S.  basketball  टोली   कि  won the  ओलम्पिक   सुनहरा   पदक  in 1992  .
After leaving the NBA  in  1992 , Johnson  formed  the Magic  जॉनसन  All-Stars ,  a  barnstorming  टोली  that travelled around  the   संसार  playing  प्रदर्शनी  games .
Johnson  थी   सम्मानित   as   एक  of  the   50  Greatest Players in  एनबीए  History in 1996  ,  and  enshrined  in the  बास्केट  Hall of Fame in 2002  .
He  थी  rated  the  greatest  एनबीए  point guard of all  समय  by ESPN in  2007   .
उसके   दोस्ती  and  फंसने   साथ  Boston Celtics  स्टार  Larry Bird ,  जिसको   he   faced   in   the  1979 NCAA finals  और  three  एनबीए   चैंपियनशिप  series ,  यहूद   खूब   प्रलेखित  .
Since his retirement  ,  Johnson has been an advocate for  hiV/  AIDS prevention and safe  sex  , as  खूब  as an entrepreneur ,  लोकसेवक  , broadcaster and  प्रेरक  speaker .
Johnson was a  part-owner   of  the Lakers for  अनेक   सालो  ,  और   थी   भाग  of  a  group that  खरीदा  the Los Angeles Dodgers  in  2012  .
Allium  कोशिकाएं  in different  phases  of the cell cycle
The cells  of  eukaryotes ( left ) and  prokaryotes   (   सही  )
the   कोशिका   is  the basic structural  ,  functional and biological  ईकाई  of all known living organisms .
It is the smallest  ईकाई   of   जीवन  that is classified  as   a  living  बात   (  except virus , which  consists  only  इससे  DNA/RNA covered by protein and lipids )  ,  and is often  पुकारा  the  भवन  block  of  life  .
it   consists  of  a   जीवद्रव्य  enclosed  भीतर   a  membrane  ,  which  contains  many biomolecules  ऐसे  as proteins  और   nucleic   acids   .
Organisms can be classified  as  unicellular ( consisting of a single cell ; including most  जीवाणु   )  or multicellular (  सहित  plants  और  animals ) .
जबकि   the   क्रमांक   of  cells in  पौधे  and animals varies  इससे  species  to   प्रजाति   ,  Humans contain about 100 trillion  (   1014   )  cells  .
Most plant and animal  कोशिकाएं  are between 1  और  100  micrometres  and therefore are  दृश्य   तभी  under the microscope .
The cell  थी   खोजा   by  Robert  hooke  in 1665 .
the  cell theory  ,   पहला   विकसित  in  1839  by Matthias  jakob   schleiden   और  Theodor Schwann  ,  states  कि  all organisms are composed  of   एक  or more cells  ,  that  सब   कोशिकाएं  come from preexisting cells , that vital  कृत्यों  of  an  organism occur within cells  ,   और  that all  कोशिकाएं  contain  the   खानदानी   सूचना  necessary  लिये  regulating cell  कृत्यों   और  for transmitting information to  the   अगला   पीढी  of cells .
कोशिकाएं   उभरा  on planet Earth  at  least  4.0–4.3   अरब  years  पहले   .
The  शब्द  cell comes from the  लैटिन   गर्भगृह  ,  अर्थ   ``  small room ''  .
The  वर्णनात्मक   पद  for  the  smallest living biological  ढांचा   थी   coined   by   रॉबर्ट  Hooke  in  a book he published  in   1665   जब   he   compared   the  cork  कोशिकाएं  he  देखी  through his microscope to the  छोटी  rooms  भिक्षुओं   जिया  in .
Grecian  सूत्र   is  a men 's hair coloring product in the  संयुक्त  States .
Canada and  यूरोपीय  previously banned the product because  of  its  उपयोग   of  lead acetate  .
A motor  स्कूटर  's front  साथ   an  impractical number  और  variety of headlamps ,  added   लिये  decorative  उद्देश्य
A  headlamp  is a lamp  संलग्न   to  the front  of  a  गाडी  to  लाइट  the road  ahead   .
Headlamp  प्रदर्शन  has steadily improved throughout  the  automobile  आयु  ,  spurred  by the  ग्रेट  disparity between  दिन  and nighttime traffic fatalities : the U.S. National  राजमार्ग  Traffic Safety Administration states  कि  nearly half of all traffic-related  fatalities   occur   in   the  dark , despite  तभी   25   %  of  ट्रैफ़िक  travelling  दौरान  darkness  .
जबकि  it  is   आम  for  the   पद  headlight to  be   प्रयुक्त  interchangeably in informal discussion  ,  headlamp is the term for the device itself  ,   जबकि  headlight  properly  refers to  the   बीम   of  light produced  और  distributed  by   the   यंत्र  .
Other vehicles ,  ऐसे   as  trains  और   वायुयान  ,  हैं  required to have headlamps  .
Bicycle headlamps are  प्रायः  used on  साइकिल  , and are required in some  jurisdictions  .
वे  can be powered by  a  battery  or  a small electrical  सृजनकर्ता  on the wheel .
Additionally  ऑटोमोटिव  night  दृष्टि  systems work to supplement  headlamps   .
Women 's rights  हैं   the  rights and entitlements claimed for  महिलाओं   और   लड़कियों  of  अनेक  societies worldwide  .
In  कुछ  places  ये  rights  हैं   institutionalized  or supported by law  ,  local custom  ,   और  behaviour  ,  whereas in others they  may  be  उपेक्षित  or  suppressed  .
They  differ  from broader  धारणाएं  of  इंसान  rights  through   दावा   of  an inherent  ऐतिहासिक   और  traditional  पूर्वाग्रह  against the  कसरत   of  rights by  महिलाओं  and girls in favour  of  men  और   लड़कों  .
Issues commonly associated  साथ   धारणाएं   of  women  's  rights  शामिल  ,  हालांकि  are  नहीं  limited  to   ,  the right : to  bodily  integrity and autonomy ;  to  vote ( suffrage ) ;  to   थाम  public office  ;  to work ; to  मेला   मजदूरी  or  बराबर   अदा   ;  to own property ; to  शिक्षा  ; to serve in the  सैन्य  or be  conscripted   ;  to enter  into   विधिक  contracts ;  और  to have  वैवाहिक   ,  parental and religious  अधिकारों  .
Caryn Elaine Johnson , best  ज्ञात  as Whoopi  गोल्डबर्ग   (   ,   (   born  November  13  ,  1955  )  is   an  American  comedienne   ,  actress , singer-songwriter  ,  political  activist   ,  author and  बात   दिखाएँ  host  .
Goldberg  बना   उसके   फिल्मी   डेब्यू   in  The Color Purple  (  1985  )  , playing  celie  , a mistreated black woman  in   the  Deep  दक्षिण  .
She  प्राप्त   a  nomination  लिये   the  Academy Award for  बेहतरीन   अभिनेत्री  and won  उसके   पहला   सुनहरी  Globe Award  लिये  her role in the film .
in   1990  ,  वो   निभाई  Oda Mae Brown ,  a   wacky  psychic  helping  a  slain  man  (  Patrick  swayze   )  save his lover (  demi  Moore )  in  the  ब्लॉकबस्टर   भुत  .
इस  performance  जीती  her a  दूसरी  Golden Globe and  an  Academy Award  लिये  Best  supporting   अभिनेत्री   ;   इस  made Goldberg  तभी  the second  ब्लैक   स्त्री  in the history  of   the  Academy  पुरस्कार  to win an  एक्टिंग  Oscar—the  पहला  being  हैटी  McDaniel  जो   जीती   लिये   गए   साथ   the  Wind  in  1939  .
Notable  बाद   films  include  सिस्टर  Act and  सिस्टर  Act 2 , The Player , Made  in  America ,  कैसा  Stella  मिला   उसके   नाली  Back , Girl  ,   बाधित   और  Rat Race .
She is also acclaimed  लिये  her  भूमिकाएँ  as the bartender  guinan  in  स्टार  Trek  :  The Next  पीढी  , as Terry  doolittle  in  jumpin   '   जोकर  Flash , and  as  Carmen  tibideaux   in   ग्ली  , as well as  the   आवाज़  of  shenzi  the hyena in The Lion King .
गोल्डबर्ग  has  महरूम  nominated  लिये   13  Emmy Awards for her  कार्य   in  television .
वो  was  co-producer   of  the popular  खेल  show Hollywood Squares  इससे   1998  to 2004  .
She  रै  been the moderator  of  the daytime talk  दिखाएँ   the   दृश्य  since 2007  .
गोल्डबर्ग  has  a   ग्रैमी   ,   दो  Daytime  emmys  ,  दो  Golden Globes  ,  a Tony (  लिये  production ,  नहीं  acting )  ,   और  an Oscar .
In addition , Goldberg has a  अंग्रेजों   अकादमी  Film  पुरस्कार   ,  four People 's  चुनाव   पुरस्कार  , and has  महरूम  honored with  a   स्टार   on  the  हॉलीवुड  Walk  of  Fame .
She is one of the  few  entertainers who  have   जीती   an  Emmy  ,  Grammy , Oscar , and  टोनी  Award .
the   नेशनल  Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is  an  `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' which operates a  प्रमुख   पेशेवर  ice hockey  लीग  of 30 franchised member clubs ,  of  which  सात   हैं  currently located in  कनाडा  and  23   in   the  United States .
Headquartered in New York  नगर  ,  the   एनएचएल  is widely  माना   to  be  the  premier professional ice hockey  लीग  in  the  world ,  और  one of  the  major professional sports  लीग  in the United States  और  Canada .
the   स्टेनली  Cup , the  oldest  professional  खेल  trophy  in   उत्तर   अमेरिका  , is awarded annually  to  the  लीग  playoff champion at  the   समाप्त  of each season .
The league was organized on November  26   ,  1917 , in  मॉन्ट्रियल  ,  क्यूबेक  , Canada  ,  after  the   बर्खास्तगी  of operations  of   इसके  predecessor  संगठन   ,  the  नेशनल  Hockey  संघ   (   नह   )  , which had been founded in  1909   .
It  प्रारंभ  with four teams  और  , through a series of expansions ,  contractions  , and  relocations  , the league  is  now  रचित  of  30  active franchises  .
The  स्वदेश  to which the name  of   the  league  originally   referred   थी  Canada  ,  although the league  रै   अभी  been binational  चूंकि   1924  when it expanded  into   the  United States  .
After  a   श्रमिक   विवाद  that  led  to  the   रद्दीकरण   of  the  संपूर्ण  2004–05  ऋतु  , the league resumed play  अंतर्गत   a   नई  collective bargaining agreement that  शामिल  a salary cap  .
In 2009 ,  the   एनएचएल  enjoyed record highs in terms  of  sponsorships , attendance ,  और   टेलीविज़न   ऑडियंस   .
the  NHL  draws   अनेक   अत्यधिक   skilled   खिलाड़ी   इससे  all over the  संसार  and currently  रै  players from  परिचय  20  अलग  countries .
Although  canadians  have  historically  constituted  the   बहुमत  of the players in the  एनएचएल  ,  over  the past  चार  plus  दशकों   the  percentages of US and European  खिलाड़ी  have  increased  both because of the NHL 's continued expansion  इससे  six to  तीस   क्लब   चूंकि  1967  ,  and the increased availability  of  highly skilled European players .
Maggots  feeding  on  carrion   .
a   maggot   is  the larva of  a  fly (  अनुक्रम  Diptera ) ;  it  is  लागू  in particular to  the  larvae of Brachyceran flies  ,   ऐसे  as houseflies , cheese flies , and blowflies  ,  rather than  लार्वे  of the Nematocera , such  as   मच्छरों  and  क्रेन   उड़ता  .
``   maggot   ''  is not a  तकनीकी  term and should  नहीं  be taken as  ऐसे  ; in  अनेक   मानक  textbooks  of   कीटविज्ञान  it  करता   नहीं  appear in the index at all .
in  many non-technical texts the  पद   is   प्रयुक्त  for insect larvae in general .
Other sources have  coined  their  अपना  definitions ;  लिये  example  :  `` ...
the   पद  applies  to  a  ग्रब  when all trace  of   limbs  has disappeared ...  ''   और  ``  ...  Applied to the  footless   लार्वे  of  dipters  . ''
maggot-like   मक्खी   लार्वे   हैं  of  चौड़ी  importance in ecology and medicine ;  among  other  भूमिकाएँ  ,  विभिन्न   प्रजाति   हैं   prominent   in   रीसाइक्लिंग  carrion  और   कचरा   ,  attacking crops and foodstuffs , spreading microbial infections  ,   और   causing  myiasis .
Herod ( , Hordos  ,   यूनानी   :   ,   hērōdēs  )  ,  also  ज्ञात  as Herod  the   ग्रेट   (  73/74 BCE – 4  bce   in  Jericho ) , was  a  Roman  क्लाएंट   किंग   of   judea   .
His  epithet   of  `` the Great ''  is  widely  विवादित   as  he is described as  ``   a  madman  जो  murdered his own family and a  ग्रेट  many  rabbis   ``   .
he  is  भी  known  लिये   उसके  colossal building  प्रोजेक्ट   in  Jerusalem  और   elsewhere   ,  including  उसके   विस्तार  of the  दूसरी   टेम्पल   in   जेरूसलम  ( sometimes referred to as  हेरोदेस   's  Temple ) and  the  construction of the  बंदरगाहों  at  caesarea  Maritima  .
महत्वपूर्ण  details of his  जीवनी   हैं   gleaned  from the works of the 1st  सदी   ce  Roman–Jewish historian Josephus Flavius .
The  romans  made  हेरोदेस   's  son  ,  Herod Archelaus , ethnarch of  judea  ,  samaria  , and Idumea (  biblical   edom  ) from 4 BCE to 6  ce  , referred to as  the   tetrarchy  of  judea   .
Archelaus was  judged   incompetent  by  the  Roman emperor Augustus who then  संयुक्त   samaria   ,   judea   उचित  and  idumea   into  Iudaea province  अंतर्गत   नियम  of a prefect  जबतक  age 41  .
Herod 's other son Herod  antipas  was tetrarch  of  Galilee from 4 BCE–39  ce  .
ABO blood  समूह   antigens  present  on  red blood  कोशिकाएं   और  IgM  antibodies  present in the  सीरम
The ABO  रक्त  group system  is   the   सबसे   महत्वपूर्ण   रक्त   प्रकार   प्रणाली   (  or blood group  प्रणाली  )  in   इंसान   रक्त  transfusion  .
The  संबद्ध  anti-A  और   anti-b  antibodies are  प्रायः   igm   antibodies   ,  which are  प्रायः  produced  in   the  first  सालो  of  जीवन   by  sensitization to environmental  substances  such  as  food  ,  bacteria ,  और   वाइरस  .
ABO  रक्त   प्रकार  are  भी   उपस्थित   in  some  अन्य  animals  ,   लिये  example apes such  as  chimpanzees ,  bonobos  , and gorillas .
Year 1907  (   mcmvii  ) was  a  common year starting  on  Tuesday  (  link will  प्रदर्शक  the full  पंचांग   )   of   the  Gregorian  पंचांग  and a common year starting on  सोमवार   of   the  13-day-slower Julian calendar .
northville  is  an  affluent city located  in   और  divided by  ओकलैंड  and Wayne  काउंटी  in the U.S.  राज्य   of  Michigan  .
The area  is  a  उपनगरीय  of Metropolitan  डेट्रॉयट  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was  5,970   at  the  2010  census .
सबसे  of the city is in Oakland  काउंटी  , and  is   घिरी  by the  नगर  of  novi  .
The  वेन   काउंटी   portion  is surrounded by Northville Township  .
Northville is served by Northville Public  स्कूलों  .
the  city is located northeast of Ann  arbor   और   उत्तरपश्चिम   of  Detroit .
ऐलेन   stritch   (  born  फ़रवरी  2 ,  1925  ) is an  अमरीकी  actress  और   vocalist   .
वो  has  appeared   in   numerous   स्टेज  plays  और   musicals  ,  विशेषता  films ,  और   अनेक  television programs .
She is  ज्ञात  for her  प्रदर्शन  of ``  the  Ladies  जो   लंच  '' in Stephen Sondheim  's   1970  musical Company , her  2001   one-woman  show ,  ऐलेन  Stritch  at   स्वतंत्रता  , and  recently   लिये  her  भूमिका  as  जोकर  Donaghy  's  mother Colleen on  एनबीसी  's  30  Rock  .
वो  has  महरूम   मनोनीत  for the  टोनी  Award five  टाइम्स   in  various  श्रेणी  .
Stritch is also a three-time Emmy  पुरस्कार   विजेता   .
Misfits is a British  विज्ञान  fiction comedy-drama television show  परिचय   a   समूह   of   यंग   अपराधियों   sentenced  to work  in   a  community service programme  ,   जहाँ  they obtain supernatural powers after a strange electrical storm  .
The series  खोली   in   2009  and is currently ongoing  .
antonia  Thomas , Iwan Rheon , Lauren Socha ,  नाथन  Stewart-Jarrett , and Robert  sheehan   हैं  introduced as Alisha Daniels , Simon  bellamy   ,  Kelly Bailey  ,  Curtis  डोनोवन   ,  and  नाथन   यंग  respectively  .
sheehan   बाएँ  after  the   दूसरी   श्रेणी   ,  replaced in  the  third  by   जोसेफ   gilgun  as  रूडी  Wade  .
बाद  the fourth  श्रेणी  was announced Rheon  ,  Thomas  और  Socha  था  left their  भूमिकाएँ  and  होता  be replaced by  नई   वर्ण  Karla Crome , Nathan McMullen and  मैट  Stokoe  ,   as  Jess , Finn and Alex respectively .
