Brett  lorenzo  Favre  (   born   अक्तूबर  10  ,  1969  )  is a former  अमरीकी   फ़ुटबॉल  quarterback who  खर्च   the  majority  of  his  करियर  with the Green  खाड़ी   पैकर्स  of the  नेशनल   फ़ुटबॉल  League  (  NFL ) .
He was  a  20-year veteran of the NFL  ,  having played  क्वार्टरबैक  for the Atlanta  falcons   (  1991 ) , Green Bay Packers (  1992   –  2007 ) , New York  jets   (  2008 )  और   मिनेसोटा  Vikings (  2009   –   2010  )  .
favre  is  the   तभी  quarterback  in  NFL history  to  throw  लिये   over   70,000   गज   ,  over 500  touchdowns  ,  over  300  interceptions  ,  over  6,000  completions  ,  और  over 10,000 pass attempts  .
Favre started  at   the   क्वार्टरबैक  position  लिये   the   विश्वविद्यालयों  of Southern Mississippi for  चार  years before being  चयनित   in   the  second  गोलाकार  of the  1991  NFL  ड्राफ्ट   by  Atlanta  (  33rd overall ) .
He  थी  traded to  ग्रीन   खाड़ी   on   फ़रवरी   10   ,   1992  ,  लिये   the  19th pick in  the  1992 NFL  ड्राफ्ट   .
Favre became  the   पैकर्स  '  starting  quarterback  in  the fourth game of the  1992   ऋतु   ,  stepping in  लिये   घायल  quarterback Don Majkowski ,  और   प्रारंभ  every  खेल  through the  2007  season .
He was traded  to   the  New  यॉर्क   jets  and started at  क्वार्टरबैक   लिये   the  2008  ऋतु  before signing with the Vikings on  अगस्त  18 ,  2009   as  their starting  क्वार्टरबैक   .
He made an NFL  रिकार्ड  297  लगातार  starts ( 321  सहित  playoffs )  .
he  is  the  only player to win the  ap  Most Valuable Player three consecutive times ( 1995–97  )   .
He  रै   led   टीमों   to  eight  प्रभाग   championships   (  1995  ,   1996  , 1997 , 2002 ,  2003  , 2004  ,  2007 , 2009  )  , five NFC Championship  खेल   (  1995 , 1996  ,  1997 , 2007 , 2009  )   ,  and  दो  Super Bowl appearances (  सुपर  Bowl XXXI ,  सुपर   कटोरी   xxxii   )   ,  winning  एक  (  सुपर   कटोरी  XXXI )  .
he  holds many  एनएफएल  records ,  सहित   सबसे  career touchdown  गुजरता  ,  सबसे   करियर  passing yards , most  करियर   pass  completions , most  करियर   pass  attempts , most career interceptions  thrown   ,  most  लगातार   starts   by  a  खिलाड़ी  , most consecutive starts by a  क्वार्टरबैक  , most  करियर  victories as a  starting   क्वार्टरबैक  ,  सबसे  sacked ,  और   सबसे   fumbles  .
He is  भी  referred to by  उसके  nickname  ``   the  Gunslinger  ''   .
The following is a  सूची   of  notable  वायुयान  hijackings around  the  world .
the   संसार  Wide  वेब  (  abbreviated   as  WWW  or   w3  ,  commonly  known as the web  )  ,  is  a system of interlinked  हाइपरटेक्स्ट  documents  पहुँचा   via   the   अंतरजाल  .
With  a  web browser , one  can  view  वेब  pages that  may   contain   टेक्स्ट   ,  images , videos  ,   और  other  मल्टीमीडिया   ,   और  navigate between  उन्हें  via hyperlinks .
Using concepts  इससे  his earlier  हाइपरटेक्स्ट   प्रणालियों  like  enquire  , British engineer  ,  computer scientist and at that  समय   कर्मचारी   of   the   cern  , Sir  टिम  Berners-Lee  ,   अभी   निदेशक  of the  संसार  Wide Web Consortium  (  W3C  )   ,   लिखा  a  प्रस्ताव   in  March 1989  लिये  what would eventually  become   the  World Wide Web .
At CERN  ,  a European research organisation near  जेनेवा   straddling   the  border between  फ़्रांस   और  Switzerland ,  berners-lee   और   belgian  computer scientist  रॉबर्ट  Cailliau proposed in  1990   to   उपयोग   हाइपरटेक्स्ट  `` to link and  अभिगम  information of various  kinds   as  a web of nodes in which the  उपयोक्ता  can browse at  होगा   ''  , and they  सरेआम  introduced the project in December  of   the  same year .
Wayne Lyman  मोर्स   (   अक्तूबर  20 , 1900July  22  , 1974 ) was  a  politician  और  attorney  इससे  Oregon  ,  United  राज्य   ,   ज्ञात   लिये  his proclivity for opposing his parties  '  leadership  ,  and  specifically  for  उसके   विपक्ष   to  the  वियतनाम   युद्ध  on constitutional grounds .
Born in  मैडिसन  , Wisconsin ,  और   शिक्षित  at the University of Wisconsin-Madison and  the  University of  मिनेसोटा   विधि  School , Morse moved to  ऑरेगॉन   in  1930  और  began teaching  at   the  University  of  Oregon School of Law .
दौरान  World War  ii  he was  निर्वाचित  to  the  United States  सीनेट  as  a  Republican  ;  he became an  स्वतंत्र   बाद  Dwight  D.  Eisenhower  's   चुनाव   to   the  presidency  in  1952  .
जबकि   an  independent , he  नियत   a  record  लिये   performing  the  दूसरी  longest  one-person  filibuster  in  the history of the  सीनेट  .
Morse  joined   the   लोकतांत्रिक   पार्टी  in  1955   ,   और   थी  reelected twice  जबकि  a  सदस्य   of  that  पार्टी  .
मोर्स  made a brief run  लिये   the  Democratic  पार्टी  's presidential  नामांकन  in 1960 .
A few years later ,  मोर्स  was one of  तभी   दो   सीनेटरों  who opposed  the  Gulf of  tonkin  Resolution , which authorized  the   अध्यक्ष  to take military action  in  Vietnam without a declaration  of   युद्ध   .
he  continued to speak out against  the  war  in   the  ensuing  सालो  ,  और  lost  उसके   1968  bid for reelection to  bob   packwood   ,  who criticized his strong opposition  to  the war  .
Morse  बना  two more  बोलियों   लिये  reelection  to  the  सीनेट  before his  मौत  in 1974 .
in   संसदीय  procedure  ,  a  गति  to table has two different and contradictory meanings:
In the United States ,  to  table usually means the to lay [ the  टॉपिक  ] on the table or to move  लिये  postponement of consideration ; a proposal  to   बर्खास्तगी   विचार  of a pending  गति   .
much   कम  often  ,   it   अर्थात्   a  motion  to  ``  put  on  the  table ''  :  a proposal to begin consideration ( or reconsideration  )  , a usage  सतत   साथ  the rest of the  english-speaking  world  .
In  the   बाकी  of  the  English-speaking world  ऐसे  as the United Kingdom ,  to   तालिका  means  to  move to place [  the  topic ]  upon  the table ( or to move  to  place on the table  )  :  a  proposal to  शुरू  consideration  (  or  reconsideration   )  of a proposal .
दोनो   the  American  और   the  British  dialects  have the sense of  ``  to  तालिका   ''   as  to  lay   [  the topic ] on the table or to cause [  the   टॉपिक   ]   to  lie  on   the  table  .
The  अंतर   is   the  idea  of   कया   the   तालिका  is for  ,   कि  of a  शेल्फ  off to the  पक्ष  , or  an  active  कार्य  bench .
the  British  अर्थ  has  the   भाव   of  the  तालिका   as  being  an  active work bench ,  साथ   the  topic being the center of attention ,  माना   और   discussed  by  सब   जबतक  it  can  be resolved  ,   at   जिससे  point  it  is taken  बंद  the  'table   '  .
The American  भाव  is  कि   the  table is like  कि   of  a shelf ,  अभिलेख  , or long-term  भंडार  device , where  the  topic  रै   महरूम   disposed  of by sending it to  the   'table  ' and leaving it there .
Toy Story 3 is  a  2010  अमरीकी  3D  कंप्यूटर   एनिमेटेड   comedy-drama  prison film , and the third  किश्त   in   the   खिलौना   स्टोरी   श्रेणी   .
it  was  उत्पादित   by  Pixar Animation Studios  और  distributed  by   वॉल्ट   डिज़्नी  Pictures .
Directed  by  Lee Unkrich , the film was  released  worldwide  इससे  June through  अक्तूबर   in   डिज़्नी  Digital 3-D , RealD , and IMAX 3D .
खिलौना  Story 3 was also the  पहला  film to be released theatrically with Dolby  घेर  7.1 sound .
The  पटकथा  was written by Michael Arndt  ,  while Unkrich wrote the  स्टोरी   साथ   साथ   जॉन  Lasseter and Andrew Stanton , respectively  निदेशक  and  co-writer  of the two first films .
the   प्लाट  focuses on  the  toys Woody , Buzz Lightyear  ,  and their  मित्रों   dealing  with an  अनिश्चित  future  as   उनके  owner , Andy ,  prepares   to   छोड़   लिये  college  .
Actors Tom  हैंक्स  , Tim Allen ,  जोन  Cusack , Don  rickles   ,  Estelle Harris ,  जॉन  Ratzenberger  ,  Wallace  shawn  ,  जेफ़   pidgeon  ,  jodi   बेंसन  ,  R.  Lee  ermey   ,  John Morris , and  लॉरी   metcalf  reprised their voice-over roles from the  पिछला  films  .
Jim Varney ,  जो  played  slinky   श्वान   in  the first  दो  films  ,  and Joe  ranft   ,  who portrayed  lenny  and Wheezy  ,   दोनो  died  पहले  production  began  on  खिलौना  Story  3   .
The role of  slinky   श्वान   थी  taken over by Blake Clark (  a   dost  of Varney ) , while  ranft  's  वर्ण  and  विभिन्न  others  यहूद  written out of the  स्टोरी  .
नई  characters  शामिल  performances  by  Ned Beatty  ,  Timothy  डाल्टन  ,  क्रिस्टन   schaal   ,   bonnie  Hunt  ,   whoopi   गोल्डबर्ग   ,   जेफ़  Garlin , Richard Kind ,  और  Michael  कीटन  .
The  विशेषता  broke  shrek  the  तिहाई  record as the biggest opening day  उत्तर   अमरीकी  gross for an animated film unadjusted for inflation , and a big opening  साथ   an  unadjusted  सकल  of $  110,307,189  .
It is  भी  the  highest-grossing  opening weekend  लिये  a Pixar  फिल्मी   ,  as well  as  the highest-grossing  खोलने  weekend for a film  to   have  opened  in  the month of  जून   .
This is the  highest-grossing   फिल्मी   of   2010  , both in the United States and  कनाडा   ,  and  विश्वव्यापी   .
In early August , it became Pixar 's  highest-grossing  film  at  the  उत्तर  American box  दफ्तर  (  surpassing   ढूंढना   nemo   )  ,  और   the   highest-grossing   एनिमेटेड   फिल्मी   of   सब   समय  worldwide  (   surpassing  Shrek  2   )  ; later that month , Toy Story 3 became the first ever animated film  in   इतिहास   to   मेक   over   $  1  अरब   विश्वव्यापी   .
It is currently the 10th-highest-grossing film of all time .
Toy  स्टोरी   3   थी   मनोनीत  for  पाँच  Academy Awards , including Best  चित्र   ,   बेहतरीन  Adapted  पटकथा  ,  और   बेहतरीन  Sound Editing  .
It was the third  एनिमेटेड   फिल्मी  (  बाद  Beauty  और   the  Beast  और  Up ) to  be  nominated for Academy Award for Best Picture  .
It won  the   पुरस्कार   लिये  Best  एनिमेटेड  Feature and  बेहतरीन  Original  सोंग   .
John Levell Starks ( born August 10  ,  1965 ) is  an   अमरीकी  retired professional basketball shooting  गार्ड  .
starks  was  सूचीबद्ध   at   6'5   ''   और   190   पाउंड   दौरान   उसके  NBA playing career .
Although  he  was  नहीं  drafted in  the  1988  एनबीए   ड्राफ्ट  after  उपस्थित  four colleges in his native Oklahoma ,  सहित  Oklahoma State University  ,   he   gained  fame  जबकि  playing for  the  New  यॉर्क  Knicks  of  the  नेशनल   बास्केट  Association in the 1990s  .
सुरक्षित   डिजिटल  or  (   sd  )  is  a non-volatile  मेमोरी   कार्ड  format  लिये   उपयोग  in  पोर्टेबल  devices , such  as  mobile  फोन   ,   डिजिटल  cameras ,  gps   नेविगेशन   डिवाइस  , and tablet computers .
The Secure Digital  मानक   is   कायम  by  the  SD  कार्ड  Association ( SDA ) .
SD technologies have  महरूम  implemented in more  than   400   ब्रांड्स  across  दर्जनों  of product categories and more than  8,000  models  .
the   सुरक्षित  Digital format includes four card families available  in   तीन  different form factors .
The  चार   परिवारों  are the original Standard-Capacity ( SDSC ) , the  high-capacity  ( SDHC ) , the  extended-capacity  ( SDXC  )  , and the SDIO  ,   जिससे  combines  input/output  functions with data  भंडार  .
the  three  रूप  factors  हैं   the  original size  ,   the   ``  mini  ''  size , and the `` micro  ''   आकार   (   देखिए   उदाहरण   )   .
There are many  combinations   of  form  कारकों  and  यंत्र   परिवारों  .
Electrically  passive   adapters   allow  the use  of  a smaller  कार्ड  in a  मेजबान  device built  to   थाम  a  larger   कार्ड   .
Host devices that  comply  with  नए   संस्करण  of  the  specification  provide  backward compatibility  और   accept  older SD cards , but this  आलेख  explains several  कारकों  that  can   prevent   the   उपयोग  of  a  newer SD card:
A newer  कार्ड  may  प्रस्ताव  greater capacity  than   the   मेजबान  device  can  handle .
A newer  कार्ड  may use  a   संचिका  system  the   मेजबान   यंत्र  can not  navigate  .
उपयोग   of   an  SDIO card requires the  मेजबान  device be designed for  the   input/output  functions  the  card provides .
The organization  of  the  कार्ड  was changed  starting  with the SDHC family .
कुछ   विक्रेता  produced  sdsc  cards above 1  gb   पहले   the   sda   था   मानकीकृत   a  method  of  doing  so  .
the  SDA  उपयोग  several trademarked logos  to  enforce  अनुपालन  with its specifications  और   assure   उपयोक्ता  of compatibility  .
Hugh John  mungo   ग्रान्ट  ( born 9  सितंबर   1960   )  is a  अंग्रेजों  actor and film producer .
he  has received a Golden Globe ,  a  BAFTA ,  और  an  मानद   césar   .
His films  have  earned more than  us  $  2.4   अरब  from  25  theatrical  रिलीज   विश्वव्यापी   .
Grant achieved  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  stardom after appearing in Richard Curtis  's  successful  चार  Weddings  और   a  Funeral  (   1994  )  .
He  प्रयुक्त   इस  breakthrough  भूमिका   as   a  frequent cinematic persona during  the  1990s  ,  delivering comic  प्रदर्शन  in mainstream films like  मिकी   ब्लू   आँखें   (   1999  ) and Notting Hill ( 1999  )   .
by  the turn of  the  21st  सदी  , he  था   स्थापित   खुद  as a leading  man  skilled with a  satirical  comic  हुनर  .
Grant has expanded his oeuvre  साथ  critically acclaimed turns as a cad in  ब्रिजेट   जोन्स  's Diary ( 2001  )  , About  a   लड़के  (  2002   )   ,  Love Actually  (  2003  )   ,  and American Dreamz  (  2006 ) .
He later  निभाई   विरूद्ध  type with multiple  कैमियो   भूमिकाएँ   in  the epic  नाटक   फिल्मी   बादल  Atlas  (   2012  )  .
भीतर  the film  उद्योग  , Grant is cited as an  anti-film  star  जो   approaches  his roles like a  अक्षर   कर्ता  , and  कोशिशें  to  मेक  his  एक्टिंग  appear spontaneous  .
hallmarks  of his comic skills include a  nonchalant  touch of  विडंबना  / sarcasm and  पढ़ाई  physical  mannerisms  as  खूब   as   उसके  precisely-timed dialogue delivery  और  facial  expressions   .
The  entertainment  media 's coverage of Grant 's life off the big screen has  प्रायः  overshadowed his  कार्य   as   a  thespian  .
he  has been  गायन  about  उसके  disrespect for  the  profession  of  acting ,  और   in   उसके  disdain towards the  संस्कृति  of  हस्ती  and  दुश्मनी  towards the media .
In  a  career  spanning  30 years ,  ग्रान्ट  has repeatedly claimed  कि   एक्टिंग   is   नहीं  a true calling  लकिन  just  a   जॉब  he  गिरी   into  .
The Han  राजवंश   (   ;  )  (   206  BC – 220 AD  )   थी   an  imperial dynasty  of   चीन  ,  preceded  by the  qin   राजवंश   (  221–207 BC ) and succeeded by the  तीन   kingdoms  (  220–280  AD  )   .
It was  संस्थापित  by the rebel  नेता  Liu Bang ,  ज्ञात   मरणोपरांत  as Emperor Gaozu  of   हान   .
it   थी  briefly  बाधित   by  the Xin  राजवंश  ( 9–23 AD  )  of the former regent  वांग   mang  .
This interregnum separates  the  Han  into  two  अवधि  : the Western  हान  (  206   bc  –  9   ad   )   और  Eastern Han (  25–220   ad   )   .
Spanning over four  सदियां   ,   the   काल  of  the  Han  राजवंश  is  माना  a  सुनहरी  age  in  Chinese history .
to  this day , China 's  बहुमत   जातीय   समूह  refers to  itself  as  the  `` Han people '' and the Chinese script  is  referred to as ``  हान   वर्ण  `` .
The Han  साम्राज्य   थी  divided into  क्षेत्रों  directly  नियंत्रित  by the  सेंट्रल   सरकारी  ,  ज्ञात   as  commanderies , and  a   क्रमांक   of   semi-autonomous  kingdoms .
These kingdoms  धीरे   खोया   सब  vestiges of  उनके   स्वतंत्रता   ,  particularly following  the  Rebellion of  the   सात   राज्य  .
The  xiongnu  ,  a   nomadic  confederation  जिससे   वर्चस्व  the eastern Eurasian Steppe ,  पराजित  the Han army in  बैटल  in  200   bc   .
following  the defeat , a  राजनैतिक   विवाह  alliance was  negotiated  in which  the  Han became the  de  facto  अवर  partner .
When  ,  despite  the   सन्धि   ,  the Xiongnu continued  to  raid Han  सीमायें  , Emperor  wu   of  Han (  r.   141–87  BC  )  launched several military  अभियान  against them  .
the   परम  Han  विजय  in these wars eventually forced  the  Xiongnu to accept  vassal   औकात  as  हान  tributaries .
These  अभियान   विस्तारित   हान   प्रभुता  into the Tarim  जलाशय  of Central  एशिया   और  helped  स्थापित  the  विशाल  trade network known  as  the  रेशा  Road  ,  which reached  as   दूर   as   the  Mediterranean  संसार  .
Han  शक्तियां  managed to divide the Xiongnu into two competing  राष्ट्र   ,  the Southern and  उत्तरी  Xiongnu , and  मजबूर   the  Northern  xiongnu  across the Ili River .
Despite these victories , the territories  उत्तर   of   हान   's  borders  यहूद  quickly overrun by  the   nomadic   xianbei  Confederation .
After 92 AD , the  राजमहल  eunuchs increasingly involved  themselves  in court  राजनीती   ,  engaging in  हिंसक  power struggles between the  विभिन्न   consort  clans of the  empresses  and  सम्राज्ञी   dowagers  , causing the Han  's   परम   downfall  .
Imperial authority was  भी   seriously  challenged by large Daoist religious societies  जिससे   instigated  the  पीला   पगड़ी   विद्रोह  and  the   पाँच   pecks  of  राइस  Rebellion  .
Following  the   मौत   of  Emperor  ling   (   r.   168–189  AD ) ,  the  palace eunuchs  suffered  wholesale massacre by  सैन्य  officers  ,  allowing members of the aristocracy and  सैन्य   राज्यपालों   to  become  warlords   और  divide  the   साम्राज्य  .
जब  Cao Pi , King of Wei , usurped the throne  इससे   सम्राट   xian   ,   the   हान  Dynasty  ceased   to   मौजूद  .
the   हान   राजवंश  was an  आयु   of  economic prosperity  और  saw a significant growth of the money economy  पहला   स्थापित  during  the  Zhou  राजवंश  ( c.  1050–256  BC )  .
The coinage issued by  the  central government mint  in   119   bc   remained  the standard coinage of  चीन  until the Tang Dynasty ( 618–907  ad  )  .
to   अदा   लिये   इसके  military campaigns and the settlement of newly  conquered   frontier  territories  ,  the government  राष्ट्रीयकृत   the  private salt and  आयरन  industries in 117  bc   .
These government  monopolies   यहूद   repealed   दौरान  the Eastern  हान  period  ,   और   the  lost revenue  थी   recouped  through heavily taxing  निजी  entrepreneurs  .
The emperor  थी  at  the   शिखर  of Han  समाज   .
he   presided   over  the  हान   सरकारी   लकिन   साझा   शक्ति  with both the  धामों   और  appointed ministers who came largely from the  scholarly   gentry   क्लास   .
From the  शासनकाल  of Emperor Wu onward , the Chinese court officially  प्रायोजित  Confucianism in  शिक्षा   और  court  राजनीती   ,   synthesized  with the cosmology of later scholars  ऐसे   as   डांग  Zhongshu  .
This policy endured  जबतक  the  पतन  of  the   चिंग   राजवंश   in  1911  ad   .
विज्ञान  and technology during  the   हान   काल  saw  significant  advances ,  सहित  papermaking , the nautical  परिचालन   अरित्र  ,  the  use  of  negative numbers in mathematics ,  the  raised-relief  मैप  , the hydraulic -powered  armillary  sphere  लिये   खगोलशास्त्र  ,  और  a seismometer employing  an  inverted pendulum .
Tourette syndrome (  भी  called Tourette 's  सिंड्रोम   ,  Tourette  's   विकार  , Gilles de la Tourette  सिंड्रोम  , GTS or , more commonly  ,  simply Tourette  's  or TS )  is  an  inherited  neuropsychiatric  विकार   साथ  onset in childhood , characterized  by  multiple physical  (  motor ) tics  और  at least one  गायन  (  phonic  ) tic .
These tics characteristically wax and  wane  ,  can  be suppressed temporarily ,  और   हैं  preceded by a  premonitory  urge .
tourette  's is defined as  भाग  of  a   वर्णक्रम  of tic disorders , which includes  क्षणिक   और  chronic  tics   .
Tourette  's  was once considered  a   विरल   और  bizarre syndrome  ,  most often associated with  the  exclamation of obscene words  or   socially  inappropriate and derogatory  remarks   (  coprolalia ) ,  लकिन  this  लक्षण   is  present  in  only a small minority  of   लोगों   साथ  Tourette 's .
Tourette 's is  no  longer considered  a   विरल   कंडीशन  , but  it   is  not always  correctly  identified  क्युकी  most cases are mild and the severity of tics decreases  लिये  most children as they  pass  through adolescence  .
Between 0.4  %  and  3.8  % of  children  ages 5 to 18  may   have  Tourette 's ;  the   व्यापकता  of  क्षणिक  and  दीर्घकालिक   tics   in   school-age  children is higher , with the  अधिक  common tics  of   नजर   blinking  ,  खाँसी  ,  गला   clearing  ,  सूँघने   ,   और  facial movements  .
Extreme  tourette   's   in  adulthood is a rarity  ,  and Tourette 's does not adversely  affect  intelligence  or   जीवन  expectancy .
Genetic and environmental factors  खेल  a  भूमिका   in  the etiology  of   tourette  's , but the exact  कल्याणकारी   हैं  unknown .
in   सबसे  cases , medication is  अनावश्यक  .
There is  no  effective  उपचार  for  प्रत्येक  case of  tics   ,   लकिन  certain  medications  and therapies  can   सहायता  when  उनके  use  is   warranted   .
Education is  an  important part of any treatment  योजना  , and explanation  और   reassurance  alone are  प्रायः  sufficient treatment .
comorbid  conditions  (  co-occurring  diagnoses   अन्य  than  tourette   's  )  ऐसे  as attention-deficit  अतिसक्रियता  disorder  (   adhd   )  and  obsessive–compulsive  disorder ( OCD ) are  उपस्थित  in many patients seen  in  tertiary  specialty  clinics .
These other conditions often cause more functional  पुतलियों  to  the  individual than  the  tics  कि   हैं   the   hallmark   of  Tourette 's , hence  it  is important  to  correctly identify  comorbid  conditions and  दावत  them  .
The  eponym  was bestowed  by  Jean-Martin  charcot   (  1825–1893  )   on  behalf  of  his resident  ,  Georges Albert  édouard  Brutus Gilles  de  la Tourette  (  1859–1904 ) , a French  चिकित्सक   और  neurologist ,  जो   प्रकाशित  an account  of  nine patients with  tourette   's   in   1885  .
सनबीम  badge .
Sunbeam  थी  a marque registered  by  John  marston   co.  Ltd of  wolverhampton   ,  England ,  in  1888 .
The company  पहला  made  साइकिल   ,   तब   मोटरसाइकिल   और  cars from the late  19th  century until about 1936 ,  और  applied the marque  to  all three forms of transportation  .
The  कम्पनी  also  manufactured  aero  इंजन  in the First World  युद्ध   और   647  aircraft during  the  Second World War  .
A Sunbeam was the first British  car  to  जीत   a  Grand Prix  रेस   ,   और  set  a  number of land speed records .
The company  गई   into   receivership   in   1935  and was  खरीदा  by  the  Rootes Group ,  जिससे  continued to use the Sunbeam marque .
Fox News Channel ( FNC ) ,  भी  known  as  Fox News , is a cable  न्यूज   चैनल   स्वामित्व   by  the Fox  entertainment  Group  ,  a subsidiary  of   न्यूज  Corporation .
As of  अप्रैल   2009  , the channel was available to 102 million  households   in  the United States  और   to   दर्शक  internationally , broadcasting  primarily   इससे  its New  यॉर्क  studios  .
The channel  थी   निर्मित  by Australian-American media  mogul  Rupert  मर्डोक  ,  जो  hired  पूर्व   एनबीसी   कार्यपालिका   रोजर   ailes   as  its  founding   सीईओ   .
It  शुभारम्भ   on  October  7   ,  1996  to  17 million cable  सदस्य  .
It grew during the late 1990s and  2000s  to become  the  dominant  केबल  news network in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  .
आलोचकों  have stated  कि   फॉक्स   न्यूज  Channel promotes  रूढ़िवादी  political positions and  पक्षपातपूर्ण  reporting  .
टीकाकारों  ,  न्यूज   anchors  ,  और  reporters at Fox  न्यूज   चैनल  have responded  कि  news  रिपोर्टिंग   और  political commentary operate independently  of   प्रत्येक   अन्य  ,  और   have   अस्वीकृत  any  पूर्वाग्रह  in news reporting  .
The mandibular first molar  or  six-year  molar  is the tooth  स्तिथ   distally  ( away  इससे   the  midline  of   the  face )  इससे   दोनो   the   mandibular  second premolars  of  the mouth but  mesial   (   toward  the midline of  the   फेस   )   इससे   दोनो  mandibular  दूसरी  molars  .
It is  स्तिथ  on  the  mandibular (  निम्नतर  ) arch  of   the   मुँह   ,  and generally  opposes  the maxillary ( upper  )  first molars and the maxillary  2nd  premolar in normal class I  occlusion  .
the  function of this  molar  is  समान   to  that of all molars  in  regard to  पीस   होने  the  प्रिंसिपल  action during mastication ,  commonly  known  as   चबाने  .
There are usually five well-developed cusps on mandibular  पहला  molars : two on  the   buccal  ( side nearest the  गाल  )  ,  two lingual  (  side nearest  the   जीभ   )   ,   और  one  distal  .
There are great differences  between  the deciduous (  baby  ) mandibular  molars  and  those   of  the  स्थाई   mandibular  molars , even though their function are  समान  .
The permanent mandibular molars  हैं   नहीं  considered to  have   कोई  teeth that precede it  .
despite  being named molars , the deciduous  molars   हैं  followed by  स्थाई  premolars  .
In the universal system of notation ,  the  deciduous  mandibular  first  molars   हैं   designated  by a letter written in uppercase  .
the   सही   पतझड़ी   mandibular   पहला   molar   is  known  as  `` S '' , and the left one is  ज्ञात  as `` L  ''   .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  notation  रै  a  अलग  system  of  notation  .
यूँ   ,  the  सही  deciduous  mandibular  first molar is known  as   ``  84  ''  ,  और   the   बाएँ   एक  is  ज्ञात  as  ``   74  ''  .
In the universal  प्रणाली   of   संकेतन   ,  the permanent mandibular first molars are designated  by  a number  .
The right permanent mandibular first molar  is  known  as  ``  30   ''  , and  the   बाएँ   एक  is known as `` 19  ''   .
The  पामर  notation  उपयोग  a number  in   संयोजन   साथ  a symbol designating in which quadrant  the  tooth is  मिला   .
For this tooth , the  बाएँ   और   सही  first  molars   होता  have the  वही  number  ,  `` 6 '' ,  लकिन   the   सही   एक  would have the symbol ,  ``  ┐  ''   ,   over  it  ,  while the  बाएँ   एक  would  have  ,  ``  ┌ '' .
the  international  संकेतन   रै  a  अलग   क्रमांकन  system  than  the previous two ,  और  the  सही   स्थाई  mandibular first molar is  ज्ञात  as ``  46   ''   ,  and  the  left  एक   is  known as  ``  36 '' .
Mandibular  प्राथमिक  first molars usually have four  गूदा  horns .
the  first molar  is  usually the first  स्थाई   दाँत  to erupt  और  has  वयस्क  undertones  .
Anatomy :  the  mandibular  पहला  molar  रै   पाँच   पुलिन   :   the  mesiobuccal ( MB , toward  midline  and cheek  )   ,  mesiolingual (  ml  ,  toward  midline  और   जीभ  )  ,  distolingual  (   dl   ,  away  इससे  midline and  towards  tongue  )  ,  distobuccal  ( DB  ,  away  इससे  midline and toward cheek  )  , and  distal  (  d  ,  दूर   इससे   midline   )  ,  सूचीबद्ध   in   अनुक्रम   of   अवरोहण   आकार  .
सूचीबद्ध   in  order of decreasing height  वे  are  :  ML ,  dl  ,  df  , MF ,  और  D.  an  eighth cusp  थी   मिला   in  a primary second lower molar  in  an  argentinean  child  .
viewed  from  the  top  of  the  दाँत  ( occlusal  दृश्य  )  ,  the mandibular  पहला   molar   is   pentagonal  (  पाँच   तरफा  ) in shape and tapers toward the lingual  ,  with the  पहलू   होने  the buccal surface  ,  the  mesial  surface  ,  the lingual  सतह  , distal  सतह  , and the  distobuccal  surface .
the   occlusal   सतह  has  चार   डोले  .
The  सेंट्रल   नाली   is  not straight but runs  bas  the center  of  the  दाँत  mesially  to  distally and contains four  गड्ढों  (  mesial  , central  ,  central , and  distal   )  .
The distobuccal groove runs from  the   distal  pit in  the   सेंट्रल   नाली   distobuccally  separating the  distal   और   distobuccal  cusps .
The lingual  नाली   रनों  from the  अधिक   distal   of  the central  गड्ढों  in  the  central groove toward the  lingual  surface between  the  mesiolingual and  distolingual   पुलिन  .
The  buccal  groove runs from the more mesial of the central pits  in   the   सेंट्रल  groove  toward  the buccal  सतह  between  the   mesiobuccal  and  distobuccal  cusps  समाप्ति  in  the  buccal pit  .
the  portion of  the  central groove  between   the   सेंट्रल  pits is termed  the  Lewis offset and is  अनिवार्य   to   खाता   लिये  the  स्थितियाँ   of  the buccal and lingual grooves ( buccal  नाली  being more mesial than  the  lingual groove while  वे   हैं   समानांतर   )   .
इससे  the buccal ( buccal  दृश्य  ) ,  दो  roots are  उपस्थित   .
The distal root is generally straighter , although both  प्रायः   have  a slight  distal  curvature  .
the   हाइट्स   of  contour  on  the mesial and distal contact the adjacent  दांत  and  हैं  located at the junction of  the  occlusal and  मध्य  thirds of  the   क्राउन   .
The  फ्लोरिडा   विधानमंडल  is  the   दो  houses that act as  the  state  विधानमंडल  of the U.S. state of Florida  .
the  Florida  संविधान  states  कि  `` The legislative  शक्ति   of   the  state shall  be  vested  in  a legislature  of  the  राज्य   of   फ्लोरिडा   ,  '' composed of  a  Senate and House of Representatives  .
the   विधानमंडल   is   seated   at  the  फ्लोरिडा  State  कैपिटल   in  Tallahassee .
Stained  कांच   चित्रण   of  Daniel interceding with Arioch ,  the  king 's guard .
arioch  had been  चार्ज  with  हत्या   सब   the  wise men after they were not able to  interpret  Nebuchadnezzar 's dream .
Daniel 2  is  the  दूसरी  chapter of the Book of Daniel  in  the  यहूदी  Bible  .
The chapter  's  source  टेक्स्ट  is predominantly written in Aramaic .
According  to  the text  ,   nebuchadnezzar   is  the  किंग  of Babylon who is troubled  by  his dreams .
He demands an interpretation  लिये  his  सपनो  or will have his mystic interpreters executed  .
डेनियल  seeks Divine  अक्ल  to  interpret  the  किंग  's dreams  और  praises  परमेश्वर  with  a  short psalm .
परमेश्वर  gives  डेनियल   a   दृष्टि  in the night to  खुलासा  the king 's  सपना  .
समर्थ   to   satisfy  the king ,  डेनियल  is  प्रचारित   over   the  whole  प्रांत  of Babylon .
One Comcast  बीच   ,   the  headquarters  of   comcast   in  Philadelphia  ,   pa  .
The  बूढ़ा  Comcast logo from 1969 to 1999 , when it was replaced with the crescent logo .
the  Comcast Corporation is an  अमरीकी  provider of entertainment ,  सूचना  and communications products  और   सेवाएं  .
It  is  the  largest  cable operator  ,   एक   of  the biggest  द्रव्यमान  media ,  घर   अंतरजाल   सेवा   प्रदाता   ,  and third largest home telephone  सेवा   प्रदाता   in   the   संयुक्त   राज्य  , providing cable television  ,  broadband  अंतरजाल  ,  टेलीफोन  service  और   in  some areas  घर  security ( including  burglar   सचेतक  , surveillance cameras , fire  सचेतक  systems and home automation ) to both residential and  वाणिज्यिक  customers in 40 states and  the  District of Columbia .
the  company  is  headquartered in Philadelphia  ,   पेन्सिलवेनिया   .
in  2011  ,   comcast   acquired  a  51   %  majority stake in media conglomerate NBCUniversal from  ge  in  जनवरी  2011 , and began the process of  खरीदना   the  remaining 49 % on February 12 , 2013  ,   at  a  लागत  of $ 16.7 billion  .
it  completed the purchase on March  19  ,  2013  .
Comcast also  रै  significant  पकड़कर  in  अनेक   केबल  networks (  सहित  E !
Entertainment Television ,  स्टाइल  Network  ,   g4   ,  the Golf Channel  और   एनबीसी   खेल   संजाल  ) , distribution (  theplatform  ) ,  और  related businesses  .
Comcast has been the  विषय  of criticism  लिये   क्रियाएँ   सहित  its stance  on  net  neutrality  , as  खूब   as   ग़रीब  results on customer  संतोष  surveys .
porcupines   हैं   rodents  with a  कोट  of sharp spines ,  or   quills  ,  कि   बचाव  and  camouflage   उन्हें   इससे   परभक्षी   .
They are  स्वदेशी  to the Americas  ,  southern Asia ,  और   अफ़्रीकी  .
Porcupines are the  तीसरा   largest  of the rodents  ,   पीछे   the  capybara  और   the   बीवर  .
Most porcupines  हैं  about long , with  an  long  टेल  .
Weighing ,  वे  are rounded  ,   विशाल  and slow  .
Porcupines come in  विभिन्न   शेड्स  of brown  ,  gray ,  और   the   असामान्य  white  .
porcupines  '  spiny  protection resembles that of the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs  और  monotreme  echidnas  .
The  आम   साही  is a  herbivore   .
It eats  पत्ते  , herbs , twigs  और  green  पौधे   जैसे   skunk  cabbage  और   क्लोवर  and  in   the   शीत  it may eat  छाल   .
The North  अमरीकी  porcupine often climbs trees to  ढूँढें  food  .
The African  साही   is   नहीं  a climber  और  forages  on  the ground .
It is mostly  nocturnal  , but will  sometimes  forage  लिये   खाना  in the  दिन   .
porcupines   have   become   a   pest  in  कीनिया  and are eaten  as  a  कोमलता   .
The name  साही  comes  इससे  Middle French porc espin  (   spined   सुअर  )  .
A regional  अमरीकी  name for  the  animal is  quill   सुअर  .
First page  of  US  पेटेंट   129,843   लिये  Improvement in Lubricators for  steam-engines
Elijah J. McCoy ( May  2  ,  1844  –  अक्तूबर  10 , 1929  )  was  a  black  canadian-american  inventor and  इंजीनियर  , who was notable for his  57  U.S. patents  ,   सबसे  to do with lubrication of steam  इंजन  .
Born  फ़्री   in  Canada  ,   he  returned  as  a five-year-old  चाइल्ड  with his family to the  संयुक्त   राज्य  in  1847   ,  where  he   जिया   लिये  the  बाकी  of  उसके   जीवन  and  became   a  US citizen .
होंडा   fcx  Clarity , a hydrogen  ईंधन  cell demonstration  गाडी  introduced  in   2008
A hydrogen  गाडी  is a vehicle that uses hydrogen  as  its onboard fuel  लिये  motive power  .
Hydrogen  वाहनों  include hydrogen fueled  स्पेस  rockets , as well as  ऑटोमोबाइल  and other transportation  वाहनों  .
The power  पौधे   of  such vehicles  बदलें  the  रासायनिक  energy of hydrogen to mechanical  उर्जा  either  by   burning   हाइड्रोजन  in an  आतंरिक  combustion engine , or  by  reacting hydrogen with oxygen  in  a fuel cell  to  run  इलेक्ट्रिक  motors .
Widespread  उपयोग  of  हाइड्रोजन  for  fueling  transportation is a key element of a  प्रस्तावित   हाइड्रोजन  economy .
Hydrogen  ईंधन  does not  occur   naturally   on  Earth and thus is  नहीं  an energy source ; rather it  is   an  energy carrier  .
it   is  most frequently made from  मिथेन  or other  चट्टान   fuels  ,  लकिन  it can be produced using sources  (   ऐसे   as   हवा  ,  सौर  , or nuclear )  कि  are intermittent ,  too  diffuse  or  too cumbersome to  सीधे  propel vehicles .
Integrated wind-to-hydrogen  पौधे  , using electrolysis of water  ,   हैं  exploring technologies to deliver costs low enough  ,  and quantities  ग्रेट   पर्याप्त  , to  compete  with traditional  उर्जा  sources .
अनेक   कंपनियाँ   हैं  working to develop technologies  कि  might efficiently exploit the  संभावित  of hydrogen energy for  मोबाईल  uses .
The attraction  of  using hydrogen  as   an   उर्जा   करेंसी  is that , if hydrogen  is  prepared without using fossil fuel inputs  ,  vehicle propulsion  होता   नहीं  contribute to carbon dioxide emissions .
The drawbacks of hydrogen use are high  पूंजी   लागत   ,  low  उर्जा  content  प्रति   ईकाई  volume  ,  high  tankage   weights   ,  very  ऊँची   भंडार  vessel pressures  ,   the   भंडार   ,  transportation and filling of  गैसीय   or   द्रव  hydrogen  in  vehicles  ,  the large investment  in  infrastructure that  होता   be  required to fuel vehicles , and  the   inefficiency   of   उत्पादन   प्रक्रियाओं  .
Sacramento  is   the  capital city of  the  U.S.  राज्य   of   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   और  the  सीट   of   सरकारी  of  sacramento  County .
It is  स्तिथ  at  the  confluence of  the   sacramento  River and the  अमरीकी  River in  the   उत्तरी   portion  of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  's  expansive   सेंट्रल   घाटी  .
साथ  an  अनुमानित   2011  population of 477,891  ,   it  is  the  sixth-largest  नगर  in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   और  the  35th  largest  नगर  in the United  राज्य   .
Sacramento  is  the core cultural and economic  बीच  of the Sacramento  महानगर  area  जिससे  includes seven counties  साथ   an   अनुमानित  2009 population  of  2,527,123 .
Its  महानगर  area  is   the  fourth  largest   in  California  बाद  the  वृहद  Los  एंजिल्स   क्षेत्रफल   ,  San  फ्रांसिस्को  Bay Area , and  the   सैन  Diego metropolitan area , as  खूब  as the 25th largest in  the  United  राज्य  .
sacramento   थी   cited   by  Time  पत्रिका  as America  's  most  ethnically  and racially  एकीकृत  city  in  2002 .
Sacramento became a  नगर  through  the   प्रयत्न  of  the  Swiss immigrant  जॉन  Sutter  ,   sr.   ,   उसके  son John Sutter  ,  Jr. ,  और  James W.  मार्शल  .
sacramento  grew  जल्दी   धन्यवाद   to   the  protection of  sutter   's  Fort  ,   जिससे  was  स्थापित   by  Sutter in 1839  .
During the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   सुनहरा   फटाफट  ,  sacramento   थी  a major  वितरण   पाइंट  ,  a   वाणिज्यिक  and agricultural center  ,   और  a terminus for  वैगन  trains ,  stagecoaches  ,  riverboats   ,  the telegraph ,  the  Pony Express ,  और  the  पहला  Transcontinental Railroad .
कैलिफ़ोर्निया  State University  ,  Sacramento ,  अधिक  commonly known  as   sacramento  State  or  Sac State , is the  largest   लोकल  university .
it   is   एक  of the  twenty-three  campuses of the California State  विश्वविद्यालयों   प्रणाली   .
Drexel University Sacramento is located  in   शहर  , Sacramento .
विश्वविद्यालयों  of  the   प्रशांत   's   mcgeorge   स्कूल   of  Law  is  located  in  the Oak  पार्क  neighborhood .
in  addition ,  the   विश्वविद्यालयों   of  California , Davis is  स्तिथ  in  आसपास  Davis  ,  west  of   the  capital .
the  UC Davis Medical  बीच  ,  a  world-renowned  शोध  hospital ,  is  located in  the  city of Sacramento .
the  Apple Store is a chain of retail stores  स्वामित्व  and operated by Apple Inc. , dealing in  कंप्यूटर  and consumer  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स   .
the  stores  बेचें  Macintosh personal computers , software ,  ipods  ,  ipads  , iPhones , third-party accessories , and other consumer electronics such as Apple  tv   .
कुछ  high  प्रोफ़ाइल  stores feature a  थिएटर   लिये   प्रस्तुतियों  and workshops and a  स्टुडियो   लिये  training with  ठहराना  products ; all  स्टोर्स  offer a Genius Bar for technical  support  and  मरम्मत  , as  खूब   as   फ़्री  workshops  उपलब्धियाँ   to   the  public  .
Under  the   नेतृत्व  of Ron Johnson ,  the   पूर्व   वरिष्ठ   वाइस  President  of   खुदरा  Operations , the Apple  स्टोर्स  have  ,  according to  an  article  in  the New York  टाइम्स  , been responsible for `` [  turning  ] the boring  कंप्यूटर  sales floor into  a   sleek   playroom  filled with  गैजेट  '' .
, Apple has 405 stores worldwide , with  वैश्विक  sales  of   अरब  in  merchandise  in  2011   ,   और   वे   सीसे  the  संयुक्त  States  खुदरा  market  in  terms of  बिक्री  per  ईकाई  area .
Steven Paul  ``   स्टीव  '' Jobs ( ; February 24  ,  1955  –   अक्तूबर  5 ,  2011  ) was an American entrepreneur and inventor ,  बेहतरीन  known  as  the co-founder  ,  chairman  ,   और   सीईओ  of Apple  inc   .
through  Apple ,  he   थी  widely recognized  as   a  charismatic  पायोनियर  of  the  personal  कंप्यूटर  revolution and  लिये  his influential  करियर   in  the computer and consumer  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स  fields , transforming  ``   एक   उद्योग  after  another   ,   इससे   कंप्यूटर  and smartphones to  म्यूज़िक  and movies ... ''
कार्य  also  co-founded  and served as  मुख्य   कार्यपालिका   of  Pixar Animation  studios   ;   he  became  a  member of  the  board of directors of The  वॉल्ट  Disney Company  in   2006  , when  डिज़्नी   acquired   पिक्चर्स  .
Jobs was among the first  to  see the commercial potential  of  Xerox  parc   's  mouse  -ड्राइवn   आलेखीय  user  इंटरफ़ेस  , which  led   to  the creation  of   the  Apple Lisa  और  , one year later ,  the   मैकिंटोश   .
he  also played a role in introducing the  laserwriter  ,  एक   of   the   पहला   widely  available laser printers  ,  to the market .
बाद   a   शक्ति  struggle with the  फलक   of  directors in 1985 , Jobs  बाएँ  Apple and founded NeXT  ,  a computer  मंच  development company  specializing  in  the   higher-education   और  business  बाज़ार   .
in   1986  ,  he   acquired   the   कंप्यूटर   ग्राफिक्स   प्रभाग  of Lucasfilm  ,  which  थी   spun   बंद   as  Pixar  .
he   थी   credited   in  Toy Story  (  1995  )  as  an  executive  निर्माता   .
he  served  as   सीईओ  and majority shareholder until  डिज़्नी   's  purchase  of   पिक्चर्स  in 2006 .
In 1996 ,  बाद   ठहराना  had failed  to   उद्धार  its operating  प्रणाली   ,   copland  , Gil  amelio  turned to NeXT Computer ,  और  the NeXTSTEP  मंच  became the  न्यास   लिये   the  Mac OS X .
Jobs returned  to   ठहराना   as   an  advisor  ,  and took control of the company  as  an interim  सीईओ   .
Jobs brought  ठहराना   इससे  near  दिवालियापन  to profitability  by  1998  .
as  the  नई   सीईओ  of the company  ,   कार्य  oversaw the  विकास  of the iMac , iTunes , iPod ,  iphone  , and iPad  ,  and on  the   सेवाएं   पक्ष   ,  the company 's Apple Retail  स्टोर्स   ,   itunes  Store and  the   app  Store .
the  success of these  उत्पाद   और  services provided  अनेक   सालो   of   stable   वित्तीय  returns , and propelled  ठहराना  to  become   the  world 's  सबसे  valuable  सरेआम  traded company in  2011  .
the  reinvigoration  of   the  company is  regarded   by  many  टीकाकारों  as one  of  the  महानतम   turnarounds   in   कारोबार  history .
in  2003 , Jobs  थी   diagnosed   साथ  a pancreas neuroendocrine  ट्यूमर   .
Though  it   थी  initially  treated   ,  he reported  a   हार्मोन   असंतुलन  ,  underwent  a liver transplant in 2009 , and  appeared   progressively  thinner  as   उसके   स्वास्थ्य   अस्वीकृत   .
On  चिकित्सा   छोड़   लिये  most  of  2011 , Jobs resigned in  अगस्त  that year  ,  and was elected  अध्यक्ष   of  the Board  .
He died of  respiratory  arrest  सम्बन्धित   to   उसके  metastatic tumor on October 5 ,  2011  .
कार्य   प्राप्त  a  क्रमांक  of honors and  पब्लिक  recognition for  उसके  influence  in  the technology  और   म्यूज़िक  industries  .
he  has been referred  to  as ``  legendary   ''  ,  a   ``   futurist  '' or simply `` visionary  ''   ,   और  has  महरूम   वर्णित   as  the `` Father  of  the Digital Revolution  ''   ,  a `` master  of   नवीनता  ''  ,  and  a  ``  डिज़ाइन  perfectionist '' .
प्रवेश   to   खण्ड  ( 52 ) of  the  Colosseum ,  साथ  numerals still  दृश्य
Roman numerals  ,   the   न्यूमेरिक  system in ancient  रोम  ,  उपयोग  combinations of  अक्षर  from  the   लैटिन  alphabet to  signify  values  .
The numbers 1 to  10   can  be  expressed  in  रोमन  numerals as  follows:
and  .
the   रोमन   numeral  system is a  cousin   of   etruscan   numerals   .
Use  of  Roman  numerals  continued  बाद  the  मनाही   of   the  Roman Empire  .
From the 14th  सदी  on  ,   रोमन  numerals began to be  replaced   in  most contexts by  अधिक   सुविधाजनक  Hindu-Arabic numerals ; however this  प्रक्रम   थी   क्रमिक   ,  and the use of  रोमन   numerals  in  कुछ  minor  अनुप्रयोग   continues   to   इस  day .
प्रभावी   नाभिकीय  Charge  आरेख
The  प्रभावी  nuclear charge  (   प्रायः  symbolize as  or  Z*  )  is  the   जाल   धनात्मक   चार्ज  experienced by an  इलेक्ट्रॉन   in  a  multi-electron  atom  .
the   पद  `` effective '' is used because the  shielding  effect  of  negatively charged  electrons   रोकता  higher orbital  electrons  from experiencing  the  full nuclear  चार्ज  by  the   repelling   प्रभाव   of  inner-layer electrons  .
The  प्रभावी  nuclear  चार्ज  experienced  by  the outer shell electron  is  also called the  कोर  charge  .
it  is  संभावित  to  determine  the  शक्ति  of the nuclear charge  by   looking   at  the oxidation  क्रमांक   of  the  अणु  .

A  ग्रामीण   खींचें  of  i-5   ,  with two  गलियों   in   प्रत्येक  direction separated by a  विशाल  grassy  मध्य  ,  और   साथ  cross-traffic limited to overpasses and  underpasses
The Dwight D.  आइज़नहावर   नेशनल  System  of  Interstate  और  Defense  राजमार्गों  ( commonly  ज्ञात  as  the  Interstate Highway System ,  अंतरराज्यीय   फ्रीवे  System  ,   अंतरराज्यीय  System ,  or  simply  the  Interstate ) is  a   संजाल  of  freeways   कि   फ़ॉर्म  a part of the National Highway System  of  the United States .
the   प्रणाली  is  नामित   लिये  President  ड्वाइट   D.  Eisenhower , who championed its formation .
निर्माण  was authorized by the Federal Aid Highway Act of 1956 , and the original portion was  समाप्त  35  सालो  later .
The network has since been  विस्तारित  ,  और  ,  it  had a total  लंबाई  of , making it the world  's  second longest after China 's . ,  परिचय  one-quarter of  सब  vehicle miles driven  in  the country use the  अंतरराज्यीय   प्रणाली  .
the   लागत   of  construction  रै  been  अनुमानित  at $ 425 billion ( in  2006   डॉलर  ) ,  बनाना  it the ``  largest  public works  कार्यक्रम  since the  पिरामिडों  `` .
The system  रै   contributed  in shaping the United  राज्य  into a world economic superpower  और   a   अत्यधिक   industrialized   स्वदेश   .
.eu is the country code top-level  डोमेन   (  ccTLD )  लिये  the European Union  (   eu   )  .
Launched  on   7   दिसम्बर   2005  , the domain  is   उपलब्धियाँ  for organisations  in   और   निवासियों   of  EU member states .
The TLD  is   administered   by  EURid  ,  a consortium originally  consisting  of the  नेशनल  ccTLD registry operators of  बेल्जियम  ,  स्वीडन   ,   और  Italy  ,  joined later  by  the  नेशनल   रजिस्ट्री   ऑपरेटर   of   the   चेक  Republic  .
Trademark  स्वामी   यहूद   समर्थ  to  submit   पंजीकरण   through  a sunrise  काल  ,  in   an   प्रयत्न  to prevent cybersquatting  .
पूरा   पंजीकरण   प्रारंभ  on 7 April 2006  .
Meister  अर्थात्  master in German  (   as  in  निपुण  craftsman ,  or  as  an  honorific title  ऐसे  as Meister Eckhart )  .
The word is  akin  to  maestro  .
In  खेल   ,   meister  is  प्रयुक्त   लिये  the  वर्तमान  national , European  or  world champion ( Deutscher Meister , *Europameister , Weltmeister ) .
Many  आधुनिक  day  जर्मनी  police forces use the title Meister .
During  the  Second  संसार   युद्ध   ,   meister  was  the  highest enlisted  रैंक  of the Ordnungspolizei  .
meister  has been borrowed into English slang , where  it   is   प्रयुक्त  in  यौगिक  nouns  .
a  person referred to as  “meister”  is one  जो   रै  extensive theoretical knowledge and  व्यावहारिक  skills  in  his profession  ,  business , or some other kind of work  or  activity .
लिये  example  ,  a  “puzzle-meister”  would be someone  अत्यधिक  skilled at solving puzzles .
These neologisms sometimes  have  a sarcastic  intent   (   लिये   उदाहरण   ,  “stubble-meister”  लिये  someone with a  छोटी   ,   neat   दाढ़ी   or   “crier-meister”  for someone who  प्रायः  cries ) .
mighty   morphin   शक्ति  Rangers is  an  American  live-action   children  's television series  परिचय  teenagers with  super-powers   ,  based  on   the  16th installment of the  जापानी  Super  sentai  franchise  ,   kyōryū  Sentai Zyuranger .
दोनो  the show and its  सम्बन्धित   merchandise  saw unbridled overnight success  ,   बनने  a staple of 1990s  पॉप  culture in mere months  .
अंतर्गत  the original  नाम  , `` Mighty  morphin  Power  रेंजरों  '' the series  भागा  from 1993 to 1995 and spawned  the  feature film Mighty Morphin Power Rangers :  the  Movie  .
the   दूसरी   और   तीसरा  seasons  of  the show drew on footage and  तत्व  from  the  Super  sentai  series Gosei Sentai Dairanger and Ninja Sentai Kakuranger respectively ,  हालांकि   the   zyuranger   वेशभूषा   यहूद  still  प्रयुक्त  for the  पाँच   प्रमुख  Rangers and  अनेक  regular  खलनायक  .
तभी   the  mecha  और   the  Kiba Ranger costume  (   worn   by  the  श्वेत  Ranger ) were  retained   इससे  Dairanger  लिये   the   दूसरी  season ,  जबकि   तभी  the mecha from Kakuranger were  प्रदर्शित  in the  तीसरा   ऋतु  .
However  the  Kakuranger costumes were later used  लिये  the title characters of  the   mini-series   ,   mighty  Morphin Alien  रेंजरों  .
The series  थी  produced by  mmpr  Productions  ,  distributed  by   saban   entertainment  , and aired  on   फॉक्स   बच्चे  .
The show  's  merchandise  थी   उत्पादित  and  वितरित  by Bandai Entertainment .
in  1996  ,   the   श्रेणी  was  rebranded   as   the   शक्ति  Rangers  मताधिकार  ; renaming  the  series every year after , and using costumes ,  प्रॉप्स  , and footage from subsequent Super Sentai series ,  as  well as changing  the  cast  और   कथानक   .
While an overarching  कथानक   होता  continue until  शक्ति  Rangers Lost Galaxy  ,   subsequent  series  बाद  MMPR are  नहीं  sequels or  spin-offs  in the  परंपरागत   भाव  .
In 2010 , a re-version  of   mighty  Morphin Power  रेंजरों  , with  a  new logo , comic book-referenced graphics , and  अतिरिक्त  alternative  खास  effects  ,  was broadcast on ABC Kids  ,   और  Bandai  उत्पादित  brand  नई  toys to coincide with  the  series .
Edgar Allan Poe (  born   एडगर   पो  ; January 19 , 1809 – October  7   ,  1849 ) was an American  लेखक  , poet  ,  editor  और  literary critic ,  माना  part of  the  American Romantic  गति  .
Best known for his tales  of   रहस्य  and the macabre , Poe  थी   एक  of  the  earliest  अमरीकी  practitioners  of  the  छोटी  story and is  generally  considered the inventor of  the  detective fiction genre .
he  is  further  credited with  contributing  to the emerging  विधा  of science fiction  .
He was  the  first well-known  अमरीकी  writer  to  try to  earn  a  जीना   through   लिखने  alone ,  resulting  in a  financially  difficult life and career  .
He was  born   as  Edgar  पो   in  Boston  ,  Massachusetts  ;  he was  अनाथ  young when  उसके   माँ  died shortly  बाद   उसके  father abandoned the family .
Poe  थी  taken in  by  John and  frances  Allan ,  of  Richmond  ,   वर्जिनिया  , but  वे  never  formally  adopted him .
He attended the University of Virginia for one semester but left due to lack of money .
After enlisting  in  the Army  और   बाद  failing as  an  officer  's  cadet  at  West Point  ,   पो   parted   तरीके   साथ  the Allans .
उसके  publishing  करियर  began humbly  ,  with an anonymous collection  of   कविताएं   ,  Tamerlane and Other Poems ( 1827  )   ,  credited only to ``  a   bostonian  '' .
पो   switched  his focus to  गद्य  and  खर्च  the next several  सालो   working   लिये   साहित्यिक   जर्नल्स   और   periodicals  ,  बनने  known for his  अपना  style of  साहित्यिक   आलोचना  .
उसके   कार्य  forced him  to   मूव  among several  शहरों   ,  including  बाल्टीमोर  ,  फिलाडेल्फिया   ,  and New York City .
in  Baltimore in 1835  ,  he married  वर्जिनिया   clemm  , his  13-year-old   cousin  .
In  जनवरी  1845  पो   प्रकाशित  his poem  ,  ``  the  Raven `` , to instant  कामयाबी   .
His  बीवी   died   of   तपेदिक   दो  years after  इसके   प्रकाशन  .
He  began  planning to  उपज  his  अपना  journal  ,   the  Penn  (   बाद  renamed The Stylus  )  , though he  died   पहले   it  could be  उत्पादित   .
On  अक्तूबर   7   ,  1849  ,   at  age 40 , Poe died in  बाल्टीमोर  ;  the   कारण   of   उसके  death  is  unknown  और  has been variously attributed  to   दारू  , brain  जमघट  , cholera ,  दवाएँ  ,  दिल  disease  ,   rabies   ,  suicide , tuberculosis ,  और   अन्य  agents .
पो  and his works  बहकावे  literature in the United  राज्य   और   around  the  संसार  ,  as   खूब  as in specialized fields ,  ऐसे   as  cosmology and cryptography .
Poe and his  कार्य  appear throughout popular culture in literature ,  म्यूज़िक   ,   films  , and television  .
A number  of  his  घरों  are  समर्पित  museums today .
the  Mystery Writers  of   अमेरिका  present an  सालाना  award  ज्ञात  as the  एडगर  Award  लिये   विशिष्ट  work  in  the mystery genre .
Lions  हैं  obligate  carnivores  ; they require  up  to seven kilograms  (   15   पाउंड   )   of   मांस   प्रति  day  .
A major component of their diet  is   the  flesh of large mammals  ,   जैसे  this African  भैंस  .
a   carnivore   (   )   अर्थ   'meat   भक्षक  ' (  लैटिन   ,  caro  अर्थ  'meat  '   or   'flesh   '  and  vorare  meaning 'to devour  '  )  is  an organism  कि  derives its  उर्जा  and nutrient  आवश्यकताएँ   इससे   a  diet consisting mainly or exclusively of animal tissue ,  whether   through   predation  or scavenging  .
Animals  कि  depend  solely  on animal  flesh  for their nutrient requirements are considered  carnivores   जबकि   those   कि   भी   consume  non-animal  खाना  are considered carnivores  .
omnivores  also consume both  एनिमल   और   non-animal   खाना  , and  अलावा   इससे   the  more general  परिभाषा  ,  वहीँ   is  no clearly  पारिभाषित  ratio of  संयंत्र   to   एनिमल  material  कि  would  फर्क  a facultative carnivore from  an   सर्वाहारी   .
A  carnivore   कि  sits at  the  top  of   the  foodchain is  an  apex  परभक्षी  .
पौधे  that  कैप्चर  and  डाइजेस्ट   कीट   हैं  called  मांसाहारी  plants  .
Similarly  ,  fungi  कि  capture microscopic animals  हैं  often called carnivorous  fungi  .
The FIFA World Cup ,  प्रायः  simply the  संसार   कप  , is  an   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  association  फ़ुटबॉल  competition  लडे  by the  वरिष्ठ  men 's  नेशनल  teams of the members of Fédération  internationale  de  फ़ुटबॉल  Association  (   फीफा   )  ,  the   खेल   's   वैश्विक  governing body .
The championship has been  awarded   प्रत्येक  four years since  the   inaugural   टूर्नामेंट  in  1930   ,  except in  1942  and 1946 when it was  नहीं  held  क्युकी   of  the  दूसरी   संसार  War  .
the   वर्तमान  champions  हैं   स्पेन   ,   जो   जीती   the  2010 tournament  .
the   वर्तमान   स्वरूप   of   the  tournament  involves  32 teams competing for the title  at   venues   भीतर   the  host nation ( s )  over  a  काल  of  परिचय   a   माह  ;  इस  phase is often called  the   संसार  Cup  फाइनल   .
a   योग्यता  phase  ,   जिससे  currently takes  प्लेस   over  the preceding  तीन   सालो  , is  प्रयुक्त   to   determine   जिससे  teams qualify for  the  tournament together with the  मेजबान   स्वदेश  (  s   )   .
the  19  संसार   कप  tournaments  have  been won by eight different  नेशनल  teams .
Brazil have  जीती  five  टाइम्स  , and they  हैं  the  तभी   टोली   to   have   निभाई  in every  टूर्नामेंट  .
the  other World  कप   विजेता  are Italy , with four  शीर्षक  ;  जर्मनी  , with  तीन  titles  ;  Argentina and inaugural winners Uruguay , with two titles each ; and  इंग्लैण्ड   ,  France , and Spain  ,   साथ  one title  प्रत्येक   .
The World Cup is  the   संसार   's  most  widely   viewed   sporting   इवेंट  ; an estimated 715.1 million  लोगों  watched the final  मैच   of  the 2006  फीफा   संसार  Cup held in Germany .
the  next three World Cups will be  hosted  by Brazil in  2014  ,  रूस   in   2018   ,  and  क़तर  in 2022 .
नायक   is   an  American science  fiction  television drama series created by  टिम  Kring that  appeared  on  एनबीसी   लिये  four  सीज़न  from September 25 ,  2006   through  February 8 , 2010 .
the  series tells  the  stories of  ordinary  people who  discover  superhuman  abilities   ,   और  how  ये  abilities  लो   प्रभाव   in  the  वर्ण   '  lives .
the  series emulates  the   aesthetic  style  और  storytelling  of   अमरीकी  comic  किताबे  , using  multi-episode   स्टोरी   arcs  that build upon a larger  ,  more encompassing arc .
The  श्रेणी  was  उत्पादित  by Tailwind  प्रोडक्शन्स   in   संघ   साथ  Universal  मीडिया  Studios  .
It was filmed  primarily  in  लॉस  Angeles  ,  California  .
Four complete seasons  aired   ,  ending on  फ़रवरी  8 ,  2010   .
The critically  acclaimed  first  ऋतु  had  a  run of  23  episodes and  garnered   an  average of  14.3  million  दर्शक  in the United States  ,  receiving the highest  दरजा   लिये   an   एनबीसी  drama premiere  in   पाँच  years .
The second  ऋतु  of Heroes attracted an average of  13.1  million viewers  in  the U.S. , and marked NBC 's  एकमात्र  series among the top  20  ranked  कार्यक्रम  in total viewership  लिये  the 2007–2008 season .
Heroes has earned a number  of  awards and nominations  ,   सहित  Primetime Emmy  पुरस्कार  , Golden  ग्लोब्स  ,  लोगों   's  Choice Awards and British Academy Television  पुरस्कार   .
An  ऑनलाइन  extension  of  the series  ,   नायक  360 Experience ,  बाद   rebranded  as  नायक   evolutions  , was  निर्मित   to   explore  the  नायक   ब्रह्मांड  and  provides   इनसाइट  into the  दिखाएँ   's   mythology   .
Other  आधिकारिक  Heroes media include magazines  ,  action figures  ,   tie-in   और  interactive websites  ,   a  mobile game  ,   a  novel ,  कपडे  and other  merchandise   .
in  the fall of  2008  ,  एनबीसी   डिजिटल  Entertainment released a  श्रेणी  of online content for  the  summer  ,  including more  असली  web  सामग्री  ,  बेतार   आईटीवी  interactivity , graphic novels  उपलब्धियाँ  for  मोबाईल   देखने   और  webisodes  .
एनबीसी  announced Heroes  रद्दीकरण  on May 14  ,   2010  .
Afterward , the  संजाल  considered  बनाना   a   टेलीविज़न   खास  event  to   conclude  the series  ;  however ,  on  September 9  ,   2010   ,  NBC announced  the   निर्णय   to  stop any further  विकास  of  the  Heroes  मताधिकार  .
Tim Kring  तब   सुझाया  that  the   व्यापक   आधार   of   नायक   storylines   अनुमत   लिये   the  franchise  to  return for fans  ,  but  he   किया  not specify  जब   or  in what  मीडिया   स्वरूप   .
On  अप्रैल  17 ,  2013  , TV  लकीर  reported  कि  MSN  थी  in  बाते   to  revive  the  series with a new  डाल  .
जॉन   pierpont   ``   J.  P  .  ''
Morgan  (   अप्रैल  17 ,  1837  –  कूच   31   ,   1913   )  was an American financier  ,  banker ,  लोकसेवक  and  आर्ट  collector  जो   वर्चस्व   कॉरपोरेट   वित्त   और  industrial consolidation during his  समय   .
In 1892  मॉर्गन   arranged   the  merger  of   एडिसन  General Electric and  thomson-houston  Electric Company  to  form  सामान्य  Electric  .
After financing  the   सृष्टि   of  the  संघीय  Steel  कम्पनी   ,   he  merged in  1901  with  the  Carnegie Steel  कम्पनी  and several other steel  और  iron  व्यवसायों   ,  including  संचित  Steel  और  Wire Company owned by William  edenborn   ,  to  रूप  the United States Steel  निगम  .
Morgan  died  in Rome  ,   इटली  , in  उसके  sleep in  1913  at  the   आयु  of 75  ,  leaving his fortune  और   कारोबार   to   उसके   बेटे  , John  pierpont   ``  Jack  ''   मॉर्गन  , Jr.  ,  and bequeathing his  mansion  and large  किताब   संग्रहण  to The Morgan Library &  संग्रहालय  in  नई   यॉर्क   .
At the  ऊँचाई  of  मॉर्गन  's career during  the  early 1900s ,  he  and  उसके  partners had  वित्तीय  investments  in  many  विशाल  corporations and were  अभियुक्त  by  आलोचकों   of  controlling  the  nation  's  high finance .
He directed  the  banking coalition  कि   रोका   the  Panic of 1907  .
He  थी  the leading financier  of  the Progressive Era  ,  and  उसके  dedication to efficiency and modernization helped transform  अमरीकी  business  .
This is  a  list  of   एपीसोड   of   the   टेलीविज़न   श्रेणी   .
The episodes were  निर्देशित   by  Shigeru  ueda   और  produced  by  the Yggdrasil  कार्यपालिका   कमेटी  which included Xebec and Genco  .
the  plot of the episodes is  नियत  in Tokyo  और  revolves around  रिन  Asōgi  ,  an  अमर  private investigator  ,   as  she explores the secrets  of   आधुनिक  and  near-future   संसार  and the supernatural events that  घेर  the fictional  समाज   of  immortals like  herself  .
There are large time gaps in the internal chronology between  the   पहला   पाँच  episodes ,  ranging  from one to thirty  सालो  .
The  छह  episodes  यहूद  broadcast monthly on  at-x  channel in Japan  ,  between February 3  और   जुलाई   6  ,  2008  .
प्रत्येक  episode is  45  minutes long  .
Two pieces of  थीम   म्यूज़िक  are  प्रयुक्त  for  the  episodes  :  the opening theme ``  alsatia  ''  और   the  ending theme `` Cause Disarray '' .
दोनो  were  रचित  and performed  by   the   जापानी   मेटल   बैंड   galneryus  .
the  series  थी   उत्पादित   to   commemorate   the  tenth  वर्षगांठ   of   the   at-x  network it originally aired  on  .
Aerial photo  of   fletc   ,  where  us   डिजिटल  forensics standards were  विकसित   in   the  1980s and  '90s
Digital  forensics  ( sometimes known  as   डिजिटल  forensic science  )  is  a  branch of  forensic  science  encompassing  the  रिकवरी  and  छानबीन  of material found in digital  डिवाइस  ,  प्रायः  in  संबंध  to computer  अपराधों  .
the   पद   डिजिटल  forensics  थी   originally   प्रयुक्त  as a  पर्याय  for computer forensics but has expanded to  कवर   छानबीन   of  all devices capable  of  storing digital  आंकड़ा   .
साथ  roots  in  the personal computing revolution of  the   लेट   1970s   और  early '80s ,  the   अनुशासन   विकसित  in a haphazard  manner  during the  1990s  , and it was not until the  जल्दी  21st  सदी  that  नेशनल  policies emerged .
डिजिटल   forensics   investigations  have a variety  of   अनुप्रयोग  .
The most  आम  is to  support  or refute  a  hypothesis  पहले  criminal or  सिविल  ( as part  of  the  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  discovery  प्रक्रम  )  न्यायालयों   .
Forensics  may  also feature in  the  private  सेक्टर   ;  such as during  आतंरिक  corporate investigations or intrusion investigation  (  a specialist  जांच  into  the  nature  और  extent  of  an unauthorized network intrusion  )  .
the  technical  पहलू  of  an   छानबीन   is   विभाजित   into  several  sub-branches  , relating to  the  type of digital  डिवाइस  involved  ;  computer forensics , network  forensics   ,   forensic  data  विश्लेषण   और   मोबाईल  device forensics .
the   ठेठ  forensic process encompasses  the  seizure  ,  forensic imaging  (   अधिग्रहण   )  and analysis  of  digital  मीडिया  and the production  of  a report into  एकत्रित  evidence .
As well  as   identifying  direct evidence  of   a  crime , digital  forensics  can be  प्रयुक्त  to  विशेषता   प्रमाण  to specific suspects , confirm alibis or statements , determine intent  ,  identify  स्त्रोत   (  for example  ,   in   कापीराइट  cases  )   ,  or authenticate documents .
Investigations are much broader in scope  than  other areas  of  forensic analysis  (  where the usual aim  is  to provide  जवाब  to  a   श्रेणी   of  simpler  सवाल  ) often involving  जटिल   time-lines  or hypotheses .
A  तुलना  of the chromaticities  enclosed  by some color spaces .
A  रंग   मॉडल   is   an   अमूर्त  mathematical model describing the way colors can be represented as  tuples  of  संख्याएँ   ,  typically as three or  चार  values  or   रंग  components (  e.g  . RGB and CMYK  हैं   रंग   मॉडल  ) .
However , a color  मॉडल  with no  संबद्ध  mapping  फलन  to  an   निरपेक्ष  color space is a more  or  less  मनमानी  color system  साथ   no  connection to any globally understood system  of  color interpretation  .
Adding a certain mapping  फलन  between  the   रंग  model  और  a certain reference color  स्पेस   परिणाम  in  a   definite  `` footprint '' within the reference color space .
This  ``   पदचिह्न  '' is known as a  gamut  , and  ,   in  combination with the  रंग   मॉडल  , defines a  नई  color space .
For example , Adobe RGB and sRGB are two  अलग  absolute color spaces  ,  both based on  the  RGB  मॉडल  .
in  the most  जेनेरिक  sense  of  the definition  ऊपर  , color spaces can be defined without the use  of   a  color model  .
These spaces , such as Pantone , are in  प्रभाव  a  दिए  set  of  names or  संख्याएँ   जिससे  are  पारिभाषित   by   the  existence  of   a   सम्बन्धित   नियत   of  physical  रंग  swatches .
इस  article  focuses  on the mathematical model concept .
Labor  दिन   is  an  अमरीकी   संघीय   अवकाश   observed  on the  पहला  Monday in  सितंबर  ,  कि   मनाता   the   आर्थिक   और  social  योगदान  of  मजदूर   .
Life  बीमे  is a contract between an  insured  ( insurance policy  होल्डर  ) and an  insurer  , where the  insurer   वादे  to pay a designated  लाभार्थी  a sum of  धन  ( the `` benefits  ''  ) upon the death of the  insured  person .
Depending on  the  contract , other events such  as  terminal illness  or  critical illness  may  also trigger payment .
The policy holder typically  pays  a premium , either regularly or as  a   lump   योग   .
Other expenses (  ऐसे  as  अंत्येष्टि  expenses  )   हैं  also sometimes included  in  the benefits .
जीवन  policies are legal  अनुबंध  and the terms  of   the   अनुबंध  describe the limitations  of   the  insured events  .
विशिष्ट  exclusions are often written  into  the contract  to  limit the liability of  the   insurer  ; common  उदाहरण   हैं   दावा  relating  to  suicide , fraud  ,  war , riot  और   सिविल   commotion   .
Life-based  अनुबंध  tend to fall into  दो   प्रमुख   categories:
Protection policies – designed to  provide  a  लाभ  in  the   इवेंट  of  निर्दिष्ट  event , typically a lump  योग   भुगतान   .
a   आम  form  of   इस   डिज़ाइन  is  पद  insurance  .
Investment  नीतियों  –  जहाँ  the main objective is to facilitate the growth  of   पूंजी  by  नियमित   or  single  प्रीमियम  .
Common  फ़ॉर्म  (  in  the US )  हैं   पूरे   जीवन  , universal  जीवन  and variable life policies  .
