चाइनीज   नई   साल
9   –  12 February  (   वियतनाम   )
Mitzi  gaynor  Donahue  (   born  May  2  ,  1962   in  Yorba  लिंडा  ,  नारंगी  County ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   )   is  an American actress , also  credited   और  more popularly  ज्ञात   as  Mitzi Kapture .
kapture  began  उसके  career in  films  ,  सबसे   of  which were  नहीं  huge commercial  सफलताओं  .
वो  went on to  मेक   a  few television guest  दिखावे  ( MacGyver  ,  1st &  टेन   ,   और   as  a contestant on The  $  100,000  पिरामिड   )  before  वो  gained  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  exposure with her first major television role  as   सार्जेंट   रीता  Lee Lance in the television  श्रेणी   रेशा  Stalkings .
Kapture  's  role  as   रीता  , the  अन्य  half of the two ``  sams  ''  लिये  almost 5  सालो  ,  cemented  her  लोकप्रियता  .
युग्म  with Rob Estes  जो   निभाई  Sergeant  क्रिस   lorenzo   ,   kapture  gained  वैश्विक   मान्यता   साथ  with her  costar  since the  दिखाएँ   थी  broadcast  in  several  देशों  .
Sergeant Lance eventually became  लेफ्टिनेंट   तलवार  by the  समय  Kapture left  the  series  in  1995 to  have  her  पहला   चाइल्ड   मैडिसन  .
During  उसके   समय   साथ  the  श्रेणी   ,  Kapture briefly  सत  in the director  's   कुर्सी  , for  दो  episodes  .
She was  interviewed   लिये  the Silk Stalkings Season 1 DVD which  थी   वितरित  by Anchor Bay Entertainment  और  released in  सितंबर   2004   .
After a short  अंतराल  from the  स्क्रीन   following  her  निकास  from  रेशा  Stalkings  ,  Kapture  लौटे  in  1997  to  the  small  स्क्रीन  and  यूएसए  Network  .
वो   निभाई   सीसे  roles in two  यूएसए   तस्वीरें  Originals telemovies  ,  Perfect Crime ( based on a  सच्चा  story , also called Hide  और   तलाश   :  The Joanne  जेन्सेन   स्टोरी  )  ,  which also starred Jasmine Guy and His Bodyguard .
She  बाद  starred in  a  few  अन्य  independent film projects  और  theatre productions and had several television guest appearances .
Kapture  भी  had  a  recurring role  on   बेवाच  as Alexis  ryker   .
She played  अनीता  Hodges  on  The  यंग   और  the  बेचैन   इससे  2002  through  2004 , where she was  credited   as  Mitzi Kapture  donahue  , and starred in  the  made-for-TV movie Night of Terror which premiered March 26 , 2006 on  आजीवन   संजाल  .
Her latest is a supporting role  in   परमेश्वर  's Ears ,  released  in 2007  .
Kapture is  the  official celebrity spokesperson  लिये  the Xeroderma  pigmentosum   समाज  .
the  Xbox 360 is the second video game  कंसोल   विकसित   by   और   उत्पादित   लिये   microsoft  and the successor to  the  Xbox .
The  एक्सबॉक्स  360 competes with Sony 's PlayStation 3  और  Nintendo 's Wii  as   भाग  of  the   सातवाँ   पीढी   of   वीडियो  game  consoles  .
as  of  सितंबर  30 , 2012 , 70 million Xbox  360  consoles have  महरूम  sold worldwide  .
The Xbox 360 was officially  अनावरण   on   एमटीवी   on  May 12  ,  2005 ,  साथ  detailed  लॉन्च  and game information  divulged  later  कि  month at  the   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   entertainment  Expo  (   e3   )  .
The  कंसोल   बेची  out  completely   upon  release in  सब   regions   मगर  in  जापानी   .
Several  प्रमुख  features of the Xbox 360 are its integrated  एक्सबॉक्स   सजीव  service that allows  खिलाड़ी  to compete online  ;   डाउनलोड   आर्केड  games ,  खेल  demos  ,   trailers   ,  TV  shows  , music  और  movies  ;   और  its Windows  मीडिया   बीच   मल्टीमीडिया  capabilities .
The Xbox  सजीव  also offers  अभिगम  to various ( often region-specific )  third-party  media  स्ट्रीमिंग   अनुप्रयोग   .
at  their  e3  presentation  on  June 14  ,   2010   ,  Microsoft announced a redesigned Xbox 360 that would  जलयान  on the same day .
the  redesigned console  is   slimmer   than  the previous Xbox  360  model and  सुविधाएँ  integrated 802.11 b/g/n  wi-fi  ,  toslink  S/PDIF optical  ऑडियो  output , five  usb  2.0  पोर्ट   (   compared   to  the three  इससे   पुरानी   संस्करण  ) and  a  special AUX port .
Older  मॉडल   of  the  एक्सबॉक्स   360   have   चूंकि  been discontinued .
The  पहला  new console to  be  released  सुविधाएँ  a 250 GB hard drive , while  a   बाद  , less expensive SKU  सुविधाएँ  4 GB internal storage .
Backpack  may   भी  refer  to  a 2001 novel  by  Emily Barr
a  modern  backpack
स्विस   फौज  backpack ca . 1960
Integrated  तुमको   फ़्रेम   .
a  backpack  (   भी   पुकारा  rucksack , knapsack , packsack  ,  pack )  is   ,  in  इसके  simplest  रूप   ,  a  cloth  sack  carried  on one 's  वापस  and secured with  दो  straps that  go   over   the  shoulders , but there can be exceptions  .
lightweight   प्रकार  of  backpacks  are sometimes worn  on   तभी  one shoulder  डोरी   .
Backpacks are often preferred  to  handbags  लिये   carrying   भारी   loads   or   carrying   कोई   sort   of  equipment , because of the limited  क्षमता   to  carry heavy  weights  for long periods of time  in   the   हैंड्स  .
Large backpacks ,  प्रयुक्त   to   carry  loads  over  10 kg ( 22 lbs )  ,   प्रायः  offload  the  largest part ( up to about  90   %   )  of  उनके  weight  onto   padded  hip  बेल्ट   ,   leaving  the shoulder straps  मुख्यतः   लिये   stabilising  the  लोड  .
This  improves  the  संभावित  to carry heavy  loads   ,   as  the hips are stronger than  the  shoulders  ,   और   भी  increases  चपलता   और   संतुलन   ,  since the load rides  nearer  the wearer 's own  बीच  of mass .
In  प्राचीन   टाइम्स   ,  the backpack  थी  used as  a  means to carry  the  hunter 's  larger  game  और  other types  of  prey  और  as a  रास्ता  of easier transport for other  सामग्री  .
in   the   मामले  of  larger  hunts , the hunters would  dismember  their prey and  वितरित  the pieces  of  the  एनिमल  around  ,  each one  पैकिंग  the meat  into  many wrappings  और   तब   into  bags  जिससे   वे  placed on  to  their backs  .
The  थैला  itself  थी   बना   up  of different animal hide and skin  (   depending  on what  sorts  of  पशु  were in the area  )   और  sewn  साथ   by  the intestines of said  पशु  ,  जिससे  were  woven   साथ   tightly  to  मेक   a   sturdy  thread-like  सामग्री  .
Mexico  (  ;  ;   )  ,  officially  the  संयुक्त   मैक्सिकन  States  (  )  ,   is   a  federal constitutional republic  in  North America .
It is bordered  on   the  north by the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ; on the south and west by  the  Pacific Ocean  ;   on   the   southeast  by Guatemala , Belize ,  और  the  caribbean  Sea  ;  and on  the  east by the Gulf  of  Mexico .
covering  almost  दो  million square kilometres  (   over   760,000  sq  mi   )   ,  Mexico is the fifth  largest   देश   in  the Americas  by   कुल  area and  the   13th   largest  independent  स्वदेश  in the world .
साथ  an estimated population  of  over  113  million , it is  the   संसार  's eleventh  सबसे  populous  देश  and the most  populous   spanish-speaking  country .
Mexico  is   a   संघ  comprising thirty-one states and a  संघीय  District  ,  the  पूंजी  city .
In pre-Columbian Mexico  अनेक  cultures matured into  उन्नत   सभ्यताओं  such as the Olmec  ,   the  Toltec ,  the   teotihuacan  ,  the   zapotec   ,   the   माया   और  the  एज़टेक  before first contact with  europeans  .
In 1521 ,  स्पेन   conquered  and colonized the territory  इससे  its base in México-Tenochtitlan  ,  which was  administered  as  the  Viceroyalty of  नई   स्पेन  .
This territory  होता  eventually become Mexico  following  recognition of the  उपनिवेश   's  independence  in  1821  .
The post-independence  काल  was characterized  by  economic instability ,  the  Mexican-American War  और  territorial cession  to  the United States ,  a   सिविल   युद्ध  , two  empires   और   a  domestic dictatorship  .
The  latter  led  to  the Mexican Revolution  in  1910 ,  जिससे  culminated  साथ  the  promulgation   of   the  1917  संविधान  and  the   emergence   of  the country  's  current  राजनैतिक   प्रणाली   .
चुनावों  held  in   जुलाई   2000  marked the first  समय   कि  an opposition party won the  प्रेसिडेंसी  from  the   संस्थागत   क्रांतिकारी   पार्टी  .
Since 2006  the  country  रै   महरूम   in   the  midst of a drug war which  रै  caused  60,000  deaths  .
Mexico has  एक   of  the world 's largest  economies  ,  और   is  considered both  a  regional  शक्ति  and  मध्य   शक्ति  .
In addition  ,  Mexico was the first Latin American member  of   the  Organisation  लिये   आर्थिक   co-operation  and Development OECD  (  since  1994  ) ,  और   माना  an upper-middle  आय  country by the World Bank  .
मैक्सिको  is considered a  newly   industrialized  country  और   an  emerging power  .
It has  the   fourteenth  largest nominal  जीडीपी   और   the   eleventh  largest GDP by  खरीदना  power parity .
The economy is strongly  linked   to  those  of  its  उत्तर  American  फ़्री   व्यापार  Agreement (  nafta   )  partners , especially the United  राज्य  of America  .
मैक्सिको   बाँधने   छठे  in  the  world  और   पहला   in   the   americas   by   क्रमांक   of  UNESCO  संसार  Heritage Sites  साथ   31   ,   और  in 2007 was  the   दसवाँ  most visited country in the world with 21.4 million international arrivals per  साल  .
Babe Ruth  holds   the  MLB  करियर  slugging  प्रतिशत   रिकार्ड  ( .690  )  .
in   बेसबॉल  statistics ,  slugging   प्रतिशत   (  abbreviated SLG ) is a  लोकप्रिय  measure of  the  power of a hitter  .
it  is calculated as total  bases  divided  by  at bats :
जहाँ  AB is the number of at-bats for a  दिए  player  ,  and 1B  ,   2b  , 3B ,  और  HR are  the  number of  singles  ,  युगल  , triples , and  घर   रनों  ,  क्रमशः  .
सैर  are specifically excluded from  इस  calculation .
For  उदाहरण   ,  in 1920 ,  बेब  Ruth  निभाई   उसके   पहला   ऋतु  for the  नई  York  यांकीज़  .
In 458  at   bats   ,  Ruth  था  172  हिट्स  , comprising  73   singles   ,   36  doubles ,  9  triples  ,   और  54  घर  runs , which  brings   the  total  आधार  count  to  ( 73  ×  1  )   +   (  36 ×  2  ) + ( 9 × 3 ) +  (  54  ×  4 ) = 388  .
His total  क्रमांक   of  bases (  388  ) divided  by  his  कुल   at-bats   (  458 )  is  .847  ,  his slugging percentage for the  ऋतु  .
the   अगला  year  he  slugged .846  ,  and these records  गई  unbroken until 2001  ,  when  बैरी  Bonds achieved  411   bases   in   476  at-bats  ,   bringing   उसके   slugging  percentage to .863 ,  बेमेल  since .
is a role-playing  वीडियो  game developed  और   प्रकाशित   by  Square  (  now  वर्गाकार  Enix  )  for the Super  निन्टेंडो   entertainment  System  in  1995  .
chrono  Trigger 's development  टोली   शामिल  three designers that  वर्गाकार   उतावले  the `` Dream  टोली   ''   :  Hironobu  sakaguchi  , the creator  of  Square  's  Final  काल्पनिक  series ; Yuji  horii  , a  freelance  designer  और   निर्माता   of  Enix  's  popular Dragon Quest series ; and  अकिरा   toriyama  , a  freelance  manga artist famed for his work with  ड्रैगन   क्वेस्ट   और   ड्रैगन  Ball  .
Kazuhiko  aoki  produced the  खेल  ,  masato   काटो   लिखा   सबसे  of  the  plot ,  जबकि  composer Yasunori Mitsuda scored  सबसे  of  the  game before falling  बीमार  and deferring remaining tracks to Final  काल्पनिक  composer  nobuo  Uematsu .
The game  's   स्टोरी  follows a  समूह   of  adventurers who travel  through  time to  prevent   a   वैश्विक  catastrophe .
वर्गाकार   re-released   a  ported  संस्करण   by   tose  in  जापानी   लिये  Sony  's  PlayStation in  1999  ,  बाद  repackaged with a Final  काल्पनिक   iv  port as Final  काल्पनिक  Chronicles  in   2001   लिये  the North American market  .
A slightly  उन्नत  Chrono Trigger  थी  released for the  निन्टेंडो  DS on November  25   ,  2008  ,   in  North America  और  Japan , and went on sale  in  Australia  on   फ़रवरी  3 , 2009  और  in  यूरोपीय  on  फ़रवरी  6  ,  2009 .
the   खेल  was never  released   in   pal   territories   पहले  the  निन्टेंडो  DS  संस्करण  .
chrono  Trigger was a  नाजुक  and commercial success upon release and  is   माना   आज  to  be  one  of   the  greatest video games  of   सब  time .
Nintendo  शक्ति  magazine described aspects of Chrono  ट्रिगर  as revolutionary  ,   सहित   इसके   अनेक  endings ,  plot-related  sidequests focusing  on  character development , unique battle  प्रणाली  , and  विस्तृत  graphics .
Chrono Trigger was the third  best-selling  game  of   1995   ,  and  the  game 's  snes  and  प्लेस्टेशन   iterations   have  shipped  2.65  million copies as  of  March 2003 .
The  संस्करण  for  the   निन्टेंडो   ds  sold 790,000  नक़ल  as of March 2009  .
Chrono Trigger  थी   भी   ported  to mobile  फोन   ,   आभासी   कंसोल   ,  the  प्लेस्टेशन  Network (  तभी   in  the  यूएसए  )  ,   आईओएस  devices  ,  and  एंड्रॉइड   डिवाइस  .
बकरी   चीज
Goat  चीज   ,   or   chèvre  ( from the  फ्रेंच  word for  बकरी  ) , is cheese  बना  out of  the  milk of goats  .
अतिताप   is  elevated body  तापमान   due   to  failed thermoregulation  कि   occurs   जब  a body  produces  or  absorbs  more heat than it dissipates .
Extreme  तापमान   उन्नयन  then becomes a  चिकित्सा   आपात   requiring  immediate  उपचार   to   prevent  disability  or   मौत  .
The most  आम   कल्याणकारी   शामिल   ऊष्मा  stroke and  प्रतिकूल  reactions to drugs .
The former is  an   अधि  temperature elevation  caused  by exposure to excessive heat , or  संयोजन   of   ऊष्मा  and humidity ,  कि   overwhelms  the  heat-regulating  mechanisms .
The latter is a relatively  विरल   पक्ष  effect of  अनेक  drugs , particularly those that affect  the   सेंट्रल   बेचैन  system  .
Malignant hyperthermia is  a  rare complication of  कुछ  types  of   सामान्य  anesthesia .
अतिताप   can  also  be  deliberately  induced  using  दवाएँ   or  medical  डिवाइस   और   may   be  used  in   the   उपचार  of some kinds  of  cancer  और   अन्य  conditions , most commonly in  संयोजन  with  radiotherapy  .
Hyperthermia  differs  from  ज्वर  in  कि  the body 's  तापमान   नियत  point remains unchanged .
The opposite is hypothermia  ,   जिससे  occurs  जब  the  तापमान  drops  नीचे   कि  required to  maintain   सामान्य  metabolism .
Belize , is  a   देश  located on  the   northeastern  coast of  सेंट्रल   अमेरिका  .
It is  the   तभी   देश  in  the   क्षेत्रफल  where  अंग्रेज़ी  is  the   आधिकारिक  language  ,  although  kriol   और  Spanish are more  commonly  spoken .
बेलीज़  is  bordered  on the  उत्तर  by  मैक्सिको  ,  to  the south and  वेस्ट  by Guatemala  और  to the east  by  the Caribbean  समुद्र  .
Its  मेनलैंड   is   परिचय   long  and  चौड़ी   .
With  of  land and a population of  तभी   312,698   निवासियों   (  2010  जनसांख्यिकी   )   ,  Belize  possesses  the lowest  जनसांख्यिकी   घनत्व  in  सेंट्रल  America .
The  देश  's population  विकास  rate  of   3.15  % ( 2012  est  . )  is   the   दूसरी   उच्चतम  in the  प्रदेश   और  one  of  the highest  in  the  पश्चिमी  hemisphere .
Belize 's abundance of  स्थलीय   और  marine  प्रजाति  , and  इसके   विविधता   of  ecosystems give  it   a   कुंजी  place within the  globally   significant   mesoamerican  Biological Corridor  .
Belize has a diverse society , comprising many cultures  और  languages  .
It is  the   तभी  nation in  the   प्रदेश  with a British  औपनिवेशिक  heritage  ,  but as  a   भाग  of  the  Western  caribbean   मण्डल   ,   it  also shares  a  common heritage with the fellow Anglophone  caribbean   देशों  .
in  general ,  बेलीज़   is  considered to  be  a  सेंट्रल  American  और   caribbean  nation  साथ   दमदार  ties  to  both the  caribbean   और  Latin  अमेरिका   .
बेलीज़   is   a  member  of   the   caribbean  Community  (   caricom   )  , the Community  of   लैटिन  American and Caribbean  राज्य  ( CELAC ) ,  और  Central American  संयोजन  System ( SICA  )   .
Belize  is   ज्ञात  for  इसके   सितंबर  Celebrations ,  और   is  the birthplace  of  chewing  गम   और  Punta Rock  .
the  ``  बेट्सी  Ross ''  ध्वज
a  `` Betsy  रॉस  '' flag  उड़ती  outside San  फ्रांसिस्को  City Hall
The  बेट्सी   रॉस  flag is an early  डिज़ाइन  of  the   ध्वज  of  the  United  राज्य  ,  popularly   attributed  to Betsy Ross  ,  using the common motifs  of   प्रत्यावर्ती   red-and-white   धारीदार   फ़ील्ड  with five-pointed  सितारों  in a  ब्लू  canton .
The flag was designed during the American Revolution  और  features  13  stars  to  represent the original 13  colonies  .
The distinctive feature of the  रॉस  flag is  the  arrangement of  the  stars in a circle .
हालांकि  the Betsy  रॉस   स्टोरी   is  accepted by most Americans  ,   कुछ   ध्वज  historians and  revisionists   do   नहीं  accept the  बेट्सी   रॉस  design as the  पहला  American flag .
According to the traditional  खाता  ,  the  original flag was  बना  in June 1776 , when  a   छोटी  committee—including  जार्ज  Washington ,  रॉबर्ट   मॉरिस  and relative George  रॉस   —visited   बेट्सी  and  discussed   the   need  for a  नई  American flag  .
Betsy  स्वीकृत  the  जॉब   to   manufacture   the  flag , altering  the  committee  's  design by  replacing   the   six-pointed  stars with five-pointed  सितारों   .
While  the  Betsy  रॉस  legend is  questionable  , the  ध्वज  design is known to have been  in  use by 1777 ;  अल्फ्रेड   b  .  गली  described it at the  आत्मसमर्पण   of   सामान्य   burgoyne  and understood the  वृत्त   of  stars to represent equality  among  the American states .
It  is  one of the oldest versions of  u.S.   ध्वज  known to exist  ;   जबकि  it is  नहीं   the  oldest surviving flag  centuries  in cloth  रूप  ,  इसके  likeness appears on older physical relics  ,  namely  ,   the  contemporary  रणभूमि  paintings  by  John Trumbull and Charles Willson Peale  .
They depict  the   गोलाकार  star  व्यवस्था   होने  flown from  जलयान   masts   और  many other places ,  और   यूँ   provide  the first  ज्ञात   ऐतिहासिक   दस्तावेज़ीकरण  of the flag 's appearance .
The seal  of  the U.S. Department of Veterans  अफेयर्स   उपयोग   the  Betsy  रॉस  flag  to   represent   सेवा   to  all  दिग्गजों   इससे  the  अमरीकी   क्रान्ति   to  the present day .
the  Betsy  रॉस  design of  13-star  US flags has been featured in many popular  artworks  ( sometimes  inaccurately   ,   as  in Washington Crossing the Delaware ) and films , such  as  the 1960 version of  pollyanna   .
the  flag  continues  to be  एक  of  the   सबसे  popular  प्रतीकों   of  the American Revolution .
a  purr is a  ध्वनि   बना   by  all  प्रजाति  of felids and  is   a   भाग   of   बिल्ली  communication .
It varies  between   बिल्लियों   (  for  उदाहरण  by loudness and  टोन   )  , and  इससे   प्रजाति   to  species ,  लकिन  can be  characterized   as   a  tonal  गुलजार  .
the  term `` purring ''  रै   महरूम  used  liberally  in  साहित्य  ,  और   it  has been claimed that viverrids  (   सीविट   ,  mongoose  ,  genet )  ,  bears ,  badgers   ,  hyaenas  (  et  cetera   )   purr   .
अन्य  animals  कि  have  महरूम  said to purr  हैं  rabbits ,  squirrels  , guinea  सूअर  , tapirs  ,  ring-tailed lemurs ,  हाथियों   ,   raccoons  and gorillas while eating  .
However ,  using  a strict  परिभाषा   of   purring   कि  continuous  ध्वनि   उत्पादन   जरूर   वैकल्पिक  between  pulmonic  egressive and ingressive airstream  (  and usually go  on   लिये   मिनट्स  ) ,  पीटर्स  ( 2002 )  ,  in an exhaustive review of  the  scientific literature , reached the conclusion that until then only ‘purring  cats’  ( Felidae  )  and  दो  species  of  genets , Genetta tigrina  ,  and most likely also  genetta  genetta  ,  had  महरूम  documented to purr .
the  platypus (  ornithorhynchus  anatinus ) is a semiaquatic mammal endemic to eastern  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , including Tasmania  .
साथ   साथ   the   चार   प्रजाति   of  echidna , it is  एक  of the five extant  प्रजाति  of monotremes ,  the  only mammals  कि   lay  eggs  बजाय  of giving  जनम   .
It is the  एकमात्र   जीना  representative  of   इसके   परिवार   (  Ornithorhynchidae  )  and genus ( Ornithorhynchus ) , though  a   क्रमांक  of related  प्रजाति   have  been found  in   the  fossil record .
the  unusual appearance of this egg-laying , duck  -billed   ,  beaver  -tailed   ,   otter  -footed  स्तनधारी  baffled European naturalists when  वे   पहला   encountered  it  ,   साथ  some  considering  it  an   विस्तृत  fraud  .
It  is  one of the  few  venomous mammals  ,   the   पुरूष   platypus   having  a spur on the hind  पैर  that  delivers  a  venom  capable  of  causing  कठोर  pain  to  humans .
The  अद्वितीय   सुविधाएँ  of  the  platypus  मेक  it an important  विषय  in the study  of  evolutionary biology and a  recognisable   और  iconic symbol of  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   ;   it  has  appeared  as a mascot  at  national events and  is   प्रदर्शित  on  the   रिवर्स  of  इसके   20-cent   सिक्का  .
the   platypus  is the animal  emblem   of  the  राज्य  of  नई   दक्षिण  Wales .
Until  the  early  20th   सदी  ,  it  was  hunted   लिये   इसके   फर   ,   लकिन  it is  अभी   सुरक्षित  throughout its range  .
Although captive breeding programmes  have  had only limited success and  the   platypus  is vulnerable to the  प्रभाव   of  pollution  ,  it is  नहीं   अंतर्गत  any immediate  threat  .
st.   एलिज़ाबेथ  is a village  in   मिलर  County , Missouri ,  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
the   जनसांख्यिकी   थी  336 at the 2010 census  .
wilton  is a  census-designated  place ( CDP )  in  Sacramento  काउंटी  , California , United States .
it  is part of the  sacramento   –  Arden-Arcade – Roseville Metropolitan Statistical Area .
The population  थी  5,363  at  the  2010   जनसांख्यिकी  , up  इससे   4,551   at  the  2000  census .
In human-computer interaction , cut and  paste  and copy and paste  हैं   सम्बन्धित  commands that offer a user-interface interaction  तकनीक   लिये  transferring text , data , files  or  objects  इससे   a   सोर्स   to  a destination .
Most  ubiquitously   ,  users  आवश्यकता  the  क्षमता  to cut and paste sections of plain text .
The  काटें   कमांड  removes the selected  आंकड़ा  from  इसके   असली  position ,  जबकि   the   नक़ल   कमांड  creates a  नकल  ;  in   दोनो  cases the selected data is placed in  a   clipboard   .
The  आंकड़ा  in the clipboard is later inserted in  the  position where the paste  कमांड   is  issued .
The  कमांड  names are  an  interface metaphor based  on  the physical procedure used in manuscript editing  to   बनाएँ  a  पेज  layout  .
This  बातचीत  technique  रै  close associations with  सम्बन्धित  techniques in graphical  उपयोक्ता   अंतरफलक  that use pointing  डिवाइस   ऐसे   as   a   कंप्यूटर  mouse (  by  drag and drop  ,   लिये  example  )  .
आर्थिक   अनुक्रम   मात्रा   is   the   अनुक्रम   मात्रा  that minimizes  कुल   inventory  holding costs  और  ordering  लागत   .
it   is   एक   of   the  oldest  शास्त्रीय   उत्पादन  scheduling models  .
the   फ्रेमवर्क   प्रयुक्त  to determine this order  मात्रा   is  also known  as  Barabas EOQ Model  or  Barabas  सूत्र   .
The model  थी   विकसित  by  घाट  W. Harris in 1913 ,  लकिन  R. H. Wilson ,  a   सलाहकार   जो   लागू  it extensively  ,  is given credit for  उसके  in-depth analysis  .
Stephen  ``  Stevie ''  रे  Vaughan  (  October 3 ,  1954   –   अगस्त  27 , 1990 )  थी   an   अमरीकी  guitarist ,  singer-songwriter   ,  and  रिकार्ड   निर्माता   .
Often referred to by  उसके   आद्याक्षर  SRV ,  vaughan  is best known as  a   founding   सदस्य  and leader of Double  ट्रबल  .
Together  साथ   वादक  Chris Layton  और   bassist   टॉमी  Shannon , they ignited  the   ब्लूज़  revival  of  the 1980s .
With a career spanning seven  सालो  ,  vaughan  and Double  ट्रबल   consistently   बेची   आउट   कॉन्सर्ट   जबकि  their  एल्बम  frequently went  सुनहरा  .
He  थी   born   और   उठाया  in Dallas ,  टेक्सास  , and for a short  काल   of   समय  lived  in   ग्राहम  ,  टेक्सास   .
as  the  younger   bhai  of Jimmie Vaughan , Vaughan started playing the guitar at age seven  और  formed several  bands  that  occasionally   performed  in  लोकल  nightclubs .
At age 17  ,  he dropped out  of  high school  और  moved to Austin  to   further   pursue   उसके   musical  career  ,  joining groups such as Krackerjack ,  the  Nightcrawlers  ,  and the Cobras .
In 1977  ,   he   formed  Triple Threat Revue , a  बैंड   कि   आखिरकार   विकसित   into  Double  ट्रबल  and  regularly  performed  around  Austin .
In  1982  ,  vaughan  and Double  ट्रबल  performed at  the   montreux   जैज़  Festival  in   स्विट्ज़रलैंड   ,  catching the  ध्यान  of  संगीतकारों  David  बोवी   और  Jackson  browne   .
Bowie  पूछा   vaughan  to  खेल   on  his upcoming  स्टुडियो  album Let 's Dance ,  जबकि  Browne offered the band  फ़्री  use of his personal  स्टुडियो   in   लॉस  Angeles  to  record an  एल्बम   .
In  कूच  1983 ,  vaughan   और   दोगुना  Trouble were signed to Epic Records by  दिग्गज  record  निर्माता  John Hammond Sr.  और  released their debut  एल्बम  , Texas Flood in  जून  of that  साल  .
बाद  successful  touring  , the  समूह   released  the albums ,  could  n't  स्टैंड  the Weather (  1984   )  and  आत्मा  to  आत्मा   (   1985   )   ,   the  latter of  जिससे  featured new  keyboardist   रीज़   wynans  .
Although his career  था  progressed  सफलतापूर्वक  ,  vaughan   checked  into a rehabilitation hospital  in  Atlanta ,  जॉर्जिया  to give up a  कोका   और  alcohol habit  और  returned to touring  साथ   the   बैंड  .
in   जून  1989 ,  in   कदम  was released  और  earned them a Grammy Award  लिये   बेहतरीन  Contemporary Blues Performance  .
on  August 27 ,  1990  ,  vaughan   थी   मारे   in   a   हेलीकाप्टर  crash  following  a performance in East Troy , Wisconsin .
vaughan  's uniquely  eclectic  yet intense style was derived from a  किस्में  of musical genres .
He  थी  influenced by blues musicians including Albert  किंग  ,  फ्रेडी  King ,  ओटिस  Rush  ,  and  muddy   waters  ,  और  rock  guitarists  such  as  Jimi  हेंड्रिक्स  and Lonnie  mack  .
उसके   गिटार  playing reflected the classic blues  और   pentatonic   तराजू  .
He has received wide  नाजुक   मान्यता  for  उसके   गिटार  playing ,  रैंकिंग  at # 6 on Rolling Stones list  of   ``  100 Greatest  guitarists   ''  in 2011  .
He was posthumously  inducted   into  the  ब्लूज़  Hall of Fame  in  2000 and a memorial  प्रतिमा   थी  erected  in  Austin  's  Auditorium Shores park  .
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely  माना   to  be one  of  the greatest musicians to come  इससे  the state  of   टेक्सास  .
the  Las  वेगास   स्ट्रिप  World  of   coca-cola  museum in  2003
Coca-Cola is  a  carbonated  नरम  drink  बेची  in stores , restaurants  ,  and vending machines in every country except Cuba and  उत्तर   कोरियाई  .
it   is   उत्पादित  by  the   coca-cola   कम्पनी  of  अटलांटा   ,   जॉर्जिया  , and is often referred  to  simply as Coke ( a registered trademark of  the   coca-cola   कम्पनी  in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  since March 27  ,  1944 )  .
originally  intended as  a  patent  आयुर्विज्ञान  when  it  was  invented   in  the late  19th  century by John Pemberton , Coca-Cola was bought out by  बिजनेसमैन  Asa Griggs Candler ,  जिनकी  marketing  tactics  led Coke  to   इसके  dominance of the world  soft-drink  market throughout  the  20th century .
The company  produces  concentrate  ,   जिससे   is  then sold to  licensed  Coca-Cola bottlers  throughout  the world .
the  bottlers  ,  who hold territorially  विशेष  contracts with the  कम्पनी   ,   उपज   समाप्त  product in cans and bottles  इससे  the  concentrate  in  संयोजन  with filtered water  और  sweeteners .
The bottlers  तब  sell ,  वितरित  and merchandise Coca-Cola  to  retail  स्टोर्स  and vending machines .
Such bottlers  शामिल  Coca-Cola Enterprises , which is the largest single Coca-Cola bottler in North America  और   पश्चिमी  Europe  .
The  coca-cola  Company also sells  concentrate   लिये   सोडा  fountains to major restaurants and  खाना  service distributors .
The Coca-Cola  कम्पनी  has  ,  on  अवसर   ,  introduced other cola drinks under  the   कोक  brand name .
The most  आम  of these is  आहार  Coke , with  अन्य  including  caffeine-free   coca-cola  , Diet  कोक   caffeine-free  , Coca-Cola Cherry , Coca-Cola Zero , Coca-Cola Vanilla  ,   और   खास  versions with lemon , lime or coffee .
Based  on  Interbrand 's  बेहतरीन   वैश्विक   ब्रांड  2011  ,   coca-cola   थी  the world  's   सबसे  valuable  ब्रांड  .
Barry Louis Larkin (  born  April 28 , 1964 )  is   a  retired  प्रमुख  League Baseball player .
larkin  played shortstop for the  सिनसिनाटी   लाल  from 1986  to  2004  और  was one  of   the  pivotal  खिलाड़ी  on the  1990  Reds  '  World  श्रेणी  championship team  .
Larkin was elected to the National Baseball  हॉल   of   कीर्ति   in  January 2012 and was  inducted  on  जुलाई   22   .
Larkin is considered one of  the   शीर्ष  players of  उसके  era  ,  winning  नौ  Silver Slugger awards and  तीन  Gold Glove awards .
He was  चयनित   to  the Major  लीग  All-Star  खेल  twelve  टाइम्स  , and  थी  elected  the  1995  नेशनल  League Most Valuable Player .
Brasília ( ) is the federal  पूंजी   of  Brazil  और   the  seat  of  government of  the  Federal District .
administratively   ,  the  नगर  is  स्तिथ  in the  संघीय  District which is in  the  Central-West  प्रदेश  .
physically  ,  it   is  located  in  the  ब्राज़ीलियाई  Highlands .
It has  a   जनसांख्यिकी  of about  2,562,963  ( 3,716,996 in the metropolitan area  )  as of the  2008  IBGE estimate  ,   बनाना  it the fourth  largest   नगर   in  Brazil .
However  ,   as  a metropolitan area  ,  it  बाँधने   निम्नतर  at sixth  in  population  .
Brasília is the  largest  city  in   the  world  कि  did not  मौजूद  at  the   शुरूआत  of  the   20th  century .
brasília  has  the   पांचवां  largest  जीडीपी   among   लैटिन  American cities and  the   तीसरा  in  ब्राज़ील  .
At around  r   $  62,000  ब्राज़ीलियाई  reais (  बराबर  to  लगभग  $ 30,900 US  डॉलर  or  €23,000  euros )  ,  the  नगर   's   प्रति  capita income is  the  highest among Brazil  's   largest  cities  .
As the  नेशनल  capital , Brasília is the  सीट  of all  तीन  branches of the  संघीय   सरकारी   of  Brazil  .
The city  भी   होस्ट  the  मुख्यालय   of   अनेक   ब्राज़ीलियाई  companies .
Planning policies such  as   the  location  of  residential buildings around  expansive  urban areas  ,   as  well as building  the  city around large avenues and  dividing   it  into sectors  ,  have sparked  a  debate and reflection on  जीवन  in big  शहरों   in   the  20th  सदी   .
the   नगर  's  डिज़ाइन  divides it into numbered  ब्लॉक  as  खूब  as  सेक्टर  for specified activities , such as the  होटल  Sector  ,  the  बैंकिंग  Sector or the Embassy Sector  .
Brasília hosts 124 foreign  embassies   .
the  city  थी  planned and  विकसित  in  1956  with Lúcio  कोस्टा  as  the  principal urban planner , Oscar Niemeyer  as  the principal  वास्तु  and  रॉबर्टो   burle   मार्क्स   as  the  लैंडस्केप  designer .
Brasilia is  in   the  Unesco 's  संसार  Hertitage List  due  to  इसके   वास्तुकला  .
On April 22  ,  1960  ,  it formally became Brazil 's  नेशनल   पूंजी   .
viewed  from above , the main portion  of   the   नगर  resembles  an   वायुयान   or  a butterfly .
The city  is   commonly  referred  to  as  पूंजी   संघीय  , or simply  bsb  .
Residents  of   brasília   हैं   ज्ञात   as  brasilienses or  candangos   (  the  latter  referring  to  those not  born  in  the  city but  जो   migrated   वहीँ  after  it   थी  established )  .
In local usage  ,  the  शब्द  `` Brasília  ''  usually refers only to  the   पहला   प्रशासनिक  Region  (   ra   i   )  within  the  Federal  ज़िला   (   distrito  Federal ) ,  जहाँ   the   सबसे  important government  इमारतें  are located .
brasília  has  a  unique status  in   ब्राज़ील   ,  as it is an administrative  प्रभाग   बल्कि   than   a  legal municipality  जैसे   nearly  all  शहरों  in Brazil .
Nationally , the  पद   is  almost always used synonymously  साथ  the  संघीय  District  ,  which constitutes an indivisible Federative Unit , analogous to a state  .
Several  ``  satellite cities ''  मौजूद  which  हैं  also part of  the  Federal District .
brasília   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport is the  प्रमुख   विमानक्षेत्र  in Brasília , connecting the  पूंजी  to all major Brazilian  शहरों   और  many  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   गंतव्यों   .
it   is  the  तीसरा  most important airport  in  Brazil  ,  in terms of passengers and  वायुयान   आंदोलनों  .
personifications   of  Germany , France , Russia ,  austria-hungary  , and  the  United Kingdom attempting to keep the lid on the simmering  cauldron  of  imperialist  and  राष्ट्रवादी  tensions in  the  Balkans  to   prevent  a  सामान्य  European  युद्ध   .
वे   यहूद  successful in 1912  और   1913   लकिन   किया  not succeed in in  1914  .
the   कल्याणकारी   of   संसार   युद्ध   i   ,  which  began   in   सेंट्रल   यूरोपीय   in  late  जुलाई   1914  and finished in 1918 ,  शामिल   अनेक   कारकों  , such  as  the conflicts and  दुश्मनी   of  the four decades leading up to the  युद्ध   .
सैन्यवाद   ,  alliances , imperialism , and  राष्ट्रवाद  played major roles in  the  conflict  as   खूब   .
The  तात्कालिक  origins  of  the  युद्ध  , however  ,  lay  in   the  decisions taken  by   कूटनीतिज्ञों  and generals during the Crisis of 1914 , casus belli for which was  the  assassination of  archduke   फ्रांज   फर्डिनेंड  (  the   archduke   of   ऑस्ट्रिया   हंगेरियाई  )  और  his  बीवी  Sophie  by  Gavrilo  princip  ,  an   irredentist  Serb  .
the   संकट  came after a long  और  difficult  श्रेणी  of diplomatic clashes between the Great Powers  (  Italy  ,  France , Germany ,  the   अंग्रेजों   साम्राज्य   ,   the   austria-hungarian  Empire  और  Russia )  over  European and  औपनिवेशिक   मुद्दे   in  the decade before 1914 that  था  left tensions  ऊँची  .
in  turn these diplomatic  clashes  can be traced to  परिवर्तन  in  the  balance of  शक्ति   in   यूरोपीय   चूंकि  1867 .
The more immediate cause for  the   युद्ध   थी  tensions  over   territory  in  the  Balkans  .
Austria-Hungary competed  साथ  Serbia  और  Russia  लिये  territory  और  influence  in  the  प्रदेश  and they pulled  the  rest of  the   ग्रेट  Powers into the conflict through  उनके  various alliances and treaties .
Although  the  chain of  कार्यक्रम  unleashed  by   the   हत्या   triggered  the war ,  the  war  's   origins  go  deeper  ,  involving   नेशनल   राजनीती  , cultures  ,   अर्थशास्त्र   ,   और  a complex web  of   alliances   और  counterbalances  कि  had developed between the  विभिन्न   यूरोपीय  powers since  1870  .
Some  of  the  सबसे  important  long   पद   or  structural  कल्याणकारी  are : the  विकास   of  nationalism  आरपार  Europe , unresolved  territorial  disputes ,  an  intricate system of alliances , the perceived  विश्लेषण   of  the  संतुलन  of  शक्ति  in  यूरोपीय  , convoluted and fragmented governance  ,  the  बाहें   दौड़   of   the   पिछला  decades  ,  previous military  नियोजन  ,  इम्पीरियल  and colonial rivalry  लिये   माल  , power and  प्रतिष्ठा  , and economic and military rivalry in industry and trade  –  e.g. , the Pig  युद्ध  between  ऑस्ट्रिया  and Serbia  .
Other causes that came into play  दौरान  the  राजनयिक   संकट   कि   preceded   the   युद्ध  included  misperceptions  of  intent  (  e.g.   ,  the German belief that  the  United  किंगडम   होता   remain   न्यूट्रल  )  और  delays  और  misunderstandings in  राजनयिक   संचार  .
The various categories  of  explanation  लिये   संसार  War I correspond to  अलग  historians  '  overall methods .
Most historians and popular  टीकाकारों   शामिल  causes from more than  एक  category of  स्पष्टीकरण   to  provide  a  rounded  खाता   of  the  कल्याणकारी   of  the war .
The  deepest  distinction among these accounts is between stories that see it as the  अपरिहार्य  and predictable  निष्कर्ष   of   निश्चित  factors ,  और  those  कि  describe  it  as an arbitrary and unfortunate  गलती  .
In  attributing  causes  लिये  the war  ,  historians and  लड  had to  सौदे   साथ   an   unprecedented  flood  of  memoirs  और  official documents , released  as  each  देश   शामिल  tried  to  avoid blame for starting the war  .
Early releases of  सूचना   by   सरकारें  , particularly  those  released  लिये   उपयोग  by the `` Commission  on  the Responsibility  of  the Authors of the  युद्ध  ''  यहूद   दिखाया  to  be  incomplete and biased .
In  जोड   कुछ   दस्तावेज़  , especially  राजनयिक  cables between Russia  और  France ,  यहूद   मिला  to  have  been  doctored  .
Even  in  later  दशकों   however  ,  जब  much more  सूचना   था  been  released  , historians from  the   वही   संस्कृति  have been shown to  आइये   to  differing conclusions  on   the   कल्याणकारी  of  the  war .
Johnson  's  new  चार्ट   of   नेशनल  emblems , published  c.  1868 .
The large  ध्वज  shown in the corners  हैं   the   37-star  flag of  the  United States ( flown 1867-1877  )  , the Royal  मानक   of   the  United  किंगडम  , the Russian Imperial  मानक  , and the French tricolore with  इनसेट   इम्पीरियल  Eagle  .
Various other  ध्वज  flown by ships are shown .
The Flag  of  Cuba is  labelled  ``  क्यूबन  (  so   पुकारा  )  ``   .
The Chinese  ड्रैगन  on the Flag of China  थी   drawn  mistakenly  as  a western  ड्रैगन  .
a  national  ध्वज   is   a   ध्वज   कि  symbolizes a  देश  .
the   ध्वज  is  flown   by   the   सरकारी  , but usually  can   भी   be   flown   by  citizens of  the  country  .
Both public and private buildings such  as   स्कूलों   और   courthouses   may  fly the national  ध्वज  .
In some countries  ,  the national flags  हैं  only flown from non-military buildings on  निश्चित  flag days  .
वहीँ  are  तीन  distinct  प्रकार   of   नेशनल  flag  लिये  use on  जमीन  , and three for use  at   समुद्र  , though  अनेक  countries use identical designs for several ( and  sometimes  all ) of these types  of   ध्वज   .
The  अमरीकी  Civil War  (   acw   )  , also  ज्ञात   as   the   युद्ध   between   the  States or  बस  the Civil War  (   देखिए   नामकरण  ) , was a civil  युद्ध  fought from 1861  to  1865 between  the  United States ( the  ``  Union '' or the `` North  ''  ) and several  दक्षिणी  slave states  कि  declared their secession and formed the Confederate States  of   अमेरिका  ( the ``  confederacy  '' or the  ``   दक्षिण  ''  )   .
The war had its origin  in  the issue of  गुलामी  , especially  the  extension of slavery  into  the  पश्चिमी  territories  .
Foreign powers did not intervene  .
After  चार   सालो  of bloody  कॉम्बैट   कि   बाएँ   over   600,000  soldiers  मुर्दे  and destroyed  much  of the South 's infrastructure ,  the   confederacy  collapsed  ,  slavery  थी   abolished   ,  and the difficult  पुनर्निर्माण   प्रक्रम   of   restoring  national unity  और   guaranteeing  rights to  the   freed  slaves began  .
In the 1860 presidential  चुनाव   ,   republicans  , led  by  Abraham  lincoln  ,  opposed  expanding  गुलामी  into  संयुक्त  States  '  territories .
lincoln  won  ,   लकिन  before  उसके  inauguration on  कूच   4   ,  1861  ,  seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy  .
Outgoing  लोकतांत्रिक   अध्यक्ष   जेम्स   बुकानन   और  the incoming  republicans  rejected  secession  as illegal  .
lincoln  's  inaugural   पता   घोषित  his  प्रशासन  would not initiate  सिविल   युद्ध  .
आठ   बाकी  slave  राज्य  continued to reject calls for secession .
confederate   शक्तियां  seized numerous federal  दुर्गों   भीतर  territory claimed by  the  Confederacy .
a   सलाम   सम्मेलन   विफल  to  ढूँढें   a  compromise , and  दोनो  sides  prepared   लिये  war .
The  confederates  assumed  कि  European countries were  so  dependent on  ``  King  कपास  `` that they would  intervene  ; none did and  none   पहचाना  the new  confederate  States of America  .
hostilities  began on  अप्रैल  12  ,   1861  ,  जब   confederate  forces  fired   upon   फोर्ट  Sumter , a key fort  आयोजित  by Union troops in South Carolina .
lincoln  called for each state to  provide   सैनिकों  to  retake  the  फोर्ट  ;  नतीजतन   ,  four  अधिक  slave  राज्य  joined the Confederacy  ,  bringing their total to  ग्यारह   .
The Union  जल्द  controlled the border states and established a naval blockade that  अबोध  the southern economy .
the  Eastern  थिएटर  was  inconclusive  in 1861–62  .
the   पतझड़  1862 Confederate campaign into  मेरीलैंड   (   a  Union state  )  ended  साथ  Confederate  रिट्रीट   at  the Battle  of   antietam   ,   dissuading   अंग्रेजों   हस्तक्षेप  .
lincoln  issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा   ,   जिससे   बना   समाप्ति  slavery a war goal  .
to  the  वेस्ट   ,  by summer  1862   the  Union  नष्ट   the   confederate   नदी   नेवी  , then much of their  पश्चिमी  armies  ,  and  the  Union  at   vicksburg   विभाजित  the Confederacy  in  two  at   the   मिसिसिपी  River  .
In  1863   ,  Robert E.  ली  's Confederate incursion north ended at  the   बैटल   of  Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses  S.  Grant  कमांड  of all Union armies in 1864 .
In the Western Theater ,  विलियम  T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and  marched   to   the  sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure  साथ  the  रास्ता   .
the  Union marshaled the  संसाधन   और  manpower  to   आक्रमण  the Confederacy from all  दिशानिर्देश   ,  and could afford to  लड़ो   लड़ाइयों  of  अपघर्षण  through the Overland  अभियान   towards  Richmond  ,   the  Confederate  पूंजी   .
The defending  confederate   फौज  failed  ,   अग्रणी   to   ली  's surrender  to  Grant at  appomattox   अदालत   हाउस  on  अप्रैल  9 , 1865 .
The American  सिविल  War was  एक  of the earliest  सच्चा   औद्योगिक   युद्धों   .
railroads  ,  the  telegraph  ,  steamships , and mass-produced weapons  यहूद   employed  extensively .
The  mobilization  of civilian  कारखानों   ,   खानों   ,   shipyards  , banks ,  परिवहन  and  खाना  supplies all foreshadowed  संसार  War I .
It remains the deadliest  युद्ध  in  अमरीकी  history ,  resulting   in  the deaths  of  an estimated 750,000  सैनिको  and  an  undetermined number of civilian  हताहत   .
इतिहासकार  John  huddleston   estimates  the  मौत   टोल   at  ten percent  of  all Northern  males  20–45 years old  ,  and  30  percent of all  दक्षिणी  white males  aged  18–40 .
Norrie  बीमारी   is   a  genetic disorder that primarily  affects  the eye  और  almost always leads to blindness .
In  जोड  to  the   जन्मजात   ocular  symptoms , some patients  suffer   इससे   a   प्रगतिशील  hearing loss starting mostly in  उनके  2nd  दशक   of  life ,  जबकि  another portion may be  मानसिक  challenged .
मरीजों   साथ   norrie  disease may  develop   cataracts  , leukocoria ( a condition  जहाँ  the pupils appear white when  लाइट  is shone  on  them )  ,  along with other  developmental  issues  in   the   नजर  ,  ऐसे  as  shrinking  of  the   ग्लोब  and  the  wasting away of the  आईरिस  .
around  30–50  %  of them will  भी   have   developmental  delay/ mental retardation ,  psychotic-like  features , incoordination of movements or behavioral  abnormalities   .
सबसे   मरीजों   हैं  born  साथ   सामान्य   सुनना  ; however , the onset of hearing loss is very common in early adolescence .
परिचय   15   %   of  the patients are estimated to  develop   सब  the  सुविधाएँ  of the disease .
The disease  affects  almost  तभी   पुरूष   infants   at  birth  or  soon  बाद  birth , because  the   बीमारी   is  inherited X-linked recessive .
Only  in  very rare  मामले   ,   महिलाओं   have   महरूम   diagnosed  with  norrie   बीमारी  as well  .
The exact  incidence   क्रमांक  is  अनजान  ; only a few hundred cases  have   महरूम   reported   so  far .
it   is   a  very rare  विकार   कि  is not  संबद्ध   साथ  any specific ethnic or  जातिगत   समूह   .
A contract is an agreement having a  lawful  object  डाला   into   voluntarily  by  दो  or more parties , each of whom  intends  to create one  or   अधिक   विधिक   दायित्वों   between   उन्हें  .
the   तत्व   of  a contract  हैं  ``  प्रस्ताव   ''  and ``  स्वीकृति  '' by ``  competent  persons ''  having  legal capacity  जो  exchange ``  विचार  '' to create  ``  mutuality of obligation . ''
प्रमाण  of some or  सब  of  ये   तत्व  may be  किया  in writing ,  हालांकि  contracts may  be  made entirely  orally  or by  conduct  .
the  remedy for breach of  अनुबंध   can  be `` damages '' in  the  form  of  compensation  of  money or specific performance  enforced  through an  आदेश   .
Both  of  these remedies award the  पार्टी   at  loss the `` benefit  of  the bargain ''  or  expectation  क्षतिपूर्ति   ,   जिससे  are  वृहद   than  mere  रिलायंस   क्षतिपूर्ति  ,  as   in  promissory  estoppel  .
the   पार्टियों  may be  प्राकृतिक  persons or juristic  व्यक्तियों   .
A  अनुबंध  is a  legally  enforceable  वादा  or  undertaking  that something will or  होगा   नहीं   occur  .
the  word promise can be  प्रयुक्त  as a  विधिक  synonym  लिये  contract , although care  is   जरूरी   as  a promise may  नहीं  have the  पूरा  standing of  a   अनुबंध  ,  as  when  it   is   an  agreement  बगैर  consideration .
अनुबंध   विधि   varies   greatly  from  एक   क्षेत्राधिकार   to  another , including  मतभेद   in   आम  law  compared   to   सिविल  law  ,   the  impact  of  received  विधि  , particularly  इससे   इंग्लैण्ड   in  common law  देशों   ,   और   of  law codified in regional legislation  .
Regarding  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई   अनुबंध  Law for  उदाहरण   ,   वहीँ  are  40  relevant acts  जिससे   प्रभाव   on  the interpretation of contract at the  राष्ट्रमंडल  (  संघीय  /  नेशनल   )  level  ,  and  an  additional  26   अधिनियमों  at the  स्तर  of  the  state of NSW  .
in  addition there are  6   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   यंत्र  or conventions  जिससे  are applicable  लिये  international dealings , such as  the  United  राष्ट्र   सम्मेलन  on Contracts for the International Sale  of  Goods .
ASP.NET  is  a server-side  वेब  application  फ्रेमवर्क  designed  लिये  Web development  to  produce dynamic  वेब   पृष्ठों   .
It was developed by  microsoft   to  allow programmers to  निर्माण  dynamic web sites , web  अनुप्रयोग  and  वेब  services  .
It was first released in  जनवरी  2002  साथ   संस्करण   1.0   of   the  .NET  फ्रेमवर्क  ,  और   is  the successor  to   microsoft   's   क्रियाशील   सर्वर  Pages ( ASP )  प्रौद्योगिकी  .
ASP.NET is  निर्मित   on   the  Common Language Runtime  (  CLR  )   ,   allowing   प्रोग्रामर्स  to write ASP.NET code using any supported .NET language .
The ASP.NET  साबुन  extension  फ्रेमवर्क  allows  asp.net  components to  प्रक्रम   साबुन   संदेश   .
Lysergic acid  diethylamide  , abbreviated LSD or LSD-25 ,  भी  known  as  lysergide ( INN ) and  colloquially   as   एसिड  , is a semisynthetic psychedelic  ड्रग   of  the  ergoline  family  ,   खूब   ज्ञात   लिये  its psychological effects which can include  altered  thinking  प्रक्रियाओं  ,  बंद   और  open eye  visuals  ,  synesthesia   ,   an   altered  sense  of   समय  and spiritual experiences ,  as   खूब   as   लिये   इसके  key  भूमिका  in  1960s  counterculture  .
it  is  प्रयुक्त  mainly  as  an entheogen  ,   recreational   ड्रग   ,  and as an  एजेंट  in psychedelic therapy .
एलएसडी  is non-addictive , is not known to cause  दिमाग  damage  ,  and has extremely  कम   toxicity  relative  to  dose .
However  ,   प्रतिकूल   मनोरोग  reactions such as anxiety , paranoia ,  और  delusions are  संभावित  .
एलएसडी   थी   पहला  synthesized by  अल्बर्ट  Hofmann in 1938 from  ergotamine  ,  a  chemical derived by Arthur Stoll  इससे  ergot  ,   a  grain fungus  कि   typically   grows   on  rye  .
the  short  रूप   ``   एलएसडी   ''   आता  from its  जल्दी  code  नाम  LSD-25  ,  which  is  an  संक्षिप्त  for  the   जर्मनी  ``  lysergsäure-diethylamid   ''  followed  by   a   sequential  number .
LSD is  संवेदनशील   to  oxygen ,  पराबैंगनी   लाइट   ,  and chlorine , especially  in  solution  ,   हालांकि  its potency may last for years if  it  is stored away from light and moisture at low temperature  .
In  pure  form  it  is  a   colorless  ,  गंधहीन   ,  tasteless solid  .
एलएसडी  is typically delivered orally , usually  on   a  substrate such as  absorbent  blotter paper , a sugar cube  ,  or  जिलेटिन   .
In its liquid  रूप   ,  it can also be administered by  intramuscular   or  intravenous injection .
LSD is  बहुत  potent , with 20–30 μg ( micrograms )  होने   the  threshold dose  .
नई   प्रयोग  with LSD  प्रारंभ  in 2009 for  the   पहला   समय   in  40 years .
introduced  by Sandoz  laboratories  ,  साथ  trade-name Delysid  ,  as  a   ड्रग   साथ   विभिन्न  psychiatric  उपयोग   in  1947  ,  LSD quickly  became   a  therapeutic  एजेंट  that appeared to  दिखाएँ  great promise .
In the 1950s  ,  officials at the U.S. Central  प्रज्ञा  Agency  (  CIA  )  thought  the  drug might be  लागू   to  mind  कंट्रोल  and  रासायनिक   warfare  ;  the  agency  's   mkultra  research program  propagated  the  ड्रग  among young servicemen  और  students .
the   subsequent  recreational use  of   the   ड्रग   by   युवावस्था  culture in the Western world during  the  1960s led to  a  political  firestorm  that  resulted  in its prohibition .
Currently  ,  a number of organizations—including the Beckley  न्यास  , MAPS  ,  Heffter Research Institute and the  अल्बर्ट  Hofmann  foundation—exist  to fund , encourage and coordinate  शोध  into the medicinal  और  spiritual  उपयोग  of LSD and related psychedelics  .
The  संयुक्त   राज्य  Navy 's Sea  ,  Air , Land  टीमों  ,  commonly  known  as   the  Navy  seals   ,  are  the  U.S.  नेवी  's  प्रिंसिपल  special  परिचालन  force and  a   भाग  of  the   नवल   खास  Warfare Command and United States Special  परिचालन   कमांड  .
``   मुहर  ''  is  always capitalized  in  reference  to  members  of  the  नवल  Special  warfare  community  .
The  एक्रोनिम   is  derived from  उनके   क्षमता  to  operate  at sea ,  in  the  एयर  , and  on   जमीन  .
SEALs  हैं  male members of  the  United  राज्य   नेवी  .
An exchange  कार्यक्रम  with  the   coast   गार्ड  , which graduated  तीन   coast  Guardsmen as  seals  , was suspended in  2011   .
the  CIA 's  अत्यधिक  secretive Special Activities Division ( SAD ) and  अधिक   specifically   इसके   elite  Special Operations  समूह   (  SOG  )  recruits  ऑपरेटर  from the  मुहर  Teams .
Joint Navy SEALs and CIA  परिचालन   go   वापस   to   the   famed   macv-sog  during the Vietnam War .
This  सहयोग  still exists  आज   और   is   देखी  in  the  wars  in  Iraq  और  Afghanistan ,  और  in the  ढूंढना  and  हत्या   of   ओसामा   बिन  Laden  in   पाकिस्तानी  .
World population  estimates  from 1800  to  2100 ,  आधारित  on UN  2010  projections  (  red  ,  orange  ,  green )  और  US Census Bureau  ऐतिहासिक  estimates ( black ) .
Actual  अंकित  population figures are  in  blue  .
According  to  the  उच्चतम  estimate  ,   the   संसार  population may  वृद्धि  to 16 billion  by  2100  ;  according to the  न्यूनतम  estimate , it may decline  to   6  billion  .
The  संसार  population  is  the total  क्रमांक   of  living humans  on  Earth  .
As of  आज   ,  it is estimated  to  number billion by the United States  जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau  (   uscb   )  .
The  uscb  estimates that  the   संसार  population exceeded 7 billion on  कूच   12   ,   2012  .
According to  a  separate estimate by the  संयुक्त  Nations  जनसांख्यिकी  Fund  ,  it reached this milestone on October  31  , 2011  .
The world population has experienced continuous growth since  the  end of the  ग्रेट  Famine  और   the  Black Death in  1350  , when it stood at around 370  लाख  .
The  उच्चतम  rates of growth  –  global population  increases  above  1.8  %  प्रति   साल  –  यहूद   देखी  briefly during the  1950s   ,  and  लिये  a longer  काल  during  the   1960s  and 1970s .
the  growth  रेट  peaked  at   2.2  % in  1963  , and  था   अस्वीकृत   to  1.1 %  by  2011 .
कुल  annual births  यहूद  highest  in   the  late  1980s  at  परिचय  138  लाख   ,  and  हैं  now expected  to   remain  essentially  निरंतर   at   उनके   2011   स्तर  of 134 million , while  मौतों  number  56   लाख  per  साल  ,  और  are expected to  बढ़ाएँ  to  80  million per year  by  2040  .
Current projections  दिखाएँ   a   जारी  increase in  जनसांख्यिकी  in  the   निकट   भविष्य   (  but  a   स्थिर  decline in  the   जनसांख्यिकी  growth  रेट   )  , with the  वैश्विक  population  अपेक्षित  to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion  by  2050  .
विभिन्न  longer-term  estimates   भविष्यवाणी   further   विकास   ,  stagnation ,  or  even overall decline in the  वैश्विक  population by 2150 .
Some analysts  have   questioned   the  sustainability of further world population growth ,  citing  the  growing  pressures on the  पर्यावरण   ,   वैश्विक   खाना   आपूर्तियाँ   ,   और  energy resources .
Memphis is  a  city  in  the southwestern corner  of  the U.S. state  of  Tennessee , and the county  सीट  of Shelby  काउंटी  .
The city is  स्तिथ  on the  4th  Chickasaw  bluff  , south  of  the confluence of  the  Wolf and Mississippi rivers .
मेम्फिस  had  a   जनसांख्यिकी  of 672,277 in  2011   बनाना   it   the  largest city in the state of Tennessee ,  the  largest city on the  मिसिसिपी  River  ,   the   तीसरा  largest in  the   southeastern  United States  ,  and  the   20th   largest   in   the   संयुक्त  States .
The greater  मेम्फिस  metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल   ,  including adjacent counties in  मिसिसिपी  and Arkansas , had  a  2010 population of  1,316,100  .
This makes  मेम्फिस   the   दूसरी   largest  metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  in  टेनेसी  ,  surpassed  only by metropolitan  नैशविले  , which has overtaken  मेम्फिस  in  हाल  years  .
मेम्फिस  is  the   youngest   of  Tennessee  's  major  शहरों   .
A resident of  मेम्फिस  is  referred   to  as  a   memphian  , and the Memphis  प्रदेश  is known  ,   विशेषकर   to   मीडिया   आउटलेट  , as  ``   मेम्फिस   &  The Mid-South  ``   .
the  Cattenom Nuclear Power Plant in  फ़्रांस  .
France produces  around   तीन   quarters  of its electricity  by  nuclear power .
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear  शक्ति  Plant  in  Germany  .
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's coalition  घोषित   on  May  30  , 2011  ,   कि  Germany’s  17  nuclear  शक्ति   स्टेशन  will  be  shut  bas   by  2022  ,  in a policy reversal following  जापानी   's  Fukushima Daiichi  नाभिकीय   विपत्ति   .
Currently ,  68   रिएक्टरों   हैं  under  निर्माण  in 15  देशों  .
Nuclear power  स्टेशन   operate   in  thirty  देशों   .
In 2010 ,  पहले  the Fukushima  daiichi  nuclear disaster ,  it   थी   reported   कि  an  औसत  of  परिचय  10  नाभिकीय  reactors  यहूद  expected to  become   operational  per  साल  ,  हालांकि   according   to   the   संसार   नाभिकीय  Association  ,  of  the  17  civilian   रिएक्टरों  planned  to  become  operational   between   2007  and  2009  , only five actually came  on  stream .
As of June  2011  , Germany and  स्विट्ज़रलैंड   हैं  phasing-out nuclear power .
as  of June 2011 , countries such  as  Australia , Austria , Denmark ,  यूनानियों  , Ireland , Italy  ,  Latvia  ,  Liechtenstein ,  ध्वज  , Malaysia  ,  Malta ,  नई  Zealand , Norway and Portugal remain opposed  to   नाभिकीय   शक्ति  .
Skeletal  मांसपेशियां  homo  sapiens
इस  is a table of muscles of the  इंसान  anatomy .
There are  लगभग  642 skeletal muscles within the typical  इंसान  ,  और  almost every  मांसपेशी  constitutes  एक  part of  a   जोड़ी   of  identical bilateral muscles  ,   मिला  on  दोनो  sides , resulting  in   लगभग   320   pairs  of muscles ,  as   प्रस्तुत   in  this article .
nevertheless  ,  the  exact number  is   मुश्किल   to   define  because different sources  समूह   मांसपेशियां  differently ,  e.g  . regarding what  is   पारिभाषित   as  different  भाग  of  a  single  मांसपेशी   or  as  अनेक  muscles .
Examples  दायरा   इससे  640 to 850 .
The  मांसपेशियां   of  the human  देह  can be  categorized  into a number  of  groups which include  मांसपेशियां  relating  to  the head and neck  ,   मांसपेशियां   of  the  धड़  or trunk ,  मांसपेशियां  of  the  upper  limbs  ,  और   मांसपेशियां  of the lower  limbs  .
the   कार्रवाई  refers  to   the   कार्रवाई   of  each muscle from the standard  anatomical   स्थिति  .
In other  स्थितियाँ  ,  अन्य  actions may be performed .
A  reenactment  of a battle at Fort Foster ,  1837  ( at Hillsborough River  राज्य  Park )
the   seminole   युद्धों   ,   भी   ज्ञात  as the Florida Wars , were three conflicts in Florida between  the  Seminole  —  the  सामूहिक   नाम   दिए   to   the   amalgamation  of  विभिन्न  groups of  देशी   अमेरिकी  and  ब्लैक  people who settled in Florida  in  the  जल्दी  18th century —  और  the United States Army  .
The  पहला  Seminole War was  इससे  1814  to  1819 ( although  स्त्रोत   differ  ) ,  the  Second  seminole   युद्ध  from  1835  to  1842  ,  और   the   तीसरा  Seminole War  इससे   1855  to  1858  .
the  first conflict  साथ   the  Seminoles  arose   आउट   of   तनाव  relating  to  General  एंड्रयू  Jackson  's  attack  और  destruction  of  Negro  फोर्ट   in   फ्लोरिडा  in 1816  .
Jackson also attacked  the  Spanish  at  Pensacola .
Ultimately ,  the  Spanish Crown ceded the colony  to  United States rule .
Orono is a  कस्बा  in Penobscot  काउंटी   ,  Maine  ,  United States .
It was first settled in 1774  और  named in honor of Chief Joseph Orono of the  penobscot   स्वदेश   .
it  is home to  the  University  of   maine   .
The population was  10,362  at the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी   .

लक्सर   लास   वेगास   is   a  hotel  और   कसीनो   on  the Las Vegas  स्ट्रिप   in   स्वर्ग   ,  Nevada .
The  30-story  hotel  ,  owned  और   संचालित  by  mgm  Resorts International ,  रै  a casino with over 2,000 slot machines and  87  table  खेल  .
In  the  2008 to 2009  नवीकरण  , it  रै  a new  ,  highly  आधुनिकीकरण  , and  समकालीन  design and contains  a  total of 4,400 rooms ,  सहित  442  suites  ,  अस्तर  the interior walls of a pyramid  स्टाइल  tower and within  जुड़वा  22-story ziggurat towers that  यहूद  built as later  परिवर्धन   .
The  होटल   is  named after  the  city of  लक्सर  ( ancient Thebes  )  in  मिश्र  .
Luxor is the second largest hotel  in  Las  वेगास  ( the  largest  being the MGM Grand  )   और  the eighth largest in  the  world .
as  of  2010   ,  the Luxor has  a  4  कुंजी   दरजा  from  the   ग्रीन   कुंजी  Eco-Rating  कार्यक्रम   ,  which  evaluates  ``  चिरस्थायी  ''  होटल  operations  .
a  pilot  प्रयोग  , also  पुकारा  a  पायलट  study ,  is  a small  स्केल  preliminary study conducted  in  order to evaluate feasibility  ,   समय   ,  cost  ,   प्रतिकूल   कार्यक्रम   ,  and effect size  (   सांख्यिकीय   variability  )  in  an  attempt  to predict an appropriate sample  आकार  and improve upon the  पढ़ाई   डिज़ाइन   prior  to performance  of  a full-scale research  प्रोजेक्ट   .
पायलट   अध्ययन   ,   इसलिए  , may  नहीं  be appropriate for  मामला   अध्ययन  .
The Los Angeles  आग   विभाग  (  lafd  )  is  the agency  कि  provides  आग   सुरक्षा   और  emergency medical services for the  नगर  of  लॉस  Angeles  .
it  may be unofficially  referred   to   as  the Los  एंजिल्स  City  आग  Department to distinguish  it  from  the  Los Angeles County  आग  Department .
the  acre is a unit of area used in the imperial  और   u.S.  customary systems .
An  एकड़   is  about  40   %   of  a hectare  –  slightly  छोटी  than  an  American football field .
The acre is no  longer   commonly   प्रयुक्त   ,   हालांकि   a  few notable exceptions include  the  United  राज्य  , Australia  ,   बर्मा  and  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom  (  as of 2010  ,  the acre is no longer officially  प्रयुक्त  in the United Kingdom , though  is   स्टिल   प्रयुक्त  in real estate descriptions  )  .
It is still used  ,  to some extent  ,  in Canada  .
The international symbol  of  the  एकड़   is   ac   ,  and is  पारिभाषित   as   1/640   of  a square mile  .
The  सबसे  commonly used  एकड़   आज   is  the international  एकड़  .
In the United States both  the  international  एकड़   और   the  slightly  अलग  US survey  एकड़  are  in   उपयोग  .
The most common use of  the  acre  is  to  माप  tracts  of   जमीन  .
एक  international  एकड़  is defined as 4046.8564224  वर्गाकार  metres .
दौरान   the  Middle  आयु  , an acre was  the   राशि   of  land  कि   could   be  plowed in  एक  day with a yoke  of   oxen   .

Language processing  refers   to   the   रास्ता  human  beings   उपयोग  words to  communicate   विचार   और   जज्बात   ,   और  how  ऐसे  communications are  processed   और   समझा  .
Thus it  is   कैसा  the  दिमाग   creates   और  understands language .
Most recent theories consider that this  प्रक्रम  is carried out entirely  by  and inside  the  brain  .
This is  माना   एक   of   the   सबसे  characteristic abilities of the  इंसान  species  -  perhaps the most characteristic .
However  बहुत   छोटी  is known about  it  and there is huge scope for research on it .
Most of the  ज्ञान  acquired to date on  the   विषय  has  आइये  from  मरीजों  who  have  suffered  कुछ  type of  significant   सिर   चोट  ,  whether  external  (  wounds  ,  bullets  )  or  आतंरिक  ( strokes  ,  tumors , degenerative  रोगों   )  .
Studies have shown that  सबसे   of  the  भाषा   प्रसंस्करण   कृत्यों   हैं   carried   आउट  in  the  cerebral  cortex  .
The essential function of  the   cortical  language  क्षेत्रों   is   सांकेतिक   प्रतिनिधित्व   .
Even  हालांकि   भाषा  exists  in  different forms , all of them are based on  सांकेतिक  representation  .
the   bugatti  Veyron EB 16.4 is  a  mid-engined grand touring car  ,   designed  and developed by  the   volkswagen   समूह   और   manufactured  in Molsheim , France  by   bugatti   ऑटोमोबाइल  S.A.S .
the   सुपर   खेल   संस्करण  of  the  Veyron is the fastest  street-legal  production  car   in  the  संसार  , with a  शीर्ष  speed of  .
The  असली   संस्करण   रै   a  top speed  of  .
it   थी  named  car   of  the Decade (  2000–2009   )   by  the BBC  टेलीविज़न   कार्यक्रम  Top Gear .
The standard  veyron  won  शीर्ष  Gears  बेहतरीन  Car Driven  सब   साल   पुरस्कार   in  2005 .
on  6 April  2013  ,  bugatti   नियत   the  record for the  तीव्रतम   roadster  in the world with  the   veyron  Grand Sport  vitesse  , reaching on  औसत  a  शीर्ष   गति  of .
the  Veyron 's chief designer was Hartmut Warkuss  ,  and  the   exterior  was designed by Jozef  kabaň   of   volkswagen   ,   साथ   much  of  the  engineering  कार्य  being conducted under  the   मार्गदर्शन  of  अभियान्त्रिकी  chief Wolfgang Schreiber  .
A  क्रमांक  of  खास  variants  have  been produced .
in   दिसम्बर  2010 , Bugatti began offering  prospective   खरीदार  the  क्षमता   to   मनपसंद  exterior  और  interiors colours  by  using the Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on the  marque   's   आधिकारिक   जालस्थल   .
dvd   is   an   ऑप्टिकल  disc storage format  ,   invented  and developed  by   फिलिप्स  , Sony ,  तोशिबा  , and Panasonic in 1995 .
dvds  offer higher storage capacity  than   कॉम्पैक्ट  discs while having  the   वही   आयाम   .
Pre-recorded DVDs  हैं  mass-produced using  सांचा  machines  कि  physically  स्टैम्प   आंकड़ा  onto the DVD  .
Such discs  हैं  known  as  DVD- ROM  ,   क्युकी  data can only be  पढ़ा   और  not  लिखा  nor erased  .
Blank recordable  dvd  discs (  dvd-r  and DVD+R  )   can  be recorded once using a  dvd   रिकॉर्डर   और   तब  function  as  a  dvd-rom   .   rewritable  DVDs ( DVD-RW  ,   dvd+rw  , and DVD-RAM  )  can be recorded and erased multiple  टाइम्स   .
dvds  are  प्रयुक्त  in DVD-Video consumer  डिजिटल   वीडियो   स्वरूप   और   in  DVD-Audio  उपभोक्ता   डिजिटल   ऑडियो   स्वरूप  ,  as  well  as  for authoring AVCHD  discs  .
DVDs  containing   अन्य  types of  सूचना  may  be  referred  to  as  dvd  data  discs   .
कया   chilli   wants   is   an  American reality  श्रेणी  on VH1 starring Chilli , one-third of  the   ग्रैमी  Award  -winning  R & B  तिकड़ी   tlc   .
The  दिखाएँ  chronicles  chilli  's quest to  ढूँढें  love with the help of  tionna  T. Smalls , an  लेखक  and  संबंध   कोच   .

The second season premiered on  संडे  ,  जनवरी   2   ,  2011 .
Peter Gene  hernandez  (  born   अक्तूबर  8 , 1985 )  ,   ज्ञात  by his stage name  ब्रूनो  Mars , is  an  American singer-songwriter  और  record  निर्माता  .
Raised  in  Honolulu , Hawaii , by a family of musicians ,  मंगल  began  बनाना  music at a young age  और  performed in various musical  venues  in his hometown throughout his  बाल्यकाल  .
He graduated  इससे  high school and then moved  to  Los Angeles , California  ,   to   pursue   a  musical career .
मंगल  produced songs for  अन्य   कलाकारों  , joining production  टोली  The  smeezingtons   .
मंगल   था   an   unsuccessful  stint with Motown Records ,  लकिन   तब  signed  साथ  Atlantic in 2009 .
he  became recognized  as  a solo artist  बाद   lending   उसके   vocals  and  co-writing  the hooks for  the  songs  ``   nothin   '  on You ``  by   b.o.b  , and `` Billionaire  ``  by Travie McCoy .
he  also  co-wrote  the  हिट्स  ``  सही   गोलाकार  ``  by  Flo  rida  featuring Ke  $   ha  , and `` Wavin  '  Flag `` by K'naan  .
In October 2010 , he  released  his  डेब्यू  album ,  doo-wops  & Hooligans .
Anchored by the  विश्वव्यापी  number-one singles ``  बस  the Way You  हैं  ``  और  `` Grenade `` ,  the  album peaked  at   क्रमांक  three on the Billboard  200  .
मंगल   थी  nominated  लिये   सात   grammys  at  the   53rd  Grammy  पुरस्कार   ,  winning  बेहतरीन  Male Pop  गायन   प्रदर्शन   लिये   ``  Just the Way You Are ''  .
His  दूसरी   स्टुडियो   एल्बम   ,  Unorthodox Jukebox ,  थी   released  on December  11  ,  2012  .
मंगल  '  म्यूज़िक   is   विख्यात  for  displaying   a  wide  किस्में   of   शैलियाँ   और   प्रभाव   ,   और  contains  तत्व  of many musical genres  .
he   रै  worked with an  assortment  of artists from various  जाति   .
as  a child  ,   he   थी  highly influenced by  कलाकारों  such as  छोटी   रिचर्ड   ,  Elvis Presley  और  Michael  जैक्सन  and would  प्रायः  impersonate these artists  इससे   a  young  आयु  .
Mars  भी  incorporates reggae - and  motown   -inspired  sounds into  उसके   कार्य  .
विश्वव्यापी   ,   मंगल   became  the  best-selling   डिजिटल  artist  in  2011  .
he  had  तीन   singles   in  the  शीर्ष  ten ,  सहित   पहला  place  साथ  `` Just  the  Way You  हैं   ''  ,  जिससे   बेची  12.5  लाख  copies  .
मंगल  won Best  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Male Solo  कलाकार   at  the 2012 BRIT Awards .
Bruno  मंगल   रै  sold 6  लाख  albums  और  40 million singles  विश्वव्यापी  as a singer .
althought   as  a song-writer ,  निर्माता   और   सिंगर  his total  सिंगल   डाउनलोड  sales surpass  100   लाख   विश्वव्यापी  .
बस्ट   of  Zeus , Otricoli ( Sala  रोटोंडा   ,  Museo Pio-Clementino , Vatican ) .
Greek  mythology  is the body  of  myths and teachings that belong to the  प्राचीन  Greeks ,  concerning  their gods and heroes  ,   the  nature of  the  world , and the origins  और   significance  of  उनके  own  cult  and ritual practices .
It was a part of the religion  in  ancient Greece and  is  part of religion  in  modern  यूनानियों   और   around   the   संसार   ,   ज्ञात  as Hellenismos .
Modern  विद्वानों  refer to  और  study the myths  in   an  attempt to  throw  light on the religious and political  संस्थानों  of  प्राचीन  Greece and  इसके   सभ्यता   ,  and to gain understanding of the  प्रकृति  of  myth-making  itself  .
Greek mythology is  explicitly   समाविष्ट  in  a  large collection of narratives , and implicitly in Greek  representational  arts  ,   ऐसे   as  vase-paintings and votive  उपहार   .
यूनानी  myth  कोशिशें   to   बताइये  the origins of  the   संसार   ,  and  विवरण  the  जीवनदान  and adventures of  a  wide  किस्में  of gods , goddesses  ,  heroes  ,  heroines ,  और  mythological creatures  .
ये  accounts initially were disseminated  in  an oral-poetic tradition ; today  the  Greek  मिथकों  are  ज्ञात   primarily  from Greek literature .
the  oldest  ज्ञात  Greek literary  स्त्रोत  , Homer 's  एपिक  poems  इलियड  and Odyssey , focus on  कार्यक्रम   surrounding  the Trojan  युद्ध  .
Two poems by Homer 's near contemporary Hesiod , the Theogony and the Works and  दिनों  , contain  खाते   of   the   उत्पत्ति   of  the  संसार  , the  उत्तराधिकार  of divine rulers ,  the  succession of human  आयु  , the origin  of  human  woes   ,   और  the  उत्पत्ति  of  sacrificial  practices .
मिथकों   हैं   भी   preserved  in  the  Homeric  hymns  ,  in   fragments   of   एपिक  poems of  the  Epic Cycle  ,  in  lyric  poems ,  in   the   works  of the  tragedians  of  the   पांचवां  century  bc   ,   in   कृतियाँ  of scholars and poets  of  the Hellenistic Age , and  in  texts from  the  time  of   the  Roman  साम्राज्य  by writers such as Plutarch and Pausanias .
पुरातत्व  findings  provide  a principal  सोर्स   of   विवरण  about  यूनानी  mythology ,  साथ  gods  और  heroes featured prominently in the decoration of many  artifacts  .
Geometric  डिजाइन   on  pottery  of   the   आठवीं  century BC depict scenes from the Trojan cycle as well as  the  adventures of Heracles  .
in  the succeeding  archaic  , Classical , and  hellenistic   अवधि   ,  Homeric and  विभिन्न   अन्य   पौराणिक   दृश्यों  appear , supplementing  the  existing literary evidence  .
Greek  mythology   रै   था  an  extensive   influence   on  the culture  ,   कला   ,   और  literature of Western  सभ्यता  and  remains   भाग  of  पश्चिमी  heritage  और   भाषा  .
कवियों  and artists from ancient times to  the  present  have  derived inspiration from Greek mythology  और  have  खोजा   समकालीन   significance  and relevance in  the   विषयवस्तु  .

Mouth &  macneal  was a  पॉप  duo from  the  Netherlands .
They are best known for  उनके  million selling  रिकॉर्डिंग  of  ``   कैसा  Do You  do  `` .
The  boise   राज्य  Broncos football program  represents   boise  State  विश्वविद्यालयों  in college  फ़ुटबॉल  and compete in the  फ़ुटबॉल   कटोरी  Subdivision  (   fbs  )  of  Division  i  as a member of the Mountain  वेस्ट  Conference .
वे  are  फिलहाल  led by head coach Chris Petersen and  खेल  their  घर   खेल   at   bronco   स्टेडियम   .
The franc  (  sign :  fr  . or SFr  .  ; German :  franken  , French  और  Romansh : franc  ,  Italian  :  franco  ;   कोड  :  chf  ) is the  करेंसी  and legal  टेंडर  of  स्विट्ज़रलैंड   और  Liechtenstein ; it  is  also  विधिक   टेंडर  in the  इतालवी   exclave   campione  d'Italia .
Although not  formally  legal tender in the  जर्मनी  exclave Büsingen (  the  sole  विधिक   करेंसी   is   the  euro  )  , it is  in  wide  रोज़  use  वहीँ   .
the  Swiss  नेशनल  Bank  मुद्दे   banknotes   और  the  संघीय   मिंट  Swissmint issues  सिक्के   .
the  Swiss franc is the  तभी   संस्करण  of  the   फ़्रैंक  still issued in  यूरोपीय  .
the  smaller  denomination   ,  a hundredth of a franc , is a Rappen  (  Rp . ) in German , centime ( c.  )  in French  ,  centesimo ( ct. )  in  Italian  ,  and  रैप  ( rp .  )   in   romansh   .
The ISO code  of  the  करेंसी  used  by   बैंको  and financial institutions is CHF  ,  although `` Fr .  ''   is   प्रयुक्त  by most  व्यवसायों  and advertisers ; some  उपयोग  SFr . ;  the   latinate  `` CH ''  स्टैंड   लिये   confoederatio  Helvetica  .
Given  the  different languages  प्रयुक्त   in   स्विट्ज़रलैंड  , Latin is used for  language-neutral  inscriptions  on  the coins  .
Sir Charles Spencer  ``  Charlie ''  चैपलिन   ,  (  16   अप्रैल   188925   दिसम्बर   1977  )  थी  a British comic actor and filmmaker who rose to fame  in  the silent  era  .
चैपलिन  became a worldwide icon through  उसके  screen persona  ``  the Tramp `` and  is  considered  एक   of  the most important figures  of  the film industry .
उसके  career spanned  अधिक  than 75 years ,  इससे  a child in the Victorian era to close to his  मौत  at  the   आयु  of 88  ,  and  encompassed  both  adulation   और  controversy .
Raised in London ,  चैपलिन   's  childhood  थी  defined by poverty and  hardship  .
he  was sent  to  a workhouse twice before the  आयु   of   नौ   ;  his father was absent , and his mother  थी   वचनबद्ध  to a mental asylum  .
Chaplin began performing from  a  young  आयु  ,  touring  music  हॉल  and later working as  a  stage  कर्ता  and  हास्य  .
At 19  he  was signed to  the   prestigious  Fred Karno  कम्पनी   ,   जिससे  took  उसे   to   अमेरिका   .
Chaplin was scouted  by   the   फिल्मी  industry  ,  and  बना  his first appearances in 1914 with Keystone  studios  .
He soon developed the Tramp persona  और  formed a large fan base  .
Chaplin directed his  films   इससे  an early  स्टेज  , and continued  to  hone  उसके   शिल्प  as  he   स्थानांतरित   to   the  Essanay , Mutual ,  और  First National corporations .
By 1918  ,  he  थी   एक  of the  सबसे  famous  मेन  in  the   संसार   .
In 1919 ,  चैपलिन   co-founded   the   वितरण  company United Artists  ,   giving   उसे   पूरा   कंट्रोल   over   उसके  films .
His first  feature-length  picture was The  बच्चा  (  1921  ) ,  followed   by   a  Woman of  पेरिस  (  1923  ) , The  सुनहरा  Rush ( 1925 )  ,   और  The Circus ( 1928  )   .
he   refused   to   मूव  to sound films  in  the  1930s   ,   बजाय  producing City  लाइट्स  ( 1931 ) and  आधुनिक   टाइम्स  (  1936  ) without  संवाद  .
Chaplin became  increasingly   राजनैतिक   और  his next film ,  the  Great  तानाशाह   (  1940 ) , satirised  एडोल्फ  Hitler .
The 1940s was a decade  चिह्नित  with controversy for  चैपलिन  , and his  लोकप्रियता  declined rapidly  .
he  was accused of communist sympathies ,  जबकि   उसके   भागीदारी   in  a paternity suit  और  marriages  to  much  younger  women  यहूद   माना  scandalous .
An FBI investigation was  खोली   on   चैपलिन  , and he was eventually  मजबूर   to  leave  the  United  राज्य  and  settle  in  स्विट्ज़रलैंड  .
he  abandoned the Tramp  लिये   उसके  later  films   ,  which include Monsieur Verdoux  (  1947  )  ,  limelight   (   1952   )  , A  किंग  in New York  (  1957 ) , and A Countess From Hong  काँग   (  1967 ) .
चैपलिन  wrote , directed  ,  produced  ,   संपादित  , scored  ,   और   स्ट्रक्चर   in  most of  उसके  films .
He was a perfectionist ,  और   उसके  financial independence  meant   he   प्रायः   खर्च   सालो  on the development  और  production  of  a picture  .
उसके   films  are characterised  by   slapstick  combined with  pathos   ,   और   प्रायः  feature  the   ट्रैम्प   struggling  against  adversity   .
अनेक   contain   सोशल  and  राजनैतिक   विषयवस्तु  , as well  as   autobiographical  elements  .
In  1972  , as part  of  a renewed appreciation for  उसके  work ,  चैपलिन  received  an   मानद   अकादमी  Award for  ``  the  incalculable  effect he has  था  in  बनाना  motion pictures the art form  of  this  सदी  ''  .
He continues  to  be held  in   ऊँची   लिहाज़  , with The  सुनहरा   फटाफट   ,  City Lights , Modern Times , and  the   ग्रेट  Dictator  प्रायः  ranked among  the   महानतम   films  of all  समय   .
Planned Parenthood Federation of  अमेरिका  (  ppfa   )   ,   commonly   shortened  to Planned Parenthood  ,   is  the  u.S.   संबद्ध   of   the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Planned  parenthood   संघ  (  ippf   )  and one of  इसके  larger members  .
PPFA is  a  non-profit  संगठन  providing  reproductive  health  और   मातृ  and child  स्वास्थ्य   सेवाएं  .
The Planned Parenthood Action Fund , Inc.  (  PPAF )  is  a related organization which lobbies  लिये  pro-choice legislation , comprehensive sex education  ,  and access to  सस्ती   स्वास्थ्य  care in the United  राज्य  .
नियोजित   parenthood  is the largest  u.S.   प्रदाता   of  reproductive health  सेवाएं  , including  कर्कट  screening  ,  HIV  स्क्रीनिंग   और   counseling  ,  निरोधक  , and  गर्भपात  .
Contraception accounts  लिये  35  %  of PPFA 's total  सेवाएं  and abortions  खाता   लिये  3 % ;  ppfa  conducts roughly 300,000 abortions each year , among 3 million  लोगों  served .
The organization  रै  its roots in  ब्रुकलीन  , New York ,  जहाँ  Margaret Sanger  खोली  the  देश  's first birth-control clinic .
Sanger founded the American Birth  कंट्रोल  League in  1921   ,  which in 1942 became  भाग   of  the Planned  parenthood  Federation  of   अमेरिका   .
चूंकि  then , Planned  parenthood  has  grown   to  have over 820  क्लिनिक  locations  in   the  U.S.  ,   साथ   a  total  बजट  of US  $  1 billion .
PPFA  provides   an  array of services to  over   तीन   लाख  people in the United  राज्य  ,  और   supports  services  लिये  over one million clients outside the United  राज्य  .
पुरुषों   rea  is Latin  लिये  `` guilty mind ''  .
In  दण्ड   विधि  , it  is  viewed as  एक  of  the  necessary elements of some crimes .
The standard common law test of  दण्ड   देयता  is usually  expressed  in  the   लैटिन   phrase  ,  actus   गैर   facit   reum   nisi  mens sit rea  ,  which  अर्थात्   ``  the act is not culpable  जबतक  the  दिमाग  is guilty ''  .
Thus  ,  in jurisdictions  साथ   due  process  ,  there  जरूर  be an actus reus , or ``  अपराधी  act  ,  '' accompanied by some level  of  mens  rea   to   constitute  the crime with  जिससे   the  defendant is charged ( see the  तकनीकी  requirement  of   concurrence  )  .
As a general rule  ,   दण्ड  liability  करता  not attach to a person who acted with the absence of mental fault .
The  एक्सेप्शन  is  सख्त  liability  अपराधों   .
In civil law ,  it  is usually not necessary to prove  a  subjective mental  तत्व   to  establish liability  लिये   उल्लंघन  of  अनुबंध   or   अपकृत्य  , for example .
However ,  if  a tort  is  intentionally  वचनबद्ध   or  a contract is intentionally breached  ,   ऐसे   intent  may  बढ़ाएँ   the  scope  of   देयता   as  well as  the   माप  of damages payable to the plaintiff .
Therefore  ,  mens rea refers  to   the   दिमागी  element  of   the  offence that accompanies the actus  reus  .
In  कुछ  jurisdictions , the terms mens  rea  and  actus  reus  have   महरूम  replaced by alternative terminology  .
In Australia , for example ,  the  elements of the  संघीय  offences are  अभी  designated  as   ``   दोष  elements  ''   or  `` mental elements  ''  (  पुरुषों  rea ) and  ``  physical  तत्व   ''   or  ``  बाह्य   तत्व  '' ( actus reus ) .
This  शब्दावली   थी   अपनाया   to  replace  the   अस्पष्टता  of the Latin terms with  सरल   और   सटीक   phrasing  .
ulysses  S. Grant (  born   hiram  Ulysses Grant  ;  April 27  ,  1822  –   जुलाई   23   ,  1885 )  थी   the   18th  President  of   the   संयुक्त  States  (   1869–1877  )  following  his highly successful role  as  a  युद्ध  general  in  the  दूसरी  half of the Civil War .
अंतर्गत  Grant , the Union  फौज  defeated  the   confederate   सैन्य  ; having  effectively  ended the war and secession with the  आत्मसमर्पण  of Robert E. Lee 's  फौज  at Appomattox .
as  president he led  the  Radical Republicans  in  their effort to eliminate all vestiges of Confederate nationalism and  गुलामी  .
Upset  over  uncontrolled  हिंसा  in the South and  having  desired  to   protect  African  अमरीकी  citizenship  ,  President Grant effectively  नष्ट   the   ku  Klux Klan in 1871  .
Grant  थी  the  पहला  President  to  establish Civil Service reform having  निर्मित   a   two-year   federally  funded  सिविल  Service Commission in 1871 .
In terms of foreign  नीति  , Grant revealed  an   ``  unexpected capacity  लिये  deliberation and consultation ''  कि   प्रचारित  the national  ब्याज   .
उसके  reputation  थी  marred by  उसके   दोहराया  defense  of  corrupt  appointees  , and by America 's  पहला  industrial  आयु   आर्थिक  depression ( called the  ``   दहशत   of  1873  ``  ) that dominated  उसके  second term .
Although his Republican Party split in 1872 with  reformers  denouncing  उसे   ,   ग्रान्ट  was easily reelected  .
by  1875  the   रूढ़िवादी   श्वेत  Southern opposition  regained  control of  प्रत्येक   राज्य  in the South  और  as he  बाएँ  the  श्वेत   हाउस  in  कूच  1877 his  नीतियों   यहूद   होने   undone   .
A career  सिपाही  ,  he  graduated from the United States  सैन्य  Academy at West Point and served in the Mexican–American War  .
जब  the  सिविल  War  began   in  1861 ,  ग्रान्ट  trained Union volunteer regiments in Illinois  .
In 1862  ,  as a  सामान्य  he  लड़ा  a series of battles  और  was promoted to  प्रमुख  general  बाद  forcing  the   आत्मसमर्पण   of  a  विशाल  Confederate  फौज   और  gaining  कंट्रोल  of Kentucky and  सबसे   of   टेनेसी   .
He then led  संघ  forces to victory after initial setbacks  in  the Battle of Shiloh ,  कमाई  a reputation  as   an  aggressive  कमांडर  .
In July 1863  ,   बाद   a  long , complex campaign , Grant defeated  पाँच   uncoordinated   confederate   सेना  (  capturing   एक  of them  )  and  जब्त  Vicksburg .
इस   प्रसिद्ध   विजय   दिया  the Union full control  of  the  मिसिसिपी  River ,  विभाजित  off  the   पश्चिमी   confederacy  ,  और  opened the  रास्ता  for more Union triumphs  .
After another win at the Battle of  चट्टानूगा  in  लेट  1863  ,  President Abraham Lincoln  बना   उसे  lieutenant  सामान्य  and commander of  सब   of  the Union  सेना   .
