As commanding  सामान्य   of   the   फौज   ,  Grant confronted Robert E.  ली   in  a series of  बहुत  bloody battles in 1864 known  as  the Overland Campaign that  ended   साथ  the bottling up of Lee at  पीटर्सबर्ग  , outside the Confederate capital of Richmond .
During the siege , Grant coordinated  a   श्रेणी  of  विनाशकारी  campaigns  शुभारम्भ   by   विलियम   tecumseh  Sherman  ,   फिलिप   sheridan   ,  and George Thomas  .
Finally  तोड़कर  through Lee  's   trenches  , the  संघ  Army captured  रिचमंड   in  April  1865  .
ली  surrendered  उसके  depleted forces to  ग्रान्ट  at  appomattox  as  the  Confederacy collapsed  .
हालांकि   pro-confederate  historians attacked  ग्रान्ट  as  a   निष्ठुर   कसाई  who won  by   brute  force  ,   सबसे  historians have hailed  उसके   सैन्य  genius .
ग्रान्ट   's  two consecutive terms  as   अध्यक्ष   stabilized   the  nation  बाद   the  American  सिविल  War  और   दौरान  the  turbulent   पुनर्निर्माण  period that followed .
As  अध्यक्ष  , he enforced Reconstruction by  enforcing   सिविल   अधिकारों   कानून  and  लड़   ku   klux  Klan violence .
ग्रान्ट   जीती  passage of  the   पंद्रहवीं  Amendment  ;  giving constitutional protection for African-American  मतदान   अधिकारों  .
he  used the army to build  the   रिपब्लिकन   पार्टी   in  the South  ,   आधारित  on  ब्लैक  voters  ,  Northern  newcomers  ( ``  carpetbaggers  `` )  और   देशी  white  समर्थक   (   ``   scalawags  .  ''   )
As  a  result ,  अफ़्रीकी  Americans were represented in the U.S. Congress  लिये   the  first time in American history in 1870 .
Reformers praised Grant  's   भारतीय  peace policy by having  टूटा  the deadlock on  भारतीय   appropriations  in  कॉंग्रेस  ,  the   सृष्टि  of  the  Board of  भारतीय   commissioners   to  make  सुधार  recommendations , and  उसके   enlistment   of  Quaker Protestants who controlled mid western  भारतीय   एजेंसियों   ,   कि  effectively  curbed  Congressional patronage  .
ग्रान्ट  remained determined in keeping  इंडियंस   इससे  being exterminated from  श्वेत   settler  encroachment  or   by  the U.S. military .
Grant  's  reputation as president by  1875   थी  at  an  all-time  ऊँची   लिये  his previous veto of  the  Inflation Bill , the  ड्योढ़ी  of the  resumption   of  Specie Act  ,  and Secretary Bristow 's  कामयाब   छापे   कि  shut  bas  the  whiskey   रिंग   .
Grant  's  foreign policy  ,  led by  सचिव   of  State  हैमिल्टन  Fish  ,  implemented International Arbitration , settled the  अलबामा   दावा  with Britain and  avoided   युद्ध   साथ   स्पेन  over the  virginius  Affair .
a  jukebox  is  a partially automated music-playing  यंत्र  , usually a coin-operated  यंत्र  ,  कि  will  खेल   a   संरक्षक   's  selection from self-contained media .
The classic jukebox has  बटन   साथ   अक्षर  and  संख्याएँ  on  उन्हें  that  ,  when entered  in  combination , are used  to   खेल  a specific selection .
A  ड्रग  test is a technical analysis  of   a  biological specimen  –  for example  मूत्र  ,  बाल  , blood  ,  sweat , or oral  द्रव   /  saliva –  to  determine the  उपस्थिति   or  absence  of  specified parent drugs or their  metabolites  .
Major uses of drug testing are to detect  the   उपस्थिति  of performance  बढ़ाना   steroids   in  sport or  लिये   दवाएँ   निषिद्ध  by laws , such  as  cannabis  ,  cocaine  और   हेरोइन  .
A `` 10-panel urine screen ''  consists  of  the  following:
Amphetamines  (  including  methamphetamine  )
Barbiturates
benzodiazepines
cannabinoids  ( THC  )
Cocaine
Methadone
Methaqualone
Opiates (  codeine   ,   मॉरफीन   ,   हेरोइन  ,  oxycodone   ,  Hydrocodone , etc  .   )
Phencyclidine ( PCP )
propoxyphene
शनि  V rocket , used  लिये  the  अमरीकी   मानवयुक्त   चंद्र  landing  मिशन
Space exploration  is   the  discovery  और  exploration of outer space  by   अर्थात्  of space  प्रौद्योगिकी  .
Physical  खोजी  of space is  conducted   दोनो   by   इंसान   spaceflights   और  by robotic spacecraft  .
While  the  observation of objects  in  space , known as astronomy  ,   predates  reliable recorded  इतिहास  ,  it  was  the   विकास   of   विशाल   और   अपेक्षाकृत  efficient  rockets   दौरान   the   जल्दी  20th century that  अनुमत   शारीरिक  space exploration  to  become a reality .
Common rationales  लिये  exploring  स्पेस  include  advancing  scientific research  ,  uniting different  राष्ट्र  , ensuring  the   भविष्य  survival of humanity  और  developing  सैन्य  and  रणनीतिक   लाभ  against other  देशों  .
विभिन्न   आलोचनाओं  of space  खोजी  are sometimes made .
स्पेस  exploration  रै  often been used  as  a proxy competition for  geopolitical  rivalries such  as   the  Cold  युद्ध  .
The  जल्दी  era  of  space exploration  थी   चलित  by  a  ``  स्पेस  Race  ``  between  the   सोवियत  Union and the United  राज्य   ,   the  launch of the first man-made object to  कक्षा   the  Earth  ,  the  ussr   's  Sputnik 1  ,   on   4   अक्तूबर  1957  ,   और  the first Moon landing by the  अमरीकी  Apollo  11   शिल्प  on  20  July  1969  are  प्रायः  taken as the boundaries  लिये  this initial period .
the  Soviet space program  हासिल  many  of  the first milestones  ,  including  the   पहला   जीना   होने   in  orbit in 1957 ,  the  first human spaceflight ( Yuri Gagarin aboard Vostok 1  )   in  1961 ,  the  first  spacewalk  ( by Aleksei Leonov  )   on   18  March  1965   ,  the first automatic landing on  another  celestial body in 1966 ,  और  the  लॉन्च  of the first space station (  salyut   1  ) in 1971  .
After the first  20   सालो   of  exploration  ,   फ़ोकस   shifted  from  one-off  flights  to  renewable  हार्डवेयर   ,  such as the Space  शटल   कार्यक्रम   ,  and from  प्रतियोगिता  to cooperation  as  with the International Space Station  (  ISS ) .
With the  substantial  completion of  the  ISS following STS-133 in March  2011   ,   योजनाएँ  for space  खोजी   by   the  USA remain in flux .
नक्षत्र   ,   a  Bush Administration program  लिये  a return to the  चंद्रमा  by 2020 was judged inadequately funded and unrealistic by an expert review panel  रिपोर्टिंग  in 2009 .
The Obama  प्रशासन  proposed  a  revision of  नक्षत्र  in  2010  to  फ़ोकस   on  the  विकास  of  the   काबिलियत  for  crewed  missions beyond low  धरती   कक्षा  (  leo  ) , envisioning  extending   the   आपरेशन   of  the ISS beyond  2020   ,   transferring   the  development of  लॉन्च  vehicles for human crews from NASA  to   the  private sector  ,   और  developing technology to enable missions  to  beyond LEO  ,  such as  earth/moon   l1   ,  the  चंद्रमा   ,  Earth/Sun  l2  , near-earth asteroids , and Phobos or Mars orbit  .
As  of   कूच  2011 , the  us   सीनेट   और   हाउस  of  प्रतिनिधि  are  स्टिल  working  towards   a  compromise NASA  funding  bill ,  जिससे  will  संभवतः  terminate  नक्षत्र  and fund development  of  a heavy  लिफ्ट   लॉन्च  vehicle  (  HLLV ) .
in  the 2000s  ,   the  People  's   गणतंत्र  of  चीन  initiated a  कामयाब  manned spaceflight  कार्यक्रम   ,   जबकि   the   यूरोपीय  Union , Japan , and  इण्डिया   have  also  नियोजित  future  मानवयुक्त   स्पेस  missions  .
China  ,  Russia  ,   जापानी   ,  and India  have   advocated   मानवयुक्त  missions to  the  Moon during  the  21st  सदी   ,  while  the  European  संघ   रै   advocated   मानवयुक्त   मिशन   to   दोनो   the   चंद्रमा  and Mars during  the  21st century .
From the 1990s onwards  ,  private interests began  promoting  space  पर्यटन   और   तब  private space exploration  of   the  Moon ( see Google  चंद्र  X  पुरस्कार  )  .
John Calvin Coolidge ,  jr.   (  July 4 , 1872January 5  ,  1933  )   थी   the  30th President  of  the United States  (  1923–1929  )  .
A  रिपब्लिकन   वकील  from  वर्मांट  , Coolidge worked  उसके   रास्ता  up  the  ladder  of  Massachusetts  राज्य  politics ,  आखिरकार  becoming  राज्यपाल   of   कि  state .
उसके   conduct   दौरान  the  बोस्टन  Police  स्ट्राइक  of  1919   thrust  him into  the  national spotlight  और   दिया   उसे  a reputation  as   a   man  of  निर्णायक  action  .
Soon after ,  he   थी  elected as  the  29th Vice President in 1920 and succeeded to  the   प्रेसिडेंसी  upon the sudden death  of  Warren  G.   हार्डिंग   in   1923   .
Elected  in   उसके  own  सही   in  1924 ,  he  gained a reputation as  a   small-government   रूढ़िवादी   ,   और   भी  as a man  जो  said very little  .
Coolidge  लौटी   पब्लिक   विश्वास  in the White House  बाद   the  scandals of  उसके  predecessor 's  प्रशासन  , and left  दफ्तर   साथ  considerable popularity .
as  a Coolidge biographer put it  ,  ``  he  embodied the spirit and hopes  of   the   मध्य  class , could  interpret   उनके  longings and express their opinions .
कि   he  did  represent  the genius of the average  is  the most  convincing   प्रमाण   of   उसके   शक्ति  . ''
Some later  criticized   कूलिज   as   भाग  of  a   सामान्य   आलोचना   of  laissez-faire government  .
उसके  reputation  underwent  a renaissance  दौरान   the   रोनाल्ड   reagan  Administration  ,   लकिन   the   परम   मूल्यांकन   of  his  प्रेसिडेंसी  is still divided between  those  who approve of his reduction of the  आकार   of   सरकारी  programs and  those  who believe  the  federal government should be  अधिक  involved in  regulating  and  controlling   the   अर्थव्यवस्था  .
Espresso is  a   concentrated  beverage  brewed  by forcing a small  राशि  of nearly  खौलते   जल  under  दबाव  through  finely   मैदान   कॉफी   सेम  .
Espresso often has a thicker consistency than coffee  brewed  by other  विधि   ,   a   उच्चतर  concentration of  निलंबित  and dissolved solids , and crema (  अर्थ  cream , but being  a   सन्दर्भ   to   the   झाग  with  a  creamy texture that forms as  a  result of  the   दबाव  ) .
as   a   परिणाम  of the  pressurized   brewing  process the flavors and chemicals  in  a typical cup of  एस्प्रेसो  are very  concentrated   .
Espresso  is   the  base for  अन्य  drinks  ,  such  as  a latte ,  कापुचीनो  , macchiato  ,  mocha  ,  or americano .
Espresso has more  कैफीन   प्रति  unit volume than  सबसे   पेय   ,   लकिन   the   usual  serving  आकार   is  smaller—a  ठेठ  60  ml   (   2  US fluid  ounce  ) of espresso  रै   80  to 150 mg  of   कैफीन  , little less than the  95  to  200   mg  of a standard  240   ml  ( 8  us   द्रव   औंस  )  कप   of  drip-brewed coffee  .
ब्रायन  Keith Kelly ( born  अक्तूबर   25  ,  1961  ) is an  अमरीकी  football  कोच   और  former player .
He  is  currently  the  head football  कोच  for the  notre  Dame Fighting  आयरिश  , a  स्थिति   he   रै  held since  दिसम्बर  2009  .
Kelly was  previously  head  कोच  at Grand Valley State University ( 1991–2003  )  , Central  मिशिगन   विश्वविद्यालयों   (   2004–2006  ) ,  और  University  of   सिनसिनाटी   (  2006–2009 ) .
A  अनुबंध   is   an   अनुबंध   having  a lawful object entered into voluntarily  by   दो  or more  पार्टियों  ,  प्रत्येक  of whom  intends  to create  एक   or   अधिक   विधिक  obligations  between  them .
The  तत्व  of a contract are ``  प्रस्ताव  '' and `` acceptance ''  by  ``  competent  persons  ''   having   विधिक   क्षमता  who exchange `` consideration '' to  बनाएँ  `` mutuality  of   दायित्व   .  ''
प्रमाण   of  some or  सब  of  ये   तत्व  may be  किया   in  writing  ,  though  अनुबंध  may  be   बना  entirely orally or by conduct  .
The remedy for  उल्लंघन   of   अनुबंध  can be `` damages '' in the form of  मुआवजे   of   धन  or  विशिष्ट  performance  enforced   through   an  injunction  .
Both of these remedies award the party  at  loss the `` benefit  of  the bargain  ''  or  अपेक्षा  damages ,  जिससे  are  वृहद  than mere  रिलायंस   क्षतिपूर्ति  , as  in  promissory  estoppel  .
The  पार्टियों  may be natural  व्यक्तियों  or juristic persons  .
A  अनुबंध   is  a  legally  enforceable  वादा  or undertaking  कि   कुछ   होगा   or  will not occur  .
The word promise  can   be  used as  a   विधिक  synonym  लिये   अनुबंध  , although  परवाह  is required  as  a promise may not have the  पूरा  standing of  a  contract  ,  as when it  is  an agreement without  विचार  .
अनुबंध   विधि  varies greatly from one jurisdiction to  another   ,  including differences  in  common law compared to civil  विधि  , the  प्रभाव   of  received law , particularly  इससे   इंग्लैण्ड  in  आम  law countries ,  और  of  विधि  codified in  क्षेत्रीय  legislation .
Regarding Australian Contract  विधि  for example ,  वहीँ   हैं   40   प्रासंगिक   अधिनियमों  which  प्रभाव   on   the  interpretation of contract at  the   राष्ट्रमंडल  (  संघीय  /  नेशनल  ) level  ,  and an additional 26 acts at the level of the  राज्य  of  nsw   .
In addition  वहीँ  are 6 international instruments  or  conventions  जिससे   हैं  applicable for international  dealings  , such  as  the United  राष्ट्र  Convention on  अनुबंध  for the International  बिक्री   of   goods  .
sidney  Patrick Crosby , ONS ( born August  7  ,  1987   )   is  a Canadian professional ice hockey player who  is  captain of  the   पिट्सबर्ग   penguins  of the National Hockey  लीग  ( NHL ) .
crosby  was  drafted  first overall by the Penguins  आउट  of the Quebec Major  जूनियर  Hockey  लीग  (  qmjhl   )  .
दौरान   उसके  two-year  प्रमुख  junior career  साथ  the  rimouski   océanic   ,   he  earned back-to-back CHL Player of the  साल  awards  और  led his club  to   the   2005   मेमोरियल   कप  final .
Nicknamed ``  the  Next One `` , he  थी  one  of  the  सबसे   अत्यधिक  regarded draft picks  in   हॉकी   इतिहास   ,  leading many  to  refer to  the  2005 Draft Lottery  as  the ``  sidney  Crosby Sweepstakes ''  .
In his first NHL season  ,  Crosby finished sixth  in  league  स्कोरिंग  with 102 points (  39   लक्ष्य  ,  63  assists  )   और   थी   a  runner-up for the Calder Memorial Trophy (  जीती  by Alexander  ovechkin  )  .
by  his  दूसरी  season  ,  he led the  एनएचएल   साथ  120 points ( 36 goals , 84  assists   )   to  capture  the  Art  रॉस   ट्रॉफी   ,  becoming the youngest player and  the   तभी  teenager to  जीत  a  स्कोरिंग   शीर्षक  in  कोई  major North American  खेल   लीग   .
कि  same season ,  crosby  also won  the  Hart Memorial Trophy as  the  Professional  हॉकी  Writers Association 's  चुनाव   लिये  most valuable player and  the  Lester  B.   पियर्सन   पुरस्कार   as   the   एनएचएल   खिलाड़ी  Association  's   चुनाव   लिये  most  बकाया  player ,  बनने   the  seventh player in  एनएचएल   इतिहास   to   earn   सब  three awards in one  साल  .
Crosby started  the  2007–08 season with the  टोली  's  कप्तानी  and  subsequently   led  them to the  2008  Stanley Cup  फाइनल   ,  where  वे   यहूद   पराजित   by  the Detroit Red  विंग्स   in  six  खेल  .
the  Penguins  लौटे   to  the  फाइनल   विरूद्ध  Detroit the  following   साल   और  won  in   सात  games ; Crosby became  the  youngest captain  in  NHL  इतिहास  to win  the  Stanley  कप   .
In the 2009–10 season , Crosby scored a career-high 51 goals , tying him  साथ  Steven  stamkos  for the Rocket Richard Trophy  as   the   league-leader   ;   साथ  58 assists ,  he  totaled 109  अंक  ,  दूसरी   in   the   एनएचएल   .
दौरान   the  off-season  ,   crosby   प्राप्त   the   चिह्नित   मेसियर  Leadership Award  .
In 2010–11  ,   crosby   sustained  a concussion  as  a result of  हिट्स  to the  सिर  in back-to-back  खेल   .
the  injury  बाएँ  him  sidelined   लिये  ten  और  a half months .
However  ,   बाद  playing eight games  in   the  2011–12  ऋतु  , Crosby 's concussion-like  लक्षण  returned in  दिसम्बर   2011   ,  and he  किया   नहीं  return  जबतक   mid-march  2012  .
internationally  , Crosby  रै   represented  Canada  in   numerous  tournaments  लिये   the   देश   's   जूनियर  and  मेन  's  टीमों  .
After competing in the 2003  u-18  Junior  संसार  Cup , he  represented  Canada  in  back-to-back IIHF World  u20   championships   ,   जीतना   चांदी  in 2004 and  सुनहरा   in   2005  .
At  the  2006 IIHF  संसार  Championship , he  led  the tournament  in  scoring ,  जबकि   भी  earning Top  आगे  and  all-star   टोली  honours .
Four years  बाद   ,   crosby  was named to  टोली  Canada for  the   2010   शीत  Olympics  in   वैंकूवर  .
playing  the  संयुक्त  States  in  the  सुनहरा  medal  खेल   ,   he   scored  the game-winning goal in overtime  .
a   संयुक्त  States  cent  , also known  as  a  पैनी  .
``  My  दो  cents ''  (   2¢  ) and  इसके  longer version  ``   put  my  दो   सेंट  in '' is an United States ( US  )   idiomatic   अभिव्यक्ति   ,  taken from  the   असली  English idiom  अभिव्यक्ति   :   to   put  in `` my  दो  pennies worth  ''  or  ``  my tuppence worth  .  ''
it  is used  to   preface  the  अंतरिम   stating  of one’s opinion .
By deprecating the opinion to  follow  – suggesting  इसके   मान   is   तभी  two  सेंट  ,  a   बहुत  small amount  –  the  उपयोक्ता   of  the  phrase  hopes  to   lessen  the impact  of  a  संभवतः   बयान  , showing  politeness  and humility .
however  , it is  भी  sometimes used  साथ  irony  जब  expressing a  strongly  felt  राय  .
the   phrase  is  भी  used out  of   आदत  to preface uncontentious opinions .
लिये   example:
The  चाइनीज  Civil War was  a   सिविल  war in China  लड़ा  between  शक्तियां   वफ़ादार   to   the  government of  the  Republic of China  led   by   the  Kuomintang (  kmt   )   और   शक्तियां   of  the Communist Party  of  China  (  CPC ) .
The  युद्ध  began in April  1927  , amidst  the   उत्तरी  Expedition  ,  and essentially ended when major active battles ceased  in  1950  .
the  conflict eventually resulted  in   दो   de  facto states , the  गणतंत्र  of China  (  ROC ) in  ताईवान  and  the   लोगों  's  गणतंत्र  of China  (  PRC )  in   मेनलैंड   चीन  , both  claiming  to  be   the   legitimate   सरकारी  of  चीन   .
the   युद्ध  represented an ideological  विभाजित  (  बाएँ   vs   .  Right ) between  the  Communist CPC ,  और  the  kmt  's  ब्रांड  of Nationalism .
the  civil war  जारी  intermittently until late 1937 ,  जब   the  two  पार्टियों  formed a Second  संयुक्त  Front  to   काउंटर  a Japanese  आक्रमण   .
चीन   's   full-scale  civil  युद्ध   resumed   in  1946 , a  साल   बाद   the   समाप्त   of  hostilities  साथ   जापानी  .
बाद  four  अधिक  years  ,   1950   देखी  the  cessation  of major military hostilities—with the  newly   संस्थापित  People  's  Republic  of  China controlling mainland China (  सहित  Hainan )  ,   और   the   गणतंत्र   of  China  's  jurisdiction  होने  restricted  to  Taiwan , Penghu , Quemoy , Matsu  और  several  outlying   आइलैंड्स  .
the  Kuomintang defeat is  attributed  to several  कारकों  : Corruption  -  Chiang  लिखा  in  उसके  diary  on  June  1948   कि  the KMT  था   विफल   ,  not because  of   बाह्य  enemies but because of rot from within  .
Strong initial support  इससे   the   u.S.  diminished , and  तब  , stopped .
(   partly  because  of  KMT corruption and anti-democratic regime , and  partly   क्युकी  of  the   अनिश्चित   u.S.   विदेशी   नीति   towards  Communism  between  1945 and  1950   )  ; Communist  जमीन  reform  नीति   promised  poor  peasants  farmland from  उनके  landlords  .
This ensured PLA  लोकप्रिय   support  .
After the surrender  of   जापानी  at  the   समाप्त  of World  युद्ध   ii  ,  सोवियत  forces  turned  over  उनके   captured   जापानी   हथियार  to  the   cpc   और  allowed  the  CPC to  लो  control of territory in  मंचूरिया  .
to   इस  day ,  no   armistice  or peace  सन्धि   रै  ever been  हस्ताक्षरित  ,  और   it  is  debated   as   to  the whether the  सिविल   युद्ध  has legally  ended  .
cross-strait  relations have  महरूम  hindered by  सैन्य  threats and political and economic  दबाव  , particularly over  ताईवान  's political  औकात   ,  with both governments officially adhering  to   a   ``   one-china  policy  .   ''
the  PRC  स्टिल  actively claims  ताईवान   as  part of its territory  और  continues  to   threaten   the   आरओसी  with  a   सैन्य   आक्रमण  if  the   आरओसी  officially declares independence  by  changing  इसके  name to  और  gaining international  मान्यता   as   the  Republic  of  Taiwan  .
the  ROC mutually  दावा   मेनलैंड  China  ,   और  they both continue  the   लड़ो  over  राजनयिक  recognition  .
Today , the war  as  such  occurs  on  the   राजनैतिक  and economic  fronts  in  the  form of  cross-strait  relations ; however  ,   the   दो   पृथक  de facto states  have   बंद   आर्थिक  ties  .
The  एक   सौ  Twelfth United  राज्य  Congress was the meeting  of  the  विधान  branch of  the  United States  संघीय  government , from  जनवरी  3 ,  2011  until January 3 ,  2013   .
it  convened in Washington ,  d.C.  on January  3  , 2011 ,  और  ended  on   जनवरी  3  ,   2013  , 17 days before  the   समाप्त  of  the   अध्यक्षीय  term  to   जिससे  Barack Obama  थी  elected in 2008 .
सीनेटरों  elected to  नियमित   शर्तें  in  2006   समाप्त  those  शर्तें   in   इस  Congress .
This Congress  शामिल  the last House  of  Representatives elected from congressional  जिले   कि   यहूद   apportioned   आधारित  on the 2000  जनसांख्यिकी  .
in  the  2010  midterm elections , the  रिपब्लिकन  Party  जीती   the  majority  in   the   हाउस   of  Representatives .
While the Democrats  रखा  their Senate majority ,  it  was  घटाया   इससे  the previous Congress  .
This was the  पहला  Congress in which the House and  सीनेट  were controlled by different parties  चूंकि  the  107th  Congress ( 2001–2003 )  ,   और   the   पहला   कॉंग्रेस  to  शुरू  that way  चूंकि  the 99th Congress (  1985–1987  ) .
In this Congress  ,   the   हाउस  of  प्रतिनिधि   था  the largest  क्रमांक  of  रिपब्लिकन  members , 242  ,  since the 80th Congress (  1947–1949  ) .
It was  भी  the first Congress  चूंकि  1947 in which no member  of  the Kennedy family served ,  as  well  as  the most  नीतियां   polarized  Congress  चूंकि   पुनर्निर्माण  , with record  कम  approval ratings .
Wealth in the  संयुक्त  States is  commonly   measured  in  शर्तें  of net worth , which  is  the  योग   of  all assets  ,  including home  इक्विटी  ,  ऋण   सब  liabilities .
the   कुल  net worth of US  households  and  nonprofit  organizations 1945–2009 , unadjusted for inflation or population  बदलें  .
For example , a household  in  possession of an $ 800,000  हाउस  ,  $   5,000   in  mutual funds ,  $  30,000 in  गाड़ियाँ  ,  $   20,000   लायक   of  stock in their  अपना  company ,  और  a  $  45,000 IRA would  have  assets  totaling   $  900,000  .
Assuming that  इस   household   होता  have a $  250,000   बंधक  , $ 40,000  in   car  loans , and  $   10,000   in  credit  कार्ड  debt , its debts would total $  300,000  .
subtracting   the   debts   इससे  the worth of  इस  household 's assets  (  900,000  -  $  300,000  =  $  600,000 ) ,  इस   household  would have  a   जाल   लायक  of $ 600,000 .
Net  लायक   can   vary  with  fluctuations   in  value of the underlying assets .
the   माल   —more  specifically ,  the   मध्य  net worth—of households  in   the  United  राज्य   is  varied with  संबंध  to race , education  ,   भौगोलिक   स्थान  and gender .
As  एक  would  expect   ,   households   साथ  greater  आय  feature  the   उच्चतम   जाल  worths ,  हालांकि  high income  can  not be taken  as  an always  सटीक   indicator  of net  लायक   .
overall  the number of wealthier households  is   on  the  वृद्धि   ,   साथ  baby  boomers  hitting the  highs   of   उनके   करियर  .
In addition  ,  wealth  is  unevenly  वितरित  ,  साथ   the  wealthiest  25   %   of  US households  owning   87  % of  the   माल  in  the   संयुक्त  States ,  जिससे  was $  54.2  trillion  in   2009  .
Including human capital  ऐसे  as skills ,  the  United Nations estimated  the  total  माल  of the  संयुक्त  States in  2008  to  be   $  118 trillion  .
This  आलेख  deals with  चयनात्मक  Dorsal Rhizotomy  (   sdr   )   बल्कि  than  the  rhizotomy procedures for pain  राहत  ;  लिये  those  प्रक्रियाओं  ,  जिससे   have   begun   to   लो  the  नाम   ``   rhizotomy  '' in certain  उदाहरण   ,   देखिए  facet rhizotomy and  समान   .
A rhizotomy  (   )  is a term  chiefly   referring   to   a   neurosurgical  procedure that selectively destroys problematic  तंत्रिका  roots in the  स्पाइनल  cord , most often to  relieve  the symptoms  of  neuromuscular conditions such as  spastic  diplegia and other forms of spastic cerebral palsy .
the  selective dorsal  rhizotomy  ( SDR  )  for spastic cerebral palsy  रै   महरूम   the  main use  of   rhizotomy   लिये   neurosurgeons   specialising  in  spastic  CP since  the   1980s  ; in  इस  surgery  ,   the  spasticity-causing nerves are isolated and then  targeted  and  नष्ट   .
The  संवेदी   तंत्रिका   जड़ें   ,   जहाँ   spasticity   is   स्तिथ   ,   हैं   पहला  separated  इससे  the motor  ones  , and  the  nerve fibres  to  be cut  हैं   तब  identified via  electromyographic  stimulation  .
The ones producing spasticity are then selectively  lesioned  with  छोटा  electrical pulses  .
In  spasticity   ,  rhizotomy precisely targets  और  destroys the damaged  nerves   कि  don’t  प्राप्त   गामा   अमीनो  butyric acid , which is the core  प्रॉब्लम   लिये   लोगों  with spastic cerebral  palsy  .
These over-firing ,  non-gaba-absorbing  nerves generate unusual  विद्युत  activity during the EMG  परीक्षण  phase in  sdr   और  are thus considered to be  the   सोर्स  of  the   रोगी   's   hypertonia  ;  वे  are eliminated with  the   विद्युत   pulses  once  पहचाना   ,  while  the   बाकी   nerves  and nerve  रूट  carrying the  सही  messages remain fully intact  और  untouched .
This means that the  spasticity   is   permanently   dissolved  , and that  इस  is done without  affecting  nervous  प्रणाली   संवेदनशीलता  or  फलन   in   अन्य   क्षेत्रों  , because the  तभी   nerves   नष्ट  are the  over-firing  ones  जिम्मेदार   लिये   the  muscle tightness .
the  terms  rhizotomy   और   neurotomy  are also increasingly becoming interchangeable in the  उपचार  of chronic  वापस  pain from  अपक्षयी   डिस्क   बीमारी  .
इस  is a  कार्यविधि   पुकारा  a  facet  rhizotomy  और  is not a  सर्जिकल  procedure but is  बजाय  done  on  an  outpatient   आधार  using  a   सरल  probe to apply radiofrequency  लहरें   to  the impinged  pain-causing   तंत्रिका  root  lying   between  the facet  संयुक्त   और  the  vertebral  body .
Such  रेडियो  frequency  तंत्रिका   lesioning  results in five to eight  or   अधिक  months  of   पीड़ा  relief before the  तंत्रिका   regenerates  and another round of the procedure needs  to   be  performed  .
a   facet  rhizotomy is just one  of  many different  फ़ॉर्म  of  radiofrequency  ablation  ,  and  इसके   उपयोग  of the  ``   rhizotomy  '' name  चाहिए  not be  उलझन   साथ  the SDR  कार्यविधि   .
Migrant workers in California  ,   1935
The  पद  migrant  कार्यकर्ता   रै  different  आधिकारिक   meanings  and  connotations   in   अलग  parts  of   the  world .
the   संयुक्त   राष्ट्र  ' definition is  व्यापक  , including any  लोगों   working   बाहर  of  उनके   घर  country  .
The term can  भी  be used  to   describe   किसी  who migrates within  a   देश   ,  possibly their own  ,  in order to pursue work  ऐसे  as seasonal work  .
Photograph of Lil Wayne with teardrop tattoos below his eyes  .
The  teardrop   टैटू   or  tear tattoo is a symbolic tattoo that  is  placed  underneath  the  नजर  .
it  has no fixed meaning but almost  सब   meanings  (  देखिए   नीचे  ) have  कुछ  connection  to   थाना  .
U.S.  रूट  75 is a north–south  u.S.   राजमार्ग  .
The highway 's northern  टर्मिनस   is  in Kittson County  ,   मिनेसोटा   ,   at  the  कनाडाई   किनारा  , where  it  once continued  as  Manitoba Highway 75  on   the  other side  of  the  now-closed   किनारा  crossing .
Its southern terminus is  at   अंतरराज्यीय   30   और   अंतरराज्यीय   45   in   डलास   ,  Texas , where  it   is   ज्ञात  as  उत्तर   सेंट्रल  Expressway .
U.S. 75  थी  a  border-to-border  route  ,  from Canada  to  the Gulf  of   मैक्सिको   at  Galveston , Texas  .
however  , the  संपूर्ण   खण्ड   दक्षिण   of  Dallas ,  टेक्सास  has been  decommissioned  in  एहसान   of  Interstate  45   ,  a cutoff section of  town-to-town  surface road having become State  राजमार्ग  75 .
Lower Ninth Ward is  a  neighborhood of  the  city  of   नई   ऑरलियन्स   .
As  the   नाम   implies  , it is part  of   the   नवीं  Ward of New Orleans .
The Lower  नवीं  Ward is often thought  of   as  the  संपूर्ण  area  भीतर  New  ऑरलियन्स  downriver of the Industrial Canal ;  however  , the City Planning Commission divides  इस   क्षेत्रफल   into  the  निम्नतर  Ninth Ward ( 2  )   और   पावन  Cross  (  3  )  neighborhoods  .
the  term  ``   निम्नतर  ''  refers   to  its location farther  towards   the   मुँह   of   the  Mississippi River , `` down  ''   or  `` below ''  the  rest of  the   नगर  in  लोकल   भौगोलिक   शब्दावली  .
But the  9th  Ward , like all Wards in New Orleans , is  a   मतदान  district .
The  9th   वार्ड  was  added  as  a  voting district in  1852  .
The  ``   निम्नतर  '' 9th Ward is composed of  वार्ड   9  Districts 1  ,  2  ,  4 , and 7 which make up the Holy Cross Area and Ward  9   जिले  3  ,  5  ,  6  ,   और  8  .
उच्चतर  voting district  संख्याएँ  in  the   9th   वार्ड  ( 8-27 ) are on the upriver side  of  the  औद्योगिक  Canal  .
The area came  to   नेशनल   ध्यान   लिये  its devastation in the aftermath  of  Hurricane Katrina in  2005   .
Hubble views of  कोपरनिकस  crater  (   इनसेट  )  ,  which is  परिचय  58 miles ( 93  km   )   चौड़ी
Red  और   नारंगी   tinted  Moon , as seen from Earth  दौरान   a   चंद्र  eclipse , where the Earth comes  between  the  चंद्रमा  and Sun
The Moon is the  तभी  natural satellite of the Earth  ,   और  the fifth largest  उपग्रह   in  the Solar System  .
it  is  the  largest  प्राकृतिक  satellite  of  a  ग्रह  in the  सौर   प्रणाली  relative to  the   आकार  of its primary ,  having  27 % the diameter  और   60  % the density of Earth , resulting in its mass .
the   चंद्रमा  is the second densest satellite after Io  ,   a   उपग्रह   of   बृहस्पति  .
The  चंद्रमा  is  in   तुल्यकालिक  rotation with Earth ,  सदा  showing  the  same face with its  निकट  side marked by dark volcanic maria  कि   भरण   between  the bright  प्राचीन   crustal   हाइलैंड्स  and the prominent  प्रभाव   craters   .
it  is the  brightest   ऑब्जेक्ट  in  the  sky after the Sun , although  इसके  surface is  दरअसल   बहुत  dark  ,   साथ  a  reflectance  similar  to  that  of   कोयले   .
इसके  prominence  in   the   आसमान   और   इसके  regular  साईकिल  of phases  have   ,  since ancient times ,  बना  the Moon  an   महत्वपूर्ण  cultural influence on  भाषा  ,  पंचांग  , art and  mythology  .
The Moon 's  गुरुत्वाकर्षक  influence  produces   the   समंदर  tides and  the   मिनट  lengthening  of  the day .
The Moon 's  वर्तमान   कक्षीय  distance , about  तीस  times  the   व्यास   of  the Earth  ,  causes  it   to  appear  लगभग  the same  आकार  in the sky as  the  Sun , allowing  it   to   कवर  the Sun  nearly  precisely in  कुल   सौर  eclipses  .
This matching of  apparent  visual size is a coincidence .
the  Moon 's linear  अलहदा  from the  धरती  is currently increasing at  a  rate  of   3.82±0.07cm  per year  ,   लकिन  this rate  is  not  निरंतर   .
The  चंद्रमा  is thought to have formed  nearly  4.5 billion years ago , not  long  after  the  Earth .
हालांकि  there  have   महरूम   अनेक  hypotheses  लिये  its  उत्पत्ति  in the  पास्ट  ,  the  current  सबसे  widely  स्वीकृत   स्पष्टीकरण   is  that  the   चंद्रमा  formed  इससे  the debris left  over  after  a  giant impact  between  Earth and  a   मंगल  -sized body .
The  चंद्रमा  is  the  only  celestial   देह   अन्य   than   धरती  on which humans have set  पैर   .
the  Soviet Union 's  luna  programme was the  पहला   to   पहुँचें  the Moon  साथ  unmanned  spacecraft  in 1959  ;  the United  राज्य  ' NASA Apollo program  हासिल  the only  मानवयुक्त  missions  to  date ,  शुरूआत  with  the  first  मानवयुक्त   चंद्र  orbiting mission  by   अपोलो  8  in   1968  , and  छह  manned lunar  अवतरण  between  1969  and  1972  ,  साथ   the  first being  अपोलो  11  .
ये   मिशन   लौटे   over   380   kg  of lunar  रॉक्स  , which  have   महरूम   प्रयुक्त  to  develop   a   geological  understanding  of  the  चंद्रमा   's  origins , the  गठन  of its  आतंरिक  structure  ,  and its subsequent history .
After the Apollo  17   मिशन  in 1972  ,   the  Moon has  महरूम  visited only by unmanned  spacecraft   ,   notably  by  the  final  सोवियत   lunokhod   रोवर  .
Since  2004  , Japan ,  चीन   ,  India , the United States ,  और   the  European  स्पेस  Agency  have  each sent lunar orbiters .
These spacecraft  have  contributed to  confirming   the  discovery  of   चंद्र   जल  ice in permanently  shadowed   craters  at the  डंडे  and  बंधी   into  the lunar  regolith   .
भविष्य  manned missions to  the   चंद्रमा   have  been planned , including government  as  well as privately  वित्तपोषित  efforts .
The Moon  remains   ,   अंतर्गत   the  Outer Space  सन्धि  , free  to  all  राष्ट्र  to  explore   लिये   शांतिपूर्ण   उद्देश्य   .
रोनाल्ड  Wilson Reagan (  ;   फ़रवरी  6  ,   1911   –   जून  5 , 2004 )  थी  the  40th  President of  the  United  राज्य  ( 1981–1989  )   .
prior  to that  ,   he  was  the  33rd Governor  of  California (  1967–1975  ) ,  और   a  radio , film  और   टेलीविज़न  actor .
Born in  tampico   ,   इलिनोइस   ,  and  उठाया   in  Dixon , Reagan was educated at Eureka College , earning a  स्नातक   of  Arts  उपाधि  in  अर्थशास्त्र  and sociology .
After graduating  ,  Reagan moved first to Iowa to  कार्य  as a radio  प्रसारणकर्ता  and then , in  1937   ,  to Los Angeles where he  began   a  career  as   an  actor , first in  films  and later television  .
कुछ   of   उसके  most  notable  films include  knute  Rockne , All American (  1940   )   ,   किंग्स  Row  (  1942 ) ,  और   bedtime  for  bonzo  ( 1951 ) .
reagan  served as  अध्यक्ष  of the  स्क्रीन  Actors  गिल्ड  and later  as   a  spokesman  लिये  General Electric  (  GE  )  ; his start  in  politics  occurred  during his work  लिये  GE  .
Originally  a   सदस्य   of  the  लोकतांत्रिक  Party , his positions  began  shifting rightward  in  the  1950s  ,  और   he  switched  to  the  रिपब्लिकन  Party in  1962  .
After delivering  a  rousing speech  in   support   of  Barry  goldwater  's  अध्यक्षीय  candidacy in  1964   ,   he   थी  persuaded to  तलाश  the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  governorship  ,  winning  दो  years later  और  again in 1970  .
He was defeated in  उसके   चलाएं  for  the  Republican presidential nomination in  1968  and  in  1976  ,  but won  दोनो  the nomination and  सामान्य  election in 1980  ,  defeating  लाज़िम   jimmy  Carter .
As president , Reagan implemented sweeping new political and  आर्थिक  initiatives .
His  supply-side  economic policies ,  उतावले  ``  reaganomics   ``  , advocated reducing  कर   दरों   to  spur  आर्थिक  growth  ,  controlling the  धन  supply to  reduce  inflation , deregulation of  the  economy , and reducing government  बिता  .
in  his  पहला  term  he  survived an  हत्या  attempt  ,  took a  मुश्किल  line against labor unions , announced  a  new War on Drugs  ,  and ordered  an  invasion  of  Grenada .
he   थी  re-elected  in   a  landslide  in  1984 , proclaiming  कि  it was `` Morning  in   अमेरिका   ``  .
His second  पद  was primarily marked  by   विदेशी  matters  ,   ऐसे  as  the   समाप्ति   of   the   ठंडा   युद्ध  ,  the  1986 bombing  of  Libya  ,  and the revelation of the Iran-Contra affair  .
Publicly describing the Soviet Union as an `` evil  साम्राज्य  `` ,  he  supported anti-communist movements  विश्वव्यापी  and spent  उसके  first  पद   forgoing  the strategy of  détente  by ordering  a   विशाल  military buildup in an  बाहें   रेस  with  the   ussr  .
reagan   negotiated  with Soviet  सामान्य   सचिव   मिखाइल  Gorbachev , culminating in  the  INF Treaty and  the  decrease of both  देशों   '  nuclear  arsenals   .
Reagan  बाएँ   दफ्तर  in  1989  .
In  1994  ,  the  former  अध्यक्ष  disclosed that he  था   महरूम   diagnosed   साथ   अल्जाइमर   's   बीमारी  earlier in the year  ;  he died ten years  बाद   at  the age  of   93   .
A conservative  प्रतीक   ,  he  बाँधने   अत्यधिक   in  public  राय  polls  of  U.S.  राष्ट्रपतियों   और   is   credited  for generating  an  ideological renaissance on the American political right .
Complete  नियत   of   scrolls   ,   constituting   the  entire Tanakh .
The  tanakh  (  ,  or  ;   भी   tenakh  , Tenak  ,  Tanach )  is   a   नाम  used in Judaism for  the  canon of the Hebrew Bible .
The Tanakh is also known  as   the  Masoretic  टेक्स्ट  or  the  Miqra .
The  नाम  is an  एक्रोनिम  formed from the  आरंभिक  Hebrew letters of the Masoretic Text 's three  परंपरागत   subdivisions  : The Torah  (  `` Teaching '' ,  भी  known as  the   पाँच   किताबे   of   मूसा  ) ,  nevi'im   (  `` Prophets  ''   )  and Ketuvim (  ``   कृतियाँ  ''  )   —hence  TaNaKh .
The name `` Miqra  ''   (  מקרא ) , meaning `` that which  is  read '' ,  is   an  alternative Hebrew term  लिये  the Tanakh  .
The books  of  the Tanakh were  relayed  with an accompanying oral tradition  passed  on by each  पीढी   ,   पुकारा  the Oral  तोरा  .
the   कावासाकी  Ninja  zx-6r   is  a Kawasaki  600  cc  क्लास  sport  मोटरसाइकिल   .
it  was  introduced  in 1995 ,  और  has been constantly  अद्यतनीकृत  throughout  the   सालो   in   जवाब  to  नई  products from  होंडा   ,  Suzuki ,  और  Yamaha  .
the   zx  series is  कया  was  ज्ञात  as  the  Ninja  लकीर  of  कावासाकी   मोटरसाइकिल   in  the  1980s   और  still carries the name  आज  .
हत्या   कोशिशें  and  भूखंड  on Presidents  of   the  United States  have   महरूम   numerous  :  अधिक  than 20  कोशिशें   to   मार  sitting and former presidents  ,  as well as the Presidents-elect  ,  are known .
Four sitting presidents  have  been  मारे  : Abraham  lincoln   (   the  16th  अध्यक्ष   )  , James A. Garfield ( the 20th  अध्यक्ष  )  ,   विलियम   mckinley  ( the 25th President ) and John F. Kennedy  (  the 35th  अध्यक्ष  )  .
Two presidents were injured in attempted  assassinations   :  former President  थियोडोर  Roosevelt ( the 26th  अध्यक्ष  ) , and President  रोनाल्ड  Reagan (  the   40th  President )  .
हालांकि  the historian  j.w  .  क्लार्क  has suggested that  सबसे  American assassinations  यहूद  politically motivated actions  ,   carried  out by rational men , not  सब  such attacks  have   महरूम  undertaken  लिये  political reasons .
Some  हमलावर  had questionable  दिमागी  stability , and  a  few were  judged  legally insane  .
Since the Vice President  of   the   संयुक्त  States has  लिये  more than  a   सदी  been  निर्वाचित  from  the   वही   राजनैतिक  party  as  the  अध्यक्ष  ,  the  assassination of the President is unlikely  to   परिणाम  in major policy changes .
इस  may explain why  राजनैतिक  groups typically do not make such attacks .
Where the  रेड  Fern  grows  is  a  novel  लिखा  by  विल्सन   राल्स   in   1961  about a boy  जो  buys and trains two Redbone  coonhound   शिकार   कुत्तो  .
Oklahoma (  )  ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa ,  cay  :  gahnawiyoˀgeh   )   is  a state  स्तिथ   in  West South Central United States  .
ओक्लाहोमा  is the  20th   सबसे  extensive and  the  28th most populous of the  50  United  राज्य   .
The state 's name  is  derived from  the  Choctaw  शब्द   okla  and humma , meaning ``  रेड  people ''  ,  and it is known  informally   by   इसके  nickname  ,  The Sooner State  .
Formed  by   the  combination  of  Oklahoma Territory and  भारतीय   territory  on November  16  ,  1907  ,  ओक्लाहोमा   थी  the 46th  राज्य  to enter  the   संघ  .
Its residents are  ज्ञात  as Oklahomans  or  , informally `` Okies  ''  ,  और  its  पूंजी   और   largest  city  is   ओक्लाहोमा  City  .
a  major  निर्माता   of   प्राकृतिक  gas , oil  ,  and agriculture , Oklahoma  relies  on an  आर्थिक   आधार  of  विमानन  , energy  ,   दूरसंचार   ,  and  जैवप्रौद्योगिकी  .
It has  एक  of the fastest  growing   economies  in  the  nation , ranking among the top  राज्य  in  प्रति  capita  आय  growth  और   सकल   घरेलू  product growth .
ओक्लाहोमा  City and Tulsa serve  as  Oklahoma 's  प्राथमिक   आर्थिक   anchors  ,  साथ   nearly   दो   तिहाई  of  oklahomans   जीना  within their metropolitan statistical  क्षेत्रों  .
With small mountain ranges  ,  prairie , mesas , and eastern  वनों  , most  of   ओक्लाहोमा   झूठ  in  the  Great Plains  और  the U.S  .  Interior Highlands —a region especially  prone  to  कठोर   मौसम  .
In addition to having a prevalence  of   अंग्रेज़ी  , German ,  स्कॉटिश  , Irish and  देशी   अमरीकी  ancestry , more  than  25  देशी  American languages are  बोला  in Oklahoma , second only  to   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Oklahoma  is   स्तिथ   on   a   संगम  of three major American cultural regions and  historically  served as a  रूट  for  चौपायों  drives  ,  a  गंतव्य  for southern  settlers  , and  a  government-sanctioned  territory  for  देशी  Americans .
Redwall ,  by  Brian Jacques , is a series  of   children  's fantasy  novels  .
It is the  शीर्षक   of   the   पहला  book of the  श्रेणी  , published  in  1986 , as well as the name of the Abbey featured in  the   किताब  and the name  of   an  animated  tv  series based on  तीन   of  the novels (  redwall  ,  mattimeo  ,  और  Martin  the   योद्धा  ) , which first aired  in   1999   .
The  किताबे   हैं  primarily aimed  at   पुरानी  children ,  लकिन  have fans of all  आयु  .
There have been twenty-two  novels  and two  चित्र  books  प्रकाशित  .
The twenty-second , and final , novel  ,   the  Rogue Crew ,  थी  posthumously released on May 3 , 2011 .
Natural  गैस   is  usually measured  by   आवाज़   in  the  संयुक्त  States and is  stated   in  cubic  फीट  .
A cubic  पैर  of gas  is   the  amount of gas  needed  to fill a volume  of  one  घन  foot under set  शर्तें  of pressure and temperature.To  माप   larger  amounts  of  natural gas  ,  a  ``  therm  ''   is  used to denote 100 cubic feet , and `` mcf ''  is  used  to  denote 1,000  घन  feet .
To provide greater accuracy  in  comparing fuels , energy  सामग्री  is measured in  शर्तें  of  ``  British Thermal Units (  btu  's  )  . ''
A  btu  is  the  amount  of  heat required  to   उठाएँ  one  पाउंड   of  water ( approximately  a  pint  )  , one  उपाधि   फ़ारेनहाइट   at  or  बंद   to   इसके  point of  अधिकतम  density  .
One British therm ( symbol thm )  is   a  non- SI  ईकाई  of  ऊष्मा   उर्जा  equal to 100,000 British thermal units ( BTU  )   .
It is approximately the  उर्जा   समतुल्य   of   burning  100 cubic feet  (  often referred  to  as  1   ccf  ) of natural  गैस   .
चूंकि  (  प्राकृतिक  Gas  )  meters measure  आवाज़  and not energy content  ,  a therm  फ़ैक्टर   is  used  by   (  Natural ) gas  कंपनियाँ  to convert  the  volume of gas used to its heat equivalent  ,  and thus calculate  the  actual energy use  .
The  therm  factor is usually in  the  units therms/CCF  .
It  होगा   vary   साथ   the  mix of hydrocarbons in  the   प्राकृतिक   गैस   .
Natural gas  साथ  a higher than average concentration of ethane , propane or butane will have a higher therm factor  .
impurities  , such as carbon  डाइऑक्साइड  or nitrogen , lower the  therm  factor  .
the  volume of the gas  is   गणना   as  if measured at  मानक  temperature and pressure ( STP  )  .
The  ऊष्मा   सामग्री  of natural gas  is  solely  निर्भर  on the  संयोजन  of  the  gas , and is independent of temperature and pressure .
One therm is equal to about  105.5   megajoules  ,  25,200   kilocalories  or  29.3  kilowatt-hours .
One therm can  भी   be  provided by about of natural  गैस   .
The  therm   sometimes  has been  उलझन   साथ   the   thermie   (  see below  )   .
the  names of both  इकाई   आइये  from the  यूनानी  word for  ऊष्मा   .
A thermie ( th ) is  a  metric unit of heat  उर्जा  ,  भाग  of the meter-tonne-second system sometimes  प्रयुक्त  by  यूरोपीय  engineers .
The thermie is  बराबर   to  the amount  of   उर्जा   जरूरी   to  raise the  तापमान  of 1  टन  of  जल   by  1 °C  .
the  thermie  is   समतुल्य  to  1,000  kilocalories , 4.1868 megajoules  or   3968.3  BTU .
The  अमरीकी  Civil  युद्ध   (   acw  ) ,  भी   ज्ञात  as the War  between  the States  or   बस   the  Civil  युद्ध  ( see naming )  ,  was a civil war  लड़ा  from  1861   to  1865  between  the  संयुक्त  States (  the   ``  Union  ''   or  the ``  उत्तर  '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession  और   formed  the  confederate  States  of  America (  the  `` Confederacy '' or  the   ``  South  ''  ) .
the   युद्ध  had its origin in the issue of  गुलामी  , especially the  एक्सटेंशन   of  slavery  into   the   पश्चिमी  territories .
Foreign powers did  नहीं  intervene  .
बाद   चार   सालो  of bloody combat  कि   बाएँ  over  600,000   सैनिको   मुर्दे   और  destroyed much of  the  South  's  infrastructure , the  confederacy  collapsed ,  गुलामी   थी   abolished   ,  and  the   मुश्किल  Reconstruction process of  restoring  national  एकता   और  guaranteeing  अधिकारों  to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential  चुनाव   ,   republicans  , led by Abraham Lincoln ,  opposed   expanding   गुलामी  into  संयुक्त  States  '  territories .
Lincoln  जीती   ,   लकिन  before his  उद्घाटन  on March 4  ,  1861  ,  seven  cotton-based  slave states  formed  the Confederacy  .
outgoing   लोकतांत्रिक   अध्यक्ष  James Buchanan and the incoming  republicans   अस्वीकृत   secession  as  illegal   .
Lincoln 's  inaugural  address declared his administration  होता  not initiate  सिविल   युद्ध  .
Eight remaining  स्लेव  states  जारी   to  reject  काल्स   लिये  secession  .
Confederate  शक्तियां  seized  numerous  federal forts  भीतर   territory  claimed by  the   confederacy   .
a  Peace Conference  विफल  to find  a   सुलह   ,  and both sides  prepared  for  युद्ध  .
The Confederates assumed that  यूरोपीय   देशों   यहूद  so dependent  on   ``  King Cotton `` that  वे  would intervene  ;   none  did  और  none recognized  the  new Confederate  राज्य  of  अमेरिका  .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 ,  जब   confederate  forces  fired  upon Fort Sumter  ,   a   कुंजी  fort held by Union  सैनिकों  in South Carolina .
Lincoln called  लिये  each  राज्य  to  provide  troops to retake  the  fort ; consequently  ,  four more slave states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total  to   ग्यारह   .
The Union soon controlled the border  राज्य  and established  a  naval  नाकेबंदी  that  अबोध   the   दक्षिणी  economy  .
The Eastern  थिएटर   थी   inconclusive   in  1861–62 .
The  पतझड़  1862  confederate  campaign  into  Maryland ( a  संघ  state  )   ended   साथ  Confederate retreat  at   the   बैटल  of Antietam ,  dissuading  British intervention .
lincoln   जारी  the  emancipation   उदघोषणा   ,  which  बना  ending slavery  a   युद्ध  goal .
To  the   वेस्ट   ,  by  गर्मियाँ  1862 the Union destroyed  the   confederate  river navy  ,  then  much   of   उनके   पश्चिमी  armies  ,  and the Union  at   vicksburg  split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi  नदी   .
in  1863 ,  रॉबर्ट  E. Lee  's   confederate   incursion  north ended  at   the  Battle  of  Gettysburg .
Western successes  led   to  Ulysses  S.   ग्रान्ट  command of  सब  Union  सेना  in 1864  .
in  the  पश्चिमी   थिएटर  , William T.  शरमन   drove  east to capture Atlanta and marched to the  समुद्र  , destroying  confederate   अवसंरचना  along the way  .
The Union marshaled  the   संसाधन   और  manpower  to   आक्रमण  the Confederacy from all directions  ,  and could afford to  लड़ो  battles of attrition  through   the   overland   अभियान   towards  Richmond  ,  the Confederate  पूंजी   .
The  defending  Confederate  फौज  failed  ,   अग्रणी   to  Lee  's  surrender  to  Grant at Appomattox Court House  on   अप्रैल  9  ,  1865 .
the   अमरीकी   सिविल   युद्ध  was one  of  the  earliest   सच्चा   औद्योगिक  wars .
Railroads  ,  the telegraph , steamships  ,  and mass-produced weapons were  employed  extensively  .
The mobilization  of   civilian  factories  ,  mines , shipyards  ,  banks  ,  transportation  और  food supplies all foreshadowed  संसार  War I .
it  remains the deadliest  युद्ध   in   अमरीकी  history  ,   resulting   in  the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers  और  an  undetermined   क्रमांक  of civilian  हताहत  .
इतिहासकार  John  huddleston  estimates  the  death toll at ten percent of all  उत्तरी  males 20–45  सालो   बूढ़ा   ,  and  30  percent of  सब   दक्षिणी  white males aged  18–40  .
विलियम  Bruce  जेनर  ( born  अक्तूबर   28  , 1949 )  is  a former U.S. track and  फ़ील्ड   खिलाड़ी  , motivational speaker ,  socialite  ,  टेलीविज़न   व्यक्तित्व   और   बिजनेसमैन  .
he   जीती  the gold  पदक   लिये   decathlon   in  the  मॉन्ट्रियल  1976 Summer  ओलंपिक  .
Following his  ओलम्पिक  win  और  the related recognition  ,  he married  क्रिस   कार्दशियन   ,  and his  पेशेवर   करियर  evolved into being a television  हस्ती   .
By  1981   ,   he  had starred  in   अनेक  made-for-TV  फिल्मों  and was Erik Estrada  's  replacement on the top rated  tv  series CHiPs .
He has  छह  children : Burt ,  केसी  ,  ब्रैंडन   ,  Brody ,  केंडल  and Kylie .
चूंकि  his 1991  विवाह   to   क्रिस  Jenner , he is the stepfather  to  Kourtney  ,  Kim  ,   khloe  and  रोब  Kardashian  .
चूंकि  2007 ,  he  has  appeared   साथ  his blended  परिवार  on Keeping Up with  the   kardashians   .
Escherichia coli  (  ; commonly abbreviated E.  कोलाई  )  is   a  Gram-negative , rod-shaped bacterium  कि   is  commonly  मिला   in  the lower  आंत   of   warm-blooded  organisms  (   endotherms  )  .
Most  E.   कोलाई  strains are harmless ,  लकिन  some serotypes can cause  गंभीर  food  विषाक्तता  in  इंसानो   ,   और   हैं  occasionally  जिम्मेदार   लिये  product recalls  due  to food contamination  .
The  हानिरहित  strains are  भाग  of  the   सामान्य   फ्लोरा  of the gut , and can benefit  उनके  hosts by producing vitamin  k2   ,  and by  preventing   the   स्थापना   of  pathogenic bacteria  भीतर  the intestine  .
E.  कोलाई  and related  जीवाणु  constitute about  0.1  %  of   आंत   फ्लोरा  , and  fecal–oral   हस्तांतरण  is the major  रूट   through  which pathogenic strains  of  the  bacterium  cause disease  .
कोशिकाएं  are able to  जीवित   बाहर  the  देह   लिये   a   सीमित  amount of  समय   ,  which  makes  them ideal indicator organisms  to  test environmental samples for fecal contamination .
There is  ,  however ,  a  growing  देह  of research  कि  has examined  environmentally   persistent   E.   कोलाई  which can  जीवित   लिये   विस्तारित  periods outside of the host  .
The  bacterium  can also be  grown  easily and inexpensively in  a   प्रयोगशाला   सेटिंग  , and has been intensively investigated for  over  60  सालो  .
E.  कोलाई   is  the most  widely   पढ़ाई  prokaryotic  मॉडल  organism ,  और   an  important  प्रजाति   in  the fields of biotechnology  और   सूक्ष्मजैविकी   ,   जहाँ  it has served  as  the  मेजबान  organism  लिये  the  बहुमत  of work with recombinant  डीएनए  .
Area code  217  is the North American telephone  क्षेत्रफल   कोड  for much of western and  सेंट्रल  Illinois .
The 217  क्षेत्रफल   शामिल  Illinois '  पूंजी   ,  Springfield ,  प्लस   champaign   ,   urbana  ,  decatur  , Danville  ,   क्विंसी   ,   और  Rantoul .
217  was one  of  the original  क्षेत्रफल  codes , which were  निर्मित   in  1947  .
The only significant  बदलें  in 217 's boundaries  थी   in  1957  ,  when  इसके   उत्तरी   portion  was combined  साथ  part of area  कोड   815  to form  क्षेत्रफल  code  309  .
Image  of  the  largest  Antarctic ozone hole  कभी   अंकित   (  September  2006  ) , over the  दक्षिणी  pole
Layers of the atmosphere ( not to  स्केल   )
Ozone depletion describes  दो  distinct but related phenomena observed  चूंकि  the late 1970s : a steady decline  of  about  4   %   प्रति  decade  in  the total volume  of  ozone in Earth  's  stratosphere  (  the  ओज़ोन  layer  )  , and  a   much  larger springtime decrease  in   stratospheric  ozone  over  Earth  's  polar regions .
The latter phenomenon is  referred  to as the  ओज़ोन  hole  .
In  जोड  to these well-known stratospheric  phenomena  , there are  भी  springtime polar tropospheric ozone  depletion  events  .
The details of polar ozone hole  गठन  differ  इससे   कि   of  mid-latitude  thinning  ,  लकिन   the  most  महत्वपूर्ण  process in both is catalytic  विनाश  of  ओज़ोन  by  परमाणु  halogens .
The main  सोर्स   of   ये  halogen atoms in  the   stratosphere   is   photodissociation  of man-made halocarbon  refrigerants  ( CFCs ,  freons  , halons ) .
ये  compounds  हैं  transported  into   the   stratosphere   बाद   होने  emitted  at  the surface .
दोनो   प्रकार   of  ozone depletion were observed  to  increase as emissions  of   halo-carbons   increased  .
CFCs and other contributory  substances  are  referred  to  as  ozone-depleting substances (  ods  )  .
चूंकि   the   ओज़ोन   परत   रोकता   सबसे  harmful  uvb  wavelengths (  280–315  nm ) of ultraviolet  लाइट  ( UV light  )  from passing  through  the Earth 's atmosphere , observed  और   प्रक्षिप्त   decreases   in  ozone  have   उत्पन्न  worldwide concern  अग्रणी  to adoption  of  the  मॉन्ट्रियल   प्रोटोकॉल   कि   bans  the production of  cfcs   ,   halons   ,  and other ozone-depleting  रसायन  such as carbon tetrachloride and trichloroethane  .
It  is   suspected   कि  a variety of biological  consequences  such as  increases   in  skin cancer , cataracts  ,  damage  to   पौधे   ,   और  reduction of  प्लवक   populations  in the ocean 's photic  मण्डल   may  result  इससे   the  increased UV exposure  due   to  ozone  depletion  .
the  Preamble to the United States Constitution  is  a  ब्रैड  introductory  बयान  of  the   संविधान  's fundamental  उद्देश्य  and  guiding   सिद्धान्त   .
it   राज्य   in   सामान्य  terms , and courts have referred  to   it   as  reliable evidence  of   ,  the Founding Fathers ' intentions  regarding  the  संविधान   's   अर्थ   और  what they hoped the  संविधान  would achieve  as  it pertains to all  of   the  people of the United  राज्य  .
as  the phrase , `` we the  लोगों  ''  suggests  that  the  new government originates  इससे   the  people of the  संयुक्त   राज्य   और  it sets  into  motion a  सवाल   as   it  pertains to  कि   विशाल  population concerning  the  individual rights  और  equality among all  लोगों   ;   इस  can be seen  सबसे   broadly   in   the  divide between republicanism and social democracy .
czechoslovakian  shot  putter  Plihan at the 1957  ईस्ट  German Indoor Athletics  championships
The shot put  (   सुनाया  )  is  a track  और  field event  involving  ``  फेंकना  '' / ''  putting  ''  (   फेंकना  in a pushing  गति  )  a  heavy  गोलाकार   ऑब्जेक्ट  —the shot—as far as  संभावित   .
The  शॉट  put  प्रतियोगिता  for  मेन   रै   महरूम  a part of the  आधुनिक   ओलंपिक   चूंकि  their  पुनरुद्धार   in  1896  ,  women  's  competition  began   in  1948 .
मैप   of   the   संयुक्त  Nations ( UN  )   सदस्य  states , with  उनके   territories  (  सहित  dependent territories  )  recognized  by  the UN  in  blue
There are  संयुक्त  Nations  (  UN )  सदस्य  states ,  और   प्रत्येक  of them  is  a  सदस्य  of  the   संयुक्त   राष्ट्र   सामान्य  Assembly .
The criteria  लिये   प्रवेश   of  new members are set out in the United Nations  चार्टर  , Chapter  ii   ,   आलेख   4:
A recommendation for admission from  the   सुरक्षा   परिषद   requires  affirmative votes  इससे  at least  नौ   of   the  council 's  पंद्रह  members , with none  of  the  पाँच  permanent  सदस्यों  voting against .
the   सुरक्षा   परिषद  's  अनुशंसा  must  तब  be subsequently  स्वीकृत  in the  सामान्य  Assembly by a two-thirds  बहुमत  vote  .
In  principle  ,  तभी  sovereign states  can  become UN members , and currently  सब  UN members are  sovereign  states  (   हालांकि  a  few  members were not  sovereign   जब   वे  joined the  un  ) .
Because a state  can  only  be  admitted to  the  UN by  the  approval of  the   सुरक्षा  Council and the General Assembly  ,  a  क्रमांक   of   राज्य  that may  be  considered sovereign  राज्य   according  to the Montevideo  सम्मेलन  criteria  हैं  not members  क्युकी   the  UN does  नहीं  consider them  to   possess  sovereignty , mainly  due  to  the   कमी   of  international recognition or opposition from  निश्चित  members  .
In addition  to   the  member states , the  un  also invites  non-member   राज्य  ( currently two : the Holy See and  फिलिस्तीन  )  ,   intergovernmental   संगठन  , and other  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  organizations and  entities   जिनकी   statehood   or  sovereignty are  नहीं  precisely defined  ,  to become observers at  the  General  सभा   ,   allowing  them to  participate   और  speak , but not vote , in General Assembly  बैठक  .
The  एफिल  Tower ( ,  )  is  an  iron  जाली   मीनार  located  on   the  Champ de  मंगल   in  Paris  ,   नामित  after  the  engineer Gustave  एफिल  , whose company  designed  and built  the   मीनार  .
erected   in  1889 as  the   प्रवेश   मेहराब  to the 1889 World 's Fair ,  it  has  become  both a global cultural  प्रतीक  of France and  एक  of the most recognizable  structures  in  the  world  .
the   मीनार  is  the   tallest   ढांचा  in  पेरिस  and  the   most-visited  paid  स्मारक  in  the  world ; 7.1  लाख  people  ascended   it  in  2011  .
The  तीसरा  level observatory  's   अपर  platform is  at   the   उच्चतम  accessible to  पब्लिक   in  the European  संघ  and  the   उच्चतम  in  यूरोपीय  as long as the platform of the Ostankino Tower , at , remains  बंद  as a result  of  the  आग  of  अगस्त  2000 .
The tower received  इसके  250  millionth   आगंतुक  in  2010  .
The  मीनार   स्टैंड  tall ,  परिचय   the   वही   ऊँचाई   as  an 81-storey building .
During  इसके  construction ,  the   एफिल  Tower surpassed the  वॉशिंगटन   स्मारक  to  assume  the  शीर्षक  of  the  tallest man-made  ढांचा  in  the   संसार   ,  a  शीर्षक  it held  लिये   41  years , until the Chrysler Building in New York  नगर   थी   निर्मित  in 1930  .
Because of the addition ,  in  1957 ,  of   the  antenna atop the Eiffel Tower  ,   it   is  now taller  than   the   क्रिसलर  Building .
Not including  ब्रॉडकास्ट  antennas ,  it  is the  second-tallest  structure in France  ,   बाद  the Millau Viaduct .
The  मीनार   रै  three levels for visitors .
Tickets  can  be purchased  to  ascend , by stairs or lift (  लिफ्ट  )  ,  to  the   पहला  and  दूसरी   स्तर  .
the  walk from ground level to the first level is over 300  कदम  , as is the  चलना  from  the   पहला   to  the second level  .
The  तीसरा  and highest level is accessible  तभी  by  lift—stairs  do exist but  हैं  usually closed to the  पब्लिक  .
The  पहला   और  second levels  have   रेस्तरां  .
The tower  रै  become  the  most  prominent   प्रतीक  of both Paris  और  France  ,  often in the establishing  शॉट  of films set in the  नगर  .
केनेथ  Wayne `` Ken '' Jennings  iii   (   born  May  23   ,  1974  )   is   an  American  खेल  show contestant and author  .
जेनिंग्स  is  विख्यात  for holding the  रिकार्ड  for the  longest  winning  streak  on the U.S.  syndicated  game show Jeopardy !
and as being  the  all-time leading  धन   विजेता   on  American  खेल   shows   .
In  2004  , Jennings  जीती  74  jeopardy  !
खेल  before he was defeated by challenger Nancy Zerg on  उसके  75th appearance .
उसके  total  आय   on   jeopardy  !
are  $  3,172,700  ,  consisting  of   $   2,520,700   over  his 74 wins  ,  a $ 2,000 second-place prize in  उसके   75th  appearance  ,  a  $  500,000 second-place prize  in  the Jeopardy  !
Ultimate  टूर्नामेंट   of  Champions , as  खूब   as  half  of  a $ 300,000 prize in the IBM  चुनौती  .
During his  पहला  run  of  Jeopardy  !
appearances , Jennings  अर्जित  the record for the highest American game  दिखाएँ  winnings  .
His total was  surpassed  by Brad  rutter  ,  जो  defeated Jennings  in   the  finals  of  the Jeopardy !
परम  Tournament of  champions  ( first  aired   on  May 25 ,  2005   )  , adding $  2,000,000  to Rutter 's  मौजूदा  Jeopardy !
winnings .
जेनिंग्स  regained the record after appearing  on  several  अन्य  game  shows   ,  culminating in  an  appearance on Are  तुम  Smarter Than  a  5th Grader  ?
( first  aired   on  October 10 ,  2008  )  ,  though  rutter  retains  the  Jeopardy !
record .
After  उसके  success  on   jeopardy   !   ,   जेनिंग्स   लिखा  about  उसके  experience and  छान   अमरीकी  trivia history  और  culture  in   उसके  book  brainiac  : Adventures in  the  Curious ,  प्रतिस्पर्धी  ,  बाध्यता   संसार   of   ट्रिविया   buffs   ,  published  in   2006   .
the   कनाडाई   फ़ुटबॉल  League or CFL  (   '  [  lcf  ] in  फ्रेंच   )  is  a  professional sports  लीग   स्तिथ  in  कनाडा  .
The CFL is the  उच्चतम  level of  प्रतियोगिता   in  Canadian  फ़ुटबॉल  ,  a   रूप  of  gridiron   फ़ुटबॉल  closely related to American football  .
इसके  eight current  टीमों   ,  which are located in  आठ   पृथक   शहरों  , are  विभाजित   into  two  विभाजन  of  चार  teams  प्रत्येक  —  the  East Division and the West Division  .
the  league 's 19-week regular season  रनों   इससे   लेट  June  to  early  नवम्बर   ;  each team plays 18 games with  एक  bye week  .
following   the   नियमित   ऋतु   ,  the  तीन   टीमों   साथ   the  best  रिकॉर्ड   in  their  प्रभाग   (  except if  the   चौथी  place  टोली   in  one division  रै  a better  रिकार्ड   than   the   तीसरा   प्लेस  team  in  the other division ,  जब  the team with the  बेहतर  record  makes   the  playoffs  और   ``   crosses   over  '' to the other  प्रभाग   's   playoff  )  compete   in   the  league 's  three-week   डिवीजनल   playoffs   ,  which culminate in the  late-november  Grey Cup  चैंपियनशिप   ,  the country 's  largest  annual  खेल   और  television  इवेंट   .
the  CFL was officially founded on  जनवरी   19   ,   1958   ,  making  it   the  second  oldest   gridiron  football  लीग  in North America  स्टिल  in operation  ,   हालांकि  all its  टीमों   long   predate  the modern formation  of  the league .
It is the highest level of  खेल  in Canadian  फ़ुटबॉल  , the most  लोकप्रिय   फ़ुटबॉल   लीग  in  कनाडा  , and the second-most  लोकप्रिय  major sports league in  कनाडा   ,  after  the  National Hockey  लीग   .
हालांकि  ice  हॉकी  is Canada 's  सबसे  popular sport  ,   the   cfl  has increased  the  popularity of Canadian  फ़ुटबॉल   in   क्यूबेक   और  Western Canada .
कनाडाई  football is also  निभाई  at amateur levels (  i.e   .   युवावस्था  ,  ऊँची   स्कूल  ,  cjfl   ,  QJFL  ,  CIS  और   वरिष्ठ  leagues  ऐसे  as the  अलबर्टा  Football League  )  .
The 2010s will  be  a significant decade for  the   cfl   in  terms of growth  ,   as  teams have renovated , expanded stadiums  ,   or  plan  to  build entirely new  स्टेडियम   .
The Montreal  अलॉतेस  accomplished  इस   पहला  , adding  5,000  seats to  पर्सिवल  Molson  मेमोरियल  Stadium in  समय  for the  2010   cfl   ऋतु   .
The Edmonton  एस्किमोस  and  कैला  Stampeders also  संवर  their respective stadiums  और  facilities  लिये   the  2010 season .
In 2011  ,   the   bc  Lions  निभाई   अंतर्गत  a  नई   ,   retractable  roof in BC Place  बाद  spending  एक   और  a half  सीज़न  at Empire Field .
तब  the  विन्निपेग  Blue Bombers will play  in  an entirely new stadium at  the  University of  मनिटोबा   ,  scheduled  to  open in time  लिये  the  2013  season .
The Hamilton Tiger-Cats  ,  Saskatchewan Roughriders and the new Ottawa franchise are also  looking   at  new or extensively-renovated stadiums  in   the   following   सालो  .
वहीँ  are also hopes of expanding  the   लीग  to Atlantic  कनाडा   (   ideally  basing a team in either the  अधिक  populated Halifax  ,  or the more  centralized   moncton   )  , as  2010   और   2011  had  नियमित  season games  hosted  in  moncton   .
According to sports  इतिहासकार  Douglas Brei , the  कनाडाई  Football  लीग  holds  the  distinction  of   होने  the only  पेशेवर   खेल  league  in   उत्तर  America ,  प्रमुख  or minor league , in  जिससे  each existing franchise  रै  won  at   तनिक   एक  league title  जबकि   in  their current  स्थान  .
Each  एंटीबॉडी  binds to  a  specific  प्रतिजन  ; an  बातचीत  similar to a lock and key .
An  एंटीबॉडी  (  ab  ) , also known as an  immunoglobulin  ( Ig ) ,  is  a large Y-shaped protein  उत्पादित  by B-cells  कि   is   प्रयुक्त   by   the   प्रतिरक्षा  system to identify and  neutralize   विदेशी   वस्तुएँ   ऐसे  as bacteria and  वाइरस   .
the   एंटीबॉडी  recognizes  a  unique part of the  विदेशी  target  ,  called an antigen  .
प्रत्येक  tip  of   the   ``  Y '' of  an  antibody contains a  paratope   (  a  ढांचा   analogous  to a lock  )  that  is  specific for one  particular   epitope  (  similarly  analogous to a key ) on an antigen  ,  allowing  ये  two structures to  bind  together with precision .
Using this binding mechanism ,  an  antibody can tag a microbe or  an  infected  कोशिका   लिये  attack by other  भाग   of  the immune system , or can neutralize its  निशाना  directly (  लिये   उदाहरण  ,  by  blocking a  भाग  of a microbe  कि   is  essential for its  आक्रमण   और  survival  )   .
The  उत्पादन   of   antibodies   is  the main function of  the  humoral  प्रतिरक्षा  system .
antibodies   हैं   स्रावित   by  a  प्रकार  of white blood cell  पुकारा  a plasma cell  .
antibodies   can  occur  in   दो  physical forms , a soluble  रूप  that is secreted from the  कोशिका  , and  a   झिल्ली   -bound  form that is attached  to  the surface of  a  B cell  और   is  referred  to   as   the   b   कोशिका  receptor ( BCR ) .
The BCR is only found on the  सतह  of  b   कोशिकाएं   और   facilitates   the  activation of  ये   कोशिकाएं  and their  subsequent  differentiation  into   either   एंटीबॉडी   कारखानों   पुकारा   प्लाज्मा  cells  ,   or   मेमोरी  B cells  कि  will survive in the  देह   और   याद   कि  same  प्रतिजन  so the  b  cells  can  respond faster upon future exposure  .
in  most cases ,  बातचीत   of  the  b  cell  साथ  a  t  helper cell is  जरुरी  to produce full activation of the B  कोशिका  and , therefore  ,  antibody  पीढी  following  प्रतिजन  binding  .
Soluble  antibodies  are released  into   the  blood  और  tissue fluids  ,   as  well as  अनेक   secretions  to continue to survey  लिये  invading  microorganisms   .
Antibodies are glycoproteins belonging to the immunoglobulin superfamily ; the  शर्तें  antibody  और  immunoglobulin are  प्रायः  used interchangeably .
Antibodies are typically  बना  of  मौलिक   संरचनात्मक   units—each  with two large  भारी   जंजीरों   और   दो  small light chains  .
There are several different types of  एंटीबॉडी   भारी  chains ,  और  several  अलग  kinds of antibodies  ,  which  हैं   grouped  into different isotypes  आधारित  on which heavy  कड़ी  they possess  .
Five different antibody isotypes  हैं  known in mammals , which  perform   अलग  roles ,  और   सहायता   सीधा   the  appropriate  प्रतिरक्षा   जवाब   लिये  each  अलग  type  of  foreign  ऑब्जेक्ट  they encounter .
हालांकि   the   सामान्य   ढांचा  of all antibodies  is   बहुत   समान  , a small region  at  the  टिप  of the protein is extremely variable ,  allowing  millions of  antibodies   साथ   थोड़ा  different  टिप   structures  , or  प्रतिजन   बाइंडिंग   साइट   ,   to   मौजूद  .
This region is known  as  the hypervariable  प्रदेश  .
Each  of   ये   विसंगतियाँ   can   bind  to  a  different antigen  .
इस   विशाल  diversity  of   antibodies   allows  the immune system to recognize an equally  चौड़ी   किस्में  of antigens  .
The  विशाल  and diverse population of antibodies  is  generated  by  random combinations  of   a  set of gene  खण्ड   कि   encode   अलग  antigen binding sites (  or  paratopes  )  , followed by  यादृच्छिक  mutations  in  this area of the antibody gene , which create  further  diversity .
Antibody genes also  re-organize   in  a  प्रक्रम  called class switching that changes  the   आधार  of  the   भारी  chain  to  another  ,  creating  a  different isotype  of  the antibody that retains the antigen specific  परिवर्तनीय  region  .
This allows  a   सिंगल  antibody to be  प्रयुक्त   by   अनेक   अलग  parts  of  the  प्रतिरक्षा   प्रणाली  .
The symbol used  by   the  Zodiac  कातिल  to  चिह्न   उसके  correspondence
The Zodiac Killer was  a  serial killer who  संचालित   in  Northern California in the  लेट  1960s and early  1970s   .
The  कातिल  's identity remains  अनजान  .
the  Zodiac murdered victims in Benicia , Vallejo  ,   झील  Berryessa , and San Francisco  between  December 1968 and October 1969  .
Four  मेन  and  तीन   महिलाओं   between   the  ages of  16   और  29 were  targeted  .
The killer originated  the   नाम   ``  Zodiac '' in a  श्रेणी   of   taunting   अक्षर  sent to the  लोकल  Bay Area press  .
These  अक्षर  included four cryptograms ( or  ciphers   )   .
Of the four cryptograms sent  ,  only one  रै   महरूम  definitively solved .
Suspects  have   महरूम   नामित  by  विधि   प्रवर्तन  and amateur investigators , but  no   conclusive  evidence  रै  surfaced .
In April  2004   ,  the  सैन   फ्रांसिस्को  Police  विभाग  marked the case  ``   निष्क्रिय  '' , yet re-opened the case  at  some  पाइंट  prior to  कूच   2007  .
The case also remains  खोलें   in   the  city  of   vallejo   ,  as well as  in  Napa  काउंटी  and  solano  County .
the   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  Department  of   इंसाफ  has maintained an open case  संचिका  on  the  Zodiac  हत्याएं  since 1969  .
Jennings is  a  small city  in   और   the  parish seat of  जेफरसन  Davis  मोहल्ला  ,  louisiana   ,  United States ,  निकट  Lake Charles  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was  10,383  at  the  2010 census , a small  मनाही  from the 2000 tabulation  .
The  नगर  is 68 percent white  .
जेनिंग्स  is  the  principal  नगर   of  the Jennings Micropolitan Statistical Area  ,   जिससे   शामिल  all of Jefferson  डेविस  Parish .
it   is   भी  part of  the   larger  Lake  charles-jennings  Combined  सांख्यिकीय  Area  .
Nanotechnology ( sometimes shortened  to   ``  nanotech  ''  ) is the  हेरफेर  of matter  on   an   परमाणु  and  आणविक  scale .
the   earliest   ,  widespread  वर्णन   of  nanotechnology referred to  the   particular  technological goal  of   precisely   manipulating   अणु   और  molecules  लिये  fabrication of  macroscale  products , also  अभी  referred  to  as  आणविक   nanotechnology  .
A  अधिक   generalized  description of nanotechnology was subsequently  स्थापित  by  the  National Nanotechnology Initiative  ,   जिससे   defines   nanotechnology  as the manipulation  of   पदार्थ  with at least  एक  dimension  sized   इससे   1   to  100 nanometers .
This  परिभाषा  reflects the  फैक्ट  that  क्वांटम  mechanical effects  हैं   महत्वपूर्ण   at   इस   quantum-realm  scale , and so  the  definition shifted from  a   particular  technological goal  to   a  research  श्रेणी   समावेशी  of  सब  types of  शोध   और  technologies that deal with the special  गुण   of  matter that occur  नीचे  the given size  दहलीज   .
It is therefore common  to  see the plural  रूप  `` nanotechnologies '' as  खूब  as  ``   nanoscale  technologies  ''  to refer to the  व्यापक   दायरा   of  research and applications  जिनकी  common  trait   is  size .
क्युकी  of  the   किस्में   of   संभावित  applications  (  including  औद्योगिक   और  military ) ,  सरकारें  have invested  अरबों   of   डॉलर  in nanotechnology research  .
through  its National Nanotechnology  पहल  , the USA  रै  invested  3.7   अरब  dollars .
The  यूरोपीय  Union has  invested  1.2  अरब  and  जापानी  750  लाख  dollars .
Nanotechnology as defined  by   आकार   is  naturally very broad , including fields  of   विज्ञान   as   विविध   as   सतह  science  ,   सशुल्क  chemistry ,  आणविक  biology , semiconductor physics  ,   microfabrication   ,  etc  .
The associated research and applications  हैं  equally  विविध  , ranging from extensions  of   conventional  device physics  to  completely new approaches based  upon   आणविक   self-assembly   ,   इससे  developing new  सामग्री  with  आयाम   on   the   nanoscale   to  direct control of  पदार्थ   on  the atomic scale .
Scientists currently debate the  भविष्य  implications of nanotechnology .
nanotechnology  may be able  to   बनाएँ   अनेक  new  सामग्री   और  devices with a vast  दायरा  of  अनुप्रयोग  , such  as  in medicine  ,  electronics  ,   biomaterials   और  energy production .
on  the  अन्य  hand ,  nanotechnology   उठाता  many  of  the  वही   मुद्दे  as any new technology  ,   सहित   चिंताएं  about the  toxicity  and  पर्यावरणीय  impact  of   nanomaterials   ,   और   उनके   संभावित   प्रभाव   on  global  अर्थशास्त्र   ,   as  well  as   अटकलें  about various doomsday  scenarios   .
ये  concerns have  led   to  a debate  among   वकालत  groups  और  governments  on  whether special regulation of  nanotechnology  is  warranted  .
मैप  of the Eastern Bloc
the  term Eastern Bloc or Communist Bloc refers  to  the former communist  राज्य  of  सेंट्रल  and  पूर्वी  Europe ,  generally  the Soviet Union and the countries of  the   वॉरसॉ  Pact  .
The terms Communist  bloc  and Soviet Bloc were  भी   प्रयुक्त  to denote  groupings  of states  लकीर   साथ  the  सोवियत  Union , although  ये  terms  might  include states  बाहर  Central  और  Eastern  यूरोपीय   .
The  नई   जर्सी   gubernatorial   चुनाव  of 2009  took  place on  नवम्बर   3  , 2009 .
Democratic Governor Jon Corzine was running for a second term and  थी  being challenged by Republican Chris  क्रिस्टी   ,  Independent  क्रिस्टोफर   daggett  and nine others , in addition to several  write-in  candidates .
Christie won the election  ,  with about  48.5   प्रतिशत  of the vote , to 44.9  प्रतिशत   लिये   corzine  and 5.8  प्रतिशत   लिये  Daggett .
Christie won the largest margin  लिये   a   पहला  term Republican  चूंकि  1969 .
क्रिस्टी  assumed office  on  January 19  ,   2010  .
This  थी  the  पहला  election to fill the newly  निर्मित   दफ्तर   of   लेफ्टिनेंट   राज्यपाल  .
the  candidates for  राज्यपाल  and lieutenant governor were joined together as  a  single choice , so that voters  किया   नहीं  have the  अवसर   to   विभाजित  the  टिकट  .
Kim Guadagno ,  क्रिस्टी   's  running mate , became  नई  Jersey 's  पहला  lieutenant governor following her inauguration .
Health  परवाह  in  the  United States  is   provided  by many distinct  संगठन  .
Health  परवाह  facilities are  largely  owned  और  operated by private  सेक्टर   व्यवसायों   .
Health insurance for public  सेक्टर  employees is primarily provided by the government .
60-65  % of  healthcare  provision  और  spending  आता   इससे  programs  ऐसे  as Medicare  ,  Medicaid , TRICARE  ,  the Children  's   स्वास्थ्य  Insurance Program , and  the   दिग्गजों  Health  प्रशासन  .
Most of the  जनसांख्यिकी  under  65   is  insured  by   उनके  or  a   परिवार  member  's   नियोक्ता   ,  some buy  स्वास्थ्य  insurance on  उनके  own , and the remainder are  uninsured  .
Of  17  high-income countries studied by the National Institutes  of  Health in  2013  , the  संयुक्त  States was at  or  near the  नीचे  in infant  मृत्यु  ,  दिल  and lung disease  ,   sexually   transmitted   infections  ,  adolescent   pregnancies   ,  injuries , homicides , and  दरों  of  विकलांगता   .
Together  ,  such  मुद्दे  place the U.S.  at   the  bottom of  the  list  लिये  life expectancy .
on  average , a  u.S.  male  can   be   अपेक्षित  to live  लगभग  four fewer years than those  in  the top-ranked  देश   .
According to the  संसार  Health  संगठन  ( WHO  )   ,  the United States spent more on health care per  capita  (  $   7,146   )  , and more  on  health care as  प्रतिशत  of its  जीडीपी   (  15.2  %  ) , than any other nation  in   2008  .
The Commonwealth Fund ranked  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  last in  the  quality  of   स्वास्थ्य   परवाह  among  समान  countries  ,   और  notes  u.S.  care costs the  सबसे  .
the  U.S. Census  ब्यूरो  reported that  49.9   लाख  residents  ,   16.3  % of  the  population  ,   यहूद  uninsured in 2010 ( up  इससे  49.0 million residents  ,  16.1  %   of  the population ,  in  2009 )  .
A 2004 Institute of Medicine  (  IOM )  रपट  said :  ``   the   संयुक्त  States is among the few industrialized nations in the world that  करता   नहीं  guarantee  अभिगम  to  स्वास्थ्य   परवाह  for its population . ''
a   2004   oecd   रपट   कहा   :   ``  With  the  exception  of  Mexico , Turkey , and the  संयुक्त  States , all OECD countries had achieved  सार्वभौमिक  or near-universal  (  at least 98.4 %  insured  ) coverage of  उनके   populations  by 1990 .  ''
A 2010 report observed  कि  lack of health  बीमे  causes  roughly   48,000  unnecessary  मौतों   प्रत्येक  year in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
in   2007   ,  62.1 % of  filers  for bankruptcies  claimed  high medical expenses  .
a   2013  study  मिला  that about 25 %  of  all  वरिष्ठ  citizens declare  दिवालियापन  due to medical expenses  ,   और  43 % are  मजबूर  to mortgage  or  sell  उनके  primary residence .
on   कूच  23  ,   2010  , the Patient  सुरक्षा  and Affordable  परवाह   अधिनियम   (  PPACA  )  became law ,  providing   लिये   प्रमुख   परिवर्तन  in health  बीमे  .
In  physiology   ,   देह  water  is  the  जल   सामग्री   of  the human  देह   .
A significant  भिन्न  of the human  देह   is  water .
Arthur Guyton 's Textbook of Medical Physiology  राज्य  that  ``  the  कुल  amount  of  water in  a  man of  औसत  weight (  70  kilograms ) is approximately  40  litres  ,  averaging  57   प्रतिशत   of  his total body weight  .
In a  नवजात  infant  ,   इस  may  be  as high as  75  percent of  the  body weight  ,   लकिन  it progressively  decreases   इससे  birth  to  old age , most of the  घटी   occurring  during the first  10   सालो  of  जीवन  .
भी   ,  obesity  decreases  the  प्रतिशत   of   जल  in the body , sometimes  to  as  कम   as   45   प्रतिशत  '' .
These  आंकड़े  are statistical averages , so  हैं  illustrative  ,  and like  सब  biostatistics  ,  will  vary   साथ   बाते  like type  of  population  ,  age  और  number  of   लोगों  sampled  ,  and methodology  .
so  there is  नहीं  , and can  नहीं  be  ,  a figure  कि   is   exactly  the  वही  for all people , for this or  कोई  other physiological measure .
For example  ,   जैक्सन   's   (   1985  )  anatomy  & Physiology for Nurses  देता  a figure of 60 %  लिये   the  proportion of  body-weight  attributable to  जल   ,  which  approximates   guyton   's  57  %  .
in  diseased states where  देह   जल   is   प्रभावित  ,  the  compartment or compartments  कि   have   बदला  can  दे  clues to the nature of  the  problem .
Body  जल  is  regulated   by   हार्मोन   ,  including anti-diuretic hormone ( ADH )  ,   aldosterone   और   अलिंदी  natriuretic peptide  .
Per Netter 's Atlas of Human  physiology  ,  देह  water is  टूटा   bas   into  the  following   कम्पार्टमेंटs:
Intracellular fluid (  2/3   of  body  जल  )  .
Per  guyton   ,   in  a body containing  40  litres of  द्रव   ,   परिचय  25 litres  is  intracellular , which  amounts  to 62.5 % ( 5/8  )   ,  close enough  to   the   2/3  rule  of   अंगूठा   .
Jackson  's  texts states 70  %  of  देह   द्रव  is  intracellular  .
extracellular   द्रव  ( 1/3 of body water  )   .
Per  guyton  's illustration , for  a  40 litre  देह  ,  परिचय   15  litres is extracellular  ,  which amounts to  37.5  % Again  ,   इस   is  close  to  the 1/3  नियम  of thumb cited here .
Plasma  (  1/5  of  extracellular fluid  )  .
Per Guyton  's   उदाहरण  ,  of   the  15  लीटर  of extracellular  द्रव  ,  प्लाज्मा   आवाज़   averages   3  litres .
This amounts  to   20  % ,  the   वही   as  per Netter 's  एटलस   .
Interstitial fluid ( 4/5 of extracellular fluid  )
Transcellular  द्रव   (   a.k.a   .  ``  तीसरा  space ,  ''  normally ignored in calculations )
Contained inside organs , such as the  जठरांत्र   ,  cerebrospinal , peritoneal ,  और  ocular fluids .
self-esteem   is  a term used in  मनोविज्ञान   to   प्रतिबिंबित  a  व्यक्ति  's overall  emotional  evaluation of his or her own worth .
it   is   a  judgement  of   oneself  as  खूब  as an  रवैया   toward  the self  .
self-esteem  encompasses  मान्यताओं  (  लिये  example  ,   ``  I am competent  ,  '' `` I am  worthy   ''  ) and emotions  ऐसे  as triumph  ,   despair  , pride and  शर्म   .
Smith and Mackie define  it  by saying `` The self-concept  is   कया   we   सोचो   परिचय  the  स्वः  ; self-esteem ,  is  the positive or negative  evaluations  of the self ,  as  in how we feel about it .  ''
self-esteem   is  also known as the evaluative dimension of the self  कि   शामिल  feelings  of   worthiness  ,  prides   और  discouragement  .
One  's  self-esteem  is  also closely associated with self-consciousness  .
Self-esteem is  a  disposition  कि  a person  रै   जिससे   represents  their  निर्णयों  of  उनके  own worthiness  .
