In  the  mid-1960s , Morris Rosenberg  और  social-learning  पैरोकार  defined  self-esteem   as   a  personal  लायक  or worthiness .
Nathaniel  branden   in   1969  defined  self-esteem  as  ``  the experience of  होने   competent   to  cope with  the   मौलिक   चुनौतियां  of  जीवन   और  being worthy  of   सुख  .  ''
According  to  Branden ,  self-esteem   is  the  योग   of  self-confidence ( a  अहसास  of  निजी   क्षमता  )  और  self-respect ( a  अहसास  of personal worth  )  .
it   exists  as  a  consequence of the implicit judgement  कि  every person has of their  क्षमता   to   फेस   जीवन   's  challenges , to understand and  solve  problems ,  और   उनके  right to  achieve  happiness  ,  and be given respect .
As a social psychological construct  ,  self-esteem  is   आकर्षक   क्युकी   शोधकर्ताओं  have conceptualized it  as  an influential predictor of  प्रासंगिक  outcomes  ,   ऐसे  as academic achievement  (  Marsh  1990   )   or   कसरत  behavior ( Hagger  et   al  .  1998   )  .
in   जोड   ,  self-esteem has  भी   महरूम   treated  as  an   महत्वपूर्ण   निष्कर्ष  due to its  बंद  relation  साथ   मनोवैज्ञानिक   well-being  (  दलदल  1989 ) .
self-esteem   can  apply specifically to a particular  आयाम   (   लिये   उदाहरण  , `` I  मानना  I  am  a good writer and I  महसूस   प्रसन्न   परिचय  that  ''   )  or  a   वैश्विक   extent   (  for example , ``  i  believe I am a bad person  ,  and feel  ख़राब  about myself in general ''  )  .
Psychologists usually regard self-esteem as an enduring  व्यक्तित्व  characteristic ( ``  trait  ''  self-esteem  ) , though  सामान्य  ,  short-term   विसंगतियाँ  ( ``  राज्य  '' self-esteem ) also exist .
समानार्थी  or near-synonyms  of   self-esteem  include  :   self-worth  , self-regard  ,  self-respect , and self-integrity .
a   masonic  Lodge  ,   प्रायः   termed   a  Private Lodge or  constituent   आवास   ,  is the basic  organisational  unit  of   freemasonry   .
Every  नई  Lodge  जरूर  be warranted  or   चार्टर्ड  by a  ग्रैंड  Lodge ,  लकिन  is subject  to  its  दिशा  only in enforcing the  प्रकाशित  Constitution  of  the  क्षेत्राधिकार  .
by  exception the  तीन  surviving  lodges  that formed the  संसार  's  पहला   ज्ञात  Grand Lodge in  लंदन  (  आज  called  the  United  ग्रैंड   आवास   of   इंग्लैण्ड   )   have   the  unique  विशेषाधिकार  to  operate   as  time immemorial  i.e  . without such warrant  ;  only  एक  other lodge  operates  without a  वारंट  - this  is  the Grand Stewards ' Lodge in London  ,  although it is not also entitled to the ``  समय  immemorial '' title .
a   freemason  is  generally   हकदार  to visit any Lodge ,  in  any  क्षेत्राधिकार   (  i.e  .   अंतर्गत  any  ग्रैंड  Lodge ) in amity with his  अपना   .
In  कुछ   jurisdictions   इस  privilege  is   प्रतिबंधित  to Master  masons   (   कि  is ,  freemasons   जो  have  attained  the Order 's third degree  )   .
He  is   पहला  usually required to check  ,  and  certify   ,  the regularity of the relationship  of   the  Lodge -  और   be   समर्थ  to  satisfy   कि  Lodge  of  his regularity  of   सदस्यता   .
Freemasons  एकत्रित   साथ  as a Lodge to work  the  three  मौलिक  Degrees  of  Entered  प्रशिक्षु  , Fellowcraft  और  Master Mason .
pilkington   समूह  Limited is  a  multinational glass  निर्माण   कम्पनी  headquartered  in  St  हेलेन्स   ,  United Kingdom and a wholly owned subsidiary of the  japan-based   एनएसजी  Group .
prior  to its acquisition by NSG in  2006   it  was  an  independent company listed  on   the  London  भण्डार  Exchange and for  a   समय  was a constituent  of  the  ftse   100   अनुक्रमणिका   .
A quotation is  the   repetition   of  one expression as  भाग   of   another   एक  , particularly when the  कोटेड   अभिव्यक्ति   is  well-known or  explicitly   attributed  by citation to  इसके  original  सोर्स  , and  it  is indicated by  (  punctuated  साथ   )   quotation  marks .
a  quotation  can   भी  refer  to  the repeated use  of  units  of  any other  रूप  of  अभिव्यक्ति  , especially parts of artistic works :  तत्व  of  a  painting  ,   दृश्यों  from  a  movie or sections from  a  musical composition  .
साल  1877  (  MDCCCLXXVII  )   थी  a  आम  year starting  on  Monday  (  link  होगा  display  the   पूरा   पंचांग  ) of the Gregorian calendar  और  a  आम  year starting  on  Saturday  of  the  12-day  slower  जूलियन   पंचांग   .
ब्लैक   pepper   (   पाइपर   nigrum  ) is  a  flowering  बेल  in the  परिवार   piperaceae   ,   cultivated  for its fruit ,  जिससे  is usually dried  और  used as a spice and seasoning .
the  fruit ,  ज्ञात  as a  peppercorn  when  सूखी   ,  is approximately  in  diameter ,  अंधेरा   रेड  when fully mature ,  और   ,  like all drupes , contains a single seed .
Peppercorns  ,  and  the   मैदान   pepper  derived from them ,  may  be described  बस   as  pepper ,  or   अधिक  precisely as black pepper  (   पकाया  and dried unripe fruit )  ,  green pepper  (  dried unripe  फल  ) and white pepper  (   सूखी  ripe  बीज  )  .
ब्लैक   pepper  is native to south India , and is extensively cultivated there  और   elsewhere  in tropical regions .
फिलहाल  Vietnam is the world 's  largest  producer and  निर्यातक  of  pepper  ,  producing  34 %  of  the world 's Piper  nigrum  crop as of 2008  .
Dried ground pepper  रै   महरूम   प्रयुक्त   चूंकि  antiquity for both its flavour and  as   a   आयुर्विज्ञान  .
Black  pepper   is  the world 's most traded spice .
It  is  one  of   the  most common spices  added   to   यूरोपीय  cuisine  और  its descendants .
The  spiciness   of  black pepper is  due   to   the  chemical  piperine   ,   नहीं  to  be   उलझन   साथ   the  capsaicin  कि  gives fleshy peppers  theirs  .
It is in  the   आधुनिक   संसार  , often paired with  नमक  .
Fire hydrant in Charlottesville  ,  Virginia ,  यूएसए
A fire  hydrant  ( also  ज्ञात  colloquially as a fire plug in the United States or as a  जॉनी   पंप  in New York  नगर   )  ,  is   an   क्रियाशील  fire protection measure ,  और   a  source  of   जल  provided  in   सबसे   शहरी   ,  suburban  और   ग्रामीण  areas  साथ  municipal  जल   सेवा  to  enable  firefighters to  tap  into  the  municipal water  सप्लाई  to  assist  in extinguishing  a  fire .
Buildings  निकट   a   hydrant   may  qualify  लिये   an   बीमे   छूट  since firefighters should be able to more  rapidly   बुझा  a fire on the insured  प्रॉपर्टी  .
the   अवधारणा  of fire plugs dates to at least  the  17th  सदी  .
इस  was  a  time when  अग्निशमन  responding to a  कॉल  would dig  bas  to the wooden  जल  mains  और   hastily   bore  a hole to secure water to fight  फ़ायर   .
The water  होता   भरण  the  छेद   बनाना  a  अस्थाई  well  ,  and be  transported   इससे  the  खूब  to the fire  by   बाल्टी  brigades  or  , later  ,  by  hand-pumped   आग  engines .
the   छेद  were then  plugged  with  stoppers  ,  सामान्यतः  redwood , which over time came to  be   ज्ञात   as  fire  plugs   .
The location of the plug  होता   प्रायः  be recorded or  चिह्नित  so that it could  be  reused  in  future  फ़ायर   .
इस   is  the source of the  colloquial  term fire plug still  प्रयुक्त  for  आग   hydrants  today .
After  the  Great Fire  of  London in  1666  ,  the  city  संस्थापित  water  मेन्स  with  छेद  drilled at  intervals   ,  equipped with  उठते  , allowing  an   अभिगम   पाइंट   to   the   लकड़ी  fire  plugs  from street  स्तर  .
The  आविष्कार  of  a  post- or pillar-type fire hydrant  is   generally   credited  to Frederick  graff   sr.  , Chief  इंजीनियर   of   the  Philadelphia Water Works around the year  1801  .
It had  a   संयोजन   hose/faucet  outlet and  थी   of  `` wet  बैरल  ''  डिज़ाइन  with  the  valve in the top .
it  is  कहा  that  graff   आयोजित  the  पहला  patent for a  आग  hydrant  ,   लकिन   इस  can not  be  verified because  the   पेटेंट   दफ्तर  in Washington  d.C.  caught on  आग  in 1836 destroying  अनेक   पेटेंट  records  इससे   कि  period in the process .
The President of the  गणतंत्र   of  South Africa is the head  of   राज्य  and  सिर  of government under South Africa 's  संविधान  .
इससे   1961  to 1994 ,  the   सिर  of  राज्य  was  पुकारा   the  State President .
The President is elected  by  members of  the  National  सभा   ,  the lower  हाउस  of  पार्लियामेंट  , and is usually  the  leader of  the  largest  पार्टी  , which has  महरूम   the   अफ़्रीकी  National Congress since the first non-racial elections were held  on  27  अप्रैल  1994 .
The role was originally founded to be distinct  इससे  the now  defunct  role of prime minister , but the two roles  यहूद  merged in the 1983 constitution  जिससे  specified  a  four-year  पद  of  दफ्तर  .
The  1993  and  बाद  constitutions limits the  अध्यक्ष  's time in office to two  five-year   शर्तें  .
The first President to be elected  अंतर्गत  the new constitution was Nelson  मंडेला  , and the incumbent  अध्यक्ष   is  Jacob Zuma .
Under the interim  संविधान  (  मान्य   इससे  1994 to 1996 )  ,  there was  a  Government  of   नेशनल   एकता  ,  in   जिससे   an   mp   इससे  the largest  विपक्ष   पार्टी  was entitled to a position  as   डिप्टी   अध्यक्ष  .
साथ   साथ   thabo   mbeki   ,   the   पिछला   राज्य   अध्यक्ष  , F.W .  de  Klerk also served as Deputy  अध्यक्ष  ,  in   उसके  capacity  as   the  leader of the  नेशनल  Party which  थी  the second-largest  पार्टी  in the  नई  Parliament  .
But  de  Klerk  बाद  resigned  और  went into opposition with  उसके   पार्टी   .
a   voluntary   गठबन्धन   सरकारी  continues  to  exist under the new  संविधान  ( adopted  in  1996  )  , although there have been no  नियुक्ति   of  opposition politicians  to  the post  of  deputy  अध्यक्ष  .
Special education or special  needs   शिक्षा   is  the education of  विद्यार्थी  with special  needs  in a way  कि   पता  the students  '  individual differences and  needs   .
Ideally , this process  involves  the  individually  planned  और   systematically   monitored   व्यवस्था   of  teaching  प्रक्रियाओं  ,  adapted   उपकरण  and  सामग्री  , accessible settings  ,  and other interventions designed to help  learners  with special needs achieve  a  higher  स्तर  of  निजी  self-sufficiency  और  success in  स्कूल   और   जातियाँ  than would be  उपलब्धियाँ  if  the  student  यहूद  only given  अभिगम  to a typical  कक्षा  education .
आम   खास   needs   शामिल   चुनौतियां  with learning  ,  communication challenges  ,   emotional  and behavioral disorders , physical disabilities , and  developmental  disorders .
विद्यार्थी   साथ  these kinds  of  special  needs   हैं   संभावित   to  benefit from additional educational  सेवाएं   ऐसे   as   अलग  approaches to teaching ,  उपयोग   of  technology , a  specifically  adapted teaching  क्षेत्रफल  , or  संसाधन   रूम   .
बौद्धिक  giftedness  is  a  अंतर  in learning  और   can  also benefit  इससे  specialized  शिक्षण   तकनीकों  or  अलग  educational programs ,  लकिन   the  term `` special education  ''  is generally  प्रयुक्त   to  specifically indicate instruction of students  जिनकी   खास  needs  reduce   उनके   क्षमता  to  सीख   independently  or in  an  ordinary  कक्षा  , and  gifted   शिक्षा   is   संभाला  separately  .
In most  विकसित  countries ,  शिक्षक  are modifying teaching  विधि   और  environments so  कि  the maximum  क्रमांक  of  विद्यार्थी  are served  in   सामान्य   शिक्षा   environments   .
Special  शिक्षा  in developed countries is often regarded  कम   as   a   ``   प्लेस  ''  और   अधिक   as   ``  a  दायरा  of services ,  उपलब्धियाँ   in  every school . ''
संयोजन  can reduce social stigmas  और   improve   अकादमिक  achievement for  अनेक  students .
the   विपरीत   of  special education  is  general education .
General education is  the  standard curriculum presented with standard teaching methods and without additional supports .
जार्ज  Soros  (  or ;  ;  ; born August 12 , 1930  ,   as  Schwartz  györgy  )  is   a   hungarian-american   कारोबार   महारथी  , investor , and philanthropist .
He is  the  chairman of Soros  निधि  Management .
Soros supports progressive-liberal causes .
He  is  known as ``  the   man   जो  Broke the  बैंको   of  England ``  क्युकी  of his in  निवेश   profits  during  the   1992   ब्लैक  Wednesday  uk  currency crisis .
Between  1979  and 2011 , Soros  दिया  away over  $   8   अरब  to human rights , public health  ,   और   शिक्षा  causes .
He  निभाई  a  significant   भूमिका   in  the peaceful  परिवर्तन   इससे   साम्यवादी  to capitalism in Hungary ( 1984–89  )   और  provided  एक  of Europe  's  largest  उच्चतर  education endowments to Central  यूरोपीय  University in  बुडापेस्ट   .
Soros is  भी  the  अध्यक्ष  of the Open Society Institute .
An  कर्ता   portraying  Alexander  ग्राहम  Bell  बोलना  into an  जल्दी  model telephone  .
The invention of  the   टेलीफोन   is   the  culmination  of   कार्य   किया  by many individuals  ,  the history of which involves a  संग्रहण  of claims and counterclaims  .
the  development of  the  modern electrical  टेलीफोन   शामिल  an array of lawsuits  संस्थापित  upon  the   पेटेंट   दावा  of  अनेक  individuals and numerous companies  .
इस   आलेख   कवर   the  early years from  1844   to   1898   ,  from conception  of   the   विचार  of  an  electric voice-transmission device , to  विफल   कोशिशें  to use ``  make-and-break   ''  current ,  to  successful  प्रयोग   साथ  electromagnetic telephones by Alexander  ग्राहम   घंटी  and Thomas Watson , and finally  to  commercially successful  telephones  in the  लेट  19th century  .
A Master of Fine Arts ( MFA , M.F.A . ) is a graduate degree typically  requiring   2–3   सालो   of   postgraduate  study beyond the bachelor  's  degree ( BFA )  ,  although the term  of   पढ़ाई   होगा  vary by country  or  by university  .
the  MFA is a  रचनात्मक   उपाधि   प्रायः   awarded  as a terminal  उपाधि   in  visual arts  ,   रचनात्मक   लिखने   ,  filmmaking ,  नृत्य  ,  or  theatre and other performing  कला  .
Coursework  is   primarily  of an applied or  performing  nature with  the  program  प्रायः   culminating  in a major work or performance  .
Master of Fine  कला   कार्यक्रम   have  generally required  a  bachelor  's  degree prior to  प्रवेश  , but  अनेक   do  not require that the  undergraduate  major  be  the same as the  mfa   फ़ील्ड  of study  .
the  most important  admissions  requirement has often  महरूम   a  sample portfolio  or   a  performance audition .
The Master of  ठीक   कला   differs  from the  निपुण   of  Arts  in  that the MFA ,  जबकि  an  अकादमिक  program  ,  centers around  अभ्यास  in the  particular  field ,  whereas  programs leading  to  the  ma   प्रायः  center  on  the scholarly  ,  academic  ,  or critical study  of   the  field  .
additionally   ,   in   the  United  राज्य   ,  an MFA  is  recognized  as  a terminal degree for practitioners  of   विज़ुअल   आर्ट  ,  डिज़ाइन   ,   नृत्य   ,  Theatre , Film/Video  ,   नई   मीडिया  , and  रचनात्मक  Writing  -   अर्थ   कि  it  is  considered to  be   the  highest degree  in  its field  ,   और  is used as  a   न्यूनतम  qualification  to  be  समर्थ   to  apply to become a  full-time  Professor teaching at the University  स्तर  in  ये   disciplines  .
वहीँ  are  अपवाद  to  इस   मानक   in   the  Arts  ,   notably   in  the case of  म्यूज़िक  performance  ,  where  the   mfa  is not seen as a terminal degree  in  the  कॉन्टेक्स्ट  of the  अधिक   मानकीकृत  DMA degree  .
it  is also  नाजुक   to   नोट  that in the  ब्याज  of extending the  कनेक्शन   between   रचनात्मक  production and continued academic  शोध  ,  कुछ  universities  have   स्थापित  practice-based Ph.D programs  in   फ़ील्ड   ऐसे  as creative  लिखने   ,   विज़ुअल  arts  ,   नई  media , design and theater  .
While  इस   रै   था   an   प्रभाव   in  Creative Writing  ,  and to  a  lesser extent  in  design and  नई  media , the  influx   of   graduates  from practice-based PhD  कार्यक्रम   रै   नहीं  appreciably changed  the  standard  लिये   the  MFA as the terminal degree in most  कला   disciplines  yet  .
This is an ongoing contentious topic  ,  and is  the  frequent subject  of  academic panels  ,  especially at the annual  कॉलेज   आर्ट   संघ   सम्मेलन  .
the  CAA 2008 guidelines  regarding  the  mfa  strongly  re-affirms  that  the  PhD is  नहीं   जरूरी   as  a terminal  उपाधि   in   the  visual arts .
the  atomic  bombings  of the cities  of  Hiroshima  और  Nagasaki in Japan  यहूद   conducted   by  the United States during  the  final stages of World  युद्ध   ii  in 1945 .
The  दो  events are the  तभी  use of nuclear  हथियार   in  war  to  date  .
Following  a   firebombing  campaign  कि   नष्ट  many Japanese cities  ,   the   allies   prepared  for a costly invasion  of  Japan  .
The war in Europe  ended  when  नाजी  Germany signed its instrument of surrender  on  8 May , but  the  Pacific War  जारी   .
Together  साथ   the  United Kingdom and  the  Republic of China  ,  the  संयुक्त  States called for a  आत्मसमर्पण  of  जापानी   in   the  Potsdam  घोषणा  on  26   जुलाई  1945  ,   threatening  Japan with  ``  prompt and utter destruction '' .
The  जापानी  government ignored this  ultimatum  ,  और  the United  राज्य   तैनात  two nuclear  हथियार  developed by the Manhattan  प्रोजेक्ट  .
American airmen dropped  छोटी   लड़के  on  the  city  of  Hiroshima on 6 August  1945   ,   followed  by Fat  man  over Nagasaki  on   9  August .
भीतर   the  first two to  चार   महीने  of the bombings , the acute effects killed 90,000–166,000  लोगों   in  Hiroshima  और  60,000–80,000 in  नागासाकी   ,  with roughly  हाफ   of  the  मौतों  in  प्रत्येक   नगर  occurring  on  the  पहला  day .
The  हिरोशिमा  prefecture  स्वास्थ्य   विभाग   अनुमानित  that , of  the  people  जो  died  on  the  दिन  of the explosion , 60 %  died   इससे   फ्लैश   or  flame  burns  , 30  %   इससे  falling debris and 10 %  इससे  other  कल्याणकारी  .
दौरान   the  following months ,  विशाल  numbers  died  from the  प्रभाव  of burns , radiation sickness ,  और  other  चोटों   ,   compounded   by   बीमारी  .
in  a US estimate of  the  total immediate  और  short  पद   कारण   of  death ,  15–20   %   died  from radiation  बीमारी  , 20–30 %  इससे  burns  ,  and 50–60  %  from  अन्य   चोटों  , compounded by illness .
In  दोनो  cities  ,  most  of   the   मुर्दे   यहूद  civilians , although  हिरोशिमा  had a sizeable  गैरीसन   .
On  15   अगस्त  ,  छह  days after the  bombing  of Nagasaki , Japan  घोषित   इसके  surrender  to   the   allies   ,  signing the  यंत्र   of  Surrender  on   2   सितंबर   ,  officially ending World War II .
the  bombings  led  , in part  ,  to post-war Japan  's   adopting   तीन  Non-Nuclear Principles , forbidding  the   स्वदेश  from nuclear armament  .
The role of the  bombings  in  जापानी  's surrender and their  नैतिक   औचित्य   हैं   स्टिल   debated  .
मोहनदास  Karamchand Gandhi  (  ; 2  अक्तूबर  1869  –  30  जनवरी  1948  )  , commonly known as Mahatma Gandhi , was  the  preeminent  नेता   of  Indian nationalism in  british-ruled   इण्डिया  .
employing  non-violent  सिविल  disobedience , Gandhi  led   इण्डिया  to independence  और  inspired movements for non-violence , civil rights  और   स्वतंत्रता   आरपार   the  world  .
The son of a  वरिष्ठ   सरकारी  official , Gandhi was  born   और  raised  in  a Hindu Bania community in  तटीय  Gujarat , and  प्रशिक्षित   in  law in London .
गांधी   became  famous  by   लड़   लिये   the   सिविल  rights of  मुस्लिम   और  Hindu  इंडियंस  in  दक्षिण   अफ़्रीकी  , using new  तकनीकों  of non-violent civil  disobedience   कि  he developed .
returning  to  इण्डिया  in  1915   ,   he   नियत  about organising peasants to protest excessive  land-taxes  .
A  lifelong  opponent of ``  सांप्रदायिकता  `` ( i.e .  basing  politics  on   धर्म  ) he reached  आउट  widely to all religious groups  .
he  became  a  leader  of  Muslims  protesting   the  declining status of the  खिलाफत  .
Assuming  नेतृत्व  of the  भारतीय  National Congress in 1921  ,  Gandhi led  देशभर  campaigns for easing  गरीबी   ,  expanding women 's  अधिकारों   ,  building religious and ethnic amity  ,   समाप्ति  untouchability  ,   increasing   आर्थिक  self-reliance , and  ऊपर  all  लिये  achieving Swaraj —the  स्वतंत्रता  of India from British  हुकूमत   .
गांधी   led  Indians in protesting  the  national salt  कर   साथ   the  Dandi Salt March in 1930  ,   और  later  in  demanding the British  to   तत्काल   छोड़ो  India in  1942  ,  दौरान   संसार   युद्ध   ii  .
He  थी   imprisoned  for that  और   लिये  numerous other political offenses over  the  years  .
गांधी   sought  to practice  non-violence   और  truth  in  all  परिस्थितियों  ,  और  advocated that  अन्य  do the same  .
he  saw  the  villages  as  the  कोर   of   the   सच्चा  India  और  promoted self-sufficiency  ;  he did  नहीं  support the  industrialization  programs  of  his disciple  जवाहरलाल   नेहरू   .
He  जिया  modestly in  a  self-sufficient  आवासीय   जातियाँ  and  पहना  the traditional Indian  धोती  and  चादर  , woven with yarn  he  had  हाथ  spun on a  charkha  .
उसके   मुख्य  political enemy  in   ब्रिटेन  was Winston Churchill  ,  who ridiculed him  as  a ``  half-naked  fakir  .   ''
He  थी   a   समर्पित   शाकाहारी  , and undertook  long  fasts as means of both  self-purification  and  राजनैतिक  mobilization  .
In  उसके  last year  ,  unhappy at  the  partition  of  India  ,   गांधी   worked  to  रोकें  the  carnage   between  Muslims , Hindus and Sikhs  कि   raged   in   the   किनारा  area between India and Pakistan .
he  was  assassinated   on  30 January  1948  by Nathuram Godse  जो  thought Gandhi was  too   सहानुभूतिपूर्ण   to   इण्डिया   's  Muslims .
30  जनवरी  is observed as Martyrs  '  Day  in  India  .
The  honorific   महात्मा  ( `` Great  आत्मा   ''  )  थी  applied to  उसे  by 1914  .
in  India he  थी  also  पुकारा  Bapu  (  `` Father '' )  .
He  is  known  in   इण्डिया  as the Father  of  the  स्वदेश  ;  उसके   जन्मदिवस  ,  2  October  ,   is  commemorated there as  गांधी  Jayanti , a national holiday ,  और   world-wide  as the International Day of  non-violence   .
Gandhi  's  philosophy  थी   नहीं  theoretical  लकिन  one of pragmatism , that is , practicing his principles in  the   पल   .
पूछा  to give a message to the people  ,  he would respond  ,   ``  My life is my  संदेश   .   ''
जोन  Crawford  (  March  23   ,  ca  .  1904 –  may   10  , 1977  )  , born Lucille Fay  lesueur   ,   थी  an  अमरीकी  actress  in   फिल्मी   ,  television and theatre  .
Starting  as  a dancer in traveling theatrical companies  पहले   debuting   on   ब्रॉडवे  ,  क्रॉफर्ड  was  हस्ताक्षरित   to  a  गति  picture contract  by   metro-goldwyn-mayer   in  1925 .
initially  frustrated  by  the  आकार  and  विशेषता  of her parts  ,  Crawford began a campaign  of   self-publicity  and became nationally  ज्ञात   as   a  flapper by the  समाप्त  of the 1920s .
In the 1930s ,  क्रॉफर्ड  's  कीर्ति  rivaled , and later  outlasted  ,  mgm  colleagues Norma  शियर्र   और   greta   garbo  .
Crawford often played  मेहनती   यंग   महिलाओं   जो  find  रोमांस   और   वित्तीय   कामयाबी   .
These `` rags-to-riches '' stories were  खूब  received by Depression  -era   ऑडियंस   और   यहूद  popular with women  .
Crawford  became   एक  of  हॉलीवुड  's  सबसे  prominent  फिल्म  stars and  एक   of  the  उच्चतम  paid  महिलाओं  in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  , but her  films   began   खोने  money  और   by   the  end of  the   1930s   वो  was labeled `` box office  ज़हर   ''   .
After an absence of nearly  दो   सालो   इससे   the  screen  ,  Crawford  मंचन   a   वापसी  by starring in Mildred  पियर्स  (  1945  ) ,  लिये   जिससे   वो  won the Academy  पुरस्कार   लिये  Best Actress .
in   1955   ,  she became  शामिल  with  the  Pepsi-Cola Company through  उसके  marriage to company  अध्यक्ष   अल्फ्रेड   स्टील   .
After  उसके  death in  1959   ,  Crawford was  निर्वाचित  to fill his vacancy  on   the  board of  निर्देशकों   लकिन   थी   forcibly  retired in 1973 .
She  जारी   एक्टिंग   in   फिल्मी   और  television regularly through the 1960s  ,   जब   उसके  performances  became  fewer ; after  the  release of  the   अंग्रेजों  horror  फिल्मी   trog  in 1970 , Crawford retired from the  स्क्रीन  .
following  a public appearance  in  1974  ,   बाद  which  unflattering  photographs were  प्रकाशित   ,  Crawford withdrew  इससे  public life  और   became  increasingly reclusive until her  मौत  in  1977  .
क्रॉफर्ड   शादीशुदा  four  टाइम्स   .
उसके   पहला  three marriages ended in divorce ; the last  ended  with the death  of   husband   अल्फ्रेड   स्टील   .
She adopted  पाँच   children   ,   एक   of   जिसको  was  reclaimed  by his birth  माँ  .
क्रॉफर्ड  's  संबंध   साथ  her  दो   पुरानी   children  , Christina and  क्रिस्टोफर  ,  यहूद   acrimonious   .
Crawford disinherited the  दो  and  ,  after  क्रॉफर्ड   's  death ,  क्रिस्टीना   लिखा  a  ``  tell-all ''  संस्मरण  , Mommie  dearest  , in which  वो   कथित  a lifelong  पैटर्न  of  शारीरिक   और   emotional   गाली  perpetrated  by  Crawford .
She was voted the tenth greatest  मादा  star  in   the   इतिहास  of  अमरीकी   सिनेमा   by   the  American Film  संस्थान   .
