Tonneau cover ( or  )  describes  a  hard or soft  कवर  used to protect unoccupied passenger  सीटे   in   a  convertible  or  roadster , or the  कार्गो   bed  in a  पिकअप  truck .
मुश्किल  tonneau covers  खोलें  by a hinging  or   फोल्डिंग  mechanism while soft covers  खोलें   by   रोलिंग   up   .
The tonneau  कवर   is  used to  छिपाते   कार्गो  .
When the  कवर   is  pulled out ,  it  keeps  वस्तुएं  out of  the  sun and provides extra  सुरक्षा  by keeping  निजी   वस्तुएं  out of sight  ,  as well as  shielding  the driver from view .
ट्विटर  is an online social networking  सेवा   और  microblogging service that  enables  its  उपयोक्ता  to send and read  text-based   संदेश  of  up   to  140  वर्ण  ,  ज्ञात   as   ``   tweets   ''  .
Twitter was created in  कूच  2006  by  Jack  dorsey  and  by  July  ,   the  social networking site was launched .
the  service rapidly  gained  worldwide  लोकप्रियता  , with over 500  लाख   पंजीकृत  users  as   of  2012 ,  generating  over  340   लाख  tweets daily and  हैंडलिंग  over  1.6   अरब  search queries per  दिन  .
चूंकि   इसके  launch , Twitter  रै  become  एक  of the ten most  visited  websites  on  the  अंतरजाल   ,  and has been described  as   ``   the  SMS of the Internet  .   ''
Unregistered  उपयोक्ता  can read tweets ,  जबकि  registered users  can   पोस्ट  tweets through  the  website interface  ,   sms  , or  a  range of  ऐप्स  for mobile devices  .
ट्विटर  Inc.  is   आधारित  in  सैन  Francisco , with  अतिरिक्त  servers and  कार्यालयों  in  नई  York  नगर  ,  बोस्टन   ,   और   सैन   अंतोनियो   .
the   hangover  is  a  2009  अमरीकी   कॉमेडी  film , co-produced  और  directed by Todd Phillips  और  written  by  Jon Lucas and  स्कॉट  Moore .
it  is the first film  of  The Hangover franchise .The  फिल्मी   सितारों  Bradley Cooper , Ed Helms , Zach  galifianakis  , Heather  ग्राहम  ,  जस्टिन  Bartha ,  और   जेफरी  Tambor .
The Hangover  tells  the  स्टोरी  of Phil Wenneck , Stu  दाम   और  Alan  गार्नर  , who  सफर   to   लास  Vegas  लिये  a  स्नातक   पार्टी   to  celebrate their  dost   डग  Billings  '  impending marriage .
However , Phil ,  stu  and  एलन  have no memory  of  the previous  रात्रि   's   कार्यक्रम  and must find Doug  पहले   the   विवाह   can  take place  .
लुकास  and Moore wrote  the  script after executive producer  क्रिस  Bender 's friend  disappeared   और   था   a   विशाल  bill  बाद   होने  sent to  a  strip club  .
After  लुकास  and Moore  बेची  it to  the   स्टुडियो  for $  2   लाख  , Philips and Jeremy Garelick  rewrote  the  स्क्रिप्ट   to  include a tiger  as  well as  a   subplot  involving  a  baby and a police  क्रूजर  ,  और   भी  including  boxer  Mike Tyson  .
Filming  took   प्लेस  in Nevada  लिये   15  days ,  और   दौरान  filming  ,  the three  प्रमुख   अभिनेताओं   (   कूपर  , Helms and Galifianakis )  formed  a friendship .
The Hangover was released on  जून  5 , 2009 , becoming  a  critical and  वाणिज्यिक  success  .
it  became  the  tenth-highest-grossing film  of   2009  ,  साथ  a  विश्वव्यापी  gross  of  over  us  $ 467 million .
Critics praised  the   फिल्मी   's  comedic approach but criticized it  लिये   इसके   vulgarity   .
the  film won  the  Golden Globe Award for Best Motion Picture – Musical or  कॉमेडी   ,   और  received multiple  अन्य  accolades .
it  is the tenth-highest-grossing  फिल्मी  of 2009 in the  संसार  , as  खूब   as  the  दूसरी  highest-grossing R-rated  कॉमेडी  ever  in  the  संयुक्त  States  ,  surpassing a record previously  आयोजित  by  बेवर्ली  Hills  cop  for  लगभग  25  सालो  and later being  surpassed   by  Ted in  2012   .
आउट   of  all R-rated films , it  is  the  तीसरा   highest-grossing   कभी  in the  u.S.  , behind only  the   जुनून  of the Christ and  the   मेट्रिक्स   reloaded  .
A  sequel  ,  the  Hangover Part II , was released in  2011   ,  and a third  और  final film  ,  The Hangover Part III  ,  is set for  रिलीज   in  2013 .
Events involving meiosis , showing chromosomal  क्रॉसओवर
Meiosis ( ) is a special type of cell  प्रभाग  necessary  लिये   यौन  reproduction in eukaryotes .
the  cells produced  by  meiosis are gametes  or  spores .
In many  जीवों  , including  सब  animals and land  पौधे  ( but  नहीं   कुछ   अन्य   समूह   ऐसे  as  fungi   )  , gametes are called  शुक्राणु   और  egg  कोशिकाएं   .
whilst  the  प्रक्रम  of  meiosis  bears a  क्रमांक  of  similarities   साथ  the 'life-cycle ' cell  प्रभाग  process  of  mitosis  ,  it differs in  दो   महत्वपूर्ण   आदरs:
the  गुणसूत्रों   in   meiosis   undergo  a recombination which shuffles  the  genes producing a different genetic combination  in  each gamete , compared  साथ  the  co-existence  of  प्रत्येक   of  the  दो  separate pairs  of  each  chromosome  ( one received from  प्रत्येक   जनक  ) in  प्रत्येक  cell which  परिणाम  from  समसूत्रण   .
the  निष्कर्ष   of   meiosis  is potentially four (  genetically   अद्वितीय  )  अगुणित  cells , compared with the  दो  ( genetically identical ) diploid cells produced from mitosis .
Meiosis begins with  एक   द्विगुणित   कोशिका  containing two copies  of   प्रत्येक  chromosome —one from the  सजीव  's  माँ  and one from its  पिता   .
The  कोशिका  divides twice  ,  potentially producing up  to  four haploid  कोशिकाएं  containing one copy of each chromosome  .
( ``  potentially  '' because  in  some  मामले  ,  ऐसे   as  the formation of oocytes  in  mammals ,  तभी   एक  of  the  possible  चार  haploid cells  survives   .  )
In animals the haploid  कोशिका  resulting  इससे   meiosis   is  a male  or   मादा   gamete  .
Each of  the  resulting  गुणसूत्रों  in  the  gamete cells  is  a unique mixture  of   मातृ  and paternal  डीएनए  , resulting  in   औलाद   कि   हैं   genetically   पृथक  from either  जनक  .
This  देता  rise to genetic  विविधता  in sexually reproducing populations  .
This genetic diversity can provide  the  variation of  शारीरिक  and behavioural  गुण  ( phenotypes  )  upon which  प्राकृतिक   चयन  can act  ,   लकिन  , as  वर्णित  below  in  Section  6  ,  उत्पत्ति  and function of meiosis  ,   the  genetic diversity may be largely a by-product of the homologous  recombination  that is  primarily   employed  for its DNA repair function during  meiosis  .
it  is  भी  noteworthy that during meiosis  ,   विशिष्ट  genes are  अधिक  highly  transcribed   ,   और  these are  पुकारा   the   meiome  ,  the  term used in  कार्यात्मक   जीनोमिक्स   लिये   the   meiotic  transcriptome .
Meiosis is a key  विशेषता  for  सब  sexually reproducing  eukaryotes  in which homologous  chromosome  pairing ,  अन्तर्ग्रथन  and recombination occur  .
in   जोड  to  दमदार  meiotic  stage-specific   अभिव्यक्ति   of  mRNA  (  the meiome  )   ,   however   ,  there  हैं  also pervasive  translational   नियंत्रण   (  e.g . selective  उपयोग  of  preformed   mrna  ) ,  regulating  the  परम   meiotic   stage-specific  protein expression of  जीनों  during meiosis  .
यूँ   ,   दोनो   the   meiome  and translational controls determine  the   व्यापक  restructuring  of  meiotic cells  needed  to carry  आउट  meiosis  .
prior  to  the   meiosis  process the cell 's chromosomes are  duplicated  by  a   गोलाकार   of   डीएनए  replication ,  बनाना   इससे   the   मातृ   और   पैतृक   संस्करण   of   प्रत्येक  chromosome  (   homologs  ) two  सटीक   नक़ल   ,  sister  chromatids  , attached at the centromere region  .
In  the  beginning of  meiosis  the maternal  और  paternal homologs pair  to  each other .
Then  वे  typically  एक्सचेंज   भाग  by homologous  recombination   अग्रणी  to crossovers  of  DNA between  the  maternal and  पैतृक  versions  of  the chromosome  .
Spindle  मछली   bind  to  the   centromeres   of  each  जोड़ी  of  homologs   और  arrange  the  pairs  at  the spindle equator  .
Then  the   मछली  pull the  recombined  homologs to  विपरीत   डंडे   of  the cell .
As  the  chromosomes move away  इससे  the center the  कोशिका  divides  into  two  बेटी  cells , each  containing  a haploid number of  गुणसूत्रों  composed  of   दो  chromatids .
After the  recombined   मातृ  and paternal  homologs  have  अलग   into  the two  बेटी   कोशिकाएं   ,   a   दूसरी  round of cell  प्रभाग  occurs .
There meiosis  ends  as the  दो  sister chromatids  बनाना   up   प्रत्येक  homolog  हैं  separated and  मूव  into one of  the   चार   resulting  gamete cells  .
Upon fertilization ,  लिये  example  जब  a sperm enters  an  egg cell  ,   दो   gamete   कोशिकाएं  produced by  meiosis  fuse  .
The  gamete  from the mother  और  the  gamete  from  the   पिता  each  योगदान  one  हाफ  of the set of  गुणसूत्रों   कि  make  up  the  नई   औलाद   's  genome  .
Meiosis  उपयोग   अनेक  of  the   वही  mechanisms as  समसूत्रण  , a type of  कोशिका  division  प्रयुक्त   by  eukaryotes like plants  और  animals to split one cell into two identical daughter  कोशिकाएं   .
in  all  पौधे  and  in  many protists  meiosis  results in the formation of spores : haploid cells that  can   divide  vegetatively without undergoing fertilization .
Boxing ( pugilism , prize fighting , the sweet science or in Greek pygmachia  )  is a martial art and combat  खेल   in  which two people  engage  in a contest  of   शक्ति  , speed  ,   reflexes   ,  endurance and will by throwing  घूंसे  with gloved hands .
amateur  boxing is  an  Olympic and Commonwealth sport  और   is  a common  fixture  in most  of  the major  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   खेल  -  it  also  रै  its own  संसार   championships  .
Boxing is  पर्यवेक्षित   by   a  referee  over   a  series  of   one-   to  three-minute intervals called rounds .
The result  is   decided  when  an   प्रतिद्वन्दी   is   deemed  incapable to  continue   by   a  referee , is  disqualified   लिये   तोड़कर   a   नियम  , resigns by throwing  in   a  towel  ,  or is pronounced  the  winner or loser based  on  the judges  '   scorecards   at   the  end  of   the  contest .
The birth hour of boxing as a sport  may   be   इसके  acceptance  by   the   प्राचीन  Greeks  as   an  Olympic game  as   जल्दी  as  688   bc  .
Boxing evolved from  16th-  and 18th-century prizefights  ,  largely  in   ग्रेट  Britain , to  the  forerunner of  आधुनिक  boxing in the  mid-19th  century  ,  again  initially  in Great  ब्रिटेन  and later in the United States .
In 2004  ,  ESPN ranked boxing  as   the  most  मुश्किल   खेल  in the  संसार   .
Agreement or concord happens when a word  परिवर्तन  form depending  on  the  अन्य  words  to  which  it  relates .
it  is  an   उदाहरण  of  inflection  , and usually  involves   बनाना  the value of  कुछ   व्याकरणिक  category (  ऐसे  as gender  or  person )  ``  agree  ''  between different words or parts  of  the sentence  .
For example , in  मानक  English , one  may  say  i   am  or  he  is  ,  but not ``  i  is ''  or  `` he am ''  .
This  is   क्युकी   the  grammar of the  भाषा  requires  कि  the  क्रिया  and its subject  सहमत  in person  .
The  pronouns  I  और   he  are first  और   तीसरा  person  क्रमशः  , as are  the  verb forms am and is  .
the  verb form must  be   चयनित  so  कि   it  has  the  same person  as   the  subject .
the   अनुबंध  based  on   overt  grammatical categories  as   ऊपर   is  formal agreement  ,   in  contrast to notional agreement  ,   जिससे   is  based on  अर्थ  .
लिये   उदाहरण  , the  phrase  The  संयुक्त  States is  treated  as  एकवचन   लिये  purposes of agreement ,  भी  though  it  is  formally   बहुवचन  .
This is  a  list of places below mean sea  स्तर   कि  are on  जमीन   .
Places  in  tunnels  ,  mines  ,  basements  ,  dug  छेद  (  भी   साथ  open sky  )   ,   अंतर्गत   जल   ,   अंतर्गत   बर्फ  , or  मौजूदा  temporarily as  a   परिणाम  of  ebbing   of  sea tide etc  .  are  नहीं   शामिल   .
सब  figures are in meters  नीचे  sea level:
Debbie  macomber  ( born October 22  ,  1948 in Yakima  ,   वॉशिंगटन   )  is  a   best-selling  American  लेखक   of  over 150 romance novels and contemporary women  's   fiction   .
over  140 million copies  of   उसके  books are in  छपाई   throughout  the  संसार  ,  और   चार  have  become  made-for-TV-movies .
macomber  was  the  inaugural winner  of  the fan-voted  quill  Award for  रोमांस   in   2005   और  has been awarded  दोनो  a Romance  लेखक   of   अमेरिका   रीता   और  a  आजीवन   उपलब्धि   पुरस्कार   by  the  रोमांस  Writers of America  .
Catonsville  is  a census-designated place ( CDP  )  in  बाल्टीमोर   काउंटी   ,  Maryland  ,  United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 41,567 at the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी   .
The  जातियाँ   झूठ  to the  वेस्ट  of  बाल्टीमोर   साथ  the city 's border  .
Catonsville is the home  of  the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of  मेरीलैंड   ,  Baltimore  काउंटी   (  UMBC  )  , a  पब्लिक  research university  साथ   over   12,000  students .
A  वकील  ,  according  to  ब्लैक  's Law  शब्दकोष  , is  ``  a person  सीखे  in the law  ;   as  an  attorney  , counsel or solicitor ;  a  person who  is  practicing law . ''
Law is  the   प्रणाली  of  नियम  of  conduct  established by the  sovereign  government of a society  to  correct wrongs  ,  maintain the stability of political and  सोशल  authority  ,  and deliver  इंसाफ  .
Working as a  वकील  involves  the   व्यावहारिक  application of abstract legal theories and knowledge to solve  विशिष्ट  individualized  समस्याएं  , or  to  advance  the   रूचि  of  those  who  retain  (  i.e.  , hire )  वकील  to perform  विधिक  services  .
The  भूमिका   of  the  वकील   varies  significantly  आरपार   विधिक   jurisdictions   ,  and  so  it  can  be  treated   यहाँ  in  तभी  the  सबसे   सामान्य   शर्तें  .
Vector  विपणन   is  the domestic sales  भुजा  of Cutco Corporation  ,   an  Olean  ,  New York based cutlery manufacturer .
the  Family and Medical Leave  अधिनियम  of 1993  (   fmla  ) is a United States federal law  requiring   covered  employers  to   provide   कर्मचारी  job-protected and  unpaid   छोड़   लिये  qualified medical  और  family  कारण  .
Qualified medical  और  family reasons include : personal or family  बीमारी   ,  family  सैन्य  leave , pregnancy ,  अपनाना  , or the foster  परवाह  placement of a  चाइल्ड   .
The FMLA is administered by  the  Wage and  घंटा   प्रभाग  of the United States Department of Labor .
the   विधेयक  was a major  भाग  of President Bill  क्लिंटन  's agenda  in  his  पहला  term  .
President Clinton signed  the   विधेयक  into law on  फ़रवरी  5 , 1993 (  ;   29   u.s.c   .  sec . 2601  ;  29 CFR  825   )  and it took effect  on   अगस्त  5  ,  1993  ,   छह  months later  .
The FMLA was intended  ``  to balance the demands of  the  workplace with  the  needs of families  .  ''
The Act  allows   योग्य   कर्मचारी  to take up to  12  work weeks of unpaid  छोड़  during  कोई  12-month period to attend to  the  serious  स्वास्थ्य  condition of the  कर्मचारी  ,  जनक  , spouse  or   चाइल्ड  ,  or  for  गर्भावस्था  or care of a newborn child , or  लिये   अपनाना  or foster  परवाह  of  a   चाइल्ड   .
in  order to  be  eligible for  fmla  leave ,  an  employee  जरूर  have been at  the   कारोबार  at  तनिक   12   महीने  ,  और  worked  at   तनिक   1,250   घंटों  over  the   पास्ट   12  months ,  और  work at  a  location  जहाँ  the  कम्पनी   employs   50  or  अधिक   कर्मचारी  within 75 miles  .
The FMLA  कवर   दोनो  public- and private-sector  कर्मचारी  ,  लकिन  certain categories of employees are excluded , including elected  officials  and their  निजी  staff members  .
the   वियतनाम  War ( ) was a Cold  युद्ध  -era military conflict that  occurred  in Vietnam , Laos  ,   और   कंबोडिया  from 1 November 1955  to  the  पतन  of Saigon on 30 April 1975 .
इस   युद्ध   followed  the  पहला   इंडोचायना  War  और   थी  fought  between  North Vietnam ,  समर्थित  by  इसके  communist allies  ,   और  the  सरकारी   of  South Vietnam , supported  by  the United States  और  other anti-communist countries .
The  viet   cong  ( also  ज्ञात   as   the  National Liberation Front  ,  or  nlf  ) , a  हलके  armed  दक्षिण  Vietnamese communist  आम  front directed by the North , largely  लड़ा   a   छापामार  war against anti-communist  शक्तियां  in  the  region .
the  Vietnam  लोगों  's  फौज  ( North  वियतनामी   फौज  ) engaged  in   a  more  conventional  war  ,  at  टाइम्स  committing  विशाल  units into battle  .
u.S.  and  दक्षिण   वियतनामी   शक्तियां   relied  on  एयर  superiority and  overwhelming  firepower to conduct search and  नष्ट   परिचालन  , involving  मैदान   शक्तियां  ,  तोपखाने   ,   और  airstrikes .
The  u.S.  government viewed involvement  in   the  war as  a  way to prevent a  कम्युनिस्ट  takeover  of  South Vietnam as  भाग   of   उनके  wider  रणनीति  of  containment   .
The  उत्तर  Vietnamese government  और   viet   cong  were  लड़  to  reunify   वियतनाम  under communist  नियम   .
वे  viewed  the  conflict as a colonial war  ,   लड़ा   initially  against France , backed  by   the  U.S.  ,   और  later against South Vietnam ,  जिससे  it  regarded  as a  u.S.   कठपुतली  state .
अमरीकी  military advisors arrived in what was then French Indochina beginning in 1950  .
U.S.  भागीदारी  escalated in the  जल्दी  1960s , with troop levels  tripling  in 1961 and tripling again in 1962 .
u.S.   कॉम्बैट   इकाई  were  तैनात  beginning  in  1965 .
Operations spanned international  सीमायें   ,   साथ   लाओस   और  Cambodia heavily  bombed  .
American  भागीदारी  in the war peaked in 1968  ,  at  the  time  of  the  tet  Offensive .
बाद  this , U.S. ground forces were gradually  withdrawn   as   भाग   of   a  policy  ज्ञात   as  Vietnamization .
despite  the Paris  सलाम  Accords ,  हस्ताक्षरित   by  all  पार्टियों  in  जनवरी  1973  ,  fighting continued .
u.S.  military involvement ended  on  15 August  1973  as  a  result  of  the  case–church  Amendment passed  by  the  u.S.   कॉंग्रेस   .
The  कैप्चर   of  Saigon by the  वियतनाम  People 's  फौज  in April  1975  marked the end  of  the  युद्ध  , and North  और   दक्षिण  Vietnam were reunified  the   following   साल   .
the   युद्ध  exacted a huge  इंसान  cost in terms of fatalities  (   देखिए  Vietnam War  हताहत   )   .
Estimates of  the   क्रमांक  of Vietnamese soldiers  और  civilians killed vary from 800,000 to 3.1 million .
Some 200,000–300,000 Cambodians  ,  20,000–200,000 Laotians ,  और  58,220 U.S. service  सदस्यों  also  died  in the conflict  .
Cleveland Volcano  in  the Aleutian Islands of Alaska photographed  इससे  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Space  स्टेशन  , May 2006 .
राख  plumes  पहुँचे  a height of 19  km   दौरान   the   climactic  eruption at Mount  pinatubo  , Philippines in 1991 .
A volcano  is   an   खोलने  , or rupture , in a  ग्रह  's surface  or   क्रस्ट  ,  जिससे   allows  hot  मैग्मा  , volcanic ash and gases to  एस्केप  from the  मैग्मा  chamber  नीचे   the  surface  .
ज्वालामुखी  are generally found where tectonic plates are  diverging   or  converging  .
A mid-oceanic ridge  ,  for example the  mid-atlantic  Ridge , has examples of  ज्वालामुखी  caused by  अपसारी  tectonic plates pulling  अलावा  ; the Pacific Ring of Fire  रै  examples of volcanoes caused by convergent tectonic  प्लेटों   coming  together  .
By contrast ,  ज्वालामुखी  are  प्रायः  not created where two  tectonic   प्लेटों  slide  पास्ट  one  another   .
Volcanoes can also form  जहाँ   वहीँ  is stretching  और   thinning   of  the Earth  's   क्रस्ट  in the interiors of plates ,  e.g.  ,  in  the  ईस्ट  African  दरार  ,  the   कुएं  Gray-Clearwater volcanic field and the  रिओ   ग्रांडे   दरार   in  North  अमेरिका   .
इस   प्रकार  of volcanism falls  अंतर्गत  the  छतरियाँ  of  ``   थाली  hypothesis '' volcanism .
Volcanism  दूर   इससे  plate  सीमाएँ  has also been  समझाया  as mantle plumes  .
ये  so-called ``  हॉटस्पॉट   ``  , for example Hawaii  ,  are postulated to arise  इससे  upwelling  diapirs  with magma from the core–mantle  boundary  , 3,000 km  गहन  in the Earth  .
erupting  volcanoes  can  pose  अनेक   जोखिमों  , not  तभी  in  the  immediate  vicinity  of  the  eruption  .
Volcanic ash  can   be   a   threat  to aircraft , in  particular  those with jet  इंजन   जहाँ  ash  अणु   can  be  melted  by the high  ऑपरेटिंग   तापमान   .
विशाल   eruptions  can  affect   तापमान  as ash and droplets of sulfuric acid  अस्पष्ट  the sun and cool the  धरती   's  lower atmosphere or  क्षोभमण्डल   ;  however ,  वे  also absorb heat  radiated  up from  the  Earth ,  thereby   वार्मिंग   the   stratosphere   .
historically   ,   so-called   volcanic  winters  have  caused catastrophic famines .
A deep pothole  on  New  यॉर्क  City  's  Second  एवेन्यू
a  pothole ( sometimes  पुकारा  a  केतली   और  known in parts of the Western United States  as   a   chuckhole  ) is  a   प्रकार  of  disruption  in  the   सतह  of a roadway where  a  portion  of   the  road  सामग्री   रै   टूटा   दूर  ,  leaving  a hole  .
Renal  कोशिका  carcinoma  (  RCC , also known  as  hypernephroma  )  is a kidney cancer  कि   originates   in   the   अस्तर  of  the  proximal  convoluted   tubule   ,  the  बहुत  small  tubes   in   the  kidney  कि   हस्तांतरण   gf  ( glomerular  filtrate   )   इससे   the   glomerulus  to the descending limb of the nephron .
RCC  is   the  most  आम   प्रकार  of  गुर्दा  cancer  in  adults , responsible for approximately 80 %  of  cases  .
It is also  ज्ञात  to be  the   सबसे   lethal   of  all the genitourinary  tumors   .
Initial treatment  is  most  commonly   a  radical or partial nephrectomy  और   remains  the mainstay  of  curative treatment  .
Where  the   ट्यूमर  is  confined  to  the  renal parenchyma ,  the  5-year  अस्तित्व  rate  is  60-70 % , but this is lowered considerably  जहाँ  metastases have spread  .
it  is  अपेक्षाकृत  resistant to  विकिरण  therapy  और   कीमोथेरेपी   ,   हालांकि  some cases  respond   to   immunotherapy  .
Targeted cancer  therapies   ऐसे   as  sunitinib  ,   temsirolimus  ,  bevacizumab  , interferon-alpha  ,  and sorafenib have improved  the  outlook  लिये   rcc  .
estée   lauder   कंपनियाँ  , Inc. is  a  manufacturer and marketer  of  prestige  skincare   ,  makeup  ,  fragrance  और   बाल   परवाह  products .
The company  रै   इसके  headquarters in Midtown  मैनहटन  ,  नई   यॉर्क  City .
The  peritoneum  (  )   is  the serous  झिल्ली   कि  forms  the  lining of  the   abdominal  cavity  or  the  coelom  —it  कवर   सबसे   of   the   intra-abdominal  ( or coelomic  )   organs—in  amniotes and some invertebrates (  annelids   ,  for  उदाहरण  )  .
it  is  रचित  of a layer of mesothelium supported  by   a  thin layer of connective  ऊतक  .
The peritoneum both supports the abdominal  अंगों  and serves as  a  conduit  लिये   उनके  blood  और   लसीका  vessels and  nerves  .
The  abdominal   गुहा  (  the   स्पेस  bounded  by   the  vertebrae ,  abdominal  muscles  ,   diaphragm  and pelvic floor ) should not be  उलझन  with the intraperitoneal  स्पेस   (  located within the  abdominal  cavity , but wrapped  in   peritoneum  )  .
The structures  भीतर  the intraperitoneal  स्पेस   हैं   पुकारा  `` intraperitoneal '' (  e.g   .  the  पेट   )   ,  the structures in the abdominal cavity  कि  are  स्तिथ   पीछे   the  intraperitoneal  स्पेस   हैं   पुकारा  `` retroperitoneal  ``  ( e.g . the kidneys )  ,  and those structures below the intraperitoneal space are called ``  subperitoneal  '' or `` infraperitoneal '' (  e.g  . the bladder  )  .
Modern  2.5  '' SSD  प्रयुक्त  in consumer  लैपटॉप   और  desktop computers .
DDR SDRAM based SSD  .
अधिकतम  and .
PCI  संलग्न  IO  त्वरक  SSD
PCI-E  ,  DRAM ,  और  NAND  आधारित  SSD .
It  उपयोग  an external power  सप्लाई  to make the DRAM non-volatile  .
a   solid-state  drive ( SSD ) ( also known  as  a solid-state  डिस्क  or electronic disk , though it contains  no   वास्तविक  `` disk ''  of  any kind  )  is a  आंकड़ा  storage  यंत्र  using integrated  सर्किट   सभाओं  as memory to  स्टोर  data persistently .
SSD technology  उपयोग   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   अंतरफलक   संगत   साथ   परंपरागत   ब्लाक  input/output ( I/O  )   मुश्किल   डिस्क   ड्राइव  .
SSDs have no moving  mechanical   components   ,   जिससे  distinguish them from traditional electromechanical magnetic disks such as hard disk drives ( HDDs  )   or   फ्लॉपी   डिस्क  , which  contain  spinning  डिस्क  and movable read/write heads  .
Compared with electromechanical disks  ,  SSDs  हैं  typically less  susceptible   to   शारीरिक  shock , much quieter  ,  have  निम्नतर  access  समय   ,  and  कम  latency  .
However ,  जबकि  the price of SSDs has continued to decline  in   2012  ,  ssds  are  स्टिल  about 7  to  8  टाइम्स   अधिक  expensive per  ईकाई   of   भंडार  than HDDs .
Many SSDs use I/O interfaces  विकसित  for  मुश्किल  disk  ड्राइव  , thus  permitting   सरल   बदलना   in  common applications  .
,  most SSDs  उपयोग  NAND-based flash memory  ,  which retains  आंकड़ा  without power .
लिये   अनुप्रयोग  requiring fast  अभिगम   ,  but not  necessarily   आंकड़ा  persistence  बाद   शक्ति   घाटा   ,  SSDs may be constructed from  random-access   मेमोरी  ( RAM ) .
ऐसे   डिवाइस   may   employ  separate power  स्त्रोत   ,  such  as   बैटरी  ,  to   maintain  data after  शक्ति  loss  .
संकर  drives or solid state hybrid drives (  sshd  ) combine  the   सुविधाएँ  of SSDs  और  HDDs in the same  ईकाई  , containing  a  large  मुश्किल  disk drive and an SSD cache  to  improve performance  of  frequently  पहुँचा  data  .
ये   डिवाइस   may  offer  near-ssd  performance for many applications .
Salmon  roe   (   बाएँ  )  और  sturgeon  caviar  ( right )  परोसा   साथ  mother of  पर्ल   caviar  spoons  to  avoid tainting the  स्वाद   of   the  caviar .
ossetra  caviar , salmon  creme  fraiche  ,   आलू  shallot  croquette   ,   बेसिल  oil ,  अंडा  whites and yolks
Caviar , according to the Food  और  Agriculture Organization  ,   is  a  उत्पाद  made from salt-cured fish-eggs of the Acipenseridae family  .
The  roe   can  be ``  भैस  ''  (   non-pasteurized  ) or  pasteurized   ,   साथ   pasteurization  reducing  इसके   culinary  and  आर्थिक  value  .
Traditionally the term caviar  refers   तभी  to  roe   इससे  wild sturgeon in the  कैस्पियन  and Black  समंदर  ( Beluga , Ossetra and  sevruga  caviars )  .
Depending  on  the country ,  caviar   may  also be used  to   describe  the roe of other  मछली   ऐसे  as salmon ,  steelhead   ,  trout , lumpfish  ,  whitefish ,  और   अन्य  species  of  sturgeon .
Caviar  is  considered a luxury delicacy  और  is  खाया  as a garnish or  a  spread  .
In 2012 , caviar sold  लिये  $ 2,500 per  पाउंड  , or $ 3,000 to  $   5,500  per  किलो  .
The SEC Network  is  a television syndication  संजाल   featuring   सजीव  broadcasts  of  college  फ़ुटबॉल  and basketball events from  the   southeastern   सम्मेलन  .
it  is  स्वामित्व   और   संचालित  by ESPN Plus  और   is   दिखाया  in more than 50  प्रतिशत   of  households  in   the   संयुक्त  States , mostly Southeastern United States markets  .
the   सेक  Network typically  airs  in  the  noon  पूर्वी   स्लॉट  that was former home  to   the  Raycom Sports SEC  खेल  of the week .
Games  हैं  shown  locally   on  broadcast  स्टेशन  , regional  खेल  networks , as  खूब  as  on  ESPN GamePlan ,  ईएसपीएन  Full Court ,  और  ESPN3.com .
the   सेक  Network is  भी  available in  कनाडा   via  Atlanta 's WPCH-TV  .
the  SEC Network uses the same on-screen  ग्राफिक्स   फिलहाल   प्रयुक्त  by ESPN on  एबीसी  , a  संस्करण  of ESPN 's graphics package  .
SEC  संजाल  's football programming still uses a title safe area because most  of   इसके  affiliates do not  letterbox  their Standard Definition feeds  ,   जबकि  ESPN 's television networks have allowed their graphics  to   लापरवाही  the title  सुरक्षित  , but  letterbox   लिये   sd  viewers .
Starting with the SEC  2012  Basketball  ऋतु   ,   सेक   संजाल  's graphics  have  been  परिवर्तित  to a 16:9 Widescreen-only format .
इस  is  भी  being used for  the  2013 Basketball season  ,  but had still  adapted  the former  4:3-safe  graphics format  लिये   the  2012 SEC football season .
The 1990s , pronounced and also  ज्ञात   as   ``   the  Nineteen-Nineties ''  or   abbreviated  as `` the Nineties '' or  ``  the '90s '' , was  a  decade that  began  on  जनवरी  1 , 1990 , and  ended  on  दिसम्बर   31   ,  1999  .
It was  the  10th  और  last decade of the 20th century and  the   100th  and last decade of  the  2nd millennium .
The decade is  बेहतरीन  known  लिये  the end of the  ठंडा  War at  the  beginning of  the  decade and  the   विस्तार  and commercialization  of  the Internet during  the   दूसरी   हाफ   of  the  दशक   .
In  much  of the West  the  1990s  is  remembered as a period of unprecedented  सलाम  and  समृद्धि  , though many parts of the so-called Third World  faced  various problems including  नरसंहार  ,  एड्स  and new  or   continuing  ethnic tensions and civil wars  .
culturally  speaking the decade was characterized  by   the   वृद्धि   of   बहुसंस्कृतिवाद   और   वैकल्पिक  media .
Movements  ऐसे   as  grunge  ,  the  रेव  scene and hip hop  स्प्रेड  around the world to  यंग  people during  the   दशक  ,  aided   by  then-new  प्रौद्योगिकी  such  as   केबल  television and the  अंतरजाल  .
a   संयोजन  of  कारकों   ,   सहित  the mass mobilization of  पूंजी   बाज़ार   through  neoliberalism  ,   the  beginning  of  the widespread  अप्रसार  of  नई  media such as the Internet , and the dissolution of the  सोवियत  Union led  to  a realignment  और  reconsolidation  of  economic  और   राजनैतिक   शक्ति  across the world  ,   और  within countries .
Income inequality among  देशों  in the world rose sharply between the 1980s and  the  mid-1990s , before levelling  बंद  and then  गिरना  after 2000  .
नई   जातीय   विरोध  emerged  in  Africa , the  balkans  and the Caucasus , the  पूर्व  two which  led   to   the  Rwandan  नरसंहार   और  Bosnian genocide , respectively .
the  United States  began   इसके   वर्तमान  military occupation of the  मध्य  East during the summer  of  1990 with Desert Shield after it  काटें   बंद  a  विशाल  portion of the world  's   पेट्रोलियम   सप्लाई   .
लक्षण   of   कोई  resolution of  तनाव  between Israel and the Arab  संसार  remained elusive  ,   हालांकि  the  आयरिश  Troubles  आए   to  a standstill in 1998 with the  शुभ  Friday  अनुबंध  after  30   सालो  of violence  .
The  धूसर   भेड़िया  or  धूसर  wolf  (   canis   lupus   )   is   a  species of  canid   देशी  to the wilderness and remote  क्षेत्रों  of North  अमेरिका  , Eurasia , and North Africa .
It is  the  largest member of  इसके   परिवार  , with  males   averaging  ,  और  females  .
It is  समान   in  general  रूप   और   proportions  to a German  गड़रिये   ,   or   sled  dog , but has  a  larger head  ,   narrower   छाती  ,  longer  legs  ,  straighter  टेल  and bigger paws .
Its winter fur is long and bushy , and predominantly  a   mottled  gray  in   रंग   ,  although nearly pure white  ,  red , or brown  to  black  भी   occur  .
Within  the  genus  canis   ,  the gray  भेड़िया   represents   a   अधिक  specialised and progressive form than its  छोटी  cousins  (  the  कायोटी   और  golden jackal  )  ,  as  demonstrated  by   इसके   morphological  adaptations  to   शिकार   विशाल  prey  ,  its  अधिक   मिलनसार   प्रकृति  and  इसके   अत्यधिक  advanced expressive behavior  .
It is a social  एनिमल  , travelling in  नाभिकीय  families consisting of a  पन्द्रहवें   जोड़ी   ,  accompanied by the  जोड़ी  's  वयस्क  offspring .
The gray wolf  is  typically  an  apex predator  throughout  its range  ,   साथ  only  इंसानो  and  टाइगर्स  posing a serious  threat  to  it  .
it  feeds primarily  on   विशाल  ungulates , though it also eats smaller  पशु   ,  livestock , carrion  ,   और  garbage .
the  gray wolf  is   एक  of  the   संसार  's  सबसे   खूब  researched  पशु  , with probably more books  लिखा  about it  than  any  अन्य  wildlife species  .
it  has  a  long history of association with humans , having  महरूम  despised  और   hunted  in most agricultural communities due  to  its attacks on livestock , while conversely  होने  respected by some Native American tribes .
it  is  the   एकमात्र  ancestor of the  श्वान   ,  which was first domesticated in the Middle  ईस्ट  .
हालांकि  the fear  of  wolves is prevalent in  अनेक   इंसान  societies  ,  the majority  of  recorded  हमले  on people  have  been attributed to  पशु  suffering from  rabies  .
non-rabid  wolves have attacked and killed people  ,   मुख्यतः  children  ,  but this  is  unusual  ,  as  भेड़ियों  are relatively few  ,  live  दूर   इससे   लोगों  , and have been taught to  भय   इंसानो  by  hunters  and shepherds .
Hunting and trapping has reduced  the  species ' range to , though its  स्टिल  relatively widespread range  और   stable   जनसांख्यिकी   अर्थात्   कि   the  species is not threatened  at   a   वैश्विक  level , and is  इसलिए  classified by  the   आईयूसीएन   as  Least Concern .
The Roman Empire (  )   थी  the post- Republican period of  the  ancient Roman  सभ्यता  , characterised by an  निरंकुश   रूप  of government and large territorial  holdings  around the Mediterranean  in  Europe  ,  Africa  ,   और   एशिया   .
the  500-year-old  रोमन  Republic  ,  which preceded  it  ,  था  been  destabilized  through  a  series  of  civil wars  .
अनेक   कार्यक्रम  marked  the  transition from  गणतंत्र  to  साम्राज्य   ,  including Julius Caesar 's  नियुक्ति  as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC  )  ;  the   बैटल   of  Actium (  31  BC ) ;  और   the  granting of  the  honorific Augustus  to   octavian  by the  रोमन  Senate ( 27 BC )  .
the   पहला  two  सदियां   of  the Empire were  a   काल  of unprecedented stability  और  prosperity known as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace  ''  ) .
It reached its greatest expanse  दौरान  the  शासनकाल   of   त्राजान  (  98–117  AD  )  .
in   the  3rd century , the Empire  underwent   a  crisis  कि   threatened  its  अस्तित्व  , but  थी  reunified and  stabilized   अंतर्गत   the  emperors Aurelian  और   diocletian   .
Christians rose to power  in  the  4th  century , during  जिससे  time a  प्रणाली  of dual  नियम  was  विकसित  in the  लैटिन   वेस्ट  and Greek East  .
बाद  the  पतन  of central  सरकारी  in  the  West in  the   5th  century  ,   the  eastern half  जारी  as what would later be  ज्ञात  as  the   बीज़ान्टिन  Empire .
क्युकी   of  the  साम्राज्य  's vast extent  और  long endurance  ,   the   संस्थानों  and culture  of  Rome  था  a  profound   और  lasting influence on the development of language ,  धर्म   ,  architecture ,  दर्शनशास्त्र   ,  law , and  फ़ॉर्म  of government in the territory it  governed   ,   विशेषकर  Europe , and by means of European expansionism throughout  the  modern  संसार   .
शिक्षा  in the  संयुक्त   राज्य   is   मुख्यतः  provided by the public sector ,  साथ   कंट्रोल  and  funding  coming  इससे  three levels  :  local ,  राज्य  , and  संघीय   ,  in  कि   अनुक्रम  .
चाइल्ड  education is compulsory  ,   और   वहीँ   हैं   भी   a   विशाल  number and wide variety  of  higher  शिक्षा  institutions  throughout  the  देश   कि  one can  चुनें  to attend  ,  both publicly  और   privately  administered .
पब्लिक   शिक्षा  is  universally  available .
School curricula , funding  ,  teaching  ,   नियुक्ति   ,  and other  नीतियों  are  नियत  through locally  निर्वाचित  school  फलक  with  क्षेत्राधिकार  over school  जिले  with  अनेक  directives from  राज्य  legislatures .
School  जिले  are usually  पृथक   इससे   अन्य   लोकल   jurisdictions  , with  स्वतंत्र  officials and  budgets  .
शैक्षणिक   मानकों   और   मानकीकृत  testing  निर्णय  are usually made  by   राज्य  governments  .
the  ages for compulsory education vary by state  .
It  begins  from ages  पाँच   to   आठ   और  ends from  आयु  fourteen  to   अठारह  .
Compulsory education requirements  can  generally be satisfied  by   educating  children  in   पब्लिक   स्कूलों  , state-certified private  स्कूलों   ,   or  an  स्वीकृत  home school  कार्यक्रम  .
in  most  पब्लिक  and  निजी  schools  ,  education is  विभाजित  into  तीन  levels  :  elementary  स्कूल  ,  मध्य  school ( sometimes called junior  ऊँची  school  )   ,   और  high school  (   sometimes   referred  to as secondary education ) .
In almost all  स्कूलों  at these levels ,  children   हैं   विभाजित  by  आयु  groups into grades ,  ranging  from  किंडरगार्टन  ( followed by first grade ) for the youngest children  in   elementary  school ,  up  to twelfth grade ,  the  final year  of  high school  .
The exact age  दायरा  of students in  ये   ग्रेड  levels  varies   थोड़ा  from area to  क्षेत्रफल   .
post-secondary  education  ,   बेहतर  known  as   ``   कॉलेज   ``  in  the  United States ,  is   generally  governed  separately  from the elementary and high school  प्रणाली   ,  and  is   वर्णित   in   a  separate section below .
सरकारी   समर्थित  , free public schools for all started being  स्थापित  after the revolution , and  विस्तारित   in  the  19th  century , as  the   परिणाम   of   प्रयत्न  of men  जैसे  Horace Mann  और  Booker  T.  Washington .
by  1870 , all states  था   फ़्री  elementary  स्कूलों  ,  albeit  only in urban  centers  .
As  the   20th  century drew  nearer   ,  states  प्रारंभ   गुजर   कानून   to   मेक   schooling  compulsory , and by 1910 ,  72  percent  of  children attended  स्कूल  .
Private schools  जारी   to  spread during this  समय   ,  as  खूब  as colleges and—in  the   ग्रामीण  centers—  जमीन   ग्रान्ट  colleges .
The  साल  of 1910 also  देखी   the   पहला   सच्चा  high  स्कूलों  .
During the rest  of   the  20th  सदी   ,   शैक्षणिक   प्रयत्न  centered on reducing  the  inequality of the schooling system  .
The  लैंडमार्क  Supreme Court case  भूरा  v. Board  of  Education  बना  the  desegregation  of elementary  और  high schools a national  प्रधानता   ,   जबकि  the  pell   ग्रान्ट  program helped  ग़रीब  minorities gain access  to   कॉलेज   .
Special education  थी  made  into  federal law  in   1975   .
The Elementary  और  Secondary Education Act of 1965  बना  standardized testing a requirement  ,  and  in  1983 , a  आयोग  was established  to  evaluate their results  और   propose  a course  of   कार्रवाई   .
The  resulting  No  चाइल्ड   बाएँ  Behind Act of  2001  was  विवादास्पद   और  its goals  proved  to be unrealistic .
A  आयोग   स्थापित   in  2006 evaluated higher education , but its  सुझाव  have  yet  to be fully  implemented  .
पॉल   ब्रैग  (  फ़रवरी  6  ,  1895 –  दिसम्बर  7 ,  1976   )   ,  nutritionist ,  थी   a   पायोनियर  in America’s  तंदुरुस्ती   गति  .
Health spending  प्रति  capita , in  $  US PPP-adjusted  ,  with the US and Canada  compared  amongst  अन्य   पहला  world nations  .
Comparison  of   the  health care  प्रणालियों  in Canada and  the   संयुक्त  States are often made by  सरकारी  , public  स्वास्थ्य  and  पब्लिक   नीति   विश्लेषकों  .
The two countries had similar health  परवाह   प्रणालियों  before  कनाडा   reformed   इसके  system in the 1960s  और  1970s .
The  संयुक्त  States spends much  अधिक   धन   on  health  परवाह   than  Canada  ,  on  दोनो   a  per-capita  आधार   और  as  a   प्रतिशत  of  जीडीपी  .
In 2006 ,  per-capita  spending for  स्वास्थ्य   परवाह   in  Canada  थी   us  $  3,678  ; in  the   u.S.  ,  us  $ 6,714 .
The  u.S.  spent 15.3  %   of   जीडीपी   on   स्वास्थ्य  care  in   कि  year  ;  Canada spent 10.0 % .
In  2006   ,  70  %  of  स्वास्थ्य  care  बिता  in Canada was  financed   by   सरकारी   ,   बनाम  46  %   in   the  United States .
कुल  government  बिता  per  capita   in  the U.S.  on   स्वास्थ्य   परवाह   थी   23   %  higher than Canadian government spending  ,   और  U.S. government expenditure on health  परवाह  was just under  83  % of  कुल  Canadian  बिता  (  पब्लिक  and  निजी   )  though  ये   आंकडे   do  n't take into account population  मतभेद  .
अध्ययन  have  आइये  to different conclusions about the  परिणाम  of this disparity  in  spending .
A 2007 review of  सब  studies comparing health outcomes in Canada and the US in a Canadian  peer-reviewed   चिकित्सा   जर्नल  found that `` health outcomes  may  be  श्रेष्ठ  in patients cared for  in  Canada versus  the  United States ,  लकिन   मतभेद   हैं   नहीं  consistent .  ''
Life expectancy  is  longer in  कनाडा   ,   और  its infant mortality rate is lower than that of  the   u.S.  , but there  is   बहस  about the underlying  कल्याणकारी  of these differences  .
One commonly cited comparison , the 2000 World Health  संगठन   's  ratings of `` overall health service  प्रदर्शन   ''   ,  which used a ``  कम्पोजिट   माप  of  उपलब्धि   in  the level  of   स्वास्थ्य   ,  the distribution  of   स्वास्थ्य  , the  स्तर   of   responsiveness   और  fairness  of  financial  योगदान  '' , ranked  कनाडा  30th  और  the US 37th  among  191  सदस्य   राष्ट्र  .
This  पढ़ाई   रेटेड  the US ``  responsiveness   ''  , or quality of service for individuals  receiving   उपचार   ,  as  1st   ,  compared with 7th for Canada .
जबकि   the   औसत  life  प्रत्याशा  for  canadians  was 80.34 years compared  साथ   78.6  years for residents of  the   us  , simply comparing the life expectancy  of  two  समूह  with  अलग  racial  मेकअप   और   अलग   मोटापा   दरों  is  संभावित  not an  प्रभावी   रास्ता   of  determining which healthcare  प्रणाली   is   श्रेष्ठ   .
the  WHO  's   पढ़ाई  methods were criticized  by   कुछ  analyses .
हालांकि  there  is  a measure of consensus that life-expectancy  और  infant mortality mark  the   सबसे   विश्वसनीय  ways  to  compare nation-wide health  परवाह  , assuming the  जनसांख्यिकी  makeup is similar , a recent report by the Congressional  शोध  Service  carefully  summarizes some  हाल   आंकड़ा   और   टीप   the   ``   मुश्किल  research  मुद्दे   ''  facing  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  comparisons .
The sound  सोर्स  has  अभी  broken through the sound  गति  barrier  ,  and is traveling  at  1.4  टाइम्स  the  गति  of sound , ( Mach  1.4   )   .
Since the source is moving faster (  साथ  a speed  )  than  the  sound waves  it  creates  ,  it actually leads  the   advancing   तरंगाग्र   .
The sound source will pass  by  a  stationary  observer ( with a speed ) before the  निरीक्षक   दरअसल  hears the  ध्वनि  it creates  .
As a result  ,  an observer  in  front of  the  source will  detect
and an observer behind the source .
a   सोनिक  boom produced by an aircraft moving at M=2.92 ,  गणना   इससे   the  cone angle  of   20  degrees .
An observer hears the boom when  the   शॉक   वेव   ,  on the edges of the  कोन  , crosses his  or  her  स्थान   .
Mach  कोन  angle
a  sonic  बूम   is  the sound associated with the shock waves created by  an  object traveling through the  एयर  faster  than   the  speed of  ध्वनि  .
सोनिक  booms  generate  enormous  amounts   of  sound  उर्जा   ,   sounding   much   जैसे   an  explosion  .
The  क्रैक  of a supersonic bullet  गुजर   ओवरहेड  is an example of  a   सोनिक   बूम   in  miniature  .
the  Tonight  दिखाएँ  with Jay Leno  is   an   अमरीकी  late-night  बात  show  hosted   by   jay  Leno that  initially  aired  इससे   may  25  ,  1992 to May 29 , 2009 ,  और  resumed production on  कूच   1  ,  2010   .
The  चौथी  incarnation of the  tonight   दिखाएँ  franchise made its debut  on  May 25 , 1992  ,   तीन  days following  जॉनी  Carson  's  retirement  as   मेजबान  of  the   कार्यक्रम   .
the  program  originates  from NBC Studios in  burbank   ,  California , and is  ब्रॉडकास्ट  Monday through Friday at 11:35  pm  in  the  Eastern and Pacific time zones ( 10:35  pm  Central / Mountain time )  .
नापसंद   कार्सन  or his  पूर्ववर्ती  Jack Paar ,  लीनो  only once  utilized  a  अतिथि   मेजबान   ,   preferring  to host  the  series  by   खुद  .
On  अप्रैल   26   ,  1999 ,  the  show began broadcasting in  1080i  HDTV , becoming the  पहला   अमरीकी  nightly talk show to  be   शॉट   in  high  परिभाषा   .
the  show is shot in 16:9  पहलू   अनुपात  .
The series  ,   जिससे  followed  the   वही  basic  स्वरूप   as  that of his  पूर्ववर्तियों   (  an  खोलने  monologue followed by  कॉमेडी   दिनचर्या  , interviews and  प्रदर्शन   )   ,  ran until  may   29  , 2009  ,  after which Leno was succeeded by Conan O'Brien  .
एनबीसी   हस्ताक्षरित  Leno to a  नई  deal  लिये   a   nightly   बात  show  in  the  10:00  pm  et  timeslot .
The primetime series  ,   titled   the  Jay Leno Show ,  debuted  on September  14  , 2009  ,  following  a   समान  format  to  the  लीनो   अवतार   of   tonight   .
Neither O'Brien  's  version of  the   कार्यक्रम   ,   जिससे  premiered June 1  ,   2009  ,  nor  The Jay Leno Show generated  the  ratings that NBC had expected .
the  network  decided  to move a condensed 30-minute  संस्करण  of Leno  's  show to O'Brien  's  time slot , and O'Brien  's  Tonight  दिखाएँ   a  half-hour later .
इस   निर्णय   मिले  with opposition from  o'brien   ,  whose stint  on  The  tonight  Show ended January 22  ,   2010  , after  जिससे   he   began  his own talk  दिखाएँ   on  TBS .
the  Tonight  दिखाएँ   साथ  Jay  लीनो   तब  began its second and  वर्तमान   अवतार  , the sixth  of   the  franchise  ,  on March 1  ,   2010   .
RFID chip next to a grain  of  rice  .
This chip  contains   a   radio-frequency  electromagnetic field coil that modulates an external magnetic field to  ट्रांसफ़र  a  coded  identification number when queried by  a   रीडर  device .
This  छोटी   प्रकार   is  incorporated in consumer products , and implanted in pets  ,  for  पहचान   उद्देश्य  .
Radio-frequency  पहचान  (  rfid  ) is the wireless  non-contact  use  of   radio-frequency   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  fields to transfer data ,  लिये  the purposes  of   automatically  identifying and  ट्रैकिंग  tags  संलग्न  to objects .
the  tags contain electronically stored  सूचना  .
कुछ   टैग  are powered and read  at   छोटी   सीमाएँ   (  a few meters ) via  चुम्बकीय  fields  (  electromagnetic  प्रेरण  ) .
अन्य  use a  लोकल  power source such  as  a  बैटरी  , or else have  no   बैटरी  but  collect   उर्जा   इससे  the interrogating  em  field , and then act as  a   passive  transponder to  emit  microwaves or  uhf   रेडियो   लहरें   (  i.e. ,  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation  at  high  बारंबारता   )   .
बैटरी   संचालित   टैग  may operate at  सैंकड़ों  of meters  .
Unlike a  बार  code , the  टैग   करता  not necessarily need  to   be  within line of sight  of   the   रीडर  , and may be  अंतःस्थापित  in the  tracked   ऑब्जेक्ट   .
RFID tags  हैं  used in many  उद्योग   .
An RFID tag  संलग्न   to  an  ऑटोमोबाइल  during  उत्पादन  can  be  used  to   track  its progress through  the   सभा  line  .
दवाएँ  can  be   tracked  through  warehouses  .
Livestock and  पालतु  may have tags  injected  , allowing positive  पहचान  of  the  animal .
चूंकि  RFID tags  can  be attached  to   कपडे   ,   possessions   ,  or even implanted  भीतर   लोगों  , the  सम्भावना  of  पढना   personally-linked  information  बगैर  consent  रै   उठाया  privacy concerns .
id   ,  ego  और  super-ego are the three  भाग   of  the psychic apparatus defined  in  Sigmund Freud 's structural model  of  the  psyche  ;  वे  are  the   तीन   सैद्धांतिक   constructs   in  terms of whose activity and interaction mental life  is   वर्णित  .
according  to this  मॉडल  of the psyche ,  the  id is  the  set  of  uncoordinated instinctual trends  ;   the   super-ego  plays the critical and  moralizing   भूमिका   ;  and the  अहंकार  is the organized , realistic part  कि   mediates  between  the  desires of the id and the  super-ego  .
the   super-ego  can stop you  इससे  doing  निश्चित   बाते  that your id  may  want you  to   do   .
Even  हालांकि  the model  is  structural  और   makes   सन्दर्भ   to  an apparatus , the  id  ,  अहंकार   और  super-ego  हैं  functions of  the  mind rather than  भाग  of  the   दिमाग  and  do   नहीं  correspond one-to-one  साथ   वास्तविक   दैहिक   structures  of the kind  dealt   साथ   by  neuroscience .
The concepts themselves arose at a late stage in  the  development of  फ्रायड  's thought  :  the `` structural model  ''  ( which  succeeded  his  ``   आर्थिक  model ''  और  `` topographical model ''  )   थी  first discussed  in  his 1920 essay `` Beyond  the  Pleasure  principle   ``  and was formalized and elaborated  upon  three years  बाद   in   उसके   ``  The Ego and  the   id   ``  .
फ्रायड   's   प्रस्ताव   थी  influenced by the  ambiguity  of the term  ``  unconscious ``  और  its  अनेक   conflicting   उपयोग  .
एयर  Force ROTC emblem
The Air Force Reserve Officer Training  corps  ( AFROTC )  is   एक   of   the  three primary commissioning  स्त्रोत   लिये  officers in the United  राज्य  Air  फ़ोर्स   ,  the  अन्य  two being the United  राज्य   एयर  Force Academy  (  USAFA )  और   एयर   फ़ोर्स  Officer  प्रशिक्षण   स्कूल   (   ots  ) .
A  अधीनस्थ   कमांड  of  the  Air University  भीतर   the   एयर   शिक्षा   और  Training  कमांड   (  AETC  )   ,  AFROTC is aligned  अंतर्गत   the  Jeanne M.  holm   बीच   लिये  Officer  accessions  and Citizen  विकास  at Maxwell AFB  ,   अलबामा  .
The  holm   बीच  , formerly known  as   the  Air Force Officer  accession   और   प्रशिक्षण  Schools (  afoats  )  ,  retains  सीधा  responsibility for both AFROTC  और   ots  .
afrotc   is  the  largest  and oldest source of  commissioned  officers  लिये   the   u.S.  Air Force  .
AFROTC 's  stated  mission is  to  produce  विशेषता   नेताओ   लिये   the  U.S. Air  फ़ोर्स  .
AFROTC  इकाई   हैं   स्तिथ  on 144  कॉलेज  and university campuses  साथ   984   अतिरिक्त  institutions of higher learning participating in cross-town agreements that allow their  विद्यार्थी  to attend AFROTC  वर्ग   at  a nearby ``  मेजबान   ''   कॉलेज  or  विश्वविद्यालयों  .
according   to   afoats  HQ  ,  in  2006   ,  AFROTC commissioned 2,083 USAF Second Lieutenants  ,  with  afrotc  enrollment ranging  इससे  23,605 in  1985  to 10,231 in  1993   ,  and around 13,000 enrolled today  .
afrotc   इकाई  at  कॉलेजों   और  universities  हैं  called  ``  detachments , '' and  हैं  typically headed by an active  ड्यूटी   यूएसएएफ   अधिकारी  in  the  rank of  कर्नल   or   लेफ्टिनेंट  colonel  जो  functions as both the  detachment  Commander  लिये  USAF  उद्देश्य  and with  the  nominal title of Professor of  aerospace  Studies  (  PAS  )   भीतर   the  institution  's   अकादमिक  community .
Most  कॉलेजों   और  universities  होगा   designate  the AFROTC  detachment   as   the   विभाग  of Aerospace Studies .
the   pas   is  assisted by  तीन  to four  सहायक   professors  of  aerospace   अध्ययन  (  apas   )  , all  क्रियाशील   ड्यूटी   यूएसएएफ  officers in the ranks of major or captain .
Three USAF non-commissioned officers and one senior  non-commissioned  officer will typically  provide  military administrative  support   और   हैं   प्रायः  augmented by  एक  to two civilian staff  support   कर्मचारी   of   the  academic institution  .
भीतर   afrotc  detachments  ,  the students (  referred  to  as  `` cadets  ''  ) are  व्यवस्थित  into wings ,  समूह   ,   squadrons   ,   और  flights  ,  mirroring the USAF functional wing  ढांचा  .
the   afrotc  detachment 's cadet  wing  or  cadet   समूह   is  separated into  दो   विभाजन   :   the  General  सैन्य  Course (  जीएमसी  ) consisting  of   the  first two years of  प्रशिक्षण   ,  and  the   पेशेवर  Officer Course  (  POC  )  consisting of  the   पिछला  two  सालो  of training .
The AFROTC program  is   भी  divided  into  two training functions : the  अकादमिक   कक्षा   कार्यक्रम  ( Aerospace  अध्ययन  classes  )   और  Cadet  क्रियाएँ   (   i.e.  ,  नेतृत्व  Laboratory  ,  Physical  प्रशिक्षण   ,  and other training  )  .
Paper density (  भी  known as basis weight and grammage  )  is  a  term used in  the  pulp  और  paper industry and also  लिये  fabric industry to denote a  माप  of mass of  the  product  प्रति  unit of  क्षेत्रफल  for  a   प्रकार   of   कपड़ा  ,  पेपर  or paperboard .
The term `` density '' is not  प्रयुक्त  in its traditional sense of  द्रव्यमान  per unit volume .
`` Paper  घनत्व   ''  ,  बल्कि   ,  is a  माप   of  the  क्षेत्रफल  density .
पेपर  products  कि   let   छोटी  or no light pass through  (  e.g . poster  फलक  )  हैं  considered  घना   or   भारी   .
Paper products that  allow  some  लाइट   to  pass through ( e.g . tissue paper  )  are considered lightweight .
in   the   गूदा   और   पेपर  industry ,  it   is  common  to   नियत  a  वाणिज्यिक  paper machine to  उपज  paper to a  निशाना   पेपर  density .
Paper density can  भी   be   प्रयुक्त   to   फर्क  paper  इससे  paperboard as  the  latter  प्रायः  has a  grammage   वृहद  than  134  g/m2  .
Two ways of  expressing  paper density  हैं   commonly  used:
Expressed in grams per square meter  (   g/m2  )  ,  paper density is also  ज्ञात   as   grammage  .
This is  the   माप   प्रयुक्त  in most parts  of  the  संसार   .
expressed   in  terms  of   the   द्रव्यमान  (  expressed   as  weight ) per  क्रमांक  of  चादरें  ,  it   is   ज्ञात  as  आधार  weight  .
the  convention  प्रयुक्त  in the United  राज्य  and a  few  other countries  using   us   पेपर  sizes is  पाउंड  of  a   ream  of 500 ( or  in  some cases  1000   )  sheets  of  a given ( raw  ,  still uncut ) basis  आकार   .
जापानी  paper  is  expressed  as  the weight in kg of  1000   चादरें   .
Candace Nicole  पार्कर   (   born  April  19   ,  1986 )  is  an  अमरीकी   बास्केट  player for  the   wnba  's Los  एंजिल्स  Sparks and UMMC  ekaterinburg  of Russia .
She  is  the  younger  sister of  एनबीए  player  एंथोनी   पार्कर  .
वो   attended   the  University of Tennessee and  थी   drafted  by  the   स्पार्क्स  in 2008 .
She may be best known for being  the  first woman  to   डंक   in  an NCAA  टूर्नामेंट   खेल  and the first  स्त्री  to dunk twice in  a   कॉलेज   game—she  set both  माइलस्टोन   as  a  redshirt  freshman on  कूच  19 ,  2006   .
She also became only  the  second  खिलाड़ी   to  dunk  in  a WNBA game on June 22  ,  2008 .
A versatile player  ,   वो   is  mainly  a  forward , but  थी   सूचीबद्ध  on Tennessee 's roster as a forward  ,  center , and  गार्ड   .
She  थी  a starter on the Lady  vols   बास्केट  team , winners of  the  2007  और  2008 NCAA championships .
Parker won the  2009   निकलोडियन   बच्चे  '  चुनाव  award  as  the favorite female athlete  in   the   खेल  category .
And she  थी   a  guest star  on   फिगर   it  Out  .
A food guide pyramid is a pyramid shaped guide of  स्वस्थ  foods  विभाजित  into  भाग   to  show the recommended intake for each food group  .
the  first  खाना  pyramid was published  in  Sweden in  1974  .
The most widely  ज्ञात   खाना  pyramid was  introduced   by   the   संयुक्त  States Department  of  Agriculture in the year 1992  ,   थी  updated  in  2005 , and then replaced in  2011  .
Over 25 other  देशों   और  organisations have  भी  published food  पिरामिडों  .
Hans  ईसाई   andersen  ( ; often  referred  to in Scandinavia as  H.   C.   andersen   ;   अप्रैल   2  ,  1805august  4  ,  1875 )  थी   a  Danish  लेखक  and poet .
Although a prolific  लेखक   of  plays ,  travelogues   ,  novels , and  कविताएं   ,   andersen  is  बेहतरीन  remembered  लिये  his  परी  tales , a  साहित्यिक  genre he so  mastered  that he himself  रै  become  as  mythical  as   the  tales  he  wrote .
Andersen 's  लोकप्रियता   is   नहीं  limited  to  children ; his  stories—called   ,  or `` fantastic  किस्से  ''  —express   विषयवस्तु  that  transcend  age and  राष्ट्रीयता   .
दौरान  his lifetime  he  was  acclaimed  for having  प्रसन्न  children worldwide  और  was feted  by  royalty  .
Andersen 's  परी   किस्से  , which have been translated into  अधिक   than   125  languages , have become culturally  अंतःस्थापित   in  the West 's  सामूहिक   चेतना  ,  readily  accessible  to  children , but presenting  lessons  of  पुण्य  and resilience  in  the  फेस  of  adversity   लिये  mature readers as well .
वे  have inspired motion  तस्वीरें   ,   plays  , ballets , and  एनिमेटेड  films  .

Eye contact  occurs  when  ``  two  लोगों   dekh   at  each other 's eyes at  the  same time  .  ''
in   इंसान   beings   ,  eye  सम्पर्क   is   a  form  of   अशाब्दिक  communication and is thought to  have  a large  influence  on  सोशल   बर्ताव   .
Coined  in  the early to mid-1960s  ,  the term has  आइये   in  the  वेस्ट  to often define the act as  a  meaningful  और   महत्वपूर्ण  sign of  विश्वास  and social communication .
The customs and significance  of  eye  सम्पर्क  vary  widely  between cultures  ,  with  धार्मिक   और   सोशल   मतभेद  often altering its meaning greatly  .
The study of eye  सम्पर्क  is sometimes known  as  oculesics  .
Bed bugs  हैं   parasitic   कीट  of  the  cimicid family that feed exclusively on blood  .
The  पद  most  commonly  refers  to  members of the genus Cimex of  जिससे   cimex   lectularius   ,  the  आम  bed bug , is the best known  as  it prefers  to   फीड  on human  रक्त   हालांकि   अन्य   cimex  species  हैं  specialized to other  पशु   ,   e.g.  , bat  बग  ,  C.  pipistrelli  (   यूरोपीय   )   ,   C.  pilosellus (  पश्चिमी   us   )  ,  और  C. adjunctus  (   संपूर्ण  eastern  us  ) .
The name of the ``  bed   कीड़ा   ''   is  derived  इससे  the  पसन्दीदा   आवास  of Cimex lectularius : warm houses and especially nearby or  अंदर  of beds and bedding or other  नींद  areas .
Bed bugs  हैं   मुख्यतः  active  at  night  ,   लकिन  are  नहीं  exclusively  nocturnal   .
They  प्रायः  feed on their  होस्ट   बगैर   होने   noticed  .
a  number of adverse health  प्रभाव  may  परिणाम  from bed  कीड़ा  bites , including  स्किन   rashes  ,  मनोवैज्ञानिक   प्रभाव   ,  and allergic  लक्षण   .
Diagnosis involves  दोनो   ढूंढना  bed bugs  और  the occurrence of compatible symptoms .
bed  bugs  have  been known as  इंसान   परजीवी  for  हज़ारों   of  years .
At  a  point in the  जल्दी  1940s , they  यहूद   ज़्यादातर   eradicated   in  the developed world ,  लकिन   have  increased in prevalence  चूंकि  1995  .
Because infestation of  इंसान  habitats  रै   महरूम  on the  बढ़ाएँ  , bed bug bites and  सम्बन्धित   शर्तें  have  महरूम   on   the  rise as well .
the  Book of  यशायाह  ( ) is the  पहला   of  the Latter  नबियों   in  the  यहूदी   बाइबल   ,   preceding  Ezekiel  ,  Jeremiah and the  किताब  of  the  Twelve .
(  the  order of  the   subsequent   किताबे  differs somewhat in the  ईसाई   बूढ़ा   वसीयत  )  .
The  पहला  39 chapters prophesy  यातना  for a sinful Judah and for  सब  the  राष्ट्र   of   the  world  कि   oppose   परमेश्वर  , while the  पिछला  27  prophesy   the  restoration  of   the  nation of Israel  और   a   नई  creation in God  's  glorious future kingdom ;  इस   खण्ड   शामिल  the  गीतों   of  the Suffering Servant  ,  four separate passages referring to the nation of Israel  ,   interpreted   by   ईसाइयों   as  prefiguring  the   coming  of Jesus  मसीह  .
Tradition ascribes authorship  of   the  book to  यशायाह   बेटे  of Amoz  ,  but  अभी  scholars  widely  agree  कि  the book is  the  work of three different authors - few scholars deny this  दृश्य   ,  and those  कि  do  ,   do  so for theological reasons .
The first , termed Proto-Isaiah  (  chapters  1–39  ) ,  contains  the words of  the  8th-century BCE prophet with 7th-century  bce  expansions  ;  the  दूसरी  , Deutero-Isaiah  (  chapters  40–55  )  ,   is  the work  of   a  6th-century  bce  author writing near the  समाप्त  of the Babylonian captivity ;  और  the  तीसरा  ,  the  poetic  trito-isaiah   (  chapters 56–66 ) ,  थी  composed in  जेरूसलम  shortly after  the   वापसी   इससे   निर्वासन  , probably  by  multiple authors .
Oregon  राज्य  University  (   osu   )  is  a   coeducational   ,  public research university  स्तिथ  in  corvallis  , Oregon , United  राज्य   .
the  university offers  undergraduate   ,   ग्रैजुएट  and doctoral degrees and a multitude of  शोध   अवसर  .
There  हैं   अधिक   than  200  अकादमिक   उपाधि   कार्यक्रम  offered through  the   विश्वविद्यालयों  .
OSU  's  programs in microbiology ,  नाभिकीय   अभियान्त्रिकी  , ecology ,  वानिकी   ,  public health ,  biochemistry  , zoology  ,  oceanography , food science  और   फार्मेसी   हैं  recognized  nationally   as   शीर्ष   टियर  programs .
The  osu  's  उदार  arts  कार्यक्रम  have  भी  grown  significantly  and the department is considered  a  ``  cornerstone  '' of  the  institution  .
अधिक  than 200,000 people  have  attended OSU  चूंकि  its  founding   .
the  Carnegie Foundation  classifies  Oregon State  विश्वविद्यालयों  as  भाग   of   इसके  top tier of research  संस्थानों   .
As of 2008  ,   osu   is   एक  of only  seventy-three  land-grant universities .
The  स्कूल  is  भी  recognized as a  sea-grant   ,  space-grant and  sun-grant   संस्था  ,  बनाना  it one of only  दो  US institutions  to   retain   सब  four designations and  the  only  पब्लिक   विश्वविद्यालयों   to  do so ( Cornell  is  the  तभी  other  साथ  similar  designations  )  .
as  one of the two flagship universities  of  the Oregon  विश्वविद्यालयों  System , OSU receives more  funding   लिये  research  ,  annually ,  than   सब   अन्य  public higher  शिक्षा   संस्थानों  in  ऑरेगॉन  combined  .
Female  स्खलन  is the expulsion of fluid by  इंसान  females from the paraurethral ducts  through  and around the female urethra during  or   पहले   an   orgasm  .
It is  भी   ज्ञात  colloquially as  gushing  or  squirting  ,  हालांकि  these are considered to be different phenomena  in  some  शोध  publications .
The exact  सोर्स   और  nature of the fluid  continue   to   be  a  टॉपिक  of debate among medical professionals ,  जिससे   is  also  सम्बन्धित  to doubts over the existence  of  the G-Spot .
the  Kanab ambersnail  ,   वैज्ञानिक  name Oxyloma  haydeni  kanabensis  or  Oxyloma  kanabense  ,  is  a critically endangered subspecies  or  species  of  small ,  air-breathing  land snail , a terrestrial  pulmonate  gastropod  mollusc  in  the   परिवार   succineidae  , the amber snails  .
The  आम  name of the amber snails is based on  the  shell  ,  which is  पारदर्शी  and when empty usually  resembles  amber in color  .
इस  species  is   endemic   to  the  संयुक्त  States ,  specifically  the state of Arizona and Utah  ,   जहाँ  it  थी  first collected  in   the  early  20th  century .
It has been listed  as   endangered   on   the  United  राज्य  Fish  और  Wildlife Service list of endangered  प्रजाति  since 8 August 1991  .
इस   घोंघा  lives in  वेटलैंड्स   ,  springs  ,   और  seeps  ,   और  only two of  इसके   प्राकृतिक  habitats are  ज्ञात   to  exist :  तीन  Lakes  ,   a   मर्ग   निकट   kanab  ,  यूटा   ,  and  vasey  's Paradise , a  वसन्त  along the Colorado River within Grand Canyon National Park .
In  इसके   प्राकृतिक   आवास   it  is  बल्कि   polyphagous   ,  feeding mainly  on   जीवाणु   ,  plants and  fungi  ,  और   reproduces  during the summer  .
Now considered a  critically   endangered  species on the  आईयूसीएन  Red List  of  Threatened Species due to a  श्रेणी  of  कारकों  (  सहित   influence  ) , the Kanab  ambersnail   रै  been  reintroduced  to  तीन  springs  ऊपर  the  ऐतिहासिक   ऊँची  water level along the Colorado  नदी   .
The Spanish  भाषा   is  the second  सबसे   प्रयुक्त   भाषा  in  the   संयुक्त  States  .
वहीँ  are  अधिक   स्पेनी  speakers in  the  United States than there are  अध्यक्षों   of   चाइनीज  ,  फ्रेंच   ,  German ,  इतालवी  , Hawaiian  ,  and  the  Native American  भाषाएं   संयुक्त  .
according  to the 2010  अमरीकी  Community Survey  conducted  by the  u.S.  Census  ब्यूरो   ,  Spanish is the primary  भाषा   बोला  at home by almost  37  million people  aged  five or older , a  फिगर  more than  दोगुना   कि   of   1990   .
There  हैं  45 million  hispanophones  who speak Spanish as  a   पहला  or second language , as  खूब   as   छह  million  स्पेनी  language students ,  composing  the  largest   नेशनल  Spanish-speaking community outside of Mexico and making  स्पेनी   the   रोमांस   भाषा  and the  indo-european   भाषा  with  largest  number  of  native  अध्यक्षों  in the  संसार  .
roughly  half of all  u.S.  Spanish speakers also  बोलो   अंग्रेज़ी   ``  very well  ,  '' based on  the   self-assessment  Census  सवाल  respondents .
The language came  to   the   देश  since  the  16th and  17th  centuries  साथ  the  आगमन   of  Spanish  colonists  in  क्षेत्रों  that would  बाद  become  the   राज्य   of  Florida , Texas  ,  Colorado , New Mexico , Arizona  ,   नेवाडा   ,  Utah  ,   और  California and of  the  Spanish  explorers   -   जो   छान   क्षेत्रों  of  42  states- .
भी  west of Louisiana  territory   थी  Spanish  between   1763  - 1800  (  year of the French recovery of territory )  ,  after  the   फ्रेंच   और  Indian  युद्ध   .
After of  the   incorporation  of these states  to   the  U.S.  in  first  हाफ   of  19th  सदी  , the  स्पेनी  language was later  reinforced  by the acquisition  of   प्यूर्टो  Rico  in   1898   और   by   बाद  waves of  the  Hispanic emigration ,  मूलरूप  from Hispanic America  ,  to the  संयुक्त  States  शुरूआत   in  the  दूसरी  half  of   19th  century until today  .
is a Latin word that  अर्थात्  `` thus ''  or   ,  in writing , `` it was thus in  the   सोर्स  material ''  .
Sic may also refer to:

the  Tokyo  mew   mew  manga and anime  श्रेणी  features a  डाल  of characters designed  by  Mia  ikumi  .
The series  takes   प्लेस   in   टोकियो  , Japan  ,  where five adolescent  लड़कियों   ,  called Mew Mews  ,  are infused with the  डीएनए  of  endangered  species to combat aliens attempting to take over  the  Earth .
The  manga   श्रेणी  is followed  by  a  छोटी  sequel  श्रेणी  ,  टोकियो  Mew  mew   a  la Mode ,  जिससे   introduces  a  नई  Mew Mew and a new threat .
The Mew  mews   हैं   led  by  the   प्रमुख   अक्षर  , Ichigo  momomiya   ,  whose first  कार्य  is  to   एकत्रित   the  other four Mew Mews :  मिंट  Aizawa ,  सलाद   midorikawa  , Pudding  फोंग  ,  और  Zakuro  fujiwara   .
As  the   श्रेणी   progresses  , Ichigo  goes   इससे  having a crush  on  Masaya  aoyama   to   बनने  his  गर्लफ्रेंड  while  trying  to hide her secret double  जीवन   इससे  him  .
the  series antagonists  शामिल  three aliens  ,   kish   ,  Pie , and Tart , and their leader  ,   गहन  Blue  .
Originally  इससे   धरती  , the aliens were  मजबूर  to leave long ago  due  to deadly environmental changes .
वे  have  लौटे  to kill  the  humans ,  जो   वे  feel are destroying  उनके  planet ,  और  reclaim the  ग्रह  .
in  a  la   विधि   ,  middle school  छात्र  Berry Shirayuki is introduced  as  the sixth Mew  mew   और   ,  in the  अनुपस्थिति  of Ichigo  ,  the  अस्थाई   नेता  of the Mew Mews .
A  la   विधि  also introduces new set  of  antagonists ,  the   संत  Rose Crusaders ,  a  group  of  human teenagers with various psychic  abilities   साथ   a   ख्वाहिश  to  बनाएँ   उनके  own utopia .
Led by Duke , they make  अनेक   कोशिशें  to kill Berry , eventually  turning  the local  populace   विरूद्ध  the Mew  mews  .
Ikumi 's initial vision  लिये  Tokyo Mew  mew  was  a   स्टोरी   पुकारा  Tokyo  ब्लैक  Cat  लड़की  that featured a  cat-girl  battling alien invaders  .
बाद  the  स्टोरी  was transitioned to  a  more upbeat story  of  five  मादा   superheroes  , the character designs were redone to have a lighter  ,   अधिक  colorful  महसूस   .
the  main series characters were praised for  होने  a perfect fit  लिये  the overall  स्टोरी  , as well as  लिये   उनके   cute  appearances .
The characters introduced in a la  विधि  were  भी  praised  लिये   उनके  visual  दिखावे  , but criticized  as  being repeats  of  the original  श्रेणी  .
the  character Duke was also criticized for  having  a design reminiscent of the white supremacy group ,  the  Ku Klux  क्लान  .

Sedimentary  रॉक्स  are  प्रकार  of rock that are formed by  the  deposition of  सामग्री  at  the  Earth 's surface and within bodies  of   जल  .
Sedimentation  is   the  collective  नाम  for  प्रक्रियाओं  that cause mineral  and/or  organic particles  (  detritus ) to  settle   और   accumulate  or minerals to  precipitate  from a  समाधान   .
Particles that  रूप  a sedimentary  चट्टान  by accumulating are called sediment .
Before being deposited , sediment  थी   formed   by  weathering  और  erosion in  a  source area  ,   और   तब  transported  to  the place  of  deposition  by  water , wind  ,  ice  ,   द्रव्यमान  movement or glaciers which are  पुकारा  agents of denudation .
The sedimentary rock cover of the  महाद्वीपों  of  the  Earth 's crust is extensive  ,  but the  कुल  contribution  of  sedimentary rocks  is   अनुमानित  to be  तभी   8  % of the total  आवाज़  of  the  crust .
Sedimentary rocks are only a thin  veneer   over  a  क्रस्ट   consisting   मुख्यतः   of   igneous  and metamorphic rocks  .
Sedimentary rocks are  deposited   in  layers as  strata   ,  forming a structure called bedding .
the  study of sedimentary  रॉक्स   और  rock strata provides  सूचना  about  the  subsurface  कि  is useful for  सिविल   अभियान्त्रिकी   ,   लिये   उदाहरण   in   the  construction  of  roads ,  घरों   ,  tunnels  ,   नहरों   or  other constructions  .
sedimentary  rocks are  भी  important sources of  प्राकृतिक   संसाधन  like coal ,  चट्टान   fuels  , drinking water or ores .
The study  of  the sequence  of  sedimentary rock  strata  is the main  सोर्स   लिये  scientific knowledge about the Earth 's history , including  palaeogeography   ,  paleoclimatology  और  the history  of   जीवन   .
the  scientific discipline  कि   अध्ययन   the  properties  और   उत्पत्ति   of   sedimentary  rocks is  पुकारा   sedimentology   .
sedimentology  is both part of geology and physical geography  और   overlaps  partly  साथ  other  disciplines   in   the  Earth  sciences  , such as pedology ,  geomorphology  , geochemistry  or  structural  भूविज्ञान   .
