Humans  हैं   born  with over  270   हड्डियों  , some of which fuse  साथ   into  a longitudinal axis , the axial  कंकाल  ,  to  which the  appendicular  skeleton is  संलग्न  .
संत   पैट्रिक   (   ;  ;  आधुनिक  ; ; c.  387   –  17  कूच   c.  460  or   c.  492 ) was a Romano-British  ईसाई   मिशनरी   और  bishop in Ireland .
Known as the  ``   apostle  of  आयरलैंड  ''  ,  he  is   the  primary patron saint  of  the  द्वीप  along  साथ   संतो   brigid   और   columba   .
Two authentic letters from  उसे   जीवित  ,  इससे   जिससे  come the  तभी   generally   स्वीकृत  details of his  जीवन  .
जब   he   थी  about 16  ,   he   थी  captured from  उसके  home and  लिया   as  a  स्लेव  to Ireland  ,  where he  जिया  for  छह  years before  escaping  and returning to  उसके  family .
बाद   बनने   a  cleric  ,   he   लौटे  to northern and western  आयरलैंड  as an ordained  बिशप  , but little is  ज्ञात   परिचय  the  स्थान   जहाँ  he worked  .
By  the  seventh century  ,  he had  already   आइये  to be revered as  the   संरक्षक  saint of Ireland .
Most  उपलब्धियाँ  details of  उसके  life are from  subsequent  hagiographies ,  और  these  हैं  now not accepted without  विस्तृत  criticism .
The Annals of Ulster  राज्य   कि  he  arrived   in  Ireland  in  432  ,   ministered   in  Ulster around 443  ,   और  died in 457  or  461  .
The  टेक्स्ट  ,  however   ,  distinguishes  between   ``  Old Patrick  ''  (  विचार  to  औसत  Palladius  )  and `` Patrick ,  archapostle  of the Scots ,  ''   जो  died in 492 .
The actual  तिथियाँ  of Patrick 's  जीवन  can not  be  fixed  साथ  certainty but ,  on  a  फैली  interpretation  ,  he  थी  active as a  मिशनरी  in  आयरलैंड   दौरान  the second half of the 5th  सदी  .
He is  generally   credited   साथ  being the first bishop of Armagh  ,  Primate of  सब   आयरलैंड  .
संत  Patrick 's Day  is  observed  on  March  17   ,  the  तिथि   of  his death  .
It is celebrated both inside  और   बाहर  Ireland , as  दोनो  a religious and  ,  especially outside Ireland , secular  अवकाश  .
In the  dioceses   of   आयरलैंड   ,  it is both a solemnity and  a  holy day  of  obligation  ;   बाहर   आयरलैंड  , it  can   be  a  जश्न  of  आयरलैंड   itself  .
Line  खण्ड  in the  सुनहरी   अनुपात
a   सुनहरी  rectangle  साथ  longer side  a   और   shorter  side b , when placed adjacent  to   a   वर्गाकार   साथ  sides of length  a  , will  उपज  a  समान  golden  आयताकार  with longer side  a   +   b  and  shorter   पक्ष   a  .
This  illustrates  the  संबंध   .
in   गणित   और  the  कला   ,   दो  quantities are  in  the golden  अनुपात   if   the   अनुपात   of  the sum  of  the quantities  to   the   larger  quantity  is  equal  to   the   अनुपात  of the larger quantity to the  छोटी  one .
The  फिगर  on the right  illustrates   the  geometric relationship .
Expressed algebraically:
where the Greek  अक्षर  phi  (  )  represents   the   सुनहरी  ratio .
Its value is:
The golden  अनुपात  is  भी  called the golden section  (  Latin : sectio  ओरिया   )   or  golden mean .
अन्य  names include extreme and  औसत  ratio , medial section , divine  proportion  , divine  खण्ड  ( Latin  :  sectio  divina   )  , golden  proportion  , golden cut  ,  and golden number .
Many 20th century artists  और  architects have  proportioned  their works  to   सन्निकट   the  golden  ratio—especially   in  the  रूप  of the  सुनहरी  rectangle  ,  in which  the  ratio  of  the  longer  side to the shorter is the golden ratio—believing  इस   proportion  to be aesthetically  pleasing  (  देखिए   अनुप्रयोग   और  observations below ) .
Mathematicians since Euclid have  पढ़ाई   the  properties of the golden ratio , including its appearance  in   the   आयाम  of  a   नियमित  pentagon  और  in  a   सुनहरी   आयताकार   ,  which can be cut  into   a  square and a smaller  आयताकार  with  the   वही  aspect  अनुपात  .
the   सुनहरी  ratio has  भी   महरूम   प्रयुक्त   to   analyze  the  proportions  of natural objects as  खूब  as man-made  प्रणालियों  such  as   वित्तीय  markets ,  in   कुछ  cases  आधारित  on  संदिग्ध  fits  to  data  .
उत्तर  Myrtle  बीच  is  a  coastal resort  नगर  in  horry  County  ,  South  कैरोलिना  ,  संयुक्त  States .
It  थी  created in  1968  from  चार   मौजूदा   municipalities  north  of   myrtle  Beach , and serves  as   एक  of  the   प्राथमिक  tourist towns along the Grand Strand  .
The population  थी  13,752 at the 2010 census .
World War  i  (  wwi  ) was a  वैश्विक  war centred  in  Europe  कि  began on  28   जुलाई  1914 and lasted  जबतक  11  नवम्बर   1918  .
It  थी  predominantly called the  संसार   युद्ध  or the  ग्रेट  War  इससे  its  occurrence  until the start  of  World  युद्ध  II  in   1939  ,  और  the  पहला   संसार  War or World War  i  thereafter  .
it   शामिल  all the world 's great powers , which  यहूद  assembled in two  opposing  alliances :  the   allies   (   आधारित  on  the   ट्रिपल  Entente of  the  United Kingdom  ,   फ़्रांस   और  Russia ) and the Central  शक्तियां  ( originally  the  Triple Alliance of Germany ,  austria-hungary  and  इटली   ;  but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement ,  इटली   किया  not  डालें  into the war )  .
ये  alliances  यहूद   दोनो  reorganised and  विस्तारित  as  अधिक  nations entered  the   युद्ध   :  Italy ,  जापानी   और  the United  राज्य   joined  the Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and  बुल्गारिया   the   सेंट्रल   शक्तियां  .
ultimately  , more than  70  million  सैन्य  personnel , including  60  million  europeans   ,  were mobilised in one of  the   largest   युद्धों   in   इतिहास  .
More  than  9  लाख   combatants  were killed  ,   largely  because of technological advancements that led  to   विशाल  increases in  the   lethality  of weapons  बगैर  corresponding  सुधार  in  सुरक्षा  or mobility  .
It was  the   fifth-   deadliest   विरोध  in  संसार  history ,  subsequently   paving   the  way  लिये  various  राजनैतिक   परिवर्तन  ,  ऐसे   as  revolutions in  अनेक   of  the nations involved .
One  of  the long-term causes  of  the war was the  पुनरुत्थान   of   साम्राज्यवाद  in  the  foreign policies  of   the  great powers of Europe .
अधिक  immediately  ,  the  हत्या  of  archduke  Franz Ferdinand  of  Austria , the heir  to   the   सिंहासन  of Austria-Hungary  ,  on  28   जून   1914  by Yugoslav  राष्ट्रवादी  Gavrilo Princip  in  Sarajevo triggered a  राजनयिक  crisis  जब  Austria-Hungary  subsequently   वितरित   an   ultimatum  to the Kingdom  of   सर्बिया  .
Several  alliances   formed  over  the   पिछला  decades were invoked .
Within weeks  ,   the  major powers  यहूद  at war and  ,   via  their colonies  ,  the conflict  जल्द   स्प्रेड  around the world  .
on  28 July  ,  the  austro-hungarians  fired the first  गोलियाँ  of  the  war as  तैयारी   लिये   the   आक्रमण   of   सर्बिया  .
While the  russians  mobilised , the  germans  invaded neutral  बेल्जियम   और   ध्वज   on  the way  to   फ़्रांस  , providing a casus belli for  ब्रिटेन   's  declaration of war against Germany .
After the German march  on  Paris was brought to  a  halt—the so-called  चमत्कार  of  the  Marne —the  पश्चिमी  Front settled  into   a  static  बैटल  of attrition with a  गर्त  line that  बदला  little until 1917 .
On  the  Eastern Front , the  रूसी  army  थी   कामयाब  against the  austro-hungarians   ,  but was stopped in  इसके   आक्रमण   of  East Prussia  by   the  Germans .
in  November  the  Ottoman  साम्राज्य  joined the  युद्ध  ,  खोलने  up  fronts   in   the   काकेशस   ,  Mesopotamia  और  the  sinai  .
इटली  and Bulgaria went to war in  1915   और   रोमानिया  in 1916  .
In Russia ,  the  tsar 's government  collapsed  in March 1917  और   a   subsequent  revolution in November brought the Russians  to   शर्तें  with  the   सेंट्रल  Powers .
बाद  a 1918 German offensive  साथ  the western  सामने   ,  the  allies   drove   वापस  the  germans   in   a  series  of   कामयाब  offensives and American  शक्तियां  began  प्रवेश   the  trenches .
जर्मनी   ,  which had  इसके  own  ट्रबल   साथ  revolutionaries , agreed  to  an  armistice  on 11  नवम्बर   1918   .
The  युद्ध   ended   in  victory for  the   allies  .
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous  as  on the  बैटल  fronts  ,   as  the participants tried to mobilize their manpower  और   आर्थिक   संसाधन   to   लड़ो   a   कुल  war  .
by   the  end of the  युद्ध   ,   चार  major  इम्पीरियल   powers—the   जर्मनी  ,  रूसी  ,  austro-hungarian  and  उस्मानी   empires—ceased  to  मौजूद   .
The  successor  states of the  पूर्व  two lost  a   ग्रेट  amount  of  territory , while the latter two were dismantled  entirely   .
the  map  of  central Europe was redrawn into  अनेक  smaller states  .
The  लीग  of Nations was formed in the  आशा  of preventing another  ऐसे  conflict  .
the  European  राष्ट्रवाद  spawned by the war  और   the   ब्रेकअप  of empires , the  परखना  of Germany  's   शिकस्त  and problems  साथ   the   सन्धि  of  versailles   हैं  agreed  to   be   कारकों   contributing  to World  युद्ध   ii  .
camden  is  a   नगर   in   camden   काउंटी  , New Jersey , United States .
it  is the  काउंटी   सीट  ,  स्तिथ  across the Delaware River from Philadelphia  .
as   of  the 2010 United  राज्य  Census  the  city had a  कुल  population of  77,344   ,   representing  a decline of 2,560 ( 3.2 % )  इससे  the 79,904  निवासियों  enumerated  दौरान   the  2000 Census , which  था  in turn  अस्वीकृत   by  7,588  (  8.7  %   )   इससे  the 87,492  गिने  in the  1990   जनसांख्यिकी  .
camden  ranked as the  12th-most   populous  municipality in  the   राज्य   in   2010   बाद  having  महरूम   क्रमित   10th   in  2000 .
camden   थी  originally  incorporated  as  a  city  on  February 13  ,   1828  ,  इससे  portions  of  the now-defunct  न्यूटन  Township  ,  while  the  area  थी  still part of Gloucester County .
On  कूच  13 ,  1844  ,  camden   became   भाग  of the  newly   formed  Camden  काउंटी   .
Although once a  thriving  center  लिये  manufacturing  और   उद्योग  , Camden is  शायद   बेहतरीन  known  लिये  its  struggles  with urban  dysfunction  .
तीन   camden  mayors have been  jailed   लिये   भ्रष्टाचार  , the  सबसे   हाल   होने  Milton Milan in  2000  .
Since 2005  the  school system  और  police department have  महरूम   संचालित  by the state of New  जर्सी  ; the  कब्ज़ा   समाप्त   in  2012 .
in  2008  ,  Camden  था  the  उच्चतम   अपराधों  rate  in   the  U.S. with  2,333  violent crimes per  100,000  people while the  नेशनल  average was 455  प्रति  100,000 .
camden  public  स्कूलों   खर्च  $ 23,770  प्रति  student ( $  19,118  on a budgetary per-pupil  आधार  ) in the  2009–10   स्कूल  year and two-thirds  of  the students graduate  .
Two  आउट  of every five residents  हैं  below the  नेशनल   गरीबी  line .
amitriptyline   (   tryptomer  , Elavil , Tryptizol  ,   laroxyl   ,   saroten  ,  sarotex  , Lentizol ,  endep   )  is a tricyclic  antidepressant  (  tca   )   .
It  is  the most widely used TCA  और   रै  at  तनिक  equal  efficacy   विरूद्ध  depression  as   the  newer class of SSRIs according to a study  इससे  early 2001  .
As well as  reducing   depressive  symptoms ,  ये  types  of  tricyclics also ease migraines  ,  tension headaches , anxiety attacks and some  schizophrenic  symptoms  .
It  is   भी  known  to   reduce  aggression and violent  बर्ताव  .
A computer is a  सामान्य  purpose device  कि  can  be  programmed  to   carry  out a  परिमित  set of arithmetic  or  logical  परिचालन  .
Since  a  sequence of operations can  be   readily  changed  ,  the computer can  solve  more  than   एक  kind of  प्रॉब्लम  .
Conventionally ,  a  computer consists of  at   तनिक  one processing  तत्व   ,   typically  a central processing  ईकाई  (  cpu  ) and some  रूप  of memory  .
the  processing element carries  आउट   गणित  and  लॉजिक   परिचालन  ,  और   a   sequencing   और  control  ईकाई  that can change  the  order of  परिचालन  based  on   भंडारित  information .
परिधीय   डिवाइस  allow information to be  पुनर्प्राप्त  from an  बाह्य  source  ,  and the result of operations saved and  पुनर्प्राप्त  .
The first electronic digital computers  यहूद   विकसित  between  1940   और  1945 in  the  United Kingdom  और  United States .
originally  they  यहूद  the  आकार   of   a  large room  ,   consuming  as much  शक्ति  as  अनेक  hundred modern personal computers ( PCs )  .
In this  era  mechanical  एनालॉग   कंप्यूटर  were  प्रयुक्त   लिये  military applications .
Modern  कंप्यूटर  based  on  integrated  circuits   हैं   लाखो  to  अरबों   of   टाइम्स   अधिक   सक्षम   than  the early machines  ,  and occupy a fraction of the  स्पेस  .
Simple computers are small enough to fit into mobile  डिवाइस   ,  and  मोबाईल   कंप्यूटर  can be powered by small batteries  .
Personal  कंप्यूटर  in their various  फ़ॉर्म   हैं  icons of the Information Age and are what most people think of  as  “computers.”
however   ,  the embedded  कंप्यूटर   मिला   in  many  डिवाइस  from  mp3   खिलाड़ी  to fighter aircraft and from toys to industrial  robots   हैं  the most numerous .
``  Barefoot  और  pregnant '' is a phrase  सबसे  commonly associated with the controversial idea that women should not  कार्य  outside the  घर  and  चाहिए  have many children  दौरान  their  reproductive  years .
it  has several  अन्य  meanings as  खूब  .
It  is   a  figure of  वाक   .
the  phrase  ``  barefoot and pregnant ''  थी  probably  पहला   प्रयुक्त  sometime before 1950  .
an  article from 1949 states ,  ``   by  early 1949 ,  twa   was—in   the  words of  इसके  new  अध्यक्ष   ,  Ralph  S.   damon—both   'barefoot  and pregnant  .   '  ''
Its usage  may  date  as  early as  the   1910s  .
An article published  in  1958 states  the  phrase was first  प्रयुक्त   by  a  ``   dr.   hertzler   ''   40   सालो  earlier  .
``  Some forty  सालो   पहले   ,  Dr. Hertzler advanced a hypothesis  जिससे  young women of  आज   seem  bent  on  proving correct. '
The only way to keep a woman  प्रसन्न   ,  ' he  कहा   ,  'is  to   रखना  her  barefoot   और  pregnant  .  ' ''
Oakhurst  is   a   census-designated  place and  unincorporated   जातियाँ   भीतर  Ocean  township  , in Monmouth County , New  जर्सी   ,  United  राज्य  .
as  of the 2010  संयुक्त   राज्य  Census  ,  the CDP  's   जनसांख्यिकी   थी   3,995   .
विश्वविद्यालयों  of  फीनिक्स  Stadium  ,  opened August  1  , 2006 , is  a   बहुउद्देशीय  football stadium located in Glendale  ,   एरिज़ोना   .
it  is the home of  the  Arizona Cardinals of  the  National Football League ( NFL  )  and the annual Fiesta Bowl .
The stadium  is  located  अगला   द्वार  to  the  Jobing.com Arena  और  it features the first  fully   retractable  natural grass  playing  surface built  in   the  United States  on   शीर्ष  of an AirField Systems drainage system  .
An opening  on  one side  of  the  स्टेडियम   allows   the   playing  field to move to the  exterior   of  the building ,  allowing  the entire  प्राकृतिक  turf  playing   सतह  to be  उजागर   to  daylight .
The  स्टेडियम  has hosted  सुपर   कटोरी   xlii   ,   और  the 2011  bcs   नेशनल   चैंपियनशिप   खेल  , a  खेल   कि   it   होस्ट   प्रत्येक   चार  years  ,  which  नियत  the  स्थान  's entertainment  उपस्थिति   रिकार्ड   of   78,603   on  January 11  ,   2011  .
it   होगा  again  मेजबान   सुपर   कटोरी  XLIX  in  2015 .
The University of Phoenix acquired the naming  अधिकारों   in   सितंबर  2006 ,  shortly  after  the  stadium  था  opened under  the  name Cardinals Stadium .
The  ``  University  of   फीनिक्स   ``  name  is  applied as a corporate  प्रायोजक   ,   और   नहीं   as   the  home stadium of the  विश्वविद्यालयों  ( which has no intercollegiate athletics  कार्यक्रम  ) .
the  stadium  रै   भी   hosted  the WWE event WrestleMania  xxvi   साथ   72,219   प्रशंसक  in attendance .
The  इवेंट  was held in the  स्टेडियम  on March  28th  2010 .
Joshua Lawrence  चेम्बरलेन   (  September 8 , 1828 – February  24   ,  1914  )   ,  born as  लॉरेंस  Joshua Chamberlain , was  an   अमरीकी  college  प्राध्यापक   इससे   the  State of  maine   ,  who  volunteered   दौरान  the  अमरीकी  Civil  युद्ध   to   जुड़ें   the   संघ  Army .
Although having no  पहले  education  in  military  रणनीति  ,  he  became a highly respected  और  decorated  संघ   अधिकारी  ,  reaching   the   रैंक  of brigadier  सामान्य  (  और  brevet major  सामान्य  ) .
लिये   उसके  gallantry at  gettysburg  ,  he  was  awarded   the  Medal of  सम्मान  .
he  was  दिए  the honor  of   commanding  the  संघ   सैनिकों  at  the   आत्मसमर्पण  ceremony for  the   infantry  of  रॉबर्ट  E.  ली   's   फौज   at   appomattox   ,  Virginia .
After the  युद्ध  ,  he   डाला   राजनीती   as  a Republican and  परोसा  four one-year terms  of   दफ्तर  as  the  32nd  राज्यपाल   of  Maine  .
He  परोसा   on   the   संकाय  , and as president  ,   of  his  अल्मा  mater ,  bowdoin   कॉलेज  .
An inning , or innings , is a  fixed-length  segment  of  a  खेल  in any of a  किस्में  of sports –  सबसे   notably  cricket and baseball during  जिससे  one team attempts  to   स्कोर   जबकि  the other  टोली  attempts to prevent  the  first  इससे  scoring  .
In cricket  ,  the  पद   पारी   is   दोनो   एकवचन   और  plural and is  सदा   spelled   और  pronounced  साथ   the  terminal ``  s  '' .
In baseball and softball  ,   the  singular form  is  inning and only the plural  takes  an ``  s  ''  .
In many other  खेल   ,   the  length  of  the game  is   लिखवाई   by   a  clock  और  teams swap  अप्रिय  and  रक्षात्मक   भूमिकाएँ  dynamically  by   लेने   कब्ज़ा  of  a  ball or  समान   मद  .
in  baseball and cricket ,  however  ,  एक   टोली  ,  कहा  to  be   ``   बल्लेबाजी  '' ,  कोशिशें  to score  ``  runs '' —see  चलाएं  (  बेसबॉल  )  और  run (  क्रिकेट   )  —while  the  other team  ,   कहा  to be `` fielding  ''  , attempts to prevent the  स्कोरिंग  of  रनों  and  मिलेंगी   सदस्यों   of   the  batting  टोली   आउट   .
the  teams switch places after  the   क्षेत्ररक्षण   टोली  has  succeeded  in getting a fixed number  of   खिलाड़ी  out ,  बनाना   a  clock unnecessary .
In  क्रिकेट   ,   the  term innings is  भी   प्रयुक्त  to refer to the play  of   एक  particular  खिलाड़ी  ( Smith had  a  poor innings  ,  scoring only 12  )   .
By extension , this term can  be  used  in  British  अंग्रेज़ी  for almost  कोई  activity which  takes  a period of time  (  The Liberal  सरकारी   था   a  good  पारी   ,  but finally lost office in 1972 ,  or  You 've had a fair innings , now  it  's my turn ,  अर्थ  ``  तुम   have  spoken for long enough  ,   अभी  let me speak  ''   )   .
It  is   भी   प्रयुक्त   in   सन्दर्भ  to someone  जो   रै  died  at   a  reasonably old  आयु   or  lived a  समृद्ध   और  rewarding life ( Ah , well .
John was 89 .
At least  he  had a good innings  )   .
The baseball-derived  समानांतर   to  this in American  अंग्रेज़ी  is the  पद  at  चमगादड़   .
According to  the   ऑक्सफोर्ड   अंग्रेज़ी  Dictionary  ,  the  पद  innings has  महरूम  used  in  reference to  क्रिकेट  since at  तनिक   1735   .
As cricket was  a   वयस्क  , highly  व्यवस्थित  sport  in  the  1600s  in  इंग्लैण्ड  ,  the   पद  's origin could well  precede   इस   पहला  recorded  उपयोग   .
The  शब्द  inning  अर्थ   'a  gathering  in   '  is  पहला  recorded in 1522  ,  and  could   be  related  .
Adenosine deaminase  कमियां   ,  also called ADA  कमियां  or ADA-SCID ,  is  an  autosomal   recessive  metabolic disorder  कि   कल्याणकारी  immunodeficiency  .
It occurs in fewer  than  one  in  100,000 live births worldwide .
It  खाते  for about 15  %  of  सब   मामले  of severe  संयुक्त  immunodeficiency ( SCID  )  .
it  is  बहुत  rare , you have  a  3  %  chance of  getting  this  जीन   .
ADA deficiency may be  उपस्थित   in  infancy ,  बाल्यकाल  , adolescense  ,   or   adulthood  .
Age of onset  और  severity is  सम्बन्धित   to  some 29 known genotypes  संबद्ध  with  the   विकार  .
An  उदाहरण   of   शहरी  poverty in  इस   slum  in  जकार्ता  ,  इंडोनेशिया
Poverty is the  राज्य  of one who lacks  a  certain amount of  सामग्री  possessions or money .
Absolute poverty or  destitution   refers  to  the  deprivation  of  basic  इंसान  needs  ,  which commonly includes  खाना   ,   जल  , sanitation ,  कपडे  , shelter ,  स्वास्थ्य  care and education  .
Relative poverty is defined contextually as  आर्थिक   असमानता  in the  स्थान  or society in  जिससे   लोगों  live  .
लिये   much  of history , poverty was considered largely unavoidable as traditional  मोड्स  of  उत्पादन   यहूद  insufficient  to   दे   an  entire population a comfortable standard of living .
बाद   the  industrial revolution ,  द्रव्यमान  production  in  factories  बना  wealth increasingly  अधिक  inexpensive and accessible .
Of  अधिक   महत्व  is the modernization of agriculture  ,  such  as   fertilizers  , in order  to  provide enough yield to feed the  जनसांख्यिकी  .
The  सप्लाई  of basic needs can  be  restricted  by   constraints  on  सरकारी   सेवाएं  such  as  corruption  ,  tax  avoidance   ,  debt and loan conditionalities and by the brain drain  of   स्वास्थ्य   परवाह  and  शैक्षणिक   पेशेवर   .
Strategies of increasing income to make basic needs more  सस्ती  typically  शामिल   welfare  , economic freedoms , and providing financial services .
Poverty  कटौती  is a  प्रमुख   लक्ष्य  and  समस्या   लिये  many international  संगठन  such as the United Nations and  the  World  बैंको   .
the  World Bank estimated 1.29  अरब  people were living  in  absolute poverty in  2008  .
Of these  ,  about 400  लाख   लोगों  in absolute  गरीबी  lived in India and 173 million  लोगों  in China .
In USA 1 in  5  children lives in poverty  .
In terms  of   प्रतिशत  of regional populations , sub-Saharan Africa at  47   %  had  the  highest  incidence   रेट  of absolute poverty  in   2008   .
Between 1990  और   2010   ,  about  663  million  लोगों  moved above the absolute poverty level .
Still , extreme  गरीबी  is  a  global  चुनौती   ;  it is observed  in  all  भाग  of  the  world ,  सहित  the  विकसित   economies   .
मशरूम  poisoning ( also  ज्ञात   as   mycetism  )  refers  to  नुकसानदेह  effects from  ingestion  of toxic substances present in a  मशरूम  .
These symptoms can  vary   इससे  slight  जठरांत्र  discomfort  to   मौत   .
The toxins  उपस्थित  are  द्वितीयक  metabolites produced  in   विशिष्ट   biochemical  pathways  in  the  fungal   कोशिकाएं  .
Mushroom poisoning  is  usually  the   परिणाम  of  ingestion  of  जंगली   मशरूम  after misidentification of  a  toxic mushroom  as  an edible  प्रजाति   .
The most  आम   कारण  for  इस  misidentification is  बंद   प्रतिरूप  in  शर्तें   of  colour and general morphology of the toxic mushrooms  प्रजाति  with edible species  .
Even very  अनुभवी  wild  मशरूम   gatherers  are  upon  rare  अवसर  poisoned  by   खाने   विषाक्त   प्रजाति   ,  despite being  खूब  aware  of  the risks ,  through  carelessness .
To prevent  मशरूम   विषाक्तता  , mushroom  gatherers  need to be very  परिचित   साथ  the  मशरूम   वे  intend to  collect  as well as  साथ  any  similar-looking   विषाक्त   प्रजाति   .
in  addition  ,  edibility  of  mushrooms may depend on methods of preparation for  कुकिंग   .
collectors  also  need   to   be   खूब  aware that  edibility   or  toxicity  of   कुछ   प्रजाति  varies with geographic  स्थान  .
इंसान  height is the distance from  the  bottom  of  the  फीट  to the top  of  the  सिर  in a  इंसान  body  ,   खड़ा   वीर्यपात  .
When populations  share   जेनेटिक   पृष्ठभूमि   और   पर्यावरणीय  factors  ,   औसत  height is  अक्सर   characteristic  within  the   समूह  .
असाधारण   ऊँचाई  variation  (  around 20  %  deviation  इससे  average  )  within  ऐसे  a population is sometimes due  to  gigantism or  dwarfism  ,  जिससे  are medical  शर्तें  caused by specific genes  or  endocrine  abnormalities   .
In regions of extreme poverty or prolonged  warfare   ,   पर्यावरणीय  factors like chronic malnutrition  दौरान  childhood or  किशोरावस्था   may  account  लिये  delayed  विकास   and/or  ( in severe cases ) marked reductions  in   वयस्क  stature even  बगैर  the presence  of  any of  ये  medical  शर्तें  .
Apollo  11   थी  the  spaceflight  that  उतरा  the first humans  ,   अमेरिकी  Neil Armstrong  और   बज़   एल्ड्रिन   ,  on  the  Moon on  जुलाई   20  ,  1969   ,   at   20:18  UTC .
Armstrong  became   the  first  to   कदम   onto   the  lunar  सतह   6   घंटों  later on  जुलाई  21 at  02:56  UTC .
Armstrong spent about two  और  a  हाफ  hours outside  the  spacecraft , Aldrin  थोड़ा  less ;  और   साथ  they  एकत्रित  of lunar  सामग्री  for  वापसी  to Earth .
A  तीसरा   सदस्य   of  the mission  ,   माइकल   कॉलिन्स   ,  piloted the command spacecraft alone in lunar  कक्षा   जबतक   आर्मस्ट्रांग   और  Aldrin  लौटे  to  it  just under  a   दिन   बाद   लिये  the  ट्रिप  back to  धरती  .
Launched  by   a   शनि   v  rocket  इससे  Kennedy Space Center in  merritt   द्वीप  , Florida  on  July 16 , Apollo  11   थी  the fifth manned mission  of  NASA  's  Apollo  कार्यक्रम  .
The  अपोलो   spacecraft  had three  भाग  :  a   कमांड  Module with a  केबिन  for the three  astronauts  which was the only part  जिससे  landed back on Earth ; a Service Module which supported  the  Command Module with  नोदन   ,  electrical  शक्ति  ,  ऑक्सीजन   और  water ; and  a  Lunar Module for landing on the Moon .
बाद  being sent to the Moon by  the  Saturn V 's upper  स्टेज  , the  astronauts   अलग  the  spacecraft  from it and travelled for three days  जबतक  they  डाला  into lunar orbit  .
Armstrong and  एल्ड्रिन   तब   स्थानांतरित   into   the  Lunar Module and landed in the  समुद्र  of Tranquility .
They stayed a total of about 21  और   a   हाफ  hours on  the  lunar surface .
After  उठाने  off in the upper part of the Lunar Module and  rejoining  Collins in  the  Command Module  ,  they returned to  धरती   और  landed  in  the  प्रशांत   समंदर   on  July 24 .
ब्रॉडकास्ट  on live TV to a  world-wide  audience  ,  Armstrong stepped onto the lunar  सतह  and described  the  event as ``  एक  small step for [ a  ]   man  ,  एक  giant leap for  mankind  . ''
Apollo 11  effectively  ended  the   स्पेस  Race  और  fulfilled  a  national goal  प्रस्तावित  in  1961   by  the late  u.S.  President  जॉन   F.  Kennedy in  a  speech  पहले  the  संयुक्त  States  कॉंग्रेस   ,  `` before this decade  is  out  ,   of   लैंडिंग  a  man  on  the  Moon and returning him safely to the  धरती  . ''
The FIFA World Cup , often  बस  the  संसार  Cup  ,   is   an  international association football competition contested by the  वरिष्ठ   मेन   's  national  टीमों   of   the   सदस्यों  of Fédération  internationale   de   फ़ुटबॉल  Association  (  FIFA ) , the sport 's global governing body .
the  championship has been awarded  प्रत्येक   चार  years  चूंकि  the  inaugural  tournament in 1930  ,  except  in   1942  and  1946  when  it   थी  not held because of the Second World War .
The current champions are Spain  ,  who  जीती   the  2010 tournament  .
The current  स्वरूप   of   the  tournament involves 32 teams  स्पर्धा  for  the  title  at  venues within the host nation (  s   )   over  a period of about  a  month ;  इस   phase  is often called the World  कप  Finals .
A qualification  phase  ,  जिससे  currently takes  प्लेस  over  the   preceding  three years , is used  to   determine   जिससे   टीमों   qualify  for  the   टूर्नामेंट  together  साथ   the   मेजबान   स्वदेश  (  s  )  .
The 19 World  कप   tournaments  have  महरूम   जीती   by   आठ   अलग  national teams .
Brazil  have   जीती  five times ,  और  they are the only team to  have  played  in  every  टूर्नामेंट  .
the  other World  कप  winners  हैं  Italy  ,   साथ   चार   शीर्षक  ;  जर्मनी  , with  तीन   शीर्षक  ;  अर्जेंटीना  and inaugural winners Uruguay  ,  with two titles each ;  और  England ,  फ़्रांस   ,  and  स्पेन   ,   साथ   एक  title each .
the  World Cup  is   the   संसार  's most  widely  viewed sporting  इवेंट  ; an  अनुमानित  715.1 million  लोगों  watched the  फाइनल   मैच  of the 2006  फीफा   संसार   कप   आयोजित  in Germany  .
the  next three World Cups will be  hosted   by  Brazil in 2014 ,  रूस  in 2018 ,  और  Qatar in 2022 .
Genocide  is  a term coined in  1944  by Raphael Lemkin to  describe  the deliberate and systematic destruction  ,   in  whole or  in  part ,  of   an  ethnic  ,  racial  ,  religious ,  or   नेशनल   समूह  .
it   is  defined  in  Article  2  of  the   सम्मेलन   on   the   रोकथाम  and  दंड  of the Crime  of  Genocide (  cppcg   )  of  1948  as  ``   कोई   of  the following acts  वचनबद्ध  with  intent   to  destroy  ,  in whole  or  in part , a  नेशनल  , ethnical , racial or  धार्मिक  group  ,  as such : killing  सदस्यों   of   the  group ; causing  गंभीर  bodily  or   दिमागी   नुक़सान   to  members of  the   समूह   ;  deliberately inflicting  on   the  groups  शर्तें  of  जीवन   ,  calculated to bring about  इसके  physical destruction in whole  or  in  भाग   ;  imposing measures  intended  to prevent births within the  समूह   ;  [  और   ]   forcibly  transferring  children  of the  समूह  to  another  group .  ''
skulls   of  victims of the Rwandan  नरसंहार
The preamble  to  the CPPCG not only  राज्य  that ``  नरसंहार  is a  अपराधों   अंतर्गत  international  विधि  ,  contrary   to   the  spirit  और   aims   of   the  United  राष्ट्र   और  condemned by  the  civilized world '' , but  भी  that  ``   at   सब   अवधि  of history  नरसंहार   रै  inflicted  ग्रेट  losses  on  humanity ''  .
Determining what  ऐतिहासिक   कार्यक्रम  constitute a genocide  और  which are merely  दण्ड  or inhuman  बर्ताव  is  नहीं   a  clear-cut  पदार्थ  .
In  nearly  every case  जहाँ  accusations of genocide have circulated ,  partisans   of  various  पहलू   have   fiercely  disputed the interpretation and  विवरण   of   the  event , often to  the  point of promoting  wildly  different versions  of   the   तथ्य   .
An accusation of  नरसंहार  is  कतई  not  लिया   हलके   और  will almost always  be   विवादास्पद  .
The  following   सूची   of  genocides and alleged  genocides  should  be  understood in this  कॉन्टेक्स्ट  and can not be regarded  as   the  final  शब्द   on   ये  subjects .
a   समय   बेल्ट  is a non-slipping  mechanical  drive  बेल्ट  and the term may  refer   to  either:
Toothed belt ,  a  flexible belt with teeth  moulded   onto  its inner  सतह
समय  belt ( camshaft  )  ,  a   toothed  belt used  to   ड्राइव  the camshaft (  s   )  within an  आतंरिक  combustion engine
The culture  of  the  संयुक्त  States is  primarily   a  Western  संस्कृति  , but is also  बहकावे  by Native  अमरीकी  ,  अफ़्रीकी  , Asian  ,  Polynesian , and Latin American cultures .
American culture started  इसके   गठन  over 10,000  सालो  ago  साथ   the  migration of Paleo-Indians  इससे   एशिया  into  the   प्रदेश  that is today  the  continental  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
it  has  इसके  own unique  सोशल   और  cultural  विशेषताएँ  such  as  dialect ,  म्यूज़िक  ,  कला   ,  social habits  ,   भोजन   ,  and folklore .
the  United  राज्य   of  America is  an   ethnically  and  racially  diverse  देश  as  a  result of large-scale immigration  इससे   अनेक   अलग  countries  throughout  its history .
Its  मुख्य   जल्दी  European influences came  इससे  English  ,   स्कॉटिश   ,   वेल्श  and Irish settlers of  औपनिवेशिक   अमेरिका   दौरान  British rule .
British  संस्कृति  ,  due  to colonial ties  साथ  Britain that spread the  अंग्रेज़ी  language ,  विधिक  system  और  other cultural inheritances , had  a  formative  influence   .
Other important influences  आए   इससे   अन्य  parts of  पश्चिमी  Europe  ,  especially Germany  ,  France , and  इटली   .
Original elements also  खेल  a  दमदार   भूमिका  ,  ऐसे   as  the invention  of   jeffersonian   लोकतंत्र  .
Thomas  जेफरसन   's  Notes on the State of Virginia was  शायद   the  first influential domestic  सांस्कृतिक  critique by  an  American  और   a  reactionary  टुकड़ा   to  the prevailing  यूरोपीय  consensus that  अमेरिका   's  domestic originality  थी   विकृत   .
Prevalent  विचार  and ideals that  विकसित  domestically  ,  such as  नेशनल   छुट्टियाँ   ,  uniquely American sports ,  सैन्य   परंपरा  , and  नवप्रवर्तनों   in  the  कला  and  entertainment  give  a  strong  भाव  of national pride among  the   जनसांख्यिकी  as  a  whole  .
American culture includes both conservative  और  liberal  तत्व   ,   वैज्ञानिक  and  धार्मिक  competitiveness , political structures  ,   रिस्क   लेने  and  फ़्री  expression , materialist and  moral  elements  .
Despite  निश्चित   सतत  ideological  सिद्धान्त   (  e.g . individualism  ,   समतावाद  , and  आस्था  in freedom and  लोकतंत्र  )  ,   अमरीकी  culture has a  किस्में  of  expressions   due   to  its geographical  स्केल  and  जनसांख्यिकी  diversity .
the   लचीलापन  of  u.S.  culture and  इसके  highly symbolic nature lead some researchers  to  categorize American culture as a  mythic   पहचान  ; others see  it  as  अमरीकी  exceptionalism  .
it  also  शामिल  elements that evolved from  स्वदेशी   अमेरिकी  , and other  जातीय  cultures—most prominently  the  culture  of  African Americans  ,  cultures  इससे  Latin America , and  एशियाई   अमरीकी   संस्कृतियों   .
Many  अमरीकी   सांस्कृतिक  elements , especially from popular culture ,  have   स्प्रेड   आरपार  the globe  through  modern mass media .
The United States has often  महरूम  thought  of   as   a  melting pot , but beginning  in  the  लेट  1990s and  जल्दी  2000s , it trends towards cultural diversity , pluralism and  the  image of a  सलाद   कटोरी  instead  .
due   to   the  extent of American culture  ,  there  हैं  many integrated  लकिन  unique  सोशल   subcultures   भीतर  the  संयुक्त  States  .
The  सांस्कृतिक   संबद्धों   an   व्यक्तिगत  in  the  United  राज्य  may have  commonly  depend on social class ,  राजनैतिक   अभिविन्यास   और   a  multitude  of  demographic  विशेषताएँ  such as  धार्मिक   पृष्ठभूमि   ,   occupation  and  जातीय   समूह  membership .
Samoan ( Gagana  fa'a   sāmoa  or  gagana   sāmoa   —  IPA  :  )  is  the  भाषा  of  the  Samoan Islands  ,   comprising  the  स्वतंत्र  country  of  Samoa and  the  United States  territory  of American Samoa  .
It is an official language—alongside English  —in   दोनो   jurisdictions  .
Samoan , a Polynesian language  ,   is  the  पहला  language  लिये  most of the  समोआ  Islands  '  population of about 246,000 .
साथ  many Samoan people living  in   अन्य   देशों   ,  the  कुल  number of speakers worldwide is  अनुमानित  at 370,000  .
The  भाषा   is   notable  for the phonological  मतभेद  between formal and informal speech as  खूब  as a ceremonial form used in  samoan   छाये  .
a  glucose tolerance test is a  चिकित्सा  test  in   जिससे   ग्लूकोज   is  given  और  blood samples taken  afterward   to  determine how quickly  it   is  cleared  इससे   the  blood .
The test  is  usually used to  परीक्षण  for diabetes  ,  insulin resistance ,  और   sometimes  reactive  hypoglycemia   और   acromegaly   ,   or   rarer  disorders of carbohydrate metabolism .
In  the  most  commonly   performed   संस्करण  of the test , an oral  ग्लूकोज  tolerance  परीक्षण   (  OGTT ) ,  a  standard  खुराक  of glucose  is  ingested by mouth and blood  स्तर  are checked two  घंटों   बाद  .
अनेक   विसंगतियाँ  of the  gtt  have  महरूम  devised over the years  लिये  various  उद्देश्य   ,   साथ  different  मानक  doses  of  glucose  ,   अलग   रूट  of administration ,  अलग   intervals   और   durations   of  sampling , and various substances measured  in  addition  to  blood  ग्लूकोज   .
``  What  परिचय  Me  ''   is  a song  लिखा   by  Garry Frost and  frances  Swan ,  पहला   अंकित  by  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  rock  बैंड  Moving  तस्वीरें   इससे   उनके  album Days of  innocence  .
It was  the   बैंड   's  first number-one single in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  spending six  लगातार  weeks  on  the  शीर्ष   ;  there , it  थी  the  second-highest  selling  सिंगल   of   1982  .
the  success  of   the   सोंग  led them  to  America where it  became  a  hit  ,  reaching   #   29  on the  u.s  .  बिलबोर्ड   hot   100  chart  .
the  song stayed in  the  U.S.  चार्ट   लिये  such a long  समय   कि  it  प्रबंधित  to  मेक   billboards   शीर्ष  100  पॉप   singles  of 1983 ,  at  # 88 , a  विरल  feat for a  सिंगल   साथ  such  a  low peak  स्थिति  .
The  सोंग  made  an  unusual  वापसी  in 1989 ,  peaking  at  #  46  .
On the  बाएँ  a  मुर्गा  egg , the  अंडा  most  commonly  eaten  by  humans  ,   और  on the right two  बटेर   अंडे
अंडे  are laid by females  of   अनेक   अलग  species  ,  including  पक्षियों   ,   सरीसृपों   ,   amphibians  ,  और  fish ,  और  have  महरूम  eaten by  mankind  for thousands of years  .
Bird and  reptile  eggs  consist   of  a  सुरक्षात्मक  eggshell , albumen  (  egg white )  ,  and vitellus  (  egg yolk )  ,  contained within various  पतला   झिल्लियों   .
लोकप्रिय  choices  लिये  egg consumption are  मुर्गा  , duck ,  बटेर  , roe , and caviar ,  लकिन  the  अंडा  most  प्रायः   खपत   by   इंसानो  is the  मुर्गा  egg , by a  चौड़ी  margin  .
अंडा  yolks and  पूरे   अंडे   स्टोर   significant   amounts   of  protein and choline , and are  widely   प्रयुक्त  in cookery .
due  to  उनके   प्रोटीन  content , the United States  विभाग   of   कृषि  (  यूएसडीए  )  categorizes   अंडे  as  meats  within the Food Guide Pyramid  .
Despite  the  nutritional value of  अंडे  , there are  कुछ   संभावित  health  मुद्दे   arising   इससे  egg quality ,  भंडार  , and individual  allergies   .
मुर्गियों   और  other  egg-laying   जीव   हैं  widely kept throughout  the   संसार   ,  and mass production  of  chicken  अंडे   is  a  वैश्विक  industry  .
In 2009 ,  an   अनुमानित  62.1  लाख  metric  टन   of   अंडे  were  उत्पादित  worldwide  इससे  a  कुल  laying  झुण्ड  of  लगभग  6.4  अरब  hens .
There  हैं  issues of regional  विभिन्नता  in  माँग   और  expectation , as  खूब   as   वर्तमान   debates   concerning   विधि   of  mass production , with the European Union  's  ban on  बैटरी   खेती  of chickens  .
Major League  सॉकर   (   mls  )  is  a  पेशेवर  soccer league representing  the  sport 's  उच्चतम  level in the  संयुक्त  States and Canada .
Sanctioned by the United  राज्य  Soccer Federation  (  U.S. Soccer )  ,  the  लीग  is composed of 19  टीमों  —  16  in the  u.S.   और   3  in  कनाडा  .
Seasons presently run from March to  दिसम्बर   ,   साथ   प्रत्येक   टोली  playing 34 games  in  the  नियमित  season .
Ten teams compete  in   the  postseason  mls   कप  Playoffs culminating in the championship game  ,   the  MLS Cup .
Major League Soccer  थी  founded in 1993 as part of  the  United States  '   बोली   to   मेजबान  the 1994  फीफा  World Cup .
The first season took place in  1996  beginning  साथ  ten teams .
बजाय  of  ऑपरेटिंग   as  an association  of  independently owned teams ,  mls  is a  सिंगल  entity  जहाँ  each  टोली  is  स्वामित्व  and controlled by  the  league 's  निवेशकों  .
The league  's   बंद  membership  makes  it one  of  the  संसार  's few  सॉकर   लीग   नहीं  using promotion  और   relegation  .
the  legality of cannabis varies  इससे  country to  देश   .
कब्ज़ा  of  कैनबिस   is  illegal  in   सबसे   देशों   और   रै   महरूम  since the beginning  of   फैली   कैनबिस  prohibition  in  the late  1930s  .
However  ,   अनेक  countries have  decriminalized  the  कब्ज़ा  of  छोटी   quantities   of   कैनबिस  , particularly in North America  ,   दक्षिण  America and Europe .
Furthermore  ,  possession is legal or  effectively   विधिक  in  the  Netherlands ,  उत्तर  Korea and  होता   be   in  the U.S.  राज्य  of Colorado and Washington  if   it  were not  लिये   संघीय  law , which governs persons in all  राज्य   .
The medicinal use of cannabis is legal in a number  of  countries , including  कनाडा   ,  the  चेक  Republic and Israel .
जबकि  federal law in  the   संयुक्त  States  bans   सब   बिक्री   और  possession  of  cannabis , enforcement  varies   widely  at  the   राज्य  level and  कुछ  states have established medicinal marijuana programs  in   कि  contradict federal law ;  दो   राज्य   (   कोलोराडो  and Washington ) have repealed their  कानून  prohibiting  the  recreational use of  कैनबिस   और  replaced  उन्हें  with  a   नियामक  regime , also contrary to federal  statute  .
Some countries have laws that  हैं   नहीं  as  vigorously   prosecuted  as  अन्य  but , apart from  the   देशों  that offer access to medical  मारिजुआना  ,  सबसे  countries  have   विभिन्न   दंड   ranging  from  lenient  to very severe .
Some infractions  हैं   लिया  more seriously in some  देशों  than  अन्य   in   लिहाज़  to  the  cultivation  ,  use  ,   कब्ज़ा   or   ट्रांसफ़र   of   कैनबिस  for  recreational  use .
a   few  jurisdictions have  lessened  penalties  लिये  possession  of  small quantities of  कैनबिस   ,   बनाना  it punishable by confiscation and a fine , rather  than  imprisonment .
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use mandatory  उपचार   कार्यक्रम   लिये  young  or  frequent users ,  साथ  freedom from narcotic drugs as  the  goal  और   a   few  jurisdictions  परमिट   कैनबिस   उपयोग   लिये  medicinal  उद्देश्य  .
There are also  परिवर्तन  in a more  प्रतिबंधक  direction as  in   कनाडा  .
Drug tests  to   detect  cannabis are  increasingly   आम   in  many  देशों   और   have  resulted  in  jail  वाक्य  and people losing  उनके   कार्य  .
however  , simple  कब्ज़ा  can carry  long  jail sentences in some countries  ,   विशेषकर   in  parts  of  East Asia and Southeast  एशिया   जहाँ   the  sale of  कैनबिस   may   सीसे   to  a sentence  of  life in  थाना  or even execution .
In  cardiovascular  physiology , ejection fraction  (  EF ) represents  the  volumetric  भिन्न   of  blood pumped out of  the  ventricle ( heart )  साथ  each heart  ताल   or  cardiac cycle .
It  can  be  लागू  to  either   the  right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary valve into  the  pulmonary  परिसंचरण  or the left  ventricle  which  ejects  via the aortic valve into  the  systemic  परिसंचरण  .
Imaging of the  physiology  of the mammalian heart  is  the art that allows  सार्थक  mathematical  अभिव्यक्ति   धमक   ef  .
noninvasive   हृदय   इमेजिंग  has become a  विश्वव्यापी  utility enabling study  of  cardiac  प्रदर्शन   reproducibly   और   inexpensively  .
सरलीकृत  , Ejection  भिन्न   is  a mathematical product  अनुमत   by  cardiac imaging .
As a mathematical  पद  , Ejection  भिन्न   is   an   एक्सटेंशन  of  the   कार्य   of  Adolph  फिक  in cardiac output  .
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography , Computed Tomography  ,  Magnetic Resonance Imaging and  muga  scanning have definitively allowed  clinically  relevant mathematics regarding Ischemia ,  जन्मजात  Heart Disease  और  Heart  विफलता  .
राज्य   रूट  14  (  SR 14  )  is a north–south state  राजमार्ग  in the  u.S.  state of California , largely in  the   mojave  Desert  .
The southern  portion   of  the highway  is   हस्ताक्षरित  as the Antelope Valley Freeway .
the   रूट   connects  Interstate  5  , or Golden  राज्य  Freeway , near Santa  clarita   और   साथ  U.S. Route 395  निकट   inyokern  .
Legislatively , the route extends  दक्षिण   of  I-5 to State Route  1   in  the Pacific Palisades area of Los Angeles  ,   however  the portion south of the junction with I-5  रै  not been constructed .
the   दक्षिणी  part of the constructed route is a  व्यस्त   commuter  freeway serving and connecting the communities  of   सांता   clarita   ,   palmdale   और   lancaster  with the  बाकी  of the Greater Los  एंजिल्स  area  .
The  उत्तरी   portion  ,  इससे  Vincent (  दक्षिण   of   palmdale   )  to Route  395  , is legislatively named  the   aerospace  Highway ,  as  the  राजमार्ग  serves Edwards Air  फ़ोर्स  Base , once  एक  of  the  primary  लैंडिंग  strips  लिये  NASA  's   स्पेस  Shuttle  .
This section is rural  ,  following the line between the hot  mojave   मरुस्थल   और   the   forming   सिएरा   नेवाडा  mountain  दायरा  .
सबसे  of  रूट   14  is loosely paralleled  by  a main line  of  the  दक्षिणी  Pacific Railroad  ,   प्रयुक्त  for  the   antelope   घाटी   लकीर  of the  metrolink  commuter rail system  as  well  as  a connection  between   लॉस  Angeles and the California  सेंट्रल   घाटी  via  tehachapi  Pass .
linked  with US 395 ,  इस  road  connects   लॉस  Angeles with such  स्थान  as  मैमथ   पहाड़  , Mono  झील  , Yosemite National Park and Reno , Nevada .
रूट   14  was part of U.S. Route  6   prior  to truncation in 1964 , when  u.S.  6 was  a  coast-to-coast  रूट   इससे   long  Beach to Provincetown ,  मैसाचुसेट्स   .
the   non-freeway  segment of  sr  14  इससे  Silver Queen Road north of  rosamond  to Mojave  is  known as  सिएरा   राजमार्ग  ,  as   is   the   बूढ़ा   रूटिंग  between Interstate 5  और   चांदी   महारानी   सड़क   जहाँ   sr   14  has been  स्थानांतरित  to a  नए  freeway alignment  .
Portions  of  Route 14  remain   हस्ताक्षरित   साथ  names associated  साथ  US 6  ,   सहित   मिडलैंड   ट्रेल  , Theodore Roosevelt  राजमार्ग  and  ग्रैंड   फौज   of  the  गणतंत्र  Highway .
This route is part  of  the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  Freeway and  एक्सप्रेसवे   प्रणाली   .
Blindness is the condition  of   lacking  visual perception due to physiological  or  neurological  कारकों   .
Various  तराजू  have  महरूम  developed to describe  the  extent  of  vision  घाटा  and  define  blindness  .
कुल   दृष्टिहीनता  is  the  complete lack of form and  विज़ुअल  light  बोध   और  is clinically  अंकित  as  nlp  , an abbreviation for  ``   no  light perception . ''
Blindness  is  frequently  प्रयुक्त  to describe severe visual impairment  साथ   दृष्टि  .
those   वर्णित   as  having only  लाइट  perception have no  अधिक  sight than  the   क्षमता   to  tell  लाइट  from  अंधेरा  and  the   सामान्य  direction  of  a light source .
To  determine   जिससे  people may  need   खास   सहायता  because of  उनके  visual  disabilities   ,  various governmental  jurisdictions  have formulated more complex definitions referred  to  as legal blindness .
In  उत्तर  America and most of  यूरोपीय   ,   विधिक   दृष्टिहीनता  is defined  as  visual acuity (  दृष्टि   )   of  20/200 (  6/60   )  or less in  the   बेहतर  eye with  बेहतरीन   सुधार  possible  .
This  अर्थात्   कि  a  legally   अँधा  individual  होता  have to stand from an  ऑब्जेक्ट  to  देखिए   it—with   corrective  lenses —with the  वही   उपाधि  of clarity as  a  normally  sighted  person could from .
In many  क्षेत्रों  , people with  औसत  acuity who nonetheless  have   a  visual field of less than 20 degrees  (  the norm being 180  डिग्री  ) are also classified as  होने  legally  अँधा  .
Approximately  टेन  percent  of  those deemed legally blind ,  by  any measure ,  have   no  vision .
The  बाकी   have  some  दृष्टि  , from light perception alone to relatively good acuity .
कम   दृष्टि   is  sometimes used  to  describe visual acuities from 20/70  to  20/200  .
By  the   10th   संशोधन   of  the WHO International  सांख्यिकीय  Classification of  रोगों  , Injuries and  कल्याणकारी   of   मौत   ,   कम   दृष्टि  is defined as visual  तीक्ष्णता  of less  than  20/60 (  6/18  )  ,  but  बराबर   to  or better  than  20/200  (   6/60  )  ,   or  corresponding visual  फ़ील्ड   घाटा   to   कम  than 20  डिग्री  ,  in   the  better eye with best  संभावित   सुधार  .
Blindness is defined  as   विज़ुअल   तीक्ष्णता  of less than 20/400  (  6/120  )  , or corresponding visual field loss to less  than  10  डिग्री  , in  the  better  नजर   साथ   बेहतरीन   संभावित  correction  .
अँधा   लोगों   साथ   undamaged  eyes may still  पंजीकरण  light non-visually for  the  purpose  of   circadian   entrainment  to the 24-hour light/dark cycle .
Light signals  लिये  this purpose  सफर   through  the  retinohypothalamic   ट्रैक्ट  and  हैं  not affected by optic nerve  क्षति  beyond where the  retinohypothalamic  tract exits .
Earl  सीमन्स  ( born December  18  ,  1970   )  ,  बेहतर  known by his  स्टेज  names DMX  और   अंधेरा   man   x   ,   is  an  अमरीकी  rapper and  कर्ता   .
in  1999  ,  DMX released his best-selling  एल्बम   ...   और   तब  There  थी  X  ,   जिससे   प्रदर्शित   the  hit single ``  पार्टी  Up  (   up   in   यहाँ   )  ``  .
he  has acted in films such  as  Belly ,  रोमियो   जरूर   die  , Exit  wounds  ,  पालना  2 The  संगीन  , and  पिछला   घंटा   .
in  2006  ,  he  स्ट्रक्चर   in   the   वास्तविकता  television series , which was  primarily  aired on  the   शर्त  cable television network  .
in  2003 ,  dmx  published  a   किताब   of  his memoirs entitled ,  e.a.r.l  . :  the  Autobiography of DMX  .
dmx  released  a  mixtape The  तौल   in   as  a prelude/promotion towards his  एल्बम  Undisputed  (  2012 ) .
DMX has  बेची  over 30 million  रिकॉर्ड  worldwide  ,  making him one of the best-selling  hip-hop  artists  of   सब   समय  .
Professional certification  ,  trade certification  ,  or  पेशेवर   नामांकन  , often  पुकारा  simply  प्रमाणन  or  योग्यता   ,   is  a designation earned  by   a  person to assure  योग्यता  to  perform  a  जॉब  or  कार्य  .
नहीं  all  certifications  that  उपयोग  post-nominal letters are an acknowledgement  of   शैक्षणिक  achievement , or an  एजेंसी   नियुक्त  to safeguard the  पब्लिक  interest .
Bugs Bunny  is   a  funny animal  कार्टून  character  ,  best remembered for  उसके   अभिनीत   भूमिकाएँ   in  the  looney  Tunes  और  Merrie  melodies  series of  नाट्य  short films  उत्पादित  by Warner Bros. during  the   सुनहरी  age of  अमरीकी  animation .
उसके  popularity  दौरान  this  era  led to his  बनने   a  corporate  शुभंकर   of  Warner  भाईs.  Entertainment  .
बग  is an  anthropomorphic   धूसर  hare or  खरगोश  who is  प्रसिद्ध  for his  flippant  ,  व्यक्तित्व  , a pronounced New York  एक्सेंट  , his portrayal as  a  trickster  ,  and  उसके   कैच  phrase  ``  Eh ...
What 's  up  , doc ? ''
(  प्रायः   कहा  while chewing a  गाजर  )  .
Bugs has appeared  in   अधिक  films than any  अन्य  cartoon  अक्षर  and is  the  ninth most portrayed film personality  in   the   संसार  .
According  to  his 1990  ``  biography  ''  Bugs Bunny  :   50  Years and  तभी   एक  Grey  हरे   ,  Bugs was born  on  July  27   ,  1940  in  Brooklyn ,  नई  York in a warren  अंतर्गत  Ebbets Field , home  of   the  Brooklyn  डॉजर्स  .
in  reality  ,  he  थी  brought  to   जीवन  by  the   animators  and staff of Leon Schlesinger Productions (  बाद  Warner Bros. Cartoons  )   :  including  टेक्स   एवेरी  ,  जो  directed Bugs '  जल्दी   निर्णायक  short  a  Wild  हरे   (  1940 ) ;  रॉबर्ट  McKimson ,  जो  created  बग  '  निर्णायक   अक्षर  design ;  और  Mel  blanc   ,  who  originated   the   आवाज़   of  Bugs .
The mucous  झिल्लियों  ( or mucosae or mucosas ; singular mucosa ) are linings  of  mostly endodermal origin , covered in  epithelium  ,  जिससे  are involved  in  absorption  और  secretion .
They  लकीर   कैविटी  that are exposed to the external environment and  आतंरिक   अंगों  .
वे  are at several places  संलग्न  with skin :  at   the  nostrils ,  the  lips of  the   मुँह   ,  the  eyelids  , the ears , the genital  क्षेत्रफल   ,  and  the  anus  .
The sticky ,  मोटा  fluid secreted  by   the  mucous  झिल्लियों   और  glands is termed  mucus  .
The term  श्लेष्मक  membrane refers  to   जहाँ   वे   हैं  found in  the  body  और   नहीं  every mucous membrane secretes  mucus  .
the  glans  clitoridis  , glans  शिश्न  ( head  of  the  शिश्न  ) , along  साथ  the  अंदर  of the foreskin and  the   clitoral  hood  ,  are  श्लेष्मक   झिल्लियों  .
the   urethra   is   भी   a   श्लेष्मक   झिल्ली  .
The  स्रावित  mucus traps the pathogens  in  the  देह   ,   preventing   कोई   further   क्रियाएँ  of diseases .
A master sergeant  is  the military rank for  a  senior non-commissioned officer in some  हथियारबंद   शक्तियां  .
Cake is  a  form of bread  or  bread-like  खाना   .
In its modern  फ़ॉर्म  ,  it   is   typically   a   मीठी  baked dessert .
in   इसके   oldest  forms  ,  cakes were  सामान्यतः   fried   breads   or  cheesecakes ,  और   सामान्यतः  had  a   डिस्क  shape  .
determining   whether  a  दिए  food  चाहिए  be classified as bread ,  केक  ,  or   पेस्ट्री   can  be difficult  .
Modern  केक  , especially layer  cakes  , normally contain  a   संयोजन   of   आटा  , sugar  ,   अंडे  , and  मक्खन  or oil  ,   साथ   कुछ  varieties also requiring  द्रव  (  typically  milk or  जल  )  और  leavening  एजेंटों   (  such  as  yeast or baking powder  )  .
Flavorful  संघटक  like fruit  purées  ,  nuts  , dried  or   candied  fruit  ,  or extracts are often added  ,  and  numerous  substitutions  लिये  the primary ingredients are  संभावित   .
cakes  are often  भर  with fruit preserves  or  dessert sauces ( like  पेस्ट्री  cream )  ,   आइस्ड  with buttercream or other icings  ,  and  सजा   साथ  marzipan  ,   piped  borders  or  candied fruit .
केक  is  प्रायः  the dessert  of   चुनाव  for meals at  ceremonial  occasions , particularly  विवाह   ,  anniversaries ,  और  birthdays .
There are  अनगिनत  cake recipes ; some are  bread-like  ,  कुछ  rich  और  elaborate ,  और   अनेक   हैं  centuries  बूढ़ा   .
केक   बनाना  is no longer  a   जटिल   कार्यविधि   ;  while  at   एक   समय  considerable  मजदूर  went  into  cake  बनाना   (  particularly  the  whisking of egg foams ) , baking  उपकरण  and directions have  महरूम   सरलीकृत   so   कि  even the most  amateur   कुक   may  bake a cake  .
Tamara Faye LaValley Bakker  messner   (  March 7 , 1942 –  जुलाई  20 , 2007 )  थी  an  अमरीकी  Christian  सिंगर   ,   इंजीलवादी   ,   उद्योगों  , author  ,   बात  show  मेजबान  ,  और   टेलीविज़न  personality .
She was married from 1961  to  1992 to televangelist ,  और   बाद  convicted felon  ,  Jim  bakker  .
She  co-hosted   साथ  him on  the   ptl  Club (  1976–1987   )  .
She  थी   a  participant in  the  2004 season  of  the reality show The Surreal Life .
Cambria  is  a village in Columbia County ,  विस्कॉन्सिन  , United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 767 at the  2010   जनसांख्यिकी  .
it  is part  of   the   मैडिसन   महानगर  Statistical Area  .
Public policy is the  principled  guide to action taken by  the  administrative executive branches of the  राज्य   साथ   लिहाज़   to  a class  of   मुद्दे   in   a  manner consistent with  विधि  and  संस्थागत  customs .
In general ,  the   न्यास  is  the  pertinent national and substantial constitutional  विधि  and implementing  विधान   ऐसे   as  the US Federal code .
further  substrates  शामिल  both  न्यायिक  interpretations  और  regulations which are  generally   प्राधिकृत  by legislation  .
Other scholars define  it   as  a system of ``  पाठ्यक्रम   of   कार्रवाई   ,  regulatory measures ,  कानून   ,  and funding  प्राथमिकताएं   concerning  a  दिए  topic promulgated by  a  governmental entity  or   इसके   प्रतिनिधि  . ''
Public policy  is  commonly  समाविष्ट  `` in  constitutions  ,  विधान  acts ,  और  judicial  निर्णय   .  ''
in   the   संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  इस   अवधारणा  refers not only  to  the  परिणाम  of policies ,  लकिन  more broadly  to   the   decision-making   और  analysis of governmental  निर्णय  .
as   an   अकादमिक   अनुशासन  , public  नीति  is  पढ़ाई  by professors  और  students  at   पब्लिक  policy schools of  प्रमुख  universities throughout the  देश   .
the   u.S.  professional association of public  नीति  practitioners , researchers , scholars ,  और  students  is  the Association for  पब्लिक  Policy  विश्लेषण   और   प्रबन्धन   .
Digestion is the mechanical and  रासायनिक   विश्लेषण   of  food  into  smaller components that are more  easily   अवशोषित   into  a blood stream , for  उदाहरण   .
Digestion is  a  form  of  catabolism  :  a breakdown of  विशाल  food molecules to  छोटी  ones .
जब  food  enters   the   मुँह   ,  digestion of the food starts by the  कार्रवाई   of  mastication , a  रूप  of mechanical  पाचन  ,  और   the   wetting   सम्पर्क  of saliva  .
लार  ,  a   द्रव   स्रावित  by the salivary glands  ,  contains salivary  amylase  , an enzyme  जिससे  starts the digestion  of   मंड   in   the  food .
After undergoing mastication and  मंड   पाचन  , the  खाना  will  be  in  the  form of  a  small  ,   गोलाकार  slurry mass called a bolus .
It will then  सफर  down the  ग्रासनाल  and  into  the  पेट  by the action  of  peristalsis .
Gastric juice  in  the stomach starts  प्रोटीन  digestion .
gastric   रस   मुख्यतः  contains hydrochloric  एसिड   और  pepsin  .
as  these two chemicals may damage the stomach wall , mucus is  स्रावित   by  the stomach  ,  providing a  slimy   परत   कि  acts as  a   शील्ड   विरूद्ध  the  damaging  effects  of   the   रसायन   .
At  the   वही  time protein digestion is occurring , mechanical mixing  occurs  by  peristalsis   ,  which  हैं   लहरें  of muscular contractions that move  साथ   the  stomach  वॉल   .
इस   allows  the  द्रव्यमान  of food to  further  mix with the digestive  एंजाइमों  .
बाद  some time  (   typically  an hour or two in humans , 4–6  घंटों  in  कुत्तो  ,  somewhat   shorter  duration in house cats  )  ,  the  resulting  मोटा  liquid is called  chyme  .
जब  the  pyloric  sphincter  वाल्व   opens  ,  chyme   enters   the  duodenum  जहाँ   it  mixes  साथ   digestive   एंजाइमों   इससे   the  pancreas  ,   और  then passes  through  the small  आंत   ,   in   जिससे  digestion continues  .
When the chyme  is  fully  पचता  , it is absorbed  into  the blood .
95  %  of  अवशोषण  of  nutrients  occurs in the  छोटी  intestine .
Water and  खनिज   हैं  reabsorbed back  into  the  रक्त  in  the   कोलन  (  विशाल  intestine )  जहाँ   the  pH is slightly acidic  परिचय   5.6  ~  6.9   .
Some  विटामिन   ,   ऐसे   as  biotin and vitamin  k  ( K2MK7  )  produced by bacteria  in  the  कोलन  are also absorbed into the blood in  the  colon .
Waste material  is  eliminated  इससे  the  मलाशय   दौरान  defecation  .
हेनरी  VIII ( 28  जून   1491   –   28  January  1547  )  थी  king of  इंग्लैण्ड  from  21   अप्रैल  1509 until his death .
He  थी   रब   ,  and  बाद  king  ,   of   आयरलैंड  ,  as  well as  continuing  the nominal  अर्जी  by  the  English  monarchs  to  the  Kingdom  of   फ़्रांस   .
Henry was  the  second  monarch  of the  ट्यूडर  dynasty , succeeding his father ,  हेनरी  VII  .
Besides  उसके  six marriages  ,   हेनरी   viii  is  ज्ञात  for  उसके  role in  the  separation  of  the Church of  इंग्लैण्ड  from  the  Roman Catholic Church  .
Henry  's   struggles  with  रोम  led to the  विरह  of  the  Church  of  England from papal  प्राधिकार  ,  the   विच्छेद   of   the   monasteries  ,  और   उसके  own  स्थापना  as  the  Supreme Head  of  the  गिरिजाघर  of  इंग्लैण्ड  .
Yet he remained  a  believer  in  core Catholic  theological   शिक्षाओं  , even after his excommunication  इससे  the  रोमन  Catholic Church  .
Henry  oversaw  the  विधिक   संघ  of England and  वेल्स  with  the   कानून   in  Wales Acts 1535 and 1542  .
In  1513   ,   the  new  किंग  allied  साथ   the  Holy Roman Emperor , Maximillian  i  , and  invaded   फ़्रांस  in  1513   साथ   a   विशाल   ,  well-equipped army  ,  but achieved  छोटी   at  a  considerable   वित्तीय  cost .
Maximillian , for his  भाग  ,  प्रयुक्त  the English  आक्रमण   to   उसके   अपना   ends  ,  और  this  prejudiced  England  's   क्षमता   to  defeat the French  .
This  foray   होता   prove  the  प्रारंभ  of an obsession for  हेनरी  , who invaded  again  in 1544  .
This time  ,  Henry  's   शक्तियां  captured  the  important city of Boulogne  ,   लकिन  again the  पावन   रोमन  Emperor ,  चार्ल्स  V  ,  supported  हेनरी   तभी   as   long   as  he  needed  to and  इंग्लैण्ड  ,  strained   by   the   विशाल  cost of the  युद्ध   ,   ransomed  the city  वापस   लिये  peace  .
उसके   contemporaries  considered Henry  in  his  प्रधान  to be  an   आकर्षक   ,   शिक्षित   और  accomplished  किंग  , and he has been  वर्णित  as  ``  one  of  the  सबसे   charismatic  rulers to  बैठना  on the  अंग्रेज़ी  throne  ''   .
Besides ruling with  निरपेक्ष  power ,  he  also engaged himself as an author  और   composer   .
His  ख्वाहिश  to  provide  England  साथ   a  male heir  –  which stemmed partly  इससे  personal  वैनिटी  and partly because  he   believed   a   बेटी  would be unable  to  consolidate the  ट्यूडर   राजवंश   और  the fragile peace that  existed   following  the  युद्धों   of  the Roses – led to  the   दो  things  लिये  which  हेनरी  is  सबसे  remembered  :   उसके   छह  marriages  और   the  English  reformation   .
हेनरी   became  morbidly  मोटे  and his health suffered  ,  contributing  to   उसके   मौत  in 1547 .
He is frequently characterised  in  his later life  as  a lustful , egotistical ,  हर्ष   ,   और   असुरक्षित  king .
Bongos  (   स्पेनी   :  bongó  )  are an  afro-cuban   percussion   यंत्र   .
The drums are  of  different  आकार  : the larger drum  is   पुकारा  in Spanish  the  hembra  (  female  )  and  the  smaller the macho (  पुरूष  ) .
They are membranophones  ,   or  instruments that create  ध्वनि   by   a   स्पंदन  of a  stretched  membrane .
Different religious  समूह  include  अलग   किताबे  in their  biblical  canons  ,   in  varying orders ,  और   sometimes  divide  or  combine books  ,  or  चरितार्थ   अतिरिक्त  material  into   canonical  books .
ईसाई  Bibles range  इससे  the sixty-six  किताबे  of the  प्रोटोस्टेंट   canon  to the eighty-one books  of   the  Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church canon  .
the  Hebrew Bible  ,   or   tanakh  ,  contains  twenty-four books  विभाजित   into   तीन  parts  ;  the five books of the  तोरा  ( `` teaching  ''  or ``  विधि  '' )  ,  the  nevi'im   (  ``  नबियों   ''   )  ,  और  the  ketuvim   (   ``  writings  ''   )   .
the   पहला   भाग  of Christian Bibles is the Old  वसीयत  , which  contains   ,  at minimum ,  the   twenty-four  books of  the  Hebrew  बाइबल   विभाजित   into   thirty-nine  books and  ordered  differently  इससे   the  Hebrew  बाइबल   .
The Catholic  गिरिजाघर   और  Eastern  ईसाई  churches also  थाम  certain  deuterocanonical  books and passages  to  be part of the Old Testament  canon  .
The second part  is   the  New  वसीयत   ,  containing  twenty-seven  books ; the  चार   canonical  gospels  ,  Acts of the  रसूलों   ,   twenty-one   epistles  or letters  और  the Book  of   रहस्योद्घाटन  .
The Eastern Orthodox , Oriental Orthodox and Eastern Catholic churches may have  नाबालिग  differences  in  their  सूचियाँ  of  स्वीकृत  books .
the  list given  यहाँ  for these  चर्च  is  the  most  समावेशी  :  if  at least one  पूर्वी  church accepts the  किताब  it  is  included  यहाँ  .
The national  ध्वज  of the  संयुक्त  States of America  ,  often simply referred to  as   the  American flag , consists of thirteen  बराबर   आड़ा  stripes of red ( top and bottom ) alternating with white , with  a  blue rectangle  in  the canton  (  referred  to  specifically  as   the   ``  union '' )  bearing  fifty small ,  श्वेत  ,  five-pointed  stars  arranged   in   नौ  offset horizontal rows of six stars  (  top and bottom ) alternating  साथ   पंक्ति  of  पाँच  stars  .
the  50  सितारों  on the  ध्वज  represent  the  50 states of the  संयुक्त  States  of  America and  the   13  stripes represent  the  thirteen British colonies that  घोषित  independence  इससे   the  Kingdom  of  Great  ब्रिटेन  and became the first states in  the   संघ   .
nicknames  for the  ध्वज  include the ``  सितारों  and  धारियाँ  '' ,  ``  Old  महिमा  `` ,  और  `` The  star-spangled  Banner .  ''
Dred Scott  v.  Sandford ,  ,  also  ज्ञात  as the Dred Scott Decision  ,  was a  लैंडमार्क   निर्णय  by  the  U.S. Supreme Court  .
It made two  प्रमुख  rulings  .
The  पहला  ruling  थी  that African-Americans were  नहीं   नागरिकों  , and  इसलिए  had no standing  to  sue in  संघीय  court .
The second ruling was that the federal government had no power to regulate slavery in  कोई  territory acquired subsequent  to  the creation  of  the United  राज्य  .
दिए  the first ruling , most  विद्वानों   और  many contemporary  राजनैतिक   आंकड़े   (   सहित   the   नेतृत्व   of  the  then-new   रिपब्लिकन  Party ) considered that  the  second ruling  थी  not  बाइंडिंग  precedent , but  mere   कहावत  .
The rationale of the Supreme Court  regarding   the  jurisdictional ruling  implied   कि   लोगों   of  African  descent   (  both  स्लेव   और   फ़्री  )  यहूद   नहीं   सुरक्षित  by the  संविधान   और  were not U.S.  नागरिकों   .
Since  ड्योढ़ी  of the 14th  amendment   to  the U.S.  संविधान   ,   दोनो  rulings are superseded and no  longer   मान्य  precedent .
nonetheless  , the case  retains  historical  significance  as it is widely  regarded  as the worst  निर्णय  ever  बना  by  the  Supreme  अदालत   .
the  opinion of  the  court  ,  written  by   मुख्य   इंसाफ  Roger B.  taney   ,  stirred debate  .
The decision  थी  7–2 , and  प्रत्येक  Justice  besides   taney  wrote  a  separate concurrence  or  dissent .
For  the  first  समय  since Marbury v. Madison  ,  the  अदालत   आयोजित  an Act  of  Congress  to   be  unconstitutional  .
Dred  स्कॉट  ,  an  African-American slave  ,  had asked a United States  सर्किट  Court to  पुरस्कार   उसे  his  स्वतंत्रता  because  he   और  his master  था  resided  in   a   राज्य  ( Illinois ) and a  territory   (  Wisconsin Territory  )  where slavery had  महरूम   बैन   .
Chief  इंसाफ  Roger  taney  , writing  लिये  the court  ,  held  कि  Scott  ,  as a person  of  African ancestry ,  थी   नहीं  a citizen of the United States and therefore had no right  to  sue in federal  अदालत  .
इस   पकड़कर   थी  contrary to  the  practice  of   numerous  states at the time ,  विशेषकर   फ़्री  states  ,  where  फ़्री  blacks did  in  fact  आनंद   the   अधिकारों   of  citizens  ,  such  as  the right to vote and hold  पब्लिक  office  .
in  what is  sometimes  considered  mere   obiter  dictum  ,  the Court  गई  on  to  hold that Congress had no  प्राधिकार   to   prohibit  slavery in  संघीय   territories  because slaves  हैं  personal  प्रॉपर्टी   और  the Fifth Amendment to the  संविधान   protects  property owners against deprivation of their  प्रॉपर्टी   बगैर   due  process  of  law  .
in  reaching this decision ,  taney  had hoped to  settle   the  growing controversy surrounding slavery in  the  United  राज्य   ,  but it  था  the  विपरीत   प्रभाव   .
the  decision was  fiercely   debated   आरपार   the  country ,  as  perhaps  बेहतरीन   सरंचनाओं  by the Lincoln–Douglas debates of 1858  .
Abraham  lincoln  , the second-ever  रिपब्लिकन  nominee  लिये  President ,  थी   समर्थ   to   जीत  the presidential election in 1860  ;  the  stopping  of the further  विस्तार  of  गुलामी  was a key  रिपब्लिकन   पार्टी  plank .
the  decision played  an  important  भूमिका   in   the  timing  of   राज्य   secession  and  the  Civil War  ,  although it  is  extreme  to   कह  the decision  ``  caused  ''  the war  .
the   निर्णय   is  acknowledged  लिये  the influential role it  निभाई  in altering  the  national  राजनैतिक  landscape  :  it is credited  साथ   शुभारंभ  Abraham Lincoln’s national  राजनैतिक   करियर  and ultimately allowing for his  चुनाव  .
Although  the  Supreme Court has never explicitly overruled  the  Dred  स्कॉट  case , the Court  stated   in  the  slaughter-house   मामले  that  at  least one part  of  it  था   already  been overruled  by   the  Fourteenth  amendment   in  1868 , which  begins   by   stating  ,  ``   सब  persons born or  देशीयकृत   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   ,  and subject  to  the jurisdiction thereof  ,   हैं  citizens  of  the United  राज्य  and  of  the State wherein they  reside  .  ''
To  जिससे  the  अदालत  noted:
The  पहला  observation  we   have   to  make on this  clause   is  ,  कि  it puts  at  rest both  the  questions which we  stated   to   have  been the  विषय   of   मतभेद  of opinion .
it   declares  that persons may be citizens  of   the   संयुक्त   राज्य  without  लिहाज़   to   उनके   नागरिकता   of   a   particular  State , and  it   overturns  the Dred  स्कॉट   निर्णय   by  making  सब   व्यक्तियों   born  within the United  राज्य   और  subject  to   इसके   क्षेत्राधिकार   नागरिकों  of  the  United States .
वहीँ  are dozens of  पड़ोस  in Columbus  ,   ओहियो   .
Some are hard to  define   ,   as   वे  encompass  विशाल   क्षेत्रों  developed at  अलग   times—often  with sub-neighborhoods within them .
सीमायें  can also change based on popular understanding of the  क्षेत्रफल   ,   as  well  as   the  whims of the residents .

a   जीवविज्ञानी   is  a scientist  जो  studies living  जीवों  and their relationship to their environment .
Biologists  शामिल   in   मौलिक  research  attempt   to   discover  underlying  mechanisms  that govern how  जीवों  work  .
biologists  involved  in  applied research  attempt  to develop or improve medical , industrial or  agricultural  processes .
martinus  Willem  beijerinck   ,  a  वनस्पतिशास्त्री  and microbiologist
आधार   कूद  from  a   चट्टान   in  a  wingsuit  .
आधार  jumping  ,  also  sometimes   लिखा   as  B.A.S.E .  कूद   ,  is an activity where  भागीदार  jump  इससे  fixed objects  और   उपयोग  a parachute  to   ब्रेक  their fall .
``  आधार  ''  is  an acronym  कि  stands  लिये  four categories of  फिक्स्ड  objects from which one  can  jump  :   इमारतें  ,  एन्टेना  ,  spans   (  bridges  )   ,   और  earth ( cliffs  )  .
The British Shorthair is  a  domesticated cat  जिनकी   सुविधाएँ  make it a popular breed  in  cat  shows   .
it  has been the most popular breed  of  cat  पंजीकृत  by the  uk  's Governing  परिषद  of the Cat  फैंसी   (   gccf   )   चूंकि  2001 ,  जब  it  overtook  the  पारसी  breed  .
the  USA Basketball Men  's  Senior National Team , commonly  ज्ञात  as the United  राज्य   मेन   's   नेशनल   बास्केट  team  ,  represents the United States of America in  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  men  's   बास्केट   .
The USA is the most  कामयाब   टोली  in international competition , winning  medals  in  सब   सत्रह   ओलम्पिक   tournaments  it has entered ,  coming  away with  चौदह   golds   .
Two  of  its gold medal-winning squads were inducted  to  the Naismith Memorial Basketball  हॉल  of Fame as teams in August 2010—the 1960  टोली   ,   जिससे   प्रदर्शित  six Hall of Famers  (  4  खिलाड़ी   ,  2 coaches ) , and the 1992 `` Dream Team ''  ,   featuring   14  Hall  of  Famers  (   11  players ,  3  coaches )  .
the  United States is currently ranked  पहला  in the FIBA  संसार  Rankings .
Traditionally composed  of  amateur players  ,  a 1989 rule change  by   fiba  allowed  यूएसए   बास्केट   to  field  टीमों  with  पेशेवर  players  .
the   पहला  such  टोली  ,  ज्ञात   as  the `` Dream  टोली   ''  , won the gold  पदक   at  the  1992  Summer Olympics in  बार्सिलोना   ,   स्पेन   ,  playing  in   the   फाइनल   विरूद्ध   क्रोएशिया  .
With  the  introduction of professionals , the  टोली  was  समर्थ   to  spark  a  second run of  दबदबा  after  capturing   तभी   a  bronze  पदक   in  1988 .
A team  of  professional  खिलाड़ी   competed   at  the 1994  fiba   संसार  Championship , finishing  पहला  .
in  1996 , 2000 , 2008  ,   और   2012   the  USA  again  captured gold  medals  .
Facing increased competition ,  the   यूएसए  failed to win a medal at  the  2002 FIBA World Championship  ,  finishing sixth  .
The  2004  Summer Olympic  टोली  lost  तीन  games on  इसके  way  to   a  bronze  पदक  , a record that represented  अधिक  losses in  a   सिंगल  year  than   the  country 's  ओलम्पिक  teams had suffered in all  पिछला  Olympiads combined  .
Determined  to  put an  समाप्त   to  these  असफलताओं   ,  USA Basketball initiated a long-term project aimed  at  creating  बेहतर  , more  cohesive  teams .
The USA  जीती  its first  सात  games  at   the  2006 FIBA  संसार   चैंपियनशिप   in   जापानी  before losing  विरूद्ध   यूनानियों   in  the semi-finals  ,   समाप्ति  the  प्रतियोगिता   साथ  the bronze medal .
The  यूएसए  won  सुनहरा   दो  years later , though , at  the  2008  गर्मियाँ  Olympics with  a  dominant performance .
This success  थी  followed up at the 2010 FIBA World  चैंपियनशिप  , where despite  क्षेत्ररक्षण   a  roster  featuring  no  खिलाड़ी   इससे  the  2008  Olympic team  ,  the  यूएसए   किया  not  खोना   a  single  खेल  en route  to  defeating host Turkey for the  सुनहरा  medal .
the   यूएसए   जारी  this streak of  दबदबा   by  going undefeated and capturing  सुनहरा  once  अधिक  at  the   2012  Summer Olympics .
The  स्टीलर्स  Super Bowl XL ring
Joe  theismann   's   सुपर  Bowl Ring ( right  )
The  सुपर  Bowl  रिंग  is  an   पुरस्कार  in the  नेशनल  Football League given  to  the  विजेता  of  the  league  's  annual  संसार   चैंपियनशिप  game , the Super Bowl .
Since  तभी  one Vince  लोम्बार्डी   ट्रॉफी   is  awarded to the  टोली  (  स्वामित्व  ) itself ,  the  Super  कटोरी   रिंग   offers  a collectible memento  लिये   the  actual  खिलाड़ी  and  टोली   सदस्यों   to   रखना  for themselves to symbolize  the  victory .
