The Witch  's  Finger in  the   carlsbad  Caverns
A  stalagmite   (  or ;  इससे  the Greek σταλαγμίτης - stalagmitês , from  σταλαγμίας  -  stalagmias  , `` dropping , trickling  ''  )  is   a  type  of   speleothem   कि   उदय  from the  मंजिल  of a limestone cave  due  to the dripping of  mineralized   समाधान  and the deposition  of   कैल्सियम  carbonate .
इस  stalagmite formation  occurs  only under  निश्चित  pH  शर्तें   भीतर   the  underground  cavern  .
the  corresponding formation  on   the  ceiling of a  गुफा   is  known as  a  stalactite .
if   ये   formations  grow together  ,   the  result is known as a column .
the   हॉल  of Giants  in  the Carlsbad  caverns
Stalagmites should normally not  be  touched  ,   चूंकि  the rock buildup is  formed  by minerals precipitating out  of  the  जल   समाधान  onto  the   बूढ़ा   सतह  ;  स्किन  oils can alter the surface  जहाँ   the  mineral  जल  will  चिपकी   ,  thus  affecting   the   विकास  of the formation .
oils  and dirt from  इंसान   सम्पर्क  can also stain the formation  और  change its  रंग  permanently .
Similar structures can also form in  लावा   tubes  , associated with some  प्रकार  of lavacicles ,  हालांकि  the  यांत्रिकी  of  गठन  is very different  .
Stalactites and  stalagmites   can  also  रूप   on  concrete ceilings and floors , although they form  much   अधिक  rapidly  वहीँ  than  in   the  natural cave  पर्यावरण   .
The  largest  stalagmite in  the  world  is   ऊँची  and  is  located  in   the   गुफा   of   cueva   मार्टिन  Infierno  ,  Cuba .
In  the  Zagros  kyu   of  south  इरान  , approximately  इससे   the   प्राचीन  city of Bishapur , in  the  Shapur cave on the fourth of  पाँच   बरामदा  stands  the  3rd century CE  प्रतिमा   of  Shapur I  ,   दूसरी  ruler  of  the Sassanid Empire .
The  प्रतिमा  , carved from  एक  stalagmite , is  nearly   ऊँची   .
How I Met Your Mother is  an  American sitcom  कि  premiered on CBS on September 19  ,  2005  .
the  show was  निर्मित  by Craig Thomas  और   कार्टर  Bays .
कैसा  I Met  अपना   माँ  is  framed  by the  साल  2030  ,  when Ted  mosby  ( voiced by Bob Saget  )   gathers  his  बेटी  (  lyndsy   fonseca  )  और   बेटे  ( David Henrie ) to tell them the story of how  he  met their mother  .
We flashback to where it  begins  in  2005  with Ted  mosby  ( Josh Radnor ) as  a  single  ,  27-year-old  वास्तु  living with his two  बेहतरीन  friends from  wesleyan  University , Marshall Eriksen (  जेसन  Segel ) , a  विधि  student , and Lily Aldrin  (  Alyson  हनिंगन  ) , a kindergarten  टीचर  , who have  महरूम  dating for almost nine years when Marshall proposes  .
उनके   सगाई  causes Ted  to   सोचो   परिचय  finding  उसके  own soul  mate   ,  much to the disgust  of   उसके  friend Barney Stinson  (  Neil Patrick Harris  )   ,   a  womanizer  साथ   an  unnamed corporate  जॉब   .
और  thus , Ted begins  उसके  search  लिये  his perfect  mate  ,  और  meets  रोबिन  Scherbatsky  (  Cobie Smulders ) , whom he  भी   befriends  .
The  100th  episode of  कैसा   i  Met  अपना   माँ   aired   on  January 11  ,  2010 .
On  दिसम्बर   21   ,   2012  ,  the   श्रेणी  was  नवीनीकृत  for a ninth season .
On January 30 , 2013 , it was  घोषित  that Season 9 will be  इसके  final season .
Gringo ( , , )  is  a slang Spanish  और   पुर्तगाली  word used in Ibero-America , to  denote  foreigners  ,  often  इससे   the  United  राज्य  .
the  term  can  be applied to someone who  is  actually a foreigner , or  it   can  denote a  दमदार   संघ  or  सम्मिलन   into   विदेशी  ( particularly  us  ) society and  संस्कृति   .
In Spanish it does not have a negative connotation .
रोजर  Axtell ,  a   सफर   तहज़ीब  expert , notes  कि  ``  [  t ] he word gringo  is   नहीं   necessarily   a  bad word .
It is slang  लकिन  is  अपमानजनक   तभी  in its use and context .  ''
The  शब्द   थी  used in  स्पेन   long  before  it  crossed  the  Atlantic to  denote   विदेशी  , non-native  अध्यक्षों  of Spanish .
the  great white  शार्क   ,  Carcharodon carcharias , also known as the  ग्रेट  white , white pointer ,  श्वेत   शार्क  ,  or  white  मौत   ,   is   a   प्रजाति  of  विशाल   lamniform  shark  जिससे   can  be found in the coastal surface waters of all  the  major  महासागर   .
The great white shark is mainly  ज्ञात   लिये  its size  ,   साथ   the  largest individuals  ज्ञात  to have approached or exceeded in  लंबाई   ,   और  in  वज़न  .
This shark reaches its  परिपक्वता  around 15 years  of   आयु   और  can have a  जीवन   स्पैन  of over 30  सालो   .
The great  श्वेत   शार्क   is   arguably   the   संसार  's largest known extant  macropredatory  fish ,  और   is   एक   of  the primary predators of marine  स्तनधारियों  .
It  is  also  ज्ञात   to   शिकार  upon  a   किस्में  of  अन्य  marine  पशु   ,  including fish and  seabirds   .
It  is   the  only known  surviving  species of  इसके   genus  Carcharodon , and  is  ranked  पहला   in   having  the most attacks on  इंसानो   .
The  आईयूसीएन  list the great  श्वेत  shark  as  a vulnerable species , while it is  शामिल  in Appendix  ii   of   cites   .
The bestselling novel Jaws by  पीटर  Benchley  और   the  subsequent blockbuster  फिल्मी  by  स्टीवन   स्पिलबर्ग  depicted  the  great white shark as  a  `` ferocious man eater  ``  .
in   वास्तविकता   ,   इंसानो   हैं  not the preferred prey of the  ग्रेट  white shark .
the  United  राज्य  Armed Forces  हैं   the   सैन्य  forces  of   the  United States of  अमेरिका   .
वे   consist   of  the  फौज   ,   नेवी  , Marine  corps  ,  एयर   फ़ोर्स  , and Coast  गार्ड   .
The U.S.  रै  a  दमदार  tradition of civilian  कंट्रोल  of  the   सैन्य  .
The  अध्यक्ष   is   the  military 's  overall  head , and helps form military  नीति  with  the  U.S.  विभाग  of Defense ( DoD )  ,   a  federal  कार्यपालिका  department ,  एक्टिंग   as   the  principal  अंग  by which military policy is  carried  out  .
The  dod  is headed  by  the Secretary of  रक्षा  ,  जो   is  a civilian and Cabinet member .
the  Defense  सचिव  is second in the military 's  कड़ी  of  कमांड  ,  बस  below the President  ,  and serves  as   the  principal  सहायक  to the President  in   सब  DoD-related  matters  .
To coordinate military action with  कूटनीति   ,  the  अध्यक्ष  has an advisory  नेशनल  Security  परिषद  headed by a National  सुरक्षा  Advisor .
Both the  अध्यक्ष   और  Secretary  of   रक्षा  are advised by a  seven-member   संयुक्त   chiefs   of  Staff , which includes  the  head of each  of   the  Defense Department  's  service  शाखाओं  as  खूब   as  the  मुख्य  of the National Guard  ब्यूरो   .
Leadership is provided  by  the Chairman of the  संयुक्त   chiefs  of  स्टाफ  and  the   वाइस  Chairman  of  the  संयुक्त  Chiefs of  स्टाफ  .
the  Commandant of  the   coast   गार्ड   is   नहीं  a member of  the  Joint  chiefs   of   स्टाफ  .
सब   of  the  शाखाओं   कार्य   साथ  during operations  और   संयुक्त   मिशन   ,   अंतर्गत   the  Unified Combatant Commands  ,  under  the  authority of the Secretary of Defense with  the   एक्सेप्शन   of   the  Coast  गार्ड   .
The Coast  गार्ड   जलप्रपात  under the  प्रशासन   of  the  विभाग   of  Homeland  सुरक्षा  and receives its  operational  orders  इससे   the  Secretary of  मातृभूमि  Security .
the   coast   गार्ड  may be transferred to  the  Department  of   the  Navy  by  the  अध्यक्ष  or Congress  दौरान  a time of war .
All five armed  सेवाएं   हैं   among   the   सात  uniformed  सेवाएं   of   the  United  राज्य  ;  the  others are the  u.S.  Public Health Service  commissioned   corps   और  the  नेशनल  Oceanic and  वायुमंडलीय   प्रशासन   commissioned   corps  .
From  the  time  of  its  inception  , the military  निभाई   a   निर्णायक  role in the  इतिहास   of  the  संयुक्त  States  .
A sense of  नेशनल  unity  और  identity  थी  forged as  a   परिणाम   of   विजय  in  the   पहला  Barbary War and the  दूसरी  Barbary War  .
Even so ,  the   संस्थापकों  were suspicious  of  a permanent military  फ़ोर्स  and not  जबतक   the   outbreak  of  संसार  War II  किया   a  large  खड़ा  army become officially established .
The National  सुरक्षा  Act of 1947 , adopted following World  युद्ध   ii   और  during  the  Cold War 's  onset   ,  created the modern  u.S.  military  फ्रेमवर्क   ;   the  Act merged previously  cabinet-level  Department of War and the Department  of   the   नेवी  into  the  National Military Establishment  (   renamed   the  Department of Defense  in  1949 )  ,  headed by  the   सचिव  of  रक्षा   ;  and  निर्मित   the  Department of the Air Force and National Security Council .
The U.S.  सैन्य  is  एक  of  the  largest  militaries   in   शर्तें  of number of personnel  .
It  draws  its  जनशक्ति  from a  विशाल  pool of  सशुल्क   स्वयंसेवक   ;  although conscription  रै  been used in the past in  विभिन्न   टाइम्स  of  दोनो   युद्ध  and  सलाम  ,  it   रै  not been used since 1972 .
as  of 2013 , the U.S. spends about $  554.2  billion annually  to  fund its  सैन्य  forces , and appropriates approximately $  88.5   अरब   to   निधि   विदेशी   आकस्मिकता  Operations .
Put together ,  the   u.S.  constitutes roughly  43  percent  of  the  संसार   's   सैन्य  expenditures .
the  U.S. Armed Forces  as   a  whole  possess  large  quantities   of   उन्नत  and powerful equipment , along with  फैली  placement of forces around  the  world , giving  उन्हें   significant  capabilities in  दोनो  defense and power projection  .
Freedom  of  speech  is  the political  सही   to  communicate one  's   राय   और  ideas  using  one 's body  और   प्रॉपर्टी  to anyone who is  willing  to  प्राप्त   उन्हें  .
The term  स्वतंत्रता  of  अभिव्यक्ति  is sometimes used  synonymously  , but  शामिल  any act of seeking ,  receiving   और  imparting  सूचना  or ideas , regardless of the  मीडियम  used  .
in   अभ्यास   ,  the  सही  to freedom of speech  is   नहीं  absolute  in   कोई  country  और   the  right  is   commonly   विषय  to limitations , as  साथ   मानहानि  , slander ,  obscenity  , sedition  (  including , for example  inciting  ethnic hatred ) ,  कापीराइट  violation , revelation of information that is  वर्गीकृत   or  otherwise  .
The  सही   to   स्वतंत्रता  of expression is recognized as  a  human right  अंतर्गत   आलेख  19  of   the   सार्वभौमिक  Declaration of  इंसान   अधिकारों  and recognized in  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   इंसान  rights  विधि   in  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Covenant on Civil  और   राजनैतिक   अधिकारों   (   iccpr  ) .
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone  shall   have  the right  to  hold opinions without  हस्तक्षेप  '' and ``  everyone   shall   have  the  सही   to  freedom of  अभिव्यक्ति  ; this right  shall  include freedom  to   तलाश  ,  प्राप्त  and  impart   सूचना   और   विचार   of  all kinds  ,  regardless of frontiers ,  either   orally  , in writing or in print , in  the   रूप   of  art ,  or  through any other media of  उसके   चुनाव   ''  .
आलेख   19   goes   on  to  कह  that the exercise of these rights  carries  `` special duties  और  responsibilities `` and  may   ``   इसलिए  be subject to  निश्चित  restrictions  ''   जब  necessary  ``  [ f ] or respect of the rights or reputation  of  others ''  or  ``  [  f ] or the  सुरक्षा  of national security or  of   पब्लिक  order  (  order public  )  ,  or   of  public health  or  morals  ''   .
Freedom of  वाक   may  be  legally   curtailed   in   कुछ  religious legal systems and  in   धर्मनिरपेक्ष   jurisdictions  where it is  मिला  to cause  धार्मिक  offense , such as the British  जातिगत   और   धार्मिक  Hatred  अधिनियम  2006 .
The Big Bang Theory logo  .
The Big  बंग   सिद्धान्त   is   an  American  कॉमेडी  television series created and executive  उत्पादित  by  चक  Lorre and  विधेयक   prady  .
Like the  नाम   of   the  series itself  ,   साथ  the  एक्सेप्शन   of   the  first  episode—  ''  पायलट  '' —episode titles  of   the  Big Bang  सिद्धान्त  always  प्रारंभ   साथ  `` The  ''  and resemble  the  name  of   a   वैज्ञानिक  principle ,  सिद्धान्त  or  प्रयोग  , whimsically referencing a plot point  or  quirk .
,   133   एपीसोड   have   aired  .
the  Big  बंग   सिद्धान्त  has been  नवीनीकृत   लिये  a seventh season  .
Dwight David ``  आइक  ''  आइज़नहावर   (  pronounced  ,  ; October  14  ,  1890   –  March 28  ,   1969   )  was  the   34th  President of the  संयुक्त  States  इससे   1953  until  1961  .
he   था   previously   महरूम   a   five-star  general in  the  United States Army during World War  ii  and served as Supreme  कमांडर   of   the   अलाइड  Forces  in  Europe ;  he  had responsibility for  नियोजन   और  supervising the invasion  of  North  अफ़्रीकी  in Operation Torch in 1942–43 and the  कामयाब  invasion of France and Germany in  1944–45   इससे  the Western Front  .
In 1951 , he  became  the  पहला  supreme  कमांडर  of NATO  .
आइज़नहावर  was of Pennsylvania Dutch  ancestry   और  was reared in  a  large family  in  Kansas by parents with a  मजबूत  work ethic and religious  पृष्ठभूमि  .
As one of six  बेटे   ,  he was conditioned  by   a  competitive  माहौल  which instilled self-reliance  .
He attended and  ग्रैजुएट   इससे  West Point and later married and had two sons .
बाद  World War II  ,  Eisenhower served as  फौज  Chief of Staff  अंतर्गत   अध्यक्ष   हैरी  S.  ट्रूमैन  , then  assumed   the   पोस्ट   of   अध्यक्ष  at Columbia  विश्वविद्यालयों  .
आइज़नहावर  entered the 1952 presidential  रेस  as a Republican to  काउंटर  the non-interventionism of Senator Robert  A.   taft   और   to  crusade against `` Communism ,  कोरियाई  and corruption ''  .
He  जीती  by  a  landslide , defeating  डेमोक्रेट   adlai   stevenson  and  समाप्ति  two decades  of  the New  सौदे  Coalition  .
in  the first  साल   of   उसके  presidency , Eisenhower deposed the leader  of  Iran in  the  1953 Iranian coup d'état and  प्रयुक्त   नाभिकीय   खतरे  to  conclude  the  कोरियाई   युद्ध   साथ  China .
His New Look  नीति   of  nuclear deterrence gave priority to inexpensive nuclear weapons while reducing the  funding   लिये   conventional   सैन्य  forces ; the goal was to keep pressure on  the   सोवियत   संघ   और  reduce federal deficits .
in  1954 , Eisenhower first  articulated  the domino theory in his  वर्णन  of  the   threat  presented  by  the  स्प्रेड  of communism .
the  Congress agreed to  उसके   निवेदन   in  1955 for the Formosa  रेज़ोल्यूशन  ,  जिससे  enabled him  to   prevent  Chinese communist  आक्रामकता  against  चाइनीज   राष्ट्रवादियों   और   स्थापित  the  u.S.  policy of  defending  Taiwan .
जब  the Soviets launched  sputnik  in 1957  ,  he  था  to play  catch-up   in  the  स्पेस  race .
Eisenhower forced  इसराईल   ,  the UK , and France to end their invasion  of  Egypt during the  स्वेज  Crisis of 1956 .
In  1958   ,  he sent 15,000 US troops  to  Lebanon to prevent  the   pro-western   सरकारी   इससे  falling to  a  Nasser -inspired revolution  .
निकट  the  समाप्त  of his term  ,   उसके   प्रयत्न   to   नियत  up  a  summit  बैठक   साथ   the   soviets   collapsed   क्युकी  of the  u-2   घटना   .
on  the domestic front  ,  he covertly  opposed  Joseph  मैकार्थी   और  contributed to the end  of  McCarthyism  by  openly invoking the  आधुनिक  expanded version of executive  विशेषाधिकार  .
He  वरना  left  सबसे  political  कार्यकलाप   to  his Vice  अध्यक्ष  ,  रिचर्ड  Nixon .
He  थी  a  मॉडरेट   रूढ़िवादी  who continued New Deal agencies and expanded  सोशल  Security .
among  his  enduring  innovations  ,  he  शुभारम्भ   the  Interstate Highway System  ;   the   रक्षा   उन्नत  Research Projects Agency (  darpa  ) , which  led   to   the   अंतरजाल   ,  among many invaluable outputs ; the  नेशनल   aeronautics   और  Space  प्रशासन   (  NASA  )  ,  ड्राइविंग   शांतिपूर्ण  discovery  in  space ;  the  establishment  of  strong science education via the  नेशनल   रक्षा  Education  अधिनियम  ;  और  encouraging peaceful use of  नाभिकीय  power  via   amendments   to  the  परमाणु   उर्जा   अधिनियम  .
In  सोशल   नीति  , he sent  संघीय   सैनिकों  to Little Rock  ,   अरकंसास   ,   लिये   the   पहला   समय   चूंकि   पुनर्निर्माण  to  enforce  federal  अदालत   आदेश  to  desegregate  public schools .
he  also signed  सिविल  rights  विधान   in   1957  and 1960  to  protect the right  to  vote .
he  implemented  desegregation  of the armed forces in  दो   सालो   और  made five appointments  to   the  Supreme Court .
he   थी  the  पहला   term-limited  president in  accordance  with  the  22nd  amendment  .
Eisenhower 's two terms were peaceful  ones  for the  सबसे   भाग   और  saw considerable economic prosperity  मगर  for a sharp recession  in  1958–59  .
Eisenhower  is   प्रायः  ranked  अत्यधिक   among   the   u.S.   राष्ट्रपतियों   .
एयर  Force One is the  आधिकारिक   एयर  traffic  कंट्रोल   कॉल  sign  of   a   संयुक्त  States  एयर  Force  वायुयान  carrying the President of  the  United States .
In common parlance the term refers to those  एयर   फ़ोर्स   वायुयान  specifically  designed  , built  ,   और  used for the  purpose   of  transporting the president  .
The  अध्यक्षीय  aircraft is  a   prominent  symbol of the  अमरीकी  presidency and its  शक्ति   .
the   विचार   of   designating  specific  सैन्य   वायुयान  to transport the  अध्यक्ष  arose in 1943 ,  जब   officials   of  the United States Army  एयर   शक्तियां   –  the predecessor  to   the  U.S.  एयर   फ़ोर्स  –  became   चिंतित  with relying  on  commercial airlines to transport the  अध्यक्ष  .
a  C-87 Liberator Express  थी  reconfigured for use as a presidential transport  ;  however , it  थी   अस्वीकृत  by the Secret  सेवा  amid concerns over  the   वायुयान  's safety record .
a   c-54  Skymaster was then  परिवर्तित   लिये   अध्यक्षीय  use  ;  this  वायुयान  ,  उतावले  the Sacred  गाय  , transported President  फ्रैंकलिन  D. Roosevelt to  the  Yalta  सम्मेलन  in  फ़रवरी   1945  , and  थी   subsequently   प्रयुक्त  for  another  two  सालो  by President Harry S. Truman  .
the  ``  एयर  Force One  ''  call sign was created  बाद  a  1953  incident during  जिससे  a  उड़ान   carrying   अध्यक्ष   ड्वाइट  D. Eisenhower entered  the  same airspace as a commercial airline  उड़ान   using  the  वही   कॉल   चिह्न   .
अनेक  aircraft have  महरूम   प्रयुक्त  as Air  फ़ोर्स  One since the  सृष्टि  of  the   अध्यक्षीय  fleet , including two Boeing  707s  introduced  in   the   1960s   और   1970s   ,   क्रमशः  ;  चूंकि   1990   ,  the presidential  बेड़े  has  consisted  of two Boeing VC-25As – specifically  विन्यस्त  ,  अत्यधिक   customized  Boeing 747-200B  श्रेणी  aircraft  .
The Air  फ़ोर्स  is looking  into   replacing   the  two VC-25 aircraft  साथ  three replacement aircraft beginning in  2017   .
A  विवाह   वर्षगांठ  is  the   वर्षगांठ  of the date  a  wedding took  प्लेस  .
परंपरागत  names exist  लिये   सबसे  of  उन्हें   :  for instance  ,   50  years  of   विवाह  is called a ``  सुनहरी   विवाह  anniversary  ''   or   बस   a   ``   सुनहरी   वर्षगांठ   ''  .
A  स्कैनर  with  duplexing  Automatic Document  फीडर  .
in  multifunction or  all-in-one   मुद्रक   ,  fax machines  ,  photocopiers and  scanners  , an  स्वचालित  document  फीडर  or  adf  is a feature  जिससे  takes  अनेक  pages and  फ़ीड्स  the  पेपर   एक  page  at  a time into a  स्कैनर  or  कॉपियर  ,  allowing  the  उपयोक्ता   to   स्कैन   ,   और   thereby  copy  ,  print ,  or  fax , multiple-page  दस्तावेज़   बगैर  having  to   हस्तचालित  replace each  पेज   .
सबसे   copiers   allow   स्कैनिंग  on the  फ्लैटबेड   or   platen   (   the   ``  glass ''  )   or  through  a  document feeder  .
The  विशाल  majority of fax  मशीने  have an  adf  ,  allowing  the unattended sending of multi-page  faxes  .
Due  to   the  ubiquity of ADF  in  fax machines  ,  some fax machine owners use the  फैक्स   यंत्र   as   a   स्कैनर  , faxing  multi-page  documents to  themselves  .
दस्तावेज़  feeders are described by speed , in  पृष्ठों   प्रति  minute  or  ppm , and  क्षमता   ,  usually in a range from 10 sheets to 200  .
There are  दो  kinds  of   दस्तावेज़  feeders capable of two-sided ( duplex  )  scanning  :   a   reversing   स्वचालित   दस्तावेज़   फीडर   or  RADF scans  एक   पक्ष  of a  पेज   ,  then flips it and  scans  the other  पक्ष  .
A duplexing automatic  दस्तावेज़   फीडर  or DADF scans both  पहलू   in  one  pass  .
the  advantage  of  the  dadf   is   तेज़  speed  लिये  two-sided  मूल  .
radfs  and  dadfs  are  रेटेड  in images  प्रति   मिनट  ( IPM ) , the number of  पहलू   वे  can scan each  मिनट   .
Fair Park is  a   recreational   और   शैक्षणिक  complex  स्तिथ  in  डलास  , Texas (  यूएसए  ) .
the   जटिल  is registered  as  a Dallas Landmark  ,   नेशनल  Historic  लैंडमार्क  and  is  home to  नौ   संग्रहालय  ,  छह  performance facilities , a lagoon ,  और   the  largest Ferris  व्हील  in North America  .
अनेक   of  the  इमारतें   on   the   जटिल  were  constructed  for the  टेक्सास   centennial  Exposition  in  1936 which  खींचा  over six million visitors .
Most  of   the   इमारतें  built for the exposition  स्टिल  survive and  it  is recognized  as   a   significant  example of Art Deco architecture  .
Fair  पार्क  has  महरूम   designated   a   ग्रेट  Place in  अमेरिका   by  the American Planning Association  .
The  अमरीकी   नियोजन  Association  (  APA  )   “is   an  independent ,  not-for-profit   शैक्षणिक  organization that provides  नेतृत्व  in the development  of   vital  communities.”
the  Great Places in  अमरीकी  program helps to celebrate areas  साथ  “exemplary character  ,  quality  ,  and planning.”
Being designated as  a  Great  प्लेस  in  अमेरिका  , Fair  पार्क  was one of  तभी   टेन  cities  चुनी  in 2011 .
San Jose (  ;  Spanish : St. Joseph  )  is the third-largest city in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,   the   tenth-largest  in the  u.S.  , and the  काउंटी  seat of Santa Clara  काउंटी   जिससे  is located at  the  southern end of  सैन   फ्रांसिस्को   खाड़ी  .
सैन  Jose is the largest  नगर  within Silicon  घाटी  , which is  a  major  घटक   of   the  greater San  फ्रांसिस्को   खाड़ी  Area ,  a  region of  8.4  million people and the fifth largest metropolitan area (  सीएसए  )  in  the United  राज्य  .
It  is  the  largest  city in Northern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
San Jose was  संस्थापित   on  November 29  ,   1777  ,  as  El Pueblo de San  जोस  de Guadalupe  ,  the  पहला   civilian  town  in   the  Spanish colony  of  Nueva  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,   जिससे   बाद  became Alta  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
The city  परोसा   as   a  farming  जातियाँ   to   support  Spanish military  संस्थापना   at  San Francisco  और  Monterey  .
When  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  gained statehood  in  1850  ,  San Jose served  as  its first  पूंजी   .
After  अधिक  than 150  सालो  as a  छोटी   खेती   नगर  ,  सैन   जोस  and the surrounding  सांता   क्लारा   घाटी  became  the  last ( and  largest  ) contiguous area of undeveloped land surrounding the  सैन  Francisco Bay .
San Jose  अनुभवी   increased  demand  लिये  housing  इससे   सैनिको  and  दिग्गजों  returning  इससे  World War II  .
San Jose  तब  continued its aggressive expansion  दौरान  the 1950s and  1960s  by annexing more land area  .
The rapid growth of  the  high-technology and electronics industries  further  accelerated  the  transition from an  agricultural   बीच   ,   to  an urbanized metropolitan area  .
By the  1990s   ,  San  जोस   's   स्थान   भीतर  the  booming  local technology  उद्योग  earned the city  इसके   उपनाम  , Capital  of  Silicon  घाटी  .
सैन  Jose now  maintains   वैश्विक  city status  और   is  the largest  नगर   in  the  सैन  Francisco Bay Area  in  terms  of   जनसांख्यिकी   ,  land  क्षेत्रफल   ,  and  औद्योगिक  development .
the  U.S. Census  ब्यूरो   reported  the population of the city  to  be 945,942 as of  the  2010  जनसांख्यिकी   .
as  of April  2013   ,  the  अनुमानित  population of San  जोस  was 984,000  .
San Jose  ,  along  साथ  the Santa  क्लारा  Valley , experienced about half a  सदी   of  spectacular suburban sprawl  ,  with  विशेषताएँ  of intense urbanization similar  to  the Los  एंजिल्स   क्षेत्रफल  of Southern California .
The city has taken  definite  steps to  avoid  becoming `` L.A.  उत्तर  ''  .
however   ,  the sprawl in  सैन  Jose  is   बदतर  than in Los Angeles by measures  ऐसे   as  population  घनत्व   और   पब्लिक  transit safety ,  निवेश  ,  और  ridership .
Europe  चित्रित  by  antwerp   cartographer  Abraham Ortelius in 1595
The history of Europe covers  the  people inhabiting  the   यूरोपीय  continent since it was  पहला  populated  in   प्रागैतिहासिक  times to  उपस्थित  , with the first  होमो  sapiens arriving between 45,000 and  25,000   bc  .
The earliest  settlers  to Prehistoric  यूरोपीय   आए   दौरान   the   paleolithic  era .
The arrival  of   कृषि  around 7000  bc   ushered   in   the   पाषाणकालीन   आयु  .
पाषाणकालीन  Europe lasted  लिये  4000 years ,  अतिव्यापी   साथ  metal-using cultures that gradually spread  throughout  the continent .
Technological advances  दौरान  the  प्रागैतिहासिक   आयु  tended  to  arrive from the  मध्य  East  ,   spreading  gradually to the  उत्तरपश्चिम  .
Some of the best-known  सभ्यताओं  of prehistoric Europe  यहूद  Minoan and Mycenaean , which  flourished  during  the   कांस्य  Age until they  collapsed   in  a short  काल  of  समय   around  1200 BC .
The  काल   ज्ञात  as  शास्त्रीय   प्राचीनता  began  साथ   the   वृद्धि  of  the  city-states  of  Ancient Greece .
Greek influence  पहुँचे  its zenith  अंतर्गत   the  expansive  साम्राज्य   of   सिकंदर  the Great , spreading throughout  एशिया   .
उत्तरी   और   पश्चिमी  Europe  यहूद  dominated  by  the  la  Tène culture  ,   a  precursor  to   the  Celts  .
Rome  ,  a small city-state traditionally founded in  753   bc   ,  would  grow  to  become   the  Roman Republic in  509   bc  and  होता  succeed  यूनानी  culture as the  प्रबल  Mediterranean civilization .
The  कार्यक्रम   of  the  नियम  of Julius Caesar  led   to  reorganization of  the  Republic  into  the Roman Empire .
The  साम्राज्य  was later divided by the emperor Diocletian into the Western and  पूर्वी  empires .
दौरान   the  later years of  the  Roman  साम्राज्य   ,  the Germanic  peoples  of  उत्तरी  Europe grew  in   शक्ति   और  repeated attacks led to the  पतन  of  the   पश्चिमी  Roman  साम्राज्य   in   ad  476 , a  तिथि  which traditionally  marks  the  समाप्त   of   the  classical  काल  and the start of  the   मध्य  Ages .
During  the  Middle Ages , the  पूर्वी   रोमन   साम्राज्य   बच  , though modern  इतिहासकारों  refer  to   इस  state as  the   बीज़ान्टिन   साम्राज्य  .
In Western  यूरोपीय  ,  germanic  peoples moved into positions of  शक्ति  in the remnants  of   the  former Western  रोमन   साम्राज्य  and established  kingdoms   और   empires  of their own .
of  all of the Germanic  peoples   ,  the  franks  would rise  to  a  स्थिति  of Hegemony over western Europe ,  the   frankish   साम्राज्य   reaching  its peak under  शारलेमेन   around  AD 800 .
Francia was divided  into  several parts ;  वेस्ट   francia  would evolve into  the  Kingdom  of   फ़्रांस  ,  जबकि  East Francia would  evolve   into  the  पावन  Roman Empire , a precursor  to  modern  जर्मनी  .
the  British Isles were  the  site of several large-scale migrations .
देशी  Celtic peoples had been marginalized during the  काल   of  Roman Britain  ,   और  when the Romans abandoned the British Isles during the  400s  , waves  of  Germanic  anglo-saxons   migrated  to  दक्षिणी  Britain  और  established a series of  क्षुद्र  kingdoms in  कया  would  आखिरकार  develop  into   the  Kingdom  of  England by  ad   927   .
During  इस   काल  , the  किंगडम  of Poland and Kingdom  of  Hungary  (  1000–1945  )  were organized as well .
the   viking  Age  ,  a  काल  of migrations of Scandinavian peoples , dominated the period from  the  late 700s to  the   मध्य  1000s  .
मुख्य  among  the  Viking states was the  साम्राज्य  of  cnut  the Great , a  डैनिश   नेता  who would  become   किंग  of England  ,   डेनमार्क  , and  नार्वे   .
The Normans  ,   a   viking  people  जो   settled  in Northern France and  संस्थापित  the Duchy of  normandy  , would have a  significant   प्रभाव  on  अनेक   भाग   of  Europe  ,   इससे  the Norman conquest of England  to   दक्षिणी  Italy and  सिसिली  .
another  Scandinavian people  ,  the Rus ' people , would  go  on to found Kievan Rus  '   ,  an early state which  थी   a  precursor  लिये  the  आधुनिक   देश   of  Russia .
as   the   viking  Age  खींचा  to a close ,  the   काल  known  as  the  क्रूसेड  , a series  of  religiously-motivated military  रिझाने  originally intended  to  bring  the  Levant back  into  Christian rule  ,   began  .
अनेक   जेहादी   राज्य  were  संस्थापित  in the  पूर्वी  Mediterranean  .
ये   यहूद   सब  short-lived .
the  Crusaders would  have   a  profound impact  on   अनेक  parts of Europe  .
उनके   बोरी  of Constantinople in  1204   brought  an abrupt  समाप्त   to  the Byzantine  साम्राज्य  .
विलुप्त   श्वान   breeds   is   a  compilation of  श्वान  breeds that have become  विलुप्त   .
Wii  बोलो  is  a   माइक्रोफोन  accessory  लिये  Nintendo 's  वी  video game  कंसोल  .
Connected to the console via USB  ,   the   यंत्र  can be  लगाई  near  the   वीडियो  display  ,  allowing  आवाज़  chat to  be  conducted  साथ  the entire room .
The device features  an   led   to  indicate  जब  the microphone is active .
Wii  बोलो  was  घोषित  at Nintendo 's  2008   e3  media  drug   .
it   थी  released separately and bundled  साथ  Animal Crossing  :  City Folk  on   नवम्बर   16   ,   2008   ,   in  North America , and was released on December 5 , 2008 , in Europe .
the  Wii Speak accessory  is  succeeded by  the  embedded  माइक्रोफोन   on   the   वी  U 's GamePad  नियंत्रक   .
निसान  Intelligent  key®
a  smart  कुंजी   is  an electronic access and authorization  प्रणाली  which is  उपलब्धियाँ   as   an   विकल्प   or  standard in several cars  .
It was first developed by Siemens  in  the  mid-1990s  and  introduced  by  mercedes-benz   अंतर्गत  the name `` Keyless Go '' in  1998   on  the  w220  S-Class  following  its  डिज़ाइन  patent filed by Daimler-Benz  on  May 17 , 1997  .
Univisión (  )  is a  spanish-language  television network in  the  United States .
The network is primarily dedicated for  लैटिन   अमरीकी  families who  reside   in   the  United States .
it  has the  largest  audience of  spanish-language  television viewers  in  the world according to Nielsen ratings  .
Randy Falco , (  सीईओ  as  of  June  29   ,   2011  ) COO ,  रै   महरूम   in   चार्ज   of   the  company since  the  departure of Univision Communications  अध्यक्ष  and CEO Joe Uva in  अप्रैल  2010  .
In recent years the network  रै  reached parity with  the  U.S.  's  five major English-language  टेलीविज़न  networks  ,  and is often a  दमदार   पांचवां  ,  outranking  The CW , with some  fourth-place   साप्ताहिक  placings  ,  and as  of   2012  , even  पहला   प्लेस  rankings for individual  कार्यक्रम   over  all five English networks  due  to the  संजाल  's  सतत  schedule  of   नई  telenovelas all  52  weeks of  the  year .
univisión   is  headquartered in New York  ,   और  has its  प्रमुख   studios   ,   उत्पादन   सुविधाएं   ,   और  operations in  doral  ,  फ्लोरिडा  , a suburb  of  Miami .
In  2009   ,  another  टेलीविज़न  studio  थी   घोषित  ,  univision   studios   ,   to   be   निर्मित   in   doral   .
univision  is  उपलब्धियाँ  on  केबल   और   उपग्रह   in   सबसे   of   the  country , with local stations  in  over 50 markets with large  हिस्पैनिक  and Latino populations and  a   नेशनल   केबल   संजाल   फीड   वितरित  in markets  बगैर  either  the  availability or the demand  लिये   a  locally-based  स्टेशन  .
Most of  ये  stations  एयर   पूरा  local news and  अन्य  local programming  in  addition to network  shows  ,  और  in major markets such  as  Los  एंजिल्स   ,  New York  ,   और  Miami  the   लोकल  newscasts carried  by  the  संजाल   's  owned-and-operated station (  o   &   o  ) stations are equally  प्रतिस्पर्धी   साथ  their English-language counterparts ratings-wise .
Univisión was acquired  on  March 29 , 2007 by  a   consortium  led by Haim  saban  's Saban Capital  समूह  (  जो   था  previously owned  the   एंटिटी   saban  Entertainment ) , TPG  पूंजी  ,  l.P.  , Providence Equity Partners  ,  Madison Dearborn Partners  ,  and Thomas  H.  Lee  साझेदार   लिये  $ 13.7 billion or  $   36.25   प्रति   share   प्लस  $ 1.4 billion in acquired debt  .
the   buyout  left the  कम्पनी   साथ   a  debt level  of  twelve  टाइम्स   इसके   सालाना   नकदी  flow ,  जिससे  was twice the norm  in  buyouts done  over  the previous  दो   सालो  .
Artist  's   धारणा  of a  आदिग्रह   डिस्क
the   गठन   और  of  the  Solar System  is  estimated to have begun 4.6  अरब  years  पहले  with the gravitational collapse of  a   छोटी  part  of   a  giant  आणविक  cloud .
सबसे  of the  collapsing  mass collected in the centre ,  forming  the Sun , while the rest flattened  into   a   आदिग्रह  disk out of which the  ग्रह  , moons ,  क्षुद्रग्रह   ,   और  other small Solar System bodies formed  .
This widely  स्वीकृत  model ,  ज्ञात  as the  nebular  hypothesis  ,  was  पहला  developed in the 18th century by Emanuel  swedenborg  ,  immanuel  Kant ,  और  Pierre-Simon Laplace .
Its subsequent  विकास   रै  interwoven a variety of scientific disciplines including astronomy  ,   भौतिकी   ,  geology  ,   और  planetary science  .
चूंकि  the dawn  of  the  स्पेस  age in the 1950s and the  डिस्कवरी  of  extrasolar   ग्रह   in   the   1990s   ,  the model  रै   महरूम   दोनो  challenged and refined to  खाता   लिये   नई   observations  .
the   सौर  System has  विकसित   considerably   चूंकि  its initial  गठन  .
Many moons have formed from circling  discs  of  गैस  and dust around their  जनक  planets ,  जबकि  other moons are thought to  have   formed   independently  and  बाद   महरूम   captured   by   उनके   ग्रह   .
Still others ,  as   the  Earth 's  चंद्रमा  , may  be  the result of giant collisions  .
Collisions between  लाशें  have occurred continually  up  to the  उपस्थित  day and have been central to the evolution of  the  Solar  प्रणाली   .
the   स्थितियाँ   of   the   ग्रह  often  shifted   ,  and planets  have   switched  places  .
This  ग्रहीय   माइग्रेशन   is   अभी  thought to have  महरूम  responsible for  much  of  the   सौर  System 's  जल्दी   एवोल्यूशन   .
In roughly  5  billion years , the Sun  होगा  cool and  विस्तार  outward  अनेक   टाइम्स  its  वर्तमान   व्यास  (  बनने  a red giant  )  , before casting  बंद  its outer layers as a  ग्रहीय   नीहारिका   और  leaving behind a stellar  remnant  known  as   a   श्वेत  dwarf .
In  the  far  दूर   भविष्य  , the  गम्भीरता  of passing  सितारों  will gradually reduce  the   सूर्य   's  retinue  of   ग्रह   .
Some  ग्रह   होगा  be destroyed , others ejected into interstellar space  .
Ultimately  ,  over the  कोर्स  of  tens  of  अरबों   of   सालो  , it is  संभावित  that the Sun will  be   बाएँ  with  none   of   the   असली   लाशें  in orbit around it .
the  Trial ( Kafka 's original German  शीर्षक   :  , later as , and )  is  a novel  लिखा  by Franz  काफ्का   in   1914   और   1915  but  नहीं   प्रकाशित   जबतक  1925 .
एक  of Kafka  's  best-known  works  ,  it  tells the story of a man  गिरफ्तार  and prosecuted by a remote ,  अभिगम्य  authority  ,   साथ   the   प्रकृति   of  his  अपराधों  revealed  to  neither  उसे  nor the reader .
जैसे  Kafka  's   अन्य  novels , The Trial  थी  never  समाप्त  , although it  करता  include  a  chapter which brings  the   स्टोरी  to an end .
Because of  इस   वहीँ  are  निश्चित   inconsistencies   जिससे   मौजूद  within  the   अनोखा   ,  such as disparities in timing in addition to  अन्य  discontinuities in narration .
बाद  Kafka 's death in 1924 his  dost  and  साहित्यिक   executor  Max Brod edited the text for  प्रकाशन   by  Verlag  die   schmiede   .
the  original manuscript is  आयोजित  at the  संग्रहालय   of   आधुनिक   साहित्य   ,  Marbach am  neckar   ,   जर्मनी  .
in   1999  , the  किताब   थी   सूचीबद्ध   in  Le Mondes  100   किताबे  of the  सदी  and  as  No  .  2 of  the   बेहतरीन   जर्मनी  Novels  of   the  Twentieth Century .
लिसा  Anne Loeb (  born  March 11 , 1968  )  is an  अमरीकी  singer-songwriter and  अभिनेत्री  .
वो   शुभारम्भ  her career  in   1994  with the song  ,   ``   रहो   (  I Missed You  )  ``  ,   जिससे  was included in the  फिल्मी  Reality Bites  .
She  थी  the first  कलाकार  to have  a   क्रमांक  one single in the United  राज्य   जबकि   नहीं  signed to  a   रिकॉर्डिंग  contract  .
Her five studio  cds  include her  प्रमुख  label  डेब्यू   ,   the  gold-selling Tails and  इसके   follow-up  , the  grammy-nominated   ,  gold-selling Firecracker .
लोएब   रै  also  worked  in film , television  ,   voice-over  work  और   children’s   रिकार्डिंग  .
लोएब   रै   appeared   in  two television series , Dweezil  &   लिसा  , a  साप्ताहिक   culinary   एडवेंचर  for  the  Food Network and Number 1 Single  ,   a   वास्तविकता  show on the E !
Network in 2006 focused on  उसके  quest for love ,  कामयाबी   ,  career , and family .
Her  children  's music  शामिल  the albums  कैच  the  चंद्रमा   (  2003 )  ,   और   शिविर  Lisa ( 2008  )  .
Her  पहला  joint children 's  किताब  and album Lisa  लोएब  's Silly  sing-along  : The Disappointing Pancake  और  Other Zany  गीतों  was  प्रकाशित  in 2011  .
In 2010 she  संस्थापित  the  लिसा   लोएब  Eyewear Collection  ,  which is  आधारित  on  उसके  own designs .
the  Coat of arms  of  the State of  नई  Jersey  शामिलs:
a  shield with  तीन  plows  emblazoned  , representative  of   नई  Jersey  's  agricultural  परंपरा  .
A forward-facing knight 's  हेल्मेट  .
A  घोड़ा  's  सिर  as  the   crest   of   the  helmet .
the   मादा  figures  स्वतंत्रता  and  ceres  , representative of  the   राज्य  's  motto   (   देखिए  next  मद   )   .
स्वतंत्रता   is  holding a  स्टाफ   supporting  a  ``   स्वतंत्रता  cap  ``   ;   ceres   is   पकड़कर  an  overflowing   cornucopia  .
the   streamer  at  the  foot of  the   emblem  contains  the  State Motto of  नई  Jersey  ,   ``  Liberty  और   समृद्धि   ''   ,  and  the  year  of  statehood  ,   1776  .
it  was  originally   designed  by  पियरे  Eugene  du  Simitiere in 1777  और  was modified  थोड़ा   in   1928   .
The seal is the  सेंट्रल  motif in  the   ध्वज  of New Jersey  और  the  ग्रेट  Seal of  the  State  of  New Jersey .
The Coat of arms  contains  a  घोड़ा   's   सिर   .
A helmet  प्रर्दशित   कि  New Jersey  governs   itself   तदनुसार  and three  plows   on  a shield  referring  to  the   राज्य  's  कृषि  tradition  ,   giving  it  the  nickname ``  गार्डन  State  ''  .
the  two Goddesses represent the State  motto  , `` Liberty and  समृद्धि  ''  .
Liberty is  on  the left .
She is  पकड़कर  a staff  साथ  a liberty  कैप  on  it  , and the word liberty underneath  उसके  .
the   देवी  on  the   सही  is Ceres  ,  goddess of agriculture  .
She  is  holding  a   cornucopia  with prosperity written below her .
according  to the minutes of the  नई   जर्सी  General Assembly  लिये  March 11  ,  1896 , the date  in  which  the   सभा  officially approved  the  flag  as   the  state  emblem  ,  the   buff   रंग  is due  indirectly   to  George Washington ,  जो   था  ordered on October  2  , 1779 , that  the  uniform  coats  of  the  New Jersey  महाद्वीपीय   लकीर   be   अंधेरा  (  जर्सी  ) blue  ,   साथ  buff facings  .
Buff-colored facings had  जबतक  then been  सुरक्षित   तभी   लिये  his own  वर्दी  and those of other Continental generals and  उनके   aides   .
Then , on  फ़रवरी   28   ,   1780  , the Continental  युद्ध   अधिकारियों   in  Philadelphia  निर्देशित  that the  वर्दी   कोट  facings  of  all regiments  यहूद  to be  the  same  as  the background color of the regiments  '  state  ध्वज   .
the   मुहर   is  described in New Jersey statute Title 52  ,  §2-1:
`` We Can  कार्य   it   आउट   ''  is  a   सोंग  by the  बीटल्स  ,  लिखा  by Paul  mccartney   और  John  लेनन   .
It was released as  a  ``  दोगुना   a-sided   ``  single with `` Day  tripper  ``  ,   the   पहला   समय  both  पहलू   of  a  सिंगल   यहूद   so  designated  in  an initial release  .
Both  गीतों  were  अंकित   दौरान   the  Rubber Soul  सत्र  .
The  सोंग   is  an  उदाहरण  of  lennon–mccartney  collaboration  at  a  गहराई   कि   happened  only  rarely  after they  लिखा   the  hit  singles  of 1963  .
This song  ,  ``  a  Day in the Life  ``   ,   ``   baby  ,  तुम  're a  समृद्ध  Man `` and  ``  I 've  मिला  a Feeling `` ,  हैं   among  the notable  अपवाद  .
As a medical diagnosis ,  pedophilia  or  paedophilia  is  a  psychiatric  विकार  in persons  16   सालो  of  आयु   or  older  typically  characterized  by  a primary or  विशेष  sexual  ब्याज  toward prepubescent children  (  generally age 11  सालो  or  younger  ,  हालांकि  specific diagnosis criteria for the disorder  extends   the  cut-off  पाइंट  for  prepubescence  to age 13  )  .
An adolescent who is  16  years  of   आयु  or older  जरूर  be at least  पाँच  years older than the prepubescent child before  the   आकर्षण  can be diagnosed as  pedophilia  .
The  पद   रै  a range of  परिभाषाएं  , as  मिला  in  psychiatry  , psychology , the vernacular , and law enforcement  .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Classification  of   रोगों  (  आईसीडी  ) defines  pedophilia  as a  ``   विकार  of adult  व्यक्तित्व  and behaviour ''  in   जिससे  there is  a  sexual preference for  children  of  prepubertal  or  जल्दी  pubertal age  .
According to the Diagnostic  और  Statistical Manual  of   दिमागी   विकार  (  dsm   )  , it  is   a  paraphilia  in   जिससे   वयस्कों   or  adolescents  16   सालो  of  आयु   or  older  have  intense  और  recurrent sexual  प्रेरणाएं  towards and  कल्पनाओं  about prepubescent children that they  have  either acted on or which  कारण  them  तकलीफ   or  interpersonal difficulty  .
in  popular  उपयोग   ,   pedophilia  means  कोई   यौन   ब्याज   in  children  or  the  अधिनियम  of  चाइल्ड   यौन  abuse ,  प्रायः  termed ``  pedophilic  behavior ''  .
लिये  example , The  अमरीकी   विरासत  Stedman 's Medical Dictionary  राज्य   ,   ``   pedophilia   is  the  अधिनियम   or  fantasy on the part  of  an  वयस्क   of   engaging   in  sexual activity with a child or children . ''
This common  उपयोग  application also extends to the sexual  ब्याज   in   और   यौन   सम्पर्क  with  रोमिल  or  post-pubescent   नाबालिग  .
Researchers recommend that  ये   imprecise   उपयोग  be  avoided   क्युकी  although people  जो  commit  चाइल्ड   यौन  abuse commonly exhibit the disorder  ,  some offenders  do   नहीं  meet the clinical diagnosis standards for pedophilia and  ये   मानकों  pertain to  prepubescents   .
additionally  , not  सब   pedophiles  actually commit such abuse .
Pedophilia  थी  first formally  पहचाना   और  named in  the  late  19th  century .
A significant  राशि  of research  in   the   क्षेत्रफल  has  लिया  place since the  1980s   .
Although  ज़्यादातर  documented in men ,  वहीँ  are  भी   महिलाओं  who exhibit the disorder , and researchers assume  उपलब्धियाँ   estimates  underrepresent the  सच्चा  number of  मादा  pedophiles .
No cure for pedophilia has  महरूम   विकसित  ,  लकिन  there are therapies  कि  can  reduce   the  incidence  of   a  person  committing   चाइल्ड   यौन  abuse .
In  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  , following Kansas v. Hendricks , sex  अपराधियों   जो  are  diagnosed   साथ  certain mental disorders , particularly pedophilia ,  can   be  subject to indefinite civil  प्रतिबद्धता   ,   अंतर्गत  various state laws ( generically called  svp   कानून   )   और   the  federal  आदम  Walsh Child Protection  और  Safety Act  of   2006  .
at  present , the exact  कल्याणकारी  of  pedophilia   have  not been conclusively  स्थापित   .
Research  suggests   कि  pedophilia may  be  correlated with several different neurological abnormalities  ,   और  often co-exists with other  व्यक्तित्व   विकार  and  मनोवैज्ञानिक   pathologies  .
In the  contexts  of forensic psychology and law enforcement , a variety of typologies  have  been suggested to categorize  pedophiles  according to  बर्ताव  and motivations .
Julio César  chávez   (  born Julio  césar  Chávez  gonzález  on  जुलाई   12   ,  1962  )   is   a  retired Mexican  पेशेवर  boxer  .
chávez   is  considered  by   अनेक  people for their sport statistics the  महानतम  fighter  कभी   to  come  आउट  of Mexico .
He  is  a six-time  संसार   चैंपियन   in   तीन  weight divisions ,  और  for several  सालो   he   थी  considered one of the best pound-for-pound  boxer  in the  संसार  .
In a  करियर  that  spanned   over  25 years  ,   chávez  won five  संसार   शीर्षक   in  three weight  विभाजन  : WBC Super  featherweight   in  1984 , WBA  lightweight   in  1987 ,  wbc   lightweight  in  1988   ,   wbc  Light  welterweight  in 1989  ,  IBF Light Welterweight in  1990   ,   और  WBC Light  welterweight  in  1994   .
He holds records for most  कामयाब   लगातार  defenses  of  world titles ( 27  )  , most  शीर्षक  fights  (  37  )  ,  सबसे  title-fight  victories  ( 31  )  and  he  is after Joe Louis  साथ   (   23  ) for most title  defenses  won  by  knockout ( 21 ) .
Chávez also has the  longest   अपराजित   streak  in  मुक्केबाज़ी  history , 13 years .
उसके  record was  89-0-1  going  into  his first loss to Frankie  रान्डेल  and had an  87  fight win  streak  until  उसके  ``  चित्रण  ''  साथ  Whitaker  .
Julio  césar  Chávez was known for  उसके  outstanding punching power , devastating body attack  ,  remarkably strong chin and the relentless  stalking  of  उसके   प्रतिद्वंद्वियों   .
He ranks #  24  on ESPN 's 50 Greatest Boxers Of  सब   समय  .
On December 7 , 2010  ,   he  was inducted in  the   prestigious  International  मुक्केबाज़ी   हॉल  of Fame for the Class of 2011  .
he   is   the  father of prospect Omar Chávez and  पूर्व  WBC Middleweight Champion  जूलियो  César Chávez  ,  Jr .

The photographer was  अर्नस्ट  Hofmann or  बर्नहार्ड   वाल्टर  of the  ss  .  चित्र   सौजन्य  of  yad   vashem
The Holocaust (  इससे   the   यूनानी   '  :  hólos   ,   ``  whole '' and  kaustós   ,  `` burnt '' )  भी  known as  the  Shoah (  यहूदी   :  , HaShoah  ,   ``   प्रलय   ''  ; Yiddish  :  , Churben or Hurban , from the Hebrew for  ``   विनाश   ''   )  , was  the  mass murder  or   नरसंहार  of  लगभग  six  लाख   यहूदियों  during World  युद्ध   ii   ,  a  कार्यक्रम  of  व्यवस्थित  state-sponsored  हत्या  by  नाजी  Germany , led  by   एडोल्फ  Hitler and the  नाजी  Party , throughout  german-occupied  territory .
of   the  nine million Jews who had resided in  यूरोपीय  before the  holocaust   ,   लगभग  two-thirds were killed  .
Over one  लाख   यहूदी  children were killed  in   the  Holocaust ,  as  were approximately two million Jewish  महिलाओं   और   तीन   लाख   यहूदी  men .
a  network of over  40,000  facilities in Germany and  german-occupied  territory  यहूद  used  to   concentrate   ,  hold ,  और  kill  यहूदियों   और   अन्य  victims  .
Some scholars  argue   कि   the  mass  हत्या   of  the Romani and  लोगों  with disabilities should be included  in  the definition , and  कुछ   उपयोग  the common  संज्ञा  `` holocaust ''  to   describe   अन्य  Nazi mass murders , including  those   of   सोवियत   बंदियों   of  war  ,   पॉलिश   और   सोवियत   नागरिकों  ,  और   homosexuals  .
Recent estimates based  on   आंकड़े   प्राप्त  since  the   पतन   of   the   सोवियत  Union indicates some ten to  ग्यारह  million civilians and  बंदियों  of  युद्ध  were intentionally  murdered   by   the   नाजी  regime  .
The persecution and genocide  यहूद  carried out in  चरण  .
Various  कानून   to  remove the Jews from  सिविल  society  ,  most prominently  the   nuremberg  Laws , were  enacted  in  जर्मनी  years before  the   outbreak  of World  युद्ध   ii  .
Concentration  शिविरों  were  स्थापित   in   जिससे   inmates  were subjected to  स्लेव  labor  जबतक  they  died  of  थकावट   or   बीमारी  .
Where  जर्मनी  conquered new  territory  in eastern Europe ,  specialized   इकाई  called  einsatzgruppen  murdered Jews and political  प्रतिद्वंद्वियों  in  द्रव्यमान  shootings .
the  occupiers required Jews and Romani to  be   confined  in  overcrowded  ghettos  पहले  being transported  by  freight train to  extermination  camps  जहाँ   ,  if they survived  the   यात्रा   ,  most  यहूद  systematically killed in  गैस   कक्षों   .
Every arm  of  Germany 's bureaucracy  थी  involved  in  the  लोजिस्टिक्स  that led  to   the  genocides ,  turning  the Third Reich into what  एक   holocaust  scholar has  पुकारा  `` a genocidal state  ''  .
4-H  in   the  United States is a youth organization  administered  by  the  National Institute of Food and  कृषि  of  the   संयुक्त  States  विभाग  of Agriculture (  यूएसडीए  ) ,  साथ   the  mission of ``  engaging  youth to reach  उनके  fullest potential  जबकि   advancing  the  फ़ील्ड  of youth development .  ''
The name represents four personal development  क्षेत्रों  of  फ़ोकस  for the  संगठन   :   सिर  ,  दिल  , hands , and health  .
the  organization has over  6.5  million  सदस्यों   in  the United  राज्य   ,  from ages five  to  twenty-one , in approximately 90,000 clubs .
the  goal of 4-H  is   to   develop   नागरिकता  , leadership  ,  responsibility  और   जीवन   कौशल  of youth through  experiential  learning  कार्यक्रम  and a positive youth development approach .
Though typically thought of as an  agriculturally   केन्द्रित  organization as a result of its  इतिहास  , 4-H today focuses  on   नागरिकता   ,   स्वस्थ   जीना  , science  ,  engineering ,  और   प्रौद्योगिकी   कार्यक्रम   .
आज   ,  4-H and related  कार्यक्रम  exist in over eighty  देशों  around the  संसार   ;  the  संगठन   और  administration  varies   इससे  country  to  country .
प्रत्येक   of   ये   कार्यक्रम  operates independently ,  लकिन  cooperatively through  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  exchanges , global  शिक्षा  programs  ,  and communications .
The 4-H  motto   is  ``  to  make  the  best better  ''   ,  while  इसके  slogan is ``  सीख  by  doing   ''  (  sometimes  written as `` Learn to do  by  doing ''  )   .
The  नेशनल   ध्वज   of   चिली  ,  consists   of   दो  unequal  आड़ा  bands of white and red and  a  blue  वर्गाकार   the   वही   ऊँचाई   as  the  श्वेत   बैंड  in the  कैण्टन   ,   जिससे  bears a white five-pointed star  in   the   बीच   .
it  was adopted on 18 October  1817   .
The  chilean   ध्वज  is also known  in   स्पेनी  as La Estrella  solitaria  (  the   लोन   स्टार   )  .
the   स्टार  represents a guide to  प्रगति  and honor ;  ब्लू  symbolizes the sky  और  the Pacific Ocean ,  श्वेत   is  for  the  snow-covered  andes   ,  and red  स्टैंड  for  the  blood  spilled  to achieve independence .
according   to   the   एपिक  poem  la  Araucana  ,   the  colors  यहूद  derived from those from  the  flag  flown  by the Mapuche during  the  Arauco  युद्ध  .
`` Flag  दिन  ''  is  held  प्रत्येक  year  on  the  नवीं  of July to commemorate the 77 soldiers who  died  in  the  1882 Battle of La  concepción  .
Generation Y  ,  also  ज्ञात  as the  अंतर्दृष्टियों  Generation ,  is   the  demographic cohort following Generation X .
There are no  precise   तिथियाँ   लिये  when Generation  y   starts   और   ends  .
टीकाकारों  use beginning birth  तिथियाँ   इससे  the latter 1970s  ,   or   इससे   the  early 1980s  to   the  early 2000s  .
the  Torches  of  Nero , by Henryk Siemiradzki  .
According  to  Tacitus  ,   नीरो   targeted   ईसाइयों  as  those   जिम्मेदार   लिये  the  आग  .
The  ग्रेट  Fire of Rome  (  ) was  an   शहरी  fire that  occurred   शुरूआत  19 July AD 64  .
वर्जिनिया  ( )  ,  officially the  राष्ट्रमंडल  of Virginia  ,  is a  u.S.  state located in  the  South Atlantic region of the  संयुक्त   राज्य   .
Virginia is  nicknamed  the `` Old  डोमिनियन   ''  and the ``  माँ  of Presidents '' after the eight U.S.  राष्ट्रपतियों  born there  .
the  geography and  जलवायु  of  the   राष्ट्रमंडल  are shaped by  the   ब्लू  Ridge Mountains and the Chesapeake Bay  ,  which provide  आवास  for much of its  फ्लोरा   और  fauna .
the  capital of  the  Commonwealth is Richmond  ;   और   वर्जिनिया   बीच  is the most populous  नगर   .
फेयरफैक्स  County  is  the  सबसे   populous   राजनैतिक  subdivision  .
the   wealthiest   is   loudoun  County .
the  Commonwealth 's population  is   over  eight  लाख   .
the  area 's history  begins   साथ  several indigenous  समूह  ,  सहित  the Powhatan  .
In  1607  the London  कम्पनी  established the Colony  of  Virginia as the first permanent  नई  World English  उपनिवेश   .
स्लेव  labor and  the   जमीन  acquired from  विस्थापित   देशी   अमरीकी  tribes  प्रत्येक   निभाई  a significant  भूमिका  in the  उपनिवेश   's   जल्दी  politics and plantation economy .
वर्जिनिया  was  एक  of  the  13 Colonies  in   the   अमरीकी   क्रान्ति   और   joined  the  confederacy  in  the   अमरीकी   सिविल  War ,  दौरान  which Richmond was  बना  the Confederate  पूंजी   और   वर्जिनिया  's northwestern  काउंटी  seceded  to   रूप   the   राज्य   of  West Virginia .
Although  the   राष्ट्रमंडल  was  अंतर्गत  conservative  single-party  rule for nearly a  सदी  following  पुनर्निर्माण   ,   दोनो   प्रमुख  national  पार्टियों   हैं   प्रतिस्पर्धी  in modern  वर्जिनिया  .
The Virginia General Assembly is the oldest  विधानमंडल   in  the Western Hemisphere .
The  राज्य  government has been repeatedly ranked most effective  by  the Pew  बीच   on   the  States  .
It is unique in  कैसा  it treats  शहरों  and counties equally  ,   manages  local  सड़कें  ,  और   prohibits   इसके  governors from  सेवारत  consecutive terms .
Virginia 's  अर्थव्यवस्था   रै   अनेक  sectors : agriculture  in  the Shenandoah Valley  ;  federal  एजेंसियों   in  Northern  वर्जिनिया   ,   सहित  the headquarters  of   the  Department of Defense  और  CIA ;  और  military facilities in  हैम्पटन  Roads  ,   the   साईट  of  the  region 's main  seaport  .
Virginia  's  public  स्कूलों  and many colleges and universities have contributed  to  growing media and technology sectors .
As a result , computer chips  have  become  the  state  's  leading export .
Windows Movie  मेकर  (  formerly  known as  खिड़कियाँ   सजीव  Movie  मेकर   ,   codenamed   sundance  ) is  a  freeware video editing  तन्त्र  by Microsoft  .
it  is a  भाग   of  Windows Essentials  तन्त्र  suite  और   offers  the ability  to  create and edit videos as  खूब  as  to   प्रकाशित   उन्हें   on   skydrive  , Facebook , YouTube , and  फ्लिकर   .
`` Brenda  's  Got A  baby  ''  is  the solo debut single by  तुपाक  Shakur ,  और   दसवाँ   track   इससे  his debut  एल्बम   ,   2pacalypse  Now  .
the   सोंग  , which features  r  & B  सिंगर  Dave  hollister   ,   is  about a twelve year-old  लड़की  named  ब्रेंडा  who  जीवनदान  in a ghetto  ,  has a baby ,  और   is   incapable   of  supporting  it  .
The song  explores  the issue of teen pregnancy  और  its  प्रभाव  on  the  young mothers  और   उनके   परिवारों   .
जैसे  many  of  Shakur  's   गीतों  , `` Brenda 's  मिला   a   baby  '' draws  इससे  the  दुर्दशा  of the  impoverished  .
using   ब्रेंडा  to represent young mothers  in  general , Shakur criticises  the  low  स्तर  of support  इससे   the  baby 's  पिता   ,  the  सरकारी   ,   और   समाज  in  सामान्य  .
shakur  wrote the song when  he   पढ़ा   a  newspaper article about a  twelve-year-old   लड़की   जो   मिला   गर्भवती   इससे   उसके   cousin   और   ,   क्युकी   वो  did not want  उसके   अभिभावक   to   जान  about the baby ,  फेंका  it in  a  trash  can   .
The  आधिकारिक   लोगो  of  पोकीमॉन   लिये   इसके   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  release ; ``  पोकीमॉन   ''  is short  लिये  the  असली  Japanese title  of  ``  जेब   राक्षस   ''   .
is a media  मताधिकार  published and owned  by  Japanese video  खेल   कम्पनी   निन्टेंडो   और   निर्मित   by  Satoshi Tajiri in 1996 .
originally   released   as  a pair  of   interlinkable  Game Boy  role-playing  video games developed  by  Game  freak   ,  Pokémon has  चूंकि  become the  second-most   कामयाब  and lucrative video  game-based   मीडिया  franchise  in  the world  ,  behind only Nintendo  's  own Mario  मताधिकार   .
Pokémon properties  have  since been merchandised into  दुश्मनी  , manga ,  व्यापार  cards , toys  ,   किताबे  ,  और  other media  .
The  मताधिकार  celebrated in  2006  ,  और  ,  संचयी  sales of  the   वीडियो  games ( including  घर  console versions , such as  the  ``  pikachu   ''   निन्टेंडो   64  )  have  reached  अधिक   than  200 million  नक़ल  .
In November  2005   ,  4Kids Entertainment  ,  which had managed  the   non-game  related  लाइसेंसिंग  of Pokémon ,  घोषित   कि   it  had agreed  नहीं  to  नवीनीकृत  the Pokémon  प्रतिनिधित्व  agreement .
पोकीमॉन  USA Inc. ( now The Pokémon Company International  )  ,  a   subsidiary  of Japan  's  Pokémon Co. ,  अभी   oversees  all  पोकीमॉन   लाइसेंसिंग  outside of Asia  .
The name Pokémon is the romanized contraction of the  जापानी  brand .
The term Pokémon , in addition  to  referring to the Pokémon franchise itself ,  भी  collectively  refers  to the  649   fictional  species that  have  made  दिखावे  in Pokémon  मीडिया  as  of  the release of  the   पांचवां   पीढी  titles  पोकीमॉन   ब्लैक   2   और   श्वेत  2 ; with the upcoming releases of Pokémon  x   और  Y , 6  नई  Pokémon have been  प्रदर्शित  in  प्रचार  for the games .
`` Pokémon ''  is  identical in  दोनो  the  एकवचन   और  plural  ,   as   is  each individual species  नाम   ;  it  is  grammatically correct  to   कह  ``  एक  Pokémon  ''  and  ``  many  पोकीमॉन  ''  ,  as well as ``  एक  Pikachu  ``  and  ``  many Pikachu '' .
Cover of  the  first edition  of  the publication  दादा  by  ट्रिस्टन   tzara  ; Zurich  ,   1917
दादा   (   )   or  Dadaism was an  आर्ट  movement  of  the European  avant-garde  in the  जल्दी  20th  सदी  .
Many  अर्जी  Dada began  in   ज्यूरिख   ,  Switzerland in 1916 , spreading  to  Berlin shortly thereafter but  the  height  of  New  यॉर्क   दादा  was  the  year  पहले  in 1915 .
to   उद्धरण   डोना  Budd  's   the   भाषा   of  Art Knowledge , Dada  थी   born   आउट  of negative reaction to  the  horrors  of   संसार  War I .
इस  international movement  थी  begun  by  a group of  कलाकार   और  poets associated with  the   कैबरे  Voltaire  in   ज्यूरिख   .
दादा  rejected reason  और  logic , prizing nonsense , irrationality and intuition .
The  उत्पत्ति   of   the  name Dada is unclear ; some believe that  it  is  a  nonsensical word .
अन्य   maintain   कि  it originates from  the   रोमानियाई   कलाकारों   ट्रिस्टन   tzara  and  मार्सल  Janco 's  बारंबार  use  of  the  शब्द   da   ,   da   ,  meaning  यस   ,   यस  in the  रोमानियाई  language .
Another theory  says  that  the   नाम   ``  Dada  ''  came during  a   बैठक  of the group when  a   पेपर  knife stuck into  a  French-German dictionary happened to point to  'डैडa   '  ,  a  French  शब्द   लिये   'hobbyhorse  '  .
The  गति  primarily involved visual arts , literature  ,  poetry , art manifestoes  ,   आर्ट  theory , theatre , and graphic design , and  concentrated   इसके  anti-war  राजनीती  through a  अस्वीकृति  of the  प्रचलित  standards  in  art through anti-art  सांस्कृतिक   works  .
In addition  to   होने  anti-war ,  दादा  was also  anti-  bourgeois and had  राजनैतिक  affinities  साथ   the  radical left .
Dada activities included  पब्लिक  gatherings  ,  demonstrations ,  और   प्रकाशन  of  art/literary   जर्नल्स   ;   passionate  coverage of art , politics  ,   और   संस्कृति  were  विषय   प्रायः  discussed in  a   किस्में  of media .
Key figures in the movement included Hugo Ball  ,  Emmy  hennings   ,  Hans Arp  ,  Raoul Hausmann , Hannah Höch ,  योहानेस   baader   ,  Tristan Tzara ,  फ्रांसिस   picabia   ,   रिचर्ड  Huelsenbeck ,  georg  Grosz  ,  John Heartfield ,  मार्सल  Duchamp  ,  Beatrice Wood , Kurt Schwitters ,  और   hans   रिक्टर   ,  among others  .
The  गति  influenced later  शैलियाँ  like  the  avant-garde and  शहर  music  आंदोलनों  , and  समूह  including  surrealism  , Nouveau réalisme , pop art and Fluxus .
Dada is the  groundwork   to  abstract  आर्ट  and  ध्वनि  poetry , a starting point  लिये  performance art  ,  a  prelude  to postmodernism , an influence  on  pop art ,  a  celebration of antiart to  be  later embraced for anarcho-political uses  in  the 1960s  और  the  गति  that  lay   the   न्यास   लिये  Surrealism .
पहला  trophic  स्तर   .
The plants in this  चित्र  , and  the   शैवाल   और  phytoplankton in the  झील   ,   हैं   प्राथमिक   निर्माता   .
They  लो  nutrients from  the   मृदा   or  the  जल   ,  and manufacture their  अपना  food  by   photosynthesis   ,  using  उर्जा  from the sun .
The  trophic   स्तर   of   an  organism  is   the  position it occupies  in   a   खाना  chain  .
the  word  trophic  derives  इससे  the Greek  τροφή   (  trophē ) referring to  खाना   or   feeding   .
a   खाना  chain represents  a  succession of  जीवों   कि  eat  another  organism and  हैं  , in  फेरे   ,  eaten themselves  .
the  number of steps  an  organism  is   इससे  the start  of   the   कड़ी  is a measure of its trophic  स्तर   .
Food chains  प्रारंभ  at  trophic  level  1   साथ   प्राथमिक  producers  ऐसे  as plants  ,   मूव  to herbivores at level  2  , predators at  स्तर  3 and typically  समाप्त   साथ   carnivores  or  apex  predators at level  4   or  5  .
the  path  साथ  the  कड़ी  can  रूप  either a  one-way  flow  ,  or a  खाना  ``  वेब  . ''
Ecological communities with higher biodiversity form  अधिक  complex trophic paths .
Four of  the   सबसे  important  domesticated   रेशा   शलभ  .
Top  to   नीचे   :  Bombyx  mori   ,   hyalophora  cecropia , Antheraea pernyi  ,  Samia cynthia  .
इससे   मेयर्स  Konversations-Lexikon  (  1885-1892 )
A silk-producing raspy cricket .
रेशा   is  a natural  प्रोटीन  fibre , some forms of which  can  be woven into  वस्त्र  .
The  प्रोटीन   fibre   of   रेशा  is  रचित  mainly  of  fibroin  और  produced by  निश्चित  insect larvae  to  form cocoons .
The best-known  प्रकार  of silk  is   प्राप्त  from  the  cocoons of the larvae  of   the  mulberry silkworm Bombyx mori  reared   in   captivity  (  sericulture   )  .
the   shimmering  appearance  of  silk is due to  the  triangular  प्रिज़्म  -like  ढांचा  of  the  silk fibre ,  जिससे   allows  silk  cloth  to refract  आवक  light at  अलग  angles  ,   यूँ   producing  different colors  .
silks  are produced by several other insects ,  लकिन  generally only the silk of  शलभ  caterpillars  रै   महरूम  used  लिये   वस्त्र  manufacturing  .
वहीँ   रै   महरूम  some  शोध  into other silks , which differ at the  आणविक   स्तर  .
Many silks  हैं  mainly produced by the larvae of insects  undergoing  complete metamorphosis  ,  but some  वयस्क  insects  ऐसे   as   webspinners   उपज   रेशा   ,   और   कुछ  insects  ऐसे   as   raspy  crickets produce silk throughout their  जीवनदान  .
रेशा  production also  occurs  in Hymenoptera (  मधुमक्खियों  , wasps  ,   और  ants ) , silverfish ,  mayflies  , thrips  ,  leafhoppers  ,   भृंग  , lacewings , fleas  ,   उड़ता   और  midges  .
Other  प्रकार   of   सन्धिपाद   उपज   रेशा  ,  सबसे  notably various  arachnids   ऐसे   as  spiders  (   देखिए   मकड़ी  silk )  .
Late Show with David Letterman  is   an  American late-night  बात   दिखाएँ   hosted  by  दाउद   लेटरमैन  on CBS  .
The  दिखाएँ  debuted  on  August 30  ,  1993 , and is  उत्पादित  by  लेटरमैन   's  production company , Worldwide Pants  incorporated  .
The  दिखाएँ  's music director and  band-leader  of  the   हाउस  band  ,  the  सीबीएस   ऑर्केस्ट्रा  , is Paul Shaffer .
The  सिर   लेखक  is  मैट   रॉबर्ट्स  and  the  announcer is  एलन  Kalter .
Of  the  major  u.S.  late-night  कार्यक्रम   ,  Late  दिखाएँ  ranks second in cumulative average viewers over  समय  and third  in  number  of   एपीसोड  over  समय   .
The  दिखाएँ  leads  अन्य  late night  shows  in ad revenue  साथ   $  271 million  in   2009  .
In  सबसे  U.S. markets the show airs  at   11:35   p.m.   eastern/pacific  time  ,   लकिन  is  अंकित   सोमवार  through Wednesday at 4:30 p.m. ,  और  Thursdays  at   3:30  p.m and  6:00   p.m   .
The second  गुरुवार  episode  प्रायः  airs  on  Friday of that  सप्ताह  .
In 2002 , Late Show with  दाउद   लेटरमैन   थी  ranked No .  7  on TV  मार्गदर्शिका  's  50  Greatest  tv  Shows of All Time  .
सीबीएस  has a contract with Worldwide  पैंट  to  continue   the  show through 2014 ;  by   तब  , Letterman will surpass Johnny Carson  as  the longest tenured late-night talk show  मेजबान  .
the  Real  housewives  of Orange County is  an   अमरीकी   वास्तविकता  documentary  टेलीविज़न   कार्यक्रम  on Bravo , set in  नारंगी  County , California .
it  was the  पहला  The  रियल   housewives   कार्यक्रम  in the series  .
The  श्रेणी   is   a  voyeuristic  dekh  into the  धनवान   जीवनदान  of these housewives  ,   as  they shop  ,   मिलेंगी  plastic  सर्जरी   ,  gossip  ,  fight and  सजीव  lavishly .
the  financial crisis ,  the  beginning  of   जिससे   coincided  almost exactly with the  पहला   ऋतु   's  broadcast ,  रै  since  trimmed  the housewives '  lifestyles  with  जॉब  losses  ,  evictions  ,   बंधक   मूलभूत  , foreclosures  ,   और   वैवाहिक  stress—all recorded in  प्रगतिशील   सीज़न   of  the show  .
Cyberstalking is the use of  the  Internet  or   अन्य  electronic means to stalk  or   harass   an   व्यक्तिगत  , a group  of  individuals  ,   or  an  संगठन   .
It may include the making  of  false accusations or statements  of  fact ( as  in  defamation  )  ,  निगरानी  , making  खतरे  , identity  चोरी  ,  क्षति  to  आंकड़ा  or  उपकरण   ,   the   solicitation  of  नाबालिग   लिये  sex , or gathering  सूचना  that may be used  to  harass .
The definition of  ``  harassment ''  जरूर  meet the  मानदंड  that  a   उचित  person  ,  in  कब्ज़ा   of   the  same information  ,   होता  regard  it  as sufficient  to   कारण  another reasonable person distress .
Cyberstalking is different from spatial  or  offline stalking  in  that it  occurs   through  the  उपयोग  of  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   संचार  technology  ऐसे   as  the  अंतरजाल  .
however  , it  sometimes  leads to it , or  is   accompanied  by  it   .
दोनो  are  दण्ड  offenses .
cyberstalking  shares important  विशेषताएँ  with  ऑफ़लाइन   stalking  .
Many stalkers –  ऑनलाइन  or  बंद  – are motivated by a  ख्वाहिश  to  कंट्रोल  their victims  .
a  cyberstalker may be  an  online stranger  or  a person whom  the  target knows .
a  cyberstalker may  be  anonymous and  may  solicit involvement of other people online  जो  do not even know the target .
cyberstalking   is  a criminal offense that  आता  into play under  राज्य  anti-stalking laws  ,   बदनामी  laws  ,   और   उत्पीड़न   कानून  .
a  cyberstalking  conviction   can   परिणाम  in a restraining order  ,   परिवीक्षा   ,  or even criminal penalties against the  assailant  , including jail .
a   कारोबार  letter  is  usually used  जब   लिखने   इससे  one company  to  another ,  or  for correspondence between  ऐसे   संगठन   और  their customers  ,   क्लाइंट   और  other  बाह्य  parties .
The overall style of letter  होगा   निर्भर   on   the  relationship between the  पार्टियों  concerned  .
There  हैं  many reasons  to   लिखें   a   कारोबार  letter .
It  could  be to  निवेदन  direct information  or   कार्रवाई  from another party , to  अनुक्रम   आपूर्तियाँ  from  a   प्रदायक  , to identify  a  mistake  कि   थी  committed  ,  to reply  सीधे  to a request , to apologize for  a  wrong  or  simply  to   convey  goodwill  .
Even today ,  the   कारोबार  letter is still very useful because it produces  a   स्थाई   रिकार्ड   ,  is  गोपनीय  ,  औपचारिक  and delivers  persuasive  , well-considered  संदेश  .
Tilapia ( ) is the  आम  name for nearly a hundred species of cichlid fish  इससे   the  tilapiine  cichlid  tribe  .
tilapia   हैं   मुख्यतः   freshwater  fish , inhabiting  उथले  streams ,  तालाबों   ,  rivers and  झीलों   ,  and less  commonly   मिला   जीना  in brackish  जल  .
Historically  ,   वे   have  been  of  major importance  in   कारीगर  fishing in Africa  और  the Levant ,  और  are of increasing importance in aquaculture  .
Tilapia can become  समस्यापूर्ण   हृदयरोग  species in new warm-water habitats , whether  deliberately   or  accidentally introduced  ,  but  generally  not  in  temperate climates due to their inability  to  survive in  कूलर  waters  नीचे  about .
Turner &  hooch  is  a  1989  कॉमेडी   नाटक   अपराधों  film starring  tom   हैंक्स   और  Beasley the Dog as the eponymous  वर्ण  ,  टर्नर   और  Hooch respectively  .
The  फिल्मी  also  सितारों  Mare Winningham , Craig  T.   नेल्सन  , and Reginald VelJohnson  .
It  थी   निर्देशित  by Roger  spottiswoode  ;  the   फिल्मी  was originally  slated  to  be  directed by Henry Winkler  ,  but he  थी  terminated  due   to  `` creative differences '' .
it   थी   co-written   by  Michael  blodgett  from  परे  the Valley  of   the   डॉल  fame .
हालांकि  K-9 (  साथ  James  belushi   )  was  released  prior  to  this  फिल्मी   (  exactly three months earlier  )  , Turner & Hooch  became  more  लोकप्रिय  and  seemingly  overshadowed  इसके  greater success  ,  even though  k-9   था  a very similar  प्लाट   .
a  pilot for  a  Turner & Hooch  tv  series  थी  made  और   भागा  as  a  part of  the   जादुई   संसार  of  डिज़्नी  .
