एडोल्फ   हिटलर  ( ; 20 April 1889  –  30 April  1945  )  थी   an  Austrian -born German politician and the leader of the Nazi  पार्टी  (  (   nsdap  )  ;   नेशनल  Socialist German Workers Party ) .
he  was chancellor of Germany  इससे  1933 to 1945 and dictator of Nazi  जर्मनी   (  as Führer und  reichskanzler   )  from 1934 to 1945  .
हिटलर   थी  at  the   केन्द्र  of Nazi  जर्मनी  ,  संसार   युद्ध  II  in  Europe ,  और  the Holocaust  .
Hitler was  a   सजा   दिग्गज   of   संसार   युद्ध   i   .
he  joined the  जर्मनी  Workers  '  Party ( precursor  of  the NSDAP )  in   1919  , and became  नेता   of  the NSDAP in  1921   .
In  1923   ,  he attempted a coup d'état in Munich  ,  known as the Beer Hall Putsch .
The failed coup resulted in Hitler 's  कारावास  ,  दौरान   जिससे   समय  he  लिखा  his memoir , Mein Kampf  (  My  संघर्ष  ) .
After his release in 1924 , Hitler gained popular  support   by  attacking the  सन्धि  of Versailles  और   promoting  Pan-Germanism  ,   antisemitism   ,  and  anti-communism   साथ   charismatic  oratory  और  Nazi propaganda  .
After his  नियुक्ति  as chancellor  in   1933  , he  रूपांतरित   the  Weimar Republic into the Third Reich  ,   a   single-party  dictatorship based  on   the  totalitarian  और  autocratic ideology of Nazism .
Hitler 's aim was  to  establish  a   नई  Order of absolute Nazi German  आधिपत्य   in  continental Europe  .
to  this  समाप्त  ,  उसके   विदेशी  and domestic policies  था   the  aim  of  seizing Lebensraum  (  `` living space  ''  )  लिये  the Germanic  लोगों  .
He  निर्देशित  the rearmament of Germany and the  आक्रमण  of Poland by the Wehrmacht  in  September  1939   ,  resulting in  the   outbreak  of World War II in  यूरोपीय   .
अंतर्गत   हिटलर  's rule  ,  in 1941  जर्मनी  forces and their European allies occupied  सबसे   of  Europe and North Africa .
In  1943  ,  जर्मनी   था  been forced  onto  the defensive and suffered a series  of  escalating defeats  .
In the final days  of  the war , during  the   बैटल   of   बर्लिन   in  1945 ,  हिटलर   शादीशुदा  his long-time partner ,  एवा  Braun .
On 30 April 1945 , less than two days later  ,  the two committed suicide  to  avoid  कैप्चर   by  the  रेड  Army ,  और   उनके  corpses were burned  .
Hitler 's aggressive foreign  नीति  is considered  the  main  कारण  of the  outbreak  of World War II in Europe .
उसके  antisemitic policies and racially motivated ideology  resulted   in  the deaths  of   at  least 5.5 million  यहूदियों   ,  and millions of  अन्य   लोगों  deemed  racially  inferior .
अंगूठा
A  डोमेन  name is an identification  स्ट्रिंग   कि   defines  a  फ्रेम   of   प्रशासनिक  autonomy  ,  authority , or control on the  अंतरजाल   .
डोमेन   names   हैं   formed   by  the rules and procedures of the Domain Name System ( DNS  )  .
Technically  ,   कोई   नाम  registered in the DNS is a  डोमेन  name .
Domain  names   हैं  used in various  नेटवर्किंग  contexts  और  application-specific  नामकरण  and addressing  उद्देश्य   .
in   सामान्य  ,  a  domain  नाम  represents an  अंतरजाल  Protocol ( IP  )   संसाधन   ,   ऐसे   as  a  निजी  computer used  to  access  the  Internet  ,  a server computer hosting a web  साईट  ,  or  the  वेब   साईट  itself or any  अन्य  service  communicated  via  the  Internet .
Domain  names   हैं  organized  in   अधीनस्थ   स्तर  ( subdomains  )  of the DNS  रूट   डोमेन  ,  जिससे  is nameless  .
The  first-level   नियत  of  डोमेन   names  are the top-level  डोमेन  ( TLDs ) , including the generic top-level domains ( gTLDs  )  , such  as   the  prominent domains com ,  सूचना   ,   जाल  and org ,  और  the country code  top-level  domains ( ccTLDs ) .
नीचे  these top-level domains in the  डीएनएस  hierarchy are  the   second-level  and  third-level   डोमेन  names  कि  are  typically  open for reservation  by  end-users who wish to  कनेक्ट  local area networks to  the  Internet , create other publicly accessible Internet  संसाधन   or  run  वेब  sites  .
the  registration of these domain names is  प्रायः  administered by  डोमेन  name  registrars  who sell their  सेवाएं   to  the public  .
a   fully  qualified  डोमेन   नाम  (  fqdn  )  is   a   डोमेन  name  कि  is  completely   निर्दिष्ट   in   the  hierarchy of the DNS ,  having   no   omitted  parts .
Domain names  हैं   प्रायः   लिखा   in   लोअरकेस   ,  although  लेबल्स  in  the   डोमेन  Name System are case-insensitive .
नाइट्रेट  is  a   polyatomic  ion  साथ  the  आणविक  formula NO3− and a  आणविक  mass  of  62.0049  g/mol   .  Nitrates also  describe  the  सशुल्क   कार्यात्मक  group  rono2  .
ये   नाइट्रेट   esters  are  a  specialized class of explosives .
a  wheat  कटाई   in   idaho
This  फ़ोटो   इससे  a 1921  ज्ञानकोष   shows  a tractor  ploughing  a crop  फ़ील्ड  .
Agriculture  is  a  प्रमुख  industry  in  the  संयुक्त  States and the  देश   is   a  net  निर्यातक  of  खाना  .
as   of  the last census  of  agriculture  in   2007   ,   वहीँ  were  2.2  million  खेतो   ,  covering an  क्षेत्रफल   of  ,  an   औसत   of  per farm .
Although agricultural activity  occurs  in  सबसे  states  ,   it  is particularly  concentrated   in  the vast expanse of flat , arable land  ज्ञात   as  the Great Plains ,  जिससे   encompasses   the  central region of the nation  .
The Mpemba effect  ,  named after  tanzanian   छात्र   erasto   mpemba   ,  is the assertion  कि   warmer  water can  फ्रीज   तेज़  than colder water .
हालांकि   वहीँ  is  anecdotal  support for  the  effect , there is  no   अनुबंध  on  exactly  what  the  effect  is   और   अंतर्गत   कया  circumstances it occurs  .
वहीँ   have  been reports  of   समान  phenomena since  प्राचीन   टाइम्स   ,  although with  अपर्याप्त  detail for  the  claims to be replicated .
The phenomenon seems  contrary  to  ऊष्मागतिकी   ,  but  a   क्रमांक  of  संभावित  explanations  लिये  the effect  have  been proposed  .
Further  investigations   होगा  need  to  decide on a  precise   परिभाषा  of ``  जमने  ''  और  control a vast number of  starting  parameters in order  to  confirm or explain the effect .
the  Siamese ( , ) is  एक  of the first  distinctly  recognized  breeds  of Oriental cat .
The breed originated  in  Thailand (  formerly  known  as  Siam  )  , where they are one of  अनेक  native  breeds   और   हैं  called  wichian   mat  ( วิเชียรมาศ , a name  अर्थ  `` moon diamond '' )  .
in   the  20th  सदी   the  Siamese  बिल्ली  became  एक   of  the most  लोकप्रिय  breeds  in  Europe and  उत्तर  America .
Quality Food Centers (  qfc  )  is  a supermarket chain  आधारित  in Bellevue ,  वॉशिंगटन  ,  साथ  64  स्टोर्स  in  the  Puget Sound  प्रदेश  of  वॉशिंगटन  state and  in  the  पोर्टलैंड   ,   ऑरेगॉन  metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  .
in  economics ,  the  money supply or  धन  stock ,  is  the  कुल  amount  of   मौद्रिक   एसेट   उपलब्धियाँ   in  an  अर्थव्यवस्था  at a specific  समय  .
There are several  तरीके  to define  ``   धन   ,   ''  but  मानक  measures  प्रायः   शामिल  currency in circulation and  माँग  deposits  (  depositors ' easily accessed  एसेट   on  the books of  वित्तीय  institutions  )  .
Money  सप्लाई  data are  अंकित  and published , usually  by  the  सरकारी   or  the  सेंट्रल  bank of  the  country .
पब्लिक   और   निजी  sector  विश्लेषकों   have  long  monitored  changes in  धन  supply  क्युकी  of its effects  on   the  price  स्तर   ,  inflation , the exchange  रेट  and  the  business  साईकिल  .
कि  relation  between   धन   और   कीमतें   is  historically associated  साथ  the  मात्रा  theory  of   धन   .
There is  दमदार  empirical  प्रमाण  of  a   सीधा   संबंध  between  money-supply   विकास  and  long-term  price inflation  ,   at  least for rapid increases  in  the amount of  धन  in  the  economy .
That  is   ,  a  देश  such as  ज़िम्बाब्वे   जिससे  saw rapid  increases   in  its money  सप्लाई  also saw  रैपिड   increases  in  कीमतें   (  hyperinflation  )  .
This is  एक  reason for the reliance  on   मौद्रिक  policy as a  अर्थात्  of controlling  महंगाई  .
The  प्रकृति  of this causal chain is  the  subject of contention  .
कुछ   शास्त   अर्थशास्त्रियों  argue that the  धन   सप्लाई   is   endogenous  ( determined by  the   workings  of the  अर्थव्यवस्था  , not by the central bank ) and  कि   the  sources  of   महंगाई   जरूर  be found  in   the  distributional  ढांचा  of  the  economy .
In addition , those economists  देखकर  the central bank 's control over  the  money  सप्लाई   as   feeble  say  कि  there  हैं  two weak links  between  the growth of the  धन  supply  और  the inflation rate  .
First  ,  in the aftermath of a  मंदी   ,  when  अनेक  resources are underutilized  ,   an  increase  in   the   धन  supply can  कारण  a  sustained   बढ़ाएँ  in  रियल   उत्पादन   बजाय  of inflation .
दूसरी  , if  the  velocity  of  money ,  i.e.  , the ratio between nominal GDP  और  money supply , changes  ,  an  बढ़ाएँ   in  the  धन   सप्लाई  could have  either  no  प्रभाव   ,   an  exaggerated  प्रभाव  ,  or  an unpredictable effect on the growth of  नाममात्र  GDP .
लोगो   लिये  IMAX  .
Warren Theatre  imax   सिनेमा  , Wichita  ,  Kansas , USA , 601 seats  .
A comparison  between  35  mm  and 15/70  mm  negative  क्षेत्रों  .
IMAX ( an abbreviation for Image  अधिकतम   )   is  a motion picture film  स्वरूप  and  a  set of cinema projection standards created by the Canadian company  imax  Corporation .
IMAX  रै  the  क्षमता  to record  और  display images of far greater size  और   रेज़ोल्यूशन  than conventional film systems  .
Since  2002  , some feature films have been converted  (  or upgraded  )  into IMAX format for display in  imax   थिएटर   और  some have  भी   महरूम  partially shot in  imax  .
imax  is  the   सबसे   widely  used system for special-venue film  प्रस्तुतियों   .
,  वहीँ  are 697 IMAX theatres  in  52 countries .
आज   's  Special  is  a Canadian children  's  television show produced by Clive  vanderburgh  at TVOntario  इससे  1981 to 1987  .
it  also  भागा   on  Nickelodeon  और  the  आस्था   और  Values  channel/odyssey  (  अभी   the  Hallmark  चैनल  )  as   खूब   as  many PBS stations  throughout  the United States .
it   थी  set in  a  department store  ,   आधारित   on   the  flagship location  of  the now  defunct  Simpson 's in  टोरंटो  .
Many sequences  लिये  it  यहूद   शॉट   at  the Queen Street West and  yonge  Street store  बाद   घंटों   .
Constitutionalism  ,  in  इसके   सबसे   सामान्य  meaning  ,  is  ``  a complex of  विचार  , attitudes  ,   और   पैटर्न  of behavior  elaborating   the  principle that  the  authority  of   सरकारी   गर्भाशयी   इससे   और  is  सीमित   by  a body of  आधारभूत   विधि  '' .
A political organization  is   संवैधानिक  to the  extent   कि  it `` contain [ s  ]   institutionalized  mechanisms  of  power control for  the  protection of the  रूचि   और   लिबर्टीज  of the  citizenry  , including  those   कि  may be in  the  minority `` .
As  वर्णित  by  राजनैतिक  scientist and  संवैधानिक  scholar  दाउद   fellman   :
An ice-cream headache ,  भी  known as brain freeze , cold-stimulus headache  ,   or   इसके  given scientific name sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia  (   अर्थ   ``  nerve  पीड़ा  of  the  sphenopalatine ganglion  ``   )  , is a form of  ब्रैड   cranial   पीड़ा   or  headache commonly associated with consumption ( particularly quick  खपत  ) of cold beverages or foods such  as  ice cream  और  ice pops  .
It is  caused  by  having  something cold touch the roof  of   the  mouth ( palate  )   ,  and  is  believed  to   परिणाम   इससे   a  nerve response  causing  rapid constriction  और  swelling of blood vessels  or  a ``  referring   ``  of pain  इससे  the  छत  of  the  mouth to  the  head  .
the   रेट   of   सेवन   लिये  cold foods  रै   महरूम   पढ़ाई   as  a  contributing  factor .
वहीँ  are people  जो  can not experience  ``  brain freeze '' or  समान  symptoms .
The term  ice-cream  headache has  महरूम  in  उपयोग  since at least 31  जनवरी  1937  ,   contained  in  a   जर्नल  entry  by  Rebecca Timbres published  in   the   1939  book  we   किया  n't ask  यूटोपिया  : a  quaker  family in Soviet Russia .
the  first  प्रकाशित  use of  the  term  दिमाग  freeze  ,  as it pertains to cold-induced  headaches  ,  थी   on  27 May  1991  .
``  Auld Lang  syne  '' (  :   नोट   ``  s ''  बल्कि   than   ``  z '' ) is  a   स्कॉट्स   कविता   लिखा  by Robert Burns in  1788   और  set  to   the  tune of  a   परंपरागत   लोक  song  (  Roud  #  6294 ) .
it  is well known in many countries  ,   विशेषकर  in the English-speaking  संसार  ; its  परंपरागत   उपयोग  being  to  celebrate  the  start of  the  New Year  at   the  stroke  of   मध्यरात्रि   .
By extension , it is also sung at funerals ,  graduations  and  as  a farewell  or  ending to  अन्य   अवसरों   .
the  international Boy  स्काउट  youth movement ,  in   अनेक  countries  ,   उपयोग  it as a  बंद  to jamborees  और  other  कृत्यों   .
The song 's Scots title  may  be translated into English  वस्तुतः   as  ``  बूढ़ा  long since '' , or more idiomatically , ``  long   long  ago  ''   ,  `` days gone by  ''  or  ``  old  टाइम्स   ''  .
Consequently `` For auld  लैंग  syne '' , as  it  appears  in  the first  लकीर  of  the   कोरस   ,  might  be   loosely  translated  as  ``  लिये   (   the  sake  of   )  old times ''  .
the  phrase `` Auld Lang Syne ''  is   भी  used  in  similar poems by  रॉबर्ट   ayton   (  1570–1638  )   ,   allan   ramsay   (   1686–1757   )  ,  और   जेम्स  Watson (  1711  )  as   खूब   as  older  लोक  songs  predating   burns  .
Matthew  fitt  uses  the   phrase   ``  In  the   दिनों  of  auld   लैंग   syne   ''  as  the   समतुल्य  of `` Once upon  a  time ...
`` in his retelling  of  fairy  किस्से  in the Scots  भाषा  .
Ben  schulz   ,  player  of   leeroy  Jenkins  at   blizzcon  2007
leeroy  Jenkins ,  sometimes   misspelled  Leroy Jenkins  और  often  elongated  with numerous  अतिरिक्त  letters  ,   is  an Internet  मीम  named for  a  player character created  by   बेन  Schulz in Blizzard  entertainment   's  MMORPG ,  संसार   of   warcraft  .
The  अक्षर  became  लोकप्रिय   due  to  a  video of the  खेल  that circulated around  the  Internet .
The phenomenon has  चूंकि   स्प्रेड  beyond  the   सीमाएँ   of  the gaming  जातियाँ  into  अन्य  online and mainstream media  .
Oscar Grant was  fatally  shot by BART  पुलिस   अधिकारी  Johannes Mehserle in  ओकलैंड  , California ,  संयुक्त   राज्य   ,  in  the  early morning  घंटों  of New  साल  's  दिन   2009  .
Responding  to  reports  of   a   लड़ो  on a crowded  खाड़ी  Area  रैपिड  Transit  ट्रैन  returning  इससे  San Francisco , BART  पुलिस   अधिकारियों   detained  Oscar Grant  और   अनेक   अन्य  passengers on the platform at the  fruitvale   बार्ट  Station .
अधिकारी   योहानेस  Mehserle and another officer  यहूद  restraining Grant  ,  who was prostrate and allegedly resisting  गिरफ़्तार   .
Officer Mehserle  stood  and ,  according  to  गवाह  , said : ``  मिलेंगी  back , I  'm  gon na tase him  .   ''
तब   mehserle  drew  उसके   गन  and  शॉट  Grant once  in   the   वापस  ;  mehserle  appeared stunned ,  put  his hands to his head and  exclaimed  , ``  oh   ,  my  परमेश्वर   !  ''
During his court testimony  ,  Mehserle said  कि  Grant then exclaimed  ,  `` You shot me  !  ''
Grant turned  आउट   to   be  unarmed ;  he  was pronounced dead  the   अगला   morning   at  Highland Hospital  in  Oakland .
The  कार्यक्रम  were  captured  on  अनेक   डिजिटल   वीडियो   और   कोशिका  phone cameras  .
The footage  थी   disseminated  to media outlets  और  to various  वेबसाइटों  ,  जहाँ  it was watched millions  of   टाइम्स   .
The following  दिनों   देखी   दोनो  peaceful and  हिंसक  protests .
The  शूटिंग   रै  been  variously   labeled   an  involuntary  manslaughter   और   a   सारांश   निष्पादन   .
On  जनवरी  13  ,  Alameda  काउंटी   prosecutors  charged  mehserle  with  हत्या   लिये  the shooting .
he  resigned  उसके  position  और  pleaded not guilty  .
The trial began  on  June 10 ,  2010  .
Michael  rains  , Mehserle 's criminal  रक्षा  attorney , argued  कि  Mehserle  mistakenly  shot Grant  साथ   उसके  pistol , intending to  उपयोग  his Taser  जब   he   देखी   ग्रान्ट  reaching  लिये   उसके   waistband   .
Pretrial  filings   argue  that his client did not  कमिट  first-degree murder  और  asked a Los Angeles judge  to  instruct  the  jury  to  limit its deliberations to  either  second-degree murder or acquittal .
ओकलैंड  civil  अधिकारों  attorney John  burris  filed  a  $  25   लाख  wrongful death  अर्जी  against  बार्ट   on  behalf of Grant 's  परिवार  .
On  जुलाई  8  ,  2010  ,  the jury  लौटे   इसके  verdict :  mehserle   थी   मिला  guilty of  involuntary  manslaughter and  नहीं  guilty  of  second-degree murder and voluntary  manslaughter  .
आरंभिक   विरोध  against  the  ruling were peacefully  व्यवस्थित   ;  looting , arson ,  विनाश  of property ,  और  small  दंगे  broke out after dark .
nearly  80 people were eventually arrested .
On  शुक्रवार  , July 9 , 2010  ,   the   u.S.  Justice Department opened  a   सिविल   अधिकारों  case  विरूद्ध  Mehserle ;  the  federal  सरकारी  can  prosecute  him independently for  the   वही  act under the  पृथक  sovereigns  एक्सेप्शन   to  double jeopardy .
The Department of Justice will  be   working  with  the   u.S.  Attorney 's office in San Francisco and  the  FBI  .
on  November 5  ,   2010   ,   mehserle  was  sentenced  to two years ,  ऋण   समय   परोसा  .
He served his time in  the   लॉस  Angeles County Jail , occupying a private  कोशिका  away  इससे  other prisoners .
He was released  on   जून  13  ,  2011 and is  अभी  on  पैरोल   .
Major  प्रतिनिधि  of the Harlem Renaissance  .
the  Harlem  पुनर्जागरण  was  a  cultural movement that spanned  the   1920s  .
At  the  time ,  it  was  ज्ञात   as   the   ``  New  नीग्रो  Movement  ''  , named after the  1925   anthology  by Alain Locke .
Though  it  was centered in the Harlem neighborhood  of  New York City  ,   अनेक  French-speaking  ब्लैक   लेखक   इससे   अफ़्रीकी  and  caribbean  colonies who  जिया  in Paris  यहूद   भी   बहकावे  by the Harlem  पुनर्जागरण  .
the  Harlem Renaissance is unofficially  पहचाना   to  have  spanned   इससे  about 1919  जबतक  the early or mid-1930s  .
Many  of  its ideas  जिया  on much longer  .
the  zenith  of   इस   ``  flowering  of   नीग्रो  literature '' ,  as  James Weldon Johnson  पसन्दीदा   to   कॉल   the  Harlem Renaissance  ,   थी  placed  between  1924 ( the year  कि  Opportunity :  a   जर्नल  of  नीग्रो  Life hosted a  पार्टी  for  ब्लैक  writers  जहाँ  many  श्वेत  publishers  यहूद  in attendance ) and 1929  (  the year  of  the stock market  क्रैश   और   the   शुरूआत   of  the Great Depression ) .
African  राज्य   between   500   bce  and 1500 CE
obelisk  at  टेम्पल   of  Luxor  ,  Egypt  .
c. 1200  bce  .
अफ़्रीकी  knight  of  Baguirmi  in  full padded armour suit .
The  इतिहास  of  अफ़्रीकी  begins with the prehistory of Africa and the  emergence   of   होमो   sapiens   in  East Africa , continuing into  the  present as  a   patchwork  of diverse and politically developing  स्वदेश  states  .
Some  जल्दी  evidence of agriculture in  अफ़्रीकी   तिथियाँ  from  16,000  BCE  ,  and  metallurgy   इससे   परिचय   4000  BCE  .
The recorded history  of  early civilization arose  in  Egypt ,  और  later in  नुबिया   ,   the  Maghreb and the Horn of Africa  .
During  the  Middle  आयु  ,  islam  spread through the regions  .
क्रासिंग  the Maghreb  और  the Sahel ,  a  major  बीच   of   मुस्लिम  culture  थी   टिम्बकटू  .
Some  notable   pre-colonial  states and societies  in  Africa include the  nok  culture , Mali  साम्राज्य   ,  Ashanti Empire  ,  Kingdom  of   mapungubwe  , Kingdom of Sine , Kingdom  of  Saloum ,  किंगडम   of  Baol , Kingdom of Zimbabwe  ,   किंगडम   of   kongo   ,   प्राचीन  Carthage , Numidia ,  mauretania   ,   the  Aksumite Empire , the Ajuuraan  राज्य   और  the Adal Sultanate  .
From the late 15th  सदी  , Europeans  और  Arabs  took   स्लेव  from West , Central and Southeast  अफ़्रीकी  overseas in  the  African slave trade .
European  colonization  of Africa developed  rapidly   in  the Scramble for  अफ़्रीकी  of  the  late  19th  and early 20th centuries  .
Following  struggles   लिये   स्वतंत्रता  in many  भाग   of   the   महाद्वीप  , as well as a  weakened   यूरोपीय  after the Second World  युद्ध  ; decolonization took  प्लेस  .
अफ़्रीकी   's   इतिहास   रै  been challenging  लिये   शोधकर्ताओं  in the field of African  अध्ययन   क्युकी  of the scarcity of  लिखा  sources in large parts of sub-Saharan Africa .
scholarly   तकनीकों   ऐसे  as the  रिकॉर्डिंग  of  मौखिक  history , historical  भाषाविज्ञान  ,  पुरातत्व   और   आनुवंशिकी  have been crucial  .
curry  Foley  थी  the first player in Major  लीग  Baseball  इतिहास   to  hit  लिये   the  cycle  .
in   बेसबॉल   ,  hitting  लिये  the cycle  is  the  accomplishment  of  एक   बैटर   hitting   a  single ,  a  double  ,   a  triple ,  और   a  home run  in  the same game .
Collecting the  हिट्स   in  that order  is   ज्ञात  as  a   ``  natural  साईकिल   ''   .
चक्र  are  uncommon  in  प्रमुख   लीग  Baseball  (  MLB ) ,  और  have occurred  294  times since the  पहला  by Curry  फोली  in 1882 .
the  cycle  is  roughly  as   आम  as  a  no-hitter  (  279 occurrences in  एमएलबी   इतिहास  )  ;  it has been called `` one of the rarest  ''  and `` most  मुश्किल   feats  ''  in   बेसबॉल  .
आधारित  on  2009   अप्रिय  levels , the  संभाव्यता  of an average  एमएलबी   खिलाड़ी   hitting   लिये  a cycle  विरूद्ध   an  average  टोली  in a game  is  approximately  0.00590   %   ;  this  corresponds  to about  2.5  cycles in a 162-game  ऋतु  with 30  टीमों  .
in  other  बेसबॉल  leagues  ,   the  cycle is achieved less frequently .
through  September 4  ,  2008 ,  62  players  in   निप्पन  Professional  बेसबॉल   (  NPB  )   ,  the top-level baseball organization in Japan , have hit for the cycle ,  the  most recent being Michihiro  ogasawara   .
Two players have hit for the cycle  on  the  वही   दिन   एकबार   in  NPB  इतिहास  ; this  रै   occurred  twice in  एमएलबी   इतिहास  .
एक  NPB player has also hit for the cycle in  an  NPB All-Star game  .
no   खिलाड़ी   रै  ever hit  लिये  the cycle in the MLB All-Star Game or  the   postseason   .
The main  स्लेव  routes  in  medieval  अफ़्रीकी   .
This  आलेख  discusses  प्रणालियों   ,  history  ,   और   प्रभाव  of  गुलामी  within Africa .
See Arab  स्लेव   व्यापार  ,  अटलांटिक  slave  व्यापार  ,  maafa  , and Slavery  in  contemporary  अफ़्रीकी  for other discussions .
``  स्लेव   हस्तांतरण  in Africa '' .
Europeans  प्रायः  did not enter the interior regions  .
गुलामी  in Africa  रै  existed  throughout   the   महाद्वीप  for many  सदियां   ,   और   continues  in  the   वर्तमान   दिन  .
Systems of servitude  और  slavery  यहूद  common  in  many parts  of   the  continent  ,  as  वे  were  in  much of the  प्राचीन  world .
In most African societies  जहाँ  slavery was  प्रचलित  , the  enslaved  people were  largely   treated  as  indentured  servants and not treated as chattel slaves  .
When  the   अरब   स्लेव   व्यापार  and Atlantic slave trade  began   ,   अनेक  of the local  स्लेव   प्रणालियों  changed and began  supplying   captives   लिये  slave markets  बाहर  of Africa  .
गुलामी   in  historical  अफ़्रीकी  was practiced in many different forms  और  some  of   ये   do  not clearly fit the  परिभाषाएं   of   गुलामी   elsewhere  in the  संसार  .
कर्ज़  slavery  ,  enslavement  of   युद्ध   captives   ,  military  गुलामी   ,   और  criminal  गुलामी  were  सब  practiced in  विभिन्न  parts of Africa  .
Although  वहीँ   था  been  कुछ  trans-Saharan  व्यापार  from  the   आंतरिक  of Sub-Saharan Africa  to   अन्य   regions  ,  गुलामी  was  a   छोटी  part  of   the  economic  जीवन  of many  समाजों   in  Africa until  the   परिचय  of transcontinental slave  ट्रेड  (  अरब  and Atlantic  )  .
स्लेव  practices  यहूद   again  transformed  साथ  European  colonization  of  अफ़्रीकी  and the  औपचारिक  abolition  of  slavery in the early  1900s  .
Windows Task Manager  is   a  task manager  or  System monitor application included with  the  Microsoft  खिड़कियाँ  NT  परिवार  of  ऑपरेटिंग  systems  कि   provides   सीमित  information about computer performance  और  running applications , processes and  cpu  usage ,  कमिट  charge and memory  सूचना   ,   संजाल  activity  और  statistics ,  logged-in  users , and system  सेवाएं   (  and  as  often  is  the case with software tools  provided  by Microsoft for  खिड़कियाँ  ,  3rd  party software  is   उपलब्धियाँ   जिससे  fills  the   आवश्यकताएँ  more  thoroughly  , e.g  ,  ``  प्रक्रम  Explorer  ''  , `` Extended Task  मैनेजर  ''  ,  ``  anvir  Task Manager '' , `` Process Hacker ''  ,  and  ``  System Explorer ''  )  .
The Task  मैनेजर   can   भी  be used  to   नियत  process  प्राथमिकताएं  ,  प्रोसेसर  affinity  ,   forcibly   terminate   प्रक्रियाओं  ,  और   shut   bas  , restart  ,   hibernate  or log  बंद  from  खिड़कियाँ  .
खिड़कियाँ  Task Manager was  introduced  with Windows  nt  4.0  .
Previous versions of  खिड़कियाँ   nt  included the  कार्य  List application , which had  दूर  fewer features .
The task list  थी  capable  of  listing currently running processes  और   हत्या  them ,  or  creating a  नई  process .
In  खिड़कियाँ   xp  only ,  a  Shutdown  मेनू  is also present  कि  allows access to Standby ,  hibernate  , Turn  बंद   ,  Restart  ,   log  Off and Switch  उपयोक्ता   .
Earlier versions of  microsoft   खिड़कियाँ  ( Microsoft Windows 3.x ,  खिड़कियाँ   95   ,   खिड़कियाँ   98   )  had a program  ज्ञात   as  tasks to display  the  programs currently  कार्यशील  .
This file  थी  executed  by   कार्यशील  the  taskman.exe  file from the C :  \खिड़कीs  directory  .
the  Troop  is  an American-Canadian live-action , single  कैमरा  comedy  -adventure   टेलीविज़न   श्रेणी  about  a  trio of  teenagers   जो   लड़ो  and capture monsters and  अन्य  supernatural  phenomena  that  invade   the   fictional   कस्बा  of  lakewood   .
निर्मित  and executive produced  by  Max  burnett  , Greg  कूलिज  and Chris Morgan  ,  the series premiered  on   निकलोडियन   on  September  18  ,  2009  .
The  दूसरी   ऋतु   premiered   on  June  25  ,  2011  and Nickelodeon cancelled  the  series midway through it  's  second  ऋतु  .
The  बाकी  episodes  of  season 2  यहूद  aired on Nicktoons except the  पिछला  3..
Sparsely  आबादी   in  relation to its area ,  the  Democratic  गणतंत्र  of the Congo (  drc  )  is  home  to  a vast  संभावित  of  प्राकृतिक  resources  और  mineral wealth , its untapped  जमा  of  कच्चा  minerals are  अनुमानित  to  be  worth  in  excess  of  US $  24  trillion , yet  the   अर्थव्यवस्था  of the DRC has declined  drastically  since  the  mid-1980s .
at  the  समय  of its independence in 1960  ,   drc  was the second most  industrialized  country  in   अफ़्रीकी  after  दक्षिण  Africa  ;  it boasted a  thriving  mining sector  और  its agriculture sector was relatively productive .
If the viewer stares at  इस  image for 20–60 seconds and stares at  a   श्वेत  object  ,   a   ऋणात्मक   afterimage  will appear  (  in this  मामला  , it will be cyan on magenta )  .
इस  can also be  हासिल  by  the   दर्शक   closing  his/her eyes and tilting their  सिर   up   .
an  afterimage or  भुत  image or image burn-in is  an  optical  भ्रम  that refers  to   an  image  continuing   to  appear  in  one  's  vision after the exposure  to   the  original  चित्र  has  ceased   .
एक  of the most  आम  afterimages  is  the bright glow that seems  to  float  पहले  one  's  eyes  बाद   looking  into  a  light  सोर्स  for a  few  seconds  .
Closing the  नजर  can help  achieve  a better  भाव  of the color in its own  पहलू   .
Afterimages  आइये  in  दो  forms ,  ऋणात्मक  (  उलट  ) and  धनात्मक  ( retaining original color  )  .
the  process  पीछे  positive  afterimages   is  unknown , though thought to be related  to   neural  adaptation  .
On the other  हाथ  , negative  afterimages   हैं  a retinal phenomenon and  हैं  well  समझा  .
Lost is  an  American serial drama television series  कि   premiered  on September  22  ,  2004   on  the American Broadcasting Company ( ABC  )  .
The series was  निर्मित   by   J.  J. Abrams and Damon Lindelof  ,   आधारित  upon an original pilot script titled Nowhere written  by   जेफरी   lieber   .
छह  seasons  of  the show aired ,  in  addition  to  numerous clip  shows  to recap  पिछला   एपीसोड  .
एबीसी  announced that Lost would  समाप्त  after six seasons  ,  having  उत्पादित   a  total of 121 episodes .
The series follows the  पास्ट   ,  present , and  भविष्य  experience  (   s   )  of the  survivors  of a  प्लेन   क्रैश   on   a  passenger jet  ,  Oceanic  उड़ान   815   ,  flying from Sydney  to   लॉस  Angeles  बाद  it  क्रैश   on   a  tropical island in  the   दक्षिण  Pacific .
The series also includes  कहानियां  of the lives of  लोगों   already   जीना  on  the  island — they include the  ``   अन्य   ``   ,  who initially antagonize  the  survivors , as well as a group  of  people  जो   arrive  on the  freighter  Kahana .
Each  एपीसोड  typically features action on  the  island as  खूब  as a  द्वितीयक  storyline  इससे   another  point  in   a   अक्षर  's  जीवन  .
Season 6 features a detailing  of  the  जीवनदान  of the survivors in  a  different reality , as if  the  flight had never  क्रैश   .
In the following list , the term ``  प्रदर्शित   अक्षर  ( s )  ''   refers   to  the character  or   वर्ण  who  हैं   प्रदर्शित   in  the secondary  कथानक  of each  एपीसोड  .
``  no  .
in  श्रेणी   ''   refers  to the episode 's number in the overall series  ,   whereas  `` No  .
in season  ''  refers to  the  episode 's  क्रमांक  in  प्रत्येक   particular  season .
`` U.S.  दर्शक  (  लाख  ) ''  refers   to  the number of  अमेरिकी   in   लाखो  who watched the episode live  .
a  total of 121 episodes of  खोया  were produced  ,   the  last of  जिससे  aired on  may  23 , 2010 .

Flat  फीट   (   भी   पुकारा  pes  planus   or  fallen arches  )  is a  औपचारिक  reference to  a   चिकित्सा   कंडीशन   in   जिससे  the arch of the foot  collapses  ,  साथ  the  संपूर्ण  sole  of  the foot coming into  पूरा  or  near-complete  contact  साथ   the  ground  .
in   कुछ  individuals (  an  estimated 20–30  %   of  the general population  )  the arch simply never develops in  एक  foot (  unilaterally  ) or  दोनो  feet  (  bilaterally )  .
Three  अध्ययन  (  देखिए   citations  below in  सैन्य   खण्ड  )  of  military recruits have shown no  प्रमाण  of  बाद  increased injury  ,   or  foot  समस्याएं  , due to flat feet ,  in  a population  of  people who reach military service age  बगैर  prior  पैर  problems  .
However  ,  these studies  can   नहीं  be  प्रयुक्त  to  न्यायधीश  possible  भविष्य   क्षति  from this  कंडीशन  when diagnosed at younger ages .
वे   भी  can not  be   लागू   to  persons whose flat  फीट   हैं  associated with  पैर   लक्षण  , or  निश्चित  symptoms in other parts of  the  body (  ऐसे   as  the  लेग  or back )  संभवतः  referable to  the   पैर   .
पीढी  X  ,  commonly  abbreviated   to  Gen X  ,   is  the  पीढी  born after the Western post-World War II  baby  boom  .
Demographers ,  इतिहासकारों   और  commentators  उपयोग  beginning birth dates from the early  1960s  to  the  early 1980s .
The  पद  was  popularized  by  डगलस  Coupland  's   1991   अनोखा  Generation  x   :   किस्से  for an Accelerated  संस्कृति  .
पहले  that ,  it  had  महरूम  used  लिये   विभिन्न   subcultures  or  countercultures  after the  1950s  .
दबाव   छाले  , also known as  decubitus   छाले  or  bedsores   ,  are  स्थानीयकृत  injuries to  the   स्किन  and/or underlying  ऊतक  usually over a  बोनी   prominence   ,  as  a  result  of  pressure  ,  or  दबाव   in  combination with shear  and/or   घर्षण  .
Most commonly  इस  will  be  the sacrum , coccyx , heels  or  the hips  ,  but other sites such as the  elbows   ,  knees , ankles or  the   वापस   of   the   cranium  can  be  affected  .
the  cause of  दबाव  ulcers is pressure applied  to  soft tissue so  कि  blood  प्रवाह  to the soft tissue is completely  or  partially obstructed  .
Shear is  भी   a   कारण  ; shear  खींचता   on  blood  बरतन   कि  feed the skin .
Pressure ulcers most commonly  develop  in  व्यक्तियों  who  हैं  not moving about  or  are confined to  wheelchairs  .
it   is   widely  believed  कि  other factors  can   influence  the  सहिष्णुता  of skin for  दबाव  and  shear   thereby  increasing the risk  of  pressure  अल्सर  development  .
ये  factors are protein-calorie  कुपोषण  , microclimate (  स्किन   wetness  caused by sweating  or  incontinence  )   ,  diseases  कि   reduce   रक्त   प्रवाह   to  the skin ,  ऐसे  as arteriosclerosis or  रोगों  that  reduce  the  अहसास  in the skin  ,  such as paralysis or neuropathy .
the  healing of pressure ulcers  may  be slowed by the age of the person  ,   चिकित्सा   शर्तें   (  such  as  arteriosclerosis ,  मधुमेह   or  infection ) , smoking  or   medications  such as antiinflammatory drugs  .
Although often prevented and treatable  if  found  जल्दी  ,  दबाव   छाले  can be very  मुश्किल  to prevent in critically ill patients , frail elders , wheelchair users  (  especially where spinal  चोट   is   शामिल  ) and terminally  बीमार   मरीजों  .
Primary prevention  is  to redistribute  दबाव   by  turning the  रोगी  regularly  .
The benefit of  turning  to avoid further sores  is  well  प्रलेखित  since at least  the  19th  सदी  .
In addition  to   turning  and re-positioning  the  patient  in  bed  or  wheelchair , eating a balanced diet  साथ   पर्याप्त  protein and keeping the skin free from  एक्सपोज़र  to  मूत्र  and stool is very important .
the  prevalence of pressure ulcers  in   हॉस्पिटल  settings  is   ऊँची   ,   लकिन  improvements are  होने   बना   .
According to the  2010   ipup  ( International Pressure  अल्सर   व्यापकता  Survey  )  conducted in  कनाडा  , there was a significant  घटी  in the  overall  facility-acquired  व्यापकता  of pressure  छाले  from  2009-2010  .
Ulcers  यहूद  most commonly identified at the sacral/coccyx ulcer location ; however , heel  छाले   यहूद   the  most common facility-acquired location in the  सर्वेक्षण   .
overboard   is  a  1987   अमरीकी  romantic  कॉमेडी  film starring  goldie  Hawn  और  Kurt  रसेल  .
it  was directed  by   गैरी  Marshall  ,   उत्पादित  by Roddy McDowell ,  और   loosely  inspired by the  1974   इतालवी   फिल्मी  Swept Away .
in   फेरे   ,   overboard  was adapted  into  the 2006  दक्षिण   कोरियाई  television series  ,   युगल   or   ट्रबल  .
ग्रीन  Bay is a  नगर  in  और  the  काउंटी  seat of Brown  काउंटी   in   the  U.S.  राज्य  of Wisconsin , located at  the  head of  ग्रीन  Bay  ,   a  sub-basin of Lake Michigan , at the  मुँह   of  the Fox  नदी  .
it   रै  an elevation  of  above sea level and  is   स्तिथ   उत्तर   of  Milwaukee .
The population was 104,057 at the  2010  census  .
It is  the   third-largest  city in the  राज्य  of  विस्कॉन्सिन  ,  बाद   मिल्वौकी  and Madison .
it   is  also the third-largest  नगर   on   the  west shore of Lake Michigan  ,  after  शिकागो   और   मिल्वौकी  .
ग्रीन   खाड़ी  is  घर   to  the  ग्रीन  Bay  पैकर्स   of  the  नेशनल  Football  लीग  ,  बनाना  it by far the  smallest   महानगर   क्षेत्रफल   in   the  USA to  मेजबान  a major  पेशेवर  sports franchise .
ग्रीन   खाड़ी   is   the  principal  नगर  of the Green Bay  महानगर  Statistical  क्षेत्रफल  , which covers Brown , Kewaunee , and Oconto Counties  और  had  a   संयुक्त   जनसांख्यिकी  of  282,599   at   the  2000 census  .
ग्रीन  Bay is an  औद्योगिक  city  साथ   अनेक  meatpacking and  पेपर  plants , and a  बंदरगाहों   on  Green Bay ,  an  arm of  झील  Michigan that  स्थानीय   कॉल  the Bay of Green Bay  ,   to  avoid conflating it  साथ   the  eponymous  नगर  .
It  is   घर   to  the National Railroad  संग्रहालय   ;   the  Neville Public Museum  ,  with exhibitions  of   आर्ट  ,  इतिहास  ,  और  science  ;  and the  विश्वविद्यालयों   of  Wisconsin–Green  खाड़ी  .
luteinizing  hormone ( LH , also known  as   lutropin   और   sometimes  lutrophin )  is   a   हार्मोन   उत्पादित  by gonadotroph  कोशिकाएं   in   the  anterior pituitary gland .
In females  ,  an acute  वृद्धि  of LH  (  ``  lh   surge   ''  )  triggers   ovulation  and development of the  कॉर्पस   luteum   .
In males , where  lh  had also been called  अंतरालीय   cell-stimulating  hormone ( ICSH  )   ,   it  stimulates Leydig cell  उत्पादन  of testosterone .
it   अधिनियमों  synergistically  साथ   fsh  .
Selena  quintanilla-pérez  (  अप्रैल  16  ,  1971 –  कूच  31 ,  1995   )  ,  ज्ञात  simply  as  Selena ,  थी  an American singer-songwriter .
She was named the  ``  top Latin  कलाकार  of  the   '90s  '' and ``  बेहतरीन  selling Latin  कलाकार  of the  दशक  ''  by   बिलबोर्ड  for her fourteen top-ten singles  in   the   शीर्ष  Latin Songs chart , including  सात  number-one hits .
सेलिना   था   the   सबसे  successful  singles  of 1994  और  1995 , ``  amor  Prohibido  ``  and `` No  me  Queda Más ``  .
She was called  ``  The Queen of  tejano   म्यूज़िक   ``   और  the Mexican  समतुल्य  of  मैडोना  .
Selena released  उसके  first  एल्बम  ,  सेलिना  y Los Dinos  ,  at the  आयु  of twelve  .
वो  won Female Vocalist  of  the Year  at   the   1987  Tejano Music Awards and  उतरा   a  recording  अनुबंध  with  emi  a  few  years later .
उसके  fame grew  throughout  the  जल्दी   1990s  ,  विशेषकर  in  spanish-speaking   देशों   ,   और  she  था  begun recording in English as  खूब  .
Selena  थी  murdered at the age of 23 on  कूच  31 , 1995 by Yolanda  saldívar  , the  पूर्व  president of  उसके   प्रशंसक  club .
on  April 12 , 1995 , two weeks  बाद  her death  ,   जार्ज   W.  Bush , governor of  टेक्सास  at  the  time ,  घोषित  her birthday ``  सेलिना   दिन  '' in  टेक्सास  .
Warner Bros. produced Selena , a  फिल्मी  based on  उसके  life starring  जेनिफर   लोपेज़   ,   in   1997  .
सेलिना   's  life was  भी  the basis of the musical Selena Forever starring Veronica  vazquez  as Selena .
in   जून  2006  सेलिना   थी   commemorated  with  a  life-sized bronze statue (  mirador   de   la  Flor in  कॉर्पस   christi   ,   टेक्सास   )   और   a  Selena museum opened there  .
She has  बेची   over   60  million albums  विश्वव्यापी  ,  बनाना   उसके   एक  of the best-selling artists  of  all  समय   .
She is  भी   the   तभी   मादा  artist  to  have  पाँच   एल्बम   in   u.s   .   बिलबोर्ड  200  at   the  same  समय  .
जर्मनी   stahlhelm  from World War II
Insignia  of  the Bolivian Army Colorados regiment  ,   प्रर्दशित  a Stahlhelm  और  two  crossed   bayonets
stahlhelm   (   बहुवचन   ,  Stahlhelme  )   is  German for `` steel helmet ''  .
The  इम्पीरियल   जर्मनी   फौज  began  to  replace the traditional boiled-leather Pickelhaube ( spiked combat  हेल्मेट  ) with the Stahlhelm during World War  i   in  1916  .
The  पद  Stahlhelm refers both to a  जेनेरिक   स्टील  helmet  ,  and  अधिक  specifically to  the  distinctive ( and iconic ) German design  .
The Stahlhelm  ,  with  इसके   distinctive   ``   कोयले  scuttle ``  आकार  , was  an  instantly  recognizable  icon  लिये   सैन्य  imagery and  became  a common  तत्व  of military propaganda on  दोनो  sides , just like  the  Pickelhaube before  it  .
इसके   नाम   थी   भी  used  by   the  Stahlhelm , a  अर्धसैनिक   राष्ट्रवादी   संगठन  established at the end of 1918 .
glow-in-the-dark   may  refer to:
जीवदीप्ति   ,   the  production  और   उत्सर्जन  of light  by  a  जीना   सजीव
Chemiluminescence  ,   is   the   उत्सर्जन  of light  (   संदीप्ति   )  without  उत्सर्जन  of  ऊष्मा
Phosphorescence , a specific type  of   photoluminescence   सम्बन्धित  to fluorescence
radioluminescence   ,  production  of  luminescence  in   a  material by the bombardment of  आयनकारी  radiation
Glow in  the  Dark  दौरे  ,  a   2008  concert tour by Kanye West
फ्रैंकफर्ट   विमानक्षेत्र   serves  as a hub city for  लुफ़्थान्सा  and  receives  flights  इससे   स्टार   गठबंधन   वाहक   .
Airline hubs  हैं   एयरपोर्ट   क्रमित  as large ,  मीडियम  ,  छोटी  ,  और  non-hubs  as   एक  of the FAA  विमानक्षेत्र   श्रेणी   जिससे  are re-evaluated every year based  on   क्रमांक  of commercial  यात्री  .
the   अधिक  common but  अनौपचारिक  use for the  phrase  airline hub is an airport that an  एयरलाइन  uses as  a   ट्रांसफ़र   पाइंट  to get  यात्री  to  उनके   intended   गंतव्य   .
it  is  भाग  of a  हब   और   spoke   मॉडल  , where  travelers   चलती  between airports not  परोसा  by  सीधा  flights  बदलें   planes  en  रूट  to their destinations .
इस   is   as  opposed to  the  Point to  पाइंट   मॉडल  .
Many hubs of the airlines are  भी  situated at airports  in  the cities of the  संबंधित  head  कार्यालयों  .
Some airlines  may  use only a  सिंगल   हब  ,  जबकि   अन्य  airlines use multiple  hubs  .
Hubs  हैं  used for  दोनो   यात्री   फ़्लाइट  as well  as   कार्गो  flights .
अनेक   एयरलाइंस  also use focus  शहरों  , which function  much   the  same as hubs  .
Airlines  may   भी  use secondary hubs  ,  a  non-technical   पद  for  विशाल  focus  शहरों   .
a  hub in  the   मध्य  of  a  route  is   अधिक  effective than at  either  end as connecting  ट्रैफ़िक  more  easily   भरता  the plane  -  passengers prefer a one-stop ( two-leg )  रूट  over a two-stop  (   three-leg  )  रूट   .
Hollow Lacedaemon .
साईट  of the  menelaion   ,  the  shrine  to Helen and Menelaus  constructed   anciently  in  the  Bronze  आयु   नगर  that stood on the hill  of  Therapne  on  the left bank of the Eurotas  नदी   निहार  the  भविष्य  site of Dorian  स्पार्टा  .
आरपार   the  valley the successive ridges  of   माउंट  Taygetus  हैं   in  evidence .
Sparta  (  Doric Greek : ;  अटारी  Greek : )  ,  or Lacedaemon  ,   थी  a  prominent   city-state  in ancient  यूनानियों   ,   situated  on  the  banks  of  the Eurotas River in  laconia  ,  in   south-eastern   पेलोपोनीज़   .
It emerged  as   a  political  एंटिटी  around the 10th century BC ,  जब  the invading Dorians subjugated the  लोकल  , non-Dorian population  .
around  650 BC ,  it   रोज़   to  become the dominant military land-power  in  ancient Greece .
Given  इसके  military pre-eminence ,  स्पार्टा  was recognized as the  overall   नेता  of the combined  यूनानी  forces during  the   greco-persian   युद्धों   .
between  431 and  404   bc  , Sparta was the  प्रिंसिपल   दुश्मन  of  एथेंस   दौरान  the Peloponnesian War , from  जिससे   it  emerged victorious  ,  though at  ग्रेट  cost  .
Sparta 's  शिकस्त  by Thebes in  the  Battle of Leuctra in 371 BC  ended   स्पार्टा   's   prominent  role  in  Greece .
however  ,  it   कायम  its political independence until the  रोमन  conquest of Greece  in  146 BC .
it  then  underwent  a long  काल  of decline  ,   विशेषकर   in   the  Middle Ages , when many  spartans   स्थानांतरित  to live  in  Mystras .
आधुनिक   स्पार्टा  is the capital of  the   यूनानी   क्षेत्रीय  unit of Laconia and  a   बीच  for the processing  of  goods such as  citrus  and olives  .
स्पार्टा  was  अद्वितीय  in  प्राचीन   यूनानियों  for its  सोशल   प्रणाली  and  संविधान  , which  completely  focused  on  military  प्रशिक्षण   और   excellence  .
Its  निवासियों   यहूद  classified as Spartiates  (  Spartan citizens ,  जो   enjoyed   पूरा   अधिकारों  ) ,  mothakes  ( non-Spartan free  मेन   उठाया   as  Spartans ) ,  perioikoi  ( freedmen  )   ,  and Helots ( state-owned serfs  ,  enslaved non-Spartan local population ) .
Spartiates  underwent   the   कठोर   agoge  training  और   शिक्षा  regimen , and  spartan  phalanges were  widely  considered to  be  among  the   बेहतरीन  in  बैटल  .
spartan  women  enjoyed  considerably  अधिक  rights and  समता   to  men  than   elsewhere   in  the  शास्त्रीय   संसार  .
Sparta was the  विषय  of  fascination  in its own day , as well  as  in  the  West following the revival of classical  सीखना  .
This love  or  admiration of Sparta is  ज्ञात  as  laconism  or  laconophilia   .
Fantasy football  is  an interactive competition in which users compete  विरूद्ध   प्रत्येक  other as general  प्रबंधक  of virtual  टीमों  .
The players  कि   an  individual  is   समर्थ  to  मैनेज   हैं   पेशेवर  American  फ़ुटबॉल  players  in   the  National Football League .
The different  क्रियाएँ   लोगों   हैं   समर्थ   to  make are  drafting  , trading , adding or  छोड़ने   खिलाड़ी   ,   और   बदलना  rosters  .
due  to the  विकास  of the Internet , Fantasy football  रै  vastly increased in  लोकप्रियता  , particularly because Fantasy  फ़ुटबॉल  providers such as  ईएसपीएन  , Yahoo , CBS  ,   और   the  NFL itself are able to keep  track   of  statistics  entirely  online  ,  eliminating  the   need  to  जाँच  box scores  और   अखबारों   regularly  to  रखना  track  of  players  .
सबसे   लीग  have  a  single week championship  in   सप्ताह  16  of  the  एनएफएल  season .
संसार   जनसांख्यिकी  estimates from  1800  to 2100  ,   आधारित  on UN 2010 projections (  रेड  , orange ,  ग्रीन  ) and US  जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau  ऐतिहासिक  estimates ( black  )  .
Actual recorded  जनसांख्यिकी   आंकड़े   हैं  in  ब्लू  .
According to the  उच्चतम   अनुमान  , the world  जनसांख्यिकी   may   वृद्धि  to  16  billion  by   2100   ;  according to  the   न्यूनतम  estimate  ,   it   may  decline to  6  billion  .
The  संसार  population is  the   कुल  number of living humans  on  Earth .
As  of  today  ,  it  is  estimated to  क्रमांक   अरब  by  the  United  राज्य  Census Bureau  (  USCB  )  .
the  USCB  estimates   कि   the   संसार  population exceeded  7   अरब  on  कूच  12 ,  2012  .
According to a separate estimate by  the   संयुक्त  Nations Population Fund  ,   it  reached this milestone on October  31  ,  2011  .
The  संसार   जनसांख्यिकी  has experienced continuous  विकास  since  the   समाप्त   of  the  ग्रेट  Famine and  the  Black  मौत   in   1350   ,  when  it  stood at around  370   लाख  .
the  highest  दरों  of growth – global population increases  ऊपर  1.8 %  प्रति  year  –  were  देखी   briefly  during  the  1950s , and for  a  longer period during the 1960s  और  1970s .
The growth rate  peaked   at   2.2   %  in 1963  ,   और  had declined  to   1.1  %  by  2011 .
कुल  annual births were highest  in   the  late 1980s  at  about 138 million  ,   और  are now  अपेक्षित   to  remain essentially constant  at   उनके  2011 level of 134 million  ,   जबकि   मौतों  number  56  million  प्रति   साल   ,  and are expected to increase to  80  million per year  by  2040 .
Current projections show  a  continued increase in  जनसांख्यिकी   in   the   निकट  future ( but a steady decline in the  जनसांख्यिकी  growth rate ) , with  the   वैश्विक   जनसांख्यिकी   अपेक्षित  to reach between 7.5 and  10.5   अरब   by  2050 .
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth ,  stagnation  ,  or   भी   overall  decline in  the   वैश्विक   जनसांख्यिकी  by 2150 .
कुछ   विश्लेषकों   have  questioned the  स्थिरता   of   further   संसार   जनसांख्यिकी  growth , citing the  growing  pressures on the  पर्यावरण  ,  वैश्विक  food  आपूर्तियाँ   ,  and energy resources  .
Skeletal muscles  होमो  sapiens
This  is   a  table of muscles  of  the human anatomy .
There  हैं  approximately  642   skeletal  muscles within  the   ठेठ  human  ,   और  almost every  मांसपेशी   constitutes   एक  part  of   a  pair of identical bilateral  मांसपेशियां  , found on both sides ,  resulting   in   लगभग  320  pairs   of  muscles , as presented in  इस   आलेख  .
nevertheless  , the  सटीक  number is difficult to define because  अलग   स्त्रोत  group  मांसपेशियां   differently   ,  e.g .  regarding   कया   is  defined  as   अलग   भाग   of  a single  मांसपेशी   or  as several muscles  .
Examples  दायरा   इससे   640   to  850 .
the   मांसपेशियां  of  the  human  देह   can   be   categorized   into   a  number  of   समूह  which include muscles relating to  the  head and  गर्दन   ,  muscles of the torso  or   ट्रंक   ,  muscles of  the  upper limbs  ,  and muscles of  the  lower  limbs  .
the  action refers to the  कार्रवाई  of each muscle from the  मानक   anatomical  position .
in  other  स्थितियाँ  ,  अन्य  actions  may   be  performed  .
a  gold bar is  a  quantity  of  refined  धात्विक  gold  of  any shape  कि  is made by  a  bar producer meeting  मानक   शर्तें   of  manufacture ,  labeling  ,  और   रिकार्ड  keeping  .
larger  gold bars  कि  are  उत्पादित  by  pouring  the molten  मेटल   into   molds   हैं  called ingots  .
Smaller bars may be  manufactured  by  minting  or stamping  इससे  appropriately  लिपटे   सुनहरा   चादरें  .
the  standard gold  बार   आयोजित   as   सुनहरा   reserves  by central  बैंको   और  traded among bullion dealers is  the  400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg  or   438.9   औंस  ) Good  डिलीवरी  gold bar .
the  kilobar , which is to  कह  1000 grams in  द्रव्यमान   ,  is the  बार  that  is  more manageable and is  प्रयुक्त   extensively  for trading and investment .
The premium on these bars when traded  is   बहुत  low over  the   स्पॉट   मान  of the gold  बनाना  it ideal for small  हस्तांतरण  between banks  और  traders  .
Most  kilobars  are flat  ,   हालांकि   कुछ  investors  ,  particularly in  यूरोपीय  ,  prefer  the brick shape  .
elisha  Archibald  ``   आर्ची  ''  मैनिंग  III ( born May 19  ,   1949  ) is  a  former American football quarterback in  the  National  फ़ुटबॉल   लीग  ,  playing   लिये  the New  ऑरलियन्स   संतो  from 1971  to  1982 ,  तब  for  the  Houston Oilers  और  Minnesota  वाइकिंग्स  .
He is  the  father of  वर्तमान   डेनवर   broncos   क्वार्टरबैक   peyton   मैनिंग   ,   वर्तमान  New York Giants  starting   क्वार्टरबैक  Eli Manning , and former  ओले   मिस  receiver  कूपर  Manning .
Advocacy  is   a  political  प्रक्रम  by an individual  or   समूह  which aims to influence public-policy  और  resource allocation  निर्णय  within  राजनैतिक   ,  economic , and  सोशल   प्रणालियों  and  संस्थानों  .
वकालत   can  include many  क्रियाएँ   कि  a person or  संगठन  undertakes  सहित   मीडिया   अभियान   ,  public speaking  ,  commissioning  और  publishing research or  पोल  or  the  filing  of   an   amicus  brief  .
Lobbying ( often by  लॉबी   समूह  ) is a form of  वकालत   जहाँ   a  direct  दृष्टिकोण   is   बना  to  विधायक  on an issue which plays  a  significant role  in  modern politics .
Research  is   शुरूआत   to  explore how  वकालत  groups in the U.S. and Canada are  using   सोशल  media to  सुकर   नागरिक  engagement and  सामूहिक   कार्रवाई  .
The flag  of  Mexico ( Spanish  :   bandera   de   méxico  ) is  a  vertical  तिरंगा  of  ग्रीन   ,   श्वेत  , and  रेड  with the national coat  of   बाहें  charged  in  the  बीच  of the white  stripe   .
While the  अर्थ   of   the  colors  रै  changed  over   समय   ,  these three  रंगों  were adopted by Mexico  following   स्वतंत्रता   इससे  Spain  दौरान   the  country 's War of Independence ,  और  subsequent First  मैक्सिकन  Empire  .
The current flag was adopted in  1968   ,   लकिन  the  overall  design  रै  been  प्रयुक्त  since 1821  ,   जब   the  First  नेशनल   ध्वज   थी  created  .
The  वर्तमान  law  of   नेशनल  symbols  ,  Law on  the   नेशनल  Arms , Flag  ,   और   गान  , that governs the  उपयोग  of  the  national flag has  महरूम  in place since 1984  .
रेड  ,  श्वेत  ,  और  green are the  रंगों   of   the  national  मुक्ति   फौज  in Mexico .
The central emblem  is  the Aztec  pictogram  for  tenochtitlan  (  अभी  Mexico  नगर  ) , the center  of  their empire .
It recalls  the  legend that inspired  the  Aztecs to  settle  on what  थी   originally  a lake-island  .
the   रूप   of  the  कोट   of  arms  थी  most  recently  revised in  1968  .
A  रिबन  in  the  national  रंगों  is at the  नीचे  of the  कोट   of  arms  .
Throughout  इतिहास   ,  the  ध्वज   रै   बदला  four times ,  as  the  डिज़ाइन  of  the  coat of arms  और   the   length-width   ratios   of  the flag  have  been  परिवर्धित   .
However ,  the  coat of arms has  था  the same features  throughout   :  an  त्रिभुज  , holding  a   serpent   in  its talon  ,  is  perched   on   शीर्ष   of  a  prickly  pear cactus  ;  the cactus  is  situated  on   a  rock that rises  ऊपर   a   झील  .
The coat  of  arms is  निकला  from  an   एज़टेक   लेजेंड  that their  देवताओं  told them to  निर्माण  a city where they spot an  त्रिभुज  on a nopal  खाने   a  serpent ,  जिससे   is   अभी  Mexico City .
The current national flag ,  the   चौथी   नेशनल  Flag  ,  is also used as the  मैक्सिकन  naval  ensign  by ships registered in Mexico .
A destination marketing  संगठन  or  सम्मेलन   और  visitor bureau  promotes   a  town , city  ,  region , or country in order to increase the  क्रमांक  of visitors  .
It promotes  the  development  और  marketing of  a   गंतव्य  ,  focusing  on convention  बिक्री   ,   पर्यटन   विपणन   ,  and  सेवाएं  .
ऐसे  organizations  प्रचार   आर्थिक  development  of   a  destination by increasing visits from  पर्यटकों  and  कारोबार   travelers  , which  generates  overnight lodging  लिये  a destination  ,  visits to restaurants  ,  and shopping  revenues  .
Convention  और  visitor  bureaus  are  the  most important  पर्यटन  marketing  संगठन  in  उनके   संबंधित  tourist destinations , as they are  सीधे  responsible  लिये   विपणन  the  गंतव्य  brand  through  travel  और   पर्यटन   ``  product awareness  ''  to visitors .
DMOs  उपज  billions  of  dollars in  सीधा   और  indirect  आय   और   कर  for their destinations ' economies  साथ  their marketing and sales expertise .
गंतव्य  marketing organizations are  प्रायः  called  सफर   ,   सम्मेलन  , visitors ,  or  tourism bureaux  ,  welcome centers  ,  information centers  और   अधिक  .
regardless  of the name  ,   ये  organizations offer many  सेवाएं  to the  traveling   पब्लिक   .
The elk  or  wapiti  (  Cervus canadensis  )  is  एक  of  the   largest  species of deer  in  the world  ,  and one  of  the largest  जमीन   स्तनधारियों   in  North  अमेरिका  and  पूर्वी   एशिया   .
It was  long   believed   to   be  a subspecies of the  यूरोपीय  red  हिरण  (  cervus  elaphus )  ,  but evidence from  a   2004  study of the  mitochondrial  DNA indicates  कि  the two are distinct species .
This  एनिमल  should not be confused with  the  larger moose (  alces   alces  )  ,   to  which  the  name  ``  elk '' applies in  यूरेशिया   .
Apart  इससे   the   मूस  ,  the  only  अन्य   सदस्य  of the deer family to  प्रतिद्वंद्वी   the   नीलगाय   in   आकार  is  the   दक्षिण  Asian  sambar  ( Rusa  unicolor  ) .
Elk range in forest  और  forest-edge habitat  ,   feeding  on grasses  ,  plants , leaves , and bark  .
हालांकि   देशी  to  उत्तर   अमेरिका   और  eastern  एशिया  , they have  adapted  well  to   देशों   जहाँ  they  have   महरूम  introduced  ,  including Argentina , Australia , and New Zealand .
उनके   ग्रेट  adaptability may  threaten  endemic species and ecosystems  into  which they  have  been introduced  .
Male elk have large antlers which  हैं  shed each year  .
Males also engage  in  ritualized  समागम  behaviors  दौरान   the  rut , including  posturing   ,  antler  कुश्ती  ( sparring ) ,  और  bugling  ,   a   लाउड  series of  vocalizations   जिससे  establishes  दबदबा   over  other  males   और  attracts females .
नीलगाय  are  susceptible  to  a  number  of  infectious  रोगों   ,  some of which can  be   transmitted  to livestock .
Efforts  to   eliminate   संक्रामक  diseases  इससे  elk populations  ,   largely   through  vaccination , have  था  mixed success  .
Some  संस्कृतियों   आदर   the   नीलगाय  as a  आध्यात्मिक  force .
In parts  of   एशिया  , antlers and their  मखमल   हैं   प्रयुक्त  in traditional  दवाइयाँ   .
Elk are  hunted  as a  खेल  species ; the  मांस  is leaner and  उच्चतर  in  प्रोटीन  than beef  or   मुर्गा  .
the   जार्ज   वॉशिंगटन   विश्वविद्यालयों  ( GW , GWU  ,   or   जार्ज  Washington )  is  a comprehensive  निजी  ,  coeducational   शोध  university located in Washington ,  d.C.   .
it  awards certificates  ,  Bachelor degrees ,  मास्टर्स  degrees  ,  and  phds  across  अनेक   दर्जन  disciplines  .
the   विश्वविद्यालयों  was chartered by  an   अधिनियम  of  कॉंग्रेस  on  फ़रवरी  9  ,  1821  as   the   columbian   कॉलेज   in  the District of  कोलंबिया  .
The  शेर   (   पेंथेरा  leo )  is  one  of   the  four big  बिल्लियों  in the genus  पेंथेरा   और   a  member of  the   परिवार  Felidae  .
साथ   कुछ  males  exceeding   in  weight  ,  it  is   the  second-largest living  बिल्ली  after the tiger .
Wild lions  फिलहाल  exist in sub-Saharan  अफ़्रीकी  and in  एशिया   (  where an endangered  remnant   जनसांख्यिकी  resides in  गिर  Forest  नेशनल  Park in  इण्डिया  )  जबकि  other types  of   शेर   have   disappeared  from North Africa  और   दक्षिणपश्चिम  Asia  in  historic  टाइम्स  .
जबतक  the late Pleistocene ,  परिचय   10,000  years ago , the lion  थी   the  most widespread  विशाल   जमीन  mammal after humans  .
They  यहूद   मिला  in most  of  Africa  ,  across  यूरेशिया  from western Europe  to  India  ,  and  in  the Americas from  the   yukon   to   पेरू   .
The lion is a vulnerable species ,  having  seen a major  जनसांख्यिकी   मनाही  of 30–50  %   over  the past two  दशकों  in its  अफ़्रीकी  range  .
Lion  populations  are  untenable  outside designated reserves  और  national  पार्क  .
हालांकि  the  कारण  of the decline is not  fully  understood ,  आवास   घाटा   और  conflicts  साथ  humans are currently the greatest causes  of  concern .
भीतर  Africa  ,   the  West  अफ़्रीकी   शेर   जनसांख्यिकी  is  विशेषकर  endangered  .
Lions live for  10–14  years in the wild  ,  while in  captivity   वे  can live  longer  than 20 years  .
in  the  जंगली   ,   males   seldom   सजीव  longer  than  10 years  ,  as  चोटों   sustained  from  continual  fighting  साथ   प्रतिद्वंद्वी  males greatly reduce their  आयु   .
They typically inhabit  सवाना  and  घासभूमि   ,  although  वे  may take to bush and forest .
शेर  are  unusually   सोशल   compared  to other cats .
A  अभिमान  of lions consists of related  महिलाओं   और  offspring  और  a small  क्रमांक   of   वयस्क   males  .
Groups  of   मादा  lions  typically   हंट   साथ   ,  preying  ज़्यादातर   on  large ungulates .
शेर   हैं  apex and keystone predators  ,   हालांकि  they scavenge as  अवसर  allows  .
While lions do not  typically  hunt humans ,  कुछ  have  महरूम  known to do so .
sleeping   मुख्यतः  during  the  day , lions are primarily  nocturnal   ,   हालांकि   bordering  on crepuscular  in   प्रकृति  .
Highly distinctive  ,  the male  शेर  is  easily  recognised by  इसके  mane , and its face is one of  the   सबसे   widely  recognised animal  प्रतीकों   in   इंसान   संस्कृति  .
Depictions  have   existed   इससे  the  अपर   paleolithic  period , with carvings  और  paintings  इससे  the Lascaux and  chauvet   गुफाएं  , through  वस्तुतः   सब   प्राचीन  and  मध्यकालीन  cultures where they  एकबार  occurred .
it   रै  been  extensively  depicted in sculptures ,  in  paintings  ,   on   नेशनल  flags , and in  समकालीन   films  and literature .
शेर   have  been  रखा  in menageries since the  समय   of  the Roman Empire , and have  महरूम  a  कुंजी   प्रजाति  sought  लिये   प्रदर्शनी  in  zoos  over the world since  the   लेट  18th century  .
zoos  are cooperating worldwide  in  breeding  कार्यक्रम   लिये   the  endangered Asiatic  subspecies  .
in  the history of video games , the seventh generation of  consoles   is  the previous generation  ,  and includes  consoles   released  since late by Nintendo , Microsoft  ,   और  Sony  .
लिये  home consoles  ,  the seventh generation began on 22  नवम्बर  2005  साथ  the  रिलीज  of  एक्सबॉक्स   360  and continued with the release of  प्लेस्टेशन  3 on  11   नवम्बर   2006  , and  वी  on 19 November  2006  .
Each new  कंसोल  introduced  a   नई  type of breakthrough in technology  .
the   एक्सबॉक्स   360  offered games rendered natively at HD resolutions , the PlayStation 3 offered ,  in   जोड   to   fhd   गेमिंग  , HD  फिल्म  playback  via   a   built-in  3D Blu-ray  डिस्क  player  ,   और  the Wii  केन्द्रित   on  integrating controllers with movement sensors as  खूब   as   joysticks   .
Joining  निन्टेंडो  in  the  motion  मार्केट  ,  सोनी  released the PlayStation Move  in  September 2010  .
the  PlayStation Move  सुविधाएँ   गति  sensing gaming , similar  to  that of the Wii  .
microsoft   भी   joined  Sony  और   निन्टेंडो   ,  with  इसके  Kinect .
Unlike the other two systems  (   प्लेस्टेशन  3  और  Wii )  ,   kinect   करता   नहीं  use any  परिरक्षक  of any sort and  makes  the users the ``  नियंत्रक  . ''
Having sold 8  लाख   इकाई  in  इसके   पहला   60  days on  the  market  ,  Kinect  रै   claimed  the  गिनीज  World  रिकार्ड  of being the `` fastest selling consumer  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स   यंत्र  ''  .
जबकि  the  एक्सबॉक्स  360 offers  तार   परिरक्षक  as  a   स्टैंडअलोन   उत्पाद  , all PlayStation  3   परिरक्षक  can  be  used  in  wired and  बेतार   configurations   .
Starting with handheld  consoles   ,  the seventh  पीढी   began   on   21  November 2004  साथ  the  उत्तर   अमरीकी  introduction of the Nintendo  ds   as   a  ``  तीसरा   pillar  '' ,  alongside   निन्टेंडो  's  मौजूदा  Game Boy Advance  और  GameCube consoles  .
The  निन्टेंडो  DS ( NDS ) features  a   टच  screen  और   built-in  microphone , and supports wireless IEEE 802.11 (  wi-fi   )   मानकों  .
Additionally  ,   the   संशोधित  version  of   the   nds   ,   the  DSi ,  सुविधाएँ   दो   निर्मित   in   कैमरे   ,  the ability to  डाउनलोड  games from the DSi store  ,  and a web browser .
the   प्लेस्टेशन  Portable , or PSP ,  released   बाद  the same year  on   12   दिसम्बर  2004 ,  followed  a different pattern .
It became the  पहला  handheld video game  कंसोल   to  use an  ऑप्टिकल   डिस्क  format , Universal Media  डिस्क   (   umd  )  ,  as its  प्राथमिक   भंडार  media  .
Sony  भी  gave  the   psp  robust multi-media  काबिलियत   ,   कनेक्टिविटी  with the  प्लेस्टेशन   3  and other PSPs ,  और  Internet connectivity .
the  Nintendo  ds  likewise has connectivity to  the   अंतरजाल   through   the  Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection and  निन्टेंडो  DS Browser , as  खूब  as  बेतार  connectivity  to  other DS systems and Wii  consoles  .
despite  high sales numbers  लिये  both  consoles   ,   प्लेस्टेशन   पोर्टेबल  sales have consistently  पिछड़ापन  behind those of the Nintendo  ds  ; nevertheless  ,  the  प्लेस्टेशन   पोर्टेबल   रै  the  भेद   of  being  the   best-selling  non-Nintendo  हैंडहेल्ड  gaming system .
Sgt . Pepper 's Lonely Hearts Club Band  (  often shortened  to   sgt  . Pepper  )  is the eighth studio album by English  चट्टान   बैंड   the   बीटल्स  .
Released in  जून  1967  ,   the   एल्बम  included songs  ऐसे   as   ``   साथ  a Little Help from My Friends `` , `` Lucy in  the  Sky with Diamonds  ``   ,  and  ``   a  Day in  the  Life `` .
Continuing  the  artistic maturation seen on the  बैंड   's   एल्बम  Revolver ( 1966  )   ,  Sgt .  pepper   further  departed from the  conventional  pop rock idiom  of  the time  और   incorporated   balladry  ,  साइकेडेलिक  , music hall , and symphonic influences .
During the  sgt  .  pepper  sessions , the group improved upon the quality  of   उनके   म्यूज़िक  's production  जबकि   exploring  experimental  रिकॉर्डिंग   तकनीकों   .
Producer George  मार्टिन  's  अभिनव  approach included the use of an  ऑर्केस्ट्रा   .
widely  acclaimed  और  imitated ,  the  album  कवर   ,   designed  by English  पॉप  artists  पीटर  Blake and  jann  Haworth  ,  was inspired by  a   स्केच  by Paul McCartney  कि   चित्रित  the  बैंड   पोज़  in front  of  a  कोलाज  of some of their  पसंदीदा   हस्तियाँ  .
Sgt .  pepper   थी   a  worldwide  नाजुक  and commercial  कामयाबी  , spending 27 weeks at the top  of   the   uk  Album  चार्ट  and 15 weeks at number one  on  the US  बिलबोर्ड  200 .
a   seminal  work in  the   उभरते   साइकेडेलिक  rock  स्टाइल  , the album was critically  acclaimed   upon   रिलीज   और  won  चार  Grammy Awards  in   1968   .
साथ  an estimated  32  million copies  बेची  ,  it  is  एक   of  the world  's  best selling albums .
sgt  .  pepper  is considered by many to be the  सबसे   influential   और   प्रसिद्ध   चट्टान  album ever  ,   और   रै  been  नामित   the  greatest album of all  समय   by  both  सब  Time Top  1000   एल्बम  and Rolling  स्टोन  .
The  temporal  lobe is  a  region of  the   दिमागी  cortex  कि   is   स्तिथ   beneath   the  lateral fissure on  दोनो   दिमागी  hemispheres  of   the  mammalian  दिमाग   .
The  temporal   निर्मोक   हैं  involved in  the  retention  of  visual memories , processing sensory  इनपुट   ,   comprehending   भाषा  , storing  नई   यादें   ,  emotion  ,  and deriving  अर्थ  .
The human lungs are  the   अंगों   of  respiration  in  humans .
Humans have  दो   फेफड़े  , a right lung and  a  left  फेफड़ों  .
the   सही  lung consists  of   तीन   निर्मोक  while the left  फेफड़ों   is   थोड़ा  smaller  consisting   of  only two lobes ( the left  फेफड़ों   रै  a ``  हृदय  notch ''  allowing   स्पेस   लिये   the  heart  भीतर  the chest ) .
Together ,  the  lungs  contain   लगभग   of  airways and 300 to 500 million  alveoli   ,  having  a   कुल  surface  क्षेत्रफल  of  परिचय   (   )  in adults — roughly  the  same  क्षेत्रफल  as one side of a tennis court .
Furthermore  ,  if all of the  capillaries  that surround the  alveoli   यहूद   unwound   और  laid end  to  end ,  वे  would extend for  परिचय   .
Each  फेफड़ों  weighs ,  इसलिए   बनाना  the entire organ about .
Human lungs
the  trachea divides into  दो   bronchi  ( one  लिये  each side  )  at the level of  t4   .
इस  junction is  भी  known  as  the carina .
The  conducting   मण्डल  contains  the  trachea  ,   the  bronchi , the bronchioles ,  और  the terminal  bronchioles   the  respiratory  मण्डल  contains the  respiratory   bronchioles   ,  the alveolar ducts , and the alveoli .
The conducting zone  और  the respiratory stuffers ( but not  the  alveoli  )  are  बना  up of  एयरवेज़  .
the   conducting   मण्डल  has  no   गैस  exchange with  the   रक्त   ,   और   is   reinforced  with cartilage  in   अनुक्रम   to  hold open the airways  .
The conducting  मण्डल  warms  the   एयर   to  and humidifies the air .
It also cleanses  the  air by  निकालना  particles via cilia  स्तिथ   on  the  दीवारें   of  all the passageways .
The  फेफड़े   हैं  surrounded  by  the rib  पिंजरा   .
the   respiratory  zone is the  साईट  of gas  एक्सचेंज  with  रक्त   .
the   सहानुभूतिपूर्ण  nervous  प्रणाली   via   noradrenaline   एक्टिंग  on the beta receptors  कल्याणकारी  bronchodilation  .
The parasympathetic  बेचैन  system via acetylcholine  ,  which acts on the M-3 muscarinic  receptors  , maintains the resting tone  of   the   bronchiolar   चिकना   मांसपेशी   .
This action is related  ,  although  माना   पृथक   इससे   bronchoconstriction  .
अनेक   अन्य  non-autonomic  बेचैन   और  biochemical stimuli  ,  including carbon dioxide  और  oxygen ,  हैं  also involved in  the   विनियमन   प्रक्रम  .
The pleural cavity is the potential space  between   the  parietal  pleura  , lining  the  inner  वॉल   of   the  thoracic cage , and the  visceral  pleura  अस्तर   the  lungs  .
the   फेफड़ों  parenchyma is strictly used  to   refer  solely  to  alveolar tissue with respiratory bronchioles  ,  alveolar ducts and terminal  bronchioles   .
However  ,  it often  शामिल   कोई  form  of   फेफड़ों  tissue  ,   भी   सहित  bronchioles ,  bronchi   ,   रक्त  vessels  और   फेफड़ों   interstitium  .
the  margarita is a  मैक्सिकन  cocktail consisting  of   टकीला  mixed with  cointreau  or similar orange -flavoured  liqueur  and lime or lemon juice , often  परोसा  with salt  on  the glass  रिम  .
It is the most common tequila-based cocktail  in  the United  राज्य  .
the  drink is served shaken with ice ( on  the  rocks  )   ,  blended with  बर्फ   (  frozen margarita ) , or without  बर्फ  (  सीधा   up   )  .

Burgundy is  a  dark red  रंग   संबद्ध  with the  बरगंडी  wine of the  वही   नाम  , which in turn  is  named after  the   बरगंडी  region of France .
The  रंग  burgundy  is  similar to other  शेड्स   of   अंधेरा  red such as  मैरून   .
जब  referring  to   the   रंग  , `` burgundy '' is  प्रायः   नहीं  capitalized .
The  पहला   अंकित  use of `` burgundy ''  as  a color  नाम   in   अंग्रेज़ी  was  in   1881   .

लापता  in  कार्रवाई  ( MIA  )  is a casualty  श्रेणी   आबंटित  under  the   औकात  of  लापता  to armed  सेवाएं  personnel  जो  are reported  लापता   दौरान   क्रियाशील  service  .
They may  have   महरूम  killed ,  wounded  ,  become  a prisoner of war  ,  or deserted .
if   मृतक  , neither  उनके  remains  nor  grave can  be  positively identified .
बनने  MIA  रै  been an  occupational  risk for service  कर्मियों  for as  long   as  there has been  warfare   .

पहला   बैपटिस्ट  Church  at   117   कोरा  Street  in  Center is located next  to   the   शहर  section .
