Center is a city  in  Shelby County ,  टेक्सास   ,  United  राज्य   .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 5,193  at  the 2010 census .
It is  the  county  सीट  of Shelby County  .
It is  नामित  for  इसके   स्थान   निकट  the center  of   शेल्बी   काउंटी  , not for its location in Texas as it is  स्तिथ  near  the  Louisiana border .
Intense red-eye  प्रभाव   in  blue eyes with dilated pupil
The red-eye effect  in  photography is the  आम  appearance of  रेड  pupils  in  color photographs of  आँखें   .
It  occurs  when  using   a  photographic  फ्लैश  very close  to  the  कैमरा   लेंस  (  as   साथ   सबसे   कॉम्पैक्ट   कैमरे  )  ,  in ambient low light  .
The effect appears  in  the eyes of humans and  पशु   कि   have   tapetum   lucidum   .
Theatrical followspot operators  ,  positioned nearly coincidentally with  a  very  उज्जवल  light and  somewhat   दूर   इससे  the actors ,  occasionally  witness  red-eye  in actors on stage .
The  प्रभाव   is   नहीं   दृश्य  to the rest  of   the  audience  क्युकी   it  is reliant  on   the  very small angle  between  the followspot  ऑपरेटर  and the light .
the  University  of  California , Santa Barbara  (  commonly  referred   to  as UC Santa  बारबरा  or  ucsb  ) is a  पब्लिक  research university and  एक   of  the ten general  campuses   of   the   विश्वविद्यालयों  of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  system  .
The  प्रमुख  campus  is   स्तिथ  on a  साईट   in  Goleta ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , United States  ,   इससे   सांता   बारबरा  and  उत्तरपश्चिम   of  Los Angeles  .
ट्रेसिंग  its roots back to  1891   as  an independent  शिक्षक  ' college , UCSB joined the University  of  California system in 1944  और  is  the  third-oldest  general-education   कैम्पस  in the system .
ucsb  is one  of  America 's  पब्लिक   आइवी  universities ,  जिससे  recognizes  शीर्ष   पब्लिक  research universities  in   the  United States  .
the  university is a  व्यापक  doctoral university and is  व्यवस्थित   into   पाँच  colleges and  स्कूलों  offering  87  undergraduate  डिग्री  and  55   ग्रैजुएट  degrees  .
the   कैम्पस   is  the  6th-largest  in  the   uc   प्रणाली  by enrollment with 18,977 undergraduate  और  2,950 graduate  विद्यार्थी  .
in  2012 , UCSB was  क्रमित   41st  among `` National Universities  ''  and 10th among  पब्लिक   विश्वविद्यालयों  by U.S. News & World Report .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों   थी   भी   क्रमित  35th worldwide  by   the  Times Higher  शिक्षा  World University Rankings and 34th  विश्वव्यापी  (  6th  worldwide  लिये  engineering  )  by  the   अकादमिक  Ranking of World  विश्वविद्यालयों   in  2012. <  संदर्भ  name= '' Shanghairanking.com/FieldENG2012 ''  >
UC Santa Barbara  is   a  `` very high activity  ''  research university and spent $  191.2  million  on   शोध  expenditures in  the   2007   फिस्कल   साल   ,  97th-largest in  the   संयुक्त  States  .
UCSB  घरों  twelve national  शोध  centers , including the renowned  kavli   संस्थान   लिये   सैद्धांतिक   भौतिकी  .
UCSB faculty  शामिल  five  नोबेल   पुरस्कार   laureates  ,  एक   फ़ील्ड  Medalist  ,   29   सदस्यों   of   the  National Academy of Sciences  ,  27 members of the National Academy  of  Engineering ,  और   31  members of  the   अमरीकी   अकादमी  of Arts  और  Sciences .
UCSB was  the  No . 3  मेजबान  on the  arpanet  and  थी  elected to the  संघ  of American  विश्वविद्यालयों   in  1995 .
The UC  सांता   बारबरा  Gauchos compete  in   the   ncaa   प्रभाग   i   बिग  West Conference  .
the  Gauchos  have  won NCAA  नेशनल  championships in men  's  soccer and men 's  जल  polo .
संत   जोसेफ   साथ  the Infant Jesus  by  Guido  reni
संत  Joseph  's  Day , March  19  , the Feast of  st.   जोसेफ  is in Western  christianity  the  प्रिंसिपल   feast   दिन   of   संत  Joseph  ,   जीवनसाथी   of   the  Blessed  वर्जिन   मरियम  .
he  is  भी  the step-father of  यीशु  of Nazareth /Jesus Christ  .
it  has the rank  of  a  solemnity   in  the Roman Catholic Church ;  catholics   जो   follow   the  Missal of 1962  celebrate   it  as a  पहला   क्लास  feast .
Previous to 1962 it  थी  celebrated as  a  feast  of  the  रैंक  of  दोगुना  of  the  first class  .
it   is  a feast or commemoration in the provinces  of   the   anglican   नियाज़   ,  and  a  feast or  पर्व   in   the   लूथरन  Church  .
Saint Joseph 's  दिन   is  the  patronal   feast  day for  कैंडल   as  well as  लिये  Canada , persons named Joseph , Josephine  ,  etc.  ,   लिये   धार्मिक   संस्थान   ,  schools and  parishes  bearing his name ,  और  for carpenters .
it  is also Father  's   दिन   in   कुछ   कैथोलिक  countries ,  मुख्यतः   स्पेन  , Portugal , and  इटली  .
March 19  थी   समर्पित  to Saint Joseph in several Western calendars  by  the tenth century ,  और   इस   कस्टम   थी   स्थापित  in  रोम   by  1479 .
Pope  st.  Pius V  विस्तारित  its use to the  संपूर्ण   रोमन  Rite  by  his Apostolic  संविधान  Quo  primum  ( July  14  , 1570 ) .
Since  1969  ,  एपिस्कोपल  Conferences  may  ,  if   वे   काश   ,  transfer  it   to  a  तिथि   बाहर  Lent .
Between 1870 and 1955 ,  a  feast  थी  celebrated in honor of  st.  Joseph  as  Spouse  of   the  Blessed Virgin  मरियम  and Patron of  the   सार्वभौमिक  Church  ,   the  latter title having been  दिए  to him by Pope  पायस   ix  .
Originally celebrated on the  तीसरा   संडे  after  ईस्टर  with  an  octave , after Divino Afflatu  of  St. Pius X (  देखिए   सुधार   of   the   रोमन   breviary  by  पोप  Pius  x   )  ,  it  was moved to the preceding  बुधवार  .
The feast  थी  also  retitled  The Solemnity of Saint Joseph .
This celebration and  इसके   accompanying   अष्टक   थी  abolished  दौरान  the  आधुनिकीकरण  and simplification of rubrics  अंतर्गत  Pope  पायस   बारहवीं  in  1955  .
it   is   स्टिल  maintained by Catholics who follow the missal of  1962   or  earlier  missals   .
as  the traditional holiday  of  the  रसूलों  Ss . Philip and James ,  may   1  , had  धुंधली  from  the  memory of most Catholics by the  mid-twentieth  century  ,   कि   of  Joseph the  कार्यकर्ता  was  निर्मित  in  अनुक्रम   to   coincide  with  the   जश्न   of   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   श्रमिक  Day ( May Day )  in   अनेक  countries .
The  feast  of Ss  .   फिलिप  and  जेम्स   ,   जिससे  had been celebrated on that  तिथि  since the sixth century , was moved from its  परंपरागत   प्लेस  .
in  the  नई  calendar published in 1969 , the feast ,  जिससे   at   एक   समय  occupied the highest  संभावित  rank in the Church  पंचांग  , was  घटाया  to  an  optional  मेमोरियल   ,   the  lowest rank for a saint  's  day  .
The  पूर्वी  Orthodox  गिरिजाघर  celebrates Saint Joseph on the  संडे   बाद   क्रिसमस   .
Mariah Carey ( born  कूच  27 , 1970 )  is  an  अमरीकी  singer ,  songwriter  , record  निर्माता  , actress  ,  and  लोकसेवक  .
अंतर्गत  the guidance of  कोलंबिया  Records  कार्यपालिका  Tommy Mottola , Carey released  उसके  self-titled  डेब्यू   स्टुडियो   एल्बम  Mariah Carey in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive  क्रमांक   एक  singles  on  the U.S . Billboard Hot 100 chart  .
following   उसके  marriage  to  Mottola in 1993  और  success  साथ   hit  records  भाव  ( 1991 ) , Music  बक्सा  (  1993  )  ,  and Merry Christmas ( 1994 )  ,  Carey was  स्थापित   as   कोलंबिया  's  highest-selling   अधिनियम  .
Daydream ( 1995  )  made music  इतिहास  when  इसके   दूसरी   सिंगल  ``  एक  Sweet  दिन   ``   ,  a  duet   साथ  Boyz II  मेन   ,   खर्च   a   रिकार्ड  sixteen weeks on top  of   the   बिलबोर्ड  Hot  100  , and remains  the  longest-running number-one  सोंग   in   u.S.   चार्ट   इतिहास  .
During the  रिकॉर्डिंग  of the  एल्बम   ,  Carey  began  to  deviate   इससे  her R  &  B  और  pop beginnings  और  slowly  traversed   into  hip hop  .
इस  musical change became evident  साथ  the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ) ,  at  which time Carey had  अलग   इससे  Mottola  .
Carey left  कोलंबिया   in  2000  ,   और  signed a  record-breaking   $  100 million  रिकॉर्डिंग  contract  साथ   वर्जिन   रिकॉर्ड  .
पहले   the  release of  उसके   पहला   विशेषता  film  glitter  ( 2001 ) , she suffered a physical and  emotional  breakdown  और  was  hospitalized   लिये  severe exhaustion .
following  the  फिल्मी  's poor  रिसेप्शन   ,  she was bought  आउट  of her recording  अनुबंध   लिये  $ 50 million  ,  which  led  to  a  decline in her career  .
She signed  a  multi-million  डालर   अनुबंध   सौदे  with Island Records in 2002  ,  and after an unsuccessful period , returned  to   the  top  of  music  चार्ट  with The  emancipation  of  मिमी  (  2005  )  .
Its second  सिंगल   ``   we  Belong  साथ  ``  became  her most successful single of the 2000s , and  थी  later named `` Song  of  the Decade ''  by   बिलबोर्ड   .
Carey once again ventured  into  film with a  well-received  starring  भूमिका  in  (  2009  )  ;  वो   थी   awarded   the  ``  भेदन  Performance Award '' at  the   ताड़   स्रोतों  International Film Festival ,  और  Black Reel and NAACP  चित्र  Award  nominations  .
In  a  career spanning over  दो  decades  ,   कैरी  has  बेची  more  than   200  million records worldwide  ,  making her  एक   of  the  best-selling  music artists  of   सब   समय  .
in  1998  ,   वो  was honored  as  the  संसार   's  best-selling  रिकॉर्डिंग  artist of the  1990s   at   the  World  म्यूज़िक   पुरस्कार   .
Carey was also named  the   best-selling   मादा   कलाकार   of   the  millennium in 2000  .
According  to  the  रिकॉर्डिंग   उद्योग  Association of America  ,  she is  the  third best-selling  मादा   कलाकार  in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  , with  63.5  million  certified   एल्बम   .
साथ   the  release of  ``  Touch My  देह  `` ( 2008 )  ,   कैरी  gained her  eighteenth   क्रमांक  one single in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  , more  than  any other  सोलो   कलाकार   .
in  2012 , Carey  थी  ranked  दूसरी   on   vh1   's  list of the  ``   100  Greatest Women in Music ''  .
aside   इससे  her  वाणिज्यिक   accomplishments   ,   कैरी  has won five Grammy  पुरस्कार   ,  17  संसार  Music Awards  ,   11   अमरीकी  Music Awards ,  और  31 Billboard  म्यूज़िक  Awards .
referred  to as the  ``   songbird  supreme '' by the Guinness  संसार  Records , she  is   famed  for her five-octave vocal range  ,   शक्ति  , melismatic style  और   हस्ताक्षर  use of the whistle  पंजीकरण  .
a  bumblebee  is   कोई   सदस्य   of  the bee genus Bombus  ,  in  the   परिवार  Apidae  .
There  हैं   over  250  ज्ञात  species  ,  existing primarily in the  उत्तरी   गोलार्ध   हालांकि   वे  also  occur   in  South America .
They  have  been  introduced  to  नई   जीलैंड   और  the Australian state  of  Tasmania  .
Bumblebees are  सोशल  insects that  हैं  characterised  by   ब्लैक  and  पीला  body hairs , often in bands  .
However ,  कुछ   प्रजाति   have  orange  or  red  on  their bodies , or may be entirely  ब्लैक  .
Another obvious  (   लकिन  not  अद्वितीय   )   characteristic  is the soft nature  of   the   बाल   (   long  , branched setae )  ,  called  pile   ,  that covers  उनके  entire body ,  बनाना  them appear  और  feel  फजी   .
They are best distinguished from similarly  विशाल  , fuzzy bees by the form  of   the   मादा  hind  लेग   ,   जिससे  is modified  to  form a corbicula  :   a  shiny  concave   सतह   कि   is   bare   ,  but surrounded  by   a   फ्रिंज  of hairs used  to  transport pollen  (  in similar  मधुमक्खियों  , the hind leg is completely hairy , and  पराग  grains are wedged into  the  hairs for transport ) .
जैसे   उनके  relatives  the   मधु   मधुमक्खियों   ,  bumblebees  फीड  on nectar  और  gather pollen to feed their young .
A  man  openly carrying a handgun  in  a Burger King in  त्रिभुज   ,   कोलोराडो  .
In the United States  ,  open carry is  आशुलिपि  terminology  लिये  ``  खुलकर  carrying  a   firearm  in public '' , as  विशिष्ट  from  concealed  carry  ,  where  firearms  can not  be   देखी  by the casual observer .
The  अभ्यास   of   खोलें   carry  , where  गन   स्वामी  openly carry firearms while they go about their daily business , has seen  an   बढ़ाएँ  in  the  U.S.  in   हाल  years  .
इस   रै  been  चिह्नित  by  a   क्रमांक  of organized  कार्यक्रम  intended  to  increase  the  visibility  of   खोलें   carry  and public awareness about the practice .
Proponents of open  carry  point to history and  आंकडे  , noting that criminals usually conceal  उनके  weapons .
Encouraged  by  groups  जैसे  OpenCarry.org  ,  GeorgiaCarry.org and some participants  of   the  Free  राज्य  Project  ,   खोलें   carry   रै   देखी  a revival  in   हाल   सालो  , but  it   is   नहीं  yet clear  if  this represents just a short-term trend  .
The gun rights community has  महरूम  mixed  in  its  जवाब   .
एलन  Gottlieb of the Second  amendment  Foundation and the NRA have been cautious  in   expressing  support  ,   जबकि  special-interest groups such as  the  aforementioned OpenCarry.org and GeorgiaCarry.org  ,  and  निश्चित  national  समूह  such as the Gun Owners of  अमेरिका  (  गोवा  )  have  been more outspoken  in  favor of the  अभ्यास  .
Open carry is strongly opposed by gun control  समूह   ऐसे   as   the  Brady Campaign and the Coalition  to  Stop Gun  हिंसा  .
the  Cattenom Nuclear Power Plant in France .
France produces around  तीन  quarters  of  its electricity by  नाभिकीय  power .
The  grafenrheinfeld   नाभिकीय  Power Plant in Germany .
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's  गठबन्धन  announced on May  30  ,  2011   ,  that  germany’s  17 nuclear  शक्ति  stations will be  shut   bas   by   2022  , in  a  policy reversal  following  Japan 's  फुकुशिमा   daiichi  nuclear disaster  .
Currently  ,  68 reactors  हैं  under  निर्माण  in 15  देशों  .
Nuclear  शक्ति  stations  operate  in thirty countries .
In  2010  , before the Fukushima  daiichi  nuclear  विपत्ति   ,  it was  reported  that an  औसत   of  about 10 nuclear  रिएक्टरों  were  अपेक्षित   to   become   operational   प्रति   साल  , although according  to   the   संसार  Nuclear Association , of the 17  civilian  reactors planned to become  operational  between 2007  और  2009  ,  only five actually  आए  on  स्ट्रीम  .
As  of  June 2011  ,   जर्मनी   और  Switzerland are phasing-out nuclear power  .
As of  जून   2011  ,  देशों  such as  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   ,   ऑस्ट्रिया  ,  डेनमार्क  , Greece , Ireland ,  इटली   ,   लातवियाई   ,  Liechtenstein , Luxembourg  ,   मलेशिया  , Malta  ,   नई  Zealand , Norway  और   पुर्तगाल  remain  opposed   to   नाभिकीय  power .
Color  गति   चित्र   फिल्मी  refers both to  unexposed  color photographic  फिल्मी  in a  स्वरूप  suitable  लिये  use  in   a  motion  चित्र  camera  ,   और  to finished motion picture film  ,   तैयार   लिये  use in  a   प्रोजेक्टर   ,   जिससे   bears   बिंब  in  रंग  .
The  पहला  color  cinematography  was  by  means of  योगात्मक   रंग  systems such  as  the  एक   patented  in England  by   एडवर्ड   रेमंड  Turner in  1899   और  tested  in   1902   .
A simplified additive  प्रणाली  was developed by  जार्ज   अल्बर्ट   स्मिथ  and successfully commercialized  in   1909  as  kinemacolor  .
ये  early systems  प्रयुक्त  black-and-white  फिल्मी  to photograph and project  दो  or  अधिक  component  बिंब   through   अलग   रंग   फ़िल्टर   .
Still from footage recorded  by  Edward  टर्नर  in 1902
With  the  present-day technology ,  वहीँ   हैं  two  पृथक  processes :  eastman  Color Negative 2 chemistry ( camera negative stocks  ,   duplicating   interpositive  and internegative  स्टॉक्स  ) and Eastman  रंग   धनात्मक  2 chemistry (  धनात्मक  prints for direct projection  )  , usually  abbreviated   as  ECN-2 and  ecp-2   .
Fuji 's  उत्पाद  are compatible with  ecn-2  and  ecp-2   .
ashanti  Shequoiya  डगलस   (   born   अक्तूबर  13 ,  1980   )  is an American  singer-songwriter  ,  रिकार्ड   निर्माता   ,  and actress .
ashanti  is most famous for  उसके  eponymous debut album , which featured the hit  सोंग  `` Foolish `` , and sold  over  503,000  नक़ल   in  its first  सप्ताह  of  रिलीज   throughout   the   u.S.   in  April 2002 .
the  album set a Soundscan record as  the  biggest  खोलने  week sales for a  नई  female  कलाकार   ,  outselling debuts by Alicia  कुंजियाँ  and  लॉरिन   हिल  .
In  the   वही  week  ,  she became  the  first  मादा  performer to  simultaneously  hold  the   शीर्ष  two  स्थान  on the  बिलबोर्ड  Hot  100  singles  चार्ट   साथ  ``  foolish  '' , and `` What 's  luv  ?  ``
(  with Fat Joe ) .
ashanti  broke records  again  by having  तीन   शीर्ष   टेन  songs , `` Foolish , '' `` What 's Luv ? '' and `` Always  on   समय   ``  ,  on   the  Billboard Hot 100 charts in the same  सप्ताह   ,  being the  पहला  woman  to   accomplish   इस   feat  and being second  तभी  to the Beatles  .
In  2003  , the self-titled debut album  जीती   ashanti   उसके   पहला   ग्रैमी  Award for Best Contemporary  r  & B  एल्बम  .
as  of  अप्रैल   1st   2013  ,  ashanti   रै  sold over 27.7  लाख  records worldwide  .
ashanti   ended  the decade  (  2000–09 )  as  the third top  नई  R & B  कलाकार  behind Alicia Keys and Beyoncé  .
वो  also ended the  दशक  at  क्रमांक   38   on  the Top Artist of the  दशक   सूची  .
She is  फिलहाल  on the  सूची  of  the   बीस  Best Selling  म्यूज़िक   singles  Since  1990  for her single Foolish  लिये  selling 7.2 million copies to-date .
Ashanti  रै   an   अनुमानित  net  लायक   of  $  40   लाख   डॉलर  [ USD ] .
Ashanti wrote  और  sang  पृष्ठभूमि  on Jennifer  लोपेज़  's  ``  Ai n't  it   मजेदार  (  हत्या  Remix ) `` ,  जिससे  reached number  एक   on  Billboard Hot  100   ,  which was also  in  the  शीर्ष   10  chart at the same time as ``  foolish   ''   ,   ``  Always on  समय   ''   (  with  ja  Rule  )  , and ``  कया   's  Luv '' ( with  मोटे   जो   )  .
बाद  that  साल  ,  वो   थी  acclaimed as the  ``  Princess Of Hip-Hop & R & B '' by  उसके  label and capped  बंद  her  कामयाब   डेब्यू  by  जीतना  eight Billboard awards  और   दो   अमरीकी  Music  पुरस्कार  .
Within seven  सालो  of Ashanti 's career , she has scored 16 top  40   हिट्स  on the  hot   100   .
ashanti  has endorsed  numerous   उत्पाद  including Gap  ,  Herbal Essences and Mudd Jeans  .
Ashanti cites Whitney Houston  ,   जेनेट   जैक्सन   ,  Prince  ,  Madonna , Tupac Shakur  ,  Mary J. Blige ,  एला   fitzgerald  , Smokey Robinson , Donna Summer  ,   और  Blue Magic as  उसके   musical  influences .
Praised as a gifted songwriter  by  her  peers   और   आलोचकों   alike   ,  Ashanti  रै  written/co-written  the   बल्क  of all her music  .
वो  is currently  working  on her  अपना   प्रकाशन   कम्पनी  entitled Written Entertainment  .
She released her fourth  स्टुडियो  album entitled The Declaration on  जून   3   ,   2008   और   is  currently in the studio  working  on  उसके  fifth .
She also  performed   the   दान  tune `` Just Stand  up  `` alongside 15 other  मादा   गायकों   लिये   the   ``  Stand  up  to Cancer '' live television special which  helped  raise  $  100  लाख  dollars for  कर्कट   शोध   .
the  United  राज्य  Army  एयर  Forces ( USAAF or  aaf  )  थी  the military aviation arm  of  the  संयुक्त  States  of  America during and immediately after World  युद्ध   ii   ,   और   the  direct  पूर्ववर्ती  of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   एयर   फ़ोर्स  .
the  AAF was a  घटक  of the United  राज्य  Army  ,   जिससे   in  1942  थी   विभाजित  functionally  by  executive order into three  autonomous  forces  :  the  फौज   मैदान  Forces , the Services of Supply  (   जिससे  in 1943  became  the Army  सेवा  Forces  )  , and the  aaf  .
Each of  ये  forces  था   a  commanding general  जो   reported  directly  to  the  मुख्य  of Staff of the United States Army .
the  AAF administered all parts of  सैन्य  aviation  formerly  distributed among  the  Army Air Corps , General Headquarters  एयर  Force ,  और  ground  शक्तियां  corps area commanders ,  और   यूँ  became the  पहला   एयर  organization  of  the U.S.  फौज  to control  इसके   अपना  installations and  support   कर्मियों   .
In  अभ्यास  , the AAF was virtually  autonomous  inside  the  Army .
the   शिखर  size of  the  AAF was over  2.4  million  मेन  and  महिलाओं  in  सेवा  and nearly 80,000  वायुयान  in 1944 , and 783  घरेलू   bases  in December  1943   .
By  ve   दिन  it  था  1.25  लाख  men stationed overseas and operated from more than 1,600 airfields  विश्वव्यापी   .
The  एयर   corps  became  the  Army  एयर  Forces in  जून   1941  to provide the  एयर  arm a  वृहद   स्वायत्तता   in  which to expand  अधिक   efficiently   ,   और  to provide a  ढांचा   लिये  the additional command echelons required by a vastly  increased   फ़ोर्स  .
हालांकि  other nations already  था  separate air  शक्तियां  independent of the army or  नेवी   (  such as  the  British  royal  Air Force  और  the  जर्मनी  Luftwaffe ) ,  the   aaf  remained  a   भाग   of   the   संयुक्त  States  फौज  until the  संयुक्त  States  एयर   फ़ोर्स  came into being  in  September 1947  .
however  ,  in  its  विस्तार   और  conduct of  the  war , the  aaf   became   अधिक  than  बस   an   भुजा  of  the  greater organization .
By the  समाप्त  of  संसार  War II  the   aaf   था   become  virtually an  स्वतंत्र  service .
By regulation and executive  अनुक्रम   ,  the  aaf  was  a  subordinate agency  of  the War Department  tasked   तभी  with  आयोजन  , training  ,  and equipping  कॉम्बैट  units  ,  limited  in  responsibility to  the   महाद्वीपीय  United  राज्य   ,  as  यहूद   the   फौज  Ground Forces  और   the  Army Service Forces  .
in  reality  ,  Headquarters  aaf   नियंत्रित   the  conduct of all  पहलुओं  of  the  air  युद्ध  in  प्रत्येक   भाग  of the  संसार   ,  determining  एयर  policy and issuing orders  बगैर  transmitting  उन्हें   through   the  Chief  of  Staff .
इस  `` contrast between  सिद्धान्त  and  फैक्ट  is ... fundamental to an  समझना  of the AAF . ''
The Freedom  of   सूचना  Act (  foia  )  is   a  federal freedom of information  विधि  that allows  लिये  the full  or   आंशिक  disclosure of previously unreleased information  और  documents  नियंत्रित   by  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  government  .
the   अधिनियम  defines agency  रिकॉर्ड  subject to  प्रकटीकरण   ,  outlines  अनिवार्य  disclosure  प्रक्रियाओं   और  grants  नौ  exemptions to the statute .
it   थी  originally signed into law by President Lyndon  B.   जॉनसन  , despite his misgivings , on  जुलाई   4   ,   1966  as  और   गई  into  प्रभाव  the following year .
the  Federal Government  's  Freedom  of  Information Act  चाहिए  not  be   उलझन  with  the  different and varying Freedom of Information Acts passed by the  व्यक्तिगत  states .
Many of  those   राज्य  acts  may   be   समान   लकिन  not  एकसमान  to  the  federal  अधिनियम  .
The  यूरोपीय  Union (  eu   )   is   an   आर्थिक   और  political union  of  27 member  राज्य  that are  स्तिथ   primarily   in  Europe .
the   eu   operates   through   a  system of  supranational   स्वतंत्र  institutions  और  intergovernmental  negotiated  decisions  by  the  सदस्य  states .
संस्थानों  of  the   eu  include  the  European Commission ,  the  Council of the  यूरोपीय  Union ,  the   यूरोपीय   परिषद   ,   the  Court  of  Justice of the  यूरोपीय  Union , the  यूरोपीय   सेंट्रल  Bank , the Court  of  Auditors , and  the   यूरोपीय   पार्लियामेंट   .
the   यूरोपीय   पार्लियामेंट  is  निर्वाचित  every five years  by  EU  नागरिकों  .
The  eu   's  de  facto  capital is  ब्रसेल्स   .
the  EU  traces  its origins from the European Coal and  स्टील   जातियाँ   (  ECSC  )  and  the   यूरोपीय  Economic Community ( EEC  )  , formed by the Inner Six  देशों   in  1951 and  1958  respectively .
In the intervening years the community and its  successors   have   grown  in  आकार   by  the accession  of   नई   सदस्य   राज्य  and in  शक्ति   by   the  addition of policy areas to its remit .
the  Maastricht Treaty established  the  European  संघ  under its current name in  1993  .
the   नवीनतम  major  amendment   to  the  संवैधानिक  basis  of   the   eu  , the Treaty of  लिस्बन  , came into  फ़ोर्स   in  2009 .
the   eu  has developed a  सिंगल   मार्केट  through a  standardised  system  of  laws that apply  in   सब  member states  .
Within the Schengen Area ( which includes  22  EU  और  4 non-EU  राज्य  ) passport  नियंत्रण  have been  abolished  .
eu   नीतियों  aim  to  ensure the  फ़्री  movement of people , goods ,  सेवाएं  , and capital  ,   enact  legislation  in   इंसाफ  and  घर   अफेयर्स  ,  और  maintain  आम  policies on trade ,  कृषि  , fisheries and  क्षेत्रीय   विकास  .
a  monetary union  ,   the   eurozone   ,  was established in 1999 and is composed of  17   सदस्य  states .
through   the  Common Foreign and Security  नीति  the  eu  has developed  a  role in external relations and defence  .
Permanent diplomatic  मिशन   have  been  स्थापित   around  the world .
The  eu   is   represented   at  the United Nations  ,   the   wto  , the G8 and  the   g-20   .
With  a   संयुक्त   जनसांख्यिकी   of   over  500 million inhabitants , or 7.3  %   of   the  world population  ,  the  eu   ,  in  2012   ,   उत्पन्न   a  nominal  सकल   घरेलू  product ( GDP  )   of  16.584 trillion US dollars  ,  representing  लगभग  20  %  of  the  global GDP when  measured  in terms of purchasing  शक्ति  parity , and represents the  largest   नाममात्र  GDP  और  GDP PPP  in   the  world .
the  EU was the recipient of the 2012 Nobel Peace Prize  .
The  वेल्स   नेशनल  rugby league  टोली   represent   वेल्स  in  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   रग्बी  league football  मिलान   .
Currently the team  is  seventh in  the  RLIF World Rankings .
The team were run  अंतर्गत   the   auspices   of  the  रग्बी  Football League  ,  but an  स्वतंत्र   देह   ,   वेल्स  Rugby League  ,  now  रनों  the  टोली  from  कार्डिफ   .
a   कुल  of  तीन   वेल्श   खिलाड़ी  have  महरूम   डाला   into  the Rugby  लीग  Hall  of   कीर्ति  .
Similar to many other  वेल्श   नेशनल  sporting teams ,  वेल्स   स्ट्रिप  has been primarily red for  अनेक  years  ,   सहित   अभी   .
however  in their last  संसार  Cup  अभियान  in 2000  वे   किया   पहनें  a shirt  featuring   the   वेल्श  flag ,  adding  a touch  of  green and white  .
The  टोली  is  ज्ञात  as `` The Dragons ''  और  so the teams logo on  the  shirt is a red dragon .
the  team date back to 1907 , making them the  तीसरा  oldest  नेशनल   पक्ष   बाद   इंग्लैण्ड  and New Zealand .
And it was  a  touring New  जीलैंड  side  कि   वेल्स   पहला  played against in 1908 , winning 9-8 at  aberdare  .
Since then  वेल्स   have  regularly played England  ,   चूंकि  1935 France , as well as welcomed the touring  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  and New Zealand teams , although  वे   rarely   toured  themselves , not playing a match in the  दक्षिणी  Hemisphere  जबतक   1975  .
लिये  twenty-six years Wales  competed   विरूद्ध  their two biggest  विरोधियों  , England and France , in the European  राष्ट्र  Cup  ,  winning  the  trophy  चार  times .
वेल्स   have  also competed in the World  कप   on   तीन   अवसरों   ,  the first  समय  being in 1975 .
In  1995   और   2000  they had their  सबसे  successful tournaments to date , surprisingly  बनाना   the  Semi-Finals  on   दोनो  occasions  पहले  being beaten  by  England  और   ऑस्ट्रेलिया   क्रमशः   .
Wales  विफल  to qualify for the 2008 World Cup , being  the  second highest  क्रमित  side not to  do  so  ,   having   खोया   to  Scotland  on  points difference  over   दो  matches .
In  2008  Australian John  डिक्सन   became  the  नई  head coach  और  appointed  ली   briers  as captain , having  निभाई   लिये   वेल्स  since 1998  .
in  recent seasons Wales have taken massive strides  अंतर्गत   पूर्व   खिलाड़ी  Iestyn  हैरिस  who  रै   coached  Wales to  वापस   to  back European  कप   सफलताओं  , which  culminated  in  a   चार  Nations  रूप  in 2011 .
Cardiomyopathy  (  literally  ``   दिल  muscle disease  ''   )   is  the  measurable  deterioration  of  the function of  the   myocardium  ( the  दिल  muscle  )  for any reason ,  प्रायः   अग्रणी   to  heart  विफलता  ; common symptoms are dyspnea ( breathlessness ) and peripheral edema (  सूजन  of  the   टाँगे  )  .
लोगों   साथ   cardiomyopathy   हैं  often at risk of dangerous  फ़ॉर्म   of  irregular  दिल  beat and sudden cardiac death .
The  सबसे   आम  form of cardiomyopathy is dilated cardiomyopathy  .
Fuck  in  its  शाब्दिक   अर्थ  refers to  the   अधिनियम   of  sexual  मैथुन   .
it   is  an English  शब्द  that  is  often used  as  a profanity  ,  either to denote disdain or  as   an  intensifier .
the   उत्पत्ति  of  the  word is obscure .
it   is   प्रायः  considered to  be   पहला  attested  to   around  1475 , but  it   may   be   considerably  older .
in  modern usage , fuck  और   इसके  derivatives  (  such as fucker and fucking  )   can  be used  in   the  position  of  a noun  ,  a verb , an adjective or an  क्रियाविशेषण   .
वहीँ   हैं   अनेक  common phrases which make use of the  शब्द  , as well as a  क्रमांक  of compounds incorporating it  ,  such  as  motherfucker  .
Note  :  this  आलेख  adopts the U.S.  विभाग  of Transportation  's   परिभाषा   of  a passenger  गाडी  , to  औसत   a   car   or  truck  ,  used for passengers  ,  excluding buses and  रेल   .
The United  राज्य  is home to the largest passenger  गाडी  market of any country in the world  .
Overall ,  वहीँ   यहूद   an  estimated 254.4  लाख  registered passenger vehicles in  the  United States according  to  a 2007 DOT study .
इस  number  ,   साथ  with  the  average age of  वाहनों   ,  has increased steadily since 1960  ,   indicating  a  growing  number of  वाहनों  per  capita  .
The Chinese  car   मार्केट  , however  ,  is poised  to  soon  exceed   the  United States ;  by  the end  of   2012  , there  यहूद   over   240   लाख   गाड़ियाँ   on  the road in China  .
The  संयुक्त  States  is  also home  to   तीन  large vehicle manufacturers : General Motors ,  घाट  Motor Company and Chrysler , which have historically been referred to as  the  ``  बिग  Three  .   ''
क्रिसलर  however  is   no   longer   among  the top  तीन  ; but is number  पाँच  , behind Toyota  और   होंडा  .
The  मोटर   car   रै  clearly  become   an   अभिन्न   भाग   of   अमरीकी  life ,  साथ  vehicles  outnumbering  licensed drivers .
नैदानिक  laboratory in a  हॉस्पिटल  setting  प्रर्दशित   अनेक   स्वचालित   analysers  .
a  medical laboratory  or  clinical  प्रयोगशाला  is a laboratory  जहाँ  tests are done on clinical  नमूनों  in order to get  सूचना  about  the  health of a patient as pertaining  to  the diagnosis  ,  treatment , and prevention of  बीमारी  .
in  poker  ,  players  construct  hands of five  ताश  according to  predetermined  rules  ,   जिससे   vary   according  to which  रूपांतर  of poker is being  निभाई  .
These  हैंड्स   हैं   compared   using  a hand ranking system that  is   मानक  across  सब   विसंगतियाँ   of   पोकर   ,  the player with the highest-ranking  हाथ  winning  कि  particular deal in most variants  of   पोकर  .
in  some variants ,  the  lowest-ranking hand can win or tie .
ये  hand rankings  हैं  also used  in   कुछ   अन्य   कार्ड  games , and  in  poker  dice  .
The ranking of a  particular  hand  is  increased by  सहित   अनेक  cards of the same  कार्ड   रैंक   ,   by  all five cards being  इससे  the  वही   सूट  ,  or   by   सब  five cards being  of  consecutive  रैंक  .
The relative ranking of  the   विभिन्न   हाथ  categories  is  based  on  the probability  of  being  randomly  dealt  ऐसे   a  hand from  a  well- shuffled deck .
ब्रूस  Randall Hornsby (  born  November  23   ,   1954  ) is an  अमरीकी  virtuoso ; a  सिंगर  , pianist  ,  synthesizer  ,   accordion  , and dulcimer  खिलाड़ी  ,  और   songwriter   .
ज्ञात  for the spontaneity  और  creativity of his  सजीव   प्रदर्शन   ,  Hornsby draws frequently  इससे  classical  ,  jazz ,  ब्लूग्रास   ,  folk , Motown ,  इन्जील  , rock , blues , and jam band musical traditions with his songwriting  और  the seamless improvisations contained  भीतर  .
hornsby  's  रिकार्डिंग  have been  recognised   on   a  number of occasions with industry  पुरस्कार  ,  सहित   the  Best New Artist Grammy in 1987  साथ  Bruce Hornsby and  the   दायरा  , the Best Bluegrass  रिकॉर्डिंग   ग्रैमी   in   1990  , and the  बेहतरीन  Pop  इंस्ट्रूमेंटल   ग्रैमी  in 1993 .
Hornsby  रै   भी   हासिल  recognition for  उसके   सोलो   एल्बम  and  प्रदर्शन  , his  touring  band  ब्रूस  Hornsby and the  noisemakers   ,  his bluegrass project  साथ   रिकी  Skaggs and  उसके  appearances  as  a  session-   और  guest-musician .
he  also  collaborated   साथ  Grateful  मुर्दे   और   थी  a member of  the  band  इससे  September  1990  to  कूच  1992  ,   playing  at over one  सौ  shows  दौरान   कि  period  .
Sugarcane plantation  in   ग्रामीण   क्यूबा
कृषि   in   क्यूबा  has  निभाई   an  important part in the economy  लिये  several  सौ  years  .
Agriculture contributes  कम  than  10  percent to the  सकल  domestic  उत्पाद  (  जीडीपी   )  , but it  employs  roughly  20  percent  of  the working  जनसांख्यिकी  .
About  30  percent of the  देश   's  land is used for crop cultivation .
The  अकुशल   agricultural  industry in Cuba  रै   led   to  the need to import large  amounts  of foods  .
क्यूबा   अभी   imports  about 80 % of the food it rations to the public .
The rationing program accounts for  परिचय   a  third  of   the   खाना  energy  the   औसत  Cuban consumes .
Overall  ,  however , Cuba  is   निर्भर  on  imports  for  तभी  16 %  of  its food .

Mega  लाखो  (  initially   पुकारा  The Big Game  आचमन  Millions as  the  successor of The Big  खेल   )  is  an  American  multi-jurisdictional  $ 1 lottery  खेल  .
The  पहला  ( The Big  खेल   )  Mega Millions drawing was in  2002   (  see below )  .
the   न्यूनतम  Mega Millions  advertised   जैकपॉट  is $ 12,000,000  ,   सशुल्क  in 26 equal  वार्षिक  installments ( unless  the  cash option is  चुनी   )  ;  प्रायः  , the jackpot increases when there is  no  top-prize winner .
However  ,   despite  no  जैकपॉट   विजेता   लिये   the   $   12,000,000   दिसम्बर   18  , 2012 drawing , the  जैकपॉट  remained  at   $   12,000,000  for the drawing to  be   आयोजित  on December 21 .
( See below  लिये  information  on  how the  खेल  's  जैकपॉट  is funded . )
Reflecting  आम  practice among  अमरीकी  lotteries ,  the  jackpot is advertised  as   a  nominal  मान   of  annual  किश्तों   .
a  cash value option  (   the  usual choice  )  ,  जब  chosen  by   a  jackpot  विजेता   (   देखिए  below ) ,  pays   the  approximate present value of  the  installments .
आचमन   लाखो   फिलहाल   उपयोग   a  5/56 (  श्वेत  balls  )   प्लस  1/46 ( the  आचमन  Ball  )  double  मेट्रिक्स  to select  इसके  winning numbers .
प्रत्येक  game  लागत  $ 1 .
In 43 of  the  44  आचमन  Millions  jurisdictions   (  California is the exception )  ,   वहीँ  is  an  option ,  पुकारा   megaplier  ( such games are $ 2  प्रत्येक   )  where  non-jackpot  prizes  हैं  multiplied by  2   ,   3   ,  or 4 .
The Megaplier  थी   बना   उपलब्धियाँ  to all  आचमन   लाखो   jurisdictions   in   जनवरी  2011 ; it began as  a  Texas  -only  option  .
Mega Millions  is   drawn   at  10:59 p.m.  पूर्वी   समय  Tuesdays and Fridays  ,  including  छुट्टियाँ   .
Mega Millions is  administered  by  a  consortium of  इसके   12  original lotteries  और  the drawings are held at WSB-TV in Atlanta , Georgia .
पर्यवेक्षित  by the  जॉर्जिया   लॉटरी  .
The  largest  jackpot in  आचमन  Millions ,  as  well as in  अमरीकी  lottery history  ,  was $  656,000,000  annuitized ( with  a   नकदी  option  of   $  474,000,000  )   लिये  the March 30 , 2012  आरेखण   in  which there were  तीन  jackpot-winning  टिकटें  ; one each in Illinois , Kansas  ,   और  Maryland .
All three tickets had  महरूम   claimed  as of April  18  , with  प्रत्येक  set of  विजेता   चुनना  the cash  विकल्प   .
is  a  Japanese manga  श्रेणी  created  by   लेखक   tsugumi  Ohba and manga artist  takeshi  Obata  .
The  प्रमुख   अक्षर   is  Light Yagami , a high school student who discovers a  अलौकिक  notebook , the `` Death Note '' , dropped on Earth by a shinigami ( a god of  मौत  ) named Ryuk .
The Death Note  अनुदान  its  उपयोक्ता  the ability to  मार  anyone whose  नाम   और  face they  जान  , by writing the name in the notebook while picturing their  फेस  .
The  श्रेणी   centers   around   लाइट  's attempt to  बनाएँ  and  नियम  a world  ``  cleansed  of   दुष्ट  '' as  ``  God ''  using   the  notebook , and the efforts of a  जासूस  known  as   l   to  stop  उसे  .
Death Note was first  serialized   in   108  chapters  by  Shueisha in the  जापानी  manga magazine Weekly Shōnen Jump from December  2003   to  May 2006 .
the  series  थी  also published  in  tankōbon  स्वरूप  in  जापानी   starting  in  may  2004  और  ending  in  October  2006   साथ  a total of  तेरह   आयतन   .
the   दुश्मनी  series  aired  in  जापानी  from October  3   ,  2006  ,  to  जून  26  ,   2007  .
रचित   of  37  एपीसोड  , the anime was  विकसित   by   madhouse   और  directed  by  Tetsuro Araki .
A  लाइट  novel  आधारित  on the  श्रेणी  , written by Nisio Isin , was released in Japan .
Additionally ,  विभिन्न   वीडियो  games have been published  by  Konami for Nintendo DS .
the  series  थी   adapted   into   live-action   films  released in Japan on June 17 , 2006  ,  November  3  , 2006  ,  and  फ़रवरी  2 ,  2008  .
Viz Media licensed  the  Death Note manga in North America  और  has  प्रकाशित   सब   the  twelve  आयतन  from the series , a 13th volume  जिससे   serves   as   a   ``  reader  's  guide ''  ,   as  well  as  the light novels  .
the  episodes  इससे  the anime  पहला   appeared   in   उत्तर   अमेरिका   as  downloadable by  ign  .
viz  later  licensed  the anime series and  it  aired on Bionix in Canada and on Cartoon Network in the United  राज्य  .
the  live-action films briefly played in  निश्चित   उत्तर  American  थिएटर   चूंकि  2008  .
however   ,  none of  the  video  खेल   have   यूँ   दूर  been published  in  North America  or  Europe .
Death Note  is  one  of  Weekly Shōnen  jumps   best-selling  manga  श्रेणी  of all time  ,  with  बिक्री  over 26.5 million  नक़ल  .
Halloween or Hallowe'en  (  a  संकुचन   of  `` All  hallows   '  Evening  ``  )  ,   भी   ज्ञात   as  All Hallows  '  Eve , is a  वार्षिक  celebration  observed  in  a  number  of  countries on  अक्तूबर   31  ,  the   संध्या  of  the  Western Christian  feast  of  सब   hallows   (  or All  संतो   )  and  the  day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas .
according   to   अनेक  scholars , All  hallows   '  Eve is  a  Christianised feast originally influenced by  पश्चिमी  European  कटाई   त्यौहार   ,  and  त्यौहार   of  the dead with possible pagan roots  ,  particularly  the  Celtic  samhain   .
Other  विद्वानों  maintain that  it  originated  independently   of  Samhain and has  solely  Christian roots  .
Typical festive Halloween  क्रियाएँ   शामिल  trick-or-treating (  भी  known as `` guising ``  )  ,  उपस्थित  costume  पार्टियों   ,   नक्काशी  pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns  ,  lighting bonfires , apple bobbing , visiting  haunted  attractions ,  playing   pranks  , telling  डरावने   कहानियां   ,  and  watching  horror  films   .
New York City  taxicabs  during Midtown rush  घंटा  in  मैनहटन
the   taxicabs  of New York  नगर  , with  उनके   distinctive   पीला  paint  ,  are a widely recognized icon of the  नगर  .
taxicabs  are  संचालित   by  private  कंपनियाँ  and licensed  by   the   नई   यॉर्क  City Taxi  और   लिमोज़ीन  Commission  (  TLC )  .
it  also oversees over  40,000   अन्य  for-hire vehicles ,  सहित  ``  ब्लैक  cars  ''  , commuter  वैन  and  ambulettes   .
``  medallion  taxis , '' the  परिचित   पीला   कैब  , are the  तभी  vehicles in  the  city  permitted  to pick  up   यात्री   in  response to a street  hail  .
Schematic  क्रॉस  section of  भाग   of   पत्ता  , xylem shown as red circles at figure 8  .
जाइलम  is  एक  of  the  two  प्रकार  of transport tissue in vascular plants ( phloem is the  अन्य   )   .
The  शब्द  xylem is derived  इससे  the Greek word ξύλον  (   xylon  ) , meaning ``  लकडी   ''   ;   the   best-known  xylem  ऊतक  is wood  ,   हालांकि  it is  मिला  throughout  the   संयंत्र  .
इसके  basic  फलन   is  to transport  जल  , but  it   भी  transports  कुछ   nutrients  through  the   संयंत्र  .
U.S.  महिलाओं   suffragists  demonstrating  लिये   the   सही   to   vote  , February 1913  .
महिलाओं   's   suffrage  also known as  स्त्री  suffrage  is  the  सही  of women to vote and to run  लिये  office .
सीमित   मतदान  rights were gained by women in Sweden ,  फिनलैंड  and some western U.S.  राज्य   in  the late 19th  सदी  .
अंतरराष्ट्रीय   संगठन  were  formed   to  coordinate efforts ,  विशेषकर   the  International Council  of  Women  (  1888 ) and  the  International Woman  suffrage  Alliance ( 1904 ) .
In 1893 , New  जीलैंड  , then  a  self-governing British colony ,  granted   वयस्क   महिलाओं   the  right  to   vote  and  the   self-governing  British colony  of  South Australia did the same  in   1895  ,  लकिन   भी  permitted women to run for office  .
ऑस्ट्रेलिया  federated in  1901   ,  and  महिलाओं  acquired the right  to  vote  और   स्टैंड   in   संघीय   चुनावों   इससे  1902 ,  हालांकि   uneven   प्रतिबंध   on  Aboriginal women voting  in   नेशनल   चुनावों   यहूद  not completely  removed  until 1962  .
The first  यूरोपीय   देश   to   introduce   महिलाओं   's   suffrage  was the Grand Duchy of  फिनलैंड  , then part  of   the   रूसी  Empire ,  जिससे   भी   उत्पादित   the  world 's first female members  of  parliament  in  the 1907 parliamentary elections  .
Norway  followed  ,  granting  full  महिलाओं  's suffrage  in  1913 .
in  most Western  देशों  ,  महिलाओं   's  suffrage came after World I War I  i   ,  with some important late adopters being France in 1944 and Switzerland in  1971   .
Women  's   suffrage   रै   generally  been  पहचाना   बाद  political  अभियान   to  obtain it  यहूद   waged  .
In many  देशों  it  थी   granted   पहले  universal suffrage .
Women 's suffrage  is  explicitly stated as a right under the  सम्मेलन   on   the  Elimination of  सब  Forms  of  Discrimination  विरूद्ध   महिलाओं   ,   अपनाया  by  the   संयुक्त  Nations  in  1979 .
the  Thirteenth  टेल  ( 2006 )  by   डायने   setterfield   is   a   गोथिक  suspense novel ,  the   लेखक   's   पहला  published book  .
Jehovah 's  गवाह   is  a millenarian  restorationist   ईसाई  denomination with  nontrinitarian  beliefs  पृथक   इससे  mainstream Christianity  .सोर्सs   लिये   descriptors  :  •   millenarian   :   •  Restorationist :  •  Christian  :  • Denomination  :   the  organization reports worldwide  सदस्यता   of   over  7.78  लाख   adherents   शामिल   in   इंजीलवाद   ,   सम्मेलन  attendance  of  over  12  million  ,   और  annual Memorial  उपस्थिति  of over  19   लाख   .
वे  are  निर्देशित   by  the Governing  देह   of  Jehovah 's  गवाह   ,  a group of elders  in  Brooklyn , New York ,  कि  establishes  सब  doctrines .
Jehovah 's Witnesses  '  beliefs are based on their interpretations  of   the  Bible and  वे   prefer  to use  उनके   अपना  translation , the New World  अनुवाद  of the Holy Scriptures .
वे   मानना   कि  the destruction of  the  present  संसार  system at  armageddon  is imminent , and  कि  the  स्थापना   of   परमेश्वर  's kingdom on earth  is   the  only  समाधान  for all problems faced by mankind .
the  group  उभरा   इससे   the   बाइबल   छात्र   गति   —founded   in  the  लेट  1870s by  चार्ल्स  Taze Russell with  the  formation  of  Zion 's Watch Tower Tract Society  —with   significant  organizational  और  doctrinal changes under the  नेतृत्व  of  जोसेफ  Franklin Rutherford .
The name  यहोवा  's  गवाह  , based  on  Isaiah 43:10–12 , was adopted in 1931 to distinguish themselves  इससे   अन्य  Bible Student groups and  symbolize   a  break with the legacy of Russell 's traditions  .
यहोवा  's  गवाह   हैं  best  ज्ञात  for their door-to-door  उपदेश  , distributing  साहित्य   ऐसे   as  The Watchtower  और  Awake !
, and refusing  सैन्य   सेवा  and blood  transfusions  .
वे  consider use of the name  यहोवा   vital   लिये  proper  इबादत  .
They reject Trinitarianism , inherent  अमरत्व   of   the  soul ,  और   hellfire  , which they consider to be  unscriptural  doctrines .
वे  do not observe  क्रिसमस  , Easter , birthdays , or  अन्य  holidays  और   कस्टम  they consider  to   have   pagan  origins incompatible with  christianity  .
Adherents commonly refer  to   उनके  body  of   मान्यताओं   as  ``  the  truth  ''   और   consider  themselves to  be  ``  in  the  सच्चाई  ''  .
They consider  धर्मनिरपेक्ष  society to be morally corrupt and  अंतर्गत  the influence  of   शैतानी  , and most  सीमा  their  सोशल   बातचीत  with  non-witnesses   .
Congregational disciplinary  क्रियाएँ  include  disfellowshipping   ,  their term for formal  expulsion   और   shunning   .
Baptized individuals who formally  छोड़   हैं   माना  disassociated  और  are also shunned .
Disfellowshipped  और  disassociated individuals  may   आखिरकार  be  reinstated   if   deemed   repentant  .
The  धर्म   's   स्थिति  regarding  ईमानदार  objection  to  military service and refusal to salute national flags has  brought  it into conflict  साथ  some governments .
नतीजतन  ,  यहोवा  's  गवाह  have been persecuted and their activities are banned or restricted  in   कुछ  countries .
persistent  legal  चुनौतियां   by  Jehovah 's Witnesses have influenced  विधान  related to  सिविल   अधिकारों  in several  देशों  .
पिछला   टैंगो   in  Paris  (  ) is  a  1972 Franco-Italian  रोमांटिक  Drama film  निर्देशित  by  बर्नार्डो  Bertolucci which  portrays  a recent American widower  जो  begins an  बेनाम  sexual  संबंध  with a  यंग   ,  betrothed Parisian woman  .
it  stars Marlon  ब्रैंडो  ,  मरिया  Schneider , and  jean-pierre   léaud  .
The  फिल्मी  's  कच्चा  portrayal of sexual violence  और   emotional   turmoil   led  to  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   विवाद  and drew various levels  of  government  सेंसरशिप  .
the  MPAA gave the film an X rating upon release  in  the United States .
बाद   revisions  were made  to  the  mpaa   दरजा   कोड   ,  it was classified  as  an NC-17  in  1997  .
mgm  released a  censored   r-rated  cut in 1981  .
The film  रै   इसके   nc-17  rating for `` some  सुस्पष्ट   यौन  content . ''
Windows  xp  is  an  operating system  उत्पादित  by  microsoft  for  उपयोग  on personal  कंप्यूटर  ,  सहित   घर   और  business desktops ,  लैपटॉप  and  मीडिया  centers .
First released to computer  निर्माताओं   on   अगस्त   24   ,   2001  ,  it  is the second  सबसे  popular  संस्करण   of   खिड़कियाँ   ,  based  on  installed  उपयोक्ता   आधार  .
The name `` XP  ''  is short for  ``   अनुभव  '' , highlighting  the  enhanced  उपयोक्ता  experience .
Windows XP  ,   the   successor   to  Windows  2000   और  Windows ME  ,  was the  पहला  consumer-oriented operating  प्रणाली   उत्पादित   by  Microsoft to be  निर्मित  on the  खिड़कियाँ  NT kernel .
खिड़कियाँ   xp   थी   released  worldwide for retail sale on October 25  ,  2001 , and over  400   लाख  copies  यहूद   in   उपयोग  in  जनवरी  2006 .
it  was succeeded  by   खिड़कियाँ  Vista in  जनवरी  2007  .
सीधा   oem   और   खुदरा   बिक्री  of Windows XP ceased  on   जून  30 , 2008 .
Microsoft continued  to  sell  खिड़कियाँ   xp  through  उनके  System Builders (  छोटी   oems  who  बेचें   समवेत  computers ) program until  जनवरी  31  ,  2009 .
on  April 10 , 2012 , Microsoft reaffirmed that extended support  लिये  Windows XP and Office 2003  होता  end  on  April  8  , 2014 and  सुझाया   कि  administrators begin preparing to  migrate  to a  नए  OS .
The NT -based versions of  खिड़कियाँ  , which  हैं  programmed in C , C++ ,  और  assembly  ,  are  ज्ञात  for  उनके   improved   स्थिरता  and  दक्षता   over  the  9x  versions of  microsoft  Windows .
Windows XP  प्रस्तुत  a significantly redesigned graphical  उपयोक्ता  interface  ,  a  बदलें   microsoft  promoted as more user-friendly than previous  संस्करण  of  खिड़कियाँ  .
In an  attempt   to   further  ameliorate the ``  dll   नरक  `` that  plagued  the past versions of  खिड़कियाँ  ,  improved   side-by-side   सभा   प्रौद्योगिकी  in  खिड़कियाँ  XP  allows   side-by-side   संस्थापना  ,  पंजीकरण  and servicing  of   अनेक  versions of globally shared  तन्त्र   components  in  पूरा  isolation .
It is also the first version of  खिड़कियाँ  to use product  सक्रियण   to   कॉम्बैट  illegal copying .
दौरान   खिड़कियाँ  XP  's  development  ,  the  प्रोजेक्ट   थी  codenamed ``  whistler  '' ,  बाद  Whistler , British  कोलंबिया   ,   as  many  microsoft   कर्मचारी   skied  at the  whistler-blackcomb  ski resort  .
according   to  web analytics data  उत्पन्न  by Net Applications , Windows XP  थी   the   सबसे  widely  प्रयुक्त  operating  प्रणाली   जबतक  August  2012   ,   जब   खिड़कियाँ   7   overtook  it .
,  खिड़कियाँ   xp  market  share   is  at 38.99  %   ,   having   decreased  almost  प्रत्येक   माह   चूंकि   at  least  नवम्बर   2007   ,  the  पहला   माह   लिये  which statistics are  सरेआम   उपलब्धियाँ   इससे  Net  अनुप्रयोग  .
``  Por una  cabeza   ''   is   an  Argentine  टैंगो  with music and lyrics written  in   1935  by  कार्लोस  Gardel  और   अल्फ्रेडो  Le Pera respectively .
The name is  a  Spanish  horse-racing   phrase   अर्थ  `` by a  सिर  '' , which  refers  to  a  horse  जीतना  a  रेस  by the  लंबाई  of  एक  head .
the   गीत  speak of a compulsive horse-track gambler  जो   compares  his  व्यसन   लिये  horses with  उसके  attraction to  महिलाओं   .
Alfredo  le  Pera was a  ब्राज़ीलियाई  from  são  Paulo , a much Italian-influenced area  in  Brazil ,  और  also  the   जन्मस्थान   of  Zequinha  de   abreu  , composer of Tico-Tico  no   fubá  .
le  Pera and Gardel died in an airplane crash  in  Medellín ,  (   कोलंबिया  ) ,  on  June 24 , 1935  .

the  tango has since  महरूम  performed by numerous tango orchestras  .

The  baroreflex  or baroreceptor reflex is one  of  the body  's   homeostatic   mechanisms  for  maintaining  blood pressure .
it   provides  a  ऋणात्मक  feedback loop in  जिससे  an elevated blood pressure  reflexively   कल्याणकारी   दिल  rate to decrease  इसलिए  causing blood  दबाव  to  घटी   ;  likewise  ,   decreased   रक्त  pressure activates the baroreflex , causing heart rate to  बढ़ाएँ   यूँ  causing an increase in  रक्त  pressure  .
The  प्रणाली  relies on specialized  न्यूरॉन्स   ,  known  as  baroreceptors ,  in  the  aortic   मेहराब  , carotid sinuses , and elsewhere to monitor changes in blood pressure and relay  उन्हें  to the brainstem  .
Subsequent changes in  रक्त  pressure  हैं  mediated by  the  autonomic  बेचैन   प्रणाली  .
Atrial natriuretic  पेप्टाइड  forms a parallel  ऋणात्मक   प्रतिक्रिया  loop  in  an  endocrinological  contrast  to   the   renin-angiotensin  system  .
The Loma Prieta earthquake , also known as the Quake of  '89  and  the  World Series  भूकंप  , was a major earthquake that  struck   the  San  फ्रांसिस्को   खाड़ी  Area of California on October 17 ,  1989  ,  at   5:04   pm  local time .
Caused  by  a slip along  the   सैन  Andreas  दोष  ,  the  quake  lasted   10–15  seconds  और   measured   6.9   on  both  the   पल   परिमाण   स्केल   (  surface-wave magnitude  7.1   )  and on  the  open-ended  रिक्टर  Scale .
The quake killed 63 people  throughout  northern California , injured 3,757 and left some 3,000–12,000  लोगों  homeless .
The  भूकंप   occurred   दौरान   the  warm-up  अभ्यास  for  the  third game  of  the  1989  World Series ,  featuring   दोनो   of  the Bay Area  's  Major  लीग  Baseball  टीमों   ,  the  ओकलैंड   एथलेटिक्स  and  the  San Francisco Giants .
Because of game-related sports coverage , this was  the  first  प्रमुख  earthquake in the United States to have its initial jolt broadcast live  on  television .
साहूकार   in  the standard  staunton  pattern
The  साहूकार   (  ♙♟  )  is  the   सबसे  numerous  और   in  most  हालातों   the  weakest  टुकड़ा  in the  खेल  of chess , historically  representing  infantry  or   ,  more particularly  ,  armed peasants  or  pikemen .
in   शतरंज  ,  प्रत्येक   खिलाड़ी   begins   the  game with eight  प्यादे  ,  एक   on  each square of  the  rank  तत्काल  in front  of  the  अन्य  pieces  .
( In algebraic  संकेतन   ,   the   श्वेत   प्यादे   प्रारंभ  on  a2  , b2  ,  c2 , ... ,  h2   ,   जबकि   ब्लैक   प्यादे   प्रारंभ  on a7 ,  b7  , c7 ,  ...   ,  h7  .   )
व्यक्तिगत   प्यादे  are referred  to  by  the   संचिका   on  which  वे   स्टैंड   .
For example , one speaks of  ``  White 's f-pawn  ''  or  ``   ब्लैक   's   b-pawn  '' ,  or   कम   commonly  ( using  वर्णनात्मक  notation  )  ,  ``   श्वेत  's king 's bishop  साहूकार  ''  or   ``  Black 's  महारानी  's  नाईट  pawn  ''  .
It  is  also common to  refer  to a  rook   साहूकार  , meaning any pawn on the  a-  or h-file  ,  a knight pawn ( on the b- or  g-file   )   ,  a bishop  साहूकार   (   on  the  c-  or f-file  )  , a  महारानी  pawn  (  on the d-file ) , a king pawn ( on  the   e-file  ) , and a  सेंट्रल  pawn  (  on either the d- or e-file )  .
The military forces  of  the  संसार  have  differing   approaches  to the  enlistment  of homosexual (  gay  and  लेस्बियन  ) and bisexual  individuals  .
The armed forces of  सबसे  developed  देशों  have now  removed  policies excluding non-heterosexual  individuals   (  with  सख्त  policies on  यौन   उत्पीड़न  ) .
Nations that  परमिट  gay people  to  serve openly in the  सैन्य   शामिल  the  4   of  the  5   सदस्यों  of the  un   सुरक्षा  Council  (   संयुक्त  States  ,  United Kingdom  ,  France , and  रूस  ) ,  the  Republic of  चीन   (   ताईवान  )  ,   ऑस्ट्रेलिया   ,  Israel , South  अफ़्रीकी  , Argentina  ,   और  all  नाटो  members excluding  तुर्कों  .
Hydrogen production is the family of  औद्योगिक   विधि  for generating hydrogen .
Currently the  प्रबल  technology  लिये  direct production is steam reforming  इससे   hydrocarbons  .
अनेक  other methods  हैं  known including electrolysis and  thermolysis  .
In 2006 ,  the  United States was  अनुमानित  to  have  a  उत्पादन  capacity of  11   लाख   टन  of hydrogen .
5  million  टन   of  hydrogen were  खपत   on-site  in  आयल  refining  ,  and in  the  production of  अमोनिया  ( Haber  प्रक्रम   )   और   methanol  ( reduction  of   कार्बन  monoxide )  .
0.4  million tonnes were an  incidental   by-product  of  the   chlor-alkali   प्रक्रम  .
हाइड्रोजन   उत्पादन  is an estimated $  100   अरब   उद्योग   .
A basis  पाइंट   (  often denoted  as   bp  , colloquially referred to  in  the plural  as   ``   bips  '' , also known as  a   ``  beep  ''   )  is  a   ईकाई  equal  to  one hundredth of  a   प्रतिशत   पाइंट   ,  or one part per  टेन   हजार   ,  1/10000  .
The same  ईकाई   is  also ( rarely  )   पुकारा  a  permyriad   ,   वस्तुतः   अर्थ  'for  (  every ) myriad ( ten  हजार   )   '  , and in  कि   कॉन्टेक्स्ट  is written with which looks  जैसे   a  percent  चिह्न   (  % ) with two extra zeroes at  the   समाप्त  (  जैसे  a  stylized  form  of   the  four zeros in the denominator  ,  although it originates as  a  natural extension of the percent  (  % ) and permille ( ‰ )  लक्षण  ) .
A basis  पाइंट  is defined as:
1  basis  पाइंट  =  1  permyriad =  एक  one-hundredth  प्रतिशत
1   bp   =   1   =  0.01  %  = 0.1‰ =  10−4   =   =  0.0001
1  %  = 100  bp   =   100
आधार   अंक  are used as a  सुविधाजनक  unit of measurement in  contexts  where  प्रतिशत   मतभेद  of less  than   1   %   हैं  discussed  .
the  most common  उदाहरण  is interest rates ,  जहाँ   मतभेद  in interest  दरों  of  कम  than  1  % per  साल   हैं  usually meaningful to talk about  .
For example  ,  a difference  of  0.10 percentage points  is  equivalent to  a  change of 10  आधार  points (  e.g  .  a   4.67  % rate  increases  by 10 basis  अंक  to 4.77 %  )   .
Like  प्रतिशत  points , basis  अंक  avoid  the  ambiguity between relative and absolute  चर्चाएँ  about interest  दरों   by  dealing only with the  निरपेक्ष  change in numeric value of  a  rate .
For example , if a  रपट   says   वहीँ  has been  a  `` 1 % increase  ''   इससे   a   10  % interest rate , this could refer  to   an   बढ़ाएँ  either  इससे  10 % to 10.1 % ( relative , 1  %  of 10 %  )  , or from 10  %  to  11  %  (   निरपेक्ष  ,  1  %  प्लस  10  %   )   .
If  ,  however , the report  says   वहीँ  has been a  ``  10  आधार   पाइंट   बढ़ाएँ  '' from  a   10  % interest  रेट  ,  तब   we  know that the  ब्याज   रेट  of 10 % has  increased  by 0.10 %  (  the absolute  बदलें  ) to a 10.1 % rate  .
It is  आम   अभ्यास   in  the financial  उद्योग   to   उपयोग  basis points to  denote  a rate change in a financial instrument , or the difference ( spread  )  between two interest rates ,  सहित  the yields  of  fixed-income securities  .
Since certain loans  और   bonds  may commonly  be   कोटेड  in relation to some  अनुक्रमणिका   or  underlying  सुरक्षा  , they will often be quoted as  a   स्प्रेड  over ( or  अंतर्गत   )   the   अनुक्रमणिका   .
For example , a  ऋण   कि  bears  ब्याज  of 0.50  %  per annum  ऊपर   the  London Interbank  offered  Rate ( LIBOR ) is said to be 50 basis points  over  LIBOR  ,  which is commonly  expressed  as  ``   l+50bps   ''   or   बस   ``   l+50  '' .
the  term  ``   आधार  point '' has  इसके   origins   in  trading the ``  आधार   ''  or the spread  between   दो  interest rates .
Since the basis  is   प्रायः  small , these are quoted  multiplied  up by 10000  ,   और  hence a ``  पूरा  point '' movement in the `` basis '' is a basis  पाइंट  .
Contrast  साथ  pips in FX  आगे   बाज़ार  .
the  relationship between percentage  परिवर्तन  and basis  अंक  can  be  summarized as follows : 1  प्रतिशत  point  बदलें  =  100  basis points  ,  and  0.01  percentage  अंक  =  1  basis point  .
So , a  बंध   जिनकी  yield increases from  5  %  to  5.5  %  is  कहा   to   बढ़ाएँ  by 50  आधार   अंक  ;  or   ब्याज  rates  कि   have  risen 1 percentage  पाइंट   हैं  said  to  have increased  by   100   आधार   अंक  .
The British  royal  Family is the  समूह  of close relatives of the monarch of the United  किंगडम   .
the  term  is  also commonly applied to the same group of people who  हैं  the relations of the  monarch  in  उसके   or   उसके  role  as   sovereign  of any of  the   अन्य   राष्ट्रमंडल  realms , thus  sometimes   at   variance  with official  नेशनल  terms  लिये  the family .
Members of the  royal   परिवार  belong  to   ,   either   by  birth  or  marriage , the House of  विंडसर  ,  चूंकि   1917   ,  when George  v   बदला  the name of  the   royal  house  इससे  Saxe-Coburg and Gotha .
This decision  थी  primarily  लिया   क्युकी   ब्रिटेन  and her  साम्राज्य  were  at   युद्ध   साथ  Germany and given  the  British Royal Family 's  दमदार  German ancestry ; it  थी  felt that its  पब्लिक  image could be  improved   by  choosing  a  more British  हाउस  name .
the  new  नाम  chosen  ,   विंडसर  ,  था   बिल्कुल  no connection other  than  as the name  of   the  castle which was and continues to be a royal residence  .
हालांकि  in the United Kingdom there is  no   सख्त   विधिक  or  औपचारिक  definition  of  who is or is not  a  member  of   the  Royal Family , and  अलग  lists will  शामिल   अलग   लोगों   ,  those  carrying  the style  उसके  or His  majesty   (   hm   )   ,  or  उसके  or His  royal  Highness (  hrh   )  are  सदा  considered members , which  प्रायः   परिणाम  in  the  application  of   the  term to the monarch ,  the  consort of the monarch  ,   the   विधवा   consorts   of  previous  monarchs  , the  children  of the  monarch  and  पिछला   monarchs  ,  the   male-line   grandchildren  of  the   monarch  and  पिछला   monarchs  , and the spouses and the widows of a  monarch  's and previous  monarch  's  बेटे   और  male-line grandsons  .
On  30  November 1917 , King  जार्ज  V  जारी  Letters Patent defining  जो   हैं   सदस्यों   of  the  royal  Family ; the text of the notice from  the   लंदन  Gazette is as  follows:
In 1996  ,  Her  majesty  The Queen modified  ये   अक्षर  Patent , as was evidenced by this  सूचना  from the London Gazette:
in  2013 Letters Patent were issued  to  extend a  शीर्षक  and a  स्टाइल  borne by  सदस्यों  of the Royal Family to additional persons to  be   born  , evidenced  by  this Notice  इससे  the London Gazette:
Members  और  relatives  of  the  अंग्रेजों   royal   परिवार  historically represented the  monarch   in  various  स्थान  throughout  the  British  साम्राज्य  , sometimes  लिये   विस्तारित  periods as viceroys  ,  or  लिये   विशिष्ट   ceremonies   or  events  .
Today , they often perform ceremonial and social  कर्तव्य  throughout the United Kingdom and abroad on  निमित्त  of the United Kingdom .
aside   इससे  the monarch , their  तभी  constitutional role in  the   अफेयर्स  of government is  to   serve  , if eligible and  जब   नियुक्त  by letters patent , as  a   काउंसलर  of  राज्य  ,  दो  or  अधिक  of  जिसको   कसरत  the authority of  the   क्राउन  ( within  stipulated  limits  )  in the indisposal or absence from the  अंग्रेजों  realm of the monarch .
in   the  other realms  of  the Commonwealth  रॉयल्टी  do not serve  as  Counsellors  of  State .
However in  प्रत्येक  such  फ्रेम  the monarch  's  family  सदस्यों  may act  on  behalf  of  , are funded by ,  और  represent the  sovereign   of   कि  particular state , and not  the  United  किंगडम  .
The  महारानी   ,   उसके   consort  , her  children  and  grandchildren  , as well as all former sovereigns ' children and  grandchildren  hold places in  the  first  भाग   of   the   आधिकारिक  orders of precedence  in  England and Wales  ,  Scotland , and Northern  आयरलैंड   .
Wives of  the   कहा  enjoy their husbands ' precedence ,  और  husbands of princesses  हैं  unofficially  लकिन  habitually placed with  उनके  wives  as  well  .
However  ,  the  महारानी  changed the private order of  पूर्वता  in  the  Royal Family in  पक्ष  of Princesses Anne and Alexandra ,  जो  henceforth take  निजी   पूर्वता   over   the  Duchess of Cornwall ,  जो  is otherwise  the  realm  's   उच्चतम  ranking  स्त्री  after the  महारानी  herself .
She did not alter the  सापेक्ष   पूर्वता  of  अन्य  born-princesses ,  ऐसे  as  the  daughters of her younger sons .
हैती  (  ;   haitian  Creole Ayiti  )  ,  officially  the Republic of Haiti (  ;  )  ,  is  a  Caribbean country .
it  occupies the  पश्चिमी  ,  छोटी   portion  of the island of  हिस्पानिओला   ,  in the  वृहद  Antillean  द्वीपसमूह   ,  which  it  shares with  the   डोमिनिकन  Republic .
Ayiti  (   जमीन  of  ऊँची   kyu  ) was  the   स्वदेशी   taíno  or Amerindian name  लिये  the island  .
The  देश   's  highest  पाइंट   is  Pic la Selle , at .
The total area of  हैती   is  and its capital  is   port-au-prince  .
haitian  Creole and  फ्रेंच  are the  आधिकारिक   भाषाएं   .
हैती  's regional  ,   ऐतिहासिक  , and ethno-linguistic position  is   अद्वितीय  for  अनेक   कारण   .
it  was  the  first independent nation  of  Latin America and the  caribbean   ,   the  first black -led  गणतंत्र   in   the  world  ,  and  the  second republic in the Americas  जब  it gained independence in  1804   as   भाग   of   a  successful slave revolution lasting  nearly  a  दशक   .
In 2012 , Haiti announced  इसके  intention to seek associate  सदस्यता  status  in  the African  संघ  .
Haiti is the most populous of  the  predominantly Francophone independent  राष्ट्र  in  the   americas   .
it  is one  of  only two independent  राष्ट्र  in the Americas (  साथ   साथ  Canada  )  to  designate  French  as   an   आधिकारिक  language  ;  the  अन्य  French-speaking  क्षेत्रों  are all  विदेशी   départements  ,  or  collectivités , of  फ़्रांस  .
Haiti is  the   सबसे   populous  full member-state of the Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ) .
It  is  the poorest country in  the   americas   as  measured  by   the  Human Development  अनुक्रमणिका  .
Political violence has occurred  regularly   throughout  its  इतिहास  , leading  to  government instability .
Most  recently   ,   in  February 2004  ,  a  तख्तापलट  d'état originating in the  उत्तर   of   the   देश   मजबूर   the  resignation and  निर्वासन   of  President  jean-bertrand  Aristide  .
a   अस्थायी   सरकारी   took  control  साथ   सुरक्षा   provided  by the United  राष्ट्र  Stabilization Mission in  हैती  (  minustah  ) .
Michel  martelly  , the  वर्तमान  president  ,  was elected in the Haitian general election , 2011 .
The  द्वीप   रै   था   a   इतिहास  of  destructive  earthquakes  .
a  7.0 magnitude earthquake struck  हैती  on 12  जनवरी  2010 and devastated Port-au-Prince .
The highest reliable death  गिनती  was estimated at  220,000  .
haitian  government  estimates   यहूद   उच्चतर  .
The Presidential palace , Parliament and  अनेक  other important structures were destroyed  ,  along with  अनगिनत   घरों  and  व्यवसायों   ,  leaving  सैंकड़ों   of   हज़ारों  of people homeless .
The  देश  has yet to recover  इससे   the   2010  earthquake ( and subsequent incidents ) due to both the severity  of   the  damage Haiti endured  in  2010 , as well  as   a  government that  थी  ineffective well  पहले   the  earthquake .
संयुक्त  States aid organizations have donated $ 2 billion .
Combined  साथ  other  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  donations , these funds  हैं   intended   to  contribute to the  पुनर्निर्माण  of the country  .
The  खूनी  Beetroots is the  pseudonym  of Sir  bob  Cornelius Rifo  ,   the   इतालवी  electro  हाउस  and  dance-punk  music  निर्माता  ,  dj   और  photographer  .
The  खूनी   beetroots  is well-known for  the  black Venom mask he  wears  during  प्रदर्शन  .
in  fact ,  the  only identifying  पब्लिक  feature of  rifo  is the  साल  `` 1977  ''  tattooed across his chest , which is  दोनो  the year that the producer  और   punk-rock   थी   born  .
`` The Bloody Beetroots  dj   नियत  '' contains  सर  Bob Cornelius Rifo and  टॉमी  Tea .
A Motorola  सलाहकार  alphanumeric pager used  in   ब्राज़ील   in  the  1990s  , operated by Teletrim
A pager is  a  wireless telecommunications device that  receives   और   प्रदर्शक   न्यूमेरिक  or  टेक्स्ट  messages ,  or   receives  and announces  आवाज़   संदेश   .
One-way  pagers   can  only receive  संदेश  ,  जबकि   जवाब   pagers   और  two-way  pagers  can also acknowledge  ,  reply to  ,  and originate messages using an  आतंरिक   ट्रांसमीटर  .
pagers   operate  as part of a paging system  जिससे  includes  एक  or  अधिक  fixed  ट्रांसमीटरों   (   or  in the  मामला  of response  pagers   और   two-way  pagers  ,   एक   or   अधिक  base stations  )  ,  as  well  as  a  क्रमांक  of  pagers  carried  by   मोबाईल  users  .
ये  systems  can   दायरा   इससे  a restaurant system with a  सिंगल   low-power   ट्रांसमीटर  , to a  देशभर   प्रणाली   साथ   हज़ारों   of  high-power  आधार  stations  .
One of  the  first practical  paging   सेवाएं  was launched  in  1950 for  physicians  in the New York City  क्षेत्रफल  .
Physicians  सशुल्क   us   $   12   प्रति   माह  for the  सेवा  and carried a ( 6 oz  )  pager that  होता   प्राप्त  phone  संदेश  within ( 25  mi   )  of  a   सिंगल   ट्रांसमीटर  tower  .
The system  थी   manufactured   by  the Reevesound  कम्पनी  and operated by Telanswerphone  .
In  1960  ,  जॉन  Francis  मिशेल   संयुक्त  elements of Motorola 's Walkie Talkie and automobile  रेडियो  technologies to create  the   पहला   transistorized  pager  ,  and from  इस   पाइंट  , paging technology continued  to  advance ,  और   पेजर   अपनाना   जारी  to expand , until the early 1990s .
However  ,  by the mid-1990s  ,   as  cellular  technologies  became cheaper  और   अधिक   widely  available ,  उन्नत   सेवाएं  began to displace  paging  as  a   वाणिज्यिक  product  .
आज  , pagers exist largely  as  niche products , finding preferential  उपयोग  in applications  ऐसे   as  hospitals ,  पब्लिक  safety  ,  and retail locations  जहाँ  their  सादगी  , high  विश्वसनीयता  ,  और  low cost represent significant  लाभ  .
Reevesville is  a  town in  dorchester  County ,  दक्षिण  Carolina , United  राज्य   .
the  population  थी  196 at the  2010   जनसांख्यिकी   .
as  defined  by  the  u.S.   दफ्तर  of  प्रबन्धन   और   बजट  , and used by the U.S.  जनसांख्यिकी   ब्यूरो  for  सांख्यिकीय   उद्देश्य  only  ,  Reevesville is  शामिल  within the Charleston-North  charleston-summerville  metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल   .
frida   kahlo  de Rivera ( born  magdalena   कार्मेन   frieda   kahlo  y Calderón ; July  6  ,  1907  –  जुलाई  13  ,   1954  )  थी  a  मैक्सिकन  painter , born in  coyoacán  , who is best  ज्ञात  for her  self-portraits  .
Kahlo  's   जीवन   began   और  ended in Mexico City  ,  in  उसके   घर  known  as  the Blue House  .
She gave her birth  तिथि   as  July 7 ,  1910  ,  लकिन  her  जनम   प्रमाणपत्र  shows  जुलाई   6   ,  1907  .
Kahlo  था   allegedly   चाही  the year of her  जनम  to  coincide   साथ   the  year of the beginning of the Mexican  क्रान्ति  so  कि   उसके  life would begin  साथ   the   जनम  of  आधुनिक  Mexico  .
Her  कार्य  has  महरूम   मनाये   in   मैक्सिको  as  emblematic   of  national  और  indigenous tradition  ,   और   by  feminists for its  uncompromising  depiction of  the  female experience and  रूप  .
मैक्सिकन  culture and Amerindian cultural tradition  हैं   महत्वपूर्ण  in  उसके  work ,  जिससे  has  महरूम  sometimes  characterized  as Naïve art or folk art .
उसके   कार्य   रै  also been described  as  ``  surrealist  '' , and in  1938   आंद्रे   ब्रेटन  ,  प्रिंसिपल   initiator  of the surrealist  गति  , described Kahlo 's  आर्ट  as  a  `` ribbon around a bomb  ''  .
kahlo   था  a  volatile   विवाह  with the  प्रसिद्ध   मैक्सिकन  artist Diego  रिवेरा   .
She  suffered  lifelong  स्वास्थ्य  problems  .
Many of her  स्वास्थ्य  problems  यहूद  the  परिणाम  of  a  traffic accident  वो  survived as  a  teenager .
Recovering from  उसके   चोटों   पृथक  her from other people and  इस   अलगाव   बहकावे  her works ,  अनेक   of   जिससे   हैं  self-portraits  of  one sort  or   another   .
Kahlo suggested  ,  `` I paint myself because I am so  प्रायः  alone  और   क्युकी  I  am  the  विषय  I know  बेहतरीन  .  ''
She also stated , `` I was born  a   कुतिया  .
I  थी  born a  चित्रकार   .  ''

Theresienwiese on  the  day before Oktoberfest 2006
oktoberfest  is a 16-day  पर्व  celebrating  बियर  held annually  in   म्यूनिख  ,  बायर्न   ,   जर्मनी   ,   कार्यशील   इससे  late September  to  the first  वीकेंड  in  अक्तूबर  .
it  is one  of  the most famous events in Germany  और   is   the   संसार   's  largest  मेला  ,  साथ   अधिक   than  6 million people  इससे  around the  संसार  attending  the  event every  साल  .
to  the locals  ,   it  is not  पुकारा  Oktoberfest , but `` die  wiesn  '' , after the colloquial name of  the  fairgrounds themselves .
The  oktoberfest  is an important part of Bavarian  संस्कृति  ,  having  been  आयोजित  since  1810   .
Other cities across  the   संसार  also hold Oktoberfest  जश्न  , modeled after the original Munich  इवेंट  .
The  म्यूनिख  Oktoberfest originally  took  place  दौरान  the  सोलह  days  up  to  ,  and  सहित  ,  the   पहला   संडे  in October .
In 1994 , the schedule  थी  modified  in  response to German reunification so that if  the   पहला  Sunday in  अक्तूबर  falls on  the   1st  or  2nd  , then the  पर्व  would  go  on until  अक्तूबर  3  (  German Unity Day ) .
Thus , the festival is now  17   दिनों   जब   the   पहला   संडे  is October 2 and 18 days when  it   is  October  1  .
in   2010  , the festival lasted until the first Monday  in  October  ,  to mark  the   वर्षगांठ   of  the event  .
the  festival  is   आयोजित   in  an area  नामित  the Theresienwiese ( field , or  मर्ग  ,  of  Therese ) , often called  wiesn  for  छोटी  , located  निकट   म्यूनिख   's  center .
Large quantities of Oktoberfest  बियर   हैं  consumed  ,  with  लगभग  7 million liters served  दौरान   the  16 day  पर्व  in 2007 .
Visitors  may  also enjoy a  चौड़ी   किस्में  of traditional  खाना   ऐसे  as  hendl   (  chicken ) , Schweinebraten ( roast  पोर्क   )  ,  schweinshaxe  ( grilled ham hock ) , Steckerlfisch (  ग्रील्ड   मछली  on a stick ) ,  würstl  ( sausages ) along  साथ  Brezeln  (  Pretzel ) ,  knödel  ( potato or  ब्रैड   पकौड़ी   )   ,   käsespätzle   (   चीज   नूडल्स   )  , Reiberdatschi (  आलू  pancakes  )  ,  sauerkraut  or Rotkohl/Blaukraut (  रेड   गोभी   )   साथ   साथ   ऐसे   bar  delicacies as  obatzda  (  a  spiced  cheese-butter  spread ) and Weisswurst (  a   श्वेत  sausage ) .
