Wheels of  gouda
Cheese  is   a   जेनेरिक  term  लिये  a diverse group  of  milk-based food products  .
चीज  is  उत्पादित  in wide-ranging  जायका  ,  बनावट   ,  and forms .
चीज  consists of proteins  और  fat from milk  ,   प्रायः   the  milk of cows  ,  buffalo , goats  ,   or  sheep .
it  is  उत्पादित  by coagulation of the milk protein casein  .
Typically , the  मिल्क  is  acidified   और  addition of the  एंजाइम  rennet  कल्याणकारी  coagulation .
The solids are  अलग  and pressed into  फाइनल   रूप  .
Some cheeses  have  molds on  the   rind   or  throughout .
Most cheeses melt at  कुकिंग  temperature .
सैंकड़ों  of types of cheese  इससे   विभिन्न   देशों  are produced .
Their  शैलियाँ  ,  बनावट  and flavors  निर्भर  on the  उत्पत्ति  of  the  milk ( including the  एनिमल   's   आहार   )  , whether  वे   have   महरूम  pasteurized  ,   the  butterfat content  ,   the   जीवाणु  and  मोल्ड   ,  the processing ,  और  aging .
Herbs , spices , or wood smoke may be  प्रयुक्त  as  flavoring  agents .
the   पीला  to red  रंग  of  अनेक  cheeses ,  ऐसे  as  रेड  Leicester , is normally formed from adding  annatto   .
For  a  few cheeses , the milk is curdled  by  adding acids  ऐसे   as   सिरका   or   नीबू  juice  .
सबसे   cheeses  are acidified to a lesser degree by bacteria ,  जिससे   फेरे  milk  sugars   into   लैक्टिक   एसिड  , then the addition of rennet  completes   the  curdling .
Vegetarian alternatives  to   rennet   हैं  available ;  सबसे   हैं  produced  by  fermentation  of   the   कवक   mucor   miehei  , but  अन्य  have been extracted from  विभिन्न  species  of   the   cynara  thistle  परिवार   .
Cheese  is   valued   लिये   इसके  portability , long  जीवन  ,  और  high content of  मोटे   ,  protein  ,   कैल्सियम  , and  फॉस्फोरस   .
Cheese is  अधिक  compact  और  has a  longer   शेल्फ   जीवन   than  milk  ,  although how  long   a   चीज  will keep  may  depend  on   the  type of cheese  ;  labels on packets of cheese often claim  कि   a  cheese should be consumed within three to five  दिनों   of  opening .
generally  speaking , hard cheeses last  longer  than soft  cheeses  , such as  brie   or  goat  's   मिल्क  cheese  .
cheesemakers  near  a  dairy region may benefit from  fresher   ,   lower-priced   मिल्क   ,  and lower  शिपिंग  costs  .
the  long  भंडार   जीवन   of  some  चीज  , especially  if  it is  encased  in a protective  rind   ,   allows   selling   जब   बाज़ार  are  अनुकूल  .
Additional ingredients may  be  added to some cheeses  ,  such as black peppers , garlic , chives  or  cranberries .
A specialist  विक्रेता  of  चीज  is  sometimes   ज्ञात   as   a  cheesemonger .
To become  an   विशेषज्ञ  in  इस  field ,  जैसे   वाइन   or   कुकिंग  ,  requires   कुछ  formal education  और  years  of  tasting  और  hands-on experience .
This position  is   typically  responsible for all aspects  of  the cheese  inventory  ; selecting the  चीज   मेनू   ,  purchasing  ,  receiving ,  भंडार  , and ripening  .
Legal citation  सिग्नल  are a  नियत  of brief  abbreviated  phrases  or  words  प्रयुक्त   to   clarify  the authority or  significance   of  a legal  citation   as  it  relates   to   a  proposition  .
Signals  सहायता  a  रीडर  quickly discern meaning or usefulness of  a  particular  सन्दर्भ  when the  सन्दर्भ   itself  does not  provide   पर्याप्त   सूचना  .
Most  citation   सिग्नल  are placed in  सामने  of  the  citation to which they apply .
For  उदाहरण   ,  in the paragraph When  लिखने  a  विधिक   तर्क   ,   it  is important to  refer   to  primary sources  .
To assist  पाठक  in  locating  these sources , it is desirable to  उपयोग  a standardized citation format .
See generally Harvard Law Review Association , The  bluebook  : A Uniform System  of  Citation  (  18th ed . 2005 )  .
Note  ,   however  , that some  न्यायालयों   may  require  कोई   विधिक  papers  कि   हैं  submitted to them  to  conform to a  अलग   citation  format  .
the signal  is  the phrase ``  देखिए   generally   ,  '' which indicates  कि  the  citation  `` The  bluebook  :  a  Uniform System  of   citation   (  18th ed  .  2005  )   ''   provides  general background information on the topic .
Neil Alden Armstrong ( August  5  , 1930  –  August 25 , 2012 ) was  an  American  astronaut  and the first person to  चलना  on the  चंद्रमा  .
he   थी  also  an  aerospace engineer ,  नवल  aviator ,  परीक्षण  pilot  ,  and university professor  .
Before  बनने  an astronaut  ,  Armstrong was an  अधिकारी  in the U.S.  नेवी  and served  in  the  कोरियाई   युद्ध   .
After the war , he earned his  स्नातक  's degree at  purdue   विश्वविद्यालयों   और   परोसा  as a test  पायलट  at  the   नेशनल   सलाहकार  Committee for  aeronautics  High-Speed Flight Station ,  अभी  known as the Dryden  उड़ान  Research  बीच  ,  जहाँ  he logged over 900 flights .
He  बाद  completed graduate studies at the  विश्वविद्यालयों   of   दक्षिणी  California  .
a  participant in  the  U.S.  एयर  Force  's   man   in  Space  soonest  and  x-20  Dyna-Soar human  spaceflight  programs  ,  Armstrong  joined  the NASA  astronaut  Corps in  1962   .
He  बना  his first space flight ,  as  command  पायलट   of  Gemini  8  ,  in   1966  ,  बनने   नासा  's first  civilian   astronaut   to  fly  in   स्पेस  .
On  इस   मिशन   ,  he  performed  the  पहला   डॉकिंग  of two  spacecraft  , with pilot David Scott .
Armstrong  's  second and  पिछला   spaceflight   थी  as mission  कमांडर  of  the   अपोलो   11  moon  लैंडिंग  ,  in  July  1969   .
On  इस  mission  ,  Armstrong  और   बज़  Aldrin  descended   to   the   चंद्र   सतह   और   खर्च   दो   और  a  हाफ  hours exploring , while Michael Collins  remained  in lunar orbit in the  कमांड  Module  .
Along  साथ   कॉलिन्स   और  Aldrin  ,  Armstrong  थी   awarded   the  Presidential  पदक   of  Freedom by  अध्यक्ष   रिचर्ड  Nixon  ;  in  1978  , President  jimmy   कार्टर  presented  आर्मस्ट्रांग   the   congressional  Space  पदक  of Honor in 1978  ;  he  और   उसके  former crewmates received the Congressional  सुनहरा  Medal  in  2009  .
आर्मस्ट्रांग  died  in  Cincinnati ,  ओहियो   ,   on   अगस्त   25   ,   2012  ,  at  the  आयु  of 82  ,   बाद  complications from coronary artery  बायपास  surgery .
सचिवालय  ( March 30  ,  1970  –  October 4 , 1989 ) was an American Thoroughbred racehorse that  in  1973  became  the first U.S .  ट्रिपल   क्राउन   चैंपियन  in 25 years  .
he  set  रेस  records in  सब   तीन  events  in   the   श्रेणी   —   the  Kentucky Derby  (  1:59.4  )  , the Preakness  stakes  ( 1:53 ) , and  the  Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 )  —   रिकॉर्ड  that still  स्टैंड   आज  .
He is  माना  to be  एक  of  the   महानतम   thoroughbreds  of all time .
in   1999  ,  ईएसपीएन  ranked  सचिवालय  the  35th  best athlete  of  the  20th  century  ,   the   उच्चतम  ranking  racehorse  on  the   सूची  URL_http .
he   क्रमित   दूसरी   पीछे  Man  o  ' War in The  blood-horse  's List  of   the   शीर्ष   100  U.S.  racehorses  of  the  20th  सदी  .
सचिवालय  was  sired   by   बिंदास   शासक  out  of   somethingroyal   ,   by  Princequillo  .
He  थी  foaled at The  मर्ग   in  Caroline  काउंटी   ,  Virginia .
जैसे  his famous  पूर्ववर्ती   man   o  ' War  ,  Secretariat was  a  large chestnut  टट्टू  and was given the same nickname  ,   ``  Big  रेड  . ''
Secretariat  's  grandsire ,  nasrullah  , is  भी   the   great-great-grandsire   of  1977 Triple  क्राउन  winner  सिएटल  Slew .
Owned by Penny Chenery  ,  he  थी  trained by Lucien Laurin and mainly ridden by Canadian jockey Ron Turcotte , along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano  (  first two  दौड़  ) ,  और  veteran Eddie Maple  (  last race )  .
He raced in Chenery  's  Meadow  stable  's  ब्लू  and white checkered  रंगों  and his groom was  एडी  Sweat .
Secretariat stood  लगभग  tall , and weighed  ,  with a  75-inch   girth  , in his racing prime  .
मैड्रिड  (  ,  )  is  the  पूंजी   और   largest   नगर  of Spain .
The population  of  the  नगर  is  roughly  3.3  लाख  and the  संपूर्ण   जनसांख्यिकी  of the  मैड्रिड   महानगर  area is calculated to be  around   6.5   लाख   .
It  is  the third-largest city  in   the  European Union  ,  after  लंदन   और  Berlin , and its metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल   is  the third-largest in  the  European Union after London  और  Paris  .
The city spans a total  of   .
The city is located  on  the  manzanares  river in the centre of both the country and  the   जातियाँ  of Madrid ( which comprises the city of  मैड्रिड  , its conurbation  और  extended suburbs  और   गांवों   )  ;  इस   जातियाँ  is bordered  by  the  autonomous   समुदायों  of Castile  और   león   और  Castile-La  मांचा  .
As  the   पूंजी  city of  स्पेन   ,  seat  of  government  ,   और   निवास  of the Spanish  monarch  , Madrid  is  also  the  political ,  आर्थिक   और   सांस्कृतिक  centre of Spain .
the  current  महापौर  is Ana Botella from  the   लोगों   's  Party  (  PP )  .
The Madrid  शहरी   agglomeration  has the third-largest GDP in the  यूरोपीय   संघ  and its influences in politics ,  शिक्षा  , entertainment , environment , media  ,  fashion ,  विज्ञान   ,   संस्कृति  ,  और  the arts all  योगदान  to  इसके   औकात  as  एक  of the  संसार  's  प्रमुख   वैश्विक  cities  .
due  to  इसके   आर्थिक  output  ,  high standard  of   जीना  , and market  आकार  , Madrid  is  considered the major  वित्तीय  centre of  दक्षिणी  Europe and  the  Iberian Peninsula ;  it   होस्ट  the  सिर  offices of the vast  बहुमत  of the major  स्पेनी   कंपनियाँ   ,   ऐसे  as  telefónica  , Iberia or  repsol   .
Madrid  is  the most  touristic   नगर  of Spain  ,   the  fourth-most touristic  of  the continent ,  और  the seventh most visited city in  the  world  according   to  Forbes .
Is  the   10th  most  livable   नगर   in   the  world according to Monocle  पत्रिका   ,  in its 2010  अनुक्रमणिका  .
मैड्रिड  also ranks among the 12 greenest European cities in  2010.  <  संदर्भ   name=   ''  http :  //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html   ''  >  मैड्रिड   is  currently a  प्रत्याशी  City for the  2020   गर्मियाँ   ओलंपिक  .
मैड्रिड  houses  the  headquarters of the  संसार  Tourism Organization  (  WTO ) , belonging  to   the  United  राष्ट्र  Organization  (  UN )  ,   the   segib  , the Organization  of  Ibero-American States ( OEI )  ,   और  the Public  ब्याज   oversight   फलक  ( PIOB ) .
It also  होस्ट   प्रमुख   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   संस्थानों   regulators  of  स्पेनी   :  the Standing Committee of the Association of Spanish Language  अकादमियों   ,  headquarters  of  the  royal  Spanish Academy (  rae  ) , the  cervantes   संस्थान   और  the Foundation of Urgent Spanish ( Fundéu )  .
Madrid organizes fairs  as  FITUR , ARCO , SIMO TCI and the  cibeles  Madrid  फ़ैशन  Week .
While Madrid possesses  a  modern  अवसंरचना  , it  रै  preserved the  dekh  and feel of many  of   इसके   ऐतिहासिक  neighbourhoods and  गलियों   .
Its landmarks  शामिल  the  royal   राजमहल  of Madrid  ;   the  Teatro Real  (   royal   थिएटर  ) with its  लौटी  1850  ओपेरा  House ;  the   buen  Retiro  पार्क  , founded  in  1631  ;  the 19th-century  नेशनल  Library building ( founded in 1712 ) containing some  of  Spain  's   ऐतिहासिक  archives  ;  a  विशाल  number of National museums , and the Golden Triangle  of  Art , located along  the  Paseo del Prado  और   comprising  three  आर्ट  museums  :  Prado  संग्रहालय  , the  museo  Nacional  centro  de  arte  Reina Sofía , a  संग्रहालय  of  आधुनिक  art  ,   और  the Thyssen-Bornemisza  संग्रहालय  , which completes  the   त्रुटियां  of  the   अन्य  two  संग्रहालय   .
Cibeles Palace and  फव्वारा  have become the  स्मारक  symbol of  the  city .
The  पाथ  of the Via  appia   और  of  the   via  Appia Traiana  .
Remains  of  the Appian Way  in   रोम  , near Quarto  miglio
Near Rome .
The Appian Way  (  Latin  और   इतालवी  : Via Appia )  थी  one of the earliest and strategically most important Roman roads of  the   प्राचीन  republic .
It connected  रोम  to  brindisi  ,  apulia  , in southeast  इटली  .
Its importance  is   indicated  by its common  नाम  ,  अंकित  by  statius  :
appia  teritur regina longarum viarum
`` the  appian   रास्ता  is the  महारानी  of the long roads  ''
the   सड़क   is   नामित  after Appius Claudius  caecus  ,  the   रोमन  censor  जो  began and  समाप्त  the first section as  a  military road to the south in 312 BC during  the   samnite   युद्धों  .
the   draupner   वेव  , a single giant wave measured on  नई   साल  's  दिन  1995  ,   आखिरकार  confirmed the  अस्तित्व   of  freak waves , which  था  previously been considered  near-mythical
दुष्ट   लहरें  ( also known  as  freak waves ,  दानव   लहरें   ,  killer waves , extreme waves , and abnormal  लहरें   )   हैं  relatively large  और   spontaneous  ocean surface waves that occur  दूर  out at sea ,  और  are  a  threat even to  विशाल   जहाजों   और  ocean liners  .
In oceanography ,  वे  are more precisely  पारिभाषित   as  waves  जिनकी   ऊँचाई   is   अधिक   than  twice the  significant  wave height ( SWH  )  ,  जिससे  is itself  पारिभाषित   as   the   औसत  of  the  largest  तीसरा   of   लहरें  in a wave record .
इसलिए  rogue waves are  नहीं   necessarily  the biggest waves found at  समुद्र   ;   वे   हैं   ,   बल्कि   ,  surprisingly  विशाल  waves  लिये   a  given  समुद्र  state .
Rogue  लहरें   seem  not  to  have  a   सिंगल  distinct  कारण  , but  occur  where physical factors such as high  हवाएँ   और  strong currents cause  लहरें   to  merge to create a single exceptionally large  वेव  .
Electress  sophia   of  Hanover  (  1630–1714 )
the  line of  उत्तराधिकार   to   the   अंग्रेजों  throne is the ordered sequence  of  all  those  people  योग्य   to  succeed  to  the  सिंहासन  of the United Kingdom and  the  other  15   राष्ट्रमंडल   realms  .
the  Act of Settlement  1701  bestowed  उत्तराधिकार  on  the  Electress  sophia   of  Hanover and  उसके  descendants while excluding Roman Catholics .
The British government  करता   नहीं   प्रकाशित  an  आधिकारिक  list  of   सब   those  in  लकीर  to  सफल  , but the  कार्य  of genealogical  लेखक  and amateur researchers suggests  कि   वहीँ  are several thousand  लोगों   potentially  in  लकीर  .
At  a  summit  in  Perth  ,   पश्चिमी   ऑस्ट्रेलिया   in  2011 , the heads of government  of   सब  16 Commonwealth realms agreed  to  take steps  to  adopt  निरपेक्ष  primogeniture ,  समाप्त  the  exclusion  of people married  to   रोमन   catholics  , and make  अन्य  changes  in  the  उत्तराधिकार  rules .
The line  of  succession is also  प्रयुक्त  to select the  counsellors  of  राज्य   (  and a regent if the  need  arises )  अंतर्गत   the  provisions  of  the  रीजेंसी  Act 1937 .
लिये  earlier  संस्करण  of the line of succession  ,  see  इतिहास   of   the  British line of succession  .
Edward  मोंटगोमरी   क्लिफ्ट   (   अक्तूबर  17 , 1920July 23  ,   1966  )  थी  an American  फिल्मी  and  स्टेज  actor The New York Times’  obituary  noted his portrayal of ``  मूडी  , sensitive  यंग  men '' .
He often  निभाई  outsiders and `` victim-heroes ''  ;   उदाहरण  include the social  climber  in George Stevens 's A Place  in   the   सूर्य  ,  the  anguished Catholic  पुजारी   in  Hitchcock  's   i  Confess ,  the  doomed regular soldier Robert  E.   ली  Prewitt  in   फ्रेड   zinnemann  's From Here  to   शाश्वत  ,  और   the  Jewish GI bullied by  antisemites  in Edward  dmytryk  's  the  Young Lions  .
बाद   ,   बाद   a   disfiguring  car crash in  1956  , and alcohol and  नुस्खा  drug abuse  ,   he  became  erratic  .
nevertheless  important  भूमिकाएँ   यहूद   स्टिल  his , including  ``   the   लापरवाह  ,  alcoholic  ,  mother-fixated  rodeo  यजमान   ''  in John  हस्टन   's  The Misfits ,  the   शीर्षक   भूमिका  in Huston  's  , and the concentration  शिविर  victim  in  Stanley  क्रेमर  's  निर्णय  at Nuremberg . ''
Clift  प्राप्त   चार  Academy Award nominations during his career  ,  three  लिये   बेहतरीन   कर्ता   और   एक   लिये  Best  supporting   कर्ता  .
the  War on  आतंक  (  भी   ज्ञात   as   the  Global War  on  Terrorism  )   is   a  term  commonly   लागू  to  an  international  सैन्य  campaign which started as a result  of  the 11 September 2001 terrorist attacks on  the  United  राज्य  .
This resulted in  an   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   सैन्य  campaign  to  eliminate al-Qaeda  और  other militant organizations  .
The United Kingdom and many other NATO and non-NATO nations participate in the conflict .
The phrase  'war  on  आतंक  ' was  पहला   प्रयुक्त   by  US President George  W.  Bush on 20 September 2001  .
the   बुश  administration and the Western  मीडिया   have  since used  the  term to  signify   a   वैश्विक  military , political  ,  lawful  ,   और   conceptual  struggle—targeting  दोनो   संगठन  designated as terrorist  और  regimes accused of supporting them  .
it  was  typically  used with a  particular  focus on militant  islamists  , al-Qaeda ,  और   अन्य  jihadi  समूह  .
Although the term is  नहीं  officially used  by  the administration of US  अध्यक्ष  Barack  ओबामा   (  which instead uses  the  term  विदेशी   आकस्मिकता   आपरेशन  )  ,   it   is  still commonly used by politicians ,  in   the  media and  by   कुछ   पहलुओं  of  सरकारी  officially , such  as  the United States ' Global  युद्ध  on Terrorism Service Medal .

The main causes of  संसार  War II were  nationalistic   मुद्दे   ,   अनसुलझे  issues , and resentments resulting  इससे  World War I  और  the interwar period  in   यूरोपीय  , in addition to the  प्रभाव   of  the Great  अवसाद   in   the   1930s   .
The culmination  of   कार्यक्रम  that led to the  outbreak   of   युद्ध  are generally understood to be the  1939  invasion of Poland  by  Germany  और   सोवियत   रूस  and the  1937  invasion of  the  Republic  of  China  by  the Empire of  जापानी   .
These military aggressions were the  परिणाम  of  निर्णय   बना   by   the  authoritarian ruling  नाजी  elite  in   जर्मनी   और  by the leadership of  the   kwantung   फौज  in  जापानी  .
संसार  War II  प्रारंभ   बाद   ये   आक्रामक  actions were  मिले   साथ  an  आधिकारिक  declaration of war and/or armed  प्रतिरोध   .

The  मित्सुबिशी  Galant is an automobile  manufactured   by  Mitsubishi Motors between 1969  और  2012  .
the   नाम  was derived  इससे  the French word  galant  , meaning ``  chivalrous  '' .
There have been nine  पृथक   पीढियां  , and cumulative sales  अभी  exceed five million .
It  began  as  a   कॉम्पैक्ट   सेडान  ,  लकिन  over  the  course of its  जीवन   रै   विकसित   into   a   larger   mid-size   car  .
आरंभिक  production was  तभी   आधारित  in Japan , but since 1994  the  American  मार्केट   रै  been  परोसा   by   वाहनों  assembled at  the  former  diamond-star  Motors ( DSM  )  facility  in  Normal , Illinois .
Blood  दबाव  ( BP ) , sometimes referred to as arterial  रक्त   दबाव   ,  is  the   दबाव  exerted  by  circulating  रक्त  upon the walls of blood vessels  ,  and is  एक  of the principal  vital  signs  .
जब  used  बगैर  further specification  ,  `` blood pressure '' usually  refers  to the arterial  दबाव  of the  प्रणालीगत  circulation .
During each heartbeat ,  रक्त  pressure varies  between  a maximum  (   systolic  ) and a minimum  (   diastolic  )  दबाव  .
The blood  दबाव  in  the   परिसंचरण   is   प्रधानतया  due to the  pumping  action of the  दिल   .
Differences in mean blood pressure are  जिम्मेदार   लिये  blood  प्रवाह  from  एक  location  to  another  in   the   परिसंचरण   .
The  रेट  of  औसत   रक्त  flow  depends  on the  प्रतिरोध   to   प्रवाह  presented  by  the  रक्त  vessels .
औसत  blood  दबाव   decreases  as  the   circulating   रक्त  moves  दूर   इससे   the  heart through arteries and capillaries due to viscous  नुकसान  of energy  .
Mean blood  दबाव  drops over the whole circulation  ,  although  सबसे  of  the  fall occurs  साथ   the   छोटी  arteries and arterioles  .
Gravity  affects  blood pressure via hydrostatic forces ( e.g.  ,  during  खड़ा  )  और  valves  in   रगों  ,  श्वास  , and pumping from contraction of skeletal muscles also  influence  blood pressure  in   रगों  .
रक्त  pressure without  further   specification   प्रायः  refers to the systemic  arterial   दबाव  measured at  a  person  's   अपर  arm and  is  a  माप  of the pressure in the  brachial  artery  ,  the major  धमनी  in the  अपर  arm .
a  person’s blood pressure  is  usually  expressed   in  terms of the systolic pressure over diastolic pressure  और  is  measured  in  millimetres  of mercury  (  mmHg )  ,  for example 120/80 .
A  वीटो  – Latin for  ``  I forbid  ''   –   is  the  शक्ति  (  प्रयुक्त  by  an  officer of  the   राज्य   ,  for example ) to  unilaterally   रोकें  an  आधिकारिक   कार्रवाई  , especially  the  enactment of legislation .
A  वीटो   can  be absolute , as  लिये  instance in the  संयुक्त   राष्ट्र   सुरक्षा  Council ,  जिनकी   स्थाई   सदस्यों   (  China  ,   फ़्रांस  , Russia , United Kingdom  ,   संयुक्त   राज्य   of   अमेरिका   )  can block  कोई  resolution  .
or   it   can  be limited , as  in  the legislative process of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  , where a  two-thirds  vote  in  both the House and Senate may override  a  Presidential veto  of  legislation .
a  veto  तभी  gives power to stop changes , not to adopt  उन्हें  ( except for the rare  ``  amendatory veto '' )  .
यूँ  a veto allows its holder to  protect  the  औकात  quo .
the  concept of a veto body  originated  with  the  Roman consuls and  tribunes  .
either  of the  दो   consuls   पकड़कर   दफ्तर  in a given year could  ब्लाक   a  military or civil decision by  the  other  ;   कोई  tribune  था   the  power to unilaterally  ब्लाक  legislation passed  by  the  रोमन   सीनेट   .
Sulfur  डाइऑक्साइड  ( also  गंधक   डाइऑक्साइड  ) is the  रासायनिक  compound with the  सूत्र  .
It  is   a  toxic gas with  a   pungent  , irritating  महकते  , that is released  by   ज्वालामुखी  and  in  various industrial processes .
Since  कोयले  and petroleum often contain sulfur compounds , their  दहन   generates   गंधक  dioxide  जबतक  the sulfur  यौगिकों  are removed before burning the fuel .
further  oxidation of SO2 , usually in the  उपस्थिति  of a catalyst  ऐसे  as NO2 ,  फ़ॉर्म  H2SO4  ,  and  यूँ   एसिड  rain  .
Sulfur dioxide emissions are  भी   a   precursor  to particulates in the  माहौल  .
Both of these  impacts  are  कारण   लिये  concern over the  पर्यावरणीय  impact of  ये   fuels  .
Myasthenia gravis  (  from Greek μύς  ``  muscle '' , `` weakness '' , and `` serious '' ; abbreviated  mg  ) is an autoimmune neuromuscular disease leading  to   fluctuating  muscle  कमज़ोरी  and  fatigability  .
It is  an  autoimmune disorder , in which  कमज़ोरी   is   caused  by circulating antibodies that  ब्लाक  acetylcholine  receptors   at  the postsynaptic neuromuscular  जंक्शन  , inhibiting  the   excitatory   प्रभाव  of the  neurotransmitter   acetylcholine   on  nicotinic  receptors   throughout  neuromuscular  junctions   .
myasthenia  is treated  medically  with acetylcholinesterase inhibitors  or   immunosuppressants   ,  and , in selected cases , thymectomy  .
The  बीमारी   incidence  is  3–30   मामले  per  लाख   प्रति  year  और  rising  as  a result  of  increased awareness .
mg  must be distinguished from congenital myasthenic  syndromes  that  can  present similar symptoms but offer no  जवाब  to  immunosuppressive  treatments  .
Reflective twisted  nematic  liquid  क्रिस्टल  display  .
Polarizing filter film  साथ   a  vertical  अक्ष  to polarize light  as  it enters .
कांच  substrate with ITO  electrodes  .
the   आकार   of  these electrodes  होगा  determine the shapes that  होगा   appear  when  the  LCD  is  turned ON .
Vertical  ridges   etched   on   the   सतह  are smooth .
Twisted  nematic  liquid crystal .
Glass substrate with  आम  electrode film ( ITO )  साथ   आड़ा   ridges   to  line  up   साथ  the horizontal filter  .
polarizing  filter  फिल्मी   साथ  a horizontal axis  to  block/pass  लाइट   .
Reflective surface to send  लाइट  back to viewer  .
(  in  a backlit LCD  ,   इस  layer is  replaced   साथ  a  लाइट   सोर्स   .  )
A liquid-crystal display ( LCD )  is   a  flat panel  प्रदर्शक   ,   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   विज़ुअल  display , or video display that  उपयोग   the  light  modulating  properties of liquid crystals .
Liquid crystals do not  emit  light  सीधे   .
LCDs  हैं  available  to  display  मनमानी   बिंब  ( as in a  general-purpose   कंप्यूटर  display )  or   फिक्स्ड  images  जिससे   can  be displayed  or   छुपा  ,  ऐसे  as preset  शब्द   ,   अंक   ,   और  7-segment displays as in  a  digital  क्लॉक  .
They use the same basic  प्रौद्योगिकी   ,  except that arbitrary images are  बना   up  of a  विशाल  number of  छोटी   पिक्सेल  , while other displays  have   larger  elements .
lcds  are used in  a  wide range  of   अनुप्रयोग   सहित  computer monitors  ,  televisions  ,   यंत्र   panels  , aircraft  कॉकपिट  displays , and signage .
They are common  in   उपभोक्ता  devices such  as   वीडियो  players  ,   गेमिंग  devices ,  घड़ियाँ  , watches  ,  calculators  ,  and  telephones  ,  और  have replaced cathode ray tube  (  CRT )  प्रदर्शक  in most applications  .
They are  उपलब्धियाँ   in   a  wider range of  स्क्रीन   आकार  than  crt   और  plasma displays  ,   और  since  वे  do not  उपयोग  phosphors , they do not suffer image  burn-in  .
lcds   हैं  ,  however  , susceptible  to   चित्र  persistence .
the   एलसीडी   स्क्रीन  is  अधिक  energy efficient and can be disposed  of  more  सकुशल  than  a  CRT  .
Its  कम   विद्युत  power consumption enables it  to  be used in battery -powered  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  equipment .
It is an  electronically  modulated  ऑप्टिकल  device made up of  कोई   क्रमांक  of segments  भर   साथ   द्रव  crystals and arrayed  in   सामने  of a light source ( backlight  )   or  reflector to  उपज  images in color  or  monochrome .
Liquid  crystals  were first discovered in 1888 .
by  2008  ,  worldwide  बिक्री  of  टेलीविज़न  with  एलसीडी   screens   exceeded   सालाना   बिक्री  of CRT units ; the CRT became obsolete for  सबसे   उद्देश्य  .
the  Borgata  होटल  Casino and  स्पा  is a luxury  होटल  , casino  ,  and spa in Atlantic  नगर   ,  New Jersey , United States .
it  is owned by Marina District Development  ,  a  संयुक्त  venture  between   boyd   गेमिंग  and  a   divesture  trust established by  mgm   रिसॉर्ट  International  .
the  $ 1.1  अरब   कसीनो  hotel features 2,002 rooms  और  is the largest hotel  in   नई   जर्सी   .
The Borgata  खोली   in  July 2003  as  a  लास  Vegas-style  megaresort  and  is  the  top-grossing  casino in Atlantic City .
A  बोतल  of high  potency  B-complex vitamin  संपूरक  pills .
a  vitamin  (  or  )   is  an organic  यौगिक   जरूरी  by  an   सजीव  as  a  vital nutrient in limited  amounts  .
an  organic chemical compound (  or   सम्बन्धित   नियत  of compounds )  is   पुकारा   a  vitamin  जब   it   can  not be synthesized in sufficient  quantities   by  an organism  ,   और  must  be   प्राप्त  from the  आहार   .
यूँ  ,  the   पद  is conditional  दोनो  on  the   हालातों  and on the particular organism .
For example  ,  ascorbic acid (  विटामिन   c  ) is a  विटामिन   लिये   इंसानो  ,  लकिन   नहीं  for most  अन्य   पशु  ,  और  biotin and vitamin D are required  in   the  human  आहार  only in  निश्चित  circumstances .
by  convention ,  the   पद   विटामिन   शामिल  neither other essential nutrients  ,   ऐसे  as  dietary  minerals  ,   अनिवार्य  fatty acids  ,   or  essential amino  acids   (   जिससे  are  needed  in larger  amounts  than vitamins )  nor  the large number of  अन्य  nutrients that promote  स्वास्थ्य   लकिन  are  वरना   जरूरी   कम  often .
तेरह  vitamins  हैं   universally  recognized  at  present  .
विटामिन   हैं   वर्गीकृत  by their biological and chemical  कार्यकलाप  , not their  ढांचा   .
Thus ,  प्रत्येक  ``  विटामिन  '' refers to  a  number of vitamer  यौगिकों  that  सब  show  the   biological  activity associated with a  particular   विटामिन  .
Such  a  set of chemicals  is  grouped under an alphabetized vitamin `` generic  वर्णनकर्ता  ''  शीर्षक   ,  such as `` vitamin  a   ``  ,  जिससे   शामिल   the  compounds retinal , retinol ,  और  four known carotenoids .
vitamers  by  परिभाषा   हैं  convertible to the  क्रियाशील  form  of   the   विटामिन  in the  देह  ,  और   हैं   sometimes   inter-convertible  to one another , as well .
विटामिन  have  विविध  biochemical  कृत्यों   .
Some  have  hormone-like functions as  regulators   of   खनिज  metabolism  (  such as vitamin D  )  ,  or  regulators of  कोशिका   और   ऊतक   विकास  and  differentiation   (   ऐसे  as some forms  of   विटामिन  A ) .
अन्य  function as antioxidants  (  e.g. , vitamin E  और  sometimes vitamin  c  )  .
the  largest  क्रमांक   of  vitamins ( such  as  B complex vitamins  )   फलन   as  precursors for enzyme cofactors ,  कि  help  एंजाइमों  in  उनके  work as  catalysts  in  चयापचय   .
In this  भूमिका   ,   विटामिन  may be tightly bound  to   एंजाइमों   as   भाग   of   prosthetic   समूह  :  लिये   उदाहरण  , biotin  is  part  of  enzymes  शामिल  in making  वसीय   acids  .
विटामिन  may also be  कम  tightly bound  to  enzyme  catalysts  as  coenzymes  ,  detachable  molecules that  फलन  to  carry   रासायनिक  groups or  electrons  between molecules  .
लिये  example , folic  एसिड   may  carry methyl ,  formyl  ,  और  methylene  समूह  in  the  cell .
हालांकि   ये   भूमिकाएँ  in assisting  enzyme-substrate  reactions  हैं   विटामिन   '   best-known  function , the other vitamin functions  हैं   बराबर   महत्वपूर्ण  .
Until  the  mid-1930s  ,   जब   the  first commercial yeast-extract vitamin B complex and  semi-synthetic   विटामिन  C supplement tablets  यहूद   बेची   ,   विटामिन  were obtained solely  through  food  सेवन  ,  और  changes in diet  (  which  ,   लिये   उदाहरण  , could  occur  during  a  particular growing season  )  usually  greatly  altered  the  types and  amounts   of  vitamins ingested  .
However ,  विटामिन  have  महरूम  produced  as   कमोडिटी  chemicals  और  made  widely   उपलब्धियाँ  as  inexpensive  semisynthetic and  synthetic-source   multivitamin  dietary  और  food  पूरक  and additives  ,  since  the  middle of  the   20th  century  .
संसार  Muslim population by percentage  (  Pew Research Center , 2009  )
संसार  Muslim  जनसांख्यिकी  in millions
islam  is the  संसार   's  second  largest  religion after Christianity .
according  to a 2010 study  ,   islam   रै  1.62 billion  adherents  ,  बनाना   up  over 23 % of the  संसार   जनसांख्यिकी  .
Islam is  the   predominant  religion in the Middle East  ,   in  Sahel , in the  सींग   of   अफ़्रीकी  and northern  अफ़्रीकी   ,  and in some parts  of   एशिया  .
Large communities of  मुसलमान   हैं   भी  found in China , the  balkans  ,  और   रूस   .
Other parts of the  संसार  host large Muslim immigrant communities  ;  in Western  यूरोपीय   ,  for instance , Islam  is  the  दूसरी  largest religion  बाद  Christianity  ,  where  it  represents 6 % of the  कुल  population .
according   to  the Pew  शोध   बीच  in 2010  वहीँ   यहूद  49 Muslim-majority countries .
around  62 % of the world 's Muslims live  in  South  और  Southeast  एशिया  , with over  1  billion adherents .
the   largest  Muslim  देश   is  Indonesia ,  घर  to  12.7  %  of   the  world  's   मुसलमान  , followed by Pakistan (  11.0   %  )  ,  India  (  10.9  %   )  , and  बांग्लादेश   (  9.2 % ) .
About  20  % of  मुसलमान  live in  अरब  countries .
In  the  Middle East  ,   the  non-Arab countries of Turkey  और  Iran are  the  largest Muslim-majority  देशों  ; in  अफ़्रीकी  , Egypt and  सीरियल   have   the   सबसे  populous  मुस्लिम  communities  .
A study conducted  by  the Pew  शोध   बीच  in 2010 and released January  2011   मिला   कि  there are  1.62  billion Muslims around  the  world  .
The study  मिला   अधिक  Muslims in the United Kingdom than  in   लेबनान  and  अधिक  in China  than   in  Syria .
Rhode Island  (  or ) ,  officially  the  राज्य   of  Rhode Island and  विधाता   बागानों   ,   is   a  state in the  नई  England region  of  the United  राज्य  .
Rhode  द्वीप  is the  smallest   in   क्षेत्रफल  , the  आठवीं   तनिक  populous  ,  but  the  second  सबसे   densely   आबादी  of the 50 US  राज्य   पीछे  New Jersey .
Rhode Island is  bordered  by  कनेक्टिकट  to  the  west and  मैसाचुसेट्स  to the north  और  east  ,  and  it  shares a water boundary with New York  's  Long  द्वीप  to  the   दक्षिणपश्चिम   .
Rhode  द्वीप   थी  the first of  the  13 original colonies to declare independence from  अंग्रेजों  rule  ,  declaring itself independent  on  May  4   ,  1776 ,  दो   महीने   पहले   कोई   अन्य  colony .
The  राज्य  was also the  पिछला  of the thirteen original  colonies   to  ratify the United  राज्य  Constitution  .
rhode  Island 's official nickname  is  `` The Ocean State '' , a reference to the  राज्य   's  geography , since  rhode  Island has several large bays  और   inlets  that amount  to  about 14 %  of   इसके   कुल  area  .
Its land area  is  ,  लकिन   इसके  total area  is  significantly larger  .
Dubai  (  ;  '  , )  is  a  नगर  in the  संयुक्त   अरब  Emirates ,  स्तिथ  within  the  emirate  of  the same  नाम  .
the   अमीर  of Dubai  is  located  on  the southeast  coast  of  the  Persian  गल्फ   on   the   arabian  Peninsula and is one  of  the seven emirates  कि   मेक   up   the  country  .
It has the largest population  in  the UAE ( 2,106,177  )   और  the  second-largest  land  territory   by   क्षेत्रफल   (   4,114   km2  )  बाद  Abu Dhabi  .
Dubai  और  Abu Dhabi ,  the  national  पूंजी   ,   हैं  the  तभी  two emirates  to   have  veto power over  नाजुक   matters  of national importance in the country 's legislature .
The  नगर  of Dubai is  स्तिथ  on the  अमीर   's   उत्तरी   तटरेखा  and heads  up   the  Dubai-Sharjah-Ajman metropolitan area .
Dubai  is  nowadays often  misperceived  as a country  or  city-state and , in  कुछ  cases , the UAE as a whole has been described  as  'Dubai  '   .
the  earliest  जिक्र  of Dubai is in 1095  ad   ,  and  the  earliest  अंकित  settlement  in  the  प्रदेश  dates  इससे   1799  .
The Sheikhdom  of   दुबई  was formally established in 1833  by  Sheikh Maktoum  बिन   butti  Al-Maktoum when he persuaded around 800 members  of  his  जनजाति  of  the   bani  Yas ,  जीना  in  कया   थी  then  the  Second  सऊदी   राज्य  and now part of Saudi Arabia , to  follow   उसे  to  the  Dubai Creek by the Abu Falasa clan of the Bani  yas  .
It remained  अंतर्गत  the tribe 's control when the  संयुक्त   किंगडम  assumed protection of  the  Sheikhdom  in   1892  and  joined  the  nascent   संयुक्त  Arab Emirates  upon  independence  in   1971   as  the country 's  दूसरी   अमीर   .
इसके  strategic  भौगोलिक   स्थान  made  the  town  an   महत्वपूर्ण  trading hub  और   by   the  beginning  of   the   20th  century  ,   दुबई   थी  already  an  important  क्षेत्रीय  port .
Today , Dubai has  उभरा  as  a  cosmopolitan metropolis that  रै   grown  steadily to become a  वैश्विक  city and  a  business and cultural hub  of   the   मध्य  East and  the   पारसी   गल्फ   प्रदेश   .
Although Dubai 's economy was  historically  built on the oil  उद्योग  , the  अमीर  's Western-style model  of   कारोबार  drives  इसके   अर्थव्यवस्था   साथ  the main revenues now coming  इससे  tourism  ,  real  एस्टेट  , and financial services .
Dubai  रै  recently attracted world attention through many  अभिनव  large construction  प्रोजेक्ट   और  sports  कार्यक्रम  .
The city has become  सांकेतिक  for  इसके  skyscrapers  और   high-rise  buildings , such as the world  's  tallest Burj Khalifa  ,   in  addition to ambitious  विकास  projects  सहित  man-made  आइलैंड्स  ,  होटल  , and  कुछ  of the  largest   खरीदारी   मॉल  in  the  region  और  the world .
इस   increased  attention has also highlighted labor  और  human rights  मुद्दे   concerning  the city 's  largely  South  एशियाई  paid  workforce   .
Dubai  's  property market experienced a  प्रमुख   deterioration   in  2008–2009  as   a   परिणाम  of the worldwide economic downturn following the financial  संकट   of  2007-2008 .
however  ,  दुबई   रै  made a steady  और   क्रमिक   रिकवरी  with  सहायता  coming  इससे  neighboring emirates  .
the  handful of  नई   प्रोजेक्ट   कि   हैं  in the pipeline  have  been able  to  help Dubai real  एस्टेट  make a comeback  .
As of 2012 ,  दुबई  is  the   22nd  most expensive city  in   the  world ,  और   the   सबसे  expensive city  in  the  मध्य   ईस्ट  , surpassing Israel 's Tel  aviv  ( 31st  )  .
दुबई  has also  महरूम  rated as  एक  of the best  स्थान   to   सजीव   in   the  Middle East , including  by  US  अमरीकी   वैश्विक  consulting firm Mercer who rated  the  city as the  बेहतरीन   प्लेस   to   सजीव  in  the  Middle East  in  2011  .

Waves on  an  ocean  coast  .
इस  animation  उपयोग  Earth science data from  a   किस्में  of sensors  on  NASA  धरती  observing satellites to  माप  physical  oceanography  parameters  ऐसे  as  समंदर  currents  ,   समंदर  winds , sea surface height  और  sea  सतह  temperature  .
an  ocean (  ;  the  संसार  Ocean of classical  प्राचीनता  ) is a body of  saline  water  कि  composes a large part  of  a  ग्रह   's  hydrosphere .
In  the  context of Earth , it refers to one  or   सब  of the major divisions of  the   ग्रह   's  World Ocean  –   वे  are  ,  in descending order  of  area , the Pacific , Atlantic ,  भारतीय  ,  दक्षिणी  ( Antarctic  )  ,  और   आर्कटिक  Oceans  .
the  word  ``   समुद्र  `` is often  प्रयुक्त  interchangeably with `` ocean  ''   ,   लकिन  strictly speaking  a  sea is  a  body of saline  जल   (   संभवतः  a  प्रभाग  of the  संसार  Ocean ) partly  or  fully  enclosed  by  जमीन  .
Earth  is  the only planet known to have an ocean ( or  कोई   विशाल   amounts   of   खोलें  liquid  जल  ) .
Approximately 72  %  of the  ग्रह  's surface ( ~3.6x108 km2  )  is  covered  by  saline  water that is  customarily   विभाजित  into  अनेक  principal  महासागर   और  smaller  समंदर  ,  साथ  the  समंदर  covering  लगभग  71 % of the  धरती  's surface .
in  terms  of  the  जलमंडल  of the Earth  ,  the  समंदर  contains 97 %  of   the  Earth 's water  .
Oceanographers  have   stated  that  आउट   of   97   %  , only  5  %  of   the   समंदर   as  a  पूरे   on  Earth  रै  been  छान   .
क्युकी   it   is   the   प्रिंसिपल   घटक  of Earth 's hydrosphere ,  the   संसार   समंदर   is  integral  to   सब  known  जीवन  ,  फ़ॉर्म  part of  the  carbon  साईकिल   ,   और  influences climate and weather patterns  .
The  कुल   आवाज़  is approximately 1.3 billion cubic kilometres  (  310  लाख   cu  mi  )   साथ  an  औसत  depth of .
It is the habitat of 230,000 known species  ,  although much  of  the  समंदर  's  गहराइयों  remain unexplored and it is estimated that over two million marine  प्रजाति  exist  .
The  उत्पत्ति   of   धरती  's  महासागर   is  still unknown  ,  but  महासागर  are believed to have formed in the Hadean  काल   और  may have been  the  impetus  लिये  the  emergence  of  जीवन   .
extraterrestrial  oceans  may   be  composed of a wide range of  तत्व   और   यौगिकों  .
The  तभी   पुष्टि  large stable  लाशें   of  extraterrestrial  सतह  liquids are  the  lakes  of   टाइटन   ,   हालांकि  there is evidence  लिये  the existence of  महासागर   elsewhere  in  the  Solar System  .
Early in  उनके  geologic histories ,  मंगल  and  शुक्र   हैं  theorized to have  था   विशाल  water  महासागर   .
the  Mars ocean hypothesis suggests  कि  nearly a  तीसरा  of  the   सतह  of Mars  थी   एकबार  covered  by  water ,  हालांकि   the  water on Mars  is  no longer oceanic , and a runaway  ग्रीनहाउस   प्रभाव  may  have  boiled  दूर   the   वैश्विक  ocean of  शुक्र  .
यौगिकों  such  as  salts  और  ammonia  dissolved  in  जल  lower its freezing point  ,  so that water might  मौजूद  in large quantities  in   extraterrestrial   environments  as brine or convecting  बर्फ   .
Unconfirmed oceans  हैं   speculated  beneath the surface of many  बौना   ग्रह   और   प्राकृतिक   satellites  ;  notably   ,   the  ocean of Europa is  believed  to have  over   twice  the water volume  of  Earth  .
the  Solar System  's  gas giant  ग्रह   हैं  also believed to possess  द्रव   वायुमंडलीय  layers  of  yet to be confirmed compositions  .
Oceans may  भी   मौजूद  on exoplanets  और  exomoons ,  सहित   सतह  oceans  of  liquid water within a  परितारकीय  habitable zone  .
समंदर   ग्रह  are a  काल्पनिक  type of planet with a  सतह  completely covered with liquid .
एल्विस  Aaron  प्रेस्ली  ( January 8  ,   1935  – August 16 , 1977 ) was an American singer  और  actor .
a  cultural  प्रतीक   ,   he   is  commonly  ज्ञात  by  the  single name  एल्विस  .
एक  of  the  most  लोकप्रिय   संगीतकारों   of  the  20th  century  ,  he  is   प्रायः  referred to as  the   ``  King  of   चट्टान   और   फेंकें  '' or  ``  the King ''  .
born  in  tupelo   ,   मिसिसिपी   ,  Presley moved to Memphis  ,   टेनेसी  , with his  परिवार  at the  आयु  of  13   .
He  began  his  करियर   वहीँ   in   1954  , working with Sun Records  मालिक  Sam Phillips ,  जो  wanted  to  bring  the  sound  of  African-American music  to  a wider  दर्शक  .
accompanied  by  guitarist  Scotty  मूर  and bassist Bill  ब्लैक  , Presley was the most  महत्वपूर्ण  popularizer  of  rockabilly , an uptempo  ,   backbeat  -driven fusion of country  और   लय  and  ब्लूज़  .
आरसीए  Victor acquired his contract  in  a  सौदे   arranged   by   कर्नल  Tom  पार्कर  , who  गई   on  to  मैनेज  the singer for  over  two  दशकों  .
Presley 's  पहला   आरसीए   सिंगल   ,  `` Heartbreak Hotel  ``   ,   released  in January  1956   ,  was  a   number-one  hit .
he  became  the  leading figure  of  the newly popular sound  of  rock  और   फेंकें   साथ   a  series  of  network television appearances  और  chart-topping  रिकॉर्ड   .
His energized interpretations of  गीतों   ,   अनेक  from African-American  स्त्रोत  , and his  uninhibited   प्रदर्शन  style  बना  him enormously popular—and  विवादास्पद  .
in  November  1956   ,   he  made his film  डेब्यू  in  प्रेम   me  Tender .
Drafted into  सैन्य   सेवा   in   1958  ,  प्रेस्ली  relaunched his recording career two years later with some  of   उसके  most commercially successful  कार्य  .
he  staged few  कॉन्सर्ट  however , and guided by Parker  ,   proceeded   to  devote much of the  1960s  to making Hollywood  फिल्मों   और  soundtrack albums , most of  उन्हें   critically  derided .
In 1968 ,  बाद  seven years  दूर   इससे  the stage  ,  he  लौटे   to  live performance in  a  celebrated comeback television  खास  that led  to  an extended  लास   वेगास  concert  रेसिडेंसी  and a string  of  profitable tours  .
in   1973   प्रेस्ली  staged the first  कॉन्सर्ट  broadcast  globally  via satellite ,  aloha  from Hawaii .
Prescription drug  गाली   severely   deteriorated  his health ,  और   he   died  suddenly in  1977   at  the  आयु   of  42 .
प्रेस्ली   is  regarded  as   एक  of  the  most important  आंकड़े   of  20th-century  लोकप्रिय  culture .
He had a versatile voice and unusually wide  कामयाबी   encompassing   अनेक  genres  ,  including country , pop ballads , gospel ,  और  blues .
he   is   the   best-selling  solo  कलाकार  in the history of  लोकप्रिय   म्यूज़िक   .
Nominated  लिये  14 competitive Grammys , he won  तीन   ,  and received  the  Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award at age  36  .
He has been  inducted   into  multiple music halls of  कीर्ति   .
A  कांच  of root  बियर  with  झाग
Root beer is  a  carbonated  ,   sweetened  beverage ,  originally  made using the  रूट  of  a  sassafras plant ( or  the  bark  of   a  sassafras tree  )  as  the  primary flavor .
Root beer , popularized  in  North  अमेरिका   ,   आता  in two forms  :   alcoholic   और  soft drink .
the  historical root beer was analogous to  छोटी  beer in  कि   the   प्रक्रम  provided a  पेय  with a very low  दारू   सामग्री   .
Although roots  हैं   प्रयुक्त  as the  सोर्स  of many  नरम  drinks  throughout  the world , often  अलग   names   हैं   प्रयुक्त  .
fluorescent  minerals emit  दृश्य  light  जब   उजागर   to  ultraviolet light
प्रतिदीप्ति  is  the   उत्सर्जन   of  light  by   a  substance that  रै   अवशोषित  light or  अन्य  electromagnetic  विकिरण   .
It is a  रूप   of  luminescence .
In  सबसे   मामले   ,  the  उत्सर्जित  light has a longer  wavelength  , and therefore lower  उर्जा  ,  than   the   अवशोषित   विकिरण  .
however   ,  when the  अवशोषित  electromagnetic  विकिरण  is intense  ,  it is  संभावित  for one electron  to  absorb  दो  photons ; this  two-photon  absorption can lead to emission  of  radiation  having  a shorter  wavelength   than  the absorbed  विकिरण  .
the   उत्सर्जित  radiation may also  be   of  the  वही  wavelength as the  अवशोषित  radiation ,  termed  `` resonance  प्रतिदीप्ति  '' .
the   सबसे  striking examples  of   प्रतिदीप्ति   occur   जब  the  अवशोषित  radiation  is  in the ultraviolet  प्रदेश  of the spectrum ,  और  thus invisible to  the  human eye  ,  and  the  emitted light  is   in   the  visible region  .
प्रतिदीप्ति   रै   अनेक   व्यावहारिक   अनुप्रयोग  ,  सहित  mineralogy , gemology , chemical sensors (  प्रतिदीप्ति  spectroscopy )  ,  fluorescent  लेबलिंग  ,  dyes  , biological  डिटेक्टरों  , and , most commonly  ,  fluorescent lamps .
अनौपचारिक  logic , intuitively ,  refers  to the principles of logic and logical  विचार  outside of  a  formal setting .
However  ,  perhaps because of the informal in the  शीर्षक  , the precise  परिभाषा   of  informal  लॉजिक  is a matter of some  विवाद   .
Ralph H.  जॉनसन   और  J.  एंथोनी  Blair  define  informal logic  as  `` a branch of  लॉजिक  whose task  is  to develop non-formal  मानकों   ,  criteria , procedures for  the   विश्लेषण  ,  निर्वचन  , evaluation ,  आलोचना   और   निर्माण  of  argumentation   .   ''
This definition reflects what had been implicit  in   उनके   अभ्यास   और  what others were doing  in  their  अनौपचारिक   लॉजिक  texts .
Informal logic is  संबद्ध   साथ   (  informal ) fallacies , critical thinking  ,   the   सोच   कौशल  Movement and the interdisciplinary  पूछताछ  known  as  argumentation theory  .
Frans H. van Eemeren writes that  the  label  ``  informal  लॉजिक  ''  कवर   a  ``  संग्रहण   of  normative  approaches   to   the  study of  तर्क  in  ordinary   भाषा  that remain closer  to  the practice of argumentation  than  formal logic . ''
यूएसए  annual  रियल  GDP 1910–60 , with the years  of  the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted  .
Unemployment rate  in  the  us  1910–1960  ,   साथ   the  years  of   the   ग्रेट   अवसाद  ( 1929–1939 )  highlighted  .
The  ग्रेट   अवसाद  began  in  August  of   1929  , when  the   संयुक्त  States  अर्थव्यवस्था  first  गई  into an  आर्थिक  recession .
Although  the   देश  spent  दो   महीने  with declining GDP ,  it   थी  not until the  वॉल  Street Crash of  अक्तूबर   ,  1929  कि  the effects of  a   घटती   अर्थव्यवस्था  were  लगा  ,  और   a   प्रमुख   विश्वव्यापी  economic  downturn  ensued .
the   मार्केट   क्रैश  marked the beginning  of  a decade of high  बेरोजगारी  , poverty  ,   कम  profits  ,   अपस्फीति  , plunging  फार्म  incomes ,  और  lost opportunities for economic growth  और  personal  उन्नति   .
हालांकि   इसके   कल्याणकारी  are still uncertain and controversial , the net  प्रभाव   थी   a   अचानक  and  सामान्य  loss  of  confidence in  the  economic  भविष्य  .
The  usual   स्पष्टीकरण  include numerous  कारकों   ,  especially high consumer debt  ,   ill-regulated   बाज़ार   कि  permitted overoptimistic  लोन  by banks and  निवेशकों  , and the lack of  high-growth  new  उद्योग  , all interacting to create a downward  आर्थिक  spiral of reduced spending  ,  falling  विश्वास  ,  और   lowered   उत्पादन  .
Industries that  suffered  the most included construction ,  कृषि   as  dust-bowl conditions  persisted  in the agricultural heartland ,  शिपिंग  ,  खनन  ,  और   लॉगिंग  as  खूब   as  durable  goods  like automobiles  और   उपकरण   कि  could  be  postponed  .
the   अर्थव्यवस्था   पहुँचे  bottom  in  the winter  of   1932–33  ;  तब  came four years  of   बहुत   रैपिड   विकास  until  1937  , when  the  Recession of 1937 brought back 1934 levels of unemployment  .
The  अवसाद  caused  प्रमुख  political  परिवर्तन   in   अमेरिका   .
Three  सालो  into  the  depression ,  हर्बर्ट  Hoover lost the  1932  presidential election  to  Franklin  delano   रूज़वेल्ट  in a sweeping  भूस्खलन   .
Roosevelt 's economic  रिकवरी  plan  ,   the   नई  Deal  ,  instituted unprecedented  कार्यक्रम  for  राहत  , recovery and reform  ,  and  brought   परिचय   a  major  realignment  of American  राजनीती   .
The  अवसाद  also resulted in an  बढ़ाएँ   of   करणों   of   लोगों  to  अन्य   देशों  for the first time  in   अमरीकी  history .
लिये  example ,  कुछ   आप्रवासियों  went  वापस  to their  देशी   देशों   ,  and some  देशी  US citizens  गई  to Canada  ,   ऑस्ट्रेलिया   ,  and South Africa .
it   भी   resulted   in  the mass migration of people  इससे   badly   hit   क्षेत्रों   in   the   ग्रेट  Plains  और  the South  to   स्थान  such as California and  the  North  ,   क्रमशः  ( see Okies and  the  Great Migration of African Americans ) .
Racial tensions also increased  दौरान  this time .
by  the  1940s  immigration  था  returned back to  सामान्य   ,  and emigration  अस्वीकृत   .
a   well-known  example of an emigrant was  फ़्रैंक  McCourt , who went  to  Ireland , as recounted  in   उसके  book  एंजेला  's  राख  .
the  memory of the Depression  भी  shaped modern  theories   of  economics and resulted in  अनेक   परिवर्तन   in   कैसा  the  सरकारी  dealt with  आर्थिक  downturns ,  ऐसे   as  the  उपयोग  of stimulus  पैकेज  , Keynesian economics , and  सोशल   सुरक्षा   .
it  also  तराशा  modern American  साहित्य   ,  resulting in famous  novels  such  as  John Steinbeck  's   ``  The Grapes of  प्रकोप  `` and ``  of  Mice  और   मेन   ``  .
The  ग्रेट  Depression  of   the  1930s started  साथ   the  stock market crash  of  October  1929   .
तुर्कों  (  )  , officially the  गणतंत्र  of  तुर्कों  ,  is   a  transcontinental  देश  , located mostly  on   आनातोलिया   in  Western Asia and  on  East  thrace   in  Southeastern Europe  .
तुर्कों   is  bordered  by   आठ  countries :  बुल्गारिया  to  the  northwest ; Greece to the  वेस्ट  ; Georgia to the northeast ;  अर्मेनिया  , Iran and the  अज़रबैजानी  exclave  of  Nakhchivan  to  the  ईस्ट  ; and Iraq and Syria  to  the southeast  .
The Mediterranean Sea is  to   the  south ; the Aegean  समुद्र  is to the  वेस्ट  ; and  the   ब्लैक  Sea is  to  the north .
the   समुद्र  of Marmara , the Bosphorus and the Dardanelles  (  which together form the Turkish Straits )  demarcate   the  boundary  between   thrace  and Anatolia ;  वे  also  पृथक   यूरोपीय  and  एशिया   .
तुर्कों  's  स्थान  at the  क्रॉसरोड्स  of Europe  और   एशिया  makes it  a   देश   of  significant  geostrategic  importance .
the  country 's official  भाषा  is Turkish , a Turkic  भाषा   ,  which is spoken  by  approximately  85   %  of  the  population  as  mother tongue  .
The  सबसे   numerous   जातीय  group is  the   turks   ,  who constitute  between  70 %  और   75   %   of  the population  according   to  The  संसार  Factbook  .
Kurds are the  largest  ethnic  अल्पसंख्यक  and  ,   according  to  the  same  सोर्स  ,  क्रमांक   around   18  % of  the  population while other  जातीय   अल्पसंख्यकों  are  अनुमानित   to  be  at  7–12  %   .
The  विशाल  majority of the population  is  Muslim .
The area now  पुकारा   तुर्कों   रै  been inhabited since the  paleolithic  , including  विभिन्न  Ancient Anatolian  सभ्यताओं  and Thracian  peoples  .
After  सिकंदर  the  ग्रेट  's conquest , the area was Hellenized ,  जिससे   जारी  with  the  Roman  नियम  and the transition  into   the  Byzantine Empire .
The Seljuk  turks  began  migrating   into   the  area in the 11th century  ,  starting the process  of  Turkification , which was  greatly  accelerated by the Seljuk  विजय  over  the  Byzantines at  the   बैटल  of Manzikert in 1071 .
the  Seljuk Sultanate of Rûm  शासित  Anatolia until the  mongol  invasion  in  1243  ,  upon which  it   disintegrated   into  several small  तुर्की  beyliks .
Starting  इससे  the  लेट  13th  सदी  , the Ottoman beylik  संयुक्त   आनातोलिया  and  निर्मित  an  साम्राज्य  encompassing  much  of  southeastern  Europe ,  पश्चिमी  Asia and North Africa  .
After the Ottoman  साम्राज्य   collapsed   following   इसके  defeat  in   संसार  War I , parts of  it  were  occupied  by  the   विजयी  Allies  .
a  cadre of  यंग   सैन्य  officers  ,   led   by   mustafa  Kemal Atatürk and his  सहयोगियों  , organized a successful resistance to the  allies  ; in  1923   वे  established the modern  गणतंत्र  of Turkey  ,  with Atatürk as its  पहला   अध्यक्ष  .
तुर्कों   is  a democratic , secular ,  एकात्मक   ,   संवैधानिक   गणतंत्र  with  a   विविध   सांस्कृतिक   विरासत  .
Turkey has  become  increasingly  एकीकृत   साथ  the West through  सदस्यता   in  organisations  ऐसे   as   the   परिषद  of  यूरोपीय  , NATO  ,  OECD  ,   osce   और   the  G-20 major  economies  .
तुर्कों  began  पूरा  membership negotiations  साथ  the  यूरोपीय  Union  in   2005   ,  having been  an  associate  सदस्य  of the European Economic Community  चूंकि  1963 and  having   joined  the EU  कस्टम  Union in  1995  .
Turkey has also fostered close  सांस्कृतिक  , political and  आर्थिक  relations with the Middle  ईस्ट  , Caucasus  ,  the  turkic  states  of   सेंट्रल  Asia and the  अफ़्रीकी  countries through membership in organisations  ऐसे   as   the  Turkic Council , Joint  प्रशासन   of   turkic   कला  and Culture ,  संगठन  of  इस्लामी  Cooperation and the Economic Cooperation Organisation  .
तुर्कों  's  growing   अर्थव्यवस्था  and diplomatic initiatives have  led  to its recognition  as  a  क्षेत्रीय  power .
Turkey is the world 's  17th  largest economy  by  nominal  जीडीपी   और   the  16th largest by purchasing  शक्ति  parity .
caryn  Elaine Johnson ,  बेहतरीन   ज्ञात  as Whoopi Goldberg ( ,  (  born  नवम्बर  13 ,  1955   )  is  an  American comedienne , actress , singer-songwriter ,  राजनैतिक   activist  ,  लेखक   और   बात  show  मेजबान  .
गोल्डबर्ग  made  उसके   फिल्मी   डेब्यू  in  the   रंग   जामुनी   (  1985  )  , playing  celie  ,  a  mistreated black  स्त्री  in the  गहन   दक्षिण  .
वो   प्राप्त  a nomination  लिये  the Academy  पुरस्कार   लिये  Best  अभिनेत्री   और  won her first  सुनहरी  Globe Award  लिये  her role  in  the film .
in   1990  , she  निभाई  Oda Mae Brown ,  a  wacky psychic helping a  slain   man  ( Patrick Swayze  )  save  उसके  lover ( Demi  मूर  )  in   the   ब्लॉकबस्टर  Ghost .
इस  performance  जीती  her a second  सुनहरी   ग्लोब   और   an   अकादमी  Award for Best Supporting Actress ; this  बना  Goldberg  तभी  the second black woman in  the  history of the Academy Awards to win  an  acting Oscar—the first  होने  Hattie McDaniel  जो   जीती  for Gone  साथ  the Wind in 1939 .
notable  later films include  सिस्टर   अधिनियम  and Sister  अधिनियम   2  ,  the  Player ,  बना  in America , How  स्टेला   मिला  Her  नाली   वापस  , Girl  ,   बाधित  and Rat Race  .
She  is  also  acclaimed   लिये  her  भूमिकाएँ  as the  बारटेंडर   guinan  in Star Trek : The Next Generation ,  as  Terry Doolittle  in  Jumpin  '  Jack Flash  ,  and  as  Carmen Tibideaux  in  Glee , as well  as   the   आवाज़  of Shenzi  the   लकड़बग्घा  in  the  Lion  किंग   .
Goldberg  रै   महरूम   मनोनीत  for 13  एमी  Awards for  उसके   कार्य  in  टेलीविज़न  .
She  थी  co-producer of the popular  खेल  show Hollywood Squares from  1998  to 2004 .
She has  महरूम   the  moderator of the daytime talk show  the  View  चूंकि  2007  .
Goldberg has a Grammy , two  दिन   emmys   ,  two Golden Globes , a Tony (  लिये   उत्पादन   ,   नहीं  acting  )  , and  an  Oscar .
In addition , Goldberg  रै  a British Academy Film  पुरस्कार  , four  लोगों  's  चुनाव  Awards , and  रै   महरूम  honored with a star  on  the  हॉलीवुड   चलना   of  Fame  .
वो  is one  of  the few entertainers  जो  have won an Emmy  ,   ग्रैमी  , Oscar , and Tony  पुरस्कार  .
Augusta  is  a  संचित  city  in  the  u.S.  state of  जॉर्जिया  , located at the  पतन  line of the  savannah   नदी   ,   at  the head  of   इसके   navigable  portion  .
as  of the  2010  census  ,  the  augusta–   रिचमंड  County  जनसांख्यिकी   थी  195,844 not counting the unconsolidated cities of  hephzibah  and  blythe  .
Augusta is the principal  नगर   of   the   augusta  – Richmond County  महानगर   सांख्यिकीय  Area  ,   जिससे  as of  2010  had  an   अनुमानित  population of  556,877  ,  बनाना   it  both the  second-largest  city and the  second-largest   मैट्रो  area in  the  state after Atlanta  .
It  is   the   116th-largest   नगर   in   the  United States  .
Internationally , Augusta is best  ज्ञात  for hosting The  मास्टर्स   टूर्नामेंट   in  golf  प्रत्येक  spring .
A CD-ROM (  )   is  a pre-pressed  कॉम्पैक्ट  disc which contains  आंकड़ा  .
the  name  is   an  acronym which stands  लिये  ``  कॉम्पैक्ट  Disc Read-only memory `` .
कंप्यूटर   can   पढ़ा  CD-ROMs  ,   लकिन   can   नहीं   लिखें  on them  .
CD-ROMs  हैं   popularly   प्रयुक्त  to distribute  कंप्यूटर   तन्त्र  , including video  खेल  and  मल्टीमीडिया  applications  ,   हालांकि   कोई  data  can  be stored  (  up to the capacity limit of a  डिस्क   )  .
कुछ   cds   ,   पुकारा   उन्नत   cds  ,  थाम  both computer  आंकड़ा  and audio  साथ  the  latter  capable of  होने   निभाई  on  a  CD player , while data (  ऐसे  as software  or  digital  वीडियो  )  is  only  usable   on   a   कंप्यूटर  ( such  as   आईएसओ   9660  format PC CD-ROMs  )   .
the   पीला  Book  is  the technical  मानक  that defines  the  format of CD-ROMs .
एक   of  a set of  color-bound  books that contain the technical specifications  लिये  all CD formats  ,  the  पीला   किताब   ,   निर्मित  by  सोनी   और  Philips ,  थी  the first extension of  कॉम्पैक्ट  Disc Digital Audio  .
It  adapted   the   स्वरूप  to hold any  रूप  of data  .
the  Chicago Blackhawks  (  spelled  as  Black  चीलों   पहले   1986  ,  और   ज्ञात   colloquially  as the Hawks  )   हैं   a   पेशेवर   बर्फ  hockey  टोली  based in Chicago , Illinois  .
They are members of  the   सेंट्रल   प्रभाग  of the Western Conference  of   the   नेशनल  Hockey League (  एनएचएल  ) .
They have  जीती  four  स्टेनली  Cup championships since  उनके   founding  in  1926  , most recently  in  2009–10 .
the   ब्लैकहॉक्स  are  एक   of   the   असली  Six NHL  टीमों  ,  साथ   साथ  the  डेट्रॉयट  Red Wings ,  मॉन्ट्रियल   canadiens  , Toronto  मेपल  Leafs , Boston Bruins  और  New  यॉर्क   रेंजरों  .
Since the Blackhawks have played their home  खेल   at   the   संयुक्त  Center after  having  spent 65 years  playing  at  शिकागो  Stadium .
Lent  याजकों   carrying  out  a   गली  procession  दौरान  Holy Week  .
The  बैंगनी  color  is  often associated with penance and  detachment   .
समान  Christian  penitential   अभ्यास   is  seen in other Catholic  देशों   ,  sometimes  संबद्ध   साथ  mortification  of   the   flesh  .
Granada , Nicaragua .
Lent ( Latin :  quadragesima   )  is a solemn  observance  in  the   liturgical   साल   of   अनेक  Christian  denominations   ,  lasting for a  काल  of approximately six weeks leading  up   to  Easter  संडे   .
In  the   सामान्य  Latin-rite and  सबसे   पश्चिमी  denominations Lent is  लिया   to  run from Ash Wednesday to Maundy Thursday ( Holy  गुरुवार  ) morning or  to   ईस्टर  Eve .
In the Catholic Church  ,  Lent  lasts  until Holy  गुरुवार  ,  जबकि  other  denominations  run until  ईस्टर  Eve .
the   परंपरागत  purpose of Lent is the  तैयारी   of   the  believer through prayer ,  penance  , repentance , almsgiving  ,  and  self-denial  .
इसके   संस्थागत   purpose   is  heightened in  the  annual commemoration of  पावन   सप्ताह  ,  अंकन  the  मौत   ,  burial and resurrection of Jesus ,  जिससे   recalls  the events  of   the  Bible when Jesus is crucified  on  Good Friday , which then culminates in  the   जश्न  on  ईस्टर  Sunday  of  the Resurrection of Jesus Christ  .
दौरान  Lent  ,  many of the  वफादार   कमिट  to  उपवास  or giving up certain  प्रकार  of  luxuries   as  a form  of  penitence .
the  Stations of the Cross ,  a  devotional commemoration  of  Christ  's  carrying the Cross and  of   उसके  execution  ,   हैं  often observed .
अनेक  Roman Catholic and some Protestant churches remove flowers  इससे   उनके  altars , while  crucifixes   ,   धार्मिक   मूर्तियाँ  , and  अन्य  elaborate religious symbols are often veiled  in  violet  fabrics  in  solemn   observance  of the event  .
In certain pious Catholic  देशों   ,  some adherents mark the season with the traditional abstention  इससे   the  consumption of  मांस  .
in   कुछ  countries  ,  grand  धार्मिक   जुलूसों  and cultural customs are observed  ,  and the  वफादार  attempt  to   विज़िट  seven churches during  पावन  Week  in  honor of Jesus Christ heading to  माउंट  Calvary  .
Lent  is   traditionally  described as  स्थायी  for forty days  ,  in  commemoration   of   the   चालीस   दिनों  which ,  according  to  the   gospels   of  Matthew , Mark  और   ल्यूक   ,   यीशु   खर्च  fasting in  the  desert before the  शुरूआत  of his public ministry , where he  endured  temptation  by   the  Devil .
however  , different Christian denominations calculate the forty  दिनों   of  Lent  differently  .
In most Western  परंपराओं   the  Sundays are not counted  as   भाग  of  lent   ;   यूँ   the  period from Ash Wednesday until  ईस्टर  consists of 40 days  जब  the  sundays  are  excluded   .
However in the  रोमन   कैथोलिक  Church  lent   is   अभी  taken to end  on  Holy Thursday  बल्कि   than   ईस्टर  Eve , and  hence   lasts  38 days excluding Sundays , or 44 days in  कुल  .
इस  event ,  साथ  with  इसके  pious customs are  observed   by   catholics   ,   lutherans  ,  methodists  , Presbyterians  ,  and Anglicans .
