The  chernobyl  disaster ( , Chornobylska  katastrofa  –  chornobyl  Catastrophe )  थी  a catastrophic nuclear  दुर्घटना   कि  occurred  on  26 April  1986  at the Chernobyl  नाभिकीय  Power Plant  in   युक्त  ( then  officially   the   यूक्रेनी  SSR  )  ,  जिससे   थी   अंतर्गत  the  सीधा  jurisdiction of the central authorities  of  the Soviet Union .
an   विस्फोट   और  fire released large  quantities  of radioactive particles into  the  atmosphere  ,  which spread over  much   of  the western  ussr   और   यूरोपीय  .
The  chernobyl   विपत्ति  is  widely  considered to  have  been the worst  नाभिकीय  power plant accident in history ,  और  is one  of  only  दो   वर्गीकृत   as   a  level  7  event  on  the International Nuclear  इवेंट  Scale ( the  अन्य  being  the   फुकुशिमा   daiichi  nuclear disaster  in  2011  )   .
the  battle to contain the  संदूषण  and avert  a  greater catastrophe  ultimately  involved over 500,000 workers  और   लागत   an  estimated 18 billion rubles .
the   आधिकारिक  Soviet casualty count  of   31  deaths  रै  been  विवादित  , and long-term  प्रभाव   ऐसे  as  cancers  and deformities are still  होने  accounted for .
In grammar  ,  a  विषय   पूरक  is a predicative expression  कि  follows a  linking   क्रिया   (  copula  )  and that complements  (  completes )  the   विषय  of the sentence by either  (   1   )   renaming  it or (  2   )  describing it .
in  the former  मामला  , a  renaming  noun phrase such as  a   संज्ञा   or   सर्वनाम  is  पुकारा  a  predicative  nominal  .
An adjective  following   the  copula and describing the  विषय  is  पुकारा  a predicative  क्रियाशील  .
In either case  the  predicative  पूरक   in  effect  mirrors   the  subject .
Subject complements  हैं  used with a small  क्लास  of verbs  पुकारा  linking  क्रियाएँ  or  copula  ,  of  which be is the most common .
Since  copula   हैं   stative   क्रियाएँ  , subject complements are not  प्रभावित  by any action of the verb .
Subject complements are typically  नहीं   clause  arguments  ,  nor  हैं  they  clause   केंद्रीभूत   .
Throughout the fifty-five  साल   इतिहास   of   the  Grammy  पुरस्कार   ,  many significant records have been set  .
This page only includes  the  competitive awards  जीती   by   विभिन्न   कलाकारों  .
इस  does not  शामिल  the various special awards that  हैं  presented by  the  National Academy of Recording  कला  and Sciences such as  आजीवन   उपलब्धि   पुरस्कार   ,  Trustees  पुरस्कार  ,  तकनीकी  Awards  or  Legend  पुरस्कार   .
The page  however  does include other  non-performance   सम्बन्धित  Grammys (  ज्ञात  as the Craft &  उत्पादन   फ़ील्ड  )  कि  may  have  been presented  to  the  कलाकार  (  s  )  .
Marshall Bruce Mathers  iii   (  born October 17  ,  1972  )   ,  better  ज्ञात  by  उसके   स्टेज  name Eminem ( stylized as EMINƎM ) and by his  alter   अहंकार  Slim  छायादार   ,   is  an American  rapper  , record producer , songwriter and actor  .
Eminem ,  साथ  with his solo  करियर   ,  is  a   सदस्य   of  his group  d12  ,  और  also one  हाफ  of  the   हिप   हॉप  duo Bad Meets  दुष्ट  ,  साथ  Royce da 5'9 '' .
Eminem  is  one of the best-selling artists  in   the  world and  is  the best-selling artist of  the   2000s  .
He has been  सूचीबद्ध   और   क्रमित  as  एक   of  the  महानतम   कलाकारों  of  सब  time  by  many  मैगज़ीन  ,  सहित  Rolling  स्टोन  magazine  जिससे  ranked  उसे   82nd  on its  सूची  of  the   100  Greatest  कलाकारों  of  सब   समय  .
The same magazine  घोषित  him  the  King of Hip Hop .
सहित  his work  साथ   d12  and  ख़राब  Meets Evil , Eminem  रै  achieved  टेन  number-one albums on the  बिलबोर्ड  200 .
He has  बेची  more than  100  million records worldwide , including  42  million tracks and  49.1  million  एल्बम  in the United  राज्य   .
as   an   भूमिगत  rapper  एमिनेम  released his  डेब्यू   सोलो  album  ,  Infinite in  1996  .
The  एल्बम  was  a   नाजुक   और   वाणिज्यिक   विफलता  .
he  gained mainstream popularity  in  1999 after the  रिलीज   of   उसके   major-label  debut  एल्बम  The  पतला   छायादार   lp   .
The  lp  also  अर्जित   एमिनेम  his  पहला  Grammy  पुरस्कार   लिये  Best  रैप  Album .
His  अगला  two records The Marshall  mathers  LP , and The Eminem  दिखाएँ  ,  भी  won Best Rap Album  ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार  , making  एमिनेम  the first  कलाकार   to   जीत  Best Rap  एल्बम  for three consecutive LPs .
इस  was  followed   by   another  studio release  in  2004  titled  Encore  .
Eminem then  गई  on hiatus after  touring   in  2005 .
he  released his  पहला  album in five years titled Relapse , on May 15 ,  2009  .
In  2010  , Eminem  released  his  सातवाँ   स्टुडियो   एल्बम  Recovery  .
Recovery was an international  कामयाबी   और  was named the  बेहतरीन  selling  एल्बम  of  2010   विश्वव्यापी   ,  joining  the  Eminem  दिखाएँ   ,  which was  the   बेहतरीन  seller of 2002  .
Eminem  जीती  Grammy  पुरस्कार  for  दोनो  Relapse and Recovery ,  giving  him a total of  13  Grammys  in  his career .
एमिनेम   रै  opened  अन्य  ventures  ,  including his own record  लेबल  Shady Records with his manager Paul Rosenberg .
he  also has  उसके  own  रेडियो   चैनल   ,   शेड  45 on  sirius  XM  रेडियो   .
Eminem began an  एक्टिंग   करियर  in  2002   ,  when  he   स्ट्रक्चर   in  the hip hop drama film 8 Mile .
He  जीती  the  अकादमी   पुरस्कार  for Best Original  सोंग  , becoming the  पहला  rap  कलाकार   कभी  to win the award .
He  रै   भी  made  कैमियो  appearances in  the   धो   (  2001  )  , Funny  लोगों   (   2009  )  और  the  टेलीविज़न   श्रेणी  Entourage .
The  एकड़   is  a  ईकाई  of area used in the imperial and U.S. customary systems .
An  एकड़   is  about 40 % of a hectare – slightly smaller than an American football  फ़ील्ड  .
the  acre is  no   longer   commonly   प्रयुक्त   ,   हालांकि  a  few  notable  अपवाद  include  the   संयुक्त  States , Australia  ,   बर्मा   और   the   संयुक्त  Kingdom ( as of 2010 , the acre is no longer officially  प्रयुक्त  in  the   संयुक्त   किंगडम  ,  हालांकि  is still  प्रयुक्त  in real estate descriptions  )  .
It  is  still  प्रयुक्त  ,  to   कुछ  extent , in  कनाडा  .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  symbol of the  एकड़   is   ac   ,  and  is  defined  as  1/640 of a square  मील  .
the   सबसे  commonly used acre today  is   the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   एकड़  .
In the  संयुक्त  States  दोनो  the international acre and  the   थोड़ा   अलग   us  survey acre are in use  .
The most common use  of  the  एकड़   is  to measure  tracts  of land .
One international acre  is  defined  as   4046.8564224  square metres .
दौरान   the  Middle Ages  ,   an   एकड़  was  the   राशि  of  जमीन   कि  could be plowed in one  दिन  with a yoke of  oxen  .
एंटोनी   लाव्वाज़्ये  's  डिस्कवरी  of the Law of Conservation  of   द्रव्यमान   led  to many new findings in  the   19th  century  .
Joseph Proust  's  law of definite  proportions   और  John Dalton 's atomic  सिद्धान्त   branched   इससे   the   discoveries   of   एंटोनी   लाव्वाज़्ये  .
Lavoisier  's   quantitative  experiments revealed that combustion involved  ऑक्सीजन   बल्कि  than  कया  was previously thought to be phlogiston  .
the   विधि  of  संरक्षण  of  द्रव्यमान   ,   or  principle  of   द्रव्यमान   संरक्षण  , states that  लिये  any system closed to  सब  transfers  of  matter and energy  (  both of which have  द्रव्यमान  ) , the  द्रव्यमान  of the  प्रणाली  must  remain   निरंतर   over  time ,  as  system mass  can  not change  मात्रा   if  it is not  added   or   removed  .
Hence ,  the  quantity of mass is `` conserved ''  over  time .
the  law  implies  that mass can neither be created  nor   नष्ट   ,   हालांकि  it may  be   rearranged  in space  ,   or  the  entities   संबद्ध  with it may  be  changed in form  ,  as for  उदाहरण  when light or physical  कार्य   is  transformed into particles that contribute  the  same  द्रव्यमान   to   the  system as the light  or  work  था   contributed  .
The law implies ( requires ) that  दौरान   कोई  chemical reaction ,  नाभिकीय  reaction ,  or   रेडियोसक्रिय  decay in  an   पृथक   प्रणाली  , the mass of  the  reactants  or  starting material  जरूर   बराबर  the mass of the products  .
the   अवधारणा  of mass conservation  is  widely used  in   अनेक  fields  ऐसे   as   रसायन   ,  mechanics  ,   और   द्रव  dynamics .
Historically  ,   द्रव्यमान  conservation was discovered in chemical reactions  by   एंटोनी   लाव्वाज़्ये   in   the  late 18th  सदी  , and  थी   of   निर्णायक  importance  in   the  progress from alchemy to the modern  प्राकृतिक  science  of  chemistry  .
The closely related  अवधारणा  of matter conservation  थी  found  to  hold good in chemistry to  ऐसे  high approximation  कि  it failed only for  the  high energies treated  by  the later refinements of  आपेक्षिकता   सिद्धान्त  , but otherwise remains  उपयोगी  and sufficiently  सटीक   लिये  most  रासायनिक  calculations ,  भी  in  आधुनिक  practice  .
In special  आपेक्षिकता  , needed for accuracy when large energy  हस्तांतरण   between  systems is  शामिल  ,  the   अंतर  between  thermodynamically   बंद  and isolated systems  becomes  important  ,   चूंकि  conservation  of   द्रव्यमान   is  strictly and  perfectly   upheld  only for  so-called  isolated systems , i.e  .   those   completely   पृथक  from all  exchanges   साथ   the  environment  .
In this circumstance ,  the   mass-energy  equivalence  प्रमेय  states that  द्रव्यमान  conservation is equivalent to  कुल  energy  संरक्षण  , which is  the  first law of thermodynamics  .
By contrast , for a thermodynamically  बंद  system ( i.e. , one  जिससे  is  बंद   to  exchanges of  पदार्थ  ,  लकिन  open to  exchanges  of non-material  उर्जा  , such as heat  और  work , with the surroundings  )  mass is  (  usually )  तभी   लगभग   conserved  .
The  इनपुट   or   आउटपुट  of  non-material  energy  जरूर   बदलें  the  द्रव्यमान   of   the   प्रणाली   in  relativity theory , although the change is  प्रायः   छोटी   ,  since relatively large  amounts   of  such  उर्जा  (  by  comparison  साथ   ordinary  experience ) carry only a small  राशि   of  mass  (  again  by  ordinary standards of  मापन   )  .
in   खास  relativity , mass is not  परिवर्तित   to  energy ,  चूंकि  energy  in  all of its forms always retains  इसके  equivalent  राशि  of mass  throughout   कोई   परिवर्तन  or translocation into , or out of  ,  a  प्रणाली  .
however   ,   निश्चित  types of matter ( a different concept  )   may   be   परिवर्तित  to energy  ,  so  long   as   the   द्रव्यमान   of  the system is unchanged  in   the   प्रक्रम  .
However  ,   if   ऐसे  energy is  removed  from systems  ,  they must lose the mass that is  संबद्ध  with  it  .
in   सामान्य  relativity  ,   द्रव्यमान   (  and  उर्जा  ) conservation  in  expanding volumes of  स्पेस   is  a complex concept ,  विषय  to  अलग  definitions ,  और   neither  mass nor  उर्जा   is  as  सख्ती  and simply conserved  as  is  the  case in special relativity and  in   मिन्कोवस्की  space .
For  a  discussion , see mass in general relativity .
a   सुअर  is any  of   the  animals in the genus Sus , within  the  Suidae family  of  even-toed ungulates  .
Pigs include  the   घरेलू  pig ,  इसके   पूर्वज   the  wild  boar  , and  अनेक   अन्य  wild relatives .
यंग  and small  सूअर   हैं  known as piglets .
Pigs are omnivores  और  are highly social  और  intelligent animals .
8-inch  ,  -inch   ,  and -inch  फ्लॉपी  disks
8-inch  , -inch  (   पूरा   ऊँचाई  ) , and -inch drives
A 3.5-inch  diskette  's ``  फ्लॉपी   ''  magnetic  सामग्री   ,   removed  from  इसके  housing
a  floppy disk  ,  or  diskette  , is a disk  भंडार   मीडियम  composed of a  डिस्क   of   पतला  and flexible  चुम्बकीय  storage  मीडियम   ,   sealed  in  a  rectangular  प्लास्टिक   वाहक   lined   साथ   कपड़ा   कि  removes  धूल  particles .
वे  are  पढ़ा  and  लिखा   by  a  फ्लॉपी  disk  ड्राइव  ( FDD  )  .
फ्लॉपी   डिस्क  , initially as  मीडिया  and  बाद   in   और  3.5-inch  (  90 mm  )   आकार  , were a  सर्वव्यापी  form of data storage  और  exchange from the mid-1970s well  into  the  पहला   दशक   of   the  21st century .
By 2010  ,  computer  motherboards   यहूद   rarely   manufactured   साथ  floppy drive support ; `` floppies could  be  used as  an  external USB drive  ,   लकिन   ``  , 8 `` ,  और   non-standard  drives could only be  संभाला   by  old  उपकरण   .
While  फ्लॉपी  disk  ड्राइव   स्टिल   have   कुछ   सीमित   उपयोग  , especially  साथ   विरासत  industrial  कंप्यूटर  equipment  ,   वे  have been superseded by data  भंडार  methods  साथ  much greater  क्षमता  , such  as   usb   फ्लैश  drives  ,  portable external  मुश्किल   डिस्क   ड्राइव  ,  ऑप्टिकल   discs  , memory  ताश  , and computer networks  .
An animated  आरेख  of a cutter
In baseball , a  कटर  , or  काटें   fastball  , is  a   प्रकार   of   fastball   जिससे  breaks slightly  toward  the pitcher 's  दस्ताने  side  as   it   पहुँच   घर   थाली  .
इस   पिच   is  somewhere  between  a  स्लाइडर   और   a  fastball ,  as   it  is  प्रायः  thrown faster than  a   स्लाइडर   लकिन  with  अधिक   गति   than  a  ठेठ   fastball   .
कुछ   pitchers   उपयोग   a   कटर  as a  रास्ता  to prevent  hitters  from expecting their regular  fastballs   .
A  आम   तकनीक  used to  throw  a cutter  is   to  use  a  four-seam fastball  पकड़  with  the  baseball set slightly  बंद  center in the hand .
When  a  batter  is  able to hit a cutter  पिच  , it often  परिणाम  in  नरम   सम्पर्क  and  an  easy  आउट   ,  due  to  the  पिच  's  गति   keeping   the   बॉल  away from the bat 's  मीठी  spot .
the  cutter is typically 2–5  किमी   धीमा  than  a   पिचर  's four-seam fastball .
in  2010  ,   the   औसत  pitch classified as a cutter  by  PITCHf/x  thrown   by  a  right-handed  pitcher  थी  88.6 mph  ;  the average four-seamer was  92.1   किमी  .
``   कया  It  takes  '' is a power ballad by American hard rock band  एरोस्मिथ  .
It was written by Steven Tyler  ,  Joe Perry  ,  and Desmond Child .
It was released in  1990   as   the  third single from Aerosmith  's   critically  and commercially successful  1989   एल्बम   पंप  .
In the video The Making  of   पंप   ,  A & R man John Kalodner  वर्णित  the  सोंग  as ``  a  masterpiece  ''  .
During live performances ,  टायलर  sings the first  श्लोक   a  cappella and  बेल्ट   आउट  one of his signature screams right before the  कोरस  .
the   एल्बम   संस्करण   of  the song is  followed  by an untitled  छुपा   track  .
Head of Odysseus from a  यूनानी   2nd  century  bc  marble  समूह   representing   odysseus   blinding  Polyphemus , found  at   the   विला  of Tiberius at Sperlonga
विवरण   of  an  प्राचीन  Roman  मोज़ेक   of  Ulysses  in   ट्यूनीशिया
Odysseus (  or  ; Greek :  ,  )  ,   भी   ज्ञात  by  the  Roman name Ulysses ( ; ) , was  a   legendary   यूनानी   किंग  of Ithaca  और  a hero of  होमर  's epic  कविता   the   ओडिसी   .
Odysseus also  plays  a  कुंजी   भूमिका   in   होमर   's  Iliad  और   अन्य  works in  कि   वही   एपिक   साईकिल   .
Husband of Penelope  ,  father of  telemachus  , and son of Laërtes (  or  Sisyphus  )   और  Anticlea  ,   odysseus   is   प्रसिद्ध  for his brilliance ,  छल   ,  and  versatility  (  polytropos   )  , and is hence  ज्ञात   by  the  epithet   odysseus  the Cunning  (  mētis ,  or   ``  cunning intelligence `` ) .
He is  सबसे   प्रसिद्ध  for the  टेन  eventful years he took  to  return  घर  after the  decade-long   trojan  War and his famous  trojan  Horse ploy to capture the  नगर  of Troy .
Erie is a Statutory  कस्बा  in  बोल्डर  and Weld counties  in  the  u.S.  state of  कोलोराडो  .
The population according  to   the   2010  census  is   18,135  and was recorded as  6,291   at   the  2000 census .
the  Town of  erie  is located  बस  west of  i-25  for  आसान   अभिगम  to  i-70  ,  डेनवर   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport and Colorado  's  entire  सामने   दायरा   .
erie  's Planning Area spans  48  square miles  ,   extending   इससे  the  उत्तर   पक्ष   of  State  राजमार्ग  52 south to  राज्य  Highway 7 , and between US  287  on the  वेस्ट  and Interstate  25  to  the  east .
Erie  is  approximately  35  minutes from Denver  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   विमानक्षेत्र   ,   25   मिनट्स   to  Denver and  20   मिनट्स   इससे  Boulder .
The Board  of  Trustees  serves  as  the  legislative and governing body of  the  Town  of  Erie and is  जिम्मेदार   लिये  establishing  कस्बा   नीतियों  and goals .
the  Board has the  प्राधिकार  to  अपनाना   कानून   ,   ordinances  and resolutions as needed  to  conduct  the  business of the  कस्बा  ,  और  by ordinance may  डालें   into  contracts or intergovernmental agreements  to  furnish , receive services or  to   provide  for cooperative  सेवा  delivery  .
Appointed  by   और  serving  at  the pleasure of  the  Board of  trustees   ,  the  कस्बा  Administrator is  the  chief operating and administrative  अधिकारी  of the Town  और  is responsible for providing  पेशेवर  leadership in  the  administration and  निष्पादन  of  नीतियों  and objectives formulated by the Board  .
the   मिशन   of   the   erie  Police  विभाग   is  to communicate and work with the  जातियाँ  to  maintain   a  safe environment , prevent  अपराधों   और   enforce  the law  ,  while protecting the  अधिकारों  of all  .
Erie  नगरपालिका  Airport (  eik   )   is   स्वामित्व  and operated by the Town of  erie   और  is strategically located in the  denver-boulder   महानगर  area on Colorado Highway  7  ,  a  little over  तीन   मील  west of  अंतरराज्यीय   25   .
the   प्रमुख  runway is concrete paved  और  4,700  फीट  long  .
the  is a  घर  video game console  उत्पादित  by  सोनी   कंप्यूटर  Entertainment .
It is the successor to the  प्लेस्टेशन  2  ,  as part of  the  PlayStation series .
the  PlayStation 3 competes with  microsoft   's  Xbox  360  and Nintendo 's  वी   as   भाग  of the seventh  पीढी  of  वीडियो   खेल   consoles  .
it   थी   पहला   released  on November 11 , 2006  ,  in Japan ,  साथ  international markets  following  shortly  thereafter   .
The console  थी  first  officially  announced at E3  2005  .
originally   नियत  for a  वसन्त  2006 release date ,  it  was delayed several  टाइम्स  until finally  hitting  stores at the end of the year  .
It was the first and  फिलहाल  only console to use Blu-ray  डिस्क  as its primary storage medium  .
Major features of the console include  इसके   एकीकृत  online gaming service ,  the  PlayStation Network , and its  कनेक्टिविटी  with the PlayStation  पोर्टेबल   और   प्लेस्टेशन  Vita ,  in  September  2009   the  updated PlayStation 3 Slim  ,  was released .
This Slim is lighter and  thinner  than  the  original  संस्करण   ,  although  it  lacks PlayStation  2   पीछे  compatibility (  removed  on later original models  )  , but notably featured a re-designed logo and  विपणन   डिज़ाइन  .
As  of   नवम्बर   4  , 2012  ,   70  million PlayStation  3s   have  been  बेची  worldwide .
Its  successor  , PlayStation  4  ,  is   नियत   लिये   a   q4  2013  रिलीज  .
Salvador Domingo Felipe Jacinto  dalí  i  domènech   ,  1st  marqués  de Dalí  de   pubol   (   may  11 , 1904January 23 ,  1989  ) , known as  साल्वाडोर  Dalí ( ) ,  थी  a prominent Spanish surrealist  चित्रकार   born   in  Figueres  ,   स्पेन  .
dalí  was a  skilled  draftsman ,  बेहतरीन  known  लिये   the  striking and bizarre  बिंब  in his surrealist work  .
His painterly skills are often attributed  to  the influence of Renaissance  मास्टर्स   .
His  best-known  work  ,  The Persistence  of  Memory , was  समाप्त  in  1931   .
Dalí 's expansive  कलाकारी   रंगमंडल  included film ,  मूर्तिकला  ,  और  photography  ,   in  collaboration  साथ  a range of  कलाकारों  in  a  variety of  मीडिया   .
Dalí attributed his ``  प्रेम  of everything that is gilded and  excessive  , my passion  लिये   लक्ज़री  and  my  love of oriental clothes ''  to   a   self-styled   ``   अरब  lineage  ''   ,   claiming  that  उसके   पूर्वजो   यहूद  descended from  the   मूर  .
dalí   थी  highly  कल्पनाशील  , and also  enjoyed  indulging in unusual  और  grandiose behavior .
His eccentric manner and attention-grabbing public actions  sometimes  drew  अधिक   ध्यान   than   उसके   कलाकृति   ,   to  the  dismay   of   those  who held his work in  ऊँची  esteem ,  और  to  the  irritation of his critics  .
Philosopher Plato  by   silanion
The  मानवता   हैं  academic disciplines that  पढ़ाई  human culture , using  विधि   कि  are primarily analytical ,  नाजुक   ,  or speculative ,  और  having a significant historical element , as  विशिष्ट  from  the  mainly empirical approaches of  the   प्राकृतिक   sciences   .
The humanities include  प्राचीन  and  आधुनिक  languages ,  साहित्य  ,  दर्शनशास्त्र  ,  धर्म   ,  and visual and performing arts such as  म्यूज़िक  and theatre  .
the   मानवता  that  हैं  also regarded as  सोशल  sciences  शामिल   इतिहास   ,  anthropology , area studies  ,   संचार  studies , cultural studies  ,   विधि  , economics and linguistics .
Scholars  working  in the  मानवता   हैं  sometimes  वर्णित   as   ``   humanists  ''  .
However , that  पद  also describes  the  philosophical  स्थिति  of humanism , which  कुछ  ``  antihumanist  `` scholars in  the  humanities  अस्वीकृत  .
Some secondary  स्कूलों  offer humanities classes  ,   प्रायः   consisting   of  English  साहित्य   ,   वैश्विक   अध्ययन  , and  आर्ट  .
Human disciplines  जैसे   इतिहास  , cultural anthropology and  मनोविश्लेषण  study subject  matters  to  जिससे  the experimental  विधि  does  नहीं  apply  ,   और  they have  अभिगम  instead  to  the comparative  विधि  and comparative research  .
the  2005 Blue  रूम  Christmas  पेड़
The White House  क्रिसमस  Tree ,  भी  known  as  the Blue Room Christmas Tree  ,   is   the  official  अंदर  Christmas tree  at  the residence of  the   अध्यक्ष   of  the United States  ,  the White House  .
the  first indoor Christmas tree  थी  installed in the  श्वेत  House sometime  in   the  19th century ( there  हैं  varying  दावा   as  to the exact year )  और  since 1961 the tree has  था   a  themed motif at the discretion of the First Lady  of  the  संयुक्त  States  .
The President  of   the  United  राज्य  of America (  potus   )  is the  सिर   of  state and  सिर  of government of the  संयुक्त  States  .
The  अध्यक्ष   लीड   the  executive  शाखा  of  the  federal government  और   is  the commander-in-chief of the United States  हथियारबंद  Forces  .
Article  ii   of   the  U.S.  संविधान   vests   the   कार्यपालिका  power of  the   संयुक्त  States in the  अध्यक्ष  and charges  उसे  with  the  execution  of  federal  विधि  , alongside  the   जिम्मेदारी   of  appointing  संघीय  executive , diplomatic  ,  regulatory  ,  and  न्यायिक  officers  ,  and  concluding  treaties  साथ  foreign  शक्तियां  ,  साथ  the  सलाह   और   सहमति  of the Senate .
the  president is further empowered to  ग्रान्ट  federal pardons  और  reprieves ,  और  to convene  और  adjourn either  or  both  घरों   of  Congress under extraordinary circumstances .
Since  the  founding of the United  राज्य  ,  the  power  of   the   अध्यक्ष  and the federal government  have  grown  substantially  and each modern  अध्यक्ष  ,  despite   possessing  no formal legislative powers beyond  हस्ताक्षर  or vetoing congressionally passed bills , is  largely   जिम्मेदार   लिये   dictating  the legislative agenda of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of  the  United States .
the   अध्यक्ष   is   अक्सर  described as  the  most powerful  व्यक्ति   in  the world .
The president is  indirectly  elected by  the   लोगों   through   the  Electoral College to  a   four-year  term ,  और  is one  of  only  दो   nationally   निर्वाचित  federal officers , the other  होने  the  वाइस  President  of   the  United  राज्य   .
The Twenty-second Amendment  ,  adopted in  1951  ,  prohibits  anyone from ever being elected to the presidency  लिये   a   तीसरा  full  पद  .
It  भी   prohibits   a  person from being elected to the  प्रेसिडेंसी  more than  एकबार  if that person previously had  परोसा  as president ,  or  acting president  ,   लिये  more  than   दो   सालो  of another person 's  पद   as   अध्यक्ष  .
In all  ,  43 individuals  have  served  55  four-year terms .
On January 20 , 2009 , Barack Obama became the 44th and current  अध्यक्ष   .
On  नवम्बर   6   ,   2012   ,   he  was re-elected  और   is   अनुसूचित  to serve until January 20 ,  2017   .
होश  are physiological  capacities   of   जीवों   कि   provide   आंकड़ा  for perception  .
The senses  और   उनके  operation ,  वर्गीकरण   ,  and  सिद्धान्त   हैं   अतिव्यापी   विषय   पढ़ाई  by a variety of  फ़ील्ड   ,   सबसे   notably   neuroscience  , cognitive psychology ( or cognitive  विज्ञान  ) ,  और  philosophy of perception .
The  बेचैन  system  रै  a specific  संवेदी   प्रणाली  or organ  ,   समर्पित  to each sense  .
इंसानो   have   a  multitude of  होश  .
Sight (  ophthalmoception  )  ,  hearing  (   audioception   )  , taste  (  gustaoception ) , smell ( olfacoception or  olfacception  ) ,  और  touch  (  tactioception  )   हैं  the  पाँच  traditionally  पहचाना  .
While  the   क्षमता  to  detect   अन्य  stimuli  परे   those  governed  by  the  परंपरागत   होश   exists   ,   सहित  temperature (  thermoception   )   ,   kinesthetic  sense (  proprioception   )  , pain  (  nociception ) , balance ( equilibrioception ) , acceleration (  kinesthesioception  ) ,  और  various internal stimuli (  e.g  . the different chemoreceptors for detecting  नमक  and carbon  डाइऑक्साइड   एकाग्रता   in  the  रक्त   )  ,  तभी  a small  क्रमांक   of  these  can  safely  be  classified  as   पृथक   होश  in and  of   themselves  .
कया  constitutes a sense is  a   पदार्थ  of some  बहस  , leading  to  difficulties in defining what exactly  a   भाव  is  .
पशु  also have  receptors  to  भाव   the  world  around  them  ,   साथ  degrees  of  capability varying greatly  between  species .
Humans have  a   comparatively  weak  भाव   of   महकते  ,  जबकि  some  पशु   may   कमी  one or  अधिक  of the  परंपरागत   पाँच  senses  .
कुछ   पशु  may also intake and  interpret   संवेदी   stimuli   in  very different  तरीके  .
कुछ   प्रजाति  of animals are  समर्थ  to  भाव   the  world in  a   रास्ता  that  इंसानो  can not ,  साथ   कुछ  species able to  भाव  electrical and  चुम्बकीय  fields , and  detect   जल  pressure  और  currents .
मकड़ियों   (   अनुक्रम  Araneae ) are  air-breathing  arthropods that  have   आठ   टाँगे   और  chelicerae with  fangs   कि  inject venom .
They are  the  largest  अनुक्रम   of   arachnids   और   रैंक  seventh in total  प्रजाति   विविधता  among all other groups of organisms  .
मकड़ियों  are found worldwide on every continent  मगर   लिये   अंटार्कटिक   ,   और  have  become   स्थापित  in nearly every  आवास  with the exception of air and  समुद्र  colonization .
As  of   2008  , at least 43,678 spider species ,  और   109  families have  महरूम  recorded  by   taxonomists  ;  however  , there  रै  been confusion within the  वैज्ञानिक  community as to how  सब   ये  families should be  वर्गीकृत  , as evidenced by the  over  20 different  classifications  that  have   महरूम  proposed since  1900  .
Anatomically ,  मकड़ियों  differ  इससे   अन्य   arthropods  in that  the   usual   देह  segments  हैं  fused  into  two  tagmata  , the cephalothorax  और   उदर   ,   और  joined  by   a  small ,  बेलनाकार   pedicel   .
Unlike insects  ,   मकड़ियों  do not have antennae  .
in   सब  except  the  most primitive  समूह  , the  mesothelae   ,  spiders  have  the most centralized nervous  प्रणालियों   of  all arthropods ,  as  all  उनके   ganglia  are fused  into  one mass in  the  cephalothorax .
Unlike  सबसे  arthropods  ,  spiders have no  extensor   मांसपेशियां   in  their limbs  और  instead extend them  by   हाइड्रोलिक  pressure .
Their  abdomens  bear appendages that have been  परिवर्धित  into spinnerets  कि   extrude  silk  इससे   up  to six  प्रकार   of  silk glands within their abdomen  .
Spider  webs  vary widely  in  size  ,  shape  और  the amount of sticky thread  प्रयुक्त   .
It  अभी   appears   कि   the   सर्पिल  orb  वेब   may   be   एक  of  the   earliest  forms  ,  and  मकड़ियों  that  उपज  tangled cobwebs are  अधिक  abundant  और  diverse  than   orb-web   मकड़ियों  .
spider-like   arachnids  with  silk-producing   spigots  appeared  in  the Devonian period about ,  लकिन   ये  animals  जाहिर  lacked spinnerets .
True  मकड़ियों   have   महरूम  found  in  Carboniferous  रॉक्स   इससे  , and are very similar to the  सबसे  primitive surviving order , the Mesothelae .
the   प्रमुख   समूह   of  modern  मकड़ियों  ,  mygalomorphae   और   araneomorphae  ,  पहला  appeared in  the  Triassic  काल   ,   पहले  .
a   herbivorous   प्रजाति  ,  bagheera   kiplingi   ,  was described in  2008   ,   लकिन   सब   अन्य  known  प्रजाति   हैं  predators , mostly  preying   on   कीट  and on other spiders , although a few  विशाल  species  भी   लो   पक्षियों  and lizards .
Spiders  उपयोग   a   चौड़ी  range of strategies  to  capture  शिकार   :   trapping   it   in   स्टिकी  webs ,  lassoing   it   साथ   स्टिकी   bolas  ,  mimicking  the  शिकार   to  avoid  डिटेक्शन  , or running it down  .
Most  detect  prey mainly by sensing vibrations , but the  क्रियाशील  hunters have acute  दृष्टि   ,  and  hunters   of   the   genus   portia  show signs  of   प्रज्ञा  in their choice of tactics  और  ability  to  develop new ones .
मकड़ियों  ' guts  हैं  too narrow to take solids , and they liquidize  उनके   खाना  by flooding it with digestive enzymes  और  grinding it with the bases of their pedipalps ,  as   वे   do  not  have   सच्चा  jaws  .
Male spiders  पहचानो   themselves  by a variety of  जटिल  courtship rituals  to  avoid being  खाया  by  the   महिलाओं  .
males  of  सबसे   प्रजाति   जीवित  a  few   matings   ,   सीमित   मुख्यतः   by  their  छोटी  life  spans   .
Females weave silk egg-cases ,  प्रत्येक  of  जिससे  may  contain  hundreds of  अंडे  .
महिलाओं  of many species  परवाह  for  उनके  young , for example  by  carrying them around or by sharing  खाना  with them  .
A minority of species are social  ,   भवन  communal  webs   कि  may house  anywhere  from a  few   to  50,000 individuals .
सोशल   बर्ताव   सीमाएँ  from  precarious  toleration  ,   as   in  the widow  मकड़ियों  , to  co-operative   शिकार   और  food-sharing  .
हालांकि   सबसे   मकड़ियों  live  लिये  at  सबसे  two  सालो   ,  tarantulas and other  mygalomorph   मकड़ियों   can  live  up  to 25 years in captivity .
While  the  venom of a few species is dangerous  to  humans , scientists are  अभी  researching  the  use of  मकड़ी  venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides .
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness  ,  strength and  लोच  that  is  superior to  कि   of  synthetic materials ,  और   मकड़ी   रेशा  genes  have  been inserted  into  mammals and plants to see  if  these can be used  as   रेशा   कारखानों  .
as   a   परिणाम  of their wide range  of  behaviors ,  मकड़ियों  have become  आम  symbols  in   आर्ट  and  mythology   symbolizing   विभिन्न   combinations  of patience , cruelty and creative powers .
Grey  's  Anatomy  is  an American  टेलीविज़न  medical drama  कि  premiered on  the   अमरीकी   प्रसारण   कम्पनी   (   एबीसी  ) , as a mid-season replacement on  कूच  27 ,  2005  .
the  series  रै   aired  nine seasons  ,   और   focuses  on  the   fictional   जीवनदान   of  surgical  interns  and residents  as  they gradually evolve  into  seasoned  डॉक्टर  ,  जबकि   trying  to  maintain  personal lives .
the   दिखाएँ  's  आधार  originated with Shonda Rhimes  ,  who  serves   as   an  executive  निर्माता  , along  साथ  Betsy Beers , Mark Gordon  ,  Krista Vernoff , Rob Corn , Mark Wilding ,  और  Allan Heinberg .
the   श्रेणी  was created to  be  racially diverse  ,  utilizing a  color-blind  casting technique .
it   is  primarily  फिल्माया   in   लॉस  Angeles ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
the  series  '   समर्थक   is  Dr.  मेरेडिथ   धूसर  (  एलेन  Pompeo )  ,   जो   originally  is accepted  into  the residency program at the fictional Seattle  अनुग्रह  Hospital .
Meredith is assigned  to  work  अंतर्गत  Dr.  मिरांडा  Bailey  (  Chandra  विल्सन   )   ,  along  साथ  Dr.  क्रिस्टीना   यांग   (   सैंड्रा  Oh  )  ,  dr.   जार्ज   o'malley   (  T. R.  नाईट   )   ,   dr.  Izzie Stevens ( Katherine  heigl   )  ,  और   dr.  Alex Karev ( Justin  कक्षों   )   .
Following O'Malley 's death and Stevens '  प्रस्थान  ,  the  hospital  's   विलय  with  रहमत   वेस्ट  brings  in  Dr. Jackson Avery ( Jesse  विलियम्स  ) and  dr.   अप्रैल  Kepner  (  Sarah Drew )  ,   in   the   छठे  season  .
The surgical wing  is  primarily supervised by  dr.  Richard  webber   (  James  pickens  ,  jr.   )  ,  जो  is eventually  replaced  by  dr.   डेरेक  Shepherd  (  Patrick  डेम्पसे  )  ,  and  बाद   dr.  Owen  हंट   (  Kevin  mckidd  )  .
dr.  Preston Burke  (  Isaiah  वॉशिंगटन  )  प्रस्थान  at  the  conclusion of  the   तीसरा  season ,  और  is replaced by Dr. Erica  hahn  (  ब्रुक  Smith  )  , who  पत्ते  the show during  the  fifth season , and later  dr.  Teddy  altman  ( Kim Raver )  ,  who  प्रस्थान   at  the  समाप्त  of  the  eighth  ऋतु   .
introduced   in  the second season  is  Dr. Addison Montgomery  (   केट   वाल्श   )   ,  who  पत्ते   the   दिखाएँ  at  the  end  of  the third  ऋतु  , in order to  लॉन्च  her own  spin-off  medical  नाटक  Private Practice  .
Dr. Callie Torres (  सारा  Ramirez )  और   dr.  Mark Sloan  (   eric   डेन   )   भी  enter the show in the second  ऋतु   ,  while the  latter  dies in the  प्रीमियर   of  the ninth  ऋतु  .
Meredith 's  half-sister   ,   dr.   lexie   धूसर   (  Chyler Leigh )  ,  appears from season  तीन   और   मरता  at the end  of  season eight .
Dr. Arizona  रॉबिन्स  (  जेसिका  Capshaw  )   is  given  श्रेणी  regular status at the beginning  of  the  छठे   ऋतु  .
Grey  's  Anatomy is the highest-rated drama in  the  key 18–49  जनसांख्यिकी   .
Previously  among   the   overall   top-ten  rated  shows  in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  धूसर  's  anatomy   रै   महरूम  well received by critics  .
Considered an impact on culture , the series has received  numerous   पुरस्कार  ,  और   रै   भी   महरूम  included in  विभिन्न  critics  '  top ten lists .
the  show  रै   उत्पादित   अनेक  specials  ,   as   खूब  as distributed  सब  seasons to DVD  ,  and released a collection  of  merchandise  .
in  2012  ,   धूसर   's   anatomy  was named the fifth-highest  आय  earning  दिखाएँ  , in terms  of  advertising per half-hour .
On  may  11 , 2012 ,  the  series  थी  renewed for  a  ninth season , which  premiered   on  September  27  , 2012  .
Schizophrenia  (  or  )  is a  दिमागी  disorder characterized by  a   विश्लेषण  of  विचार  processes  और  by  a  deficit  of  typical emotional  प्रतिक्रियाएँ   .
Common symptoms  शामिल   auditory  hallucinations  ,  paranoid or bizarre delusions , or disorganized speech  और   सोच  , and it  is  accompanied by significant social or  occupational   dysfunction   .
the  onset of  लक्षण   typically   occurs   in  young adulthood , with a  वैश्विक   आजीवन  prevalence  of  about  0.3–0.7   %   .
निदान  is based  on   observed   बर्ताव  and the patient  's  reported experiences  .
Genetics  ,   जल्दी  environment , neurobiology , and psychological  और   सोशल   प्रक्रियाओं   appear  to  be  important  contributory   कारकों   ;  some recreational  और  prescription  दवाएँ  appear  to  cause or worsen symptoms .
Current research  is   केन्द्रित   on  the role  of   neurobiology   ,  although no single isolated organic cause has been  मिला   .
The many possible combinations of symptoms have triggered debate  परिचय  whether the  निदान  represents  a  single  विकार   or  a  क्रमांक  of  अलहदा   syndromes   .
despite   the   etymology  of  the  term from  the   यूनानी  roots  skhizein  (  σχίζειν  , ``  to  split  ''   )  and phrēn  ,  phren- (  φρήν  ,  φρεν-  ; `` mind ''  )  , schizophrenia  करता  not imply a `` split  व्यक्तित्व  '' ,  or  `` multiple  व्यक्तित्व  disorder ''  (  which  is  known these days as dissociative  पहचान   विकार  )  —a   कंडीशन  with which it is often confused  in   पब्लिक  perception .
Rather , the term  अर्थात्   a  `` splitting of  दिमागी  functions  ''  , because  of  the symptomatic  प्रस्तुतीकरण   of   the  illness  .
the   mainstay  of treatment is  antipsychotic  medication  ,  which primarily suppresses dopamine  (  and sometimes serotonin  )  receptor activity .
मनोचिकित्सा  and  वोकेशनल  and social  पुनर्वास   हैं  also  महत्वपूर्ण  in treatment  .
In more serious  cases—where   वहीँ  is  रिस्क  to self  और   others—   involuntary  hospitalization  may  be  जरुरी   ,  although  हॉस्पिटल  stays are  अभी  shorter  और  less  बारंबार  than they once  यहूद   .
The disorder is thought  मुख्यतः   to  affect  संज्ञान  , but it  भी   प्रायः  contributes  to  chronic  समस्याएं  with behavior and  जज्बात  .
People  साथ  schizophrenia are likely to have additional ( comorbid )  शर्तें   ,  including major  अवसाद  and anxiety disorders  ;  the lifetime  occurrence   of  substance use disorder  is   लगभग   50   %  .
सोशल   समस्याएं  , such  as  long-term unemployment , poverty , and  homelessness  are common .
The average life  प्रत्याशा  of people  साथ  the  विकार   is   12  to 15 years less  than  those  बगैर  , the  परिणाम  of  increased   शारीरिक  health  समस्याएं   और   a   उच्चतर  suicide  रेट   (  about 5 %  )  .
पॉल  Leslie Snider ( April 15  ,   1951–august  14 ,  1980  ) was  the  estranged husband and  मैनेजर  of Playboy model Dorothy Stratten ,  जिसको  he  murdered   पहले  killing himself  the  same day .
The  एपिक   of   gilgamesh   ,  an  एपिक   कविता  from Mesopotamia , is  amongst  the  earliest   surviving  works of literature .
the  literary history  of  Gilgamesh  begins  with five  स्वतंत्र  Sumerian poems  परिचय  'Bilgamesh ' (  sumerian  for Gilgamesh )  ,   किंग  of Uruk  .
चार   of  these were  प्रयुक्त   as   सोर्स   सामग्री  for a  संयुक्त  epic in  अक्कादी  .
This  पहला  combined  एपिक   ,  known as  the  `` Old  babylonian  '' version  ,  dates to the  18th   सदी  BC  और  is titled after  इसके  incipit  ,  Shūtur  एली  sharrī ( `` Surpassing  सब  Other  किंग्स   ''  )  .
Only  a  few  fragments   of  it have survived .
the   बाद   ``  Standard  babylonian  '' version  तिथियाँ  from the 13th  to   the   10th  centuries BC  और   bears  the  incipit  Sha  naqba   īmuru   (   ``   he   जो   देखी  the Deep  ''  ) .
fragments   of  approximately two thirds  of   इस  longer , twelve-tablet  संस्करण  have been recovered .
कुछ   of  the  बेहतरीन  copies  यहूद   खोजा   in   the  library ruins of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal .
the  story  centers  on a friendship between Gilgamesh  और  Enkidu .
Enkidu is  a  wild man  निर्मित   by  the gods as Gilgamesh  's  equal to  distract  him from oppressing  the   लोगों  of Uruk  .
साथ  ,  वे  journey to the Cedar  पहाड़  to defeat Humbaba ,  इसके  monstrous guardian .
Later they kill  the   सांड   of   स्वर्ग  , which the goddess Ishtar sends to punish  gilgamesh   लिये  spurning  उसके  advances .
As  a  punishment  लिये  these actions , the gods sentence Enkidu to death .
The second half  of   the  epic focuses  on  Gilgamesh 's distress at  enkidu  's  मौत  ,  और  his quest  लिये  immortality  .
In  अनुक्रम  to  सीख   the  secret  of   अनन्त  life  ,  Gilgamesh undertakes  a   long   और  perilous journey .
He  learns  that `` The life that you are seeking you  होगा  never find  .
When the gods created man they  आवंटित  to  उसे   मौत  ,  लकिन  life  वे  retained in  उनके  own  keeping   .  ''
This quote  थी  originally  attributed  to Siduri  in  the  बूढ़ा  Babylonian  संस्करण   of   the  epic  ,   और  then attributed to  the  immortal  बाढ़   नायिका   utnapishtim  in the Akkadian version  of  the epic .
Nevertheless , Gilgamesh  's   कीर्ति  lived on  बाद   उसके   मौत   ,   क्युकी  of  उसके   ग्रेट  building projects  ,  and  उसके  account of  कया   utnapishtim  told  उसे  happened during the flood .
The  स्टोरी   रै   महरूम  translated into  अनेक   अलग   भाषाएं   ,  and  gilgamesh   रै   चूंकि   become  adapted  in   works  of  लोकप्रिय   fiction   .
A eukaryote ( or  )   is   an   सजीव  whose  कोशिकाएं  contain complex  structures   enclosed   भीतर  membranes  .
Eukaryotes may more formally be referred  to  as  the   टैक्सोन  Eukarya or  eukaryota  .
The defining membrane-bound structure  कि  sets  eukaryotic  cells  अलावा  from prokaryotic cells  is   the  nucleus  ,   or  nuclear envelope ,  भीतर   जिससे   the   जेनेटिक   सामग्री  is carried .
The presence of a nucleus  देता  eukaryotes  उनके   नाम  ,  जिससे   आता  from the  यूनानी  (  eu   ,   ``  good '' )  और  (  karyon  ,  ``  nut  ''   or  ``  कर्नेल  '' )  .
Most eukaryotic cells  भी  contain other membrane-bound  organelles  such as mitochondria , chloroplasts and  the  Golgi apparatus .
सब   विशाल  complex organisms  हैं   eukaryotes  , including  पशु   ,   पौधे  and fungi  .
The group  भी  includes many  एककोशिकीय  organisms .
Cell division  in  eukaryotes is different  इससे   कि  in organisms without  a   केंद्रक   (   prokaryote  )  .
it   involves  separating the duplicated  गुणसूत्रों  ,  through  movements directed  by  microtubules .
वहीँ   हैं  two  प्रकार   of  division processes .
in  mitosis , one cell  divides  to produce two genetically identical cells  .
In meiosis  ,  which  is   जरूरी  in sexual reproduction  ,  one diploid cell ( having two instances of  प्रत्येक  chromosome  ,  one from each parent  )  undergoes recombination of each pair  of   parental  chromosomes  ,   और   तब  two  चरण  of  कोशिका  division  ,  resulting  in  four haploid  कोशिकाएं   (   गैमीट  )  .
प्रत्येक   gamete   रै  just one  पूरक  of  गुणसूत्रों  , each a unique mix of the  सम्बन्धित  pair of parental chromosomes .
Eukaryota  appears   to  be monophyletic  ,  and so makes  up  one  of  the three domains  of  life  .
the  two  अन्य  domains  ,  Bacteria  और  Archaea ,  हैं   prokaryotes  and have none of  the  above features .
eukaryotes   represent  a  छोटा   अल्पसंख्यक  of  सब  living things ;  भी  in a human body  वहीँ   हैं   10  times more microbes than  इंसान   कोशिकाएं  .
however  , due to  उनके  much larger  आकार  their  सामूहिक  worldwide biomass is estimated at  परिचय   बराबर   to   कि  of prokaryotes .
वे   हैं   माना   to  have  पहला   विकसित  approximately 1.6–2.1 billion  सालो  ago  .
The use of Internet  सेवाएं  or  तन्त्र  with  अंतरजाल  access to  defraud  victims  or  to otherwise  लो   लाभ  of  उन्हें  , for example  by  stealing personal information  ,  which  can  even lead to identity  चोरी  .
a  very common form of  अंतरजाल  fraud is the distribution of  दुष्ट  security  तन्त्र  .
अंतरजाल  services can be used to present  बेईमान   solicitations   to  prospective  पीड़ितों  , to  conduct  fraudulent transactions , or to  संचारण   the  proceeds of fraud  to  financial institutions  or   to   अन्य  connected with  the   योजना  .
अंतरजाल   धोखाधड़ी  can occur in  गपशप   कक्ष   ,   ईमेल  , message boards , or  on  websites .
The International  सुरक्षा  Assistance  फ़ोर्स  ( ISAF ) is a  नाटो  -led  सुरक्षा   मिशन   in   अफगानिस्तान   कि  was established by the  संयुक्त   राष्ट्र  Security Council in  दिसम्बर   2001  by  रेज़ोल्यूशन  1386  ,   as   envisaged  by the Bonn Agreement  .
इसके   प्रमुख  purpose  is  to train the  अफगान   नेशनल   सुरक्षा  Forces  (  ANSF ) and assist Afghanistan in  पुनर्निर्माण  key government  संस्थानों   लकिन  is also  सगाई  in the  2001-present  war with  बागी   समूह  .
isaf   थी   initially  charged with securing Kabul  और   surrounding   क्षेत्रों  from the Taliban ,  al   qaeda   और  factional warlords , so as to  allow   लिये  the  स्थापना  of  the  Afghan Transitional  प्रशासन  headed  by   हामिद  Karzai  .
in  October 2003 , the UN Security Council  प्राधिकृत   the   विस्तार   of   the   isaf  mission  throughout   अफगानिस्तान  ,  और  ISAF  subsequently   विस्तारित   the   मिशन  in four  प्रमुख   चरण   over  the  पूरे  of the country .
इससे  2006 to 2011 ,  isaf  had been involved  in  increasingly more intensive combat operations  in  southern and  पूर्वी  Afghanistan  .
Troop contributors include from the United States , United Kingdom ,  नाटो  member states and  a  number of  अन्य  countries .
the  intensity of  the   कॉम्बैट  faced by contributing  राष्ट्र  varies greatly  ,   साथ   the   संयुक्त  States ,  संयुक्त  Kingdom , and Canada sustaining  the  majority  of   हताहत  in  intensive   कॉम्बैट  operations , with  अन्य   योगदानकर्ता   sustaining   significantly  less .
As  of  early  2010  , there were at least  700   सैन्य   bases  inside Afghanistan but  अधिक  were expected to be built in  the  coming years .
About 400  of  these  यहूद   प्रयुक्त  by American‐led NATO  शक्तियां   और   300  by  ansf   .
Cocaine (  benzoylmethylecgonine  ) (  इन  ) is a crystalline tropane alkaloid  कि   is  obtained  इससे  the leaves of  the  coca plant .
the   नाम   आता   इससे  ``  कोका   ''  and the alkaloid  प्रत्यय   -ine  , forming  कोका   .
It is a stimulant ,  an  appetite suppressant ,  और   a  topical  anesthetic   .
biologically  , cocaine  अधिनियमों   as  a serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine  reuptake   inhibitor  ,  भी   ज्ञात  as  a  triple reuptake  inhibitor  ( TRI  )   .
It is  addictive  because of  इसके  effect  on  the  mesolimbic  reward  pathway   .
नापसंद   सबसे   अणुओं  ,  कोका  has pockets with  दोनो   ऊँची   hydrophilic   और   lipophilic  efficiency , violating  the  rule of  hydrophilic-lipophilic  balance .
This causes it to cross  the  blood–brain  अवरोध  far better than  अन्य  psychoactive chemicals and may even  induce  blood-brain  अवरोध   विश्लेषण   .
It is illegal to possess ,  उपज  , or distribute  कोका   लिये  non-medicinal and  non-government-sanctioned   उद्देश्य  in almost  प्रत्येक  country .
Whole  बीफ   tri-tip   rump  ,  roasted  medium  विरल
The  tri-tip  is a cut  of  beef from the bottom sirloin primal cut  .
it  is a  छोटी   triangular   मांसपेशी  , usually  1.5  to 2.5 lbs  .  (  675  to 1,150g )  प्रति   पक्ष  of beef .
The scientific  नाम  of this  मांसपेशी   is  tensor fasciae  latae   ,   inserted  in  the   fascia  lata , the connective tissue covering  the  quadriceps femoris , also called  quadriceps   extensor   ,  a  समूह  of four muscles which  in  turn insert in  the  patella ,  or  knee cap of  the   एनिमल   .
Willmar  is  a  नगर  in  ,  and the  काउंटी  seat  of  , Kandiyohi County  ,   मिनेसोटा  ,  संयुक्त  States  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was  19,610  at  the   2010  census .
Willmar has been  आबंटित  ZIP code 56201 by  the   संयुक्त  States Postal Service .
U.S . Routes  12   और  71  और  Minnesota State Highways 23 and 40 are  चार   of  the main routes  in  the city .
the  Speaker of the  संयुक्त  States House of  प्रतिनिधि  ( or Speaker of the  हाउस   )  is the presiding officer of the  कक्ष  .
the   दफ्तर   थी   स्थापित   in  1789 by Article I  ,  Section 2 of the United  राज्य  Constitution , which states in  भाग   ,   ``  The  हाउस  of  प्रतिनिधि   shall   chuse   उनके   स्पीकर  ...  ''
the   वर्तमान  Speaker is John Boehner , a  रिपब्लिकन   जो   represents   ओहियो  's  8th  congressional district .
The Constitution  करता  not  आवश्यकता   कि  the Speaker be a  सदस्य  of Congress ,  लकिन  no  non-member   रै  ever been elected to the office  .
The Speaker is second in  the   संयुक्त  States presidential  लकीर  of  उत्तराधिकार  , after  the  Vice President  और  ahead  of  the President pro  tempore   of  the U.S.  सीनेट   .
Unlike  कुछ  Westminster system parliaments  ,   in  which  the  office of  स्पीकर   is   माना   non-partisan   ,   in  the  संयुक्त  States the  स्पीकर  of the House  is  a leadership  स्थिति  and the  office-holder  actively works  to  set  the   बहुमत   पार्टी   's  legislative agenda .
The Speaker usually does not personally preside over debates  ,  instead delegating  the   ड्यूटी   to  members  of  the  हाउस   इससे   the  majority  पार्टी  .
Aside from duties relating to heading the House and the majority political party ,  the  Speaker  भी   performs   प्रशासनिक   और   प्रक्रियात्मक  functions  ,   और  represents his or  उसके  Congressional district .
A bicycle  फ़्रेम  is the main component of  a   सायकिल  ,  on  to which wheels  और  other components  हैं  fitted  .
the  modern and most common  फ़्रेम  design  लिये  an upright  सायकिल   is   आधारित  on the safety bicycle , and  consists   of   दो  triangles ,  a  main  त्रिभुज   और  a  युग्म  rear triangle  .
इस   is  known  as  the diamond frame .
Frames  हैं  required  to  be strong ,  stiff   और   लाइट  , which they do by  combining  different  सामग्री  and shapes .
``  सरल  gravity pendulum '' model assumes no friction or air resistance  .
an  exemplar animation  of  a pendulum showing the  गति  and  त्वरण  vectors
A pendulum  is   a   वज़न  suspended from a  so   कि   it  can swing freely .
जब  a  लोलक  is displaced sideways from  इसके   resting  equilibrium position  ,   it   is   विषय   to  a  restoring  force due to  गम्भीरता  that will  accelerate  it  वापस   toward  the  संतुलन  position  .
When  released  ,  the   restoring   फ़ोर्स  combined with the pendulum 's mass causes it  to  oscillate  परिचय  the equilibrium  स्थिति  ,  सुहाने  back and  forth  .
the  time for one  पूरा   साईकिल  ,  a  left swing and a right swing ,  is  called the  काल  .
a  pendulum  swings  with a  विशिष्ट  period  जिससे  depends (  मुख्यतः   )   on   इसके   लंबाई   .
इससे   इसके  discovery  around  1602 by  गैलीलियो   गैलिली  the regular motion of pendulums was  प्रयुक्त   लिये  timekeeping ,  और   थी   the  world  's   सबसे   सटीक  timekeeping technology until the 1930s  .
Pendulums  हैं  used to regulate pendulum clocks  ,  and  हैं  used  in   वैज्ञानिक  instruments such as accelerometers  और  seismometers  .
Historically they  यहूद  used  as   gravimeters   to  measure the acceleration  of  gravity  in  geophysical  सर्वेक्षण   ,  and even as  a   मानक  of length  .
The word 'pendulum  '  is  नई   लैटिन  , from  the  Latin  pendulus   ,  meaning 'hanging '  .
the  simple  गम्भीरता  pendulum is  an  idealized  गणितीय  model of a pendulum  .
This is a weight  (  or bob )  on  the  समाप्त  of a massless  cord  suspended from  a  , without  घर्षण   .
When given an initial push , it will  झूले  back and forth at a  निरंतर  amplitude .
रियल  pendulums  हैं  subject to  घर्षण  and  एयर   खीचें  ,  so  the  आयाम   of   उनके  swings declines  .
the  First  बैटल  of Bull  चलाएं  ,  भी   ज्ञात   as   पहला  Manassas (  the   नाम  used  by  Confederate  शक्तियां  )  ,   थी   लड़ा   on   जुलाई  21  ,  1861 , in Prince  विलियम  County  ,  Virginia ,  निकट   the   नगर  of  manassas  .
It  थी  the  पहला  major  जमीन  battle of the American Civil War .
Just  महीने  after the start of the  युद्ध  at  फोर्ट  Sumter ,  the  Northern public clamored for a march against  the  Confederate  पूंजी   of  Richmond ,  वर्जिनिया  , which they  अपेक्षित  to  लाओ  an early end  to   the  rebellion .
yielding  to  राजनैतिक   दबाव   ,   ब्रिगेडियर  . Gen. Irvin McDowell  led   उसके   unseasoned  Union Army across  सांड   चलाएं  against  the  equally inexperienced Confederate  फौज   of  Brig .  gen.  P.  G.   T.  Beauregard camped  निकट  Manassas Junction .
McDowell 's ambitious  योजना  for  a   आश्चर्य   पार्श्व   आक्रमण   on  the  confederate   बाएँ  was poorly executed by  उसके   अधिकारियों  and  मेन   ;   nevertheless  , the Confederates , who  था  been  नियोजन  to  आक्रमण   the   संघ  left  पार्श्व  , found themselves at  an  initial disadvantage .
confederate   सुदृढीकरण   अंतर्गत   ब्रिगेडियर   .  Gen. Joseph  E.  Johnston arrived from the Shenandoah  घाटी  by railroad  और  the  कोर्स  of the  बैटल   जल्दी  changed  .
a   ब्रिगेड   of  Virginians under  a  relatively unknown  कर्नल   इससे  the Virginia Military  संस्थान  ,  थामस   J.   जैक्सन  ,  stood  their ground  और   जैक्सन  received his  प्रसिद्ध  nickname , `` Stonewall  जैक्सन  '' .
the   confederates   तब  launched  a  strong  counterattack  ,  और  as  the   संघ  troops began  withdrawing   अंतर्गत  fire , many panicked and  it   turned  into  a   rout  as McDowell 's  मेन  frantically ran without  अनुक्रम  in  the   दिशा   of  Washington , D.C .
Both  सेना  were  sobered  by the  fierce   लड़  and many  हताहत   ,  and realized the war  थी   going   to  be  much  longer and bloodier  than  either  था  anticipated  .

मौसम   is   the   राज्य  of  the   माहौल  , to the degree  कि  it is hot or cold  ,   गीला   or  dry  ,   शांत  or stormy  ,  clear or  cloudy   .
Most  मौसम   phenomena  occur  in  the troposphere ,  बस  below the  stratosphere  .
Weather generally refers  to  day-to-day  तापमान   और  precipitation  कार्यकलाप  , whereas climate is the term  लिये   the   औसत   वायुमंडलीय  conditions  over  longer periods of  समय  .
When used  बगैर  qualification , ``  मौसम   ''  is understood to  be  the weather of Earth .
मौसम  is  चलित   by  air  दबाव   (  temperature  और  moisture )  मतभेद  between  एक  place  और   another   .
ये  pressure and  तापमान   मतभेद  can occur due  to  the sun  कोण   at   कोई   particular   स्पॉट   ,  which  varies  by latitude  इससे   the   ऊष्णकटिबन्ध  .
The  दमदार  temperature contrast between  ध्रुवीय  and  तीव्र   एयर   देता   वृद्धि   to  the jet stream .
Weather systems  in   the   mid-latitudes  ,  ऐसे   as  extratropical  cyclones  , are caused by instabilities  of  the  जेट  stream flow .
क्युकी   the   धरती   's  axis is  tilted  relative to its orbital plane  ,   धूप  is  घटना  at different  कोण  at different  टाइम्स  of the  साल  .
On  धरती  's  सतह   ,  temperatures  प्रायः   दायरा   ±40  °C (  −40  °F to 100  °f  ) annually .
Over thousands  of  years  ,  changes in Earth 's  कक्षा   affect  the amount  और   वितरण  of solar  उर्जा  received by the Earth  और  influence long-term climate and  वैश्विक  climate change  .
Surface temperature differences  in   फेरे   कारण  pressure  मतभेद  .
उच्चतर  altitudes are  कूलर   than  lower altitudes due  to  differences  in  compressional heating .
Weather  forecasting  is the  अनुप्रयोग  of science and  प्रौद्योगिकी  to predict the  राज्य  of the atmosphere for a future  समय  and a given location  .
The atmosphere is a chaotic  प्रणाली   ,  so small changes to one  भाग  of the  प्रणाली  can  grow   to   have  large effects on  the   प्रणाली  as  a   पूरे   .
Human attempts  to   कंट्रोल  the weather have occurred  throughout  human history  ,  and  वहीँ   is  evidence  कि  human  कार्यकलाप  such  as   कृषि  and  उद्योग  has  inadvertently   परिवर्धित  weather  पैटर्न   .
अध्ययन   कैसा   the  weather works on other planets  रै  been helpful  in   समझना  how weather works on Earth .
A famous landmark in the Solar System ,  बृहस्पति  's  ग्रेट   रेड  Spot  ,  is  an  anticyclonic  तूफ़ान  known  to   have  existed for at least  300   सालो  .
however   ,   मौसम  is not limited  to  planetary bodies .
a  star  's  corona is  constantly   होने   खोया  to  स्पेस   ,  creating what is essentially a very thin atmosphere throughout  the  Solar  प्रणाली   .
The movement of mass ejected  इससे   the  Sun is  ज्ञात   as  the  सौर  wind .
Katy Perry is  an  American  singer-songwriter  from Santa  बारबरा  ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
She signed  साथ  Capitol Records  .
Perry  रै   released   तीन   स्टुडियो  albums , including her  डेब्यू  Christian  प्रयत्न  Katy  हडसन  ,  एक   of  the  लड़कों  ,  और   teenage  Dream  .
Perry 's  मुख्यधारा  career  थी   kicked  off  साथ  the  विशाल   चार्ट  success of  उसके  debut single `` I Kissed a Girl ``  .
दौरान   उसके  career , Perry  रै  been  मनोनीत   लिये   numerous   प्रमुख  music  पुरस्कार   ,  primarily  लिये  Teenage  सपना  and One  of  the Boys .
The following  is   a   सूची   of  sovereign states and territories where English  is  an official  भाषा   or  language of government  .
In 2012  ,  there were  88   राज्य   in  total (  60  sovereign  राज्य   और  28 non-sovereign states )  .
In  अनेक  countries English is  the   प्रबल  language , but  करता  not  have  official status .
In Australia ,  अंग्रेज़ी   is  spoken by the vast  बहुमत  of the population  और   is   the  only  भाषा   प्रयुक्त  in  सरकारी  institutions , but Australia does not  have  an official language .
the   मामला  is the  वही  in the United  किंगडम  and the  संयुक्त  States ,  हालांकि  many  राज्य  and  regions  within  the  U.S. do have  अंग्रेज़ी  as  an  official language .
English is  the   प्रबल  language of New Zealand  और   an   आधिकारिक  language  of   कनाडा   (  along  साथ  French ) , India ( along with  हिंदी   और  several other  भाषाएं  ) , Ireland (  साथ  with Irish  )   ,   और  the Philippines (  साथ  with Tagalog  )   .
English  is  the  एकमात्र  official language of the Commonwealth  of   राष्ट्र   और  the Commonwealth Games .
English  is  one of  the   आधिकारिक  languages of the  संयुक्त   राष्ट्र   ,   the   यूरोपीय   संघ   और  the International  ओलम्पिक  Committee  .
अनेक   of  these countries  हैं   वर्तमान   or  former colonies or dependencies of  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom (  देखिए   भी   अंग्रेजों   साम्राज्य   )  , or of the United States , itself a former colony of the UK .
notable  exceptions include Rwanda  ,   जिससे   थी  a former Belgian colony  और   इरित्रिया   ,  which was  an  Italian colony where  the   अंग्रेजों  Empire  spanned   इसके  control only  in   संसार  War  ii   और   shortly   बाद  ( 1941-1952  )  .
India  's  linguistic  चित्र   is   जटिल  .
according   to  the  संविधान  of India ,  ``  Hindi  in   the   देवनागरी  script  ''  is the official  भाषा   of  the union ; and English the 'subsidiary official language '  ;  however  ,   अंग्रेज़ी   is  mandated  लिये  the authoritative texts of all federal  कानून  and  परम्  Court  निर्णय   और   (   साथ  with  हिंदी   )   is  one of the two languages of the Indian Parliament .
English is  प्रयुक्त   लगभग  exclusively  लिये   उच्चतर   शिक्षा  ,  कारोबार   और  science .
Courses  in   बहुमत   of  the schools are taught  exclusively  in English .
अंग्रेज़ी   is  extensively used  लिये  administrative  उद्देश्य   in  India .
India is  the  second-largest English-speaking country in the  संसार  by number  of   अध्यक्षों  , after the United States .
As  ऐसे  , many consider English  to   be  the de  facto   आधिकारिक  language of  इण्डिया  .
See  आधिकारिक  languages  of   इण्डिया   .
The linguistic makeup of Pakistan  is  similarly  जटिल  .
While the national language  is  Urdu  ,   अंग्रेज़ी  is an  आधिकारिक   भाषा  and used in business ,  सरकारी  and law .
English is a  अनिवार्य  language in  स्कूलों   .
All school courses  हैं  taught  in   अंग्रेज़ी  .
Pakistan is the 9th largest English-speaking country in the world  by   जनसांख्यिकी   .
दक्षिणी  Cone  (  , ) is a geographic region composed of the  southernmost   क्षेत्रों  of  दक्षिण   अमेरिका  , south  of   the  Tropic of  मकर   .
Although geographically this includes Southern and  भाग  of Southeast  (   são   पाउलो   )   of   ब्राज़ील   ,  in  शर्तें  of political geography the  दक्षिणी  cone  रै   traditionally  comprised  अर्जेंटीना   ,   चिली   ,  Paraguay ,  और  Uruguay .
In the  narrowest  sense ,  it  only covers  अर्जेंटीना  ,  चिली   और  Uruguay  ,   bounded  on  the  north by  the  states of Brazil ,  पैराग्वे  ,  बोलीविया   और   पेरू  , on  the  west by  the   प्रशांत  Ocean  ,   और  south to the  जंक्शन   between  the Pacific and Atlantic  महासागर  ,  जिससे   it   is  the closest continental area of  अंटार्कटिक  ( 1000 km )  .
ऊँची  life expectancy , the  उच्चतम   इंसान   विकास   अनुक्रमणिका  of Latin America ,  ऊँची   मानक  of  जीना  , significant  भागीदारी   in  the global  बाज़ार  and the emerging economy  of  its  सदस्यों   मेक  the Southern Cone  the  most prosperous  macro-region   in  South  अमेरिका  .
लिये  multi-event athletic  प्रतियोगिताओं   देखिए  Track and  फ़ील्ड   प्रतियोगिताओं   ,  section  ``   बैठक   ''   .
Meetings are sometimes held  around  conference tables  .
In a meeting  ,  two or  अधिक  people come  साथ   to  discuss  एक  or  अधिक   विषय   ,  often in  a   औपचारिक   सेटिंग   .
An  आधिकारिक  game in  बेसबॉल  ,  भी  sometimes  पुकारा  a  विनियमन  game , is a  खेल  that has progressed  परे   the  point at which it can be considered complete  if  necessary .
This is approximately the halfway point  of  the game .
in  the case of inclement weather ,  कोई  game which has reached this point may be stopped and shortened  as   needed  , with the result being  फाइनल  ,  और   सब   रिकॉर्ड  and statistics  गिने  .
a  game  जिससे   रै   नहीं  reached  इस  point before  होने  stopped is either considered a suspended game ( to  be  continued  at   a   बाद  date from  the   पाइंट   of  stoppage ) , or is simply canceled  और  replayed from the  प्रारंभ   .
(  इस  depends  on   the   नियम  of each  व्यक्तिगत   लीग   .   )
in   either   मामला   ,   no  statistics are counted until  the  game becomes official .
Since  सबसे  professional  बेसबॉल   खेल   हैं  nine innings long  ,   the  fifth inning is used as the threshold for  an  official game  .
If the visiting  टोली  is  अग्रणी  , or the  खेल  is tied ,  the  end of the fifth inning  marks  this point .
if   the  home team (  जिससे   bats  last  )   is   already  ahead in the  स्कोर  , and theoretically would not need its  हाफ  of the fifth inning  ,   तब  41⁄2 innings  (  i.e. ,  the  middle of the fifth )  is  considered an official game  .
The  खेल   is   भी   माना  official  if   the   घर  team  स्कोर  to take the lead  in   the  bottom  of  the fifth inning , since the  खेल  would  समाप्त   तत्काल   if  the same  बात  happened  in  the ninth  .
In  nearly  all  मामले  , the  ``  official game ''  औकात   is  used  to   determine   whether  a  बरसात  check will  be   सम्मानित  for fans holding tickets .
If  a  game is started but  करता  not reach the  पाइंट  of  बनने  official , fans  हैं   हकदार   to   a   नई  ticket for the make-up game or (  in  most  मामले  ) any other available game of their  चुनाव  .
If a  खेल  is halted after  it  becomes official  ,  the game  is   बस   shortened  and  no   बरसात  check is given .
The ``  आधिकारिक  game '' statistic received some attention  दौरान   the  1995 season , when Cal Ripken  ,  Jr.  थी  approaching  the  record  लिये  consecutive games played  ,  previously held by Lou Gehrig .
Large  संख्याएँ  were  लटका  on the side of  the   b  & O Warehouse at  oriole  Park  at  Camden Yards  to  show  the   क्रमांक  of  खेल   in  Ripken 's streak .
प्रत्येक   दिन  , a new  क्रमांक   थी  unfurled  दौरान   the   पांचवां   inning  after each game had become official  (  since  the   statistic  would  नहीं   have   गिने  if the  खेल  had  महरूम  stopped  पहले  that point ) .
A  समान   अभ्यास   रै  been  प्रयुक्त  to count  bas   toward  the demolition of several stadiums  (  including Veterans  स्टेडियम  in Philadelphia  in  2003  ,  Busch Memorial Stadium  in  St. Louis in 2005 ,  और  the original Yankee  स्टेडियम   और  Shea  स्टेडियम   in  New York City  in  2008 ) ;  as  each game  became   आधिकारिक  , the  टोली  would unveil a  नई   (  lower ) number showing  the   क्रमांक  of games left  to  be  निभाई  in  the  stadium .
A telephone number  or  phone number is a sequence of digits used  to  call from one telephone  लकीर   to  another  in  a public switched  टेलीफोन  network .
When  टेलीफोन  numbers were  invented  , they  यहूद   छोटी  — as  few  as one ,  दो  or three digits  —  and  यहूद   दिए   orally   to   a  switchboard  ऑपरेटर   .
As  फोन  systems  have  grown  और   interconnected  to  encompass  the world , telephone  संख्याएँ  have become  longer  .
In addition to telephones ,  वे  now access other devices  ,   ऐसे  as computers and fax machines .
The number  contains   the  information necessary to  पहचानो   uniquely  the intended  endpoint   लिये  the telephone call  .
Each such endpoint must have a unique number  भीतर   the  public  switched   टेलीफोन   संजाल   .
Most countries  उपयोग  fixed  लंबाई  numbers ( for normal lines at least ) and therefore  the   क्रमांक  of  endpoints   determines  the necessary  लंबाई  of  the  telephone  क्रमांक  .
It is  भी  possible  लिये  each  सदस्य  to have a set of  shorter   संख्याएँ   लिये  the endpoints most often used  .
ये   ``   आशुलिपि   ''  or `` speed calling  ''   संख्याएँ  are  automatically  translated to unique  टेलीफोन  numbers  पहले  the  कॉल  can  be  connected  .
Some  खास  services have  उनके  own short  संख्याएँ  ( e.g.  ,  1-1-9 ,  9-1-1  , 0-0-0  ,   9-9-9   ,  1-1-1 , and 1-1-2  होने  the Emergency Services numbers for  चीन  ,  जापानी   ,   दक्षिण   कोरियाई  ,  ताईवान   और   श्री  Lanka  ;  Canada  और  the United States ; Australia ;  the  United  किंगडम  ,  आयरलैंड   ,  South Africa , Poland  ,  Saudi  अरब  , the  संयुक्त   अरब   अमीरात   ,  Morocco  ,   मकाओ   ,   बहरीन  , Qatar  ,  Bangladesh  ,   बोत्सवाना  ,  घाना   ,  Kenya  ,  Hong Kong  ,  Malaysia  ,  Mauritius , Singapore , Zimbabwe  ,  Trinidad  ,   टोबैगो  ; New  जीलैंड  ; Kuwait and the European  संघ  ,  क्रमशः  . )
Many systems also allow  काल्स  within a local area to  be   बना  without dialing  the  local area code .
लिये   उदाहरण  ,  a   फोन  number in  उत्तर  America will  प्रारंभ  with  तीन  numbers  (  such  as  661 ) , which  is  the  क्षेत्रफल   कोड  , followed by seven digits split into  भाग   of  three  और   चार  ( such as 550-1212 )  ,  which  is  the local number .
कुछ  areas  अभी  have  अनिवार्य  ten-digit  डायलिंग  in place  ,   भी   लिये   लोकल  calls  .
सबसे   टेलीफोन  networks  आज  ( exceptions being private intercom and secure phone  संजाल   )  are interconnected  in   the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  telephone  संजाल  ,  जहाँ   the   स्वरूप   of  telephone  संख्याएँ   is   मानकीकृत  by  itu-t   in  the  अनुशंसा   e.164   .
इस   specifies   कि   the  entire  क्रमांक  should be 15  अंक   or   shorter  ,  और  begin  साथ   a  country  उपसर्ग  .
For most  देशों   ,  this  is  followed  by   an   क्षेत्रफल  code or city code and the subscriber  क्रमांक   ,  which might  consist  of the code  लिये  a particular telephone exchange .
ITU-T recommendation E.123 describes  कैसा  to  represent  an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  telephone number in writing  or   छपाई  ,  starting  with  a  plus sign  (  `` +  ''   )  and the  देश  code .
When calling an international  क्रमांक   इससे  a fixed  लकीर  phone ,  the  + must be  replaced  with  the  international call  उपसर्ग   चुनी  by the country the  कॉल  is  होने   बना  from .
Some mobile phones allow the  +  to  be  entered directly .
the  format and  आवंटन  of  लोकल  phone numbers are  नियंत्रित  by  प्रत्येक  nation  's   संबंधित  government  ,  either  सीधे  or by sponsored  संगठन  (  ऐसे   as   nanpa  overseen  by  NeuStar Inc.  )  .
Before  a  telephone call is connected  ,  the  टेलीफोन   क्रमांक   जरूर   be  dialed  by   the  calling party  or   कॉलर   .
the  called party  might   have   उपकरण  that presents caller ID before the  कॉल   is   answered   .
a  collection agency is  a   कारोबार  that pursues  भुगतान   of   debts   owed   by   individuals  or businesses .
Most  संग्रहण  agencies operate as agents of creditors and collect debts for  a   शुल्क   or  percentage  of   the  total amount owed .
वहीँ  are  अनेक  types of collection  एजेंसियों   .
first-party   एजेंसियों   हैं  oftentimes  subsidiaries   of   the  original company the debt is  owed   to   .
Third-party  एजेंसियों  are separate  कंपनियाँ   contracted   by  a  कम्पनी  to  collect   debts  on their  निमित्त   लिये  a  शुल्क  .
Debt  खरीदार  purchase the debt at a percentage of its value , then  attempt  to  collect  it .
Each country has its own rules  और  regulations regarding them .
Cannabis flower  साथ  visible  trichomes
Cannabis ,  भी  known  as  marijuana ( from  the   मैक्सिकन  Spanish  marihuana   )  ,  और  by other  names   ,  is  a   तैयारी  of the  कैनबिस  plant intended for  उपयोग  as a  psychoactive   ड्रग   और  as medicine  .
Pharmacologically ,  the  principal  psychoactive   constituent  of  कैनबिस  is tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC  )  ;  it   is  one  of   483  known compounds in the plant ,  सहित  at least  84  other cannabinoids  ,  such as cannabidiol ( CBD )  ,  cannabinol  (   cbn  )  ,  tetrahydrocannabivarin ( THCV ) .
and cannabigerol ( CBG )  .
This  is   a  list  of  American football quarterbacks  जो   have   प्रारंभ   लिये  the  वॉशिंगटन   redskins  , as well as  इसके   पूर्ववर्तियों   the  Boston Braves  (   1932   )  and  बोस्टन  Redskins (  1933   –  1936 )  ,  in  the  National  फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL ) .
the   वॉशिंगटन  Redskins franchise was  originally  founded in Boston , Massachusetts as the Boston  braves  , named after the  लोकल  baseball franchise .
The name was changed  the  following year to  the  Redskins  .
In 1937  ,  the franchise moved  to  Washington  ,   d.c   .
Of the  49  Redskins starting  quarterbacks  , two have been  inducted  into the Pro  फ़ुटबॉल   हॉल   of   कीर्ति  : Sammy Baugh  और  Sonny  jurgensen   .

1st   खास  Forces Operational  detachment-delta   (  1st SFOD-D  )   ,   popularly  known as  डेल्टा  Force ,  is   एक  of the  संयुक्त  States ' four secretive tier-one  counter-terrorism   और   खास   मिशन   इकाई  .
It  थी   formerly  listed as the Combat Applications  समूह   by   the  Department  of  Defense but has  चूंकि  been officially re-designated the Army Compartmented Elements ( ACE )  .
While  1st  SFOD-D is administratively supported by  usasoc  , it  जलप्रपात   अंतर्गत  the operational control of  the  Joint  खास   परिचालन  Command  .
Delta  फ़ोर्स  and  इसके  Navy counterpart , the Naval Special Warfare Development Group  ,   हैं   the   संयुक्त  States  सैन्य  's  प्राथमिक  counter-terrorism  इकाई  .
Delta  फ़ोर्स   's  primary  कार्य   हैं  counter-terrorism ,  सीधा   कार्रवाई   ,  and  नेशनल   हस्तक्षेप  operations ,  हालांकि   it  is  an  extremely  बहुमुखी   समूह  capable of  conducting   अनेक   प्रकार   of   गुप्त  missions  ,  including  ,  but not limited to , hostage rescues  और  raids .
The Central Intelligence Agency 's highly  गुपचुप   खास   क्रियाएँ   प्रभाग   (   उदास  ) and more  specifically  its  elite   खास   परिचालन  Group (  sog  )  प्रायः   works  with  –  and recruits –  ऑपरेटर  from Delta  फ़ोर्स   .
Alpha  क्षय  is one example  प्रकार   of  radioactive decay  ,  in which  an  atomic nucleus emits an alpha  कण   ,  and thereby transforms  (   or  'decays '  )  into an atom with  a  mass number 4  कम  and  परमाणु   क्रमांक  2  कम  .
अनेक  other types of  decays   हैं  possible .
रेडियोसक्रिय   क्षय  ,  भी  known as  नाभिकीय  decay  or   radioactivity  , is  the   प्रक्रम   by  which a  केंद्रक  of an unstable atom loses energy  by  emitting  अणु  of ionizing radiation  .
a   सामग्री  that spontaneously emits this kind of  विकिरण   —   जिससे  includes the emission  of   ऊर्जावान  alpha  अणु  , beta  अणु  , and gamma rays — is considered radioactive .
There  हैं  many different types  of   रेडियोसक्रिय  decay ( see table  नीचे   )  .
a  decay , or loss of energy ,  परिणाम   जब   an   अणु  with  एक  type  of   केंद्रक   ,   पुकारा   the  parent radionuclide  ,  transforms to  an   अणु  with  a  nucleus in a  अलग  state  ,   or  to  a   अलग   केंद्रक   containing  different  संख्याएँ  of protons and  neutrons   .
Either of these products is named  the  daughter nuclide  .
In  कुछ   decays  the  जनक  and daughter are different chemical elements  ,   और  thus the decay  प्रक्रम  results in nuclear transmutation ( creation  of  an atom of  a  new element  )   .
The  पहला  decay  प्रक्रियाओं  to  be  discovered were alpha decay , beta decay , and gamma decay .
अल्फा   क्षय  occurs when the nucleus  ejects   an  alpha  कण   (   हीलियम  nucleus  )  .
This  is  the most common  प्रक्रम   of  emitting nucleons  ,   लकिन  in rarer  प्रकार  of decays , nuclei  can  eject protons  ,  or  विशिष्ट   nuclei  of other elements ( in  the   प्रक्रम   पुकारा  cluster  क्षय   )  .
Beta decay occurs when the nucleus  emits  an  इलेक्ट्रॉन  or positron and a type  of   न्यूट्रिनो   ,  in  a   प्रक्रम  that changes  a  proton to a neutron or the other way  around  .
the   केंद्रक   may   कैप्चर  an orbiting  इलेक्ट्रॉन   ,  converting  a  proton  into  a neutron  (   इलेक्ट्रॉन  capture ) .
All  of  these  प्रक्रियाओं  result in nuclear  transmutation  .
By contrast , there exist radioactive  क्षय  processes that  do   नहीं   परिणाम  in transmutation .
The  उर्जा   of  an excited  केंद्रक   may   be  emitted  as  a gamma ray  in   गामा  decay ,  or  used to eject an  कक्षीय   इलेक्ट्रॉन   by  interaction with the excited  केंद्रक  in a  प्रक्रम   पुकारा  internal conversion .
Radioisotopes occasionally emit neutrons ,  और  this results  in  a change in an element  इससे  one  समस्थानिक   to  another .
One  प्रकार   of  radioactive  क्षय  results in  उत्पाद   जिससे  are  नहीं  defined  ,  but appear in  a  range  of  `` pieces ''  of  the original  केंद्रक   .
इस  decay  is  called spontaneous fission  .
This decay  happens  when  a   विशाल   अस्थिर  nucleus spontaneously  splits   into  two ( and  occasionally   तीन  ) smaller daughter nuclei ,  और   प्रायः  emits  गामा  rays  ,  neutrons  ,   or  other particles  as   a  consequence  .
Radioactive decay is a stochastic ( i.e. , random )  प्रक्रम  at the  स्तर  of  सिंगल   अणु  , in that ,  according   to  quantum  सिद्धान्त  ,  it  is impossible  to   भविष्यवाणी  when  a   particular  atom  होगा  decay .
However , the  मौका  that a given atom will decay is  निरंतर  over time .
लिये  a  विशाल   क्रमांक  of atoms , the  क्षय  rate  लिये  the  संग्रहण   is  computable  इससे   the   measured  decay  स्थिरांक  of the  न्यूक्लाइड   (   or  equivalently from  the  half-lifes )  .
Waxing is  a   रूप  of semi-permanent hair removal which removes the hair  इससे  the root  .
New  बाल  will  नहीं  grow  वापस   in  the  previously  waxed area for two  to  eight  सप्ताह   ,  although  कुछ   लोगों   होगा  start to  देखिए   regrowth   in  only a week .
Almost any area of the body can be  waxed   ,  including eyebrows , face , bikini area  ,  legs , arms  ,  back  ,   उदर  and feet .
There  हैं   अनेक   प्रकार  of  वैक्सिंग   उपयुक्त  for  निकालना   अनावश्यक  hair  .
Strip waxing  is   संपन्नता  by  spreading  a wax  thinly  over  the  skin .
a  cloth or paper  स्ट्रिप  is then pressed  on   the  top  और   ripped   बंद  the  दिशा   of  hair growth .
इस  removes  the   मोम   साथ   साथ   the   बाल   .
स्ट्रिप   मोम  can also be made  at   घर   using   नीबू   रस   ,  water  ,   शुगर  and honey  .
Hot waxing  utilizes  Hot wax  (   as   opposed   to  strip wax ) .
in   इस  case  ,   the  wax is  लागू   somewhat  thickly and with no  cloth  or  पेपर   स्ट्रिप्स   .
the  wax then  hardens  when it  cools   ,  thus allowing the  आसान   हटाना   by  a  चिकित्सक  without the aid  of  cloths .
This waxing  विधि  is very beneficial to people who have sensitive skin .

Ancient  रोमन  culture existed  throughout  the  लगभग   1200-year  history of the  सभ्यता   of  Ancient Rome  .
The term refers  to  the culture  of  the Roman Republic  ,  later the Roman Empire  ,   जिससे   ,  at its  शिखर   ,  covered  an   क्षेत्रफल  from  lowland  Scotland  और  Morocco  to  the Euphrates .
Life in  प्राचीन  Rome  revolved   around  the  नगर  of Rome ,  इसके   famed  seven  पहाड़ियाँ   ,  and  इसके   स्मारकीय  structures such as  the   flavian   amphitheatre   (   अभी  called  the  Colosseum  )   ,  the Forum of Trajan  ,  and the Pantheon  .
The  नगर  also had  अनेक   थिएटर   ,  gymnasiums  ,   और  many taverns  ,   baths  ,  और   brothels  .
Throughout  the  territory  अंतर्गत   प्राचीन  Rome  's   कंट्रोल  , residential architecture ranged  इससे  very  modest  houses to country villas ,  और  in  the  capital city of  रोम  , there were  इम्पीरियल  residences  on   the  elegant  palatine   हिल  , from which  the   शब्द   राजमहल   is   निकला   .
the  vast majority of  the  population  जिया   in  the city center ,  packed   into   insulae   (   अपार्टमेंट  blocks ) .
the  city of Rome was the  largest  megalopolis of that time  ,   साथ  a population that may well have  exceeded   एक   लाख  people  ,  with a high  समाप्त  estimate  of   3.6  million  और   a  low  समाप्त   अनुमान   of  450,000  .
Historical estimates  indicate   कि   around   30   प्रतिशत   of  the  जनसांख्यिकी  under the city  's  jurisdiction lived in  innumerable  urban  centers   ,  with  जनसांख्यिकी  of at least 10,000  और   अनेक  military  settlements   ,   a   बहुत   ऊँची   रेट   of   शहरी  by pre-industrial  मानकों  .
The most urbanized  भाग  of the  साम्राज्य  was  इटली   ,   जिससे  had an  अनुमानित  rate  of  urbanization of 32  %  , the same rate of urbanization of  इंग्लैण्ड  in 1800 .
सबसे   रोमन   कस्बों  and cities  था   a  forum , temples  और   the  same  प्रकार  of buildings , on a smaller  स्केल  , as  मिला  in Rome .
The  विशाल  urban  जनसांख्यिकी   जरूरी  an endless supply  of  food which  थी   a   जटिल  logistical task  ,  including acquiring  ,  transporting  ,   storing  and distribution of food for Rome and other urban centers  .
Italian  खेतो   supplied   सब्जियां  and fruits , but  मछली   और   मांस  were  luxuries   .
aqueducts  were built  to  bring water  to   शहरी  centers and wine  और   आयल  were  आयातित  from Hispania , Gaul  और  Africa .
वहीँ   थी  a  बहुत  large amount of commerce  between   the   प्रांतों  of  the   रोमन   साम्राज्य  , since  इसके  transportation  प्रौद्योगिकी  was  बहुत  efficient .
The  औसत  costs of transport and the  प्रौद्योगिकी  were comparable with 18th-century  यूरोपीय   .
the  later  नगर  of Rome did  नहीं   भरण  the space  भीतर  its  प्राचीन  Aurelian  दीवारें  until after 1870 .
Eighty percent  of  the population under the jurisdiction of ancient  रोम   जिया   in  the countryside  in  settlements with less  than   10  thousand inhabitants  .
Landlords generally resided in cities  और   उनके   estates  were left in the care  of   फार्म   प्रबंधक   .
The  दुर्दशा  of rural  स्लेव  was generally  बदतर   than  their counterparts  working  in  शहरी  aristocratic households .
To  stimulate  a  उच्चतर  labor productivity most landlords  freed   a  large  क्रमांक   of   स्लेव   और  many received  मजदूरी  .
कुछ   रिकॉर्ड   indicate  that `` as  अनेक  as 42 people lived in one  छोटी   फार्म  hut  in  Egypt ,  जबकि   छह   परिवारों  owned a single olive tree . '' .
ऐसे   a   ग्रामीण  environment continued to  induce  migration  of  population to urban centers  जबतक  the  जल्दी  2nd  सदी  ,  जब  the urban population stopped  growing  and  प्रारंभ   to  decline .
Starting  in  the middle of  the  2nd  सदी  BC , private Greek culture  थी  increasingly  in   ascendancy   ,   in  spite of tirades  विरूद्ध  the ``  softening  ''  प्रभाव   of   hellenized   संस्कृति   इससे   the   रूढ़िवादी  moralists .
By  the   समय  of Augustus  ,  cultured Greek household  स्लेव   सिखाया  the  रोमन   यंग  ( sometimes even the  लड़कियों  ) ;  शेफ़  , decorators ,  secretaries  ,  डॉक्टर   ,   और   hairdressers—all  came from the  यूनानी   ईस्ट  .
Greek  sculptures  adorned Hellenistic  लैंडस्केप  gardening on  the  Palatine  or  in  the  villas  ,  or  यहूद  imitated in Roman sculpture yards  by  Greek  स्लेव  .
the  Roman  भोजन   preserved   in   the   cookery   किताबे   ascribed  to  apicius  is essentially  यूनानी   .
Roman writers  disdained  Latin for a  संस्कारी   यूनानी  style .
Only in  विधि  and governance  थी   the   तिरछा  nature of Rome 's accretive culture  परम्  .
विरूद्ध  this human background , both  the   शहरी  and rural setting  ,   एक  of  इतिहास  's most influential  सभ्यताओं   took  shape , leaving behind a cultural  विरासत  that survives in part today  .
James Joseph `` Duffy '' Waldorf  ,  Jr. ( born  अगस्त  20 ,  1962  ) is  an  American  पेशेवर   मनःस्थिति  .
