A modern ``  फ्रेंच  Kilner  ''   जार
कांच  production  involves  two main methods – the float  कांच   प्रक्रम  , which produces sheet  कांच   ,  and  glassblowing  which  produces  bottles and  अन्य   containers   .
a  season  is   a   subdivision  of the year , marked by changes  in   मौसम  ,  पारिस्थितिकी   ,  and hours of daylight .
Seasons result from  the   वार्षिक  revolution of  the  Earth  around  the Sun  और  the  झुकाव  of the Earth 's  अक्ष  relative to the plane of revolution  .
In  शीतोष्ण   और   ध्रुवीय  regions , the seasons  हैं  marked by changes in the intensity  of  sunlight that  पहुँच   the   धरती  's  सतह  , variations of  जिससे   may  cause animals to go  into   शीतनिष्क्रियता   or  to migrate , and plants to be  dormant  .
दौरान   may   ,  June and July , the  उत्तरी   गोलार्ध  is exposed to  अधिक  direct sunlight  क्युकी   the   गोलार्ध  faces the sun .
The same  is  true  of   the   दक्षिणी   गोलार्ध  in  नवम्बर   ,   दिसम्बर  and  जनवरी   .
It is  the   झुकाव  of  the  Earth that causes the Sun to be higher in the sky during the  गर्मियाँ  months  जिससे   increases   the  solar flux  .
However , due  to   मौसमी   lag  , June , July and August are  the   hottest   महीने  in the  उत्तरी   गोलार्ध  and  दिसम्बर  , January and February are the  hottest  months  in  the  दक्षिणी   गोलार्ध  .
In  शीतोष्ण   और   subpolar  regions , generally  चार  calendar -based seasons  (  with  उनके  adjectives  )   हैं  recognized :  वसन्त  (  vernal   )  , summer ( estival ) , autumn  (  autumnal ) and  शीत  (  hibernal  )  .
However , ecologists  ज़्यादातर  use a  छह   ऋतु  model for temperate climate  regions  that  शामिल  pre-spring (  prevernal  )  और  late  गर्मियाँ   (  serotinal )  as  distinct  सीज़न   साथ  with the traditional  चार  .
Hot  regions  have two or  तीन  seasons  ;  the rainy  (  or  गीला  ,  or  monsoon ) season and the dry season ,  और   in  some  तीव्र   क्षेत्रों  , a cool or mild season .
in  some  भाग  of  the  world , special `` seasons '' are loosely defined  आधारित  on important  कार्यक्रम  such  as   a   hurricane  season  ,   बवंडर   ऋतु   or   a   दावानल   ऋतु   .
the  six  ecological  seasons
the  four  पंचांग  seasons ,  चित्रित   in   an  ancient Roman  मोज़ेक   इससे  Tunisia
the  Battle  of   फोर्ट  Sumter (  अप्रैल   12–14   ,  1861  )  was  the   बमबारी   और  surrender  of  Fort  sumter   ,   निकट  Charleston ,  दक्षिण  Carolina  ,  that  प्रारंभ  the American Civil War .
Following  घोषणाओं   of  secession  by   सात  Southern  राज्य   ,   दक्षिण   कैरोलिना  demanded  कि   the   u.S.  Army  लापरवाही  its facilities in Charleston Harbor  .
On December 26 , 1860 , U.S. Major  रॉबर्ट   एंडरसन  surreptitiously  स्थानांतरित   उसके  small command  इससे  the indefensible Fort  moultrie  on  सुलीवान  's Island  to   फोर्ट   sumter  ,  a   substantial   किला   controlling   the  entrance of Charleston Harbor  .
An attempt by U.S. President James Buchanan  to   reinforce  and resupply Anderson ,  using  the unarmed merchant  जलयान   स्टार   of  the West , failed when  it   थी  fired upon  by   shore  batteries  on  January  9   ,  1861  .
South Carolina  अधिकारियों  then seized all Federal  प्रॉपर्टी   in   the  Charleston area , except for Fort Sumter .
दौरान  the  जल्दी   महीने   of   1861  ,  the  situation around Fort Sumter increasingly began to  resemble  a siege  .
in   कूच   ,   ब्रिगेडियर   .  Gen. P.  G.  T.  beauregard   ,   the   पहला  general  अधिकारी   of   the   newly   formed  Confederate States of America , was placed in  कमांड   of  Confederate  शक्तियां  in  चार्ल्सटन  .
Beauregard energetically directed the  strengthening   of  batteries around Charleston  हार्बर   aimed   at  Fort  sumter   .
शर्तें   in  the fort grew dire  as   the  Union  सैनिको   rushed  to  पूरा  the installation of  अतिरिक्त  guns  .
एंडरसन   थी   छोटी   of  men ,  खाना   ,  and supplies .
The resupply of  फोर्ट   sumter  became  the  first  संकट  of the administration  of   अध्यक्ष  Abraham Lincoln .
He notified the  राज्यपाल  of  दक्षिण   कैरोलिना   ,  Francis  W.  Pickens  ,   कि  he was sending supply ships ,  जिससे   resulted   in   an   ultimatum  from the Confederate  सरकारी   :   evacuate   फोर्ट  Sumter  तत्काल  .
प्रमुख  Anderson refused to surrender .
Beginning at  4:30  a.m. on April 12 , the Confederates  bombarded  the fort from artillery batteries  surrounding  the harbor  .
Although the Union garrison returned  आग  , they  यहूद  significantly outgunned and  ,  after 34  घंटों   ,  Major Anderson  सहमत   to   evacuate  .
वहीँ  was no  घाटा  of life  on  either side as  a  direct result  of   इस  engagement , although a gun explosion  दौरान   the  surrender  ceremonies  on April  14  caused two  संघ  deaths .
following   the  battle ,  वहीँ  was widespread support from  दोनो  North and South  लिये   further  military action  .
lincoln   's  immediate  कॉल  for  75,000  volunteers  to   दबाने  the  विद्रोह   resulted  in an additional four southern slave  राज्य  also declaring  उनके   secession   और  joining the  confederacy  .
The Civil War had begun .
3G , short for third Generation , is  the   तीसरा   पीढी   of  mobile telecommunications technology .
3G  दूरसंचार  networks  support  services that provide an  सूचना   ट्रांसफ़र   रेट   of  at least  200   kbit/s  .
however  , many  सेवाएं  advertised  as   3g  provide higher speed  than   the  minimum  तकनीकी  requirements for  a  3G service .
हाल   3g  releases , often  denoted  3.5G and  3.75g  ,  भी  provide mobile broadband access  of   अनेक  Mbit/s to smartphones and  मोबाईल  modems in laptop  कंप्यूटर  .
3G finds application  in  wireless voice  telephony   ,  mobile Internet  अभिगम   ,  fixed  बेतार  Internet access ,  वीडियो   काल्स  and  मोबाईल  TV .
``  mazel  Tov ! ''  लिखा  on a  वाइन   कांच  tag
Traditionally , after the groom breaks the  कांच   ,   the   अतिथि  shout  ``  Mazel Tov  !   ``  .
A birthday  केक  , iced  साथ   the   शब्द   ``   מזל   טוב  '' ( mazal tov ) , as is  प्रायः  done in Israel .
यहाँ  the  phrase  is written  in   यहूदी   कर्सिव  .
`` Mazel  tov   ''  or ``  mazal  tov ''  (   यहूदी  / Yiddish : `` מזל  טוב   ''   ,  Hebrew :  ``  mazal  tov   ''  ; Yiddish  :   ``  mazel tov  ''  ; lit .
``   शुभ  luck  ''  )  is  a  phrase  used to express congratulations for a happy  और  significant  अवसर   or   इवेंट   .
Hepatitis C  is   an   संक्रामक   बीमारी   affecting  primarily the  जिगर   ,   caused   by   the  hepatitis C  वायरस  ( HCV ) .
The infection  is   प्रायः   asymptomatic  ,  लकिन  chronic infection  can  lead  to   scarring  of the liver and ultimately  to  cirrhosis  ,   जिससे  is generally  apparent  after many  सालो  .
In some cases  ,   those  with cirrhosis will go on to  develop   जिगर  failure ,  जिगर  cancer or life-threatening esophageal  और  gastric varices  .
hcv  is  स्प्रेड   primarily  by blood-to-blood contact  संबद्ध  with  intravenous  drug  उपयोग   ,  poorly  sterilized  medical  उपकरण   और   transfusions   .
An estimated 130–200 million  लोगों   विश्वव्यापी  are infected with  .
the   अस्तित्व  of  (   originally  `` non- A non-  b  hepatitis '' )  थी  postulated in the  1970s   और  proven in 1989 .
तभी   infects  humans  और  chimpanzees .
The virus  persists  in the  जिगर   in  about  85   %  of those infected  .
This persistent infection can  be  treated with medication : the standard therapy  is   a   संयोजन   of  peginterferon and ribavirin , with  either  boceprevir  or   telaprevir  added in  कुछ  cases .
overall  ,  50–80  % of people treated  हैं  cured  .
Those who develop cirrhosis  or  liver cancer  may   आवश्यकता   a  liver transplant .
is  the  अग्रणी  cause of liver transplantation , though the virus usually  बारंबार  after transplantation  .
No  टीका  against  is   उपलब्धियाँ   .
A  लचीली  spending account ( FSA ) ,  भी   ज्ञात   as  a  लचीली  spending arrangement  ,  is  एक   of  a number  of  tax-advantaged financial accounts that can be set up through a cafeteria plan  of  an employer  in   the   संयुक्त   राज्य  .
an  FSA  allows  an employee to set  aside  a portion  of  earnings to pay  लिये  qualified expenses as  स्थापित  in  the   कैफेटेरिया  plan ,  सबसे  commonly  लिये  medical expenses  लकिन  often for dependent care  or   अन्य  expenses .
धन  deducted from an employee  's  pay  into  an  fsa   is   नहीं  subject to payroll  कर   ,   resulting  in substantial  payroll   कर   बचत   .
One  significant  disadvantage  to  using an FSA is  कि   निधि  not  प्रयुक्त  by the  समाप्त   of  the plan  साल  are  खोया   to   the   कर्मचारी  , known  as   the   ``   उपयोग  it or lose  it  ''  नियम   .
the   सबसे  common  प्रकार   of   लचीली   बिता   खाता  ,  the  medical expense FSA  (  also  चिकित्सा   fsa  or  स्वास्थ्य  FSA  )   ,   is  similar  to  a health  बचत  account  (  HSA ) or  a   स्वास्थ्य   reimbursement  account (  hra   )  .
However , while  hsas   और  HRAs  हैं   लगभग   exclusively  used  as  components of  a  consumer  चलित  health care plan , medical FSAs are  commonly  offered with  अधिक   परंपरागत  health plans as well  .
In addition  ,  funds in a  स्वास्थ्य   बचत   खाता  are not  खोया  when the plan  साल  is over , unlike  निधि   in  an  fsa  .
Paper  फ़ॉर्म  or an  fsa  debit  कार्ड  , also  ज्ञात  as  a  Flexcard  ,   may  be used to access the account funds .
Tennessee  (  ) ( ) is  a   u.S.   राज्य   स्तिथ  in the  southeastern  United States .
Tennessee is the 36th most  extensive  and the 17th most  populous  of  the   50   संयुक्त   राज्य  .
Tennessee is  bordered   by  Kentucky  और   वर्जिनिया  to  the  north  ,  North  कैरोलिना  to  the   ईस्ट   ,  Georgia , Alabama  ,   और  Mississippi  to  the  दक्षिण   ,   और  Arkansas and Missouri  to  the  वेस्ट  .
the  Appalachian Mountains dominate the  पूर्वी  part of the  राज्य  ,  और  the  मिसिसिपी  River forms  the  state  's   पश्चिमी  border  .
Tennessee 's capital  और  second largest  नगर  is  नैशविले  , which  रै   a   जनसांख्यिकी  of 609,644 .
Memphis is  the  state 's largest city ,  साथ   a   जनसांख्यिकी  of 652,050 .
The  राज्य  of Tennessee is rooted in the Watauga Association ,  a   1772  frontier  अनुबंध  generally  regarded  as  the  first constitutional government west of the Appalachians .
What  is  now Tennessee  थी  initially  भाग   of  North Carolina , and  बाद   भाग  of  the   दक्षिणपश्चिम  Territory .
Tennessee was admitted  to  the Union as the 16th  राज्य  on  जून  1 , 1796  .
Tennessee  थी  the last state  to   छोड़  the Union and join the  confederacy  at the outbreak of  the   u.S.  Civil War in 1861  ,  and the first state to  be  readmitted to the  संघ  at the end of the war .
Tennessee  सुसज्जित  more soldiers for the Confederate  फौज  than any other state  ,  and  अधिक  soldiers for  the  Union Army than any other Southern state .
in  the 20th  सदी  , Tennessee transitioned  इससे  an agrarian economy  to   a  more  diversified  economy ,  aided  at times  by   संघीय  entities  ऐसे   as   the  Tennessee  घाटी   प्राधिकार   .
In  the  early 1940s ,  the  city  of   ओक  Ridge was  स्थापित   to   हाउस   the   मैनहटन   प्रोजेक्ट  's  यूरेनियम  enrichment  सुविधाएं   ,  helping  to  build  the   संसार  's first atomic bomb .
Tennessee has played  a  critical role  in  the development  of  many  फ़ॉर्म  of  अमरीकी  popular music  ,  including  चट्टान   और   फेंकें  , blues ,  देश   ,  and  rockabilly  .
Beale  गली  in Memphis is  माना  by many to be the birthplace  of   the  blues , with musicians such as W.C  .  Handy  performing  in its clubs  as  early as 1909  .
मेम्फिस  was  भी   घर   to   सूर्य   रिकॉर्ड   ,  where musicians such  as   एल्विस   प्रेस्ली  , Isaac Hayes  ,   जॉनी  Cash ,  कार्ल   perkins   ,  Jerry  ली  Lewis , Roy Orbison  ,   और   चार्ली  Rich began  उनके  recording  करियर   ,   और  where rock and roll  took  shape in the 1950s .
The  1927   विक्टर  recording sessions  in   ब्रिस्टल  generally mark the beginning of  the  country  म्यूज़िक   विधा  and the  वृद्धि  of the Grand Ole Opry  in   the   1930s   helped  make Nashville  the  center  of  the country music  रिकॉर्डिंग   उद्योग  .
तीन  bricks and  गारा  museums recognize Tennessee  's   भूमिका   in   nurturing  various forms  of  popular  म्यूज़िक  : the Memphis Rock  n  ' Soul  संग्रहालय   ,  the Country  म्यूज़िक   हॉल  of Fame and  संग्रहालय   in   नैशविले  , and the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Rock-A-Billy Museum in  जैक्सन   .
In addition ,  the  Rockabilly Hall of  कीर्ति  , an  ऑनलाइन   साईट   recognizing   the  development of  rockabilly  in which  टेनेसी  played  a  crucial  भूमिका  , is  आधारित  in  नैशविले  .
Tennessee  's   प्रमुख  industries  शामिल   कृषि   ,   निर्माण  ,  और  tourism  .
मुर्गीपालन   ,   soybeans   ,   और  cattle are the  राज्य  's primary agricultural products , and major manufacturing  निर्यात  include chemicals ,  परिवहन  equipment ,  और  electrical  उपकरण   .
The  ग्रेट   smoky  Mountains  नेशनल   पार्क   ,  the  स्वदेश  's  सबसे  visited national park  ,   is  headquartered in  the   पूर्वी   भाग  of  the  state  ,  and a  खण्ड  of the Appalachian  ट्रेल  roughly  फ़ॉलो   the   tennessee-north  Carolina  किनारा   .
Other major tourist attractions  शामिल  the  टेनेसी   एक्वेरियम  in Chattanooga  ,  the Sunsphere  in  Knoxville  ,   dollywood  in Pigeon Forge ,  the   पार्थेनन  ,  the  Country Music Hall of  कीर्ति   और  Museum ,  और  Ryman  ऑडिटोरियम  in Nashville ,  और   एल्विस  Presley  's   graceland  residence  और  tomb  in  Memphis  .
एक   डिज़ाइन  variant  of  a  मुर्गा   रिंग  .
A  मुर्गा  ring is a  रिंग  that can be placed around a  man   's  penis  ,   प्रायः  at the  आधार  , primarily to slow the  प्रवाह   of  blood from the  वीर्यपात   penile   ऊतक   ,  thus  maintaining   an  erection  लिये  a much  longer  period  of  time  .
Cock rings  can   be  worn around just  the   शिश्न  or  दोनो  the penis  और   scrotum  , or  बस  the  scrotum   अलोन  ,  हालांकि  this is usually called a testicle cuff .
बजती   can   be   बना  of a variety  of  different materials  ,  most commonly leather  ,  rubber , or silicone , though  नायलॉन  and  मेटल  are also  प्रयुक्त  either as the  प्रमुख  component or part  of   the  closure .
The term  मुर्गा   रिंग   is  sometimes used as a synonym  लिये  a Prince  अल्बर्ट  piercing , a  piercing  of  the  penis that  is  usually , though not always  ,  a  मेटल  ring .
जब   प्रयुक्त  in cases of erectile dysfunction  वे   हैं  known  by  various names  ऐसे  as ``  स्तंभन   रिंग  '' and `` tension ring '' .
The  मुख्यालय   of   प्रमुख  League Baseball at 245 Park Avenue  ,  Midtown Manhattan , New York City  ,  USA  .
Major  लीग   बेसबॉल  (  एमएलबी  )  is  a professional baseball  लीग   ,  consisting of  टीमों  that play  in  the National League  और  the American League  .
डेटिंग  to 1876  और  1901 respectively ,  the   दो  leagues  मिलाया  in 2000 into a single  संगठन  led  by  the Commissioner of  बेसबॉल  , after  100  years as separate legal entities .
MLB constitutes  एक   of  the  प्रमुख   पेशेवर  sports leagues of  the  United States and Canada  .
it  is composed of 30 teams  —   29   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  and one in Canada .
टीमों  in MLB  खेल  162 games each  ऋतु  over six  महीने  (  अप्रैल   through  September  )   .
Five  टीमों  in  प्रत्येक   लीग  advance to  a  four-round  postseason  tournament that culminates in the World Series  ,  a  best-of-seven-games   चैंपियनशिप   श्रेणी   between  the  दो  league champions which  तिथियाँ   to   1903   .
the  organization  oversees   अनेक   minor-league  baseball  लीग  which operate about 240 teams affiliated with the major-league  क्लब   .
साथ   the  International  बेसबॉल   संघ  , the league also manages the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  World Baseball Classic  टूर्नामेंट   .
MLB has the  उच्चतम  season attendance  of  any sports  लीग  in  the  world with nearly  75  million spectators  in  2012  .
Delaware ( ) is  a  U.S. state located  on   the   अटलांटिक   coast   in  the  mid-atlantic  region  of   the  United  राज्य  .
It  is  bordered to  the  south and west by Maryland  ,  to the northeast by New Jersey , and to the  उत्तर   by   पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
The  राज्य   takes  its name  इससे   थामस  West  ,   3rd   सामन्त  De La Warr , an  अंग्रेज़ी  nobleman and Virginia 's  पहला  colonial governor  ,   बाद  whom what is now called  केप  Henlopen  थी  originally named .
डेलावेयर   is   स्तिथ   in  the northeastern portion  of   the   delmarva  Peninsula and is the  दूसरी  smallest , the sixth least  populous  , but  the   छठे  most  densely   आबादी  of  the   पचास   संयुक्त  States .
डेलावेयर   is  divided into three  काउंटी   .
इससे  north to south ,  ये  three  काउंटी  are  नई  Castle , Kent ,  और  Sussex  .
जबकि   the  southern two  काउंटी  have  historically   महरूम   predominantly   agricultural   ,  New Castle  काउंटी   रै  been more industrialized .
Before  इसके  coastline was  छान  by Europeans in  the  16th century  ,   डेलावेयर  was inhabited  by  several  समूह  of Native Americans  ,  including the Lenape in  the  north and Nanticoke in  the  south .
It  थी  initially  colonized  by  डच  traders  at   zwaanendael   ,  located  निकट   the   उपस्थित  town  of   lewes   ,  in  1631  .
डेलावेयर   थी  one of the 13  colonies  participating  in  the American  क्रान्ति   और  on December  7   ,  1787 ,  became   the  first state to  ratify   the  Constitution of the United  राज्य  , thereby becoming  ज्ञात  as  the  First State .
उर्जा  Transformation  in   उर्जा   प्रणालियों  Language
Energy  परिवर्तन  or  उर्जा  conversion  is   the  process of changing  एक   रूप  of energy  to  another .
In physics , the  पद   उर्जा   describes   the  capacity  to   उपज  certain  परिवर्तन  within a system  ,   बगैर   लिहाज़   to   सीमाएं   in   परिवर्तन  imposed  by   एन्ट्रॉपी   .
Changes  in  total energy of  प्रणालियों   can  only be  संपन्नता  by adding  or  subtracting  उर्जा  from  उन्हें   ,  as  उर्जा  is a  मात्रा  which  is   conserved   ,  according to  the   पहला  law  of  thermodynamics .
according  to special relativity , changes in the energy  of  systems will also  coincide  with  परिवर्तन  in  the   प्रणाली   's   द्रव्यमान  , and the  कुल   राशि  of  द्रव्यमान  of a system is  a  measure of its energy  .
उर्जा  in  a   प्रणाली   may  be transformed so  कि   it  resides in a different  राज्य   ,  or a different type  of  energy .
Energy in  अनेक  states may be  प्रयुक्त   to   do   अनेक   किस्में   of   शारीरिक  work  .
उर्जा  may be used  in  natural processes or  मशीने  ,  or   else   to   provide  some service to society  (   ऐसे  as heat  ,  light ,  or  motion  )   .
लिये  example , an  आतंरिक  combustion  इंजन   converts  the  संभावित   रासायनिक   उर्जा  in gasoline and oxygen  into  heat , which is then transformed into the propulsive  उर्जा   (   गतिज   उर्जा  that moves  a   गाडी  ) .
a  solar cell  converts   सौर   विकिरण   into  electrical energy that  can   तब  be used to light a bulb or power  a  computer  .
The generic name  लिये   a  device which converts  उर्जा  from one form  to  another , is a transducer  .
in   सामान्य  , most  प्रकार   of   उर्जा   ,  save for  थर्मल   उर्जा  ,  may  be  परिवर्तित   efficiently  to any other  दयालु  of energy .
Sometimes  इस  occurs with an  दक्षता   of  essentially  100  %  ,   ऐसे  as when  संभावित  energy  is   परिवर्तित  to kinetic energy as an object  जलप्रपात  in vacuum  ,   or  when  it  orbits nearer or  दूर   इससे  another object ,  in  space  .
Conversion  of  other  प्रकार  of energies to  ऊष्मा  may also  occurs  with  nearly  perfect  दक्षता  ( many types of friction do this  )   .
अपवाद  for perfect conversion efficiency ( even  लिये  isolated systems  )  occur when energy has already  महरूम   partly  distributed  among  many  उपलब्धियाँ  quantum states for a  संग्रहण   of  particles  ,  which are freely  अनुमत  to explore  कोई   राज्य  of  आवेग   और   स्थिति  (  phase  space ) .
in   ऐसे   हालातों  , a  माप   पुकारा   एन्ट्रॉपी  , or evening-out  of  energy  वितरण   in  such states , dictates that future  राज्य  of  the  system must be of  at   तनिक  equal  evenness   in  energy  वितरण  .
(   वहीँ  is no way , taking  the  universe  as  a  पूरे   ,  to  collect  energy  into  fewer  राज्य   ,  once  it  has spread  to  them ) .
A consequence of  इस  requirement is  कि  there are limitations to the efficiency with which thermal energy can  be  converted to other kinds  of  energy , since thermal energy in  संतुलन  at  a  given temperature  already   represents  the  maximal   evening-out   of  energy between  सब   संभावित  states  .
Such energy is sometimes considered `` degraded  उर्जा   ,  '' because  it   is  not  entirely  usable .
The second law  of  thermodynamics  is  a  रास्ता  of stating that , for this  कारण  , thermal energy  in  a system may be converted  to  other kinds of energy  साथ   efficiencies  approaching 100 % , only  if   the   एन्ट्रॉपी  (  even-ness  or  विकार   )  of the universe is increased  by  other means , to  compensate   लिये   the   घटी  in entropy associated  साथ   the   disappearance   of   the   थर्मल  energy  और   इसके  entropy content  .
वरना  , only a part of thermal  उर्जा   may   be  converted to other kinds  of   उर्जा   (  and thus , useful work )  ,  since  the  remainder of the  ऊष्मा  must be  सुरक्षित  to  be  transferred to a thermal reservoir  at   a  lower  तापमान  , in such a way  कि  the  बढ़ाएँ  in Entropy  लिये  this  प्रक्रम   अधिक   than   compensates   लिये  the  एन्ट्रॉपी  decrease associated with  परिवर्तन  of the  बाकी   of  the heat into  अन्य  types of energy  .
the   नेशनल   हॉकी   लीग  ( NHL ; )  is  an ``  unincorporated   not-for-profit   संघ   ''   जिससे  operates a  प्रमुख  professional ice  हॉकी  league of 30  franchised  member clubs , of which  सात  are currently  स्तिथ  in  कनाडा   और  23 in the United  राज्य  .
headquartered   in  New  यॉर्क   नगर   ,  the  एनएचएल  is widely considered to  be  the premier professional ice  हॉकी   लीग   in  the world , and one  of   the   प्रमुख  professional  खेल  leagues in  the  United  राज्य  and Canada .
The Stanley  कप  , the  oldest   पेशेवर  sports  ट्रॉफी   in  North America , is  awarded   annually  to  the   लीग  playoff  चैंपियन  at the  समाप्त   of   प्रत्येक   ऋतु  .
The league  थी  organized  on  November 26  ,   1917   ,  in Montreal , Quebec  ,  Canada , after the  बर्खास्तगी   of  operations of  इसके  predecessor  संगठन   ,  the National Hockey  संघ  ( NHA  )  ,  जिससे   था  been  संस्थापित  in  1909  .
It  प्रारंभ  with four  टीमों  and , through a series  of  expansions , contractions ,  और   relocations  ,  the   लीग  is now composed of  30   क्रियाशील  franchises .
the  nation  to  which the  नाम  of the league  originally  referred was Canada  ,  although  the   लीग   रै  now been  binational   चूंकि   1924   जब   it   विस्तारित  into  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  .
बाद  a  श्रमिक  dispute  कि   led  to the cancellation  of  the  संपूर्ण   2004–05  season ,  the  league resumed  खेल  under  a  new collective  bargaining  agreement that included  a  salary cap .
In  2009  ,  the   एनएचएल  enjoyed record highs  in   शर्तें  of  sponsorships  , attendance , and television  ऑडियंस  .
The  एनएचएल  draws many highly  skilled  players from all over the world  और   फिलहाल   रै  players from  परिचय   20   अलग   देशों  .
हालांकि   canadians   have  historically  गठित  the majority  of  the players  in  the NHL ,  over   the  past four  प्लस  decades  the   percentages   of  US and European players have increased both  क्युकी   of  the  एनएचएल   's  continued expansion  इससे  six to thirty clubs  चूंकि  1967 , and the increased  उपलब्धता  of  अत्यधिक  skilled European players .
This  is  the complete list of  the  ratified  और  unratified amendments to  the  United  राज्य  Constitution  जिससे   प्राप्त  the approval of  the  United  राज्य   कॉंग्रेस   .
Twenty-seven amendments have  महरूम   ratified  since  the  original signing  of  the Constitution  ,  the first  टेन  of which are known  collectively   as  the  विधेयक  of Rights .
The procedure  लिये   amending  the  संयुक्त  States  संविधान  is governed  by  Article  v  of the original text .
There have been  अनेक  other  प्रस्ताव   लिये   amendments  to the  संयुक्त  States  संविधान  introduced in  कॉंग्रेस  , but not  सुपुर्द  to the states .
पहले   an  amendment  can   लो   प्रभाव  ,  it  must  be  proposed to the states by a  two-thirds   vote  of  दोनो   घरों   of  Congress or  by   a  convention ( known as  an   आलेख  V convention  )   पुकारा  by two-thirds  of   the  states  ,   और  ratified  by   three-fourths  of the states  or  by  three-fourths   of  conventions thereof  ,  the method of ratification being  संकल्पित  by Congress  at   the   समय  of proposal .
To date  ,  no  सम्मेलन  for proposing  amendments   रै  been  पुकारा   by   the   राज्य  , and  तभी   once—in  1933  लिये   the  ratification of  the   twenty-first  amendment —has the convention  विधि  of  अनुसमर्थन  been employed  .
fmr  LLC ( Fidelity  प्रबन्धन   और  Research ) or  वफ़ादारी  Investments is an  अमरीकी  multinational financial services corporation .
it  is one  of  the  largest  mutual  निधि  and financial services groups in  the  world  .
It  थी  founded in  1946  and  serves  North  अमरीकी   निवेशकों   .
Fidelity Ventures  is   इसके  venture capital arm .
वफ़ादारी  International Limited  (  FIL  )  , was an international  संबद्ध  founded  in  1969 ,  सेवारत   सबसे   देशों  in  the  rest of  the  world  .
In September 2011 ,  फील  was rebranded as 'Fidelity  विश्वव्यापी   निवेश  ' .
Fidelity Investments manages a large  परिवार   of  mutual  निधि   ,  provides fund distribution  और   निवेश  advice services , as well as providing discount brokerage services ,  रिटायरमेंट   सेवाएं   ,  wealth management  ,  securities  निष्पादन  and  क्लीयरेंस   ,   जीवन  insurance and a number  of  other services  .
जून  2006  थी   the  sixth  माह  of  कि   साल   .
It  began   on   a  Thursday and  ended  after  30   दिनों  on  a   शुक्रवार   the   following  events  भी  occurred during the month:
Sociology  is   the   वैज्ञानिक  study of  इंसान  society  और   इसके   origins  , development , organizations ,  और  institutions .
it  is a  सोशल   विज्ञान  which uses various  विधि  of empirical  छानबीन  and critical  विश्लेषण   to   develop  a body of knowledge about human  सोशल  activity , structures , and functions  .
a   लक्ष्य  for many sociologists is to conduct research which  may   be  applied directly to social policy  और  welfare  ,  while others focus  primarily  on refining the  सैद्धांतिक   समझना   of  social processes  .
विषय  matter  सीमाएँ  from the micro  स्तर  of individual agency and interaction to  the  macro  स्तर  of  प्रणालियों  and the social  ढांचा   .
the  traditional focuses of  समाजशास्त्र   शामिल   सोशल   स्तरीकरण   ,  social  क्लास  , culture ,  रेस  and ethnicity ,  लिंग   और  sexuality ,  सोशल   गतिशीलता  , religion , secularization ,  विधि  , and  deviance  .
as  all spheres of  इंसान  activity are  प्रभावित  by the interplay between social structure and individual  एजेंसी  , sociology has gradually  विस्तारित   इसके  focus to  further   विषय   ,   ऐसे  as health , medical  ,   सैन्य   और   penal   संस्थानों   ,  the Internet ,  पर्यावरणीय   समाजशास्त्र   ,   राजनैतिक   अर्थव्यवस्था   और  the  भूमिका   of   सोशल  activity in the development of  वैज्ञानिक   ज्ञान   .
The  दायरा  of  सोशल  scientific methods  रै  also expanded .
Social  शोधकर्ताओं   चित्रण  upon a variety of  गुणात्मक  and quantitative techniques .
The  भाषाई   और   सांस्कृतिक  turns of  the   mid-twentieth   सदी   led   to  increasingly interpretative , hermeneutic ,  और   philosophic  approaches  to  the analysis  of  society  .
conversely   ,  recent  दशकों  have seen the  वृद्धि  of new analytically , mathematically and  computationally   कठोर   तकनीकों  , such as  agent-based   मॉडलिंग   और  social network analysis .
समाजशास्त्र   चाहिए   नहीं   be   उलझन  with  विभिन्न   सामान्य  social studies courses  जिससे  bear  छोटी   संबंध   to  sociological theory or  सोशल   विज्ञान   शोध  methodology  .
Thunder is the sound caused by  बिजली   .
depending   on  the nature  of  the  बिजली   और  distance  of   the   श्रोता   ,  thunder can range from a  शार्प  ,  लाउड   क्रैक  to  a  long ,  कम  rumble  (   brontide  ) .
The sudden  बढ़ाएँ   in  pressure  और  temperature  इससे  lightning produces rapid expansion  of   the   एयर   surrounding  and  भीतर   a  bolt of  बिजली  .
in   फेरे  , this  विस्तार   of  air  creates   a   सोनिक  shock wave , similar  to  a sonic boom ,  जिससे   produces  the sound of thunder  ,  often  referred  to  as   a  clap  ,   क्रैक  , or  peal   of   थंडर  .
The  अलहदा   of  the lightning can  be   गणना   by   the  listener  आधारित  on  the   समय   अंतराल  from  जब  the lightning is seen  to  when  the  sound is  सुना  .
पालमा  ( , , )  ,   in  full  पालमा   de  Mallorca , is the major  नगर   और  port on the island of Majorca ( Mallorca ) and  पूंजी   नगर  of the  autonomous  community of the  balearic  Islands  in  Spain  .
the  names Ciutat  de  Mallorca ( City of Majorca  )  and  ciutat   (  City ) were used  पहले  the  युद्ध  of the  स्पेनी  Succession  और  are  स्टिल   प्रयुक्त   by  people  in  Majorca .
However , the  आधिकारिक  name was  mallorca  , the  वही   as  the island .
It is situated on the  दक्षिण   coast  of the island  on  the Bay of  पालमा  .
As  of   the   2009   जनसांख्यिकी  ,  the  population  of  the city of Palma  उचित  was  401,270  , and the population  of  the entire urban area was 517,285  ,  ranking as  the  twelfth  largest   शहरी  area of  स्पेन  .
लगभग   हाफ  of  the  total population  of  Majorca live in Palma .
the  Cabrera  द्वीपसमूह   ,   हालांकि  widely  अलग   इससे  Palma  उचित  ,  is  administratively considered part of  the   नगरपालिका  .
इसके   विमानक्षेत्र  , Son  सन्त  Joan , serves over 22 million  यात्री  each  साल  .

the  royals have since  खर्च  their  गर्मियाँ   छुट्टियाँ  in Palma .

Alexander  जोसेफ  ``  लेक्स  '' Luthor is  a   fictional  character  ,   a  supervillain appearing in comic books published  by  DC Comics .
Luthor is the archenemy of Superman ,  और   as   a  high-status supervillain , has also come into  विरोध   साथ   बैटमैन   और   अन्य  superheroes in  the  DC Universe  .
निर्मित  by Jerry Siegel and Joe  shuster  ,  the  character  पहला  appeared in  कार्रवाई  Comics #  23  (  अप्रैल  1940 )  .
Luthor is described as `` a  power-mad  , evil scientist  ''   of  high intelligence and  अविश्वसनीय   technological  prowess  .
Luthor 's goals  typically  center on  हत्या  Superman  ,  the  foremost  obstacle to achieving  the  villain  's   megalomaniacal  goals .
Despite periodically  wearing   a   संचालित  exoskeleton , Luthor  रै  traditionally  lacked   superpowers   or  a dual  पहचान  .
the   अक्षर  was originally depicted  as  a mad scientist  जो  , in the vein of  गूदा   novels  , wreaks  कहर  on the world with  उसके  futuristic weaponry  .
in  his earliest  दिखावे  , Luthor  is   दिखाया  with  a   पूरा   सिर  of red  बाल   .
despite   इस   ,   the  character later became hairless  as   the  result of  an   कलाकार  's mistake .
A  1960   स्टोरी   by  Jerry  siegel   विस्तारित  upon  luthor   's   उत्पत्ति  and motivations , revealing  उसे  to be  a  childhood friend of  सुपरमैन  's who lost his  बाल  when  a  fire  नष्ट  his laboratory ; Luthor vowed revenge  .
following  the 1985 limited  श्रेणी   संकट   on   अनन्त  Earths ,  the  character  थी  re-imagined as  a   machiavellian  industrialist and  white-collar  criminal  ,  even  briefly   सेवारत  as President  of  the United  राज्य  .
in  recent years ,  विभिन्न   लेखक  have revived Luthor 's mad scientist persona  इससे  the 1940s  .
The character  थी  ranked as  the  8th  महानतम   विलेन   by   जादूगर  on its 100 Greatest  खलनायक   of   सब  Time list .
IGN 's list  of  the Top  100   कॉमिक  Book  खलनायक  of  सब  Time ranked Luthor as  #  4 .
Luthor  is  also  वर्णित  as  a  `` megavillain ''  by   कॉमिक  book critic  पीटर   sanderson   ,   एक  of a few  genre-crossing  villains  जिनकी  adventures take place  ``  in  a   संसार  in which  the  ordinary  कानून  of nature are  थोड़ा   निलंबित  '' ;  वर्ण   ऐसे  as Professor Moriarty  ,  Count Dracula ,  hannibal   lecter  , Doctor Doom ,  और   darth   vader   ,   भी  fit this description .
मार्टिन  Luther King , Jr. Day is a United  राज्य   संघीय  holiday marking the birthday of  रेव  .  dr.  Martin Luther King , Jr  .
it  is observed on the third  सोमवार   of   जनवरी  each  साल  ,  जिससे  is around the time of King  's  birthday ,  जनवरी   15  .
the   फ्लोटिंग  holiday is similar to holidays  नियत  under the Uniform Monday  अवकाश  Act  ,  though the  अधिनियम   predated   the   स्थापना  of Martin Luther  किंग  , Jr. Day by  15   सालो   .
King was the chief spokesman for  nonviolent  activism in  the  civil rights movement  ,   जिससे   सफलतापूर्वक  protested  जातिगत   पक्षपात  in federal  और  state law .
the  campaign  लिये  a federal holiday in King 's honor began  जल्द  after his  हत्या  in  1968   .
Ronald Reagan signed the  अवकाश   into   विधि  in  1983   ,   और   it  was  पहला   observed  on January 20 ,  1986  .
At first  ,   कुछ   राज्य  resisted observing  the  holiday  as  such  ,  giving  it   वैकल्पिक  names  or  combining it with  अन्य  holidays  .
It  थी  officially observed  in  all  50  states for  the  first time  in  2000  .

As  it   's  automatic and  तत्काल  , the user does  नहीं  have to use  a  cable or removable media  to  connect  to   a   निजी  computer  .

Since early in  the  21st century the  बहुमत   of  mobile phones  in   उपयोग  are  कैमरा  phones .
Most camera phones are simpler than separate  डिजिटल  cameras .
Their usual  फिक्स्ड   फ़ोकस   lenses  and smaller  सेंसर   सीमा  their performance  in   ग़रीब  lighting  .
lacking  a  शारीरिक   शटर  , most  have  a  long   शटर   lag   .
Flash  ,   जहाँ  present ,  is  usually  कमजोर   .
ऑप्टिकल   जूम   और  tripod screws  हैं   विरल  .
कुछ   भी  lack a USB connection , removable  मेमोरी  card ,  or   अन्य  way of transferring  उनके  pictures more quickly than by the phone 's  अंतर्निहित   संचार  feature .
कुछ  of the  अधिक   महंगी  camera phones have only  a  few of these  तकनीकी  disadvantages ,  जिससे   लागू   सबसे  acutely  in  low light conditions and in  कोई  case  have  not inhibited their widespread use .
सबसे  model  लाइनों  improve  in   ये  regards every  साल   or  two .
Some  ,  such  as   the  Droid Incredible only have a  मेनू   चुनाव  to start an application program to activate  the  camera .
अन्य  , such  as   the  BlackBerry Storm 2  ,   droid  X ,  मोटोरोला  V980 and Nokia 5800 also  have  a separate camera  बटन  for  quickness  and  convenience   .
Windows Phones can  be   विन्यस्त  to  operate  as  a  camera even  if   the   फोन   is  asleep  .
कुछ   कैमरा   फोन  are  designed  to resemble separate  low-end  digital compact  कैमरे  in appearance and  to  some extent in features and picture quality ,  और  are  ब्रांडेड   as  both mobile  फोन   और   कैमरे   ,  including certain Sony phones  .
The  प्रिंसिपल  advantages of camera  फोन   हैं   लागत   और  compactness  ;   बेशक   लिये  a  उपयोक्ता  who  carries  a mobile phone  वैसे   ,  the additional  आकार  and cost are negligible  .
Smartphones  कि   हैं  camera  फोन   may  run mobile applications to  add   सामर्थ्य   ऐसे  as  geotagging   और  image  stitching  .
A few high end  फोन   can   उपयोग  their touch screen to  सीधा   उनके  camera to  फ़ोकस   on  a  particular  object in  the  field of  दृश्य  ,  giving  even  an  inexperienced  उपयोक्ता   a  degree of focus  कंट्रोल  exceeded  तभी  by seasoned  फ़ोटोग्राफ़र   using  manual focus .
``  Whatever  happened   to  the  man  of Tomorrow  ?  '' is a 1986 comic  किताब  story  featuring  the  dc  Comics  अक्षर  of Superman .
Written  by   एलन   मूर   साथ  help from long-time , and  जल्द  to be  retiring   ,   सुपरमैन   एडिटर  , Julius  schwartz  ,  the  story  थी   प्रकाशित  in two parts  ,  beginning in  सुपरमैन   #  423  और   समाप्ति   in   कार्रवाई   कॉमिक्स  # 583 ,  दोनो   प्रकाशित  in  सितंबर   1986   .
The story  थी   drawn  by  long-time  artist Curt Swan , in his final  प्रमुख   योगदान  to the Superman titles  ,   और  was inked by  जार्ज  Pérez in the issue of  सुपरमैन  and Kurt Schaffenberger in  the  issue of  कार्रवाई  Comics  .
The story was  an   काल्पनिक  tale which  बताई  the final  स्टोरी  of  the   चांदी   आयु   सुपरमैन   और  his long history , which was  होने   rebooted   following   the  events of  संकट   on  Infinite Earths ,  पहले   उसके  modern introduction in  the   जॉन  Byrne series  ,  The Man of Steel .
Moore  चाही  his  प्लाट  to honor  the   long   इतिहास  of  the  character  और  to serve as a  पूरा  conclusion to  उसके  mythology .
the  story is  a  frame story set ten years  बाद  Superman  थी   पिछला  seen  ,  where Lois Lane  recounts   the  tale  of   the   समाप्त  of Superman 's career  to  a reporter from  the  Daily Planet .
Her story includes numerous  हिंसक  attacks against  सुपरमैन  by his enemies  ,  the public  रहस्योद्घाटन  of his secret  पहचान  of Clark Kent  और  a  क्रमांक  of deaths of  those  closest to him  .
The  स्टोरी  has been cited  as  one  of   the  best stories of  the   अक्षर  of Superman  ,  and critics  और   ऑडियंस   अक्सर   चुनें  it as one of the most memorable comics ever  प्रकाशित   .
It is  प्रयुक्त  as an example  of  how  to   बंद  the  long-time  continuity  of   a  comic  किताब  character  .
The  स्टोरी   's  legacy has  endured  with  समान  stories written as  श्रद्धांजलि   to   it  .
The title is a reference to one of  the   nicknames  of Superman as the  man  of Tomorrow , and  थी  used in the title of another Superman .
The Bugatti  veyron  EB 16.4  is   a  mid-engined  ग्रैंड  touring car ,  designed  and  विकसित  by  the  Volkswagen  समूह   और   manufactured  in  molsheim   ,   फ़्रांस   by  Bugatti Automobiles  s.a.s  .
the  Super  खेल  version  of   the  Veyron is the fastest street-legal production  car  in  the  world  ,   साथ  a top speed of .
The original  संस्करण  has a top speed  of   .
it   थी   नामित  Car of the  दशक  ( 2000–2009 )  by   the  BBC  टेलीविज़न   कार्यक्रम  Top Gear  .
the  standard Veyron  जीती  Top Gears Best  car   चलित  All Year  पुरस्कार   in  2005  .
On  6  April  2013  ,  bugatti  set the  रिकार्ड  for the fastest  roadster  in  the  world with  the   veyron   ग्रैंड   खेल   vitesse  ,  reaching   on   औसत   a  top speed  of  .
the  Veyron  's  chief designer  थी   hartmut  Warkuss ,  और  the exterior was designed  by  Jozef  kabaň  of  volkswagen  , with much of  the  engineering  कार्य  being conducted under the  मार्गदर्शन  of  अभियान्त्रिकी   मुख्य  Wolfgang  schreiber  .

The institution  of  the  eucharist   रै  been a key theme  in  the depictions of the Last Supper  in  Christian  आर्ट   ,  as in  इस   16th-century  Juan de Juanes painting .
``  At the Last Supper , on the night  he  was betrayed  ,   हमारी  Savior instituted  the  Eucharistic sacrifice of  उसके  Body and Blood  .  ''
( Catechism  of  the Catholic Church 1323  )
eucharist  in the  कैथोलिक  Church refers to  दोनो   the   जश्न   of  the  द्रव्यमान  ,  कि  is  ,   the  Eucharist liturgy , and the bread and  वाइन  which after the  प्रतिष्ठापना   हैं   transubstantiated  ( changed in  पदार्थ  ) into the body and blood of  यीशु  Christ ,  रब   और  God  ,   a  declaration formulated by the Council  of   ट्रेंट  with  an  anathema against anyone who denied this .
धन्य   sacrament  is a devotional term used in the Roman  कैथोलिक  Church to  refer  to the Eucharistic species ( the Body  और  Blood  of   मसीह   )  .
