A short story  is  a  ब्रैड   कार्य   of  literature , usually  लिखा  in narrative prose .
Emerging from earlier oral storytelling  परंपराओं   in   the  17th century  ,   the  short  स्टोरी  has grown to  encompass  a  देह   of   कार्य   so   विविध   as  to defy easy characterization .
At  इसके   सबसे   prototypical  the  छोटी  story  सुविधाएँ  a small cast of named  वर्ण  ,  और  focuses  on  a self-contained  घटना  with the  intent  of  evoking  a `` single effect '' or  मनोदशा   .
in  so doing ,  छोटी   कहानियां  make use  of   प्लाट  ,  अनुनाद   ,  and  अन्य   डायनेमिक  components  to  a far  वृहद  degree than is typical of an anecdote ,  yet   to   a  far  lesser  degree  than  a  अनोखा  .
While the  छोटी   स्टोरी   is   largely  distinct from the  अनोखा  ,  लेखक   of  both generally  चित्रण   इससे  a  आम   पूल   of  literary  तकनीकों  .
Short stories  have  no set length .
in  terms  of   शब्द  count  वहीँ  is  no  official  demarcation  between  an  anecdote  ,  a short story  ,  and a novel  .
Rather  ,  the  रूप  's  पैरामीटर्स  are given by the rhetorical  और  practical context in  जिससे  a given  स्टोरी  is  उत्पादित  and considered , so that  कया  constitutes a short story  may   differ  between genres  ,  countries  ,   eras   ,   और   टीकाकारों  .
Like the novel ,  the   छोटी  story 's  predominant  shape reflects  the  demands of the  उपलब्धियाँ  markets  लिये  publication  ,  and the  एवोल्यूशन   of  the form seems  closely   tied   to   the   एवोल्यूशन   of  the publishing industry  और   the  submission  दिशानिर्देश   of   इसके  constituent houses .
The  छोटी   स्टोरी  has been  माना  both  an   शिक्षुता  form  preceding  more  lengthy  works ,  और  a crafted  रूप   in   इसके   अपना  right , collected  साथ   in  books of  समान   लंबाई  , price  ,  and distribution  as  novels  .
Short  स्टोरी  writers may define  उनके  works as part of the artistic  और  personal expression of the form .
They  may  also attempt to  resist   categorization  by genre  और   फिक्स्ड  form .
Area codes  in  Michigan
क्षेत्रफल   कोड   810  is the telephone area  कोड  serving  पूर्वी  Michigan  .
The  raccoon  ( , Procyon lotor  )  ,  sometimes  spelled racoon  ,   भी  known as the common raccoon , North American  raccoon  , northern raccoon and  colloquially   as  coon , is a medium-sized mammal native to North America  .
The  raccoon  is the  largest  of the  procyonid   परिवार  , having  a  body length  of   और  a  देह  weight  of  .
इसके  grayish  कोट   ज़्यादातर  consists of dense underfur which insulates against cold weather  .
Two  of  the raccoon 's  सबसे  distinctive  सुविधाएँ  are its extremely dexterous  सामने  paws  और  its  फेशियल   मुखौटा  , which  हैं  themes in the mythology  of   अनेक  Native  अमरीकी   जनजातियों  .
raccoons  are noted for their  प्रज्ञा  ,  साथ  studies showing that  वे  are  समर्थ  to  याद   the   समाधान  to  कार्य  for  up   to   तीन  years  .
The diet of the  omnivorous  raccoon , which is usually nocturnal  ,   consists   of  about 40 %  invertebrates   ,   33  % plant foods  ,  and 27  %  vertebrates .
the  original habitats of  the  raccoon  हैं  deciduous and mixed  वनों  ,  लकिन  due  to  their  adaptability  they  have  extended  उनके  range  to  mountainous  क्षेत्रों   ,   तटीय  marshes ,  और   शहरी  areas  ,  where some homeowners consider  उन्हें  to be pests  .
as  a result  of   escapes  and deliberate  introductions   in  the mid-20th century  ,  raccoons are  अभी  also distributed across the  यूरोपीय   मेनलैंड   ,   the   काकेशस  region and  जापानी  .
हालांकि   previously   विचार   to  be  एकान्त  , there is  अभी  evidence that raccoons engage in gender-specific social  बर्ताव  .
सम्बन्धित  females  प्रायः   share   a  common  क्षेत्रफल   ,  while  unrelated   males  live together in groups of up to four  पशु  to  maintain  their positions against  विदेशी  males  दौरान  the  समागम  season ,  और  other potential invaders  .
घर  range sizes  vary   anywhere  from  3   हेक्टेयर  ( 7  एकड़  ) for  महिलाओं   in   शहरों  to 50 km2  (   20  sq mi  )  for males  in   prairies  .
बाद  a gestation period  of  about 65 days , two to five young , known as  ``  kits '' ,  हैं  born  in  spring .
the   kits   हैं  subsequently raised  by  their mother  जबतक   dispersion  in late fall  .
हालांकि   खिलाते  raccoons  have   महरूम   ज्ञात  to live over  20  years  ,  their average life  प्रत्याशा  in  the  wild  is  only 1.8  to   3.1  years .
in  many  क्षेत्रों  ,  शिकार   और   vehicular   चोट  are  the   दो  most  आम  causes of  मौत  .
The  2010   हैती  earthquake  थी  a catastrophic  परिमाण   7.0  Mw earthquake ,  साथ   an   उपरिकेंद्र  near the town of  léogâne  ( Ouest Department  )  ,  लगभग  west of Port-au-Prince , Haiti  's   पूंजी   .
The earthquake occurred at 16:53 local  समय   (  21:53  utc  )  on   मंगलवार  ,  12  January 2010  .
By 24 January ,  at   तनिक   52  aftershocks measuring 4.5  or  greater  था  been  अंकित  .
An estimated  तीन   लाख   लोगों  were affected  by  the  भूकंप  .
The highest  विश्वसनीय  death count was estimated at  220,000  .
Haitian  सरकारी   estimates  were higher  .
the  government of  हैती  estimated  कि   250,000  residences and 30,000  वाणिज्यिक   इमारतें  had collapsed or were  severely  damaged  .
the  earthquake  caused  major damage in Port-au-Prince  ,  Jacmel  और   अन्य   settlements  in the region .
अनेक  notable landmark buildings  यहूद  significantly  क्षतिग्रस्त   or   नष्ट   ,   सहित   the   अध्यक्षीय  Palace  ,  the National Assembly  भवन  ,  the   port-au-prince   गिरजाघर  ,  और   the  main jail  .
Among  those  killed were Archbishop of Port-au-Prince Joseph  सर्ज   miot   ,  and opposition leader Micha  gaillard   .
the   मुख्यालय  of the  संयुक्त  Nations Stabilization  मिशन  in  हैती   (   minustah  )  ,   स्तिथ  in  the  capital , collapsed  ,   हत्या   अनेक  , including the Mission  's  Chief ,  hédi  Annabi .
अनेक  countries responded to  appeals  for humanitarian  सहायता   ,   pledging   निधि   और   dispatching  rescue and  चिकित्सा  teams , engineers  और  support personnel  .
संचार   प्रणालियों  , air  ,  land  ,  and sea transport facilities  ,   अस्पताल  , and  विद्युत  networks had  महरूम  damaged by the  भूकंप   ,  which  hampered   बचाव  and aid  प्रयत्न   ;  confusion over who  थी  in charge ,  एयर  traffic congestion ,  और  problems with prioritisation  of  flights  further  complicated early  राहत   कार्य   .
Port-au-Prince 's morgues were  अभिभूत   साथ   tens  of  हज़ारों   of   लाशें   .
ये  had to be buried in  द्रव्यमान  graves .
As  छुटकारा  tailed off  ,   आपूर्तियाँ   ,  medical care  और  sanitation  became   प्राथमिकताएं  .
Delays  in  aid  वितरण   led   to   एंग्री   appeals  from aid  मजदूर  and  survivors  , and looting and sporadic  हिंसा   यहूद   observed  .
on  22 January  the  United Nations  विख्यात  that the  आपात  phase of the relief  आपरेशन   थी  drawing to  a  close , and on the following  दिन  the Haitian government officially called off the  ढूंढें  for survivors .
मिस्टर  Ed is a  fictional  talking horse ,  originally  appearing in short stories by Walter  R.   ब्रूक्स  , and later  in  an American television  हालात   कॉमेडी   उत्पादित   by  Filmways that  पहला   aired  in  अनुप्रयोग  from  जनवरी   5  to  जुलाई   2   ,  1961 ,  और  then  on  CBS from  अक्तूबर   1   ,  1961 to February  6   ,  1966 .
The stars of  the   दिखाएँ  were Mister  ed   ,   a  palomino  घोड़ा   जो   could  `` talk '' ,  निभाई   by  gelding Bamboo  harvester  and voiced by  पूर्व   पश्चिमी  star Allan Lane  (  who  गई   uncredited  for  the   संपूर्ण  length of  the  series ) ,  और  his owner  ,  an  eccentric  and enormously  klutzy   ,  yet friendly , architect named  wilbur  Post ( Alan  यंग   )  .
much   of  the  कार्यक्रम  's  ह्यूमर  stemmed from  the   फैक्ट  Mister  ed  would  बोलो  only to Wilbur ,  as   खूब  as  ed   's   सुर्खी  as  a  troublemaker .
अन्य   कार्यशील  jokes centered  on  Wilbur  's  character  होने  a huge  klutz   और   inadvertently  causing harm  to  himself  or  others .
According to the show  's  producer , Arthur Lubin  ,   यंग  was chosen as  the  lead character because  he   ``   बस   लगा  like the sort  of   guy   a   घोड़ा   होता  talk to '' .
Lubin , a friend  of   mae  West  ,  scored a coup  by   persuading  the screen icon to guest star  in   एक   एपीसोड  .
in  the  संयुक्त  States  ,   reruns  aired on  उपनाम  at  नाइट   इससे   कूच  3  ,  1986  ,  to  फ़रवरी  1 , 1993  .
Sister station TV Land also  reran  the show  इससे  1996–98  और  again  इससे   2003-06  .
The series  is  currently broadcast every  morning   on   इस  TV , along  साथ  Highway  पैट्रोल  ,  और  The  पैटी  Duke  दिखाएँ  .
it   is  also  फिलहाल   ब्रॉडकास्ट   on  Hallmark Movie  चैनल  .
as   of   जनवरी  1 , 2011 ,  the   पहला   दो  seasons  of   the   दिखाएँ   हैं  available on Hulu .
the  Rapture is a  पद   in  Christian eschatology  जिससे   refers  to the `` being  caught   up  ''  discussed  in 1 Thessalonians  4:17   ,   जब  the `` dead  in   मसीह  '' and  ``  we who  हैं  alive and  remain  '' will  be   ``   caught  up in the clouds  ''   to   मिलें  `` the Lord  in  the air ''  .
The  पद  `` Rapture '' is  प्रयुक्त   in  at least  दो  senses  .
In the  pre-tribulation  view , a group of people  होगा  be  बाएँ  behind  on   धरती   बाद  another  समूह  literally leaves ``  to  meet the Lord in the air .  ''
This is now the  सबसे  common use of the term  ,  especially among  fundamentalist   ईसाइयों   और  in the United States .
The  अन्य  , older use of  the  term `` Rapture '' is simply as a  पर्याय  for the  फाइनल   क़यामत   generally  ,  बगैर  a belief  कि  a  समूह  of people is  बाएँ  behind on earth  लिये  an extended Tribulation  काल  after  the  events of  1  Thessalonians  4:17  .
This  भेद  is important as  कुछ   प्रकार  of  christianity   never   refer   to  `` the  rapture   ''   in  religious education  ,  but might  उपयोग   the  older and  अधिक  general sense  of   the   शब्द  `` rapture  ''   in   referring  to what happens during the  फाइनल   क़यामत  .
There  हैं   अनेक  views  among  Christians  regarding  the timing  of  Christ 's  वापसी  (  सहित  whether  it   होगा   occur   in   एक   इवेंट  or  दो  ) , and  विभिन्न  views  regarding   the  destination  of   the  aerial  महफ़िल  described in 1 Thessalonians 4  .
denominations   ऐसे   as   रोमन  Catholics , Orthodox  ईसाइयों   ,  Lutheran Christians ,  और  Reformed  ईसाइयों   मानना   in  a rapture  तभी  in  the  sense  of   a  general  फाइनल   क़यामत  ,  जब  Christ  रिटर्न  a  सिंगल   समय  .
They do not  मानना  that  a  group of  लोगों  is  बाएँ  behind  on   धरती  for  an  extended Tribulation period  बाद  the events  of  1 Thessalonians 4:17  .
Pre-tribulation rapture  धर्मशास्त्र  was developed  in   the   1830s   by   जॉन   नेल्सन  Darby and  the   plymouth   brethren   ,  and popularized in the United  राज्य   in  the  जल्दी   20th  century by  the  wide circulation of the Scofield  सन्दर्भ  Bible  .
क्रिस   नाथन   humphries  ( born February 6 ,  1985  ) is  an   अमरीकी   पेशेवर   बास्केट   खिलाड़ी  with  the   ब्रुकलीन  Nets .
the  Philistine  शहरों   of   गाजा  , Ashdod , Ashkelon , Ekron  ,  and Gath
the  Philistines  (   ,  ,  ,  or ;  ,   plištim  ) , Pleshet or Peleset ,  यहूद  a people who as part of the Sea Peoples  appeared  in the southern  तटीय   क्षेत्रफल  of  canaan   at   the  beginning  of  the Iron Age ( circa 1175 BC )  ,   सबसे  probably  इससे  the Aegean region .
According to  the   बाइबल   ,  they ruled  the  five  city-states  ( the `` Philistine Pentapolis '' ) of Gaza ,  ashkelon  ,  ashdod  ,  ekron   और   gath  , from Wadi  गाजा   in  the south to  the  Yarqon  नदी  in the  उत्तर  ,  लकिन   साथ  no  फिक्स्ड   किनारा   to   the   ईस्ट  .
The  बाइबल  paints  उन्हें  as  the  Kingdom of Israel  's  most dangerous  दुश्मन   .
Originating somewhere  in   the  Aegean  ,   उनके   जनसांख्यिकी  was around  25,000   in  the 12th century BC ,  उठती   to   a  peak of 30,000 in  the  11th  सदी  BC , of  जिससे  the Aegean  तत्व  was not more than half the total ,  और  perhaps much  कम  .
Nothing  is   ज्ञात  for certain about the original language  or  languages of the Philistines ,  however  they were not part  of  the  सामीती  Canaanite population  .
There is some limited  प्रमाण   in  favour of the assumption  कि  the  philistines  were Indo-European-speakers either from Greece and/or Luwian  अध्यक्षों  from  the  coast of  एशिया  Minor .
philistine-related   शब्द   मिला  in  the   बाइबल  are  नहीं   सामीती  , and can in  कुछ  cases ,  साथ  reservations , be traced back to Proto-Indo-European roots  .
by  the beginning of the  1st  Millennium BCE they had  अपनाया  the  सामान्य   canaanite  language  of  the region  .
The  हथियारबंद  Services Vocational Aptitude Battery ( ASVAB  )   is   a  multiple  चुनाव  test , administered  by   the   संयुक्त  States Military Entrance Processing  कमांड  , used to determine qualification  लिये  enlistment in the  संयुक्त  States  हथियारबंद  forces  .
It  is  often offered to  अमरीकी  high school  विद्यार्थी  when they are  in  the  10th  , 11th  और  12th grade ,  हालांकि  anyone eligible  लिये  enlistment  may   लो  it .
Although the test  is  administered by  the   सैन्य   ,   it   is  not (  और   never  has been ) a  आवश्यकता  that  a   test-taker  with  a  qualifying score enlist  in   the   हथियारबंद  forces  .
in  financial  हिसाब  ,  a   संतुलन  sheet  or  statement  of   वित्तीय  position  is  a summary of  the   वित्तीय   balances   of  a  एकमात्र  proprietorship , a  कारोबार   साझेदारी   ,  a corporation or  अन्य  business  संगठन   ,   ऐसे  as an LLC  or  an LLP .
Assets ,  देनदारी  and ownership equity  हैं  listed as  of  a  विशिष्ट  date  ,  such  as   the  end of its  वित्तीय   साल  .
a   संतुलन  sheet is  प्रायः   वर्णित  as  a  ``  स्नैपशॉट  of a  कम्पनी   's   वित्तीय   कंडीशन   ''  .
Of the  चार  basic  वित्तीय   कथन  , the  संतुलन  sheet  is  the only statement  जिससे   applies  to a single point  in   समय  of a business  '   पंचांग   साल   .
A  मानक  company balance sheet has  तीन  parts  :   एसेट   ,  liabilities  और  ownership  इक्विटी  .
the  main categories  of   एसेट   हैं  usually listed first , and typically in order  of  liquidity .
एसेट  are  followed   by   the  liabilities  .
The  अंतर   between  the  एसेट  and the liabilities is known as equity  or   the  net assets or the  जाल   लायक  or capital of  the  company and according to the accounting equation  ,  net  लायक  must  बराबर   एसेट  minus liabilities  .
another   रास्ता  to  dekh  at the same  समीकरण   is  that assets equals  देनदारी   प्लस   मालिक   's   इक्विटी  .
Looking  at   the  equation in this  रास्ता  shows  कैसा  assets were financed :  either  by borrowing money (  देयता   )  or  by   using  the owner 's money ( owner 's  इक्विटी  )  .
Balance  चादरें   हैं  usually  प्रस्तुत   साथ  assets  in  one section and  देनदारी  and net worth  in  the  अन्य  section  साथ   the   दो  sections `` balancing  .  ''
A business  ऑपरेटिंग   entirely  in cash can  माप  its  profits   by   withdrawing  the entire  बैंको  balance at the end of the period  ,   प्लस  any cash in  हाथ   .
However , many  व्यवसायों  are not paid  तत्काल  ; they build up inventories of  goods  and they acquire buildings and  उपकरण  .
in   अन्य   शब्द   :  businesses have  एसेट  and  so  they  can  not , even  if  they want to , immediately  फेरे  these  into  cash at  the   समाप्त   of  each period .
Often  ,  these businesses  owe   धन  to  आपूर्तिकर्ता  and  to  tax authorities ,  और  the proprietors  do  not withdraw all  उनके   असली   पूंजी  and  profits  at the  समाप्त   of  each  काल  .
In  अन्य  words businesses  भी   have  liabilities  .
.17 Hornady Magnum Rimfire  ,  commonly  ज्ञात   as  the .17  hmr  , is  a  rimfire  राइफल   कार्ट्रिज   विकसित   by   the  ammunition company Hornady  in  2002 .
it  descended from the .22 Magnum  by   necking  down  the  .22 Magnum  मामला  to  लो  a .17 caliber ( 4.5 mm  )  bullet , and it is more costly to  shoot   than   परंपरागत   .22  caliber  rimfire   कारतूस  .
commonly  loaded with a  17  grain (  1.1   g  )  गोली  , it can  उद्धार  muzzle  गतियाँ  in excess  of  2550 ft/s (  775   m/s  ) .
The Schaumburg Flyers were  a  professional  बेसबॉल   टोली  based in Schaumburg  ,  Illinois , in  the  United  राज्य  .
The Flyers  यहूद  to  be  a charter  सदस्य  of the  उत्तर  American League , which is not affiliated  साथ  Major  लीग  Baseball ,  however  ,  the  team folded  in   कूच  2011  ,   पहले  they began play in  the  NAL .
From the  1999  season to the 2010  ऋतु  ,  the  Flyers played  उनके  home games at Alexian Field ,  निकट   the   एल्गिन  O'Hare Expressway  .
the   टोली   formerly  played in  थंडर  Bay ,  ओंटारियो   ,   जहाँ   वे  were known  as   the  Thunder  खाड़ी   whiskey  Jacks .
the   टोली   थी  originally  a  member  of   the   उत्तरी  League from 1993 to 2010  .
On  जुलाई  27  ,  2009  ,  the Flyers played host to  बैटल  of  the   लिंगों   ii   ,   जिससे   pitted  the Flyers  विरूद्ध  the National Pro Fastpitch  सॉफ्टबॉल   champions   ,  the Chicago Bandits  .
Played  by  official softball rules ,  the  game  थी  seen by an overflow  रिकार्ड  crowd of  8,918   ,   और   थी  won by  the  Bandits 4-2 .
In 1999  ,  the  flyers   नियुक्त   उनके  first  मैनेजर   ,  Ron Kittle .
Kittle  is  best known  लिये  his playing days with the  शिकागो  White Sox , and  पूर्व  Chicago Cubs  और  White  sox  player Greg Hibbard was  the  pitching coach .
दौरान   the   जल्दी  years  of   the   मताधिकार  , Kittle  किया   a  series of  tv   commercials  to  प्रचार  the team ,  using  the  gimmick  `` Ma  kittle  . ''  जहाँ  he played both himself and  उसके  `` Ma . ''
the   विज्ञापन  were successful at  sparking  some initial  ब्याज  in  the  team as  the   flyers  hoped to  चोरी  away fans from the  आसपास  Kane  काउंटी  Cougars .
The ad mimicked the highly  कामयाब   converse  ads  जहाँ   लैरी  Johnson  स्ट्रक्चर   as   दोनो  himself and ``  gramama   .   ''
At the end of the 2001  ऋतु   ,   however   ,  Kittle resigned from his  managerial  position ,  और  Jim  boynewicz  was hired  to  replace him  .
in   2004   ,  the  flyers  made it  to   the  Northern League Championship Series against  the  St. Paul Saints .
Despite leading the  five-game  series  2-1  , Schaumburg  आखिरकार  lost the series .
In  खेल   5   ,  Flyers relief pitcher Lyle Prempas allowed  a   खेल  winning  ग्रैंड  slam by St. Paul infielder Marc Mirizzi in  the   नवीं   inning   .
the   flyers   appeared   in  the  उत्तरी   लीग  Playoffs four  टाइम्स  (  1999  ,  2003  , 2004  ,   2006   )  but  never   जीती  the  चैंपियनशिप  .
Some  प्रसिद्ध   खिलाड़ी  who  निभाई  for the  flyers   यहूद   पूर्व  Oakland A 's  outfielder  Ozzie  canseco   और  former Chicago Cubs  outfielder  Dwight  स्मिथ  .
Rachel Hannah Weisz  (   /  vice /  ;  born  7   कूच  1970  )  is an English film and theatre  अभिनेत्री  and former fashion model  .
Weisz began  उसके  acting  करियर   at   ट्रिनिटी  Hall ,  कैम्ब्रिज  in  the  early 1990s  ,  then  प्रारंभ   working  in television , appearing in Inspector  मोर्स  , the  अंग्रेजों  mini-series  स्कारलेट  and Black  ,   और  the television film Advocates II  .
वो  made her  फिल्मी   début   in  the film Death  यंत्र  ( 1994 )  ,   लकिन  her breakthrough role came in  the  film  कड़ी   प्रतिक्रिया  ( 1996 ) , leading to a high-profile role  as   एवलिन  Carnahan-O'Connell in  the   films  The Mummy ( 1999 ) and The Mummy Returns  (  2001 )  .
अन्य   notable  films featuring  वाइज़  are Enemy at  the  Gates ,  परिचय  a Boy  ,  Constantine , The  फव्वारा  and The Constant  माली  ,  लिये  which she received  an  Academy  पुरस्कार   ,  a Golden  ग्लोब   और   a  Screen Actors  '  Guild  पुरस्कार  for her supporting  भूमिका  as  टेसा   quayle   .
She has been  labelled  an `` English rose '' since her minor  भूमिका  in  चोरी   सौंदर्य   (  1996 ) .
वाइज़   भी  works in theatre .
Her  स्टेज   भेदन   थी  the  1994  revival of Noël  कायर  's play Design  लिये   जीना   ,  which earned her the London Critics  वृत्त   पुरस्कार  for  the  most promising newcomer  .
Weisz 's performances also include  the  1999  donmar   गोदाम   उत्पादन  of Tennessee Williams ' Suddenly  ,   पिछला   गर्मियाँ   ,  and their 2009  पुनरुद्धार   of  A Streetcar  नामित   ख्वाहिश   .
Her portrayal of  blanche   dubois   in   the   latter  play  अर्जित  her the Critics  '  Circle Theatre Award  लिये   बेहतरीन  Actress .
वो  has recently  निभाई  Evanora  in  Oz the  ग्रेट  and  शक्तिशाली   .
the  American  सिविल  War  (  ACW  )   ,  also known  as   the   युद्ध   between  the  राज्य  or  बस  the  सिविल   युद्ध  (  देखिए  naming ) ,  थी  a civil  युद्ध  fought  इससे   1861  to  1865  between  the  United  राज्य  (  the   ``  Union ''  or  the `` North  ''  ) and  अनेक  Southern slave states  कि   घोषित   उनके  secession  और   formed   the  Confederate States of  अमेरिका  ( the  ``  Confederacy  ''   or   the  `` South  ''  ) .
the  war  था   इसके   उत्पत्ति  in the issue  of  slavery  ,  especially the extension  of   गुलामी  into  the   पश्चिमी  territories .
विदेशी  powers  किया  not  intervene   .
बाद   चार  years of  खूनी  combat that  बाएँ  over  600,000  soldiers  मुर्दे  and destroyed much of the South  's  infrastructure  ,  the Confederacy  collapsed   ,  slavery  थी   abolished  ,  और   the   मुश्किल  Reconstruction  प्रक्रम  of restoring national  एकता  and  guaranteeing   अधिकारों  to the freed  स्लेव  began  .
In the  1860  presidential  चुनाव   ,  Republicans , led  by  Abraham Lincoln  ,  opposed  expanding   गुलामी   into  United  राज्य  '  territories  .
Lincoln won , but before his  उद्घाटन  on March 4  ,  1861 ,  सात   cotton-based  slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic  अध्यक्ष  James  बुकानन   और  the incoming Republicans rejected  secession   as   illegal  .
lincoln  's  inaugural  address  घोषित  his administration  होता  not initiate civil war .
Eight  बाकी   स्लेव  states  जारी  to reject  काल्स   लिये  secession .
confederate  forces seized numerous federal forts within  territory  claimed  by  the Confederacy .
a  Peace  सम्मेलन  failed to  ढूँढें   a   सुलह   ,  and both sides prepared for  युद्ध   .
The  confederates  assumed  कि  European countries  यहूद  so dependent on  ``   किंग  Cotton  ``  that they  होता   intervene  ;  none  did  और  none recognized the new  confederate   राज्य  of  अमेरिका  .
hostilities  began on April  12  , 1861 , when  confederate   शक्तियां  fired  upon   फोर्ट   sumter  , a key  फोर्ट  held by Union troops in  दक्षिण   कैरोलिना  .
Lincoln called  लिये  each  राज्य   to  provide troops to retake the fort  ;  consequently , four more  स्लेव   राज्य  joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union  जल्द  controlled  the  border states and established  a   नवल  blockade that crippled the  दक्षिणी   अर्थव्यवस्था   .
The  पूर्वी   थिएटर  was inconclusive  in  1861–62  .
The autumn  1862  Confederate  अभियान   into   मेरीलैंड  (  a  Union state ) ended with Confederate  रिट्रीट  at the  बैटल  of  antietam  ,  dissuading  British  हस्तक्षेप  .
lincoln  issued the Emancipation Proclamation  ,   जिससे  made ending  गुलामी   a  war goal .
to  the  वेस्ट  ,  by  summer 1862 the  संघ  destroyed  the   confederate  river  नेवी  , then much of their western armies  ,  and  the  Union  at  Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at  the   मिसिसिपी  River  .
In  1863  , Robert  E.   ली  's  confederate  incursion north  ended  at the Battle of Gettysburg  .
Western successes led to Ulysses S.  ग्रान्ट  command of  सब   संघ   सेना  in  1864  .
In the Western  थिएटर  , William T. Sherman drove east  to   कैप्चर  Atlanta and marched  to  the sea , destroying  confederate   अवसंरचना   साथ  the way .
The Union  marshaled  the resources and manpower to attack  the  Confederacy  इससे  all  दिशानिर्देश  , and  could  afford to  लड़ो   लड़ाइयों   of  attrition through the  overland   अभियान  towards  रिचमंड  , the Confederate  पूंजी  .
The  defending  Confederate  फौज  failed , leading to  ली  's surrender to  ग्रान्ट   at  Appomattox  अदालत  House  on  April 9  ,  1865  .
the  American Civil War was one of the earliest true  औद्योगिक  wars .
railroads  ,  the  telegraph  ,  steamships  ,   और   mass-produced  weapons  यहूद   employed  extensively .
The mobilization of  civilian   कारखानों   ,   खानों   ,   shipyards   ,  banks , transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
it   remains  the  deadliest  war in  अमरीकी  history  ,  resulting  in   the   मौतों   of  an  अनुमानित  750,000 soldiers and  an  undetermined  क्रमांक   of   civilian   हताहत  .
Historian  जॉन  Huddleston estimates the  मौत  toll at  टेन  percent of  सब  Northern males  20–45   सालो  old  ,   और  30  प्रतिशत   of  all Southern white  males  aged  18–40  .
Potato  ब्रैड   is  a  रूप   of  bread  in  which potato  replaces   a   portion  of the  नियमित  wheat  आटा  .
It is  पकाया  in  a   किस्में  of methods ,  सहित   by  baking it  on  a  hot  griddle or  पण   ,  or in  an  oven  .
It may be leavened  or   unleavened  ,  और   may  have a variety  of   अन्य  ingredients  baked   into  it .
the  ratio of  आलू  to  गेहूं  flour varies significantly from  रेसिपी  to  रेसिपी  , with  कुछ  recipes having  a  majority  of   आलू  , and others  having  a majority  of  wheat flour .
Some  व्यंजनों  call for mashed potatoes  ,  with  अन्य   कॉलिंग   लिये   निर्जलित   आलू  flakes  .
it  is  उपलब्धियाँ  as a commercial product in  अनेक  countries  ,   साथ  similar variations in ingredients , cooking method  ,  and  अन्य   परिवर्तनीय   .
The  प्रशांत   समय  Zone  observes  standard time  by  subtracting  आठ  hours from Coordinated  सार्वभौमिक   समय  (  )  .
The clock time in  इस   मण्डल   is  based on  the   औसत  solar time  of  the  120th  meridian west  of   the  Greenwich Observatory .
During daylight saving time  ,  its time  ऑफसेट  is  .
in  the  संयुक्त  States  और   कनाडा   ,   इस  time  मण्डल  is generically called  प्रशांत   समय   (  PT  )  .
Specifically  ,  it  is   प्रशांत   मानक  Time  (   pst  )  जब   observing   मानक   समय  (  शीत   )  ,  और   प्रशांत  Daylight Time ( PDT  )  when observing  daylight   छायांकन  time  (  summer  )   .
सबसे  of Canada uses daylight saving time .
in   मैक्सिको   the  UTC−8 time  मण्डल   is  known as the  उत्तरपश्चिम  Zone , which  is  synchronized  साथ  the  u.S.   पीडीटी  daylight saving  अनुसूची   .
the  largest  नगर   in   the   प्रशांत  Time Zone  is   लॉस   एंजिल्स  in California from USA ; the city 's metropolitan area is  the  largest in the zone .
The zone is one hour ahead  of  the Alaska Time Zone  ,   एक  hour behind the Mountain Time  मण्डल  and three  घंटों   पीछे  the Eastern Time  मण्डल   .
स्टीरियो   8   ,   commonly  known  as   the  eight-track cartridge , eight-track tape ,  or   बस  eight-track ,  is   a   चुम्बकीय  tape sound  रिकॉर्डिंग  technology .
it   थी  popular in the United  राज्य  from the mid-1960s through to the early 1980s ,  लकिन  was relatively unknown in many  यूरोपीय  countries .
It was ,  however  , very popular  in  the  संयुक्त   किंगडम   दौरान  this period  .
Stereo  8   थी   निर्मित  in  1964   by  a consortium led  by  Bill  lear   of   lear   जेट  Corporation , along  साथ   ampex   ,   घाट   मोटर   कम्पनी   ,   सामान्य   मोटर्स  , Motorola  ,   और  RCA Victor Records  (  RCA )  .
It was  a  further development of  the   समान  Stereo-Pak four-track  कार्ट्रिज   निर्मित  by  अर्ल  `` Madman  ''  Muntz  .
a  later quadraphonic  संस्करण  of the format  थी  announced by  आरसीए  in April 1970  और   पहला   ज्ञात   as   quad-8  , then later  बदला  to just Q8  .
Ramesses  ii  (  1303   bc   –  July  or  August 1213 BC  ;  Egyptian  :   ,   alternatively  transcribed  as  Rameses and Ramses or ) , referred to  as   रामेसेस  the  ग्रेट  , was the third Egyptian  pharaoh   (  reigned  1279   bc  – 1213 BC )  of   the  Nineteenth dynasty .
He is  प्रायः  regarded  as  the greatest , most  मनाये  ,  और  most powerful pharaoh of the  मिश्र  Empire  .
उसके   successors  and later  उन्होंने   पुकारा  him the ``  ग्रेट  Ancestor . ''
Ramesses II led several  सैन्य   रिझाने  into the Levant , re-asserting Egyptian control over Canaan  .
He also led expeditions to the south , into Nubia ,  commemorated   in   inscriptions   at  Beit el-Wali and  gerf   hussein  .
At age fourteen  ,  Ramesses was appointed Prince Regent  by   उसके  father Seti I .
he  is believed to  have  taken  the   सिंहासन  in  उसके  late teens and is  ज्ञात   to   have   शासित   मिश्र   इससे   1279  BC to  1213  BC  लिये  66  सालो  and 2  महीने   ,   according   to   दोनो   manetho  and  मिश्र  's contemporary  ऐतिहासिक   रिकॉर्ड  .
he  was  एकबार  said to  have   जिया  to be 99 years old  ,   लकिन  it is more likely that  he  died in  उसके   90th  or 91st year .
if   he   became   pharaoh  in 1279 BC  as  most Egyptologists today  मानना   ,   he  would have assumed the  सिंहासन  on May  31  , 1279  bc   ,   आधारित   on  his known  accession  date  of   iii  Shemu  दिन   27   .
रामेसेस  II celebrated  an  unprecedented 14  sed   त्यौहार   (   the  first held  बाद  thirty  सालो  of a  pharaoh   's   शासनकाल   ,   और   तब  every  तीन   सालो  ) during  उसके   reign—more  than any other pharaoh  .
On his  मौत  , he  थी  buried  in   a  tomb in the Valley of  the   किंग्स  ; his body was later  स्थानांतरित  to a royal cache  जहाँ  it was discovered in 1881  ,  and  is  now  on  display in  the  Cairo Museum .
the  early part of his  शासनकाल  was focused on  भवन  cities  ,  temples and  स्मारक   .
he  established the city of Pi-Ramesses in  the  Nile Delta  as  his  नई  capital and main base  लिये  his  अभियान  in Syria .
This  नगर   थी  built on  the  remains  of  the city of  avaris  , the capital of  the   हिक्सोस   जब   वे  took  over  ,  और   थी  the location  of  the main Temple of Set  .
he   is   भी   ज्ञात   as  Ozymandias in the Greek  स्त्रोत  , from  a  transliteration  into  Greek of  a  part of Ramesses  's   सिंहासन  name  ,  , ``  ra   's  mighty truth  ,  chosen of Ra  ''  .
The Texas Rangers are  a  professional baseball team located  in  the  dallas-fort  Worth  metroplex   ,   आधारित   in  Arlington  ,  Texas  .
The Rangers franchise is currently a member  of  the Western Division of  प्रमुख   लीग  Baseball 's American League .
Since ,  the   रेंजरों   have   निभाई   in  Rangers  ballpark  in  आर्लिंगटन  in  आर्लिंगटन  , Texas .
The  टोली  's  नाम  is  उधार   इससे   the  famous law enforcement  एजेंसी  of the same  नाम  .
The franchise  थी  established in 1961 by the name  of  the Washington  सीनेटरों  ,  an   विस्तार  team  awarded  to  वॉशिंगटन  , D.C.  ,  after the city 's first  ballclub  , the original  वॉशिंगटन  Senators , moved to Minnesota and  became   the  Twins  .
After  the   ऋतु   ,  the new Senators moved  to   आर्लिंगटन  ,  टेक्सास  ,  और  debuted as  the   रेंजरों   the  following  वसन्त   .
The  टेक्सास  Rangers Baseball  क्लबों  has made six appearances in  the  MLB  postseason  , all  following   प्रभाग   championships  , in  1996   ,  1998  ,   1999   ,   2010  ,  2011  and  2012  .
In 2010 , the Rangers advanced past  the   प्रभाग  Series for the first time  ,  defeating  the   tampa   खाड़ी  Rays .
Texas then brought home their  पहला  American League  pennant   बाद   धड़कन   the  New  यॉर्क  Yankees in six  खेल   .
In the 2010  संसार   श्रेणी  ,  the  franchise  's  first , the Rangers  गिरी   to  the San  फ्रांसिस्को   दिग्गज  in five  खेल   .
Their lone  विजय  made them the  पहला   टेक्सास   टोली   to  win a World  श्रेणी  game ,  the   ह्यूस्टन  Astros  having   महरूम   swept   in  their 2005 World Series appearance  .
वे  repeated as American League  champions  the following  साल  ,  तब   खोया   the  2011  संसार  Series  to  the St. Louis Cardinals in  सात  games .
Gaius  जूलियस   सीज़र  ( , July 100 BC  –  15 March  44  BC )  थी  a Roman general , statesman ,  कौंसुल  and  notable   लेखक  of Latin  गद्य  .
he  played  a  critical  भूमिका   in  the  कार्यक्रम   कि   led  to the demise  of  the  रोमन   गणतंत्र   और  the rise  of   the  Roman  साम्राज्य  .
in  60  bc  ,  सीज़र  , Crassus and Pompey  formed  a  राजनैतिक  alliance  कि   थी  to dominate Roman  राजनीती  for several years .
Their  कोशिशें  to  amass  power through populist  tactics  were opposed by the  रूढ़िवादी  elite within the  रोमन  Senate , among them  केटो  the Younger with  the  frequent support of Cicero .
Caesar  's  conquest of Gaul , completed by 51  bc  , extended  रोम   's  territory  to   the   अंग्रेज़ी   चैनल   और  the  राइन   .
Caesar  became   the   पहला  Roman general to cross both when  he  built  a  bridge across the Rhine and conducted the first invasion of Britain .
ये  achievements  granted  him  बेमेल   सैन्य   शक्ति   और   threatened   to  eclipse the  खड़ा  of Pompey , who had realigned himself with the  सीनेट  after  the   मौत  of Crassus in 53  bc  .
With  the  Gallic  युद्धों  concluded , the Senate ordered  सीज़र   to  lay down his  सैन्य  command  और   वापसी  to  रोम   .
सीज़र  refused , and  चिह्नित   उसके   defiance  in  49   bc   by   क्रासिंग   the  Rubicon  साथ  a legion  ,   leaving  his  प्रांत  and illegally entering  रोमन  territory  अंतर्गत   बाहें   .
Civil  युद्ध   resulted   ,   इससे  which  he  emerged as  the   unrivaled   नेता   of   रोम   .
After assuming  कंट्रोल  of government , Caesar  began  a program  of   सोशल   और  governmental reforms  ,  including the  सृष्टि   of   the  Julian  पंचांग  .
He  केंद्रीकृत   the  bureaucracy of the  गणतंत्र  and was eventually proclaimed  ``  dictator in perpetuity '' .
But the  underlying  political conflicts had  नहीं   महरूम   resolved   ,  and on the  ides  of  कूच  ( 15 March ) 44 BC ,  सीज़र  was  assassinated   by  a  समूह   of   सीनेटरों  led by Marcus Junius Brutus .
a   नई  series  of  civil  युद्धों  broke out ,  और  the  संवैधानिक   सरकारी  of the  गणतंत्र   थी   never  restored  .
Caesar  's  adopted  वारिस  Octavian , later  ज्ञात   as  Augustus ,  रोज़  to sole  शक्ति   ,  and the era  of   the   रोमन  Empire began  .
Much of  सीज़र   's  life is known  इससे   उसके  own  खाते   of   उसके  military  अभियान  ,  और  from  अन्य   समकालीन  sources  ,   मुख्यतः   the  letters and speeches of  सिसरो   और  the historical  कृतियाँ  of  sallust   .
The later  biographies  of  सीज़र  by  suetonius  and Plutarch are  भी  major  स्त्रोत  .
Caesar  is  deemed to be  एक  of the  महानतम   सैन्य  commanders of history .
Linguistic map  of   सीरियल  ,  कैमरून   ,  and Benin .
Sign in  अंग्रेज़ी   ,   बाहर   the  University  of   लागोस
वहीँ  are hundreds of  भाषाएं  spoken in  सीरियल  .
The  प्रमुख  languages are Yoruba , Hausa  ,   इग्बो  ,  ईदो   ,   fulfulde  ,  कनूरी   ,  and Ibibio .
The official language  of   सीरियल   ,  English ,  the   पूर्व  colonial language ,  थी   चुनी  to  सुकर  the  सांस्कृतिक   और   भाषाई   एकता   of   the   देश   .
English ,  however   ,   remains   an   विशेष   बचाना  of the  देश   's  urban elite , and is  नहीं  widely spoken  in   ग्रामीण  areas ,  जिससे   comprise  three quarters of  the  countries  जनसांख्यिकी  .
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is  a  microcosm of Africa as a  पूरे  , encompassing three  प्रमुख   अफ़्रीकी  languages  परिवारों  : Afroasiatic ,  nilo-saharan  ,  और   niger–congo   .
सीरियल  also has several  as-yet  unclassified languages , such as Cen Tuum , which  may  represent a  relic  of an even greater  विविधता   prior   to  the  स्प्रेड  of the  वर्तमान   भाषा  families  .
Daucus carota  (   आम   names   शामिल  wild carrot  ,  (  uk   )  bird 's nest ,  बिशप  's lace  ,  and Queen  ऐनी   's  lace ( North America ) )  is  a flowering plant in the family  apiaceae   ,  native to  शीतोष्ण  regions of Europe ,  दक्षिणपश्चिम  Asia  और  naturalised to North America  और   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
domesticated   गाजर  are  cultivars  of a subspecies  ,   daucus  carota  subsp  . sativus .
In the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  the   शीर्षक  of federal judge  प्रायः  means a  न्यायधीश   नियुक्त  by the President  of  the  संयुक्त  States and confirmed by  the  United  राज्य   सीनेट  pursuant  to  the  नियुक्ति   clause  in  आलेख  II of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  Constitution .
In addition  to  the Supreme Court of the United States  ,  whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond  the  constitutional power of Congress  to   alter  , acts  of  Congress have  स्थापित  13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit  न्यायालयों  '' )  साथ  appellate jurisdiction over  अलग   regions  of the United States  ,  and 94 United  राज्य  district courts .
Every  न्यायधीश  appointed  to   ऐसे  a  अदालत  may  be  categorized as a  संघीय  judge ;  ऐसे  positions include  the   मुख्य   इंसाफ  and Associate Justices of  the   परम्   अदालत  , Circuit Judges  of  the courts of  appeals  , and  ज़िला  judges  of   the  United States district  न्यायालयों  .
All of  ये  judges described thus far are referred  to   sometimes   as  `` Article  iii  judges ''  क्युकी  they  कसरत  the  न्यायिक   शक्ति  vested  in   the  judicial branch  of   the  federal government  by  Article III of the U.S. Constitution .
In  जोड   ,  judges of  the  Court of International Trade exercise judicial  शक्ति   pursuant   to  Article III  .
Other judges  सेवारत  in the  संघीय  courts  ,  including  मजिस्ट्रेट  judges and  दिवालियापन   न्यायाधीशों   ,  are also sometimes  referred  to  as  ``  संघीय   न्यायाधीशों  '' ; however , they are  neither   नियुक्त  by  the  President  nor   पुष्टि   by   the   सीनेट   ,   और  their  शक्ति  derives from  आलेख   i   बजाय   .
See  आलेख  I and  आलेख   iii  tribunals .
नेल   किम   फ़र्टाडो  ( born  दिसम्बर   2  ,  1978  )  is  a Canadian singer  ,  songwriter and actress .
वो  has sold 20 million albums  विश्वव्यापी  and more  20  million singles ,  bringing  her total  बिक्री   to  over  40   लाख  records around  the   संसार   .
Furtado  पहला   gained  fame with  उसके  debut album , Whoa  ,   नेल  !
,  which spawned two  कामयाब  singles ,  ``  I  'm  Like  a  Bird `` and `` Turn Off the Light ``  .  ``
i  'm Like A  बर्ड   ''   जीती   a   2001   juno  Award for  सिंगल  of the  साल   और   a   2002  Grammy Award  लिये   बेहतरीन   मादा   पॉप   गायन   प्रदर्शन  .
In  2003  , Furtado released  लोकगीत   ,  which produced  तीन  international singles— `` Powerless  (  Say  कया  You Want  )   ``  ,  ``  Try `` and ``  força  `` .
तीन  years later she  released   ढीला   ,  a worldwide commercial success  .
The album spawned  चार   number-one  hits : `` Promiscuous  ``  , `` Maneater  ``   ,   ``  Say It  सही   ``  and  ``  All  शुभ  Things  (  Come to  an   समाप्त   )  `` .
After  a   three-year  break , she released her first full-length Spanish album , Mi Plan  ,  and  फ़र्टाडो  received a Latin Grammy for Best  मादा   पॉप   गायन  Album .
in   2012  , Furtado 's  चौथी  English-language  स्टुडियो  album  ,   the   स्पिरिट  Indestructible was  released  .
फ़र्टाडो   's  work  रै   अर्जित   उसके  numerous awards and  accolades  ,  सहित  2 Grammy Awards  ,   10   juno   पुरस्कार  , 3 MuchMusic Video Awards and a star on Canada  's  Walk of  कीर्ति   .
Creatures of the Night is the tenth  स्टुडियो  album by Kiss .
it  is  the   बैंड   's   पिछला   एल्बम   लिये   कासाब्लांका   रिकॉर्ड  , the only label the group had  कभी  recorded  लिये   at  that  पाइंट   .
the   एल्बम  was  समर्पित   to  the  मेमोरी  of Casablanca founder and early  चुंबन   समर्थक   neil   bogart   ,  who had died of cancer during  the  recording sessions .
It  is   भी  the band 's last  एल्बम  recorded with Ace Frehley credited as an  आधिकारिक   सदस्य  (  जबतक  1998 's Psycho Circus  )  ,  और  its first  एल्बम   साथ   vinnie  Vincent as  the  initially uncredited lead  guitarist  ( Vincent  होता  later  be  credited  ,   लकिन  not  प्रदर्शित   pictorially  on  the  cover , of 1985 's  reissue  of  the  album  )  .
Touch  is   a   निर्णायक  means  of  receiving information  .
इस  photo shows tactile markings  identifying  stairs  लिये  visually  impaired  people .
The  somatosensory   प्रणाली   is  a  विविध  sensory  प्रणाली  comprising  the  receptors and processing centres to  उपज  the  संवेदी   modalities  such  as   टच  , temperature  ,  proprioception  (  body position  )   ,  and nociception  (   पीड़ा  ) .
the  sensory  receptors   कवर   the   स्किन   और  epithelia  ,  skeletal muscles , bones  और  joints ,  आतंरिक   अंगों  ,  और  the cardiovascular system .
While touch  is   माना   एक   of   the  five traditional  होश   ,   the   छाप  of touch is  formed   इससे   अनेक  modalities  .
In medicine  ,   the  colloquial  पद  `` touch '' is  प्रायः  replaced  साथ  ``  दैहिक   होश   ''   to   बेहतर   प्रतिबिंबित   the  variety of mechanisms  शामिल  .
Somatic senses are  sometimes   referred  to  as   somesthetic   होश  , with the understanding  कि  somesthesis includes  टच  ,  proprioception   और   (  depending on  उपयोग  )  भी   haptic   बोध  .
the  system  प्रतिक्रियाएँ  to diverse  stimuli  using different receptors  :   thermoreceptors  ,  nociceptors  ,  mechanoreceptors  and  chemoreceptors   .
हस्तांतरण  of  सूचना  from  the  receptors passes via  संवेदी  nerves through tracts  in  the  स्पाइनल   cord  and into the brain  .
प्रसंस्करण   primarily  occurs in the  प्राथमिक  somatosensory  क्षेत्रफल   in  the parietal  पालि   of  the cerebral cortex  .
The  cortical   homunculus   थी  devised by Wilder  penfield  .
at  its simplest  ,   the   प्रणाली  works  जब  activity in  a   संवेदी   न्यूरॉन  is triggered  by  a  विशिष्ट  stimulus such as heat ; this signal  आखिरकार  passes to  an  area in the brain uniquely attributed  to   कि  area on the body—this  allows  the processed stimulus to be  लगा  at  the  correct  स्थान   .
The point-to-point mapping of the body  सतहों  in  the  brain  is   पुकारा  a  homunculus   और   is   अनिवार्य   in  the creation  of  a  देह  image  .
This  brain-surface  ( `` cortical  ''   )  map is not immutable , however  .
Dramatic shifts can  occur   in  response  to   स्ट्रोक   or  injury .
magnolia  is  a   विशाल  genus of about  210   flowering  plant  प्रजाति   in  the subfamily  magnolioideae  of  the   परिवार  Magnoliaceae .
it   is  named after  फ्रेंच  botanist  पियरे  Magnol .
Magnolia  is   an  ancient  genus  .
appearing  before bees did , the  पुष्प   विकसित  to encourage pollination  by  beetles .
To avoid  क्षति  from  pollinating   भृंग  ,  the  carpels of Magnolia flowers are  अत्यधिक  tough  .
Fossilised specimens  of  Magnolia acuminata  have  been found  डेटिंग  to  20  million  सालो  ago  ,  and of plants  identifiably  belonging  to   the  Magnoliaceae dating to 95 million  सालो  ago  .
Another aspect of Magnolias  कि  is considered to represent  an  ancestral  राज्य  is  कि   the  flower bud is enclosed  in  a  bract  rather  than   in  sepals ;  the   perianth  parts are  undifferentiated  and  पुकारा  tepals rather than distinct sepals  और   पंखुड़ियों   .
magnolia   साझा  the tepal  characteristic  with several other flowering plants near  the  base of the flowering plant  lineage  such as Amborella and  nymphaea  ( as well  as  with  अनेक   अधिक   recently  derived  पौधे   ऐसे  as Lilium  )  .
The natural  दायरा  of  magnolia   प्रजाति   is  a  disjunct  distribution  ,  with  a   प्रमुख   केन्द्र   in  east and southeast Asia and a  द्वितीयक   केन्द्र  in  पूर्वी  North America  ,   सेंट्रल   अमेरिका   ,  the  वेस्ट  Indies , and  कुछ   प्रजाति   in  South America .

``  श्वेत  Christmas '' is  an   इरविंग  Berlin  सोंग  reminiscing about  an  old-fashioned  क्रिसमस   सेटिंग   .
according   to   the  Guinness  किताब  of World Records  ,  the version  सुंग  by Bing  crosby  is  the  best-selling  सिंगल  of all time ,  साथ  estimated  बिक्री   in   excess  of  50   लाख  copies  विश्वव्यापी   .
खाते  vary as to when  और   जहाँ  Berlin  लिखा   the  song .
एक   स्टोरी  is that he wrote  it   in  1940  ,   in  warm  la   quinta  , California , while staying at the  la   quinta  Hotel , a frequent Hollywood  रिट्रीट  also favored  by  writer-producer Frank  capra   ,  although the Arizona Biltmore also claims  the   सोंग  was written there  .
He  प्रायः  stayed up  सब  night  लिखने  — he told his  सचिव   ,   ``  Grab your  कलम  and take down  इस   सोंग  .
i  just wrote the best  सोंग   i  've  कभी  written —  हेक   ,  I  बस   लिखा   the  best song  कि   anybody  's ever written !  ''
cross-country   स्कीइंग  ( or XC skiing ) is a form  of   स्की   touring  in which participants propel  themselves  across  snow-covered   मैदान   using   skis  and poles  .
the   कार्यकलाप   is  popular in many  स्थान  with  विशाल  snowfields , primarily Northern Europe  ,   कनाडा   ,  and Alaska .
Cross-country  स्कीइंग   is   भाग  of  the  Nordic skiing sport family , which  शामिल   स्की   कूद  , Nordic  संयुक्त   (  cross-country  स्कीइंग  and ski  कूद   )  , Biathlon  (   स्कीइंग   और   राइफल  marksmanship )  और  ski-orienteering (  जिससे  includes map navigation along  हिम  trails and tracks ) .
cross-country  skiing  is   the  modern style of  स्कीइंग  that most  resembles  prehistoric skiing , particularly when done  in   the  backcountry  .
It is  भी  related  to  Telemark skiing .
A  उपयोग  tax  in   संयुक्त  States is complementary to sales tax  जिससे   अर्थात्  , if you buy a  taxable  product/services without  paying   कोई  Sales  कर   to   विक्रेता  , you  owe   उपयोग  tax .
तुम   जरूर  self assess use tax and  अदा  it  सीधे  to  the  state where the  उत्पाद   यहूद  consumed  or   सेवाएं  were rendered .
Use tax typically  is  a tax on consumption but if  तुम  buy an item ( without paying  बिक्री  tax  )   और  store it  in   अपना  warehouse  initially   ,   उपयोग   कर  applies to that  स्थान  where goods were stored .
Later on  जब  the  फाइनल  consumption  takes   प्लेस   at   कुछ   अन्य   स्थान  ,  तुम  are required to  अदा  the differential of tax rate  to  the jurisdiction of ultimate place  of  consumption  .
This really  अर्थात्   कि   तुम   do   n't  have to  अदा   दोनो  Sales Tax as well  as  Use Tax  on   एक  transaction .
It  is  only  एक  or the other that  तुम   हैं   जरूरी  to  अदा  on purchase  of  taxable  products/services  .
if   विक्रेता   करता  n't charge  कोई  Sales tax on its  चालान  then  it  is  the  obligation  of  the buyer to self assess Use tax and  अदा   it  to the  उचित  Jurisdication .
उपयोग   कर   is  generally  चार्ज  at the  वही   कर  rate of  बिक्री  Tax  लकिन   in   कुछ  states the  कर  rate is different  .
Use tax is also termed as ``  खपत  Tax ''  or   ``   उपभोक्ता  Use Tax '' .
a  use tax is  a   प्रकार  of excise tax  levied  in the United  राज्य  by  numerous  state  सरकारें  .
it  is assessed upon tangible personal property  खरीदा  by  a   निवासी  of the assessing state  लिये  use , storage  ,   or   खपत   in   कि  state ( not for resale  )   ,  regardless of  जहाँ  the  खरीदें   took  place .
If a resident  of  a state  makes  a  खरीदें   भीतर   उसके  home  राज्य  ,  पूरा  sales tax is  सशुल्क  at  the   समय  of  the   लेनदेन  .
the  use tax applies  जब  a resident of  the  assessing state  purchases  an  मद   कि  is  नहीं   विषय   to  his home state 's sales  कर   .
Usually  ,   इस  is due to out-of-state  purchases  , as well as ordering  वस्तुएं  through  the   मेल  , by phone  ,  or over the  अंतरजाल   इससे  other  राज्य  .
The  उपयोग  tax  is  typically  assessed   at  the  वही   रेट  as the sales tax  कि  would have been owed  (   if  any  )  had the same goods been  खरीदा  in the state  of  residence  .
For  उदाहरण   ,   a  resident of  मैसाचुसेट्स   ,   साथ   a   6.25  % ``  बिक्री  and  उपयोग   कर  '' on certain  goods  and services  ,   purchases   non-exempt   goods   or  services  in   नई   हैम्पशायर   लिये  use  ,  storage or other consumption in Massachusetts .
अंतर्गत  New  हैम्पशायर  law ,  the  New Hampshire vendor collects no sales taxes on  the  goods , but the Massachusetts purchaser/user  जरूर  still  अदा   6.25  % of  the  sales price  सीधे  to  the   विभाग  of Revenue in  मैसाचुसेट्स  as a use tax  .
if   the  same goods  हैं   खरीदा   in  a US  राज्य   कि   करता  collect  बिक्री  tax  लिये   ऐसे  goods at time  of   खरीदें  , whatever taxes were  सशुल्क   by  the purchaser  to  that state  can  be deducted (  as   a  tax credit  )   इससे  the 6.25  %   owed   लिये  subsequent use  ,  storage or  खपत  in Massachusetts .
With  few  exceptions , no state  's  vendors  होगा   चार्ज  the native state  's   बिक्री  tax  on   goods  shipped out of  राज्य  , meaning all  goods  ordered from out-of-state  हैं  essentially  फ़्री  of sales tax .
the  purchaser is  इसलिए   जरूरी   to  declare and  अदा   the  use tax  to  his home state on  ये  ordered  goods  .
The assessing  क्षेत्राधिकार  may make  the  use tax payable annually ,  लकिन  some  राज्य  require a  मासिक   भुगतान  .
For example  ,   जहाँ   a  Vermont  निवासी   रै   नहीं  paid  at  least  6   %   बिक्री  tax on property brought in for  उपयोग   in  the  राज्य  ,  वर्मांट   विधि  requires  दाखिल  a tax return  (  Form SU-452 and  भुगतान  ) by the 20th day  of  the month following non-exempt purchases to avoid a  $   50  late fee  ,  a 5 % penalty per  माह  , to  a  maximum of  25  % ,  प्लस   statutory  interest on the unpaid  कर  and penalties .
Typical exemptions include purchases by charitable non-profit  संगठन  or governmental agencies ,  purchases  for  पुनर्विक्रय  in commerce , and purchases  via  ``  कैज़ुअल   बिक्री   ''   by  individuals not in  the  ordinary course of  कारोबार   .
Also  नोट  that there  हैं  thousands  of  tax jurisdictions  in  the  u.S.   और  many have  ever-changing  lists  of  specific types of goods and  सेवाएं  that are not taxable .
as   an  illustration of the complexities  :   a  2006 Massachusetts law requires payment  of  tax on `` pre-written '' ( not custom ) software  खरीदा  and  डाउनलोड  over  the   अंतरजाल  for installation  और  use in  मैसाचुसेट्स   ,   regardless   of   जहाँ  it  originates  .
however   ,  the actual use of  the  same software  डाउनलोड  by a  मैसाचुसेट्स   निवासी   to  a server  in   another  state  remains  a  non-taxed  ``  सेवा   ''  .
In  कंट्रास्ट  ,  अरकंसास  generally  करता   नहीं   कर  anything delivered over  the   अंतरजाल  (  ऐसे  as  डाउनलोड  software or music ) , except VoIP  जिससे   is  specifically defined as taxable ``  दूरसंचार   सेवाएं  '' .
Software  (   pre-written  or  कस्टम  ) `` delivered  thru  a  ठोस   मीडियम  ''  (  i.e. ,  on  disk ) in Arkansas is taxable even if  ordered   ऑनलाइन  , except ``  कस्टम  software  लिये   a  particular  ग्राहक  ''  जिससे   is  non-taxable `` programming  सेवाएं   ''  even  if   वितरित  on a  डिस्क  .
in  most cases , this complexity is  भाग  of the  underlying  sales  कर   कानून  ; but while a brick-and-mortar store has  to   सौदे   साथ  only the sales  कर  laws of  इसके   अपना   स्थान   ,  remote  विक्रेता   have  to deal with the use tax laws  of  many jurisdictions—up to every  us  state and locality  कि   प्रकृती   उन्हें  ,  if  the  कम्पनी   रै  a  उपस्थिति   or  ``  नेक्सस  ''  in  every state  (  as  विशाल  ``  brick-and-mortar   ''  sellers  जैसे   wal-mart   और   बेहतरीन  Buy do  )   .
In medicine ,  pulmonary  hypertension  (  PH  )  is  an  increase  of  blood  दबाव  in  the   pulmonary   धमनी  , pulmonary  रग  ,  or  pulmonary capillaries , together known  as  the lung  vasculature  ,  अग्रणी  to shortness  of  breath , dizziness , fainting , and other  लक्षण  ,  सब   of   जिससे  are  exacerbated  by exertion .
pulmonary  hypertension  can   be   a  severe disease  साथ  a markedly  decreased  exercise  सहिष्णुता  and  दिल   विफलता  .
it  was  पहला   पहचाना  by Dr. Ernst von Romberg in  1891  .
According to  the  most  हाल  classification  ,   it  can be  एक   of  five  अलग   प्रकार   :  arterial , venous , hypoxic ,  thromboembolic  or miscellaneous  .

sanuk  , a  प्रभाग   of   deckers   बाहरी  Corporation , is a footwear  ब्रांड   आधारित  in  दक्षिणी  California .
Sanuk , the Thai  शब्द   लिये   मजा   ,   थी   संस्थापित  by Southern California native Jeff  kelley  when he started  बनाना  sandals  आउट  of  indoor-outdoor   पिंजरा  .
the  first  उत्पाद  created  थी   ग्रीन  carpeted and entitled the ``  फर   रियल   ''  after  एक  shop  मालिक  asked if  the   विलक्षणता  sandal was  ``  For  रियल  .  ''
the  Fur  रियल  first became a runaway  hit   through   बुटीक   स्टोर्स  and  नहीं   the  intended surf  दुकानें   .
the  novelty act was  followed  up by a sandal wrapped  in   तार   जाल  ,  a  leopard  छपाई  version ,  और   शैलियाँ   बना   आउट   of  a poncho  सामग्री   in  a variety of colors .
Sanuk has  grown  to  शामिल  style options  लिये  men , women  और   युवावस्था  and is  वितरित  across the  संयुक्त  States and in  over   50  countries  throughout  Europe , Asia  ,  South America and Australia .
sanuk  centers itself  around  a  धनात्मक   जीवनशैली   वकालत  the slogan , ``  मुस्कान  ,  pass   it   on  ! ``  .
In  कंप्यूटर  science , array programming  भाषाएं  (  भी  known  as   वेक्टर   or   multidimensional  languages )  generalize  operations on  scalars   to  apply transparently to  सदिश   ,  matrices , and  उच्चतर  dimensional arrays .
Array  प्रोग्रामिंग   primitives  concisely  एक्स्प्रेस   व्यापक   विचार  about  आंकड़ा  manipulation .
The level of conciseness  can  be dramatic in certain cases :  it   is  not uncommon to find array  प्रोग्रामिंग  language one-liners  कि   आवश्यकता   अधिक   than  a couple of  पृष्ठों   of   जावा  code  .
apl  , designed by Ken Iverson , was  the   पहला   प्रोग्रामिंग  language to  provide   सरणी  programming  सामर्थ्य  .
The  mnemonic  APL  refers  to  the  title  of  his  seminal  book ``  a  Programming  भाषा   ''   और   नहीं  to arrays per se .  iverson   's   योगदान  to rigor  और   स्पष्टता   थी  probably  अधिक  important  than  the simple  एक्सटेंशन   of   आयाम  to  कृत्यों  .
In  the  United States an annuity contract  is   निर्मित  when an insured  पार्टी  , usually  an   व्यक्तिगत  ,  pays  a life  बीमे  company a  सिंगल   प्रीमियम  that  होगा  later be  वितरित   वापस  to the  insured  party  over   समय  .
Annuity  अनुबंध   traditionally  provide a guaranteed distribution  of   आय   over  time ,  ऐसे   as   via  fixed payments , until  the   मौत  of  the  person  or   व्यक्तियों   नामित   in  the contract  or   जबतक   a   फाइनल  date  ,  whichever comes first .
however   ,  the majority  of   आधुनिक  annuity customers use  annuities  only  to  accumulate  निधि   फ़्री  of income and  पूंजी  gains taxes  और  to  बाद  take  lump-sum  withdrawals without using the  guaranteed-income-for-life  feature  .
अध्यक्ष   बराक  Obama .
बराक  Obama with his first  परम्   अदालत  nominee ,  सोनिया   सोटोमायोर   .
Following is a  सूची  of  सब   संयुक्त  States  संघीय  judges  नियुक्त   by   अध्यक्ष  Barack  ओबामा   दौरान   उसके   प्रेसिडेंसी  .
As of  अप्रैल  30 , 2013 ,  187   ओबामा  nominees to  आलेख  III  judgeships  have been  पुष्टि  by  the   संयुक्त  States  सीनेट  ,  namely   दो  Justices  to  the Supreme Court of the  संयुक्त  States , 35 judges  to   the  United  राज्य  courts of appeals and 150  न्यायाधीशों   to   the  United States  ज़िला   न्यायालयों  .
25  further   nominations   हैं   फिलहाल   प्रतीक्षारत   सीनेट   कार्रवाई   .
There are  फिलहाल  16 vacancies  on   the  United States  न्यायालयों  of Appeals ,  67  vacancies  on  the United  राज्य   ज़िला   न्यायालयों   और  22  अतिरिक्त  federal  न्यायपालिका  vacancies that  हैं   anticipated  to occur  पहले   the   समाप्त  of Obama 's  दूसरी   पद  .
ओबामा  has  नहीं   बना  any recess appointments to  the  federal  न्यायालयों  .
ओबामा   रै  made two  nominations  to the  संयुक्त  States  अदालत  of International Trade , an  आलेख   iii  tribunal .
Obama also  designated   बैठे   न्यायधीश  Emily C. Hewitt  of  the United  राज्य   अदालत  of  संघीय  Claims  ,  an  आलेख   i  court  ,  to  be  Chief Judge of  कि   अदालत   .
इस  is a  सूची   of   एयरपोर्ट   in   मैक्सिको  , sorted by location  .
मैक्सिको  has  परिचय   1,834  airports , ranking  2nd  in  क्रमांक   of  airports in  उत्तर  America , and  3rd  in the  संसार  .
तभी  major National and  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   एयरपोर्ट   हैं   दिखाया   .
Agency  कर्ज़  also  ज्ञात  as  an   एजेंसी   बंध   is  a security  ,  usually  a  bond , issued by a  u.S.  government-sponsored agency .
the   offerings  of these agencies are  समर्थित  but not  गारंटी  by  the   us  government since  the  agencies are private entities  .
कुछ   prominent   issuers   of   ये  securities  हैं  Student  ऋण  Marketing Association ( Sallie  mae  )  ,  Federal  नेशनल  Mortgage  संघ   (   fannie   mae  )  और   संघीय   घर  Loan Mortgage  निगम  ( Freddie  मैक  )  .
एजेंसी  securities are usually exempt  इससे   राज्य  and local taxes  ,  but not federal tax  .
Agency  कर्ज़  is also called  an  agency security .
The Susquehanna Steam Electric Station  ,   a   खौलते  water reactor  .
the   रिएक्टरों   हैं  located inside the rectangular  containment   इमारतें   towards  the front of  the  cooling towers .
Three nuclear-powered American warships ,  (  top  to  bottom )  नाभिकीय   cruisers  USS Bainbridge and  uss  Long  बीच  with USS  एंटरप्राइज़   the  first  nuclear-powered  aircraft carrier  in   1964  .
Crew members  हैं  spelling out Einstein 's mass-energy equivalence  सूत्र  E  =  mc2 on the flight  डेक  .
the  Russian nuclear-powered icebreaker  ns  Yamal  on  a 1994  संयुक्त  expedition with  the  NSF .
Nuclear power  is  the  उपयोग  of sustained  नाभिकीय  fission to generate heat and electricity  .
नाभिकीय   शक्ति  plants provided  परिचय  5.7 % of  the   संसार   's   उर्जा   और  13 % of the world 's electricity ,  in  2012 .
in  2013  ,   the   iaea  report that  वहीँ  are 437 operational  नाभिकीय   शक्ति   रिएक्टरों  (  हालांकि   नहीं  all are  producing   विद्युत   )   ,   in  31 countries .
In addition  ,   वहीँ  are  लगभग   140  naval  बरतन   using  nuclear propulsion  in   आपरेशन  , powered by some  180   रिएक्टरों  .
वहीँ   is  an ongoing  बहस  about  the  use  of   नाभिकीय  energy  .
Proponents , such as  the   संसार  Nuclear  संघ   ,  the IAEA and Environmentalists for  नाभिकीय  Energy contend that nuclear  शक्ति   is   a   चिरस्थायी  energy source that reduces carbon  emissions  .
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों   ,   ऐसे  as Greenpeace International and  nirs  ,  मानना  that  नाभिकीय  power  मुद्राएँ   अनेक  threats to people and the  पर्यावरण  .
Nuclear power  संयंत्र  accidents include the  chernobyl  disaster  (  1986  )  , Fukushima  daiichi   नाभिकीय  disaster  (  2011 ) , and  the   तीन  Mile Island accident (  1979   )  .
There have also been some  nuclear-powered   पनडुब्बी   mishaps   .
शोध  into safety  सुधार   is  continuing  और  nuclear  संलयन   ,   believed   to  be  safer  , may be used in the  भविष्य  .
As of 2012 , according  to  the  iaea  ,  विश्वव्यापी  there were 68 civil  नाभिकीय  power  रिएक्टरों  under construction in  15  countries .
in   the   us   the   पंक्तियां  of  लगभग  half  इसके   रिएक्टरों   have   महरूम  extended to 60 years , and plans to build another dozen are  अंतर्गत   गंभीर  consideration .
However  ,  Japan  's  2011  फुकुशिमा  Daiichi nuclear disaster prompted a rethink of nuclear energy policy  in   अनेक   देशों   .
Germany decided to  बंद   सब   इसके   रिएक्टरों  by  2022  , and Italy has banned nuclear  शक्ति  .
following  Fukushima  ,   the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Energy  एजेंसी   halved   इसके  estimate of  अतिरिक्त  nuclear generating capacity to be  निर्मित   by  2035  .
फोटोग्राफ   of  the Berlin Wall taken  इससे  the West side .
The  वॉल   थी  built in  1961  to prevent East  germans   इससे  fleeing  इससे   साम्यवादी  .
It was  an  iconic  प्रतीक  of the Cold War and its  पतन   in   1989   चिह्नित  the  समाप्त   of  the War  .
the  Cold War  ,  often  दिनाँक  from 1947 to  1991   ,  was  a  sustained state of  राजनैतिक  and military  टेंशन  between powers in the Western  bloc  , dominated by the  संयुक्त   राज्य  with  नाटो  among  इसके   allies  ,  और   शक्तियां  in  the  Eastern Bloc , dominated by  the  Soviet Union  साथ   साथ  the Warsaw Pact .
This  began   बाद  the success  of  their  अस्थाई  wartime alliance against  नाजी  Germany ,  leaving   the   ussr   और  the  us  as two superpowers with  profound   आर्थिक  and political  मतभेद  .
a  neutral faction arose  साथ  the Non-Aligned Movement  संस्थापित   by   मिश्र   ,  India , and  यूगोस्लाविया   ;   इस  faction rejected association with either  the  US-led  वेस्ट  or the Soviet-led  ईस्ट   .
The  ठंडा   युद्ध  was so named  क्युकी   the   दो  major powers—each  possessing   नाभिकीय  weapons  और  thereby  threatened  with mutual assured  विनाश   —never   मिले   in   सीधा  military  कॉम्बैट   .
बजाय  , in  उनके  struggle for  वैश्विक   influence   वे   सगाई  in  जारी  psychological  warfare   और   in  regular  अप्रत्यक्ष  confrontations through proxy  युद्धों  .
चक्र  of relative  शांत   होता  be followed by  ऊँची  tension  ,   जिससे  could  have  led to  संसार  war .
The tensest  टाइम्स  were  दौरान  the Berlin Blockade (  1948–1949   )   ,   the   कोरियाई  War  (  1950–1953 ) ,  the  Suez Crisis ( 1956 ) , the  बर्लिन  Crisis of  1961  ,  the  Cuban  मिसाइल  crisis  (  1962 )  ,  the Vietnam  युद्ध  (  1959–1975  )  ,  the  योम  Kippur War (  1973  ) ,  the  Soviet war in Afghanistan  (   1979–1989   )  , the Soviet downing  of  Korean Air  लाइनों   उड़ान   007  (  1983  ) , and the `` Able  archer  '' NATO military exercises ( 1983  )   .
the   विरोध  was expressed through military  coalitions   ,  strategic conventional  फ़ोर्स  deployments  ,  extensive  सहायता  to client states  ,  espionage ,  विशाल  propaganda  अभियान  , conventional and nuclear arms  दौड़   ,   appeals  to neutral  राष्ट्र   ,  rivalry  at  sports  कार्यक्रम  (  in   particular  the Olympics ) , and technological  प्रतियोगिताओं   ऐसे   as  the  स्पेस  Race  .
the   us   और   ussr  became  शामिल  in political and military conflicts in the Third  संसार  countries of  लैटिन  America  ,  Africa , the  मध्य  East  ,  and  southeast  Asia .
To  alleviate  the risk  of   a  potential nuclear  युद्ध  ,  दोनो   पहलू   sought  relief  of   राजनैतिक  tensions through détente in  the  1970s  .
In the 1980s  ,   the   संयुक्त   राज्य   increased   राजनयिक  , military ,  और   आर्थिक   pressures  on  the   सोवियत   संघ  ,  at   a  time  जब   the  communist state  थी   already   कष्ट  from economic stagnation .
in  the mid-1980s  ,   the  new Soviet  अध्यक्ष   मिखाइल  Gorbachev introduced the liberalizing reforms of perestroika  (  `` reorganization  ''  , 1987  )  and  ग्लास्नोस्त  ( ``  खुलेपन  '' ,  ca   .   1985  ) .
pressures  for national  स्वतंत्रता   grew  stronger in  पूर्वी   यूरोपीय   ,   विशेषकर  Poland .
They  पहुँचे  a breaking  पाइंट  when Gorbachev refused to use Soviet troops to  support  the faltering  सरकारी   of  East  जर्मनी   in   लेट   1989  .
Within  सप्ताह   सब  the satellite states broke  फ़्री   इससे  Moscow in a peaceful wave of revolutions ( there  थी  some violence  in   रोमानिया   )   .
the   pressures  escalated  अंदर  the  सोवियत   संघ   ,   जहाँ  Communism fell and the  ussr  was formally  dissolved  in  लेट   1991  .
The  संयुक्त   राज्य   remained  as  the  world  's  only superpower  .
the  Cold War  और   इसके   कार्यक्रम   have   बाएँ  a significant  विरासत  , and  it  is often  referred  to in  लोकप्रिय  culture , especially  in  media  featuring   विषयवस्तु  of espionage and  the  threat of  नाभिकीय   warfare   .
Pikes  शिखर  State Park  is  a  राज्य  park of Iowa  ,  USA  ,   featuring  a  bluff   निहार   the  Upper Mississippi River opposite the confluence  of   the  Wisconsin  नदी   .
The park is operated  by  the  आयोवा  Department of Natural  संसाधन  .
it  is nearly a thousand acres (  4   km2  ) in extent .
the  nearest city is  मैकग्रेगर  , Iowa .
आयोवा  Highway 76  लगभग  defines its  उत्तरी  boundary  .
It  gets   इसके  name from  the   आयोवा  incarnation of Pikes  शिखर   ,   a  particularly  ऊँची  point overlooking the  gorge  of the  अपर  Mississippi ,  और  like Pikes Peak  in   कोलोराडो  , is  नामित   लिये   zebulon   पाइक   .
वहीँ  are hiking  trails   ,  campgrounds  और   rv  facilities .
Mountain bikes are  permitted  in  निश्चित  portions of the park .
Aside  इससे   recreational   विकास   ,   the   जमीन   in  the park was never cleared and to a large  extent  remains as it  थी  before the  आगमन   of  white settlement .
It  is  part of  a   larger   जटिल   of  parks  ,  reserves and  refuges  which include Effigy Mounds  नेशनल   स्मारक  ,  the   विभिन्न   components   of  the  पीला  River  राज्य  Forest , the enormous Upper Mississippi River  नेशनल  Wildlife  और   मछली  Refuge  और  much smaller , much less  खूब  known Driftless Area National  वन्यजीव  Refuge  .
the  Northeast Iowa Legacy Trail System is  undergoing  development  ,  and will connect elements of these sites .
zac   भूरा  Band is  an  American country/folk band based  in  Atlanta  ,   जॉर्जिया  .
The lineup  consists  of Zac  भूरा   (  lead vocals  ,  guitar  )  , Jimmy De Martini  (  fiddle , vocals  )   ,  John Driskell Hopkins ( bass  गिटार  , vocals )  ,  Coy Bowles ( guitar , keyboards  )   ,  Chris Fryar (  ड्रम   )  , Clay Cook ( guitar  ,  keyboards ,  mandolin  , steel guitar , vocals )  ,   और  Daniel de  लॉस  Reyes ( percussion ) .
the  band has toured  throughout  the  संयुक्त  States  ,   सहित   a  slot on  the  2009  और  2010  bonnaroo  Music Festival .
वे  have  भी   अंकित  five studio  एल्बम  , and  charted   नौ  Number  एक   singles   on   the   बिलबोर्ड   देश  charts : `` Chicken  fried   ``  , `` Toes `` , ``  राजमार्ग  20  सवारी  `` , ``  फ़्री  ``  ,   ``  As She 's Walking Away `` ,  ``  Colder Weather  ``   ,   ``  Knee Deep `` , `` Keep Me In  दिमाग  `` , and `` Goodbye  in   उसके  Eyes `` in addition to  the  singles `` Whatever  it  Is `` and ``  no  Hurry  ``  , which peaked at  क्रमांक  2  on  the same  चार्ट  .
Talk radio  is  a  रेडियो  format containing discussion  परिचय  topical  मुद्दे  .
सबसे  shows are  regularly   hosted  by a single individual , and  प्रायः  feature interviews with a number of different guests  .
बात  radio typically  शामिल   an  element  of  listener participation  ,   प्रायः  by broadcasting  सजीव  conversations  between  the host and  श्रोता  who ``  कॉल  in '' (  प्रायः  via  टेलीफोन   )  to  the  show  .
श्रोता  contributions are usually  screened  by  a   दिखाएँ  's producer ( s ) in order to  अधिकतम   दर्शक  interest  और   ,  in the  मामला   of  commercial  बात  radio  ,   आकर्षित  advertisers  .
generally  , the shows are organized into segments ,  प्रत्येक   अलग   by   a   ठहराना  for advertisements ; however  ,  in  पब्लिक  or non-commercial  रेडियो  , music  is  sometimes played in place of commercials  to   पृथक   the  program segments .
Variations of talk radio  शामिल   रूढ़िवादी  talk  ,  hot talk  ,   उदार   बात  and sports talk .
जबकि  talk  रेडियो  has historically  महरूम   संबद्ध   साथ  AM/FM , starting around 2005 the technology for Internet-based  talk-radio  shows  became  cost  प्रभावी   in  the form of podcasts .
Now  ,  it is  संभावित   लिये  an individual  to   उपयोग   a  variety of services  to   मेजबान  an  internet-based  talk-radio show  बगैर  carriage by a  परंपरागत  radio  स्टेशन   .
in   जोड   tv  programming from talk and news outlets  ऐसे  as BBC  ,   सीएनएन   ,   ब्लूमबर्ग  and  फॉक्स   हैं  now  प्रायः  available expanding  the  world  of   बात  radio  further   .
Talk radio listening is now  enjoyed  not  तभी   on   radios   ,  but  a  wide variety of other  डिवाइस  and services including PCs  using  iTunes , station  निर्देशिका   ऐसे   as  Tunein ,  दिखाएँ  directory  स्मार्टफ़ोन  with  ऐप्स  such as  stitcher  .
hippa   is  a  genus  of  decapod   crustaceans  in the  परिवार   hippidae  , containing  the  following  species:
hippa   adactyla  Fabricius  ,  1787
Hippa  admirabilis  ( Thallwitz , 1892  )

Hippa australis  hale   ,   1927
Hippa carcineutes  holthuis  & Manning  ,  1970
Hippa celaeno ( de  man  , 1896  )
hippa  granulatus  (  Borradaile , 1904 )
Hippa hirtipes ( Dana , 1852 )
hippa   इंडिका  Haig ,  मुरुगन   &   बालकृष्णन  Nair  ,  1986
Hippa marmorata (  hombron  & Jacquinot  ,  1846  )
Hippa ovalis (  A.  Milne-Edwards  ,   1862  )
Hippa  picta  ( Heller , 1861 )
hippa  strigillata  (  Stimpson ,  1860   )
Hippa testudinaria (  herbst  , 1791  )
Hippa truncatifrons  (   miers   ,  1878 )
it  is closely  सम्बन्धित  to the  genus  Emerita , and species  have  often been transferred  between  the  दो   genera   .
जकार्ता   (  ) ,  officially  known  as  the Special  पूंजी   प्रदेश   of   जकार्ता   (   )   ,   is  the  पूंजी  and  largest   नगर  of  इंडोनेशिया  .
Located  on  the  उत्तरपश्चिम  coast  of   जावा   ,  Jakarta is  the   देश  's economic  ,   सांस्कृतिक  and political  केन्द्र  , and with a  जनसांख्यिकी   of  10,187,595 as of November  2011   ,  it is  the   सबसे  populous city  in  Indonesia  और   in  Southeast Asia  ,   और  is the  तेरहवीं   सबसे   आबादी  city  in  the world  .
the  official  महानगर   क्षेत्रफल  ,  ज्ञात   as  Jabodetabek  (   a   नाम  formed by  combining  the initial  syllables  of  जकार्ता   ,  Bogor , Depok ,  tangerang  and Bekasi ) ,  is  the  दूसरी  largest  in   the  world  ,  yet  the   metropolis  's  उपनगरों  still continue  परे   it   .
Jakarta is listed  as  a global city in the 2008  वैश्वीकरण  and World  शहरों  Study Group and Network ( GaWC )  शोध  .
and  रै  an area  of  .
इस  area has  जनसांख्यिकी  of  खूब   over  28 million ,  बनाना  it  एक   of   the  world  's  largest conurbations  in  terms of number of inhabitants .
in  2011  ,   जकार्ता   क्रमित   17th  among the  संसार  's  200  largest  शहरों  ,  a  jump from  इसके  2007 ranking of  171   .
जकार्ता   रै   grown  more rapidly than  kuala  Lumpur  ,  Beijing  और   बैंकॉक  .
Established in the  चौथी   सदी  , the city became an important trading port for the Kingdom of  sunda   .
It  थी   the  de facto capital of the Dutch  ईस्ट  Indies (  जब   it  was  ज्ञात  as Batavia  )   और  has continued  as   the  capital of Indonesia  चूंकि   the   देश   's   स्वतंत्रता  was declared in 1945  .
the  city is the seat of the ASEAN Secretariat  .
Jakarta  is  served by the Soekarno–Hatta  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   विमानक्षेत्र  , Halim  perdanakusuma   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   विमानक्षेत्र  ,  और  Tanjung Priok  harbour   ;   it  is connected by several intercity and  commuter  railways  ,  and served by  अनेक  bus lines running  on  reserved busways .
a  typical home air conditioning window  ईकाई  .
Air conditioning is  the   प्रक्रम  of  altering  the  गुण  of air ( primarily temperature  और  humidity  )  to  अधिक  favourable  शर्तें  .
More  generally   ,   एयर   कंडीशनिंग   can   refer   to  any  रूप  of  technological  cooling ,  हीटिंग   ,  ventilation  ,  or disinfection  कि  modifies the  कंडीशन  of  एयर   .
An air conditioner ( often referred  to   as   एयर  con  ,  AC or  a/c  ,  और   नहीं   to  be confused  साथ  the  संक्षिप्त   लिये  alternating current ) is a major or  घर   appliance  , system ,  or  mechanism designed  to  change the  एयर  temperature  और  humidity within an area  (   प्रयुक्त   लिये  cooling and sometimes heating depending on the  एयर   गुण   at  a  दिए  time  )   .
The cooling  is  typically  किया  using  a   सरल  refrigeration cycle  ,  but sometimes evaporation  is  used ,  commonly   लिये   सुकून  cooling in buildings and motor  वाहनों   .
In construction , a complete system of heating , ventilation and air conditioning is referred to  as  `` HVAC `` .
``   6   पैर  7 Foot  ''  (  भी   styled  as  ``   6'7  '' ) is a  सोंग   by  American  rapper  Lil  वेन  featuring label mate  ,   कोरी  Gunz .
