the  song samples `` Day-O ( The Banana  नाव  Song  )   ``   by  Harry Belafonte  .
dc   बात  ( styled  as  dc  बात  ) ,  is  a Grammy -winning Christian rap  तिकड़ी   .
The group  थी  formed  in  Lynchburg ,  वर्जिनिया  in 1987 by Toby  mckeehan   ,  Michael  tait  , and  केविन  Max  स्मिथ  .
वे  have  released  five  प्रमुख  studio albums together :  dc   बात  (  1989  ) ,  nu  Thang  (   1990   )  ,  फ़्री  at Last ( 1992 )  ,  Jesus  freak  ( 1995  )  ,  और  Supernatural ( 1998 ) .
in  2002  ,   the   ज्ञानकोष  of Contemporary Christian Music  पुकारा   dc   बात  ``  the   सबसे   लोकप्रिय  overtly Christian  अधिनियम   of  all time  .  ''
in  2000  ,  the  समूह   released  an  ep   titled  Solo which  contained   दो  solo songs from each member  .
Since that time  ,  DC Talk  रै  been  on   an   indefinite  hiatus ,  और   the  three band  सदस्यों   have  each led  सोलो  careers .
वे   have  performed and recorded individual  गीतों   साथ  several  टाइम्स  during the 2000s ,  हालांकि   the   समूह  never  officially   reunited  or  disbanded   .
The group 's musical style  विकसित  significantly throughout their career  .
उनके  first two  रिलीज  , DC Talk  और  Nu Thang  ,  were of  the  hip hop genre  .
DC Talk 's  तीसरा  album ,  फ़्री   at  Last ,  भी  mainly  took   influence  from the hip  हॉप  style , although their  म्यूज़िक   began  taking on a rock sound .
The trio  's  last two albums ,  यीशु   freak   और   अलौकिक   ,  were  predominantly   पॉप  rock .
The Bible  is   a   संकलन   of   अनेक   shorter   किताबे  written  at  different  टाइम्स  and  बाद  assembled into the biblical  canon   .
सब   लकिन   the   shortest   of  these books  have   महरूम   विभाजित  into chapters , generally a page or so in  लंबाई  , since  the   जल्दी  13th  सदी   .
चूंकि  the  mid-16th   सदी  ,  प्रत्येक   अध्याय   रै   महरूम  further  विभाजित  into ``  आयतें  '' of  a  few short lines  or  sentences .
sometimes   a   वाक्य   spans  more than  एक  verse , as  in   the  case of ,  और   sometimes  there is  अधिक   than   एक   वाक्य  in a  सिंगल  verse  ,   as   in   the  case of .
as   the   अध्याय   और  verse divisions were  नहीं   भाग  of the  असली   ग्रन्थ  ,  वे   रूप   भाग  of the paratext of the Bible  .
The  यहूदी   विभाजन  of the  यहूदी  text differ at various points from those used by Christians .
लिये  instance  ,  in  यहूदी  tradition  ,  the ascriptions to many Psalms are regarded as  स्वतंत्र  verses  ,  making 116 more verses ,  whereas   the   स्थापित   ईसाई  practice is to count and number each  psalm  ascription together with  the  first verse following  it  .
Some chapter  विभाजन  also occur  in   अलग   स्थान   ,   e.g  . in  यहूदी  Bibles  is   गिने  as  in  Christian translations .
An  अनुक्रमणिका   (  plural  :   indexes  )  is  a  सूची  of  शब्द  or  वाक्यांश   (   'headings   '  ) and  संबद्ध   संकेतक  (  'लोकेटरs   '  ) to where  उपयोगी  material relating  to   कि  heading can  be  found in a  दस्तावेज़  .
In a  परंपरागत   back-of-the-book   अनुक्रमणिका   the  headings will include  names   of   लोगों   ,  places  और  events , and concepts selected by  a   व्यक्ति  as  होने  relevant and of  ब्याज  to a possible  रीडर   of  the book  .
the  pointers are typically page  संख्याएँ   ,   अनुच्छेद   संख्याएँ   or  section numbers .
In a library  कैटलॉग   the  words are authors  ,  titles , subject headings , etc.  ,   और   the   संकेतक   हैं  call numbers .
Internet  ढूंढें  engines , such  as  Google ,  और   पूरा   टेक्स्ट   searching   सहायता  provide access  to   सूचना  but are not as selective  as  an  अनुक्रमणिका  ,  as  they  provide   non-relevant  links  ,   और  may miss relevant information  if   it   is  not phrased in exactly the way they expect .
In United  राज्य   वित्तीय   विनियमन  , a suspicious activity report (  or  SAR ) is  a   रपट   बना   by  a  वित्तीय  institution to the Financial  अपराधों  Enforcement Network  (  FinCEN )  ,   an   एजेंसी   of   the   संयुक्त  States Department  of  the  राजकोष  ,  regarding  suspicious or  potentially  suspicious activity .
Facebook  on  the Ad-tech  2010
Facebook is an  ऑनलाइन  social  नेटवर्किंग  service  ,  whose  नाम   तना   इससे   the  colloquial  नाम   लिये  the book given  to   विद्यार्थी   at   the   प्रारंभ  of the academic year  by   कुछ  university administrations  in   the  United  राज्य   to  help students  मिलेंगी   to   जान   प्रत्येक   अन्य   .
It was founded  in  February  2004   by  Mark Zuckerberg with his  कॉलेज   roommates  and  fellow  Harvard University students  एडुआर्डो  Saverin  ,  Andrew McCollum ,  डस्टिन   moskovitz  and Chris Hughes .
The website 's membership was  initially  limited by  the  founders  to  Harvard  विद्यार्थी   ,  but was expanded  to  other colleges  in  the  बोस्टन  area  ,   the  Ivy League , and Stanford  विश्वविद्यालयों  .
It  धीरे  added  support   लिये   विद्यार्थी   at  various other universities before opening  to  high school  विद्यार्थी   ,  and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over .
Facebook now  allows   कोई   उपयोक्ता   जो  declare  themselves  to be at  तनिक   13  years  बूढ़ा  to become registered users  of  the  साईट  .
उपयोक्ता  must register  पहले  using the  साईट   ,   बाद   जिससे   वे  may  बनाएँ  a personal profile  ,  add other users as friends , and exchange messages , including  स्वचालित  notifications  जब  they update their profile  .
Additionally ,  उपयोक्ता   may  join common-interest user  समूह   ,   व्यवस्थित   by   कार्यस्थल   ,   स्कूल  or college ,  or   अन्य  characteristics ,  और  categorize their friends  into  lists such  as   ``  People  इससे   कार्य  '' or `` Close  मित्रों   ''  .
As of September  2012   ,   फेसबुक  has over  एक  billion  क्रियाशील   उपयोक्ता  .
according  to  a   may  2011  उपभोक्ता  Reports  सर्वेक्षण  , there  हैं  7.5 million  children  under  13  with accounts  और   5  million  अंतर्गत  10 , violating  the  site 's  शर्तें  of service  .
In  may   2005   ,  Accel  साझेदार  invested  $  12.7 million  in  Facebook ,  और  Jim Breyer added $  1  million  of   उसके  own money  to   the  pot .
a  January 2009 Compete.com study ranked  फेसबुक  as  the  most used social networking service by  विश्वव्यापी  monthly  क्रियाशील   उपयोक्ता   .
Entertainment Weekly  शामिल   the  site  on  its end-of-the-decade `` best-of  ''  list ,  saying  ,  ``  How on earth did  we   stalk  our exes ,  याद   हमारी  co-workers ' birthdays , bug our friends ,  और  play  a   rousing  game  of  Scrabulous before Facebook ?  ''
Critics , such  as  Facebook  detox  , state that Facebook has  turned   into  a national obsession  in  the United States , resulting in vast amounts  of  time lost and encouraging narcissism .
quantcast  estimates  फेसबुक   रै  138.9 million monthly  अद्वितीय   u.S.  visitors  in  May 2011 .
According to Social Media  आज   ,  in April  2010   an   अनुमानित  41.6 %  (  129.5 million ) of the  u.S.   जनसांख्यिकी  had  a   फेसबुक   खाता   .
Nevertheless  ,   फेसबुक  's  मार्केट   विकास   प्रारंभ   to   स्टाल   in  some regions  ,   साथ  the site  खोने  7 million active  उपयोक्ता  in the  संयुक्त  States and Canada  in  May  2011  .
Facebook eventually filed  लिये  an initial public offering on February 1  ,  2012 ,  और  was headquartered in Menlo  पार्क  ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Facebook Inc. began selling stock  to  the  पब्लिक  and trading  on  the  नैस्डैक   on  May 18  ,  2012 .
सल्फोनेमाइड  functional group
Hydrochlorothiazide is  a   सल्फोनेमाइड  and a thiazide .
furosemide  is  a   सल्फोनेमाइड  , but not a  thiazide   .
सल्फोनेमाइड   or   sulphonamide  is the basis of  अनेक  groups  of  drugs  .
The  असली  antibacterial sulfonamides ( sometimes  पुकारा  sulfa drugs  or   sulpha  drugs )  हैं  synthetic antimicrobial  एजेंटों   कि  contain  the   सल्फोनेमाइड  group .
Some  sulfonamides  are  भी   विहीन  of antibacterial activity ,  e.g.  , the anticonvulsant sultiame .
The  sulfonylureas  and thiazide diuretics  हैं   नए  drug  समूह  based  on  the antibacterial sulfonamides .
Sulfa allergies  हैं  common , hence medications containing sulfonamides are prescribed  carefully  .
It is important  to   मेक  a distinction between sulfa drugs  और  other  sulfur-containing   दवाएँ   और  additives  ,   ऐसे  as sulfates and  sulfites   ,  which  हैं   chemically  unrelated to  the   सल्फोनेमाइड   समूह   ,   और  do not cause  the  same hypersensitivity reactions  देखी  in  the  sulfonamides  .
This  is  a list of  वर्ण  from  जार्ज   लोपेज़   .
घरेलू  geese  (  Anser anser  domesticus  or  आंसर  cygnoides )  हैं  domesticated grey  geese   (  either Greylag Geese  or   swan  Geese  )  kept as  मुर्गीपालन  for  उनके  meat , eggs , and down feathers since  प्राचीन   टाइम्स  .
30  Seconds  to  Mars  is  an American rock band  इससे   लॉस   एंजिल्स  , formed in 1998  .
Since  2007  , the  बैंड   रै  consisted of actor Jared Leto (  सीसे   vocals   ,  rhythm  गिटार  , songwriter ) , Shannon Leto  (   ड्रम   ,  percussion ) and  tomo  Miličević ( lead guitar , keyboards  )   .
Following the departure of Matt Wachter  (  now  of  Angels  &   airwaves  ) in  2007  , Tim Kelleher became the bassist for the  समूह   ,  performing live  तभी   साथ  both Jared and  miličević  recording bass for studio recordings , while  braxton   olita  ( keyboards )  थी  added  to  the touring lineup in 2009  .
Previously , the group  भी   प्रदर्शित  guitarists Solon  bixler  ( now of Great Northern  )  and  केविन  Drake  (   अभी  of Polaroid Kiss  )  .
to  date , 30  सेकेंड  to Mars  have   released  three studio  एल्बम  – 30 Seconds  to  Mars ( 2002 ) ,  a  Beautiful Lie ( 2005 ) ,  इस   is  War ( 2009  )   और   तीन  extended plays –  एओएल  Sessions  अंडरकवर   (  2007 )  ,   to   the  Edge of  the  Earth  (  2008  )  ,  और  MTV Unplugged  :  30  सेकेंड  to  मंगल   (   2011   )  .
30   सेकेंड  to Mars '  म्यूज़िक   रै   महरूम   संबद्ध   ज़्यादातर  with neo-prog  ,  progressive metal  और   post-grunge  , but they have  भी   शामिल   भावनाएं  , screamo , space  चट्टान  and synthrock  into  their  म्यूज़िक  .
They have been  compared   to  Pink Floyd  (  who were  an  influence on their work ) and  औजार  because of their  उपयोग   of  philosophical and  आध्यात्मिक  lyrics , concept albums and their  उपयोग   of  experimental music  .
A Christmas  स्टोरी  is a 1983  अमरीकी  Christmas comedy film based on  the   छोटी   कहानियां   और   semi-fictional  anecdotes of author  और  raconteur Jean Shepherd ,  आधारित  on  उसके   किताब  In God  we  Trust ,  सब  Others Pay  नकदी   ,  with some elements derived from Wanda Hickey 's  रात्रि   of   सुनहरी  Memories .
it   थी   निर्देशित  by Bob  क्लार्क  .
The film has  चूंकि  become  a   अवकाश   क्लासिक  and is  दिखाया  numerous  टाइम्स   on  television  दौरान  the Christmas season  on   the   संजाल  TBS  ,  often in  a  24-hour marathon .
in   2012  , the film was selected  लिये   संरक्षण  in the National Film Registry by  the  Library of Congress  लिये  being `` culturally , historically  ,  or aesthetically significant  ''  .
a  Joe  's  Crab Shack branch  in   सैन   डिएगो   ,   ca  .
the   भवन  was  initially   a  rowing  क्लबों  and was later converted into  the  restaurant  .
Joe 's Crab  shack  is  an  American chain  of  beach-themed seafood  कैज़ुअल   डाइनिंग  restaurants owned  by  Ignite Restaurant Group  .
संस्थापित   in   ह्यूस्टन   ,   टेक्सास  , the  रेस्तरां   अभी  operates locations all  आरपार  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  of America  .
It serves seafood and  अमरीकी   भोजन  .
the   रेस्तरां   भी   have  a  तोहफा   दूकान  that sells facetious t-shirts  featuring  phrases advertising  जो   's   seafood  choices  .
it   is   आधारित  in  ह्यूस्टन  , Texas .
New  यॉर्क  City  क्रूज   लाइनर  Terminal  in   नरक  's  रसोईघर  at  52nd  Street .
The New York Passenger  जलयान  Terminal  (  also known  as   the   लक्ज़री   लाइनर  Row  or   मैनहटन  Cruise Terminal  or  New  यॉर्क   क्रूज  Terminal ) is  a   टर्मिनल  for  ocean-going   यात्री  ships  on  Manhattan 's  वेस्ट  side  .
The terminal  consists  of North River  पियर   88   ,  90 , 92 and  94  on the  हडसन   नदी  between  वेस्ट  46th and West  54th  Street .
(  As a  सामान्य   नियम  , pier  संख्याएँ   in   मैनहटन  can be  संकल्पित  by adding 40  to   the   सम्बन्धित   cross-street   .   )
Ships now dock  at   पियर  88 ,  90   और   92  .
Pier 94  on   the  north  पक्ष   is  now used for  प्रदर्शनी  space .
Pier 86  ,  once  प्रयुक्त   by   संयुक्त  States  लाइनों   ,  is  अभी   घर  to  the  USS Intrepid  .
In 2003 , the  टर्मिनल  handled 900,000 passengers .
The  नगर   is  forecasting  कि  1.5 million will use  the  terminal by 2017  .
The piers are  long  and apart .
वे   यहूद  first  समाप्त  in  1935   to   बदलें   the  Chelsea Piers as the city 's luxury  लाइनर  terminal  .
the  new terminal was built to handle bigger ships that  था   outgrown  the Chelsea Piers .
The  पियर  were renovated in  1970  and are currently undergoing another $ 150  लाख   नवीकरण  .
the  renovated plans call  लिये  it  to  handle three  विशाल   जहाजों  at a time .
In doing  renovations  ,  the   नगर  is also considering decommissioning Pier 92 .
लोगो  of  the  New  यॉर्क  Cruise Terminal.For
decades the  टर्मिनल   थी   the  only ocean-going  यात्री  terminal in New  यॉर्क  harbor .
साथ  an  upsurge  in cruise  जलयान   ट्रैफ़िक  and the  टर्मिनल  's  क्षमता  to handle comfortably  तभी  three  विशाल  ships at a time  ,   दो   नई   terminals  have opened in the  हार्बर  — the  केप  Liberty Cruise Port opened  in   2004  in Bayonne  ,  New  जर्सी  (  प्रयुक्त  by Royal Caribbean Cruise  लकीर  ,  हस्ती   क्रूज़  and Azamara  क्रूज़   )  ,  और  the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal  (   प्रयुक्त   by  the  महारानी   मरियम  2 and other ships  of   the   कार्निवल  Corporation cruise brands  )   खोली  in 2006  in   ब्रुकलीन  ,  नई  York .
the  West Side  राजमार्ग   takes  a small  जोग  east from  the  piers to below West 42nd Street because when  the   टर्मिनल  was built land had  to   be   लिया   दूर  from  मैनहटन   to   allow  for longer piers .
the  US  फौज  Corps of Engineers , who control  the   waterfront   आयाम  ,  होता  not  extend  the pierhead  लकीर  farther into  the  river  ,   so  the city extended the pier by cutting  दूर  at the land .
The city earlier did  इस  for  the  Chelsea Piers  ;  however  in   चेल्सी   तभी  landfill was taken away .
At the Passenger Terminal actual Manhattan schist was taken away .

अनेक   प्रमुख  passenger ships  have   docked  there , including  the  RMS Queen Mary  2   और   स्वतंत्रता  of the  समंदर  , before  the  Brooklyn and Bayonne terminals  खोली   .
the   ss  Normandie caught fire and  subsequently  capsized at  इसके   बांध  88  berth   दौरान  World  युद्ध  II .
The Normandie , renamed  uss   lafayette  , lies capsized  in   the   frozen  mud at Pier 88 in the winter  of   1942

Christian right  is   a   पद  used in the United States  to  describe right-wing Christian political  समूह  that  हैं  characterized  by  their strong  support   of   socially  conservative policies  .
ईसाई   conservatives   प्रधानतया  seek to apply their  समझना  of  the   शिक्षाओं   of  Christianity  to   राजनीती  and public  नीति   by   proclaiming   the   मान  of  those  teachings and/or  by  seeking to  उपयोग   those  teachings to influence law and public policy .
In the U.S. ,  the   ईसाई   सही  is an  अनौपचारिक  coalition formed around a  कोर  of  धर्मान्तरण  Protestants  कि  draws  ``  support from politically conservative  catholics  , Jews ,  mormons   ,  and occasionally secularists '' who share their  लक्ष्य   .
the   गति  has  इसके   जड़ें   in  American politics  going  back as far the  1940s  and  रै  been especially influential since the  1970s   .
उनके  influence  draws  , in part , from  grassroots  activism as well as their  फ़ोकस   on   सोशल   मुद्दे  and ability  to   motivate  the electorate around  those  issues .
The  ईसाई   सही   is  notable today  लिये  advancing  socially  conservative  स्थितियाँ   on   मुद्दे  including school prayer , stem  कोशिका  research  ,  homosexuality  ,   निरोधक   ,  abortion  ,  and  pornography  .
Although  the  Christian right is  प्रायः  associated with the U.S. ,  the  movement has been a key factor  in  the politics of Canada  ,  The Netherlands  ,   उत्तरी  Ireland  और  Australia  ,   among  others .
दूर   ईस्ट   गति   (  stylized as Far★East Movement or  abbreviated  FM ) is  an  American  हिप  hop band  quartet  based in Los Angeles .
the  group  formed   in   2003  and consists of Kev  nish  ( Kevin  nishimura   )  ,  prohgress   (  James Roh ) , J-Splif  (  Jae Choung  )   ,   और   dj   virman  (  virman  Coquia )  .
दूर   ईस्ट  Movement 's first claim to fame  थी  their song ``  गोलाकार  Round ''  प्रदर्शित  in the Hollywood  फिल्म  , The  तेज़  and the Furious  :  Tokyo Drift  ,   और   इसके  subsequent soundtrack  ,   वीडियो  game  और  DVD  .
Since `` Round  गोलाकार   ''  ,  the  group  रै  been featured on various network  shows  including , , Entourage ,  गपशप   लड़की  ,  और  Finishing  the  Game ( a  प्रदर्शित   फिल्मी  at Sundance  2007   )   .
Their single `` Like  a  G6 ``  hit  number one on the Billboard  hot  100 Chart  और  on  itunes  as well in late  अक्तूबर   2010   .
दूर   ईस्ट  Movement  भी  has  the   भेद  of being  the   पहला  Asian-American  समूह   to   earn  a  #  1  hit   on   the  Billboard  hot   100  in the United  राज्य   .
LR44 is the  आईईसी  designation  लिये  an alkaline  1.5  volt button cell ,  commonly   प्रयुक्त  in  छोटी  LED flashlights ,  डिजिटल   thermometers  , calculators , calipers , watches , clocks , toys  और  laser pointers .
LR44  क्षारीय   कोशिका
the  battery nomenclature  is  defined by  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   विद्युततकनीकी   आयोग  ( IEC ) in its 60086-3 standard  (  Primary  बैटरी  ,  भाग  3  देखें  batteries  )   .
the  letter  l  indicates  the   electrochemical  system  प्रयुक्त  ; a zinc  ऋणात्मक  electrode ,  मैंगनीज  dioxide depolarizer  और  positive electrode , and an  क्षारीय  electrolyte .
r44  indicates  a   गोलाकार  cell  11.4±0.2  mm diameter  और  5.2±0.2 mm height as  पारिभाषित  by the IEC  मानक  60086  .
Manufacturers have their own  भाग   संख्याएँ  for IEC type LR44 batteries including:
LR44  ,  LR44G  ,  LR44GD ,  lr44h
LR1154 ,  l1154   ,  L1154C  ,  L1154F , L1154G ,  l1154h
6135-99-792-8475  (  NSN )
1166A
AG13 ,  a613   ,   ag14  ,  ag-14  , G13A ,  g13-a
157  ,  303  ,  357
A76 , GDA76  ,   gp76a   ,   gpa7  ,  gpa75  ,  gpa76   ,  GPS76A,
1128MP  ,   208-904   ,   a-76   ,   ca18   ,   ca19  , CR44  ,   d76a  , KA  ,  KA76  ,  MS76H , PX76A , PX675A  ,   rpx675   ,  RW82  ,  SB-F9 , V13GA
4.5-volt   ,   d   ,  C  ,  AA , AAA ,  aaaa   ,  A23 , 9-volt , CR2032  और   lr44   बैटरी
अन्य  types of batteries  हैं   or  were made in  the   r44   आकार   .
formerly   ,   पारा   बैटरी   यहूद  made  as   बटन  cells  (  types  mr44   और  NR44 ) .
zinc-air   बैटरी  type PR44  आवश्यकता   एयर   to  work .
Silver-oxide  बैटरी  type  sr44  may  provide   अतिरिक्त  capacity compared to  lr44  types  लकिन   have  slightly different voltage  विशेषताएँ  .
Performance of  a  device  meant  to use a  silver-oxide  battery may  be   degraded  with substitution  of  LR44 types  .
निर्माता  's numbers for silver oxide R44  आकार  cells include:
SR44/SR44W/SR44SW

hurricane  Katrina was the deadliest  और   सबसे  destructive Atlantic hurricane  of   the   2005  Atlantic hurricane season .
it  was  the  costliest natural  विपत्ति  , as  खूब   as   एक   of  the  पाँच  deadliest hurricanes , in  the  history of the  संयुक्त  States  .
among   अंकित  Atlantic hurricanes , it was  the  sixth strongest overall .
At least  1,833  people  died  in the hurricane  और   subsequent  floods ,  बनाना   it   the  deadliest U.S.  hurricane   चूंकि   the  1928  okeechobee   hurricane  ; total property damage was  अनुमानित   at   $  81 billion ( 2005 USD ) , nearly  ट्रिपल  the damage brought by  hurricane   एंड्रयू  in  1992  .
hurricane   कैटरीना  formed  over  the Bahamas on  अगस्त   23   ,  2005 and  crossed   दक्षिणी   फ्लोरिडा   as  a moderate  श्रेणी   1  hurricane , causing some deaths and flooding  वहीँ  before  strengthening  rapidly in the  गल्फ  of Mexico .
The hurricane strengthened to  a  Category 5  hurricane  over the  गरम  Gulf water , but weakened before making  इसके   दूसरी  landfall as a  श्रेणी  3 hurricane on  the  morning of  सोमवार  , August  29  in southeast Louisiana .
It  caused  severe  विनाश  along the Gulf coast from central  फ्लोरिडा  to  टेक्सास  , much of it due to the  तूफ़ान  surge .
The most significant  क्रमांक  of  मौतों  occurred in New  ऑरलियन्स  ,  louisiana  ,  जिससे   flooded   as  the  तटबन्ध   प्रणाली  catastrophically failed  ,   in  many cases  घंटों  after  the  storm had moved  अंतर्देशीय  .
Eventually 80 % of the  नगर   और  large  tracts   of   neighboring  parishes became flooded , and the floodwaters lingered for weeks  .
however  , the worst  प्रॉपर्टी  damage occurred in coastal areas , such  as   सब  Mississippi beachfront towns  ,   जिससे  were flooded over  90   %  in hours ,  as  boats and casino  barges  rammed  इमारतें   ,   pushing  cars and houses inland , with waters reaching  6–12  miles  (  10–19 km  )  from the  बीच  .
the   hurricane   surge   सुरक्षा  failures in New  ऑरलियन्स   हैं  considered the worst civil  अभियान्त्रिकी   विपत्ति  in  u.S.  history and prompted  a   मुकदमा  against the U.S.  फौज   corps  of Engineers  (  USACE ) ,  the  designers  और   बिल्डर   of  the levee system  as  mandated by the  बाढ़  Control Act  of  1965  .
Responsibility for  the  failures and flooding was laid  squarely   on   the  Army Corps  in   जनवरी   2008  by Judge Stanwood  डुवल  , U.S.  ज़िला  Court  ,  but the federal  एजेंसी  could  नहीं  be  आयोजित  financially liable due  to   sovereign  immunity in the  बाढ़  Control Act of  1928   .
There  थी  also an investigation of  the  responses from  संघीय  , state and  लोकल   सरकारें   ,   resulting  in the resignation  of   संघीय  Emergency  प्रबन्धन  Agency  (  FEMA  )  director Michael  D.  Brown ,  और   of  New Orleans Police Department ( NOPD )  अधीक्षक  Eddie Compass  .
Several agencies  सहित  the United  राज्य   coast   गार्ड  ( USCG )  ,  National  hurricane   बीच  ( NHC  )  , and National Weather Service  (   nws   )   यहूद   commended  for their  क्रियाएँ  .
They  provided   सटीक   hurricane   मौसम  tracking  forecasts  with sufficient  सीसे  time .
Even  the  most  insistent   appeals  from  नेशनल  , state and local  पब्लिक   officials   to  residents to evacuate before  the  storm did  नहीं  warn that the levees  could  breach  और  fail .
U.S. debt  इससे   1940  to 2011  .
रेड   लाइनों  indicate the  ``  debt  आयोजित   by  the public  ''  and  ब्लैक  lines  indicate   the  total national debt or  सकल  public  कर्ज़   .
The  अंतर  is the ``  intragovernmental  debt ,  ''  which  शामिल  obligations to government  कार्यक्रम  such  as  Social Security .
Stated as a  सूत्र   ,   नेशनल   कर्ज़  =  कर्ज़  held by  the   पब्लिक   +  Intragovernmental  कर्ज़   .
the  second panel shows  the  two  कर्ज़  figures  as   a  percentage  of   u.S.  GDP ( dollar value of U.S. economic production for  कि  year  )  .
The top panel is deflated  so  every year  is   in  2010  डॉलर   .
The  संयुक्त   राज्य   पब्लिक   कर्ज़   is  the  धन   उधार   by  the federal  सरकारी  of the United  राज्य   through   the   issuing  of securities  by  the Treasury and other federal  सरकारी   एजेंसियों  .
US public  कर्ज़  consists of  दो   घटकs:
Debt held by  the   पब्लिक   शामिल   राजकोष  securities held by investors  बाहर   the   संघीय  government  ,  including  कि   आयोजित  by  individuals   ,  corporations , the Federal Reserve  प्रणाली   और  foreign , state  और   लोकल   सरकारें  .
Debt  आयोजित   by  government  खाते  or  intragovernmental  debt  शामिल  non-marketable Treasury securities  आयोजित  in accounts administered by  the  federal  सरकारी  that  हैं   owed  to  कार्यक्रम  beneficiaries , such  as   the  Social Security Trust Fund .
कर्ज़  held  by  government accounts represents the  संचयी  surpluses  ,  including interest earnings  ,  of these  खाते   कि   have   महरूम   invested  in Treasury securities  .
पब्लिक   कर्ज़   increases  or decreases as  a  result  of   the   सालाना   एकीकृत  budget  deficit  or  surplus  .
The federal  सरकारी  budget deficit or  surplus   is  the difference  between  government receipts and spending  ,   ignoring   intra-governmental  transfers .
However  ,  some spending  कि   is  excluded from the  deficit   (  supplemental  appropriations  ) also adds  to  the debt  .
Historically  ,  the  us  public debt as a  share   of  GDP  increased  during wars  और  recessions  ,  and subsequently declined .
लिये  example , debt  आयोजित  by the public as  a  share  of   जीडीपी  peaked  बस  after World War  ii   (  113  %  of GDP in 1945  )  ,  लकिन  then fell over the  following   30   सालो  .
In  हाल   दशकों   ,  however , large budget  deficits   और   the   resulting  increases  in   कर्ज़  have led to concern  परिचय   the  long-term sustainability  of  the federal government 's  फिस्कल   नीतियों  .
On 2  अप्रैल  2013  ,  debt held by the public  थी   लगभग  $ 11.959 trillion  or   परिचय   75  % of GDP .
Intragovernmental holdings stood at $ 4.846 trillion  ,   giving  a combined total public debt  of   $  16.805 trillion .
as  of  जनवरी  2013  ,   $  5.6  खरब  or approximately  47  % of the debt  आयोजित  by  the  public  थी  owned by foreign investors ,  the   largest   of   जिससे   यहूद   the   लोगों  's Republic  of   चीन  and Japan  at   बस   over   $  1.1  खरब  each .
in  basketball , an  assist   is   attributed  to a player  जो  passes  the   बॉल  to a  teammate  in  a   रास्ता   कि   लीड  to a score  by   फ़ील्ड  goal  ,   अर्थ  that he or  वो  was  ``   assisting  '' in the basket  .
There is  कुछ   निर्णय   शामिल   in  deciding whether a passer should  be  credited with an assist .
an   assist  can be scored  लिये  the  passer   भी  if the player who  receives  the  pass   makes   a  basket after dribbling  the  ball .
however  , the original  परिभाषा  of an assist  किया  not include  ऐसे  situations , so the  तुलना  of assist  आंकडे   आरपार  eras is  a   जटिल  matter  .
तभी  the pass directly before the  स्कोर   may  be counted as  an  assist  ,  so no more  than  one  assist  can be  अंकित   प्रति   फ़ील्ड  goal  (  unlike in  अन्य  sports ,  ऐसे   as  ice hockey )  .
A  pass   कि   लीड  to a shooting  बेईमानी  and  स्कोरिंग  by free  throws   करता  not count  as   an  assist in  the  NBA ,  लकिन   करता   in  FIBA play  (   तभी   एक  assist  is   awarded  per  नियत   of   फ़्री   throws  in which at least  एक   फ़्री   throw  is made  )   .
Point guards tend to get  the  most assists  प्रति   खेल   (   apg   )   ,  as  उनके  role  is   primarily  that of a passer  और   ballhandler  .
Centers tend to get  कम  assists  ,  but  centers  with  शुभ   मंजिल  presence and court vision can  dominate   a  team  by  assisting  .
Being  अंदर  the key , the center often has the  बेहतरीन  angles and the  बेहतरीन  position for `` dishes '' and  अन्य   छोटी  passes in the scoring  क्षेत्रफल   .
बीच  Wilt  चेम्बरलेन  led the NBA in assists in  1968  .
a   दमदार   बीच  with  inside-scoring  prowess  ,   ऐसे  as  पूर्व  NBA center Hakeem Olajuwon  ,   can   भी  be  an  effective  assistor  because  the   रक्षा  's double-teaming  tends   to   खोलें  up offense  in  the form of  निशानेबाज  .
The  एनबीए  single-game  assist   रिकार्ड  is 30  ,  held by Scott  skiles   of   the  Orlando Magic  विरूद्ध  the Denver  टेंडर्स  ,  on   दिसम्बर   30   ,   1990   .
The NBA  रिकार्ड   लिये   सबसे   करियर  assists is held by  जॉन   स्टॉकटन  with  15,806  .
The mill or mille (  )   (  sometimes mil  in  the UK ,  जब   discussing  property taxes in  the  United States ,  or  previously  in   साइप्रस   और   माल्टा   )  is  a   now-abstract  unit  of   करेंसी  used sometimes in  हिसाब   .
In  the  United States ,  it   is   a  notional  ईकाई  equivalent  to  of a United States dollar ( a  दसवाँ  of a cent ) .
In  the  United  किंगडम  it was  प्रस्तावित   दौरान  the  दशकों  of discussion on  the   decimalization   of  the pound as a division of  the  pound  स्टर्लिंग   .
Several other currencies used the mill , such as the  maltese  lira  .
The term  आता  from  the   लैटिन  ``  millesimum  '' , meaning  ``  thousandth  भाग   ''  .
The Greco-Persian Wars (  भी   प्रायः   पुकारा   the   पारसी   युद्धों   )   यहूद   a   श्रेणी   of  conflicts between the Achaemenid Empire  of  Persia  और   city-states  of the  हैलेनिक  world  कि   प्रारंभ   in  499 BC and lasted until 449  bc   .
The collision between the  fractious  political world of the  यूनानियों   और  the  विशाल   साम्राज्य   of  the  फारसियों  began  जब  Cyrus the Great conquered Ionia  in  547 BC  .
Struggling  to  rule the  independent-minded  cities  of   ionia   ,  the Persians  नियुक्त   उत्पीड़क  to rule  प्रत्येक  of them  .
इस  would prove to  be  the source of much  ट्रबल   लिये  the Greeks  और   फारसियों  alike .
In 499 BC ,  the   तब   tyrant   of   miletus  , Aristagoras ,  embarked  on an  expedition  to  जीतें   the   द्वीप  of  naxos  , with Persian support  ;   however   ,  the expedition  थी  a debacle  और  ,  pre-empting  his  dismissal   ,  Aristagoras incited all of  हैलेनिक   एशिया  Minor into  विद्रोह  against  the   फारसियों   .
This  थी   the  beginning  of  the Ionian Revolt  ,   जिससे   होता  last  जबतक  493 BC , progressively  आरेखण  more  regions   of   एशिया  Minor  into   the  conflict  .
Aristagoras secured military support from  एथेंस   और   eretria  , and in 498  bc  these forces  helped  to capture  और  burn the Persian regional capital  of  Sardis  .
the  Persian  किंग   दारा  the  ग्रेट  vowed  to  have revenge on  एथेंस  and  eretria  for  इस   अधिनियम  .
The revolt  जारी  , with the  दो  sides  effectively   stalemated  throughout 497–495 BC .
In 494 BC , the Persians regrouped , and  attacked   the   epicentre  of  the  revolt in Miletus  .
At the Battle of Lade ,  the  Ionians suffered a  निर्णायक   शिकस्त  , and  the   विद्रोह  collapsed  ,   साथ  the final members being  stamped  out the following  साल  .
Seeking to secure his empire  इससे   further  revolts and from the interference  of  the  मेनलैंड  Greeks , Darius embarked on a  योजना  to conquer  यूनानियों  and  to   सजा  Athens and  eretria   लिये  burning Sardis .
the  first  पारसी  invasion  of   यूनानियों  began in 492 BC , with the  पारसी  general Mardonius  conquering  Thrace and Macedon  पहले  several  mishaps   मजबूर   an  early end to the campaign .
in  490  bc  a second force was sent to Greece  ,  this time  आरपार  the Aegean  समुद्र  , under  the   कमांड  of  datis   और   artaphernes   .
इस   expedition   subjugated  the Cyclades , before besieging , capturing  और  razing Eretria .
however  ,  जबकि   en  route  to  attack Athens ,  the  Persian  फ़ोर्स  was decisively defeated  by  the  athenians  at  the  Battle of  मैराथन   ,   समाप्ति  Persian efforts for the  समय   होने   .
Darius then  began  to plan to complete the  conquest  of  यूनानियों   ,  but  died  in  486  BC and responsibility  लिये   the   conquest  passed  to   उसके  son  xerxes   i   .
In  480   bc  , Xerxes personally  led  the  दूसरी  Persian  आक्रमण  of Greece with one of the largest ancient  सेना  ever assembled  .
Victory  over  the 'Allied  '   यूनानी  states ( led by Sparta and  एथेंस   )  at the Battle of Thermopylae allowed the Persians  to  torch  एथेंस  and overrun most of  यूनानियों   .
however  , while  seeking  to destroy  the  combined  यूनानी   बेड़े  , the  फारसियों  suffered  a   कठोर  defeat  at  the  बैटल  of Salamis .
The following year ,  the  confederated Greeks went  on  the  अप्रिय  , defeating the  पारसी   फौज   at   the  Battle of Plataea  ,   और   समाप्ति  the invasion  of  Greece .
The  अलाइड   यूनानियों  followed up their success by  destroying   the   बाकी  of the  पारसी  fleet at  the  Battle of Mycale , before expelling  पारसी   garrisons  from Sestos  (  479  bc   )   और   byzantium   (  478  bc   )   .
the  actions of  the  general  pausanias  at  the   घेरा   of  Byzantium  alienated  many  of   the   यूनानी  states from the Spartans ,  और   the  anti-Persian alliance  थी  therefore reconstituted  around  Athenian  नेतृत्व  ,  as  the  so-called  Delian League  .
The Delian League continued to campaign against Persia for the next  तीन  decades  ,   शुरूआत  with the  expulsion  of  the  remaining  पारसी   garrisons  from Europe .
At  the   बैटल   of   the   eurymedon   in   466   bc  ,  the  League  जीती  a double  विजय  that  आखिरकार  secured freedom  लिये   the  cities  of  Ionia .
However  ,   the  League  's  involvement  in   an   मिश्र  revolt (  इससे  460–454 BC ) resulted in  a   विनाशकारी   शिकस्त   ,   और  further campaigning  थी  suspended .
a  fleet  थी   भेजा   to   साइप्रस  in  451   bc  , but achieved little  ,  and when it withdrew  the  Greco-Persian  युद्धों  drew to  a  quiet end .
कुछ  historical sources  सुझाएँ   the  end  of  hostilities was marked by a peace treaty  between   एथेंस  and  फारस  ,  the  so-called  सलाम   of  Callias  .
hooverville  near Portland , Oregon
a   ``   hooverville  '' is the popular  नाम  for shanty towns  निर्मित   by   बेघर   लोगों  during the  ग्रेट  Depression  .
वे   यहूद   नामित   बाद  Herbert  हूवर   ,   जो   थी   अध्यक्ष   of   the  United States during  the   onset   of   the  Depression and widely  blamed   लिये   it  .
The term  थी  coined by  चार्ल्स   माइकेल्सन   ,  publicity  मुख्य  of the Democratic National  कमेटी  .
मैथ्यू  Michael Hasselbeck ( born  सितंबर  25 , 1975 ) is  an   अमरीकी   फ़ुटबॉल  quarterback for  the   इंडियानापोलिस  Colts of  the  National  फ़ुटबॉल   लीग  ( NFL )  .
he   थी  drafted  in   the   छठे  round  of  the 1998 NFL Draft by the Green  खाड़ी   पैकर्स   .
बाद   a   ऋतु  on the  अभ्यास  squad and two  सीज़न  backing up Brett  favre  , he  थी  traded to  the   सिएटल  Seahawks  in   2001   .
hasselbeck  gained the  starting  role in 2003  ,   और  led  सिएटल   to  six playoff appearances and a Super Bowl  रूप   ;  he  थी   चयनित  to three Pro Bowls and an All-Pro  चयन  .
Following  टेन  seasons  साथ  the  सीहॉक्स   ,   hasselbeck  joined the  टेनेसी   टाइटन्स  in 2011 .
hasselbeck  then signed a contract  साथ  the Indianapolis  कोल्टस  in 2013  कम   than   24  hours after being  released   by  the Tennessee  टाइटन्स   .
ICT is inevitably  सम्बन्धित   to   the   कंप्यूटर  network .
Information and Communications  प्रौद्योगिकी  or  (  ICT ) , is  प्रायः  used as  an   विस्तारित  synonym for information technology (  it  ) ,  लकिन  is a more specific term that stresses the role  of  unified communications  और  the integration of telecommunications  (  telephone lines and  बेतार   सिग्नल  ) , computers as  खूब  as necessary enterprise software ,  middleware   ,  storage ,  और  audio-visual  प्रणालियों  , which enable users  to   अभिगम  ,  स्टोर  , transmit , and manipulate  सूचना  .
The  phrase   आईसीटी   था   महरूम  used  by  academic researchers since  the   1980s   ,  but  it   became   लोकप्रिय   बाद   it   थी   प्रयुक्त  in  a  report to the UK  सरकारी  by Dennis Stevenson  in   1997   और  in the revised  नेशनल  Curriculum for  इंग्लैण्ड   ,  Wales and Northern  आयरलैंड  in  2000  .
The term  आईसीटी  is  अभी  also  प्रयुक्त  to  refer  to  the  convergence of audio-visual and telephone  संजाल   साथ  computer  संजाल   through  a  सिंगल   cabling  or  कड़ी  system  .
There  हैं  large  आर्थिक  incentives (  विशाल  cost savings due to  विलोपन  of the telephone network )  to  merge  the  audio-visual  ,   भवन  management and  टेलीफोन  network  साथ   the   कंप्यूटर  network system using a single unified system  of  cabling  ,  signal distribution and  प्रबन्धन  .
the  term Infocommunications is  प्रयुक्त   in   कुछ   मामले  as a shorter form of information and communication ( s  )  technology .
In  फैक्ट   infocommunications   is   the   विस्तार   of   दूरसंचार  with information  प्रसंस्करण   और  content handling  कृत्यों   on   a  common digital technology base  .
लिये  a comparison of these  और   अन्य  terms , see  .
लिये  ICT Development Index  around  the world  ,  see .
इस  is  a   सूची   of   वर्ण   इससे   जार्ज  Lopez .
a  schematic  प्रस्तुतीकरण   of  the  प्लम   खीर   मॉडल  of the  अणु  ;  in  Thomson 's  गणितीय   मॉडल  the  ``  corpuscles  ''   (  or modern  electrons  )  यहूद   arranged  non-randomly , in rotating rings
the   वर्तमान   मॉडल  of  the   sub-atomic  structure involves  a   घना  nucleus surrounded by a  probabilistic  ``  बादल   ''  of  electrons
The plum pudding model of the  अणु   by   J.   J.  Thomson  ,   जो  discovered  the  electron  in  1897  ,   थी  proposed in  1904  before the discovery of the atomic  केंद्रक  in  अनुक्रम  to add the electron to the atomic model .
in   इस  model , the atom is  रचित   of   electrons   (  which Thomson  स्टिल   पुकारा   ``  corpuscles ''  ,   हालांकि   G.  J.  stoney   था  proposed that  अणु  of  विद्युत   be  called electrons  in  1894 ) surrounded by a  सूप   of  positive charge  to   संतुलन   the  electrons  '   ऋणात्मक   आरोप   ,  like negatively  चार्ज   ``  plums `` surrounded  by  positively charged  ``   खीर  `` .
The electrons ( as we  जान   उन्हें   आज  ) were thought to be positioned throughout the atom  ,  but with  अनेक   structures   संभावित  for  positioning   अनेक  electrons  ,  particularly rotating  बजती  of electrons ( see  नीचे   )  .
Instead  of  a  सूप   ,  the atom was  भी   sometimes  said to have  था   a  `` cloud '' of positive charge  .
साथ  this  मॉडल  , Thomson abandoned his earlier  ``  nebular atom ''  परिकल्पना   in  which the  अणु  was  रचित  of  immaterial   vortices   .
अभी   ,  at least part of the  अणु   थी   to   be  composed of  thomson   's  particulate negative  corpuscles   ,  although the rest of the positively charged part of the  अणु   remained  somewhat  nebulous   और   ill-defined  .
the  1904  thomson   मॉडल  was disproved by the  1909  gold  foil   प्रयोग  of Hans  geiger  and  अर्नेस्ट   मार्सडेन   .
This was interpreted  by  Ernest  रदरफोर्ड   in  1911
to  imply   a  very  छोटी  nucleus of the  अणु   containing  a  बहुत  high  धनात्मक   चार्ज  ( in the case  of   सुनहरा  ,  पर्याप्त   to  balance about 100  electrons  )  ,   यूँ   अग्रणी  to the Rutherford  मॉडल   of  the atom .
Although gold has  an   परमाणु  number of 79 ,  तत्काल  after  रदरफोर्ड  's  पेपर  appeared  in  1911  antonius  Van den  broek  made  the   सहज  suggestion that atomic number is nuclear  चार्ज  .
The matter  जरूरी  experiment to decide .
Henry Moseley  's   कार्य   दिखाया   experimentally  in 1913  (  see Moseley  's  law  )  that the effective  नाभिकीय  charge was very close to  the  atomic number (  moseley   मिला  only one  ईकाई   अंतर  )  ,  and Moseley referenced only the  papers  of Van den  broek  and  रदरफोर्ड   .
This work culminated in the solar-system-like (  लकिन  quantum-limited ) Bohr model of  the  atom  in   the  same year ,  in  which  a  nucleus  containing  an  परमाणु  number  of  positive charge is surrounded by an  बराबर  number of  electrons  in orbital shells  .
bohr   था  also  प्रेरित  Moseley  's  work  .
thomson  's model was compared ( though  नहीं   by   thomson  ) to  a  British dessert called  प्लम   खीर  ,  hence  the name  .
Thomson 's paper was published in the  कूच  1904 edition of the Philosophical  पत्रिका   ,   the  leading  अंग्रेजों  science  जर्नल  of  the  day .
In  thomson  's  दृश्य  :  ...  the atoms  of   the  elements consist  of   a   क्रमांक  of negatively electrified corpuscles enclosed in  a  sphere of uniform positive electrification ,  ...
In  इस   मॉडल   ,  the electrons  यहूद   फ़्री  to  घूर्णन   भीतर  the  blob   or   बादल   of  positive substance  .
ये  orbits  यहूद  stabilized in the model  by   the  fact that when an electron moved  दूर   इससे  the center  of  the positive  बादल  , it felt a  larger  net positive inward force  ,  because there  थी  more material  of   विपरीत  charge , inside  इसके  orbit  (  see Gauss 's law ) .
In Thomson  's  model  ,  electrons  यहूद   फ़्री  to  घूर्णन  in rings  जिससे  were further stabilized by interactions between the  electrons  ,  और  spectra were to be  accounted  for  by  energy  मतभेद   of   अलग   रिंग  orbits  .
Thomson attempted  to   मेक   उसके  model  खाता  for some of  the   प्रमुख  spectral lines known for some elements  ,  but was  नहीं   notably  successful at  इस   .
Still  ,  Thomson  's  model  (   साथ  with a  समान  Saturnian ring model for atomic  electrons   ,  also  put  forward  in   1904   by  Nagaoka after  जेम्स   क्लर्क  Maxwell 's model of  शनि   's   बजती  )  ,  were  पहले  harbingers  of  the later and more  कामयाब  solar-system-like  bohr  model of the  अणु  .
Typical  स्ट्रिप  of  बेकन  .
Bacon is  a  cured meat  prepared   इससे  a  सुअर   .
It is first cured  using  large  quantities  of salt  ,  either  in  a brine or  in  a dry  पैकिंग   ;  the result is  भैस  bacon (  भी  known  as  green  बेकन   )  .
Fresh bacon  may  then  be   further  dried  लिये  weeks or months in cold air  ,   or   it  may be  boiled   or  smoked .
Fresh and  सूखी  bacon is typically cooked before  खाने  .
boiled  bacon  is   तैयार  to  खा  , as is  कुछ   स्मोक्ड   बेकन  ,  लकिन   may   be  cooked further before  खाने  .
बेकन  is prepared from  अनेक   अलग   कटौती  of  मांस  .
It is usually made from side  और   वापस   कटौती   of  pork , except  in   the  United States , where  it  is  लगभग  always  prepared  from  पोर्क   पेट  (  typically  referred to as  ``  streaky  ''  , ``  वसीय  ''  ,  or `` American style  ''  outside  of   the   us   और  Canada ) .
The  पक्ष   काटें  has more  मांस  and less fat than the belly .
बेकन  may be  prepared  from either  of   दो  distinct back cuts : fatback  ,  which is almost pure  मोटे  , and  पोर्क  loin  ,   जिससे   is   बहुत  lean .
bacon-cured  pork loin is known  as  back  बेकन   .
Uncooked pork belly bacon  स्ट्रिप्स  .
Bacon may be eaten smoked  ,   boiled   ,   fried   ,  baked ,  or   ग्रील्ड  ,  or  used as a  नाबालिग  ingredient to flavor dishes .
Bacon is  भी   प्रयुक्त  for barding and  larding  roasts , especially  खेल  , e.g .  venison  , pheasant .
the   शब्द  is derived from  the  Old High  जर्मनी   bacho  , meaning  ``  buttock '' ,  ``   हैम   ''   or   ``  side of bacon  ''  ,  और   cognate  with the Old French  बेकन  .
In continental Europe ,  इस   भाग   of   the   सुअर   is   प्रायः  not  स्मोक्ड  like  बेकन   is   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ; it  is  used primarily  in  cubes ( lardons  )  as a cooking  संघटक  ,  valued   दोनो   as  a  सोर्स  of fat  और  for  इसके   स्वाद  .
In Italy ,  इस  is  पुकारा   pancetta  and is  प्रायः   पकाया  in small cubes or  परोसा  uncooked and  thinly  sliced as part  of  an antipasto  .
Meat from other animals , such as beef ,  मेमने  ,  मुर्गा  ,  बकरी   ,   or   तुर्कों  ,  may   भी   be  cut  ,  cured , or  वरना   prepared  to  resemble  bacon , and  may  even be referred to as `` bacon ''  .
Such  उपयोग  is common in areas with significant Jewish and Muslim populations .
the  USDA defines  बेकन   as  `` the cured  पेट   of   a  swine  carcass   ''   ;  other  कटौती  and  विशेषताएँ  must be  separately  qualified ( e.g.  ,  `` smoked  पोर्क   loin   बेकन  '' ) .
For safety , bacon must  be   treated  to prevent trichinosis , caused by  trichinella  , a parasitic  roundworm  which  can   be  destroyed  by  heating  ,  freezing ,  drying  ,  or  smoking .
Bacon is  विशिष्ट  from salt  पोर्क  and ham by differences in the brine ( or  शुष्क  packing  )  .
बेकन  brine has added  curing   संघटक   ,   सबसे  notably sodium  नाइट्राइट   ,   और  occasionally sodium  नाइट्रेट  or potassium nitrate  (  saltpeter ) ;  सोडियम   ascorbate  or erythorbate are added to accelerate curing and stabilize  रंग   .
Flavorings such as brown sugar or maple are  प्रयुक्त  for  कुछ  products  .
If used , sodium polyphosphates are added to improve sliceability  और  reduce  spattering  when  the   बेकन   is  pan fried .
Today , a brine for ham  ,  but  नहीं   बेकन   ,   शामिल   a   विशाल   राशि  of sugar  .
Historically  ,  `` ham  ''  and `` bacon  ''   referred  to  अलग   कटौती   of   मांस  that were brined  or   packed  identically , often together in  the  same  बैरल   .
the  Employee Retirement Income Security  अधिनियम  of  1974  ( ERISA )  (   ,   संहिताबद्ध  in part  at  )  is  a federal law  जिससे  establishes minimum standards for  पेंशन   योजनाएँ  in private industry  और  provides for extensive  नियम  on the  संघीय  income tax effects of  ट्रांजेक्शन  associated with  कर्मचारी  benefit  योजनाएँ   .
erisa   थी  enacted to  protect   the   रूचि  of  कर्मचारी   लाभ   योजना  participants and  उनके   beneficiaries  by:
requiring   the   प्रकटीकरण   of  financial and other information  concerning   the  plan to  beneficiaries   ;
Establishing  मानकों  of conduct for  योजना  fiduciaries ;
Providing  लिये  appropriate remedies and  अभिगम   to  the  संघीय   न्यायालयों  .
ERISA is  sometimes  used to refer  to  the  पूरा  body of  कानून   regulating   कर्मचारी  benefit  योजनाएँ  , which are found  मुख्यतः   in   the   आतंरिक   आय  Code and  erisa  itself .
Responsibility  लिये  the interpretation  और  enforcement  of   erisa  is divided among the Department of  मजदूर   ,   the   विभाग   of  the  राजकोष   (  particularly the Internal  आय   सेवा   )  ,  और  the Pension  लाभ  Guaranty  निगम   .
Illegal  आव्रजन  to  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  is the act  of  foreign  नागरिकों   प्रवेश  the  संयुक्त  States  ,  without government permission and in violation  of  United  राज्य  nationality law , or  रहकर  beyond the  termination  date of a  वीज़ा  ,  भी   in  violation of the  विधि   .
A warning  चिह्न  at  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   boundary   between  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  and Canada in  पाइंट   रॉबर्ट्स  ,  वॉशिंगटन   .
A  much   अलग  approach at the  u.s.-mexico  border near El  पासो  , Texas
The undocumented immigrant population of  the  United  राज्य  in 2008  थी   अनुमानित   by   the   बीच   लिये  Immigration Studies to  be  about  11  million  लोगों  ,  bas  from  12.5  million  लोगों  in 2007 .
अन्य  estimates range from  7   to   20  million .
According  to  a 2005  pew  Hispanic Center report , 56 %  of   undocumented  immigrants were from Mexico ; 22 %  यहूद  from  अन्य  Latin American countries ; 13  %  were from Asia  ;  6 %  यहूद   इससे  Europe  और  Canada  ;   और   3  %  यहूद  from  अफ़्रीकी   और   the   बाकी   of  the world  .
Alvin Independent School District  is  a school district based in Alvin  ,  Texas (  यूएसए   )   .
एल्विन  ISD is  a  large suburban school district  दक्षिण  of  ह्यूस्टन  in  the  communities of Alvin ,  manvel  , Pearland  ,   hillcrest  , Rosharon , Iowa Colony ,  लिवरपूल  , and Amsterdam .
aisd   serves   pearland   नगर  's rapidly growing  पश्चिमी  portion of the city including the new  विशाल  master-planned communities  of   छाया   क्रीक   ranch   ,  South Fork , and Southern Trails  .
Alvin ISD covers of  जमीन  .
In human anatomy , the  ulnar   तंत्रिका  is a  तंत्रिका   जिससे  runs near the ulna  अस्थि   .
The  ulnar   collateral  ligament of elbow  संयुक्त  is in relation with  the   ulnar  nerve  .
The  तंत्रिका   is  the  largest  unprotected  तंत्रिका  in  the   इंसान   देह   (  meaning unprotected by muscle or  अस्थि   )  ,  so   चोट   is   आम  .
This  तंत्रिका  is  सीधे  connected to the little  उंगली  , and  the   सटा  half of the  रिंग  finger  ,  supplying the palmar  पक्ष   of  these fingers , including both front  और   वापस   of   the  tips , perhaps  as  far back as  the  fingernail beds .
एक  method of  injuring   the   तंत्रिका   is   to  strike the medial epicondyle  of  the  humerus  from posteriorly , or inferiorly with the  कोहनी   flexed  .
The  ulnar  nerve is  फंस  between the  अस्थि  and the overlying skin  at   इस   पाइंट  .
This is commonly referred to as bumping one 's ``  मजेदार  bone  ''   .
इस   नाम  is thought  to   be  a pun  ,   आधारित  on  the   ध्वनि  resemblance between the name of the bone  of  the  अपर   भुजा  , the  ``  humerus `` and the  शब्द   ``  humorous `` .
alternatively   ,   according   to   the  Oxford English  शब्दकोष  it may refer to `` the peculiar sensation  अनुभवी  when it  is  struck '' .
Hogwarts  स्कूल  of Witchcraft and Wizardry ,  shortened  Hogwarts ,  is  a fictional British  स्कूल  of magic for students aged  ग्यारह  to eighteen ,  और   is  the  प्राथमिक   सेटिंग  for  the  first  छह   किताबे  in J.K. Rowling  's  Harry Potter series  .
रोलिंग   रै  suggested that she may have inadvertently taken the  नाम   इससे  the  hogwort  plant  (   croton   capitatus  ) ,  जिससे  she  था  seen  at   kew  Gardens  कुछ  time before writing  the   श्रेणी   ,   हालांकि   the  names `` The Hogwarts ''  और  `` Hoggwart  ''  appear  in   the  1954  निगेल  Molesworth book How To Be Topp  by  Geoffrey  willans  .
Hogwarts school  थी  voted as the  36th  best  स्कॉटिश   शैक्षणिक  establishment in a 2008  ऑनलाइन   रैंकिंग   ,   outranking   एडिनबर्ग   's   loretto  School .
According to  a   निदेशक  of the Independent Schools  संजाल  Rankings  ,  it  थी   added   to  the  स्कूलों   लिस्टिंग   ``  for  मजा  ''  और  was then voted on  .
the  U.S.  subprime   बंधक   संकट   थी   a   नियत   of  events  और  conditions that led to a financial crisis  और   subsequent  recession  कि   began  in 2008  .
It was characterized by a rise  in   subprime   बंधक   delinquencies  and foreclosures , and the  resulting   मनाही  of securities  समर्थित  by said mortgages .
अनेक   प्रमुख  financial  संस्थानों  collapsed  in  September  2008  , with significant  disruption   in   the   प्रवाह   of  credit to businesses and  उपभोक्ता   और  the onset  of  a severe global recession .
वहीँ  were many causes  of  the crisis ,  साथ  commentators assigning  अलग   स्तर   of  blame  to  financial institutions , regulators  ,  credit  एजेंसियों  , government  आवास   नीतियों   ,   और  consumers ,  among  others .
a   proximate  cause  थी  the rise in  subprime   lending  .
The  प्रतिशत  of  lower-quality  subprime  mortgages   originated  during a given year  रोज़  from  the   ऐतिहासिक  8 %  or  lower range to  लगभग  20  %   इससे   2004  to 2006 ,  साथ  much higher ratios in some parts of the U.S  .
A  ऊँची  percentage  of  these subprime mortgages , over  90  % in 2006  लिये   उदाहरण  ,  यहूद   adjustable-rate   mortgages  .
These two changes were  भाग  of a broader trend of lowered  lending  standards and  higher-risk   बंधक  products  .
further  ,  u.S.   households   था  become  increasingly  indebted ,  साथ   the  ratio of debt to disposable personal income rising  इससे  77 %  in   1990  to 127 %  at   the   समाप्त  of 2007  ,   much  of this  बढ़ाएँ  mortgage-related .
When U.S. home prices  अस्वीकृत   steeply   बाद  peaking  in   mid-2006   ,  borrowers ' ability  to  refinance their  लोन   became  more difficult .
as  adjustable-rate mortgages  began  to reset at  उच्चतर  interest rates (  causing   उच्चतर  monthly  भुगतान   )   ,  mortgage delinquencies  soared   .
Securities backed with mortgages  ,  including  subprime  mortgages ,  widely  held by financial firms  globally  ,  खोया  most of their value .
Global investors  भी   drastically   घटाया  purchases of mortgage-backed debt  और  other securities as part  of  a decline in  the  capacity and willingness  of   the   निजी  financial system to support  lending  .
चिंताएं   परिचय  the soundness  of  U.S. credit and financial markets  led   to  tightening credit  around  the world  और  slowing  आर्थिक  growth in  the   u.S.  and  यूरोपीय  .
the   संकट  had severe ,  long-lasting   consequences  for the  u.S.   और  European economies  .
The U.S.  डाला   a   गहन  recession  ,  with nearly 9 million jobs lost during  2008  and 2009 , roughly  6  % of  the  workforce .
U.S.  आवास  prices fell  nearly   30  % on average and the  u.S.   भण्डार   मार्केट  fell  लगभग  50  %   by  early 2009 .
As of early 2013 ,  the   u.S.   भण्डार  market  था  recovered  to  its pre-crisis  शिखर  but  आवास  prices  remained  near  उनके  low  पाइंट   और  unemployment  remained  elevated .
Economic growth  remained  below pre-crisis levels  .
यूरोपीय   भी   जारी   to   संघर्ष   साथ   इसके  own  आर्थिक  crisis .
Carl Jung  in  1910  .
मायर्स  and Briggs extrapolated  उनके  MBTI  सिद्धान्त  from Jung  's   कृतियाँ  in his book Psychological Types .
the   myers-briggs  Type Indicator  (  MBTI )  मूल्यांकन  is a  psychometric  questionnaire  designed   to  measure  मनोवैज्ञानिक  preferences  in  how  लोगों  perceive  the  world and  मेक   निर्णय  .
ये   वरीयताओं  were extrapolated from  the   typological  theories proposed  by   कार्ल  Gustav Jung and  पहला   प्रकाशित  in his 1921  किताब   मनोवैज्ञानिक  Types ( English  संस्करण   ,  1923 )  .
जंग  theorized  कि  there  हैं  four principal  मनोवैज्ञानिक  functions by which we  अनुभव   the   संसार  :  सनसनी  ,  अंतर्ज्ञान  , feeling ,  और   सोच   .
One of these four  कृत्यों  is  प्रबल  most  of  the  समय   .
the   असली  developers  of   the   व्यक्तित्व   inventory  were Katharine Cook Briggs and her daughter  ,  Isabel  briggs  Myers ; these two , having studied  extensively  the work of Jung  ,   turned  their  ब्याज  of human behavior  into  a  भक्ति   of  turning the theory  of   मनोवैज्ञानिक   प्रकार  to practical use .
वे  began  बनाना  the indicator during  संसार  War  ii  , believing that a knowledge of  व्यक्तित्व  preferences would  सहायता   महिलाओं   जो  were entering the industrial workforce for the first  समय  to identify the sort of  war-time  jobs that would  be  `` most comfortable  और  effective '' .
The  आरंभिक  questionnaire  grew  into the  myers-briggs   प्रकार   indicator   ,  which was  पहला   प्रकाशित   in   1962  .
the   mbti   focuses  on normal populations and emphasizes the value of  naturally  occurring differences .
Robert  kaplan  and Dennis Saccuzzo  मानना   ``   the  underlying  assumption   of  the MBTI is that we  सब   have  specific  वरीयताओं   in  the way  we  construe  हमारी  experiences  ,   और   ये  preferences  underlie  our interests  ,  needs ,  मान   ,  and motivation  ''  ( p.  499  ) .
`` Judas ''  is  a  सोंग   by  American recording  कलाकार   महिला  Gaga , from  उसके  second  स्टुडियो  album Born This Way ( 2011 )  .
It was released by Interscope  रिकॉर्ड  on April 15 ,  2011  ,  चार  days  ahead   of  its scheduled release  .
लिखा  and  उत्पादित   by  Lady Gaga and RedOne ,  ``  Judas '' is  a  dance  और  electro  हाउस   सोंग  about a woman in love with  a   man  who betrayed  उसके   .
It  embodies   the  incidents  कि  have  haunted  Gaga  in  the  पास्ट   ,  and its core  अर्थ   refers   to  the negative  भाग  of her life that  वो  ca  n't  escape  .
गागा  has further  समझाया  that the  सोंग  was also  परिचय  honoring one 's  भीतरी   अंधेरा  in  अनुक्रम   to  bring oneself into  the  light  .
The artwork  लिये   the   सिंगल  was designed by Gaga in Microsoft  शब्द  .
In spite of a  polarizing   प्रभाव   on   अनेक  religious  समूह   ,  the  सोंग   थी  generally  खूब   प्राप्त  by  आलोचकों   ,  who likened the  सोंग  to ``  ख़राब  Romance `` with some noting it should  have  been  the   एल्बम  's lead  सिंगल   .
the   सोंग   रै  a similar sound to Gaga 's  पिछला  RedOne-produced tracks , including  ``   पोकर  Face  ``  , `` LoveGame `` , ``  ख़राब  Romance  ''   ,   और  `` Alejandro  ``  .
it   contains  three  पृथक   hooks   और   a  house  -influenced  break down  .
Gaga  समझाया  that  the   लाइनों  spoken during  the   विश्लेषण   बात  about  उसके  as beyond redemption  ,  regarding  the   परंपरागत  views of  कया  a  स्त्री   चाहिए  be .
`` Judas ''  initially  had  a  strong sales  खोलने  , but  थी   कम  successful  commercially   in   तुलना   to   गागा  's previous  singles  .
The  सोंग   पहुँचे   the  top  टेन   of  the  चार्ट  in most major  म्यूज़िक   बाज़ार  , and also reached  the  top of the charts in South Korea .
A music video for  the   सोंग  was  फिल्माया  in  अप्रैल  2011  ,  co-directed by Gaga and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring Norman Reedus .
It has a Biblical storyline  जहाँ   reedus  played  यहूदा   इस्कैरियट  and Gaga played  मरियम  Magdalene .
the  video portrays them as modern  दिन   प्रचारकों   going   to  Jerusalem  .
it   शामिल  the Biblical story  of   यहूदा  betraying  यीशु  ,  और   ended  with Gaga as Magdalene  getting  stoned  to   मौत   .
Before its release  ,  the  कैथोलिक  League condemned Gaga for the  कथित   उपयोग  of religious imagery and  उसके   भूमिका   in   the  video .
However , critics generally praised  the  video  ,   नहीं  finding any offensive content .
The  वीडियो   थी   मनोनीत  for  दो  awards at  the  2011 MTV  वीडियो   म्यूज़िक  Awards  .
Gaga  रै  performed `` Judas '' on  a  number  of  television shows  ,  including The Graham  नॉर्टन  Show ,  शनिवार   रात्रि  Live , Good  morning   americas  ``  गर्मियाँ   कॉन्सर्ट   श्रेणी  '' , the French X  फ़ैक्टर   as   खूब   as   on  The  एलेन   degeneres   दिखाएँ   .
Marvin Gaye ( April 2  ,  1939April 1 , 1984  )  , born Marvin Pentz Gay  ,  Jr.  ,   थी  an American singer-songwriter and musician  .
gaye   helped   to   आकार  the  ध्वनि  of  motown  Records in the  1960s   साथ   a  string of hits including  ``  How  मीठी   it  Is (  to  Be  loved  By You  )   ``   और  ``  i  Heard It Through the  grapevine  ``  और   duet   रिकार्डिंग   साथ  Mary Wells and Tammi  terrell  ,  बाद  earning the titles `` Prince of Motown '' and  ``   प्रिंस  of Soul '' .
दौरान   the  1970s , Gaye  अंकित  the concept albums  कया   's  Going On and  let   's  Get  it  On  और   became  among  the   पहला  artists in Motown  to  break away from  the   बागडोर   of  its  उत्पादन   कम्पनी  .
Gaye 's later recordings influenced several R & B subgenres  ऐसे  as  शांत  storm and neo-soul  .
Following a  काल  in Europe  अंतर्गत   a  tax exile  in   the  early  1980s  ,  gaye   released   the  1982 Grammy  award-winning   hit  ``  यौन   healing  `` and the  मध्यरात्रि  Love album .
Since his death in  1984   ,  Gaye has  महरूम   मरणोपरांत  honored  by  many institutions  ,  including the  ग्रैमी   आजीवन   उपलब्धि  Award and the Rock and  फेंकें  Hall  of   कीर्ति  .
the  Academy Award for Best Picture  is  one of the  अकादमी  Awards of  मेरिट   प्रस्तुत  annually by  the   अकादमी  of  गति  Picture  कला   और   sciences   (   ampas   )   to   निर्माता  working in  the   गति   चित्र  industry  और  is  the  only category in which every member  is  eligible  to  nominate  लिये   .
बेहतरीन   चित्र  is considered the  सबसे  important  of   the   अकादमी  Awards , as  it   represents  all  the   directing  , acting , music composing , writing ,  संपादन  and other efforts  put  forth into a  फिल्मी  .
Consequently  ,  Best Picture is  the   फाइनल  award and  the  conclusion of  the  annual Academy  पुरस्कार  ceremony .
the  Grand Staircase columns  at  the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles , where  the  Academy Awards ceremonies have been  आयोजित   चूंकि  2002 , showcase every film that has  जीती  the Best  चित्र   शीर्षक  since the award 's inception  85  years ago .
भारी  Rain is an  इंटरैक्टिव   नाटक  action-adventure video game  निर्मित  by  फ्रेंच  developer  quantic  Dream  exclusively  for  the  PlayStation 3 .
the   खेल  is written and  निर्देशित  by Quantic Dream  's  founder and CEO David  पिंजरा  .
Heavy Rains  स्टोरी   is  a dramatic  थ्रिलर   modelled  after film  noir   ,  featuring  चार   protagonists  involved with the mystery of the  origami   कातिल   ,  a  सीरियल  killer who uses extended periods of rainfall  to   डुबो  his  पीड़ितों  .
Ethan  मंगल   is  trying  to   सहेजें  his son  इससे   होने  the next victim  ,  while  investigative  journalist Madison Paige  ,   एफबीआई  profiler Norman  jayden   ,   और   निजी  detective Scott Shelby  हैं   प्रत्येक   trying   to   track  down  clues  to  the  Origami  कातिल  's  पहचान   .
The  खिलाड़ी  interacts with the game  by  performing actions  highlighted  on  स्क्रीन  related  to  motions  on   the  controller  ,   और  in some cases , performing  a   श्रेणी  of  जल्दी   समय  events during fast-paced action  sequences  .
the  player 's decisions  और  actions during  the   खेल   होगा   affect   the  narrative .
The  प्रमुख   वर्ण   can  be killed ,  और  certain  क्रियाएँ   may   सीसे   to   अलग  scenes and endings .
a   playable  demo  थी  released on 11 February  2010  .
the   डेमो   थी  released prior  to  this  तिथि  for  लोगों  who took part in a  चार  Day  चुनौती  on  5   फ़रवरी   2010   .
a  patch  to  allow  उपयोग  of the PlayStation Move controller to play  the   खेल  was released in September 2010  .

it  won  2010   's  Game of the Year from CNN and Gaming Union , and Best PS3 Game of  2010  by GameSpy and  ign  .
A  परिवर्धित  version of  the   खेल  was released titled Heavy Rain Edition  modifiée   exclusively  in France ,  aimed  towards  a   younger   दर्शक   .

Total superannuation  उद्योग  liabilities : members funds and reserves  (  A $ millions ) since 1988 .
Annual total superannuation industry  एसेट  growth 1996-2005 .
superannuation   in  Australia refers to the  इंतजाम  which people make in Australia to  have   निधि  available  लिये   उन्हें   in  retirement  .
In Australia ,  superannuation  arrangements  हैं  government-supported and  प्रोत्साहित   ,   और  minimum provisions are  अनिवार्य   लिये  employees  .
लिये  example ,  नियोक्ता  are required  to  pay a  proportion  of an employee 's  salaries   और   मजदूरी  ( currently 9 % )  into  a  superannuation  fund  ,  but  लोगों   हैं   प्रोत्साहित  to  put   aside  additional  निधि  into superannuation  .
the   न्यूनतम  obligation required by  नियोक्ता  is set to  बढ़ाएँ   to  12  %   धीरे   stepping   annually  from 2013 to  2020  .
an  individual  can   withdraw   निधि   आउट  of  a  superannuation fund when the person  meets   एक  of  the  conditions of  रिलीज  contained  in   अनुसूची  1  of  the  superannuation   उद्योग   (  Supervision ) Regulations  1994   .

Electoral  कॉलेज   मैप   प्रर्दशित   the  results of the 2012  u.S.  presidential  चुनाव  .
President Barack Obama ( D - IL ) won the  लोकप्रिय  vote in 26 states and  the  District of Columbia  (   denoted  in  ब्लू   )   to  capture 332  चुनावी  votes .
Former Governor Mitt  romney  ( R - MA  )   जीती  the popular vote in 24 states  (   denoted   in   रेड  )  to  capture 206  चुनावी  votes  .
Cartogram  प्रतिनिधित्व   of   the   चुनावी  College  vote  for  the   2012   चुनाव   ,   साथ   प्रत्येक   वर्गाकार  representing one electoral  vote   .
the  United States Electoral College is the  संस्था   कि  officially  elects   the   अध्यक्ष   और  Vice President  of   the  United States every four  सालो   .
the   अध्यक्ष   और   वाइस  President  हैं  not elected directly  by  the  मतदाता   .
Instead  ,  they are elected by  ``   निर्वाचक   ''  who  हैं   चुनी   by   लोकप्रिय  vote  on  a state-by-state  आधार   .
निर्वाचक   हैं  apportioned to each state and the District of Columbia , but not to  territorial  possessions  of  the United  राज्य  , such as  प्यूर्टो   रीको  and Guam  .
the  number of  निर्वाचक  in each  राज्य   is  equal to the number of members  of  Congress  to  which  the   राज्य   is  entitled .
the  Twenty-third Amendment has always resulted  in  the District  of  Columbia  having  three  निर्वाचक   .
वहीँ   हैं  538 electors , based on  वहीँ  being 435  प्रतिनिधि  and 100  सीनेटरों  ,  प्लस   the   तीन  electors from the District of  कोलंबिया  .
Electors are  pledged  to  particular  presidential and vice presidential  उम्मीदवार  ,  हालांकि   unpledged  electors  हैं   संभावित  .
In all  राज्य   ,  except  maine  and  नेब्रास्का   ,  electors  हैं   निर्वाचित  on  a  ``  winner-take-all   ''  basis  .
That is , all electors pledged to  the   अध्यक्षीय  candidate who wins the most votes in a  राज्य  become electors for that state .
Maine and Nebraska use the `` congressional district  विधि  '' ,  selecting   एक  elector within each  congressional  district  by  popular  vote  and selecting  the   बाकी   दो  electors  by  a statewide  लोकप्रिय   vote  .
हालांकि   no  elector is required by federal law to honor a  प्रतिज्ञा  , there  have  only been very few  अवसरों  when an elector voted contrary to  a   प्रतिज्ञा   .
The  बारहवीं  Amendment  specifies  how a President and Vice President are elected and  requires   प्रत्येक   elector   to  cast  एक   vote   लिये  President  और  another vote for Vice President .
आलोचकों   argue  that  the   चुनावी   कॉलेज  is inherently undemocratic and gives swing states  अनुपातहीन   influence  in  electing  the President and  वाइस  President  .
the  Electoral College  देता  a numeric advantage  in   the  election of the president to the  छोटी  states  ,   as  the  न्यूनतम   क्रमांक   of   निर्वाचक   लिये  the small states is three compared to one  लिये  the  चुनाव   of   प्रतिनिधि  .
On the other  हाथ   ,  the  winner-take-all   विधि  of voting  favors  the larger states .
a   क्रमांक  of  संवैधानिक  amendments  have  been  प्रस्तावित  seeking to  alter  the  चुनावी   कॉलेज  or replace it with a  सीधा   लोकप्रिय  vote .
Barack Hussein Obama II  (   ;  born  अगस्त  4 , 1961 )  is   the  44th  और  current  अध्यक्ष   of  the United States ,  the   पहला  African American to hold the  दफ्तर  .
Born in  होनोलूलू  ,  हवाई  ,  ओबामा   is  a graduate of Columbia University and Harvard Law  स्कूल  , where  he   थी   अध्यक्ष  of the Harvard Law Review .
he  was a  जातियाँ   आयोजक   in   शिकागो  before  कमाई  his  विधि   उपाधि   .
he  worked as a  सिविल   अधिकारों   attorney  in Chicago  और   सिखाया  constitutional  विधि  at  the   विश्वविद्यालयों  of Chicago  विधि  School  इससे  1992 to 2004 .
He served  तीन  terms  representing   the  13th District  in   the  Illinois  सीनेट   इससे   1997   to   2004  ,  कार्यशील   unsuccessfully   लिये   the  United  राज्य  House of Representatives in 2000 .
In  2004  , Obama received  नेशनल   ध्यान   दौरान  his  अभियान   to   represent  Illinois  in  the United States Senate with  उसके  victory  in  the  कूच  Democratic Party primary ,  उसके   keynote  address at  the   लोकतांत्रिक   नेशनल   सम्मेलन  in  जुलाई  , and his election to  the   सीनेट  in November  .
he  began his  अध्यक्षीय  campaign in 2007 , and  in   2008  ,  बाद   a  close primary campaign against Hillary Rodham  क्लिंटन  , he  जीती   sufficient   delegates   in   the  Democratic  पार्टी  primaries to receive the  अध्यक्षीय   नामांकन  .
he   तब   पराजित   रिपब्लिकन   nominee  John  मैक्केन   in  the  सामान्य   चुनाव   ,   और  was  उदघाटन  as president  on  January  20  , 2009 .
नौ   महीने  later  ,  Obama  थी  named the  2009   नोबेल  Peace  पुरस्कार   laureate  .
He  थी  re-elected president in November  2012  , defeating Republican nominee Mitt Romney  ,   और  was  sworn  in for a  दूसरी   पद  on January 20  ,  2013 .
जल्दी  in his  पहला  term in office , Obama signed into law economic stimulus legislation in  जवाब  to  the  Great Recession in  the  form  of   the  American Recovery and  reinvestment  Act of 2009 and the  कर  Relief , Unemployment Insurance  reauthorization  , and  जॉब  Creation Act  of  2010 .
अन्य  major domestic  पहलों   in  his presidency  शामिल  the Patient  सुरक्षा  and  सस्ती  Care Act  ,  often  referred  to as `` Obamacare  ''  ; the  dodd–frank   वॉल  Street Reform  और   उपभोक्ता   सुरक्षा   अधिनियम   ;  the  do  n't Ask  ,   do   n't  Tell  repeal  Act of 2010 ; the  बजट   कंट्रोल  Act of  2011  ;  और  the American  करदाताओं  Relief Act of 2012 .
In  may   2012   ,  he  became   the  first  बैठे  U.S. president to  सरेआम   support  same-sex marriage and in  2013  his administration filed briefs  जिससे   urged  the  परम्   अदालत  to rule in  एहसान  of  same-sex  couples in  दो  high-profile cases .
in  foreign  नीति  , Obama  ended   u.S.  military involvement in the Iraq War  ,  increased  troop  levels in  अफगानिस्तान  ,  हस्ताक्षरित  the  नई  START arms  कंट्रोल  treaty with  रूस  ,  ordered  U.S.  सैन्य  involvement in Libya  ,  and  ordered  the  सैन्य  operation that resulted in the death  of  Osama  बिन  Laden .
The  होंडा  CBR1100XX Super  blackbird  was  a  Honda  मोटरसाइकिल  made from 1996 to  2007  .
the  bike was  विकसित  to challenge the Kawasaki Ninja ZX-11 as the  संसार   's   तीव्रतम  production  मोटरसाइकिल   ,   और   होंडा   succeeded   साथ  a  शीर्ष  speed  of   .

नमूना  view  of  an  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  health record  आधारित  on  बिंब
Sample  दृश्य   of   an  electronic  स्वास्थ्य  record
An electronic health  रिकार्ड   (  EHR ) is an  evolving  concept  पारिभाषित   as  a systematic collection of  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  health  सूचना  about individual patients  or   populations   .
it  is a  रिकार्ड  in  डिजिटल   स्वरूप   कि   is   theoretically  capable  of   होने  shared  आरपार  different  स्वास्थ्य  care  जमावट  .
In  कुछ  cases  इस  sharing can occur by way of  network-connected  enterprise-wide  सूचना  systems  और  other information  संजाल  or exchanges  .
EHRs  may   शामिल  a range of  आंकड़ा  , including demographics  ,  medical  इतिहास   ,  medication and allergies  ,  immunization  औकात  , laboratory test results ,  radiology  images ,  vital   लक्षण  ,  निजी   आंकड़े  like  आयु  and weight , and billing information .
The  मेरिनर   up  on the mast in a storm  .
One of  the   wood-engraved  illustrations  by  Gustave Doré .
The  rime  of the  प्राचीन  Mariner  (   originally   the  Rime of the Ancyent Marinere )  is   the   longest  major  कविता  by  the   अंग्रेज़ी  poet  सैमुएल  Taylor  कॉलरिज   ,  written  in  1797–98 and  प्रकाशित  in 1798 in  the   पहला   संस्करण  of Lyrical  ballads   .
Modern  संस्करण  use  a  later revised version printed in  1817  that featured  a  gloss  .
Along  साथ  other  कविताएं   in  Lyrical  ballads   ,   it  was  a  signal shift to modern poetry  और  the  शुरूआत  of British Romantic literature .
a  proxy auto-config  (   pac  ) file  defines   कैसा   वेब  browsers  और  other  उपयोक्ता  agents can automatically choose  the  appropriate  प्रॉक्सी  server  (   अभिगम  method )  लिये  fetching a given URL  .
a   pac   संचिका  contains a  जावास्क्रिप्ट  function “FindProxyForURL (  url  ,  मेजबान  ) ” .
This function returns a string  साथ   एक   or  more  अभिगम   विधि  specifications .
ये  specifications cause the  उपयोक्ता   एजेंट  to  उपयोग   a  particular proxy server or to connect  सीधे  .
Multiple specifications provide a  fall-back  when a  प्रॉक्सी  fails to  respond  .
The  ब्राउजर   fetches  this  pac   संचिका   पहले  requesting other  यूआरएल  .
The URL of the  pac   संचिका   is   either   विन्यस्त   हस्तचालित  or determined  automatically  by the Web Proxy Autodiscovery Protocol .
Zendaya Coleman  (  born  सितंबर  1  ,   1996  )  ,  known mononymously as  zendaya  ,  is  an  अमरीकी   अभिनेत्री  , singer  और   नर्तकी   .
वो  stars  on  the  डिज़्नी   चैनल  sitcom  शेक  It Up as Rocky Blue  .
वो  has  स्ट्रक्चर  in  दो  films and  निभाई   एक  of the lead roles in the  फिल्मी  Frenemies  as  Halley Brandon  .
वो  voiced Fern in the  pixie  Hollow  खेल   .
She  appeared  in Good  लक  Charlie  as  Rocky Blue  और   in  a Good Luck Charlie  और  Shake  it  Up crossover title  चार्ली   शेक  It  up  .

zendaya  is also  a   संगीतकार  .

This  is  a  सूची  of airports  in   पेन्सिलवेनिया  ( a  u.S.  state ) ,  grouped   by  type and sorted  by  location .
It  contains  all  public-use  and military airports in  the   राज्य   .
Some private-use and  पूर्व   एयरपोर्ट  may be  शामिल   जहाँ   notable  , such  as  airports that were previously public-use , those with  वाणिज्यिक  enplanements  अंकित   by  the FAA or  एयरपोर्ट   आबंटित  an IATA  विमानक्षेत्र  code .
iOS  (  previously iPhone OS )  is   a   मोबाईल   ऑपरेटिंग  system  विकसित  and distributed by  ठहराना   inc  .  originally  released in  2007  for the iPhone and iPod Touch platforms  ,  it has been extended  to  support  अन्य   ठहराना  devices such as the iPad and  ठहराना   tv  .
Unlike Microsoft 's Windows  फोन   और   google  's Android , Apple does not  अनुज्ञा  iOS for installation on  non-apple  hardware .
,   ठहराना   's   app  Store contained more  than  700,000 iOS applications  ,  which have collectively been  डाउनलोड  more  than  30  अरब   टाइम्स   .
It had a 21 %  share  of the  स्मार्टफोन   मोबाईल   ऑपरेटिंग  system units  shipped   in   the  fourth  क्वार्टर  of 2012 , behind  तभी  Google  's  Android  .
In June  2012   ,  it  accounted  for  65  % of mobile web data consumption (  सहित  use on  दोनो   the  iPod  टच  and  the   ipad   )  .
At the half of  2012   ,  there  यहूद  410  लाख  devices  activated  .
according  to  the  special  मीडिया  event held  by  Apple  on   सितंबर  12 , 2012 , 400  लाख   डिवाइस  have been sold through June 2012 .
the  user interface of  आईओएस   is  based on the concept  of  direct manipulation ,  using  multi-touch  इशारों   .
इंटरफ़ेस   कंट्रोल  elements  consist   of   sliders   ,  switches  ,   और   बटन  .
बातचीत  with the OS includes  इशारों   ऐसे   as  swipe ,  tap  ,  पिंच  , and reverse pinch  ,  all of  जिससे   have   विशिष्ट  definitions within  the   कॉन्टेक्स्ट   of  the iOS  ऑपरेटिंग   प्रणाली   और  its multi-touch  इंटरफ़ेस  .
Internal accelerometers are used by  कुछ  applications  to   respond  to shaking  the  device  (   एक  common  परिणाम  is  the   undo  command  )   or  rotating it in  तीन  dimensions ( one  आम  result  is   switching  from  पोर्ट्रेट  to landscape mode )  .
iOS  is  derived  इससे  OS  x  ,  साथ   जिससे   it  shares  the  Darwin foundation  .
iOS is  ठहराना   's   मोबाईल  version of  the   os  X operating  प्रणाली  used  on  Apple computers  .
in   आईओएस  , there are four  abstraction   परतों  : the  कोर  OS layer ,  the  Core  सेवाएं  layer ,  the   मीडिया   परत  , and the Cocoa Touch layer .
The current  संस्करण  of the  ऑपरेटिंग  system (  आईओएस   6.1.3  ) dedicates 1-1.5 GB  of  the device 's flash  मेमोरी   लिये  the  प्रणाली  partition  ,  using  roughly   800  MB of  कि  partition (  varying   by  model )  लिये  iOS itself .
iOS  फिलहाल  runs on iPhone ,  ipad  , iPod  टच  and Apple TV  .

A spoiler  is   an  automotive  aerodynamic   यंत्र   जिनकी  intended  डिज़ाइन   फलन   is  to 'spoil '  प्रतिकूल  air movement across  a  body  of  a vehicle in  गति  ,  प्रायः  described as turbulence  or  drag  .
Spoilers  on  the front of  a  vehicle  हैं  often  पुकारा   एयर  dams  ,   क्युकी   in  addition to directing  एयर   प्रवाह  they  भी  reduce the amount of air flowing  underneath  the vehicle  जिससे  generally  reduces   aerodynamic  lift and  खीचें  .
Spoilers  हैं  often  fitted  to race and  high-performance  sports cars ,  हालांकि  they have become common on passenger  वाहनों   as   खूब  .
Some spoilers  हैं  added to cars  primarily   लिये  styling purposes and have either little  aerodynamic   लाभ   or  even make  the  aerodynamics worse .
Spoilers for cars are often  incorrectly  confused with ,  or   the  term used  interchangeably   साथ  ,  विंग्स  .
ऑटोमोटिव   विंग्स   हैं   डिवाइस   जिनकी   intended   डिज़ाइन  is to generate downforce  as  air passes around  उन्हें   ,  not simply disrupt existing airflow  पैटर्न   .
मारियो  , who serves as Nintendo 's mascot  ,   is   a  fictional character created  by  game designer  शिगेरू  Miyamoto  और  voiced  by  Charles  martinet  .
This is a list of  वीडियो   खेल  where the character  मारियो  plays a  भाग  , either as  the  protagonist , antagonist  ,  supporting  अक्षर   ,  as part  of   an   ensemble   डाल   ,   as   a  cameo ,  or  in a game within a game  .
It  करता  not  शामिल  simple  सन्दर्भ   to  the  अक्षर   ,   ऐसे   as  the portraits of Mario found  in  The  लेजेंड   of   zelda   :  A Link to the Past .
the  year  indicated  is the year the  खेल  was first  released   ,   सबसे   commonly   in  Japan  ;  games were  sometimes   released   सालो   बाद   in  other  regions   of  the world .
The list  शामिल  ports , remakes  और  compilations  .
it  does  n't   शामिल  any  आभासी  Console re-releases .
`` Man  of  Constant Sorrow  ''   (   भी  known as  ``   i  Am A  man  of Constant  विषाद  '' ) is a traditional  अमरीकी  folk  सोंग   पहला  recorded by Dick Burnett  ,  a  partially  blind fiddler from  केंटकी   .
The song  थी   originally   अंकित  by Burnett  as  ``  विदाई  Song  ''   मुद्रित  in  a  Richard Burnett  songbook  ,  circa   1913   .
An early version was recorded by Emry Arthur in  1928   (  Vocalion  vo   5208  )  .
Public  ब्याज  in  the  song  थी  renewed  बाद  the release of the 2000  फिल्मी   o  Brother , Where Art Thou  ?
, as  it  plays a central  भूमिका  in  the   फिल्मी  's plot  .
The song  थी  also  शामिल  in the  फिल्मी   's  highly  कामयाब  , multiple-platinum selling  साउंडट्रैक  .
Josephson  जंक्शन   सरणी   चिप   विकसित  by the National  ब्यूरो   of  Standards  as  a standard volt
the   वोल्ट  ( symbol : V ) is  the  SI  निकला   ईकाई  for  इलेक्ट्रिक  potential (  वोल्टेज  ) ,  इलेक्ट्रिक   संभावित  difference , and  विद्युतवाहक  force .
the   वोल्ट  is  नामित   in  honor  of   the   इतालवी  physicist  alessandro   volta   (   1745–1827  ) , who invented  the  voltaic  pile   ,  possibly the first chemical battery .
a  plaque  commemorating   the  location of  the   साराजेवो  assassination  और   कदम  of Gavrilo Princip  (   चित्र   लिया  in 1987 , before steps were  removed   in   1992  and plaque changed  इससे  Cyrillic to  लैटिन  script  )
