On 28  जून   1914   ,  Archduke  फ्रांज  Ferdinand  of  Austria , heir presumptive  to  the  austro-hungarian   सिंहासन  ,  और  his wife , Sophie  ,   duchess   of   hohenberg   ,   यहूद  shot dead in Sarajevo  ,  by  gavrilo   princip  ,  एक  of  a   समूह  of six Bosnian  serb  assassins  समन्वित   by   डेनियल  Ilić .
the   राजनैतिक  objective of the assassination was  to  break off  austria-hungary   's  south-Slav provinces  so   वे   could   be   संयुक्त   into  a Greater Serbia or  a  Yugoslavia .
The  हत्यारे  '  motives  were consistent  साथ   the   गति   कि  later became  ज्ञात  as Young Bosnia  .
सर्बियाई  military officers stood behind  the  attack .
At  the  top  of  these Serbian military conspirators was  मुख्य   of   सर्बियाई  Military  प्रज्ञा   dragutin   dimitrijević   ,   उसके   righthand  man Major  vojislav  Tankosić , and Masterspy  rade  Malobabić .
प्रमुख  Tankosić armed the assassins  साथ  bombs and pistols and trained  उन्हें  .
The  हत्यारे   यहूद  given access to  the   वही  clandestine  टनल  of  safe-houses  and agents  कि   rade  Malobabić  प्रयुक्त   लिये   the   घुसपैठ  of weapons and operatives  into  Austria-Hungary .
The assassins  ,  the key members of the  clandestine  tunnel  ,  and the  कुंजी   सर्बियाई  military  षड्यंत्रकारियों   जो   यहूद  still  जिंदा   यहूद  arrested , tried , convicted  और  punished .
those  who  यहूद  arrested in Bosnia were  आजमाया   in  Sarajevo in October 1914 .
the  other conspirators were arrested  और  tried  पहले  a Serbian kangaroo court  on   the  French-controlled Salonika Front in  1916–1917  on  unrelated  false charges  ;   सर्बिया   चलाया  three  of  the top military  षड्यंत्रकारियों  .
Much of  कया   is  known about the assassinations comes  इससे   ये   दो   ट्रायल  and related  रिकॉर्ड   .
Assignment of responsibility for the  bombing   और  murders  of  28 June is highly  विवादास्पद   क्युकी  the attack led to  the   outbreak  of World War I one month  बाद   .
मिशन   सैन  Juan Capistrano was a Spanish  मिशन   in  Southern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ,  स्तिथ  in  present-day   सैन  Juan  capistrano  .
It was founded  on  All  संतो  ' Day  नवम्बर  1 , 1776  ,   by   स्पेनी   catholics  of the  franciscan   अनुक्रम  .
Named for  giovanni   da   capistrano  ,  a   15th   सदी  theologian  और  `` warrior priest  ''   जो  resided  in  the Abruzzo region of Italy , San Juan Capistrano has  the  distinction  of  being  घर  to  the   oldest   भवन  in California  स्टिल  in use , a  चैपल   निर्मित  in  1782  .
Known alternately as  ``   सेरा  's Chapel '' and  ``   पिता  Serra 's Church  ,  ''  it  is the  तभी   extant  structure where it  रै   महरूम  documented  कि  the padre  junipero  Serra celebrated mass .
One of the best known of the  alta   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   मिशन  ( and one  of   the   few  missions to  have  actually been founded twice—others  होने  Mission San  जिबरील   arcángel   और  Mission La Purísima Concepción  )  .
The  साईट  was originally  consecrated  on  अक्तूबर  30  ,   1775  , by  पिता   fermín  Lasuén  ,   लकिन  was quickly abandoned  due   to  unrest  among  the indigenous population in San Diego  .
the  success  of   the  settlement is evident  in  its historical records .
Prior  to  the arrival of the  प्रचारकों  , some 550 natives  यहूद  scattered throughout the  लोकल   क्षेत्रफल   .
by  1790  ,  the  क्रमांक   of  converted  ईसाइयों  had  grown  to 700  ,  and just six  सालो   बाद  nearly 1,000 ``  neophytes   ``   (   हाल   converts   )  lived in  or   around   the  Mission compound .
1,649   baptisms  were conducted  कि  year alone  ,   आउट   of  the  कुल  4,639  souls   परिवर्तित  between 1776 and  1847  .
More than 2,000 former  निवासियों  ( mostly Juaneño Indians  )  are buried in  unmarked  graves in the  मिशन   's  cemetery ( campo santo )  .
The remains of  पिता   (  later Monsignor )  st.  John  o'sullivan   ,  who recognized the property  's   ऐतिहासिक   मान   और  working tirelessly  to  conserve and rebuild its structures , are buried at the entrance to  the  cemetery  on   the  west  पक्ष   of  the property , and a statue  उठाया  in  उसके   सम्मान  stands at  the   सिर  of  the   क्रिप्ट  .
the  surviving  चैपल  also serves as the final  resting  place  of   तीन  padres who passed on  जबकि  serving at the Mission :  fathers  José  barona  ,  विसेंट  Fustér , and  विसेंट   पास्कुआल  Oliva  हैं   सब   entombed  beneath  the   अभयारण्य   मंजिल   .
The Criolla or  ``   मिशन  grape , '' was first  planted  at San Juan Capistrano  in   1779  ;  in   1783  , the  पहला  wine produced in Alta  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  emerged from the Mission 's  वाइनरी   .
the  Mission entered  a  long  काल  of  क्रमिक  decline  बाद   secularization  in  1833   .
numerous  efforts were made over the years  to  restore  the   मिशन   to  its former glory ,  लकिन  none  मिले  with  ग्रेट  success  जबतक  the arrival of  पिता  O'Sullivan in 1910  .
बहाली  efforts continue , and  ``   सेरा  's  चैपल   ''   is  still used  लिये  religious  सेवाएं   .
About half-a-million visitors ,  सहित  80,000 school  children  , come  to  the Mission  प्रत्येक  year  .
And while the ruins of ``  the  Great  स्टोन   गिरिजाघर  '' ( which was all but  leveled  by an 1812 earthquake  )  are  a  renowned  architectural  wonder , the Mission is  शायद   बेहतरीन   ज्ञात  for  the   सालाना   ``  Return  of   the  Swallows  ''  which is traditionally  observed  every  कूच  19  (  Saint Joseph 's  दिन   )   .
Mission San Juan Capistrano  रै   परोसा  as a favorite subject for many notable artists , and  रै   महरूम  immortalized  in  literature  और   on   फिल्मी  numerous times  ,  perhaps  अधिक  than any other mission .
in   1984   ,  a  आधुनिक  church  जटिल  was  constructed  just north  और   वेस्ट  of the Mission compound  और  is now known  as   मिशन   basilica  San  जुआन   capistrano   .
Today , the  मिशन  compound  serves  as a  संग्रहालय   ,  with  the  Serra Chapel  भीतर   the  compound serving  as   a   चैपल  for  the  mission parish  .
Better  बंद   मुर्दे  is a  1985  American  टीन  romantic comedy  फिल्मी   अभिनीत  John  cusack  and written  और  directed by Savage Steve  हॉलैंड  .
it  tells  the  story of high  स्कूल   छात्र  Lane Myer  जो   is   suicidal  after  उसके   गर्लफ्रेंड  breaks up  साथ   उसे  .
mercedes-benz   superdome   (   originally  Louisiana  superdome  and commonly  the  Superdome  )  is a sports and exhibition  स्टेडियम  ,  स्तिथ  in the  सेंट्रल   कारोबार  District of New  ऑरलियन्स  , Louisiana  ,  USA .
योजनाएँ  were  drawn   up   in  1967  ,  by the New Orleans  modernist  architectural firm  of  Curtis and  डेविस  .
इसके  steel  फ़्रेम   कवर   a  expanse  .
इसके  dome is  बना   of   a  Lamella multi-ringed frame and  रै  a  व्यास  of , making it  the  largest fixed  domed  structure in the  संसार  .
it  is  घर   to  the NFL 's  नई  Orleans  संतो   ,  the  ncaa  's Division  i-a  Tulane  ग्रीन   वेव   फ़ुटबॉल  team  (  the largest football stadium in  सम्मेलन  USA ) ,  the   राज्य  Farm Bayou Classic , the R+L  वाहक  New  ऑरलियन्स  Bowl , the  allstate   शुगर  Bowl  और  , every fourth year ,  the  BCS  नेशनल  Championship Game  .
क्युकी  of the  आकार  and  स्थान  in one  of  the major tourist destinations in  the  United States  ,  the  superdome  routinely makes  the   ``  short  सूची   ''  of  उम्मीदवार   होने  considered for major sporting events , such as the Super Bowl  और  the  फाइनल  Four .
in   2005  ,  the   superdome  gained international  ध्यान   of  a  अलग  type  जब  it housed thousands of  लोगों  seeking  आश्रय   इससे  Hurricane Katrina .
The  भवन   suffered   extensive  damage  as  a result  of  the storm  ,  and  थी  closed for many months afterward  .
On October  3   ,  2011 , it was  घोषित  that German  automaker  Mercedes-Benz purchased naming  अधिकारों  to the stadium .
the   नई   नाम   took  effect on October 23 , 2011  .
It is the third stadium that  रै  naming rights  इससे   mercedes-benz   (   और  first  in   the   संयुक्त  States )  ,  after the Mercedes-Benz  एरिना   ,  the  स्टेडियम   of   bundesliga   क्लबों   vfb   stuttgart  , in Stuttgart , Germany  और  the Mercedes-Benz  एरिना  in  शंघाई   ,   चीन   .

डिज़्नी   's   एनिमल   किंगडम   आवास  is an African-themed  डीलक्स  resort at  the   वॉल्ट  Disney  संसार  Resort .
it   खोली  on  अप्रैल  16  ,  2001  .
the  resort is owned and operated by  वॉल्ट  Disney Parks and Resorts .
Disney  's  Animal  किंगडम   आवास   is  located in the Animal Kingdom  रिज़ॉर्ट   क्षेत्रफल  , adjacent  to  Disney  's   एनिमल  Kingdom  .
It  देता  guests the  अवसर  to  दृश्य   चरने  wildlife outside their  कक्ष  and  पब्लिक  areas in the  रिज़ॉर्ट   भीतर   निकटता  of  the  animals , conveying the feeling  of   होने  in  an  African savanna .
the  People  's  Party  ,   भी  known as  the  `` Populists '' , was a short-lived political  पार्टी  in  the   संयुक्त  States established in  1891   दौरान   the   populist  movement (  संयुक्त   राज्य  , 19th  सदी  ) .
It  थी  most important in 1892-96  ,  and  तब  rapidly  धुंधली   दूर  .
आधारित  among poor  ,  white cotton farmers  in  the  दक्षिण  (  विशेषकर  North  कैरोलिना  , Alabama  ,   और  Texas  )   और   hard-pressed  wheat  किसानो   in   the   मैदान  states ( especially Kansas  और   नेब्रास्का   )  , it  represented  a radical crusading form  of  agrarianism and hostility  to   बैंको  ,  railroads  , and elites generally .
it  sometimes  formed   coalitions   साथ  labor  संघ  , and in 1896 the Democrats endorsed  उनके   अध्यक्षीय  nominee , William  जेनिंग्स  Bryan .
the   शर्तें  `` populist  ''   और   ``  populism `` are  commonly  used for  anti-elitist   appeals  in  विपक्ष   to   स्थापित  interests  और  mainstream parties .
भाषाई  map of  सीरियल   ,  Cameroon , and Benin  .
Sign in English , outside the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Lagos
There are hundreds  of   भाषाएं  spoken in Nigeria .
the   प्रमुख  languages are Yoruba , Hausa , Igbo ,  ईदो  , Fulfulde  ,  Kanuri , and Ibibio .
The  आधिकारिक  language of Nigeria  ,   अंग्रेज़ी   ,   the  former colonial language ,  थी  chosen to facilitate  the   सांस्कृतिक  and linguistic unity  of  the  देश   .
English  ,  however ,  remains  an  विशेष  preserve  of   the  country 's urban elite  ,  and  is  not  widely  spoken in  ग्रामीण  areas , which  comprise  three quarters  of  the countries  जनसांख्यिकी   .
Nigeria 's linguistic  विविधता   is   a  microcosm of Africa  as  a whole , encompassing three major African languages families :  afroasiatic   ,   nilo-saharan   ,  and Niger–Congo .
सीरियल  also has  अनेक  as-yet unclassified languages , such as Cen Tuum  ,   जिससे   may   represent  a  relic   of  an even  वृहद   विविधता  prior to  the  spread of the current  भाषा   परिवारों   .
a   श्रेणी  of events led to the attack  on  Pearl  हार्बर   .
युद्ध  between Japan and  the  United States had been a  सम्भावना   कि  each  स्वदेश   's   सैन्य   शक्तियां  planned  लिये  since the 1920s  ,   हालांकि   रियल   टेंशन   किया  not  शुरू   जबतक   the   1931   आक्रमण  of  मंचूरिया  by  जापानी   .
Over  the   अगला  decade , Japan expanded  धीरे   into  China ,  अग्रणी   to   सब   आउट  war  between   the   दो  in 1937 .
In  1940  Japan invaded  फ्रेंच  Indochina in an effort  to  embargo  सब   imports  into  चीन  ,  सहित  war supplies purchased from the U.S .
This  मूव  prompted the  संयुक्त  States to embargo  सब  oil exports  ,   अग्रणी  the Imperial Japanese  नेवी   to  estimate that it had less than  दो   सालो   of  bunker  आयल   बाकी  and to support the  मौजूदा  plans to  seize   आयल  resources in  the  Dutch East  इंडीज  .
Planning  था  been  underway   लिये   कुछ  time on  an  attack  on   the  `` Southern Resource Area  ''  to add it  to  the Greater  ईस्ट  Asia Co-Prosperity  गोला  that  जापानी   envisioned  in  the  Pacific .
The Philippine islands  ,  at  कि  time  an  American  territory  , were  भी   a  Japanese  निशाना   .
the  Japanese  सैन्य  concluded  कि  an invasion  of  the Philippines  होता  provoke an American military response .
Rather than  seize  and  fortify  the  आइलैंड्स   ,   और  wait for the inevitable US counterattack  ,   जापानी   's   सैन्य  leaders instead  decided   on   the   pre-emptive  Pearl Harbor attack ,  जिससे  they  assumed  would negate  the  American forces  needed   लिये  the  मुक्ति   और   reconquest  of the islands .
Planning for the attack  था  begun in very  जल्दी   1941  , by  admiral  Isoroku Yamamoto  .
He  आखिरकार  won  assent  from  the  Naval  ऊँची  Command  by   ,  among other  बाते   ,  threatening to  इस्तीफा  .
The attack  थी  approved in the summer at  an   इम्पीरियल  Conference  और   again  at  a   दूसरी  Conference  in  the  पतन  .
Simultaneously over the year  ,  pilots  यहूद   प्रशिक्षित   ,   और   जहाजों  prepared for  इसके  execution  .
Authority for the  आक्रमण  was granted  at   the  second  इम्पीरियल  Conference  if  a  राजनयिक   परिणाम  satisfactory to Japan was not reached  .
बाद  final  स्वीकृति  by Emperor  हिरोहितो   the   अनुक्रम   to  attack was  जारी  at the  शुरूआत  of December .
a  common  दफ्तर   stapler
a   आम   स्कूल   stapler
a  stapler  is  a  mechanical  device  कि   joins  sheets of paper or  समान  material by  ड्राइविंग  a  पतला   मेटल  staple through  the  sheets and folding  the   ends  .
Staplers are widely used  in   सरकारी   ,   कारोबार   ,  offices , homes  और   स्कूलों  .
the   शब्द  ``  stapler  '' can  दरअसल  refer  to   a  number of different  डिवाइस  of  varying   उपयोग   .
In addition  to  joining paper  चादरें  together ,  staplers  can also  be  used  in   a  surgical setting to join tissue  साथ  with surgical staples  to   बंद  a surgical  घाव   (  much in the same  रास्ता  as stitches  or  sutures  )  .
Typically , most  staplers  are used to  जुड़ें  multiple sheets of paper .
पेपर  staplers  आइये   in   दो  distinct types :  हस्तचालित  and  इलेक्ट्रिक   .
Manual staplers  हैं   सामान्यतः  hand-held , although models that are  प्रयुक्त  while set  on   a   डेस्क  or  अन्य  surface are  नहीं   uncommon  .
Electric staplers  मौजूद  in  a   किस्में   of   अलग   डिजाइन   और  models .
उनके   प्राथमिक  operating function is  to   जुड़ें  large numbers of paper sheets  साथ  in  रैपिड   उत्तराधिकार  .
कुछ  electric staplers can join up  to   20  sheets  at  a  समय  .
Swallowing  ,   ज्ञात   scientifically  as deglutition ,  is  the  प्रक्रम   in  the human or animal body that makes something pass from  the   मुँह  , to  the  pharynx , and into the esophagus  ,   जबकि   shutting  the  epiglottis   .
If  इस   fails  and  the  object  goes   through  the  श्वासनली  , then choking or  pulmonary  aspiration can occur  .
in   the   इंसान   देह  it is  नियंत्रित  by the  swallowing  reflex .
Thaddeus  स्टीवंस  (  अप्रैल  4 , 1792 – August  11   ,   1868   )   ,   of   पेन्सिलवेनिया  ,  थी  a leader of the  कट्टरपंथी  Republican faction of the  रिपब्लिकन  Party  और  a  fierce   प्रतिद्वन्दी  of  गुलामी   .
He  थी   एक  of the most influential members  in  the history of  कॉंग्रेस   .
As  अध्यक्ष  of the  शक्तिशाली  House  तरीके   और   अर्थात्   कमेटी   ,   स्टीवंस   ,  a  witty   ,  sarcastic  स्पीकर  and flamboyant  पार्टी  leader , dominated  the  House from  1861  until  उसके  death  .
he  wrote much of the  वित्तीय  legislation that paid  लिये   the   अमरीकी   सिविल  War .
Stevens and  सीनेटर   चार्ल्स  Sumner  यहूद   the  prime leaders  of   the  Radical  republicans   दौरान  the  युद्ध  and Reconstruction era .
Scholarly views of Stevens have  swung  sharply  चूंकि   उसके   मौत   as  interpretations  of   पुनर्निर्माण  have changed .
इतिहासकारों  of the  dunning   स्कूल  (  1890s–1940s  ) held Stevens responsible for demanding  हर्ष  treatment of  the  white South and  violating  American traditions  of   republicanism  ,  depicting  Stevens  as  a villain for  उसके  advocacy of  हर्ष  measures  in  the South such as disfranchising  सब  ex-Confederates  .
This highly negative  characterization  held  sway  into  the  1950s .
the  rise of  the   neo-abolitionist  school  in  the 1950s led  to   a  strong positive appreciation of Stevens '  कार्य  on civil rights for Freedmen .
A recent biographer characterizes him  as   ,   ``  The Great  commoner  , savior of  फ़्री  public education  in  Pennsylvania ,  नेशनल  Republican  नेता   in  the struggles  विरूद्ध  slavery  in  the United  राज्य   और  intrepid  mainstay  of the  attempt  to secure  जातिगत  justice for  the   freedmen  during Reconstruction , the only member of  the  House of  प्रतिनिधि  ever  to   have  been  ज्ञात   as  the 'dictator  '  of  कॉंग्रेस   .  ''
अवलोकन  of  the  translation of eukaryotic messenger  rna
Diagram  प्रर्दशित   the  translation of mRNA and  the  synthesis  of   प्रोटीन  by a ribosome
In molecular  जीवविज्ञान  and genetics , translation  is  the  प्रक्रम  through  जिससे  cellular ribosomes  manufacture  proteins  .
It  is  part  of  the  प्रक्रम   of  gene expression .
in  translation , messenger RNA  (   mrna  ) produced by transcription is decoded  by   the  ribosome to produce  a   विशिष्ट  amino acid chain ,  or  polypeptide ,  कि  will later fold into an active  प्रोटीन   .
In bacteria ,  अनुवाद   occurs   in  the cell 's cytoplasm , where  the   विशाल  and small  subunits   of   the   राइबोसोम   हैं   स्तिथ   ,   और  bind to  the   mrna  .
In  eukaryotes  ,  अनुवाद   occurs  across  the  membrane of the endoplasmic  reticulum  in a process  पुकारा   vectorial   संश्लेषण  .
the   राइबोसोम   facilitates  decoding  by  inducing the  बाइंडिंग  of tRNAs  साथ  complementary  anticodon  sequences  to  that of the mRNA .
The  trnas  carry specific amino acids that are chained  साथ   into  a polypeptide as the  mrna  passes through and  is  `` read  ''  by the  राइबोसोम  in a fashion  reminiscent   to  that  of  a stock  टिकर   और   टिकर  tape .
In many  उदाहरण  ,  the   संपूर्ण   ribosome/mrna   जटिल  binds to the outer membrane of  the   अशिष्ट  endoplasmic  reticulum  and releases the nascent protein polypeptide inside  लिये   बाद  vesicle transport  और   स्राव   बाहर   of  the cell  .
अनेक   प्रकार  of  transcribed  RNA ,  ऐसे   as  transfer RNA ,  ribosomal  RNA , and  छोटी   नाभिकीय  RNA  ,  do not  undergo  translation into proteins  .
Translation  proceeds  in  चार  phases  :   दीक्षा  , elongation , translocation  और   termination   (  all describing the growth  of  the  अमीनो  acid chain , or polypeptide  कि  is the  उत्पाद  of translation ) .
Amino acids  हैं  brought to ribosomes  और   समवेत   into  proteins  .
In  सक्रियण  ,  the  correct  अमीनो   एसिड   is  covalently  बंधुआ   to  the correct transfer RNA ( tRNA ) .
The  अमीनो  acid is  joined  by  इसके   carboxyl  group to the 3  '  OH  of  the tRNA by  an  ester bond  .
When  the   trna  has an  अमीनो   एसिड  linked to it , it is termed `` charged ''  .
Initiation involves the small subunit of the  राइबोसोम  binding  to  the 5  '  end  of   mrna  with the  सहायता  of initiation  कारकों  ( IF ) .
termination  of  the  polypeptide happens when  the  A site  of  the  राइबोसोम   चेहरों  a  रोकें  codon ( UAA ,  uag  , or UGA ) .
No  trna   can  recognize  or  bind to this codon .
Instead  ,  the stop codon  induces  the  बाइंडिंग   of   a   रिलीज  factor protein that prompts  the   disassembly  of the  संपूर्ण   ribosome/mrna  complex .
A  क्रमांक  of antibiotics  अधिनियम  by  inhibiting  translation ;  ये   शामिल  anisomycin , cycloheximide ,  chloramphenicol   ,  tetracycline ,  streptomycin  ,  erythromycin  ,  और  puromycin  ,  among others  .
prokaryotic  ribosomes  have  a different  ढांचा  from  कि  of  eukaryotic   ribosomes  ,  और  thus  एंटीबायोटिक  can specifically target bacterial infections without  कोई  detriment  to  a eukaryotic  मेजबान  's cells .
a  multimedia message  on  a mobile phone  .
मल्टीमीडिया   messaging  Service  (  MMS )  is   a  standard way to  भेजें   संदेश   कि  include multimedia content  to   और   इससे   मोबाईल  phones  .
it  extends the core  sms  ( Short Message Service )  काबिलियत  that allowed exchange  of  text  संदेश   तभी   up   to  160 characters in length .
The most popular use  is   to  send  छायाचित्र   इससे   camera-equipped  handsets , although it  is  also popular as a  विधि  of  delivering   न्यूज  and entertainment content  सहित  videos ,  तस्वीरें   ,  text pages  और  ringtones  .
The standard  is   विकसित  by the  खोलें  Mobile  गठबंधन   (   ओमो   )  , although during development it was part of  the  3GPP and WAP groups  .
Smallpox was  an   संक्रामक  disease unique to humans  ,   caused  by  either   of  two  वायरस  variants  ,  Variola  प्रमुख  and  variola  minor  .
The  बीमारी   is  also known  by  the Latin names  variola  or Variola  वीरा   ,   निकला  from varius ( `` spotted  ''  )  or  varus (  ``  pimple  ''  )  .
The disease was  originally   ज्ञात  in English as the ``  चेचक   ''  or  ``  red plague ''  ;  the term  ``   smallpox  '' was first used  in  Britain  in  the  15th   सदी  to  फर्क  variola from  the  `` great pox '' ( syphilis ) .
The  पिछला  naturally occurring  मामला  of smallpox (  variola  minor )  थी  diagnosed  on   26  October  1977  .
Smallpox localized in small blood vessels  of   the  skin and in  the   मुँह   और  throat .
in   the  skin  it   resulted   in  a characteristic  maculopapular  rash and , later , raised  fluid-filled   फफोले  .
V. major produces a more serious disease  और   रै   an  overall  मृत्यु   रेट  of  30–35  %  .
V.  minor  कल्याणकारी   a  milder  रूप   of  disease (  भी  known as alastrim ,  cottonpox  , milkpox ,  whitepox  , and Cuban  खुजली  )  जिससे   मारता  about  1  % of  इसके  victims .
Long-term complications of V.  प्रमुख   संक्रमण  include  characteristic  scars ,  commonly   on  the  फेस  , which occur in 65–85 %  of   survivors  .
Blindness resulting  इससे  corneal ulceration and  scarring  , and limb  deformities   due  to  गठिया  and  osteomyelitis  are less common complications  ,  seen  in   परिचय  2–5  %   of   मामले   .
smallpox  is believed to have  उभरा  in  इंसान   populations   परिचय  10,000  bc  .
the  earliest physical evidence of  it   is  probably the  pustular   खाज  on the mummified body  of  Pharaoh Ramses V  of   मिश्र  .
The disease  मारे  an  अनुमानित  400,000  europeans   annually   दौरान  the  closing  years  of   the   18th  century  (  including  पाँच   reigning  monarchs ) , and  थी   जिम्मेदार   लिये  a third of all  दृष्टिहीनता  .
of   सब  those infected  ,  20–60  %   —and   over  80 % of  संक्रमित  children—died  इससे   the  disease  .
Smallpox  थी   जिम्मेदार   लिये  an  अनुमानित  300–500  लाख  deaths during the  20th   सदी  .
As recently as 1967 ,  the  World  स्वास्थ्य  Organization  (   जो  )  अनुमानित   कि  15  लाख  people contracted the disease  और   कि   दो  million  died   in  that year .
After  टीकाकरण  campaigns  throughout  the 19th and 20th centuries  ,   the  WHO  certified  the  eradication  of  smallpox  in  1979   .
Smallpox is one of two infectious diseases  to  have been eradicated , the other  होने  rinderpest , which was declared  eradicated   in   2011  .
`` I Want  to  Hold Your  हाथ  ''  is  a song  by   the  English rock  बैंड  the Beatles .
लिखा  by John Lennon and Paul McCartney , and recorded  in  October 1963 ,  it  was  the  first  बीटल्स  record to be made  using  four-track equipment .
With advance orders  exceeding  one million copies  in   the  United  किंगडम   ,  ``  i   want  to  थाम   अपना  Hand  ''  would ordinarily  have  gone straight  to   the   शीर्ष  of the  अंग्रेजों   रिकार्ड   चार्ट   on   इसके  day of release (  29   नवम्बर  1963  )  had  it  not been  अवरोधित   by  the  समूह  's first million seller  ``   वो   loves   तुम   ``  , the Beatles  '  previous UK  सिंगल   ,  which was  having   a   resurgent  spell  in   the   शीर्ष  position  following  intense media coverage of the  समूह   .
लेने  two weeks  to   dislodge   इसके  predecessor , `` I  want  to  थाम  Your Hand  ''  stayed  at  number one for  पाँच  weeks and remained in the UK  शीर्ष  fifty for  twenty-one   सप्ताह   in  total  .
It  थी  also  the  group 's  पहला  American  क्रमांक  one  ,  entering the Billboard Hot 100 chart on 18 January  1964   at  number  forty-five  and starting  the   अंग्रेजों   आक्रमण   of   the  American  म्यूज़िक  industry  .
by  1 February it  आयोजित  the  क्रमांक  one spot — for seven weeks — before being replaced by `` She Loves You ''  ,   a  reverse  परिदृश्य  of  कया  had occurred  in   ब्रिटेन   ,  and  remained  in the US  चार्ट  for a total of fifteen weeks .
``   i  Want to Hold  अपना   हाथ  '' became the  बीटल्स  '  best-selling  single worldwide  .
a  gasser was  a  type of  hot  rod originating on the dragstrips of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  in the late  1950s   और  continued until  the   जल्दी  1970s .
Gassers  यहूद   आधारित  on  उत्पादन  models from the 1930s to  mid-1960s  , which  have  been  stripped  of  extraneous   वज़न  and jacked up using a truck  बीम   धुरी   to   provide  better  वज़न  distribution on acceleration (  बीम  axles are  भी  lighter than an independent front  बर्खास्तगी  ) , though a raised  भण्डार   सामने  suspension is  आम  as well .
Common  वज़न   कटौती   तकनीकों  include  fiberglass   देह   panels   ,   stripped  interiors  और   plexiglass   खिड़कियाँ  ( sometimes color tinted ) .
क्युकी   वे   यहूद  primarily  निर्मित  for  रेसिंग  , these  गाड़ियाँ  typically  था   the   इंजन  swapped  to   a   larger  or more  शक्तिशाली   एक   ,   the  existing stock engine modified  (   प्रायः   heavily   )  or  दोनो  .
it   थी   बहुत  common to fit a  जड़ें   supercharger  and  mechanical   ईंधन   इंजेक्शन  , such  as   एक   इससे  Algon  ,  Hilborn , or Crower .
साथ  form  होने  dictated  by  function , their appearance  is   प्रायः  very top heavy  और   ungainly   ,  largely due to front ends being  उठाया  higher than stock  ,  to  assist   in   the   वज़न   ट्रांसफ़र  during  रैपिड  acceleration (  रेसिंग   )  .
Having their exhaust  पाइप   निकास   through   the  front fender well  is  a common  characteristic  of  gassers   ,   as   is  having bodies painted in  flamboyant   metalflakes   ,   मोती   ,   और   कैंडी   finishes  complemented by  lettering  in wild  फ़ॉन्ट्स  .
the  name arose because  वे  competed in  a  gasoline  -fueled  drag  रेसिंग  class  ,  rather than  एक  using  methanol  or nitromethane  .
The  gasser  is  the  predecessor of  the  modern Funny  car  .
Twelve-lead  ईकेजी   of  a 26-year-old male
electrocardiography  (  ईसीजी  or  ईकेजी   इससे  ) is a  transthoracic  ( across the thorax or chest ) interpretation of the electrical activity of the heart  over   a   काल  of time ,  as   detected  by  electrodes  attached  to  the surface  of  the skin and  अंकित  by  a  device external to the body .
The recording  उत्पादित  by this noninvasive procedure is  termed  an electrocardiogram  (   भी  ECG or EKG  )  .
an  ECG  is   प्रयुक्त  to  माप  the  रेट   और   नियमितता   of  heartbeats ,  as   खूब  as  the  size and position of the chambers ,  the  presence  of  any  क्षति  to  the  heart  ,  and the effects of drugs  or   डिवाइस   प्रयुक्त  to regulate  the  heart  ,   ऐसे   as  a pacemaker  .
सबसे   ecgs   हैं  performed for diagnostic  or   शोध   उद्देश्य   on  human  दिल  ,  लकिन  may  भी  be  performed  on animals , usually for  निदान  of heart abnormalities or  शोध  .
Donald  जॉन  Trump ,  sr.   (   born  June  14  , 1946  )   is   an   अमरीकी  business magnate ,  टेलीविज़न   व्यक्तित्व  and author .
he  is the chairman and president  of  The Trump  संगठन   और   the  founder of Trump Entertainment  रिसॉर्ट  .
ट्रम्प   's   हद  lifestyle , outspoken manner  ,  and  भूमिका  on the  एनबीसी  reality show The Apprentice  have  made  उसे  a well-known  हस्ती   जो   थी  No .  14   on   the   2012  Forbes  हस्ती   100   सूची  .
ट्रम्प  is  the   बेटे  of Fred Trump , a  धनवान  New  यॉर्क  City real-estate  डेवलपर  .
he  worked for  उसके  father  's  firm  ,  Elizabeth Trump &  बेटे   ,  while attending the  व्हार्टन   स्कूल   of  the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Pennsylvania , and  in  1968  officially  joined  the  company .
He  थी  given  कंट्रोल   of   the  company  in   1971   और  renamed it The  ट्रम्प  Organization .
in   2010  ,  ट्रम्प   expressed  an interest in becoming a  प्रत्याशी   लिये  president of  the  United States in  the  2012 election , though in May  2011   ,  he announced  he   होता   नहीं  be a candidate  .
In December 2011  ,  Trump was suggested  as  a possible vice presidential  चयन   by  Michele  bachmann  ,  if   वो   यहूद  to  जीत  the Republican nomination .
``   a   बदलें  Is Gon na Come  ''   is  a  1964   सिंगल  by  r  & B singer-songwriter Sam Cooke  ,   लिखा  and  पहला   अंकित  in  1963  and  released  under the  आरसीए   विक्टर  label  shortly   बाद  his  मौत   in  late  1964  .
Though only a  modest  hit  लिये  Cooke in comparison with his previous  singles   ,  the  सोंग  came to exemplify  the   1960s  ' Civil Rights Movement .
the  song  रै  gained in popularity  और  critical  acclaim   in   the  decades since its release ,  और   is  # 12  on  Rolling Stone 's  500  Greatest Songs  of   सब  Time .
भाप  rising from the  nesjavellir   geothermal  Power Station in Iceland .
Geothermal  उर्जा  is  थर्मल  energy generated  और  stored in the  धरती  .
थर्मल  energy is the  उर्जा  that determines  the   तापमान  of matter .
The Geothermal energy  of  the Earth 's crust originates from  the   असली  formation  of   the   ग्रह  ( 20  %  )  और   इससे  radioactive decay of  खनिज  ( 80  %  )  .
The  geothermal   अनुपात  ,  जिससे  is the difference in temperature between the  कोर  of the planet  और  its surface , drives  a  continuous  conduction   of   थर्मल  energy  in  the form of heat from the core to the  सतह   .
The adjective geothermal originates from  the   यूनानी   जड़ें  γη (  ge  ) , meaning earth ,  और   θερμος  (  thermos   )   ,   अर्थ   hot  .
At  the  core  of  the Earth  ,  thermal  उर्जा  is  निर्मित  by  रेडियोसक्रिय  decay and temperatures  may  reach over 5000 °C (  9,000  °F  )   .
Heat conducts  इससे   the  core to surrounding cooler  चट्टान  .
The  ऊँची   तापमान  and pressure cause some  चट्टान  to melt  ,   बनाना   मैग्मा   संवहन  upward  चूंकि   it  is lighter than the  ठोस  rock  .
The magma heats rock  और  water in  the  crust , sometimes  up  to 370 °C  (  700 °F  )  .
इससे   hot   स्रोतों  , geothermal  उर्जा  has been used for  स्नान  since Paleolithic  टाइम्स   और   लिये   स्पेस  heating  चूंकि  ancient Roman  टाइम्स   ,  but  it   is  now better  ज्ञात  for  विद्युत   पीढी  .
विश्वव्यापी  ,  परिचय  10,715  megawatts  ( MW  )  of geothermal power is  ऑनलाइन   in  24  देशों  .
An additional 28 gigawatts  of  direct geothermal heating capacity is  संस्थापित  for  ज़िला  heating  ,  space heating , spas ,  औद्योगिक  processes , desalination and  agricultural  applications  .
Geothermal power  is  cost  प्रभावी  ,  विश्वसनीय  , sustainable  ,  and environmentally friendly , but has  historically   महरूम   सीमित   to   क्षेत्रों   निकट   tectonic  plate boundaries .
Recent  technological  advances have  dramatically  expanded the  दायरा  and  आकार   of  viable resources , especially  लिये   अनुप्रयोग  such as home  हीटिंग  , opening a potential  लिये  widespread exploitation .
Geothermal wells release  ग्रीनहाउस  gases  फंस  deep  भीतर  the earth ,  लकिन  these  emissions   हैं  much  निम्नतर  per energy  ईकाई   than   those  of fossil fuels  .
As a  परिणाम  ,  geothermal   शक्ति   रै   the  potential to  सहायता  mitigate  वैश्विक  warming  if  widely deployed in place of fossil  fuels  .
the  Earth 's geothermal  संसाधन   हैं  theoretically more than  पर्याप्त  to  सप्लाई   मानवता   's  energy needs  ,  but only a very  छोटी  fraction  may  be  profitably  exploited  .
Drilling  और  exploration for  गहन   संसाधन  is  बहुत  expensive .
Forecasts  लिये   the   भविष्य  of geothermal  शक्ति  depend on assumptions about  प्रौद्योगिकी  , energy  कीमतें   ,   subsidies   ,   और   ब्याज  rates .
पायलट   कार्यक्रम  like EWEB 's customer opt in Green Power Program show that customers  होता   be  willing to pay  a   छोटी  more for  a   बेदर्दी  energy source like  geothermal   .
लकिन  as a  परिणाम   of   सरकारी   assisted  research and industry experience , the cost  of   generating  geothermal power has decreased  by  25 %  over  the past  दो   दशकों  .
In  2001  , geothermal  उर्जा   लागत  between  दो  and ten  सेंट   प्रति   सम्पात  .
स्वामित्व  of  प्रॉपर्टी  may  be   निजी   ,  collective  ,   or  common  और  the  प्रॉपर्टी   may  be objects , land/real  एस्टेट   ,  or  बौद्धिक  property .
Determining ownership  in   विधि  involves  determining   जो  has certain rights and  कर्तव्य  over the property  .
These rights and  कर्तव्य   ,  sometimes called  a   'bundle   of   अधिकारों   '  ,  can   be  separated and held  by  different parties .
the  question  of   स्वामित्व  reaches back to  the  ancient philosophers ,  प्लेटो  and  अरस्तू  ,  जो  held  अलग  opinions  on   the  subject  .
प्लेटो  (  428/427   bc  –  348/347  BC  )   विचार  private property  निर्मित  divisive  inequalities  , while Aristotle ( 384  bc   –   322  BC ) thought private  प्रॉपर्टी  enabled people  to   प्राप्त  the full  लाभ  of  उनके   मजदूर   .
निजी  property  can   circumvent   कया   is  now referred  to   as   the  “ tragedy of the commons ” problem , where people  tend  to degrade common property more than they do  निजी   प्रॉपर्टी   .
दिए   a  short-sighted owner ,  however   ,  a private  प्रॉपर्टी  system can make  ये  tragedies worse—for  उदाहरण   ,   a   निजी  owner of a piece  of   oil-rich  property , depending on his worldview ,  might  be more interested in short-term financial gain  than  incremental  उपयोग  with an eye toward other  's   चिंताएं   (   e.g.  , those  of   भविष्य  generations , the  disenfranchised  , etc  .  )  .
जबकि  Aristotle  जायज  the  अस्तित्व   of  private  स्वामित्व   ,  he left  खोलें  questions of  (   1   )  how to allocate property  between  what is  निजी   और   आम  and ( 2 ) how to allocate the  निजी  property within  समाज   .
over   the  millennia , and across  संस्कृतियों   कया  can be property  और   कैसा  it  is  regarded  culturally  have  varied  widely .
Ownership is  the  basis for  अनेक   अन्य   अवधारणाओं   कि  form  the  foundations  of  ancient and modern societies  ऐसे  as money  ,  trade , debt , bankruptcy , the criminality of theft , and  निजी  vs. public property .
स्वामित्व  is the key building  ब्लाक   in  the  विकास   of   the  capitalist socio-economic  प्रणाली   .
आदम   स्मिथ  stated that one of the  पवित्र  laws  of  justice  थी  to guard a  व्यक्ति   's   प्रॉपर्टी  and possessions .
the   प्रक्रम   और  mechanics  of  ownership  हैं  fairly complex :  एक   can  gain ,  ट्रांसफ़र   और  lose  स्वामित्व  of property in  a  number  of  ways  .
To acquire  प्रॉपर्टी  one  can  purchase it with money  ,   व्यापार   it  for  अन्य   प्रॉपर्टी  ,  प्राप्त  it as a gift , steal it ,  ढूँढें  it , make , it or homestead  it   .
One can transfer or lose ownership  of  property by selling  it  for money , exchanging  it  for  अन्य  property , giving it  as  a gift  ,  being robbed of it , it  ,  or having it  stripped  from one 's ownership  through  legal means  ऐसे  as  eviction  ,  foreclosure  , seizure , or taking .
Ownership is  self-propagating  in  कि  the  मालिक   of  any property will also own  the  economic benefits  of   कि   प्रॉपर्टी   .
`` What 's My Name  ?  ''  is  a  सोंग  recorded  by  Barbadian recording  कलाकार  Rihanna , for her  पांचवां  studio album Loud ( 2010 )  .
featuring   अतिथि  vocals from Canadian  rapper  Drake , the  सोंग  was  released  as the  दूसरी  single  इससे  Loud on  अक्तूबर   29   ,  2010 through Def  jam  Recordings .
The R & B song was produced by  the  Norwegian production duo StarGate  ,   और  was  लिखा   by   the  duo along with Ester Dean , Traci Hale ,  और  Drake .
Lyrically  ,  it incorporates  विषयवस्तु   of  sexual intercourse  और  romance .
Music critics  दिया  the  सोंग  positive  समीक्षाएँ  , citing  it  some of Rihanna  's  best vocal work  to  date  ;   वहीँ   थी  a  तारीफ़   regarding  its  रोमांटिक  nature ,  as  well  as   इसके  sexual tones .
`` What 's  my  Name  ?   ''  was a commercial  कामयाबी  and  अव्वल   the  US Billboard Hot  100  chart ,  giving   रिहाना  her  तीसरा  number-one single in 2010 ,  as  well  as  her  आठवीं   overall   on   the  chart .
The  सोंग   भी   अव्वल   the   चार्ट   in  Hungary and the  संयुक्त   किंगडम   और   पहुँचे  the top five  in   कनाडा   ,  Ireland  ,  New Zealand , Norway and Slovakia .
The song  प्राप्त  a nomination at the 54th  ग्रैमी  Awards for  बेहतरीन   rap/sung  Collaboration .
An accompanying music  वीडियो   ,  directed  by   फिलिप   andelman  ,  portrays   a  romantic encounter  between  Rihanna and  ड्रेक   in   a  grocery store along with romantic scenes between the  जोड़ी   और  Rihanna  चलना  through  मैनहटन  's Lower East Side  .
`` What 's My  नाम   ?   ''  was promoted with live  प्रदर्शन  across  दोनो   पहलू  of the Atlantic , including Saturday  रात्रि  Live  in  America  और  the  श्रेणी  seven  finale  of The X  फ़ैक्टर  in the United  किंगडम  .
The latter performance  resulted   in  an investigation  इससे  the country 's media regulator , Ofcom  ,   लिये   the  raunchy  प्रकृति   of   रिहाना   's  outfit .
a   गणितीय  constant is  a   खास  number ,  प्रायः  a  रियल  number ,  कि   is  ``  significantly  interesting in some  रास्ता   ''  .
स्थिरांक  arise  in  many  अलग  areas  of  mathematics , with constants such  as  e ( mathematical constant ) |  और   pi|  occurring  in  such  विविध  contexts  as  geometry , number theory and calculus .
What it means  लिये  a constant  to  arise  ``  naturally ''  ,   और  what  makes   a  constant  ``  interesting ''  ,   is  ultimately a matter of  स्वाद   ,  and some mathematical constants are notable  अधिक  for  ऐतिहासिक  reasons than  लिये  their intrinsic mathematical  ब्याज   .
the   अधिक  popular constants have been  पढ़ाई   throughout  the ages  और  computed  to  many decimal places  .
सब   गणितीय  constants are definable numbers and usually  हैं  also computable  संख्याएँ  ( Chaitin 's constant  होने  a significant exception ) .
Elections to the United States  सीनेट  were held on November 2  ,   2010   ,  for  37  of the United  राज्य  Senate  's   100  seats  .
( A  खास  election  on   जनवरी  19  ,  2010 in Massachusetts was held  पहले  in the year  .  )
thirty-four  of the  सीटे  were  लिये  six-year  शर्तें  to the Senate 's `` class three  ''   ,  and  तीन   यहूद   खास   चुनावों   लिये  shorter  शर्तें  .
Of the 37 elections  ,   19   प्रदर्शित  incumbent  डेमोक्रेट  ( 7  of  whom retired  or  were defeated in  the   प्राथमिक   )  and  18   प्रदर्शित  incumbent  republicans   (   आठ  of  जिसको   रिटायर्ड   or  were  पराजित   in  the primary )  .
बाद  the previous elections  (   in  2008  )   ,  the United States  सीनेट   थी  composed  of   58  Democrats , 40 Republicans  ,   और  2  independents  who caucus  साथ   the  Democrats  .
republicans  won  चार  seats  आयोजित  by retiring Democrats  और   republicans   पराजित  two incumbent  डेमोक्रेट  .
This  थी   the  largest number  of  Republicans  gains  since the 1994 elections  और   भी  the first time since that election that Republicans successfully  defended   सब  of their  अपना   सीटे   .
इस   थी   the  fourth  लगातार  election of  ``   क्लास   3   ''   सीनेटरों   जहाँ   डेमोक्रेट  have failed to gain seats  और   the  third  लगातार  mid-term  चुनाव  held in  a   अध्यक्ष  's  पहला   पद  where  republicans  have picked-up seats  .
despite   ये   रिपब्लिकन   विन्स  , however , the Democrats retained a majority of  the  Senate  साथ   51  seats  प्लस   2  independents who caucus with them ,  compared  to the 47 Republicans .
a  solstice  is  an astronomical event  कि  occurs twice  प्रत्येक   साल  as the  सूर्य  reaches  इसके  highest or  न्यूनतम  excursion relative  to   the   celestial  equator on  the   celestial  sphere  .
As a result  ,   on   the   दिन  of the  संक्रांति  , the Sun appears  to  have  पहुँचे   इसके   उच्चतम  or lowest annual  ऊँचाई  in the sky above the  क्षितिज   at  local  सौर  noon .
The  शब्द   संक्रांति  is derived  इससे   the   लैटिन  sol  (   सूर्य  ) and sistere  (  to  स्टैंड   स्टिल  )  ,  because  at   the  solstices  ,  the  सूर्य  stands  स्टिल   in  declination  ;   कि  is , the  मौसमी  movement of the Sun 's path  (   as   देखी   इससे  Earth  )  comes  to  a  रोकें  before  reversing   दिशा  .
The  solstices  , together with the equinoxes  ,  are connected with the  सीज़न   .
In many  संस्कृतियों   the  solstices  चिह्नित   either  the beginning or the midpoint  of   शीत   और   गर्मियाँ  .
The term  संक्रांति  can  भी  be used in a  broader   भाव  , as  the  date  (  day  )  when  इस  occurs .
the  day of  the   संक्रांति   is   either   the  longest day  of   the   साल   (   in   गर्मियाँ   )   or  the shortest  दिन  of the year ( in winter  )  for any place outside of  the  tropics  .
Jerry  ली  Lewis (  born  September  29   ,   1935   )  is  an  American rock  और  roll and country music  singer-songwriter  and  pianist  .
He is  ज्ञात  by the  उपनाम  ``  the  Killer  ''   और   is  often viewed  as  “rock  &  roll  's  first great wild  man”  .
An  जल्दी  pioneer of  चट्टान  and  फेंकें  music ,  in  1956 Lewis made his  पहला  recordings at  सूर्य  Records .
``  Crazy  बाहें   ``   बेची  300,000 copies  in  the South  ,  but  it  was  उसके  1957  hit  `` Whole  lotta  Shakin '  going   on  `` that shot  लुईस  to fame worldwide .
लुईस  followed  इस  in  कि   वही  year when he recorded songs such as ``  ग्रेट  Balls  of   आग   ``  , ``  breathless  `` and ``  ऊँची  School  गोपनीय   ``  .
लुईस  sold more  रिकॉर्ड   than   एल्विस  Presley at this  समय   .
However  ,   लुईस  ' rock 'n  '  roll career faltered in  the  wake of his marriage  to  his  यंग  cousin  .
He  था  little success in  the  charts  following  the scandal and his popularity quickly faded  .
His  सजीव   प्रदर्शन  fees  plummeted  from  $   10,000   प्रति   रात्रि  to $ 250  .
In the meantime  he  was determined to gain back some of  उसके   लोकप्रियता   .
During the early 60’s he did  n't  have much chart success  साथ  few exceptions such  as   ``  What  'd  I Say  ``   .
उसके  live  प्रदर्शन   at  this time were increasingly  जंगली   और  energetic  .
His album Live  at   the   स्टार  Club ,  हैम्बर्ग  from 1964 is  प्रायः  regarded  by  many music  पत्रकारों   और  fans as one  of   the   wildest  and greatest rock and roll  कॉन्सर्ट  albums  कभी  .
After recording  गीतों  such  as   ``   i   'm  on Fire ''  लिये   अनेक  years with  छोटी   कामयाबी   ,  in  1968  Lewis made a  परिवर्तन   into  country music  और   था   हिट्स  with songs  ऐसे  as  ``  Another  प्लेस  , Another Time  ''   .
This  reignited   उसके  career  और  throughout the late  '60s   और   '70s  he  regularly   अव्वल  the country-western charts .
उसके  # 1 country  हिट्स  included  ``  To  मेक  Love Sweeter  लिये   तुम  ``  ,   ``  There Must  be   अधिक  to  प्रेम  Than This  ``  ,  ``  Would You Take Another Chance on  me   ``  and `` Me And  bobby  McGee `` .
लुईस   's  successes  जारी  throughout  the   दशक   और  he embraced  उसके  rock  'n  ' roll past with  गीतों  such  as   a   कवर  of the Big Bopper 's  ``   chantilly   फीता   ``  and  ``  Rockin  '   my  Life  दूर   ``   .
in   the  21st century Lewis continues to tour to audiences around the world  और  still releases new  एल्बम  .
One such album , titled  पिछला   man  Standing  ,   is   उसके   बेहतरीन   selling  to date at over  a  million  नक़ल  sold worldwide  .
This was followed by Mean Old Man  जिससे  has received some  of   the  best sales of Lewis’s career  .
Lewis  रै   था   a   दर्जन  gold records in  दोनो   चट्टान  and  देश   ,   जीती  several  ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार   ,  including a Lifetime Achievement Award .
Lewis was  inducted   into  the Rock and  फेंकें   हॉल   of  Fame  in   1986   ,   और  his  pioneering  contribution to  the  genre has been recognized  by   the  Rockabilly Hall  of  Fame  .
In 1989 ,  उसके  life was chronicled in the  फिल्म  Great  गेंदें  of  आग  , starring Dennis  quaid   .
In  2003   ,   रोलिंग   स्टोन   पत्रिका  listed  उसके  box set All Killer , No Filler :  the  Anthology number 242 on  उनके   सूची   of  ``  500  greatest  एल्बम  of all  समय   ``  .
in  2004 , they  क्रमित  him number  24   on  their  सूची   of  the 100 Greatest Artists  of   सब  Time .
Lewis is  the  last surviving member of Sun Records  '   लाख  Dollar  quartet  and the Class of  '55  album , which  भी   शामिल   जॉनी  Cash , Carl  perkins  , Roy Orbison and Elvis Presley  .
Henry Louis Stephens  ,  untitled watercolor (  1863   )  of a  man  reading a newspaper  साथ  headline ``  अध्यक्षीय  Proclamation / Slavery ''  .
the   emancipation  Proclamation was an order issued  to  all segments of  the  Executive branch  (   सहित  the  फौज  and  नेवी  ) of the United  राज्य  by President  अब्राहम  Lincoln  on   जनवरी   1  , 1863 ,  दौरान  the American  सिविल  War  .
it   थी   आधारित  on  the  president  's   संवैधानिक   प्राधिकार  as  कमांडर  in  मुख्य  of the  हथियारबंद  forces ; it was not a law passed by  कॉंग्रेस  .
it  proclaimed all  those  enslaved  in  Confederate territory to be  forever   फ़्री   ,   और  ordered the  फौज  ( and all segments of the  कार्यपालिका  branch  )   to   दावत  as  फ़्री   सब   those   enslaved  in ten  राज्य   कि  were still in  विद्रोह   ,   यूँ  applying  to  3.1 million  of  the 4 million slaves in the  u.s  .
The Proclamation could not be  enforced  in areas  स्टिल   अंतर्गत  rebellion , but  as  the army took control of  confederate  regions  ,  the slaves  in  those regions were emancipated rather than  लौटे  to  उनके  masters  .
इससे  20,000 to 50,000  पूर्व  slaves  in   regions  where  विद्रोह   था  already been subdued  यहूद   तत्काल  emancipated , and over 3  लाख   अधिक  were emancipated as the  संघ  army advanced .
the  Proclamation did not  लागू  to  the  five  स्लेव   राज्य   कि  were not in  विद्रोह  , nor  to  most  regions  already controlled  by  the  संघ  army ; emancipation there would  आइये  after separate state actions and/or the  दिसम्बर  1865  अनुसमर्थन  of the  तेरहवीं   amendment  , which made slavery illegal everywhere in  the  U.S .
the  Proclamation did  नहीं  compensate the owners  ,  did not itself outlaw slavery ,  और   किया   नहीं  make the ex-slaves ( called  freedmen   )  citizens  .
it  made  the  eradication  of  slavery an explicit war  लक्ष्य  , in  जोड  to the goal  of  reuniting the  संघ  .
On  सितंबर  22  ,   1862   ,   lincoln   था  issued a preliminary  उदघोषणा  that he would order the emancipation of  सब   स्लेव  in  कोई  state  of  the  confederate  States  of  America  कि   किया  not return to  संघ  control by January  1  ,  1863  .
None returned  ,   और  the order  ,  signed and  जारी   जनवरी  1  ,  1863 , took effect except in  स्थितियाँ   जहाँ  the  संघ  had already mostly  regained  control .
the  Proclamation outraged  श्वेत  Southerners who envisioned a race  युद्ध  ,  angered  some Northern Democrats , energized anti-slavery  शक्तियां  , and  weakened   शक्तियां  in Europe  कि  wanted to  intervene  to help the Confederacy  .
It  भी   lifted  the  आत्माओं  of African Americans both in the Southern  और  Northern  राज्य  , and led to many  स्लेव  escaping  उनके   मास्टर्स  and running  पीछे  Union  लाइनों  in order  to   have  their  emancipation  enforced  .
Sucker Punch is a 2011 American  काल्पनिक  action  फिल्मी  directed by  zack  Snyder  और   co-written  by  उसे  and Steve  शिबुया   .
It is  स्नाइडर  's first  फिल्मी   आधारित  on  an  original script .
the  film stars Emily Browning , Abbie  cornish  ,  जेना  Malone , Vanessa Hudgens  ,   जेमी  Chung  ,  and Carla Gugino .
The  कथानक  follows  the  fantasies of a young  स्त्री  who is  वचनबद्ध  to a mental  संस्था  , as  वो  makes a plan  to  escape  the  hospital  पहले  suffering a lobotomy .
The film was  released   in  both  conventional  and IMAX  थिएटर  in  the  United  राज्य  at  मध्यरात्रि  on March  25  , 2011  .
It received  generally  negative reviews from  आलोचकों   ,  but was a moderate box  दफ्तर  success .
सामने  and  वापस  of Canon  powershot  A95  ,  a  ठेठ  pocket-size digital camera
Haselblad 503CW with Ixpress V96C digital back , an example  of  a professional  डिजिटल  camera system
a  digital  कैमरा  ( or  digicam  )  is  a  कैमरा   कि  takes video  or  still photographs by recording  बिंब   on   an  electronic image sensor .
सबसे  cameras sold today are digital , and  डिजिटल   कैमरे  are incorporated into many devices  ranging  from PDAs and  मोबाईल  phones (  पुकारा   कैमरा  phones )  to  vehicles  .
Digital  और  film  कैमरे   share  an  ऑप्टिकल  system  ,  typically  using  a  लेंस   साथ   a  variable diaphragm to  फ़ोकस  light onto an  चित्र   पिकअप  device .
the  diaphragm and shutter  admit  the correct amount of light  to  the imager  ,  just  as   साथ  film  लकिन   the  image  पिकअप   यंत्र   is  electronic  बल्कि  than  रासायनिक   .
however   ,  unlike film  कैमरे  , digital cameras can  प्रदर्शक  images on a  स्क्रीन  immediately after being recorded  ,   और   स्टोर   और  delete images  इससे  memory .
अनेक   डिजिटल  cameras  can  also record moving  वीडियो   साथ  sound .
Some  डिजिटल   कैमरे   can   क्रॉप  and stitch pictures  और  perform  अन्य  elementary image editing  .
The  अंदर   और  front  of   a  Dell  poweredge   वेब   सर्वर  , a computer designed  लिये   रैक  mounting
अनेक   वेब   सर्वर  may  be   प्रयुक्त  for a high traffic  जालस्थल  ,  यहाँ  four Sun  आग  X4200 servers are  संस्थापित   साथ
Web server  can  refer  to  either the  हार्डवेयर  ( the  कंप्यूटर  )  or  the software ( the computer application ) that helps to deliver web content  कि  can be accessed through the Internet .
the   सबसे   आम   उपयोग  of  वेब   सर्वर  is to host websites , but there are other  उपयोग  such as  गेमिंग  ,  आंकड़ा   भंडार  or  कार्यशील   एंटरप्राइज़  applications  .
The American Red Cross  (   चाप   )   ,  also  ज्ञात  as  the   अमरीकी  National Red  क्रॉस  , is  a  humanitarian organization  कि  provides emergency assistance , disaster relief  और  education inside the United  राज्य  .
It is the  designated  U.S. affiliate  of  the International Federation  of  Red Cross  और   रेड   crescent  Societies .
आज  , in  जोड  to  घरेलू  disaster  राहत   ,  the American Red  क्रॉस  offers services  in   पाँच   अन्य  areas :  जातियाँ   सेवाएं  that help the needy  ;   संचार   सेवाएं  and  सुकून  for  सैन्य   सदस्यों   और  their family  सदस्यों  ; the collection  ,   प्रसंस्करण  and distribution of  रक्त  and blood  उत्पाद   ;  educational  कार्यक्रम  on preparedness , health  ,  and  सुरक्षा  ; and  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   राहत  and  विकास  programs .
जारी  a  कॉरपोरेट  charter by the  संयुक्त   राज्य   कॉंग्रेस   अंतर्गत  Title  36  of the  संयुक्त  States Code  ,   खण्ड  3001 ,  the   अमरीकी   नेशनल  Red  क्रॉस  is  governed  by volunteers and supported by community donations  ,  income  इससे  health  और   सुरक्षा  training and products , and  आय  from  रक्त  products .
The American Red Cross  is  headquartered  in   वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
the  Chairman  of  the Board  of  Governors , serving  उसके  second  three-year  term , is Bonnie McElveen-Hunter  .
The  वर्तमान   अध्यक्ष  and  मुख्य  Executive Officer is Gail  J.  McGovern .
A rooster  in  Kosovo
A rooster ,  प्रर्दशित  wattles  ,   earlobes  and  कंघी
a   मुर्गा   crowing  ( with audio )
right
A  मुर्गा  (  भी  called a cockerel  or  cock  )  is a  पुरूष  gallinaceous  बर्ड   .
It  प्रायः   refers  to a  पुरूष  chicken  (  Gallus  gallus  ) .
Immature male chickens less  than  one year  बूढ़ा  are called  cockerels   .
The  पद  `` rooster ''  originates   in  the United  राज्य  , and the term is  widely   प्रयुक्त  throughout  उत्तर  America , as well as Australia  और   नई  Zealand  .
in   the   संयुक्त   किंगडम  and  आयरलैंड  the  पुरानी  term `` cockerel  ''  is  अधिक  commonly  प्रयुक्त   .
`` Cock '' is  in  general use as the  नाम  for a  पुरूष  of other species of bird  ,   लिये   उदाहरण  ``  मुर्गा  sparrow '' .
``  Roosting '' is  the  action of  perching   aloft  to  नींद   at  night  ,  and is  किया  by both  लिंगों  .
The rooster is polygamous  ,  but can not guard several nests  of   अंडे  at once .
He guards  the  general  क्षेत्रफल   जहाँ  his hens are nesting , and will attack  अन्य  roosters that  डालें  his  territory  .
During the daytime ,  he  usually  sits  on a  ऊँची  perch , usually  3–5   फीट  off the ground to  serve  as a lookout for his flock  .
he   होगा  sound a  distinctive  alarm  कॉल  if predators are nearby  .
The Pokémon Trading Card Game  (  Pokémon  tcg  ) is a collectible card game based  on  the  पोकीमॉन  video  खेल  series ,  पहला  published in October 1996 by Media  फैक्टरी   in   जापानी   .
In the  us  , it was  initially   प्रकाशित   by   wizards  of  the  Coast  ,   the  company that produces  ,  in  दिसम्बर  1998 .
निन्टेंडो  took over publishing in June 2003 .
it   is  one  of  Nintendo  's   पिछला   बाकी   दमदार   कड़ी  to  इसके  heritage as a playing card  कम्पनी  .
Land Rover is a  अंग्रेजों   car  manufacturer with its headquarters in Gaydon  ,   warwickshire   ,  United Kingdom  जिससे  specialises in  four-wheel-drive   वाहनों  .
it  is part of the  जैगुआर  Land Rover group  ,   a   subsidiary  of Tata  मोटर्स  of  इण्डिया   .
it  is the second  oldest   four-wheel-drive   car   ब्रांड   in  the  संसार  ( after Jeep ) .
the   जमीन   रोवर  name was  originally  used by  the   रोवर  Company  लिये   एक  specific  गाडी  model  ,  named simply  the   जमीन  Rover , launched  by   रोवर  in  1948  .
Over the following years  it   विकसित  into  a  marque  encompassing   a  range of four-wheel-drive models , including  the  Defender , Discovery ,  freelander  , Range Rover , Range  रोवर  Sport  और  Range  रोवर   evoque  .
Land  रोवर्स  are  फिलहाल  assembled  in   the  company 's Halewood and  solihull   पौधे  ,  साथ   शोध  and development  लेने   प्लेस   at   jlr  's Gaydon and Whitley engineering centres  .
Land Rover sold 194,000 vehicles worldwide in 2009 .
Although the brand originates from the  असली   1948   मॉडल   ,  Land  रोवर   as  a company  रै  only existed since 1978  .
Prior  to  this ,  it  was  a   उत्पाद  line  of   the   रोवर  Company  जिससे  was subsequently  अवशोषित  into the  rover-triumph  division of the British Leyland Motor Corporation (  bl  ) following Leyland Motor Corporation ’s takeover of  रोवर  in 1967  .
the   जारी  commercial success of the original Land  रोवर  series  मॉडल  ,  और  latterly the  दायरा  Rover in  the   1970s   in  the  midst  of BL’s  खूब  documented business troubles prompted the establishment  of  a  पृथक  Land Rover  कम्पनी   लकिन  still  अंतर्गत  the  bl   छतरियाँ  ,  बाकी  part of  the  subsequent Rover Group in  1988  ,  अंतर्गत  the ownership  of  British  aerospace   बाद   the   remains   of  British Leyland  यहूद   टूटा   up  and  privatised  .
In 1994  रोवर   समूह  plc was  acquired  by BMW  .
In  2000   ,   रोवर  Group was broken-up  by   bmw  and Land  रोवर  was sold to  घाट  Motor  कम्पनी  , becoming part of its Premier Automotive Group  .
In 2006  घाट   खरीदा  the Rover brand from  bmw   लिये  around  £6  million  .
This  reunited   the   रोवर   और   जमीन   रोवर  brands  लिये  the first  समय   चूंकि   2000  when the  रोवर   समूह   थी  broken  up  by BMW .
In June 2008 ,  घाट   बेची  both  जमीन   रोवर  and Jaguar Cars to Tata Motors  .
इस   बिक्री  also included  the  dormant Rover brand
the  cover  of  the  पहला  DVD compilation  released  by  aniplex  of  the   नई  Captain Shūsuke Amagai arc
The  नवीं   ऋतु   of  the Bleach  दुश्मनी  series  is  named .
The series is based on Tite  kubo  's  manga  with  वही  name  .
The episodes  हैं   निर्देशित   by  Noriyuki  abe  and produced by TV Tokyo  ,  Dentsu  ,  and Studio  pierrot   .
The episodes ' plot focuses on the introduction  of   a  new Soul Reaper captain  ,   shūsuke  Amagai  ,  and  the  mystery surrounding  the  Kasumiōji clan  ,  one  of   the  families that  constitute  the  धामों  of Soul  समाज   .
The season  began   airing  on  अप्रैल  23  ,   2008  in  जापानी   on   tv   टोकियो  and  ended   on  October 7 ,  2008  .
The English  अनुकूलन  of the  ब्लीच  anime is licensed by Viz Media , and  इस   चाप  began airing on  अगस्त  28 ,  2010  on Cartoon Network 's Adult Swim  ,  and finished  on   जनवरी   29  , 2011 .
Five  dvd   compilations  ,  प्रत्येक  containing four episodes of the season  ,  have  महरूम  released  by  Aniplex  ;   the   पहला   dvd   संकलन  was  released   on  November 26 ,  2008   और   the  fifth on  कूच   25   ,   2009   .
a   dvd   बक्सा   होगा  be  प्रकाशित  by  viz  Media on  दिसम्बर  13 , 2011 .
The  एपीसोड  use  तीन  pieces  of  theme music : one opening theme and two closing themes .
The opening theme is ``  chu-bura   ``   by   kelun  .
the  first closing theme  is  `` Orange '' by Lil'B  ,  used for episodes  168  to 179  ,  and the second closing theme  is  `` Gallop '' by pe'zmoku  ,  used for  the   शेष   of  the  एपीसोड  .
The  विनियमन  of prostitution in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  is  नहीं  among the enumerated powers  of   the  federal government ;  अंतर्गत  the Tenth  amendment  to the  संयुक्त  States Constitution , it  is  therefore  exclusively  the domain of  the  states to permit , prohibit  ,   or  otherwise  विनियमित   वाणिज्यिक  sex  ,  except  insofar  as Congress  may   विनियमित  it  as   भाग   of  interstate commerce with  कानून   जैसे  the Mann Act  .
In most states  ,  prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in the category of  पब्लिक   अनुक्रम  crime  ,  a crime that  disrupts   the  order  of  a community  .
It  थी   at  one time considered  to  be  a  vagrancy crime  .
Currently  ,   नेवाडा  is the  तभी  state to  allow   वेश्यालय  prostitution , the terms of which are stipulated  in  the  नेवाडा  Revised Statutes .
Only 8  काउंटी  currently contain active brothels .
All forms  of  prostitution  हैं  illegal  in  Clark County (  जिससे   contains  the Las  vegas–paradise   महानगर  area )  ,  Washoe County  (  which  contains  Reno  )  , Carson City , Douglas  काउंटी   ,   और  Lincoln  काउंटी  .
The  अन्य   काउंटी  theoretically  allow   वेश्यालय  prostitution ,  लकिन   कुछ  of these counties currently  have   no   क्रियाशील  brothels  .
गली   वेश्यावृति   ,  `` pandering ,  ''   और  living off  of   the  proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal  अंतर्गत   नेवाडा  law  ,   as   elsewhere  in the  देश   .
As with  अन्य   देशों  , prostitution  in   the   संयुक्त  States can be divided into three broad categories  :  street prostitution  ,   वेश्यालय   वेश्यावृति  , and  अनुरक्षण  prostitution .
The East  coast  of the United States , also known  as   the  Eastern Seaboard  or  the  अटलांटिक  Seaboard and commonly  shortened   to  East Coast  ,  refers to  the   easternmost  coast  of  the United  राज्य  along the Atlantic Ocean  .
The states  जिससे   have   shoreline  on the East Coast  हैं  , from  उत्तर  to  दक्षिण   ,  the U.S. states of  maine  , New  हैम्पशायर   ,   मैसाचुसेट्स   ,  Rhode Island ,  कनेक्टिकट   ,  New  यॉर्क   ,  New Jersey  ,   डेलावेयर  , Maryland ,  वर्जिनिया  , North Carolina  ,  South  कैरोलिना   ,  Georgia  ,   और   फ्लोरिडा   .
Richard  milhous   निक्सन   (   जनवरी  9 , 1913  –  April  22   ,  1994 )  थी  the  37th  President  of  the  संयुक्त  States  ,  serving  इससे  1969 to  1974  , when  he  became the only president to resign  the  office .
निक्सन  had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative  और  senator from California and  as   the  36th Vice President of  the   संयुक्त  States from 1953 to 1961  .
Nixon was  born  in  yorba  Linda ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   .
He  ग्रैजुएट  from Whittier College in  1934  and Duke University  स्कूल  of Law in  1937  ,  returning   to  California  to  practice  विधि  .
he  and his wife  ,  Pat Nixon ,  स्थानांतरित  to  वॉशिंगटन  to work for the federal  सरकारी  in 1942 .
He  subsequently  served in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   नेवी  during World  युद्ध   ii   .
Nixon  थी  elected in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   to  the  हाउस  of Representatives in 1946 and  to   the   सीनेट  in  1950   .
उसके   pursuit   of  the Alger Hiss  मामला  established his reputation as  a  leading  anti-communist  ,  और   elevated  him  to   नेशनल  prominence .
he  was the  कार्यशील  mate  of   ड्वाइट   D.   आइज़नहावर  ,  the   रिपब्लिकन   पार्टी  presidential  nominee  in  the  1952  चुनाव  .
Nixon served for eight  सालो   as  vice president  .
he  waged an unsuccessful  अध्यक्षीय  campaign  in  1960  ,  narrowly losing to  जॉन  F. Kennedy ,  और  lost a race for Governor  of   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  in  1962  .
In  1968  ,  he   भागा   again  for the presidency and was elected .
हालांकि   निक्सन  initially escalated America  's   भागीदारी   in  the  वियतनाम   युद्ध  , he  subsequently  ended  u.S.   भागीदारी  in 1973  .
निक्सन  's visit  to  the  लोगों  's Republic  of   चीन   in  1972  खोली   राजनयिक  relations between the two nations , and he initiated  détente   और   the  Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty  साथ  the  सोवियत  Union  the  same  साल   .
Domestically ,  उसके  administration  generally   embraced   नीतियों  that  transferred   शक्ति  from  वॉशिंगटन  to the  राज्य   .
Among  अन्य  things ,  he   शुभारम्भ  initiatives to fight  कर्कट  and illegal drugs  ,   imposed   मजदूरी   और  price  नियंत्रण  ,  enforced   desegregation   of   कुछ  Southern  स्कूलों   ,  and established  the   पर्यावरणीय  Protection  एजेंसी   .
हालांकि   he  presided over the lunar landings beginning  साथ   अपोलो  11  ,  he  scaled   वापस  manned space  खोजी   .
He  थी  re-elected  by   a   भूस्खलन   in   1972   .
निक्सन  's second  पद  saw an Arab oil  embargo  ,  the  resignation of  उसके  vice president  ,  Spiro  agnew  , and a continuing  श्रेणी   of  revelations  परिचय   the  Watergate scandal  और  other misconduct  by   सदस्यों  of the administration .
The scandal  escalated   ,  costing Nixon much of his  राजनैतिक   support   ,  and on August 9 , 1974  ,  he  resigned   in  the face of  लगभग   निश्चित   महाभियोग   और  removal from  दफ्तर  .
बाद  his  इस्तीफा  , he controversially received a  pardon   जारी  by his successor ,  जेराल्ड   घाट  .
In  रिटायरमेंट   ,  Nixon 's work as an elder  statesman   ,  authoring several  किताबे   और  undertaking many foreign trips ,  helped  to rehabilitate his  पब्लिक  image .
he  suffered a debilitating stroke  on  April 18 , 1994  ,   और   died  four  दिनों   बाद  at  the  age  of  81  .
Sertraline hydrochloride ( trade names Zoloft  ,   lustral  )  is  an  antidepressant   of  the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) class .
It  थी  introduced to the market by  फाइजर  in 1991  .
sertraline   is  primarily prescribed for major  depressive  disorder  in  adult  outpatients  as well as obsessive–compulsive ,  दहशत   ,  and  सोशल  anxiety  विकार  in both  वयस्कों  and  children   .
in   2011   ,   it  was the second-most  विहित  antidepressant  on  the U.S. retail  मार्केट   ,  with  37,208,000  prescriptions .
the  efficacy  of  sertraline for depression  is  similar  to   कि  of  पुरानी  tricyclic antidepressants  ,   लकिन   इसके   पक्ष  effects are  much   कम  pronounced .
Differences  साथ  newer  antidepressants   हैं  subtler  और  also mostly confined  to  side  प्रभाव  .
Evidence suggests  कि  sertraline  may  work better than  fluoxetine   (  Prozac ) for some  subtypes  of depression .
Treatment  of  panic disorder with sertraline  परिणाम   in   a   significant  decrease  of   the   क्रमांक  of  दहशत  attacks and  in   improved   विशेषता  of  जीवन  .
For obsessive-compulsive  विकार  ,  sertraline  is not  as  effective  as   संज्ञानात्मक  behavioral therapy  ;  the  बेहतरीन   परिणाम  have been achieved by  combining   ये   दो   उपचार   .
हालांकि  approved  लिये   सोशल  phobia and  posttraumatic  stress disorder , sertraline  लीड  to only modest improvement in  ये  conditions .
Sertraline also  alleviates  the symptoms of premenstrual dysphoric disorder  और   can   be  used  in  sub-therapeutic doses  or  intermittently for  इसके  treatment .
Sertraline  साझा  the common side effects  और  contraindications of  अन्य   ssris  ,  साथ   ऊँची  rates of nausea  ,   अतिसार   ,  insomnia , and sexual side effects ; however  ,  it does  नहीं   कारण   वज़न   लाभ  , and its effects  on   दोनो   संज्ञान  and vigilance  हैं   अपेक्षाकृत   mild  .
In  गर्भवती  women  लेने  sertraline  ,   the   ड्रग  was  उपस्थित  in  significant  concentrations in fetal  रक्त   ,   और  was  भी   संबद्ध   साथ   a   उच्चतर  rate of  विभिन्न   जनम  defects .
similarly   to   अन्य  antidepressants  ,  the  उपयोग   of  sertraline  लिये   अवसाद  may be associated  साथ  a  उच्चतर  rate of suicidality .
The  पाँच  Heartbeats  is  a 1991  musical  drama  फिल्मी  directed by Robert  टाउनसेंड   ,  who co-wrote  the  script with Keenan  आइवरी   wayans  .
Distributed by 20th  सदी   फॉक्स  , the  फिल्मी   's   प्रमुख   डाल  includes  टाउनसेंड  ,  माइकल  Wright , Leon Robinson , Harry  J.  Lennix , Tico  कुएं   ,  Harold Nicholas  of  the  निकोलस   भाइयो  ,  और  Diahann  कैरल  .
The plot of the film ( which is loosely  आधारित  on the lives of  अनेक  artists : The Dells , The  temptations  ,  चार   टॉप  , Wilson Pickett ,  जेम्स  Brown ,  फ्रेंकी  Lymon ,  sam  Cooke and  अन्य  ) follows  the   तीन   दशक   करियर  of the R & B  गायन   समूह  The  पाँच   heartbeats   .
the  film  depicts   the   वृद्धि  and fall of  a  Motown inspired soul act through  the  eyes  of  the  फिल्मी  's  प्रमुख  protagonist  ,  Donald ``  बतख  '' Matthews (  portrayed   by   टाउनसेंड  ) , who  serves  as a narrator  throughout  the film .
However ,  a   बहुमत   of  the  सिनेमा  is  प्रस्तुत   in  a  लगातार  time  लकीर  as  opposed  to traditional flash backs .
The film includes  a  significant amount of  असली   म्यूज़िक  conceived by  विभिन्न   कलाकारों  for  the  film 's soundtrack  ,   सहित  singles such  as  `` A Heart  is   a   हाउस   लिये  Love ``  ,   ``  We Have n't  समाप्त  Yet '' ,  और   ``  Nothing But Love  ''  .
The film was  released  to most North  अमरीकी  audiences  कूच  29  ,  1991 however it was not  बना  available  to   ऑडियंस  in other continents until  2002  when  a  DVD  थी   released  prior  to  another  dvd  release  in  2006  लिये   the  film  's   15th  anniversary .
The movie received  मिश्रित  reviews  इससे   आलोचकों  .
Secretariat  (  March 30 ,  1970   –   अक्तूबर   4  , 1989 )  थी   an   अमरीकी  Thoroughbred racehorse  कि  in  1973  became the  पहला  U.S . Triple Crown champion  in  25  सालो   .
He set race records in all three  कार्यक्रम  in the Series — the Kentucky  डर्बी  (  1:59.4  ) ,  the   preakness   stakes   (   1:53  ) , and the Belmont  stakes   (   2:24  ) — records that still stand today  .
he  is considered  to  be one  of   the  greatest  thoroughbreds   of  all  समय  .
In 1999 , ESPN  क्रमित  Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the  20th  century ,  the  highest ranking racehorse  on  the  सूची  URL_http .
he  ranked second behind Man  o   '   युद्ध   in   the  Blood-Horse 's  सूची  of  the   शीर्ष  100  u.S.  Racehorses  of   the  20th Century .
सचिवालय  was sired by  बिंदास   शासक   आउट  of  somethingroyal   ,   by   princequillo  .
He  थी  foaled  at   the  Meadow  in   कैरोलीन  County  ,   वर्जिनिया  .
Like his famous predecessor  man   o  ' War , Secretariat was  a   विशाल  chestnut colt and was given  the  same nickname  ,  ``  बिग   रेड  . ''
Secretariat 's grandsire ,  nasrullah  ,  is  also  the  great-great-grandsire  of  1977  ट्रिपल   क्राउन   विजेता  Seattle Slew .
Owned by Penny Chenery , he was trained  by  Lucien  laurin   और   मुख्यतः   ridden  by Canadian  jockey  Ron  turcotte   ,   साथ   साथ   प्रशिक्षु  jockey Paul Feliciano ( first  दो   दौड़   )   ,  and  दिग्गज   एडी   मेपल  ( last  रेस  ) .
he   raced  in Chenery 's Meadow  stable   's  blue and white  checkered   रंगों  and his  दूल्हे   थी   एडी  Sweat .
सचिवालय   stood  approximately tall  ,  and weighed , with a 75-inch  girth  , in his racing  प्रधान   .
A typical 12 V ,  40  Ah Lead-acid car  बैटरी
an  automotive battery  is   a   प्रकार  of  rechargeable   बैटरी  that supplies electric energy to an automobile  .
Usually this refers to an SLI  बैटरी  ( starting  ,  lighting  ,  ignition ) to power the starter motor , the  लाइट्स  , and  the  ignition  प्रणाली  of a vehicle’s engine .
Automotive SLI batteries are usually  lead-acid  type , and are made of six galvanic  कोशिकाएं   in  series to  provide   a   12   वोल्ट  system .
प्रत्येक  cell  provides  2.1 volts for  a  total of 12.6 volt  at   पूरा  charge .
Heavy  वाहनों   ऐसे   as  highway trucks or  tractors  , often  equipped   साथ   डीज़ल   इंजन   ,   may   have  two batteries in series for a 24 volt system , or  may  have  समानांतर  strings  of  batteries .
lead-acid   बैटरी   हैं  made up  of   प्लेटों  of  सीसे  and  पृथक  plates of lead  डाइऑक्साइड  ,  जिससे   हैं  submerged into an electrolyte solution  of   परिचय   38  %  sulfuric  acid  और   62   %  water .
This  कल्याणकारी  a chemical reaction that  रिलीज  electrons , allowing them to  प्रवाह  through  conductors   to  produce electricity .
As  the  battery  discharges  ,  the   एसिड  of the  electrolyte  reacts  साथ   the   सामग्री  of the  प्लेटों  , changing their  सतह  to  सीसे   सल्फेट  .
When the battery is recharged  ,  the chemical reaction is  reversed  : the  सीसे   सल्फेट  reforms  into   सीसे  dioxide and  सीसे  .
With  the   प्लेटों  restored  to   उनके  original condition , the process may  अभी  be repeated  .
बैटरी  recycling of automotive batteries  reduces  the need for resources required  लिये   manufacture   of  new batteries  ,   diverts   विषाक्त   सीसे  from landfills , and prevents risk of  improper  disposal .
full-time  employment  is   नियुक्ति  in  जिससे   a   व्यक्ति  works a minimum number  of   घंटों  defined  as   ऐसे  by  his/her  employer .
Full-time  नियुक्ति  often  आता  with  लाभ  that  हैं  not typically  offered   to   part-time   ,  temporary  ,  or  लचीली  workers , such as annual  छोड़  , sickleave  ,   और   स्वास्थ्य  insurance .
full-time   कार्य  are  प्रायः   माना   करियर   .
They  generally  pay more  than   part-time  jobs  ,  and usually carry more hours per week  .
the  Fair Labor Standards Act  (  FLSA  )  does not define full-time employment or  part-time   नियुक्ति  .
This is  a  matter generally to be  संकल्पित  by  the   नियोक्ता  (  us   विभाग   of   मजदूर   )  .
The definition  by   नियोक्ता  can  vary  and  is  generally  प्रकाशित  in a company  's   कर्मचारी  Handbook .
Companies  commonly  require  इससे  30–35 or 40  घंटों  per  सप्ताह   to  be defined as full-time and therefore eligible for benefits .
Full-Time  औकात   varies  between  कम्पनी  and is  प्रायः   आधारित   on   the  shift the  कर्मचारी   जरूर  work  दौरान  each work week .
The  ``   मानक  ''  कार्य  week consists of five eight-hour days ,  commonly  served between  9:00am  to 5:00PM totaling 40  घंटों  .
जबकि  a four-day week  generally  consists  of  four ten-hour  दिनों   ;  it may  भी  consist  of  as little as nine hours  लिये  a  कुल   of   a  36 hour work week  .
Twelve-hour shifts  हैं  often  तीन  days per week  ,  unless the  कम्पनी   रै   the  intention  of  paying  आउट   the  employee overtime .
Overtime  is   legally  paid  आउट   anytime   an   कर्मचारी   works  more than  40   घंटों  per week .
the  legal minimum for overtime starts at  आधार  Pay +  one-half   .
The  increased  payout  is   माना  to  compensate  slightly  लिये  the  increased  fatigue  जिससे  a person experiences  on  such long  शिफ्ट   .
Shifts can also  be  very  irregular   ,   as   in  retail ,  लकिन   हैं  still full-time  if   the   जरूरी  number of  घंटों  is reached  .
There  हैं   कुछ   परिस्थितियों   जहाँ  a  व्यक्ति   जो  needs full-time  कार्य  is dropped  to  part-time ,  जिससे  is sometimes  a  form of constructive dismissal to avoid paying unemployment benefits to a laid-off worker  .
Seahorse is the title given  to   54  species  of  marine  मछली   in   the   genus  Hippocampus .
`` Hippocampus  ''   आता  from the Ancient  यूनानी  hippos meaning  ``  horse ''  और  kampos meaning `` sea monster  ''   .
The  नियंत्रित  Substances  अधिनियम  ( CSA  )   थी  enacted into law by the  कॉंग्रेस  of the  संयुक्त  States  as   शीर्षक  II of  the  Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention  और  Control Act of  1970   .
The CSA is  the   संघीय  U.S. drug  नीति   अंतर्गत  which  the  manufacture , importation  ,  possession  ,  use and distribution  of   निश्चित  substances  is   regulated  .
The  अधिनियम  also served as  the   नेशनल   implementing  legislation  लिये   the  Single  सम्मेलन  on Narcotic  दवाएँ   .
The legislation created five  schedules   (  classifications )  ,  with varying  योग्यता  for  a  substance to  be  included in each  .
Two  संघीय  agencies , the Drug  प्रवर्तन  Administration  और  the Food  और  Drug  प्रशासन   ,  determine which  substances  are added to or removed from the  विभिन्न   schedules  , though the  statute   passed   by   कॉंग्रेस  created the  आरंभिक  listing ,  और   कॉंग्रेस   रै   sometimes  scheduled  अन्य   substances  through  विधान  such  as   the  Hillory  J.  Farias and Samantha Reid  date-rape  Prevention Act  of   2000  ,  जिससे  placed  गामा   hydroxybutyrate  in  अनुसूची  I  .   वर्गीकरण   निर्णय  are required to be made  on  criteria  सहित  potential for abuse  (  an undefined term ) , currently accepted medical  उपयोग  in  उपचार   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   ,  and international treaties  .
माया  numerals
Maya numerals are  a   vigesimal   (   आधार  -  बीस  )  numeral  system used  by   the   pre-columbian   माया  civilization .
The  numerals  are  बना   up   of  three  प्रतीकों  ;  शून्य   (  shell  आकार  ) ,  एक   (   a   बिन्दु  )  और  five (  a   बार   )   .
लिये  example ,  तेरह  is written  as  three dots in a horizontal row above two horizontal  लाइनों  stacked  ऊपर  each  अन्य  .
Lyndon Baines Johnson (  अगस्त  27 , 1908  –   जनवरी  22 , 1973 )  ,   प्रायः  referred to as  lbj  , was  the  36th President of  the  United States ( 1963–1969 ) , a  स्थिति   he  assumed after  उसके  service  as  the 37th Vice President  of  the United  राज्य   (   1961–1963  ) .
He is  एक  of only four  लोगों  who  परोसा  in all four  निर्वाचित  federal offices  of  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  : Representative ,  सीनेटर   ,   वाइस  President  ,  and  अध्यक्ष  .
जॉनसन   ,  a Democrat  इससे  Texas , served as a United States  प्रतिनिधि  from  1937–1949   और  as a Senator  इससे  1949–1961 ,  सहित  six years as United  राज्य  Senate  बहुमत   नेता  , two as  सीनेट   अल्पसंख्यक  Leader and two  as   सीनेट   बहुमत   चाबुक   .
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the Democratic  नामांकन  in 1960  ,  Johnson  थी   पूछा  by John F.  कैनेडी   to   be  his  कार्यशील   mate   लिये  the 1960  अध्यक्षीय  election  .
Johnson  succeeded  to  the   प्रेसिडेंसी  following the  हत्या  of  जॉन   F.   कैनेडी   on   नवम्बर  22 , 1963  ,   समाप्त  Kennedy  's  term and was  निर्वाचित   अध्यक्ष  in  उसके  own right  ,   जीतना   by  a  विशाल  margin over  बैरी  Goldwater in  the  1964  चुनाव  .
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic  पार्टी  and  as   अध्यक्ष  , he was responsible  लिये   डिजाइनिंग   the   ``  Great  समाज   ``  legislation that  शामिल   कानून  that  upheld  civil rights ,  पब्लिक  broadcasting , Medicare  ,  Medicaid  ,  environmental protection  ,  aid to education  ,   और  his `` War on Poverty  .  ''
Johnson was  प्रसिद्ध   लिये  his domineering personality and  the   ``   जॉनसन   उपचार  ,  ''  his  coercion  of  शक्तिशाली   राजनेता   in  order to  अग्रिम   विधान  .
Meanwhile  ,   जॉनसन  escalated American involvement in  the  Vietnam War , from  16,000   अमरीकी  advisors/soldiers  in  1963 to  550,000  combat  सैनिकों  in early 1968 , as American casualties soared and the peace process  bogged   bas  .
The  भागीदारी   stimulated  a large  एंग्री  antiwar movement  आधारित  especially  on  university campuses in  the  U.S. and  विदेश   .
Summer  दंगे  broke out in most major  शहरों  after 1965 , and crime  दरों   soared  ,  as   उसके   प्रतिद्वंद्वियों   उठाया  demands for  ``  law and order ''  नीतियों  .
The Democratic Party  विभाजित  in  अनेक  feuding  गिरोहों  , and  बाद   जॉनसन   किया   poorly  in  the  1968 New  हैम्पशायर  primary ,  he   ended  his bid for reelection  .
रिपब्लिकन  Richard  निक्सन  was elected  to   सफल  him .
Historians  argue   कि   जॉनसन  's  प्रेसिडेंसी  marked the  शिखर  of modern liberalism in  the  United States  बाद   the  New Deal era .
जॉनसन  is ranked  favorably  by some historians  क्युकी  of  उसके  domestic  नीतियों  .
Progesterone  भी  known as  p4   (  pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione )  is  a C-21 steroid hormone involved in the  मादा  menstrual  साईकिल   ,   गर्भावस्था  ( supports gestation )  और  embryogenesis  of   इंसानो   और  other species .
Progesterone  belongs   to  a class of hormones called  progestogens  ,  और   is  the major naturally  occurring  human  progestogen  .
बिग  Bird  is  a protagonist of the  children   's  television show Sesame Street  .
officially  performed by Caroll Spinney  चूंकि  1969 , he  is  an eight-foot two-inch  (   249  cm  )  tall  उज्जवल   primrose-yellow  bird .
He  can   रोलर   स्केट  , ice skate  ,   नृत्य   ,  sing , write  काव्य   ,  draw  और  even ride a unicycle .
But despite this  चौड़ी   सरणी   of  talents , he is  prone  to  बारंबार   misunderstandings   ,  on one  अवसर   भी  singing the  वर्णमाला  as  एक  big  long   शब्द   (   इससे  the song  पुकारा   ``   abc-def-ghi   ,  ''  सुनाया  `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz  ''  )  ,  pondering what it  could   कभी   औसत   .
He lives in a large  घोंसला  behind the 123 Sesame  गली   brownstone   और   रै  a  टेडी  bear named Radar .
Webtrends  is   a   निजी   कम्पनी  headquartered  in   पोर्टलैंड  , Oregon ,  संयुक्त  States .
It provides  वेब  ,  सोशल   ,  and  मोबाईल  analytics  और  other  तन्त्र   समाधान  related to marketing  प्रज्ञा  .
the  company was founded in 1993 and  अभी  serves more than  10,000  large and  छोटी  firms. < ref name='Intelligent Enterprise 2007-05-21  '  >
the  Second Crusade ( 1145–1149 )  थी  the second major crusade  शुभारम्भ   इससे  Europe .
the  Second  crusade   थी  started in response  to  the  पतन  of the County  of  Edessa the previous year  to   the  forces  of  Zengi  .
the  county  था  been  संस्थापित   दौरान  the  पहला   crusade   (   1096–1099  )  by   baldwin  of  boulogne  in 1098 .
जबकि  it was the  पहला  Crusader state  to  be  संस्थापित   ,  it was  भी  the first  to  fall .
The Second Crusade was announced by Pope Eugene III  ,  and was  the   पहला  of  the   क्रूसेड  to be  led  by European  किंग्स  , namely Louis  सात   of   फ़्रांस  and Conrad III of Germany , with  सहायता   इससे  a number  of   अन्य   यूरोपीय  nobles .
The armies of  the  two  किंग्स  marched separately across Europe .
After crossing  बीज़ान्टिन  territory  into  Anatolia ,  दोनो  armies  यहूद  separately  पराजित   by   the  Seljuq Turks .
The main Western Christian source ,  odo   of   deuil   ,  and Syriac  ईसाई  sources claim  कि  the Byzantine emperor  मैनुएल   i  Comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders '  प्रगति  , particularly in Anatolia  जहाँ   he  is alleged  to   have  deliberately ordered  turks  to  आक्रमण  them .
Louis and Conrad  और   the  remnants  of  their  सेना  reached Jerusalem  और  ,  in  1148  ,   participated  in  an  ill-advised  आक्रमण  on Damascus .
the   crusade  in  the   ईस्ट   थी   a   विफलता  for the crusaders and  a   ग्रेट  victory for  the   मुसलमान   .
It would  ultimately   have   a  key influence  on   the  fall of  जेरूसलम  and give rise to  the   तीसरा   crusade   at   the   समाप्त   of  the 12th  सदी  .
the   तभी  success  of   the  Second Crusade  आए   to   a   संयुक्त  force of 13,000  फ्लेमिश  ,  frisian  , Norman  ,  English  ,   स्कॉटिश   ,  and  जर्मनी   crusaders  in 1147 .
