यात्राएं  from England ,  by  ship , to the  पावन  Land  ,  the  फौज  stopped  और   helped   the  smaller  (  7,000 ) Portuguese army in the  कैप्चर  of Lisbon , expelling its Moorish occupants .
Wal-Mart Stores  ,  Inc. ( )  ,   ब्रांडेड  as Walmart , is an American  बहुराष्ट्रीय  retail corporation that  रनों  chains of  विशाल   छूट   विभाग  stores  और  warehouse stores .
The  कम्पनी  is  the  world 's third largest  पब्लिक   निगम  , according to  the  Fortune  वैश्विक  500 list in 2012 , the  biggest  private employer in  the   संसार  with over  दो  million employees , and is the largest  रिटेलर   in  the world .
Walmart  remains  a  family-owned  business  ,  as the company is  नियंत्रित  by  the  Walton  परिवार  , who own a 48 percent stake  in  Walmart .
it  is  भी  one  of   the  world 's most  मूल्यवान  companies .
The company was  संस्थापित  by Sam  वाल्टन  in 1962 , incorporated on October 31  ,  1969  ,  and publicly  traded   on  the New York Stock Exchange  in  1972  .
It is headquartered  in   bentonville  ,  अरकंसास   .
walmart  is  भी   the  largest grocery  रिटेलर  in  the   संयुक्त  States  .
In  2009   ,  it generated 51 percent of  इसके  US  $  258 billion sales in  the   u.S.  from grocery  कारोबार  .
it  also  owns   और  operates  the  Sam  's   क्लबों   खुदरा  warehouses in North  अमेरिका  .
by   1988   ,  Wal-Mart was  the   सबसे   लाभप्रद   रिटेलर  in the  us  ,  और  by  नवम्बर  1990 ,  it  outsold  k-mart   .
By 1991 it outsold Sears in retail , making it America  's   largest  retailer ,  a   भेद   it  still  holds   .
walmart   रै  8,500 stores  in   15  countries , under 55  अलग  names .
the   कम्पनी  operates under  the   walmart  name in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  , including the 50 states and  प्यूर्टो  Rico  .
it  operates  in  Mexico  as   walmex  ,  in   the   संयुक्त  Kingdom  as  Asda  ,  in Japan  as  Seiyu ,  और   in   इण्डिया  as Best Price  .
it  has wholly  स्वामित्व  operations  in  Argentina , Brazil  ,   और  Canada .
walmart  's  निवेश   बाहर  North America have  था   मिश्रित  results : its operations in  the  United  किंगडम   ,   दक्षिण  America , and  चीन   हैं  highly  कामयाब   ,   whereas   ventures  in Germany and  दक्षिण   कोरियाई  were  unsuccessful  .
Robert  विलियम  Gary Moore  (  4  अप्रैल   1952  –  6   फ़रवरी   2011  ) ,  थी   a  Northern Irish musician ,  सबसे  widely recognised  as  a  सिंगर   और  guitarist .
in   a   करियर   डेटिंग   वापस   to   the  1960s  ,  Moore  निभाई   साथ  artists  सहित   फिल   lynott   और  Brian  downey  during  उसके  teens  ,  leading him to memberships with the Irish  bands   स्किड   पंक्ति  and  पतला  Lizzy on three separate  अवसरों   .
मूर   साझा  the stage with such blues  और   चट्टान  luminaries as B.B .  किंग   ,   अल्बर्ट  King , Colosseum  ii  ,  जार्ज   हैरिसन   और  Greg  झील  , as well as having a  कामयाब   सोलो  career  .
he  guested on  a  number  of   एल्बम  recorded by  ऊँची  profile musicians  ,   सहित  a  कैमियो  appearance playing the lead  गिटार   सोलो  on ``  वो  's  my  Baby `` from  traveling   wilburys  Vol . 3  .
An  उदाहरण  of  रैक   आरोहित   सर्वर
A web hosting service is a type  of  Internet  होस्टिंग  service  कि  allows  individuals  and organizations  to   मेक   उनके   जालस्थल  accessible via the World Wide  वेब  .
वेब  hosts are  कंपनियाँ  that provide space  on  a server  स्वामित्व  or leased for use by clients , as  खूब   as  providing  अंतरजाल   कनेक्टिविटी  ,  typically  in  a  data center .
वेब  hosts can  भी  provide data  बीच   स्पेस   और   कनेक्टिविटी   to  the Internet  लिये  other servers located  in  their data center , called  colocation  ,  भी  known  as  Housing  in  Latin America or France  .
the  scope of web hosting  सेवाएं  varies greatly .
The  सबसे  basic is web  पेज   और  small-scale file  होस्टिंग  ,  जहाँ  files  can  be uploaded via File Transfer  प्रोटोकॉल   (   एफटीपी  ) or a Web interface  .
The files  हैं  usually delivered to  the  Web `` as  is   ''  or with minimal  प्रसंस्करण  .
अनेक  Internet  सेवा  providers (  isps  ) offer this service free to subscribers  .
individuals   और   संगठन  may  भी  obtain  वेब   पेज  hosting from alternative service providers .
Personal  वेब   साईट  hosting  is  typically free , advertisement-sponsored ,  or   inexpensive  .
Business web  साईट   होस्टिंग  often has a higher expense depending upon the size  और   प्रकार  of  the   जालस्थल  .
Single page  होस्टिंग  is  generally  sufficient for personal  वेब   पृष्ठों   .
A complex site calls for a more  व्यापक  package that provides database  support  and application development platforms ( e.g  .  PHP ,  जावा  ,  माणिक्य  on Rails , ColdFusion  ,   or   asp.net  )  .
These  सुविधाएं  allow customers  to  write or install scripts  लिये   अनुप्रयोग   जैसे   forums  and content  प्रबन्धन  .
Also ,  सुरक्षित  Sockets  परत  ( SSL ) is typically  प्रयुक्त  for e-commerce  .
the  host may  भी   provide   an  interface  or  control  फलक  for managing  the   वेब  server  और  installing  स्क्रिप्ट  , as well  as   अन्य  modules and  सेवा   अनुप्रयोग  like  e-mail  .
कुछ   होस्ट  specialize  in   निश्चित  software  or  services (  e.g  . e-commerce ) ,  जिससे  are  commonly  used  by   larger   कंपनियाँ   कि   outsource   संजाल  infrastructure .
Obstetrics (  इससे   the   लैटिन  obstare , ``  to   स्टैंड  by  ''  ) is  the   चिकित्सा   specialty   dealing   साथ  the  परवाह   of  all women 's reproductive tracts and their children during  गर्भावस्था   (  prenatal  काल   )  , childbirth and  the   postnatal   काल  .
Many obstetricians are  भी   स्त्रीरोग   ,  meaning  वे   perform   in  both specialties  .
In the  संयुक्त  States , these physicians are commonly  referred   to  as OB/GYNs  .
The  राइट  brothers  ,  Orville (  अगस्त  19 ,  1871   –  January 30  ,  1948 ) and Wilbur  (  April 16 , 1867  –  May 30 ,  1912   )  , were two  अमरीकी  brothers , inventors ,  और  aviation pioneers who were credited with  inventing  and  भवन   the  world 's first  कामयाब  airplane and making  the  first controlled  ,  powered and sustained  heavier-than-air   इंसान  flight , on December  17  ,  1903   .
From  1905   to  1907 ,  the  brothers developed  उनके  flying machine into  the  first practical fixed-wing aircraft .
हालांकि   नहीं  the first to build  और   मक्खी  experimental  वायुयान  , the Wright brothers  यहूद  the first  to  invent  वायुयान  controls that made fixed-wing  संचालित  flight possible .
The  भाइयो  ' fundamental  भेदन   थी  their  आविष्कार  of three-axis control  ,  which enabled  the   पायलट  to  steer   the   वायुयान  effectively and to  maintain  its  संतुलन   .
This method  became   मानक   और   remains   मानक  on fixed-wing  वायुयान  of all  kinds   .
इससे   the  beginning  of  their  aeronautical  work , the Wright brothers  केन्द्रित   on  developing a  विश्वसनीय   विधि   of  pilot control  as   the  key to solving `` the  उड़ती   प्रॉब्लम  '' .
This  दृष्टिकोण   differed   significantly  from other  experimenters  of the time who  put   अधिक  emphasis on  विकासशील  powerful engines .
Using a small  homebuilt   हवा  tunnel ,  the  Wrights  भी   एकत्रित   अधिक  accurate data  than  any before , enabling them  to   डिज़ाइन  and  निर्माण  wings and propellers that  यहूद   अधिक   कुशल  than  कोई  before .
उनके  first  u.S.  patent  ,  821,393  ,  did not claim invention  of   a   उड़ती  machine ,  लकिन  rather ,  the  invention of  a  system  of  aerodynamic control that  manipulated   a   उड़ती  machine 's surfaces .
They  gained   the  mechanical skills essential for their  कामयाबी  by working  लिये   सालो  in their  दूकान  with  मुद्रण   दबाता   ,  bicycles  ,  motors  ,   और   अन्य   मशीनरी  .
उनके  work with bicycles in particular influenced their belief  कि  an  अस्थिर  vehicle like  a  flying  यंत्र  could  be  controlled and  संतुलित  with  अभ्यास  .
इससे  1900 until their  पहला  powered  फ़्लाइट   in  late  1903   ,   वे   conducted  extensive glider  परीक्षण  that also developed their  कौशल   as   पायलटों  .
उनके   सायकिल  shop employee Charlie Taylor became an important part of  the  team , building their first aircraft  इंजन   in   बंद  collaboration  साथ   the  brothers  .
the   राइट  brothers ' status as  आविष्कारक  of  the   वायुयान  has been subject  to   counter-claims   by   विभिन्न   पार्टियों  .
much   विवाद  persists  over  the many competing  दावा  of early aviators .
America  's  Next Top  मॉडल   ,   साईकिल   12  is  the  twelfth cycle of America 's  अगला  Top Model and the sixth season to  एयर  on  the   cw   संजाल   .
it   premiered   on   कूच  4  ,  2009 .
the   साईकिल  's catch phrase  is   ``  Get In The  मोड़ें   .  ''
The  साईकिल   's  promotional  सोंग  is Lady Gaga 's ``  the  Fame  ''  .
the  prizes for this  साईकिल   are:
a  modeling contract with Elite Model Management .
A fashion spread  और  cover in  सत्रह  .
A  100,000   अनुबंध   साथ   covergirl  cosmetics .
The first  हाफ  of the cycle took place in  नई  York City  ,  moving the  दिखाएँ  back  इससे  Los  एंजिल्स   पिछला  season .
the  international  गंतव्य   लिये   इस  cycle  is  São Paulo  ,  Brazil , the series first  विज़िट  to South  अमेरिका  .
The number of girls was reduced to  13   ,  the first time  चूंकि   साईकिल   9  , after  होने  maintained at 14 in the  पिछला   दो   चक्र  .
This  थी  the  पिछला  time  paulina  Porizkova  participated  as  न्यायधीश   .

इस  season  averaged  4.35  लाख   दर्शक  per  एपीसोड  .
exxon   mobil  Corporation , or ExxonMobil , is  an   अमरीकी  multinational  आयल  and  गैस   निगम  headquartered  in   इरविंग   ,  Texas  ,   संयुक्त  States  .
it  is  a  direct  वंशज   of  John D.  rockefeller  's Standard Oil company ,  और  was formed  on  November  30   ,  1999 ,  by   the  merger of Exxon  और  Mobil  .
it  is affiliated  साथ  Imperial  आयल   जिससे  operates in Canada  .
exxonmobil   is  the world 's  largest  company by revenue  और  in 2013 , became  the  largest publicly traded  कम्पनी  by  मार्केट  capitalization  in   the   संसार   .
The  कम्पनी  is  क्रमित   #   5  globally in  फोर्ब्स  Global  2000   सूची  in  2013   .
Exxon Mobil 's reserves were  72  billion oil-equivalent barrels at the end of 2007 and ,  at  then ( 2007 ) rates  of  production ,  हैं   अपेक्षित  to last over  14   सालो   .
साथ   37  oil refineries  in  21  देशों  constituting a  संयुक्त   रोज़   शोधन   क्षमता  of ,  exxon  Mobil is  the  largest refiner  in   the  world , a title that was  भी  associated with Standard  आयल  since its incorporation  in  1870  .
ExxonMobil is  the   largest  of  the  world 's supermajors  साथ   रोज़   उत्पादन  of  3.921  million  boe   (   barrels  of  आयल   समतुल्य   )  .
In 2008 , this was approximately  3  %  of  world  उत्पादन  ,  जिससे  is  कम  than  अनेक  of  the   largest  state-owned  पेट्रोलियम  companies .
When ranked by oil  और   गैस  reserves it is 14th  in   the  world  साथ   कम   than  1 %  of  the total  .
A  2012  article in  the  Daily Telegraph  says   कि  ExxonMobil has `` grown  into  one  of   the   planet’s  most hated  corporations   ,  able  to   determine   अमरीकी  foreign  नीति  and  the   भाग्य   of  entire nations  ''   .
In terms  of  its environmental  रिकार्ड  , ExxonMobil  increasingly   drills  in terrains leased to them by  dictatorships  ,  ऐसे  as those in Chad and Equatorial  गिनी   .
Lee Raymond , the corporation’s chief executive  जबतक   2005   ,  was ``  notoriously  sceptical  परिचय   जलवायु  change and disliked  सरकारी   हस्तक्षेप  at  कोई   स्तर   ''  .
the   कम्पनी   थी  widely criticized for  इसके  slow response to cleaning  इसके  1989 Valdez  आयल   spill  in Alaska .
This article is  परिचय  the Globe  थिएटर  of  शेक्सपियर  .
लिये  the modern reconstruction in London , see Shakespeare 's Globe .
लिये  other uses  ,  see  ग्लोब  Theatre (  बहुविकल्पी  )  .
The  ग्लोब  Theatre  थी  a  थिएटर  in London associated with  विलियम   शेक्सपियर  .
It was built  in   1599  by  शेक्सपियर  's  playing   कम्पनी  ,  the  Lord  चेम्बरलेन   's   मेन   ,   on  land  स्वामित्व   by   थामस   brend   और  inherited by  उसके   बेटे  , Nicholas Brend  और   पोता  Sir Matthew  brend  , and  थी  destroyed  by  fire on 29  जून  1613  .
a   दूसरी  Globe Theatre was  निर्मित  on  the   वही  site by  जून   1614  and closed  in   1642  .
A  आधुनिक  reconstruction  of   the   ग्लोब  ,  नामित   ``  Shakespeare  's  Globe `` , opened  in  1997 approximately  इससे  the site of the  असली  theatre .
it  's a  अद्भुत   जीवन  is a 1946 American Christmas  नाटक  film produced and directed  by   फ़्रैंक  Capra ,  आधारित   on   the  short  स्टोरी  `` The Greatest Gift `` , which  फिलिप  Van  doren  Stern  लिखा  in  1939  and privately published in 1945  .
the   फिल्मी  is  माना  one of the  सबसे   loved   films   in  American  सिनेमा   और   रै  become traditional viewing during the Christmas season ,  alongside  popular classics  ऐसे   as   चार्ल्स  Dickens ' A  क्रिसमस  Carol  .
The film  सितारों   जेम्स   स्टीवर्ट   as   जार्ज  Bailey  ,   a  man  जो  has given  up  his dreams in order to help others  और  whose imminent suicide  on  Christmas  संध्या   brings  about the  हस्तक्षेप   of   उसके  guardian angel  ,  Clarence  odbody  ( Henry Travers ) .
Clarence  shows   जार्ज  all  the  lives he has touched and how  अलग  life in his community of Bedford  जलप्रपात   होता   be   था  he  never   महरूम   born  .
despite   initially  performing poorly at the box office  due  to high production costs and stiff competition  at   the  time  of  its release ,  the  film  रै  come  to  be  regarded   as  a  क्लासिक  and is  a   स्टेपल  of Christmas television  around  the  संसार   .
theatrically   ,  the film 's break-even  पाइंट  was actually  $  6.3  लाख  , approximately twice  the   उत्पादन   लागत  ,  a  figure it never  आए   बंद   to   achieving   in  its  आरंभिक   रिलीज   .
An  appraisal   in  2006  reported   :   ``   हालांकि  it was  नहीं   the  complete  बक्सा   दफ्तर   विफलता   कि  today everyone  मानता  ... it was initially a major disappointment and  पुष्टि   ,  at  तनिक  to the studios ,  कि  Capra  थी   no  longer  सक्षम   of  turning  आउट  the populist  सुविधाएँ   कि   बना  his films  the  must-see , money-making  कार्यक्रम  they once were . ''
The film  थी   मनोनीत  for five Oscars  और  has  महरूम  recognized by the  अमरीकी  Film  संस्थान  as  एक  of the 100  बेहतरीन   अमरीकी   films  ever made ,  रखकर  number  11   on  its initial  1998   महानतम   फिल्म  list ,  और  would  भी   प्लेस  number  एक   on  its list of the most  प्रेरणादायक  American  films   of  all time .
Data Warehouse  अवलोकन
In computing  ,   a   आंकड़ा   गोदाम  or enterprise data warehouse (  dw  , DWH , or  edw  ) is a database  प्रयुक्त  for reporting  और  data  विश्लेषण   .
It is a central  repository  of  आंकड़ा  which is created by integrating  आंकड़ा  from  एक  or  अधिक  disparate sources .
Data warehouses store current as well as historical  आंकड़ा   और  are used for creating  चर्चित   रिपोर्ट्स  for senior  प्रबन्धन   रिपोर्टिंग   ऐसे  as annual and  त्रैमासिक  comparisons  .
The data stored in  the  warehouse are uploaded  इससे  the operational systems ( such  as  marketing ,  बिक्री  etc.  ,  shown  in   the  figure  to   the  right  )  .
The data  may  pass through  an  operational data store for  अतिरिक्त   परिचालन  before  वे  are used in  the  DW  लिये  reporting .
the   ठेठ   etl   -आधारd   आंकड़ा  warehouse  उपयोग  staging , data integration ,  और   अभिगम  layers  to  house its  कुंजी   कृत्यों   .
The  स्टेजिंग   परत   or   स्टेजिंग   डेटाबेस   स्टोर्स  raw data  निकाली  from  प्रत्येक  of the  disparate  source data  प्रणालियों   .
The integration  परत   integrates   the  disparate data sets  by  transforming the data  इससे   the  staging  परत   प्रायः  storing this transformed data  in  an operational data store  (  ODS  )  database .
the  integrated  आंकड़ा  are then  स्थानांतरित  to yet  another  database , often  पुकारा  the  आंकड़ा  warehouse database ,  जहाँ  the  आंकड़ा  is arranged into hierarchical groups often called  आयाम  and into facts and aggregate facts  .
the  combination of  तथ्य  and  आयाम  is  sometimes  called  a   स्टार   स्कीमा  .
The  अभिगम  layer  helps   उपयोक्ता   retrieve  data .
a   आंकड़ा  warehouse constructed from an  एकीकृत  data source systems does  नहीं  require  etl   ,  staging databases  ,  or operational data store  databases  .
The integrated  आंकड़ा  source systems may  be  considered to be a part of a  वितरित   operational   आंकड़ा  store layer .
आंकड़ा   संघ  methods or data  आभासीकरण  methods  may   be  used to access the distributed  एकीकृत   सोर्स   आंकड़ा   प्रणालियों  to  consolidate   और   कुल  data  सीधे  into the  आंकड़ा  warehouse database tables .
नापसंद  the  etl-based  data warehouse ,  the   एकीकृत  source data systems  और  the data warehouse are all integrated since  वहीँ  is  no   परिवर्तन  of dimensional  or  reference data .
This integrated  आंकड़ा  warehouse architecture  supports  the  ड्रिल  down from  the   कुल  data  of  the  आंकड़ा   गोदाम   to  the transactional data of  the  integrated source data systems  .
Data warehouses can be subdivided into data marts .
आंकड़ा  marts  स्टोर  subsets of  आंकड़ा   इससे  a warehouse .
This definition of  the   आंकड़ा  warehouse focuses on data  भंडार  .
The main source  of  the data is cleaned , transformed ,  cataloged   और  made  उपलब्धियाँ  for  उपयोग   by   प्रबंधक  and  अन्य  business professionals for data mining , online  विश्लेषणात्मक   प्रसंस्करण  ,  मार्केट  research  और   निर्णय  support (  marakas  & O'Brien  2009  ) .
However ,  the   अर्थात्  to  retrieve  and analyze  आंकड़ा   ,   to  extract  ,   रूपांतरण  and load  आंकड़ा  , and to manage  the   आंकड़ा   शब्दकोष   हैं   भी  considered  अनिवार्य   components  of  a  data warehousing  प्रणाली   .
अनेक   सन्दर्भ  to  आंकड़ा   warehousing   उपयोग   इस   broader  context .
यूँ   ,  an  विस्तारित  definition  लिये   आंकड़ा   warehousing  includes business intelligence tools  ,   टूल्स  to extract , transform and load data  into   the  repository ,  और   टूल्स  to manage and  retrieve   मेटाडेटा   .
Portland stone  पाषाण   on  the  आइल  of Portland ,  इंग्लैण्ड
An abandoned  निर्माण  aggregate quarry near Adelaide , South  ऑस्ट्रेलिया
A  पाषाण  is a type of  open-pit   मेरा  from which rock or minerals are  निकाली  .
खदानों   हैं  generally  प्रयुक्त   लिये   extracting   भवन   सामग्री   ,   ऐसे  as  आयाम   स्टोन   ,  construction  कुल  ,  riprap  , sand , and gravel .
वे  are often collocated with  कंक्रीट  and  डामर   पौधे  due to the requirement for  विशाल   amounts  of  कुल   in   those  materials  .
Open  खानों   कि  produce  खनिज  are typically referred to  as   खोलें   गड्ढे  mines .
the  word  पाषाण   can  include  भूमिगत   quarrying  for  स्टोन  , such  as  Bath  स्टोन   .
Mormons ( ) are  a  religious and cultural group  सम्बन्धित   to  Mormonism , the  प्रिंसिपल   शाखा   of  the  latter  Day Saint  गति  of Restorationist  christianity  , which  began   साथ  the  visions   of   जोसेफ  Smith  in   upstate  New York  दौरान   the   1820s  .
बाद  Smith 's death  in   1844  the  mormons  followed  ब्रिघम   यंग  to  कया  would become the Utah Territory  .
आज  Mormons  हैं   समझा   to  be  सदस्यों  of The Church  of   यीशु  Christ of  latter-day  Saints ( LDS  गिरिजाघर   )  .
कुछ   mormons  are also  either   स्वतंत्र  or non-practicing .
The center of  mormon  cultural influence  is   in   यूटा   ,   और   उत्तर  America  रै   अधिक  Mormons than  कोई  other  महाद्वीप  ,  हालांकि  the majority of Mormons live outside  the   संयुक्त  States  .
Mormons  have   विकसित   a  strong  भाव  of  communality  that stems  इससे   उनके  doctrine and  इतिहास  .
During the 19th century Mormon  converts  tended  to  gather  to   a   सेंट्रल   भौगोलिक   स्थान  , and between  1852  and 1890  a  minority of  mormons  openly  practiced   बहुवचन  marriage  ,  a form of  धार्मिक  polygamy .
mormons   dedicate   विशाल  amounts of  समय  and resources  to  serving in their church , and  अनेक  young Mormons  चुनें  to serve  a   full-time  proselytizing mission  .
mormons   have   a  health code that eschews alcoholic beverages  ,   तम्बाकू  , coffee , tea  ,   और   अन्य   addictive  substances .
वे  tend to be very  family-oriented  , and  have  strong  कनेक्शन्स   आरपार  generations  और  with  विस्तारित   परिवार  ,  परावर्तक   of   उनके  belief  कि  families  can  be sealed together  परे  death  और  throughout eternity  .
Mormons  भी  have a strict  विधि  of chastity ,  requiring  abstention from sexual  संबंध   बाहर  of  विवाह   और  strict  वफ़ादारी  within  विवाह  .
Mormons self-identify as  ईसाई  , though some of  उनके  beliefs differ  इससे  mainstream  christianity  .
Mormons  मानना  in the  बाइबल   ,  as well as  अन्य   किताबे  of  scripture   ,   ऐसे  as  the  Book of Mormon  .
They have a  अद्वितीय  view of cosmology , and believe  कि   सब  people are  spirit-children  of  परमेश्वर   .
mormons   मानना  that  returning   to   परमेश्वर  requires  following   the  example of Jesus  मसीह   ,   और   accepting   उसके  atonement  through  ordinances such  as  baptism .
They believe  कि   मसीह  's church was restored through  जोसेफ   स्मिथ   ,  and is  हिदायत   by   जीना   नबियों  and apostles .
सेंट्रल   to   mormon  faith is the  विश्वास   कि   परमेश्वर  speaks  to   उसके   children   और  answers their prayers .
in   वित्तीय   हिसाब  , assets are economic resources  .
Anything tangible  or  intangible  कि  is capable of  होने   स्वामित्व   or   नियंत्रित  to  उपज  value  और   कि   is   आयोजित  to have positive economic  मान   is  considered  an   एसेट  .
Simply stated , assets represent value  of   स्वामित्व   कि  can  be   परिवर्तित   into  cash  (  although cash itself  is   भी  considered an  एसेट   )  .
The  संतुलन  sheet  of   a  firm  रिकॉर्ड  the  monetaryj   .
G. Siegel , N. Dauber & J. K. Shim ,  ``  The Vest Pocket  cpa  '' , Wiley ,  2005.there   हैं  different methods of  assessing  the monetary  मान  of the assets recorded  on   the   संतुलन   चादर  .
In some  मामले   ,   the  Historical Cost  is  used ;  ऐसे  that the  मान  of the asset  जब  it  थी  bought in  the  past  is   प्रयुक्त   as  the monetary value  .
In other instances , the present  मेला  market  मान  of the  एसेट   is   प्रयुक्त  to  determine  the value  दिखाया  on the balance sheet  .
मान  of the  एसेट  owned by the  कड़  .
it  is money and  अन्य  valuables belonging to  an   व्यक्तिगत   or   कारोबार  .
Two  प्रमुख  asset classes are  ठोस  assets and intangible assets  .
Tangible assets contain various subclasses ,  सहित  current assets and fixed  assets.j  .
Downes , J.E  .   गुडमैन  , `` Dictionary  of  Finance  &   निवेश  Terms ''  ,   सामन्त  's  वित्तीय  Guides ,  2003   वर्तमान  assets include inventory , while fixed assets  शामिल  such items as buildings  और  equipment .J .  downes   ,  J.E  .   गुडमैन  , `` Dictionary  of   वित्त   &   निवेश  Terms '' , Baron 's Financial  मार्गदर्शिका   ,   2003   ;  and J.  G.   siegel  , N. Dauber  &   J.  K.  shim  ,  ``  The Vest  जेब   cpa  '' , Wiley ,  2005  .
Intangible  एसेट   हैं   nonphysical   संसाधन   और  rights  कि   have  a  मान  to the firm because they give  the   कड़  some kind  of   लाभ   in  the  मार्केट   प्लेस  .
Examples  of   intangible  assets  हैं  goodwill ,  copyrights  , trademarks , patents  और   कंप्यूटर  programs  ,  and  वित्तीय  assets ,  सहित  such  वस्तुएं  as  खाते   receivable   ,  bonds  और  stocks  .
A neuron  (  or  ;   भी   ज्ञात  as a neurone or nerve  कोशिका   )   is   an  electrically excitable cell  कि  processes  और  transmits information through  विद्युत  and  रासायनिक   सिग्नल  .
a  chemical  सिग्नल   occurs  via  a   अन्तर्ग्रथन   ,  a  specialized   कनेक्शन   साथ  other cells .
Neurons connect to each  अन्य  to  रूप  neural networks  .
Neurons are  the  core components of the  बेचैन   प्रणाली  , which includes  the  brain  ,  spinal cord , and  परिधीय  ganglia .
a   क्रमांक  of  specialized   प्रकार  of neurons exist  :   संवेदी   न्यूरॉन्स  respond to  टच   ,  sound  ,   लाइट  and  numerous  other stimuli affecting cells  of  the  संवेदी  organs  कि  then send  सिग्नल   to   the  spinal  cord  and brain  .
Motor  न्यूरॉन्स  receive signals from  the   दिमाग  and  स्पाइनल  cord , cause  मांसपेशी  contractions  ,   और   affect  glands  .
interneurons   कनेक्ट  neurons to other neurons  भीतर  the  वही   प्रदेश   of   the  brain or  स्पाइनल  cord  .
a  typical neuron possesses  a  cell body ( often  पुकारा  the soma )  ,   dendrites   ,   और   an  axon .
dendrites  are  पतला   structures   कि   उठता  from the  कोशिका  body  ,  often  extending  for hundreds  of   micrometres  and branching multiple times ,  giving  rise to a complex ``  dendritic   पेड़  '' .
An  axon   is  a special cellular extension that arises from  the   कोशिका   देह  at a  साईट   पुकारा  the  axon   उभरकर   और  travels for a distance ,  as   दूर   as  1  मीटर   in  humans  or   भी   अधिक  in other  प्रजाति   .
The cell  देह  of a  न्यूरॉन  frequently gives  वृद्धि   to   अनेक  dendrites , but  never   to   अधिक  than one axon  ,   हालांकि  the axon may branch  सैंकड़ों   of  times before  it  terminates  .
At the  बहुमत  of synapses ,  सिग्नल   हैं  sent from the  axon  of  एक  neuron to a dendrite of  another  .
There are ,  however  , many exceptions to  ये  rules  :  neurons that  कमी   dendrites   ,  neurons  कि  have  no   axon  , synapses that  कनेक्ट  an axon to  another  axon or  a   dendrite  to  another  dendrite , etc .
All  न्यूरॉन्स  are  electrically  excitable , maintaining  वोल्टेज  gradients across their membranes  by   अर्थात्  of  metabolically  driven  आयन  pumps ,  जिससे  combine with ion  चैनल्स   अंतःस्थापित  in the  झिल्ली  to generate  intracellular-versus-extracellular  concentration  मतभेद   of   ions  such  as  sodium ,  पोटैशियम  ,  chloride   ,   और  calcium  .
परिवर्तन  in the cross-membrane  वोल्टेज   can  alter the function of  voltage-dependent  ion  चैनल्स  .
If  the   वोल्टेज  changes by  a  large enough  राशि  ,  an   all-or-none   electrochemical   पल्स   पुकारा   an   कार्रवाई  potential is  उत्पन्न  , which  ट्रेवल्स   rapidly  along the  कोशिका  's axon  ,   और  activates  सिनेप्टिक  connections  साथ  other  कोशिकाएं  when it  आगमन  .
Neurons do not undergo cell  प्रभाग  .
in   सबसे   मामले   ,  neurons are  उत्पन्न   by  special types  of  stem  कोशिकाएं   .
astrocytes   ,   a  type of glial cell , have also  महरूम  observed to turn into neurons  by  virtue  of   the   स्टेम  cell  characteristic  pluripotency  .
In humans  ,  neurogenesis largely ceases during adulthood—but  in  two  दिमाग  areas , the  हिप्पोकैम्पस  and olfactory  बल्ब  ,  वहीँ   is  strong  प्रमाण  for  पीढी   of   substantial   संख्याएँ   of   नई  neurons .
सुपर  Bowl  xliii  was an  अमरीकी  football game  between   the  American  फ़ुटबॉल  Conference (  afc  )  चैंपियन   पिट्सबर्ग  Steelers and  the   नेशनल   फ़ुटबॉल  Conference  (  NFC ) champion  एरिज़ोना   कार्डिनल्स  to  decide   the  National Football  लीग  ( NFL  )   चैंपियन   लिये  the 2008 season  .
the   स्टीलर्स  defeated the Cardinals  by   the  score of 27–23 .
the  game  थी  played on  फ़रवरी  1 , 2009 ,  at   रेमंड   जेम्स   स्टेडियम  in Tampa  ,  Florida .
साथ   इस   जीत  , the Steelers became  the   पहला  team  to  win six Super Bowls .
Pittsburgh ,  जो   समाप्त   the   नियमित   ऋतु   साथ  a 12–4 record , also  जीती   उनके  second Super Bowl  in  four  सालो  after winning Super Bowl XL at the end of the  2005   ऋतु   .
The  कार्डिनल्स  entered the game  seeking   उनके  first NFL  शीर्षक  since  1947   ,  the longest championship drought in  the  league  .
The club became an  अनपेक्षित  winner during the  नियमित   ऋतु  ,  compiling   a   9–7   रिकार्ड  , and  the  playoffs with the aid of  सिर  coach Ken Whisenhunt  ,   जो  was  the  Steelers '  अप्रिय  coordinator  in  Super Bowl XL , and  the  re-emergence of quarterback  कर्ट  Warner ,  जो  was  the   सुपर  Bowl MVP  in  Super Bowl  xxxiv  with  उसके   पूर्व   टोली   ,  St.  लुई  Rams  .
Pittsburgh  कूद   to   a  17–7 halftime lead ,  aided  by linebacker James Harrison 's  सुपर  Bowl  रिकार्ड  100-yard  interception  return for  a   touchdown  .
Trailing  20–7   at  the start of the fourth quarter , Arizona scored 16  अनुत्तरित  points  ,   सहित   चौड़ी  receiver  लैरी  Fitzgerald 's 64-yard  touchdown  reception , to take  the   सीसे   साथ   2:37   बाकी  in  the  game .
But  the  Steelers  marched   78   गज   to  score on wide receiver  santonio  Holmes  '  6-yard  game-winning   touchdown   कैच   साथ  35 seconds left .
Holmes , who caught nine  गुजरता   लिये   131   गज  and  a  touchdown , including four  receptions  for  73   गज  on that final  game-winning  drive  ,  was named  सुपर  Bowl  mvp  .
he  became the sixth wide receiver to  जीत   the  award ,  और  also was the third Pittsburgh receiver  to  win the award , following  lynn   swann  and Hines Ward  .
despite  the  वैश्विक  financial crisis and limited amount of ancillary  festivities  that  हैं   सामान्यतः  held  पहले  the game , the  एनबीसी   टेलीविज़न  network broadcast attracted an average U.S. audience of  98.7   लाख   दर्शक   ,  making it the most watched Super Bowl  in   इतिहास   to   कि   पाइंट   .
A  आरेख  of  the   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक   वर्णक्रम  ,  प्रर्दशित  various  गुण  across the  दायरा   of   बारंबारता   और   wavelengths
The electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम   is  the  दायरा   of   सब  possible frequencies of  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation  .
the   ``   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक   वर्णक्रम  ''  of   an   ऑब्जेक्ट   रै  a  अलग   अर्थ  , and is instead the characteristic distribution  of   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक   विकिरण  emitted or  अवशोषित   by  that particular object .
the  electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम  extends  इससे  below the  कम  frequencies used for modern radio  संचार   to   गामा  radiation  at   the  short-  wavelength  ( high-frequency ) end ,  thereby  covering  wavelengths   इससे   हज़ारों   of  kilometers down to  a  fraction of  the  size  of  an atom .
The limit for  long  wavelengths is  the   आकार  of the  ब्रह्मांड  itself  ,   जबकि  it  is   विचार  that the  छोटी   wavelength  limit  is  in the vicinity  of  the Planck length ,  हालांकि  in principle the spectrum  is  infinite  और  continuous  .
Most parts of the electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम  are used  in  science for  spectroscopic   और  other probing interactions , as  तरीके  to  पढ़ाई  and characterize  पदार्थ   .
in   जोड  ,  विकिरण  from various  भाग   of   the  spectrum  रै  found  अनेक  other uses for communications  और  manufacturing  (  see electromagnetic radiation for more  अनुप्रयोग  ) .
लेजेंड
Marchantia ,  a  liverwort
Bryophyte  is   a  traditional  नाम   प्रयुक्त  to  refer  to  सब   embryophytes   (  land plants ) that do not  have  true vascular tissue  और  are therefore called  '  non-vascular plants ' .
कुछ   bryophytes  do have  specialized   ऊतकों  for  the   हस्तांतरण  of  जल  ;  however  since these do  नहीं  contain lignin  ,  they are not  माना  to  be  true vascular  ऊतक  .
फिलहाल  bryophytes are thought not to be  a  natural or monophyletic  समूह   ;  however the name is convenient and  remains  in  उपयोग  as a collective term for mosses , hornworts  ,   और  liverworts  .
Bryophytes  उपज  enclosed reproductive  structures  (  gametangia   और   sporangia  ) ,  लकिन  they produce neither  पुष्प  nor  बीज   ,  reproducing via  बीजाणुओं   .
The  पद  bryophyte  आता  from Greek  βρύον  ,  bryon   ,  `` tree-moss  ,   oyster-green  ''  +  φυτόν  -   phyton   ``   संयंत्र   ''   .
a  bank is a  वित्तीय   संस्था  and a financial intermediary that accepts  जमा  and channels those deposits into lending  क्रियाएँ   ,  either directly  by  loaning or  indirectly  through  पूंजी   बाज़ार  .
A  बैंको  is the  कनेक्शन   between   ग्राहक  that have  पूंजी   deficits  and customers  साथ  capital surpluses .
due  to their  influence  within a financial  प्रणाली  and  an  economy  ,   बैंको   हैं  generally  अत्यधिक   regulated  in most countries  .
सबसे  banks operate under a system  ज्ञात   as  fractional  आरक्षित  banking  जहाँ   वे   थाम  only  a   छोटी  reserve  of   the  funds deposited and lend  आउट  the  बाकी   लिये   लाभ   .
वे  are generally subject to  न्यूनतम  capital  आवश्यकताएँ  which  हैं  based  on   an   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  set of  पूंजी  standards , known as the  basel  Accords .
The oldest bank still  in  existence is  मोंटे   देई   paschi   di  Siena  ,   headquartered  in Siena , Italy , which has been operating continuously since 1472  .
It is  followed   by   berenberg  Bank of  हैम्बर्ग  ( 1590  )   और  Sveriges  riksbank  of Sweden  (  1668 )  .
Banking in its modern sense evolved in  समृद्ध  cities  of  Renaissance Italy , such  as   फ्लोरेंस   ,  Venice and  जेनोआ  .
In  the  history  of  banking  ,   a   क्रमांक  of  बैंकिंग   dynasties  —among  उन्हें  notably  medici  , Fugger , Welser ,  berenberg  , Baring  और  Rothschild —have  निभाई  a  सेंट्रल  role over many centuries .
The  एक्सबॉक्स   is  a video  खेल  console manufactured  by  Microsoft  .
it  was released on November  15  , 2001  in  North  अमेरिका  ,  फ़रवरी  22 , 2002 in Japan , and  कूच  14 ,  2002   in  Australia  और   यूरोपीय  .
It was  microsoft  's first  foray   into  the gaming  कंसोल  market  .
as   भाग   of   the   sixth-generation   of   गेमिंग   ,  the Xbox  competed   साथ   सोनी  's PlayStation  2  ,  sega  's  dreamcast   (   जिससे  stopped  अमरीकी  sales before  the  Xbox went on sale  )   ,  and  निन्टेंडो   's  GameCube  .
the  Xbox was the first console offered by an American company  बाद  the  atari   जैगुआर   रोका  sales  in   1996   .
the   एकीकृत   एक्सबॉक्स  Live  सेवा  launched in  नवम्बर  2002 allowed players to play  खेल   ऑनलाइन  with  a  broadband  कनेक्शन  .
It first  competed  with  dreamcast  's online  सेवा   लकिन   बाद  primarily competed with  प्लेस्टेशन  2  's   ऑनलाइन  service  .
Although these  दो  are free  जबकि  Xbox Live  जरूरी  a  सब्सक्रिप्शन   ,  as  खूब  as  broadband-only  connection  जिससे  was  नहीं  completely adopted yet ,  एक्सबॉक्स   सजीव  was  a   कामयाबी   due  to  बेहतर  servers ,  सुविधाएँ  such  as  a  दोस्त  list , and milestone titles like Halo 2  released   in   नवम्बर  2004 ,  जिससे  is the  best-selling  Xbox video game and was  by  far  the   सबसे  popular  ऑनलाइन   खेल   लिये  years .
Xbox  's  successor , the Xbox  360  , was launched  in  November 2005 .
the  Xbox was discontinued in late  2005   in  Japan  जहाँ  sales  यहूद   ग़रीब  .
It  थी  discontinued in  लेट   2006   in  Europe and early  2007   in  North  अमेरिका  .
the  last Xbox game in  यूरोपीय   थी  Tony  हॉक   's  Project  8  released  in  November  2006   ,  and the last game in North  अमेरिका  was Madden  एनएफएल  09  released  in August  2008  .
support   लिये  out-of-warranty  एक्सबॉक्स  consoles was discontinued on  कूच  2  ,   2009  ,  stating  that any in-warranty repair  अभी   needed  will  नहीं   be  undertaken .
Xbox access  to  Xbox  सजीव  was  रोका  on  अप्रैल  15 , 2010  .
The Gospel  according  to John  (   यूनानी  τὸ  κατὰ  Ἰωάννην  εὐαγγέλιον  )  ,   commonly   referred   to   as  the  इन्जील  of John  or   बस  John and often referred to in  नई   वसीयत  scholarship as the Fourth  इन्जील  ,  is  an account  of   the  public ministry of Jesus .
it  begins  साथ   the  witness and affirmation by  जॉन   the   बैपटिस्ट  and  concludes  with the death ,  दफ़न   ,  resurrection ,  और  post-resurrection  दिखावे  of Jesus .
This  खाता  is fourth of the canonical gospels , after the synoptics Matthew  ,  Mark  और   ल्यूक   .
states  कि   the  book derives  इससे  the testimony  of  the ' disciple whom  यीशु  loved . '
Along with Peter ,  the  unnamed  शिष्य  is  विशेषकर  close to Jesus ,  और  early-church tradition identified  उसे   as   जॉन  the Apostle  ,  one  of   यीशु  ' Twelve  रसूलों  .
The gospel is  closely  related  in   स्टाइल   और  content  to  the  तीन  surviving Epistles of John such  कि  commentators treat the four books together ,  yet  , according  to  most  आधुनिक  scholars  ,  John was  नहीं   the   लेखक  of  कोई  of these  किताबे  .
हाल  Christian Scripture scholarship more and  अधिक  has placed  जॉन  within a first-century  यहूदी  context  .
Raymond E.  भूरा   किया  pioneering  कार्य  to  ट्रेस  the development of the tradition from  जिससे  the gospel  arose  .
The discourses seem to  be  concerned with the  वास्तविक  issues of  the   church-and-synagogue   बहस   at   the   समय   जब   the  Gospel  थी   लिखा  .
it  is notable that  ,  in the gospel , the  जातियाँ   स्टिल   appears   to  define  itself   primarily   विरूद्ध  Judaism  ,   बल्कि   than  as part of  a   wider  Christian church  .
हालांकि   christianity  started  as   a  movement  भीतर  Judaism , gradually Christians  और   यहूदियों   became  bitterly opposed  .
John presents  a  `` higher  ''  Christology than the synoptics ,  अर्थ  that it  describes   यीशु  as the incarnation  of  the divine  लोगो  through whom  सब   बाते  were made , as the object  of   veneration   ,  and more explicitly as God  incarnate  .
Only  in  John does Jesus talk  at  length about  खुद   और  his  दैवी   भूमिका   ,  often shared with  the   शिष्यों  only .
Against  the   synoptics   ,  John  focuses  largely  on   अलग   चमत्कार  (  सहित   resurrecting  Lazarus )  ,   दिए  as signs  meant  to  engender   आस्था   .
Synoptic  तत्व  such  as   parables  and  exorcisms  are  नहीं  found in John .
it  presents a  एहसास  eschatology  in  which salvation  is  already  उपस्थित  for the  आस्तिक  .
The  plagues   of  Egypt  (  )  ,  also called the Ten Plagues (  )  or the  biblical  Plagues  ,  were ten calamities that ,  according  to the biblical  किताब   of  Exodus  ,  Israel 's  परमेश्वर   ,   yahweh   ,   inflicted  upon  मिश्र  to persuade Pharaoh to  रिलीज  the ill-treated Israelites from  गुलामी  .
pharaoh  capitulated after  the  tenth plague , triggering  the   exodus   of   the  Jewish  लोगों  .
the   plagues  were designed  to  contrast  the  power  of  Yahweh  साथ  the impotence of  मिश्र   's   विभिन्न  gods  .
Some commentators  have   संबद्ध   अनेक   of   the   plagues  with judgment on specific gods associated  साथ   the  Nile ,  प्रजनन   और   प्राकृतिक  phenomena  .
The plagues of  मिश्र   हैं  also  उल्लेखित   in  the Quran  (   7,133–136  ) .
According to the  किताब  of Exodus ,  परमेश्वर   proclaims  that all the gods of Egypt will be  judged  through the  दसवाँ   और  final  plague:
John  मार्टिन   's  painting of  the  plague  of   hail   और  fire  (   1823   )  .
a   role-playing   खेल  ( RPG and sometimes roleplaying game )  is  a  खेल  in which  खिलाड़ी  assume the roles of characters in  a  fictional  सेटिंग  .
खिलाड़ी  take responsibility  लिये  acting out these roles  भीतर   a   कथा   ,  either through literal acting  or   through  a process  of  structured decision-making or character  विकास  .
Actions  लिया   भीतर   अनेक  games succeed or fail according to  a   औपचारिक   प्रणाली   of   नियम  and guidelines .
वहीँ   हैं   अनेक  forms of RPG .
The  असली   रूप  ,  sometimes   पुकारा   the   tabletop  RPG ,  is   conducted  through discussion , whereas in live action role-playing games  (   larp   )   खिलाड़ी   physically  perform their characters ' actions  .
In  दोनो  of these forms , an arranger  पुकारा   a  game  निपुण  ( GM )  प्रायः  decides  on  the  नियम  and setting to be  प्रयुक्त  and acts as  रेफरी  , while  प्रत्येक  of  the  other players  plays   the  role of  a   सिंगल  character  .
अनेक   किस्में   of  RPG also  मौजूद   in   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  media , such as  multi-player  text-based MUDs and their graphics-based successors  ,  massively multiplayer  ऑनलाइन   role-playing  games  (   mmorpgs   )  .
role-playing   खेल  also  शामिल  single-player offline  role-playing  video games in which players  कंट्रोल   a   अक्षर   or   टोली  who undertake  quests  , and  may   शामिल  capabilities  कि   अग्रिम  using statistical mechanics .
These  खेल  often share settings and rules  साथ  tabletop RPGs , but emphasize character advancement  अधिक   than  collaborative  storytelling  .
Despite  इस  variety of  फ़ॉर्म   ,   कुछ   खेल   फ़ॉर्म  such  as  trading card games and wargames that are  सम्बन्धित  to role-playing games may not be  शामिल  .
Role-playing activity  may   sometimes   be   उपस्थित  in such  खेल  ,  लकिन   it  is  नहीं  the primary  फ़ोकस  .
The term is also  sometimes   प्रयुक्त  to describe  लिए  simulation games  और  exercises used in teaching , training , and academic  शोध  .
The American Civil  युद्ध  ( ACW )  ,  also known  as   the  War  between   the  States or simply the  सिविल  War (  देखिए  naming ) , was a  सिविल  war  लड़ा   इससे   1861  to 1865  between  the United States  (  the ``  संघ   ''  or the `` North ''  )  and several Southern slave states that declared  उनके  secession and  formed   the  Confederate States of America  (   the  ``  confederacy  '' or  the  ``  दक्षिण   ''  )  .
The  युद्ध  had its  उत्पत्ति   in  the  समस्या   of  slavery ,  विशेषकर  the extension of slavery  into   the  western territories  .
Foreign powers  किया  not intervene  .
बाद  four  सालो  of bloody combat that  बाएँ   over  600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed  much   of   the  South 's  अवसंरचना  , the Confederacy  collapsed   ,  slavery  थी  abolished , and the  मुश्किल  Reconstruction process of restoring  नेशनल  unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed  स्लेव  began  .
In the  1860   अध्यक्षीय  election  ,  Republicans  ,  led by Abraham Lincoln  ,  opposed  expanding  slavery into  संयुक्त  States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his  उद्घाटन  on  कूच   4  , 1861 ,  सात   cotton-based  slave states formed the  confederacy  .
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the  आवक   republicans   अस्वीकृत  secession  as  illegal  .
lincoln  's  inaugural   पता  declared his  प्रशासन   होता  not  initiate  civil  युद्ध   .
Eight  बाकी  slave  राज्य  continued to  अस्वीकृत   काल्स   लिये   secession  .
confederate  forces  जब्त  numerous federal forts within territory claimed  by   the  Confederacy  .
A  सलाम   सम्मेलन  failed  to   ढूँढें  a  सुलह  ,  और   दोनो   पहलू   prepared  for  युद्ध  .
The Confederates  assumed  that  यूरोपीय   देशों  were  so  dependent on ``  किंग   कपास  ``  कि   वे   होता  intervene  ;   none  did  और  none recognized the  नई  Confederate States of  अमेरिका  .
hostilities   began   on   अप्रैल  12  ,   1861  ,  जब  Confederate forces  fired  upon  फोर्ट  Sumter ,  a  key fort held by Union  सैनिकों  in  दक्षिण  Carolina .
lincoln   पुकारा  for  प्रत्येक   राज्य   to   provide  troops to retake the  फोर्ट  ;  नतीजतन  ,  चार   अधिक   स्लेव   राज्य  joined the Confederacy , bringing  उनके  total to eleven  .
The Union soon controlled the  किनारा  states  और   स्थापित   a   नवल  blockade that crippled the  दक्षिणी  economy .
The Eastern Theater  थी  inconclusive  in  1861–62 .
the  autumn 1862  confederate  campaign into Maryland  (  a Union state  )  ended with  confederate  retreat  at   the  Battle  of   antietam   ,   dissuading  British intervention .
Lincoln issued  the   emancipation  Proclamation  ,  which  बना  ending slavery  a   युद्ध  goal  .
To the west ,  by  summer 1862 the Union destroyed  the  Confederate  नदी  navy , then  much  of  उनके   पश्चिमी  armies  ,  and the  संघ  at Vicksburg split  the  Confederacy in  दो  at  the   मिसिसिपी  River .
in  1863 , Robert E.  ली   's  Confederate incursion north ended  at   the  Battle of Gettysburg .
पश्चिमी  successes led  to   ulysses   S.   ग्रान्ट  command of all Union armies in 1864 .
In the  पश्चिमी   थिएटर   ,  William T.  शरमन  drove  ईस्ट  to capture  अटलांटा   और  marched to  the   समुद्र  , destroying  confederate  infrastructure  साथ   the   रास्ता  .
The Union  marshaled  the resources and  जनशक्ति   to  attack the  confederacy   इससे   सब   दिशानिर्देश  ,  और   could  afford  to   लड़ो  battles of attrition through  the  Overland Campaign towards Richmond ,  the   confederate  capital .
the  defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's  आत्मसमर्पण   to   ग्रान्ट  at  appomattox  Court House  on   अप्रैल   9  , 1865  .
The  अमरीकी  Civil War  थी   एक  of  the   earliest  true  औद्योगिक  wars  .
Railroads , the  टेलीग्राफ  ,  steamships  ,  और   mass-produced   हथियार  were employed  extensively  .
The mobilization  of   civilian   कारखानों   ,  mines , shipyards  ,   बैंको  , transportation  और   खाना  supplies  सब  foreshadowed World  युद्ध   i   .
It remains  the   deadliest  war  in  American history  ,  resulting in  the  deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers  और  an undetermined  क्रमांक  of civilian  हताहत  .
Historian John  huddleston  estimates  the  death  टोल  at  टेन  percent of  सब  Northern males  20–45  years old  ,  and  30  percent of all Southern  श्वेत   males  aged  18–40  .
The definition  of  the world 's busiest airport  रै   महरूम   निर्दिष्ट   by   the  Airports  परिषद  International in Geneva  ,  Switzerland .
the  ACI defines and measures the following  तीन  types of airport  traffic:
Passenger traffic : total  यात्री   emplaned  and deplaned  ,  passengers in transit counted once
Cargo  ट्रैफ़िक  : loaded  और   मोड  freight and  मेल   in  metric tonnes
Traffic  आंदोलनों  : landings  और   take-offs  of aircraft
संसार  War I ( WWI )  थी  a  वैश्विक  war  केंद्रित   in   यूरोपीय  that  began   on  28  जुलाई  1914  और  lasted until 11  नवम्बर   1918  .
It  थी  predominantly called the World  युद्ध  or the Great War  इससे   इसके  occurrence until  the  start  of  World  युद्ध   ii  in  1939   ,  and the First  संसार  War or  संसार  War I  thereafter   .
it  involved all  the   संसार  's  ग्रेट   शक्तियां  , which were  समवेत   in  two opposing alliances  :   the  Allies  (  based on  the   ट्रिपल   entente   of  the United  किंगडम   ,  France  और  Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally  the  Triple Alliance of Germany  ,  Austria-Hungary  और   इटली   ;   लकिन  ,  as   austria–hungary  had  लिया   the   अप्रिय   विरूद्ध  the agreement  ,  Italy did not enter into  the  war  )   .
These  alliances   यहूद  both reorganised and expanded  as  more nations entered the  युद्ध   :  Italy  ,  Japan  और   the  United  राज्य  joined  the  Allies ,  और   the  Ottoman Empire  और   बुल्गारिया  the Central  शक्तियां  .
Ultimately  ,  more  than  70  लाख  military personnel , including 60 million Europeans  ,   यहूद   mobilised  in one of  the   largest  wars in history  .
More than 9  लाख   combatants  were killed , largely  क्युकी  of technological  advancements   कि   led  to enormous increases  in  the  lethality   of  weapons  बगैर   सम्बन्धित   सुधार   in  protection  or  mobility .
it  was the fifth- deadliest  विरोध   in   संसार  history ,  subsequently   paving   the  way  लिये  various  राजनैतिक  changes , such  as  revolutions in many  of  the  राष्ट्र  involved .
One of the long-term causes of  the   युद्ध   थी   the  resurgence of imperialism in  the  foreign policies of  the   ग्रेट   शक्तियां   of  Europe .
More immediately , the assassination  of  Archduke Franz Ferdinand of  ऑस्ट्रिया  ,  the  heir to the  सिंहासन   of  Austria-Hungary  ,  on 28 June 1914  by  Yugoslav  राष्ट्रवादी  Gavrilo  princip  in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic  संकट  when  austria-hungary  subsequently  वितरित   an   ultimatum   to  the  किंगडम  of Serbia .
अनेक   alliances   formed   over   the   पिछला  decades were  invoked   .
भीतर  weeks  ,  the  प्रमुख   शक्तियां  were at  युद्ध  and , via their  colonies  , the conflict soon spread  around  the world  .
On 28 July  ,  the  austro-hungarians  fired  the   पहला  shots of  the   युद्ध  as preparation  लिये   the  invasion of  सर्बिया  .
While the Russians  mobilised   ,   the   germans   invaded  neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the  रास्ता  to France ,  providing  a casus belli for  ब्रिटेन   's  declaration  of   युद्ध  against Germany  .
बाद  the German march on Paris  थी  brought to  a  halt—the so-called Miracle  of  the  marne  —the  पश्चिमी   सामने  settled into a  स्थिर   बैटल  of  अपघर्षण  with  a  trench line that changed little until  1917  .
On  the   पूर्वी  Front  ,   the  Russian army was successful against the Austro-Hungarians  ,  but  थी  stopped in its  आक्रमण   of  East  prussia  by the Germans .
In November the  उस्मानी  Empire joined  the   युद्ध  , opening up fronts in the  काकेशस   ,   मेसोपोटामिया  and the  sinai   .
Italy and Bulgaria went  to  war  in  1915 and Romania in  1916  .
In Russia  ,  the tsar 's government collapsed in March  1917  and  a   subsequent   क्रान्ति   in  November  brought   the   russians  to  शर्तें  with the Central  शक्तियां  .
After a 1918 German  अप्रिय  along  the  western  सामने  , the  allies   drove  back  the  Germans in a  श्रेणी  of successful  offensives  and  अमरीकी  forces began entering  the   trenches   .
Germany  ,  which had  इसके  own trouble with revolutionaries , agreed to an armistice on  11   नवम्बर  1918  .
The war ended in victory  लिये   the   allies  .
Events  on   the   घर   fronts  were as tumultuous as  on  the  बैटल   fronts   ,  as  the  participants  आजमाया   to  mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight  a  total war .
by  the end of the war , four major imperial powers—the German ,  रूसी  , Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman  empires—ceased   to  exist .
The  successor   राज्य  of the former two  खोया  a great amount of territory , while the  latter  two were dismantled entirely .
The map of  सेंट्रल  Europe  थी   redrawn  into  अनेक   छोटी   राज्य  .
The League of Nations was formed in  the  hope of preventing another such conflict .
The  यूरोपीय  nationalism spawned  by   the   युद्ध  and  the   ब्रेकअप   of  empires , the  परखना   of   जर्मनी   's   शिकस्त   और   समस्याएं  with the  सन्धि  of  versailles  are  सहमत  to be  कारकों  contributing to  संसार   युद्ध  II .
the  Deepwater  क्षितिज  oil  spill  ( also  referred  to  as  the BP oil spill , the  bp  oil disaster  ,   the   गल्फ  of Mexico oil  spill  ,  और  the  macondo   blowout  ) was an oil spill in  the   गल्फ  of  मैक्सिको  on the  bp  -operated  macondo  Prospect  ,  considered the  largest   आकस्मिक  marine oil  spill  in  the  history  of   the   पेट्रोलियम   उद्योग   ,  estimated to be between 8 % and 31 % larger in  आवाज़  than  the   पहले  Ixtoc I  आयल   spill  .
Following  the  explosion and sinking of the Deepwater Horizon  आयल  rig  ,  which  claimed  11 lives , a sea-floor oil gusher flowed  unabated  for  87   दिनों   ,   जबतक  it was capped  on  15  जुलाई  2010  .
The total discharge  is  estimated  at   .
A massive response  ensued  to protect beaches ,  वेटलैंड्स   और  estuaries  इससे  the  spreading  oil utilizing  skimmer  ships , floating  booms  , controlled  burns   और   of  Corexit oil  dispersant  .
After several failed efforts  to  contain the  प्रवाह   ,  the well was declared sealed on 19 September  2010  .
Some reports indicate the  खूब  site  continues  to leak .
due  to the months-long spill , along  साथ   प्रतिकूल  effects from  the  response and cleanup  क्रियाएँ  ,  extensive  damage  to   समुद्री  and  वन्यजीव  habitats  ,   फ़िशिंग   और  tourism  उद्योग   ,  and human health problems have continued through 2013.Three years  बाद  the spill ,  तारकोल  balls could still be found  on  the Mississippi  coast   .
numerous   investigations   छान   the  causes  of  the  विस्फोट  and  record-setting   spill  .
Notably  ,   the  U.S.  सरकारी  's September  2011  report pointed  to  defective  सीमेंट   on   the   खूब  ,  faulting   ज़्यादातर  BP  ,  but also well  ऑपरेटर   transocean   और   ठेकेदार   halliburton  .
Earlier in  2011   ,  a White House commission likewise blamed BP and  इसके  partners  लिये  a  श्रेणी   of   cost-cutting  decisions and an insufficient  सुरक्षा  system , but  भी  concluded  कि  the  spill  resulted from  ``  systemic '' root causes  और  `` absent  significant   सुधार   in  both industry practices  और  government  नीतियों  , might  खूब  recur '' .
In November  2012  , BP and the United States Department of Justice settled  संघीय  criminal  आरोप   साथ  BP  pleading  guilty  to  11  रिश्तो   of  manslaughter , two misdemeanors , and a felony count  of  lying to Congress .
bp   भी  agreed to  चार   सालो  of government  निगरानी  of its safety  practices  and  आचार  ,  और   the   पर्यावरणीय   सुरक्षा  Agency  घोषित   कि  BP would be  temporarily   बैन   इससे   नई  contracts with  the  US government .
bp  and the Department  of  Justice  सहमत   to   a  record-setting $ 4.525  अरब  in fines and  अन्य  payments but further legal proceedings  नहीं  expected to  conclude  until 2014 are  जारी  to  determine   payouts  and fines under the Clean  जल  Act  और  the Natural  संसाधन  Damage  मूल्यांकन   .
as  of February  2013  , criminal  और  civil  settlements  and payments  to   a   विश्वास  fund had cost  the  company $ 42.2 billion  .
`` Where  the  Streets Have  no   नाम  '' is a song  by  rock  बैंड   u2   .
It is the opening track from their 1987  एल्बम  The  जोशुआ   पेड़   और  was  released  as the  एल्बम  's  तीसरा   सिंगल  in  अगस्त  1987 .
The song 's  आँकड़ा   is  a  repeating   गिटार   arpeggio   using  a delay effect ,  निभाई   दौरान   the  song 's  परिचय   और  again at  the  end .
सीसे  vocalist Bono wrote the lyrics in  जवाब  to  the   ख़्याल  that  it  is possible to identify a  व्यक्ति  's religion and  आय  based  on  the street on which they  जिया  ,  विशेषकर  in  belfast   .
दौरान  the band  's   कठिनाइयों  recording  the  song , producer Brian Eno considered erasing the song 's  टेपों   to  have them start  इससे   खरोंच   .
``   जहाँ  the  गलियों  Have No  नाम  '' was  praised  by  आलोचकों   और   became  a commercial  कामयाबी  , peaking at number  तेरह   in  the US ,  क्रमांक  fourteen  in   कनाडा  ,  क्रमांक   टेन   in   the   नीदरलैंड्स   ,  and number four in  the  United  किंगडम   .
The song  रै   become  one of  the  band 's  सबसे   लोकप्रिय  songs  और  has  remained  a staple of their live act since the  सोंग  debuted in 1987  on  The Joshua  पेड़   दौरे  .
The  सोंग   थी  notably performed  on   a  Los Angeles  छत  for  the   फिल्मांकन   of   इसके  music  वीडियो  ,  जिससे  won a  ग्रैमी  Award for  बेहतरीन   प्रदर्शन  Music Video .Recently the song  रै  been used  by   the  NFL  's  Baltimore Ravens  as  their  प्रवेश   सोंग  in  सुपर  Bowl XLVII
Thomas  जेफरी   ``  Tom '' Hanks (  born  July 9 ,  1956  ) is an American actor  ,  producer ,  लेखक  , and director .
Hanks  is  known  लिये  his roles  in  Apollo  13  , Big  ,  That Thing  तुम   do  !
, The Green Mile , You 've  मिला  Mail ,  sleepless  in  सिएटल  , Charlie  विल्सन   's  War  ,   कैच  Me If You  can  , Forrest Gump  ,  Cast Away , A  लीग   of  Their  अपना  ,  the   da   विंची   कोड   ,  Angels  &  Demons  ,  as well as animated  films   जैसे  the  खिलौना  Story film  श्रेणी   ,  The  ध्रुवीय  Express  ,  and The  सिम्पसन्स   फिल्म   .
He has earned  और  been nominated  लिये  numerous  पुरस्कार   दौरान   उसके  career  ,  including winning a Golden Globe  लिये  Best Actor and an Academy  पुरस्कार   लिये   बेहतरीन  Actor  लिये  his role in  फिलाडेल्फिया   और  a Golden Globe  ,  an  अकादमी   पुरस्कार  ,  a  Screen Actors  गिल्ड  Award  ,  and  a  People  's  Choice  पुरस्कार   लिये  Best Actor  लिये   उसके   भूमिका   in   फॉरेस्ट   गंप  , and earning the  स्टेनली  Kubrick  britannia   पुरस्कार  for Excellence in  फिल्मी   इससे   the   baftas  in  2004  .
Hanks  is   भी  known for  उसके  collaboration  साथ   फिल्मी  director Steven Spielberg on Saving Private  रयान  and the  mini-series  Band of Brothers  ,  which  शुभारम्भ  Hanks also as  a  successful  निदेशक   ,   निर्माता  and  लेखक   .
as  of 2012  ,  Hanks '  films  have  grossed  over $ 4.2 billion  at  the United States box  दफ्तर   अलोन   ,  and over $ 8.5 billion worldwide  बनाना   उसे  the highest all-time box office star .
The  केप  is  an  American superhero  नाटक  series .
it   premiered   on  NBC  दौरान  the  2010–2011   टेलीविज़न  season as  a  mid-season  बदलना  beginning  साथ  a  two-hour   पायलट  episode on Sunday  ,  January 9 ,  2011   at  9  pm  Eastern and  प्रशांत  Time  .
