NBC  subsequently  cut the total  क्रमांक  of  एपीसोड  to  be   aired   इससे   13  to 10 as a result  of  low  दरजा  .
On March  2   ,  2011  ,   एनबीसी  announced  कि  the  श्रेणी  finale would only  be  aired on  the  network 's website .
हैली   's  Comet or  धूमकेतु  Halley ( or  )  , officially  designated  1P/Halley ,  is   the  best-known  of   the  short-period comets and  is   दृश्य   इससे   धरती   प्रत्येक  75–76 years  .
हैली  is  the  only  short-period  comet that  is   clearly   दृश्य   to   the  naked  नजर   इससे   धरती  ,  और   यूँ   the  only naked-eye  धूमकेतु  that might  appear   twice  in  a   इंसान  lifetime .
Other  naked-eye  comets  may  be brighter and more  spectacular  , but will appear  तभी  once  in   हज़ारों  of  सालो  .
हैली  's returns to  the  inner Solar System have been observed  और   अंकित   by  astronomers since at least  240  BCE .
Clear records  of   the  comet 's  दिखावे  were  बना  by Chinese ,  babylonian   ,  and medieval European  chroniclers   ,  but were not  पहचाना  as reappearances of  the   वही  object at the time .
the   धूमकेतु  's  periodicity   थी   पहला   संकल्पित  in 1705  by   अंग्रेज़ी   astronomer  Edmond Halley ,  बाद  whom it is  अभी  named  .
Halley  's   धूमकेतु   पिछला  appeared  in  the  भीतरी   सौर   प्रणाली  in 1986 and will next  appear   in   mid-2061  .
During its  1986   apparition  , Halley became  the   पहला   धूमकेतु  to  be  observed in detail by  spacecraft   ,  providing  the   पहला   observational   आंकड़ा  on the structure of  a  comet  केंद्रक  and the mechanism  of  coma and tail formation  .
ये   observations   समर्थित   a   क्रमांक   of   longstanding  hypotheses  परिचय  comet construction , particularly Fred Whipple 's `` dirty snowball '' model , which correctly predicted that Halley would  be   रचित  of a mixture  of  volatile ices  –  such as  जल  , carbon dioxide  और  ammonia  –   और   धूल  .
the  missions  भी   provided  data which substantially reformed and  reconfigured  these  विचार   ;  for instance it  is   अभी  understood that Halley  's   सतह   is   largely  composed  of   dusty   ,   non-volatile  materials ,  और  that  तभी  a  छोटी   portion   of   it  is icy  .
The following is a list of  the   सबसे  populous incorporated places  of   the  United States  of  America  .
As defined by  the  United States Census  ब्यूरो   ,  an  ``  incorporated  प्लेस   ``   शामिल   a  variety of  designations   ,  including city ,  कस्बा   ,   गाँव  ,  बरो  , and municipality  .
a   few  exceptional Census Designated  स्थान   (  CDPs  )  are also  शामिल  in  the  Census  ब्यूरो  's listing of incorporated  स्थान  .
संचित  city-counties  represent   a   पृथक  type of government that includes the entire  जनसांख्यिकी   of  a county ,  or   काउंटी   समतुल्य  .
Some consolidated city-counties , however , include multiple  incorporated  places  .
इस   सूची   presents  only  कि  portion ( or  ``   संतुलन   ''  ) of  ऐसे   संचित   city-counties  that are not  a  part of  another  incorporated place .
Note  कि  this  सूची   refers   तभी  to the population  of   व्यक्तिगत  municipalities  भीतर   उनके   पारिभाषित  limits ,  जिससे  does not  शामिल  other  municipalities  or unincorporated  suburban  areas within  शहरी  agglomerations .
a  different  रैंकिंग   is  evident when  considering   u.S.  metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  populations  .
The  mayflower  was the  जलयान   कि   in  1620  transported   102  English  तीर्थयात्रियों   ,   सहित  a core group  of   separatists  , to New  इंग्लैण्ड   .
Their story is one of travail and  अस्तित्व  in a  हर्ष   नई   संसार  environment  .
A  नई  Zealand forward ( in white ) takes  a  shot  on  goal  विरूद्ध  Cameroon in the 2011 FIFA U-20  संसार   कप  .
Forwards ,  भी   ज्ञात   as   strikers   ,  are  the   खिलाड़ी   on  a team in association football  जो   खेल  nearest to  the  opposing team 's  लक्ष्य  , and  हैं   इसलिए   प्रधानतया  responsible  लिये  scoring  लक्ष्य  .
इस  very  उन्नत  position and its limited  रक्षात्मक  responsibilities mean forwards  सामान्यतः   स्कोर   अधिक   लक्ष्य  than  अन्य  players .
इस  position  requires  intelligence  ,  speed  ,  and  शक्ति  , both  of  execution and of  विचार   ,  to  perform   the  role  खूब  .
Modern team  formations   प्रायः  include  एक  to  तीन   आगे   ;  two is  the   सबसे   आम   .
Coaches  typically   फ़ील्ड   एक  striker who  plays  in an advanced position ( the centre  आगे  )  ,  and another attacking  आगे   जो  plays somewhat  deeper   और  assists  in  making goals  as  well as scoring  (   the  second  स्ट्राइकर   )  .
It should  be  noted that inside forwards develop from  attacking  midfield positions and  hence  are naturally midfielders .
Barcelona  fc  star Lionel  मेस्सी  is  a  typical Attacking Midfielder seen as  a   आगे  due to  उसके  shot  सटीकता   .
A California domestic partnership is a legal relationship available  to  same-sex couples  ,  and  to  certain opposite-sex couples  in   जिससे   at  least  एक  party  is   at  least  18   सालो   of   आयु  .
It affords  the   युगल   ``   the   वही  rights , protections  ,   और  benefits  ,   और  ...  the  same  जिम्मेदारियों  , obligations , and  कर्तव्य  under law ...  ''   as   शादीशुदा  spouses .
Enacted in 1999 , the  घरेलू  partnership registry  थी   the  first  of   इसके  kind in the  संयुक्त  States created  by  a  विधानमंडल  without court  हस्तक्षेप   .
Initially  ,  domestic  partnerships  enjoyed very few  privileges—principally  just  hospital-visitation  rights and the right to be claimed as a next  of   kin   of  the  एस्टेट  of  a  deceased partner .
the  legislature  रै  since  विस्तारित  the  पैमाना   of   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   घरेलू   partnerships  to  शामिल  all of the  अधिकारों  and responsibilities common to marriage .
As  ऐसे  ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  domestic  partnerships  are  functionally  equivalent to civil unions offered in several other  राज्य  .
Although the program enjoys broad support  in  California , it  रै   महरूम  the source of some controversy .
समूह   opposed   to   the   मान्यता  of same-sex families  have   challenged   the  expansion  of   घरेलू  partnerships in  अदालत  .
conversely  , advocates  of  same-sex  विवाह   contend  that anything  कम   than   पूरा   विवाह   अधिकारों  extended to  same-sex   साझेदार   is  analogous  to  the `` separate but equal ''  जातिगत  laws  of  the Jim Crow era .
Mark  A.  Jackson ( born April  1   ,   1965   )  is  an  American basketball coach , and former  खिलाड़ी   जो  is  the  current head coach  of  the Golden  राज्य   योद्धाओं  of the NBA .
a  point  गार्ड   इससे  St. John 's University  ,  he played for  the   नई  York  knicks   ,   इंडियाना   पेसर्स   ,  Los Angeles  क्लिपर्स  , Denver  टेंडर्स   ,   टोरंटो  Raptors , Utah  जैज़  and Houston  rockets  in the  एनबीए   in  a career spanning  इससे   1987  to 2004 .
जैक्सन  has also worked as a  कमेंटेटर  for ESPN and  एबीसी   alongside  his former  कोच  Jeff  वैन   gundy  and  play-by-play  man  माइक  Breen  .
he  was  previously  an  एनबीए   विश्लेषक  for The  यस   संजाल  's  नई   जर्सी   नेट  games .
South Africa has eleven  आधिकारिक  languages  :   अफ्रीकी  , English  ,  Ndebele  ,  Northern Sotho  ,  Sotho  ,  Swazi ,  tswana   ,  Tsonga , Venda , Xhosa and Zulu  .
कम  than two percent of South Africans speak a  पहला  language other than an  आधिकारिक   एक  .
सबसे   दक्षिण   africans   can  speak more than  एक   भाषा  .
Dutch  और  English were  the   पहला  official languages  of   दक्षिण  Africa  इससे  1910 to 1925  .
अफ्रीकी   थी   added   as  a part of Dutch  in   1925  .
डच   थी   replaced   by  Afrikaans when South Africa  became  a republic in  1961  ,  और   डच  was  dropped  in 1983 ,  so  between  1983  and  1994   ,   दक्षिण   अफ़्रीकी  had  दो   आधिकारिक  languages :  अंग्रेज़ी  and Afrikaans .
the   अंग्रेज़ी   संस्करण  of the South African constitution refers to  the  languages by the names in those languages  :  isiZulu ,  isixhosa   ,  Afrikaans  ,  Sepedi (  referring  to  उत्तरी   sotho  )  ,   setswana  , English ,  sesotho  ( referring  to   दक्षिणी   sotho   )   ,  Xitsonga  ,   siswati   ,  Tshivenda and isiNdebele  (  referring to  दक्षिणी  Ndebele  )  .
In South  अफ़्रीकी   ,   दक्षिणी  Ndebele is  ज्ञात   बस  as  ndebele  , as most  अध्यक्षों   of  Northern  ndebele  live in Zimbabwe  .
The 1993 version  of  the Constitution referred  to  Northern Sotho as  sesotho   sa  Leboa , but the  1996  version referred to the language  as  Sepedi  .
Different government departments  और   आधिकारिक   लाशें   उपयोग  different  शर्तें  to denote  उत्तरी  Sotho  .
the   प्रमुख  language of  सरकारी  is English even if  दक्षिण   africans  often  लो   अभिमान  in using  स्वदेशी  languages  लिये   कोई  purpose  .
अफ्रीकी  also features prominently in  कॉमर्स   साथ  with  अंग्रेज़ी  as the languages  साथ  the  उच्चतम  number  of  fluent speakers are Afrikaans and English  .
In  शर्तें  of linguistic classification  ,   the   आधिकारिक  languages include two West-Germanic languages ( English  और  Afrikaans  )   और   नौ  Bantu  भाषाएं   .
Four  of   ये   हैं  Nguni languages (  ज़ुलू  , Xhosa , Swati  और  Ndebele  )  and three are Sotho–Tswana  भाषाएं   (   उत्तरी  Sotho  ,   दक्षिणी  Sotho and  tswana  )  .
Tsonga is a Tswa–Ronga  भाषा   .
South African Sign Language is a distinct  हालांकि  incompletely emerged  नेशनल  standard language  जिससे  also subsumes a cluster of semi-standardised dialects .
Aluminium nitrate  is  a  नमक   of   एल्युमिनियम   और  nitric  एसिड   ,   मौजूदा  normally  as   a  crystalline hydrate ,  सबसे   commonly   as  aluminium  नाइट्रेट  nonahydrate ,  al  (  no3   )   3·9h2o  .
The  नई  York Jets  हैं   a   पेशेवर  football team headquartered  in   florham  Park ,  नई  Jersey  ,   representing  the New York  महानगर  area  .
The team  is   a  member of the Eastern Division  of  the  अमरीकी  Football Conference ( AFC  )  in the National Football League (  एनएफएल  ) .
In a unique arrangement for  the   लीग  ,  the  Jets share MetLife Stadium  in  East Rutherford , New Jersey  साथ   the  New York Giants .
the   मताधिकार   is   legally   और  corporately registered  as   नई   यॉर्क  Jets ,  llc  .
The team was founded  in  1959  as  the  टाइटन्स  of New York , an  असली  member  of   the   अमरीकी  Football  लीग   ;  later  ,  the franchise joined  the  NFL  in  the AFL–NFL  विलय   .
The  टोली  began to play  in  1960 at the Polo Grounds .
अंतर्गत  new ownership  ,  the current  नाम  was  अपनाया   in   1963   और  the franchise was relocated to Shea  स्टेडियम  in 1964 and  तब  to the  meadowlands   खेल  Complex  in  1984  .
the  Jets  उन्नत  to the playoffs for the first time  in   1968   और  went  on  to  compete   in  Super  कटोरी   iii  where  वे  defeated  the   बाल्टीमोर  Colts , becoming the first  afl  team to defeat an NFL club in  an  AFL-NFL World  चैंपियनशिप   खेल  .
Since 1968 ,  the   jets  have appeared  in   the   playoffs   तेरह   टाइम्स  , and in the  afc  Championship Game four times  ,   सबसे  recently losing  to  the  पिट्सबर्ग   स्टीलर्स   in  2010 .
however  ,  the   jets  have  never  returned to  the  Super  कटोरी   ,  making  उन्हें  one of three NFL  टीमों  to win  उनके  lone  सुपर   कटोरी  appearance  ,   साथ  with the  नई   ऑरलियन्स  Saints and Tampa Bay  buccaneers  .
the   टोली  's training facility ,  अटलांटिक   स्वास्थ्य  Jets Training Center ,  जिससे   खोली  in  2008   ,  is located in Florham Park .
The  टोली   फिलहाल   holds  their annual training  शिविर  sessions on  the  campus of the State University of New York at  cortland  in Cortland  ,  New York while  पकड़कर   occasional  sessions at the Florham Park complex .
Psilocybe semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms  ,  also  ज्ञात  as psychedelic  मशरूम   ,   हैं   fungi  that contain psychoactive  indole  alkaloids .
वहीँ  are multiple colloquial terms for psilocybin mushrooms  ,   the   सबसे  common being  shrooms  and  जादू   मशरूम  .
Biological  genera  containing psilocybin mushrooms include Agrocybe ,  conocybe  ,  copelandia  , Galerina ,  gerronema  , Gymnopilus , Hypholoma ,  inocybe   ,  Mycena , Panaeolus ,  pluteus   ,   और  Psilocybe .
There are approximately 190 species of psilocybin  मशरूम   और  most of  उन्हें   पतन  in  the  genus Psilocybe .
psilocybin  mushrooms  have  likely  महरूम   प्रयुक्त   चूंकि   प्रागैतिहासिक   टाइम्स  and may have been depicted  in  rock  आर्ट   .
Many cultures  have  used these  मशरूम  in  धार्मिक  rites .
In modern  पश्चिमी  society  वे   हैं  used  recreationally   लिये   उनके  psychedelic  प्रभाव  .
Recent  अध्ययन  done at Imperial  कॉलेज  London and  जॉन्स  Hopkins School  of  Medicine conclude  कि   जब  used  properly  , psilocybin  अधिनियमों  as an  anti-depressant   as  suggested by fMRI  दिमाग  scans  .
अलास्का   (   )   is  a  राज्य   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   ,   situated   in  the  उत्तरपश्चिम  extremity of the  उत्तर   अमरीकी  continent ,  साथ  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   boundary   साथ  Canada  to  the east , the  आर्कटिक   समंदर   to  the  उत्तर   ,  and  the  Pacific  समंदर   to  the  वेस्ट  and south  ,  with  रूस  further  वेस्ट  across  the  Bering  जलसन्धि  .
Alaska is  the  largest  राज्य  in  the  United  राज्य   by  area  ,  the 4th  तनिक   populous  and the  तनिक   densely  populated of the 50  संयुक्त  States .
Approximately half of  अलास्का  's 731,449  निवासियों  live within the Anchorage  महानगर  area  .
अलास्का  's  अर्थव्यवस्था   is   वर्चस्व  by  the  oil ,  प्राकृतिक  gas , and  फ़िशिंग   उद्योग  ;  it   रै  these resources in abundance .
अलास्का   थी  purchased from  रूस   on  March 30 , 1867  ,  for $ 7.2  लाख  (  $   समायोजित   लिये  inflation ) at approximately two  सेंट  per acre  (  $ 4.74/km2 ) .
the   जमीन   गई  through  अनेक   प्रशासनिक  changes before becoming an  व्यवस्थित   (  or  incorporated  ) territory  on  May  11   ,  1912 , and  the   49th   राज्य  of  the  U.S. on January 3  ,  1959  .
the   नाम  ``  अलास्का  '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian  औपनिवेशिक   काल   ,   जब   it  was  प्रयुक्त   तभी   लिये   the   प्रायद्वीप   और  is derived from the  aleut  alaxsxaq  ,  meaning `` the mainland '' or  ,   अधिक  literally  ,  ``  the   ऑब्जेक्ट  towards which the  कार्रवाई  of  the   समुद्र  is  निर्देशित   ''  .
It  is  also  ज्ञात  as Alyeska , the `` great land '' ,  an  Aleut word  निकला   इससे  the  वही  root  .
the  101  फ्रेंच   विभाग  are divided into  342   arrondissements   ,  which  may  be translated  into  English as districts .
The capital  of   an  arrondissement/district  is   पुकारा  a subprefecture  .
When an  arrondissement  contains the  प्रीफ़ेक्चर  (  पूंजी   )  of the department , that  प्रीफ़ेक्चर  is  the  capital of  the  arrondissement ,  एक्टिंग   दोनो   as  a prefecture  और  as a  subprefecture  .
arrondissements  are  further   विभाजित  into  cantons  and  communes   .
the   योनि   (  from  लैटिन   vāgīna  ,  वस्तुतः  `` sheath  ''  or `` scabbard `` ) is a  tubular   ट्रैक्ट   जिससे  is  a   sex  organ  और  has  दो   प्रमुख  functions ; sexual intercourse  और   प्रसव  .
in   इंसानो  ,  इस  passage leads from  the   खोलने  of  the   भग  to the  गर्भाशय   (  womb )  ,  but the  vaginal   ट्रैक्ट   ends   at   the  cervix  .
Unlike  मेन  , who  have  only  एक   genital  orifice , women have two , the urethra and  the  vagina .
the  vaginal  खोलने   is   much   larger  than  the   urethral   खोलने  ,  और  both  उद्घाटन  are protected  by   the  labia .
the  inner  सांचे  of the  योनि  has  a  foldy texture  जिससे  can create friction for the penis during  मैथुन  .
दौरान   arousal  , the  योनि  gets moist  to  facilitate  the  entrance  of  the  शिश्न  .
the   latinate  plural  ``  vaginae  ''   is  rarely  प्रयुक्त   in   अंग्रेज़ी  .
colloquially  , the  शब्द  vagina is  प्रायः   प्रयुक्त  to  refer  to the vulva or to the female  गुप्तांग   in  general  .
However , by  इसके   शब्दकोष  and anatomical definitions , vagina refers exclusively  to   the   विशिष्ट   आतंरिक  structure .
The Cincinnati Reds are a  प्रमुख  League  बेसबॉल   टोली   आधारित  in  सिनसिनाटी   ,   ओहियो  .
They  हैं  members  of  the National  लीग  Central Division  .
स्थापित   in  1881  as  an independent  क्लबों   ,   the  team  became  a  चार्टर  member of  the   अमरीकी  Association in  1882   ,  and  joined   the   नेशनल   लीग  in 1890 .
the  club traditionally traces  इसके  origin  to   बेसबॉल  's  पहला  openly professional team in 1869  .
The  लाल  have  जीती   पाँच  World Series  शीर्षक  , one American Association  pennant   ,   नौ  National  लीग   pennants  and ten  प्रभाग  titles .
The  लाल  played in the National  लीग  West between 1969 and 1993 and  have  been in the National League Central  चूंकि  1994  .
Since  2003   ,   the  Reds  have   निभाई   at  Great American  बॉल   पार्क  ,  निर्मित  next  to  their home from 1970 to  2002   ,  Riverfront  स्टेडियम  .
Bob  castellini   रै  owned the Cincinnati Reds  चूंकि  2006  .
a  prank  बदबू  bomb  .
A stink  बमबारी   is   a  device  designed  to create  an   अप्रिय   महकते   .
They  दायरा   in  effectiveness  इससे  simple  pranks  to  सैन्य  grade  malodorants  or riot control  रासायनिक  agents .
The Guinness Book of Records  सूचियाँ   दो  smelliest  substances   .
एक  is `` US Government Standard  बाथरूम  Malodor  ''  ;  a  mixture of  आठ   रसायन  with  a  stench  resembling   इंसान  feces  ,  only much  stronger   ,   designed   to  test the  efficacy   of   deodorizers   और   एयर   fresheners  .
Another  एक  ,  ``  Who me ?  ``  , is a  मिश्रण   of  five sulfur-containing  रसायन  and  खुश्बू  like  rotting   खाना  and carcasses .
the   कहावत  `` A picture  is   लायक  a thousand  शब्द   ''  refers to  the  notion  कि   a  complex  विचार   can  be  conveyed  with just a single  स्टिल  image .
It  भी   aptly  characterizes one of  the   प्रमुख  goals  of   कल्पना  , namely making it  संभावित  to absorb large amounts  of  data quickly .
The  अभिव्यक्ति   ``   उपयोग   a   चित्र  .
It 's worth  a  thousand words . '' appears  in  a 1911 newspaper article quoting newspaper  एडिटर   आर्थर   ब्रिसबेन  discussing journalism and  publicity   .
1913  समाचारपत्र   विज्ञापन
a  similar phrase , `` One Look Is Worth  a  Thousand Words '' , appears  in  a 1913 newspaper advertisement  लिये  the  piqua   स्वचालित  Supply House of Piqua ,  ओहियो  .
An  जल्दी  use of  the  exact  phrase   appears   in  an 1918  समाचारपत्र  advertisement  लिये   the  San  अंतोनियो  Light which  says   :  One of the Nation  's   महानतम  Editors Says : One Picture  is  Worth a  हजार   शब्द  The  सैन  Antonio Light 's Pictorial Magazine  of  the War Exemplifies the truth of  the  above statement --  judging  from the  गरम   रिसेप्शन   it  has  प्राप्त  at the hands of the Sunday Light readers  .
It is  believed  by some  कि  the  आधुनिक   उपयोग  of  the  phrase  तना   इससे   an   आलेख  by  फ्रेड  R. Barnard in the advertising  व्यापार  journal Printers '  स्याही  ,  promoting  the use of images  in   विज्ञापन  that appeared  on   the  sides of  streetcars  .
The December  8  , 1921 issue  carries  an ad  हकदार  ,  ``   एक  Look is Worth  a  Thousand Words .  ''
another  ad  by  Barnard appears in the March 10  ,  1927 issue  साथ  the  phrase  ``  एक  Picture  लायक  Ten Thousand  शब्द   ,  '' where  it   is  labeled a Chinese  कहावत  (  一圖勝萬言   )  .
The Home  किताब  of  proverbs  , Maxims  ,   और  Familiar Phrases quotes  बर्नार्ड  as saying he  पुकारा  it `` a Chinese proverb , so  कि  people would  लो   it  seriously . ''
जल्द  after  ,  the  कहावत  would become  popularly  attributed to  कन्फ्यूशियस  .
The  चर्चा  of `` One Picture  लायक  Thousand Words ''  बनाम   ``  One Picture  लायक   टेन   हजार  Words '' Wan yen  i  hua and 10.000  मील   लायक  10.000 books is cited in Information graphics where the concept of many  in   अलग   disciplines  and  संस्कृतियों  .
A picture is worth a  हजार  words
Despite this modern  उत्पत्ति  of the popular phrase ,  the   भावना  has been expressed by  पहले  writers .
For  उदाहरण   the  Russian  लेखक  Ivan Turgenev wrote  (  in Fathers and Sons  in  1862  )  , `` A  चित्र   shows  me at  a  glance  कया  it takes dozens  of   पृष्ठों  of a book  to  expound  .   ''
Computer programmer  और   लेखक  Fred Brooks makes an opposite statement regarding programming in The Mythical Man-Month :  ``  Show me your  flowcharts   और   छिपाते  your  टेबल   ,  and I shall  continue  to be mystified .
दिखाएँ  me  अपना   टेबल   ,   और  I won’t  प्रायः  need your flowcharts  ;  they’ll  be   स्पष्ट   .  ''
The phrase has also been spoofed by  जॉन  McCarthy  ,  the  प्रसिद्ध   कंप्यूटर  scientist  ,  to  मेक   the  opposite point :  ``  As the Chinese say  ,   1001   शब्द   is  worth more than a  चित्र  .  ''
a   ऋतु  is  a  subdivision  of   the  year , marked by  परिवर्तन  in weather , ecology , and hours  of  daylight  .
Seasons  परिणाम  from the yearly  क्रान्ति  of the Earth  around  the Sun  और   the   झुकाव  of the Earth 's axis  सापेक्ष   to   the  plane  of   क्रान्ति   .
in  temperate and  ध्रुवीय  regions  ,   the  seasons are marked  by   परिवर्तन  in  the   तीव्रता   of  sunlight that  पहुँच   the  Earth  's  surface  ,  variations of which  may  cause  पशु   to   go   into  hibernation or to  migrate  ,  और  plants  to   be   dormant  .
During May , June and July  ,  the  उत्तरी   गोलार्ध  is  उजागर  to more direct sunlight because  the  hemisphere faces  the   सूर्य  .
The same  is   सच्चा   of  the southern hemisphere in November ,  दिसम्बर  and  जनवरी   .
it   is   the  tilt of the Earth  कि  causes the Sun to  be  higher in the  आसमान  during the summer months which increases the solar  फ्लक्स  .
however  , due to  मौसमी  lag  ,  June ,  जुलाई   और  August are  the   hottest   महीने  in  the   उत्तरी  hemisphere and  दिसम्बर  , January and February  हैं   the  hottest months  in  the southern  गोलार्ध  .
In  शीतोष्ण   और  subpolar regions , generally four calendar  -आधारd   सीज़न  ( with their adjectives )  हैं  recognized : spring  (  vernal ) , summer (  estival   )  ,  पतझड़   (  autumnal )  और  winter  (  hibernal ) .
However ,  ecologists   ज़्यादातर   उपयोग  a six  ऋतु  model  लिये  temperate climate regions  कि   शामिल   pre-spring  ( prevernal ) and  लेट   गर्मियाँ  (  serotinal  )  as   पृथक  seasons along with  the   परंपरागत  four .
Hot regions have  दो  or  तीन   सीज़न  ; the rainy (  or  wet , or monsoon  )   ऋतु  and  the  dry season , and  in  some tropical areas  ,  a  कूल   or   mild   ऋतु  .
in   कुछ  parts of  the  world , special `` seasons  ''  are  loosely   पारिभाषित  based on important  कार्यक्रम  such as  a   hurricane   ऋतु  , tornado season  or  a wildfire season .
The  छह  ecological seasons
The four calendar seasons , depicted  in   an   प्राचीन  Roman mosaic  इससे  Tunisia
Dutch  निर्यात  in 2006
at  the  समय   of   लिखने   the   नीदरलैंड्स  is the 17th  largest  economy  of  the  संसार  .
( see : List  of  countries by GDP ( nominal )  )
जीडीपी  per capita is roughly  $  42,000  जिससे  puts  it   in   the  top 10  of  richest  राष्ट्र   in  the world  (  see : List  of  countries by GDP ( PPP ) per  capita  ) .
between  1996  और  2000  सालाना   आर्थिक   विकास  (  जीडीपी  )  averaged  over  4   %   ,  well above the European average .
Growth slowed considerably in 2001-05  as   भाग   of  the  वैश्विक   आर्थिक  slowdown  .
2006  और  2007  however  showed economic growth  of  3.4 % and 3.9 %  .
The  डच  economy was  hit  considerably  by  the ongoing global  वित्तीय  crisis and  the   ensuing  European debt crisis  .
अनेक  banks  गई   दिवालिया  , and a number of  अन्य  had  to   प्राप्त   सरकारी   सहायता  .
in  2009 the economy  अस्वीकृत   साथ  3.5  %   ,  followed by two years of  mild  growth .
the   डच  economy is  फिलहाल  in a recession  again  , with  an  economic decline of 0.5 % in  2012   .
Inflation is  at  3.2  %  in  फ़रवरी  2013  .
बेरोजगारी   रै   महरूम  relatively  कम  compared to  अन्य   eu   राष्ट्र  for decades but after mid-2012 it  रै  seen a fast increase  और   in  February 2013  it   रै   hit   7.7   %   .
The Netherlands managed to maintain  इसके   aaa   दरजा   at  least  जबतक  March  2013   according  to  the  three  प्रमुख   क्रेडिट  rating  एजेंसियों   .
Historically , the  डच   introduced   और  invented the stock market  by  the merchandise  व्यापार   through   डच   वेस्ट  India Company  .
The Netherlands is a founding member  of   the   यूरोपीय  Union  ,  the OECD  और  the  संसार   व्यापार  Organization .
वफ़ादार  to the Game  is   the  tenth studio  एल्बम  and sixth  स्टुडियो  album  by  Tupac  shakur  .
it   contains  remixes of previously  unreleased  music  अंकित  by Shakur  पहले  his death in 1996  .
Released in the United States  on   दिसम्बर  14 ,  2004   (  December 12  in  the United  किंगडम   )  , Loyal  to  the  खेल  was produced by Eminem  .
The original  फलक   of   the  View  ;  Meredith  vieira  , Star Jones , Debbie Matenopoulos  और  Barbara  walters  in  1997  .
the  View is an  अमरीकी  talk show broadcast on  एबीसी   कि   debuted  in  1997  as part  of   the   संजाल   's  daytime programming block .
Created by Barbara Walters and  विधेयक   geddie  ,  जो  both  भी   serve   as  the show 's executive producers ,  the   कार्यक्रम  features  a  panel of women as co-hosts .
Along  साथ   walters  ,  the   वर्तमान  panel includes  whoopi  Goldberg , who serves  as   the   मॉडरेटर  ,  आनन्द  Behar , Elisabeth Hasselbeck , and Sherri Shepherd .
International versions of  the  program  हैं  aired  in  several countries .
as  of the  2012–13  season  ,  its  16th  , The View  is   the  fourth-longest  कार्यशील   नेशनल   दिन  talk show  in   इतिहास   ,  behind  the   फिल   donahue   दिखाएँ  (  29   )  , the  variously-named  Live  !
कार्यक्रम  (  25  )  ,  and The Oprah  विनफ्रे  Show  (  25 )  .
Prunus virginiana , commonly called  bitter-berry  , chokecherry ,  वर्जिनिया  bird cherry and western  chokecherry  (  भी  black chokecherry for  P.  virginiana  var   .  demissa  )  , is  a   प्रजाति   of  bird cherry  (  Prunus subgenus Padus )  देशी  to  उत्तर   अमेरिका  ;  the   प्राकृतिक   ऐतिहासिक  range  of  P.  virginiana  includes  सबसे  of  the  continent ,  मगर  for  the   दूर   उत्तर  and far south .
लॉस   एंजिल्स  International Airport  is   the  primary airport serving the Greater  लॉस   एंजिल्स   क्षेत्रफल  , the  second-most   आबादी  metropolitan area in the United States .
it   is  most often referred to by its IATA airport  कोड   lax  , with the  अक्षर   सुनाया   individually   .
LAX  is  located  in   southwestern  Los Angeles  साथ  the Pacific coast in the neighborhood  of   westchester   ,  from the  शहर  core and  is  the  प्राथमिक  airport  of   लॉस   एंजिल्स  World Airports (  lawa  ) ,  an   एजेंसी  of the  लॉस  Angeles  नगर   सरकारी  formerly  ज्ञात  as the  विभाग   of  Airports .
In 2011  ,  LAX  थी   the   छठे   व्यस्ततम  airport  in   the  world  बाद   hartsfield-jackson   अटलांटा  International Airport  ,  Beijing  पूंजी   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   विमानक्षेत्र  , London Heathrow  विमानक्षेत्र   ,   शिकागो  O'Hare  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport , and  टोकियो   haneda   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   विमानक्षेत्र  with 61,862,052 passengers  .
the  airport holds the  अर्जी  for  ``  the  संसार   's   व्यस्ततम  origin and destination  (  O  &  D ) airport  ''  in 2011  कि   involves  non-connecting passenger  ट्रैफ़िक  .
It  is  also the only airport to rank among  the   शीर्ष  five  u.S.   एयरपोर्ट  for both passenger and cargo traffic  .
lax  is  the   व्यस्ततम   विमानक्षेत्र  in the  वृहद  Los Angeles Area , but other airports  सहित  Bob Hope  विमानक्षेत्र  , John  वेन   विमानक्षेत्र  , Long Beach  विमानक्षेत्र  ,  la/ontario   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   विमानक्षेत्र   ,  and  ताड़   स्रोतों   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport also serve the region  .
LAX is also  the  busiest airport in California and the  वेस्ट   coast  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  in terms of  उड़ान  operations ,  यात्री  traffic and air cargo activity , leading  it  to  be   referred  to as  the   ``  Gateway  to  the  प्रशांत  Rim  ``   .
peyton  Williams  मैनिंग  (  born   कूच   24  , 1976  )  is  an  American football quarterback for the Denver Broncos of the National  फ़ुटबॉल  League  (   एनएफएल  )  .
He played for the Indianapolis Colts  लिये  14  सीज़न  from  1998   to  2011 .
he  is the son of former NFL  क्वार्टरबैक  Archie Manning and an elder  bhai   of  New York Giants quarterback  एली   मैनिंग  .
Manning played  कॉलेज  football  लिये  the University of Tennessee , leading the  स्वयंसेवक  to the 1997 SEC  चैंपियनशिप  in  उसके  senior season .
however  , No . 3  टेनेसी  lost  to  the No  .   2   नेब्रास्का  Cornhuskers  42-17  in the  नारंगी   कटोरी  giving  नेब्रास्का  and Tom  ओसबोर्न   उनके  3rd  नेशनल  championship  in   4  years .
He was chosen by  the   इंडियानापोलिस  Colts with  the  first overall pick  in  the 1998  एनएफएल   ड्राफ्ट   .
इससे  1998  to  2010  ,   he  led  the  Colts  to   आठ   (   सात  AFC South  और  one  afc  East ) division  championships   ,  two AFC championships , and to  a   सुपर   कटोरी   चैंपियनशिप  ( Super Bowl  xli   )  .
he  has won a record four league most  मूल्यवान   खिलाड़ी  awards  ,  was the most  मूल्यवान   खिलाड़ी   of   सुपर  Bowl XLI ,  रै  been  नामित   to  twelve Pro  प्याले   ,  has twelve 4,000-yard passing seasons ,  और  is the  इंडियानापोलिस  Colts ' all-time leader in passing yards  (   54,828  )  और  touchdown  गुजरता  ( 399  )  .
in  2009 , he was named the best player in the  एनएफएल  and  फॉक्स  Sports along with  खेल  Illustrated named him the NFL  खिलाड़ी   of  the decade of  the   2000s  .
in  May 2011  ,   he  underwent neck surgery  to  alleviate  गर्दन  pain and  भुजा   कमज़ोरी   he   dealt  with during  the   पिछला   few  seasons  पहले  signing  a   five-year  , $ 90 million contract extension with the  कोल्टस  in July 2011 .
मैनिंग   था  hoped to play in the 2011 season ,  लकिन  in September  2011   ,   he   underwent  a much  अधिक  serious second surgery : a  स्तर   एक   सर्वाइकल  fusion procedure .
Manning had never missed  an  NFL  खेल  in his career , but was forced to miss the entire  2011   ऋतु  .
He  थी  released by  the  Colts  on  March 7 ,  2012   ,  and  बाद   an  almost  two-week  period  जहाँ  he visited  साथ   और  worked  आउट   लिये   अनेक  NFL teams , he signed  साथ   the  Denver Broncos on March  20   ,  2012 .
मैनिंग  's pre-snap  दिनचर्या  has  अर्जित  him  the  nickname , `` The Sheriff  ''  and  is  one of  the  most recognizable and  parodied  in the  एनएफएल  .
the  Indianapolis  कोल्टस  '  लगभग  exclusive use of the hurry-up offense led  to   मैनिंग  using  an   सरणी  of  इशारों  and  मौखिक  commands  to  call the play  at  the  लकीर   of  scrimmage rather  than  in the huddle  .
the  America  मीनार  of the  अमरीकी   सामान्य  Center ,  the   मुख्यालय  of Baker Hughes
Baker Hughes  is   एक   of  the world  's  largest  oilfield  services companies  .
it  operates in  over  90 countries  ,   providing  the  आयल   और  gas industry  साथ   उत्पाद   और  services for drilling ,  गठन   मूल्यांकन  ,  पूर्णता   ,  production and reservoir  परामर्श  .
Baker Hughes has  इसके   मुख्यालय  in the America Tower in the American  सामान्य   बीच   in  Neartown  ,  Houston  .
Baker  ह्यूजेस   incorporated  was formed when  बेकर  International  और   ह्यूजेस  Tool Company merged  in   1987  .
Baker Hughes operates  विश्वव्यापी   साथ  major  कार्यालयों  in Liverpool , United Kingdom ;  सिंगापुर   ;   दुबई  ;  a  research  और  maintenance facility  in   celle  , Germany ;  lafayette   ,   louisiana  ;  ह्यूस्टन   ,  Texas ;  pescara  , Italy ; and Kuala  lumpur  ,  मलेशिया  .
The  कम्पनी   is  administered  broadly  in two  बांटती  :  the  eastern hemisphere  साथ   पाँच   regions  (  यूरोपीय  , Africa ,  the   मध्य  East ,  एशिया  Pacific  और  Russia/Caspian )  और  the western hemisphere with four  regions  (  कनाडा  , US Land , US Gulf  ,  and  लैटिन  America ) .
Each of these regions  is  subdivided  into  markets .
The  संयुक्त  States one- cent coin  ,   commonly  known  as   a   पैनी  ,  is  a  ईकाई  of currency equaling one one-hundredth  of  a United States  डालर   .
The cent 's  प्रतीक   is  ¢ .
Its obverse  रै  featured  the   प्रोफ़ाइल   of   अध्यक्ष   अब्राहम  Lincoln  चूंकि   1909   ,  the  centennial   of   उसके   जनम  .
इससे  1959  (   the   sesquicentennial  of  lincoln  's  जनम  ) to 2008  ,  the  रिवर्स   प्रदर्शित   the   lincoln   मेमोरियल  .
Four  अलग  reverse designs  in   2009  honored Lincoln  's  200th  जन्मदिवस  and  a  new ,  स्थाई   रिवर्स  –  the   संघ   शील्ड   –  was introduced  in  2010 .
the  coin is 0.75 inches  (  19.05  mm  )  in   व्यास  and  0.061   इंच  (  1.55  mm  )  in thickness  .
The U.S. Mint 's  आधिकारिक   नाम  for  a  penny is ``  ''   और  the  u.S.   राजकोष  's official name  is  `` one cent piece  ''  .
The colloquial term penny derives from the British coin  of  the same name ,  the  pre-decimal version  of  which  था   a  similar  मान  .
In American  अंग्रेज़ी   ,  pennies is the  बहुवचन  form , other plural forms  पेंस  and  पेशाब   (  standard use in British  अंग्रेज़ी   )  are not  प्रयुक्त  .
as  of  2012   ,   it   लागत  the U.S. Mint 2.00  सेंट  to  मेक   a  cent  क्युकी   of  the cost of materials  और  production  .
इस   फिगर  includes  the   mint’s  fixed components for  वितरण  and fabrication  ,  estimated at $ 13  लाख  in  fy   2011   .
It also includes Mint overhead allocated  to  the penny  ,  which  थी  $ 17.7 million for  2011  .
Fixed costs  और   ओवरहेड   होता   have   to  be  अवशोषित   by   अन्य   circulating  coins without the  पैनी  .
the  loss in  profitability   due  to  producing  the one  cent  coin  in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   लिये  the year  of  2012  थी  $ 58,000,000 .
This was a  पतला   घटी   इससे  2011  ,  the year before  ,  which had a production loss  of  $  60,200,000  .
or   अधिक  specifically ,  हैं  ornamental varieties  of  domesticated  आम   कार्प  (  cyprinus  carpio ) that  हैं  kept  लिये  decorative purposes  in  outdoor  कोई  ponds  or  water gardens .
Koi varieties  हैं   विशिष्ट  by coloration , patterning , and scalation  .
कुछ  of the major colors  हैं  white  ,  black ,  रेड  , yellow , blue ,  और  cream .
The  सबसे   लोकप्रिय  category  of  koi is the Gosanke , which is  बना   up  of  the   kohaku   ,  Taisho  sanshoku   ,   और  Showa  sanshoku  varieties .
the   अमरीकी   संघ   of  Government  कर्मचारी  (  afge  ) is an American labor union representing over  650,000  employees of  the   संघीय  government  ,   परिचय  5,000  कर्मचारी   of   the  District of Columbia  ,   और  a  few  hundred private sector employees  ,   ज़्यादातर  in and around  संघीय   सुविधाएं  .
AFGE  is   the   largest   संघ   लिये  civilian ,  non-   डाक  federal  कर्मचारी   और  the largest union  लिये  District  of  Columbia  कर्मचारी   जो  report directly  to  the mayor  (   i.e.   ,   बाहर  of D.C.  पब्लिक   स्कूलों   )  .
it  is affiliated  साथ  the  afl-cio  .

Green : A spore tetrad  .
Blue  :   a   spore  bearing  a  trilete  चिह्नित  – the -shaped  scar  .

The evolution  of  plants has resulted  in   increasing  levels of complexity ,  इससे   the  earliest  algal  mats  ,  through  bryophytes  , lycopods ,  ferns  to  the  complex gymnosperms  और  angiosperms of  आज  .
जबकि  many  of   the  groups which appeared  पहले   continue  to thrive , especially  in  the environments in  जिससे   वे   विकसित   ,   लिये  a time each  नई   ग्रेड  of  संगठन  became more `` successful  ''   than  its predecessors .
In  the   ordovician   काल   ,   around  , the  पहला  land plants  appeared   .
ये  began to diversify in the  लेट  Silurian Period ,  around  , and  the   परिणाम   of  their diversification are  प्रदर्शित  in remarkable  विवरण   in  an early Devonian fossil assemblage  इससे  the Rhynie chert .
This chert preserved early  पौधे  in cellular  विवरण  ,  petrified   in  volcanic springs .
By  the   मध्य  of  the  Devonian Period , most  of  the features recognised  in  plants today  हैं  present , including roots  ,  leaves  और   द्वितीयक  wood  ;  and , by late  devonian  times  ,  seeds  था   विकसित   .
Late  devonian  plants had thereby reached  a   उपाधि  of sophistication that allowed them to  रूप  forests  of   लम्बा  trees .
Evolutionary  नवीनता  continued into  the  Carboniferous  काल  and is  स्टिल  ongoing today .
Most plant  समूह   यहूद   अपेक्षाकृत  unscathed by the  permo-triassic   extinction  event  ,   हालांकि  the structures  of   समुदायों   बदला  .
This may have set the  झाँकी  for  the  appearance  of   the  flowering plants  in  the Triassic (  ~   )   ,   और  their  बाद  diversification in the Cretaceous  और   paleogene  .
The latest  प्रमुख  group of  पौधे   to  evolve were the grasses ,  जिससे   became  important in  the  mid-Paleogene  ,   इससे  around  .
the  grasses , as  खूब  as  अनेक  other groups  ,   विकसित   नई   mechanisms  of  चयापचय  to survive  the  low and warm , dry conditions  of  the tropics  over   the  last .
The winning Super Bowl  टोली   receives   the  Vince  लोम्बार्डी  Trophy  .
The Super Bowl  is  an annual American  फ़ुटबॉल  game that  determines  the champion of the National  फ़ुटबॉल   लीग  ( NFL )  .
the  contest  is   आयोजित  in an American  नगर  that is  चुनी  three to four years beforehand , usually in warm-weather or  domed  sites  .
चूंकि   1971   ,   the  winner of the American Football Conference (  afc  ) Championship Game  रै   faced   the  winner of the National  फ़ुटबॉल   सम्मेलन   (   nfc   )  Championship  खेल  in the culmination of the NFL  playoffs  .
Before the 1970  विलय   between   the  American Football  लीग  ( AFL  )   और  the National Football League (  एनएफएल  ) , the  दो   लीग  met  in  four such contests .
the   पहला  two were known as  the  `` AFL-NFL World Championship Game . ''
सुपर  Bowl III in 1969 was the first such  खेल  that  carried  the ``  सुपर  Bowl '' moniker ,  the   names  `` Super  कटोरी  I  ``  and ``  सुपर   कटोरी   ii  ``  यहूद  retroactively applied to  the   पहला  two  खेल  .
the   nfc  /NFL leads  in   सुपर   कटोरी  wins  साथ  25 ,  जबकि   the  AFC /AFL  रै  won 22  .
Eighteen different  franchises  ,  सहित  teams that relocated to another  नगर   ,  have won the  सुपर   कटोरी  .
The  पिट्सबर्ग   स्टीलर्स  have  जीती   the  most  सुपर  Bowls  साथ   छह  championships  (   रिकार्ड   6–2  )  ,   जबकि  both  the  Dallas Cowboys and San Francisco  49ers  have five  विन्स  each ( Cowboys  5–3   ;  49ers 5–1 )  .
डलास  and Pittsburgh  have  the most Super Bowl appearances with  आठ  , while  the  Buffalo  बिल्स   have   the  most consecutive  दिखावे   साथ  four  नुकसान  in a row from 1990 to 1993 .
The New  इंग्लैण्ड  Patriots  ,  Denver  broncos   और   मिनेसोटा  Vikings  have  also  खोया   a   रिकार्ड   चार   सुपर  Bowls .
Buffalo  और  Minnesota are both 0–4 ,  डेनवर   is  2–4 and  नई   इंग्लैण्ड  is  3–4   .
the   रिकार्ड  for consecutive  विन्स  is  दो   और   is   साझा  by seven franchises :  the   1966-67   ग्रीन  Bay  पैकर्स   ,  the 1972-73  मियामी  Dolphins  ,   the  1974-75 and 1978-79 Pittsburgh Steelers ( the only  टोली   to  accomplish  इस  feat  twice  )  ,   the   1988-89  San  फ्रांसिस्को  49ers , the 1992-93  डलास  Cowboys  ,   the   1997-98  Denver  broncos  ,  और  the  2003-04  New England Patriots .
the  only team with multiple Super  कटोरी  appearances  और  no losses is the  बाल्टीमोर   ravens   ,   जो   in  winning Super Bowl  xlvii  unseated and replaced  the  49ers in that position .
चार  current NFL teams have  never  appeared in a Super Bowl , including  मताधिकार   relocations  and  renaming  : the Cleveland Browns ,  डेट्रॉयट   शेर   ,  Jacksonville Jaguars  ,   और   ह्यूस्टन  Texans , though  दोनो  the  भूरा  and Lions  था  won NFL  चैंपियनशिप   खेल  prior  to  the creation of the  सुपर  Bowl .
Martin  काउंटी  is  a   काउंटी   स्तिथ  in  the  U.S. state of  टेक्सास  .
as  of the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी   ,   इसके   जनसांख्यिकी  was 4,799  .
Its  सीट  is Stanton  .
The  काउंटी  is  नामित  for  wylie   मार्टिन  ,  an   जल्दी  settler  .
Martin County is  एक   of   30   निषेध   ,  or  entirely  dry , counties in the state of Texas  .
क्षारीय   phosphatase  ( ALP  ,  ALKP  )  (  )  is a hydrolase  एंजाइम  responsible for  निकालना   फास्फेट  groups from  अनेक  types of  अणुओं   ,  including  nucleotides  , proteins , and alkaloids  .
the  process of  निकालना   the  phosphate  समूह   is   पुकारा  dephosphorylation  .
As  the   नाम   suggests   ,   क्षारीय  phosphatases are most  प्रभावी  in an alkaline  पर्यावरण  .
It is sometimes used  synonymously   as  basic phosphatase  .
triticale  ( ×  triticosecale   )  ,  (  )  is  a hybrid  of   गेहूं   (  Triticum  )  and rye ( Secale  )   पहला   करवाया  in  laboratories  during  the  late 19th  सदी   .
the   अनाज  was originally bred in  स्कॉटलैंड  and Sweden  .
commercially   उपलब्धियाँ  triticale  is   लगभग  always  a  second  पीढी   संकर  , i.e.  ,  a  क्रॉस   between  two  kinds  of primary  (  first cross ) triticales  .
as  a rule  ,   triticale   combines  the yield  संभावित  and grain  विशेषता   of   गेहूं   साथ   the  disease  और  environmental tolerance  (  including  मृदा   शर्तें  ) of rye  .
Only recently has it been  विकसित  into  a  commercially viable  क्रॉप  .
Depending on the cultivar , triticale can more  or   कम   resemble   either  of its parents  .
it  is grown mostly for forage or  चारा   ,  although some  triticale-based   भोजन  can be purchased  at   स्वास्थ्य   खाना   स्टोर्स  or are to  be  found in some  नाश्ता   cereals   .
When crossing  गेहूं   और   rye  ,  गेहूं   is  used  as  the female  जनक  and  rye  as  the  male parent ( pollen  दाता  )  .
the  resulting hybrid is sterile ,  और  must be  treated   साथ   colchicine  to induce polyploidy and thus  the   क्षमता   to  reproduce itself .
The  प्राथमिक  producers  of  triticale  हैं  Poland  ,   जर्मनी  , France , Belarus  और   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
In  2009  ,  according   to  the  खाना  and Agriculture Organization (  fao  )  ,  15.0 million tons were harvested in  29   देशों  across the world .
The triticale hybrids are  सब  amphidiploid , which  अर्थात्  the plant  is  diploid for  दो  genomes derived  इससे   अलग  species .
In other  शब्द   ,   triticale   is  an  allotetraploid  .
in  earlier years  ,   सबसे  work  थी   किया  on octoploid triticale .
Different  ploidy   स्तर  have  महरूम  created and evaluated over time .
The tetraploids showed little  वादा  , but hexaploid triticale  थी  successful enough to  ढूँढें  commercial  अनुप्रयोग  .
the   cimmyt  triticale  सुधार  program wanted to  improve  food production  और   पोषण   in   विकासशील   देशों  .
Triticale has  संभावित  in  the   उत्पादन   of  bread and other food products , such  as  cookies  ,   पास्ता  , pizza  आटा  and breakfast cereals  .
the   प्रोटीन   सामग्री  is  उच्चतर   than   कि   of   गेहूं  , although the glutenin  भिन्न   is   कम   .
the  grain  रै  also been  stated  to have higher levels of lysine than wheat .
Assuming increased  स्वीकृति  , the  मिलिंग   उद्योग  will have to adapt to triticale , as  the  milling techniques  employed  for wheat are  मुलम्मा  to triticale  .
Sell et al  .  found  triticale   could  be used as a feed grain ,  और  later research found its starch was  विशेषकर   readily   पचता  .
as   a   फीड  grain  ,   triticale  is already  खूब  established and of high economic  महत्व  .
It  रै  received  ध्यान  as a  संभावित  energy  क्रॉप  ,  और   शोध   is  currently being  conducted   on  the  उपयोग  of the  क्रॉप  's biomass in  bioethanol   उत्पादन  .
``  Puff  ,  the Magic  ड्रैगन  '' is a song  लिखा  by Leonard  lipton  and Peter Yarrow , and made popular  by   yarrow   's  group Peter  ,  Paul and Mary in  a  1963  रिकॉर्डिंग  .
The song  हासिल  great  लोकप्रियता  .
a  college  फ़ुटबॉल  national  चैंपियनशिप  in  the  highest level of  कॉलेजिएट  play in the United  राज्य  ,  फिलहाल  the  नेशनल   कॉलेजिएट   एथलेटिक  Association ( NCAA )  प्रभाग   i   फ़ुटबॉल  Bowl Subdivision  (  FBS  )  , is a  नामांकन  awarded annually by  विभिन्न  third-party  संगठन  to their selection (  s   )   of   the  best college football  टोली   (  s  )  .
Division  i  FBS  (  formerly  प्रभाग   i-a  ) football  is  the only  ncaa  sport  in   जिससे   a   वार्षिक  champion  is  not  संकल्पित   by  an NCAA  मंजूर   चैंपियनशिप  event  .
Because  the  championship team is not  संकल्पित   by   a  NCAA  चैंपियनशिप  or  टूर्नामेंट  event ,  it  is sometimes  unofficially  referred  to  as a `` mythical national championship `` .
Since the  ncaa  , the sport  's   शासी  body , does  नहीं   determine  or declare  a  national  चैंपियन  in this  फ़ील्ड   ,   determination  of such has often engendered controversy .
a   चैंपियनशिप   टोली  is independently declared  by   विभिन्न  individuals and  संगठन   ,  often referred to as ``  चयनकर्ताओं  '' .
These  चुनाव  are sometimes at odds with each other  .
While the NCAA has never officially  endorsed  an annual championship team  ,  it has documented  the  choices of several  चयनकर्ताओं  in the  आधिकारिक  NCAA  फ़ुटबॉल   कटोरी  Subdivision Records  .
In addition , various third party analysts have independently published  उनके  own  सूचियाँ   of  what  वे   have  determined to  be  the most legitimate selections for  प्रत्येक   ऋतु   .
ये  are also often at odds with  प्रत्येक   अन्य   as   खूब   as  individual  स्कूल  's  दावा  on  नेशनल   championships   ,  which ,  लिये  any particular season , may  or  may  नहीं   correlate  to the selections published elsewhere .
Currently ,  दो   widely   पहचाना  national  champions  selectors  हैं   the   संबद्ध  Press , which conducts a poll  of  football sportswriters ,  और  the  यूएसए   आज  Coaches '  पोल   ,  a poll of American  फ़ुटबॉल  Coaches Association active coaches  कि  is contractually obligated to  नाम  the  विजेता  of  the  Bowl  चैंपियनशिप  Series championship  खेल   as  its national  चैंपियन   .
The Milwaukee  ब्रेवर्स  are a professional baseball  टोली   आधारित   in   मिल्वौकी   ,   विस्कॉन्सिन   .
The team  is  a member of the  सेंट्रल   प्रभाग   of   प्रमुख  League Baseball 's  नेशनल   लीग   और   plays   इसके  home games  at  Miller Park  .
The team  is  so  नामित  because  of  the city 's  संघ  with the brewing industry .
The Washington Nationals are  a  professional baseball team based in Washington ,  d.c  .
the   नागरिकों  are  a  member  of   the  East  प्रभाग   of  the National League of  प्रमुख  League Baseball  (  MLB  )   .
The team 's home ballpark is  नागरिकों  Park  ,  located  on   दक्षिण  Capitol Street in Southeast  d.C.   ,  near the Anacostia  नदी  .
The park  खोली   in   2008   ,   replacing  RFK Stadium ,  the  team  's   घर   इससे  2005  to   2007   .
The  नागरिकों   '   नाम  derives from the former Washington baseball  टोली  that had the same name ( used interchangeably with Senators  )  .
Their  उपनाम  is `` the  nats  '' —a shortened version  कि  was also  प्रयुक्त  by the old D.C.  टीमों  .
An  विस्तार  franchise  ,  the club was  संस्थापित   in  as the  मॉन्ट्रियल  Expos  ,   the   पहला  major league  टोली  in  कनाडा   .
They  यहूद  based in Montreal , Quebec ,  और  played their home games  at   jarry  Park Stadium and later  in  Olympic Stadium  .
in   ,  the  expos  won a division  चैंपियनशिप  , won their first-ever playoff series by  defeating  the  फिलाडेल्फिया   फ़िलीज़  , 3–2  ,   और   उन्नत  to the  नेशनल  League  चैंपियनशिप  Series  ,  where  वे  would  go  on to lose to the Los Angeles Dodgers  ,   3–2  , in  उनके  only postseason appearance during the  strike-shortened  season .
The Expos had their  उच्चतम   जीतना  percentage in  the  strike-shortened season of  ,   जब   the  team had  the  best  रिकार्ड  in  बेसबॉल   .
the  team  's  subsequent shedding of players  caused  fan interest to  बूँद  off  .
After the 2001 season  ,   एमएलबी  considered  revoking   the  team 's franchise  ,  along with either the  मिनेसोटा   जुड़वा  or  the   tampa  Bay Devil Rays  .
बाद   होने   खरीदा  by MLB  in  2002  ,   the  team  थी  moved  पहले  the season to  वॉशिंगटन  and  renamed   the  Nationals ,  the  first relocation since the  दूसरी   वॉशिंगटन   सीनेटरों   स्थानांतरित   to  Arlington  ,  Texas ,  और   became   the  Texas  रेंजरों  in  .
The  नागरिकों  are one  of  two MLB  franchises  , and  the  only one  in   the  National League  ,   कि   रै  never  निभाई  in a World Series ( the  सिएटल  Mariners are the  अन्य   )  .
A contingent fee  (   in   the  United States ) or conditional fee (  in   इंग्लैण्ड  and  वेल्स   )  is  कोई   शुल्क   लिये   सेवाएं  provided  जहाँ   the   शुल्क   is  payable only  if  there is a favourable result .
in  the law  ,   it   is   पारिभाषित   as   a   ``  fee  चार्ज  for a  वकील  's  सेवाएं   तभी   if  the  मुकदमा   is  successful or  is  favorably  settled  out  of   अदालत  ... .
Contingent  शुल्क  are usually  गणना   as  a percentage of  the   क्लाएंट  's net  रिकवरी  .  ''
in   the   अंग्रेज़ी  legal  प्रणाली  ,  it  is  generally   referred   to  as no win no  शुल्क   .
A  सशर्त  fee  अनुबंध   between  a law firm and  a   क्लाएंट  .
the  usual form of  इस   अनुबंध   is   कि  the  solicitor  will take  a   विधि  case on  the   समझना  that if lost  ,   no   भुगतान   is  made .
However ,  if   the  case is won , the lawyer  होगा   be   हकदार   to  the normal fee  आधारित   on  hourly billing  ,  plus  a  success fee  .
The success fee in  इंग्लैण्ड  must  be   as  a percentage  no  greater  than   100  %  of   the   सामान्य  fee .
इस   contrasts  with the contingency fee in the US ,  जिससे   देता  the  कामयाब   attorney  a percentage of  the  damages awarded in  एहसान   of  his client  .
इस  makes it easier  लिये   the   ग़रीब  to  pursue   उनके  civil rights since otherwise ,  to   मुकदमा   किसी  for a tort ,  एक   जरूर  first be wealthy enough  to  pursue such litigation  in   the   पहला  place .
However ,  क्युकी  of the high  रिस्क   ,  few  attorneys  will take cases on a contingency basis  जबतक  they feel the  मामला   रै   शुभ  merit  .
According  to   a  2004 book  by   विधि   प्राध्यापक  Herbert Kritzer , contingent fees were allowed as of that  साल  in the  following  countries  :   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  ,  ब्राज़ील   ,  Canada , the Dominican Republic ,  फ़्रांस  ,  यूनानियों   ,  Ireland  ,  Japan  ,  New Zealand  ,  the United  किंगडम  and the United  राज्य  .
They  हैं   भी   अनुमत   in   निजी  injury actions in  लिथुआनिया   .
Recently , they  have  been allowed in Belgium as  खूब  .
a   convocation  ( Latin  'calling   साथ  ' , translating  the   यूनानी  ecclesia )  is  a  समूह   of   लोगों   formally   समवेत  for a special purpose .
Sons  of   अराजकता  is a  टेलीविज़न  drama series  निर्मित  by Kurt Sutter about the lives  of   a  close-knit outlaw motorcycle  क्लबों  operating in  आकर्षक  , a  fictional  town in California 's  सेंट्रल  Valley .
The  दिखाएँ  centers on protagonist Jackson  ``   जैक्स  '' Teller (  चार्ली   hunnam   )  , the  then-vice  president  of  the club  ,  who begins questioning the club  और  himself  .
बेटे   of   अराजकता  premiered  on  September  3  , 2008 , on  केबल   संजाल  FX  .
the   तीसरा   ऋतु   of   the  series attracted  an  average  of   4.9  million viewers  प्रति  week  ,  making  it   fx  's highest  रेटेड  series ever  ,   surpassing  FX 's other hits The Shield  ,   nip/tuck  , and Rescue Me  .
On  फ़रवरी  3 ,  2012  , Sons of Anarchy  थी   नवीनीकृत   लिये   दो   अतिरिक्त   सीज़न   ,  a fifth and  a  sixth  .
Those involved in  the  production  of  the series imply that a seventh  और   फाइनल   ऋतु  is creator Kurt  sutter  's  योजना  .
the  Grímsvötn sub-glacial  झीलों  (  ;  vötn = ``  waters  ''  ,   एकवचन  :  )  and the volcano of the  वही   नाम  are  in   south-east  Iceland  .
They are  in   the  highlands of Iceland at the  northwestern  side of the Vatnajökull ice-cap .
The lakes are at , at an  उन्नयन  of  .
beneath  the  झीलों   is   the  magma  कक्ष  of the  grímsvötn  volcano .
Grímsvötn is a  basaltic   ज्वालामुखी  which has the highest eruption  आवृत्ति  of all the volcanoes in  आइसलैंड   और  has a southwest-northeast-trending  फिशर   प्रणाली  .
the   विशाल   climate-impacting  Laki  फिशर  eruption of 1783–1784 was  a  part  of  the  वही   फिशर   प्रणाली  .
Grímsvötn was erupting at the same time  as   laki  during 1783  ,   लकिन   जारी   to  erupt until  1785   .
क्युकी   सबसे   of  the volcano lies underneath  vatnajökull  ,  सबसे  of its eruptions have been  subglacial  and the interaction of magma  और   meltwater  from the ice  कल्याणकारी  phreatomagmatic  विस्फोटक   कार्यकलाप  .
On 21 May  2011  at  19:25  UTC  ,  an eruption began , with high plumes accompanied by  अनेक  earthquakes  ,  resulting in cancellation  of   900   फ़्लाइट  in  आइसलैंड   ,  and in the  संयुक्त   किंगडम   ,  Greenland  ,   जर्मनी   ,   आयरलैंड  and Norway  on   22–25   may   .
Until 25 May the  फटना   स्केल  had been  larger  than that of the  2010   फटना  of  eyjafjallajökull   .
the  eruption stopped  at  02:40  utc  on 25 May 2011 , although  वहीँ   थी   कुछ   विस्फोटक  activity  इससे   the  tephra  vents  affecting  तभी  the  क्षेत्रफल   around  the crater .
vetting  is the process of performing  a  background check  on   किसी  before offering them employment  ,   डाक्टरेट   an  award , etc .
A prospective person or  प्रोजेक्ट   may  be vetted before making a hiring decision .
In addition , in intelligence gathering  ,   एसेट  are vetted to  determine   उनके  usefulness  .
