caesars  Entertainment Corporation (  formerly   harrah   's  Entertainment from 1995 to  2010   )   is  an American public  गेमिंग  corporation that  owns  and  operates   over  50 casinos ,  होटल  ,  और   सात   गोल्फ़   पाठ्यक्रम   अंतर्गत  several brands .
the  company , based in  स्वर्ग   ,  Nevada  ,  is the largest gaming company in the world , with  सालाना   revenues   of  $ 8.9 billion  (   2010   )  .
Caesars  is   a  public  कम्पनी   ,  with a  संयुक्त  venture of Apollo Global  प्रबन्धन  and  टेक्सास  Pacific  समूह  ownig a large portion  of  the stack  और  Blackstone Group  भी  holding a  significant   हिस्सेदारी  .
The name change from ``  harrah  's  entertainment   inc.  '' to  ``  Caesars Entertainment Corporation  ''  was made  आधिकारिक  on November 23  ,   2010   .
Harrah  's   remains  a  कुंजी   ब्रांड  in the company .
On  नवम्बर  5 ,  2010   ,  Harrah 's  घोषित  an initial public  offering  of  31,250,000   साझा   लकिन   retracted  this offering on November 19 .
a  Permanent Resident  in   कनाडा   is   a  person  जो   is  not  a   कनाडाई  citizen but who has been granted permission  to   सजीव   और   कार्य   in  Canada without any  समय   सीमा  on his  or  her  रहो   .
A  स्थाई   निवासी  must live in  कनाडा   लिये  two years out of every five  or   रिस्क   खोने   कि  status  .
a   स्थाई  Resident  holds   अनेक   of  the  वही   अधिकारों   और   जिम्मेदारियों  as  a  Canadian  नागरिक  ,  among   अन्य  the right to  कार्य   लिये   कोई   एंटरप्राइज़  as well as  लिये   the   संघीय   or   प्रांतीय   सरकारी  (  अंतर्गत   प्रतिबंध   of  access  अधिकारों   to  certain  regulated  professions ) .
The  प्रमुख  differences  हैं   कि  residents  can  not  :
vote  in elections in Canada ;
run for elected  दफ्तर  ;
hold Canadian  passports  ;
In addition  ,  they may  be   अनुमत  to join  कनाडा  's armed  शक्तियां  if the  नेशनल   ब्याज   होता  not be prejudiced .
स्थाई  residents also risk  प्रत्यर्पण  for serious crimes committed while resident in Canada .
स्थाई  residents may  लागू  for  कनाडाई  citizenship after three years  in  Canada  ;   however  this is not mandatory .
Erica Kane is  a  fictional  अक्षर   इससे  the  अमरीकी   एबीसी   दिन  soap  ओपेरा  All My  children   .
the   अक्षर   थी   portrayed   by  actress Susan Lucci from her debut on January  16  , 1970 until the last broadcast television  एपीसोड   aired   on   सितंबर  23 ,  2011  .
On  फ़रवरी  11 , 2013 ,  it  was  घोषित  that Lucci will  guest-star  on the Prospect Park 's continuation  of  All My  children  .
in   the  U.S. , Erica is considered to  be  the  सबसे  popular character  in  soap  ओपेरा   इतिहास   .
regarding   the  North-American market , TV Guide calls  उसके   ``   unequivocally  the most  प्रसिद्ध   साबुन  opera  अक्षर  in the history of  दिन  TV ''  ,   और   शामिल  her in their 2013  सूची  of  the   60   nastiest   खलनायक   of  All  समय  .
A graph  of   the  US  cpi  from 1913  to  2006 (  in   ब्लू   )   ,  and  इसके  percent annual change (  in  red )
A consumer price  अनुक्रमणिका   (   cpi  )  उपायों  changes  in  the  दाम  level of a market basket of  उपभोक्ता  goods  और   सेवाएं   खरीदा  by  households  .
the  CPI in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  is defined  by  the Bureau  of  Labor  आंकडे   as   ``  a measure of the  औसत   बदलें  over time in the prices paid  by  urban consumers  लिये   a   मार्केट   बास्केट  of  उपभोक्ता   goods   और  services . ''
The  cpi  is a  सांख्यिकीय  estimate constructed  using  the prices of a  नमूना   of  representative items whose prices are  एकत्रित  periodically  .
Sub-indexes and sub-sub-indexes are  computed  for different  श्रेणी  and sub-categories of goods and services , being  संयुक्त  to produce the  overall  index  साथ  weights  reflecting  their shares  in  the total of the consumer  expenditures  covered  by   the   अनुक्रमणिका  .
It is one of  अनेक  price  indices  calculated by most national  सांख्यिकीय  agencies  .
The  सालाना   प्रतिशत  change  in  a CPI  is  used  as   a   माप  of inflation .
A  cpi  can be  प्रयुक्त  to  अनुक्रमणिका  ( i.e. , adjust for the effect  of  inflation  )   the  real value of wages ,  salaries  ,  pensions   ,  for  regulating  prices and  लिये   deflating   मौद्रिक   magnitudes  to show changes  in   रियल   मान  .
In  सबसे  countries , the CPI is , along with the population census  और  the  यूएसए   नेशनल  Income and  उत्पाद  Accounts , one  of   the  most closely watched  नेशनल  economic  आंकडे  .
knocking  on  लकडी   ,   or  to touch  लकडी  , refers to  the   apotropaic  tradition in western  लोकगीत   of  literally touching/knocking on wood ,  or  merely  stating  that  तुम   हैं  doing or intend  वही   ,  in  अनुक्रम   to  avoid `` tempting fate ``  बाद   बनाना  a favourable observation  ,  a boast  ,  or  घोषणा   concerning  one 's  अपना  death  .
रॉकर   भुजा
Generally referred  to   भीतर   the   कॉन्टेक्स्ट  of the internal combustion engine of automotive  ,   समुद्री   ,   मोटरसाइकिल   और   प्रत्यागमनी  aviation engines  ,  the rocker  भुजा  is an  oscillating  lever  कि  conveys  रेडियल   गति  from the  कैम  lobe into  रैखिक   गति   at   the  poppet valve  to  open  it   .
One end is raised  और  lowered  by   a  rotating  पालि   of  the  camshaft  (  either  directly or  via  a tappet ( lifter )  और  pushrod ) while  the  other end acts on the valve stem  .
When the  camshaft  lobe raises the outside  of  the arm ,  the  inside presses down on  the   वाल्व   स्टेम   ,   खोलने  the valve  .
जब   the   बाहर  of the arm is permitted to  वापसी  due to  the  camshafts rotation , the  अंदर  rises ,  allowing   the  valve spring to  बंद  the valve .
The  ड्राइव  cam is  चलित   by  the  camshaft  .
This pushes  the   रॉकर   भुजा  up  और  down  परिचय  the  trunnion  pin  or  rocker  शाफ्ट  .
Friction may  be   घटाया  at  the   पाइंट  of contact with the  वाल्व   स्टेम   by   a  roller cam follower  .
A similar arrangement transfers the  गति  via another roller  कैम   अनुसरणकर्ता   to  a  दूसरी   रॉकर   भुजा  .
This rotates  परिचय  the rocker shaft  ,   और  transfers the  गति  via a tappet  to   the   poppet  valve  .
in  this  मामला  this opens the intake  वाल्व   to  the cylinder  सिर  .
the  effective leverage of the arm (  और  thus  the  force  it   can  exert on the  वाल्व  stem  )  is determined  by   the   रॉकर   भुजा  ratio  ,  the  अनुपात  of  the  distance  इससे  the rocker arm 's center of rotation to the tip divided  by   the   अलहदा  from the center of rotation  to   the  point acted  on  by the camshaft or pushrod  .
वर्तमान  automotive design favors rocker  भुजा  ratios  of  about 1.5:1 to 1.8:1  .
however  , in  the  past smaller  धनात्मक   ratios   (  the valve  लिफ्ट  is  वृहद   than  the cam lift  )  and  भी  negative  ratios  ( valve lift  छोटी  than the cam lift ) have  महरूम  used  .
Many  pre-ww2  engines use  1:1  ( neutral ) ratios  .
For  car  engines  the  rocker arms are generally steel stampings , providing a reasonable balance of strength  ,  weight  और  economical cost  .
Because  the  rocker arms are , in  भाग  , reciprocating weight  ,  excessive mass especially  at  the lever  ends   हद   the   इंजन  's ability to  पहुँचें   ऊँची  operating speeds  .
``   the   रात्रि  the Lights Went  आउट  in Georgia '' is a  दक्षिणी   गोथिक   सोंग  written  by   songwriter  Bobby  रसेल  and performed in 1972 by his  then-wife  Vicki Lawrence .
Reba  mcentire   बाद  covered  it  in  1991  .
Recorded in late October 1972 in United/Western  studios   on  Sunset  in  Hollywood and released  कम  than two weeks  बाद  in November  1972  ,  the  song centers around the older brother  of   the   narrator  , falsely convicted of  और  executed for a murder  ,  which  the  narrator  herself  has  वचनबद्ध  .
In  डाक  mail ,  a  return address is an explicit  समावेश   of   the  address of the  व्यक्ति  sending  the  message  .
It provides the  प्राप्तकर्ता  (  और  sometimes  प्राधिकृत   intermediaries   )  with a means to determine how  to  respond to the sender  of  the  संदेश  if  needed   .
the  return  पता  need not  शामिल  a  प्रेषक  's  नाम  , but  चाहिए  include  पता  or  p.o   .  box details  in   the  same  रास्ता  as  the  delivery address should  .
In  कुछ  countries , the return address is  conventionally  located  in   the  upper left hand corner of the envelope ,  कार्ड  ,  or  label  .
In  the  United Kingdom ,  the  return  पता   is  usually placed on  the  reverse  of   the   लिफाफा  , near the top .
Businesses often  उपयोग   लिफाफे   preprinted  with a return address  .
अनेक  individuals have  चादरें  of adhesive  लेबल्स  preprinted  साथ  their home address to  affix   to  their correspondence  .
धर्मार्थ   sometimes   शामिल  such  चादरें   in  mailshots  .
रोल्स  of Return Address Labels can  be   खरीदा  from  कंपनियाँ  that  बेचें  personalized labels  to   provide  individuals an easy way to peel and stick return address  लेबल्स  to  उनके   लिफाफे   .
The  वापसी  address is not required  on   डाक   मेल  .
however   ,  lack of a return address prevents the  डाक  service from being able  to  return the  मद   if  it proves undeliverable ; such  as   इससे   क्षति  ,  postage  due  ,   or  invalid  गंतव्य  .
Such mail may  यूँ  become dead letter  मेल  .
Should  the   वापसी  address be  of  a different state  or   देश  ,  the  mail may  be  routed through that location  लिये   आसानी   of  return .
A nerve  मार्गदर्शन  conduit  (  also referred to  as  an artificial nerve conduit or artificial  तंत्रिका   graft   ,  as opposed to an  autograft  )  is  an artificial means  of  guiding axonal regrowth  to   सुकर  nerve  regeneration  and is one  of   अनेक  clinical treatments  लिये   तंत्रिका  injuries  .
जब  direct  suturing   of  the two stumps  of   a   severed  nerve  can   नहीं  be accomplished  बगैर  tension  ,   the  standard clinical treatment for  परिधीय  nerve injuries is autologous nerve grafting  .
Due to  the   सीमित  availability of donor tissue  और   कार्यात्मक  recovery  in  autologous  तंत्रिका   कलम   ,  neural tissue engineering research has focused  on   the  development  of  bioartificial nerve  मार्गदर्शन  conduits  as  an alternative  उपचार  ,  विशेषकर   लिये  large defects  .
Similar  तकनीकों   हैं  also being explored  लिये  nerve repair in the spinal cord  लकिन   तंत्रिका   regeneration  in the central  बेचैन  system  मुद्राएँ   a  greater  चुनौती   क्युकी  its  axons   do  not regenerate appreciably in their  देशी   पर्यावरण  .
The  सृष्टि  of  कृत्रिम  conduits is also  ज्ञात  as entubulation because  the   तंत्रिका   ends  and  intervening   गैप  are enclosed within  a  tube  रचित  of biological or  सिंथेटिक   सामग्री   .
Whether  the  conduit is  in   the  form  of  a  biologic  tube ,  सिंथेटिक  tube or tissue-engineered  conduit  , it  चाहिए  facilitate neurotropic  और  neurotrophic communication  between   the  proximal and distal  ends  of  the  nerve  गैप  , block external inhibitory factors  ,  and provide a  शारीरिक  guidance for axonal regrowth .
The most basic objective  of  a nerve guidance  conduit  is to combine  शारीरिक  ,  रासायनिक  , and biological  cues   अंतर्गत  conditions that will  फोस्टर  tissue  गठन  .
सामग्री  that  have   महरूम   प्रयुक्त   to  make biologic  tubes   शामिल  blood  बरतन  and skeletal muscles ,  जबकि   nonabsorbable  and bioabsorbable synthetic tubes  have  been made from silicone and polyglycolide  क्रमशः  .
Tissue-engineered nerve guidance conduits are a  संयोजन  of  अनेक   तत्व  :  scaffold  structure  ,  scaffold  सामग्री  ,  सेल्यूलर  therapies  ,   neurotrophic   कारकों  and biomimetic  सामग्री  .
The  चुनाव  of  जिससे   शारीरिक  ,  रासायनिक  and  biological   cues  to  उपयोग  is  आधारित   on  the properties of  the  nerve environment  ,  which  is  critical in  बनाना  the most desirable environment for  axon  regeneration  .
the  factors that control material  चयन  include  biocompatibility   ,  biodegradability  ,  mechanical integrity , controllability during  तंत्रिका  growth , implantation  और  sterilization .
Hardcore Pawn is  an   अमरीकी  reality  टेलीविज़न  series  उत्पादित  by RDF  यूएसए  ( later  zodiak   यूएसए   )  and  रिचर्ड  Dominick  प्रोडक्शन्स   लिये  truTV about the day-to-day operations  of  American Jewelry  और  Loan ,  a  family-owned  साहूकार   दूकान   स्तिथ  at 20450 Greenfield Road , between 8 Mile Road and the John C.  आवास  Freeway  in   डेट्रॉयट  , Michigan  .
The  श्रेणी  premiered on August 16 , 2010  ,  delivering  दो  million viewers  ,  setting a record  as  truTV 's most-watched  श्रेणी   प्रीमियर  ever  .
amoxicillin  BP
Amoxicillin ( INN )  ,   formerly   amoxycillin  ( BAN  )  , and  abbreviated   amox   ,  is a moderate-spectrum ,  bacteriolytic   ,   β-lactam  antibiotic used to  दावत  bacterial  infections   caused   by   susceptible  microorganisms  .
it  is usually  the  drug  of  choice within the class  क्युकी   it   is  better absorbed , following  मौखिक   प्रशासन   ,   than   अन्य   β-lactam  antibiotics .
Amoxicillin  is   एक   of  the most common antibiotics prescribed  लिये  children .
the   ड्रग  became  उपलब्धियाँ   in  1972  .
Amoxicillin  is  susceptible  to  degradation  by  β-lactamase -producing bacteria , which are  resistant  to  a  broad spectrum  of   β-lactam   एंटीबायोटिक  ,  ऐसे  as penicillin .
For this  कारण   ,   it   is  often combined with  clavulanic   एसिड  , a  β-lactamase  inhibitor .
This increases  प्रभावकारिता   by  reducing  इसके  susceptibility to β-lactamase  प्रतिरोध  .
lyndon  Baines Johnson ( August  27   ,  1908 – January  22  ,  1973   )   ,  often  referred   to  as  lbj  , was the 36th President of the United  राज्य  ( 1963–1969  )   ,  a  स्थिति  he  assumed   बाद  his service  as   the   37th  Vice  अध्यक्ष  of the United States (  1961–1963  )  .
He  is  one  of  only four  लोगों   जो  served  in  all four elected federal  कार्यालयों  of the  संयुक्त  States  :  Representative ,  सीनेटर  , Vice President , and President  .
Johnson  ,   a  Democrat from Texas , served as a  संयुक्त   राज्य  Representative from 1937–1949  और  as a Senator from 1949–1961  ,  including  छह   सालो  as United  राज्य   सीनेट   बहुमत   नेता   ,  two  as  Senate  अल्पसंख्यक  Leader and  दो   as  Senate  बहुमत  Whip .
बाद   campaigning  unsuccessfully for  the  Democratic nomination in 1960  ,   जॉनसन   थी  asked by John  F.   कैनेडी   to   be  his running mate  लिये   the  1960 presidential election .
जॉनसन  succeeded to the presidency following the  हत्या  of John  F.   कैनेडी  on  नवम्बर   22  , 1963  ,  completed Kennedy 's term  और  was elected President in his own  सही  , winning  by   a  large margin over  बैरी   goldwater   in  the 1964 election .
Johnson was  greatly  supported by the Democratic  पार्टी  and as  अध्यक्ष   ,  he was responsible for  डिजाइनिंग  the ``  ग्रेट  Society ``  विधान  that  शामिल  laws that upheld civil  अधिकारों   ,   पब्लिक   प्रसारण   ,   medicare   ,  Medicaid ,  पर्यावरणीय  protection , aid  to  education , and  उसके  ``  युद्ध  on  गरीबी  . ''
Johnson  थी   प्रसिद्ध   लिये   उसके   domineering   व्यक्तित्व  and  the  ``  जॉनसन   उपचार   ,  '' his  coercion  of powerful politicians in  अनुक्रम   to   अग्रिम  legislation  .
Meanwhile , Johnson escalated American  भागीदारी   in  the  वियतनाम  War  ,   इससे  16,000 American advisors/soldiers  in   1963  to 550,000  कॉम्बैट   सैनिकों   in   जल्दी  1968 ,  as  American  हताहत   soared  and  the  peace process bogged down  .
The involvement  stimulated  a large  एंग्री   antiwar   गति  based especially on  विश्वविद्यालयों  campuses  in   the   u.S.   और  abroad  .
Summer riots  broke  out in  सबसे  major  शहरों  after 1965 ,  और   अपराधों  rates  soared   ,  as  उसके  opponents raised demands for ``  विधि  and  अनुक्रम   ''  policies .
The  लोकतांत्रिक   पार्टी   विभाजित  in multiple  feuding   गिरोहों  , and  बाद  Johnson did  poorly  in the 1968  नई   हैम्पशायर  primary  ,  he  ended   उसके   बोली   लिये   reelection  .
Republican Richard Nixon was elected to  सफल  him  .
इतिहासकारों  argue  कि  Johnson 's  प्रेसिडेंसी   चिह्नित  the peak  of  modern liberalism  in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  after  the  New  सौदे  era .
जॉनसन  is ranked  favorably  by some  इतिहासकारों  because of his domestic policies .
The Big  बंग   सिद्धान्त   डाल   at  Comic  कॉन   2009   ,   इससे  left : Kunal  नय्यर  , Simon  helberg  , Kaley Cuoco  ,  Jim Parsons  ,   और   जॉनी   galecki
The American sitcom The Big Bang Theory  ,  created  और   कार्यपालिका  produced by Chuck Lorre  और   विधेयक   prady   ,  premiered  on  CBS on September  24   ,  2007  .
The  दिखाएँ   centers  on  पाँच   वर्ण  :  roommates   शेल्डन   कूपर  and Leonard  hofstadter   ,   दो   caltech  physicists  ;   पैनी  , a  वेट्रेस   और  aspiring actress  जो  lives across the hall ;  और   लियोनार्ड  and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz ,  और   astrophysicist   राजेश   koothrappali  .
Over time , several  supporting   वर्ण  have been promoted to  अभिनीत  roles : Leslie Winkle  (   ऋतु  1  पुनरावर्ती   ;   ऋतु  2  नियमित   ;   ऋतु  3  अतिथि  )  ,   a   physicist   सहयोगी   ,  and , at  अलग  times , a  प्रेमी  of both Leonard and Howard  ;   bernadette  Rostenkowski-Wolowitz  (  season 3 recurring ; season  4-present  regular  )  , a  microbiologist  , Howard  's   fiancée  and subsequent  बीवी  ,  और   पूर्व  part-time waitress  alongside   पैनी  ;  neuroscientist  Amy Farrah Fowler (  ऋतु  3  अतिथि  ; season 4  पुनरावर्ती   ;  season 4-present regular ) , who  joins  the  समूह   बाद   होने  matched to Sheldon  on   a   डेटिंग   जालस्थल   ;   और   कॉमिक  book store-owner  ,  Stuart Bloom ( seasons  2–5  recurring  ;   ऋतु  6-present  नियमित  )  ,  who replaces  हावर्ड  as Raj  's   बेहतरीन  friend when  हावर्ड  is in space .
The  दिखाएँ   भी   सुविधाएँ  numerous  supporting  characters ,  प्रत्येक   of   जिसको  plays  a  prominent role  in  a  छोटी   समूह  of episodes  .
The American  सिविल  War ( ACW ) , also  ज्ञात  as the  युद्ध  between  the  States or simply  the  Civil War ( see  नामकरण   )  , was a  सिविल  war fought  इससे  1861  to   1865   between  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  (  the  `` Union '' or  the   ``   उत्तर  ''  )   और   अनेक  Southern slave states that declared their secession and  formed  the  confederate  States of America ( the ``  confederacy  ''  or  the ``  दक्षिण  ''  )   .
The  युद्ध   था   इसके   उत्पत्ति  in the issue  of  slavery  ,  especially  the  extension of slavery into the western territories  .
विदेशी  powers  किया   नहीं   intervene  .
बाद  four  सालो  of bloody  कॉम्बैट  that  बाएँ   over  600,000  सैनिको   मुर्दे   और   नष्ट   much   of  the  दक्षिण  's  अवसंरचना   ,  the Confederacy  collapsed  , slavery was abolished  ,  and the  मुश्किल   पुनर्निर्माण  process  of  restoring  नेशनल  unity and  guaranteeing  rights to the  freed  slaves began  .
in  the 1860 presidential election , Republicans  ,   led  by  अब्राहम  Lincoln ,  opposed  expanding slavery into United  राज्य   '  territories  .
Lincoln  जीती   ,   लकिन   पहले  his inauguration  on  March  4   ,   1861  ,  सात  cotton-based slave  राज्य  formed the  confederacy  .
Outgoing  लोकतांत्रिक  President James Buchanan  और  the incoming Republicans rejected secession as  illegal  .
Lincoln  's   inaugural  address declared his administration would not  initiate   सिविल   युद्ध   .
Eight remaining slave  राज्य   जारी   to   अस्वीकृत  calls for secession  .
Confederate  शक्तियां  seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy  .
a  Peace Conference failed to find  a  compromise ,  और  both  पहलू  prepared for war  .
the   confederates   assumed   कि  European countries were  so  dependent on ``  किंग  Cotton ``  कि  they  होता   intervene   ;   none   किया  and  none  recognized the  नई   confederate  States  of  America  .
Hostilities began on April 12  ,  1861 , when  confederate   शक्तियां   fired   upon  Fort  sumter  , a key fort held  by   संघ   सैनिकों  in  दक्षिण  Carolina  .
Lincoln  पुकारा  for each state  to  provide troops  to   retake  the fort ;  नतीजतन   ,  four more slave states joined  the   confederacy   ,   bringing  their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled  the  border states  और  established a  नवल  blockade that crippled the southern economy  .
The  पूर्वी   थिएटर  was  inconclusive  in  1861–62  .
The  पतझड़  1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland  (   a   संघ   राज्य   )  ended  साथ  Confederate  रिट्रीट  at  the   बैटल  of  antietam  , dissuading British  हस्तक्षेप   .
Lincoln issued  the  Emancipation Proclamation  ,  which made ending slavery a  युद्ध  goal  .
To the  वेस्ट  ,  by  summer 1862  the   संघ   नष्ट  the Confederate  नदी  navy , then much of their  पश्चिमी  armies , and  the  Union at  vicksburg   विभाजित   the   confederacy   in  two at the  मिसिसिपी   नदी   .
in  1863  ,  Robert  E.  Lee  's  Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of  gettysburg  .
पश्चिमी  successes led  to   ulysses   S.  Grant  कमांड   of   सब  Union  सेना   in   1864  .
In  the   पश्चिमी  Theater , William  T.  Sherman  drove  east to capture Atlanta  और  marched  to  the sea , destroying  confederate  infrastructure  साथ  the way  .
the  Union  marshaled  the resources and  जनशक्ति  to attack the Confederacy from all directions  ,  and could  afford  to fight battles of  अपघर्षण  through the  overland  Campaign towards Richmond  ,   the   confederate   पूंजी  .
the  defending Confederate army failed  ,  leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant  at   appomattox  Court House on April 9 ,  1865  .
The American Civil  युद्ध  was  एक  of the earliest  सच्चा  industrial  युद्धों  .
Railroads  ,   the   टेलीग्राफ  , steamships , and mass-produced weapons were  employed  extensively .
the  mobilization of civilian factories , mines , shipyards ,  बैंको  ,  परिवहन  and food  आपूर्तियाँ  all foreshadowed World  युद्ध  I .
It remains the deadliest war in American history  ,  resulting in the deaths of  an   अनुमानित  750,000 soldiers and  an  undetermined number  of   civilian  casualties  .
इतिहासकार   जॉन   huddleston   estimates   the   मौत  toll  at   टेन  percent  of  all  उत्तरी  males 20–45 years old , and 30 percent  of   सब  Southern white males aged 18–40  .
Human evolution refers to  the  evolutionary  प्रक्रम  leading up  to   the  appearance of modern humans  .
While  it   began  with the  पिछला  common ancestor  of  all  जीवन   ,   the  topic  प्रायः  covers  तभी  the  विकासवादी   इतिहास   of   primates   ,  in  particular  the  genus  Homo ,  और  the emergence of  होमो   sapiens   as  a distinct species  of   hominids  (  or  ``  ग्रेट  apes  ''  )  .
the   पढ़ाई   of  human evolution involves  अनेक  scientific  disciplines  , including physical anthropology  ,   primatology   ,   पुरातत्व  , linguistics ,  विकासवादी   मनोविज्ञान  , embryology  और   आनुवंशिकी  .
According to genetic studies , primates  diverged  from other  स्तनधारियों  about in the Late Cretaceous period ,  और  the  earliest  fossils appear in  the  Paleocene ,  around   .
the   परिवार   मानवनुमा  diverged from  the   hylobatidae   (  Gibbon )  परिवार  15-20 million years  पहले   ,  and around , the Ponginae  (   orangutans   )   ,   diverged  from the Hominidae  परिवार  .
bipedalism  is the basic adaption of  the  Hominin  लकीर  ,  और   the  earliest  bipedal  Hominin is considered  to  be either Sahelanthropus or Orrorin , with  ardipithecus   ,  a  पूरा  bipedal  ,  coming somewhat later .
the  gorilla  और  chimpanzee diverged around the same time , about 4-6 million years  पहले  ,  और   either   sahelanthropus  or Orrorin  may  be our  पिछला  shared  पूर्वज  with them  .
The  जल्दी  bipedals eventually  विकसित   into  the australopithecines and  बाद   the   genus   होमो   .
The earliest documented members of the genus  होमो   हैं  Homo habilis which evolved  around  ;  the   earliest   प्रजाति   लिये  which  वहीँ   is   धनात्मक  evidence of use  of  stone  टूल्स   .
The  दिमाग   of   ये  early  hominins  were  परिचय  the same  आकार  as that of a  चिंपैंजी  .
दौरान  the  अगला   लाख   सालो  a process of encephalization began  ,   और  with the arrival of Homo erectus  in  the fossil record ,  cranial  capacity  था   doubled   to   850  cm3  .
होमो  erectus and  होमो  ergaster were  the  first of the hominina to leave  अफ़्रीकी  , and these  प्रजाति  spread through  अफ़्रीकी   ,  Asia  ,  and Europe between .
It is  believed   कि  these species were the  पहला  to use fire  और  complex  टूल्स  .
According to the  हाल  African Ancestry  सिद्धान्त   ,  modern  इंसानो  evolved in  अफ़्रीकी  possibly  इससे  Homo heidelbergensis  ,  Homo rhodesiensis or  होमो   antecessor  and  migrated  out  of  the continent some 50,000 to  100,000  years ago ,  replacing  local  populations  of Homo erectus , Homo denisova  ,   होमो   floresiensis   और  Homo neanderthalensis  .
Archaic Homo sapiens  ,   the   forerunner   of  anatomically modern humans ,  विकसित  between 400,000  और   250,000   सालो  ago .
Recent DNA evidence  suggests   कि  several  haplotypes   of  Neanderthal origin  हैं  present among  सब  non-African  populations   ,   और  Neanderthals and other  hominids  , such as Denisova hominin may have contributed up  to  6 % of their  genome  to present-day  इंसानs.  <  संदर्भ  name= '' 10.1126/science.1209202 '' > Anatomically modern humans evolved from archaic Homo sapiens  in  the Middle Paleolithic , about 200,000 years ago  .
the  transition  to   behavioral   आधुनिकता  with  the  development  of   सांकेतिक  culture  ,  language  ,   और   specialized  lithic technology happened around 50,000 years  पहले  according to many anthropologists  हालांकि  some  सुझाएँ  a gradual change in  बर्ताव   over  a  longer  time  स्पैन  .
Lisa Cuddy ,  m.d   .   ,   is  a  fictional   अक्षर  on  the  Fox network medical drama House .
She is  portrayed  by  लिसा   edelstein  .
Cuddy was  the   डीन   of  Medicine  और   हॉस्पिटल   व्यवस्थापक   of  the fictional Princeton-Plainsboro  शिक्षण  Hospital in  नई   जर्सी  .
She  भी  becomes House  's  love  ब्याज  through the years to start a  संबंध  with  उसे   in  season  सात   .
Cuddy quit  उसके   जॉब   बाद  the events  of  season seven 's finale ``  चलती  On ``  .
Track  और  field is  a  sport  comprising  various competitive  एथलेटिक  contests based  on  running ,  कूद  ,  और  throwing .
The  नाम  of the  खेल  derives  इससे  the competition venue :  a  stadium with an  ओवल   कार्यशील  track  around  a grass  फ़ील्ड  .
The throwing and jumping events generally  लो   प्लेस  in  the   सेंट्रल  enclosed area  .
track  and field falls under the  छतरियाँ   खेल  of athletics  ,   जिससे  also includes  सड़क   कार्यशील   ,   क्रॉस   देश   कार्यशील   ,  and race walking .
The  दो  most prestigious international track  और  field competitions  हैं   आयोजित  under the  ध्वज  of athletics : the  एथलेटिक्स   प्रतियोगिता  at the Olympic  खेल   और   the   आइएएएफ  World  championships  in Athletics  .
The International  संघ  of  एथलेटिक्स   federations  is the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  governing body for track and  फ़ील्ड  .
Track  और   फ़ील्ड   कार्यक्रम   हैं   generally   व्यक्तिगत  sports with athletes challenging each other to  decide  a single victor .
the   रेसिंग  events  हैं  won  by   the   खिलाड़ी  with the fastest time ,  जबकि   the   कूद  and  फेंकना   कार्यक्रम   हैं  won by the athlete who has  हासिल  the greatest  अलहदा   or  height in  the   प्रतियोगिता  .
The running events are categorised as sprints , middle and  long-distance   कार्यक्रम  , relays , and hurdling .
नियमित  jumping events include  long   जम्प  , triple jump  ,   ऊँची   जम्प   और   ध्रुव  vault  ,   जबकि   the  most  आम  throwing events  हैं  shot put  ,  javelin  ,   discus  and  हथौड़ा   .
वहीँ  are also  ``  combined  कार्यक्रम  ''  ,   ऐसे  as  heptathlon   और  decathlon , in  जिससे  athletes compete in  a  number  of   the  above  कार्यक्रम   .
Records  हैं  kept of  the   बेहतरीन   प्रदर्शन  in specific  कार्यक्रम   ,  at  संसार  and national levels  ,   सही   bas  to  a   निजी   स्तर   .
however  , if athletes  हैं  deemed to have  violated  the event 's  नियम  or  regulations   ,  they are  disqualified  from the  प्रतियोगिता  and their marks  हैं  erased  .
in  North America  ,  the term track and field  may  be used to  refer  to  एथलेटिक्स   in  general  ,   बल्कि  than specifically track and field events .
The Gulf  युद्ध   (   2  August  1990  –  28  February 1991  )   ,   codenamed  Operation Desert Storm  (  17  जनवरी   1991  –  28  February  1991   )   थी  a war waged by  a  U.N.-authorized Coalition  फ़ोर्स  from  34  nations led by the United  राज्य  ,  विरूद्ध   इराकी   in  response to Iraq 's invasion and annexation of Kuwait .
The war is also known under  अन्य  names ,  ऐसे  as the  पारसी  Gulf War  ,   पहला  Gulf War , Gulf  युद्ध   i  , or the First Iraq War  ,   पहले   the  term `` Iraq  युद्ध  ''  became   पहचाना  instead with  the  2003  इराकी  War (  भी  referred  to  in the  u.S.  as  ``  Operation Iraqi Freedom  ''  )  .
Kuwait  's   आक्रमण  by Iraqi  सैनिकों  that  began  2  अगस्त  1990 was  मिले   साथ  international condemnation  ,  and  brought  immediate economic  प्रतिबंधों   विरूद्ध  Iraq by  सदस्यों   of   the  U.N. Security Council .
U.S. President George H.  W.   बुश   तैनात  U.S. forces  into  Saudi  अरब  , and urged other countries to send their  अपना   शक्तियां  to  the  scene .
An array  of   राष्ट्र  joined the Coalition  .
The  ग्रेट  majority of  the  Coalition  's  military forces were  इससे  the  u.S.  , with Saudi  अरब  , the United Kingdom and  मिश्र  as leading  योगदानकर्ता  , in  कि  order .
सऊदी  Arabia paid around US $ 36  अरब  of  the   us   $  60 billion  लागत  .
the   युद्ध   थी  marked by  the  beginning of live news  on  the front  लाइनों   of  the fight  ,  with the  primacy  of  the  U.S. network CNN .
The war has  भी   अर्जित  the  उपनाम  Video  खेल  War  बाद   the   रोज़   ब्रॉडकास्ट  images  on  board the  u.S.  bombers  दौरान  Operation Desert Storm .
The initial conflict to expel Iraqi troops from Kuwait began with  an   aerial  bombardment on 17 January  1991  .
इस   थी  followed  by  a ground assault on  24   फ़रवरी  .
This was  a   निर्णायक  victory  लिये   the  Coalition  शक्तियां   ,  who liberated Kuwait  और   उन्नत  into  इराकी   territory  .
The  गठबन्धन   ceased  their  अग्रिम   ,  and declared a cease-fire  100   घंटों  after  the  ground  अभियान  started .
aerial  and ground combat  थी  confined  to   इराकी  ,  कुवैत   ,  and areas on  सऊदी  Arabia 's border .
Iraq launched  scud  missiles against Coalition  सैन्य  targets in  सऊदी   अरब  and against Israel  .
The nickel , in  अमरीकी  usage  ,  is  a   five-   cent  coin  जारी   by   the  United  राज्य  Mint .
रचित   of   75   %   तांबे   और  25 %  निकल   ,  the piece has  महरूम  struck since 1866 .
The  चांदी  half dime , equal to five cents  ,  had  महरूम  issued since the 1790s .
the  American  सिविल   युद्ध  caused economic hardship , driving gold and  चांदी  from circulation ;  in  response  ,   in   प्लेस   of   low-value  coins ,  the   सरकारी  at first issued paper  करेंसी   .
In 1865 ,  कॉंग्रेस   abolished  the five-cent fractional currency  नोट   बाद   स्पेंसर   M.  Clark , head of  the  Currency  ब्यूरो  ( today  the   ब्यूरो  of  नक्काशी  and  मुद्रण  ) , placed his  अपना  portrait  on   the  denomination .
बाद  successful introduction  of   two-cent  and  three-cent   टुकड़े   ,   बगैर  precious metal ,  कॉंग्रेस  also  प्राधिकृत   a   five-cent   टुकड़ा  consisting  of  base metal ; the  मिंट   began  striking this  संस्करण  in 1866 .
The  आरंभिक   डिज़ाइन  of  the  Shield  निकल  was struck until  1883   ,  then  replaced  by  the   स्वतंत्रता  Head  निकल  .
the  Buffalo nickel was  introduced  in  1913  as part of  a  drive to  बढ़ाएँ  the beauty of American coinage  ;  in 1938 , the Jefferson nickel  followed  .
in  2004  और   2005  , special  डिजाइन   in  honor of  the  bicentennial  of   the  Lewis and  क्लार्क  Expedition  यहूद   जारी  .
In  2006  , the Mint  reverted  to using Jefferson nickel designer Felix  schlag   's  original reverse  (  or  ``   tails  '' side ) , although  a  new  obverse   ,   by  Jamie Franki  ,  was  substituted   .
As  of  2013 , it costs  अधिक  than eleven  सेंट  to  उपज   a  nickel  ;  the  मिंट  is exploring the possibility  of   reducing  cost by  using  less  महंगी  metals  .
A poster  साथ  flowers or clusters of  पुष्प  produced by twelve  प्रजाति   of  flowering plants from  अलग  families
a  flower , sometimes known as  a  bloom or  खिलना  ,  is  the  reproductive  structure found in  flowering  plants ( plants of  the   प्रभाग   magnoliophyta  ,  भी   पुकारा  angiosperms )  .
the  biological function of a flower  is  to effect reproduction  ,  usually  by  providing  a  mechanism for  the  union  of  sperm  साथ  eggs .
Flowers  may  facilitate  outcrossing  (  संलयन  of sperm and eggs  इससे  different individuals in  a   जनसांख्यिकी  ) or  allow  selfing ( fusion  of  sperm and  अंडा  from  the   वही  flower )  .
कुछ   पुष्प   उपज  diaspores  बगैर  fertilization (  parthenocarpy   )   .
पुष्प  contain sporangia  और  are  the  site where  gametophytes   develop  .
Flowers  दे  rise to fruit and seeds .
अनेक  flowers have evolved  to  be attractive to animals  ,  so as  to  cause them  to   be  vectors for  the  transfer  of   पराग   .
In addition to  facilitating  the reproduction of  flowering   पौधे  ,  पुष्प  have long been admired  और   प्रयुक्त   by   इंसानो  to beautify their environment  ,   और   भी   as  objects of romance , ritual , religion ,  आयुर्विज्ञान  and as a source of food .
The McDonnell Douglas ( now Boeing ) F-15 Eagle is a twin-engine  ,   all-weather  tactical fighter designed  by   mcdonnell  Douglas  to  gain and maintain air superiority in aerial combat  .
it   is  considered  among   the  most successful  आधुनिक   सेनानी  , with over 100  aerial   कॉम्बैट   victories   साथ  no  नुकसान   in  dogfights .
Following  समीक्षाएँ   of  proposals  ,   the  United  राज्य   एयर   फ़ोर्स  selected McDonnell  डगलस  '  डिज़ाइन  in 1967 to meet the service 's need  लिये  a  समर्पित  air superiority fighter  .
The Eagle  पहला   उड़ाया   in   जुलाई  1972 , and entered service in 1976 .
Since the 1970s , the Eagle  रै   महरूम   exported  to Israel  ,   जापानी   ,   सऊदी  Arabia ,  और  other  राष्ट्र  .
the  F-15  थी  originally  envisioned   as   a   pure  air superiority  वायुयान  .
Its design  शामिल  a  द्वितीयक   ground-attack   काबिलियत   कि  was largely  अप्रयुक्त   .
the  design proved flexible  पर्याप्त  that an all-weather strike derivative , the F-15E Strike Eagle , was later developed  ,   और  entered service in 1989 .
the  F-15 Eagle  is  expected  to   be   in  service with the U.S.  एयर  Force past 2025 .
mimio   is   a  brand  नाम  of a line of technology products aimed at  the   शिक्षा  market .
the   प्राथमिक  products  हैं  focused  around  computer  whiteboard  interactive teaching devices .
MimioCapture  डिवाइस  also  allow  users to capture  सब  of the  स्याही   स्ट्रोक्स  that are written on the whiteboard .
जब  used in conjunction with  a   वीडियो  projector it turns the  ordinary   whiteboard  surface  into   a   fully  interactive  whiteboard  .
The  उत्पाद  line  थी  originally designed by  आभासी  Ink .
on   अक्तूबर  4  ,  2006  newell   rubbermaid   acquired   the   mimio  interactive  whiteboard  ( iWB )  उत्पाद  line .
Rahab  of   जेरिको
Rahab , ( ; ; )  थी  , according to the Book  of   जोशुआ   ,  a  स्त्री   जो   जिया  in Jericho  in  the  promised  Land and assisted the Israelites in capturing the  नगर   .
Nearly all English translations of  जोशुआ  describe  उसके  as a  बदचलन  or  वेश्या  .
The Organization of American States ( Spanish : Organización  de   लॉस  Estados Americanos  ,   पुर्तगाली  : Organização dos Estados  americanos  ,  फ्रेंच   :  Organisation  देस  États  américains  )  ,  or  the   oas  , is  a   क्षेत्रीय   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   संगठन   .
the   oas  was founded on 30 April 1948  ,  and  रै  its headquarters  in   वॉशिंगटन  , D.C.  ,  United States  .
इसके   सदस्यों  are the  35   स्वतंत्र   राज्य   of   the   americas   .
Since 26  may   2005   ,  the Secretary  सामान्य  of OAS has been José Miguel Insulza .
Christopher Columbus ( Italian  :   cristoforo   कोलोन   ;   स्पेनी  : Cristóbal  colón   ;  Portuguese  :   cristóvão  Colombo  ;  before  31  October 145120 May  1506   )  was  an  Italian  एक्सप्लोरर  ,  नाविक   ,   और  colonizer , born in the Republic of Genoa , in what is today  northwestern   इटली  .
अंतर्गत  the  auspices   of  the Catholic Monarchs of Spain  ,   he  completed four voyages across the Atlantic  समंदर   कि   led  to  सामान्य   यूरोपीय   जागरूकता  of the American continents .
Those voyages , and his efforts to establish permanent settlements on  the  island of Hispaniola ,  initiated   the  Spanish colonization of the New  संसार  .
In the  कॉन्टेक्स्ट  of  उभरते  western imperialism and economic competition between European kingdoms  seeking   माल  through the  स्थापना  of trade routes and  colonies  , Columbus 's speculative proposal  ,   to   पहुँचें   the  East Indies by sailing westward  ,  eventually received  the  support  of  the Spanish  क्राउन  , which saw  in   it   a  promise , however  रिमोट   ,   of   gaining  the upper  हाथ  over rival powers in the contest for  the  lucrative spice trade with Asia  .
During his first voyage in 1492  ,   बजाय  of reaching Japan as he  था   intended  ,  कोलंबस  landed in  the  Bahamas  द्वीपसमूह  , at a  locale  he named  सैन  Salvador .
over  the  कोर्स   of  three  अधिक  voyages ,  कोलंबस   visited   the  Greater and  lesser  Antilles  ,  as well as the Caribbean  coast  of Venezuela  और   सेंट्रल  America ,  claiming   उन्हें   लिये   the   स्पेनी   साम्राज्य   .
Though Columbus was  नहीं   the   पहला   यूरोपीय  explorer  to  reach  the  Americas (  having  been  preceded  by  the  Norse expedition led by Leif Ericson  in  the 11th  सदी  ) ,  कोलंबस  's voyages  led   to  the first  स्थायी  European  सम्पर्क   साथ   the  Americas ,  inaugurating   a  period  of  European exploration , conquest  ,   और  colonization  कि  lasted for  अनेक  centuries .
वे   था  ,  इसलिए   ,   an  enormous  प्रभाव  in the historical  विकास  of the  आधुनिक  Western world .
Columbus  खुद  saw his accomplishments primarily in the  लाइट  of the  spreading  of  the  Christian religion .
Never  admitting   कि  he had reached  a   महाद्वीप   previously  unknown to  europeans   ,  rather  than   the  East  इंडीज  he had  नियत  out for ,  कोलंबस  called the inhabitants of  the   lands  he  visited   indios   (   स्पेनी  for  ``  Indians  ``  ) .
Columbus 's strained relationship  साथ  the Spanish crown and its appointed colonial administrators  in  America  led   to   उसके  arrest and dismissal as  राज्यपाल  of the settlements  on   the  island of  हिस्पानिओला  in  1500  , and later to  protracted   वाद  over the  लाभ  which Columbus and his  वारिस  claimed were owed  to  them by the  क्राउन   .
करवाया   in  Germany , the  boxer   is   a   नस्ल   of   stocky   ,  medium-sized ,  short-haired   कुत्तो  .
The coat is smooth and tight-fitting  ;   रंगों  are  fawn  or brindled ,  साथ  or without white markings  ,  which may  कवर  the  संपूर्ण  body .
Boxers are brachycephalic ( they  have   व्यापक   ,  short skulls  )  , and  have   a  square muzzle  ,   mandibular   prognathism  ( an underbite ) ,  बहुत   दमदार  jaws ,  और  a  शक्तिशाली  bite ideal  लिये   फांसी  on to large prey  .
The  boxer   थी  bred  इससे   the   बूढ़ा   अंग्रेज़ी  Bulldog and  the  now extinct Bullenbeisser ,  और  is part  of  the Molosser  समूह   .
मुक्केबाज  were  पहला   exhibited   in   a   श्वान  show for St. Bernards  in   म्यूनिख  in 1895  ,   the  first  boxer  club being founded the  अगला  year  .
Based  on   2012  American Kennel Club statistics  ,   मुक्केबाज  held  स्थिर  as  the  seventh most popular  नस्ल  of dog in  the   संयुक्त  States  लिये   the  third  लगातार   साल   .
Serial  ata   (   sata  )  is   a  computer bus interface that connects  मेजबान  bus adapters  to  mass storage devices  ऐसे  as  मुश्किल   डिस्क   ड्राइव  and optical drives .
Serial ATA  replaces  the older  at   अनुलग्नक  standard ( ATA ; later  referred   to  as Parallel ATA  or   pata  ) , offering  अनेक  advantages over the  पुरानी  interface  :  reduced  केबल  size and  लागत  (  सात  conductors instead of  40  ) ,  देशी  hot  swapping   ,  faster data transfer  through  higher  signalling  rates  ,  and more efficient transfer through  an  (  वैकल्पिक   )  I/O queuing protocol .
SATA host adapters  और  devices communicate via  a  high-speed serial  केबल   over  two pairs of conductors .
In  कंट्रास्ट  , parallel ATA ( the redesignation for  the  legacy  ata  specifications ) used a 16-bit wide  आंकड़ा  bus with many additional support and control signals , all  ऑपरेटिंग   at  much  निम्नतर  frequency  .
to  ensure backward  संगतता  with legacy  ata  software and applications , SATA uses the same  मौलिक   ata   और  ATAPI command-set  as   विरासत  ATA devices .
SATA has  replaced  parallel  ata   in   उपभोक्ता  desktop and laptop computers  ,  and  रै   largely  replaced  pata   in  new embedded applications  .
sata  's market  share  in  the  desktop  pc   मार्केट  was  99  %  in   2008  .
PATA  remains   widely   प्रयुक्त  in  औद्योगिक   और  embedded  अनुप्रयोग   कि   उपयोग  CompactFlash  भंडार  , even  हालांकि   the  new  cfast  standard is  आधारित  on  sata  .
Serial  ata  industry  संगतता   विशेषताएँ   originate   इससे  The Serial ATA  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Organization ( aka .
SATA-IO ,  serialata.org   )  .
The SATA-IO  समूह   collaboratively   creates  , reviews  ,  ratifies  ,   और   publishes  the interoperability  विशेषताएँ  , the test cases  ,  and plug-fests .
as  with  अनेक   अन्य  industry compatibility standards  ,   the  SATA content ownership is transferred to other  उद्योग  bodies  :  primarily  the   incits  T13  उपसमिति   ata  , the INCITS  t10  subcommittee ( SCSI ) ;  a   subgroup  of  t10  responsible for Serial Attached  scsi   (   sas   )  .
the  complete specification from SATA-IO  .
the   शेष  of this article will try to  उपयोग   the   शब्दावली  and  विशेषताएँ   of  SATA-IO .
The history of the Internet began  साथ  the  विकास  of electronic  कंप्यूटर  in the 1950s .
the   पब्लिक   थी   पहला  introduced  to  the  अवधारणाओं  that would  सीसे  to  the   अंतरजाल  when  a  message  थी  sent  over  the ARPANet from computer  विज्ञान  Professor  लियोनार्ड  Kleinrock  's   प्रयोगशाला  at University of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ,  लॉस   एंजिल्स  (  ucla  )  ,   बाद   the   दूसरी   टुकड़ा   of  network equipment  थी   संस्थापित  at Stanford Research Institute (  श्री  )  .
पैकेट  switched networks such  as   arpanet   ,  Mark I  at   npl  in  the  UK  ,  CYCLADES  ,  Merit Network , Tymnet ,  और  Telenet , were developed in the late 1960s and early 1970s  using  a  किस्में   of  protocols  .
The ARPANET in  particular  led  to  the  विकास  of  प्रोटोकॉल  for internetworking  ,   in  which multiple separate networks  could  be  joined  together into a network  of  networks .
In  1982  ,  the   अंतरजाल  protocol  सुइट  ( TCP/IP ) was standardized  ,  and consequently , the concept  of   a  world-wide network  of  interconnected  tcp/ip   संजाल   ,  called the Internet  ,   थी   introduced  .
Access to the  arpanet  was expanded in  1981  when the  नेशनल  Science Foundation  (  NSF ) developed  the  Computer Science  संजाल   (   csnet   )  and again in 1986 when NSFNET  provided  access to supercomputer  साइट  in the  संयुक्त  States from research and  शिक्षा  organizations .
वाणिज्यिक   अंतरजाल  service providers (  isps   )  began to emerge in  the  late 1980s and  जल्दी  1990s .
The ARPANET was  decommissioned  in  1990   .
the  Internet  थी   commercialized  in  1995   जब  NSFNET was decommissioned  ,   निकालना  the last restrictions on the use of  the   अंतरजाल   to  carry  वाणिज्यिक  traffic .
Since the  mid-1990s   ,   the  Internet has  था  a  क्रांतिकारी   प्रभाव  on culture and commerce  ,  including the  वृद्धि   of  near-instant communication  by  electronic mail ,  तत्काल  messaging  ,  Voice  over  Internet Protocol  (   voip  ) ``  फोन   काल्स   ''  , two-way  इंटरैक्टिव  video calls ,  और  the World  चौड़ी  Web with its discussion  forums   ,  blogs  ,  social  नेटवर्किंग  , and online shopping  साइट   .
The  शोध  and  शिक्षा  community  continues  to  develop   और  use  उन्नत  networks such as NSF 's  बहुत  high speed Backbone Network Service  (   vbns  ) ,  internet2   ,  and National  lambdarail   .
increasing  amounts  of  data  हैं   transmitted  at  उच्चतर   और  higher speeds  over  fiber optic networks operating  at   1-gbit/s   ,  10-Gbit/s , or  अधिक   .
The Internet  's  takeover over  the  global communication  लैंडस्केप  was almost  तत्काल   in  historical  शर्तें  : it only  communicated  1  %  of  the   सूचना   बहती  through two-way telecommunications networks in  the   साल   1993   ,  already 51 % by  2000  , and more than 97 %  of  the telecommunicated  सूचना  by 2007  .
Today  the  Internet continues to grow  ,  driven by ever greater amounts  of   ऑनलाइन   सूचना   ,  commerce  ,  entertainment , and  सोशल  networking .

Boyle hinted that the album has a 1960s feel  ``   क्युकी  that  थी   [  her ]  era   ''  .

`` This Is Just To  कह  '' (  1934   )   is  a famous imagist poem by  विलियम  Carlos  विलियम्स  .
Professor  ऐल्बस   पर्सिवल  Wulfric Brian  डम्बल्डोर  is  a  major character and protagonist  of  J.  K.  Rowling  's   हैरी  Potter  श्रेणी  .
For  सबसे  of  the   श्रेणी   ,  he is the  हेडमास्टर  of the  wizarding  school Hogwarts  .
as   भाग  of his backstory , it is revealed that he  is  the founder  और  leader of  the  Order of the Phoenix ,  an  organisation dedicated  to   लड़   the  main  विपक्षी  of  the   श्रेणी   ,   रब   voldemort  .
Dumbledore is portrayed by Richard  हैरिस  in the film adaptions  of   हैरी  Potter and  the  Philosopher  's  Stone and Harry  कुम्हार  and the  कक्ष  of Secrets .
बाद  Harris '  मौत  , Michael Gambon portrayed  डम्बल्डोर  for  सब   of   the   बाकी   films  .
रोलिंग  stated  वो   chose  the name  डम्बल्डोर   ,   जिससे   is   an  Early Modern English  शब्द   लिये   ``   bumblebee   ``  , because of Dumbledore 's  प्रेम   of   म्यूज़िक   :   वो  imagined  उसे  walking around `` humming to himself  a   लॉट   ''  .
calcitonin  (  भी  known as thyrocalcitonin ) is  a   32-amino  acid linear polypeptide hormone that is  उत्पादित  in humans primarily by the parafollicular cells ( also known  as   c-cells  ) of  the   थायराइड   ,  and  in  many other animals in  the  ultimobranchial  देह   .
It  अधिनियमों   to  reduce blood calcium (  ca2+   )   ,  opposing the effects of parathyroid hormone (  pth   )   .
Calcitonin has  महरूम  found in fish , reptiles  ,  birds ,  और  mammals .
Its importance  in   इंसानो  has  नहीं   महरूम  as well  स्थापित  as  इसके   महत्व  in other  पशु  , as its function is usually  नहीं  significant  in   the  regulation of  सामान्य   कैल्सियम  homeostasis  .
it  belongs to  calcitonin-like   प्रोटीन  family  .
A mousepad with a padded wrist rest .
A  mousepad   (  US  )  or  चूहा  mat  (   uk   )  is  a  surface  लिये  placing  और  moving a computer  चूहा  .
A mousepad enhances  the   उपयोगिता   of  the  चूहा   compared  to using a  चूहा  directly on  a   तालिका  by  providing   a  surface to  allow   the   ट्रैकिंग   led  or  बॉल   (   in  former  मॉडल   )  to measure  गति   accurately   और   बगैर   जिटर  .
Some mousepads  बढ़ाएँ   ergonomics   by  providing  a  padded wrist  बाकी  .

The  riverfront  Stadium site in June ,  2006   .
इस  photo  थी  taken from the  पश्चिमी  concourse  of   ग्रेट  American  बॉल  Park .
A  छोटी  portion of  the  Riverfront Stadium site  is   अभी   occupied  by the Reds  '  Hall  of  Fame and  संग्रहालय   और  Main Street ,  जिससे  was extended  जब  the  नई   पार्क   थी   निर्मित  .
The  सिनसिनाटी  Bengals  '  Paul  भूरा   स्टेडियम  is  in   the   अलहदा   .
Riverfront Stadium (  1970–1995  )  ,   बाद   ज्ञात  as Cinergy  फ़ील्ड  ( 1996–2002 )  ,   थी   the  home  of   the  Cincinnati Reds  नेशनल   लीग   बेसबॉल   टोली  and  the   सिनसिनाटी  Bengals National  फ़ुटबॉल   लीग  team .
स्तिथ   on  the  ओहियो  River in  शहर   सिनसिनाटी  , the  स्टेडियम   थी   बेहतरीन  known as the home  of   ``  The  बिग  Red  यंत्र  `` , as the Reds were  प्रायः  called in  the  1970s .
Construction began  on  February  1  , 1968 , and was completed  at   a  cost of  कम   than  $ 50 million .
On  जून  30  ,  1970 ,  the  Reds hosted  the   अटलांटा  Braves in  उनके  grand opening ,  साथ  Hank Aaron hitting  the  first ever  घर  run at Riverfront  .
दो  weeks later  on   जुलाई  14 , 1970 , Riverfront  hosted  the  1970  Major  लीग   बेसबॉल  All-Star Game .
इस   खेल   is  best remembered for the often-replayed  टक्कर   at  home  थाली  between  लाल  star  पीट   रोज़  and catcher Ray  fosse  of  the   क्लीवलैंड   इंडियंस  .
In September 1996  ,  Riverfront  स्टेडियम  was renamed ``  cinergy   फ़ील्ड   ''   in  a  प्रायोजन  deal with Greater Cincinnati 's energy  कम्पनी  ,  cinergy  Corporation .
In  2001  , to  मेक   रूम   लिये   ग्रेट   अमरीकी   बॉल   पार्क   ,  the seating  क्षमता   at  Cinergy  फ़ील्ड   थी  reduced  to  39,000 .
There was a  विशाल   वॉल  in  बीच  Field visible after  the   renovations   ,  to serve  as  the  बैटर   's   नजर  .
The stadium  थी  demolished by implosion on December 29 , 2002  .
Nexen Tire is  a  tire manufacturer  ,   headquartered  in  yangsan  , South Gyeongsang Province , and Seoul ,  दोनो   in   दक्षिण  Korea  .
Its major domestic competitors  हैं  Hankook Tire and  kumho   टायर  .
The  कम्पनी  's name  is   reflected  in  the  company slogan ,  ``   अगला   सदी   टायर   .  ''
The  मूक  majority is an  अनिर्दिष्ट   विशाल  majority  of  people in a country or  समूह   जो  do not express their opinions  सरेआम  .
the  term was popularized  (  though  नहीं   पहला  used  )   by  U.S. President Richard Nixon  in  a November 3  ,   1969  ,  वाक   in   जिससे  he said  ,   ``  And so tonight—to you  ,  the  ग्रेट  silent majority  of   my   fellow   americans—i   पूछो  for your support  .  ''
in  this usage it referred  to   those  Americans  जो  did not  जुड़ें  in the  विशाल   demonstrations   विरूद्ध  the Vietnam War  at   the   समय  , who did  नहीं   जुड़ें   in  the  counterculture  ,  और   जो  did  नहीं   participate  in public discourse  .
Nixon  साथ   साथ  many others saw  इस   समूह  of Middle  अमेरिकी   as   होने   निष्प्रभ   in   the   मीडिया  by  the  more vocal minority .
the  phrase  थी   प्रयुक्त   in   the  19th  सदी  as a  प्रेयोक्ति   referring  to all  the  people who  have   died  , and  अन्य  have  प्रयुक्त  it before  और   बाद  Nixon to refer to  समूह  of  मतदाता   in  various  राष्ट्र  of the  संसार   .
Sam ,  a  rhesus monkey , flew to an  ऊँचाई   of  88  km   in   1959   .
(  NASA  )
Before  इंसानो  went  into   स्पेस   ,   अनेक  animals  यहूद  launched into space ,  सहित   numerous  monkeys , so that  वैज्ञानिकों  could investigate the  biological  effects of  स्पेस  travel .
The United  राज्य   शुभारम्भ   फ़्लाइट  containing  primate   कार्गो  primarily between 1948-1961 with one flight  in  1969 and one in 1985  .
फ़्रांस   शुभारम्भ  two monkey-carrying flights  in   1967   .
the  Soviet Union  और  Russia launched  बंदरों   between  1983  और  1996  .
Most monkeys  यहूद   anesthetized  before lift-off .
overall  thirty-two monkeys flew in  the  space program ; none flew  अधिक  than once  .
Numerous  back-up  monkeys  भी  went  through  the programs but  never  flew  .
Monkeys from several species were  प्रयुक्त  , including rhesus  बंदरों  ,  cynomolgus  monkeys , squirrel  बंदरों   ,  and  pig-tailed  macaques .
Some  chimpanzees   (  which are apes rather than monkeys  )  were also used .
रेड   (  redundant array of independent disks ,  originally  redundant array of  inexpensive  disks ) is a  भंडार  technology that combines multiple disk drive components  into   a   लॉजिकल  unit .
Data  is  distributed across  the  drives in one  of  several ways  पुकारा  ``  रेड  levels  ''  , depending on the level of redundancy and  प्रदर्शन  required  .
the  term  ``   रेड  ''  थी  first defined by  दाउद   पैटरसन   ,   garth  A. Gibson  ,   और  Randy  katz   at   the  University of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,   बर्कली  in  1987  .
Marketers representing  उद्योग  RAID manufacturers later attempted to  reinvent  the term to describe a  अनावश्यक  array of  स्वतंत्र  disks as a means  of   disassociating  a  low-cost  expectation from  रेड   प्रौद्योगिकी   .
RAID  is   अभी  used as  an  umbrella term for computer data storage  योजनाएं  that can  divide   और   replicate  data  among  multiple  शारीरिक   ड्राइव   :  RAID is  an  example  of  storage  आभासीकरण   और  the  सरणी  can be accessed by the operating  प्रणाली   as  one  सिंगल   ड्राइव   .
the   अलग  schemes  or   architectures   हैं   नामित   by   the  word RAID followed  by  a number ( e.g . RAID  0   ,   रेड   1   )  .
प्रत्येक  scheme provides  a   अलग   संतुलन  between the key goals  :   विश्वसनीयता  and  उपलब्धता  , performance  और  capacity  .
RAID levels greater than  रेड  0 provide  सुरक्षा  against  unrecoverable  ( sector  )  read  त्रुटियाँ   ,   as   खूब  as  पूरे  disk failure  .
A lymphocyte is a type  of   श्वेत   रक्त  cell  in  the  vertebrate  immune system .
Under  the  microscope , lymphocytes  can  be divided into large lymphocytes and small lymphocytes .
विशाल   granular   lymphocytes   शामिल   प्राकृतिक  killer  कोशिकाएं  (  nk   कोशिकाएं  ) .
Small lymphocytes  consist  of T cells and  b  cells .
The  बिग  Lebowski  is   a  1998 dark  कॉमेडी  film written and directed by Joel and Ethan Coen .
Jeff Bridges stars as  जेफ़  Lebowski  ,  an  बेरोजगार  Los  एंजिल्स   slacker  and  avid  bowler , nicknamed  ``  The Dude  .   ''
After a case  of  mistaken  पहचान  , The Dude  is   introduced   to  a millionaire also named Jeffrey Lebowski .
When the millionaire  lebowski   's   ट्रॉफी  wife is  बाद   kidnapped   ,  he commissions The  यार   to  deliver  the  ransom  to  secure her  रिलीज  .
The  योजना  goes awry when The Dude  's   dost  Walter  sobchak  ( John Goodman )  योजनाएं   to   रखना   the  full ransom  .
स्टीव  Buscemi , Philip  seymour  Hoffman  ,   दाउद  Huddleston ,  julianne  Moore  ,  Tara  reid  ,  और   जॉन  Turturro  भी  star  in   the   फिल्मी  , which is narrated by a cowboy known only  as  `` The Stranger ''  ,   निभाई   by   sam   elliott   .
The film  is   loosely  inspired  by  the  कार्य  of  रेमंड   चांडलर   .
Joel Coen  stated   :   ``   we   चाही  to  do  a Chandler  दयालु   of   स्टोरी   –   कैसा  it moves episodically  ,  and deals  साथ  the  वर्ण  trying  to  unravel a mystery ,  as  well as having a hopelessly complex  प्लाट  that  's  ultimately  महत्वहीन  .  ''
The  असली  score was  रचित  by Carter  burwell  ,  a   longtime  collaborator of  the  Coen  भाइयो  .
The  बिग  Lebowski  थी   a  disappointment  at  the  u.S.  box  दफ्तर  and  प्राप्त  mixed  समीक्षाएँ  at the  समय   of  its  रिलीज   .
Reviews  have  trended  towards   the  positive over time  ,  and the film  रै  become  a  cult  पसंदीदा   ,  noted for  इसके  idiosyncratic characters  ,   सपना   sequences  , unconventional dialogue , and  eclectic  soundtrack .
सेवेरस  Snape  is   a  fictional  अक्षर   in   the   हैरी  Potter book  श्रेणी  written by J.K.  रोलिंग   .
In the first novel  of  the series , he is hostile  toward  Harry  और  is built up  to  be the  प्राथमिक  antagonist until the final  अध्याय  .
As  the   श्रेणी  progresses , Snape  's  character becomes  अधिक  layered  और  complex  .
रोलिंग  does not  fully  reveal the  विवरण  of his true  loyalties  until the  समाप्त   of   the  final  किताब  ,  हैरी   कुम्हार   और  the Deathly Hallows .
over   the  course  of   the   श्रेणी  , Snape  's  portrayal  evolves   इससे   कि   of   a   दुर्भावनापूर्ण  and  दलगत   टीचर   to   कि   of  a pivotal character of considerable complexity and  moral   ambiguity   .
Snape primarily teaches Potions at  हॉग्वार्ट्स  , though in  the   छठे   अनोखा   he  teaches  रक्षा  Against the  अंधेरा   कला  , a  स्थिति   जिससे  he  थी  known  to   have  desired throughout the  श्रेणी   .
He  ultimately  becomes  हेडमास्टर  of  हॉग्वार्ट्स  in the  फाइनल  novel .
Rowling has  वर्णित  him  as   ``   a   तोहफा   of  a character '' .
grits   refers  to  a   ground-corn   खाना  of Native  अमरीकी  origin  ,   कि   is   आम  in the Southern United States and mainly eaten at  नाश्ता   .
आधुनिक   grits  are commonly  बना   of   alkali-treated  corn known as  hominy   .
Grits are similar  to  other  मोटा  maize-based porridges  इससे   around  the world such  as  polenta  or  the thinner farina .
`` Instant grits  ''  have been processed to  गति   कुकिंग  .
the  word  ``   grits  ''  गर्भाशयी   इससे   the   बूढ़ा  English  शब्द  ``  grytt  , '' meaning  coarse   भोजन  .
इस  word originally referred to  गेहूं  and other  porridges  now known  as   groats  in parts of  the  U.K..
Maize ,  अनजान   in   यूरोपीय  in the Middle Ages  ,   is   a  food derived from  मकई  ( a New World plant )  और   ``  corn  ''  had  महरूम   प्रयुक्त   to  describe wheat products in many  यूरोपीय  regions .
`` Grits ''  may   be   either  singular  or  plural  ;  historically ,  in   the   अमरीकी  South  the  word  थी   invariably   एकवचन  notwithstanding its plural  रूप   (  cf  .   ऐसे  food  names   as  ``  स्पघेटी   ''  or  ``  linguine '' , likewise plural in  रूप  , but singular in use  )   .
Sometimes  ,  grits  हैं  called  sofkee   or  sofkey (  इससे   a   देशी  American Muskogee word ) .
in  molecular biology  ,   इंसान  chorionic gonadotropin  (  hCG )  is  a hormone produced  by  the fertilized egg after conception .
बाद  during pregnancy  it   is  made  by   the  developing placenta  ,  and  बाद  by  the  placental component  syncytiotrophoblast  .
कुछ  cancerous tumors produce  इस   हार्मोन   ;   इसलिए  , elevated levels  measured  when the patient  is  not  गर्भवती  can  सीसे  to  a  cancer  निदान  .
However , it  is   नहीं  known whether this  उत्पादन  is a contributing cause or an effect  of  tumorigenesis .
The pituitary analogue  of  hCG  ,  known as luteinizing hormone  (  LH )  ,  is produced  in  the  pituitary   ग्रंथि  of males and  महिलाओं  of all ages  .
,   the   एफडीए  has prohibited the sale of ``  होम्योपैथिक   ''  and over the  काउंटर  hCG  आहार   उत्पाद  and  घोषित   उन्हें   बेईमान   और   illegal  .
The Las Vegas Strip World  of   coca-cola  museum in 2003
Coca-Cola is a  कार्बोनेटेड   नरम   पेय   बेची   in   स्टोर्स  , restaurants , and  वेंडिंग   मशीने  in  प्रत्येक   देश  except Cuba and North  कोरियाई   .
It  is  produced  by  The Coca-Cola  कम्पनी  of Atlanta , Georgia  ,  and is often referred  to   बस  as  कोक  (  a  registered trademark  of  The Coca-Cola Company in  the  United States  चूंकि   कूच   27   ,   1944  ) .
Originally intended  as  a patent medicine when it  थी  invented in the late  19th  century by John Pemberton ,  coca-cola  was  खरीदा  out by businessman  asa  Griggs  candler  , whose marketing  tactics  led Coke to  इसके  dominance  of  the  संसार  soft-drink  मार्केट   throughout   the  20th  सदी  .
the  company  produces  concentrate , which  is  then sold  to  licensed  coca-cola  bottlers  throughout  the  संसार  .
The bottlers  ,   जो  hold  territorially  exclusive contracts with the company , produce finished product in  डिब्बे   और  bottles from the  concentrate   in  combination  साथ  filtered water and sweeteners .
The bottlers then sell , distribute  और  merchandise Coca-Cola to  खुदरा  stores  और  vending  मशीने  .
Such  bottlers   शामिल  Coca-Cola Enterprises , which is the  largest  single Coca-Cola  bottler  in  उत्तर  America and western Europe .
the   coca-cola  Company also  बिकता  concentrate  लिये   सोडा   स्रोतों  to  प्रमुख   रेस्तरां   और   खाना  service distributors .
The Coca-Cola  कम्पनी   रै  , on occasion ,  introduced   अन्य   कोला   पेय  under the Coke brand  नाम   .
the  most  आम  of  ये  is Diet  कोक   ,  with  अन्य  including  caffeine-free  Coca-Cola ,  आहार   कोक  Caffeine-Free ,  coca-cola  Cherry , Coca-Cola  शून्य  , Coca-Cola  वैनिला   ,   और  special  संस्करण  with  नीबू  ,  लाइम   or  coffee .
Based on  interbrand   's   बेहतरीन   वैश्विक  brand 2011 ,  coca-cola  was  the  world 's most  मूल्यवान  brand .
an   ombudsman  is an  आधिकारिक  , usually appointed by the government  or  by parliament  लकिन   साथ  a significant degree  of  independence  ,  who is  चार्ज  with representing  the  interests  of  the  पब्लिक  by  investigating   और   संबोधित   शिकायत  of maladministration  or  violation  of  rights .
in  some countries an Inspector  सामान्य   ,  Citizen  एडवोकेट   or   अन्य  official  may  have duties  समान  to those of a national ombudsman , and may also be appointed  by  the legislature .
Below the national level an ombudsman may  be   नियुक्त  by a  राज्य  ,  लोकल  or  नगरपालिका  government  ,  and unofficial ombudsmen may be appointed  by   ,  or even  कार्य  for ,  a  corporation  ऐसे   as  a utility supplier or  a   समाचारपत्र  , for  an  NGO ,  or   लिये   a   पेशेवर   नियामक  body .
whether   नियुक्त  by  the  legislature , the executive ,  or  an  संगठन   (  or  ,   कम   अक्सर   ,  elected by the constituency  कि   he   or   वो   serves   )   ,   the  typical  कर्तव्य  of  an  ombudsman are to  investigate  complaints and attempt  to  resolve  उन्हें  , usually  through  recommendations ( binding or not ) or  मध्यस्थता  .
ombudsmen   sometimes  also aim to  पहचानो  systemic  मुद्दे   अग्रणी  to poor service  or  breaches of people 's rights .
at  the national level , most ombudsmen have  a  wide mandate to deal with  the   संपूर्ण  public sector , and  sometimes   भी   तत्व  of  the  private sector (  लिये  example ,  contracted   सेवा  providers  )   .
in   कुछ  cases ,  वहीँ  is a  अधिक   प्रतिबंधित  mandate , for example with particular  सेक्टर   of   समाज  .
More  हाल  developments  have  included the creation  of  specialised Children 's Ombudsman  और  Information Commissioner agencies .
in   कुछ   jurisdictions  an  ombudsman   चार्ज  with the handling of  चिंताएं   परिचय  national government  is   अधिक  formally referred  to  as  the  `` Parliamentary Commissioner '' ( e.g  .  the United Kingdom  संसदीय  Commissioner for Administration , and  the  Western Australian  राज्य  Ombudsman  )   .
in  many  देशों  where the  ombudsman  's remit extends  परे   dealing  with  कथित  maladministration to  promoting  and  protecting  human  अधिकारों  , the  ombudsman  is  recognised   as  the national human rights institution  .
the  post  of   ombudsman   था  by the  समाप्त  of  the  20th  सदी  been instituted  by   सबसे  governments  और  by some  intergovernmental  organizations  ऐसे   as  the  यूरोपीय  Union .
Making  a  complaint to an ombudsman is  प्रायः  free of  चार्ज  .
