New  इंग्लैण्ड  is  a  region in the  northeastern  corner of the United States consisting of  the   छह   राज्य  of Maine  ,   नई  Hampshire  ,  Vermont ,  मैसाचुसेट्स  , Rhode  द्वीप  ,  और  Connecticut .
New England is bordered by  नई   यॉर्क  state  to   the   दक्षिणपश्चिम   ,   क्यूबेक  to  the   उत्तरपश्चिम  , and New  ब्रंसविक  and  the   अटलांटिक  Ocean to  the  east .
in   एक   of  the earliest English settlements in North America , Pilgrims  इससे  England first settled in New England in 1620  ,  to form Plymouth  उपनिवेश  .
टेन  years later  ,   the   puritans   settled  north of  plymouth  Colony in Boston  ,  thus  forming  Massachusetts Bay  उपनिवेश  .
Over  the   अगला   130   सालो   ,  New England  लड़ा  in four French and Indian  युद्धों   ,   जबतक  the  अंग्रेजों  defeated  the  French and their  देशी   allies   in   उत्तर  America .
in  the late 18th  सदी  ,  the  New  इंग्लैण्ड  Colonies initiated  the  resistance  to  the  अंग्रेजों  Parliament 's  प्रयत्न  to impose  नई  taxes without  the  consent  of  the  colonists  .
The  बोस्टन  Tea Party was  a  protest to  जिससे   ग्रेट  Britain  responded   साथ  a  श्रेणी  of  दंडात्मक   कानून  stripping  मैसाचुसेट्स  of  self-government  ,  जिससे   यहूद   termed  the `` Intolerable Acts  ``  by the colonists  .
The confrontation  led  to open  warfare   in  1775  ,   the  expulsion of the  अंग्रेजों  authorities  इससे  New  इंग्लैण्ड   in  spring 1776 ,  और  the Declaration of  स्वतंत्रता   in  July 1776 .
Some  of  the  पहला   आंदोलनों  of American  साहित्य   ,   दर्शनशास्त्र  ,  और  education  originated  in  नई   इंग्लैण्ड   .
the  region  निभाई  a prominent  भूमिका   in  the  गति   to  abolish  गुलामी  , and  थी  the first region of  the  United States to  be  transformed by the Industrial Revolution .
आज   ,  New  इंग्लैण्ड  is  a  major  संसार   बीच   of  education ,  ऊँची   प्रौद्योगिकी  , insurance , and medicine .
Boston is its cultural ,  वित्तीय   ,  educational  ,  medical and  परिवहन  center .
प्रत्येक  state is principally  subdivided  into small  incorporated  municipalities  ज्ञात   as   नई   इंग्लैण्ड   कस्बों  ,  जिससे   हैं  often  governed   by  town meeting .
The  तभी  unincorporated  territory  in New England exists in  the  sparse , northern regions  of   वर्मांट   ,   नई   हैम्पशायर  ,  और   maine  .
Since 1970 , voters have more  प्रायः  supported  उदार   उम्मीदवार  at the state and federal  स्तर  than  those  of  कोई  other region  in   the  United  राज्य  .
नई  England is  the  only  एक   of   the  United States Census Bureau 's  नौ  regional divisions  जिनकी  name does  नहीं  derive  इससे   इसके   भूगोल   ,  and it is  the  only  multi-state   प्रदेश   साथ   साफ   ,   सतत  boundaries .
it   maintains   a   दमदार   भाव   of  cultural  पहचान   नियत  apart from the  बाकी  of  the  country , although the  शर्तें  of this  पहचान   हैं  often contested ,  combining   puritanism   साथ  liberalism ,  कृषिक   जीवन   साथ   उद्योग   ,   और  isolation with  आव्रजन  .
आपात  !
is an  अमरीकी  television  श्रेणी   कि   combines  the medical  नाटक  and  action-adventure   जाति   .
It was  उत्पादित  by Mark VII Limited and distributed by Universal  studios  .
It  debuted   as   a  midseason  बदलना   on   जनवरी  15 , 1972 ,  on   एनबीसी   ,   replacing   the  two  short-lived   श्रेणी   the   साझेदार  and  the   शुभ  Life  ,  and ran until  सितंबर   3   ,  1977 , with six  अतिरिक्त  two-hour  टेलीविज़न   films  during the following  दो   सालो   .
Emergency !
was  निर्मित  and produced  by  Jack Webb and  रॉबर्ट   A.   cinader  , both  of   जिसको  were  भी   जिम्मेदार   लिये  the police dramas Adam-12 and Dragnet .
The Eastern Time Zone  (   et   )   encompasses   17  U.S. states  in   the   पूर्वी  part of the contiguous  संयुक्त  States , parts  of  Canada  और  three  देशों   in  South America .
Places that use Eastern Standard Time (  est  )  जब   observing  standard time  (  autumn/winter ) are 5 hours behind  समन्वित  Universal Time  (  )  .
Eastern Daylight  समय  (  edt   )  ,  जब  observing  daylight   छायांकन   समय   (  spring/summer )  is   4   घंटों  behind  समन्वित  Universal  समय  ( ) .
in  the  उत्तरी  parts  of  the time  मण्डल  ,  दौरान  the  दूसरी   संडे  in March ,  at   2:00  a.m. EST  ,  clocks are  उन्नत  to 3:00  a.m.   edt  leaving a  एक  hour `` gap  .   ''
During the first Sunday in November  ,  at 2:00  a.m.  EDT  ,  clocks  हैं  moved back  to  1:00 a.m. EST , thus `` duplicating  ''   एक  hour .
दक्षिणी  parts  of   the   मण्डल  (  पनामा  and the  caribbean   )   do  not observe daylight saving  .
Standard form  of  the periodic table .
the   रंगों  represent different categories  of  elements explained  नीचे   .
The periodic  तालिका  is a tabular  प्रदर्शक   of   the  chemical  तत्व   ,  organized on the basis of their atomic numbers  ,  electron  configurations   ,  and  पुनरावर्ती   रासायनिक   गुण  .
Elements are  प्रस्तुत   in   अनुक्रम  of  increasing   परमाणु   क्रमांक  ( number  of  protons ) .
the  standard form  of  table comprises an 18 × 7 grid  or   प्रमुख   देह  of elements  ,  positioned above a smaller double row  of  elements .
the   तालिका  can also  be  deconstructed into four rectangular  ब्लॉक   :  the  s-block  to the left ,  the   p-block  to  the  right , the d-block in the middle  ,  and the  f-block  below that .
The  पंक्ति   of  the  तालिका   हैं  called periods ;  the  columns  of  the s- , d- ,  और  p-blocks  हैं  called groups , with some of these  having   names   ऐसे   as  the  हैलोजन्स  or the noble  गैसों  .
Since  ,   by  definition , a periodic table incorporates recurring trends , any such table can be  प्रयुक्त  to derive  संबंध   between  the  गुण   of   the  elements  और   भविष्यवाणी   the   गुण  of  नई   ,  yet to be discovered  or   synthesized  , elements .
as  a  परिणाम  , a periodic table—whether in  the  standard form or some  अन्य   variant—provides  a  उपयोगी  framework  लिये  analyzing chemical  बर्ताव  , and such tables are widely  प्रयुक्त  in  रसायन  and  अन्य   sciences   .
Although precursors exist , Dmitri  mendeleev   is  generally  credited  with  the   प्रकाशन   ,  in 1869 , of the  पहला  widely recognized periodic table .
He developed  उसके   तालिका  to illustrate periodic  रुझान  in the properties  of  the  then-known   तत्व  .
mendeleev  also  पूर्वानुमानित  some properties  of   then-unknown  elements that  होता  be expected to  भरण  gaps in this table .
सबसे  of his predictions were proved correct when the elements  in  question were  subsequently   खोजा  .
mendeleev  's  आवधिक  table has since been expanded and refined with the discovery or synthesis of  further  new elements  और  the  विकास  of  नई  theoretical models to explain  रासायनिक   बर्ताव  .
All elements from  परमाणु   संख्याएँ  1 (  हाइड्रोजन   )  to 118 ( ununoctium )  have   महरूम  discovered  or  synthesized  .
the  elements  इससे  1  to  98 ( californium )  have   महरूम  found to  मौजूद   naturally   ,  although some are found only in trace  amounts  and  यहूद   initially  discovered  by  synthesis in laboratories .
The elements after 98 have only  महरूम   synthesized  in laboratories .
Production of elements beyond  ununoctium   is  being  धड़ा  , with the question  of  how the  आवधिक  table  may  need to  be   परिवर्धित  to accommodate any such additions being  a   पदार्थ   of  ongoing debate .
numerous  synthetic radionuclides  of  naturally  occurring   तत्व  have also  महरूम  produced in laboratories .
minecraft   is  a sandbox indie  खेल  originally created  by   स्वीडिश  programmer Markus `` Notch ''  persson  and later developed  और  published  by   mojang  .
It was publicly  released   लिये   the  PC on May 17  ,  2009  ,  as a  developmental   अल्फा   संस्करण   और  , after gradual updates , was published as a full  रिलीज  version on November  18   ,  2011 .
A version for  एंड्रॉइड   थी  released a month  पहले   on  October 7 ,  और  an iOS version was released  on   नवम्बर  17  ,   2011  .
on  May 9 , 2012 ,  the   खेल  was  released   on  Xbox 360  as   an   एक्सबॉक्स   सजीव  Arcade  खेल  , co-developed by 4J Studios  .
All versions of Minecraft receive  आवधिक   अद्यतन  .
the   रचनात्मक  and building aspects  of   minecraft  allow players  to  build constructions out of textured cubes  in  a  3d   procedurally  generated world .
Other activities  in   the  game include  खोजी  ,  महफ़िल  resources , crafting  और  combat  .
gameplay  in its commercial release has two principal  मोड्स  : survival , which  requires  players  to  acquire resources and maintain their health and hunger ;  और  creative  ,   जहाँ  players  have  an unlimited supply of resources  ,   the  ability  to  fly  ,   और  no  स्वास्थ्य   or  hunger  .
A third gameplay mode  नामित  hardcore is  the  same as  अस्तित्व  , differing only in difficulty  ;   it  is set  to   hardest   सेटिंग  and  respawning  is disabled ,  forcing  players to delete their worlds  upon   मौत  .
Minecraft  प्राप्त  five awards  इससे  the 2011  खेल   डेवलपर   सम्मेलन  :  it   थी   awarded  the Innovation  पुरस्कार   ,   बेहतरीन  Downloadable  खेल  Award , and the  बेहतरीन  Debut  खेल   पुरस्कार   इससे  the Game Developers Choice Awards ;  और   the   दर्शक  Award ,  as   खूब   as  the  seumas  McNally Grand  पुरस्कार  , from the  स्वतंत्र   खेल  Festival in 2011 .
in  2012  ,   minecraft  was awarded  a  Golden Joystick Award in the category Best Downloadable Game  .
As of  अप्रैल  8 , 2013  ,   the  game has  बेची  over 10 million  नक़ल  on PC  और   as   of   जनवरी  22 ,  2013   ,   over  20 million  नक़ल  across  सब  platforms .
The Dark  नाईट  is a  2008   british-american   सुपरहीरो   फिल्मी   निर्देशित  , produced , and  co-written  by  क्रिस्टोफर  Nolan .
Based on the DC Comics character Batman ,  the   फिल्मी   is  the second  भाग  of Nolan 's  बैटमैन  film  श्रेणी  and  a   sequel   to   2005  's Batman Begins  .
ईसाई  Bale  reprises  the lead  भूमिका   of   ब्रूस  Wayne/Batman , with  a  returning cast  of  Michael  caine   as  Alfred  pennyworth  , Gary Oldman  as   जेम्स  Gordon  और  Morgan Freeman as Lucius  फॉक्स  .
the  film  introduces   the   अक्षर  of Harvey Dent ( Aaron  eckhart  )  ,  Gotham 's newly elected  ज़िला   attorney  and the consort of Bruce Wayne 's childhood friend Rachel Dawes  (   मैगी  Gyllenhaal  )   ,   जो  joins Batman  और   the   पुलिस   in   combating   the   नई   उठती  threat  of  a  दण्ड   मास्टरमाइंड  calling  खुद   ``   the   जोकर   ``   (   झाड़  Ledger  )   .
Nolan 's  प्रेरणा   लिये  the film was the  जोकर   's  comic book  डेब्यू   in   1940   ,   the  1988 graphic novel  ,  and  the  1996  श्रेणी   ,   जिससे   retold  Two-Face  's  origin  .
the  nickname `` the Dark Knight '' was first applied to Batman in Batman No  .  1  (  1940 ) ,  in  a story written  by   विधेयक  Finger .
the  Dark Knight was filmed primarily  in   शिकागो   ,  as  खूब  as  in  several  अन्य  locations in  the  United States  ,   the   संयुक्त  Kingdom  ,   और   हांग   काँग   .
नोलन   प्रयुक्त  an  imax   कैमरा   to   फिल्मी   कुछ  sequences  ,   सहित   the   जोकर   's   पहला   रूप   in  the film  .
On  जनवरी  22 ,  2008   ,  some  महीने   बाद  he had completed filming on  the  Dark  नाईट   और  six months  पहले  the film  's  release , Heath Ledger  died  from a toxic combination of prescription  दवाएँ  , leading  to  intense  ध्यान  from  the  press  और  movie-going  पब्लिक  .
warner  Bros. had initially created a viral marketing campaign for The  अंधेरा   नाईट   ,   विकासशील   promotional   वेबसाइटों   और   trailers   highlighting   स्क्रीन  shots of Ledger  as  the Joker , but after Ledger  's   मौत  ,  the  studio refocused its promotional campaign .
The  अंधेरा  Knight  थी   released   on  July 16 ,  2008  in Australia  ,  on  जुलाई   18  ,  2008   in  North America ,  और   on   जुलाई  24 ,  2008  in the  संयुक्त   किंगडम  .
Considered  एक   of  the  बेहतरीन  films of the 2000s and  एक  of  the   बेहतरीन  superhero films ever made , the film received highly positive reviews and  नियत   numerous   रिकॉर्ड  during its  नाट्य   चलाएं   .
साथ  over $  1   अरब  in revenue  विश्वव्यापी   ,  it is the 14th-highest-grossing film of  सब  time ,  unadjusted  for inflation  .
The film  प्राप्त  eight Academy Award  nominations  ;  it  won the award  लिये  Best  ध्वनि  Editing and Ledger  थी  posthumously  awarded   बेहतरीन  Supporting  कर्ता  .
the  Dark  नाईट  Rises ,  the   फाइनल  part  of  the trilogy , was  released  on  जुलाई  20 ,  2012  .
the  timeline of radio  सूचियाँ   भीतर  the  इतिहास  of  रेडियो   ,  the technology and events that  उत्पादित  instruments that  उपयोग   रेडियो   लहरें  and  क्रियाएँ   कि  people undertook .
Later  ,  the  इतिहास  is  वर्चस्व   by  programming and  सामग्री   ,   जिससे   is   करीब  to general history  .
the   सिडनी   ओपेरा  House  is  a multi-venue  performing  arts centre in  नई  South Wales  ,  Australia  .
It  थी   conceived  and largely built by  डैनिश  architect Jørn Utzon  ,  opening  in   1973  after  a   long  gestation  कि   began   साथ  his competition-winning design in 1957  .
Joseph  काहिल  's New South Wales Government gave the  go-ahead  for work to  शुरू   in  1958  .
The government 's  बिंदास  decision to  चुनें   utzon   's   डिज़ाइन  is  प्रायः  overshadowed by the scandal  कि   followed   .
it  is  on   bennelong  Point  in   सिडनी  Harbour , close  to  the Sydney Harbour Bridge  .
it  sits  at   the  northeastern  टिप   of  the Sydney central business  ज़िला   (  the  सीबीडी  ) ,  घिरी   on  three sides by the  harbour   (   सिडनी  Cove and Farm  कोव  ) and inland by the  royal  Botanic Gardens .
contrary   to  its name , it houses multiple performance venues  .
it  is among the busiest  performing  arts  केंद्रों   in  the world , hosting over 1,500  प्रदर्शन  each  साल  attended  by  some 1.2  लाख   लोगों  .
It provides a  स्थान  for  अनेक  performing-arts  कंपनियाँ  , including  the  four key  निवासी   कंपनियाँ  Opera Australia ,  the   ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  Ballet , the Sydney Theatre  कम्पनी  and  the  Sydney Symphony Orchestra  ,   और   presents   a   चौड़ी   दायरा   of   प्रोडक्शन्स  on its  अपना  account .
it   is  also one  of  the most popular visitor  आकर्षण  in Australia  ,  with more than seven  लाख  people  visiting  each year  ,  300,000 of whom take a guided tour .
It is  administered  by  the  Sydney  ओपेरा  House Trust , under  the  New  दक्षिण   वेल्स  Ministry of the  कला  .
On  28   जून  2007 , it  थी  made a  युनेस्को  World  विरासत  Site .
it   is  one  of  the 20th  सदी  's  सबसे  distinctive buildings  और  one of  the   सबसे  famous  performing  arts centres in the world  .
a   आलेख   of  body mass index as  a   फलन  of body mass and  देह   ऊँचाई  is  दिखाया  above .
the  dashed  लाइनों  represent  subdivisions  within  a  major  क्लास  .
लिये   उदाहरण  the ``  underweight  ''  वर्गीकरण  is  further  divided into  ``  severe  ''  , `` moderate ''  ,  and  ``  mild '' subclasses  .
The  देह  mass index  (   बीएमआई   )  , or  quetelet  index , is  a  measure for human  देह  shape based  on   an  individual 's weight and  ऊँचाई  .
It was  devised  between 1830  और   1850  by the  belgian  polymath Adolphe Quetelet during  the  course of developing ``  सोशल  physics  ''   .
देह   द्रव्यमान   अनुक्रमणिका   is  defined  as   the  individual 's body  द्रव्यमान   विभाजित   by  the  वर्गाकार   of  their height .
The formulae  universally  used  in   आयुर्विज्ञान   उपज  a unit of measure of kg/m2 .
बीएमआई  can also  be   संकल्पित  using  a   बीएमआई  chart  ,  which displays  बीएमआई  as  a  function of weight (  आड़ा  axis ) and height (  लंबवत  axis ) using contour  लाइनों  for different values of  बीएमआई  or colors  लिये   अलग   बीएमआई   श्रेणी  .
† The factor for  uk/us  units  is  more precisely  703.06957964  ,  लकिन  that  स्तर   of  precision  is  not meaningful for this  गणना  .
To work from stone and pounds first multiply the  स्टोन  by  14  then add the  पाउंड   to   दे   the   पूरे   द्रव्यमान   in  pounds ;  to  work from  फीट   और  inches first multiply the feet by 12  तब  add the inches to  दे   the  whole height  in  inches  .
Thomas  paine   (   जनवरी   29  , 1737  (   ns   फ़रवरी  9 ,  1737  )  –  June 8 , 1809  )  was  an  English-American political activist , author , political  theorist  and revolutionary .
as   the   लेखक  of  दो   अत्यधिक  influential pamphlets  at  the  प्रारंभ   of  the American  क्रान्ति  ,  he  inspired the Patriots in 1776 to  घोषित   स्वतंत्रता  from Britain .
His  विचार  reflected  आत्मज्ञान   era   बयानबाजी  of  transnational   इंसान   अधिकारों  .
He has  महरूम   पुकारा  `` a corsetmaker  by   व्यापार   ,   a   पत्रकार   by  profession ,  और   a  propagandist by inclination  .  ''
born  in  thetford  ,  इंग्लैण्ड  , in the county of  नॉर्फ़ोक   ,  Paine emigrated to the British  अमरीकी   colonies  in 1774  साथ   the  help  of   बेंजामिन   फ्रैंकलिन   और  he  arrived  in time to  participate  in  the  American  क्रान्ति  .
उसके  principal contributions  यहूद   the  powerful , widely read pamphlet Common Sense  (  1776  )  , the all-time  best-selling   अमरीकी  book that advocated  औपनिवेशिक  America 's  स्वतंत्रता  from  the   किंगडम  of Great  ब्रिटेन  , and The  अमरीकी  Crisis (  1776–83   )   ,  a pro-revolutionary  pamphlet   श्रेणी  .
Common  भाव  was  so  influential that  जॉन  Adams said ,  ``  Without the pen of  the  author of Common Sense , the sword of Washington  होता   have   महरूम  raised in vain.”
paine  lived in  फ़्रांस   लिये   सबसे   of   the  1790s  ,  becoming deeply  शामिल  in  the  French Revolution .
He wrote the  अधिकारों  of  man  ( 1791  )  ,  in  part  a  defence of the French Revolution  विरूद्ध  its critics .
His attacks on  अंग्रेजों  writer  एडमंड   बुर्के  led  to  a trial and conviction in  absentia   in  1792 for  the   अपराधों   of  seditious libel .
in  1792 , despite not  होने  able  to  speak French  ,  he was elected to the French National Convention .
The  girondists  regarded  उसे   as  an ally .
नतीजतन   ,  the  montagnards   ,   विशेषकर   robespierre   ,   regarded   उसे   as  an  दुश्मन   .
In December  1793   ,  he  थी   गिरफ्तार  and imprisoned in Paris  ,   तब  released  in  1794 .
he  became  बदनाम   क्युकी  of The Age  of   कारण  ( 1793–94  )  ,  उसके   किताब  that advocates deism , promotes reason  और   freethinking  , and argues  विरूद्ध  institutionalized  धर्म   in  general  और  Christian doctrine in particular  .
He  भी   लिखा  the pamphlet  कृषिक  Justice ( 1795  )   ,  discussing the origins of  प्रॉपर्टी  , and  introduced   the   अवधारणा  of a guaranteed minimum income .
in  1802 ,  he   लौटे   to  America where he  died  on June 8  ,   1809  .
तभी  six people attended  उसके  funeral  as   he  had been ostracized  लिये   उसके   उपहास  of Christianity  .
Clinical trials are sets  of  tests in medical research and drug  विकास   कि   generate  safety and efficacy  आंकड़ा   (   or   अधिक   specifically  , information  परिचय  adverse drug reactions  और   प्रतिकूल  effects of other treatments  )  for health interventions  (  e.g.  ,  drugs  ,  diagnostics  ,  devices , therapy protocols ) .
They are conducted  तभी  after  संतोषजनक  information has been gathered on  the  quality of  the  non  नैदानिक  safety ,  और  health authority/ethics  कमेटी   स्वीकृति  is  granted  in the  देश  where  स्वीकृति  of the  ड्रग   or  device is sought .
Previously  ,   अनेक  emerging countries  किया   नहीं   आवश्यकता   लोकल   ट्रायल   लिये  product approvals .
Now , though emerging countries still accept data from  u.s./europe   ,  they  भी   आवश्यकता  some  लोकल  trials .
Depending  on  the type  of  product and the  स्टेज  of  इसके  development ,  जांचकर्ताओं   initially  enroll  स्वयंसेवक   and/or   मरीजों   into  small pilot  अध्ययन  ,  और  subsequently  conduct  larger scale studies in patients that often  compare  the  नई  product with  अन्य   already  approved for  the  affliction of interest .
As positive safety  और  efficacy  आंकड़ा  are gathered , the  क्रमांक  of  मरीजों   is   typically   increased  .
Clinical trials can vary in size  ,   और  can involve  a   सिंगल   शोध   एंटिटी   in   एक  country or many such  entities  in  अनेक  countries .
a   पूरा  series of trials  may  incur sizable costs  ,  and  the  burden of paying for  सब   the  necessary  लोगों  and services  is   प्रायः   borne   by  the  प्रायोजक  , which may be a governmental  संगठन  or  a  pharmaceutical ,  जैवप्रौद्योगिकी  or  चिकित्सा   यंत्र  company .
When  the  diversity  of  required support  भूमिकाएँ  exceeds the resources  of   the  sponsor  ,  a  नैदानिक   विचारण   is   प्रबंधित  by an outsourced partner , such as  a   अनुबंध  research organization or a  नैदानिक  trials unit  in  the academic sector .
the   ग्रीन  Bay Packers  हैं  an American football team based in Green Bay ,  विस्कॉन्सिन  .
They are members  of  the North Division  of  the National Football Conference  (  NFC )  in   the  National  फ़ुटबॉल  League (  एनएफएल   )   .
Green Bay  is  the  third-oldest   मताधिकार  in  the  NFL  ,  having been organized and playing in  1919  .
the  Packers  हैं   the   तभी  non-profit , community-owned major league  पेशेवर  sports team in the United States  .
the  Packers  हैं   the   पिछला   vestige  of `` small  कस्बा   टीमों   ''  that  यहूद  once common  in  the NFL during  the  1920s and 1930s  .
संस्थापित  in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence  the   नाम  Lambeau Field on  जिससे  the team  plays  ) and George  व्हिटनी   calhoun  ,  the   ग्रीन   खाड़ी   पैकर्स  can trace  उनके  lineage to other  semi-professional  teams in  ग्रीन  Bay dating  वापस  to  1896  .
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers  competed   as  a semi-professional football  टोली   विरूद्ध   क्लब   इससे   around  Wisconsin  और   the   मिडवेस्ट  .
वे   joined  the  अमरीकी  Professional Football  संघ  ( APFA ) in  1921  , the forerunner  to   कया  is known today as the  नेशनल  Football  लीग  (  एनएफएल  )  .
Although  ग्रीन   खाड़ी  is the last  एनएफएल  `` small town  ''  team  ,  its  लोकल  fan base  और   मीडिया  extends  into   आसपास  Milwaukee  ;   the  team  भी  played selected  घर   खेल   वहीँ   between   1933   और  1994  .
the   ग्रीन   खाड़ी  Packers  have  won 13 league  championships   (  more than any  अन्य  team  in  the NFL )  ,  including nine  एनएफएल   championships   prior  to  the  Super  कटोरी  era and four  सुपर  Bowl  victories  —in  1967   (  Super Bowl  i  ) , 1968 (  सुपर  Bowl II  )  ,  1997  ( Super  कटोरी  XXXI  )  and 2011  (  Super Bowl XLV  )   .
The Packers  have   long-standing  , bitter rivalries with  उनके   nfc   उत्तर  (  formerly  the  nfc  Central )  प्रतिद्वंद्वियों  , the Chicago Bears ,  मिनेसोटा   वाइकिंग्स  and  the  Detroit Lions .
the   bears-packers   फंसने  is one of the oldest rivalries  in   एनएफएल   इतिहास   ,   डेटिंग  back to  1921   .
इथेनॉल  fuel  is  ethanol ( ethyl alcohol  )   ,  the  वही   प्रकार  of alcohol found in alcoholic  पेय   .
It  is   सबसे  often  प्रयुक्त  as a  मोटर  fuel ,  मुख्यतः  as a  biofuel  additive for gasoline  .
संसार  ethanol production for  हस्तांतरण   ईंधन  tripled between 2000  और   2007  from 17  अरब  to  अधिक  than 52  अरब  liters  .
From  2007  to 2008  ,  the share of  इथेनॉल   in  global  गैसोलीन  type  ईंधन  use  increased   इससे  3.7  %   to  5.4 %  .
In  2011   विश्वव्यापी   इथेनॉल  fuel production reached 22.36 billion U.S. liquid  गैलन   (  bg )  (  84.6 billion  liters  )  ,  with the United  राज्य   as  the  शीर्ष  producer  साथ  13.9  bg   (   52.6  billion liters )  ,  accounting  लिये  62.2 % of global  उत्पादन  , followed by Brazil with  5.6   bg   (  21.1 billion liters )  .
इथेनॉल  fuel has  a  `` gasoline  गैलन   equivalency   ``   (  GGE ) value of  ,  which means 1.5 gallons  of  ethanol produce the energy  of  one gallon  of  gasoline .
Ethanol fuel is widely used in Brazil and  in   the   संयुक्त  States , and  साथ   दोनो  countries were responsible for  87.1  %  of   the  world 's ethanol fuel  उत्पादन   in  2011 .
Most  गाड़ियाँ  on the  सड़क   आज   in   the  U.S.  can   चलाएं  on blends  of   up  to  10  % ethanol  ,   और  ethanol represented 10  %   of  the  u.S.   गैसोलीन  fuel supply  निकला  from domestic sources  in  2011  .
Since 1976  the  Brazilian government has  बना  it  अनिवार्य  to blend  इथेनॉल  with gasoline  ,  and since  2007   the   विधिक   मिश्रण   is   around   25  % ethanol  और   75  % gasoline ( E25 ) .
By  दिसम्बर  2011 Brazil had a  बेड़े   of  14.8 million  flex-fuel   ऑटोमोबाइल   और  light  ट्रक  and  1.5   लाख  flex-fuel motorcycles that regularly use neat  इथेनॉल  fuel (  ज्ञात   as   e100   )  .
bioethanol  is a form  of   बेदर्दी   उर्जा  that can be  उत्पादित   इससे  agricultural  feedstocks  .
it  can  be   बना   इससे  very common  फसलों   ऐसे  as  शुगर  cane , potato , manioc and corn .
There  रै   महरूम   considerable  debate about  कैसा  useful bioethanol  होगा  be in replacing gasoline .
चिंताएं   परिचय   इसके  production  और  use relate  to  increased food  कीमतें  due to  the   विशाल  amount of arable  जमीन  required for  फसलों   ,  as well as the  उर्जा   और   प्रदूषण  balance  of  the  पूरे  cycle  of  ethanol production ,  विशेषकर   इससे  corn .
Recent developments  साथ  cellulosic ethanol  उत्पादन  and commercialization may  allay   कुछ  of these  चिंताएं  .
Cellulosic  इथेनॉल  offers  वादा  because cellulose  मछली  , a  प्रमुख  and  सार्वभौमिक   घटक   in  plant cells  दीवारें   ,  can be used  to  produce  इथेनॉल  .
According to  the  International Energy Agency  ,  cellulosic ethanol could  allow   इथेनॉल  fuels to  खेल  a much  बडे  role in the  भविष्य   than  previously  विचार   .
Saab 9-3 SportCombi  biopower  .
the  second  e85   flexifuel  model introduced  by  Saab in  the  Swedish  मार्केट  .
a   प्लैक  commemorating the  स्थान  of  the  Sarajevo assassination and steps of Gavrilo Princip  (   चित्र  taken in 1987  ,   पहले   कदम   यहूद  removed in  1992  and plaque changed  इससे   cyrillic  to  लैटिन  script )
a   प्लैक   commemorating  the  स्थान  of the Sarajevo assassination  (  image taken in  2009  )
on  28 June 1914 ,  archduke   फ्रांज  Ferdinand  of   ऑस्ट्रिया   ,  heir  presumptive  to  the  Austro-Hungarian  सिंहासन   ,   और   उसके  wife  ,  Sophie ,  duchess   of  Hohenberg , were shot  मुर्दे   in  Sarajevo  ,   by  Gavrilo Princip  ,   एक  of  a  group of  छह   बोस्नियाई  Serb  हत्यारे   समन्वित   by  Danilo Ilić  .
The political objective of the assassination  थी   to   ब्रेक  off  austria-hungary  's south-Slav  प्रांतों   so  they could be combined into  a  Greater Serbia  or  a Yugoslavia .
The assassins ' motives were consistent with the movement that  बाद  became known  as  Young Bosnia  .
Serbian  सैन्य   अधिकारियों   stood   पीछे  the  आक्रमण  .
At the top  of  these Serbian military conspirators  थी  Chief  of  Serbian  सैन्य   प्रज्ञा  Dragutin Dimitrijević , his  righthand  man  प्रमुख   vojislav  Tankosić  ,   और   masterspy  Rade  malobabić  .
प्रमुख   tankosić  armed the assassins  साथ   बम  and pistols and trained  उन्हें  .
The  हत्यारे   यहूद   दिए   अभिगम  to the same clandestine tunnel  of  safe-houses and  एजेंटों  that Rade  malobabić   प्रयुक्त  for  the  infiltration  of  weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary  .
The assassins  ,   the   कुंजी  members of  the   clandestine   टनल  , and the key  सर्बियाई  military conspirators  जो   यहूद   स्टिल  alive were arrested , tried , convicted and punished .
those  who were arrested in  बोस्निया  were  आजमाया  in Sarajevo in  अक्तूबर   1914  .
the   अन्य  conspirators were  गिरफ्तार  and  आजमाया  before  a   सर्बियाई   कंगारू  court  on  the  french-controlled  Salonika Front  in  1916–1917  on  unrelated  गलत   आरोप  ; Serbia executed three of the top  सैन्य   षड्यंत्रकारियों  .
much   of  what is known about the assassinations  आता  from these  दो   ट्रायल  and related  रिकॉर्ड  .
Assignment  of  responsibility  लिये   the  bombing  और   हत्याएं  of  28  June  is   अत्यधिक  controversial  क्युकी  the attack led to the outbreak of World  युद्ध  I  एक   माह  later .
Renée Kathleen  zellweger  ( born April 25 , 1969  )  is  an  American  अभिनेत्री  and producer .
Zellweger first gained widespread  ध्यान   लिये  her role in  the  film Jerry  मैग्वायर  ( 1996 )  ,   और  subsequently received  दो  nominations for  the  Academy Award  लिये  Best  अभिनेत्री  for  उसके  roles  as   ब्रिजेट  Jones  in   the  comedy  ब्रिजेट  Jones 's Diary (  2001  )  ,  and  as  Roxie Hart  in  the  musical   शिकागो  ( 2002 )  .
वो  won the  अकादमी   पुरस्कार  for Best Supporting Actress for her  प्रदर्शन   in   the  drama  ठंडा  Mountain  (   2003  ) .
She has won an Academy Award , three Golden Globe Awards ,  तीन  Screen Actors Guild  पुरस्कार  , and a BAFTA  पुरस्कार  ; was named Hasty Pudding  's  Woman of  the   साल  in 2009  ;   और  established herself as one of  the  highest-paid Hollywood  अभिनेत्रियों  as of 2007 .
The ossicles (  भी  called auditory ossicles  )  are  the  three smallest  हड्डियों   in   the  human body ,  the  malleus , the  incus  and  the  stapes  .
वे  are contained  भीतर  the middle ear space and  serve   to  transmit  ध्वनि  from the air to  the   fluid-filled  labyrinth  (  cochlea ) .
the   अनुपस्थिति   of   the   auditory  ossicles  होता  constitute  a  moderate-to-severe  सुनना   घाटा  .
The term  ``   ossicles  ''  वस्तुतः   अर्थात्   ``  tiny  हड्डियों   ''  and commonly refers to  the  auditory ossicles  ,   हालांकि  the  पद   may   refer  to any  छोटी  bone throughout the body .
the  New Covenant (  यहूदी  •  •  — Greek •  •   diatheke  kaine ) is  a  biblical interpretation  originally  derived  इससे   a  phrase in the Book  of  Jeremiah , in the  यहूदी  Scriptures  .
It is often  विचार   of  as an eschatological  मुक्तिदाता   आयु   or   संसार  to come and is  सम्बन्धित   to  the  biblical   अवधारणा  of  the  Kingdom of God .
Generally ,  ईसाइयों   मानना  that  the   नई  Covenant was instituted at  the  Last Supper as part of the Eucharist , which in  the  Gospel  of   जॉन  includes the  नई   commandment  .
There are  अनेक   ईसाई  eschatologies that further  define  the New  वचन  ,  as  an  उदाहरण  an inaugurated eschatology defines  और   describes   the   नई  Covenant  as   an  ongoing  संबंध  between  ईसाई   ईमानवालों   और  God  कि  will be in  पूरा  fruition  बाद  the  दूसरी   coming  of  मसीह   ;   कि  is , it will  नहीं  only be in full fruition in believing hearts , but  in   the  future  बाह्य  world as  खूब  .
The  कनेक्शन   between  the Blood  of   मसीह  and  the  New  वचन  is  देखी   in  most modern English translations of  the   नई  Testament with the saying  :  ``  इस  cup that  is   poured   आउट  for  तुम  is  the   नई   वचन   in  my blood  ''  .
ईसाइयों   मानना   कि  Jesus is the mediator of the New  वचन   ,   और   कि  the Blood of  मसीह   शेड  at his  crucifixion  is  the   जरूरी  blood of  the   वचन  .
As with all covenants  between   परमेश्वर   और  man  वर्णित   in   the  Bible , the New Covenant is  माना  ``  a   बंध   in   रक्त  sovereignly  administered  by  परमेश्वर  . ''
it   रै   महरूम   theorized  that the New  वचन  is the Law of Christ  as   बोला  during his  उपदेश  on the  माउंट  .
The following  सूची  of  लोगों  pardoned  or   granted   दया   by  the President  of  the United  राज्य   दस्तावेज़  the most prominent cases  of  each presidency .
as  granted  by  the Constitution  (  Article  ii  ,  खण्ड  2 , Clause  1   )  , Presidents have the power  to   ग्रान्ट   दया  in one or more of the following  तरीके  :  the  ability  to   ग्रान्ट  a full  pardon  , to  भ्रमण  a sentence  ,  or  to   तोड़ना  a fine  .
U.S. Presidents have  no  power  to   ग्रान्ट  clemency  लिये   अपराधों   prosecuted   अंतर्गत   राज्य  law .
As  to   the   अंतर   between  a  pardon  and a commutation:
a  pardon  is   an   कार्यपालिका   अनुक्रम   vacating  a conviction  .
a  commutation  is  the mitigation of the  वाक्य   of  someone  फिलहाल  serving  a  sentence for a  अपराधों  pursuant to  a  conviction , without  vacating  the conviction itself  .
लगभग  20,000 pardons and  clemencies   यहूद  issued by  u.S.  presidents in  the  20th century alone .
the   रिकॉर्ड  of acts of clemency  यहूद   पब्लिक  until 1934 .
In 1981 the  दफ्तर  of the Pardon  attorney  was  निर्मित  and records  इससे  President  H.  W. Bush  आगे   हैं  now listed  .
इस  list includes pardons  और   commutations   .
Tampa ( ) is a city in the  u.S.  state  of   फ्लोरिडा  .
It  serves  as the county seat for Hillsborough County and is located on the  वेस्ट  coast of Florida ,  on  Tampa Bay near  the   गल्फ  of  मैक्सिको  .
The population of  tampa  in 2011  थी   346,037  .
The  वर्तमान  location  of  Tampa  थी  once inhabited  by   स्वदेशी   peoples   of  the Safety Harbor culture , most notably the Tocobaga and  the   pohoy  ,  जो  lived along the  shores   of  Tampa Bay .
It was briefly  छान  by Spanish explorers  in  the early 16th  सदी  ,  लकिन  there were no  स्थाई   अमरीकी  or European settlements within today 's city  हद  until  बाद  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  had acquired Florida from Spain in 1819 .
In 1824 , the  संयुक्त   राज्य   फौज  established a  frontier  outpost called  फोर्ट  Brooke  at  the mouth  of  the  hillsborough   नदी  , near the  साईट  of  आज   's   tampa   सम्मेलन   बीच  .
The first  civilian   निवासियों  were  pioneers   जो  settled near the  फोर्ट  for  सुरक्षा  from the  आसपास  Seminole population  .
the   कस्बा   grew  slowly until the 1880s  ,  when railroad links , the  डिस्कवरी   of   फास्फेट  ,  और  the arrival  of  the  सिगार  industry jump-started Tampa  's  development and  helped  it to  grow   into  an  महत्वपूर्ण  city by the  जल्दी   1900s  .
आज   ,   tampa  is  a  part of  the   महानगर   क्षेत्रफल  most  commonly   referred   to   as   the   tampa   खाड़ी  Area  .
For U.S. Census purposes  ,   tampa  is part  of   the   tampa-st.  Petersburg-Clearwater , Florida Metropolitan  सांख्यिकीय   क्षेत्रफल  .
The four-county area is  रचित   of   roughly  2.7 million  निवासियों  , making it  the  second  largest  metropolitan statistical  क्षेत्रफल  (  एमएसए  )  in   the   राज्य  , and  the  fourth largest  in   the  Southeastern  संयुक्त   राज्य   ,  behind Miami , Washington  ,  D.C. , and Atlanta .
The Greater  tampa   खाड़ी  area has just over 4 million residents  और   generally  includes  the  Tampa and Sarasota metro  क्षेत्रों   .
the  Tampa Bay  साझेदारी  and U.S. Census  आंकड़ा   दिखाया   an  average annual growth of 2.47 percent ,  or   a   लाभ  of approximately 97,000 residents per year .
between  2000 and 2006  ,   the  Greater  tampa   खाड़ी  Market experienced  a   संयुक्त   विकास   रेट   of  14.8 percent , growing  इससे   3.4   लाख   to  3.9  लाख   और  hitting  the   4   लाख  people mark on April  1  ,  2007  .
A  2012  estimate shows the  tampa   खाड़ी   क्षेत्रफल  population to  have   4,310,524   लोगों  and  a  2017 projection  of  4,536,854 people .
Tampa has a  क्रमांक   of   खेल   टीमों   ,  such as the Tampa Bay Buccaneers of the  नेशनल  Football League , the Tampa  खाड़ी  Lightning of the  नेशनल  Hockey League  ,  and  the  Tampa  खाड़ी  Storm  of  the Arena Football League .
The Tampa Bay Rays  in  Major  लीग   बेसबॉल  and the Tampa Bay  rowdies  of  the  North American  सॉकर   लीग   खेल  their home  खेल  in  neighboring   st.  Petersburg , Florida .
in   2008  , Tampa was ranked  as  the 5th best outdoor  नगर  by Forbes  .
A 2004 survey by the  nyu  newspaper Washington Square News ranked  tampa  as  a  top city for  ``   twenty-somethings  . ''
tampa   is  now ranked as a `` Gamma '' world  नगर   by  Loughborough University .
According to  loughborough   ,   tampa  ranks alongside  अन्य  world  शहरों   ऐसे  as Phoenix , Santo Domingo , and Osaka .
In recent years  tampa  has  देखी   a  notable upsurge in high-market  माँग  from  उपभोक्ता  , signaling more  माल  concentrated in  the  area .
Tampa hosted  the   2012  Republican  नेशनल  Convention .
The  शेवरलेट  Cavalier was a compact automobile produced from  1982  to 2005  by   सामान्य   मोटर्स   .
निर्मित  on the company  's  J platform  ,  the Cavalier produced  the  highest sales in  1984   .
at   &   t   गतिशीलता   llc  branded and referred to as AT  &  T ( formerly Cingular  बेतार  LLC ) , is a  wholly  owned  subsidiary   of  AT &  t   inc.   कि  provides  बेतार  services to 107  लाख  subscribers in  the   संयुक्त  States  ,  including Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin  आइलैंड्स  .
at  &  t   गतिशीलता  is  the   दूसरी   largest  wireless telecommunications  प्रदाता   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   और  Puerto  रीको  ,  पीछे  Verizon  बेतार   ,   जिससे  serves 115.78 million customers as of the fourth quarter  of   2012  .
AT &  t   गतिशीलता   is  headquartered  in   the  Lenox Park area of DeKalb Co.  जॉर्जिया  , just outside Atlanta .
originally  Cingular Wireless  llc  from  2000  to 2007 , a  संयुक्त   venture   between   sbc   संचार  and  bellsouth  , the company  acquired   the   बूढ़ा  AT & T Wireless in 2004 ;  sbc  later acquired  the  original AT &  t  and re-branded  as  `` AT  &  T ''  .
Cingular became wholly owned by  at  & T in December  2006  as  a   परिणाम  of  at  &  t   's  acquisition of BellSouth .
in   जनवरी   2007   ,   cingular  confirmed it  होता   re-brand  itself under the  at  & T  नाम   .
हालांकि  the legal  कॉरपोरेट  name  बदलें   occurred   तत्काल  ,  लिये   दोनो  regulatory  और  brand-awareness  कारण  both  ब्रांड्स   यहूद   प्रयुक्त   in  the company 's signage and advertising  दौरान   a  transition period .
the  transition  concluded   in   लेट  June ,  बस  prior to  the   rollout   of  the Apple iPhone .
on  March  20  ,  2011  ,  at   &   t  Mobility announced its intention to acquire T-Mobile USA from  डॉयचे  Telekom for $  39   अरब  .
If  it  had received government  और  regulatory  स्वीकृति  , AT  &  T  होता   have  had  अधिक   than  130  लाख  subscribers  .
however   ,   the  U.S. Department  of   इंसाफ  ,  the   संघीय  Communications Commission ,  और  AT  &  T Mobility  's  competitors (  ऐसे  as  स्प्रिंट  Nextel  )   opposed   the   मूव  on the grounds  कि  it  होता  reduce competition  in  the cellular  संचार   मार्केट  .
in  December 2011 , in  the  face of both governmental and  फैली  consumer opposition  ,   at   &  T withdrew  उनके  offer to  पूरा   the   विलय  .
Martin Luther King , Jr.  (  January 15 ,  1929   –  April 4  ,  1968  )  was  an  American clergyman , activist  ,  and  नेता  in  the  African-American  सिविल  Rights Movement  .
He  is  best known  लिये   उसके  role in the advancement of  सिविल  rights  using  nonviolent  सिविल  disobedience .
King has  become  a national icon  in   the  history  of  American progressivism .
A  बैपटिस्ट   मंत्री   ,  King became  a   सिविल  rights  activist  early in his  करियर   .
he   led  the  1955   मोंटगोमरी   बस  Boycott and helped found the  दक्षिणी   ईसाई   नेतृत्व   सम्मेलन  (  sclc   )  in 1957 ,  सेवारत  as its  पहला   अध्यक्ष   .
साथ   the   sclc  , King  led  an unsuccessful  संघर्ष   विरूद्ध  segregation  in  Albany , Georgia ,  in  1962 , and organized  nonviolent  protests in Birmingham ,  अलबामा  ,  कि  attracted national  ध्यान   following  television news  कवरेज   of  the brutal police response  .
King  भी   helped   to  organize the  1963  March  on   वॉशिंगटन  , where  he  delivered his ``  i  Have a Dream `` speech  .
वहीँ  ,  he  established his  प्रतिष्ठा  as  एक  of the greatest  orators   in  American  इतिहास  .
he  also  स्थापित  his reputation  as   a   कट्टरपंथी   ,   और  became an object of the  संघीय   ब्यूरो  of  छानबीन  's COINTELPRO  लिये   the  rest of  उसके  life  .
एफबीआई   एजेंटों   investigated   उसे   लिये   संभावित  communist  ties  , recorded  उसके   extramarital  liaisons  और  reported on them to  सरकारी  officials ,  और   on  one occasion  ,   mailed   किंग  a  threatening  anonymous letter  कि  he  interpreted   as  an  attempt  to make  उसे  commit suicide  .
on  October  14   ,   1964   ,  King received the Nobel Peace  पुरस्कार  for combating racial  असमानता  through  nonviolence  .
In 1965  ,  he and the  sclc  helped to organize the  selma  to Montgomery marches  और  the  following  year ,  he  took  the   गति  north to  शिकागो  .
in   the   फाइनल  years of his life ,  किंग  expanded  उसके  focus to include  गरीबी  and the Vietnam War ,  alienating  many of his liberal allies with a 1967 speech titled  ``  Beyond  वियतनाम  '' .
किंग  was  नियोजन  a  नेशनल  occupation of Washington ,  d.C.   ,  called the Poor People 's  अभियान   .
King was  assassinated   on  April 4  ,   1968  , in Memphis ,  टेनेसी   .
His death was  followed  by riots  in  many U.S. cities .
दोषारोपण  that  जेम्स  Earl Ray  ,  the man convicted  of  killing King , had been framed or  acted  in concert  साथ   सरकारी   एजेंटों   persisted  for decades after the shooting  ,   और  the jury of  a  1999 civil trial found  loyd   jowers  to be complicit in  a  conspiracy  विरूद्ध  King .
King was  awarded  the  अध्यक्षीय   पदक  of Freedom and the Congressional Gold Medal posthumously .
Martin Luther  किंग  , Jr.  दिन  was  स्थापित  as a  u.S.  federal  अवकाश   in  1986  .
Hundreds  of   गलियों  in  the   u.S.  have been  renamed  in his  सम्मान  .
A memorial statue on  the  National  मॉल  was opened to the public  in  2011  .
The  बाघ  ( Panthera tigris ) is the largest  बिल्ली   प्रजाति   ,   reaching   a  total  देह  length  of  up to and  weighing  up to .
it  is the third largest  जमीन  carnivore ( behind only the  ध्रुवीय  bear  और  the brown bear )  .
इसके  most  recognizable   विशेषता  is  a   पैटर्न   of   अंधेरा   लंबवत  stripes on reddish-orange fur with a  हल्का  underside .
it  has exceptionally  stout   दांत  ,  और  the canines  हैं   the   longest   among  living  felids   साथ   a  crown  ऊँचाई  of as much  as  or  भी  .
in  zoos ,  टाइगर्स  have  जिया  for  20   to  26 years ,  जिससे  also seems to  be  their  आयु   in   the  wild .
वे  are  territorial  and  generally  solitary  लकिन  social animals  ,   प्रायः   requiring   विशाल  contiguous areas of  आवास  that support their  शिकार  requirements  .
इस  ,  coupled  with the fact  कि  they are  स्वदेशी  to some of  the  more densely populated places on Earth , has caused  significant  conflicts with  इंसानो  .
Tigers once  ranged  widely across Asia ,  इससे  Turkey  in  the west  to  the eastern coast of  रूस  .
over   the   पास्ट  100  सालो  ,  वे   have   खोया   93  % of  उनके  historic  दायरा  , and  have  been  extirpated  from southwest  और  central Asia ,  इससे   the   आइलैंड्स   of  Java  और   bali  , and  इससे  large  क्षेत्रों   of  Southeast and Eastern  एशिया  .
आज   ,  they range from the Siberian taiga to  खोलें   grasslands  and  तीव्र   mangrove   swamps  .
the   बाकी  six  बाघ   subspecies  have been classified as endangered  by   आईयूसीएन  .
The  वैश्विक  population  in  the wild  is   अनुमानित   to   क्रमांक   between  3,062  और  3,948 individuals , down from  around   100,000   at   the  start of the 20th century , with  सबसे   बाकी   populations  occurring in small  pockets  isolated from  प्रत्येक  other .
प्रमुख  reasons  लिये   जनसांख्यिकी   मनाही   शामिल  habitat  विनाश   ,  habitat  fragmentation   और  poaching  .
the  extent  of   क्षेत्रफल  occupied by tigers is  अनुमानित  at less  than   ,  a 41 %  मनाही  from the area estimated in  the   mid-1990s   .
Tigers are  among  the most recognisable and popular of the  संसार  's  charismatic  megafauna  .
They  have  featured prominently  in  ancient mythology and  लोकगीत  , and continue to be depicted  in   आधुनिक   films   और   साहित्य  .
Tigers appear  on  many flags , coats  of  arms ,  और  as  mascots  for sporting  टीमों  .
the   बंगाल  tiger is  the  national  एनिमल  of both India and Bangladesh .
the   सरलीकृत  internal  ढांचा  of a  हरितलवक
अवलोकन  of the Calvin  साईकिल   और   कार्बन  fixation
the   light-independent   प्रतिक्रियाएँ  of  photosynthesis  are chemical reactions  कि  convert carbon  डाइऑक्साइड  and other compounds into  ग्लूकोज  .
ये   प्रतिक्रियाएँ  occur in  the  stroma , the fluid-filled  क्षेत्रफल   of   a  chloroplast outside  of  the thylakoid membranes  .
These  प्रतिक्रियाएँ   लो   the  light-dependent reactions and perform further chemical  प्रक्रियाओं  on them  .
There  हैं  three phases to  the   light-independent  reactions , collectively  पुकारा  the Calvin  साईकिल  : carbon  fixation   ,   कटौती  reactions  ,  and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate  (   rubp  )  regeneration   .
Despite its name  ,   इस   प्रक्रम  occurs only  जब   लाइट   is  available  .
Plants do not carry  आउट  the  calvin  cycle by  रात्रि  .
They  ,  instead ,  रिलीज  sucrose into the  फ्लोएम   इससे  their  मंड   reserves  .
This process happens  जब  light is available independent  of   the  kind of  photosynthesis   (   c3  carbon fixation , C4  कार्बन  fixation ,  और  Crassulacean Acid  चयापचय  ) ;  कैम  plants store malic  एसिड  in their vacuoles  प्रत्येक  night  और  release it  by  day  in  order  to  make this process  कार्य  .
a   लिनेन  handkerchief with pulled thread embroidery around  the   किनारे
Linen  cloth   बरामद  from Qumran  गुफा  1  निकट   the  Dead  समुद्र  .
Linen  (  ) is  a  textile  बना  from  the  fibers of the flax plant , Linum usitatissimum  .
लिनेन   is  labor-intensive to  manufacture   ,  but when it is made into  garments  ,  it   is   valued  for its  असाधारण  coolness  और   ताजगी   in  hot weather .
The word `` linen  ''   is  of West Germanic origin  और   cognates   साथ  the Latin name for the flax plant linum  ,  and the earlier Greek λινόν ( linon ) .
इस   शब्द   इतिहास   रै  given rise  to   a  number  of   अन्य   शर्तें  in English ,  the   सबसे   notable  of  जिससे   is  the English  शब्द  line , derived from the use of  a  linen  (   flax  ) thread to determine a  सीधा   लकीर   .
वस्त्र   in   a   लिनेन   बुनते   बनावट   ,   भी  when  बना  of  कपास  ,  गांजा   और   अन्य   non-flax  fibers are also loosely  referred  to as `` linen ''  .
ऐसे   fabrics   generally  have their  अपना  specific names other than linen ; for example  ,   ठीक  cotton  धागे  in  a  linen-style  बुनते  is called  madapolam  .
the  collective term `` linens `` is still  प्रायः   प्रयुक्त  generically  to   describe  a class  of  woven and  भी   knitted   bed  , bath , table and  रसोईघर  textiles  .
The name linens  is  retained because traditionally , linen  थी   प्रयुक्त  for many of these items .
In the past , the  शब्द   ``  linens ''  थी   भी   प्रयुक्त   to   औसत  lightweight undergarments such  as  shirts , chemises , waistshirts ,  lingerie  (  a  word also  cognate  with  लिनेन  ) , and  detachable   कमीज़  collars  और  cuffs  ,  which  यहूद   historically  made  लगभग   exclusively  out of linen  .
The  अंदर   cloth  layer of  ठीक   कम्पोजिट   कपडे  garments (  as   लिये  example  jackets  )  थी  traditionally made  of   लिनेन   ,  and this is  the  origin  of  the  शब्द  lining .
Linen textiles  appear  to  be   कुछ  of the oldest in the world :  उनके  history goes back many thousands of  सालो  .
Fragments of straw ,  बीज  ,  मछली   ,   yarns  ,  और  various types of fabrics  जिससे  date  वापस  to about 8000 BC  have  been  मिला  in Swiss lake dwellings .
Dyed flax fibers  मिला  in a  प्रागैतिहासिक  cave in  जॉर्जिया   सुझाएँ  the use  of  woven linen fabrics from  जंगली  flax may  तिथि   वापस  even  पहले  to  36,000  BP .
लिनेन  was sometimes used as currency in ancient Egypt  .
Egyptian mummies were wrapped  in  linen because  it  was seen as  a   प्रतीक   of  light  और   पवित्रता   ,   और   as   a  display of  माल  .
Some of  ये  fabrics ,  woven  from hand spun yarns , were very fine for their day , but are coarse compared to modern linen .
आज   ,   लिनेन  is usually an expensive textile ,  और  is  उत्पादित  in relatively small  quantities  .
It  रै  a long ``  स्टेपल   ''  ( individual fiber  लंबाई   )  relative to cotton  और  other natural  मछली   .
Many products  हैं  made  of  linen : aprons ,  बैग  , towels  (  swimmers ,  नहाना  ,  बीच  ,  देह   और   धो  towels  )  , napkins ,  bed  linens  ,  linen  चौके   ,  runners  ,  chair covers ,  और  men 's &  महिलाओं  's wear .
the  FIFA World  कप   ,   प्रायः  simply  the   संसार   कप   ,  is  an   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  association football  प्रतियोगिता  contested  by  the senior  मेन  's national teams of the members of  fédération  Internationale de Football  संघ   (  FIFA  )   ,  the  खेल   's  global  शासी  body .
the  championship  रै   महरूम   awarded  every four  सालो  since  the   inaugural  tournament in  1930  , except  in  1942 and 1946 when it was  नहीं  held  क्युकी   of  the Second World War .
The  वर्तमान   champions  are Spain , who won the  2010   टूर्नामेंट  .
the   वर्तमान  format  of  the  टूर्नामेंट  involves  32   टीमों   स्पर्धा   लिये   the  title at  venues  within  the  host  स्वदेश  (  s  ) over a period  of   परिचय  a month ;  इस  phase  is  often  पुकारा  the World  कप   फाइनल  .
A qualification phase , which  फिलहाल   takes  place  over  the preceding  तीन  years , is used  to  determine which  टीमों  qualify  लिये   the   टूर्नामेंट  together  साथ   the  host  स्वदेश   (   s   )  .
The 19 World  कप  tournaments have  महरूम  won by eight different  नेशनल  teams  .
ब्राज़ील  have  जीती   पाँच  times  ,   और  they are the only  टोली  to  have  played  in  every  टूर्नामेंट  .
The other  संसार  Cup winners are  इटली   ,   साथ  four  शीर्षक  ; Germany , with three titles ;  अर्जेंटीना  and inaugural winners Uruguay , with  दो  titles each ; and England  ,   फ़्रांस  , and  स्पेन   ,  with  एक  title  प्रत्येक  .
The World  कप  is  the   संसार  's most widely  viewed   sporting  event  ;   an  estimated  715.1  million people watched the  फाइनल  match  of  the 2006 FIFA  संसार   कप   आयोजित   in  Germany .
the  next  तीन  World Cups  होगा  be hosted by Brazil  in  2014 ,  रूस  in 2018 , and Qatar in 2022 .
The is an expansion device for the Wii Remote video game controller for  the   वी  that allows it to more  accurately  capture complex  गति  .
According to Nintendo ,  the   सेंसर  in the  यंत्र   पूरक  the  accelerometer  and Sensor Bar  सामर्थ्य   of  the  वी  Remote  to  enable actions  to   be   rendered   identically  on the  स्क्रीन   in  real time  .
The Wii  's  successor console  ,   the  Wii  u  , supports  the   वी  MotionPlus and its peripherals in games where  उपयोग  of  इसके   touchscreen-built-in   प्राथमिक   नियंत्रक  is  नहीं   जरुरी  .
Majulah  singapura   (  Onward  सिंगापुर  ) is the national  गान  of Singapore  .
Composed  by   zubir   कहा   in   1958  as a theme  सोंग  for  आधिकारिक  functions  of   the   नगर  Council of  सिंगापुर   ,  the song was selected in 1959  as   the  island 's anthem when  it   attained  self-government  .
Upon full independence in 1965 , Majulah Singapura was  formally  adopted  as  Singapore 's  नेशनल  anthem .
By law the anthem  may  only be sung with its original Malay lyrics  ,   हालांकि  there exist  प्राधिकृत   अनुवाद  of the  गीत   of  the anthem  in  Singapore 's  तीन   अन्य  official languages  :   अंग्रेज़ी  , Mandarin and  तमिल  .
originally  composed in  the   कुंजी   of  G major  ,  in 2001 the  नेशनल   गान  was officially relaunched in  the  lower  कुंजी   of  F  प्रमुख  as  इस  was said to  allow  for a ``  grander  and more  प्रेरणादायी   व्यवस्था  '' .
The  नेशनल   गान   is   regularly   performed  or sung  in  schools and  हथियारबंद  forces  शिविरों   at   ceremonies  held at  the   शुरूआत  and/or the end of each day  ,  during  जिससे  the  नेशनल  flag  is  also  उठाया  and lowered and  the   नेशनल  pledge  is  taken  .
singaporeans   हैं  especially encouraged to  गाओ  the national  गान  on occasions  of   नेशनल   जश्न  or national  significance  such as at the  नेशनल  Day  परेड  , at National Day observance  ceremonies  conducted by educational institutions  और   सरकारी  departments ,  और  at sporting  कार्यक्रम   at  which Singapore teams are participating  .
an   expedition   's  shipwrights building a brigantine , 1541  .
shipbuilding  is the  निर्माण  of ships  और  floating vessels .
It  सामान्यतः   takes  place  in   a  specialized facility  ज्ञात   as   a   डॉकयार्ड   .
shipbuilders  ,  भी  called  shipwrights   ,  follow a specialized  occupation  that traces its roots to before recorded  इतिहास   .
shipbuilding  and ship repairs  ,  both commercial and  सैन्य   ,  are  referred  to as  ``   नवल  engineering '' .
The construction of boats is a similar  कार्यकलाप  called boat building  .
the   dismantling  of ships  is  called ship  तोड़कर  .
Wakonda  is   a  town in  मिट्टी   काउंटी   ,  South  डकोटा   ,  United States  .
the   जनसांख्यिकी  was 321 at the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
The  following   is   a  list of the  सबसे   populous  incorporated  स्थान  of  the  United States of America .
as  defined by the  संयुक्त   राज्य  Census  ब्यूरो  , an ``  incorporated   प्लेस   ``   शामिल  a variety  of  designations ,  सहित  city ,  कस्बा  ,  गाँव  , borough  ,  and municipality  .
A few exceptional Census Designated Places  (  CDPs ) are also included in  the   जनसांख्यिकी   ब्यूरो  's listing  of  incorporated places .
संचित  city-counties  represent  a  पृथक   प्रकार  of  सरकारी  that  शामिल  the  संपूर्ण  population  of  a county ,  or  county equivalent .
Some  संचित   city-counties   ,  however  ,  include multiple incorporated  स्थान  .
This  सूची  presents only that portion  (  or ``  संतुलन  '' ) of such consolidated city-counties that are not  a  part  of   another  incorporated place .
Note  कि   इस   सूची   refers   तभी  to  the  population of individual  municipalities  within their defined  हद   ,  which does  नहीं  include other municipalities  or   unincorporated  suburban  क्षेत्रों  within urban  agglomerations  .
A different  रैंकिंग  is evident when  considering  U.S.  महानगर  area  populations  .
alt=Larger flashcart , shown with  छोटी  card  और  U.S. quarter  लिये  size
Nintendo DS  भंडार   डिवाइस  are devices  प्रयुक्त  to  स्टोर  a licensed developer  's   work-in-progress  images , homebrew video  खेल   और  downloaded commercial games ( since the Nintendo  ds  is not  बेची   साथ   a   rewritable  storage  मीडियम  )  .
licensed   डेवलपर  , however  ,  can use a  ब्लू  Intelligent Systems Nitro Emulator  बक्सा  to  फ्लैश  cards  .
These devices are also known as  ``   flashcarts   ''  or ``  flashcards  ''  .
There  हैं  two  प्रमुख  classes of  flashcarts  : older devices  जिससे  fit  in  Slot-2  (  the Game Boy  अग्रिम   खेल   पाक  slot  )   और   नए  devices that  अनुरूप  in Slot-1 (  the  DS Game  कार्ड   स्लॉट   )  .
Slot-2 ( or  first-generation  )  डिवाइस   have  been  historically  cheaper due  to   economies  of  स्केल   (   inherited   इससे  their  उपयोग   साथ   खेल  Boy  अग्रिम  ) ,  लकिन  require  a  booting  औजार  in Slot-1  in   अनुक्रम  to use the touch screen  और  other DS features .
Second-generation devices (  those   जिससे  only use Slot-1 ) do not  कार्य   साथ  GBA homebrew  ,   लकिन   became  less  महंगी   और   easier  to  उपयोग   ,  rivaling many Slot-2 devices in price .
First-generation devices include GBA flash  कारतूस   ,   gbamp  CF  ,   supercard  ,  और  M3 .
Second-generation  डिवाइस  include  r4   क्रान्ति  ,  cyclods  ,  g6   रियल  and DS-X .
The storage device either  contains   फ्लैश   मेमोरी  or a slot  लिये  a memory  कार्ड  to store homebrew  .
भंडार  devices  साथ  a memory-card slot usually  have  more storage  क्षमता  than  flash-memory   डिवाइस   .
हालांकि  flash-memory  क्षमता  is  प्रायः  measured in megabits ( Mb )  ,  memory-card  क्षमता  is usually  measured  in  मेगाबाइट  ( MB ) ( where 8 Mb is  1  MB )  .
Storage-device  ब्रांड्स  differ in their  support  for homebrew ; DS  और   खेल   लड़के   अग्रिम   roms  ;  खास  features ( such  as   क्षमता  to  खेल  media  फाइलें  ) ; physical  आकार   और  cost .
सख्ती  speaking  ,   a  storage device  is   नहीं  necessary  लिये   ds  with FlashMe  संस्थापित   क्युकी  homebrew  can  be  भेजा  to  the   ds   using  WMB .
however   ,  this is not  an  easily-portable  विधि  because the DS  needs  to be within range of a suitable Wi-Fi card .
हैं   अमरीकी   लोगों  of Japanese heritage .
जापानी  Americans have  historically  been among the three largest Asian American communities  ,  but in recent decades  ,  it has  become  the  छठे   largest   समूह  at  roughly  1,304,286 ,  सहित  those of mixed-race or  mixed-ethnicity  .
in   the  2010  जनसांख्यिकी  ,  the   largest  Japanese American  समुदायों  were found  in  California  साथ  272,528 ,  हवाई  with 185,502 ,  नई   यॉर्क  with  37,780   ,  Washington with 35,008 , and Illinois with 17,542 .
Southern California  रै  the largest Japanese-American  जनसांख्यिकी   in  North  अमेरिका   .

This is a  व्यापक  listing which highlights significant  उपलब्धियाँ   और   माइलस्टोन   आधारित   upon  Billboard magazine  's  singles  चार्ट  , most notably the  बिलबोर्ड   hot   100   .
This list spans from  the  issue dated  जनवरी   1   ,  1955  to   उपस्थित   .
The  बिलबोर्ड   hot   100  began with the issue dated August 4 , 1958  ,   और   is  currently  the   मानक  popular  म्यूज़िक   चार्ट  in the United States  .
Prior  to  the creation  of  the  hot  100 , Billboard published four singles charts  :   ``  Best Sellers  in   स्टोर्स  '' , ``  सबसे  Played  by   jockeys  '' ,  ``  Most Played in  jukeboxes  ''  और  ``  the  Top 100  ''  .
These charts , which  ranged   इससे   20  to 100 slots ,  यहूद  phased  आउट  at  अलग   टाइम्स   between   1957   और  1958  .
हालांकि  technically  नहीं  part of  the  Hot  100  chart history , their data is included  लिये   कम्प्यूटेशनल  purposes ,  और   to  avoid unenlightening or misleading  characterizations   .
All  वस्तुएं   सूचीबद्ध  below  हैं  from the Hot 100 era  ,  unless otherwise noted ( pre-Hot  100  charts ) .
V  is  an American  विज्ञान   fiction   टेलीविज़न   श्रेणी   कि   भागा  for  दो  seasons on  एबीसी  , from November 3 ,  2009   to  March 15 , 2011 .
A remake of the 1983 miniseries created  by   केनेथ   जॉनसन   ,  the new series chronicles  the  arrival on  धरती   of  a technologically  उन्नत   एलियन   प्रजाति  which  ostensibly   आता   in   सलाम  ,  लकिन  actually has sinister  motives  .
v  stars Morena  baccarin   ,   lourdes  Benedicto  ,  Morris Chestnut  ,   जोएल  Gretsch  ,  Logan Huffman , Charles Mesure , Elizabeth Mitchell ,  लौरा  Vandervoort and Scott  भेड़िया   ,  and was executive produced  by  Scott  rosenbaum  , Yves Simoneau ,  स्कॉट   पीटर्स   ,  and Jace Hall .
The  श्रेणी  was  उत्पादित   by   the  Scott Peters  कम्पनी  , HDFilms and Warner Bros.  टेलीविज़न  .
Geocaching is an  बाहरी  recreational activity , in which  the  participants  उपयोग   a  Global Positioning  प्रणाली   (   gps   )   receiver   or  mobile  यंत्र  and  अन्य  navigational  तकनीकों  to  छुपा  and seek containers , called `` geocaches  ''   or   ``   caches   ''  , anywhere  in   the   संसार   .
a   ठेठ   संचय  is  a  small  waterproof  container  containing  a logbook where  the   geocacher  enters the  तिथि  they found  it  and  लक्षण  it with their established code  नाम  .
बाद  signing  into  the log ,  the  cache must  be  placed back exactly  जहाँ   the   व्यक्ति   मिला  it .
Larger containers such  as   प्लास्टिक  storage containers ( Tupperware  or  similar ) or  ammunition  boxes  can  also contain items  लिये  trading ,  प्रायः   खिलौने   or   trinkets   of  little value .
Geocaching  साझा   अनेक  aspects with benchmarking , trigpointing , orienteering ,  treasure-hunting   ,  letterboxing  ,  and waymarking .
Boogie  bas   प्रोडक्शन्स  was a hip hop group  कि   थी   originally   रचित  of  krs-one  ,  d-nice  , and DJ Scott La Rock .
DJ Scott  la  Rock was murdered on August 27  ,  1987  ,  months  बाद   the  release of  bdp   's  debut album  ,  Criminal  minded  .
the  name of the group , Boogie  bas   ,   गर्भाशयी  from a nickname for the South  bronx  section of The Bronx  ,  one  of   the   पाँच  boroughs of New York City .
The  समूह   pioneered  the  संलयन  of  डांसहॉल   रेगी  and  हिप  hop  म्यूज़िक   और   उनके  debut LP  दण्ड   minded   contained  frank descriptions of  जीवन   in  the  दक्षिण   bronx  of the late 1980s thus setting  the  stage  लिये   कया   होता  eventually become gangsta rap .
a  municipal  बंध   is  a  बंध   जारी  by  a  local  सरकारी  ,  or  their agencies .
संभावित  issuers of  नगरपालिका   bonds  include  राज्य  ,  शहरों   ,  counties  ,   redevelopment  agencies , special-purpose  जिले  , school districts , public utility  जिले   ,   सरेआम  owned airports and seaports , and  कोई   अन्य  governmental entity  (   or  group  of  governments ) at  or  below  the  state level  .
नगरपालिका   bonds   may   be   सामान्य   दायित्वों  of the issuer  or   secured  by  निर्दिष्ट  revenues  .
In  the  United States  ,   ब्याज  income  प्राप्त  by  धारकों  of municipal bonds is often  exempt  from the  संघीय   आय  tax and from the income tax of  the  state in  जिससे  they are issued , although  नगरपालिका   bonds  issued for certain  उद्देश्य  may not be  कर  exempt .
नापसंद   नई  issue  स्टॉक्स  that are brought  to   मार्केट  with price restrictions until the  सौदे  is  बेची  , municipal bonds  हैं   फ़्री  to trade at any time once  वे   हैं  purchased by  the  investor .
Professional traders regularly  व्यापार  and retrade the same bonds several times a week .
``   gim   me   कुछ   lovin  '  ''  is a  सोंग  written by  स्टीव  Winwood  ,  Spencer  डेविस  and  muff   winwood  ,  और   originally   performed  by The  स्पेंसर   डेविस  Group .
The  मौलिक  riff  of   the  song was borrowed from  the   होमर  Banks song  ``  ( Ai n't  कि   )   a   लॉट  of Love '' , written  by   बैंको  and Willie Dean  ``  Deanie ''  पार्कर  .
``  gim  me Some  lovin  ' '' was a UK # 2  in   the  Autumn of 1966  और  a  us  # 7  .
The  सोंग  is ranked #  247  on the Rolling  स्टोन   पत्रिका  's list of The 500 Greatest Songs  of   सब  Time  .
the  version issued in the  uk  ( and probably most  of  Europe ) is different from  कि   जारी   in  the US on the  संयुक्त  Artists label  ,   होने  slower  ,  and lacking  the  backing vocals  और   ``  live sounding  ''   प्रदर्शन   मिला  on the US  सिंगल  .
( The US version has more  प्रायः  been used on reissue CDs , even  those   coming   इससे  Europe  .   )
the   सिंगल  features the sound of the Hammond B-3  अंग  .
the   अंतरजाल  Movie Database (  आईएमडीबी   )  is  an   ऑनलाइन  database  of  information related to films ,  टेलीविज़न   कार्यक्रम  ,  और   वीडियो  games .
इस   शामिल  actors  ,   उत्पादन  crew personnel ,  और  fictional  वर्ण  featured  in   ये  three visual entertainment media  .
It  is  one  of  the  सबसे  popular  ऑनलाइन  entertainment destinations  ,  with  over  100  लाख  unique  उपयोक्ता   प्रत्येक   माह   और  a  ठोस   और   rapidly   growing  mobile presence  .
IMDb  थी  launched on October  17   ,  1990 ,  और  in  1998   थी  acquired by  amazon.com  .
as  of April  27  ,  2013  ,  आईएमडीबी  had  2,503,783  titles ( includes episodes  )  and  5,192,493  personalities in its database  ,  as  खूब   as   43  million  पंजीकृत  users .
The website  रै   an   एलेक्सा  rank  of  48  .
Fibre  चैनल  Host  बस  Adapter  (  64-bit PCI-X  कार्ड  )
SCSI  मेजबान   बस  Adapter  (  16-bit  isa  card  )
In computer hardware  ,   a  host controller  ,  host adapter  ,  or  मेजबान  bus adapter  (  HBA )  connects  a  मेजबान  system  (  the computer ) to other  संजाल   और   भंडार  devices .
The terms  हैं  primarily used to  refer  to  डिवाइस   लिये  connecting SCSI , Fibre  चैनल  and eSATA devices .
however  ,  डिवाइस  for connecting to  आईडीई  , Ethernet  ,   firewire  , USB and other systems  may  also be called  मेजबान  adapters .
Recently  ,  the advent of  iscsi  and  fibre   चैनल   over  Ethernet has brought about  ईथरनेट  HBAs  ,  which are  अलग   इससे   ईथरनेट  NICs in that they  शामिल  TCP Offload  इंजन   .
There  हैं   भी  converged  hbas   कि  support  दोनो   ईथरनेट  and Fibre Channel called Converged Network Adapters (  cnas  ) .
cashmere  Scarves
आधुनिक  men  's   cashmere  sweaters  लिये   बिक्री  .
cashmere  wool  ,   प्रायः  simply known as cashmere , is a  रेशा   प्राप्त  from Cashmere  बकरियों  and other  प्रकार  of goat  .
The word  cashmere  derives  इससे   an  old spelling  of  Kashmir .
cashmere   is  fine  in   बनावट  ,  दमदार  ,  लाइट   ,   और   नरम  .
garments  made from  it   provide  excellent insulation .
In the United  राज्य  ,  अंतर्गत  the U.S . Wool Products Labeling Act of  1939  , as amended ,  (  15 Uction 68b ( a )  (  6 ) )  ,  states that  a  wool or  वस्त्र  product may not  be  labeled  as   containing  cashmere unless:
ऐसे   ऊन   उत्पाद  is the  ठीक   (   dehaired   )   undercoat  fibers produced  by  a cashmere goat  (  Capra hircus laniger  )  ;
the average diameter of the fiber  of   ऐसे   ऊन   उत्पाद  does not exceed  19   माइक्रोन   ;   और
ऐसे   ऊन  product does not  contain  more than 3 percent ( by weight  )  of cashmere fibers with average  diameters  that  exceed   30  microns  .
the  average fiber  व्यास  may  be   विषय  to  a  coefficient  of   विभिन्नता  around the mean  कि  shall not exceed  24  percent .
जेनिफर  Convertibles  inc.  is  the  owner  और  licensor  of  sofabed  और  leather  specialty  retail stores in the  संयुक्त  States ,  साथ  stores  स्तिथ   throughout  the Eastern seaboard  ,  in  the  Midwest ,  on  the  वेस्ट  Coast and in the  दक्षिणपश्चिम  .
The company was  संस्थापित  in  1975  and is based in  woodbury  , New York .
on  July 19 , 2010 ,  the   कम्पनी   घोषित  that it  था  filed  लिये  bankruptcy as  a   consequence  of `` substantial losses  ''  .
According to  फर्नीचर  Today the company was  क्रमांक   48  among furniture retailers with  us   $   114  million in  बिक्री   लिये   the  year ending August  29  , 2009 .
It subsequently emerged from Chapter  11  under  the  control of its  प्रमुख   प्रदायक   ,  the  haining  Mengnu Group .
अंडा  roll  is  a term used for many  अलग  foods  around  the world  .
2__egg_roll  __  किस्में  of egg rolls  हैं   मिला  in  मेनलैंड   चीन   ,   अनेक  Chinese-speaking regions of Asia , and Chinese  अप्रवासी  communities  around  the world .
Egg rolls  as  referred to in China .
in  Guangdong and Hong  काँग   ,  egg roll  प्रायः  refers to  बिस्किट   फेंकें  .
इस  is a type of  बिस्किट  .
The  संघटक   शामिल  egg ,  आटा  and sugar  .
Egg  फेंकें  also  is   a   डिश  in Canton  और  Hong  काँग  ,  इस  is usually made with  सब्ज़ी  .
Within China  अंडा   रोल्स  are eaten  predominantly  in the southeast  और   हैं  not  as  commonly consumed in the  उत्तर  and western parts of China  .
In American  चाइनीज  cuisine , an egg roll is a savory dish typically  परोसा   as  an  क्षुधावर्धक   .
It  is   प्रायः   भरवां  with chicken  ,  pork  or  shrimp , cabbage , carrots , tomatoes  ,  bean  sprouts  and  अन्य  vegetables , and then deep fried .
This variety  of   the  egg  फेंकें  is  बहुत  common  और   लोकप्रिय  ,  आरपार  even regional  किस्में  of American Chinese food  ,   और  is often included as  भाग  of  a   ``  combination  platter  ''  .
In  मॉन्ट्रियल   ,  Canada , open-ended  eggrolls  are a Jewish-Chinese fusion dish .
They can be either  कोषेर   certified  or  merely  kosher  स्टाइल  .
Pain  और  suffering is the legal  पद  for  the   शारीरिक  and emotional  तनाव  caused  इससे  an injury ( see also  पीड़ा  and suffering ) .
Some  क्षतिपूर्ति  that might be under  इस  category  होता  be : aches , temporary and  स्थाई   सीमाएं  on  कार्यकलाप   ,  potential  shortening  of  जीवन  ,  अवसाद  or scarring .
When filing a lawsuit as a  परिणाम  of an  चोट  , it  is   आम  for someone  to  seek money  दोनो  in  मुआवजे   लिये  actual money that is  खोया  and for  the   पीड़ा   और  stress  संबद्ध  with virtually  कोई   चोट  .
In a suit ,  पीड़ा  and suffering is part  of  the ``  सामान्य  damages ''  खण्ड   of  the  claimant  's  अर्जी   ,  or , alternatively ,  it  is an element  of  ``  compensatory  '' non-economic damages  कि  allows  रिकवरी  for  the  mental anguish  and/or  physical  पीड़ा   endured  by the  claimant   as  a  परिणाम  of injury  लिये  which  the  plaintiff seeks redress  .
अलावा  from money damages  awarded  in trial  ,   धन   क्षतिपूर्ति   हैं   भी   दिए  informally outside the judicial system in  mediations   ,   मध्यस्थता  ( both of  जिससे   may  be court  annexed  or  गैर  litigated  दावा  ) as well as in routine insurance settlements .
Individual claimants or those represented  by  lawyers often present demands to insurers to  settle   लिये   धन   .
These demand  लिये   bodily   चोट   मुआवजे   monies  often  नियत  out damages that  हैं   similarly  used in  the   अदालत   litigated  pleadings  .
मांगे  are usually written summaries  of   a   claimant  's medical  परवाह  and  the  facts which resulted in the injury .
Sample of  a  Medallion signature guarantee stampIn
the  United  राज्य  and Canada  ,  a  medallion  signature guarantee is  a   खास  signature guarantee for  the  transfer of securities  .
It is a  गारंटी   by  the transferring financial institution that the signature is genuine and the  वित्तीय  institution accepts liability  लिये  any  जालसाजी  .
हस्ताक्षर   guarantees   protect  shareholders by preventing unauthorized transfers and possible  निवेशकों  losses .
They also  सीमा   the  liability of the transfer  एजेंट   जो  accepts  the  certificates .
अलग  institutions have different policies as  to  what type  of   पहचान  they require to provide the guarantee and whether they  चार्ज   a   शुल्क  for  ऐसे   सेवा  (  प्रायः   नाममात्र  if  कोई  ) .
सबसे  institutions  होगा  not  गारंटी  a signature  of   किसी  who  रै   नहीं   already  been their customer .
A medallion signature guarantee is not  the  same  as  an  acknowledgment  by  a  notary  पब्लिक  , in the  भाव  that a ``  हस्ताक्षर   गारंटी  ''  is  a certification by  the  institution that the  हस्ताक्षर   is   प्रामाणिक   ,   और  an acknowledgment is  a   प्रमाणन   by   a  notary public  attesting  that the signer signed  a  document  voluntarily   .
Some banks may no longer provide this  सेवा  ,  however   ,  many still do as  खूब  as other  वित्तीय   संस्थानों   ऐसे   as  a Savings  और   लोन  and Credit Unions .
At their sole discretion  ,  these  संस्थानों  may still decline  to   provide   the  Medallion Signature Guarantees .
When  us  citizens are  विदेश  ,  कुछ  financial  संस्थानों   may   accept   संयुक्त  States  दूतावास   seals  , in place of  the  Medallion Signature  गारंटी  Stamp  .
Pacific  इलेक्ट्रिक   रेल  streetcars  stacked  at  a   junkyard   on  Terminal Island  ,   लॉस   एंजिल्स  County  ,  California ,  कूच   1956
the  General  मोटर्स  streetcar conspiracy  (  also known  as   the   ग्रेट  American streetcar scandal  )   refers   to  allegations and  convictions  in relation  to  a program  by  General Motors (  gm  ) and  अन्य  companies  जो  purchased and  तब   dismantled  streetcar and electric train  प्रणालियों   in  many  अमरीकी   शहरों  .
between  1936 and 1950 , National  नगर   लाइनों   और   प्रशांत  City Lines —with  निवेश  from GM ,  firestone  Tire ,  मानक  Oil of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,  Phillips  पेट्रोलियम   ,   mack   ट्रक  , and the Federal Engineering Corporation—bought over  100   इलेक्ट्रिक  surface-traction systems in 45 cities  सहित  Baltimore  ,   न्यूर्क  , Los Angeles ,  नई  York  नगर  , Oakland and San  डिएगो  and converted  उन्हें  into  बस   आपरेशन   .
अनेक   of   the  companies involved were convicted  in   1949  of conspiracy to monopolize  अंतरराज्यीय   कॉमर्स  but  यहूद  acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the ownership of these  कंपनियाँ   .
Some suggest that  इस   कार्यक्रम   निभाई   a  key role in the  मनाही  of public  पारगमन   in  cities across the  संयुक्त   राज्य   ;  notably Edwin J. Quinby ,  जो   पहला  drew attention to  the  program in 1946 ,  और  then  ब्रैडफोर्ड   C.   snell  , an  anti-trust  attorney  लिये  the  संयुक्त  States Senate whose  विवादास्पद   1974   गवाही   to  a Senate inquiry  brought   the   समस्या  to national awareness  .
Both  quinby  and Snell argued that the  deliberate  destruction  of   streetcars  was part of a  larger   रणनीति   to  push the  संयुक्त  States into  ऑटोमोबाइल  dependency  .
Others say  कि  independent  आर्थिक  factors  brought  about changes  in   the   पारगमन   प्रणाली  , including  the   ग्रेट   अवसाद  ,  the  Public Utility Holding  कम्पनी  Act of 1935 , labor unrest ,  मार्केट  forces  ,   rapidly  increasing traffic  जमघट  , urban  sprawl   ,  taxation policies that  favored  private vehicle ownership  ,  and  सामान्य   enthusiasm  for  the   ऑटोमोबाइल   .
One writer on  the  subject has suggested  कि  Snell and others  गिरी  into  simplistic   षड्यंत्र   सिद्धान्त  thinking , bordering  on   paranoid   delusions   saying  ``  clearly  ,  gm   waged   a  war on  इलेक्ट्रिक   कर्षण  .
It was  बेशक  an  सब  out assault ,  लकिन   by  no means the single  कारण  for  the   विफलता   of  rapid transit .
Also , it is  बस   as   साफ  that actions  और   inactions  by government  contributed  significantly  to  the  विलोपन   of  electric  कर्षण  .  ''
तभी   a  small handful of  u.S.  cities  have  surviving effective rail-based urban  हस्तांतरण   प्रणालियों  based  on  streetcars or  trams  ,  सहित  Newark , Philadelphia , San Francisco ,  पिट्सबर्ग  , and  बोस्टन   ;  others  हैं  re-introducing them  .
The story has  महरूम   छान   अनेक   टाइम्स  in print , film  और   अन्य  media ,  notably  in Who Framed Roger  खरगोश   ,  Taken for a Ride and The  समाप्त  of Suburbia  .
corwin   हाउस  ,  सलेम   ,  Massachusetts  ,   निर्मित   ca   .  1660  ,  First Period  अंग्रेज़ी
American  औपनिवेशिक  architecture includes several  भवन  design styles associated with  the  colonial period  of   the   संयुक्त  States  ,  including First  काल   अंग्रेज़ी  (  late-medieval  ) , French Colonial  ,  Spanish Colonial , Dutch Colonial and Georgian .
These styles  हैं   संबद्ध  with  the   घरों  , churches  और  government buildings  of  the period from  परिचय   1600  through the 19th  सदी  .
``  in   the   मनोदशा   ''   is   a  big  बैंड   era  # 1  hit   अंकित  by  अमरीकी  bandleader Glenn  मिलर  .
It  अव्वल   the   चार्ट   in  1940 in  the  U.S. and  एक  year  बाद  was featured in the  फिल्म  Sun Valley Serenade .
In 1999  ,  National Public  रेडियो  ( NPR  )  included the 1939 Glenn  मिलर  recording on RCA Bluebird on  the   npr  100  ,   the   सूची  of  ``   the   100  most  महत्वपूर्ण  American musical works of  the  20th century '' .
NEPTUNE logo
The NEPTUNE  कनाडा   प्रोजेक्ट  is the world’s  पहला  regional-scale underwater ocean observatory  कि  plugs directly into the  अंतरजाल  .
Since  दिसम्बर  2009  ,  it has allowed people  to  `` surf  ''   the  seafloor while  समंदर  scientists run  deep-water  experiments from labs  और  universities  around   the  world  .
Along with its sister project  ,  VENUS  ,  NEPTUNE offers  a  unique  दृष्टिकोण  to ocean science  .
Traditionally , ocean scientists have relied  on  infrequent ship  क्रूज़  or space-based satellites to carry out their research , while the NEPTUNE  प्रोजेक्ट   उपयोग   a  remotely operated  क्रॉलर   .
A gramophone  रिकार्ड   ,  commonly known  as  a phonograph  रिकार्ड  (  in  American  अंग्रेज़ी  ) , vinyl record  (  in reference to vinyl , the material most commonly  प्रयुक्त  after about 1950 ) , or colloquially  ,  `` a record '' , is  an  analog  ध्वनि  storage medium consisting  of  a  चपटा   डिस्क  with an inscribed  ,   modulated  spiral groove .
the  groove usually starts near  the  periphery and ends near the center of  the  disc  .
Phonograph  रिकॉर्ड  are generally described  by  their diameter  in   इंच  ( 12-inch  ,  10-inch ,  7-inch  ,  इत्यादि   .  )  ,  the rotational speed  at  which they are  निभाई   (   ``  33 rpm  ``   ,  ``  78   ''   ,   ``  45 ''  ,  etc  .  ) , their  समय   क्षमता   (   ``  long playing '' ) , their reproductive  सटीकता   ,   or   ``   वफ़ादारी   ``  ( ``  ऊँची   वफ़ादारी  '' ,  ``  Orthophonic ''  ,  `` full-range ''  ,  etc .  )  , and the number of  चैनल्स  of audio  provided  (  ``  mono  ``   ,  ``  स्टीरियो   ``  , ``  quadraphonic  `` , etc . ) .
Phonograph  रिकॉर्ड  were the  प्राथमिक  medium used for music reproduction for  सबसे  of the 20th  सदी   ,  replacing  the  phonograph cylinder  ,   साथ   जिससे   it   था  co-existed , by  the  1920s .
By the  लेट   1980s  , digital  मीडिया  had gained  a   larger  market  share  ,  और  the vinyl record  बाएँ   the  mainstream  in  1991 .
वे   continue  to  be  manufactured  और  sold in the 21st century .
In 2008  ,   nearly  2.9  लाख  units  shipped   ,  the most in  कोई   साल   चूंकि   1998  and  the  format has continued  to  slowly regain  लोकप्रियता   .
They  हैं   विशेषकर  used by  djs  and  audiophiles   लिये  many  प्रकार  of music .
As  of  2013  ,  vinyl  रिकॉर्ड  continue  to   be   प्रयुक्त  for distribution .

the   konza  tallgrass  प्रेयरी   in   the  Flint Hills of northeastern  कान्सास   .
