grasslands   हैं   क्षेत्रों   जहाँ  the vegetation  is  dominated by grasses  (   पोएसी  ) ,  however  sedge (  cyperaceae  ) and rush (  juncaceae   )  families can  भी  be found .
Grasslands occur  naturally  on all continents except  अंटार्कटिक  .
in   शीतोष्ण   latitudes  ,  ऐसे  as  northwestern   यूरोपीय   और   the  Great Plains and  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  in North  अमेरिका   ,  native  grasslands  are dominated by perennial bunch grass species , whereas  in  warmer  climates   सालाना  species form  a  greater component  of  the vegetation .
Grasslands are  मिला  in  सबसे   ecoregions  of the Earth .
For example there  हैं  five terrestrial ecoregion classifications  (  subdivisions  )  of the  शीतोष्ण  grasslands  ,  savannas , and shrublands  बायोम   (   '  ecosystem '  )  ,  जिससे  is one  of  eight terrestrial  ecozones  of the Earth 's  सतह   .
हिना   (  Lawsonia inermis ,  भी  called henna  पेड़   )  or Hina  is  a flowering plant ,  the  sole  प्रजाति  in  the  genus  lawsonia   in   the  family Lythraceae .
The English name  ``  henna  ''  comes  इससे  the  अरबी  (  ala-lc  :  ḥinnāʾ  /  सुनाया  ) or colloquially ,  loosely   सुनाया   .
The  नाम  is also used  लिये   डाई  preparations  निकला  from the  संयंत्र  ,  और   लिये  the art  of  temporary tattooing based  on  those dyes .
हिना  has  महरूम  used  चूंकि   प्राचीनता  to dye skin ,  बाल  , and fingernails  ,  as  खूब  as  fabrics  including  रेशा  ,  ऊन  and  चमड़े   .
Additionally  ,  the  नाम   is   misused   लिये  other skin  और   बाल  dyes  ,   ऐसे  as black henna or neutral henna , which are not derived from the  संयंत्र  .
A thin  फिल्मी   is   a  layer of material ranging from  भिन्नों   of  a nanometer ( monolayer ) to  अनेक   micrometers   in  thickness .
Electronic semiconductor  डिवाइस   और  optical coatings  हैं  the  प्रमुख  applications  लाभकारी  from thin-film  निर्माण  .
A  परिचित   अनुप्रयोग  of  पतला  films  is   the   household  mirror  ,  which typically  रै  a  पतला   मेटल   कोटिंग   on  the back of a sheet  of  glass  to   रूप   a  reflective  इंटरफ़ेस  .
the  process  of   silvering  was once commonly  प्रयुक्त   to  produce  mirrors  .
a  very-thin-film coating  (  less than  a  nanometer thick  )   is   प्रयुक्त  to produce  two-way  mirrors .
the   प्रदर्शन   of  optical coatings  (   e.g  .  antireflective  , or  ar   ,  coatings  )  are typically  उन्नत  when  the   thin-film  coating consists  of  multiple layers having varying thicknesses  और  refractive  indices  .
Similarly  ,  a periodic structure  of  alternating thin films of  अलग  materials  may  collectively form a  so-called  superlattice  जिससे   कारनामे  the phenomenon  of   क्वांटम   कारावास  by  restricting   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   phenomena  to  two-dimensions   .
कार्य  is  होने   किया  with  ferromagnetic   और  ferroelectric thin films  लिये   उपयोग  as computer  मेमोरी  .
It is also being applied to  दवाएँ  , via thin-film drug  डिलीवरी  .
Thin-films are  प्रयुक्त   to  produce thin-film  बैटरी   .
Thin films are also used in dye-sensitized  सौर  cells  .
सिरेमिक  thin films are  in  wide use  .
The relatively high  कठोरता  and  inertness   of  ceramic  सामग्री   मेक  this type of thin coating  of  interest for protection of substrate materials  विरूद्ध  corrosion ,  ऑक्सीकरण   और  wear .
In particular ,  the  use  of   ऐसे  coatings  on  cutting tools can extend  the  life of these items by  अनेक   आदेश  of  परिमाण  .
शोध   is  being done on a new class  of  thin-film  अकार्बनिक   ऑक्साइड   सामग्री   ,   पुकारा  amorphous  heavy-metal  cation  multicomponent   आक्साइड  ,  जिससे  could be used  to  make transparent  transistors  that are  inexpensive   ,   stable   ,   और   environmentally  benign  .
Gears  of  War  is  a military science fiction  third-person  shooter video game developed by  एपिक   खेल   और  published by  microsoft  Game Studios  .
It was  initially  released as  an  exclusive title  लिये  the Xbox 360 in November 2005  in   उत्तर  America ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , and most of Europe and included  a  `` Limited  कलेक्टर   's   संस्करण  '' with added  सामग्री   और  an  आर्ट   किताब   titled  Destroyed Beauty that detailed  much  of the  खेल   's  back-story  .
despite   the  initial  कथन  of Xbox  360  exclusivity  ,   a   microsoft  Windows  संस्करण   of   the  game  थी  developed in  संयोजन   साथ   लोगों   can  Fly  और  released  a  year later , featuring new  सामग्री  including  अतिरिक्त   अभियान   स्तर   ,  a new multiplayer game mode  ,  and Games  लिये   खिड़कियाँ  Live  कार्यक्षमता   .
the   खेल   focuses   on   the  troops of Delta  स्क्वाड   as  they  wield  a  हताश   ,  last-ditch attempt  to  save the remaining  इंसान   निवासियों   of   the  fictional planet  sera   इससे   a   अथक   और  seemingly unstoppable subterranean  दुश्मन  known as  the  Locust Horde  .
The player  assumes  the  भूमिका  of Marcus Fenix  (  but can  भी  play as  डोमिनिक  Santiago )  ,  a former  कैदी  and war-hardened soldier .
the  game  is  based on  the   उपयोग  of  कवर  and strategic fire for  the  player  to   अग्रिम  through the  scenarios   ;  a second  खिलाड़ी  can  खेल   cooperatively  through  the   प्रमुख  campaign to assist .
The  खेल  also features several online  एकाधिक   खेल  modes for  up  to eight  खिलाड़ी  .
Gears of  युद्ध   बेची  over three million copies  in  just ten weeks and was the  fastest-selling  video  खेल  of  2005   as  well as the second-most played game over Xbox  सजीव   दौरान  .
It currently  स्टैंड  as  the   5th   बेहतरीन  selling Xbox 360 game of  सब   समय  .
the   खेल   रै   चूंकि   बेची  over five million copies by September  2008   .
The  खेल   थी  well received by  आलोचकों  , who praised  इसके  gameplay and detailed visuals  ,   और   it   जीती  several ``  खेल   of  the  साल   ''  awards in  2006  .
the   कामयाबी  of the game has led  to  the  विकास  of  the   गियर्स  of War franchise , including the  2008   sequel  Gears of War  2   और   इसके  follow-up  ,   गियर्स  of War  3  , which was released  on   सितंबर   20  ,  2011  ,  बाद   having  initially  महरूम  set  to   have   महरूम   released  on April 5  ,  2011  ,   the  date  upon  which  एपिक   खेल  '  चट्टान  Bleszinski was a guest  on  Late Night with Jimmy Fallon .
Adaptations to books ,  कॉमिक्स   ,  as  खूब  as a  विशेषता  film  हैं   to  be expected .
a   पेड़  Grows in Brooklyn  is  a  1943  novel written  by  Betty Smith .
the  story  focuses  on an  irish-american   परिवार  in Williamsburg , Brooklyn , New York City .
The  अनोखा  is set in the first and second  दशकों  of the 20th century  .
the   किताब  was an  immense  success .
The main metaphor  of  the book  is  the  हार्डी   पेड़  of  स्वर्ग  , native  to  China and Taiwan , now  माना   हृदयरोग   ,  and common in  the   vacant  lots of  नई  York  नगर   .
संसार  map with  the  intertropical zone highlighted in red .
Tropical climate  zones  of the  धरती  where all twelve months have mean temperatures above  18   °c  (  64  °F ) .
the   ऊष्णकटिबन्ध  is a region  of   the  Earth  surrounding  the Equator .
it   is  limited in  अक्षांश  by the Tropic  of  Cancer  in  the northern  गोलार्ध   at   लगभग   n   और  the  tropic   of   मकर  in the southern  गोलार्ध  at  s   ;   ये  latitudes correspond to  the   अक्षीय   झुकाव   of   the  Earth .
The tropics are  भी   referred  to as the tropical zone  और  the torrid zone ( see geographical  मण्डल  ) .
The tropics include all the areas on the Earth  जहाँ   the   सूर्य  reaches  a   पाइंट  directly overhead  at   तनिक  once during the solar year .
the  tropics are  विशिष्ट   इससे  the other climatic and biomatic regions of Earth  ,   the   मध्य  latitudes and the  ध्रुवीय  regions  on   either  side of the equatorial zone  .
For the INXS  सोंग   ,  see What You Need (  सोंग  ) .
`` What  तुम  Need ''  is   an  episode of the  अमरीकी  television anthology  श्रेणी   the   गोधूलि   मण्डल   .
It  is  based  on  the  छोटी   स्टोरी   of   the  same name  by   लुईस  Padgett ( Henry  kuttner   और   C.  L.  मूर  )  .
playhousesquare  , in  the  Cleveland  थिएटर  District  in  downtown Cleveland  ,   ओहियो   ,   is   the  second-largest  थिएटर   जटिल  in the United  राज्य  , second only to New York City 's Lincoln Center  )   .
Constructed  in  a span of 19 months  in  the  जल्दी  1920s , the theaters were  subsequently  closed  bas  , but were  revived   through  a  grassroots  effort  .
Their  नवीकरण   और  reopening  helped  usher in a new era  of   शहर   पुनरोद्धार   in  Cleveland  ,   और  was called  ``  one of  the   शीर्ष   टेन  successes  in   क्लीवलैंड   इतिहास  . ''
the   ड्राइवर   और  passenger  सामने   airbags   ,  after having  महरूम  deployed ,  in   a  British Peugeot  306  car  .
An airbag  is  a vehicle  सुरक्षा  device .
It is an occupant  संयम   प्रणाली   consisting   of   a   लचीली  fabric envelope  or   cushion   designed   to  inflate rapidly  दौरान  an  ऑटोमोबाइल  collision .
इसके  purpose is to  cushion   occupants  during a crash and provide protection  to  their bodies when  वे   स्ट्राइक   आंतरिक  objects such as the  परिचालन   व्हील  or a window .
आधुनिक   वाहनों  may contain multiple  एयरबैग  modules in various  पक्ष  and frontal locations of  the   यात्री  seating positions , and sensors may deploy  एक   or  more airbags  in   an   प्रभाव   मण्डल  at  परिवर्तनीय   दरों  based on the type  ,  angle and  गंभीरता   of   प्रभाव  ; the  एयरबैग  is  designed   to  only  inflate   in   मॉडरेट   to   कठोर   frontal  crashes .
Airbags are  सामान्यतः  designed  साथ   the   इरादे   of  supplementing  the  protection of  an  occupant who  is   correctly   restrained  with  a   seatbelt  .
सबसे   डिजाइन   हैं   inflated   through   pyrotechnic   अर्थात्   और  can only  be   संचालित   एकबार  .
नए  side-impact airbag  मौड्यूल   consist  of compressed air  सिलेंडर  that  हैं  triggered in the  इवेंट   of   a  side impact  गाडी   प्रभाव  .
The first  वाणिज्यिक  designs were introduced  in  passenger automobiles during  the  1970s with limited  कामयाबी  .
व्यापक  commercial  अपनाना   of  airbags  occurred   in   अनेक  markets  दौरान  the late 1980s  और   जल्दी  1990s with a driver  एयरबैग  , and  a  front passenger airbag as well  on   कुछ  cars ; and many modern vehicles now  शामिल  four  or  more units .
IRS tax  फ़ॉर्म  are used for taxpayers and tax-exempt  संगठन  to  रपट  financial information to the  आतंरिक  Revenue Service ( IRS  )   of  the United States  .
They  हैं   प्रयुक्त  to  रपट  income  ,   गणना  taxes to be paid  to  the federal  सरकारी  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  और  disclose other  सूचना  as required by the Internal Revenue  कोड  (  आईआरसी  ) .
वहीँ  are  over  800 various  फ़ॉर्म  and schedules .
the   best-known   of  these  is   रूप  1040 used by  individuals  .
In  the   संयुक्त  States  ,  driver 's  पंक्तियां  are issued  by   प्रत्येक   व्यक्तिगत  state  (  including  वॉशिंगटन   ,  D.C. and territories  )  ,  बल्कि   than  the federal government because  of  the  राजनैतिक  concept of federalism .
Drivers are normally required to obtain  a   अनुज्ञा  from  उनके   राज्य  of residence and all states recognize each  अन्य   's  licenses for temporary visitors subject  to   सामान्य  age  आवश्यकताएँ  .
a   राज्य   may  also suspend an individual 's  ड्राइविंग  privilege  भीतर  its borders for  ट्रैफ़िक  violations  .
अनेक  states share a  आम   प्रणाली   of   अनुज्ञा  classes  ,   साथ  some  अपवाद  ,  और  commercial license  वर्ग  are  मानकीकृत   by  federal  विनियमन  at 49  cfr   भाग   383  .
चीन   रै   महरूम  the  सोर्स  of  अनेक  inventions  ,   सहित  the Four  ग्रेट  Inventions :  papermaking   ,  the compass , gunpowder , and  मुद्रण  ( both woodblock  और  movable type ) .
The  सूची  below contains  ये  and  अन्य  inventions  .
The Chinese invented technologies involving  यांत्रिकी   ,   hydraulics   ,  and mathematics applied to  horology  ,  metallurgy   ,  astronomy , agriculture ,  अभियान्त्रिकी  , music theory ,  craftsmanship   ,   nautics  , and  warfare  .
By  the   युद्धरत   राज्य   काल  ( 403–221  bc  ) , they  था   उन्नत  metallurgic  प्रौद्योगिकी   ,  including the blast furnace  और  cupola furnace  ,  while the finery forge  और  puddling process were known  by  the Han Dynasty ( 202  bc  – AD 220 ) .
A  sophisticated  economic system  in  China gave  जनम  to  आविष्कारों  such as paper money during the  सोंग  Dynasty ( 960–1279  )   .
The invention of gunpowder  by  the  10th   सदी   led  to an array of inventions such as  the  fire  तलवार  , land mine  ,   नवल   मेरा   ,   हाथ   तोपों   ,  exploding  गोलों  ,  multistage   प्रक्षेपास्त्र   ,  and rocket  बम   साथ  aerodynamic  विंग्स   और   विस्फोटक   payloads   .
With the  navigational  aid of  the   11th-century  compass and  क्षमता   to  steer at high sea with the  1st-century  sternpost  अरित्र  , premodern Chinese sailors  sailed  as  दूर  as  ईस्ट   अफ़्रीकी  and Egypt .
in  water-powered clockworks  ,  the premodern Chinese had used  the   escapement   यांत्रिकी   चूंकि   the   8th   सदी  and the  अंतहीन  power-transmitting chain drive  in  the  11th   सदी  .
They also  बना   विशाल   mechanical  puppet  थिएटर  driven  by  waterwheels and  carriage  wheels and  wine-serving  automatons driven by  चप्पू  wheel  नौकाएँ  .
the  contemporaneous Peiligang and Pengtoushan  संस्कृतियों   represent   the  oldest  पाषाणकालीन  cultures  of   चीन   और  were formed around 7000  bc  .
कुछ  of  the  first inventions  of   पाषाणकालीन  , prehistoric China  शामिल  semilunar  और  rectangular  स्टोन   knives  , stone hoes and  हुकुम  , the cultivation of millet ,  राइस   और   the   सोयाबीन  , the  refinement   of   sericulture   ,  the  भवन   of  rammed earth structures  साथ  lime  -plastered   हाउस  floors  ,  the creation of the potter 's wheel  ,  the  सृष्टि   of  pottery  साथ   cord-mat-basket  designs , the creation  of  pottery tripods  और  pottery steamers , and the  विकास   of  ceremonial  बरतन  and  scapulimancy   लिये  purposes  of   भविष्यवाणी   .
फ्रांसिस्का  Bray  argues   कि   the  domestication  of  the ox and buffalo  दौरान   the  Longshan culture (  c.   3000–c   .   2000  BC ) period ,  the  absence  of  Longshan-era  सिंचाई  or  high-yield  crops  ,  full  प्रमाण  of  longshan   cultivation  of  dry-land  cereal  फसलों   जिससे   दिया  high yields `` only  जब  the soil was carefully  cultivated   ,  '' suggest  कि  the plow was  ज्ञात   at   तनिक   by   the  Longshan  संस्कृति  period  और   explains  the high agricultural production yields  जिससे  allowed the rise of Chinese  सभ्यता  during the  शांग   राजवंश  ( c.  1600–c  . 1050 BC )  .
साथ  later inventions  ऐसे  as the multiple-tube  बीज  drill  और  heavy moldboard iron  हल  , China 's  agricultural  output could sustain a  much  larger  जनसांख्यिकी  .
For the  उद्देश्य  of this list  ,   आविष्कारों  are regarded  as  technological firsts developed  in  China , and as such does not include foreign technologies which the Chinese acquired through contact ,  ऐसे  as the  पवनचक्की   इससे   the  Middle East  or   the   दूरदर्शी   इससे   जल्दी   आधुनिक   यूरोपीय  .
It also does  नहीं  include  technologies   विकसित  elsewhere and  बाद   invented  separately by the Chinese , such as the odometer  और   कड़ी  pump .
Scientific  ,  mathematic or natural discoveries  ,  changes in minor concepts of  डिज़ाइन  or  स्टाइल   और  artistic innovations  can   नहीं  be regarded as inventions  और  do  नहीं   appear   on  the list .
सकल  domestic  उत्पाद  in  2011  US dollars  प्रति  capita  ,   समायोजित   लिये  inflation and purchasing  शक्ति  parity (  log  scale ) from  1860  to 2011 , with population  (   डिस्क  area )  लिये   the  US  (   पीला   )  , UK  (   नारंगी  ) , Japan  (   रेड   )  ,  चीन  ( red ) ,  और   इण्डिया   (   ब्लू  )  .
वैश्वीकरण   (   or   globalisation—see  spelling  मतभेद   )  is  the   प्रक्रम   of  international  संयोजन   arising  from the interchange of world views ,  उत्पाद   ,   विचार   ,  and  अन्य  aspects of  संस्कृति  .
Put in simple  शर्तें   ,   वैश्वीकरण  refers to processes  कि  promote world-wide  exchanges  of national  और  cultural resources  .
Advances in transportation  और  telecommunications infrastructure ,  सहित   the  rise  of  the Internet  ,  are  प्रमुख  factors  in   वैश्वीकरण   ,   generating  further interdependence of economic and  सांस्कृतिक   क्रियाएँ  .
Though several  विद्वानों   प्लेस  the origins of globalization in modern  टाइम्स  ,  अन्य   ट्रेस   इसके   इतिहास  long before  the  European age of  डिस्कवरी   और   voyages  to the New  संसार  .
कुछ   भी   ट्रेस  the  origins   to  the  तीसरा   मिलेनियम   bce   .
चूंकि   the   शुरूआत  of the 20th century , the pace of  वैश्वीकरण   रै  intensified at a  रैपिड  rate , especially  दौरान  the Post  ठंडा   युद्ध  era .
the  term globalization  रै   महरूम   in   increasing  use since  the   mid-1980s   और  especially since  the  mid-1990s  .
in   2000  , the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Monetary  निधि   (  IMF  )  identified  चार   मौलिक   पहलुओं   of  globalization :  व्यापार  and transactions ,  पूंजी  and  निवेश   आंदोलनों  ,  माइग्रेशन  and  गति  of people and the dissemination of knowledge  .
further  , environmental challenges such as  जलवायु   बदलें   ,  cross-boundary water and air  प्रदूषण  ,  और  over-fishing of the ocean are  linked  with globalization  .
Globalizing processes affect and are affected by  कारोबार   और   कार्य   संगठन  , economics ,  socio-cultural   संसाधन  , and the  प्राकृतिक  environment .
The Replacements is  a  2000  अमरीकी   खेल   कॉमेडी   फिल्मी  directed by Howard Deutch  .
it  stars  कियानू  Reeves ,  जीन  Hackman ,  और   ब्रुक   langton  .
an   अमरीकी  Airlines  वायुयान  takes  बंद  from  dallas/fort   लायक   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport .
इस   विमानक्षेत्र  is the airline  's  largest hub  .
अमरीकी   एयरलाइंस   उड़ता  to  79  domestic destinations  और  78 international destinations  in  48 countries .
(   as  of  दिसम्बर   2012  )
the   सूची   शामिल  the city , country  ,  the  कोड  of  the  International  एयर  Transport Association ( IATA  विमानक्षेत्र  code  )  and  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   सिविल   विमानन  Organization  (  ICAO airport code ) , and  the   विमानक्षेत्र  's name  ,   साथ  the airline 's  hubs  ,  फ़ोकस  cities and seasonal destinations marked .
The  सूची  also  contains   गंतव्यों  no longer served by the airline , which  हैं  marked as terminated  गंतव्यों  .
It does not include destinations  परोसा  for American Airlines by  इसके  regional affiliates  अमरीकी  Eagle Airlines ,  कार्यपालिका   एयरलाइंस   ,  and  americanconnection  .
`` Day-O (  the   banana  Boat Song  )  '' is a traditional Jamaican mento folk song ,  the  best-known version of which was  सुंग  by Harry  belafonte   और  an  वैकल्पिक  version interspersed with another  jamaican   folksong  ,  हिल  and Gully Rider , by  dame   शर्ली   bassey   .
Despite  the   सोंग   's   mento  influences  ,   ``  Day-O (  the   banana   नाव   सोंग   )   ''  is widely  ज्ञात  as an example of calypso  म्यूज़िक  .
It is a work song  ,  from  the   पाइंट  of  दृश्य   of   डॉक  workers working the  रात्रि  shift  लदान  bananas  onto  ships .
daylight  has come  ,   the   शिफ़्ट   is  over and they  want  their work to  be   गिने  up so  कि   वे  can go  घर  .
World War I (  wwi  )  थी  a  वैश्विक  war centred  in   यूरोपीय  that  began  on 28  जुलाई  1914  और  lasted until 11 November  1918  .
it  was  predominantly   पुकारा   the  World  युद्ध  or the Great War  इससे  its  occurrence   जबतक  the start of World War  ii   in  1939  ,   और  the  पहला   संसार   युद्ध   or   संसार   युद्ध  I thereafter  .
It involved all the world 's  ग्रेट  powers  ,   जिससे  were assembled  in  two opposing alliances :  the   allies   (  based on the Triple Entente of  the  United Kingdom ,  फ़्रांस  and Russia  )   और   the  Central  शक्तियां  ( originally  the  Triple Alliance of Germany  ,  Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but  ,  as Austria–Hungary had taken  the   अप्रिय  against the agreement , Italy did not  डालें  into  the   युद्ध   )   .
These alliances were  दोनो   reorganised   और   विस्तारित  as  अधिक  nations  डाला  the  युद्ध  :  इटली  , Japan  और  the  संयुक्त  States joined the Allies  ,   और   the   उस्मानी   साम्राज्य  and Bulgaria the  सेंट्रल   शक्तियां  .
Ultimately ,  अधिक  than  70   लाख  military personnel  ,   सहित   60   लाख  Europeans  ,  were  mobilised  in one of  the  largest wars in history .
More  than  9 million  combatants  were  मारे   ,   largely   क्युकी  of technological advancements  कि  led to enormous  increases  in the lethality  of  weapons without corresponding  सुधार  in protection or  गतिशीलता  .
It  थी  the  fifth-  deadliest  विरोध  in world  इतिहास  , subsequently paving the  रास्ता  for various political  परिवर्तन   ,  such as  revolutions   in  many of the  राष्ट्र   शामिल  .
एक  of the  long-term  causes  of   the  war  थी  the  पुनरुत्थान   of   साम्राज्यवाद  in the  विदेशी  policies  of   the   ग्रेट   शक्तियां   of   यूरोपीय   .
अधिक   तत्काल  ,  the  assassination  of  Archduke  फ्रांज  Ferdinand of  ऑस्ट्रिया  ,  the   वारिस   to  the  सिंहासन   of   austria-hungary   ,  on 28 June  1914   by  Yugoslav  राष्ट्रवादी   gavrilo  Princip  in  Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis  जब  Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum  to  the  किंगडम  of Serbia  .
Several alliances  formed  over the previous decades  यहूद  invoked .
Within  सप्ताह  , the major  शक्तियां   यहूद  at war  और  , via  उनके  colonies ,  the  conflict soon spread around the  संसार   .
on  28 July  ,   the  Austro-Hungarians fired  the  first shots of the war as preparation for the  आक्रमण   of  Serbia  .
While  the  Russians  mobilised   ,  the  germans  invaded neutral  बेल्जियम  and Luxembourg  on   the   रास्ता  to  फ़्रांस  ,  providing   a  casus belli for Britain 's declaration  of  war  विरूद्ध   जर्मनी  .
After  the  German march on  पेरिस  was brought to a halt—the  so-called  Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled  into   a  static battle  of  attrition  साथ   a   गर्त  line  कि   बदला   छोटी  until  1917  .
on  the Eastern  सामने  ,  the  Russian army was successful against  the  Austro-Hungarians  ,  but was stopped  in   इसके  invasion of  ईस्ट   prussia   by  the  germans   .
in  November the  उस्मानी  Empire joined the  युद्ध  ,  खोलने  up fronts in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia  और   the  Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria went to war  in  1915  और   रोमानिया   in  1916 .
In Russia  ,   the   त्सार   's  government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November  brought  the  russians  to terms with  the  Central Powers  .
बाद   a  1918  जर्मनी  offensive  साथ  the western front ,  the   allies  drove back the  germans   in   a  series of successful offensives  और  American forces began entering the  trenches  .
जर्मनी  , which had  इसके  own trouble with revolutionaries  ,  agreed to an  armistice   on  11 November  1918  .
the  war  ended  in  विजय   लिये  the  allies  .
Events on the  घर   fronts   यहूद  as tumultuous as  on   the  battle  fronts   ,   as   the   भागीदार  tried  to  mobilize  उनके   जनशक्ति  and economic resources  to  fight a total  युद्ध  .
by  the  समाप्त  of  the  war  ,  four major imperial powers—the German  ,   रूसी  , Austro-Hungarian and  उस्मानी   empires—ceased   to  exist  .
the  successor  राज्य   of   the  former two lost  a  great  राशि  of territory , while  the   latter  two  यहूद  dismantled entirely  .
The map  of  central Europe  थी   redrawn  into several smaller states .
the  League of  राष्ट्र  was  formed  in the hope  of  preventing  another   ऐसे   विरोध  .
The European  राष्ट्रवाद  spawned by the war  और  the breakup of  empires  , the repercussions of Germany 's  शिकस्त   और   समस्याएं  with  the   सन्धि  of Versailles  हैं  agreed to  be  factors contributing  to   संसार   युद्ध  II .
Nurse Jackie  is   an  American series that  premiered  on June 8  ,  2009  ,  on Showtime , Movie Central and The Movie  संजाल  .
The  श्रेणी  stars  edie  Falco  as   the   शीर्षक  character  जैकी  Peyton , an emergency  विभाग  nurse at All  संतो  ' Hospital  in  New  यॉर्क  City  .
लिये  Jackie  ,  ``  प्रत्येक  day  is   a  high wire act of juggling patients ,  डॉक्टर  , fellow  नर्स   और   उसके  own indiscretions .  ''
Keeping Up  साथ  the Kardashians  (  often  referred   to  simply as The Kardashians  )  is an American reality television series that premiered  on  October 14 ,  2007   ,  on E  !   .
It follows the lives  of  the Kardashian/Jenner family , including sisters Kourtney , Kim  ,   और  Khloé Kardashian .

अफगानिस्तान   (   ;   ;  )  ,  officially the  इस्लामी   गणतंत्र   of  Afghanistan , is a landlocked sovereign state forming part of South Asia , Central Asia , and  to  some extent  पश्चिमी  Asia .
it  has a  जनसांख्यिकी   of   around  30 million inhabiting an  क्षेत्रफल  of approximately  ,  making  it  the 42nd  सबसे  populous and 41st  largest   स्वदेश   in  the world .
It  is  bordered by  पाकिस्तानी  in the  दक्षिण  and  the  east  ,  Iran  in  the west , Turkmenistan ,  उज़्बेकिस्तान  and  ताजिकिस्तान  in the north , and  चीन   in   the   दूर   पूर्वोत्तर  .
Afghanistan has  महरूम  an  प्राचीन  focal point  of   the   रेशा  Road  और   इंसान   माइग्रेशन  .
Archaeologists  have   मिला  evidence  of   इंसान  habitation from as far back as  the  Middle Paleolithic .
शहरी  civilization  may   have   begun  in the area as  जल्दी  as  3,000  to 2,000  bce  .
बैठे  at  an  important geostrategic  स्थान  that connects the  मध्य   ईस्ट   संस्कृति  with  सेंट्रल  Asia  और  the Indian  उपमहाद्वीप  , the  जमीन  has  महरूम   घर   to   विभिन्न   peoples   through  the  आयु  and witnessed  अनेक   सैन्य   अभियान  , notably by Alexander  the   ग्रेट   ,  Genghis Khan , and in modern era Western forces .
The land also  परोसा  as a source from which  the  Greco-Bactrians , Kushans ,  hephthalites   ,  Saffarids  ,  Ghaznavids ,  ghorids  ,  khiljis  ,  timurids  ,  मुगलों  ,  durranis  ,  और   अन्य  have risen  to   रूप  major empires  .
the   राजनैतिक   इतिहास  of  the  modern  राज्य  of  अफगानिस्तान  begins  in  1709  ,   जब   the  Hotaki dynasty was  स्थापित  in  कांधार   followed   by   अहमद  Shah Durrani 's rise to power in 1747 .
in  the  लेट   19th  century , Afghanistan became a buffer state in the  ``  Great  खेल  ``  between  the British and  रूसी  empires .
Following  the  1919  anglo-afghan  War ,  किंग   अमानुल्ला   began   a  European style modernization of  the  country  लकिन  was  रोका  by the ultra-conservatives .
During the  ठंडा  War ,  बाद   the  withdrawal of  the   अंग्रेजों   इससे  neighboring  इण्डिया  in 1947  ,  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   और  the Soviet Union began spreading  प्रभाव   in   अफगानिस्तान  ,  जिससे   led  to  a  bloody war between  the  US-backed  मुजाहिदीन   शक्तियां   और   the   soviet-backed   अफगान   सरकारी  in which  over  a million  afghans  lost their lives  .
This was followed by  the   1990s  civil war ,  the  rise  और  fall of the extremist  तालिबान   सरकारी  and the  2001–present  war .
In December  2001  ,  the  United  राष्ट्र  Security Council authorized the creation of the International Security Assistance Force  (   isaf  ) to help maintain security  in  Afghanistan  और   assist  the  करज़ई   प्रशासन  .
Three  दशकों  of  युद्ध   बना   अफगानिस्तान  one of the  संसार  's most dangerous countries  ,  including the largest  निर्माता  of refugees and  asylum   जरुरतमंदों   .
जबकि  the international community  is   पुनर्निर्माण   war-torn  Afghanistan , terrorist groups  ऐसे   as  the Haqqani  संजाल  and  hezbi  Islami are actively  शामिल   in  a nationwide Taliban  -led  insurgency ,  जिससे  includes hundreds of assassinations  और  suicide attacks  .
According  to  the United  राष्ट्र  ,  the  insurgents were  जिम्मेदार   लिये   80  % of civilian casualties in 2011 and 2012 .
The American  सिविल  War  (  ACW ) ,  भी  known  as   the   युद्ध  between the States or  बस   the  Civil War  (  see  नामकरण  )  ,  was  a  civil war fought  इससे  1861  to  1865  between   the  United States ( the ``  संघ  '' or the `` North  ''  )  और   अनेक  Southern  स्लेव  states that  घोषित  their secession and  formed   the   confederate   राज्य  of  अमेरिका  ( the `` Confederacy  ''   or   the  ``  दक्षिण  '' )  .
The war  था  its origin in the issue  of  slavery  ,   विशेषकर   the  extension  of  slavery  into   the  western territories  .
Foreign powers  किया  not intervene .
बाद   चार   सालो   of  bloody  कॉम्बैट  that  बाएँ  over  600,000   सैनिको  dead  और  destroyed  much   of  the South 's infrastructure , the  confederacy  collapsed , slavery was  abolished  , and  the   मुश्किल   पुनर्निर्माण   प्रक्रम   of   restoring  national  एकता  and  guaranteeing  rights to  the   freed  slaves  began   .
In the  1860   अध्यक्षीय  election ,  republicans  , led  by   अब्राहम   lincoln  ,  opposed  expanding slavery into United States  '  territories .
Lincoln  जीती   ,  but before his inauguration on  कूच   4   ,   1861  ,  सात  cotton-based slave  राज्य   formed   the   confederacy  .
outgoing  Democratic  अध्यक्ष   जेम्स   बुकानन   और  the  आवक   republicans  rejected secession  as  illegal  .
lincoln  's inaugural  पता   घोषित  his  प्रशासन  would not initiate civil war .
Eight  बाकी  slave states  जारी   to  reject calls  लिये  secession  .
confederate   शक्तियां  seized  numerous   संघीय  forts  भीतर   territory  claimed by the  confederacy   .
A Peace  सम्मेलन  failed  to   ढूँढें  a  सुलह  , and both sides prepared for war .
the   confederates  assumed that  यूरोपीय  countries  यहूद   so   निर्भर   on   ``  King Cotton `` that they would  intervene  ; none did and  none  recognized the new  confederate   राज्य  of  अमेरिका   .
Hostilities began on  अप्रैल  12 , 1861  ,  when Confederate forces  fired  upon Fort Sumter ,  a   कुंजी  fort held by  संघ   सैनिकों   in   दक्षिण  Carolina  .
Lincoln called for each state  to  provide  सैनिकों  to retake  the  fort ;  नतीजतन  , four  अधिक  slave  राज्य   joined   the  Confederacy , bringing  उनके  total to eleven .
The  संघ  soon controlled the  किनारा  states  और  established a naval blockade  कि   अबोध  the  दक्षिणी  economy .
the  Eastern Theater was inconclusive in  1861–62   .
The  पतझड़  1862 Confederate campaign into  मेरीलैंड  ( a Union  राज्य   )   ended  with  confederate  retreat at  the  Battle  of  Antietam ,  dissuading  British  हस्तक्षेप   .
lincoln  issued the  emancipation  Proclamation , which made ending slavery a war  लक्ष्य  .
To  the  west  ,  by summer 1862  the  Union  नष्ट  the  confederate   नदी  navy , then much of their western  सेना  ,  और  the Union at Vicksburg  विभाजित  the  confederacy   in   दो  at  the  Mississippi  नदी  .
in  1863 , Robert  E.  Lee 's Confederate incursion  उत्तर   ended  at  the   बैटल  of Gettysburg  .
पश्चिमी  successes led  to  Ulysses  S.  Grant  कमांड  of  सब  Union  सेना  in 1864 .
In the Western Theater  ,  William T.  शरमन   drove  east to capture  अटलांटा   और   marched   to  the sea , destroying Confederate  अवसंरचना   साथ   the  way  .
The  संघ   marshaled  the resources and  जनशक्ति  to attack  the   confederacy   इससे  all directions ,  और   could   afford   to  fight battles of attrition through  the  Overland Campaign towards  रिचमंड  ,  the  Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate  फौज   विफल   ,  leading  to  Lee  's  surrender  to  Grant at  appomattox  Court  हाउस   on   अप्रैल   9   ,  1865 .
The  अमरीकी  Civil War was  एक  of  the   earliest  true industrial wars  .
Railroads  ,  the telegraph ,  steamships  ,  और  mass-produced  हथियार   यहूद   employed  extensively  .
The  mobilization  of civilian factories ,  खानों  , shipyards , banks  ,  transportation and food  आपूर्तियाँ  all  foreshadowed   संसार  War  i   .
It remains  the  deadliest war in American  इतिहास   ,  resulting in the  मौतों   of   an  estimated 750,000 soldiers  और   an   undetermined  number  of  civilian  हताहत  .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the  मौत   टोल  at ten percent  of   सब   उत्तरी  males 20–45 years old , and 30 percent of all Southern  श्वेत   males  aged 18–40 .
Cost of  goods   बेची  ( COGS  )   refer  to the inventory costs  of  those goods a business  रै   बेची   दौरान   a   particular   काल   .
लागत   हैं  associated  साथ   particular  goods  using   एक  of several formulas  ,  including  विशिष्ट  identification  ,  first-in first-out  (   fifo  )  ,   or   औसत  cost .
Costs  शामिल  all  लागत  of purchase , costs of conversion  और   अन्य   लागत  incurred  in  bringing the  inventories   to  their  उपस्थित  location and condition  .
लागत  of  goods  made by  the  business include  सामग्री   ,  labor ,  और   आबंटित   ओवरहेड  .
The costs  of   those  goods not yet sold are  deferred  as costs of inventory until the inventory is sold or written  bas  in  मान  .

a  confectionery  स्टोर  ( more commonly  referred  to  as   a  sweet  दूकान   in  the  संयुक्त  Kingdom ,  a   कैंडी  store in  the  North America , or  a  lolly shop in Australia  )   बिकता  confectionery and is usually targeted to  children  .
सबसे  confectionery  स्टोर्स  are  भर  with an assortment of  मिठाई  far larger than a  पंसारी   or  convenience  स्टोर  could accommodate .
वे  often offer a selection of old fashioned treats  ,  and sweets from different  देशों  .
बहुत  often unchanged  in  layout since their  inception  , confectioneries are  ज्ञात  for their  वार्मिंग  and nostalgic feel  .
the  village  of  Pateley Bridge claims  to   have  the oldest confectionery store in  इंग्लैण्ड   .
the  oldest sweet shop in  इंग्लैण्ड   ,   in  the village of Pateley Bridge
Oklahoma (  )  ( Pawnee  :   uukuhuúwa   ,   cay  :  gahnawiyoˀgeh  ) is a  राज्य  located  in  West South  सेंट्रल   संयुक्त  States .
ओक्लाहोमा  is the  20th   सबसे   extensive  and the 28th most populous of the  50  United States .
The state  's   नाम  is derived from  the  Choctaw words  okla   और  humma  ,   अर्थ  `` red people ''  ,   और   it  is known  informally  by its nickname , The Sooner  राज्य  .
Formed  by  the combination  of  Oklahoma Territory and Indian Territory on  नवम्बर  16 , 1907  ,   ओक्लाहोमा   थी  the 46th  राज्य   to  enter the  संघ   .
Its residents are  ज्ञात  as Oklahomans or  ,  informally  ``   okies   ''  ,  और   इसके  capital and largest city is  ओक्लाहोमा  City .
a   प्रमुख   निर्माता   of  natural gas  ,   आयल  , and agriculture , Oklahoma  relies   on   an   आर्थिक  base of  विमानन  , energy , telecommunications , and biotechnology  .
it   रै  one of the  तीव्रतम  growing  economies   in  the nation  ,   रैंकिंग  among  the  top  राज्य   in  per capita income  विकास  and gross  घरेलू   उत्पाद  growth .
Oklahoma City  और  Tulsa serve as Oklahoma  's  primary economic anchors , with  nearly  two thirds of  oklahomans  living  भीतर  their metropolitan  सांख्यिकीय  areas .
With  छोटी  mountain  सीमाएँ   ,  prairie  ,   mesas   ,   और   पूर्वी  forests  ,  most  of  Oklahoma lies in  the  Great Plains and the  u.s  . Interior Highlands  —a  region especially  prone  to severe weather .
In  जोड   to   having  a  व्यापकता  of English  ,   जर्मनी   ,  Scottish ,  आयरिश   और  Native American  ancestry   ,  more than 25  देशी   अमरीकी   भाषाएं   हैं  spoken  in   ओक्लाहोमा  ,  दूसरी  only to California .
ओक्लाहोमा  is  स्तिथ   on   a   संगम   of   तीन  major American  सांस्कृतिक   regions  and  historically   परोसा   as   a  route for cattle drives ,  a  destination for southern  settlers  , and a government-sanctioned territory for  देशी  Americans  .
Stacked and standing car  टायर
a  tire ( or  टायर   )  is a  ring-shaped  covering  कि  fits  around   a   व्हील  's rim  to  protect it and enable  बेहतर  vehicle performance .
Most tires  ,  such  as  those for  ऑटोमोबाइल  and  साइकिल   ,  provide traction between the vehicle and the road while  providing  a flexible cushion  कि   absorbs  shock  .
The materials of modern  न्यूमेटिक  tires are synthetic rubber ,  प्राकृतिक  rubber ,  कपड़ा   और  wire , along with carbon black and other  रासायनिक   यौगिकों   .
They  consist  of a tread and a body .
the   tread   provides  traction  जबकि  the  देह  provides containment  लिये  a  मात्रा   of   संपीडित  air .
Before  रबर  was  विकसित  , the first  संस्करण   of   टायर  were simply  bands  of  मेटल  that fitted around  लकड़ी  wheels  to   prevent  wear and  आंसू  .
Early  रबर  tires were solid ( not pneumatic  )  .
आज   ,  the majority of  टायर  are pneumatic  inflatable   structures  ,  comprising   a  doughnut-shaped body  of   रस्सियाँ   और  wires  encased   in  rubber and  generally  filled  साथ   संपीडित  air to form an  inflatable  cushion .
Pneumatic tires are used  on   अनेक   प्रकार  of  वाहनों  , including  गाड़ियाँ  , bicycles , motorcycles  ,  trucks  ,   earthmovers   ,   और   वायुयान   .
Metal tires are still used on locomotives  और   railcars  , and solid rubber  (  or other polymer ) tires  हैं   स्टिल   प्रयुक्त   in  various non-automotive applications  ,   ऐसे   as  some casters  ,  carts , lawnmowers , and wheelbarrows .
Dr. Joseph Warren ( June 11 , 1741 – June 17 , 1775 ) was an  अमरीकी  doctor who  निभाई  a leading  भूमिका   in  American  patriot   संगठन  in  बोस्टन  in early  दिनों   of  the American Revolution  ,   आखिरकार   सेवारत  as president  of  the  क्रांतिकारी  Massachusetts Provincial Congress  .
वारेन  enlisted  पॉल   आदर  and William Dawes on  अप्रैल  18 ,  1775   ,   to  leave  बोस्टन   और   स्प्रेड  the alarm that  the   अंग्रेजों   गैरीसन  in  बोस्टन   थी   सेटिंग  out  to   रेड  the  कस्बा   of  Concord and arrest  विद्रोही   नेताओ  John Hancock  और  Samuel  एडम्स   .
Warren  participated   in  the next  दिन   's  Battles of Lexington and Concord ,  जिससे   हैं  commonly  माना  to  be  the opening  engagements  of the  अमरीकी   क्रांतिकारी   युद्ध  .
वारेन  had been  commissioned  a Major General in the  उपनिवेश  's militia shortly  पहले   the  June  17  ,  1775  Battle  of  Bunker  हिल  .
Rather than exercising his rank ,  वारेन  served  in  the battle as  a  private  सिपाही  , and was  मारे   in  combat  जब   अंग्रेजों  troops  stormed   the  redoubt atop  नस्ल  's  हिल   .
उसके   मौत   ,  immortalized  in  John Trumbull 's  पेंटिंग   ,   the  Death of General  वारेन   at   the   बैटल  of Bunker  's   हिल   ,  June  17  , 1775  ,  galvanized the rebel forces ,  और   he  has  महरूम   स्मरणीय   in  many  प्लेस   names   in  the United States  .
STM  चित्र  of self-assembled  supramolecular  chains  of   the   सशुल्क  semiconductor  quinacridone  on  ग्रेफाइट   .
An  सशुल्क  semiconductor  is  an organic  सामग्री  with semiconductor properties , that  is   ,  with  an  electrical conductivity between that  of  insulators and that  of   धातुओं  .
सिंगल   अणुओं  , short  कड़ी  ( oligomers ) and  सशुल्क   polymers  can be  semiconductive   .
Semiconducting small molecules  (  aromatic hydrocarbons )  शामिल  the polycyclic  खुशबूदार  compounds  pentacene  , anthracene  ,  and  rubrene   .
polymeric  organic semiconductors  शामिल   बहु   (  3-hexylthiophene ) , poly  (   p-phenylene  vinylene ) ,  as   खूब  as polyacetylene and its  डेरिवेटिव   .
There  हैं  two  प्रमुख   अतिव्यापी  classes  of   सशुल्क   semiconductors  .
ये  are organic charge-transfer  देवालय  and various linear-backbone  conductive   polymers  derived from  polyacetylene  .
Linear backbone organic semiconductors  शामिल  polyacetylene itself  और   इसके  derivatives  polypyrrole  , and  polyaniline  .
At  तनिक   locally   ,   charge-transfer  complexes often exhibit similar conduction mechanisms  to   अकार्बनिक  semiconductors  .
Such  mechanisms   उठता  from the presence  of  hole  और  electron  conduction  layers  अलग  by a  बैंड  gap .
While  ऐसे  classic  mechanisms  are  महत्वपूर्ण  locally ,  as   साथ  inorganic amorphous  semiconductors  ,  tunnelling  ,  स्थानीयकृत  states , mobility gaps  ,   और  phonon -assisted  hopping  also significantly contribute to conduction , particularly in polyacetylenes .
जैसे  inorganic semiconductors ,  सशुल्क  semiconductors can  be   doped  .
सशुल्क  semiconductors susceptible  to  doping such  as  polyaniline  (  Ormecon ) and are also known  as  organic metals  .
Typical  वर्तमान   वाहक   in  organic semiconductors  हैं  holes and electrons in π-bonds .
लगभग   सब  organic  solids  are  insulators  .
लकिन   जब   उनके  constituent  अणुओं  have π-conjugate systems ,  electrons  can  मूव   via  π-electron  बादल  overlaps , especially by hopping , tunnelling and related  mechanisms  .
Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons and phthalocyanine salt  crystals   हैं   उदाहरण  of  इस  type of organic  सेमीकंडक्टर   .
Mainly due  to  low  गतिशीलता  , even unpaired electrons may  be  stable in  charge-transfer  complexes  .
ऐसे  unpaired electrons  can   फलन  as current  वाहक  .
इस  type of  सेमीकंडक्टर  is also  प्राप्त  by pairing  an   इलेक्ट्रॉन  donor  अणु  with an electron acceptor molecule .
मादा  ejaculation  is  the expulsion of  द्रव  by  इंसान   महिलाओं  from the  paraurethral   नलिकाएं   through   और   around  the  मादा  urethra  दौरान   or   पहले   an   orgasm  .
It is  भी  known  colloquially   as  gushing  or  squirting  ,  although  ये  are considered  to  be different phenomena  in   कुछ  research publications  .
The exact source and  प्रकृति  of the  द्रव  continue to be a topic of debate among medical professionals , which is also related to doubts  over  the existence of the G-Spot .
the  FIFA  महिलाओं  's  संसार  Cup is an international association football competition  लडे   by  the senior women 's national teams of the members  of  Fédération Internationale  de  Football  संघ   (   फीफा   )  ,  the  sport 's global governing  देह   .
the  championship has been awarded every four  सालो   चूंकि   the  inaugural tournament in 1991 .
Japan  जीती   the  2011 tournament in  a  penalty shootout  .
The  वर्तमान  format of the  टूर्नामेंट  involves 16 teams competing  लिये  the  शीर्षक   at  venues within the host  स्वदेश  ( s )  over  a period  of   परिचय  three weeks ;  –   इस  phase  is  often called the  संसार  Cup Finals .
A  योग्यता   phase   ,  which currently takes place over the preceding three  सालो   ,   is  used  to   determine  which teams  qualify  for the  टूर्नामेंट   साथ   साथ  the host  स्वदेश  (  s  ) .
The  फीफा  Women 's World Cup is  पहचाना  as  the  most important International  प्रतियोगिता  in women  's  football and  is   निभाई   amongst  women  's  national  फ़ुटबॉल   टीमों  of the member states  of   फीफा  ,  the  sport  's  global governing body .
The  पहला   महिलाओं  's World Cup  टूर्नामेंट   ,   नामित   the   महिलाओं  's  संसार   चैंपियनशिप   ,   थी   आयोजित  in 1991 , sixty-one years  बाद  the men 's  पहला  FIFA  संसार   कप   टूर्नामेंट  in  1930   .
the   छह   संसार  Cup tournaments have been won by four different  नेशनल   टीमों  .
the   अगला  World Cup will be  hosted  by  कनाडा   in  2015  .

'Son of man ' is  the  translation of various Hebrew  और   यूनानी  phrases used  in   दोनो  the Hebrew Bible and  the  New  वसीयत   .
it   रै  diverse  meanings  ,  ranging   इससे  a  सामान्य  human being  to  a  prophesied  eternal  ,   दैवी  ruler .
the  Hebrew  अभिव्यक्ति   ``  son of  man  '' (  בן–אדם  i.e  .  ben-'adam  )  appears one  सौ  and seven times  in  the  यहूदी   बाइबल   .
This is  the  most common Hebrew  निर्माण  for  the  singular  लकिन  is used mostly in Ezekiel (  93  times ) and  14   टाइम्स   elsewhere  .
in  thirty  दो   मामले  the  phrase  appears  in  intermediate plural form  ``   बेटे  of  मेन  '' , i.e  .  human  beings   .
As generally  interpreted  by  यहूदियों   ,  it  denotes   humankind   generally  .
In  the   koine   यूनानी   of   the   नई  Testament  ,   ``  the son  of  man '' is  invariably  used  as   ``  ὁ  υἱὸς   τοὺ  ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite  आलेख  .
the  use  of  the definite article in  ``   the  son  of   man  '' in the  ईसाई  gospels  is  novel  ,  and  पहले  its use  वहीँ  ,  no  records of  इसके   उपयोग  in any  of   the  surviving Greek documents  of  antiquity  मौजूद   .
Geza Vermes has stated  कि  `` the Son of man  ''   in   the   ईसाई  gospels is unrelated to Hebrew Bible  usages   .
In  ईसाई   उपयोग   ,  unlike the Son of  परमेश्वर  title ,  जिससे   रै   महरूम   an  essential  तत्व  of  ईसाई   creeds  since the Apostolic  आयु   ,  the proclamation  of  ``  यीशु  as the  बेटे   of  man  ''  has never  महरूम  an article of  आस्था  in  christianity  .
The interpretation  of   the   उपयोग  of  ``  the Son  of  man  ''  in  the  New Testament has  remained  challenging and after 150 years of debate  no  consensus on the issue has emerged  among  scholars .
Master of foxhounds leads  the  field from  powderham  Castle  in  Devon ,  इंग्लैण्ड   ,  with  the  hounds  in  front .
फॉक्स  hunting is  an   कार्यकलाप   involving  the tracking , chase ,  और  sometimes  हत्या   of  a  फॉक्स  ,  traditionally  a  रेड   फॉक्स  ,  by   प्रशिक्षित   foxhounds   or  other scent  hounds  ,  और   a   समूह   of  unarmed followers led by a master of foxhounds ,  जो  follow  the   hounds   on  foot or  on  horseback  .
फॉक्स  hunting originated in  the  form practised  जबतक  recently in the United  किंगडम  in the  16th   सदी   ,   लकिन   is  practised all over  the  world ,  सहित   in   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , Canada , France  ,   आयरलैंड   ,  Italy and  the  United States .
in   ऑस्ट्रेलिया   ,  the  पद  also refers to  the   शिकार   of   foxes  with firearms similar to  spotlighting   or  deer  शिकार  .
In  much   of   the   संसार   शिकार  in general is understood  to   सुनाना  to any  खेल  animals or  हथियार   (  e.g.  ,  deer hunting  साथ  bow  और  arrow  )  ;  in   ब्रिटेन  and  आयरलैंड  , ``  शिकार  ''  बगैर  qualification implies  फॉक्स   शिकार  ( or  अन्य  forms  of   शिकार   साथ  hounds- beagling , stag hunting  ,   मिंक   शिकार   ,  drag hunting or  शिकार  the clean boot  )  as described here .
The  खेल  is  विवादास्पद  ,  विशेषकर   in  the  uk  , where it was  बैन  in Scotland in 2002  ,   और  in England and  वेल्स  in  नवम्बर  2004 (  विधि  enforced  इससे   फ़रवरी  2005  )   ,   हालांकि   शूटिंग  foxes as vermin remained  विधिक  .
Proponents  of  fox  शिकार   दृश्य   it  as an  महत्वपूर्ण  part of  ग्रामीण  culture  और   उपयोगी   लिये  reasons of conservation and pest  कंट्रोल   ,   जबकि  opponents argue that it is  बेदर्द  and unnecessary .
Tobacco  विज्ञापन   is  the advertising of tobacco products  or  use ( typically cigarette smoking  )  by the tobacco industry through a variety  of   मीडिया  including sponsorship , particularly of  sporting  events  .
It  is   अभी  one of  the   सबसे  highly regulated forms  of  marketing .
Some  or  all forms of  तम्बाकू   विज्ञापन   हैं   बैन  in many countries  .
बल्ली  Technologies ,  inc.  is  a   निर्माता   of  slot  मशीने  and other gaming technology based in  लास  Vegas  ,   नेवाडा  .
The  कम्पनी  was founded  in   1968  as  उन्नत  Patent  प्रौद्योगिकी  .
It  आखिरकार  changed  इसके  name to  गठबंधन   गेमिंग  and  acquired   ,   in   1996  ,  बल्ली  Gaming International ,  a  former  प्रभाग   of  Bally Manufacturing  .
In  2006  , the entire company  अपनाया   the  Bally  नाम   ,  a trademark that  originated  in 1932  by  the Bally Manufacturing Corporation .
Gustave Doré 's engravings illustrated  the   दैवी  Comedy ( 1861–1868  )  ;  यहाँ  ,  दांते  is lost in Canto 1 of  the  Inferno  .
inferno  ( Italian for `` Hell `` )  is  the  पहला  part of  दांते  Alighieri 's 14th-century epic poem  दैवी  Comedy .
it   is   followed   by   purgatorio   और  Paradiso  .
It is an  allegory  telling of the journey  of  Dante  through  Hell ,  हिदायत   by  the Roman  कवि   वर्जिल  .
In the poem , Hell  is  depicted  as   नौ   वृत्त  of suffering  स्तिथ   भीतर  the Earth .
Allegorically , the  दैवी   कॉमेडी  represents the  यात्रा  of  the   आत्मा  towards God ,  साथ   the  Inferno describing the recognition  और   अस्वीकृति  of sin  .
Smirnoff  is  a brand  of  vodka  स्वामित्व   और   उत्पादित  by the British  कम्पनी   diageo   .
the  Smirnoff  ब्रांड  began with  a  vodka distillery founded in  मास्को  by  pyotr   arsenievich  Smirnov ( 1831–1898 ) .

It  is  produced in several countries  सहित  India  ,  Ireland ,  इटली  , the  संयुक्त  Kingdom and  the  United States  .
Smirnoff products  शामिल   वोदका   ,   flavoured  vodka  ,   और  malt  पेय   .
in   कूच  2006 ,  diageo  North America claimed that  स्मरनॉफ  vodka was the best-selling  आसुत  spirit  ब्रांड   in   the  world .
बिग  Brown (  foaled  April 10  ,   2005  in Kentucky ) is a retired champion American Thoroughbred  racehorse   और  winner of the 2008 Kentucky Derby and  2008  Preakness  stakes  .
Bred by  dr.  Gary  B.  Knapp 's Monticule Farms in Lexington ,  केंटकी  ,  he  won  उसके  first five race starts  .
He  थी   sired  by Grade III winner Boundary ,  a   बेटे  of  उत्तर  American Champion  sire   danzig  , a son of  उत्तरी  Dancer  .

the  Serenity Prayer  is  the common  नाम   लिये  an  originally  untitled prayer by the  अमरीकी   theologian  Reinhold  niebuhr  ( 1892–1971  )  .
it  has been  अपनाया  by Alcoholics Anonymous  और   अन्य   twelve-step   कार्यक्रम  .
the   best-known  form is  :  God  ,  grant me  the   serenity  to accept the things I can not change,
The courage  to  change  the  things I can,
And wisdom to  जान  the difference  .
the  Declaration  और  Resolves  of  the First Continental Congress ( also  ज्ञात  as the  घोषणा   of  Colonial Rights  ,   or  the  घोषणा   of  Rights  )   ,  was  a   बयान  adopted  by  the  पहला   महाद्वीपीय   कॉंग्रेस   on  October  14  , 1774  ,  in  जवाब  to  the  Intolerable  अधिनियमों  passed  by  the  अंग्रेजों   पार्लियामेंट  .
The Declaration outlined colonial objections to the Intolerable Acts ,  सूचीबद्ध   a   औपनिवेशिक   विधेयक  of  अधिकारों  , and provided  a  detailed list  of   grievances  .
It was  समान  to the  घोषणा  of  अधिकारों   और  Grievances ,  passed  by  the  Stamp Act Congress a  दशक   पहले  .
the  Declaration concluded with an outline of Congress 's  योजनाएँ  :  to  enter  into  a boycott of British  व्यापार  (  the  Continental Association  )  until  उनके  grievances were redressed ,  to   प्रकाशित  addresses to the  लोगों   of  Great Britain and British America  ,   और   to  send  a  petition  to   the   किंग  .
पल्स   दबाव  is the pressure that  is  felt when  अहसास  the pulse .
measured   in  millimeters of  पारा   (  mmHg ) ,  the  pressure difference between the systolic and diastolic  pressures  is the pressure change  to   बनाएँ  the pulse ,  जिससे  is  the   पल्स   दबाव   .
If resting  रक्त   दबाव   is  (  systolic/diastolic  )  120/80  millimeters of  पारा  ( mmHg ) ,  पल्स  pressure  is   40   .
The  पहाड़ियाँ  is a  वास्तविकता  television series  जिससे  originally  aired   on  MTV from May  31  ,  2006  until July 13 , 2010 .
the   दिखाएँ  uses  a  reality  टेलीविज़न   स्वरूप  , following  the  personal lives  of  several young adults  जीना  in Los Angeles , California  ,  but tends towards  a   कथा  format more commonly found in scripted genres  ऐसे  as soap  operas  .
The  श्रेणी   originally  followed  the  personal life of former Laguna Beach star Lauren Conrad  और  her  मित्रों  ' new lives in  लॉस  Angeles .
After five seasons , Conrad  बाएँ   the  series  और  was  replaced  by another former Laguna  बीच   स्टार  ,  kristin   cavallari   ,   शुरूआत  in the  दूसरी  half  of  the  पांचवां   ऋतु  .
The  श्रेणी  concluded  at   the  end of  the  sixth season .
Entertainment Weekly  क्रमित   the   पहाड़ियाँ   82nd  on their list of ``  the   100   बेहतरीन  Shows of  the  Last  25   सालो   ,   ''  stating  कि   the   श्रेणी  was a  ``  New Classic  .  ''
AOL TV  पुकारा   it   tv  's Biggest Guilty Pleasure  .
The series  premiered  in syndication in the fall of 2009 alongside  लगुना   बीच  :  the  Real  नारंगी   काउंटी  .
In poker , bad beat is a subjective  पद  for a  हाथ  in which  a  player with  कया   appear  to be  दमदार  cards  nevertheless   loses   .
It most  प्रायः   occurs   जहाँ  one player  bets   the  clearly  stronger  hand  और   उनके  opponent  makes  a  ग़रीब   कॉल  that eventually `` hits '' and wins  .
There is  no  consensus  among   पोकर  players  as   to  what exactly constitutes a  ख़राब  beat and often  खिलाड़ी  will disagree about  whether   a  particular hand  थी  a bad beat .
The  goldfish  (  carassius   auratus  auratus ) is  a  freshwater fish in the  परिवार  Cyprinidae of order Cypriniformes .
it  was one  of   the   earliest  fish  to   be   domesticated   ,   और   is  one  of  the most commonly  रखा  aquarium  मछली  .
a  relatively small member of  the  carp family  (  which  भी  includes  the   कोई  carp and the crucian carp )  ,   the  goldfish is  a  domesticated version  of  a  less-colorful  carp ( Carassius auratus )  देशी   to   ईस्ट  Asia .
it   थी   पहला   domesticated  in  चीन   अधिक   than   a  thousand  सालो   पहले  ,  और  several  पृथक  breeds have since been  विकसित  .
Goldfish  breeds   vary  greatly in  आकार  , body  आकार  ,  जोडे   विन्यास  and coloration  (   विभिन्न   combinations   of  white , yellow , orange , red  ,   भूरा   ,   और   ब्लैक   हैं  known )  .
uncooked  Rouladen
Rouladen  (  or Rinderroulade  ,  singular  :   roulade  )  is  a German meat roulade usually  consisting  of bacon  ,  onions , mustard and pickles wrapped  in  thinly  sliced  beef  जिससे  is then  पकाया   .
In some  देशों  ,  the   roulade   is   भी  known  as  `` beef olive '' .
Beef or veal is used as  मांस  though  कुछ   खाना  scholars  tend   to  believe that  the  original  संस्करण  was probably venison or pork  ,  and pork is still  लोकप्रिय  in some  क्षेत्रों   .
the  beef  rouladen  as we  जान  them today  have  become  लोकप्रिय  over the last century .
the   काटें   is  usually topside beef  or  silverside  चूंकि  this  is   the  cheaper  काटें   .
The  अधिक   महंगी  version would be  the  round  स्टीक   ,  also  ज्ञात  as  rump   स्टीक  .
The meat  is   काटें   into   विशाल   ,  thin  स्लाइस  .
The filling is  a   मिश्रण  of  स्मोक्ड  and  पकाया  pork belly  ,  chopped onions  और  chopped pickles  (   gurken  )  जिससे  is  at   टाइम्स  varied  by  adding minced meat , sausage meat  ,   पाइन   nuts   और   सरसों  .
The mixture varies from  प्रदेश  to region .
Rouladen  हैं   traditionally  served  लिये  dinner  .
Red wine is often  परोसा  with this  डिश  .
Typical eukaryotic  कोशिका  .
सेल्यूलर   श्वसन   is   the   नियत  of the  metabolic   प्रतिक्रियाएँ   और  processes  कि   लो  place  in   the   कोशिकाएं  of organisms to  बदलें  biochemical energy from  nutrients   into   एडीनोसिन  triphosphate  (   एटीपी  ) ,  और  then  रिलीज   बर्बाद  products .
The reactions involved  in   श्वसन   हैं  catabolic reactions , which break large molecules into  छोटी  ones ,  releasing   उर्जा  in  the  process as weak  so-called  `` high-energy  ''  bonds  हैं   replaced   by  stronger bonds in  the  products .
श्वसन   is   एक  of the key ways  a  cell  gains  useful  उर्जा   to  fuel cellular activity .
सेल्यूलर  respiration  is  considered an exothermic  रेडॉक्स   प्रतिक्रिया  .
The overall reaction  is   टूटा   into   अनेक  smaller ones when it occurs in the  देह   ,   सबसे  of which  हैं  redox reactions  themselves   .
Although technically  ,  cellular respiration is a combustion reaction  ,   it  clearly does  नहीं   resemble  one when  it   occurs  in a living cell .
This difference is  क्युकी  it occurs  in  many separate  कदम   .
While the  overall   प्रतिक्रिया   is   a  combustion  प्रतिक्रिया   ,  no  सिंगल   प्रतिक्रिया  that comprises it is  a  combustion  प्रतिक्रिया  .
Nutrients that  हैं   commonly  used by  एनिमल  and  संयंत्र  cells in respiration include sugar ,  अमीनो  acids and  वसीय   acids   ,   और  a common oxidizing  एजेंट   (   इलेक्ट्रॉन   acceptor   )  is molecular oxygen  (   o2  )  .
The  उर्जा   भंडारित   in   एटीपी  (  इसके  third phosphate  समूह   is   weakly   बंधुआ  to  the  rest  of   the  molecule  और  is cheaply  टूटा  allowing stronger  bonds   to   रूप  ,  thereby   transferring   उर्जा   लिये  use by  the  cell  )  can then be used to  ड्राइव  processes  requiring  energy  ,  including biosynthesis  ,  locomotion or transportation of molecules  आरपार  cell membranes .
देशों  by  2011  GDP ( nominal ) according to the  सीआईए   संसार   factbook   .
This article  शामिल  a list of countries  in  the  संसार   sorted   by  their gross  घरेलू  product ( GDP )  ,   the   मार्केट  value  of  all  फाइनल  goods  और  services from a nation  in   a  given year .
The GDP  डालर  estimates  प्रस्तुत  here  हैं  calculated at market or government official  एक्सचेंज  rates .
अनेक   economies  which  हैं  not  माना  to be  देशों   (  world ,  the  EU ,  और  some dependent territories ) are included in the  सूचियाँ   क्युकी   वे  appear  in  the  स्त्रोत  .
These  economies  are  नहीं  ranked  in   the   चार्ट  here  ,  but are  सूचीबद्ध   जहाँ   लागू  .
The figures presented here do not  लो  into account  मतभेद   in   the   लागत  of living in different  देशों  ,  और  the results  can   vary  greatly from one  साल   to   another   आधारित   on  fluctuations in the exchange  दरों   of   the   देश  's  करेंसी  .
Such  fluctuations   may   बदलें  a  देश  's  रैंकिंग  from one year to the  अगला   ,   भी   हालांकि  they often make little or no difference to the standard of  जीना   of  its  जनसांख्यिकी  .
Therefore  ये  figures should be used with caution  .
कुछ  countries/regions  may   have   नागरिकों  which are on average  धनवान   .
ये  countries/regions could appear in this list as  having   a  small GDP  .
इस  would be because the  country/region   सूचीबद्ध   रै   a  small population ,  और  therefore  छोटी  total economy ;  the   जीडीपी   is  calculated as the population times the wealth per  capita   .
Comparisons  of   नेशनल  wealth  हैं   भी  frequently  बना  on the  आधार  of purchasing power parity  (  PPP  )  ,  to   समायोजन  for differences in the  लागत  of living in different countries .
(   देखिए   सूची  of countries by GDP ( PPP ) )
PPP  largely  removes the exchange  रेट  problem  ,  but has its  अपना  drawbacks  ;  it  करता   नहीं  reflect the  मान  of economic  आउटपुट  in  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  trade ,  और   it  also requires more estimation  than  nominal GDP .
on   the  whole , PPP per  capita  figures are  अधिक   narrowly  spread than nominal GDP  प्रति  capita  आंकड़े   .
The  पहला   सूची  includes data compiled by the United Nations Statistics  प्रभाग   लिये  2011 .
the  second list  largely   शामिल   आंकड़ा  ( estimate ) compiled by  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   मौद्रिक   निधि   लिये  2012 .
The third list shows the World Bank  's   ज़्यादातर  2011  estimates  ,  और  the fourth list includes mostly 2012 estimates from the CIA World Factbook  .
Lapping is  a  machining  प्रक्रम   ,  in  जिससे   दो   सतहों   हैं   मला  together with  an  abrasive between  उन्हें   ,  by  हाथ  movement or by way of a machine  .
इस   can  take  दो  forms .
The first type  of  lapping (  traditionally  called grinding )  ,  typically involves  रगड़  a  भंगुर   सामग्री   ऐसे  as glass  विरूद्ध  a surface  ऐसे  as  आयरन  or glass itself  (  also  ज्ञात  as  the  `` lap ''  or  grinding  औजार   )   साथ   an  abrasive such as aluminum  ऑक्साइड  , jeweller  's  rouge  ,  optician 's rouge  ,  emery ,  सिलिकॉन  carbide ,  डायमंड  ,  etc.   ,   in  between  उन्हें   .
This produces  microscopic  conchoidal fractures as  the   अक्खड़  rolls about between the  दो  surfaces and removes material from both .
The other  रूप  of  lapping  involves  a  softer material such as pitch or  a  ceramic for  the   गोद   ,   जिससे  is  ``  charged  ''   साथ  the abrasive .
the  lap is then used  to   काटें  a harder material—the  workpiece   .
the   अक्खड़  embeds  भीतर   the  softer material  जिससे  holds  it  and  permits  it  to   स्कोर   आरपार   और   काटें  the harder  सामग्री  .
Taken to a  महीन   सीमा  , this will produce  a  polished surface  ऐसे  as with  a  polishing  cloth   on  an  ऑटोमोबाइल   ,   or  a  पॉलिशिंग   cloth   or  polishing pitch upon glass  or   स्टील   .
लिया   to  the ultimate limit ,  साथ  the aid of accurate interferometry  और  specialized polishing machines or skilled hand polishing , lensmakers  can   उपज   सतहों   कि   हैं   चपटा  to better than 30  nanometers  .
This  is  one  बीसवीं   of   the   wavelength   of  light  इससे   the  commonly  प्रयुक्त  632.8 nm helium neon laser  लाइट  source  .
सतहों   इस   चपटा  can  be   molecularly  bonded ( optically  contacted  ) by bringing them together  अंतर्गत   the  right  शर्तें  .
(  This is not  the  same as  the   wringing   प्रभाव  of Johansson blocks ,  हालांकि  it is  समान  ) .
the   पद  `` America  's  Team  ''   is  a popular  उपनाम  in the United  राज्य   कि   refers  to the Dallas Cowboys in the  नेशनल  Football  लीग   .
the  nickname originated with the  टोली  's 1978 highlight film ,  जहाँ  the narrator opens  साथ  the  following   परिचय   :  The term is  पहचाना  and  प्रायः  used by  मीडिया  outlets  ,  including ESPN  ,  Yahoo  !   ,  HBO Sports ,  और  Sports  illustrated  .
my  Babysitter 's  a  Vampire  (  French : Ma gardienne est un vampire  )   is   a   2011   कनाडाई  television series ,  आधारित  on  the  television  फिल्मी   of   the  same name .
in  Canada  ,   the   श्रेणी  premiered in French on Télétoon on February 28  ,   2011  , in English on Teletoon on March 14  ,  2011  ,   और   on  Disney Channel  in   the  United States on June 27 , 2011  .
the   दिखाएँ  was  निर्मित  by Fresh TV , creators  of  6teen and Total  नाटक   .
the  show follows Ethan Morgan (  मैथ्यू   नाईट   )  , who ,  in  the television film ,  learns  that his babysitter  सारा   (  Vanessa  मॉर्गन  ) is  a  vampire  .
in   the   फिल्मी  , he  learns  he is  समर्थ  to have visions  और   उसके   बेहतरीन   dost  Benny Weir ( Atticus Mitchell  )  is a  spellmaster  .
The  श्रेणी  follows  the  three as they  लो   on  supernatural  शक्तियां  and have  adventures  , with  occasional   सहायता  from  fellow  vampires  रोरी  ( Cameron  कैनेडी   )  and  एरिका   (   केट  Todd ) , while  dealing  with the troubles of regular high school life .
a   दूसरी  season was confirmed  to   प्रारंभ   उत्पादन  in  सितंबर  2011 and it first premiered  on   डिज़्नी   चैनल   on  June  29   ,   2012  , it premiered  on  Teletoon September 6 ,  2012   .
télétoon  started  featuring  season 2 sneak-peak  एपीसोड   on  October  28   ,  2012 and  premiered  it on  जनवरी  10 , 2013
