A  पिकअप   ट्रक  or  pick-up  ,  प्रायः  simply  referred  to as  a  pickup ,  is   a  light  मोटर   गाडी  with  an  open-top  ,  rear cargo area  (  bed  )  .
in  North  अमेरिका  ,  the   पद  pickup is used for light trucks  साथ  a  हल्का  duty  chassis  and factory built  ,  integrated bed , as well  as  for coupé  यूटिलिटी  vehicles , often  आधारित  on  a  personal car  chassis   ,  but also often on a special dedicated chassi for  ऐसे  use .
Some  देशों  have  उनके  own terms similar  to  pickup , such  as  ute in Australia and New Zealand , or  bakkie  in South  अफ़्रीकी  .
Large pickup  ट्रक  are somewhat rare in  यूरोपीय   ,  where  वैन   और  light lorries are  commonly   प्रयुक्त   लिये   समान  roles .
The President of the  संयुक्त  States  of  America  (  POTUS  )  is  the  head of state and head of government  of  the  संयुक्त  States .
The  अध्यक्ष   लीड  the executive branch of  the   संघीय   सरकारी   और   is   the   commander-in-chief  of the United  राज्य  Armed Forces .
आलेख   ii  of  the  U.S.  संविधान  vests the  कार्यपालिका  power  of   the   संयुक्त  States  in  the  अध्यक्ष  and charges him  साथ   the   निष्पादन  of federal  विधि  , alongside  the  responsibility of appointing federal executive  ,  diplomatic  ,   नियामक  , and judicial officers ,  और  concluding  treaties  with  विदेशी   शक्तियां   ,  with  the   सलाह  and  सहमति   of   the  Senate .
the   अध्यक्ष   is  further empowered to  ग्रान्ट  federal pardons and  reprieves  ,  और  to  convene  and adjourn  either   or  both  घरों  of Congress under extraordinary circumstances  .
Since the  founding  of the  संयुक्त  States , the  शक्ति  of the  अध्यक्ष   और   the   संघीय   सरकारी  have  grown   substantially   और  each modern president , despite possessing  no   औपचारिक  legislative  शक्तियां   परे  signing or vetoing congressionally passed  बिल्स   ,  is  largely  responsible  लिये  dictating  the  legislative agenda  of  his party and the  विदेशी   और   घरेलू  policy of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
The  अध्यक्ष  is frequently  वर्णित   as   the   सबसे   शक्तिशाली  person  in  the world .
The president is indirectly  निर्वाचित   by   the  people  through   the  Electoral College to a four-year  पद  , and  is   एक  of only  दो  nationally  निर्वाचित  federal officers  ,  the other  होने   the  Vice President of  the   संयुक्त  States .
the  Twenty-second Amendment  ,  adopted in  1951  , prohibits  anyone  from  कभी  being elected  to  the presidency  लिये   a  third  पूरा  term  .
it  also  prohibits  a  व्यक्ति  from being elected  to  the presidency  अधिक  than once if that person previously  था   परोसा  as president ,  or  acting president  ,   लिये   अधिक  than two  सालो  of  another   व्यक्ति   's   पद   as  president .
In  सब  , 43 individuals have  परोसा   55   four-year  terms .
On January  20   ,   2009   ,  Barack  ओबामा   became  the 44th and current president  .
on   नवम्बर   6  , 2012 ,  he  was  re-elected  and  is  scheduled to serve until January 20 ,  2017   .
बोतलबंद  mineral  जल
बोतलबंद  water is  पीने  water (  e.g.  , well water ,  आसुत   जल  ,  खनिज  water ,  or  spring water  )   packaged  in plastic  or   कांच   जल  bottles  .
Bottled water may  be  carbonated or  नहीं  .
Sizes range  इससे  small  सिंगल   सेवारत   बोतलों   to   विशाल  carboys for water coolers  .
मैप   of  the  प्रमुख  rivers  ,  lakes , and reservoirs  in   इण्डिया
Map  प्रर्दशित   नदियाँ  and flood prone areas  in  India
नदियाँ   of   इण्डिया   खेल   an   महत्वपूर्ण  role  in  the lives  of  the Indian people .
The river  प्रणालियों   provide  irrigation , potable water , cheap transportation  ,   विद्युत  ,  और   the   livelihoods   लिये  a  विशाल  number  of  people  सब  over the  देश   और   to   ग्रामीण   क्षेत्रों   .
This easily  explains   क्यों  nearly  सब   the  major  शहरों  of India are  स्तिथ  by the  बैंको  of rivers  .
the  rivers also  have   an   महत्वपूर्ण   भूमिका  in Hindu  mythology  and are considered holy by  सब  Hindus in the country .
Seven major rivers along with their numerous tributaries  मेक  up the  नदी   प्रणाली   of   इण्डिया  .
सबसे  of the rivers  डालना  their waters  into  the Bay of Bengal  ;  however  ,  some of  the  rivers whose courses take them  through  the  पश्चिमी  part of the  देश   और  towards  the  east of the  राज्य  of  himachal  Pradesh  खाली   into   the  Arabian Sea .
Parts of  लद्दाख  , northern parts of  the   aravlli  range and the arid parts of the Thar  मरुस्थल  have  अंतर्देशीय  drainage .
Dr.Francis Buchanan surveyed  the   पाठ्यक्रम   of   the  rivers  of  India along with  उनके  tributaries and branches in  1810-11  AD and presented a minute account  of   it   .
the  shifting of  the  courses  और   bed   over   the  centuries is very remarkable  .
Many of the  चैनल्स   उल्लेखित  in that  सर्वेक्षण  have now  become  dead ,  सूखी   or  even extinct .
All  प्रमुख  rivers of  इण्डिया  originate from one of the  तीन  main  watersheds  :
The  हिमालय  and the Karakoram  सीमाएँ
विंध्य  and Satpura ranges  और  Chotanagpur  पठार   in  central  इण्डिया
Sahyadri  or  Western Ghats in western  इण्डिया
The  bretton   वुड्स  system of  मौद्रिक   प्रबन्धन   स्थापित   the   नियम  for commercial and financial  संबंध   among   the  world  's   प्रमुख  industrial states in the mid-20th  सदी   .
the   bretton  Woods  प्रणाली  was the  पहला   उदाहरण  of  a   fully   negotiated   मौद्रिक  order intended to govern monetary  संबंध  among independent nation-states .
तैयारी  to rebuild the international  आर्थिक  system as  संसार   युद्ध   ii   थी  still raging , 730 delegates  इससे   सब  44  अलाइड   राष्ट्र   gathered   at   the  Mount Washington Hotel in Bretton Woods  ,  New  हैम्पशायर  ,  संयुक्त  States , for  the  United Nations  मौद्रिक   और   वित्तीय  Conference .
the   delegates  deliberated during 1–22  जुलाई  1944 , and  हस्ताक्षरित   the  Agreement on  इसके   फाइनल  day  .
सेटिंग  up a system  of   नियम  , institutions ,  और   प्रक्रियाओं   to  regulate the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   मौद्रिक  system , the planners at Bretton  वुड्स  established  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Monetary  निधि   (   imf   )  and the International  बैंको  for Reconstruction and  विकास  ( IBRD ) ,  जिससे  today  is  part  of   the  World Bank Group .
ये   संगठन   became  operational  in  1945  बाद   a  sufficient  क्रमांक   of   देशों   था  ratified  the  agreement .
the   मुख्य   सुविधाएँ  of the Bretton Woods  प्रणाली  were  an  obligation for each  देश  to adopt  a   मौद्रिक  policy  कि  maintained  the  exchange  रेट  by tying  इसके   करेंसी   to  the U.S.  डालर  and the  क्षमता   of  the IMF to  सेतु   अस्थाई   imbalances  of payments .
On 15 August  1971  , the  संयुक्त   राज्य  unilaterally  terminated  convertibility  of  the US  $  to gold .
इस   brought   the  Bretton Woods system to an end and  देखी   the   डालर   become  fiat  करेंसी  .
इस   कार्रवाई   ,  referred  to   as  the  निक्सन   शॉक  ,  निर्मित   the   हालात   in  which the  संयुक्त   राज्य  dollar became  a   आरक्षित   करेंसी  used  by  many  राज्य   .
at   the  same  समय   ,   अनेक  fixed  मुद्राएँ   (  such as GBP  ,  for example )  ,   भी  became  फ़्री  floating .
Ducati Motor Holding S.p.A. is an Italian  कम्पनी  that designs  और   manufactures  motorcycles .
headquartered  in  बोलोग्ना  ,  इटली  , Ducati  is  owned  by  Audi through its Italian  subsidiary  Lamborghini  .
a  credit score is a numerical expression based on a statistical analysis  of  a person 's  क्रेडिट  files  ,  to represent the creditworthiness  of  that  व्यक्ति  .
A credit score is primarily  आधारित   on   क्रेडिट  report  सूचना  typically  sourced  from credit  bureaus  .
Lenders , such  as  banks  और   क्रेडिट  card companies  ,   उपयोग  credit  स्कोर  to  evaluate   the   संभावित   रिस्क   posed   by   lending  money to  उपभोक्ता  and to mitigate  नुकसान  due  to  bad  कर्ज़   .
lenders  use credit scores to  determine  who qualifies for  a  loan , at  कया   ब्याज  rate , and what credit limits  .
Lenders also  उपयोग   क्रेडिट  scores to determine which customers  हैं  likely to bring in  the  most revenue  .
the  use  of   क्रेडिट  or  पहचान  scoring prior to authorizing access or  granting  credit is an implementation of a  विश्वसनीय  system .
Credit  स्कोरिंग   is  not limited to banks  .
Other  संगठन  , such  as  mobile phone companies  ,  insurance companies ,  जमींदार   ,   और   सरकारी  departments employ  the   वही  techniques .
क्रेडिट  scoring also  रै  a lot of  ओवरलैप   साथ  data mining  ,  which  उपयोग  many  समान  techniques  .
These techniques combine  हज़ारों  of  कारकों  but they  हैं   अधिक   or  less  समान  or  the   वही   .
the  seven SI  आधार  units  और  the interdependency of their definitions : for example  ,  to  निकालें  the definition  of  the metre from the speed  of   लाइट  , the definition of the second must be  ज्ञात   जबकि   the  ampere and candela are both dependent on the definition of energy which  in   फेरे   is   पारिभाषित   in  terms of length  ,   द्रव्यमान   और   समय  .
The International System of Units (  si  ) defines seven units of measure  as  a  मौलिक   नियत  from  जिससे  all  अन्य   si   इकाई   हैं  derived  .
ये   si   आधार  units and  उनके   शारीरिक   quantities   are:
metre  लिये   लंबाई   (   us  English : meter )
किलोग्राम  for mass (  नोट  :  नहीं  the gram  )
दूसरी   लिये   समय
ampere   लिये   इलेक्ट्रिक  current
kelvin for  तापमान
candela   लिये  luminous intensity
mole for the  राशि   of  substance .
The SI base quantities form  a  set of  mutually  independent  आयाम   as   जरूरी  by dimensional  विश्लेषण   commonly  employed in  विज्ञान  and  प्रौद्योगिकी  .
however   ,  in a given realization  of   ये  units they  may  well  be  interdependent  ,  i.e  .   पारिभाषित  in terms  of  each other  .
the   names  of SI  इकाई  are written  in  lowercase characters  (  the 'degree  सेल्सियस  '  meets  this  नियम  , as  'degree  '  is   the   ईकाई  ,  और  'Celsius '  is  a modifier ) .
the   प्रतीकों  of  इकाई   हैं   लिखा  in lowercase (  e.g   .  metre has the  प्रतीक  m )  ,  except  कि  symbols  लिये  units named after  व्यक्तियों  are written with an  आरंभिक  capital  अक्षर  ( e.g.  ,  the  हर्ट्ज़   रै  the uppercase symbol Hz )  .
Many  अन्य   इकाई   ,  such  as   the   लीटर  ( US English :  लीनियर  ) , are formally not  भाग   of  the  si  ,  लकिन  are  स्वीकृत  for use  साथ   si   .
Monument  canyon
Colorado National  स्मारक  ( locally referred to  as  The  स्मारक  ) is  a  part of the  नेशनल   पार्क   सेवा  near the city of  ग्रैंड   जंक्शन   ,  Colorado .
spectacular  canyons cut  गहन  into  sandstone  and even granite–gneiss–schist rock formations , in  कुछ   क्षेत्रों   .
इस  is an area of desert land high on  the  Colorado Plateau ,  साथ   पिनियन  and  juniper   वनों  on the  पठार   .
The park hosts a  चौड़ी  range of  वन्यजीव  , including  red-tailed   चीलों  and golden eagles  ,   ravens   ,  jays  ,  desert bighorn sheep ,  और   coyotes  .
क्रियाएँ  include  चढ़ाई  ,  horseback  riding ,  सड़क   bicycling  , and  दर्शनीय   ड्राइव   ;   a  visitor center  on   the   वेस्ट   पक्ष   contains  a natural  इतिहास  museum  और   तोहफा   दूकान  .
वहीँ  are magnificent views from  trails  and the  रिम  Rock  ड्राइव  , which  हवाएँ  along  the  plateau .
Nearby  हैं  the  किताब   cliffs   ,  and  the   largest   flat-topped  mountain in  the   संसार  ,  the   ग्रैंड   mesa   .
इसके  feature  आकर्षण  is Monument Canyon  ,  which  रनों  the  चौडाई  of the park  ,   और  includes rock formations such as Independence Monument  ,  the Kissing Couple  ,  and Coke Ovens  .
the   स्मारक   शामिल  20,500  एकड़  (  32   वर्गाकार  miles  )  , much of  जिससे  has been recommended  to  Congress  लिये  designation as wilderness .
बाएँ  to  सही  :  यूटिलिटी  Uniform ,  ब्लू   पोशाक  Uniform  ,  Service Uniform ,  और  Evening  पोशाक  uniforms
the   वर्दी   of   the  United  राज्य   समुद्री  Corps  serve   to  distinguish Marines from members  of  other  सेवाएं  .
Among current uniforms in  the  United  राज्य   हथियारबंद  Forces  ,  the  marines   '  uniforms have  महरूम  in service the longest .
The Marine  पोशाक   ब्लू  uniform has , with  few  changes ,  महरूम  worn in essentially  इसके   वर्तमान   रूप  since the 19th century  .
North American telephone area  कोड   419  and  567  serve the  उत्तरपश्चिम  quadrant of the U.S. state  of  Ohio .
the   largest  city served by these  क्षेत्रफल   कोड  is  टोलेडो  ( and its  उपनगरों  of  हॉलैंड   ,   maumee   ,   northwood  ,  ऑरेगॉन   ,   ओटावा   पहाड़ियाँ   ,  Perrysburg , Rossford ,  sylvania   ,   swanton  , Waterville  ,   और   whitehouse  ) .
Other  शहरों  served by these area  कोड  include  एडीए  , Ashland  ,  Bellevue , Bluffton , Bowling Green  ,  Bryan , Bucyrus  ,   celina   ,  Clyde  ,  Crestline , Defiance  ,   delphos   ,   एडिसन   ,  Erastus  ,  Findlay  ,   fostoria  ,  fremont  ,  galion  ,  kenton   ,  Lima , Mansfield ,  माउंट  Gilead , Napoleon ,  नॉरवॉक   ,   ओक  Harbor , Port  क्लिंटन  , Sandusky , Shelby , St. Marys  ,  Tiffin  ,   अपर  Sandusky  ,   वैन  Wert , Wapakoneta  ,   wauseon  , Willard  .
अन्य   क्षेत्रों   परोसा   शामिल  the  झील  Erie Islands north  of  Port Clinton  और   वेस्ट   of  Sandusky .
The main area  कोड  , 419 ,  थी  created as one of  the  original  क्षेत्रफल  codes in  अक्तूबर  1947 ;  the  overlay area code  567  was  निर्मित  on January 1  ,  2002 .
Despite the  उपस्थिति  of Toledo ,  the  state 's fourth-largest  नगर  , 419  थी  the last of Ohio 's original  चार  area codes to  have   महरूम   विभाजित  or  overlaid  .
Mickey Leroy Gilley  (  born March 9 , 1936 )  is   an  American country music singer and musician .
Although he started  आउट   गायन  straight-up country and western  सामग्री   in   the  1970s , he moved  towards   a   अधिक  pop  -friendly   ध्वनि  in the 1980s , bringing  उसे  further  कामयाबी   on  not just  the  country  चार्ट  , but the pop charts as well .
among  his  biggest   हिट्स  are `` Room Full of Roses  ,   ''  `` Do  n't  the  लड़कियों  All Get  prettier  at Closing Time , '' and the remake of the Soul  hit  ``  स्टैंड  by Me  ``   .
he  is also  the  cousin of Jerry Lee Lewis  ,  Carl McVoy  ,   जिम   gilley   और  Jimmy Swaggart  .
According  to  the Federal Aviation Administration  ,  Gilley is  a   licensed   पायलट  ,  जो  holds  an  instrument rating with  वाणिज्यिक  pilot privileges for  multi-engine   airplanes  , as  खूब  as  निजी   पायलट  privileges  लिये   सिंगल  engine  वायुयान  .
the  September 11 attacks  (  also  referred   to   as  September 11 , September 11th , or 9/11 )  यहूद  a series of  चार  coordinated  आतंकवादी   हमले  launched by the Islamic  आतंकवादी  group al-Qaeda upon  the  United States in New York City  और  the  वॉशिंगटन  ,  d.C.  area  on  September 11 , 2001  .
Four  यात्री   airliners  were  hijacked  by  19   al-qaeda  terrorists so they could be flown  into  buildings in  आत्महत्या  attacks  .
Two  of  those planes ,  अमरीकी  Airlines Flight 11  और   संयुक्त  Airlines  उड़ान  175  ,   यहूद  crashed into  the   उत्तर   और   दक्षिण  towers , respectively  ,   of   the  World Trade  बीच  complex  in   नई   यॉर्क   नगर   .
Within two  घंटों   ,  both towers collapsed  साथ  debris and  the   resulting  fires causing partial or complete collapse of  सब   अन्य   इमारतें   in  the WTC  जटिल  ,  as   खूब   as  major damage to ten other large surrounding structures .
A third plane ,  अमरीकी  Airlines  उड़ान   77  ,  थी   क्रैश  into  the   प्रस्तुतीकरण   (  the headquarters of  the  United  राज्य  Department  of  Defense )  ,   अग्रणी  to a  आंशिक  collapse in its western side .
the  fourth  प्लेन   ,   संयुक्त  Airlines Flight  93   ,  was  targeted   at   the   संयुक्त  States Capitol in Washington , D.C. , but crashed into a  फ़ील्ड  near  shanksville  , Pennsylvania , after its  यात्री   आजमाया   to  overcome  the   hijackers  .
In total , almost  3,000   लोगों  died in the  हमले   ,   सहित  the 227  नागरिकों  and 19  hijackers  aboard  the  four planes .
Suspicion quickly fell  on  al-Qaeda .
Although  the  group 's  नेता  , Osama  बिन  Laden ,  initially  denied  कोई   भागीदारी   ,   in   2004  he claimed responsibility  लिये  the attacks .
al-qaeda  and  बिन  Laden  cited  U.S. support of  इसराईल  , the  उपस्थिति  of U.S. troops in  सऊदी   अरब  ,  और  sanctions  विरूद्ध   इराकी   as   motives   लिये   the  attacks .
The  संयुक्त   राज्य   responded   to   the   हमले   by  launching  the   युद्ध  on Terror  और  invading Afghanistan  to  depose the  तालिबान  , which had harbored  al-qaeda   .
Many countries strengthened  उनके  anti-terrorism legislation and expanded  विधि   प्रवर्तन  powers .
having  evaded capture for  सालो  , bin  लादेन  was  स्तिथ  and killed  by  U.S. forces  in   may  2011  .
the   विनाश   of  the  जुड़वा   मीनारें  and  अन्य   गुण  caused  गंभीर   क्षति  to the  अर्थव्यवस्था  of Lower  मैनहटन  and  था  a significant effect on global  बाज़ार   .
क्लीनअप   of  the World Trade Center  साईट  was completed  in  May 2002  ,  and  the  Pentagon  थी  repaired  भीतर  a year .
Numerous  memorials   have   महरूम  constructed  ,  including  the   नेशनल   सितंबर   11  Memorial  &   संग्रहालय  in New York  ,   the  Pentagon Memorial , and  the  Flight  93  National Memorial  in   पेन्सिलवेनिया   .
After  a  lengthy  विलंब  , the One World  व्यापार   बीच  is  अपेक्षित  to be completed  at   मैदान   शून्य  in  नई  York City  in  2013 .
ढूंढना  Nemo  is   a   2003  American  computer-animated  comedy-drama  एडवेंचर  film  लिखा  and  निर्देशित  by  एंड्रयू   stanton  , released by Walt Disney  तस्वीरें  , and the  पांचवां   फिल्मी   उत्पादित   by  Pixar  एनिमेशन  Studios .
it   tells   the  story of the over-protective  clownfish   नामित   marlin  ( Albert  ब्रूक्स  ) who ,  साथ   साथ  a  राजसी  tang named  dory  ( Ellen  degeneres  )  ,   खोज  for  उसके  abducted  बेटे  Nemo ( Alexander Gould ) all the  रास्ता  to  सिडनी   harbour  .
Along  the  way ,  marlin   learns  to take  risks  and let Nemo take care  of   खुद  .
It  is  Pixar 's  पहला   फिल्मी   to   be  released  in  cinemas in the northern hemisphere  गर्मियाँ   .
the  film was re-released for  the  first  समय  in  3d  on  सितंबर  14 , 2012  ,   और   it  was released on Blu-ray  on  December  4   ,  2012 .
A sequel  ,  Finding  dory  , is currently in development , set to be  released   on  November 25  ,   2015  .
The film received universal critical acclaim and won  the  Academy Award for Best Animated  विशेषता   ,  and was nominated  in  three more categories  सहित  Best Original Screenplay .
it  was the second highest-grossing film of  2003   ,  earning  a  total of $ 921 million worldwide  .
ढूंढना  Nemo is also the best-selling  dvd   of  all time  ,  with over 40 million copies  बेची  as  of  2006 ,  और  was the highest-grossing G-rated film  of  all time before  पिक्चर्स   's  own Toy  स्टोरी  3  overtook  it .
it  is  भी  the 23rd  highest-grossing   फिल्मी  of  सब   समय  , as  खूब  as the  3rd  highest-grossing  एनिमेटेड  film .
In  2008   ,  the  अमरीकी   फिल्मी  Institute named  it   the  tenth  महानतम  animated film ever made during  उनके   शीर्ष   10   .
The sixth  ऋतु  of  अमेरिका   's  Best  नृत्य   क्रू  , also known as America 's  बेहतरीन  Dance  क्रू  : Season of  the  Superstars , premiered on April 7  ,   2011   और  concluded on  जून   5  ,  2011  .
auditions  were held in  चार  cities  इससे  January  21  through  फ़रवरी   5  :  शिकागो  , Houston , New York , and  लॉस   एंजिल्स   .
This season takes a different route from  पास्ट  seasons .
The crews must perform  to  the music of one specific  कलाकार   प्रत्येक   सप्ताह   ,   सहित  Rihanna  ,  Lil  वेन  ,  और  other popular stars .
इस  season also  सुविधाएँ  special guest appearances  by  various  म्यूज़िक   हस्तियाँ   सहित   जस्टिन  Bieber ,  the   ब्लैक  Eyed  मटर  ,  कैटी  Perry  ,  Kesha , Nicki  minaj  , and  kanye   वेस्ट  .
Dominic `` D-Trix  ''  Sandoval  ,  a former member  of   क्वेस्ट  Crew  ,  the winner of  the   तीसरा  season  of  America 's Best  नृत्य  Crew  ,   joins   returning  judges  लील  Mama and JC  chasez   as  the newest  न्यायधीश   .
in   the  season  finale   ,  I aM  me  was declared  the  winner of Season  6   और  received  the   $   100,000  ( USD  )  prize .
in  the  संयुक्त  States  ,  Social  सुरक्षा  refers  to  the  old-age  , Survivors , and  विकलांगता  Insurance ( OASDI )  संघीय  program .
The  असली   सोशल   सुरक्षा   अधिनियम   (   1935  ) and  the   वर्तमान  version  of   the  Act , as amended , encompass several social  welfare   और  social  बीमे   कार्यक्रम  .
Social  सुरक्षा   is  primarily funded through dedicated  payroll   कर  called Federal Insurance  योगदान  Act tax (  fica  )  .
Tax deposits  हैं  formally entrusted to the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund  ,  the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund , the Federal  हॉस्पिटल  Insurance  विश्वास   निधि  , or  the  Federal  अनुपूरक   चिकित्सा   बीमे  Trust  निधि  which comprise the  सोशल  Security Trust Fund  .
Upward redistribution  of   आय  is  जिम्मेदार  for about 43  %   of   the  projected  सोशल  Security  shortfall  over the  अगला   75  years .
According to  अर्थशास्त्री  Martin  feldstein   ,   the  combined spending  लिये  all  सोशल   बीमे  programs  in   2003   गठित   37   %  of  सरकारी  expenditure  और   7  % of the gross domestic product .
Social  सुरक्षा  is currently  अनुमानित  to keep roughly  40   प्रतिशत  of all  अमेरिकी  age 65 or  पुरानी  out of poverty .
The Social Security Administration is  headquartered  in Woodlawn  ,  Maryland ,  बस  west  of   बाल्टीमोर  .
The alcohol by volume  दिखाया  on  a  bottle  of   absinthe   .
Alcohol  by  volume ( abbreviated as  abv  , abv , or alc/vol ) is a  मानक  measure  of   कैसा   much   दारू  ( ethanol  )   is   contained  in  an   alcoholic  beverage ( expressed  as   a  percentage  of  total volume  )   .
The ABV standard  is  used worldwide .
In some countries  ,   दारू   by  volume is  referred   to  as degrees  gay-lussac  ( after  the  French  केमिस्ट  Joseph Louis Gay-Lussac  )   .
लॉरेल   खोखला   is   a   गाँव  in the Town  of  Oyster Bay in  nassau  County , New York in the  संयुक्त   राज्य   .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 1,952  at   the   2010  census  .
चार्ल्स  John Huffam  डिकेंस  ( ; 7  फ़रवरी  1812 –  9   जून  1870  )  was  an   अंग्रेज़ी   लेखक   और  social critic .
he  created  कुछ   of  the world 's most memorable fictional  वर्ण  and  is  generally  regarded  as the greatest novelist  of  the Victorian  काल   .
During  उसके  life , his works  enjoyed   unprecedented  fame , and  by  the twentieth century  उसके   साहित्यिक   प्रतिभाशाली  was  broadly  acknowledged  by  critics  और  scholars .
उसके  novels and short  कहानियां  continue  to   be   widely  popular .
born  in  portsmouth  ,  इंग्लैण्ड  , Dickens  बाएँ   स्कूल  to  कार्य  in  a  factory after  उसके  father was thrown  into   कर्जदार  ' prison .
हालांकि  he had little  औपचारिक  education ,  उसके   जल्दी   impoverishment   drove  him to succeed .
Over his career  he   संपादित  a weekly journal for  20  years  ,  wrote 15  novels  ,  5  novellas and  सैंकड़ों   of   छोटी   कहानियां   और  non-fiction  आलेख  ,  lectured  and  performed   extensively   ,   थी   an  indefatigable letter  लेखक  , and campaigned vigorously for children  's   अधिकारों  ,  शिक्षा  ,  और   अन्य   सोशल  reforms  .
डिकेंस  sprang to fame with  the  1836  सीरियल  publication of The Pickwick Papers .
Within  a  few  सालो   he  had become an international literary celebrity  ,  famous  लिये  his  ह्यूमर   ,  satire , and  keen  observation of character  और   समाज   .
His  novels  ,  सबसे  published  in   मासिक  or weekly  किश्तों  ,  pioneered  the  सीरियल  publication of narrative  fiction  , which  became   the   प्रबल  Victorian mode for novel  प्रकाशन   .
the  instalment format allowed  डिकेंस   to  evaluate his  दर्शक  's  प्रतिक्रिया   ,  and  he  often modified his  प्लाट   और   अक्षर  development based on  ऐसे  feedback .
लिये  example ,  जब  his  बीवी  's  chiropodist   expressed  distress at the way Miss  mowcher   in  David Copperfield seemed to reflect her  disabilities  , Dickens went  on   to  improve the character with positive lineaments  .
fagin   in   ओलिवर  Twist apparently mirrors  the  famous  बाड़  Ikey  सुलेमान  ; His caricature  of  Leigh Hunt  in  the figure  of  Mr Skimpole in  bleak  House was likewise toned  bas   on   सलाह  from  कुछ  of his  मित्रों   ,  as they  पढ़ा   एपीसोड  .
In the same novel ,  दोनो  Lawrence Boythorne and  मूनी   the   beadle   हैं   drawn   इससे  real  जीवन  – Boythorne from Walter  जंगली  Landor and Mooney from  'looney   '   ,  a beadle at Salisbury Square  .
His  भूखंड  were  carefully   constructed   ,   और  Dickens often wove  in  elements  इससे  topical  कार्यक्रम  into his  कहानियां   .
masses   of  the illiterate  ग़रीब   chipped  in  ha'pennies  to  have   प्रत्येक   नई   मासिक  episode read to  उन्हें  , opening up and inspiring a new class of readers .
Dickens  थी  regarded as  the  literary  colossus   of  his age  .
उसके   1843  novella ,  a  Christmas  कैरोल   ,   is  one of  the   सबसे  influential  works  ever  लिखा  , and  it  remains popular  और  continues to  inspire  adaptations in every artistic genre  .
His creative genius has been praised by  fellow  writers—from  leo   टालस्टाय  to G.  K.   चेस्टरटन  and George Orwell —for its realism ,  कॉमेडी  ,  गद्य   स्टाइल   ,  unique characterisations ,  और   सोशल  criticism .
On  the  other hand Oscar  वाइल्ड   ,  Henry James  और  Virginia  woolf  complained  of  a  कमी  of psychological  गहराई  , loose writing  ,  and  a   रग  of saccharine sentimentalism .
Martin  लूथर  King and other civil rights leaders  in  front of the  प्रतिमा  of Abraham  lincoln  , August 28  ,  1963
The civil rights movement was a  श्रेणी  of worldwide  राजनैतिक   आंदोलनों   लिये  equality before the law  कि   peaked  in the 1960s .
In many situations it  took   the   रूप   of   अभियान  of  सिविल  resistance aimed  at  achieving change by nonviolent forms  of   प्रतिरोध  .
in   कुछ   परिस्थितियों  it was accompanied  ,  or  followed  ,  by  civil  अशांति  and  हथियारबंद  rebellion  .
the   प्रक्रम  was  long  and tenuous in  अनेक  countries  ,  and many  of   ये  movements did not fully  achieve  their  लक्ष्य  although ,  the  efforts  of  these  आंदोलनों  did  सीसे  to  सुधार   in  the legal  अधिकारों  of previously oppressed groups  of  people  .
the  main aim  of   the  civil  अधिकारों   गति  included ,  और  include ,  ensuring  that  the   अधिकारों  of  सब  people are equally protected  by   the   विधि  ,  सहित  the rights of  अल्पसंख्यकों   .
Civil rights movements ranging  इससे   the   वैश्विक   lgbt   अधिकारों  movement  to  the  वैश्विक  Women 's  अधिकारों   गति  to  विभिन्न  racial  अल्पसंख्यक   अधिकारों  movements  around  the world continue .
The  2010  FIFA World Cup  थी  the  19th  FIFA World Cup ,  the  world championship for men 's national association football teams  .
It took place  in   दक्षिण  Africa  इससे  11 June  to  11 July 2010 .
the   bidding  process for hosting  the   टूर्नामेंट  finals  थी  open only to African nations ; in 2004 , the international football  संघ  , FIFA , selected South  अफ़्रीकी  over  मिश्र  and Morocco to become the first African nation to host  the  finals .
The matches  यहूद   निभाई   in  ten stadiums in nine host  शहरों   around  the  देश  ,  साथ   the   फाइनल  played  at   the   सॉकर  City stadium  in   दक्षिण   अफ़्रीकी  's  largest   नगर   ,   जोहान्सबर्ग  .
Thirty-two  टीमों  were selected for participation  via   a   विश्वव्यापी   योग्यता  tournament  कि  began  in   अगस्त  2007 .
In  the  first round  of  the tournament finals , the teams  competed  in  round-robin   समूह  of four teams  लिये  points  ,   साथ  the top  दो  teams in  प्रत्येक  group  proceeding  .
These  सोलह  teams advanced to the  नॉकआउट  stage ,  जहाँ  three rounds of play decided which  टीमों   होता   participate   in  the  फाइनल  .
in  the final , Spain  ,  the European champions ,  पराजित   third-time   finalists  the Netherlands 1–0  बाद   अतिरिक्त  time , with  आन्द्रेस   iniesta  's  लक्ष्य  in  the   116th  minute  giving  Spain  उनके   पहला  world  शीर्षक   ,  becoming  the   आठवीं   स्वदेश  to win the  टूर्नामेंट  ,  और  the  पहला  European nation to win  the  tournament outside its  घर   महाद्वीप  .
Host nation South Africa  ,  2006 world  champions  Italy  और  2006  runners-up  France were  सब   eliminated   in  the first  गोलाकार  of  the  tournament  .
It was the first  समय   कि  the  होस्ट  were eliminated in the first  गोलाकार  .
New  जीलैंड   साथ   उनके   तीन   draws  were  the   तभी   अपराजित   टोली   in   the  tournament ,  लकिन  were  भी  eliminated in  the   पहला  round .
the  McMuffin is a family  of   नाश्ता  sandwiches in  विभिन्न   आकार  and  configurations   ,  sold by  the  fast-food restaurant  कड़ी  McDonald 's .
The  अंडा  McMuffin is  the  signature breakfast sandwich ; it  थी  invented  by  the  लेट   मैकडोनाल्ड  's  वाल  Herb  पीटरसन  in the late  1960s  and was  introduced   देशभर  in  1972  .
जॉन  Lennon was  an   अंग्रेज़ी  musician  जो   gained   विश्वव्यापी  fame  as  one of the  संस्थापकों  of The Beatles  ,   लिये  his  subsequent  solo  करियर  , and  लिये  his  राजनैतिक   सक्रियता   और   शांतिवाद  .
he  was shot by  चिह्नित   दाउद   chapman   at   the  entrance of the building where he  जिया  ,  the  Dakota ,  in  New  यॉर्क   नगर  on 8 December  1980   .
Lennon had just returned from Record Plant  स्टुडियो   साथ   उसके  wife  ,   योको  Ono .
लेनन   थी  pronounced dead on arrival  at  St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital  बीच  , where it was  stated   कि  nobody  could  have lived for  अधिक  than a few minutes after sustaining such injuries  .
Shortly after local news stations  reported   लेनन  's death ,  crowds  gathered  at  Roosevelt  हॉस्पिटल  and in front  of   the  Dakota .
लेनन   थी  cremated on  10  December  1980  at the  ferncliff   कब्रिस्तान   in  Hartsdale  ,  New  यॉर्क  ;  the   राख  were given to  ओनो   ,  who chose  नहीं  to  थाम  a funeral  लिये  him .
the   पहला  report of Lennon 's  मौत   to  a U.S. national  दर्शक  was  घोषित   by  Howard Cosell  ,   on  ABC 's Monday Night Football  .
नई   ऑरलियन्स   (   or   ,  locally or ;  )  is a major  संयुक्त   राज्य   बंदरगाहों   और   the   largest   नगर   और  metropolitan area  in   the   राज्य   of  Louisiana  .
the  population  of   the  city  थी  343,829 as  of   the  2010 U.S.  जनसांख्यिकी  .
The New  ऑरलियन्स   महानगर   क्षेत्रफल  ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner  महानगर   सांख्यिकीय  Area ) had  a  population of  1,167,764   in   2010  and was the  46th  largest  in  the  संयुक्त  States .
The New Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa Combined  सांख्यिकीय  Area  ,   a   larger   व्यापार   क्षेत्रफल  , had a 2010 population of 1,214,932 .
The  नगर   is   नामित  after  orléans  , a  नगर  located on  the  Loire River in Centre  ,  France  ,   और  is well  ज्ञात   लिये  its  पृथक  French  क्रियोल  architecture  ,   as   खूब  as its cross-cultural  और  multilingual  विरासत  .
New  ऑरलियन्स  is also famous for its  भोजन   ,   म्यूज़िक  ( particularly  as  the  जन्मस्थान   of   जैज़   )  , and  इसके   सालाना  celebrations  और  festivals  ,  most  notably  Mardi  ग्रा  .
The city is  प्रायः  referred  to  as the  ``  most unique '' in America .
नई   ऑरलियन्स  is located  in   southeastern   louisiana   ,  straddling the Mississippi  नदी  .
The  नगर  and Orleans  मोहल्ला  ( ) are .
The city  और  parish are  bounded  by  the   parishes  of  st.   tammany  to the  उत्तर   ,  St. Bernard to the east ,  plaquemines   to   the  south and  जेफरसन   to  the  दक्षिण  and west  .
झील  Pontchartrain , part  of  which is included in  the  city  हद  , lies to the north  और  Lake Borgne  झूठ  to  the  east .
the   संयुक्त  States presidential  चुनाव   of   1968  was the  46th   quadrennial  presidential election  ,  held on Tuesday ,  नवम्बर  5 , 1968  .
the  Republican nominee , former  vice-president  Richard Nixon  ,   जीती  the election over the Democratic  nominee  ,  लाज़िम  Vice-President Hubert  humphrey  .
निक्सन  ran  on  a campaign that promised to  restore  law  और  order to the nation  's  cities , torn by  दंगे  and  अपराधों  .
विश्लेषकों  have  argued  the election  of   1968  is a realigning  चुनाव   as   it  permanently disrupted the  नई  Deal Coalition  कि   था   वर्चस्व  presidential politics  लिये  36 years  .
coming  four  सालो   बाद  Democrat  lyndon  B. Johnson  जीती   in  a  ऐतिहासिक  landslide  ,  the election saw the incumbent  अध्यक्ष  forced out of  the  race and a Republican  निर्वाचित  for the first  समय  in twelve  सालो   .
it  was a wrenching national experience , conducted  दौरान   a  year  of  violence that included  the  assassination of civil rights leader Martin Luther  किंग   ,   jr.   ,  and  subsequent   रेस   दंगे   आरपार   the   स्वदेश   ,   the  assasination of Democratic  अध्यक्षीय  candidate  रॉबर्ट   F.  Kennedy , widespread opposition to  the   वियतनाम   युद्ध  across  विश्वविद्यालयों   campuses   ,  and  हिंसक  confrontations between  पुलिस   और  anti-war  प्रदर्शनकारियों  at  the   1968  Democratic  नेशनल   सम्मेलन  as  the  Democratic party split again and  again   .
The  चुनाव  featured the strongest third party  प्रयत्न  since 1912 by former Alabama Governor George  वालेस  , a  डेमोक्रेट  .
Because  वालेस  's  अभियान   opposed   संघीय   हस्तक्षेप  in the South to  समाप्त   स्कूल   पृथक्करण   ,   he  carried the Deep South and ran  खूब  in ethnic industrial  जिले   in  the  उत्तर   .
इस  was the last election in which New York  था   the  most votes  in   the  electoral college  (  43  मत  )  .
After the 1970  जनसांख्यिकी   ,   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   gained   the  most  चुनावी  votes  और  has remained the most populous  राज्य  since then  .
इस  is  the   नवीनतम  election  जहाँ  a  अध्यक्षीय  ticket won  बगैर   carrying  the vice  अध्यक्षीय  candidate 's  घर  state .
करक   (  ;  भी  known as  garak  , Garrak  ,  and  gorg  ) is  a  village in  gamasiyab  Rural  ज़िला  , in  the  Central District of Nahavand County ,  हमादान  Province  ,   इरान  .
At  the  2006  जनसांख्यिकी  , its  जनसांख्यिकी   थी   294  ,  in  65  परिवारों  .

Kurt  डोनाल्ड   कोबेन  (  फ़रवरी   20  , 1967  –  April  5  , 1994 ) was an  अमरीकी  musician and artist  ,   बेहतरीन  known as  the  lead  सिंगर   ,   guitarist  and primary songwriter of  the   grunge  band  निर्वाण  .
Cobain formed Nirvana  साथ   krist  Novoselic in  एबरडीन  , Washington in 1985  और   स्थापित   it   as  part  of  the Seattle music scene , having its  डेब्यू  album Bleach released on the  स्वतंत्र   रिकार्ड   लेबल  Sub Pop in  1989  .
After  हस्ताक्षर   साथ   प्रमुख   लेबल  DGC Records  ,   the  band found  भेदन  success  साथ  ``  खुश्बू   जैसे  Teen  स्पिरिट  ``  इससे   इसके  second album Nevermind (  1991  ) .
following  the  कामयाबी   of  Nevermind , Nirvana was  labeled  ``  the  flagship band '' of Generation X  ,   और  Cobain hailed  as  ``  the  spokesman  of   a  generation ''  .
Cobain , however  ,  was often uncomfortable and  कुंठित  , believing his  संदेश  and artistic  दृष्टि  to have  महरूम  misinterpreted by the public  ,  with his personal  मुद्दे  often subject to media attention  .
He challenged Nirvana 's  दर्शक  with its final studio album In Utero ( 1993 )  .
During the  पिछला  years of his  जीवन  ,  कोबेन  struggled with heroin addiction  ,   बीमारी  and  अवसाद  .
he   भी  had difficulty  coping  with  उसके  fame and public  चित्र   ,  and the professional and lifelong personal pressures surrounding  खुद  and  उसके  wife , musician  कोर्टनी   प्रेम  .
on  April  8  , 1994 , Cobain was  मिला  dead at his home in  सिएटल  ,  the   शिकार   of  what  थी   officially   शासित  a suicide  by   a  self-inflicted shotgun wound  to  the head  .
the   हालातों   of  his  मौत  at  आयु   27  have become a  टॉपिक  of public  fascination  and debate  .
Since  उनके   डेब्यू  ,  निर्वाण   ,  with  कोबेन  as a songwriter , has sold over 25 million  एल्बम   in   the  U.S.  ,   और   over  50 million  विश्वव्यापी   .
A  millwright  is a  craftsman  or tradesman engaged  साथ   the   निर्माण  and  मेंटेनेंस  of machinery  .
More  generally   in   the  English speaking world ,  जल्दी  millwrights were specialist  बढ़ई   जो   erected   मशीने  used in agriculture ,  खाना  processing and processing lumber and  पेपर  .
in  the early  भाग   of  the  औद्योगिक   क्रान्ति  ,  उनके  skills were pressed into service building the  earliest  powered textile  मिलों   .
Modern  millwrights  work with  स्टील   और  other materials  in   जोड   to   लकडी  and must often combine the skills of  अनेक  skilled trades  in  order  to  successfully fabricate industrial  मशीनरी   or   to   इकट्ठे   मशीने  from  pre-fabricated  parts .
The modern millwright must also be able to read blueprints and  अन्य   schematics  to  सहायता  him in the  निर्माण  of  जटिल   प्रणालियों  .
Millwrights are  अक्सर   unionized  ,  साथ  around  45   %  unionized in  the  US , although experienced millwrights often  नियत   themselves  up as independent  ठेकेदारों   .
The Adjustment Bureau is  a  2011 American romantic action  थ्रिलर  film  loosely  based on the  फिलिप  K.  लंड  short  स्टोरी   ,  ``  समायोजन  Team  ``   .
The  फिल्मी   थी  written and  निर्देशित  by George Nolfi  और   सितारों  Matt Damon  और   एमिली  Blunt .
The  डाल   भी  includes  एंथोनी   mackie  , John  slattery   ,  Michael Kelly , and Terence  स्टैम्प  .
the  score was composed by  थामस  Newman  ,   साथ   दो  songs by  रिचर्ड   ashcroft   (  `` Future 's Bright  ''   लिये   the   खोलने   अनुक्रम   ;  `` Are You Ready ?  ''  for the  closing  credits )  .
सोडियम  azide  is  the inorganic compound with the  सूत्र   nan3   .
इस  colorless salt  is  the  gas-forming   घटक   in  many  car  airbag systems  .
It is used  लिये  the  तैयारी   of  other  azide  compounds .
it   is  an  ionic  substance , is highly  घुलनशील   in   जल   ,   और  is very acutely toxic  .
Double  रेनबो   और   supernumerary  rainbows on  the   अंदर   of   the  primary  चाप  .
the  shadow  of   the  photographer  's  head on  the  bottom  marks  the centre  of  the rainbow circle ( antisolar point ) .
A  रेनबो  is  an   ऑप्टिकल  and meteorological phenomenon  कि  is caused by  प्रतिबिंब  of light in water droplets in  the  Earth  's  atmosphere , resulting in a  वर्णक्रम  of light  appearing   in   the  sky .
it   takes  the form of  a   multicoloured  arc  .
Rainbows  caused   by  sunlight always appear in the section  of  sky directly opposite the  सूर्य  .
in  a  ``  primary  रेनबो  '' ,  the   चाप  shows red on the  बाहरी  part and  बैंगनी   on   the   भीतरी   पक्ष   .
इस   रेनबो  is caused by light  होने   refracted  while entering a  droplet  of water ,  तब   reflected  inside  on  the back  of  the droplet and  refracted  again when leaving  it  .
In a  दोगुना  rainbow , a  दूसरी   चाप   is  seen  बाहर  the  प्राथमिक  arc ,  और   रै  the  अनुक्रम   of  its colours reversed ,  रेड   facing  toward  the  other one ,  in  both  rainbows   .
इस  second rainbow is  caused   by  light reflecting twice  अंदर   जल  droplets .
the  Conservative Party ,  officially  the Conservative and  यूनियनिस्ट  Party  और  colloquially referred  to  as the Tory Party or the Tories , is  a   centre-right  political party in the United Kingdom that espouses the philosophies  of   कोसा   और  British  unionism   .
it  is the largest political party  in   the  United Kingdom , being  the  largest single party in the  हाउस  of Commons with 303 MPs  ,  the largest  पार्टी  in  लोकल  government  साथ   9,391   पार्षदों   ,   और   the  largest British party in the  यूरोपीय  Parliament with  25  MEPs .
it   governs  in coalition with  the  Liberal  डेमोक्रेट  , with  पार्टी   नेता  David Cameron as Prime  मंत्री  .
The Conservative  पार्टी  was founded  in   1834  ,  और   थी  one of  दो  dominant  पार्टियों   in   the  19th  सदी   ,   साथ   साथ  the Liberal Party  .
it   बदला   इसके  name  to  the  रूढ़िवादी   और   यूनियनिस्ट   पार्टी  in  1912  after merging with  the  Liberal Unionist Party  ,  although that name is rarely used  और  it is generally referred  to   as  simply  the   रूढ़िवादी  Party  .
in   the  1920s ,  the  Liberal vote  greatly  diminished and the Labour Party  became  the Conservatives  '  main  विरोधियों   .
रूढ़िवादी  Prime Ministers led governments  लिये   57  years  of   the   20th  century ,  सहित   विंस्टन   चर्चिल   (   1940–45   ,  1951–55 ) and  मार्गरेट  Thatcher ( 1979–90  )  .
थैचर   's  tenure led to wide-ranging economic  उदारीकरण  and saw the  conservatives  become  the   सबसे  eurosceptic of  the  three major parties .
the  party  थी   लौटे  to government  in   गठबन्धन  , having  विफल   to  win  a  majority , in  2010  under  the  more `` liberal  ''  leadership  of  David Cameron .
in  the  यूरोपीय  Parliament  ,  the Conservatives are  the   largest  British party  साथ  25 MEPs  ,  who sit with the soft eurosceptic European Conservatives  और   reformists  ( ECR ) parliamentary group  ,   जबकि   the   पार्टी  itself is a member  of   the  Alliance of European  conservatives   और  Reformists ( AECR ) Europarty  .
They are  the  third-largest party  in  the  स्कॉटिश   पार्लियामेंट   और  second-largest in  the   वेल्श  Assembly .
वे  were formally allied  to   the   ulster   यूनियनिस्ट  Party (  uup   )  as part  of  the  ulster  Conservatives and Unionists arrangement  ,   साथ   the  UUP  फिलहाल  participating in the  five-party  Northern Ireland Executive  .
Destiny 's Child  थी  an American  r  &  b  girl group whose  फाइनल   ,  and  शायद   सबसे  recognizable  ,   line-up  comprised Beyoncé  नॉलेस  ,  केली   rowland  and Michelle Williams .
Formed in  1990   in   ह्यूस्टन   ,  Texas  ,  Destiny 's Child  सदस्यों   began   उनके   musical   endeavors   as  Girl 's Tyme  comprising  ,  among  others ,  नॉलेस   ,  Rowland , LaTavia  roberson   और  LeToya  luckett  .
बाद   सालो   of   सीमित  success  ,   वे  were signed to  कोलंबिया   रिकॉर्ड  as Destiny 's  चाइल्ड   .
नियति  's Child was  शुभारम्भ  into mainstream  मान्यता  following  the  release of their best-selling second  एल्बम  , The  लिखने  's  on   the  Wall  ,  which contained  the   number-one   singles  `` Bills ,  बिल्स   ,  Bills  ``  and `` Say My Name `` .
Despite  नाजुक  and commercial success ,  the  group  थी  plagued  by  internal conflict  और  legal turmoil ,  as  Roberson and  luckett  attempted  to   विभाजित  from  the   समूह  's manager Mathew Knowles ,  citing   favoritism  of  नॉलेस  and  rowland   ,  his daughter  और   भांजी   ,  respectively  .
दोनो  Roberson and  luckett  were soon  replaced   साथ  Williams and Farrah Franklin ;  however  , in 2000 ,  फ्रैंकलिन  was  बर्खास्त   ,   leaving  them as  a  trio  .
Their  तीसरा   एल्बम  , Survivor ,  जिससे   contains   विषयवस्तु  the  पब्लिक  interpreted  as  a  चैनल   to  the group 's  अनुभव  , contains  the   विश्वव्यापी   हिट्स  ``  स्वतंत्र   महिलाओं   ``   ,   ``   उत्तरजीवी  `` and ``  bootylicious  ``  .
in  2002 , they announced a hiatus and  re-united  two years later for the  रिलीज  of  उनके  fourth studio album ,  नियति   fulfilled  (  2004  )  .
नियति  's  चाइल्ड   रै  sold  अधिक   than  50 million  रिकॉर्ड   विश्वव्यापी   to  date  .
बिलबोर्ड  magazine  बाँधने  the  समूह  as one  of  the greatest musical trios of  सब   समय  , the ninth most  कामयाब  artist/band  of   the   2000s  , and  लगाई   the  group  68th  in  इसके   all-time   hot   100   कलाकारों   सूची  in 2008  .
the  Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (  सीडीसी  ) is a United  राज्य  federal agency under  the  Department of  स्वास्थ्य  and  इंसान  Services headquartered  in   druid  Hills  ,  unincorporated DeKalb County ,  जॉर्जिया  ,  in   वृहद  Atlanta .
it  works  to   protect  public  स्वास्थ्य  and  सुरक्षा  by providing information to enhance health  निर्णय  , and it  promotes   स्वास्थ्य   through  partnerships  साथ   राज्य  health departments and other  संगठन   .
The CDC focus national attention  on  developing and applying  बीमारी  prevention and  कंट्रोल  ( especially infectious diseases  और   foodborne   pathogens   और  other microbial infections )  ,   पर्यावरणीय   स्वास्थ्य  ,  occupational   सुरक्षा  and health  ,   स्वास्थ्य   प्रमोशन   ,  injury prevention and  शिक्षा  activities designed to improve the  स्वास्थ्य  of the  लोगों  of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  .
the   सीडीसी  is the  संयुक्त  States ' national public  स्वास्थ्य  institute and is  a   founding  member of  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Association of National Public  स्वास्थ्य  Institutes .
Earthquake prediction  ``   is  usually  पारिभाषित  as the  specification   of  the time  ,   स्थान   ,  and  परिमाण   of   a  future  भूकंप  within  stated  limits  ''  , and  विशेषकर  of ``  the   अगला   दमदार   भूकंप   to  occur in a region . ''
This can be distinguished  इससे   भूकंप  forecasting  ,  which is  the   probabilistic  assessment  of   सामान्य   भूकंप  hazard ,  सहित   the  frequency and magnitude of damaging earthquakes  ,  in a given  क्षेत्रफल  over periods  of   सालो   or  decades .
इस  can be  further  distinguished from real-time  भूकंप  warning systems , which , upon  डिटेक्शन  of  a   कठोर  earthquake ,  can  provide neighboring  regions  a  few   सेकेंड  warning  of  potentially significant shaking  .
To  be   उपयोगी  , an earthquake  भविष्यवाणी  must be precise enough  to   वारंट   the   लागत  of increased precautions , including disruption  of   ordinary  activities and  कॉमर्स   ,  and  सामयिक   पर्याप्त  that preparation  can  be  बना  .
पूर्वानुमान   जरूर  also be reliable , as false alarms and  रद्द   सचेतक   हैं  not only  economically  costly , but  seriously   undermine  confidence in , and  thereby   the   प्रभावकारिता   of  , any kind  of   चेतावनी  .
साथ  over 7,000 earthquakes around the world  प्रत्येक  year  साथ   a  magnitude of 4.0 or greater , trivial  कामयाबी  in  भूकंप   भविष्यवाणी   is  easily  प्राप्त  using sufficiently  व्यापक  parameters of  समय  ,  स्थान   ,  or  परिमाण  .
however  ,  ऐसे   नगण्य  `` successful  पूर्वानुमान   ''  are not useful  .
Major earthquakes  हैं  often followed by reports that they were  पूर्वानुमानित  , or at  तनिक  anticipated ,  लकिन  no  अर्जी  of a successful  भविष्यवाणी  of a major  भूकंप  has survived close inquiry .
in  the  1970s  there  थी  intense optimism  amongst  scientists  कि   कुछ  method  of  predicting  भूकंप  might  be  found ,  लकिन  by the  1990s  continuing failure led many  वैज्ञानिकों  to  सवाल  whether  it  was even  संभावित   .
While many  वैज्ञानिकों   स्टिल  hold that ,  दिए  enough  संसाधन   ,  prediction might be  संभावित  ,  अनेक  others maintain  कि  earthquake prediction is inherently impossible  .
डेबोरा  Ann  ``   debby   ''  Ryan ( born May 13  ,  1993  )  is an American actress ,  सिंगर   ,   संगीतकार  ,  songwriter   और   रिकार्ड   निर्माता   .
रयान   is  best known  लिये  starring as Bailey  पिकेट   in  the  डिज़्नी  Channel Original  श्रेणी   the   सुइट   जीवन   on   डेक  .
In 2008 ,  the  Suite Life  on   डेक   क्रमित  as TV 's  शीर्ष   श्रेणी   among   बच्चे  6-11 and the No . 2  scripted   श्रेणी   among  tweens 9-14 .
Ryan started acting  in   पेशेवर   थिएटर   at  the age  of  seven ;  in  2007 she  appeared  in the Barney  &   मित्रों  straight-to-DVD  फिल्मी   बार्नी   :  Let  's  Go to the Firehouse and  तब   थी  discovered  in  a nationwide  ढूंढें  by  डिज़्नी   .
वो  is  भी   ज्ञात  for  appearing  in the 2008  विशेषता   फिल्मी  The Longshots  as  Edith .
In 2009  ,   वो   अतिथि  starred  in  an episode of Wizards of Waverly Place in Wizards  on  Deck with Hannah Montana  as  Bailey Pickett along with her other  डाल  mates from The  सुइट  Life on Deck  .
Then , in 2010 , she starred  in   the   फिल्मी  16  बधाइयां  ,  जिससे  was the most watched cable program  on  the day of its  प्रीमियर  on  the  Disney  चैनल   .
16  बधाइयां   introduced   रयान   to  new audiences  ;  the movie  प्राप्त   ऊँची  viewership in the  वयस्कों  demographic ( 18-34  )  .
Soon  बाद  that  ,  Ryan  स्ट्रक्चर  in  the  independent theatrical  फिल्मी  , What If ...  ,   जिससे  premiered on  अगस्त  20 ,  2010   .
Ryan also  स्ट्रक्चर  in the  नई   डिज़्नी   चैनल   असली  movie , Radio Rebel , where  वो   portrays  the  भूमिका  of  tara  Adams , a  शर्मीले   17-year-old   लड़की  who  adopts  the radio personality , Radio Rebel .
Released February  17  , 2012 .
Ryan stars  in   the   titular  role in the  डिज़्नी  Channel  असली  Series , Jessie .
Stührling Tourbillon Movement  (  ) .
In horology , a tourbillon  (  ;  ``  whirlwind  ''  ) is an  जोड   to   the  mechanics of  a   देखें  escapement  .
विकसित  around 1795  by   the  French-Swiss  घड़ीसाज़  Abraham-Louis  breguet   इससे  an earlier idea by the  अंग्रेज़ी  chronometer  मेकर   जॉन   अर्नाल्ड   ,  a tourbillon aims  to   काउंटर   the  effects  of  gravity by mounting the escapement and  संतुलन  wheel in  a   घूर्णन  cage , to  negate   the   प्रभाव  of gravity  जब  the  timepiece   (  thus  the  escapement ) is stuck in  a  certain  स्थिति  .
originally   an   attempt  to  improve  accuracy  ,  tourbillons are still included  in  some  महंगी  modern watches  as  a  विलक्षणता   और  demonstration  of  watchmaking virtuosity .
the   यांत्रिकी  is  प्रायः   उजागर   on  the  देखें  's  फेस  to  दिखाएँ   it   बंद   .
The  खिड़कियाँ   installer   (  previously known as Microsoft Installer ) is  a   तन्त्र  component used for the installation ,  मेंटेनेंस  , and  हटाना   of  software on modern Microsoft Windows systems  .
The  संस्थापना   सूचना   ,  and  प्रायः  the  फाइलें   themselves  ,  हैं  packaged  in  installation packages  ,   loosely  relational databases  संरचित  as COM Structured  storages  and commonly known  as  ``  msi   फाइलें   ''  , from their default  संचिका  extension .
खिड़कियाँ  Installer contains  significant   परिवर्तन   इससे  its predecessor  ,   सेटअप   api   .
नई  features include a GUI  फ्रेमवर्क   और   स्वचालित   पीढी   of  the uninstallation  अनुक्रम  .
Windows  installer  is positioned as an  वैकल्पिक  to  stand-alone  executable installer frameworks such  as   पुरानी   संस्करण  of InstallShield  और  NSIS  .
microsoft  encourages  तीसरा   पार्टियों   to  use Windows Installer as  the   आधार  for installation  frameworks   ,   so  that they synchronize correctly  साथ   अन्य   installers   और   रखना  the internal  डेटाबेस  of installed products consistent .
महत्वपूर्ण   सुविधाएँ  such as  rollback  and versioning depend on a consistent  आतंरिक  database for  विश्वसनीय  operation .
Furthermore  ,  Windows  installer   facilitates  the principle  of  least privilege  by  performing software installations  by  proxy for unprivileged  उपयोक्ता  .
चार  Loko is  a  line  of  alcoholic beverages , originally  marketed  as energy drinks ,  बेची   by  Phusion  प्रोजेक्ट   of  Chicago  ,   इलिनोइस   .
Phusion  operates  as Drink Four  brewing  Company  .
Four Loko  ,  the company 's most  लोकप्रिय   पेय  , debuted in  the  United  राज्य   मार्केट  in 2005 .
it   is   अभी  sold  in   48  states  ,  and in Canada ,  the  Bahamas ,  बोलीविया  ,  होंडुरास  , and Europe  .
The  नाम   ``  Four  ''   is  derived from  the  original energy drink  's  four  प्रमुख  ingredients : alcohol , caffeine , taurine  ,   और  guarana  .
चार   ब्रांडेड  products have been  the   ऑब्जेक्ट  of  विधिक  ,  नैतिक  , and  स्वास्थ्य  concerns related to the company  allegedly   विपणन  them  to   the  underaged and  the  purported danger  of   combining  alcohol and  कैफीन   .
After  the  beverage was  बैन  in several states , a product reintroduction  in  December 2010 removed  कैफीन  , taurine  ,   और   guarana   as  ingredients ,  और  the  malt   पेय  is no  longer  marketed  as   an  energy drink  .
The neck of a  गिटार   प्रर्दशित   the   नट  (  in  the background  ,  coloured  श्वेत  )  और  first four metal  frets  .
a   fret  is  a   उठाया  element  on  the neck  of  a stringed  यंत्र  .
frets   प्रायः  extend across the full width  of   the   गर्दन  .
On most modern  पश्चिमी  fretted  यंत्र   ,   frets  are metal strips  inserted  into  the  fingerboard  .
on  some historical instruments and non-European instruments  ,   frets   हैं   बना  of  टुकड़े  of  स्ट्रिंग  tied around the neck .
Frets divide the neck into  फिक्स्ड   खण्ड  at intervals related  to  a  musical  framework .
On  यंत्र  such as guitars ,  प्रत्येक  fret represents  एक   semitone   in  the standard  पश्चिमी  system where  एक  octave is  विभाजित  into twelve  semitones  .
Fret is often  प्रयुक्त  as a verb , meaning  बस   ``  to  दबायें   bas  the  स्ट्रिंग  behind a fret .  ''
Fretting  प्रायः  refers  to   the  frets  and/or  their system of placement .
There was consumption of  दारू  both  दौरान   और  after prohibition  .
The 18th  amendment  prohibited the  उत्पादन  , distribution and sale of alcoholic beverages  in  the  संयुक्त  States and was  widely   समर्थित  by  the  American  पब्लिक   जब  it went into effect in 1920  .
The temperance movement  था  popularized the  विश्वास   कि   दारू  was the  प्रमुख  cause of most personal and social  समस्याएं   और   निषेध   थी  seen as  the  solution  to  the  स्वदेश   's   गरीबी  , crime , violence  ,   और  other  ills   .
Upon ratification of the  amendment  , the  प्रसिद्ध  evangelist Billy Sunday  कहा   कि   ``   the  slums will soon be  तभी  a memory .
we  will turn our prisons into factories and our jails  into   storehouses  and  corncribs   .  ''
( Compare Christianity  और   दारू   .  )
चूंकि  alcohol was  to   be   बैन  and  चूंकि  it was seen as  the  cause of most  ,  if not  सब  , crime ,  कुछ  communities sold their jails  .
The  स्वदेश   थी  highly  आशावादी  and the leading  prohibitionist   in   the  United  राज्य  Congress  confidently  asserted  कि   ``  There is as  much  chance  of   repealing   the  Eighteenth  amendment  as  वहीँ  is for a  हमिंगबर्ड  to fly to  the  planet  मंगल   साथ   the   वॉशिंगटन   स्मारक  tied to its tail.”
The metre ( meter in  अमरीकी  English  )   ,   (  SI  ईकाई  symbol :  m  ; SI dimension symbol :  l  ) ,  is  the  आधारभूत  unit of  लंबाई  in the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  System of Units  (   si  ) .
Originally intended to  be  one ten-millionth  of  the distance from  the  Earth 's  equator  to the North Pole  (  at sea  स्तर  )  ,  its definition  रै   महरूम  periodically  परिष्कृत  to reflect growing knowledge of metrology .
चूंकि  1983 , it  रै   महरूम  defined as  ``  the  लंबाई  of  the   पाथ  travelled  by  light in  वैक्यूम  during  a   समय  interval of  1/299,792,458  of a  दूसरी   .  ''

geologists   explaining  the  महत्व   of  volcanic ash  परतों  to  विद्यार्थी  on  फ़ील्ड  in  आइसलैंड
A  भूवैज्ञानिक  is  a  scientist who studies the  ठोस  and liquid matter  कि  constitutes  the  Earth as  खूब  as the processes and history that has  तराशा  it .
Geologists usually  engage  in studying geology .
geologists  , studying more of an applied science  than  a theoretical  एक   ,  must approach Geology  using  physics , chemistry  और   जीवविज्ञान  as well  as  other sciences  .
geologists  ,  compared   to  scientists engaged in other fields ,  हैं  generally more exposed to the outdoors  than   रहकर   in  laboratories  ;  although some geologists  prefer  to  perform  most of  उनके  studies in the  lab  .
geologists   हैं   सगाई  in  खोजी  for mining companies in search of  धातुओं  , oils , and other  धरती  resources .
They are also  in  the  forefront   of  natural hazards  और  disasters warning  और   शमन   ,  studying earthquakes , volcanic activity  ,  tsunamis ,  मौसम   तूफ़ान  , and  the  like ;  उनके   अध्ययन  are used  to   warn  the general public of  the   occurrence  of  ये  events .
Currently  ,   geologists   हैं   भी  engaged  in  the discussion of climate change  ,  as  वे   पढ़ाई  the  इतिहास   और  evidence for  इस  Earth process  .

Modern  वैक्यूम  tubes , mostly miniature  स्टाइल
In electronics , a vacuum  ट्यूब  , electron tube (  in  North America  )   ,  thermionic valve , tube ,  or  valve  is   a   यंत्र   controlling  electric current  through  a vacuum in a  sealed  container  .
the  container  is  often  पतला  transparent glass  in  a roughly cylindrical  आकार   .
The simplest  वैक्यूम   ट्यूब  ,  the   डायोड  , is essentially  an   incandescent  light bulb with  an  added electrode inside .
जब  the bulb 's  फिलामेंट   is  heated white-hot ,  electrons  are  ``  boiled  ''   बंद   इसके  surface and  into  the  वैक्यूम  inside the bulb  .
If  the  electrode  --  called a ``  थाली   ''  or `` anode '' --  is   बना  more positive than  the  hot  फिलामेंट   ,   a  direct  वर्तमान  flows  through   the   वैक्यूम   to   the  electrode ( a demonstration of the  एडिसन  effect )  .
As the  वर्तमान   तभी  flows in  एक   दिशा  , it  makes   it   संभावित  to convert  an  alternating  वर्तमान   लागू   to  the  फिलामेंट  to direct  वर्तमान   .
The introduction of a third electrode ,  a  grid  between   the   फिलामेंट   और  the  थाली  , yields  another  function .
A voltage applied to the grid controls  the  current flowing from  the   फिलामेंट  to the plate .
Thus  ,  it allows the  यंत्र   to  be  प्रयुक्त  as an  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  amplifier  .
वैक्यूम  tubes  हैं   यूँ  used  लिये   rectification  , amplification ,  switching  , or similar processing or creation of  विद्युत  signals  .
The vast majority of  आधुनिक  day  tubes  consist of  a  sealed  संग्राहक  with  a  vacuum inside , and  essentially   rely  on thermionic  उत्सर्जन  of electrons from  a  hot filament  or  a  कैथोड   heated  by the filament .
Some  अपवाद  to this  हैं  dealt with  in   the  section  परिचय   gas-filled  tubes  नीचे  .
Vacuum tubes were  नाजुक  to  the  development of  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  technology ,  जिससे  drove the expansion and commercialization of  रेडियो  broadcasting ,  टेलीविज़न  , radar , sound reinforcement , sound recording and reproduction , large telephone networks  ,   एनालॉग  and digital computers , and  औद्योगिक   प्रक्रम  control  .
Although some  अनुप्रयोग  had counterparts using  पहले   technologies   ऐसे  as the spark gap  ट्रांसमीटर  or mechanical  कंप्यूटर  , it was  the  invention of the  वैक्यूम   ट्यूब   साथ   तीन  electrodes ( called  a  triode ) and  इसके  capability of  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   प्रवर्धन   कि   बना  these technologies widespread  और  practical .
In  सबसे  applications ,  solid-state   डिवाइस   ऐसे  as  transistors  and other  सेमीकंडक्टर  devices  have   replaced  tubes .
solid-state  devices last longer  और  are  छोटी   ,  more efficient , more reliable ,  और   सस्ता  than tubes  .
Tubes can be fragile  ,   sometimes  generate  significant  unwanted  ऊष्मा  , and  can  take many seconds—many minutes in  नाजुक   applications—after   powering   on  to warm to a temperature where they perform within operational  सहिष्णुता  .
However ,  tubes   स्टिल   ढूँढें  uses where  solid-state   डिवाइस  have  नहीं  been developed ,  हैं  impractical , or where a tube has superior performance ,  as  with  कुछ  devices  in  professional  ऑडियो  and  high-power   रेडियो   ट्रांसमीटरों   .
Tubes are  स्टिल  produced  लिये  such  अनुप्रयोग  .
Tubes  हैं   कम  likely than semiconductor  डिवाइस  to  be  destroyed by  the   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक   पल्स  produced by nuclear explosions  और   geomagnetic  storms  उत्पादित  by giant solar flares .
Skittles is a  ब्रांड  of fruit-flavoured sweets , currently produced and marketed by the  wm   .  Wrigley Jr. Company  ,   a   प्रभाग  of Mars  ,  Inc .
They  have  hard sugar shells which carry the letter  s  .
The inside is  मुख्यतः   शुगर  , corn  सिरप   ,  and  hydrogenated   ताड़  kernel oil along with fruit juice ,  साइट्रिक  acid , and natural and  कृत्रिम  flavours .
The confectionery has  महरूम  sold  in   a  variety of  फ्लेवर  collections  ,   ऐसे   as  Tropical  और   जंगली   बेरी  .
सर   विंस्टन  Leonard Spencer-Churchill  ,   (   30  November 1874  –  24 January 1965 ) was a British politician  जो  was  the   प्रधान  Minister  of   the   संयुक्त   किंगडम  from  1940   to  1945  और   again   इससे  1951  to  1955 .
widely   regarded   as  one  of   the   महानतम   wartime  leaders  of   the   20th  century ,  चर्चिल  was  भी  an  अधिकारी  in  the  British Army  ,  a historian , a  लेखक   ,  and an artist .
he  is the only British  प्रधान  Minister in  इतिहास  to have  प्राप्त   the  Nobel Prize  in   साहित्य   ,   और  was also  the   पहला   व्यक्ति  to be  बना   an  Honorary Citizen of  the  United States  .
Churchill was  born   into  an aristocratic family as the  पोता   of  the 7th Duke of  marlborough   .
उसके   पिता  ,  रब   randolph   चर्चिल   ,   थी   a  charismatic politician who  परोसा  as Chancellor of  the  Exchequer  ;  his mother ,  jennie   जेरोम  , was an American socialite .
As a young  फौज  officer ,  he  saw  कार्रवाई  in British India , The  सूडान   ,  and  the   दूसरी  Boer War  .
he   gained  fame as a war correspondent and  लिखा  books about  उसके   अभियान  .
At  the  forefront of politics  लिये   पचास   सालो   ,  he  आयोजित   अनेक   राजनैतिक  and cabinet positions  .
Before the  पहला  World War , he  परोसा  as  अध्यक्ष   of  the  फलक   of  Trade  ,  Home Secretary , and First Lord of  the  Admiralty as part of the  asquith  Liberal government  .
During the war , he  जारी  as  पहला  Lord of the Admiralty  जबतक   the  disastrous Gallipoli Campaign  caused  his  प्रस्थान  from government  .
he   तब  briefly resumed active  फौज   सेवा   on  the  पश्चिमी  Front as commander of  the   6th   बटालियन  of  the  Royal Scots  fusiliers  .
He returned to government  as   मंत्री  of  munitions   ,  Secretary of State  लिये  War , and Secretary  of  State for Air .
After  the   युद्ध  ,  चर्चिल  served as  चांसलर  of  the   exchequer   in  the  रूढ़िवादी   (   baldwin  ) government of 1924–29  ,  controversially  returning   the  pound  स्टर्लिंग  in  1925   to   the  gold standard at  इसके   pre-war  parity , a  मूव   widely  seen as  बनाना  deflationary pressure on  the  UK economy .
भी  controversial was  उसके   विपक्ष   to  increased home  नियम  for  इण्डिया  and  उसके  resistance to the 1936 abdication of Edward  viii  .
आउट  of office and politically ``  in   the   wilderness   ''   दौरान   the   1930s   ,  Churchill took  the  lead in warning  परिचय  Nazi Germany  और  in  campaigning   लिये  rearmament .
on  the outbreak  of  the Second World War , he  थी   again  appointed  पहला   रब   of   the  Admiralty  .
Following the  इस्तीफा  of  नेविली   चेम्बरलेन   on  10 May 1940  ,  Churchill  became  Prime  मंत्री   .
His steadfast refusal to consider  शिकस्त  , surrender  ,   or   a   सुलह  peace  helped  inspire British  प्रतिरोध  ,  विशेषकर  during the difficult early days of the  युद्ध  when Britain  stood  alone  among  European countries  in  its  क्रियाशील  opposition to Adolf  हिटलर   .
Churchill was particularly noted  लिये   उसके  speeches  और   रेडियो  broadcasts , which  helped  inspire the British  लोगों   .
he  led Britain as Prime  मंत्री   जबतक  victory over Nazi Germany had been  secured   .
After  the  Conservative Party  खोया   the  1945  चुनाव  , he  became  Leader  of  the  विपक्ष  to the Labour (  attlee   )   सरकारी  .
बाद   जीतना  the 1951  चुनाव   ,  he  again   became  Prime Minister  ,   पहले   retiring  in  1955  .
Upon  उसके   मौत   ,   एलिज़ाबेथ  II granted  उसे  the  इज्ज़त  of a  राज्य  funeral  ,  which saw one  of   the  largest assemblies of world  कूटनीतिज्ञों   in  history .
Named the  महानतम  Briton of all  समय  in  a  2002  पोल  , Churchill is widely  regarded   as  being  among  the most  influential  people  in   अंग्रेजों   इतिहास   .

The show is produced  by   nelvana  and began  airing  on October 13  ,  2006 in Canada  on  the network YTV  .

the  Ford Focus is a  कॉम्पैक्ट  car ( C-segment in  यूरोपीय   )  manufactured by the  घाट  Motor Company since 1998 .
Ford  began   बिक्री  of the Focus  to   यूरोपीय  in July 1998 and in  उत्तर  America during 1999  लिये  the 2000 model year .
In Europe  ,   दक्षिण  America  ,   उत्तर  America and  दक्षिण  Africa , the Focus  replaced  the various versions of the  घाट  Escort sold  in  those markets  .
In  एशिया  and  australasia  ,  it   replaced  the Ford Laser  .
As of the first half of  2012   ,  the  फ़ोकस  surpassed the Toyota Corolla to  become   the   संसार   's   बेहतरीन   selling  automobile  nameplate  .
The Focus has been  माना   एक  of  the  50  महानतम   गाड़ियाँ  of  the   पास्ट  fifty years  by   अंग्रेजों   पत्रिका  CAR .
an  agar plate  --  an  उदाहरण  of a  बैक्टीरियल  growth medium  .
specifically   ,  it is a  streak  plate  ;  the  नारंगी   लाइनों  and  dots  are  formed  by bacterial colonies .
a  growth medium  or   संस्कृति  medium is  a   द्रव  or  gel  designed  to  support the  विकास   of   microorganisms   or  cells , or  छोटी  plants like the moss Physcomitrella patens  .
वहीँ   हैं  different types of media  लिये  growing  अलग  types of cells .
वहीँ   हैं  two  प्रमुख  types of growth  मीडिया  : those used for  कोशिका   संस्कृति   ,  which use  विशिष्ट  cell types derived from plants or animals , and microbiological  संस्कृति   ,   जिससे  are  प्रयुक्त  for  growing  microorganisms , such as  जीवाणु  or  खमीर   .
The most common  विकास  media  लिये   microorganisms  are  nutrient  broths and agar plates ; specialized media are sometimes required  लिये   microorganism  and  कोशिका  culture  विकास  .
Some organisms  ,  termed  सुकुमार  organisms  ,  require  specialized   environments  due to complex nutritional requirements .
Viruses ,  लिये   उदाहरण  ,  हैं   obligate  intracellular parasites  और  require a  विकास   मीडियम  containing living  कोशिकाएं  .
A talent agent  ,   or  booking agent , is a person who  पाता   कार्य  for  अभिनेताओं   ,  authors , film  निर्देशकों   ,  musicians ,  मॉडल   ,  producers , professional athletes  ,   लेखक   और   अन्य  people in various entertainment  व्यवसायों  .
an   एजेंट   भी  defends  ,  supports  और  promotes  the   ब्याज  of his/her clients .
एजेंटों   can   नहीं   उपज   उनके   अपना  shows  due  to  विरोध  of interest .
A talent  एजेंट   जरूर   be  familiar  साथ  their clients .
An agent  रै  to know what kind  of  work the  क्लाएंट   can  and can not do in order to match them  साथ   विभिन्न   कार्य  .
having   an  agent  is   नहीं   जरूरी  , but does  सहायता   the   कलाकार  in  getting  jobs .
In  अनेक   मामले   ढलाई  directors , or other businesses , go to talent agencies to find  कलाकारों   वे  are looking for  .
the  agent is paid a  प्रतिशत  of  the  star  's   आय   (   typically  10  %  ) .
Agents  sometimes   होगा   be  referred to  as   ``  10 percenters .  ''
There are different  regulations  that govern different types of agents that are established  by  artist  's   संघ  and the legal  क्षेत्राधिकार  in  जिससे   the  agent  operates   .
वहीँ   हैं   भी   पेशेवर  organizations that license  हुनर  agencies .
चूंकि  the decline in  viewership  in theaters  ,  from the  1950s  to  1960s  , this caused  a  monumental shift in how studios would  उपज   films  and thus reducing  the  cost of  विशेष   और  expensive  अभिनेताओं  .
अभिनेताओं  and actresses  यहूद  working  लिये   the   studios  but were not owned by  एक   प्रमुख  studio entity and  so  were able  to  work on within their time and with other  studios  .
Because of this ,  एजेंटों   यहूद  now seen as a  necessity   बजाय   of   an   विकल्प   .
Agents now  became  third parties  कि  negotiated between studios and clients , this making their services  imperative   between   प्रत्येक   पार्टी  .
Since talent  एजेंसियों  are working  साथ  lucrative contracts , all  हुनर  agencies  जरूर   be  licensed  अंतर्गत  special  भाग  of  the  California Labor  कोड   ,   जिससे   काल्स   an   एजेंट   a   ``  person  or  corporation  जो  engages in the occupation of  procuring   ,   offering  ,  होनहार   ,  or  attempting   to  procure employment for artist or artists  .   ''
मंगल   रै   दो  known  moons  ,  phobos  and  deimos   ,   जिससे  are thought  to  be  captured   क्षुद्रग्रह  .
Both  satellites  were  खोजा  in 1877 by  asaph   हॉल  and are named after the characters Phobos ( panic/fear )  और  Deimos  (  terror/dread )  जो  , in  यूनानी   mythology  , accompanied their father  एरीस  ,  परमेश्वर  of  युद्ध  ,  into  battle .
एरीस   थी  known  as   मंगल  to the Romans  .
It  is  possible  कि  Mars  may  have  moons  smaller than 50 -  100   मीटर  and a dust  रिंग  between  phobos  and Deimos  may  be present but none have  महरूम   खोजा   .
In  विधि  enforcement  parlance   ,  the term murder book  refers  to the  मामला  file of  a   हत्या  investigation  .
Typically , murder  किताबे  include crime  झाँकी   छायाचित्र  and sketches  ,   पोस्टमार्टम  and  forensic  reports ,  transcripts   of  investigators '  टीप  and  गवाह  interviews  .
The murder  किताब   encapsulates   the  complete paper trail of a murder  छानबीन   ,  from  the  time  the  murder  is   पहला  reported  through   the  arrest  of  a  suspect   .
Law enforcement  एजेंसियों  typically guard murder  किताबे  carefully  ,  and it is  असामान्य  for civilians to be given  आज़ाद   अभिगम  to  ये   kinds  of records , especially for unsolved cases  .
A  melon  baller
melon  balls are  गेंदें   of   melon  made  using  a melon baller that varies from  around   1   centimeter  to  3  centimeters  (   परिचय   3/8  inch  to   1   इंच   )  .
They are generally  प्रयुक्त  in  फल  salad  .
A KSA  ,  or Knowledge , Skills  ,   और  Abilities  ,  is a  श्रेणी  of narrative  कथन   कि   हैं   जरूरी  when applying to United States Federal  सरकारी  job openings  .
KSAs are used to determine  ,   साथ  with resumes , who  the   बेहतरीन  applicants are  जब   अनेक   उम्मीदवार   qualify  for a job .
the  knowledge ,  कौशल  and abilities  (  KSAs ) necessary for  the  successful performance of a position are contained on each  जॉब  vacancy announcement  .
In 2009 the Office  of  Personal Management asked  संघीय   एजेंसियों  to  रोकें   requiring  job applicants  to  fill  आउट  the  questionnaires  , to be  phased   आउट   भीतर  a  साल  .
ksas  are brief  और   केन्द्रित  essays about one  's  career and  शैक्षणिक   पृष्ठभूमि  that  presumably   qualify  one to perform  the  duties of  the  position  होने  applied for .
A  ज्ञान   ,  skills ,  और   abilities   (  KSA  )  is  a  concise  निबन्ध   परिचय  one  's  talent  और   विशेषज्ञता   और  related experiences (  कार्य  , education ,  स्वयंसेवी  )  और   accomplishments   .
a   श्रेणी   of   ksa  statements are usually required  जब  applying for most  संघीय   सरकारी  and some state  और   नगर  government jobs  .
ksas   हैं  used  as   a  yardstick to  assess  the  सामर्थ्य  of  a  prospective applicant in terms  of   संभावित  ability to perform  the  duties of the job .
सबसे  government hiring  officials  look for  a   छोटी   ,   कुरकुरे   और   साफ  KSA that  emphasizes  results  or  accomplishments obtained in previous work .
ksa   कथन  are  भी  known as  मूल्यांकन  Factors .
अन्य  agencies sometimes  कॉल   उन्हें   ``   दरजा   कारकों  ''  ,   ``   विशेषता  Ranking Factors  ''   ,   ``  Knowledge , Abilities , skills  और   अन्य   विशेषताएँ  '' ,  or  `` Job  तत्व   ''   .
The name  can   be   बस  a  नाम  but often it influences content and length  of   the   निबन्ध  .
Every agency has  इसके   अपना  regulations  लकिन   सबसे   of  the time the each KSA factor  चाहिए  be  1/2  to  11⁄2   पृष्ठों   long  .
The below definitions are  पारिभाषित  by  the  U.S. Office of  कर्मियों  Management :
Knowledge  ,  Skills  ,  and  abilities  ( KSAs )  -   the   गुण   जरूरी  to perform  a  job and  हैं   generally  demonstrated through qualifying  सेवा  , education  ,   or   प्रशिक्षण  .
ज्ञान  -  is  a  देह   of   सूचना  applied directly to the  प्रदर्शन  of a function .
कौशल  - Is an  observable  competence to perform  a   सीखे  psychomotor act .
Ability  -  Is  competence   to  perform an observable behavior or a  बर्ताव  that results in  an   observable  product .
the  scoring of KSA essays is based on  a  scale of from one to  100   .
Job  आवेदकों   जरूर  score  ऊपर   70   to  be considered  लिये  the position .
ऊँची  scores are derived through  answering   the  KSA question as  specifically   as   संभावित  , providing examples from previous employment  or  training  कि   clearly   demonstrate  you meet the qualifications .
जब  applying to federal government positions  ,  a  संघीय   पुनरारंभ   is   प्रायः  required in  जोड   to  KSA  कथन   .
