Love Always  is  the  डेब्यू   एल्बम  of  अमरीकी   r  &  b  duo K-Ci  &   जोजो  , released  on  June  17  , 1997  ,  by MCA Records .
It was  अंकित  at  विभिन्न   studios  in  नई  York and the Los Angeles area  in   1996   और  1997 .
It  थी  produced by  जोजो  and  अनेक  others ,  सहित   devante  Swing ,  जेम्स  Mtume , and Jeff Redd .
The  duo  were  originally   a   भाग   of   jodeci   पहले   इस  album .
The album peaked at  छठे   on  the  us   बिलबोर्ड   200  and also  appeared  on international charts  .
the   सिंगल  ``  सब  My Life ``  charted   क्रमांक   एक   in  multiple  देशों  , and all  चार  of the  एल्बम   's  singles  peaked   ऊपर  the  शीर्ष   25  in the  us   hot  R & B/Hip-Hop Songs and  the   नई  Zealand  शीर्ष  40 Singles .
Love Always  थी   प्राप्त  favorably  by  critics , who  praised  the  भाइयो   '  singing ability and  the   उत्पादन   .
the   एल्बम   रै  been  certified  three times  प्लेटिनम   by   the   रिकॉर्डिंग  Industry  संघ  of America (  riaa  ) and gold  by  Music Canada and IFPI Sweden .
As  of  June 1999 it  था  sold  2.9  million copies in  the   संयुक्त  States  .
A  variable-rate  mortgage  ,  adjustable-rate  बंधक   (   भुजा  ) , or tracker mortgage is a  बंधक   ऋण  with  the  interest  रेट   on   the  note periodically adjusted  आधारित  on an index  जिससे  reflects  the  cost to the  lender   of  borrowing  on  the credit markets .
the  loan may be offered  at  the lender 's  मानक   परिवर्तनीय  rate/  आधार  rate .
वहीँ  may be  a   सीधा  and  legally-defined   कड़ी   to   the  underlying  अनुक्रमणिका   ,  but where the lender offers no specific  कड़ी   to  the underlying  मार्केट  or index the  रेट  can be changed  at   the   lender  's discretion .
the   पद   ``  variable-rate mortgage  ''   is  most  आम  outside the United States  ,  whilst in the United States ,  ``   adjustable-rate  mortgage  ''   is   सबसे   आम   ,   और  implies a  बंधक   regulated  by  the   संघीय  government  ,   साथ  caps on charges .
In many  देशों   ,  adjustable  रेट  mortgages are  the  norm , and in  ऐसे   स्थान  , may simply  be  referred  to   as   mortgages  .
Among the most  आम  indices  हैं   the  rates  on   1-year  constant-maturity  राजकोष   (   cmt   )   प्रतिभूति   ,  the Cost  of   निधि  Index  (  COFI )  ,  and the London Interbank  offered   रेट  (  libor  )  .
A few  lenders   उपयोग  their own  लागत  of  निधि   as  an index  ,   बल्कि  than  using  other indices .
This  is   किया   to   ensure   a  steady  हाशिया  for  the   lender  , whose  अपना  cost of  funding   होगा   प्रायः  be related  to   the  index .
Consequently  ,   भुगतान  made by the borrower  may  change  over   समय   साथ  the  बदलना  interest rate (  alternatively  ,  the  term  of   the   ऋण   may  change )  .
इस   is   पृथक   इससे  the  ग्रैजुएट  payment mortgage , which  offers   बदलना   भुगतान  amounts  लकिन   a   फिक्स्ड   ब्याज  rate .
Other forms of mortgage loan  शामिल   the  interest  तभी  mortgage ,  the  fixed rate mortgage  ,  the negative amortization  बंधक   ,  and  the   गुब्बारा  payment  बंधक  .
समायोज्य  rates transfer  भाग   of  the interest  रेट  risk from  the   lender   to  the borrower .
They can be used where  मनमौजी   ब्याज  rates  मेक   फिक्स्ड  rate  लोन  difficult  to  obtain  .
The  borrower  benefits  if   the   ब्याज  rate falls  लकिन   loses  if the  ब्याज  rate  increases  .
the  borrower  लाभ  from reduced margins to the underlying cost  of  borrowing compared to fixed or  capped  rate  mortgages  .
the   हत्या  of  रॉबर्ट  Francis `` Bobby  ''  Kennedy  ,  a United  राज्य  Senator and brother  of  assassinated President John  fitzgerald  `` Jack ''  कैनेडी  , took place  shortly   बाद   मध्यरात्रि  on June  5   ,  1968 , in Los Angeles , California , during  the  campaign season for the United  राज्य   अध्यक्षीय   चुनाव   ,  1968 .
After  जीतना  the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   और   दक्षिण   डकोटा  primary elections  लिये  the Democratic  नामांकन  for President  of   the  United  राज्य  ,  कैनेडी   थी  shot  as  he  walked   through   the  kitchen of the  दूत  Hotel  और   died   in   the   शुभ   सामरी  Hospital twenty-six hours  बाद   .
Sirhan Sirhan  ,   a  24-year-old Palestinian /  जार्डन  immigrant  ,   थी  convicted of Kennedy  's  murder  और  is  सेवारत   a  life  वाक्य  for the crime  .
sirhan   's  lawyers  have   released  statements  claiming   प्रमाण  that he was framed  .
the   शूटिंग   थी  recorded  on  audio tape  by   a  freelance newspaper  रिपोर्टर  , and the aftermath was captured  on   फिल्मी   .
कैनेडी  's  देह  lay in repose at  st.  Patrick 's Cathedral in New York  लिये   दो  days before a funeral  द्रव्यमान  was held on June 8  .
His  देह   थी   interred  near  उसके  brother John at  आर्लिंगटन  National Cemetery  .
His death  prompted   the  protection of  अध्यक्षीय  candidates  by   the  United States Secret  सेवा  .
Hubert Humphrey went on  to   जीत   the  Democratic  नामांकन  for the presidency , but  ultimately   narrowly   खोया  the election to Richard Nixon  .
As  साथ  his brother  जोकर  's death , Bobby 's  हत्या  and  the   हालातों  surrounding it have  शाखित  a variety  of  conspiracy theories  .
As of  2013   कैनेडी   remains   एक  of only  दो   बैठे  United States Senators to  be  assassinated ( the  अन्य   होने   huey   long   )  .
The  आधुनिक  Age of  कॉमिक   किताबे   is  an  अनौपचारिक  name for the  काल   in  the history of  मुख्यधारा  American comic  किताबे  generally  माना  to  पिछला  from the mid-1980s  जबतक  present  दिन  .
in   इस   काल   ,  comic book characters  generally  became darker  और   अधिक  psychologically  जटिल   ,   creators  became better-known and active in  बदलना   the   उद्योग  , independent comics flourished , and larger  प्रकाशन   घरों  became  अधिक   commercialized   .
An  वैकल्पिक   नाम   लिये  this period  is  the Dark  आयु  of  कॉमिक   किताबे  ,  due  to the popularity  और  artistic influence of grim titles ,  ऐसे  as  और  Watchmen  .
When  हैरी  Met  सैली  ... is a  1989   अमरीकी  romantic  कॉमेडी  film written  by  Nora  ephron   और  directed by  रोब  Reiner  .
it  stars Billy Crystal as Harry and  मेग  Ryan  as   सैली   .
The story  फ़ॉलो   the  title characters  इससे  the time  वे   मिलें   बस  before  sharing  a  cross-country   ड्राइव  , through twelve  सालो  or so  of  chance encounters  in  New  यॉर्क  City  .
the  film  उठाता  the  सवाल  `` Can men  और   महिलाओं  ever just be  मित्रों   ?  '' and advances  अनेक  ideas about relationships that became  household   अवधारणाओं   ,  such as those  of  the  ``  '' girlfriend  और   the  ``  transitional  person  ''  .
The origins of  the  film  आए  from  reiner  's  वापसी   to   सिंगल   जीवन  after  a  divorce  .
an  interview Ephron  conducted   साथ   reiner  provided  the  basis for Harry .
Sally  थी  based  on  Ephron and some  of   उसके   मित्रों  .
Crystal  आए   on   फलक   और  made his own contributions  to   the  screenplay , making  हैरी  funnier .
ephron  supplied  the  structure of the film with  much   of  the dialogue  आधारित   on  the  real-life  friendship  between   reiner  and Crystal  .
The soundtrack consists  of   मानकों   performed   by   हैरी  Connick , Jr. ,  साथ  a  बिग  band and  ऑर्केस्ट्रा  arranged by  मार्क  Shaiman  .
Connick  जीती   उसके  first Grammy  पुरस्कार  for Best Jazz  पुरूष   गायन   प्रदर्शन  .
कोलंबिया   तस्वीरें   released  the film  using   the   ``   मंच  '' technique , which  शामिल   खोलने   it  in  a  few  चुनें   शहरों  ,  letting  positive word of mouth  generate  interest  ,   और  then  धीरे   expanding  distribution over subsequent weeks  .
When Harry Met Sally  ...   grossed  a  कुल  of US $  92   .8  million in  उत्तर  America .
ephron  received a  अंग्रेजों  Academy  फिल्मी  Award , an Oscar  नामांकन   ,  and a Writers Guild  of  America Award nomination for her  पटकथा   .
The  फिल्मी   is   क्रमित  23rd on AFI  's  100  सालो  ... 100 Laughs  सूची   of   the  top comedy  films  in American  सिनेमा   और  number  60  on Bravo 's `` 100 Funniest  फिल्मों   ''   .
In  जल्दी  2004 , the  फिल्मी   थी   adapted  for  the  stage in a  उत्पादन  starring  ल्यूक  Perry and Alyson  हनिंगन   .

Hamburger  हेल्पर  is  a   लकीर  of  packaged   खाना   उत्पाद  primarily  consisting   of  boxed  पास्ता  bundled with a packet or packets of  powdered   सॉस   or  seasonings  .
The  सामग्री  of each box are  संयुक्त  with  browned  ground  बीफ   ,  water and  मिल्क   to   बनाएँ   a  complete dish  .
the  product  लकीर  also features products  साथ   अन्य  starches  ऐसे   as  rice or  आलू  instead  of   पास्ता   .
it   is  made by General Mills  .
Although the  क्लासिक   boxed   हैमबर्गर   हेल्पर   उत्पाद  only  सप्लाई  the starch item  और   the  sauce  पैकेट्स  , some  किस्में  of the  उत्पाद  include  मैदान  beef .
These  शामिल  a  frozen  food line  ,   जिससे   सुविधाएँ   कुछ   of  the brand 's classic varieties in  a   पूरा  meal  kit   रूप   ,  with  frozen  ground beef and  frozen  sauce packaged  separately  from  the   नूडल्स   in  the  वही  bag  .
There is  भी  an `` instant '' version of  हैमबर्गर  Helper containing  निर्जलित  meat , noodles and  seasonings  in a small pouch  ,   requiring   तभी  water  to  be  added   .
The  हैमबर्गर  Helper mascot  is   the  ``  helping  Hand  ''  , an anthropomorphic animated ,  चार   fingered   left-hand  glove  ,  which appears  in  the  उत्पाद   's  television  commercials  and  on  the packages .

a  dwarf  ग्रह  is  a   planetary-mass  object that is  neither  a planet nor  a  satellite .
अधिक   explicitly   ,   the  International  खगोलीय  Union  (   iau  )  defines  a  बौना  planet  as  a celestial body in direct orbit  of  the Sun that  is  massive enough for its shape to  be  controlled by gravitation , but that unlike  a  planet  रै   नहीं   साफ  its orbital  प्रदेश   of  other objects .
The  पद  dwarf planet was adopted in 2006 as part of  a  three-way  categorization   of  bodies orbiting the  सूर्य  ,  brought   परिचय   by   an   बढ़ाएँ   in  discoveries  of  trans-Neptunian objects that  rivaled   प्लूटो   in  size ,  और  finally precipitated by  the  discovery of  an   भी  more massive  ऑब्जेक्ट  , Eris .
This classification states  कि   लाशें   विशाल  enough to have  साफ  the neighbourhood of their orbit are defined  as  planets , while those  कि  are  नहीं  massive enough to be rounded  by  their  अपना  gravity are  पारिभाषित   as   छोटी  Solar System  लाशें  .
Dwarf  ग्रह  come  in  between .
The  exclusion  of  बौना  planets from  the  roster of planets by the  iau   रै   महरूम  both praised  और  criticized ; it  थी  said to be the  ``  right decision '' by  माइक   भूरा   ,   जो  discovered and  अन्य  new dwarf planets  ,   लकिन  has  महरूम   अस्वीकृत   by  Alan Stern , who had  coined  the term dwarf planet  in  1990  .
The  iau  currently recognizes five dwarf planets  in   the  Solar System :  ,  Pluto  ,   ,  ,  और  .
However , only two  of   ये   लाशें  ,  ceres  and  प्लूटो  , have been observed in enough  विवरण  to demonstrate that  वे   अनुरूप   the  definition .
eris  has  महरूम  accepted as  a   बौना   ग्रह   क्युकी  it is  अधिक   विशाल  than Pluto .
The IAU subsequently decided that unnamed trans-Neptunian objects with  an   निरपेक्ष  magnitude brighter  than  +1 (  और  hence a  व्यास  of  ≥838  km  assuming  a  ज्यामितीय   ऐल्बीडो   of  ≤1 )  हैं  to  be   नामित   अंतर्गत  the assumption that they are dwarf  ग्रह  .
the  only  दो   ऐसे  objects known  at   the   समय   ,   माकेमाके  and Haumea , went through  इस   नामकरण   कार्यविधि  and were  घोषित  to be dwarf  ग्रह  .
it   is  suspected that another hundred  or  so known  वस्तुएँ   in  the Solar  प्रणाली  are  बौना  planets .
estimates   हैं  that  up   to   200   बौना  planets may  be  found when the entire region  ज्ञात  as  the  Kuiper belt  is  explored  ,   और   कि   the  number may  exceed  10,000 when objects scattered  बाहर   the   kuiper  belt are  माना   .
व्यक्तिगत  astronomers recognize several  of   ये  ,  और   in   अगस्त  2011 Mike  भूरा   प्रकाशित   a  list of  390   प्रत्याशी  objects , ranging  इससे  ``  nearly   निश्चित  ''  to  `` possible '' dwarf planets .  '
Brown identifies  नौ  known objects  –  the  पाँच  accepted  by   the  IAU  प्लस  , ,  ,  and – as `` virtually certain '' , with another  दो   दर्जन  highly likely , and  वहीँ   हैं  probably  a  hundred  or  so such objects in  कुल  .
The classification of bodies  in   अन्य   ग्रहीय  systems  साथ   the  characteristics of dwarf  ग्रह   रै   नहीं   महरूम  addressed  .
A debit  कार्ड  (  भी  known  as  a  बैंको  card or check  कार्ड  ) is  a  plastic  भुगतान   कार्ड   कि   provides  the cardholder electronic  अभिगम  to his  or   उसके   बैंको  account (  s   )  at a  वित्तीय  institution  .
Some cards have a stored  मान   साथ  which  a   भुगतान  is made ,  जबकि   सबसे   रिले  a  संदेश  to the cardholder  's   बैंको  to withdraw  निधि   इससे  a  payee   's   designated  bank account .
The card  ,  where  स्वीकृत  , can be  प्रयुक्त   बजाय  of cash  जब  making purchases  .
In  कुछ  cases  ,  the  प्राथमिक  account  क्रमांक   is   आबंटित  exclusively for use on the  अंतरजाल  and there is  no  physical  कार्ड  .
In many countries ,  the  use  of   डेबिट  cards has  become   so   फैली  that their volume has overtaken or  entirely  replaced  cheques  and  ,  in  कुछ   उदाहरण  ,  नकदी   ट्रांजेक्शन  .
The  विकास   of   डेबिट   ताश   ,  unlike credit cards and  चार्ज  cards , has  generally  been  देश  specific resulting in a  क्रमांक  of different systems around the  संसार  ,  जिससे   यहूद   प्रायः   असंगत  .
Since  the  mid-2000s ,  a  number  of  initiatives  have  allowed debit  ताश  issued in  एक  country to  be  used in  अन्य  countries and  अनुमत  their use  लिये  internet  और  phone purchases  .
Unlike  क्रेडिट  and charge cards , payments using a debit card are immediately  transferred  from the cardholder  's  designated bank account , instead of  उन्हें  paying the  धन  back at  a  later  तिथि  .
Debit cards  प्रायः  also  allow  for instant withdrawal of  नकदी  ,  एक्टिंग  as the ATM card  लिये  withdrawing cash  .
Merchants may  भी  offer cashback facilities  to  customers , where  a  customer  can   withdraw   नकदी  along with  उनके   खरीदें  .
francois   henri  `` Jack  ''   lalanne   (   सितंबर   26  ,  1914  -  जनवरी  23 , 2011  )   थी  an  अमरीकी  fitness  ,  exercise ,  और  nutritional expert  और   प्रेरक  speaker who  is  sometimes called ``  the   गॉडफादर   of   फ़िटनेस   ''  and  the  ``  पहला   फ़िटनेस  superhero . ''
he  described  खुद   as  being a `` sugarholic '' and a ``  जंक  food junkie '' until he was  15   .
He  भी  had behavioral  समस्याएं  , but  ``  turned his life around ''  बाद   सुनना   to   a   पब्लिक  lecture by  पॉल  Bragg  ,   a  well-known nutrition  स्पीकर  .
During his career , he  आए  to believe that the  देश  's  overall  health  depended   on  the health  of   इसके  population  ,   लिखने  that ``  शारीरिक  culture  और   पोषण  — is the  मोक्ष   of  America . ''
दशकों   पहले  health  और   फ़िटनेस  began  होने  promoted by celebrities like  जेन   फोंडा  and  रिचर्ड   सीमन्स   ,   lalanne   थी   already  widely recognized for publicly preaching the  स्वास्थ्य   लाभ  of regular  कसरत   और  a good diet .
he   प्रकाशित  numerous  किताबे   on   फ़िटनेस  and  hosted  a fitness television  दिखाएँ   between  1953  और  1985  .
As  जल्दी  as 1936  ,  at  आयु  21 , he opened one  of  the nation 's first  फ़िटनेस  gyms  in   ओकलैंड  ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , which became a  प्रोटोटाइप  for dozens  of  similar gyms using his  नाम   .
One of his 1950s television exercise programs was  aimed   toward  women , whom he  भी  encouraged to  जुड़ें   उसके  health  क्लब  .
He invented a number of exercise machines  ,   सहित   leg-extension  and  चरखी  devices .
besides   producing   उसके  own series  of  videos , he coached the elderly  और  disabled not to forgo  कसरत  ,  believing  it would  enable   उन्हें  to enhance  उनके   शक्ति  .
LaLanne  भी  gained  मान्यता  for his  कामयाबी   as   a  bodybuilder  ,   as   खूब  as for his prodigious  feats  of strength .
अर्नाल्ड   श्वार्ज़नेगर   एकबार  stated  ,  ``  कि   जोकर   lalanne  's an animal ! ,  ''  after LaLanne  ,  at 54  ,  beat a  21-year-old  Schwarzenegger ``  badly  '' in an  अनौपचारिक  contest .
on   the   अवसर  of LaLanne 's death  ,  Schwarzenegger credited LaLanne for  होने  `` an apostle  लिये   फ़िटनेस  ''  by   प्रेरणादायी  ``  अरबों   सब   over  the world  to  live  healthier  lives , ''  और  , as governor of California  ,  had earlier  लगाई  him on his Governor 's Council  on  Physical  फ़िटनेस   .
Steve  रीव्स  credited LaLanne as his inspiration  to   निर्माण  his muscular  physique  while  keeping   a  slim waist .
He was inducted  to   the  California Hall of  कीर्ति   और  has a star on the  हॉलीवुड  Walk of Fame .
Air  शक्तियां   of   सबसे  of  the   देशों  use system similar to  सेना  .
However , the  raf  and  the  air  शक्तियां   of  many Commonwealth countries ,  or  those formerly under a British influence  ,   उपयोग  a different  नियत  of  बाँधने  loosely  आधारित  on naval  समतुल्यता  ;  लेफ्टिनेंट   ,  Commander  ,  Captain and  commodore  are prefixed  लिये  air  फ़ोर्स   उपयोग   साथ  Flight , Wing , Group  और  Air  ,  respectively (  the  first three being the  इकाई  that they used to command  )  .
पेनेलोपे  Cruz Sánchez  (  ; born April 28 ,  1974   )   is   a  Spanish actress  .
Signed by an  एजेंट   at   आयु  15 , she made her acting  डेब्यू   at  16 on  टेलीविज़न  and her feature film  डेब्यू   the  following year in  jamón  , jamón  (  1992 )  ,   to  critical  acclaim  .
उसके   subsequent  roles  in   the  1990s and  2000s  included  खोलें  Your Eyes  (   1997  )  ,   the  Hi-Lo  देश   (  1999  )  , The Girl of Your Dreams ( 2000 )  और  Woman on Top  (  2000 )  .
Cruz achieved recognition for her  सीसे  roles  in   the  2001 films  वैनिला  Sky  और   उड़ा  .
She has since built  a   कामयाब  career  ,   appearing  in films  इससे  a wide range of genres ,  सहित   the  comedy Waking Up in  रेनो  ( 2002 )  ,  the  थ्रिलर  Gothika  (  2003  )   ,  the Christmas movie  नोएल   (  2004  )   ,  and the action adventure  सहारा  ( 2005 )  .
She  रै  received critical acclaim  लिये  her roles  in  Volver ( 2006 ) and  नौ   (   2009   )   receiving  Golden Globe  और  Academy Award  nominations  for  प्रत्येक  .
वो  won  the  Academy Award for  बेहतरीन  Supporting  अभिनेत्री   in  2008  लिये  Vicky Cristina Barcelona .
She was  the  first Spanish actress  in   इतिहास   to   प्राप्त   an  Academy Award and  the  first  स्पेनी  actress to  प्राप्त  a star at the Hollywood  चलना  of Fame  .
क्रूज़   रै  modeled for companies  ऐसे  as  आम   ,   ralph   लॉरेन  and  l'oréal  .
Penélope and her younger sister  mónica  Cruz  have   designed  items  लिये   आम   .
वो  has donated  दोनो   उसके  time and money  to  charities  .
Cruz has volunteered  in  Uganda and India  ,   जहाँ  she  खर्च  one  सप्ताह   working  for Mother Teresa  ;  she donated  उसके   सैलरी  from  '  to help  निधि   the   लेट   नन   's  mission .
A  मोम   मूर्तिकला  of Cruz  होगा  be placed in  a  premier  स्पॉट  in the Grevin  मोम  Museum in  पेरिस   .
File Explorer , previously  ज्ञात   as  Windows Explorer ,  is  a  संचिका   मैनेजर  application and also a navigation tool that is included with  रिलीज  of the Microsoft  खिड़कियाँ  operating  प्रणाली   इससे   खिड़कियाँ   95   onwards   .
It provides  a  graphical  उपयोक्ता  interface for accessing the file systems .
It is also  the   घटक   of  the operating system that  presents  many user interface  वस्तुएं  on the  मॉनिटर  such as the taskbar and  डेस्कटॉप  .
Controlling the computer is  संभावित   बगैर  Windows Explorer running (  लिये   उदाहरण   ,   the   संचिका  |  चलाएं  command in Task Manager on  nt-derived  versions  of  Windows  होगा   फलन   बगैर  it  ,  as  होगा   कमांड  typed in a  कमांड  prompt  खिड़की  )  .
Located in the C  :  \Windows directory  ,  it is sometimes  referred  to as the Windows  शेल   ,   explorer.exe   ,  or  बस  “Explorer” .
The Care Bears  हैं  characters created by American Greetings in 1981  लिये   उपयोग  on greeting  ताश  .
The original artwork for  the  cards  थी   चित्रित  by  कलाकार   एलेना  Kucharik .
in  1983 , Kenner turned the Care Bears into plush teddy bears  .
the   परवाह  Bears  appeared   in  their own TV specials called The Care Bears in  the  Land Without Feelings ( 1983 )  और   the  Care Bears Battle the Freeze  यंत्र   (  1984 ) .
वे  also had their  अपना   टेलीविज़न   श्रेणी   इससे   1985  to 1988  ,   in  addition  to   तीन  feature  films   :  The Care  bears   फिल्म   (  1985  )  ,  परवाह  Bears  फिल्म  II  :  A New  पीढी   (  1986 ) ,  और   the  Care Bears Adventure  in   वंडरलैंड   (  1987 ) .
Each Care Bear comes  in   a  different  रंग   और  has  a  specialized insignia on  इसके  belly  कि  represents its  ड्यूटी  and personality .
इस  insignia was known as  उनके   ``   tummy  symbol . ''
however  , the movie Care  bears  : Oopsy Does It  !  renamed them  ``  belly  बैज   ''   .
Adding to the  परवाह  Bear family are  the  `` Care  भालू   cousins  '' , which  विशेषता  a lion  ,  rabbit ,  पेंगुइन  , raccoon ,  और  other such  पशु  created  in  the same  स्टाइल  as the teddy  bears   .
In 2002 , the  bears  were reintroduced with new  खिलौने   .
बना   by  Play-Along Toys , the new toys offered features  ऐसे   as  illuminated  bellies  upon  टच   ,  aerobic bears , and  glow-in-the-dark   bears  .
As part  of  this  वापसी  ,  the  Bears have appeared in two  computer-animated  movies :  परवाह   bears   :  Journey  to   joke-a-lot   (  2004 ) and The  परवाह   bears   '   बिग  Wish  फिल्म  ( 2005 ) .
in  2007 ,  the   मताधिकार   मनाये  its 25th anniversary  ;  another relaunch  took   प्लेस  ,  as  well  as   the   रिलीज  of  परवाह   bears  : Oopsy Does It ! .
in   mid-2011   ,  AG  घोषित  a revival TV animated  श्रेणी  titled ``  परवाह  Bears : Welcome to  care-a-lot  ``  .
The premiere of the series utilizes ``  30  years of caring  ''  .
it  premiered on The Hub  on  June  2   ,   2012  .
As of  2013  ,  परवाह   bears  merchandise  is   स्टिल   होने  marketed .
During  2008  and  2009  , Canada 's Cookie Jar  समूह  and France 's MoonScoop Group attempted  to  acquire the  मताधिकार   इससे   agc  , with no apparent  कामयाबी  .
Interstate 70 (  i-70   )   is  an Interstate Highway in the  संयुक्त  States  कि  runs  इससे  Interstate 15  निकट  Cove Fort ,  यूटा   ,   to   a  Park  और  Ride  निकट  Baltimore , Maryland  .
It  थी   the  first  अंतरराज्यीय   राजमार्ग   प्रोजेक्ट  in the United  राज्य   .
I-70  लगभग   traces   the   पाथ   of  U.S.  रूट   40  (  और  also  the   बूढ़ा  National Road ) east  of  the Rocky Mountains  .
West  of  the Rockies ,  the  route of  i-70  was  निकला   इससे  multiple sources  .
I-70  is  the  पांचवां   longest   अंतरराज्यीय  Highway , after I-90 , I-80 ,  i-40  , and I-10  .
the  construction of I-70 in Colorado  और  Utah  is  considered an  अभियान्त्रिकी  marvel  as  the route  गुजरता   through  the  आइज़नहावर   टनल   ,   glenwood  Canyon ,  और   the  San Rafael Swell .
The Eisenhower Tunnel  is  the highest  पाइंट   साथ   the   अंतरराज्यीय   राजमार्ग  system with an elevation of .
the  sections  of  the interstate  in   मिसौरी   और   कान्सास  have  रखी  claim to  be  the  पहला  interstate  in  the  संयुक्त  States .
Though disputed  ,   the   संघीय  Highway Administration  रै  claimed  the  section of  i-70   through  Glenwood Canyon  ,  completed in 1992 , was the  पिछला   टुकड़ा  of the Interstate  राजमार्ग   प्रणाली  , as originally planned , to open  to  traffic .
फ़ोटो  of 1999 total eclipse
as   देखी   इससे   the   धरती   ,  a solar  ग्रहण   occurs  when the Moon  गुजरता   between  the Sun and  धरती  ,  और  the  चंद्रमा   fully  or  partially  blocks ( `` occults  ``  ) the Sun  .
इस  can happen  तभी  at  नई  moon  ,   जब  the  सूर्य   और   the  Moon are  in   संयोजन   as  seen  इससे  Earth in  an  alignment referred  to  as  syzygy   .
In  a  total  ग्रहण   ,  the  डिस्क  of  the   सूर्य   is   fully  obscured by  the  Moon .
In partial and annular eclipses only part of the  सूर्य   is  obscured  .
If the  चंद्रमा   यहूद  in  a  perfectly circular  कक्षा  ,  a  little closer  to   the   धरती  , and  in   the  same orbital  प्लेन  , there would  be  total  सौर  eclipses  प्रत्येक  single month  .
However ,  the  Moon 's orbit is inclined  (  tilted  )   at  more than  5  degrees  to  Earth  's   कक्षा   around  the  सूर्य   (   देखिए  ecliptic )  so   इसके  shadow  at  new moon usually  चूकें   धरती   .
Earth 's orbit  is   पुकारा  the  ecliptic   प्लेन   as   the  Moon  's  orbit  जरूर   क्रॉस  this  प्लेन   in  order for  an   ग्रहण   (   दोनो  solar  as  well as  चंद्र  )  to  occur  .
in  addition  ,  the Moon 's actual orbit is elliptical , often taking it  दूर  enough  दूर   इससे  Earth that its apparent  आकार  is not large enough  to  block the Sun  totally   .
The  कक्षीय   planes   क्रॉस   प्रत्येक  year  at   a  line of  नोड  resulting  in   at  least two  ,  and  up  to five , solar eclipses occurring each year ; no more  than   दो  of which can  be  total eclipses .
however   ,  total  सौर   eclipses   हैं  rare at  कोई  particular  स्थान  because totality  exists  only along  a   सीमित  path on  धरती  's  सतह   traced   by   the  Moon  's  shadow or umbra .
An eclipse  is   a  natural phenomenon  .
Nevertheless  ,  in some ancient and modern cultures , solar eclipses have been  attributed   to  supernatural  कल्याणकारी   or   regarded   as   ख़राब   शकुनों  .
a  total  सौर   ग्रहण  can  be  frightening  to  people  जो   हैं   बेखबर   of   इसके  astronomical  स्पष्टीकरण  ,  as  the  सूर्य  seems  to   गायब  during  the  day and  the  sky  darkens   in  a matter  of   मिनट्स   .
क्युकी  it  is  dangerous to look  सीधे  at the  सूर्य   ,   observers  should use special  नजर   सुरक्षा   or   अप्रत्यक्ष  viewing  तकनीकों  when viewing  a  partial  ग्रहण   ,  or the partial phases of a total  ग्रहण  .
It  is  safe to view the  कुल   phase   of  a total  सौर   ग्रहण   साथ   the  unaided eye and  बगैर  protection , however .
People  referred   to   as   ग्रहण  chasers  or  umbraphiles will  सफर  to remote  स्थितियाँ  to  observe   or  witness  पूर्वानुमानित   सेंट्रल  solar eclipses  .
A political party (  इससे  ,  genitive  partis , ``  भाग  ''  ,  ``  portion  ''  )  is  a   राजनैतिक  organization  कि  typically seeks to  influence  ,  or  entirely control , government  नीति  ,  प्रायः  by nominating candidates with  लकीर   राजनैतिक  views and  trying  to  सीट  them  in   राजनैतिक  office .
Parties participate in  चुनावी  campaigns  और  educational  मंगवाने   or   विरोध  actions  .
पार्टियों   प्रायः   espouse   an   विचारधारा  or vision , expressed in  a  party program , bolstered by a written  मंच  with  विशिष्ट  goals  ,   forming  a coalition  among  disparate  रूचि   .
The mango  is   a   मांसल   स्टोन   फल   belonging  to the  genus   mangifera  , consisting  of   numerous   तीव्र  fruiting trees in  the   flowering  plant family  anacardiaceae   .
The mango is  देशी  to South  एशिया  ,  इससे  where it  रै  been  वितरित   विश्वव्यापी  to become  एक  of  the  most  cultivated   फल  in the tropics .
जबकि  other Mangifera species  (   e.g   .  horse mango ,  M.  foetida )  हैं   भी   grown   on  a more  स्थानीयकृत  basis ,  mangifera   इंडिका  – the 'common mango  '   or  'Indian mango '  –   is   the   तभी  mango tree  commonly   cultivated  in many tropical  और  subtropical  regions  .
it  is the national  फल  of India ,  पाकिस्तानी  and Philippines .
In several cultures , its fruit and leaves are ritually used  as  floral decorations  at   विवाह   ,  public celebrations and  धार्मिक  ceremonies  .
गिल  Arnette Byrd  ,  < ref name  >  http : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/B/ByrdGi00.htm  (   born  February  20  ,  1961   in   सैन  Francisco ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ) is  a   पूर्व   पेशेवर  American  फ़ुटबॉल  player  .
he   थी   a  two  समय  Pro  कटोरी   cornerback  in 1991 and  1992  for  the   सैन   डिएगो  Chargers after graduating from San Jose  राज्य  University .
Byrd  थी  inducted into the Chargers  हॉल  of  कीर्ति   in   1998   .
He was  an   all-city  running  वापस   और  defensive back  at  Lowell  ऊँची   स्कूल  ( San  फ्रांसिस्को  ) ,  helping  to lead  the  Cardinals  to  the city  चैंपियनशिप   in  his senior season of 1978 .
संसार  map  प्रर्दशित  the Tropic  of   कर्कट
The  tropic   of  Cancer , also referred  to  as the Northern tropic  ,  is the  वृत्त  of latitude on the Earth that marks the most northerly position at  जिससे  the Sun  may  appear directly  ओवरहेड  at  इसके   zenith   .
This event occurs once  प्रति  year  ,  at the  समय  of the June solstice  ,  when  the  Northern  गोलार्ध  is tilted toward the Sun to its  अधिकतम   extent  .
It currently ( Year 2013  )   झूठ  at  23°  26′ 15.143′′ north  of  the Equator .
Its  दक्षिणी   गोलार्ध   बंटवारा  , marking  the  most  southerly  position  at   जिससे   the  Sun may appear  सीधे  overhead ,  is   the  Tropic of Capricorn .
These tropics are  दो  of the  पाँच   प्रमुख  degree  उपायों  or  प्रमुख  circles of  अक्षांश   कि   चिह्नित   मानचित्र  of the Earth  ,  besides  the   आर्कटिक   और  Antarctic Circles  और   the  Equator .
the   स्थितियाँ   of  these  वृत्त   of   अक्षांश   (   अन्य   than  the Equator ) are  लिखवाई  by the tilt  of   the  Earth  's   अक्ष  of rotation  सापेक्ष   to  the  प्लेन  of its orbit .
dvd-video  is  a  consumer video format used to store digital video on  dvd  discs , and is currently the dominant consumer video format  in   एशिया  ,  उत्तर   अमेरिका  , Europe , and Australia .
Discs using the DVD-Video  specification   आवश्यकता   a  DVD drive and  an  H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g. , a  dvd  player ,  or  a  कंप्यूटर   dvd  drive with a software DVD player ) .
Commercial DVD movies  हैं  encoded  using  a  संयोजन  of H.262/MPEG-2  भाग   2   संपीडित   वीडियो  and  ऑडियो   of  varying formats  (   प्रायः  multi-channel  स्वरुप   as   वर्णित   नीचे  ) .
typically  ,  the  data rate for DVD movies ranges  इससे  3 Mbit/s  to  9.5 Mbit/s  ,   और  the bit rate  is   प्रायः  adaptive  .
it   थी   पहला   उपलब्धियाँ   लिये  retail around  1997  .
the   dvd-video  specification was created by DVD  फ़ोरम  and can  be   प्राप्त  from DVD Format/Logo Licensing  निगम  for  a   शुल्क  of $ 5,000  .
The  specification   is  not publicly  उपलब्धियाँ   ,  because  प्रत्येक  subscriber  जरूर   चिह्न  a non-disclosure agreement  .
Certain  सूचना   in  the  dvd  Book is  मालिकाना  and  गोपनीय  .
In computing and  specifically  Internet  ,   a   जोंक  is one who benefits  ,  usually deliberately ,  इससे   अन्य   '  information or  प्रयत्न  but  करता   नहीं  offer anything in return , or  makes  only  टोकन   offerings   in   an  attempt to  avoid  being  पुकारा   a   जोंक  .
In economics ,  इस  type of behavior is called ``  फ़्री   सवारी  '' and is associated with  the  free rider problem  .
Depending on context , leeching  करता  not necessarily refer to  illegal  use  of  computer  संसाधन   ,   लकिन   प्रायः  instead  to  greedy use according to etiquette : to wit ,  using  too much  of   कया   is  freely given  बगैर  contributing a reasonable amount back to the  जातियाँ  that provides  it  .
The name derives from the  जोंक  , an animal that  झंझट   रक्त  and then tries to leave unnoticed .
Other terms are  प्रयुक्त  ,  ऐसे  as `` freeloader '' ,  लकिन  leech is  the   सबसे  common  .
The  पूरा  eagle  लोगो   ,   प्रयुक्त  in various versions from 1970  to  1993  .
the   संयुक्त  States Postal Service (  usps  ) , also  ज्ञात  as the Post Office and  u.S.   मेल  , is  an  independent agency  of   the  United States federal  सरकारी  responsible for  providing   डाक   सेवा  in the United  राज्य   .
it  is one of the few government agencies  explicitly   प्राधिकृत   by  the United  राज्य   संविधान  .
The  usps  traces  इसके  roots  to   1775  during the Second  महाद्वीपीय   कॉंग्रेस   ,  where  बेंजामिन  Franklin  थी   नियुक्त  the first postmaster general .
the   cabinet-level  Post Office Department  थी  created in 1792 from  फ्रैंकलिन  's operation  और   रूपांतरित  into its current form in  1971   अंतर्गत   the   डाक   reorganization   अधिनियम   .
the  USPS  employs  over  574,000  workers  और   operates  over 260,000 vehicles .
the  USPS  is   the   ऑपरेटर   of  the  largest  vehicle fleet in  the   संसार  .
the  USPS is  legally  obligated to serve all  अमेरिकी  ,  regardless   of   भूगोल   ,  at uniform  दाम  and  विशेषता   .
The  usps  has  विशेष  access to letter boxes  चिह्नित  `` U.S.  मेल  '' and personal letterboxes  in  the United States  ,  but  स्टिल   competes   विरूद्ध  private  पैकेज  delivery  सेवाएं   ,   ऐसे   as  UPS and FedEx  .
The USPS has not directly  प्राप्त   taxpayer-dollars  since  the   जल्दी  1980s with  the  minor  एक्सेप्शन   of  subsidies for costs  संबद्ध  with the disabled and overseas voters .
Since the  2006  all-time  शिखर  mail volume ,  बाद  which Congress  passed  the Postal  जवाबदेही   और  Enhancement  अधिनियम   ``  ,  (   जिससे   mandated   $   5.5   अरब   प्रति   साल   to   be  paid  into  an  खाता  to  pre-fund  retiree  health-care  , 75 years into  the  future  ,  a  आवश्यकता   अद्वितीय  among organizations  और  businesses in the U.S. )  ,  revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced  घटती  mail volume  ,   prompting   the  postal service to look  to   अन्य  sources of revenue while  कटिंग  costs to  reduce   इसके   बजट  deficit  .
वॉशिंगटन  ,  d.C.  has been  the  capital of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  since 1800  .
आठ   अन्य   शहरों   have  served as the meeting  प्लेस   लिये  Congress and are therefore considered  to  have once been  the   पूंजी  of the United States .
in  addition , each of  the   50  U.S. states and the five  प्रिंसिपल   territories   of  the United States  maintains   इसके   अपना  capital .
राजकुमारी  cut  डायमंड  set in  a  ring
the   राजकुमारी   काटें  is the second most popular cut shape  लिये  diamonds , next to  a  round  शानदार  .
The face-up  आकार  of the princess  काटें   is   वर्गाकार  or rectangular and the  प्रोफ़ाइल  or side-on  आकार   is   समान  to that of an  उलट  pyramid  साथ   चार   beveled  sides  .
The  राजकुमारी  cut  is   a   अपेक्षाकृत   नई  diamond  काटें   ,  having been created  in   the  1960s .
it  has gained in popularity  in  recent years as a  अधिक  distinctive alternative  to  the more popular  गोलाकार  brilliant  काटें  ,  in  which  the   शीर्ष  of  डायमंड  , called the  क्राउन  , is cut with a round face-up shape and the  नीचे  , called the pavilion , is  तराशा   समान  to  a   कोन  .
a  princess  काटें  with the same  चौडाई  as the diameter of a  गोलाकार  brilliant will weigh more  as  it  रै  four corners which would otherwise have  महरूम  cut off  और  rounded to form  a  round  शानदार  .
The princess  काटें  is sometimes  referred  to as  a   वर्गाकार  modified brilliant  .
However  ,   जबकि  displaying the same high degree  of   brilliance  , its faceting style  is   अद्वितीय  and completely different  इससे  that of a round brilliant  .
The Princess  काटें   था  its origins in the  जल्दी   ``   फ्रेंच   ''   काटें  , having a  step-modified   ``  Double-French  ''  or  ``  Cross '' cut crown  और  a  श्रेणी   of  unique , chevron-shaped  facets   in  the  मण्डप  which combine to give  a   पृथक  cross-shaped reflection when the stone  is  viewed directly  through  the table  .
Effectively ,  the  Princess cut combines the high degree  of   लाइट  return of  a  round  शानदार  cut with  a  distinctive  वर्गाकार   or  rectangular  आकार   .
The  वर्गाकार   राजकुमारी   काटें  diamond is usually slightly cheaper  than   गोलाकार  brilliant  काटें  diamonds of the  वही   कैरेट  weight because it retains about 80 % of  the  rough  डायमंड  ,  as  opposed to the round  शानदार  which retains  तभी   परिचय  50 %  of   the  rough  .
The ability  to  retain  अधिक   क्रिस्टल  weight  makes  this shape popular amongst  डायमंड   cutters  .
Accredited Gem  appraisers  ( AGA  )   और  American  gem   समाज  Laboratory ( AGSL )  और   यूरोपीय   gem   laboratories-usa  ( EGL-USA  )  are currently  the  only labs  कि  grade the Princess cut  लिये   काटें  .
There is no universal  परिभाषा  of  कया  measurements  मेक   an   आदर्श  princess cut  डायमंड   और  many diamond manufacturers market  आदर्श   ईंट   साथ  differing facet patterns  और   कोण   as   ``  ideal cut '' .
In contrast to the AGSL , AGA , and EGL-USA the Gemological  संस्थान  of  अमेरिका  ( GIA  )  has  stated  that  वहीँ  is  नहीं  enough  उद्योग   सर्वसम्मति  or  अनुभवजन्य   आंकड़ा  to  बताएँ  cut grading standards for  राजकुमारी   काटें  diamonds and  to  do  so   is  at the  रिस्क  of  उपभोक्ता   जो  may be  धोखे  by diamonds  accompanied   by   निर्गुण  Ideal or Excellent cut  ग्रेड   .
the   नाम   ``  Princess Cut '' was originally used  in  connection  साथ   another   डायमंड  cut , otherwise known  as  the ``  प्रोफ़ाइल  '' cut  ,   designed  by Arpad  nagy   ,   a   लंदन   कटर  , in 1961  .
The same name was later  प्रयुक्त  and made popular by  ygal  Perlman  ,   betzalel   ambar  ,  और  Israel Itzkowitz in Israel  in   1979  .
A similar cut with  तभी   49   facets  , as opposed  to  the  असली  58  facets  of  the  princess cut ,  थी   बाद  branded  the  `` Quadrillion  ''  and initially  वितरित  by Ambar Diamonds in Los Angeles .
Three years  of   ऑप्टिकल  research  yielded   a  square  स्टोन   साथ   faceting   समान   to  that of a round brilliant  काटें   डायमंड  .
a   तुलना
The number of chevrons can  affect   the   overall   आउटलुक  of  a  princess  काटें  diamond .
इस  can  प्रायः  be  संकल्पित  by the wire diagram that  is   plotted   in  diamond  ग्रेडिंग   रिपोर्ट्स  .
By  adding   अधिक  chevrons  on  the pavilion side  of  the diamond ,  the  individual facets  of  the  डायमंड  will  अभी  be broken  bas   into  smaller  facets   .
as  a result , it can  दे   a   राजकुमारी   काटें   डायमंड  a `` crushed ice  ''   dekh  .
वाइस  versa , when a princess cut  डायमंड  has lesser chevrons , it tends to  दे   the  diamond a chunky outlook due  to   broader   facets   .
The  घरेलू  dog  (   canis   lupus   familiaris   )  is  a  subspecies  of   the  gray  भेड़िया  (  canis   lupus  ) ,  a   सदस्य  of  the  Canidae family  of   the   mammalian   अनुक्रम  Carnivora .
the   पद  `` domestic dog '' is  generally  used for both domesticated  और  feral varieties  .
the   श्वान  has  महरूम  the  पहला   एनिमल   to   be   domesticated  and has been the most widely  रखा  working  ,  hunting  ,  and pet animal in human history .
The  शब्द  `` dog  ''  may  भी  mean the male of a  canine  species , as  opposed   to  the  शब्द  ``  कुतिया  ''  लिये  the female  of   the  species .
mtdna  evidence shows an evolutionary  विभाजित  between  the  modern  श्वान  's lineage and the modern  भेड़िया   's  lineage around  100,000  years  पहले  but , , the oldest  चट्टान  specimens  genetically  linked to the modern dog 's lineage  तिथि  to approximately  33,000-36,000   सालो  ago  .
Dogs ' value to early  इंसान  hunter-gatherers led to  उन्हें  quickly  बनने  ubiquitous  आरपार   संसार  cultures  .
Dogs perform  अनेक   भूमिकाएँ  for  लोगों  ,  ऐसे   as   शिकार  , herding , pulling loads  ,   सुरक्षा   ,  assisting  पुलिस  and  सैन्य   ,  companionship , and ,  अधिक  recently ,  aiding  handicapped  individuals  .
This  प्रभाव   on   इंसान   समाज  has given them  the   उपनाम   ``  Man  's  Best  dost  ''  in  the Western  संसार  .
in  some cultures  ,   कुत्तो   हैं  also a source  of  meat .
In  2001   ,  there  यहूद  estimated to be  400   लाख  dogs  in  the  संसार   .
सबसे  breeds  of  dogs are at  सबसे  a few  सौ   सालो   बूढ़ा  ,  having   महरूम   artificially  selected for  particular  morphologies and behaviors  by  people for  विशिष्ट   कार्यात्मक  roles  .
Through this selective breeding  ,  the  श्वान  has  विकसित  into hundreds  of  varied breeds , and  shows   अधिक   behavioral   और   morphological   विभिन्नता  than  कोई  other land mammal .
लिये  example ,  ऊँचाई  measured to  the   withers  ranges  इससे  in  the  Chihuahua to about  in   the  Irish Wolfhound  ;  color  varies  from  श्वेत  through grays ( usually  पुकारा   ``  blue  ''   )   to   ब्लैक  , and  भूरा   इससे   लाइट  (  तन  ) to dark  (   ``  red ''  or  ``  चॉकलेट   ''   )  in a wide variation  of   पैटर्न   ;   coats  can be short  or   long  , coarse-haired to wool-like ,  सीधा   ,  curly ,  or   चिकना   .
It is common  लिये  most  breeds   to   शेड  this coat .
आरेख  of  a   हस्तांतरण   इलेक्ट्रॉन  microscope
A 1973  siemens   इलेक्ट्रॉन  microscope ,  musée  des  कला   et  Métiers , Paris
an   इलेक्ट्रॉन  microscope ( EM )  is   a   प्रकार  of microscope that  उपयोग  an electron  बीम   to   illuminate  a specimen  और   उपज   a  magnified image  .
An EM  रै   वृहद   resolving  power  than  a light  सूक्ष्मदर्शी  and can reveal the structure  of  smaller  वस्तुएँ   क्युकी  electrons have wavelengths about 100,000  टाइम्स  shorter than visible  लाइट  photons  .
वे   can   achieve  better than  50   pm  resolution  और  magnifications of up  to  about 10,000,000x  whereas   ordinary   ,  non-confocal  लाइट  microscopes  हैं  limited by  विवर्तन  to about  200   nm  resolution and useful magnifications below 2000x .
The  इलेक्ट्रॉन  microscope  उपयोग   electrostatic   और  electromagnetic lenses to control  the  electron beam and focus  it  to  रूप  an image .
ये   इलेक्ट्रॉन  optical  lenses  are analogous to the  कांच   lenses   of   a  light  ऑप्टिकल  microscope  .
Electron microscopes are  प्रयुक्त   to   investigate  the  ultrastructure  of  a   चौड़ी  range of biological and inorganic  नमूनों  including microorganisms ,  कोशिकाएं  , large  अणुओं  , biopsy samples ,  धातुओं  , and  crystals  .
Industrially  ,   the   इलेक्ट्रॉन  microscope is often  प्रयुक्त   लिये  quality  कंट्रोल   और   विफलता   विश्लेषण   .
Modern  इलेक्ट्रॉन  microscopes  उपज  electron micrographs , using  specialized   डिजिटल  cameras or frame  grabbers   to   कैप्चर   the  image .
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen  is   a  chain of fried chicken  तेज़  food restaurants founded in 1972  in  New  ऑरलियन्स   ,  Louisiana .
Often referred  to  as  popeyes   और   sometimes   as  Popeyes Chicken  &  Biscuits or  popeyes  Chicken & Seafood ,  it   थी  acquired by Sandy  स्रोतों  ,  जॉर्जिया   -आधारd  AFC Enterprises , originally America  's  Favorite Chicken  कम्पनी   ,  in 1993 .
According to  a  company press release  दिनाँक  June 29 , 2007  ,  Popeyes  is  the  second-largest  `` quick-service chicken restaurant group , measured by number  of   इकाई  '' ,  साथ   अधिक   than   1,800  restaurants  in  more  than  40 states  और  the  ज़िला  of Columbia ,  और   over   22  countries  विश्वव्यापी   सहित   तुर्कों  , Northern  साइप्रस  ,  बहरीन   ,  China , Hong  काँग  , Iraq ,  इंडोनेशिया  , Jordan ,  कुवैत   ,   संयुक्त  Arab  अमीरात   ,   जापानी   ,   मलेशिया   ,   सऊदी   अरब  , South  कोरियाई  ,  सिंगापुर  , Canada , Jamaica , Guyana , Suriname  ,  Mexico  ,   त्रिनिदाद  , Puerto  रीको  , Honduras ,  वियतनाम  , Panama  ,  Peru , and Costa  रिका  .
परिचय  thirty locations are company-owned  ,   the   बाकी   franchised  .
the   लेग  press is a weight  प्रशिक्षण  exercise  in  which the  व्यक्तिगत  pushes a weight  or   प्रतिरोध  away from them using  उनके   टाँगे  .
The term  लेग  press also  refers   to  the  apparatus   प्रयुक्त   to   perform   इस  exercise .
The  लेग   दबायें  can be used  to  evaluate  an  athlete 's overall lower body  शक्ति  ( from knee joint to hip ) .
Using  the  diagonal sled-type leg press machine  .
वहीँ  are  दो  main  प्रकार   of  leg  press:
the  diagonal or vertical 'sled  '   प्रकार  leg press .
Weight disks ( plates )  हैं   संलग्न   सीधे  to  the  sled ,  जिससे  is  आरोहित  on rails .
The  उपयोक्ता  sits  नीचे  the sled and pushes it  upward  with  उनके   फीट  .
ये   मशीने  normally include  समायोज्य   सुरक्षा   कोष्ठक  that  prevent  the user from being  फंस   अंतर्गत  the weight .
The 'cable '  प्रकार  leg press  ,   or   'seated   लेग   दबायें  '  ,  commonly  मिला  on multigyms  .
the   उपयोक्ता   sits  upright  और  pushes  आगे  with  उनके  feet  onto   a  plate  कि   is  attached to the weight stack by means of  a  long steel  केबल  .
Wendy Williams  शिकारी   (  born  वेन्डी   जोन  Williams ; July 18 , 1964  )   is  an American media  व्यक्तित्व   ,   अभिनेत्री   और   लेखक   .
वो  hosts a syndicated  टेलीविज़न  talk  दिखाएँ   ,  The  वेन्डी  Williams  दिखाएँ  .
Prior to television , Williams was  a  `` shock jockette  ``   on  several radio shows .
Williams  रै   gained   सुर्खी   लिये  her on-air spats with celebrities .
वो  was  the  subject of  the   2006  VH1 reality TV  श्रेणी   पुकारा  The Wendy Williams  अनुभव   जिससे   ब्रॉडकास्ट  events surrounding  उसके   रेडियो  show  .
She has written  an  autobiography  और  several  अन्य  books ,  और   रै  created  a  product line called Adorn by Wendy Williams .
Patrick Henry `` Treason ''  वाक  before  the  House of  burgesses  in  an  1851  पेंटिंग  by Peter F. Rothermel
``  दे   me   स्वतंत्रता  , or give  me   मौत  ! '' is a quotation attributed  to  Patrick  हेनरी   इससे  a speech he  बना  to the  वर्जिनिया  Convention .
on   कि  day , at  st.   जॉन  's Church in  रिचमंड   ,   वर्जिनिया  , and  is   credited  with having swung  the   संतुलन   in  convincing the Virginia House  of  Burgesses  to  pass a  रेज़ोल्यूशन   delivering  the  वर्जिनिया  troops  to  the  क्रांतिकारी  War  .
Among  the  delegates  to   the  convention were future  us   राष्ट्रपतियों  Thomas  जेफरसन  and  जार्ज  Washington .
Newfoundland  और  Labrador ( , locally ) is the easternmost province of  कनाडा   .
Situated  in   the   देश  's  अटलांटिक  region , it incorporates the island  of  Newfoundland and mainland Labrador  to  the northwest , with  a  combined area  of  .
in  2011  ,  the province 's population was 514,536  .
लगभग   92  percent of the province  's  population  जीवनदान   on   the  Island of  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  ( including its  संबद्ध  smaller islands ) ,  of  which more than  हाफ  live on the  avalon  Peninsula .
the  province is Canada 's  सबसे  linguistically homogenous  ,  with 97.6 % of residents  रिपोर्टिंग  English (  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड   अंग्रेज़ी  )  as   उनके   माँ  tongue in the 2006  जनसांख्यिकी  ; .
Historically  ,   न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड   थी   भी  home to unique  किस्में   of   फ्रेंच  ,  और   आयरिश   ,   as  well  as   the  now-extinct Beothuk  भाषा  .
In Labrador , local  dialects  of Innu-aimun and Inuktitut are also spoken  .
न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड   और  Labrador 's capital and largest  नगर   ,   st.  John 's , is Canada 's  20th-largest   जनसांख्यिकी  Metropolitan Area  ,  and is home to almost  40   प्रतिशत  of the  प्रांत  's population .
st.   जॉन   's  is the  सीट  of  सरकारी  , home  to  the  हाउस   of   सभा  of  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  and Labrador  और   the  highest court in the jurisdiction ,  the  Newfoundland and Labrador Court  of  Appeal  .
A former colony  और   डोमिनियन  of  the  United Kingdom , Newfoundland  और   labrador  became the  दसवाँ   प्रांत  to  डालें   the  Canadian Confederation on March 31  ,  1949  ,  as  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड   .
on  December  6  , 2001  ,   an   amendment  was made  to   the  Constitution of  कनाडा  to change  the  province 's official  नाम  to  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड   और  Labrador  .
in  day-to-day conversation , however ,  canadians  generally still refer to  the  province itself  as  Newfoundland  और  to the  प्रदेश  on  the  Canadian mainland as  labrador  .
Theodore  ``  T.R .  ''
Roosevelt ,  jr.  ( ; October 27 , 1858—January  6   ,   1919   )  was the 26th  अध्यक्ष   of  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   (  1901–1909  )   .
He is noted for  उसके  exuberant  व्यक्तित्व  , range  of  interests  और   उपलब्धियाँ   ,   और  his  नेतृत्व   of   the   प्रगतिशील  Movement  ,  as well  as   उसके  `` cowboy ``  persona   और  robust  मर्दानगी  .
he  was  a   नेता   of  the  रिपब्लिकन  Party and founder  of  the first incarnation of the short-lived Progressive (  ``   सांड  Moose '' ) Party of  1912  .
Before becoming President , he  आयोजित  offices  at   the   नगर  ,  राज्य   ,   और   संघीय  levels .
रूज़वेल्ट  's  उपलब्धियाँ   as  a naturalist  ,  explorer  ,  hunter ,  लेखक  , and soldier  हैं  as  much  a part of his  कीर्ति   as   कोई   दफ्तर  he held  as   a  politician .
रूज़वेल्ट  was  42  years  बूढ़ा   जब  sworn in as  अध्यक्ष  of the  संयुक्त  States in 1901  ,   बनाना   उसे  the youngest president ever  ;   he   ताल  out  the   youngest  elected  अध्यक्ष  ,  जॉन  F.  कैनेडी  ,  by  only one  साल   .
Roosevelt was also  the  first  of  only  तीन  sitting presidents  to  have won the  नोबेल  Peace Prize  .
The Teddy bear is named after  उसे  , despite his contempt  लिये  being called  ``  Teddy '' .
Born into  a  wealthy  परिवार  in  नई   यॉर्क   नगर  , Roosevelt  थी   a  sickly child  जो  suffered from  दमा   और   ठहरे   at   घर  studying  प्राकृतिक   इतिहास   .
to  overcome  उसके  physical  कमज़ोरी   ,  he  embraced   a  strenuous  जीवन   .
home-schooled   ,  he became an eager  छात्र   of  nature  .
He  attended   हार्वर्ड  University  ,  where  he  studied  जीवविज्ञान  , boxed and  विकसित  an interest in  नवल   अफेयर्स   .
In 1881 ,  एक  year out of Harvard ,  he  was elected  to  the  नई  York  राज्य   सभा  ,  जहाँ  he  became   a   नेता   of   the  reform faction  of  his Republican  पार्टी   (  the ``  gop   ''  )  .
उसके  The Naval  युद्ध  of 1812 ( 1882 ) established  उसके  professional  प्रतिष्ठा   as   a   गंभीर  historian  ;  he wrote numerous  किताबे   on  hunting  ,  the outdoors ,  और  current  राजनैतिक   मुद्दे  , as well as  frontier  history .
in  1884  ,   उसके   पहला   बीवी   और  his  माँ   died  on  the  same day .
He temporarily  बाएँ  politics  और  went to  the   frontier  ,  बनने  a rancher in the `` Badlands ''  in  the Dakotas  .
Returning to New York  नगर  , he ran for mayor in  1886  ,  finishing  third with 60,000 votes .
He later gained  कीर्ति  by  लेने  vigorous  चार्ज  of the  नगर   पुलिस   .
At the national level ,  he   थी   a  leader  in  civil  सेवा   सुधार  .
The Spanish–American War broke out in 1898 while Roosevelt was  ,   effectively  ,  कार्यशील   the   विभाग   of   the   नेवी  .
he  promptly  resigned   और  formed the  अशिष्ट  Riders – a  स्वयंसेवी  cavalry  रेजीमेंट  that fought in  क्यूबा   .
the  war  नायिका   थी   निर्वाचित  governor in 1898 and in 1900 was  मनोनीत  for  वाइस   अध्यक्ष  .
He  सफलतापूर्वक  energized the  gop  base as a  अत्यधिक  visible campaigner  to  reelect President  विलियम   mckinley  on  a  platform of  ऊँची  tariffs ,  the  gold standard , imperialism  ,  prosperity at home  और  victory  विदेश  .
In 1901 , President William McKinley was  assassinated  and Roosevelt became President .
He attempted  to   मूव  the Republican Party ( GOP )  toward   प्रगतिवाद  , including trust  busting  and increased regulation of businesses  .
Roosevelt  became   the   पहला  person elected  to  a  पद  in  उसके  own right  in   1904  after  having  ascended to  the  Presidency ( from the  vice-presidency  ) upon  the  death  of   उसके   पूर्ववर्ती  ,  जीतना  the  largest   प्रतिशत   of  the  लोकप्रिय  vote  चूंकि   the  uncontested election of 1820  .
रूज़वेल्ट  coined  the  phrase  ``  Square  सौदे   ``  to describe  उसके  domestic  कार्यसूची  , emphasizing that  the  average citizen would  मिलेंगी  a fair share under  उसके   नीतियों   .
As  an  outdoorsman and  naturalist  , he promoted the  संरक्षण   गति   .
On  the   संसार  stage , Roosevelt  's  policies were characterized  by  his  स्लोगन  ,  ``  Speak  softly  and  carry  a big  स्टिक  `` .
a  cousin is  a   सापेक्ष   साथ  whom a  व्यक्ति  shares one or  अधिक  common  पूर्वज   (  s )  (  other  than   a  parent  ,  child/descendant  ,   सहोदर  ,  child/descendant  of  a   सहोदर  , or  सहोदर  of a parent/ancestor  )  .
However in common  parlance  ,  ``   cousin  ''  सामान्यतः   specifically   अर्थात्  `` first cousin ''  .
Systems of `` degrees '' and ``  removals  '' are used  in   the   english-speaking   संसार   to  describe the exact  संबंध  between two cousins (  in   the  broad  भाव  ) and the  पूर्वज   वे   have   in  common .
विभिन्न  governmental  entities   have  established systems  लिये  legal  उपयोग  that can  अधिक   precisely  specify kinships with  आम  ancestors existing  कोई  number  of  generations in  the  past  ,  though common usage  प्रायः   eliminates  the degrees and  removals   और  refers to people  साथ   आम  ancestry as  बस   ``  distant cousins '' or  ``  relatives '' .
वेबस्टर  is an American situation comedy  कि   aired  on  एबीसी   इससे   सितंबर   16   ,   1983   जबतक   may   8  ,  1987   ,  and in first-run  अनुप्रयोग  from  सितंबर   21   ,   1987  until  कूच   10  , 1989  .
the   श्रेणी  was created by  stu  Silver .
The  दिखाएँ  stars Emmanuel Lewis in  the  title  भूमिका  as  a  young  लड़के  who , after losing  उसके  parents ,  is  adopted by his NFL  -pro  godfather ,  portrayed   by   एलेक्स  Karras  ,  and  उसके   नई  socialite  बीवी  ,  निभाई  by Susan Clark .
The  फ़ोकस  was largely on how this impulsively married couple  था  to adjust  to  their new lives  और  sudden parenthood , but  it  was the  अनुकूल   वेबस्टर  himself who  drove   much   of   the   प्लाट   .
The  श्रेणी  was produced  by  Georgian  खाड़ी  Ltd.  ,   emmanuel   लुईस  Entertainment  उद्यमों   ,  Inc. ( 1986-1989  )  and  सर्वोपरि  Television  .
जैसे  NBC 's  पहले   hit   diff'rent  Strokes , Webster featured a  यंग   african-american   लड़के   अपनाया   by   a   श्वेत  family .
तीन  types of  कोशिका  division
Cell division  is  the  प्रक्रम  by which a  जनक   कोशिका  divides into two or more daughter cells .
Cell  प्रभाग  usually  occurs  as part of  a   larger   कोशिका  cycle  .
In  eukaryotes  ,  वहीँ  are  दो  distinct type  of  cell  प्रभाग  : a vegetative division , whereby  प्रत्येक   बेटी   कोशिका   is  genetically identical  to  the  जनक  cell (  समसूत्रण   )  ,  और  a  reductive   कोशिका  division , whereby  the  number of chromosomes in the daughter cells  is  reduced by half  ,   to   उपज  haploid  गैमीट  (  meiosis  ) .
दोनो   of  these  कोशिका  division cycles  हैं  required in sexually  reproducing  organisms at some  पाइंट  in their life cycle ,  और  both are  believed   to  be present  in   the   पिछला  eukaryotic common ancestor  prokaryotes  also undergo a vegetative cell division known as binary fission ,  जहाँ   उनके  genetic material is  segregated   बराबर  into  दो  daughter cells .
All cell  विभाजन  ,  regardless   of  organism  ,   हैं  preceded by  a   सिंगल  round of  डीएनए  replication .
For simple unicellular  जीवों  such as  the  amoeba , one  कोशिका   प्रभाग  is  समतुल्य  to reproduction  –  an  संपूर्ण   नई  organism is created .
On a larger  स्केल  , mitotic  कोशिका  division  can   बनाएँ   progeny  from multicellular organisms  ,  such  as   पौधे   कि  grow  इससे   cuttings  .
कोशिका   प्रभाग  also  enables  sexually reproducing organisms to  develop  from the one-celled zygote  ,  which itself was produced by  कोशिका   प्रभाग  from gametes  .
And after  विकास  ,  कोशिका  division allows for continual construction  और  repair of  the   सजीव  .
a  human  होने   's   देह   अनुभवों   परिचय  10,000 trillion  कोशिका  divisions in  a   आजीवन   .
कोशिका  division has been modeled  by   परिमित  subdivision rules  .
the  primary  चिंता  of cell  प्रभाग  is the  मेंटेनेंस  of the original  कोशिका   's  genome .
पहले   प्रभाग  can  occur  ,  the  genomic  सूचना  that is stored in  गुणसूत्रों  must be  replicated  , and  the   duplicated  genome  जरूर   be  separated cleanly  between  cells  .
A great deal  of   सेल्यूलर   अवसंरचना   is  involved in  keeping   genomic  information consistent between `` generations  ''   .
Mountain ranges of Massachusetts  ,  United  राज्य   .
Howard Jones ( born John  हावर्ड  Jones  ,  23 February 1955 ,  southampton   ,   हैम्पशायर   ,   इंग्लैण्ड  ) is a British  संगीतकार  , singer and songwriter .
According to  the   गिनीज  Book  of   अंग्रेजों  Hit  singles  & Albums , `` Jones  is  an  संपन्नता   singer-songwriter   जो   थी  a  नियमित   चार्ट   आगंतुक  in the mid-1980s with his brand of synthpop  .
जोन्स  ,  जो   थी  equally  लोकप्रिय  in the  u.S.  ,  appeared  at Live Aid ``  .
Allmusic  पत्रकार   ,  Stephen  थामस  Erlewine adds , `` Jones was one of  the   धमक  figures  of  mid-1980s synthpop .
उसके  music merged  the   प्रौद्योगिकी   intensive  sound  of  New  वेव  with  the  cheery optimism of hippies  और  late 1960s  पॉप   .
Jones racked up a string of hits in the mid and late 1980s , before  he   retreated  into being a  cult  figure in  the  1990s  ''   .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Isle  of  Man  tt   (  Tourist  ट्रॉफी  )  रेस  is  a   मोटरसाइकिल   रेसिंग   इवेंट  held on the Isle  of  Man  और  was for  अनेक  years  the  most  prestigious   मोटरसाइकिल  race in the world .
The event was part  of  the  fim  Motorcycle Grand  प्रिक्स  World Championship during the  काल   1949–1976   पहले  being  transferred   to  the  संयुक्त   किंगडम  after  सुरक्षा   चिंताएं  and run  by   the   fim   as  the British Grand Prix  लिये   the   1977  season .
The  आइल   of   man   tt  Races  became   भाग  of the TT  सूत्र  1 Championship from  1977   to  1990 to preserve the event 's  रेसिंग  status  .
From  1989   the  racing has been  विकसित  by the Isle of Man Department of Tourism as the Isle  of  Man  tt  Festival .
The  रेस   is   चलाएं  in a time-trial format  on   पब्लिक  roads closed  लिये   रेसिंग  by the  प्रावधानों   of  an Act of  tynwald   (  the parliament of the Isle of Man ) .
the   पहला  race was held  on  Tuesday 28  may   1907   और  was called the International Auto-Cycle Tourist Trophy  .
The event was  संगठित  by the Auto-Cycle Club over 10  गोद   of   the  St John 's  छोटी  Course of 15  मील   1,470   गज   लिये   road-legal  touring motorcycles  साथ  exhaust silencers  ,   saddles   ,   pedals  and mud-guards .
The  विजेता  of the  single-cylinder  class ,  और  overall winner of  the   पहला   इवेंट  in  1907   ,  was Charlie  collier  riding  a  Matchless motorcycle in a  समय   of  4  घंटों  , 8 minutes and 8 seconds at an average  रेस  speed of  38.21  mph .
the  winner of  the   twin-cylinder   क्लास  was  rem   fowler  riding  a  Peugeot  एंजिन   नॉर्टन  in  a   समय   of  4 hours 21  मिनट्स  and 52 seconds at an  औसत   रेस   गति   of   36.21  mph .
the  trophy presented to Charlie Collier as the  विजेता  of  the  1907 Isle of Man TT  रेस   ,  was donated by the Marquis de Mouzilly  st.   मंगल  .
it   प्रदर्शित  a stylised  संस्करण  of Olympic God  hermes   by  Giovanni  da  Bologna  as  a silver figurine astride a winged  व्हील   .
The trophy  थी   समान  in design to the 18  कैरेट  gold Montague Trophy presented to John  नेपियर  ( Arrol-Johnston ) as  the   inaugural  winner  of  the Isle of  man  Tourist Trophy car race in 1905  अभी   ज्ञात   as  the RAC Tourist Trophy  .
the  Marquis de Mouzilly St.  मंगल   ट्रॉफी  is  अभी   प्रस्तुत  annually to  the   विजेता  of the Isle of Man  वरिष्ठ  TT Motor-Cycle Race  .
the  2007 Isle of Man  tt  was the Centenary event which ran between 26  may   और   8   जून  2007  और  featured a special  re-enactment   of  the  1907   आइल  of  man   tt   रेस  held on  the   गाँव   ग्रीन  next  to  Tynwald Hill in  st   जॉन  's  on  Monday 28  may   2007  .
The vintage parade  of  100 classic motorcycles  लिये  the Centenary  re-enactment  on the original  st  John  's  Short  कोर्स   थी  flagged away by former  संसार  Motor-Cycle Champion Geoff  ड्यूक  .
The first of the participants  to  be flagged away  थी  the recently  लौटी  twin-cylinder Peugeot-Norton  ridden  by Rem  fowler  during  the  first  आइल  of Man  tt  Race in 1907 .
Also participating in the 2007 Re-enactment  थी  TT  रेस   प्रतिस्पर्धी  Guy  मार्टिन  riding a 1938  triumph  Tiger 100  500   cc   और  other former  tt   प्रतिस्पर्धी  including Alan Cathcart  ,  Sammy Miller  ,   उपनाम  Jefferies and Mick Grant also completed the Re-enactment lap .
