Unemployment ( or joblessness ) occurs  जब   लोगों  are  बगैर  work  और  actively  seeking   कार्य  .
the   बेरोजगारी  rate  is   a   माप  of the  व्यापकता  of  बेरोजगारी   और  it is calculated as a percentage by  dividing  the  क्रमांक  of  बेरोजगार  individuals by all individuals  फिलहाल  in  the   मजदूर   फ़ोर्स  .
During periods of recession  ,   an  economy  प्रायः  experiences  a   अपेक्षाकृत   ऊँची   बेरोजगारी  rate .
According  to  International Labour  संगठन  report , more  than  197 million people globally are out of  कार्य  or  6  %  of  the  संसार  's  workforce  were without a job  in  2012 .
There remains  considerable  theoretical debate regarding the causes , consequences and solutions  लिये   बेरोजगारी  .
Classical  अर्थशास्त्र   ,   नई  classical  अर्थशास्त्र   ,  and the Austrian School of  अर्थशास्त्र   argue  that  मार्केट  mechanisms  हैं  reliable  अर्थात्  of  resolving   बेरोजगारी   .
ये  theories argue against  interventions   imposed   on  the  मजदूर  market from the outside  ,   ऐसे   as  unionization ,  न्यूनतम  wage laws  ,  taxes ,  और   अन्य  regulations that they  अर्जी  discourage  the  hiring of  मजदूर   .
Keynesian  अर्थशास्त्र  emphasizes the cyclical nature of unemployment and recommends  सरकारी  interventions in the economy that  it  claims will  reduce  unemployment during recessions .
This theory  focuses  on recurrent shocks that suddenly reduce  कुल  demand for goods and services  और  thus  reduce   माँग   लिये  workers .
Keynesian models recommend government interventions designed to  बढ़ाएँ   माँग  for workers  ;  these can include financial stimuli  ,   सरेआम   वित्तपोषित  job creation , and expansionist monetary policies .
In  जोड   to  these comprehensive theories of  बेरोजगारी   ,  there  हैं  a  few  categorizations of unemployment that  हैं  used to  अधिक  precisely  मॉडल   the   प्रभाव  of unemployment within the  आर्थिक  system  .
the   प्रमुख   प्रकार   of   बेरोजगारी  include  संरचनात्मक   बेरोजगारी  which focuses  on  structural problems in the  अर्थव्यवस्था   और  inefficiencies  अंतर्निहित   in  labour  बाज़ार  , including a mismatch between the supply  और  demand of laborers with  जरुरी  skill  सेट  .
Structural  वितर्क  emphasize causes  और  solutions  सम्बन्धित  to disruptive technologies and globalization  .
चर्चाएँ   of   frictional  unemployment focus on voluntary decisions to  कार्य   आधारित  on  प्रत्येक  individuals ' valuation of  उनके   अपना  work and how that  compares   to  current  मजदूरी  rates  प्लस  the  समय  and effort  जरूरी   to  find  a  job .
Causes and solutions for frictional unemployment often  पता   जॉब  entry threshold  और  wage rates  .
behavioral   अर्थशास्त्रियों   हाइलाइट   व्यक्तिगत  biases in decision making ,  और  often involve  समस्याएं  and solutions concerning sticky wages  और  efficiency wages .
Collectivism is  कोई  philosophic , political ,  धार्मिक  , economic  ,  or  सोशल  outlook  कि   emphasizes  the interdependence of every  इंसान  being in a society or civilization .
Collectivism is a basic cultural element  कि  exists as  the   रिवर्स   of   व्यक्तिगत   in  human  प्रकृति  (  in  the same way high context culture exists as the  रिवर्स  of  कम  context  संस्कृति   )   .
Collectivist orientations  तनाव  the  महत्व   of  cohesion within  सोशल  groups (  ऐसे  as  an  `` in-group  ''  , in what  विशिष्ट  context it is  पारिभाषित  )  और   in  some cases  ,  the priority of  समूह   लक्ष्य  over individual goals .
collectivists  often  फ़ोकस  on community , society , nation or country .
it   रै   महरूम  used  as   an  element in  अनेक   अलग  and  विविध  types  of  government  और   राजनैतिक   ,   आर्थिक  and educational philosophies throughout history and  सबसे   इंसान   समाजों  in practice contain elements  of  both individualism and collectivism  .
कुछ   उदाहरण   of   collectivist  cultures include India  और  Japan  .
collectivism   can  be divided into horizontal collectivism  और  vertical collectivism .
आड़ा   collectivism   तनावों  collective decision-making among  बराबर   individuals  , and  is  thus  प्रायः  based  on  decentralization and egalitarianism .
Vertical  collectivism  is based  on  hierarchical  structures   of   शक्ति  and on moral and  सांस्कृतिक  conformity , and is therefore  आधारित  on  centralization  and  पदानुक्रम   .
A  सहकारी   एंटरप्राइज़  would  be   an  example of horizontal collectivism  ,  whereas  a   सैन्य  hierarchy would  be   an   उदाहरण  of  लंबवत  collectivism .
Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis  (   adem   )   is  an  प्रतिरक्षा   mediated  disease of the brain .
It usually  occurs   following  a  वाइरल   संक्रमण   लकिन   may  appear following  टीकाकरण  , bacterial or  parasitic  infection  ,  or  भी  appear spontaneously .
As it involves autoimmune demyelination , it is  समान  to multiple sclerosis ,  और  is  माना  part of the Multiple sclerosis  borderline  diseases .
the  incidence rate is about 8 per  1,000,000  people  प्रति   साल   .
हालांकि  it occurs  in  all ages  ,  most  reported   मामले  are in children  और   adolescents  ,  साथ  the average age around 5 to  8  years  बूढ़ा  .
the  mortality rate may be as  ऊँची  as  5   %  ,  पूरा   रिकवरी   is   देखी   in  50  to  75 % of  मामले   ,  while up  to   70  to 90 % recover  साथ   कुछ  minor  अवशेष  disability .
The  औसत  time to  रिकवर  is one  to  six months  .
ADEM produces  अनेक  inflammatory  lesions  in  the  brain and  स्पाइनल  cord , particularly  in  the  श्वेत   पदार्थ   .
प्रायः   ये   हैं  found  in  the subcortical  और   सेंट्रल  white matter and  cortical  gray-white junction of both  दिमागी   बांटती   ,  cerebellum  ,  brainstem  ,  and spinal cord  ,  but periventricular white matter and  धूसर   पदार्थ  of  the   cortex  , thalami  और  basal ganglia  may   भी  be  शामिल   .
When the  रोगी  suffers more than  एक  demyelinating episode  ,   it  is called recurrent  disseminated  encephalomyelitis  or   multiphasic   disseminated   encephalomyelitis  (  mdem   )  .
The  पेट  is  a   muscular  , hollow  ,  dilated  भाग   of  the  पाचन   प्रणाली  which  कृत्यों   as  an important  अंग  of  the  digestive tract in some  पशु  , including vertebrates  ,  echinoderms  ,   कीट  ( mid-gut  )  ,  और   molluscs  .
It is involved  in   the   दूसरी   phase  of  पाचन   ,  following mastication (  चबाने   )  .
The  पेट   is  located between the  ग्रासनाल  and the small  आंत   .
it  secretes  protein-digesting   एंजाइमों   पुकारा  protease  और   दमदार   acids   to  aid in  खाना   पाचन  , (  भेजा  to  it   via  esophageal peristalsis  )   through  smooth  muscular  contortions (  पुकारा  segmentation )  पहले   sending   partially   पचता  food  (  chyme ) to the  छोटी  intestines .
the   शब्द   पेट  is  निकला   इससे   the  Latin stomachus which is derived from the Greek  शब्द  stomachos ( στόμαχος ) ,  ultimately  from stoma ( ) ,  ``   मुँह  ''  .
The words gastro- and  gastric  (  अर्थ  related  to   the  stomach )  हैं  both  निकला   इससे   the   यूनानी  word gaster ( ) .
1940   pontiac   खास  Series  25   woodie
A  woodie  is  a   car   देह   स्टाइल  ,  विशेषकर  a  स्टेशन   वैगन  , where the  पश्च  bodywork  is   constructed   of  wood  फ्रेमवर्क  with  infill  panels of  लकडी  or painted  मेटल  .
बाद  the  निधन   of  actual  लकडी  construction , manufacturers  प्रयुक्त  simulated  woodgrain   चादर  vinyl—sometimes  augmented  with three-dimensional ,  अनुकरण   framework—to  recall  लकडी  construction .
in   2008   ,  wood construction  थी  evoked abstractly on  the  Ford Flex with a  श्रेणी   of   पक्ष  and  पश्च   आड़ा  grooves .
a  pearl is a hard  ऑब्जेक्ट  produced within  the  soft  ऊतक  ( specifically the  mantle  ) of  a   जीना  shelled mollusc  .
Just like the  शेल  of  a  clam , a  पर्ल   is   बना  up of  कैल्सियम  carbonate  in  minute crystalline form  ,   जिससे  has  महरूम  deposited in  केंद्रिय  layers  .
The  आदर्श  pearl is perfectly  गोलाकार   और   चिकना  , but many  अन्य   आकार  of pearls (  बरॉक  pearls  )   occur   .
the  finest  विशेषता  natural  मोती   have  been  अत्यधिक  valued as gemstones and objects  of  beauty for many  सदियां   ,  and because of this ,  the  word pearl  रै  become a metaphor  लिये   कुछ  very  विरल   ,   ठीक   ,  admirable ,  और   मूल्यवान   .
the  most  मूल्यवान  pearls occur  अनायास   in  the  जंगली  , but  वे  are  अत्यधिक  rare .
These  जंगली  pearls  हैं  referred to as  प्राकृतिक  pearls .
Cultured  or   farmed   मोती  from pearl oysters and freshwater mussels make up  the   बहुमत  of  those   कि   हैं   फिलहाल  sold  .
Imitation  मोती  are also widely  बेची  in  inexpensive  jewelry  ,  but  the   विशेषता  of their  iridescence  is  प्रायः  very poor  ,  and often  ,  artificial pearls are  easily   विशिष्ट  from genuine pearls  .
Pearls have  महरूम   harvested  and cultivated primarily  लिये   उपयोग  in  आभूषण  ,  लकिन  in the  पास्ट  they were  भी   सिले  onto  lavish  clothing  .
Pearls have also  महरूम   कुचल  and used in cosmetics  ,   दवाइयाँ  , and in paint formulations .
whether   जंगली   or   संस्कारी  ,  gem  quality  मोती  are almost  सदा  nacreous  और  , as is  the  interior of the shell that  produces  them .
however  , almost all species of shelled molluscs are capable  of  producing  मोती  (  formally  referred to  as   ``  calcareous concretions '' by some sources  )   of  lesser shine  or  less spherical shape  .
हालांकि   ये   may   भी   be  legitimately referred to  as  ``  मोती  '' by  gemological  labs and  भी   अंतर्गत   u.S.   संघीय  Trade Commission rules , and  हैं  formed  in   the  same  रास्ता  ,  सबसे   of   उन्हें   have  no value  ,  except as  curiosities  .
Bing  (  known  previously   as  Live  ढूंढें   ,   खिड़कियाँ   सजीव  Search , and MSN Search  )   is  a web search engine ( advertised  as  a ``  निर्णय   इंजन  `` ) from  microsoft  .
bing   थी   अनावरण   by   microsoft  CEO  स्टीव   बाल्मर  on  may   28  , 2009  at  the  सब   बाते  Digital conference in San Diego  लिये  release on June 1  .
Notable  परिवर्तन  include the listing  of   ढूंढें   सुझाव  while  प्रश्नों   हैं  entered and  a  list of  सम्बन्धित  searches ( called  ``  Explore pane  ''   )  based  on  semantic technology from  powerset  which  microsoft  purchased in 2008 .
on   जुलाई  29  ,  2009 , Microsoft and Yahoo  !   घोषित  a deal in  जिससे   bing  would power  याहू  ! Search  .
सब  Yahoo ! Search global customers and  साझेदार  are expected to have  बना  the transition  by  early 2012 .
in  October  2011   ,  Bing announced it  थी   working  on  नई  back-end search infrastructure ,  साथ  the goal  of  delivering  तेज़  and slightly  अधिक   प्रासंगिक  search results  लिये  users .
ज्ञात   as  ``  बाघ   ''   ,   the   नई  index-serving technology has  महरूम  incorporated into Bing globally , since August  2011  .
in  May  2012   ,   bing  announced  another   redesign  of its search  इंजन  that  शामिल   ``  Sidebar  ''   ,  a social  विशेषता  that searches users  '   सोशल  networks for information relevant  to   the  search  क्वैरी   .
A diagram showing  an  I  गठन  on  ठोकर   और  a 4-3 Formation  on  defense
in  American  फ़ुटबॉल  , each team  रै   ग्यारह   खिलाड़ी   on   the   फ़ील्ड  at one time  .
the   विशिष्ट  role that  a   खिलाड़ी   takes   on   the  field is called  उनके  position  .
Under  the  modern  नियम  of  अमरीकी  football  ,   टीमों  are  अनुमत  unlimited  subsititutions   ,  that is teams may  बदलें  any  क्रमांक   of  players after  कोई  play .
This  रै   resulted   in   the  development of three  ``  platoons  ''  of players ,  the  offense (  the  team with the ball , who  is  trying  to   स्कोर  )  ,  the defense  (  the  टोली  trying to prevent the other team  इससे  scoring , and  to  take  the  ball  इससे  them ) ,  और  the special teams  (   जो  play  in  kicking  परिस्थितियों   )  .
Within  those   platoons   ,   विभिन्न  specific  स्थितियाँ  exist  depending   on   कया  the player 's  प्रमुख   जॉब   is  .
The Irish people ( or na  héireannaigh  ; Ulster-Scots  :  Airish  fowk   )   हैं   an  ethnic group  जो   originate  in Ireland  ,   an  island in northwestern Europe .
Ireland  रै   महरूम  populated for  around  9,000 years  (  according to archaeological  अध्ययन  , see Prehistoric Ireland )  .
The Irish  लोगों  's earliest ancestors  हैं  recorded in legends  –  they are claimed  to   be  descended  इससे   समूह  such as the  nemedians  ,  fomorians  , Fir Bolg ,  tuatha  Dé Danann and the Milesians  .
Lebor Gabála  érenn  , a book  of  Irish mythology  tells   कि   milesians  were Scythian descendants .
The main groups that  interacted   साथ  the Irish  in  the Middle Ages  शामिल   the   picts  ,  स्कॉट्स  ,  और   the   वाइकिंग्स  .
due   to   इस  contact  ,  Icelanders are noted  लिये  having some Irish  descent   .
the  Anglo-Norman invasion of the  ऊँची  Middle  आयु   ,  the  अंग्रेज़ी  plantations and  the  subsequent English rule  of  the country introduced  the   normans  and  फ्लेमिश  into  आयरलैंड  .
वेल्श  ,  picts  , Bretons ,  और   छोटी   पार्टियों   of  Gauls and even  anglo-saxons   हैं   ज्ञात  in Ireland from  much   पहले  times .
वहीँ  have  महरूम  many  notable   आयरिश  people  throughout   इतिहास  .
The  6th   सदी   आयरिश   भिक्षु  and  मिशनरी   columbanus  is  regarded  as one of  the  `` fathers of  यूरोपीय   ''  ,  followed  by Kilian of Würzburg and  vergilius   of  Salzburg .
the  scientist  रॉबर्ट   बॉयल  is  माना  the `` father  of   रसायन   ``  .
प्रसिद्ध   आयरिश   explorers  include Brendan  the  Navigator  ,  Robert  mcclure   ,   अर्नेस्ट  Shackleton and  tom   crean   .
by   कुछ  accounts , the  पहला   यूरोपीय   चाइल्ड   born   in   उत्तर  America  था  Irish descent on both sides ; and  an  Irishman was  the   पहला  European  to   नियत   पैर   on   अमरीकी  soil in Columbus ' expedition  of   1492  .
वहीँ  are descendants of Irish  लोगों  living in many western countries  ,   विशेषकर   in  English-speaking  देशों  .
historically  ,  करणों  has been  caused  by politics , famine  और  economic issues .
An estimated  50  to 80 million people  हैं   वंशजों  of  आयरिश   लोगों   ,  primarily  in   the  United Kingdom  ,  the  संयुक्त  States , Australia  ,  Canada and  आइसलैंड   ;  there are also smaller  संख्याएँ  in Argentina , Chile  ,   मैक्सिको  , Jamaica  ,   बारबाडोस   ,   दक्षिण  Africa , New Zealand ,  फ़्रांस  , Germany and Brazil .
The largest  क्रमांक  of  वंशजों  of Irish  लोगों   सजीव  in the United  राज्य  .
the   क्रमांक  of people  जीना  in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  who  हैं  of Irish  descent   is   उच्चतर  ,  as   a  percentage of  कुल  population , than that of  कोई  other country  .
Approximately forty percent of the  उपनिवेश  population of Iceland  आए  from Ireland or  स्कॉटलैंड  .
The  बहुत   पहला  inhabitants  of   आइसलैंड   यहूद   आयरिश  .
The  हबल  Space Telescope ( HST  )  is  a  space  दूरदर्शी  that  थी   carried   into  orbit by a Space  शटल  in  1990  and remains  in   आपरेशन  .
a   एपर्चर   दूरदर्शी  in  कम   धरती  orbit , Hubble 's four main instruments observe  in  the near  पराबैंगनी  , visible , and near infrared  .
The telescope is named  बाद   the  astronomer  एडविन   हबल   .
Hubble  's   कक्षा  outside  the  distortion of Earth  's  atmosphere  allows   it  to take extremely sharp  बिंब  with  लगभग   no   पृष्ठभूमि  light .
Hubble 's  गहन   फ़ील्ड  have been some of  the   सबसे  detailed  visible-light   बिंब  ever  ,  allowing a  गहन   दृश्य  into  स्पेस   और  time  .
Many  हबल   observations  have led to  सफलताएँ   in   astrophysics  , such as  accurately  determining  the   रेट  of expansion  of  the  ब्रह्मांड   .
Although  नहीं  the first  स्पेस  telescope ,  हबल   is  one of the  largest  and most versatile  ,  and  is  well known as both a  vital   शोध  tool and a public  संबंध  boon for astronomy  .
The HST was  निर्मित   by   the  United  राज्य   स्पेस  agency NASA  ,   साथ  contributions  इससे  the  यूरोपीय  Space  एजेंसी   ,   और  is operated by  the   स्पेस  Telescope Science Institute  .
the   hst  is  एक   of   नासा   's   ग्रेट   observatories   ,  along with  the   कॉम्पटन   गामा   रे   वेधशाला   ,   the   चन्द्रा   x-ray   वेधशाला   ,  and the  स्पिट्जर   स्पेस   दूरदर्शी   .
स्पेस   telescopes  were  प्रस्तावित  as early as  1923  .
Hubble was  वित्तपोषित  in the  1970s  , with  a  proposed  लॉन्च   in  1983 , but the  प्रोजेक्ट  was beset by technical delays  ,  budget problems  ,   और   the   चैलेंजर  disaster .
When  आखिरकार  launched in  1990   ,  scientists  मिला  that the main mirror  था  been ground incorrectly ,  compromising   the  telescope 's capabilities .
The  दूरदर्शी  was  लौटी  to its intended quality by a  सर्विसिंग  mission in  1993   .
Hubble is the  तभी  telescope designed to be serviced in  स्पेस   by  astronauts  .
Between 1993 and  2002  , four missions  repaired   ,  upgraded , and  replaced   प्रणालियों  on  the   दूरदर्शी  ;  a   पांचवां  mission was canceled  on  safety  grounds   following  the  कोलंबिया   विपत्ति   .
however  , after  spirited  public  चर्चा   ,  NASA  व्यवस्थापक  Mike Griffin approved one final  सर्विसिंग   मिशन   ,  completed in 2009 by  स्पेस  Shuttle Atlantis .
the  telescope  is   अभी  expected  to   फलन   जबतक  at  तनिक  2013  .
इसके  scientific successor  ,  the  जेम्स  Webb  स्पेस  Telescope (  jwst  )  ,  is  to  be  शुभारम्भ  in 2018 or possibly  बाद   .
Anti-inflammatory refers to the  प्रॉपर्टी  of a  पदार्थ  or treatment that reduces inflammation .
Anti-inflammatory drugs  मेक   up  about  हाफ  of analgesics  ,  remedying pain by  reducing  inflammation as opposed to opioids , which affect  the   सेंट्रल  nervous system  .
the  Tonight  दिखाएँ   is   a  US  late-night   बात   दिखाएँ   कि  has aired  on   एनबीसी   चूंकि   1954  .
it   is  the longest  फिलहाल   कार्यशील   regularly   अनुसूचित   entertainment  program  in  the US and the  तीसरा   longest-running   दिखाएँ  on NBC  बाद  Meet  the   दबायें  and Today .
the   tonight   दिखाएँ   थी  hosted  by  Steve Allen  (   1954–1957  ) ,  जोकर   paar  (  1957–1962  ) ,  जॉनी   कार्सन  (  1962–1992  ) ,  jay   लीनो  ( 1992–2009  ,   2010–present  ) ,  और   कोनन   o'brien  ( 2009–2010  )  .
Several guest hosts also appeared  ,  particularly  दौरान   the  Paar and  कार्सन  eras .
the   longest-serving  host  to   तिथि  was Johnny  कार्सन  , who  hosted   the  Tonight Show  अभिनीत  Johnny Carson for 30 seasons from  the  fall  of  1962 through the spring  of  1992 .
The current  मेजबान  of  the  show  is  Jay  लीनो   ,  who  था  previously hosted the show  इससे  1992  to  2009  और   began  his  दूसरी  tenure on March 1 , 2010  .
On April 3 , 2013 , NBC  घोषित  Jimmy Fallon  होता   become  the  नई   मेजबान  of The Tonight Show  .
The Tonight Show with  jimmy   fallon  will  प्रीमियर   फ़रवरी   24  , 2014 , the day after the  closing  ceremonies of the  2014  Winter Olympics  .
SS Andrea  डोरिया   .
Pronounced was an ocean liner  लिये   the  Italian  लकीर  (  società   di  navigazione  इटालिया  )  घर  ported  in  Genoa  ,  Italy ,  सबसे   प्रसिद्ध  for  इसके   डूब   in   1956   ,  when 52 people died (  51  from immediate impact )  .
नामित  after the 16th-century Genoese admiral Andrea  डोरिया  , the ship  था   a   सकल   पंजीकरण   tonnage  of 29,100 and  a  capacity of  परिचय  1,200 passengers and  500  crew  .
लिये   a  country  attempting  to rebuild  इसके  economy and  प्रतिष्ठा  after  संसार   युद्ध  II , Andrea  डोरिया  was an  प्रतीक   of  Italian national pride .
of  all  इटली  's ships  at  the  समय   ,  Andrea  डोरिया  was the largest , fastest and  माना   safest  .
शुभारम्भ   on   16  June  1951  , the  जलयान  undertook its  maiden  voyage  on  14 January  1953  .
on  25  जुलाई  1956 ,  जबकि  the Andrea  डोरिया  was  approaching  the coast  of  Nantucket , Massachusetts , bound for New York  नगर  , the eastbound of the  स्वीडिश   अमरीकी   लकीर  collided  साथ  it  in   कया  became one of history  's  most infamous  मेरीटाइम  disasters .
Struck in the side  ,  the  top-heavy  Andrea Doria  तत्काल   प्रारंभ  to  सूची   severely  to starboard  ,   जिससे   बाएँ  half  of  its  lifeboats  unusable  .
The  consequent  shortage  of  lifeboats might have resulted in  significant  loss of  जीवन  ,  लकिन   the  efficiency of  the  ship  's  technical design  अनुमत   it   to  stay afloat  लिये  over 11 hours after the ramming .
The good behavior  of  the crew , improvements in  संचार  and the rapid  जवाब  of other  जहाजों  averted a  विपत्ति   समान  in scale  to  that  of  the in  1912  .
1,660  यात्री  and  क्रू  were  बचाया   और  survived  ,  while 46 people died  as   a  consequence  of  the  टक्कर   .
The evacuated  लक्ज़री  liner capsized and sank  the   following  morning .
इस   दुर्घटना   remains  the  worst  maritime disaster  to  occur  in  United  राज्य  waters since  the   डूब  of  the  in  1915  .
the  incident and its  aftermath  were  heavily  covered  by  the news media  .
While  the  rescue efforts were both successful  और   commendable  ,  the  cause of  the  collision with the  स्टॉकहोम   और  the  घाटा  of Andrea Doria  उत्पन्न   much  interest in  the  media  और  many  lawsuits  .
Largely  क्युकी   of  an  out-of-court  settlement agreement between the  दो  shipping  कंपनियाँ   दौरान  hearings  तत्काल  after the disaster  ,  no determination of the  कारण  ( s ) was ever formally published .
Although greater  दोष  appeared initially  to  fall on  the   इतालवी  liner  ,   अधिक  recent discoveries have indicated  कि   a  misreading of radar on the  स्वीडिश   जलयान  may have initiated  the  collision  कोर्स  , leading to  त्रुटियाँ  on  दोनो   जहाजों  .
एंड्रिया   डोरिया   थी  the last  प्रमुख  transatlantic  यात्री  vessel  to  sink  पहले  aircraft  became   the   पसन्दीदा  method of  सफर  .
डायलिसिस   tubing
Dialysis tubing  is  a  प्रकार  of semi-  or  partially permeable membrane  tubing  made  इससे  regenerated cellulose or  सेलोफेन   .
It  can   be  used for diffusion  साथ   solutes   or   परासरण   if   प्रयुक्त  with  जल   तभी   .
Osmosis is when  जल  passes through a semi-permeable layer to  पहुँचें   संतुलन  .
Diffusion  ,   on   the  other  हाथ  , allows the movement  of  molecules from high  विशेषज्ञता   to   कम  concentration .
it   होगा   तभी   allow  molecules to  pass  through a  semi-permeable  membrane  or   परत   if   the  molecule is small  पर्याप्त  to fit  through   the  membrane  or  a membrane  's  pore .
इस  usually results  साथ   the  effects of  diffusion  through  a  membrane  तभी   वाकई   affects  small  अणुओं   ,  and almost never  larger  molecules  .
Dialysis tubing  is   प्रयुक्त  in clinical circumstances to  ensure   a   filtered   प्रवाह  of molecules  ,  preventing the flow of  larger  solute molecules  .
Small  अणुओं  can  be   ``  washed  ''  out  of  a solution  जिससे   is  pumped through  the   tubing  into  a  solvent , usually  जल   ,   जिससे  surrounds it  और  in which they can be flushed away .
in   demonstrations  of semi-permeable membranes  ,   a  solution containing  अनेक  types of  अणुओं   ,  usually  ग्लूकोज  and starch  ,  is placed into a semi-permeable dialysis  थैला   ,  such  as  a cellulose  झिल्ली  with pores , and the  थैला  is  sealed  with a knot or elastic  बैंड  .
The  sealed  dialysis bag  is  placed in  a  container of a  अलग  solution  ,  or water .
अणुओं  small  पर्याप्त   to   pass   through  the tubing ( water  ,  salts ,  monosaccharides  , and other  छोटी   अणुओं  ) tend  to  move into or out  of  the dialysis bag in the  दिशा   of  decreasing concentration , therefore displaying  diffusion  .
larger   अणुओं   (   ऐसे  as proteins , or  polysaccharides  )  कि  have dimensions  significantly  greater  than  the  pore   व्यास  are retained inside  the  dialysis bag .
The water  और   छोटी  solutes  in   a  hypotonic  समाधान   (   a  solution that has a lesser solute concentration than the solution  it  is referenced  to  ) will cross  a  semi-permeable  झिल्ली   ,  like dialysis tubing  ,  into  a   hypertonic  solution ( a  समाधान   कि  has  a  higher solute concentration than  the  solution it is  संदर्भित  to ) in  an   attempt  to reach  संतुलन  , where the solute  विशेषज्ञता   of   प्रत्येक  solution is  in  equilibrium .
पारा   प्रयोगशाला  thermometer
a   थर्मामीटर  ( from the Greek ,  thermos  ,  अर्थ  `` hot ''  और   μἐτρον   ,  metron ,  ``  measure  ''   )  is a  यंत्र   कि  measures temperature or temperature gradient  using   a  variety of different  सिद्धान्त  .
A thermometer has  दो   महत्वपूर्ण  elements  :  the temperature sensor (  e.g  .  the  bulb on  a  mercury-in-glass  थर्मामीटर   )  in which  कुछ   शारीरिक  change  occurs   साथ  temperature  ,  plus  कुछ   अर्थात्  of  converting   इस   शारीरिक   बदलें   into  a numerical value  (   e.g  . the  दृश्य  scale that is marked on a mercury-in-glass thermometer  )  .
There are many  प्रकार  and many  उपयोग  for thermometers  ,   as  detailed below in  भाग  of this  आलेख   .
Snow White  और   the  Seven  dwarfs  is  a   1937  American animated musical fantasy  फिल्मी  produced by Walt Disney  और  released by RKO  रेडियो   तस्वीरें   .
Based  on   the  German fairy tale by  the   भाइयो  Grimm  ,   it   is  the first full-length  cel   एनिमेटेड  feature film  और   the  earliest  in   the   वॉल्ट  Disney  एनिमेटेड  Classics  श्रेणी  .
The story  थी   adapted   by   स्टोरीबोर्ड  artists Dorothy Ann  रिक्त   ,  Richard Creedon  ,  Merrill De  मारिस  ,  ओटो   englander  , Earl Hurd ,  लंड  Rickard  ,  Ted  सियर्स   और  Webb Smith .
David Hand was the  supervising  director ,  जबकि   विलियम  Cottrell  ,  Wilfred Jackson , Larry Morey  ,   perce  Pearce  ,   और  Ben Sharpsteen directed the film  's   व्यक्तिगत  sequences  .
Snow White premiered  at   the  Carthay Circle Theatre on December 21 , 1937 , followed by a nationwide release on February  4  , 1938  ,  and  साथ  international earnings of $  8  million during its initial  रिलीज   briefly  assumed  the  record of highest  grossing  sound film at  the  time  .
the   लोकप्रियता   of   the  film has  led   to  it being re-released theatrically  अनेक  times  ,  until  इसके  home video release in  the   1990s   .
Adjusted for inflation  ,  it is one of the  शीर्ष   टेन  performers at the  उत्तर  American box  दफ्तर  .
at   the  11th Academy Awards , Walt Disney was awarded an honorary  ऑस्कर   ,   और  the film was nominated for  बेहतरीन  Musical Score .
It was added  to  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   नेशनल   फिल्मी   रजिस्ट्री  in  1989   और   is   क्रमित  in  the  American  फिल्मी  Institute 's  सूची  of  the   100  greatest  अमरीकी  films  ,  who also named the film as  the   महानतम   अमरीकी   एनिमेटेड   फिल्मी   of   सब  time  in  2008 .
Disney 's  लो   on  the fairy tale  रै   था  a big cultural impact ,  resulting   in  a popular theme  पार्क  attraction , a video game ,  और  a Broadway musical .
Childbirth , labour , delivery ,  जनम  , partus  ,  or parturition is the  culmination   of  a  गर्भावस्था  period  साथ  the  expulsion   of  one or more newborn infants from a  स्त्री   's  uterus .
The  प्रक्रम  of normal childbirth is categorized in three stages of labour : the  shortening  and dilation of the cervix  ,   descent  and birth  of   the   शिशु   ,  and birth  of   the   placenta  .
In many cases and with  increasing   आवृत्ति   ,  childbirth is achieved  through  induction  of  labor or  caesarean  section  ,  which is  the  removal of  the  neonate through  a  surgical incision in the abdomen  ,  rather than  through   vaginal  birth  .
प्रसव  by C-Sections  increased   50  %  in   the  U.S. from  1996  to  2006   ,  and comprise nearly  32  %  of  births in  the  U.S.  और  Canada .
With  आदर  to induced labor , more than 22  %  of  महिलाओं  undergo  प्रेरण  of  श्रमिक   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
चिकित्सा   पेशेवर   नीति  makers  ढूँढें  that  induced   births   और   elective  cesarean can  be  harmful to  the  fetus  और  neonate as well  as   नुकसानदेह  or  बगैर  benefit to the  माँ   ,  and have  स्थापित  strict  दिशानिर्देश   लिये   non-medically  indicated induced births  और  elective  cesarean   पहले  39 weeks .
चिरायु  La Bam was an MTV  &   चिरायु   दिखाएँ   जिससे   followed   bam   margera   और   उसके  crew as they undertook  चुनौतियां   ,  performed stunts and traveled  the   संसार   .
the  show ran for 5  सीज़न  between  2003  and  2005  .
Flushed  दूर   is  a 2006  british/american   कंप्यूटर   एनिमेटेड  action  /   एडवेंचर  comedy film  निर्देशित  by David Bowers and  sam  Fell  .
It was made in the partnership  between  Aardman  एनिमेशन  and  ड्रीमवर्क्स  Animation  ,   और   is  Aardman  's  first completely computer-animated feature  as  opposed  to   the   usual  stop-motion .
The film stars  the  voice talents of Hugh  जैकमैन  , Kate  विंसलेट   ,  Andy  serkis  , Bill Nighy  ,   इयान  McKellen , Shane Richie and Jean  रेनो  .
The story was  by   sam   गिरी   ,  Peter  रब  ,  लंड   सहनशील   ,   और   इयान  La Frenais  ,  and the screenplay was  लिखा   by  Dick Clement , Ian La  frenais  , Christopher Lloyd , Joe  keenan  , and William Davies .
The film was released  in   us  on  3  November  2006   ,   और  in UK  on   दिसम्बर  1  2006  , and was  वितरित   by  Paramount Pictures  ,   मगर  for  स्विट्ज़रलैंड  ,  स्पेन  ,  और  the Netherlands  ,  which were handled  by  Universal  तस्वीरें   .
the  Atlanta Braves are a professional baseball  टोली  based in Atlanta .
The  braves  are  a   सदस्य   of   the   पूर्वी  Division of  प्रमुख  League Baseball 's National League  .
The  braves  have played  in  Turner  फ़ील्ड   चूंकि  1997  .
The  ``  Braves  ''  name ,  जिससे   थी  first used in  1912   ,  originates from a term for  a  Native  अमरीकी  warrior .
वे   हैं   nicknamed  `` the Bravos '' , and often referred to  as  ``  अमेरिका   's   टोली  `` in  सन्दर्भ  to the  टोली   's   खेल  being  ब्रॉडकास्ट   on  the  nationally  available  tbs   इससे  the  1970s   जबतक  2007 , gaining  a   चौड़ी  fanbase  .
इससे   1991   to   2005   the   braves  were  एक   of   the  most successful  franchises  in baseball , winning division  शीर्षक  an  unprecedented  14 consecutive times in that period ( omitting the  strike-shortened   1994  season in which there  यहूद  no official  प्रभाग  champions )  .
The Braves  जीती   the  NL West 1991–93  और  the NL East 1995–2005 , and  लौटे  to  the   playoffs  as  the   नेशनल   लीग  Wild  कार्ड   in  2010  .
The Braves advanced  to  the  संसार   श्रेणी  five  टाइम्स  in the 1990s ,  जीतना   the   शीर्षक   in  1995 .
Since their debut in the  नेशनल   लीग   in   1876  , the  मताधिकार  has  जीती  16  डिवीजनल   शीर्षक  , 17 National League pennants  ,   as   खूब   as   तीन  World  श्रेणी   championships—in  1914 as the Boston  braves  , in 1957  as  the Milwaukee  braves   ,  and  in  1995 in Atlanta .
The  braves  are the only  एमएलबी   मताधिकार   to  have won the World  श्रेणी   in  three different home  शहरों   .
The  क्लबों  is one of the National League 's  दो  remaining charter franchises ( the  अन्य   होने  the  शिकागो   शावक   )   और  was founded in  बोस्टन  , Massachusetts , in 1871 as the  बोस्टन  Red Stockings (  नहीं  to  be  confused  साथ  the  अमरीकी   लीग  's Boston  रेड  Sox )  .
They are considered  ``  the  oldest  continuously  playing  team in major  उत्तर  American sports  .  ''
There is an argument as to who  is   दरअसल   पुरानी   क्युकी  although the  शावक  are a  पूरा   ऋतु   ``   पुरानी  '' (  formed  as  the   शिकागो  White Stockings  in  1870  )  Chicago  खोया   दो   सीज़न  to the Great Chicago Fire , thus the Braves have played  अधिक  consecutive seasons .
After various name changes ( such  as  the Boston  beaneaters  ) , the  टोली  operated as the Boston Braves for  सबसे  of the  पहला  half  of  the 20th  सदी  .
in  1953 , the team  स्थानांतरित  to  मिल्वौकी  , Wisconsin and  became  the Milwaukee Braves , followed  by   the  move to Atlanta in 1966  .
The team  's  tenure in Atlanta is  प्रसिद्ध  for Hank  आरोन  breaking  बेब  Ruth 's career home  चलाएं  record in 1974  ,   हालांकि  the  बहुमत   of   आरोन  's home runs  यहूद   hit  while the team  थी  in  मिल्वौकी  .
उसके   रिकार्ड  stood  जबतक  2007 , when  सैन  Francisco left fielder Barry  bonds   broke   the  record  .

3d   रेंडरिंग  of  a  μCT  स्कैन  of  a   पत्ता  piece  ,  resolution circa 40 μm/  voxel  .
a  leaf  is  an  अंग   of   a  vascular  संयंत्र  , as defined in  वनस्पति  terms ,  और  in particular  in   संयंत्र   morphology   .
foliage   is   a  mass  संज्ञा  that  refers  to leaves  as  a feature of plants .
typically  a leaf  is  a thin ,  flattened  organ  borne  above ground and specialized  लिये   photosynthesis   ,  but  अनेक  types  of  leaves  हैं   adapted  in ways  लगभग  unrecognisable in those terms : some are not flat (  लिये  example many  रसीले  leaves and  conifers   )  , some are  नहीं  above ground (  ऐसे  as bulb  तराजू  ) , and some are  बगैर  major photosynthetic function (  consider  for example cataphylls , spines ,  और  cotyledons )  .
Conversely ,  अनेक   structures  of non-vascular plants , or even  of   कुछ   lichens  ,  जिससे   हैं  not plants at all (  in  the sense of  होने   सदस्यों  of the  किंगडम  Plantae )  ,  do look and function much  जैसे   पत्ते   .
furthermore   ,   अनेक  structures found  in   vascular  plants  dekh   जैसे  leaves  लकिन   हैं  not actually  पत्ते   ;   वे  differ from leaves  in   उनके   structures  and origins  .
उदाहरण  include  phyllodes   ,   cladodes  ,  और   phylloclades  .
Title  कार्ड  for  the  1937  हमारी   गिरोह  comedy Rushin '  बैले   .
Our Gang  (  also known as The Little Rascals or  एचएएल  Roach  's  Rascals )  हैं  a  श्रेणी   of  American comedy short  films   परिचय  a group  of   ग़रीब  neighborhood  children  and their  adventures  .
निर्मित  by  कॉमेडी  producer  एचएएल  Roach , the series is noted for showing children behaving in a  अपेक्षाकृत  natural way , as  रोच  and original director  रॉबर्ट   F.  McGowan  worked   to   फिल्मी  the unaffected  ,  raw  nuances   apparent  in regular children  बल्कि   than  have  उन्हें  imitate  वयस्क   एक्टिंग  styles .
In addition , Our Gang notably put boys , girls ,  whites   और   अश्वेतों   साथ  in  a  group  as   बराबरी  , something  कि  `` broke new ground  ,  ''  according  to  फिल्मी  historian Leonard  maltin   .
ऐसे   a  thing had never  महरूम   किया  before  in   सिनेमा  but has  चूंकि  been repeated after the success of Our Gang .
the  first production at the  रोच  studio  in  1922 was  a   श्रेणी  of  मूक  short subjects  .
जब  Roach changed distributors  इससे  Pathé  to  Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer (  mgm   )   in  1927 , and  परिवर्तित  the  श्रेणी  to  ध्वनि  in  1929   ,  the series took off even  further   .
Production  जारी  at the  रोच  studio until 1938  ,  when  the  series was sold to MGM , who then continued producing  the   comedies  until 1944  .
The  हमारी  Gang  श्रेणी  includes  a  total of  220  shorts  और  one  विशेषता  film , General  spanky  ,  featuring   over   forty-one   चाइल्ड  actors .
as  MGM  retained  the  अधिकारों   to  the Our Gang trademark following their purchase  of  the  उत्पादन  rights  ,  the  80  Roach-produced  ``   टॉकीज़  '' were syndicated  लिये  television  अंतर्गत   the  title The Little Rascals beginning in 1955 .
Both Roach 's The  छोटी   दुष्टों   पैकेज  ( now owned by CBS  टेलीविज़न  Distribution ) and MGM  's   हमारी  Gang package ( now owned by Warner Bros. Entertainment ) have  चूंकि   remained   in  syndication ,  साथ  periodic  नई  productions  आधारित  on  the  shorts surfacing over  the  years  ,  including a  1994   छोटी  Rascals  विशेषता  film released by Universal Pictures .
Zacharias Janssen ( also Zacharias  जानसन  or Sacharias  जानसन   )   (  b.1580-88 , d.pre-1632  to   1638  )  थी  a Dutch  spectacle-maker   इससे  Middelburg  संबद्ध  with  the  invention  of  the first optical telescope  .
janssen  is  sometimes   भी   credited  for  inventing   the   पहला  truly  यौगिक  microscope .
However  ,  the  उत्पत्ति  of  the  microscope , just like  the  origin of the  दूरदर्शी   ,  is  a  matter  of  debate  .
Lake  tahoe   (  ; Washo :  dáʔaw   )   is   a   विशाल  freshwater  झील   in  the  सिएरा   नेवाडा  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
At a  सतह  elevation  of  , it is located along  the  border  between   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  and  नेवाडा  , west  of   कार्सन  City .
Lake  tahoe   is  the largest  अल्पाइन  lake  in  North America .
Its depth is ,  बनाना  it  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   's   second-deepest   (  the  deepest   is  Crater  झील   in  Oregon  ,  being  deeper  , at  )  .
Additionally  ,   झील  Tahoe is listed as the  26th   largest  lake by volume in  the  world at .
The  झील   थी  formed  परिचय  2  लाख  years ago  और   is  a  भाग   of   the   झील  Tahoe Basin  साथ   the  modern lake being shaped  दौरान  the  बर्फ   आयु   .
it  is  ज्ञात   लिये   the   स्पष्टता  of its  जल  and the panorama of  surrounding   kyu  on  सब   पहलू   .
the   क्षेत्रफल  surrounding the  झील   is  also referred  to   as   झील  Tahoe , or  बस   tahoe   .
Lake Tahoe  is  a  प्रमुख  tourist  आकर्षण   in  both Nevada and California  .
it   is  home to a number of  स्की   रिसॉर्ट  , summer outdoor recreation , and  पर्यटक   आकर्षण  .
हिम  and  स्कीइंग  are  a   significant   भाग   of  the area 's economy and reputation .
पहाड़  and  झील   नजारा  are  आकर्षण  throughout the year  .
The Nevada side also  शामिल  large  कसीनो  .
Highways  provide  year-round  अभिगम  from Reno , Carson City ,  और  Sacramento .

The  twenty-seventh   amendment  (  amendment   xxvii  ) prohibits any  विधि  that  increases   or   decreases  the salary of  सदस्यों  of  the   कॉंग्रेस  from  लेने  effect  जबतक  the  प्रारंभ  of the  अगला  set of terms  of   दफ्तर  for  प्रतिनिधि  .
it  is the most recent  amendment  to the United States Constitution .
It was submitted to the states for  अनुसमर्थन  in 1789  और   थी  adopted  in   1992  .
“first  they came ... ”  is  a  प्रसिद्ध   बयान  and  उत्तेजक   कविता  attributed to pastor Martin  niemöller  ( 1892–1984 ) about  the  sloth  of   जर्मनी  intellectuals following the  nazis  '  वृद्धि  to power and the subsequent  purging  of their  चुनी  targets  ,  group after  समूह  .
There is some disagreement  over   the   सटीक  wording  of   the  quotation  और   जब  it  थी   निर्मित   ;   the  content of the  quotation  may have been presented differently by  niemöller  on different  अवसरों   .
इस  list of  आइलैंड्स   by   क्षेत्रफल  includes  सब  islands in the  संसार   वृहद  than  2,500   km2  ( ) and several other islands over  500   km2   (   )   ,  sorted in  descending  order  by   क्षेत्रफल  .
लिये   तुलना  , continents are  भी   दिखाया  .

The Four Thirds system is  a  standard created  by  Olympus and  कोडक  for digital  single-lens   reflex   कैमरा  ( DSLR )  डिज़ाइन  and  development.  < ref  name='dpreview.com  2001-02-13  '   >
the  system  provides  a  मानक   कि   ,   साथ  digital  कैमरे  and  lenses  available from  अनेक   निर्माताओं  , allows for the  इंटरचेंज  of lenses  और  bodies  इससे   अलग  manufacturers  .
seems  to cover the standard  .
Proponents  describe  it  as  an open  मानक  ,  लकिन   कंपनियाँ   may   तभी  use  it  under a non-disclosure agreement .
नापसंद   पुरानी   slr  systems ,  चार  Thirds has been  designed   इससे  the  मैदान  up  to  be  entirely  digital  .
Many  lenses  are extensively computerized  ,  to the point that  ओलम्पस  offers firmware updates  लिये  many  of  them  .
Lens design has  महरूम   tailored   to   the   आवश्यकताएँ   of   डिजिटल   सेंसर   ,  most notably through  telecentric  designs .
The  आकार  of  the   सेंसर   is   significantly   छोटी  than for most DSLRs and this implies that lenses , especially telephoto lenses  ,  can be smaller .
For example ,  a  Four  तिहाई   लेंस   साथ   a   300  mm focal  लंबाई  would cover about the  वही  angle of view  as   a  600 mm  फोकल   लंबाई  lens  लिये   the  35  mm  film standard ,  और  is correspondingly more  कॉम्पैक्ट  .
Thus ,  the   चार   तिहाई  System has crop  फ़ैक्टर  (  फोकल  length multiplier ) of  परिचय  2 , and while  इस  enables longer  फोकल   लंबाई  for  वृहद  magnification ,  it  does n't  सहायता  the manufacture of wide  कोण   lenses  .
the   चित्र   सेंसर  format ,  generally   इंटरमीडिएट   between  those  of   larger   slrs  and smaller compact cameras ,  generally  gives levels of cost  ,   प्रदर्शन   और  convenience  इंटरमीडिएट  between those two classes  .
HVAC  प्रणालियों  use  वेंटिलेशन  air ducts  संस्थापित   throughout   a  building  to  supply conditioned  एयर   to  a  रूम   through   आउटलेट  vents ,  पुकारा  diffusers ; and  नलिकाएं  to  हटाएँ   एयर   through  return-air grilles .
hvac  ( heating  ,   वेंटिलेशन   ,  and  एयर  conditioning  )  is the technology of  अंदर   और   ऑटोमोटिव  environmental comfort .
HVAC  प्रणाली   डिज़ाइन   is   a  subdiscipline of mechanical  अभियान्त्रिकी  ,  आधारित   on   the  principles  of  thermodynamics , fluid mechanics ,  और  heat  ट्रांसफ़र   .
Refrigeration is sometimes added  to   the   फ़ील्ड   's  abbreviation  as  HVAC & R or  hvacr  ,  or   ventilating   is   dropped  as  in   hacr  ( such  as  the designation of HACR-rated  सर्किट  breakers )  .
hvac  is important in the design  of  medium to large industrial  और  office buildings  ऐसे  as skyscrapers and  in  marine  environments  such as aquariums , where safe and healthy  भवन   शर्तें  are regulated  साथ   आदर  to  तापमान   और  humidity  ,  using fresh air from  बाहरी  .
वेंटिलेशन  on  the   downdraught   प्रणाली  , by impulsion  ,   or  the 'plenum ' principle ,  लागू   to   schoolrooms  ( 1899 )
Heating ,  ventilating   ,  and air  कंडीशनिंग  is based on inventions and  discoveries   बना  by Nikolay  lvov  , Michael Faraday , Willis  वाहक   ,   reuben  Trane , James  जूल   ,  William Rankine ,  sadi  Carnot ,  और   अनेक  others .
the   आविष्कार  of  the  components  of   hvac  systems went  hand-in-hand   साथ  the  औद्योगिक  revolution  ,  and new methods of  modernization  ,  उच्चतर  efficiency , and system control are  constantly  introduced by companies and inventors worldwide .
the   तीन  central functions  of  heating  ,   ventilating  , and  air-conditioning   हैं  interrelated  ,  especially with  the  need to  provide  thermal comfort and  स्वीकार्य  indoor air quality within reasonable  संस्थापना  , operation ,  और   मेंटेनेंस   लागत  .
hvac  systems  can  provide ventilation  ,   reduce   एयर  infiltration , and maintain pressure relationships between  स्पेसेस  .
the   अर्थात्  of air delivery  और  removal from  स्पेसेस   is  known  as   रूम  air distribution  .
The starting point  in  carrying out an estimate  दोनो   लिये   कूलिंग  and  हीटिंग  depends on the  exterior  climate  और   आंतरिक  specified  शर्तें   .
however  before taking up  the   ऊष्मा  load calculation  ,  it is  जरुरी  to find  भैस   एयर  requirements for each area  in  detail , as  pressurization  is  an  important  विचार  .
in   आधुनिक  buildings the  डिज़ाइन  , installation  ,  and  कंट्रोल   प्रणालियों  of  ये  functions are  एकीकृत  into one or more HVAC systems  .
For very small  इमारतें  , contractors normally capacity engineer  और  select  hvac   प्रणालियों  and  उपकरण  .
For larger buildings ,  भवन   सेवाएं   designers   और  engineers  ,  such as mechanical  ,  architectural ,  or   भवन  services  इंजीनियर्स  analyze , design , and specify the HVAC systems ,  और  specialty mechanical contractors fabricate  और  commission them .
Building  permits   और  code-compliance inspections  of  the installations  हैं  normally required for  सब   आकार  of  इमारतें  .
The HVAC industry  is  a worldwide  एंटरप्राइज़   ,   साथ   भूमिकाएँ  including operation  और  maintenance , system design and  निर्माण  ,  उपकरण  manufacturing  और   बिक्री   ,  and  in  education  और   शोध   .
The  hvac  industry  थी  historically regulated by the manufacturers  of   hvac   उपकरण  , but regulating  और  standards organizations such as HARDI ,  ashrae   ,  SMACNA ,  एसीसीए   ,   वर्दी   mechanical  Code , International Mechanical Code ,  और   amca  have  महरूम   स्थापित  to  support   the  industry and encourage  ऊँची   मानकों  and achievement .
royal  Navy Commander James  बंध  ,  cmg  , RNVR ,  is  a  fictional  character created by British journalist  और  novelist Ian Fleming  in  1953 .
He  is   the  protagonist of the James Bond series of novels ,  films   ,  comics  और  video  खेल  .
फ्लेमिंग  wrote twelve  बंध   novels  and two short  स्टोरी  collections  पहले  his  मौत  ,  हालांकि   the  last two books—  the  Man with the Golden Gun and  octopussy  and The Living Daylights —were published  मरणोपरांत  .
The Bond character is  a  Secret Service  एजेंट   ,  code number  007  , residing  in  London but active internationally  .
Bond was a composite character who was based  on  a number of  कमांडो   जिसको   फ्लेमिंग   knew   दौरान  his service in the Naval  प्रज्ञा  Division during World War II  ,  to whom Fleming added  उसके   अपना   स्टाइल   और  a  क्रमांक  of his own  tastes  ; Bond 's  नाम  was appropriated from  अमरीकी   ornithologist   जेम्स  Bond .
Bond has a  क्रमांक   of  character traits  जिससे   चलाएं   throughout  the books  ,  including an enjoyment  of  cars ,  a  love  of   खाना   और   पेय   ,  and an  औसत  intake of sixty custom-made cigarettes a day .
चूंकि   फ्लेमिंग  's death  in  1964 , there have been other authorised  लेखक  of Bond material  ,  including John Gardner , who wrote fourteen novels and  दो   novelizations  and Raymond Benson , who wrote  छह   novels  ,  तीन   novelizations  and  तीन  short  कहानियां   .
There  have  also been three authors  जो  wrote one  किताब   प्रत्येक  , Kingsley  एमिस   (   लिखने   as   रॉबर्ट  Markham ) ,  सेबेस्टियन  Faulks and Jeffery Deaver  .
Additionally  a  series of novels based  on   बंध  's youth—  यंग   बंध   —was  written by  चार्ली   higson   .
as  spin-offs from  the  literary  works   ,  there was  a  television adaptation  of  the first novel , Casino  royale   ,  in which Bond  थी  played as  an  American agent  .
A comic strip  श्रेणी  also ran in  the   रोज़  Express newspaper .
There have also  महरूम  twenty-five Bond  films  ; seven actors have played  बंध   in   ये  films .
``  Nature  लड़के   ''  is  a   सोंग  by  ईडन  Ahbez  ,  published  in  1947  .
the  song tells a fantasy  of   a  ``  अजीब  enchanted boy  ...   जो   wandered  very  दूर   ''   तभी   to  learn that `` the greatest thing ... was  बस   to  love  और  be loved  in  return '' .
Nat King Cole  's  1948 recording  of  the song was  a  major hit  और  ``  प्रकृति  Boy ''  रै  since  become  a pop  और  jazz standard , with  दर्जनों   of   प्रमुख  artists interpreting  the  song  .
louisiana  ( or ; , ;  louisiana   क्रियोल   :  Léta de la Lwizyàn ) is  a  state located  in  the  दक्षिणी  region of the United  राज्य  of America  .
Louisiana  is  the  31st   सबसे  extensive and  the   25th   सबसे   populous  of  the   50   संयुक्त  States .
Its capital is Baton  रूज   और  largest city  is  New  ऑरलियन्स  .
Louisiana is the  तभी   राज्य  in  the  U.S.  साथ   राजनैतिक   subdivisions   termed   parishes  ,  जिससे   हैं  local  सरकारी  's equivalent to counties  .
The largest  मोहल्ला   by  population is  ईस्ट   baton  Rouge  मोहल्ला   ,  and the largest by  जमीन  area is  cameron   मोहल्ला   .
much  of the state  's  lands  यहूद  formed from sediment  धोया  down  the  Mississippi River , leaving  विशाल  deltas and  विशाल  areas  of  coastal marsh and  मग्न  .
These contain a  समृद्ध  southern biota  ;  typical examples  शामिल  birds such as ibis and  egrets  .
There are also many  प्रजाति   of  tree frogs ,  और   मछली  such as  sturgeon  and paddlefish .
in  more elevated areas ,  आग   is  a natural process  in  the  लैंडस्केप  , and has produced extensive areas of longleaf  पाइन   वन  and wet savannas  .
ये  support an exceptionally large number  of  plant species , including many species of orchids  और  carnivorous  पौधे  .
Some Louisiana urban environments  have  a multicultural , multilingual  विरासत   ,  being  so  strongly influenced by an admixture  of   18th-century   फ्रेंच   ,  Spanish ,  देशी  American  (  Indian )  और  African  संस्कृतियों  that they  हैं  considered to  be   somewhat   असाधारण  in the U.S .
Before the American purchase of  the   territory  , the current  louisiana  State had been both  a   स्पेनी  and French colony .
in   जोड  ,  the   पैटर्न  of development included importing numerous  अफ़्रीकी   स्लेव  in the 18th  सदी  , with many  इससे  the same region  of  West  अफ़्रीकी  , thus  concentrating   उनके  culture .
In the post-Civil  युद्ध  environment  ,   anglo-americans   increased   the  pressure for  anglicization  ,  और  in 1915  ,  English was made the only official language of the state .
Women 's rights are the rights  और   entitlements   claimed  for women and girls of  अनेक  societies worldwide .
in   कुछ  places  ये  rights are  institutionalized   or  supported  by  law  ,   लोकल   कस्टम  ,  और  behaviour  ,  whereas in  अन्य   वे   may   be  ignored or suppressed .
वे   differ   इससे  broader notions  of   इंसान  rights through  दावा  of  an  inherent historical  और  traditional bias against  the  exercise of rights by women and  लड़कियों  in  पक्ष   of  men  और   लड़कों   .
मुद्दे  commonly associated  साथ   धारणाएं   of   महिलाओं  's rights include ,  हालांकि  are  नहीं   सीमित  to  ,   the  right :  to   bodily  integrity  और   स्वायत्तता  ;  to  vote ( suffrage )  ;  to hold  पब्लिक   दफ्तर  ;  to  work  ;   to  fair wages or  बराबर   अदा  ;  to  own  प्रॉपर्टी  ; to  शिक्षा  ;  to   serve  in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into  विधिक   अनुबंध  ;  और  to have marital ,  parental   और  religious rights .
the  laws  of  science or  वैज्ञानिक   कानून  are statements that describe , predict  ,   और   शायद   बताइये  why ,  a  range of phenomena behave as they  appear   to   in  nature  .
the   पद  `` law '' has  विविध   उपयोग  in  अनेक   मामले  : approximate  ,   सटीक  , broad or narrow theories , in all  प्राकृतिक  scientific  disciplines   (  physics ,  रसायन  ,  जीवविज्ञान  ,  भूविज्ञान  , astronomy etc  .  )  .
an  analogous  पद  for a scientific law is a principle  .
वैज्ञानिक  laws:
summarize  a  large collection of facts  संकल्पित   by  experiment into  a  single statement,
can usually be formulated  mathematically  as  एक  or  अनेक  statements or  समीकरण   ,  or at  तनिक   stated  in a single  वाक्य   ,   so  that it can be  प्रयुक्त  to  भविष्यवाणी   the  outcome  of   an  experiment  ,   दिए  the  आरंभिक   ,   boundary   ,  and other physical  शर्तें  of the processes which take place,
हैं  strongly  समर्थित  by empirical evidence - they are  वैज्ञानिक   ज्ञान   कि   प्रयोग   have  repeatedly verified ( and never falsified  )   .
उनके   सटीकता   करता  not change when  नई   theories  are  worked  out , but  बल्कि  the  पैमाना  of application , since the  समीकरण   (   if   कोई  ) representing the law  करता  not change  .
As with  अन्य  scientific  ज्ञान  ,  वे  do  नहीं  have absolute certainty like mathematical theorems or identities ,  और  it is  सदा  possible for a law to be  विकल  by future  observations   .
हैं   प्रायः  quoted as a fundamental  controlling   influence  rather than  a  description of  observed  facts .
i.e   .  ``  the  laws of  गति  require  कि   ''
कानून  differ from  hypotheses  and  postulates  ,  जिससे  are  प्रस्तावित  during the  वैज्ञानिक  process before and  दौरान  validation  by  experiment and  अवलोकन  .
These are  नहीं   कानून   चूंकि   वे  have not  महरूम   सत्यापित  to the same degree  और   may   नहीं   be  sufficiently  सामान्य  , although they may lead to  the  formulation of  कानून   .
A  विधि  is a more solidified  और   औपचारिक   बयान   ,   आसुत  from repeated experiment .
Although the concepts of a law  or  principle in  प्रकृति   is  borderline  to  philosophy ,  और   presents  the  गहराई  to which mathematics can describe nature , scientific laws are considered  इससे   a  scientific perspective and  follow   the   वैज्ञानिक   विधि  ; they ``  serve  their purpose '' rather than  ``   questioning  reality  ''  (  philosophical  )  or  ``  कथन  of logical absolution '' ( mathematical )  .
For example , whether a  विधि   ``  refers  to  reality ''  is   a   philosophical   समस्या   ,  rather  than   वैज्ञानिक  .
fundamentally   ,  all  वैज्ञानिक   कानून  follow from physics , laws  जिससे  occur in other sciences ultimately follow  इससे  physical  कानून  .
प्रायः  , from  mathematically  fundamental  viewpoints  ,  सार्वभौमिक  constants emerge from  वैज्ञानिक   कानून   .
The launch  of  the  प्लेस्टेशन  3  into   the  Japanese  मार्केट   on   10  November 2006  चिह्नित  the  दूसरी  major seventh generation  entertainment  system  to   be  released .
the   प्रणाली  was  released  seven days  बाद   on   17  November in  the   संयुक्त  States .

Lauren Fenmore Baldwin  (  formerly  विलियम्स   और  Grainger  )  is a fictional character  इससे   the   सीबीएस   साबुन   operas   the   यंग  and  the  Restless and The Bold and  the  Beautiful , portrayed by Tracey  E.   bregman   .

the  2010 NBA  फाइनल   थी  the  नेशनल  Basketball Association (  एनबीए  )  चैंपियनशिप  series for  the  2009–10  ऋतु  .
The best-of-seven playoff was contested  between  the Los Angeles Lakers  ,  champions of  the  Western Conference and  defending   एनबीए   champions   ,  and  the   बोस्टन  Celtics  ,  champions  of  the  पूर्वी   सम्मेलन  .
the  Lakers  पराजित   the  Celtics , four  खेल   to   तीन   ,   to  win the franchise  's   16th  NBA championship .
The  64th   संस्करण   of  the championship  श्रेणी   थी  played  between  June 3 and  जून   17  , was  ब्रॉडकास्ट  on ABC  ,  and  थी   देखी  by  an  average of 18.1 million  लोगों   .
the  Celtics earned their  berth  into the playoffs by winning the Atlantic  प्रभाग  .
The  लेकर्स   जीती  the  प्रशांत   प्रभाग  to  earn   उनके  berth .
The Celtics reached the  एनबीए   फाइनल  by defeating  the  Miami  ऊष्मा  in  the  best-of-seven  पूर्वी   सम्मेलन   पहला  Round  ,  the Cleveland Cavaliers in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Semifinals  ,  and  defending   पूर्वी  conference champion Orlando  जादू   in   the  best-of-seven Eastern  सम्मेलन   फाइनल  .
The Lakers reached the  एनबीए  Finals  by   defeating  the Oklahoma City Thunder  in  the best-of-seven Western  सम्मेलन   पहला   गोलाकार  ,  the   यूटा  Jazz  in   the  best-of-seven Western  सम्मेलन  Semifinals  ,  and the Phoenix Suns in the  best-of-seven  Western  सम्मेलन   फाइनल   .
the  NBA  फाइनल   यहूद  scheduled  in  the Major  लीग  Baseball  संसार   श्रेणी  2–3–2 seven  खेल   स्वरूप  , with the Lakers possessing home-court  लाभ  as  a   बदला   लिये  finishing  साथ   बेहतर  regular season record than the  सेल्टिक्स   .
Repeated  baskets  from  स्टार्टर   कोबे  Bryant  ,  Pau Gasol , and Ron  artest   brought   the  Lakers close to victory in Game  1   .
a   रिकार्ड   तोड़कर   प्रदर्शन  from Ray  एलन  's  आठ   three-point  baskets ensured  the  Celtics a Game 2 triumph .
Derek Fisher ’s 11 points in  the   चौथी  quarter helped  the  Lakers win Game  3  .
the  Celtics  जीती  Game 4 ;  it   किया   n't  hurt that they netted  an  excellent  प्रदर्शन  in baskets by  the  team’s reserves , while Paul Pierce  led  the team to a Game  5   जीत   साथ   27  points  on  57 %  शूटिंग   इससे   the  floor  .
The Lakers  avoided   विलोपन  by  जीतना  a decisive  खेल  6 with 24  अंक  contributed by  उनके  bench .
हालांकि  they trailed the Celtics  by   13  points early in  the   तीसरा   क्वार्टर  ,  the  Lakers rallied and won  उनके  second  लगातार  championship  by  taking  over  an  रोमांचक   खेल   7   aided  by  लेट  contributions on  ठोकर   by  Pau Gasol and Artest  और   rebounding   .
ब्रायंट  was named  सबसे  Valuable Player of the Finals  लिये   उसके   दूसरी  consecutive trophy .
इस   थी  the first  एनबीए   फाइनल  to go the full seven games since and  तभी   the  fourth since the  एनबीए  Finals returned  to  a 2–3–2 format  in  .
The Laker franchise  रै  16  एनबीए  Championships  (  Five  in  Minneapolis , 11  in  Los Angeles  )  trailing  the   सेल्टिक्स  ' seventeen championships  .
the  NBA Finals used the  ``  World Series '' Format in 1949 Minneapolis Lakers defeated the Washington  capitols   4   खेल  to  2   ;   in  1953  मिनियापोलिस  defeated  the   नई   यॉर्क   knicks  4 games to 1 ; in  1954  Minneapolis  पराजित   the  Syracuse Nationals 4  खेल   to   3   ;   और  in  1955   syracuse  Nationals defeated the Fort Wayne Pistons 4 games to 3 .

Black  pepper   (  Piper  nigrum  ) is  a   flowering   बेल   in  the family Piperaceae ,  cultivated  for its  फल   ,  which is  प्रायः   सूखी  and  प्रयुक्त  as a spice  और  seasoning .
The fruit  ,  known  as  a peppercorn when  सूखी   ,   is  approximately  in   व्यास   ,  dark  रेड  when  fully  mature ,  और  , like all  drupes   ,  contains a single  बीज   .
Peppercorns  ,  and  the  ground pepper  निकला   इससे   उन्हें   ,  may  be  described simply as  pepper  ,  or  more  precisely   as  black pepper ( cooked  और   सूखी  unripe fruit ) , green  pepper  ( dried  unripe  fruit )  और  white pepper ( dried  पके   बीज  ) .
Black pepper is  देशी  to  दक्षिण   इण्डिया  ,  और   is   extensively  cultivated there and  elsewhere  in  तीव्र  regions  .
फिलहाल  Vietnam is the  संसार  's largest  निर्माता   और   निर्यातक   of   pepper   ,  producing 34  %  of the world 's  पाइपर   nigrum   क्रॉप  as  of  2008 .
Dried ground  pepper   रै  been used  चूंकि   प्राचीनता  for both its  फ्लेवर   और  as  a   आयुर्विज्ञान  .
Black  pepper   is   the   संसार   's  most traded  मसाला  .
It is one of  the  most  आम   मसाले  added to  यूरोपीय  cuisine and  इसके  descendants  .
The  spiciness   of   ब्लैक  pepper is  due  to the  रासायनिक  piperine , not to  be  confused with  the  capsaicin that  देता  fleshy  मिर्च   theirs   .
It  is  in the modern  संसार  , often paired with  नमक   .
in   cardiovascular   physiology   ,   ejection  fraction  (  EF  )  represents the volumetric fraction  of   रक्त   उत्तेजित  out of  the   ventricle   (  heart )  साथ  each heart beat or cardiac  साईकिल  .
It can be  लागू   to  either the right ventricle which ejects via  the  pulmonary valve  into  the pulmonary  परिसंचरण  or the left  ventricle   जिससे  ejects  via   the  aortic valve into  the  systemic circulation .
इमेजिंग  of the physiology of the  mammalian  heart is the  आर्ट  that allows meaningful mathematical expression defining  ef  .
Noninvasive  हृदय   इमेजिंग  has become a worldwide utility enabling  पढ़ाई   of   हृदय   प्रदर्शन   reproducibly   और   inexpensively  .
Simplified ,  ejection  fraction is a mathematical product allowed by cardiac  इमेजिंग  .
as  a  गणितीय  term  ,  Ejection  भिन्न   is   an  extension of the work of Adolph  फिक  in  हृदय  output .
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography  ,  Computed  टोमोग्राफी   ,  Magnetic Resonance  इमेजिंग  and MUGA  स्कैनिंग  have  definitively  allowed  clinically   प्रासंगिक  mathematics  regarding   ischemia  , Congenital  दिल   बीमारी  and Heart  विफलता  .
The prosecutor is  the  chief legal  प्रतिनिधि  of  the   अभियोजन  in countries with either the  आम  law adversarial system  ,  or the civil  विधि  inquisitorial system  .
the   अभियोजन  is the legal party responsible for presenting  the  case in  a  criminal trial against an  व्यक्तिगत   अभियुक्त  of breaking  the   विधि  .
स्ट्रॉबेरी  shortcake  सबसे  commonly means  a  dessert in the shortcake family of  cakes  .
