the  shortened title of Strawberry on  the   shortcake  , a  जापानी   रोमांस  movie .
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn  ʿabd   al-muṭṭalib  ibn  hāshim   (  ) ( circa| 570  –   circa|   8  June  632  ) , also  transliterated  as  मुहम्मद  ( )  ,   थी  a  धार्मिक  ,  राजनैतिक  , and military leader from  मक्का   जो  unified Arabia  into  a single religious  polity   अंतर्गत  Islam .
He  is   believed  by Muslims and  bahá'ís  to be a messenger and  नबी  of God .
Muhammad  is   लगभग  universally  माना  by  मुसलमान   as  the  पिछला   नबी  sent by  परमेश्वर   लिये   mankind   .
non-muslims  regard  मुहम्मद  as  the   संस्थापक  of  islam   .
मुसलमान   consider   उसे  to  be   the   restorer   of  an  अनछुए  original  monotheistic  faith  of  Adam  ,  Noah ,  अब्राहम  ,  मूसा  ,  यीशु  , and other  नबियों  .
born  in  परिचय  570  ce  in the Arabian city of Mecca  ,  he was  अनाथ   at  an early age  और  brought  up   अंतर्गत  the  परवाह  of  उसके  uncle Abu Talib .
he   बाद   worked  mostly as  a   व्यापारी   ,  as  खूब  as a  गड़रिये   ,  and was  पहला  married  by   आयु  25 .
होने   in  the habit of  periodically  retreating  to  a cave in the  surrounding  mountains  लिये  several  नाइट्स  of seclusion and prayer , he  बाद  reported  कि   it  was  वहीँ  , at age 40  ,  that he  प्राप्त  his first revelation from  परमेश्वर   .
Three years  बाद   इस  event Muhammad started preaching these revelations publicly , proclaiming that ``  परमेश्वर   is  One `` , that  पूरा   ``   आत्मसमर्पण  ''  to  Him ( lit .
islām  )   is   the   तभी  way  (  dīn )  स्वीकार्य  to  परमेश्वर  , and that  he  himself  थी   a   नबी  and  मेसेंजर   of  God , in  the  same  रग  as other  इस्लामी   नबियों   .
मुहम्मद  gained few  अनुसरणकर्ता   जल्दी   on   ,  and was met with  दुश्मनी  from some Meccan  जनजातियों   ;   he  and his  अनुसरणकर्ता   यहूद  treated harshly .
to  escape  persecution  , Muhammad sent  कुछ   of  his followers  to  Abyssinia before he and  उसके  followers in Mecca  migrated  to  मदीना  ( then known  as  Yathrib )  in  the  साल  622 .
This  इवेंट  ,  the   हिज्र   ,   marks  the beginning of  the   इस्लामी   पंचांग  , which is also known as the Hijri  पंचांग  .
In Medina  ,  Muhammad united  the  tribes  अंतर्गत   the   संविधान  of Medina .
After  आठ   सालो   of  fighting  साथ  the Meccan tribes , his  अनुसरणकर्ता   ,   जो  by then had  grown  to  10,000  ,  took  control of Mecca  in  the largely peaceful  conquest  of  मक्का   .
He destroyed the pagan  मूर्तियों  in the city  और  then sent  उसके  followers out  to   नष्ट   सब  of the remaining pagan  मंदिरों   in   पूर्वी  Arabia  .
in  632  ,  a few  महीने   बाद   returning   to  Medina from  the  Farewell  यात्राएं  ,  मुहम्मद  fell  बीमार   और   died  .
By the time  of  his death  ,  most  of  the Arabian Peninsula had  परिवर्तित   to  Islam  ,  and he had  संयुक्त  Arabia into a  सिंगल   मुस्लिम  religious polity .
the  revelations ( or  ayah   ,  lit  .
``  लक्षण  [  of   परमेश्वर   ]  ''  )   —  which  मुहम्मद  reported  receiving  until his death  –  form the verses of the  कुरान  ,  regarded  by Muslims as the `` Word  of  God ''  और  around which  the   धर्म   is  based .
Besides the Quran , Muhammad  's  life ( sira ) and  परंपराओं   (   सुन्नत   )  are  भी  upheld  by  Muslims as the sources  of  sharia  विधि  .
वे  discuss Muhammad  और  other  नबियों   of  Islam with reverence  ,   adding  the  phrase  peace be  upon   उसे  whenever their names are  उल्लेखित  .
While  conceptions   of  Muhammad  in  medieval  christendom  and premodern  टाइम्स   यहूद   largely  negative , appraisals in modern history have  महरूम  far  कम   so  .
The Great Books (  दूसरी  edition )
Great Books of  the  Western World is a series of books  originally  published  in  the United  राज्य  in  1952  by Encyclopædia  विश्वकोष   inc.   to  present  the   ग्रेट  Books  in  a single package  of  54  आयतन   .
The series is now in its  दूसरी   संस्करण   और  contains  60   आयतन  .
The original  सम्पादक   of  the  श्रेणी  chose  तीन  criteria for inclusion  :  a  किताब  must be relevant  to   समकालीन  issues , and not  तभी  important  in  its historical  कॉन्टेक्स्ट   ;   it   जरूर  reward rereading  ;  and it  जरूर   be  a part of  ``  the great conversation about the  ग्रेट   विचार   ,   ''  relevant  to  at  तनिक   25  of the  102   ग्रेट  ideas  पहचाना   by  the editors .
Books were  नहीं  chosen on  the   आधार  of ethnic  or  cultural  inclusiveness   ,   ऐतिहासिक  influence  ,  or the  सम्पादक  ' agreement  साथ   the   दृश्य   expressed   .
``  Cocaine ''  is  a  सोंग   लिखा  and  अंकित  by  jj  Cale in 1976 , but also known  as  a  कवर  version recorded  by  Eric Clapton .
allmusic   काल्स  the latter `` among [ Clapton 's  ]   सबसे  enduringly popular hits '' and notes  कि   ``  even for  an   कलाकार  like Clapton  साथ   a  huge body  of  high-quality  कार्य   ,   'cocaine  '  बाँधने   among  his best . ''
Glyn  जॉन्स  , who  था   previously   worked  with  the  Who  ,   led   zeppelin   और   the  Rolling  पत्थरों   ,  produced  the   क्लैप्टन  recording , which was  released  on  क्लैप्टन  's 1977 album  slowhand  and as  a  single in 1980  .
The live  संस्करण  of ``  कोका   ''   ,  from  the   बस  One  रात्रि   एल्बम  recorded  in  Tokyo , charted  on  the Billboard  hot   100   as  the B-side of  ``  Tulsa  समय  `` , which  थी  a  no  .  30   hit  in  1980.   ``
Cocaine  ''  was one of  अनेक   of  Cale 's songs  अंकित   by   क्लैप्टन  ,  सहित  ``  बाद  Midnight `` and  ``  Travelin ' Light '' .
the  attack  on   पर्ल  Harbor  (  called Hawaii Operation  or  Operation AI by  the  Japanese  इम्पीरियल  General Headquarters ( Operation  z  in  नियोजन  )  और   the   बैटल   of  Pearl Harbor ) was a  आश्चर्य  military strike conducted by  the  Imperial Japanese Navy against the United States naval base at Pearl  हार्बर   ,  Hawaii , on  the   morning  of  दिसम्बर  7 , 1941 (  दिसम्बर   8  in  जापानी   )   .
इससे  the standpoint of the defenders ,  the   आक्रमण   commenced  at  7:48   a.m.  Hawaiian  समय   .
The attack was intended as  a  preventive action  in  order  to   रखना   the   u.S.  Pacific Fleet from  दखल   साथ  military actions  the  Empire  of  Japan  थी   नियोजन   in  Southeast  एशिया  against overseas territories of  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom ,  the  Netherlands  ,  and  the   संयुक्त  States  .
The base  थी   attacked  by  353   जापानी  fighters  ,   बमवर्षक  and torpedo  planes  in two waves ,  शुभारम्भ  from  छह   वायुयान  carriers .
सब   आठ  U.S.  नेवी  battleships  यहूद   क्षतिग्रस्त   ,  with four being  sunk   .
Two  of  these  यहूद   बाद  raised ,  और  with the remaining four  repaired  ,  छह   battleships  returned to service later in the war  .
The  जापानी  also sank or  क्षतिग्रस्त  three  cruisers   ,  three destroyers  ,  an anti-aircraft training ship ,  और  one minelayer .
188  u.S.  aircraft were destroyed ;  2,402  Americans were  मारे  and  1,282   wounded  .
Important  आधार   संस्थापना  such  as  the power station ,  डॉकयार्ड  , maintenance , and  ईंधन   और  torpedo storage  सुविधाएं   ,  as  खूब  as the  पनडुब्बी   पियर  and headquarters building  (  also home  of  the intelligence section ) were  नहीं   attacked   .
Japanese  नुकसान  were light : 29  वायुयान  and five midget submarines lost  ,  and 65  servicemen  killed or wounded .
एक  Japanese  नाविक  was captured  .
The  आक्रमण   आए  as a  profound  shock  to  the American  लोगों   और  led directly  to   the   अमरीकी  entry  into  World War  ii  in both the  प्रशांत   और  European  थिएटर  .
The  following   दिन  (  दिसम्बर   8   )   ,  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  declared war on Japan  .
Domestic  support  for non-interventionism ,  जिससे   था   महरूम   दमदार  ,  disappeared   .
clandestine   support  of  ब्रिटेन  (  लिये  example  the  Neutrality Patrol ) was  replaced   by   क्रियाशील   गठबंधन  .
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted Germany and  इटली  to  घोषित  war on the U.S. on December  11  , which was reciprocated  by   the  U.S.  the  same  दिन  .
वहीँ  were numerous historical precedents for unannounced military action  by  Japan .
However  ,  the  कमी  of any  औपचारिक  warning  ,   विशेषकर  while negotiations were still  जाहिर  ongoing  ,  led President  फ्रैंकलिन  D.  रूज़वेल्ट   to  proclaim December 7 , 1941  ,  ``  a   तिथि  which will live  in  infamy  ``  .
प्रोजेक्ट  Runway Season 2 was  the  second season of Bravo 's  कामयाब  Project Runway ,  a   वास्तविकता   प्रतियोगिता  for  फ़ैशन  designers  .
Season 2 began airing on  दिसम्बर   7  , 2005 .
Following a  देशभर  search  पहले  in the  साल   ,  sixteen  designers   यहूद  chosen as  semi-finalists   और  brought  to   नई  York  नगर   in   जून   ,   2005  .
After  the  first challenge  ,  called  ``   सड़क  To The Runway  ''  , fourteen went on to compete  as   finalists   .
The  जीतना   पंक्तियां   ,   क्लो  Dao  ,  received $ 100,000  in   बीज  money  to   सहायता   लॉन्च   उसके   अपना  line , a 2007  शनि   आसमान   roadster   ,  a spread in  elle  magazine , and  a   mentorship   साथ   the   banana  Republic Design Team  .
जीतना  alongside Dao was her model  ,  Grace Kelsey , who received  the  ELLE  पत्रिका  spread  .
माइकल  Kors  और  Nina  गार्सिया   लौटे  as  न्यायाधीशों  for  the   दूसरी  season .
The fourth  judging  seat rotated each  सप्ताह  , based on  the   चुनौती   .
टिम  Gunn , fashion  कुर्सी  at  पार्सन्स   the  New School  लिये  Design , returned  as  a mentor for the designers  .
कारा  Janx later appeared  in   प्रोजेक्ट  Runway  :   सब  Stars in 2012  ,  where  वो  finished 7th out of 13 .
andrae   gonzalo  ,  in  the same year  ,  competed in  the   दूसरी   ऋतु   of   the   सब  Stars edition placing 10th  आउट   of   13  .
an  example of a Heraclius  खच्चर
In numismatics  ,  a  खच्चर   is  a  सिक्का   or  medal minted with obverse  और  reverse designs not normally seen on  the  same piece  .
These can be  जानबूझकर  or  उत्पादित  by  गलती  .
इस   प्रकार  of  गलती   is   अत्यधिक  sought after , and examples can  लाने  steep  कीमतें  from  collectors   .
The earliest mules  हैं   मिला  among ancient Greek and Roman coins  .
Opinion is divided  between   those  who think that  वे   हैं  accidental , the result  of  an incorrect combination of  a   नई   die  with one that had officially  महरूम  withdrawn  इससे  use ,  or  the work  of  coiners  working  with dies  चुराया  from  an   आधिकारिक  mint , perhaps at a  समय   जब   एक  of them  चाहिए   have  been destroyed .
The name derives from the mule  ,   the  hybrid offspring of a horse and a donkey , due to  ऐसे  a coin  having  two sides intended for  अलग   सिक्के   ,   much  as  a  mule  रै  parents of two different species  .
इस  page documents the  tornadoes  and tornado outbreaks  of   2010   .
The majority  of  tornadoes  रूप   in   the  U.S.  ,   लकिन   वे   can  occur almost  anywhere   अंतर्गत   the  right  शर्तें   .
a  lesser number occur outside the U.S.  ,  most notably in  भाग  of neighboring southern Canada during the Northern  गोलार्ध  's summer  ऋतु  ,  लकिन  are also known in  दक्षिण  America , Europe , Asia  ,  and  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
There were 1,531 tornadoes reported  in  the  संयुक्त  States in 2010  (  of which at  तनिक   1,266   यहूद  confirmed ) ,  साथ   45  confirmed fatalities  .
Elsewhere  in  the world , 11 people were killed in tornadoes ,  छह   in  Argentina  ,   तीन  in  the  Bahamas , one in  बांग्लादेश   ,   और   एक   in   जर्मनी  .
The year was near average for tornadoes despite an  अत्यधिक   शांत  early spring period , however such changed  बाद  a huge  upswing   starting  in late  अप्रैल   और   a  busy  लेट  spring and summer period .
the  autumn months were slightly above  औसत  .
a  lymphocyte is a  प्रकार   of   श्वेत  blood cell in the vertebrate  प्रतिरक्षा  system  .
Under  the   सूक्ष्मदर्शी  , lymphocytes can  be   विभाजित   into   विशाल   lymphocytes  and small  lymphocytes  .
Large  granular   lymphocytes   शामिल   प्राकृतिक  killer cells  (  NK  कोशिकाएं  ) .
छोटी  lymphocytes  consist   of  T  कोशिकाएं   और   b  cells .
खिड़कियाँ  PowerShell  is  Microsoft  's  task automation framework  ,   consisting   of   a  command-line  शेल  and associated scripting language built  on   .neT  Framework .
powershell  provides full access to COM and WMI , enabling administrators to perform administrative  कार्य   on   दोनो  local and remote  खिड़कियाँ  systems  .
In PowerShell ,  प्रशासनिक   कार्य   हैं  generally performed by  cmdlets  ( pronounced  command-lets   )  , which  हैं  specialized .NET  वर्ग  implementing  a  particular  आपरेशन  .
Sets of cmdlets  may   be  combined together  in  scripts  ,  executables  (  which  हैं  standalone applications ) , or by instantiating regular .NET  वर्ग   (  or WMI/COM  वस्तुएँ  ) .
These  कार्य  by accessing data in different data  स्टोर्स   ,  like  the  filesystem or registry  ,   जिससे  are made  उपलब्धियाँ   to   the   powershell  runtime  via   खिड़कियाँ   powershell   प्रदाताओं  .
खिड़कियाँ  PowerShell also provides  a  hosting API with  जिससे   the  Windows  powershell   runtime   can  be embedded inside  अन्य   अनुप्रयोग   .
These applications  can   तब  use Windows PowerShell functionality to implement certain  परिचालन  ,  सहित  those exposed  via  the  आलेखीय  interface .
इस  capability has been  प्रयुक्त  by Microsoft  एक्सचेंज   सर्वर  2007 to expose its  प्रबन्धन  functionality  as  PowerShell cmdlets and providers and  implement   the   आलेखीय  management tools as  powershell   होस्ट   जिससे  invoke  the   जरुरी   cmdlets  .
Other Microsoft applications including  microsoft   एसक्यूएल  Server 2008 also  expose   उनके   प्रबन्धन  interface via  powershell   cmdlets  .
With  powershell   ,  graphical interface-based management applications  on  Windows are  परतदार  on  शीर्ष  of Windows  powershell  .
A PowerShell  एनक्रिप्शन  interface  लिये  Windows  उत्पाद  is mandated by  the  Common Engineering  मापदण्ड   .
खिड़कियाँ  PowerShell  शामिल  its own extensive , console-based help , similar to man pages  in   यूनिक्स   शेल   ,  via  the  Get-Help cmdlet .
Mary  poppins  is  a  1964 musical  फिल्मी  starring  जूली  Andrews , Dick  वैन  Dyke ,  दाउद  Tomlinson , and  glynis   जॉन्स   ,  produced by Walt Disney  ,  and based  on   the  Mary Poppins books series by  P.   L.   ट्रेवर्स   .
The  फिल्मी  was directed  by   रॉबर्ट  Stevenson  और   लिखा  by  विधेयक  Walsh and Don  dagradi   ,  with  गीतों   by  the Sherman Brothers  .
It was  शॉट  at  वॉल्ट   डिज़्नी   studios  in Burbank ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   .
जूली   एंड्रयूज  won  the   अकादमी   पुरस्कार  for Best Actress for her performance as Mary Poppins  और  the film also  जीती   ऑस्कर  for Best  फिल्मी  Editing  ,  Original  म्यूज़िक  Score ,  बेहतरीन   सोंग   लिये  `` Chim Chim  cher-ee   ''   और   बेहतरीन  Visual  प्रभाव  ,  और  received a  कुल  of  13   nominations   .
A story  चाप   is  an extended or continuing storyline  in   episodic  storytelling  मीडिया  such as television , comic books ,  कॉमिक  strips ,  boardgames   ,   वीडियो  games  ,   और  in  कुछ  cases ,  films   .
on  a  टेलीविज़न   कार्यक्रम  , for example , the  स्टोरी   होता  unfold over many episodes  .
in  television , the use  of  the story arc  is  much  अधिक  common in dramas  than  in  comedies   ,   विशेषकर   in  soap operas  .
Webcomics are  अधिक  likely to use story arcs than newspaper  कॉमिक्स   ,  as  सबसे  web comics  have   पठनीय  archives online  कि  a newcomer  to   the  strip  can   पढ़ा  in order to  समझे  what is going on  .
हालांकि   स्टोरी   arcs  have  existed   लिये  decades , the  पद   ``   स्टोरी  arc  ''  was  coined  in 1988 in relation to the television series Wiseguy  ,  and was quickly adapted  लिये  other  उपयोग   .
अनेक  American comic book  श्रेणी  are  अभी   लिखा  in four  or   six-issue   arcs   ,   भीतर   a   continuing   श्रेणी   .
Short  स्टोरी  arcs are  easier  to package  as   व्यापार   paperbacks   लिये  resale  ,   और  more accessible to  the  casual  रीडर  than the never-ending  निरंतरता   कि  once  characterised  comics .
ब्लैक  Friday is the  दिन  following  थैंक्सगिविंग  Day  in   the  United States ,  प्रायः  regarded  as   the  beginning of  the  Christmas shopping  ऋतु   .
in   हाल   सालो  , most major retailers  have  opened extremely early and offered  promotional  sales  to  kick off  the  holiday shopping  ऋतु  ,  समान  to  मुक्केबाज़ी  Day sales  in  many Commonwealth Nations .
Black  शुक्रवार  is  नहीं  an official public  अवकाश  as  ऐसे  , but  अनेक  non-retail employees and  स्कूलों  have  दोनो  Thanksgiving and the day  बाद  off  ,  followed by a weekend  ,   thereby  increasing  the   क्रमांक   of   संभावित  shoppers  .
it   रै  routinely  महरूम  the busiest  खरीदारी   दिन   of  the  साल   चूंकि  2005 , although news reports , which at that  समय  were inaccurate ,  have   वर्णित   it  as  the   व्यस्ततम   खरीदारी  day of  the  year  लिये   a   much  longer  काल  of time  .
The  दिन  's name originated in  फिलाडेल्फिया   ,   जहाँ  it  originally  was  प्रयुक्त  to describe the heavy and disruptive pedestrian and vehicle traffic  जिससे   होता  occur  on   the   दिन  after  थैंक्सगिविंग  .
उपयोग   of   the  term started  पहले   1961   और   began   to   देखिए  broader  उपयोग  outside Philadelphia around 1975 .
Later an alternative explanation  began  to  be   offered  : that `` Black Friday '' indicates  the  point at  जिससे   रिटेलर   शुरू  to turn  a  profit  ,  or are `` '' .
लिये   अनेक  years , it  थी   आम   लिये  retailers  to  open at  6:00  a.m.  ,  but  in  the late 2000s many  था  crept  to  5:00 or even  4:00   .
This was  लिया  to a  नई   चरम  in  2011  ,  जब   अनेक   रिटेलर   (  including Target , Kohl 's , Macy 's , Best  ख़रीदे   ,   और  Bealls ) opened  at  midnight for the  पहला  time .
in  2012 ,  walmart   और   अनेक   अन्य   रिटेलर   घोषित   कि  they would  खोलें   सबसे  of their  स्टोर्स  at  8:00   p.m.  on Thanksgiving Day  (   मगर  in  राज्य   जहाँ  opening on  थैंक्सगिविंग   is   निषिद्ध   due  to blue  कानून  , such  as   मैसाचुसेट्स  where they still opened around midnight ) ,  prompting  calls for  a  walkout among some  मजदूर  .
ब्लैक   शुक्रवार   खरीदारी  is  ज्ञात  for attracting aggressive crowds , with  सालाना  reports of assaults  ,  shootings , and throngs  of   लोगों   trampling  on other  shoppers  in  an  attempt to get the best deal on a product  पहले   आपूर्तियाँ  run  आउट  .
The Family That  preys   is   a   2008  American movie drama  लिखा   ,   उत्पादित   ,   और   निर्देशित   by   टायलर  Perry  .
the  screenplay focuses on  दो   परिवारों   ,   एक  wealthy and the other  working   क्लास   ,   जिनकी   जीवनदान   हैं  intertwined in both  प्रेम   और   कारोबार   .
The movie is  the   दूसरी  of four in  जिससे  Perry 's signature character  ,   madea   ,   करता  not  मेक   an   रूप  .
It  is  also  the   दूसरी  Perry-directed  फिल्मी   (  alongside  पापा  's  छोटी  Girls  )  that  is   नहीं   आधारित  on  कोई  of the filmmaker 's  स्टेज  plays  .
Net 10 , Net  15   ,  Net 30 and  जाल  60  (  also Net 10  दिनों   ,   et  al )  हैं  forms  of   व्यापार   क्रेडिट   जिससे  specify  कि  the  जाल   राशि  ( the total outstanding  on   the  invoice ) is expected to be paid  in  full  और   प्राप्त   by  the  विक्रेता  within  10  ,  15   ,  30  or   60  days  बाद   the  goods are  dispatched  or service  is   समाप्त  .
Net 30 or Net 60 terms are often  coupled   साथ  a credit for  जल्दी  payment .
The word  जाल   in  this sense means  ``  total  बाद  all  छूट  .  ''
It originally  गर्भाशयी  from the Latin  nitere   (   to   चमक  ) and  nitidus   (  elegant ,  trim   )   ,   और  more recently from the French net ( sharp ,  neat   ,  clean ) .
roadtown  , Tortola
The  अंग्रेजों  West Indies were the islands  in  and  around   the   caribbean  that  यहूद  part  of  the British Empire .
in  1912 , the  अंग्रेजों   वेस्ट   इंडीज   यहूद   विभाजित   into   आठ   colonies  : The  बहामा  ,  बारबाडोस  , British  guiana   ,   अंग्रेजों  Honduras  ,   जमैका  ( with  इसके   dependencies  the  turks  and Caicos Islands  और   the  Cayman  आइलैंड्स  )  ,   त्रिनिदाद   और  Tobago ,  the  Windward Islands and the  leeward   आइलैंड्स   .
between  1958  और  1962 , all of  the  island  territories  except  the   अंग्रेजों   वर्जिन  Islands , the Bahamas  ,  British  होंडुरास  and British  guiana  were organised into  the   वेस्ट  Indies Federation .
it  was hoped  कि   the   संघ  would  become  independent  as  a  सिंगल   स्वदेश   ,   लकिन   it   था  limited  शक्तियां  , many  व्यावहारिक  problems , and a lack of popular  support  .
नतीजतन  , the  वेस्ट   इंडीज   संघ   थी  dissolved  .
सबसे  of the  territories   ,  including  सब   the   larger  ones , are now  स्वतंत्र   as  separate countries , with  सदस्यता   to   अनेक  international  forums  such  as  the Organization  of  American  राज्य   ,   the   संघ  of  caribbean  States , the World Trade Organization ,  the   संयुक्त   राष्ट्र  ,  the   caribbean   जातियाँ  , the Commonwealth  of  Nations  और  the  caribbean   विकास  Bank  among   अन्य   .
The remainder  हैं   अंग्रेजों  overseas territories .
सब  the  पूर्व  nations  of  the  अंग्रेजों  West Indies  ,  except  the  Commonwealth of  डोमिनिकन  , Guyana and  त्रिनिदाद  and Tobago  ,   हैं  Commonwealth  realms  .
The term  is   स्टिल  used  लिये  British  विदेशी  Territories in the Caribbean  ,  such as the Cayman Islands .
the  remaining British West Indies
``   कया  a Wonderful World ''  is   a  song written by Bob Thiele ( as `` George Douglas  ''  )  और   जार्ज   दाउद  Weiss  .
It was  पहला  recorded by Louis  आर्मस्ट्रांग  and released as  a   सिंगल   in  1967 .
Thiele and Weiss were both prominent in the music  संसार   (  Thiele as a producer and  वेइस   as   a  composer/performer  )   .
आर्मस्ट्रांग  's  रिकॉर्डिंग   थी  inducted  in  the Grammy  हॉल  of Fame in  1999   .
the   प्रकाशन  for this song is controlled by Memory Lane  म्यूज़िक  Group , Carlin Music  corp.  ,  और  Bug  म्यूज़िक   ,  Inc .
Inauguration  दिन  2009 on the west steps of the U.S.  कैपिटल   .
President  जार्ज  W.  बुश   और  First Lady Laura  बुश  lead the inaugural  परेड  down  पेन्सिलवेनिया  Avenue to the  श्वेत   हाउस  , 2005
The inauguration  of   the  president  of  the United States is a ceremonial event marking  the   शुरुआत  of a  नई   four-year  term  of  a president of  the   संयुक्त  States  .
The day  a   अध्यक्षीय  inauguration occurs  is  known  as  `` Inauguration  दिन  ''  और  occurs on  जनवरी  20 ( or 21st if  the  20th  is  a Sunday  )  .
( Prior to the Twentieth Amendment ,  the   तिथि  was March 4  ,  the day  of  the  साल   on  which the Constitution of  the   संयुक्त  States first took  प्रभाव   in   1789  ; the  पिछला  inauguration  to   लो  place  on  the older date  थी  Franklin D.  रूज़वेल्ट  's first one  on   कूच  4  ,  1933 . )
the   सबसे  recent public presidential inauguration  रस्म   ,  the swearing  in   of   अध्यक्ष  Barack Obama to begin  उसके  second  four-year  term in  दफ्तर  ,  took  place  on  Monday  ,  January 21  ,  2013 .
The only inauguration element mandated  by  the United  राज्य  Constitution is that  the   अध्यक्ष   मेक  an oath  or   प्रतिज्ञान  before that person can ``  डालें   on  the  निष्पादन  ''  of   the  office of the presidency .
however  , over the  सालो  , various traditions have arisen that have expanded the  उद्घाटन  from a simple oath-taking ceremony  to   a  day-long event , including  parades  ,  भाषणों   ,  and  गेंदें   .
इससे   the  presidency  of  Andrew  जैक्सन  through that  of   jimmy   कार्टर   ,   the   प्राथमिक  Inauguration  दिन  ceremony took place on the  कैपिटल  's East  portico  .
चूंकि   the  1981 inauguration  of  Ronald Reagan ,  the  ceremony  रै  been  आयोजित  at  the  Capitol 's West Front .
The  inaugurations  of  विलियम  Howard Taft in  1909  and Reagan in 1985 were moved indoors at the Capitol due to cold weather .
The  युद्ध   of   1812  and World War  ii   caused  two  inaugurations  to be held  at   अन्य   स्थितियाँ  in Washington ,  d.c   .
When  जार्ज  Washington  थी  inaugurated ,  the  oath was  administered   by   रॉबर्ट  Livingston , Chancellor of New York State ,  in   1789   ,  and  by  William  cushing  , Associate Justice of  the  Supreme Court ,  in  1793 .
Since Chief Justice Oliver Ellsworth swore in President John Adams ,  no   मुख्य   इंसाफ   रै  missed  an  Inauguration Day  .
When  उद्घाटन   दिन  has  गिरे  on  a  Sunday , the  मुख्य  justice has administered  the  oath  to  the president on the Sunday privately and then again the  अगला   दिन   सरेआम   .
जब  a new president takes  over   mid-term  due to the death or resignation of  a  president  ,   the   शपथ   of   दफ्तर  is administered  लकिन   औपचारिक   ,  public inauguration events  have  not been held .
stefani   जोआन   एंजेलीना   germanotta  (  ;  born March  28   ,  1986 ) , known by her stage name Lady Gaga  ,  is an  अमरीकी  singer  ,  songwriter  ,   रिकार्ड  producer , dancer , activist , businesswoman , fashion  पंक्तियां   ,  actress and philanthropist .
born   और  raised in  नई   यॉर्क   नगर  ,  वो   primarily  studied at the  कान्वेंट   of   the   पवित्र  Heart and  briefly   attended   नई   यॉर्क   विश्वविद्यालयों  's Tisch School of the Arts before  withdrawing   to  focus  on  her  musical  career .
वो   जल्द   began  performing  in   the  rock  म्यूज़िक   झाँकी  of  मैनहटन  's Lower East Side  .
By  the   समाप्त  of  2007   ,  record  कार्यपालिका   और   निर्माता   विंसेंट   हर्बर्ट   हस्ताक्षरित  her to  उसके  label  streamline   रिकॉर्ड  , an imprint  of   interscope  Records .
Initially  working  as  a   songwriter   at   interscope  Records ,  उसके  vocal abilities captured the attention of recording artist Akon  ,   जो  also  हस्ताक्षरित  her  to  Kon Live Distribution ,  उसके   अपना  label under Interscope .
Lady Gaga came to prominence  as   a  recording artist  following   the  release of her  डेब्यू   एल्बम   ,  The  कीर्ति   (  2008  )  ,  जिससे   थी   a   नाजुक   और  commercial success that topped charts around  the  world and included the international number-one  singles  `` Just  नृत्य   ``  and `` Poker Face ``  .
After  embarking  on the  the  Fame  बॉल  Tour , she  followed  the album  साथ  The Fame Monster ( 2009 )  ,  which  शाखित  the worldwide hit singles  ``  Bad  रोमांस  `` , ``  टेलीफोन  ``  ,  and `` Alejandro ``  .
The Fame  राक्षस  success allowed her to embark on  the   eighteen-month  long  दानव   बॉल   दौरे  ,  जिससे  later became one  of  the highest-grossing  कॉन्सर्ट   टुर   of  all time  .
Her most recent  एल्बम   ,   born   इस   रास्ता  ( 2011 ) , topped  the  charts of most major markets and generated  अधिक   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   chart-topping  singles , including `` Born This  रास्ता   ``   ,  `` Judas  ``  , and  ``  The Edge  of  Glory  ``  .
Influenced  by   britney  Spears  ,   दाउद  Bowie , Michael Jackson ,  मैडोना  , and  महारानी   ,   महिला  Gaga  is  recognized for her  flamboyant   ,  diverse and outré contributions  to   the  music  उद्योग   through   उसके  fashion , performances and music videos .
As of October  2011   ,   वो  has sold an estimated  23  million  एल्बम  and 64 million  singles  worldwide and her  singles   हैं  some of  the  best-selling worldwide .
उसके  achievements include  पाँच  Grammy  पुरस्कार   और   13   एमटीवी   वीडियो  Music Awards .
महिला  Gaga has  consecutively  appeared on  बिलबोर्ड  magazine 's  कलाकारों  of  the  Year  (  scoring the definitive title in  2010   )  ,  क्रमित   चौथी  in  vh1   's  list of  100  Greatest  महिलाओं  in  म्यूज़िक  , is the sixth best selling  डिजिटल  singles artist in US according to RIAA , is regularly placed on  सूचियाँ  composed  by  Forbes magazine  और  was  नामित  one of the  सबसे  influential people  in  the  संसार   by   समय  magazine .
besides   उसके   musical  career  ,  she  involves  herself with  humanitarian  causes and  lgbt   सक्रियता  .
mckethan   स्टेडियम  home  of   घड़ियाल  baseball
A  चित्र  of the 1924 Baseball team
the  Florida Gators  बेसबॉल  team represents the University of Florida in the sport of  बेसबॉल  .
the   फ्लोरिडा  Gators  compete  in Division I of  the  National Collegiate  एथलेटिक्स   संघ  (  ncaa   )  , and the  पूर्वी  Division of the  southeastern  Conference ( SEC ) .
They play  उनके  home  खेल  in Alfred A. McKethan Stadium on the university  's  Gainesville , Florida  कैम्पस   ,  and are currently led  by  head coach Kevin  o'sullivan   .
In the  ninety-eight   ऋतु  history  of  the Gators  बेसबॉल  program , the team has  जीती   बारह  SEC  championships  and  रै  appeared  in  eight  कॉलेज  World Series tournaments  .

अध्यक्षीय   अभियान  button for  अब्राहम  Lincoln  ,  1860 .
the   रिवर्स  side  of   the   बटन   shows  a portrait  of  his running  mate  Hannibal Hamlin  .
A  राजनैतिक   अभियान  is an  व्यवस्थित   प्रयत्न  which seeks to  influence  the decision  बनाना  process  भीतर   a  specific  समूह  .
In  democracies   ,  political  अभियान  often  refer   to   चुनावी  campaigns ,  wherein   प्रतिनिधि   हैं  chosen  or   referendums  are decided .
In modern politics , the  सबसे  high  प्रोफ़ाइल  political  अभियान  are  केन्द्रित   on  candidates  लिये  head  of  state or  सिर  of  सरकारी   ,  often a President  or  Prime  मंत्री   .
Elizabeth  cady   stanton  and  उसके   बेटी   ,  Harriot
एलिज़ाबेथ  Cady  stanton   (  November  12   ,  1815  –  October  26  , 1902  )   थी  an  अमरीकी  social activist  ,   abolitionist  ,  और  leading figure  of   the   जल्दी   महिलाओं   's   अधिकारों  movement .
उसके   घोषणा  of Sentiments  ,  presented  at   the   पहला  women 's  अधिकारों   सम्मेलन  held  in   1848   in  Seneca Falls , New York  ,  is often  credited  with  initiating   the   पहला   व्यवस्थित  women 's  अधिकारों   और   महिलाओं   's  suffrage  आंदोलनों  in  the  United States  .
पहले  Stanton narrowed her  राजनैतिक  focus almost exclusively to women 's  अधिकारों   ,   वो  was an active abolitionist together  साथ   उसके  husband  ,   हेनरी   brewster  Stanton and  cousin   ,   gerrit  Smith  .
नापसंद  many  of   those  involved in  the   महिलाओं  's  अधिकारों   गति   ,   stanton   addressed   विभिन्न  issues pertaining to women beyond  मतदान  rights  .
उसके   चिंताएं   शामिल  women  's  parental  और  custody rights  ,  property rights ,  नियुक्ति  and income  अधिकारों  , divorce , the  आर्थिक  health  of   the  family  ,  and  जनम  control  .
वो  was  भी   an  outspoken supporter of the 19th-century temperance movement .
After  the   अमरीकी   सिविल   युद्ध   ,  Stanton  's  commitment to female  suffrage   caused  a schism in the women 's  अधिकारों   गति   जब  she , together  साथ  Susan B. Anthony ,  अस्वीकृत   to  support passage of  the  Fourteenth and Fifteenth Amendments to  the  United States Constitution .
वो  opposed giving  added  legal protection and  मतदान   अधिकारों   to  African American men while  महिलाओं   ,  black and white  ,   यहूद   अस्वीकृत  those  वही  rights  .
उसके  position on  इस   समस्या   ,  together  साथ   उसके  thoughts  on  organized  christianity  and  महिलाओं  's issues beyond voting rights , led to the  गठन   of  two separate  महिलाओं  's  अधिकारों   संगठन   कि  were finally rejoined , with  stanton   as  president of  the  joint organization  ,  approximately twenty years  बाद   उसके  break  इससे  the original women 's suffrage  गति  .
Stanton  died  in  1902   having   authored   दोनो  The Woman 's  बाइबल  and  उसके  autobiography , along  साथ   अनेक  articles and pamphlets  concerning  female  suffrage  and  महिलाओं  's rights  .
My  मेला   महिला  is  a  musical  आधारित  upon  जार्ज   बर्नार्ड  Shaw  's  Pygmalion and  साथ   किताब  and lyrics by  एलन  Jay Lerner and  म्यूज़िक  by Frederick  loewe   .
The story concerns Eliza Doolittle ,  a   काकनी  flower  लड़की  who  takes  speech lessons from professor  हेनरी  Higgins  ,   a   phoneticist   ,  so  कि  she may pass as a well-born lady  .
The  musical  's  1956   ब्रॉडवे  production was a hit , setting what was then  the   रिकार्ड  for the longest run of  कोई  major musical  थिएटर  production in history .
it   थी  followed by  a  hit London  उत्पादन   ,  a  लोकप्रिय  film version ,  और  numerous revivals  .
it  has been called  ``  the perfect  musical   ''   .
Deregulation  is   the  act  or  process of  निकालना  or reducing state regulations .
It  is  therefore  विपरीत   of   विनियमन  , which refers to  the   प्रक्रम  of  the   सरकारी   regulating   निश्चित  activities .
The  बोस्टन  Bruins  रेडियो   संजाल  is  a  25-station  (   17  A.M.  ,   8  F.M  .  plus 2 F.M . translators  )  CBS  रेडियो   संजाल  which carries live  खेल  broadcasts of the Boston Bruins  .
The  संजाल  's flagship  स्टेशन   is   wbz-fm  /98.5- Boston  ,  Massachusetts  .

bob  Beers provides  रंग  commentary  .
इस   आलेख   is  about the short story .
लिये  the poem by Sara Teasdale  ,   देखिए   वहीँ   होगा  Come Soft  rains  .
``   वहीँ  Will Come  नरम  Rains  ''   is   a  short  स्टोरी   by   विज्ञान   fiction  author Ray Bradbury  जिससे  was first  प्रकाशित   in  the May 6 , 1950  समस्या  of  collier  's .
बाद  that  वही   साल   the  story  थी  included in  bradbury  's  the   martian   क्रॉनिकल्स  (  1950  ) .
With over 1.2 billion  लोगों   ,   हान  Chinese is  the  largest ethnic group  in  the world  .
Pashtun people of  the  Pashtunistan region ,  जिससे  sits in  an  area  between  south of the Hindu  कुश   in  Afghanistan and the  सिंधु  River in Pakistan .
वे  number  around   50  million  .
The Korowai  लोगों  of  पापुआ  numbered just  around  3,000 people  ,   और  were uncontacted until  the  1970s .
नस्ल   or  ethnic group is a socially  पारिभाषित   श्रेणी  based on common culture or  राष्ट्रीयता   .
नस्ल  can ,  लकिन   करता   नहीं   have   to  , include common ancestry , appearance , cuisine  ,  dressing style  ,  heritage  ,  history , language or  dialect  , religion , symbols  ,  traditions ,  or  other cultural  फ़ैक्टर  .
Ethnic identity  is   constantly   reinforced   through   आम  characteristics which  नियत  the group apart from  अन्य  groups .
The 19.9 MW  gemasolar   सौर  plant in Spain features  15  hours  of  storage and  can  supply  शक्ति   24   घंटों   a  day  .
Solar  उर्जा  , radiant light and heat from the sun  ,  has been  harnessed  by humans  चूंकि   प्राचीन  times using  a  range of ever-evolving technologies .
सौर   उर्जा  technologies include  सौर  heating , solar  photovoltaics   ,   सौर   थर्मल   विद्युत  , solar architecture and  कृत्रिम  photosynthesis ,  जिससे  can make  considerable  contributions  to   solving   कुछ   of   the   सबसे  urgent  उर्जा   समस्याएं  the world  अभी  faces .
Solar technologies are  broadly  characterized as  either  passive  सौर  or  क्रियाशील  solar depending  on  the  रास्ता  they  कैप्चर   ,  convert and distribute  सौर  energy .
Active  सौर  techniques include  the   उपयोग   of  photovoltaic  panels   और  solar  थर्मल   collectors   to   दोहन  the energy .
Passive  सौर  techniques include  orienting  a  भवन   to   the   सूर्य  , selecting  सामग्री  with favorable thermal  द्रव्यमान  or light dispersing properties , and designing spaces  कि  naturally circulate air .
in  2011 , the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   उर्जा  Agency said that `` the  विकास  of affordable  ,  inexhaustible  और  clean solar energy technologies  होगा  have  विशाल  longer-term benefits  .
It will increase countries’ energy security  through  reliance  on  an  स्वदेशी   ,  inexhaustible and mostly  import-independent  resource , enhance  स्थिरता  , reduce pollution , lower the costs of mitigating climate change  ,  and  रखना  fossil  ईंधन  prices lower than  वरना   .
These advantages are  वैश्विक  .
Hence  the   अतिरिक्त  costs of the incentives for early  deployment   चाहिए  be considered learning  निवेश   ;  they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared '' .
the   शास्त्रीय   लैटिन  alphabet or Roman  वर्णमाला  evolved  इससे   a   पश्चिमी   किस्में  of  the  Greek alphabet  पुकारा  the Cumaean  वर्णमाला  , which  थी  adopted and modified by  the   etruscans   जो  ruled early Rome .
The Etruscan  वर्णमाला  was in turn adopted and further modified  by  the ancient Romans  to   लिखें   the  Latin  भाषा  .
During  the  Middle Ages ,  the  Latin alphabet was adapted  to   रोमांस   भाषाएं   ,  direct  वंशजों   of   लैटिन  , as  खूब   as   to   सेल्टिक   ,   germanic  , Baltic ,  और  some  स्लावी   भाषाएं  .
With  the  age  of  colonialism  और  Christian evangelism  ,   the  Latin  स्क्रिप्ट  was spread overseas  ,   और   लागू  to  स्वदेशी  American ,  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  , Austronesian ,  austroasiatic   ,   और  African  भाषाएं  .
More recently ,  linguists  have  भी   tended  to prefer  the  Latin  स्क्रिप्ट  or  the  International Phonetic Alphabet (  itself  largely based on  लैटिन   स्क्रिप्ट  ) when  transcribing   or  creating  लिखा   मानकों   लिये   non-european  languages , such as the  अफ़्रीकी   सन्दर्भ  alphabet  .
the  term Latin alphabet  may  refer to either the alphabet  प्रयुक्त  to  लिखें   लैटिन   (   as   वर्णित  in this article )  ,   or  other alphabets based  on  the  लैटिन   स्क्रिप्ट   ,   जिससे  is the basic  नियत  of  अक्षर  common  to  the  विभिन्न  alphabets descended from  the  classical Latin  एक  , such as the English  वर्णमाला  .
These Latin-derived alphabets may discard letters ,  जैसे   the   rotokas  alphabet , or  add  new  अक्षर   ,  like the  डैनिश   और  Norwegian alphabet .
अक्षर   आकार   have   बदला  over  the   सदियां  , including the  सृष्टि  for Medieval Latin  of  lower case  फ़ॉर्म  which did not  मौजूद  in  the  Classical  काल  .
The assassination of  संयुक्त  States  अध्यक्ष   अब्राहम  Lincoln took place  on   शुभ  Friday , April  14  , 1865  ,   as   the   अमरीकी  Civil  युद्ध   थी  drawing to  a  close  .
the  assassination  occurred  five  दिनों   बाद  the  कमांडर  of  the  Confederate Army  of  Northern  वर्जिनिया   ,  General Robert E.  ली  ,  surrendered  to  लेफ्टिनेंट  General  ulysses   S.  Grant  और  the  संघ  Army of the  potomac  .
Lincoln was the  पहला  American president  to  be  assassinated  ,  हालांकि   an   unsuccessful  attempt had  महरूम   बना   on   एंड्रयू  Jackson 30  सालो  before  in   1835  .
The assassination was planned and carried out by the  well-known  stage  कर्ता  John  wilkes  Booth  ,  as  भाग  of a  larger  conspiracy in a bid  to  revive the Confederate  कारण  .
बूथ  's  co-conspirators  were  लुईस   पावेल   और  David Herold , who  यहूद   आबंटित  to kill Secretary of State William H.  seward   ,  and  जार्ज  Atzerodt  जो  was  to  kill  वाइस   अध्यक्ष   एंड्रयू   जॉनसन  .
by  simultaneously eliminating the top three people  in  the administration ,  बूथ  and his  co-conspirators   hoped  to sever  the  continuity of the  संयुक्त  States  सरकारी  .
lincoln   थी   शॉट   जबकि   watching   the   खेल   हमारी  American  cousin   साथ   उसके  wife Mary  टॉड   lincoln   at   घाट  's  थिएटर  in  वॉशिंगटन   ,  D.C. on the night  of   अप्रैल   14  ,  1865   .
He died  जल्दी   the   अगला  morning .
The  बाकी   of  the conspirators '  प्लाट  failed  ;  Powell  तभी  managed to wound Seward  ,   जबकि  Atzerodt  ,  Johnson 's would-be  हत्यारे  , lost his nerve  और   fled  Washington  .
Add-on might mean:
Plug-in ( computing )  ,   a   टुकड़ा  of  तन्त्र  which  enhances   another  software application and  प्रायः  can  नहीं   be   चलाएं  independently
Browser  एक्सटेंशन   ,   जिससे  modifies the interface and/or behavior of web  browsers
Add-on  (  Mozilla  )   ,   a  piece of software  कि  enhances and  customizes  Mozilla-based  अनुप्रयोग
Add-ons  लिये  Firefox  (   addons.mozilla.org  ) , the official Mozilla Foundation  वेब   साईट   जिससे   serves  as a repository of add-ons for Mozilla-based applications
परिधीय  ,  an  optional computer  हार्डवेयर  component that significantly supplements  or  enhances the functionality of the original  ईकाई
Video  खेल  accessory  ,  a piece  of   हार्डवेयर  used in  संयोजन  with  a  video  खेल   कंसोल  for playing video games
क्लबों   स्तर  seating  is   a   खास   खण्ड  of  seating   in   आधुनिक  sports stadiums  .
the   क्लबों   स्तर   is   प्रायः   स्तिथ   towards  the  मध्य  of  the  stage of seating sections , above  the   निम्नतर  deck but  नीचे  the  अपर   डेक   .
वे   हैं  usually  सही  next  to   the   लक्ज़री   बाक्स  , either  सही   ऊपर  , right below , or sandwiched between two levels of Luxury Boxes .
Club Level  seating   is  considered as  उच्चतर   क्लास  than sitting anywhere else in the  एरिना   ,   लकिन   निम्नतर  class compared  to   the   लक्ज़री  Boxes  .
नापसंद   the   लक्ज़री   बाक्स   ,   सबसे  club levels do  नहीं   रैप  entirely  around  the arena .
Some club levels stop  at  a  निश्चित   पाइंट  , giving  रास्ता   to   an   विस्तार  of the Mezzanine  ,   जबकि   अन्य   दे   रास्ता  to  निम्नतर   क्लास   लक्ज़री   बाक्स  ( such  as  ``  पार्टी  Suites '' ) .
A notable exception  to  this  is  Emirates Stadium in  लंदन   ,  which has a  पूरा  tier of  क्लबों  seating  .
Club  स्तर  allow  प्रशंसक  multiple  स्तर  of  entertainment  .
Club Level seating is open to  the  elements  ,   as   opposed   to   the   entirely  enclosed  लक्ज़री   बाक्स  , which  देता  more of an outdoors impression at  roofless   और  open-roof stadiums  और  arenas .
Club  स्तर   seating   is  normally bought on a contract basis  to   allow   लिये  maximum profit  on  the  भाग  of  the   स्टेडियम  .
the  Club Level provides  प्रशंसक  with  खास  access to an  अंदर   भाग  of the arena exclusive  to   प्रशंसक  with  खास  tickets .
These areas  हैं   एयर   conditioned   और  allow access to special restaurants , merchandise stands , and lounge  क्षेत्रों   of  the stadium that  हैं  not  वरना  available .
Concession  स्टैंड  and vendors on the Club  स्तर  also often offer  अलग  menus than in other  स्टैंड  to  दे   अधिक  of a  खास   महसूस  to  the   क्लबों  .
ये   क्षेत्रों  are closed off to the rest of  the  stadium  ,  and  वे  usually  can  only  be  accessed through the exclusive  ,  private club entrances .
sophia   लोरेन  (  ;  born Sofia Villani  scicolone  ; 20 September 1934 ) is  an   इतालवी  actress  .
लोरेन  is widely recognized as Italy 's  सबसे  renowned  और  honored actress .
She was  the   पहला   अभिनेत्री  of the talkie  era  to win  an  Academy  पुरस्कार  for a non-English-speaking  प्रदर्शन  ,  लिये  her  portrayal  of  cesira  in Vittorio  de  Sica  's  Two Women  .
Her other  पुरस्कार   शामिल   a  Grammy Award ,  पाँच  special Golden  ग्लोब्स   ,  a BAFTA Award and a Laurel  पुरस्कार   .
In  1995   वो   प्राप्त   the  Cecil  B.  DeMille Award for  आजीवन  achievements ,  एक  of many such  पुरस्कार   .
उसके   films   शामिल   :  Houseboat (  1958   )   ,   el  Cid (  1961   )   ,  Yesterday ,  आज  and Tomorrow  (   1963  ) , Marriage  italian-style   (  1964  )  , and  a  Special  दिन   (  1977  )   .
In later years she has  appeared   in  American blockbusters such as  grumpier   बूढ़ा  Men  (  1995 ) ,  और   नौ   (  2009 )  .
In 1994 she  स्ट्रक्चर   in   रॉबर्ट  Altman 's  prêt-à-porter  , which earned her  a  Golden Globe  नामांकन  the same year .
She has also achieved  नाजुक  and commercial success in TV movies such  as  Courage ( 1986  )   .
मौतों  for  self-inflicted   चोटों   प्रति  100,000  निवासियों  in 2004  .
incidence   of   आत्महत्या   is   underreported   due   to  both religious  और   सोशल  pressures  ,  and possibly completely  unreported  in some areas .
nevertheless  , from reported cases ,  निश्चित  trends  हैं  apparent  .
Since the data is  skewed   ,  comparing suicide rates between  राष्ट्र  is  statistically   unsound   .
The trends themselves  हैं  not  the  cause ,  लकिन   may  be indicative  of  a  रूट   कारण  .
the  Oprah Winfrey  नेतृत्व   अकादमी  for Girls  -  South Africa is a  मादा  boarding school founded  in  January  2007  and located  in   henley  on Klip  निकट  Meyerton , south of  जोहान्सबर्ग   ,   दक्षिण  Africa  .
The academy was founded  by   ओपरा  Winfrey with  the  goal of  providing  educational and leadership opportunities  लिये  academically gifted girls  इससे  impoverished backgrounds .

Digicel is  a  mobile phone  संजाल  provider  ऑपरेटिंग  in 31 markets across the  caribbean  ,  सेंट्रल  America  ,   और   महासागरीय  regions  .
the  company is  स्वामित्व   by  Irishman Denis O'Brien  ,  is  incorporated  in Bermuda  ,   और   आधारित   in   जमैका  .
it   रै  about 13  लाख  wireless users  .
as   of   2012  , Digicel  's  markets  comprise   :   एंगुइला  , Antigua  और   बारबूडा  , Aruba  ,   बारबाडोस  , Bermuda , Bonaire  ,   the   अंग्रेजों   वर्जिन  Islands  ,  the  केमन   आइलैंड्स  , Curacao ,  डोमिनिकन  ,  el  Salvador  ,  Fiji ,  फ्रेंच  Guiana , Grenada  ,  Guadeloupe ,  गुयाना   ,  Haiti  ,  Jamaica  ,   मार्टीनिक  , Nauru , Panama , Papua New  गिनी   ,  Samoa , Saint  किट्स   और  Nevis  ,  Saint  लूसिया   ,   संत   विंसेंट  and the Grenadines  ,  Suriname , Tonga , Trinidad  &   टोबैगो   ,   turks  and  caicos   ,  and Vanuatu  .
इस  is  a   सूची   of  records  of   the  FIFA  संसार   कप   और   इसके   योग्यता  matches  .
Hospital Emergency  कोड   हैं  used in hospitals worldwide to alert  स्टाफ  to various emergencies  .
The  उपयोग   of  codes  is   intended  to  convey  essential  सूचना   जल्दी   और   साथ   minimal  misunderstanding to  स्टाफ  , while preventing stress  और  panic  among  visitors to  the  hospital .
These  कोड  may  be   posted   on  placards  throughout  the hospital ,  or  printed  on  employee  पहचान   बैज   लिये   तैयार   सन्दर्भ   .
Back of a hospital ID badge showing disaster codes .
Hospital  आपात  codes  may  denote different events at different hospitals ,  सहित   आसपास   ones   .
Because many physicians work  at   अधिक  than one  सुविधा  , this  may  lead to confusion in emergencies , so  वर्दी   प्रणालियों  have  महरूम  proposed  .
The route  of   the  Eifel  जलसेतु  ,  साथ   इसके  average slope .
The Eifel  जलसेतु  was  एक   of  the  longest  aqueducts of the Roman Empire .
the  aqueduct ,  constructed  in  ad  80 ,  carried  water some from the  hilly  Eifel region  of  what is  अभी   जर्मनी   to   the   प्राचीन  city  of   colonia  Claudia Ara  agrippinensium  ( present-day Cologne ) .
If  the   auxiliary  spurs  to  additional springs are  शामिल  ,  the  length  थी   .
the  construction was almost entirely  नीचे  ground ,  और   the  flow of the water  थी  produced entirely by gravity  .
A  few   पुलों  ,  सहित  one  up   to  in  लंबाई   ,  were  needed  to  pass  over valleys .
Unlike some of the other  प्रसिद्ध  Roman aqueducts , the  eifel   जलसेतु   थी  specifically designed to  minimize  the above-ground portion  to   protect  it from damage and  जमने  .
In chemistry ,  a   disulfide   बंध  ( Br.E .  disulphide  bond  )   is  a  covalent  bond  ,  usually  निकला   by   the   coupling  of two thiol groups .
the   linkage  is also called an SS-bond or disulfide  सेतु   .
the  overall  कनेक्टिविटी  is therefore R-S-S-R  .
The terminology is widely used  in  biochemistry .
in   औपचारिक   शर्तें   ,   the  connection  is  a  persulfide  ,  in  analogy to its  congener  , peroxide ( R-O-O-R  )  ,  लकिन   इस  terminology  is  obscure and  is   no   longer  used ( except in reference to R-S-S-H or H-S-S-H compounds ) .
Formal depiction  of  disulfide bond  गठन  as  an  oxidation  .
Westminster Abbey is used for the coronation  of   अंग्रेजों   monarchs
धर्म  in the United  किंगडम  and in the countries  कि   preceded  it , has  महरूम  dominated  ,   लिये  over  1,400  years ,  by   विभिन्न   फ़ॉर्म  of  christianity   .
According to some  सर्वेक्षण   ,   a   बहुमत  of  नागरिकों  still identify with Christianity ,  हालांकि  regular  गिरिजाघर   उपस्थिति  has fallen  dramatically  since the  मध्य  of  the   20th   सदी  ,  और   आव्रजन  and demographic change  have   contributed  to  the  growth of other faiths .
धार्मिक   संबद्धों  of UK citizens  हैं   अंकित   by   नियमित   सर्वेक्षण   ,   the   चार  major  ones   होने  the  uk   जनसांख्यिकी   ,  the Labour  फ़ोर्स  Survey  ,   the   अंग्रेजों  Social  attitudes  survey  और   the   यूरोपीय  Social  सर्वेक्षण   .
according   to  the 2001 UK census  ,  Christianity is the  प्रमुख   धर्म  , followed by  islam  , Hinduism , Sikhism ,  judaism  and  buddhism  in  शर्तें  of number of adherents .
This , and the  अपेक्षाकृत  large  क्रमांक   of   individuals  with nominal or  no  religious  संबद्धों  has  led   टीकाकारों   to  variously describe the  संयुक्त  Kingdom as  a   multi-faith  ,  secularised  , or post-Christian society .
the  United Kingdom  थी   formed  by the  संघ  of previously  स्वतंत्र  countries from 1707 ,  और   नतीजतन   सबसे  of the largest religious  समूह  do  नहीं   have   uk-wide  organisational  structures   .
While  कुछ   समूह   have  separate  structures   लिये   the  individual countries  of  the United Kingdom  ,   अन्य  may  have  a single structure covering  इंग्लैण्ड   और   वेल्स  or  ग्रेट  Britain  .
similarly   ,  due to  the   अपेक्षाकृत   हाल   सृष्टि  of Northern Ireland in  1921   ,  most  प्रमुख   धार्मिक  groups in Northern  आयरलैंड   हैं  organised on an  all-ireland   आधार  .
the   1967   न्यूर्क  riots were a major  सिविल  disturbance  कि   occurred   in  the city  of   न्यूर्क  , New Jersey  between  July 12  और  July 17  ,   1967  .
the  six days of rioting ,  लूटने   ,  and destruction  बाएँ  26  मुर्दे   और   सैंकड़ों   घायल  .
In United  राज्य  college athletics  ,  redshirt is a delay or  बर्खास्तगी   of  an athlete 's participation  in   अनुक्रम  to  lengthen   उसके   or  her period of eligibility .
Typically , a student  's  athletic  पात्रता  in a  दिए  sport is four  सीज़न   ,  a number  निकला  from the four  सालो  of  अकादमिक   वर्ग   कि   हैं  normally required to  obtain   a  bachelor 's degree at  an  American  कॉलेज  or university  .
however  , a  छात्र  athlete  may  be offered  the  opportunity  to  redshirt  लिये  up to two  सालो   ,  which allows  the  athlete  to   स्प्रेड  those  चार  years  of  eligibility over five , or sometimes  छह   सालो  .
In  a  redshirt  साल  , a student  खिलाड़ी  may attend classes at  the  college  or  university  ,  practice  साथ   an   एथलेटिक   टोली  , and dress for play but he or  वो  may not  compete   दौरान   the  game  .
using   इस  mechanism ,  a   छात्र   खिलाड़ी   रै  up  to  five  अकादमिक   सालो   to  use  the   चार  years of eligibility , thus becoming a fifth-year  वरिष्ठ   .
the   पद  is  प्रयुक्त  as a verb , noun , and adjective .
लिये   उदाहरण  , a coach  may  choose to  redshirt   a  player who  is   तब  referred to as  a  redshirt freshman or  बस   a   redshirt  .
The opposite of this is a  ``  true freshman  .  ''
संसार  War I ( WWI  )   थी  a global  युद्ध  centred in Europe  कि   began   on  28 July  1914   और  lasted  जबतक   11  November  1918  .
It was  predominantly   पुकारा  the World War  or  the Great  युद्ध  from its  occurrence  until the  प्रारंभ  of  संसार   युद्ध  II in 1939  ,   और   the  First  संसार   युद्ध  or  संसार   युद्ध   i   thereafter  .
it  involved all the world  's  great  शक्तियां  , which were  समवेत   in  two  opposing   alliances  :  the   allies  ( based on the Triple Entente of the  संयुक्त  Kingdom , France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the  ट्रिपल  Alliance of Germany  ,  Austria-Hungary and Italy ;  लकिन   ,  as  austria–hungary  had taken  the  offensive  विरूद्ध  the  अनुबंध  , Italy did  नहीं   डालें   into  the war ) .
These alliances were  दोनो   reorganised   और  expanded as more  राष्ट्र   डाला  the war :  इटली  ,  जापानी  and  the   संयुक्त  States joined the Allies , and  the   उस्मानी  Empire and Bulgaria the  सेंट्रल  Powers .
Ultimately  ,   अधिक  than 70 million military personnel ,  सहित   60   लाख   europeans  , were  mobilised   in  one  of  the largest wars in  इतिहास   .
अधिक   than  9 million  combatants  were  मारे   ,  largely because of technological  advancements   कि  led to enormous  increases   in  the lethality  of  weapons without  सम्बन्धित  improvements in protection or mobility .
It was  the  fifth-  deadliest  conflict in world  इतिहास  , subsequently paving  the  way  लिये   विभिन्न  political  परिवर्तन  ,  ऐसे   as  revolutions in  अनेक  of the  राष्ट्र  involved  .
एक  of  the  long-term causes  of  the war was  the  resurgence of imperialism in  the   विदेशी  policies of  the  great  शक्तियां  of  यूरोपीय  .
More  तत्काल  , the  हत्या  of Archduke  फ्रांज   फर्डिनेंड  of  ऑस्ट्रिया  ,  the  heir  to  the throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28 June  1914   by   यूगोस्लाव   राष्ट्रवादी   gavrilo   princip  in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary  subsequently  delivered  an  ultimatum  to   the  Kingdom of Serbia  .
Several  alliances  formed  over  the previous  दशकों  were  invoked  .
Within  सप्ताह   ,  the major  शक्तियां  were at war and , via  उनके   colonies   ,   the   विरोध  soon spread around the world  .
on  28  जुलाई   ,   the  Austro-Hungarians fired the  पहला  shots  of  the  युद्ध  as preparation for the  आक्रमण  of  सर्बिया  .
While the Russians  mobilised   ,  the Germans  invaded  neutral Belgium and  ध्वज  on the  रास्ता   to   फ़्रांस   ,   providing  a casus belli for Britain  's  declaration of war against  जर्मनी  .
After the German march on  पेरिस  was  brought   to  a halt—the so-called Miracle  of  the  marne   —the   पश्चिमी   सामने  settled into a  स्थिर   बैटल   of  attrition with  a   गर्त  line that  बदला  little until  1917   .
on   the   पूर्वी  Front  ,  the Russian army was successful against the Austro-Hungarians ,  लकिन   थी   रोका   in  its  आक्रमण   of  East Prussia  by  the  germans  .
In  नवम्बर  the Ottoman Empire  joined  the war , opening  up   fronts  in the Caucasus  ,   मेसोपोटामिया   और   the  Sinai .
Italy and  बुल्गारिया  went  to  war  in  1915 and Romania in  1916   .
in  Russia  ,   the  tsar 's  सरकारी   collapsed  in  कूच  1917  और  a  subsequent   क्रान्ति   in  November brought the  russians   to  terms  साथ  the Central  शक्तियां  .
After  a  1918  जर्मनी  offensive along the western front , the Allies drove  वापस   the   germans   in   a  series of successful offensives and American forces began  प्रवेश  the trenches  .
Germany , which had its own  ट्रबल   साथ  revolutionaries , agreed to  an  armistice on  11  November 1918  .
The  युद्ध  ended in victory  लिये  the  allies  .
Events on the home fronts  यहूद  as  उग्र   as  on the  बैटल   fronts  ,  as  the participants tried  to  mobilize their  जनशक्ति  and economic resources to fight a  कुल  war .
By  the   समाप्त   of  the war  ,  four major imperial powers—the German  ,  Russian ,  austro-hungarian  and Ottoman  empires—ceased   to   मौजूद   .
the  successor states  of  the former  दो  lost a great amount  of   territory   ,  while  the  latter two were  dismantled  entirely  .
the  map of  सेंट्रल  Europe was  redrawn  into several smaller  राज्य  .
the   लीग  of  राष्ट्र  was formed in  the   आशा   of  preventing another such  विरोध  .
the   यूरोपीय   राष्ट्रवाद  spawned by the  युद्ध   और  the  ब्रेकअप  of empires , the repercussions  of   जर्मनी  's defeat and  समस्याएं  with the Treaty  of   versailles  are agreed  to  be factors  contributing   to  World War  ii  .
मैप   of   देशों  that  घोषित   themselves   to  be  समाजवादी  states  अंतर्गत   the   marxist–leninist   or  Maoist definition  -  that is  to  say , ``  कम्युनिस्ट   राज्य  ''  -  between 1979 and  1983   .
इस  period  चिह्नित  the greatest  territorial  extent of Communist states .
a  communist state  is   a  state  जहाँ  the  अर्थात्  of  उत्पादन  are collectively owned by  the  society  .
it  has  a   रूप  of government characterized by  single-party  rule  or   dominant-party   नियम   of  a communist party  (  referred  as   तानाशाही  of the  proletariat  by  इसके   proponents  ) and  a   professed   निष्ठा   to  a  leninist  or  marxist–leninist   विचारधारा   as   the  guiding  principle   of  the state  .
technically  ,  ``   कम्युनिस्ट  state  ''  is  a   contradictio  in terminis as a communist society  as   पारिभाषित  by both  माक्र्सवादी   और   anarcho-communists   is  in  principle   stateless  .
From  इस   परिप्रेक्ष्य   ,  the  पद  Marxist-Leninist state is  अधिक  appropriate  .
historically  ,  a  ``  कम्युनिस्ट  state  ''  referred to a system  जहाँ  public  स्वामित्व  of all  or  most means of  उत्पादन  by  the  Communist  पार्टी  -run state is  deemed  necessary to further the  रूचि  of  the  working  क्लास   ;  today ,  a   कम्युनिस्ट   राज्य  can also , for instance  ,  refer to contemporary China and Vietnam  ,   जहाँ  a Communist Party-run  राज्य  exists  alongside   a  mixed economy .
According to Marxist–Leninists , the  राज्य  is  a  tool in the hands of the ruling class ,  जिससे   in  a socialist society  is   the   working   क्लास  ,  so   a  socialist state is ,  according   to  Leninists , a state of the working class  .
In  अभ्यास   ,   कम्युनिस्ट  states  do  not actually  refer   to   themselves   as  such .
They do this  नहीं  to disguise the fact that the  सत्ताधारी  party is  कम्युनिस्ट   ,   लकिन  rather  क्युकी  they do not  consider   themselves   to   be  a communist  समाज   at  present  .
बजाय  ,  वे   constitutionally   पहचानो   themselves  as socialist states  or  workers  '  states  .
the  primary  लक्ष्य   of  these  राज्य  ,  जिससे  also explains  उनके  official name ,  is  to guide their  संबंधित  countries in the process  of  building socialism , ultimately  अग्रणी  to communism  .
Communist  राज्य  may  have  several legal political parties  ,  but  the  communist party  is   प्रायः   granted   a   खास  or  प्रबल   भूमिका   in   सरकारी  ,  प्रायः   by  statute or under  the  constitution  .
नतीजतन   ,   the  institutions of  the  state and of the communist party  become  intimately entwined ,  ऐसे   as  in the  विकास  of parallel  संस्थानों   .
In the 20th century ,  सबसे  communist states adopted  नियोजित  economies .
however  ,  वहीँ   यहूद  exceptions : The Soviet Union during the  1920s  and late 1980s and  यूगोस्लाविया  after World War II allowed limited markets and a  उपाधि  of  कार्यकर्ता   self-management  ,  जबकि  China  ,  Vietnam  और   लाओस  introduced  far-reaching   मार्केट   reforms   बाद  the  1980s   .
In the 21st  सदी  , China  और   वियतनाम  have allowed a  मिश्रित   अर्थव्यवस्था  to develop  .
The  आधारभूत   अवधारणाओं  of  कम्युनिस्ट  states often diverge from the original  socio-economic   विचारधाराओं  from which  वे  develop  .
as  a  परिणाम  , many  adherents   of  these ideologies often oppose the  राजनैतिक   प्रणालियों  commonly associated  साथ   ये   राज्य   .
For  उदाहरण   ,   dissenting  communists  ऐसे  as Trotskyists were often  opposed  to the communist states  of  the  20th  century ,  claiming  either  कि  they had  nothing  to  do   साथ  `` real '' communism  or   कि  the ideology of  ऐसे  states  था  reached a point of irrevocable  भ्रष्टाचार  .
माइकल  Fred  फेल्प्स   ii  ( born June 30 , 1985 )  is  a retired American  तैराक  and the most  सजा  Olympian  of   सब   समय   ,  with  a   कुल  of 22  medals  .
फेल्प्स  also holds  the  all-time  रिकॉर्ड  for Olympic gold medals (  18   ,  double the second  उच्चतम  record holders  )   ,  Olympic gold  medals  in individual  कार्यक्रम   (  11  )   ,  and Olympic  medals   in   व्यक्तिगत  events for a  पुरूष   (  13 )  .
In winning  आठ  gold  medals   at  the 2008  बीजिंग  Games , Phelps took the record for  the  most first-place finishes  at  any  सिंगल  Olympic  खेल  .
पाँच  of those  victories  were  in  individual events  ,  tying the  सिंगल  Games record  .
In  the  2012 Summer Olympics  in   लंदन  ,  फेल्प्स  won  चार  golds and two silver medals ,  बनाना   उसे   the  most successful athlete  of   the  Games  लिये   the  third Olympics  in  a row  .
Phelps is the  long  course world  recordholder   in   the   100-meter  butterfly  ,  200-meter butterfly and  400-meter  individual  medley  as well as the former  long  course  संसार  recordholder  in  the 200-meter  फ्रीस्टाइल  and  200-meter  individual  medley  .
He  रै   जीती   a   कुल   of  71  medals   in  major  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   long-course  competition  ,   57  gold , 11  चांदी  ,  और  three bronze  spanning  the Olympics  ,  the  संसार  ,  और  the  पण  Pacific  championships   .
फेल्प्स   's   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   शीर्षक   और  record-breaking  प्रदर्शन  have  अर्जित   उसे  the World Swimmer of  the  Year Award seven  टाइम्स   और  American Swimmer of the  साल   पुरस्कार   नौ  times as  खूब   as   the  FINA Swimmer of the  साल  Award in 2012 .
His  unprecedented  Olympic success in 2008 earned Phelps  खेल  Illustrated  पत्रिका   's   sportsman  of  the   साल  award .
बाद   the  2008 Summer Olympics ,  फेल्प्स   प्रारंभ   the  Michael Phelps  न्यास   ,  which focuses on  growing  the  खेल   of   तैराकी  and promoting  healthier  lifestyles .
he  expects to  do  further  कार्य   साथ   उसके   न्यास  after the  2012  Olympics  ,   जिससे  he has said will  be   उसके  last  .
Lenovo Group Limited ( ) is a  चाइनीज  multinational computer  हार्डवेयर  and  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स   कम्पनी   साथ   इसके   मुख्यालय   in  Beijing , China  और   morrisville  , North Carolina  और  its  पंजीकृत   दफ्तर   in   हांग   काँग  ,  चीन   .
Its products include personal computers ,  टैब्लेट  computers  ,   मोबाईल   फोन  , workstations , servers , electronic  भंडार  devices , IT  प्रबन्धन  software  और  smart televisions .
Lenovo  is   the  world  's   second-largest   pc   विक्रेता   by   2012   ईकाई  sales  .
It  बाज़ार  the ThinkPad  लकीर  of  कोपी   कंप्यूटर  and the  thinkcentre  line of  desktops   .
लेनोवो   रै   परिचालन  in  अधिक   than  60 countries  और  sells its  उत्पाद  in around  160  countries .
Lenovo was  संस्थापित   in  Beijing  in  1984  और  incorporated in Hong  काँग  in 1988 under its previous name  ,  Legend .
Lenovo  is  listed on  the  Hong Kong Stock  एक्सचेंज   और   is   a  constituent of the Hang  सेंग   china-affiliated  Corporations  अनुक्रमणिका  .
स्लग  is  a  common  नाम  for  an   जाहिर  shell-less terrestrial  gastropod  mollusk  .
the  word `` slug '' is also  प्रायः   प्रयुक्त   as   भाग  of  the  common  नाम   of  any gastropod  mollusc  that has no  शेल  , has  a  very  घटाया  shell , or has  तभी   a   छोटी  internal shell .
(  This  is   in  contrast to the common name ``  घोंघा  ``  ,  which  is  applied to  gastropods   कि  have a coiled shell that  is  large enough that the soft  भाग   of   the  animal  can  retract fully into it . )
Slugs exist  on   जमीन   और  in  the   समुद्र   ,  and there is  भी   एक  genus of freshwater  slugs  ,  acochlidium  .
the   unadorned   शब्द   ``  slug '' is however  लागू  primarily to  जमीन  slugs  ,   whereas  slugs from the sea or from  freshwater  are  प्रायः  referred to  as  `` sea slugs ``  और   ``  freshwater  slugs   ''   .
जमीन  gastropods with  a   शेल  that is not quite vestigial ,  लकिन  is  too  small  to  retract into ( like  अनेक  in the  परिवार   urocyclidae  ) ,  हैं   ज्ञात  as  semislugs  .
The  विभिन्न   taxonomic  families of slugs form part of  अनेक  quite  अलग  evolutionary  lineages   जिससे   भी   शामिल   घोंघे  .
Thus , for  उदाहरण   ,  the  विभिन्न  families  of   जमीन  slugs  हैं   नहीं  very  closely  related to one another ,  despite  a superficial  समानता  in  the  overall  देह  form .
The shell-less condition has  arisen   अनेक  times  independently   दौरान   the  evolutionary  पास्ट  , and thus the category `` slug ''  is   emphatically   a  polyphyletic  एक   .
slugs   ,  like all  अन्य   gastropods   ,   undergo  torsion ( a 180°  टेढ़ी   of  the internal organs ) during  विकास  .
Internally , slug anatomy clearly shows the effects  of  this rotation  ,   लकिन  externally the  लाशें  of land slugs appear  to   be   अधिक   or  less symmetrical  ,  except  लिये   the  positioning  of  the pneumostome , which  is   on  one  पक्ष  of the  एनिमल   ,   सामान्यतः   the   सही   हाथ  side  .
The  नरम  ,  slimy   लाशें  of slugs are  prone  to desiccation , so  land-living  slugs are confined  to  moist  environments   और   जरूर  retreat to  नम   छुपाना  places when the weather  is   शुष्क  .
the   subsequent   सूचना   in  this  आलेख   applies  to land  slugs   .
is a Latin word that  अर्थात्  `` thus '' or  ,  in writing , `` it was thus in the source material '' .

SiC , Silicon carbide , a  semiconducting  material  ,  also used to  मेक  metalworking tools
