Imperial  मानक  of  नेपोलियन  I
Napoleon Bonaparte ( , ; 15  अगस्त  1769  –  5  may   1821  )  थी  a  फ्रेंच  military and political leader who rose  to  prominence  दौरान   the   latter  stages of  the  French Revolution and its associated wars  in   यूरोपीय  .
As  नेपोलियन  I , he was Emperor of  the  French from 1804 to 1815  .
His legal reform ,  the  Napoleonic  कोड  , has  महरूम  a major influence  on  many  सिविल  law jurisdictions worldwide  ,  but he  is  best remembered for  उसके  role in  the   युद्धों   led   विरूद्ध   फ़्रांस  by a series  of  coalitions  ,   the  so-called Napoleonic  युद्धों   .
He established hegemony  over  most of  महाद्वीपीय   यूरोपीय  and sought to spread  the   आदर्शों  of  the   फ्रेंच  Revolution , while consolidating an imperial  साम्राज्य  which  लौटी  aspects  of   the   अपदस्थ  Ancien Régime .
Due  to  his success in these  युद्धों   ,   प्रायः   विरूद्ध   numerically   श्रेष्ठ  enemies , he is generally  regarded   as   एक  of the  महानतम  military  कमांडरों  of  सब   समय   ,  and his  अभियान   हैं  studied at military  अकादमियों   विश्वव्यापी   .
नेपोलियन  was  born  at Ajaccio in Corsica in a  परिवार   of   प्रतिष्ठित   इतालवी  ancestry  जिससे   था   settled  Corsica  in  the 16th century  .
He trained  as  an  तोपखाने  officer  in   मेनलैंड   फ़्रांस  .
he   रोज़   to   prominence  under  the   फ्रेंच  First Republic  और  led successful  अभियान  against the First and Second Coalitions arrayed  विरूद्ध   फ़्रांस   .
he   led  a  कामयाब   आक्रमण   of   the   इतालवी   प्रायद्वीप   .
in  1799 ,  he  staged a  तख्तापलट  d'état  और  installed himself as  पहला  Consul ; five years later  the   फ्रेंच   सीनेट  proclaimed him emperor ,  following   a  plebiscite in  उसके   पक्ष  .
in   the   पहला   दशक   of  the 19th  सदी  , the  फ्रेंच  Empire under  नेपोलियन  engaged  in   a  series of  conflicts—the  Napoleonic Wars —that involved  प्रत्येक   प्रमुख   यूरोपीय   शक्ति  .
After  a   streak  of victories  ,   फ़्रांस  secured a dominant position  in   महाद्वीपीय   यूरोपीय   ,  and Napoleon maintained the  फ्रेंच  sphere  of  influence through  the   गठन   of   extensive   alliances   और   the  appointment  of  friends  और  family members  to   नियम   अन्य  European countries as French client states .
The  प्रायद्वीपीय  War and  1812  French invasion  of  Russia marked turning  अंक  in Napoleon  's  fortunes .
His Grande Armée  थी   badly  damaged in the  अभियान  and never fully recovered .
in  1813 ,  the   छठे   गठबन्धन   पराजित   उसके  forces at  लिपजिग   ;   the   following   साल  the Coalition invaded France ,  मजबूर  Napoleon to  abdicate  and exiled  उसे  to  the  island of Elba  .
कम   than  a year later , he escaped  एल्बा   और   लौटे  to power ,  लकिन  was defeated  at  the Battle of Waterloo in  जून  1815 .
नेपोलियन   खर्च   the   पिछला   छह   सालो  of his life  in  confinement  by   the   अंग्रेजों   on  the island of Saint Helena .
an   पोस्टमार्टम  concluded he died  of   पेट  cancer , but  वहीँ  has been  कुछ   बहस  about  the   कारण   of   उसके   मौत   ,  as  कुछ  scholars have  speculated   कि   he  was a  शिकार   of  arsenic  विषाक्तता  .
This  is  a  कालानुक्रमिक  listing of  the   संयुक्त  States Senators from Pennsylvania  .
United States Senators  हैं  popularly elected , for  a   six-year  term ,  शुरूआत  January 3 .
चुनावों   हैं   आयोजित  the  पहला   मंगलवार  after November 1 .
पहले  1914 ,  वे  were chosen by  the  Pennsylvania General Assembly , and  पहले  1935  ,  their terms began March 4 .
The South Africa national  रग्बी  union  टोली   (  known  as   the  Springboks  )  represents South Africa in  रग्बी  union .
They  compete  in the annual Rugby  चैंपियनशिप   ,  along  साथ  southern-hemisphere counterparts Argentina ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   और   नई   जीलैंड   .
They have won  इस   चैंपियनशिप   on  three  अवसरों   in  sixteen  सालो   .
They are currently  क्रमित  second in  the   संसार   by  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   रग्बी  Board  ,   और  were named  2008   संसार   टोली  of  the   साल  at the Laureus World  खेल  Awards .
Although South Africa was  इंस्ट्रूमेंटल  in the creation of  the  Rugby  संसार   कप  competition ,  the  Springboks  किया   नहीं   compete  in the  पहला  two World Cups in 1987  और  1991 because of anti-apartheid sporting  boycotts  of  दक्षिण   अफ़्रीकी  .
The  टोली   बना   इसके  World  कप   डेब्यू   in   1995   ,  when  the  newly democratic  दक्षिण   अफ़्रीकी   hosted   the  tournament  .
The  springboks  then  पराजित  the  सब  Blacks  15–12  in the final ,  जिससे  is now remembered  as   एक   of  the greatest moments  in   दक्षिण  Africa  's   sporting   इतिहास   ,  and a watershed moment  in  the post-Apartheid nation-building process  .
South  अफ़्रीकी   regained   उनके  title  as   champions   12   सालो  later  ,   जब  they defeated  इंग्लैण्ड  15–6 in  the  2007 final  .
As a result  of   the  2007  संसार  Cup  टूर्नामेंट   the   springboks  were  प्रचारित  to first place in the IRB  संसार  Rankings  ,  a position they held until July the  following  year when New Zealand  regained  the top spot  .
the  Springboks play  in  green and gold  jerseys  ,  और  their  प्रतीक   हैं  the Springbok  और   the   protea   .
the  side has  महरूम  playing international rugby since 1891 , when  a  British  isles   पक्ष   toured  the nation  ,  playing  दक्षिण  Africa in  उनके  first  परीक्षण  on 30 July .
South  अफ़्रीकी  was coached by  जेक   श्वेत  , who led  the  Boks to the 2007 World  कप  title  ,  announcing his resignation  effectively   इससे   the   समाप्त  of 2007 .
His replacement 's (  पीटर  de Villiers )  अनुबंध   समाप्त  in 2011 ,  following  a 11–9 defeat  to  Australia  in   the  Rugby World Cup quarter-final  ,   जो  then stated he would  नहीं   be   हस्ताक्षर  a  नई   सौदे   .
the  previous captain was John  smit  ,  जो  before he retired in 2011  निभाई  hooker for  सबसे   of   उसके   करियर   ,   हालांकि   he  has also been a  prop   ,   मुख्यतः  in 2008  और  2009 .
Due  to  Smit  होने  unavailable  लिये  the November  2010  Tests after surgery , lock Victor Matfield  took  Smit 's place  as  captain for  कि   दौरे  .
The  वर्तमान  captain is  जां  de  villiers  .
The Battle of  gettysburg   (  , with an  ध्वनि   )  , was fought July 1–3 ,  1863  ,  in  and  around  the town  of  Gettysburg , Pennsylvania .
it  was  the  battle with  the  largest  क्रमांक  of casualties in the  अमरीकी   सिविल  War and is often  वर्णित   as  the war  's   turning  point .
Union  maj.   gen.  George  गॉर्डन  Meade  's   फौज  of  the  Potomac defeated attacks  by   confederate  Gen. Robert E.  ली  's Army of  उत्तरी  Virginia  ,  ending Lee 's invasion  of   the  North .
After  उसके   कामयाबी   at  Chancellorsville in  वर्जिनिया  in  may  1863  ,  Lee led his army through the Shenandoah  घाटी  to  शुरू   उसके  second invasion  of   the   north—the  Gettysburg Campaign  .
साथ   उसके   फौज  in high  आत्माओं  ,  ली  intended to  शिफ़्ट   the  focus of the  गर्मियाँ  campaign from war-ravaged  उत्तरी  Virginia  और   hoped  to influence  उत्तरी  politicians to give  up  their prosecution  of  the  युद्ध  by penetrating  as   दूर  as Harrisburg  ,   पेन्सिलवेनिया   ,   or  even Philadelphia  .
prodded   by  President Abraham Lincoln  ,  Maj.  gen.   जोसेफ  Hooker moved  उसके   फौज  in  pursuit  ,  लकिन  was relieved  बस  three  दिनों   पहले   the  battle and replaced  by  Meade .
तत्व   of   the   दो   सेना  initially  collided  at Gettysburg on July 1  ,  1863 , as Lee  तत्काल   concentrated   उसके   शक्तियां   वहीँ  ,  उसके  objective  होने  to  engage  the Union  फौज  and destroy it .
Low ridges  to  the  उत्तरपश्चिम  of town were  defended  initially by a Union  प्यादे  division under Brig .  gen.   जॉन   buford   ,  and soon  reinforced  with two  corps  of  संघ  infantry .
however  ,  दो  large Confederate corps assaulted them  इससे  the northwest and  उत्तर   ,  collapsing the  hastily  developed Union lines , sending  the  defenders retreating through  the  streets of town to the hills just  to  the south  .
On the  दूसरी  day  of   बैटल  , most of both armies had assembled .
the  Union  लकीर  was laid  आउट  in a  रक्षात्मक   गठन  resembling a  fishhook   .
in   the  late  दोपहर  of July 2  ,   ली  launched a  भारी  assault  on  the  संघ   बाएँ  flank  ,   और   fierce  fighting  raged  at  छोटी  Round Top  ,  the  wheatfield   ,   शैतान   's  Den ,  और   the   आड़ू  Orchard  .
on  the  संघ  right  ,  demonstrations  escalated   into  full-scale assaults on Culp 's  हिल  and  कब्रिस्तान  Hill  .
सब  across  the  battlefield  ,  despite  significant  losses , the Union  defenders  held their  लाइनों   .
On the  तीसरा  day of battle  ,  July 3 , fighting resumed on Culp 's  हिल  ,  और   प्यादे  battles raged  to  the  ईस्ट  and south , but the main  इवेंट  was  a  dramatic  infantry   उत्पीड़न  by  12,500   confederates   विरूद्ध   the   बीच  of  the  Union line on  कब्रिस्तान  Ridge , known as Pickett 's Charge .
the   चार्ज  was  repulsed   by   संघ   राइफल   और   तोपखाने  fire , at  ग्रेट   नुकसान   to  the Confederate  फौज  .
Lee  led  his  फौज  on a  torturous  retreat back to  वर्जिनिया   .
Between  46,000  and 51,000  सैनिको  from  दोनो   सेना   यहूद   हताहत  in the three-day battle  .
That  नवम्बर  , President  lincoln  used  the   समर्पण   रस्म  for the  gettysburg  National Cemetery  to  honor the fallen  संघ   सैनिको   और  redefine  the  purpose of the war  in  his historic  gettysburg   पता   .
An academic  अनुशासन  , or  फ़ील्ड  of study , is a  शाखा  of knowledge that  is   सिखाया   और   शोधकार्य  at  the  college or  विश्वविद्यालयों  level .
Disciplines  हैं  defined ( in part  )  , and recognized by the academic  जर्नल्स  in which  शोध  is published  ,  and  the  learned societies and academic departments or  faculties  to  जिससे  their practitioners  belong  .
however   ,   वहीँ   exists   no   औपचारिक   मापदण्ड  for when educational  कार्यक्रम  and  scholarly   जर्नल्स  form an academic discipline  .
A huge difference exists  between  , on  the  one hand , well  स्थापित  disciplines  कि   मौजूद   in  almost  सब   विश्वविद्यालयों  all over the world , have  a   long  history  ,   और  have a  खूब  established set of journals and  सम्मेलनों  , and  ,  on the  अन्य  hand , suggestions  लिये  new fields supported  तभी   by  few universities  और  publications .
फ़ील्ड   of  study usually have several sub-disciplines  or  branches  ,   और  the  distinguishing  lines between these are  प्रायः   दोनो  arbitrary and ambiguous  .
पीएचपी   is   a  server-side scripting language  designed  for  वेब   विकास   लकिन   भी   प्रयुक्त   as   a  general-purpose programming language .
PHP  is   अभी  installed  on   अधिक   than  244 million websites  और  2.1 million web  सर्वर  .
Originally created  by  Rasmus Lerdorf  in   1995   ,  the reference implementation  of  PHP  is  now  उत्पादित  by  the   पीएचपी   समूह  .
While PHP  originally  stood for Personal Home  पेज   ,  it  अभी  stands  लिये  PHP :  हाइपरटेक्स्ट   preprocessor  , a recursive acronym  .
PHP  कोड  is  interpreted  by  a  web server  साथ  a PHP  प्रोसेसर  module  जिससे  generates the resulting web page :  पीएचपी  commands can be  अंतःस्थापित   सीधे  into  an   एचटीएमएल   सोर्स  document  बल्कि  than calling an external  संचिका  to process  आंकड़ा  .
it  has also  विकसित  to  शामिल  a  command-line  interface capability  और  can be  प्रयुक्त   in   स्टैंडअलोन   आलेखीय   अनुप्रयोग  .
PHP is free  तन्त्र  released under the  पीएचपी   अनुज्ञा  ,  जिससे   is  incompatible  साथ   the  GNU General Public License ( GPL ) due to restrictions on  the  usage of the term  पीएचपी  .
PHP  can  be  तैनात  on  सबसे  web  सर्वर  and also as a  स्टैंडअलोन   शेल   on   लगभग  every operating system  और  platform  ,   फ़्री  of charge .
जॉन   fitzgerald  `` Jack '' Kennedy (  may  29  ,   1917  –  नवम्बर   22  ,  1963  )  ,  often  referred  to by his  आद्याक्षर   jfk   ,  was the  35th  President of  the  United States  ,   सेवारत  from 1961  जबतक  his death in 1963 .
After  सैन्य  service as  कमांडर   of   the  Motor Torpedo Boats PT-109  और  PT-59  दौरान  World War  ii  in  the   दक्षिण   प्रशांत  , Kennedy represented  मैसाचुसेट्स  ' 11th congressional district in  the   u.S.   हाउस   of   प्रतिनिधि   इससे  1947  to  1953  as   a   डेमोक्रेट   .
thereafter  , he  परोसा   in  the  u.S.   सीनेट  from  1953  until 1960  .
Kennedy defeated  वाइस  President  और   रिपब्लिकन   प्रत्याशी  Richard Nixon  in  the 1960 U.S. presidential election .
At 43 years of age  ,   he  is the youngest to have  महरूम  elected to  the   दफ्तर  , the second-youngest  अध्यक्ष   (  after  थियोडोर  Roosevelt ) , and the first  व्यक्ति  born in  the  20th  सदी  to serve as  अध्यक्ष   .
A Catholic  ,  Kennedy  is  the only non-  प्रोटोस्टेंट   अध्यक्ष   ,  and  is  the only president to have  जीती   a  Pulitzer  पुरस्कार  .
कार्यक्रम   दौरान   उसके  presidency  शामिल   the  Bay of Pigs Invasion  ,  the  क्यूबन  Missile Crisis , the building of  the  Berlin  वॉल  ,  the   स्पेस   रेस  , the  african-american  Civil Rights  गति   ,   और  early  चरण  of the Vietnam War  .
therein  ,  कैनेडी  increased  the  number  of  military advisers , special  आपरेशन  forces  ,  and helicopters in an  प्रयत्न  to curb the spread  of   साम्यवादी   in   दक्षिण  East Asia .
The Kennedy  प्रशासन   अपनाया  the policy of the  रणनीतिक   हैमलेट  Program which was  implemented   by   the   दक्षिण  Vietnamese  सरकारी  .
It  शामिल   निश्चित   मजबूर  relocation ,  गाँव  internment  ,  and  पृथक्करण  of rural  दक्षिण   वियतनामी  from  the   उत्तरी  and southern communist insurgents .
कैनेडी  was assassinated on November 22  ,   1963   in   डलास  , Texas  .
ली  Harvey Oswald  थी  charged  साथ  the crime ,  लकिन  he was shot  और  killed by Jack  माणिक्य  two days  बाद   ,   पहले  a  विचारण   could  take  प्लेस   .
The FBI and  the   वारेन  Commission  officially  concluded that  ओसवाल्ड  was the  लोन  assassin  .
However  ,  the United States  हाउस   चुनें   कमेटी  on Assassinations  (  HSCA  )   concluded   कि   those   investigations  were flawed and  कि  Kennedy  थी   संभवतः  assassinated  as  the result of  a   षड्यंत्र  .
However ,  एबीसी  News in  उनके  investigation ,  the   कैनेडी   हत्या   :  Beyond  षड्यंत्र   ,   पुष्टि  the findings of  the  Warren  आयोग  ; having concluded  ओसवाल्ड  acted  अलोन  .
कैनेडी   's  controversial Department  of  Defense TFX fighter  bomber   कार्यक्रम  led  to  a  congressional   छानबीन  that lasted  इससे  1963  to  1970 .
Since  the   1960s  information  concerning   कैनेडी  's  निजी   जीवन   रै  come  to  light .
विवरण  of Kennedy 's health problems in which  he  struggled have become better  ज्ञात  , especially  चूंकि  the 1990s .
हालांकि   initially  kept secret  इससे  the general  पब्लिक   ,   रिपोर्ट्स  of Kennedy  's  philandering  have   garnered  much  दबायें  .
Kennedy  बाँधने  highly  in  public opinion ratings of  u.S.   राष्ट्रपतियों  .
``  स्टैंड  by  me  ''  is   a   सोंग  originally  performed   by  Ben E.  किंग  and written by King ,  जेरी  Leiber , and Mike Stoller  ,  inspired by  the   आध्यात्मिक   ``  Lord Stand  by  Me  ,  '' plus  दो   लाइनों  rooted  in  Psalms  46:2–3  .
There have  महरूम  over  400   अंकित   संस्करण   of  the song  .
a   राजनैतिक   कार्टून  from an 1894 Puck magazine by illustrator  s.d  .  ehrhart  , shows  a  farm woman  labeled   ``  Democratic  पार्टी   ''  sheltering  इससे  a tornado  of  political  बदलें  .
a   रूपक   is  a  फिगर   of   वाक  that  describes   a   विषय  by asserting  कि   it   is  , on some point of  तुलना  , the  वही  as  another   वरना  unrelated object .
रूपक  is  a  type of analogy and is closely  सम्बन्धित   to   अन्य  rhetorical  आंकड़े   of   वाक   कि   achieve   उनके   प्रभाव   via   संघ   ,   तुलना   or   प्रतिरूप  including allegory ,  अतिशयोक्ति  ,  और  simile .
in   simpler   शर्तें   ,   a  metaphor compares two objects or things without using the  शब्द   ``  like '' or  ``  as  ''   .
एक  of the most  prominent  examples  of  a  रूपक  in  अंग्रेज़ी  literature is the All the world 's a  स्टेज  monologue from As  तुम  Like It :
All the world  's  a stage,
And all the men  और   महिलाओं  merely  खिलाड़ी   ;
They have  उनके   exits   और   उनके   entrances  ;  —   विलियम  Shakespeare , As You  जैसे   it   ,  2/7
This  उद्धरण   is  a  रूपक  because  the   संसार   is   नहीं  literally a  स्टेज  .
by   figuratively  asserting that  the   संसार  is  a  stage  ,  Shakespeare uses  the   अंक  of  तुलना  between the world and a stage to convey an  समझना  about  the  mechanics  of  the  संसार   और  the lives of the  लोगों  within it  .

rembrandt   वैन   rijn  , Self-portrait , etching , c.1630
Francisco Goya  ,  There  is   no  One  to   सहायता   उन्हें  , Disasters of War  श्रेणी   ,  aquatint c.1810
Felix  vallotton  ,  la  raison probante  (   the  Cogent Reason )  ,   woodcut   इससे  the series Intimités ,  1898
Printmaking is  the  process of  बनाना   artworks  by  मुद्रण  ,  सामान्यतः  on paper .
Printmaking  सामान्यतः  covers only  the  process of creating prints with an  तत्व  of originality  ,  rather than just being a  फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक  reproduction of  a  painting .
मगर   in   the   मामला  of monotyping ,  the   प्रक्रम  is capable  of  producing multiples  of   the   वही  piece , which is  पुकारा  a print .
Each print produced is not considered a  ``  copy '' but  बल्कि   is  considered an  ``  original  ''  .
This  is   क्युकी  typically  प्रत्येक   छपाई   varies   to  an extent due to variables  मूलभूत  to the  printmaking  process , and also because the  imagery   of   a  print is typically  नहीं   बस  a  जनन   of  another work but rather is often  a  unique  चित्र  designed from  the  start to be expressed  in  a  particular  printmaking  तकनीक   .
a   छपाई   may  be known as  an  impression .
printmaking  (  अन्य   than   monotyping  ) is not chosen only for its ability  to   उपज  multiple impressions  ,   लकिन   बल्कि  for  the   अद्वितीय  qualities  कि   प्रत्येक  of  the  printmaking  प्रक्रियाओं  lends  itself   to  .
prints  are created  by  transferring  स्याही  from a  मेट्रिक्स   or   through   a  prepared screen to  a  sheet of paper or other  सामग्री  .
Common  प्रकार  of  matrices   शामिल  :  मेटल  plates  ,   प्रायः  copper or zinc , or  पॉलिमर  plates for engraving  or  etching  ;  stone ,  एल्यूमिनियम  , or polymer  लिये   lithography  ;  ब्लॉक  of wood for woodcuts and  लकडी  engravings  ;   और  linoleum  लिये  linocuts .
Screens  बना  of  रेशा   or  synthetic fabrics are  प्रयुक्त  for  the   screenprinting  process  .
Other types  of  matrix substrates and related processes are discussed below .
Multiple  impressions  printed from the same  मेट्रिक्स  form an edition .
चूंकि   the  late 19th  सदी  ,  कलाकारों  have generally signed individual  impressions   इससे  an edition and often  क्रमांक  the impressions to form a  सीमित   संस्करण  .
prints   may   भी  be  मुद्रित   in  book form  ,  such as illustrated books  or   कलाकार   's  books .
il   divo   is  an  अंग्रेज़ी   बहुराष्ट्रीय   operatic   पॉप  vocal  समूह  created by music  मैनेजर  ,  कार्यपालिका   ,  and reality TV star  साइमन   cowell  .
Formed  in   the  United Kingdom ,  वे   हैं   भी   हस्ताक्षरित   to   cowell  's record label  ,  Syco  म्यूज़िक   .
Il  divo   is  a group of four  पुरूष   गायकों  : French  पॉप   सिंगर  Sébastien Izambard , Spanish  baritone  Carlos Marín ,  अमरीकी  tenor  दाउद   मिलर   ,  and Swiss  टेनर   उर्स   bühler  .
to   तिथि   ,   वे  have sold more  than   26   लाख  albums worldwide .
Su-15  ,  one of  the   प्रिंसिपल   सोवियत   एयर   रक्षा   interceptors   in  the 1970s and 1980s
An  interceptor   वायुयान  (  or   बस  interceptor )  is   a   प्रकार  of fighter  वायुयान  designed  specifically  to  prevent   मिशन   of  enemy aircraft ,  विशेषकर  bombers and  reconnaissance  aircraft ,  और  destroy them ,  relying  usually on great speed and  शक्तिशाली  armament .
होने  used  चूंकि  the First World  युद्ध   ,  after  the  late 1960s , interceptors became less  महत्वपूर्ण   due   to  shifting from bombers  to  intercontinental  बैलिस्टिक  missiles (  icbms  ) for  नाभिकीय  warfare .
a   वियतनामी  American ( ) is  an  American of Vietnamese  descent  .
They  मेक  up about  हाफ  of all  विदेशी  Vietnamese ( Người Việt Hải  ngoại  ) and  हैं  the fourth-largest  एशियाई  American group .
द्रव्यमान  Vietnamese  आव्रजन  to the United States started  बाद  1975 ,  बाद  the  समाप्त  of the Vietnam  युद्ध  .
Early  आप्रवासियों  were refugee boat people  fleeing  persecution or poverty  .
Forced  to  flee from their  मातृभूमि  and often  thrust  into poor  शहरी   पड़ोस   ,   ये  newcomers have  nevertheless  managed to establish strong communities in  a  short amount of  समय   .
More than  साठ   प्रतिशत  of Vietnamese  अमेरिकी  reside in the states of California , Texas  ,  Washington ,  फ्लोरिडा   ,  and Virginia  .

Adolf Hitler  वचनबद्ध  suicide by gunshot on  30   अप्रैल   1945   in  his Führerbunker in Berlin .
उसके   बीवी   एवा   (  née  braun  ) committed  आत्महत्या  with  उसे  by ingesting  साइनाइड  .
That afternoon , in accordance  साथ  Hitler  's  prior instructions ,  उनके  remains were carried up  the   सीढ़ियाँ   through  the bunker 's  आपात  exit  ,   doused  in petrol  और   नियत   alight  in the  reich   chancellery   गार्डन   बाहर  the  बंकर   .
The Soviet archives record that their burnt  remains  were  बरामद  and interred  in   successive   स्थितियाँ  until 1970 when  वे   यहूद   again   exhumed  , cremated  और  the ashes  बिखरे  .
Accounts differ  as   to  the cause of death ; one that  he  died by  ज़हर  only  और  another  कि  he died  by  a  self-inflicted   gunshot  , while  biting  down on  a   साइनाइड   कैप्सूल  .
Contemporary  इतिहासकारों   have   अस्वीकृत   ये  accounts  as   होने  either Soviet propaganda or  an   attempted  compromise  in  order  to  reconcile  the   अलग  conclusions  .
एक  eye-witness  अंकित  that the body  दिखाया   लक्षण  of  having   महरूम   शॉट  through the mouth ,  लकिन   इस  has  महरूम   सिद्ध   असंभावित  .
There is also controversy  regarding  the authenticity of skull  और  jaw  fragments  which were  बरामद  .
In  2009   ,   डीएनए  tests were performed on a  कपाल  Soviet officials  था   long  believed to be  हिटलर  's .
The tests revealed  कि  the  कपाल  was actually  कि   of  a woman  कम  than  40   सालो  old  .
स्थान  of  मिसौरी
The  दारू  laws of  मिसौरी   हैं  among  the  least  प्रतिबंधक  and most  lax  and  permissive  in  the  United  राज्य  .
Missouri is known throughout the Midwest for  इसके   largely   laissez-faire  approach to  दारू   विनियमन   ,   in  sharp contrast  to   the   बहुत  strict  दारू   कानून  of  कुछ  of its neighbors ,  जैसे  Kansas and  ओक्लाहोमा  .
Necrotizing fasciitis (  or   )  or NF , commonly known as  flesh-eating  disease  or  flesh-eating  जीवाणु  syndrome ,  is   a  rare infection of  the  deeper layers of skin  और  subcutaneous tissues ,  easily  spreading across the fascial plane within  the  subcutaneous tissue .
Necrotizing fasciitis  is   जल्दी   progressing  , having  वृहद  risk of  विकासशील   in  the immunocompromised due to  शर्तें   जैसे  diabetes  ,  cancer  ,  etc  .
It  is  a  कठोर   बीमारी   of  sudden onset and is usually treated immediately with high doses of  intravenous   एंटीबायोटिक   .
Type I  describes  a  polymicrobial   संक्रमण   ,   whereas   प्रकार  II  describes   a  monomicrobial  संक्रमण   .
Many  प्रकार   of  bacteria  can  cause necrotizing  fasciitis  (  e.g.  ,  समूह  A streptococcus  (  Streptococcus pyogenes  )  , Staphylococcus  aureus  , Clostridium perfringens , Bacteroides  fragilis  , Aeromonas hydrophila  )  .
Such infections  हैं  more  संभावित   to  occur in people with compromised  प्रतिरक्षा  systems .
historically  ,  समूह   a   streptococcus  made  up   सबसे  cases of  प्रकार   ii  infections .
However ,  चूंकि   as   जल्दी  as 2001  ,   another  serious  रूप   of   monomicrobial  necrotizing  fasciitis   रै   महरूम  observed with increasing frequency , caused by methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus  aureus   (   मरसा  )  .
Some published  मामला  reports have  implied   a   संभावित  link  between  use of  non-steroidal  anti-inflammatory drugs and  nf  ,  हालांकि   the   प्रमाण   of  the  कड़ी  was  कहा   to  be  कमजोर  because of a  छोटी   क्रमांक   of  case patients  और  it  थी  unclear  whether  the drugs just  नकाबपोश  the  लक्षण   of  a secondary  संक्रमण  or  यहूद  a  कारण   प्रति  se .
World War II  (   wwii  or WW2  )  ,  भी   ज्ञात  as the Second  संसार   युद्ध  , was a  वैश्विक   युद्ध  that  lasted  from 1939  to  1945  .
It  शामिल   the  vast majority  of  the world 's nations  —including   सब   of   the   ग्रेट  powers —eventually  forming  two opposing  सैन्य   alliances  : the  allies  and  the   अक्ष   .
It  थी   the  most  फैली   युद्ध   in  history  ,   साथ  more  than   100  million people  सेवारत   in   सैन्य   इकाई   इससे   over   30   अलग  countries .
in  a state  of  `` total  युद्ध   ``  , the major participants placed  उनके  entire economic , industrial ,  और  scientific capabilities at the service of  the   युद्ध   प्रयत्न   ,  erasing the distinction between civilian and  सैन्य  resources  .
चिह्नित   by   द्रव्यमान   मौतों  of civilians ,  सहित   the  Holocaust  और  the  तभी   उपयोग  of nuclear  हथियार   in  warfare , it  resulted  in 50 million  to  over  75  million  fatalities   .
ये   मौतों   मेक  World War  ii   by  far  the  deadliest  विरोध  in human history .
The  साम्राज्य   of   जापानी   aimed   to  dominate  ईस्ट  Asia and  थी  already  at  war  साथ   the  Republic of China in  1937  , but  the   संसार   युद्ध  is generally said  to   have  begun on  1   सितंबर  1939  साथ  the invasion  of  Poland by Germany  और  subsequent  घोषणाओं  of war on  जर्मनी   by  France  और   ब्रिटेन   .
From late  1939  to  जल्दी  1941 , in  a  series of campaigns and treaties , Germany  formed  the Axis alliance  साथ   इटली  , conquering or subduing much  of  continental Europe .
following   the   molotov–ribbentrop  Pact ,  जर्मनी   और   the   सोवियत   संघ   partitioned   और  annexed  territories  between  themselves   of   उनके   यूरोपीय  neighbours ,  सहित   कैंडल   .
the   संयुक्त   किंगडम  and the other  सदस्यों  of  the  British Commonwealth  यहूद  the only major Allied forces continuing the fight  विरूद्ध  the  अक्ष  ,  साथ   लड़ाइयों  taking place  in   उत्तर   अफ़्रीकी  as well  as   the   long-running  Battle of the Atlantic  .
in   जून   1941  ,  the  European Axis  शुभारम्भ   an   आक्रमण  of the Soviet  संघ  ,  giving  a  प्रारंभ  to the  largest  land theatre of  युद्ध  in history , which tied down the major part of  the  Axis  '  military forces for  the  rest  of   the   युद्ध   .
In December 1941 ,  जापानी   joined  the  अक्ष  ,  attacked  the United States and European territories in  the  Pacific Ocean  ,  and  जल्दी   conquered   much   of  the Western  प्रशांत   .
the  Axis advance  थी  stopped  in  1942 ,  बाद   जापानी  lost a  श्रेणी  of naval  लड़ाइयों  and  यूरोपीय   अक्ष   सैनिकों   यहूद  defeated  in  North Africa and , decisively , at  stalingrad   .
in  1943  ,  with  a  series of German  defeats   in  Eastern Europe  ,   the  Allied invasion  of  Italy  ,   और   अमरीकी   victories   in  the Pacific  ,  the Axis  खोया  the  पहल   और   undertook   रणनीतिक   रिट्रीट   on   सब  fronts .
in  1944 ,  the  Western Allies invaded France , while the Soviet Union regained all of  इसके   territorial   नुकसान  and  invaded  Germany  और  its  allies  .
During 1944  और  1945 the  संयुक्त   राज्य  defeated the Japanese Navy  और   captured  key Western  प्रशांत   आइलैंड्स  .
the  war in Europe ended with the  कैप्चर  of  बर्लिन  by  सोवियत  and Polish troops  और  the  subsequent  German  unconditional   आत्मसमर्पण  on 8  may  1945 .
following  the  पॉट्सडैम  Declaration  by  the  allies  on 26 July 1945  ,   the  United  राज्य  dropped atomic bombs  on   the  Japanese cities  of  Hiroshima on 6 August ,  और   नागासाकी  on 9 August .
साथ  an  आक्रमण  of the  जापानी  archipelago  निकट  ,  और   the   सोवियत   संघ  having declared war on Japan by  आक्रमणकारी  Manchuria  ,  Japan  surrendered   on  15  अगस्त  1945 , ending the  युद्ध   in   एशिया  and cementing  the  total victory  of   the   allies   over  the Axis .
संसार  War  ii   altered   the   राजनैतिक  alignment and  सोशल   ढांचा   of  the  संसार   .
The United Nations  (  UN ) was established to foster international cooperation and prevent  भविष्य   विरोध   .
The  ग्रेट  powers  कि   यहूद   the  victors of  the  war—the United States ,  the  Soviet Union  ,   चीन  , the  संयुक्त  Kingdom ,  और   france—became  the  स्थाई  members of  the  United  राष्ट्र   सुरक्षा  Council .
The Soviet  संघ  and  the  United States emerged as  प्रतिद्वंद्वी   superpowers  ,  सेटिंग   the  stage  लिये  the  ठंडा  War  ,  which lasted for the  अगला   46   सालो   .
Meanwhile  ,  the influence of  यूरोपीय  great  शक्तियां   प्रारंभ   to  decline  ,   जबकि   the   decolonisation  of Asia  और  Africa began  .
Most countries  जिनकी  industries had been  क्षतिग्रस्त  moved  towards  economic recovery  .
राजनैतिक   संयोजन  ,  विशेषकर  in  यूरोपीय   ,  emerged  as  an effort  to  stabilise postwar relations and  लड़ो  more  effectively   in   the  Cold  युद्ध  .
a  limited liability  कम्पनी  ( LLC )  is  a flexible  रूप  of enterprise that blends  तत्व  of  साझेदारी   और   कॉरपोरेट  structures .
नोट  than an  llc   is  not  a   निगम  , and  कॉलिंग   an  LLC a  निगम   is  technically  गलत  .
An LLC is  a   विधिक  form of company that  provides   सीमित   देयता  to  इसके  owners  in  the vast  बहुमत   of  United States  jurisdictions   .
LLCs do  नहीं  need  to  be organized  लिये  profit .
पाँच   k-cups
The inside of  a   प्रयुक्त   k-cup   ,  with the top foil  और   the   प्रयुक्त   कॉफी  grounds removed .
This shows the filter inside the K-Cup .
k-cup  portion  पैक  are used  साथ  Keurig  or  other  सिंगल  cup brewing systems to brew  a   कप  of coffee  ,  tea  ,  or  hot  chocolate .
प्रत्येक   k-cup  is a plastic container with  a   कॉफी  filter inside  .
Ground  कॉफी   सेम   हैं  packed in the K-Cup and  sealed   air-tight   साथ   a  combination plastic and foil lid .
जब  the K-Cup is placed in a  keurig  brewer , the brewer  punctures  the  foil   ढक्कन   और  the bottom of  the   k-cup  and  शक्तियां   hot  water under pressure  through   the  K-Cup  और   into   a  mug .
keurig   पंक्तियां  its  k-cup   प्रौद्योगिकी   to   कॉफी  roasters and  चाय  makers  ऐसे  as Green Mountain Coffee Roasters  ,   diedrich/   ग्लोरिया  Jeans  ,   टिमोथी   's  World  कॉफी  ,  वैन   houtte   ,   हिरण  Coffee  ,   celestial  Seasonings  ,   bigelow  Tea Company ,  twinings   ,   टली  's , Coffee  लोगों   और  Newman 's Own .
keurig   's  patents on  the  original K-Cup  डिज़ाइन   समाप्त  in  सितंबर   2012  .
Keurig holds  at  least  एक  additional , still-active US  पेटेंट  and another patent  अनुप्रयोग  ,  detailing   सुधार   कि   have   subsequently  been incorporated in  उनके   k-cup  design .

a   chronograph   is  a  विशिष्ट   प्रकार   of  watch  कि   is  used  as   a  stopwatch combined with  a  display  देखें   .
A  मौलिक  chronograph  रै  an independent sweep second hand ;  it  can be started  ,  stopped  ,  and returned  to   शून्य  by successive pressure  on  the  स्टेम  .
Louis Moinet invented the chronograph in  1816
Conventional PCI  (  PCI is an  initialism  formed from  परिधीय   घटक  Interconnect  ,  part  of  the PCI Local Bus standard  और  often shortened to just  पीसीआई  ) is  a  local computer bus for  attaching   हार्डवेयर  devices in  a  computer .
the  PCI bus  supports  the  कृत्यों  found on  a   प्रोसेसर  bus  ,  but in a standardized format  कि   is  independent  of  any particular processor .
Devices connected to the  बस  appear to the processor to be connected directly to the processor  बस   ,   और  are  आबंटित  addresses in the processor  's  address space .
संलग्न  devices can take either  the   रूप  of  an  integrated  सर्किट   fitted   onto  the motherboard itself , called a  planar   यंत्र  in  the  PCI  specification  ,  or  an  विस्तार  card that fits into  a   स्लॉट  .
The  पीसीआई  Local Bus  थी   पहला   implemented  in  ibm  PC  compatibles  , where  it  displaced the combination  of  ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as  the  bus configuration  .
it  has  subsequently   महरूम   अपनाया  for  अन्य  computer types  .
PCI  और   pci-x  are being replaced by  पीसीआई  Express , but  ,  most motherboards are  स्टिल  made with  एक  or more  पीसीआई  slots ,  जिससे   हैं  sufficient  लिये   अनेक  uses .
The  पीसीआई  specification  कवर   the  physical  आकार  of the bus ( including the size and spacing of  the  circuit  फलक   किनारे  electrical contacts ) ,  विद्युत  characteristics , bus timing , and protocols .
the  specification  can   be  purchased  इससे  the PCI Special  ब्याज   समूह   (  PCI-SIG ) .
ठेठ  PCI cards used in PCs  शामिल  :  संजाल   ताश  , sound  ताश  ,  modems  , extra  पोर्ट   ऐसे  as USB or  सीरियल  , TV tuner cards  और  disk  परिरक्षक  .
PCI video cards  replaced  ISA and VESA cards ,  जबतक   growing   बैंडविड्थ  requirements outgrew  the  capabilities of  पीसीआई   ;  the preferred interface for  वीडियो  cards became  अगप  , and  तब  PCI Express  .
PCI video  ताश  remain available  लिये   उपयोग   साथ   बूढ़ा   pcs   बगैर   अगप   or   पीसीआई  Express  स्लॉट   .
Many  डिवाइस   previously   provided   on  PCI expansion cards  हैं  now commonly integrated  onto   motherboards  or  उपलब्धियाँ   in  universal  सीरियल  bus and PCI  एक्स्प्रेस   संस्करण  .
Michael  whitaker  Smith ( born  अक्तूबर   7  , 1957  )   is   an  American contemporary  ईसाई  musician  ,  who  रै  charted primarily in  the   समकालीन   ईसाई   और   occasionally   in  the  मुख्यधारा  charts .
His biggest  कामयाबी   in  mainstream  म्यूज़िक  was in 1991 when ``  प्लेस   in  this  संसार   ''   hit  No  .  6  on  the  बिलबोर्ड   hot   100  .
स्मिथ   is  a three-time  ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार   विजेता  , and has earned 40 Dove Awards  .
Over  the  course  of   उसके  career , he  बेची  more than 13 million albums and  अंकित  29  no   .   1  Hit songs ,  चौदह   सुनहरा   एल्बम   ,   और  five platinum  एल्बम   .
स्मिथ   is  an  अमरीकी  Music Award  प्राप्तकर्ता   ;  he was  भी   नामित   एक  of  लोगों  magazine  's   ``   सबसे  Beautiful  लोगों   ''  .
An American  पोस्टर  from the  संसार  War II  -era  that was used  to  inform  लोगों  about what  वे  should do  if   वे   suspect  sabotage  .
Sabotage is a deliberate  कार्रवाई   aimed  at weakening another  एंटिटी  through  subversion  , obstruction ,  disruption  , or destruction .
In a  कार्यस्थल  setting , sabotage  is   the  conscious withdrawal  of   दक्षता  generally directed at  causing   कुछ  change in workplace  शर्तें  .
One who engages in  तोड़फोड़  is a saboteur .
As  a   नियम  , saboteurs try  to  conceal  उनके   पहचान   क्युकी   of   the  consequences of their actions .
लिये  example  ,   whereas  an  पर्यावरणीय  pressure  समूह   might   be  happy  to  be  पहचाना   साथ  an act of sabotage  ,  it would  नहीं   want   the   व्यक्तिगत   पहचान   of  the perpetrators known .
Patrick  हेनरी  College ( PHC ) is  a  private , independent  कॉलेज   साथ  an  धर्मान्तरण   ईसाई   आधार  that focuses on teaching  शास्त्रीय  liberal  कला  and government , located  in   purcellville  , Virginia , United States  .
Patrick  हेनरी  is known for  इसके  conservative  धर्मान्तरण  Christian  फ़ोकस   .
as  of April  17  , 2007 , the  कॉलेज   थी   accredited  by the  transnational   संघ   of  Christian  कॉलेजों  and  स्कूलों  , a  नेशनल  faith-related accrediting organization  पहचाना  by the Department of Education and  the  Council for Higher  शिक्षा  Accreditation  .
The school  थी   संस्थापित   साथ   the  help of the  घर  School Legal Defense Association , and now  serves   as  the headquarters for the organization  ,   साथ   जिससे   it   is  still closely connected .
The  इतिहास  of television comprises  the   कार्य   of   numerous   इंजीनियर्स  and inventors in  अनेक   देशों   over  many decades .
the   earliest  proposal  थी  in 1908 ,  in   a  paper by A  .   A.   campbell-swinton  and postulated  the   उपयोग  of cathode rays .
The first  व्यावहारिक  demonstrations of television ,  however  , were developed  using  electromechanical methods to  स्कैन  , transmit , and reproduce an image  .
as  electronic  कैमरा   और   प्रदर्शक   tubes  were perfected , electromechanical television  दिया  way to  all-electronic   प्रणालियों  in  nearly  all  अनुप्रयोग  .

a   फिल्म   थिएटर  ( also called a cinema ,  फिल्म  house ,  फिल्मी  house , film theater  or  picture house ) is a venue , usually  a  building , for viewing  films  .
Most but not  सब   फिल्म  theaters  हैं  commercial operations catering to  the   सामान्य  public , who attend by purchasing  a  ticket .
The movie is  प्रक्षिप्त  with  a   फिल्म  projector onto  a  large projection screen  at   the  front  of   the  auditorium .
Most movie theaters are now equipped for digital  सिनेमा   प्रक्षेप  , removing the need  to   बनाएँ  and  हस्तांतरण   a  physical  फिल्मी  print  .
दक्षिणी  California Norton  मालिक  's  क्लबों   on  California State  रूट  41 , near Creston .
A motorcycle  क्लबों   is   a   समूह  of  individuals   जिनकी   प्राथमिक   ब्याज  and activities involve motorcycles  .
lyme   बीमारी   ,  Lyme borreliosis  is  an infectious  बीमारी  caused by  at  least three species  of   जीवाणु   belonging  to the  genus  Borrelia .
borrelia  burgdorferi  sensu  stricto is the  प्रमुख   कारण   of   lyme  disease in  उत्तर  America , whereas Borrelia afzelii and Borrelia  garinii   कारण   सबसे  European  मामले   .
the   बीमारी   is   नामित   बाद   the  towns of Lyme and  बूढ़ा  Lyme , Connecticut , USA  ,   जहाँ  a number of cases  यहूद   पहचाना   in   1975   .
हालांकि  Allen  steere  realized that Lyme  बीमारी   थी  a  tick-borne  disease in  1978  , the cause  of   the   बीमारी  remained a  रहस्य   जबतक   1981   ,  when  B.  burgdorferi was identified  by  Willy  burgdorfer   .
Lyme disease is  the  most  आम   tick-borne   बीमारी  in  the  Northern  गोलार्ध   .
borrelia  is  transmitted  to humans  by  the bite  of  infected ticks belonging to a  few  species  of  the genus  ixodes   (  ``  मुश्किल   ticks  ''  )  .
जल्दी  symptoms  may  include  ज्वर  , headache  ,  fatigue , depression  ,  and a characteristic circular  स्किन   खाज   पुकारा  erythema migrans (  em   )   .
Left  अनुपचारित  , later symptoms may  involve   the  joints , heart ,  और  central  बेचैन   प्रणाली  .
in  most cases , the infection and  इसके   लक्षण  are eliminated  by   एंटीबायोटिक   ,  especially  if   the  illness is treated  जल्दी  .
Delayed or  अपर्याप्त  treatment can lead  to  more  गंभीर  symptoms  ,   जिससे   can   be  disabling and  मुश्किल  to treat  .

Penis  (   बहुवचन  penises or penes ) is a  सामान्य   पद  for the organs with which male  और   उभयलिंगी   पशु   introduce  sperm  into  receptive females  दौरान  copulation .
ऐसे  organs occur in  अनेक   पशु   ,  both vertebrate  और  invertebrate , but  males  do not bear a  शिश्न  in  प्रत्येक  animal species , and  in  those  प्रजाति  in  जिससे  the  पुरूष   करता  bear a  so-called  penis  ,  the penes in the  विभिन्न   प्रजाति   हैं  not necessarily homologous .
लिये   उदाहरण  , the  शिश्न   of  a mammal  is   at  most  analogous   to  the  शिश्न  of a male insect  or  barnacle  .
The term penis applies  to  many reproductive intromittent  अंगों  , but  नहीं  to  सब  ;  लिये   उदाहरण   the  intromittent organ  of  most  cephalopoda   is   the  hectocotylus , a specialised  भुजा  , and male spiders use  उनके   pedipalps   .
in   सबसे  species of animals in  जिससे   वहीँ  is  an   अंग  that  might  reasonably be described as  a  penis ,  it  has no major function other than  intromission  , or at least conveying  the  sperm to the female , but in  the  placental  स्तनधारियों  the penis  bears  the distal part of  the   urethra  ,  जिससे  discharges both urine  दौरान   urination  and semen during copulation as  the  occasion requires .
कलाकारों  and  रंगमंडल   (   a  &  r   )  is the  प्रभाग  of a  रिकार्ड   लेबल   or  music publishing company  कि   is   जिम्मेदार  for talent  बालचर  and  overseeing  the artistic development  of   रिकॉर्डिंग  artists and/or songwriters .
It  भी   अधिनियमों  as  a   liaison  between artists and  the  record  लेबल  or  प्रकाशन  company ; every activity  involving  artists to the point of album  रिलीज   is  generally  माना  under  the  purview of , and  जिम्मेदारी  of , A & R  .
a   furlong   is  a measure  of   अलहदा   in  imperial units  और   u.S.   प्रथागत  units  बराबर   to  one-eighth  of  a  मील  , equivalent to 220  गज  ,  660  feet  ,  40 rods , or 10 chains .
The  सटीक   मान   of  the furlong varies slightly  among  English-speaking countries .
पाँच  furlongs  हैं  approximately  1   किलोमीटर  (  1.0058  km is a  करीब  approximation )  .
Since the original  परिभाषा  of  the  metre was one-quarter of one ten-millionth of the  परिधि   of   the   धरती  (  साथ   the  great  वृत्त   coincident   साथ   the  meridian  of   देशांतर   गुजर   through  Paris ) ,  the   परिधि  of the Earth is about  40,000  km  or  about 200,000  furlongs   .

Lithium  बैटरी  are  डिस्पोजेबल  (  प्राथमिक  )  बैटरी  that have lithium metal or lithium compounds as an  धनाग्र   .
They stand apart  इससे  other batteries  in   उनके  high charge density ( long life  )   और  high cost per  ईकाई  .
depending  on the  डिज़ाइन  and chemical compounds used , lithium  कोशिकाएं  can produce  voltages  from 1.5  v  ( comparable  to  a  zinc–carbon   or  alkaline battery )  to  about 3.7 V. Lithium  बैटरी  are  widely  used in products such  as  portable consumer electronic  डिवाइस  .
Raymond `` Ray ''  चार्ल्स  Jack  lamontagne  ( ; born  जून   18  , 1973 ) is an American singer-songwriter  .
lamontagne   रै   released  four studio albums , Trouble , Till the  सूर्य  Turns  ब्लैक  , Gossip in the  अनाज   और   परमेश्वर   willin  '  &  the  क्रीक   do  n't  वृद्धि  .
He was born  in   नई  Hampshire and was inspired to create music after hearing an  एल्बम  by Stephen Stills .
Critics  have   compared   lamontagne  's  म्यूज़िक  to that  of   the  Band , Van  मॉरिसन  ,  उपनाम  Drake ,  और  Tim Buckley  .
He  जीवनदान  in  मैसाचुसेट्स  with his wife and  दो  children  .
जब  the  हवा  Blows  is  a novel  by  James  पैटरसन   .
it  is the precursor to The  झील  House  और   प्रेरित  the Maximum Ride series .
The  अनोखा  is  फिलहाल  set to be adapted  into  a  फिल्म  .
The  पिट्सबर्ग   स्टीलर्स  were founded  in  1933 .
Over the course  of  the  टोली   's   इतिहास  , the  टोली   रै  had  अनेक   लोगो   जबकि  wearing virtually the same uniforms  over  the years , with subtle changes made to give the  वर्दी   an  updated look .
the  team  रंगों  ,  वर्दी   ,   और  logo are often ranked  as  being among  the  best  in  the NFL .
Facebook on the Ad-tech  2010
Facebook  is   an  online  सोशल  networking service , whose  नाम  stems from  the   colloquial   नाम   लिये   the  book  दिए  to  विद्यार्थी  at the start  of  the academic  साल   by  some university  administrations  in the United  राज्य   to   सहायता   विद्यार्थी   मिलेंगी   to   जान  each other .
it  was  संस्थापित   in   फ़रवरी   2004  by Mark  zuckerberg  with  उसके   कॉलेज  roommates and fellow  हार्वर्ड   विश्वविद्यालयों   विद्यार्थी   एडुआर्डो   saverin  , Andrew McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz  और   क्रिस   ह्यूजेस   .
The website  's   सदस्यता   थी   initially  limited by the founders  to  Harvard students , but was expanded to  अन्य   कॉलेजों  in  the  Boston  क्षेत्रफल  , the Ivy League  ,  and  स्टैनफोर्ड  University .
It  धीरे   added  support for students at  विभिन्न   अन्य   विश्वविद्यालयों  before  खोलने  to  ऊँची  school  विद्यार्थी   ,   और   आखिरकार  to  anyone   aged  13  और  over .
Facebook now allows  कोई   उपयोक्ता   जो  declare  themselves  to  be  at  तनिक   13  years old to  become  registered  उपयोक्ता  of  the  site  .
उपयोक्ता   जरूर  register  पहले  using the  साईट   ,   बाद   जिससे  they may create a  निजी   प्रोफ़ाइल  ,  add   अन्य  users as  मित्रों   ,  and exchange  संदेश   ,  including  स्वचालित   सूचनाएं  when  वे   अद्यतन   उनके   प्रोफ़ाइल   .
Additionally  ,  users may join common-interest  उपयोक्ता  groups ,  व्यवस्थित   by   कार्यस्थल   ,   स्कूल  or college , or  अन्य   विशेषताएँ   ,  and categorize  उनके   मित्रों   into  lists such as ``  लोगों  From Work ''  or   ``   बंद  Friends  ''  .
As  of  September 2012 , Facebook has over one billion active users  .
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports survey , there are  7.5   लाख   children  under 13  साथ   खाते   और  5  लाख   अंतर्गत  10 ,  violating   the   साईट   's  terms of  सेवा  .
In  may  2005 , Accel partners invested $ 12.7 million in  फेसबुक  , and Jim Breyer added $ 1 million of his own money to the  घट  .
A January 2009  compete.com   पढ़ाई  ranked  फेसबुक  as  the   सबसे  used  सोशल   नेटवर्किंग   सेवा  by worldwide monthly  क्रियाशील   उपयोक्ता   .
Entertainment Weekly  शामिल  the site  on  its end-of-the-decade  ``   best-of  '' list , saying , `` How on earth did we stalk  हमारी  exes  ,   याद   हमारी   co-workers  ' birthdays  ,   कीड़ा  our friends , and  खेल  a rousing  खेल  of Scrabulous before Facebook  ?  ''
Critics , such  as   फेसबुक  Detox  ,  state that Facebook  रै   turned  into  a  national obsession  in  the United  राज्य  , resulting in vast amounts  of  time  खोया   और  encouraging narcissism .
Quantcast estimates  फेसबुक   रै  138.9 million monthly unique U.S. visitors in May 2011  .
According to Social Media  आज  ,  in   अप्रैल   2010  an  अनुमानित   41.6  %  (  129.5  लाख   )   of  the U.S. population  था  a  फेसबुक  account  .
Nevertheless , Facebook 's market growth started  to   स्टाल  in some regions  ,  with  the  site losing 7 million active  उपयोक्ता  in the United States  और  Canada in  may  2011 .
फेसबुक   आखिरकार  filed for an initial  पब्लिक  offering on February  1  ,  2012  , and was  headquartered  in Menlo Park  ,  California  .
Facebook  inc.  began selling stock to the public and trading on  the   नैस्डैक  on May 18 , 2012 .
Erwin  योहानेस  Eugen  ख़बरों   (  15 November  1891   –   14  October 1944  )  , popularly known  as   the   मरुस्थल   फॉक्स   (  Wüstenfuchs  ,   )   ,  was  a   जर्मनी  Field Marshal  of   संसार   युद्ध  II .
he   अर्जित   the  respect of both  उसके  own troops and  the  enemies  he   लड़ा  .
Rommel  थी   a  highly  सजा   अधिकारी  in  संसार  War I and was  awarded  the Pour  le  Mérite  लिये   उसके   कारनामे   on   the  Italian front .
In World War II  ,  he  further  distinguished  खुद  as the  कमांडर  of the 7th  panzer   प्रभाग   दौरान   the  1940 invasion of France .
His  नेतृत्व  of German and  इतालवी   शक्तियां   in   the   उत्तर  African  अभियान   स्थापित  him  as  one of the most  समर्थ  commanders of the war ,  और   अर्जित   उसे  the  appellation   of   the  Desert  फॉक्स  .
he  is regarded  as   एक  of  the   सबसे   skilled  commanders  of   मरुस्थल   warfare  in  the   विरोध   .
He later  commanded   the  German  शक्तियां  opposing the Allied cross-channel invasion in Normandy  .
उसके  assignments never  took  him  to   the   पूर्वी   सामने   .
Rommel  is  regarded as having  महरूम  a  दयालु  and  पेशेवर  officer .
उसके  Afrika  कोर्प्स   थी   never  accused of war crimes  ,  and soldiers  captured  during his  अफ़्रीकी  campaign  यहूद  reported  to  have  महरूम  treated humanely .
Orders  to  kill Jewish  सैनिको  , civilians  और  captured commandos  यहूद   उपेक्षित   .
लेट  in the war ,  ख़बरों  was linked to the conspiracy to  assassinate  Adolf  हिटलर   .
Since Rommel  थी  a national hero  ,  Hitler desired to eliminate him quietly .
He forced Rommel  to  commit  आत्महत्या   साथ  a cyanide pill  ,   in   वापसी   लिये   आश्वासनों   कि   ख़बरों   's  family would  नहीं   be  persecuted following his  मौत   .
Stained glass  प्रतिनिधित्व  of the Holy Spirit  as   a   dove  , c. 1660 .
The seven gifts of the Holy Spirit is an  enumeration   of   सात  spiritual  उपहार   originating  with patristic  लेखक  ,  बाद  elaborated  by  five intellectual virtues and four  अन्य   समूह  of  नैतिक  characteristics  .
वे  are  :   अक्ल  , understanding , wonder  और   डरते  ( fear  of  the  रब  ) ,  counsel  , knowledge ,  fortitude  , and piety (  reverence  ) .
The  धरती  Day Flag ,  the  latest proposal of John McConnell  लिये  a flag  of  Earth Day
Earth Day is an  सालाना   इवेंट  , celebrated on April 22  ,   on   जिससे  events  हैं   आयोजित  worldwide  to  demonstrate  support  for  पर्यावरणीय   सुरक्षा   .
It was  पहला   मनाये  in  1970  ,  और  is now coordinated globally  by   the   धरती  Day  संजाल   ,   और  celebrated  in  more  than   192  countries  प्रत्येक  year  .
in   1969  at a UNESCO  सम्मेलन  in San  फ्रांसिस्को  , the  तिथि  proposed was  कूच  21  ,   1970  ,  the   पहला  day of spring in the northern hemisphere  .
इस   दिन   of   प्रकृति  's  equipoise  was later  मंजूर  in a Proclamation signed  by   सचिव  General  u  Thant at  the   संयुक्त   राष्ट्र  .
A  माह  later a separate Earth  दिन  was  संस्थापित  by United  राज्य   सीनेटर  Gaylord Nelson as an  पर्यावरणीय  teach-in  पहला  held on  अप्रैल  22 , 1970 .
Nelson  थी  later awarded  the   अध्यक्षीय   पदक  of  स्वतंत्रता  Award in recognition of his work  .
जबकि  this April 22  धरती   दिन   थी  focused  on  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   ,  an organization launched by  डेनिस   हेज़   ,   जो  was the  असली  national coordinator  in   1970   ,  took  it   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  in 1990  और   व्यवस्थित   कार्यक्रम   in  141 nations  .
numerous  communities  celebrate   धरती   सप्ताह  ,  an  entire week of activities  केन्द्रित  on environmental issues .
Iodine  is   a  chemical element with symbol I and  परमाणु  number  53  .
the  name  is  from  यूनानी   ioeidēs  ,  अर्थ  violet or  जामुनी   ,  due  to  the color  of  elemental  आयोडीन   वाष्प  .
आयोडीन  and its compounds are primarily  प्रयुक्त   in   पोषण   ,  and industrially  in  the  उत्पादन   of   एसिटिक   एसिड   और  certain  polymers   .
Iodine 's  अपेक्षाकृत  high atomic number , low  toxicity   ,  and ease of  अनुलग्नक   to  organic  यौगिकों  have made  it  a  भाग  of many X-ray contrast materials in  आधुनिक  medicine .
आयोडीन   रै  only  एक  stable isotope .
A  क्रमांक   of   आयोडीन  radioisotopes are also  प्रयुक्त  in medical applications  .
आयोडीन  is found  on   धरती  mainly  as   the   अत्यधिक  water-soluble iodide  आयन   ,  I−  ,   जिससे   concentrates   it  in oceans  और  brine pools .
जैसे   the   अन्य  halogens ,  फ़्री   आयोडीन   occurs  mainly as  a  diatomic molecule I2  ,  and then  तभी  momentarily after  होने  oxidized from iodide by an oxidant like free  ऑक्सीजन  .
In the  ब्रह्मांड  and on  धरती   ,  iodine  's   ऊँची  atomic number makes  it  a relatively  विरल   तत्व   .
however   ,  its presence in ocean water has  दिए  it  a   भूमिका  in  जीवविज्ञान   .
It  is  the  अधिकतम   अनिवार्य  element utilized  widely  by life in  biological  functions ( only  टंगस्टन   ,  employed  in   एंजाइमों  by a  few  species  of   जीवाणु  ,  is  heavier )  .
Iodine  's  rarity  in   अनेक  soils , due to  आरंभिक   कम   प्रचुरता  as a  crust-element   ,   और  also leaching  of   घुलनशील   आयोडाइड   by   rainwater  ,  रै  led  to  many deficiency  समस्याएं  in land animals  और  inland  इंसान   populations  .
Iodine deficiency affects about two  अरब   लोगों   और  is the leading preventable cause of intellectual disabilities  .
आयोडीन   is  required  by  higher animals  ,  which  उपयोग  it  to   synthesize  thyroid  हार्मोन  , which contain  the   तत्व   .
Because  of  this function ,  radioisotopes  of iodine  हैं  concentrated in the  थायराइड   ग्रंथि  along with  nonradioactive  iodine  .
If  inhaled  ,  the  radioisotope  iodine-131  ,  जिससे  has a  ऊँची  fission  उत्पाद   उपज  , concentrates in  the  thyroid  ,  but  is  easily  remedied   साथ   पोटैशियम  iodide  उपचार  .
Lobbying (  भी   लॉबी  )  is   the   अधिनियम  of  attempting  to  influence   निर्णय  made by officials in the government  ,   सबसे   प्रायः  legislators  or  members  of   नियामक   एजेंसियों   .
lobbying   is   किया   by   अनेक   अलग  types  of  people  और  organized groups ,  सहित  individuals in the private  सेक्टर  ,  corporations  ,  fellow  legislators or  सरकारी  officials  ,   or  advocacy groups  (   ब्याज  groups  )  .
Lobbyists may be among a legislator 's  constituencies  , meaning  a   वोटर  or bloc  of  voters within his  or   उसके  electoral district  ,   or  not ;  वे  may engage  in  lobbying as  a   कारोबार   ,  or  नहीं   .
Professional lobbyists  हैं   लोगों  whose business is trying to influence  विधान  on behalf  of  a  समूह   or  individual who hires them .
individuals   और   nonprofit   संगठन   can  also  लॉबी  as  an  act  of  volunteering or as a  छोटी   भाग   of  their  सामान्य  job  (  for instance  ,   a  CEO  बैठक  with  a   प्रतिनिधि  about  a  project  महत्वपूर्ण  to  his/her  company  ,  or an activist  बैठक  with  his/her   विधायक   in  an  unpaid   क्षमता   )   .
Governments often define  और  regulate organized  समूह   lobbying  that has become influential  .
The ethics  और   नैतिकता   of  lobbying are  .
lobbying  is often  बोला   of   साथ   अवमानना   ,  when the implication is that people with  अत्यधिक  socioeconomic  शक्ति  are  corrupting  the law  (  twisting it  दूर  from  निष्पक्षता   )   in  order to serve their own conflict of  ब्याज   .
But  another   पक्ष   of   lobbying  is  बनाना  sure that  अन्य   '  interests  हैं   विधिवत   defended  against others ' corruption ,  or  even simply making sure that  अल्पसंख्यक   रूचि  are fairly defended against mere  जुल्म  of the majority  .
For  उदाहरण  ,  a  medical association  ,   or  a  व्यापार  association of health  बीमे  companies  ,  may  लॉबी  a  विधानमंडल   in  order to counteract the  influence  of  तम्बाकू   कंपनियाँ   ,   in  which  मामला  the lobbying would be  viewed  by most people as justified  (  duly  defending  against others  '   भ्रष्टाचार  ) .
The difficulty in  आरेखण  objective lines  between  which  lobbyists  are ``  शुभ  lobbyists '' and  जिससे  ones  हैं  `` bad  ones  ''  is  compounded  by   the  cleverness  साथ  which lobbyists or their  क्लाइंट   can  argue that their  अपना  lobbying is of the ``  शुभ   ''  kind .
At  दिल  , the  प्रयत्न  to influence  विधान  is a power  संघर्ष   .
As  in   अन्य  forms  of  power  संघर्ष  , such  as  war  or   विधि   प्रवर्तन  , motives range  इससे  to  self-defense  to  लड़  for justice  ,  and the dividing  लकीर  between  predation  and justice  is  subject to rationalization  .
Sunshine of your love  गिटार  riff
मलाई   यहूद   a  1960s  अंग्रेजों  rock supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist Jack Bruce  ,   guitarist/vocalist   eric   क्लैप्टन   ,  and  वादक  Ginger Baker .
Their sound  थी  characterised  by  a  संकर  of blues  चट्टान  ,  मुश्किल  rock  और   साइकेडेलिक  rock  ,   combining  the psychedelia-themed lyrics  ,  Eric  क्लैप्टन  's  ब्लूज़  guitar playing and vocals , Jack Bruce  's   आवाज़   और   prominent  bass  playing  and  अदरक  Baker  's   जैज़  -influenced  drumming  .
The  समूह   's   तीसरा  album , Wheels of  आग   ,  was  the  world  's  first  platinum-selling  double album  .
Cream  हैं  widely regarded as being  the  world 's first successful  supergroup   .
In their career  ,   वे   बेची   over   15   लाख   एल्बम   विश्वव्यापी  .
Cream  's   म्यूज़िक   शामिल  songs based on traditional  ब्लूज़   ऐसे   as  `` Crossroads  ``   और   ``   spoonful   ``  ,  और  modern blues  ऐसे  as  ``   born  Under a  ख़राब  Sign `` , as  खूब  as more eccentric songs  ऐसे  as `` Strange  काढ़ा  `` , ``  किस्से  of  वीर  Ulysses `` and  ``  Toad ``  .
Cream  's  biggest  हिट्स  were `` I Feel Free `` ( UK ,  क्रमांक  11 ) , ``  सनशाइन  of Your  प्रेम  ``  (   us  , number  5   )   ,  `` White Room ``  (   us  ,  क्रमांक   6  ) , `` Crossroads  ''  ( US , number  28  )  ,   और  `` Badge `` ( UK , number 18 ) .
Cream  बना   a  significant impact on the popular music of the  समय  , and ,  साथ  with Jimi  हेंड्रिक्स  ,  और  Terry Kath  of  Chicago ,  popularised   the  use of the wah-wah  पैदल  .
They  provided   a   भारी  yet technically proficient musical theme that  foreshadowed  and influenced  the  emergence  of   अंग्रेजों  bands such  as  The Jeff  बेक  Group in the late 1960s  .
The band  's  live  प्रदर्शन   बहकावे   प्रगतिशील   चट्टान  acts such as Rush .
Cream were  inducted   into  the  चट्टान  and Roll  हॉल  of  कीर्ति  in  1993  .
वे   यहूद  included in both  रोलिंग   स्टोन  and  vh1  's  सूचियाँ  of  the  `` 100  महानतम  Artists  of  All Time  ''  .
वे  were  भी  ranked  क्रमांक   16  on  vh1  's  ``   100   महानतम  Artists  of  Hard Rock  ''  .
hairspray   is  a 1988 comedy  फिल्मी   लिखा  and directed by John Waters  ,   और  starring Ricki Lake  ,  Sonny  बोनो  , Debbie Harry  ,   माइकल   st.  Gerard , Shawn Thompson ,  colleen   fitzpatrick  ,  जेरी  Stiller  ,  and  in  his last film role  ,  Divine .
hairspray   थी  a  नाटकीय  departure  इससे   waters   '  earlier works , with a much broader intended  दर्शक  .
in  fact , Hairsprays  pg  is  the   mildest  rating a Waters  फिल्मी   रै   प्राप्त  ;  सबसे  of his previous films were rated  x   by  the MPAA  .
Set  in  1962 Baltimore ,  मेरीलैंड  , the film revolves around self-proclaimed  ``  pleasantly  plump  '' teenager Tracy Turnblad  as  she pursues stardom as a dancer  on   a   लोकल   tv  show and rallies  विरूद्ध  racial  पृथक्करण  .
Hairspray was only  a  moderate success upon its  आरंभिक  theatrical  रिलीज  , earning a modest gross of  $   8  million  .
However  ,   it   प्रबंधित  to attract  a   larger   दर्शक   on   घर  video in the early 1990s and became a cult classic  .
Most  आलोचकों   praised   the  film  ,   हालांकि   कुछ  were displeased with  the   overall   campiness  .
In 2002  ,   the   फिल्मी   थी  adapted into a  ब्रॉडवे   musical  of  the  same name , which  जीती   आठ  Tony Awards  ,  including Best  musical   in  2003  .
a   दूसरी   फिल्मी  version  of  Hairspray  ,  an  अनुकूलन  of the stage musical , was  भी   released   by  New  लकीर  Cinema in 2007  ,  which  शामिल  many changes of  scripted   वस्तुएं  from the original .
The film also ranks #  444  on Empire  पत्रिका  's  2008  list  of  the 500 greatest movies of all  समय  .
A Christian  denomination  is  an   identifiable   धार्मिक   देह  under a  आम   नाम   ,   ढांचा  , and doctrine  भीतर   christianity   .
कुछ   समूह  included do not consider themselves a denomination  (  e.g.  ,  the  कैथोलिक   गिरिजाघर   considers  itself the one true church and the Apostolic  देखिए  , and as pre-denominational )  .
Some groups viewed  by  non-adherents as denominational  actively  resist  होने  called a  denomination   और  do not have any formal denominational  ढांचा  , authority ,  or  record-keeping beyond the local congregation ; several  समूह   भीतर  Restoration Movement  पतन   into  this  श्रेणी   .
कुछ   समूह  are  विशाल   (   e.g  . Catholics  ,  Lutherans  ,  Anglicans or Baptists ) , while others  हैं  just a few small churches , and  in  most  मामले  the relative size is  नहीं  evident in  इस  list .
आधुनिक  movements such as  fundamentalist  Christianity  ,  Pietism , Evangelicalism  ,  Pentecostalism and the  पवित्रता   गति  sometimes cross denominational  लाइनों  , or in some cases  बनाएँ  new denominations out of  दो   or  more continuing groups , (  as  is the case  लिये   अनेक  United and uniting churches  ,   लिये  example ) .
ऐसे  subtleties  और   complexities  are not clearly depicted  यहाँ  .
Major  विभाजन  within  christianity   .
Note : This is  नहीं   a  complete list ,  लकिन  aims  to  provide  a   comprehensible  overview of  the  diversity  among  denominations of Christianity .
As there are  reported  to be  लगभग   41,000  Christian denominations ,  अनेक   of  which can  नहीं   be  verified  to   be  significant  ,  only  those   denominations   साथ   विकिपीडिया  articles will be listed  in  order to  ensure  that all entries on  इस   सूची  are notable and  verifiable  .
Between denominations ,  theologians   ,  and comparative religionists  वहीँ   हैं   considerable  disagreements  परिचय   जिससे  groups can be  properly   पुकारा  Christian ,  मतभिन्नता   arising  primarily from  doctrinal   मतभेद  between  समूह  .
For  the  purpose of  सादगी  , this  सूची  is intended  to   प्रतिबिंबित  the self-understanding  of  each denomination .
Explanations of  अलग   राय  concerning their status as  ईसाई  denominations  can   be  found at their respective  आलेख  .
There  is  no  आधिकारिक  recognition  in  most parts of the  संसार  for religious bodies , and there is no official clearinghouse which  could  determine  the  status  or   respectability   of  religious bodies  .
Often  वहीँ  is considerable disagreement between various  चर्च   परिचय  whether other churches should be  labeled   साथ  pejorative terms such as  ``  cult '' ,  or   परिचय   whether  this  or  that  समूह  enjoys some measure of respectability  .
Such  considerations  often  vary  from place to  प्लेस   ,  where  एक   धार्मिक  group may  आनंद   बहुमत   औकात   in   एक  region , but be widely regarded as  a  ``  खतरनाक  cult  ''  in  another   भाग   of  the world .
समावेश   on   इस  list does  नहीं   indicate  any judgment about the  आकार   ,  importance  ,  or character of a group or its members  .
1804  मैप   of  ``  louisiana   ``  , edged  on  the  वेस्ट   by  the  रॉकी   kyu   .
the  Louisiana  खरीदें  (  ``  Sale of Louisiana  ''  )  थी   the  acquisition by the United States of  अमेरिका  in 1803 of of France 's  अर्जी  to  the   territory  of Louisiana .
The  u.S.  paid 50 million  francs  ( $ 11 ,250,000 )  प्लस  cancellation of debts  लायक  18  लाख  francs ( $  3,750,000   )  , for a  कुल  sum  of   15   लाख   डॉलर   (  less than  3  cents  प्रति   एकड़  ) for the Louisiana  territory  ( $  लाख   in   डॉलर  , less  than   42  cents per  एकड़  ) .
the  Louisiana territory  encompassed  all  or  part  of   15  present U.S. states  और  two  कनाडाई  provinces  .
The land  खरीदा   contained   सब   of  present-day Arkansas , Missouri  ,  Iowa ,  ओक्लाहोमा  , Kansas , and Nebraska  ;  parts of  मिनेसोटा  that  यहूद  west of the  मिसिसिपी  River ;  सबसे  of North Dakota  ;  most of South  डकोटा   ;   northeastern  New Mexico ;  उत्तरी   टेक्सास   ;  the portions  of   मोंटाना  , Wyoming , and Colorado  ईस्ट  of the Continental Divide ;  louisiana  west  of  the Mississippi  नदी   ,  including the city of  नई  Orleans ;  और   छोटी  portions  of  land that would  आखिरकार   become  part of  the  Canadian  प्रांतों  of  अलबर्टा  and Saskatchewan .
France controlled this vast area from 1699 until 1762  ,  the  साल  it  दिया  the  territory  to its  ally  Spain .
अंतर्गत  Napoleon  बोनापार्ट  , France took  वापस  the territory  in  1800 in  the  hope  of   भवन  an  साम्राज्य  in  उत्तर  America .
A slave revolt  in  Haiti and  an  impending  युद्ध   साथ   ब्रिटेन   ,  however , led  फ़्रांस  to  लापरवाही  these plans and sell  the  entire territory to  the  United States , who  था  originally  intended  only to  तलाश  the purchase  of  New  ऑरलियन्स  and  इसके  adjacent lands .
The purchase of the territory of  louisiana   took  place during  the  presidency of Thomas Jefferson  .
At the time , the purchase  faced  domestic  विपक्ष  because it  थी  thought to be  असंवैधानिक   .
Although he agreed that the  u.S.  Constitution did not contain  प्रावधानों   लिये  acquiring territory ,  जेफरसन   decided  to go ahead  साथ  the purchase  वैसे  in  अनुक्रम   to   हटाएँ  France  's  presence  in  the  प्रदेश  and  to  protect  दोनो   u.S.  trade  अभिगम  to the  बंदरगाहों   of   नई   ऑरलियन्स  and  फ़्री   ड्योढ़ी   on   the   मिसिसिपी   नदी   .
Ceremony at Place d'Armes  ,  New Orleans marking transfer of Louisiana to the United  राज्य   ,   10   कूच   1804   ,   as   चित्रित   by  Thure de  thulstrup   .
``  Cool  झटका  '' is  a  popular  सोंग  written  by  Donald Storball  और  originally performed by The Capitols  .
Released in  1966  ,  it   पहुँचे  No  .   2   on  the American R & B  चार्ट  and  no   .   7  on  the   पॉप  chart .
The  बैकिंग   track   लिये   इस  song  थी  actually recorded (  secretly  )  by   the  Motown house band  the   दुर्गंध   भाइयो  .
प्रति  one of the Funk  भाइयो   ,   the  song  थी  originally to  be   पुकारा  ``  pimp  Jerk . ''
इस  was  लिया   इससे  watching  पड़ोस   pimps  , who  होता  dance  in   the  clubs ,  लकिन   यहूद  too `` cool  ''  to do the  झटका   जैसे   नियमित  folks  .
Their  संस्करण   थी  subsequently  नामित  ``  the  Pimp Jerk  .  ''
The producer was afraid that  a   सोंग   साथ  the word  pimp  in  the  title would be  बैन  or  नहीं   प्राप्त   much  positive attention , and had the title changed  to  its  वर्तमान  form  .
the   go-go  's , Todd Rundgren , Big Trouble , Human  यौन  Response  ,   the  La  de  Da 's  ,  The  सृष्टि  , and  the   coasters   have   covered  the song  .
Todd  rundgren   किया   उसके   संस्करण   in  an  विषम  time signature (  7/4  ) , giving an obviously  jerky  feel to the song .
The  go-go   's   covered  the  सोंग   लिये   उनके  1982  एल्बम   अवकाश   और  later re-recorded  it   लिये  their  1990   एल्बम   महानतम  .
in  the feature film  घर   अलोन  2 :  खोया  in New  यॉर्क  ,  ताऊ  Frank  (   gerry   bamman   )  sings  ``   कूल   झटका   ''   in  the  बरसात  .
A version  of  the  सोंग  with different lyrics  (  ``  do  the Cool  चाबुक  ''  )   is   प्रयुक्त   in   कूल  Whip  commercials   .
A recording  of  `` Cool  झटका   ''  by  रिकार्डो   रे  is featured  in  the feature  फिल्मी  Donnie Brasco  (  1997  )  .
The  सोंग   सुविधाएँ   in  the film Standing  in  the Shadows of Motown  ,  performed by the Funk  भाइयो  with  सीसे  vocals by  bootsy  Collins .
the  song is heard briefly in the  एनिमेटेड  feature , Madagascar  3   :   यूरोपीय  's Most  चाही   .
Despite  इस   कारण   ,  it is  सूचीबद्ध   in  some variations  of   the  film 's  साउंडट्रैक  .
a  league is a  ईकाई  of  लंबाई   (  or ,  rarely   ,   क्षेत्रफल   )   .
It was  long  common in Europe and Latin America , but it is no longer an official unit in any nation .
The league originally referred  to  the distance a  व्यक्ति  could walk  in   an  hour  .
चूंकि  the Middle Ages , many values have been specified  in  several  देशों  .
in   the   कॉन्टेक्स्ट   of   nautical   दूरियाँ  , the  3  mile ( 4.8 km  )  distance corresponds to  कैसा   दूर   an  observer of average  ऊँचाई  ( 5'9 '' or  1.78   m  ) can  देखिए  when standing at  समुद्र  level .
यूँ  , a ship  traveling   एक  `` league ''  रै  reached what was previously the farthest visible  अलहदा  on  the   क्षितिज  .
the  lack of  a  historical and  वैश्विक   मानक  for the  सटीक  measure of  a  ``  लीग  ''  can  be accounted for  by   the   परिवर्तनीय   उन्नयन   of   the  observer ( i.e. , sightings  इससे   a  ship 's  डेक   vs.   masthead  )  .
The Irish state  आए  into being  in  1922  as  the Irish  फ़्री  State ,  a   डोमिनियन  of  the   अंग्रेजों  Commonwealth  ,  having seceded from  the  United Kingdom  अंतर्गत   the  Anglo-Irish Treaty .
It  comprises   26  of Ireland  's  32 counties  .
चूंकि  1949 it has existed as the  गणतंत्र   of  Ireland  .
इससे  its  न्यास  ,  the   आयरिश   फ़्री  State was  embroiled  in  a   सिविल   युद्ध  between nationalists supporting the Treaty  और   प्रतिद्वंद्वियों  who supported a republic  .
the  pro-Treaty side , organised  as  Cumann na  ngaedheal  emerged victorious from  the  conflict and won subsequent  चुनावों  .
They formed the government  of  the state  जबतक  1932  ,  when  वे   शांतिपूर्वक   हात   over  power to  the  anti-Treaty  गुट   in  Fianna  fáil   ,   जो  defeated them in an election .
the  Irish  राज्य   ,   despite   इसके  violent  beginnings  ,  रै  remained a  उदार   लोकतंत्र  throughout  इसके  existence  .
A new constitution in  1937   removed   अनेक  of the  कड़ी  with Britain  स्थापित  under  the  Treaty and  आयरलैंड  's neutrality in  the  Second World  युद्ध  demonstrated its independence in  विदेशी   नीति  matters  इससे  Britain .
In 1948 Ireland  formally   बाएँ  the  अंग्रेजों   राष्ट्रमंडल  and  अपनाया  the title  of  `` Republic ''  .
in  the  आर्थिक  sphere , the Irish state has had a mixed performance  .
On independence , it  थी   एक  of the  wealthier   देशों  in Europe  प्रति  head of  जनसांख्यिकी  .
However  it  also  inherited  from British rule  the   समस्याएं   of  unemployment  ,  emigration , uneven  भौगोलिक  development  और  lack of  a  native  औद्योगिक   आधार  .
For  much   of  its history ,  the   राज्य   struggled  to rectify  ये   समस्याएं  .
particular  peaks of emigration were  अंकित  during the  लेट  1930s , 1950s  और  1980s  ,  when  the   आयरिश   अर्थव्यवस्था   अंकित  little  विकास   .
In the  1930s   ,   fianna   fáil  governments  attempted   to  create  आयरिश   घरेलू  industries using  subsidies   और  protective tarifs  .
in   the   लेट   1950s  ,  ये   नीतियों  were  dropped   in   पक्ष   of   फ़्री  trade  साथ   चयनित  countries  और  encouraging  of   विदेशी   निवेश  with  कम  taxes  .
इस   थी  expanded when Ireland  डाला  the  यूरोपीय  Economic  जातियाँ   in   1972   .
In  the  1990s and  2000s   ,   आयरलैंड   अनुभवी   an  economic  बूम  known  as  the Celtic  बाघ   ,  in which the  देश  's  जीडीपी  surpassed  अनेक  of its European neighbours .
Immigration  भी   surpassed   करणों   ,  bringing the  राज्य  's population up  to  over 4 million  .
however  ,  चूंकि  2008  ,  Ireland  रै  experienced a  कठोर   संकट   in   the   बैंकिंग   सेक्टर  and  साथ  sovereign debt .
The resultant economic slump has  deepened   the  effect  of  the world  मंदी   on  Ireland .
इससे  1937  to  1998  ,  the Irish constitution  शामिल   a   अर्जी   on  Northern Ireland  as   a   भाग  of the  नेशनल  territory .
However , the state also opposed  और  used  इसके  security forces against  those  armed groups - principally the Provisional Irish  रिपब्लिकन  Army , who  आजमाया  to unite Ireland  by   फ़ोर्स  .
This  occurred   in  the 1950s , throughout the 1970s and 1980s and has continued on  a   घटाया  scale .
आयरिश   सरकारें  meanwhile  आजमाया   to  broker  an  agreement  to  the conflict known as  the   परेशानियों   भीतर   उत्तरी   आयरलैंड   इससे   1968  to  the  late 1990s  .
The  अंग्रेजों  government  officially  recognised  the   सही  of  the   आयरिश  government  to   be   a  party to the Northern negotiations in the Anglo-Irish Agreement of 1985 .
in   1998   ,  as  भाग   of  the  शुभ   शुक्रवार  Agreement , the  आयरिश  constitution was altered by referendum to  हटाएँ   the  territorial  अर्जी  to Northern Ireland and instead  extend  the right  of  Irish  नागरिकता   to  all  the  people of the  द्वीप   चाहिए  they wish  to   have   it   .
जॉन  Quincy  एडम्स  (  जुलाई  11 , 1767February  23   ,   1848   )   थी  the sixth  अध्यक्ष  of  the  United  राज्य   (  1825–1829 ) .
he  served as American diplomat  ,  Senator , and Congressional  प्रतिनिधि  .
He was a member  of  the Federalist  ,  Democratic-Republican  ,  National  रिपब्लिकन   ,  and  बाद  Anti-Masonic and  whig  parties .
Adams  थी  the son  of   पूर्व   अध्यक्ष  John  एडम्स  and Abigail Adams .
as  a  राजनयिक  , Adams  निभाई  an  महत्वपूर्ण   भूमिका   in  negotiating many international treaties ,  सबसे  notably the  सन्धि  of  ghent   ,  which ended  the  War  of  1812 .
As Secretary of State ,  he  negotiated  साथ  the United  किंगडम   over  America  's   उत्तरी  border with Canada  ,  negotiated  साथ  Spain the  annexation  of Florida , and authored the Monroe Doctrine  .
इतिहासकारों   सहमत  he was one  of  the greatest diplomats and  secretaries   of  state in  अमरीकी   इतिहास   .
as  president ,  he   sought  to modernize the American economy and  प्रचारित  education .
एडम्स  enacted a part of  उसके   कार्यसूची  and  सशुल्क   बंद   much  of the  नेशनल  debt  .
He  थी  stymied by a Congress controlled  by  his enemies  ,   और  his  कमी  of  patronage  networks helped politicians eager to undercut him  .
he  lost  उसके   1828   बोली  for  re-election   to  Andrew Jackson  .
In  doing   so  ,  he  became the first  अध्यक्ष  since his father  to  serve  a   सिंगल  term .
एडम्स  is  बेहतरीन  known  as   a  diplomat  जो  shaped America  's   विदेशी   नीति   in  line with  उसके   ardently   राष्ट्रवादी  commitment to America  's  republican  मान   .
अधिक   recently  Howe  (  2007  )  portrayed  एडम्स  as the exemplar and moral leader  in  an era of modernization .
दौरान   एडम्स   '   आजीवन  , technological innovations  और  new means  of   संचार  spread messages of religious  पुनरुद्धार  , social reform  ,   और  party politics .
Goods ,  धन  ,  और  people traveled more  rapidly  and  efficiently   than  ever before  .
Adams  थी  elected a  u.S.   प्रतिनिधि  from Massachusetts after  leaving  office  ,  serving for  the   पिछला   17  years  of  his  जीवन  with far greater acclamation than he  था  achieved  as   अध्यक्ष   .
he  is , so far  ,   the   तभी  president later elected to  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   हाउस   of   प्रतिनिधि  ( though John Tyler  थी   निर्वाचित   to  the House of Representatives of  the  Confederate  राज्य  just before his  मौत  in 1862  )  .
एनिमेटेड   by   उसके  growing  revulsion  against slavery , Adams  became  a  अग्रणी   प्रतिद्वन्दी   of  the Slave Power .
he  predicted  कि   if   a  civil war  यहूद  to break  आउट   ,  the president could  abolish   गुलामी   by   using  his war powers  .
Adams also  पूर्वानुमानित   the  Union 's dissolution  over  the slavery  समस्या   ,   लकिन   कहा  that if  the   दक्षिण  became  स्वतंत्र  there would be a series  of  bloody slave revolts  .
Windows Internet  एक्सप्लोरर  9 ( IE9 ) is a  संस्करण  of the  अंतरजाल  Explorer web browser from  microsoft  .
It  थी   released  to the public on March 14  ,  2011 .
Microsoft  रै   released   अंतरजाल  Explorer 9  as  a  प्रमुख  out-of-band version  कि  is  नहीं  tied to the release schedule  of  any  particular   संस्करण  of Windows ,  नापसंद   पिछला  versions  .
It  is  the  पहला  version  चूंकि  Internet  एक्सप्लोरर  2  to  not  be   bundled  with a Windows  ऑपरेटिंग  system , although some OEMs have installed  it   साथ   खिड़कियाँ  7 on  उनके  PCs ,  as   खूब  as  नई  Windows 7  लैपटॉप  .
The system requirements  लिये  Internet Explorer 9 are  खिड़कियाँ  7 , Windows Server  2008   r2  ,  खिड़कियाँ  Vista Service  पैक  2  or   खिड़कियाँ  Server  2008  SP2  साथ  the Platform Update  .
खिड़कियाँ   xp   और  earlier are not supported .
Internet Explorer 9  is  the last version of Internet Explorer  to  be supported on Windows Vista .
दोनो   ia-32  and x64 builds are  उपलब्धियाँ  .
Internet  एक्सप्लोरर   9   supports   अनेक   सीएसएस  3  गुण  ,  अंतःस्थापित   आईसीसी   v2   or  v4 color profiles  support   via   खिड़कियाँ   रंग  System , and  रै  improved JavaScript performance .
It  is  the last  of   the  five  प्रमुख   वेब   browsers  to  implement  support for Scalable Vector Graphics  (  SVG ) .
It also  सुविधाएँ   hardware-accelerated   ग्राफिक्स  rendering using Direct2D ,  hardware-accelerated   टेक्स्ट  rendering using DirectWrite  ,   hardware-accelerated   वीडियो   रेंडरिंग  using  मीडिया  Foundation  ,  imaging  support  provided  by   खिड़कियाँ  Imaging Component  ,  and high fidelity printing  संचालित   by   the   xml  Paper  specification   (   xps  )  छपाई   पाइपलाइन  .
Internet Explorer  9  also supports the  html5   वीडियो  and audio  टैग  and the Web Open  फ़ॉन्ट  Format .
Alka-Seltzer is an effervescent  antacid   और   पीड़ा  reliever  पहला  marketed by the Dr  .   मील  Medicine Company  .
It was  विकसित  by Maurice Treener , head chemist  at   मील  ,  in   elkhart  ,  इंडियाना  .
Alka-Seltzer  is   marketed   लिये   राहत  of minor  aches  , pains , inflammation ,  ज्वर   ,  headache , heartburn  ,  sour stomach  ,   अपच  , and  hangovers  , while  neutralizing  excess stomach acid  .
it   थी  launched in  1931  .
A spin-off of Alka-Seltzer made to  relieve  colds and  फ्लू   ,  Alka-Seltzer Plus ,  थी  later  introduced   .
a   short-lived   antacid   non-aspirin  variant ,  alka-mints  ,  थी  introduced in  1994  and discontinued  in   1997   .
alka-seltzer   is   फिलहाल  owned by Bayer Schering  फार्मा  AG , Germany  .
the  name `` Alka-Seltzer '' has been extended to incorporate an entire  लकीर  of medications  बेची  over the  काउंटर  and taken by means of rapidly dissolving  टैबलेट  that  रूप  a carbonated solution in water .
