A  stalactite  (  ,  ;  इससे  the  यूनानी   stalasso   ,  ( σταλάσσω  )   ,  ``  to  drip '' , and meaning ``  कि   जिससे   drips  '' ) is a type of speleothem  (   द्वितीयक   खनिज  )  कि  hangs from the  छत   of   चूना   गुफाएं  .
It is  a   प्रकार  of dripstone .
the  corresponding  गठन   on   the  floor  of  the  गुफा   is   ज्ञात  as  a  stalagmite .
Degree abbreviations are used as  an  alternative way  to  specify an academic  उपाधि  instead  of   स्पेलिंग  out the title in full , such  as   in   सन्दर्भ   किताबे   जैसे   जो  's Who  और  on  कारोबार   ताश   .
Many degrees have more than  एक   संक्षिप्त  .
in  the  uk  ,  it   is   नहीं  generally  the   कस्टम   to   punctuate  abbreviations  लिये  degrees  साथ  full  stops  ( e.g . `` BSc  ''  rather  than  `` B.Sc . `` .
Race is  a  classification system  प्रयुक्त  to  categorize   इंसानो  into  विशाल  and  पृथक   populations   or  groups by  anatomical  ,  सांस्कृतिक  , ethnic  ,   जेनेटिक  ,  भौगोलिक  , historical  ,  linguistic ,  धार्मिक   ,  or  सोशल   संबद्ध  .
First  प्रयुक्त   to   denote  national affiliations , the term began to  be  used to  सुनाना  to physical traits in the  17th  century  .
In the early 20th  सदी  the term was often used ,  in   a   taxonomic   भाव  , to denote  genetically   differentiated  human  populations  defined by  phenotype  .
While biologists  sometimes  use the  अवधारणा  of race to  मेक  distinctions among fuzzy  सेट   of   traits   ,  others in the  वैज्ञानिक  community suggest  कि  the idea of race  प्रायः  is  प्रयुक्त  in  a  naive or simplistic way ,  i.e   .   कि   among   इंसानो   ,  race has  no  taxonomic significance  :   सब  living  इंसानो  belong to  the   वही   प्रजाति   ,  Homo sapiens  और  subspecies , Homo sapiens sapiens  .
सोशल   conceptions   और   groupings   of   दौड़  vary over time  ,   involving   लोक  taxonomies
कि   define  of individuals based  on  perceived traits  .
वैज्ञानिकों  consider biological essentialism obsolete , and  generally  discourage  जातिगत   स्पष्टीकरण  for collective differentiation in  दोनो   शारीरिक  and behavioral traits  .
Since  the   दूसरी  half  of   the  20th century  the  associations of race with the  विचारधाराओं  and  theories  that grew  आउट  of the work of 19th-century  विज्ञानियों  and  physiologists   रै  led to  the  use  of  the  शब्द  race  itself  becoming problematic .
Although still used in general  contexts  ,  it  is now often replaced by other words  जिससे  are less ambiguous and  emotionally  charged ,  ऐसे  as populations , people  (  s ) , ethnic  समूह  or  समुदायों   depending  on context .
Lucy Stone  (   अगस्त   13   ,  1818 –  अक्तूबर   19   ,  1893  )  was a  prominent  American  abolitionist  and suffragist , and a  गायन   एडवोकेट   और   आयोजक   promoting   अधिकारों  for  महिलाओं  .
In  1847   ,  Stone  became  the first  स्त्री  from  मैसाचुसेट्स   to   earn  a college  उपाधि   .
वो  spoke out for women 's rights  और  against slavery at a  समय   जब   महिलाओं  were discouraged and  prevented  from  पब्लिक  speaking .
Stone was  the  first recorded American woman  to  retain her own last name  बाद   विवाह  .
स्टोन  's organizational activities for the cause of women 's rights  yielded   ठोस  gains in the  मुश्किल  political  पर्यावरण   of   the   19th  century .
स्टोन   helped   initiate  the  पहला   नेशनल  Women  's   अधिकारों  Convention and  वो   समर्थित   और  sustained  it  annually along with  a  number  of  other  लोकल   ,  state  और  regional activist  प्रथाओं   .
स्टोन  spoke  in   सामने   of  a  क्रमांक  of  विधान   लाशें  to promote laws giving  अधिक   अधिकारों   to  women .
She assisted  in   establishing  the  स्त्री  's National Loyal  लीग  to help pass  the  Thirteenth  amendment   और   thereby   abolish  slavery  ,   बाद   जिससे  she helped form the largest group of like-minded women 's  अधिकारों  reformers  ,  the politically moderate American  स्त्री  Suffrage  संघ  , which worked for  दशकों   at   the   राज्य  level in  एहसान  of women 's  सही   to   vote   .
स्टोन  wrote  extensively  about a wide range of women  's   अधिकारों  ,  प्रकाशन   और  distributing  भाषणों   by  herself  और  others , and  सम्मेलन   कार्यवाही   .
In  the  long-running  और  influential Woman  's   जर्नल   ,   a  weekly periodical  कि  she established and promoted  ,  Stone aired both  उसके  own  और   differing   दृश्य  about  महिलाओं  's  अधिकारों  .
पुकारा  `` the orator ''  और  `` the  morning  star of the woman  's  rights movement '' ,  स्टोन   वितरित   a   वाक   जिससे  sparked  सुसान  B.  एंथोनी  to  लो   up  the  कारण  of women  's  suffrage .
Elizabeth  cady  Stanton wrote  कि  `` Lucy  स्टोन  was  the  first person by whom the heart of  the   अमरीकी   पब्लिक  was deeply  stirred   on  the  स्त्री  question .  ''
साथ  , Anthony  ,   stanton  , and Stone have  महरूम  called  the  19th century  ``   triumvirate  `` of women 's  suffrage   और   नारीवाद  .
In finance ,  a   बंध   is  an  यंत्र  of  indebtedness  of  the   बंध  issuer  to  the  धारकों  .
It is  a  debt security , under which the issuer owes  the   धारकों  a  कर्ज़  and , depending on  the  terms of  the  bond ,  is   obliged  to pay them interest (  the   कूपन  )  or   to   repay   the  principal at a later date  ,  termed the  परिपक्वता   .
Interest  is   प्रायः   देय  at fixed intervals ( semiannual , annual  ,   sometimes   मासिक  )  .
Very often  the   बंध  is negotiable , i.e .  the  ownership  of   the   यंत्र  can be  transferred  in the  द्वितीयक  market .
यूँ  a bond is  a   रूप  of loan or  iou   :   the  holder of  the   बंध  is the lender (  creditor  ) , the issuer of the  बंध  is the borrower ( debtor  )   ,   और  the coupon  is  the interest  .
bonds  provide the borrower with external  निधि  to finance  long-term  investments  ,  or  ,   in   the  case  of  government bonds , to  वित्त  current expenditure .
प्रमाणपत्र   of  deposit ( CDs )  or  short term commercial paper are considered to be money market instruments and  नहीं   bonds   :  the main difference is  in   the   लंबाई   of  the term of the  यंत्र  .
Bonds and  स्टॉक्स  are  दोनो  securities  ,   लकिन   the  major  अंतर   between   the  two is that  (   पूंजी   )   stockholders  have an equity  हिस्सेदारी  in the company ( i.e  .  they  हैं  owners  )  , whereas  bondholders   have   a  creditor stake  in  the  कम्पनी   (  i.e .  वे  are  lenders   )  .
Another difference  is   कि  bonds  प्रायः  have a  पारिभाषित  term  ,   or  maturity  ,   बाद   जिससे  the  बंध  is  redeemed  , whereas  स्टॉक्स  may be  बकाया  indefinitely .
an   एक्सेप्शन  is an irredeemable bond ,  ऐसे  as  consols   ,   जिससे   is  a  perpetuity   ,  i.e . a  बंध  with  no  maturity .

Model  जहाजों  and  किला
a  scale  मॉडल  is a  शारीरिक   मॉडल  , a representation or copy of  an   ऑब्जेक्ट  that is larger or smaller  than  the actual size  of  the object ,  जिससे  seeks  to   maintain  the  सापेक्ष  proportions (  the   स्केल  factor )  of  the physical size of the  असली  object  .
Very  प्रायः   the  scale model is used  as   a   मार्गदर्शिका  to  बनाना  the  ऑब्जेक्ट  in full size .
Scale  मॉडल  are  निर्मित   or  collected  लिये  many  कारण  .
the   zune  HD  थी  a portable media player in the  zune  product  परिवार  released on  सितंबर   15  , 2009 by Microsoft .
it  was a direct competitor with  the  Apple iPod  और  iPhone  श्रेणी  of mobile devices  .
It was initially released in  16  and 32 GB capacities .
A 64 GB version was  released  on  अप्रैल   9  ,  2010   .
It utilized  a   टचस्क्रीन  interface  लिये   नेविगेशन   और   शामिल  Wi-Fi for synchronization  ,   अभिगम  to the  zune  Marketplace  और  Web browsing .
The Zune  hd  utilized the Nvidia Tegra APX  2600  chip  ,   allowing   it   to  play  720p  video through the optional HDMI Zune  डॉक   on   a  high-definition television .
Otherwise , content would  be  scaled down  to  480x272 pixels on the  खिलाड़ी  's  oled  touchscreen  .
Old  sparky  ,  the   इलेक्ट्रिक   कुर्सी  used at  गाओ  Sing prison
निष्पादन   by  electrocution  ,  usually  performed   using   an  electric  कुर्सी   ,   is  an execution method originating in the  संयुक्त  States  in   जिससे  the  condemned  person  is   strapped  to  a  specially built wooden  कुर्सी   और  electrocuted  through   electrodes   लगाई  on  the  body .
इस   निष्पादन   विधि  was created  by  employees of Thomas Edison  दौरान  the  युद्ध  of  currents  , and has been  प्रयुक्त  only  in  the United States and  ,   लिये   a   काल   of  several decades , in  the  Philippines  (   इसके  first  उपयोग   वहीँ   in   1924   अंतर्गत  American occupation  ,  last in  1976  ) .
Historically ,  एकबार   the  condemned person was attached  to   the   कुर्सी  , various  चक्र  (  differing   in  voltage and duration ) of alternating  वर्तमान  would be  passed  through the individual 's body , in order to  कारण  fatal damage to  the  internal organs ( including  the  brain ) .
the  first jolt of electric current was designed to cause  तात्कालिक  unconsciousness and brain death ; the second one was designed  to  cause fatal damage  to   the   vital  organs  .
मौत   थी  frequently  caused  by electrical  overstimulation   of   the   दिल  .
हालांकि   in  the  संयुक्त  States the electric  कुर्सी  has become a symbol of the death penalty ,  इसके   उपयोग   is  in decline due to the  वृद्धि   of  lethal injection , which is widely believed to  be  a more  दयालु   विधि  of execution  .
Although  कुछ  states still  maintain   electrocution  as a method of  निष्पादन  ,  आज  it  is   तभी   कायम  as a secondary method that  may  be chosen over lethal injection  at  the  निवेदन   of   the   कैदी  .
As of  2010  ,  electrocution  is  an   वैकल्पिक   रूप  of  निष्पादन  in  अलबामा   ,  Florida , South Carolina  और   वर्जिनिया  .
They allow the  कैदी   to   चुनें  lethal injection  as  an  वैकल्पिक  method .
In  the  states of  केंटकी  and Tennessee  ,   the  electric  कुर्सी   रै  been retired except for  those  whose capital crimes were committed prior to legislated  तिथियाँ  in 1998 (  केंटकी  :  कूच   31  , 1998 ; Tennessee : December 31  ,  1998 ) and  जो   chose  electrocution .
In both  राज्य  , inmates who  do  not choose  electrocution   or   inmates  who committed their  अपराधों   बाद   the   designated   तिथि   हैं   मारे   by  lethal  इंजेक्शन   .
The electric  कुर्सी  is  an   वैकल्पिक  form  of  execution  स्वीकृत   लिये   संभावित   उपयोग  in  अरकंसास   और  Oklahoma  if   अन्य   फ़ॉर्म  of execution are  मिला  unconstitutional in  the  state  at  the  समय  of  निष्पादन  .
it  is  the   एकमात्र   विधि  of execution  in   वर्मांट  , where  देशद्रोह  is the only  पूंजी   अपराधों   .
on  February  8   ,   2008   ,   the  Nebraska  परम्  Court determined  कि  execution  by   इलेक्ट्रिक   कुर्सी  was a  ``  cruel  और  unusual punishment '' under the state  's  constitution  .
This  brought   executions   of   इस  type  to  an  समाप्त   in   नेब्रास्का  ,  the  only remaining state to retain electrocution as its sole  विधि  of execution for murder .
The Maryland House of Delegates is the lower house of the General  सभा  , the  राज्य   विधानमंडल  of  the  American State of  मेरीलैंड   ,   और   is  composed of 141 Delegates elected from 47 districts  .
the  House  of  Delegates Chamber is  स्तिथ   in   the   मेरीलैंड  State  हाउस  (  राज्य  capitol  )   on  State Circle  in  Annapolis , which is the  राज्य   पूंजी  .
the  State House also houses the Maryland  राज्य  Senate  कक्ष  and the  कार्यालयों  of the Governor  और   लेफ्टिनेंट  Governor of the State  of  Maryland .
Each Delegate  रै  offices  in  Annapolis ,  in  the  आसपास   कैस्पर  R.  टेलर  ,  jr.   हाउस   दफ्तर   भवन  .
The  मुक्ति  of Paris  (  also  ज्ञात   as   the  Battle for Paris ) took  प्लेस  during  संसार  War II from 19  अगस्त  1944 until  the  surrender of the occupying German garrison on 25  अगस्त  .
The  मुक्ति  of Paris  प्रारंभ  with  an  uprising by the French Resistance  विरूद्ध  the  जर्मनी  garrison .
on  24 August , the  फ्रेंच   शक्तियां   of   the  Interior ( Forces  françaises  de l'intérieur  ,   ffi  )  प्राप्त   सुदृढीकरण   इससे   the   फ़्री   फ्रेंच  Army of  मुक्ति  and  इससे   the  U.S.  तीसरा  Army  अंतर्गत  General Patton  .
the   पूंजी   प्रदेश  of  फ़्रांस   था   महरूम   governed  by Nazi Germany  चूंकि  the  हस्ताक्षर  of  the   दूसरी  Compiègne Armistice  in   जून   1940  ,  जब   the  German Army  occupied  northern and westernmost France  ,  and when the  कठपुतली   शासन   of   vichy  France  थी  established in  the   कस्बा   of  Vichy  in  central France .
इस  battle  चिह्नित   the   मुक्ति   of  Paris  और  the  निर्वासन  of  the  Vichy government to Sigmaringen in  जर्मनी  .
However , there  थी  still much  भारी   लड़   to  be done before  फ़्रांस  was liberated ,  सहित  the campaign  in  southern  फ़्रांस   दौरान  August-September  (   in   provence  and extending into the southwestern region  of  the  vosges  Mountains  )  ,  साथ  the German-held  seaports  of western France (  ऐसे  as at Brest and Dunkirk )  ,  in  alsace  and  लोरेन  in eastern France ,  और   in  northeastern France  ,  such  as   साथ  the Rhine and Moder  नदियाँ  .
The  जर्मनी   फौज  and  ss   लड़ा   doggedly  in these areas for the  शेष   of   1944   और  into 1945 .
``  Feelin ' Alright ? ''  भी  known  as   ``  Feeling Alright  ''  is  a  song written by Dave Mason  of   the  English rock band Traffic  इससे  their  eponymous  1968  एल्बम  , Traffic  .
the   सोंग  was also  a  hit  सिंगल  for  अनेक  performers :  जो   cocker  ( 1969  ,   #  69 , recharted in  1972   ,  US  #  33 ) , Mongo Santamaría (  1969   ,   #   95  ) and Grand Funk  रेलरोड  (  1971  , US #  54   )   .
it   रै  also  महरूम   अंकित  by Three Dog  रात्रि  (  1969  ) , The  5th  Dimension (  1970  ) , Lou Rawls  ,   फ्रेडी  King ,  पॉल  Weller  ,  Lulu , Chairmen of the Board ( 1970 )  ,   विरल  Earth ,  the   इलेक्ट्रिक  Concept  ऑर्केस्ट्रा   ,   माँ   's   finest  ( 1973 ) ,  the   ओहियो  Players ( 1971 ) ,  डायना  Ross  साथ  the  जैक्सन   5  (  1971   )   ,  Maceo  पार्कर   ,   gladys   नाईट   &   the  Pips  ,   फैली  Panic and  the  Black Crowes .
a  Steel  ढोल  version  by   त्रिनिदाद   आयल   कम्पनी  was reissued on the dancefloor jazz  संकलन  Blue  रस  2  .
It  थी  also featured in  the  2000 film Duets , sung by  huey  Lewis  .

देवों  Werkheiser  (  born March 8,1991  )   is  an  अमरीकी  actor ,  आवाज़  actor ,  सिंगर   ,  songwriter and  संगीतकार   ,  best  ज्ञात  for  उसके  starring role as Ned Bigby on the Nickelodeon sitcom Ned  's   declassified  School Survival  मार्गदर्शिका  and  लिये  his role in the 2007 TV  फिल्म  Shredderman  नियम   ,   as  the lead character Nolan Byrd .
Werkheiser  भी   निभाई   पीटर  Parkes  in  the  चौथी  and  फाइनल  season  of  the  एबीसी   परिवार  show Greek  .
Sample  दृश्य   of   an  electronic health record based on  बिंब
नमूना  view  of   an  electronic health  रिकार्ड
an  electronic health  रिकार्ड   (  EHR ) is an evolving  अवधारणा   पारिभाषित  as a systematic collection  of   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   स्वास्थ्य   सूचना  about individual patients  or   populations  .
It is a record in digital format that  is  theoretically  सक्षम   of  being shared across  अलग  health care settings .
in   कुछ  cases this  sharing   can  occur by way of  network-connected  enterprise-wide information systems and other information networks or exchanges .
EHRs may include a  दायरा  of data , including  जनसांख्यिकी   ,   चिकित्सा  history  ,  medication and  allergies  ,  immunization  status ,  प्रयोगशाला   परीक्षण   परिणाम  ,  radiology  images  ,   vital  signs ,  निजी   आंकड़े  like age  और   वज़न  , and billing information .
Loan origination  is   the  process by  जिससे   a  borrower  applies  for a  नई  loan ,  और   a  lender processes  कि   अनुप्रयोग   .
origination  generally  शामिल  all the steps from taking a loan application  up   to  disbursal of funds ( or declining the application ) .
Loan servicing covers  सबकुछ   बाद  disbursing  the  funds  जबतक  the loan is fully  सशुल्क  off .
ऋण   origination   is  a specialized  संस्करण  of new account opening for financial services organizations .
निश्चित  people and organizations specialize  in   ऋण  origination .
Mortgage brokers  और   अन्य  mortgage  originator   कंपनियाँ  serve  as   a   prominent  example  .
वहीँ   हैं   अनेक   अलग  types of loans .
लिये  more  सूचना  on loan types  ,   देखिए  the loan  और   उपभोक्ता  lending articles .
Steps  शामिल   in  originating a loan vary by loan  प्रकार  ,  विभिन्न  kinds of loan  रिस्क   ,  regulator , lender policy  ,   और  other factors  .
Top  बाएँ  : The  टेनेसी  Valley Authority  ,  part of  the   नई  Deal , being  हस्ताक्षरित  into  विधि  in  1933   .
Top  सही  :  फ्रैंकलिन   delano  Roosevelt  ,  who was responsible  लिये  initiatives  और   कार्यक्रम   collectively   ज्ञात  as the  नई  Deal  .
Bottom : A  पब्लिक   भित्ति  from one  of   the  artists  employed  by the New  सौदे   .
The New Deal was a  श्रेणी  of economic programs  enacted   in  the United  राज्य   between  1933 and 1936  .
वे  involved presidential executive orders or laws  passed  by Congress during the  पहला   पद  of  अध्यक्ष  Franklin  D.  Roosevelt .
The programs were in  जवाब  to the  ग्रेट  Depression  ,   और  focused on what historians  कॉल  the ``  3   rs  ''  :   राहत  ,  रिकवरी   ,  and  सुधार  .
That is Relief  लिये  the  बेरोजगार   और   ग़रीब  ;  रिकवरी  of  the  economy  to  normal levels  ;  and Reform of  the  financial  प्रणाली  to prevent  a  repeat depression .
The  नई   सौदे   उत्पादित   a  political realignment  ,  making the Democratic Party the  बहुमत  (  as   खूब   as   the   पार्टी  that held  the  White House  लिये  seven  आउट   of   नौ  Presidential terms from 1933 to  1969  ) , with its base  in   उदार  ideas ,  the  white South  ,   परंपरागत  Democrats ,  बिग   नगर   मशीने  , and  the  newly empowered labor unions  और  ethnic minorities  .
The Republicans  यहूद  split , with  conservatives  opposing the  संपूर्ण   नई  Deal as an  दुश्मन  of  कारोबार  and  विकास   ,  and liberals  accepting   कुछ  of  it  and  होनहार  to make it more efficient .
The realignment crystallized into  the  New Deal Coalition that dominated  सबसे  presidential elections into the  1960s  ,  जबकि  the  विपक्ष  Conservative  गठबन्धन   largely   नियंत्रित   कॉंग्रेस  from  1937   to  1963  .
By 1936  the  term ``  उदार  '' typically  थी  used for  समर्थक  of  the  New  सौदे   ,  and  ``  conservative `` for its opponents  .
From 1934  to  1938  ,   रूज़वेल्ट  was  assisted  in his  endeavours  by  a  “pro-spender” majority in Congress  (   drawn  from two-party , competitive , non-machine , Progressive , and Left party districts ) .
As noted by Alexander Hicks , “Roosevelt ,  समर्थित  by  विरल  , non-Southern Democrat  majorities   —  270 non-Southern Democrat  प्रतिनिधि  and  71  non-Southern Democrat  सीनेटरों  — spelled Second New Deal reform.”
Many historians distinguish between  a  ``  पहला  New Deal  ''  (  1933–34  )  और  a `` Second  नई   सौदे   ''   (  1935–38  )   ,  with the  दूसरी  one  अधिक  liberal and more controversial .
the  ``  पहला   नई   सौदे   ''   (   1933–34  )  dealt  with diverse groups  ,  from banking and railroads to  उद्योग   और  farming  ,   सब   of   जिससे  demanded help  लिये  economic  अस्तित्व  .
the  Federal Emergency Relief Administration  ,  for instance ,  provided  $ 500 million  लिये  relief operations by states  और  cities ,  जबकि  the  short-lived  CWA  (   सिविल  Works Administration ) gave  बस्तियों  money to operate make-work  प्रोजेक्ट  in 1933-34 .
the  `` Second New  सौदे   ``  in 1935–38  शामिल   the   वेगनर  Act to promote  मजदूर  unions ,  the  Works  प्रगति   प्रशासन  (  wpa   )  relief program ( which made the federal  सरकारी  by far the largest  सिंगल   नियोक्ता  in the  स्वदेश  )  ,  the Social Security  अधिनियम  ,  और  new programs to aid tenant  किसानो  and  migrant   मजदूर   .
The final major items of New Deal legislation  यहूद  the  सृष्टि  of the United States  आवास   प्राधिकार   और  Farm  सुरक्षा   प्रशासन  , both in  1937  , and the  मेला  Labor Standards  अधिनियम  of 1938 ,  जिससे   नियत  maximum  घंटों  and  न्यूनतम   मजदूरी   लिये  most  श्रेणी  of workers .
The  आर्थिक   downturn  of  1937–38  ,  और  the  कड़वा  split between the AFL and CIO  मजदूर  unions  led  to major  रिपब्लिकन   gains   in  Congress  in  1938  .
Conservative Republicans and Democrats  in  Congress  joined  in  the  informal Conservative Coalition  .
By  1942–43  they shut down relief programs  ऐसे   as   the   wpa  and CCC and blocked major  उदार   प्रस्ताव   .
Roosevelt himself  turned   उसके   ध्यान   to   the  war  प्रयत्न   ,   और  won  reelection   in   1940  and  1944  .
the   परम्   अदालत  declared the National  रिकवरी  Administration  (   nra  )  और  the first version of the Agricultural Adjustment  अधिनियम  ( AAA ) unconstitutional ,  however   the   aaa   थी  rewritten and then upheld  .
as   the  first  रिपब्लिकन  president elected after FDR , Dwight  D.  Eisenhower (  1953–61  ) left the  नई  Deal largely  बरकरार   ,   भी  expanding it in  कुछ   क्षेत्रों  .
in   the  1960s  ,  Lyndon B. Johnson 's Great Society used  the   नई   सौदे  as inspiration for a  नाटकीय   विस्तार   of  liberal programs  ,  which  रिपब्लिकन  Richard M.  निक्सन   generally   retained  .
बाद   1974  ,  however  ,  the  call  लिये   deregulation  of  the  economy gained bipartisan support  .
The New  सौदे  regulation of banking  (  Glass–Steagall Act ) was suspended  in  the 1990s .
Many New Deal programs remain active  ,  with some  स्टिल   ऑपरेटिंग  under the  असली  names , including the  संघीय  Deposit Insurance  निगम   (  FDIC  )   ,   the  Federal  क्रॉप  Insurance Corporation ( FCIC ) ,  the   संघीय   आवास  Administration  (  FHA )  ,  and the Tennessee Valley  प्राधिकार  (  त्व  )  .
The largest  कार्यक्रम   स्टिल  in existence  आज  are  the  Social Security System  और  the Securities and  एक्सचेंज   आयोग  (  सेक   )  .
a  woman  (  ) , pl  :  women ( ) is a female human .
The  पद  woman is  प्रायः  reserved  लिये   an   वयस्क   ,   साथ  the  पद   लड़की   होने  the usual  पद   लिये  a  मादा   चाइल्ड  or adolescent  .
However  ,  the term woman is  भी  sometimes used to  पहचानो   a  female  इंसान  , regardless of age  ,  as in  वाक्यांश  such  as  `` Women 's  अधिकारों  ``  .
Women  हैं   typically  capable  of   giving  birth  ,   हालांकि   पुरानी  women who  have  gone through menopause and some  intersex   महिलाओं  can not .
``  I Do  n't   want  to  मिस   a   बात   ''  is a song performed  by  American  चट्टान  band  एरोस्मिथ  for the 1998 film  armageddon  .
Written by Diane  वारेन   ,  the song debuted  at  number  एक  on  the   बिलबोर्ड  Hot  100   (   the  first  #   1  for the  बैंड  after 28 years together  )  .
The song stayed at number one  लिये   चार  weeks from  सितंबर  5 to September 26 , 1998  .
the   सोंग   भी   ठहरे  at  क्रमांक  1 for several weeks in several  अन्य  countries .
in  the UK ,  the  song peaked  at   क्रमांक  four , becoming Aerosmith  's  highest  charting  song  in  the UK , where  it  was  the   17th   best-selling  single  of  1998 , and  रै   बेची   over  a million  नक़ल   .
Although not  प्रयुक्त   by  the majority  of  the  संसार   's  countries ,  daylight   छायांकन  time is common  in  the Western  संसार  .
Daylight  छायांकन   समय  ( DST )  —also  summer  समय  in  अंग्रेजों  English — is the practice  of   advancing   घड़ियाँ   दौरान   the  lighter months so that evenings  have   अधिक   daylight  and mornings have  कम  .
typically   घड़ियाँ  are adjusted forward  एक  hour near the start  of   वसन्त  and  हैं  adjusted backward  in  autumn .
the   आधुनिक   विचार   of   daylight   छायांकन  was first  प्रस्तावित  in 1895  by  George  vernon  Hudson and it was first  implemented  during the First World War .
Many  देशों   have  used it  at   विभिन्न  times since then  .
much   of   the   संयुक्त  States used DST in the 1950s  और  1960s  ,   और   dst  use expanded following the  1970s  energy crisis and  रै  been  widely   प्रयुक्त   in   उत्तर  America and  यूरोपीय   चूंकि  then  .
The practice has been both praised and criticized  .
Adding  daylight  to evenings benefits retailing  ,   खेल   ,   और  other activities that exploit  धूप  after  working  hours ,  लकिन  can cause  समस्याएं   लिये   संध्या   entertainment  and other  occupations   tied   to   the  sun  .
Although  an  early  लक्ष्य  of DST was  to  reduce evening  उपयोग   of  incandescent  lighting  ( formerly a primary  उपयोग  of electricity  )   ,   आधुनिक  heating  और  cooling  उपयोग  patterns differ greatly ,  और  research about  कैसा  DST currently affects  उर्जा   उपयोग  is limited  or  contradictory .
DST  क्लॉक   शिफ्ट   उपस्थित   अन्य  challenges  .
They  complicate  timekeeping  ,   और  can  disrupt   बैठक  , travel , billing , record keeping  ,   चिकित्सा  devices  ,  heavy equipment  ,   और  sleep patterns .
तन्त्र  can often  समायोजन   कंप्यूटर   घड़ियाँ  automatically ,  लकिन   इस   can   be  limited  और   error-prone  ,  विशेषकर  when  dst  dates are  बदला   .
Floorplan  of   the  Château  de   montargis
Montargis is  a   कम्यून  in the Loiret  विभाग   in  north-central France  on  the  loing  river .
the   कस्बा  is  स्तिथ  about south of Paris  और  east of  orléans  in the Gâtinais  .
montargis   is  the second  largest  city in the Loiret ,  बाद  Orléans .
it   is   निकट  a large forest , and contains light industry  और   खेती   ,   सहित  saffron .
due   to  its  numerous  canals and  पुलों  ,  montargis  sometimes  बिल्स  itself  as  the ``  वेनिस   of  the Gâtinais .  ''
हालांकि   काफी   आधुनिक   ,  it  retains  a medieval charm in  इसके   शहर  area .
in   कंप्यूटर   भंडार  , a logical unit  क्रमांक  ,  or   lun   ,  is a number used to  पहचानो  a  लॉजिकल   ईकाई   ,   जिससे   is   a   यंत्र   addressed  by the  scsi  protocol or protocols which  encapsulate   scsi  , such  as  Fibre  चैनल   or   iscsi  .
a  LUN may be used  साथ   कोई   यंत्र   जिससे   supports   read/write  operations  ,  such  as  a  टेप  drive , but is most often used to refer  to  a logical disk as  निर्मित  on a SAN .
Though not technically correct  ,  the  पद  `` LUN  ''  is often also  प्रयुक्त   to  refer  to  the logical disk  itself   .
The Gospel According to Mark  (  , , to  euangelion  kata Markon ) ,  commonly  shortened  to   the   इन्जील  of  चिह्नित  or simply  चिह्नित  , is  the  second  किताब  of  the  New Testament  .
This canonical account of  the  life  of  Jesus of Nazareth  is  one  of  the three  synoptic  gospels .
It  थी   विचार  to  be   an   निचोड़   ,  which accounts  लिये   इसके   प्लेस   as  the  दूसरी   इन्जील  in  the   बाइबल  .
however  , most  समकालीन  scholars now regard  it  as the earliest of  the  canonical gospels  (   c   70  )  .
That Mark  थी   प्रयुक्त  as a source  लिये   the   अन्य  synoptic  gospels  Gospel  of  Matthew and  इन्जील  of  ल्यूक  is widely  आयोजित  by many  ,   हालांकि  not  सब   ,  New Testament scholars .
The  इन्जील   of   चिह्नित  narrates  the  Ministry  of  Jesus from his baptism  by  John  the   बैपटिस्ट  to his  मौत  and resurrection .
It  focuses  particularly on the last week of  उसके   जीवन  ( chapters 11–16 ) in Jerusalem  .
इसके  swift  कथा  portrays Jesus as a  वीर  man  of  action  ,  an exorcist , healer and  चमत्कार  worker .
An important  थीम   of  Mark  is  the  मुक्तिदाता  Secret .
यीशु   silences  the demoniacs he  heals  ,  कोशिशें  unsuccessfully to keep his  मुक्तिदाता   पहचान  secret  ,   और  conceals  उसके  message with parables  .
Meanwhile , the disciples fail to  समझे  both  the  implication  of  the miracles of Jesus  और   the  meaning of  the   बाते  he predicts about  उसके  arrest ,  मौत   और  resurrection .
Most scholars believe that the original  टेक्स्ट  of the gospel ends  at  Mark  16:8   साथ   the   डिस्कवरी   of  Jesus ' empty tomb  और   कि   the   following   खाता   of  his resurrection appearances is a  बाद  addition .
according   to  tradition  और   कुछ   जल्दी   गिरिजाघर  writers ,  the  author  is  Mark  the  Evangelist ,  the  companion of  the   apostle   पीटर   .
the  gospel , however  ,   appears   to  rely  on  several  underlying   स्त्रोत   ,  varying in  रूप   और   in   धर्मशास्त्र  , which tells against  the  tradition  कि  the gospel  थी   आधारित  on Peter 's preaching .
the  text is a  संकलन   जिससे  may  शामिल  eye-witness accounts  as  well  as  known  अपोस्टोलिक   preachings  , and  pre-existing  written records  कि  do  नहीं   मौजूद  today but can  be  confirmed  इससे   2nd-century   टीकाकारों  .
कुछ  of  the  stories  in  the  इन्जील   may  have been  transmitted   orally   पहले   होने  written down .
विभिन्न   तत्व  within the  इन्जील  suggest that the author wrote  in  Syria or Palestine  लिये   a   non-jewish   ईसाई  community .
the   रब  of the  बजती   is   an  epic high fantasy  अनोखा  written by English  भाषाशास्त्री  and University  of  Oxford  प्राध्यापक  J. R. R. Tolkien .
The story began as  a  sequel to Tolkien  's  1937 children  's   काल्पनिक   अनोखा   the  Hobbit  ,  but eventually developed  into  a much larger work .
It  थी   लिखा  in stages between  1937   और  1949  ,  much  of   it  during World  युद्ध  II .
it  is the second best-selling novel ever  लिखा  , with over  150  million copies sold  .
The title  of   the  novel refers to the  स्टोरी   's   प्रमुख   विपक्षी  , the Dark Lord  sauron   ,  who had in an  पहले   आयु  created the  एक   रिंग  to rule  the  other  बजती   of  Power as  the  ultimate weapon in his campaign  to   जीतें  and  नियम  all  of   middle-earth   .
From quiet beginnings  in  the  शायर  , a Hobbit land  नहीं  unlike the  अंग्रेज़ी   countryside   ,  the  स्टोरी   सीमाएँ  across north-west  middle-earth   ,  following  the   कोर्स  of the War of the  रिंग   through   the   आँखें  of  इसके  characters ,  notably  the hobbits Frodo Baggins , Samwise `` Sam  ''   gamgee  , Meriadoc `` Merry  ''   brandybuck  and Peregrin  ``   pippin  ''  took   ,  but  भी  the hobbits  '  chief  allies  and  यात्राएं   companions   :  Aragorn  ,  a  इंसान   रेंजर  ; Boromir ,  a   man  from Gondor  ;  Gimli  ,  a  बौना   योद्धा  ;  legolas  ,  an   elven  prince ;  और  Gandalf , a Wizard  .
the  work  थी   initially   intended   by  Tolkien to  be  one volume of  a  two-volume set , with the  अन्य   होने  The  silmarillion  , but  इस   विचार  was dismissed by his publisher .
It was  decided  for  आर्थिक  reasons to publish  the   रब   of  the  बजती  as three volumes  over   the   कोर्स   of  a year from  29  July 1954  to  20 October  1955   ,  thus creating the  अभी  familiar Lord  of  the Rings  त्रयी  .
The three  आयतन  were  हकदार  The Fellowship of  the  Ring , The Two Towers , and The Return of  the   किंग   .
structurally  ,  the  novel is divided internally into six books ,  दो  per  आवाज़  , with several appendices  of   पृष्ठभूमि   सामग्री  included at  the  end of the  तीसरा  volume .
The Lord  of   the  Rings  रै   चूंकि  been  reprinted  numerous times and  अनूदित  into many languages  .
tolkien  's work has been the subject  of  extensive analysis of  इसके   विषयवस्तु   और   origins   .
Although a major work  in   itself   ,  the  स्टोरी  was  तभी   the   पिछला   गति   of   a   larger   एपिक  Tolkien had  worked  on  चूंकि   1917  ,  in   a   प्रक्रम  he described  as  mythopoeia .
Influences on  इस  earlier work  ,   और   on   the   स्टोरी   of  The  रब  of the  बजती  , include philology  ,  mythology , religion  और   the  author 's distaste  लिये  the effects of industrialization  ,  as  खूब   as  earlier fantasy  works  and  tolkien  's experiences in  संसार  War  i  .
the  Lord of  the  Rings in  इसके   फेरे  is considered  to   have   था  a  ग्रेट   प्रभाव  on  आधुनिक  fantasy ; the  प्रभाव  of  tolkien   's   works  is such  कि  the  उपयोग  of the words ``  tolkienian  ''  और   ``   tolkienesque   ''  have been  अंकित  in the Oxford English  शब्दकोष  .
the  enduring popularity  of  The Lord  of  the  बजती  has led to  numerous  references  in  popular  संस्कृति   ,  the founding  of  many societies  by  fans of  tolkien   's   works  , and the publication  of   अनेक   किताबे  about Tolkien and  उसके  works .
The  रब  of  the   बजती  has  प्रेरित   ,  and continues to  inspire  , artwork  ,  music  ,   films  and television  ,  video games ,  और  subsequent literature .
Award-winning adaptations of  the  Lord of  the   बजती  have  महरूम  made for radio ,  थिएटर  , and film  .
The following is an episode list  लिये  the Nickelodeon  sitcom  Drake  &   जोश  .
The series debuted on January 11 , 2004  .
a  TV film Merry Christmas ,  ड्रेक  &  जोश   थी  made  अलावा   इससे   the   नियमित   श्रेणी  on  दिसम्बर   5  , 2008 .
वहीँ  are a total  of  60  एपीसोड   यहूद  produced spanning four  सीज़न  .
Drake  घंटी  ,  जोश   पेक   ,   और  Miranda Cosgrove  यहूद   the   तभी   अभिनेताओं   to  appear  in   सब  60  एपीसोड  .
The San Francisco 49ers conduct training camp  at  the team 's headquarters and  अभ्यास  facility in Santa Clara ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  in August 2010  .
The offense is wearing red  jerseys  with the  एक्सेप्शन  of  क्वार्टरबैक  Alex Smith  ,   जो   is   in  a black jersey ; the defense  in   श्वेत  .
In the  नेशनल   फ़ुटबॉल   लीग   ,   प्रशिक्षण  camp refers to the  समय  before the season  commences  .
During  इस  time , teams will sometimes congregate at an outside location ,  प्रायः  a university ,  to  conduct  प्रशिक्षण  camp for  at   तनिक  the first  few  weeks  .
इस  is  समान   to  baseball 's  वसन्त  training  .
प्रशिक्षण  camp  is   प्रयुक्त   in   अनेक   अलग  ways .
नई   खिलाड़ी  and coaches  उपयोग  it  to  acclimate themselves to new teammates and systems  .
लिये   younger   खिलाड़ी  , it  serves   as   a   काल  of evaluation  ;   लिये   दिग्गजों   ,   it   is  time to round  वापस  into form  .
प्रशिक्षण   शिविर  is divided  into   अनेक  different  components  .
the   पहला   is   scrimmages  .
These  हैं   pseudo-games  where teams run nearly full games '  लायक   of  plays  .
Sometimes ,  दो  practice sessions are held  on   the  same  दिन   .
This  अवधारणा  is referred to as two-a-days .
Other parts of training camp include drills  ,   बैठक   साथ   कोच  and other  खिलाड़ी  at  एक  's position  ,   वज़न  training , and  pre-season   खेल   .
the  latter half of training  शिविर  leads directly into  the  exhibition season .
With NFL  प्रशिक्षण  camps starting in  late-july  , the biggest  चिंता  has  महरूम   निर्जलीकरण  .
In  2001   ,  Minnesota Vikings player Korey  stringer   died  of  a  medical  कंडीशन  based from  निर्जलीकरण  and heatstroke .
the  death  of  Stringer  prompted   the   एनएफएल   to   बदलें   उनके   प्रशिक्षण  policies  .
at  each practice ,  प्रत्येक  team must have  the  team doctor and trainers  on  the  फ़ील्ड  ; additionally , an ambulance must be present during practices  .
साथ   एनएफएल  training camps beginning in late  जुलाई  , severe  मौसम   can   affect   अभ्यास  and exhibition  खेल   .
In  2002  ,  a  Cleveland Browns exhibition  खेल   ended   due   to  lightning  निकट   क्लीवलैंड  Browns  स्टेडियम   ,   और  severe storms have been  ज्ञात  to  disrupt   प्रशिक्षण  camps .
Fans are often able to  विज़िट  their  पसंदीदा  team  's  training  शिविर   to  catch an early  dekh   at  the players ;  प्रवेश  to practices  is   प्रायः  free  or  substantially  कम  expensive than a  खेल   टिकट  ,  बनाना  training  शिविर  trips a popular  विकल्प  for fans who can  नहीं  attend many games due to financial or other reasons .
NFL teams  प्रायः  sell souvenirs and  concessions  at camp sites along with  offering  activities and  कार्यक्रम  to make training  शिविर   a   अधिक  fan-friendly experience .
in   कम्प्यूटिंग  ,  a  file  प्रणाली  ( or filesystem ) is  a   प्रकार   of  data store which can  be  used to  स्टोर  ,  retrieve   और  update  a  set of  फाइलें   .
The term could  refer   to   the  abstract  आंकड़ा   structures   प्रयुक्त  to  define   फाइलें  , or to the actual  तन्त्र   or  firmware  components   कि  implement  the  abstract ideas .
कुछ   संचिका   प्रणालियों  are  प्रयुक्त   on  local  आंकड़ा  storage  डिवाइस  ;  अन्य  provide file  अभिगम   via  a network  प्रोटोकॉल  (  e.g   .  NFS  ,  SMB ,  or  9P  क्लाइंट  ) .
कुछ  file systems are  ``   आभासी   ''   ,  in that the ``  फाइलें  ''  supplied  are  computed   on  request  (  e.g . procfs ) or  हैं  merely a mapping  into  a  अलग  file  प्रणाली  used  as   a   बैकिंग   स्टोर  .
the  file  प्रणाली  manages  अभिगम   to  both the  सामग्री  of files and  the  metadata about  those  files .
It is responsible for arranging storage space  ;   विश्वसनीयता  ,  दक्षता   ,   और  tuning with  लिहाज़  to  the  physical storage medium are important design considerations  .
विलियम   हावर्ड   taft   (  September  15  , 1857  –  March 8 , 1930  )   थी   the  27th President of  the  United States ( 1909–1913 ) and later the  दसवाँ  Chief  इंसाफ  of the United States  (  1921–1930 ) .
He is the  तभी  person to have  परोसा  in  दोनो  of these  कार्यालयों   .
पहले   बनने   अध्यक्ष   ,  Taft ,  a  Republican ,  थी   चयनित  to  serve  on the  श्रेष्ठ   अदालत  of  सिनसिनाटी   in   1887   .
In 1890  ,  Taft was appointed Solicitor General of the United  राज्य   और   in  1891 a judge on the United States Court of  appeals  for the Sixth  सर्किट   .
In  1900   ,   अध्यक्ष  William McKinley  नियुक्त  Taft  governor-general  of the  फिलीपीन  .
In  1904  , President Theodore  रूज़वेल्ट  appointed Taft Secretary of War in  an  effort to  दूल्हे  Taft , then his  बंद   राजनैतिक  ally ,  into  his  handpicked   अध्यक्षीय  successor .
taft   assumed  a  prominent  role  in  problem  solving  , assuming on some occasions the  भूमिका   of  acting Secretary of  राज्य   ,  while declining repeated offers  इससे   रूज़वेल्ट  to  serve  on  the  Supreme Court .
सवारी  a wave of  लोकप्रिय   support  for  fellow   रिपब्लिकन  Roosevelt , Taft won an easy  विजय   in   उसके   1908  bid for the  प्रेसिडेंसी  .
in  his  तभी  term ,  taft  's  घरेलू  agenda emphasized trust-busting ,  सिविल   सेवा  reform , strengthening the Interstate  कॉमर्स  Commission ,  improving  the  प्रदर्शन  of the  डाक   सेवा  , and  ड्योढ़ी   of   the  Sixteenth Amendment .
Abroad  ,  Taft  sought   to   further  the economic  विकास   of   राष्ट्र   in   लैटिन  America and Asia  through   ``  Dollar Diplomacy `` , and showed decisiveness  और  restraint  in  response  to   क्रान्ति  in  मैक्सिको   .
the   task-oriented   taft  was oblivious to the political ramifications  of   उसके  decisions ,  प्रायः  alienated his  अपना   कुंजी  constituencies , and was  overwhelmingly  defeated in his bid for a second term in  the  presidential  चुनाव   of   1912   .
In surveys of presidential  विद्वानों   ,  Taft is usually ranked near  the  middle of lists of all American Presidents  .
After  leaving   दफ्तर   ,  Taft  खर्च  his time  in  academia  ,  arbitration ,  और  the search for world peace  through  his self-founded  लीग   to   enforce  Peace .
In  1921  , after  the   पहला   संसार   युद्ध  ,  अध्यक्ष   वारेन   G.  Harding appointed Taft Chief Justice  of  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
taft  served  in  this capacity until  shortly   पहले  his death in  1930   .
The Ten  आयतें  is a  1956   एपिक   फिल्मी   उत्पादित  and  निर्देशित  by Cecil B. DeMille that dramatized the biblical story of  the  Exodus , in which  the   hebrew-born   मूसा  , an adopted Egyptian prince  ,  becomes the deliverer of the Hebrew slaves  .
It starred Charlton  हेस्टन  in  the   सीसे   भूमिका  , Yul Brynner as his adoptive brother  ,   pharaoh  Rameses II ,  ऐनी  Baxter as Nefretiri , Edward G.  रॉबिन्सन  as Dathan , Yvonne De Carlo as  sephora  ,  डेबरा  Paget  as  Lilia  ,  and  जॉन  Derek  as  Joshua .
The  supporting   डाल   शामिल  Sir Cedric  hardwicke  as Pharaoh Seti I ,  नीना  Foch  as  Bithiah  ,   मार्था   स्कॉट  as  yoshebel  ,  जूडिथ  Anderson as Memnet  ,   विंसेंट  Price  as   baka  , and  जॉन  Carradine  as   आरोन  .
The  फिल्मी  was  released   by   सर्वोपरि  Pictures in  vistavision  on  अक्तूबर  5 ,  1956   .
The Ten Commandments , which  demille  narrated , was the  पिछला   फिल्मी   कि   he  directed  .
He  थी   नियत  to  सीधा  the  1958   रीमेक  of his 1938 film The  buccaneer  , but his  फाइनल   बीमारी   मजबूर   उसे   to   बाज़  the  directing   chores   to  his son-in-law ,  कर्ता  Anthony Quinn .
DeMille had  भी   नियोजित  to  फिल्मी  the life of  रब  Baden  पावेल  , the  संस्थापक  of  the  Scout movement ,  साथ  David Niven ; this project was never  एहसास   .
The  टेन  Commandments  is   a  partial remake  of  DeMille 's  1923  silent film .
Some of the cast and crew of  the   1956  version  worked  on  the   असली   .
It  रै  since  महरूम   remade  as a television  miniseries   ब्रॉडकास्ट   in   अप्रैल   2006  .
The Ten Commandments  is   एक  of the  सबसे   financially   कामयाब  films  कभी  made  ,   grossing  over $ 65 million  at   the  U.S. box  दफ्तर   .
adjusting  for inflation  ,  this makes it the sixth  highest-grossing   फिल्मी   domestically  ,  साथ   an  adjusted total  of   $  1,025,730,000 in 2012 .
The box office website ``  the   संख्याएँ  ''  सूचियाँ  the domestic gross at $ 80  लाख  .
In  1999  , The  टेन   आयतें  was selected for preservation  in   the  United  राज्य   नेशनल  Film  रजिस्ट्री   by  the  पुस्तकालयों  of  कॉंग्रेस  as being ``  culturally  ,  historically   ,   or  aesthetically significant ''  .
In June 2008 , the American Film  संस्थान   नाज़िल  its  ``   टेन  Top  टेन  `` —the best ten  films  in ten  अमरीकी  film genres—after  polling  over 1,500  लोगों  from the  रचनात्मक  community .
The Ten  आयतें  was  सूचीबद्ध  as  the  tenth best film in the epic genre  .
the   फिल्मी   प्राप्त  seven Academy Award nominations  सहित  Best Picture  ,   और  won the Academy Award for Best  विज़ुअल  Effects  .
चार्ल्टन  Heston was nominated for  a   सुनहरी  Globe Award for Best Motion Picture  कर्ता   in  the drama category  .
Yul Brynner  जीती  the National Board of Review  पुरस्कार   लिये   बेहतरीन   कर्ता   लिये  his role  as  Rameses , along  साथ   उसके   अन्य   भूमिकाएँ   in  The King  और   i  and  अनास्तासिया  .
louisville   (   ,  or  )   is   a  major city  और  the  largest  city in the U.S. state  of   केंटकी  and  the  county seat of  जेफरसन  County .
Since 2003 , the city 's borders  have  been with  those  of the  काउंटी   क्युकी  of  a   city-county   विलय   .
The city 's total  संचित  population at  the  2010 census  थी   741,096  ( Louisville  's   संतुलन  total ,  602,011  , excludes semi-autonomous  कस्बों  and is  the   जनसांख्यिकी  listed  in  most sources and  नेशनल   rankings  )  .
As of 2010 , the  louisville  metropolitan area ( MSA )  था  a population of 1,307,647 ranking  42nd  nationally  .
the  metro  क्षेत्रफल  includes Louisville-Jefferson County and 12  surrounding  counties , eight  in   केंटकी   और  four in  दक्षिणी  Indiana ( see Geography below ) .
The  louisville   संयुक्त   सांख्यिकीय   क्षेत्रफल  ,  having   a  population  of  1,451,564  ,   शामिल  the MSA ,  hardin   काउंटी  and  larue   काउंटी  in  केंटकी   ,  and Scott  काउंटी  ,  इंडियाना  .
An  महत्वपूर्ण   आतंरिक   शिपिंग  port in the 19th  सदी   ,  Louisville  आज   is   बेहतरीन   ज्ञात  as  the   स्थान  of the Kentucky Derby ,  the   पहला  of three annual thoroughbred horse races  बनाना   up  the Triple Crown .
A  ठेठ   प्रायोगिक   सेटअप  for  an   aldol   प्रतिक्रिया  .
Both flasks are submerged in a dry ice/acetone  कूलिंग   नहाना   (   −78   °c   )   the   तापमान  of  जिससे   is   होने   monitored   by  a  तापयुग्म   (   the  wire  on   the  left  )  .
A cooling  नहाना   ,   in   प्रयोगशाला  chemistry (  प्रायः  but  नहीं  always organic chemistry ) practice , is a  द्रव   मिश्रण  which is  प्रयुक्त  to  maintain  low temperatures  ,   typically  between  13  °C  और  −196 °C  .
ये   कम   temperatures   हैं   प्रयुक्त   to   collect  liquids  बाद   आसवन   ,  to  हटाएँ   सॉल्वैंट्स   using  a  रोटरी   evaporator  , or to perform a chemical reaction  नीचे  room temperature (  देखिए  :  गतिज   कंट्रोल  ) .
Cooling  baths  are  generally  one of two types  :  ( a )  a  cold  द्रव  ( particularly liquid nitrogen  ,  water  ,  or even air ) —  लकिन  most commonly  the  term refers  to  ( b )  a  mixture of 3 components : (  1  )  a  cooling agent  (   ऐसे   as   शुष्क   बर्फ  or water ice ) ;  (  b  )   a  liquid  'कैरीr   '  (  ऐसे   as   द्रव   जल   ,   एथिलीन  glycol  ,   एसीटोन  , etc . ) ,  जिससे   हस्तांतरण  heat  between   the   नहाना  and the vessel ; ;  और  (  c   )   an  additive to depress the melting-point of  the  solid/liquid system  .
(  a   परिचित   उदाहरण   of  this  is  the use  of  an ice/rock-salt  मिश्रण   to  freeze  बर्फ   मलाई  .
the  phase-change of ice  into  liquid  जल  requires energy  ,   'pulling  '  ऊष्मा  from the system .
Adding salt lowers  the  temp  at  which this happens  ,  meaning more  उर्जा  has  to  be absorbed  इससे   the  environment in  अनुक्रम   to   melt  the  बर्फ  .
This effectively  makes   the  ice 'colder  '  —  it   जरूर   'pull   '  more heat from its  पर्यावरण  to  become  liquid . )
Eating  विकार  are conditions defined  by  abnormal eating  आदतें   कि  may  involve   either   अपर्याप्त  or excessive food  सेवन  to the detriment  of  an individual  's  physical  और  mental health  .
Bulimia nervosa  और  anorexia  नर्वोज़ा  are  the   सबसे   आम  specific forms in the United  किंगडम  .
Other types of eating disorders  शामिल  binge eating disorder and eating disorder  नहीं  otherwise specified  .
bulimia  nervosa  is  a  विकार   characterized  by binge eating and purging  .
purging  can  शामिल   self-induce  vomiting , over-exercising ,  और   the  usage  of   diuretics   ,  enemas , and  laxatives  .
Anorexia nervosa  is  characterized by extreme  खाना   प्रतिबंध   to  the point of  self-starvation   और   excessive   वज़न   घाटा   .
Though primarily thought of  as  affecting  महिलाओं   (  an  अनुमानित  5–10 million  होने  affected  in  the U.K.  )  ,  खाने  disorders affect males  as  well .
an   अनुमानित  10 – 15  %   of  people with eating  विकार   हैं  males  (  Gorgan , 1999  )   .
(  an  अनुमानित  1 million U.K.  males  being  प्रभावित  ) .
हालांकि  eating  विकार  are  increasing   सब   over   the  world among both men and  महिलाओं   ,   वहीँ  is evidence to  सुझाएँ  that it is women  in   the   पश्चिमी   संसार  who  हैं   at  the  उच्चतम   रिस्क  of developing  उन्हें   और   the   उपाधि  of  westernization  increases  the  risk  .
nearly  half of  सब  Americans  personally   जान  someone with an  खाने   विकार   .
The  कौशल  to comprehend the  सेंट्रल  processes  of  appetite has  increased  tremendously since  लेप्टिन  was discovered  ,  and the skill to observe the functions of the brain as well .
Interactions  between   प्रेरक  ,  homeostatic  and self-regulatory control processes  हैं  involved  in   खाने  behaviour  ,   जिससे  is  a  key  घटक  in  खाने  disorders .
the  precise  कारण   of   खाने  disorders is  नहीं   entirely   समझा   ,  but  वहीँ  is  प्रमाण  that  it  may be linked to other medical  शर्तें  and  परिस्थितियों  .
Cultural  idealization   of  thinness and youthfulness  have  contributed  to  eating disorders affecting diverse populations  .
One study  दिखाया   कि  girls with ADHD  have  a greater chance of getting an eating disorder  than  those  नहीं   प्रभावित  by ADHD  .
Another study suggested that women  साथ   ptsd   ,  especially due  to  sexually related trauma  ,  are more  संभावित  to  develop   एनोरेक्सिया  nervosa  .
One study showed that foster  लड़कियों  are more likely to  develop  bulimia nervosa  .
Some  सोचो  that peer  दबाव  and  idealized   body-types  seen in the  मीडिया   हैं   भी  a significant  फ़ैक्टर  .
Some research show that  लिये   निश्चित   लोगों   वहीँ  are  जेनेटिक  reasons why they  may  be prone to developing  an  eating  विकार  .
हाल   अध्ययन  have found evidence  a  correlation  between  patients with  bulimia  nervosa and  पदार्थ  use disorders  .
in   जोड  , anxiety disorders  और   व्यक्तित्व  disorders are  आम   आवृत्ति   साथ   क्लाइंट  of eating disorders  .
While proper treatment  can   be  highly  प्रभावी  for  अनेक   कष्ट   इससे   विशिष्ट  types  of  eating disorders  ,  the consequences of  खाने  disorders  can  be severe ,  सहित  death ( whether  इससे   सीधा  medical  प्रभाव  of disturbed eating habits or from comorbid conditions such as suicidal  सोच   )  .
गुलामी   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  existed from  the   जल्दी  years  of   the  colonial period ;  it  was  firmly   स्थापित   by  the time  the  United  राज्य   sought  independence from Great  ब्रिटेन  in 1776  .
However ,  by   1804   ,   सब  states  उत्तर  of the  मेसन   और   डिक्सन   लकीर   था   either  abolished  गुलामी  outright or passed laws for the gradual  abolition  of slavery .
In 1787 Congress  निषिद्ध  slavery in the Northwest Territory .
But  गुलामी   gained  new  जीवन  in the  दक्षिण   साथ  the cotton industry  बाद  1800 ,  और  expanded into  the  Southwest .
The nation was  polarized  into  स्लेव   और  free states along  the  Mason-Dixon  लकीर   ,  which separated Pennsylvania and Maryland .
the   संयुक्त   राज्य  and  ग्रेट  Britain  दोनो   निषिद्ध  the international  स्लेव  trade in 1808 , but the domestic  व्यापार  , with sales to the Deep South , expanded dramatically , and  अनेक  captives were shipped by the coastwise slave  व्यापार  .
Before the 1840s  ,   the  South was vigorously  defending  slavery  और   इसके  expansion into the territories .
In  the  North  कुछ  abolitionists denounced  it  as sinful , and numerous anti-slavery forces  अस्वीकृत  it as detrimental  to  the rights  of  free men  .
After failed compromises  और  Abraham Lincoln 's  चुनाव   ,  in  1861  eleven slave  राज्य  broke away  to   रूप   the  Confederate States of America  ,   अग्रणी  to the American Civil  युद्ध  .
The federal  सरकारी  in 1862 made abolition of slavery a  युद्ध  goal  .
in   जनवरी   1863  President Lincoln freed  स्लेव  in  the   confederacy   through  the Emancipation  उदघोषणा   .
After the war , the Thirteenth Amendment  ,   प्रभावी  December 1865  ,  abolished  गुलामी  throughout  the  entire United States ,  सहित   the   किनारा  states and the  भारतीय  territories .
From  the   16th  to the 19th centuries ,  an   अनुमानित  12 million  africans   यहूद   shipped   as   स्लेव   to  the  americas  .
See  गुलामी   in   the  Americas  .
The great majority went to the sugar  बागानों  of the West  इंडीज  or Brazil , where mortality  थी  high  .
परिचय  645,000  यहूद  brought  to  what is now the United  राज्य   .
By  the  1860  संयुक्त  States Census ,  the  slave population  in  the  अमरीकी  South had  grown  to four million .
Of all  1,515,605  families in  the  15 slave  राज्य   ,   nearly   400,000  held slaves  (   roughly  one in  चार  ) ,  amounting   to  8 % of  सब  American  परिवारों  .
जबकि  some  स्लेव  worked  as   हाउस   बन्दों   और   शहरी  artisans , the great  बहुमत   worked  on plantations  or  large farms , cultivating  lucrative   नकदी  crops  ,  such as  राइस  , tobacco ,  शुगर   और   ,  after 1800 , chiefly  कपास  .
By  1860  most slaves were held  in  the  गहन  South , where they served  in  work-gangs ; two-thirds  worked   in  cotton .
In  छोटी  operations  ,  they worked  साथ  their  स्वामी   .
in  large plantations  वे   यहूद   निर्देशित   by   श्वेत  paid  overseers  .
Under the  प्रणाली  that  became   chattel   गुलामी  (  स्वामित्व  of a human  होने   ,  and  of  his/her descendants )  ,   a  racial  तत्व   थी   आधारभूत  : slaves  यहूद  blacks of  अफ़्रीकी  descent  और   स्वामित्व  , almost  universally  , by whites  of  European descent .
In the 17th century  ,  Virginia  ,  followed  by   अन्य   दक्षिणी  colonies  ,  enacted law that children of slave  माताओं  were born into slavery  .
स्लेव  could  लाभ   स्वतंत्रता  only  by   कार्यशील  away (  जिससे   थी  difficult  और  illegal to  do  )  ,   or  by manumission  by  owners  ,   जिससे  was  regulated  by states  ,   और  became increasingly difficult  or   निषिद्ध   .
in  the earliest  era  of  chattel  slavery ,  the  colonies  भी  organized  कार्य  by a system of bonded  मजदूर  known as indentured  servitude  .
इस  typically lasted for several  सालो  for  दोनो   ग़रीब   europeans  and  africans  alike  ,   to  pay off the  लागत  of  हस्तांतरण  to the colonies .
वे   contracted  for such arrangements because  of   ग़रीब  economies in their home  देशों  .
between  1680 and 1700 , as fewer  europeans  migrated to the colonies  ,   planters  began to import more Africans as slaves  .
Recognizing the  महत्व   of   गुलामी  ,  the   हाउस  of  burgesses   in  Virginia  enacted  a new slave code  in  1705  ;  it combined a variety of legislation and added new provisions  enforcing  white supremacy in the law .
schematic   क्रॉस   खण्ड  of  भाग  of  पत्ता  , xylem  दिखाया  as red  वृत्त  at  फिगर  8  .
Xylem is one  of   the  two types  of   हस्तांतरण  tissue in  vascular  plants  (  phloem is the  अन्य  ) .
The  शब्द  xylem is derived from  the   यूनानी  word  ξύλον  (  xylon   )  ,  अर्थ  ``  लकडी  '' ; the best-known  जाइलम  tissue  is   लकडी   ,  though it is found  throughout  the plant  .
Its  मौलिक   फलन  is to transport water ,  लकिन   it  also transports some nutrients through  the   संयंत्र   .
इस  clock  प्रतिनिधित्व  shows some  of   the   प्रमुख  units of  geological  time and  निर्णायक   कार्यक्रम  of Earth history  .
the  Hadean  इओन   represents   the  time  पहले  fossil  रिकार्ड  of life on Earth ;  इसके  upper boundary is  अभी  regarded as 4.0 Ga ( billion  सालो   पहले  )  .
Other subdivisions reflect  the  evolution of life  ;  the Archean and  proterozoic   हैं  both  eons  ,  the   palaeozoic   ,  Mesozoic and Cenozoic are  eras  of  the  Phanerozoic eon  .
The two million  साल   quaternary   काल   ,   the  time of recognizable humans , is too  छोटी  to be visible  at  this  स्केल   .
the  geologic  समय   स्केल   is  a system  of  chronological measurement that relates stratigraphy  to  time  ,  and  is  used by geologists , paleontologists  ,   और   अन्य  earth scientists  to   describe   the  timing  और  relationships  between  events  कि   have   occurred  throughout  धरती  's history .
The table of geologic time  spans   प्रस्तुत  here  agrees   साथ   the  dates  और   नामकरण   नियत  forth by  the  International  आयोग  on  स्तरिकी   मानक   रंग   कोड  of the International  आयोग   on  Stratigraphy  .
Evidence  इससे  radiometric  डेटिंग  indicates that  the  Earth is  परिचय   4.54   अरब  years  बूढ़ा  .
The geology or deep  समय  of Earth 's  पास्ट  has been organized into various  इकाई  according to events which  took  place in each  काल  .
Different spans  of  time on  the   gts  are  प्रायः  delimited by  परिवर्तन   in  the  संयोजन  of strata  जिससे  correspond to them  ,  indicating major geological or paleontological  कार्यक्रम  , such as mass extinctions .
लिये  example  ,   the  boundary  between  the Cretaceous  काल   और  the Paleogene period  is  defined  by   the  Cretaceous–Paleogene extinction event , which  चिह्नित  the  निधन   of   the   dinosaurs   और  many  अन्य  groups of life .
Older time  spans   जिससे  predate the reliable  चट्टान  record  (   पहले  the  proterozoic   इओन  ) are defined  by  absolute  आयु   .
The TI-82  is   a   graphing  calculator made  by  Texas  यंत्र  .
The TI-82  थी  designed  in   1993  as  a  stripped  bas  , more  उपयोक्ता  friendly version  of   the   ti-85  ,  और  as a  बदलना  for the TI-81 .
it   थी  the  सीधा  predecessor of  the  TI-83  .
It  साझा  with the TI-85 a  6   mhz  Zilog  z80  microprocessor  .
Like the TI-81 , the TI-82 features  a  96x64 pixel display ,  और   the   कोर  feature set  of  the TI-81 with  अनेक  new  सुविधाएँ  .
the  cast of  वर्ण   of   the  King  of  Fighters  xi  .
The King of  सेनानी  fighting game series ,  उत्पादित   by  SNK Playmore  ,   शामिल  a wide cast  of   वर्ण  ,  कुछ  of which  हैं  taken  इससे  other SNK games .
The story takes place  in  a  fictional   ब्रह्मांड  in which  an  annual series  of   3-on-3  or  4-on-4   लड़   tournaments  are held  .
The  पहला  game in  the   श्रेणी  introduces the initial  प्रमुख   अक्षर  of  the   श्रेणी  ,  kyo  Kusanagi , a young Japanese fighter who is the heir to a powerful group of martial  कलाकारों  having  pyrokinetic   abilities   .
kyo   झगड़े  against the  kusanagi  clan  's  enemies  ,  his  प्रतिद्वंद्वी  Iori  yagami   ,   और   the  god Orochi and its human  अनुसरणकर्ता  ,  among   अन्य   .
The  पहला  four  खेल  in the series revolve about these fights , while The King of  सेनानी   '99  introduces  a  new story arc  ,  revolving around K ' , a young man  जो  seeks to destroy the  रहस्यमय   nests  organization  क्युकी  they  kidnapped  him at  an   जल्दी   आयु   और  stripped him of  उसके   पास्ट   यादें   ,  so that they  could   फ़ोर्स   उसे  to  be   a   सेनानी  under their  कंट्रोल   .
In The  किंग  of Fighters 2003 , a new  अक्षर  named Ash  crimson   enters  the tournament ,  to   चोरी  the powers  of   the  clans who  sealed  the Orochi  in  the past for an unknown reason .
a  new group  of  antagonists ,  ज्ञात   as  Those From  the  Past , also appears  in   the   श्रेणी   ;   वे  want to obtain  orochi   's  power for  the   purpose  of giving it to their  अनजान  master .
The plot and the  वर्ण   आए   इससे  the  yamata   no  Orochi  लेजेंड   .
वहीँ   हैं  also  अनेक   वर्ण  in the  खेल   कि  are  parodies   or  homages to several popular  दुश्मनी  , manga , and films .
Merchandise based  on  the  वर्ण   रै   भी   महरूम  released , including action  आंकड़े  and keychains .
the   वर्ण   have  garnered praise  इससे  several video  खेल  publications for the  विशेषता  of their  डिजाइन  and movesets .
टिप्पणी  focused on the  कमी   of  improvements in  कुछ  of  the   वर्ण  ,  लकिन  added  कि   the  roster  is  greatly  विविध  .
व्हेल  Wars is a weekly  अमरीकी  documentary-style reality television  श्रेणी   कि  premiered  on   नवम्बर  7  ,  2008 on the  एनिमल   ग्रह   केबल  channel .
The  कार्यक्रम  follows  पॉल  Watson , founder of  the  Sea Shepherd  संरक्षण   समाज   ,   as  he and the crew aboard their  विभिन्न  vessels harass Japanese whalers off the coast  of  Antarctica  .

The  harpy   त्रिभुज  ( Harpia harpyja ) is a  neotropical  species of  त्रिभुज  .
it   is  sometimes  ज्ञात   as  the American Harpy Eagle to distinguish  it  from  the  Papuan Eagle which is sometimes known  as  the  नई  Guinea  harpy   त्रिभुज  or Papuan Harpy  त्रिभुज  .
it  is  the   largest  and most powerful raptor  मिला   in  the Americas , and among the largest  extant  species of eagles  in  the world .
It usually  inhabits  tropical lowland rainforests in  the   अपर  (  emergent  ) canopy layer .
Destruction  of   इसके  natural habitat has seen  it   vanish  from many parts of  इसके  former  दायरा   ,   और   it  is  nearly   extirpated  in Central America .
biological   वर्गीकरण  , or  वैज्ञानिक  classification in  जीवविज्ञान   ,   is  a  विधि   of  scientific taxonomy used to  समूह   और   categorize  organisms into groups  ऐसे   as  genus or species  .
These  समूह  are  ज्ञात  as taxa ( singular : taxon  )  .
Modern biological classification has its  रूट   in   the  work  of  Carolus Linnaeus  ,   जो  grouped species  according   to   साझा  physical characteristics .
ये   groupings   have   चूंकि  been revised  to   improve  consistency with the Darwinian principle of common descent .
साथ  the  परिचय   of   the   cladistic  method in the  लेट   20th   सदी  , phylogenetic taxonomy  in  which  जीवों   हैं   grouped  based purely on  inferred  evolutionary  relatedness   ,   ignoring   morphological   समानता  , has become  आम   in   कुछ  areas of  जीवविज्ञान   .
Molecular phylogenetics  ,  which uses DNA  sequences   as   आंकड़ा  , has also driven  अनेक  recent revisions and  is   संभावित  to continue doing  so   .
Biological  वर्गीकरण   belongs   to  the science of  biological  systematics .
Lennon  's  signature
John  विंस्टन  Ono Lennon ,  (   born  John  विंस्टन   लेनन   ;   9   अक्तूबर  1940  –  8  दिसम्बर   1980  ) was an  अंग्रेज़ी  musician  ,   सिंगर   और   songwriter  who rose to  विश्वव्यापी  fame as  a  founder member of the  बीटल्स   ,  one of  the  most  commercially  successful  और   critically   acclaimed  acts in  the  history of  लोकप्रिय  music .
With Paul  mccartney   ,  he formed  एक   of  the most  मनाये   songwriting  partnerships  of  the  20th  century .
Born and raised in Liverpool  ,  as  a   किशोरावस्था  Lennon became involved  in  the  skiffle   craze   ;  his first  बैंड  , the  quarrymen  ,  विकसित  into  the   बीटल्स   in  1960 .
As the group disintegrated towards the  समाप्त   of   the   दशक   ,  Lennon embarked on a solo  करियर  that produced  the  critically acclaimed  एल्बम   जॉन  Lennon/Plastic Ono Band and Imagine ,  और  iconic songs such as ``  दे  Peace  a   मौका   ``  and `` Imagine `` .
After  उसके  marriage to  योको  Ono in 1969 , he  बदला  his  नाम  to  जॉन   ओनो   लेनन  .
Lennon  disengaged  himself from  the  music  कारोबार  in  1975  to  devote  time  to  raising his  शिशु   बेटे   शॉन   ,  but re-emerged  साथ  Ono  in   1980  with the new  एल्बम   दोगुना  Fantasy .
he  was  murdered   तीन   सप्ताह  after its  रिलीज   .
Lennon revealed a  rebellious   प्रकृति  and acerbic wit in  उसके   म्यूज़िक  , writing , drawings  ,   on  film  और  in  साक्षात्कार  .
विवादास्पद   through   उसके   राजनैतिक  and peace activism  ,   he   स्थानांतरित  to New York  नगर   in  1971  ,  where his  आलोचना  of  the   वियतनाम  War  resulted  in a  lengthy   attempt  by  रिचर्ड  Nixon 's  प्रशासन   to  deport him  ,  while some  of  his songs were adopted  as  anthems by  the   anti-war  movement .
as   of   2012   ,   लेनन   's   सोलो  album  बिक्री   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  exceed 14  लाख  units  ,  and as writer ,  co-writer  or performer ,  he  is responsible  लिये  25 number-one singles  on   the  US  hot  100  चार्ट  .
in   2002  , a  बीबीसी   पोल  on the 100  महानतम  Britons  voted   उसे  eighth  ,   और  in  2008   ,  Rolling Stone  क्रमित  him the fifth-greatest  सिंगर  of all time .
He was posthumously  inducted  into the  songwriters   हॉल  of Fame in 1987  और   into  the  चट्टान  and  फेंकें  Hall of  कीर्ति  in 1994 .
Statue of Rip van Winkle in Irvington , New York , not  दूर   इससे  `` Sunnyside  ``  ,  the   घर  of Washington Irving
`` Rip Van Winkle '' is a  छोटी  story by American  लेखक  Washington Irving published in 1819  ,  as well  as  the name of the  स्टोरी   's  fictional  समर्थक  .
लिखा  while Irving  थी  living  in  Birmingham , England  ,   it  was  भाग  of  a  collection entitled The Sketch  किताब  of  geoffrey  Crayon .
Although  the   स्टोरी  is  नियत  in  नई   यॉर्क   's   catskill   kyu  , Irving  बाद  admitted , ``  जब   i   लिखा  the story  ,  I  था  never  महरूम  on the  catskills  . ''
Throughout the  fifty-five  year  इतिहास  of  the  Grammy Awards ,  अनेक  significant  रिकॉर्ड  have  महरूम   नियत  .
This  पेज  only includes the competitive  पुरस्कार  won  by  various artists .
इस  does  नहीं   शामिल  the  विभिन्न  special  पुरस्कार   कि  are presented by the  नेशनल  Academy of  रिकॉर्डिंग  Arts and Sciences such as Lifetime Achievement  पुरस्कार  , Trustees  पुरस्कार   ,  Technical Awards  or  Legend Awards .
The page however does include other  non-performance  related  grammys  ( known  as  the  शिल्प  & Production  फ़ील्ड  )  कि   may  have  महरूम   प्रस्तुत  to the  कलाकार  ( s ) .
pee-wee  Herman is a  कॉमिक   fictional   अक्षर  created  और   portrayed  by American  हास्य   पॉल   reubens   .
He  is  best known for his two television  श्रेणी  and  फिल्मी  series during the 1980s .
the  childlike  pee-wee  Herman  अक्षर  developed  as  a stage  अधिनियम  that quickly led  to   an   एचबीओ   खास  in  1981  .
As  the  stage performance  gained  further popularity , Reubens  took  the character to  गति  picture with  pee-wee  's Big  एडवेंचर   in  1985  ,   toning  down the adult  innuendo  for the appeal  of  children .
इस   प्रशस्त  the way  लिये   pee-wee  's  playhouse  , an  एमी   पुरस्कार   जीतना  children 's  श्रेणी   कि   भागा  on CBS  इससे   1986-1991  .
Another film  ,   बिग   शीर्ष   pee-wee  , was  released  in 1988 .
Due to negative media  ध्यान   following  a  कांड   in  1991  ,  Reubens decided  to   shelve   उसके   alter  ego  दौरान   the  1990s  ,  and then gradually resurrected it  दौरान  the following decade  .
It was at  कि   समय  that  reubens  addressed plans to write a new Pee-wee  फिल्मी  ,  pee-wee  's Playhouse  :  The Movie  .
in  June 2007 ,  reubens   appeared  as  pee-wee  Herman for the first  समय   चूंकि   1991  at Spike  tv  's Guys  '  Choice Awards  .
कि   '70s  Show is  an  American  टेलीविज़न  period sitcom  कि  centers  on  the lives of a group of teenage friends living  in  the fictional  suburban  town of Point Place  ,   विस्कॉन्सिन  ,  इससे   may   17   ,   1976   ,  to December  31  , 1979 .
It debuted  on   the  Fox television network ,  पहला   airing  on August 23  ,   1998  ,  कार्यशील   लिये  eight  लगातार  seasons , and concluding  साथ  the 200th episode  on   may  18 , 2006 .
The main teenage cast  सदस्यों  were Topher Grace , Mila Kunis ,  एश्टन   कूचर  , Danny Masterson  ,   लौरा  Prepon  ,  and  wilmer   valderrama  .
The main adult cast  सदस्यों  were  डेबरा  Jo Rupp  ,   kurtwood   स्मिथ  ,  डॉन  Stark and ,  दौरान  the first  तीन  seasons , Tanya Roberts .
कान्सास  (  )   is   a  U.S. state  स्तिथ   in  the  midwestern  United States .
It  is  named after the Kansas River which flows through  it  ,  जिससे  in  फेरे   थी  named after the Kansa Native American tribe  ,  which inhabited the area .
the  tribe 's  नाम   (  natively kką :  ze   )  is  प्रायः  said  to  mean  ``  people  of  the  हवा  ''  or  ``  लोगों   of  the  दक्षिण  wind  ,  '' although this  थी  probably not the  पद   's  original meaning .
Residents of  कान्सास  are  पुकारा  `` Kansans .  ''
For  हज़ारों   of  years  कया   is  now  कान्सास  was home  to  numerous  और   विविध  Native  अमरीकी   जनजातियों  .
जनजातियों   in  the  पूर्वी  part of the state  generally   जिया   in  villages along the  नदी  valleys .
जनजातियों  in the Western part of the state  यहूद  semi-  nomadic   और  hunted  विशाल  herds of  बाइसन  .
कान्सास   थी   पहला   settled  by European  अमेरिकी  in  the  1830s , but  the  pace  of   उपनिवेश  accelerated in the 1850s , in  the  midst of  राजनैतिक  wars  over   the   गुलामी  issue .
When officially opened  to  settlement  by   the  U.S. government in  1854   ,   abolitionist   free-staters  from  नई  England and pro-slavery settlers from  neighboring  Missouri rushed  to  the territory to  determine   if   कान्सास  would become a free  राज्य  or a slave state .
Thus  ,  the area  थी   a  hotbed of violence and chaos in its early  दिनों  as these  शक्तियां   collided   ,  and  थी  known as Bleeding Kansas .
the  abolitionists eventually prevailed and  on   जनवरी  29  ,  1861  ,  Kansas entered  the   संघ  as a free state .
बाद  the Civil War  ,   the  population  of   कान्सास   grew   rapidly   ,  when waves  of  immigrants  turned  the prairie  into   farmland   .
आज  ,  कान्सास  is one of the most productive  agricultural  states  ,  producing high yields of  गेहूं   ,   ज्वार  and  sunflowers  .
Kansas  is  the 15th most extensive and the 33rd most populous of the  50   संयुक्त  States  .
Psychology  is   an  academic and applied discipline  कि   involves  the scientific  पढ़ाई  of  दिमागी   कृत्यों   और  behaviors  .
मनोविज्ञान   रै  the immediate goal  of   समझना  individuals  और  groups  by  both establishing general principles and researching  विशिष्ट  cases ,  और  by many accounts  it  ultimately aims  to  benefit society .
in  this field  ,  a professional  or   शोधकर्ता  is  पुकारा   a   मनोवैज्ञानिक   और  can be classified as  a  social  ,  behavioral  ,   or  cognitive scientist  .
Psychologists attempt to understand  the  role of  दिमागी  functions in  व्यक्तिगत  and social behavior , while  भी  exploring  the   physiological  and  neurobiological  processes that underlie  निश्चित  cognitive  कृत्यों  and  व्यवहार   .
psychologists  explore  अवधारणाओं   ऐसे  as  बोध  , cognition , attention ,  जज्बात   ,  phenomenology ,  प्रेरणा  , brain functioning  ,  personality , behavior , and  interpersonal  relationships .
psychologists   of   विविध  stripes also  consider  the  बेहोश   दिमाग   .
Psychologists employ empirical  विधि  to  infer  causal  और  correlational relationships between  psychosocial  variables .
In addition ,  or  in  विपक्ष  , to employing  अनुभवजन्य  and  निगमनात्मक  methods  ,  some—especially clinical and counseling psychologists—at  टाइम्स   rely  upon  सांकेतिक   निर्वचन   और   अन्य  inductive techniques  .
मनोविज्ञान   रै  been  वर्णित  as a ``  हब   विज्ञान  '' , with  मनोवैज्ञानिक  findings linking  to  research and  perspectives  from  the  social sciences ,  प्राकृतिक  sciences , medicine ,  और   the  humanities  ,  such as  दर्शनशास्त्र   .
While  मनोवैज्ञानिक  knowledge is  प्रायः  applied  to   the   मूल्यांकन  and  उपचार   of  mental  स्वास्थ्य  problems  ,  it is  भी  directed  towards  understanding and solving  समस्याएं  in many  अलग  spheres  of  human activity .
The  बहुमत   of  psychologists  हैं  involved in  कुछ  kind  of   therapeutic  role  ,  practicing in  नैदानिक   ,   counseling  , or school  जमावट  .
Many  do  scientific  शोध  on a  चौड़ी   दायरा   of  topics  सम्बन्धित  to mental  प्रक्रियाओं   और  behavior  ,  and typically work in  विश्वविद्यालयों   मनोविज्ञान  departments  or   सिखा  in  अन्य   अकादमिक  settings (  e.g.   ,  medical schools  ,  hospitals  )   .
Some are employed in  औद्योगिक  and  organizational  settings ,  or  in  अन्य   क्षेत्रों   ऐसे  as human development and  वृद्धावस्था   ,   खेल  , health , and the media  ,  as  खूब  as in forensic  छानबीन  and  अन्य  aspects  of  law  .
Thomas Jefferson ( April 13 , 1743 ( April  2  ,  1743   o.S.   )  –  जुलाई   4  , 1826 ) was an American  founding   पिता   ,  the  प्रिंसिपल  author of  the   घोषणा   of   स्वतंत्रता  (  1776   )  and the third  अध्यक्ष  of  the  United  राज्य  ( 1801–1809  )  .
at  the beginning  of   the   अमरीकी  Revolution ,  he   परोसा  in the  महाद्वीपीय   कॉंग्रेस  ,  representing  Virginia and  तब  served as a wartime  राज्यपाल   of   वर्जिनिया  (  1779–1781  ) .
बस  after the  युद्ध  ended ,  इससे  mid-1784  जेफरसन  served as  a   राजनयिक  ,  stationed  in Paris  .
in   may  1785  ,   he   became  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  Minister to France  .
Jefferson  थी  the  पहला  United  राज्य  Secretary of  राज्य   (   1790–1793  ) serving under  अध्यक्ष   जार्ज   वॉशिंगटन  .
साथ  his close  dost   जेम्स   मैडिसन  he  व्यवस्थित   the  Democratic-Republican Party ,  और  subsequently  resigned  from Washington 's cabinet  .
निर्वाचित   वाइस   अध्यक्ष  in 1796  ,   जब   he  came in second  to  John Adams of the  federalists   ,  Jefferson  opposed   एडम्स   और  with  मैडिसन  secretly  लिखा  the Kentucky and Virginia  रिज़ॉल्यूशन   ,  which attempted to nullify  the   एलियन  and  राजद्रोह  Acts  .
निर्वाचित   अध्यक्ष  in what Jefferson called the Revolution of  1800  , he oversaw the  खरीदें  of the vast  louisiana  Territory  इससे   फ़्रांस  (  1803  ) ,  और  sent the Lewis and  क्लार्क  Expedition  (  1804–1806  )  to  explore  the new west .
His  दूसरी   पद   थी  beset with troubles at  घर  , such as the failed treason  विचारण   of  his former  वाइस  President Aaron Burr .
With escalating trouble with Britain  जो  was  चुनौतीपूर्ण   अमरीकी   neutrality  and threatening shipping at  समुद्र  , he tried economic warfare  साथ   उसके   embargo   कानून  which  तभी   क्षतिग्रस्त   अमरीकी   व्यापार  .
in  1803 ,  अध्यक्ष  Jefferson initiated  a  process of Indian tribal removal and relocation to the Louisiana Territory  वेस्ट   of  the Mississippi River  ,  in order  to  open lands  लिये   eventual  American settlers .
a   नेता   in  the Enlightenment  ,  Jefferson was  a  polymath who  spoke  five  भाषाएं  fluently and  थी  deeply  दिलचस्पी  in science  ,   आविष्कार   ,  architecture  ,  religion and philosophy , interests that led him  to  the  founding  of the  विश्वविद्यालयों   of  Virginia after his  प्रेसिडेंसी  .
He designed his  अपना  large mansion on a 5,000 acre plantation near  charlottesville  , Virginia , which he named  monticello  .
जबकि   नहीं  a notable orator  ,   जेफरसन   थी  a skilled writer and  corresponded  with many influential people in  अमेरिका  and  यूरोपीय   throughout  his  वयस्क   जीवन   .
Though  जेफरसन  owned  अनेक   स्लेव   ,   he  opposed  the   संस्था  all  उसके  life  और  consequently treated and took care  of  them very well and  अपेक्षित  them  to   कार्य   no   अधिक  than free farmers .
Since  1802  historians and  अन्य  have been divided over the controversy of  whether   जेफरसन  was  the  father  of  one  or  more  children  belonging to Sally  hemings  ,  a   स्लेव  at  monticello   .  ''
इतिहासकारों  are also in disagreement with how much Jefferson was committed  to   the   anti-slavery  cause .
In 1807  ,  President  जेफरसन  signed into law  a  bill that banned  the  importation of slaves  into   the  United  राज्य  .
After Martha Jefferson , his  बीवी   of  eleven years  ,  died  in  1782 ,  जेफरसन  remained  a   विधुर   लिये  the rest of  उसके   जीवन  ;  उनके  marriage produced six children , of whom  दो   बच  to adulthood .
Though Jefferson has  महरूम   criticized  by many  आधुनिक  day scholars over  the  issue  of  slavery ,  he  remains  रेटेड  as one of  the  greatest U.S. presidents .
`` Sun  नगर   ''   is   a   1985  protest  सोंग  written  by   स्टीवन  Van Zandt  ,  produced by  वैन  Zandt and Arthur  बेकर  and recorded  by  Artists  संयुक्त   विरूद्ध   रंगभेद  to convey opposition to  the   दक्षिण  African  नीति  of  रंगभेद   .
The  प्राथमिक  means  of  that opposition is  to  declare  कि  all the artists involved would  इंकार  any and  सब  offers  to  perform at Sun City , a resort  जिससे  was located in  bantustan  of Bophuthatswana , one of a  क्रमांक   of   internationally  unrecognized supposed ``  स्वतंत्र   ''   राज्य   निर्मित  by  the  South African  सरकारी  to  forcibly   relocate  its black  जनसांख्यिकी   .
