the   नेशनल   बास्केट  Association  (  NBA  )  is a major  पेशेवर  basketball  लीग   in   उत्तर   अमेरिका   .
It  थी   संस्थापित  in  1946   as  the Basketball Association  of  America  (  BAA )  .
the  league  अपनाया   इसके  current name  at   the  start of  the  when  it  merged with  the  National Basketball League  (  NBL ) .
The NBA  फाइनल  is  the   चैंपियनशिप  series  लिये  the NBA and the conclusion of the sport  's  postseason .
The winning  टोली   of  the  श्रेणी   receives  the Larry O'Brien Championship Trophy  .
Players from  the  winning  टोली  usually  प्राप्त  championship  बजती  from the team  honoring  their contribution .
however   ,   in  some rare  अवसर  ,  the  teams opted to  दिया   अन्य   commemorative  items , such as  कलाई  watches , instead  of   बजती  .
the   क्रमांक   of  championships  जीती  by NBA  सुपरस्टार  is  प्रायः  used as  a   मापन   of   उनके  greatness .
Boston Celtics center Bill  रसेल  holds the record  लिये  the most NBA  championships  won with 11  शीर्षक  during  उसके  13-year  playing   करियर  .
he  won his first championship with the  बोस्टन  Celtics in  उसके  rookie  साल  .
Afterwards , he went on to win 10 championships in the  अगला  12 years  ,   सहित   आठ  consecutive championships from  1959  to 1966 .
he  won the last two championships  in  1968 and 1969 as player-coach .
रसेल   's  teammate  ,  Sam Jones  ,  won 10 championships from 1959  to   1969  , the second  सबसे  in  एनबीए  history .
चार   सेल्टिक्स  players , Tom  heinsohn   ,  K.  C.  Jones ,  satch  Sanders and John  havlicek  , won eight  championships  each .
दो  other Celtics  ,   जिम   loscutoff   और  Frank Ramsey  ,   जीती  seven championships each .
Four players , Bob Cousy ,  kareem  Abdul-Jabbar ,  माइकल   जॉर्डन   और   scottie   pippen  , won six championships  प्रत्येक   .
जॉर्डन   और  Pippen  हैं  members  of  the Chicago Bulls team who won  तीन   लगातार  championships  twice   in  the 1990s .
रॉबर्ट  Horry and John  salley  are the only players  to  have won the championships with  तीन   अलग   टीमों   .
horry  won seven championships  साथ   the  Houston Rockets ,  the  Los Angeles  लेकर्स  and the  सैन  Antonio  स्पर्स   ,   जबकि   salley  won four championships with the  डेट्रॉयट  Pistons ,  the   bulls  and the Lakers .
Frank  शाऊल   और  Steve  केर  are  the  only  खिलाड़ी  to win two championships  साथ   दो   अलग  teams in consecutive  सीज़न  .
Saul  जीती   लगातार  championships  साथ  the Rochester  रॉयल्स   और   the   मिनियापोलिस  Lakers  in  the 1950s  ,  while Kerr  जीती   लगातार  championships with  the  Bulls and  the  Spurs in  the  1990s,
सटीकता  indicates proximity of measurement results to the true value  ,  precision  to  the repeatability ,  or  reproducibility of the measurement
In  the   फ़ील्ड  of science  ,  engineering  ,  industry ,  और  statistics ,  the   सटीकता  of a measurement system is the degree  of   निकटता   of  measurements of a quantity  to   कि  quantity 's actual  (  true ) value .
the  precision  of   a  measurement  प्रणाली  ,  भी   पुकारा  reproducibility or  repeatability  , is the degree to which repeated measurements  अंतर्गत  unchanged conditions show  the   वही   परिणाम   .
Although  the  two  शब्द  reproducibility  और  repeatability  can   be  synonymous in colloquial use ,  वे  are  deliberately   contrasted  in the context of the  वैज्ञानिक  method  .
A measurement  प्रणाली  can be accurate  लकिन   नहीं  precise , precise but not accurate  ,   neither   ,  or both .
For example , if  an   प्रयोग  contains  a  systematic error  ,   तब  increasing  the  sample  आकार  generally  increases   परिशुद्धता  but does  नहीं  improve  सटीकता   .
the   परिणाम  would be  a  consistent  yet   inaccurate  string  of  results  इससे   the   flawed  experiment .
Eliminating the systematic  गलती  improves accuracy but does not  बदलें  precision  .
A measurement  प्रणाली   is  designated  मान्य  if  it  is both accurate and  precise   .
Related  शर्तें  include bias ( non-  यादृच्छिक  or directed effects  caused   by  a factor  or   कारकों  unrelated  to   the  independent variable )  और   गलती  ( random variability  )   .
The terminology is  भी   लागू   to  indirect measurements—that  is   ,   मान  obtained by a computational procedure from  observed   आंकड़ा   .
in  addition to accuracy and precision  ,   माप   may  also  have   a  measurement resolution  ,  which is  the  smallest change in the underlying physical quantity that produces  a  response  in   the  measurement  .
in  the case of full reproducibility  ,  such as  जब  rounding a number to  a   representable  floating  पाइंट   क्रमांक   ,  the word  परिशुद्धता  has a meaning  नहीं  related to  reproducibility  .
लिये   उदाहरण  ,  in   the  IEEE 754-2008 standard  it  means the number of  बिट्स  in the significand  ,  so  it   is   प्रयुक्त  as a measure for the  सापेक्ष   सटीकता  with  जिससे   an  arbitrary  क्रमांक   can   be  represented  .
बकवास   in  its literal meaning refers to the  अधिनियम  of sexual intercourse  .
It is an  अंग्रेज़ी  word that is  प्रायः  used as  a   profanity   ,  either  to  denote  तिरस्कार   or   as  an intensifier .
the   उत्पत्ति  of  the   शब्द   is  obscure .
it  is usually considered to  be  first  attested  to around 1475 ,  लकिन  it may  be  considerably older  .
in  modern usage  ,  fuck  और  its derivatives  (   ऐसे  as fucker and  fucking  ) can be used  in  the  स्थिति   of  a noun ,  a   क्रिया   ,  an  क्रियाशील  or  an  adverb .
There are many  आम  phrases  जिससे  make use of  the   शब्द   ,  as  खूब   as   a  number of  यौगिकों   incorporating   it   ,  such as  motherfucker   .
Animated  ,   color-coded   मैप   प्रर्दशित  the various  महाद्वीपों   और  regions .
depending  on  the   सम्मेलन  and  मॉडल  , some  महाद्वीपों  may be  संचित   or  subdivided : for example  ,  Eurasia  is   सबसे  often subdivided  into  Europe and  एशिया   (  red  शेड्स   )   ,  while North  और   दक्षिण   अमेरिका   हैं   sometimes  recognized as  एक  American  महाद्वीप  (  ग्रीन  shades  )  .
a  continent is  एक   of  several  बहुत  large landmasses on Earth  .
वे   हैं  generally  पहचाना  by convention rather  than  any  सख्त   मापदण्ड  , with  up  to  सात  regions  commonly   regarded  as  continents—they  are  (  from  largest  in size to smallest  )  : Asia ,  अफ़्रीकी  , North  अमेरिका  , South  अमेरिका  ,  अंटार्कटिक  ,  यूरोपीय  , and Australia  .
In  भूविज्ञान   ,  continents are  वर्णित  by means  of  tectonic  प्लेटों   .
Plate tectonics  is  the process  और  study of the movement  ,  collision and division  of  continents ,  पहले   ज्ञात  as continental drift .
Biker  बॉयज  is  a   2003  film  परिचय  a group of  भूमिगत   मोटरसाइकिल   खीचें  racers  .
it   सितारों   laurence  Fishburne , Djimon  hounsou  , Derek Luke , Meagan Good  ,   और   larenz  Tate and  is  written  और   निर्देशित  by  reggie  Rock  bythewood  .
it  also  सुविधाएँ  Lisa  bonet   ,  Orlando  जोन्स  , Kid Rock and Vanessa  घंटी  Calloway .
For  the  Steel  पैंथर  song  ,   देखिए  Feel the Steel  .
Community property is a marital  प्रॉपर्टी  regime  कि  originated  in   सिविल   विधि  jurisdictions and  is  now also  मिला  in some  आम   विधि  jurisdictions  .
The  राज्य   of  the  संयुक्त  States  कि  recognize  जातियाँ   प्रॉपर्टी  are  primarily  in the West  ;   it   थी  inherited from  मैक्सिको  's  ganancial   जातियाँ  system ,  जिससे  itself was inherited  इससे   स्पेनी  law ( a Roman  -derived  civil law  प्रणाली   )   और  ultimately  इससे  the  visigoths   .
जबकि  under Spanish  नियम   louisiana  adopted the ganancial community system  of  acquests and  gains  ,  जिससे   replaced   the   परंपरागत   फ्रेंच  community  of  movables and  acquests  in  इसके  civil  विधि  system .
Map  of  the  संयुक्त  States with community property states  highlighted  in red .
In  जोड   to   the  highlighted  राज्य  , Alaska is a separate property state that  permits  couples to  ऑप्ट  into  a  community property arrangement  .
in   a  community  प्रॉपर्टी  jurisdiction ,  सबसे  property acquired  दौरान   the  marriage (  मगर  for  उपहार  or  inheritances  )  —the   जातियाँ  , or communio  bonorum—is   स्वामित्व   jointly  by both spouses  और   is   विभाजित  upon divorce , annulment or death  .
Joint  स्वामित्व   is  automatically  presumed   by  law in  the  absence  of  specific  प्रमाण  that  होता  point to  a  contrary conclusion for  a  particular piece  of  property  .
Division  of  community  प्रॉपर्टी   may  take  प्लेस   by   मद  , by splitting  सब  items or by value  .
in  some jurisdictions , such  as  California  ,   a   50/50  division  of  community property is strictly mandated  by  statute , meaning that the focus  तब  shifts to whether particular items are to be classified as community  or  separate property  .
In other  jurisdictions   ,   ऐसे  as Texas , a  तलाक   अदालत   may   डिक्री   an  `` equitable distribution  ``   of   जातियाँ  property  ,   जिससे  may result in  an   गैरबराबरी   प्रभाग  of such .
In non-community  प्रॉपर्टी  states property may  be  divided  by  equitable  वितरण   .
Generally speaking  ,  the property that  प्रत्येक  partner brings into  the   विवाह  or receives by  तोहफा  , bequest or  मक्कारी   दौरान  marriage is  पुकारा  separate property  (  i.e.  ,   नहीं  community property  )  .
देखिए   प्रभाग   of  property  .
प्रभाग   of  community  debts   may  not be  the   वही  as division  of   जातियाँ  property .
For  उदाहरण   ,  in California ,  जातियाँ  property  is  required to be  विभाजित  ``  बराबर  '' while community debt  is  required to be divided `` equitably  ''  .
प्रॉपर्टी  that is owned  by  one  जीवनसाथी   पहले  the  विवाह   is  the separate  प्रॉपर्टी  of that  जीवनसाथी   ,  unless  the  property  is  `` transmuted  ''   into  community  प्रॉपर्टी   .
The rules  लिये  this vary  इससे  jurisdiction to jurisdiction .
The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge waving to the crowd at The  मॉल  shortly  बाद  the wedding  .
The wedding of Prince William ,  ड्यूक  of Cambridge ,  और  Catherine Middleton took  प्लेस  on 29 April  2011   at   वेस्टमिंस्टर  Abbey  in  London  .
the   दूल्हे  ,  प्रिंस  William , Duke of  कैम्ब्रिज  , is the eldest son of  चार्ल्स  , Prince  of   वेल्स   ,  and is  दूसरी  in  the  line of succession  to   the   अंग्रेजों  Throne  और  the thrones  of  fifteen other Commonwealth realms  .
the   बहू   ,  Catherine `` Kate ''  मिडलटन   is  the eldest  of  three children of  माइकल  and  carole  Middleton of  bucklebury   ,  Berkshire .
the   डीन  of Westminster  ,  John Hall ,  presided  at the service ; the Archbishop  of   canterbury  , Rowan  विलियम्स   ,   conducted   the  marriage ; Richard  chartres   ,   the   बिशप  of  लंदन  ,  preached  the  उपदेश   ;  and a reading  थी  given  by  the  बहू   's  brother , James  .
William 's  बेहतरीन  man was his  bhai   ,  Prince Harry ,  जबकि  the bride 's sister ,  पिप्पा  ,  थी  maid  of   इज्ज़त  .
The ceremony was  attended  by the bride 's and groom  's  families , as  खूब  as  अनेक  foreign royals ,  राजनयिकों   ,  and  the   युगल   's   चुनी  personal guests .
बाद  the ceremony , the  युगल  made the  परंपरागत  appearance  on   the  balcony of  बकिंघम  Palace .
As Prince William  थी  not  the  heir  apparent  to  the  throne  ,   the  wedding  थी   नहीं  a  पूरा   राज्य   अवसर   और   अनेक   विवरण  were  बाएँ  to  the  couple to decide , such  as   much  of  the   अतिथि  list of  परिचय  1,900 .
प्रिंस  William  और   केट   मिडलटन  met  in   2001  .
उनके  engagement on  20  October  2010  was announced on 16  नवम्बर  2010 .
The build-up to  the   विवाह  and the  अवसर   itself   आकर्षित   much  media  ध्यान  ,  होने  compared in many  तरीके  with the 1981 marriage of William 's  अभिभावक  .
The occasion  थी  a public holiday in the United  किंगडम  and featured  अनेक  ceremonial aspects ,  सहित   उपयोग   of   the  state carriages and roles  लिये   the  Foot Guards  और   household   प्यादे  .
Events were held  around  the  राष्ट्रमंडल   to  mark the  विवाह   ;  organisations and hotels  आयोजित   कार्यक्रम   आरपार   कनाडा  ,  over   5,000  street parties  यहूद  held throughout the  संयुक्त   किंगडम   ,   और   एक  million people lined the route  between   वेस्टमिंस्टर  Abbey and Buckingham Palace .
The  रस्म  was  viewed  live  by   tens  of  लाखो  more around  the   संसार  , including 72 million on the  youtube  Royal Channel .
in   the  United Kingdom  ,  television audiences peaked at 26.3  लाख  viewers , with a  कुल   of   36.7  million watching part of  the   कवरेज   .
Vanessa  आनन्द  Lachey  (  née Minnillo ; born  नवम्बर  9  ,  1980  )  is an American  टेलीविज़न  personality  ,   टेलीविज़न  host ,  फ़ैशन   मॉडल   ,  and  अभिनेत्री  .

A hand ( med .  /  lat  .  : manus  ,  pl  .  manūs  )  is  a  prehensile  ,  multi- fingered  extremity  located at the end  of   an  arm or  forelimb  of primates  और  humans , chimpanzees  ,  monkeys  ,  and  lemurs   .
a   few  other vertebrates such  as   the  koala ( which has two  opposable   thumbs   on  each `` hand ''  और  fingerprints  remarkably   समान  to  इंसान  fingerprints  )   हैं  often described  as   having   either  ``  हैंड्स  ''  or  `` paws  ''  on  उनके   सामने   limbs  .
Hands  हैं   the  main structures  लिये  physically  manipulating   the  environment  ,  used for both gross motor skills  (   ऐसे   as  grasping  a  large  ऑब्जेक्ट   )  and fine  मोटर  skills ( such as picking  up   a   छोटी  pebble ) .
the   उंगलियों  contain  कुछ  of the  densest   क्षेत्रों   of   तंत्रिका  endings on the body  ,  are  the  richest source  of  tactile  प्रतिक्रिया   ,  and have  the  greatest  positioning  capability  of  the body  ;  thus  the  sense  of   टच   is  intimately  संबद्ध   साथ  hands .
Like  अन्य   युग्म   अंगों  ( eyes , feet  ,  legs  )  , each  हाथ  is dominantly  नियंत्रित   by  the opposing brain hemisphere , so  कि  handedness  ,  or  the  preferred  हाथ  choice  लिये  single-handed activities such as  लिखने   साथ   a  pencil ,  reflects  individual brain functioning .
कुछ   विकासवादी  anatomists  उपयोग   the   पद   हाथ   to  refer to  the  appendage of  अंक   on   the  forelimb  अधिक  generally — for  उदाहरण  ,  in  the context of  whether  the three digits of the  बर्ड   हाथ  involved the  वही   समजात   घाटा  of  दो  digits as in  the  dinosaur hand  .
the   इंसान   हाथ  has 27 bones  ,  not including  the  sesamoid bones which number  varies  between  लोगों   .
14 of which  हैं   the  phalanges ( proximal  ,  intermediate  और  distal  )   of  the fingers  .
The  metacarpals  are the bones that connects  the   उंगलियाँ  and the wrist  .
Each human hand has 5  metacarpals  and  8  carpal  हड्डियों  .
Too  कूल  was  a  professional wrestling tag team and  पूर्व   गुट   सबसे   notably   क्रियाशील   in  World Wrestling  federation/entertainment   between  1998  और  2001  और  for a short  समय  in 2004  .
मौलिक   डिजिटल  alarm  क्लॉक  without a radio .
the   चिह्नित   in   the  top-left of the  प्रदर्शक  indicates that the  समय  is 4:00pm  ,  not 4:00am  .
A  1969  radio alarm clock  (   सोनी  Digimatic  8fc-59w  ) with  an   जल्दी   mechanical-digital  display .
a  digital  क्लॉक   is  a  प्रकार  of clock  कि   प्रदर्शक   the   समय  digitally  ,  i.e  .   in   numerals  or  अन्य  symbols , as opposed  to  an analog  क्लॉक   ,   जहाँ  the time is  indicated  by the positions of  घूर्णन   हैंड्स   .
डिजिटल  clocks are often associated with electronic drives  ,  but the  ``  digital ''  वर्णन  refers only  to  the display , not to the drive  यांत्रिकी  .
( Both  एनालॉग  and digital clocks  can   be   चलित  either  mechanically  or electronically ,  लकिन  ``  घटीयंत्र  '' mechanisms with  डिजिटल  displays  हैं   विरल  . )
The biggest digital clock is  the  Lichtzeitpegel  (   ``  Light Time  स्तर  '' ) on the television tower Rheinturm Düsseldorf , Germany  .
Family  guy  creator  सेठ  MacFarlane also provides the voices of Peter  griffin  , Stewie Griffin  ,   ब्रायन  Griffin , and Glenn  कीचड़  .
Family  guy  is an  अमरीकी  animated sitcom  कि  features  पाँच   प्रमुख   आवाज़   अभिनेताओं  ,  और  numerous regular  डाल  and recurring  अतिथि   सितारों  .
the   प्रिंसिपल  voice cast  consists  of  दिखाएँ  creator  सेठ   macfarlane  ,  एलेक्स   borstein  , Seth Green  ,  Mila  kunis  ( who  replaced  Lacey  chabert  after the first  ऋतु  ) and  माइक  Henry and now  ,  the new actor  beau  Osborne  .
पुनरावर्ती  voice actors include  पैट्रिक   warburton   ,  Adam West  ,   जॉन   G.  Brennan , Nicole  सुलीवान   और  Jennifer Tilly  ,  and repeat guest stars  शामिल   फिलिस  Diller , Charles Durning ,  फटाफट   limbaugh   ,  and  फिल   lamarr  .
Many  डाल  members provide voices  लिये  multiple  वर्ण   .
the   आवाज़   अभिनेताओं   ,  in portraying  the   विभिन्न   अक्षर   personalities   on   the  show , draw inspiration  इससे  celebrities and pop culture .
Family Guy  वर्ण   have   महरूम  played by more than one actor ,  बाद  members  of  the  दिखाएँ   बाएँ   the   श्रेणी   or  had conflicting  दायित्वों  .
Kunis was  मनोनीत  for an  एनी  Award  लिये   voicing   मेग  Griffin in the season 5  एपीसोड  `` Barely  विधिक   ``   और  MacFarlane  रै  also  जीती   an  Emmy  पुरस्कार   लिये   बकाया   voice-over  Performance  और  an Annie  पुरस्कार  for Best Voice Acting  in  an Animated  टेलीविज़न  Production  ,  though no other cast  सदस्य  has  जीती  an award for their work on the  श्रेणी  .
The  पाँच  sets of  the  board game  एकाधिकार   चित्रित   यहाँ  show the evolution  of   the  game 's artwork and  डिजाइन   in   the  United  राज्य  from  1935–2005  .
The history of the  फलक   खेल   एकाधिकार   can   be  traced back  to   the  early  20th  century .
the  earliest  ज्ञात   डिज़ाइन   थी  by the American , Elizabeth  magie  , patented in 1904 but  मौजूदा  as early  as   1902   .
Magie  's   असली  intent  थी   to  publish  a   फलक   खेल  to illustrate an economic principle  ,  namely  the  Georgist concept  of  a single land value  कर  .
A series of board  खेल  were developed  इससे  1906  through   the  1930s that involved  the   खरीदे   और  selling  of  land and the  विकास  of that  जमीन  .
by   1934  , a  फलक  game  था  been  निर्मित  much  जैसे  the version  of  Monopoly sold  by   पार्कर   भाइयो  and its related companies  through   the  rest of the  20th   सदी   ,  and  into   the   21st   .
Several people  ,  mostly in  the  Midwestern United  राज्य   और   निकट   the   ईस्ट  Coast  ,   contributed  to the  खेल  's  डिज़ाइन  and evolution .
By the 1970s  ,   the  idea that  the  game had  महरूम   निर्मित  solely  by  Charles Darrow had  become  popular  लोकगीत  ; it  थी  printed in the  खेल  's  निर्देश  for  अनेक  years , in  a  1974 book devoted to Monopoly ,  और  was cited in a  सामान्य   किताब   परिचय  toys even as recently  as  2007 .
भी   a  guide to family games  प्रकाशित  for Reader 's  डाइजेस्ट   in   2003  only  दिया   क्रेडिट  to Darrow and Elizabeth  magie  , erroneously  stating  that  magie   's  original game  थी   निर्मित   in  the 1800s , and not  acknowledging  any of the game  's   विकास  between Magie 's creation of the  खेल   ,  and  the  eventual publication by Parker Brothers  .
Also  in   the  1970s  ,  Professor Ralph  anspach  ,  जो  had himself published a board game intended  to  illustrate the  सिद्धान्त   of  both  monopolies   और   विश्वास  busting , fought  पार्कर  Brothers and its then  जनक  company , General Mills ,  over  the trademarks of the Monopoly board game .
Through the  शोध   of  Anspach and  अन्य  ,  much   of  the early  इतिहास  of  the  game  थी  `` rediscovered '' .
Anspach confronted  maxine  Brady ,  लेखक   of  the 1974  किताब  The  एकाधिकार  Book : Strategy and Tactics of  the  World  's  Most Popular  खेल   over   the   वास्तविक  history  of  the game  on   बैरी  Farber 's New  यॉर्क  City talk  दिखाएँ  in  1975  .
Because  of  the lengthy court  प्रक्रम  ,  सहित   appeals   ,  the legal status  of   पार्कर   भाइयो  '  trademarks   on  the  खेल  was  नहीं  settled until  1985  .
the   खेल  's name  remains  a registered  ट्रेडमार्क   of  Parker Brothers  ,   as   do  its  विशिष्ट   डिज़ाइन   तत्व  .
At  the   निष्कर्ष   of   the   अदालत  case  ,   the  game 's logo  और   ग्राफिक  design  तत्व   became  part of a larger Monopoly  ब्रांड   ,   licensed   by   पार्कर  Brothers ' parent  कंपनियाँ   onto  a  किस्में   of  items  through  the present day  .
despite   the  `` rediscovery ''  of   the   फलक  game  's  early history in the 1970s and  1980s  , and  अनेक  books and journal articles on  the  subject  ,  Hasbro (  पार्कर  Brothers '  वर्तमान  parent  कम्पनी  ) did not acknowledge any of the game 's  इतिहास   पहले  Charles Darrow  on  its  आधिकारिक  Monopoly  जालस्थल   as   recently   as  June 2012  .
nor   किया   हास्ब्रो   acknowledge  anyone other than Darrow in materials published or  प्रायोजित  by them ,  at  least as recently  as  2006  .
International tournaments , first  आयोजित  in the  जल्दी  1970s , continue  to  the present , with the  अगला  world  चैंपियनशिप   संभावित  scheduled for 2013 .
Starting in 1985 , a new  पीढी  of spin-off board  खेल  and card  खेल  appeared  on  both  पहलू  of  the  Atlantic Ocean  .
In 1989 , the first of many video game and computer  खेल  editions  थी  published  .
चूंकि  1994 ,  अनेक  official variants  of  the  खेल   ,  based  on  locations other  than   अटलांटिक  City , New Jersey (  the  official  u.S.  setting ) or London ( the official  राष्ट्रमंडल   सेटिंग   ,  excepting  कनाडा  ) ,  have  been  प्रकाशित  by Hasbro or its licensees  .
in  2008 ,  हास्ब्रो   permanently   बदला   the  color  योजना  and some of the  gameplay   of  the  मानक  U.S  .  Edition of the game  to   मैच  the  uk   संस्करण   ,  although the U.S. standard edition  maintains   the  Atlantic  नगर  property names  .
Hasbro also  परिवर्धित   the  official  लोगो  to give the `` Mr .  एकाधिकार  '' character  a  3-D  computer-generated  look  ,   जिससे  has  चूंकि  been adopted by licensees USAopoly , Winning Moves  और  Winning Solutions .
And  हास्ब्रो   रै   भी  been including the Speed  die   ,  introduced  in   2006  's Monopoly  :   the   आचमन  Edition by Winning  चालें   खेल  , in versions produced directly  by  Hasbro (  ऐसे   as  the  2009  Championship Edition )  .
in  baseball ,  a   बलिदान   मक्खी  is  a  batted ball that satisfies four criteria:
There are fewer  than  two outs  जब   the  ball is  hit  .
The  बॉल  is hit  to  the outfield (  मेला   or  foul )  ,  or  to  infield  बेईमानी   territory  .
The  बैटर  is  put   आउट   क्युकी   an   outfielder   (  or  an   infielder  running  in  the  आउटफील्ड   ,  or  बेईमानी  territory ) catches the  बॉल  on the fly  (  alternatively  if   the  batter would  have  been out  if  not for  an  error  or   if  the  outfielder  drops  the   बॉल  and another runner is  put  out  )   .
A  धावक  who  is   already   on   आधार   स्कोर  on the play  .
it  is called a `` sacrifice  ''  fly because  the  batter  presumably   intends   to  cause  a  teammate  to   स्कोर  a  चलाएं   ,   जबकि   sacrificing  his  अपना  ability to  do  so .
Minnesota  (  ) is a U.S. state located in  the   midwestern  United States .
मिनेसोटा   थी   carved   आउट   of  the  पूर्वी   हाफ  of  the  Minnesota  territory   और  admitted  to  the Union  as  the 32nd state  on  May 11  ,  1858  .
Known as the `` Land  of   10,000  Lakes  ''   ,  the  राज्य   's  name  आता   इससे  a Dakota  शब्द   लिये  ``  sky-tinted  water  ''   .
Those waters , together with  वनों   ,   पार्क  ,  और  wilderness  क्षेत्रों  ,  प्रस्ताव  residents and tourists  a  variety of  बाहरी  recreational opportunities .
मिनेसोटा   is   the   12th  most extensive and the  21st  most  populous  of  the   u.S.  states .
Nearly 60 % of its residents live  in  the Minneapolis–Saint Paul metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  (  ज्ञात  as the `` Twin Cities  ''  ) , the center of  परिवहन  , business , industry , education , government  और  home to an internationally  ज्ञात  arts community .
The  शेष  of  the  state  consists   of   पश्चिमी  prairies  अभी   दिए  over to intensive agriculture  ;   पतझड़ी   वनों   in   the  southeast ,  अभी  cleared  ,   farmed  and  settled   ;  and the less  आबादी  North  वुड्स  , used  लिये  mining  ,  forestry ,  और   मनोरंजन   .
Minnesota is known for  इसके  relatively mixed  सोशल   और   राजनैतिक  orientations  ,   और   रै  a high  रेट  of  नागरिक  participation  और  voter turnout .
Minnesota ranks among the  healthiest   राज्य  ,  और   रै  a highly literate  जनसांख्यिकी   .
the   विशाल   बहुमत  of residents are  of  Scandinavian  और   जर्मनी  descent  .
the  state is known  as  a  बीच   of  Scandinavian  अमरीकी   संस्कृति  .
Ethnic  विविधता   रै  increased  in  recent decades .
Substantial  influxes  of  एशियाई   ,   अफ़्रीकी  ,  और  Latin American  आप्रवासियों   have  joined  the  descendants  of   यूरोपीय  settlers and the  असली  Native  अमरीकी  inhabitants .
Grants are  non-repayable   निधि   by   एक  party ( grant  makers   )   ,  often a government department  ,  corporation ,  न्यास  or  विश्वास   ,   to  a  ,  often  (   लकिन   नहीं   सदा  ) a nonprofit  एंटिटी   ,  educational  संस्था  , business or  an  individual  .
in   अनुक्रम   to   प्राप्त  a  ग्रान्ट  ,  कुछ   रूप  of  ``  Grant Writing '' often  referred  to as either  a  proposal or an  अनुप्रयोग  is usually  जरूरी  .
Most grants are made to  निधि   a  specific project  और  require  कुछ   स्तर   of   अनुपालन  and reporting  .
the  grant  लिखने  process  involves   an  applicant  submitting  a  प्रस्ताव   (   or  submission  )   to  a  संभावित  funder ,  either  on the applicant  's  own  पहल  or in  जवाब  to  a  Request for  प्रस्ताव   इससे   the  funder .
अन्य   अनुदान  can be given  to  individuals , such as victims  of  natural disasters or  individuals  who  तलाश  to  खोलें   a   छोटी  business  .
sometimes  grant  makers  require grant seekers to have  कुछ  form of  tax-exempt   औकात  ,  be   a   पंजीकृत   nonprofit   संगठन  or a local government .
For example  ,  tiered  funding   लिये  a freeway  हैं  very large grants negotiated at  सरकारी   नीति   स्तर   .
however  smaller grants may be  provided   by  a government  एजेंसी   (  e.g . municipal  सरकारी   )   .
project-related  funding involving governments ,  कारोबार  , communities  ,  and individuals is  प्रायः  arranged  by  application  either  in  लिखने   or   ऑनलाइन  .
Naturally occurring  कोबाल्ट  ( Co  )  is composed of 1  stable  isotope , 59Co . 28  radioisotopes  have been  characterized   साथ  the  सबसे   stable  being 60Co with  a   half-life   of   5.2714  years , 57Co  साथ   a  half-life of  271.79   दिनों  , 56Co  साथ  a half-life of  77.27   दिनों  ,  और   58co   साथ  a half-life of  70.86   दिनों  .
सब  of the  बाकी  radioactive isotopes have half-lives  कि  are  कम   than  18  घंटों   और  the majority  of  these have half-lives that are less  than  1 second  .
This element also  रै   11   मेटा   राज्य   ,   सब   of  which have half-lives less than  15  minutes  .
The isotopes of  कोबाल्ट   दायरा   in  atomic weight from  47co  to 75Co .
The  प्राथमिक  decay mode  लिये   isotopes  with atomic  द्रव्यमान  unit  मान  less  than   कि   of  the  सबसे   abundant  stable  समस्थानिक  ,  59co  ,  is  electron capture and the primary  विधि  of  क्षय  for those of  वृहद  than 59 atomic mass units  is  beta decay  .
The primary decay  उत्पाद  before 59Co are iron isotopes  और  the  प्राथमिक   उत्पाद   बाद   हैं   निकल   isotopes  .

Who Moved  my   चीज  ?
An  अद्भुत  Way to  सौदे   साथ  Change  in   अपना  Work and in Your  जीवन   ,  published  in  1998  ,  is a motivational book by  स्पेंसर   जॉनसन  written  in   the   स्टाइल  of a parable or  कारोबार  fable .
it  describes change  in  one 's  कार्य  and life  ,  and four  ठेठ   प्रतिक्रियाएँ   to   कहा   बदलें  by  दो  mice and two  ``  littlepeople '' , during  उनके  hunt  लिये  cheese .
A New  यॉर्क  Times  कारोबार   बेस्टसेलर  since release ,  जो   स्थानांतरित  My Cheese  ?
remained on  the  list  लिये   लगभग  five  सालो  and spent over  200   सप्ताह   on  Publishers  साप्ताहिक  's hardcover  nonfiction  list  .
It has  बेची   अधिक  than  26  million copies  विश्वव्यापी   in   37  languages and  remains   to  be  एक   of  the best-selling business  किताबे   .
निकिता  Sergeyevich  khrushchev  (  –   सितंबर   11   ,   1971  ) led  the   सोवियत   संघ   दौरान  part  of   the   ठंडा   युद्ध  .
He served as  पहला   सचिव  of the  कम्युनिस्ट  Party  of  the Soviet  संघ  from 1953 to  1964   ,  and as Chairman  of  the  परिषद   of  Ministers ,  or  Premier  ,  from  1958  to 1964  .
khrushchev  was  जिम्मेदार  for  the   आंशिक  de-Stalinization of  the  Soviet Union ,  लिये  backing the progress  of  the early Soviet space program  ,   और  for  अनेक  relatively  उदार   reforms  in areas of  घरेलू   नीति  .
Khrushchev 's party colleagues  removed   उसे  from  शक्ति  in  1964   ,   replacing   उसे  with Leonid Brezhnev  as  First Secretary and Alexei Kosygin as Premier .
Khrushchev  थी  born in the  रूसी  village  of   kalinovka  in  1894  , close to the present-day border between Russia  और   युक्त  .
He was employed as a metalworker in his  युवावस्था  ,  और   दौरान  the  रूसी   सिविल  War  थी   a  political commissar .
With the help of Lazar Kaganovich  ,   he  worked  उसके  way up  the   सोवियत   पदानुक्रम   .
He supported Joseph  स्टालिन   's   purges  , and  स्वीकृत   हज़ारों  of arrests  .
in   1939  ,  स्टालिन   भेजा  him to govern Ukraine , and he continued the  purges   वहीँ   .
During what was  ज्ञात   in  the  सोवियत  Union as the Great Patriotic War ( Eastern Front of World War II ) , Khrushchev  थी  again a  commissar   ,  serving as  an   intermediary  between Stalin  और  his generals  .
Khrushchev was  उपस्थित  at the  खूनी  defense of  stalingrad   ,  a fact he  took  great  अभिमान   in   throughout  his  जीवन  .
After the war  ,  he returned to  युक्त  before being recalled to  मास्को  as  एक  of  स्टालिन  's close  advisers   .
in  the  शक्ति  struggle  triggered  by  स्टालिन   's  death in 1953  ,  Khrushchev ,  बाद   अनेक   सालो  , emerged victorious .
On February 25 ,  1956  ,  at   the  20th Party Congress , he delivered the  ``  Secret  वाक  , '' denouncing Stalin 's  purges   और   ushering   in  a  कम  repressive era  in   the  Soviet Union .
His  घरेलू   नीतियों   ,  aimed at bettering the lives  of  ordinary citizens , were often  अप्रभावी   ,   विशेषकर   in  the  क्षेत्रफल  of  कृषि   .
Hoping eventually to  rely   on   मिसाइलें   लिये   नेशनल  defense ,  khrushchev   ordered  major cuts in conventional  शक्तियां   .
despite  the  कटौती  , Khrushchev 's rule saw  the  tensest years  of   the   ठंडा   युद्ध  , culminating  in  the Cuban  मिसाइल  Crisis .
Some  of   khrushchev  's policies were seen  as   erratic   ,  particularly  by  his  उभरते   विरोधियों   ,  who quietly rose  in   शक्ति   और   अपदस्थ  him in October  1964   .
he  did not  suffer  the  घातक  fate  of   कुछ   पिछला   losers  of  सोवियत  power  struggles  ,  लकिन  was  pensioned  off  साथ  an apartment in  मास्को  and a dacha  in  the countryside .
His lengthy memoirs  यहूद  smuggled to  the  West  और   प्रकाशित  in part  in   1970  .
khrushchev   died  in 1971 of heart  बीमारी   .
Upper gastrointestinal ( GI  )  bleeding refers  to  hemorrhage in  the  upper  जठरांत्र  tract .
the   anatomic   cut-off   लिये  upper  gi  bleeding is the ligament of  treitz  ,  जिससे   connects  the  चौथी  portion  of  the  duodenum  to the  diaphragm  near the splenic flexure  of  the colon .
अपर   gi  bleeds are  माना  medical emergencies ,  और   आवश्यकता   प्रवेश  to hospital for urgent  निदान   और  management .
Due to advances in medications  और  endoscopy ,  अपर  GI  hemorrhage   is  now usually  treated   बगैर  surgery .
World population  estimates   इससे   1800   to   2100  ,  आधारित  on UN  2010   projections  (  रेड   ,   नारंगी  , green  )  and  us   जनसांख्यिकी   ब्यूरो  historical  estimates  (  ब्लैक  )  .
Actual recorded population figures are in  ब्लू   .
According to  the   उच्चतम   अनुमान   ,  the world population  may  rise to 16 billion by 2100  ;   according   to  the lowest estimate ,  it  may decline to 6 billion .
The world  जनसांख्यिकी   is  the total number of living  इंसानो  on  धरती  .
as  of today  ,  it is estimated to number  अरब  by  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau ( USCB )  .
The  uscb  estimates that  the  world  जनसांख्यिकी  exceeded 7 billion on  कूच  12  ,  2012  .
according   to   a  separate  अनुमान   by   the   संयुक्त  Nations  जनसांख्यिकी  Fund , it  पहुँचे   इस  milestone  on   अक्तूबर  31 , 2011 .
the   संसार   जनसांख्यिकी  has  अनुभवी   निरन्तर  growth  चूंकि  the  समाप्त  of the  ग्रेट   अकाल   और   the   ब्लैक   मौत  in 1350  ,  when it  stood   at  around  370  million  .
The  उच्चतम  rates  of   विकास   –  global  जनसांख्यिकी   increases   ऊपर   1.8  % per  साल  –  यहूद   देखी   briefly  during  the  1950s , and  लिये  a  longer  period during the  1960s  and  1970s   .
the  growth rate  peaked  at  2.2   %   in  1963 , and  था   अस्वीकृत  to 1.1  %  by 2011 .
Total annual births were highest  in  the late  1980s   at   परिचय  138 million , and are  अभी  expected to remain essentially  निरंतर  at their 2011 level  of  134  लाख  , while  मौतों  number 56  लाख  per year  ,   और   हैं   अपेक्षित   to   बढ़ाएँ  to  80   लाख   प्रति   साल  by 2040  .
वर्तमान  projections  दिखाएँ  a continued  बढ़ाएँ  in  जनसांख्यिकी  in the near  भविष्य  (  लकिन  a steady decline in the population  विकास  rate )  ,   साथ  the global population  अपेक्षित  to  पहुँचें  between 7.5  और   10.5   अरब   by  2050 .
विभिन्न  longer-term estimates predict further growth  ,  stagnation  ,  or even overall  मनाही   in  the  वैश्विक  population  by  2150 .
कुछ  analysts  have   questioned  the sustainability of further  संसार  population  विकास  , citing  the  growing  pressures   on   the   पर्यावरण  , global food supplies ,  और  energy  संसाधन   .
फिलिप्स  Lumileds Lighting  कम्पनी   is   the  manufacturer of a wide range  of  high-power/high-efficiency  light-emitting   diodes  (  leds  )  .
It  is   a  now a fully owned  प्रभाग   of  Philips  lighting   .
knuckle  mnemonic  लिये   the  number of  दिनों   in   प्रत्येक  month  of  the  gregorian   पंचांग  .
प्रत्येक  projecting knuckle  represents  a  31-day   माह   .
A mnemonic  (  , with a  मूक   ``   m   ''  )  ,  or mnemonic device ,  is  any  सीखना  technique that aids information retention .
Mnemonics aim  to  translate information into a form that  the  human brain  can  retain better than its original form .
Even the process  of  applying  इस  conversion might already aid  the  transfer  of  information  to  long-term memory  .
Commonly  encountered   mnemonics  are often for lists and in auditory form , such as short  कविताएं   ,  acronyms , or memorable  वाक्यांश  , but mnemonics can also be for  अन्य  types of information and in visual  or   kinesthetic   फ़ॉर्म   .
Their use is based on  the  observation  कि  the  इंसान   दिमाग  more  easily   remembers   स्थानिक  ,  निजी   ,  surprising  ,  physical  ,  sexual ,  humorous   ,   or   वरना   'relatable  '  सूचना  , rather than more abstract or  impersonal  forms of  सूचना  .
The word  mnemonic  is  निकला   इससे   the   प्राचीन  Greek word  μνημονικός  ( mnēmonikos ) , meaning  ``  of memory '' and  is  related to  mnemosyne  ( `` remembrance ''  )  ,  the   नाम   of   the  goddess  of  memory  in  Greek  mythology   .
Both of  ये  words are  निकला  from  μνήμη  ( mnēmē ) , `` remembrance ,  मेमोरी  ''  .
mnemonics  in antiquity  यहूद   सबसे  often considered in  the   कॉन्टेक्स्ट  of  कया  is  आज  known  as  the  आर्ट   of  memory  .
प्राचीन  Greeks and  romans   विशिष्ट   between  two types  of   मेमोरी  : the 'natural '  मेमोरी  and the  'artificial   '   मेमोरी   .
The  पूर्व   is  inborn  ,   और  is the one  कि  everyone  उपयोग  automatically  और  without thinking  .
the  artificial  मेमोरी  in  कंट्रास्ट  has to  be  trained and  विकसित   through  the learning and  practicing  of  a  variety  of  mnemonic techniques  .
Mnemonic systems  हैं  special techniques  or  strategies consciously  प्रयुक्त   to  improve memory  ,   it   helps  employ  सूचना  already  भंडारित  in  long-term  memory  to   मेक  memorization  an  easier task .
अध्यक्ष  Bush signing the  no  Child Left  पीछे  Act at Hamilton H.S . in  हैमिल्टन  ,  ओहियो  .
the   no  Child Left  पीछे  Act of  2001  ( NCLB  )  is a United  राज्य  Act of Congress that  is   a  reauthorization  of  the  elementary  and Secondary Education  अधिनियम  ,  जिससे  included  शीर्षक  I ,  the  government  's  flagship aid  कार्यक्रम  for disadvantaged students  .
nclb  supports  standards-based   शिक्षा  reform  आधारित  on  the  premise that  सेटिंग   ऊँची  standards  और   establishing  measurable goals can improve  व्यक्तिगत   outcomes   in  education .
The Act requires states  to  develop  आकलन  in basic  कौशल  .
States must  दे  these  आकलन  to  सब   विद्यार्थी  at  चुनें  grade levels in order  to  receive  संघीय   स्कूल  funding  .
The Act  करता  not assert a national achievement standard ;  मानकों  are  नियत  by each individual  राज्य  .
NCLB expanded the  संघीय   भूमिका  in  पब्लिक  education  through   सालाना  testing ,  सालाना   अकादमिक  progress ,  रपट  cards  ,  teacher qualifications , and funding changes  .
The  विधेयक  passed in  the   u.S.   कॉंग्रेस   साथ  bipartisan  support  .
