A  पिकअप  truck  or   pick-up   ,   प्रायः  simply referred  to   as   a   पिकअप  ,  is   a  light  मोटर   गाडी  with  an  open-top ,  पश्च   कार्गो  area ( bed ) .
In North  अमेरिका  ,  the   पद  pickup is used for  लाइट   ट्रक  with  a  lighter duty chassis and factory built , integrated  bed  ,  as   खूब  as for coupé utility vehicles  ,   प्रायः   आधारित   on   a  personal car chassis , but also often  on  a  खास   समर्पित  chassi for such  उपयोग   .
Some countries have their own terms similar to  पिकअप  ,  ऐसे  as ute in Australia and New Zealand  ,   or  bakkie in South Africa .
Large pickup  ट्रक   हैं  somewhat rare  in  Europe ,  जहाँ  vans and  लाइट   lorries  are  commonly   प्रयुक्त  for similar  भूमिकाएँ   .
This 15th-century depiction of Charlemagne  और   पोप  Adrian  i  shows a well-bred medieval horse with arched  गर्दन  , refined head and elegant gait .
घोड़े  in the  मध्य   आयु  differed in size , build and breed from the  आधुनिक  horse , and  यहूद  , on average , smaller .
They were  भी   अधिक   सेंट्रल  to  समाज  than their modern  counterparts  ,  होने   अनिवार्य  for war , agriculture , and  हस्तांतरण   .
Consequently ,  विशिष्ट  types of  घोड़ा  developed , many of  जिससे   have  no modern equivalent  .
जबकि  an  समझना   of   आधुनिक  horse breeds and equestrianism is  vital   लिये  any  विश्लेषण  of the medieval horse ,  शोधकर्ताओं  also need  to  consider documentary ( both written and  सचित्र  ) and archaeological evidence .
Horses  in   the   मध्य   आयु  were rarely differentiated by breed  ,  but rather  by   उपयोग  .
This  led   उन्हें   to  be described ,  लिये  example  ,   as   ``  chargers  ``  (  युद्ध  horses  )   ,  `` palfreys  ``  (  सवारी  horses  )  , cart horses  or   packhorses  .
Reference is  भी   दिए  to  उनके  place of origin , such  as  `` Spanish  घोड़े   ,   ''  but whether  इस  referred to  एक  breed  or   अनेक   is  unknown .
Another difficulty arising during any study of medieval documents  or  literature is  the   लचीलापन  of  the  medieval languages , where  अनेक   शब्द  can be used for one  बात  (  or  , conversely  ,   अनेक   वस्तुएँ  are referred to  by   एक  word  )   .
Words  ऐसे  as  '  courser '  और  'charger  '  are used interchangeably  (  even within one  दस्तावेज़  ) , and  जहाँ  one epic  may  speak disparagingly of a rouncey , another praises  इसके  skill and swiftness  .
significant  technological advances  in   घुड़सवार   उपकरण   ,  often  introduced  from other cultures , allowed for significant changes in both  warfare  and  कृषि   .
In  particular  , improved  डिजाइन   लिये   the  solid-treed  काठी  as  खूब  as  the   आगमन  of  the  stirrup  ,   नाल  and horse  कॉलर  were significant advances in medieval  समाज  .
नतीजतन  , the assumptions and  theories   विकसित   by  historians are not  निर्णायक  , and  बहस   स्टिल  rages on many issues , such  as  the breeding  or  size of  the   घोड़ा  ,  और   a  number  of   स्त्रोत   जरूर   be   consulted  in order  to  understand  the   विशालता  of the  विषय   .
the  Music  man   is   a   musical   साथ   किताब  ,  म्यूज़िक   ,  and lyrics  by  Meredith Willson ,  आधारित   on   a   स्टोरी   by   willson  and Franklin Lacey .
The  प्लाट  concerns con man Harold Hill , who poses  as   a  boys  '   बैंड   आयोजक   और  leader and sells band instruments and  वर्दी   to  naive townsfolk before skipping town with  the  cash .
in   नदी  City , Iowa , prim librarian and piano teacher Marian Paroo  sees  through him ,  लकिन  when Hill helps  उसके   younger  brother  overcome  his fear of  सोशल  interactions  due  to  उसके  lisp  ,  Marian begins  to   पतन  in love with Harold  .
हेरोल्ड  , in  फेरे  falling  लिये  Marian  ,   risks   होने  caught  to   जीत  her .
in   1957   ,  the show became a  hit  on Broadway ,  जीतना   पाँच   टोनी  Awards , including Best Musical  ,  and running for 1,375  प्रदर्शन  .
The  डाल  album won the first  ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार  for `` Best  असली   डाल  Album  ''  and was number  एक   on   the  Billboard charts  लिये  245  सप्ताह   .
the   दिखाएँ   's   कामयाबी  led to  revivals  and a popular  1962   फिल्मी  adaptation and a  2003   टेलीविज़न   रीमेक   .
it  frequently is produced  by   दोनो   पेशेवर  and amateur  थिएटर  companies .
Surveyor 's wheel
A  निरीक्षक   's   व्हील   ,  also  पुकारा  a clickwheel  ,   hodometer  , waywiser , trundle  व्हील  ,  measuring  wheel  ,  or perambulator is  a  device for measuring distance  .
Largest non-polar  रेगिस्तान
Sand  टीले   in   the  Rub  '   al   खली  (  ``   खाली  quarter ''  )   of   सऊदी   अरब   .
Makhtesh Ramon ,  negev  desert ,  इसराईल
a  desert  is   a  landscape or region of land that  is  very dry  क्युकी  of low  वर्षा   amounts   (  precipitation  )  , often  रै  little  कवरेज  by plants , and  in  which streams dry up unless they are  supplied  by water  इससे   बाहर  areas .
रेगिस्तान   can   भी   be  described as areas where more water is  खोया  by  evapotranspiration   than  falls  as   वर्षण   .
Desert  पौधे   जरूर  have special adaptations to survive with  इस  little water  .
Deserts generally receive less than  25   cm   of   बरसात   (   वर्षण  ) each year  .
Semideserts  or   steppes  are  regions   जिससे  receive between  और   .
in  the Köppen climate  वर्गीकरण  system , deserts are  classed  as  bwh  ( hot desert )  or  BWk  (   शीतोष्ण  desert  )  .
In the  thornthwaite  climate classification system ,  रेगिस्तान  would be classified as arid megathermal climates  .
World War I  (  WWI  )   थी   a   वैश्विक   युद्ध  centred  in  Europe  कि  began  on  28 July 1914  और   lasted   जबतक  11 November 1918 .
It was predominantly called the World War  or  the Great  युद्ध  from its occurrence  जबतक  the  प्रारंभ  of World War  ii   in  1939  ,   और  the First  संसार   युद्ध   or  World War  i  thereafter .
it  involved all  the  world 's great powers  ,   जिससे   यहूद  assembled  in   दो  opposing  alliances  : the  allies   (   आधारित  on the Triple  entente  of  the  United  किंगडम   ,  France and  रूस   )   और  the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany , Austria-Hungary and  इटली   ;  but ,  as   austria–hungary   था  taken  the  offensive against  the  agreement , Italy  किया  not enter into the war )  .
These alliances were both reorganised  और   विस्तारित  as more  राष्ट्र  entered  the  war : Italy  ,  Japan and the United States  joined  the  allies   ,   और   the  Ottoman  साम्राज्य  and  बुल्गारिया   the   सेंट्रल  Powers  .
ultimately  , more than 70  लाख  military personnel  ,  including 60 million  europeans  ,  यहूद   mobilised  in one  of   the  largest  युद्धों   in   इतिहास   .
More than 9 million combatants were killed ,  largely   क्युकी   of   technological   advancements   कि   led   to  enormous  increases   in   the   lethality   of   हथियार  without corresponding improvements in protection or  गतिशीलता  .
It  थी  the  fifth-   deadliest  conflict in world history  ,  subsequently paving  the   रास्ता  for various political  परिवर्तन  , such as revolutions in  अनेक   of  the nations involved  .
One of the long-term causes of  the   युद्ध  was the  पुनरुत्थान   of  imperialism  in  the  विदेशी  policies of the great  शक्तियां   of   यूरोपीय  .
अधिक  immediately ,  the  assassination of  archduke  Franz  फर्डिनेंड  of Austria , the  वारिस   to  the throne of Austria-Hungary , on  28   जून   1914  by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in  साराजेवो  triggered  a   राजनयिक  crisis  जब  Austria-Hungary subsequently  वितरित  an ultimatum  to   the  Kingdom  of  Serbia .
Several  alliances  formed over the  पिछला  decades were  invoked  .
Within weeks ,  the   प्रमुख   शक्तियां   यहूद  at  युद्ध  and ,  via  their colonies  ,   the  conflict soon spread around the world .
On 28  जुलाई   ,  the Austro-Hungarians fired  the  first  गोलियाँ  of  the  war  as   तैयारी  for  the  invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians  mobilised   ,  the Germans invaded neutral  बेल्जियम  and Luxembourg on the  रास्ता  to France , providing  a  casus belli  लिये   ब्रिटेन  's declaration of war against  जर्मनी  .
After the German  कूच  on Paris was  brought   to  a halt—the  so-called  Miracle of the  marne   —the  Western  सामने   settled  into a  स्थिर  battle of attrition with a trench  लकीर   कि   बदला   छोटी   जबतक   1917   .
On  the   पूर्वी  Front ,  the  Russian army was successful against the  austro-hungarians  , but  थी  stopped  in   इसके  invasion of East  prussia   by  the Germans .
in  November the Ottoman Empire joined  the   युद्ध   ,   खोलने  up  fronts   in  the Caucasus  ,  Mesopotamia and the  sinai  .
Italy and  बुल्गारिया  went to war in 1915 and Romania  in  1916  .
In  रूस   ,  the tsar 's government collapsed in  कूच   1917   और   a   subsequent  revolution in November  brought  the  russians  to  शर्तें  with the Central Powers .
बाद  a 1918  जर्मनी  offensive  साथ  the western  सामने   ,   the   allies   drove  back the Germans  in   a  series  of  successful  offensives  and  अमरीकी  forces began entering the trenches .
Germany  ,  which  था   इसके   अपना  trouble with  क्रांतिकारियों  , agreed  to  an armistice  on  11  नवम्बर  1918 .
The  युद्ध   ended  in  विजय  for the Allies .
कार्यक्रम   on  the home  fronts  were  as  tumultuous as  on  the  बैटल  fronts , as  the   भागीदार  tried to  mobilize  their  जनशक्ति  and economic resources to fight  a   कुल  war .
by   the  end of the  युद्ध  , four  प्रमुख  imperial powers—the  जर्मनी  ,  रूसी  ,  austro-hungarian   और   उस्मानी  empires—ceased  to  exist .
The  successor   राज्य  of  the  former two lost  a   ग्रेट   राशि  of territory  ,  while the latter  दो  were  dismantled  entirely .
the   मैप   of   सेंट्रल  Europe  थी  redrawn  into  several  छोटी  states .
the   लीग   of   राष्ट्र   थी  formed in the  आशा  of preventing another  ऐसे  conflict .
The European  राष्ट्रवाद   शाखित   by  the  युद्ध  and  the  breakup of  empires   ,   the  repercussions  of   जर्मनी   's  defeat and  समस्याएं  with the Treaty of  versailles   हैं  agreed to be factors contributing  to   संसार  War II .
``  Girls Just  want  to  have  Fun  ''   is  a 1979 song originally written  by  Robert  जोखिम  and made  प्रसिद्ध   by   सिंगर  Cyndi Lauper .
It  थी   the  first major single released by Lauper as  a   सोलो  artist and  the  lead-off  सिंगल   इससे   उसके   डेब्यू  album She  's  So  असामान्य  .
lauper’s  version  gained  recognition as a  feminist  anthem  और   प्रचारित   by  an  award-winning   वीडियो  .
It  रै   महरूम   covered  on either  an  album or in  सजीव  concert  by  over 30 other artists .
the  single  थी  Lauper 's breakthrough hit , reaching  #   2   on  the Billboard Hot 100 and  बनने  a worldwide hit  throughout   लेट   1983  and  जल्दी   1984   .
it  remains  एक  of  lauper  's signature songs and was a  widely   लोकप्रिय  song during the era of  इसके  release  ,  the 1980s  .
the  `` Rolling  स्टोन  &  एमटीवी  : '100  महानतम   पॉप  Songs  '   :  1-50 '' , ``  रोलिंग  Stone : `` The  100  Top  म्यूज़िक  Videos ''  ''  and the ``  vh1   :  100 Greatest Videos '' lists ranked  the   सोंग  at  #   22  , # 39  और   #   45   ,   क्रमशः  .
The  सोंग   प्राप्त  a  ग्रैमी  Award nomination  लिये   रिकार्ड  of the Year and Best  मादा  Pop Vocal Performance .
View of  defibrillator  electrode position and placement .
Defibrillation  is  a common treatment  लिये   life-threatening  cardiac dysrhythmias , ventricular fibrillation , and pulseless ventricular tachycardia .
Defibrillation consists  of   delivering  a therapeutic  खुराक  of electrical energy to the  प्रभावित  heart  साथ   a  device called a defibrillator .
This depolarizes a  नाजुक  mass of  the  heart  मांसपेशी   ,   terminates  the dysrhythmia  ,   और  allows  सामान्य   sinus  rhythm  to   be   reestablished   by  the  देह  's natural pacemaker  ,   in  the sinoatrial node  of   the  heart .
defibrillators  can be  बाह्य  , transvenous  ,  or implanted ,  depending  on the  प्रकार   of  device used or needed .
कुछ  external  इकाई  , known  as   स्वचालित   बाह्य  defibrillators  (   aeds   )  ,  automate  the diagnosis  of  treatable rhythms , meaning that  lay   responders  or bystanders  हैं  able to  उपयोग  them successfully  साथ   छोटी   ,  or  in   कुछ  cases  no   प्रशिक्षण  at all  .
the   केटो   संस्थान  is  an   अमरीकी  libertarian  सोचो  tank  headquartered  in Washington  ,  D.C  .
It  थी  founded as  the   चार्ल्स  Koch Foundation in  1974  by Murray Rothbard  ,   ed  Crane  और   चार्ल्स  Koch ,  अध्यक्ष   of  the board  और   मुख्य   कार्यपालिका  officer of  the   संगुटिका  Koch  उद्योग  , Inc. .
In  जुलाई   1976  , the name  थी  changed  to   the   केटो   संस्थान  .
According to the  2011  Global Go To  सोचो   टैंक  Index , Cato is  the   6th   सबसे   influential  US based  सोचो  tank , ranking 3rd in Economic  नीति  and 2nd in Social  नीति   .
The  संस्थान   's  stated mission  is  ``  to   बढ़ाएँ  the  समझना  of  पब्लिक  policies based  on   the  principles  of   सीमित  government ,  फ़्री  markets , individual liberty  ,  and peace .
The Institute  होगा  use  the  most  प्रभावी   अर्थात्  to  originate  ,  एडवोकेट   ,  promote , and  disseminate   लागू   नीति   प्रस्ताव   कि  create free , open , and  सिविल  societies  in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  and  throughout  the  संसार  .  ''
केटो   विद्वानों  were critical  of  George  W.   बुश   's  Republican administration ( 2001–2009 ) on several  मुद्दे  ,  सहित  the Iraq War , civil liberties  ,   शिक्षा  , agriculture , energy  नीति  , and excessive government spending .
on   अन्य   मुद्दे   ,   वे   समर्थित   बुश  administration initiatives , most notably health care ,  सोशल  Security  ,   वैश्विक   वार्मिंग  , tax policy  ,   और  immigration .
During  the  2008 U.S. presidential  चुनाव   ,   केटो  scholars criticized both major-party  उम्मीदवार   ,  John  मैक्केन   और  Barack Obama .
Cato  रै  criticized  अध्यक्ष   ओबामा   's  stances on policy  मुद्दे  since his  उद्घाटन   ,  such as fiscal  stimulus  , healthcare reform ,  विदेशी  policy ,  और  the War on Drugs , while supporting his stance on the  repeal   of   do  n't  पूछो  , Do  n't   बताना  and liberal  आव्रजन   नीति  .
Dracula is an 1897  गोथिक   हॉरर  novel by Irish  लेखक  Bram  स्टोकर   .
प्रसिद्ध  for introducing  the   अक्षर  of  the   पिशाच   गिनती   ड्रैकुला   ,  the novel  tells   the  story  of   ड्रैकुला   's   attempt  to relocate from Transylvania to England ,  और  the  बैटल   between   ड्रैकुला   और   a  small group  of  men and  महिलाओं   led  by  प्राध्यापक   अब्राहम  Van  helsing   .
ड्रैकुला   रै   महरूम  assigned to  अनेक   साहित्यिक   जाति   सहित   पिशाच  literature , horror  fiction   ,  the  गोथिक  novel and invasion literature .
the  novel touches on themes  ऐसे  as  the   भूमिका   of  women in  विक्टोरियन  culture , sexual conventions , immigration , colonialism  ,  and post-colonialism .
Although Stoker did not  इफ़तेरा  the  पिशाच   ,  he  पारिभाषित  its modern  रूप  , and the novel has  शाखित  numerous theatrical  ,  film and television interpretations .
Quidditch  is  a  प्रतिस्पर्धी  sport  in  the  wizarding   संसार  of the  हैरी   कुम्हार  universe  ,  and is from the  श्रेणी  of  children  's novels  और   फिल्मों  .
It  is  an extremely  अशिष्ट  but very  लोकप्रिय   semi-contact  sport ,  निभाई   by  wizards and witches .
मिलान   हैं   निभाई  between two  टीमों  of  सात   खिलाड़ी  riding flying  broomsticks  , using four  गेंदें   और  six elevated ring-shaped goals ,  तीन   on  each side of the  quidditch   पिच  (  फ़ील्ड  ) .
In  the  Harry  कुम्हार  universe , Quidditch holds a fervent following similar to  the  position  कि  association  फ़ुटबॉल   holds  as  a   globally  popular sport  .
The sport is monumental throughout  the  wizarding  संसार  .
हैरी  plays an important  स्थिति  for  उसके   हाउस   टोली   at  Hogwarts : he is  the   seeker  and  becomes  the captain in his sixth year  वहीँ  .
Regional and international competitions are mentioned throughout the  श्रेणी  .
in  Goblet of Fire , Quidditch at Hogwarts is  रद्द  for the Tri-Wizard Tournament  ,  but Harry  और   the  Weasleys attend the  quidditch   संसार  Cup .
In  जोड  , Harry uses his  quidditch  skills to capture a golden egg  इससे   a  dragon  पुकारा   the   हंगेरियाई   horntail  ( in the first task of  the  Tri-Wizard Tournament ) ,  to  capture  a   उड़ती   कुंजी  in Philosopher  's  Stone , and on  दो  key occasions in Deathly Hallows — getting hold of Ravenclaw 's  diadem  ,  और  during the final fight with Voldemort — the `` unerring  कौशल   of  the  seeker   ''   is  useful  to  him in snatching the Elder Wand out of the  एयर  .
हैरी   कुम्हार  has owned  दो  broomsticks , the Nimbus  2000   और  the  firebolt  , both of which are destroyed by the series ' end .
The  खेल   रै  been adopted  in   the  real world  in  the form  of   मगलू  Quidditch .
The United States  कॉंग्रेस  is the bicameral  विधानमंडल  of  the   संघीय   सरकारी   of  the United States consisting of  दो  houses  :   the  lower  हाउस   ज्ञात  as the House  of   प्रतिनिधि  and the upper  हाउस   ज्ञात  as  the   सीनेट  .
Congress meets  in   the   कैपिटल  in Washington , D.C .
दोनो  representatives and  सीनेटरों   हैं   चुनी   through  direct  चुनाव   .
कॉंग्रेस  has  a   कुल  of 535 voting members :  435   सदस्यों  in the House  of  Representatives and 100 members in the Senate .
Members of the House of  प्रतिनिधि  serve  two-year   शर्तें   representing  the people  of  a district .
congressional  districts  हैं  apportioned to  राज्य   by   जनसांख्यिकी   using   the   संयुक्त  States Census results  ,  each state in  the   संघ  having at  तनिक   एक  representative in the House  of  Representatives  .
regardless   of   जनसांख्यिकी  ,  प्रत्येक  of  the  50  राज्य   रै   दो  senators ; the  100   सीनेटरों  each serve  a  six-year  पद  .
The  शर्तें   हैं   लड़खड़ाते  so  प्रत्येक   दो   सालो  approximately  one-third   of   the   सीनेट   is   up  for  चुनाव   .
Each staggered  समूह  of  one-third   of  the senators  हैं  called 'classes ' .
No state of the United States has  दो  senators from  the   वही  class  .
सबसे  incumbents seek re-election  ,  and  उनके  historical  likelihood   of  winning subsequent  चुनावों  exceeds  90  percent .
in  August 2012 , a Gallup  पोल  reported that  congress’s  approval  दरजा  amongst  अमेरिकी  was at  10   %  ,  मिलान  a  38-year  low reached  in   नवम्बर   2011  .
`` A  छोटी  More  देश  Than That  ''  is  the  title of  a   सोंग  written by  जॉय   +   रोरी  's  रोरी   ली  Feek , Wynn Varble , and Don Poythress  ,  and recorded by  अमरीकी  country artist Easton Corbin  .
It was released in  अगस्त  2009  as   कोर्बिन  's debut  सिंगल  and is  शामिल  on  उसके   self-titled   डेब्यू  album .
in  April  2010   ,   the  song  पहुँचे   क्रमांक   एक   on  the  देश  music charts ,  बनाना  Corbin the  पहला  male solo artist in  सात  years to send a debut single to  क्रमांक   एक  .
It  रै  been certified  सुनहरा   by   the   riaa  .
The BlackBerry is  a  line of wireless  हैंडहेल्ड  devices  और  services designed and  marketed  by  शोध   in  Motion  सीमित  ( RIM  )  operating  as   ब्लैकबेरी  .
the  first  ब्लैकबेरी   यंत्र  , an  ईमेल  pager  ,   थी   released  in 1999 ; the  सबसे   हाल  BlackBerry devices ,  the   z10   और   q10  , were announced on January  30  , 2013 .
The  उपयोक्ता  interface varies by model  ;  most feature  a  physical  क्वर्टी  keyboard , while  नए  generations have relied on  a  multi-touch screen and  आभासी   कुंजीपटल  .
A BlackBerry can  shoot  video  ,   लो  photos ,  खेल  music ,  और   perform  online  कृत्यों   ऐसे  as web-browsing  और  emailing  .
They can  भी  send and receive push email  और  instant messages while maintaining a  ऊँची   स्तर  of security through  on-device   संदेश  encryption  ,   और  are  designed   to  function as personal digital assistants  .
BlackBerry devices support a large variety of instant messaging features ,  साथ  the  सबसे   लोकप्रिय   होने  the proprietary BlackBerry Messenger service  .
The BlackBerry  playbook   is  a tablet computer offered  by  the  कम्पनी   .
the  100 millionth  ब्लैकबेरी   स्मार्टफोन  was  shipped   in  June quarter of  2010   और   the  200 millionth  स्मार्टफोन  was shipped  in   सितंबर  quarter of 2012 .
BlackBerry accounts for 3 % of mobile device sales worldwide in 2011  ,   बनाना   इसके   निर्माता   the   छठे   सबसे   लोकप्रिय  device  मेकर  (  25   %  of mobile device  बिक्री   हैं  smartphones ) .
the   उपभोक्ता  BlackBerry Internet Service  is  available in  91   देशों  worldwide  on  over  500  mobile  सेवा  operators using various mobile technologies .
as  of September 2012 , there were eighty  लाख   सदस्य   विश्वव्यापी   to   ब्लैकबेरी   .
in   2011  the Caribbean and  लैटिन  America had the  उच्चतम   penetrations   of   ब्लैकबेरी   स्मार्टफ़ोन   विश्वव्यापी  ,  साथ  up to  परिचय   45   प्रति  cent in the region  having  a RIM  यंत्र   .
BlackBerry , iPhone  ,   एंड्रॉइड   ,   और   खिड़कियाँ   फोन  are considered the four major  स्मार्टफोन  brands .
BlackBerry is widely referred to as `` CrackBerry '' in the United  राज्य   ,   जिससे   alludes  to its  excessive  use  by  its  स्वामी  and is a reference to the  addictiveness   of  crack cocaine .
उपयोग  of  the   पद  CrackBerry became so  फैली  that in November 2006  वेबस्टर   's  New World  कॉलेज  Dictionary named  ``  crackberry  ''  the `` New Word  of  the Year . ''
an   उदाहरण   of   a   माँग  curve shifting  .
The  शिफ़्ट  from  d1  To D2 means  an  increase  in  demand  साथ   consequences  for the other variables
In economics  ,  the demand curve is  the  graph depicting the  संबंध   between   the  price of  a   निश्चित   कमोडिटी  and the amount  of  it that consumers are willing and able to purchase at that  दिए  price .
It is a graphic representation  of  a  माँग  schedule .
The demand curve for  सब  consumers  साथ  follows from the demand  वक्र  of every individual consumer  :  the individual demands at each  दाम   हैं   added   साथ   .
Demand  वक्र   हैं   प्रयुक्त   to   अनुमान  behaviors in  प्रतिस्पर्धी  markets , and  हैं   प्रायः  combined with  सप्लाई   वक्र  to  अनुमान  the equilibrium price  (  the price  at   जिससे  sellers together  हैं  willing to  बेचें   the   वही  amount  as  buyers together  हैं  willing to  ख़रीदे  ,  भी  known as  मार्केट   clearing  price )  और   the  equilibrium quantity (  the  amount of  कि   शुभ  or  सेवा   कि  will be  उत्पादित   और   खरीदा   बगैर  surplus/excess  सप्लाई  or  shortage/excess  demand  )  of that  मार्केट  .
in  a monopolistic market , the demand curve facing the  monopolist   is   बस   the   मार्केट   माँग  curve .
historia
by  Nikolaos Gysis (  1892  )
History ( from Greek -  historia   ,  meaning `` inquiry  ,  knowledge  acquired  by investigation '' )  is  an umbrella  पद  that relates to  पास्ट  events  as  well as the discovery  ,   संग्रहण  ,  संगठन  , and presentation of  सूचना  about these events .
The term includes  लौकिक   ,   भूगर्भिक  ,  और  organic  इतिहास   ,   लकिन   is   प्रायः   generically  implied to  औसत   इंसान  history  .
विद्वानों  who write  परिचय   इतिहास  are called  इतिहासकारों  .
History can also refer  to  the academic  अनुशासन   जिससे   उपयोग  a narrative to  जाँचें  and  analyse   a  sequence of past events ,  और   objectively   determine  the patterns  of  cause  और  effect  कि  determine  उन्हें   .
Historians sometimes  बहस  the  प्रकृति  of history and its  उपयोगिता   by  discussing  the  study  of  the discipline as an  समाप्त   in  itself and  as   a   रास्ता  of providing `` perspective '' on  the  problems  of  the  उपस्थित  .
Stories common  to  a  particular   संस्कृति   ,   लकिन  not supported by  बाह्य  sources ( such as  the  tales surrounding  किंग  Arthur  )   हैं   प्रायः  classified as cultural heritage  or   महापुरूष  ,  क्युकी  they do  नहीं  support the  ``   disinterested   छानबीन   ''   जरूरी  of  the  discipline of  इतिहास  .
Events occurring prior to  लिखा  record  हैं  considered prehistory  .
हिरोडोटस  , a 5th century  b.c   .  Greek historian is considered  भीतर   the  Western tradition to  be  the `` father  of  history '' , and , along with his  समकालीन  Thucydides ,  helped  form the foundations for the  आधुनिक   पढ़ाई  of  इंसान  history .
उनके  work continues  to   be  read  आज  and the divide between  the   culture-focused   हिरोडोटस  and the  military-focused  Thucydides  remains   a   पाइंट   of  contention  or   दृष्टिकोण   in   आधुनिक  historical writing  .
In the  पूर्वी  tradition , a  राज्य  chronicle the Spring and Autumn  annals  was known to be compiled from as  जल्दी  as 722 BCE  हालांकि  only  2nd  century  bce  texts survived  .
Ancient  प्रभाव  have  helped   spawn   रूपांतर  interpretations of the  प्रकृति   of  history  जिससे   have  evolved over  the  centuries and continue to change today .
The modern  पढ़ाई  of  इतिहास  is wide-ranging , and  शामिल   the  study  of   विशिष्ट  regions and the study  of   निश्चित  topical or thematical elements of  ऐतिहासिक   छानबीन  .
Often  इतिहास   is  taught  as   भाग  of  प्राथमिक   और   द्वितीयक  education ,  और   the  academic  पढ़ाई   of   इतिहास   is   a  major discipline in University studies  .
Malcolm X (  ;  May 19  ,   1925february  21  ,   1965  ) ,  born  Malcolm Little  और  also  ज्ञात  as El-Hajj Malik  el-shabazz   (  )  ,   थी  an African-American  मुस्लिम  minister  और  human rights  activist  .
to  his admirers  ,   he  was a  साहसी   एडवोकेट   लिये  the  अधिकारों  of  अश्वेतों  ,  a   man  who  indicted  white  अमेरिका   in  the harshest terms for  इसके  crimes against black Americans .
detractors  accused  उसे   of  preaching  जातिवाद  , black supremacy  ,  and violence  .
He  रै   महरूम   पुकारा  one  of  the  महानतम   और   सबसे   influential  African  अमेरिकी  in history  .
मैल्कम   x   's  father  died—killed  by  श्वेत   supremacists  , it  थी  rumored—when he  थी  young  ,  and at  तनिक  one of his  uncles   थी  lynched .
When he was 13 , his mother  थी  placed in a mental  हॉस्पिटल  ,  और   he  was  लगाई   in   a  series  of   फोस्टर  homes  .
in  1946 ,  at  age  20  , he  गई  to prison  लिये   तोड़कर  and  प्रवेश  .
In prison ,  मैल्कम   x  became a  सदस्य  of the Nation of Islam  ;  after his  पैरोल   in   1952   ,   he  quickly  रोज़   to  become  एक  of  इसके  leaders  .
For a dozen years  ,  Malcolm  x  was the public face  of   the  controversial  समूह  , but  मोहभंग  with  स्वदेश   of   islam  head Elijah Muhammad led him to leave the  स्वदेश  in March  1964   .
After  a  period of travel in  अफ़्रीकी  and the Middle  ईस्ट   ,  he  लौटे   to   the  United  राज्य  , where  he   संस्थापित  Muslim  मस्जिदे  , Inc.  और  the  संगठन  of Afro-American Unity .
in   फ़रवरी  1965 ,  कम   than   a  year after leaving  the  Nation of Islam ,  he   थी  assassinated  by  three members of  the   समूह   .
Malcolm X 's expressed  मान्यताओं   बदला  substantially over  समय  .
As  a   प्रवक्ता  for the Nation of  islam   he   सिखाया  black supremacy  और  advocated  विरह  of black and white Americans  —in  contrast  to   the  civil  अधिकारों  movement 's  जोर   on   संयोजन  .
बाद   तोड़कर  with the  स्वदेश  of Islam in  1964—saying  of his association  साथ  it  ,  `` I did many things as  a   [  Black ] Muslim that  i   'm  sorry for now .
i   थी  a zombie  तब  ... pointed  in   a  certain  दिशा  and  बताई  to march ''  —and  becoming a Sunni  मुस्लिम  ,  he  disavowed  जातिवाद  and expressed willingness to work with  सिविल  rights leaders , he continued to  emphasize   pan-africanism  ,  ब्लैक  self-determination ,  और   self-defense  .
Henry Merritt `` Hank  ''  Paulson  ,  Jr. (  born  March 28 ,  1946  ) is an American  बैंकर  who served as  the   74th  United States Secretary  of  the Treasury .
He had served as the  अध्यक्ष  and Chief Executive Officer of Goldman  sachs  ,  और  is  अभी   अध्यक्ष  of  the  Paulson Institute ,  जिससे  he  संस्थापित   in   2011   to  promote sustainable economic  विकास  and a cleaner  पर्यावरण   around   the   संसार  , with an  आरंभिक  focus on the United  राज्य   और   चीन  .
A  आभासी  machine (  vm   )  is a  तन्त्र   implemented   abstraction  of the underlying  हार्डवेयर   ,  which is presented to  the  application  परत  of the  प्रणाली   .
Virtual machines  may  be  आधारित  on specifications  of   a  hypothetical computer  or  emulate  the  computer  वास्तुकला   और  functions of  a   रियल   संसार  computer .
मकड़ियों  ( order  araneae   )   हैं  air-breathing arthropods  कि  have  आठ  legs  और  chelicerae with  fangs   कि  inject  venom   .
They  हैं  the  largest  order of arachnids  और  rank  सातवाँ   in  total species diversity among all other  समूह  of organisms  .
Spiders are found worldwide on every continent except for  अंटार्कटिक  , and have become  स्थापित  in  nearly  every  आवास   साथ  the  एक्सेप्शन  of air  और   समुद्र  colonization  .
As  of   2008  ,  at  least  43,678  spider  प्रजाति   ,   और  109 families have been  अंकित  by  taxonomists  ; however  ,   वहीँ  has been  भ्रम  within the  वैज्ञानिक  community  as  to how all these families should  be   वर्गीकृत  ,  as   evidenced  by  the  over 20  अलग   classifications   कि   have   महरूम   प्रस्तावित   चूंकि  1900 .
anatomically  ,  मकड़ियों  differ  इससे  other  arthropods  in  कि   the  usual  देह  segments are fused  into  two  tagmata   ,   the   cephalothorax   और  abdomen , and  joined   by  a  छोटी  , cylindrical pedicel .
नापसंद   कीट   ,   मकड़ियों   do   नहीं  have  antennae  .
in  all  मगर  the most primitive  समूह  , the Mesothelae  ,  spiders have the  सबसे  centralized nervous  प्रणालियों  of all arthropods ,  as   सब   उनके  ganglia are fused into  एक  mass in  the  cephalothorax  .
नापसंद  most  arthropods  , spiders have no extensor muscles in  उनके  limbs  और  instead  extend  them by  हाइड्रोलिक  pressure  .
Their  abdomens  bear  appendages   कि   have  been modified into  spinnerets  that extrude  रेशा   इससे   up  to six  प्रकार  of  रेशा  glands within their abdomen .
Spider webs vary widely  in   आकार  ,  आकार   और   the   राशि  of  स्टिकी   लड़ी   प्रयुक्त  .
it   अभी  appears  कि  the spiral  orb  web may be one of the earliest forms , and spiders that  उपज  tangled  cobwebs  are more abundant and  विविध  than orb-web spiders  .
Spider-like arachnids  साथ  silk-producing spigots  appeared   in  the Devonian period about , but these animals apparently  lacked   spinnerets  .
सच्चा  spiders  have  been  मिला  in Carboniferous  रॉक्स   इससे   ,  and are very similar to the  सबसे  primitive surviving  अनुक्रम   ,  the  mesothelae  .
The main  समूह   of  modern spiders  ,  Mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae  ,   पहला  appeared  in  the  triassic  period , before .
a  herbivorous species  ,  Bagheera kiplingi  ,  was described in 2008  ,   लकिन  all other known  प्रजाति  are predators ,  ज़्यादातर   preying  on insects  और   on  other spiders  ,   हालांकि   a  few large  प्रजाति  also take birds and lizards  .
Spiders  उपयोग   a   चौड़ी  range of  रणनीति  to  कैप्चर   शिकार  : trapping it in sticky webs ,  lassoing  it with sticky  bolas   ,  mimicking the prey to avoid detection , or  कार्यशील  it  bas   .
सबसे  detect  शिकार  mainly by  संवेदन  vibrations  ,  but  the  active hunters  have   अधि  vision  ,   और  hunters of  the  genus Portia show signs of intelligence in their choice of  tactics   और  ability to  develop  new ones  .
मकड़ियों  ' guts  हैं  too  सीमित   to   लो  solids , and  वे   liquidize   उनके  food by flooding  it  with  digestive  enzymes and  पीस   it   साथ  the  bases  of  उनके  pedipalps  ,   as  they  do  not  have   सच्चा   जबड़े   .
Male  मकड़ियों   पहचानो  themselves  by   a  variety  of   जटिल  courtship  संस्कार  to avoid  होने   खाया   by  the females .
Males of  सबसे  species  जीवित  a  few   matings  , limited  मुख्यतः  by  उनके  short life  spans   .
महिलाओं   बुनते   रेशा   egg-cases  ,  प्रत्येक  of which may contain  सैंकड़ों  of eggs .
Females  of   अनेक  species  परवाह   लिये   उनके  young  ,  for example  by   carrying  them  around   or   by   sharing   खाना   साथ  them .
a  minority  of  species are social , building  सांप्रदायिक  webs  कि   may   हाउस  anywhere from  a  few  to  50,000 individuals .
Social behavior  सीमाएँ   इससे   precarious  toleration  ,  as in the widow spiders , to co-operative  शिकार  and food-sharing  .
हालांकि  most spiders  सजीव   लिये   at   सबसे  two years  ,   tarantulas  and  अन्य  mygalomorph  मकड़ियों   can  live  up  to  25  years in captivity .
While the  venom  of a  few   प्रजाति   is  dangerous to  इंसानो  ,  वैज्ञानिकों  are now researching  the   उपयोग  of spider venom in  आयुर्विज्ञान  and as non-polluting pesticides .
मकड़ी   रेशा  provides  a  combination of lightness , strength and elasticity that is superior to that  of  synthetic  सामग्री   ,   और  spider silk genes  have   महरूम  inserted into mammals  और  plants to  देखिए   if   ये  can  be   प्रयुक्त  as  रेशा  factories .
as   a  result of  उनके  wide range  of  behaviors , spiders have become common symbols in art  और   mythology  symbolizing various combinations  of   सब्र  ,  क्रूरता  and creative powers .
Donna Marie Pinciotti  (  Born February 13  ,   1960   )   is  a fictional character  और  one  of  the two female leads in  the   फॉक्स   sitcom  That  '70s   दिखाएँ  ,  appearing  in all eight seasons .
Portrayed  by  Laura Prepon  ,   डोना  is the love interest  to   eric  Forman .
US  काउंटी   household  median income 2009 .
मध्य   us  household  आय   ,  2001-2011
household  income is a measure  commonly   प्रयुक्त  by the United States government and  निजी  institutions .
प्रत्येक  household  is  measured  by  the income of  प्रत्येक   निवासी  over the age  of   15   .
Income includes wages  और  salaries , unemployment  बीमे  ,  विकलांगता  payments , child  support  payments  प्राप्त   ,  regular rental receipts ,  as   खूब  as  कोई   निजी  business  ,  investment  ,  or other kinds of income  प्राप्त   routinely  .
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real ''  )   household   आय  had been  increasing  almost every year  इससे   1945  to 1999 ,  it  has since  महरूम  flat  और  even  decreased  recently  .
U.S. median household income  गिरी   इससे   $  51,144 in 2010  to  $  50,502  in 2011  .
Extreme poverty in  the  United States , meaning  households  living on  कम  than $  2  per  दिन  before government  लाभ  ,  doubled  from 1996  to  1.5 million  households   in   2011   ,  including 2.8 million children .
The residents of the  household   do  not  have   to  be  सम्बन्धित  to the head  of  the  household  for their earnings to be considered part of the household  's   आय  .
As  households  tend  to  share a  समान  economic  कॉन्टेक्स्ट  ,  the   उपयोग  of household income  remains  among  the   सबसे   widely  accepted measures of income .
That the size of  a  household is not  commonly  taken  into  account  in   ऐसे  measures  may  distort  कोई  analysis of fluctuations within  or  among the  household  income  श्रेणी   ,  and  may  render direct  comparisons  between  quintiles  difficult  or  even  नामुमकिन  .
a  registered agent ,  भी  known  as  a resident  एजेंट  or statutory  एजेंट   ,  in United States business law , is  a  business or  व्यक्तिगत  designated  to   प्राप्त  service of process ( SOP ) when a business  एंटिटी  is a  पार्टी  in a legal  कार्रवाई   ऐसे   as  a  मुकदमा  or summons .
the  registered agent  's  address may  भी   be   जहाँ   the   राज्य  will send the  कागजी  for  the   वार्षिक   नवीकरण   of   the   कारोबार  entity 's charter .
The  पंजीकृत  agent  लिये   a  business entity  may  be  an  individual member  of  the company  ,   or  (  अधिक  often ) a third party  ,  such  as  the organization 's lawyer  or  a service company .
Failure to properly  maintain  a registered agent can affect a  कम्पनी  negatively .
Office  लिये   आपात  Management .
दफ्तर  of War Information  युद्ध  poster  1941   -   1945
``  Life , Liberty  ,   और  the pursuit of  सुख  ''  is  a  well-known   phrase   in  the United States Declaration of  स्वतंत्रता  .
the  phrase  is   meant  to  exemplify  the  ``   unalienable  rights ''  साथ  which all  इंसान  beings  हैं   endowed   by  their  निर्माता   लिये   उनके   सुरक्षा  of  जिससे   वे  institute governments  .
तलवारबाजी  , is  typically   विभाजित   into  Olympic fencing ,  शास्त्रीय  fencing and  ऐतिहासिक  fencing  ,   .
The sport of  तलवारबाजी   (  commonly  पुकारा  olympic fencing or competitive  तलवारबाजी  )  is   विभाजित   into   तीन   हथियार  categories :  foil   ,  sabre and épée  .
शास्त्रीय   तलवारबाजी   उपयोग   the   वही   तीन  weapons , but  approaches  fencing  as   a  martial art .
Competitive Fencing  is  one of  पाँच  sports  जिससे  has  महरूम  featured  at  every one of the modern  ओलम्पिक   खेल  , the other  चार   होने   एथलेटिक्स  , Cycling  ,  Swimming ,  और  Gymnastics .
the  quadriceps  femoris  ( Latin for  ``   four-headed  muscle  of  the  femur  `` ) , also called simply the quadriceps  ,   quadriceps   extensor  , quads  ,   is   a  large muscle  समूह  that includes  the  four prevailing muscles on the  सामने  of  the   जांघ   .
It  is  the great  extensor  muscle  of   the   घुटना  ,  forming   a  large fleshy mass which covers the front and sides of the  femur  .
The proper Latin plural  रूप   of  the adjective quadriceps would be  quadricipites  .
In  आधुनिक  English usage , quadriceps  is   प्रयुक्त  in both  एकवचन   और   बहुवचन   .
The  एकवचन  form quadricep , produced by  hypercorrection   ,  is  अक्सर  used  .
RMS Titanic  थी  a British passenger  लाइनर   कि   sank  in  the  North Atlantic Ocean on 15 April 1912 after  colliding   साथ   an   हिमशैल  during her maiden voyage  इससे  Southampton  ,   uk  to  नई  York City , US  .
The  डूब   of  Titanic caused the deaths of 1,502 people in  एक   of  the deadliest  peacetime   मेरीटाइम  disasters  in  modern  इतिहास  .
The  rms   टाइटैनिक  was the largest ship  afloat  at  the  time  of   उसके  maiden voyage .
वो   थी   the   दूसरी   of  three Olympic class ocean liners  संचालित   by   the   श्वेत   स्टार  Line  ,  and she  थी  built  by   the   harland  and  wolff  shipyard in Belfast with  थामस  Andrews  ,  who perished  साथ   the  ship  ,  as her  नवल   वास्तु   .
on  her  maiden  voyage  ,  she  carried  2,224  यात्री  and crew .
अंतर्गत   the   कमांड  of Edward  स्मिथ  , her passengers  शामिल  some of the wealthiest people in the  संसार   ,   as  well  as  hundreds of  emigrants   इससे   ग्रेट  Britain and  आयरलैंड   ,  Scandinavia  और  elsewhere  throughout  Europe seeking a new life in North America .
the   जलयान  was designed to  be   the  last word  in  comfort and luxury , with an  on-board   gymnasium  , swimming  पूल  , libraries  ,   high-class  restaurants  और   opulent  cabins .
She  भी  had  a  powerful wireless  टेलीग्राफ   provided  for the convenience of passengers  as   खूब   as  for  operational  use .
हालांकि  she had advanced safety features such as  watertight   compartments   और   remotely  activated  watertight  doors , she lacked  पर्याप्त   lifeboats   to  accommodate  सब   of  those aboard .
Because of outdated maritime  सुरक्षा  regulations  ,  she carried  तभी  enough lifeboats for  1,178   people—slightly   अधिक  than half  of   the   क्रमांक  travelling on the maiden voyage ,  और   one-third   उसके   कुल   यात्री  and crew  क्षमता   .
After leaving Southampton on 10 April 1912 ,  टाइटैनिक  called at Cherbourg in France  और  Queenstown ( now  cobh  ) in  आयरलैंड   पहले  heading westwards towards New York .
On  14  April 1912 , four days into the crossing and  परिचय  375 miles ( 600  km  ) south of  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड   ,   वो  hit  an   हिमशैल  at 11:40  pm  ship 's  समय  .
The  glancing   टक्कर  caused Titanics  हल  plates to buckle inwards along her  स्टारबोर्ड  side and opened  पाँच   of  her sixteen watertight compartments  to  the  समुद्र   ;  the ship gradually filled with  जल  .
Meanwhile ,  यात्री   और  some  क्रू  members were  evacuated   in  lifeboats  ,   अनेक   of  which  यहूद  launched  तभी  partly loaded  .
a  disproportionate  क्रमांक  of  मेन  were  बाएँ  aboard because  of   a  `` women and children  पहला   ``   प्रोटोकॉल  followed  by   कुछ  of  the  officers loading the  lifeboats  .
By 2:20  am  ,  वो  broke  अलावा   और   foundered  , with  खूब  over one thousand people  स्टिल  aboard  .
Just  अंतर्गत  two  घंटों  after  the  Titanic foundered , the  cunard  liner  rms  Carpathia arrived on the scene of the sinking , where  वो   brought  aboard an  अनुमानित  705  survivors  .
the  disaster was  greeted   साथ   विश्वव्यापी  shock  और  outrage at  the  huge loss  of  life and  the   नियामक  and operational  असफलताओं   कि   था   led  to it .
Public inquiries  in   ब्रिटेन  and  the  United States  led   to  major improvements  in  maritime  सुरक्षा   .
एक  of their most  महत्वपूर्ण   legacies  was  the   स्थापना  in 1914 of the International  सम्मेलन  for  the  Safety  of   जीवन  at Sea ( SOLAS ) ,  जिससे  still governs  मेरीटाइम  safety today .
Additionally  ,   अनेक  new wireless regulations were  passed   around   the  world in an effort to learn  इससे  the  अनेक  missteps  in  wireless communications --  -which  could  have   saved  many more  यात्री   .
अनेक  of  the   survivors  lost all of their money  और   possessions  and were left destitute  ;  many families  ,  particularly those of crew  सदस्यों  from  southampton   ,   खोया   उनके   प्राथमिक  bread-winners .
They  यहूद  helped  by  an outpouring  of  public sympathy  और  charitable donations .
कुछ   of  the male survivors  यहूद  accused of cowardice for  leaving  the  जलयान   जबकि  people were  स्टिल  on board ;  the  White Star  लकीर   's   अध्यक्ष  ,  J.  Bruce  ismay   ,   faced   सोशल   ostracism  for  the  rest of  उसके   जीवन  .
The  रेक  of the Titanic remains  on  the seabed ,  विभाजित   in   दो   और  gradually disintegrating  at   a  depth  of   .
Since its  डिस्कवरी  in 1985 ,  हज़ारों  of  artefacts   have  been  बरामद   और   put  on  प्रदर्शक   at   संग्रहालय  around the world  .
टाइटैनिक  has become  एक  of  the   सबसे   प्रसिद्ध   जहाजों  in history ,  उसके   मेमोरी  kept  जिंदा  by  numerous   किताबे  , folk songs , films ,  दर्शाती  , and memorials .
The  इंसान   लेग   is  the  संपूर्ण  lower extremity or limb  of  the human body ,  सहित   the  foot , thigh and  भी  the  हिप   or   gluteal  region  ;  however ,  the  precise definition  in  human anatomy refers  तभी  to the  खण्ड  of the lower limb  extending   इससे  the  घुटना  to the ankle .
Legs are used for standing  ,   चलना   ,   कूद   ,   कार्यशील  , kicking  ,  and similar activities ,  और   constitute  a  significant  portion of a  व्यक्ति  's mass .
This article  is  about the  जनसांख्यिकी   सुविधाएँ   of  the population  of  Turkey  ,  including population density ,  नस्ल   ,   शिक्षा   स्तर  , health  of   the  populace  ,  economic status ,  धार्मिक  affiliations  और   अन्य   पहलुओं  of the population  .
As of 2010 , the population of Turkey is  अनुमानित  to be  73.7   लाख  with a growth rate  of  1.21  %  per annum (  2009   फिगर  ) .
the  population is  अपेक्षाकृत  young  साथ  26.6  %   गिरना  in the 0-14  आयु  bracket .
According  to  the OECD/World Bank population  आंकडे  in  तुर्कों  the population  विकास   इससे  1990  to  2008 was  16   लाख   or  29 %  .

in  the United  राज्य  , the EPA uses  the  term ``  विशाल   car   ''   to  denote  full-size  cars  .
जोएल   धूसर  ( born April 11 , 1932 ) is an American stage  और   स्क्रीन  actor , singer ,  और   नर्तकी   ,   ज्ञात  for his  भूमिका   as   the  Master of  ceremonies   in  both the  स्टेज   और   फिल्मी   अनुकूलन  of the  kander   &  Ebb  musical  Cabaret .

James  मैडिसन  ,  jr.  (  कूच  16 , 1751 ( O.S . March 5 ) – June 28 ,  1836  )  थी  an American statesman and political theorist , the fourth  अध्यक्ष  of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   (   1809–1817   )  .
He is hailed as the  “father  of the Constitution”  लिये   होने  instrumental  in   the  drafting of the United States  संविधान  and as the key champion  और   लेखक  of the  संयुक्त  States Bill of Rights .
He  परोसा   as  a politician  much   of  his adult  जीवन  .
बाद  the constitution had  महरूम  drafted , Madison became one of the leaders  in   the  movement to  ratify  it .
उसके  collaboration with Alexander  हैमिल्टन   और  John Jay  उत्पादित  the Federalist Papers ( 1788 )  .
Circulated  तभी   in  New York at the  समय  ,  वे  would  बाद  be considered among the most  महत्वपूर्ण   polemics  in  support   of  the Constitution  .
He was also a delegate  to   the  Virginia constitutional  ratifying  convention , and was  इंस्ट्रूमेंटल  to the successful ratification effort  in   वर्जिनिया   .
जैसे  most of  उसके   contemporaries   ,  Madison changed  उसके   राजनैतिक  views during his  जीवन  .
दौरान   the  drafting and  अनुसमर्थन   of   the  constitution  ,  he favored  a   दमदार  national  सरकारी   ,   हालांकि  later he  grew  to  एहसान  stronger state governments ,  पहले  settling between the two extremes late  in   उसके   जीवन   .
in  1789 , Madison became a  नेता  in  the   नई  House of Representatives ,  drafting   अनेक  basic laws  .
He is notable  लिये   drafting   the  first  टेन  amendments to the  संविधान  ,  और  thus is known  as  the `` Father  of  the Bill  of  Rights  ``   .
Madison worked closely with President  जार्ज  Washington to  व्यवस्थित   the  new federal government .
तोड़कर  with  हैमिल्टन  and  कया  became the Federalist  पार्टी  in  1791  ,  मैडिसन  and  थामस  Jefferson organized what they called  the  Republican Party ( later called by historians the Democratic-Republican  पार्टी   )
As Jefferson’s Secretary of  राज्य  ( 1801–1809 ) , Madison  पर्यवेक्षित  the Louisiana Purchase , which doubled  the  nation’s size  .
बाद  his  चुनाव  to the presidency , he  presided   over   नवीनीकृत   समृद्धि  for several years .
As  अध्यक्ष  ( 1809–17 ) , after the failure of  राजनयिक   विरोध  and a trade  embargo  against Great Britain  ,   he  led the nation into the War  of   1812   .
he  was responding  to   अंग्रेजों   encroachments   on   अमरीकी  honor and rights ; in  जोड  , he wanted  to  end  the   influence  of  the   अंग्रेजों  among  उनके  Indian allies  ,   जिनकी   प्रतिरोध  blocked United States settlement  in  the Midwest around the Great  झीलों   .
मैडिसन   मिला   the   युद्ध  to be an  प्रशासनिक  nightmare  ,   as   the  United  राज्य  had neither a  दमदार  army nor financial system ;  as  a result , he afterward supported a stronger national government and a strong military  ,  as well  as  the  नेशनल   बैंको  , which he  था  long opposed .
जैसे   अन्य   वर्जिनिया  statesmen  in  the slave society , he  थी   a  slaveholder  जो  inherited  उसके   वृक्षारोपण  known  as   montpelier  , and  स्वामित्व   सैंकड़ों   of  slaves during his  आजीवन   to   cultivate  tobacco  और   अन्य   फसलों   .
मैडिसन   समर्थित   the  three-fifths  सुलह  that allowed three-fifths of the  enumerated   जनसांख्यिकी  of  स्लेव   to  be counted  लिये   प्रतिनिधित्व  .
``  रोमन  's  बदला   ''  is a song performed  by  American rapper Nicki  minaj   इससे   उसके   डेब्यू  studio album  गुलाबी   शुक्रवार   .
it  was written by Minaj and rapper Eminem  ,  who is  भी  featured in  the  song  ,  and was produced  by   swizz  Beatz .
It was  released  exclusively on October 30 ,  2010  through  the  US iTunes Store , as  a  promotional release  preceding  the album  's  release  .
The song initiated a  feud  between Lil  '   किम  and Minaj ,  जहाँ  many people felt the song was directed  at   लील   '  Kim and regarded around her  जज्बात   towards   minaj  's rise to  कीर्ति  .
The  सोंग  references  minaj   's  alter-ego  ,  Roman  zolanski   ,   और  Eminem 's alter-ego ,  पतला   छायादार  .
The song garnered  बहुत   धनात्मक  reviews from  आलोचकों  , most  of  which  praised  the  सोंग   as  a stand-out track  on   the   एल्बम  .
An  आधिकारिक   रिमिक्स  featuring  minaj  's mentor , Lil  वेन  , was released  to   the   us  iTunes  स्टोर   on   जनवरी   19  ,  2011   .
The instrumental was used  in   the  song 'Firing  स्क्वाड  ' by Horseshoe G.A.N.G  .
हाइड्रोलिक  fluid being  poured  .
हाइड्रोलिक  fluids , also called hydraulic liquids  ,  are the medium by  जिससे   शक्ति  is  transferred  in  हाइड्रोलिक  machinery  .
Common hydraulic  fluids  are based on mineral  आयल   or   जल   .
उदाहरण  of equipment  कि  might use  हाइड्रोलिक   fluids   शामिल   excavators  and backhoes , hydraulic  brakes   ,  power steering systems , transmissions  ,   कचरा  trucks  ,  aircraft  उड़ान   कंट्रोल  systems , lifts ,  और   औद्योगिक   मशीनरी   .
हाइड्रोलिक  systems like  the  ones  उल्लेखित   ऊपर   होगा  work  सबसे  efficiently if the  हाइड्रोलिक   द्रव   प्रयुक्त  has  no  compressibility
Mahindra Tractor
महिंद्रा  Tractors , the  फार्म   उपकरण  division of  महिंद्रा  & Mahindra , builds and  स्त्रोत   tractors  that are sold  विश्वव्यापी  across six continents .
Mahindra is  भी  among the  शीर्ष  three tractor  निर्माताओं  in the world .
महिंद्रा   रै   a   विशाल  consumer base in  इण्डिया  , China  और  America and a growing  आधार   in  Australia .
the  company  builds  more  tractors  in India than  कोई  other manufacturer , and has  the   क्षमता  to build  150,000  tractors  a  year .
in  1963 , M  &   m   formed  a  संयुक्त  venture with  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Harvester to  manufacture  tractors  carrying   the  Mahindra nameplate for the Indian market .
Armed  साथ   अभियान्त्रिकी  ,  tooling   और  manufacturing  know-how   gained  from this relationship , M &  m  developed its first  ट्रैक्टर  , the B-275  .
महिंद्रा  Tractors with sales of  nearly  85,000 units annually is one of  the  largest  ट्रैक्टर   कंपनियाँ  in the  संसार   ,  and is number one in sales  in  India - the largest tractor market in  the   संसार   .
to  expand into  the   growing   ट्रैक्टर   मार्केट  in China  ,   महिंद्रा  acquired majority stake in Jiangling .
to   उठाएँ  awareness about Mahindra  in   the   us   ,  Mahindra  यूएसए  announced its new  प्रायोजन   in  the  nascar   देशभर  Series with R3 Motorsports , which is participating  साथ  a  #  23  महिंद्रा  Tractors  शेवरलेट   .
The car  होगा  be driven by Robert  रिचर्डसन  , Jr. Mahindra USA ,  inc.  announced a 17-race primary and  18-race  associate sponsorship  लिये  the 2009  nascar   देशभर  Series .
With this sponsorship  ,   महिंद्रा   थी  the  पहला  Indian company  to  sponsor  a   car   in  NASCAR .
in   2008  , Mahindra was a sponsor of the McDonald  मोटरस्पोर्ट  team  जिससे   भागा  the  #   81   car   in  the NASCAR  देशभर   श्रेणी  .
The POWER6  is  a  माइक्रोप्रोसेसर  developed  by  IBM that  implemented  the  शक्ति   isa   v.2.03   .
जब  it became  उपलब्धियाँ   in  systems in 2007  ,  it  succeeded   the  POWER5+ as IBM  's  flagship  शक्ति   माइक्रोप्रोसेसर  .
It is  भाग  of the eCLipz project ,  कहा   to   have  a  लक्ष्य  of converging IBM 's server  हार्डवेयर  where practical  (  hence ``  ipz   ''   in  the acronym  :   iseries  , pSeries  ,  and zSeries )  .
The  अमरीकी  middle class  is   a  social class in the United States  .
While  the  concept  is   typically  ambiguous in popular opinion  और  common  भाषा  use ,  समकालीन  social  वैज्ञानिकों   have  put forward  अनेक  , more or less congruent , theories  on  the  अमरीकी   मध्य  class .
Depending on class model used , the  मध्य  class may constitute anywhere from 25 % to  66   %  of households  .
एक  of the  पहला   प्रमुख  studies of  the   मध्य  class  in   अमेरिका  was  श्वेत   कॉलर  :  the  American Middle Classes , published in  1951  by  समाजशास्त्री  C.  राइट  Wright_Mills  मिलों  Wright_Mills .
बाद   sociologists  such  as   डेनिस  Gilbert  of   हैमिल्टन  College commonly divide the middle class into  दो  sub-groups .
Constituting roughly 15 % to  20   %  of households  is   the   अपर  or professional middle class consisting of  अत्यधिक   शिक्षित  , salaried professionals and  प्रबंधक  .
Constituting  roughly  one  तीसरा   of  households  is  the  निम्नतर   मध्य  class  consisting  mostly  of  semi-professionals  ,  skilled  कारीगरों  and  lower-level   प्रबन्धन  .
middle-class  persons commonly have a  आरामदायक  standard  of  living  ,   significant   आर्थिक  security , considerable work autonomy  और  rely  on  their expertise  to   sustain  themselves  .
सदस्यों  of the  मध्य  class belong to diverse groups  जिससे  overlap  साथ   प्रत्येक  other  .
Overall  ,  middle-class  व्यक्तियों  ,  विशेषकर   upper-middle-class  individuals  ,   हैं  characterized by  conceptualizing   ,  creating and consulting  .
यूँ   ,   कॉलेज  education  is  one  of   the   प्रमुख  indicators of middle-class status  .
largely  attributed  to  the nature  of  middle-class occupations  ,  middle class  मान   tend   to   emphasize  independence  ,  adherence  to  intrinsic  मानकों  , valuing  नवीनता  and respecting non-conformity  .
नीतियां  more active  than  other  जनसांख्यिकी   ,  college  शिक्षित  middle class  पेशेवर  are  विभाजित  between the two major  पार्टियों  .
आय   varies   considerably  from  निकट   the  national  मध्य  to well in excess of  $  100,000  .
household  income figures , however ,  do  not  सदा  reflect  क्लास   औकात  and standard  of   जीना   ,   as   वे   हैं   largely   बहकावे   by   the  number of income earners and fail to  recognize  household size .
It is therefore  संभावित   लिये   a   विशाल   ,   dual-earner  , lower  मध्य  class  household  to out-earn a small  ,  one-earner  ,  upper  मध्य  class household  .
the   मध्य  classes  हैं   बहुत  influential ,  as  they encompass the majority  of  voters , writers ,  शिक्षक  ,  पत्रकारों  , and editors  .
Most societal  रुझान  in the  us   originate  within the  मध्य  classes  .
the  following is a list of Saturday Night Live cast members , past and  उपस्थित  .
The cast members of  शनिवार  Night  सजीव  were originally  referred   to  as the ``  नहीं  Ready For  प्रधान   समय  Players '' .
the  original cast  (   l  to r )  :  Laraine  न्युमैन  , John Belushi ,  जेन   कर्टिन  , Gilda Radner , Dan Aykroyd , Garrett Morris  ,   और   चेवी   पीछा
Ruins  इससे  the 1906 San  फ्रांसिस्को   भूकंप   ,  remembered as one of  the   worst  natural  आपदाओं  in  संयुक्त  States history
a  disaster is a  प्राकृतिक   or   man-made  (  or  technological ) hazard resulting  in  an event of  substantial  extent causing significant  शारीरिक   क्षति   or   विनाश  , loss of life , or drastic change to  the   पर्यावरण   .
A disaster  can   be   ostensively   पारिभाषित   as  any  tragic   इवेंट   stemming  from events  ऐसे   as  earthquakes , floods ,  अनर्थकारी  accidents , fires , or explosions  .
it  is a  घटना  that can cause damage  to  life and property and destroy the economic , social  और  cultural life  of  people  .
In contemporary academia ,  आपदाओं  are seen  as  the consequence of  inappropriately  managed risk  .
These  risks  are  the  product of  a  combination of both hazard/s  और   vulnerability  .
Hazards  कि  strike in  क्षेत्रों   साथ  low  vulnerability  will never become  आपदाओं   ,   as  is the case  in   uninhabited  regions  .
Developing  देशों  suffer  the  greatest costs when a disaster  हिट्स  – more  than   95  percent  of  all  मौतों   caused  by disasters occur  in  developing countries  ,  and  नुकसान  due to  प्राकृतिक  disasters  हैं  20 times greater ( as  a  percentage of GDP ) in  विकासशील  countries than in industrialized countries .
In computing , booting  (  also known as booting  up   )   is  the initial set of operations that  a  computer  प्रणाली  performs  जब  electrical  शक्ति  to the  cpu  is switched on  .
The  प्रक्रम  begins when  a  computer is turned  on   लिये  the  पहला  time or  is  re-energized after being turned  बंद   ,   और   ends   जब  the  कंप्यूटर  is ready to  perform  its  सामान्य  operations .
On modern general purpose  कंप्यूटर   ,   इस   can   लो   tens   of   सेकेंड  and  typically  involves  performing  a power-on self-test , locating  और  initializing  परिधीय  devices  ,  and  तब   ढूंढना   ,  loading  और  starting  an   ऑपरेटिंग  system  .
Many computer  प्रणालियों   भी  allow  ये  operations to be initiated  by   a  software  कमांड  without cycling power  ,  in what is  ज्ञात   as  a  नरम  reboot , though  कुछ  of the  आरंभिक   परिचालन  might be skipped on a soft  रिबूट   .
a  boot loader  is  a  कंप्यूटर   कार्यक्रम  that  loads  the main operating  प्रणाली  or  runtime  environment for the computer after completion of the  self-tests   .
The computer  पद  boot is short for bootstrap  or  bootstrap  लोड  and derives from the  phrase   to  pull oneself  up   by  one 's  bootstraps   .
The  उपयोग   काल्स  attention to the  आवश्यकता  that , if most  तन्त्र   is   loaded   onto   a   कंप्यूटर  by  अन्य   तन्त्र  already  कार्यशील  on the computer ,  कुछ  mechanism  जरूर   मौजूद   to   लोड  initial software onto the  कंप्यूटर   .
जल्दी   कंप्यूटर  used a variety  of  ad-hoc methods to get a small program  into  memory to solve  इस   प्रॉब्लम  .
The  आविष्कार  of integrated circuit  read-only   मेमोरी   (   rom  )  of   विभिन्न   प्रकार  solved  इस   विरोधाभास  by allowing  कंप्यूटर   to   be  shipped  साथ   a   प्रारंभ  up  कार्यक्रम   कि  could  नहीं  be erased  .
Growth in  the   क्षमता  of  rom  has allowed ever  अधिक  elaborate start  up   प्रक्रियाओं   to  be implemented  .
On  सामान्य  purpose computers  ,  the boot process begins with  the   निष्पादन  of  an  initial program stored in  बूट  ROMs or  पढ़ा   in  another  फ़ैशन  .
In some  पुरानी  computers  ,   the  initial program might  have  been  the  application  to  run , if no operating system  थी  used  ,  or the operating  प्रणाली  .
in  other computers ,  the  initial program  is   a  boot loader that may  तब  load into random-access memory ( RAM )  ,  from nonvolatile secondary storage (  ऐसे   as   a  hard  डिस्क   ड्राइव  ) or  ,  in  कुछ  older  कंप्यूटर   ,  from  a  medium such as punched cards , punched tape ,  or  magnetic tape  in  older computers , the binary  कोड  of  an   ऑपरेटिंग  system or  runtime   पर्यावरण  and then  चलाएँ  it  .
If the  बूट  loader  is  limited  in   इसके   आकार  and capabilities  ,   it   may   ,  instead , load a  larger   और   अधिक  capable secondary  बूट  loader  ,  which would then load the  ऑपरेटिंग  system  or  runtime environment  .
कुछ   अंतःस्थापित   प्रणालियों   do  not require a noticeable boot sequence to begin  कामकाज  and when turned  on   may  simply  चलाएं   operational   कार्यक्रम  that are  भंडारित   in   rom  .
firebird  is  an  open source SQL relational database  प्रबन्धन  system that runs on Linux ,  खिड़कियाँ   ,   और  a variety  of  Unix .
The database forked  इससे  Borland  's   खोलें  source edition  of  InterBase  in   2000  , but  चूंकि   firebird  1.5  the  code  रै  been largely rewritten  .
Outsourcing is  the   contracting  out of  an   आतंरिक  business process  to  a third-party  संगठन  .
the   अभ्यास   of   contracting  a business process out to a third party rather than staffing it internally is  आम  in the modern economy  .
the  term `` outsourcing  ''   became   लोकप्रिय   in   the  United States near the turn  of  the 21st century .
आउटसोर्सिंग   sometimes  involves  transferring   कर्मचारी  and assets  इससे  one  कड़  to  another   ,  but  नहीं   सदा   .
The definition  of  outsourcing  शामिल   दोनो   विदेशी   और   घरेलू  contracting  ,   और   sometimes  includes offshoring  ,   जिससे  means relocating a  कारोबार  function to another country  .
वित्तीय  savings  इससे  lower international labor rates is  a  big motivation  लिये   outsourcing/offshoring  .
The opposite of outsourcing is  पुकारा  insourcing , which entails bringing processes handled  by   third-party  firms in-house , and is sometimes accomplished  via   लंबवत  integration .
However  ,  a business can  provide  a contract  सेवा  to  another  business without necessarily insourcing  कि  business  प्रक्रम   .
Human immunodeficiency virus (  hiv  ) is a lentivirus ( slowly replicating retrovirus ) that causes acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (  एड्स   )   ,   a   कंडीशन  in humans  in  which progressive  विफलता   of  the  प्रतिरक्षा   प्रणाली  allows life-threatening opportunistic  infections  and cancers  to  thrive .
Infection with HIV  occurs  by the transfer  of   रक्त  ,  वीर्य   ,  vaginal fluid  ,   pre-ejaculate  ,  or  breast milk .
भीतर  these bodily fluids , HIV  is   उपस्थित  as  दोनो  free virus particles and virus within infected immune cells .
hiv  infects vital cells in the  इंसान   प्रतिरक्षा  system  ऐसे   as   हेल्पर   t  cells (  specifically  CD4 + T cells  )  , macrophages , and  dendritic  cells .
HIV  संक्रमण  leads  to  low  स्तर  of  cd4+  T cells through a  क्रमांक  of  mechanisms  including :  apoptosis  of uninfected  bystander  cells ,  सीधा  viral killing  of  infected cells  ,  and killing of infected  cd4+   t   कोशिकाएं  by  cd8  cytotoxic lymphocytes  कि  recognize infected cells .
When  cd4+   t   कोशिका  numbers decline below a critical level ,  cell-mediated  immunity  is  lost ,  और  the body  becomes   progressively   अधिक   susceptible  to  opportunistic   infections  .
the  firepole in  a   आग   स्टेशन   in  Toronto
A fireman 's pole  (  also  पुकारा  a sliding pole  or  firepole ) is a  लकड़ी   ध्रुव  or  a  metal tube  or   पाइप  installed  between  floors in  आग   स्टेशन  , allowing firefighters  responding  to an  सचेतक  to quickly descend  to  the ground  मंजिल  faster than by  using  a standard  staircase   .
The  यंत्र   थी  invented in the 1870s  by   दाउद  Kenyon  ,  in  शिकागो  , Illinois , although it is often  incorrectly   credited  to the Boston  आग  Department  .
मरियम  Poppins is the title  अक्षर   of  a series  of   children   's   किताबे  written by P.  L.  Travers .
Throughout  the   मरियम  Poppins series  ,   जिससे  lasted  इससे   1934  to 1988  ,  Mary Shepard  थी  the  इलस्ट्रेटर  and acted as a second author .
the  books  केन्द्र  on a magical English  नैनी  ,  मरियम  Poppins .
She  is   blown  by the  ईस्ट   हवा  to Number Seventeen  चेरी  Tree Lane , London , and into the Banks ' household to  परवाह  for  उनके  children .
मुठभेड़ों  with  चिमनी   sweeps  , shopkeepers  और   विभिन्न  adventures  follow   जबतक  Mary  poppins  abruptly leaves  ,   i.e.  , `` pops-out '' .
The adventures take  प्लेस  over a total of  आठ  books  .
however   ,  only the first three  किताबे  feature  मरियम  Poppins arriving and  leaving   .
The later five  किताबे  recount previously  unrecorded   adventures   इससे  her  असली  three visits .
as   P.   L.   ट्रेवर्स   explains  in her introduction to Mary Poppins in the  पार्क   ,   ``  She  can  not forever  arrive   और   निकलें   .  ''
The books  यहूद  adapted  in  1964 into a musical Disney film starring  जूली   एंड्रयूज  and  लंड   वैन  Dyke  .
In  2004   ,  Disney Theatrical produced a  स्टेज   musical   अनुकूलन  in the  वेस्ट  End theatre .
The stage musical  थी  transferred to  ब्रॉडवे  in  2006  where it  भागा  until its closing on March  3  , 2013 .
It  रै  been  अत्यधिक   कामयाब  , as was the  1964  film .
The  पिछला  Song  is   a  2010 American coming  of   आयु  teen romantic drama  फिल्मी  developed alongside Nicholas Sparks  '   अनोखा  by  the   वही   नाम  .
The  फिल्मी   थी   निर्देशित  by Julie Anne Robinson  in  her  विशेषता  film  directorial  debut  और  co-written  by  Sparks  और  Jeff Van  wie  .
The Last  सोंग   सितारों  Miley  सायरस  ,  लियाम   hemsworth  , and Greg  kinnear   और  follows a  troubled  teenager as she reconnects with her estranged  पिता  and falls  in   प्रेम  during  a   गर्मियाँ  in a  शांत   दक्षिणी  United States  बीच  town .
The film  is   वितरित  by Touchstone Pictures  .
स्पार्क्स   थी   approached   to   लिखें  both the  फिल्मी   's  screenplay and the novel .
Sparks completed the screenplay in January  2009   ,  prior  to  the completion of  the  novel  ,  making The Last Song his  पहला   स्क्रिप्ट  to  be   optioned  for  फिल्मी  .
The  सेटिंग   ,  originally in North Carolina like the  अनोखा  ,  स्थानांतरित  to Georgia after the states  था   campaigned  for months to  मेजबान  production  .
upon   शुरूआत  production in Tybee Island  ,   जॉर्जिया  and  आसपास   savannah   ,  The  पिछला  Song  became   the  first  फिल्म   to  be both  शॉट  and set  in  Tybee Island .
Filming  lasted   इससे  June  15   to  August 18  ,   2009  with much  of   it  occurring  on  the  द्वीप  's  बीच  and  बांध   .
The  पिछला   सोंग  was originally  अनुसूचित   लिये  wide  रिलीज  on  जनवरी   8   ,  2010  ,  but was postponed to March 31  ,   2010   .
Written Simlish
simlish  is a  fictional   भाषा   प्रदर्शित   in  EA Games ' Sim series of games .
It  debuted   in   simcopter  , and  रै   महरूम   विशेषकर   prominent   in  The Sims ,  the  Sims 2 and The Sims  3  .
The Sims  विकास   टोली   निर्मित  the  अद्वितीय  Simlish  भाषा   by   experimenting  with  fractured   यूक्रेनी   ,  French  ,   लैटिन  , Finnish  ,  English , Fijian ,  सेबुआनो   ,   और  Tagalog .
Simlish can also  be   सुना  in SimCity 4 , SimCity Societies and  simcity  2013 ,  लकिन  far less  अक्सर  .
Civilized Creatures  in  Spore can also be  सिखाया  to  बोलो  Simlish .
it  is  भी   प्रदर्शित  to an extent in Firaxis  खेल  '  सिड  Meier 's SimGolf .
Designer Will Wright  थी  conscious  of  the need for dialogue in  the  game  ,  but thought  कि  using a  रियल   भाषा   होता  make it sound too repetitive and would  भी  be too  costly  to  hire   अनुवादक  for  संसार  languages .
Initially , inspired by  the   देशी   अमरीकी  code talkers of  संसार   युद्ध  II  ,   सीम  creator Will  राइट  and language  विशेषज्ञ  Marc  gimbel   सुझाया  experimenting  साथ   the   navajo  language to create Simlish  .
however   ,  they ultimately decided that Simlish  worked  best  as   a   ``  language  ''   बना  up of  gibberish  words that could n't  be  translated  ,  so that its meaning  होता  be left  खोलें  to the imagination  of   the   खिलाड़ी  .
Wright later commented  कि  using ``  बकवास  language '' turned out to be  the   सही  development  चुनाव  ,  as  people were capable  of  imagining it more realistically  than   a  computer  could  simulate a real one  .
the   वास्तविक  sound  of  Simlish was created improvisationally  by   आवाज़   अभिनेताओं  Stephen  kearin  and Gerri Lawlor .
an  example of Ultrasonic Testing (  ut  ) on blade roots of a  v2500  IAE  वायुयान   इंजन  .
Step 1  :   the  UT probe  is  placed on  the  root  of   the  blades to be inspected  साथ  the help of a  खास  borescope tool ( video probe ) .
Step  2   :   यंत्र   जमावट  are  इनपुट  .
Step 3  :   the  probe  is   scanned  over the  ब्लेड   रूट  .
in  this case , an indication ( peak  in  the data  )  through  the   रेड  line  (  or gate  )  indicates a  शुभ   ब्लेड   ;   an  indication to  the  left of  कि  range indicates  a  crack  .
Principle  of  ultrasonic testing  .
LEFT  :  A  जांच   भेजना   a   ध्वनि  wave  into  a test material  .
वहीँ  are two  indications   ,   एक   इससे  the  आरंभिक   पल्स  of  the  probe  ,   और  the second due to the back wall  गूंज  .
RIGHT :  a  defect creates a third indication  और   simultaneously  reduces  the  amplitude  of  the back wall indication .
The  गहराई   of  the  defect  is  संकल्पित  by the ratio  d/e
In ultrasonic  परीक्षण  ( UT )  ,  very short  अल्ट्रासोनिक   pulse-waves  with center frequencies ranging from 0.1-15 MHz and occasionally up to 50 MHz are  शुभारम्भ  into materials  to   detect  internal  खामियां   or   to  characterize  सामग्री   .
A  आम  example is  अल्ट्रासोनिक  thickness measurement ,  जिससे  tests the thickness  of   the   परीक्षण   ऑब्जेक्ट  ,  लिये   उदाहरण  ,  to  monitor  pipework  corrosion .
Ultrasonic  परीक्षण  is often performed on  स्टील  and other  धातुओं  and  alloys   ,  though it  can  also  be   प्रयुक्त   on   कंक्रीट   ,  wood and composites , albeit with  कम  resolution .
It is a form of non-destructive testing  प्रयुक्त  in  अनेक   उद्योग   सहित  aerospace , automotive  और   अन्य   परिवहन   सेक्टर   .
The vas deferens ( plural  :  vasa deferentia )  ,  also called ductus  deferens   (   लैटिन   :  `` carrying-away vessel  ''  ; plural : ductus deferentes ) ,  is   भाग  of the male anatomy  of   अनेक  vertebrates  ;  they  हस्तांतरण  sperm from the  epididymis  in  पुट   of   स्खलन  .
Vascular ischemia  of  the toes with  characteristic   cyanosis   .
In medicine  ,  ischemia  ,  also spelled  as   ischaemia  or  ischæmia   ,   (  ; from Greek  भाषा  ισχαιμία ,  ischaimía   ;   isch-   रूट  denoting a restriction  or   thinning   or  to make or  grow  thin/lean , haema  रक्त  ) is a restriction in blood supply to tissues  ,  causing  a   shortage  of  ऑक्सीजन  and  ग्लूकोज   needed  for cellular  चयापचय   (   to  keep tissue  जिंदा  ) .
Ischemia is generally  caused  by  समस्याएं   साथ   रक्त  vessels  ,   साथ  resultant damage  to  or dysfunction of tissue .
It  भी  means  लोकल  anemia  in  a given  भाग   of   a   देह  sometimes  resulting  from  जमघट  ( such as vasoconstriction  ,  thrombosis  or  embolism  )  .
bas  syndrome (  ds  )  or  Down  's  syndrome , also known  as   trisomy  21 , is a  जेनेटिक  disorder  caused  by the  उपस्थिति  of  सब   or  part  of  a  तीसरा   नक़ल  of chromosome  21   .
bas  syndrome is the  सबसे  common chromosome abnormality in  इंसानो   .
It is  typically  associated with a delay in  संज्ञानात्मक   क्षमता   (  mental retardation , or MR  )  and physical  विकास  , and a particular set  of   फेशियल   विशेषताएँ   .
The average IQ of young adults with Down  सिंड्रोम  is around  50  , whereas young adults  बगैर  the  कंडीशन  typically have an IQ of  100   .
(  MR has historically been defined as an IQ below  70   .   )
A large  proportion  of individuals  साथ  Down syndrome have  a  severe  उपाधि  of  बौद्धिक   विकलांगता  .
Down  सिंड्रोम   is  named  बाद  John Langdon  bas  ,  the   अंग्रेजों  physician  जो   वर्णित  the syndrome  in  1866 .
the  condition  थी   clinically  described earlier  by   जां   etienne  Dominique  esquirol   in  1838  और   edouard  Seguin in 1844  .
bas  syndrome  थी   पहचाना   as  a chromosome  21   trisomy   by   dr.   jérôme  Lejeune  in   1959  .
bas  syndrome can  be  identified in  a  baby at birth  or   पहले   जनम   by   prenatal  screening .
pregnancies  with this diagnosis are often  terminated   .
The  सीडीसी  estimates  कि  about one of  प्रत्येक  691 babies  born   in   the   संयुक्त  States each year is  born  with Down syndrome .
Many  children  with Down  सिंड्रोम  are educated in regular school  वर्ग   जबकि  others  आवश्यकता   specialised   शैक्षणिक   सुविधाएं  .
Some children  ग्रैजुएट   इससे  high school  ,  and , in  the   us   ,   वहीँ  are increasing opportunities for participating in  post-secondary  education  .
Education and proper care has  महरूम  shown  to   improve   विशेषता   of  life significantly  .
अनेक  adults  साथ  Down  सिंड्रोम   हैं   समर्थ   to   कार्य  at paid  नियुक्ति   in  the community , while  अन्य   आवश्यकता  a  अधिक   sheltered   कार्य  environment .
hot   flashes   (  also known as hot flushes , or night  sweats  if  वे  happen  at  night  )  are  a  symptom which may have several other causes  ,   लकिन  which is often  caused  by the  बदलना  hormone  स्तर  that are  characteristic  of  रजोनिवृत्ति   .
the  Servicemen 's Readjustment Act of 1944 (  p.l  . 78-346 ,  58  Stat . 284m  )  , known informally as the  g.i  . Bill  ,  was a law  कि   provided   a  range  of   लाभ   लिये  returning World War II veterans  (  commonly referred  to   as  G.I.s )  .
Benefits  शामिल  low-cost mortgages ,  low-interest   लोन   to   प्रारंभ  a business or farm ,  नकदी   भुगतान   of  tuition and living  खर्च  to attend  कॉलेज  , high school  or  vocational education , as well  as   एक   साल  of  बेरोजगारी   मुआवजे  .
It  थी  available  to  every veteran who  था  been on active  ड्यूटी  during  the   युद्ध  years  लिये   at  least  नब्बे  days and had not been  dishonorably  discharged  ;  combat  थी   नहीं  required .
by   the  end  of  the program in  1956   ,  roughly 2.2 million  दिग्गजों   था  used the G.I .  विधेयक   शिक्षा  benefits  in   अनुक्रम  to attend  कॉलेजों   or  universities , and  an   अतिरिक्त  6.6 million  प्रयुक्त   ये  benefits for  कुछ   दयालु  of training program  .
चूंकि   the  original 1944 law , the  पद   रै   आइये  to include other veteran benefit programs  निर्मित   to   assist  veterans  of   subsequent  wars as  खूब  as peacetime service .
इतिहासकारों  and  अर्थशास्त्रियों  consider  the   g.i  .  विधेयक   a  major political success—especially  in   कंट्रास्ट   to  the treatments of World War  i   veterans—and  a major  योगदान  to  अमेरिका   's   भण्डार   of   इंसान   पूंजी   कि  sped  long-term   आर्थिक  growth .
The  वाटरगेट  scandal was a political  कांड   कि   occurred   in   the  United States in the 1970s  as  a result of the June  17   ,   1972   break-in   at   the  Democratic National Committee  मुख्यालय   at   the  Watergate  दफ्तर  complex in  वॉशिंगटन  , D.C. , and  the   निक्सन  administration  's   attempted   cover-up   of  its involvement  .
The scandal  आखिरकार   led  to the resignation of  रिचर्ड  Nixon , the  अध्यक्ष  of the  संयुक्त  States , on  अगस्त   9  , 1974  —  the  तभी  resignation of  a   u.S.   अध्यक्ष   .
The scandal also  resulted  in the indictment  ,  trial  ,   conviction  , and  incarceration   of   forty-three   व्यक्तियों  ,  दर्जनों  of whom  यहूद  Nixon  's  top administration  officials   .
The affair began with  the   गिरफ़्तार   of   पाँच  men  लिये  breaking and entering into the Democratic National  कमेटी   (  DNC ) headquarters  at  the  वाटरगेट  complex  on  June  17  , 1972 .
the  Federal  ब्यूरो  of Investigation  (   एफबीआई   )  connected cash found on the burglars  to  a slush fund  प्रयुक्त  by  the   कमेटी   लिये  the  re-election   of  the  अध्यक्ष   ,  the official organization of Nixon 's  अभियान  .
In July  1973   ,   as   प्रमाण   आरोहित   विरूद्ध  the president  's  staff  ,   सहित  testimony provided by former  स्टाफ   सदस्यों  in an investigation conducted by the  सीनेट   वाटरगेट   कमेटी  ,  it  was revealed  कि   अध्यक्ष   निक्सन  had a  tape-recording  system  in   उसके  offices and  he   था  recorded many conversations  .
रिकार्डिंग  from  ये   टेपों  implicated the  अध्यक्ष  ,  revealing  he  था   attempted  to cover  up   the   questionable   (  and illegal ) goings-on  कि   था   लिया   प्लेस   दौरान   उसके   प्रशासन   ,  both before and after  the   break-in   .
After a  protracted   श्रेणी   of  bitter court battles ,  the   u.S.   परम्  Court unanimously ruled  कि  the president  था  to  हाथ   over   the  tapes to government investigators ;  he  ultimately complied  .
Facing  near-certain  impeachment in  the   हाउस  of  प्रतिनिधि  and  a  strong possibility of a conviction  in   the  Senate  ,   निक्सन  resigned the presidency on  अगस्त   9  , 1974  .
His successor ,  जेराल्ड   घाट  ,  तब   जारी  a  pardon   to  him  .
एलिज़ाबेथ   imogene   webber   (  formerly  lansing  and Spencer )  is  a fictional character on  the  ABC Daytime  साबुन  opera General  हॉस्पिटल   .
एलिज़ाबेथ  is  the  granddaughter of  dr.   स्टीव   हार्डी  (  जॉन  Beradino ) ,  एक  of  the   originating   कोर  characters of the  श्रेणी   .
Rebecca  herbst  originated the character on August  1   ,  1997  और  has  महरूम  the  तभी   अनुबंध  actress to play the role .
Elizabeth is part of two  supercouple  pairings , Lucky  स्पेंसर  and Elizabeth Webber and Jason Morgan and  एलिज़ाबेथ  Webber .
The United States  प्रेसिडेंसी  of Ronald Reagan , also known as  the  Reagan  प्रशासन  , was a Republican  प्रशासन   headed   by  Ronald  reagan   इससे  January  20  , 1981 ,  to   जनवरी  20  ,  1989  .
domestically  , the  प्रशासन  favored reducing government  कार्यक्रम  and introduced the largest across-the-board  कर  cuts in American history .
The economic policies enacted  in   1981  , known as  ``  Reaganomics ``  ,  were an  उदाहरण   of  supply-side economics .
Reagan aimed to encourage  उद्यमिता   और   सीमा   the  growth of  सोशल  spending , as  खूब   as  the reduction  of  regulation and  महंगाई  .
Economic  विकास   देखी   a   दमदार  recovery in  the  1980s  ,   helping  Reagan  to  win  a   भूस्खलन  re-election  .
The  नेशनल  debt  increased  significantly  ,   however  .
Regarding  विदेशी  policy ,  the  administration was  steadfastly   anti-communist  , calling the  सोवियत  Union an ``  दुष्ट  empire ``  और  ending 1970s  détente  .
Reagan accelerated  the   विशाल  buildup  of   the   सैन्य  started by his predecessor  ,  including an invasion  of   हरा   ,   the   पहला  major  विदेशी  action by  u.S.  troops since  the  end  of   the  Vietnam War .
The  ``  Reagan Doctrine `` controversially  granted  aid  to  paramilitary  शक्तियां  seeking to overthrow  कम्युनिस्ट   सरकारें  , particularly in war-torn Central America and Afghanistan  .
Reagan also  प्रचारित  new technologies  ऐसे  as  मिसाइल  defense systems in  अनुक्रम   to   confront   the  Soviets and their  allies  .
in  diplomacy , Reagan  forged  a strong  गठबंधन  with UK Prime Minister  मार्गरेट  Thatcher  ,   और  he met with Soviet General Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev  चार   टाइम्स  , aiming to shrink the superpowers '  नाभिकीय  arsenals  .
Reagan  's  presidency  रै  been  termed   the  ``  reagan  Revolution '' , or the Age  of  Reagan in recognition of the political realignment both within and beyond  the   u.S.  in favor of  उसके  brand of conservatism and his faith  in   फ़्री  markets .
the  Reagan administration worked toward  the   पतन  of  सोवियत  Communism ,  और  it  किया   पतन  just  as   he  left office  .
विजय  in the  ठंडा   युद्ध   led   to  a unipolar  संसार   साथ  the  u.S.  as  the   संसार  's sole superpower .
जबकि  the damaging Iran-Contra affair engulfed  अनेक  Reagan aides during  उसके  second term , Reagan himself left office with a 63 percent approval rating , one of  the  higher approval ratings  of   दूँ  presidents .
बाद   सालो  of unstinting  तारीफ़  from  the  right , and unrelenting criticism from the  बाएँ   ,  historian David  हेनरी   पाता   कि   by   2009  a  सर्वसम्मति   था  emerged among  विद्वानों  that Reagan revived conservatism  और  turned the nation to the  सही  by demonstrating  a   ``  pragmatic conservatism '' that  प्रचारित  ideology  भीतर   the  constraints imposed by the  विभाजित   राजनैतिक   प्रणाली   .
Furthermore ,  says  Henry , the  सर्वसम्मति  viewpoint agrees that  he   revived   आस्था   in  the  प्रेसिडेंसी  and  अमरीकी   self-confidence  , and  contributed  critically  to  ending the Cold  युद्ध  .
Crude death  रेट  by country ( 2006 ) .
मृत्यु  rate  is  a  माप   of   the   क्रमांक   of   मौतों  (  in  general , or  due  to  a   विशिष्ट   कारण   )  in  a   जनसांख्यिकी  .
Scaled  to  the size of that population ,  प्रति   ईकाई   of   समय  .
मृत्यु  rate is typically expressed  in  units of deaths per 1000  individuals   प्रति  year ;  यूँ  ,  a  mortality rate of 9.5 (  आउट  of  1000   )  in a  जनसांख्यिकी  of 1,000 would mean 9.5  मौतों   प्रति  year in  कि  entire  जनसांख्यिकी   ,  or  0.95   %   आउट   of  the total  .
It  is  distinct from  morbidity   रेट  , which  refers  to  the  number of individuals  in   ग़रीब   स्वास्थ्य   दौरान   a   दिए  time period  (   the  prevalence rate ) or  the  number  of   newly  appearing cases  of  the  बीमारी   प्रति   ईकाई  of time  (  incidence rate )  .
The term  ``  mortality  ``  is also  sometimes   inappropriately  used  to  refer to the number of deaths  among   a   नियत   of   diagnosed  hospital  मामले  for  a   बीमारी  or  चोट  , rather  than   लिये   the  general  जनसांख्यिकी  of  a  country or  जातीय  group  .
This disease mortality  statistic  is more  precisely  referred  to  as  ``   मामला   fatality  rate `` ( CFR  )   .
एक  distinguishes:
The crude  मौत   रेट  , the total  क्रमांक  of  मौतों  per  साल   प्रति   1000  people  .
the crude death rate for the whole world is  परिचय  8.37 per 1000  प्रति  year  according  to the current CIA  संसार  Factbook .
