The  perinatal  mortality rate  ,  the  योग  of neonatal deaths and  fetal  deaths  (   stillbirths   )  per  1000  births  .
The maternal mortality  अनुपात  , the  क्रमांक   of  maternal deaths  प्रति  100,000 live births  in  same time period  .
The maternal mortality  रेट   ,  the  क्रमांक   of   मातृ  deaths per 1,000 women of reproductive age in  the  population ( generally  पारिभाषित  as  15–44   सालो  of  आयु   )  .
The infant mortality rate , the  क्रमांक  of deaths of children  कम  than 1  साल   बूढ़ा   प्रति  1000 live  births   .
The child mortality  रेट   ,   the  number  of  deaths of children  कम   than   5  years  बूढ़ा  per  1000   सजीव  births .
The standardised mortality ratio (  smr   )  - This  represents  a proportional  तुलना  to the numbers of deaths  कि  would have been  अपेक्षित   if  the population had been  of   a  standard  संयोजन   in  terms of age ,  लिंग  ,  इत्यादि   .
the  age-specific mortality rate ( ASMR ) -  इस  refers  to   the  total  क्रमांक  of deaths  प्रति   साल  per  1000  people of a  दिए  age ( e.g  .  age 62  पिछला  birthday  )  .
In  लिहाज़   to  the or  विफलता  of  चिकित्सा   उपचार  or procedures ,  एक   होता  also distinguish:
the   जल्दी  mortality rate , the  कुल  number  of  deaths in the  जल्दी  stages of an ongoing treatment ,  or   in   the  period  तत्काल   following   an  treatment .
The late mortality rate ,  the  total number  of  deaths in the late  चरण   of  an ongoing  उपचार  , or  a   significant   लंबाई   of   समय  after an acute  उपचार   .
Note that the crude death  रेट  as  पारिभाषित  above and applied  to  a whole  जनसांख्यिकी  can  दे   a  misleading impression  .
the   crude   मौत   रेट  depends  on  the  आयु   (   और  gender ) specific  मृत्यु   दरों  and the  आयु  ( and gender  )   वितरण  of  the   जनसांख्यिकी  .
The  क्रमांक  of deaths per 1000 people can be higher for developed nations  than  in  less-developed  countries , despite  जीवन  expectancy being  उच्चतर  in developed  देशों   due  to standards of health being  बेहतर   .
इस   happens  because  विकसित  countries typically have  a  completely  अलग   जनसांख्यिकी  age distribution , with  a   much   उच्चतर   proportion  of older people  ,   due   to  both lower  हाल   जनम  rates and lower mortality rates .
A  अधिक   पूरा  picture  of  mortality  is  given by  a   जीवन   तालिका   जिससे  shows the  मृत्यु  rate  separately  for each age  .
A life table  is   जरुरी   to  give  a   शुभ  estimate of  जीवन   प्रत्याशा   .
An otoacoustic  उत्सर्जन  ( OAE  )   is   a  sound  जिससे  is generated  इससे   भीतर  the  भीतरी  ear  .
having  been predicted by Thomas Gold in 1948 , its  अस्तित्व   थी  first  demonstrated  experimentally  by   दाउद  Kemp in 1978  और   otoacoustic   emissions  have  चूंकि  been shown  to   उठता  by a number  of   अलग   सेल्यूलर   mechanisms  within the  भीतरी   कान  .
अध्ययन  have  दिखाया  that OAEs disappear after  the   भीतरी  ear has  महरूम   क्षतिग्रस्त  , so OAEs  हैं   प्रायः   प्रयुक्त  in the laboratory  और   the  clinic as  a  measure of inner  कान  health .
Broadly  बोलना   ,  there are  दो   प्रकार  of otoacoustic  emissions  :  spontaneous   otoacoustic  emissions  (  SOAEs ) , which can occur without  बाह्य   उत्तेजनाओं  ,  और   जगाई  otoacoustic emissions ( EOAEs ) ,  जिससे   आवश्यकता  an evoking stimulus  .
Hurricane  टॉमस   थी   the  nineteenth named  तूफ़ान  and  बारहवीं  hurricane of the  2010  Atlantic hurricane  ऋतु  .
Tomas  विकसित  from a  तीव्र  wave east  of   the   windward   आइलैंड्स  on  अक्तूबर   29  .
Quickly intensifying into  a   hurricane  , it moved through the Windward  आइलैंड्स  and passed very near Saint  लूसिया   .
After reaching Category 2  औकात   on  the  saffir-simpson   स्केल   ,  Tomas quickly weakened  to  a tropical storm in the  सेंट्रल  Caribbean  समुद्र   ,  due to strong wind  shear  and dry  एयर   .
Tomas  बाद   regained   hurricane  status as it  reorganized  near the  windward  passage .
Throughout the hurricane  's  path , 71 people  हैं   ज्ञात   to  have  महरूम  killed  ,  14 of whom  यहूद  in Saint Lucia .
Monetary  नुकसान   throughout  the  windward   आइलैंड्स   यहूद  estimated at  us  $ 588 million , mainly  in   संत  Lucia .
In  the  wake of the storm in Haiti ,  बाढ़  intensified an ongoing  हैजा  outbreak  indirectly  causing more  fatalities  .
According to  a  report released  in  December  2010  ,  55   लोगों   यहूद  killed in  क्यूबा   और   hispanola   ,  though the distribution  of  these fatalities are unknown  .
Overall damage from the storm was at least  $   741   लाख  .
Victoria  जैक्सन  (  born  August  2   ,  1959 ) is an American  हास्य   ,  actress  ,  satirist , singer and internet blogger best  ज्ञात  as a  डाल  member of the NBC  टेलीविज़न  sketch  कॉमेडी  series  शनिवार   रात्रि  Live (  एसएनएल   )   इससे  1986  to   1992  .
वो  has  प्राप्त   ध्यान  as  a  vocal  आलोचक  of President  बराक  Obama , and is an  क्रियाशील  participant in the Tea Party  गति  .
postmodern  literature is  साहित्य  characterized by  भारी  reliance  on   तकनीकों  like fragmentation ,  विरोधाभास  , and  questionable   narrators  , and is often ( though not exclusively )  पारिभाषित   as  a style or trend which emerged  in   the   post–world   युद्ध   ii  era .
postmodern  works are  देखी   as   a  reaction against  आत्मज्ञान  thinking  और   modernist  approaches to literature  .
Postmodern  साहित्य  , like  postmodernism   as  a whole , tends  to   resist   परिभाषा  or classification as a ``  गति   ''  .
Indeed  ,  the  अभिसरण   of   postmodern  literature  साथ  various  मोड्स   of  critical theory , particularly  reader-response  and deconstructionist  approaches  , and the  subversions  of the  अव्यक्त  contract  between  author , text and reader by which  इसके  works  हैं  often characterised , have led to pre-modern  fictions   ऐसे  as Cervantes ' Don Quixote ( 1605,1615  )   और   laurence  Sterne  's  eighteenth-century satire Tristram Shandy being  retrospectively   inducted  into the  मोड़ें  .
While there is little  सर्वसम्मति  on  the  precise characteristics ,  पैमाना   ,   और  importance  of  postmodern  साहित्य   ,  as  is  often  the   मामला  with  कलाकारी   आंदोलनों   ,  postmodern  साहित्य  is commonly defined  in  relation to a precursor .
For example  ,   a   postmodern   साहित्यिक  work tends  नहीं  to conclude with the neatly  tied-up  ending as is often  मिला  in  modernist  literature  ,  but  प्रायः   parodies   it  .
postmodern  authors tend to celebrate  मौका  over craft , and further  employ  metafiction  to   undermine   the   लेखक   's  authority .
Another  characteristic   of  postmodern  साहित्य  is the questioning of distinctions between high  और  low  संस्कृति   through  the use of pastiche ,  the   संयोजन  of subjects and genres not  previously  deemed fit  लिये  literature  .
Enigma is an electronic musical  प्रोजेक्ट  founded in  जर्मनी  by Michael  cretu  , David Fairstein  और  Frank  पीटरसन   in  1990 .
The Romanian-born Cretu conceived the  पहेली  project while working in  जर्मनी   ,   लकिन   आधारित  his  रिकॉर्डिंग  studio A.R.T .  studios   in  Ibiza , Spain  ,  from  the  early 1990s until May  2009  , where he has recorded  सब  of Enigma  's  studio releases to date .
Cretu  is  both the composer and  the   निर्माता  of the project  .
His  पूर्व  wife  ,   पॉप   सिंगर  Sandra  ,   प्रायः  provided  vocals  on  पहेली  tracks .
Jens  gad   co-arranged  and  निभाई  guitar on three of the Enigma albums .
पीटर  Cornelius also contributed  to  Enigma  दौरान  the 1990s  .
Seven studio albums have  महरूम  produced  अंतर्गत   the   नाम  of the project .
scooby-doo   is  an American animated cartoon franchise  ,  comprising  अनेक   एनिमेटेड  television series produced from  1969  to the present  दिन   .
The  असली   श्रेणी  , Scooby-Doo , Where Are  तुम   !
,   थी  created for Hanna-Barbera Productions by writers Joe  माणिक्य  and Ken Spears  in  1969 .
This Saturday morning  कार्टून  series  प्रदर्शित  four teenagers—  फ्रेड  Jones  ,  Daphne  ब्लेक  , Velma Dinkley ,  और  Norville  ``   shaggy  '' Rogers  —   और  their talking brown  ग्रेट   डेन   श्वान  named Scooby-Doo , who solve mysteries  involving  supposedly supernatural  जीव  through  a  series  of   हरकतों   और   missteps   .
following  the success of the original series  ,   hanna-barbera  and  इसके  successor Warner  ब्रदर्स   .  Animation  have   उत्पादित   numerous  follow-up and  spin-off  animated series and several related  works  , including television  specials  and  telefilms  , a  लकीर  of  direct-to-video  films , and  दो   warner   भाईs.  –produced  नाट्य  feature films .
कुछ   संस्करण   of  Scooby-Doo feature different variations  on   the   दिखाएँ   's  supernatural theme ,  और   शामिल  characters such as Scooby  's  cousin  scooby-dum  and  भतीजे  Scrappy-Doo in  जोड  to  or   बजाय  of some of the original characters .
scooby-doo   थी  originally broadcast on CBS  इससे  1969 to 1976  ,  when  it   स्थानांतरित  to  एबीसी  .
एबीसी  aired the show  जबतक   canceling  it  in  1986 ,  और   प्रस्तुत  a  spin-off  featuring the  वर्ण   as   children  , A  pup   नामित   scooby-doo  , from 1988 until  1991  .
Two new  scooby-doo  series , What  's   नई  , Scooby-Doo  ?
and Shaggy and Scooby-Doo  मिलेंगी  a  a  Clue  !  ] ]  ,  aired  as   भाग  of  बच्चे   wb  on The WB  संजाल  and its successor  ,  The CW network , from 2002  जबतक  2008  .
the  most recent  scooby-doo  series ,  scooby-doo   !
रहस्य  Incorporated , aired on  कार्टून   संजाल  from 2010  to   2013   .
दोहराव   of  the various Scooby-Doo  श्रेणी  are broadcast  अक्सर  on  कार्टून  Network and Boomerang in the United States and other countries  .
Call of Duty is a first-person  और   third-person  shooter  computer/  video game franchise .
the  series began on the PC , and later expanded  to  consoles and handhelds .
अनेक  spin-off games  have  also been  released  .
the   पहले   खेल  in the series  हैं   नियत  primarily  in   संसार   युद्ध   ii  ,  इस  includes :  कॉल  of  ड्यूटी  , Call of  ड्यूटी   2  , and Call  of  Duty  3   .
Beginning  साथ   आधुनिक   warfare   ,   जिससे  is set  in  modern  टाइम्स  ,  the  series has shifted  फ़ोकस  away  इससे   संसार   युद्ध  II .
Call  of  Duty  4  : Modern Warfare ( released November 2007 ) was  followed  by Call of  ड्यूटी   :  World  at  War  और  Call of Duty  :  Modern  warfare   2  .
Black Ops  (  released  नवम्बर  2010  )  takes  प्लेस   in  the  ठंडा   युद्ध  , while  आधुनिक  Warfare  3  ( released November  2011  ) takes place  in   the   near-future   सेटिंग  .
Black Ops 2 ( Released  नवम्बर  13 , 2012  )  takes  प्लेस   in   the  year 2025  .
the  Call  of  Duty  खेल  are published and  स्वामित्व  by Activision with Aspyr Media publishing  it   लिये   ठहराना  OS X  .
While the  स्टुडियो  Infinity  वार्ड  primarily still  develops   उन्हें  , Treyarch has  भी   विकसित   अनेक  of the  शीर्षक  with the release  of  the studios '  खेल  interlaced with  प्रत्येक   अन्य   .
Some games  have  been  विकसित   by  Gray Matter  इंटरैक्टिव  ,  चिंगारी  Unlimited , Amaze  entertainment  , n-Space , Rebellion Developments  ,   ideaworks   खेल  Studio  ,   sledgehammer  Games and nStigate  खेल  .
the   खेल   उपयोग   a   किस्में   of   इंजन   ,  including the id Tech 3 , the Treyarch NGL ,  और  the  iw  5.0  .
Other products in the  मताधिकार  include  a  line of action figures  designed  by Plan-B Toys , a  कार्ड  game  निर्मित  by  अपर  Deck  ,  and a  कॉमिक   किताब  mini-series  प्रकाशित   by  WildStorm .
As  of   नवम्बर   11  , 2011  ,  the  कॉल  Of Duty  श्रेणी  have  बेची   over  100  लाख  copies .
As of  कूच  31 , 2012 there  हैं  40  लाख  monthly  क्रियाशील   खिलाड़ी   आरपार   सब   of  the  कॉल   of   ड्यूटी   शीर्षक   ,   साथ   10   लाख  Call of  ड्यूटी  : Elite users and  2  million  paying  annual members .
Over  1.6  billion  घंटों  of online  gameplay  have been  logged  Modern  warfare   3   चूंकि   इसके   2011  release  .
the  estate  कर  in  the  United  राज्य   is   a   कर   imposed   on   the   ट्रांसफ़र  of the `` taxable  एस्टेट  `` of  a   मृतक  person  ,   whether  such property is transferred  via  a  होगा   ,   according   to   the  state laws of intestacy or otherwise made as an incident  of   the  death  of   the   मालिक   ,  such as a  ट्रांसफ़र   of  property from  an  intestate  एस्टेट  or  विश्वास  , or  the  payment of  निश्चित   जीवन  insurance benefits  or   वित्तीय   खाता   रकम  to beneficiaries .
The estate tax is  एक  part of the Unified Gift and  एस्टेट  Tax  प्रणाली  in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  .
The  अन्य   भाग   of   the  system  ,  the  तोहफा   कर  , imposes a tax on transfers of property  दौरान  a person 's life  ;  the  तोहफा   कर  prevents  avoidance   of  the estate  कर  should  a   व्यक्ति   want  to give away  his/her  estate  .
In  जोड  to  the  federal government , many states  भी  impose an  एस्टेट  tax ,  साथ   the   राज्य  version called either an estate tax  or  an  उत्तराधिकार  tax .
Opponents  of  the  एस्टेट  tax call it the  ``  death tax ''  .
If an  एसेट  is left  to  a spouse or  a   federally  recognized  दान   ,  the tax usually  करता  not  लागू   .
in  addition  ,  up  to  $  5,250,000  can be  दिए  by an individual , before and/or upon their death , without  रूष्ट   संघीय   तोहफा  or  एस्टेट  taxes .
Gavin  मैकग्रेगर  Rossdale (  born   30   अक्तूबर  1967  )  is  an  English  कर्ता   और  musician , known as  the   सीसे  singer and  लय  guitarist of the rock band  बुश  .
Following  बुश  's separation in 2002  ,   जिससे   lasted  for eight  सालो  , he was  the  lead singer and guitarist  लिये   संस्थान   ,   और   बाद  began  a  solo  करियर  .
When  performing   सोलो   ,  Gavin plays  गीतों   इससे   उसके   extensive  musical libraries .
rossdale   रै   महरूम   क्रमित   in  the  शीर्ष  100  भारी   मेटल  Vocalists by Hit Parader ( #  75  )  .
raffaello  Sanzio da Urbino  (   अप्रैल  6 or March 28  ,  1483 –  अप्रैल  6 ,  1520   )  ,  बेहतर   ज्ञात   बस   as   राफेल   ,   थी  an  इतालवी   चित्रकार  and architect  of  the High Renaissance .
His  कार्य  is admired  लिये  its clarity of form  और  ease  of  composition and for  इसके   विज़ुअल   उपलब्धि  of the Neoplatonic  आदर्श  of  इंसान  grandeur  .
साथ  with  michelangelo   और  Leonardo da Vinci , he forms  the  traditional trinity of  ग्रेट  masters of  कि  period .
राफेल  was enormously productive  ,  running an  unusually  large workshop , and  despite   उसके  death at 37  ,  a large body of  उसके  work  remains  .
अनेक  of his  works  are  मिला  in  the   वेटिकन  Palace , where the frescoed  राफेल   कक्ष  were the central  ,   और   the  largest , work  of  his career  .
the  best known work is  the   स्कूल   of   एथेंस  in the Vatican Stanza della  segnatura  .
After  उसके  early years  in  Rome much of his work was self-designed ,  लकिन   लिये  the most part executed by the workshop  इससे   उसके  drawings , with  considerable   घाटा  of quality .
He was extremely  influential   in  his lifetime , though  बाहर  Rome  उसके  work was mostly known  इससे  his  collaborative  printmaking .
After  उसके  death  ,  the influence of his  ग्रेट  rival  michelangelo  was  अधिक   फैली  until  the   18th  and 19th  सदियां   ,  when  राफेल   's  more  निर्मल  and harmonious qualities  यहूद  again regarded as  the  highest  मॉडल   .
His career  जलप्रपात  naturally into three phases and three  शैलियाँ  , first  वर्णित  by Giorgio Vasari :  उसके   जल्दी  years in Umbria  ,  then  a   काल  of  परिचय  four years (  इससे   1504–1508  )  absorbing  the  कलाकारी  traditions  of  Florence  ,  followed by his  पिछला  hectic  और  triumphant twelve years  in   रोम   ,   working  for  दो  Popes and  उनके  close associates  .
Julia Fiona  रॉबर्ट्स   (   born   अक्तूबर  28 , 1967 )  is  an American  अभिनेत्री   .
वो  became a  हॉलीवुड  star after  headlining  the romantic  कॉमेडी  Pretty Woman  (   1990   )  , which grossed $ 464 million  विश्वव्यापी  .
After  receiving  Golden  ग्लोब   पुरस्कार   और  Academy Award nominations for Steel  magnolias  (  1989   )  and Pretty Woman ,  वो   जीती   the   अकादमी   पुरस्कार   लिये  Best Actress for  उसके  performance in  एरिन  Brockovich (  2000  ) .
उसके  films  the  Pelican  ब्रैड  ( 1993  )  ,  my  Best  dost   's  Wedding (  1997  )  ,   रहस्यवादी  Pizza ( 1988  )  , Notting  हिल  ( 1999 ) , Runaway  बहू  ( 1999  )  ,  समंदर   's  Eleven  (   2001   )   ,   समंदर   's  Twelve (  2004  ) ,  चार्ली  Wilson 's War ( 2007 ) , Valentine 's Day (  2010   )   ,  Eat Pray  प्रेम   (  2010  )   ,   और  Mirror Mirror ( 2012 ) have  collectively   brought   बक्सा   दफ्तर  receipts of over  $  2.6  अरब  ,  बनाना  her  एक   of  the most successful actresses  in  terms of  बक्सा  office receipts .
Roberts had  become  one of the highest-paid actresses in the  संसार  ,  टॉपिंग  The Hollywood Reporters annual `` power  सूची  '' of top-earning female stars  इससे  2005  to   2006   .
Her  शुल्क  for 1990 's Pretty  स्त्री  was $  300,000  ;  in  2003  ,   वो  was  सशुल्क  an  unprecedented  $  25  million  लिये  her role in Mona  लिसा  Smile  (   2003  )  .
As  of   2010  , Roberts 's net worth was estimated  to  be $  140  million  .
रॉबर्ट्स   रै   महरूम  named one  of  People  पत्रिका   's  `` 50 Most Beautiful People  in   the  World '' eleven  टाइम्स  ,  tied   साथ  Halle Berry  .
In 2011  ,  she was named one  of  the `` 100  hottest  Women  of  All-Time  ''  by  मेन  's Health .
In 2001 , Ladies  घर  Journal ranked her  as  the  11th  most powerful  स्त्री  in the United States  .
चिह्नित   इलियट  Zuckerberg (  born  May 14  ,  1984  )  is an  अमरीकी   कंप्यूटर  programmer  और   अंतरजाल   उद्योगों   .
He is  बेहतरीन  known as one  of   पाँच  co-founders of  the  social  नेटवर्किंग   जालस्थल   फेसबुक  .
As  of  April 2013  ,  Zuckerberg  is  the  अध्यक्ष  and chief executive  of  Facebook , Inc. and in 2013  उसके  personal  माल   थी  estimated to be US $  13   .3   अरब  .
साथ   साथ   उसके   कॉलेज   roommates   और  fellow Harvard  विश्वविद्यालयों  students Eduardo  saverin  , Andrew McCollum , Dustin  moskovitz   और  Chris Hughes ,  zuckerberg  launched  फेसबुक   इससे   हार्वर्ड   's  dormitory  कक्ष  .
The group  तब   introduced   फेसबुक  onto  अन्य  campuses nationwide and moved to Palo  आल्टो  , California , United  राज्य  ( U.S.  )   shortly   afterwards  .
in  2007 ,  at  the age of twenty-three years  ,  Zuckerberg became a  अरबपति   as  a  परिणाम  of Facebook  और   the   क्रमांक   of  Facebook users worldwide  पहुँचे  a  कुल  of one  अरब  in  2012   .
Zuckerberg was involved in  विभिन्न  legal  विवादों   कि   यहूद   initiated  by others  in   the  group , who claimed  a  share  of  the company based  upon  their  भागीदारी   दौरान  the development  phase   of  Facebook  .
Since  2010   ,   zuckerberg  has  महरूम   नामित  among the 100  wealthiest  and most influential  लोगों  in the world  by  Time  पत्रिका  as a  भाग   of  its  व्यक्ति   of   the  Year  accolade  .
Zuckerberg was played by  कर्ता   जेसी  Eisenberg in  the  2010 Hollywood film  the  Social  संजाल   in   जिससे   the  rise of Facebook is portrayed .
the   mayflower  was the  जलयान  that  in   1620   transported  102  अंग्रेज़ी   तीर्थयात्रियों  , including a core group of  separatists   ,  to  नई  England .
Their story is one of  travail   और  survival in a  हर्ष   नई   संसार   पर्यावरण  .
framedThe
Committee  of  Ways and  अर्थात्  is  the  chief tax  -writing  committee  of  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  House  of   प्रतिनिधि  .
Members of  the  Ways and Means Committee are not allowed to serve on any  अन्य   हाउस  Committees unless they apply  लिये  a  waiver   इससे   उनके   पार्टी   's  congressional leadership  .
The  कमेटी  has  क्षेत्राधिकार   over  all taxation ,  tariffs  and other  revenue-raising  measures , as well as a number  of  other programs  including:
Social Security
Unemployment benefits
Medicare
Enforcement  of  child  support  laws
अस्थाई  Assistance for  मोहताज  Families  ,  a federal welfare program
फोस्टर  care and adoption programs
The U.S.  संविधान  requires that  सब   बिल्स  regarding  कराधान  must  originate   in  the House  of  Representatives .
चूंकि  House  कार्यविधि  is  कि  all bills  regarding  taxation must go  through  this committee , the committee  is  very influential , as is  इसके  Senate  बंटवारा  ,  the   u.S.   सीनेट  Committee  on  Finance .
The Ways  और   अर्थात्   कमेटी   in  the 111th Congress  थी   chaired   by  Charlie Rangel  ,   जो   था   लिया   a   छोड़  of  अनुपस्थिति  as chairman  जबतक   हाउस   आचार  violations  यहूद   resolved  .
However ,  उसके  leave of absence  as  chairman  थी   शासित   to  be a  इस्तीफा   .
पीट  Stark resigned as  एक्टिंग   अध्यक्ष   ,   so  Sander  levin  held that position  जबतक  the start of  the  112th  कॉंग्रेस   .
Dave Camp became the  कमेटी   कुर्सी   लिये  the  112th   कॉंग्रेस  ,  बाद  the Republicans  जीती  control of the House  in  the  2010  election  .
The blue whale  (  Balaenoptera musculus ) is a  समुद्री  mammal  belonging  to  the  suborder of  baleen  whales ( called  mysticeti   )   .
At  in   लंबाई  and or  अधिक   in  weight , it is  the   largest  known animal to  have  ever  existed   .
Long and  slender  , the  ब्लू   व्हेल  's body can be various  शेड्स   of  bluish-grey dorsally and  somewhat   हल्का  underneath  .
There are  at  least  तीन   पृथक   subspecies  :  B.  m. musculus of  the  North  अटलांटिक  and North Pacific  ,   B.  m. intermedia of the  दक्षिणी  Ocean  और   B.  m.  brevicauda  ( also  ज्ञात   as  the pygmy  ब्लू  whale  )   मिला  in the  भारतीय   समंदर  and  दक्षिण   प्रशांत  Ocean .
B.  m.  indica  ,   मिला  in the  भारतीय   समंदर   ,  may be another subspecies .
As  साथ  other  baleen  whales  ,  its  आहार   consists  almost  exclusively  of  छोटी  crustaceans known  as  krill  .
ब्लू  whales  यहूद  abundant in  nearly  all  the  oceans  on   धरती   जबतक   the  beginning  of  the twentieth  सदी  .
For over  a   सदी  ,  वे   यहूद   hunted   लगभग  to  extinction  by whalers  जबतक   सुरक्षित   by   the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  community in 1966  .
a  2002 report estimated  वहीँ   यहूद  5,000 to 12,000  ब्लू   whales  worldwide  ,  located in  at   तनिक  five groups  .
अधिक   हाल  research  into   the  Pygmy  subspecies   suggests   इस  may  be  an underestimate  .
Before whaling  ,   the  largest  जनसांख्यिकी   थी  in the Antarctic ,  क्रमांकन  approximately  239,000  ( range 202,000  to   311,000   )  .
वहीँ  remain only much  छोटी   (   around   2,000   )   एकाग्रता  in each  of  the  पूर्वी   उत्तर   प्रशांत  , Antarctic , and Indian Ocean groups .
There are  दो  more groups in  the  North  अटलांटिक  , and at  तनिक   दो  in the  दक्षिणी  Hemisphere .
the  globe artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus  var   .   scolymus  ) is a  किस्में  of a  प्रजाति  of thistle  cultivated  as  a  food  .
The  खाद्य  matter is buds  कि   रूप  within the flower  heads  before the  पुष्प  come into bloom .
the  buds go away or change to a  coarse   ,   मुश्किल  edible form  जब   the   पुष्प  blooms .
the  uncultivated or  जंगली  variety of the species is  पुकारा   a  cardoon .
it  is a perennial plant native to the  भूमध्यसागरीय   प्रदेश   .
the  United  राज्य  one  hundred-dollar  bill ( $ 100  )  is a  denomination  of United States currency .
u.S.  statesman , inventor , and diplomat  बेंजामिन  Franklin is currently  प्रदर्शित  on the obverse  of   the  bill  .
On  the  reverse of the  banknote  is an image of Independence Hall  .
the  $ 100 bill  is  the  largest  denomination that has  महरूम  printed  चूंकि  July 13  ,   1969   ,  when  the  denominations of $  500  ,  $  1,000 , $ 5,000 ,  और  $ 10,000  यहूद  retired .
The Bureau of  नक्काशी  and Printing says the average  जीवन  of  a  $  100   विधेयक   in   परिसंचरण  is  90   महीने   (  7.5 years ) before it is replaced due  to   पहनें  and tear .
The  बिल्स   हैं   भी  commonly referred  to  as ``  benjamins  '' , in  सन्दर्भ  to  the  use  of   बेंजामिन  Franklin 's  पोर्ट्रेट   on   the   denomination  ,  or   ``  C-Notes '' , based  on   the  Roman numeral for 100 .
The  विधेयक  is one of two denominations  मुद्रित   आज   कि  does  नहीं   विशेषता   a   अध्यक्ष   of   the  United States  ;  the  अन्य  is  the  $  10  bill  ,  featuring  सिकंदर  Hamilton .
The time on the  क्लॉक  of Independence Hall on the  रिवर्स  , according to  the   u.S.  Bureau  of  Engraving and Printing  ,  shows approximately  4:10  .
One  सौ   hundred-dollar  bills are delivered  by  Federal Reserve Banks in  mustard-colored  straps ( $ 10,000 ) .
The  श्रेणी  2009 $ 100 bill redesign was unveiled  on  April 21 ,  2010   ,  and  थी  to  be   जारी  to the  पब्लिक   on  February  11   ,  2011  ,  but  उत्पादन  was shut down in  दिसम्बर   2010  because as many as 30  %   यहूद  unusable  due   to   a  manufacturing flaw .
A  लंबवत  crease  in  the paper reveals  a  blank space on the bill  जब   खींचा  out  .
In  उनके   बदलना  , and continuing the high  माँग   of  this denomination  ,  the Series  2006a  was launched retaining the  पिछला  design ( 1996-generation  )   .
on   अप्रैल  24  ,   2013  , the Federal  आरक्षित  announced the new $ 100 bill would enter  परिसंचरण  on October 8  ,   2013   .
King David in  robes  of  a  Byzantine  सम्राट   .
Miniature  इससे   the  Paris  psalter  .
दाउद  ( ; ISO  259-3  Dawid ;  '  ; Strong 's  :   daveed   )   according  to the Hebrew  बाइबल   ,  was  the  second  किंग  of  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom  of   इसराईल   ,  and according to  the  New  वसीयत  Gospels of Matthew  और  Luke , an ancestor of  यीशु   .
His life is  conventionally  dated to c.  1040–970   bce  , his reign over Judah  c.  1010–1002  bce  ,  और  his reign  over   the  United Kingdom of Israel  c.   1002–970  BCE .
The Books of Samuel  ,   1  Kings  ,   और  1  क्रॉनिकल्स  are  the  only sources of  सूचना  on  दाउद  , although the Tel Dan stele  (  dated c.  850–835   bce  )  contains  the  phrase   (   bytdwd  ) ,  पढ़ा  as `` House  of  David '' , which most scholars  लो   as  confirmation  of  the  अस्तित्व   in  the  mid-9th   सदी   bce   of   a   judean   royal   राजवंश  called the House of  दाउद  .
He is depicted  as  a righteous king  ,  although  नहीं   बगैर   त्रुटियां   ,   as   खूब  as an  acclaimed   योद्धा  , musician ,  और   कवि   ,   traditionally   credited  for composing many of  the  psalms  contained   in  the Book  of   ज़बूर  .
दाउद   is  central  to   यहूदी  ,  ईसाई  , and Islamic doctrine and culture  .
Biblical tradition  maintains  that a  सीधा  descendant of  दाउद   होगा  be the Messiah  .
in   islam  he is considered  to  be a prophet  और   the  king  of   a  nation  .
Kathmandu (  ;  ) is  the  capital  और   largest  urban agglomerate of  नेपाल  .
the  agglomerate  consists  of Kathmandu  महानगर   नगर  at  इसके  core , and  इसके  sister cities Patan , Kirtipur ,  thimi  , and Bhaktapur .
It  भी   शामिल  the recently recognized urban areas of  shankhapur  , Karyabinayak ,  और   champapur  .
Banepa ,  dhulikhel  ,  और  Panauti  हैं  satellite  शहरी   क्षेत्रों   of   काठमांडू  located just outside the Kathmandu  घाटी  .
Kathmandu  is   भी  known informally as `` KTM  ''   or  the  ``   tri-city  ''  .
according   to   a  census  conducted  in 2011 ,  काठमांडू  metropolis alone has 975,453 inhabitants ; and the  agglomerate  has a population of more  than  2.5 million  निवासियों   .
The  महानगर  city area  is   और  has a population density  of  19,250  प्रति   km2  .
the   नगर   स्टैंड  at an  उन्नयन  of approximately in the bowl-shaped Kathmandu  घाटी   of   सेंट्रल  Nepal .
It  is   घिरी   by   चार  major  kyu   :  Shivapuri , Phulchoki  ,   nagarjun   ,  and Chandragiri .
Kathmandu Valley is  भाग   of   तीन  districts (  काठमांडू   ,  Lalitpur ,  और  Bhaktapur  )   ,  has the highest population  घनत्व   in   the  country , and  is   घर  to about a twelfth of  नेपाल  's  जनसांख्यिकी  .
During Rana  और   शाह   eras   ,   the   नाम  `` Nepal '' referred  तभी  to  the  Kathmandu Valley ;  it  was what people who  जिया   बाहर   the  valley called it .
During  इस  period  ,  British historians  पुकारा  the valley itself ``  नेपाल  Proper '' .
Today , Kathmandu  is  not only  the  capital of  the   संघीय  Democratic Republic  of  Nepal , but also the headquarters  of  the  सेंट्रल   विकास  Region of  नेपाल   .
the  Central  प्रदेश  comprises three  zones   :   bagmati   ,  Narayani  ,  and Janakpur .
काठमांडू   is  located in the  bagmati   मण्डल   .
Kathmandu  is   the  gateway  to   पर्यटन  in Nepal .
It is also the nerve  बीच  of  the  country  's  economy .
it  has the most  उन्नत   अवसंरचना   of  any urban area in Nepal , and its  अर्थव्यवस्था   is  focused on tourism , which accounted for  3.8  %  of  Nepal  's  GDP in  1995–96   .
( Tourism in  काठमांडू  declined  thereafter  during a  काल   of   राजनैतिक   अशांति  ,  लकिन   चूंकि  then  रै  improved . )
The city has a rich  इतिहास  ,  spanning  nearly  2000   सालो  ,  as   inferred  from  inscriptions   मिला  in  the  valley .
धार्मिक  and cultural  festivities  form a major  भाग   of   the   जीवनदान  of people residing in Kathmandu  .
सबसे  of Kathmandu  's  people follow  हिंदुत्व   और   अनेक   अन्य  follow Buddhism  .
There are people of other religious beliefs as well  ,   giving   काठमांडू  a cosmopolitan  संस्कृति   .
Nepali is the most  commonly  spoken  भाषा  in  the  city .
नेपाल   bhasa   is  the indigenous language spoken by  the  Newar people .
हिंदी   is   widely  understood and  अंग्रेज़ी  is  समझा   by   काठमांडू  's educated residents .
The  नगर  's literacy  रेट  is 98 %  .
Kathmandu 's sister  शहरों  (  ललितपुर  Patan ) and Bhaktapur are  अभिन्न  to Kathmandu 's  सांस्कृतिक  heritage  ,  tourism industry , and economy  ;   इसलिए   युनेस्को  's  संसार   विरासत  Site  सूचियाँ  all three cities ' monuments  और   आकर्षण  together under  एक  heading  ,  ``  काठमांडू  Valley-  युनेस्को   संसार  Heritage  साईट  ``  .
Field hockey  ,  usually  referred  to simply as  हॉकी  ,  is   a  team sport of the  हॉकी  family which is  निभाई  between  दो  teams  of  eleven players  साथ  hockey sticks  और   a  hard , solid  प्लास्टिक  ball  .
at  the  फेरे  of the 21st  सदी   ,  the game  is  played globally  ,  with particular  लोकप्रियता   throughout  Europe ,  एशिया  , Oceania  ,   और   दक्षिण  America – in  जोड  to  होने  the  नेशनल   खेल  of  पाकिस्तानी  and India .
The term `` field hockey ''  is   प्रयुक्त   primarily  in Canada ,  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   ,  and  अन्य  regions of  the  world where the  खेल   of  ice hockey  is  more popular .
During  खेल  , goal  keepers  are  the  only  खिलाड़ी  who are allowed to touch  the  ball with any  भाग   of  their  देह   (   साथ  the  एक्सेप्शन  of  a  player  's  hand  माना   'part   of  the stick '  )  , with  इस  only  applying  within  the   शूटिंग   वृत्त  ( also known  as  the  d  , or shooting arc ,  or  just the circle ) , while field  खिलाड़ी   खेल  the ball with  the  flat side  of   उनके  stick .
the  team that scores  the  most goals  by   the   समाप्त  of the  मैच   विन्स   .
if   the  score  is   tied  at the end of  the  game  ,   either   a   चित्रण  is declared  or  the game  goes   into  extra  समय  and/or  a   दंड  shootout ,  depending  on the  प्रतियोगिता   's   स्वरूप   .
The governing  देह   of   हॉकी  is the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Hockey  संघ   (   fih  )  ,   साथ   मेन   और   महिलाओं   होने  represented internationally in  प्रतियोगिताओं  including the  ओलम्पिक   खेल   ,  Commonwealth games  ,   हॉकी  World  कप  ,  champions  Trophy and Junior Hockey  संसार  Cup , with  अनेक  countries running  extensive  junior , senior , and  मास्टर्स   '   क्लबों   प्रतियोगिताओं  .
The  fih  is also  जिम्मेदार  for  organising  the  हॉकी   नियम  Board and developing  the  rules  लिये   the  sport  .
A popular  रूपांतर  of field hockey is indoor  हॉकी  ,  जिससे  differs in  a   क्रमांक  of respects  जबकि  embodying the primary principles of hockey  .
अंदर   हॉकी   is   a   6-a-side  variant ,  साथ   a  field which  is   घटाया   to  approximately  40m  × 20m .
साथ  many of the rules  बाकी  the  वही  , including obstruction and feet , there  हैं  several  कुंजी  variations  -  Players  may  not raise  the  ball unless shooting  on   लक्ष्य   ,  players may not hit  the   बॉल  ( instead utilising pushes to transfer the  बॉल  ) , and  the  sidelines are replaced  साथ  solid barriers which  the  ball will rebound  बंद   .
Ethan ``  cane  ''  ashby  ( né Atkinson  )   is  a fictional character  इससे  the American  सीबीएस  soap opera The Young and the  बेचैन   .
he  is  portrayed  by Australian  कर्ता  Daniel  गोडार्ड  , who originally  auditioned   लिये  Brad Snyder on  as  the World Turns but was recommended for a  भूमिका  on  the  Young  और  the Restless  बजाय   .
the   भूमिका   थी  to  be  portrayed  as  an American ,  लकिन  Goddard 's Australian descent  बहकावे  the  अक्षर   's   पृष्ठभूमि  .
Former head  लेखक  Lynn Marie Latham introduced him during the episode airing  on  January 12 , 2007 as  an  Australian bartender in search of his family  ,  a  डेब्यू  that received  a   मिश्रित  response .
लैथम   निर्मित  Cane  as  the son of  फिलिप  Chancellor II  (  Donnelly Rhodes ) and Jill  फोस्टर  Abbott  (   जेस   वाल्टन  )  लकिन  the character 's  पृष्ठभूमि   थी  rewritten by  मरिया   एरिना   घंटी   in   2009   ,   reestablishing   उसे   as   the   बेटे   of   कोलिन   और  Genevieve Atkinson ( Tristan Rogers  और   जिनी  Francis ) .
Though characterized as  ``  mysterious  ''  ,  cane   is  ``  वफ़ादार   और  dedicated '' ,  जबकि   गोडार्ड  described  the  character  as  a  ``   ठेठ  Australian  ,  working-class  दयालु  of  guy   ''  .
He was the first member  of  the  एटकिन्सन  family to  appear  on  the   श्रेणी  ,  followed   by   उसके  parents  और   एकसमान  twin brother .
Soon  बाद   उसके   डेब्यू   ,   he  became a leading  अक्षर   ,  a  निर्णय  praised by  दर्शक  and  आलोचकों  .
The character  रै  been involved with  एम्बर  Moore  (  Adrienne  frantz   )  ,  क्लो  Mitchell ( Elizabeth Hendrickson )  और   सबसे  notably Lily  सर्दियों  ( Christel  खलील  ) ,  a   रोमांस   कि   garnered  significant fan  ध्यान  .
In  2009  , Cane  और  Lily were married ;  वैश्विक  BC  होता   बाद  call  लिली  the  प्रेम  of Cane 's  जीवन  .
The pair  था   दो  children , Charlie and Mattie Ashby  .
In  2011  ,  the  actor was fired ,  और  Cane  थी   शॉट   to   मौत  onscreen .
however   ,   गोडार्ड  was rehired  जल्द  after viewers campaigned  लिये  his return ,  revealing  that Cane 's  एकसमान  twin  bhai  was in fact the  man  who  died   .
इस  sacrificed his  विवाह  to Lily ,  लकिन  the  युगल   यहूद  remarried  on   वेलेंटाइन   's   दिन  in  2012  .
Goddard has been widely  acclaimed  for his  portrayal  ; Canyon News said  कि   he  portrays the character  honestly  ,  और   is  `` always dependable ,  on  fire  और  exciting '' .
John Christopher  ``  Johnny  ''   डेप  II  (  born  जून  9  ,  1963 ) is  an  American actor  ,   फिल्मी  producer  ,  and musician .
he  has  जीती  the  सुनहरी   ग्लोब   पुरस्कार  and  स्क्रीन   अभिनेताओं   गिल्ड  award  लिये   बेहतरीन  Actor .
Depp rose  to  prominence  on  the 1980s television series 21  जम्प  Street , becoming a teen  आइडल  .
Dissatisfied with that status ,  डेप  turned to film for  अधिक  challenging  भूमिकाएँ  ; he played the title character of  the  acclaimed  एडवर्ड   scissorhands   (  1990  )  and later found box  दफ्तर   कामयाबी  in films such as Sleepy  खोखला   (  1999 ) ,  चार्ली   और   the  Chocolate Factory  (   2005   )  , Alice in  वंडरलैंड  ( 2010 ) , Rango  (   2011  )  और   the  Pirates  of  the  caribbean   फिल्मी  series  (  2003–present  )  .
He has collaborated  साथ   निदेशक   और   dost  Tim Burton in  आठ   films  ; the most  हाल   होने  Dark  साए   (   2012   )  .
Depp has  gained  acclaim for  उसके  portrayals of such  लोगों  as  ed  Wood in  ed  Wood  ,  Joseph D.  pistone   in  Donnie  brasco   ,  Hunter S. Thompson in Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas  ,  George Jung  in  Blow  ,  and  the   बैंको  robber  जॉन  Dillinger in  माइकल   मन   's  Public  दुश्मनों   .
Films featuring Depp have grossed  over   $  3.1 billion at  the  United States box office and over $ 7.6 billion worldwide  .
he   रै   महरूम   मनोनीत  for  शीर्ष   पुरस्कार  many times  ,  winning the Best Actor Awards  इससे  the  सुनहरी  –_Motion_Picture_Musical_or_Comedy Globes –_Motion_Picture_Musical_or_Comedy  लिये  Sweeney Todd : The  राक्षस   नाई   of  Fleet  गली   और   इससे  the Screen  अभिनेताओं   गिल्ड  for  pirates   of   the   caribbean  : The Curse  of  the Black  पर्ल   .
He also has  garnered  a  sex  symbol status in  अमरीकी  cinema , being twice named as the  ``   sexiest  Man  जिंदा   ``  by People  पत्रिका  in  2003   और   2009   .
He  रै   महरूम  listed  in   the  2012 Guinness  किताब   of   संसार  Records as the highest  सशुल्क  actor , with $ 75  लाख  .
The World  चौड़ी  Web  (  abbreviated  as   www   or  W3 , commonly known  as  the  वेब  ) , is a  प्रणाली   of  interlinked hypertext documents  पहुँचा  via the  अंतरजाल  .
With  a  web browser ,  एक  can  दृश्य  web  पृष्ठों   कि   may   contain  text ,  बिंब  , videos  ,  and  अन्य  multimedia ,  और  navigate  between  them  via  hyperlinks .
Using concepts  इससे  his  पहले  hypertext  प्रणालियों  like  enquire  , British engineer  ,  computer scientist and  at  that  समय  employee  of  the  cern  , Sir Tim  berners-lee  , now Director  of  the World  चौड़ी  Web Consortium (  w3c   )   ,   लिखा   a  proposal  in  March 1989  लिये  what would eventually  become  the  संसार  Wide Web .
At CERN , a European  शोध  organisation  निकट  Geneva straddling the border  between  France and  स्विट्ज़रलैंड  ,  berners-lee  and  belgian  computer scientist  रॉबर्ट  Cailliau  प्रस्तावित  in 1990 to use hypertext  ``  to  कड़ी   और  access  सूचना  of various kinds as a web of nodes in  जिससे   the  user can  ब्राउज़  at  होगा   ''  , and  वे  publicly  introduced  the project in December of the same  साल  .
Mark  ट्रैविस  John Sanchez (  born  November 11 , 1986 )  is  an American football quarterback  लिये  the  नई   यॉर्क  Jets of  the   नेशनल   फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL  )   .
He was  drafted   in  the first round of the 2009 NFL Draft as the  पांचवां   overall  selection  by  the Jets and the second quarterback taken overall  .
He played  कॉलेज  football  at  the University of Southern California ( USC )  .
सांचेज़  grew  up  in a well-disciplined  और  athletic family .
In the eighth  ग्रेड   ,  he  began  to play football and  सीख   the  intricacies  of   the   क्वार्टरबैक  position  ,  training with his father , Nick .
A well-regarded prospect , Sanchez committed  to  Southern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   following  his successful high  स्कूल  career in  जिससे   he   led  his team to a championship  शीर्षक  during his  फाइनल   ऋतु  .
At  यूएससी  ,  सांचेज़  was  relegated   as   the  backup quarterback  दौरान  his first three years though  he   रोज़  to prominence  due   to  his brief appearances on  the   फ़ील्ड   in   2007  due to  चोटों  suffered by  starting   क्वार्टरबैक  John David  बूटी   .
Sanchez also became popular within  the   जातियाँ  due to his  mexican-american   विरासत  .
Named  the   प्रारंभ  in 2008 ,  सांचेज़  led USC to a 12–1 record and won the Rose Bowl  विरूद्ध   penn   राज्य   लिये   जिससे  Sanchez was awarded  the  Most  मूल्यवान   खिलाड़ी  award  लिये  his  प्रदर्शन  on offense .
हालांकि  many considered him too inexperienced , Sanchez  घोषित   उसके  intention  to  enter the 2009 NFL Draft .
he   थी  selected by the  jets   बाद   वे   traded  up  साथ   the   क्लीवलैंड  Browns , and was  नामित   the   starting  quarterback prior  to  the start  of  the season .
despite  a  subpar  performance  ,  Sanchez led the Jets  to  the AFC  चैंपियनशिप  Game ,  a  losing  प्रयत्न  to the Indianapolis  कोल्टस   ,  becoming  the  fourth rookie  क्वार्टरबैक  in NFL  इतिहास   to   जीत   उसके   पहला   playoff   खेल   और  the second  to   जीत   दो  playoff  खेल  .
In his second  ऋतु   ,  Sanchez continued  to  develop and led the Jets  to  the playoffs  और   the   टोली  's second consecutive AFC  चैंपियनशिप   खेल   जहाँ  they narrowly lost  to  the Pittsburgh Steelers  ,  24–19 .
साथ  the win over  the  New England  देशप्रेमी   the  week prior , Sanchez  tied  four other quarterbacks  लिये  the second most post-season road victories by  a  quarterback in  एनएफएल  history .
in   अग्रणी  the Jets to  दो   लगातार   सम्मेलन  championships , Sanchez joined quarterback  बेन  Roethlisberger  as  the only  दो  quarterbacks  in  NFL history  to  reach the conference championship  in  their first  दो  seasons  in  the  लीग  .
the  next two seasons  होता  be a regression  लिये   दोनो   the  team  और  Sanchez as they failed  to   पहुँचें  the playoffs  .
Fans  और   मीडिया  critics called  लिये   a  struggling  सांचेज़  to be benched .
He  आखिरकार   थी  replaced  towards  the end of the 2012 season with Greg McElroy .
Paul Avery  (  April 2 , 1934December  10   ,  2000 ) was an American police  रिपोर्टर   ,   बेहतरीन   ज्ञात   लिये  his stories  on  the  infamous   सीरियल  killer  ज्ञात  as the Zodiac ,  और  later  लिये  his work on the Patricia Hearst  अपहरण   .
a   छोटी  submersible AC  sump   पंप  with  a   गार्डन   नली   कनेक्टर
A sump pump is a  पंप   प्रयुक्त  to remove  जल   कि   रै  accumulated in a water collecting sump basin  ,  commonly found in the basement  of  homes  .
The water  may  enter  via  the  घेरा  drains  of  a basement waterproofing system , funneling into  the  basin or  क्युकी   of   बरसात  or natural  मैदान  water  ,   if   the   तहखाने   is   नीचे   the  water table  स्तर  .
sump  pumps  हैं   प्रयुक्त  where basement  बाढ़   happens  regularly  और   to  remedy dampness  जहाँ  the  जल  table  is   ऊपर  the foundation  of   a  home  .
sump  pumps send  जल   दूर   इससे  a  हाउस  to any place where  it  is no  longer  problematic ,  ऐसे  as a municipal  तूफ़ान  drain  or   a   शुष्क   खूब   .
पंपों  may discharge to the  sanitary   सीवर  in  पुरानी   संस्थापना  .
एकबार  considered acceptable , this practice  may  now violate the  plumbing   कोड  or  नगरपालिका  bylaws  ,  because it can overwhelm  the  municipal sewage  उपचार  system .
Municipalities urge  homeowners  to disconnect and  reroute  sump pump discharge away  इससे  sanitary sewers .
Fines  may  be imposed  लिये   noncompliance  .
अनेक  homeowners have inherited their  sump  pump  configurations  and do  नहीं   एहसास   कि  the pump  discharges   to   the   सीवर   .
If  the  discharge is  खिलाया  to a laundry sink  in   the  basement , it  's  likely going to the sewer  .
प्रायः  hardwired into a home 's electrical  प्रणाली   ,   sump  pumps  may  have a battery backup .
The home 's pressurized water  सप्लाई  powers some pumps  ,  eliminating  the  need for electricity at  the  expense  of  using potable water , potentially making them more  महंगी  to operate than  विद्युत  pumps and  बनाना   an   अतिरिक्त  water disposal  प्रॉब्लम  .
Since  a  sump  जलाशय   may  overflow  if   नहीं   constantly  pumped , a backup  प्रणाली  is  महत्वपूर्ण  for cases when the  प्रमुख  power  is  out for prolonged  अवधि   of  time  ,  as during a  कठोर  storm .
वहीँ  are generally two  प्रकार  of sump pumps —  pedestal  and submersible  .
The pedestal  पंप   's  motor  is   आरोहित  above  the  sump , where it is more easily  सर्विस  ,  लकिन  is also more  conspicuous  .
The pump  impeller  is driven by  a   long  , vertical extension  शाफ्ट  and  the  impeller  is   in  a scroll  आवास  in  the   आधार  of the pump  .
The  submersible  pump is entirely  आरोहित  inside the  sump  ,  और  is  विशेषकर  sealed  to   prevent  electrical short circuits .
sump  pump systems are  भी  utilized in industrial  और   वाणिज्यिक  applications  to  control  जल   तालिका  -related problems in  सतह   मृदा  .
An  आर्टेसियन  aquifer  or  periodic high  जल   तालिका  situation can cause the  मैदान  to  become   अस्थिर  due to  जल  saturation  .
as  long as  the   पंप   कृत्यों   ,   the  surface soil will  remain  stable .
These sumps are  typically   टेन   फीट  in depth  or  more ;  lined  with corrugated  मेटल  pipe that  contains  perforations or drain  छेद  throughout  .
वे  may include electronic control systems  साथ  visual  और  audible alarms and are usually covered to prevent debris and  पशु  from  गिरना   in   .
Bleeding Kansas  ,  Bloody  कान्सास   or  the Border  युद्ध  ,  थी  a  श्रेणी   of   हिंसक  political confrontations  involving  anti-slavery  free-staters   और  pro-slavery  ``   किनारा   ruffian   ``  elements ,  कि  took place  in   the   कान्सास  Territory and the  neighboring  towns of  मिसौरी  between  1854  and  1861   .
at   the   दिल   of   the   विरोध  was the question of whether Kansas would enter the Union as a free  राज्य   or  slave state  .
As such ,  bleeding   कान्सास   थी  a proxy  युद्ध   between  Northerners  और  Southerners over  the   समस्या  of slavery  in   the  United States .
the  term ``  bleeding   कान्सास   ''  was coined by  होरेस   greeley  of the  नई  York  ट्रिब्यून   ;   the  events it encompasses  सीधे   presaged  the  अमरीकी  Civil  युद्ध  .
Congress  था  long struggled  to   संतुलन   the   रूचि  of pro-slavery forces and anti-slavery  शक्तियां   .
the  events  बाद  known  as   bleeding  Kansas  यहूद  set into  गति  by the  kansas–nebraska   अधिनियम  of  1854  , which  nullified  the Missouri  सुलह  and  बजाय  implemented  the   अवधारणा   of  popular sovereignty  .
an  ostensibly  लोकतांत्रिक  idea , popular sovereignty stated  कि  the  निवासियों   of  each territory or  राज्य   चाहिए  decide whether  it  would  be   a  free or  स्लेव   राज्य   ;  however  ,  this resulted  in   आव्रजन  en masse  to   कान्सास  by activists from both  पहलू  .
At  एक   पाइंट  , Kansas had  दो   पृथक   सरकारें  ,  प्रत्येक  with its  अपना   संविधान   ,   हालांकि  only one  थी   federally  recognized .
On January 29 , 1861 ,  कान्सास  was admitted to the Union as  a  free  राज्य   ,   कम  than  तीन   महीने   पहले  the  बैटल   of  Fort Sumter which began the Civil  युद्ध   .
बेंजीन  is  an  organic chemical compound  साथ  the molecular formula  c6  H|Hydrogen|H6  .
इसके  molecule is composed  of  6 carbon atoms joined  in   a   रिंग   ,   साथ   1   हाइड्रोजन   अणु  attached  to  each  कार्बन  atom .
क्युकी   इसके   अणुओं   contain   तभी  carbon and hydrogen atoms , benzene is classed as  a   हाइड्रोकार्बन  .
बेंजीन   is  a  प्राकृतिक  constituent of crude oil  ,  and  is   एक  of the  सबसे  basic petrochemicals  .
बेंजीन   is   an  aromatic hydrocarbon  और   the  second  [  n ] - annulene ( [ 6 ]  -annulene  )  ,  a cyclic  हाइड्रोकार्बन  with a  निरन्तर  pi  बंध  .
It  is  sometimes abbreviated  ph  –H .  बेंजीन   is   a  colorless and highly flammable liquid with a  मीठी   महकते  .
It is  मुख्यतः  used as  a   precursor   to  heavy chemicals ,  ऐसे  as  ethylbenzene   और   cumene  ,  जिससे   हैं   उत्पादित   on  a  अरब  kilogram scale  .
क्युकी   it   रै  a high octane  क्रमांक   ,  it is  an   महत्वपूर्ण   घटक   of  gasoline , composing a few percent of its mass .
सबसे   non-industrial  applications  have  been limited  by  benzene  's  carcinogenicity  .
Giovanni Virginio  स्क्यापारेल्ली   (  ;  14  March  1835  –  4  July 1910  )   थी  an Italian  astronomer  and science historian .
वी  homebrew refers to the  reuse  of Nintendo 's Wii game  कंसोल  to  चलाएं  software  कि  has not  महरूम  authorized  by  Nintendo .
it   achieves  this by defeating  the  Wii  's  copy protection and code signing measures .
in   अधिक  general terms  ,   वी   homebrew  refers to the use of  the  Wii  's  hardware , accessories  और  software  लिये   उद्देश्य  outside those  intended   by  the manufacturer  .
Original efforts  केन्द्रित  on  using   the   वी  Remote  as   a   इंगित   यंत्र  on other operating systems  ,   or   कार्यशील   web-based   खेल   in  the  built-in   वेब   ब्राउजर   .
subsequent  developments in games exploits ,  ऐसे  as the `` Twilight hack  ``  , ``  bannerbomb   ''  and  इसके  later incarnation `` LetterBomb  ''  ,  ``  Smash Stack ''  ,  ``  इंडियाना   pwns  '' , `` Yu-Gi-OWNED  ''   ,  ``  bathaxx  ''  ,  and ``  वापसी   of   the  Jodi ''  ,   बना  installing the  ``  Homebrew Channel `` possible .
Hadley ( right  )  discussing the 2006 Israel-Lebanon crisis with  बुश   और   राइस  .
Stephen  जॉन   हैडली   (   born  February 13 , 1947 )  थी   the   21st  U.S. Assistant  to  the  अध्यक्ष   लिये  National Security  अफेयर्स  ( commonly  referred  as National  सुरक्षा   सलाहकार  ) ,  सेवारत   अंतर्गत  President George  W.  Bush  .
Take identical growing  पौधे  and give  उर्वरक   to  half of  उन्हें  .
if   वहीँ   हैं  differences  between   the  fertilized  संयंत्र  group and  the   unfertilized   ``   कंट्रोल   ''  group ,  ये  differences may be due  to  the  उर्वरक   .
A scientific control is an experiment or observation  designed   to   minimize  the effects  of  variables other than  the  single independent variable .
This  increases  the reliability  of  the results , often  through  a comparison between  कंट्रोल   माप  and the other measurements .
Scientific controls are  a  part of the scientific  विधि  .
For  उदाहरण  , during drug testing  ,   वैज्ञानिकों   होगा  try to  कंट्रोल  two groups  to  keep  उन्हें   as   एकसमान  as possible , then allow one group to  कोशिश   the  drug  .
Another  उदाहरण  might be  परीक्षण  plant  उर्वरक  by giving  it   to   तभी  half  the   पौधे   in   a   गार्डन   :   the  plants that  प्राप्त   no   उर्वरक  are  the   कंट्रोल   समूह   ,   क्युकी  they establish the baseline level  of  growth  कि  the  fertilizer-treated   पौधे   होगा  be compared  विरूद्ध   .
Without a  कंट्रोल   समूह  , the experiment can not  determine  whether  the   fertilizer-treated   पौधे  grow more than they would have if untreated  .
Ideally , all variables  in   an   प्रयोग  will be  नियंत्रित   (   accounted  for by  the  control measurements )  और  none will  be   uncontrolled   .
in  such an experiment , if all  the   नियंत्रण  work  as   अपेक्षित  , it  is  possible  to  conclude that  the  experiment is working as  intended  and  कि  the results of  the  experiment are  due  to the effect of  the   परिवर्तनीय  being tested .
That  is  ,  वैज्ञानिक  controls  allow   an  investigator  to  make  a  claim  जैसे  ``  दो  situations  यहूद  identical until factor  x   occurred   .
Since factor X is the only difference between the  दो   परिस्थितियों  , the new outcome  थी  caused  by  factor X  .   ''

जॉन  Adams  (  October 30  ,  1735 ( O.S .  अक्तूबर  19  ,  1735 )  –   जुलाई   4  , 1826  )   थी   the  second president  of   the  United  राज्य  (  1797–1801  )  ,   having   पहले  served as the  पहला  vice  अध्यक्ष  of  the  United States .
An American  founding  Father , he was a  statesman  , diplomat , and  a   अग्रणी  advocate of American independence  इससे   ग्रेट  Britain .
Well educated  ,   he  was  an  Enlightenment political  theorist   जो   प्रचारित  republicanism and wrote  prolifically   परिचय  his often  seminal  ideas  ,  both in published works  और  in letters  to  his  बीवी  and key adviser Abigail as well as  to   अन्य  Founding Fathers  .
एडम्स   आए  to  prominence   in   the  early  चरण   of   the   अमरीकी  Revolution  .
A lawyer  और  public figure  in  Boston , as a delegate from Massachusetts to  the  Continental Congress ,  he  played a leading role in persuading Congress  to   घोषित  independence  .
He  assisted   थामस  Jefferson in drafting the Declaration  of  Independence in  1776  ,  और   थी  its primary  एडवोकेट  in  the  Congress  .
बाद  , as a diplomat  in  Europe ,  he  helped  negotiate  the  eventual  peace treaty with Great Britain  ,  and was responsible for obtaining vital governmental loans  इससे  Amsterdam bankers .
A political  theorist  and  इतिहासकार   ,  Adams largely  लिखा  the Massachusetts Constitution  in  1780  ,  which  साथ  with  उसके  earlier Thoughts  on   सरकारी   ,   बहकावे   अमरीकी  political thought  .
एक  of his  महानतम  roles was as a judge of character  :  in  1775   ,  he  मनोनीत   जार्ज  Washington  to   be   commander-in-chief  , and  25   सालो  later nominated  जॉन   मार्शल   to  be  मुख्य  Justice of  the  United  राज्य  .
एडम्स  ' revolutionary credentials secured him two  शर्तें  as George Washington  's   वाइस   अध्यक्ष  and his own  चुनाव  in 1796 as the second president .
During  उसके  one  पद  , he encountered  ferocious   हमले   by  the  jeffersonian   republicans   ,  as  खूब  as the dominant faction in  उसके  own  federalist  Party led  by  his bitter enemy  सिकंदर   हैमिल्टन   .
एडम्स  signed the controversial  एलियन   और  Sedition  अधिनियमों   ,  and built  up  the army and navy especially in  the  face of  an  undeclared  नवल  war ( called the ``  quasi-war  ``  )   साथ   फ़्रांस  ,  1798–1800   .
The major  accomplishment  of his presidency was his  शांतिपूर्ण   रेज़ोल्यूशन  of the conflict in the face  of   हैमिल्टन   's  opposition .
In 1800  ,  Adams was defeated  लिये   re-election  by  थामस  Jefferson  और  retired to Massachusetts .
He  बाद   resumed  his friendship  साथ  Jefferson  .
He and his wife ,  अबीगैल   एडम्स   ,  founded  an  accomplished family line  of  politicians , diplomats , and  इतिहासकारों   अभी  referred  to   as  the Adams political family .
Adams  थी  the father of John  क्विंसी  Adams , the  छठे  President of  the   संयुक्त  States .
His  उपलब्धियाँ   have   प्राप्त  greater  मान्यता  in modern times ,  हालांकि   उसके  contributions  यहूद  not initially  as  celebrated  as   those   of  other Founders  .
Adams was  the   पहला  U.S.  अध्यक्ष   to  reside  in  the building  कि   आखिरकार  became known  as   the   श्वेत  House .
A  वाट  steam engine .
the  steam engine , fuelled primarily  by   कोयले   ,   propelled  the Industrial Revolution in  ग्रेट  Britain  और  the  संसार  .
the  Industrial  क्रान्ति   थी  the transition  to  new manufacturing processes that occurred in the period from about 1760  to  some  समय   between   1820  and 1840 .
इस  transition included  going  from  हाथ   उत्पादन   विधि  to machines ,  नई   रासायनिक   निर्माण   और  iron production processes  ,   improved   दक्षता  of water  शक्ति  , the increasing use  of  steam  शक्ति   और  development of  यंत्र  tools .
The  परिवर्तन   भी   शामिल  the change from  लकडी   और  other bio-fuels  to  coal  .
the  Industrial  क्रान्ति   began   in   ब्रिटेन  and within a few decades  स्प्रेड  to Western Europe and  the   संयुक्त  States .
The Industrial Revolution marks  a  major turning  पाइंट   in  history  ;  almost  प्रत्येक  aspect  of   रोज़  life was  बहकावे  in  कुछ  way .
सबसे  notably ,  औसत  income and  जनसांख्यिकी  began to exhibit  unprecedented  sustained growth  .
In  the  words of Nobel  पुरस्कार  winner Robert  E.  Lucas ,  jr.   ,   ``  For the  पहला   समय  in history  ,  the living  मानकों  of the masses of ordinary  लोगों  have  begun   to   undergo  sustained growth ... Nothing  remotely  like  इस   आर्थिक   बर्ताव  is  उल्लेखित   by  the classical economists ,  भी  as  a  theoretical  सम्भावना  . ''
William Bell  स्कॉट   आयरन   और  Coal ,  1855-60
The  काल  of time covered by the Industrial  क्रान्ति  varies  साथ   अलग   इतिहासकारों   .
eric  Hobsbawm  आयोजित  that it 'broke out ' in Britain in the 1780s  और   थी  not fully  लगा  until  the   1830s  or 1840s , while  T.   S.  Ashton  आयोजित   कि  it occurred roughly  between  1760  और  1830 .
Some 20th-century  इतिहासकारों  such as John  clapham  and Nicholas Crafts have argued that  the  process  of  economic and  सोशल   बदलें   took   प्लेस  gradually and the term revolution  is  a misnomer .
This is still a subject of  बहस  among historians  .
जीडीपी  per  capita  was broadly stable before the Industrial  क्रान्ति   और  the emergence of  the   आधुनिक  capitalist economy  .
The  औद्योगिक  Revolution  began   an  era of  per-capita   आर्थिक  growth  in  capitalist economies .
Economic historians  हैं  in agreement  कि   the   onset  of the  औद्योगिक   क्रान्ति  is  the  most  महत्वपूर्ण  event in the history  of   मानवता  since  the   domestication   of  animals  और  plants .
the   पहला  Industrial  क्रान्ति  evolved into the Second Industrial  क्रान्ति   in  the  परिवर्तन  years between  1840   और  1870 ,  जब   technological   और  economic  प्रगति  gained momentum with  the   increasing  adoption of steam-powered  नौकाएँ  , ships and railways , the  विशाल  scale  manufacture  of  यंत्र  tools  और   the   increasing   उपयोग  of  भाप  powered factories  .
जूलियट   annmarie   huddy  ( born September 27  ,  1969  )  ,  is   an  American  टेलीविज़न   न्यूज  reporter ,  फिलहाल   appearing  on Fox  न्यूज  Channel .
This  सूची   बाँधने   u.S.   शहरों   by  land area (  नहीं  including bodies  of   जल  ) .
कुल  areas ( including  जल   )  are  भी   दिए  , but note that  ,  when ranked by  कुल  area , a  क्रमांक  of coastal  शहरों  appear disproportionately ``  larger   ''  .
San  फ्रांसिस्को  is  an   चरम  example  ;  water makes  up  nearly  80  % of its  कुल   क्षेत्रफल  of 232 square  मील   (   601  km2 )  .
Note also that  in   अनेक   मामले   a   नगर   may  be geographically large  primarily  because  इसके  municipal government has merged with the government of  the   surrounding  county .
In  कुछ  cases  the  county  no  longer exists , while in  अन्य   the   व्यवस्था  has formed a  संचित  city–county  (  or  city-  borough in  अलास्का   ,  or city- parish  in  Louisiana  )   .
These are shown in  बिंदास   in  the list  नीचे   (  but not all examples may  be   indicated   )  .
** These  हैं  independent  शहरों  , meaning they are not a part of any  काउंटी   .
the   विशाल   आंत  ( or bowel ,  कोलन   )  is the last part of  the  digestive  प्रणाली  in vertebrate  पशु   .
Its function  is  to  अवशोषित   जल   इससे  the remaining indigestible food matter , and  तब   to  pass  व्यर्थ   बर्बाद   सामग्री  from the body .
This  आलेख  is  primarily  about  the   इंसान   आंत   ,   हालांकि   the  information about  इसके   प्रक्रियाओं  are directly  लागू  to most mammals  .
The large  आंत  consists of the cecum , rectum  और  anal canal .
it  starts  in   the   सही  iliac  प्रदेश   of  the pelvis ,  बस  at or below  the  right  कमर   ,   जहाँ  it is joined to the  नीचे  end of  the   छोटी  intestine  .
इससे   यहाँ   it  continues up the  उदर  , then  आरपार  the  चौडाई  of the  abdominal   गुहा   ,  and then it turns  bas   ,   continuing  to its  endpoint  at the  गुदा   .
The  विशाल  intestine is  परिचय  long , which is  परिचय  one-fifth  of  the whole  लंबाई  of the intestinal canal  .
In Terminologia Anatomica the large intestine  शामिल  the  cecum  , colon , rectum , and anal canal .
However , some sources exclude  the  anal  कनाल   .
The Green Bay Packers are an American football  टोली   आधारित  in  ग्रीन  Bay  ,   विस्कॉन्सिन  .
They are members  of   the  North Division  of  the National Football Conference (  nfc   )  in the  नेशनल  Football  लीग  (  एनएफएल   )  .
ग्रीन   खाड़ी  is  the   third-oldest  franchise in the NFL , having  महरूम  organized and  playing  in 1919 .
the  Packers are  the  only non-profit , community-owned major league professional sports  टोली  in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
the  Packers  हैं  the last vestige of `` small town teams '' that  यहूद  once common  in  the NFL during  the   1920s   और  1930s .
संस्थापित   in   1919  by Earl `` Curly ''  lambeau  ( hence the name  lambeau  Field  on   जिससे   the  team  plays  ) and George Whitney Calhoun ,  the  Green Bay  पैकर्स  can trace  उनके  lineage  to  other semi-professional  टीमों  in Green Bay  डेटिंग  back to 1896  .
in   1919   और  1920 the  पैकर्स  competed  as  a  semi-professional  football  टोली  against  क्लब  from around  विस्कॉन्सिन   और  the  मिडवेस्ट   .
वे   joined  the American  पेशेवर   फ़ुटबॉल  Association ( APFA ) in  1921   ,  the forerunner to  कया   is   ज्ञात  today  as   the   नेशनल  Football  लीग  ( NFL  )   .
हालांकि  Green Bay  is   the  last NFL  ``   छोटी   कस्बा  '' team  ,   इसके   लोकल   प्रशंसक  base  और  media extends into nearby Milwaukee ;  the  team  भी   निभाई   चयनित   घर  games there between  1933  and 1994 .
the  Green Bay Packers have won 13  लीग  championships  (  more than  कोई  other team in the NFL ) ,  सहित  nine  एनएफएल   championships  prior  to  the Super Bowl era and four Super Bowl victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl  i   )   ,  1968 ( Super Bowl II ) , 1997  (  Super  कटोरी  XXXI )  और   2011  (  सुपर   कटोरी   xlv  ) .
The  पैकर्स   have  long-standing  ,   कड़वा   rivalries  with  उनके  NFC  उत्तर   (   formerly   the  NFC Central ) opponents  ,  the  शिकागो  Bears  ,  Minnesota Vikings  और   the  Detroit Lions  .
the  Bears-Packers  फंसने  is one of the oldest rivalries in NFL  इतिहास  , dating  वापस  to 1921  .
The  सैन   फर्नांडो   घाटी   (  locally  ज्ञात  as  ``  The Valley  ''  ) is an  urbanized  valley  स्तिथ   in   the   लॉस   एंजिल्स  metropolitan area  of   दक्षिणी  California ,  संयुक्त  States , defined  by  the mountains  of  the Transverse Ranges circling it  .
घर  to 1.76  लाख   लोगों  , it  झूठ   उत्तर   of   the  larger  और   अधिक   populous  Los Angeles  जलाशय   .
Nearly two thirds of the Valley  's   जमीन  area  is  part of the City of Los  एंजिल्स  .
The other  incorporated  cities  in   the   घाटी  are Glendale , Burbank ,  सैन  Fernando  ,  Hidden Hills and Calabasas .

The exterior  of   the  current World of Coca-Cola  at  Pemberton  प्लेस   .
the  World of Coca-Cola  ,  is  a  permanent exhibition featuring the  इतिहास  of The Coca-Cola  कम्पनी  .
Its  well-known   विज्ञापन   as  well  as   a  host of  entertainment  areas and  आकर्षण  ,  और  is located  in  Atlanta , Georgia  (  where the  कम्पनी  's  मुख्यालय  are  स्तिथ   )  at Pemberton Place ( named in honor  of   जॉन   pemberton   ,  the inventor of  coca-cola   )  .
as  part  of   जॉर्जिया   's  museums  .
the  complex  स्तिथ   आरपार  Baker Street  इससे  Centennial  ओलम्पिक  Park that is home to the Georgia Aquarium and  भविष्य   बीच  for Civil &  इंसान   अधिकारों   .
It opened to the public on  may   24  , 2007 , relocating  इससे   और  replacing  the   असली   प्रदर्शनी   .
pretties  is a  2005   विज्ञान  fiction  अनोखा   और  the  दूसरी  book of the Uglies  त्रयी  written  by  Scott Westerfeld .

Susan Leigh  vaughan  Smith ( born September 26 , 1971 ) is an  अमरीकी   स्त्री  sentenced to  जीवन  in  थाना  for murdering her  children  .
Born in  संघ   ,   दक्षिण   कैरोलिना  ,  और  a former student  of   the  University  of   दक्षिण  Carolina Union  ,  she was convicted on July 22  ,  1995  लिये   murdering   उसके  two  बेटे  , 3-year-old  माइकल  Daniel  स्मिथ  ,  born  October 10  ,   1991   ,  and 14-month-old Alexander Tyler Smith , born August 5 , 1993 .
The case  gained  worldwide attention shortly  बाद  it  विकसित  , due to  उसके  claiming  कि   a   ब्लैक  man  चुराया  her  car  and  kidnapped   उसके   बेटे   .
She  बाद   claimed  that  वो  suffered  इससे  mental health issues that impaired her judgment .
according   to   the   दक्षिण  Carolina Department of Corrections  ,   स्मिथ   होगा  be eligible  लिये   पैरोल   on  November 4 , 2024 , after serving  a  minimum of  तीस  years  .
वो   is   incarcerated  at South Carolina 's  leath   correctional   संस्था  ,  निकट   greenwood   .
Mount  mckinley   (   भी   ज्ञात  as Denali taken from the  इनुइट  Koyukon Athabaskan language meaning `` The Great One  ''   )  is  the  highest  पहाड़  peak in  the  United States and in North  अमेरिका   साथ   a  summit elevation  of  above sea level  .
at   कुछ  , the base  to  peak rise is considered the  largest  of any mountain situated  entirely  above sea level .
measured  by  स्थलाकृतिक  prominence ,  it  is the third most  prominent   शिखर  after  माउंट  Everest and Aconcagua  .
स्तिथ   in   the   अलास्का  Range in  the  interior  of  US state  of   अलास्का   ,   it  is  the   centerpiece  of Denali  नेशनल   पार्क  and Preserve .
the  first European  to  document sighting the mountain  थी   जार्ज   वैंकूवर   in  1794 .
In 1903  ,  James  wickersham   अंकित  the first  attempt  at climbing McKinley  जिससे   थी   unsuccessful  .
In  1906  ,  फ्रेडरिक  Cook claimed  the   पहला  ascent which was later  सिद्ध   to  be  गलत  .
The  पहला   verifiable  ascent to  mckinley  's  समिट   थी  achieved on June  7  , 1913 by  चढना  Hudson Stuck , Harry Karstens  ,  Walter Harper , and  रॉबर्ट  Tatum  .
In 1951 ,  ब्रैडफोर्ड   washburn  pioneered the West Buttress  रूट  considered  to  be the safest and easiest route and  इसलिए   the  most popular currently in  उपयोग   .
the   होंडा   s600   is  an automobile manufactured by Honda  .
it  was  शुभारम्भ  in March  1964   .
Available as a  roadster   –  bearing strong  प्रतिरूप   to  the Honda S500 – and  as   a  fastback coupé –  introduced   in  March 1965 –  the  S600  थी  the  पहला  Honda available in two trim levels  .
During its  उत्पादन   चलाएं   up  to  1966  , the model styling  होता  remain  pretty   much   the  same , with the most  notable  changes coming to  the  front  grille  ,  बम्पर   ,  and headlights .
संचालित  by a  dohc   ,  water-cooled , four-cylinder inline engine with  चार  carburetors ,  the  engine capacity was  increased   to   606   cc  from  the   s500   's  531 cc .
the   इंजन   उत्पादित  at 8,500 rpm and had a top speed  of   .
With the convertible weighing  in  at  mere  , the extra sheet metal of  the   कूप   तभी  added to  the  overall  वज़न   .
Suspension  थी  independent with  sealed   रोलर  chain  ड्राइव  to each rear wheel .
The S600 was  the  first mass  marketed   होंडा   car   .
First offered  तभी  in right-hand drive  ,  it soon  became   उपलब्धियाँ  in  left-hand   ड्राइव   to  appeal  to  export  बाज़ार  .
There  यहूद   a   few   pre-production   s500s  manufactured  in  left  हाथ  drive , two or  तीन   भी  being shown  in  some  जल्दी  sales  विवरणिका   .
Both  the   s600  roadster  और   coupé  were available  in  standard trim and  a   खास   ,  upgraded package  पुकारा  the  sm600   जिससे   शामिल   ,   among  other items , special  पेंट  colors , exclusive badging  ,   a  standard  रेडियो  and speaker  ,   a  special antenna  in   the  passenger side sun  छज्जा  , standard reversing lights  ,  a  मानक  cigarette lighter ,  a  standard  हीटर  ,  बेहतर  cushioned seats  ,   और  a  detachable  seat track for  जल्दी  removal  of  the passenger  सीट   .
Honda built  3,912   roadsters  in 1964  ,   साथ  production climbing to 7,261  convertibles  and 1,519 coupes  in  1965 .
Production  dropped  off  in  1966  (  as they were  shifting   to  the S800  )   साथ   तभी   111   roadsters  and  281  coupes , giving tallies of  11,284  convertibles and 1,800  coupes   लिये  the  3   साल  span .
everybody  Hates  क्रिस   is  an  अमरीकी  television  काल   sitcom  that  depicts   the  teenage  अनुभवों   of   हास्य   क्रिस  Rock ( who is also  the  narrator  )   जबकि  growing up in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood  of   ब्रुकलीन  , New  यॉर्क   .
The show is set between  1983   और  1987 ; however ,  चट्टान   खुद   थी   a   किशोरावस्था   between  1978  और   1983  .
चट्टान  grew up with  a  boy  नामित  Kenny Montero , whom he  रै   प्रायः  referred  to  as the inspiration for a  लॉट   of   the  episodes .
In many interviews  ,   चट्टान   रै  described  केनी  as the  कारण  he  मिला   into  comedy in the  पहला  place .
the   दिखाएँ  's title parodies the CBS sitcom Everybody Loves  रेमंड   .
चट्टान  stated :  ``  Everybody  loves   रेमंड  but  everybody  Hates  क्रिस   !  ``  .
The show  's  lead actors are Tyler James Williams  ,   टेरी   क्रू   ,  Tichina  अर्नाल्ड   ,   tequan  Richmond ,  imani  Hakim  ,  and  विंसेंट  Martella .

the  fourth season of the  श्रेणी  premiered Friday  ,   अक्तूबर  3  ,  2008 ,  at   8:00pm  Eastern/7:00PM  सेंट्रल  .
On May  21  , 2009 ,  the  CW announced that it  था   रद्द  Everybody Hates Chris .

Pleural effusion is excess  द्रव  that  accumulates   between  the  दो   pleural   परतों  ,  the   fluid-filled  space that  surrounds  the lungs  .
Excessive amounts of such  द्रव  can impair breathing  by  limiting  the  expansion of the lungs  दौरान  ventilation .
Beowulf ( ;  in   बूढ़ा  English or  )  is  the   conventional  title  of  an Old English  वीर  epic  कविता  consisting of  3182   alliterative   long  lines  ,  set  in  Scandinavia  ,  commonly cited  as  one of the most important works of Anglo-Saxon  साहित्य  .
it  survives  in   a  single manuscript  ज्ञात  as the Nowell  codex  .
इसके   संयोजन  by  an  anonymous  anglo-saxon   कवि  is dated  between  the 8th  और  the  जल्दी  11th century  .
in  1731 , the manuscript was badly damaged by a fire  कि  swept  through  a  भवन  housing a collection of Medieval  पांडुलिपियों   समवेत   by   सर  Robert  ब्रूस   कपास  .
the  poem  गिरी   into  obscurity for  दशकों  ,  और   इसके   अस्तित्व  did  नहीं  become widely known again until it  थी  printed  in  1815 in  an  edition  prepared   by   the  Icelandic-Danish scholar Grímur Jónsson Thorkelin .
In the poem  ,  Beowulf , a hero  of   the  Geats in  scandinavia   ,  comes to the help of  hroðgar   ,  the king  of  the Danes , whose  मीड  hall  (  in Heorot  )  has been  अंतर्गत  attack  by  a  दानव  known as Grendel .
After  बियोवुल्फ़   जानबूझ  him ,  grendel  's  माँ   हमले   the   हॉल   और  is  तब  also defeated  .
Victorious ,  बियोवुल्फ़  goes home to Geatland in  स्वीडन  and later  becomes  king of the Geats  .
बाद  a period of fifty years has  passed  ,  बियोवुल्फ़  defeats a  ड्रैगन  ,  लकिन  is  fatally  wounded  in  the  बैटल   .
After his death ,  उसके  attendants bury him  in   a  tumulus , a burial mound  ,  in  geatland  .
shem   हैम  and Japheth by James Tissot 1904 .
shem   (   ;  Sēm  ;   अरबी   :  Sām ;  ge'ez  :  ሴም  , Sēm ;  ``  renown ; prosperity  ;   नाम  '' ) was  एक  of the sons of Noah in  the   यहूदी   बाइबल  as well as in Islamic  साहित्य  .
He is most popularly regarded  as  the eldest son , though  कुछ   परंपराओं  regard him  as   the   दूसरी  son  .
उत्पत्ति   10:21   refers   to  relative ages  of   shem  and  उसके   bhai   japheth  ,  लकिन  with sufficient  ambiguity  to  have   yielded   अलग   अनुवाद   .
The  श्लोक   is  translated in the KJV  as   ``   unto   shem   भी  ,  the  father of  सब   the  children  of   eber  ,  the  brother of Japheth the elder ,  भी   to  him were children born  .  `` .
However ,  the  New  अमरीकी  Standard Bible gives  ,   ``  Also to  shem  , the father of all the children of Eber ,  और  the older brother  of  Japheth ,  children  were  born   .   ''
Genesis 11:10 records that Shem was still 100 years  बूढ़ा   at  the birth  of   arphaxad  ,  (  but nearly 101 -  देखिए   कालक्रम  note , )  दो   सालो  after the flood  ,  making him barely 99  at  the  समय  the flood  began  ; and that  he  lived for  another   500   सालो  after this ,  बनाना   उसके   आयु  at  मौत   600  years .
The  children   of  Shem  यहूद  Elam , Asshur , Arphaxad , Lud  ,  and Aram  ,  in addition  to   बेटियां  .
Abraham , the  patriarch  of the  hebrews  and Arabs  ,   थी  one  of  the descendants of  arphaxad   .
Islamic literature describes  shem  as one of the  believing   बेटे  of Noah  .
कुछ  sources  भी  identify  shem  as  a  prophet in  उसके  own right and that  he  was  the  next prophet after his father  .
In  एक   मुस्लिम   लेजेंड  , Shem was  एक   of  the people that God made  यीशु  resurrect  as  a  चिह्न  to  the  Children of Israel  .
The  1st   सदी  historian Flavius Josephus , among  अनेक  others  ,  recounted the tradition that  ये  five  बेटे  were  the  progenitors of  the  nations  of  Elam ,  assyria  , Chaldea ,  लीडिया  , and Syria  ,  respectively .
सामीती   is   स्टिल   a  commonly used  पद   लिये  the  सामीती   भाषाएं  , as a subset  of  the  afro-asiatic   भाषाएं  , denoting the common linguistic heritage of  अरबी  , Aramaic ,  अक्कादी  , Ethiopic  ,   यहूदी  and Phoenician languages .
According to some Jewish  परंपराओं  ( e.g.  ,   B.   talmud   nedarim   32b  ; Genesis Rabbah 46:7 ;  उत्पत्ति   rabbah  56:10 ; Leviticus Rabbah 25:6 ;  संख्याएँ  Rabbah 4:8 . ) , Shem  is   believed   to  have been Melchizedek ,  किंग  of Salem whom Abraham  is   अंकित  to have met after the  बैटल  of the  चार  kings .
in  a few  of  the  अनेक  extra-biblical  स्त्रोत  that describe him , Shem  is  also credited with  हत्या  Nimrod , son of Cush  .
Shem  is  mentioned  in   उत्पत्ति  5:32 ,  6:10   ;   7:13  ; 9:18,23,26-27 ; 10  ;   11:10   ;   भी   in   1  Chronicles  1:4   .
Geographic identifications of Flavius Josephus  ,   c.  100 AD ;  japheth  's  बेटे  shown  in   रेड  ,  हैम  's sons in blue  ,  Shem  's   बेटे   in  green .
go  Daddy or  go  Daddy  समूह  Inc. is a privately held  कम्पनी   कि   is  primarily an  अंतरजाल  domain registrar  और   वेब   होस्टिंग  company .
Go  पापा  Group  inc.   दायर  for an IPO in 2006 , but later canceled  it  ,  due  to  ``   मार्केट  uncertainties '' .
in  addition to domain registration  और   होस्टिंग  Go Daddy also sells e-business  सम्बन्धित  software and  सेवाएं  .
on  June  24   ,   2011   ,   the   वॉल  Street Journal reported  कि   private-equity  firms KKR and  चांदी  Lake  साझेदार  , along with  a   तीसरा  investor , were nearing a  सौदे  to buy  the  company  लिये  between $ 2–2.5 billion .
On  जुलाई  1 , 2011 Go  पापा  confirmed that KKR , Silver Lake Partners and Technology Crossover  ventures   था  closed the deal .
हालांकि  the  खरीदें   दाम  was  नहीं   officially  announced it was reported to  be  $ 2.25 billion  ,   लिये   65   %   of  the company  .
,  bob  Parsons  था  ceded  the   सीईओ  role of Go Daddy to  वारेन  Adelman , who  था  been  साथ  the company for  परिचय   10   सालो  .
The Andorran  कोट  of  बाहें   at  the Andorran  पार्लियामेंट  .
अंडोरा  (  ;  ,  )   ,   officially   the  Principality  of   अंडोरा  (  )  , also called  the  Principality  of  the Valleys of Andorra ,  (  ) , is a landlocked microstate  in   southwestern  Europe ,  स्तिथ   in  the eastern Pyrenees  kyu  and bordered by  स्पेन   और  France  .
It is  the   छठे  smallest  स्वदेश  in Europe  ,   having   an  area of and  an   अनुमानित  population of 85,000 in  2012  .
Its capital ,  अंडोरा   la  Vella , is the  उच्चतम  capital city in  यूरोपीय   ,  at an elevation of  ऊपर   समुद्र   स्तर   .
The official language is Catalan ,  हालांकि   स्पेनी   ,   पुर्तगाली   ,   और   फ्रेंच   हैं   भी  commonly spoken .
Created under a charter in 988 , the  उपस्थित  Principality was formed in  1278   .
it  is known as  a  principality as it is a  साम्राज्य   headed  by two co-princes –  the  Bishop of Urgell and the President of  फ़्रांस  .
Andorra is  a   prosperous   देश   मुख्यतः  because  of   इसके  tourism industry  ,  which services an estimated  10.2  million visitors  annually   ,  and  भी   क्युकी   of  its status as  a  tax haven  .
it  is not  a  member of the  यूरोपीय   संघ   ,  but  the  euro is the de facto currency  .
The people  of  Andorra have the 4th highest human life  प्रत्याशा   in  the  संसार   —  82  सालो  at  जनम  .
The George Washington  विश्वविद्यालयों   (  GW ,  gwu   ,   or  George Washington )  is  a comprehensive  निजी   ,  coeducational research  विश्वविद्यालयों   स्तिथ  in  वॉशिंगटन  , D.C. .
it   पुरस्कार  certificates , Bachelor  डिग्री  ,  मास्टर्स  degrees , and PhDs across  अनेक  dozen disciplines  .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों  was  चार्टर्ड  by an  अधिनियम  of  कॉंग्रेस   on  February 9  ,  1821  as  The  columbian   कॉलेज  in the District  of  Columbia .
Kimberly Noel  ``   किम   ''   कार्दशियन  (  born   अक्तूबर  21  ,  1980  )  is  an  American socialite  ,   टेलीविज़न  personality and  occasional  actress  .
In  2007   ,   वो  gained notoriety as the subject of a sex tape that subsequently resulted in a court awarding her $ 5 million ; later  in  that same year , she and her family  रोज़  to  prominence  with their  e   !
वास्तविकता  television series  keeping  Up with  the  Kardashians  ,  and its subsequent  spin-offs   ,  including  कोर्टनी  and Kim  लो   नई  York  और   कोर्टनी   और   किम  Take  मियामी   .
In  2010  ,  कार्दशियन  was  the  highest-earning reality  स्टार   ,  with  अनुमानित   आय  of $  6  million  .
With  बहनों  Kourtney and  khloé   ,  Kardashian  co-owns  the fashion  बुटीक  chain  d-a-s-h  .
वो  has been  शामिल  in the production  of  several lines of clothing  और  fragrances .

That October  ,  Kardashian filed for divorce following 72 days of  विवाह  .
The  मूव   garnered  significant backlash  इससे  the media  ,  who  labeled   it  a  ``   publicity   स्टंट   ''  .

Oahu  (  ) or  oahu  ,  ज्ञात   as  `` The Gathering Place '' , is the third  largest  of the Hawaiian Islands and  the  most  populous   of   the   आइलैंड्स  in  the   u.S.   राज्य  of  हवाई   .
The  राज्य  capital , Honolulu , is on Oahu  's   southeast   coast   .
Including  छोटी  close-in offshore islands  ऐसे   as  Ford  द्वीप   और  the  आइलैंड्स   in   kaneohe  Bay and  बंद  the  पूर्वी   (   windward  )  coast   ,  it has a  कुल  land  क्षेत्रफल  of  ,  making  it  the  20th  largest island  in  the  संयुक्त  States .
in   the   महानतम  dimension , this volcanic island  is  long and  आरपार  .
the   लंबाई  of  the   shoreline  is .
The island is  the  result of two  पृथक  shield volcanoes :  waianae   और   koolau  , with  a  broad ``  घाटी   ''  or saddle  (  the central  oahu  Plain  )  between  उन्हें  .
The  उच्चतम  point is Mt  .   ka'ala  in the  waianae  Range , rising to above sea level .
The base  करेंसी   of   the  United States  is   the  U.S. dollar ,  और  is printed  on  bills in  denominations  of $ 1 , $ 2 , $ 5 , $  10  ,  $  20 , $ 50 , and $ 100 .
at   एक   समय  , however  ,   u.S.  currency  शामिल  five larger  denominations  .
टीप  in the denominations of  $   500  ,  $  1,000  ,   $  5,000 , and $ 10,000 were printed  लिये  general  उपयोग  , and  a   $   100,000  note was  मुद्रित   लिये  certain internal  ट्रांजेक्शन   .
British Honduras was  a  British colony  in  Central America  .
In 1981 , the colony gained full independence  ,   और  is now the independent nation  of  Belize  .
पहला   colonised  by  spaniards   in  the 17th  सदी  , the territory on the  ईस्ट  coast  of  Central America , south of Mexico ,  became  a British crown colony  in   1862   .
In  1964   ,  it  became  a  self-governing  colony .
Belize  became  fully  स्वतंत्र   इससे  the United  किंगडम   in  1981 .
Belize was the  पिछला  continental possession  of  the United Kingdom  in  the Americas  .
Spelt , also  ज्ञात   as  dinkel wheat , or hulled wheat  ,  is an  प्राचीन   प्रजाति  of wheat from  the   पांचवां   मिलेनियम  BC  .
spelt   थी   an   महत्वपूर्ण   स्टेपल  in parts of  यूरोपीय  from the  कांस्य   आयु  to medieval  टाइम्स  ;  it  now  survives   as   a   relict   क्रॉप   in  Central  यूरोपीय  and northern  स्पेन  and has found  a  new market as a health food .
spelt  is  sometimes  considered a  subspecies  of the closely  सम्बन्धित  species common wheat (  T.  aestivum ) , in which case its botanical  नाम  is considered  to   be  Triticum aestivum  subsp   .   spelta  .
it   is  a  hexaploid   गेहूं  , which  अर्थात्  it has  छह  sets of chromosomes .
Sherlock Holmes (  or  ) is  a   fictional   जासूस   निर्मित  by author  और   चिकित्सक  Sir  आर्थर   कोनन   डोयल  .
A London-based ``  परामर्श  detective  ''   जिनकी  abilities border on the  fantastic  , Holmes is famous for his astute logical  तर्क  , his  क्षमता  to  अपनाना   लगभग  any  भेस   ,  and his use of forensic science skills to solve difficult cases .
Holmes , who first  appeared  in  प्रकाशन  in 1887 ,  थी   प्रदर्शित  in four novels and  56  short stories .
The first  अनोखा  , A Study in Scarlet  ,   appeared  in Beeton 's Christmas Annual  in   1887  and  the  second ,  the   चिह्न  of the Four  ,   in   lippincott  's Monthly  पत्रिका   in  1890 .
