the  character grew tremendously in  लोकप्रियता   साथ  the first  श्रेणी   of  short stories in The  strand   पत्रिका  , beginning  साथ   a   कांड  in Bohemia in 1891 ; further  श्रेणी   of   छोटी  stories and two novels  प्रकाशित  in serial  रूप   appeared  between  तब   और   1927  .
The  कहानियां   कवर  a period  इससे  around  1880  up  to   1914  .
सब  but four  कहानियां   हैं  narrated by Holmes 's  dost  and biographer ,  dr.  John  H.  Watson ;  दो   हैं  narrated by Holmes  खुद  (  ``   the   blanched   सिपाही  `` and `` The Lion 's  माने   ``  )  और  two others are written in  the  third  व्यक्ति   (   ``   the   mazarin   स्टोन  ``  और  ``  उसके  Last Bow `` )  .
In two stories ( `` The  musgrave   अनुष्ठान   ``  and  ``   the   ग्लोरिया  Scott ``  )  ,  holmes  tells Watson  the  main story from his  यादें  , while  वाटसन  becomes the narrator of the frame  स्टोरी  .
The first and fourth novels  ,  A Study in  स्कारलेट   और   the  Valley of  भय   ,   प्रत्येक  include a long  अंतराल   of   सर्वज्ञ   narration  recounting events unknown to either Holmes  or  Watson  .
the   संयुक्त   राज्य   हाउस  of Representatives  is  one of the  दो  houses of  the  United  राज्य   कॉंग्रेस  ( a bicameral  विधानमंडल   )   .
it   is  frequently  referred  to as the  हाउस  .
the  other house is the  सीनेट  .
the   संयोजन  and  शक्तियां   of  the House are  स्थापित  in Article  एक  of  the   संयुक्त  States  संविधान  .
The  प्रमुख  power  of  the  हाउस   is  to  pass  federal legislation  कि  affects the entire country  हालांकि  its  बिल्स   जरूर   भी  be passed  by  the Senate  और   further  agreed  to  by  the  U.S.  अध्यक्ष  before becoming  विधि   (   जबतक   दोनो  the House and Senate re-pass the legislation  साथ   a  two-thirds majority in  प्रत्येक  chamber  )  .
the   हाउस  has  अनेक  exclusive powers :  the  power to  initiate  revenue bills , to  impeach   officials   ,  and  to   elect  the  u.S.   अध्यक्ष   in  case there  is   no   बहुमत   in  the Electoral  कॉलेज  .
Each U.S.  राज्य  is  represented  in  the   हाउस   in  proportion to its population but  is  entitled  to   at   तनिक   एक  representative  .
The most populous  राज्य  , California  ,  currently  रै  53  प्रतिनिधि  .
the  total  क्रमांक  of  मतदान   प्रतिनिधि   is  fixed  by  law at 435 .
प्रत्येक  representative serves  लिये  a two-year term .
the   स्पीकर  of the United States  हाउस   of  Representatives , who  presides  over the chamber , is  निर्वाचित  by  the   सदस्यों  of  the   हाउस  ,  और  is therefore  traditionally   the  leader  of  the  हाउस   लोकतांत्रिक   caucus  or the House Republican  सम्मेलन  , whichever  पार्टी  has more voting  सदस्यों  .
the  House meets in  the  south wing of the United States Capitol .
Jell-O  is   a   ब्रांड   नाम  belonging  to  U.S.-based  kraft  Foods  लिये  a number of  जिलेटिन   desserts   ,  including fruit  gels   ,  puddings and no-bake  मलाई  pies .
The brand  's  popularity  रै   led  to it being used as a  जेनेरिक  term for  जिलेटिन   मिठाई  across  the   u.S.  and  कनाडा  .
kennywood  is an amusement park  स्तिथ   in  West  mifflin   ,  Pennsylvania  ,  a suburb of Pittsburgh .
The park  पहला   खोली  in 1898 as a  ``  trolley park '' attraction  at  the  समाप्त  of the Mellon  परिवार   's  Monongahela  गली  Railway .
The park was  खरीदा  in  1906   by  F. W. Henninger and  एंड्रयू   mcswigan   और   यूँ  began the  kennywood   entertainment   कम्पनी  that has remained  a   closely  held family  कारोबार   लिये   over   100   सालो   .
This traditional  मनोरंजन   पार्क  still has  structures  and rides dating back to  इसके   खोलने   और  the early  1900s  .
साथ  with  rye   playland  Park ,  it   is   एक  of  तभी  two  मनोरंजन  parks listed  in  the  नेशनल  Register of  ऐतिहासिक  Places .
kennywood   is  owned by Kennywood  entertainment   कम्पनी  , which until December 2007 was  a  closely held family business owned  by  the Henninger and McSwigan families .
Kennywood Entertainment is  अभी  operated by  california-based  Palace  entertainment  ,  a   subsidiary   of  Parques Reunidos , an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  amusement park company based in Madrid , Spain  .
parque  Reunidos is in turn  a  subsidiary of  candover   निवेश  , an investment fund  आधारित   in   the   uk  .
A Social Security card issued by the Railroad Retirement Board in  1943  to  a   अभी   मृतक   व्यक्ति  .
in   the  United  राज्य   ,   a   सोशल   सुरक्षा  number  (  SSN ) is a nine-digit  क्रमांक  issued to U.S. citizens  ,  permanent  निवासियों  ,  और   अस्थाई  ( working )  निवासियों   अंतर्गत   खण्ड  205 ( c  )  ( 2  )   of  the  सोशल   सुरक्षा   अधिनियम  , codified as .
the  number is issued to  an  individual by the Social Security  प्रशासन  , an independent agency  of   the  United  राज्य   सरकारी  .
Its  प्राथमिक  purpose is  to  track  individuals  for Social Security  उद्देश्य   .
A  सोशल  Security number may  be  obtained by applying  on  Form SS-5 , ``  अनुप्रयोग  for A  सोशल   सुरक्षा  Number  कार्ड   ''  .
minimalism   describes   आंदोलनों  in various  फ़ॉर्म   of  art and design ,  विशेषकर  visual  आर्ट   और  music  ,  where the work is set  आउट   to  expose  the  essence  or   पहचान   of  a  विषय  through eliminating  सब   non-essential   फ़ॉर्म  ,  सुविधाएँ  or  अवधारणाओं   .
Minimalism is  कोई   डिज़ाइन   or  style  in  which the simplest and  fewest   तत्व   हैं  used to create  the  maximum effect  .
as  a  विशिष्ट   गति   in   the   कला  it  is  identified with developments  in  post–World War II  पश्चिमी  Art  ,  most  strongly  with  अमरीकी  visual arts  in   the   1960s  and early 1970s .
prominent   कलाकारों  associated  साथ   इस   गति  include  डोनाल्ड   judd   ,  John McCracken  ,  Agnes  मार्टिन  , Dan  flavin   ,  Robert Morris  ,   ऐनी  Truitt , and  फ़्रैंक  Stella  .
It is  rooted  in  the  reductive aspects of Modernism , and  is   प्रायः  interpreted  as  a reaction against  अमूर्त  expressionism and  a  bridge to Postminimal  आर्ट  practices  .
The  शर्तें  have  विस्तारित  to encompass  a  movement  in  music which  सुविधाएँ   repetition  and iteration , as  in   the   रचनाएं   of  La Monte Young , Terry  रिले   ,   स्टीव   reich  , Philip Glass , and  जॉन  Adams .
Minimalist  रचनाएं   हैं   sometimes   ज्ञात  as systems  म्यूज़िक  .
the  term  ``   अल्पतम   ''  is often applied colloquially  to   designate  anything that is  अतिरिक्त  or  stripped  to its essentials  .
it  has also been used to  describe  the  plays  and novels  of  Samuel  beckett   ,  the films of  रॉबर्ट  Bresson , the stories of Raymond  carver  , and even  the  automobile  डिजाइन  of  कोलिन   chapman   .
the   शब्द  was  पहला  used  in   अंग्रेज़ी  in the early 20th century to describe  the  Mensheviks  .
In  रसायन   और  physics  ,  Dalton 's  विधि   (   भी  called  डाल्टन  's law of partial pressures  )  states  कि  the total pressure exerted by the mixture  of  non-reactive gases  is   बराबर  to the sum  of   the   आंशिक   pressures  of  व्यक्तिगत  gases  .
इस  empirical law was observed by John  डाल्टन   in   1801  and is  सम्बन्धित   to  the  आदर्श  gas laws  .
Mathematically  ,   the   दबाव  of  a  mixture of gases  can   be  defined as the summation
or
जहाँ  represent  the  partial  दबाव  of each component  .
it  is  assumed   कि  the  गैसों   do  not react with each other
where  is   the  mole fraction  of  the i-th component in the  कुल  mixture  of  n components .
The relationship  नीचे   provides  a way to  determine  the volume  आधारित   विशेषज्ञता  of any individual  गैसीय  component
where is the concentration  of  the  i-th   घटक  expressed in ppm  .
Dalton 's law is not exactly followed by real gases .
those  deviations are  considerably  large  at   ऊँची   pressures   .
in   ऐसे   शर्तें   ,  the  आवाज़  occupied  by   the   अणुओं   can  become significant compared  to  the  फ़्री   स्पेस   between  them .
In  particular  ,  the  short  औसत  distances between molecules  उठाता   the  intensity of intermolecular  शक्तियां   between  gas molecules  पर्याप्त   to  substantially  बदलें  the pressure exerted by  उन्हें   .
Neither of  those  effects  हैं   माना  by the ideal gas  मॉडल  .
This is  a  list of  the   largest  United  राज्य  colleges and universities  by  enrollment for  कॉलेजों  and universities in the United  राज्य   .
What this list  शामिलs:
Colleges and universities  भीतर   the   संयुक्त  States
University systems if  the   प्रणाली   is  run  अंतर्गत   a  single  प्रशासन
Enrollment  is  the  योग  of  the   headcount  of undergraduate  और   ग्रैजुएट  students
Enrollment is counted by the  एकीकृत  Post-secondary Education  प्रणाली  within the U.S.  विभाग   of   शिक्षा   .
नामांकन  is the 12-month unduplicated headcount ,  indicating  the  क्रमांक   of  unique  विद्यार्थी  who attended the university  दौरान  the year  .
कया   इस  list  करता   नहीं  include:
कोई  indication  of  how many  of  the  नामांकित  students are  पूरा  or  भाग   समय  ( e.g.  ,  some universities may  have   a   ऊँची  enrollment ,  लकिन  have  सबसे   विद्यार्थी   नामांकित  in only a single  क्लास   )
लिये   अन्य  lists  कि  measure university enrollment ,  देखिए   the   देखिए  Also section below .
``  सही  Round '' is a  सोंग   performed   by   अमरीकी  rapper Flo Rida , released  as  the  सीसे  single from  उसके   दूसरी  studio  एल्बम  ,  r.o.o.t.s  . ( 2009 ) .
The song  सुविधाएँ  guest  vocals  from Kesha .
It was released to radio  on  27  जनवरी   2009  and  थी   डिजिटली  released on 10  फ़रवरी  by  पो   लड़के   entertainment   और  Atlantic Records .
The song  lyrically   बोलती  of  flo  Rida 's  जाल   बॉल   रेफरी  enthusiasm , while  adapting   the  chorus  of   the  1984 Dead  or  Alive  सोंग  ``  तुम   स्पिन  Me  गोलाकार  (  जैसे  a Record ) `` in  इसके   आँकड़ा   .
According to one  of   the  song 's  लेखक  , the  कोरस   refers  to  मौखिक  sex .
Kesha contributed guest vocals to the song  ,   लकिन   in  the United States , during  the   चलाएं  atop the chart  ,  Kesha was  uncredited   .
the  song received mostly  ऋणात्मक   समीक्षाएँ   इससे  critics  ,  who  claimed   it  was kitsch  और  misogynistic .
However , it  थी   a   वाणिज्यिक   कामयाबी  ,  reaching  the  शीर्ष  ten of  the  charts in  उन्नीस  countries worldwide .
In  the  United  राज्य  ,  it   became   flo   rida  's  दूसरी  number-one  सिंगल   और   broke   the  record  लिये  first-week sales when it was released to  डिजिटल  retailers  .
The single  's   accompanying  music video  थी  directed  by  Malcolm  जोन्स  and nominated for an  एमटीवी  Video  म्यूज़िक  Award  .
The  सोंग   रै   महरूम  used  in  several movies , such as  the  Hangover , The Ugly  सच्चाई   और  the  तेलुगु  movie  pilla  Zamindar  .
in  the movie Pitch Perfect , the song  is  performed by  the  a cappella group the Treblemakers .
The  मुख्य   इंसाफ  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  is  the  head of  the  United  राज्य  federal court system  (  the  न्यायिक  branch of the  संघीय  government  of   the  United  राज्य   )   और   the  chief judge of the  परम्   अदालत  of the United  राज्य   .
The Chief Justice is one of nine Supreme Court justices ;  the   अन्य  eight are  the  Associate Justices of the  परम्  Court  of   the   संयुक्त   राज्य   .
इससे  1789 until  1866  ,  the   दफ्तर  was  ज्ञात   as  the Chief  इंसाफ  of the Supreme Court .
The  मुख्य  Justice is  the  highest judicial officer in the country , and acts  as   a   मुख्य  administrative officer for the  संघीय   न्यायालयों   और  as  सिर   of   the   न्यायिक  Conference  of   the  United  राज्य  appoints  the   निदेशक   of  the Administrative  दफ्तर   of  the  संयुक्त  States  न्यायालयों  .
The Chief Justice also serves as  a   प्रवक्ता  for  the  judicial  शाखा   .
the  Chief Justice leads the business  of  the Supreme  अदालत   .
he  presides  over  oral arguments before the court  .
When the  अदालत   renders   an   राय  , the Chief Justice—when  in   the  majority—decides who writes the  अदालत   's   राय  .
The  मुख्य   इंसाफ   भी   रै   significant  agenda-setting power  over  the  अदालत   's  meetings .
In the case  of  an impeachment  of  a  अध्यक्ष  of  the  United States  ,  which  रै   occurred  twice ,  the  Chief  इंसाफ  presides over  the   विचारण  in the  सीनेट   .
In modern  परंपरा  ,  the  Chief Justice has the ceremonial duty of administering the oath  of  office of  the   अध्यक्ष   of  the United States .
The first Chief  इंसाफ  was John Jay  .
the   17th  and  वर्तमान  Chief  इंसाफ  is John  G.  Roberts  ,   jr   .
Caribou  निकट  Prudhoe  खाड़ी  ,  1973
Prudhoe Bay  आयल   फ़ील्ड   is  a  विशाल   आयल  field  on  Alaska  's  North  ढलान  .
it  is  the  largest oil field  in  both the  संयुक्त  States and in North America , covering and originally containing  लगभग  of oil .
The amount of  recoverable  oil in  the  field  is  more than double that  of  the  अगला   largest   फ़ील्ड  in  the  United  राज्य   ,   the   ईस्ट  Texas  आयल   फ़ील्ड  .
The  फ़ील्ड   is  operated by BP ; partners  हैं  ExxonMobil and ConocoPhillips Alaska  .
मजदूर  unions are legally  पहचाना  as  प्रतिनिधि   of   मजदूर  in many  उद्योग   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
Their  कार्यकलाप   आज  centers on collective bargaining  over   मजदूरी  , benefits , and working conditions for their membership  ,  and on representing  उनके  members  in  disputes with management over  उल्लंघनों  of contract provisions  .
larger   संघ  also typically engage in  lobbying   क्रियाएँ   और  electioneering at  the  state and  संघीय  level .
Most unions in America are aligned with one  of  two  larger  umbrella  संगठन  :  the   afl-cio  created in 1955  ,   और  the Change  to  Win Federation which split from the  afl-cio  in 2005  .
दोनो   एडवोकेट  policies  और  legislation on  निमित्त  of workers in the  संयुक्त   राज्य   और   कनाडा   ,   और  take an active role  in  politics  .
the   afl-cio  is  विशेषकर  concerned with global  व्यापार  issues .
In  2010  , the  प्रतिशत  of workers belonging to a union in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  (  or  total labor union ``  घनत्व  ''  )  was 11.4 % ,  compared   to   18.4  % in Germany  ,  27.5 %  in   कनाडा  , and 70 %  in  Finland .
संघ  membership  in  the  निजी  sector  रै  fallen  अंतर्गत  7 % — levels not seen  चूंकि  1932 .
संघ   allege  that  employer-incited   विपक्ष   रै  contributed to this decline  in  membership .
the   सबसे  prominent unions are among public sector employees  ऐसे  as teachers and  पुलिस  .
Members of  संघ   हैं   disproportionately   पुरानी  ,  पुरूष  and  निवासियों   of  the Northeast  ,   the   मिडवेस्ट   ,  and  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Union  मजदूर  average  10-30   %  higher pay than non-union  in  America  बाद  controlling for individual  ,   जॉब   ,  and labor market  विशेषताएँ   .
हालांकि   much  smaller  compared   to  their peak membership  in   the  1950s  ,  American  संघ   remain   a  prominent political  फ़ैक्टर   ,   दोनो  through mobilization  of   उनके   अपना   सदस्यताएँ   और  through  coalitions  with like-minded activist  संगठन  around issues  ऐसे  as  अप्रवासी  rights ,  व्यापार  policy  ,   स्वास्थ्य  care  ,  and living wage  अभियान  .
To fight alleged employer  anti-union  programs  ,   संघ  are  फिलहाल   वकालत   नई  `` card check `` federal  विधान   कि   होता   आवश्यकता  employers to  सौदेबाजी   साथ  a union  if  more  than  50  %  of workers  हस्ताक्षरित   फ़ॉर्म   ,   or  `` cards ,  ''  stating  वे   काश  to be represented by that  संघ  .
the   वर्तमान   कार्यविधि   involves  waiting 45 to  90  days  लिये  a federally  पर्यवेक्षित  secret-ballot employee referendum on  the  subject .
the  economist Joseph Stiglitz has asserted  कि  ,  ``   दमदार   संघ  have  helped  to  reduce  inequality ,  whereas  weaker unions have made it easier  लिये   ceos   ,  sometimes working with market  शक्तियां  that they have helped  आकार   ,  to increase  it  .  ''
The decline  in  unionization since WWII  in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  has  महरूम  associated with a pronounced  वृद्धि  in income  और  wealth inequality .
A Christian Lacroix  फ़ैशन  boutique
A  बुटीक   is  a  छोटी  shopping  आउटलेट  , especially one  कि   specializes   in   elite   और   फैशनेबल   वस्तुएं   ऐसे   as   कपडे   और  jewelry .
the   शब्द  is French  लिये  `` shop ''  ,   via  Latin from Greek ἀποθήκη  (  apothēkē ) , `` storehouse ''  .
The  पद  entered into everyday  अंग्रेज़ी   उपयोग  in the  लेट  1960s when , for a brief period ,  लंदन   थी  the  केन्द्र  of  the   फ़ैशन  trade .
Carnaby Street and the  किंग्स  Road were  the  focus of  much  media  ध्यान  as home to  the   सबसे   फैशनेबल  boutiques of the era .
अभी  the  ईस्ट   of  London has been regenerated and more Boutiques pop up in fashionable areas  ,   ऐसे   as  Tower Bridge Road .
It  can   भी   refer   to  a specialised firm such  as  a  बुटीक  investment bank or boutique law firm  .
the   शब्द  is often  प्रयुक्त  to  describe  a property  in   the   स्वतंत्र   खण्ड  of the hotel  मार्केट  ( such as The Rockwell in London ) in order to distinguish  themselves  from  larger  chains ( such  as  Hilton  होटल   )  .
In such cases  the   establishments   उद्देश्य  to  convey   the  idea  कि  the operation is elite and  अत्यधिक   specialised  .
in  the strictest sense of the  शब्द  ,  boutiques  would be one-of-a-kind but  अधिक  generally  बोलना  ,  कुछ   जंजीरों   can   be  referred  to   as   boutiques  if they  specialize   in  particular styles .
recently  ,  the  term `` boutique  ''   रै  started  होने  applied to  normally-mass-market  items  कि  are  either  niche or  उत्पादित   in  intentionally small numbers  at   बहुत  high prices .
This  may  be referred  to  as boutique  निर्माण  .
For  उदाहरण   ,  before the release of  the  Wii  ,  a Time  पत्रिका  article  सुझाया  that Nintendo could  become   a  `` boutique  video-game  company '' , producing games for niche  ऑडियंस   ,  rather  than   trying  to  compete  directly  साथ  Microsoft  और   सोनी   .
In the traditional luxury- watch industry Scalfaro International  is   माना   as   the   precursor  in manufacturing  और  sale  of  bespoke watches .
the  Swiss  कम्पनी  uses  a   अत्यधिक  flexible  बुटीक  manufacturing site ,  जिससे   allows   producing   छोटी   श्रेणी  or even unique  timepieces  .
Although  कुछ   boutiques   specialise  in hand-made  वस्तुएं   और  other truly  one-of-a-kind  items ,  अन्य   बस   उपज  t-shirts  ,   स्टिकर  , and  अन्य  fashion accessories in  artificially   छोटी   रनों  and sell them at  unusually  high  कीमतें  .
in   the   जल्दी  1990s Selena started manufacturing  उसके  own line of women  's   कपडे  .
Opening two boutiques labeled as  ``  Selena Etc  .  Boutique &  सैलून  ''  एक   स्तिथ  in Corpus Christi  और   एक   स्तिथ   in  San Antonio ,  टेक्सास  .
One  थी  due to open  in  Monterrey , Mexico  ,  in  1995  but  due   to   उसके  death it was  नहीं   खोली   .
around  1999  the  San Antonio location closed  और  the Corpus Christi location  थी  closed  in  2009 .
In late  1990s  some European retail  व्यापारियों   विकसित  the idea of  tailoring   a  shop towards  a  lifestyle theme ,  in  the form  of   ``  concept stores '' ,  जिससे  specialised in  cross-selling  without using separate departments  .
एक   of   the  first  अवधारणा   स्टोर्स   थी   10   कोरसो  Como  in  Milan  ,   इटली  followed  by   colette  in Paris and Quartier 206 in  बर्लिन  .
अनेक  well-known American chains such  as  Urban Outfitters  ,   d-a-s-h  ,  और  The Gap , Australian chain  billabong   और   ,   हालांकि   कम  common , Lord & Taylor adapted to  the  concept  स्टोर   ट्रेंड   बाद  2000 .
Navy Federal Credit  संघ  (  or  Navy Federal  )   is   a  credit union headquartered in Vienna , Virginia  ,  chartered  और  regulated  अंतर्गत   the  authority  of  the National Credit  संघ   प्रशासन  (  ncua  ) of  the  U.S.  संघीय  government .
Navy Federal  is  the largest  प्राकृतिक  member (  or   खुदरा  ) credit  संघ  in the world , both in asset  आकार  and in membership  .
As of September  2012  , Navy  संघीय  had over  $   50  billion USD in assets  ,   और   over  4 million  सदस्यों  .
Stevland  hardaway   मॉरिस  ( born  may  13  ,   1950   as   stevland  Hardaway Judkins ) , known by  उसके  stage name  स्टीवी   अचरज  , is an American singer  ,   songwriter  ,  और  multi-instrumentalist  ,  a child prodigy who developed  into  one  of  the  सबसे  creative  musical   आंकड़े  of  the  late 20th century .
Blind since  shortly   बाद   जनम  ,  अचरज   हस्ताक्षरित   साथ  Motown 's Tamla label  at  the age  of  eleven  ,  and continues  to  perform and record  लिये  Motown  to  this day .
among  Wonder  's   बेहतरीन  known works are singles  ऐसे  as  ``   अंधविश्वास   ``   ,  `` Sir  ड्यूक   ``  , ``  तुम  Are the  सनशाइन  of My Life ``  और   ``  I Just Called  to  Say I Love  तुम  `` .
खूब  known albums also  शामिल  Talking Book ,  innervisions  and Songs in the Key  of   जीवन   .
He  रै  recorded  अधिक  than thirty U.S. top ten hits and received twenty-two Grammy Awards  ,  the most ever  awarded   to  a  पुरूष   सोलो   कलाकार  .
Wonder  is  also noted for  उसके   कार्य  as an  activist  for political causes  ,  including his 1980 campaign to make Martin Luther King  ,  Jr. 's birthday a  अवकाश  in the United States  .
In 2009 , Wonder  थी  named a  संयुक्त   राष्ट्र   मेसेंजर   of   सलाम   .
In 2008 , Billboard magazine released a list  of  the  hot  100 All-Time  शीर्ष  Artists  to  celebrate the  us  singles chart  's  fiftieth  वर्षगांठ  ,  साथ  Wonder  at   क्रमांक  five  .
by  popular  vote  ,  स्टीवी  was inducted  into   the   soulmusic   हॉल  of Fame at  soulmusic.com  in  दिसम्बर  2012  .
Psychosis  (  from  the   यूनानी   ψυχή   ``  psyche '' ,  लिये  mind/soul , and -ωσις ``  -ओएसआईs  ''  ,  for  असामान्य  condition or  derangement  )  refers   to   an   असामान्य  condition  of  the mind , and is a  जेनेरिक  psychiatric  पद   लिये  a mental state  प्रायः  described as involving a `` loss of contact with  वास्तविकता   ``  .
People  कष्ट  from psychosis are described  as  psychotic  .
Psychosis  is   दिए  to the more severe  फ़ॉर्म  of  मनोरोग  disorder ,  दौरान  which  मति   और  delusions , gross excitement or  बेहोशी  and impaired insight may occur .
The term `` psychosis  ''  is very broad  और   can   औसत   anything  from relatively  सामान्य  aberrant  अनुभवों  through  to  the complex and  catatonic  expressions of  schizophrenia   और  bipolar type  1  disorder .
Moreover a wide  किस्में  of  सेंट्रल   बेचैन  system diseases ,  इससे   दोनो  external  substances  and internal physiologic illness , can produce symptoms  of  psychosis .
This led  अनेक  professionals to  कह   कि  psychosis is not  विशिष्ट   पर्याप्त  as a  निदान  term .
Despite  इस  , ``  मनस्ताप  ''  is   generally  given to noticeable deficits in  सामान्य  behavior  (  negative  लक्षण  )  और   अधिक   commonly   to  diverse types of hallucinations or delusional  मान्यताओं  (  e.g  .  grandiosity  ,  delusions   of  persecution ) .
Someone exhibiting very  स्पष्ट  signs may be described as  ``   frankly   psychotic  '' ,  whereas   एक   exhibiting  very subtle signs  could  be classified  in   the  category of an ``  attenuated  psychotic risk  सिंड्रोम  '' .
An excess in dopaminergic  signalling  is traditionally linked  to   the  positive symptoms of psychosis  ,  especially  those   of   schizophrenia  .
इस   is   विचार  to occur  through  a mechanism of aberrant salience of environmental stimuli  .
Many antipsychotic drugs accordingly  निशाना  the dopamine  प्रणाली  ;  meta-analyses  of placebo-controlled trials  of  these  दवाएँ  , however  ,  show  either   no   significant   अंतर  between drug and  placebo  , or a very  छोटी   प्रभाव  size  ,  suggesting that the pathophysiology of psychosis is  much  more  जटिल   than   an   overactive  dopamine  प्रणाली  .
People  experiencing   मनस्ताप   may  exhibit  कुछ  personality changes and thought disorder  .
Depending on  इसके  severity , this  may  be accompanied by  असामान्य  or  विचित्र   बर्ताव   ,  as  खूब  as  परेशानी  with  सोशल  interaction and impairment in  carrying  out daily life activities .
General  grievous   is  a  fictional  character  in  the Star  युद्धों   ब्रह्मांड  .
A recurring antagonist , he is the Supreme Commander  of  the Confederacy of Independent Systems ,  a  political faction  of  planetary systems waging war  on   the   गांगेय   गणतंत्र  .
प्रशिक्षित  in all seven forms of lightsaber combat  by  Count  dooku  ,  he   is  a  निष्ठुर  and  शक्तिशाली  warrior devoted  to  Jedi  's   विनाश  during the Clone  युद्धों  .
His acts of  wanton  aggression and high Jedi  देह  count  होता   संकेत  the  आकाशगंगा  to give him  the  nickname the Knightslayer  .
Though  the  notorious  जेडी  slayer  थी   the  being in the galaxy during the  क्लोन   युद्धों  who  था  killed the most Jedi  in  single  कॉम्बैट  ,  he  did not hesitate to flee from battles he knew he would  खोना  .
आंकडे   खेल   an  important  भूमिका   in   summarizing  baseball performance and evaluating players in the sport .
Since the flow of  a   बेसबॉल  game has natural  ब्रेक  to  it   ,  and  सामान्यतः  players act individually rather than performing in clusters , the sport lends itself to  आसान  record-keeping and  आंकडे   .
आंकडे   have  been kept  लिये   पेशेवर  baseball  चूंकि   the  creation of  the  National  लीग   और  American  लीग  ,  अभी  part of Major League Baseball  .
Many statistics are also  उपलब्धियाँ   इससे   बाहर   of  Major League Baseball ,  इससे  leagues  ऐसे  as the National  संघ   of   पेशेवर   आधार  Ball Players  और  the Negro Leagues .
Dorothea Lange 's Migrant Mother depicts  अक्षम  pea pickers in California ,  centering  on  फ्लोरेंस   ओवेन्स   थॉम्पसन  ,  आयु  32 ,  a  mother of  सात   children  , in Nipomo ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , March 1936 .
USA  सालाना  real GDP from 1910–60 , with the years of the  ग्रेट   अवसाद   (  1929–1939  )  highlighted  .
the  unemployment  रेट  in the  us   1910–1960  ,  साथ   the   सालो  of  the   ग्रेट  Depression  (   1929–1939  ) highlighted .
The Great Depression was  a   कठोर  worldwide economic  अवसाद  in the  दशक  preceding World  युद्ध  II .
the   समय  of  the  Great  अवसाद   varied   आरपार   राष्ट्र  , but  in  most countries  it  started in 1930  और  lasted until  the   लेट   1930s  or middle 1940s  .
it  was the  longest  , most widespread , and deepest depression  of  the 20th  सदी  .
In the  21st   सदी   ,   the   ग्रेट   अवसाद   is   commonly   प्रयुक्त   as  an example of how far the  संसार   's   अर्थव्यवस्था   can  decline  .
the  depression  originated  in the U.S. ,  बाद  the  पतन  in stock prices that began  around  September  4   ,   1929   ,   और  became  विश्वव्यापी  news with  the  stock market crash of October 29  ,  1929 ( known  as   ब्लैक   मंगलवार  ) .
The Great  अवसाद   था  devastating effects  in   देशों   समृद्ध   और   ग़रीब  .
Personal  आय   ,  tax revenue ,  profits   और  prices  dropped  , while international trade plunged by more than 50 %  .
बेरोजगारी   in  the U.S.  रोज़  to 25 % ,  और  in  कुछ  countries  रोज़   as  high as  33  % .
शहरों   सब  around the world were hit  मुश्किल   ,  especially those  निर्भर  on heavy industry .
Construction was  वस्तुतः  halted in many countries  .
Farming and rural areas suffered as crop prices fell by  लगभग  60  %   .
Facing plummeting  माँग   साथ   few  alternate sources  of  jobs  ,  areas dependent  on  primary  सेक्टर   उद्योग  such as cash  cropping   ,  mining and  लॉगिंग  suffered  the  most  .
कुछ   economies  started to  रिकवर   by  the mid-1930s .
in   अनेक   देशों   ,  the negative effects of the Great  अवसाद   lasted   जबतक  the  समाप्त   of  World War II .
A premature  ventricular  contraction ( PVC ) ,  भी   ज्ञात  as  a  premature  ventricular  complex  ,  ventricular premature contraction ( or complex  or   देवालय   )  ( VPC  )  , ventricular premature beat ( VPB  )   ,  or ventricular  extrasystole  (  ves  ) ,  is  a relatively common  इवेंट   जहाँ  the  धड़कन  is initiated  by  Purkinje fibres  in  the ventricles rather than by the sinoatrial node ,  the  normal heartbeat initiator  .
The  विद्युत   कार्यक्रम  of the heart  detected   by  the  electrocardiogram   allow  a PVC to be easily  विशिष्ट   इससे  a normal  दिल  beat .
a  PVC may be  आभास   as  a  ``  skipped beat `` or  लगा   as  palpitations in  the   छाती  .
In a  सामान्य  heartbeat  ,   the   ventricles  contract after the  atria   have  helped  to  fill them by  contracting   ;  in this  रास्ता  the  ventricles   can  pump a  maximized   राशि   of  blood both  to  the  फेफड़े  and to the rest of the body  .
in  a PVC  ,   the   ventricles  contract first and  पहले  the atria  have   optimally  filled the ventricles with blood , which means  कि  circulation is  अकुशल  .
However  ,  single  ताल  PVC arrhythmias do not usually pose a danger and  can   be   asymptomatic  in healthy  individuals  .
विलियम  Gary Busey  (  born  जून   29  ,  1944  )  ,  better known as  गेरी   busey  , is  an  American film  और  stage  कर्ता  ,  और   कलाकार  .
He has  appeared   in  a variety of films ,  सहित   lethal  Weapon ,  पाइंट  Break  ,  and  अंतर्गत  Siege , as well  as   अतिथि  appearances on Gunsmoke , Walker , Texas Ranger  ,   विधि   &   अनुक्रम   ,  and Entourage  .
He was  मनोनीत  for an Academy Award for  बेहतरीन   कर्ता   in  1978 for his role  in   the  Buddy  होली   स्टोरी  .
The Anti-Counterfeiting  व्यापार   अनुबंध  (  acta  ) , is a  बहुराष्ट्रीय   सन्धि  for the  purpose   of   establishing  international standards for  बौद्धिक   प्रॉपर्टी  rights enforcement .
The  अनुबंध  aims  to  establish an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  legal  फ्रेमवर्क  for targeting counterfeit goods ,  जेनेरिक   दवाइयाँ   और  copyright  infringement  on the Internet , and would create a  नई  governing  देह   बाहर   मौजूदा  forums  ,   ऐसे  as  the   संसार  Trade Organization ,  the   संसार  Intellectual Property Organization ,  or  the United  राष्ट्र   .
The agreement was  हस्ताक्षरित   in   अक्तूबर  2011 by  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   ,  Canada ,  जापानी   ,  Morocco  ,   नई  Zealand ,  सिंगापुर   ,   दक्षिण  Korea  ,  and  the  United  राज्य  .
in   2012  ,  मैक्सिको  , the European Union and 22  देशों  which are member states  of  the European  संघ   हस्ताक्षरित   as  well .
एक  signatory ( Japan ) has ratified  (  formally approved ) the agreement  ,   जिससे  would come  into   फ़ोर्स  in countries that ratified  it  after ratification  by  six  देशों  .
Supporters  have  described  the   अनुबंध   as   a   जवाब   to  `` the  बढ़ाएँ   in   वैश्विक  trade of  नकली  goods and pirated  कापीराइट  protected works  ''  .
Trades Unions representing  मजदूर  in the music ,  फिल्मी   और  TV industries and large  बौद्धिक  property-based  संगठन   ऐसे   as  the  गति  Picture  संघ  of America and Pharmaceutical  शोध  and  निर्माताओं   of  America were  क्रियाशील  in the treaty 's  विकास   .
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों  say the convention adversely affects  आधारभूत   अधिकारों  including  स्वतंत्रता   of  expression and privacy .
acta   रै   भी   महरूम  criticised  by  Doctors Without  सीमायें   लिये  endangering  अभिगम  to medicines in  विकासशील  countries .
the  secret nature of negotiations has excluded  सिविल   समाज  groups , developing  देशों   और   the  general  पब्लिक   इससे  the  अनुबंध  's negotiation process  और   it   रै   महरूम   वर्णित   as  policy  laundering  by critics including the Electronic  frontier  Foundation  और  the Entertainment  उपभोक्ता   संघ  .
The signature of  the  EU  और   अनेक  of its  सदस्य  states  resulted  in the resignation in  विरोध  of the  यूरोपीय   पार्लियामेंट   's   नियुक्त   मुख्य  investigator , rapporteur  कादर   आरिफ  , as well  as   फैली  protests across  यूरोपीय   .
In 2012  the   newly-appointed  rapporteur , British MEP  दाउद   मार्टिन   ,  recommended  विरूद्ध  the  सन्धि   ,  stating  :   ``  The intended benefits of this  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  agreement  हैं   दूर  outweighed  by  the potential  खतरे  to  सिविल  liberties '' .
On 4  जुलाई   2012  , the European  पार्लियामेंट   अस्वीकृत  the  अनुबंध  in  plenary  session  ,  with 478  मतदान  against  the  treaty  ,  39 in favour and 165 MEPs  abstaining  .
FAW semi-trailer  ट्रक  in China
Tractor  साथ  side dump trailer  semi-trailer
A tractor  साथ  an auto-transport semi-trailer  .
semi-trailer  truck  साथ  sleeper  पीछे  the cab .
a   semi-trailer  truck  is   an   articulated  vehicle that consists  of  a towing engine  ,  known  as   a  tractor in the United  राज्य  and truck in  अनेक  other places , attached  to   एक  or more semi-trailers  to  carry  भाड़ा  .
it   is  also known as  a   हस्तांतरण   in   कनाडा  ,  प्रधान   प्रस्तावक   in   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  ,  सेमी  , tractor-trailer  ,  truck and trailer , transfer truck , 18-wheeler , mack truck  ,  big rig in the  संयुक्त  States , or artic ,  छोटी   लिये  articulated  लारी  , in  ब्रिटेन  and Ireland  .
a   semi-trailer   करता   नहीं  trail  completely  behind the towing vehicle  ,  but is attached at a point that is just  आगे  of  the   rear-most  axle of the towing unit  .
इस  is done so that  a  fraction  of   the   वज़न   of   the  trailer is carried by  the   प्रधान  mover .
This arrangement means  कि  both  ट्रैक्टर   और  semi-trailer will have a distinctly  अलग  design  than   a  rigid truck and trailer .
the   पिट्सबर्ग  Steelers are  a  professional football team based  in  Pittsburgh , Pennsylvania  .
The team currently  belongs  to the  उत्तर  Division of the American  फ़ुटबॉल   सम्मेलन  (  afc   )  in  the  National  फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL  )  .
संस्थापित  in ,  the  Steelers are the oldest franchise in the  afc  .
पिट्सबर्ग  has  जीती  more  सुपर  Bowl  शीर्षक   (   छह  ) ,  जीती  more  afc  Championship  खेल   (  eight  )   और  played  in  (  पंद्रह   )  and hosted  अधिक   (   ग्यारह  ) conference championship games than any other  afc   or   nfc   टोली  .
The Steelers  share  the  रिकार्ड  for most Super Bowl appearances with  the  Dallas Cowboys  (  eight  )   .
the  Steelers  जीती  their most recent championship , Super Bowl  xliii   ,  on February 1  ,  2009  .
The Steelers were founded  as   the   पिट्सबर्ग  Pirates on July 8 , 1933 , by  आर्ट  Rooney  ,  taking  इसके   असली   नाम  from the baseball  टोली   of  the  वही  name  ,  as was  आम  practice for  एनएफएल   टीमों   to  do at  the  time  .
the  ownership of the  स्टीलर्स  has remained within the Rooney family since  इसके   founding  .
the  current  मालिक   is  Art 's son  ,  Dan Rooney  ,  who  रै   दिए  much  कंट्रोल  of the franchise  to  his  बेटे  Art Rooney  ii  .
Long one  of  the  एनएफएल   's   फ्लैगशिप   टीमों  , the Steelers enjoy a large  ,  widespread  fanbase  nicknamed Steeler Nation .
The  स्टीलर्स   फिलहाल  play their home games at Heinz Field on Pittsburgh  's  North Side  in  the North Shore  पड़ोस  , which also hosts the University  of   पिट्सबर्ग  Panthers  .
Built  in   2001   ,  the stadium  replaced  Three Rivers Stadium  जिससे   hosted  the Steelers for 31  सीज़न  .
Prior to Three  नदियाँ  , the Steelers had  निभाई   उनके  games in Pitt Stadium and  फोर्ब्स   फ़ील्ड  .
Three  अलग  kinds of wheat and  rye   आटा
Flour is  a  powder which is made  by  grinding cereal  दाने  ,  or   अन्य   बीज  or  जड़ें  ( like Cassava )  .
it  is the main  संघटक  of  ब्रैड   ,   जिससे  is a staple food for  अनेक  cultures , making  the   उपलब्धता   of   पर्याप्त   आपूर्तियाँ  of flour  a  major  आर्थिक   और  political issue at various  टाइम्स  throughout history  .
गेहूं  flour is one of  the  most  महत्वपूर्ण  foods in European , North American , Middle Eastern  ,   भारतीय  and North African cultures , and  is  the defining  संघटक   in  most  of  their styles of breads  और   pastries  .
जबकि   गेहूं  is  the  most common base  लिये  flour , corn flour  रै   महरूम   महत्वपूर्ण   in  Mesoamerican cuisine since  प्राचीन   टाइम्स  ,  और  remains a  स्टेपल   throughout   the  Americas .
Rye  आटा  is an  महत्वपूर्ण  constituent  of   ब्रैड  in  much  of central Europe , and  राइस  can also  be  used in  आटा  ,  हालांकि  this is  अपेक्षाकृत  uncommon .
दिल  rate  is  the  क्रमांक   of  heartbeats  प्रति  unit of time  ,  typically  expressed   as  beats  प्रति  minute (  bpm   )   .
Heart  रेट   can   vary  as  the  body  's  need  to  absorb oxygen and excrete carbon dioxide changes  ,  such  as   दौरान  physical exercise , sleep ,  बीमारी   ,  or as a  परिणाम  of ingesting drugs :
Central nervous system  stimulants   ऐसे  as amphetamines increase heart rate .
Central nervous system  depressants   or  sedatives decreases  the  heart  रेट  (  अलावा  from  कुछ   विशेषकर  strange ones with equally strange  प्रभाव  ,  ऐसे   as   केटामाइन   जिससे   can  cause - amongst  अनेक  other  बाते  -  stimulant-like  effects such  as  tachycardia )  .
There are many ways  in   जिससे  the heart rate  speeds  up  or  slows  bas  .
Most  involve   stimulant-like   endorphins  and hormones being  released   in  the brain , many  of   जिससे  are  those  that are  'forced'/'enticed   '  out by the  ingestion   और  processing of drugs  .
Due  to   individuals   having   a   निरंतर   रक्त   आवाज़   ,  one  of   the  physiological  तरीके   to  deliver more  ऑक्सीजन   to  an  अंग  is  to  increase  दिल   रेट  to permit blood  to  pass by the organ more often  .
सामान्य  resting  दिल   दरों  range from 60-100 bpm .
मंदनाड़ी   is  defined as  a  resting heart rate  नीचे   60  bpm .
however  ,  दिल  rates from 50 to 60  bpm  are common  among  healthy  लोगों  and do not  necessarily  require  खास  attention  .
tachycardia   is  defined as a resting heart rate above  100   bpm  ,  हालांकि   persistent   बाकी  rates  between   80-100   bpm  , mainly if they  हैं   उपस्थित   दौरान   नींद   ,  may  be  signs of  हाइपरथाइरॉयडिज़्म   or  anemia ( see  नीचे  )  .
कैथरीन  II  's   carved  , painted  और   gilded  Coronation  कोच  (  hermitage  Museum )
A carriage  is   a   wheeled  vehicle  लिये   लोगों   ,   प्रायः   horse-drawn  ; litters ( palanquins )  और   सेडान  chairs are excluded  ,  since  वे   हैं   wheelless  vehicles .
The carriage is  विशेषकर  designed for private  यात्री   उपयोग   और  for  सुकून  or  लालित्य   ,  though some are  भी  used  to   हस्तांतरण  goods .
it   may  be  लाइट   ,  smart and  तेज़   or  heavy , large  और  comfortable .
carriages  normally have suspension  using   पत्ता   स्रोतों  , elliptical  स्रोतों  ( in the  19th  century  )   or  leather strapping .
a  public passenger vehicle would not usually  be   पुकारा   a  carriage –  शर्तें  for  ऐसे   शामिल  stagecoach , charabanc  और   omnibus  .
Working  वाहनों   ऐसे  as  the  ( four-wheeled  )   वैगन   और   (   two-wheeled  ) cart  share  important parts  of   the   इतिहास  of the  carriage   ,  as is  the  fast  (   two-wheeled  ) chariot .
the  2004 Indian Ocean  भूकंप  was an undersea  megathrust  earthquake that occurred  at   00:58:53  UTC on Sunday , 26 December  2004   ,   साथ  an epicentre off the  वेस्ट  coast of Sumatra  ,  Indonesia .
The quake itself is known by  the  scientific  जातियाँ  as the Sumatra–Andaman earthquake  .
The  resulting  tsunami was given  विभिन्न  names  ,   सहित  the 2004 Indian  समंदर  tsunami ,  दक्षिण  Asian tsunami , Indonesian tsunami , and  the  Boxing Day  सुनामी   .
The earthquake  थी  caused  by  subduction  और   triggered  a  श्रेणी   of  devastating tsunamis along the  coasts  of most landmasses  bordering  the Indian Ocean , killing over 230,000 people  in  fourteen countries , and inundating  तटीय   समुदायों   साथ  waves  up  to  ऊँची  .
It was one of the  deadliest  natural disasters  in  recorded  इतिहास   .
Indonesia was the  hardest-hit   देश   ,  followed by Sri Lanka ,  इण्डिया   ,  and Thailand .
With  a  magnitude of Mw  9.1–9.3  ,  it   is  the  तीसरा  largest  भूकंप   कभी   अंकित   on   a   seismograph  .
the   भूकंप  had the  longest   अवधि  of faulting ever  observed   ,  between 8.3  और  10 minutes .
it   caused  the  संपूर्ण  planet to  हिलना  as  much  as  और  triggered  अन्य  earthquakes  as   दूर  away as Alaska .
इसके  epicentre  थी  between Simeulue  और   मेनलैंड   इंडोनेशिया  .
The plight of the affected people and  देशों  prompted a  विश्वव्यापी  humanitarian  जवाब   .
In  सब   ,   the   विश्वव्यापी  community donated more than $ 14  अरब  (  2004   us   $  ) in  humanitarian   सहायता   .
भाप  rising  इससे  the  nesjavellir  Geothermal Power Station in  आइसलैंड   .
geothermal   उर्जा  is thermal  उर्जा  generated  और   भंडारित  in  the  Earth  .
थर्मल  energy is  the  energy  कि  determines the temperature of matter .
the   geothermal  energy of the Earth 's crust originates from the original  गठन  of the  ग्रह  (  20  %  )   और   इससे   रेडियोसक्रिय  decay  of  minerals ( 80 % ) .
the   geothermal   अनुपात  , which  is  the  अंतर  in temperature  between  the  कोर  of  the  planet and its surface  ,  drives a continuous  conduction  of thermal energy in the  रूप   of  heat from the  कोर  to the surface  .
the   क्रियाशील   geothermal   originates   इससे  the Greek  जड़ें   γη  (  ge  )  ,  meaning earth ,  और   θερμος   (  thermos  )  ,  अर्थ  hot .
at  the core  of   the   धरती  , thermal energy is  निर्मित  by  रेडियोसक्रिय   क्षय  and temperatures may reach over 5000  °c   (   9,000  °F  )   .
Heat conducts from the core  to  surrounding  कूलर  rock  .
The  ऊँची  temperature and  दबाव   कारण  some rock  to  melt , creating magma convection upward since  it   is   हल्का  than  the   ठोस  rock .
the  magma  heats   चट्टान   और  water in the  क्रस्ट  , sometimes up  to   370  °C (  700   °f  )  .
इससे  hot springs , geothermal  उर्जा   रै  been used for bathing since  paleolithic  times and  लिये  space heating since ancient  रोमन   टाइम्स   ,  but it is now better  ज्ञात  for electricity  पीढी   .
Worldwide  ,   परिचय  10,715 megawatts (  mw  ) of geothermal power  is  online in 24 countries .
An additional 28 gigawatts of  सीधा   geothermal  heating  क्षमता  is installed for district heating  ,   स्पेस  heating , spas ,  औद्योगिक  processes , desalination  और  agricultural applications  .
Geothermal  शक्ति  is cost  प्रभावी   ,  reliable , sustainable , and environmentally friendly  ,  but has  historically  been  सीमित   to  areas near  tectonic  plate boundaries .
हाल   technological   अग्रिम   have   dramatically   विस्तारित  the  दायरा  and size  of  viable resources ,  विशेषकर   लिये   अनुप्रयोग   ऐसे  as home heating  ,   खोलने  a potential for widespread exploitation  .
geothermal   कुएं  release  ग्रीनहाउस  gases trapped  गहन   भीतर  the earth ,  लकिन  these  emissions  are much  निम्नतर   प्रति  energy  ईकाई  than those  of  fossil fuels  .
as  a  परिणाम  , geothermal  शक्ति  has  the  potential to help mitigate global  वार्मिंग  if widely  तैनात   in  place  of  fossil fuels .
the  Earth 's  geothermal  resources  हैं   theoretically  more than adequate  to  supply humanity 's  उर्जा  needs , but  तभी  a  बहुत  small  भिन्न  may be profitably  शोषित  .
खुदाई   और  exploration  लिये  deep resources is very  महंगी   .
forecasts   लिये  the future of geothermal power  निर्भर   on  assumptions  परिचय   प्रौद्योगिकी  , energy  कीमतें   ,  subsidies  ,   और  interest rates  .
Pilot programs like EWEB 's  ग्राहक   ऑप्ट  in  ग्रीन  Power Program  दिखाएँ  that  ग्राहक   होता  be willing to pay  a   छोटी  more for a  बेदर्दी  energy source like geothermal  .
But as  a   परिणाम  of government  assisted  research and industry experience , the  लागत  of generating geothermal power has decreased by  25   %  over the past two decades .
In  2001  , geothermal  उर्जा  cost between  दो  and ten cents per kwh  .
the   पद  cubic foot is an Imperial and US customary  (   non-  metric  )  unit of volume  ,  used in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  and  the   संयुक्त   किंगडम  .
It is defined as  the  volume  of  a  घन   साथ  sides of  एक  foot (  0.3048  m  )  in  लंबाई  .
to  calculate cubic feet multiply length  x   चौडाई  X  ऊँचाई   .
Hồ  chí  Minh ( Northern  वियतनामी  pronunciation  :   ,  Southern Vietnamese  उच्चारण  : )  ;  19  may   1890  – 2 September  1969   )   ,  born Nguyễn  sinh   cung  and also  ज्ञात  as Nguyễn  tất   thành  and Nguyễn  ái  Quốc ,  थी   a  Vietnamese communist  क्रांतिकारी  leader  जो  was  प्रधान  minister  (  1945–1955  )   और   अध्यक्ष   (  1945–1969 ) of the  लोकतांत्रिक   गणतंत्र   of  Vietnam  (  North  वियतनाम  )  .
he  was  a  key figure  in  the foundation of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam in 1945 , as  खूब  as the  people’s  Army  of  Vietnam  (  PAVN  )  and the Việt Cộng (  nlf  or  vc   )  during the  वियतनाम  War  .
He led the Việt Minh  स्वतंत्रता  movement  इससे   1941  onward  ,   establishing   the  communist -ruled  लोकतांत्रिक   गणतंत्र  of Vietnam  in   1945   और  defeating  the   फ्रेंच  Union in 1954 at the battle of Điện  biên   phủ  .
He  officially   stepped   bas   इससे  power  in  1955  due   to  health problems ,  लकिन  remained  a   अत्यधिक  visible  figurehead   और  inspiration for those Vietnamese fighting for his cause—a united  ,  communist Vietnam—until his  मौत   .
बाद  the  युद्ध  ,  साइगॉन  ,  पूंजी  of  the  Republic of  वियतनाम  ,  थी   renamed  Hồ Chí Minh City  .
सब  Roads  सीसे  Home  is  a feature  फिल्मी   released  on September 26 , 2008  .
निर्देशित   by  Dennis  fallon  ,  it  stars Peter Boyle ,  patton  Oswalt ,  जेसन   लंदन   ,  Vivien Cardone , Vanessa Branch , Peter Coyote ,  स्टीफन  Milton  ,   और  Allan  kayser  .
The  फिल्म  was  फिल्माया   in   और  around Kansas  नगर  , Missouri  .
The movie made its World Premiere  जनवरी   27  at the  सांता  Barbara  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Film Festival .
The film  रै   भी   recently  been  in  several film festivals ,  और   रै   प्राप्त  bad reviews .
Peter  बॉयल  died  पहले  the movie 's  रिलीज  .
It  थी  the last movie  he   appeared   in  .
Sales  कर  in  the   संयुक्त  States are taxes placed on  the   बिक्री  or  पट्टे  of  goods  and  सेवाएं   in  the  संयुक्त  States .
जबकि   no  national general  बिक्री   कर  exists ,  the   संघीय   सरकारी  levies several  नेशनल  selective sales taxes  on   the   बिक्री  or lease  of  particular  goods  and services .
Furthermore , forty-five states  ,  the  ज़िला  of Columbia  ,  and  गुआम   थोपने   सामान्य   बिक्री  taxes  कि  apply  to   the   बिक्री  or  पट्टे  of  सबसे   goods  and some services ,  और  states  भी  may levy selective  बिक्री  taxes on the  बिक्री   or  lease  of  particular goods  or  services .
राज्य  may also delegate  to  local governments  the  authority  to  impose additional  सामान्य   or  selective  बिक्री  taxes .
बिक्री   कर   is   गणना  by multiplying the purchase  दाम  by the  लागू  tax rate .
कर  rates vary  widely  by jurisdiction and range  इससे  less  than  1 % to over 10 %  .
बिक्री  tax is collected by the  विक्रेता   at   the   समय   of  sale .
उपयोग  tax  is  self  assessed  by a buyer  जो   रै  not  सशुल्क  sales  कर   on   a   taxable   खरीदें  .
Unlike the value added tax , a  बिक्री  tax is imposed only once , at the retail  स्तर  .
However  ,  in  मामले   जहाँ  items are sold at retail more  than   एकबार  , such  as   प्रयुक्त  cars , the  बिक्री  tax  can   be  charged  on  the  वही   मद  indefinitely .
the  definition  of   खुदरा  sales  और   कया   goods  and services are taxable  vary   among   the   राज्य  .
Nearly all jurisdictions provide  numerous  categories of  goods  and services that  हैं  exempt from  बिक्री  tax  ,  or taxed  at   घटाया  rates .
The purchase of goods for  further  manufacture or  लिये   पुनर्विक्रय  is uniformly  exempt  from  बिक्री  tax .
सबसे  jurisdictions  exempt  food  बेची   in  grocery  स्टोर्स  ,  नुस्खा   medications  ,  और  many agricultural  आपूर्तियाँ  .
Sales  कर   ,  including those  imposed   by   लोकल  governments  ,  are generally  administered  at the state level  .
States  imposing  sales  कर  require  खुदरा  sellers  to  collect tax from customers  ,  file returns  ,   और  remit  the  tax to  the  state .
प्रक्रियात्मक  rules vary widely .
Sellers  generally  must collect tax from  in-state  purchasers unless  the  purchaser provides an  exemption  certificate  .
सबसे  states  allow  or require electronic remittance  .
A central  प्रसंस्करण   ईकाई  ( CPU ) , also  referred   to  as a  सेंट्रल  processor  ईकाई  , is the  हार्डवेयर   भीतर  a computer that  carries  out the  निर्देश  of a  कंप्यूटर   कार्यक्रम  by  performing   the   मौलिक  arithmetical  ,   लॉजिकल   ,   और  input/output operations of  the   प्रणाली   .
the  term  रै  been  in  use in  the  computer industry  at   तनिक  since the early 1960s .
The form  ,  design , and  क्रियान्वयन  of  cpu  have changed over the course of their history , but their fundamental operation  remains  much  the  same .
A computer  can   have   अधिक  than one CPU ; this is called  multiprocessing   .
कुछ   एकीकृत   circuits  (  ics   )   can  contain  अनेक  CPUs on a  सिंगल   चिप  ;  those  ICs are  पुकारा  multi-core processors .
दो  typical components of a  cpu   हैं   the  arithmetic logic unit  (   alu  ) , which  performs   गणित  and logical  परिचालन   ,   और   the  control unit  (   cu  ) , which  extracts  instructions from  मेमोरी  and decodes  और  executes  उन्हें  , calling on  the  ALU  जब   जरुरी   .
नहीं  all  कम्प्यूटेशनल  systems rely on a  सेंट्रल   प्रसंस्करण  unit  .
An  सरणी   प्रोसेसर   or  vector  प्रोसेसर  has  अनेक   समानांतर  computing elements  ,  with no one unit  माना  the `` center '' .
in   the  distributed  कम्प्यूटिंग  model  ,  problems  हैं  solved  by  a distributed interconnected set of processors  .
RFID chip  अगला  to  a   अनाज  of  राइस   .
इस   चिप  contains a radio-frequency  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  field coil that  modulates   an   बाह्य   चुम्बकीय  field to transfer  a   coded   पहचान  number when  queried  by  a  reader device .
इस   छोटी  type  is  incorporated in consumer products  ,  and implanted  in  pets ,  लिये  identification purposes  .
radio-frequency   पहचान   (  RFID )  is  the  बेतार  non-contact  उपयोग  of  radio-frequency  electromagnetic  फ़ील्ड   to   ट्रांसफ़र  data  ,  for the purposes  of  automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects .
The tags  contain   electronically  stored information .
कुछ  tags  हैं  powered and  पढ़ा   at  short  सीमाएँ  ( a few meters  )  via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic induction ) .
Others use  a   लोकल  power source such as  a  battery , or else  have  no battery but collect  उर्जा  from the  interrogating  EM field , and then act as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio  लहरें  (  i.e.  ,  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक   विकिरण   at   ऊँची  frequencies  )  .
Battery powered tags  may   operate   at   सैंकड़ों  of meters .
Unlike a  बार  code , the tag does  नहीं  necessarily  need   to  be  भीतर   लकीर   of  sight of the  रीडर   ,   और  may be embedded in the  tracked   ऑब्जेक्ट  .
RFID tags are  प्रयुक्त  in  अनेक   उद्योग  .
An  rfid  tag attached to an automobile during production  can   be  used to track its progress through the assembly line  .
Pharmaceuticals can be tracked  through  warehouses .
पशुधन  and pets may  have  tags injected , allowing positive identification  of  the animal .
Since  rfid  tags  can  be  संलग्न  to clothing , possessions , or even implanted within  लोगों  ,  the   सम्भावना   of  reading personally-linked information without  सहमति   रै  raised privacy  चिंताएं  .
Overtime is the amount  of  time someone works  परे  normal working  घंटों   .
सामान्य   घंटों  may  be  determined  in  several ways:
by custom (  कया  is considered healthy  or   उचित   by  society  )  ,
by  practices   of  a  दिए  trade or profession,
by   legislation,
by   अनुबंध  between  नियोक्ता   और   मजदूर  or  उनके   प्रतिनिधि   .
Most nations  have   ओवरटाइम   मजदूर  laws  designed   to  dissuade or  prevent   नियोक्ता  from forcing their  कर्मचारी  to work  excessively  long  घंटों  .
These  कानून   may  take  into  account other considerations than the humanitarian ,  ऐसे   as  preserving the health of  मजदूर   so  that  वे   may  continue to  be   उत्पादक  ,  or   increasing  the  overall   स्तर   of  employment  in   the   अर्थव्यवस्था   .
One common  दृष्टिकोण  to  regulating  overtime is  to   आवश्यकता  employers  to  pay  मजदूर  at  a  higher  hourly  rate for  ओवरटाइम  work .
Companies  may   चुनें  to  अदा  workers  उच्चतर   ओवरटाइम  pay  भी  if not obliged to do  so  by  विधि  ,  विशेषकर   if  they  मानना  that they  फेस   a  backward bending  सप्लाई  curve  of   श्रमिक   .
ओवरटाइम  pay rates  can  cause workers  to   कार्य  longer hours than they would  at  a flat hourly rate  .
Overtime  कानून   ,   attitudes  toward overtime  और  hours  of   कार्य  vary greatly from country  to  country and  between   अलग  economic  सेक्टर   .
Visualization  of  links between pages  on  a wiki using  a  force-directed layout  .
force-directed   आलेख   आरेखण   algorithms   हैं   a   क्लास  of  algorithms  for drawing graphs in an aesthetically  pleasing  way .
Their purpose  is   to  position the nodes of  a  graph  in  two-dimensional  or   three-dimensional   स्पेस  so that  सब  the edges  हैं   of   अधिक   or   कम   बराबर   लंबाई   और  there  हैं   as  few  क्रासिंग  edges as possible , by  assigning   शक्तियां  among the set of  किनारे  and  the  set of nodes  ,  based  on  their relative  स्थितियाँ   ,  and then using  ये   शक्तियां  either to simulate the motion of the edges and nodes  or   to  minimize their energy .
जबकि   आलेख  drawing  can   be  a difficult problem , force-directed  algorithms  ,  होने   शारीरिक   simulations   ,  usually require no  खास  knowledge about graph theory such as planarity  .
Purchasing power  (  sometimes  retroactively  called  समायोजित  for inflation ) is the amount of  goods   or   सेवाएं  that  can  be purchased  साथ   a   ईकाई  of currency .
For  उदाहरण  , if  तुम  had taken  एक  dollar  to  a store in  the  1950s  ,   तुम   होता  have  महरूम   समर्थ  to buy a greater number  of   वस्तुएं  than you would today  ,   indicating  that you would have had a greater  खरीदना  power in the  1950s   .
Currency can  be  either a  कमोडिटी  money , like  सुनहरा   or  silver , or fiat currency ,  or   free-floating  market-valued  करेंसी  like US dollars  .
as   आदम  Smith noted  ,   having   धन   देता  one the ability to  ``  command '' others '  मजदूर  ,  so  purchasing  शक्ति   to  some  extent   is   शक्ति  over other people  ,  to the extent  कि  they are  willing  to trade their  मजदूर   or   goods  for money  or  currency .
If  एक  's  मौद्रिक  income  stays  the  वही  ,  लकिन  the price  स्तर  increases , the purchasing power of that income  जलप्रपात   .
Inflation  करता  not always  imply   गिरना  purchasing power  of  one  's   धन   आय  since it may rise faster than  the  price level  .
A higher real income means a  उच्चतर   खरीदना   शक्ति  since  रियल  income refers  to   the  income adjusted for  महंगाई   .
For  a  price index , its  मान  in the  आधार  year  is   प्रायः   सामान्यीकृत  to  a  value  of   100  .
The purchasing  शक्ति  of  a  unit of currency  ,   कह  a  डालर  , in a given year , expressed in dollars  of  the base  साल  , is 100/P , where P is the  दाम  index in  कि  year  .
So  ,  by definition the  खरीदना   शक्ति   of  a dollar decreases as the price level  उदय  .
the  purchasing power in today 's money of  an   राशि  C of money ,  t  years  into  the future  ,   can  be  computed  with  the  formula  लिये  the present value :
where  in  this  मामला  i is an  assumed   भविष्य   सालाना   महंगाई   रेट   .
शिक्षा   in  South Korea  is   viewed  as  होने  crucial  लिये   कामयाबी   और  competition  is   नतीजतन   बहुत   heated   और  fierce  .
A  सेंट्रल  administration oversees  the   प्रक्रम   लिये  the  शिक्षा   of  children from  किंडरगार्टन  to the  तीसरा  and  फाइनल  year  of   ऊँची  school  .
गणित   ,  science , Korean ,  अंग्रेज़ी  , and social studies are  generally   माना   to   be  the  सबसे   महत्वपूर्ण   विषय  .
Normally  शारीरिक   शिक्षा   is  not considered important  as   it  is  नहीं  recognised , by the  generally  academic elitist South Korean populace  ,   as  education and  इसलिए  many  स्कूलों   कमी  high-quality gymnasiums and varsity  एथलेटिक्स   .
South Korea was the  पहला  country in the world to provide  high-speed   अंतरजाल   अभिगम  to  सब  primary  ,  junior  ,   और   ऊँची  schools .
Although  दक्षिण  Korean students often  रैंक   अत्यधिक  on  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   तुलनात्मक  assessments when  compared  to  विद्यार्थी   of  most Western  शिक्षा   प्रणालियों   ,   the  South Korean education  प्रणाली  is criticised for emphasising too much  upon  passive learning and memorisation .
the  South  कोरियाई   शिक्षा  system  is  rather notably  सख्त  and  overly  structured as compared to its  counterparts   in   सबसे  Western societies .
Also  ,  the prevalence of  non-school  for-profit  निजी  institutes such as academies or cram-schools ( Hagwon [  학원   ]   )  , which  too  emphasise  on   passive   memorisation  ,  as  opposed  to  conceptual  समझना  ,  in  students  हैं  criticised as  a  major social  प्रॉब्लम  .
The  my   lai  Massacre (  ,   ;   ,   ,   or  ) was  the   वियतनाम   युद्ध  mass murder of  between   347  and  504  unarmed civilians  in   दक्षिण  Vietnam  on  March 16 ,  1968  , by  संयुक्त  States Army soldiers of  ``  Charlie  ''  Company  of  1st  बटालियन   ,   20th   infantry   रेजीमेंट  , 11th  ब्रिगेड   of   the   americal  Division  .
Victims included women ,  मेन  , children  ,   और  infants .
Some  of  the  महिलाओं  were gang-raped  और   उनके  bodies were later  मिला  to  be  mutilated  और  many  महिलाओं   यहूद   allegedly  raped prior to  the   हत्याओं   .
While 26  u.S.  soldiers  यहूद   initially  charged with  दण्ड  offenses for their actions at  mỹ   lai  ,  तभी   दूसरी   लेफ्टिनेंट   विलियम  Calley  ,   a   प्लाटून   नेता   in   चार्ली   कम्पनी  , was convicted  .
मिला  guilty of  हत्या  22 villagers , he  थी  originally given a life sentence , but only served  तीन  and a  हाफ   सालो   अंतर्गत  house arrest  .
The massacre  took  place in  the  hamlets of My Lai and  my  Khe of Son My  गाँव  .
the   इवेंट   is   भी   ज्ञात   as  the  बेटे   my   नरसंहार   ,   विशेषकर  in  the  Vietnamese  राज्य   मीडिया   .
The  u.S.  military  codeword  for  the  `` Viet Cong  stronghold  ''  थी  ``  pinkville   ''   .
the  incident prompted global  आक्रोश   जब  it  became   पब्लिक   ज्ञान  in 1969  .
The massacre  भी  increased domestic opposition to the U.S. involvement in  the   वियतनाम  War .
Three U.S.  servicemen   जो   था  tried  to   halt   the  massacre and  protect  the  wounded  were  initially   denounced  by  अनेक   u.s  .  कांग्रेसियों   as   traitors  .
वे  received hate  मेल  and death threats  और   मिला  mutilated animals  on  their doorsteps .
The  तीन   यहूद  later  widely  praised and  सजा  by the  फौज  for their  वीर   क्रियाएँ  .
The hijackers  in   the  September  11   हमले  were 19 men affiliated with  al-qaeda  , and 15  of  the 19  यहूद  citizens of  सऊदी  Arabia  .
Others  यहूद   इससे  Egypt  ,  Lebanon  ,  and the  uae   .
The  hijackers  were organized  into  four  टीमों  , each led  by  a pilot-trained hijacker with four `` muscle hijackers  ''   जो   यहूद  trained to help  subdue   the  pilots  ,   यात्री   ,  and crew  .
The first hijackers to arrive  in  the United States  यहूद  Khalid  al-mihdhar  and Nawaf al-Hazmi ,  जो   settled  in the San Diego  क्षेत्रफल   in  January  2000   .
They  यहूद   followed  by  तीन   hijacker-pilots  ,  मोहम्मद  Atta , Marwan  al-shehhi   ,  and  ziad   jarrah  early in the summer of 2000 to undertake flight training in south Florida .
The fourth  hijacker-pilot   ,  Hani Hanjour ,  arrived  in San Diego in December 2000  .
the   बाकी  of the  ``   मांसपेशी  hijackers  ''  arrived  in   the  spring and  जल्दी  summer of 2001 , just  महीने  before the September 11  हमले   .
Abū  al-qāsim   muḥammad   इब्न  ʿAbd Allāh  इब्न  ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib  इब्न   hāshim   (   )   (   circa|  570  –   circa|  8  जून  632 ) ,  भी   transliterated   as  Muhammad  (  )  ,  was a religious , political ,  और  military leader  इससे   मक्का   जो  unified Arabia into  a  single religious  polity  under  islam  .
he   is  believed  by   मुसलमान  and  bahá'ís  to be a messenger and  नबी   of  God .
Muhammad is almost  universally  considered by  मुसलमान   as  the last  नबी   भेजा  by God for  mankind  .
non-muslims  regard  मुहम्मद  as  the  founder of  islam  .
Muslims  consider  him  to   be   the  restorer  of  an  अनछुए  original  monotheistic  faith of  आदम  , Noah , Abraham  ,   मूसा  , Jesus ,  और   अन्य   नबियों   .
Born in about  570  CE in  the   arabian  city of  मक्का   ,   he  was  अनाथ  at  an  early age and brought up  अंतर्गत  the  परवाह   of  his uncle  abu  Talib .
he   बाद  worked mostly as a  व्यापारी   ,   as  well as a shepherd , and was  पहला  married by age  25   .
होने   in  the  आदत  of periodically retreating to a  गुफा  in the surrounding mountains for several  नाइट्स  of seclusion  और   दुआ   ,   he  later  reported   कि  it was  वहीँ  , at  आयु  40 , that  he  received  उसके   पहला  revelation from God .
Three years after this  इवेंट   मुहम्मद  started preaching these  खुलासे   सरेआम  , proclaiming that  ``  God is One  ``  ,  कि  complete  ``  surrender ''  to   उसे   (   lit   .
islām ) is  the   तभी  way ( dīn  )  acceptable to God ,  और   कि  he himself was  a  prophet and messenger of God , in  the  same vein as other  इस्लामी  prophets  .
मुहम्मद   gained  few  अनुसरणकर्ता  early on , and was met with  दुश्मनी   इससे  some Meccan  जनजातियों   ;  he and  उसके  followers were  treated  harshly  .
To escape  persecution   ,   मुहम्मद   भेजा  some  of   उसके   अनुसरणकर्ता  to  अबीसीनिया  before  he  and his followers in Mecca migrated to Medina  (   तब  known  as   yathrib  ) in the year 622 .
This event ,  the  Hijra , marks the beginning of the Islamic  पंचांग   ,  which  is   भी   ज्ञात  as the Hijri  पंचांग   .
In Medina  ,   मुहम्मद   संयुक्त   the  tribes  अंतर्गत  the  संविधान  of  मदीना  .
बाद   आठ  years of  लड़   साथ  the Meccan tribes , his followers  ,  who  by  then had  grown   to  10,000 , took control of  मक्का  in the  largely  peaceful Conquest of Mecca  .
he   नष्ट   the   pagan   मूर्तियों  in  the   नगर  and  तब   भेजा  his followers out to destroy all  of   the  remaining pagan temples in Eastern  अरब   .
In 632 ,  a   few  months  बाद   returning   to  Medina from  the   विदाई   यात्राएं   ,   मुहम्मद   गिरी   बीमार  and  died   .
By the  समय   of   उसके   मौत   ,  most of the  arabian   प्रायद्वीप   था   परिवर्तित  to Islam , and  he  had united  अरब  into a single  मुस्लिम  religious polity .
the   खुलासे  (  or   ayah   ,  lit .
`` Signs [  of   परमेश्वर  ]  ''  )  —   जिससे  Muhammad  reported  receiving until  उसके   मौत  – form the  आयतें  of the  कुरान   ,  regarded by Muslims  as  the ``  शब्द  of God  ''   और  around  जिससे  the  धर्म   is   आधारित  .
Besides  the   कुरान  ,  मुहम्मद   's  life ( sira )  और  traditions  (  sunnah )  हैं  also upheld by  मुसलमान   as  the  स्त्रोत  of sharia law .
They discuss Muhammad and  अन्य  prophets of  islam   साथ   reverence   ,  adding the  phrase  peace be upon him  whenever   उनके  names  हैं   उल्लेखित  .
While conceptions  of  Muhammad in medieval  christendom  and  premodern  times were largely  ऋणात्मक  ,  appraisals   in   आधुनिक   इतिहास   have  been  दूर  less  so   .
This is a list  of  tables  of   the   सत्यापित  oldest people in the world  in   ordinal  rank , such as oldest person  or   oldest  man .
In these  टेबल  ,  a   supercentenarian  is considered 'verified '  if  his  or  her claim has  महरूम   validated  by an international body  कि   specifically  deals in longevity research , such  as   the  Gerontology  शोध  Group ( GRG ) or  गिनीज   संसार   रिकॉर्ड   .
the   longest  unambiguously documented  इंसान   जीवनकाल  is that of Jeanne Calment  of  France  (  1875–1997 )  ,  who died  at  age  122   सालो  ,  164  days .
वो   मिले  Vincent  वैन   gogh   जब   वो  was 12  or  13 .
इस  led  to  news media attention in 1985 ,  बाद  Calment turned  110  .
Subsequent  छानबीन  found documentation for Calment 's age , beyond any  उचित   सवाल  , in the records  of  her native city  ,   arles   ,  France  .
More evidence  of   calment  's lifespan has been  उत्पादित  than  लिये  any other supercentenarian ;  उसके   मामला  serves  as  an  archetype  in the  methodology  for verifying  the  ages  of  the  संसार  's oldest  लोगों  .
the  longest undisputed lifespan  लिये   पुरूष   supercentenarians  is  कि  of Jiroemon Kimura  ,   जो  currently lives in  जापानी  and is age  as  of  .
चूंकि  the death  of   115-year  old Dina  manfredini  of the United  राज्य   ,   on  17  दिसम्बर  2012  ,  Kimura , born 19  अप्रैल   1897  , is  the  oldest  जीना   व्यक्ति   in  the world  जिनकी  age can  be  documented .
He  रै   भी   महरूम  the oldest living man since the death of 114-year old Walter Breuning on  14  April  2011  .
Since  the  death  of   115-year   बूढ़ा  Koto  okubo  of  जापानी   on  12  जनवरी  2013 , the oldest living  स्त्री  has been -year-old  misao   okawa  , also from  जापानी   ,  born  on  5  कूच  1898 .
This  is   a  timeline of  the  African-American Civil  अधिकारों  Movement  .
The Civil  अधिकारों  movement  थी   a  freedom  संघर्ष  by African  अमेरिकी  in  the  1950s  और   1960s   to  gain equality .
the  goals of  the   गति  were freedom  इससे   पक्षपात  , equal opportunity in  नियुक्ति  , education and  आवास  ,  the  right  to   vote   और  equal access  to   पब्लिक  facilities .
भारी  metal (  प्रायः   referred  to as  मेटल  ) is  a  genre of rock  म्यूज़िक   कि   विकसित  in  the   लेट  1960s  और   जल्दी  1970s , largely  in   the   संयुक्त   किंगडम   और  in the  संयुक्त  States .
साथ   जड़ें  in  ब्लूज़   चट्टान  and psychedelic  चट्टान  ,  the  bands that  निर्मित  heavy  मेटल  developed  a  thick  ,  massive  ध्वनि   ,  characterized by highly  प्रवर्धित  distortion , extended guitar  solos   ,   emphatic  beats  ,   और  overall  loudness  .
Heavy metal  गीत  and performance  शैलियाँ   हैं   generally   संबद्ध  with masculinity and machismo .
The  पहला   भारी   मेटल  bands such  as  Led Zeppelin , Deep Purple and Black Sabbath  आकर्षित   विशाल   ऑडियंस  ,  हालांकि  they  यहूद  often derided by  आलोचकों  ,  a   औकात  common  throughout   the  history of  the   विधा  .
In  the  mid-1970s  यहूदा   पुजारी  helped  spur  the genre 's evolution  by   discarding  much of its blues  influence   ;  Motörhead introduced a punk  चट्टान   sensibility  and an  increasing  emphasis on speed .
Bands  in  the  नई  Wave of  अंग्रेजों   भारी  Metal such  as   आयरन   maiden   followed  in a  समान  vein .
Before the end  of   the   दशक   ,   भारी   मेटल   प्रशंसक  became  ज्ञात  as  ``   metalheads   ``  or ``  headbangers  `` .
During  the  1980s  ,  glam metal  became   a  commercial force with groups  जैसे  Mötley  crüe   और   ज़हर   .
Underground scenes  उत्पादित  an  सरणी   of   अधिक  extreme ,  आक्रामक  styles  :  thrash metal broke into the mainstream  साथ  bands such as Metallica  ,  Megadeth , Slayer ,  और  Anthrax  ,  while other styles of the most extreme  subgenres  of metal like death metal and black metal remain subcultural  phenomena  .
Since the  mid-1990s   ,   लोकप्रिय  styles such as nu metal  ,  which often incorporates elements  of  grunge  और   हिप  hop  ;  and metalcore , which  मिश्रणों  extreme metal with hardcore punk ,  have   further  expanded the definition of  the  genre  .
the   far-right  (  भी   ज्ञात  as the extreme right ) refers to the  उच्चतम  degree  of  rightism  in   right-wing   राजनीती  .
दूर  right  राजनीती  involves  support  of strong or  पूरा   सोशल  hierarchy  in  society  ,  and  supports  supremacy of certain  individuals  or groups deemed to  be   innately   श्रेष्ठ  or  अस्तबलों  who are  to   be  more valued than those deemed to be innately inferior  or  undesirable  .
the  far right 's advocacy of supremacism  is  based on  कया  its adherents perceive as  स्वाभाविक   विशेषताएँ   of   लोगों  that  can  not be changed .
This stands  as  a point of difference  साथ   the   centre-right  's  आरोपण   of   behaviours  ,  ऐसे  as  आलस्य  or decadence  ,  as the  प्राथमिक  sources of social  inequalities  .
the  centre  right—unlike   the  far right—claims that people  can  end  उनके   behavioural  inferiority through changing  उनके  habits and choices  .
The  असली  far  सही   ,   जिससे  emerged in  फ़्रांस  after the French Revolution  ,  refused to accept the French Republic and supported  a  counter-revolution  to  restore the French monarchy and  aristocracy  .
the  far right is commonly associated with  व्यक्तियों  or groups  जो   थाम   चरम   राष्ट्रवादी  , xenophobic  ,  racist , religious fundamentalist  or  reactionary views  .
The  सबसे   extreme-right   आंदोलनों   have   धड़ा   दमन  and  नरसंहार  against groups of  लोगों   on   the   आधार   of  their alleged  हीनता  .
थामस  Hobbes of  malmesbury  ( 5 April 1588 –  4  December 1679  )  ,  in   कुछ  older texts  थामस  Hobbs of  malmsbury  ,  थी  an English  पारस  ,  बेहतरीन  known  आज  for  उसके  work  on   राजनैतिक   दर्शनशास्त्र  .
उसके  1651  किताब  Leviathan established the  न्यास   लिये  most of  पश्चिमी  political philosophy  इससे   the   परिप्रेक्ष्य  of social  अनुबंध  theory  .
Hobbes  थी  a  चैंपियन   of  absolutism  लिये  the  sovereign  ,  लकिन  he also developed  कुछ  of the  fundamentals  of European  उदार   विचार  :  the   सही   of  the individual ; the natural equality of all men ;  the  artificial character of  the   राजनैतिक   अनुक्रम  ( which  led  to the  बाद  distinction  between  civil society and  the   राज्य  )  ;  the view that  सब  legitimate political power  जरूर  be ``  प्रतिनिधि  ''  और   आधारित   on  the consent of  the  people  ;   और  a  उदार  interpretation  of   विधि  which  पत्ते   लोगों   फ़्री  to do  whatever   the  law  करता  not  explicitly   forbid   .
he   थी  one of  the  founders  of   आधुनिक   राजनैतिक  philosophy  .
His  समझना  of humans as  होने  matter and motion , obeying the same  शारीरिक   कानून  as other matter and  गति  , remains  influential   ;   और  his account  of   इंसान  nature  as   self-interested  cooperation , and of  राजनैतिक   समुदायों  as being based  upon   a  `` social  अनुबंध  `` remains  एक  of the major topics of  राजनैतिक  philosophy .
in   जोड  to  राजनैतिक  philosophy , Hobbes also contributed  to  a diverse array of other  फ़ील्ड   ,   सहित   इतिहास   ,   भूगोल   ,  the  भौतिकी  of  गैसों  ,  धर्मशास्त्र   ,  ethics ,  और   सामान्य   दर्शनशास्त्र  .
Emotional  प्रज्ञा   (   ei  )  is   the  ability to identify  ,  assess , and  कंट्रोल   the  emotions  of   oneself  , of others ,  और   of   समूह  .
It can  be   विभाजित   into  ability EI  और   trait   ei   .
Ability EI is  प्रायः  measured  using   अधिकतम  performance  परीक्षण   और  has  stronger   संबंध   साथ  traditional intelligence  ,   whereas  trait EI is  प्रायः  measured using self-report questionnaires and has stronger relationships  साथ   व्यक्तित्व  .
आलोचनाओं  have  केन्द्रित   on   whether  EI  is   a  real intelligence  और   whether  it  रै   वृद्धिशील  validity over  iq  and the Big  पाँच  personality  traits   .
Heredity  is  the passing  of  traits to offspring from its  अभिभावक  or ancestor .
This is the process by which  an   औलाद  cell or organism  acquires  or  becomes   predisposed  to the characteristics of  इसके   जनक   कोशिका   or   सजीव  .
through  heredity ,  विसंगतियाँ  exhibited  by   individuals   can  accumulate  और  cause some  प्रजाति   to   evolve   .
the  study of heredity  in  biology is  पुकारा  genetics  ,   जिससे  includes  the  field of epigenetics  .
For  संयुक्त   राज्य  individual income  कर  ,  समायोजित   सकल   आय  ( AGI ) is total  सकल   आय   ऋण  specific reductions .
Taxable income is  समायोजित   सकल  income minus allowances  लिये   निजी  exemptions and itemized  deductions   .
लिये  most  व्यक्तिगत  tax  उद्देश्य   ,   agi  is more  प्रासंगिक  than gross income .
सकल  income is  बिक्री  price  of  goods or property ,  ऋण  cost of the property  बेची  , plus  अन्य   आय   .
It  शामिल  wages , interest , dividends , business income ,  rental   आय  ,  और   सब   अन्य  types of income  .
समायोजित  gross  आय  is  सकल   आय  less  deductions  from a  कारोबार  or rental activity  और  21 other  विशिष्ट  items  .
Several deductions  (   e.g  . medical expenses  और   विविध  itemized  deductions  ) are  सीमित   आधारित   on  a percentage of  agi  .
निश्चित   phase   outs  , including those of  निम्नतर   कर  rates  और  itemized  deductions  ,  हैं   आधारित  on  स्तर  of  agi  .
अनेक  states base state income tax on  agi  with certain  deductions  .
``  Lazy Eye '' is  the  third single from Silversun Pickups '  डेब्यू  album Carnavas .
the  band performed the  सोंग   on  the Late Show with David Letterman  ,  The Tonight Show with  jay   लीनो   ,  Later With Jools Holland , and  पिछला  Call with  कार्सन   daly   .
The song is a playable  track  on Rock  बैंड  2 and Guitar  नायिका   :   संसार   दौरे   .
an  alternate version of  the   सोंग   ,   साथ   a   लंबाई  of  7:27   ,   थी  played  on  XMU before the  shorter   संस्करण   थी   निभाई  on  fm   और  other XM channels  .
इस   संस्करण  was  प्रदर्शित  on  उनके   डेमो   cd  ( which featured early versions  of  four  ट्रैक्स  ) .
A  टेलीफोन  prefix  is  the first set  of  digits of  a   टेलीफोन  number ; in  the  North American  क्रमांकन  Plan  देशों   (  country code 1 ) , it  is   the   पहला   तीन   अंक  of a seven-digit  फोन   क्रमांक  .
in   अन्य  countries both the prefix and the number may have  अलग  lengths .
it  shows  जिससे   एक्सचेंज   the  remaining  संख्याएँ  refer to .
A full telephone number  is   प्रायः   बना   up  of  देश  code ( required  लिये  international calls only ) , area  कोड  ( required  लिये  calls between telephone  क्षेत्रों   )  , prefix , and subscriber number .
कुछ  places  सीमित  certain prefixes  to  fax numbers or cell phones only ; in other  स्थान  such dedicated prefixes are  नहीं   प्रयुक्त  .
As  टेलीफोन  technology  उन्नत  ,  the   precise   significance   of  the prefix  became   धुंधला   in  many places ;  485  in  लंदन   ,  UK ,  थी  once  the   gulliver   एक्सचेंज   ,  but  अभी   44207485xxxx   is  just considered one of many number  ब्लॉक   परोसा   by  the CLKEN Kentish Town exchange ; 4420770703xx  is  another .
metformin   (  BP  ,  pronounced  ,  ;  originally  sold as Glucophage  )  is an oral antidiabetic  ड्रग  in  the  biguanide  क्लास  .
it  is the  first-line   ड्रग   of   चुनाव   लिये   the  treatment of type  2  diabetes , in particular , in  overweight   और   मोटे  people  और   those  with normal  गुर्दा   फलन  .
Its use  in  gestational  मधुमेह  has  महरूम  limited by safety concerns  .
It is also  प्रयुक्त  in the  उपचार  of polycystic  ovary  syndrome ,  और   रै  been  investigated   लिये  other diseases where  इंसुलिन  resistance may be  an  important  फ़ैक्टर   .
Metformin works  by   suppressing  glucose  उत्पादन   by  the liver  .
metformin  is  the  only antidiabetic drug  कि   रै   महरूम  conclusively shown  to   prevent  the cardiovascular  जटिलताओं   of   मधुमेह   .
It  helps   reduce  LDL  कोलेस्ट्रॉल  and triglyceride levels ,  और   is  not associated  साथ   वज़न   लाभ  .
,  metformin   is  one of  तभी  two oral antidiabetics  in  the  संसार   स्वास्थ्य  Organization Model List of Essential Medicines ( the other  होने  glibenclamide  )  .
जब  prescribed  appropriately   ,   metformin  causes  few   प्रतिकूल   प्रभाव   (  the  सबसे  common is  जठरांत्र   परेशान  ) and is associated with a low risk  of  hypoglycemia .
Lactic acidosis  (  a buildup  of   lactate   in  the  रक्त  )  can  be a  गंभीर  concern in overdose and when it is  विहित  to people  साथ  contraindications  ,  but  वरना   ,   वहीँ  is  no  significant risk  .
First  synthesized  and  मिला   to   reduce  blood sugar in  the  1920s  ,  metformin was  forgotten  for the next two decades as research  shifted   to  insulin  और  other  antidiabetic  drugs .
Interest in  metformin  was  rekindled  in the  लेट   1940s  after several  रिपोर्ट्स  that  it  could  reduce   रक्त   शुगर  levels in people  ,  and  in  1957  ,  French  चिकित्सक  Jean  sterne  published the first  नैदानिक  trial  of  metformin as  a   उपचार  for diabetes  .
It  थी  introduced  to  the United Kingdom  in  1958  ,  Canada in  1972  , and the United States in 1995 .
Metformin is now  believed  to be the  सबसे  widely prescribed  antidiabetic  drug in the  संसार   ;   in   the  United  राज्य  alone ,  अधिक  than 48  लाख  prescriptions  यहूद  filled in 2010 for its generic formulations .
The Mount Rushmore National Memorial is  a  sculpture  carved  into  the   ग्रेनाइट  face of  माउंट   rushmore  near  keystone  , South Dakota , in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  .
sculpted  by  danish-american  Gutzon Borglum  और   उसके  son  ,  Lincoln Borglum , Mount Rushmore  सुविधाएँ   sculptures   of   the   heads  of four United States presidents  :  George Washington  ,   थामस  Jefferson , Theodore  रूज़वेल्ट  and  अब्राहम  Lincoln .
the  entire  मेमोरियल   कवर   और  is above sea  स्तर  .
the  tallest  पहाड़  in the region  is   harney   शिखर   (   )  .
दक्षिण  Dakota historian  दोने  Robinson is  credited   साथ  conceiving the  विचार   of  carving  the  likenesses  of   प्रसिद्ध   लोगों  into  the   ब्लैक   पहाड़ियाँ  region of South Dakota in  अनुक्रम  to promote tourism in the region  .
रॉबिन्सन   's  initial idea was  to  sculpt the  needles   ;   however  , Gutzon Borglum  अस्वीकृत  the Needles site because of the poor  विशेषता   of  the granite and strong opposition from environmentalists and  देशी  American groups  .
They settled on the  माउंट   rushmore  location  ,  which also has the advantage  of  facing southeast for maximum sun exposure .
Robinson wanted it to feature  पश्चिमी   नायक   जैसे  Lewis and Clark , Red  बादल  and  भैंस   विधेयक   कोड़ी  but  borglum   decided   the   मूर्तिकला  should have a  अधिक  national  फ़ोकस  , and  chose   the  four presidents whose  likenesses  would  be  carved  into   the  mountain  .
बाद   securing  federal  funding   ,  construction on the memorial began  in   1927   ,   और  the  राष्ट्रपतियों   '  faces were completed  between  1934 and 1939 .
Upon  gutzon  Borglum  's  death  in  March 1941 , his son  lincoln   borglum  took  over  construction .
Although  the   आरंभिक   अवधारणा  called for  प्रत्येक   अध्यक्ष  to be depicted  इससे  head  to  waist  ,  lack  of   funding  forced  निर्माण  to  समाप्त   in   लेट   अक्तूबर  1941 .
the  U.S. National Park Service took  कंट्रोल   of  the  मेमोरियल   in   1933  , while it  थी  still  अंतर्गत  construction , and has managed  the  memorial to the  उपस्थित  day .
it   attracts   nearly   तीन  million  लोगों   annually  .
charvet   पोशाक   कमीज़   इससे  the 1930s , Norsk  folkemuseum  ,  ओस्लो  .
A  कमीज़  , dress shirt ,  button-front  ,  button-front  shirt , or button-up  कमीज़  is a  परिधान  with a  कॉलर   ,   a  full-length opening at the front  इससे  the collar to the  हेम  , and sleeves  साथ  cuffs .
शर्ट  are predominantly used by men  ,  since women  प्रायः   पहनें   blouses  .
The  सामने  opening is fastened  using   बटन   or  studs  ,  and the cuffs close  साथ   बटन   or   कफ   कड़ी  .
Shirts  हैं  normally  बना  from  woven   cloth   ,   और   हैं   प्रायः  accompanied by a  जैकेट  and tie , for example with a suit or formalwear , but shirts  हैं   भी   worn  more  casually   .
In  अंग्रेजों   अंग्रेज़ी   ,   पोशाक   कमीज़  means specifically the more  औपचारिक   संध्या  garment  worn  with  black-  or  white-   टाई  , also discussed below .
Some of these  औपचारिक   शर्ट  have stiff  fronts  and detachable collars attached with  कॉलर   studs  .
the  term  ``   button-down   ''  (  जिससे  refers a  प्रकार  of  कमीज़   जिससे  has a  कॉलर  fastened down by buttons  )  is  sometimes  used  in   गलती  to apply  to  all shirts ( with  or  without  buttoned  down collars ) , being used as  a  synonym for  ``   button-up  '' or  ``  button-front ''  .
