Administrative  पेशेवर   दिन   (   भी  known  as  Secretaries Day or  एडमिन   दिन   )  is an  unofficial   धर्मनिरपेक्ष  holiday  observed  in several  देशों   to   recognize   the  work  of  secretaries  ,  administrative assistants , receptionists , and  अन्य  administrative support professionals  .
In  उत्तर  America , it is celebrated  on  the  बुधवार   of  the last full week  of   अप्रैल   (   अप्रैल  24 in 2013  )   .
In  फ़्रांस  it is  मनाये  on  the  third  गुरुवार   in  April (  अप्रैल   18  in 2013 ) .
in  Australia it is  मनाये  on  the   पहला  Friday in May

Nicolas Poussin ( ; 15  जून  1594  –  19 November  1665  ) was the leading  चित्रकार   of   the   शास्त्रीय   फ्रेंच  Baroque style  ,  although he spent most of his working life in  रोम  .
His  कार्य   is  characterized  by  clarity  ,  logic ,  और  order ,  और  favors line over color  .
Until  the  20th  सदी  he remained a major inspiration  लिये  such classically oriented  कलाकारों  as Jacques-Louis  दाउद   ,  Jean-Auguste-Dominique Ingres and Paul Cézanne  .
He  worked  in Rome  लिये  a  वृत्त  of leading collectors  वहीँ  and elsewhere  ,   मगर  for  a  short period when  कार्डिनल  Richelieu ordered him  वापस  to France to  serve   as   पहला  Painter to the King  .
Most of  उसके  works  हैं   इतिहास  paintings of  धार्मिक  or  पौराणिक  subjects  कि   बहुत  often  have  a large landscape element  .
Jackie  कैथ  Whitley (  जुलाई   1   ,  1954Stambler , Irwin  ,   और   grelun  Landon  (  2000  )  . -  देश  Music :  the   ज्ञानकोष  .  -   नई  York :  st.  Martin 's  दबायें  . -  p.533  .  -  ISBN 978-0-312-26487-1.—Carlin ,  रिचर्ड   (   2003   )   .  - Country  म्यूज़िक  :  a  Biographical Dictionary .  -  New York  :   routledge   -  p.427 . -  isbn  978-0-415-93802-0.—Larkin  ,  Colin ( 1995  )   .  -  the  Guinness Encyclopedia  of  Popular Music .  -   नई   यॉर्क   :  Stockton  दबायें  - P.4462  .  -  isbn   978-0-85112-662-3.—stanton  , Scott ( 2003 ) . - The Tombstone Tourist  :  Musicians .  -  New York : Pocket Books .  -  p.395 .  -  ISBN  978-0-7434-6330-0.—hicks   ,  Jack  .  -  ``  Singer  कैथ  Whitley 's Memory Alive Through  गीतों  , Love in Home Town '' .  -   the  Kentucky Post  .   -   सितंबर   25   ,  1991.—  ''  Country  म्यूज़िक   स्टार  Keith Whitley Dead  at  33 '' .  -   lexington  Herald-Leader .  -  May 10  ,  1989.——Hurst , Jack  .  -  ``   whitley   's   पिछला   दिनों  ''  .   -   शिकागो   ट्रिब्यून  . -  may   14  ,  1989.—  ''  दारू   मारता   देश  Singer  कैथ   whitley  '' . -  संयुक्त  Press International . - ( c/o The  सैन   फ्रांसिस्को  Chronicle )  .  -  may  10 , 1989  .   —   may  9  ,   1989   )  , known  professionally  as Keith  whitley  , was  an  American country music singer  .
Whitley  's  brief career  in  mainstream country  म्यूज़िक  lasted from 1984 until his  मौत  in  1989  ,  लकिन   he  continues  to  influence an entire generation of  गायकों   और   songwriters  .
he   charted  19 singles  on  the Billboard  देश  charts  ,   सहित  five consecutive Number Ones :  ``  Do n't Close  अपना   आँखें   ``  , ``  जब   तुम   कह   nothing  at  सब  `` ,  ``   i  'm  no  Stranger to the Rain  ``  , `` I  अचरज  Do  तुम  Think of  me   ``  and `` It Ai n't Nothin ' `` ( the last two  मरणोपरांत   )  .
Statute  of  Grand Duchy of Lithuania , written  in  Polish
A  statute  is  a   औपचारिक  written enactment of a legislative authority  कि  governs  a  state , city ,  or  county  .
typically  , statutes command or  prohibit  something , or  घोषित   नीति  .
the   शब्द  is often used  to  distinguish  विधि  made by  विधान  bodies from  मामला   विधि   ,   decided  by  न्यायालयों  ,  और   regulations   जारी   by   सरकारी  agencies .
Statutes are  sometimes   referred   to   as   विधान   or  ``  ब्लैक   अक्षर  law .  ''
as  a source of  विधि   ,  statutes  हैं  considered primary  प्राधिकार  ( as opposed to  द्वितीयक  authority ) .
ideally  all statutes must be  in   सामंजस्य  with the  आधारभूत  law  of  the land  (  constitutional  )   .
This  शब्द   is   प्रयुक्त   in   contradistinction  to the common  विधि  .
statutes   acquire  their  फ़ोर्स   इससे   the  time of  उनके  passage ,  however  unless  वरना  provided .
statutes   हैं  of several  kinds   ;  namely , Public or private  .
Declaratory or  remedial   .
Temporary or  perpetual  .
A  अस्थाई   statute   is   एक   जिससे  is limited in  इसके  duration  at  the  समय  of its enactment .
it  continues in force  जबतक  the  समय   of   इसके  limitation  रै   समाप्त  ,  जबतक  sooner repealed .
A  perpetual  statute  is  one  लिये   the  continuance of which there is no  सीमित   समय  , although it may not be  expressly  declared  to   be  so .
If ,  however   ,  a  statute  which did not itself contain any  limitation   is   to   be   governed  by another  जिससे  is temporary only ,  the  former will  भी   be   अस्थाई   और  dependent upon the existence of  the   latter   .
Before a statute becomes  विधि  in some countries ,  it  must be  सहमत  upon  by  the  उच्चतम   कार्यपालिका   in  the  सरकारी   ,  and finally published  as  part of a code  .
In  अनेक   देशों  , statutes  हैं  organized in topical  इंतजाम  (  or  `` codified  ''  ) within  publications  called  कोड   ,  such as the  संयुक्त  States Code  .
in  many nations  statutory   विधि   is  distinguished from and  अधीनस्थ  to  संवैधानिक  law  .
The  बाह्य   iliac  arteries are two major arteries which bifurcate off the  आम  iliac arteries anterior to  the  sacroiliac  संयुक्त  of the pelvis .
वे   proceed   अग्रवर्ती  and inferior along the medial  किनारा  of  the  psoas  प्रमुख   मांसपेशियां  .
वे   निकास   the  pelvic  girdle   posterior  and inferior  to  the inguinal ligament  परिचय  one  तीसरा   laterally  from the insertion  पाइंट  of the inguinal ligament on the pubic tubercle at  जिससे  point they are referred  to   as   the   नैया  arteries .
the   बाह्य  iliac  धमनी   is   प्रायः  the artery used to attach the renal artery  to   the  recipient  of  a  गुर्दा  transplant  .
Steam  is  a  डिजिटल   वितरण  ,  डिजिटल  rights management ,  एकाधिक  and communications platform developed by  वाल्व  Corporation  .
It is used to distribute games and related  मीडिया  online  ,   इससे   छोटी  independent developers  to  larger  तन्त्र  houses  ;   in   अक्तूबर   2012  ,  वाल्व   विस्तारित  the service  to   शामिल   non-gaming  software  .
Steam provides the user  साथ  installation and  स्वचालित  management of software  आरपार   अनेक  computers , community  सुविधाएँ   ऐसे  as friends lists and  समूह   ,  cloud saving , and in-game voice and  गपशप   कार्यक्षमता  .
The  तन्त्र  provides a  freely   उपलब्धियाँ  application programming  इंटरफ़ेस   ,  Steamworks , that developers  can   लो   लाभ  of to integrate many of  भाप  's functions  भीतर  their  तन्त्र  products , including  नक़ल   सुरक्षा   ,   नेटवर्किंग  and matchmaking , in-game achievements  और  micro-transactions , and support  लिये   user-created   सामग्री  through  भाप   कार्यशाला   .
हालांकि  initially developed  लिये  use on  microsoft   खिड़कियाँ  , the  क्लाएंट   रै  expanded  to   शामिल   os  X  और  Linux versions ,  और  clients with  सीमित   कार्यक्षमता  on  the  PlayStation  3   कंसोल  and  लिये  both iOS  और  Android mobile  डिवाइस   .
in   जोड   to   होने   a  central hub for gaming  तन्त्र  , Valve has  निर्मित   a   संस्करण   of   भाप  with altered functionality  to  be  प्रयुक्त   in  schools  लिये  educational software , including a modified version  of  Portal  2   लिये  teaching science and critical  सोच  lessons  .
,  there  हैं  nearly 2000 games available  through  Steam , and 54 million active user accounts  .
as   of   जनवरी   2013  ,  भाप   रै  seen over 6.6  लाख  concurrent  खिलाड़ी   .
Steam has an estimated  50–70  % share of the digital distribution  मार्केट  for video  खेल   .
the   भाप   लोगो   is  a stylised left-side fly-crank and  लाठी   इससे  the Walschaerts valve gear  of   a  steam locomotive  .
Jerry  लुईस  (  born  March  16  , 1926 )  is   an  American comedian  ,  actor  ,  singer  ,   फिल्मी   निर्माता   ,   screenwriter   और   फिल्मी  director .
He is known  लिये  his slapstick humor  in  film , television ,  स्टेज   और  radio .
He  थी  originally paired up with Dean  मार्टिन  in 1946 , forming the  famed  comedy team  of  Martin and Lewis  .
In  जोड  to the  duo   's  popular nightclub  कार्य  ,  वे  starred in  a   कामयाब  series  of  comedy  films  for  सर्वोपरि  Pictures  .
लुईस   is  also known  लिये  his charity  fund-raising   telethons  and  स्थिति  as national chairman  लिये   the  Muscular Dystrophy Association (  mda   )   .
Lewis  रै  won several awards  लिये  lifetime  उपलब्धियाँ  from  the   अमरीकी  Comedy Awards , Los Angeles  फिल्मी  Critics Association , and  वेनिस  Film Festival , and  he  has  दो  stars  on   the  Hollywood  चलना   of   कीर्ति  .
In 2005 , he  प्राप्त  the  राज्यपालों  Award of  the  Academy  of  Television  कला   &  Sciences  फलक  of Governors  ,  which is  the   उच्चतम   एमी  Award presented .
On February 22  ,   2009   ,  the Academy  of   गति  Picture Arts  और   sciences  awarded  लुईस  the  जां   hersholt  Humanitarian Award  .
The Rhine (  ;  ; ) is  a  European  नदी  that runs  इससे   the  Swiss  कैण्टन  of Grisons in the  southeastern  Swiss Alps  through   जर्मनी   और  eventually flows  into   the  North Sea  coast  in the Netherlands and is  the  twelfth longest  नदी   in   यूरोपीय  , at about , with  an  average  निर्वहन  of more  than  .
the   राइन   और  the  डेन्यूब   formed   सबसे  of the northern inland frontier of  the  Roman Empire  और   ,  since  those   दिनों  , the Rhine  रै  been  a   vital  and  navigable  waterway carrying trade and goods  गहन  inland .
It  रै  also served as  a   रक्षात्मक  feature and has been the  आधार  for  क्षेत्रीय   और  international  सीमायें   .
The  अनेक  castles  और   प्रागैतिहासिक   fortifications   साथ   the  Rhine  गवाही  to its importance as a waterway .
River traffic could be  रोका  at  ये  locations , usually for the purpose  of  collecting tolls  ,   by  the state that controlled  कि  portion of the river .
श्री   (   सिंहली  )
श्री  ( Devanagari :  श्री  ,  iast  ; Śrī ) ,  भी   transliterated  as Sree or Shri  or  Shree is a word of Sanskrit origin  ,  used  in   the  Indian  उपमहाद्वीप   as  polite form  of  address equivalent to the  अंग्रेज़ी  `` Mr. '' in written  और  spoken language , or  as   a  title  of   veneration   लिये   deities   (  usually translated as `` Holy  ''  ) .
डिज़ाइन  of complex  structures  like the International Space  स्टेशन  needs in-depth  समझना  of  संरचनात्मक  Analysis  .
Civil engineering  is  a professional  अभियान्त्रिकी  discipline that  सौदे  with the  डिज़ाइन   ,  construction , and  मेंटेनेंस  of the  शारीरिक   और  naturally  निर्मित   पर्यावरण  , including works like roads ,  पुलों  ,  नहरों  , dams ,  और  buildings .
सिविल  engineering is the oldest  अभियान्त्रिकी  discipline  बाद  military  अभियान्त्रिकी   ,   और   it   थी   पारिभाषित   to  distinguish non-military  अभियान्त्रिकी  from  सैन्य   अभियान्त्रिकी   .
it   is  traditionally  टूटा   into  several  sub-disciplines  including environmental  अभियान्त्रिकी  ,  भूतकनीकी  engineering , geophysics , geodesy  ,   कंट्रोल  engineering  ,   संरचनात्मक   अभियान्त्रिकी  , biomechanics ,  nanotechnology   ,   परिवहन   अभियान्त्रिकी  , earth science , atmospheric sciences , forensic  अभियान्त्रिकी  , municipal  or  urban  अभियान्त्रिकी  ,  जल   संसाधन   अभियान्त्रिकी  ,  सामग्री  engineering ,  तटीय  engineering ,  सर्वेक्षण  , and construction engineering .
Civil  अभियान्त्रिकी  takes place on all  स्तर  : in  the  public  सेक्टर  from municipal  through   to   नेशनल   सरकारें   ,  and in the private sector from individual homeowners  through  to international  कंपनियाँ  .

Katherine Dunham (  जून   22   ,   1909   –  May 21 ,  2006  ) was an  अमरीकी   नर्तकी  , choreographer  ,   लेखक  ,  educator   ,  and social  activist   .
dunham   था   एक   of  the  सबसे   कामयाब   नृत्य  careers in American and  यूरोपीय  theater of the 20th century ,  और   निर्देशित  her own dance company for  अनेक  years .
She  रै  been  पुकारा   the   ``  matriarch and queen  माँ   of  black dance '' .
During her heyday in the  1940s   और  1950s  ,  Dunham was renowned  throughout   यूरोपीय   और   लैटिन   अमेरिका  and  थी  widely popular in  the   संयुक्त  States , where the Washington Post called her ``  नर्तकी  Katherine  the  Great  ''  .
लिये  almost  तीस  years she maintained the Katherine  dunham  Dance Company  ,   the   तभी  self-supported American  ब्लैक  dance  troupe  at  कि  time  ,  and over her long career  वो  choreographed more than ninety individual  dances  .
dunham   थी  an innovator in African-American  आधुनिक  dance as  खूब   as  a  नेता   in   the  field  of  dance anthropology ,  or   ethnochoreology   .
Sphagnum  is  a genus of  between   1510  and  3500  species of  mosses  , commonly called  peat  moss due  to  its prevalence in  गीला  habitats  जहाँ   it   contributes  to  the   गठन  of  peat   bogs  and mires .
sphagnum   accumulations   can   स्टोर  water , since both  जीना   और   मुर्दे   पौधे  can  थाम  large  quantities  of water  अंदर  their  कोशिकाएं  ;  पौधे  may hold from 16-26  टाइम्स   as   much  water as their  शुष्क  weight  depending  on  the  species  .
The empty  कोशिकाएं   सहायता   retain  water in  drier  conditions .
Hence  ,  as sphagnum  मॉस  grows , it  can  slowly spread into drier conditions ,  forming  larger peatlands ,  दोनो  raised bogs  और   कंबल  bogs .
ये   peat  accumulations then provide  आवास  for  a  wide array of peatland  पौधे  ,  सहित  sedges and ericaceous shrubs ,  as   खूब  as  orchids  and carnivorous plants  .
sphagnum  and the peat  formed  from  it   do   नहीं   क्षय  readily because of the phenolic  यौगिकों  embedded in  the   मॉस   's   कोशिका  walls .
In addition , bogs  ,  like all wetlands  ,  develop anaerobic soil  शर्तें   ,   जिससे   produces  slower  अवायवीय   क्षय  rather than aerobic  सूक्ष्मजैविक  action .
Peat moss can also acidify its surroundings by taking  up  cations , such  as   कैल्सियम   और  magnesium  ,   और  releasing hydrogen  ions  .
Under the  सही   शर्तें   ,   peat  can  accumulate   to  a depth  of   अनेक  meters .
अलग  species  of   sphagnum   have   अलग   सहिष्णुता   हद   लिये  flooding  और   ph  ,  so   कोई   एक  peatland  may  have a number  of  different  sphagnum  species .
Individual peat  मॉस  plants  consist  of a  प्रमुख  stem ,  साथ   tightly  arranged clusters  of   शाखा   fascicles  usually  consisting  of  दो  or  तीन  spreading  शाखाओं  and two  to  four  फांसी  branches .
the  top of the  संयंत्र  ,  or  capitulum  ,   रै  compact clusters  of  young branches .
Along the stem are scattered leaves of various  आकार  , named  स्टेम  leaves  ;  the shape varies according  to  species  .
the  leaves  consist   of   दो   kinds   of  cells  ;  small  ,   ग्रीन   ,   जीना   कोशिकाएं  (  chlorophyllose   कोशिकाएं  ) , and large ,  साफ  ,  संरचनात्मक   ,  dead cells ( hyaline cells )  .
The latter have  the   विशाल  water-holding capacity .
The earliest version  of  the Network  कार्ड  , issued manually rather  than  through an APTIS machine .
the   पहला  APTIS version  of  the Network Card .
This  थी   प्रयुक्त   इससे  the start  of  the APTIS era  in  1986/1987 until well  into  the  1990s   ,   as  stocks had  to  be  प्रयुक्त  up despite  the  introduction  of  the  new-look  orange-banded  संस्करण  in  1991  .
the  introduction of  the  weekday minimum fare  कंडीशन   in  2002 resulted in a minor change :  the  red  ``  R ''  shows  that this  is   the  ``  संशोधित   ''  version  of  the railcard .
This version  is  still  in  use  as   of  2007 .
The Network Railcard is  a   छूट  card introduced in  1986  by  अंग्रेजों  Rail , upon the  सृष्टि  of their  संजाल  SouthEast area around London  ,  England  .
the   कार्ड   is  intended  to   प्रोत्साहित   अवकाश  travel  by  rail  by  offering discounts  लिये  adults and accompanying  children   on   a  wide  दायरा  of off-peak  किराए   .
the   दायरा   of  discounts available , and the price of  the  card  ,   have   varied   चूंकि   कि  time , but the  कार्ड   रै  always  महरूम  valid  लिये  a year  's   असीमित   उपयोग   .
It can  be   खरीदा  by any  व्यक्ति  aged 16 or over from any staffed  नेशनल   रेल  station  or   रेल  Appointed Travel  एजेंट   ,   by  completing  an  application form - no photographic identification or other documentation is needed to buy or use the card .
it  is one of a  क्रमांक  of concessionary  किराया   योजनाएं  available on the  अंग्रेजों   रेल  system .
The United Nations ( UN  ;   फ्रेंच  : Organisation des Nations Unies  ,  ONU ) is  the   संसार  's largest ,  foremost   ,  and most  prominent  international organization .
The  stated  aims  of   the  United  राष्ट्र  include  promoting   और  facilitating cooperation in  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  law , international security  ,  economic development , social  प्रगति  ,  इंसान   अधिकारों   ,  civil rights  ,   सिविल  liberties , political freedoms ,  लोकतंत्र   ,   और  the achievement of lasting world  सलाम  .
The UN was  संस्थापित   in  1945 after World War II to replace  the   लीग  of  राष्ट्र  ,  to   रोकें  wars between  देशों  ,  और   to  provide  a  platform for dialogue .
It contains multiple subsidiary organizations  to  carry out  इसके   मिशन  .
at   इसके   founding  , the  un   था  51 member states ; as of  2011   ,  there are  193  .
From  इसके   कार्यालयों  around the world , the UN  और   इसके   specialized  agencies decide on substantive and administrative  मुद्दे  in  नियमित  meetings  आयोजित   throughout  the year .
the   संगठन  has six principal organs :  the   सामान्य   सभा  ( the  प्रमुख  deliberative assembly  )   ;   the  Security Council (  लिये  deciding  निश्चित  resolutions for  सलाम   और  security )  ;  the  आर्थिक  and Social  परिषद  ( for assisting in  promoting  international  आर्थिक  and  सोशल   सहयोग  and development ) ;  the  Secretariat ( for providing  अध्ययन  , information  ,   और   सुविधाएं   needed   by  the UN  )  ;  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   अदालत   of   इंसाफ   (  the primary  न्यायिक   अंग   )  ; and the  संयुक्त   राष्ट्र  Trusteeship  परिषद  (  जिससे  is  फिलहाल  inactive ) .
Other  prominent   un  System agencies include the World  स्वास्थ्य   संगठन  (  जो   )  , the World Food Programme  (   wfp   )   और  United Nations Children 's  निधि  (  यूनिसेफ   )   .
The  un  's  सबसे  prominent  स्थिति  is  कि  of the  दफ्तर  of  secretary-general  which  रै  been held  by   बैन   ki-moon  of  दक्षिण  Korea since  2007   .
the  United  राष्ट्र  Headquarters resides in international territory  in  New  यॉर्क   नगर  ,  साथ  further  प्रमुख  offices at  जेनेवा   ,  Nairobi  ,  and Vienna .
the   संगठन  is  financed   इससे  assessed and voluntary contributions  इससे   इसके  member  राज्य   ,   और  has six official languages  :  Arabic , Chinese ,  अंग्रेज़ी  , French , Russian  ,  and  स्पेनी   .
South  बीच  ,  भी   nicknamed  SoBe  ,   is   a  neighborhood in  the   नगर  of  मियामी  Beach ,  फ्लोरिडा  , United  राज्य  , located due  ईस्ट  of Miami city proper between  biscayne  Bay  और   the   अटलांटिक   समंदर   .
the   क्षेत्रफल   encompasses  all of the barrier  आइलैंड्स  of  मियामी  Beach south of Indian Creek .
इस  area  थी   the  first section  of   मियामी  Beach to  be  developed  ,  starting in the  1910s  ,  धन्यवाद  to  the   विकास  efforts of  कार्ल   G.  Fisher  ,  the Lummus Brothers  ,  and  जॉन  S.  कॉलिन्स  , the latter whose  निर्माण   of  the Collins Bridge provided the  पहला  vital  जमीन  link between mainland Miami  और  the beaches .
The  क्षेत्रफल  has  गए  through numerous artificial and  प्राकृतिक   परिवर्तन  over  the  years  ,   सहित  a  booming  regional  अर्थव्यवस्था  , increased  पर्यटन   ,  and  the  1926  hurricane  ,  जिससे  destroyed much  of   the  area .
as   of  2010  ,   परिचय   39,186   निवासियों  live  in  South  बीच   .
the  United States  अध्यक्षीय  election  of  1960  थी  the 44th quadrennial presidential  चुनाव  ,  आयोजित  on  मंगलवार   ,   नवम्बर  8 ,  1960  .
The Republican  पार्टी   मनोनीत   लाज़िम  Vice-President Richard Nixon , while the Democratic  पार्टी   मनोनीत   जॉन   F.   कैनेडी  ,  सीनेटर  from  मैसाचुसेट्स  .
The incumbent President  ,  Republican Dwight  D.  Eisenhower  ,   थी  not eligible for  re-election  after serving the maximum two terms  अनुमत  by  the  Twenty-second Amendment  .
Kennedy was  निर्वाचित  with  a  lead of 112,827 votes ,  or   0.17  % of the  लोकप्रिय   vote  ,  giving   उसे   a  victory of  303   to   219   in  the  चुनावी  College , the closest  चूंकि   1916   .
इस   थी  the  पहला   चुनाव  in which all fifty  of  the  वर्तमान  United States participated .
a   क्रमांक   of  factors explain  क्यों  the election was so close .
कैनेडी  gained  चूंकि  there was an  आर्थिक   मंदी   जिससे   ठेस  the incumbent Republican ,  और  he had the advantage  of  17 million  अधिक  registered Democrats than  republicans  .
furthermore   ,  the new votes that Kennedy  gained  among Catholics  लगभग   neutralized  the  नई   मत   निक्सन  gained among  protestants  .
Kennedy 's campaigning skills  decisively   outmatched   निक्सन  's .
In  the   समाप्त  , Nixon  's  emphasis on his experience carried little weight  ,   और  he  wasted   उर्जा  by  campaigning  in all 50 states instead of concentrating on  the  swing states  .
Kennedy used his  विशाल   ,  well-funded campaign organization  to  win  the  nomination  ,   सुरक्षित   समर्थन  , and  ,  with  the  aid of  the   पिछला   of   the   big-city  bosses ,  to  get  आउट   the  vote in  the  big  शहरों  .
He relied on  कार्यशील  mate Lyndon B.  जॉनसन   to  hold the South and  प्रयुक्त   टेलीविज़न  effectively .
इस   चुनाव  is  notable  as being  the   पहला   समय  in U.S. history  कि  two  बैठे  U.S  .   सीनेटरों  (  कैनेडी  and  जॉनसन  )  यहूद  elected as president  और  vice-president ,  a   घटना  that  रै  been  दोहराया  once ,  by   बराक  Obama and  जो  Biden  in  2008  (   in  both cases  ,  the  अध्यक्ष  was  the   younger  ,  अधिक  junior senator  )  .
a   पोस्टर  for a c. 1884  अमरीकी  production  of   मैकबेथ   ,  starring Thomas W.  keene  .
Depicted  ,   काउंटर  clockwise from  top-left  , are  :  Macbeth  और   banquo  meet the  witches  ; just  बाद   the   हत्या  of Duncan  ;  Banquo 's ghost ; Macbeth duels  macduff  ; and  मैकबेथ  .
Macbeth is a play written  by  William  शेक्सपियर   .
it  is  माना  one  of   उसके   darkest   और   सबसे   शक्तिशाली  tragedies .
Set in Scotland  ,  the play dramatizes the  corroding  psychological  और   राजनैतिक  effects produced when  इसके  protagonist , the Scottish lord Macbeth , chooses  दुष्ट  as the  रास्ता  to  fulfill   उसके   महत्वाकांक्षा  for  शक्ति  .
He  commits   regicide   to   become   किंग  and  तब   furthers  his moral descent  साथ  a  शासनकाल   of   murderous  terror to stay in  शक्ति   ,  eventually plunging the  देश   into   सिविल  war .
in  the  समाप्त   ,  he  loses   सबकुछ  that  देता  meaning  और  purpose to  उसके  life before losing  उसके   जीवन  itself .
The  खेल  is believed  to   have  been written between 1603  और   1607  ,  और  is most  commonly  dated 1606  .
the  earliest account of  a  performance of what  थी   संभवतः  Shakespeare  's   खेल   is   अप्रैल   1611  , when Simon Forman recorded seeing such a  खेल  at the  ग्लोब  Theatre .
It was  पहला  published in the  folio  of 1623 , possibly from a  संकेत  book  .
It was most  संभावित   लिखा  during the reign  of  James I , who had  महरूम  James VI  of  Scotland before he succeeded to  the   अंग्रेज़ी  throne in 1603 .
जेम्स   थी   a   संरक्षक  of Shakespeare’s  एक्टिंग  company  ,  and of  सब   the   plays  Shakespeare  लिखा  during James’s reign ,  मैकबेथ  most clearly reflects the playwright’s  संबंध  with the sovereign  .
मैकबेथ   is   shakespeare’s   shortest  tragedy ,  और   tells  the story  of  a brave Scottish  सामान्य  named Macbeth  जो   receives   a   prophecy  from a trio of witches that one day he will become  किंग  of  स्कॉटलैंड  .
खपत   by  ambition  और   spurred  to action  by  his  बीवी  , Macbeth murders King Duncan and takes  the  throne  लिये   खुद   .
उसके   शासनकाल  is racked with guilt and  paranoia  , and he soon becomes  a   tyrannical  ruler  as   he  is  मजबूर  to commit more and more murders  to  protect himself from  enmity  and  suspicion   .
the  bloodbath swiftly takes Macbeth  और   महिला  Macbeth into realms of arrogance  ,  madness , and death  .
Shakespeare  's  source for  the   त्रासदी  is the account of King Macbeth  of  Scotland  ,  Macduff ,  और  Duncan  in   holinshed   's   क्रॉनिकल्स  ( 1587  )  , a history  of   इंग्लैण्ड  , Scotland and Ireland  परिचित   to  Shakespeare  और   उसके  contemporaries , although  the  events  in  the play differ  extensively  from the history of the  रियल  Macbeth .
In the backstage  संसार  of  थिएटर   ,   कुछ   मानना   कि   the   खेल  is cursed , and  होगा  not mention its title aloud  ,  referring to  it   बजाय   as  ``  the   स्कॉटिश   खेल  ``  .
Over  the   कोर्स   of   अनेक  centuries  ,   the   खेल  has attracted  कुछ  of  the  most  प्रसिद्ध   अभिनेताओं   to  the roles of  मैकबेथ   और  Lady Macbeth  .
It  रै  been adapted to  फिल्मी  , television , opera , novels  ,  comic  किताबे  ,  और   अन्य  media .
the  Milton Hershey  स्कूल  is  a  private  परोपकारी   (  pre-K through  12   )   बोर्डिंग  school in Hershey ,  पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
originally   नामित   the  Hershey Industrial  स्कूल  , the institution was founded  और  funded by chocolate  उद्योगपति  Milton  snavely  Hershey and his wife ,  कैथरीन  Sweeney Hershey .
The school was  originally  established  लिये  impoverished  ,  healthy , Caucasian , male  अनाथ  ,  जबकि  today  it   serves  students of various backgrounds  .
the  Milton  hershey  School Trust , which funds the  स्कूल  ,  owns   controlling  interest in The Hershey Company and  owns  the  hershey  Entertainment  और  Resorts Company  (  HERCO ) which  oversees  many of the  क्षेत्रफल   होटल  along  साथ  a  थीम   पार्क  called Hersheypark .
साथ  over  छह   अरब  dollars in  एसेट  ,  the   मिल्टन  Hershey School is  एक   of   the  wealthiest  स्कूलों  in the world  .
the   स्कूल  is  overseen   by  a Board of  प्रबंधक  .
The school  फिलहाल   serves  1,818  विद्यार्थी  ,  और  plans to grow to  2,100  students by  2013  .
A member of CORE : Coalition for  आवासीय   शिक्षा   ,  it  is   the  largest residential  शिक्षा   कार्यक्रम  in the  us  .

The Controlled  substances  Act ( CSA )  थी   enacted  into law by  the  Congress of the United States  as   शीर्षक   ii   of  the  व्यापक  Drug  गाली  Prevention  और  Control Act  of   1970   .
the   सीएसए  is the federal U.S. drug policy  अंतर्गत  which the  manufacture  , importation  ,   कब्ज़ा  , use and distribution of certain  substances  is regulated .
The Act also served  as   the   नेशनल   implementing  legislation for the Single Convention on  narcotic   दवाएँ   .
The  विधान  created  पाँच  Schedules (  classifications   )   ,   साथ   varying  qualifications  लिये  a substance to  be   शामिल  in  प्रत्येक  .
Two federal agencies , the  ड्रग  Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug  प्रशासन  , determine which substances are  added   to  or removed from the various  schedules  , though  the  statute passed  by  Congress  निर्मित  the  आरंभिक   लिस्टिंग   ,  and Congress has  sometimes  scheduled other substances  through   विधान   ऐसे  as the  hillory   J.   farias   और   सामन्था   reid  Date-Rape Prevention Act  of   2000  , which  लगाई   गामा  hydroxybutyrate in Schedule  i   .  Classification  निर्णय  are  जरूरी  to be made on criteria including  संभावित   लिये  abuse  (   an  undefined term )  ,   फिलहाल   स्वीकृत  medical use in treatment  in  the United  राज्य  ,  और   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   treaties  .
Second-language  अधिग्रहण   or   second-language   सीखना   is   the  process  by   जिससे   लोगों   सीख  a  दूसरी   भाषा  .
second-language   अधिग्रहण  ( often abbreviated to  sla  ) also refers to  the  scientific discipline  devoted   to  studying  कि  process  .
दूसरी  language refers to any language  सीखे   in  addition  to  a person  's  first language  ;  although  the   अवधारणा   is   नामित  second-language acquisition ,  it  can also  चरितार्थ  the learning of third ,  चौथी  ,  or  subsequent languages .
Second-language acquisition refers  to   कया   learners  do ;  it  does not refer to  practices   in  language  शिक्षण   .
The academic discipline of  second-language  acquisition is  a  subdiscipline of applied linguistics  .
It is  broad-based  and relatively  नई  .
As  खूब  as  the  various branches of linguistics , second-language acquisition is also  closely   सम्बन्धित  to  मनोविज्ञान  ,  संज्ञानात्मक   मनोविज्ञान  , and  शिक्षा   .
to   पृथक  the academic  अनुशासन  from the learning process itself , the terms second-language acquisition research , second-language studies  ,   और  second-language acquisition studies  हैं  also  प्रयुक्त  .
SLA research began as an  interdisciplinary   फ़ील्ड  , and because of  इस   it   is   मुश्किल   to  identify  a   precise  starting  तिथि  .
however  , it  करता   appear   to  have developed a great deal  चूंकि  the mid-1960s .
The term acquisition was originally used to emphasize the  अवचेतन  nature of  the   सीखना  process , but in recent  सालो  learning and acquisition have  become  largely synonymous .
Second-language  अधिग्रहण  can  चरितार्थ  heritage language learning  ,  but  it  does  नहीं   प्रायः  incorporate bilingualism  .
Most SLA researchers see  bilingualism   as  being the  समाप्त   परिणाम  of  सीखना   a   भाषा   ,  not the  प्रक्रम   itself  ,  और  see the term  as  referring  to  native-like fluency .
लेखक  in  फ़ील्ड  such  as   शिक्षा  and psychology  ,  however , often use bilingualism  loosely  to refer  to  all  फ़ॉर्म  of  बहुभाषिकता  .
Second-language acquisition is also  नहीं  to  be   contrasted  with the  अधिग्रहण  of a  विदेशी  language ;  बल्कि   ,  the learning  of   दूसरी  languages and  the  learning of  विदेशी   भाषाएं   involve   the  same fundamental  प्रक्रियाओं  in different situations..
There  रै  been  much   बहस  about  exactly   कैसा  language is  सीखे   ,   और   अनेक  issues  हैं   स्टिल   अनसुलझे  .
वहीँ  are  अनेक   theories  of second-language  अधिग्रहण  , but  none   हैं  accepted as  a   पूरा   स्पष्टीकरण   by  all SLA  शोधकर्ताओं  .
Due  to   the   interdisciplinary  nature  of   the  field  of  second-language  अधिग्रहण   ,   इस  is not  अपेक्षित  to happen in the foreseeable  भविष्य  .
Forbes list of  अरबपतियों  is  an  annual  रैंकिंग   of  the  संसार  's wealthiest  लोगों  , compiled  और   प्रकाशित   by  Forbes , an  अमरीकी  national  कारोबार   पत्रिका   .
The total net worth of each individual  on  the list is  अनुमानित   ,  in United States dollars , based  on  their assets  और   हिसाब  for debt  .
The  सूची  only represents each person 's valuation  on   a   सिंगल  day , due to  रोज़  fluctuations among exchange rates and stock valuations .
The  संयुक्त  States Secret  सेवा  is  a   u.S.  federal  विधि   प्रवर्तन   एजेंसी  that is part  of  the United States Department  of  Homeland Security .
the   sworn   सदस्यों  are  विभाजित  among  the  Special  एजेंटों   और  the  uniformed  Division  .
Until  कूच  1 , 2003 , the Service was  भाग   of  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   विभाग  of the Treasury .
the  U.S.  रहस्य   सेवा  has two distinct areas of responsibility:
वित्तीय  Crimes , covering missions such as prevention and  छानबीन  of counterfeiting  of  U.S. currency  और   u.S.  treasury securities  ,  and investigation  of   प्रमुख   धोखाधड़ी  .
Protection , which entails ensuring the  सुरक्षा  of current and  पूर्व  national leaders  और  their families , such  as   the   अध्यक्ष  ,  पास्ट   राष्ट्रपतियों  ,  वाइस  presidents ,  अध्यक्षीय  candidates  ,  visiting  heads  of state , and foreign  embassies   (   प्रति  an agreement  साथ  the  u.S.   राज्य   विभाग   's   ब्यूरो  of Diplomatic  सुरक्षा  ( DS )  दफ्तर  of  विदेशी  Missions ( OFM ) , etc  .   )
The Secret  सेवा  's initial responsibility  थी  to  investigate  counterfeiting  of  U.S. currency ,  जिससे  was  अनियंत्रित  following the  u.S.  Civil War .
the  agency then evolved into the  संयुक्त   राज्य   '  first domestic  प्रज्ञा   और   counterintelligence   एजेंसी  .
अनेक  of the agency  's   मिशन   यहूद   बाद  taken  over  by  subsequent   एजेंसियों  such as the Federal  ब्यूरो  of  छानबीन   (   एफबीआई  ) , Bureau of Alcohol , Tobacco  ,  Firearms  और  Explosives  (  ATF  )  , Immigration and Customs  प्रवर्तन  ( ICE ) ,  और  Internal  आय   सेवा  (  irs  ) .
``  me  and  bobby   mcgee  ''  is  a  सोंग  written  by   क्रिस  Kristofferson  और  Fred Foster  ,  originally  performed  by  रोजर   मिलर   .
Others performed the  सोंग  later , including Kristofferson  खुद  , and  janis   joplin   जो  topped the U.S.  singles   चार्ट   साथ   the   सोंग  in 1971  बाद  her death , making  the  song  the  second posthumous  number-one  single in  u.S.  chart  इतिहास  after `` ( Sittin  '  On )  the  Dock of  the   खाड़ी  ``  by  Otis  redding   .
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or  ;  January 30 ,  1882  – April  12   ,  1945  )  ,  भी   ज्ञात   by   उसके   आद्याक्षर   ,  FDR , was  the  32nd  अध्यक्ष   of  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ( 1933–1945  )   और   a  central figure  in  world  कार्यक्रम  during the  mid-20th  century , leading the United  राज्य  during a  समय   of  worldwide economic  अवसाद   और  total  युद्ध   .
a  dominant leader  of   the  Democratic  पार्टी   और  the only American president  निर्वाचित  to more than  दो   शर्तें  , he  निर्मित  a New  सौदे  Coalition  कि  realigned  अमरीकी   राजनीती   बाद   1932  , as  उसके   घरेलू  policies defined American  उदारतावाद   लिये   the  middle third  of  the 20th  सदी   .
With the bouncy  लोकप्रिय  song `` Happy  दिनों  Are Here  again  ``  as   उसके  campaign theme , FDR defeated incumbent  रिपब्लिकन   हर्बर्ट   हूवर  in  नवम्बर  1932  ,   at   the   गहराई   of  the Great Depression .
Energized  by  his  निजी  victory  over   पोलियो   ,  FDR 's unfailing  आशावाद  and activism contributed to  a   नवीकरण  of the national spirit .
He worked  closely   साथ   अंग्रेजों  Prime Minister Winston Churchill  और  Soviet  सामान्य  Secretary  जोसेफ   स्टालिन   in  leading  the   allies  against Germany  और   जापानी  in World War  ii  , and restoring  समृद्धि  to  the  nation  's  economy  .
in  his  पहला   सौ   दिनों  in office ,  जिससे  began  कूच  4  ,  1933 , Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and  जारी  a profusion  of  executive  आदेश  that  instituted  the New  सौदे   —a   किस्में  of programs designed to produce relief  (  government jobs  लिये   the   बेरोजगार  ) , recovery  (   आर्थिक  growth )  ,  and reform  (   through  regulation  of   वॉल   गली   ,  banks and transportation  )  .
The  अर्थव्यवस्था  improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937  ,   लकिन   तब  relapsed into a  गहन   मंदी   .
The  bipartisan   रूढ़िवादी   गठबन्धन  that formed  in  1937  prevented   उसके  packing the Supreme  अदालत  or passing any considerable  विधान  ;  it   abolished   अनेक  of  the   राहत   कार्यक्रम   जब   बेरोजगारी   diminished  during World  युद्ध   ii  .
Most of the  regulations  on business were ended about 1975–85  ,  except for  the   विनियमन  of Wall Street  by   the  Securities and Exchange Commission , which  स्टिल  exists  .
साथ  with several  छोटी  programs , major surviving programs include the  संघीय   जमा  Insurance Corporation  ,  which was  निर्मित  in 1933 ,  और  Social Security , which Congress  passed   in  1935 .
As World War II loomed after  1938  , with  the  Japanese  आक्रमण   of  China  और   the  aggression  of   नाजी  Germany , FDR gave strong diplomatic  और  financial support  to  China  और  Great Britain ,  जबकि  remaining officially  न्यूट्रल  .
उसके  goal was to make America  the  `` Arsenal  of  Democracy `` which would  सप्लाई  munitions to the  allies  .
In March  1941  , Roosevelt ,  साथ  Congressional approval  ,  provided Lend-Lease aid to the countries fighting against  नाजी  Germany  साथ  Britain .
साथ   बहुत  strong  नेशनल  support  ,  he  बना  war on Japan and Germany after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor  on  December 7  ,  1941  ,   कॉलिंग   it   a  `` date which  होगा  live in  infamy  `` .
he  supervised the mobilization  of  the  u.S.  economy to support the  अलाइड   युद्ध   प्रयत्न   .
as   an   क्रियाशील   सैन्य  leader  ,  Roosevelt implemented an  overall  war  रणनीति  on  दो  fronts  कि   ended   in  the  शिकस्त  of  the  Axis  शक्तियां  and  the  development of the world 's first  अणु  bomb  .
In  1942   रूज़वेल्ट   ordered  the internment  of   100,000  Japanese  अमरीकी  civilians .
बेरोजगारी  dropped to 2  %   ,   राहत  programs largely  ended  ,  और  the industrial  अर्थव्यवस्था  grew  rapidly   to  new heights as  लाखो  of people moved to new jobs in war centers  ,   और   16  million  मेन   और  300,000 women  यहूद   drafted   or   volunteered   लिये   सैन्य  service .
Roosevelt dominated the American political scene not only during the twelve years of his presidency ,  लकिन  also  लिये  decades afterward  .
He orchestrated  the  realignment of  मतदाता  that  निर्मित   the  Fifth Party  प्रणाली  .
fdr  's New  सौदे  Coalition united  मजदूर   संघ   ,  big city machines , white ethnics , African Americans  और   ग्रामीण   श्वेत  Southerners .
he  also influenced the later  सृष्टि  of  the  United  राष्ट्र   और  Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is consistently  रेटेड  by  विद्वानों  as one  of  the top three U.S. Presidents  ,  along  साथ   अब्राहम   lincoln  and  जार्ज  Washington .
A  उदार  Democrat ,  रूज़वेल्ट  defined his  वैचारिक  position as  ``   a  little left of center . ''
Mara Salvatrucha  (  commonly  abbreviated  as  ms  , Mara  ,   और   ms-13   )   is  a  transnational   दण्ड  gang that originated in Los Angeles  और   रै  spread  to   अन्य   भाग  of the United  राज्य  ,  कनाडा   ,  Mexico  ,   और  Central  अमेरिका  .
The majority  of  the gang  is  ethnically  रचित   of   सेंट्रल  Americans  और  active  in   शहरी  and suburban  क्षेत्रों   .
in   the   u.S.  , the  ms-13  has  an  especially heavy presence  in   लॉस  Angeles County and  the   सैन  Francisco  खाड़ी   क्षेत्रफल  in Northern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ;   the  Washington  ,   d.C.  metropolitan areas  of  Fairfax County ,  वर्जिनिया  , Montgomery  काउंटी   ,  Maryland  ,   और  Prince  जार्ज  's  काउंटी  ,  मेरीलैंड  ; Long  द्वीप  ,  नई   यॉर्क   ;  the  बोस्टन  , Massachusetts  क्षेत्रफल   ;  Charlotte  ,   उत्तर   कैरोलिना   ;   और  Houston , Texas  .
वहीँ  is  भी  a presence of  ms-13  in Toronto , Ontario  ,   कनाडा  .
सदस्यों   of   ms  distinguish  themselves  by  टैटू  covering  the   देह  and also often  the  face  ,  as well as  the  use  of  their  अपना   चिह्न  language .
They are notorious  लिये   उनके  use  of  violence and  a   subcultural  moral code  कि   predominantly  consists of merciless revenge  और   बेदर्द   retributions  .
This  क्रूरता  of  the  distinguished members of  the   ``  Maras '' or `` Mareros  ''   अर्जित  them  a  path to be  recruited  by the  sinaloa  Cartel  battling  against Los Zetas in an  जारी  drug war south of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  border .
उनके  wide-ranging  क्रियाएँ  have drawn the attention of the  एफबीआई   और  Immigration  और   कस्टम  Enforcement  ,  who have  initiated  wide-scale raids  विरूद्ध   ज्ञात   और  suspected  गिरोह  members –  netting  hundreds of arrests  आरपार   the  country .
हड्डियों   is  an  अमरीकी  crime comedy-drama television series that premiered  on  the Fox network in  the  United States  on   सितंबर  13  ,  2005  .
The show is  आधारित  on  forensic   मानवशास्त्र   और  forensic archaeology  ,   साथ  each  एपीसोड  focusing on an FBI case file concerning  the   रहस्य  behind human  remains   brought   by   एफबीआई   खास  Agent Seeley  बूथ   (  David  boreanaz  ) to  the  forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance  ``  Bones  ''   ब्रेनन  ( Emily Deschanel )  .
The rest of the  प्रमुख   डाल  includes Michaela Conlin ,  T.   J.   thyne  ,  eric  Millegan  ,   tamara  Taylor  ,   जोनाथन   एडम्स  , and  जॉन  Francis Daley  .
निर्मित   by  Hart Hanson  ,  the  श्रेणी   is   बहुत  loosely based  on   the  life  और   कृतियाँ   of   उपन्यासकार  and forensic anthropologist Kathy Reichs ,  जो  also  produces  the  दिखाएँ  .
इसके   शीर्षक   अक्षर   ,  Temperance  ब्रेनन  , is  नामित  after the  समर्थक  of  reichs  ' crime novel  श्रेणी   .
Conversely , Dr. Brennan  writes  successful  रहस्य   novels  based  around  a fictional  (   in  the Bones universe ) forensic  anthropologist   नामित   कैथी  Reichs .
Bones is  a  joint production by  जोसेफसन   entertainment  , Far  फ़ील्ड   प्रोडक्शन्स  and 20th Century  फॉक्स   टेलीविज़न  .
The series  रै  completed airing its eighth season  और   रै   महरूम   नवीनीकृत   लिये  a ninth  ऋतु   .
Super  कटोरी   xxv  was  an   अमरीकी  football game  between  the American  फ़ुटबॉल   सम्मेलन  ( AFC  )  champion Buffalo Bills and  the  National  फ़ुटबॉल  Conference (  nfc  )  चैंपियन   नई  York  दिग्गज  to decide the  नेशनल  Football League  (  NFL ) champion for  the   1990   ऋतु  .
The Giants defeated  the  Bills by  the  score  of  20–19 , winning their second ever Super  कटोरी  .
It is the only Super  कटोरी   decided  by one point  .
The game was held at Tampa  स्टेडियम   in   tampa   ,  Florida  ,   on   जनवरी   27  , 1991  ,   दौरान  the height of the Gulf  युद्ध   .
it  was  यूँ  played under  much  patriotic  fervor  .
The proceedings  शामिल   a  rousing  rendition  of  ``   the  Star-Spangled Banner  ``  by Whitney  ह्यूस्टन  during  the   pregame   ceremonies  .
the  Bills and  उनके  explosive  no-huddle   ठोकर  were  बनाना  their first Super Bowl appearance  बाद   finishing  the  नियमित   ऋतु  with a 13-3  रिकार्ड   ,   और   अग्रणी  the league in total points  scored  with 428 .
in   advancing  to  उनके  second Super  कटोरी  ,  the  Giants also  posted   a   13-3  regular  ऋतु   रिकार्ड   ,   लकिन   साथ  a  ball-control  offense and a defense that allowed  a  league  कम  211 points .
The game  is   बेहतरीन  remembered for Bills placekicker  स्कॉट   नॉर्वुड  's  last-second   फ़ील्ड  goal  attempt   जिससे  went wide right  of   the   uprights  ,  अग्रणी   to  a Giants victory ,  और   starting  a  four-game  losing streak  in  the Super  कटोरी  for  the   बिल्स   .
The  दिग्गज  set  a  Super  कटोरी  record  पकड़कर  possession of the ball for 40 minutes and  33  seconds .
New York also  overcame  a 12-3 second-quarter  deficit   ,  and  बना  a 75-yard touchdown  ड्राइव  that  खपत   a  Super Bowl record 9:29 off  the   क्लॉक  .
Giants  कार्यशील   वापस   ottis  Anderson , who carried the ball 21  टाइम्स  for  102   गज  and one touchdown  ,  was named  सुपर  Bowl MVP .
He was the first awardee to receive  the  newly  नामित  `` Pete Rozelle Trophy '' ( named  लिये  the former commissioner ) .
एंडरसन  also recorded one  रिसेप्शन   लिये  seven yards .
Malcolm X  (  ; May 19  ,   1925february   21  , 1965 )  ,  born Malcolm Little and also  ज्ञात   as  El-Hajj  malik   el-shabazz  (  )  , was an African-American  मुस्लिम  minister and  इंसान   अधिकारों   activist  .
to   उसके   admirers  ,  he   थी   a  courageous advocate for the rights of  अश्वेतों   ,   a  man who  indicted   श्वेत  America in the harshest  शर्तें  for its crimes  विरूद्ध   ब्लैक  Americans .
Detractors accused him  of  preaching  जातिवाद  , black supremacy , and violence .
He  रै  been  पुकारा  one  of  the greatest and most influential  अफ़्रीकी  Americans in  इतिहास  .
Malcolm  x   's  father died—killed by white  supremacists  ,  it   थी  rumored—when  he   थी  young  ,  and  at  least one  of  his uncles was lynched .
When he  थी  13 , his mother was  लगाई  in a mental hospital  ,  and  he  was  लगाई  in a  श्रेणी   of  foster homes .
in  1946 , at  आयु   20   ,   he  went  to  prison for breaking  और   प्रवेश   .
in   थाना   ,  Malcolm  x  became  a  member of the Nation of  islam   ;  after his parole  in   1952   ,   he  quickly rose  to  become one  of   इसके  leaders  .
लिये   a  dozen  सालो   ,  Malcolm X  थी  the public face of the controversial group , but disillusionment with  स्वदेश  of Islam head  इलियास   मुहम्मद  led him  to   छोड़   the  Nation in March  1964  .
After a period  of  travel in Africa and the Middle East  ,   he   लौटे  to  the   संयुक्त  States ,  जहाँ  he  संस्थापित   मुस्लिम  Mosque  ,   inc.   और  the Organization of Afro-American  एकता   .
in  February 1965 ,  कम   than  a  साल  after leaving  the   स्वदेश  of  islam  , he was  assassinated  by three members of  the  group .
Malcolm X  's  expressed beliefs  बदला   substantially  over time .
as  a spokesman for  the   स्वदेश  of Islam he taught black  सर्वोच्चता  and advocated separation of black  और  white  अमेरिकी   —in  contrast to the  सिविल   अधिकारों  movement  's   जोर  on  संयोजन  .
After breaking with  the  Nation  of   islam   in   1964—saying   of  his association with  it  , ``  i   किया   अनेक   बाते  as a [ Black ] Muslim  कि   i  'm sorry  लिये  now  .
I was a  प्रेत  then  ...   pointed  in  a  certain  दिशा  and told  to   कूच  '' —and  बनने  a  सुन्नी  Muslim ,  he  disavowed racism and  expressed  willingness  to  work with  सिविल   अधिकारों   नेताओ  , he  जारी   to   emphasize   pan-africanism   ,  black self-determination , and  self-defense  .
the  third season of 90210 , an  अमरीकी  television series ,  premiered  on Monday September  13  , 2010  .
the  CW officially  नवीनीकृत   the   दिखाएँ  for  a  third season  on  February  16  , 2010 .

it  premiered  on  September  13   ,   2010  and was met with  generally   धनात्मक  reviews from critics  .
the  season picks up at the  समाप्त  of summer and  focuses  on  the  students senior year of high  स्कूल   .
It follows Adrianna 's  वृद्धि  to fame  ,  a new  संबंध  between Silver and Navid and a confused  टेडी   जो  decides  to   खुलासा   to   उसके   परिवार  and friends he  is   gay   .
It also deals with  the  aftermath  of   नाओमी  Clark  's   उत्पीड़न  .
Regular cast members  लिये   the  season  शामिल  Shenae Grimes  ,  Tristan  wilds  ,  annalynne  McCord ,  रयान   eggold  , Jessica Stroup  ,   माइकल  Steger  ,  Jessica Lowndes , Matt Lanter ,  गिलियन   zinser  , Trevor  डोनोवन  and Lori Loughlin .
रेबेका  Sinclair continued her role as  कार्यपालिका  producer for  the  season .
The season  premiered   to  1.96 million viewers  और  a 0.9 rating in the adults  18–49  demographic .

The  ऋतु  finale  aired  on  may   16   ,  2011  .

it   थी  released on DVD in  the  United States on August  30  ,  2011   .
Elizabeth  ii  ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ;  born  21 April 1926 ) is  the   संवैधानिक   monarch  of 16  sovereign   राज्य   ,   ज्ञात   as  the Commonwealth realms  ,  and their  territories   और   dependencies  , and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations .
She  is  Supreme  राज्यपाल  of the  गिरिजाघर  of England  और  , in some of her realms , carries  the  title of  defender   of  the Faith  as  part of  उसके   पूरा  title .
On  उसके  accession  on  6 February  1952   ,  Elizabeth became  सिर  of  the  Commonwealth and  महारानी   regnant   of  seven  स्वतंत्र   राष्ट्रमंडल   देशों  :  the  United Kingdom  ,  Canada  ,  Australia , New Zealand  ,  South Africa  ,   पाकिस्तानी  and Ceylon  .
From 1956 to  1992  ,  the   क्रमांक  of  उसके   realms   varied  as territories gained  स्वतंत्रता   और  some realms became republics  .
At present ,  in   जोड   to   the  first  चार  aforementioned countries  ,   एलिज़ाबेथ   is  Queen of  जमैका   ,  Barbados , the Bahamas ,  हरा   ,  Papua New  गिनी  , the Solomon  आइलैंड्स   ,  Tuvalu  ,  Saint Lucia  ,  Saint  विंसेंट  and the Grenadines  ,   बेलीज़   ,   अण्टीगुआ  and  बारबूडा  and Saint  किट्स  and  नेविस  .
उसके  reign  of  years  is  currently the second longest for a British monarch  ;   तभी  Queen Victoria has reigned  longer  at over 63  सालो   .
Elizabeth  थी   born  in London and educated  privately   at  home  .
उसके  father acceded to the throne  as  George  vi   in  1936  on   the  abdication of  उसके   bhai  Edward VIII , from which time  वो   थी   the   वारिस  presumptive  .
वो  began  to   undertake   पब्लिक   कर्तव्य  during the  दूसरी  World  युद्ध   ,  in which  वो  served in  the   auxiliary  Territorial  सेवा  .
In 1947 , she  शादीशुदा   प्रिंस  Philip  ,   ड्यूक  of  एडिनबर्ग  ,  साथ  whom she has  चार   children  :  चार्ल्स   ,  Anne  ,   एंड्रयू   ,  and Edward  .
उसके  coronation service took place in  1953   और  was the  पहला  to  be  televised  .
the   महारानी  's many  ऐतिहासिक   विज़िट  and meetings include  a  state visit  to   the   गणतंत्र   of   आयरलैंड  and  reciprocal  visits to  और  from  the  Pope .
the  Queen has  देखी  major constitutional changes  in   उसके  realms , such as  devolution   in  the United  किंगडम  and the  patriation  of the Canadian  संविधान  .
टाइम्स   of   निजी  significance  have   शामिल  the  births  and  विवाह  of her children ,  the  births of  उसके  grandchildren ,  the  investiture  of   the  Prince  of  Wales ,  और  the  जश्न   of   माइलस्टोन  such as her  चांदी  , Golden , and Diamond Jubilees in 1977  ,  2002  ,   और   2012  ,  क्रमशः   .
Major  कार्यक्रम  in the  महारानी   's  reign  have   शामिल  the  परेशानियों   in   उत्तरी  Ireland  ,  the  falklands  War , wars  साथ  Iraq and the War in  अफगानिस्तान  .
There have  महरूम   टाइम्स  of personal  विषाद  for her  जिससे  include the  मौत   of  her  पिता  at 56 ,  the  assassination  of   प्रिंस   फिलिप   's  uncle  ,  Lord  माउंटबेटन   ,  the  विश्लेषण   of   उसके  children 's marriages  in   1992   (  a year deemed  उसके  annus horribilis )  ,   the   मौत  in  1997  of her former daughter-in-law , Diana , Princess of Wales , and  the   मौतों   of   उसके   माँ   और   सिस्टर  in 2002 .
The Queen has  occasionally   faced  severe press criticism of the  royal  family and republican sentiments , but  support  for the  साम्राज्य  and  उसके  personal popularity remain high  .
the   2010  United  राज्य  Senate  चुनाव   in   फ्लोरिडा  took place on  नवम्बर  2  ,  2010 along with  अन्य  elections  to   the  United States  सीनेट  in other states as well  as   सब  elections to  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  House  of  Representatives and various state and  लोकल   चुनावों  .
रिपब्लिकन  Marco  rubio   ,  former Speaker of the Florida  हाउस  of Representatives , defeated independent  चार्ली  Crist and Democrat Kendrick Meek  in   a  three-way  रेस   .
एक  term  सीनेटर  Mel Martinez  थी   निर्वाचित   in  a  बहुत  close  रेस   विरूद्ध  Democrat Betty  अरंडी   in   2004   साथ   49  % of the  vote   .
Martinez  घोषित  on  दिसम्बर   2   ,  2008  कि   he  would not seek  re-election  to  the  Senate , and  होता  resign prior  to  the  समाप्त  of  उसके  term .
In August  2009  , Governor Charlie  crist   घोषित  that  he   होता   नियुक्त   उसके  former Chief of  स्टाफ  , George LeMieux , a  रिपब्लिकन  ,  to  the  सीनेट  seat  होने  vacated by Martinez  .
राज्यपाल  Crist  सरेआम  announced  he   थी  running for the seat in mid-2009 .
At the time he  प्राप्त  many  रिपब्लिकन  endorsements  ,  such  as  the  नेशनल  Republican Senatorial  कमेटी   ,  Martinez ,  और  the 2008  रिपब्लिकन  presidential  nominee  John  मैक्केन   .
His  support  of the  अमरीकी  Recovery and  reinvestment  Act  of   2009  hurt his  लोकप्रियता   among   conservatives   ,  and  प्रत्याशी  Marco  rubio  surged  .
in   अप्रैल  2010  crist  announced  he  would drop  आउट  of  the  Republican primary  और   चलाएं  as an independent  .
The  नेशनल  Republican Senatorial  कमेटी  withdrew  इसके  endorsement  of  Crist  और  demanded  a   refund  of its  अभियान   निधि  that it  provided  for the Crist  अभियान  .
Congressman Kendrick Meek  थी  the  पहला   डेमोक्रेट   to   घोषित   उसके  intention to run .
Alexander  snitker   थी   the  first member of  the  Libertarian Party on  the   बैलट   लिये   सीनेटर   in  Florida  's  history  .
Satellite  दृश्य  of Doha
दोहा   (  , '  or   '   ,   वस्तुतः   :   ``   the  big  पेड़  '' )  is   the  capital  नगर   of   the   राज्य   of   क़तर   .
स्तिथ   on   the   coast  of the  पारसी   गल्फ   ,
it  था   a  population of  998,651  in  2008  , and  is   भी  one  of  the municipalities  of  Qatar .
Doha  is   क़तर  's largest  नगर  ,  साथ  over 60  %   of  the  स्वदेश  's  जनसांख्यिकी  residing in Doha or  इसके   surrounding   उपनगरों  ,  और  is also  the  economic centre of the country  .
दोहा  also serves  as  the  सीट  of  सरकारी  of Qatar  ,  which is ruled  by  Sheikh  हमद  bin Khalifa Al  थानी  .
Doha is  घर  to  the  Education  नगर  ,  an  area  devoted  to  शोध  and  शिक्षा  .
Doha was the site of the first ministerial-level meeting of the Doha Development Round of World  व्यापार  Organization negotiations  .
the  city of Doha  आयोजित  the  2006   एशियाई   खेल   ,  which  थी  the largest  एशियाई  Games ever held  .
दोहा   भी  hosted the 2011  पण   अरब  Games and most of  the   खेल  at the  2011  AFC  एशियाई   कप  .
दोहा   hosted   the  UNFCCC  जलवायु   negotiations   (  COP 18  )  December 2012 and  होगा  host a  विशाल   क्रमांक   of   the   venues  for  the  2022 FIFA World Cup  .
the  World Petroleum Council held the 20th World Petroleum Conference  in  Doha in December 2011 .
paranasal   साइनस  are  a  group  of  four paired  air-filled   स्पेसेस   कि   घेर  the nasal cavity ( maxillary sinuses  )  , above  the  eyes ( frontal sinuses  )  , between  the  eyes ( ethmoid  साइनस  )  ,  and  पीछे   the  ethmoids ( sphenoid sinuses  )   .
The sinuses  हैं  named for  the   फेशियल   हड्डियों   in   जिससे  they are located .
Lean  निर्माण  , lean enterprise ,  or  lean  उत्पादन  ,  प्रायः   बस  , `` Lean ,  ''  is  a  production practice  कि   considers  the expenditure of resources for  कोई  goal other than the  सृष्टि  of  मान   लिये   the   समाप्त  customer  to   be   अपव्यय  ,  और  thus a target for elimination .
working   इससे   the  perspective of  the  customer  जो   consumes   a   उत्पाद   or  service  ,   ``  value '' is  पारिभाषित  as  कोई   कार्रवाई   or   प्रक्रम  that a customer  होता   be   willing   to   अदा  for .
essentially   ,  lean  is   केन्द्रित   on   preserving  value  साथ  less  कार्य   .
Lean  निर्माण  is a management philosophy derived mostly from the Toyota  उत्पादन  System  (  TPS )  (  hence  the  term Toyotism is  भी  prevalent  )  and  पहचाना   as  `` Lean '' only  in  the 1990s .
TPS is renowned for  इसके  focus on reduction of  the  original  टोयोटा   सात   wastes  to improve overall  ग्राहक   मान  , but  वहीँ  are  varying   perspectives  on how  इस  is  बेहतरीन  achieved  .
the  steady growth of  टोयोटा   ,  from  a   छोटी   कम्पनी   to   the  world 's  largest   automaker   ,  has focused attention on  कैसा  it  रै   हासिल  this success  .
icarly  logo
iCarly is an  अमरीकी   sitcom  that airs on Nickelodeon  ,  which  premiered  on  सितंबर   8   ,  2007 .
Nickelodeon promoted  अनेक  episodes so  दूर  such  as   ``  iDo  ''  , `` iHire  an   idiot  ''  ,   ``  iPity the Nevel '' ,  ``   idate   sam  &  फ्रेडी  ''  ,   इत्यादि  .  as  specials ,  despite   उनके  being regular episodes  .
प्रत्येक  episode title begins with  a  lower case i  जिससे  represents the internet  ,   as   in  ``  icarly   ''  .
the  show was  मनोनीत  for  an   एमी   पुरस्कार  for Outstanding Children 's  कार्यक्रम  in  2009  .
The  श्रेणी  starring  मिरांडा  Cosgrove as  कार्ली   शे   ,  a 13-year-old who becomes an Internet  स्टार   .
The series ended on November  23  , 2012  साथ  the one-hour  खास  episode  ``  iGoodbye  ''  .
a  total of  7   सीज़न  and  109   एपीसोड  were broadcast .
the   largest  audience of the series was 11.2 million viewers , with  the  special episode  ``   isaved  Your Life '' premiered in January 2010  .

westlife  were an  आयरिश   लड़के   बैंड  which  formed   in  1998 and disbanded in  2012  .
Originally  हस्ताक्षरित   by  Simon  cowell   और  managed  by  Louis Walsh  ,  the  समूह   's   फाइनल   line-up  consisted of  nicky  Byrne  ,  Kian  egan   ,  Mark Feehily  और  Shane Filan  .
Brian McFadden  थी  a  सदस्य   इससे   1998  until his departure in 2004 .
westlife   बेची   over  50 million  रिकॉर्ड  worldwide ,  a  total that  शामिल   स्टुडियो  albums  ,  singles , video  रिलीज   ,  and compilation albums .
The group accumulated 14 number-one singles  in   the   संयुक्त   किंगडम  ( the third-highest in UK  इतिहास  )  ,   tying   साथ   चट्टान  Richard  और  ranking just  पीछे  The Beatles  और   एल्विस   प्रेस्ली   .
वे  achieved a total of 26  शीर्ष  ten singles over their 14-year  करियर  .
by   2010  , Westlife  थी   सूचीबद्ध   in  the Guinness World Records ,  as   the   uk   's   top-selling   एल्बम  group  of  the  21st   सदी  .
They  भी  won The  रिकार्ड   of   the  Year  (   the  only  म्यूज़िक  award based  on  public votes  in   the  UK )  a  record-breaking  चार  times and in  2012  , the  आधिकारिक   चार्ट   कम्पनी   सूचीबद्ध  Westlife  34th  amongst  the  biggest-selling  singles  artists in British music history  .
despite   उनके   यूरोपीय  and  एशियाई  success , Westlife never managed to break  into   the   u.S.   मार्केट  ,  achieving  only one hit  सिंगल  in  2000   :   ``  Swear  it  Again `` .
in  October  2011  , Westlife announced their intention to split  in   2012   ,  following their Greatest  हिट्स   दौरे  and  the   रिलीज  of their Greatest  हिट्स  album  .
The boyband  's  final concerts were  आयोजित  on  22   और   23  June 2012  at   croke  Park Stadium in Dublin  .
