Vitamin  a  is a group  of  nutritionally  असंतृप्त  hydrocarbons , which include retinol  ,  retinal , retinoic acid  और  several  provitamin  A carotenoids  among  which  beta-carotene  is  the  most  महत्वपूर्ण  .
विटामिन   a  has  अनेक   कृत्यों   ,  it  is   महत्वपूर्ण  for  विकास   और  development  ,  for the  मेंटेनेंस  of  the   प्रतिरक्षा   प्रणाली  and  शुभ   दृष्टि   .
Vitamin A is needed  by   the   retina  of  the  eye in the form of retinal  ,  which combines with protein  opsin   to  form  rhodopsin   the   light-absorbing   अणु  ,  कि  is necessary for  दोनो  low-light (  scotopic  vision ) and  रंग   दृष्टि  .
Vitamin  a  also functions in a  बहुत  different  भूमिका   as  an  irreversibly  oxidized form of retinol known as retinoic  एसिड   ,  which is  an   महत्वपूर्ण  hormone-like  विकास   फ़ैक्टर  for  epithelial  and other  कोशिकाएं  .
in   भोजन   of  animal origin  ,  the major  रूप  of vitamin  a   is   an   ester  , primarily retinyl palmitate , which is  परिवर्तित  to retinol ( chemically an  दारू   )   in  the  छोटी  intestine  .
The retinol form functions  as  a  भंडार  form of the vitamin ,  और  can be converted to and from its  visually  active aldehyde form  ,  retinal .
the   संबद्ध  acid (  retinoic  acid ) , a  metabolite  that can  be  irreversibly synthesized from vitamin A  ,   रै  only partial  विटामिन  A activity ,  और   करता  not function  in   the  retina  लिये  the  विज़ुअल   साईकिल   .
retinoic   एसिड  is  प्रयुक्त  for  विकास  and cellular  differentiation  .
All forms of vitamin A  have  a  beta-ionone   रिंग  to  जिससे   an  isoprenoid chain  is  attached ,  पुकारा  a  retinyl   समूह  .
Both  संरचनात्मक  features are essential  लिये   विटामिन  activity .
the  orange  रंजक  of  गाजर  – beta-carotene – can be  represented  as two connected  retinyl   समूह  , which are  प्रयुक्त   in   the   देह   to  contribute  to   विटामिन  A  स्तर  .
Alpha-carotene  और  gamma-carotene  भी   have   a   सिंगल   retinyl  group  ,   जिससे   दे  them some vitamin activity .
None  of  the  अन्य   carotenes   have  vitamin  कार्यकलाप  .
The  carotenoid  beta- cryptoxanthin possesses  an  ionone  समूह   और   रै  vitamin activity in  इंसानो  .
Vitamin A  can   be   मिला   in   दो  principal forms  in  foods :
Retinol , the form  of  vitamin A  अवशोषित   जब  eating  एनिमल  food sources  ,  is a yellow  ,   fat-soluble  substance .
Since  the  pure alcohol form is unstable  ,  the  विटामिन  is found  in  tissues in a  रूप  of  retinyl   ester  .
It is  भी  commercially  उत्पादित   और  administered  as  esters  ऐसे   as   retinyl  acetate  or  palmitate .
the   carotenes  alpha-carotene ,  beta-carotene   ,  gamma-carotene ;  और   the  xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin  (   सब  of  जिससे  contain  beta-ionone   बजती  ) ,  लकिन  no  अन्य   carotenoids  ,  फलन  as  provitamin  A in herbivores and omnivore animals , which  possess   the   एंजाइम  ( 15-15'-dioxygenase  )   जिससे   cleaves  beta-carotene in  the   intestinal  mucosa and  converts  it  रेटिनॉल   .
In general  ,  carnivores are poor converters  of  ionine-containing carotenoids  ,  and pure carnivores such as cats and  ferrets   कमी  15-15'-dioxygenase and  can  not convert  कोई  carotenoids  to  retinal (  resulting  in none of  the   carotenoids   होने   फ़ॉर्म  of  विटामिन  A for these  प्रजाति  ) .
सेलिना  Marie  गोमेज़  (  born   जुलाई   22  , 1992 ) is an American  सिंगर   और   अभिनेत्री  .
She made  उसके   डेब्यू  as a  चाइल्ड  actress in Barney  &   मित्रों  .
In  2007  , Gomez  आए  to prominence as a  अभिनीत   डाल   सदस्य  in  the  television series Wizards  of   waverly   प्लेस  .
She signed to Hollywood  रिकॉर्ड   the  following year ,  और  became  the  founder  और   सीसे  singer  of  the pop band Selena Gomez  &   the  Scene .
उनके  studio  एल्बम   चुंबन  &  बताना   (  2009 )  ,  A Year Without Rain (  2010  ) , and When  the  Sun Goes Down (  2011  )  यहूद  certified  सुनहरा   by   the  Recording Industry Association of  अमेरिका  (  riaa  ) and  have  spawned Platinum-certified singles `` Naturally ``  ,   ``  Who Says  ``  ,  और   ``   प्रेम  You like a Love  सोंग  `` .
बाद   the  release  of  television films and their accompanying  soundtracks  ,  गोमेज़   बना   उसके  theatrical  फिल्मी   डेब्यू   in  Ramona and  beezus  in 2010 and starred in Monte Carlo  in  2011  .
upon  the  निष्कर्ष  of Wizards of Waverly Place and  the  hiatus  of  Selena  गोमेज़  & the Scene  in   2012  , she focused on  उसके  film career , serving as a voice  अभिनेत्री  in Hotel  transylvania   और   अभिनीत   in   वसन्त   ब्रेकर्स   the  following  साल   .
Her debut solo album is  tentatively   अनुसूचित  to be  released  in summer 2013 , and  is   preceded   by   इसके  lead single  ``   आइये   &  Get It ``  .
बाहर   of  her work in the entertainment industry ,  गोमेज़   is  involved  in  philanthropic activities through charity  कार्य   और  various social and environmental causes .
Tracie Monique Spencer  (   born   जुलाई  12  ,   1976  ) is an  अमरीकी   r  & B  और  pop  singer-songwriter  , actress , and model  .
Sacramento is  the   पूंजी  city  of  the U.S.  राज्य   of   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  and the  सीट   of  government of Sacramento County .
It is  स्तिथ   at  the confluence of  the   sacramento  River and the  अमरीकी   नदी  in the  उत्तरी   portion  of California  's  expansive  सेंट्रल   घाटी  .
With an  अनुमानित  2011  जनसांख्यिकी  of 477,891 , it is  the  sixth-largest  नगर   in   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  and  the   35th   largest   नगर   in  the United  राज्य  .
Sacramento is the core cultural  और  economic center  of  the Sacramento  महानगर  area  जिससे   शामिल   सात  counties with an  अनुमानित   2009  population of 2,527,123 .
Its  महानगर  area is the fourth largest in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  after the  वृहद  Los  एंजिल्स  Area , San  फ्रांसिस्को   खाड़ी   क्षेत्रफल  ,  और  the  सैन   डिएगो   महानगर  area ,  as  well as the  25th  largest in  the   संयुक्त  States .
sacramento  was  cited  by Time magazine as  अमेरिका  's most  ethnically  and racially integrated city in  2002   .
Sacramento became a  नगर  through  the   प्रयत्न   of  the  स्विस  immigrant  जॉन  Sutter  ,  Sr. , his  बेटे  John  sutter   ,   jr.   ,  and James  W.  Marshall  .
sacramento  grew quickly  धन्यवाद  to  the  protection  of  Sutter  's   फोर्ट  , which was established by Sutter in 1839  .
दौरान   the  California Gold Rush  ,  Sacramento  थी  a major  वितरण  point ,  a  commercial  और   agricultural  center  ,  and a terminus  लिये  wagon trains , stagecoaches ,  riverboats  ,  the  telegraph , the  टट्टू  Express  ,   और   the   पहला  Transcontinental Railroad .
California State University  ,  Sacramento ,  अधिक   commonly   ज्ञात   as  Sacramento  राज्य  or  सैक   राज्य  , is  the  largest  लोकल  university .
it  is one of  the   twenty-three  campuses of the California State  विश्वविद्यालयों   प्रणाली  .
Drexel  विश्वविद्यालयों  Sacramento  is  located  in  Downtown , Sacramento .
University of the  प्रशांत   's  McGeorge School  of  Law  is  located  in   the   ओक   पार्क  neighborhood  .
In addition  ,  the University of California , Davis  is  located in  आसपास  Davis , west of  the   पूंजी   .
The  uc   डेविस   चिकित्सा   बीच  ,  a  world-renowned research hospital ,  is  located in the  नगर  of  sacramento  .
Memorial Day is  a   संयुक्त  States federal holiday  जिससे   occurs  every year  on  the final Monday  of  May .
Memorial Day is a day  of   remembering  the men and  महिलाओं  who died while  सेवारत   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  Armed Forces  .
formerly  known  as   सजावट   दिन  ,  it   originated  after the  अमरीकी  Civil  युद्ध  to commemorate the  संघ   और  Confederate soldiers who died in  the  Civil  युद्ध   .
By  the   20th  century Memorial  दिन  had been  विस्तारित   to  honor  सब  Americans who have died in  सब  wars  .
It typically marks  the   प्रारंभ   of  the summer vacation season  ,   जबकि   मजदूर  Day  marks  its end .
Many  लोगों  visit cemeteries and memorials ,  विशेषकर  to  सम्मान   those   जो  have died in military service .
अनेक  volunteers place  an  American  ध्वज  on each grave in national  कब्रिस्तान   .
by   the  early  20th  century , Memorial  दिन  was  an  occasion for  अधिक  general  expressions   of  memory  ,  as  लोगों  visited  the  graves of their deceased relatives in church  कब्रिस्तान  ,  whether   वे   था   परोसा  in  the  military  or  not .
it  also  became   a  long  वीकेंड  increasingly  devoted   to  shopping , family gatherings  ,  fireworks ,  यात्राएँ   to   the  beach  ,   और  national media  कार्यक्रम  .
सालाना   सजावट  Days for particular  कब्रिस्तान  are  आयोजित  on a Sunday in late  वसन्त  or early summer  in  some rural areas of the  अमरीकी  South , notably in  the  mountains  .
In  मामले  involving  a   परिवार   graveyard   जहाँ  remote  पूर्वजो  as  खूब  as  those  who were deceased more recently are buried  ,  this may take  on  the character of  an   विस्तारित   परिवार  reunion to which  कुछ  people travel  सैंकड़ों  of miles  .
People gather on  the  designated day and put flowers on graves  और  renew  सम्पर्क  with kinfolk  और  others  .
वहीँ   प्रायः  is  a  religious service and  a  ``  डिनर   on   the   मैदान  , '' the traditional term  लिये  a  potluck  meal  in  which people used  to   स्प्रेड  the dishes out on sheets  or  tablecloths on the grass  .
it   is   believed   कि  this practice began  पहले  the  अमरीकी   सिविल  War  और   यूँ   may   प्रतिबिंबित   the  real origin of the  ``   मेमोरियल  day ''  विचार   .
मेमोरियल   दिन  is not  to  be  उलझन   साथ   दिग्गजों   दिन  ; Memorial  दिन   is   a  day of remembering  the  men and women  जो  died while  सेवारत  ,  जबकि   दिग्गजों   दिन   मनाता  the  सेवा   of   सब   u.S.   सैन्य  veterans  ,   जीना   or  dead .
Mt  .  Zion Church state history  मार्कर   निकट  Philadelphia , Mississippi  .
स्वतंत्रता   गर्मियाँ  ( also  ज्ञात  as  the  Mississippi Summer Project  )   थी   a  campaign  in  the United States  शुभारम्भ   in  June 1964  to  attempt  to  register as  अनेक  African  अमरीकी   मतदाता  as possible  in  Mississippi  ,   जिससे   था  historically  excluded  most  अश्वेतों  from  मतदान   .
The  प्रोजेक्ट   भी  set  up  dozens of Freedom Schools ,  स्वतंत्रता   घरों  ,  और   जातियाँ  centers  in  small towns throughout Mississippi  to  aid the  लोकल  black  जनसांख्यिकी  .
The project was  व्यवस्थित   by   the  Council of Federated Organizations ( COFO ) , a coalition  of  the Mississippi  शाखाओं  of the four major civil rights organizations ( SNCC , CORE  ,   naacp  and SCLC  )  .
सबसे  of  the  impetus  ,  leadership , and financing for  the   गर्मियाँ  Project  आए   इससे  the  sncc  .
Robert  parris   मूसा  ,  sncc  field secretary and  co-director   of   cofo   ,   निर्देशित  the summer  प्रोजेक्ट  .
ब्लूज़  is the  नाम   दिए  to  दोनो  a musical form and  a  music  विधा   कि  originated in communities of  primarily  the ``  गहन  South  ``  of the United  राज्य   around  the end of the 19th century from  spirituals  ,  कार्य   गीतों  ,  फ़ील्ड  hollers , shouts and  chants  ,  और  rhymed simple narrative  ballads  .
the  blues form , ubiquitous in  जैज़   ,  rhythm  और   ब्लूज़  , and rock  और  roll is characterized by specific chord progressions  ,   of  which  the   twelve-bar  blues  कॉर्ड   progression   is   the   सबसे   आम   .
the   ब्लू   टीप   कि  , for  अर्थपूर्ण  purposes  हैं   सुंग   or  played flattened  or   धीरे   झुकी  (  नाबालिग  3rd to major  3rd  )  in  relation  to   the   पिच  of  the   प्रमुख  scale  ,   हैं   भी  an important  भाग  of the sound  .
the   ब्लूज़  genre  is   आधारित  on the  ब्लूज़  form but possesses other characteristics  ऐसे   as  specific  गीत   ,  bass lines , and instruments  .
ब्लूज़  can  be  subdivided  into  several subgenres ranging from country to  शहरी  blues  कि  were more  or  less  लोकप्रिय  during  अलग  periods  of   the   20th   सदी  .
Best  ज्ञात  are the Delta , Piedmont , Jump  ,  and  शिकागो  blues  शैलियाँ  .
World  युद्ध   ii  marked  the   परिवर्तन   इससे   ध्वनिक  to electric  ब्लूज़   और   the  progressive  खोलने  of blues  म्यूज़िक   to   a   wider   दर्शक  , especially  श्वेत   श्रोता  .
In the 1960s and  1970s  , a  संकर   रूप   पुकारा   blues-rock  evolved  .
The  पद  `` the blues  ''  refers  to   the   ``  blue devils  ''  ,  अर्थ   वेदना  and  उदासी  ; an  जल्दी  use  of  the term in this  भाव  is found  in   जार्ज  Colman  's  one-act farce  ब्लू   शैतानों  (  1798  ) .
Though the  उपयोग   of  the phrase  in   african-american  music may  be  older  ,   it   रै  been attested  to  since 1912 , when  हार्ट   wand   's  `` Dallas  ब्लूज़  `` became  the  first copyrighted blues composition  .
In  गीत   the   phrase   is  often used to describe a  उदास  mood  .
A  क्वार्टर  dollar  ,   commonly  shortened to  क्वार्टर   ,   is  a  सिक्का   लायक   1⁄4  of a United States  डालर  or 25  सेंट  .
The quarter has  महरूम  produced since 1796 .
the  choice  of   25¢  as  a   denomination   ,  as opposed  to  20¢ which is more  आम  in other parts of the  संसार  , originated  साथ  the  अभ्यास   of  dividing Spanish  milled   डॉलर   into   आठ  wedge shaped  खण्ड  ( cf. ``  टुकड़े  of eight  ``   )   .
at  one  समय   ``   दो   बिट्स  ``  ,  i.e .  दो   wedges  , each wedge an  आठवीं  , thus a quarter of the Spanish real  ,   थी  a  आम   उपनाम   लिये   a  quarter .
Day of the Dead  (   )  is a Mexican holiday celebrated throughout  मैक्सिको   और   around  the world  in   अन्य   संस्कृतियों  .
The holiday focuses on gatherings of family and friends  to  pray for and  याद  friends and family members  जो  have died .
it  is  विशेषकर   मनाये  in Mexico  ,  where  it   is   a   नेशनल  holiday , and  सब   बैंको   हैं   बंद  .
The celebration takes  प्लेस   on   नवम्बर   1  and 2 ,  in   कनेक्शन  with the Catholic holidays  of   सब   संतो   '  Day and All  souls  '  दिन  .
Traditions connected with the holiday include building private altars honoring the deceased using  शुगर  skulls ,  marigolds  , and  the   पसंदीदा  foods and  पेय  of the  रजि  and  visiting  graves  साथ  these as  उपहार   .
वे  also leave possessions  of  the deceased .
विद्वानों  trace the origins of  the   आधुनिक  Mexican holiday to indigenous observances dating back hundreds of years  और  to an  एज़टेक  festival  समर्पित   to  the goddess  mictecacihuatl   .
the   अवकाश   रै  spread throughout the  संसार   :  In Brazil ,  dia   de  Finados  is   a  public  अवकाश  that many Brazilians  celebrate  by visiting cemeteries and churches .
in   स्पेन   ,   वहीँ  are  त्यौहार   और   parades   ,  and  ,  at  the  end of  the   दिन  , people gather  at   कब्रिस्तान  and  दुवा   लिये  their dead  loved  ones  .
Similar observances  occur   elsewhere  in Europe , and similarly  प्रसंग  celebrations appear  in  many Asian and African  संस्कृतियों  .
ANITA Mk VIII  .
The  अनीता  Mark  सात  and ANITA Mark  viii  calculators  यहूद   शुभारम्भ  simultaneously in late  1961  as the world 's first all-  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  desktop calculators .
Designed and built  by  the Bell Punch Co  .
in Britain , and marketed through its  sumlock  Comptometer  प्रभाग  , they used  वैक्यूम  tubes and cold-cathode switching  tubes  in  उनके   लॉजिक  circuits  और  nixie  tubes  for their numerical displays .
They were the  पहला  of a  श्रेणी  of  डेस्कटॉप   और  hand-held  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  calculators that  the   कम्पनी  was  to  develop and sell under  the   अनीता  name  into  the mid-1970s .
जार्ज   वॉशिंगटन   (  – ,  1799  ) was the  पहला   अध्यक्ष  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ( 1789–1797 )  ,  the commander-in-chief of the  महाद्वीपीय  Army  दौरान  the American Revolutionary  युद्ध  , and one  of  the  founding  Fathers  of   the   संयुक्त   राज्य   .
he   presided  over  the   सम्मेलन  that  drafted  the Constitution  ,   जिससे  replaced the Articles  of  Confederation and  स्थापित  the position of  अध्यक्ष  .
वॉशिंगटन   थी  elected  अध्यक्ष  as the  सर्वसम्मत  choice of  the   69   निर्वाचक  in  1788   ,  and he served two  शर्तें  in office .
He  oversaw   the   सृष्टि   of  a  दमदार  , well-financed  नेशनल   सरकारी  that maintained  neutrality  in the  युद्धों  raging  in  Europe  ,  suppressed rebellion ,  और  won  स्वीकृति  among Americans  of  all types  .
उसके  leadership style established  अनेक  forms and rituals  of  government that have been  प्रयुक्त   चूंकि   ,   ऐसे  as  using   a   कैबिनेट  system and delivering  an  inaugural address  .
further   ,  the  शांतिपूर्ण  transition from  उसके  presidency to  the   प्रेसिडेंसी  of  जॉन   एडम्स   स्थापित  a  परंपरा   कि  continues  into  the 21st  सदी  .
Washington was  hailed   as   ``  father  of   उसके  country  ``  even during his lifetime  .
वॉशिंगटन  was  born  into  the   प्रांतीय   gentry   of  Colonial Virginia  ;  his  धनवान  planter family owned  तम्बाकू   बागानों   और   स्लेव  .
After both his  पिता   और  older brother died  जब  he was young , Washington  became   personally  and  professionally   संलग्न  to the  शक्तिशाली  William Fairfax  ,  who promoted  उसके  career as  a  surveyor  और  soldier .
Washington  जल्दी  became a senior officer in the  औपनिवेशिक   शक्तियां  during the  पहला   चरण   of   the  French  और  Indian War .
Chosen by  the   दूसरी   महाद्वीपीय  Congress in 1775  to   be   commander-in-chief  of the Continental  फौज  in  the  American Revolution , Washington managed  to  force  the   अंग्रेजों  out  of  Boston  in   1776  , but  थी  defeated  और  almost captured later that  साल  when he  खोया   नई   यॉर्क  City .
बाद   क्रासिंग  the Delaware River  in   the   मुर्दे  of  शीत  , he  पराजित   the   अंग्रेजों  in  दो   लड़ाइयों   ,   retook   नई  Jersey and restored momentum  to  the  patriot   कारण  .
क्युकी   of  his strategy ,  क्रांतिकारी  forces captured  दो  major British  सेना  at Saratoga in 1777 and  yorktown  in 1781 .
Historians laud Washington for his selection and  पर्यवेक्षण  of  उसके   सेनापतियों   ,  encouragement  of   मनोबल   और  ability  to   थाम  together  the   फौज  , coordination with the state governors and state  मिलिशिया   इकाई   ,   संबंध  with Congress and attention  to  supplies  ,  logistics ,  और  training .
In battle ,  however  ,  वॉशिंगटन   थी  repeatedly  outmaneuvered  by British  सेनापतियों  with larger armies  .
After victory  था   महरूम  finalized  in   1783   ,   वॉशिंगटन   resigned  as Commander-in-chief rather  than  seize power , proving his opposition  to   तानाशाही   और  his  प्रतिबद्धता   to  American  republicanism   .
Dissatisfied with  the  weaknesses  of  the Articles of Confederation  ,   in  1787  वॉशिंगटन  presided over the  संवैधानिक   सम्मेलन   कि   drafted  the United  राज्य  Constitution  .
Elected  unanimously   as  the  पहला  President  of  the  संयुक्त  States in  1789   ,  he  attempted   to   लाओ   प्रतिद्वंद्वी  factions  साथ   to  unify the  स्वदेश  .
He supported Alexander  हैमिल्टन   's   कार्यक्रम  to  अदा   बंद  all  राज्य  and  नेशनल  debt  ,  to implement an  प्रभावी   कर  system  और   to  create a national  बैंको   (   despite  opposition from  थामस   जेफरसन   )  .
वॉशिंगटन   proclaimed  the  संयुक्त  States neutral in the  युद्धों  raging in  यूरोपीय  after 1793  .
He  avoided  war with Great Britain and  गारंटी   a   दशक  of  सलाम  and profitable  व्यापार  by securing  the  Jay Treaty in 1795  ,  despite  तीव्र  opposition from  the   jeffersonians  .
Although never  officially  joining the Federalist Party  ,   he  supported  इसके   कार्यक्रम  .
Washington  's   विदाई  Address  थी   an   influential  primer on republican  पुण्य  and  a   चेतावनी  against partisanship  ,   sectionalism  ,  और  involvement in foreign  युद्धों   .
He retired  इससे  the  प्रेसिडेंसी  in 1797  और  returned to  उसके   घर   ,  Mount Vernon ,  और  his domestic life where  he  managed  a   किस्में  of enterprises  .
He  freed   सब  his slaves  by  his final  होगा   .
Washington  था  a vision of a great  और   शक्तिशाली  nation that  होता  be  निर्मित   on   रिपब्लिकन  lines using  संघीय  power  .
he  sought to use  the  national government to  बचाना  liberty , improve infrastructure , open the  पश्चिमी   lands  , promote commerce ,  मिला   a  permanent capital ,  reduce  regional  तनाव  and  प्रचार   a   स्पिरिट  of  अमरीकी  nationalism .
At his  मौत   ,  Washington  थी   eulogized  as  ``   पहला  in war ,  पहला  in  सलाम  ,  और   पहला  in the hearts  of   उसके  countrymen '' by  हेनरी   ली  .
the  Federalists  बना  him  the   प्रतीक   of   उनके  party but for  अनेक   सालो   ,  the  jeffersonians  continued  to  distrust his influence  और  delayed building the Washington Monument  .
As  the  leader  of   the   पहला   कामयाब  revolution against a colonial  साम्राज्य  in world history , Washington became an international icon for liberation and  राष्ट्रवाद  , especially in France and Latin America  .
Fiscal Year 2012  u.S.  Federal Spending – Cash or  बजट   आधार  .
Fiscal  साल  2012 U.S. Federal Receipts  .
The Budget of the  संयुक्त  States Government  प्रायः   begins  as  the   अध्यक्ष  's proposal  to   the   u.S.  Congress  जिससे   अनुशंसा   funding   स्तर  for the next fiscal  साल  , beginning October  1  .
However  ,   कॉंग्रेस   is  the body  जरूरी   by  law to pass a budget annually and  to  submit the budget passed by  दोनो   घरों   to  the President  लिये   हस्ताक्षर  .
congressional  decisions are  governed  by  नियम  and  विधान  regarding  the   संघीय  budget  प्रक्रम   .
बजट  committees set  बिता  limits  लिये  the House and Senate  समितियों  and for  appropriations  subcommittees  ,  which then approve  व्यक्तिगत  appropriations  बिल्स   to  allocate  funding  to  विभिन्न  federal programs .
If Congress fails to  pass  an annual budget (  as   रै  been the  मामला  since 2009  )   ,   a  series of  appropriations   बिल्स  must be passed  as  `` stop  गैप  '' measures .
After Congress  approves   an  appropriations  विधेयक  , it  is  sent  to   the  President , who  may   चिह्न   it   into  law , or  may  veto it (  as  he  होता  a  बजट  when passed by the  कॉंग्रेस  ) .
a  vetoed  विधेयक  is sent back to  कॉंग्रेस  ,  जिससे  can pass  it  into law  साथ  a two-thirds majority  in  each chamber  .
कॉंग्रेस  may also  combine  all  or  some appropriations bills into  an   omnibus   reconciliation  bill .
In addition  ,   the   अध्यक्ष   may  request and the Congress may  pass   supplemental  appropriations bills  or  emergency supplemental appropriations  बिल्स   .
Several government  एजेंसियों  provide  बजट   आंकड़ा  and analysis  .
These include the Government  जवाबदेही  Office  (   gao  ) ,  congressional  Budget Office , the Office of Management  और   बजट  (  omb   )  and  the  U.S.  राजकोष  Department  .
These agencies have  reported  that the federal  सरकारी  is  facing  a series  of  important  financing  challenges  .
In the  short-run  ,  कर  revenues have  अस्वीकृत  significantly due to a  कठोर   मंदी  and  कर   नीति  choices , while  expenditures  have expanded for  युद्धों   ,   बेरोजगारी  insurance and other  सुरक्षा   जाल   बिता  .
In  the  long-run  ,  expenditures related  to   healthcare   कार्यक्रम  such  as  Medicare  और   medicaid  are  प्रक्षिप्त   to  grow  तेज़  than  the   अर्थव्यवस्था  overall as the population matures .
New  गिनी  ( also , Tok  पिसिन   :   niugini   ,  Dutch : Nieuw  गिनी  ,  और  ; historically : Papua ) is  the  world 's second largest island , after Greenland  ,   covering  a  जमीन  area  of   786,000  km2 .
Located  in  the  दक्षिणपश्चिम  Pacific  समंदर  , it lies geographically to  the   ईस्ट   of   the  Malay  द्वीपसमूह  , with which it is  sometimes   शामिल  as  भाग  of  a   वृहद  Indo-Australian Archipelago  .
Geologically  it  is  a  part of  the  same tectonic plate  as  Australia .
When world sea  स्तर  were  कम   ,   the   दो   साझा  shorelines  (   जिससे   अभी   झूठ   100  to  140  metres  नीचे  sea level ) , combining  साथ  lands  अभी  inundated into  the  tectonic continent  of  Sahul  ,   भी   ज्ञात   as   वृहद  Australia .
The two landmasses became  अलग   जब  the area now known as the  टोरेस   जलसन्धि  flooded after  the   समाप्त  of the last  glacial   काल  .
Anthropologically , New Guinea is  माना   भाग   of  Melanesia  .
नीतियां  , the western  हाफ  of the  द्वीप  comprises two Indonesian provinces :  पापुआ   और  West Papua  .
the  eastern half forms  the   मेनलैंड   of   the   देश   of   पापुआ   नई   गिनी  .
the  island  रै   a   जनसांख्यिकी   of  about  7.5  million  ,   साथ   a  very  कम   जनसांख्यिकी  density  of   तभी   8  inh/km2 .
New  गिनी   is  differentiated from its drier , flatter  ,  and less fertile  दक्षिणी  counterpart  ,  Australia  ,  by  इसके   much   उच्चतर  rainfall  और  its active volcanic  भूविज्ञान  ,  साथ  its highest point , Puncak Jaya  ,   reaching  an  उन्नयन  of  4,884  m  (  16,023 ft  )   .
yet   the  two  जमीन   masses  share  a  similar animal fauna  ,  with marsupials , including wallabies and possums  ,  and the egg-laying monotreme , the spiny anteater , or  एकिडना  .
अन्य   than   bats   और  some two  दर्जन   स्वदेशी   कृंतक   genera   ,   वहीँ   हैं   no   pre-human  indigenous  placental  mammals .
सूअर  , several additional species of rats , and  the  ancestor of the New Guinea Singing  श्वान  were introduced with human  colonization   .
The human  उपस्थिति  on the island dates back  at  least  40,000   सालो   to  the oldest  इंसान   migrations   आउट  of Africa .
शोध  indicates  कि   the   हाइलैंड्स  were an early and  स्वतंत्र  center of  कृषि   ,   साथ   प्रमाण   of  irrigation going  वापस   at  least  10,000  years .
क्युकी  of the time depth  of  its inhabitation and its highly fractured  लैंडस्केप  , an  unusually   ऊँची  number  of  languages are  बोला  on the  द्वीप  ,  साथ  some 1,000 languages  (   a   फिगर  higher  than  that  of  most  महाद्वीपों   )  having been  catalogued  out  of  an estimated  world-wide  pre-Columbian total  of  6,000 human dialects .
सबसे  are  वर्गीकृत  as  पापुआई   भाषाएं  , a generally  स्वीकृत  geographical term  जिससे  a minority  of   लेखक   थाम  to be a genetic one .
a  number  of  Austronesian languages are  बोला   on   the   coast  and on offshore  आइलैंड्स   .
in   the  16th  सदी  Spanish  explorers  discovered the island  और   पुकारा  it  नुएवा   गिनी  .
In  हाल  history western New  गिनी  was  शामिल  in the  डच   ईस्ट  Indies colony .
the  Germans annexed the northern  coast  of the eastern half of  the  island as  जर्मनी   नई  Guinea in their pre–World War I effort  to   स्थापित  themselves as a colonial power , whilst  the  south eastern portion was reluctantly  claimed  by  ब्रिटेन   .
Following the Treaty of  versailles  , the  जर्मनी   portion  was awarded to  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   (   जिससे  was  already  governing  the  British claim , named the Territory of  पापुआ   )  as a  लीग  of  राष्ट्र   जनादेश  .
the  eastern half  of  the  द्वीप   थी  granted  स्वतंत्रता   इससे   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  as Papua  नई  Guinea in  1975   .
The western  हाफ   gained  independence from the Dutch in 1961 , but  became  part of Indonesia soon afterwards in  विवादास्पद  circumstances  .
`` The  वैन   buren   लड़कों  '' is the 148th episode of  the  sitcom Seinfeld , and name  of  a fictional  नई  York street gang .
उनके  sign is crossing the  हैंड्स  , with  एक   हाथ   साथ  all the  उंगलियाँ   'up  ' and spread  आउट  .
The other  हाथ  has  सब  but the  अंगूठा  and pointer finger  up   ,  for a  कुल   of   आठ   (  8  )  .
The  गिरोह  is  नामित   लिये  the 8th  अध्यक्ष  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य   ,  Martin  वैन  Buren ( who was the  पहला   अध्यक्ष  from New York )  .
इस   थी  the 14th episode  लिये  the  8th  season .
It aired  on  February  6  ,  1997   .
bevo   चिह्न
bevo  was  a  non-alcoholic malt beverage  ,   or  near  बियर  ,  brewed  in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   by   the  Anheuser-Busch company  शुरूआत   in  the  जल्दी  20th century .
Bevo  enjoyed  its  महानतम   कामयाबी  during the time  of  prohibition , when beer ,  वाइन   और  distilled liquors  ,   यहूद  made  illegal  for  तेरह   सालो  .
the   anheuser-busch   कम्पनी  started brewing  bevo   जब  alcoholic beverages  यहूद   निषिद्ध  in 1916  by  the United States armed  शक्तियां  .
Production rose greatly  साथ  national prohibition  in   1919  ,  और   bevo   थी  by far the  सबसे   लोकप्रिय  of the many `` cereal beverages '' or  ``  near  beers  '' of the time  .
at  the peak of its popularity in  the   जल्दी   1920s  , more  than  five  लाख   मामले  of Bevo were  बेची  annually  .
renard   साथ  a mug of Bevo ,  चित्रित  in  टेरा  cotta  on   the   आंतरिक   दीवारें  of the Bevo  भवन  , St. Louis
लेबल्स  on  the  bottles  billed  it  as   ``  Bevo  the  Beverage  ''  .
the   नाम  `` Bevo '' was coined from  the   शब्द   ``  beverage ''  और  the  स्लावी   भाषा  word for  बियर   ``  pivo '' ,  और  was  सुनाया  `` Bee-vo '' .
Some Bevo  विज्ञापन  featured the  अक्षर  `` Renard  the   फॉक्स  `` ( based  on  the protagonist  of  a medieval  फ्रेंच   folk-tale  )  ,  and promotional mugs  साथ   इस  character were  manufactured   .
In  1930   anheuser-busch   निर्मित  a series of boat-bodied cars in its  st.  Louis  दुकानें  called the ``  bevo   नौकाएँ   ''  which  यहूद   प्रयुक्त  for  प्रमोशन  .
सात  are believed  to  have been  निर्मित  on Pierce-Arrow 8-cylinder chassis while one surviving example was based  upon  1930 Cadillac 353 V8  .
बिलबोर्ड  advertising  bevo   in  Trenton  ,  New Jersey ,  1917
A contemporary advertisement  पढ़ा  `` Cooling and invigorating ,  bevo   the  Beverage  .
अनुक्रम   by  the case from your  पंसारी   ,   druggist  , or dealer . ''
The paper label on  the  back of  the   बोतल  read `` The  all-year-round  Soft  पेय  .
appetizing  -  healthful  - Nutritious  -  Refreshing  .
मिल्क  or water may contain  जीवाणु   .
BEVO never does  .  ''
Bevo  became  part of  the  popular  संस्कृति  of the  समय  , and  is  mentioned in various popular songs and  vaudeville  skits of the era .
This led  to  secondary slang uses  of  the  शब्द  ;  लिये   उदाहरण   ,  in  अमरीकी  military  कठबोली  a  यंग  and inexperienced officer was  पुकारा   a  ``  bevo  ''  .
The University  of  Texas named its mascot  ``  Bevo ''  ,  a name which  रै  stuck to this  दिन  .
Irving Berlin included a  paean  to  the  drink , ``  तुम   ca  n't Stay Up on Bevo  ''  ,  in   उसके  1917 army revue , Yip Yip  yaphank   .
in   the  late 1920s smuggled  बूटलेग  beer and  liquor   as   खूब  as  ``   homebrew  `` , cut into Bevo  's   marketshare   .
With sales  flattening  to 100,000  मामले   by  1929  ,   anheuser-busch  stopped production .
The  bevo   मिल  , St. Louis , in 2008
the  Bevo building  ,   साथ  the Renard  अक्षर  prominently displayed at the corners , still  operates  as a bottling  सुविधा  at  उनके  main  ब्रेवरी  in St. Louis , Missouri  .
The  लैंडमार्क   bevo   मिल  , constructed by August Anheuser Busch , Sr. in  1917   .
It was closed  in   2009  , but it reopened  in   अक्तूबर   2009  under  नई   स्वामी   .
bevo   is  also mentioned in  the  short story `` The Killers  ``   by  Ernest Hemingway ; as well as  in   babbitt  by  sinclair  Lewis  .
Mylanta is  an  over the  काउंटर  medication used  लिये   the  treatment  of  acid reflux ,  heartburn  , and gastroesophageal reflux disease (  भी   ज्ञात   as   गर्ड  )  .

Milk is  a  white  द्रव   उत्पादित   by  the mammary glands of mammals .
It is  the   प्राथमिक  source of nutrition  लिये   यंग   स्तनधारियों  before  वे   हैं  able to  डाइजेस्ट  other types of  खाना  .
Early- lactation milk  contains  colostrum , which  carries   the   माँ   's  antibodies  to  the  baby   और  can  reduce  the risk  of   अनेक   रोगों   in  the  baby   .
It  भी  contains many other nutrients .
as   an   agricultural  product  ,  milk is extracted from mammals and used  as  food for  इंसानो  .
Worldwide  ,   दुग्ध  farms produced about  730   लाख  tonnes of  मिल्क  in  2011  .
India  is  the  संसार   's  largest  निर्माता  and consumer of  मिल्क   ,  yet  neither   निर्यात  nor imports milk .
New  जीलैंड   ,  the European Union  's   27  member states  ,   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  ,  और   the  United States are the world 's  largest   निर्यातक   of  milk  और  milk  उत्पाद  .
China and Russia are  the   संसार   's  largest importers of  मिल्क   और  milk products .
throughout  the  संसार  , there  हैं  more than  6   अरब  consumers  of  milk and milk  उत्पाद  .
over   750  million  लोगों  live within  दुग्ध   खेती  households .
मिल्क   is  a key contributor to improving  पोषण  and  खाना   सुरक्षा   विशेषकर  in  विकासशील   देशों  .
Improvements in  पशुधन   और  dairy  प्रौद्योगिकी   प्रस्ताव  significant  वादा   in  reducing  गरीबी   और  malnutrition  in  the world .
Motorcycle  स्पीडवे   ,  usually referred  to  as  स्पीडवे  , is  a   मोटरसाइकिल   खेल   involving  four  और  sometimes  up   to  six riders competing over four  anti-clockwise  laps  of  an oval  सर्किट  .
स्पीडवे  motorcycles use  तभी   एक  gear and  have   no  brakes and racing takes place on a flat oval  track   प्रायः  consisting of dirt  or  loosely  packed  shale  .
प्रतिस्पर्धी  use  इस  surface to slide their machines  बगलों  , powersliding or  broadsiding   into  the bends .
on  the straight  भाग  of  the   track  the motorcycles  पहुँचें   speeds  of up .
the  exact origins of  the   खेल   हैं   अनजान   लकिन   वहीँ   is   प्रमाण  of  a  type of  स्पीडवे   रेसिंग  being  practised   in  the USA before  the  First  संसार  War and in Australia  in  the late 1910s  और  early  1920s   .
वहीँ  are now both  घरेलू  and  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  competitions in  a   क्रमांक   of  countries including  the  Speedway  संसार  Cup  whilst   the   उच्चतम  overall scoring individual in  the  Speedway Grand  प्रिक्स  events is  सुनाया   the  world  चैंपियन  .
Speedway is popular in  सेंट्रल  and northern Europe and  to   a  lesser  extent  in Australia  और   उत्तर   अमेरिका   .
A variant of  track  racing ,  स्पीडवे  is administered internationally by the  fédération   internationale  de  motocyclisme  (  fim  )  .
Domestic speedway events are regulated  by  FIM  संबद्ध   नेशनल  motor  खेल  federations .
Vitamin  d   is   a   समूह  of fat-soluble secosteroids  जिम्मेदार  for intestinal absorption of  कैल्सियम  and phosphate  .
In humans , the most important  सम्बन्धित   यौगिकों  of  विटामिन  D are vitamin D2 and vitamin  d3  .
cholecalciferol  ( vitamin D3 ) and  ergocalciferol  ( vitamin  d2   )  are  अद्वितीय  as they constitute what we know as vitamin D and can  be   ingested  from the  आहार  and/or supplements .
The body can  भी  synthesize vitamin D (  इससे   कोलेस्ट्रॉल  ) when sun  एक्सपोज़र  is adequate ( hence its nickname  ,  the  ``  sunshine  विटामिन   ''   )  .
हालांकि  vitamin  d   is  commonly called a  विटामिन  ,  it  is not  दरअसल   an   अनिवार्य   dietary  vitamin  in   the  strict sense  ,   as  it can  be   synthesized   in  adequate amounts  by  most  स्तनधारियों   उजागर   to   धूप  .
( Cats and dogs can not  synthesize  vitamin D efficiently  और   जरूर  receive  it   in   उनके  diet . )
An organic chemical  यौगिक   (  or related set of compounds  )  is  तभी  scientifically called a  विटामिन  when  it   can   नहीं  be  synthesized   in  sufficient quantities by an organism , and  जरूर  be obtained  इससे  their diet  .
However  ,   as   साथ   अन्य  compounds commonly called vitamins  ,  vitamin D was  खोजा  in an  प्रयत्न   to  find  the   dietary  substance that  थी   lacking  in  a   बीमारी  , namely ,  rickets   ,  the childhood form of osteomalacia .
additionally  , like other compounds called  विटामिन   ,  in the developed  संसार  vitamin D  is  added to  स्टेपल  foods , such as milk , to avoid  बीमारी  due to deficiency .
Measures  of   सीरम  levels  प्रतिबिंबित  endogenous  संश्लेषण  from  एक्सपोज़र  to sunlight as  खूब   as  intake from the diet , and it is believed that synthesis may  योगदान   generally  to the maintenance of  पर्याप्त  serum  एकाग्रता  .
The evidence indicates that the  संश्लेषण  of  विटामिन  D from sun exposure works  in  a  प्रतिक्रिया   लूप   कि  prevents toxicity but ,  क्युकी  of uncertainty about the  कर्कट  risk from sunlight , no  सुझाव   हैं  issued  by  the Institute  of   आयुर्विज्ञान  ,  यूएसए  ,  लिये  the amount of sun  एक्सपोज़र   जरूरी   to   मिलें   विटामिन  D requirements .
Accordingly ,  the   dietary   सन्दर्भ  Intakes  लिये   विटामिन  D assume that no  संश्लेषण  occurs and that all  of  a  व्यक्ति  's vitamin D is from  उनके   आहार   ,  although that  होगा   rarely   occur  in  अभ्यास   .
In the liver  विटामिन  D is converted to calcidiol  ,  which  is  also known as  calcifediol  (  इन   )   ,  25-hydroxycholecalciferol  ,  or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25  (   oh  )  d   ;   और   जिससे  is  the  specific  विटामिन   d  metabolite that is measured in  सीरम  to  determine  a person 's  विटामिन  D  औकात   .
भाग  of the calcidiol  is  converted by  the  kidneys to calcitriol  ,  the  biologically  active  रूप   of   विटामिन  D. Calcitriol circulates  as   a   हार्मोन  in  the  blood  ,  regulating the  विशेषज्ञता  of calcium and  फास्फेट   in   the   bloodstream   और   promoting   the  healthy growth and remodeling of  अस्थि  .
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol  बाहर  of the  गुर्दे  for other  उद्देश्य  , such as the proliferation  ,  differentiation  और  apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol  भी  affects neuromuscular  फलन   और  inflammation .
Beyond its use to prevent  osteomalacia   or  rickets ,  the   प्रमाण   लिये   अन्य  health effects  of  vitamin  d   supplementation  in  the  general  जनसांख्यिकी   is  inconsistent  .
the  best evidence  of  benefit is for  अस्थि  health  और   a  decrease  in  mortality in  बुजुर्ग  women .
The Duramax is a  सामान्य   मोटर्स   डीज़ल  engine  परिवार  for  light-  and  मीडियम  duty trucks , designed by Isuzu  .
The 6.6-liter Duramax  is   उत्पादित  by  dmax  , a joint venture  between   gm   और  Isuzu  in  Moraine  ,  Ohio .
इस   इंजन  was initially  संस्थापित  in 2001 model year  चेवी  and  जीएमसी  trucks and has been an option since  तब  in pickups ,  वैन  , and medium-duty  ट्रक  .
In 2006 , production  at  Moraine was  reportedly   सीमित  to approximately 200,000  इंजन   प्रति   साल  .

Balto  (   1919  –  कूच  14 , 1933 )  थी   a  Siberian Husky sled dog who  led   उसके   टोली   on  the final leg  of   the  1925 serum run  to  Nome  ,  in which diphtheria  antitoxin  was transported from  anchorage  ,  अलास्का  , to  nenana  ,  अलास्का   ,   by   ट्रैन  and then to Nome  by   श्वान  sled  to   कॉम्बैट  an outbreak  of  the disease .
The run is commemorated by the annual  iditarod  Trail Sled Dog Race .
Balto was named  बाद   the  Sami  एक्सप्लोरर  Samuel Balto .
Balto died  at  the age  of   14   .

The  निसान   उच्चिष्ट   is   a  mid-size  /  entry-level  लक्ज़री   car  manufactured by  निसान   ,  marketed as  the   ``  four-door sports car  ''  .
The origins of  the   उच्चिष्ट  began in July 1976 as  the  Datsun  810  ,  an   upscale  six-cylinder version of the  bluebird   ,  and was spun  into  its  अपना  line  in  1981  ,   having  been made continuously since then .
The  ``   उच्चिष्ट  '' name  थी  applied gradually  ,   शुरूआत  in 1981 .
सबसे  pre-2004  maximas   यहूद  built in  oppama  , Japan , until the current North American Maximas started being assembled  in  Smyrna , Tennessee .
The  ``  Maxima  ''   रै   भी  been applied to Cefiros and  चलेगा  in various markets .

Propolis is a resinous  मिश्रण  that honey bees collect from  पेड़  buds , sap flows , or  अन्य  botanical sources  .
It  is   प्रयुक्त   as  a sealant for unwanted open spaces in  the   छत्ता  .
propolis   is   प्रयुक्त  for small gaps ( approximately or  कम  ) , while larger  स्पेसेस  are usually  भर  with beeswax .
Its color varies depending  on  its botanical source , the most  आम  being dark brown .
Propolis is sticky at  और  above  रूम   तापमान   ,   .
at  lower  temperatures   ,  it becomes  मुश्किल  and  बहुत   भंगुर  .
स्टीवन   टायलर  (  born  Steven  विक्टर  Tallarico  ;  March 26 , 1948  )  is an  अमरीकी   सिंगर  , songwriter ,  और  multi-instrumentalist , best known as the frontman and  सीसे  singer of the  बोस्टन  -based rock band Aerosmith  ,  in which he  भी   plays  the harmonica  ,  and occasional piano  और   percussion  .
He  is   ज्ञात  as  the  `` Demon of Screamin  '  ''  due   to   उसके  high  चिल्लाती  and his  चौड़ी  vocal  दायरा  .
He  is  also  ज्ञात  for his  on-stage  acrobatics .
दौरान  his  high-energy  performances , he  प्रायः   पोशाक  in bright  ,   रंगीन   outfits  with his  ट्रेडमार्क  scarves hanging from his microphone stand  .
in   the  1970s ,  टायलर  rose to  prominence  as the  frontman   of  Aerosmith  ,  which released such milestone  मुश्किल   चट्टान   एल्बम   as  Toys in the Attic and Rocks .
In the  लेट   1970s  and early  1980s   ,   टायलर   था  a  भारी  drug and  दारू   व्यसन  ,  और  the band  's  popularity  waned   .
He completed drug rehabilitation in  1986   और  subsequently  कायम  sobriety for  over  20 years  ,  but had a relapse  साथ  prescription painkillers  in   the  late 2000s  ,  for  जिससे   he   सफलतापूर्वक   प्राप्त   उपचार   in  2009  .
बाद   एरोस्मिथ  launched a remarkable  वापसी   in   the  late  1980s  and early  1990s   साथ   the  albums Permanent Vacation , Pump  ,   और   मिलेंगी   a  Grip  ,  Tyler became a household  नाम  and has remained  a  relevant rock  प्रतीक  .
as  a result ,  he  has since  embarked  on  अनेक   सोलो  endeavors  सहित   अतिथि  appearances on other artists  '   म्यूज़िक   ,  film and TV roles (  सहित   as   a  judge on American Idol  )   ,   authoring  a bestselling  किताब  ,  और  solo work  (  including a Top  40   hit   सिंगल   in  2011 ) .
however  ,  he   रै  continued to record  म्यूज़िक  and  perform  with Aerosmith ,  बाद  more  than   43  years in  the   बैंड   .
The band  's  latest  एल्बम  , Music  इससे   another  Dimension  !
,   थी   released  on November  6   ,  2012  .
टायलर   is  included among Rolling Stones 100 Greatest Singers .
he  was  भी  ranked  3rd   on  Hit  parader  's Top  100  Metal Vocalists of  सब   समय  .
in   2001  he was inducted  into   the  Rock  और  Roll Hall of Fame with  एरोस्मिथ  , and he was the presenter  जब   ac/dc   थी  inducted  into  the  हॉल  of Fame  in   2003  .
In  2013  , Tyler and  उसके   songwriting  partner  जो  Perry  होगा  be recipients of the  ascap   संस्थापकों  Award  और   होगा   भी   be   inducted   into   the   songwriters  Hall of Fame .
The  जिगर   produces  urea  in   the   यूरिया  cycle  as  a  बर्बाद   उत्पाद  of  the  digestion of  प्रोटीन  .
Normal  इंसान  adult blood should contain between  7  to 21 mg of  यूरिया   नाइट्रोजन  per 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/  dl   )  of blood .
Individual laboratories may have  अलग  reference  सीमाएँ  , and  इस  is because the procedure  may  vary .
Wayne  fontes   (  born  फ़रवरी   2   ,   1940   )  is  a   पूर्व  American  फ़ुटबॉल   कोच   और  college and professional  फ़ुटबॉल   खिलाड़ी  who  थी  the head coach of the NFL  's  Detroit  शेर  from  1988  to  1996  .
His 67 wins and 71  नुकसान   हैं  each the most  लिये  a head coach  in  team  इतिहास   .
the  Jews ( ISO  259-3  Israeli  उच्चारण  ) , also  ज्ञात  as the  यहूदी   लोगों   ,  are a nation  और  an ethnoreligious  समूह  , originating in the Israelites or Hebrews of  the  Ancient  निकट  East .
The Jewish  नस्ल  , nationality  ,   और  religion  हैं  strongly  interrelated   ,  as  judaism  is  the  traditional  आस्था  of the Jewish  स्वदेश   .
converts   to  Judaism  ,  whose status as  यहूदियों   भीतर   the  Jewish ethnos is  बराबर  to  those   born   into   it  ,  have   महरूम  absorbed into the Jewish people throughout the  सहस्राब्दियों  .
in   यहूदी  tradition , Jewish  ancestry  is  traced  to  the   biblical  patriarchs  अब्राहम  , Isaac and Jacob in  the   दूसरी   मिलेनियम  BCE .
The  आधुनिक  State  of  Israel  थी  established as  a  Jewish nation-state  ,  and  defines  itself as such in  इसके   मौलिक  Laws  .
Its Law  of  Return  अनुदान   the  right  of  citizenship to any  jew  who requests it .
Israel is the  तभी  country  जहाँ  Jews  हैं  a majority of the  जनसांख्यिकी  .
Jews also enjoyed political autonomy  twice   पहले  in ancient history .
The  पहला   of  these periods  lasted   इससे  1350  to  586 BCE ,  और  encompassed  the   अवधि   of   the  Judges ,  the   संयुक्त  Monarchy , and the Divided  साम्राज्य  of the  kingdoms  of Israel and  यहूदा  ,  समाप्ति  with  the   विनाश   of  the First  टेम्पल  .
The second was the period of the  hasmonean  Kingdom spanning  इससे   140  to 37 BCE .
Since the  विनाश  of  the  First  टेम्पल  , most Jews  have   जिया   in   diaspora  .
A minority  in  every  देश   in  which  वे  live  (   मगर  Israel )  ,  they have frequently experienced persecution throughout history ,  resulting   in  a  जनसांख्यिकी   कि  has  fluctuated  both in  संख्याएँ  and distribution over the centuries  .
The world  यहूदी  population  पहुँचे   a  peak of 15 million prior to  the  Second  संसार  War  ,  but  छह  million Jews  यहूद   मारे   in   the   holocaust   .
Since then  the  population has risen  again   और   ,  was estimated at  13.4  million  by  the North American  यहूदी   आंकड़ा  Bank ,  or   कम  than 0.2 %  of  the total world  जनसांख्यिकी  (  roughly  one in every  514   लोगों  ) .
According to this report , about 42.5  %  of  सब  Jews reside  in  Israel ( 5.7  लाख   )  , and 39.3  %   in   the   संयुक्त  States  (   5.3   लाख  ) , with most of the remainder  जीना  in Europe ( 1.5  लाख  ) and Canada  (  0.4 million )  .
These numbers  शामिल  all  those   जो  consider themselves  यहूदियों   ,   whether   or  not  वे  are affiliated  साथ  a  यहूदी   संगठन  .
the  total  संसार   यहूदी  population , however  ,   is  difficult to  माप  .
in  addition to issues  साथ  census  methodology  , there are  halakhic  disputes  regarding   जो   is   a  Jew  और  secular , political , and ancestral identification factors that may affect the figure considerably .
