लिये  other uses see  कॉर्पस  Domini  (  disambiguation )
the   feast  of Corpus Christi ( Latin for Body of Christ ) ,  भी  known as Corpus Domini  ,   is  a  लैटिन  Rite liturgical solemnity celebrating the  परंपरा  and  विश्वास  in  the  body and blood  of   यीशु  Christ  और  his Real Presence in the Eucharist .
it   emphasizes  the  आनन्द  of  the  institution of the Eucharist , which was  observed  on Holy  गुरुवार  in the  somber  atmosphere  of   the  nearness of Good Friday .
in  the present  रोमन   missal  ,  the  feast is designated  the   solemnity   of   the  Most Holy  देह   और  Blood of Christ  .
it  is also  मनाये   in  some Anglican  ,   लूथरन  ,  और  Old Catholic Churches that hold similar beliefs  regarding  the Real Presence  .
The feast  is  liturgically celebrated  on   the  Thursday after  ट्रिनिटी  Sunday or  ,   ``  where the Solemnity of  the  Most  पावन  Body and  रक्त  of Christ is not  a  Holy Day of Obligation , it is assigned to the Sunday after the Most Holy Trinity  as  its proper  दिन   ''   .
At  the  end of Holy Mass , there is  प्रायः  a procession of the  धन्य  Sacrament  ,   generally  displayed  in   a   monstrance  .
The  बारात  is  followed   by   सुनाकर  of the Blessed  sacrament   .
A notable Eucharistic  बारात  is  कि  presided over by the Pope each  साल   in   रोम  , where it begins at the Archbasilica of St. John Lateran and  makes  its way to  the  Basilica of Saint Mary  प्रमुख   ,  where  it  concludes  साथ   सुनाकर  .
c-reactive  protein  (   सीआरपी  ) is a protein found in the  रक्त   ,  the  स्तर   of  which rise in  जवाब  to inflammation ( i.e .  c-reactive   प्रोटीन   is  an  acute-phase   प्रोटीन   )   .
Its physiological  भूमिका   is  to  bind   to  phosphocholine  expressed   on  the  सतह  of dead or  मरना   कोशिकाएं  (  और  some  प्रकार  of bacteria ) in  अनुक्रम  to  activate  the complement  प्रणाली   via   the   c1q   जटिल  .
CRP is  synthesized  by the liver in  जवाब  to factors released  by   macrophages  and  मोटे  cells ( adipocytes  )   .
it   is  a member  of  the pentraxin family  of  proteins .
It is  नहीं  related to C-peptide  or  protein C  .
c-reactive   प्रोटीन  was  the  first pattern recognition receptor  (  PRR ) to be  पहचाना   .
The  प्रारंभ  of  the   व्यवस्थित   यूरोपीय  colonization of the  americas  is  typically  dated to  1492  , when a Spanish  expedition   headed   by   क्रिस्टोफर  Columbus sailed for  इण्डिया  to open  व्यापार  but  inadvertently   खोजा  the Americas  .
European  conquest   ,   large-scale  exploration and  colonization  soon  followed  .
Seeing  कि  Europe was  preoccupied   साथ   अनेक  internal  युद्धों  and was slowly recovering  इससे   the  many  मौतों   कि  the  bubonic   प्लेग  caused , the  रैपिड   विस्तार  at which it grew  in  wealth and power was  unforeseeable  in the early 1400s  .
The  पहला  expeditions occurred along the Caribbean coasts on  the  islands of  हिस्पानिओला  , Puerto Rico  और  Cuba  ,   और   बाद  1500 extended into  the  interiors of  दोनो  North  और  South  अमेरिका  .
in   1497   ,   sailing   इससे  the north on behalf  of  England  ,   जॉन   cabot   उतरा   on   the  North American  coast   ,   और   a   साल   बाद  , Columbus  's   तीसरा  voyage  पहुँचे  the  दक्षिण  American  coast   .
फ़्रांस  founded colonies  in  much of eastern  उत्तर   अमेरिका  , on  a  number of Caribbean  आइलैंड्स  , and in South America .
Portugal  colonized  Brazil .
आखिरकार   ,  the entire  पश्चिमी   गोलार्ध  came under  the  control of European governments , leading to profound changes to its landscape  ,  population , and  संयंत्र   और  animal life .
in  the 19th century alone  over   50  million  लोगों  left  यूरोपीय   लिये  the  americas   .
The  post-1492   era   is  known as  the  period of the Columbian Exchange .
Keith  रिचर्ड्स  (  born  18 December  1943   )   is  an English musician , singer-songwriter  और   संस्थापक   सदस्य   of  the English rock  बैंड  the Rolling  पत्थरों  .
Rolling Stone  पत्रिका   कहा  Richards had created  ``   चट्टान  's  महानतम  single  देह   of  riffs ''  ,  ranking him 4th on  इसके   सूची  of  100   बेहतरीन  guitarists .
चौदह  songs  रिचर्ड्स  wrote with the Rolling Stones  '  lead vocalist Mick Jagger are listed among  रोलिंग  Stone magazine  's  ``  500  Greatest  गीतों  of All Time `` .
Richards  '   सुर्खी   लिये   अवैध   ड्रग   उपयोग  stems  in  part from  अनेक   ड्रग  busts  दौरान   the  late  1960s   और  1970s  और  his candour regarding  उसके   व्यसन   to  and  eventual  abstinence from  हेरोइन   .
टेस्टोस्टेरोन  is  a   स्टेरॉयड   हार्मोन  from the  androgen   समूह  and is found in  स्तनधारियों  , reptiles  ,  birds , and  अन्य   vertebrates  .
in  mammals , testosterone  is  primarily secreted in  the   अंडकोष  of males and  the  ovaries of females , although small amounts are also  स्रावित  by  the   अधिवृक्क  glands  .
It is  the  principal male sex hormone  और   an  anabolic steroid  .
in   मेन   ,  testosterone plays a  कुंजी   भूमिका   in  the development  of  male reproductive tissues such as  the  testis and  प्रोस्टेट  as  खूब   as  promoting secondary  यौन   विशेषताएँ  such as increased muscle , bone mass , and  the  growth of body  बाल  .
In addition  ,  testosterone  is  essential for health and  well-being  as well  as   the   रोकथाम  of  ऑस्टियोपोरोसिस   .
On  औसत  ,  in   वयस्क   इंसान   males  , the  प्लाज्मा   विशेषज्ञता   of  testosterone is about 7–8 times  as   ग्रेट   as  the concentration  in  adult human  महिलाओं   '   प्लाज्मा   ,   लकिन  as the metabolic consumption  of  testosterone in males is greater  ,   the  daily production  is  about  20  times greater in men .
Females also are more  संवेदनशील  to  the  hormone  .
टेस्टोस्टेरोन   is   observed  in  सबसे  vertebrates .
Fish  मेक   a   थोड़ा   अलग   रूप   पुकारा   11-ketotestosterone  .
Its counterpart in  कीट  is ecdysone .
These  सर्वव्यापी  steroids suggest  कि  sex hormones  have   an   प्राचीन  evolutionary  इतिहास  .
क्लस्टर  sampling  is   a  sampling technique used  जब   ``   प्राकृतिक  '' but relatively homogeneous groupings  हैं  evident  in   a   सांख्यिकीय  population  .
it   is   प्रायः   प्रयुक्त   in   विपणन   शोध   .
in  this technique  ,   the   कुल  population is  विभाजित  into  ये  groups (  or   क्लस्टर   )  and a simple random sample of  the  groups is selected .
Then the required information is collected from  a  simple  यादृच्छिक  sample of  the   तत्व  within each selected  समूह   .
This may  be  done for  प्रत्येक  element  in   ये  groups  or  a  subsample   of  elements  may   be   चयनित  within each of these groups .
a  common  प्रेरणा  for  क्लस्टर  sampling  is  to reduce the total number of interviews  और   लागत  given  the  desired accuracy .
Assuming  a  fixed sample size  ,  the technique gives  अधिक  accurate  परिणाम   जब  most of the variation  in   the  population  is  within the groups , not between them .
jamestown   is  a town in Guilford  काउंटी   ,  North Carolina ,  संयुक्त  States  ,   और   is   a  suburb of  the  nearby cities of  greensboro   और   ऊँची  Point .
The  जनसांख्यिकी   थी  3,382 at  the  2010 census  .
नताली  Portman ( born  नताली   hershlag  ; ; June  9   ,  1981 ) is an  अभिनेत्री  and  मॉडल  with  डुअल  American  और  Israeli  नागरिकता  .
Her first role was as  an  orphan taken in by a  हिटमैन  in  the   1994   कार्रवाई  film  ,  but mainstream success came when she  थी  cast as Padmé Amidala  in   the  Star Wars  प्रीक्वेल   त्रयी   (  released in 1999 , 2002  और  2005  )  .
in  1999  ,  she enrolled at Harvard  विश्वविद्यालयों  to study psychology while still  working  as  an  actress .
वो  completed  उसके  bachelor 's degree in 2003 .
In  2001   ,   पोर्टमैन   खोली   in  New York City  's   पब्लिक   थिएटर  production  of  Anton Chekhov 's  the   सीगल  .
in  2005  ,  Portman received a  नामांकन   लिये   the  Academy  पुरस्कार  for Best  supporting  Actress and won  the  Golden  ग्लोब  Award for Best Supporting Actress  -   गति   चित्र  for  the  drama Closer .
She  जीती  a Constellation  पुरस्कार  for Best Female  प्रदर्शन  and a Saturn Award for Best Actress for her starring role  in  V for Vendetta ( 2006 ) .
She  निभाई   अग्रणी  roles in the  ऐतिहासिक   dramas   गोया  's  भूत  (  2006  )  और   the  Other Boleyn Girl (  2008  )  .
in   may  2008 , she  परोसा  as the youngest member of the 61st Annual Cannes Film Festival jury .
पोर्टमैन  's directorial debut ,  संध्या  ,  खोली  the 65th  वेनिस   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Film Festival 's shorts  प्रतियोगिता  in  2008   .
Portman directed  a   खण्ड  of the  सामूहिक   फिल्मी  New York  ,  I  प्रेम   तुम  .
In 2011  ,  Portman won the  अकादमी  Award , the  सुनहरी   ग्लोब  Award  ,   the   bafta  Award , the  स्क्रीन  Actors Guild Award ,  और   the  Independent Spirit Award  लिये  her  सीसे  performance as Nina  sayers   in   ब्लैक  Swan  .
Copper is a chemical element with  the   प्रतीक   cu   (  from ) and atomic number  29   .
it  is a ductile metal with very  ऊँची  thermal and electrical  चालकता  .
Pure copper is  नरम   और   malleable  ;  a   freshly   उजागर  surface  रै   a  reddish-orange  रंग  .
it   is   प्रयुक्त  as  a  conductor  of   ऊष्मा  and electricity ,  a   भवन  material  ,  and a constituent of  विभिन्न  metal alloys  .
The  मेटल   और  its  alloys   have  been used for  हज़ारों  of years  .
in   the  Roman  era  , copper was principally mined  on  Cyprus , hence the origin of  the   नाम  of the metal as сyprium (  मेटल   of  Cyprus ) , later shortened to  сuprum  .
इसके  compounds are commonly  encountered   as   तांबे   (  II  )  salts , which  प्रायः  impart  ब्लू  or green  रंगों  to minerals  ऐसे   as  azurite and turquoise and  have  been  widely   प्रयुक्त   historically  as pigments .
architectural   structures  built  साथ   तांबे  corrode to give green verdigris  (  or  patina   )   .
सजावटी   आर्ट   prominently  features copper  ,   दोनो   by  itself  और   as  part of pigments  .
तांबे   is  essential  to  all living organisms as  a  trace  dietary   खनिज   क्युकी  it is  a  key  constituent  of  the  respiratory  एंजाइम  complex  cytochrome  c  oxidase  .
in  molluscs and crustacea copper  is  a constituent  of  the  रक्त  pigment  hemocyanin  , which  is   replaced  by the iron-complexed  हीमोग्लोबिन  in fish  और  other  vertebrates   .
the  main  क्षेत्रों  where copper is  मिला  in vertebrates  हैं  liver ,  मांसपेशी   और   अस्थि  .
In sufficient concentration , copper  यौगिकों   हैं   जहरीला  to  उच्चतर  organisms and are  प्रयुक्त   as  bacteriostatic substances , fungicides , and  लकडी  preservatives  .
The major  पेशेवर  sports  लीग   ,  or  बस  major  लीग   ,  in the  संयुक्त  States and  कनाडा  are  the   उच्चतम   पेशेवर  competitions  of  team  खेल   in  the  दो   देशों   .
Although individual sports such as golf ,  टेनिस  ,  और  auto racing are  भी   बहुत  popular , the  पद  is usually  सीमित  to  टोली  sports .
The term `` major  लीग   ''  was  पहला  used in  1921  in reference to  प्रमुख  League Baseball ( MLB  )   ,  the  शीर्ष   स्तर   of  professional American baseball  .
आज  , the major northern North America professional team sports leagues  हैं  Major League  बेसबॉल   (  MLB ) ,  the  National Basketball Association ( NBA  )  ,  the   नेशनल   फ़ुटबॉल   लीग  (  एनएफएल   )  ,  और   the  National Hockey  लीग   (   एनएचएल   )  .
Other notable leagues include Major  लीग  Soccer  (   mls   )  , the  कनाडाई  Football League (  cfl   )   ,  the  एरिना  Football League , Major League  lacrosse  , the National  lacrosse  League and the  महिलाओं   's   नेशनल  Basketball Association .
the   एनएफएल  ,  एमएलबी  , NBA  ,   और   एनएचएल   हैं  commonly referred  to  as  the   बिग   चार   .
Each of these is the richest  पेशेवर  club competition in  इसके   खेल   विश्वव्यापी  .
the  best  खिलाड़ी  can  become   सांस्कृतिक   प्रतीक   in   दोनो  countries and elsewhere  in  the  संसार  ,  क्युकी  the  लीग   आनंद  a  significant  place in popular  संस्कृति  in the US and Canada .
the  NFL has 32  टीमों  , and  the  others have  30   प्रत्येक  .
the  vast majority  of  major  लीग  teams are concentrated  in  the  सबसे  populous  महानगर  areas  of  the United States  .
Baseball  ,   फ़ुटबॉल  , hockey  ,   और   सॉकर   have  had professional  लीग  for  over   100  years  ;   जल्दी   लीग  such as the National Association  ,  Ohio League , and National Hockey Association  formed  the  आधार  of the modern MLB  ,   एनएफएल  and  एनएचएल  respectively  .
Soccer was  पहला   professionalized   in  1894 , but leagues suffered  greatly   इससे  lack  of   स्थिरता  and seldom lasted more than a decade .
सॉकर  's  महानतम  successes were in the form  of  the  अमरीकी  Soccer League (  1921-1933   )  , the  असली  North  अमरीकी   सॉकर  League  (   1968-1984   )  ,  the  National Professional  सॉकर  League  (  1984-2001 )  और   ,  currently , Major League Soccer (  1996-present  )  .
बास्केट  is a  अपेक्षाकृत   नई  development ; the  एनबीए  evolved from the National Basketball League  और  its splinter group  the  Basketball Association of  अमेरिका   ,  taking on its current form in 1949  .
Every major league averages 15,000  प्रशंसक  in attendance  प्रति   खेल  or higher  as   of   2011   .
मध्याह्न  Altitude is an astronomical navigation method  of  calculating an observer 's latitude  .
अर्जित  value management (  evm  ) , or  अर्जित  value project/performance management  (   evpm  )  is   a  project management technique  लिये  measuring project performance and progress in  an  objective  manner  .
Because EVM has the ability  to  combine  माप  of :
scope
schedule
and  cost,
in a  सिंगल  integrated  प्रणाली   ,  Earned Value Management is able to  provide   सटीक  forecasts  of   प्रोजेक्ट  performance problems ,  जिससे  is  an   महत्वपूर्ण   योगदान   लिये  project  प्रबन्धन   .
Early EVM  शोध   दिखाया  that  the  areas of planning and control are  significantly  impacted by  इसके  use ; and similarly  ,  using the methodology improves both scope  परिभाषा   as  well as the analysis of overall project  प्रदर्शन  .
More  हाल   शोध   अध्ययन  have shown  कि  the principles  of  EVM are positive  predictors   of  project success .
लोकप्रियता  of EVM has grown significantly  in  recent years beyond government contracting  ,  in which sector  इसके   महत्व  continues to  वृद्धि   (  e.g.  ,   हाल  new DFAR rules  )  , in part because EVM  can   भी  surface in  और   सहायता  substantiate contract disputes .
रंगीन  spring  गार्डन   पुष्प
Spring is one of  the   चार  conventional temperate seasons ,  following  winter and preceding  गर्मियाँ   .
There are various  तकनीकी   परिभाषाएं   of   वसन्त   ,  but  लोकल  usage  of   the  term  varies   according  to local  जलवायु  , cultures and customs .
When it is spring  in   the  northern  गोलार्ध  ,  it   होगा  be  पतझड़  in the southern  गोलार्ध  .
at   the  spring equinox , days  हैं   बंद  to  12   घंटों   long   साथ  day length  increasing  as the  ऋतु  progresses  .
Spring and  ``  springtime '' refer to the season , and  भी  to ideas of rebirth  ,   कायाकल्प  ,  नवीकरण   ,   क़यामत  , and regrowth  ,   साथ  festivals such as Carnival  ,  Easter  और  Holi being celebrated  at  this  समय   .
jamestown   थी  a settlement  in   the  Colony of Virginia  ,   the   पहला   स्थाई   अंग्रेज़ी   उपनिवेश  in  the  Americas .
स्थापित   by   the   वर्जिनिया   कम्पनी  of London as `` James  फोर्ट  ''  on   may   14  , 1607  (  O.S .  ,   may  24 , 1607  n.s   .  )  ,   it  followed several earlier  विफल  attempts ,  सहित   the   खोया   उपनिवेश   of  Roanoke  .
Jamestown served as the  पूंजी   of  the colony  लिये   83  years ,  इससे  1616  जबतक   1699  .
the  settlement was  स्तिथ  within  the   territory   of   a  political entity known as Tsenacommacah  ,  the state  of  the  powhatan  Confederacy  ,  with  around  14,000  देशी  inhabitants , and  specifically  was in  भाग  of the  subdivision   ज्ञात   as  the  paspahegh  tribe .
The natives initially welcomed  the  colonists  साथ   नाचना   ,  feasting and  तम्बाकू  ceremonies ,  और  they provided crucial  प्रावधानों  and support  लिये   the   अस्तित्व  of  the  colonists , who  यहूद   नहीं  agriculturally inclined ,  हालांकि   संबंध  with  the   newcomers  also soured  fairly   जल्दी   on  , leading to the  कुल  annihilation of  the  Paspahegh in  warfare   भीतर  3  सालो  .
भीतर  a year  of   jamestown   's  founding , the  वर्जिनिया  Company  brought   पॉलिश  and Dutch colonists to  सहायता  improve  the  settlement .
in   1619  , the  पहला  documented  africans   यहूद  brought  to  Jamestown  ,  though  the  modern conception  of  slavery in  the  future United States did  नहीं   शुरू  in  वर्जिनिया  until  1660   .
When the colony  थी   subdivided  into the original  आठ   shires  of Virginia in 1634 , the town became  स्तिथ   in  the eponymous James  नगर  Shire .
The London Company  's   दूसरी  settlement  ,   बरमूडा  ,  दावा  to  be  the  साईट   of   the   oldest   कस्बा  in the  अंग्रेज़ी   नई   संसार  , as St. George  's   ,   बरमूडा  was  officially   स्थापित  ( as New London )  in   1612  , whereas  जेम्स  Fort  ,   in   वर्जिनिया   ,   थी   नहीं   to  be converted  into   जेम्स  towne until 1619  ,  and  further  did not  जीवित   into  the  उपस्थित   दिन  .
in  1699 ,  the  capital was relocated from Jamestown to what is  आज  Williamsburg  ,  after which  jamestown  ceased  to  exist  as   a  settlement , existing  आज  only  as   an   पुरातत्व  site .
आज  , Jamestown is  एक  of three  स्थितियाँ  comprising the  ऐतिहासिक  Triangle of  औपनिवेशिक   वर्जिनिया  , along with  williamsburg  and  yorktown  , with two primary heritage  साइट   .
ऐतिहासिक  Jamestowne , the  पुरातत्व  site  on  Jamestown Island ,  is   a   सहकारी   प्रयत्न   by  Jamestown  नेशनल  Historic Site (  भाग  of Colonial  नेशनल   ऐतिहासिक   पार्क   )  , and Preservation Virginia .
The Jamestown  उपनिवेश  , a living  इतिहास   interpretive   साईट  , is operated by the  jamestown   yorktown   न्यास  in  संयोजन  with the Commonwealth of Virginia  .
James Christopher  फ्रे   (  born  सितंबर   12  , 1969 ) is an American  लेखक  .
उसके  books A  लाख   छोटी   टुकड़े  ( 2003 ) and My Friend  लियोनार्ड  ( 2005 )  ,  as  खूब   as  Bright Shiny Morning ( 2008 )  ,  were  bestsellers  .
he   थी   the  subject  of  a scandal when  जांचकर्ताओं  discovered that  थाना   समय  and the extent  of   निश्चित  injuries were  अतिरंजित   in  A Million Little  टुकड़े  , a  अधिकारीगण  autobiographical account  of  the  लेखक  's struggle with  व्यसन   .
deere   &  Company , most commonly  ज्ञात   by   इसके  name John Deere ,  is  an American corporation based  in  Moline ,  इलिनोइस  ,  और   एक   of   the  largest manufacturers of agricultural machinery  in   the   संसार  .
In 2012 ,  it   थी  listed as 97th  in  the Fortune 500  अमेरिका   's  ranking  और  190th  in  the Fortune 500 Global ranking  .
Deere  और  Company  agricultural   उत्पाद   ,   बेची  under the  जॉन  Deere name ,  शामिल   tractors  ,  combine   हार्वेस्टर   ,   कपास  harvesters ,  balers  , planters / seeders , sprayers  ,   और  UTVs .
The  कम्पनी   is  also a manufacturer of construction  उपकरण  and forestry  उपकरण   ,  as well as  a   प्रदायक  of diesel engines  और   drivetrains   (  axles , transmissions  ,  gearboxes ) used in  भारी  equipment .
additionally  , John Deere  manufactures  equipment  प्रयुक्त  in  लॉन   ,   grounds  , and  turf  care , such  as  walk-behind  लॉन   mowers  , zero-turn  लॉन  mowers ,  लॉन  tractors ,  और  snowthrowers .
To  support  the core  व्यवसायों   ,  John  deere  also provides financial  सेवाएं  and  अन्य   सम्बन्धित  activities .
the  company  's   स्लोगन  is `` Nothing  रनों   जैसे  a Deere ''  और  has a picture of a leaping  हिरण  as a logo ,  a   शब्द  play pun on  ``  nothing runs like  a  deer '' .
कार्ल  Westby coined the  phrase  ``  nothing  Runs  जैसे   a   deere  ''  लिये   a  marketing  अभियान  to sell snowmobiles .
The  कम्पनी   's  products are also  identifiable  by its distinctive shade  of  green paint ,  प्रायः  augmented by yellow  trim  .
The  संयुक्त   राज्य   ten-dollar  bill  (  $ 10 ) is a denomination  of  United States currency .
The first U.S. Secretary of  the   राजकोष   (  1789–95 ) ,  सिकंदर  Hamilton ,  is  currently  प्रदर्शित  on the  obverse   of  the bill  ,   जबकि   the  U.S. Treasury Building is  प्रदर्शित  on the reverse .
( Hamilton is  एक   of  two  non-presidents   प्रदर्शित   on   फिलहाल  issued U.S.  बिल्स   .
the   अन्य  is  बेंजामिन  Franklin  ,  on the $ 100 bill .
हैमिल्टन   is   एक  of  तभी   चार  people featured on  u.S.   पेपर  currency ( 1861  to   the  present ) who  थी  not born  in  the continental United States , as  he  was from the West Indies .
The  अन्य   हैं  : Albert Gallatin ,  स्विट्ज़रलैंड  ( $ 500  1862/63  Legal Tender ) ;  जार्ज  Meade ,  स्पेन  (  $   1,000  1890/91  राजकोष   नोट   )  ; and  रॉबर्ट   मॉरिस   ,  England ( $  1,000   1862/63  Legal Tender ;  $   10   1878/80   चांदी   प्रमाणपत्र   )   .
In addition , Kamehameha  i  ,  appears  on the 2008  हवाई   राज्य  quarter . )
सब  $ 10 bills issued today are Federal  आरक्षित  Notes  .
The Bureau of  नक्काशी  and Printing  says  the average  जीवन  of  a  $ 10 bill  in  circulation is 18  महीने  before it  is   replaced  due to wear .
Approximately  6   %  of  सब   us  banknotes printed in  2009  were $  10  bills  .
Ten dollar  बिल्स  are delivered  by  Federal  आरक्षित   बैंको   in  yellow  straps  .
The source of the face  on   the  $  10  bill is John  trumbull  ’s 1805  पोर्ट्रेट   of  Hamilton  कि  belongs  to   the  portrait  संग्रहण   of   नई   यॉर्क  City Hall .
The $ 10  विधेयक  is the only  u.S.   पेपर   करेंसी  in  परिसंचरण   in  which the portrait faces  to  the left ( the  $  100,000 bill featured a portrait of Woodrow Wilson  facing  to the  बाएँ   ,  but  थी   प्रयुक्त  only for intra-government  ट्रांजेक्शन  )  .
Andy Samuel  ग्रिफ़िथ  ( June 1  ,  1926 – July 3  ,   2012  )  थी  an  अमरीकी  actor , television producer  ,  Grammy  पुरस्कार  -winning  southern-gospel  singer  ,   और   लेखक  .
He was  a  Tony  पुरस्कार  nominee for two roles ,  और   gained  prominence in  the  starring  भूमिका  in director  एलिया  Kazan 's film  a   फेस  in the Crowd ( 1957 ) before  he  became better known for his television roles ,  playing  the lead  वर्ण   in  the 1960–1968 situation comedy The Andy Griffith  दिखाएँ  and in  the  1986–1995  विधिक  drama Matlock .
टेरेसा  Penelope `` Terri  ''   इरविन  ,  (   née  Raines ;  born  July 20 , 1964  )   is   an  Australian  -आधारd  , American  -born   naturalist  , author , the  विधवा   of   ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  naturalist Steve Irwin and  मालिक  of  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  Zoo at  beerwah  , Queensland ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   .
She co-starred  साथ   उसके   husband  on The  मगरमच्छ   शिकारी  , their unconventional  टेलीविज़न  nature documentary  श्रेणी   साथ   साथ   इसके   spin-off  series , Croc  फाइलें  and  the   मगरमच्छ  Hunter Diaries  .
वो  has lived in Australia since 1992 , when  वो  married Steve Irwin .
Andreas Cellarius 's illustration of  the  Copernican system ,  इससे   the   harmonia   macrocosmica  (  1660   )   .
Heliocentrism  ,  or  heliocentricism   ,   is   the  astronomical  मॉडल   in  which the Earth  और  planets revolve  around   a   अपेक्षाकृत  stationary  सूर्य  at the center of the Solar System .
the   शब्द  comes  इससे   the  Greek (  helios  `` sun '' and  kentron   ``   बीच  '' )  .
historically  , heliocentrism was  opposed  to geocentrism ,  जिससे  placed the Earth at the  बीच   .
The notion that the Earth revolves around the  सूर्य   था  been proposed as early  as  the  3rd  century  bc  by  aristarchus  of  samos  , but Aristarchus 's  heliocentrism  attracted  छोटी   ध्यान   जबतक  Copernicus  revived  and  elaborated  it .
Lucio  russo  ,  however   ,  argues  कि  this  is   a  misleading impression  resulting  from the loss of scientific works  of   the  Hellenistic Era  .
using  indirect  प्रमाण   he  argues that  a   heliocentric   दृश्य  was  expounded   in  Hipparchus 's work on  गम्भीरता  .
It was  नहीं  until the  16th  century that a fully predictive mathematical model  of  a heliocentric  प्रणाली  was presented ,  by   the  Renaissance  गणितज्ञ   ,   astronomer  ,  और   कैथोलिक   मौलवी   nicolaus   कोपरनिकस  of  कैंडल   ,  leading  to  the Copernican Revolution  .
in  the  following  century , Johannes  कॅप्लर   elaborated  upon and  विस्तारित   इस  model to  शामिल  elliptical orbits  ,  and  supporting  observations  बना  using a telescope were presented by  गैलीलियो  Galilei .
With the  observations  of William  हर्शेल  , Friedrich  bessel  ,  और  others , astronomers  एहसास   कि  the sun was not the center of the universe  और  by  the  1920s Edwin Hubble  था   दिखाया  that  it  was  भाग  of  a   आकाशगंगा  ( the Milky Way ) that was  तभी  one of  अनेक   अरबों  .
Norah Jones  (  born Geetali  नोराह  Jones Shankar ; March 30  ,   1979  )  is  an American  singer-songwriter  ,  pianist  , and actress  .
She is  the   बेटी  of  भारतीय  sitar player Ravi Shankar and  मुकदमा   जोन्स   .
She is also  anoushka  Shankar  's   half-sister   .
In 2002 ,  वो  launched her solo music career  साथ  the  रिलीज   of  the commercially  कामयाब  and  critically  acclaimed album Come Away with  me  , a fusion of country music and pop  साथ  elements of  जैज़   जिससे   थी   certified  diamond  एल्बम  , selling over 26  लाख   नक़ल   .
The  रिकार्ड   अर्जित  Jones five  ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार  , including the  एल्बम  of the Year  ,  Record  of  the Year ,  और  Best New  कलाकार   .
Her subsequent  स्टुडियो  albums ,  feels  Like Home  ,  released in 2004 ,  नहीं  Too  लेट  ,  released  in  2007  ,  the   वही  year she made  उसके  film debut in  my  Blueberry Nights  ,   और   उसके  2009  रिलीज   the  Fall all gained Platinum status  ,   selling  over a million  नक़ल   और  were generally  खूब  received  by  critics  .
जोन्स  ' fifth  स्टुडियो  album , Little  टूटा   दिल  , was released on  अप्रैल  27 , 2012 .
जोन्स  has won nine  ग्रैमी  Awards  और  was 60th on Billboard magazine 's artists of the  2000–2009  decade chart .
throughout  her career ,  जोन्स   रै  won  numerous  awards and has  बेची  more than  50   लाख   एल्बम   विश्वव्यापी  .
बिलबोर्ड   नामित   उसके   the  top jazz  कलाकार   of  the 2000–2009  दशक  .
नहीं   to  be  उलझन  with Dimension of a  शारीरिक   मात्रा   .
For other uses , see Dimension (  बहुविकल्पी   )  .
From  बाएँ  to right , the square , the cube , and the  tesseract  .
The  वर्गाकार   is   bounded  by 1-dimensional lines  ,  the cube  by  2-dimensional areas , and the tesseract  by  3-dimensional volumes .
A projection  of  the  घन   is  given since  it  is  viewed   on  a  two-dimensional  screen  .
The same  applies   to   the   tesseract   ,  which  additionally  can  तभी  be shown as a projection even in three-dimensional  स्पेस  .
a  diagram showing the  पहला  four spatial  आयाम  .
In  भौतिकी  and  गणित  ,  the   आयाम  of a space or  ऑब्जेक्ट  is informally  पारिभाषित  as the minimum  क्रमांक  of  निर्देशांक  needed to specify  कोई  point within it .
यूँ   a  line  रै  a  आयाम   of  one  क्युकी   तभी  one  निर्देशांक   is   needed   to  specify a point on  it  (  लिये  example ,  the  point at  5  on  a  number  लकीर  ) .
a   सतह   ऐसे  as a plane or the surface of  a   बेलन   or  sphere has a  आयाम   of   दो  because  दो  coordinates are needed to specify  a  point on  it   (  for example  ,  to locate  a  point on  the   सतह   of  a  गोला   तुम  need both its  अक्षांश  and its longitude )  .
The inside  of  a  घन   ,   a  cylinder  or   a  sphere is  three-dimensional  because  तीन  coordinates are  needed  to locate  a  point  भीतर  these  स्पेसेस   .
In physical terms , dimension  refers   to  the constituent  ढांचा  of all space (  आवाज़   )   और   इसके   स्थिति  in time (  आभास  as a scalar  आयाम   साथ  the t-axis )  ,  as  खूब  as the spatial  संविधान   of  objects  within—structures   कि   correlate  with  दोनो  particle and field conceptions , interact according to relative properties of mass  —and   हैं   fundamentally  mathematical  in  description .
These , or  अन्य   अक्ष  ,  may  be referenced to uniquely  पहचानो   a  point  or  structure in its  रवैया  and relationship  to  other objects and  आवृत्ति  .
Physical theories  कि  incorporate time  ,  such  as  general  आपेक्षिकता   ,  are said to  कार्य  in 4-dimensional `` spacetime ``  ,  ( defined as  a   मिन्कोवस्की   स्पेस  ) .
Modern theories tend to be `` higher-dimensional '' including quantum field  और  string  theories   .
The state-space of quantum  यांत्रिकी   is  an infinite-dimensional function space .
The  अवधारणा  of dimension is not restricted  to  physical objects  .
high-dimensional  spaces occur in  गणित  and the sciences for  अनेक  reasons  ,  frequently  as   विन्यास   स्पेसेस  such as in Lagrangian  or  Hamiltonian  यांत्रिकी  ;  ये   हैं  abstract  स्पेसेस  , independent of the physical space we  सजीव  in .
fontana   (   )   is   a   नगर   of  200,762 residents in San Bernardino  काउंटी   ,   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   .
Founded  in  1913 ,  it  remained essentially  ग्रामीण  until World War  ii  , when  उद्योगों  Henry  J.   कैसर   निर्मित  a large  स्टील  mill in the area .
It is now  a   क्षेत्रीय   हब   of   the  trucking industry , with Interstate 10  और  State Route 210 transecting  the  city from east to west , and  अंतरराज्यीय   15  passing  diagonally  through  इसके  northwestern quadrant .
It is home to the largest  of   the   सैन  Bernardino County system  पुस्तकालयों  , a  संवर  historic  थिएटर   ,   a  municipal park , and  the  Auto Club  स्पीडवे  on  the   साईट   of  the Kaiser  स्टील  Mill .
Fontana  भी   होस्ट   the  Fontana Days  हाफ  Marathon and  5k   चलाएं  .
This  रेस  is the  तीव्रतम   half-marathon  course in the  संसार   .
the   u.S.  2012  जनसांख्यिकी  reported  कि  Fontana 's population was 200,762  in  2012 ,  बनाना   it  the second most populous city  in  San Bernardino  काउंटी  county and 14th in the  राज्य  .
Cowboys Stadium is  a  stadium  साथ   a  retractable roof  in   आर्लिंगटन  , Texas  .
It  serves  as the home  of   the  National  फ़ुटबॉल  League  's  Dallas Cowboys .
It replaced the partially  covered  Texas Stadium , which opened in  1971  , and served  as  the Cowboys  '  home through  the   2008  season .
it   थी  completed on  may  27 , 2009 .
The stadium seats  85,000   ,   बनाना  it the third largest  स्टेडियम  in the  एनएफएल  by seating  क्षमता  .
The maximum  क्षमता  of  the  stadium , including standing room , is 105,000  .
The  पार्टी  Pass  (  open areas  )   भाग  are behind seats in  प्रत्येक  end zone and  on   a   श्रेणी  of six  elevated  platforms connected by stairways  .
It has  the  world 's  largest   column-free  interior  और   the  fourth  largest   ऊँची   परिभाषा  video  स्क्रीन  ,  जिससे   hangs  from 20  यार्ड  line to  20   यार्ड  line  .
The facility  can  also  be  used  लिये  a variety  of  other activities  बाहर  of  इसके   प्रमुख   purpose  ( professional football  )  such as concerts  ,  basketball games , boxing  मिलान  ,  कॉलेज   फ़ुटबॉल  and  ऊँची  school football  प्रतियोगिताओं   ,   सॉकर   मिलान  ,  और   motocross  races .
Canadian  इतिहासकारों   जबतक  the 1980s tended  to  focus on economic  इतिहास   ,  including labour history  .
In part  इस   is   क्युकी   कनाडा  has had far  कम  political  or   सैन्य   विरोध  than  अन्य   समाजों  .
इस   थी  especially true  in   the   पहला   हाफ  of  the   बीसवीं  century  जब   आर्थिक   इतिहास  was  overwhelmingly   प्रबल  .
Many  of  the most prominent English Canadian  इतिहासकारों  from this period were  आर्थिक  historians , such as  हेरोल्ड  Innis ,  डोनाल्ड   creighton  and  आर्थर  R.  M.  Lower
Scholars of Canadian  इतिहास   यहूद   वारिस   to   the   परंपराओं  that developed in  यूरोपीय   और   the  United States  ,  but frameworks that worked well elsewhere often failed in Canada .
the  heavily  मार्क्सवादी  influenced economic history  कि   dominates  Europe has little relevance to most  of  Canadian history  .
A  फ़ोकस  on  क्लास   ,   शहरी   क्षेत्रों   ,   और  industry  fails   to   पता   कनाडा  's  ग्रामीण   और   संसाधन  based economy .
Similarly  ,   the   monetarist  school that is dominant in the United States also has been difficult to transfer north of the border  .
the  study of  आर्थिक  history in  कनाडा   became  highly focused on  आर्थिक  geography , and for many  सालो  the  प्रबल   स्कूल   of  thought has  महरूम  the staples  लेख  .
This  स्कूल  of thought  bases  the study of the Canadian economy on  the  study  of  natural  संसाधन  .
This  दृष्टिकोण  has  चूंकि   भी  become  प्रयुक्त   बाहर  of  कनाडा  in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   और  in many  विकासशील  nations  .
Before the  आगमन   of  Europeans ,  the  First Nations of  कया  would  become   कनाडा  had  a   विशाल  and  हर्षोल्लास  trade network  .
Furs  ,   टूल्स   ,  decorative  वस्तुएं   ,  and other goods were often transported  हज़ारों   of   किलोमीटर  ,  ज़्यादातर  by  कैनो   throughout  the many  नदियाँ  and  झीलों  of the region .
The early  यूरोपीय  history of  the  Canadian economy is  प्रायः  studied through  the  staples thesis which argues the  कनाडाई   अर्थव्यवस्था  developed  through   the   शोषण  of a series  of  staples that would be  exported   to  Europe .
carbon-14  , 14C ,  or  radiocarbon  ,  is  a   रेडियोसक्रिय   समस्थानिक   of  carbon  साथ  a  केंद्रक  containing 6 protons and 8  neutrons  .
इसके  presence in organic  सामग्री  is the  आधार  of the  radiocarbon   डेटिंग  method pioneered by  willard   लिब्बी   और   सहयोगियों  ( 1949  )  to date archaeological ,  geological   और   hydrogeological  samples  .
Carbon-14 was  खोजा   on  27  फ़रवरी  1940 , by Martin Kamen and  sam  Ruben  at   the  University  of   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  Radiation Laboratory  in  Berkeley ,  हालांकि  its existence had been  सुझाया   by  Franz Kurie in 1934 .
वहीँ  are  तीन  naturally occurring isotopes  of  carbon  on  Earth  :   99   %   of   the  carbon is  carbon-12   ,  1  %   is  carbon-13  ,   और  carbon-14 occurs  in  trace amounts , i.e.  ,  making up about  1  part  प्रति  trillion (  0.0000000001  % ) of  the   कार्बन  in  the   माहौल  .
The  half-life   of   carbon-14   is  5,730±40  सालो  .
Carbon-14  decays  into nitrogen-14  through   बीटा  decay  .
The  प्राथमिक  natural source of  carbon-14  on Earth is cosmic ray  कार्रवाई   upon   नाइट्रोजन   in  the  माहौल   ,  and  it   is   इसलिए  a cosmogenic  nuclide   .
However  ,   open-air  nuclear testing between 1955–1980 contributed to this pool  .
The different isotopes  of  carbon  do  not  differ   appreciably   in  their  रासायनिक   गुण   .
This  is  used  in   रासायनिक  and biological  शोध  , in a  तकनीक  called carbon labeling :  carbon-14  atoms can be  प्रयुक्त  to replace nonradioactive  कार्बन   ,  in order  to   ट्रेस  chemical and  biochemical  reactions  involving  carbon atoms  इससे   कोई  given organic  यौगिक  .
बिजली   is  a highly visible  रूप   of   उर्जा  transfer
Lightning strikes are  विद्युत   discharges  on  a  massive scale  between  the atmosphere and  an  earth-bound  ऑब्जेक्ट  .
वे  mostly  originate   in   thunderclouds   और  terminate on  the  ground ,  पुकारा   बादल  to  मैदान  ( CG )  बिजली  .
However ,  वे  may  भी   be  initiated from  a  very tall grounded object  और  reach  into  the  बादल  .
हालांकि  ``  a  lightning strike ''  is  commonly used  to  describe all lightning  ,  it is rather erroneous and  a   misnomer  ,  as   तभी   परिचय   25  % of all lightning events worldwide are  cg  , the large bulk  of  lightning events are  intracloud  (  ic   )  or Cloud to  बादल  (  cc   )  ,  जहाँ  discharge only  occurs  high in  the   माहौल   .
The scientific  नाम  for the complete  प्रक्रम   of  a single lightning event is a and it  is  a very  जटिल   ,  multiple stepped interaction  ,  which  is  not  completely  understood .
सबसे   cg   flashes  only  ``  strike  ''  one  शारीरिक   स्थान  , referred  to  as a  termination   .
The primary  conducting   चैनल   ,  the bright  coursing   लाइट   तुम   may  see  और  call a `` strike '' , is  तभी   परिचय  1 inch  in   व्यास   ,  although  to  our  आँखें  it looks  much  larger  .
वे   हैं   मील  long ,  upwards   of   tens   of  miles  .
और   the  entire  फ्लैश  , lasts  तभी  a few  भिन्नों   of  a  दूसरी   ,   सबसे  of  जिससे  is not visible to human eyes .
थंडर  is  सदा  produced by  बिजली  .
Just  जैसे  lightning , that  deceives   हमारी   आँखें   ,   प्रायः  looking  larger   or  closer than it  वाकई  is ,  the  earth 's  माहौल   और  our  दिमाग  's  बोध   of  the  बाहर  world , ultimately determines whether it is `` heard '' or not  .
Lightning can not  happen   in  a  वैक्यूम   विहीन   of   ions  , nor can  थंडर  occur without molecules  to  vibrate .
Thunder is  a   शारीरिक  absolute for every single  फ्लैश  of  बिजली   .
Contrary  to  popular belief  ,  a  बिजली  strike  itself  is  प्रायः   नहीं  responsible for  अनेक  deaths  or   चोटों  from a single  इवेंट  .
it  would  be  impossible given the  प्राकृतिक   tendencies   of  a flash  ,   जबतक   लोगों  or animals were  stacked   on  top  of   प्रत्येक  other , or they  यहूद  somehow  arranged  vertically and  भाग  of the flash  चैनल  .
जब  lightning ignites an available fuel source  और  an  विस्फोट   occurs   ,   it  is  the  shock wave or fire  causing  the injuries , not the strike itself  .
Ground Currents  ,   भी  called step  संभावित  , of an  धरती  termination is  कया   truly  causes  सबसे   चोटों  or death  to  humans and animals .
the  near instantaneous rush of surface  आरोप  , induced by the  ओवरहेड   thundercloud  itself ,  रेस  to the  स्ट्राइक   पाइंट  from hundreds to thousands of  फीट   दूर  during discharge  .
This  वर्तमान   ,  caused during each  स्ट्रोक  ,  takes  the path of least  प्रतिरोध   ,   जिससे   may   be  ion rich  इंसान  or animal  टाँगे   ,  over  poorly  conducting  धरती  .
This is why it is best to  crouch  ,  साथ  feet close together , if  कभी  caught  in  the open during  a   अंधड़  .
दुर्भाग्यवश  ,  सबसे  reports do not draw a distinction between  the  real cause  of  injury or  मौत  , be it the strike itself , a  resulting   विस्फोट  or  आग  ,  or   प्रायः   जिम्मेदार  step potential .
पीटर  F. Kilmartin (  born  1962 ) is  the  current  attorney  General of Rhode Island .
Kilmartin  is  also  a   रिटायर्ड  police captain and  a   पूर्व  member of  the  Rhode  द्वीप  House of Representatives .
a   युगल   following  their marriage  in   the  Manti Utah  टेम्पल  .
sealing  is an ordinance  (  ritual  )   performed   in  Latter Day  संतो   मंदिरों   by  a person  पकड़कर   the  sealing authority  .
The purpose of  इस   अध्यादेश  is  to  seal familiar  संबंध   ,  making  संभावित  the existence of family relationships throughout eternity .
lds   शिक्षाओं  place great importance  on  the specific  प्राधिकार   जरूरी  to perform these  sealings  .
गिरिजाघर   doctrine   सिखाती   कि  this  प्राधिकार  ,  पुकारा   the  Priesthood  ,  corresponds  to  that  दिए   to  Saint Peter  in  .
sealings   हैं  typically performed as  विवाह  or as sealing  of  children  to  parents  .
वे   यहूद   performed   prior   to  the  मौत  of Joseph Smith ,  jr.  ( the main founder of the Latter  दिन   संत  movement )  ,  and are  फिलहाल  performed in  the  Church  of  Jesus Christ of Latter-day  संतो   .
हालांकि   कुछ   अन्य  denominations , such as the  जातियाँ  of Christ , view sealing as an  centuries  of Smith  's  practice of  बहुवचन   विवाह  , some  do   स्टिल   perform   उन्हें   .
The 2000s  ,  pronounced  ``  two thousands  ''   ,  was  a  decade  कि   began   on  January 1  ,   2000   ,   और  ended on December  31   ,  2009  .
Globalization ,  जिससे  had  त्वरित  after the  जल्दी  1990s fall of communism , continued to  be  a force in the 2000s  .
the   विकास  of the Internet  थी   एक  of  the   प्रधान  contributors to globalization during  the  decade  ,   बनाना  it possible for  लोगों   to  interact with  अन्य  people  ,   एक्स्प्रेस   विचार  ,  introduce  others to  अलग   संस्कृतियों  and backgrounds  ,  use goods and services  ,   बेचें  and buy online , research and learn about things  ,  along with experiencing the  संसार   बगैर   having  to  छोड़  home .
The institutions  ,  linkages  और   technologies   कि   उभरा  or  यहूद  redefined earlier  होता  subsequently in  इस  decade  लाभ  many  देशों   ,   in   particular  China  और   इण्डिया  .
however   ,  in other  भाग  of  the  world  ऐसे   प्रगति  failed to address  जारी  struggles  साथ   आधुनिकता  ,  सबसे   notably  characterized by the rise  of  al-Qaeda and  अन्य  Islamist  समूह  .
the   सितंबर  11 attacks  in  2001 led to the United  राज्य   ,   संयुक्त  Kingdom , Spain  ,  Canada  और   अन्य   राष्ट्र  invading Afghanistan , as well as implementing various anti-terrorist  उपायों   at  home and  विदेश   in  what  थी   ज्ञात   as  the  युद्ध   on   आतंक  .
The  यूरोपीय   संघ  saw further integration  और   विस्तार   throughout  much  of  Europe .
The economic growth  of   the  2000s had considerable environmental consequences ,  उठाया  demand  लिये   घटाते   उर्जा  resources  ,  and  थी  still shown to  be  vulnerable as  demonstrated   दौरान   the  Global  वित्तीय  Crisis  of  the late 2000s .
The Gunfight  at  the  o.k   .  Corral was  a   gunfight  that  took   प्लेस  at about 3:00 p.m.  on   बुधवार  ,  अक्तूबर  26 , 1881 , in  tombstone  , Arizona Territory , and is generally regarded as  the  most famous  gunfight   in  the history  of  the American Old West  .
The  gunfight   ,   believed  to have  lasted  only about thirty seconds  ,  was fought  between  the  गैरकानूनी  Cowboys Billy Claiborne  ,  Ike and Billy  clanton   ,  and  tom   और  Frank  mclaury  , and  the  opposing town Marshal  वर्जिल   earp  and  उसके  brothers Assistant  कस्बा  Marshal Morgan and  अस्थाई   lawman  Wyatt , aided  by  Doc  हॉलिडे  designated  as  a temporary marshal by Virgil .
Ike Clanton and Billy Claiborne  भागा   इससे   the  fight  unharmed   ,   लकिन  Ike 's  bhai  Billy Clanton  थी  killed ,  साथ  with  दोनो  McLaurys .
lawmen   वर्जिल  and Morgan  earp   और  Doc  हॉलिडे  were wounded .
Only  व्याट   earp  came  through   the   लड़ो  unharmed .
the  fight  रै  come to  represent  a  समय   in  American  इतिहास  when the frontier  थी  open  दायरा   लिये  outlaws  opposed   by   विधि  enforcement  कि   थी  spread thin over vast territories  ,  leaving  कुछ   क्षेत्रों   unprotected   .
The gunfight  थी  not  खूब  known to  the  American public  जबतक   1931   जब   लेखक   स्टुअर्ट  Lake published what has since  महरूम   संकल्पित   to   be  a largely  fictionalized  biography  ,  Wyatt  earp  : Frontier Marshal , two years after Earp 's  मौत   .
Lake retold his story  in   a   1946  book that  निदेशक   जॉन  Ford developed into  the   फिल्म  My Darling  clementine  .
After  the   फिल्म  Gunfight at  the  O.K . Corral  थी   released  in  1957  , the shootout came to be known by that  नाम  .
Since then ,  the  conflict  रै  been portrayed with varying degrees of  सटीकता  in  numerous   पश्चिमी  films  और  books .
despite  its  नाम  , the gunfight actually occurred in  a  narrow lot six doors  वेस्ट   of  the rear entrance to  the   o.k  .  corral   on   fremont  Street , and also  in  the  गली  .
The two opposing parties  यहूद  initially  तभी   परिचय   अलावा  .
About thirty  गोलियाँ   यहूद   fired   in   तीस   सेकेंड  .
Ike Clanton  दायर  murder  आरोप  against  the   earps  and  दस्तावेज़  Holliday but  वे   यहूद   आखिरकार  exonerated by a  लोकल  judge  बाद   a  30-day preliminary  सुनना   और  then again by a local grand jury .
on  December  28   ,   1881   ,   वर्जिल  Earp  थी  maimed in an  हत्या  attempt  by  the outlaw  cowboys  , and  on   कूच   18  ,  1882  ,  वे   assassinated   मॉर्गन  Earp  .
the  suspects furnished solid  alibis  , and  newly   नियुक्त  Deputy U.S  .  Marshal Wyatt Earp took  matters  into his own hands  दौरान  the  earp  Vendetta Ride , ironically  धड़ा   by   काउंटी   शेरिफ  Johnny Behan  साथ   वारंट   लिये  the Earp 's arrest .
HDMI ( High-Definition  मल्टीमीडिया   इंटरफ़ेस  )  is  a  कॉम्पैक्ट  audio/video interface  लिये  transferring uncompressed  वीडियो   आंकड़ा  and  compressed/uncompressed   डिजिटल  audio data from a HDMI-compliant  यंत्र  ( `` the source device ''  )  to a  संगत   कंप्यूटर  monitor  ,  video projector  ,  digital  टेलीविज़न  ,  or   डिजिटल  audio  यंत्र  .
hdmi  is  a  digital replacement  लिये   मौजूदा   एनालॉग  video standards .
There are a  क्रमांक  of HDMI-standard cable  कनेक्टर्स   उपलब्धियाँ  , each  of   जिससे   can  be used  लिये   कोई  uncompressed  tv  or  pc   वीडियो  format  ,   सहित   मानक   ,  enhanced , high definition , and  3d   वीडियो  signals ; up to  8  channels of  संपीडित  or  uncompressed   डिजिटल   ऑडियो  ; a  cec  ( Consumer Electronics  कंट्रोल  ) connection ; and an  ईथरनेट  data connection  .
hdmi  implements the EIA/CEA-861 standards , which define  वीडियो  formats and waveforms , transport  of   संपीडित   ,  uncompressed ,  और   lpcm   ऑडियो  ,  auxiliary   आंकड़ा  , and implementations of  the  VESA EDID  .
The CEC  allows  HDMI devices  to  control each other when necessary and allows  the  user  to   operate  multiple devices with one remote control handset .
Because HDMI is electrically compatible with the  cea-861  signals used  by   डिजिटल   विज़ुअल  interface ( DVI  )  , no signal conversion  is  necessary  ,  nor is  वहीँ  a  घाटा  of video quality when a DVI-to-HDMI  एडाप्टर  is used  .
As  an  uncompressed  cea-861  connection  ,  HDMI  is  independent of the various digital television  मानकों   प्रयुक्त  by individual devices  ,   ऐसे  as ATSC  और   dvb   ,   as  these are encapsulations  of  compressed MPEG  वीडियो   स्ट्रीम  ( which  can  be decoded and  आउटपुट  as an uncompressed  वीडियो  stream on HDMI ) .
Production  of  consumer HDMI products started in  लेट  2003  .
in   यूरोपीय  either DVI-HDCP or HDMI  is  included in the  hd  ready in-store  labeling  specification for TV sets  लिये  HDTV ,  प्रतिपादित  by  eicta   साथ   ses   अस्त्र  in  2005   .
HDMI began to appear on consumer HDTV camcorders and digital still  कैमरे  in 2006 .
as   of  January 8  ,   2013  , which is ten  सालो  after the  रिलीज  of the first  hdmi   specification  ,  over   3  billion HDMI devices have shipped  चूंकि  the  लॉन्च   of  the HDMI standard  .
ब्री  Van de  kamp  ( née Mason ;  भी   ज्ञात   in   the   श्रेणी  as Bree  होज  and Bree Weston )  is  a  fictional  character and one of the four protagonists on  the   एबीसी   टेलीविज़न   श्रेणी  Desperate  housewives  .
She  is   निभाई   by   अभिनेत्री   marcia  Cross ,  जो  has  प्राप्त  multiple awards and nominations for her portrayal , including an  एमी  Award nomination , three  सुनहरी  Globe Award nominations , and two Screen Actors  गिल्ड  Awards .
क्रॉस   's  portrayal of  ब्री   रै  been  widely  praised  by  critics and fans .
क्रॉस  originally auditioned  लिये  the role of  मरियम  Alice Young  ,   लकिन  series creator Marc Cherry  विचार  she was better suited  लिये  the role of Bree  .
Dana  delany  , who eventually  थी   डाल  as Katherine  mayfair   ,  was originally chosen  लिये  the  भूमिका  but  turned  it  bas  , saying it was  too   समान  to  उसके   भूमिका   in  Pasadena  .
Bree 's main struggle  throughout   the  series has  महरूम  her  कोशिशें   to  maintain a perfect life  despite  various  बाधाएं   ऐसे   as   widowhood  , divorce  ,   और  alcoholism  hindering  her .
वो   रै  been  शादीशुदा   तीन   टाइम्स  ; to  रेक्स  Van  de  Kamp  (  Steven Culp )  ,   orson  Hodge (  काइल   maclachlan  ) and  ट्रिप  Weston (  स्कॉट  Bakula ) .

Algoma  is   a  city in Kewaunee County  in   the   u.S.   राज्य  of  विस्कॉन्सिन  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 3,167 at the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .

The  hangover   भाग   ii  is  a  2011  अमरीकी   कॉमेडी  film produced by Legendary Pictures  और   वितरित  by Warner Bros. Pictures .
It is the  sequel  to 2009  's  The Hangover and the second film  in   the   hangover   मताधिकार  .
टॉड  Phillips directed  the  film in addition to  co-authoring   the   स्क्रिप्ट  with  क्रेग   mazin  ,  और  Scot Armstrong  .
The film  सितारों  Bradley  कूपर  , Ed  helms  ,  zach  Galifianakis ,  केन   jeong  ,  जेफरी   tambor  ,  जस्टिन   bartha  and Paul Giamatti  .
The  hangover  Part  ii  tells the story  of  Phil ,  stu   ,  Alan ,  और  Doug as they travel  to   थाईलैंड   लिये  Stu 's wedding .
After the  स्नातक   पार्टी   in  Las Vegas  ,  Stu takes no chances  और  opts  लिये  a safe  ,  subdued pre-wedding  brunch   .
however  , things do  नहीं   go   as  planned , resulting  in  another bad hangover with no  यादें   of   the  previous night  .
Development of The  hangover   भाग  II began in  अप्रैल  2009  ,  two months before The  hangover  was released  .
The principal actors  यहूद   डाल   in  March 2010  to  reprise  उनके   भूमिकाएँ   इससे   the  first film .
उत्पादन   began  in October 2010 , in Ontario ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,   पहले  moving on location in  थाईलैंड   .
The film  थी  released on  may   26  ,  2011  and , despite receiving mostly negative reviews from critics  ,  it  became   the  highest-grossing  r-rated   कॉमेडी  during its  नाट्य   चलाएं   .
A third film is  नियत   लिये   on  May 24 , 2013 .

The English  पुनर्जागरण  was a cultural  और   कलाकारी  movement  in   इंग्लैण्ड   डेटिंग  from  the   लेट  15th and early  16th  centuries  to  the  जल्दी  17th century .
It is  संबद्ध   साथ  the pan-European Renaissance  कि   is  usually regarded  as   शुरूआत   in   इटली  in the late 14th century  .
Like most of  उत्तरी   यूरोपीय  , England saw little of these  developments  until  अधिक  than a  सदी  later .
The beginning  of  the English  पुनर्जागरण  is often  लिया   ,  as a convenience  ,  to  be  1485 , when  the  Battle  of  Bosworth Field ended  the   युद्धों  of the  गुलाब   और   उदघाटन  the Tudor  राजवंश  .
पुनर्जागरण   स्टाइल   और   विचार   ,   however   ,   यहूद  slow  in   penetrating   इंग्लैण्ड  , and  the   elizabethan   era  in the second half  of   the   16th   सदी  is usually regarded as  the  height of  the   अंग्रेज़ी   पुनर्जागरण  .
एलिज़ाबेथ   ऐन  Bloomer Warren  ``   बेट्टी  ''  घाट  ( April  8  ,  1918  – July 8 , 2011  )  ,  थी  First Lady  of  the  संयुक्त  States from 1974 to 1977 during the presidency  of  her husband Gerald  घाट  .
As First  महिला  ,  वो   थी  active in social  नीति  and created  precedents  as  a  politically  क्रियाशील  presidential wife .
throughout  her  husband   's  term  in   दफ्तर  ,  वो  maintained  ऊँची   स्वीकृति   दरजा   despite  opposition  इससे  some  रूढ़िवादी   republicans  who  objected   to   उसके  more moderate  और  liberal  स्थितियाँ   on   सोशल  issues .
Ford was noted  लिये  raising breast  कर्कट  awareness  following  her  1974  mastectomy and was a passionate supporter  of  ,  और  activist for ,  the  Equal Rights Amendment  (  ERA )  .
pro-choice  on  गर्भपात  and a  नेता  in the Women 's Movement  ,  she gained  कीर्ति   as  one of  the   सबसे  candid first  महिलाओं   in  history  ,   commenting   on   प्रत्येक  hot-button  समस्या   of   the  time , including feminism , equal  अदा  ,  the  ERA ,  sex   ,   दवाएँ   ,   गर्भपात   ,  and gun control  .
वो  also  उठाया  awareness of addiction when she announced her  long-running  battle  साथ  alcoholism  in   the   1970s  .
Following  उसके   श्वेत   हाउस   सालो  , she  जारी   to  lobby for the  era  and remained  क्रियाशील   in  the feminist movement .
She was the founder , and served as the  पहला   कुर्सी  of the  फलक   of  directors  ,  of the Betty Ford Center for substance  गाली  and addiction  और   is   a  recipient of the Congressional Gold  पदक   (  co-presentation  साथ   उसके  husband ,  जेराल्ड  R. Ford , October 21 , 1998 )  और  the Presidential  पदक   of   स्वतंत्रता  ( alone ,  प्रस्तुत   1991  ,  by  George  H.  W.  बुश   )  .
Platelet endothelial cell adhesion molecule ( PECAM-1 )  भी   ज्ञात  as  क्लस्टर  of  differentiation  31 ( CD31  )   is  a  प्रोटीन  that in  इंसान  is  एनकोडेड  by  the   pecam1  gene found  on   chromosome  17  .
PECAM-1 plays a key role in removing aged  neutrophils   इससे   the   देह  .

the  Miss  फ्लोरिडा  USA  प्रतियोगिता   is   the   pageant   कि  selects the representative for  the   राज्य  Florida in  the   मिस   यूएसए   pageant  .
जबकि   फ्लोरिडा  has  महरूम  successful  in  terms  of   runners-up  ,  finalists   और  semi-finalists  ,  the state has  never  won the Miss USA  pageant  , although Cheryl Patton became Miss  यूएसए   बाद   सिल्विया  Hitchcock won Miss  ब्रह्मांड   .
फ्लोरिडा  's  बेहतरीन  results  यहूद   दौरान   the  mid-1960s to mid-1970s .
उनके   सबसे  recent finalist  थी   lissette   गार्सिया  who  लगाई  in the top  16   in   2011   .
दो   पूर्व   मिस  Florida  टीन  USA  titleholders  have  जीती  this competition  ,   और  three titleholders have also competed at Miss America .
The current titleholder  is  Michelle Aguirre of Hialeah .
Anglo-Saxon England refers to the period  of   the  history of  the   भाग  of Britain that  became  known as  इंग्लैण्ड   ,   स्थायी  from the end  of   रोमन   occupation  and establishment  of   anglo-saxon   kingdoms  in the 5th  सदी  until the  नॉर्मन   conquest   of  England in 1066 by William the Conqueror .
Anglo-Saxon is a  सामान्य   पद  referring to the Germanic peoples who came  to   ब्रिटेन  during  the  5th and  6th   सदियां  ,  सहित  Angles , Saxons  ,  Frisii , and  jutes  .
the   पद  also refers  to   the   भाषा   बोला   at  the  समय  in England ,  जिससे   is  now called Old English  ,  and to the culture  of   the  era ,  जिससे  has long attracted popular  और  scholarly attention  .
जबतक  the 9th  सदी  Anglo-Saxon England was dominated by  the  Heptarchy , the kingdoms of Northumbria  ,  Mercia , East Anglia , Essex , Kent , Sussex , and  wessex  .
in   शर्तें   of   धर्म  the  kingdoms  followed Anglo-Saxon  paganism   दौरान   the  early  काल   ,   लकिन  converted to Christianity  दौरान   the  7th  सदी   .
Paganism  था   a  final stronghold  in  a period  of  Mercian hegemony during the 640s , ending  साथ   the   मौत   of  Penda of Mercia  in  655 .
facing  the  threat   of   viking   invasions  ,  the  House of Wessex became dominant  दौरान  the 9th century  ,  under the rule of  अल्फ्रेड  the Great .
दौरान  the 10th century  ,  the individual kingdoms unified under  the  rule  of  Wessex into  the   किंगडम   of  England  ,  which stood opposed to the  danelaw   ,  the Viking kingdoms  स्थापित   इससे   the  9th  सदी  in the north and  ईस्ट   of   इंग्लैण्ड   .
The Kingdom  of   इंग्लैण्ड   गिरी  in the Viking  आक्रमण  from  डेनमार्क  in  1013   और   थी  ruled  by  the House  of  Denmark  जबतक  1042 , when  the   anglo-saxon  House  of   wessex   थी  restored  .
The last  anglo-saxon  king  ,  Harold  godwinson   ,  was killed  in  1066 at the Battle of Hastings .

Smoked salmon is a preparation  of   सामन   ,   typically  a fillet that  रै  been cured and  hot  or  ठंडा  smoked .
due   to   इसके   मध्यम   ऊँची  price  ,  smoked  सामन  is considered a delicacy .
Although the  पद   lox  is  sometimes  applied to smoked salmon , they  हैं  different  उत्पाद  .
View  of   defibrillator  electrode  स्थिति  and placement  .
Defibrillation is  a   आम   उपचार   लिये   life-threatening  cardiac  dysrhythmias   ,   ventricular   fibrillation   ,  and  pulseless   ventricular   tachycardia   .
Defibrillation  consists  of delivering  a  therapeutic dose  of  electrical energy to the  प्रभावित   दिल   साथ  a device called  a  defibrillator  .
This depolarizes a critical mass of the heart  मांसपेशी  ,  terminates  the dysrhythmia , and  allows  normal sinus rhythm to be  reestablished  by the body 's natural  pacemaker  ,  in  the  sinoatrial   नोड  of  the   दिल   .
Defibrillators can be external , transvenous  ,   or  implanted  ,  depending on the type  of  device used  or  needed  .
कुछ  external units , known as automated  बाह्य   defibrillators   (   aeds   )   ,   automate  the diagnosis  of  treatable rhythms  ,  meaning that lay responders or bystanders  हैं   समर्थ  to use them successfully with little , or in  कुछ  cases  no  training at all .
Gabrielle ``  कोको   ''  Bonheur Chanel  (  August 19 ,  1883   –  January 10  ,   1971  ) was a French  फ़ैशन  designer and  संस्थापक  of the Chanel brand  .
वो  was the  तभी   फ़ैशन   पंक्तियां  to  appear   on  Time  पत्रिका  's  सूची   of   the  100  सबसे  influential people of the 20th century .
साथ   साथ  Paul Poiret  ,  Chanel was credited with liberating  महिलाओं   इससे  the  constraints  of the `` corseted silhouette  ''  and popularizing  the   स्वीकृति  of  a   sportive   ,   कैज़ुअल  chic  as   the  feminine  मानक   in   the  post- World War  i   era   .
A  सफल   फ़ैशन   निर्माता  ,  चैनल  's influence  विस्तारित  beyond couture clothing .
उसके   डिज़ाइन  aesthetic was realized in jewelry , handbags  ,  and  महक  .
Her signature scent , Chanel No . 5  ,   रै  become an  iconic   उत्पाद   .
Chanel  थी  known  लिये   उसके  lifelong determination ,  महत्वाकांक्षा  and energy  जिससे   वो  applied to  उसके  professional  और  social life  .
She  हासिल   दोनो  success as a businesswoman and social prominence  धन्यवाद  to  the  connections she made through her work  .
These included many  कलाकारों   और  craftspeople  to  whom she became a patron  .
however  ,  चैनल  's  अत्यधिक  competitive , opportunistic personality led her to make questionable life  चुनाव   जिससे  have generated controversy around her reputation ,  विशेषकर   उसके  behaviour  दौरान  the German occupation of France in World  युद्ध   ii  .

A  gristmill  ( also :  grist  mill ,  मकई  mill or  आटा   मिल  ) grinds grain  into  flour  .
the  term  can  refer to  दोनो   the   पीस   यांत्रिकी  and the building  कि  holds it .
रोमानिया  (  ;  dated  spellings   roumania  and Rumania ;  )  is a  देश  located at the intersection of  सेंट्रल  and  southeastern  Europe  ,  bordering  on  the  ब्लैक  Sea  .
रोमानिया  shares  a  border with Hungary and  सर्बिया  to the  वेस्ट   ,  Ukraine and Moldova to the northeast and east , and  बुल्गारिया   to  the south .
At , Romania is the eighth largest country  of  the European Union  by  area  ,   और  has  the  seventh largest  जनसांख्यिकी  of  the  European  संघ   साथ  more than  19  million people .
Its capital  और  biggest city is  बुखारेस्ट  , the  11th   largest  city  in  the EU .
The United  principalities  emerged when the  territories   of  Moldavia and  wallachia  were  संयुक्त  under  प्रिंस   सिकंदर  Ioan  cuza  in  1859  .
in   1866  Prince  karl   of   hohenzollern-sigmaringen  was  पुकारा  to the  सिंहासन  as the  सत्ताधारी  Prince of the  रोमानियाई  Principate and  in   1881  he was finally crowned  as  King Carol I the first monarch of  the  Kingdom of Romania .
स्वतंत्रता   इससे   the   उस्मानी   साम्राज्य  was declared on 9  may  1877  ,   और   थी   internationally  recognized the following  साल   .
At the  समाप्त   of   संसार  War I ,  transylvania  , Bukovina  और  Bessarabia united with the Kingdom  of   रोमानिया   .
संसार   युद्ध  II gave cause to  the   वृद्धि   of  a military dictatorship in Romania  अंतर्गत  fascist General  आयन  Antonescu ,  जो  chose to fight on the side of  the  Axis powers  इससे  1941 to 1944 .
After  उसके  removal  ,  Romania switched  पहलू   in  1944  और   joined  the Allies .
By  the   समाप्त  of the war , some  formerly  Romanian  northeastern   territories   यहूद  occupied by the Soviet  संघ  ,  साथ   रेड   फौज   इकाई   stationed  on Romanian soil .
in   1947   रोमानिया  forcibly became a People 's Republic (  1947-1965  )  और   a  member of the Warsaw  अनुबंध   .
In 1965  nicolae  Ceauşescu  became  General Secretary  of   the  Romanian  कम्युनिस्ट   पार्टी  , and the harsh austerity measures  ,  political repression  ,  and cult  of   व्यक्तित्व  he implemented led  to  the Socialist Republic of  रोमानिया   (   1965-1989   )  becoming the  सबसे   stalinist  police state in the Eastern bloc  .
Eventually his authoritarian government was  toppled  in December 1989 during the Romanian Revolution of  1989  .
साथ  the fall  of  the Iron Curtain  ,   रोमानिया  began its transition  towards   लोकतंत्र   और   a  capitalist market economy .
After  a  decade of post-revolution economic  समस्याएं  and living-standards decline ,  extensive  reforms fostered  आर्थिक   रिकवरी   .
As of 2010 ,  रोमानिया   is  an  upper-middle-income  country with a high  इंसान  development index .
रोमानिया   joined  NATO  on  29 March 2004  ,  and  the   यूरोपीय   संघ  on  1   जनवरी   2007  .
It  is   भी  a member of the  :   लैटिन  Union ,  francophonie  , OSCE ,  wto   ,   bsec  ,  संयुक्त  Nations  ,  etc .
Today , Romania  is  a unitary semi-presidential republic ,  in  which the executive branch consists of  the   अध्यक्ष   और   the   सरकारी  .

The times before writing belong  either   to  protohistory  or  to  प्रागितिहास  .

Ancient history is  the   पढ़ाई  of  the  written past  इससे   the  beginning  of  recorded  इंसान  history to the  जल्दी   मध्य   आयु   .
The  स्पैन  of  अंकित   इतिहास   is   roughly   5,000   सालो   ,  with Cuneiform  स्क्रिप्ट   ,  the oldest  खोजा  form of coherent  लिखने   ,  from the protoliterate period  around  the 30th century  bc  .
This  is  the beginning  of   इतिहास  ,  as   opposed   to  prehistory  ,   according   to   the  definition  प्रयुक्त  by  सबसे  historians .
The term classical antiquity is often used  to  refer to  इतिहास  in  the  Old World  इससे  the beginning of  अंकित  Greek  इतिहास  in 776 BC  (  First Olympiad ) .
This roughly  coincides  with the  परंपरागत  date of  the  founding  of  Rome  in  753 BC  ,  the beginning  of   the   इतिहास  of ancient Rome , and the beginning of  the  Archaic period  in  Ancient  यूनानियों  .
Although  the  ending  तिथि  of ancient history is disputed  ,   कुछ   पश्चिमी   विद्वानों  use the  पतन  of  the   पश्चिमी  Roman  साम्राज्य  in  476  AD , the closure of  the   platonic   अकादमी  in  529   ad   ,  the death  of  the emperor Justinian  i  , the coming of Islam  or  the rise  of   शारलेमेन  as the  समाप्त  of  प्राचीन  and  शास्त्रीय   यूरोपीय  history .
in   इण्डिया  ,  the  period  शामिल   the  early  काल   of  the  मध्य  Kingdoms , and , in  चीन   ,  the time  up  to the Qin  राजवंश  is  शामिल  .
Methylcobalamin  (   दिखाया  ) is a form  of  vitamin B12 .
physically  it  resembles  the  अन्य  forms of vitamin B12 , occurring  as  dark red  crystals  that freely form  cherry-colored  transparent solutions  in  water .
विटामिन   b12  , vitamin  b12  or  विटामिन   b-12   ,  also  पुकारा   cobalamin  ,  is   a   water-soluble  vitamin  साथ  a key role  in   the   सामान्य  functioning  of   the  brain  और   बेचैन  system , and  लिये   the   गठन  of  रक्त  .
It is  एक  of  the   आठ  B  विटामिन   .
It  is   सामान्यतः  involved in the metabolism of  प्रत्येक  cell  of   the  human body  ,  especially affecting  डीएनए   संश्लेषण   और   विनियमन  , but also  वसीय  acid  संश्लेषण  and  उर्जा   उत्पादन  .
neither  fungi  ,  plants  ,  nor animals are capable  of  producing vitamin B12  .
Only bacteria and  आर्किया  have  the   एंजाइमों   जरूरी   लिये  its synthesis , although  अनेक  foods are  a  natural source of B12  क्युकी   of   बैक्टीरियल   symbiosis   .
the  vitamin is  the  largest and  सबसे  structurally complicated  विटामिन   और  can be produced  industrially  only through bacterial  fermentation-synthesis  .
Vitamin B12 consists  of  a  क्लास  of  chemically   सम्बन्धित  compounds ( vitamers  )  ,  सब  of  जिससे   have  vitamin activity .
it  contains the biochemically rare element cobalt .
Biosynthesis  of  the  मौलिक  structure of the  विटामिन   is   संपन्नता   तभी  by  जीवाणु  ( which usually produce hydroxocobalamin  )  ,  लकिन  conversion between  अलग   फ़ॉर्म   of  the vitamin  can  be accomplished in the human body .
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin ,  cyanocobalamin  , does not occur  in  nature ,  लकिन   is  produced  इससे  bacterial hydroxocobalamin and then used  in   अनेक  pharmaceuticals  और  supplements , and  as   a   खाना   योगात्मक   ,  because of its stability and lower  उत्पादन   लागत   .
In  the  body it  is   परिवर्तित   to  the  इंसान  physiological forms methylcobalamin  और   adenosylcobalamin  ,  leaving  behind  the  cyanide  ,  albeit  in   minimal  concentration .
More recently , hydroxocobalamin  ,  methylcobalamin  ,   और  adenosylcobalamin can  be   मिला  in  अधिक  expensive pharmacological  उत्पाद  and food  पूरक  .
The extra  यूटिलिटी   of  these  is  currently debated .
Vitamin  b12  was discovered  इससे   इसके  relationship  to   the   बीमारी   घातक  anemia , which is  an  autoimmune  बीमारी  in  जिससे  parietal  कोशिकाएं   of  the  पेट   जिम्मेदार  for secreting  मूलभूत  factor are destroyed .
मूलभूत  factor is crucial  लिये  the  सामान्य  absorption of  b12   ,   so  a lack  of   मूलभूत   फ़ैक्टर  , as  देखी  in pernicious anemia ,  कल्याणकारी   a   विटामिन   b12   कमियां  .
अनेक  other subtler  kinds   of  vitamin  b12  deficiency and their biochemical  प्रभाव  have since  महरूम   elucidated  .
The  रोमन  Empire (  )   थी  the post- Republican  काल   of   the  ancient Roman civilization  ,  characterised by an  निरंकुश  form  of   सरकारी   और  large territorial  holdings  around  the   भूमध्यसागरीय  in  यूरोपीय   ,  Africa ,  और  Asia .
The 500-year-old Roman  गणतंत्र  , which  preceded  it , had  महरूम   destabilized   through  a series of  सिविल  wars  .
अनेक  events marked the transition from Republic to Empire ,  सहित  Julius Caesar 's  नियुक्ति  as  perpetual  dictator  (  44 BC ) ;  the   बैटल   of   actium  ( 31  bc  ) ; and  the  granting  of  the honorific  augustus  to Octavian  by   the   रोमन  Senate (  27  BC ) .
the   पहला   दो   सदियां   of  the Empire were a  काल   of  unprecedented stability  और  prosperity  ज्ञात  as the Pax  romana  (  ``  Roman Peace '' ) .
It reached its greatest  expanse  during the reign  of   त्राजान  ( 98–117  ad   )   .
In the 3rd  सदी   ,  the Empire underwent  a  crisis that threatened its existence  ,  but  थी  reunified and stabilized under  the  emperors  aurelian   और   diocletian  .
Christians rose  to  power in the 4th century , during which  समय  a system  of   डुअल   नियम   थी  developed  in   the  Latin  वेस्ट  and  यूनानी  East .
बाद  the collapse of central government in  the   वेस्ट  in  the   5th  century  ,  the  पूर्वी   हाफ  continued as what would later be known  as  the  बीज़ान्टिन  Empire .
Because  of   the  Empire 's  विशाल  extent and long endurance , the institutions  और   संस्कृति   of  Rome had  a  profound and lasting influence  on  the development  of   भाषा  , religion  ,  architecture  ,   दर्शनशास्त्र   ,   विधि  , and  फ़ॉर्म   of  government in the territory it  governed   ,   विशेषकर  Europe  ,  and  by  means of European  expansionism   throughout  the  आधुनिक   संसार   .
कुल  body surface area ( TBSA ) is an  मूल्यांकन  measure of burns of  the  skin  .
In  वयस्कों  , the `` rule of  nines   ''   is  used  to   determine   the   कुल  percentage of  क्षेत्रफल   burned  for each major  खण्ड   of  the body  .
In some cases  ,  the burns may  कवर  more than  एक  body  भाग  , or  may   नहीं  fully  कवर   ऐसे   a  part ; in  ये   मामले  ,  burns   हैं  measured by  using  the  casualty   's  palm as a  सन्दर्भ   पाइंट  for  1  %  of  the  देह   .
For children and infants  ,  the  lund-browder  chart is used to assess the  burned  body surface  क्षेत्रफल   .
Different percentages  हैं   प्रयुक्त   क्युकी  the ratio  of   the   संयुक्त  surface  क्षेत्रफल   of   the   सिर  and neck to the  सतह  area  of   the  limbs  is   typically  larger in  children  than  कि   of   an   वयस्क  .
ठेठ  values for common groups of  इंसानो   follow  .
(  due  to  rounding   ,   मान   may   नहीं   add  to 100  %  .  )
संसार  infant  मृत्यु   दरों   by   पाँच   सालो   averages   in  2008  .
