यूनुस   किर्स्टन  Sorrentino ( born  जून   26  ,  1975  ) ,  बेहतर  known  by   उसके  stage name KJ-52 , is a Christian rapper from Tampa , Florida  .
The ``  kj  '' part  of   उसके  name refers to  उसके  old rap  alias   ,  ``  किंग   J.  Mac , '' a name which he  बाद  described in one of his podcasts  as  ``  horribly  cheesy .  ''
``   52  '' ,  जिससे  is pronounced  ``  five two  ''  ,  नहीं   ``   fifty-two  ''  ,  is a reference to  the   biblical  story of Jesus feeding the multitude  साथ  five  loaves  and  दो   मछली  , which is also sung  परिचय   in  his  सोंग  `` Push Up  ''  from The  yearbook  and in the  ``   kj  Five  दो   ''  on It 's Pronounced  'five   दो  .
He  थी   awarded   the   rap/hip   हॉप   अंकित  Song of  the  Year  लिये   ``  Never Look Away '' and Rap/Hip Hop  एल्बम   of   the  Year at the GMA  dove  Awards  of  2007 .
on   जुलाई   28  , 2009  ,  KJ-52 released `` End of  my  Rope ''  ,   जिससे  is the  पहला  single  लिये  his  एल्बम  Five-Two Television  .
उसके   सोंग  `` Dear Slim '' is  आधारित   on  Eminem  's   सोंग   ``   स्टेन  `` and  is   a   sort  of personal  संदेश   इससे   kj-52  to  एमिनेम   .
the   उपाधि  symbol ( °  )   is   a  typographical  प्रतीक  that is used  ,  among other things , to represent degrees  of   चाप   (   e.g  . in geographic  निर्देशांक  systems  )  ,  घंटों   (  in  the  medical field ) ,  or  degrees  of  temperature .
the   प्रतीक   consists   of  a  छोटी  raised circle  ,   historically  a  शून्य   glyph   .
In  युनिकोड   it   is  encoded at  .
इस  is a list  of  roots  ,   प्रत्यय  , and prefixes  प्रयुक्त  in medical terminology ,  उनके   meanings  , and their etymology  .
वहीँ  are  a  few  नियम   जब   using  medical roots .
Firstly  ,   prefixes  and suffixes , primarily in  यूनानी  , but  भी  in  लैटिन  ,  have   a   droppable   -o-   .
As  a   सामान्य  rule  ,  this  -o-   लगभग   सदा   अधिनियमों  as a joint-stem to connect two consonantal  जड़ें   ,   e.g  . arthr- + -o-  +   logy   =   arthrology  .
But generally , the -o- is  dropped   जब   connecting   to   a  vowel-stem  ;   e.g  .  arthr-   +   itis   =  arthritis  ,   बजाय  of  arthr-o-itis   .
secondly  , medical  जड़ें  generally go  साथ  according  to  language  :  Greek  prefixes  go  साथ  Greek suffixes  और   लैटिन   prefixes  with Latin suffixes .
Although international scientific  शब्दावली  is not stringent about  segregating  combining forms of  अलग  languages ,  it   is  advisable  जब   coining   नई  words not  to   मिक्सर   अलग  lingual roots .
पेट  cancer ,  or  gastric cancer ,  refers  to  कर्कट   arising  from any  भाग  of  the  stomach .
पेट   कर्कट   कल्याणकारी  about 800,000  मौतों   विश्वव्यापी   प्रति   साल   .
prognosis   is   ग़रीब  ( 5-year survival < 5  to  15 % ) because  सबसे   मरीजों   उपस्थित   साथ  advanced disease  .
सारा   lynn  Evans ( born February 5  ,  1971  )  is  an  American country singer  और   songwriter  .
लिये  her entire career  ,   वो  has been  हस्ताक्षरित  to  आरसीए  Records Nashville .
इवांस  '  डेब्यू   ,  Three  मदारी   और  the Truth ,  किया  not  उपज   a   शीर्ष   40  hit on the Hot  देश  Songs charts .
वो   followed   इस   up   साथ  No Place That Far ( 1998  )   ,  Born to  मक्खी   (  2000 )  ,  Restless  (   2003   )  and  रियल   ठीक   प्लेस  ( 2005  )   .
no  Place That Far received  a  gold certification from  the   रिकॉर्डिंग  Industry  संघ  of America ( RIAA  )  ,  जबकि  the  अन्य  three albums  सब  were certified platinum .
These  discs  include the number 1 singles  ``   no   प्लेस   कि  Far ``  ,   ``  Born  to  Fly `` ,  ``  Suds  in   the  Bucket `` and  ``  A Real Fine  प्लेस   to  Start  ``  , plus the top 10 hits ``  i   could  Not  पूछो  for  अधिक   ``   (   a  cover of the  एडविन   मैक्केन  song  )  , ``  i   रखना   looking  `` ,  ``   पूर्ण   ``   और  ``  cheatin  ' ``  .
Her  2007  Greatest Hits included  the   शीर्ष   15  hits ``  तुम  'll Always Be My Baby `` and ``  as   if   ``  .
Stronger ( 2011 ) included her fifth  क्रमांक  1  hit  ,  ``   a   छोटी   बिट  Stronger  ``   ,   जिससे  was co-written  by   हिलेरी  Scott of Lady  antebellum  .
Evans has also won one  पुरस्कार   प्रत्येक  from Billboard ,  the  Academy of  देश   म्यूज़िक  , Country  म्यूज़िक  Association ,  ब्रॉडकास्ट  Music Incorporated ( BMI )  और  a Dove Award .
The  संसार   's  principal  धर्मों  and spiritual traditions may be classified  into  a  छोटी  number of major groups ,  हालांकि  this  is  by  no   अर्थात्  a uniform  अभ्यास  .
इस  theory began  in  the 18th century  साथ   the  goal of recognizing the relative  स्तर  of civility  in   समाजों  .
berliners   watching   a   c-54   जमीन  at Tempelhof Airport ( 1948 )
The  बर्लिन   नाकेबंदी  ( 24 June 1948 – 12 May  1949   )  was  एक   of  the  पहला  major  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  crises  of   the  Cold War  .
During the multinational occupation of  post–world   युद्ध  II Germany ,  the  Soviet Union blocked  the  Western  allies  ' railway  ,  road  ,  and  कनाल  access to  the  sectors  of   बर्लिन  under  अलाइड   कंट्रोल   .
Their aim  थी   to  force the  पश्चिमी  powers to  allow  the Soviet zone  to  start  supplying  Berlin  साथ  food and fuel , thereby  giving   the   soviets   व्यावहारिक  control over the  संपूर्ण  city  .
In  जवाब  , the  पश्चिमी   allies  organized the Berlin  एयरलिफ्ट  to carry  आपूर्तियाँ  to  the   लोगों  in West  बर्लिन  .
aircrews   इससे  the United  राज्य  Air Force  ,  the  अंग्रेजों  Royal  एयर  Force  ,  the Royal Australian  एयर  Force  ,  the  royal  Canadian  एयर   फ़ोर्स  ,  the   royal   नई  Zealand Air Force , and the  दक्षिण  African  एयर  Force flew  over  200,000 flights in one  साल   ,   providing  up to 4700 tons of daily necessities such as  ईंधन  and  खाना  to  the   berliners   .
By the spring  of  1949  ,   the   प्रयत्न  was  clearly   succeeding  and ,  by   अप्रैल  , the airlift  थी  delivering  अधिक  cargo  than   था  previously  महरूम   transported  into the city  by  rail .
The  कामयाबी  of the  बर्लिन  Airlift  brought  embarrassment to  the   soviets   जो   था   refused   to  believe  it   could  make a difference  .
The blockade was  lifted   in  May  1949  and  resulted  in  the  creation of two separate  जर्मनी  states .
the  Federal Republic  of   जर्मनी  ( West Germany  )  and the  जर्मनी  Democratic Republic  (  East Germany  )  split  up  Berlin .
in   स्मरण  of the airlift ,  तीन   एयरपोर्ट   in  the  पूर्व  western  zones  of  the  city  परोसा  as  the   प्राथमिक  gateways to Germany  लिये   another  fifty years  .
The  यूरोपियन   चिह्न  ; logotype and handwritten .
The  यूरोपियन  sign  is  the currency sign used  लिये   the   यूरोपियन  , the official currency of  the  Eurozone  in  the European Union ( EU )  .
the   डिज़ाइन   थी   प्रस्तुत  to  the   पब्लिक  by the  यूरोपीय  Commission  on  12 December 1996 .
The international three-letter  कोड   (  according to  आईएसओ  standard  आईएसओ   4217   )   लिये   the   यूरोपियन  is  eur   .
In Unicode it  is   एनकोडेड   at   .
In English  ,  the  चिह्न  precedes the value .
in  some styleguides  ,  but  नहीं  others ,  the  euro sign is unspaced .
Mate  (  , ;  sometimes  also spelled maté )  ,  also known as  chimarrão   (   )  or  cimarrón  (  )  , is  a   परंपरागत  South American  infused   पेय   ,   विशेषकर  in  अर्जेंटीना  , Uruguay ,  पैराग्वे   और  the  दक्षिणी  states  of  Brazil and to a lesser  उपाधि  in south of Chile ,  the  Bolivian Chaco  ,  Syria and Lebanon  .
It is  prepared  from  steeping   सूखी  leaves of yerba  mate   (   llex  paraguariensis , known in  पुर्तगाली   as  erva-mate ) in hot water .
Mate is served  साथ  a metal straw from  a   साझा  hollow  calabash  gourd  .
The straw is  पुकारा  a  bombilla  in  कुछ  Latin  अमरीकी  countries , a bomba  in  Portuguese , and a bombija  or   ,  more generally ,  a   masassa  (  प्रकार   of  straw )  in  Arabic  .
the  straw is traditionally made  of  silver  .
Modern , commercially available  लोभी   हैं  typically made  of  nickel  चांदी  ,  पुकारा  Alpaca ; stainless steel ,  or   hollow-stemmed  cane .
The gourd is known  as  a mate  or   a  guampa  ;   जबकि   in  Brazil , it has  the   विशिष्ट  name  of   cuia   ,  or also  cabaça  (  the  name for Indigenous-influenced calabash  gourds   in   अन्य   regions   of  Brazil ,  स्टिल  used for  सामान्य  food  और  drink in  रिमोट  regions  )  .
भी  if  the  water  is  supplied from  a   आधुनिक  thermos , the  infusion  is  traditionally   नशे   इससे  mates or cuias .
as  with other  brewed  herbs  ,  yerba  mate   पत्ते  are dried  ,  chopped ,  और  ground into a powdery mixture  पुकारा   yerba  .
The bombilla acts as  दोनो  a straw  और  a sieve .
The  submerged   समाप्त  is  flared  , with small  छेद  or  स्लॉट   कि  allow  the   brewed  liquid in ,  लकिन   ब्लाक  the  चंकी  matter  कि  makes up  much  of the  मिश्रण  .
a  modern  bombilla   डिज़ाइन  uses  a  straight tube with holes , or spring sleeve to  अधिनियम  as  a   sieve  .
`` Tea-bag  ''  type infusions of mate  (  mate cocido )  have   महरूम  on the market in Argentina ,  पैराग्वे  and Uruguay  लिये  many years under such trade names  as   ``  Taragüí  vitality  '' in  अर्जेंटीना  , `` Pajarito  ''   और  ``  kurupí   ''   in   पैराग्वे  , and  in  Brazil  अंतर्गत   the  name  ``  Mate  leão  '' .
This  is  considered  a   completely  different drink  .
It  is   never   नशे   इससे  cuias or  पुकारा  chimarrão ,  nor   is   it   संबद्ध  with the gaucho/gaúcho  संस्कृति  .
The  ऑटोमोटिव  industry is a term  कि  covers  a   चौड़ी  range of companies and  संगठनों   शामिल   in  the design ,  विकास   ,   manufacture  , marketing ,  और   selling   of   मोटर  vehicles , towed vehicles , motorcycles and mopeds  .
It is one  of   the   संसार  's  सबसे  important  आर्थिक  sectors  by   आय  .
the  term automotive industry  प्रायः  does  नहीं  include industries dedicated to  the  maintenance of automobiles following delivery to  the  end-user  ,   ऐसे  as repair shops  और   मोटर   ईंधन   भरना   स्टेशन   .
the  term automotive  थी   निर्मित   इससे  Greek autos (  स्वः  ) , and  लैटिन   motivus   (  of motion  )   to  represent any  रूप  of self-powered vehicle .
This term was proposed  by  SAE member  एल्मर  Sperry .
दाउद  Michael  ``   डेव  ''  bautista   ,   jr.   (  born January 18 ,  1969  ) ,  is   an  American  मिश्रित  martial artist , bodybuilder  ,   कर्ता  , and former professional  पहलवान  best  ज्ञात   लिये   उसके   समय   in  World Wrestling  entertainment  competing under the  रिंग   नाम   बतिस्ता   .
In  डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई  , he became  a  six-time  संसार  champion , winning  the   संसार  Heavyweight Championship  चार  times  ,  and the WWE Championship  दो  times .
He  is   the  longest-reigning World Heavyweight Champion in  डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई  history  .
in   जोड  to these  championships  ,  बतिस्ता  has  जीती   the  World Tag Team  चैंपियनशिप   तीन   टाइम्स  (  twice  with Ric  फ्लेयर  and once with John Cena  )  and  the   डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई  Tag Team Championship once ( with Rey  मिस्टीरियो  ) .
Batista was also the winner of the  2005  Royal  rumble  match and  गई  on to headline WrestleMania  21  , one of the  शीर्ष   पाँच   highest-grossing   pay-per-view   कार्यक्रम  in  प्रो   कुश्ती   इतिहास  .
After trying out at World Championship Wrestling 's Power Plant , Batista signed a contract with  the  WWF in 2000 and was sent  to  its developmental  territory  , Ohio  घाटी  Wrestling ( OVW  )  , where  he   जीती  the OVW Heavyweight  चैंपियनशिप  .
In August  2012  , Bautista signed  a   अनुबंध   साथ   क्लासिक  Entertainment  &   खेल  to  लड़ो  in  मिश्रित   martial  arts  .
He won his MMA debut  on  October 6 , 2012  ,   defeating   विंस  Lucero via TKO  in  the  पहला   गोलाकार  .
Henry  T.   थामस  Sampson  ,  Jr. (  born  in Jackson , Mississippi in 1934 ) is  an  African-American inventor .
He graduated from high school  in  1951 from Lanier  ऊँची   स्कूल  in Jackson , Mississippi  .
He then attended Morehouse College  लिये   a   युगल  of  सालो  before transferring to  purdue  University where he became a member  of  the  ओमेगा  Psi  फाई  fraternity  .
He received a Bachelor  's  degree in science  इससे  Purdue  विश्वविद्यालयों  in 1956 .
He  ग्रैजुएट   साथ  an  ms  degree in engineering from the  विश्वविद्यालयों   of   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ,  लॉस  Angeles  in  1961  .
sampson  also received his  ms  in Nuclear Engineering from  the  University of  इलिनोइस  Urbana-Champaign in 1965  ,   और  his PhD  in  1967 .
He is  the   पहला  African  अमरीकी   to  earn a Ph.D.in Nuclear  अभियान्त्रिकी  in the United  राज्य  .
Some of his accomplishments  शामिल   होने  a  सदस्य  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य   नेवी   between  the  सालो   1962  and  1964   और  earning an  परमाणु   उर्जा  Commission honor between  1964  and 1967 .
Later  he   थी   awarded  the  ब्लैक  Image  पुरस्कार  from Aerospace Corporation in  1982  .
he  was awarded the  अश्वेतों  in Engineering ,  लागू  Science Award , and prize for  शिक्षा  ,  by   the   लॉस   एंजिल्स  Council  of  Black  पेशेवर  Engineers  in  1983 .
in  June 2007  ,  Sampson was married to Laura Howzell Young in St. Thomas ,  u.S.  Virgin  आइलैंड्स  .
Young-Sampson  is   a  professor in the  कॉलेज  of  शिक्षा   at  California State University San  bernardino  .
Robert Lane  गिब्स  (  born  March 29 ,  1971  )  is  a  वरिष्ठ  campaign adviser for  us  President Barack Obama .
Previously , he  थी   the  28th White  हाउस  Press  सचिव   .
Gibbs  थी   the   संचार  director  लिये  then-  u.s   .  Senator Obama and his 2008 presidential  अभियान   .
गिब्स  ,  जो   रै   worked  with Obama  चूंकि   2004  , was  दबायें  secretary of  जॉन  Kerry 's 2004 presidential campaign and has previously specialized in Senate  अभियान  , having  परोसा  as communications director for  the  Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee and for four individual Senate campaigns  ,   सहित   those  of  ओबामा  in 2004  और  Fritz Hollings in 1998 .
Gibbs was also  the   दबायें   सचिव   of  Representative  bob  Etheridge .
On November 22  ,  2008 ,  गिब्स  was announced  as  the  दबायें   सचिव  of the Obama  प्रशासन   .
He assumed  the   भूमिका   of  press secretary  on  January 20  ,   2009   ,   और  gave his  पहला   आधिकारिक  briefing  on   जनवरी  22 .
On January  5  ,  2011   ,  Gibbs  घोषित  that  he   होता   छोड़   the  White  हाउस   to  become an  बाहर  adviser  to  the administration .
He left  on  February  11  , 2011 .
On February 12 , 2013 , it  थी  announced that Gibbs had  महरूम  hired  as   a  contributor  लिये   cable-news   चैनल  MSNBC  .
His  पहला  appearance  थी   on  the  वही  night prior to the  2013  State  of  The Union  पता  .
Armando  pérez   (   born  January 15 ,  1981  ) ,  बेहतर  known  by   उसके   स्टेज  name  pitbull  , is an American  rapper  ,  songwriter  ,  और   रिकार्ड   निर्माता   .
उसके  first recorded  प्रदर्शन   थी  from the Lil Jon  एल्बम   किंग्स  of  crunk   in  2002  .
In  2004  , he released his debut album  titled  M.I.A.M.I .  (   छोटी   लिये  Money  is  A  प्रमुख  Issue  )  under TVT Records .
Since then  ,  he  रै  released  तीन   अन्य  albums under  the   लेबल  : El Mariel in  2006   ,   the  Boatlift  in  2007  ,  and Planet Pit  in   2011  .
He released  rebelution  in 2009  ,  which included singles ``  i  Know  तुम   want  Me (  calle  Ocho ) `` and `` Krazy `` .
The latter  peaked  at No . 30 on  the  Hot  100  and  no  .  11   on  the  hot  Rap Tracks  चार्ट  while ``  i  Know You Want  me  ''  peaked  at No . 2 on the Hot 100 and  peaked  within the top ten spots  of   चार्ट  in the UK  ,   कनाडा   ,   इटली   ,  and the  नीदरलैंड्स  .
The song reached  no  . 1  in  France and the European  hot   100  on  the   सप्ताह  ending  अगस्त  29  ,  2009 according  to  Billboard magazine  .
He  बाद  signed  साथ  Polo  grounds   म्यूज़िक  through  सोनी   म्यूज़िक   और  created his own label  mr.   305  Inc .
Another single from Rebelution was ``  होटल   रूम   सेवा   ``  , which peaked  at  No .  8   on  the  hot   100   .
Rebelution went  on  to sell over  7.5  million worldwide  डिजिटल  singles  और  albums combined .
Nevertheless ,  he   dropped  a smash  पुकारा  `` Give Me Everything '' which reached #  1   विश्वव्यापी   ,   और  featured  कलाकारों  Ne-yo , Nayer  ,  and Afrojack .
He has also  performed   as  a featured  कलाकार   in   the   remixes   of   अनेक  other  hit  songs  ,   जैसे  Tik  टोक  , Scream & Shout ,  lo  Hecho Esta Hecho , Bad  ,  Papi  ,  Diamonds , How  कम  , Tonight  (   i  'm Lovin '  तुम  )  ,   वीडियो  Phone , Over  to  You Now and  bumpy  Ride .
pérez   is  also the host  of  his  अपना  Spanish-language program on the  केबल  channel Mun2  titled  La Esquina (  स्पेनी  for The  कोने   )  .
In  2005  Pérez  और   rapper  Sean  'diddy  '  combs   co-founded  Bad  लड़के   लातीनी   ,   a  subsidiary of Combs ' Bad  लड़के  Records label  .
it  primarily focuses  on   लैटिन  hip hop  ,   लैटिन  soul , Latin  पॉप   और   अन्य   तीव्र  music ,  और  has  कार्यालयों   in  New York  और  Miami  ,  Florida .
साथ  with co-founding it , Pérez currently  heads  the A  &   r  division of  the  label  .
Pérez  रै  become  a  product endorser ,  representing  alongside Drake  ,  Rihanna , and  trey  Songz the  “so  Kodak” campaign  लिये   the  Kodak  ब्रांड  and embarking  on   a   साझेदारी   साथ  the soft  पेय   दानव  Dr Pepper  as   भाग   of  the  अभियान  “ Vida 23 ”  लिये  which  he  recorded  the  song  specifically  featured on his album Armando .
pitbull  also  घोषित  he has  become   the  spokesperson  लिये  Voli Vodka ,  in  which  he   holds  a majority  इक्विटी  stake , and Budweiser has chosen  pitbull  to promote  इसके  Bud  लाइट   लकीर  of  बियर   .
The commercials  फिलहाल   हाइलाइट   pitbull  dancing and gyrating  on  stage  पकड़कर   up  a bottle of Bud Light .
Pitbull has also purchased an equity stake in Miami  subs   पिज़्ज़ा  and Grill  .
Halloween  or   hallowe'en  ( a contraction  of   ``   सब  Hallows  '   संध्या   ``  ) , also known as  सब   hallows  '  संध्या  ,  is  a yearly  जश्न  observed in  a  number of  देशों  on October 31 , the  संध्या   of   the  Western  ईसाई  feast of  सब  Hallows (  or  All  संतो  )  और  the day initiating  the   triduum  of Hallowmas .
according  to many  विद्वानों  , All  hallows  ' Eve is  a   christianised  feast originally  बहकावे  by western European harvest festivals , and  त्यौहार   of  the dead with  संभावित  pagan  जड़ें   ,  particularly the Celtic Samhain  .
Other scholars maintain that it  originated  independently  of  Samhain and has solely  ईसाई   जड़ें  .
Typical  त्यौहार  Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ) , attending costume  पार्टियों  ,  नक्काशी  pumpkins into  jack-o'-lanterns   ,  lighting bonfires , apple bobbing , visiting haunted  आकर्षण  ,  playing  pranks  ,  telling  डरावने  stories  ,  and watching horror films  .
Freedom  of  speech  is   the  political right to  communicate   एक   's  opinions  और  ideas  using  one 's body and property to  anyone  who  is   willing  to receive them  .
The  पद   स्वतंत्रता  of  अभिव्यक्ति  is sometimes used synonymously ,  लकिन   शामिल  any  अधिनियम  of seeking , receiving  और   imparting  information or ideas ,  regardless  of the medium used .
In practice , the right  to   स्वतंत्रता  of  वाक  is not  निरपेक्ष   in  any  देश  and  the   सही  is  commonly  subject  to   सीमाएं  , as  साथ  libel  ,   बदनामी   ,   obscenity   ,   राजद्रोह  ( including  ,  for  उदाहरण  inciting  जातीय  hatred  )   ,   कापीराइट  violation  ,   रहस्योद्घाटन  of information that is classified  or   वरना  .
the  right to freedom of expression  is  recognized as a human  सही  under Article 19 of the Universal Declaration  of   इंसान  Rights and recognized  in  international human rights  विधि   in   the  International Covenant  on  Civil  और   राजनैतिक  Rights (  iccpr   )  .
आलेख  19 of  the  ICCPR states  कि   ``   [   e  ]  veryone  shall  have  the right  to  hold  राय   बगैर  interference  ''  and `` everyone shall have  the   सही   to   स्वतंत्रता  of  अभिव्यक्ति  ; this right shall  शामिल  freedom  to   तलाश   ,   प्राप्त  and impart information and ideas  of   सब  kinds , regardless  of   frontiers  , either  orally   ,   in  writing or  in  print ,  in  the  रूप  of art  ,   or  through  कोई  other  मीडिया  of  उसके  choice  ''  .
आलेख  19 goes on to say that  the  exercise  of  these rights  carries  ``  खास  duties and responsibilities ``  और   may   ``  therefore be  विषय   to   निश्चित   प्रतिबंध  '' when  जरुरी  ``  [   f   ]   or  respect of  the   अधिकारों  or  प्रतिष्ठा   of  others  ''  or  ``   [  f ]  or   the   सुरक्षा   of  national security  or   of   पब्लिक  order ( order  पब्लिक   )  , or  of  public  स्वास्थ्य   or   नैतिकता  '' .
Freedom  of  speech  may  be legally  curtailed   in  some  धार्मिक   विधिक   प्रणालियों  and in  धर्मनिरपेक्ष   jurisdictions  where  it   is   मिला  to cause religious offense ,  ऐसे  as the British  जातिगत  and Religious Hatred  अधिनियम   2006   .
सिडनी  Harbour from the air ,  प्रर्दशित   the  Opera House , the CBD ,  गोलाकार  Quay , the Bridge , the  parramatta  River , North  सिडनी   और  Kirribilli  in  the foreground
the  Sydney Harbour Bridge  is   a  steel through  मेहराब   सेतु   आरपार  Sydney Harbour  कि   carries   रेल  ,  vehicular   ,  bicycle and  पैदल  traffic  between  the Sydney central business  ज़िला   (  CBD  )  and the North Shore .
the   नाटकीय   दृश्य   of  the  सेतु   ,   the  harbour  ,  and the  आसपास  Sydney  ओपेरा   हाउस  is an  iconic   चित्र  of  सिडनी  ,  नई  South Wales , and Australia .
the  bridge  is   nicknamed   ``   the  Coathanger ''  क्युकी   of  its arch-based  डिज़ाइन  .
Under the directions of Dr  j.j.c   .  Bradfield  of  the NSW Department of Public  works  ,  the   सेतु  was  designed   और  built by  अंग्रेजों  firm  dorman  Long and Co Ltd  of  Middlesbrough  और   खोली   in   1932   .
the  bridge  's  design was  बहकावे   by   the   नरक  Gate Bridge  in   नई   यॉर्क  .
It  थी   the   संसार   's  widest  long-span  bridge , at 48.8  मीटर  (  160   फीट   )  wide  ,  until  निर्माण  of the  नई  Port  मन   सेतु   in  Vancouver  .
It is  भी   the   पांचवां  longest  spanning-arch  bridge in the world ,  और   it   is  the  tallest   स्टील  arch bridge  ,  measuring  इससे  top to  जल   स्तर  .
जबतक  1967 the  harbour   सेतु   थी   सिडनी  's  tallest  structure .
The  हवाई  hotspot  is  a  volcanic  hotspot located near  the  namesake Hawaiian Islands  ,   in   the   उत्तरी   प्रशांत   समंदर  .
एक   of   the   सबसे   well-known  and  heavily   पढ़ाई   हॉटस्पॉट  in  the  world ,  the   हवाई  plume  is  responsible  लिये   the  creation  of  the Hawaiian  –   सम्राट  seamount chain  ,   an   over  5,800 kilometres  (   3,600  mi  )   long   कड़ी  of volcanoes , four of which are  क्रियाशील  , two of which are  dormant  ,  और  more than 123 of which are extinct ,  अनेक   having   चूंकि   महरूम   मैदान  beneath the waves  by  erosion  as   seamounts   और  atolls .
The  कड़ी   extends  from south  of   the  island  of   हवाई   to  the  किनारे  of the  aleutian  Trench  ,  near the eastern edge of  रूस  .
While  सबसे  volcanoes are created by  geological  activity at tectonic plate boundaries , the  हवाई  hotspot  is   स्तिथ   दूर  from nearby plate boundaries  ;   the   क्लासिक   हॉटस्पॉट   सिद्धान्त   ,  first  प्रस्तावित  in  1963  by John Tuzo Wilson ,  proposes   कि   a   सिंगल  ,  फिक्स्ड  mantle  plume  builds volcanoes that  तब  , cut off from their source by the  गति   of  the Pacific  थाली   ,   become  increasingly inactive  और   आखिरकार  erode below sea level  over  millions  of   सालो  .
according  to  इस  theory  ,   the  nearly  60°  bend  separating   the  Emperor and Hawaiian segments of the chain was  caused   by   a   अचानक  shift in  the   गति   of  the Pacific  थाली  .
in  2003  ,  fresh  investigations  of this  irregularity  led to  the   प्रस्ताव   of  a  मोबाईल  hotspot theory  ,  suggesting  कि  hotspots  हैं  mobile , not fixed ,  और  that  the  47 million year old bend was  caused  by  a   शिफ़्ट   in   the  hotspot 's  गति  rather than the  थाली   's  .
Ancient Hawaiians were  the   पहला  to  recognize   the   increasing   आयु  and weathered state  of  the volcanoes  to  the north as they progressed on fishing  रिझाने   साथ  the  आइलैंड्स  .
The volatile state  of   the  Hawaiian  ज्वालामुखी  and their constant battle with the  समुद्र  was  a   प्रमुख  element in  हवाई  mythology , embodied  in  Pele  ,   the  deity  of  volcanoes .
After  the   आगमन  of Europeans on  the  island  ,  in 1880-1881  जेम्स  Dwight  दाना  directed  the  first  औपचारिक  geological  पढ़ाई  of the  हॉटस्पॉट  's volcanics , confirming the  संबंध  long observed  by   the  natives  .
1912  चिह्नित  the founding  of  the  हवाई   ज्वालामुखी  Observatory by volcanologist Thomas Jaggar , initiating continuous  वैज्ञानिक   अवलोकन  of the  आइलैंड्स   .
In the 1970s , a mapping  प्रोजेक्ट  was  initiated   to   लाभ  more  सूचना   परिचय  the complex geology  of  Hawaii  's  seafloor  .
The hotspot has since been tomographically imaged ,  प्रर्दशित  it to be  चौड़ी  and  up  to  गहन  , and  ओलीवाइन  and garnet  -आधारd  studies have shown its  मैग्मा  chamber is approximately  .
In its at least 85 million  सालो   of   कार्यकलाप   the  hotspot has produced an  अनुमानित   of   चट्टान   .
the  chain 's rate of  बहाव   रै   धीरे  increased over  समय  , causing  the   राशि  of time  प्रत्येक  individual volcano is active to decrease  ,   इससे   18  million  सालो  for  the  76 million year  बूढ़ा  Detroit  seamount  , to  बस   अंतर्गत   900,000  for  the   एक  million year-old Kohala ; on the  अन्य  hand  ,  eruptive volume has increased  इससे  per year  to  about  .
overall   ,  this has caused  a  trend towards  अधिक  active  लकिन  quickly-silenced  ,  closely spaced  volcanoes—whereas  volcanoes  on  the  निकट  side of the  हॉटस्पॉट  overlap each other (  forming  such superstructures as Hawaii  द्वीप   और   the  ancient Maui Nui )  ,  the oldest  of   the  Emperor seamounts  हैं  spaced  as  far as apart  .

osteonecrosis   of  the  जबड़ों  (  onj  ) is  a  severe  अस्थि  disease  कि   affects  the  maxilla  and  the  mandible  .
Various forms of ONJ  have   महरूम  described  over  the last 160  सालो  ,  और  a number of  कल्याणकारी  have  महरूम  suggested in the literature .
Osteonecrosis of the jaws  संबद्ध  with bisphosphonate therapy  ,  required by some  कर्कट  treatment  regimens  , has been identified  और  defined  as   a  pathological  एंटिटी  since  2003  .
The possible risk from lower oral doses  of   bisphosphonates  , taken  by  patients to  prevent  or treat  ऑस्टियोपोरोसिस   ,   remains  uncertain .
Various treatment  विकल्प  have been  छान  ,  however  severe cases of ONJ  स्टिल   आवश्यकता  surgical removal of the  प्रभावित   अस्थि  .
A thorough  इतिहास  and  assessement  of  pre-existing   प्रणालीगत   समस्याएं  and possible sites of  दंत  infection are required to  सहायता  prevent  the   कंडीशन  , especially if bisphosphonate therapy is considered .
The Boston  रेड   sox  are a  पेशेवर   बेसबॉल   टोली  based  in   बोस्टन   ,   मैसाचुसेट्स   ,  and  a   सदस्य  of  प्रमुख  League  बेसबॉल   's   अमरीकी  League Eastern Division  .
संस्थापित  in as one  of  the  अमरीकी   लीग  's  आठ  charter franchises  ,   the  Red  sox  's home ballpark has  महरूम  Fenway Park since  .
The  ``   रेड   sox   ''  name  थी   चुनी  by  the  team owner ,  जॉन  I.  टेलर  , around  ,  following  पिछला   बोस्टन  teams  कि  had been known as the  ``  Red Stockings `` .
They have played  in   11  World  श्रेणी  ,  जीतना  7  .
Boston was  a  dominant  टोली  in the new league , defeating  the  Pittsburgh Pirates in the  पहला  World Series in and winning four more championships by .
However ,  वे  then went  into   एक  of the  longest  championship droughts in baseball history ,  पुकारा   by  some  the  `` Curse  of   the   bambino  ``  बाद  its alleged  शुरूआत   साथ   the  Red  sox  's  बिक्री   of  Babe Ruth  to  the  प्रतिद्वंद्वी  Yankees two  सालो  after their world championship  in  1918  ,  an 86-year wait  पहले   the  team 's  छठे   संसार   चैंपियनशिप  in .
However ,  the   टोली  's  इतिहास   दौरान   कि   काल   थी   hardly   एक  of futility ,  लकिन  was rather  punctuated  with  कुछ  of  the  most  यादगार  moments in World  श्रेणी  history  ,   सहित   enos  Slaughter 's ``  mad   डैश   ``   in   ,  the ``  नामुमकिन  Dream  ``  of ,  कार्लटन  Fisk  's  home  चलाएं  in  ,  and  विधेयक  Buckner  's  error in  .
Red  sox  history has also been  चिह्नित  by  the  team 's  तीव्र   फंसने   साथ  the New York Yankees , arguably the  fiercest   और  most historic in North  अमरीकी  professional sports .
the   बोस्टन  Red Sox are owned  by  Fenway Sports Group , who  भी  own  लिवरपूल   फ़ुटबॉल  Club  of   the   प्रीमियर  League  in   इंग्लैण्ड  .
The  रेड   sox  are consistently one of  the  top  एमएलबी   टीमों  in  औसत   सड़क   उपस्थिति   ,  while the small capacity of  fenway  Park  रोकता  them from  अग्रणी  in  overall  attendance .
इससे  May  15   ,  2003  to   अप्रैल  10 ,  2013  ,  the  Red Sox  बेची   आउट  every home game-a total of 820 games ( 794 regular season ) for a major  पेशेवर   खेल   रिकार्ड   कि  lasted  लगभग   a  decade .
Mince  पाई  filled with mincemeat
mincemeat   is  a mixture  of  chopped  सूखी  fruit , distilled spirits and spices ,  और  sometimes beef suet  ,  beef ,  or  venison .
Originally  ,   mincemeat   सदा  contained meat  .
अनेक  modern recipes contain  बीफ  suet ,  हालांकि  vegetable  shortening   is   sometimes  used in  इसके   प्लेस  .
Variants of mincemeat  हैं  found  in   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , Brittany , Canada ,  उत्तरी   यूरोपीय   ,  Ireland  ,  South  अफ़्रीकी   ,  the United  किंगडम  and the United States  .
In  कुछ   देशों  the  पद  mincemeat refers to  minced   or   मैदान  meat  .
डायना   ,  Princess of Wales (  डायना   frances   ;  née  स्पेंसर   ;  1  जुलाई  1961 –  31  August 1997  )   थी  the first  बीवी  of  चार्ल्स  ,  प्रिंस   of  Wales ,  the  eldest  बेटे   और  heir apparent  of  Queen Elizabeth II  .
She was well known  लिये  her fund-raising  कार्य  for international charities and  as   an  eminent  हस्ती  of the  लेट   20th   सदी  .
Her  विवाह   to  the Prince  of  Wales on  29   जुलाई   1981  was held  at  St Paul 's Cathedral and  देखी   by  a  वैश्विक  television audience of over  750   लाख  .
जबकि  married  वो   bore   the  titles Princess of Wales  ,   duchess   of  Cornwall , Duchess  of   rothesay   ,  Countess  of  Chester and Baroness of  renfrew  .
the  marriage  उत्पादित  two  बेटे  , the princes  विलियम   और  Harry , who  became  second  और  third in  लकीर  to the British throne  .
Diana was  born  into an aristocratic English family  साथ  royal ancestry .
वो   थी  the  चौथी   चाइल्ड  of John Spencer , 8th  अर्ल  Spencer and  उसके   बीवी  Frances ,  बेटी  of  मौरिस  Roche ,  4th   सामन्त   fermoy  .
She became a public figure  साथ  the announcement of  उसके  engagement .
She also received  मान्यता   लिये  her  दान  work  और  for  उसके  support  of   the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Campaign to Ban Landmines .
इससे  1989 ,  वो  was  the   अध्यक्ष   of  the  ग्रेट  Ormond Street Hospital  लिये   children   ,  in addition to  दर्जनों   of  other charities .
Diana  remained   the   ऑब्जेक्ट  of worldwide media  scrutiny  during  और  after her  विवाह   ,   जिससे  ended  in  divorce on 28  अगस्त  1996 .
मीडिया   ध्यान   और   पब्लिक  mourning  यहूद   considerable  following  उसके   मौत   in  a car crash  in  Paris on 31 August 1997  .
अर्जेंटीना  ,  officially   the  Argentine  गणतंत्र   (  )  ,   is   the   दूसरी  largest  देश   in  both South America  और   the  Latin  अमेरिका  region  .
The country  is  a federation of  23   प्रांतों   और   the  autonomous  नगर  of Buenos  आयर्स   ,   इसके  capital and largest city .
it   is  the  आठवीं   -largest   देश   in  the  संसार   by   जमीन   क्षेत्रफल  and the  largest  among Spanish-speaking  राष्ट्र   by  geographical area of 2,780,400  km2  and is  the  fourth by population , with over 41  लाख   लोगों   .
Argentina is a founding  सदस्य   of   the  United  राष्ट्र  ,  mercosur  ,  the  Union  of   दक्षिण  American  राष्ट्र  , the  संगठन   of  Ibero-American  राज्य  ,  the  World  बैंको  Group and  the  World Trade Organization , and is one  of   the  G-15 and G-20  प्रमुख  economies  .
अर्जेंटीना  is located  in   दक्षिण  America , bordered by Chile  to   the   वेस्ट  and south , Bolivia and Paraguay to the north  और   ब्राज़ील   और  Uruguay to  the   पूर्वोत्तर  .
अर्जेंटीना  claims sovereignty over  भाग  of  अंटार्कटिक   ,  the  फ़ॉकलैंड   आइलैंड्स  ( ) and South  जॉर्जिया   और   the   दक्षिण   सैंडविच   आइलैंड्स  .
Argentina is  the  successor state of the Viceroyalty  of   the   río  de  la  Plata  ,  an overseas  उपनिवेश   of  the  स्पेनी   साम्राज्य   .
Argentina  घोषित  independence  दौरान   the   अर्जेंटाइन  War of Independence  ,   जिससे   थी   followed   by  the Argentine Civil  युद्धों  during most  of   the  19th  सदी  .
the   देश  faced  अनेक  military  coups  and political instability during the 20th century ,  साथ  with periodic  आर्थिक  crisis that continue to  इस  day  .
a   पहचाना  Southern Cone power ,  और   मध्य   शक्ति  , Argentina  is  Latin America  's  third-largest economy ,  साथ  a  ``  very high ''  दरजा  on the Human  विकास  index  .
भीतर  Latin America  ,   अर्जेंटीना   रै  the fifth  उच्चतम   नाममात्र  GDP per capita and the highest in  खरीदना  power  शर्तें  .
The  legatum   संस्थान   have  argued  कि   the  country has  a  `` foundation  लिये  future growth  due  to its market size , levels  of   विदेशी   सीधा   निवेश   ,   और   प्रतिशत   of   high-tech  exports  as   share  of  कुल  manufactured goods '' ,  और   it   is  classed  by  investors as  मध्य  emerging  अर्थव्यवस्था  .
अर्जेंटीना  is the  लैटिन  American country  साथ  the  सबसे   नोबेल   पुरस्कार  ,  लिये  a  कुल   of   पाँच  ,  सब  obtained during the second half of the  बीसवीं   सदी  .
The country has three  नोबेल   पुरस्कार   in  science and  दो  of peace .
the   सबसे  important  पहलुओं   of  science  और   प्रौद्योगिकी  in Argentina  हैं  concerned with medicine ,  नाभिकीय  physics  ,   जैवप्रौद्योगिकी  ,  nanotechnology   ,   स्पेस  and rocket  प्रौद्योगिकी   और   अनेक  fields  सम्बन्धित  to  the  country 's Main Economic  क्रियाएँ  .
the  country  भी  has  the  mega exhibition center  of  science , technology  ,  industry and  आर्ट  that  हैं   लैटिन  America 's  largest  .
Hickory is  a   नगर   in  Catawba County , with parts  भी   in  Burke  काउंटी   और   काल्डवेल  County .
The city  's   2010   अनुमानित  population is 40,010 .
Hickory is the principal city  in   the  Hickory-Lenoir-Morganton  एमएसए  ,  in   जिससे   the   जनसांख्यिकी   at  the 2010 Census was  365,497  .
polyethylene  terephthalate (  sometimes   लिखा  poly ( ethylene terephthalate  )   )  ,  commonly  abbreviated PET , PETE  ,  or  the   obsolete   petp  or PET-P ,  is   a  thermoplastic polymer resin of  the   पॉलिएस्टर  family and is  प्रयुक्त   in   सिंथेटिक   मछली  ; beverage ,  खाना   और  other  द्रव  containers ; thermoforming applications ; and engineering  resins  often in combination with  कांच   रेशा  .
the   पद  polyethylene terephthalate  is  a  सोर्स   of   भ्रम  because this  पदार्थ  ,  पालतु  , does not  contain  polyethylene .
यूँ  ,  the   वैकल्पिक  form  ,   बहु  ( ethylene terephthalate  )   ,   is  often used in scholarly journals for  the  sake of accuracy and clarity  .
depending  on its processing and thermal history  ,  polyethylene terephthalate  may   मौजूद  both as an  amorphous  (  पारदर्शी  ) and  as  a semi-crystalline polymer .
the  semicrystalline  सामग्री  might appear transparent  (  particle  आकार   <  500 nm ) or  अपारदर्शी   और   श्वेत  ( particle  आकार  up  to  a few microns ) depending on  इसके   क्रिस्टल  structure and  कण   आकार  .
Its  मोनोमर  (  bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate  )  can   be  synthesized by the esterification reaction between terephthalic acid  और  ethylene glycol with water  as   a   byproduct   ,   or   by  transesterification reaction between  एथिलीन  glycol and  dimethyl   terephthalate   साथ  methanol as  a   byproduct   .
बहुलकीकरण  is through a  polycondensation   प्रतिक्रिया  of the monomers (  किया  immediately after esterification/transesterification )  साथ  water as the  byproduct  .
The  बहुमत  of the world  's  PET  उत्पादन   is  for synthetic  मछली  ( in excess  of  60 % ) , with bottle production  हिसाब   लिये  around 30 % of global demand .
in   the  context of textile  अनुप्रयोग  , PET  is   referred   to  by its common  नाम   ,  `` polyester ,  ''  whereas  the  acronym `` PET  ''   is   generally   प्रयुक्त   in   संबंध   to  packaging  .
पॉलिएस्टर   makes   up  about  18  %  of  world polymer production and  is  the third-most-produced polymer  ;   polyethylene  (  pe  )  और  polypropylene  (   pp  ) are  पहला  and second  ,  respectively .
पालतु   consists   of   polymerized  units  of   the   मोनोमर  ethylene terephthalate , with  repeating   c10h8o4  units  .
PET  is   commonly   recycled   ,  and  रै   the  number ``  1  ''  as  its  रीसाइक्लिंग  symbol .
louisiana   थी  admitted  to   the   संघ   on   अप्रैल  30 , 1812  ,   और  elects senators to Classes 2 and  क्लास   3  .
Its current  सीनेटरों  are Democrat Mary Landrieu  और   रिपब्लिकन  David Vitter  .
Black pudding ,  रक्त   खीर   or  blood sausage  is   a  type of sausage  बना  by cooking blood or  सूखी  blood with  a   फिलर   जबतक   it   is  thick enough to  congeal  when  cooled  .
The  डिश  exists  in  various  संस्कृतियों   इससे   एशिया  to  यूरोपीय  and the  americas  .
Pig , cattle ,  शीप   ,  duck  ,   और   बकरी  blood  can  be  प्रयुक्त   depending  on different countries .
In Europe  और   the  Americas  ,   ठेठ   fillers  include meat , fat  ,  suet  ,   ब्रैड   ,  cornmeal  ,   मीठी   आलू  , onion  ,  chestnuts  ,  barley ,  और  oatmeal .
In Spain  ,  Portugal and Asia  ,   आलू  is  प्रायः   replaced   by  rice .
Stakeholder may  refer   to:
शेयरधारक   (  corporate ) , a person , group ,  संगठन   ,  member  or  system who affects or can be affected by  an  organization 's actions
Stakeholder , an  एंटिटी   कि   can  be affected by  the  results of that in which they are said to  be  stakeholders ,  i.e.   ,  that  in   जिससे  they have a stake .
प्रोजेक्ट  stakeholder , a person ,  समूह   or   संगठन   साथ   an   ब्याज   in  a project
Stakeholder  सिद्धान्त   ,  a theory that identifies  और   मॉडल  the groups  जिससे  are  हितधारकों   of   a   निगम  or project
शेयरधारक  analysis ,  the  process  of  identifying  those  affected by a project  or   इवेंट
Stakeholder ( law )  ,  a third  पार्टी  who  temporarily  holds money or property  जबकि   इसके   मालिक  is  स्टिल  being  संकल्पित
जोकर  Smight  (  March  9  , 1925 -  सितंबर  1 , 2003  )   थी  an American theatre and  फिल्मी   निदेशक   .
Smight was born  in   मिनियापोलिस  , Minnesota and  गई   to   स्कूल  with future actor  पीटर  Graves  .
उसके  film credits include The Traveling Executioner  ,   खरगोश   ,   चलाएं  ,  मीत  Couples  ,   मिडवे  , Harper  ,  Airport  1975  ,  फटकार  Alley and  the  Emmy Award -winning  एडी   ,   as   खूब   as  many  एपीसोड  of  टेलीविज़न   श्रेणी   ऐसे  as The Twilight Zone and The Alfred Hitchcock  घंटा  .
He also  निर्देशित  the  1960  Broadway  खेल   the  49th  cousin  and composed the music  लिये  the film adaption of  फेंकें   of  Thunder  सुन  My Cry  .
Smight died from  कर्कट   in   लॉस   एंजिल्स   ,   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
dmitri   ivanovich   mendeleev  ( ;  8   फ़रवरी  1834 –  2  February  1907   o.s  .  27   जनवरी  1834 – 20 January 1907 )  थी  a  रूसी   केमिस्ट  and inventor  .
He formulated  the  Periodic Law , created his own version  of  the  आवधिक   तालिका  of elements  ,  and used  it   to   सही  the properties  of   कुछ   already   खोजा  elements and  भी  to  भविष्यवाणी   the   गुण  of elements yet  to  be discovered  !
Modesto ( Spanish for  ``  modest  ''   )   ,   officially  the  नगर   of  Modesto ,  is   the   काउंटी  seat and largest city of  stanislaus   काउंटी   ,  California  ,   संयुक्त  States .
साथ   a  population  of  approximately 201,165 at the  2010  census  ,  Modesto  बाँधने  as the 18th largest  नगर  in  the  state  of  California  .
The  modesto  Census County Division  ,  which  शामिल  the  शहरों  of Ceres  और  Riverbank  ,  has  a   जनसांख्यिकी  of 312,842 as of  2010  .
Modesto  is   स्तिथ  in  the  central valley  क्षेत्रफल  of Northern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ,  90  miles  उत्तर  of  fresno   ,  92 miles  ईस्ट   of  San  फ्रांसिस्को  , 68  मील  south  of   the   राज्य   पूंजी  of Sacramento ,  66   मील  west of  yosemite   नेशनल   पार्क   ,  and  24  miles  दक्षिण  of Stockton .
Modesto ,  a   29-time   पेड़  City  यूएसए   honoree   ,  is surrounded by rich farmland , lending  to  a  रैंकिंग  for the county  as  6th among all California counties  in   फार्म   उत्पादन   .
led  by  मिल्क  , almonds  ,  chickens ,  अखरोट   ,  and  मकई   साइलेज  ,  the   काउंटी  grossed  nearly  $  3.1  billion in agricultural production in  2011  .
Modesto  थी  immortalized in  the  1973 George Lucas film  अमरीकी  Graffiti .
The  पुरस्कार   जीतना  film captured the spirit of ``  cruising   ''  and friendship  on  10th and  11th   गलियों  in  1962  and  led  to the revival of 1950 's  nostalgia  that included the TV show Happy Days  और  the  अन्य  spin-offs .
रॉन   हावर्ड   ,  Harrison  घाट  and  रिचर्ड  Dreyfuss starred in  the  film  .
The  साउंडट्रैक  was a huge success .
निदेशक  George  लुकास  is  a  native  of  Modesto  ,  graduating  इससे  Downey  ऊँची  School in  1962  .
The  gallup-healthways  Well-Being Index for  2011  , which interviews 1,000 participants  रोज़  and asks individuals  to   assess  their jobs , finances ,  शारीरिक   स्वास्थ्य  , emotional  राज्य  of mind  और  communities , ranked Modesto 126  आउट  of the 190  शहरों   surveyed  .
In December  2009   ,   फोर्ब्स  ranked Modesto  48th  out of 100 among  ``  Best Bang-for-the-Buck  शहरों   ''  .
in  this ranking , Modesto ranked 8th in housing  affordability   और   सफर   समय  but also ranked 86th in job forecast growth and 99th in  foreclosures   .
स्वतंत्रता  Day ,  commonly   ज्ञात   as   the   चौथी   of   जुलाई   ,   is  a  संघीय   अवकाश  in the United  राज्य   commemorating  the adoption of  the   घोषणा  of Independence  on   जुलाई   4  , 1776 ,  declaring   स्वतंत्रता   इससे  the Kingdom of Great Britain  .
Independence  दिन   is  commonly associated with  आतिशबाजी   ,  parades , barbecues  ,  carnivals , fairs , picnics  ,   कॉन्सर्ट  , baseball games , family reunions  ,   और   राजनैतिक   भाषणों  and  ceremonies   ,  in addition  to  various  अन्य  public and private events celebrating the  इतिहास   ,   सरकारी   ,  and  परंपराओं  of the United States .
Independence  दिन   is   the   नेशनल   दिन  of the United States  .
A gender  प्रतीक  denotes the  sex   of  an  सजीव  or  characterizes  an  एजेंट  by  लिंग  .
The two standard gender symbols denoting male  ♂   और  female ♀  हैं  derived  इससे  astrological  प्रतीकों  ,  denoting  the classical planets Mars  और  Venus  ,  respectively .
ये   प्रतीकों  have been in  उपयोग   चूंकि  the Renaissance also denoting  तत्व  in alchemy  ,  specifically  the  metals iron and  तांबे   .
They were first  प्रयुक्त  to  denote  the effective gender of plants (  i.e  . sex of  व्यक्तिगत  in  a  given  crossbreed  , since most plants are  hermaphroditic  ) by  carolus  Linnaeus  in  1751  .
A leasehold estate  is   an  ownership of a  अस्थाई  right  to   थाम  land or property  in  which a lessee  or  a  किरायेदार  holds rights of  रियल  property by some form of title from  a  lessor or  landlord   .
Although a  किरायेदार  does hold  अधिकारों  to real property  ,   a   leasehold  estate  is   typically   माना  personal  प्रॉपर्टी   .
Leasehold is  a  form of  जमीन   कार्यकाल   or   प्रॉपर्टी   कार्यकाल  where one  पार्टी   खरीदता  the right  to  occupy  जमीन  or  a  building for a given length  of  time .
As lease is a  विधिक  estate  ,   leasehold   एस्टेट  can be  खरीदा   और   बेची  on  the  open  मार्केट   .
A  leasehold   यूँ  differs  इससे  a freehold or fee simple where the  स्वामित्व   of  a property  is  purchased  outright  and thereafter  आयोजित  for an indeterminate length of time ,  और   भी   differs  from  a   tenancy  where a property is  let  ( rented  )  on a  आवधिक  basis such as weekly or  मासिक   .
जबतक   the  end  of   the  lease period  (   प्रायः   measured  in decades or centuries ; a 99  साल  lease is quite common  )   the  leaseholder  रै   the  right  to   remain   in  occupation as an  assured  tenant paying an agreed rent  to  the owner  .
Terms  of   the   अनुबंध  are contained in a lease , which  रै   तत्व  of  अनुबंध  and property  विधि  intertwined  .
The term estate for  सालो  may occasionally be  प्रयुक्त  .
This refers to a leasehold  एस्टेट  for  कोई  specific period  of  time  (   the  word  ``  years  ''  is misleading )  .
An estate for  सालो   is  not  automatically   नवीनीकृत   .
colloquially  , ``  पट्टे  '' and ``  पट्टे  ``  हैं  often a  formalization   of   a  longer , specific  काल  as  compared  with a  ``   rental  '' that created a tenancy  at   होगा  ,  terminable  or  बेदर्दी   at  the end of a short  काल  .
ओलिविया  ( also known  as   स्वागत  to  the   संसार  of  the  Pig Olivia ) is  a  British-American  children  's  एनिमेटेड  television  श्रेणी  produced  by   मीडिया  company  chorion  and based  on  Ian  falconer  's books .
it   is  seen on Nick Jr. in  the  US , Milkshake  !
,  उपनाम   jr.  in the UK and Ireland , and Disney Junior in Latin America and Brazil  ,  Treehouse TV in Canada  .
the   दिखाएँ  has won  a  silver  अभिभावक  '  चुनाव  Award for  इसके  positive  स्टोरी  lines  और   वर्ण  .

The  पनामा  Canal  (  )  is   a  ship canal in  पनामा  that connects  the  Atlantic  समंदर   (  via the Caribbean  समुद्र   )  to the Pacific  समंदर   .
The canal  कटौती  across the Isthmus  of   पनामा  and is  a   कुंजी   conduit  for  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  maritime trade .
There are locks at  प्रत्येक  end to lift ships  up  to Gatun Lake  (   ऊपर  sea-level  )  .
gatun  Lake was  निर्मित  to reduce  the   राशि   of   कार्य  required  लिये   the  canal .
The current locks  हैं  wide .
A  तीसरा  , wider  लेन  of  ताले  is being built  .
फ़्रांस  began  कार्य  on the canal in 1881 , but had  to   रोकें  because of engineering problems  और  high  मृत्यु  due  to   बीमारी  .
The  संयुक्त   राज्य  (  us   )  later took  over  the project  और   took   a  decade to complete  the  canal  in   1914  , enabling  जहाजों  to  avoid  the lengthy Cape Horn  रूट   around   the  southernmost tip of South  अमेरिका   (   via  the Drake  ड्योढ़ी  )  or  to  navigate  the Strait  of  Magellan  .
एक  of the largest and most difficult  अभियान्त्रिकी  projects  कभी  undertaken , the Panama Canal  शॉर्टकट  made  it  possible for ships to  सफर   between  the  अटलांटिक  and Pacific  महासागर   in  half  the  time  previously   जरूरी   .
The  shorter   ,  faster , safer route  to  the US West Coast  और   to  nations in and along the  प्रशांत  Ocean allowed those  स्थान  to become more  एकीकृत  with the world economy  .
दौरान  this time , ownership of  the  territory that is  अभी   the   पनामा  Canal  थी   पहला   कोलम्बियाई  , then French , and then  अमरीकी  ; the  संयुक्त  States completed the construction  .
The canal  थी   लिया   over  in 1999  by  the Panamanian  सरकारी  ,  as  long  नियोजित  .
सालाना  traffic has risen from  परिचय  1,000  जहाजों  when  the  canal opened in 1914 ,  to   14,702   बरतन   in  2008  ,  the  latter   measuring  a total  of  309.6 million Panama  canal/universal  Measurement System  (  PC/UMS ) tons  .
by   2008  ,  अधिक  than  815,000  vessels had passed  through  the  कनाल  , many  of   उन्हें  much  larger   than   the  original planners could  have  envisioned ;  the  largest ships that can  पारगमन  the  कनाल   आज  are  पुकारा  Panamax  .
The American  समाज  of  सिविल  Engineers  रै   नामित  the  पनामा  Canal  एक  of the  सात  wonders of  the  modern world  .
बेंजामिन  Franklin  (   अप्रैल  17 , 1790 ) was one of the  founding   fathers  of the United States .
A  विख्यात   बहुश्रुत  ,  फ्रैंकलिन  was a leading author  ,   मुद्रक  , political theorist , politician ,  postmaster  , scientist , musician , inventor ,  satirist   ,   नागरिक   activist  , statesman  ,   और  diplomat  .
As  a   वैज्ञानिक   ,  he was a major  फिगर  in the  अमरीकी  Enlightenment and  the  history  of  physics for  उसके  discoveries and theories  regarding   विद्युत  .
he   invented  the lightning rod ,  bifocals  , the  फ्रैंकलिन  stove  ,  a carriage odometer , and the glass 'armonica ' .
he   facilitated   अनेक   नागरिक   संगठन  , including a fire  विभाग  and  a  university  .
फ्रैंकलिन  earned  the   शीर्षक   of   ``  The  पहला   अमरीकी  ''  लिये  his early and  indefatigable  campaigning for  औपनिवेशिक  unity  ;  as  an  author  और  spokesman in London for several colonies , then  as  the  पहला   संयुक्त   राज्य  Ambassador  to   फ़्रांस  , he exemplified the  उभरते   अमरीकी  nation .
Franklin was  foundational  in  धमक  the American ethos  as  a marriage of the practical values of thrift , hard  कार्य   ,   शिक्षा   ,   जातियाँ  spirit  ,   self-governing   संस्थानों  , and opposition  to  authoritarianism both political and religious , with the scientific and tolerant values  of  the Enlightenment  .
in   the   शब्द   of  historian Henry Steele Commager  ,  ``  in   a  Franklin  could  be  मिलाया   the  virtues of Puritanism without  इसके   दोषों   ,  the  illumination  of  the  Enlightenment  बगैर  its heat  .   ''
to  Walter  isaacson   ,  this makes Franklin  ``   the  most accomplished American  of  his age and the most influential  in   inventing   the  type of society  अमेरिका  would  become  .  ''
Franklin  ,   सदा   गर्व  of  उसके  working class roots , became  a   कामयाब   समाचारपत्र  editor and  मुद्रक  in Philadelphia , the  अग्रणी   नगर  in the colonies .
He  थी   भी  partners  साथ  William Goddard  और  Joseph Galloway  the   तीन   of  whom  प्रकाशित   the  Pennsylvania Chronicle  ,  a newspaper  कि   थी  known  लिये  its revolutionary sentiments  और   आलोचनाओं   of  the British monarchy in the American  colonies  .
he  became  धनवान  publishing Poor Richard  's  Almanack and The Pennsylvania  गजट  .
Franklin gained international renown  as   a   वैज्ञानिक   लिये  his famous experiments in electricity  और  for his  अनेक  inventions , especially the lightning  लाठी   .
he   निभाई  a  प्रमुख  role in  establishing  the University of Pennsylvania and  थी  elected the first  अध्यक्ष   of   the  American Philosophical Society .
Franklin became a  नेशनल  hero in  अमेरिका   जब   he  spearheaded  the  effort  to   have  Parliament  repeal  the  unpopular  Stamp  अधिनियम  .
An accomplished diplomat  ,  he  थी   widely   admired  among the  फ्रेंच  as American  मंत्री  to Paris  और   थी  a major figure  in  the  विकास  of positive Franco-American  संबंध  .
लिये  many years  he   थी   the  British  postmaster  for the colonies ,  जिससे  enabled  उसे   to  set up  the  first  नेशनल  communications  संजाल  .
He  थी  active in community affairs , colonial  और  state  राजनीती  , as  खूब   as   नेशनल   और   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  affairs .
इससे  1785 to 1788 ,  he   परोसा   as   राज्यपाल  of  पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
toward  the  समाप्त  of  उसके  life , he freed his slaves and became one of  the  most prominent abolitionists  .
His  रंगीन  life and legacy of scientific and political  उपलब्धि   ,  and  औकात  as  एक  of  अमेरिका   's   सबसे  influential Founding Fathers ,  have   देखी  Franklin  सम्मानित  on coinage and  धन  ; warships ;  the  names of many towns  ,  counties  ,  educational  संस्थानों   ,  namesakes , and  कंपनियाँ   ;  and more  than   दो  centuries after his  मौत  , countless cultural references  .
दण्ड  Minds is an American  पुलिस   प्रक्रियात्मक   टेलीविज़न   कार्यक्रम  that premiered September 22 , 2005  ,   on   सीबीएस  .
The  श्रेणी  follows  a  team of  profilers  from the FBI 's  behavioral  Analysis Unit  (  BAU  )  based  in  Quantico  ,  Virginia .
The BAU  is  part of the  एफबीआई   नेशनल   बीच  for  the  Analysis of  हिंसक   अपराधों  .
the  show differs  इससे   अनेक   प्रक्रियात्मक   dramas  by  focusing  on profiling the  दण्ड  , rather than the  अपराधों  itself .
The show  is  produced by  the   चिह्नित  Gordon Company in association with CBS Television Studios  (   originally  Paramount Network  टेलीविज़न  then CBS Paramount  संजाल  Television  )  and ABC  studios   (   originally   touchstone   टेलीविज़न  ) .
CBS announced  in   अक्तूबर   2009  that Legacy  इंटरैक्टिव   होता  develop a  वीडियो  game based on  the  show .
The  खेल   होता  require players to examine  अपराधों  scenes  लिये  clues  to  help solve murder mysteries  .
The  इंटरैक्टिव  puzzle game was released in 2012  ,  but  किया  not feature any of  the   आवाज़ें  of the show  's   डाल  , nor  थी  the  डाल  involved  साथ  the project  .
on  March 14 , 2012  ,   सीबीएस   नवीनीकृत   दण्ड  Minds  लिये  an  आठवीं  season  ,  which  premiered   on  September 26 , 2012 .
``   heart-shaped  Box  ''  is  a   सोंग   by   the   अमरीकी   grunge   बैंड   निर्वाण  ,  लिखा   by  vocalist and  guitarist  Kurt Cobain  .
the  song was released as the first  सिंगल  from  the  group 's  तीसरा  and  फाइनल  studio album , In Utero , in 1993  .
it   थी   एक  of two songs from the  एल्बम  mixed by Scott Litt  in   अनुक्रम   to  augment the original  उत्पादन   by  producer  स्टीव  Albini .
जबकि   निर्वाण  's  लेबल   dgc  Records did  नहीं  release a physical single for sale  in   the  United States ,  ``   heart-shaped  Box  ''  received much  अमरीकी   रेडियो   airplay   ,  reaching  क्रमांक  one on  the   बिलबोर्ड   आधुनिक   चट्टान   ट्रैक्स  chart .
The international release  of   the  single  पहुँचे  number five on the UK Singles  चार्ट   .
The  सोंग   's  music video ,  निर्देशित   by  Anton Corbijn ,  garnered  critical plaudits .
The orbital  गति  of  a   देह   ,  generally a  ग्रह  , a natural satellite , an artificial satellite , or a multiple  स्टार  , is the speed  at   जिससे   it   orbits   around  the barycenter  of  a system , usually around  a   अधिक   विशाल   देह  .
It can  be   प्रयुक्त  to refer  to  either  the  mean orbital speed  ,   the   औसत   गति  as it  completes   an  orbit ,  or   instantaneous  orbital speed , the speed at a  particular  point in its orbit .
the   कक्षीय   गति  at  कोई   स्थिति   in  the orbit can  be  computed from the distance to  the  central  देह   at  that  स्थिति  , and  the  specific orbital energy ,  जिससे   is  independent of position :  the   गतिज   उर्जा  is  the  total energy  ऋण   the  potential energy  .

भूरा   राजमहल  Hotel is the second-oldest  ऑपरेटिंग  hotel  in   डेनवर   ,  Colorado and  is   एक  of  the   पहला   atrium-style   होटल   कभी   निर्मित   .
It is now  संचालित  by Quorum  होटल  and  रिसॉर्ट  .
it  was built in  1892   ,   एक  year later  than  the  ऑक्सफोर्ड  Hotel  .
it  was named  लिये  its original  मालिक   ,   हेनरी   C.   भूरा   ,  and was designed with its odd triangular  आकार  by architect Frank Edbrooke  .
the  hotel is  स्तिथ  at 321 17th St , Denver ,  co  between 17th Street  ,   ब्रॉडवे  and  tremont   street/pl  in  शहर  Denver behind the  गणतंत्र  Plaza .
The main  प्रवेश   द्वार  is  on  Tremont Street  .
dvd-video  is a  उपभोक्ता  video  स्वरूप   प्रयुक्त  to store digital  वीडियो   on  DVD discs ,  और   is   फिलहाल   the  dominant consumer video  स्वरूप   in  Asia , North  अमेरिका   ,   यूरोपीय  ,  और  Australia .
discs   using  the DVD-Video specification  आवश्यकता  a  dvd  drive  और  an H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2  डिकोडर   (  e.g.  ,   a  DVD  खिलाड़ी   ,   or  a  कंप्यूटर   dvd  drive with  a  software DVD player ) .
वाणिज्यिक   dvd  movies  हैं   एनकोडेड   using  a  संयोजन   of   h.262/mpeg-2   भाग  2 compressed  वीडियो   और  audio of  varying  formats ( often multi-channel formats as  वर्णित  below )  .
Typically  ,  the  आंकड़ा   रेट   लिये   dvd  movies  सीमाएँ   इससे   3   mbit/s  to 9.5 Mbit/s ,  और   the  bit  रेट  is  प्रायः  adaptive  .
It  थी  first  उपलब्धियाँ   लिये   खुदरा   around   1997  .
the   dvd-video   specification  was  निर्मित   by  DVD Forum  और  can be obtained  इससे  DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a  शुल्क  of  $  5,000  .
The  specification   is  not publicly available , because  प्रत्येक  subscriber  जरूर  sign a non-disclosure agreement  .
Certain information in  the   dvd   किताब  is proprietary  और  confidential  .
The  nautical  mile  (  symbol  m  , NM or  nmi   )   is   a  unit of length  कि  is  परिचय   एक  minute  of  arc  of  latitude measured along any meridian  ,  or  परिचय   एक   मिनट  of arc  of   देशांतर   at  the equator .
by   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   अनुबंध   it   रै   महरूम   नियत  at 1,852  मीटर  exactly  (  about 6,076 feet )  .
it   is  a  non-  SI unit (  हालांकि   स्वीकृत  for  उपयोग  in the International  प्रणाली  of  इकाई   by   the  BIPM  )  used  विशेषकर  by navigators  in  the  शिपिंग  and  विमानन  industries ,  और   भी  in polar exploration .
It  is   commonly  used  in   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  law and treaties  ,  especially regarding  the   हद  of territorial  waters  .
it  developed from the  समुद्र  mile  और  the  सम्बन्धित  geographical mile .
the  nautical mile remains in  उपयोग  by  समुद्र   और   एयर  navigators worldwide because of  इसके   convenience  when  working   साथ  charts .
Most nautical  चार्ट   उपयोग  the Mercator  प्रक्षेप   जिनकी   स्केल   varies  by  परिचय  a factor  of  six from the equator to  80°  latitude , so charts covering large areas can  नहीं   उपयोग   a   सिंगल   रैखिक  scale  .
the   nautical   मील   is  nearly equal to  a  minute  of   अक्षांश   on   a   चार्ट  ,  so  a distance measured with a  चार्ट  divider  can   be   roughly   परिवर्तित  to  nautical   मील   using   the  chart  's  latitude  स्केल   .
shippensburg  is  a   बरो  in Cumberland and Franklin counties in the  u.S.   राज्य  of  पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
Settled  in  1730  ,  Shippensburg  झूठ   in  the Cumberland Valley  ,  41  मील  ( 66 km  )   west-southwest  of  harrisburg   ,   और  is part of the  harrisburg–  Carlisle  महानगर   सांख्यिकीय   क्षेत्रफल  .
In  1900  , 3,228 people  जिया  there ; in  1910  , 3,457 ; and  in   1940   ,  5,244 people lived there .
The population was 5,492  at  the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी   .
Shippensburg was  incorporated  as  a   बरो   on   जनवरी  21  ,  1819  .
in   the   पास्ट  , there were  फर्नीचर  factories , engine and pump works , and  अन्य  industrial works  स्तिथ   भीतर   the  town  .
Shippensburg is also the home  of   the   beistle   कम्पनी   ,   the  oldest and largest manufacturer  of   सजावट  and party goods  ,  which  बिकता  its  distinctive  honeycomb paper  सजावट   विश्वव्यापी  .
it   is  also  the  location of  pague  and Fegan  ,   the  oldest continuously operated hardware store in  पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
in  May 2012 ,  वोल्वो   निर्माण   उपकरण   began   a  $  100  million  विस्तार  project to bring its American headquarters  to   shippensburg  .
Shippensburg is also  घर   to  Shippensburg  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Pennsylvania , one  of  14 universities  of  the Pennsylvania State System  of   उच्चतर  Education .
Yearly the last full  सप्ताह   of  July  ,  the Shippensburg Community  मेला   is   आयोजित   .
Begun in  1958   ,  the  मेला   बिल्स  itself  as  Pennsylvania 's largest bi-county  मेला  .
The  मेला  includes  agricultural   दर्शाती  , a craft show  ,   खाना   विक्रेता   ,  and  कार्निवल  rides amongst  अन्य  things .
Every summer on the last  शनिवार  of  अगस्त  , Shippensburg  holds   the  Corn Festival , an  इवेंट   कि   brings  regional artisans  और   विक्रेता  to  operate  stands downtown .
the  downtown is closed to  ट्रैफ़िक   लिये  at  तनिक  5 blocks for  सबसे   of  the  दिन  .
औसत   उपस्थिति  at  the   पर्व  is  अनुमानित  at  60,000   -  70,000  प्रत्येक  year .
Black  बालदार  tongue ( BHT  ,   भी   termed  lingua  villosa   nigra  )  refers   to  a  कंडीशन  of the tongue  जहाँ   the  filiform  papillae  elongate with black or brown discoloration  ,  giving a  ब्लैक  and hairy appearance  .
The appearance  may  be alarming ,  लकिन  it  is  a  हानिरहित  condition .
Predisposing  कारकों  include smoking , xerostomia  (  dry  मुँह   )  ,  नरम   आहार  , poor oral  hygiene   और  certain medications  .
प्रबन्धन  is by  improving  oral hygiene , especially scraping  or  brushing the tongue  .
the  IEEE 1394 interface is a serial bus interface  मानक  for high-speed communications  और   isochronous  real-time  आंकड़ा   ट्रांसफ़र  .
it  was developed  in   the  late 1980s and early  1990s  by Apple  ,  who  पुकारा   it  FireWire  .
The  1394   इंटरफ़ेस  is  comparable  to  usb   ,  and often those two technologies are considered together , though USB has more  मार्केट  share .
ठहराना  first  शामिल   firewire  in  कुछ  of its 1999  मॉडल   ,   और  most  ठहराना  computers since  the   साल   2000  have  शामिल  FireWire ports  ,   हालांकि   ,   as   of   2013  , nothing beyond the 800  संस्करण   (  IEEE-1394b )  .
the  interface  is  also  ज्ञात   by  the brand i.LINK ( Sony )  ,  and Lynx  (  Texas  यंत्र   )   .
IEEE 1394 replaced  समानांतर  SCSI  in  many  अनुप्रयोग  , because of lower  क्रियान्वयन   लागत  and  a  simplified ,  अधिक  adaptable cabling system  .
The 1394 standard also defines a  backplane  interface , though this  is  not as widely used .
IEEE 1394  is  the  high-definition  Audio-Video  संजाल  Alliance  (  HANA ) standard  कनेक्शन   इंटरफ़ेस  for A/V  (   audio/visual   )  component communication  और  control .
FireWire is also available in wireless  ,  fiber optic ,  और   समाक्षीय   संस्करण  using  the  isochronous protocols  .
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan (  अक्तूबर  3 ,  1954  – August  27  ,  1990  )  थी   an   अमरीकी   guitarist   ,   singer-songwriter  ,  और   रिकार्ड  producer  .
Often  referred  to  by  his  आद्याक्षर  SRV , Vaughan is best known as a founding member and  नेता   of  Double  ट्रबल  .
Together  साथ  drummer Chris  layton   और  bassist Tommy Shannon , they ignited the  ब्लूज़  revival of the 1980s .
With  a  career spanning seven years , Vaughan and Double  ट्रबल   consistently  sold out concerts while  उनके  albums  अक्सर  went gold .
He was  born  and raised  in  Dallas  ,  Texas , and  लिये   a  short  काल   of  time  जिया   in  Graham , Texas  .
As  the   younger   bhai  of Jimmie  vaughan   ,  Vaughan started playing  the   गिटार  at age  सात  and formed  अनेक  bands  कि   occasionally   performed  in  लोकल  nightclubs .
At age 17 , he  dropped   आउट  of high school  और  moved to  ऑस्टिन  to further  pursue   उसके  musical  करियर  , joining  समूह  such as  krackerjack   ,  the  nightcrawlers  ,  और   the   cobras  .
In 1977  ,  he  formed  Triple Threat  revue  , a band  कि   आखिरकार  evolved into Double Trouble and  regularly   performed   around  Austin .
in  1982 , Vaughan and Double  ट्रबल  performed  at   the  Montreux  जैज़  Festival in  स्विट्ज़रलैंड   ,   catching   the  attention of  संगीतकारों   दाउद   बोवी  and Jackson  browne   .
Bowie asked Vaughan  to  play  on  his upcoming studio album Let 's  नृत्य   ,  while Browne offered  the   बैंड  free use of  उसके   निजी  studio in Los Angeles to  रिकार्ड   an   एल्बम   .
In March  1983  , Vaughan and Double  ट्रबल   यहूद   हस्ताक्षरित   to  Epic  रिकॉर्ड  by  दिग्गज  record producer John Hammond Sr.  और   released  their debut  एल्बम  ,  टेक्सास  Flood in June  of   कि   साल  .
After successful touring ,  the  group  released  the albums  ,  Could  n't  Stand the  मौसम  ( 1984 ) and  आत्मा  to Soul  (  1985 )  ,   the   latter  of which  प्रदर्शित   नई  keyboardist Reese  wynans  .
Although  उसके   करियर  had  progressed   सफलतापूर्वक  , Vaughan  checked  into a  पुनर्वास  hospital in Atlanta  ,  Georgia  to  give  up  a cocaine and  दारू   आदत  and returned to touring  साथ   the  band .
In  जून  1989 , In Step was released  और   अर्जित   उन्हें  a  ग्रैमी  Award  लिये  Best Contemporary Blues Performance .
On August  27  , 1990 , Vaughan was killed  in   a   हेलीकाप्टर   क्रैश  following a performance in East Troy  ,  Wisconsin  .
Vaughan 's uniquely  eclectic   yet   तीव्र  style was derived from a variety of musical  जाति  .
He  थी  influenced by blues musicians  सहित  Albert King  ,  Freddie King ,  ओटिस   फटाफट  ,  और   muddy  Waters  ,   और  rock guitarists such  as  Jimi Hendrix  और  Lonnie  mack   .
उसके  guitar playing reflected the classic blues and pentatonic scales  .
he  has  प्राप्त  wide  नाजुक   मान्यता  for his guitar playing ,  रैंकिंग  at # 6  on  Rolling Stones  सूची   of  `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011 .
he   थी  posthumously  inducted  into  the  Blues Hall  of   कीर्ति  in  2000  and a  मेमोरियल   प्रतिमा  was erected in Austin 's  ऑडिटोरियम  Shores  पार्क  .
Stevie Ray Vaughan  is  widely considered  to   be  one of the greatest musicians  to   आइये  from  the  state  of  Texas .
GigE redirects  यहाँ  .
लिये   the  camera protocol , see GigE vision  .
in   कंप्यूटर   नेटवर्किंग   ,   gigabit  Ethernet  (  GbE or 1  gige  ) is  a  term  describing  various technologies  लिये  transmitting Ethernet frames at a  रेट  of a gigabit per second ( 1,000,000,000  बिट्स  per  दूसरी   )   ,   as   पारिभाषित  by the  आईईईई  802.3-2008 standard .
it  came into use beginning  in   1999   ,  gradually  supplanting   तेज़   ईथरनेट  in  तार  local networks , where  it   performed   considerably   तेज़  .
the  cables and  उपकरण  are very similar to  पिछला  standards  और   यहूद   बहुत  common and  किफायती  by 2010  .
Half-duplex  gigabit  links  कनेक्ट  through hubs  हैं  allowed  by  the  specification   ,  but  full-duplex   उपयोग  with switches is  much   अधिक  common  .

The main  components  of  a  stamp:
1   .  Image
2  .  perforations
3  .  denomination
4   .  Country  नाम
a   postage  stamp is a small piece  of   पेपर   कि  is  खरीदा  and  प्रदर्शित   on   an  item  of  mail  as   प्रमाण   of  payment  of   postage  .
typically  , stamps are  बना   इससे   खास  paper , with a national  नामांकन  and denomination ( price  )  on the  फेस  , and a gum adhesive  on  the reverse  पक्ष  .
postage   stamps  are  खरीदा  from a postal  प्रशासन  or other authorized  विक्रेता  and are  प्रयुक्त   to  pay  लिये  the  लागत  involved  in  moving  मेल  as  खूब   as  other  कारोबार   necessities  such  as  insurance and  पंजीकरण   .
The stamp’s shape is  प्रायः  that  of  a  छोटी  rectangle of varying proportions ,  हालांकि  triangles  or  other shapes are occasionally used .
The  स्टैम्प  is affixed  to  an envelope  or  other  डाक  cover (  i.e.   ,   पैकेट   ,   बक्सा  , mailing  बेलन  ) that  the  customer  बधाइयां  to send  .
The item is  तब   processed  by  the  postal  प्रणाली  ,  जहाँ   a   postmark   ,   sometimes  known  as  a  रद्दीकरण  mark  ,  is  प्रायः  applied over the stamp and  कवर  ; this  कार्यविधि  marks  the  stamp as used ,  जिससे  prevents its  reuse   .
The  postmark   indicates   the  date and point of origin  of   the   mailing  .
the   mailed   मद  is then  वितरित  to the address  कि  the customer  रै  applied  to  the envelope  or  cover .
Postage stamps have facilitated the delivery  of  mail  चूंकि  the 1840s .
पहले   इस  time  ,   स्याही  and hand-stamps  (   hence   the   शब्द   'stamp  ' ) ,  प्रायः   बना  from wood  or   कॉर्क   ,   यहूद   प्रायः  used to frank the  मेल  and confirm  the  payment  of  postage  .
the   पहला  adhesive  postage  stamp , commonly  referred   to  as the Penny Black  ,  was  जारी  in the  संयुक्त   किंगडम  in 1840  .
the  invention of the  स्टैम्प   थी  a part of  the   attempt  to  सुधार   और   improve  the postal system in  the  United Kingdom  of  Great  ब्रिटेन   और   आयरलैंड  , which in the early 19th  सदी   थी  in disarray and  rife  with  भ्रष्टाचार  .
There are varying  खाते   of  the  आविष्कारक  or inventors of  the   स्टैम्प  .
Before  the  introduction of postage  stamps   ,   मेल  in the  uk   थी  paid for by  the   प्राप्तकर्ता   ,  a system that was  संबद्ध   साथ  an irresolvable  प्रॉब्लम  :  the  costs  of  delivering mail were  नहीं  recoverable by the  डाक  service  जब   प्राप्तकर्ता  were  असमर्थ  or  unwilling  to  अदा  for  वितरित  items  ,  and senders had no incentive  to  restrict  the   क्रमांक  ,  आकार   ,  or  वज़न  of items sent , whether or not they would ultimately  be  paid  लिये   .
the  postage  स्टैम्प  resolved this  समस्या  in a simple and elegant manner , with the  अतिरिक्त  benefit of  रूम  for  an  element  of   सौंदर्य  to be  introduced   .
Later  सम्बन्धित  inventions  शामिल   डाक  stationery such as  prepaid-postage  envelopes  ,  post cards ,  lettercards  ,  aerogrammes  and  wrappers   ,   postage  meters  ,  and , more recently , specialty boxes and  लिफाफे   provided  free to  the  customer by the U.S. postal service  लिये  priority or  एक्स्प्रेस  mailing .
The postage stamp afforded  convenience   लिये   दोनो  the mailer and  डाक   officials   ,  more efficiently  बरामद   लागत  for the postal service , and ultimately  resulted   in  a  बेहतर  ,  तेज़  postal system .
With  the  conveniences stamps offered , their use resulted in greatly  increased  mailings during  the   19th  and  20th  centuries .
Postage  stamps   दौरान   इस  era  यहूद  the  सबसे   लोकप्रिय  way of paying  लिये  mail  ,  but by the  समाप्त   of  the 20th  सदी   यहूद   rapidly   होने   आत  by the  उपयोग   of   metered  postage  और  bulk  mailing  by  व्यवसायों  . )
the  same  परिणाम  with  आदर   to  communications by  निजी   पार्टियों   occurred   over  the  पिछला   दशक  of  the   20th  century and the  पहला   दशक  of  the  21st due to  घटती   लागत  of  long   अलहदा  telephone communications  और   the  development and explosive spread  of   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   mailing  (  ``   e-mail   ''  via the  अंतरजाल   )   और   विधेयक   paying  systems had  .
as   postage  stamps with  उनके   engraved  imagery  began   to  appear  on  a  फैली  basis ,  इतिहासकारों  and collectors began to  लो   सूचना   .
The study of  postage  stamps and their  उपयोग  is  referred   to   as  philately .
स्टैम्प  collecting  can   be   दोनो  a hobby  और  a form of  ऐतिहासिक   पढ़ाई  and  सन्दर्भ  ,  as  government-issued postage  stamps  and their mailing  प्रणालियों   have  always  महरूम  involved with the  इतिहास   of   राष्ट्र  .
The University  of   अलबामा  at Birmingham  (  UAB ) is a  पब्लिक  university  in   बर्मिंघम  in the  u.S.  state of Alabama .
Developing from  an   एक्सटेंशन  center established  in   1936  , the institution  became   an  autonomous  संस्था   in  1969 and is today  एक  of  तीन   संस्थानों  in  the  University of Alabama System .
UAB offers over 140 programs  of   पढ़ाई  in  12   अकादमिक   विभाजन  leading  to  bachelor 's , master 's , doctoral , and  पेशेवर  degrees in  the   सोशल  and behavioral  sciences   ,  the  उदार  arts , business , education  ,   अभियान्त्रिकी  , and  health-related  fields  ऐसे   as  medicine  ,  dentistry , optometry ,  नर्सिंग  ,  और   पब्लिक   स्वास्थ्य  .
The school  is  highly renowned  लिये   इसके  medical research and natural sciences  कार्यक्रम  .
The  uab   स्वास्थ्य   प्रणाली  , one  of   the  largest  अकादमिक   चिकित्सा   centers   in  the United  राज्य  ,  is  affiliated  साथ   the  university  .
UAB Hospital sponsors  रेसिडेंसी  programs in  विभिन्न  medical  specialties  ,  सहित  internal  आयुर्विज्ञान   ,  neurology  ,  surgery ,  radiology   ,  and  anesthesiology   .
uab  Hospital  is   the  only ACS verified  स्तर   i  trauma  बीच  in Alabama ,  as  rated by  the  American College  of  Surgeons Trauma  कार्यक्रम  .
uab   is  the state  's  largest employer  ,  with  अधिक   than   18,000   संकाय  and  स्टाफ   और   over  53,000  कार्य  at the university and in the  स्वास्थ्य  system  .
An estimated  10  percent of the jobs in the Birmingham-Hoover Metropolitan Area  और   1  in 33  कार्य  in the  राज्य  of Alabama are directly  or  indirectly related to UAB  .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों   's  overall annual economic impact was estimated  to  be  $  4.6  अरब   in  2010 .
in  the fall  of   2012  , the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Alabama at Birmingham enrolled 17,999 students from more than 110 countries , including 1,605  freshmen   .
There are plans  to  commence with an `` aggressive  ''  growth in enrollment at UAB  .
The current  uab  President is  dr.  Ray  L.   watts   .
टोफू  , also  पुकारा  bean curd , is a food  बना  by coagulating soy  रस  and then pressing  the  resulting curds into soft  श्वेत  blocks  .
It  is   a  component in many  ईस्ट   एशियाई  and Southeast  एशियाई   व्यंजन   .
वहीँ   हैं  many  अलग  varieties of tofu  ,  including  भैस  tofu and  टोफू  that has been processed in some  रास्ता  .
टोफू   रै  a  हल्का   स्वाद   और   can  be used  in  savory and sweet dishes .
it  is  प्रायः  seasoned or marinated to  सूट  the dish  .
Tofu originated in  प्राचीन   चीन  some 2,000  सालो  ago .
Chinese legend ascribes its invention to prince Liu An ( Chinese  :   劉安   liú  Ān ,  179–122   bc   )   .
टोफू   और   इसके  production  तकनीक  were introduced  into   कोरियाई  and then  जापानी  during the Nara period  .
It spread into other  भाग  of East Asia as  खूब  .
This spread  संभावित  coincided with the spread of Buddhism because it is an important  सोर्स   of  protein in the  शाकाहारी  diet  of  East Asian  buddhism  .
li   shizhen   in  the Ming  राजवंश   वर्णित  a method  of  making tofu  in   bencao  Gangmu .
Tofu  रै  a low calorie  गिनती  , relatively  विशाल   amounts   of  protein , and little fat .
it  is  ऊँची  in  आयरन  and depending  on   the  coagulant used in  निर्माण  , may also  be  high  in   कैल्सियम  and/or magnesium .
Bubbles ( born 1983 )  is  a  आम  chimpanzee ,  ज्ञात   लिये  being the one-time pet of American recording  कलाकार  Michael Jackson ,  जो  bought the  primate  from a Texas research facility in  the   जल्दी   1980s  .
The animal was a frequent  सफर   साथी  to the  सिंगर  , whose  अनुलग्नक  to the  एनिमल  led to  मीडिया  mockery and  ,  among other  कारकों  ,  to   a   पब्लिक   बोध   of  Jackson  as  an eccentric  .
दौरान  the  ख़राब   संसार  Tour  ,   लिये   उदाहरण   ,  Jackson brought  बुलबुले  with  उसे  to Japan  ,   जहाँ   वे  both drank tea  साथ   the  mayor of  ओसाका  .
Bubbles  थी  initially  रखा  at  the   जैक्सन   परिवार   's   घर  in  encino  , Los Angeles ,  लकिन  was  स्थानांतरित  to Neverland Ranch  in  1988 .
वहीँ  ,  he   slept   in  a crib  in  Jackson 's  बेडरूम   ,  used the singer 's  प्रसाधन  , and ate candy in the  neverland   फिल्म   थिएटर  .
in   2003   the   पब्लिक   सीखे  that  ,  like all  खिलाते   chimpanzees   ,  Bubbles had matured into a  विशाल   और   आक्रामक  adult  chimp  unsuitable as  a   साथी   एनिमल  .
He  थी  sent to a  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  animal  प्रशिक्षक  , where he was  reported   to   have   attempted  suicide  .
When the trainer shut down  उसके  operation  in  2004  ,  Bubbles was  स्थानांतरित   to  the Center for  ग्रेट  Apes  ,  a sanctuary  in  Wauchula  ,   फ्लोरिडा   ,   जहाँ  he  रै  lived  चूंकि  2005  .
Muse are an English rock band from  teignmouth  , Devon , which  formed  in  1994   .
The band  consists   of   स्कूल  friends  मैथ्यू  Bellamy ( lead vocals , lead  गिटार  ,  पियानो   ,   keyboards   ,  keytar  )  , Christopher  wolstenholme  (  बास  , vocals , keyboards , rhythm guitar , harmonica ) and  डोमिनिक  Howard  (  drums , percussion  ,  synthesisers ,  sampling  )  .
Since the  रिलीज  of their  2006  album  ब्लैक  Holes and Revelations , keyboardist and percussionist  मॉर्गन  Nicholls  रै  performed live with  the   बैंड  .
चिंतन  are  ज्ञात  for  उनके  energetic  और   हद  live performances and their  संलयन  of many music genres , including space rock ,  प्रगतिशील  rock ,  वैकल्पिक  rock , heavy  मेटल  ,  शास्त्रीय  music and electronica  .
Muse  have   released   छह  studio albums : Showbiz  (  1999  )  , Origin of  सममिति   (   2001   )   ,   absolution  ( 2003 ) , Black  छेद  and Revelations  (   2006  ) , The Resistance (  2009  )  और  The 2nd Law ( 2012 )  .
वे   have  also  जारी   तीन  live albums , Hullabaloo Soundtrack  (  2002 )  ,  which  is  also a compilation  of  B-sides , Absolution  दौरे  (  2005   )  , and HAARP  (   2008  ) , which  दस्तावेज़   the  band 's performances at Wembley  स्टेडियम  in  2007  .
Black Holes and Revelations earned  the   बैंड  a  पारा   पुरस्कार   नामांकन  and a  तीसरा  place finish  in  the NME Albums  of   the   साल  list  लिये  2006 .
चिंतन  have also  जीती   a  collection  of   म्यूज़िक  awards  throughout  their  इतिहास  ,  सहित  five MTV  यूरोपीय  Music  पुरस्कार  ,  छह  Q Awards  ,  eight NME Awards , two Brit Awards —winning  ``   बेहतरीन   अंग्रेजों   सजीव  Act  ''  twice , an  एमटीवी  Video Music  पुरस्कार  , four Kerrang !
Awards and an American  म्यूज़िक   पुरस्कार   .
They were  भी   मनोनीत   लिये   पाँच   ग्रैमी  Awards , of which they  जीती   बेहतरीन   चट्टान  Album  ,  for their fifth  स्टुडियो  album The Resistance ( 2009 )  .
चिंतन   have   बेची  over  15  million  एल्बम   विश्वव्यापी   .
Bloemfontein  (  ,  ;  Dutch for  ``  fountain of  पुष्प   ''   )   is  the  पूंजी   नगर  of  the  Free  राज्य   प्रांत   of   दक्षिण   अफ़्रीकी  ; and ,  as  the judicial  पूंजी   of   the   स्वदेश  ,  एक  of South  अफ़्रीकी  's three national capitals  –   the  other  दो  being  केप  Town  ,   the  legislative  पूंजी   ,   और   पेशकशों  ,  the   प्रशासनिक   पूंजी   .
Bloemfontein is popularly  और  poetically  ज्ञात  as ``  the   नगर   of   गुलाब  `` , owing to the  प्रचुरता  of  ये  flowers and  the  annual rose festival held  वहीँ  .
the  city  's  Sesotho name is Mangaung , meaning ``  प्लेस   of  cheetahs  ``  and  it   रै   महरूम  included  in  the Mangaung  लोकल  Municipality since 2000  .
Bloemfontein  is  situated on dry grassland at , at an  ऊँचाई  of above sea  स्तर  .
The city is  घर  to 369,568 residents , while  the  Mangaung Local  नगरपालिका   रै  a population of 645,455  .
