The  अर्थ  of  जीवन  is a philosophical question concerning  the  significance of  जीवन   or  existence in  सामान्य  .
it   can  also  be  expressed  in  different forms  ,   ऐसे  as `` Why are we  यहाँ   ?  ``  ,   ``   कया  is  जीवन  all  परिचय  ?  ``  , and  ``  What is the  purpose  of existence ? ''
it  has been  the   विषय  of  much  philosophical , scientific  ,  and theological  अटकलें  throughout history  .
There have been a  विशाल  number of proposed answers to  ये  questions  इससे  many different cultural and  वैचारिक  backgrounds .
The meaning of life is  in  the  philosophical  and religious conceptions of  अस्तित्व   ,   सोशल   ties  , consciousness , and happiness  ,  and borders on  अनेक  other issues , such  as   सांकेतिक   अर्थ   ,  ontology  ,   मान   ,   purpose   ,  ethics , good and evil  ,  free  होगा  , the  अस्तित्व   of   एक  or multiple Gods , conceptions  of  God  ,   the  soul , and  the  afterlife .
Scientific contributions focus  primarily   on   describing   सम्बन्धित  empirical facts  परिचय  the universe , exploring  the  context and  पैरामीटर्स  concerning the  'how  ' of life .
विज्ञान  also studies and  can   provide  recommendations for  the  pursuit of well-being and  a   सम्बन्धित   धारणा   of  morality .
An  वैकल्पिक   ,  humanistic approach  मुद्राएँ  the question  ``  What is the meaning  of  my life ?  ''
The value of the question pertaining  to   the  purpose of life may  coincide   साथ  the  उपलब्धि  of ultimate reality  ,  or  a   अहसास  of oneness ,  or   भी  a  अहसास  of sacredness .
Family  guy  creator Seth MacFarlane also  provides   the   आवाज़ें  of  पीटर  Griffin ,  stewie   griffin   ,  Brian  griffin   ,  and  ग्लेन  Quagmire  .
परिवार  Guy  is  an  अमरीकी  animated sitcom that features  पाँच  main voice  अभिनेताओं  ,  और  numerous  नियमित  cast  और  recurring  अतिथि  stars .
the  principal voice cast consists of show  निर्माता  Seth  macfarlane   ,  Alex Borstein  ,  Seth  ग्रीन  , Mila Kunis ( who  replaced  Lacey  chabert   बाद  the  पहला  season )  और  Mike Henry  और   अभी  , the  नई  actor  beau  Osborne  .
Recurring  आवाज़   अभिनेताओं  include Patrick Warburton  ,   आदम   वेस्ट  ,  जॉन   G.   ब्रेनन  ,  निकोल  Sullivan and Jennifer  tilly   ,  and  repeat  guest stars  शामिल   फिलिस  Diller ,  चार्ल्स  Durning  ,  Rush Limbaugh  ,  and Phil LaMarr .
Many cast members  provide   आवाज़ें   लिये  multiple characters  .
the  voice actors ,  in  portraying  the  various  अक्षर  personalities  on  the  दिखाएँ  ,  चित्रण   प्रेरणा  from celebrities and pop culture  .
परिवार  Guy characters have been played  by   अधिक  than one actor , after  सदस्यों  of  the  show left  the   श्रेणी   or  had  conflicting   दायित्वों  .
Kunis was nominated for  an   एनी   पुरस्कार   लिये  voicing Meg  griffin   in  the season 5 episode ``  मुश्किल  Legal `` and MacFarlane  रै  also  जीती  an Emmy  पुरस्कार  for  बकाया  Voice-Over Performance and an Annie Award for  बेहतरीन  Voice Acting in  an   एनिमेटेड  Television  उत्पादन  , though  no  other cast  सदस्य  has won  an   पुरस्कार   लिये  their work  on   the   श्रेणी  .

``  The Princess  और  the  मटर   ''  (  ;   शाब्दिक  translation  :  `` The Princess  on  the Pea ''  )  is  a  literary fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen about a  यंग  woman  जिनकी  royal identity is established by  a   परीक्षण  of her  शारीरिक   संवेदनशीलता  .
The tale was  पहला   प्रकाशित  with three others  by   andersen  in  an   inexpensive  booklet on 8 May 1835 in  कोपेनहेगन   by  C.A .  reitzel  .
Andersen had  सुना  the story as a  चाइल्ड   ,  and it likely  रै  its source  in  folk material , possibly  originating  from Sweden  as  it is  अनजान  in the Danish oral tradition  .
neither  `` The  राजकुमारी   और   the  Pea  ''  nor Andersen 's  अन्य   किस्से  of  1835   यहूद  well  प्राप्त  by  डैनिश   आलोचकों  , who  disliked  their  कैज़ुअल  , chatty  स्टाइल   ,  and their lack  of   नैतिकता   .
in  1959 `` The  राजकुमारी   और  the Pea  ''  was adapted  to  the  musical   स्टेज  in  a  production called  एकबार   upon  a Mattress  अभिनीत   कैरोल  Burnett .
जर्मनी  Americans  (   )  are citizens of  the  United States  जो   यहूद   either  born  in  Germany or are of German  ancestry  .
They comprise  परिचय   50  million  लोगों  , making  उन्हें   the  largest ancestry  समूह  ahead  of  Irish Americans , African Americans and  अंग्रेज़ी   अमेरिकी  .
वे   comprise  about 1/3  of  the German  diaspora  all  over  the  संसार  .
None of  the   जर्मनी   राज्य  had New World colonies .
नहीं  until the 1670s  किया   the  first  significant  groups of German immigrants arrive in  the   अंग्रेजों  colonies , settling primarily in New York and Pennsylvania .
Immigration continued in  बहुत   विशाल  numbers during the 19th  सदी  ,  साथ   कुछ  eight million arrivals  इससे  Germany  .
वे  were pulled by  the  attractions of  जमीन  and  धार्मिक  freedom ,  और   धकेल  out  of   यूरोपीय   by   shortages  of land and  धार्मिक   or  political oppression  .
Many  arrived   seeking   धार्मिक  or political freedom , others  लिये   आर्थिक  opportunities greater than those in Europe  ,  and others simply for the chance  to   प्रारंभ  fresh in  the   नई  World .
the  arrivals before  1850  were mostly farmers who sought out  the   सबसे  productive  जमीन  ,  जहाँ   उनके   intensive   खेती   तकनीकों  would  अदा  off .
After 1840  ,  many  आए  to cities  ,   जहाँ   ``   germania   ''   —german-speaking  districts—soon  उभरा  .
German Americans  स्थापित   the   पहला   kindergartens   in  the United  राज्य   ,  introduced the  क्रिसमस  tree tradition ,  और  originated  लोकप्रिय  American foods such as  hot  dogs  और  hamburgers .
जर्मनी  American celebrations are held throughout the country , one of the most well-known  होने   the   german-american  Steuben Parade in New  यॉर्क   नगर  , held every  तीसरा  Saturday  in  September .
There are  भी  major annual events in Chicago , Cincinnati ,  मिल्वौकी   ,   पिट्सबर्ग   ,  St. Louis and other cities .
Like  अनेक   अन्य   आप्रवासियों   कि  came to the United States , an overwhelming number  of  people of  जर्मनी  or partial German  descent   have  essentially become Americanized  .
the   प्रस्तावना  to  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  Constitution is a brief introductory statement  of  the Constitution 's fundamental  उद्देश्य   और   guiding  principles .
it   राज्य  in general  शर्तें  , and  न्यायालयों   have   referred   to   it   as  reliable evidence of , the Founding  fathers   '  intentions regarding the  संविधान  's  अर्थ  and  कया  they  hoped  the  संविधान  would achieve  as   it  pertains to  सब  of  the  people of the United  राज्य  .
As  the  phrase , ``  we  the people  ''   suggests   कि   the  new  सरकारी  originates from the people of the United States  और   it  sets into  गति   a   सवाल   as   it  pertains to that  विशाल  population concerning  the  individual rights  और   समता   among  all people ;  इस   can  be seen  सबसे   broadly  in  the   divide  between republicanism  और  social  लोकतंत्र   .
The history  of  the  अंतरजाल  began with the  विकास   of  electronic  कंप्यूटर   in  the 1950s  .
the   पब्लिक  was first  introduced  to the concepts that would lead to the Internet when a message was sent over  the   arpanet   इससे  computer science Professor  लियोनार्ड  Kleinrock 's laboratory  at   विश्वविद्यालयों  of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ,  लॉस   एंजिल्स   (  UCLA )  ,   बाद   the   दूसरी   टुकड़ा   of  network equipment  थी  installed at Stanford Research  संस्थान  ( SRI ) .
पैकेट   switched   संजाल  such as ARPANET ,  चिह्नित  I at  npl  in the UK , CYCLADES , Merit Network  ,   tymnet   ,  and Telenet , were  विकसित  in the  लेट  1960s  और  early  1970s  using  a   किस्में  of protocols  .
The ARPANET  in  particular led  to   the   विकास   of   प्रोटोकॉल   लिये  internetworking , in  जिससे  multiple  पृथक  networks could  be  joined together  into  a  संजाल  of  संजाल   .
In 1982 , the  अंतरजाल  protocol suite (  tcp/ip   )   थी  standardized ,  और  consequently ,  the   अवधारणा  of a  world-wide   संजाल  of interconnected TCP/IP  संजाल  , called  the  Internet  ,  was  introduced   .
Access to the  arpanet   थी   विस्तारित   in  1981 when  the   नेशनल  Science  न्यास  ( NSF )  विकसित  the  कंप्यूटर  Science Network ( CSNET  )  and again in 1986  जब  NSFNET provided access to  महासंगणक   साइट   in  the United States from  शोध  and education organizations .
वाणिज्यिक   अंतरजाल   सेवा  providers (  isps  ) began to  emerge  in the  लेट   1980s  and  जल्दी   1990s  .
The ARPANET was  decommissioned   in  1990 .
The  अंतरजाल  was commercialized in  1995  when  nsfnet  was decommissioned  ,  removing  the  last  प्रतिबंध  on the  उपयोग  of the Internet to  carry   वाणिज्यिक  traffic .
चूंकि   the   mid-1990s  ,  the  Internet  रै  had  a  revolutionary impact on  संस्कृति  and  कॉमर्स   ,   सहित   the   वृद्धि  of near-instant  संचार  by  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   मेल  , instant messaging  ,  Voice over Internet Protocol  (  VoIP )  ``  phone calls  ''   ,  two-way interactive  वीडियो  calls  ,  and the  संसार   चौड़ी  Web  साथ  its  चर्चा   forums   ,   ब्लॉग  ,  सोशल  networking , and online shopping sites .
The  शोध   और  education community continues  to   develop  and use  उन्नत  networks  ऐसे   as   nsf  's very high speed Backbone Network  सेवा  ( vBNS ) ,  internet2  , and National  lambdarail  .
Increasing  amounts   of   आंकड़ा  are transmitted at higher and higher  speeds  over fiber optic  संजाल   ऑपरेटिंग  at  1-gbit/s   ,  10-Gbit/s  ,   or  more .
The  अंतरजाल  's  कब्ज़ा  over  the  global communication landscape  थी   लगभग  instant in historical terms : it only communicated 1 %  of  the information flowing  through  two-way  दूरसंचार  networks in the year  1993  , already  51  % by 2000  ,  and  अधिक   than   97  % of  the   telecommunicated  information by 2007 .
Today  the  Internet  continues  to grow ,  चलित  by  कभी  greater  amounts  of online  सूचना   ,  commerce ,  entertainment  ,  और   सोशल   नेटवर्किंग  .
दक्षिणपश्चिम  Airlines  co.  ( )  is   a   प्रमुख  U.S.  एयरलाइन  and the world 's  largest  low-cost carrier , headquartered  in  Dallas  ,  Texas .
it  was established in 1967 and adopted its  वर्तमान  name in 1971  .
the  airline has more than  46,000  employees  और  operates  अधिक   than  3,400  फ़्लाइट  per day .
As  of  June  5  ,  2011   ,   it  carries the  सबसे  domestic  यात्री  of any  u.S.  airline .
As  of  April 2013 ,  दक्षिणपश्चिम  Airlines has  अनुसूचित  service to 84  गंतव्यों   in   41  states  और   प्यूर्टो   रीको  .
Southwest  एयरलाइंस  has solely operated Boeing 737s  ,  except for  a  few years in the 1970s  और   1980s   ,   जब   it  operated Boeing 727s .
As of August 2012 , Southwest is the largest operator of the  737  worldwide with over  550  in service , each operating an  औसत  of  छह  flights per day  .
in  May 2011  ,   the   एयरलाइन  acquired  airtran  Airways , with integration  of  the  वाहक  expected to  be  complete by 2014  .
On March  1  , 2012 ,  the   कम्पनी  was  जारी  a  सिंगल   ऑपरेटिंग   प्रमाणपत्र  , technically  बनने  one  एयरलाइन   .
Rolling  चट्टान   is  a 4.6  %  abv  पाले   lager   शुभारम्भ  in 1939 by the  latrobe  Brewing Company  .
Although founded as a local beer  in   पश्चिमी  Pennsylvania ,  it  was  marketed   aggressively  and eventually became  a  national product .
the  brand was sold  to  Anheuser-Busch of St. Louis  ,  Missouri  ,  in mid  2006   ,   जिससे  transferred brewing operations to New Jersey  .
Benedict XVI ( , , ;  born   जोसेफ  Aloisius Ratzinger on 16 April 1927  )  is  पोप  emeritus  of  the  कैथोलिक  Church  .
He served  as  Pope from  2005  to 2013  .
In that position , he was both the  नेता   of  the Catholic Church  और  Sovereign  of  the  वेटिकन  City State  .
Benedict  थी  elected on  19  April  2005   in   a  papal  conclave  , celebrated his Papal Inauguration Mass  on  24 April  2005  ,  और   took  possession  of  his cathedral  ,   the  Archbasilica of St. John Lateran , on 7  may  2005 .
ordained  as a priest in  1951  in his native Bavaria  ,   ratzinger  established himself  as  a highly regarded university theologian by the  लेट   1950s   और   थी   नियुक्त  a  पूरा   प्राध्यापक   in  1958 .
After a long  करियर   as  an  अकादमिक  , serving as a  प्राध्यापक  of theology  at  several German  universities—the  last  होने   the  University of  regensburg  , where he  परोसा  as Vice President of  the  university  in   1976  and 1977—he was appointed Archbishop of Munich  और  Freising and  कार्डिनल  by Pope Paul VI in 1977  ,  an unusual promotion for someone with  छोटी  pastoral experience  .
in  1981 , he settled  in  Rome  जब  he became  prefect   of  the Congregation for  the   doctrine  of the Faith , one of the most important  dicasteries  of the Roman Curia  .
From  2002  until  उसके   चुनाव  as pope , he was also  डीन   of  the  कॉलेज  of Cardinals  ,   और   as  such  ,  the primus inter pares among the  कार्डिनल्स  .
prior  to  बनने   पोप  ,  he   थी  `` a major  फिगर  on the  वेटिकन   स्टेज   लिये  a  क्वार्टर   of  a  सदी   ''  as `` one of the most respected  ,   influential  and  विवादास्पद  members of the College  of  Cardinals '' ; he had  an  influence  ``  second  to  none when  it  came  to  setting  गिरिजाघर  priorities and  दिशानिर्देश  ''  as   एक  of  पोप  John Paul  ii   's   closest   confidants  .
he   थी   originally  a liberal theologian  ,  but adopted conservative views  बाद   1968   .
उसके  prolific writings defend traditional  कैथोलिक  doctrine  और   मान   .
During his papacy ,  बेनेडिक्ट  XVI  advocated   a  return to fundamental  ईसाई  values to  काउंटर   the   increased   secularisation  of  अनेक  Western countries .
He  दृश्य   relativism   's  denial of  उद्देश्य  truth ,  और   the  denial of moral truths in  particular  , as the central problem  of   the  21st  सदी   .
He taught the importance of both  the   कैथोलिक   गिरिजाघर  and an understanding of God 's redemptive love  .
Pope Benedict also revived a  क्रमांक  of traditions including elevating the  tridentine  Mass to  a  more  prominent  position .
he  renewed the relationship  between   the   कैथोलिक   गिरिजाघर  and art  ,  viewing  the  use of beauty  as  a path  to  the sacred ,  प्रचारित  the use of Latin  ,  and reintroduced  परंपरागत  papal garments , for which  कारण  he was called  ``  the  पोप  of aesthetics  ''  .
he  has been described  as   ``  the main intellectual  फ़ोर्स  in  the  Church  ''  since the  mid-1980s   .
Several of  पोप  Benedict  's  students from his academic career  हैं  also prominent churchmen  आज   और  confidantes of  उसे  , notably  क्रिस्टोफ   schönborn  .
on  11  फ़रवरी  2013 , Pope  बेनेडिक्ट  announced  उसके  resignation  in   a  speech  in  Latin  पहले  the  कार्डिनल्स   ,   citing  a ``  कमी   of  strength of mind and  देह   ''   due  to  उसके   उन्नत  age  .
His resignation became effective  on   28   फ़रवरी   2013   .
he  is  the  first pope to resign  चूंकि   पोप  Gregory  बारहवीं  in 1415 , and the first to do so on his  अपना  initiative  चूंकि  Pope  celestine  V  in  1294  .
as  pope  emeritus  , Benedict retains the  स्टाइल   of   उसके  Holiness  ,  and  the  title of Pope  ,  and will  continue  to  पोशाक  in the  papal  colour of white  .
he   थी  succeeded by  पोप   फ्रांसिस   on  13 March 2013  ,  and  he   स्थानांतरित   into  the newly renovated  मेटर  Ecclesiae monastery for his  रिटायरमेंट  on 2  may  2013..

Stereoscopy ( also called stereoscopics or 3D  इमेजिंग   )  is a  तकनीक  for creating or  बढ़ाना  the illusion of  गहराई   in  an image  by  means  of  stereopsis for binocular  दृष्टि  .
The word stereoscopy derives  इससे   the  Greek  ``  στερεός  ''   (   stereos  ) ,  ``   कड़   ,   ठोस  ''  +  ``  σκοπέω  '' ( skopeō ) , ``  to  look  ''   ,   ``   to  see  ''  .
Most stereoscopic methods present two  ऑफसेट  images  separately  to  the   बाएँ  and  सही  eye of  the  viewer .
ये  two-dimensional images  हैं  then  संयुक्त   in   the   दिमाग   to  give  the  perception of  3d   गहराई   .
This  तकनीक  is distinguished  इससे   3d  displays that display an image in  तीन  full dimensions  ,   allowing  the observer  to   बढ़ाएँ   सूचना   परिचय   the  3-dimensional objects  होने  displayed by head  और  eye  आंदोलनों  .
John  एडम्स   (  October  30  ,  1735  (  o.s   .  October  19   ,  1735 ) –  जुलाई   4  ,  1826  ) was the  दूसरी  president  of  the  संयुक्त  States ( 1797–1801  )  , having  पहले   परोसा   as  the  पहला  vice  अध्यक्ष   of   the   संयुक्त   राज्य  .
An American  founding  Father  ,  he  थी   a  statesman  ,   राजनयिक  ,  और  a leading advocate of  अमरीकी  independence from Great  ब्रिटेन  .
खूब   शिक्षित   ,  he was an Enlightenment  राजनैतिक  theorist who promoted republicanism  और  wrote  prolifically  about  उसके  often seminal ideas , both in  प्रकाशित   works  and  in   अक्षर  to  उसके  wife and  कुंजी  adviser  अबीगैल   as  well as to  अन्य   founding  Fathers .
एडम्स  came  to  prominence in the  जल्दी  stages  of   the  American  क्रान्ति  .
A lawyer  और   पब्लिक  figure in  बोस्टन   ,  as  a  delegate from Massachusetts  to   the  Continental  कॉंग्रेस  , he played a leading role in  persuading  Congress to  घोषित  independence .
He  assisted  Thomas Jefferson  in   drafting  the  घोषणा  of Independence in  1776  , and  थी  its  प्राथमिक  advocate in the Congress  .
Later  ,   as  a  राजनयिक  in Europe ,  he   helped   negotiate   the  eventual peace treaty  साथ  Great  ब्रिटेन   ,  and  थी   जिम्मेदार  for obtaining vital governmental  लोन   इससे   एम्सटर्डम   बैंकर्स   .
A political theorist and  इतिहासकार  ,  एडम्स  largely wrote the  मैसाचुसेट्स  Constitution in  1780   ,   जिससे   साथ  with his earlier  विचार   on  Government  ,   बहकावे   अमरीकी  political thought  .
One  of  his  महानतम  roles was  as   a  judge of character : in  1775   ,  he nominated  जार्ज   वॉशिंगटन  to  be   commander-in-chief  , and 25 years later nominated John Marshall  to   be   मुख्य   इंसाफ  of the  संयुक्त  States  .
Adams '  क्रांतिकारी   श्रेय   secured  him two terms as  जार्ज   वॉशिंगटन  's  वाइस   अध्यक्ष  and his  अपना   चुनाव  in 1796  as  the second  अध्यक्ष   .
During his  एक  term , he encountered ferocious attacks by the Jeffersonian Republicans ,  as   खूब  as the dominant  गुट   in   उसके  own Federalist Party led by his  कड़वा  enemy Alexander Hamilton .
एडम्स   हस्ताक्षरित   the   विवादास्पद  Alien and Sedition Acts , and  निर्मित  up the  फौज  and navy  विशेषकर   in  the face of an  undeclared   नवल  war ( called the  ``   quasi-war   ``   )   साथ   फ़्रांस  , 1798–1800 .
the  major  accomplishment  of his presidency  थी   उसके  peaceful resolution of the  विरोध  in  the   फेस  of  हैमिल्टन   's  opposition .
in   1800  ,  एडम्स   थी  defeated for  re-election  by  थामस   जेफरसन   और  retired  to  Massachusetts .
he  later resumed his friendship  साथ  Jefferson .
he  and  उसके   बीवी   ,  Abigail  एडम्स   ,  founded  an  accomplished  परिवार   लकीर  of politicians , diplomats , and  इतिहासकारों   अभी   referred   to   as   the  Adams political family .
एडम्स  was the father of John Quincy Adams , the  छठे  President  of   the  United States  .
उसके   उपलब्धियाँ  have received greater  मान्यता  in  आधुनिक  times , though his contributions  यहूद  not  initially  as celebrated  as   those  of other  संस्थापकों  .
Adams was the first U.S.  अध्यक्ष   to   reside  in the  भवन  that  आखिरकार   became   ज्ञात   as   the  White  हाउस   .
The United States  ten-dollar   विधेयक  (  $   10  ) is a denomination  of   संयुक्त  States  करेंसी   .
the  first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury  (  1789–95 )  ,  Alexander Hamilton , is currently featured on the obverse of  the  bill , while  the  U.S. Treasury Building is  प्रदर्शित  on  the   रिवर्स  .
(  Hamilton is  एक  of two  non-presidents  featured on  फिलहाल  issued U.S. bills .
The  अन्य  is Benjamin Franklin , on the  $   100   विधेयक  .
Hamilton is one of  तभी  four  लोगों  featured on U.S.  पेपर  currency  (  1861  to  the present  )   जो   थी  not  born   in   the  continental  संयुक्त  States  ,  as  he   थी   इससे  the  वेस्ट  Indies  .
the   अन्य  are : Albert Gallatin , Switzerland  (  $ 500  1862/63  Legal  टेंडर  ) ; George Meade , Spain (  $   1,000   1890/91  Treasury Note )  ;  and  रॉबर्ट  Morris ,  इंग्लैण्ड   (  $  1,000   1862/63  Legal  टेंडर  ;  $  10 1878/80  चांदी  Certificate  )   .
in  addition , Kamehameha I  ,  appears on the  2008  Hawaii  राज्य  quarter  .   )
All $ 10  बिल्स   जारी  today are  संघीय   आरक्षित  Notes  .
the  Bureau of Engraving and Printing  says   the   औसत   जीवन   of  a $  10  bill in circulation is 18 months  पहले  it is replaced  due   to   पहनें   .
लगभग  6  %  of all  us  banknotes  मुद्रित  in  2009  were $  10  bills  .
Ten  डालर  bills are  वितरित  by Federal Reserve Banks in  पीला  straps .
The source  of  the  फेस   on  the  $  10 bill is John Trumbull  ’s   1805  portrait of Hamilton that belongs to  the  portrait  संग्रहण  of New York City Hall .
the  $ 10  विधेयक  is  the   तभी   u.S.  paper currency in  परिसंचरण   in  which  the  portrait faces to the  बाएँ  ( the  $  100,000  विधेयक  featured  a  portrait of  वुडरो  Wilson  facing  to the left ,  लकिन  was used only for  intra-government  transactions )  .

a   jetboat  is  a   नाव  propelled  by   a   जेट  of water ejected  इससे  the back  of   the   शिल्प  .
नापसंद   a  powerboat or  motorboat  that  उपयोग  a propeller in the  जल   नीचे   or  behind  the   नाव  ,  a  jetboat draws the  जल  from  अंतर्गत   the   नाव   into  a pump inside  the   नाव   ,  then expels  it   through   a  nozzle at  the  stern  .
Jetboats  यहूद  originally  designed  by  सर  William Hamilton  (   जो   विकसित  a waterjet  in  1954 )  लिये  operation in the fast-flowing  और   उथले  rivers  of   नई  Zealand ,  specifically  to overcome  the   प्रॉब्लम  of propellers striking rocks  in   ऐसे  waters .
Previous attempts at  waterjet  propulsion had  बहुत   छोटी   lifetimes  , generally  due   to  the inefficient design of  the   इकाई  and  the  fact that they offered few advantages over conventional  propellers   .
नापसंद  these previous waterjet  developments   ,  such  as   campini  's and the Hanley Hydrojet , Hamilton  था   a  specific need for a propulsion system to  operate  in very-shallow  जल  , and the waterjet proved  to   be   the  ideal solution .
From this  ,   the  popularity of  the   जेट  unit and jetboat increased rapidly .
through   further  developments ,  it  was  मिला   the   waterjet   offered   अनेक   अन्य  advantages  over  propellers for a  चौड़ी  range of vessel types ,  और  as  ऐसे   ,   waterjets  are  प्रयुक्त  widely  आज  for  अनेक   high-speed   बरतन   ,   सहित  passenger  ferries  , rescue  शिल्प  , patrol  नौकाएँ  and  offshore  supply vessels  .
Jetboats are  अत्यधिक   maneuverable  ,  और  many can  ,  from  पूरा  speed  ,  be reversed and  brought  to  a   रोकें  within little  अधिक  than their  अपना  length  ,   in   a   maneuver  known  as   a  `` crash  रोकें   ''  .
The well known  हैमिल्टन   फेरे   or  `` jet spin ''  is  a  high-speed  maneuvre  जहाँ  the boat 's engine  throttle  is  काटें  ,  the  steering  is  turned sharply and the throttle  खोली  again  ,  causing the boat  to  spin quickly around  साथ  a  विशाल  spray  of  water  .
There is no  अभियान्त्रिकी  limit  to   the  size of jetboats , though  the  validity of their use  depends   a   लॉट  on  the   प्रकार  of application .
Classic prop-drives are  generally  more  कुशल  and  किफायती  at  कम   speeds  , up to about , but as  नाव   गति   increases  beyond this  ,   the   अतिरिक्त   हल   प्रतिरोध   उत्पन्न  by  struts   ,  rudders  ,   shafts   (  etc  .  )  अर्थात्  waterjets are more  कुशल   in  the 20-50 knot range (  up  to )  .
Also , in situations with very large propellers  turning   at  slow  speeds   (  such  as  tug boats )  ,   the  equivalent  आकार  waterjet  होता  be  too  big  to  be practical .
लिये   ये  reasons , the vast majority of waterjet  इकाई   हैं   संस्थापित  in high-speed  बरतन  and in  particular  situations where shallow draught ,  maneuverability  , and load flexibility  हैं   प्रमुख  concerns  .
The  biggest  jet-driven  बरतन   हैं  found in military  उपयोग  or the high-speed passenger/car ferry  उद्योग  .
South  अफ़्रीकी  's  s  (  लगभग   long  ) are the biggest jet-propelled  बरतन  so far  .
Even these German-built vessels are capable of performing `` crash stops  ''  .
uveitis   is  broadly defined as inflammation of the  uvea  .
The uvea consists of  the  middle ,  pigmented  , vascular structures of the eye and includes the iris ,  ciliary  body , and choroid  .
Uveitis requires an urgent referral  और   thorough  examination by  an   ophthalmologist   or  optometrist along with urgent treatment  to  control the  सूजन  .

he  is played  by   केविन   connolly   .
The  जगमगाता   is   a  1980  मनोवैज्ञानिक   हॉरर  film produced and directed by  स्टेनली  Kubrick  ,  co-written  साथ  novelist Diane Johnson , and  अभिनीत  Jack  निकोल्सन  , Shelley Duvall ,  scatman   crothers  , and Danny  लॉयड   .
The film  is  based on the  स्टीफन   किंग   अनोखा  The Shining .
A  लेखक  , Jack  torrance  , takes a  जॉब   as   an   off-season  caretaker  at   an  isolated hotel .
His  यंग   बेटे   possesses  psychic abilities  और  is  समर्थ  to see things from  the  past and  भविष्य   ,  such as the  भूत  who inhabit the hotel .
Soon after  settling   in  , the family is trapped in the  होटल  by a  snowstorm  , and Jack gradually  becomes  influenced  by   a  supernatural presence ;  he   उतरता   into  madness and  कोशिशें  to murder his  बीवी  and son  .
Unlike previous Kubrick  films   ,   जिससे  developed  an  audience gradually  by  building on word-of-mouth , The Shining  थी  released as a mass-market  फिल्मी   ,  opening  at  first  in  just  दो  cities on Memorial Day ,  तब   देशभर   a   माह   बाद   .
Although initial response  to  the film  थी   मिश्रित  , later critical  मूल्यांकन  was  अधिक   अनुकूल  and  it  is now viewed as a classic of the horror genre .
फिल्मी  director Martin Scorsese ,  लिखने  in  the   रोज़   जानवर  ,  क्रमित   it  as one of the  11   scariest  horror movies of  सब  time  .
Film  आलोचकों  , film  विद्यार्थी   ,  and  kubrick  's producer ,  जन  Harlan  ,  have remarked  on   the  enormous  influence  the  फिल्मी   रै   था   on   लोकप्रिय   संस्कृति  .
The  आरंभिक   यूरोपीय  release  of  The  जगमगाता   थी  25  मिनट्स   shorter  than the American version  ,   हासिल  by  निकालना  most  of   the  scenes taking  प्लेस  outside the  environs   of  the hotel .
Patio  कोला  Bottle
Patio  आहार   कोला   थी   a   ब्रांड  of  आहार   सोडा   introduced  by  पेप्सी  in  1963   .
it  was created in  जवाब   to   आहार  Rite  कोला  , which  थी  the first  आहार  cola  on  the market .
फ़िटनेस  promoter Debbie Drake  थी  Patio Diet Cola 's  प्रवक्ता   .
In  1964  ,  आँगन  released orange  ,   अंगूर  ,  और  root  बियर  flavors .
This  स्वाद  line  थी   नहीं  meant  to   compete   साथ   ब्रांड्स  like Orange Crush  ,  but rather fill out  the   लकीर  .
Patio sodas  यहूद  available  in   the   cold-bottle  market  :  grocery and  mom-and-pop  stores .
Advertising for  आँगन  was  comparatively   scarce  ; at  the   समय  , bottlers were  regionally   franchised   ,  and  सम्बन्धित  advertising was necessarily  लोकल   .
In 1964 ,  आँगन   आहार   कोला  became Diet Pepsi .
The newly branded diet soda was advertised alongside  पेप्सी  with the tagline ``  पेप्सी  either way '' , which  replaced  the  स्लोगन   ``  Dances  साथ  flavor ''  .
The short  जीवन  span  of  Patio  आहार   कोला  makes  it  a great addition for  बोतल  collectors  .
Most of the remaining Patio  लकीर  of flavors  यहूद   phased  out by the  जल्दी   1970s   ,  while  a  few survived  जबतक   the   मिड  70s
अवसंरचना  is  मौलिक  physical and  organizational  structures  needed   लिये   the  operation of a society or enterprise , or  the   सेवाएं  and facilities  जरुरी  for  an  economy  to  function .
It  can   be   generally  defined  as   the  set of interconnected structural elements that  provide  framework  supporting   an   संपूर्ण   ढांचा  of  विकास   .
it  is  an  important  पद  for judging a country or  प्रदेश   's  development .
the  term typically refers to the technical structures  कि  support  a   समाज   ,   ऐसे   as   सड़कें  ,  पुलों  ,  जल  supply  ,  sewers  ,  electrical grids , telecommunications  ,   और   so   forth   ,  and can  be  defined as  ``   the   शारीरिक  components  of  interrelated systems providing commodities  और  services  अनिवार्य   to  enable , sustain , or enhance  societal  living conditions  .   ''
viewed  functionally ,  अवसंरचना   facilitates  the  उत्पादन   of  goods  और   सेवाएं  , and also  the   वितरण  of  समाप्त   उत्पाद  to  बाज़ार  ,  as   खूब   as  basic social services such as schools and  अस्पताल  ;  लिये  example , roads enable the  हस्तांतरण  of  कच्चा   सामग्री   to   a   फैक्टरी  .
in   सैन्य  parlance , the term  refers  to  the  buildings and  स्थाई   संस्थापना  necessary for  the  support  ,  redeployment , and  आपरेशन   of   सैन्य  forces  .
To make  it   सरल   ,   अवसंरचना   is  anything that  is   needed  everyday ,  an  everyday item .
a   आलेखीय   प्रतिनिधित्व   of  the  आदर्श   इंसान   karyotype
Mitochondrial DNA .
Human genetic variation is the genetic differences  दोनो  within and  among  populations .
There may be  अनेक   विसंगतियाँ  of any  दिए  gene in  the   इंसान   जनसांख्यिकी  ( genes )  ,   अग्रणी   to  polymorphism  .
Many genes are not polymorphic , meaning that only  a  single  allele   is   उपस्थित   in  the population  :   the  gene is  तब   कहा  to be fixed .
no  two humans  हैं   genetically  identical .
Even monozygotic  जुड़वा  , who develop from  एक  zygote , have infrequent genetic  मतभेद   due   to   mutations  occurring  दौरान  development and  जीन  copy  क्रमांक  variation .
मतभेद   between  individuals , even  closely   सम्बन्धित  individuals ,  हैं  the  कुंजी   to  techniques  ऐसे  as genetic  फिंगरप्रिंटिंग  .
Alleles  occur   at  different frequencies in  अलग  human  populations  , with populations that  हैं  more geographically and  ancestrally   रिमोट  tending  to  differ more .
Causes  of  differences between individuals include the exchange  of  genes  दौरान  meiosis and various mutational  कार्यक्रम  .
There are at least two  कारण  why  जेनेटिक  variation  exists  between  populations  .
Natural  चयन  may confer an  अनुकूली  advantage to individuals in  a   विशिष्ट  environment  if  an allele  provides  a competitive advantage .
Alleles under  चयन  are  संभावित  to occur  तभी  in those geographic  regions   जहाँ  they  confer   an   लाभ  .
the  second  प्रमुख  cause of  जेनेटिक  variation is due  to  the  ऊँची  degree  of  neutrality  of  most  mutations  .
सबसे  mutations do  नहीं  appear  to  have  कोई  selective effect  एक   रास्ता   or  the other on the  सजीव  .
The main  कारण  is  जेनेटिक  drift ,  इस   is   the  effect of random  परिवर्तन  in  the  gene pool .
in   इंसानो  ,  संस्थापक   प्रभाव  and past  छोटी  population size (  increasing  the  likelihood  of genetic drift ) may have  था  an  महत्वपूर्ण  influence in  न्यूट्रल  differences between populations  .
the   सिद्धान्त  that humans recently  migrated   आउट  of  अफ़्रीकी   supports  this  .
The study of  इंसान  genetic variation has  दोनो  evolutionary  significance  and medical  अनुप्रयोग   .
it  can help scientists understand  प्राचीन  human  जनसांख्यिकी   migrations  as  खूब   as  how different  इंसान   समूह   हैं  biologically related  to  one  another   .
लिये   आयुर्विज्ञान   ,  study of  इंसान  genetic variation  may   be  important because some  disease-causing   alleles   occur   अधिक   प्रायः  in  लोगों  from  विशिष्ट  geographic regions  .
नई  findings show  कि  each human has on average  60   नई   mutations   compared  to their parents .
Apart from  mutations   ,   अनेक  genes  कि  may have aided humans in  प्राचीन   टाइम्स  plague  इंसानो  today .
For  उदाहरण  , it  is  suspected  कि  genes that allow humans to more  efficiently   प्रक्रम   खाना  are  those   कि   मेक   लोगों   susceptible   to  obesity and diabetes today  .
चाय  Party protesters  on   the  West  लॉन   of  the U.S.  कैपिटल  and the  नेशनल   मॉल  at the Taxpayer  कूच  on  वॉशिंगटन   on   सितंबर   12  , 2009  .
The Tea Party  गति   is   an   अमरीकी   राजनैतिक  movement  कि   अधिवक्ताओं  strict adherence  to   the  United States  संविधान  , reducing U.S.  सरकारी  spending and taxes  ,  and reduction of  the  U.S.  नेशनल  debt  और   संघीय  budget  deficit  .
The movement has  महरूम  called partly conservative , partly libertarian ,  और  partly populist  .
The  गति   रै  sponsored protests  और   समर्थित  political candidates since 2009 .
The name  of   the   गति  is  निकला   इससे   the  Boston Tea Party of 1773 , an iconic  इवेंट   in  American history .
Anti-tax protesters in the United  राज्य   have  often  referred  to  the  original Boston Tea Party for  प्रेरणा   .
References to the  बोस्टन   चाय   पार्टी   यहूद  part of  कर   दिन   विरोध  held throughout the  1990s  and earlier .
By 2001 ,  a  custom  था  developed  among  some  रूढ़िवादी  activists of mailing  चाय  bags to legislators  और   अन्य  officials as a  सांकेतिक   अधिनियम  .
the  currencies of  प्यूर्टो   रीको  closely  follow  the  ऐतिहासिक   विकास  of Puerto Rico .
As a  उपनिवेश   of  Spain  और   the  United States  ,  Puerto Rico was granted the  उपयोग  of both foreign and  प्रांतीय  currencies .
Following  the  Spanish colonization in 1502 , Puerto Rico  became   an  important  बंदरगाहों   ,  with  इसके   अपना  supply of gold .
however  , as the mineral  reserves  ran empty within the century  ,  the  द्वीपसमूह  's  अर्थव्यवस्था  suffered .
the   स्पेनी  Crown issued the  situado   mexicano   ,  which  meant  that  a   semi-regular  shipment  of   सुनहरा   इससे  the  viceroyalty  of New Spain would  be  sent  to  the island , as  a   रास्ता   to   provide  economic support  .
Between 1636 and 1637 , Philip  iv  of Spain imposed a tax which  था  to be paid using a revenue stamp  .
Inspired by this  ,  Puerto Rico  began   producing  banknotes in  1766   ,  becoming  the  first colony  to  print 8- real  banknotes   in   the   स्पेनी   साम्राज्य   और  which in  the  Spanish government  's   स्वीकृति  of  subsequent  issues  .
The  situado   थी  discontinued during  the  19th century , creating an economic  संकट   ,  as  a   परिणाम  of Mexico  gaining  its  स्वतंत्रता  from Spain .
Salvador Meléndez  bruna   ,  the colonial governor  in  office  ,   ordered   the  issue of  प्रांतीय   banknotes   ,   बनाना  the  प्यूर्टो   rican   पेसो   .
however   ,   मुद्रण   of   ये   banknotes   ceased   बाद  1815  .
During the following decades ,  विदेशी  coins became  the   फैली   करेंसी   .
in  the 1860s  और  1870s , banknotes  reemerged   .
On February  1  , 1890 ,  the   banco   español  de Puerto Rico was  उदघाटन  and  began   issuing   banknotes  .
The  बैंको  designed  चार   श्रेणी   और   लगाई   तीन  in circulation  अंतर्गत  Spanish rule  .
In  1895  , a Royal Decree  ordered  the  उत्पादन  of  प्रांतीय  peso coins  .
On August  13  ,  1898   ,  the Spanish-American War  ended  with Spain ceding Puerto Rico  to  the United States  .
the  Banco  español   de   प्यूर्टो   रीको   थी  renamed  बैंको  of Porto Rico and issued bills equivalent to  the   संयुक्त  States dollar ,  बनाना  the  प्यूर्टो  Rican  डालर  .
in   1902  , the First  नेशनल  Bank of Porto Rico  जारी  banknotes in  a   समानांतर  manner  .
Two  अधिक  series were issued until  1913  .
बाद  Puerto  रीको  's economy and monetary system was fully  एकीकृत  into the United States  '  economic and monetary system  ,  the  प्यूर्टो   rican  dollars  यहूद   redeemed  for those issued by the United  राज्य   राजकोष  .
the  peso  और  dollar  have  been followed by other  समकालीन  issues ,  सहित   commemorative   banknotes   ,  private  करेंसी  ,  और  a quarter coin designed  साथ  Fort San  फेलिप  del  morro  in the  फेस   .
Pepsi (  stylized  in lowercase as pepsi  ,  formerly stylized in uppercase as PEPSI ) is  a  carbonated soft drink that is produced and manufactured  by   पेप्सिको   .
Created and developed in 1893 and introduced as Brad  's   पेय   ,   it   थी   renamed   as  Pepsi-Cola  on  August  28  ,  1898  ,  तब   to   पेप्सी  in  1961  .
the   किताब  of  ezekiel  is  the   तीसरा  of the  latter   नबियों  in  the   यहूदी  Bible  ,  following the books  of  Isaiah  और  Jeremiah  और   preceding  the Book of the Twelve .
( The order  is  somewhat different  in  the Christian  बूढ़ा  Testament  )   .
It derives its name  इससे   ,   और  records the  visions   of   ,  the 6th century BC priest and  नबी   ezekiel  .
According to  the  book  ,   the   नबी  ,  exiled  in Babylon  ,   अनुभवी  a series  of  seven visions during  the  22  सालो   इससे  593 to 571 BC ,  a   काल   जिससे   spans   the   फाइनल  destruction of  जेरूसलम   in   586  .
The visions  ,   और  the book ,  हैं  structured around three themes :  (  1  )  judgment on Israel  (  chapters  1-24   )   ;  ( 2 ) judgment on  the   राष्ट्र   (  chapters 25-32  )  ; and  भविष्य  blessings for  इसराईल   (   अध्याय  33-48 )  .
New Orleans ( or ,  locally   or  ; ) is  a   प्रमुख  United States port and the largest  नगर  and metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  in  the   राज्य   of  Louisiana  .
The population  of   the   नगर  was  343,829  as  of  the  2010  U.S. Census  .
The  नई   ऑरलियन्स  metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल   (   नई   orleans–metairie–kenner  Metropolitan  सांख्यिकीय   क्षेत्रफल   )   था   a   जनसांख्यिकी  of  1,167,764   in  2010 and was the 46th largest  in  the United  राज्य  .
The  नई   orleans–metairie–bogalusa   संयुक्त  Statistical  क्षेत्रफल  ,  a  larger  व्यापार   क्षेत्रफल   ,  had a  2010  population  of  1,214,932 .
the  city is named after Orléans  ,  a city located  on   the   loire  River in Centre  ,  France  ,   और  is well known for its distinct French Creole architecture ,  as  well as  इसके  cross-cultural  और   बहुभाषी  heritage  .
New  ऑरलियन्स   is  also famous  लिये   इसके  cuisine  ,   म्यूज़िक   (   विशेषकर   as  the birthplace of  जैज़   )   ,  and its  सालाना  celebrations and  त्यौहार  ,  सबसे  notably Mardi Gras .
The city is often referred to as the `` most  अद्वितीय   ''  in  अमेरिका   .
New  ऑरलियन्स   is   स्तिथ   in   southeastern  Louisiana  ,  straddling  the   मिसिसिपी  River  .
The city  और   ऑरलियन्स   मोहल्ला  (  )   हैं   .
The city and  मोहल्ला  are bounded by the  parishes   of   st.   tammany   to   the   उत्तर  ,  st.  Bernard  to  the  ईस्ट  , Plaquemines to the south and  जेफरसन  to the south and west  .
Lake  pontchartrain  ,  भाग  of  जिससे   is  included in  the  city  हद   ,  lies  to  the  उत्तर  and  झील  Borgne lies  to  the east  .
the   नेशनल   जनम   कंट्रोल  League was a birth control  संगठन   in  the  संयुक्त  States  .
It  थी   संस्थापित  in  कूच   1915   by   मरियम  Dennett ,  क्लारा  Gruening Stillman and Jessie  एशले  .
Its  प्रमुख   purpose   थी  to  overturn  the  कानून  which banned contraceptives  इससे  the U.S. mails  .
Campaigns were mounted  in   नई   यॉर्क   ,   लकिन  in 1919 the League was disbanded and reformed into the Voluntary Parenthood League .
कर्कट  , known medically as  a  malignant  फुलाव   ,  is a broad group of  विभिन्न  diseases  ,  all involving  unregulated  cell  विकास   .
In cancer ,  कोशिकाएं   divide  and grow uncontrollably ,  forming   malignant   tumors   ,  and  invade  nearby  भाग  of  the   देह  .
The  कर्कट   may   भी  spread  to   अधिक   दूर  parts  of   the   देह   through  the lymphatic system or bloodstream  .
नहीं  all  tumors   हैं  cancerous .
benign   tumors   do   नहीं  grow uncontrollably , do not  invade  neighboring tissues , and  do  not  स्प्रेड   throughout   the  body  .
There  हैं   over  200  अलग   ज्ञात  cancers  कि  afflict humans  .
Determining what causes  कर्कट  is complex  .
अनेक  things  हैं  known  to   बढ़ाएँ   the  risk of  कर्कट  ,  सहित   तम्बाकू   उपयोग   ,  certain  infections   ,   विकिरण   ,  lack  of  physical  कार्यकलाप   ,  obesity , and environmental  प्रदूषक  .
ये   can  directly damage genes  or  combine with existing genetic faults within  कोशिकाएं  to  कारण  the disease .
Approximately  पाँच  to ten percent of  cancers   हैं  entirely hereditary .
कर्कट  can be detected in a  क्रमांक  of ways ,  सहित  the  उपस्थिति  of certain signs and symptoms ,  स्क्रीनिंग  tests  ,  or  चिकित्सा  imaging .
Once a possible  कर्कट  is detected it  is   diagnosed   by   microscopic   परिक्षा   of   a  tissue  नमूना  .
Cancer is usually  treated   साथ  chemotherapy , radiation  चिकित्सा  and surgery .
The  संभावना   of  surviving  the  disease  vary   greatly  by the type and  स्थान  of the cancer and  the   extent  of disease  at  the start of  उपचार   .
While  कर्कट  can affect people of  सब  ages ,  और   a  few  प्रकार   of  cancer are more common  in  children  ,  the risk  of  developing  कर्कट  generally increases  साथ   आयु  .
In 2007  ,  cancer caused about 13 % of all human  मौतों   विश्वव्यापी   (   7.9  million ) .
Rates are rising as more  लोगों  live  to   an  old  आयु  and  as  mass lifestyle changes occur  in   the  developing world .
Spring ski touring  on  Hardangervidda ,  नार्वे
Skiing is  a   recreational  activity  और  competitive  खेल  in  जिससे  the participant attaches  long  runners or skis to boots or shoes  on  the  फीट   और  uses  उन्हें   to  travel on top  of   हिम   .
Aside from  मनोरंजन   और  competition , skiing  रै  been used  लिये   सैन्य   उद्देश्य  and even travelling in areas  कि  experience heavy snowfall .
Many types  of  competitive  स्कीइंग   कार्यक्रम   हैं   पहचाना  by  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Olympic  कमेटी  , and the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   स्की  Federation  .
John  मेनार्ड  Keynes  ,   1st   सामन्त  Keynes , CB , FBA  (  ;  5  June 1883 – 21  अप्रैल  1946 )  थी  a  अंग्रेजों  economist  जिनकी  ideas  have   fundamentally  affected the  सिद्धान्त  and practice  of  modern macroeconomics ,  और  informed the economic  नीतियों   of  governments .
He  निर्मित  on and  greatly   परिष्कृत  earlier work on  the  causes  of   कारोबार  cycles ,  और  is  widely  considered to be  एक  of  the  founders of  आधुनिक  macroeconomics and the most influential  अर्थशास्त्री  of the 20th century .
उसके  ideas are  the   आधार  for the school of thought known as Keynesian economics  ,   as  well as  इसके  various offshoots  .
In  अनेक   तरीके  , subsequent  developments   in  20th century  अर्थशास्त्र  can  be  viewed as  either  building on Keynes ' ideas or reacting  विरूद्ध  them .
In the  1930s  ,  keynes  spearheaded  a   क्रान्ति  in economic thinking  ,   overturning   the   पुरानी   विचार   of   neoclassical  economics that held that free markets would , in the  छोटी  to medium  पद  ,  automatically  provide full  नियुक्ति  ,  as  long as workers  यहूद  flexible  in   उनके   मजदूरी   मांगे   .
Keynes  बजाय  argued that aggregate demand  संकल्पित  the overall level of  आर्थिक   कार्यकलाप  ,  और  that inadequate aggregate  माँग   could   सीसे   to   prolonged  periods of high  बेरोजगारी   .
He  advocated  the  उपयोग   of   फिस्कल  and monetary  उपायों   to   mitigate   the   प्रतिकूल  effects  of  economic  recessions  and  depressions  .
Following the  outbreak  of the  दूसरी   संसार   युद्ध  ,  keynes  's  विचार  concerning  आर्थिक  policy  यहूद   अपनाया  by leading  पश्चिमी   economies   .
In 1942  ,  Keynes  थी   awarded   a   खानदानी  peerage as  सामन्त  Keynes of Tilton  in  the  काउंटी   of   ससेक्स  .
keynes  died in 1946 , but during  the   1950s  and 1960s the  कामयाबी   of  Keynesian  अर्थशास्त्र   resulted  in almost all capitalist  सरकारें  adopting  इसके  policy  सुझाव  .
Keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s , partly as  a   परिणाम  of  समस्याएं  that  began  to afflict the  anglo-american  economies  इससे  the start  of  the decade , and partly because of critiques from Milton Friedman and other  अर्थशास्त्रियों   जो   यहूद  pessimistic  परिचय  the ability of  सरकारें  to regulate the business  साईकिल  with fiscal policy .
However ,  the  advent  of  the  वैश्विक   वित्तीय  crisis  in   2007  caused a  पुनरुत्थान   in  Keynesian thought  .
Keynesian economics  provided  the  सैद्धांतिक  underpinning for  आर्थिक  policies  undertaken   in  response to the crisis  by   राष्ट्रपतियों  George W. Bush and Barack  ओबामा  of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   ,   प्रधान  Minister Gordon Brown of  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom  ,   और  other heads of governments  .
in   1999  ,  समय   पत्रिका   शामिल  Keynes in their list of the 100 most  महत्वपूर्ण   और   influential  people  of  the  20th   सदी  ,  commenting  that :  ``   उसके   कट्टरपंथी  idea that  सरकारें   चाहिए  spend  धन  they do  n't  have  may   have  saved  पूंजीवाद   .   ''
In addition  to   होने   an  economist  ,  Keynes was also a civil servant  ,   a   निदेशक  of the  अंग्रेजों   eugenics   समाज   ,  a  निदेशक   of  the  बैंको  of England  ,   a   संरक्षक   of  the arts and an art collector , a  भाग  of  the   bloomsbury  Group of intellectuals , an  सलाहकार   to   अनेक   charitable  trusts  ,  a  लेखक  ,  a   पारस  ,  a   निजी  investor ,  और   a  farmer  .
इस   1768   parchment  ( 612×502  mm  ) by Jekuthiel Sofer  emulated   the  1675 Ten Commandments at  the   एम्सटर्डम  Esnoga synagogue  .
the  Ten Commandments , also  ज्ञात  as the  decalogue   ,  are  a  set of biblical laws relating  to   आचार  and worship  ,  which play a fundamental role in  judaism  , Islam  और  Christianity .
वे  include instructions  to  worship  तभी   परमेश्वर   ,   to   रखना  the sabbath holy  और  prohibitions against idolatry ,  इनकार  , murder , theft  ,   deception  and adultery .
अलग  groups follow slightly  अलग  traditions for interpreting  और   क्रमांकन  them .
the  Ten Commandments appear twice  in  the Hebrew  बाइबल   ,  in the books  of   exodus   और  Deuteronomy .
According  to  the  स्टोरी  in  exodus  , God inscribed  उन्हें  on two stone  टैबलेट  ,  जिससे   he  gave to  मूसा  on Mount Sinai .
आधुनिक  scholarship  रै  found likely  प्रभाव  in Hittite and Mesopotamian laws  और  treaties , but is divided over exactly  जब  the Ten Commandments  यहूद   लिखा  and  जो  wrote  उन्हें   .
The discography of the  अंग्रेज़ी  alternative  चट्टान   बैंड  The  smiths  consists  of  four  स्टुडियो   एल्बम  , one extended play  (  EP  )  , one live  एल्बम   ,   टेन  compilation albums  ,  twenty singles ,  एक  video album  और  fourteen music  वीडियो  on the  अशिष्ट   व्यापार  , Sire and  wea  record  लेबल्स  .
the  band was  formed  in 1982  in  Manchester  by  vocalist  morrissey  , guitarist Johnny  marr  , bass  खिलाड़ी  Andy Rourke  और  drummer Mike Joyce .
Despite being championed by BBC Radio  1   डिस्क  jockey John Peel  ,   the  band  's  debut  सिंगल  ,  ``  Hand  in   दस्ताने   ``   (   may   1983  )  ,  failed to  चार्ट   .
इसके   follow-up   ,  ``  इस  Charming  man   ``   (  October 1983 ) ,  मिले  with critical acclaim and reached number twenty-five  on   the  UK Singles Chart .
the  Smiths ' cult status was  followed  by  मुख्यधारा  success  in   1984   ,  as they reached number twelve in the UK with the `` What  अंतर  Does  it  Make ? `` single  और   पहुँचे   क्रमांक  two on  the   uk   एल्बम  Chart with their  डेब्यू   एल्बम   ,  The Smiths (  1984  )  .
Their next three singles all  पहुँचे  the top twenty of  the  charts  in  the  uk  ,  helping   to  consolidate their previous chart  कामयाबी  .
the   अगला  studio album  ,  Meat Is  हत्या  (  1985  ) , reached the top  of  the British charts ; however  ,   the   तभी  single to  be   released  from the album , ``  कि  Joke  is   n't   मजेदार  Anymore  ``   (   1985   )  , failed  to  break  the   uk  Top 40 .
Returning to form , The Smiths ' next six singles  सब   पहुँचे   the  higher than  क्रमांक  thirty in the UK and their  तीसरा   एल्बम   ,   the  Queen  is   मुर्दे  (  1986   )   ,  reached number two in  the  UK .
despite  the  बैंड  's chart success  ,  Marr left  the  group  in   अगस्त  1987  due   to   a   strained   संबंध  with Morrissey .
Failing  to   ढूँढें  a replacement  ,   the  Smiths disbanded by  the  time their final  स्टुडियो   एल्बम   ,  Strangeways  ,  Here We  आइये  , was released in September  कि  year .
strangeways  , Here  we  Come  पहुँचे  number  दो  in the UK  और  became  the   बैंड  's  highest-charting   रिलीज  in  the   संयुक्त  States  जब   it  reached  क्रमांक   fifty-five  on  the  Billboard 200 .
In early 1992  ,  WEA acquired  the   संपूर्ण   वापस  catalogue of The Smiths  और   उत्पादित   दो  compilations – Best ...  i  and ...  बेहतरीन   ii  –  the  first of which reached  the  top  of  the UK  एल्बम   चार्ट  .
WEA released  दो  further  singles  compilations  in  1995 and  2001  , with a  further   संकलन  ,  the  Sound of The  smiths  ,  released  in November 2008 .
Gone with  the  Wind is  a   अनोखा   लिखा  by  मार्गरेट   मिशेल   ,   पहला  published in 1936 .
It is  प्रायः  placed  in  the literary  sub-genre  of the historical romance novel .
However  ,  it  रै  been argued the novel is a ``  निकट  miss  ''   और  does  नहीं   contain  all of the elements of the  रोमांस   विधा  ,  बनाना  it simply  a   ऐतिहासिक  novel .
the   स्टोरी   is  set in Clayton  काउंटी  , Georgia ,  और  Atlanta  दौरान   the  American  सिविल  War  और   पुनर्निर्माण   .
it   depicts  the  अनुभवों  of  स्कारलेट  O'Hara , the spoiled daughter  of  a  well-to-do  plantation  मालिक  , who  जरूर  use every means  at  her disposal  to  come  आउट  of  the  poverty  वो   पाता  herself in  बाद  Sherman  's  `` March to the  समुद्र  ''  .
Margaret Mitchell began  लिखने  Gone with the Wind  in  1926 to pass the  समय  while recovering from an  auto-crash  injury that refused  to  heal  .
in  April 1935 ,  हेरोल्ड  Latham  of  Macmillan  ,   an  editor who  थी   looking   लिये   नई  fiction , read  कया  she had written and  देखी  that it  could  be a best-seller  .
After  लैथम   सहमत   to   प्रकाशित  the book , Mitchell worked for  another   छह  months  checking  the  ऐतिहासिक  references , and  rewrote  the opening chapter several  टाइम्स   .
मिशेल  and her husband John Marsh ,  a  copy  एडिटर   by  trade ,  संपादित  the  फाइनल   संस्करण  of the novel  .
Mitchell  लिखा   the   किताब   's  final  पल   पहला  , and  तब   लिखा  the  कार्यक्रम  that led up to it .
As to what  became  of  उसके  lovers  ,  Rhett and Scarlett  ,  after  the  novel  ended   ,   मिशेल  did not know  ,   और  said  ,   ``   लिये   सब  I  जान  ,  रहेट   may   have  found someone else  जो  was  कम   मुश्किल  . ''
मिशेल  received the  पुलित्जर   पुरस्कार   लिये  Fiction for the book  in  1937  .
The book was adapted into a  1939   अमरीकी  film  .
गए  with the Wind is the  तभी  novel  by   मिशेल  published  दौरान   उसके  lifetime .
Endodontics  (  from the Greek endo `` inside '' ; and  odons   ``   दाँत   ''  )  is  one of the dental  specialties  recognized  by   the  American  दंत   संघ  , Royal  कॉलेज  of  dentists  of Canada  ,  and Royal Australasian College of Dental  अध्येतावृत्ति  , and deals  साथ   the  tooth pulp  और  the tissues surrounding the  रूट  of a  दाँत  .
Endodontists perform  a   किस्में   of  procedures  सहित  endodontic therapy ( commonly known  as   ``   रूट   कनाल  therapy  ''   )  , endodontic retreatment ,  सर्जरी  ,  treating   cracked   दांत   ,   और   treating  dental  आघात   .
रूट  canal therapy is  एक   of  the  सबसे   आम  procedures  .
if  the  गूदा  (  containing  nerves  ,  arterioles , venules ,  lymphatic   ऊतक   ,   और  fibrous tissue ) becomes  diseased  or  घायल   ,  endodontic treatment is  जरूरी   to  save  the  tooth  .
Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS  )  is  a  point-to-point  सीरियल  protocol  कि  moves data  to   और   इससे   कंप्यूटर  storage  डिवाइस   ऐसे  as hard drives and  टेप  drives  .
SAS replaces the  पुरानी   समानांतर  SCSI ( pronounced ``  scuzzy  '' )  बस  technology  कि  first appeared  in  the  mid-1980s   .
SAS  ,  like  इसके   पूर्ववर्ती   ,  uses the  मानक   scsi  command set .
SAS offers backward compatibility with second-generation  sata  drives .
SATA 3 Gbit/s  ड्राइव  may be  कनेक्ट  to SAS  backplanes   ,  but SAS  ड्राइव  can not connect  to   sata   backplanes  .
the  T10  तकनीकी  committee  of  the International  कमेटी  for  सूचना  Technology  मानकों   (   incits  ) develops and  maintains  the  sas   प्रोटोकॉल  ; the  scsi   व्यापार   संघ  (  scsita  ) promotes the  प्रौद्योगिकी   .
भाग  of the constitutional  प्रावधान   as   it   appeared  in  1787
Status  as   a  natural-born citizen of the United  राज्य   is  one of  the   पात्रता   आवश्यकताएँ   स्थापित   in  the  संयुक्त  States Constitution for  चुनाव  to the  दफ्तर  of  अध्यक्ष  or  वाइस  President  .
This requirement  थी  intended  to   protect  the nation from  विदेशी  influence  .
The Constitution does  नहीं  define the  phrase   natural-born  citizen  ,  and various opinions  have   महरूम  offered  over  time regarding  इसके   precise  meaning  .
A  2011   congressional   शोध  Service  रपट   stated
The natural-born-citizen clause has been  उल्लेखित  in passing  in  several decisions of the  संयुक्त  States  परम्  Court and lower  न्यायालयों  dealing with the question of eligibility for citizenship by  जनम   ,   लकिन   the   परम्  Court  रै  never directly addressed  the   सवाल   of   a   विशिष्ट  presidential or vice-presidential candidate  's   पात्रता   as   a   natural-born  citizen  .
kurtis  Eugene `` Kurt '' Warner  (  born  जून  22 , 1971 ) is  a   पूर्व  American  फ़ुटबॉल   खिलाड़ी   .
he   निभाई   क्वार्टरबैक  for  तीन   नेशनल  Football  लीग  ( NFL ) teams  :  the  st.  Louis  मेढ़ों  ,  the  New  यॉर्क   दिग्गज   ,  and the Arizona Cardinals .
He was originally signed  by   the   ग्रीन  Bay Packers as an  undrafted   फ़्री  agent in 1994 after  playing  college  फ़ुटबॉल  at  उत्तरी  Iowa  .
Warner  होता  go  on  to be considered the  बेहतरीन   undrafted   खिलाड़ी   of  all time ,  following  a 12-year career  regarded  as  एक  of the  महानतम  stories in NFL history .
Warner first attained stardom while  playing  for the  st.   लुई   मेढ़ों  from  1998   to  2003  ,   जहाँ  he won two NFL MVP awards in 1999  और  2001  as   खूब   as  the Super Bowl  mvp  award in Super  कटोरी  XXXIV .
he  led the 2008 Arizona Cardinals  to   सुपर   कटोरी  XLIII (  the   मताधिकार  's first  सुपर   कटोरी  berth )  ,   और   owns  the three highest single-game passing yardage totals  in  Super Bowl history  .
warner  currently  holds   the  seventh-highest  करियर  passer  दरजा  of all-time (  93.7   )  ,  और  the third-highest  करियर  completion  प्रतिशत   in  NFL  इतिहास   साथ   65.5   %   .
in  13 career playoff games  ,  Warner ranks first  all-time   in   पूर्णता  percentage ( 66.5 % ) ,  गज   प्रति  attempt ( 8.55 ) , and  दूसरी  in  passer   दरजा  ( 102.8 )  .
he  also holds the highest  पूर्णता  percentage for a single  खेल   दौरान  the regular  ऋतु   ,   at  92.3 percent  (   24/26  ) , on September  20   ,  2009 , against  the  Jacksonville  jaguars  .
He  घोषित   उसके   रिटायरमेंट  on January  29   ,   2010.  < ref name='CNN  2010-01-29   '   >
जेनेट   काय  Ruthven  hagan  ( ;  born  May 26 , 1953  )   is   the   जूनियर  United  राज्य   सीनेटर   इससे  North  कैरोलिना   ,  in office since January 2009 .
previously   वो  served in the North Carolina  सीनेट   इससे  1999  to  2009 .
She is  a   सदस्य   of  the Democratic Party  और  is  viewed   as   a  moderate member of her  पार्टी   .
When Hagan  पराजित  Republican  लाज़िम  Elizabeth Dole  in  the 2008 United  राज्य  Senate election ,  वो  became  the  first woman  to  defeat an incumbent  स्त्री   in  a Senate election  .
The  heisman   मेमोरियल   ट्रॉफी  Award (  प्रायः  known  colloquially   as   the  Heisman  ट्रॉफी   or  the Heisman ) , is  awarded  annually  to   the  player  deemed   the   सबसे   बकाया   खिलाड़ी  in  कॉलेजिएट  football .
It  थी   निर्मित  in 1935  as   the  Downtown Athletic  क्लबों  trophy and renamed in  1936   following   the  death of the Club 's athletic director , John  heisman  ( former  भूरा  University  और  University of Pennsylvania player ; head football  कोच  at Oberlin  कॉलेज  ,  auburn  University  ,   clemson  University , Rice University  ,  and the University of  पेन्सिलवेनिया   ;  and  फ़ुटबॉल  ,  बास्केट   ,   और   बेसबॉल  head coach  और  athletic director at Georgia  तकनीक   )   .
The  पुरस्कार   is  presented by the  heisman   ट्रॉफी   विश्वास  in  जल्दी  December before  the  postseason bowl  खेल  .
It is the  oldest  of  अनेक  overall  पुरस्कार  in college football , including the  मैक्सवेल  Award , Walter Camp Award , and  the  AP Player of the Year  .
The Heisman  और  the AP Player of the  साल   हैं  the only  पुरस्कार   to  honor  the   सबसे  outstanding player , while the  मैक्सवेल  Award and Walter Camp  पुरस्कार  recognize the  बेहतरीन  player ,  और  the  आर्ची   griffin  Award  recognizes  the most valuable player  .
The  संयुक्त  Nations Command (  unc  ) is  the  unified command  ढांचा  for  the   बहुराष्ट्रीय   सैन्य  forces supporting  the  Republic  of   कोरियाई  ( South  कोरियाई   or  ROK ) during  और   बाद  the  कोरियाई  War  .
After troops of the  लोकतांत्रिक  People 's Republic of  कोरियाई  ( North Korea  or   dprk   )   invaded  South Korea  on  June  25  , 1950 , the United  राष्ट्र  Security Council  अपनाया   रेज़ोल्यूशन  82 calling  on   उत्तर  Korea  to  cease  hostilities  and withdraw to  the  38th parallel .
On June  27  , 1950 ,  it  adopted Resolution 83 , recommending that members of the United  राष्ट्र   provide   सहायता  to the Republic of Korea `` to repel the  हथियारबंद  attack and to restore  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  peace and security  to  the area '' .
सुरक्षा  Council Resolution  84   ,  adopted on July  7  ,  1950  , recommended that  सदस्यों  providing  सैन्य  forces and  अन्य   सहायता   to  South Korea  ``  make such forces and other  सहायता  available  to  a unified command under  the  United States of America '' .
Although  the   रिज़ॉल्यूशन  suggested the forces under the UNC were `` United Nations  शक्तियां  ''  ,   और   संयुक्त  Nations itself  could   be   माना  a belligerent  ,   in   अभ्यास  the United Nations  exercised   no  control  over  the combat  शक्तियां  ,  जिससे   यहूद  controlled by the United States  .
Most observers  concluded   कि  the forces under the  unc  were not  in   विधि   संयुक्त   राष्ट्र   सैनिकों   ,   और   the  acts  of  the  unc   यहूद   नहीं  the acts of  the   संयुक्त  Nations .
the   unc   can   be   regarded  as an alliance of national armies  ,  operating under the collective  सही  of  self-defense  .
On August  29  , 1950 , the  अंग्रेजों   राष्ट्रमंडल   's  27th  infantry   ब्रिगेड  arrived at Busan to join  the  UNC  ,  which until then included  तभी   rok  and U.S. forces  .
The 27th Brigade  स्थानांतरित  into  the  Naktong River  लकीर   वेस्ट   of  Daegu .
troop   इकाई   इससे  other countries  of  the  un  followed in rapid  उत्तराधिकार  ;  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   ,  Belgian United Nations  कमांड  ,  कनाडा   ,   कोलंबिया  ,  इथियोपिया  , France  ,  Greece , Luxembourg  ,  the Netherlands  ,  New  जीलैंड  ,  the  Philippines  ,   थाईलैंड   और  Turkey  .
The Union of South  अफ़्रीकी   provided  air units  जिससे  fought alongside the air forces of other member nations  .
Denmark , India  ,   नार्वे  , and Sweden provided medical units .
Italy provided a hospital , even though  it   थी  not  a  UN member .
The United Nations  कमांड  and the Chinese-North Korean Command  हस्ताक्षरित  the Korean  armistice   अनुबंध   on  27  जुलाई   1953   ,   समाप्ति  the  भारी   लड़  .
The  armistice  agreement  स्थापित   the  Military  armistice   आयोग  (  मैक   )   ,   consisting  of representatives  of   the  two  signatories   ,   to  supervise the  क्रियान्वयन  of  the  armistice  शर्तें  .
The North  korean-chinese   मैक   रै  been replaced by  panmumjon  Representatives under exclusive  उत्तर  Korean  प्रबन्धन  .
Regular meetings  have  been stopped ,  हालांकि  duty officers of Joint Security  क्षेत्रफल  , commonly known  as   the  Truce  गाँव   of  Panmunjom , from  प्रत्येक   पक्ष  meet  regularly  .
lincoln   हाइट्स  is an  अमरीकी   परिवार  drama  टेलीविज़न  series about Eddie  सटन  ,  a  Mission  विस्टा   पुलिस   अधिकारी  who moves  उसके  family back to his old  पड़ोस  ,  lincoln   हाइट्स  , to  प्रारंभ   a   नई   जीवन  and to help  आउट   उसके   बूढ़ा   पड़ोस   .
It  is   a   खतरनाक  place to  उठाएँ  a family ,  और   through  the many  ट्रायल  the  परिवार  goes through  ,  they  जल्द  learn  कि  settling  in   is  not as  आसान  as it  seems  .
While Officer  सटन   struggles  to  cope   साथ  every day  जीवन  as a  गली   cop  in Los Angeles ,  उसके   बच्चे  try to  अनुरूप   in   at   उनके  new  स्कूलों  and with  उनके  new neighbors  .

a  Christian denomination is an  identifiable   धार्मिक   देह   अंतर्गत   a  common  नाम  ,  ढांचा   ,   और   doctrine   भीतर  Christianity .
in   the  Orthodox  परंपरा   ,   चर्च   हैं   विभाजित   प्रायः  along  जातीय  and linguistic  लाइनों  ,  into  separate  चर्च  and  परंपराओं  .
Technically , divisions  between  one group  और   another  are defined by doctrine and  गिरिजाघर  authority  .
Issues such as the nature  of   यीशु   ,   the   प्राधिकार  of  अपोस्टोलिक  succession  ,  eschatology  ,  and papal primacy  पृथक  one denomination from another .
The Roman Catholic Church is  the   largest  denomination  साथ   over   1.1  billion  सदस्यों   ,   over  half of all  ईसाइयों  worldwide ,  बनाना   it  the  largest   denomination   लिये  any  धर्म  worldwide (  हालांकि   the   गिरिजाघर   करता  not view  itself   as   a   denomination  ,  लकिन  as  the  original pre-denominational church  )   .
Protestant denominations comprise  roughly  38–39 %  of  Christians  विश्वव्यापी   ,  and  साथ   the  Catholics ,  protestants   ,   anglicans  ,  और  other closely related  denominations  comprise  पश्चिमी  Christianity .
The Eastern Orthodox Church ,  प्राच्य  Orthodox  चर्च   और   the   assyrian  Church  of  the  ईस्ट   हैं   माना   पूर्वी  Christian denominations  .
पश्चिमी   ईसाई  denominations prevail in Western Europe  और  its former  colonies   .
Eastern Christian denominations are  represented  mostly in  पूर्वी  Europe  ,   the  Middle  ईस्ट  and North  अफ़्रीकी  .
Christians  have  various  doctrines   परिचय   the   गिरिजाघर  ,  the   देह  of faithful  कि  they believe was established by Jesus  मसीह   ,  and  कैसा   the  divine  गिरिजाघर  corresponds to  ईसाई  denominations .
दोनो   the   catholics  and the  पूर्वी  Orthodox  consider  each of  themselves   solely  to  faithfully   represent  the  एक   पावन  Catholic and Apostolic Church to the exclusion of the  अन्य   .
protestants   अलग  from  the   कैथोलिक   गिरिजाघर   क्युकी   of  theologies and practices that they considered  to   be   in   उल्लंघन  of their  निर्वचन  .
generally   ,  members of the  विभिन्न  denominations  acknowledge  each  अन्य   as  Christians  ,  at least  to  the extent that they  have  mutually recognized baptisms  और   acknowledge  historically  परंपरागत  views including  the   देवत्व  of  यीशु  and doctrines of  सिन  and  मोक्ष  , even though doctrinal and  ecclesiological  obstacles  रोकते   पूरा  communion between  चर्च   .
Since  the  reforms  surrounding  Vatican II , the  कैथोलिक  Church  रै  referred to  प्रोटोस्टेंट   समुदायों   as  `` denominations '' ,  जबकि  reserving the  पद   ``   गिरिजाघर  ''  लिये   अपोस्टोलिक   चर्च  ,  सहित  the Eastern Orthodox  (  see  subsistit   in   और  branch theory )  .
वहीँ  are however  कुछ  non-denominational Christians  जो  do not  follow   कोई   particular  branch .
The  पांडा   (  Ailuropoda  melanoleuca  , lit  .
`` black and white cat-foot  ''  ) ,  भी   ज्ञात  as  the   दानव   पांडा  to distinguish it from the unrelated red  पांडा  , is  a  bear native to central-western  और   दक्षिण  western China  .
It is easily  पहचाना  by the large , distinctive black patches  around   इसके   आँखें   ,   over   the  ears , and across  इसके  round body .
Though it belongs  to  the  अनुक्रम  Carnivora  ,  the panda  's   आहार  is 99 % bamboo .
Pandas  in   the  wild  होगा  occasionally eat other grasses , wild tubers , or even meat in the  रूप  of birds  ,   rodents   or   carrion  .
In captivity  ,   वे   may  receive honey  ,  eggs  ,  fish  ,   yams  , shrub leaves  ,   संतरे   ,  or bananas along  साथ   विशेषकर   prepared   खाना  .
The  दानव  panda lives in  a   few  mountain ranges in  सेंट्रल  China , mainly  in   सिचुआन  province ,  लकिन   भी   in  the Shaanxi and Gansu provinces .
As  a  result  of  farming  ,  deforestation  और  other development , the panda has  महरूम  driven  आउट  of the  lowland  areas where it  एकबार  lived  .
the  panda is a  संरक्षण  reliant  endangered  species .
A  2007  report shows  239  pandas living  in  captivity inside China and another 27  बाहर  the country  .
जंगली  population estimates vary  ;  one estimate  shows  that  वहीँ   हैं   परिचय   1,590   individuals   जीना   in  the wild  ,  while a 2006  पढ़ाई  via DNA analysis estimated  कि  this  फिगर   could  be  as   ऊँची  as 2,000 to  3,000   .
Some reports  भी   दिखाएँ  that  the   क्रमांक  of pandas in  the  wild is  on  the rise  .
however  , the  आईयूसीएन   करता  not  मानना   वहीँ  is  पर्याप्त  certainty yet to reclassify  the   प्रजाति  from Endangered to Vulnerable .
जबकि  the dragon has  प्रायः   परोसा   as  China 's national emblem ,  internationally  the  पांडा  appears at least as commonly  .
as  such ,  it  is becoming  widely  used within China in  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   contexts   ,  for example the  पाँच  Fuwa  mascots   of  the  बीजिंग  Olympics .
the  Kite Runner  is   a  2007 American drama film  निर्देशित   by  Marc Forster based on  the   अनोखा   of  the same name by  खालिद   hosseini  .
It tells the  स्टोरी  of  आमिर  ,  a  well-to-do boy from  the  Wazir Akbar Khan district of Kabul  ,   जो  is  tormented  by the  guilt   of   abandoning  his  dost  Hassan , the son of  उसके   पिता  's Hazara servant .
The story is set  विरूद्ध  a  backdrop  of tumultuous events ,  इससे  the  पतन   of  the monarchy in Afghanistan through  the  Soviet military intervention  ,  the mass exodus of Afghan refugees  to  Pakistan and the United States ,  और  the  तालिबान   शासन  .
हालांकि  most of the film  is  set  in   अफगानिस्तान   ,  these parts  यहूद  mostly shot in Kashgar , China , due to  the  dangers  of  filming  in   अफगानिस्तान   at  the  समय  .
the  majority  of   the   फिल्मी   's  dialogue is in Dari ,  साथ   the   शेष  spoken in English .
the  child  अभिनेताओं  are native  अध्यक्षों   ,   लकिन   अनेक   वयस्क  actors had to  सीख  Dari  .
फिल्मांकन  wrapped up on December 21 ,  2006  , and  the   फिल्मी  was  अपेक्षित  to be released  on  November  2   ,  2007 .
However  ,  after concern for the safety of the young actors in the film due  to  fears  of  violent  reprisals   to   the  sexual  प्रकृति  of  कुछ  scenes  in   जिससे  they appear  ,   इसके  release  तिथि  was  धकेल  back  छह   सप्ताह  to December 14  ,  2007 .
the   पतंग   धावक  was released on DVD on  कूच  25 ,  2008   .
A HD  dvd  release  थी   घोषित  for the  वही  date , but was canceled  following  the  स्वरूप  's  निधन  .
the  film  थी  nominated  लिये  the  सुनहरी  Globe Award for Best  विदेशी   भाषा   फिल्मी  in 2007 .
the  film 's score by  अल्बर्टो  Iglesias was nominated for Best  असली  Score at the Golden  ग्लोब्स   और   the  Academy Awards .
the  legality  of  cannabis varies from country to country  .
Possession  of  cannabis is illegal in most  देशों  and  रै   महरूम   चूंकि  the beginning of  फैली   कैनबिस   निषेध   in   the   लेट   1930s  .
however  , many  देशों   have  decriminalized the  कब्ज़ा   of   छोटी  quantities of cannabis , particularly in North  अमेरिका  , South  अमेरिका  and  यूरोपीय   .
Furthermore , possession is legal  or   effectively  legal in the Netherlands , North Korea and  होता  be  in  the  u.S.   राज्य   of  Colorado and Washington if it  यहूद   नहीं  for  संघीय   विधि   ,  which governs persons  in   सब  states  .
The medicinal  उपयोग  of cannabis  is  legal in a number  of   देशों  , including Canada , the Czech Republic and Israel .
While  संघीय  law in the  संयुक्त   राज्य   bans  all  बिक्री   और   कब्ज़ा   of  cannabis , enforcement varies widely at the  राज्य   स्तर   और   कुछ  states have established  औषधीय  marijuana  कार्यक्रम   in  that contradict federal law  ;  two states ( Colorado and Washington ) have repealed  उनके   कानून   prohibiting  the recreational  उपयोग   of  cannabis  और   replaced   उन्हें  with a regulatory  शासन   ,  also contrary to federal  statute   .
कुछ   देशों  have laws  कि  are not as  vigorously   prosecuted  as others  लकिन  , apart  इससे  the countries  कि  offer  अभिगम   to   चिकित्सा  marijuana , most countries  have   विभिन्न   दंड  ranging  इससे  lenient  to  very severe  .
कुछ   infractions   हैं   लिया  more  seriously  in  कुछ  countries  than   अन्य  in regard  to  the cultivation ,  उपयोग  ,  कब्ज़ा  or transfer  of  cannabis for recreational use .
A few jurisdictions have lessened  दंड  for possession of small quantities  of  cannabis ,  बनाना  it punishable  by  confiscation and  a  fine  ,  rather than imprisonment .
Some  क्षेत्राधिकारs/   ड्रग   न्यायालयों  use mandatory  उपचार   कार्यक्रम   लिये  young  or   बारंबार  users  ,  with freedom  इससे  narcotic drugs  as   the  goal and  a  few jurisdictions permit  कैनबिस   उपयोग   लिये  medicinal purposes  .
वहीँ   हैं  also changes  in  a more restrictive direction  as   in  Canada .
Drug  परीक्षण  to  detect  cannabis are increasingly common in  अनेक  countries and have  resulted  in  कारावास   वाक्य   और  people  खोने   उनके   कार्य  .
However  ,  simple possession can carry long  कारावास  sentences in some countries ,  विशेषकर  in parts of  ईस्ट   एशिया  and  southeast  Asia  जहाँ  the sale  of  cannabis may lead  to  a  वाक्य  of  जीवन  in prison  or   भी  execution .
Loxahatchee  is   a   जातियाँ  located  in   ताड़   बीच   काउंटी   ,  Florida  ,   संयुक्त  States .
It is located  in   the   क्षेत्रों  north of Wellington  और  west and  उत्तरपश्चिम   of   royal  Palm  बीच   ,  Florida and  लगभग  west of  वेस्ट   ताड़   बीच  .
Loxahatchee is also the  नाम   of  the  पोस्ट  Office that serves  इस  area ,  जिससे  is under the zip code of 33470 .
the  name Loxahatchee means  ``   कछुआ   नदी  . ''
Loxahatchee is located  भीतर   the  Indian  trails   सुधार  District  और  the Loxahatchee Groves  जल  Control  ज़िला   .
शेर  Country Safari  ,  a drive-through safari park  ,  is located  in  Loxahatchee .
In 2006  ,  the state of Florida approved  incorporation   of   भाग  of  loxahatchee  as the Town of Loxahatchee Groves  to   become   the  38th municipality in  ताड़   बीच  County  .
The  प्रमुख  reason  लिये   incorporating   थी   to  better protect  the  area  इससे  encroaching growth  और  to preserve  the  rural  अक्षर  of  the   पड़ोस   .
Perhaps the most  ग्रामीण   क्षेत्रफल  within  a   बंद  proximity  to  West  ताड़   बीच  , with lot sizes range from  1-20  acres  .
साथ  with  the  Acreage ,  it   is  notable for  ढीला  land  प्रतिबंध  and the native and exotic  एनिमल  presence is quite  notable   .
seminole   लकीरें   ऊँची  School serves  the  area  .
The Canadian Citizenship Test is a  परीक्षण  , administered  by   नागरिकता   और  Immigration Canada ( CIC ) , that  is   जरूरी  for  सब   आवेदकों  for  कनाडाई   नागरिकता  who  हैं  aged between  18  and  54  and  जो  meet the basic requirements for citizenship  .
The  परीक्षण   is  available  in   दोनो   फ्रेंच  and  अंग्रेज़ी  , the  आधिकारिक  languages of Canada  .
Renaissance  क्रूज़  , originally founded in 1989 owned by Fearnley  &  Eger  rederi   in  Oslo  -  Norway  ,   बाद  purchased  by  Edward Rudner  (  founder  of  Alamo  car  Rental ) as the company faltered during  the  Gulf War  .
वे  operated year-round cruise  itineraries  to the  भूमध्यसागरीय   ,  the Greek Isles , Tahiti and  the  South Pacific  ,   उत्तरी  Europe and  scandinavia  .
the  company ceased  परिचालन  on 25  सितंबर  2001 and accommodated  up  to  220,000   अतिथि  in  2000   .
While  the  company  था  been in poor financial  स्वास्थ्य   लिये  quite some  समय  , the economic  मनाही  resulting from  the   सितंबर   11th  terrorist attacks are  credited  with the demise of this  क्रूज  line  .
the  fleet is  सूचीबद्ध  under List  of   क्रूज  ships  .
it  was  headquartered  in  फोर्ट  Lauderdale  ,  Florida  .
epithelium  is  एक  of the four basic types  of   एनिमल   ऊतक   ,   साथ   साथ   संयोजी  tissue , muscle tissue  और   बेचैन  tissue .
epithelial  tissues line  the  cavities  और  surfaces of structures  throughout  the body  ,  and  भी  form  अनेक  glands  .
Functions of epithelial  कोशिकाएं  include  स्राव  ,  चयनात्मक  absorption , protection , transcellular  हस्तांतरण  and detection of  सनसनी  .
In  यूनानी  ``  ἐπί   ''  ( `` epi '' )  अर्थात्  `` on  ''   or  `` upon  ''  , and `` θηλή '' ( ``  thēlē  '' )  अर्थात्  ``  nipple  ''  .
Epithelial layers are avascular  ,  so  वे  must receive  nourishment   via   diffusion   of  substances from the  underlying  connective tissue , through the basement  झिल्ली   .
Epithelia  can  also  be  organized into  क्लस्टर  of cells  कि  function as  बहिःस्रावी   और  endocrine glands .
Kent E. Hovind ( born January  15  ,  1953   )  is  an  American young Earth  creationist  .
Hovind  रै  spoken on creation  विज्ञान   और   रै  aimed to  मनाना  listeners to  अस्वीकृत  theories of evolution  ,   भूभौतिकी   ,  and  cosmology  in favor  of   उसके  interpretation  of  the  उत्पत्ति   सृष्टि   कथा  from the Bible  .
Hovind 's views are  contradicted  by scientific  प्रमाण  and some  of  his  विचार  have  भी  been criticized by young  धरती   creationist   संगठन   ऐसे   as  Answers in Genesis  .
Hovind established  the   सृष्टि  Science Evangelism  in   1991   ,   और  frequently spoke on young  धरती  creationism at  seminars  at  निजी  schools and churches , debates  ,   और   on  radio and  टेलीविज़न  broadcasts  .
चूंकि   जनवरी   2007   ,   hovind   रै  been  सेवारत  a  ten-year   थाना  sentence  बाद  being convicted of 58 federal counts , including  12  tax offenses , one count of  obstructing  federal agents  ,  and 45  रिश्तो  of structuring cash transactions  .
he  is  incarcerated   at  the  संघीय  Correctional Institution  at  Berlin  ,  New Hampshire  .
Bride with Bindi  सजा   माथे
A bindi  (  ,  इससे  Sanskrit  bindu  , meaning `` a drop  ,  small particle  ,  dot ''  )   ,  or  a  pottu/bottu (  in   तमिल  ,  तेलुगु  , and  मलयालम   )  is  a  forehead decoration  worn  in  दक्षिण  Asia ( particularly  इण्डिया  , Bangladesh  ,   नेपाल  , Sri  लंका  and Mauritius )  और  Southeast Asia .
Traditionally it  is   a   उज्जवल   बिन्दु  of red  रंग   लागू  in  the  center of the forehead close to  the  eyebrows  ,  but it  can   भी   consist   of   a   चिह्न  or piece of jewelry worn at this location .
The  नई  York  gubernatorial   चुनाव  of  2010   थी  held  on  Tuesday ,  नवम्बर  2  ,  2010  ,  to elect  the  Governor of New  यॉर्क  , to  serve  a  four-year  term that began in January 2011  .
लाज़िम  Democratic Governor David Paterson  ,   निर्वाचित   as   लेफ्टिनेंट   राज्यपाल   in  2006  as   the  running mate of former Governor Eliot  स्पिट्जर  , chose  नहीं   to  run for  a   full-term   .
on  November  2   ,   नई   यॉर्क  Attorney General and Democrat Andrew Cuomo  पराजित  Republican Carl  paladino  .
Green  पार्टी   प्रत्याशी  Howie  हॉकिन्स  received over 57,000  मत  ,  allowing  the  नई  York  ग्रीन  Party to  be  listed on the ballot for  the  next  4  years  .
the  main cast of Dragon Ball  at   the  end of  the  manga .
The  ड्रैगन   बॉल  manga  और   दुश्मनी   श्रेणी  features  an   extensive  cast of characters created by Akira Toriyama .
The  श्रेणी  takes place in a fictional universe , the same  as  Toriyama 's  पिछला   श्रेणी  Dr.  slump  ,  और  follows the  adventures   of  martial artist Son Goku from childhood to  adulthood  as  he   खोज   लिये  the seven  spheres  known as the  ड्रैगन  Balls ,  प्रयुक्त   to   summon  a wish-granting dragon  .
During the course  of   the   स्टोरी  , he encounters  allies   ऐसे   as  Bulma  ,   yamcha  , Kuririn  और  Trunks  ,  rivals such as Tenshinhan  ,   piccolo  and  vegeta   ,  and  दुश्मनों   ऐसे  as Freeza  और  Cell .
जबकि   अनेक   of  the  वर्ण   हैं  humans with superhuman  शक्ति   and/or  supernatural  abilities  , the cast also includes anthropomorphic  पशु   और   बाद   ,   extraterrestrial  lifeforms .
The  श्रेणी  also includes  depictions  of  the  afterlife , with several characters being gods that  govern   the   ब्रह्मांड   .

The Comanche  हैं   a   मैदान  Indian  जनजाति  whose  ऐतिहासिक  territory  ,  known  as   comancheria   ,   consisted  of present  दिन  eastern  नई  Mexico  ,  southern Colorado  ,   northeastern   एरिज़ोना   ,  southern Kansas , all of Oklahoma  ,  and  सबसे  of  उत्तरपश्चिम  Texas  .
The Comanche people are enrolled in the  federally  recognized  comanche   स्वदेश  , in Oklahoma .
Historically , the Comanches were hunter-gatherers with  a   घोड़ा  culture .
There  may   have   महरूम  as  अनेक   as  45,000  comanches  in the late 18th  सदी  .
आज  , the  comanche   स्वदेश  Comanche  जनजातीय   नामांकन   संख्याएँ  15,191 with approximately 7,763 members  residing  in  the  Lawton –  फोर्ट   sill   और   surrounding   क्षेत्रों   of   दक्षिणपश्चिम   ओक्लाहोमा  .
The  comanche   स्वदेश   homecoming  Powwow  is  held  annually   in   walters   ,  Oklahoma in  mid-july   .
The Comanche  spoke  the Comanche language ,  a  Numic language of  the  Uto-Aztecan  परिवार   ,  sometimes classified  as  a  shoshone  dialect  ;   however  , only about 1 %  of   comanches  speak  it   आज   .

Times  वर्गाकार  Studios  (  TSS ) is  an  American television studio located in  the  Times Square neighborhood of  the  Manhattan borough  of   नई  York City  ,   नई  York  .
The studio  is  best known as  the   उत्पादन   घर  of  एबीसी   न्यूज  '  शुभ  Morning  अमेरिका   (   जीएमए  )  ,   a   morning  news  और  talk program and segments for GMA  on   एबीसी   न्यूज  Now .
The  लास  Vegas Strip World  of   coca-cola   संग्रहालय  in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated  नरम   पेय  sold in  स्टोर्स  , restaurants , and vending machines  in  every country except  क्यूबा  and  उत्तर   कोरियाई  .
it   is  produced by The Coca-Cola  कम्पनी  of Atlanta , Georgia , and is  प्रायः  referred  to  simply as  कोक  ( a  पंजीकृत  trademark  of   the  Coca-Cola Company in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   चूंकि  March 27 ,  1944  ) .
Originally intended  as  a  पेटेंट   आयुर्विज्ञान   जब  it  थी  invented in the  लेट   19th  century by John Pemberton , Coca-Cola  थी   खरीदा  out  by  businessman Asa  griggs   candler   ,   जिनकी   विपणन  tactics  led  Coke  to  its dominance  of   the  world soft-drink  मार्केट  throughout the 20th century .
The  कम्पनी  produces  concentrate  , which  is   तब  sold to  licensed  Coca-Cola bottlers  throughout  the  संसार  .
The bottlers ,  जो  hold territorially exclusive  अनुबंध  with  the   कम्पनी  , produce  समाप्त  product in  डिब्बे  and bottles from the  concentrate  in combination  साथ   filtered  water and sweeteners .
the  bottlers then sell , distribute  और  merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and vending machines .
ऐसे   bottlers  include  coca-cola   उद्यमों   ,  which is  the  largest single Coca-Cola bottler  in  North  अमेरिका  and western  यूरोपीय  .
The Coca-Cola Company  भी  sells concentrate for soda  स्रोतों   to  major restaurants and food service  वितरकों  .
The  coca-cola  Company has ,  on  occasion ,  introduced   अन्य   कोला  drinks  अंतर्गत   the  Coke brand  नाम  .
The  सबसे  common  of  these is Diet  कोक  ,  साथ   अन्य  including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola ,  आहार   कोक  Caffeine-Free  ,   coca-cola   चेरी  ,  coca-cola  Zero , Coca-Cola Vanilla ,  और  special  संस्करण   साथ  lemon ,  लाइम  or  कॉफी  .
