आधारित  on Interbrand  's  best  वैश्विक  brand 2011  ,  Coca-Cola  थी   the  world 's most valuable brand .
प्रकार  of  bar-lines
In  musical   संकेतन  , a bar (  or  measure  )  is a  खण्ड   of  time defined by a  दिए  number of beats , each of which are assigned a  particular  note value .
Dividing music  into  bars provides regular reference points  to  pin  पाइंट  locations  भीतर  a piece  of  music .
It also  makes   लिखा  music  easier  to  follow  ,  चूंकि  each  बार  of  स्टाफ  symbols  can  be read and played  as  a  बैच  .
Typically  ,  a  टुकड़ा  consists of several bars  of  the same length , and  in  modern  musical  notation  the  number  of  beats in  प्रत्येक   बार  is specified  at   the  beginning of the  स्कोर  by the top number of  a   समय  signature (  ऐसे  as 3/4 )  ,  while the  नीचे   क्रमांक   indicates  the note  मान  of  the  beat  (   the   ताल   रै   a  quarter note  मान  in the  3/4  example  )  .
The  शब्द  bar  is  more common  in  British  अंग्रेज़ी   ,  and the word measure is more  आम  in  अमरीकी   अंग्रेज़ी  , although  संगीतकारों   generally   समझे   दोनो  usages .
In American  अंग्रेज़ी  ,  हालांकि   the  words bar and measure are often  प्रयुक्त   interchangeably  the correct use of  the  word  'bar  '  refers  only  to   the  vertical  लकीर  itself , while the word 'measure  '   refers  to the  बीट्स  contained between bars  .
In international  उपयोग   ,  it  is  equally correct  to   बोलो   of  bar numbers  और   माप   संख्याएँ  ,  e.g  . ‘bars  9–16’   or   ‘mm  . 9–16’  .
साथ  the same  लाइनों  , it is  हिकमत  to reserve the abbreviated form  ‘bb   .
3–4’   इत्यादि  . for beats only ; bars  चाहिए  be  referred   to   by  name in  पूरा  .
the  first metrically complete  माप   भीतर  a piece of music is  पुकारा  ‘bar  1’   or  ‘m . 1’  .
जब  the piece  begins  with an anacrusis ( an  अधूरी   माप   at   the  head  of  a piece of music ) , ‘bar 1’ or ‘m .  1’  is  the  following measure  .
the   19.9  MW  gemasolar   सौर   संयंत्र   in  Spain features 15  घंटों   of   भंडार   और  can supply  शक्ति   24   घंटों   a   दिन  .
Solar  उर्जा   ,  radiant light  और  heat from the sun , has  महरूम  harnessed by humans since  प्राचीन  times  using  a  दायरा  of ever-evolving technologies  .
सौर   उर्जा  technologies include  सौर  heating  ,   सौर   photovoltaics  , solar thermal electricity , solar architecture and  कृत्रिम   photosynthesis   ,   जिससे  can make considerable contributions  to   solving  some of  the   सबसे   तात्कालिक  energy problems the  संसार  now  चेहरों   .
सौर  technologies  हैं  broadly characterized  as  either passive solar or active  सौर   depending  on  the   रास्ता   वे   कैप्चर  , convert and distribute solar energy  .
Active  सौर  techniques include  the   उपयोग  of  photovoltaic   panels  and  सौर  thermal collectors  to   दोहन  the  उर्जा  .
Passive solar techniques include  orienting  a  भवन  to  the  Sun , selecting  सामग्री   साथ  favorable  थर्मल   द्रव्यमान  or light dispersing  गुण  ,  और   डिजाइनिंग   स्पेसेस  that naturally  circulate  air  .
In 2011 ,  the  International Energy  एजेंसी   कहा  that  ``   the   विकास   of   सस्ती   ,  inexhaustible and  साफ  solar energy technologies  होगा   have   विशाल  longer-term benefits .
it   होगा  increase countries’  उर्जा  security through reliance  on  an  स्वदेशी  ,  inexhaustible  and mostly  import-independent   संसाधन   ,  enhance sustainability ,  reduce  pollution , lower  the  costs  of  mitigating climate  बदलें   ,   और  keep fossil fuel prices lower  than   वरना  .
These advantages are global .
hence  the additional  लागत  of the  प्रोत्साहन  for early  deployment  should  be   माना  learning investments ;  वे  must be wisely spent and  need  to  be   widely   साझा   ''   .
Primary  परवाह  may be  provided   in   जातियाँ  health  केंद्रों   .
प्राथमिक  care is the  स्वास्थ्य   परवाह   दिए   by   a  health care provider .
Typically  इस  provider  अधिनियमों   as   the   प्रिंसिपल  point of consultation  लिये  patients within  a  health care system and coordinates  अन्य  specialists that the patient may  need   .
Such a professional can  be   a  primary  परवाह   चिकित्सक  ,  ऐसे   as  a  सामान्य  practitioner  or   परिवार   चिकित्सक  , or  depending   on  the locality , health  प्रणाली  organization , and patient  's  discretion ,  वे  may see a  फार्मासिस्ट  ,  a  physician assistant , a  नर्स   practitioner  , a  नर्स   (   ऐसे  as in  the   संयुक्त   किंगडम  )  ,  a  नैदानिक  officer ( such as in parts  of  Africa ) , or an Ayurvedic or other traditional  आयुर्विज्ञान  professional ( such as  in  parts  of  Asia )  .
depending  on  the  nature of the health condition , patients  may  then be  referred  for  द्वितीयक  or tertiary  परवाह  .
``  समंदर   एवेन्यू   ''  is  a  song recorded by  अमरीकी  pop  पंक  group  yellowcard  .
It  थी   released  in  फ़रवरी  2004  as  the second  सिंगल  from  समंदर   एवेन्यू  and the  तीसरा  track .
it   is  known for  bringing  them into the mainstream  ,  as  it  received  numerous   spins  on  एमटीवी  and increasing radio airplay  .
समंदर   एवेन्यू  is  a  street  in   jacksonville   ,   फ्लोरिडा  , the band 's stomping grounds near their high school , Douglas  एंडरसन   स्कूल   of   the   कला   ,  and another  गली  mentioned  in  the song ,  चेरी  Street .
The  नाम  of Ocean Avenue in Jacksonville is actually Beach Boulevard  .
They left  उनके  original  आधार   पीछे  when they moved  to   लॉस  Angeles  .
the  song was  प्रदर्शित  on the Much  म्यूज़िक  compilation  एल्बम  Big Shiny  धुनें  9  .
a  psychiatrist is a  चिकित्सक  who  specializes  in  psychiatry   .
a   मनोचिकित्सक   specializes   in  the treatment of mental  विकार  .
Psychiatrists are  प्राधिकृत  to prescribe medicine , conduct physical  examinations   ,   अनुक्रम  and interpret laboratory  परीक्षण  , use psychotherapy  और   may  order  दिमाग  imaging studies  ऐसे  as  computed  tomography (  ct/cat  Scan  )  ,  चुम्बकीय   अनुनाद  imaging  (   mri  ) ,  और   positron   उत्सर्जन  tomography ( PET )  स्कैनिंग   .
Within the framework  of  the World  स्वास्थ्य  Organization  's  (  जो  ) definition  of  health as a state  of   पूरा  physical , mental and social well-being , and  नहीं  merely  the  absence of disease  or   infirmity   ,   reproductive   स्वास्थ्य  , or sexual health/hygiene , addresses  the  reproductive  प्रक्रियाओं  ,  कृत्यों  and  प्रणाली  at all stages of  जीवन   .
reproductive  health ,  इसलिए  , implies  कि  people  हैं  able  to  have a  जिम्मेदार  ,  संतोषजनक  and safer sex  जीवन   और  that they have  the  capability to  reproduce  and  the   स्वतंत्रता   to  decide if ,  जब   और  how often to do so .
एक   निर्वचन   of  this implies that men and women  ought  to be  सूचित   of  and to  have  access to safe ,  प्रभावी  , affordable and acceptable methods of  जनम  control ; also access to  उचित  health  परवाह  services of  यौन  , reproductive medicine  और   क्रियान्वयन  of  स्वास्थ्य  education  कार्यक्रम   to  stress the importance  of  women to  go  safely  through  pregnancy  और  childbirth  could  provide couples  साथ  the best  मौका  of  having   a   स्वस्थ  infant .
On the  अन्य   हाथ  individuals  do  face  inequalities   in  reproductive  स्वास्थ्य  services .
Inequalities  vary  based  on  socioeconomic status  ,  education level , age ,  नस्ल  , religion ,  और  resources  उपलब्धियाँ  in  उनके  environment .
It  is  possible  लिये   उदाहरण  ,  कि   कम  income individuals lack  the   संसाधन   लिये   उचित  health services  और   the   ज्ञान   to   जान  what  is  appropriate  लिये   maintaining  reproductive health  .
According to the  जो  , ``  reproductive   और   यौन  ill-health  खाते   लिये  20  %  of the  वैश्विक  burden of ill-health for women , and  14   %  for men  .   ''
Reproductive health is a part of  यौन  and reproductive health and rights .
This  is  a list  of   एपीसोड  for the Disney Channel original series The  सुइट  Life on Deck ,  जिससे  aired  लिये   तीन  seasons on Disney  चैनल  from September  26  , 2008 to May 6 ,  2011   .
कोर   2   is  a brand  encompassing  a range  of  Intel 's  उपभोक्ता   64-bit  x86-64  single-  , dual- ,  और   quad-core   microprocessors  based  on  the  कोर  microarchitecture  .
the  single- and dual-core models  हैं   single-   die  , whereas the quad-core  मॉडल  comprise  दो   मरता  ,  प्रत्येक   containing   दो  cores  ,  packaged in  a  multi-chip module .
the  introduction  of  Core 2 relegated the Pentium brand  to   the  mid-range  मार्केट   ,  and  reunified   लैपटॉप   और   डेस्कटॉप  CPU  लाइनों  ,  जिससे  previously  था  been  विभाजित  into the  pentium  4 , Pentium  d   ,   और  Pentium  m  brands .
The Core  2  brand was  introduced  on  27   जुलाई  2006  ,  comprising the Solo (  single-core  )  ,  Duo (  dual-core   )  , Quad (  quad-core  ) , and  in  2007 , the Extreme  (   दुआl-  or quad-core CPUs for enthusiasts ) subbrands .
Intel Core 2  processors  with vPro technology  (  designed for businesses ) include the dual-core and  quad-core  branches  .
the   सुपर  Bowl is the  सालाना  championship game  of   the  National Football  लीग   (  NFL )  ,  the highest level of  पेशेवर  American football  in  the  संयुक्त  States , culminating a  ऋतु  that  begins  in  the   लेट  summer of the previous  पंचांग   साल   .
The  सुपर  Bowl  उपयोग  Roman  numerals  to identify each game ,  बल्कि  than the  साल  in which it  is  held .
For  उदाहरण  , Super Bowl  i  was  निभाई   on  January 15 ,  1967  , following the 1966  नियमित   ऋतु  ,  जबकि  Super Bowl XLVII was played  on  February  3  ,  2013  ,  following  the  2012   ऋतु   .
The  खेल   थी   निर्मित  as part  of  a merger agreement between  the   एनएफएल  and its  then-rival  league , the American  फ़ुटबॉल   लीग  ( AFL  )  .
it   थी  agreed that  the   दो  leagues  '  champion  टीमों   होता   खेल   in  an  afl–nfl  World Championship Game until the merger was  to  officially begin in 1970 .
After the merger  ,  each league was  redesignated  as  a  `` conference `` ,  और  the game was  तब  played  between   the   सम्मेलन  champions .
फिलहाल   ,  the  नेशनल  Football  सम्मेलन  ( NFC )  लीड  the series with 25  विन्स   to  22  विन्स   लिये   the  American Football Conference  (  AFC ) .
The  दिन  on  जिससे  the  सुपर  Bowl is played ,  अभी   माना  by  कुछ  a de facto American national  अवकाश  , is called  ``  Super  कटोरी   संडे  `` .
It is  the  second-largest  दिन   लिये  U.S. food consumption ,  बाद  Thanksgiving Day  .
in  addition ,  the  Super Bowl has  अक्सर   महरूम  the  सबसे  watched  अमरीकी  television  ब्रॉडकास्ट  of the year .
Super  कटोरी   xlv  , played in 2011 , became the most-watched  अमरीकी   टेलीविज़न   कार्यक्रम  in history ,  आरेखण   an   औसत   दर्शक   of  111 million  दर्शक  and taking over the  स्पॉट   आयोजित   by  the previous  साल  's Super  कटोरी  , which itself had taken over  the   #   1  spot  आयोजित  for  twenty-eight  years by  the   फाइनल   एपीसोड   of  M*A*S*H  .
The Super Bowl is  भी   among  the  सबसे  watched sporting events in the world , almost  सब   होने   उत्तर  American  ऑडियंस  , and is  दूसरी   to  association football ’s  यूईएफए   champions  League final  as  the most watched  सालाना   sporting  event worldwide .
Because  of   इसके  high  viewership   ,  commercial airtime during the  सुपर  Bowl  ब्रॉडकास्ट   is   the   सबसे  expensive of the year  .
Due  to  the  ऊँची  cost of  निवेश  in  विज्ञापन   on   the  Super Bowl  ,  companies regularly develop their  सबसे   महंगी   विज्ञापन  for  इस  broadcast  .
as   a   परिणाम  , watching  और  discussing the  ब्रॉडकास्ट  's  commercials  has  become  a significant  पहलू  of  the  event .
In  जोड  , many  लोकप्रिय   गायकों  and musicians  have   performed  during the event  's  pre-game  और  halftime ceremonies because of the exposure .
फिओना  is  a  feminine given  नाम  .
The name  फिओना  was invented , and  पहला  used  ,  by  the  Scottish  कवि  James Macpherson ( 1736–96 ) , author of the Ossian poems , which he  claimed  were translations from  प्राचीन  Gaelic  स्त्रोत  ( sources , when challenged  ,   he  never produced )  .
The name  थी  subsequently used  as   a  pseudonym by William  शार्प  ( 1855–1905 )  ,  who  authored  several romantic  works  under the  नाम  ``  फिओना  Macleod ''  .
The  नाम   रै   चूंकि  become popular in  इंग्लैण्ड  ,  स्कॉटलैंड  and  आयरलैंड  .
The  नाम  is considered  to  be  a  Latinised  रूप   of  the Gaelic  शब्द   fionn   ,  meaning `` white  ''   ,   ``  fair  ''   .
The name  फिओना  is  भी  sometimes used  as  an  anglicisation  of  the  Irish-language  नाम  Fíona  ,  although  ये  names are otherwise unrelated ( as  fíona   is   निकला  from an  तत्व  meaning  ``   बेल   ''  ) .
वहीँ   is  also a  आधुनिक  tendency to equate  the   प्रामाणिक  Scottish Gaelic feminine name  fionnghal  with Fiona .
the   नाम  Fiona  is  rising  in   लोकप्रियता  particularly in  जर्मनी  -speaking  देशों   .
फिओना  was the  49th  most popular name for baby girls born  in  2008  in  Germany  .
Fiona  थी   tied   लिये  third place  in  the ranking  of  most  लोकप्रिय   names   लिये  baby girls  born   in   the  tiny  principality  of Liechtenstein in 2008 .
the  name was the  347th  most  लोकप्रिय  name  लिये  girls  born  in  the  United  राज्य  in  2008  ,  जहाँ   it  has  क्रमित  among  the  top  1,000  most popular names  लिये  girls since 1990 and among  the   शीर्ष   500  since  1999   .
the  name  फिओना  has  महरूम  particularly popular  लिये  girls  of  Asian or Pacific  islander   descent   in  New York City , where  फिओना   क्रमित  as the ninth  सबसे  popular name for girls from those  समूह   in  2007 .
अनेक  languages are used  ,   or  historically have been  प्रयुक्त   in  the  संयुक्त  States .
the   सबसे  commonly  प्रयुक्त  language is English .
There  हैं  also many  भाषाएं  indigenous to North  अमेरिका   or   to  U.S.  राज्य   or  holdings  in   the  Pacific region .
भाषाएं  brought to  the  country  by  colonists or  आप्रवासियों  from Europe  ,  Asia  ,  or  अन्य   भाग  of  the  world make up a  विशाल  portion  of  the  भाषाएं   फिलहाल  used ; several languages  ,   सहित  creoles and sign languages ,  have   भी  developed in the United States  .
Approximately  337   भाषाएं  are spoken  or   हस्ताक्षरित  by the  जनसांख्यिकी  ,  of  which 176 are indigenous to the  क्षेत्रफल  .
fifty-two   भाषाएं   formerly   बोला  in the country  's   territory   हैं  now extinct .
The  किस्में   of  English spoken in  the  United States  is   ज्ञात  as American English .
English is  the   de   facto  national language of the United  राज्य  ,  साथ  80  %  of the population  claiming   it  as  a  mother tongue , and  कुछ  95  %   claiming  to speak it  ``  well '' or `` very  खूब   ''   .
however  ,  no  official language exists  at  the  संघीय   स्तर   .
There  have  been several proposals  to   मेक  English the  नेशनल  language  in  amendments  to  immigration  सुधार   बिल्स   ,  but none of these bills  रै  become  विधि  with the  amendment  intact .
The situation is quite varied at the state and territorial levels  ,   साथ  some  राज्य   mirroring  the  संघीय  policy  of  adopting no official language in a  de  jure capacity  ,   अन्य  adopting English alone , others officially  adopting   अंग्रेज़ी   as   खूब  as  लोकल   भाषाएं   ,  and  स्टिल  others adopting  a  policy of de facto bilingualism  .
Spanish  is   the  second most common language in  the  country  ,   और  is  बोला   by   over   12   %  of the population  .
The  संयुक्त  States  holds  the world  's   पांचवां   largest   spanish-speaking  population  ,  outnumbered only by  मैक्सिको   ,  Spain , Colombia , and  अर्जेंटीना   .
Throughout the Southwestern United States  ,  long-established  spanish-speaking  communities  coexist   साथ  large numbers of  अधिक  recent Hispanophone immigrants  .
Although  अनेक   नई  Latin American  आप्रवासियों   हैं  less than  धाराप्रवाह  in English ,  nearly  all second-generation  हिस्पैनिक   अमेरिकी   बोलो  English  धड़ल्ले   ,   जबकि  only about  हाफ  still speak Spanish .
According  to  the 2000  us  census  ,  people  of  German ancestry make up  the  largest  सिंगल   जातीय  group  in   the  United States ,  और  the German language ranks  पांचवां  .
इतालवी  , Polish , and  फ्रेंच  are still widely spoken  among  populations  descending  from immigrants from those  देशों  in the early 20th  सदी  , but the use of  ये  languages  is  dwindling as the  पुरानी   पीढियां  die .
रूसी  is also spoken by immigrant populations  .
tagalog   और   वियतनामी   have  over  एक  million speakers each in  the  United States , almost entirely within  हाल   अप्रवासी   populations   .
दोनो  languages ,  साथ   साथ  the varieties of the  चाइनीज   भाषा   ,  Japanese  ,   और  Korean , are  अभी  used  in   चुनावों  in Alaska , California ,  हवाई   ,  Illinois , New York , Texas ,  और  Washington .
Native American languages are  बोला   in   छोटी  pockets  of   the   देश  ,  लकिन  these populations  हैं   अवरोहण   ,   और   the  languages  हैं  almost never  widely   प्रयुक्त  outside  of   रिज़र्वेशन   .
Hawaiian  ,   हालांकि  having few native  अध्यक्षों  , is an official language along with English at  the   राज्य  level in  हवाई  .
The  राज्य   सरकारी  of  louisiana  offers services and documents in French , as  करता  New  मैक्सिको  in Spanish  .
besides  English , Spanish , French ,  जर्मनी  , Navajo and  अन्य   देशी  American  भाषाएं  ,  सब  other  भाषाएं  are usually learned from  अप्रवासी   पूर्वजो  that came  बाद  the time of  स्वतंत्रता   or   सीखे  through some form  of   शिक्षा   .
1990 's Pontiac Grand Am Sedan  फेंडर  and  क्वार्टर   फलक
on   an   ऑटोमोबाइल  , a  क्वार्टर   फलक  ( or  पश्च  wing  as   it  is  ज्ञात  in  अंग्रेजों  English ) is  प्रायः   माना  the body panel which  goes   between   the  rear door and the  ट्रंक  and typically wraps around  the  wheel  खूब  ; however  ,   the  similar  सामने  section  फेंडर  (  गाडी  ) , between  the   द्वार   और  the  हुड  , is  sometimes   incorrectly   referred   to  as a  क्वार्टर   फलक   .
The  क्वार्टर  panel is  typically  made of Sheet  मेटल  , but is  sometimes  made  of  fiberglass or  fiber-reinforced  plastic ;  हालांकि  ,  इस  varies with  अलग  makes  और  models .
a  quarter panel is typically  a   welded  on  घटक  of the  uni-body  structure  or  Monocoque .
Replacement  of   a  sheet metal quarter  फलक  typically requires it  to   be   काटें   बंद  the vehicle and a replacement part to be  welded  ( or  sometimes   बंधुआ   )  to  the   गाडी  .
Due  to  this high amount of  specialized  labor ,  a   क्वार्टर   फलक   may  often be repaired rather than replaced by  hammering   आउट   the   क्षति  ,  और   a  body filler sometimes referred to  as   bondo   to  be  लागू  to  finalize  the  असली  surface .
shropshire  (  or   ;   alternatively   salop  ;  abbreviated  ,  in   छपाई  only , Shrops ) is a county  in   the  West Midlands region  of   इंग्लैण्ड  .
it  borders  वेल्स  to  the  west ,  चेशायर  to  the   उत्तर   ,  Staffordshire  to   the  east  ,  Worcestershire to  the  south-east and Herefordshire to the south  .
a   एकात्मक   प्राधिकार  ( Shropshire Council ) was created on 1 April 2009 ,  लेने   over  from the previous  काउंटी   परिषद  and  5   ज़िला   councils  , and covers most  of   the  county  .
The borough of Telford and Wrekin has been  a  separate  एकात्मक  authority  चूंकि  1998 but  continues  to  be  included  in  the ceremonial  काउंटी  .
The  काउंटी  's population  और  economy  is   केंद्रित  on five towns : the  काउंटी   कस्बा  of  shrewsbury   ,  which is culturally  और   historically  important  और   is  located  in  the  केन्द्र  of  the   काउंटी   ;  Telford , a new  कस्बा   in  the east  जिससे   थी  constructed around  a   क्रमांक   of  older  कस्बों  ,  सबसे   notably  Wellington  ,  Dawley and  madeley  , which is today  the   सबसे  populous ; and Oswestry  in   the  north-west  ,  Bridgnorth  बस  to the south  of  Telford  ,  and Ludlow in the south .
the   काउंटी  has many further  मार्केट  towns , including Whitchurch in the north , Newport  बस   to   the   north-east  of Telford  ,   और   मार्केट   drayton  in the  north-east  of  the   काउंटी   .
The Ironbridge  gorge  area is a UNESCO World Heritage Site  ,   covering  Ironbridge  ,   coalbrookdale  and  a  part  of  Madeley  .
There are , additionally , other notable historic industrial  साइट  located around the  काउंटी  , such  as   at  Shrewsbury , Broseley ,  snailbeach  and Highley  as   खूब  as  the  Shropshire Union  कनाल  .
the  Shropshire Hills Area  of  Outstanding  प्राकृतिक   सौंदर्य   कवर   परिचय  a  क्वार्टर   of   the  county , mainly in the  दक्षिण  .
shropshire   is   एक  of  इंग्लैण्ड   's   सबसे   ग्रामीण   और   sparsely  populated  काउंटी  , with the  जनसांख्यिकी   घनत्व  of the Shropshire Council  क्षेत्रफल  being just 91/km2  (  337/sq  mi  )  .
The Wrekin  is  one of  the   सबसे  famous natural landmarks in  the   काउंटी  ,  हालांकि   the   उच्चतम  hills are  the   clee   पहाड़ियाँ   ,  Stiperstones and the  long  Mynd  .
wenlock   किनारे  is  another   significant  geographical and geological  लैंडमार्क  .
In the  low-lying  northwest of the  काउंटी  (  और   अतिव्यापी   the   किनारा   साथ   वेल्स   )  is the Fenn  's   ,  Whixall  और  Bettisfield Mosses National Nature Reserve ,  एक  of the  सबसे   महत्वपूर्ण  and  बेहतरीन  preserved  bogs   in  Britain  .
The River Severn  ,  Great  ब्रिटेन  's  longest  river , runs through the  काउंटी   ,  exiting  into  Worcestershire via the Severn Valley  .
Shropshire is landlocked  ,   और   साथ  an  क्षेत्रफल   of   ,  is  इंग्लैण्ड  's largest inland  काउंटी   .
The  काउंटी   पुष्प  is the round-leaved sundew .
For Eurostat purposes  ,   the  county ( less the  एकात्मक  district of  telford  and Wrekin  )  is a  nuts  3 region ( code  ukg22   )  .
The two  shropshire  unitary  क्षेत्रों  (  covering  all of the  ceremonial   काउंटी   )  , together  साथ  the  अधिकारियों   covering  the  ceremonial  county  of   staffordshire  ,  comprise   the  ``  shropshire   और  Staffordshire ''  nuts  2 region  .
the  Big Bang Theory cast at Comic Con  2009  , from left : Kunal Nayyar ,  साइमन  Helberg  ,   kaley  Cuoco , Jim Parsons , and  जॉनी   galecki
the   अमरीकी   sitcom   the  Big  बंग  Theory ,  निर्मित   और  executive produced  by   चक  Lorre  और  Bill  prady  ,  premiered  on  सीबीएस  on  सितंबर  24  ,  2007 .
the  show  centers  on five  वर्ण   :  roommates  शेल्डन   कूपर   और   लियोनार्ड  Hofstadter , two Caltech  physicists  ;  पैनी  ,  a   वेट्रेस   और  aspiring actress  जो   जीवनदान  across the  हॉल  ; and Leonard  और  Sheldon 's  मित्रों   और   co-workers  aerospace  इंजीनियर  Howard  wolowitz   ,   और   astrophysicist  Rajesh Koothrappali  .
over   समय   ,  several  supporting  characters have been promoted to  अभिनीत  roles  :  Leslie Winkle ( season  1   पुनरावर्ती   ;  season  2  regular ; season  3   अतिथि   )   ,  a physicist colleague  ,  and , at different  टाइम्स  , a lover of  दोनो  Leonard and  हावर्ड  ;  bernadette  Rostenkowski-Wolowitz  (   ऋतु   3   पुनरावर्ती  ;  ऋतु  4-present regular  )  , a  microbiologist  , Howard  's  fiancée and subsequent wife , and former part-time waitress  alongside  Penny  ;  neuroscientist Amy Farrah  fowler  ( season  3   अतिथि   ;   ऋतु  4  पुनरावर्ती  ; season 4-present regular  )  ,  जो   joins  the group  बाद  being  matched  to  शेल्डन   on  a dating  जालस्थल   ;  and comic  किताब   store-owner   ,   स्टुअर्ट  Bloom  (  seasons 2–5 recurring ; season  6-present  regular )  ,  who replaces  हावर्ड  as Raj 's  बेहतरीन  friend when Howard is in space .
The show  भी  features  numerous  supporting  वर्ण   ,   प्रत्येक  of  जिसको  plays  a  prominent  भूमिका   in  a small  समूह  of episodes  .
the   a-team  is  an  American action-adventure  टेलीविज़न  series , running  इससे  1983 to 1987 ,  परिचय   a  fictional group of  ex–  United  राज्य  Army Special  शक्तियां   कर्मियों   जो  work  as   सैनिको  of  सौभाग्य  , while on  the  run from the  फौज   बाद  being branded  as   युद्ध   अपराधियों   लिये  a `` crime they did n't commit `` .
A  विशेषता   फिल्मी   आधारित   on  the  श्रेणी  was  released   by   20th  Century  फॉक्स   on  June  11   ,  2010  .
A  कॉमिक   किताब  series  ,  A-Team : Shotgun Wedding  ,  began March 9 ,  2010  .
Diana  प्रिंस   is  a fictional  अक्षर   appearing  regularly in stories published by  dc  Comics .
वो  debuted in  सनसनी   कॉमिक्स  # 1 ( January 1942  )  and  serves  as the  civilian  and  रहस्य  identity of the superhero Wonder  स्त्री  .
The character  थी   निर्मित   by  Charles  moulton  and Harry  G.  Peter .
Wat  phra   kaew   ,  Bangkok  ,   थाईलैंड
वहीँ   is   no   आधिकारिक  state  धर्म   in   the  Thai  संविधान  ,  जिससे  guarantees  धार्मिक  freedom  लिये  all Thai citizens , though  the   किंग  is  जरूरी   by   विधि  to  be  Buddhist .
According  to   the   पिछला  census  (  2000 ) 94.6  %   of  Thais are  बौद्धों  of  the   थेरवाद   परंपरा   .
मुसलमान   हैं   the  second largest religious  समूह  in Thailand at  4.6  % .
थाईलैंड  's southernmost  प्रांतों  -  pattani   ,  Yala ,  narathiwat  and  भाग   of  Songkhla Chumphon have dominant  मुस्लिम  populations  ,  consisting of  दोनो   जातीय   थाई  and Malay .
The  दक्षिणी  tip of  थाईलैंड  is  ज़्यादातर  ethnic Malays .
ईसाइयों   ,  mainly Catholics , represent 0.7 % of  the   जनसांख्यिकी   .
A small but influential community of  सिखों  in Thailand  और   कुछ   हिन्दुओं  also  सजीव   in   the  country 's  शहरों   ,   और  are heavily engaged  in  retail commerce .
There is  भी   a   छोटी  Jewish community  in  Thailand  ,   डेटिंग   वापस  to the  17th  century  .
चूंकि   2001  ,  मुस्लिम   कार्यकर्ताओं  ,  generally  described  by  the  थाई  government as terrorists or separatists , have  rallied  against the  सेंट्रल  government because of alleged  भ्रष्टाचार   और   जातीय  bias  on   the   भाग   of   officials  .
Thailand  's  Department of Religion , currently under the  मंत्रालय  of Culture , is formally responsible  लिये  the  पंजीकरण   of   धार्मिक   समूह  in Thailand URL_http which hold properties  through   legally   स्थापित  foundations  .
It has oversight , along with  the  Immigration Police , over  the  work  permits  of  प्रचारकों  who  हैं   ``  expatriate  धार्मिक   मजदूर  ''  of  all religions  .
a  value added tax ( VAT ) is a  रूप   of  consumption tax .
From  the  perspective of  the  buyer ,  it   is   a   कर  on the  खरीदें  price  .
इससे  that  of  the  विक्रेता   ,  it  is   a  tax only on the value  added  to a  उत्पाद   ,  material  ,   or   सेवा  , from  an  accounting  पाइंट  of  दृश्य  , by this stage of its manufacture or  वितरण  .
the   निर्माता  remits to  the  government the difference between  ये   दो  amounts ,  और  retains the rest  लिये   themselves  to  ऑफसेट  the taxes  वे   था  previously paid on the inputs  .
the  value added to a product by or with  a   कारोबार   is   the   बिक्री  price  चार्ज  to its  ग्राहक  , minus the  लागत  of  सामग्री  and other  taxable  inputs .
A VAT is like  a  sales  कर  in that ultimately only the end consumer is taxed .
It  differs  from  the  sales tax  in  that ,  साथ   the  latter , the tax is  एकत्रित  and remitted  to   the  government only once ,  at  the  पाइंट   of  purchase by  the   समाप्त   उपभोक्ता  .
साथ  the VAT , collections , remittances  to  the  सरकारी  , and credits  लिये   कर  already paid occur each time a business in the supply chain purchases  उत्पाद  .
a   रेफरी   कॉलिंग  a  high-sticking   penaltyhigh
-sticking   is  the name of  दो  infractions in  the   खेल   of  ice  हॉकी   कि   may  occur  जब   a  player intentionally or inadvertently plays  साथ   उसके  or her stick above  the  height of the  कन्धों  or above  the  cross bar of a hockey goal  .
इस   can  result in  a  stoppage of  खेल   or  in  a  penalty  .
in   the  rules  of  the National Hockey  लीग  ,  high-sticking   is  defined  as  a penalty  in  Rule 60 and as a  non-penalty   बेईमानी  in  नियम   80  .
A stoppage in play  परिणाम   if   a  high stick comes  in  contact with the  पक   और  the team  जो  touched  it  regains control  of   the  puck .
However  ,   खेल   प्रायः  continues if a player touches the  पक   साथ  a high stick  और   the   opposing  team  gains  control of the puck .
If the puck goes  into   the   opposing  net after coming into contact with  a  high stick ,  the  goal is  प्रतिबंधित   .
the  level  at  which a  स्टिक   is  considered  too   ऊँची   लिये  a goal  is   the  crossbar of the net .
however  ,  if  a player  knocks  the  पक   into   उसके  own  जाल   साथ  a  ऊँची  stick  ,  the goal  is  allowed  .
A penalty is  assessed  if a  खिलाड़ी  strikes  another  player with a high  स्टिक  .
The player  is  given  a  minor penalty  जबतक  his high stick caused an injury  ,  in which case the referee has the option  to   assess  a  double-minor  , major or  मैच  penalty  .
It  is  the referee 's discretion  जिससे  penalty  to  assess  :   the  rule  काल्स  for  a   दोगुना  minor  लिये  an accidental injury ,  or   a  match penalty for  a  deliberate attempt  to   injure  (  whether  the opposition player was  दरअसल  injured ) .
चोट   is   प्रायः  decided  by  the high  स्टिक   causing   bleeding  , but  the  presence of blood does  नहीं   automatically   औसत  an extra  दंड  is awarded .
Some referees  have   महरूम  known  to   पुरस्कार  an extra penalty  बगैर  the  उपस्थिति   of  blood if  the   रेफरी   determines   कि   the  injury sustained  थी  sufficient  to  warrant a  double-minor   दंड  .
Typical  आधुनिक   मेमोरी  card reader , compatible with many  आम  formats
A  मेमोरी  card reader  is   a  device , typically having a USB interface  ,  for  accessing   the  data on a  मेमोरी  card such as a CompactFlash  (   cf  )  ,  Secure  डिजिटल  (  sd   )   or  MultiMediaCard ( MMC ) .
सबसे  card readers also offer write  काबिलियत  ,  और   साथ  with  the  card  ,  this can  फलन   as  a  कलम   ड्राइव   .
कुछ  printers  और  personal computers have  a  built-in  कार्ड  reader .
a   मल्टी  card  रीडर   is  used for  संचार   साथ  more than  एक   प्रकार  of flash memory  कार्ड  .
Multi  कार्ड   पाठक   do  not  have   built-in  memory  क्षमता  , but are able to  accept   अनेक   प्रकार   और   शैलियाँ   of  memory  ताश   .
The number  of   संगत   मेमोरी   ताश  varies from reader to reader  और   can  include more than  20   अलग  types  .
the   क्रमांक  of different memory  ताश   कि  a multi  कार्ड   रीडर   can   accept  is expressed as  x-in-1   ,   साथ   x  being a  फिगर  of merit indicating the number  of  memory cards accepted ,  ऐसे  as 35-in-1 .
वहीँ   हैं  three categories  of  card readers sorted by the type and quantity  of   the   कार्ड   स्लॉट  : single  कार्ड  reader (  e.g  .  1x   sd-only   )  , multi card reader ( e.g  .  9-in-1  )  and  श्रेणी   कार्ड  reader  (  e.g .  4x  SD only ) .
Some kinds of memory  ताश  with their own USB functions do not  need  the card reader ,  ऐसे  as the Intelligent Stick  मेमोरी   कार्ड  ,  जिससे   can  plug directly into  a  USB  स्लॉट   .
the  USB device  क्लास  used  is  0x08 .
Bullying is detrimental to  विद्यार्थी  ' well-being and development  .
धमकाना  is  the   उपयोग   of   फ़ोर्स   or  coercion  to   गाली  or  intimidate   अन्य  .
the  behavior can be  habitual   और  involve  an   असंतुलन   of   सोशल   or   शारीरिक  power  .
it   can  include verbal  उत्पीड़न  or threat ,  शारीरिक   उत्पीड़न   or  coercion and may  be   निर्देशित  repeatedly towards  particular   पीड़ितों  ,  शायद   on   grounds  of race  ,  religion  ,  gender  ,  sexuality ,  or  ability  .
if  bullying  is  done by a  समूह  , it is called  mobbing  .
the  victim of bullying is sometimes referred to as a  ``  target '' .
Bullying can be defined in many  अलग   तरीके   .
The  uk   फिलहाल   रै  no legal definition of  धमकाना  ,  जबकि   कुछ   u.S.  states  have  laws  विरूद्ध  it  .
धमकाना  consists  of   तीन   मौलिक  types  of  abuse  –  emotional  ,   मौखिक  , and  शारीरिक  .
It typically  involves  subtle  विधि  of coercion  ऐसे  as  intimidation  .
धमकाना  ranges from  सरल  one-on-one bullying to  अधिक  complex bullying in which the bully may have  एक   or  more `` lieutenants ''  जो   may  seem to  be  willing  to   assist  the  प्राथमिक  bully in  उसके  or  उसके  bullying activities .
Bullying  in   स्कूल   और  the workplace is  भी   referred  to as peer abuse .
Robert  W.  Fuller has analyzed bullying in the context  of  rankism  .
A bullying culture  can  develop in  कोई   कॉन्टेक्स्ट   in  which human beings  interact  with each other .
This includes  स्कूल   ,   गिरिजाघर   ,  family ,  the  workplace  ,  home , and neighborhoods  .
प्रसन्न  slapping in the Instituto Regional Federico  errázuriz  , Santa Cruz  ,  Chile
Laura  बुश   और  Rae Leigh  bradbury   (   formerly   लापता   )   on  April 4 , 2007  ,  in  ऑस्टिन   ,  Texas , after the  8-year-old   introduced  Mrs. Bush during announcement  of  the future opening of the  टेक्सास  Regional Office  of  the National Center  लिये   लापता   और   शोषित  Children .
rae  Leigh  थी  the first  चाइल्ड  in  the   u.S.   to  be recovered  as   a  result of  an   एम्बर   चेतावनी  when  वो  was 8  सप्ताह   बूढ़ा  in  नवम्बर  1998 .
an  AMBER Alert or a  चाइल्ड  Abduction  आपात  (  वही  code : CAE  )   is  a  चाइल्ड   abduction  alert system  originating   in  1996  ,   अभी  employed in  9  countries .
AMBER  is   officially   a  backronym for  अमेरिका  's  लापता  :  प्रसारण  Emergency  जवाब  , named for Amber  hagerman  ,  a   9-year-old  abducted  और  murdered in  आर्लिंगटन  , Texas in  1996   .
Alternate regional alert names were once  प्रयुक्त  ; in  जॉर्जिया  , `` Levi 's Call  ''   (  named  बाद  Levi Frady ) ; in  हवाई  ,  ``  Maile Amber Alert ''  (  after Maile  गिल्बर्ट  )  ;  and Arkansas  ,   ``   मॉर्गन   उपनाम   एम्बर  Alert '' ( in  मेमोरी  of  मॉर्गन  Chauntel Nick ) .
AMBER  चेतावनियाँ  are distributed via commercial  रेडियो   स्टेशन  , Internet radio ,  उपग्रह   रेडियो  , television stations , and cable  tv  by the Emergency Alert System  और   noaa  Weather Radio ( where  वे   हैं   termed  `` Child Abduction  आपात   ''  or ``  एम्बर  Alerts '' ) .
the   चेतावनियाँ   हैं   भी  issued via  e-mail   ,  electronic traffic-condition signs ,  the   led   billboards  which  हैं   स्तिथ  outside of  नए   walgreens   स्थितियाँ  , along  साथ  the LED/LCD  लक्षण  of billboard companies such  as   साफ  Channel Outdoor  ,  CBS  बाहरी   और  Lamar ,  or  through wireless device  sms  text  संदेश  .
AMBER Alert has  भी  teamed up  साथ   google  and Facebook to relay  सूचना  regarding an  एम्बर  Alert to  an   कभी  growing demographic .
those   दिलचस्पी  in  subscribing  to receive AMBER  चेतावनियाँ   in  their  क्षेत्रफल  via SMS messages  can   विज़िट  Wireless  एम्बर   चेतावनियाँ  , which  हैं   offered  by  विधि  as  फ़्री  messages .
in  some states , the  प्रदर्शक   scrollboards  in front of  लॉटरी   terminals   हैं  also used  .
The decision to declare  an  AMBER  चेतावनी  is  बना   by  each  पुलिस  organization (  in   अनेक   मामले  ,  the  state police or  राजमार्ग  patrol ) which investigates  प्रत्येक   of   the  abductions .
Public information in an  एम्बर  Alert usually  consists   of  the  नाम   और  description of  the  abductee  ,   a   वर्णन   of   the  suspected  abductor  ,  और  a  वर्णन  and license  थाली   क्रमांक  of the abductor 's  गाडी   ,   if  available .
Monica  samille  Lewinsky (  born  July 23 , 1973  )  is an American woman  साथ  whom  संयुक्त  States President Bill  क्लिंटन  admitted  to  having  था   an   ``  improper  संबंध  '' while she worked at the White  हाउस  in 1995 and 1996 .
the   affair  and  इसके  repercussions ( which  शामिल  Clinton 's impeachment ) became  ज्ञात   as  the Lewinsky scandal  .
House of Night is  a  series of  पिशाच  -themed fantasy  novels  by  अमरीकी   लेखक   P.  C. Cast  और  her  बेटी   kristin   डाल  .
it   फ़ॉलो   the   adventures  of Zoey  redbird  ,  a  sixteen-year-old  लड़की  who has just become  a  `` fledgling vampyre  ''  and  is   जरूरी  to attend  the   हाउस   of   रात्रि   बोर्डिंग  school  in  Tulsa ,  ओक्लाहोमा  .
The series  रै  been on  the   नई   यॉर्क   टाइम्स   बेहतरीन   विक्रेता  list for 63 weeks and there are over seven million  नक़ल   in  print in  उत्तर  America  अलोन   .
the  sixth novel , Tempted ,  जिससे   गई  on  बिक्री  on October  27  , 2009 with  a  first printing  of  a million  नक़ल  ,  डाला   the  USA Today  बेस्टसेलर  list  कि   सप्ताह  at  #   1  .
In January ,  2010  , Gezeichnet , a German  अनुवाद  of Marked , reached the  #  1  स्पॉट  on the Der Spiegel bestseller list  .
The  श्रेणी  has so far  बेची  more  than   टेन  million books in 39  देशों  .
burned  was  released   on   अप्रैल   27   ,   2010  , and like  इम्तिहान   ,  it  डाला  the USA  आज  bestseller list  कि  week at  #  1 .
awakened  , released  in   जनवरी   ,   2011   ,   भी  entered the list  at   #  1 .
the  series , which is  प्रकाशित  by St  मार्टिन  's Press is planned  to  include  बारह  books  .
In 2008 ,  योजनाएँ   लिये   a  film adaptation  यहूद  also announced  .
The tenth book in the  श्रेणी   ,  Hidden , was  released  on October 16 ,  2012   .
the  second book  in   the  novellas  (  which give  पृष्ठभूमि  on  supporting   वर्ण   )   ,  Lenobia 's  प्रण   ,   थी   released  January 31 , 2012  .
किताब   ग्यारह   is   फिलहाल   पुकारा   नाज़िल  , and  the  Casts  have  announced  कि   दो   अधिक   novellas  ,  neferet’s   अभिशाप  ,  नियोजित   to   be   released  February 19  ,  2013 , and  a   प्रीक्वेल   अनोखा   परिचय  Kalona , are to be released to coincide  साथ   the  eleventh and  बारहवीं  books .
in  Greek  mythology   ,   the  Trojan War  थी  waged against the city  of  Troy by  the   achaeans   (   यूनानियों  ) after Paris of Troy  took  Helen from her husband  menelaus  king  of   स्पार्टा   .
the   युद्ध   is   एक   of  the  सबसे  important events in  यूनानी   mythology   और  has  महरूम   narrated  through  अनेक  works  of  Greek  साहित्य  ,  सबसे  notably through Homer 's Iliad  और   the   ओडिसी  .
The Iliad relates a  भाग  of  the  last year  of   the   घेरा   of  Troy ;  the  Odyssey describes  odysseus  's journey home .
Other parts of the  युद्ध   हैं  contained  in   a  cycle  of  epic poems  ,   जिससे  have  बच   through  fragments .
एपीसोड  from the war  provided   सामग्री  for Greek tragedy  और   अन्य   works  of Greek literature , and  लिये   रोमन  poets including Virgil  और  Ovid .
the   युद्ध   originated  from a  झगड़ा   between  the  देवियाँ   एथेना  , Hera ,  और  Aphrodite  ,  after Eris  ,  the  देवी  of  संघर्ष   और  discord  ,   दिया   उन्हें   a   सुनहरी   ठहराना   ,  sometimes known  as   the  Apple of  अनबन   ,   चिह्नित  ``  लिये  the  fairest   ''  .
Zeus sent  the  goddesses  to   पेरिस  , who judged  कि   aphrodite  , as the ``  fairest  '' , should receive  the  apple .
In exchange ,  aphrodite   बना   हेलेन   ,   the  most beautiful  of  all  महिलाओं  and  बीवी  of  menelaus  , fall in love with Paris ,  जो  took her  to  Troy .
Agamemnon ,  किंग  of  mycenae  and  the   bhai   of  Helen  's   husband  Menelaus ,  led   an  expedition of Achaean troops  to   ट्रॉय   और  besieged the city  लिये  ten years because  of  Paris '  बेइज्जती   .
बाद  the deaths of many  नायक  ,  सहित   the  Achaeans Achilles  और   अजाक्स  , and  the  Trojans Hector and Paris , the  नगर  fell to the ruse of the  trojan  Horse .
The  achaeans  slaughtered  the  Trojans  (   मगर   लिये  some  of   the   महिलाओं   और  children  जिसको   वे   रखा  or sold  as  slaves )  और   desecrated  the  मंदिरों  , thus earning the  देवताओं   '   प्रकोप   .
few   of  the  achaeans  returned safely  to  their  घरों  and  अनेक  founded colonies  in   दूर  shores .
the  Romans  बाद  traced their origin to  aeneas  , one of the  ट्रोजन्स  ,  जो   थी  said to have led the surviving Trojans to  modern-day  Italy .
The ancient Greeks thought that the Trojan War was a  ऐतिहासिक  event that had  लिया  place in the 13th or 12th  सदी  BC  ,  and  believed   कि  Troy  थी  located in modern-day Turkey  निकट  the Dardanelles .
By  आधुनिक  times , both  the  war and the  नगर   यहूद  widely  believed  to  be  non-historical .
In 1868 , however  ,  the German archaeologist Heinrich Schliemann  मिले   फ़्रैंक  Calvert  ,  who convinced  schliemann   कि  Troy  थी  at  hissarlik  and  schliemann  took  over  Calvert  's  excavations on property  belonging  to Calvert  ;   इस  claim is  अभी  accepted by  सबसे  scholars  .
whether  there  is  any  ऐतिहासिक   वास्तविकता  behind the  trojan  War is  an   खोलें   सवाल   .
अनेक  scholars  मानना  that  वहीँ  is a  ऐतिहासिक  core  to   the  tale ,  हालांकि   इस   may  simply  औसत  that the  homeric   कहानियां   हैं  a fusion  of  various  किस्से   of   sieges   और   रिझाने   by  Mycenaean  यूनानियों   दौरान  the Bronze Age .
Those  जो   मानना   कि  the stories  of  the Trojan War are  निकला  from a  विशिष्ट   ऐतिहासिक  conflict usually date it to the 12th  or   11th  centuries  bc  ,  प्रायः  preferring  the  dates given  by  Eratosthenes , 1194–1184 BC  ,   जिससे   roughly   corresponds   साथ   पुरातत्व   प्रमाण   of  a  अनर्थकारी   burning   of   ट्रॉय  VIIa .
Anarchists have employed  निश्चित   प्रतीकों  for their  कारण  , including  सबसे   prominently  the  circle-a  and  the   ब्लैक   ध्वज  , although  anarchists  have historically  largely  denied  the  importance of symbols to political  गति  .
चूंकि  the revival of anarchism around the start of  the  21st-century  संयुक्त  with the rise  of   the   anti-globalization   गति   ,  anarchist cultural symbols  हैं  widely  उपस्थित  .
the  greater palatine canal (  or  pterygopalatine  कनाल   )   is  a  ड्योढ़ी  in  the  skull  कि  transmits the greater  palatine   धमनी  , vein ,  और  nerve  between   the   pterygopalatine  fossa and the oral cavity  .
Surface temperature of Antarctica in winter and  गर्मियाँ   इससे  the European Centre  लिये   medium-range  Weather  forecasts
The climate  of   अंटार्कटिक  is the coldest on the whole of Earth  .
Antarctica  रै  the  न्यूनतम  naturally occurring temperature  कभी   अंकित  on  the  ground on Earth  :  −89.2 °C  (  −128.6  °f  ) at Vostok Station .
It  is  also extremely dry  (   technically  a  मरुस्थल   )  ,  averaging   166  mm (  6.5  in  )   of   वर्षण  per  साल   .
भी   so  , on most parts of  the   महाद्वीप  the  हिम  rarely melts  और   is   आखिरकार  compressed to  become  the glacial ice that  makes  up the  बर्फ   चादर  .
Weather fronts rarely penetrate  दूर  into  the   महाद्वीप  .
Most of  अंटार्कटिक   रै   an  ice  कैप   जलवायु  ( Köppen  ef  ) with very cold , generally  अत्यधिक  dry weather throughout  the   साल  and no month  averaging  above 0 °C ( 32  °f  )  .
Some fringe coastal  क्षेत्रों   have   a   टुण्ड्रा   जलवायु   (  Köppen  et  ) with a  छोटी   गर्मियाँ   averaging  above freezing  ,  and  much  higher  वर्षण   .
Current  सिर  coach  माइक  Tomlin  ,   दौरान   the  2007  ऋतु
the  Pittsburgh  स्टीलर्स   मताधिकार  has had  16  head  कोच  throughout its  इतिहास  .
संस्थापित  as the Pittsburgh Pirates  in  , the  नाम  was changed  to  the Steelers prior  to  the  ऋतु   to  celebrate the city 's heritage  of  producing  स्टील  .
जो  Bach  परोसा   दो  separate  शर्तें  as head coach  और  Walt Kiesling  परोसा  three separate  शर्तें  .
दौरान  the and  सीज़न  ,  due  to  the   राशि  of players who  लड़ा  in  संसार   युद्ध   ii  , the Steelers combined their team with Philadelphia  और  Chicago ,  क्रमशः  .
During  ये  seasons , Steelers  '  coach Walt Kiesling  साझा  coaching  कर्तव्य   साथ  Greasy  neale   और  Phil Handler ,  जो  have not been included within  इस   सूची  .
Struggling  लिये  much of  the  franchise 's early years , the  टोली  's  पहला  season with more  विन्स   than  losses was coached by Jock Sutherland in .
In  ,  under Sutherland  ,  the Steelers  निभाई  their first playoff  खेल   विरूद्ध  the Philadelphia Eagles  .
Ten of the  16   सिर   कोच   खर्च  their entire professional coaching careers  साथ  the franchise , including  जॉन   mcnally  , Walt Kiesling and  चक  Noll , who  have   भी  been voted into the Pro  फ़ुटबॉल  Hall of Fame  .
एक   of   तभी  four men  to  coach  the  same team  लिये   23   सालो   ,  Chuck Noll retired in .
noll  is  भी   the  only coach in  नेशनल  Football  लीग  history  to   जीत  four Super Bowls  .
विधेयक   cowher   ,  Noll 's replacement ,  coached   the   स्टीलर्स  to  उनके  fifth  सुपर  Bowl  विजय   ,   in   2005   .
The Steelers  छठे  Super Bowl win came in Super Bowl XLIII , while head coached  by   माइक  Tomlin ,  the   टोली  's  वर्तमान  head  कोच  .
In  दण्ड  law , fraud is  जानबूझकर   deception  made  लिये   निजी   लाभ  or to damage another individual  ;   the   सम्बन्धित   क्रियाशील  is fraudulent  ,  and verb  is   defraud   .
Fraud  is   a   अपराधों   और  a  सिविल   विधि  violation , though the specific criminal law  परिभाषा  varies by legal jurisdiction .
defrauding  people  or   entities  of money or valuables is a common  purpose   of  fraud  .
A  hoax  also involves deception , but  बगैर  the intention of gain or  of   damaging  or depriving  the  victim  .
Fraud is a  रक्षा  in a  सिविल  action for breach of contract  or   विशिष्ट   प्रदर्शन   of   a  contract  .
Fraud  is   a  basis for equitable jurisdiction .
Passover , or Pesach ( from : in Hebrew , Yiddish  )  , Tiberian :  ,  Modern Hebrew  :  /ˈpesaχ/ Pesah , Pesakh  ,   यहूदी  : Peysekh  ,  Paysakh , Paysokh )  is  an important Biblically -derived  यहूदी  festival .
historically  , together  साथ   shavuot   (  `` Pentecost ''  )   और  Sukkot ( ``  झोपड़ियों  '' )  ,   passover  is one of the three  यात्राएं  festivals  (  Shalosh Regalim ) during  जिससे  the entire  जनसांख्यिकी  of the  किंगडम  of  यहूदा   बना   a   यात्राएं  to the  टेम्पल  in  जेरूसलम  .
samaritans   स्टिल  make  इस  pilgrimage  to  Mount Gerizim  ,  but only men participate in  पब्लिक  worship .
passover  commences on  the   15th  of the Hebrew  माह  of Nisan and  lasts   लिये   either  seven days  (  in  इसराईल   )  or eight days (  in   the  diaspora  )  .
In Judaism ,  a  day  commences   at   संध्या  and lasts  जबतक  the  following   संध्या  , thus the  पहला  day of Passover only begins after  संध्या   of   the  14th of Nisan and ends  at  dusk of the 15th  दिन   of  the  माह  of Nisan  .
the   संस्कार   अद्वितीय   to   the  Passover celebrations  commence  with the Passover  seder  when  the   15th   of  Nisan has begun .
In  the   उत्तरी  Hemisphere Passover  takes  place in spring as the  तोरा  prescribes it : `` in the month of [ the ] spring ''  (  בחדש  האביב   )   .
It  is  one of the most widely  observed  Jewish  छुट्टियाँ   .
The  यहूदी   लोगों   celebrate  Passover  as  a  commemoration  of their  मुक्ति   over  3,300 years  पहले  by God  इससे  slavery in ancient  मिश्र  that  थी  ruled by  the   pharaohs   ,   और   उनके  birth as  a  nation  अंतर्गत   the   नेतृत्व   of  Moses .
It  commemorates   the   स्टोरी  of the Exodus  as  described  in  the Hebrew  बाइबल   विशेषकर  in  the  Book of Exodus  ,  in which the Israelites were freed from slavery in Egypt  .
In the  कथा  of  the   exodus   ,   the   बाइबल  tells  कि  God  helped   the  Children of Israel escape  इससे  their slavery in  मिश्र  by inflicting ten plagues upon the ancient  उन्होंने   पहले  the Pharaoh would  रिलीज   उसके   israelite   स्लेव  ; the tenth and worst of the  plagues   थी  the death of the  मिश्र   first-born  .
the  Israelites  यहूद  instructed to  चिह्नित  the  doorposts  of their homes  साथ   the   रक्त   of  a  slaughtered   वसन्त   मेमने  and  ,  upon seeing this  ,  the spirit of  the  Lord knew to pass over  the   first-born  in these homes  ,  hence the name  of   the  holiday .
There  is   कुछ  debate over where  the  term  is   दरअसल  derived from  .
When  the  Pharaoh freed  the  Israelites , it is  कहा  that  वे   बाएँ   in   ऐसे  a hurry  कि  they could not wait for bread dough  to  rise  (  leaven ) .
in  commemoration , for the duration of  passover  no leavened  ब्रैड  is eaten , for which  कारण   it  is called `` The  पर्व   of  the Unleavened Bread '' .
Thus  matzo  (  चपटा  unleavened bread ) is  खाया  during  passover  and  it   is   a   प्रतीक   of  the  अवकाश  .
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley (  or  ) , officially designated  1p/halley   ,   is  the  best-known   of  the  short-period  comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76  सालो   .
Halley is the only short-period  धूमकेतु  that  is  clearly visible to  the  naked eye from Earth , and  यूँ  the only naked-eye comet that might appear  twice   in   a   इंसान  lifetime  .
Other naked-eye comets may  be   उज्जवल  and more  spectacular   ,  but will  appear   तभी   एकबार   in  thousands  of  years  .
हैली   's  returns  to   the  inner Solar System have been  observed  and recorded  by  astronomers since at least  240  BCE  .
साफ  records  of   the   धूमकेतु   's  appearances were made by  चाइनीज  , Babylonian ,  और  medieval European chroniclers  ,   लकिन  were not recognized as reappearances of the same object  at   the  time .
The comet 's periodicity  थी  first determined  in  1705 by English  astronomer  Edmond Halley , after whom it is now named  .
Halley 's Comet  पिछला  appeared in  the   भीतरी   सौर  System in 1986 and will  अगला  appear  in  mid-2061 .
दौरान   इसके  1986 apparition  ,  Halley  became  the first comet to be observed in  विवरण  by  spacecraft   ,   providing  the  पहला  observational  आंकड़ा  on the structure of a comet  केंद्रक   और  the  यांत्रिकी  of  कोमा  and  टेल  formation .
ये   observations  supported a  क्रमांक  of longstanding hypotheses about  धूमकेतु  construction , particularly Fred Whipple 's `` dirty snowball ''  मॉडल  , which  correctly  predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices  –  such as water  ,   कार्बन  dioxide and  अमोनिया   –  and dust .
The missions also  provided   आंकड़ा   जिससे   substantially  reformed and  reconfigured  these  विचार   ;   लिये  instance  it  is now  समझा   कि  Halley  's  surface  is   largely   रचित   of   dusty   ,  non-volatile materials , and  कि   तभी  a small  portion  of  it   is   icy   .
anti-communism   is  opposition  to  communism .
Organized anti-communism  विकसित   in   प्रतिक्रिया  to  the  rise of communism ,  विशेषकर   बाद  the 1917 October Revolution  in  Russia  और   reaching   वैश्विक   आयाम   दौरान  the Cold War .
सबसे   anti-communists   अस्वीकृत   the  concept of historical  भौतिकवाद  ,  जिससे  is a central idea in Marxism  .
Anti-communists reject  the  Marxist  विश्वास  that capitalism will be followed by socialism and  साम्यवादी  ,  बस  as feudalism  थी  followed by capitalism  .
Anti-communists question the validity of the Marxist claim  कि  the socialist state  होगा   ``  wither  दूर  '' when  it  becomes  अनावश्यक  in a true  कम्युनिस्ट   समाज   .
anti-communists  argue that the repression  in  the early  सालो  of  bolshevik   नियम   ,  while not  as  extreme as that during  जोसेफ  Stalin 's  नियम  , was still  कठोर  by  उचित   मानकों  ,  citing   उदाहरण  such  as  Felix Dzerzhinsky  's   रहस्य  police ,  जिससे  eliminated numerous political  प्रतिद्वंद्वियों  by extrajudicial executions , and  the   क्रूर  crushing of the Kronstadt  विद्रोह  and Tambov rebellion  .
कुछ   anti-communists  refer to  दोनो  Communism and fascism  as  totalitarianism , seeing similarity  between  the actions of communist and fascist  सरकारें   .
इतिहासकार  Robert Conquest has argued that Communism  थी  responsible for tens of millions of  मौतों  during the 20th  सदी  .
Opponents argue that  कम्युनिस्ट   पार्टियों  that have  आइये  to  शक्ति   have  tended to  be   rigidly  intolerant of political opposition  .
These  प्रतिद्वंद्वियों  claim that  सबसे   कम्युनिस्ट  countries have shown  no   लक्षण   of   advancing  from Marx 's socialist  स्टेज  of economy  to   an   आदर्श   कम्युनिस्ट   स्टेज  .
Rather , Communist  सरकारें  have been  अभियुक्त  of creating a  नई   सत्ताधारी  class ( a Nomenklatura  )  ,  साथ   शक्तियां  and  privileges  greater than those previously  enjoyed  by the upper  वर्ग  in the  non-   कम्युनिस्ट  regimes  .
Gil Heron (  9  April 1922  –   27  November  2008  )  थी  a Jamaican professional footballer  .
He was the  पहला   ब्लैक   खिलाड़ी  to play for Scottish  क्लबों  Celtic  ,   और  was the father of  कवि  and  संगीतकार   gil  Scott-Heron  .
He died  in  Detroit of a  दिल   आक्रमण   on   27  November 2008  .
the   सोयाबीन   (  US ) or soya  सेम  (  uk  )  (  Glycine max ) is a species  of  legume  देशी   to  East Asia ,  widely   grown  for its  खाद्य  bean which  रै   numerous  uses .
The plant  is   classed  as an  oilseed  rather than a pulse by the UN  खाना  and Agricultural  संगठन   (  FAO  )   .
Fat-free  (   defatted  )  सोयाबीन  meal  is   a  significant  और   सस्ती  source  of  protein  लिये  animal feeds and  अनेक  prepackaged meals  ;  soy vegetable oil is  another   उत्पाद  of  प्रसंस्करण  the soybean crop  .
For  उदाहरण  ,  सोयाबीन  products such  as   textured  vegetable protein (  tvp  ) are  संघटक   in  many  मांस  and  दुग्ध  analogues .
Soybeans  उपज  significantly more protein per  एकड़  than  सबसे   अन्य  uses of land  .
परंपरागत   nonfermented   खाना  uses of  soybeans  include soy  मिल्क   ,  and from  the   latter   टोफू   और  tofu  स्किन   .
fermented  foods include soy sauce , fermented bean  paste   ,  natto , and tempeh  ,  among others .
the   आयल  is used  in   अनेक   औद्योगिक   अनुप्रयोग  .
The main producers of  सोया  are the United  राज्य  (  35   %  ) ,  ब्राज़ील  ( 27  %  ) ,  अर्जेंटीना   (   19  %  )   ,   चीन  ( 6  %  ) and  इण्डिया  ( 4 % ) .
The beans contain significant amounts of phytic acid , alpha-linolenic acid  ,  and isoflavones .
Harrison Ford (  born   जुलाई   13   ,  1942 ) is an American film actor  और  producer .
he  is  प्रसिद्ध  for his  प्रदर्शन  as Han  सोलो   in  the  असली  Star Wars trilogy  और  the title  अक्षर  of  the   इंडियाना   जोन्स  film series  .
Ford is also  ज्ञात   लिये   उसके  roles as Rick Deckard in Blade Runner  ,  John Book in  गवाह  and Jack  रयान  in  patriot   खेल   और  Clear and  उपस्थित  Danger  .
His  करियर   रै   spanned  six  दशकों   और  includes roles in several Hollywood  blockbusters  ,  सहित  Presumed Innocent , The  भगोड़े   ,   एयर  Force  एक  , and  कया   झूठ   beneath   .
at   एक   पाइंट  , four of the  शीर्ष   छह  box-office  हिट्स   of  all time included one of his roles  .
Five of his  films  have been  inducted   into  the National  फिल्मी  Registry .
In 1997 , Ford was  क्रमित  No .  1  in Empire `` The Top  100  Movie Stars of All  समय   ''   सूची   .
, the United States  घरेलू  box  दफ्तर  grosses of Ford 's films total  over   us  $ 3.5 billion , with worldwide  grosses   surpassing   $  6 billion ,  बनाना   घाट   the  third  उच्चतम   grossing  U.S. domestic box-office star  .
Ford is  the  husband of  अभिनेत्री  Calista Flockhart  .
A tube of ChapStick
ChapStick is  a   ब्रांड  name for lip  बाम  manufactured by Pfizer  उपभोक्ता  Healthcare and used in  अनेक  countries worldwide  .
It is intended  to  help treat and prevent chapped lips  ;   hence  the  नाम  .
अनेक  varieties also  शामिल  sunscreen  in  order to  prevent  sunburn .
Due to  इसके   लोकप्रियता   ,  the term  रै   become  a  genericized  trademark .
It popularly  refers   to  any  लिप   बाम   contained  in  a  lipstick-style tube and  लागू   in  the  वही  manner  as  lipstick  .
However  ,  the term  is  still a registered  ट्रेडमार्क  , with rights  exclusively  owned by  फाइजर  .
In Sweden and  in   the  United Kingdom , the  उत्पाद   's   प्रमुख  competitor  is   lypsyl  ,  बना  by Novartis Consumer Health  ,  which is  वितरित  in similar packaging to ChapStick .
जार्ज  Berkeley ( ;  12  March 168514  जनवरी  1753 )  ,  also known as Bishop  बर्कली  ( Bishop of Cloyne ) ,  थी  an Anglo-Irish  पारस  whose  प्राथमिक  achievement was the  उन्नति   of  a  सिद्धान्त  he called  ``   immaterialism  ''  (   बाद  referred to as  ``  subjective  आदर्शवाद  ``  by   अन्य  ) .
This theory denies the existence of material  पदार्थ  and instead  contends  that  परिचित  objects  जैसे   टेबल  and chairs  हैं   तभी  ideas in the minds  of   perceivers  , and as  a   परिणाम   can  not  मौजूद   बगैर  being  आभास   .
Thus , as Berkeley famously put  it   ,  for physical  वस्तुएँ  `` esse est percipi  ''  ( `` to be is  to  be perceived  ``  )  .
Berkeley is  भी  known for  उसके  critique of abstraction  ,  an  महत्वपूर्ण  premise in  उसके  argument  लिये   immaterialism   .
in  1709  ,   बर्कली   प्रकाशित   उसके   पहला  major work  ,  , in  जिससे  he  discussed  the  सीमाएं   of  human vision  और  advanced the theory that the proper  वस्तुएँ  of  sight  are  नहीं  material objects , but light and colour  .
This foreshadowed  उसके   मुख्य   philosophical  work  a  Treatise Concerning the Principles  of  Human Knowledge  in  1710 which , after  इसके   ग़रीब   रिसेप्शन   ,   he   rewrote  in  संवाद  form  और   प्रकाशित   अंतर्गत  the title  तीन  Dialogues  between  Hylas  और   philonous   in  1713  .
In this book , Berkeley 's views  यहूद   represented  by  philonous  (  यूनानी   :  'lover  of  mind  '  )  ,   जबकि  Hylas ( Greek :  'मैटr  '  )  embodies the  आयरिश   thinker’s  opponents  ,  in  particular  John  locke   .
Berkeley argued  विरूद्ध   सर   इसहाक़  Newton  's   doctrine  of absolute space ,  समय  and motion in De  मोटू   (   on   गति   )   ,   प्रकाशित  1721 .
His arguments were a  precursor  to the views  of  Mach and  आइंस्टीन  .
in  1732  ,  he published  alciphron  , a Christian apologetic  विरूद्ध   the  free-thinkers  ,   और  in  1734  , he  प्रकाशित   the  Analyst , an  empiricist  critique of  the  foundations of infinitesimal calculus ,  जिससे  was influential in the development  of   गणित  .
His  पिछला   प्रमुख  philosophical work , Siris (  1744  ) ,  begins  by advocating the  औषधीय   उपयोग   of  tar water , and  तब   continues  to discuss  a  wide range of topics including  विज्ञान   ,  philosophy ,  और  theology .
ब्याज   in   बर्कली  's  कार्य  increased  बाद   संसार  War  ii  , because he tackled  अनेक   of   the  issues of paramount  ब्याज   to  philosophy  in   the   20th  century such  as  the  समस्याएं  of perception ,  the  difference between primary  और   द्वितीयक  qualities , and the importance  of  language .
चिंगदाओ   (  )  ,  historically  ज्ञात  as  tsingtao   ,   is  a  प्रमुख  city in eastern  शानदोंग  province  ,   पूर्वी  China ,  साथ   a  population of over  8.715  million ( 2010 census ) .
Its built up area , made  of  6 urban districts and  4  county-level  शहरों   ,   is   घर  to about  4,896,000  inhabitants  in  2010  .
It borders Yantai  to  the  पूर्वोत्तर  ,  weifang  to  the  west and  rizhao  to the southwest .
qīng   (   )  in  चाइनीज  means `` green '' or `` lush '' , while  dǎo  ( )  अर्थात्   ``   द्वीप  '' .
Qingdao is administered at  the  sub-provincial level  .
lying  across  the  Shandong  प्रायद्वीप   जबकि  looking  आउट  to the  पीला  Sea , Qingdao  is   a  major  seaport   ,  naval base  ,   और   औद्योगिक  centre .
It is also  the   साईट  of  the   tsingtao  Brewery .
the   संसार  's longest  समुद्र  bridge  ,   the   चिंगदाओ   haiwan  Bridge  ,  links the main urban  क्षेत्रफल   of   चिंगदाओ  with Huangdao  ज़िला  , straddling the Jiaozhou Bay  समुद्र   क्षेत्रों   .
Qingdao is  नामित  China 's most livable  नगर   .
Mimivirus  is  a viral  genus   containing   a  single identified  प्रजाति  named Acanthamoeba  polyphaga  mimivirus (  apmv   )  , or is a group of phylogenetically  सम्बन्धित  large  वाइरस  ( designated usually MimiN ) .
in  colloquial speech ,  apmv  is more  commonly   referred   to  as just `` mimivirus  ''  .
Until October  2011  , when  a  larger virus Megavirus chilensis was  वर्णित   ,   it   था   the  largest capsid  व्यास  of  सब  known viruses  .
Mimivirus has  a   विशाल  and  जटिल   genome   compared   साथ   सबसे   अन्य   वाइरस  .
Mimivirus , short for  ``   mimicking  microbe  ''  ,  is  so called to  प्रतिबिंबित  its large size and  apparent  Gram-staining properties .
The Mexican  युद्ध   of   स्वतंत्रता  (  1810–1821  )  थी   an  armed  विरोध  between  the  people  of  Mexico  और   the  Spanish colonial  अधिकारियों  which started on September 16 , 1810  .
the   गति   ,  which  became   ज्ञात   as  the Mexican War  of  Independence , was led by Mexican-born Spaniards  ,   mestizos   और  Amerindians who sought  स्वतंत्रता  from Spain .
It started as an  आदर्शवादी   peasants  '  विद्रोह  against their colonial  मास्टर्स  ,  लकिन  ended  as  an  असंभावित   गठबंधन  between Mexican  ex-royalists  and Mexican guerrilla insurgents .
crohn  's disease  ,  also  ज्ञात  as Crohn syndrome and regional enteritis , is  a  type of inflammatory  bowel   बीमारी   कि  may affect any part of  the  gastrointestinal tract from mouth to anus ,  causing   a  wide  किस्में  of  लक्षण  .
it  primarily causes abdominal pain  ,   अतिसार   (  which may  be  bloody  if  inflammation  is  at  इसके   worst  ) ,  उल्टी  ( can  be  continuous ) ,  or  weight loss ,  लकिन   may   भी  cause  जटिलताओं   बाहर  the gastrointestinal tract  ऐसे  as  स्किन  rashes  ,  arthritis , inflammation  of  the eye  ,   थकान   ,   और  lack of  विशेषज्ञता  .
Crohn 's  बीमारी   is  caused by interactions between  पर्यावरणीय   ,  immunological and bacterial factors  in  genetically  susceptible  individuals  .
This results  in  a chronic  जलन   विकार   ,   in  which the body  's  immune system attacks the  जठरांत्र  tract possibly directed at  सूक्ष्मजैविक  antigens  .
Crohn  's   बीमारी   रै   wrongly  been  वर्णित  as  an  autoimmune disease in the  पास्ट  ;  हाल  investigators  have   वर्णित  it  as   an   प्रतिरक्षा   कमियां  state .
There is a genetic  संघ   साथ  Crohn  's   बीमारी   ,   primarily  with variations  of  the  nod2  gene  और  its protein  ,  which  होश   बैक्टीरियल  cell walls .
सहोदर  of affected individuals are  at   उच्चतर  risk  .
males  and females are equally affected  .
smokers  are two  टाइम्स  more  संभावित   to  develop Crohn 's  बीमारी   than  nonsmokers  .
Crohn  's  disease  affects   between  400,000  और  600,000 people in  उत्तर  America .
व्यापकता   estimates  for Northern Europe  have  ranged from 27–48 per  100,000  .
Crohn 's disease tends to  उपस्थित  initially in the teens and twenties  ,  with another  शिखर  incidence in  the  fifties to  seventies   ,  although the  बीमारी   can   occur   at   कोई  age .
There is  no  known  फार्मास्युटिकल  or surgical cure  लिये  Crohn  's  disease .
उपचार  options  हैं  restricted to controlling  लक्षण   ,  maintaining remission  ,   और  preventing relapse  .
The disease was named  बाद   gastroenterologist   burrill  Bernard Crohn , who  ,   in  1932  ,  together  साथ   दो  other colleagues at  माउंट   sinai  Hospital  in   नई  York , described a series of patients with inflammation of  the   टर्मिनल  ileum  ,  the  क्षेत्रफल  most commonly  प्रभावित   by  the illness  .
This is an  अधूरी  list  of  the  tallest  buildings and structures  by  country .
the  list directly  शामिल  the tallest buildings  और  structures  लिये   प्रत्येक  country  ,  and  जहाँ   उचित   ,  it also points to more detailed country-specific lists .
अशिष्ट   और   तैयार  is a census-designated  प्लेस   in   नेवाडा   काउंटी   ,   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , United States  .
It is  स्तिथ  west of Grass  घाटी   ,  California , approximately  62  miles  (   100  km  )   इससे   sacramento  .
The population was 963  at   the  2010 census .
YouTube is a video-sharing  जालस्थल  ,  निर्मित  by  तीन   पूर्व  PayPal employees in February 2005  ,   on  which users can  अपलोड   ,   दृश्य  and share  वीडियो   .
The  कम्पनी  is based  in  San Bruno ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,  and uses  adobe   फ्लैश   वीडियो  and  html5  technology  to   प्रदर्शक  a wide variety of  user-generated   वीडियो  content  ,   सहित  movie  क्लिप्स  , TV clips ,  और  music videos  ,  as well as amateur  सामग्री  such as video blogging  ,   छोटी  original videos  ,   और  educational  वीडियो   .
Most of  the   सामग्री  on YouTube  रै  been uploaded by individuals  ,   हालांकि  media corporations including  सीबीएस  , the BBC  ,  Vevo , Hulu ,  और   अन्य   संगठन  offer some of  उनके   सामग्री  via the site , as  भाग   of  the  youtube  partnership  कार्यक्रम   .
Unregistered  उपयोक्ता  can watch  वीडियो  , while  पंजीकृत  users  can   अपलोड  an unlimited number of videos .
वीडियो  considered to contain potentially offensive content are  उपलब्धियाँ  only  to  registered  उपयोक्ता   at   तनिक  18 years  बूढ़ा  .
In  नवम्बर   2006  ,  youtube  , LLC was  खरीदा  by  google   लिये   us  $ 1.65 billion ,  और  operates  as  a  subsidiary   of   google   .
Sister  अधिनियम  is a musical  लिखा  by Cheri Steinkellner and Bill  steinkellner  with additional  किताब   सामग्री  by Douglas Carter  beane  ,  साथ   गीत  by  ग्लेन   स्लेटर   और  music  by  Alan Menken  .
it  is  आधारित   on   the  hit  1992  film comedy of the same name  .
the   2009  West  समाप्त   उत्पादन   थी   उत्पादित  by Stage  entertainment  ,  whoopi  Goldberg , and Michael Reno for Sis  अधिनियमों   llc   .
Goldberg is  भी  a  निर्माता   of  the 2011  ब्रॉडवे  adaptation .
Microsoft DirectX is  a   संग्रहण  of application  प्रोग्रामिंग   अंतरफलक  ( APIs  )  for handling tasks  सम्बन्धित   to  multimedia ,  विशेषकर  game  प्रोग्रामिंग   और  video , on  microsoft  platforms .
originally  ,  the  names of these  api   सब  began with  सीधा  , such  as   direct3d   ,  DirectDraw ,  directmusic   ,  DirectPlay , DirectSound ,  और   so  forth  .
the  name  डाइरेक्टएक्स  was coined as  आशुलिपि  term  लिये  all of these  api  ( the  x  standing in for  the  particular API names ) and soon  became  the  नाम   of  the  संग्रहण   .
When Microsoft later set out to develop  a   गेमिंग   कंसोल  , the  x  was  प्रयुक्त  as  the  basis of the  नाम   एक्सबॉक्स  to indicate that the  कंसोल   थी  based  on   डाइरेक्टएक्स  technology  .
The  x  initial has been carried  आगे  in the  नामकरण  of APIs  designed   लिये  the  एक्सबॉक्स  such  as   xinput  and  the  Cross-platform Audio Creation  औजार   (  XACT )  ,  while  the  DirectX pattern  रै   महरूम   जारी  for Windows APIs such as Direct2D  और   directwrite   .
direct3d   (   the  3D  ग्राफिक्स   api  within  डाइरेक्टएक्स   )   is  widely used  in  the development  of  video  खेल   लिये  Microsoft Windows  ,  Microsoft  एक्सबॉक्स   ,  Microsoft Xbox 360 and  कुछ   sega  Dreamcast games .
direct3d  is  भी   प्रयुक्त   by  other software  अनुप्रयोग  for visualization  और  graphics tasks such as CAD/CAM engineering .
As  direct3d   is   the  most widely  publicized  component  of   डाइरेक्टएक्स  ,  it  is  आम  to  देखिए  the names  ``   डाइरेक्टएक्स  '' and `` Direct3D '' used interchangeably  .
The  डाइरेक्टएक्स  software  विकास  kit ( SDK ) consists  of   runtime  libraries  in  redistributable binary form  ,  along with accompanying documentation and headers for use in coding  .
originally   ,   the  runtimes  यहूद   तभी   संस्थापित   by   खेल   or  explicitly by the user .
खिड़कियाँ   95   किया   नहीं  launch with DirectX  ,   लकिन  DirectX was included with  खिड़कियाँ   95   oem  Service  रिलीज   2   .
Windows  98  and Windows  nt   4.0  both shipped  साथ  DirectX ,  as  has every version  of  Windows released since  .
The  sdk  is  उपलब्धियाँ  as a free download  .
While  the   runtimes  are proprietary  ,  closed-source software , source code  is  provided for  सबसे  of  the   sdk  samples  .
Starting with the  रिलीज   of   खिड़कियाँ  8  डेवलपर  Preview , DirectX  sdk  has been  एकीकृत  into Windows  sdk  .
Direct3D  9ex   ,  Direct3D 10  ,   और   direct3d   11  are only available for  खिड़कियाँ  Vista  और   नए  because  प्रत्येक   of   ये  new versions  थी   निर्मित  to  निर्भर  upon  the  new  खिड़कियाँ  Display Driver  मॉडल  that  थी  introduced for  खिड़कियाँ  Vista .
the  new Vista/WDDM  ग्राफिक्स   वास्तुकला  includes a new  वीडियो  memory  मैनेजर   supporting   आभासीकरण  of  ग्राफिक्स  hardware  लिये   विभिन्न  applications and  सेवाएं   जैसे  the  डेस्कटॉप  Window Manager .
Quetzaltenango  ,  also  commonly  known by  इसके  indigenous  नाम   ,   xelajú   ,  or more  commonly   ,   xela   ,   is  the second largest city  of  Guatemala .
It is both  the   पूंजी   of  Quetzaltenango Department  और  the  नगरपालिका   सीट  of  quetzaltenango  municipality  .
It has  an   अनुमानित   जनसांख्यिकी  of  224,703  .
The population is about 61 % indigenous or Amerindian  ,   34   %  Mestizo  or   ladino  and  5  %  यूरोपीय  .
Quetzaltenango  is  located  in  a mountain  घाटी  at an elevation of  2,330   मीटर  ( 7,655 ft  )  above sea  स्तर   at   इसके  lowest part .
It may reach above  2,400   मीटर  within  the  city .
The  नगरपालिका  of Quetzaltenango consists of an area of  .
municipalities  abutting  the   नगरपालिका   of  Quetzaltenango include  :  Salcajá  ,  Cantel  ,  Almolonga , Zunil , El  palmar  , Concepción Chiquirichapa  ,  San Mateo , La  esperanza   ,   olintepeque  , and  सैन   आन्द्रेस  Xecul  .
All these  municipalities   हैं   भाग   of   the   विभाग  of Quetzaltenango  ,   मगर  San Andrés Xecul which  is   a  part  of  the Department of Totonicapán .
The Epic of Gilgamesh , an epic poem from Mesopotamia , is amongst the earliest  surviving  works  of   साहित्य  .
The literary history of Gilgamesh  begins  with  पाँच  independent  sumerian   कविताएं  about 'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh  )   ,   किंग  of  uruk  .
Four of these were  प्रयुक्त  as source  सामग्री  for a combined epic  in   अक्कादी   .
This first combined epic , known  as  the ``  बूढ़ा  Babylonian '' version  ,   तिथियाँ  to the  18th  century  bc   और  is titled after  इसके  incipit , Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing  सब  Other Kings  ''   )  .
Only a  few  fragments  of   it  have  बच  .
the  later `` Standard Babylonian ''  संस्करण  dates from  the  13th  to  the 10th centuries BC and bears the  incipit  Sha naqba  īmuru  ( `` He who Saw  the  Deep '' ) .
fragments  of  लगभग   दो  thirds of this longer ,  twelve-tablet   संस्करण  have been recovered .
Some  of   the  best  नक़ल  were discovered in  the  library  तबाह  of the 7th-century BC  assyrian   किंग   ashurbanipal  .
the  story centers on  a   दोस्ती   between  Gilgamesh  और   enkidu   .
Enkidu  is   a  wild man created  by  the gods  as   gilgamesh  's equal to  distract  him from  oppressing  the people  of  Uruk  .
साथ   ,  they  यात्रा   to  the Cedar  पहाड़  to  शिकस्त  Humbaba ,  इसके   monstrous   संरक्षक   .
Later they kill the Bull of Heaven ,  जिससे  the goddess  इश्तार   भेजना   to   सजा   gilgamesh  for spurning her advances .
as  a  दंड  for these  क्रियाएँ   ,  the  देवताओं  sentence  enkidu  to death .
The  दूसरी  half  of   the  epic focuses on Gilgamesh 's  तकलीफ  at Enkidu  's  death ,  और   उसके  quest for immortality  .
in   अनुक्रम  to learn  the  secret  of   अनन्त  life , Gilgamesh undertakes a long and  perilous   यात्रा  .
He  learns  that `` The life  कि  you are seeking you will  never  find .
When the gods created  man  they allotted to  उसे   मौत   ,  but  जीवन  they retained in their  अपना  keeping  .   ''
इस  quote was  originally   attributed  to Siduri in the Old  babylonian   संस्करण  of  the   एपिक  , and then attributed  to   the  immortal flood hero Utnapishtim in  the   अक्कादी   संस्करण  of the epic .
Nevertheless  ,   gilgamesh  's  कीर्ति  lived on after his death  ,  because of  उसके  great building projects  ,   और  his account of what Utnapishtim  बताई   उसे   happened  during the  बाढ़   .
the  story has  महरूम  translated  into   अनेक   अलग  languages  ,  and Gilgamesh  रै  since become adapted in  works   of   लोकप्रिय   fiction  .
वहीँ   हैं   numerous   debates  over  जो  created the first video  खेल   ,  with the  जवाब  depending largely on how video games are defined .
the  evolution of  वीडियो   खेल  represents a  उलझे   वेब   of  several different industries  ,  including  वैज्ञानिक   ,   कंप्यूटर  , arcade  ,   और  consumer  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स   .
The  ``  video  ''  in `` video game ``  traditionally  refers  to  a raster  प्रदर्शक  device  .
साथ   the  popular catch  phrase  use of the term `` video  खेल  ''  ,  the  पद  now implies all  प्रदर्शक   प्रकार  , formats , and platforms  .
इतिहासकारों  have also  sought  to bypass the issue  by   बजाय   using  the more specific ``  डिजिटल   खेल   ''   वर्णनात्मक  .
This  पद   पत्ते   आउट  the  पहले   analog-based   कंप्यूटर  games  .
This is a  सूची   of  best-selling video game franchises that  have  sold or shipped  at   तनिक  5  लाख  copies  .
जबतक  otherwise stated , numbers  indicate  worldwide  इकाई   बेची   ,  ordered  alphabetically  whenever two or more  सूची   the   वही   राशि   .
the  exception  हैं  the ones specifying shipments , which  have  lower  पूर्वता  than others  लिस्टिंग   बिक्री   .
मताधिकार  sales include  विस्तार  packs even  हालांकि  they are not considered  पूरा   वीडियो   खेल   .
For best-selling  व्यक्तिगत  video games , see List  of   best-selling  video  खेल   .
The sales  आंकड़े  given below do  नहीं   शामिल   आर्केड  game sales  ,  which can be  मिला   at  List  of   highest-grossing   आर्केड  video games .
– This color indicates  a   sub-series   of  a  larger  video  खेल  franchise .
This  करता   नहीं  necessarily apply  लिये   श्रेणी   कि   हैं  not video  game-based  .
Dorothy Ann Willis  रिचर्ड्स  (  सितंबर  1 , 1933 – September 13 ,  2006   )   थी  an American  राजनेता   और  the  45th  Governor  of  Texas .
वो  first came to  नेशनल  attention as  the   राज्य   कोषाध्यक्ष   of  Texas ,  जब  she  वितरित  the keynote  पता   at   the   1988  Democratic  नेशनल  Convention .
रिचर्ड्स   परोसा   as   the  45th Governor of Texas  इससे  1991 to 1995 and was  पराजित  for  re-election  in  1994   by   जार्ज   W.  Bush .
Ann  रिचर्ड्स  was the second  मादा  governor of  टेक्सास  .
आंकड़ा  Execution Prevention ( DEP )  is   a  security  विशेषता  included in  आधुनिक   ऑपरेटिंग   प्रणालियों   .
It is  ज्ञात  to be  उपलब्धियाँ  in  लिनक्स  , Mac OS X  ,  iOS  ,  Microsoft Windows and  एंड्रॉइड  operating systems and  is   intended   to   prevent  an application or  सेवा  from executing code  इससे  a non-executable  मेमोरी  region .
इस  helps prevent certain exploits  कि   स्टोर  code via a buffer overflow  ,   लिये  example .
DEP  रनों  in two  मोड्स  : hardware-enforced DEP for CPUs that  can  mark memory pages  as  nonexecutable ,  और  software-enforced DEP with  सीमित   सुरक्षा   लिये  CPUs  कि  do not  have   हार्डवेयर   support   .
Software-enforced  dep   करता  not protect against execution of  कोड  in data  पृष्ठों  ,  लकिन  instead  counters  SEH  मिटाकर  , another  प्रकार   of   आक्रमण   .
DEP  थी   introduced   on   लिनक्स  in 2004  (  kernel 2.6.8  )   ,  on Windows in 2004  साथ   खिड़कियाँ  XP  सेवा   पैक   2  ,  जबकि   ठहराना  introduced DEP  जब   वे  moved to  x86   in   2006   .
Example  उदाहरण  of  दो  common futanari variants
, is  the   जापानी   शब्द   लिये   hermaphroditism  ,  जिससे  is  भी  used in a broader sense for androgyny .
परे   जापानी   the  term is used  to  describe a  commonly  pornographic genre  of   कंप्यूटर   खेल   ,  comics and animations  ,   जिससे  includes  वर्ण   कि   दिखाएँ   दोनो   प्राथमिक  sexual  विशेषताएँ   .
लकिन  in today 's language it refers almost  exclusively  for  वर्ण  who  have  an overall  feminine  appearance .
In that  मामला  the  पद  is also often abbreviated as futa (  s  )  ,   जिससे  is  occasionally  also used as  पद   लिये  the works  itself  .
जल्दी   captchas   ऐसे  as  ये   ,  generated  by   the  EZ-Gimpy  कार्यक्रम  ,  यहूद  used  on  Yahoo !
a  modern  captcha   ,  rather  than  attempting to  बनाएँ   a  distorted background  और  high  स्तर  of  warping  on  the  text  ,  might focus  on  making  segmentation   मुश्किल   by  adding  an   angled   लकीर  .
another  way to make  segmentation  difficult is  to   भीड   प्रतीकों   साथ  ,  as  in Yahoo  !  's current  captcha   स्वरूप   .
Some CAPTCHAs try  to  utilize the ability  of  people  to  see  three-dimensional   वस्तुएँ  .
on  this image , symbols  हैं   drawn  with lines  of   अलग   मोटाई   to   मेक  an effect of extrusion .
A CAPTCHA  (  ) is a type of challenge-response test used in  कम्प्यूटिंग  as  an   attempt  to ensure  कि  the  जवाब   is  generated by a human  होने  .
the   प्रक्रम   प्रायः   involves   a   कंप्यूटर   पूछे  a user to complete a simple test which  the   कंप्यूटर   is  able to  ग्रेड   .
These tests are designed to be  आसान  for a computer  to  generate  लकिन  difficult for a computer to solve , but  again   आसान  for  a   इंसान   .
if  a correct solution is  प्राप्त  , it  can  be presumed to have been entered by  a   इंसान  .
A common  प्रकार   of  CAPTCHA requires the user  to  type letters and/or  अंक   इससे  a  distorted  image that appears on the  स्क्रीन  .
Such  परीक्षण  are commonly used to prevent  अनावश्यक   अंतरजाल   बॉट  from  accessing  websites  ,  since a normal human  can   easily  read  a  CAPTCHA  ,  while  the   bot  can  नहीं  process the  चित्र   अक्षर  and  इसलिए  ,  can  not answer properly , or  at   सब   .
हालांकि   सबसे  CAPTCHAs are letter pictures  randomly   उत्पन्न   ,   अनेक  of  उन्हें  have  become  difficult  भी  for  a  human to read , so  चित्र   captchas  were created in which a human  is  shown  a  simple test to show  a   चित्र   of   a  certain  एनिमल  ( given few  एनिमल  pictures ) ,  जिससे  is simple  लिये  a  इंसान  being to process  ,  and therefore easy to pick ,  जबकि   a   bot  can  नहीं   प्रक्रम  and solve  the   सवाल   क्युकी   हालांकि  it  can   analyze   the   चित्र  , it can not  easily   अंदाज़ा  the animal  .
the  term ``  captcha  ''  थी  coined in  2000  by  लुइस  von  ahn  , Manuel Blum ,  निकोलस  J.  हॉपर  ,  और   जॉन   langford   (   सब  of Carnegie Mellon  विश्वविद्यालयों   )  .
it   is   an   एक्रोनिम   आधारित   on  the  शब्द  `` capture '' and  खड़ा  for  ``   completely  Automated Public  turing  test  to   बताना  Computers and Humans Apart  ''   .
कार्नेगी  Mellon  विश्वविद्यालयों  attempted  to  trademark the  पद   on   15   अक्तूबर  2004  ,  but  the   ट्रेडमार्क   अनुप्रयोग  was abandoned  on   21  April 2008  .
A CAPTCHA is sometimes  वर्णित   as  a reverse  turing  test  ,   क्युकी   it   is  administered by  a   यंत्र  and targeted  at  a human , in contrast to the standard  turing   परीक्षण  that  is   typically  administered by  a   इंसान   और  targeted at  a   यंत्र   .
Jacques-Yves Cousteau  (   ;   commonly   ज्ञात   in   अंग्रेज़ी  as Jacques Cousteau ;  11  June 1910 –  25  June  1997  )  थी  a French naval officer  ,  explorer , conservationist  ,   फिल्मकार  , innovator  ,  scientist , photographer , author and researcher  जो   पढ़ाई  the sea and all forms of life  in   जल  .
He  co-developed  the Aqua-Lung ,  pioneered   समुद्री  conservation and was  a   सदस्य   of  the  académie   française   .
KFC ( Kentucky Fried Chicken ) is a fast food restaurant chain  headquartered   in   louisville   ,   केंटकी   ,   संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  जिससे  specializes in fried  मुर्गा   .
an   ``  American icon  ''  , it  is  the world  's  second largest restaurant  कड़ी  overall ( as measured by  बिक्री  ) after McDonald  's  , with over  18,000  outlets in  120  countries and territories .
the  company  is  a subsidiary of Yum  !
Brands  ,   a   रेस्तरां  company  जिससे  also owns Pizza  हट  and Taco  घंटी  .
केएफसी   थी  founded  by  Harland  सैंडर्स  , who began  selling  fried  मुर्गा   इससे   उसके  roadside  रेस्तरां   in   कोर्बिन  ,  केंटकी   दौरान   the  Great  अवसाद   .
Sanders  थी  one  of  the first people to see the potential of  the  restaurant  फ़्रेंचाइज़िंग  concept ,  साथ  the  पहला  ``  केंटकी  Fried Chicken  ''   मताधिकार  opening in Utah in  1952  .
the  franchise popularized  मुर्गा   in  the fast food industry  ,   thereby   diversifying  the market and challenging the  दबदबा  of the hamburger .
