Marketing himself as ``  कर्नल  Sanders  ''  , he became  a  legendary figure  of  American  सांस्कृतिक  history ,  और  his image is still prominently  प्रयुक्त  in KFC  ब्रांडिंग   .
the  company  's   रैपिड  expansion saw  it  grow  too   विशाल  for Sanders  to   मैनेज  ,  और   in  1964 he  बेची   the   कम्पनी  to a  समूह  of investors led by John Y . Brown  ,   jr.   और   जोकर  Massey .
केएफसी   थी   एक   of   the  first fast food chains  to  expand internationally  ,  opening outlets in  इंग्लैण्ड  , Mexico and  प्यूर्टो  Rico  by  the  mid-1960s  .
Throughout the  1970s  and  1980s   ,  KFC  अनुभवी  mixed  सौभाग्य   domestically   ,  as it went through a series of  कॉरपोरेट  owners  जो  had  छोटी  or  no   अनुभव  in the  रेस्तरां  business  .
in   the  early 1970s ,  केएफसी   थी  sold to the spirits  कड़  Heublein ,  जो  were taken  over  by  the  R.J. Reynolds food  और  tobacco conglomerate  ,  who sold the chain to PepsiCo .
the  chain  जारी   to   विस्तार  overseas  however  ,  और   in   1987  KFC  became  the  पहला   पश्चिमी   रेस्तरां  chain to  खोलें   in  China .
the  chain has  चूंकि  expanded rapidly in  चीन  , and the  देश  is  अभी  the  कम्पनी   's  most  लाभप्रद  market .
PepsiCo  spun   बंद  its  रेस्तरां  division as Tricon Global Restaurants  ,   जिससे   बाद   बदला  its name  to   यम   !
Brands .
KFC primarily  बिकता  fried chicken  टुकड़े  and variations such  as  chicken sandwiches  और   wraps  ,  सलाद   और  side dishes such  as   फ्रेंच  fries and coleslaw ,  desserts  and soft  पेय  , often supplied  by  PepsiCo .
Its  सबसे  famous  उत्पाद   is   दबाव  fried  मुर्गा  pieces , seasoned  साथ  Sanders  '   ``  Original Recipe '' of  11  herbs  और  spices  .
The exact  प्रकृति  of these ingredients is unknown ,  और  represents a notable trade secret .
larger  portions of  fried   मुर्गा  are served  in  a distinctive  गत्ता  ``  बाल्टी  ''  ,  which has become a  हस्ताक्षर  of  the   कड़ी  since being introduced by  वाल   पीट   हर्मन   .
KFC  is  famous  लिये  the slogan ``  उंगली   lickin  '  शुभ  ''  ,   जिससे  has since been  replaced  by `` Nobody does  मुर्गा   जैसे  KFC ''  और  `` So good '' .
निडारिया  (  साथ   a  silent  c  ) or  coelenterata   is   a  phylum containing over  10,000  species of animals found  exclusively  in  जलीय   और  mostly marine  environments  .
Their distinguishing feature  is  cnidocytes  ,   specialized  cells that  वे   उपयोग  mainly  लिये   capturing  prey  .
Their  लाशें   consist  of  mesoglea  ,  a  non-living jelly-like substance ,  sandwiched  between  दो  layers of epithelium  कि  are mostly one  कोशिका  thick  .
They have  दो   मौलिक  body  फ़ॉर्म  : swimming  medusae   और   स्थानबद्ध   polyps   ,  both  of   जिससे   हैं   radially   सममित  with mouths surrounded by  tentacles  that bear cnidocytes .
Both forms  have  a  सिंगल   orifice   और   देह  cavity that  हैं   प्रयुक्त  for digestion and respiration  .
Many cnidarian species  उपज  colonies that are  सिंगल   जीवों  composed  of   medusa-like  or  polyp-like   zooids  , or  दोनो   .
Cnidarians  '  activities  हैं  coordinated  by   a   विकेन्द्रित   तंत्रिका  net and simple receptors  .
अनेक  free-swimming Cubozoa  और   scyphozoa  possess  balance-sensing  statocysts , and some have simple eyes .
Not  सब  cnidarians  reproduce  sexually  .
Many have  जटिल   lifecycles   साथ   अलैंगिक  polyp stages and sexual medusae ,  लकिन  some  omit  either  the  polyp  or   the   medusa  stage .
cnidarians  were for a long time  grouped   साथ  Ctenophores in  the  phylum  coelenterata  ,  लकिन  increasing awareness of  उनके  differences caused them to be  लगाई  in separate  phyla  .
Cnidarians are classified  into   चार   प्रमुख  groups : the  लगभग   wholly  sessile  anthozoa   (  sea anemones ,  corals  , sea  पेन  )  ;   तैराकी  Scyphozoa ( jellyfish ) ; Cubozoa  (   बक्सा  jellies ) ; and Hydrozoa , a  विविध   समूह  that includes all the freshwater cnidarians  as  well as many  समुद्री  forms , and has both  स्थानबद्ध  members  ऐसे   as   hydra   और  colonial  swimmers  such  as  the  पुर्तगाली   man  o '  युद्ध   .
staurozoa   have  recently been recognised  as  a  क्लास   in   उनके   अपना  right rather than a  sub-group   of  Scyphozoa  ,   और  there  is   बहस  about whether Myxozoa and Polypodiozoa  हैं  cnidarians  or  closer  to  bilaterians  (  more complex animals  )  .
सबसे  cnidarians prey on organisms ranging  in  size from  प्लवक   to  animals several times  larger   than   themselves  , but many  obtain  much of their  पोषण  from endosymbiotic algae  ,  and  a   few  are parasites .
अनेक   हैं  preyed  upon   by   अन्य  animals including  starfish  , sea  slugs  ,  मछली   और  turtles  .
Coral  reefs   ,  whose polyps  हैं   समृद्ध  in  endosymbiotic  algae , support some of the  संसार   's  most productive ecosystems , and protect  वनस्पति  in tidal zones and  on  shorelines  इससे   दमदार  currents  और  tides .
जबकि  corals are almost entirely restricted to warm  ,  shallow marine  waters  , other cnidarians live in  the  depths  ,   in  polar seas and in freshwater .
Fossil cnidarians have been found  in  rocks formed about , and other  जीवाश्मों   दिखाएँ   कि   corals   may   have  been  उपस्थित  shortly  पहले   और   diversified  a few million years later .
Fossils  of   cnidarians  that  do  not build mineralized structures are  बहुत   विरल   .
Scientists currently think that  cnidarians   ,   ctenophores  and bilaterians are more closely  सम्बन्धित   to   calcareous  sponges than these  हैं  to other sponges  ,  and that anthozoans  हैं  the  विकासवादी   ``  aunts '' or  ``  sisters ''  of  other  cnidarians   ,   और   the  most closely related  to  bilaterians  .
Recent analyses  have  concluded that cnidarians  ,   हालांकि   माना   अधिक  ``  आदिम  ''  than  bilaterians ,  have   a   wider  range of genes  .
The Aztec  पिरामिड  at  st.  Cecilia Acatitlan , Mexico  राज्य  .

एज़टेक   cosmogram  in the pre-Hispanic  codex   fejérváry-mayer  -  the  fire god Xiuhtecuhtli is in the center  .
the  Aztec people were certain ethnic  समूह  of  सेंट्रल   मैक्सिको  , particularly those  समूह   जो  spoke  the  Nahuatl  भाषा  and who dominated  विशाल   भाग  of  मेसोअमेरिका  from the 14th to 16th  सदियां   .
The  नावातल  words  aztecatl  (  एकवचन  ) and aztecah (  बहुवचन  ) mean  ``   लोगों   इससे  Aztlan ``  ,  a mythological place for  the  Nahuatl-speaking culture of the  समय   ,  and later adopted as the word to  define  the Mexica people .
Often  the   पद  `` Aztec '' refers  exclusively   to   the  Mexica  लोगों   of   tenochtitlan  ( now  the  location  of   मैक्सिको  City  )   ,  situated  on  an island in Lake Texcoco  ,   जो   referred  to themselves as Mexica Tenochca or  cōlhuah   mexica   .
Sometimes the  पद   भी   शामिल  the inhabitants  of  Tenochtitlan  's  two  प्रिंसिपल  allied city-states , the  acolhuas   of  Texcoco  और   the  Tepanecs  of  Tlacopan ,  जो  together with  the  Mexica formed  the   एज़टेक   ट्रिपल   गठबंधन  which controlled what is often known as  ``  the Aztec Empire  ''   .
In other  contexts   ,  Aztec  may   refer  to  सब  the various city  राज्य  and their peoples , who shared large parts of  उनके  ethnic  इतिहास  and cultural  traits  with the Mexica ,  acolhua  and Tepanecs , and who often  भी  used  the  Nahuatl language as a lingua  फ़्रांका   .
In this meaning it is possible to talk  परिचय  an Aztec civilization including all  the  particular cultural  पैटर्न  common for most  of  the peoples  inhabiting  Central Mexico in the late postclassic period  .
From  the   13th  century , the  घाटी  of Mexico was the heart of Aztec civilization  :   यहाँ  the  पूंजी   of  the  एज़टेक   ट्रिपल   गठबंधन  ,  the  city of Tenochtitlan  ,  was built upon  उठाया   आइलेट  in  झील  Texcoco .
The Triple  गठबंधन  formed a tributary empire  expanding  its  राजनैतिक   आधिपत्य  far beyond the Valley  of  Mexico  ,  conquering other city states throughout Mesoamerica  .
At its  शिखर  , Aztec culture  था  rich  और   जटिल  mythological  और  religious traditions , as well as reaching remarkable architectural and artistic  accomplishments  .
in  1521  hernán  Cortés  ,  along  साथ  a large  क्रमांक  of  नावातल  speaking indigenous allies  ,   conquered   tenochtitlan   और  defeated  the  Aztec  ट्रिपल  Alliance under the leadership of  hueyi  Tlatoani  moctezuma   ii   .
Subsequently the Spanish founded  the  new settlement of  मैक्सिको  City on  the   साईट  of the ruined  एज़टेक  capital ,  इससे  where  वे  proceeded  साथ  the  प्रक्रम  of colonizing  सेंट्रल   अमेरिका  .
Aztec culture  और   इतिहास  is primarily known  through   पुरातत्व   प्रमाण  found  in  excavations  ऐसे  as  कि  of the  प्रसिद्ध   templo  Mayor in Mexico City ;  इससे  indigenous bark  पेपर  codices  ;  from eyewitness accounts by Spanish  conquistadors  such as  hernán  Cortés and  बर्नल  Díaz  डेल   कैस्टिलो  ;  और  especially  इससे  16th  और  17th  सदी   descriptions  of Aztec  संस्कृति  and history  लिखा   by  Spanish  clergymen   और   साक्षर  Aztecs  in  the Spanish  or  Nahuatl language  ,   ऐसे  as  the  famous Florentine Codex  compiled   by   the  Franciscan  भिक्षु   bernardino  de Sahagún  साथ  the  सहायता  of indigenous  एज़टेक  informants .
Anderson Hays  कूपर  ( born  जून   3  , 1967  )  is an American  पत्रकार   ,   लेखक  ,  और  television personality .
He is the primary anchor of  the  CNN news  दिखाएँ   एंडरसन  Cooper  360°   .
The program is normally  ब्रॉडकास्ट   सजीव  from a  नई  York City studio ;  however  , Cooper  प्रायः   प्रसारण   सजीव  on location  लिये  breaking  न्यूज   कहानियां  .
as  of September 2011  ,   he  also serves  as  host of his own eponymous syndicated  दिन   बात   दिखाएँ  , Anderson  सजीव  ,  जिससे   होगा  be  रद्द   at  the end of  the  second  ऋतु  .
a   प्लाट  of a  सामान्य   वितरण   (  or  bell-shaped   वक्र   )   जहाँ  each band  रै   a  width of  1   मानक  deviation  –  See also :  68-95-99.7   नियम
Cumulative probability of a  सामान्य  distribution with expected value 0  और   मानक  deviation  1  .
In statistics and probability theory  ,  standard deviation (  represented  by the  प्रतीक   सिग्मा  , σ  )  shows how much variation or dispersion exists from the  औसत   (   औसत  ) ,  or  expected  मान  .
A  कम  standard deviation indicates that  the  data points tend to  be   बहुत   बंद  to the mean  ;  high standard deviation indicates that  the  data points  हैं   स्प्रेड  out over a large range  of  values .
the   मानक  deviation  of   a   यादृच्छिक   परिवर्तनीय  ,  सांख्यिकीय   जनसांख्यिकी  , data set , or probability  वितरण   is  the  वर्गाकार  root  of   इसके   variance  .
It is algebraically simpler though practically less robust  than   the  average absolute  विचलन  .
a  useful property  of  standard deviation  is   कि   ,   नापसंद   variance   ,  it is  expressed   in   the  same  इकाई  as the data .
Note , however  ,  that  लिये   माप  with  प्रतिशत   as  unit ,  the   मानक  deviation will  have  percentage  अंक  as  ईकाई   .
in  addition  to   expressing  the  variability  of  a  population  ,  standard  विचलन   is  commonly used to  माप   विश्वास  in  सांख्यिकीय  conclusions  .
For  उदाहरण   ,   the   हाशिया  of  गलती  in polling  आंकड़ा  is determined  by   calculating   the   अपेक्षित   मानक  deviation  in   the  results  if  the same  पोल   यहूद   to   be   conducted   अनेक  times .
The  reported   हाशिया   of  error is typically  परिचय   twice   the   मानक  deviation  ­–   the  radius of a  95  percent confidence interval  .
In science , researchers commonly  रपट   the  standard  विचलन  of experimental data , and only effects that  पतन   दूर   बाहर   the  range  of   मानक  deviation are  माना   statistically   significant   –  normal  यादृच्छिक  error or  विभिन्नता  in the  माप   is   in   इस   रास्ता  distinguished from causal variation .
Standard  विचलन  is also  महत्वपूर्ण  in finance  ,  where the  मानक   विचलन   on   the  rate of return on an investment is a measure  of  the volatility of  the  investment  .
When only  a   नमूना  of data  इससे   a  population is available , the standard deviation  of   the  population can be estimated by a modified  मात्रा   पुकारा  the ``  नमूना   मानक  deviation '' .
जब   the  sample  is   the  entire population ,  इसके  unmodified  मानक   विचलन   is   पुकारा   the   ``  population  मानक  deviation  ''  .
Ulluco  (  u : ju :  kɔ  : )  (  Ullucus tuberosus ) is a  संयंत्र  grown primarily as a  रूट  vegetable ,  secondarily   as   a  leaf vegetable .
The  ulluco  is  एक   of  the most  widely  grown and  economically  important root crops  in   the   andean  region of  दक्षिण  America  ,  second  तभी   to   the   आलू   .
It  is  known  वहीँ  with the common name of  पापा  lisa  ,   लकिन   भी  by the  क्षेत्रीय   names   melloco   (  Ecuador  )  , olluco ( Peru ) , chugua  (   कोलंबिया  ) or ruba ( Venezuela )  ,  among  अन्य   .
the  leaf and  the  tuber are edible  ,   समान   to   पालक  and  the   आलू   ,  respectively .
They are known to  contain  high levels  of   प्रोटीन   ,  calcium ,  और  carotene .
Papalisa  यहूद  used by  the  Incas  prior  to arrival  of  Europeans in South America  .
Ulluco tubers are  marketed  as  ``   धरती   रत्नों   ''   in  New  जीलैंड   ,   by  Halfords Exotic Produce .

An April 24 ,  1851   पोस्टर  warning the  ``  colored  लोगों   of  Boston  ''  about policemen  एक्टिंग   as  slave  catchers  .
the  Fugitive  स्लेव  Law or Fugitive  स्लेव   अधिनियम   थी  passed by the United States  कॉंग्रेस  on September  18   ,  1850 ,  as  part  of  the Compromise  of  1850 between Southern slave-holding interests and Northern Free-Soilers  .
This  थी  one of  the   सबसे  controversial acts  of  the  1850   सुलह   और  heightened  उत्तरी  fears of a  ``  slave power conspiracy  ''  .
it  declared that all  runaway  slaves were  ,  upon capture , to be returned to their  मास्टर्स  .
Abolitionists  nicknamed  it  the   ``  Bloodhound  विधि  ''  लिये  the dogs that  यहूद   प्रयुक्त  to  track   bas   runaway  slaves .
Frank  जोसेफ  Pallone , Jr. (  born   अक्तूबर   30  ,  1951   )  is the U.S. Representative  लिये  , serving since  1993   .

trin-i-tee  5:7 is a  इन्जील  duo  इससे  New  ऑरलियन्स  , Louisiana  in  the United  राज्य  .
the  group  थी   marketed   as  a gospel alternative to  r   &   b  girl groups  ऐसे   as  Destiny  's  Child and TLC .
Trin-i-tee  5:7   रै  sold over  2.5  million albums .
In  1998  , the group released their first album entitled  trin-i-tee   5:7  which debut  at   #  1  on  the  शीर्ष  Gospel charts  .
the   एल्बम   प्रदर्शित  the  गीतों  ``  परमेश्वर   's   अनुग्रह   ''  and  the  cover song `` Oh !
Mary  do  n't You Weep ''  .
the   एल्बम  later became  certified  gold .
In  1999   ,  Terri Brown  बाएँ  the group and was  बाद   replaced  by singer  एड्रियन  Anderson  .
During that  साल  , the group  अंकित   और   released   उनके   दूसरी   एल्बम  ,  आध्यात्मिक  Love .
the  album became the  समूह  's second # 1  एल्बम  on the Top Gospel charts .
the  album  contained  the  singles  `` Put  अपना  Hands '' and  ``   my  Body ''  .
In 2002 , the group released  उनके  third  एल्बम  The  चुंबन  which  debuted   at  # 2 on  the   शीर्ष   इन्जील  charts .

The  संयुक्त   राज्य   संघीय  earned  आय   कर  credit or  अर्जित  income  क्रेडिट   (   eitc   or  EIC )  is  a  refundable  tax credit for low-  और  medium-income individuals  और  couples  ,  primarily  लिये  those  जो   have   qualifying  children .
जब   the  credit exceeds the amount  of  taxes owed ,  it   परिणाम  in  a  tax  refund   to  those  जो  claim the  क्रेडिट  .
This  क्रेडिट   is   provided   to   ऑफसेट   the   बोझ   of   सोशल   सुरक्षा  taxes  और  also to promote an  प्रोत्साहन  to  कार्य  .
in   अनुक्रम  for  a  person or  युगल  to claim one  or   अधिक   व्यक्तियों   as   उनके   qualifying   चाइल्ड  ( ren )  ,   the  age ,  संबंध  , and  साझा   रेसिडेंसी   आवश्यकताएँ  must be met  ,  as well as some other  आवश्यकताएँ  .
U.S.  कर  forms 1040EZ  ,   1040a  , or 1040  can   be   प्रयुक्त  to claim  eic   बगैर  qualifying children .
To  अर्जी  the credit with qualifying  children  , 1040A  or   1040  must  be  used  ,   as   खूब  as  attaching   अनुसूची  EIC .
eic   phases   in  slowly ,  रै  a medium-length plateau  ,   और   तब  phases out  अधिक   धीरे  than  it  phased  in   .
चूंकि   the   क्रेडिट  phases out at 21 %  (  for two children and  लिये  three  or   अधिक  qualilfying children ) or 16 % ( for one qualifying child ) , it  is   सदा  preferable  to   have   एक  more dollar  of   वास्तविक  salary or wages (  हालांकि  technically  ,   चूंकि  the  eic  table  चालें   by   पचास   डालर  increments  ,  it  's  always preferable  to   have  an extra fifty-dollar increment of salary or wages )  .
For tax  साल  2011 ,  the  maximum  eic  for  a  single person  or  couple  दाखिल  without  qualifying   children  was $  464  .
the   अधिकतम   eic   साथ  one  qualifying  child was $  3,094  , with  दो   children   थी  $ 5,112  ,  and with three or more  qualifying   children   थी  $ 5,751 .
These amounts  हैं  indexed  annually  for inflation  .
The earned income tax  क्रेडिट   रै   महरूम  part of political debates in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  regarding whether raising the minimum wage or increasing EIC  होगा   बेहतर   पता  a seeming shortage of good-paying jobs .
the  following is a  सूची  of  मध्यांतर   shows   आयोजित   at  the National  फ़ुटबॉल  League  's   चैंपियनशिप  game  ,  the Super Bowl .
While  मध्यांतर   shows  are a tradition  दौरान   फ़ुटबॉल  games  at   सब  levels  of   प्रतियोगिता   ,  the Super  कटोरी   मध्यांतर   दिखाएँ  represents a  आधारभूत  link  to   पॉप   संस्कृति  ,  जिससे  helps broaden the  टेलीविज़न  audience  और  nationwide interest  .
in  most years  चूंकि   the  mid-1980s  ,  the  मध्यांतर   दिखाएँ  of  the   सुपर   कटोरी  has  प्रदर्शित  popular  रिकॉर्डिंग   कलाकारों  and other  well-known   हस्तियाँ  .
It has measurably  increased   टेलीविज़न  viewers  दौरान  and after  the  halftime  दिखाएँ  .
The  प्रदर्शन  is regarded  एक   of  the most-watched events in American  टेलीविज़न  annually  साथ  over  100  million viewers  in  the  संयुक्त  States  अलोन  .
Musical genres over the  सालो   have   represented   a  broad range  of  music types , including  पॉप  ,  चट्टान  , classic rock ,  देश   ,  hip hop  ,   रैप  , blues  ,   और   आत्मा   .
In  कुछ  years  ,   छोटी  skits or drama scenes are  acted   आउट  on  a   स्टेज  .
The performance group Up with  लोगों  has  performed  at  the   सबसे   सुपर   कटोरी  halftime shows ,  अभिनीत  in four during the  1970s  and  1980s  .
according   to  Nielsen ratings , Super  कटोरी   xlvi  halftime show  headlined  by Madonna in 2012 remains  the  most-watched halftime  दिखाएँ  in  इतिहास  , with  114  million  दर्शक  or about  3   लाख  more  than   the  actual  खेल  .
Beyonce 's  2013   मध्यांतर   दिखाएँ   प्रदर्शन  was  the  second  सबसे  viewed  दिखाएँ  in history .
It is listed on the Guinness World  रिकॉर्ड   as   the   largest   tv   दर्शक   लिये  a Super Bowl  half-time  performance .
International Men  's  Day ( IMD ) is an annual international event  मनाये   on  19th November .
Inaugurated  in  1999  in   त्रिनिदाद  and Tobago , the  दिन  and  इसके   कार्यक्रम  find  support  from a variety of  individuals   और  groups  in  Australia  ,  the Caribbean , North America ,  एशिया  ,  यूरोपीय  and  अफ़्रीकी  .
Speaking on behalf  of   युनेस्को   ,   निदेशक  of  महिलाओं   और  Culture of Peace Ingeborg  breines  said of IMD  ,  `` This is an  बेहतरीन   विचार  and would  दे  some gender  संतुलन   .  ''
She added  कि  UNESCO  थी  looking  आगे  to  cooperating   साथ  the  आयोजकों  .
the  objectives of celebrating  an  International Men 's  दिन  include  focusing   on   मेन  's and boys  '  health  ,  improving gender  संबंध  , promoting gender  समता  ,  और  highlighting  धनात्मक   पुरूष  role models .
it  is  an  occasion to highlight discrimination  विरूद्ध   मेन   और  boys and  to   celebrate   उनके  achievements and  योगदान   ,   in   particular  for  उनके  contributions  to   जातियाँ   ,   परिवार   ,  marriage , and  चाइल्ड  care .
the   broader  and  परम   उद्देश्य   of   the  event is  to  promote  मौलिक  humanitarian values .
International Men  's  Day  is   मनाये  in over 60 countries  ,   सहित  Trinidad  और   टोबैगो   ,  Jamaica , Australia , India ,  चीन   ,  United  राज्य   ,  Romania  ,  Singapore ,  माल्टा   ,   संयुक्त   किंगडम  ,  दक्षिण   अफ़्रीकी  ,  तंजानिया  , Zimbabwe  ,   बोत्सवाना   ,   australia  , Burundi  ,   हंगेरियाई   ,   आयरलैंड  , Isle  of   man   ,   घाना   ,  Canada  ,  Denmark  ,   नार्वे  ,  ऑस्ट्रिया  ,  बोस्निया  and  हर्ज़ेगोविना  ,  युक्त   ,  France  ,  Italy ,  पाकिस्तानी   ,  Cuba ,  अण्टीगुआ  and  बारबूडा  , St.  किट्स  and  नेविस   ,  St.  लूसिया  ,  हरा  and  केमन   आइलैंड्स  ,  on   19  November  ,  and global  support  for the celebration is  व्यापक  .
घाटी   गाँव  ParkValley
Village is a district in the  सैन  Fernando  घाटी   प्रदेश  of Los  एंजिल्स  , California  .
the  median age of  इसके  population  ,  at 36 , is `` old for the  नगर   of   लॉस  Angeles . ''  और  its average household  आकार  of two  लोगों   is   कम   ,  compared  to  other parts of the  नगर   .
developmental  psychology is  the  scientific  पढ़ाई   of  changes  कि  occur in  इंसान  beings over  the  course of their life span  .
Originally  चिंतित   साथ  infants and  children  ,  the  field  रै   विस्तारित  to  शामिल   किशोरावस्था  ,  वयस्क   विकास  , aging ,  और  the  संपूर्ण   जीवन   स्पैन   .
इस   फ़ील्ड  examines  बदलें  across a  व्यापक   दायरा  of  विषय   सहित   मोटर  skills  और   अन्य  psycho-physiological  प्रक्रियाओं  ;  संज्ञानात्मक   विकास   involving  areas  ऐसे  as  प्रॉब्लम   solving  ,  moral   समझना  ,  और  conceptual  समझना   ;  language  अधिग्रहण   ;   सोशल   ,   व्यक्तित्व   ,  and emotional development ; and self-concept and identity formation .
Developmental psychology includes issues such  as  the  extent  to which development occurs  through  the gradual accumulation of knowledge  बनाम  stage-like  विकास   ,   or   the  extent  to  which  children   हैं  born  साथ   स्वाभाविक   दिमागी   structures   बनाम   सीखना  through  अनुभव   .
Many researchers  हैं  interested  in  the  बातचीत   between  personal characteristics  ,   the  individual 's  बर्ताव   ,  and  पर्यावरणीय  factors  सहित  social  कॉन्टेक्स्ट  , and  उनके   प्रभाव  on development  ;   अन्य  take a  अधिक  narrowly-focused approach  .
developmental  psychology informs  अनेक  applied fields , including :  शैक्षणिक  psychology ,  चाइल्ड   psychopathology  ,  और  forensic developmental psychology .
developmental  psychology complements  अनेक  other basic research  फ़ील्ड  in psychology  सहित   सोशल   मनोविज्ञान  , cognitive  मनोविज्ञान  ,  ecological  psychology ,  और   तुलनात्मक  psychology .
जोसेफ  Michael ``  जॉय  ''  stivic  is  a  fictional character who first appeared  on  the 1970s  अमरीकी  sitcom All in  the   परिवार  .
Joey Stivic was  the  son and only  चाइल्ड  of Mike Stivic (  निभाई   by  Rob Reiner  )  and Gloria Stivic ( played by  सैली  Struthers )  ,   और  the grandson of Archie  बंकर   (   कैरल  O'Connor )  और  Edith Bunker (  जां  Stapleton  )  .
The  अक्षर   पहला   appeared   as  a newborn baby in  a  two-part episode  of  All  in  the Family which  aired  in December 1975  .
After  अनेक   दिखावे  on All  in  the Family until Reiner  और   struthers   बाएँ   the   श्रेणी   in  1978 (  by   कि   समय   ,  Joey had been  निभाई  most often  by  alternating  जुड़वा  Jason and Justin  draeger  ) ,  the  Joey Stivic  अक्षर  next  appeared   on  the  सब   in   the   परिवार  spin-off  श्रेणी  ( some  कॉल   it   a   continuation  of  the  original ) Archie Bunker 's Place  in  a guest appearance  in  the November 1979  एपीसोड   ``  Thanksgiving Reunion .  ''
in   इस   उदाहरण  , the character  थी   निभाई  by  चाइल्ड  actor Dick  billingsley  and was  appropriately  pre-school  आयु  .
साथ   ग्लोरिया  now  अलग  from  माइक  , she returned to Archie Bunker 's  प्लेस  with  जॉय  in the  फ़रवरी  1982  एपीसोड  `` Gloria Comes Home . ''
In  इस  episode  ,   जॉय   थी  played by  क्रिस्टोफर  Johnston .
Joey Stivic was  a  regular  अक्षर   on   the   सब  in  the   परिवार  spin-off series  ग्लोरिया   in   1982  and 1983  .
On this series  ,   in  which the now-divorced Gloria Bunker character had moved to Upstate  नई  York  in   अनुक्रम  to work as an assistant veterinarian , the  भाग   of   जॉय  Stivic  थी  played  by   ten-year-old  actor Christian  jacobs   .
After  ग्लोरिया  was canceled in 1983  ,   जॉय  Stivic disappeared from prime time television for 11  सालो   ,   जबतक   the   अक्षर   बना   एक  last  रूप   on   704   hauser   ,  a short-lived 1994  श्रेणी   परिचय  a black  परिवार   जो  had moved into  the   बूढ़ा  Bunker  घर  ,  सालो  after Bunker had sold it  .
In  इस  appearance  ,  the Joey Stivic  अक्षर  was played  by  Casey  siemaszko  , an  कर्ता   born  in  1961  (  14  years  पहले  Joey  stivic  's fictional  जनम   )   .
in  1976 the Ideal Toy  कम्पनी   released   a  14-inch ``  जॉय  Stivic  गुड़िया  '' ( called `` Archie Bunker 's  पोता  '' )  जिससे  was billed  as  the  ``  first  anatomically  correct male doll . ''
The doll inspired mild  विवाद  at the time ,  और  is  a   collectors   '  item today .
The  2011  Rose  कटोरी   थी   the  97th edition of  the   सालाना  bowl game  निभाई   on  January 1 , 2011  ,  as part  of  the  2010  college football  ऋतु  .
Played in Pasadena , California  ,  the  tcu   horned  Frogs of the Mountain West Conference defeated the Wisconsin Badgers of the Big Ten Conference  by  a  स्कोर   of  21 – 19 .
the  Pasadena Tournament of Roses Association was the organizer of the game  .
Vizio Inc. was the corporate sponsor and the  खेल   थी   officially   नामित  `` The  रोज़  Bowl Game presented  by  Vizio ''  .
इस   खेल  marked  the  first  समय  a  टोली   इससे  a  non-automatic  Qualifying Conference played in ,  और   जीती  , the Rose Bowl  in  its  97  years .
The contest was  ब्रॉडकास्ट   on  cable  टेलीविज़न   स्टेशन  ESPN with a radio broadcast on ESPN  रेडियो   और  XM Satellite  रेडियो  and ESPN3  स्ट्रीमिंग  video over the internet  .
Coverage began  at  1:30  pm   (  PST ) with  kickoff   at  2:10 PM ( PST ) .
This marked  the  first  समय  that  the   खेल   थी   नहीं   ब्रॉडकास्ट  nationally  ``   over-the-air  ''  (   स्थलीय   टेलीविज़न   )  since the  खेल  prior  to  the  1952  Rose Bowl  ,  which was the  पहला  nationally  televised  college football game .
The Rose Bowl  खेल  , themed  भवन  Dreams ,  friendships   ,  & Memories ,  थी  a  contractual  sell-out , with  64,500  tickets allocated to the  participating  teams and conferences  .
Ticket  कीमतें  for all  सीटे   in   the   रोज़   कटोरी  are listed at $  145   .
the  remaining tickets  गई  to  the   टूर्नामेंट  of  गुलाब  members , sponsors ,  नगर  of  pasadena  residents , and the general public  .
The  रोज़   कटोरी   स्टेडियम  capacity is  सूचीबद्ध  at  लगभग  91,000 .
The Declaration of Independence is a  बयान  adopted by  the  Continental  कॉंग्रेस   on   जुलाई   4  , 1776  ,   जिससे  announced that the  तेरह  American colonies , then at  युद्ध  with Great Britain , regarded  themselves   as   स्वतंत्र  states ,  और  no  longer  a part of  the  British  साम्राज्य   .
Instead they now formed a  नई   nation—the  United States of America  .
John Adams  थी  a  नेता  in pushing  लिये  independence , which was unanimously approved on  जुलाई  2  .
A committee had already  drafted   the   औपचारिक  declaration , to  be   तैयार  when congress voted on  स्वतंत्रता   .
Adams persuaded the committee to  चुनें  Thomas Jefferson to compose the  असली  draft of the document  ,   जिससे  congress  होता   संपादन  to  उपज  the final version  .
the   घोषणा  was ultimately a formal explanation  of  why  कॉंग्रेस  had  voted  on  जुलाई   2  to  घोषित  independence from Great Britain  ,  more than  a  year  बाद  the  outbreak   of   the  American Revolutionary War .
the  national  जन्मदिवस   ,   the  Independence Day  is  celebrated on  जुलाई  4 , although Adams wanted July  2  .
बाद   ratifying   the  text  on  July 4 , Congress issued  the  Declaration of  स्वतंत्रता  in  अनेक   फ़ॉर्म  .
it   थी   initially  published  as  the printed Dunlap broadside  कि   थी  widely distributed and  पढ़ा   to  the public  .
The most famous version  of  the Declaration ,  a   हस्ताक्षरित   नक़ल  that is popularly regarded  as  the  घोषणा  of Independence  ,   is  displayed at  the  National  अभिलेख   in   वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
Although the  wording  of  the  Declaration  थी   स्वीकृत   on   जुलाई  4  ,  the  तिथि  of its  हस्ताक्षर  was  अगस्त   2   .
the  original  जुलाई  4 United States Declaration of Independence  पाण्डुलिपि   थी   खोया  while all  अन्य   नक़ल  have been  निकला  from  इस   असली  document .
the   स्त्रोत   और  interpretation of the  घोषणा  have been  the  subject  of   much  scholarly inquiry .
The  घोषणा  justified the independence of the United  राज्य  by listing colonial grievances against  किंग  George III  ,  and  by  asserting certain natural  और   विधिक   अधिकारों   ,   सहित  a right of  क्रान्ति  .
Having  परोसा   इसके  original  purpose  in announcing independence ,  the  text  of  the  घोषणा  was initially ignored  बाद  the American  क्रान्ति  .
Since  तब  ,  it  has  आइये   to   be   माना  a  प्रमुख  statement on  इंसान  rights  ,  particularly its second  sentence:
we  hold  ये   सच्चाई   to   be  self-evident , that all men  हैं   निर्मित  equal , that they  हैं   endowed  by  उनके  Creator with  निश्चित  unalienable Rights  ,  that among  ये  are  जीवन   ,  Liberty and the pursuit  of   सुख   .
This has  महरूम  called  ``  one  of  the best-known sentences in  the   अंग्रेज़ी   भाषा   ''  , containing `` the most  potent  and  consequential   शब्द  in American history . ''
the  passage  आए  to  represent  a moral standard to which  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   चाहिए  strive .
This view  थी   notably  promoted  by  Abraham Lincoln , who considered the  घोषणा  to be the  न्यास  of his political  दर्शनशास्त्र   ,   और  argued  कि  the  घोषणा   is   a  statement of  सिद्धान्त  through  जिससे   the   संयुक्त  States  संविधान   चाहिए  be interpreted .
It has inspired work  लिये  the rights  of   अधिकारहीन   लोगों   throughout  the world .
chitty   chitty  Bang Bang is  a  1968  अंग्रेजों   musical   फिल्मी   loosely   आधारित  on  इयान  Fleming 's  अनोखा   .
The  फिल्मी   's  script is  by  Roald Dahl and  केन  Hughes and  इसके  songs  by  the Sherman  भाइयो  .
it  stars Dick Van Dyke  as   caractacus   potts   और   सैली   ऐन  Howes  as  Truly Scrumptious  .
The film  थी  directed by Ken Hughes and  उत्पादित   by  Albert R.  ब्रोकोली  ( co-producer of the James Bond series of films ,  भी   आधारित  on Fleming 's novels  )   .
जॉन  Stears supervised the  खास  effects .
Irwin Kostal supervised and conducted the music  ,  while  the   musical  numbers were  मंचन  by  मार्क   breaux  and Dee Dee Wood  .
a   प्रदेश  is arid  जब  it is  characterized  by  a  severe  कमी  of available water  ,   to   the   extent  of hindering or preventing the growth and development  of   संयंत्र  and  एनिमल  life  .
Environments subject to arid climates tend to lack  वनस्पति  and  हैं  called  xeric  or  desertic  .
Most `` arid  ''  climates  घेर  the  equator  ;  ये   स्थान  include most  of  Africa and parts  of  South America  और   सेंट्रल  America .
Cancer ( ♋ )  is   an   astrological  sign ,  जिससे   is   संबद्ध   साथ   the  constellation Cancer  .
it  spans  the  90-120th degree of the zodiac , between  90  and  125.25   उपाधि   of  celestial  देशांतर   ,  which the Sun transits this area on average  between  June 22  to  July 22 each year .
And  अंतर्गत   the  sidereal zodiac ,  it  is currently from July  21  to August  9   .
the  United States presidential  चुनाव   of  1960 was  the  44th  quadrennial  presidential election  ,   आयोजित  on Tuesday  ,  November 8  ,  1960  .
The  रिपब्लिकन   पार्टी  nominated  लाज़िम   vice-president  Richard  निक्सन  ,  जबकि  the Democratic Party nominated John F.  कैनेडी  , Senator from Massachusetts  .
the  incumbent  अध्यक्ष  ,  रिपब्लिकन   ड्वाइट  D. Eisenhower ,  थी  not  योग्य   लिये  re-election after  सेवारत   the   अधिकतम   दो   शर्तें  allowed  by   the  Twenty-second Amendment .
कैनेडी  was  निर्वाचित   साथ  a lead of 112,827  मत   ,   or   0.17  % of  the  popular vote  ,   giving   उसे  a victory  of  303 to  219   in   the  Electoral  कॉलेज   ,   the  closest  चूंकि  1916 .
This was the  पहला   चुनाव   in  which all fifty of the current United  राज्य  participated  .
A  क्रमांक  of  कारकों   बताइये  why  the  election  थी  so  बंद   .
Kennedy gained  चूंकि   वहीँ  was an economic recession  जिससे   ठेस  the incumbent Republican ,  और   he  had the advantage  of  17  लाख  more registered Democrats than Republicans  .
Furthermore  ,   the  new  मत  that Kennedy gained among Catholics  लगभग  neutralized the  नई  votes  निक्सन   gained  among  protestants  .
Kennedy  's  campaigning  कौशल   decisively  outmatched  निक्सन   's  .
in  the end , Nixon 's emphasis on  उसके  experience carried little weight  ,  and he wasted  उर्जा   by  campaigning in  सब  50  राज्य  instead  of   concentrating  on  the  swing  राज्य  .
Kennedy used  उसके   विशाल   ,   well-funded  campaign organization to win  the  nomination , secure endorsements , and ,  साथ  the aid of  the  last of  the  big-city  bosses  ,  to   मिलेंगी  out the vote in the big cities  .
He relied on running  mate   lyndon  B.  जॉनसन   to   थाम   the  South  और  used  टेलीविज़न   effectively  .
This  चुनाव   is  notable as being  the  first time  in   u.S.   इतिहास  that two  बैठे   u.s  . Senators ( Kennedy  और   जॉनसन   )  were  निर्वाचित   as  president and  vice-president  , a  घटना   कि  has been repeated once , by Barack  ओबामा   और   जो   बिडेन   in  2008 ( in both cases , the president was the younger , more junior  सीनेटर  )  .
शेरवुड  is a  नगर  in Washington County , Oregon  ,  United  राज्य  .
Located in the southeast  कोने  of  the   काउंटी  , it is a  आवासीय   जातियाँ  in  the  Tualatin  घाटी  southwest of Portland  .
the   जनसांख्यिकी  was 11,791 at  the  2000  जनसांख्यिकी   .
according   to  the  2010  census  ,  the population was 18,205 residents  .
Indirectly named for  the   शेरवुड   वन   in  England  ,   it  was first  incorporated   in  1893 as a  कस्बा   .
The  यूएसए  PATRIOT  अधिनियम  of 2001  is  an Act of the U.S. Congress  कि   थी  signed  into   विधि  by President George  W.   बुश   on   अक्तूबर  26 ,  2001   .
the  title of  the  act  is   a  ten letter  एक्रोनिम  ( USA PATRIOT )  कि  stands for  uniting  ( and  )   strengthening  America (  by   )  Providing Appropriate Tools Required (  to  ) Intercept  (  and  )  Obstruct Terrorism Act  of  2001  .
The act ,  as   a  response to the terrorist  हमले  of September  11th  ,  significantly  reduced  प्रतिबंध   in   विधि  enforcement agencies '  महफ़िल  of intelligence  भीतर  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ; expanded the Secretary of  the  Treasury’s  प्राधिकार   to  regulate financial transactions , particularly  those   involving  foreign  individuals   और  entities ;  और  broadened the discretion of  विधि   प्रवर्तन  and immigration authorities  in   निमाड़  and  deporting  immigrants suspected of  terrorism-related  acts .
The act also  विस्तारित  the definition  of   आतंक   to   शामिल  domestic terrorism ,  यूँ   enlarging  the number of  क्रियाएँ   to  which  the   यूएसए  PATRIOT Act’s expanded  विधि   प्रवर्तन  powers can  be   लागू  .
on  May  26   ,  2011 ,  अध्यक्ष  Barack Obama used an  autopen  to  चिह्न   the  PATRIOT Sunsets Extension Act of 2011  ,  a  four-year  extension  of   तीन  key  प्रावधानों   in   the  USA  patriot  Act while  he  was in France  :  roving wiretaps  ,  searches  of   कारोबार  records ( the `` library records provision `` ) ,  और   conducting  surveillance of `` lone wolves  ''   —  individuals suspected  of  terrorist-related activities not  linked  to terrorist  समूह  .
रिपब्लिकन  leaders  questioned  if the  उपयोग   of  the  autopen  met  the   संवैधानिक   आवश्यकताएँ  for signing a bill into law  .
a   हाउस   in  Queen  ऐनी  style  at  223 Avenue A .
snohomish  is a  नगर  in Snohomish  काउंटी   ,  Washington , United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was  9,098  at the  2010   जनसांख्यिकी  .
the  mayor of Snohomish is  karen  Guzak ,  और  the City Manager is Larry  bauman  .
Snohomish  prides  itself  लिये   इसके   ऐतिहासिक  downtown ,  और   थी   एकबार  known  लिये  its  अनेक  antique  दुकानें  when it  थी  known  as   the   ``   पुरातन  Capital  of   the   उत्तरपश्चिम  . ''
The historic business and  आवासीय   बीच   of  the  कस्बा  constitutes the Snohomish Historic  ज़िला  ,  जिससे  is listed  on   the   नेशनल  Register of Historic Places .
Many houses  भालू   प्लाक  with  the  year  the  house was  निर्मित   और  the  नाम   of   the  family  or  individual who  originally   occupied  it .
Once  प्रत्येक  year  ,  the  नगर   देता  tours  of   the  historic  घरों  ; one  of   उन्हें   ,  the Blackman  हाउस  ,  is  a year-round museum  .
a  general  विमानन  airfield ,  घनघोर  Airfield  ,  is less than one mile southwest of Downtown Snohomish .
Dave Matthews  बैंड   (   dmb  ) is an American rock band that was formed  in  Charlottesville  ,  Virginia , United States  ,  in 1991 .
the  founding members were  singer-songwriter  and guitarist  डेव  Matthews , bassist Stefan  lessard   ,  drummer /backing vocalist Carter Beauford  और  saxophonist LeRoi Moore  .
Boyd  tinsley  was added to  the   बैंड   as  a violinist soon after the band  थी  formed  .
Moore  died  suddenly  in  August  2008   due   to   जटिलताओं  from  चोटों  sustained in an  atv   दुर्घटना  .
GRAMMY Award -winner Jeff Coffin  of  Béla  fleck  and the  flecktones  has since filled  मूर  's spot  as   the  band 's  saxophonist   .
Rashawn Ross and  टिम   रेनॉल्ड्स  have also  become  full-time  touring  members of  the   बैंड  .
The band  's   2009   एल्बम  Big  whiskey  and  the   groogrux  King  (   the  first album since  मूर  's  मौत  ) debuted at number  एक  on  the   बिलबोर्ड   200  ,  कमाई  the band their fifth consecutive  number-one  debut—  बनाना  them the second  बैंड  behind  मेटालिका  to  do   so  .
उनके   सबसे  recent  एल्बम  ,  दूर  from  the   संसार   ,  was  released   in  2012  ,  and  भी  debuted at number one  on   the   बिलबोर्ड  chart .
As  of   2010   ,  the Dave  matthews   बैंड  has  बेची  over  30   लाख   रिकॉर्ड  worldwide  .
the  band  is  known  लिये  their annual summer-long tours  of   the  United  राज्य  and Europe , featuring  lengthy   improvisational  renditions  of  their  गीतों   ,  accompanied  by   an  elaborate  वीडियो  and lighting show .
This portion of  the  tour  रै   become  a  स्टैम्प   of   dmb  and has  grown   साथ   the   बैंड  since Fenton  विलियम्स  began  working  with  उन्हें  in the  जल्दी   1990s   .
बाद  twenty  लगातार  years  of  touring  the   बैंड  announced that it  होता   लो  the summer of 2011 off  .
Dave  matthews   बैंड  has  जीती  one  ग्रैमी  Award ,  और  was awarded the  naacp  Chairman  's   पुरस्कार   .
According  to   जूलियन  Bond , `` they  बेचें  out the largest  arenas  on Earth  ,  but frequently give their music away .  ''
Transcendental Wild Oats :  a   अध्याय   इससे  an  अलिखित  Romance  is  a prose satire written by  louisa   may  Alcott ,  परिचय  her  परिवार  's involvement with the  transcendentalist  community Fruitlands in  the  early  1840s   .
the  work was first published  in  a  नई   यॉर्क  newspaper  in  1873  ,   और   reprinted  in 1874 , 1876 ,  और   1915  and after  .
In her  खाता   ,  Alcott  provides  the real people  शामिल   साथ   पतला  pseudonymous disguises .
Her  पिता  Amos  bronson  Alcott is `` Abel Lamb  ,  '' while his  संगी  and community co-founder Charles  लेन  is `` Timon  शेर  ;  ''   अबीगैल  May Alcott , Louisa 's mother  और   bronson  's  बीवी  , is ``  सिस्टर   आशा   .  ''
alcott   depicts  her  पिता  as dominated  by  his more  forceful  partner , and both men as feckless  और  impractical  dreamers  .
The men  of   the  community spend  उनके   समय  in pointless  debates  while  सिस्टर  Hope works from dawn to  संध्या  to maintain  उनके   अस्तित्व  .
A crisis  arises  at harvest time ,  जब  the grain crop  is  threatened by an approaching storm .
In  alcott   's  words , `` About the time the grain was ready to  हाउस  , some  कॉल  of  the  Oversoul  wafted   सब   the   मेन  away  .   ''
Sister  आशा   organizes  the  तभी  available  सहायता   ,  three  छोटी   लड़कियों   और  a boy , and manages  to  save the  क्रॉप  .
The little  जातियाँ  collapses as soon as the  मौसम   turns   ठंडा  , when  it  becomes  साफ  that their  प्रावधानों  are too  meager   to  last the coming  शीत  .
Timon Lion  और  his son abscond  to  join the Shakers — though Timon  is  unhappy  to  learn  कि  life  among  them is ``  सब  work  और  no  खेल  . ''
abel   is  crushed by the failure of the enterprise  ;  after days of  despair  he  begins  to eat  again   तभी   जब  he  realizes   कि  his  परिवार  needs him .
Sister Hope finds a way  लिये   उन्हें  to subsist and  persevere  .
Alcott 's view of  पुरूष  arrogance and female exploitation  in   इस  piece is paralleled  in  her novel  ,  published in  the   वही  year as `` Transcendental Wild Oats  .   ''
``  अनुभवातीत  Wild Oats '' has  महरूम  reprinted  in   अनेक   आधुनिक  editions .
माउंट  of the Holy Cross  is   the   northernmost  14,000-foot  पहाड़  in the Sawatch  दायरा  ,  भाग   of  the  रॉकी   kyu   in  Colorado  .
It is located  in   the  Holy Cross Wilderness  निकट   the   भुत  town of  पावन   क्रॉस   नगर   और  in  त्रिभुज  County .
it  was  नामित  for  the  distinctive cross-shaped snowfield  on  the  पूर्वोत्तर  face .
अंतर्गत  USDA  वन  Service administration , the  पहाड़   थी   proclaimed  `` Holy Cross  नेशनल   स्मारक  ''  by  Herbert Hoover on  may   11  ,  1929   .
the  monument was  transferred  to the  नेशनल   पार्क   सेवा  in  1933  .
In  1950  , it was returned to the  वन   सेवा   और  lost  इसके  National Monument status—the number of visitors  to   the  mountain and the nearby  ``  Pilgrim 's  हट   ''  had waned ,  और   the   व्यय  of full-time staff could not be justified  .
This mountain has  महरूम  the subject of  चित्रकार  , photographers and  भी  a poem by Henry  वाड्सवर्थ   लांगफेलो  ,  (  The Cross of Snow  )   .
the  first  सरेआम  available  फोटोग्राफ   थी  published in National Geographic  पत्रिका  .
Thomas  मोरान   चित्रित  the mountain in  an  oil painting  ,  which now is  भाग  of  the   संग्रहण  of the Museum of  the  American West  ,  part  of   the  Autry  नेशनल  Center in Los  एंजिल्स  , California .
It  is   स्टिल  much  photographed  but it  is  not as  खूब  known  आज  as it  थी   in  the  पास्ट   .
Nearby features  शामिल  Bowl  of   आंसू  Lake  ,  directly under the  ईस्ट  face of the  शिखर  , Tuhare  झीलों  ,  in  a cirque that  झूठ  south  of  a  significant   subpeak   ,  and  अनेक  other lakes  .
notable   स्थितियाँ  within include the  dotsero   ज्वालामुखी   (   निकट   अंतरराज्यीय  70 ) , Vail and Aspen  .
US  24   रनों  near the peak through  gilman   .
Photochrom  छपाई   of  Mount of  the  Holy Cross c.  1900   .
This image is  a   reversed  view of  the   पहाड़  compared  to  how  it   दरअसल   appears  .
The  पहला  recorded ascent of  पावन   क्रॉस   थी   in   1873   ,  by  F.  V. Hayden and  फ़ोटोग्राफ़र   W.  H.  जैक्सन  during one of  hayden   's  geographical surveys  .
However , the  शिखर   may   खूब   have  been ascended  previously   by  miners or  अमरीकी  Indians .
the  first  शीत  ascent of the  शिखर  was  बना  in  1943  by  russel  Keene  और   हावर्ड   freedman  of the 10th Mountain Division , then stationed at  शिविर   hale   .
Holy  क्रॉस  can be climbed by at  तनिक  four different routes  ,  with  the   easiest  and  सबसे  common route  होने  the North Ridge  ,   जिससे   involves   of   लंबवत  gain  over  and is  रेटेड  YDS  क्लास  2  लिये   मॉडरेट  scrambling .
The  क्रॉस  Couloir route  फ़ॉर्म  the  लंबवत  portion  of  the  प्रसिद्ध   क्रॉस  feature , and provides an advanced snow climb or extreme  स्की  descent  .
माउंट   of   the  Holy Cross  रै   a  history of  endangering  the lives  of   अनेक  hikers  .
primarily  , the hikers who  आवश्यकता   बचाव  are unfamiliar with  the  risks  of   प्रवेश   wilderness   क्षेत्रों  and  do  not bring  पर्याप्त  equipment and  आपूर्तियाँ  to  respond   to  emergency conditions  .
Although  the  summit  on   माउंट  of the Holy Cross is frequently reached on a  long   दिन  hike  ,  unprepared hikers are frequently stranded or lost  due  to  बदलना   पर्यावरणीय   शर्तें  and confusion  regarding  the  surrounding  landscape  ,   विशेषकर   on  the  descent  of North Ridge .
thorough  research  और  reasonable planning should prevent most  tragedies   .
माउंट  of the  पावन  cross is  accessible  from Tigiwon Road , south of  minturn  , Colorado .
the   हाफ  Moon  pass  Trail is the standard  रूट   to  the summit of Mount of the Holy  क्रॉस  via the  उत्तर  Ridge .
following   the   पतन  Creek Trail to  an  ascent  of  Notch Mountain  ट्रेल   provides   the  best view of the  पावन   क्रॉस  snow feature  इससे  Notch  पहाड़   लकीरें   .
The  जीएसएम   लोगो  is used to  पहचानो  compatible  handsets   और  equipment
जीएसएम   (   वैश्विक  System for Mobile Communications  ,   originally   '  )  ,  is  a  standard set  विकसित  by the European  दूरसंचार  Standards Institute (  etsi  ) to describe  प्रोटोकॉल   लिये  second generation  (  2G  )   डिजिटल   सेल्यूलर  networks  प्रयुक्त   by   मोबाईल   फोन   .
It  became  the  de  facto global standard for mobile  संचार  with over 80 %  मार्केट  share  .
The  जीएसएम  standard  थी   विकसित   as  a replacement  लिये   पहला  generation  (   1g  ) analog  सेल्यूलर  networks , and originally  वर्णित   a  digital ,  सर्किट   switched   संजाल  optimized for  पूरा  duplex  आवाज़   telephony  .
This was expanded  over   समय  to include data communications , first  by  circuit  switched  transport  ,  then  पैकेट  data  हस्तांतरण  via  gprs   (  General Packet  रेडियो  Services ) and EDGE ( Enhanced  आंकड़ा   दरों  for GSM Evolution or EGPRS  )   .
Further improvements  यहूद  made when the 3GPP developed third generation (  3g  )  umts  standards followed by  चौथी  generation  (  4G )  lte   उन्नत  standards  .
`` GSM '' is a trademark  स्वामित्व  by the GSM  संघ  .
अध्यक्ष   फ्रैंकलिन  D.  रूज़वेल्ट  signs  the  Lend-Lease bill to give aid  to  Britain and  चीन   (  1941  )
The  lend  Lease act  थी   an   अधिनियम  where  the  United States had  समर्थित  its  allies  .
lend-lease  ( )  थी  the law that started a program under which the  संयुक्त   राज्य  of America supplied the  संयुक्त   किंगडम  , the USSR , Republic of China  ,  Free France  ,   और  other  अलाइड  nations with  materiel  between 1941 and 1945 .
it  was signed  into  law on  कूच   11  ,  1941  , a year  और  a half after the outbreak  of  World  युद्ध   ii  in  यूरोपीय  in September  1939  .
This  थी  nine months before  the  U.S. entered the war in  दिसम्बर  1941  .
Formally  titled   an  Act to Further Promote  the  Defense of  the   संयुक्त  States , the Act  effectively  ended the United States  '  pretense  of  neutrality .
A  कुल   of  $  50   .1  billion  (  equivalent  to  $ today  )  worth of supplies were shipped : $ 31.4 billion  to   ब्रिटेन  , $ 11.3 billion to  the  Soviet  संघ  ,  $  3.2  अरब  to  फ़्रांस  , $  1.6  billion  to  China , and  छोटी   रकम  to other  allies   .
Reverse Lend-Lease  comprised  services such as rent  on   एयर  bases  कि  went to the U.S. ,  और  totaled $ 7.8 billion ; of this  ,   $   6.8  billion  आए  from the  अंग्रेजों   और  the  राष्ट्रमंडल  .
The  शर्तें  of  the  agreement  provided   कि   the  materiel was to be used until time for their return or  विनाश  .
Supplies  बाद  the termination date were sold to Britain  at  a large  छूट   लिये  £1 .075  अरब   using   long-term  loans from the United  राज्य  .
कनाडा  operated a  समान  program that  भेजा   $  4.7 billion in  आपूर्तियाँ  to the United Kingdom and the Soviet  संघ  .
The United States  किया  not charge  लिये  aid  supplied   अंतर्गत   इस   विधान   .
इस  program was  a  decisive step  दूर   इससे  non-interventionist  नीति  ,  जिससे  had dominated United  राज्य   विदेशी  relations  चूंकि  the end of World  युद्ध  I  ,   towards  international involvement .
the  Jerusalem artichoke ( Helianthus tuberosus ) , also  पुकारा  sunroot  ,  sunchoke ,  धरती   ठहराना  or  topinambour  ,  is  a  प्रजाति  of sunflower  देशी   to  eastern  उत्तर   अमेरिका  ,  और  found from  पूर्वी   कनाडा  and Maine west to North  डकोटा  , and  दक्षिण  to northern  फ्लोरिडा  and Texas  .
It is  भी  cultivated widely  आरपार  the  शीतोष्ण  zone for its  tuber  ,  जिससे  is used as  a  root vegetable .
Castillo San  फेलिप   डेल  Morro  भी  known  as   फोर्ट  San Felipe del Morro  or   morro   किला  ,  is  a  16th-century   citadel   स्तिथ  in San  जुआन  ,  प्यूर्टो   रीको  .
Stonehenge  is   a  prehistoric monument in  विल्टशायर  ,  इंग्लैण्ड  , about west  of   amesbury   और  north  of  Salisbury .
One of the most famous sites  in  the world  ,  Stonehenge is the  remains  of a ring  of   खड़ा  stones set within  earthworks  .
It is in the  मध्य  of  the   सबसे  dense complex of Neolithic  और  Bronze Age monuments  in  England ,  सहित   अनेक  hundred  दफ़न   mounds  .
Archaeologists believe it  थी   निर्मित  anywhere from 3000 BC  to   2000   bc   .
radiocarbon  dating in 2008  सुझाया  that  the  first stones  यहूद  raised between 2400  और  2200  bc   ,   whilst  another  सिद्धान्त  suggests  कि   bluestones  may have been raised at the  साईट  as  जल्दी   as  3000 BC  .
The surrounding  गोलाकार  earth bank and ditch  ,   जिससे  constitute  the  earliest  phase  of the monument  ,  have been dated  to  about 3100  bc   .
The site  और  its surroundings were  added  to the  युनेस्को  's list  of  World Heritage  साइट   in  1986 in  a  co-listing with Avebury  henge   .
It is a  नेशनल  legally  सुरक्षित  Scheduled Ancient Monument .
Stonehenge is  स्वामित्व  by the Crown and managed by English  विरासत  ,  जबकि   the  surrounding land is owned  by   the   नेशनल  Trust .
Archaeological evidence  मिला  by  the   stonehenge  Riverside Project  in   2008   indicates   कि   stonehenge   could   have   महरूम  a burial ground from  इसके  earliest beginnings  .
The  डेटिंग   of  cremated remains found on the  साईट  indicate that  जमा   contain  human bone  इससे  as  जल्दी  as 3000 BC  ,   जब  the ditch and  बैंको   यहूद  first dug  .
ऐसे   जमा   जारी   at  Stonehenge  लिये  at least  another   500  years .
the   साईट  is a place of religious significance  और  pilgrimage  in  Neo-Druidry .
The  ncaa   महिलाओं  's Division I  चैंपियनशिप   is   an   सालाना  college  बास्केट  tournament  लिये  women  .
आयोजित   प्रत्येक  April , the  महिलाओं  's Championship was  उदघाटन  in the 1981–82  ऋतु  .
The NCAA tournament  थी   preceded  by the AIAW Women  's  Basketball  टूर्नामेंट   ,  which was  आयोजित   annually  from 1972 to 1982  .
बास्केट  was one of twelve  महिलाओं   's  sports added to  the  NCAA championship  कार्यक्रम  for  the  1981-82  स्कूल  year  ,  as the  ncaa   सगाई   in   बैटल  with  the   संघ  for Intercollegiate Athletics for  महिलाओं  for  एकमात्र  governance  of   महिलाओं   's  collegiate sports .
the  AIAW continued  to  conduct its established championship  कार्यक्रम  in  the  same  बारह  (  और  other )  खेल  ; however , after a  साल  of  डुअल  women 's championships ,  the  NCAA prevailed ,  जबकि   the  AIAW disbanded .
Attendance and  ब्याज  in  the  Women  's   प्रभाग  I Championship have grown  over  the  सालो  ,  विशेषकर   चूंकि   2003   ,  when the final championship  खेल   थी  moved  to   the  Tuesday following the Monday men  's   चैंपियनशिप  game  .
the  women 's  चैंपियनशिप   खेल  is now the  फाइनल   overall  game of the  कॉलेज   बास्केट  season .
पहले   कि  ,  the  Women 's  फाइनल   चार  was  प्रायः  played  on   the   शुक्रवार   पहले  the Men  's  Final  चार   or   the   घंटों  before  the  men played  on  the  फाइनल  Saturday  of  the  टूर्नामेंट   .
the  final was usually played the  संडे   दोपहर   following  the  मेन   's  Final Four .
The  टूर्नामेंट   कोष्ठक  is made up of  champions  from each Division I  सम्मेलन   ,  which  प्राप्त  automatic  बोलियों   .
the   बाकी  slots are  at-large  bids , with teams chosen by  an  NCAA selection  कमेटी   .
The selection process and  टूर्नामेंट   seedings   हैं  based on several factors , including team  rankings  , win-loss records  और  Ratings  प्रतिशत  Index  (  RPI )  आंकड़ा  .
नापसंद  the  मेन   's   टूर्नामेंट   ,   वहीँ  are only 32  at-large   बोलियों  ( as  of  the next tournament  in  2014 ) , and no play-in  खेल  .
the   महिलाओं  's tournament ,  जैसे  the  मेन  's  ,  is staged in  a   सिंगल   विलोपन  format , and  is   भाग   of  the media  और  public frenzy  ज्ञात  colloquially  as  March  दीवानगी  or  the   बिग   नृत्य  .
सब  63 games  have   महरूम  broadcast  on  television since 2003 on ESPN  और  ESPN2 .
Similar  to  the pre-2011 men 's tournament  कवरेज  on CBS , local teams  हैं  shown  on   प्रत्येक   चैनल  when available  ,   साथ   ``  whip-around  ''  coverage  designed   to   शोकेस  the  सबसे   प्रतिस्पर्धी   प्रतियोगिताओं   in   the  rest  of  the country  .
The  rosetta   स्टोन  in  the  British  संग्रहालय
The Rosetta Stone is an  प्राचीन   मिश्र  granodiorite stele inscribed  साथ   a  decree  जारी  at Memphis  in  196  bc   on   निमित्त  of King  टॉलेमी  V .
The  डिक्री  appears in  तीन  scripts : the  अपर   टेक्स्ट   is  Ancient Egyptian  चित्रलिपि  , the  मध्य   portion  Demotic script  ,   और  the  न्यूनतम   प्राचीन  Greek .
Because it presents  essentially   the  same  टेक्स्ट   in   सब  three scripts ( with  कुछ   नाबालिग  differences between them  )   ,   it   provided  the key  to  the  आधुनिक  understanding  of  Egyptian hieroglyphs  .
Originally displayed  भीतर  a temple ,  the  stone was probably moved during  the   जल्दी  Christian  or   मध्यकालीन  period and eventually  प्रयुक्त   as   भवन   सामग्री   in   the  construction of Fort Julien near the  कस्बा  of Rashid  (  Rosetta ) in the  nile  Delta  .
It was rediscovered there in  1799  by a soldier ,  pierre-françois  Bouchard ,  of   the   फ्रेंच  expedition to Egypt .
as  the first  प्राचीन  Egyptian bilingual  टेक्स्ट  recovered in modern times  ,  the Rosetta Stone aroused  फैली  public  ब्याज   साथ  its potential to  decipher   इस   hitherto   untranslated   प्राचीन   भाषा   .
Lithographic copies  और   प्लास्टर  casts  began  circulating among European museums  और   विद्वानों   .
meanwhile   ,   अंग्रेजों   सैनिकों  defeated  the  French in Egypt  in   1801  , and  the  original stone  आए  into British possession under the Capitulation of  एलेक्जेंड्रिया   .
Transported to London ,  it  has been on  पब्लिक   प्रदर्शक  at  the  British Museum since 1802  .
It is the  most-visited  object in  the  British Museum .
Ever since its rediscovery , the stone has been  the  focus  of  nationalist rivalries , including its transfer  इससे   फ्रेंच  to British  कब्ज़ा  during the  napoleonic  Wars  ,  a long-running  विवाद  over the relative  मान  of  यंग  's  और   champollion  's  योगदान   to  the  decipherment   ,  and since 2003 ,  मांगे  for  the   स्टोन  's return to Egypt .
पढ़ाई   of  the  डिक्री  was already under  रास्ता  as  the   पहला  full  अनुवाद   of   the   यूनानी   टेक्स्ट  appeared in 1803 .
It  थी   20   सालो  ,  however  , before  the  transliteration of the Egyptian scripts  थी   घोषित  by Jean-François  champollion  in Paris  in  1822 ; it took  longer  still  पहले  scholars were  समर्थ   to   पढ़ा   प्राचीन  Egyptian  inscriptions  and literature  confidently   .
प्रमुख  advances  in  the  डिकोडिंग   यहूद   :   मान्यता   कि  the stone  offered   तीन  versions of the same text (  1799  ) ;  कि   the   demotic  text  प्रयुक्त  phonetic  वर्ण   to   वर्तनी  foreign names ( 1802  )  ;  कि   the  hieroglyphic  टेक्स्ट  did so  as   खूब  , and  था   pervasive   similarities  to the demotic ( Thomas Young  ,   1814   )  ; and  कि   ,   in   जोड  to  होने   प्रयुक्त  for  विदेशी  names , phonetic characters  यहूद  also used to spell  देशी  Egyptian  शब्द   (  Champollion  ,  1822–1824  )  .
Two other fragmentary  नक़ल   of  the  वही  decree  यहूद   खोजा   बाद  , and several similar Egyptian  दुभाषिया   or  trilingual inscriptions  हैं  now known  ,  including  दो   थोड़ा  earlier Ptolemaic  डिक्री  (  the   डिक्री   of  Canopus in  238  BC  ,  and the  मेम्फिस  decree of Ptolemy  iv   ,   ca  .  218  BC ) .
The  rosetta  Stone is therefore no  longer   अद्वितीय  ,  लकिन  it was the  अनिवार्य   कुंजी  to modern  समझना  of Ancient Egyptian  साहित्य  and civilization  .
The term  rosetta  Stone  is   अभी  used in  अन्य   contexts  as the  नाम  for  the  essential  सुराग   to  a new field of  ज्ञान  .
Poison dart frog  (  also dart-poison frog  ,   ज़हर  frog or formerly  ज़हर   तीर  frog  )   is  the common name of a  समूह   of  frogs in the  परिवार   dendrobatidae   जिससे  are  देशी   to  Central  और   दक्षिण  America .
These species  हैं   diurnal   और  often have brightly colored bodies  .
Although all wild dendrobatids are  at  least  somewhat   विषाक्त  ,  स्तर  of  toxicity   vary  considerably from one  प्रजाति  to the  अगला   और  from one population to another  .
अनेक   प्रजाति   हैं  threatened .
These amphibians  हैं   प्रायः   पुकारा  `` dart frogs '' due to the Amerindians ' indigenous use of  उनके  to  ज़हर  the  नुस्ख़े  of  blowdarts  .
However , of over  175   प्रजाति   ,  only four  have  been documented as  होने  used for this purpose  (   curare   पौधे   हैं  more commonly  प्रयुक्त  ) , all of  जिससे  come  इससे  the  phyllobates  genus  ,  which is  characterized  by  the  relatively  विशाल   आकार   और   ऊँची  levels of toxicity of its members  .
Cajeta  is  a Mexican confection  of  thickened syrup usually made  of   sweetened  caramelised milk  .
According to  शेफ़  Rick  bayless   ,   the  name for cajeta  आए  from the Spanish phrase al punto de cajeta  ,   जिससे  means  ``   a  liquid thickened  to   the  point at which a spoon  drawn  through  the  liquid  reveals   the   नीचे  of  the   घट  in  जिससे  it  is   होने   पकाया  '' .
another   परिकल्पना  is that  it  takes its name from the small wooden boxes  in   जिससे  it  थी  traditionally packed .
मैक्सिकन  cajeta  is  considered a specialty  of   the  city of  celaya   in  the state of Guanajuato ,  हालांकि  it is also  उत्पादित   साथ   the  traditional method  in  several towns of  the  state of  jalisco   ,  such as Mazamitla , Sayula ,  और   atotonilco  el Alto .
Cajeta is made by simmering goat 's milk  ,  or  occasionally   a  sweetened  द्रव   ,  stirring frequently , until it  becomes   बहुत  viscous  due   to  evaporation  of  water , and caramelized  .
While goat milk is the most usual  आधार   ,   अन्य   liquids  or juices may  be  used  .
In Celaya  ,  and eventually  the  rest  of  Mexico  ,  the confection  of  half goat 's  मिल्क   और  half  गाय  's  मिल्क  became known  by   the  name  cajeta  ,  लकिन   elsewhere  ,  the  milk candy  became   ज्ञात   as  leche  quemada  , dulce  de  leche ,  इत्यादि  .
it  has cousins in the many  भारतीय  milk-based sweets  जैसे  pera  और  the  मिल्क  fudge  burfi   ,   और   in  the  ओपेरा  fudge  of  the  u.S.  Cajeta  is  eaten on  इसके  own as a  मीठी  ,  as  a  स्प्रेड  or filling  लिये  breads and pastries , such  as  churros , and as a topping for  बर्फ  cream .
Certain liquors are added to special recipes  पुकारा  cajeta envinada  .
in  addition ,  cajeta  envinada  especial  is  समृद्ध   साथ  raisins ,  बादाम  ,  pecans  or  nuts  .
Often  it  is used  as  a topping for crêpes , as a sweet sauce boiled  और  softened  bas  with milk to  soak   the  crepes  ,  resulting in  a  tasty dessert  .
in  Mexico many brands  मेक   cajeta  but the most common brand is  coronado   .
It is also very  आम  to place cajeta between obleas  to  make  a  traditional Mexican dessert  .
प्रिंस   विलियम  ,  ड्यूक  of  कैम्ब्रिज  (  विलियम  Arthur  फिलिप  Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ) ,  is   the   elder  son of  चार्ल्स  ,  प्रिंस  of Wales  ,  and  डायना  , Princess of Wales  ,  and third-eldest grandchild of  महारानी  Elizabeth II and  प्रिंस   फिलिप   ,  Duke of Edinburgh .
He  is  second in the line of  उत्तराधिकार  , behind his father ,  to  the thrones  of  sixteen  स्वतंत्र   sovereign  states  ज्ञात   as  the  राष्ट्रमंडल  realms :  the  United  किंगडम   ,   कनाडा  ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  ,  नई   जीलैंड   ,  Jamaica ,  बारबाडोस   ,   the  Bahamas ,  हरा   ,   पापुआ   नई  Guinea ,  the   सुलेमान   आइलैंड्स  , Tuvalu  ,  Saint Lucia ,  संत  Vincent and  the   grenadines  , Belize  ,  Antigua and Barbuda  ,  and Saint Kitts and  नेविस  .
Prince William was  शिक्षित   at  four  स्कूलों  in  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom  और  obtained a  उपाधि  from  the  University  of  St  एंड्रयूज  .
He spent parts  of   a  gap  साल   in   चिली  , Belize , Tanzania , and Kenya  जहाँ  he  रै  lived and holidayed several times .
प्रिंस  William  रै  also taken  kiswahili  studies at universities in Kenya  और  Tanzania  .
he  was commissioned  as   a   लेफ्टिनेंट   in  the Blues  और   रॉयल्स  Regiment of the  household  Cavalry —serving  साथ   उसके  brother Prince  हैरी   —and  , two years later ,  अर्जित  his wings by completing pilot training at Royal Air Force College Cranwell .
In 2009  ,  he transferred to  the   royal  Air  फ़ोर्स  , was promoted  to  Flight Lieutenant and underwent helicopter flying training  in  order to become a  full-time  pilot  साथ   the  Search  और  Rescue  फ़ोर्स   .
in  2010 ,  he   समाप्त   उसके   सामान्य  and special-to-type helicopter  प्रशिक्षण  and went  on  to RAF Valley  on  No  .  22  स्क्वाड्रन   performing  co-pilot duties on  फलक  a Sea  किंग  search and rescue  हेलीकाप्टर  .
Prince William  शादीशुदा   उसके   longtime   गर्लफ्रेंड  , Catherine  मिडलटन  , on  29   अप्रैल  2011 at Westminster Abbey  .
Hours prior to his  विवाह   ,  Prince William was  निर्मित  Duke  of  Cambridge , Earl  of  Strathearn  ,   और   सामन्त  Carrickfergus .
Mali is a  बहुभाषी  country .
the  languages  बोला   वहीँ  reflect ancient settlement patterns , migrations  ,   और   इसके   long  history  .
Ethnologue  रिश्तो   50  languages  .
of   ये  ,  फ्रेंच   is  the  आधिकारिक  language  और   bambara  is the  सबसे  widely  बोला  .
Altogether 13 of  the   स्वदेशी   भाषाएं  of  माली  have the legal status  of   नेशनल   भाषा  .
चिह्न  in  फ्रेंच  ,  at  a monument  in   बमाको   .

Rogers  भवन  , the headquarters of  रोजर्स  Communications
रोजर्स  Communications Inc. is  a   diversified   पब्लिक  Canadian communications and media company .
It is  विशेषकर  in the field of wireless communications  ,  cable  टेलीविज़न   ,   टेलीफोन  , and Internet connectivity  साथ  significant  अतिरिक्त  telecommunications and mass media  एसेट  .
the  company is headquartered  in   the   रोजर्स   भवन   in   टोरंटो  , Ontario .
The  कम्पनी   दावा  the heritage  of   the  Rogers Vacuum Tube  कम्पनी  , founded  in   1925  by Edward  रोजर्स   ,   जिससे   प्रारंभ   the  CFRB radio station  in  Toronto  ,  which  थी  later  acquired   by   बाहर  interests  .
The present enterprise dates  to   1960  , when  रोजर्स  '  बेटे   ,  Ted  रोजर्स  , founded Rogers Radio  प्रसारण   ltd  .
कि   कम्पनी   acquired   chfi   कि   साल   ,  as  खूब   as  Aldred-Rogers  प्रसारण   ,   a   साझेदारी  with  जोएल   aldred  which helped launch CFTO in  1961   .
रोजर्स   बाद  bought out  aldred  and started the current  केबल   और   बेतार  operations , known  as   रोजर्स   cablesystems   ltd  .
The  मुख्य  competitor to the company  is  Bell Canada , which has a similarly extensive portfolio  of  radio  और  television media assets , as well as  बेतार  , television  वितरण  ,  और  telephone services  ,  particularly in Eastern  और  Central  कनाडा   ;  the two companies  हैं  often  देखी   as   having  a duopoly  on   संचार  services in  उनके   regions  .
however  ,  the  company also competes nationally  साथ   telus  for wireless services ,  और  primarily indirectly with Shaw Communications for television  सेवा   .
The  कम्पनी  also competes with  a  number of  अन्य  media companies  in  the  प्रसारण   उद्योग  .
The Internet is a  वैश्विक  system  of   interconnected   कंप्यूटर  networks  कि   उपयोग   the  standard Internet  प्रोटोकॉल   सुइट  (  tcp/ip   )   to  serve  अरबों  of users  विश्वव्यापी  .
It  is  a network  of  networks that  consists   of   लाखो   of  private ,  पब्लिक  , academic , business ,  और   सरकारी  networks ,  of  local to global scope  ,  that are  linked  by  a  broad array  of   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   ,   बेतार   और   ऑप्टिकल   नेटवर्किंग   technologies   .
The Internet carries an extensive range of information  संसाधन   और   सेवाएं   ,   ऐसे   as  the  inter-linked   हाइपरटेक्स्ट   दस्तावेज़   of   the  World Wide Web ( WWW  )  and  the  infrastructure  to   support  email  .
सबसे  traditional  संचार  media including  टेलीफोन   ,   म्यूज़िक  , film , and  टेलीविज़न  are  होने  reshaped or redefined by the Internet  ,  giving  जनम   to  new services  ऐसे  as voice  over   अंतरजाल  Protocol (  voip   )  and Internet Protocol television (  iptv   )   .
Newspaper ,  किताब  and  अन्य  print publishing  हैं   adapting  to  वेब  site technology ,  or  are  reshaped  into blogging  और   वेब   फ़ीड्स  .
The  अंतरजाल   रै  enabled  और  accelerated  नई  forms of human  interactions  through instant messaging , Internet  forums  ,  और  social networking  .
Online shopping  रै  boomed both for major  खुदरा  outlets and  छोटी  artisans and traders  .
business-to-business  and  वित्तीय   सेवाएं   on   the  Internet  affect  supply chains across entire industries .
The  origins   of  the Internet  पहुँचें  back to research commissioned  by  the United  राज्य  government in  the  1960s to  निर्माण   मजबूत  ,  fault-tolerant   संचार  via  कंप्यूटर  networks .
The funding of a  नई   u.S.   रीढ़  by the  नेशनल   विज्ञान   न्यास  in  the  1980s , as well as private  funding  for other  वाणिज्यिक  backbones ,  led   to  worldwide  भागीदारी  in the development of new networking technologies  ,   और  the merger  of   अनेक  networks  .
the   व्यावसायीकरण  of what was  by  the 1990s  an   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  network  resulted  in  इसके   popularization  and incorporation into virtually every  पहलू   of  modern  इंसान  life .
,  अधिक   than   2.4   अरब  people—over a  तीसरा  of  the   संसार   's  human population  —have  used the  सेवाएं   of  the Internet  ;  approximately  100   टाइम्स  more people  than  were  using  it in  1995   ,  when it  थी  mostly  प्रयुक्त   by  tech-savvy middle and upper  क्लास  people  in   the  United  राज्य  and several other countries .
The Internet has no  centralized  governance in either technological implementation or policies  लिये  access and usage ;  प्रत्येक  constituent network sets its  अपना   नीतियों  .
तभी   the   overreaching  definitions of  the   दो  principal name  स्पेसेस  in the Internet ,  the  Internet  प्रोटोकॉल   पता   स्पेस   और  the  डोमेन  Name  प्रणाली  ,  हैं  directed by  a   maintainer  organization  ,  the Internet  निगम  for Assigned Names and  संख्याएँ  (  icann  )  .
The  तकनीकी  underpinning  और   मानकीकरण  of the core protocols (  ipv4   और   ipv6  )  is  an activity of the Internet Engineering Task Force ( IETF  )  , a non-profit organization  of  loosely affiliated international  भागीदार  that anyone  may   संबद्ध  with by contributing  तकनीकी   विशेषज्ञता   .
The  2006   शीत  Olympics ,  officially   ज्ञात  as the XX Olympic Winter Games ,  थी   a  winter  multi-sport   इवेंट  which was celebrated  in   टोरीनो  ,  इटली   इससे  February 10 ,  2006   ,  through  फ़रवरी  26 ,  2006   .
इस   चिह्नित  the  दूसरी  time  इटली  hosted the  ओलम्पिक   शीत  Games ,  the   पहला  being the VII  ओलम्पिक  Winter  खेल  in Cortina d'Ampezzo  in   1956  .
इटली   भी   hosted  the  खेल  of  the  XVII  ओलंपियाड  in  रोम  in 1960 .
Turin was  चयनित   as  the host  नगर  for the 2006  खेल   in  1999 .
The  आधिकारिक  logo  प्रदर्शित   the   नाम   ``  Torino ''  ,  the Italian name of the city ;  the  city  is  known as ``  टोरीनो  '' in both  अंग्रेज़ी   और   the  local  परंपरागत   भाषा  , Piedmontese .
the  Olympic  mascots   of   टोरिनो   2006  were Neve  (   ``  snow  ''   in  Italian  )  , a female  स्नोबॉल  , and  gliz  , a  पुरूष  ice cube  .
The  आधिकारिक   motto  of  the   xx   ओलम्पिक   शीत   खेल  was `` Passion lives  यहाँ   ''   .
`` Help  !   ''  is  a   सोंग   by   the  Beatles that served  as   the  title song for  दोनो   the   1965   फिल्मी  and its  साउंडट्रैक  album  .
it   थी  also  released  as a  सिंगल  , and  थी  number  एक  for three weeks in both  the  United States and  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom .

Siegfried Bing  (   26  February  1838  – 6  सितंबर   1905  ) , who  प्रायः   दिया  his  नाम   as  S. Bing , and was  यूँ   प्रायः  referenced  erroneously   as  `` Samuel Bing ''  (  Samuel  ओटो  Bing , 1850–1905  ,  was his  bhai  ) was a German  आर्ट   डीलर  who lived in  पेरिस  as  an   वयस्क  ,  और  who helped introduce Japanese art and artworks  to   the  West and was a  फ़ैक्टर  in the  विकास  of  the  Art  देवानंद   स्टाइल  during the  लेट  nineteenth century .
Comparison  of   पुरूष   और  female  जीवन  expectancy  at  birth for countries  और   territories   as  defined  in  the  2011   सीआईए   factbook  , with  चयनित  bubbles labelled  .
the   बिंदीदार  line  corresponds  to equal female  और  male life expectancy  .
