kennewick  is a  नगर  in  benton  County  in   the   southeastern  part of the  u.S.   राज्य  of Washington , near the Hanford  नाभिकीय   साईट   .
It  is  the most populous of  the   तीन  cities  collectively   referred   to  as the  tri-cities  ( the others  होने   pasco  and Richland ) .
kennewick  is  स्तिथ   साथ   the  southwest bank of  the  Columbia  नदी   ,   विपरीत  Pasco  और  just  दक्षिण   of  the  संगम  of  the   कोलंबिया  and Yakima rivers  .
The population  थी  73,917  at   the  2010 census .
April  1  , 2012 estimates from the  वॉशिंगटन   राज्य  Office of Financial Management  put   the  city 's population at  75,160   .
The  निकटतम   वाणिज्यिक  airport  is   the   tri-cities  Airport in Pasco ,  a  regional  वाणिज्यिक  and  निजी  airport  .
Forbes  पत्रिका  named  kennewick  the  #  2  क्षेत्रफल  in the United States for job  विकास  , while  आसपास  Yakima  थी   नामित  # 1 .
The  आलेख   cites  the number of scientists  employed   by  the  प्रशांत  Northwest National Laboratory  और  area farmland  लिये   इस   आउटलुक   .
The prothrombin  समय  (  pt  )  और  its derived  उपायों  of  prothrombin  ratio  (  PR ) and international  सामान्यीकृत  ratio (  inr  )  हैं   उपायों   of  the extrinsic  pathway  of coagulation  .
This test is  भी  called ``  protime  INR  ''  and  ``  PT/INR '' .
They are  प्रयुक्त  to  determine  the clotting tendency  of  blood  ,   in  the measure of warfarin dosage , liver damage  ,  and vitamin K  औकात   .
pt  measures  कारकों   i  (  फाइब्रिनोजेन  ) ,  ii  ( prothrombin )  ,  V ,  सात  ,  और  X .
It  is  used in conjunction with  the  activated partial thromboplastin  समय  ( aPTT ) which measures  the   मूलभूत   pathway   .
`` I 'm  in  the Mood  लिये  Love '' is  a   लोकप्रिय   सोंग   .
the   म्यूज़िक   थी   लिखा   by  Jimmy  mchugh  ,  the   गीत   by  Dorothy Fields  .
the  song  थी  published  in  1935  .
It  थी   introduced  by Frances Langford  in  the  फिल्म  Every Night  at   आठ   released  that  साल  .
The  सोंग   थी  featured  in  the 1936 Our Gang  (  Little Rascals ) short  ,   the  Pinch  सिंगर   ,   सुंग  by Carl  ``  Alfalfa  ''  Switzer ,  और  in  the   1936  film Palm  स्रोतों  .
It is  प्रायः  known to be Switzer 's signature song  .
जेम्स  Moody 's saxophone  सोलो   on  a  1952  recording of this song inspired  the  song  ``  Moody  's   मनोदशा   लिये  Love  ``  .
हिप   हॉप  artist Prince Paul sampled the song as the basis for the track  ``   मनोदशा   लिये   प्रेम  '' on his album A Prince  among   चोरों  ( 1999  )  ,  साथ  Don Newkirk singing its  असली  lyrics .
the   सोंग  's title  प्रेरित  the English  शीर्षक  of Wong Kar Wai  's  movie  in   the  Mood for Love .
Cross-cultural psychology is  the   वैज्ञानिक  study of human behavior and  दिमागी   प्रक्रियाओं  , including both  उनके  variability  और  invariance ,  अंतर्गत  diverse  सांस्कृतिक  conditions  .
through  expanding research  methodologies  to  recognize  cultural  variance  in  बर्ताव  ,  भाषा  ,  और  meaning it  seeks   to  extend and develop  मनोविज्ञान   .
Since psychology as  an  academic  अनुशासन  was  विकसित  largely  in  North  अमेरिका  ,  कुछ  psychologists  became   चिंतित  that  constructs   स्वीकृत  as  सार्वभौमिक   यहूद  not  as   निश्चर   as   previously   assumed  ,  विशेषकर   चूंकि  many attempts to replicate notable experiments in  अन्य   संस्कृतियों  had varying  कामयाबी  .
चूंकि  there  हैं   सवाल  as  to   whether  theories  dealing  with  सेंट्रल  themes , such  as   affect  ,  संज्ञान   ,  conceptions of the self  ,  and issues  ऐसे   as  psychopathology , anxiety , and depression , may  कमी  external validity when  ``  exported  ''  to other cultural contexts  ,   cross-cultural   मनोविज्ञान   re-examines  them using methodologies designed to  फ़ैक्टर   in   सांस्कृतिक  differences  so   as   to  account  लिये  cultural variance .
Although some critics  have  pointed to  methodological  flaws  in  cross-cultural psychological research and  अर्जी  that  गंभीर  shortcomings in the theoretical and methodological bases  प्रयुक्त  impede rather  than  help the scientific search  लिये   सार्वभौमिक  principles in psychology , cross-cultural psychologists  हैं   turning  more to  the  study of  कैसा  differences  (  variance ) occur ,  बल्कि   than  searching  लिये   universals   in  the  स्टाइल   of  physics or  रसायन   .
In 1972 the International Association of  cross-cultural   मनोविज्ञान   (  IACCP )  थी  established .
इस  branch of psychology has continued to  विस्तार   as  there  रै   महरूम  an increasing  लोकप्रियता  of incorporating  संस्कृति  and diversity into  अध्ययन  .
cross-cultural  psychology  is   differentiated  from  सांस्कृतिक  psychology  .
the   latter  is  the  branch of psychology that holds that  इंसान  behavior is significantly influenced  by  cultural differences , meaning  कि  psychological  phenomena  can  तभी  be compared with each other  आरपार  cultures  to   a  very limited extent .
In  कंट्रास्ट   ,   cross-cultural   मनोविज्ञान   शामिल  a search  लिये   संभावित  universals in behavior and  दिमागी   प्रक्रियाओं  .
Walter J. Lonner  ,   लिखने  for Eye  on  Psi  ची  ,  रै  stated that `` cross-cultural  मनोविज्ञान  can be  विचार   of   as  a  प्रकार   शोध  methodology  ,  rather than  an   entirely   पृथक   फ़ील्ड   भीतर   मनोविज्ञान  ( 2000 ) . ''
`` Judas ''  is   a  song by American  रिकॉर्डिंग  artist  महिला   गागा   ,   इससे   उसके   दूसरी  studio  एल्बम   born  This Way  (  2011  )  .
It was released  by  Interscope Records on  अप्रैल  15  ,   2011   ,   चार   दिनों   ahead  of its  अनुसूचित   रिलीज  .
लिखा  and  उत्पादित   by  Lady Gaga  और   redone  , `` Judas  ''  is  a   नृत्य  and  इलेक्ट्रो  house song  परिचय  a woman in love with a  man  who  गद्दारी  her .
It  embodies  the incidents that  have  haunted  गागा  in  the  past , and  इसके   कोर  meaning  refers  to the negative parts of her life that she  ca  n't escape  .
Gaga  रै  further  समझाया  that the song  थी  also  परिचय  honoring one  's   भीतरी   अंधेरा   in  order to bring oneself into  the   लाइट   .
the  artwork  लिये  the single was designed by  गागा   in   microsoft  Word  .
in   spite  of a polarizing  प्रभाव  on several  धार्मिक   समूह  , the song  थी  generally well received  by  critics ,  जो  likened the song to  ``  Bad  रोमांस  `` with some noting it  चाहिए  have been  the  album  's  lead  सिंगल  .
the   सोंग   रै  a  समान   ध्वनि  to Gaga 's  पिछला  RedOne-produced  ट्रैक्स  , including  ``  Poker Face `` ,  ``  LoveGame `` , ``  ख़राब  Romance  ''  , and `` Alejandro `` .
it   contains  three  पृथक  hooks and  a   हाउस  -influenced  ब्रेक   bas   .
Gaga explained  कि  the lines  बोला   दौरान   the   विश्लेषण   बात  about  उसके   as  beyond  मोचन  , regarding the  परंपरागत  views  of   कया   a  woman should be .
`` Judas  ''  initially had a strong sales opening , but  थी  less successful commercially in  तुलना  to  गागा  's previous  singles  .
The song reached the top  टेन   of   the  charts in  सबसे   प्रमुख  music markets , and also reached  the  top  of  the charts in  दक्षिण  Korea .
a  music  वीडियो  for the song was filmed in April  2011  ,  co-directed   by  Gaga and Laurieann Gibson and  co-starring   नॉर्मन  Reedus .
It has  a   biblical   कथानक  where Reedus played  यहूदा   इस्कैरियट   और   गागा  played  मरियम   magdalene   .
The  वीडियो  portrays them  as  modern  दिन  missionaries going  to   जेरूसलम  .
It included  the  Biblical story  of   यहूदा  betraying Jesus ,  और   ended  with Gaga as  magdalene   getting  stoned to death  .
पहले   इसके   रिलीज  , the Catholic League condemned Gaga  लिये  the alleged  उपयोग  of religious  imagery   और   उसके  role in  the  video  .
However , critics  generally  praised the video , not finding any  अप्रिय   सामग्री   .
The  वीडियो   थी   मनोनीत   लिये   दो  awards at the 2011  एमटीवी  Video  म्यूज़िक  Awards .
गागा  has performed  ``   यहूदा  ''  on  a  क्रमांक  of television shows  ,  including The  ग्राहम   नॉर्टन  Show , Saturday Night  सजीव  , Good Morning  americas  `` Summer  कॉन्सर्ट  Series '' , the French  x   फ़ैक्टर   as   खूब  as on The  एलेन  DeGeneres  दिखाएँ   .
H.264/MPEG-4  भाग   10  or  avc  ( Advanced  वीडियो  Coding  )  is a  मानक  for video compression  ,   और  is currently  एक  of the most  commonly  used formats for  the   रिकॉर्डिंग   ,  compression ,  और   वितरण  of  ऊँची  definition video .
The final  drafting   कार्य  on  the  first version of  the  standard was  समाप्त  in May 2003 .
H.264/MPEG-4 AVC  is   a  block-oriented  motion-compensation   -आधारd   कोडेक  standard developed  by   the  ITU-T  वीडियो  Coding  विशेषज्ञ   समूह  ( VCEG  )  together with the  iso/iec   jtc1   चलती  Picture  विशेषज्ञ  Group  (  MPEG ) .
The  प्रोजेक्ट  partnership  प्रयत्न   is   ज्ञात  as  the  Joint  वीडियो   टोली  ( JVT )  .
the   itu-t   h.264   मानक   और  the ISO/IEC MPEG-4 AVC  मानक   (  formally , ISO/IEC 14496-10  –   mpeg-4  Part 10 , Advanced Video Coding ) are jointly  कायम   so  that  वे   have   एकसमान   तकनीकी   सामग्री  .
H.264 is perhaps best  ज्ञात  as being  एक   of  the  कोडेक  standards for Blu-ray Discs ;  सब  Blu-ray  डिस्क  players must  be  able  to  decode  h.264  .
it   is   भी   widely   प्रयुक्त   by   स्ट्रीमिंग   अंतरजाल  sources  ,  such as videos  इससे   vimeo  ,  youtube  , and the iTunes Store ,  वेब   तन्त्र   ऐसे   as   the  Adobe Flash Player and Microsoft Silverlight ,  और  also  विभिन्न  HDTV broadcasts over  स्थलीय  ( ATSC ,  isdb-t  , DVB-T or  dvb-t2   )  ,  केबल  (  dvb-c  ) and satellite ( DVB-S and DVB-S2 ) .
Non-binding arbitration is a type  of  arbitration in which  the  arbitrator  makes  a determination of  the   अधिकारों   of  the  पार्टियों  to the  विवाद  ,  लकिन  this determination is  नहीं   बाइंडिंग  upon  उन्हें   ,   और   no  enforceable  मध्यस्थता   पुरस्कार  is issued .
the   ``  award ''  is   in   प्रभाव   an   सलाहकार  opinion of  the  arbitrator  's  view  of   the  respective  merits  of  the  parties  मामले  .
Non-binding arbitration is used  in  connection  साथ  attempts to reach  a  negotiated  उपनिवेश  .
The  भूमिका  of an  arbitrator  in  non-binding  arbitration is , on the surface ,  समान  to that of a  मध्यस्थ   in  a mediation .
however  , the  प्रिंसिपल   भेद   is   कि   whereas  a mediator will  कोशिश  to help  the  parties find  a  middle ground to compromise  at  , the arbitrator remains totally  removed  from the  उपनिवेश  process and will  तभी  give a determination of liability and ,  if   उचित  , an  indication   of  the  क्वांटम  of damages  देय  .
Subsequent to  a   non-binding  arbitration , the  पार्टियों  remain  फ़्री  to  pursue  their claims either through the  न्यायालयों  , or by way of  a  binding  मध्यस्थता   ,   हालांकि   in   अभ्यास  a  उपनिवेश  is the most  आम  outcome  .
the  award and reasoning  in  a  non-binding  arbitration  is  almost  invariably  inadmissible  in   कोई  subsequent action  in  the  न्यायालयों   or  in another arbitration  ट्रिब्यूनल   .
Non-binding  मध्यस्थता   is   utilised  mostly in  the  United States and  कनाडा  .
It is  largely   अनजान  in Europe , although in  the  United Kingdom there is a practice of  पार्टियों  who  हैं   seeking  a settlement to jointly instruct a  महारानी  's  counsel   लिये   an  opinion on the merits and  संभावित  quantum of  a   अर्जी   ,   और  then to negotiate  on   the   आधार   of  the views  expressed  in that opinion .
अगस्टाइन  Volcano is a Lava  गुम्बद  Complex on Augustine Island  in   southwestern  Cook  इनलेट   in  the Kenai Peninsula  बरो  of southcentral coastal  अलास्का  ,  दक्षिणपश्चिम  of Anchorage .
The  अलास्का   ज्वालामुखी   वेधशाला  currently rates  माउंट  Augustine as Level of Concern  रंग   कोड   ग्रीन  for aviation and  the   ज्वालामुखी  Alert  स्तर  is at  सामान्य  .
अगस्टाइन  Island  रै  a land area  of  , while West Island  ,   बस   बंद  Augustine 's  पश्चिमी  shores , has .
The island  is   बना  up mainly  of  past eruption deposits  .
Scientists  have  been able to  discern  that past  गुम्बद   पतन  has  resulted   in   विशाल   avalanches  .
A  मैप  of Belize  .
the  country of Belize has  roughly  386 km  of  coastline  ,  and has many coral reefs , cays ,  और  islands in the Caribbean  समुद्र   .
Most of these form the Belize Barrier Reef  ,  the  longest   in  the western hemisphere stemming  लगभग  .
the  reef and its islands  have  been  a  UNESCO World  विरासत   साईट   चूंकि  1996  .
The  following   is  a list of  oceanic  islands of  बेलीज़  ,  arranged  according to region  लकिन   सब   of  which  हैं  in the Caribbean Sea  .
सबसे  of the  आइलैंड्स   variate  in  स्पेलिंग   between   ``   cay   ''  and ``  caye  ''  ,   और  also use the  स्पेनी  ``  cayo   ''  .
River islands have  नहीं  been listed  .
Drive  अक्षर  Access  (   dla   )   is  a  discontinued  commercial packet  लिखने  application for the Microsoft Windows  ऑपरेटिंग  system that allows optical disc data  भंडार  devices  to  be used in a  manner  similar  to  floppy  डिस्क   .
dla  is a  पैकेट   लिखने  technology for CD  और  DVD media  कि  uses the UDF  संचिका  system .
DLA  is  not  संगत   साथ  Windows Vista  और  newer , although a  पैच  exists  to   फिक्स  this issue under  खिड़कियाँ   विस्टा  .
roxio  Burn  थी   introduced   on  April  30   ,   2009  .
as  a  बदलना   लिये  DLA  ,   it  remedies compatibility issues  अंतरजाल  Explorer 8 .
Alpha Rex Emmanuel  humbard  (  अगस्त  13 ,  1919  – September 21 ,  2007  )  थी  a  well-known   अमरीकी  television evangelist  जिनकी  Cathedral of Tomorrow show was shown  on  over  600  stations at the peak  of   इसके  popularity .
असीमित  is a 2011  अमरीकी  thriller  फिल्मी   निर्देशित   by  Neil Burger and starring  ब्राडली  Cooper , Abbie  cornish  ,  और  Robert  de  Niro  .
it  is based on  the   2001  novel  the  Dark Fields by Alan  glynn   साथ  the screenplay  by   लेस्ली   डिक्सन  .
Alaska (  )  is a  राज्य   in   the  United  राज्य   ,  situated in the northwest extremity of the  उत्तर  American  महाद्वीप  , with  the  international  boundary   साथ  Canada to the east  ,   the   आर्कटिक  Ocean to the  उत्तर  ,  और   the  Pacific  समंदर  to  the   वेस्ट   और   दक्षिण  ,  साथ   रूस  further west  आरपार  the Bering Strait .
Alaska is the  largest  state in the  संयुक्त  States  by   क्षेत्रफल   ,   the  4th least populous and  the  least  densely   आबादी   of  the  50  United States .
Approximately half  of  Alaska  's  731,449  निवासियों   सजीव   भीतर  the Anchorage metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  .
अलास्का  's  अर्थव्यवस्था  is dominated by  the   आयल  , natural gas  ,  and  फ़िशिंग   उद्योग   ;   it   रै   ये   संसाधन  in abundance .
Alaska was  खरीदा  from Russia on March 30  ,   1867  ,  लिये  $  7.2  million ( $ adjusted for inflation  )   at   लगभग  two  सेंट   प्रति  acre (  $  4.74/km2 ) .
The land went  through  several administrative  परिवर्तन   पहले  becoming an  व्यवस्थित  (  or   incorporated  )  territory  on  may  11 , 1912 , and  the   49th   राज्य  of the  u.S.   on  January 3 ,  1959   .
The name `` Alaska  ''   (   аляска  ) was already  introduced  in the  रूसी  colonial  काल  , when it  थी  used only for the peninsula and  is  derived from the  aleut  alaxsxaq , meaning  ``  the mainland '' or  ,  more  वस्तुतः  ,  ``   the   ऑब्जेक्ट  towards which  the   कार्रवाई   of   the  sea  is   निर्देशित  ''  .
It  is  also  ज्ञात   as   alyeska  , the  ``   ग्रेट   जमीन  '' ,  an  Aleut  शब्द  derived from  the   वही  root .
Nelson Mandela Metropolitan  विश्वविद्यालयों   (   nmmu  ) is a South African  tertiary  education  संस्था   साथ   इसके   प्रमुख   प्रशासन   in   the   तटीय  city  of   बंदरगाहों  Elizabeth .
A merging of  तीन  institutions  संस्थापित   nmmu  in January  2005  but its  इतिहास   तिथियाँ  back  to  1882 with  the  foundation of  बंदरगाहों   एलिज़ाबेथ  Art School .
the   विश्वविद्यालयों   draws  international students  इससे  all over  the  world .
There  हैं  over  3000   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  students  और  include students  इससे   the  United  राज्य  , France  ,  China  ,  Germany  ,  Belgium ,  डेनमार्क  ,  फिनलैंड  ,  नीदरलैंड्स   ,   नार्वे  ,  स्वीडन  , United  किंगडम   और  many other countries .
nmmu   is   a  comprehensive  विश्वविद्यालयों  offering professional  और  vocational training .
The University has six campuses  -   पाँच  in  बंदरगाहों   एलिज़ाबेथ  and  एक  in George .
the  main campus is the  दक्षिण  Campus .
Students  at   nmmu   can  study towards  diplomas  and degrees up to  और   सहित  doctoral  स्तर  qualifications .
A number of  पाठ्यक्रम   शामिल  workplace  अनुभव  as  भाग  of  the   curriculum   .
CoverGirl is  an  American  कॉस्मेटिक्स  brand founded in Maryland , by  the   noxzema  Chemical  कम्पनी   (   बाद   पुकारा   noxell   )   और   acquired   by  Procter & Gamble in 1989 .
the  Noxell  कम्पनी  advertised this cosmetics line  by  allowing  ``  cover  लड़कियों   ''  ,  फ़ैशन   मॉडल  who  appear  on  the  front cover  of  women  's   मैगज़ीन   ,  to  पहनें   इसके   उत्पाद  .
CoverGirl makes up for  कमी  of  सीधा  individual  ग्राहक  service by  providing  a wide variety  of  cosmetics available at  उचित  prices  .
On  the  Origin of Species  ,  published on 24  नवम्बर   1859   ,  is a work of scientific literature  by  Charles  डार्विन   जिससे   is  considered  to   be   the   न्यास   of  evolutionary  जीवविज्ञान   .
Its  पूरा  title was On  the   उत्पत्ति  of Species  by   अर्थात्  of  प्राकृतिक   चयन  ,  or  the  संरक्षण  of  favoured   दौड़  in the Struggle for Life .
लिये   the  sixth edition of 1872 , the short title  थी  changed to The Origin of  प्रजाति  .
डार्विन  's book  introduced  the  वैज्ञानिक   सिद्धान्त   कि   populations  evolve  over  the course of  पीढियां  through a  प्रक्रम   of  natural  चयन  .
It  प्रस्तुत   a   देह   of   प्रमाण   कि  the  विविधता  of  जीवन   arose   by  common  descent   through  a  branching   पैटर्न  of evolution  .
डार्विन  included evidence  कि   he  had gathered  on   the  Beagle expedition  in  the 1830s  और  his subsequent findings  इससे  research ,  पत्राचार  , and  experimentation  .
विभिन्न  evolutionary ideas had already  महरूम   प्रस्तावित  to  बताइये  new  निष्कर्षों  in biology .
वहीँ  was  growing   support  for such ideas among  dissident   anatomists   और  the general public , but  दौरान   the   पहला  half  of  the 19th century  the   अंग्रेज़ी  scientific  स्थापना  was closely tied  to  the Church  of  England , while science was part  of  natural theology  .
Ideas about  the  transmutation of  प्रजाति   यहूद   विवादास्पद  as they conflicted with the beliefs that species were unchanging parts of  a   designed   पदानुक्रम  and that humans were  अद्वितीय  , unrelated to  अन्य  animals  .
the  political  और  theological implications  यहूद  intensely  debated  , but  transmutation   थी  not  स्वीकृत   by   the   वैज्ञानिक   मुख्यधारा  .
The  किताब  was  लिखा  for  non-specialist  readers and  आकर्षित   फैली   ब्याज   upon  its  प्रकाशन  .
as   डार्विन  was  an  eminent scientist  ,  his findings were taken seriously and the evidence he presented generated scientific  ,  philosophical , and  धार्मिक  discussion .
The debate over the book contributed to the campaign by T.H .  हक्स्ले  and his  fellow  members of  the   x   क्लबों   to  secularise science  by   promoting   वैज्ञानिक   naturalism   .
Within two  दशकों   वहीँ  was widespread scientific agreement  कि  evolution , with a branching pattern  of   आम   descent  ,  था  occurred  ,  but  वैज्ञानिकों  were  slow  to give  प्राकृतिक  selection the significance  कि   डार्विन   विचार  appropriate .
दौरान  the ``  ग्रहण   of   डार्विनवाद  `` from the 1880s to  the  1930s  ,   विभिन्न  other  mechanisms  of evolution  यहूद   दिए  more  क्रेडिट   .
साथ  the development of  the  modern evolutionary  संश्लेषण   in  the 1930s  और  1940s  ,  Darwin 's concept of  विकासवादी  adaptation through natural selection became central to modern  विकासवादी  theory , now the  unifying   अवधारणा  of the  जीवन   sciences  .
चार्ल्स  Dillon ``  केसी  ''  स्टेंगल  ( ;  जुलाई   30  ,  1890  – September  29  ,  1975  ) , nicknamed `` The Old Perfessor ''  ,   थी   an   अमरीकी  Major League  बेसबॉल   outfielder   और  manager  .
He was elected to  the   बेसबॉल  Hall of  कीर्ति   in  .
Stengel was born in  कान्सास   नगर   ,  Missouri ,  और   originally  nicknamed  ``   डच   ''   ,  a common nickname  at  that time for Americans of German ancestry .
बाद  his major  लीग  career began  ,   he   acquired   the   उपनाम  `` Casey  ''   ,   जिससे  originally  आए   इससे   the   आद्याक्षर   of  his hometown  (  ``  K.  C.  ''   )  , which evolved  into  ``  केसी  '' , influenced by  the   चौड़ी   लोकप्रियता   of  the poem  केसी  at  the   चमगादड़  .
in   the  1950s , sportswriters  उतावले   उसे  with yet  another  nickname  ,  `` The  बूढ़ा  Professor  ''  (  or   ``  Perfessor ''  )  , for his  शार्प  wit and his ability  to   बात   at   लंबाई  on anything  बेसबॉल  -related .
हालांकि  his  बेसबॉल  career  spanned   a   क्रमांक  of  टीमों  and  शहरों   ,  he is primarily associated with  क्लब  in New  यॉर्क  City  .
Between playing and managing  ,   he  is the only  man   to  have  worn  four  of   नई  York 's  प्रमुख  league clubs  '   वर्दी  .
He was the first  of   चार   मेन   (  through the season  )   to  manage  दोनो  the New York Yankees  और  New York Mets  ;  Yogi Berra , Dallas  ग्रीन   ,  and  जो  Torre are  the   अन्य  .
Like  टोरेस   ,   he  also managed the  braves  and the Dodgers  .
he  ended his baseball  करियर  as the  beloved  manager  लिये  the  तब   विस्तार   नई  York  मेट्स  ,  जिससे  won over  the  hearts  of  New York partly due to the unique  अक्षर  of  उनके   दिग्गज  leader  .
June ( ) is the  छठे  month  of  the  साल   in   the  Julian and  gregorian   पंचांग  and  एक   of  the four months  साथ   a  length  of  30 days  .
Ovid provides two etymologies  लिये  June  's   नाम  in his  कविता  concerning  the   महीने   हकदार  the  fasti  .
the   पहला  is that the month  is  named  बाद  the Roman goddess  juno   ,  wife of  बृहस्पति  and equivalent  to   the   यूनानी  goddess Hera  ;  the  दूसरी  is that the name  आता  from  the   लैटिन  word iuniores ,  अर्थ  `` younger ones , ''  as  opposed  to  maiores  (  `` elders '' ) for which  the   preceding   माह  May may  be   नामित  ( Fasti VI.1–88 ) .
देखिए   :  Months in  विभिन्न   पंचांग  also called  the  season  of   the  June is  the   माह  with the longest  daylight   घंटों   of  the year  in   the   उत्तरी  Hemisphere and the  shortest  daylight  घंटों  of  the   साल   in   the  Southern Hemisphere .
जून   in  the Northern  गोलार्ध  is  the   मौसमी  equivalent to December  in   the  Southern  गोलार्ध  and vice versa .
In the Northern  गोलार्ध   ,   the  beginning  of  the  meteorological   गर्मियाँ  is  1  June .
in   the   दक्षिणी   गोलार्ध   ,  the  शुरूआत  of  the  meteorological  शीत   is   1  June  .
At  the   प्रारंभ  of June ,  the  sun rises in the  नक्षत्र  of  वृष  ;  at  the end of  जून   ,   the  sun  उदय   in   the   नक्षत्र  of  मिथुन   .
However  ,   due  to the precession of the equinoxes  ,   जून  begins with the sun  in   the   astrological   चिह्न  of  मिथुन  , and  ends  with the  सूर्य  in the astrological  चिह्न  of Cancer .
June  is   ज्ञात  for  the  large number of marriages  कि  occur  over   the  course of the month  .
according  to one  etymology  , June is  नामित   बाद  Juno  (  Hera )  .
Juno  थी  the  देवी   of   विवाह  and a married couple 's household  ,   so  some  consider  it  शुभ   लक   to   be  married in  इस  month  .
According  to   another  etymology provided  by   the  Roman  कवि  Ovid , June  is  named  लिये   the   iuniores  ,  लैटिन   लिये  `` young people '' (  fasti  VI.88 )  और   कि   the   माह   of   may  is named for  the   maiores  ,  लैटिन  for ``  बड़ो  '' .
in   आइसलैंड  , folklore says  कि  if you bathe  नग्न  in the morning dew on the  morning  of  जून  24 , you are  supposed  to  रखना   वृद्धावस्था   at  bay for  longer   .
a  constitution is  a  set of fundamental principles  or   स्थापित   precedents  according  to  which  a  state or  अन्य   संगठन   is  governed .
These rules together make up , i.e  .   constitute   ,   कया   the  entity is  .
When these principles are written down  into   a  single document or  नियत  of  विधिक  documents , those documents may  be   कहा  to embody a  लिखा   संविधान  ;  if   वे   हैं   लिखा  down  in   a  single comprehensive  दस्तावेज़   ,  it  is  said to  embody  a codified constitution .
Constitutions concern different levels of organizations  ,  from  sovereign  states  to  companies  और   unincorporated  associations  .
A  सन्धि   जिससे   establishes  an international organization is  भी  its constitution , in that it would define how that organization is constituted  .
Within states ,  whether  sovereign or federated , a  संविधान  defines the  सिद्धान्त   upon  which the  राज्य   is  based , the procedure in which  कानून  are made  और  by  जिसको  .
कुछ  constitutions  ,  especially  संहिताबद्ध   constitutions   ,   भी  act  as   limiters  of state power ,  by  establishing  लाइनों   जिससे   a  state 's rulers can not cross ,  ऐसे   as  fundamental rights .
George Washington  at   संवैधानिक   सम्मेलन   of   1787  ,  हस्ताक्षर   of   u.S.  Constitution  .
the   संविधान   of  India  is  the  longest   लिखा  constitution of  कोई  sovereign  देश  in  the   संसार   ,  containing  448   आलेख  ,  12  schedules and 100 amendments  ,   साथ   117,369  words in its English language  संस्करण  , while the  संयुक्त  States  संविधान  is the  shortest  written constitution ,  at   7   आलेख  and 27 amendments .
Ron Diftler  (   बाएँ  )  ,   नासा  Robonaut  मैनेजर  assisting in  a  Robonaut familiarization training session  in   the   स्पेस  Environment  सिमुलेशन  Laboratory at  नासा   's  Johnson Space  बीच   .
अभियान्त्रिकी   प्रबन्धन   is  a  specialized   रूप   of   प्रबन्धन  that is concerned with the application  of   अभियान्त्रिकी   सिद्धान्त  to business practice .
Engineering management  is  a  करियर   कि   brings  together the  technological  problem-solving  savvy  of  अभियान्त्रिकी  and the organizational , administrative  ,  and  नियोजन  abilities  of   प्रबन्धन   in   अनुक्रम   to  oversee  जटिल  enterprises from conception to  पूर्णता   .
उदाहरण  areas of  अभियान्त्रिकी   हैं   उत्पाद   विकास  , manufacturing , construction  ,   डिज़ाइन  engineering , industrial engineering ,  प्रौद्योगिकी   ,   उत्पादन   ,   or  any  अन्य  field  कि   employs  personnel  जो  perform an  अभियान्त्रिकी  function .
कामयाब   अभियान्त्रिकी  managers typically  आवश्यकता   प्रशिक्षण   और  experience in business and  अभियान्त्रिकी  .
technically  inept  प्रबंधक   tend  to be deprived of  support  by  उनके   तकनीकी   टोली  ,  और   non-commercial  managers  tend  to  कमी  commercial acumen to deliver  in  a market economy .
Largely ,  अभियान्त्रिकी   प्रबंधक  manage  इंजीनियर्स  who are driven by non-entrepreneurial thinking  ,   यूँ   आवश्यकता   the   जरुरी   लोगों  skills to coach ,  mentor  and  motivate   तकनीकी  professionals  .
Engineering  पेशेवर  joining manufacturing companies sometimes become  अभियान्त्रिकी   प्रबंधक   by  default after  a  period  of  time  .
They are required to learn how to  मैनेज  once  वे  are  on  the job  ,   हालांकि   इस  is  प्रायः   an   अप्रभावी   रास्ता  to  develop  managerial abilities  .
In an  बीमे   नीति  ,  the  deductible is the  राशि  of expenses that must  be  paid  आउट  of pocket  पहले  an insurer will pay  कोई   खर्च  .
in  general  उपयोग  , the  पद  deductible may  be   प्रयुक्त   to  describe one  of  several types  of  clauses  (  see below ) that are used by  बीमे  companies as a  दहलीज   लिये   नीति  payments .
Deductibles are typically  प्रयुक्त  to  deter  the  विशाल   क्रमांक  of  नगण्य  claims that a  उपभोक्ता   can  be reasonably expected  to  bear the cost of .
By restricting its coverage to events  कि  are  significant  enough  to  incur large  लागत  ,  the   बीमे   कड़   expects   to  pay  आउट   थोड़ा  smaller amounts much less frequently ,  रूष्ट   much  higher savings  .
As a  परिणाम  ,  बीमे  premiums are typically  सस्ता   जब   वे  involve higher deductibles .
Deductibles  हैं   सामान्यतः  provided as  clauses   in  an  बीमे  policy that dictate how  much  of an  insurance-covered  expense  is   borne  by the  policyholder  .
वे  are normally quoted as a fixed  मात्रा   और   is   a   भाग  of  सबसे   नीतियों  covering  नुकसान   to  the  नीति   होल्डर  .
The insurer then becomes liable  लिये  claimable  खर्च  that exceed this amount ( subject to  the   अधिकतम  sum claimable indicated in the  अनुबंध  )  .
Depending  on   the  policy ,  the  deductible  may   लागू   प्रति  covered incident , or  प्रति   साल  .
लिये  policies where  incidences   हैं  not easy  to  delimit ( for example health insurance ) , the  deductible   is  typically applied  प्रति   साल   .
Several  deductibles  can be set  by  the insurer based on  the  cause  of  the  अर्जी  .
For example , a single  आवास   बीमे   नीति   may  contain multiple deductible amounts  लिये  loss  or   क्षति  arising  इससे   चोरी  , fire , natural  calamities  ,  निकासी   इत्यादि   .
वहीँ   हैं  also deductible reimbursement programs that reimburse  a   deductible  in  the  event of  an   स्वचालित   ,  home , boat/yacht or  स्वास्थ्य   बीमे  claim .
an  invoice or  विधेयक   is   a   वाणिज्यिक   दस्तावेज़  issued by a seller to  a  buyer ,  indicating   the  products , quantities  ,   और  agreed prices for products or services the seller  रै   provided  the buyer  .
an  invoice  indicates   the  sale transaction only .
Payment terms  हैं   स्वतंत्र  of  the  invoice and are negotiated  by   the   खरीदार  and the seller  .
Payment terms  हैं  usually included on the invoice  .
the  buyer could have  already   सशुल्क   लिये  the products or  सेवाएं  listed  on   the  invoice .
Buyer  can  also have a maximum number of days in  जिससे   to  pay for  ये  goods and is sometimes offered a discount if paid  पहले  the due date .
In  the   rental  industry , an  चालान   जरूर  include a specific  सन्दर्भ   to  the duration of the time  होने   billed   ,  so in addition  to  quantity , price and  छूट  the invoicing  राशि  is  भी   आधारित   on  duration  .
generally  each  लकीर  of a rental invoice  होगा  refer  to  the actual hours  ,  days , weeks  ,   महीने  ,  etc.  , being  billed   .
From the  पाइंट   of  view of a seller ,  an  invoice is  a  sales invoice  .
इससे  the point of  दृश्य   of   a  buyer , an invoice is  a  purchase invoice  .
the  document  indicates   the  buyer and seller ,  लकिन  the term invoice indicates  धन   is   owed   or  owing .
In English , the  कॉन्टेक्स्ट   of   the   पद   चालान  is usually used to clarify its meaning ,  ऐसे  as  ``   we   भेजा  them an invoice  ''   (  they owe us  धन   )  or  ``   we   प्राप्त  an invoice from  उन्हें   ''   (   we   owe   उन्हें  money ) .
the  right main bronchus ( or right primary bronchus , or right principal bronchus )  is  a  bronchus   of   the   respiratory  system .
It is wider  ,   shorter  ,  और   अधिक  vertical in  दिशा  than  the  left .
it  is about 2.5  cm  long  ,   और  enters the right lung nearly opposite the fifth thoracic vertebra  .
The azygos vein  arches  over it  इससे   पीछे   ;   और  the right pulmonary  धमनी  lies at  पहला   नीचे  and then  in   सामने   of  it .
About  2   cm   इससे   इसके  commencement  it  gives off  a  branch  to   the  upper lobe of the  सही   फेफड़ों  .
इस  is termed the eparterial branch  of  the  bronchus   ,  because it arises above the  सही   pulmonary  artery .
The bronchus  अभी   गुजरता  below the  धमनी  ,  और   is   ज्ञात   as  the hyparterial branch ;  it  divides into two branches for the middle  और  lower lobes  .
If a foreign  देह  in the airway  गुजरता   through   the  trachea ,  it  will  सबसे   संभावित  enter the  सही  main bronchus  बजाय  of the  बाएँ  ,  due   to  the  straighter  alignment of  the  right bronchus to the  श्वासनली  .
स्क्वैश  is a  racquet  sport played by  दो  (  singles  )  or   चार  players (  युगल  ) in a  four-walled  court with a small  ,  hollow rubber  बॉल  .
The players must alternate  in   striking  the  बॉल  with  उनके   racquet   और   hit  the  बॉल  onto the playable  सतहों  of the four walls of the court .
The  खेल  was formerly  पुकारा  squash  racquets   ,  a reference  to  the `` squashable '' soft  बॉल  used in the game ( compared  साथ  the fatter ball  प्रयुक्त   in   इसके   जनक  game  racquets  or  rackets  )  .
Squash is recognized by  the  IOC and  समर्थक  are lobbying for its  incorporation   in   a   भविष्य  Olympic  कार्यक्रम   .
in   2003   ,  Forbes  रेटेड  squash  as   the   क्रमांक  one  healthiest  sport to  खेल  .
Residual oil is oil  मिला  in low  एकाग्रता   naturally  or  in   बेहाल   आयल  fields .
प्रायः  mixed with  जल  , it can not  be  recovered  by  conventional techniques .
However ,  it   can   be   बरामद   using  carbon  dioxide-enhanced   आयल  recovery (  co2   eor   )   जिससे   involves  injecting carbon  डाइऑक्साइड   into  the well reducing viscosity and enhancing flow of the oil  .
The technique is not  नई   लकिन   रै   नहीं  been used extensively on  अवशेष   आयल  zones , low-grade deposits  of  petroleum such as the 38  वर्गाकार  miles  in   the  Permian Basin  of   टेक्सास  leased by  elliott  Roosevelt  jr   .
The technique  is  limited  by   उपलब्धता  of  कार्बन   डाइऑक्साइड  .
It does not result  in  sequestration  of   the  carbon dioxide  लकिन   the  gas  is  recycled  as  much  as   संभावित   .
संयुक्त   राज्य   reserves   of   अवशेष   आयल   हैं  estimated to  be  100 billion  barrels   .
कलाकार  's  रेंडरिंग  of  the   आग   ,  by John  R.  Chapin  ,   originally   मुद्रित  in  हार्पर   's   साप्ताहिक  ; the view faces northeast  आरपार  the Randolph Street  सेतु   .
The Great Chicago Fire was a conflagration  कि   burned  from Sunday ,  अक्तूबर   8  , to early Tuesday , October  10  , 1871  ,   हत्या   सैंकड़ों  and destroying about  in   शिकागो  ,  इलिनोइस  .
हालांकि  the fire was  एक   of   the  largest  u.S.  disasters  of   the  19th  सदी   ,  the  पुनर्निर्माण  that began  helped  develop Chicago  as   एक  of  the  most populous and economically  महत्वपूर्ण  American cities  .
Henry  viii   (  28  जून  1491  –   28  January 1547  )   थी   किंग  of  इंग्लैण्ड  from  21   अप्रैल  1509  जबतक  his death .
He was lord , and  बाद  king  ,  of  आयरलैंड  , as  खूब  as  continuing   the   नाममात्र   अर्जी   by  the  अंग्रेज़ी   monarchs   to  the Kingdom of  फ़्रांस   .
Henry was the  दूसरी   monarch  of the Tudor  राजवंश   ,  succeeding his father ,  हेनरी  VII  .
Besides his six marriages  ,  Henry VIII is  ज्ञात  for his role in  the   विरह   of   the   गिरिजाघर  of England  इससे   the  Roman  कैथोलिक  Church  .
Henry 's struggles with  रोम  led to the  विरह  of  the   गिरिजाघर  of England from  papal   प्राधिकार  , the  विच्छेद  of the  monasteries  , and his own  स्थापना  as the Supreme Head  of   the  Church  of  England .
Yet he remained a believer in  कोर  Catholic  theological  teachings , even after his excommunication  इससे  the Roman Catholic Church .
Henry  oversaw  the legal union  of  England and  वेल्स  with the Laws in Wales  अधिनियमों  1535 and  1542  .
In 1513  ,  the  नई  king  अलाइड   साथ  the  पावन  Roman Emperor ,  maximillian  I  ,  and invaded France  in   1513  with  a   विशाल  , well-equipped army  ,  but  हासिल   छोटी  at  a  considerable financial  लागत  .
maximillian   ,   लिये  his part , used  the  English invasion  to  his own  ends  , and  इस   prejudiced   इंग्लैण्ड  's  क्षमता  to  शिकस्त   the  French .
This foray  होता  prove  the   प्रारंभ   of  an obsession  लिये  Henry  ,  who invaded again in 1544  .
This time  ,   हेनरी   's  forces  captured  the  महत्वपूर्ण  city of Boulogne ,  लकिन   again  the Holy  रोमन   सम्राट  ,  चार्ल्स   v  , supported  हेनरी  only as  long   as  he  needed  to and  इंग्लैण्ड  ,  strained  by  the  enormous  लागत  of  the  war , ransomed  the  city  वापस   लिये   सलाम   .
His contemporaries considered Henry in  उसके   प्रधान  to be  an  attractive  ,   शिक्षित  and accomplished  किंग   ,  and  he  has  महरूम  described as `` one  of  the most  charismatic   शासकों   to   बैठना  on  the  English throne ''  .
Besides  सत्ताधारी  with absolute  शक्ति   ,  he also  सगाई  himself as an author  और   composer  .
His desire to provide  इंग्लैण्ड   साथ  a  पुरूष  heir –  जिससे  stemmed partly from  निजी  vanity and partly because he believed  a   बेटी   होता   be   असमर्थ  to  consolidate  the  ट्यूडर  dynasty  और   the  fragile peace that existed following the  युद्धों   of  the  गुलाब  – led to the  दो   बाते   लिये  which  हेनरी  is most  remembered  :  उसके  six marriages  और   the   अंग्रेज़ी  Reformation .
हेनरी   became  morbidly obese and  उसके   स्वास्थ्य  suffered  ,  contributing to his death  in  1547  .
he   is   अक्सर  characterised in his  बाद   जीवन   as  a lustful ,  egotistical  ,  हर्ष   ,   और  insecure king .
La  reina   डेल  Sur (  the   महारानी  of the  दक्षिण   )   is   a   spanish-language   telenovela   उत्पादित   by   the  United States television network Telemundo  ,  in  संयोजन   साथ   the   एंटेना  3  संजाल   और   rti  Producciones .
Based  on  a  अनोखा  of the  वही  name  by   स्पेनी  author  arturo  Pérez-Reverte  ,  the  नाटक   depicts  the  वृद्धि  of  टेरेसा   मेंडोज़ा  ( Kate  डेल   कैस्टिलो   )   ,  a young woman from Mexico who  becomes  the  सबसे   शक्तिशाली   ड्रग   trafficker  in  दक्षिणी  Spain .
patricio   wills  ,  the  president of  telemundo  Television  studios   ,  was the executive  निर्माता  .
Though  la   reina   डेल   सूर  was  मनोनीत   लिये   novela  of  the  Year , Favorite  सीसे  Actress  ,  and Best  ख़राब  Luck Video ,  it  won no awards  .
साथ  a $  10  million  बजट  , La Reina  डेल   सूर  was  the  most expensive telenovela  कभी   उत्पादित  by  telemundo   .
The  कार्यक्रम   's   प्रीमियर   on   फ़रवरी   28  ,  2011  ,  थी   the  network 's  उच्चतम   रेटेड   प्रीमियर  for a telenovela to  तिथि  .
the  program  अक्सर  dominated its  समय   स्लॉट   ,  even  over   अंग्रेज़ी   भाषा   प्रोग्रामिंग   on  other  प्रमुख  U.S.  संजाल  .
La  reina  del Sur completed its  63   एपीसोड   चलाएं  on  telemundo  and its  13   एपीसोड   चलाएं  on  एंटेना   3   simultaneously  on May 30 ,  2011   .
the  final episode  थी  the  उच्चतम  rated  ब्रॉडकास्ट  in Telemundo  's  19-year history  (   4.2   लाख  viewers )  ,   और  beat  सब   of  the English language U.S.  टेलीविज़न   संजाल  to earn the  क्रमांक   एक   स्लॉट   in  the 18-49  वयस्क  demographic  .
the   कार्यक्रम   's  success spurred  telemundo   to   लॉन्च  its  पहला  campaign  to   लाभ   the  series an Emmy  पुरस्कार  nomination .
a  one-night special  featuring  several cast members aired on May 31  ,  2011  ,   और  marked the Telemundo debut of noted Latina television personality Cristina  saralegui  .
La  reina   डेल   सूर   is  broadcast  in  several  अन्य  markets  ,   सहित   सर्बिया   ,   कोलंबिया  , Chile ,  साइप्रस   ,  Nicaragua  ,   कोस्टा  Rica  ,   मैक्सिको   ,  Albania ,  हंगेरियाई  , Slovenia , Croatia , Romania , ( among others  )  .
An example of  रैक  mounted  सर्वर
a  web  होस्टिंग  service is  a  type  of   अंतरजाल  hosting service that  allows  individuals and  संगठन  to  मेक  their website  accessible  via the  संसार  Wide Web .
Web  होस्ट  are  कंपनियाँ   कि   provide  space  on  a server  स्वामित्व   or   leased   लिये  use by  क्लाइंट  , as well as providing  अंतरजाल  connectivity , typically  in   a  data center .
वेब  hosts  can  also  provide   आंकड़ा  center space and connectivity to  the   अंतरजाल  for  अन्य  servers  स्तिथ   in  their  आंकड़ा   बीच   ,  called  colocation   ,  also known  as  Housing in  लैटिन  America or France  .
The scope  of  web  होस्टिंग  services  varies   greatly   .
the  most  मौलिक  is web page and  small-scale   संचिका   होस्टिंग  ,  जहाँ   फाइलें  can  be  uploaded via  संचिका   ट्रांसफ़र  Protocol  (  FTP ) or a Web interface .
the   फाइलें   हैं   प्रायः  delivered  to   the   वेब   ``   as  is '' or with  minimal  processing  .
अनेक  Internet  सेवा   प्रदाताओं   (   isps  )  प्रस्ताव  this service free to subscribers  .
Individuals and organizations may  भी  obtain Web  पेज  hosting from  वैकल्पिक   सेवा   प्रदाताओं   .
निजी   वेब   साईट   होस्टिंग  is  typically   फ़्री  , advertisement-sponsored  ,  or inexpensive .
कारोबार  web site hosting  प्रायः   रै   a   उच्चतर   व्यय  depending upon the size and  प्रकार   of  the  जालस्थल  .
सिंगल  page  होस्टिंग  is  generally  sufficient  लिये  personal  वेब   पृष्ठों  .
A complex site  काल्स  for a more comprehensive package that provides database support  और  application development  प्लेटफ़ॉर्म  (  e.g  .  पीएचपी  , Java ,  माणिक्य  on Rails  ,   coldfusion  , or ASP.NET  )   .
ये  facilities  allow   ग्राहक  to write or  स्थापना   स्क्रिप्ट  for applications  जैसे  forums and  सामग्री   प्रबन्धन  .
भी   ,  Secure  sockets   परत  ( SSL )  is   typically   प्रयुक्त  for e-commerce .
The host  may  also provide  an   इंटरफ़ेस  or control panel for managing  the  Web server  और   installing  scripts ,  as  well as  अन्य  modules and service  अनुप्रयोग  like  e-mail   .
कुछ   होस्ट  specialize  in   निश्चित   तन्त्र  or services ( e.g . e-commerce  )  ,  जिससे   हैं   commonly   प्रयुक्त  by larger companies that  outsource   संजाल   अवसंरचना   .
Madden NFL ( known as John  मैडेन   फ़ुटबॉल   पहले  1993 ) is  an  American  फ़ुटबॉल  video  खेल  series developed by Electronic  कला   tiburon  for EA Sports .
The game  श्रेणी   is   नामित  after  प्रो   फ़ुटबॉल   हॉल  of  famer   जॉन   मैडेन  ,  a   well-known  former Super Bowl  –winning  coach of  the  Oakland  हमलावरों  and color commentator .
The  श्रेणी   is   the  best selling  ea  Sports series  .
The games have consistently been  a  best seller  ,   और   रै  even spawned  tv  shows where players  compete  .
Among  the   खेल  's realistic features include sophisticated playbooks  और  player  आंकडे  , and  आवाज़  commentary that allows players to hear the  खेल  as if it  यहूद   a  real TV broadcast  .
the  Madden NFL  श्रेणी   रै  been  nicknamed   the   एनएफएल   's  33rd  मताधिकार  .
The series was originally  conceived   by   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  Arts founder Trip Hawkins ,  जो  then  approached  Madden  in  1984 for  उसके  endorsement  और  expertise  .
Due to Madden  's   insistence  that the  खेल  be as realistic  as   संभावित  ,  the   पहला  version of John  मैडेन   फ़ुटबॉल  was not  released  until 1988 .
the   दूसरी  version of the game was released  in  1990  ,  with  सालाना  versions since then  .
The series '  नाम   थी  changed  to  Madden NFL in  1993  after EA  acquired   the   अधिकारों  to  उपयोग  NFL  टीमों   और  players  .
despite  Madden  's   रिटायरमेंट  as  a  broadcaster in  2009   ,   he  continues to lend his name  और   provide  expertise for  the  game .
सिंडी   ली   मिलर   sheehan  ( born  जुलाई  10 , 1957 ) is an American antiwar activist whose son ,  u.S.   फौज  Specialist Casey  sheehan   ,  was killed by  दुश्मन   कार्रवाई  during  the  Iraq  युद्ध   .
वो  attracted national  और  international media attention in  अगस्त   2005   लिये  her extended  antiwar   विरोध  at a makeshift camp outside  अध्यक्ष  George  W.  Bush  's  Texas ranch  —a   स्टैंड  that  खींचा  both  passionate  support and  एंग्री  criticism  .
sheehan   भागा  unsuccessfully for Congress in  2008   .
वो   is   a  vocal  आलोचक   of   अध्यक्ष   बराक  Obama 's  विदेशी   नीति   .
उसके   संस्मरण  , Peace Mom  :   a  Mother  's  Journey  through   heartache  to  सक्रियता  ,  थी   प्रकाशित  in  2006  .
Sheehan  थी   the  2012 vice-presidential nominee  of  the Peace and  स्वतंत्रता  Party .
wyclef  Jeanelle Jean (  ;  ;  born  October 17  ,  1969 )  wyclef   dumped  From Haiti 's Presidential Ballot  –   समय  ,  अगस्त  21 ,  2010  .
``  Before  he  announced on August 5  कि  he was  कार्यशील   लिये  President of  हैती  , Wyclef Jean was still listing  उसके  age  as  only  37  years old  .
लकिन   बाद  declaring himself a presidential candidate  ,  the  haitian-american-irish   hip-hop   स्टार   भी  decided to come  साफ   और  confirm  कि  he was really 40 . ''  is  a  three-time  Grammy  पुरस्कार  -winning Haitian-American  rapper  , singer-songwriter , musician , record producer  ,   और   राजनेता   .
At age  नौ   ,  Jean moved to the  संयुक्त   राज्य  with his  परिवार   और  has spent  much  of his life in  the   देश  .
He first received fame  as   a   सदस्य   of   the  acclaimed New  जर्सी  hip hop group the  fugees  .
On August 5  ,   2010   ,  Jean  दायर  for candidacy  in   the   2010  Haitian presidential  चुनाव  , although the Electoral  आयोग  subsequently  शासित  him ineligible to stand as  he  had  नहीं   मिले  the requirement to have  महरूम  resident  in  Haiti  लिये  five  सालो  .
Wyclef  जां   to  appeal against Haiti election ruling – BBC News , Aug  22  , 2010 .
हैती  's electoral commission  कहा  that  mr  Jean was ineligible to stand as the  haitian   संविधान   requires   उम्मीदवार  to have lived  in  the  देश  for five years  prior  to an election  .
The 40-year-old  सिंगर   जीवनदान   in   the  US .
जां  's  प्रयत्न   at  earthquake relief , highly publicized  in  2010 throughout  हैती  and the  संयुक्त   राज्य   ,  were channeled through his charitable  संगठन  ,  yéle  Haiti .
The charity , which performed a  किस्में   of  charitable works  in   हैती   between  2005  और  2010 , effectively  बंद  in 2012 .
In law , a  set-off  is a statutory defense  to   the  whole or  to   a  portion  of   a   अभियोक्ता  's  अर्जी  .
it  had no existence  अंतर्गत   the  English common  विधि  , being created  by   2  Geo  .   ii  c. 22 for  the   राहत  of  insolvent  debtors , although set-off  थी   पहचाना  in equity  .
Such  a  defense could be pleaded only  in  respect of mutual debts  of  a  definite  character  ,  and  किया   नहीं  apply  to  cases  in   जिससे   क्षतिपूर्ति   यहूद  claimed , nor to  निष्पक्ष   दावा   or  demands .
By  the   नियम  of the  परम्  Court  (   O.  XIX  .   r.  3  )  a defendant in  an  action  may   नियत   बंद  or  नियत  up any  सही  or claim  by  way  of  counterclaim against the  दावा  of a  अभियोक्ता  ,  और   ऐसे   set-off  or counterclaim  रै  the  वही   प्रभाव  as a statement of  अर्जी  in a cross-action  .
The  विधिक   रक्षा  of  set-off  ( above  )   थी   originally  introduced to prevent  the  unfair situation  whereby   a  person ( `` Party  a   ''   )  who owed  धन  to  another  ( ``  पार्टी  B '' ) could  be  sent to  कर्जदार  prison  ,   despite  the  फैक्ट   कि   पार्टी  B also owed money to Party A  .
the   विधि  thus allows both parties to defer payment  जबतक  their  संबंधित  claims have been  सुना   in  court .
Upon  निर्णय  ,  दोनो   दावा   हैं   बुझे  and  replaced  by  a  single  जाल  sum owing ( e.g  .  If Party A owes  पार्टी  B 100 and  पार्टी   b   owes  Party A  105   ,  the two  रकम   हैं  set  बंद  and  replaced  with  a   सिंगल   दायित्व  of 5  इससे  Party  b  to Party A  )  .
set-off  can  भी   be   incorporated   by   contractual  agreement so  कि   ,  where a party  मूलभूत  , the  परस्पर  amounts owing  हैं  automatically set off  और  extinguished  .
in   निश्चित   jurisdictions  (  सहित  the UK  )   ,   set-off   takes  place automatically  upon   the   insolvency  of a  कम्पनी  .
इस   अर्थात्   कि  , for  प्रत्येक  party which  is   दोनो  a creditor and debtor  of  the insolvent  कम्पनी  , mutual  debts  are set-off against each other , and  तब  either  the   दिवालिया  's  creditor  can claim the balance  in  the bankruptcy or the  ट्रस्टी   in  bankruptcy can ask for the  संतुलन  remaining to be  सशुल्क   ,  depending  on  which side  owed  the most  .
This has  महरूम   criticized  as  an  undeclared  सुरक्षा   ब्याज  that violates the  principle   of  pari passu .
the  alternative ,  जहाँ   a  creditor  रै   to  pay all its  debts  , but  प्राप्त   तभी   a  limited  portion  of the leftover moneys that  अन्य   unsecured  creditors get ,  मुद्राएँ  the danger  of  'knock-on  '   insolvencies  .
The right to set off  is  particularly important when  रिपोर्टिंग   a   बैंको  's exposures  to   नियामक  authorities  .
The situation  जहाँ  a  बैंको   रै  to report  कि  it  रै  lent a large sum to  a  borrower  (   और  is  इसलिए   उजागर  , because  वहीँ  is a risk that the borrower  might   डिफॉल्ट  thereby  अग्रणी  to  the   घाटा   of  the bank 's or  इसके   जमाकर्ताओं  '  धन   )  is  यूँ  replaced  (   जहाँ  the bank has  लिया  security over shares  or  securities  of  the  borrower   )  with  an   एक्सपोज़र  of the  धन  lent  ऋण   the  value of the security  लिया   .
Jennifer Joanna Aniston ( born February 11  ,   1969  )  is  an  अमरीकी   अभिनेत्री   ,   फिल्मी   निदेशक  , and  निर्माता  .
Aniston gained  विश्वव्यापी  recognition in  the   1990s  for  portraying  Rachel Green  on  the television sitcom  मित्रों   ,   a  role  जिससे   अर्जित   उसके  an  एमी  Award  ,  a  सुनहरी   ग्लोब  Award , and a Screen  अभिनेताओं  Guild Award .
एनिस्टन  has  भी  enjoyed a  कामयाब  Hollywood film career .
She  gained  critical  acclaim   लिये   उसके  performances  in   the  independent  films  She 's the One (  1996  )  ,   दफ्तर  Space ( 1999 ) , The Good  लड़की   (  2002 ) and  मित्रों   साथ  Money ( 2006  )  .
She  रै  had her greatest  वाणिज्यिक   सफलताओं  with the films Bruce Almighty (  2003  )  ,  The Break-Up ( 2006 ) , Marley  &  Me (  2008   )  , Just Go with  it  ( 2011 ) and Horrible Bosses ( 2011 ) .
एनिस्टन  received a star  on   the  Hollywood Walk of  कीर्ति   on   फ़रवरी  22 ,  2012  .
A white Bengal  बाघ   at   the   ह्यूस्टन  Aquarium
(  वीडियो   )
a  White tiger at Tobu  चिड़ियाघर  , in Saitama , Japan  .
the  white tiger  is  a  recessive  mutant of the  बंगाल  tiger , which  थी  reported in  the  wild from time to time in  असम  ,  बंगाल  ,  बिहार   और  especially from the former State of  रीवा  .
Conventional  पीसीआई  ( PCI is an initialism formed from  परिधीय   घटक  Interconnect  ,   भाग   of   the  PCI Local Bus  मानक  and often shortened to just  पीसीआई  ) is  a   लोकल  computer bus for  attaching  hardware  डिवाइस   in   a  computer  .
the   पीसीआई   बस   supports  the  कृत्यों  found on a  प्रोसेसर  bus  ,  but in a standardized  स्वरूप   कि   is  independent  of   कोई   particular  processor  .
डिवाइस  connected to the bus appear to the processor to  be   कनेक्ट  directly  to  the processor  बस  ,  और  are assigned addresses  in  the processor  's   पता  space .
Attached devices can take  either   the  form  of  an  एकीकृत  circuit  fitted   onto  the motherboard  itself   ,   पुकारा   a   planar   यंत्र   in  the PCI specification  ,  or an expansion card that fits into a slot  .
The PCI Local  बस   थी   पहला  implemented in  ibm   pc  compatibles ,  जहाँ  it displaced the combination  of  ISA  प्लस  one VESA Local Bus as the  बस  configuration  .
it  has subsequently been adopted  लिये  other computer types .
PCI  और   pci-x  are being  replaced   by  PCI Express , but  ,  most motherboards are still  बना   साथ  one or more  पीसीआई   स्लॉट   ,   जिससे  are sufficient for  अनेक  uses .
the  PCI  specification  covers the physical  आकार  of the  बस   (  including  the  size and  अंतरण  of the  सर्किट  board  किनारे   विद्युत   सम्पर्क  ) ,  विद्युत  characteristics  ,   बस   समय  , and protocols  .
the   specification  can be  खरीदा   इससे   the   पीसीआई   खास   ब्याज  Group (  pci-sig   )   .
ठेठ   पीसीआई   ताश   प्रयुक्त  in PCs  शामिल  : network  ताश   ,  sound  ताश   ,  modems ,  अतिरिक्त   पोर्ट  such as USB  or  serial  ,   tv  tuner cards and  डिस्क   परिरक्षक  .
PCI  वीडियो   ताश  replaced ISA and VESA  ताश   ,   जबतक   growing  bandwidth  आवश्यकताएँ  outgrew  the  capabilities of  पीसीआई   ;   the   पसन्दीदा   इंटरफ़ेस  for video  ताश  became  अगप   ,  and  तब  PCI Express .
PCI  वीडियो  cards  remain  available  लिये  use with  बूढ़ा  PCs without AGP  or  PCI Express slots  .
Many devices previously provided  on   पीसीआई   विस्तार  cards  हैं   अभी  commonly  एकीकृत  onto  motherboards   or  available  in  universal serial bus  और  PCI  एक्स्प्रेस   संस्करण  .
कैफीन  is a bitter  ,   श्वेत   crystalline  xanthine alkaloid  कि  acts as  a  stimulant drug .
Caffeine  is  found  in   varying  quantities in  the  seeds ,  पत्ते   ,  and fruit of  कुछ  plants , where it acts as  a   प्राकृतिक   कीटनाशक   कि   paralyzes   और   मारता   निश्चित  insects feeding on  the   पौधे  , as  खूब   as  enhancing the reward  मेमोरी  of  pollinators   .
It is  सबसे   commonly  consumed  by   इंसानो   in  infusions extracted from  the  seed of  the  coffee  संयंत्र  and the  पत्ते  of  the   चाय   बुश  , as  खूब   as   इससे   विभिन्न  foods and drinks containing products  निकला  from  the   कोला  nut .
Other sources include  yerba   maté   ,   guarana   जामुन  ,  guayusa   ,   और  the yaupon  होली   .
In humans  ,   कैफीन   अधिनियमों  as  a   सेंट्रल  nervous system  उत्तेजक   ,  temporarily warding off drowsiness and restoring alertness .
It is the  संसार  's most  widely  consumed  psychoactive  drug  ,   लकिन   नापसंद  many other  psychoactive  substances ,  it  is legal and  unregulated   in   nearly   सब  parts  of  the world  .
Beverages containing  कैफीन   ,   ऐसे   as   कॉफी  , tea  ,   नरम   पेय  , and energy drinks  ,   आनंद  great  लोकप्रियता   .
in  North America ,  90   %  of adults consume  कैफीन   रोज़  .
Part of  the  reason caffeine is classified by the  खाना   और  Drug Administration  as  GRAS  (   generally  recognized as  सुरक्षित   )  is that  विषाक्त   doses   (   over   10  grams  )  are much higher than typically  प्रयुक्त  doses  (  less  than  500  milligrams  ) .
Ordinary  खपत   can   have   कम  health risks , even  जब  carried  on  for years  –   वहीँ  may be  a   modest   सुरक्षात्मक  effect  विरूद्ध  some diseases ,  सहित   parkinsons  Disease  ,  and certain  प्रकार   of  cancer .
Caffeine  can   have  both positive and negative effects on anxiety disorders .
कुछ  people experience  नींद  disruption  if  they consume  कैफीन  ,  विशेषकर  during the evening  घंटों  , but others  दिखाएँ  little  disturbance  and  the  effect of caffeine  on   नींद   is   अत्यधिक  variable .
Evidence of  a   रिस्क   to   गर्भावस्था  is  equivocal  ,  लकिन   कुछ   अधिकारियों  have  concluded   कि  prudent advice  is  for pregnant women  to   सीमा  consumption to the equivalent  of   दो   cups   of  coffee  प्रति  day or  कम  .
The  अमरीकी   कॉंग्रेस  of Obstetricians and  स्त्रीरोग  (  acog   )  concluded in  2010  that caffeine  खपत   is   सुरक्षित  up to 200 mg per day  in  pregnant women  .
कैफीन   रै  pressor and mild diuretic  प्रभाव  when administered to  लोगों   जो  are not used  to   it  , but regular users  develop   a  tolerance to this  प्रभाव  , and studies have generally failed to support the  आम   ख़्याल   कि  ordinary  खपत  contributes significantly to dehydration .
With  भारी  use , tolerance develops rapidly  to   autonomic  effects  ऐसे  as elevated  दिल  rate and muscle  twitching  , but not to the cognitive  or   arousal   प्रभाव   of  caffeine .
The degree to which caffeine  can  produce clinically  significant   शारीरिक  and mental dependence remains a subject  of   विवाद   in  the  चिकित्सा  literature .

A  longboard  is a longer variant of  a  skateboard .
it   is  commonly used for cruising  ,  downhill racing , slalom racing ,  स्लाइडिंग  , and/or  हस्तांतरण   .
Sources outside of  विकिपीडिया  give differing estimates:
The  सीआईए   's   संसार  Factbook gives  the  world population  as   7,021,836,029  (  जुलाई   2012  est  .   )  and the  वितरण   of  religions as Christian  100  % (  of  which Roman  कैथोलिक  18.85 %  ,  Protestant 8.15 % , Orthodox 4.96 % ,  anglican  1.26  %  ) , Muslim 22.74 % , Hindu 13.8  %  , Buddhist 6.77 % , Sikh  0.35   %  , Jewish  0.22   %  ,  baha'i  0.11 %  ,   अन्य  religions  10.95  %  ,   non-religious  9.66 % ,  atheists  2.01 % .
(  2010 est . )  .
The Coast Ranges of California span  इससे  Humboldt  काउंटी   ,   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   दक्षिण  to  सांता   बारबरा   काउंटी  .
The  अन्य   तीन   तटीय  California mountain ranges are the  अनुप्रस्थ   सीमाएँ  ,  प्रायद्वीपीय   सीमाएँ  and  the  Klamath Mountains  .
Physiographically  ,  they are  a  section  of   the   larger   प्रशांत   किनारा  province , which in turn  हैं   भाग  of the larger  प्रशांत   पहाड़   प्रणाली   physiographic  division .
युनेस्को   रै   शामिल  the `` California Coast Ranges  जीवमंडल  Reserve `` in  इसके  Man  और   the  Biosphere Programme of  संसार  Network  of   जीवमंडल  Reserves since 1983  .

World  मैप  of  यात्री  cars per 1000 people
an   ऑटोमोबाइल  ,  autocar   ,  motor  car  or  car  is a wheeled motor vehicle  प्रयुक्त  for  transporting   यात्री   ,   जिससे  also carries its  अपना  engine or motor .
Most definitions  of  the term specify  कि  automobiles are designed  to   चलाएं  primarily on  सड़कें  ,  to  have seating  लिये  one to eight people , to typically have four  पहियों  , and to  be   constructed  principally for the  हस्तांतरण   of  people rather than goods .
The term  motorcar  has also  महरूम  used in  the  context of electrified  रेल  systems to denote  a  car which functions  as   a   छोटी   लोकोमोटिव  but also  provides  space for  यात्री  and baggage .
These locomotive cars were  प्रायः   प्रयुक्त   on   suburban  routes by  दोनो  interurban  और  intercity  रेलरोड  systems .
it  was  अनुमानित   in  2010 that  the  number  of  automobiles  था  risen to  over  1 billion  वाहनों  ,  up   इससे   the   500   लाख  of 1986 .
the   संख्याएँ   हैं  increasing  rapidly  , especially in China  और  India .
John  fitzgerald  `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29 , 1917 –  नवम्बर  22  ,   1963  )  ,  often referred to by his  आद्याक्षर  JFK , was the  35th  President  of   the  United States  ,   सेवारत  from 1961 until his death  in  1963 .
After  सैन्य  service  as  commander of the  मोटर   torpedo  Boats PT-109 and  pt-59  during World War II  in   the  South  प्रशांत  ,  कैनेडी  represented Massachusetts '  11th  congressional  ज़िला   in  the U.S. House of Representatives  इससे  1947 to 1953 as a Democrat .
Thereafter ,  he  served  in  the U.S. Senate  इससे  1953  जबतक   1960  .
कैनेडी  defeated Vice President  और   रिपब्लिकन  candidate  रिचर्ड   निक्सन   in   the   1960  U.S.  अध्यक्षीय  election  .
At 43 years  of  age  ,  he  is  the  youngest   to  have  महरूम   निर्वाचित  to the office ,  the   second-youngest   अध्यक्ष  ( after  थियोडोर   रूज़वेल्ट   )  , and the  पहला  person born  in   the  20th century to  serve  as president .
A Catholic  ,   कैनेडी   is  the  तभी   non-  Protestant  अध्यक्ष  ,  और  is  the  only  अध्यक्ष  to have won a Pulitzer Prize .
Events during his presidency included the Bay of Pigs Invasion  ,  the Cuban Missile Crisis  ,  the  भवन   of  the  बर्लिन  Wall ,  the   स्पेस   रेस  , the African-American  सिविल  Rights  गति   ,   और  early  चरण   of   the  Vietnam War .
therein   ,  Kennedy  increased  the number of military advisers , special operation  शक्तियां  , and  helicopters  in  an   प्रयत्न   to  curb  the  spread  of  communism in  दक्षिण  East  एशिया   .
The  कैनेडी   प्रशासन   अपनाया   the  policy of  the   रणनीतिक  Hamlet  कार्यक्रम  which  थी   implemented   by   the  South Vietnamese  सरकारी  .
It involved certain forced  relocation  , village internment ,  और  segregation of rural  दक्षिण  Vietnamese from the  उत्तरी  and  दक्षिणी   कम्युनिस्ट  insurgents .
Kennedy was assassinated  on  November  22   ,  1963  in  Dallas  ,  Texas  .
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged  साथ  the  अपराधों   ,  but  he  was shot and killed by Jack  माणिक्य   दो   दिनों   बाद  , before a  विचारण   could   लो  place .
the   एफबीआई   और  the Warren  आयोग  officially concluded that Oswald was  the  lone assassin .
However  ,  the  संयुक्त  States House Select Committee on Assassinations  (  HSCA )  concluded   कि  those investigations  यहूद  flawed  और  that Kennedy was  संभवतः   assassinated  as the result of a conspiracy  .
However  ,   एबीसी   न्यूज   in  their investigation ,  the  Kennedy Assassination : Beyond  षड्यंत्र   ,  confirmed  the  findings of the  वारेन   आयोग   ;  having concluded Oswald acted  अलोन   .
Kennedy 's controversial Department  of  Defense TFX fighter  bomber   कार्यक्रम   led  to a Congressional  छानबीन  that lasted  इससे   1963   to  1970 .
Since the 1960s  सूचना  concerning  कैनेडी  's private life has  आइये   to  light .
विवरण  of  कैनेडी   's  health problems in which  he  struggled  have   become  better known ,  विशेषकर  since  the  1990s  .
Although initially kept secret from  the   सामान्य  public ,  रिपोर्ट्स   of   कैनेडी  's  philandering  have garnered much press .
Kennedy  बाँधने  highly  in   पब्लिक  opinion ratings of U.S.  राष्ट्रपतियों   .
A Siemens  mxl  fire  सचेतक  control panel (  शीर्ष   )  and graphic annunciator ( bottom )  लिये  Potomac Hall  ,  at  जेम्स  Madison University .
a  Vigilant VM-1  आग  alarm control unit ( FACU  )   /  autonomous  कंट्रोल   ईकाई   (  ACU  )   साथ   एकीकृत  voice evacuation and fire  सेनानी  telephone system .
Manufactured  by   एडवर्ड्स  , A UTC  f   &  S Company
A  आग  Alarm Control  फलक  ( FACP  )   ,   or   आग  Alarm Control  ईकाई  ( FACU ) , is the controlling  घटक   of  a  आग  Alarm System  .
the   फलक  receives information from  पर्यावरणीय   सेंसर  designed  to   detect  changes associated  साथ   आग   ,   मॉनीटर  their operational  अखंडता  and  provides  for automatic  कंट्रोल  of equipment  ,   और  transmission  of   सूचना   जरुरी   to   तैयारी  the  सुविधा  for fire  आधारित   on  a  predetermined  sequence .
the   फलक  may also supply electrical  उर्जा  to operate any  संबद्ध   सेंसर  ,  कंट्रोल  ,  ट्रांसमीटर  ,  or  relay .
वहीँ   हैं   चार  basic  प्रकार  of panels : coded panels , conventional panels  ,  addressable  panels  ,  और  multiplex  प्रणालियों  .
This is a list of  the  first music videos broadcast  on  MTV 's  पहला  day , August 1  ,   1981   .
एमटीवी  's first day  on  the air was  rebroadcast   on   vh1   क्लासिक   in  2006 and  अपलोड   onto  YouTube in 2010 ( although only the first  चार  hours were  प्रामाणिक  ; the rest were  संपादित   vh1  rebroadcasts  )   .
Bandaranaike  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   विमानक्षेत्र   (   bia  )  (  also  ज्ञात  as  katunayake   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport  और  Colombo International Airport  )   is  one of the  दो  international  एयरपोर्ट  serving  the  city of Colombo  ,  the other is Ratmalana  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   विमानक्षेत्र  .
Mattala  राजपक्षे   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport located in southern  नगर   of   hambantota   is  the other  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   विमानक्षेत्र   in  Sri  लंका   .
Bandaranaike International  विमानक्षेत्र  is located  in  Katunayake , 22 miles ( 35  km  ) north  of   कोलोन   .
it   is   administered   by  Airport and  विमानन   सेवाएं   (  Sri Lanka ) Ltd  .
it   is   the  hub  of  SriLankan Airlines ,  the   नेशनल  carrier of  श्री  Lanka , and Mihin  लंका  , the budget  एयरलाइन  of Sri  लंका  .
ब्लैक   swan  is  a  2010 American psychological  थ्रिलर  and horror  फिल्मी  directed  by   डैरेन  Aronofsky and starring Natalie Portman  ,  Vincent Cassel ,  और  Mila  kunis  .
the  plot revolves around a  उत्पादन  of Tchaikovsky 's  swan   झील   बैले  by  a  prestigious New  यॉर्क   नगर  company .
the   उत्पादन  requires a ballerina  to   खेल  the innocent  और  fragile White  swan   ,  for which  the   वचनबद्ध  dancer  नीना  ( Portman )  is   a   पूर्ण  fit , as  खूब  as  the   अंधेरा  and  कामुक  Black Swan  ,   जिससे   हैं  qualities embodied by  the  new arrival  लिली  ( Kunis ) .
नीना  is overwhelmed by  a  feeling  of   immense  pressure  जब   वो  finds  herself  competing  लिये   the   भाग  ,  causing  her to  खोना  her tenuous grip  on   वास्तविकता  and  descend  into a living nightmare  .
Aronofsky  conceived  the  आधार  by connecting  उसके  viewings of  a  production  of  Swan Lake with an  unrealized  screenplay about  understudies  and  the   ख़्याल   of  being haunted by a double , similar to  the   लोकगीत   surrounding  doppelgängers .
aronofsky   cites   fyodor   दोस्तोयेव्स्की  's `` The Double `` as  another   प्रेरणा  for the  फिल्मी  .
The  निदेशक  also considered Black  swan  a  साथी  piece  to  his 2008 film The  पहलवान   ,   साथ  both films involving demanding  प्रदर्शन  for  अलग  kinds of art  .
He and Portman  पहला   discussed  the project in 2000 ,  और   बाद  a  ब्रैड  attachment  to   सार्वभौमिक  Studios  ,  Black  swan  was  उत्पादित   in  New  यॉर्क  City  in  2009 by Fox Searchlight  तस्वीरें   .
पोर्टमैन  and  kunis  trained  in   बैले  for  अनेक  months prior to  फिल्मांकन  , and notable figures from the ballet  संसार   helped  with  फिल्मी   उत्पादन  to  आकार  the ballet  प्रस्तुतीकरण  .
The film  premiered  as the opening film for the  67th  Venice International Film Festival  on  September  1  , 2010  .
It had a limited release  in   the  United  राज्य  starting  दिसम्बर   3   ,  2010  और  opened  देशभर   on  December  17  .
ब्लैक  Swan received critical  तारीफ़  upon its release , particularly for Portman 's  प्रदर्शन   और  Aronofsky  's  direction ,  और  was a significant box office success ,  grossing  $  329   लाख  worldwide  .
The  फिल्मी  received five Academy Award  nominations   और  Portman  जीती  the  बेहतरीन   अभिनेत्री  award for the film  ,  as well as many  अन्य   बेहतरीन   अभिनेत्री  awards in several guilds and festivals ,  जबकि  Aronofsky  थी  nominated for Best Director  .
In addition ,  the   फिल्मी  itself received  a   नामांकन   लिये   बेहतरीन   चित्र  .
The world’s first ice-calorimeter  ,   प्रयुक्त  in  the  winter of 1782-83  ,  by Antoine Lavoisier  और  Pierre-Simon Laplace  ,  to determine  the  heat involved  in   विभिन्न  chemical changes  ;   calculations  which  यहूद   आधारित  on  जोसेफ   ब्लैक  ’s prior  डिस्कवरी   of  latent  ऊष्मा  .
ये  experiments  चिह्नित  the foundation of thermochemistry .
a   ऊष्मामापी   (  from Latin calor , meaning heat  )   is   an  object used for  कैलोरीमिति   ,   or  the process  of   measuring   the   ऊष्मा   of   रासायनिक   प्रतिक्रियाएँ   or   शारीरिक  changes  as   खूब  as heat  क्षमता   .
Differential  स्कैनिंग   calorimeters   ,   समतापी  microcalorimeters  ,  titration calorimeters and accelerated  रेट   calorimeters  are among the most common types  .
A  सरल  calorimeter just consists of a  थर्मामीटर  attached  to  a metal container full  of   जल  suspended above  a  combustion chamber .
to  find the  enthalpy   बदलें  per mole  of  a substance  a   in   a   प्रतिक्रिया  between  दो   substances  A  और   b   ,  the substances  हैं   added   to   a   ऊष्मामापी   और  the initial and  फाइनल   temperatures  ( before the reaction started  और  after it has finished  )   हैं   विख्यात   .
Multiplying the temperature change by  the  mass  और  specific  ऊष्मा   capacities   of  the substances gives a  मान   लिये  the energy  दिए  off or absorbed  दौरान  the reaction  .
Dividing the energy  बदलें   by  how many moles of  a   यहूद  present gives its enthalpy  बदलें  of  प्रतिक्रिया   .
This  विधि   is   प्रयुक्त  primarily  in   अकादमिक  teaching as it describes the  सिद्धान्त  of  कैलोरीमिति   .
It does  नहीं  account for the  ऊष्मा   घाटा   through  the container or the  ऊष्मा   क्षमता  of the thermometer and container itself  .
in  addition , the object placed inside the  ऊष्मामापी   shows   कि   the  objects  transferred   उनके  heat  to   the  calorimeter and  into  the  द्रव   ,   और  the heat  अवशोषित  by the calorimeter and the  द्रव  is equal to  the  heat given  बंद   by  the metals  .
A  जोड़ी   of   ग्रीन   flip-flops
flip-flops  ( also  पुकारा   zōri  , thongs , jandals  ,  or  a  variety  of   अन्य  names throughout the  संसार  )  हैं  a type of  open-toed  sandal  typically  worn  in  casual situations ,  ऐसे   as  outside or  at  the beach .
They consist  of  a  चपटा  sole  आयोजित   loosely  on the foot  by   a  Y-shaped strap that passes between the first  और   दूसरी  toes and  around  either side of the  पैर  .
वे  may also be held to  the   पैर  with  a  single  डोरी   over  the front  of   the  foot  बल्कि   than  a  थोंग  .
The name  ``   flip-flop  '' originated because of the sound that is  बना  by  slapping  between the sole of  the  foot  और  the  मंजिल   जब   चलना   .
This style of footwear has  महरूम  worn  by  the  लोगों   of   अनेक  cultures throughout  the   संसार   ,  originating as  जल्दी  as  the  ancient  उन्होंने  in 4,000 B.C  .
The  आधुनिक   flip-flop   उतरता  from  the   जापानी  zōri , which  became   लोकप्रिय  after World War II when  सैनिको  returning  to  the United States brought  उन्हें  back  .
वे  became popular  in  casual settings during the 1960s , 1990s  ,  and 2000s , and some  किस्में  have even found  उनके   रास्ता  into more  औपचारिक  attire , despite  आलोचना  .
The  उपयोग   of  flip-flops can  परिणाम   in  many  pains  and injuries  ,   सहित   टखने   sprains   और   टूटा  bones .
Some individuals who walk  लिये  long periods  रपट   पीड़ा  in  the   फीट   ,   ankles  , and lower  टाँगे   .
the  lack of  support  provided  by  flip-flops  प्रायः   परिणाम  in over-pronation  चोटों   ,  caused  by  the  पैर  slipping inwards further than normal .
This can lead to  चपटा   फीट  and  tendonitis  .
Other injuries that may result  हैं   due   to  the  जूते   's  open-toed nature , such as  stubbed   toes  , cuts ,  और  bruises  .
Doctors recommend purchasing  pricier   चप्पल  with thick-cushioned  सोल्स  ,  as  well  as  those that have  a   डोरी  that is  नहीं  canvas and that  आता   वापस  almost to the ankle  .
the  owners of  hanjin  Osaka  ,  seen  यहाँ  transiting  the   पनामा  Canal in 2008 , declared general  औसत  following an explosion in  the  ship 's  इंजन  room on  .
the  law of general  औसत   is  a legal principle of  मेरीटाइम  law according  to  which all  पार्टियों   in   a  sea venture proportionally  share   कोई   नुकसान   resulting   इससे  a voluntary  बलिदान  of  भाग  of  the  ship or  कार्गो   to  save  the  whole  in  an  आपात   .
In the  exigencies   of   जोखिमों  faced at  समुद्र  , crew  सदस्यों  often have  अनमोल   छोटी  time  in   जिससे  to  determine  precisely  जिनकी  cargo they are jettisoning .
Thus ,  to   avoid  quarrelling that could waste valuable time  ,   वहीँ   arose   the  equitable  अभ्यास  whereby  सब  the merchants whose cargo landed safely would be called on to contribute  a  portion ,  आधारित   upon   a   share  or percentage  ,  to the  व्यापारी  or  व्यापारियों   जिनकी  goods had  महरूम  tossed  overboard  to avert imminent peril  .
जबकि  general average  traces   इसके  origins in ancient  मेरीटाइम  law , still it remains part of  the  admiralty  विधि   of  most countries .
The first codification  of   सामान्य   औसत   थी   the   यॉर्क  Antwerp Rules of 1890  .
American companies accepted it in 1949  .
General average requires  तीन   तत्व  which  हैं  clearly  stated  by  mr.  Justice  grier  in Barnard v. Adams:
`` 1st  .
A common  खतरे   :  a danger  in   जिससे  vessel ,  कार्गो   और  crew  सब   participate  ;  a  danger imminent  और  apparently 'inevitable , ' except by voluntarily  रूष्ट  the loss of  a   portion   of  the  पूरे  to  सहेजें  the remainder . ''
``  2nd  .  There  जरूर  be  a   voluntary   jettison  ,  jactus  , or  ढलाई   दूर  ,  of  some portion of  the   संयुक्त   चिंता   लिये  the purpose of avoiding this imminent  peril  , periculi imminentis  evitandi  causa ,  or   ,  in  अन्य  words  ,   a   ट्रांसफ़र  of  the   peril   इससे  the whole to a  particular   portion   of  the  पूरे  . ''
`` 3rd .
इस  attempt to avoid  the  imminent common  peril   जरूर  be  कामयाब   ''   .
उदाहरण   पॉलिश   कॉल  for  टीकाकरण  against Diphtheria and  टेटनस   .
A vaccination schedule  is   a  series of vaccinations ,  सहित   the  timing of  सब  doses ,  जिससे   may   be   either   अनुशंसित  or compulsory , depending on the country  of  residence  .
A vaccine is an  antigenic  preparation used  to   उपज  active immunity to  a  disease  ,   in   अनुक्रम   to   prevent  or reduce the  प्रभाव   of  infection  by  any natural or ``  जंगली   ''  pathogen .
अनेक   टीके   आवश्यकता  multiple doses for  अधिकतम  effectiveness , either  to  produce  sufficient  initial immune  जवाब  or to boost response that  fades  over time  .
लिये  example  ,   टेटनस   टीका   boosters  are often  अनुशंसित  every  10  years  .
Vaccine schedules are  विकसित  by  सरकारी  agencies or physicians  समूह   to   achieve  maximum effectiveness using required  और  recommended  टीके   लिये  a  मोहल्ले   जबकि  minimizing  the   क्रमांक  of health care  प्रणाली   interactions  .
Over  the  past  दो   दशकों   ,  the recommended vaccination schedule  रै  grown rapidly and become more  जटिल  as many  नई  vaccines  have  been developed .
Some vaccines are  अनुशंसित   तभी  in  निश्चित   क्षेत्रों  (  देशों  , subnational  क्षेत्रों   ,   or   at-risk  populations ) where  a  disease  is  common  .
For instance ,  पीला  fever  टीकाकरण  is on  the   दिनचर्या  vaccine schedule  of   फ्रेंच  Guiana ,  is  recommended  in   निश्चित  regions  of  Brazil  लकिन  in  the  United States  is  only  दिए   to  travelers heading to  देशों   साथ  a history of the  बीमारी   .
In developing countries , vaccine recommendations  भी   लो  into account  the   स्तर   of  health care access  ,  the cost  of  vaccines  और   मुद्दे  with vaccine availability and storage .
Sample vaccinations schedules  discussed  by the  संसार   स्वास्थ्य   संगठन  show a developed  देश  using a  अनुसूची   जिससे  extends over  the  first five  सालो   of   a  child 's life and uses  टीके   जिससे   लागत  over $  700   सहित  administration  लागत   जबकि   a  developing country uses a schedule providing vaccines  in  the  पहला  9  महीने  of  जीवन  and costing  तभी   $   25   .
This difference  is  due to the lower  लागत   of  health  परवाह  , the  निम्नतर  cost of many vaccines provided to  विकासशील  nations ,  और  that  अधिक   महंगी   टीके  ,  प्रायः   लिये  less common diseases ,  हैं  not  utilized   .
In 1900 , the smallpox  टीका   थी  the only one administered  to  children .
By  the  early 1950s  ,   children  routinely  प्राप्त  four vaccines  ,   लिये   सुरक्षा   विरूद्ध   (   डिप्थीरिया  , pertussis  ,  tetanus  ,   पोलियो  , and smallpox ) ,  और   as  many  as   पाँच  shots by  दो  years  of   आयु   .
Since  the  mid-1980s , many vaccines have been added  to  the schedule .
, the US Centers  लिये  Disease  कंट्रोल  and  रोकथाम  ( CDC ) now recommends vaccination  विरूद्ध   at   तनिक   चौदह  diseases .
By  दो   सालो   of   आयु   ,   u.S.   children  receive as  अनेक  as 24 vaccine injections  ,  and might receive  up   to   पाँच  shots during  एक  visit  to   the  doctor  .
The use of  संयोजन   टीका  products means that ,  ,  the United  किंगडम  's immunization  कार्यक्रम  consists of 10 injections by the  आयु  of  दो  , rather than 25 if vaccination for  प्रत्येक   बीमारी  was given as  a   पृथक   इंजेक्शन  .
