ट्रक   हैं  an  अभिन्न   भाग  of  the  street parade  ,   featuring   सजीव  performances or  deejays
The  त्रिनिदाद   और  Tobago  कार्निवल   is  an annual event  आयोजित  on  the  Monday and Tuesday  पहले   राख   बुधवार   ,   और  is well known  लिये   भागीदार   's  colorful  वेशभूषा  and  समृद्ध  celebrations .
Carnival in  त्रिनिदाद  and  टोबैगो  is the most significant  इवेंट   on  the  आइलैंड्स   '  cultural and tourism calendar , with numerous  सांस्कृतिक   कार्यक्रम   कार्यशील  in the lead  up  to  the  street parade  on   कार्निवल   सोमवार   और   मंगलवार   .
it  is said that  if  the islanders are not celebrating it , then they  हैं  preparing for  it  ,  जबकि  reminiscing about  the   पास्ट  year  's  festival  .
The  दिल  of  the   musical   जश्न  has  महरूम  calypso  ;  recently  सोका  has replaced  कैलिप्सो  as  the  most  मनाये  type of music  .
Costumes  ,  stickfighting  और   limbo   प्रतियोगिताओं  are  भी   महत्वपूर्ण   components  of the  पर्व  .
Carnival as it is celebrated in Trinidad and Tobago  is  also  मनाये  in  शहरों   विश्वव्यापी  .
ये  including Toronto  's  Caribana , Miami 's Miami Carnival , Houston  carifest   ,  London 's Notting Hill Carnival  as  well  as   नई  York City 's  मजदूर  Day  कार्निवल   to   नाम  a few .
Carnival was created when West African slaves mimicked their French  स्वामी  who where known for their  lavish  costumes  गेंदें  .
Forbidden to partake in these festivities and  confined  to their quarters  ,  slaves combined  तत्व   इससे  their own  संस्कृतियों  to their  निपुण  's fete .
hence  the creation of  वर्ण  such  as   jab  Jab  or   jab  Molassie  (   शैतानों   )   ,  Midnight Robbers  ,  Imps ,  lagahroo   ,   soucouyant  , La  diablesse   और   राक्षसों  .
With the abolition of  गुलामी  in 1838 , freed Africans  took   उनके  version  of  Carnival to  the  streets through expression of drums  ,  riddim sections like tamboo  बाँसुरी   और  as each new  अप्रवासी   जनसांख्यिकी   डाला  Trinidad ,  कार्निवल  evolved into what we know  आज  .
The city of  शिकागो   ,  Illinois  आयोजित  a  nonpartisan  mayoral  चुनाव  on  मंगलवार  , February 22 , 2011  .
लाज़िम   महापौर  Richard  M.   डाले   ,  a member of the  लोकतांत्रिक  Party who  था   महरूम  in  दफ्तर  since 1989 , did not  तलाश   a  seventh term as  महापौर  .
Candidates needed to collect  12,500  petition  हस्ताक्षर  by November  22   ,   2010   to  qualify  लिये   a   प्लेस   on   the   बैलट   .
अप्रैल   5   ,  2011 was  अनुसूचित  to  be   a  runoff election date if no  प्रत्याशी  received an absolute  बहुमत   .
Rahm Emanuel won the race for mayor with more than 55 % of the  vote   .
He was inaugurated on May  16   ,   2011   .
``  उत्तेजित   up  Kicks ''  is   a   सोंग  by American  इंडी  pop  बैंड  Foster the  लोगों  .
It was  released   as  the group 's  डेब्यू   सिंगल   in   सितंबर  2010  ,   और  the following  साल  was included on  उनके   ep  Foster the People and  उनके  debut album  torches  .
``  उत्तेजित  Up  kicks   ''  became  the  group  's   भेदन   hit   और   थी  one of the most  लोकप्रिय  songs  of   2011  .
the  song was written  और   अंकित  by  frontman  Mark  फोस्टर  while  he  was  working   as  a commercial  झंकार   लेखक  .
Contrasting with the  upbeat   musical  composition  ,  the lyrics  describe   the   homicidal  thoughts  of   a   troubled   युवावस्था  .
the  track  प्राप्त   considerable  attention  बाद   it  was posted  ऑनलाइन   in   2010  as a  फ़्री  download , and  it  helped  the   समूह   गार्नर   a  multi-album  रिकार्ड   सौदे  with Columbia  रिकॉर्ड  imprint Startime  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   .
`` Pumped  up  Kicks '' proved  to  be a  स्लीपर  hit ; in 2011 , after receiving  significant  airplay on modern rock  स्टेशन   ,   the  song  crossed-over  onto contemporary hit radio stations .
The song  खर्च   आठ   लगातार   सप्ताह  at number three on the Billboard Hot  100  chart  in   the  United  राज्य  ,  बनाना  it  the   पहला  Billboard Alternative Songs  number-one  single  to   क्रैक   the  U.S. top  5  since Kings of  लिओन   's  ``  उपयोग  Somebody  ``   in   2009  .
The  सोंग  was  widely   praised   by  critics ,  और  it has been licensed  लिये   उपयोग   in  a  चौड़ी  range of  लोकप्रिय  media since  इसके   रिलीज  .
``  उत्तेजित   up  Kicks '' received a  ग्रैमी  Award nomination for  बेहतरीन  Pop  duo/group  Performance .
the   राज्य   मेला  of  वेस्ट  Virginia is an annual state fair  लिये  West Virginia  .
It is held annually in mid-August  on   the   राज्य   fairgrounds  in Fairlea  ,  near  lewisburg  ,  वेस्ट  Virginia in the  southeastern  part of  the   राज्य   .
The  राज्य  Fairgrounds consists  of  a large open  फ़ील्ड  for  carnivals   और  exhibitions , a horse track  ,  grandstands ,  और  several exhibition buildings .
Free parking  is   provided  adjacent  to   the   fairgrounds  and , until  2006  , free camping was also  उपलब्धियाँ  in  a  large field with  running-water   toilets  and showers  ,  but  no   hookups   .
Campers are now charged a  छोटी  fee .
the   श्वेत  House  ,  the  अध्यक्ष   's  official residence  और  center of the administration
Under  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   संविधान  ,  the   अध्यक्ष   of  the United States is  the   सिर  of  राज्य  and head of government  of   the  United States  .
as  chief  of  the executive branch and  सिर  of  the   संघीय  government as a whole , the presidency is  the  highest  राजनैतिक   दफ्तर   in   the  United States by influence  और   मान्यता   .
the  president is  भी  the  commander-in-chief  of  the  United States  हथियारबंद  Forces .
The  अध्यक्ष   is  indirectly elected to  a  four-year  पद  by an Electoral College  (   or   by  the House  of   प्रतिनिधि  should the Electoral College fail to  पुरस्कार  an absolute majority of votes to any person ) .
चूंकि   the  ratification  of  the  twenty-second  Amendment to  the  United  राज्य   संविधान  in  1951  , no person may be elected  अध्यक्ष  more than twice , and no  एक  who  रै   परोसा   अधिक   than   दो  years of a  पद   to  which someone  else  was elected  may  be  निर्वाचित   अधिक   than   एकबार  .
Upon the  मौत  ,  इस्तीफा   ,   or  removal from  दफ्तर  of  an   लाज़िम  President  ,  the Vice President assumes the office .
The  अध्यक्ष  must be  at  least 35  सालो   of   आयु  and a  ``   प्राकृतिक  born '' citizen  of  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
इस   सूची  includes only those persons who  यहूद   sworn   into  office as  अध्यक्ष   following   the   अनुसमर्थन  of  the  United States Constitution  ,  which  took  effect on  कूच   4  ,  1789  .
For  अमरीकी  leaders before this ratification , see  अध्यक्ष  of the Continental Congress .
The list does not  शामिल   कोई  Acting Presidents  अंतर्गत  the Twenty-fifth  amendment  to the United  राज्य  Constitution  .
There have been  43  people  sworn   into   दफ्तर  ,  और  44 presidencies ,  as  Grover Cleveland served  दो  non-consecutive terms and  is   गिने  chronologically  as  both  the  22nd  और  24th  अध्यक्ष   .
of  the  individuals  elected as president , four died  in   दफ्तर  of natural causes (  विलियम  Henry Harrison  ,   zachary  Taylor  ,  Warren  G.   हार्डिंग  ,  और  Franklin D.  रूज़वेल्ट   )  , four  यहूद  assassinated (  अब्राहम  Lincoln  ,  James  A.  Garfield , William  mckinley   ,  and John F.  कैनेडी  ) and one resigned  (  Richard Nixon  )  .
George  वॉशिंगटन   ,   the  first  अध्यक्ष  ,  थी  inaugurated  in   1789   बाद   a  unanimous  vote   of   the   चुनावी  College  .
विलियम  Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office  साथ  32 days in 1841  ,  and Franklin D.  रूज़वेल्ट   खर्च  the  longest   साथ  over twelve years ,  लकिन   died  shortly  into  his fourth term in 1945  .
he  is  the   तभी   अध्यक्ष  to serve more than two terms , and a  संवैधानिक   amendment   ,  affecting  राष्ट्रपतियों   बाद  Harry Truman ,  थी   passed  to  सीमा  the number of times an individual can  be  elected  अध्यक्ष   .
Andrew Jackson , the seventh president ,  थी  the first  to   be   निर्वाचित  by  मेन   of  all classes  in   1828  after  सबसे   कानून   barring  non-land-owners from voting were  repealed   .
Warren Harding was  the  first elected  बाद  women gained  मतदान  rights in 1920 .
History records  चार  presidents  –   जॉन  Q Adams  ,   रदरफोर्ड  B. Hayes , Benjamin  हैरिसन  and George  W.  Bush –  जो  lost the  लोकप्रिय  vote but assumed office  .
John  F.  Kennedy  रै  been the  तभी  president  of  Roman Catholic faith  ,  and the current  अध्यक्ष  ,  बराक   ओबामा   ,   is  the first president  of  African  descent  .
``  Lombardi  ट्रॉफी   ''  redirects  यहाँ  .
For  the   पुरस्कार  awarded annually to the best  कॉलेज  football lineman  or   linebacker  ,  देखिए   लोम्बार्डी   पुरस्कार   .
the  Vince Lombardi Trophy  is   the   ट्रॉफी   awarded   प्रत्येक  year to the  जीतना  team of the National Football  लीग  's championship  खेल   ,   the  Super  कटोरी   .
the   ट्रॉफी   is  named in  सम्मान  of  legendary   एनएफएल   कोच   विंस  Lombardi  .
इस  is a list of  टेबल   of   the   सत्यापित  oldest  लोगों   in   the  world in ordinal rank  ,  such  as   oldest  person or oldest  man   .
In these  टेबल   ,  a supercentenarian  is  considered  'verified   '  if  उसके  or  उसके   अर्जी  has  महरूम   validated  by an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  body that specifically deals in longevity research ,  ऐसे   as   the   जराविद्या  Research  समूह  ( GRG  )   or  Guinness World Records  .
The longest unambiguously documented  इंसान   जीवनकाल  is  कि   of  Jeanne Calment of France  (  1875–1997  )  ,  जो  died at age 122  सालो  , 164 days .
She  मिले  Vincent van Gogh  जब   वो   थी  12 or 13  .
इस  led to news  मीडिया   ध्यान  in 1985  ,  after Calment  turned   110  .
Subsequent  छानबीन   मिला  documentation for Calment 's  आयु  , beyond  कोई  reasonable question , in the records of her native city ,  arles  ,  फ़्रांस  .
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been produced than for any other supercentenarian  ;  her case serves as an  archetype  in  the   methodology   लिये   verifying  the  आयु   of   the  world 's oldest people  .
The  longest   undisputed  lifespan  लिये   पुरूष  supercentenarians is  कि  of  jiroemon  Kimura ,  जो  currently lives in Japan and is age  as  of .
Since the  मौत   of  115-year  बूढ़ा   दीना   manfredini   of   the  United  राज्य  ,  on  17  दिसम्बर  2012 , Kimura , born  19   अप्रैल  1897  ,  is the oldest living  व्यक्ति   in  the world whose  आयु   can   be   प्रलेखित  .
He has also been  the   oldest   जीना  man  चूंकि  the death  of  114-year old Walter Breuning  on   14  April  2011  .
Since the death  of  115-year  बूढ़ा   koto  Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013  ,  the oldest living woman has been  -year-old  Misao Okawa  ,   भी  from Japan  ,  born  on   5  March 1898  .
The  लोगों   's  Court is an American arbitration-based reality  अदालत   दिखाएँ  , currently presided over by  रिटायर्ड  Florida  राज्य  Circuit Court Judge Marilyn  milian   ,  in which small claims  विवादों  are handled .
The  लोगों   's  Court  is  the first court show to use binding arbitration  ,  introducing the format  into   the   विधा  in 1981 .
The  प्रणाली   रै  been duplicated by most of the show  's   successors  in the judicial  विधा   .
moreover   ,   the   लोगों   's  Court is the first  लोकप्रिय  , long-running reality in the judicial  विधा   .
it  was  preceded   तभी  by a few short-lived realities  in   the  genre ;  ये   short-lived   पूर्ववर्तियों   यहूद   तभी  loosely related to judicial  कार्यवाही   ,  except for one : Parole  (  1959  )   took   फुटेज  from real-life courtrooms  पकड़कर   विधिक  proceedings .
prior  to The People  's   अदालत  ,  the  vast majority  of  TV courtroom  shows  used  अभिनेताओं  , and recreated or fictional cases  (   as   किया  radio before  कि   )   .
among   उदाहरण   of  these types  of  court  shows   शामिल  Famous Jury Trials and Your Witness  .
The People  's  Court has had  दो  contrasting  जीवनदान   .
The show  's   पहला  life was presided over solely  by  former Los Angeles  काउंटी   श्रेष्ठ  Court Judge  जोसेफ   wapner   .
His tenure  lasted   इससे  the show  's   डेब्यू   on  September  14   ,  1981  ,  until May  21  , 1993 , when  the   दिखाएँ  was  रद्द  due to low ratings  .
This  बाएँ   the   दिखाएँ   साथ  a total  of  2,484 1⁄2-hour episodes  और  12 seasons .
The  दिखाएँ   थी  taped in Los Angeles  दौरान  its first life  .
After being cancelled  ,   reruns  aired  जबतक  September  9   ,  1994 .
On September 8 , 1997 ,  बाद   होने  out of  उत्पादन  for  चार  years  ,   the  People  's   अदालत   थी  revived for  a  second life in first-run  अनुप्रयोग   as   a   60-minute  program .
Former  वकील  and Mayor of New York  ed  Koch was  चुनी   as   arbiter  ,  जिससे  he  कायम   लिये  2  सीज़न  from  the   1997–98   ऋतु  through  the  1998–99 season  (   the  present  जीवन  's 2nd  ऋतु   और   overall  show  's  14th  )   .
by  the 1999–00  ऋतु  , husband of Judith  sheindlin   (   जो   presides   over  Judge  जुडी   )  and former  नई   यॉर्क   राज्य  Supreme Court  न्यायधीश  Jerry  sheindlin  succeeded  koch  .
sheindlin   lasted  one and a half  सीज़न   as   he  was replaced towards the end  of   the  2000–01  ऋतु  ( present  जीवन  's 4th season  और  overall  दिखाएँ  's  17th   )  .
Beginning in spring  2001   ,   फ्लोरिडा  judge Marilyn  milian   took   over  The People 's Court and has  presided   over  the show ever since .
एकबार  Milian completes  the  2012–13  ऋतु   ,  she  होगा  have served as longest arbiter  over   the   श्रेणी  with  12  and  a   हाफ  seasons .
As of  the   उपस्थित   ,  however , her years on  the  program tie Wapner at  12  seasons .
In the 2009-10  टेलीविज़न   ऋतु   ,   the  People 's Courts 2nd/present  जीवन   outlasted   इसके   पहला   जब   it   पहुँचे   13  seasons  .
While the show taped  in  New York City for  the  first 15  सीज़न  of its  दूसरी  life , it now  टेपों   in   stamford  , Connecticut as  of  the 2012-13 season  .
On September 3  ,  2012 ,  the  People  's  Court  's  2nd/present life entered its 16th season ( 28th  overall   ऋतु  )  .
With  28   कुल  seasons , The People 's  अदालत  ranks as  the  2nd longest-running courtroom  कार्यक्रम   पीछे  the  जारी   तलाक   अदालत  at 33  सीज़न  ( from its  3   संयुक्त  lives )  .
Utah  (  or ) (  arapaho  :  wo'tééneihí  ' ) is  a  state in the  पश्चिमी  United States .
It  became   the   45th  state admitted to  the   संघ  on January 4 ,  1896  .
यूटा  is the  13th-largest  , the  34th-most   populous   ,  and  the  10th-least-densely  आबादी  of the 50 United States  .
Approximately 80  %  of Utah 's 2,817,222  लोगों  live  साथ   the  Wasatch  सामने   ,  centering  on  Salt Lake City  ,   leaving   विशाल   expanses  of the  राज्य   nearly  uninhabited  और   बनाना   the  population  the  sixth most urbanized  in  the U.S.  यूटा   is  bordered  by   कोलोराडो  on the east  ,  Wyoming  on  the northeast , Idaho on the north , Arizona on  the  south ,  और  Nevada on the west .
It also touches a  कोने  of New  मैक्सिको  on  the  southeast .
यूटा  is  the   सबसे  religiously  समरूप   राज्य   in  the  संघ  .
Approximately 63 % of Utahns  हैं  reported to  be  members of The Church of Jesus Christ  of  Latter-day Saints  or   lds  ( Mormons  )   ,  which  greatly  influences  यूटा  culture and daily life .
the   संसार   मुख्यालय  of  the   गिरिजाघर   of   यीशु   मसीह   of  Latter-day  संतो  (  lds   गिरिजाघर   )   is   स्तिथ   in  Utah  's   राज्य   पूंजी  .
the   राज्य  is  a  center of transportation , education  ,  information  प्रौद्योगिकी  and  शोध  , government services ,  खनन  ,  और   a  major tourist  गंतव्य  for  बाहरी   मनोरंजन   .
According to the U.S. Census  ब्यूरो  's population estimates  ,   यूटा  is  the  fifth  fastest-growing  state  in   the  United  राज्य  as of 2012  .
St. George , was the fastest–growing  महानगर  area  in  the United  राज्य  from 2000 to 2005 .
A 2012 Gallup  नेशनल  survey found  यूटा  overall to be the ``  बेहतरीन  state to  सजीव   in  '' based on  13   forward-looking  measurements including  विभिन्न  economic , lifestyle , and  health-related  outlook metrics  .
Coldwater is a small town in  टेट   काउंटी   ,   मिसिसिपी  .
it   is  in  the   मेम्फिस   महानगर   क्षेत्रफल   .
the   जनसांख्यिकी  was 1,674  at  the 2000 census .
the   मुश्किल  palate is a thin horizontal  बोनी   थाली   of  the skull ,  स्तिथ   in  the roof of the mouth  .
it   spans  the  मेहराब  formed by the upper teeth  .
It is  formed  by  the   palatine   प्रक्रम  of the maxilla and horizontal  थाली   of  palatine  अस्थि  .
It forms a  विभाजन  between the nasal  passages   और  the mouth .
Also on the anterior portion of  the   छत  of the hard  तालु  is  the  Rugae  जिससे  are  the  irregular  ridges  in the mucous  झिल्ली  that help facilitate  the  movement  of   खाना   पीछे   towards   the   pharynx   .
This partition is continued deeper into the mouth  by  a  मांसल  extension called  the  soft palate  .
पूरा  set  of  scrolls ,  constituting  the  संपूर्ण   tanakh   .
The Tanakh (  ,   or  ; also Tenakh , Tenak ,  tanach   )  is a  नाम   प्रयुक्त   in   judaism  for the canon  of  the Hebrew Bible .
the  Tanakh  is  also known  as   the  Masoretic Text or  the  Miqra .
The name  is   an   एक्रोनिम  formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the  masoretic   टेक्स्ट   's  three  परंपरागत  subdivisions : The  तोरा  ( `` Teaching '' , also known  as  the Five  किताबे  of Moses  )  , Nevi'im  (   ``   नबियों  '' )  और   ketuvim  (  ``  Writings  ''  ) —hence TaNaKh .
the  name ``  miqra   ''  ( מקרא )  ,  meaning  ``   कि  which is  पढ़ा   ''   ,   is  an  वैकल्पिक   यहूदी  term for the Tanakh  .
the  books of  the  Tanakh  यहूद  relayed  साथ  an accompanying oral tradition passed  on  by each generation  ,  called  the  Oral Torah .
गम्भीरता   नाका  in Germany
Driving  अंतर्गत   the  influence  (  DUI  )   ,  driving  जबकि  intoxicated  (  DWI  )  , drunken driving  ,  drunk driving ,  पेय  driving ,  ऑपरेटिंग  under the influence  ,   पीने  and  ड्राइविंग  ,  or   impaired   ड्राइविंग  is the crime of driving a  मोटर  vehicle  साथ  blood  स्तर   of   दारू  in excess of  a  legal limit (  ``   रक्त  Alcohol Content ''  ,  or  ``   bac  ''  )   .
Similar regulations cover  ड्राइविंग  or operating  निश्चित  types of  मशीनरी   जबकि   प्रभावित  by  पीने  alcohol or  लेने  other drugs , including ,  लकिन  not  सीमित   to   नुस्खा  drugs .
This is a criminal offense  in   सबसे   राष्ट्र   .
Convictions do not  necessarily  involve actual driving of  the   गाडी   .
In most  jurisdictions   a  measurement such as  a  blood alcohol  सामग्री  (  bac  ) in excess of  a   विशिष्ट  threshold level ,  ऐसे  as  0.05  %  or  0.08  %   defines   the   ठोकर  ,  साथ  no  need  to prove  पुतलियों  or  होने   अंतर्गत  the influence of alcohol  .
In  कुछ   jurisdictions  , there  is  an aggravated category  of  the offense at  a  higher  स्तर  e.g .  0.12  %  .
In most  देशों  ,  anyone   जो   is  convicted of injuring or  हत्या  someone while under the  influence  of alcohol  or  drugs can  be  heavily  fined  ,  as  in France , in addition  to  being  दिए   a  lengthy  थाना  sentence .
Some  कार्य  have their own  नियम   और  BAC limits  ,  for  उदाहरण   वाणिज्यिक  pilot ,  और   the  Federal  रेलरोड  Administration  in   the  United States  रै   a  0.04 %  सीमा  for  ट्रैन   क्रू  .
कुछ  jurisdictions have multiple  स्तर   of  BAC ; for example ,  the  state of California  रै  a  0.08  %  bac  limit , which is lowered to  0.04  % if  the  operator holds a  वाणिज्यिक   ड्राइवर  's  अनुज्ञा  .
the   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   bac   सीमा  is 0.01 % for  those  younger than  21  years of  आयु   और   those  on probation for a previous DUI conviction .
Some  विशाल  corporations  have  their  अपना   नियम  ;  संघ   प्रशांत   रेलरोड  has their  अपना  BAC limit  of   0.02   %   कि   ,  if  violated   दौरान  a random test or a for-cause  परीक्षण  —  लिये  example , after a  ट्रैफ़िक   दुर्घटना  —  can  result in termination of employment with  no   मौका  of  भविष्य   re-hire  .
Many  राज्य  in the  u.S.   और  provinces in  कनाडा  have adopted  सच्चाई  in sentencing  कानून   कि   enforce   सख्त  guidelines  on   sentencing   ,  differing from previous practice where  थाना  time  थी  reduced  or  suspended after sentencing  था  been issued .
कुछ   jurisdictions  have  न्यायिक   दिशानिर्देश   requiring  a  अनिवार्य   न्यूनतम   वाक्य  .
दंड  for DUI  आरोप  range from expensive fees  to   forfetiruree  of your  अनुज्ञा  plates and in some serious  हालातों  ,  अपना  vehicle  .
A drunk driving  सिम्युलेटर  in Montréal , Canada
the  specific  दण्ड   ठोकर   may  be called  ,   depending  on the jurisdiction  ,  driving under  the   influence   [  of alcohol or  अन्य  drugs  ]   (   dui  )  ,  driving  अंतर्गत   तीव्र   influence   (   duii   )   ,  driving while intoxicated  (  DWI  )   ,  operating  अंतर्गत  the influence ( OUI  )  operating  जबकि  intoxicated ( OWI )  ,   ऑपरेटिंग  a motor vehicle while intoxicated  (  OMVI )  ,   ड्राइविंग  under  the  combined influence  of  alcohol and/or other drugs , driving  अंतर्गत  the influence per se or drunk  in   चार्ज  [ of  a  vehicle ] .
अनेक  such laws  लागू  also to motorcycling  ,   बोटिंग   ,   piloting  aircraft  ,  use of motile farm equipment  ऐसे   as  tractors and  combines  , riding horses or driving a horse-drawn  गाडी   ,  or  bicycling  , possibly  साथ  different BAC  स्तर   than   ड्राइविंग   .
In  कुछ   jurisdictions  there are separate charges depending on  the  vehicle  प्रयुक्त  , such  as  BWI (  bicycling  while  intoxicated   )   ,  which may  carry   a   हल्का  sentence  .
In the  संयुक्त  States , local law enforcement  एजेंसियों  made  1,467,300  arrests  देशभर  for driving under  the  influence of  दारू   in   1996  , compared  to  1.9 million  ऐसे   रखवाले   दौरान  the  शिखर   साल  in  1983   .
In 1997  an   अनुमानित  513,200  dwi   अपराधियों  were  in  prison  or  jail  ,  down  इससे   593,000  in 1990 and up  इससे  270,100 in  1986  .
Officers from US  कस्टम  and Border Protection boarding  a   जलयान
Law enforcement in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  is  एक   of   तीन  major components  of   the   दण्ड  justice system  of  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   ,  along  साथ  courts and  corrections   .
हालांकि  there  exists   an  inherent  interrelatedness   between   the  different groups that make up the  दण्ड   इंसाफ  system based on their  अपराधों  deterrence purpose  ,   प्रत्येक   घटक  operates independently  इससे   एक   another  .
however  ,  the  judiciary  is  vested with the power to  मेक  legal  determinations  regarding the conduct  of  the other  दो   components  .
अलावा  from  maintaining  order  और  service  कृत्यों  , the  purpose   of  policing is the  छानबीन  of  suspected  criminal activity  और  the referral  of   the  results  of   investigations   और  of suspected criminals to  the  courts .
विधि  enforcement ,  to  varying  डिग्री  at  अलग  levels of  सरकारी   और  in  अलग  agencies ,  is  also commonly charged  साथ  the  जिम्मेदारियों  of deterring criminal activity and  of   preventing  the  कामयाब  commission of  अपराधों   in  progress  ;  the service and  प्रवर्तन  of  वारंट  ,  writs   और  other orders  of  the  न्यायालयों   .
विधि  enforcement  एजेंसियों  are also involved  in  providing  पहला  response to  emergencies   और   अन्य  threats to public  सुरक्षा  ;  the  protection of  निश्चित  public facilities  और  infrastructure ;  the  maintenance  of   पब्लिक  order ; the protection  of  public officials ;  और   the   आपरेशन   of   कुछ   correctional   सुविधाएं  (  प्रायः  at  the   लोकल   स्तर  )  .
Elmer  figueroa  Arce (  born  June  28  , 1968 ) , best known under the stage name Chayanne  ,   is  a  प्यूर्टो  Rican  लैटिन   पॉप   सिंगर  and  कर्ता  .
as  a  सोलो  artist  ,   chayanne  has released 21 solo albums  और  sold  over   15  million  एल्बम  worldwide .
``  संसार   युद्ध   हल्क   ''   is  a  कॉमिक  book  क्रॉसओवर  storyline that ran through a  स्वः  titled limited  श्रेणी   और  various  अन्य  titles  प्रकाशित   by   आश्चर्य  Comics in 2007  ,  featuring the Hulk .
The  श्रेणी   consists   of  five main  मुद्दे  titled  संसार   युद्ध   हल्क  ,  साथ  Greg  पाक  as writer  और  John Romita ,  jr.  as penciller ,  और  three other limited series  :   संसार  War  हल्क   :  Front  लकीर   ,   संसार  War  हल्क   :   गामा  Corps ,  और  World War  हल्क  : X-Men  .
It also ran  through  several  अन्य  Marvel  कॉमिक्स  series  .
The plot  is   the   culmination   of  a series of  कार्यक्रम  that  began  with the  हल्क  being tricked  into   स्पेस  by the  illuminati   और   a  life  मॉडल  decoy of Nick  फ़्यूरी  ,  the   हल्क  's  subsequent   निर्वासन   देखी   in  Planet Hulk and his imminent return to Earth to seek revenge  on   the  Illuminati  .
Marion  मिशेल  Morrison (  born  Marion Robert Morrison  ;  May 26 , 1907  –  June  11  ,  1979  )  ,  better known  by   उसके  stage name John  वेन   ,  was an American  फिल्मी  actor  ,  director  और  producer  .
An Academy  पुरस्कार   -winner  ,  वेन  was  among  the top box office  draws  for three decades ,  और   थी   नामित  the all-time top  money-making  star  .
An enduring American icon , he epitomized  खुरदरा   मर्दानगी   और   is  famous for  उसके  demeanor ,  सहित   उसके  distinctive  शांत   आवाज़  , walk , and height  .
वेन  was born in  winterset  , Iowa but his family  relocated   to  the  वृहद  Los Angeles area  जब   he   थी   चार  years  बूढ़ा  .
He found work  at   लोकल   फिल्मी   studios   जब  he  खोया   उसके  football scholarship to USC as a  परिणाम  of a bodysurfing  दुर्घटना  .
Initially  working  for the Fox Film  निगम   ,   he   ज़्यादातर  appeared  in   छोटी  bit  भाग  .
His first leading  भूमिका   आए   in  the widescreen  एपिक   the   बिग   ट्रेल   (   1930  )  ,  which  led  to leading  भूमिकाएँ  in  numerous   films  throughout  the  1930s , many of them in the western genre  .
उसके  career  रोज़  to further  हाइट्स  in 1939  ,  with  जॉन  Ford 's  stagecoach  making  उसे   an   तत्काल   superstar   .
वेन  would  go  on to  स्टार  in 142 pictures , primarily typecast in Western  films   .
among  his best  ज्ञात  later films  हैं  The Quiet Man ( 1952  )   ,   जिससे  follows  उसे  as an Irish-American boxer and his  प्रेम  affair  साथ   a  fiery spinster played  by  Maureen O'Hara  ;  The Searchers ( 1956 )  ,   in   जिससे  he  plays  a  सिविल  War veteran who seeks out his abducted  भांजी   ;   रिओ  Bravo (  1959  )  ,   playing  a  शेरिफ   साथ   डीन  Martin  ;  True  grit  (  1969   )  , playing a  humorous   u.s  . Marshal who  सेट   आउट  to  avenge  a  man   's  death in the  भूमिका   कि  won  वेन   an   अकादमी   पुरस्कार  ;  और  The  shootist  (  1976  )  ,   उसके  final screen performance in which he plays an aging  gunslinger  battling cancer  .
Wayne  स्थानांतरित   to  Orange  काउंटी   ,  California  in   the   1960s  ,  और  was a prominent Republican in  हॉलीवुड   ,   supporting  anti-communist positions  .
He died  of  stomach cancer  in  1979 .
In June  1999   ,   the  American  फिल्मी   संस्थान   नामित  Wayne  13th   among  the Greatest Male  स्क्रीन  Legends of  सब  Time  .
Galileo Galilei  (   ;  15  फ़रवरी  1564  –  8 January  1642   )  , was  an   इतालवी   physicist  , mathematician , astronomer  ,   और   पारस  who played  a  major role in  the   वैज्ञानिक  Revolution  .
उसके  achievements include  सुधार   to  the  दूरदर्शी  and consequent astronomical  observations  and support for Copernicanism .
गैलीलियो   रै  been  पुकारा  the `` father of modern  observational   खगोलशास्त्र  `` , the ``  पिता  of  आधुनिक  physics `` , the  ``  father of  विज्ञान  '' ,  और  ``  the  Father of Modern  विज्ञान  '' .
उसके  contributions to observational astronomy  शामिल  the telescopic confirmation of the phases of Venus  ,  the discovery of the four largest satellites of Jupiter ( named the Galilean moons in his honour  )   ,  and the  अवलोकन  and  विश्लेषण  of sunspots  .
Galileo  भी  worked in applied  विज्ञान  and  प्रौद्योगिकी  , inventing an improved military  कम्पास  and other  यंत्र   .
गैलीलियो   's  championing of heliocentrism was controversial within his lifetime  ,   जब  most subscribed to  either   geocentrism   or   the  Tychonic  प्रणाली  .
he  met with opposition from astronomers  ,  who doubted heliocentrism due  to   the  absence of  an   observed  stellar parallax .
the   पदार्थ   थी  investigated  by  the Roman  inquisition   in   1615   ,  and they  concluded  that  it  could be supported as only  a  possibility , not  an  established fact  .
Galileo later  defended  his  दृश्य   in   संवाद  Concerning  the   दो  Chief World Systems , which appeared to  आक्रमण   पोप  Urban VIII  और   यूँ  alienated him  और  the Jesuits , who had both  समर्थित  Galileo  up   जबतक  this point  .
He was  आजमाया  by the Inquisition , found  ``  vehemently suspect  of  heresy  ''   ,  forced to  recant  , and spent  the  rest  of   उसके  life under  हाउस  arrest .
it  was  जबकि   गैलीलियो  was under house arrest that he wrote one of his  finest   works  ,  दो  New  sciences   ,  in which  he  summarised  the  work  he   था   किया  some  चालीस   सालो   पहले   ,  on the two sciences now called  kinematics   और   शक्ति   of  materials  .

Prototype OLED lighting  फलक   विकसित  by Lumiotec
demonstration  of  a   लचीली  OLED  यंत्र
an  OLED ( organic  light-emitting   डायोड   )   is  a light-emitting  डायोड   (   led  )  in  which  the   emissive  electroluminescent layer  is   a   फिल्मी  of organic  यौगिक   जिससे  emits light  in  response to  an  electric current .
इस  layer of organic semiconductor is  situated  between two electrodes .
Generally  ,  at  तनिक  one of these  electrodes  is  पारदर्शी   .
OLEDs  हैं   प्रयुक्त   to  create  डिजिटल   प्रदर्शक  in devices  ऐसे  as television  screens  , computer monitors  ,  portable systems such as mobile phones ,  हैंडहेल्ड   खेल  consoles  और  PDAs .
a  major  क्षेत्रफल  of  शोध  is the development  of   श्वेत  OLED devices  लिये  use in  solid-state   lighting   अनुप्रयोग   .
वहीँ  are two  प्रमुख  families of OLEDs : those based  on  small molecules and  those  employing polymers .
Adding mobile ions to  an  OLED creates a light-emitting electrochemical cell  or  LEC ,  जिससे  has a  थोड़ा  different mode of  आपरेशन   .
OLED  प्रदर्शक  can  उपयोग  either  passive-matrix   (   pmoled   )  or active-matrix addressing schemes .
active-matrix  OLEDs  (  AMOLED  )  require  a  thin-film transistor backplane  to   स्विच  each individual pixel on or off  ,   लकिन  allow  लिये  higher  रेज़ोल्यूशन   और  larger display sizes .
An OLED display  works  without  a   backlight  .
यूँ   ,  it  can   प्रदर्शक   गहन   ब्लैक  levels and  can  be thinner and  हल्का   than  a liquid crystal  प्रदर्शक  ( LCD ) .
in   कम   परिवेश   लाइट   शर्तें  such as  a  dark  रूम  an  oled  screen  can  achieve a  उच्चतर  contrast ratio  than   an  LCD  ,  whether  the   एलसीडी  uses cold cathode fluorescent  दीये   or   led   backlight   .
A  carton  and a glass  of  eggnog  इससे   मॉन्ट्रियल  , Canada  ,   प्रर्दशित   इसके  French  मुखाग्र  ( English  रिवर्स  ) and the French term lait de poule  (  literally ,  ``  hen 's  मिल्क  '' )
Eggnog , or egg nog  ,   is   a  sweetened  दुग्ध   -आधारd  beverage traditionally  बना   साथ  milk  and/or  cream  ,  sugar , and  whipped  eggs  (   जिससे  gives it  a  frothy texture )  .
Brandy ,  rum   ,  whisky , bourbon , vodka ,  or  a  संयोजन   of  liquors are often  added   .
The finished serving is often garnished with a  sprinkling   of   मैदान   दालचीनी  or nutmeg  .
It was also  ज्ञात   as   the  egg  मिल्क   पंच  .
Eggnog is a popular  पेय  throughout  the  United  राज्य  and  कनाडा  , and is usually  संबद्ध   साथ  Christmas  .
Eggnog  may   be  added as a flavoring to food or  पेय  such  as  coffee  और  tea  .
Eggnog  as  a  कस्टर्ड   can   भी   be  used as an  बर्फ   मलाई   आधार   .
a   pasty   (  , ) ,  (  sometimes known  in  Britain as a Cornish pasty , and in the United States  as  a  pastie  or  अंग्रेजों   pasty   )  is a baked  पेस्ट्री   ,  a traditional  किस्में   of  which  is   विशेषकर   संबद्ध   साथ  Cornwall  ,  the  westernmost  county in England .
It is made by  रखकर   uncooked  filling typically of  मांस   और   सब्जियां  , without  मांस  in  शाकाहारी  versions ,  on  a flat pastry circle  और   फोल्डिंग  it to  रैप  the  भरना  , crimping the  किनारे   to   रूप  a seal .
After baking ,  the   परिणाम   is  a raised  semicircular  comestible .
The  परंपरागत   cornish  pasty  ,  which  रै  Protected Geographical  indication  (  pgi  )  औकात  in Europe ,  is   भर  with  बीफ   ,  sliced  or  diced  आलू  , swede  (  also  ज्ञात   as  a  पीला   शलजम  or rutabaga – referred to  in  Cornwall  as   शलजम  ) and  प्याज  , seasoned  साथ   नमक   और  pepper ,  और  is baked .
Today  ,  the  pasty   is  the food  सबसे  associated with  कॉर्नवॉल   ,   it  is  regarded   as   the  national  डिश  , and it accounts for 6  %   of   the   cornish   खाना   अर्थव्यवस्था   .
pasties  with  अनेक  different fillings are made  ;  some  दुकानें  specialise  in  selling all  sorts   of  pasties .
the  origins of  the  pasty are unclear  ,  though there are many references to them throughout  ऐतिहासिक  documents  और   fiction  .
the   pasty   is  now popular world-wide due to  the   स्प्रेड  of Cornish miners , and  विसंगतियाँ  can be found in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  ,  the   संयुक्त  States  ,  Mexico  और  elsewhere  .
The ( ortho-  )   सहानुभूतिपूर्ण   बेचैन  system (  sns   )   is  one of  तीन  major  भाग   of   the   autonomic  nervous  प्रणाली   :   the  others  होने   the   enteric  and  parasympathetic   प्रणालियों  .
Its  सामान्य  action is to mobilize the  देह  's  बेचैन  system fight-or-flight response .
It is , however , constantly  क्रियाशील   at   a  basic  स्तर  to maintain  समस्थापन   .
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is  a   non-volatile  memory card  स्वरूप  for  उपयोग  in  पोर्टेबल   डिवाइस  , such as mobile phones  ,   डिजिटल  cameras ,  gps  navigation  डिवाइस  ,  और  tablet computers  .
The  सुरक्षित   डिजिटल  standard  is   कायम  by the  sd   कार्ड   संघ   (  SDA )  .
SD technologies have been  implemented   in   अधिक  than 400 brands across  दर्जनों  of product categories and more than  8,000   मॉडल  .
the   सुरक्षित  Digital format includes  चार   कार्ड  families available  in  three  अलग  form  कारकों  .
the  four families are  the   असली  Standard-Capacity (  sdsc   )  , the  high-capacity  ( SDHC  )  ,  the   extended-capacity   (   sdxc  ) , and  the   sdio   ,  which combines  input/output  functions  साथ   आंकड़ा  storage  .
The three  रूप  factors are the  असली   आकार  , the `` mini  ''  size ,  और   the  ``  सूक्ष्म  '' size  (   देखिए   उदाहरण   )  .
वहीँ  are many  combinations  of form factors  और   यंत्र  families  .
Electrically  passive   adapters  allow the use of  a   छोटी  card in  a  host  यंत्र  built to  थाम   a  larger  कार्ड  .
मेजबान  devices that comply with newer versions  of   the   specification  provide  पिछड़ा   संगतता  and accept  पुरानी  SD cards  ,  but this article explains several  कारकों  that can prevent the use of  a  newer SD  card:
a  newer card may offer  वृहद   क्षमता  than the  मेजबान   यंत्र   can   हैंडल  .
a   नए  card may use a  संचिका  system the  मेजबान  device  can  not navigate .
उपयोग  of an SDIO  कार्ड  requires the  मेजबान   यंत्र  be  designed   लिये  the input/output  कृत्यों  the  कार्ड   provides  .
The  संगठन   of  the  कार्ड  was  बदला   starting   साथ  the SDHC  परिवार   .
Some vendors produced SDSC cards above  1   gb   पहले   the   sda  had standardized a method of doing  so  .
The SDA  उपयोग  several trademarked  लोगो   to  enforce  अनुपालन  with  इसके  specifications and  assure  users  of  compatibility .
the  following  is  a  सूची  of critics of  the   नई   सौदे  .
डेनियल  Lawrence  व्हिटनी   (  born  फ़रवरी   17  ,  1963  )  बेहतरीन  known by his stage name  और  character  लैरी   the   केबल  Guy  ,   is   an  American  stand-up   हास्य  , actor  ,  country  म्यूज़िक  artist , voice actor  ,   और   पूर्व   रेडियो  personality .
he  was one of  the  members of the Blue Collar  कॉमेडी   दौरे   ,  a  कॉमेडी   troupe   जिससे   शामिल   विधेयक  Engvall  ,  Ron  श्वेत   ,   और  Jeff  foxworthy   (  with whom  he   रै  starred  on  Blue Collar  tv  )  .
व्हिटनी  has  released   सात  comedy albums ,  of   जिससे  three have  महरूम  certified  सुनहरा   by  the  riaa   लिये  shipments of 500,000 copies  .
in   जोड  , he has starred in three Blue  कॉलर  Comedy Tour-related movies , as well as  in   the  films  लैरी   the   केबल   guy   :   स्वास्थ्य  Inspector , Delta Farce  ,  and Witless Protection  ,   as  well as voicing Mater in the Cars  मताधिकार  .
Whitney  's  catchphrase : ``  git-r-done   !  '' is  भी  the  शीर्षक  of his  किताब  .
On  जनवरी  26  ,   2010  ,  the  TV  चैनल   इतिहास  announced that it was  ordering   a   श्रेणी  starring Whitney called Only in America  साथ  Larry the Cable Guy ,  in   जिससे   he   होता  explore  the   देश  and immerse himself in different  lifestyles  ,  कार्य  , and hobbies .
The first episode  of   the   श्रेणी  aired on February 8  ,  2011 .
विटामिन   d   is   a  group of  fat-soluble  secosteroids responsible for  intestinal   अवशोषण  of calcium and phosphate  .
in   इंसानो   ,   the  most important  सम्बन्धित   यौगिकों   of  vitamin D are  विटामिन   d2   और   विटामिन  D3 .
Cholecalciferol  (   विटामिन  D3  )  and  ergocalciferol  (  विटामिन  D2  )  are unique  as   वे   constitute  what we know as  विटामिन  D  और  can  be  ingested from the diet  and/or  supplements .
The body can  भी  synthesize  विटामिन  D ( from  कोलेस्ट्रॉल  )  जब   सूर्य  exposure  is   पर्याप्त  (  hence  its  उपनाम  , the `` sunshine vitamin ''  )   .
Although vitamin  d   is  commonly  पुकारा  a  विटामिन  ,  it   is  not  दरअसल   an  essential dietary  विटामिन  in the strict  भाव   ,  as  it  can  be  synthesized  in   पर्याप्त   amounts   by  most  स्तनधारियों  exposed  to  sunlight  .
( Cats and dogs can  नहीं   synthesize   विटामिन  D efficiently and  जरूर   प्राप्त  it in  उनके  diet . )
an   सशुल्क  chemical  यौगिक  (  or  related set of  यौगिकों   )  is only scientifically  पुकारा  a  विटामिन   जब  it can  नहीं  be synthesized in sufficient quantities  by  an organism ,  और  must  be  obtained  इससे   उनके  diet .
however  , as  साथ   अन्य   यौगिकों   commonly  called  विटामिन  ,  विटामिन   d   थी   खोजा   in  an  प्रयत्न  to  ढूँढें   the   dietary  substance  कि  was lacking  in   a   बीमारी  , namely , rickets  ,   the  childhood form  of  osteomalacia .
Additionally , like  अन्य   यौगिकों  called vitamins ,  in   the   विकसित  world vitamin D is  added   to  staple  भोजन  , such  as   मिल्क   ,  to  avoid  disease due  to   कमियां  .
Measures  of  serum levels reflect  endogenous   संश्लेषण   इससे  exposure  to  sunlight as  खूब  as intake from  the   आहार   ,  and  it  is believed that  संश्लेषण   may   योगदान  generally to the  मेंटेनेंस  of  पर्याप्त  serum concentrations .
the   प्रमाण  indicates that the synthesis of  विटामिन  D from sun exposure works in  a  feedback loop that prevents toxicity but  ,  because of  अनिश्चितता   परिचय  the cancer  रिस्क  from  धूप   ,   no   सुझाव  are issued by  the  Institute of  आयुर्विज्ञान  , USA , for  the  amount of sun exposure required  to  meet vitamin  d  requirements  .
तदनुसार   ,   the  Dietary Reference  intakes   लिये  vitamin  d  assume that  no  synthesis occurs and that  सब  of  a  person 's vitamin D is  इससे  their  आहार  ,  हालांकि   कि  will rarely occur in practice .
in  the liver vitamin D is  परिवर्तित  to calcidiol , which is also known as  calcifediol   (   इन   )  ,  25-hydroxycholecalciferol  ,  or   25-hydroxyvitamin  D—abbreviated 25 ( OH  )  D  ;  and which is  the  specific vitamin D metabolite that is measured in  सीरम  to determine a person  's  vitamin D  औकात   .
भाग   of   the   calcidiol   is   परिवर्तित  by the kidneys  to  calcitriol , the biologically active form of vitamin  D.  Calcitriol  circulates  as  a  hormone in the  रक्त  , regulating the  विशेषज्ञता   of  calcium  और   फास्फेट  in  the   bloodstream  and  promoting  the healthy  विकास  and  remodeling  of bone .
Calcidiol is  भी   परिवर्तित   to   calcitriol   बाहर  of  the  kidneys  लिये  other  उद्देश्य  ,  ऐसे  as the proliferation ,  differentiation  and  apoptosis  of  कोशिकाएं   ;   calcitriol  also  affects   neuromuscular   फलन  and  सूजन  .
Beyond its  उपयोग  to prevent osteomalacia or rickets , the  प्रमाण  for other  स्वास्थ्य  effects  of   विटामिन  D supplementation  in  the  सामान्य   जनसांख्यिकी  is inconsistent  .
the  best evidence of benefit is for  अस्थि  health and a decrease in  मृत्यु   in   बुजुर्ग  women  .
Standard form  of  the  आवधिक  table .
The  रंगों  represent different  श्रेणी   of  elements explained below .
The periodic table  is   a   table   प्रदर्शक  of the  रासायनिक  elements  ,  organized  on  the basis of their atomic numbers  ,  electron configurations  ,   और   पुनरावर्ती  chemical properties .
Elements  हैं  presented in order of increasing atomic  क्रमांक  (  क्रमांक  of protons ) .
The standard form of table comprises an 18  ×  7 grid or main  देह   of  elements , positioned  ऊपर   a   छोटी  double row of elements  .
The table can also  be  deconstructed into four rectangular  ब्लॉक  : the s-block to the  बाएँ   ,  the p-block to  the  right ,  the  d-block  in  the  मध्य  ,  और  the f-block below that .
the  rows of  the  table  हैं   पुकारा  periods ;  the  columns of the s-  ,  d-  ,   और   p-blocks  are called  समूह   ,  with some of  ये   having  names such as the  हैलोजन्स   or   the   प्रतिष्ठित  gases .
Since , by  परिभाषा   ,   a   आवधिक  table incorporates recurring trends  ,   कोई   ऐसे  table can be used to derive relationships between  the   गुण  of  the  elements  और  predict  the  properties of new  ,  yet to be discovered or synthesized ,  तत्व   .
As a  परिणाम  , a periodic table—whether  in  the standard  रूप   or  some  अन्य  variant—provides a useful framework  लिये  analyzing chemical behavior , and such tables  हैं   widely   प्रयुक्त  in chemistry and other  sciences   .
हालांकि   precursors  exist , Dmitri Mendeleev  is   generally  credited with the  प्रकाशन  ,  in   1869   ,  of the  पहला  widely recognized periodic table .
He  विकसित   उसके  table  to  illustrate periodic trends in  the  properties  of  the then-known  तत्व  .
Mendeleev  भी  predicted  कुछ   गुण  of then-unknown  तत्व  that would be  अपेक्षित  to fill gaps in this  तालिका   .
Most of his predictions were proved correct when the elements  in  question were  subsequently  discovered .
Mendeleev 's  आवधिक  table  रै  since been expanded and  परिष्कृत   साथ   the   डिस्कवरी  or  संश्लेषण   of  further new  तत्व   और  the  विकास  of new  सैद्धांतिक  models to explain  रासायनिक  behavior  .
All elements from  परमाणु   संख्याएँ   1   (   हाइड्रोजन  )  to  118  (   ununoctium  ) have been discovered or  synthesized   .
The elements  इससे  1 to 98 ( californium  )  have  महरूम  found  to  exist  naturally   ,  although  कुछ   हैं  found only  in   ट्रेस  amounts  और  were  initially   खोजा  by synthesis in laboratories .
The elements after 98 have only  महरूम  synthesized in laboratories  .
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is  होने  pursued  ,   साथ  the  सवाल  of how the periodic table may  need  to be modified to accommodate  कोई   ऐसे   परिवर्धन  being  a  matter  of  ongoing  बहस  .
Numerous  सिंथेटिक  radionuclides of  naturally   occurring  elements  have  also  महरूम  produced  in   laboratories  .
न्यूनतम   मजदूरी   by  U.S. state and  u.S.   territory  (  अमरीकी  Samoa  ,   गुआम  ,  प्यूर्टो   रीको   ,   वर्जिन   आइलैंड्स  )  ,   as  of  jan.  1 ,  2013  .
In  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  मजदूर   हैं   generally  entitled to be paid no less than  the  statutory  न्यूनतम   मजदूरी  .
The  संघीय   सरकारी  mandates  a   देशभर  minimum wage level of $ 7.25 per  घंटा   ,  while some states  और  municipalities have set minimum wage levels  उच्चतर  than the  संघीय   स्तर  ,  साथ  the  उच्चतम  state  न्यूनतम  wage  होने   $  9.19 per  घंटा   in   वॉशिंगटन   as   of  2013 .
Among those paid by the hour  in   2012   ,   1.6  million were reported as  कमाई  exactly  the  prevailing federal minimum wage .
About 2.0  लाख   यहूद   reported  as earning  मजदूरी   नीचे   the  minimum .
Together  ,   ये   3.6  million workers with wages at or  नीचे  the  न्यूनतम  made up 4.7  प्रतिशत  of  सब  hourly-paid workers .

Evan  विलियम्स  bourbon whiskey
bourbon   whiskey  is  a  type  of   अमरीकी   whiskey  – a barrel-aged  आसुत   स्पिरिट   बना  primarily from corn .
the  name  of  the spirit derives  इससे  its  ऐतिहासिक  association with  an   क्षेत्रफल  known as Old Bourbon  ,  around  कया   is  now Bourbon County ,  केंटकी  (  जिससे   ,  in  फेरे  , was  नामित  after the French  हाउस  of Bourbon royal family  )  .
it   रै   महरूम  produced  चूंकि   the  18th century .
जबकि  it  may  be made anywhere  in  the United  राज्य   ,  it is  strongly   संबद्ध   साथ   the  American  दक्षिण   in   सामान्य  ,  और  Kentucky  in  particular .
The Mona Lisa ( La  gioconda  or  la  Joconde ) is a half-length  पोर्ट्रेट   of   a   स्त्री  by the Italian  कलाकार  Leonardo da  विंची  , which has been acclaimed as ``  the  best  ज्ञात   ,  the most visited , the most written about  ,  the most  सुंग  about  ,   the  most parodied work of art  in  the world .  ''
the   पेंटिंग   ,   विचार   to   be  a  पोर्ट्रेट   of  Lisa  gherardini  , the  बीवी  of Francesco  डेल   giocondo  , is in  आयल  on  a   poplar  panel  ,  and is  believed   to  have  महरूम  painted between 1503 and 1506 .
it  was acquired  by  King  फ्रांसिस  I of  फ़्रांस   और   is  now the property of the French Republic , on permanent display at the  musée   du  Louvre in Paris  चूंकि  1797  .
The  ambiguity   of  the subject 's  अभिव्यक्ति   ,  which is  अक्सर  described as  enigmatic   ,  the  monumentality  of the  संयोजन   ,  the  हल्का   मॉडलिंग  of  फ़ॉर्म   और  the  वायुमंडलीय  illusionism were novel  qualities   कि   have  contributed  to  the continuing  fascination  and  पढ़ाई  of the work .
Robert Allen  पामर   (  19  जनवरी  1949 –  26   सितंबर   2003  ) , was an English singer-songwriter  और   संगीतकार   .
He  थी   ज्ञात   लिये   उसके   distinctive  voice and the eclectic mix of musical styles on his albums ,  combining   आत्मा   ,  jazz  ,   चट्टान   ,   पॉप   ,   रेगी   और   ब्लूज़   .
he  found  कामयाबी   दोनो  in  उसके  solo career and in the  musical  act The  शक्ति   स्टेशन   ,  and had Top 10 songs in both  the   uk  and the US  .
His  iconic  music videos by Terence Donovan  लिये  the hits `` Addicted  to   प्रेम  ``  और  ``  बस  Irresistible `` featured  identically  dressed  नाचना  women with  पाले   चेहरों   ,   अंधेरा   नजर  makeup and bright red  लिपस्टिक   ,   जिससे  resembled the women in the art  of  Patrick Nagel  ,  an artist popular in the 1980s .
Sharp-suited  ,   उसके  involvement  in   the   म्यूज़िक  industry commenced  in  the 1960s  ,  covered  पाँच   दशकों   और   शामिल  a  वर्तनी   साथ   सिरका  Joe .
पामर  received a number  of   पुरस्कार   throughout   उसके  career  ,  including  दो   ग्रैमी  Awards  लिये  Best  पुरूष  Rock Vocal Performance ,  an   एमटीवी   वीडियो  Music  पुरस्कार  ,  और   थी  twice  मनोनीत  for the  ब्रिट  Award for  बेहतरीन   अंग्रेजों   पुरूष  .
computed  tomography angiography  (  CTA  )  is a computed tomography technique used  to  visualize arterial  और  venous vessels  throughout  the  देह   .
इस  ranges from arteries serving  the  brain  to  those bringing blood to the lungs  ,   गुर्दे  ,  बाहें  and legs .

prise   de  la Bastille by  jean-pierre-louis-laurent  Houel
bastille  Day  is  the name  दिए  in English-speaking  देशों  to the  फ्रेंच  National  दिन   ,  which  is   मनाये   on   the  14th  of   जुलाई   प्रत्येक   साल  .
In France , it  is  formally  पुकारा  La  fête  Nationale ( ; The  नेशनल   जश्न   )  and  commonly   le  quatorze juillet (  ;   the  fourteenth  of  July )  .
It commemorates  the  1790 Fête de la Fédération , held  on  the  पहला  anniversary of the storming of  the  Bastille on 14  जुलाई  1789 ; the anniversary of the storming of the Bastille fortress-prison was seen as  a   प्रतीक  of the  uprising   of   the   आधुनिक  nation , and  of  the reconciliation of  सब   the  French inside the constitutional monarchy which  preceded   the   पहला  Republic ,  दौरान  the  फ्रेंच   क्रान्ति   .
Festivities and official  ceremonies  are held all over  फ़्रांस  .
The oldest and  largest  regular  सैन्य   परेड  in Europe  is   आयोजित   on   the  morning of 14 July , on  the  Champs-Élysées avenue in Paris in front of  the  President of the  गणतंत्र  ,  फ्रेंच  officials and  विदेशी   अतिथि  .
the  United  राज्य  of America ( USA  or  U.S.A. ) ,  commonly  called  the  United  राज्य   (  US  or  U.S. ) or America  ,  is  a  federal  गणतंत्र  consisting of  पचास   राज्य  and  a  federal  ज़िला  .
The  निम्नतर  forty-eight contiguous  राज्य  and  the   संघीय   ज़िला   of  Washington , D.C. are in central North America between  कनाडा  and Mexico  .
The  राज्य  of Alaska is west  of   कनाडा  and  ईस्ट   of   रूस  across the Bering  जलसन्धि  , and  the  state  of  Hawaii  is   in  the  mid-north   प्रशांत   .
The  देश   भी   रै  five populated and nine unpopulated  territories  in the  प्रशांत   और   the   caribbean  .
At 3.79 million  वर्गाकार   मील  ( 9.83 million km2  )  and  साथ   around   315   लाख  people ,  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   is   the   third-  or fourth-largest country by total area  और   the  third-largest  by   दोनो  land  क्षेत्रफल   और  population  .
It is  एक  of the  संसार  's most  ethnically  diverse  और   multicultural  nations , the product of large-scale  आव्रजन  from many countries .
the  geography and climate  of  the U.S.  is  also extremely  विविध  ,  साथ  deserts , plains ,  वनों  ,  और   kyu  that are  घर   to  a  चौड़ी   किस्में  of species  .
paleoindians  migrated  इससे  Asia to  कया  is now  the  United States mainland around 15,000  सालो   पहले  .
After 1500 ,  बूढ़ा   संसार   रोगों   introduced   by  Europeans greatly  घटाया  their  populations   .
European colonization began around 1600 and  आए  mostly from  इंग्लैण्ड   .
The United  राज्य  emerged  इससे  thirteen British colonies located along the  अटलांटिक  seaboard .
Disputes between Great Britain  और  the American colonies led to  the   अमरीकी  Revolution .
On July  4  , 1776 ,  delegates  from  the  13  colonies   unanimously   जारी  the Declaration of  स्वतंत्रता  , which  स्थापित   the  United States of  अमेरिका  .
the  American Revolutionary War ,  जिससे  ended with  the   मान्यता  of  स्वतंत्रता  of  the  United  राज्य  from  the   किंगडम  of  ग्रेट  Britain  ,  was the  पहला   कामयाब  war of independence  विरूद्ध   a  European colonial  साम्राज्य  .
the   वर्तमान  Constitution  थी  adopted  on   सितंबर  17 ,  1787  ; twenty-seven  amendments   have   चूंकि   महरूम  added to the Constitution  .
The  पहला   टेन  amendments ,  collectively  named the Bill of Rights , were ratified  in  1791 and guarantee many  आधारभूत   सिविल   अधिकारों  and  freedoms   .
Driven by the doctrine of manifest  नियति  ,  the  United States embarked on a  vigorous  expansion across North America throughout the  19th  century .
This involved displacing native  जनजातियों   ,  acquiring new territories ,  और  gradually  admitting   नई  states  .
The American  सिविल   युद्ध  ended legalized slavery in the United States  .
By the  समाप्त   of  the  उन्नीसवीं  century ,  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   विस्तारित  into the  प्रशांत   समंदर   ,  and its economy was  the   संसार   's  largest  .
The Spanish–American War and confirmed the country 's  औकात  as a global military  शक्ति   .
the  United States  उभरा   इससे   as  a global superpower , the  पहला  country  साथ  nuclear weapons ,  और   a  permanent  सदस्य  of  the  United Nations  सुरक्षा   परिषद   .
The  समाप्त   of  the  ठंडा  War and the dissolution of  the   सोवियत  Union  बाएँ   the  United  राज्य   as   the  sole  महाशक्ति   .
The United States  is   a   विकसित   देश   और  has the  संसार  's largest  नेशनल  economy , with  an   अनुमानित  2012 GDP  of   $  15.6 trillion  19  % of global  जीडीपी   at  purchasing-power  पैरिटी  ,  as  of  2011  .
The per capita GDP of the U.S. was the world 's  sixth-highest  as of 2010 ,  हालांकि  America 's wealth inequality was  भी   क्रमित  highest among  oecd   देशों   by  the World Bank .
the   अर्थव्यवस्था  is fueled  by   an  abundance of natural  संसाधन  , a well-developed infrastructure ,  और  high productivity ;  और   जबकि  its  अर्थव्यवस्था  is considered  post-industrial  it continues to be  एक  of  the  world  's   largest   निर्माताओं   .
The country accounts for  39  %  of   वैश्विक  military  बिता  , and is  a  leading economic  ,  political , and  सांस्कृतिक  force in the  संसार  , as well  as   a   नेता  in  वैज्ञानिक   शोध   और  technological  नवीनता  .
The NCAA Men  's   प्रभाग   i   बास्केट   चैंपियनशिप  is a  single-elimination   टूर्नामेंट  played  प्रत्येक   वसन्त  in the United States , currently featuring 68 college  बास्केट   टीमों   ,  to  determine   the  national  चैंपियनशिप  of the  प्रमुख   कॉलेज  basketball teams .
The tournament  ,  organized by the National  कॉलेजिएट  Athletic Association  (  NCAA  )  , was created during  1939  by the National  संघ   of   बास्केट   कोच  ,  और  was the  विचार  of  ओहियो  State  विश्वविद्यालयों   कोच  Harold  olsen  .
Played  ज़्यादातर  during March , it is  ज्ञात  informally as March  दीवानगी  or  the  Big Dance  ,   और  has  become  one of the most  प्रसिद्ध  annual  sporting   कार्यक्रम  in the United States  .
The NCAA  रै  credited Bob  वाल्श  of  the   सिएटल  Organizing Committee for  starting  the March  दीवानगी  celebration during  1984  .
The tournament teams include champions from 31  प्रभाग  I conferences ( which  प्राप्त  automatic  बोलियों   )  , and  37  teams  जिससे  are awarded at-large  berths  .
These ``  at-large  '' teams  हैं   चुनी   by  an  ncaa  selection  कमेटी  ,  as  detailed below .
the  64  टीमों  are divided  into   चार   regions   और   व्यवस्थित   into   a  single elimination `` bracket ''  ,  which  predetermines  , when a team wins  a  game , which team it will face next .
प्रत्येक  team  is  `` seeded '' , or ranked  ,   भीतर   इसके  region  .
बाद  an  आरंभिक  four  खेल   between   आठ  lower-ranked teams ,  the   टूर्नामेंट   occurs  during the course of  तीन  weekends  ,   at   pre-selected  neutral  साइट  around  the  United  राज्य   .
Lower-ranked teams  हैं   लगाई   in  the bracket against higher ranked  टीमों   .
Each weekend  eliminates  three-fourths  of  the  टीमों  , from  a  round of 64 ,  to   a   ``   मीठी   सोलह  ''  ,  and  लिये   the  last  वीकेंड   of   the  Tournament  a  Final  चार  ;  the  Final Four is usually played  दौरान   the  first weekend of April .
ये  four  टीमों  , one  इससे   प्रत्येक   प्रदेश  ,  तब   compete  in one location  लिये   the  national  चैंपियनशिप  .
the  tournament has been at least  partially  televised since  1969   .
Presently ,  the  games are reported  by  CBS  ,  TBS , TNT , and truTV  by   the  trade-name NCAA March  दीवानगी  .
चूंकि   2011  , all games  हैं   उपलब्धियाँ  for viewing nationwide .
as   टेलीविज़न   कवरेज   रै   grown   ,   so   too  has the  टूर्नामेंट   's   लोकप्रियता  .
presently   ,   लाखो  of Americans ``  भरण   आउट  a  कोष्ठक   ''   ,  predicting  विजेता   of  all  67   खेल   .
साथ   11   नेशनल   शीर्षक   ,  UCLA  रै   the  record for the most  ncaa  Men  's  Division  i  Basketball Championships ; John Wooden  coached   ucla   to   10  of  इसके   11  titles  .
the  University of  केंटकी  is second , with 8 national  शीर्षक  ,  जबकि  Indiana  विश्वविद्यालयों   और  the University  of   उत्तर   कैरोलिना   हैं  tied  लिये   तीसरा  with  5   नेशनल   शीर्षक   .
ड्यूक  University ranks  पांचवां   साथ   4   नेशनल  titles .
A  नमूना  of synthetic motor  आयल
सिंथेटिक   आयल  is a lubricant  consisting   of   रासायनिक  compounds that are artificially made (  synthesized  ) .
सिंथेटिक  lubricants  can   be  manufactured using chemically modified petroleum  components  rather than  पूरे   crude  oil  ,  but can  भी  be  synthesized  from other raw materials .
Synthetic  आयल   is  used  as  a substitute for  स्नेहक   परिष्कृत   इससे  petroleum when operating in  extremes   of   तापमान  ,  क्युकी  , in general ,  it  provides superior mechanical and chemical  गुण   than  those  मिला  in traditional  खनिज  oils  .
वायुयान   जेट   इंजन  ,  लिये  example ,  आवश्यकता  the  उपयोग   of  synthetic oils , whereas aircraft piston engines do not  .
बेवकूफ़   is   an  American reality  श्रेणी  , originally shown on MTV  इससे  2000 to 2002 , featuring  लोगों   performing  various dangerous ,  crude  self-injuring stunts and  pranks  .
The  दिखाएँ  served as  a   launchpad   लिये   the  television and acting  करियर  of Bam Margera , Steve-O  ,   और  also Johnny Knoxville  ,  who previously had  तभी  a few minor acting  भूमिकाएँ   .
Since 2002 , three  बेवकूफ़   films   have  been  उत्पादित  and released  by  MTV corporate  सहोदर   सर्वोपरि  Pictures  ,   continuing   the  franchise  बाद  its run  on  television .
the   दिखाएँ   sparked  several spin-offs including Viva La  bam  , Wildboyz  ,  Homewrecker ,  dr.  Steve-O and Blastazoid  .
the  show placed # 68  on  Entertainment Weekly `` New  tv  Classics '' list .
Roseanne  cherrie   barr   (   born   नवम्बर   3  , 1952 )  is   an   अमरीकी   अभिनेत्री   ,  comedienne  ,   लेखक  , television  निर्माता  ,  निदेशक  , and 2012 presidential nominee  of  the California -based Peace and Freedom  पार्टी  .
barr   began  her  करियर   in  stand-up comedy  at  clubs before  gaining   कीर्ति  for  उसके   भूमिका   in   the   sitcom  Roseanne .
the  show was a  hit   और   lasted   नौ   सीज़न  , from  1988  to 1997  .
She won both an  एमी   और   a   सुनहरी  Globe Award  लिये   बेहतरीन   अभिनेत्री   लिये   उसके   कार्य  on  the   दिखाएँ  .
barr  had  crafted  a ``  fierce  working-class  घरेलू  goddess ''  persona   in   the  eight  सालो  preceding  उसके  sitcom and wanted  to  do a realistic  दिखाएँ  about a strong mother  जो   थी  not  a   शिकार  of  patriarchal  consumerism .
The  पोती  of  आप्रवासियों  from Europe and  रूस   ,   barr  was the  oldest  of  चार  children  in  a working-class  यहूदी  Salt Lake City family ; she  थी   भी  active in the LDS  गिरिजाघर   .
in  1974  ,   वो  married Bill  pentland   ,   साथ  whom she  था   तीन   children  , before  divorcing   in  1990  और   marrying  comedian Tom Arnold for  चार  years  .
Controversy arose when she sang  ``   the  Star-Spangled Banner ``  off-key  at  a   1990   nationally  aired baseball game ,  followed   by   grabbing   उसके   crotch   और  spitting .
After her sitcom  ended  , she  शुभारम्भ   उसके  own talk show  ,   the   roseanne  Show  ,  which  aired   इससे  1998  to   2000  .
in  2005  ,  she returned to  stand-up   कॉमेडी  with a world tour  .
in  2011  ,  she starred  in   an   unscripted  TV show , Roseanne 's Nuts , that lasted from July to September of that year  ,  about her life on  a   हवाई  farm .
In early  2012   ,   barr  announced her  उम्मीदवारी  for the  अध्यक्षीय  nomination  of   the   ग्रीन   पार्टी  .
Barr  खोया   the  nomination to Jill  स्टीन   .
वो  then sought  the   अध्यक्षीय  nomination  of   the  Peace and  स्वतंत्रता  Party  ,  which she  जीती  on  अगस्त  4 , 2012  .
barr  received 61,971  मत   in  the general election , placing sixth overall  .
Francesco Albani  's  17th century  बपतिस्मा  of  मसीह  is a typical  चित्रण  with  the   आसमान  opening and  the  Holy Spirit descending as a dove .
The baptism of Jesus  marks  the beginning of his public  मंत्रालय  .
This  इवेंट   is  recorded in  the  canonical  gospels   of  Matthew , Mark  और  Luke .
John 's gospel  करता  not describe  यीशु  ' baptism ,  लकिन  John the  बैपटिस्ट   करता  testify of the  अन्य   बाते   in  .
In the New Testament ,  जॉन  the Baptist preached  the  baptism of repentance  लिये   the  remission  of   पापों  ( )  ,  and  घोषित  himself a  forerunner  of he  कि  would baptize ``  साथ   the  Holy Ghost and  साथ  fire ''  (  ) .
In  so   doing  he  थी   तैयारी   the  way for  यीशु   .
यीशु   आए   to  the Jordan  नदी   जहाँ  he was  baptized   by  John  .
The baptismal scene  शामिल   the   आकाश   खोलने   ,  a dove-like descent  of   the  Holy Spirit  ,   और  a voice from heaven saying  ,   ``   इस  is my  beloved  Son , in whom I  am   खूब  pleased . ''
Most modern scholars  दृश्य  the  फैक्ट  that  यीशु  was baptized  by  John as an historical event to  जिससे  a  ऊँची  degree of certainty can be  आबंटित   .
साथ   साथ  the  crucifixion  of Jesus most  विद्वानों   दृश्य   it   as  one of  the  two historically  निश्चित  facts about him ,  और   प्रायः  use  it   as  the starting  अंक  for  the  study of  the  historical Jesus .
The baptism is one of  the  five major milestones in the  इन्जील   कथा  of the life of Jesus , the  अन्य   होने   the  Transfiguration  ,   crucifixion   ,  Resurrection  ,   और   आरोहण  .
Most Christian  denominations   दृश्य  the  बपतिस्मा  of Jesus  as  an important event  और  a  आधार  for the Christian rite  of  baptism  (  see also )  .
In Eastern  christianity   ,  Jesus  '  baptism is commemorated  on  6 January ,  the  feast of  epiphany   .
In  the   रोमन  Catholic Church , the  anglican   नियाज़   ,   the   लूथरन  Churches and  कुछ   अन्य  Western  denominations  ,  it   is   recalled  on a day within the  following   सप्ताह  ,  the  feast of  the  baptism of  the  Lord .
in  Roman Catholicism , the baptism  of  Jesus is one of  the  Luminous  रहस्यों   sometimes  added  to  the Rosary  .
It is  a  Trinitarian  feast   in   the  Eastern  परंपरागत  Churches  .
methylcobalamin   (  shown  )  is  a  form of vitamin B12 .
Physically it  resembles  the other forms of vitamin B12  ,   occurring  as dark  रेड   crystals  that  freely  form  cherry-colored  transparent solutions  in   जल   .
Vitamin B12 , vitamin B12  or  vitamin  b-12   ,   भी  called  cobalamin  , is a water-soluble  विटामिन  with  a   कुंजी   भूमिका  in  the  normal functioning of  the  brain and  बेचैन  system , and  लिये   the  formation  of  blood .
it  is  एक  of the  आठ  B vitamins .
It is  सामान्यतः   शामिल   in   the   चयापचय   of   प्रत्येक  cell of the  इंसान   देह   ,   विशेषकर  affecting DNA synthesis  और  regulation , but also  वसीय  acid synthesis and energy production .
Neither  fungi  , plants , nor animals  हैं  capable of  producing  vitamin B12  .
Only  जीवाणु  and archaea  have   the   एंजाइमों  required for  इसके  synthesis , although many foods are  a   प्राकृतिक  source  of  B12  क्युकी   of  bacterial symbiosis  .
The vitamin is the largest and most  structurally  complicated  विटामिन   और   can  be  उत्पादित   industrially   तभी   through  bacterial fermentation-synthesis  .
विटामिन   b12  consists of a class  of  chemically related  यौगिकों   (  vitamers ) , all of  जिससे  have  विटामिन  activity .
it  contains the  biochemically   विरल   तत्व  cobalt  .
Biosynthesis of the  मौलिक  structure  of  the vitamin is accomplished only  by   जीवाणु   (   जिससे   प्रायः  produce  hydroxocobalamin  )  ,   लकिन  conversion  between  different forms  of  the vitamin can  be   संपन्नता  in  the   इंसान  body .
A  आम   semi-synthetic   रूप  of the vitamin ,  cyanocobalamin   ,  does  नहीं  occur  in  nature  ,  but is  उत्पादित  from bacterial hydroxocobalamin and  तब   प्रयुक्त   in  many pharmaceuticals  और   पूरक  ,  और  as a  खाना   योगात्मक  ,  क्युकी  of its stability  और  lower  उत्पादन  cost .
In the body  it   is   परिवर्तित  to the  इंसान   physiological  forms methylcobalamin  और  adenosylcobalamin ,  leaving  behind the cyanide , albeit  in  minimal concentration  .
अधिक  recently ,  hydroxocobalamin   ,   methylcobalamin  ,  और  adenosylcobalamin can be found in more  महंगी  pharmacological products  और  food supplements  .
the   अतिरिक्त  utility of these is  फिलहाल   debated  .
Vitamin B12  थी  discovered  इससे  its  संबंध  to  the   बीमारी  pernicious anemia  ,  which is  an  autoimmune  बीमारी   in   जिससे   parietal  cells of  the   पेट  responsible for  secreting  intrinsic factor are destroyed  .
मूलभूत  factor  is   निर्णायक   लिये  the normal absorption of B12  ,   so   a  lack of intrinsic  फ़ैक्टर  ,  as   देखी  in  घातक  anemia  ,   कल्याणकारी   a  vitamin B12 deficiency .
अनेक  other subtler kinds of  विटामिन   b12   कमियां   और  their biochemical effects  have   चूंकि   महरूम   elucidated  .
Full Metal Jacket is a  1987  war  फिल्मी   उत्पादित  , directed  और  co-written by Stanley Kubrick .
It  is  an  अनुकूलन   of  Gustav Hasford  's   1979  novel  the  Short-Timers and  सितारों   मैथ्यू  Modine , Vincent  d'onofrio  , R.  ली   ermey  ,  arliss  Howard , and Adam Baldwin .
the   फिल्मी  follows  a   प्लाटून  of U.S. Marines through  उनके   प्रशिक्षण   और   the   अनुभवों   of   दो  of the platoon  's   marines  in  the  Tet  अप्रिय  during the Vietnam  युद्ध  .
The film 's  शीर्षक  refers to the full  मेटल  jacket bullet used  by  infantry  riflemen  .
the  film  प्राप्त  critical acclaim  .
It received an Academy Award  नामांकन  for Best Adapted  पटकथा   लिये  Kubrick , Michael Herr and Gustav  hasford   .
in  2001  ,   the   अमरीकी  Film  संस्थान  placed  पूरा  Metal Jacket at # 95 in  उनके  `` AFI  's  100  सालो  ... 100  thrills  `` poll  .
TMZ  is   a   हस्ती  news website that  debuted   on   नवम्बर  8  ,   2005  .
It was a collaboration between  एओएल  and  telepictures  Productions , a  प्रभाग  of Warner  भाईs.  ,  जबतक   समय  Warner  divested  AOL  in  2009 .
however  ,  it  remained  संबद्ध   साथ  AOL  न्यूज   और   रै   the  AOL  न्यूज   लोगो  affixed in the  अपर  right corner  .
The name TMZ stands  लिये  the historic ``  स्टुडियो  zone  ``  or  30-mile  zone radius  इससे   the  intersection  of  West  बेवर्ली  Boulevard and North La Cienega  boulevard   in  Los Angeles .
TMZ 's  मैनेजिंग  editor  is  Harvey  levin   ,   a   lawyer-turned-journalist   जो   थी  previously a legal  विशेषज्ञ  for  the  Los  एंजिल्स   टेलीविज़न  station KCBS-TV .
the   साईट  claims that it does not pay  लिये  stories or interviews ; however , Levin has  admitted  that  tmz   करता  `` sometimes  अदा   स्त्रोत  for leads  on  stories  ''  .
Levin  रै   stated  that `` everything is  शोधकार्य  and  vetted  for  सटीकता   .  ''
A  साथी  TV  श्रेणी   ,  TMZ  on  TV , debuted  on  September  10  ,  2007  .
चीख   3  is a  2000  American slasher  फिल्मी  created by Kevin Williamson  ,   निर्देशित   by   वेस  Craven and  लिखा  by Ehren  क्रूगर  , starring  neve  Campbell  ,  Courteney  कॉक्स   arquette   और  David Arquette .
it  was  released   on  February 4  ,   2000  as the third installment  in  the Scream film series .
The events  of  the story  हैं   नियत   तीन  years after  those  of Scream 2  और   फ़ॉलो   sidney   प्रेस्कॉट  ( Campbell  )   जो  has  गए   into  self-imposed isolation following the events of the  पिछला  two films but is  drawn   to  Hollywood  बाद  a new  ghostface  begins killing  the  cast of the film within a  फिल्मी   ``  Stab 3  ''  .
Scream  3  combines the violence  of   the   slasher   विधा  with comedy and ``  whodunit  `` mystery  जबकि   satirizing  the cliché of film  trilogies  .
Unlike  the   पिछला   चीख   films  , there was an increased emphasis  on   comedic  elements and  the   हिंसा   और  horror  थी  reduced  in  response  to   increased   पब्लिक  scrutiny  परिचय  violence in media  following  the Columbine High School  नरसंहार  .
the  film was the concluding  अध्याय  of  the  Scream  श्रेणी   जबतक  it was revived with  a   sequel  ,  चीख   4  , in  2011  .
विलियमसन  provided  a   five-page  outline  लिये  two sequels to Scream  जब  auctioning  उसके   असली  script , hoping  to  entice  bidders   साथ  the  संभावित   of  buying a  मताधिकार  .
Williamson 's  प्रतिज्ञाओं  to other  प्रोजेक्ट   meant   he  was  असमर्थ  to develop a complete script for Scream 3  और   लिखने  duties were  undertaken  by Ehren Kruger  जो   discarded   much  of  विलियमसन   's  notes .
Craven  और  Marco  beltrami  returned to direct  और  score  the  film  क्रमशः  as  वे   था  with the previous two  श्रेणी  entries .
उत्पादन   थी  troubled  साथ  script rewrites  ,  with  पृष्ठों  sometimes only ready  on  the day of filming ,  और  scheduling  कठिनाइयों  with  the  main cast .
Scream  3   performed  both  financially  and critically worse  than   इसके  preceding films ,  कमाई   over   $   161  million  और  with  अनेक  critics  claiming   कि  the  फिल्मी   था   become  what Scream originally  ``   spoofed  ``  .
despite  negative criticism  the   फिल्मी  did receive praise  साथ  reviewers calling  it  the perfect end to  the   चीख   त्रयी  .
As of  2012   ,  the  फिल्मी  is currently  the  number  3  highest-grossing  slasher-film  in North America , following  चीख   at  number 1 and Scream 2 at number 2  .
The  फिल्मी  's  साउंडट्रैक  was well-received  ,  spending fourteen  सप्ताह   on   the   बिलबोर्ड  200 and reaching  a  high of # 32 .
कंधे  impingement syndrome  ,  also called painful arc syndrome ,  supraspinatus   सिंड्रोम   ,  swimmer  's   कंधे  ,  और  thrower 's shoulder ,  is  a  नैदानिक   सिंड्रोम  which  occurs   जब   the   tendons  of  the  rotator  कफ  muscles become irritated and  inflamed  as they pass through  the   subacromial  space  ,  the passage beneath the acromion .
इस  can  परिणाम  in  पीड़ा   ,  weakness  और  loss  of   गति  at  the  shoulder .
JLA  थी  a monthly comic book published by DC  कॉमिक्स   इससे  January  1997   to  April  2006   featuring   the  Justice League .
the  colonial  इतिहास  of  the   संयुक्त  States  कवर  the history  of  European settlements from the  प्रारंभ  of colonization  of  America until their incorporation into the  संयुक्त  States  .
In the late  16th  century ,  इंग्लैण्ड  ,  फ़्रांस   ,  Spain and the Netherlands launched  प्रमुख   colonization  programs in eastern North America  .
Small  जल्दी  attempts—such  as  the English Lost Colony of Roanoke —often disappeared  ;  everywhere  the   मौत   रेट  of the first arrivals  थी  very  ऊँची  .
Nevertheless  कामयाब  colonies were established .
European settlers  आए   इससे  a variety  of   सोशल  and religious groups  .
No  aristocrats  settled permanently  ,   लकिन   a   क्रमांक  of  adventurers  ,  सैनिको  ,  किसानो  , and tradesmen  arrived  .
Diversity  थी  an American characteristic as the Dutch  of  New  netherland   ,   the   swedes   और   finns  of New Sweden , the English Quakers of Pennsylvania  ,  the English Puritans of New  इंग्लैण्ड   ,   the  English settlers of  jamestown   ,   और   the  ``  worthy  poor ''  of  Georgia , came  to  the  नई   महाद्वीप  and  निर्मित  colonies  साथ  distinctive social , religious , political  और   आर्थिक  styles  .
occasionally   एक  colony took  कंट्रोल   of  another ( during wars  between  their European  अभिभावक  ) .
Only in  नोवा  Scotia ( now part  of  Canada )  किया  the conquerors expel the  पिछला  colonists .
बजाय   वे   सब  lived side by side in  सलाम   .
There  यहूद   no  major civil  युद्धों   among   the   13  colonies ,  और  the two  मुख्य  armed  विद्रोहों  ( in Virginia in 1676 and in New  यॉर्क   in   1689–91  )  यहूद  short-lived failures .
युद्धों  between  the  French  और   the  British—the French and  भारतीय   युद्धों   और  Father Rale 's War  —were  recurrent , and involved French-support for  wabanaki  Confederacy  हमले   on  the frontiers .
By 1760 France was defeated  और  the  अंग्रेजों  seized its  colonies  .
The four  पृथक  regions were  :  New England  ,  the  मध्य   colonies  , the  chesapeake   खाड़ी   colonies   (   अपर   दक्षिण  )  और  the Lower  दक्षिण  .
Some  इतिहासकारों  add  a  fifth region , the Frontier ,  जिससे   थी   never  separately organized .
By  the   समय   यूरोपीय  settlers  arrived   around   1600–1650  , the  बहुमत   of   the   देशी  Americans  जीना  in  the  eastern  संयुक्त   राज्य  had been decimated by  नई  diseases  ,   introduced   to   उन्हें  decades before  by   explorers   और  sailors .
देखिए   समयरेखा  of Colonial America for  सूची  of  ऐतिहासिक   कार्यक्रम  .
ग्लोरिया  Laura Vanderbilt (  born  February 20  ,  1924  )  is an American artist  ,  author ,  अभिनेत्री  , heiress  ,  and  socialite  most noted  as   an  early  डेवलपर   of  designer  ब्लू  jeans  .
She is  a   सदस्य  of the prominent Vanderbilt family of New York and  the  mother of CNN 's Anderson  कूपर  .
Greece ( Romanization of  greek|   )  , officially the Hellenic  गणतंत्र   (  ' ) , is a country in  southeast  Europe .
according  to the  2011   जनसांख्यिकी  ,  यूनानियों  's  जनसांख्यिकी   is   around   11  million .
एथेंस  is the nation 's capital  और   largest   नगर  ,  इसके   शहरी  area also including Piraeus  .
यूनानियों   is   रणनीतिक  located at the  क्रॉसरोड्स   of  Europe ,  एशिया   ,  the  मध्य  East , and Africa , and  रै  land  सीमायें   साथ   अल्बानियाई  , the  गणतंत्र   of   मकदूनिया  and  बुल्गारिया  to  the   उत्तर  , and Turkey to the northeast  .
The  ईजियन  Sea lies to the east of  मेनलैंड  Greece  ,   the  Ionian Sea to the  वेस्ट  , and  the   भूमध्यसागरीय  Sea to the  दक्षिण  .
Greece  रै  the  11th   longest   तटरेखा   in   the  world  at   in   लंबाई  , featuring a  विशाल   क्रमांक  of islands (  लगभग  1,400 ,  of  which 227  हैं  inhabited ) , including Crete , the Dodecanese , the Cyclades  ,  and the  आयोनियन  Islands  among   अन्य  .
अस्सी   प्रतिशत  of Greece consists of mountains ,  of  which  माउंट  Olympus  is   the  highest  at   .
Modern Greece traces  इसके  roots to the  सभ्यता  of Ancient Greece  ,  generally considered  the  cradle  of  Western civilization  .
as   ऐसे   ,   it   is  the birthplace of  लोकतंत्र  ,  पश्चिमी  philosophy , the Olympic  खेल  , Western literature  और  historiography , political  विज्ञान  , major  वैज्ञानिक  and  गणितीय   सिद्धान्त  , and Western  नाटक  , including both tragedy and comedy .
This legacy  is  partly  reflected   in  the seventeen UNESCO  संसार  Heritage Sites located in Greece , ranking it 7th  in  Europe  और   13th   in   the   संसार  .
the  modern  यूनानी  state was established  in  1830  ,   following  the Greek War  of   स्वतंत्रता   .
Greece  is   a  founding member of  the   संयुक्त  Nations  ,   रै   महरूम  a  सदस्य   of   कया  is now  the   यूरोपीय  Union since  1981  ( and  the  eurozone since  2001   )  , and  रै   महरूम   a  member of NATO  चूंकि  1952 .
यूनानियों  is a developed country with an  उन्नत  ,  high-income  economy and  बहुत   ऊँची   मानकों   of  living  ,   सहित  the world  's  21st highest  विशेषता  of life  as  of 2010 .
Greece  's  economy  is   भी   the  largest in the Balkans , where  यूनानियों  is an important regional investor .
A  प्रधान  meridian is  a  meridian  ,  i.e  .   a  line  of   देशांतर   ,   at  which  देशांतर  is  पारिभाषित  to  be  0°  .
A  प्रधान   मध्याह्न  and  इसके  opposite in a 360°-system , the  180th  meridian ( at  180°   देशांतर  )  ,  form a  ग्रेट  circle  .
इस   ग्रेट  circle  divides  the sphere ,  e.g  .  the   धरती  ,  into   दो   बांटती   .
if   एक  uses directions of East  और   वेस्ट  from a  पारिभाषित  prime meridian ,  तब   वे   can  be  पुकारा  Eastern Hemisphere and  पश्चिमी  Hemisphere .
gerardus  Mercator in his Atlas Cosmographicae  (   1595  )  उपयोग   a  prime  मध्याह्न   कही   बंद   to   25°w   ,  passing just to the  वेस्ट   of  Santa  मरिया  Island in  the   अटलांटिक  .
His 180th meridian runs  साथ   the   जलसन्धि  of Anián  (   बेरिंग  Strait  )
A prime meridian is  ultimately  arbitrary  ,   नापसंद  an  equator  ,  जिससे   is  determined by the axis of rotation—and various conventions have been used or advocated in  अलग  regions  और  throughout history .
Minka Dumont  केली   (  born  minka   dumont  Dufay ; June  24  , 1980 ) is an  अमरीकी  actress .
She is perhaps  बेहतरीन  known for  उसके  roles in  चार्ली  's Angels , Friday Night  लाइट्स  , and The  रूममेट  .

It was released in July 1985 in Japan  और  later that year in  उत्तर  America  .
it   था  a short  उत्पाद   जीवनकाल  , with support for only  दो   खेल   जिससे  comprised  the   ``  Robot Series '' ; Gyromite and Stack-Up .
r.o.b  .  थी  released  साथ   the   इरादे   of   portraying  the Nintendo Entertainment System as  कुछ   अनोखा  in order to alleviate  खुदरा   fears  following the  वीडियो   खेल  crash of  1983  .
