Stack-Up was purchased separately and included  इसके   अपना  physical game pieces  .
The Walking  स्वतंत्रता  half  डालर  was a  चांदी   50-cent  piece or half dollar coin issued by the United States Mint from  1916  to  1947  ; it was designed by Adolph  A.   weinman  .
In 1915 ,  the  new Mint Director  ,   रॉबर्ट   W.   woolley   ,  came  to  believe  कि   he  was  नहीं   तभी   अनुमत  but  जरूरी   by  law to replace coin designs  कि   था  been  in  use for  25   सालो  .
he   इसलिए   began  the process of replacing  the   नाई   coinage  : dimes ,  quarters  and  हाफ   डॉलर  , all bearing  समान   डिजाइन  by long-time  मिंट  Engraver Charles  E.  Barber  ,  and first struck  in   1892  .
Woolley  था   the  Commission  of  Fine Arts conduct a competition , as  a  result of  जिससे   weinman   थी   चयनित  to  डिज़ाइन  the dime and  हाफ  dollar .
weinman   's  design  of  Liberty striding towards the  सूर्य  for  the  half dollar  proved  difficult to perfect ,  और  Treasury  सचिव  William G. McAdoo  ,   जिनकी   विभाग  included  the  Mint  ,  considered having Barber create  उसके  own design .
मिंट   officials  were  कामयाब   in   getting  Weinman 's design  into  production  ,   हालांकि  it  never   struck  very well , which may have been a  फ़ैक्टर   in   इसके   बदलना  by  the  Franklin  हाफ   डालर  beginning  in   1948  .
Nevertheless , art  इतिहासकार   कॉर्नेलियस  Vermeule  माना  the piece  to   be  among the  सबसे   खूबसूरत   us   सिक्के   .
Since  1986   ,  a  परिवर्धन  of  weinman  's obverse design has  महरूम  used for the American Silver Eagle .
the   टोयोटा  4Runner  is  a mid-size sport utility vehicle ( SUV  )  produced  by  the Japanese manufacturer  टोयोटा  and  बेची   throughout  the world from  1984   to  present .
In Japan it  थी  known as the Toyota Hilux  लहरे  .
The original 4Runner was  a   कॉम्पैक्ट  SUV and  छोटी  more  than   a   टोयोटा  pickup truck  साथ  a fiberglass shell over  the  bed  ,  but the model has since undergone significant independent  विकास  into  a  cross between a compact  और  a  mid-size  SUV  .
All  4runners   have   महरूम  built at Toyota 's Tahara plant  in  Tahara  ,   aichi  ,  जापानी  ,  or   at  Hino Motors  '   hamura   ,  Japan plant  ,   और  in Brazil  .
Its mid-size crossover  एसयूवी   बंटवारा  is the  टोयोटा  Highlander .
इस  article  सौदे  with  आयुर्विज्ञान  as practiced by trained  पेशेवर  from  प्राचीन   टाइम्स  to  the  present .
The ancient Egyptians  था   a  system  of   आयुर्विज्ञान   कि  was  बहुत  advanced  लिये   इसके  time  और   बहकावे  later medical traditions .
The Egyptians and Babylonians  दोनो   introduced   the  concepts  of  diagnosis , prognosis  ,  and medical  परिक्षा  .
the   यूनानियों  went even further ,  और   उन्नत  as well medical  आचार  .
The  hippocratic  Oath , still  लिया   by  doctors today , was  लिखा  in Greece  in  the  5th   सदी  BCE .
In  the   मध्यकालीन   era  , surgical practices inherited  इससे  the ancient masters were improved and then systematized in Rogerius  's   the  Practice  of  Surgery .
विश्वविद्यालयों   began  systematic  प्रशिक्षण  of  physicians  around the years 1220 in Italy  .
दौरान   the  Renaissance , understanding  of  anatomy improved , and  the   सूक्ष्मदर्शी  was invented .
The  रोगाणु  theory of  बीमारी  in the 19th century led  to  cures  लिये  many infectious  रोगों  .
Military doctors  उन्नत   the   विधि  of trauma treatment  और   सर्जरी  .
पब्लिक  health measures were developed  विशेषकर  in the 19th century as  the  rapid growth of  शहरों   जरूरी  systematic sanitary measures .
उन्नत  research centers opened  in   the   जल्दी  20th century ,  प्रायः   कनेक्ट  with  प्रमुख   अस्पताल  .
The mid-20th century  थी  characterized by new biological treatments  ,   ऐसे  as antibiotics .
These  advancements  , along with  developments   in   रसायन  ,  आनुवंशिकी  , and  lab   प्रौद्योगिकी  (  ऐसे  as the x-ray ) led to modern  आयुर्विज्ञान   .
Medicine  थी  heavily professionalized in the 20th  सदी  ,  और   नई   करियर   खोली   to  women as nurses ( from  the  1870s  )  and as  physicians  ( especially after 1970 ) .
the  21st  सदी  is characterized by  बहुत   उन्नत  research  involving  numerous fields of science  .
the   hippocratic  Corpus ,  is  a collection  of   जल्दी  medical  works  from  प्राचीन  Greece strongly associated with the ancient Greek  चिकित्सक  Hippocrates and  उसके  teachings  .
पोटैशियम  is  a   रासायनिक  element  साथ  symbol K ( from Neo-Latin kalium  )   और  atomic number  19   .
Elemental  पोटैशियम  is a soft  silvery-white  alkali  मेटल  that oxidizes rapidly  in   एयर  and is very  प्रतिक्रिया  with water , generating  sufficient   ऊष्मा  to ignite  the   हाइड्रोजन   उत्सर्जित  in the reaction and burning with a lilac flame .
क्युकी  potassium  और  sodium  हैं   chemically  very similar  ,   उनके  salts  यहूद  not at first  differentiated   .
The existence of multiple elements  in  their salts was  suspected   इससे  1702  ,  and  इस  was  सिद्ध   in  1807  जब  potassium  और  sodium were  individually   पृथक   इससे  different salts by  electrolysis   .
Potassium  in  nature  occurs  only  in  ionic salts .
As  ऐसे  , it  is  found dissolved in  seawater  ( which  is  0.04  %   पोटैशियम  by weight )  ,  and  is   भाग  of many minerals  .
Most industrial chemical  अनुप्रयोग   of  potassium  employ  the relatively high  घुलनशीलता  in water of  पोटैशियम  compounds , such as potassium  soaps  .
पोटैशियम   मेटल   रै  only a  few  special  अनुप्रयोग  , being replaced in  सबसे   रासायनिक  reactions  साथ  sodium metal .
पोटैशियम   ions  are  जरुरी  for the function of  सब   जीना   कोशिकाएं  .
पोटैशियम  ion  diffusion  is a key mechanism in nerve transmission ,  और  potassium  depletion  in animals , including humans  ,  results  in  various cardiac dysfunctions .
Potassium  accumulates   in   संयंत्र  cells  ,   और  thus fresh  फल  and  सब्जियां   हैं   a  good  dietary   सोर्स  of it  .
Conversely ,  सबसे  plants except specialist  halophytes   हैं  intolerant of salt , and sodium  is   उपस्थित  in  उन्हें   तभी   in  low concentration .
This resulted in potassium  पहला   होने  isolated from potash ,  the  ashes  of  plants , giving the element its name  .
For the same reason ,  भारी   क्रॉप  production  rapidly   depletes  soils of potassium ,  और  agricultural  fertilizers   consume  95  %  of  वैश्विक   पोटैशियम  chemical production  .
The Singapore  डालर  or dollar (  चिह्न  :  $   ;   कोड   :   sgd  )  is   the  official  करेंसी   of  Singapore  .
It  is  normally abbreviated with the dollar sign $  ,   or   alternatively   s   $   to  distinguish  it  from other  डालर  -denominated  मुद्राएँ   .
It  is  divided into 100  सेंट  .
The Monetary  प्राधिकार   of  Singapore  और   the  Brunei Currency and Monetary Board still maintain the historic exchangeability of their  दो   मुद्राएँ  , the  singaporean   डालर   और   the   ब्रुनेई  dollar  ,  respectively  .
The dollar  is   स्वीकृत  as  ``  customary tender  ''   in   ब्रुनेई   according  to the Currency  interchangeability  Agreement .
Likewise , the Brunei  डालर  is  customarily  accepted  in  Singapore
James Samuel  कोलमैन  (  may  12  ,   1926   –  March 25 , 1995  )   थी  an American sociologist , theorist and empirical researcher ,  आधारित  chiefly at the University of Chicago .
He was  निर्वाचित  president of  the   अमरीकी   समाजशास्त्रीय  Association .
Coleman studied  the  sociology of education , public policy , and  थी   एक  of  the  earliest users  of   the  term `` social  पूंजी  ``  .
His Foundations of  सोशल  Theory  बहकावे   समाजशास्त्रीय   सिद्धान्त   .
His  the  Adolescent Society  (  1961 ) and ``  कोलमैन  Report '' (  समता  of Educational Opportunity , 1966  )  were two of the most heavily  cited   किताबे  in  शैक्षणिक   समाजशास्त्र  .
the  landmark Coleman Report helped transform  शैक्षणिक  theory ,  reshape   नेशनल   शिक्षा   नीतियों   ,   और  influenced public and scholarly opinion  regarding  the  भूमिका  of  schooling   in   determining  equality and  उत्पादकता  in the  संयुक्त   राज्य   .
सुपरमैन   (  from DC  कॉमिक्स  ) was the first superhero created ,  आर्ट  by  जिम  Lee  .
a   सुपरहीरो   (   sometimes   rendered   super-hero  or  सुपर  hero ) is a  प्रकार  of stock character  possessing  ``  असाधारण  or superhuman powers  ''  and dedicated  to  protecting the public .
चूंकि   the  debut  of  the  prototypical  superhero Superman  in   1938   ,  stories of  superheroes—ranging  from brief episodic  adventures  to continuing years-long  sagas—have  dominated American  कॉमिक  books and crossed over into  अन्य  media  .
the  word itself dates to  at   तनिक  1917 .
A  मादा   सुपरहीरो  is  sometimes  called a  superheroine  ( also  rendered   super-heroine   or   सुपर  heroine  )   .
``   सुपर  HEROES  ''  is  a  trademark co-owned  by   dc   कॉमिक्स  and Marvel Comics .
by  most definitions ,  वर्ण  do  नहीं   सख्ती  require actual superhuman powers to be deemed  superheroes  ,  हालांकि   शर्तें  such  as  costumed crime fighters or masked  vigilantes   हैं  sometimes used to refer  to  those such  as  Batman  और  Green  तीर  without such powers  जो  share other common  सुपरहीरो   traits  .
Such  वर्ण  were  generally   referred  to as `` mystery men ''  in   the  so-called  सुनहरी  Age of  कॉमिक  Books to distinguish them  इससे  characters with super-powers .
सामान्यतः  ,  superheroes  use  उनके  powers to counter day-to-day crime  जबकि   भी   combating  threats against  मानवता  by supervillains ,  उनके  criminal counterparts  .
Often  ,  one  of   ये  supervillains  होगा  be the  सुपरहीरो  's  archenemy   .
As well  ,   कुछ  longrunning superheroes , such as Superman  ,   बैटमैन   ,  Spider-Man and  आयरन  Man each has a rogues gallery  of   दुश्मनों  .
as  well , superheroes sometimes will combat such  irregular   खतरे  as  एलियंस   ,   magical/  fantasy entities  ,  American war enemies such as nazism or communism , and godlike  or  demonic creatures  .

The  shawshank  Redemption is  a   1994   अमरीकी  drama film written  और  directed  by  Frank Darabont and  अभिनीत  Tim Robbins  और   मॉर्गन   फ्रीमैन   .
adapted  from the Stephen King novella  रीता   hayworth  and  shawshank  Redemption  ,  the film tells  the   स्टोरी  of  एंडी  Dufresne ,  a   बैंकर  who spends  nearly   दो  decades  in   shawshank  State  थाना   लिये  the murder of  उसके   बीवी  and  उसके  lover  despite  his  दावा   of   innocence  .
During  उसके  time  at   the  prison ,  he   befriends   a   fellow  inmate  ,  Ellis Boyd ``  रेड   ''  Redding  ,  and finds himself protected by the guards after  the   वार्डन   begins   using  him in  उसके  money laundering operation .
Despite a  गुनगुने  box  दफ्तर  reception that  मुश्किल   recouped  its budget , the film received  अनुकूल  reviews  इससे  critics ,  अनेक  award  nominations  ,  और  has since enjoyed  a  remarkable  जीवन   on  cable television  ,  VHS  ,  DVD  ,  and  blu-ray   .
It was included in  the  American Film Institute  's  100  सालो   ...   100  Movies 10th  वर्षगांठ   संस्करण   .
IT  प्रबन्धन  is  the  discipline whereby  सब  of the technology resources of a firm  हैं  managed  in  accordance with its needs  और  priorities  .
ये  resources may  शामिल   ठोस  investments  जैसे  computer  हार्डवेयर  ,  तन्त्र  , data  ,  networks and  आंकड़ा  centre  सुविधाएं  ,  as   खूब   as   the  staffs who are hired  to   maintain  them  .
Managing this responsibility within a  कम्पनी  entails many of the basic  प्रबन्धन  functions , like budgeting ,  स्टॉफ  , and  आयोजन   और  controlling  ,  along  साथ  other aspects that  हैं   अद्वितीय  to technology ,  जैसे  change management  ,   तन्त्र  design  ,  network planning ,  तकनीक  support etc  .
The  penitentiary   of   नई  Mexico  थाना   riot  ,  जिससे   took  place on February 2  और  3 ,  1980   ,  in  the  state  's  maximum security  थाना  south of Santa  fe   ,  was one of the  सबसे   हिंसक  prison  दंगे  in the  इतिहास   of  the American correctional system :  33  inmates  died   और  more than 200 inmates were  treated  for  चोटों  .
none  of  the   12   अधिकारियों  taken hostage were killed ,  लकिन  seven were treated  लिये   चोटों  caused by  beatings   और  rapes .
इस  was the third major riot at the NM  राज्य   penitentiary  ,  the  first  occurring  on 19  जुलाई   1922  and the second on 15 June 1953 .
Author  रोजर  Morris suggests the death toll may  have   महरूम   उच्चतर  , as  a  number of bodies were incinerated  or  dismembered during  the   कोर्स  of the mayhem  .

the  Northern  कार्डिनल   (  Cardinalis cardinalis ) is a North  अमरीकी   बर्ड  in  the  genus Cardinalis  ;  it is  भी  known  colloquially   as  the  redbird  or common cardinal  .
it  can  be   मिला   in  southern Canada , through the  पूर्वी  United States from  maine  to  टेक्सास  and south  through   मैक्सिको   .
It is found  in   वुडलैंड्स  ,  gardens   ,   shrublands  ,  और   swamps   .
The Northern Cardinal is a  mid-sized   songbird  with a body  लंबाई   of  21  सेंटीमीटर  ( 8.3 inches  )  .
It has a  distinctive  crest on the  सिर   और  a mask  on   the  face  जिससे  is black in the  पुरूष  and gray in the female  .
the   पुरूष  is  a  vibrant  रेड  , while  the   मादा  is a dull red-brown  शेड  .
The Northern  कार्डिनल   is  mainly  granivorous   ,  but also feeds on insects and  फल   .
the  male behaves  territorially  , marking out  उसके  territory with  सोंग   .
During  प्रेमालाप  ,  the  male feeds seed to the female beak-to-beak  .
a   क्लच   of  three to four eggs is  रखी   ,   और   दो   to   चार  clutches are produced  प्रत्येक  year .
It was once  prized  as  a   पालतु   ,  but its sale as cage  पक्षियों  is  अभी   बैन   in   the   संयुक्त  States by the  migratory  Bird Treaty  अधिनियम   of  1918 .
Surface runoff  ,   भी   पुकारा  nonpoint source pollution  ,  from  a  farm field  in  Iowa  दौरान  a  बरसात  storm .
topsoil  as  खूब   as  farm  fertilizers   और  other  संभावित  pollutants run off  unprotected  farm fields when heavy  rains   occur  .
Topsoil  is   the   अपर   ,  outermost layer of soil , usually the  शीर्ष   to  .
It has the  उच्चतम  concentration  of  organic matter and  microorganisms  and is  जहाँ   सबसे  of the Earth 's  biological  soil activity  occurs   .
Musical  cryptogram  :  ``  Aschbeg '' set in  schoenberg  's Sechs kleine Klavierstücke ,  op  .  19  , no . 1 ,  m.  5 .
Note that the  टीप  do  नहीं   आइये   in  spelling order  लकिन  are  सब   सटा   (   नहीं  separated by  अन्य  notes  )  .
sechs  kleine Klavierstücke  ,   op  . 19  (  or Six  छोटी  Piano Pieces )  is   a   नियत  of pieces  लिये   सोलो  piano written by the  आस्ट्रिया  composer Arnold  schoenberg   ,  published in 1913 .
मैक्एफ़ी  , Inc.  (  ) is  an   अमरीकी   वैश्विक  computer  सुरक्षा   तन्त्र   कम्पनी  headquartered in Santa Clara  ,  California ,  और  the world 's  largest  dedicated security  प्रौद्योगिकी  company .

संत  Rita of Cascia  (   born  Margherita  lotti  1381  -   may   22  , 1457 ) was an Italian Augustinian nun ,  विधवा   और  saint venerated in the Roman Catholic Church  .
Rita was  शादीशुदा  at an early  आयु   .
The marriage  lasted   लिये  18 years , during which  वो   is   remembered  for her  ईसाई  values  as  a model  बीवी  and  माँ  who made efforts  to   बदलें  her  husband   इससे   उसके   गाली   बर्ताव  .
Upon the  हत्या   of  her husband by  another  feuding family  ,  she sought to  dissuade  her  बेटे   इससे   बदला  .
वो  subsequently joined  an  Augustinian community of  धार्मिक  sisters  ,  where she was known for  practicing  mortification  of  the flesh , along with  the   apparent  efficacy of her  प्रार्थनाएं  .
St. Rita is venerated due to various miracles attributed  to   उसके  intercession ,  और  is often  portrayed  with a  bleeding  wound on her forehead ,  जिससे   the   रोमन   कैथोलिक   गिरिजाघर  claims to have been a  आंशिक   stigmata  .
The Roman Catholic Church  ,   अंतर्गत   the  pontificate of  पोप   leo  XIII  officially   canonized  Rita  on  May 24 ,  1900   ,  while her  feast  day  is  celebrated  प्रत्येक  May  22  .
in  many pious  कैथोलिक  countries ,  रीता  is known  to  be a patroness for abused wives and  शोक  women .
North America is a continent wholly  भीतर  the Northern Hemisphere and almost  wholly   भीतर  the Western Hemisphere  .
it  is also considered  a  northern  उपमहाद्वीप  of  the  Americas .
it  is  bordered  to  the  north  by  the Arctic Ocean  ,  to the  ईस्ट   by  the  अटलांटिक   समंदर  ,  to  the  वेस्ट   और   दक्षिण   by   the  Pacific  समंदर  ,  और   to   the  southeast  by   दक्षिण   अमेरिका   और  the Caribbean  समुद्र   .
North America covers  an  area of  परिचय  24,709,000  वर्गाकार  kilometers  (  9,540,000  वर्गाकार  miles )  ,  about  4.8   %   of  the planet 's  सतह  or about  16.5  % of  इसके  land  क्षेत्रफल  .
As of July 2008 , its population was estimated at  nearly   529  million people across 23 independent states  ,  representing  परिचय  7.5 % of the human  जनसांख्यिकी   .
North America is the third-largest continent in  क्षेत्रफल  , following Asia and Africa  ,  and  the  fourth  in  population  बाद   एशिया  , Africa ,  और   यूरोपीय  .
The  पहला  people to live in North  अमेरिका  were Paleoindians who  began  to arrive during the last  glacial  period by crossing the Bering  जमीन  bridge .
They  differentiated  into a  क्रमांक   of   विविध  cultures and  समुदायों  across the  महाद्वीप  .
The largest and  सबसे   उन्नत  Pre-Columbian civilizations in  उत्तर  America were  the  Aztecs in what  is  now  मैक्सिको  and  the  Mayans in Central  अमेरिका   .
European colonists  began   to   arrive  starting in the 16th and 17th centuries  ,  wiping out  विशाल   संख्याएँ  of  the  native populations and beginning  an  era  of  European  दबदबा   .
jermaine  Lamarr  कोल  (  born  January 28 , 1985 ) ,  बेहतर  known by his stage name J.  कोल   ,  is  an  American hip-hop  रिकॉर्डिंग   कलाकार  and record producer from Fayetteville  ,  North Carolina  .
in  2009 , he became the first artist to sign to  jay-z  's Roc  स्वदेश  label .
उसके  long-awaited debut album ,  हकदार  Cole World : The Sideline  स्टोरी   ,  was released on  सितंबर   27  , 2011 .
The album debuted at number one  on  the  us  Billboard 200 ,  शीर्ष   r  &  b   एल्बम  and  शीर्ष  Rap Albums chart , selling more  than  218,000  in   इसके  first week .
He received a  नामांकन  for  बेहतरीन  New  कलाकार   at   the   54th  Grammy Awards .
the  two  प्रमुख   वर्ण   of  the  श्रेणी  ,  ratchet  ( right )  और   clank  (  बाएँ  ) .
ratchet   &   clank   is  a series  of  platform video games .
the  franchise was  निर्मित   और  developed by  insomniac   खेल   और   प्रकाशित  by  सोनी  Computer Entertainment for  अनेक   अलग  PlayStation consoles ,  ऐसे   as   प्लेस्टेशन   2  and PlayStation 3  साथ   the   exclusion  of Size  matters   और  Secret Agent Clank ,  जिससे  were  विकसित   by  High Impact  खेल  for the PlayStation Portable .
प्रत्येक  game in  the  series has  महरूम  released for every  कंसोल   ,  as  the   ip   is   स्वामित्व  by Sony Computer Entertainment .
An  एनिमेटेड   विशेषता  film  अनुकूलन   उत्पादित  by  rainmaker  Entertainment and Blockade Entertainment  is  scheduled for a theatrical  रिलीज   sometime   in   2015   .
the   खेल   लो   प्लेस  in a  विज्ञान  fiction setting and  follow  the  adventures  of  ratchet   (   an  animalistic human-like character known as  a   lombax  , who is a mechanic  )  and  clank   (  a diminutive  ,  sentient  रोबोट   )  as they travel through the universe ,  छायांकन  it  इससे   दुष्ट   शक्तियां  on  a  regular basis .
The series is noted  लिये  the  समावेश  of  अनेक  exotic and  अद्वितीय  ,  over  the top  हथियार  and devices  ,  a concept that Insomniac Games  भी  expanded into their other  खेल   .
A will or  वसीयत   is  a  विधिक  declaration  by   जिससे   a   व्यक्ति  ,  the   testator  ,  names   एक  or more persons  to  manage his/her  एस्टेट   और   provides   लिये   the  transfer of his  प्रॉपर्टी   at   मौत   .
For the  devolution  of  प्रॉपर्टी  not  disposed  of  by  will , see  उत्तराधिकार  and  intestacy  .
in  the strictest  भाव  , a  ``  will ''  रै  historically  महरूम  limited to real property while  ``   वसीयत   ''   applies   तभी  to  dispositions  of personal property (  यूँ  giving rise  to  the  लोकप्रिय   शीर्षक   of  the document as `` Last  होगा   और  Testament  ''   )  , though  इस  distinction is seldom observed today .
a  will  may  also create a testamentary  विश्वास  that  is  effective  तभी  after the  मौत   of  the testator .
The  19.9  MW Gemasolar  सौर  plant in Spain features  15   घंटों   of   भंडार   और  can supply power  24  hours a day  .
सौर  energy ,  रौशन  light and heat  इससे   the   सूर्य  ,  रै   महरूम   harnessed   by  humans since ancient  टाइम्स   using   a   दायरा  of ever-evolving technologies .
सौर   उर्जा   technologies   शामिल  solar heating  ,  solar photovoltaics , solar  थर्मल   विद्युत   ,   सौर  architecture and  कृत्रिम  photosynthesis , which can make  considerable  contributions to  solving   कुछ  of the most  तात्कालिक   उर्जा  problems the  संसार  now faces .
Solar  technologies   हैं  broadly characterized as either  passive   सौर   or  active solar depending  on   the  way they  कैप्चर  , convert and  वितरित  solar energy .
Active solar techniques  शामिल  the use of photovoltaic  panels   और  solar thermal  collectors  to harness the energy .
Passive  सौर  techniques include  orienting  a building to the Sun ,  selecting  materials with favorable thermal mass or light dispersing properties ,  और   डिजाइनिंग   स्पेसेस  that naturally  circulate  air .
In  2011  , the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   उर्जा  Agency  कहा  that ``  the   विकास   of   सस्ती   ,  inexhaustible and clean solar  उर्जा   technologies   होगा   have  huge  longer-term  benefits .
It will  बढ़ाएँ  countries’ energy security through  रिलायंस   on   an  indigenous , inexhaustible  और   ज़्यादातर   import-independent   संसाधन  , enhance  स्थिरता   ,   reduce  pollution , lower  the  costs  of  mitigating climate change  ,   और  keep  चट्टान  fuel prices lower  than   वरना   .
ये  advantages are  वैश्विक   .
Hence  the   अतिरिक्त   लागत   of   the   प्रोत्साहन  for  जल्दी  deployment should  be  considered  सीखना   निवेश  ; they must be wisely spent and  need  to be widely  साझा   ''  .
सर  Thomas More ( ; 7  फ़रवरी  14786  जुलाई   1535  )  ,  known to Roman Catholics as  संत  Thomas More since  1935  ,  थी  an English  वकील   ,   सोशल   पारस   ,   लेखक  , statesman , and noted  पुनर्जागरण  humanist  .
He was  an  important  पार्षद   to  Henry  viii  of England and was Lord Chancellor  इससे  October 1529 to  16  May  1532   .
he  was canonized  by  Pope Pius XI in 1935 as  एक   of   the   जल्दी  martyrs  of  the schism  कि   अलग  the Church of  इंग्लैण्ड  from  रोम  in  the   16th  century  .
In 2000 , Pope John  पॉल  II  घोषित  him patron of  कैथोलिक   कूटनीतिज्ञों   और  politicians .
More was  an  opponent  of   the   प्रोटोस्टेंट  Reformation ,  in  particular  of   मार्टिन  Luther  और  William  टिंडेल  .
However ,  चूंकि   1980   ,  he is also commemorated  by  the  गिरिजाघर  of England as a reformation  वीरगति   .
More coined the  शब्द  `` utopia ``  –   a  name he gave  to   the  ideal and imaginary  द्वीप   स्वदेश   ,  the political system of which he described in  यूटोपिया   ,  published  in  1516  .
He opposed  the  King  's  separation  इससे  the Roman Catholic Church  और  refused to accept him as  परम्  Head  of  the Church of  इंग्लैण्ड  ,  a   शीर्षक   जिससे  had been  दिए  by  पार्लियामेंट   through   the  Act  of  Supremacy of 1534 .
He was  imprisoned  in 1534 for  उसके   refusal   to  take the  शपथ  required by the First  उत्तराधिकार   अधिनियम  ,  क्युकी   the   अधिनियम  disparaged  papal  Authority  और  Henry’s marriage to Catherine of Aragon .
in  1535 , he was tried for treason  ,   convicted   on  perjured  गवाही   ,  and beheaded .
More also helped  to   originate  the  phrase   ``  grasp at  लोभी  '' to mean ``  शिद्दत  trying even useless things ''  ,  in his Dialogue  of   सुकून   विरूद्ध   tribulation  .
intellectuals  and statesmen  आरपार   यूरोपीय  were stunned by  अधिक  's execution  .
erasmus   saluted   उसे  as  एक  `` whose  आत्मा  was  अधिक   pure  than any  हिम  , whose genius was  ऐसे  that  इंग्लैण्ड  never had and  never   again  will have its like '' .
There was a more  विवादास्पद  side to  अधिक  's life  ,  because  he   advocated   the  persecution and  निष्पादन   of  Protestants  जो   refused   to  recant their faith  .
however  , the judgement of  इतिहास  has been  largely   willing  to forgive this  in   लाइट  of  the  times he lived in and  उसके  martyrdom in  the   रोमन   कैथोलिक   कारण   .
Two centuries later  जोनाथन   स्विफ्ट   कहा  More  थी   ``   the  person  of  the  महानतम   पुण्य   इस  kingdom ever produced '' , a  भावना  with which  सैमुएल   जॉनसन  agreed .
इतिहासकार  Hugh Trevor-Roper said in  1977  that  अधिक  was  ``  the first great Englishman whom we feel  कि  we know , the most saintly of  humanists   ,  the  सबसे   इंसान  of  संतो  , the universal  man  of our cool northern  पुनर्जागरण   .  ''
कप्तान   nemo   ,  also known as  प्रिंस  Dakkar  ,   is   a  fictional  अक्षर  invented  by   the  French science fiction author Jules Verne  .
nemo   appears   in  two of  वर्न  's novels , Twenty  हजार   लीग  Under the Sea ( 1870 )  और  The Mysterious Island  (   1874  )  ,   और   makes   a   कैमियो  appearance  in   वर्न   's   खेल   यात्रा  Through  the  Impossible ( 1882 ) .
Nemo  ,  one of the most  प्रसिद्ध   antiheroes  in  fiction   ,  is a  रहस्यमय  figure .
The son  of  an Indian Raja , he  is   a   वैज्ञानिक   प्रतिभाशाली   जो   roams  the depths of the sea in his  पनडुब्बी  ,  the  Nautilus  ,  which was  निर्मित  on a  उजाड़   द्वीप   .
Nemo tries to  प्रोजेक्ट   a  stern ,  नियंत्रित   विश्वास   ,  but he is driven  by   a  thirst for vengeance and a hatred  of  imperialism (  विशेषकर  the British  साम्राज्य  )  .
he   is   भी  wracked by remorse  over  the deaths  of   उसके  crew members  और  even by  the   मौतों   of  enemy  sailors  .
nemo  has  appeared   in   विभिन्न  adaptations  of  Verne  's  novels ,  सहित  films , where he  रै   महरूम   portrayed  by  a  number of  अलग  actors .
he  has furthermore  महरूम  adopted  by   अन्य  authors  लिये  inclusion  in  their  novels  , most  notably   in  Alan Moore 's The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen and Philip José Farmer  's   the  Other Log of  phileas  Fogg .
Listed  नीचे   हैं  the  प्रमुख  League  बेसबॉल   टीमों  with  the  best season  won-lost  records in history  ,   as  determined by  जीतना  percentage (  .700  or better  )  , minimum  120  games  निभाई   .
Acoustic coupler  मॉडेम
A modem  (  modulator-demodulator  )   is  a device that modulates an  एनालॉग  carrier signal  to   encode   डिजिटल  information  ,  and also demodulates such a carrier signal to  डिकोड   the  transmitted information .
the  goal is  to  produce  a   सिग्नल  that  can   be   transmitted   easily  and  decoded   to   reproduce  the original  डिजिटल   आंकड़ा   .
Modems can  be   प्रयुक्त   over  any means of  transmitting  analog signals ,  इससे   लाइट  emitting diodes  to  radio  .
the   सबसे  familiar  उदाहरण   is   a  voice band  मॉडेम   कि   turns  the digital  आंकड़ा   of  a personal  कंप्यूटर  into modulated  विद्युत  signals  in  the  आवाज़  frequency range of a  टेलीफोन  channel .
ये   सिग्नल  can be transmitted  over   टेलीफोन  lines and  demodulated  by another  मॉडेम   at  the  receiver  side  to  recover the digital data .
Modems are  generally  classified by the  राशि  of data they can send  in  a  दिए  unit  of  time  ,   प्रायः  expressed in  बिट्स  per  दूसरी  ( bit/s  ,  or bps  )  , or bytes per  दूसरी  ( B/s  )  .
modems  can alternatively  be   वर्गीकृत   by   उनके   प्रतीक   रेट  , measured in  baud  .
the   baud  unit  denotes   प्रतीकों  per second ,  or   the  number of times per  दूसरी  the modem sends a  नई   सिग्नल  .
For example ,  the   itu   v.21   मानक  used audio  आवृत्ति   शिफ़्ट  keying with two  संभावित   बारंबारता   सम्बन्धित  to  दो   पृथक   प्रतीकों   (  or one  बिट  per  प्रतीक  ) ,  to  carry 300  बिट्स  per  दूसरी   using   300   baud   .
By contrast  ,  the original ITU V.22 standard ,  जिससे   थी  able  to  transmit and  प्राप्त   चार  distinct symbols (  दो   बिट्स  per symbol  )  ,  संभाला  1,200 bit/s  by  sending 600 symbols per second (  600  baud  )   using  phase  शिफ़्ट   keying  .
the  Declaration of Independence  is  a statement  अपनाया  by the Continental  कॉंग्रेस  on  जुलाई  4 ,  1776  , which announced that  the   तेरह   अमरीकी  colonies ,  तब   at  war with Great Britain  ,   regarded   themselves   as   स्वतंत्र   राज्य   ,   और  no longer a part  of   the   अंग्रेजों   साम्राज्य  .
Instead  वे  now formed a new nation—the United States of  अमेरिका  .
John Adams was a leader in  pushing   लिये   स्वतंत्रता  ,  जिससे  was unanimously approved on July 2 .
a  committee  था  already  drafted   the  formal declaration  ,   to  be ready  जब   कॉंग्रेस   voted   on  independence  .
एडम्स  persuaded the committee  to  select Thomas Jefferson to  लिखें  the  असली   ड्राफ्ट  of  the  document ,  जिससे  congress  होता   संपादन  to produce  the  final version  .
The  घोषणा   थी  ultimately a  औपचारिक  explanation  of   क्यों  Congress had  voted  on July  2   to  declare independence from  ग्रेट  Britain , more than a year  बाद  the  outbreak  of  the  American  क्रांतिकारी  War  .
The  नेशनल   जन्मदिवस  ,  the   स्वतंत्रता  Day  is   मनाये  on July  4   ,   हालांकि  Adams wanted July  2   .
बाद   ratifying   the  text  on  July 4 , Congress  जारी  the  घोषणा  of  स्वतंत्रता  in  अनेक  forms .
it  was initially published  as   the  printed Dunlap broadside  कि  was  widely  distributed and read  to   the   पब्लिक   .
the   सबसे  famous version  of  the  घोषणा  ,  a   हस्ताक्षरित   नक़ल  that is  popularly  regarded as the  घोषणा  of Independence  ,  is displayed at the  नेशनल   अभिलेख   in  Washington , D.C .
Although the wording  of  the  घोषणा  was  स्वीकृत   on  July 4  ,   the  date  of   इसके  signing was August 2 .
The original  जुलाई   4  United States Declaration of Independence manuscript  थी  lost while all other copies have been derived from  इस  original  दस्तावेज़   .
the  sources and interpretation  of  the  घोषणा   have  been  the   विषय  of much scholarly inquiry .
The Declaration justified the  स्वतंत्रता  of  the   संयुक्त  States  by   लिस्टिंग   औपनिवेशिक   grievances  against King  जार्ज   iii  ,  और   by   asserting  certain  प्राकृतिक  and legal rights  ,  including  a  right  of   क्रान्ति   .
Having  परोसा   इसके  original  purpose  in announcing independence ,  the  text of the Declaration  थी  initially  उपेक्षित  after  the  American  क्रान्ति   .
Since then , it has  आइये  to  be  considered a major  बयान  on  इंसान   अधिकारों  ,  विशेषकर  its second sentence:
We hold  ये  truths to be self-evident ,  कि   सब  men are created equal , that  वे   हैं  endowed by  उनके  Creator  साथ  certain  unalienable   अधिकारों  , that among  ये  are Life  ,   स्वतंत्रता  and the pursuit  of  Happiness .
इस  has  महरूम  called ``  एक   of  the best-known  वाक्य   in   the   अंग्रेज़ी   भाषा  '' , containing `` the most potent and consequential words  in  American history  .   ''
the  passage  आए   to   represent  a  moral   मानक  to which the  संयुक्त  States  चाहिए  strive  .
This view was notably promoted  by   अब्राहम   lincoln  ,  जो  considered the  घोषणा   to  be the  न्यास   of   उसके  political philosophy ,  और  argued that the  घोषणा  is a statement  of   सिद्धान्त  through which the  संयुक्त  States  संविधान  should  be  interpreted .
it  has inspired work for  the  rights  of  marginalized people throughout the world .
The  अर्थव्यवस्था  of  ग्रीनलैंड  can be characterized  as   छोटी   ,  mixed and  vulnerable  .
the   उपस्थित  economy  consists  of a  बिग   पब्लिक  sector  और  comprehensive  विदेशी   व्यापार   ,   जिससे   रै  resulted in an  अर्थव्यवस्था  with periods  of  strong  विकास   ,  considerable inflation , unemployment problems and extreme  dependence   on   पूंजी   inflow  from Denmark and use  of  outside , mainly Danish ,  skilled  labor .
जीडीपी   प्रति   capita  is  समान   to   the  average  यूरोपीय  economies  लकिन   the   अर्थव्यवस्था  is  critically  dependent upon substantial  support   इससे   the  Danish  सरकारी  , which  आपूर्तियाँ  about half  the   revenues  of the  घर  rule government who  in  turn employ about  8,000   greenlanders   आउट  of a labor  फ़ोर्स  of 40,156 ( Jan. 2012  )  .
बेरोजगारी  nonetheless remains  ऊँची   ,  with the rest of the  अर्थव्यवस्था  dependent  upon   माँग  for exports  of  shrimp and fish .
Hydrogen is a chemical  तत्व  with symbol H  और   परमाणु  number  1  .
साथ  an atomic weight of ( for hydrogen-1  )  , hydrogen  is  the  lightest   तत्व   और  its  monatomic  form  (  H1 ) is the  सबसे  abundant chemical  पदार्थ  , constituting roughly  75   %  of the Universe  's  baryonic mass .
non-  remnant  सितारों  are  मुख्यतः   रचित   of  hydrogen  in  its  प्लाज्मा  state .
At standard  तापमान   और  pressure ,  हाइड्रोजन  is  a  colorless , odorless  ,   tasteless   ,   non-toxic   ,   nonmetallic  ,  अत्यधिक  combustible diatomic  गैस   साथ  the  आणविक  formula  h2   .
Most of the hydrogen  on  Earth  is   in  molecules  ऐसे  as water and  सशुल्क  compounds  क्युकी  hydrogen readily  फ़ॉर्म  covalent  यौगिकों   साथ   सबसे  non-metallic elements .
हाइड्रोजन   plays   a   विशेषकर   महत्वपूर्ण   भूमिका   in   acid-base  chemistry  साथ   अनेक  reactions exchanging protons between  घुलनशील  molecules  .
In ionic  यौगिकों  ,  it  can  लो   a  negative charge  (   an  anion known as  a  hydride and written as H−  )  ,  or  as a  positively  charged  प्रजाति  H+ .
the   latter  cation  is  written  as   हालांकि  composed of a bare proton , but  in   वास्तविकता  , hydrogen cations in ionic  यौगिकों   सदा  occur as more  जटिल   प्रजाति   .
The  सबसे   आम  isotope of hydrogen  is  protium (  नाम  rarely  प्रयुक्त  , symbol 1H  )  with a  सिंगल  proton  और   no  neutrons .
as   the   सरलतम  atom  ज्ञात  , the hydrogen atom has  महरूम   of   सैद्धांतिक   उपयोग  .
For example ,  as  the  तभी  neutral  अणु  with  an   analytic  solution  to   the  Schrödinger  समीकरण  ,  the   पढ़ाई  of  the  energetics and bonding  of  the  हाइड्रोजन   अणु   निभाई  a key role  in   the  development of  क्वांटम  mechanics .
हाइड्रोजन  gas was first  artificially   उत्पादित  in  the  early 16th century ,  via  the mixing of metals with  acids  .
In 1766–81 , Henry Cavendish  थी   the  first to  recognize  that  हाइड्रोजन  gas was a  अलहदा   पदार्थ   ,   और   कि   it  produces water when burned  ,  a property  जिससे  later gave it its name :  in  Greek  ,  hydrogen  अर्थात्  ``  water-former   ''  .
औद्योगिक   उत्पादन  is  मुख्यतः  from  the  steam reforming of  प्राकृतिक  gas  ,   और   कम   प्रायः  from  अधिक  energy-intensive hydrogen production  विधि  like the electrolysis of water .
Most  हाइड्रोजन  is employed  निकट   इसके  production site , with the two largest uses being  चट्टान   ईंधन  processing  (  e.g. , hydrocracking )  और  ammonia production  ,   ज़्यादातर   लिये  the fertilizer market .
Hydrogen  is  a  चिंता   in   metallurgy  as  it  can embrittle many metals , complicating the design of pipelines and storage tanks .
Unstoppable is a  2010   अमरीकी  action  थ्रिलर  film directed by Tony Scott  ,  written by Mark Bomback , and starring Denzel Washington  और   क्रिस   पाइन   .
The film  ,   loosely  based on  the   real-life  CSX 8888 incident , tells the  स्टोरी  of a runaway  भाड़ा   ट्रैन   ,   और  the two men  (  Washington and  पाइन  ) who manage to  रोकें  it  .
it  was Scott 's final feature film  पहले  his  मौत   in  2012 .
The  फिल्मी   थी  released in the  संयुक्त  States  और  Canada on  नवम्बर   12  ,  2010   ,  and  in  the United  किंगडम  on  नवम्बर  24 , 2010  .
it  received mostly favorable reviews from film critics  ;  it  garnered  a ``  certified  Fresh '' rating on Rotten Tomatoes  आधारित  upon aggregated reviews and a  दरजा  of  ``  Generally favorable  समीक्षाएँ  ''  at  Metacritic  .
The film was nominated  लिये   an   अकादमी  Award for Best Sound  संपादन  at  the   83rd  Academy Awards  ,  but  खोया   to  Inception  .
in  photography  ,  bracketing is  the  general  तकनीक   of  taking several  गोलियाँ  of the same  विषय  using different camera settings  .
Bracketing  is   उपयोगी   और  often  अनुशंसित   in   परिस्थितियों  that make it  मुश्किल  to obtain  a  satisfactory image  साथ  a  सिंगल  shot ,  विशेषकर  when  a  small variation  in  exposure parameters has a  comparatively  large effect on  the  resulting  चित्र   .
Autobracketing is  स्वचालित  bracketing by using a setting  on   the  camera  to   लो  several bracketed shots ( in  कंट्रास्ट   to   the  photographer  altering   the   जमावट  by  हाथ   between  each shot  )   .
दिए  the  समय  it  takes  to  accomplish  multiple  गोलियाँ   ,   it   is  typically ,  लकिन   नहीं  always ,  प्रयुक्त   लिये  static subjects .
Insulated  glazing  ( IG ) , more  commonly   ज्ञात  as  दोगुना   glazing  ( or double-pane , and increasingly triple  glazing/pane  ) are double or  ट्रिपल  glass window panes separated by an air or  अन्य   गैस  filled space to reduce heat transfer across  a  part of the  भवन   लिफाफा  .
Insulated  कांच   इकाई  are manufactured  साथ  glass in range of  मोटाई  from  3  mm  to   10   mm  or more in special applications  .
laminated   or  tempered  कांच   may   भी   be  used as part of  the  construction .
सबसे  units  हैं  manufactured with the  वही   मोटाई  of  कांच   प्रयुक्त   on   दोनो  panes  लकिन  special applications  ऐसे   as   ध्वनिक  attenuation or security  may  require wide ranges  of  thicknesses to be incorporated in the  वही  unit .
a  sectioned  आरेख   of  a fixed Insulated  चमकीले  Unit  (  IGU ) ,  indicating  the numbering  सम्मेलन  used  in  this  आलेख  .
Surface #  1  is facing outside ,  सतह   #  2  is   the  inside surface of  the   exterior  pane  ,  Surface # 3  is   the   बाहर  surface of  the   आंतरिक  pane , and Surface #  4  is the  अंदर  surface of interior  फलक  .
The  खिड़की   फ़्रेम  is labelled #  5   ,   a  spacer  is   indicated   as   #   6   ,  seals are  दिखाया   in   रेड  ( # 7 ) , the internal  खुलासा   is  on  the   सही   हाथ  side ( #  8   )  and the  exterior  windowsill  on   the   बाएँ  ( # 9  )
to  reduce shear  प्रभाव   on   the  sealed  ईकाई   (  a major cause  of   असामयिक  failure  )  ,  निर्माताओं   उपयोग  a rule  of  thumb that  permits   a  difference  of   1   mm  between the thickness of the panes of  कांच  used in the unit  और   स्टिल   maintain   the   वारंटी   लिये   the  unit  .
For  उदाहरण   ,  a  ईकाई  may be ordered with a 4  mm   फलक   on   the  exterior and a  3  mm  फलक  on  the  interior .
These  विसंगतियाँ  are allowed for  architectural  and  लागत  reasons .
Other combinations  can  be specified  और  produced but the  निर्माता   may  reserve  the  right  to  limit  the  term  of   the   वारंटी  or  इंकार   to   वारंटी   the  unit  altogether  .
For ease of  वर्णन  the  सतहों   of   a   दोगुना  paned  ईकाई   हैं  named according  to   the  following  सम्मेलन  : Surface # 1  (   facing  outside ) ,  सतह   #  2 (  अंदर  of  बाहर  pane  )   ,   सतह  # 3  (  outside  of  inside pane ) and Surface  #  4  (  inside  सतह   of  inside  फलक   )   .
applying  the  सम्बन्धित  nomenclature for triple  paned   इकाई  results  in   सतहों  # 1  through   #   6  .
The performance of insulating glazing can  be  modified through the use of the  following:
A  ठेठ   संस्थापना  of insulated glazing windows with  upvc  window  फ्रेम्स   .
सेलेनियम  is a chemical element with symbol  se   और   परमाणु  number 34  .
it   is  a  अधातु  with  गुण   कि   हैं  intermediate  between   those   of   इसके  periodic  तालिका  column-adjacent chalcogen elements sulfur and tellurium .
it  rarely  occurs   in   इसके   elemental   राज्य  in nature  ,  or as pure ore compounds  .
Selenium  (  Greek  σελήνη   selene   अर्थ   ``  Moon '' ) was  खोजा   in   1817   by  Jöns Jacob Berzelius  ,   जो  noted  the  similarity of  the  new element  to   the  previously-known tellurium ( named for  the   धरती  )  .
सेलेनियम  is found  impurely  in metal sulfide  ores  ,  जहाँ  it partially replaces the sulfur  .
Commercially  ,  selenium is produced  as   a  byproduct in the  शोधन  of  ये   ores   ,   सबसे   प्रायः   दौरान  copper production .
Minerals that  हैं  pure  selenide  or selenate compounds are  ज्ञात  , but  हैं  rare  .
the   मुख्य  commercial uses for  सेलेनियम   आज   हैं  in glassmaking and in pigments  .
Selenium is a semiconductor and  is  used in photocells .
उपयोग   in  electronics , once important  ,  have  महरूम   ज़्यादातर  supplanted by silicon semiconductor  डिवाइस  .
Selenium continues to be used in  a   few   प्रकार  of  dc  power surge protectors and one  प्रकार  of  fluorescent  quantum dot .
Selenium  लवण   हैं   विषाक्त  in  विशाल  amounts  ,   लकिन   ट्रेस  amounts are  जरुरी  for  सेल्यूलर   फलन  in  अनेक  organisms ,  सहित  all animals .
Selenium  is  a component  of  the antioxidant enzymes  glutathione   peroxidase  and  thioredoxin  reductase ( which indirectly reduce  निश्चित   oxidized  molecules in animals and  कुछ  plants )  .
It  is  also  मिला  in  तीन  deiodinase  एंजाइमों  ,  जिससे   बदलें   एक  thyroid  हार्मोन   to   another  .
Selenium  आवश्यकताएँ  in plants differ  by  species , with some plants requiring relatively  विशाल   amounts  , and  अन्य   जाहिर   requiring  none .
the   संयुक्त   राज्य  presidential election of 2008 was  the   56th  quadrennial  अध्यक्षीय   चुनाव   .
It was  आयोजित  on  मंगलवार   ,   नवम्बर  4  ,  2008 .
Democrat Barack Obama , then the  जूनियर  Senator from Illinois ,  पराजित   रिपब्लिकन  John McCain  ,  the  वरिष्ठ   सीनेटर  from  एरिज़ोना  .
as  the campaign  progressed  , the War  in   इराकी  and outgoing  रिपब्लिकन   अध्यक्ष   जार्ज  W. Bush  था  become  increasingly   unpopular   ,  and  the  major-party  उम्मीदवार   भागा  on a  मंच  of change  और   सुधार  .
Domestic policy  और  the economy eventually  उभरा  as the  प्रमुख  themes  in  the  पिछला   few   महीने  of the election  अभियान  after  the  onset of the worst  मंदी  since the  1930s  .
Obama would  go   on   to  win a decisive victory over McCain in both  the   चुनावी   और   लोकप्रिय   vote  .
ओबामा   प्राप्त   the   सबसे   मत   लिये  a presidential candidate  in  American  इतिहास  , and  जीती  the  लोकप्रिय   और  electoral vote by  the   largest   हाशिया  in 12 years , as  खूब  as  the  largest  प्रतिशत  of  the  popular vote  लिये  a  डेमोक्रेट   in  nearly  a  half-century  .
इस  was  the  first U.S. presidential  चुनाव  in  जिससे  an African American was elected  ,   having  also  महरूम  the  पहला  in which  an  African American won  the  nomination  of  either  प्रमुख  party  .
This election was also notable  लिये  being the first  समय  in  u.S.   इतिहास  that  दोनो   प्रमुख   पार्टी   उम्मीदवार   यहूद  sitting U.S .  सीनेटरों  , only the third  समय  (  बाद   1920  and 1960  )  that any sitting U.S . Senator  थी  elected  अध्यक्ष  ,  और   तभी  the second  समय  that  the  winning President and Vice  अध्यक्ष   (  Obama  और   बिडेन  ) were both sitting U.S  .  Senators  .
This  थी   भी  the first  चुनाव  since  1952  in which neither  of   the  major parties ' nominees  थी   the   लाज़िम  President  or  Vice  अध्यक्ष  .
The Sovereign  प्रिंस   or  Princess of Monaco is  the  reigning  monarch  and head of state  of   the   principality   of   मोनाको  .
सब   princes  or princesses have  officially  taken the  नाम  of the  हाउस  of Grimaldi  ,  but  have  belonged to various  अन्य   घरों  (  goyon  de  matignon   ,  Polignac )  in  male line .
The  reigning  Prince is  अल्बर्ट   ii  .
Visualization  of  fragmentation and  तब   of  defragmentation
in   the   मेंटेनेंस  of file systems  ,   defragmentation  is  a  process that  reduces  the amount of  fragmentation   .
It  करता   इस   by  physically organizing  the   सामग्री  of the mass storage  यंत्र  used  to  store files into the smallest  क्रमांक  of contiguous regions  (  fragments ) .
it  also attempts to create larger regions of free space using  compaction   to  impede the  वापसी  of fragmentation  .
Some  defragmentation  utilities try  to  keep  छोटी  files within a single directory together  ,  as they are  प्रायः   पहुँचा  in sequence .
defragmentation  is advantageous and  प्रासंगिक   to  file systems on electromechanical disk drives .
The  गति   of  the hard  ड्राइव   's  read/write heads  over  different  क्षेत्रों  of  the   डिस्क   जब  accessing  fragmented  files is  धीमा   ,  compared to  accessing  the  संपूर्ण  contents of  a  non-fragmented  संचिका  sequentially without moving the read/write heads to seek other fragments  .
a  service-level agreement (  sla  ) is a part of a service contract where  a   सेवा   is  formally defined .
In practice , the  पद   sla  is sometimes used  to   refer   to   the  contracted  डिलीवरी   समय  (  of  the service or  प्रदर्शन  )  .
as   an   उदाहरण  , internet  सेवा   प्रदाताओं   होगा  commonly include service  स्तर   समझौतों   भीतर  the  शर्तें  of their contracts  साथ  customers to  define  the level  (  s  )  of service being  बेची  in plain language  शर्तें   .
In this case the  sla   होगा  typically  have  a  तकनीकी   परिभाषा  in terms of  औसत   समय  between  असफलताओं  (  mtbf   )  ,  औसत   समय  to repair or mean time to recovery  (  MTTR )  ;   विभिन्न  data rates ; throughput ; jitter  ;  or  समान   measurable  details .
Union Station is a former shopping  मॉल  in Union  नगर  , Georgia  ,   in  southwest  मैट्रो   अटलांटा  adjacent to Interstate 85  .
After new ownership and  renovations  in 2006 ,  the   नाम   थी  changed from  शैनन  Southpark  मॉल   in  2007 to  संघ   स्टेशन   मॉल   .
A  पिछला  renovation was  किया  in  the  late  1990s  .
The mall  रै   महरूम   बंद   चूंकि   नवम्बर  2010 .
This map shows the contiguous  संयुक्त   राज्य   और  , in  insets  at the lower  बाएँ  , the two  राज्य   कि  are not contiguous  .
The  संलग्न  United  राज्य  are the  48   adjoining  U.S.  राज्य  on the continent  of   उत्तर  America that are  दक्षिण  of Canada and  उत्तर   of   मैक्सिको   ,  plus the District of  कोलंबिया  .
the   पद  excludes  the   राज्य  of  अलास्का   और   हवाई  , and all off-shore  u.S.  territories  और   possessions   ,  such as Puerto  रीको   .
Together  ,  the  48  contiguous  राज्य  and D.C.  occupy  a  संयुक्त  area  of   ,  which  is  1.58  %  of  the  total surface  क्षेत्रफल  of  the  Earth .
Of this  ,  is  जमीन  , composing 83.65 % of U.S. land  क्षेत्रफल   .
Officially ,  is  water area  ,   composing   62.66  % of  the  nation 's water  क्षेत्रफल  .
The 2010 census  जनसांख्यिकी   थी   306,675,006  , composing 99.33 % of the nation  's  population ,  और  a density of  103.639  inhabitants/sq mi (  40.015/km2  ) , compared to  87.264/sq   mi   (  33.692/km2  )  for the nation as a  पूरे  .
``   क्यों   ''   is   the   शीर्षक  of  a  song  अंकित   by  American  देश  band  rascal  Flatts  .
It  is   the  third single  इससे   उनके  sixth  स्टुडियो   एल्बम  ,  अजेय  .
It  थी  released  to   रेडियो  stations on September 29 ,  2009   और  debuted at # 44  on   the   u.s  . Billboard US Billboard Hot Country Songs chart for the week  of  October  10  ,  2009  .
it  was written by  रोब  Mathes and  एलन   shamblin  .
Utilization  प्रबन्धन   is   the  evaluation of  the   appropriateness   ,  medical need  और  efficiency  of  health care services  प्रक्रियाओं  and facilities according to  स्थापित  criteria or guidelines and  अंतर्गत  the  प्रावधानों  of  an  applicable  स्वास्थ्य   लाभ   योजना   .
Typically it includes new  क्रियाएँ   or   निर्णय   आधारित   upon  the  विश्लेषण   of  a  मामला  .
utilization  management describes proactive  प्रक्रियाओं  ,  सहित  discharge  नियोजन  , concurrent planning , pre-certification and clinical case appeals  .
it   भी  covers proactive  प्रक्रियाओं  , such as concurrent clinical reviews  और  peer reviews  ,   as   खूब  as appeals introduced by the  प्रदाता   ,   payer   or   रोगी   .
as  pre-certification  और  concurrent  पुनर्विलोकन  of  मामले  grew ,  utilization  management  spun  out  of  utilization  पुनर्विलोकन   .
जबकि  not  synonymous   ,  health  परवाह   पेशेवर  tend to use the  शर्तें  as interchangeable .
The difference is utilization management is  और   intends   to  manage  स्वास्थ्य   परवाह   मामले   efficiently   और  cost  effectively  before  और  during health  परवाह   प्रशासन  .
Utilization  पुनर्विलोकन  is  अधिक  considering whether  स्वास्थ्य  care  थी   appropriately   लागू  after it  थी   administered  .
There  हैं   चार   मौलिक   तकनीकों  in utilization management:
Demand Management
Utilization Review
Case Management
बीमारी  Management
The Outsiders is a coming-of-age novel by  S.   E.  Hinton  ,  first published in  1967  by Viking  दबायें   .
hinton  was  15   जब   वो  started writing  the  novel , but did  सबसे  of the work  जब   वो  was sixteen and a  जूनियर  in  ऊँची  school .
hinton   थी  18  जब  the book  थी  published .
the  book  फ़ॉलो   दो  rival groups ,  the  Greasers and  the   socs  ( pronounced  by   the  author as , short  लिये  Socials  )  , who are divided by their  socioeconomic  status .
The book  takes   प्लेस  in Tulsa ,  ओक्लाहोमा   ,   in  1965  ,  but  it  is never  stated   in   the   किताब  .
a   फिल्मी   अनुकूलन  was  उत्पादित   in   1983  ,  और  a little-known short-lived  टेलीविज़न  series  appeared  in 1990  ,   picking   up   जहाँ  the  फिल्म   बाएँ  off .
The United States House of  प्रतिनिधि  is one  of   the  two houses of the United States Congress  (   a   bicameral  legislature )  .
It is frequently referred  to  as  the  House  .
The other  हाउस  is  the  Senate .
the  composition  और   शक्तियां  of the  हाउस  are established in  आलेख  One  of   the   संयुक्त  States Constitution .
The major power  of  the House  is  to pass  संघीय   विधान  that affects  the  entire country although  इसके  bills must  भी  be  passed  by  the   सीनेट  and  further   सहमत  to by the  u.S.  President before becoming law  (   जबतक  both  the  House  और   सीनेट  re-pass  the  legislation with a two-thirds majority  in   प्रत्येक   कक्ष  ) .
the  House  रै  several exclusive powers  :  the  शक्ति   to  initiate revenue  बिल्स  ,  to  impeach  officials  ,  और   to   elect  the U.S.  अध्यक्ष  in  मामला   वहीँ  is no majority  in  the  चुनावी   कॉलेज  .
Each  u.S.   राज्य  is  represented  in  the  House  in   proportion  to  इसके  population but is  हकदार  to at  तनिक   एक  representative .
The  सबसे  populous  राज्य   ,   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,  currently has 53  प्रतिनिधि  .
the   कुल  number of voting representatives  is  fixed by  विधि  at  435   .
प्रत्येक  representative  serves   लिये  a two-year  पद  .
the  Speaker of the United States House of Representatives  ,  who presides over the chamber , is elected by  the  members of the House , and is therefore traditionally the leader of the House  लोकतांत्रिक   caucus   or  the House Republican  सम्मेलन   ,   whichever  party has more voting members .
The House meets in the south wing  of   the  United  राज्य   कैपिटल   .
a   सप्लाई  chain is  दरअसल   a   जटिल  and  डायनेमिक   सप्लाई   और   माँग   संजाल  .
(  cf .  wieland/wallenburg   ,  2011 )
A  सप्लाई  chain is a system  of  organizations ,  लोगों  , activities , information  ,  and resources  शामिल   in   चलती  a product or service  इससे   प्रदायक  to customer  .
Supply chain activities transform  प्राकृतिक  resources  ,  raw materials  ,  and  components   into  a finished  उत्पाद  that  is  delivered to  the  end  ग्राहक  .
in  sophisticated supply chain systems  ,   प्रयुक्त   उत्पाद   may   re-enter  the  सप्लाई  chain at  कोई  point where residual  मान  is  recyclable  .
Supply chains link value  जंजीरों  .
`` Purple  haze   ''   is   a   सोंग  written  और  recorded  by   जिमि  Hendrix  in  1967  ,  released  as  the  दूसरी   सिंगल  by  the   जिमि  Hendrix  अनुभव  in both  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom  और  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   .
It later appeared  on  the  अमरीकी  version of the band 's  1967  album Are You Experienced .
`` Purple Haze  ''  has  become  one  of  the ``  archetypical  psychedelic  ड्रग   गीतों   of  the sixties ''  .
``  जामुनी   haze   's  '' guitar virtuosic techniques would  be   emulated  by many metal guitarists  .
a   बंद   up  picture of a rhinoceros skin .
स्किन  is  the  soft outer covering  of  vertebrates .
Other  एनिमल   छतरियाँ  such as  the  arthropod  बहि  have different developmental  उत्पत्ति   ,   ढांचा   और   रासायनिक   संयोजन  .
The adjective cutaneous means  ``  of  the  skin  ''  ( from Latin cutis , skin ) .
In mammals ,  the  skin is the  largest  organ of the integumentary  प्रणाली   बना  up  of   अनेक  layers of  ectodermal  tissue  ,  and guards the  underlying  muscles , bones ,  ligaments  and internal organs .
स्किन  of a  अलग  nature exists in amphibians , reptiles  ,   और   पक्षियों   .
All mammals  have  some hair on their  स्किन  , even  समुद्री   स्तनधारियों  which appear to be hairless .
the  skin  अंतरफलक   साथ  the environment and is the  पहला   लकीर  of  रक्षा   इससे   बाह्य  factors  .
लिये  example , the skin plays a  कुंजी  role in  protecting   the   देह   विरूद्ध   pathogens  and  excessive   जल  loss .
Its  अन्य   कृत्यों   हैं  insulation , temperature regulation  ,   सनसनी  ,  और   the   उत्पादन   of  vitamin D folates  .
Severely  क्षतिग्रस्त  skin  may  heal by forming scar tissue .
This is sometimes discoloured  और  depigmented  .
The  मोटाई  of  स्किन  also varies from location to location on an organism  .
In humans  लिये   उदाहरण  , the  स्किन   स्तिथ   अंतर्गत  the  आँखें  and  around   the   eyelids  is the  thinnest  skin  in  the body at 0.5 mm thick  ,   और   is   एक   of  the first  क्षेत्रों  to show  लक्षण   of   वृद्धावस्था   ऐसे  as ``  crows   फीट  ''  और  wrinkles .
the  skin on the palms and the soles  of  the  फीट  is 4  mm  thick and the thickest  स्किन   in  the body  .
Fur is  घना   बाल   .
primarily  ,  फर  augments the insulation  the  skin  provides  but can  भी  serve as a secondary  यौन  characteristic  or   as  camouflage  .
On  कुछ  animals , the skin is  बहुत  hard and thick , and can  be  processed  to   बनाएँ  leather .
Reptiles and fish have hard protective scales on their skin  लिये   सुरक्षा  ,  और  birds have hard  feathers  , all made of  मुश्किल   β-  keratins  .
Amphibian  स्किन  is  नहीं  a strong barrier  to  passage of chemicals  और  is often  विषय   to  osmosis and diffusive  शक्तियां   .
For  उदाहरण  ,  a   मेंढक  sitting in an  anesthetic  solution would be sedated  जल्दी   ,   as   the  chemical diffuses  through   इसके  skin  .
Thomas Scott
The Rev . Thomas Scott ( 1747-1821 )  थी  an influential preacher  और   लेखक  who is  प्रधानतया  known  लिये   उसके  best-selling work A  commentary  On The  पूरे  Bible and  the  Force of Truth , and as  एक   of   the   संस्थापकों  of  the   गिरिजाघर  Missionary  समाज   .
Daniel Radcliffe  ,   जो  portrays  हैरी  Potter , has  महरूम  the icon  of  the  फिल्मी  series since  the  release of the first film in 2001  .
कुछ  of the most renowned actors of  the  United Kingdom  और  Ireland have voiced or  portrayed   वर्ण  appearing  in  the  हैरी   कुम्हार  film series  आधारित  on  the   किताब  series by J. K. Rowling .
Daniel Radcliffe , Rupert Grint  और  Emma Watson have played Harry  कुम्हार  , Ron  वीज़्ली   और  Hermione Granger in  सब   the   films  .
When they were cast only  radcliffe  had previously acted in a  फिल्मी  .
Complementing them on  स्क्रीन  are such actors as Helena Bonham  कार्टर  , Jim Broadbent , John  cleese  , Robbie  coltrane   ,  Warwick  डेविस   ,   ralph   fiennes  , Michael Gambon , Brendan  gleeson  ,  रिचर्ड  Griffiths , Richard Harris  ,  John Hurt  ,   जेसन  Isaacs ,  miriam   margolyes   ,  Helen McCrory  ,  Gary  oldman  , Alan  rickman   ,  Fiona  शॉ   ,  Maggie Smith ,  टिमोथी  Spall ,  imelda  Staunton  ,  David Thewlis  ,   एम्मा  Thompson , and Julie Walters ,  among   अन्य  .
Thirteen  अभिनेताओं  have appeared as  the  same character in all  आठ   films  of  the   मताधिकार  .
Some well-known British  अभिनेताओं  who have not appeared  in   the   श्रेणी   ,   हैं  asked  in   jest  why they  have  not  महरूम  cast .
When David  येट्स   थी  directing  the   पांचवां  film  ,  Bill  nighy  , who  था  previously  collaborated   साथ  Yates  on  three of  उसके   टेलीविज़न   प्रोजेक्ट  ,  कहा  that he  joked  with Yates  कि   संभवतः  now  he   होता   n't  be the only actor  in   इंग्लैण्ड  who had n't  महरूम  in  हैरी  Potter  .
`` But nobody called  ''  , Nighy  added   .
लकिन  in 2009  ,  Yates cast  nighy  as Minister  of   जादू   rufus  Scrimgeour in Deathly  hallows  .
Nighy  कहा  ,  ``   i   am  no longer the only English  कर्ता   नहीं   to   be   in   हैरी  Potter  और  I  am  very pleased . ''
Jude Law has quipped , `` Nobody 's  पूछा   me  .
I was  a   बिट  too old for Harry '' .
When a  रिपोर्टर   compared  potions  प्राध्यापक  Horace  slughorn  's obsession with famous names to the series  '  connection  to  ``  प्रत्येक  notable  अंग्रेजों   कर्ता  , ''  जिम   broadbent   ,  who plays Slughorn said ,  ``   खूब  , not every actor gets  आमंत्रित  .
I know some who  हैं   स्टिल  waiting  .   ''
With the  एक्सेप्शन   of  Chris Columbus  ,   प्रत्येक  director has  था  a  कैमियो  appearance in  उसके  respective film : Alfonso  cuarón   appears  as a wizard  पकड़कर  a  मोमबत्ती  during a  झाँकी  at The Three Broomsticks  in   कैदी  of Azkaban  ;  Mike  newell   is   सुना  briefly as the radio  प्रस्तुतकर्ता  in  फ़्रैंक   ब्राइस   's  house in  प्याला  of Fire ;  और  David  येट्स   सुविधाएँ  as  a   जादूगर   भीतर  a  जादुई  moving portrait  in   अनुक्रम   of   the  Phoenix  .
निर्माता  David Heyman also makes  a  cameo  रूप  as a wizard  प्रदर्शित   भीतर  a magical  चलती  portrait in the  तीसरा  film ,  कैदी   of   azkaban   .
J.  K.  Rowling gave  a  speech during the  संसार  premiere  of   the  final film  in   the   series—  Harry Potter  और   the   deathly  Hallows  भाग   2  —on 7 July 2011  in  London , England .
She announced  कि   वो   could  never have  dreamt  of the  प्रतिभाशाली   अभिनेताओं  and  अभिनेत्रियों  who have appeared in  सब  the Harry  कुम्हार   फिल्मों   .
रोलिंग  also  घोषित  that there  हैं  seven Harry Potter film series cast  सदस्यों  , who  वो   refers   to  as  ``  The Big Seven ''  ,   वे  are  डेनियल  Radcliffe ,  रुपर्ट  Grint ,  एम्मा   वाटसन   ,   tom  Felton ,  मैथ्यू   लुईस  , Evanna  लिंच   और  Bonnie Wright .

( v  )  indicates the actor  or   अभिनेत्री   lent  only his or  उसके  voice for  उसके  or her  फिल्मी  character
