a  light grey cell (  ऐसे  as the one in the  ``   दान   burbage  '' row  in  the `` Philosopher 's Stone  ''  column  )   indicates  the  अक्षर  was  नहीं   in  the film adaptation  .
A  twelve-step   कार्यक्रम   is  a  नियत  of  guiding   सिद्धान्त  (  स्वीकृत  by members as 'spiritual  सिद्धान्त  , ' based on  the  approved  साहित्य  )  outlining  a  कोर्स  of action  लिये   रिकवरी  from ,  मजबूरी   ,  or other behavioral problems .
originally  proposed  by  Alcoholics  बेनाम   (  AA )  as   a   विधि  of recovery  इससे   alcoholism   ,  the  बारह   कदम   यहूद  first published in the book Alcoholics Anonymous : The Story  of  How More  than  One Hundred  मेन  Have Recovered from Alcoholism in 1939 .
The method was then adapted  और  became the foundation of  अन्य   twelve-step  programs  .
As  summarized  by the American  मनोवैज्ञानिक   संघ  ,  the  process  involves  the  following:
admitting that one can not control  एक  's addiction or compulsion  ;
recognizing  a  higher power that can  दे  strength ;
examining past errors  साथ  the help of  a  sponsor (  अनुभवी  member  )  ;
बनाना   amends   लिये   ये   त्रुटियाँ   ;
learning  to  live a new  जीवन  with a new  कोड  of behavior ;
helping   अन्य  who suffer from  the   वही  addictions or compulsions .
Witness  महाभियोग   ,   in  the law of evidence  of   the  United  राज्य  , is the process  of  calling into  सवाल  the  विश्वसनीयता  of an individual  जो   is   testifying   in   a   विचारण  .
the  Federal  नियम  of Evidence  contain   the  rules governing impeachment  in  federal courts  .
Party  नेताओ  and whips  of   the   संयुक्त  States House  of  Representatives  हैं   निर्वाचित   by  their  संबंधित  parties  in   a  closed-door caucus  by  secret ballot and  हैं  also known  as   मंजिल  leaders  .
the   u.S.  House of Representatives does  नहीं  officially  उपयोग   the   पद  `` Minority Leader '' although  the  media frequently do  .
the   हाउस  instead uses  the  terms  ``  Republican  नेता  '' or ``  लोकतांत्रिक  Leader '' depending on which  पार्टी   holds  a minority of seats  .
the   वर्तमान   हाउस  Majority Leader  is  Republican  eric   cantor  ,  जबकि  the current House  अल्पसंख्यक  Leader  is  Democrat  नैंसी  Pelosi  .
The current House Majority Whip is Republican  केविन  McCarthy , while the current  हाउस  Minority  चाबुक   is   डेमोक्रेट  Steny Hoyer  .
following  the outbreak of  संसार  War I in 1914  ,   the  German  फौज   खोली   the   पश्चिमी   सामने  by first invading Luxembourg  और  Belgium  ,  then  gaining  military  कंट्रोल  of important  औद्योगिक  regions  in   फ़्रांस  .
the  tide of the  अग्रिम  was  dramatically  turned  साथ   the  Battle of the Marne  .
Following the race to the sea , both sides dug in  साथ  a meandering  लकीर  of fortified trenches , stretching  इससे   the  North Sea to  the   स्विस  frontier  साथ  France .
इस  line remained essentially unchanged  लिये  most  of  the war .
Between 1915 and 1917  वहीँ  were several  प्रमुख  offensives  साथ  this front .
the  attacks  employed   विशाल   तोपखाने  bombardments  और  massed infantry  अग्रिम   .
However , a  संयोजन  of entrenchments ,  यंत्र  gun  nests  ,  कंटीले  wire  ,  and artillery repeatedly inflicted severe casualties on the attackers  और  counterattacking defenders  .
as  a  परिणाम   ,  no significant  अग्रिम  were  बना  .
among   the   सबसे  costly of these  offensives  were  the  Battle of Verdun with a combined [ estimated ]  700,000   मुर्दे   ,   the  Battle of  the  Somme  साथ  more than [ an  अनुमानित   ]  million casualties , and the Battle of  passchendaele  with roughly  [  an  अनुमानित   ]  600,000 casualties  .
in   an  effort  to  break  the  deadlock  ,  this front  देखी   the   परिचय   of   नई   सैन्य  technology  ,   सहित  poison gas  ,  aircraft and  टैंक   .
But it  थी  only  बाद   the   अपनाना  of  improved   tactics  that some  उपाधि  of  गतिशीलता  was restored .
The German Spring Offensive of  1918  was made possible  by  the Treaty of  brest-litovsk  that  चिह्नित  the end of the  विरोध   on   the   पूर्वी  Front  .
using  the  recently-introduced  infiltration tactics , the German armies advanced  nearly  to the west  ,  which marked the deepest  अग्रिम  by either  पक्ष  since 1914  और  very nearly  succeeded   in  forcing a breakthrough  .
In spite  of  the  generally  stagnant nature of  इस  front  ,   इस  theater would prove  निर्णायक  .
The  inexorable   अग्रिम  of the Allied armies  दौरान  the  दूसरी  half  of  1918 persuaded  the  German commanders that  शिकस्त   थी  inevitable  ,   और  the government  थी   मजबूर   to  sue for conditions  of  an  armistice   .
the  terms of peace  यहूद   सहमत   upon   साथ  the  हस्ताक्षर  of  the   सन्धि  of  versailles  in 1919 .
The  following  is a  सूची   of  recurring  और  minor characters in the  डिज़्नी   चैनल   असली   श्रेणी  The Suite Life of Zack & Cody .
ये   वर्ण   यहूद  regularly rotated , often disappearing for long  अवधि  during  the  series .
The following  सूची   of  characters has  महरूम   sorted  alphabetically , by first name .
Some of the characters had  no   पिछला  name and  सबसे  were commonly referred to by  उनके  first  नाम   so  this appeared  to  be the  सबसे  logical  विधि   .
in   the  case of  शेफ़  Paolo , who had no known  पहला   नाम  , they  have  been listed by title .
The First  महिला  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ( FLOTUS )  is  the hostess  of   the  White  हाउस   .
क्युकी   इस  position  is  traditionally filled  by   the   बीवी   of  the  अध्यक्ष   of   the  United States  ,  the  शीर्षक  is  सबसे   प्रायः  applied  to  the wife of a  बैठे   अध्यक्ष  .
the  current  पहला   महिला  is Michelle Obama  .
बाद  her husband Barack Obama  थी  re-elected  on   नवम्बर  6  ,   2012   ,   वो  is  अनुसूचित  to  serve   जबतक   जनवरी   20   ,  2017 .
Septic shock is a  चिकित्सा  condition  as  a result of severe infection  और  sepsis , though  the   microbe  may  be  systemic  or   स्थानीयकृत  to a particular  साईट  .
it   can  cause multiple organ dysfunction syndrome (  formerly  known as  अनेक   अंग  failure  )  and death .
Its most common victims are  children  ,  immunocompromised  individuals  ,   और   the  elderly  ,   as  their  प्रतिरक्षा   प्रणालियों  can not deal with the infection  as   effectively  as those of healthy adults .
Frequently , patients  कष्ट   इससे  septic shock are  cared  for in intensive  परवाह  units  .
The mortality rate  इससे  septic shock  is  approximately  25–50   %   .
केविन  Brereton  (   born   फ़रवरी  20  ,   1972   )   ,  better known by  उसके  stage  नाम   k-os  ( ;  ``   अराजकता   ''  )  ,   is  a Canadian rapper ,  सिंगर   ,   songwriter   और  record producer  .
उसके   दिए  name may also be cited  as  Kheaven , a spelling he  बाद   अपनाया   .
the  alias  ``  k-os  ''   ,   spelled  with  a   निम्नतर   मामला   ``  k '' , was intended  to  be  कम  aggressive than the pseudonyms  of  other  rappers  whose  names  were  सब  upper case , such as  krs-one  .
It is an  एक्रोनिम   लिये  ``  ज्ञान   of   स्वः  , ''  हालांकि   in  a later  इंटरव्यू   he  said  कि  it originally stood  लिये  ``  केविन  's Original Sound  .   ''  k-os  '   म्यूज़िक  incorporates a  चौड़ी  variety  of   म्यूज़िक  genres  ,   सहित  rap , funk , rock  ,   और  reggae .
the   गीत  frequently focus on promoting a `` positive message  ''   जबकि  at times  expressing  criticism  of   मुख्यधारा  hip hop  संस्कृति   's  obsession  साथ   धन  ,  कीर्ति  and glorification of  हिंसा  .
A musician as  खूब  as a  निर्माता  , k-os has  लिखा  and  उत्पादित  nearly  प्रत्येक   भाग   of  all  चार  of his  एल्बम   .
k-os usually performs with  a  live band  ,   कुछ  that is uncommon in  the   हिप   हॉप  genre .
he  sometimes plays  गिटार   और  keyboard  दोनो  during  सजीव  performances and  in   the  studio  .
k-os  received his first  musical  exposure  साथ   the  single  ``   musical   essence  '' , released  in   1993   .
After  the  release  of  his  दूसरी   सिंगल  `` Rise Like  the  Sun  ''  in  1996  , he  withdrew   इससे   the  industry because he  थी   असंतुष्ट   साथ  his musical  स्टाइल   .
He reappeared  briefly  in 1999  और  released his debut album  निकास  in 2002  .
The  एल्बम  received positive  समीक्षाएँ   लकिन   बेची  relatively  few  copies .
he  released his  दूसरी  album  आनन्द  Rebellion  in  2004 , which received platinum status in Canada  .
A  तीसरा   एल्बम   ,  ,  थी   released  in  2006  and also went platinum  .
उसके   चौथी  album , Yes  !
,  was released  in   2009  .
His fifth album BLack on  सुनहरे  was  released   in   2013   .
the  official 2007  संस्करण  of the  ucc  .
Even the  गोपनीय  rough drafts  of  the UCC were saved and published as a  10-volume  set .
The  वर्दी  Commercial  कोड  (  ucc  or the Code  )  ,  पहला   प्रकाशित  in 1952 , is one of  a   क्रमांक  of  वर्दी  acts  कि  have been  promulgated  in  संयोजन   साथ   प्रयत्न   to   harmonize   the   विधि  of sales and other  वाणिज्यिक  transactions in  सब  50  राज्य  within the United States of America  .
multi-pitch   चढ़ाई   is  the ascent of climbing routes with one  or   अधिक  stops at a  belay  station .
प्रत्येक  section of  वास्तविक  climbing  between  stops at  the  belay  स्टेशन   is  called a  पिच  .
The leader ascends the pitch ,  रखकर   गियर  and stopping to  लंगर   themselves  to the  belay  station .
The  कारण   लिये   the   stops   can  be determined by choice  ,   सम्मेलन   or   necessity  .
For  example:
the   रस्सी  is too short to  do  the  संपूर्ण  route in  एक  pitch  (   necessity   )   .
The leader  रै  run  आउट  of protective gear ( necessity )  .
There is  a   सुविधाजनक   protectable  ledge  ,   or   फिक्स्ड  bolts placed  by   पिछला  climbers ,  at  the  स्थान   लिये   a  belay  स्टेशन   (  convention  )  .
the  leader  chooses   to  rest or exchange  लीड  before the next  खण्ड  of the  चढ़ाई  ( choice  )  .
the  general purpose of these stops is to allow the second to  ascend  to the point  of   the  lead climber while collecting  the   सुरक्षात्मक  gear from the route in the course of the  सीसे  climber 's  ascent  .
At  the   belay   स्टेशन   ,  the protective gear  is   एकत्रित  , possibly  exchanged  to  a  new leader ,  और   the  leader of  the   अगला  pitch  ascends  the  रूट  .
A diagram showing an  i  Formation  on   ठोकर  and  a  4-3  गठन   on   रक्षा
in  American football , each team  रै  eleven  खिलाड़ी  on the  फ़ील्ड  at  एक   समय  .
the   विशिष्ट  role  कि  a player takes  on  the field  is   पुकारा  their  स्थिति   .
अंतर्गत  the  आधुनिक   नियम   of  American football  ,   टीमों   हैं   अनुमत  unlimited subsititutions  ,   कि   is  teams may change any number of  खिलाड़ी  after any play .
इस  has resulted in the  विकास  of  तीन   ``  platoons  ''  of  खिलाड़ी  ,  the  offense ( the  टोली   साथ  the ball  ,   जो  is trying to  स्कोर   )   ,  the  रक्षा  ( the team  trying   to  prevent  the   अन्य  team from  स्कोरिंग  , and to  लो   the   बॉल   इससे   उन्हें   )  ,  और  the special  टीमों  ( who  खेल   in  kicking situations ) .
भीतर  those platoons  ,   विभिन्न   विशिष्ट   स्थितियाँ   मौजूद  depending  on   कया  the player  's  main job  is  .
The  नियंत्रित  Substances Act  (  CSA ) was enacted into law by  the  Congress of the  संयुक्त  States as Title II  of  the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act  of   1970  .
the  CSA is  the  federal  u.S.  drug policy  अंतर्गत  which  the   manufacture  , importation  ,   कब्ज़ा   ,  use and  वितरण  of certain substances is regulated .
The  अधिनियम  also served as  the   नेशनल  implementing legislation  लिये  the Single Convention  on  Narcotic Drugs .
the  legislation created five Schedules  (  classifications ) ,  साथ  varying  योग्यता   लिये  a substance to  be  included in each  .
दो   संघीय  agencies ,  the  Drug Enforcement  प्रशासन   और   the  Food and  ड्रग   प्रशासन   ,   determine   जिससे  substances are added  to  or  removed  from the various schedules , though the statute  passed   by   कॉंग्रेस  created  the   आरंभिक  listing , and  कॉंग्रेस   रै  sometimes scheduled  अन्य  substances through  विधान  such  as  the Hillory J. Farias  और  Samantha Reid Date-Rape  रोकथाम  Act  of   2000  ,  जिससे   लगाई   गामा  hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I  .  Classification  निर्णय  are required to be  बना  on criteria including potential  लिये   गाली   (  an undefined  पद   )  ,  फिलहाल   स्वीकृत  medical  उपयोग   in  treatment in the United States  ,   और   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   treaties  .
the  Wayne Route  23   पारगमन   बीच   is  a New  जर्सी  Transit  park-and-ride  station  in  Wayne  ,   नई  Jersey  साथ   the   montclair-boonton   लकीर   कि   provides   बस  service to  नई  York City and various other points in the area  as  well as Montclair-Boonton Line train service to New  यॉर्क  , Hoboken ,  और   इंटरमीडिएट   अंक   साथ  the  लकीर   between   hackettstown   और  Montclair  राज्य  University  .
It is located  बंद   of  the southbound  गलियों  of New  जर्सी   रूट   23  on West  बेल्ट  Road , near the interchange  जहाँ   रूट  23 , Interstate 80 ,  और  U.S. Route 46 meet ,  आरपार   इससे   the   willowbrook  Mall  .
The  स्टेशन  opened in  जनवरी   2008  and has 1,000 parking spaces .
New Jersey Transit  intends  for this combined rail  और  bus  स्टेशन  to  become  an `` interceptor  स्टेशन   ,   ''  that  होगा   सहायता  relieve the habitual  जमघट   at   the  West Belt Road  इंटरचेंज  , where the three  प्रमुख   राजमार्गों  meet .
In  जोड  ,  the  construction of the station  थी  meant to  भी  ease  the   जमघट  at  कया   थी  then Route 23  पार्क   &  Ride , a bus  डिपो  on  रूट  23 North  कि  has since been renamed Mother 's Park  &  Ride  ,  and  the  Willowbrook Mall Park & Ride ;  the  now-Mother  's  site had limited  पार्किंग  while NJT was having trouble with  overfull   पार्किंग   क्षेत्रों  at  willowbrook   .
The  वेन   township  bus garage  is  located  on   the   विपरीत  side  of   रूट  23 .
There has been a proposal to  निर्माण   a  parking  डेक   साथ  another  हजार  spots  और   develop  the  जमीन  at the station .
In addition  to  Montclair-Boonton trains  ,  the Transit Center is served by the  following  New Jersey Transit  बस  lines:
75  to  न्यूर्क  Penn Station and Butler
194  to  Port Authority Bus  टर्मिनल  and Butler/Newfoundland
198 to  बंदरगाहों   प्राधिकार  Bus Terminal  और   विलियम  Paterson  विश्वविद्यालयों
324   to   बंदरगाहों   प्राधिकार   और   वेन  Route  23
748   to   willowbrook  Mall  और  Paterson
The at sign @  is  also  commonly   पुकारा  the  at  symbol , ampersat , apetail or  वाणिज्यिक  at  in  English—and less commonly a wide  दायरा   of  other terms .
The fact that there is no  सिंगल   शब्द  in English  लिये  the symbol  रै   prompted   कुछ  writers to use the French  arobase  or Spanish and  पुर्तगाली  arroba—or to coin  नई   शब्द  such  as  asperand , ampersat—but none  of  these has  हासिल  wide currency .
Originally  an   हिसाब   और   वाणिज्यिक  invoice  संक्षिप्त   अर्थ   ``   at   the  rate  of  '' ( e.g . 7  विजेट   @   $   2  =  $   14  ) ,  it   थी   नहीं   शामिल   on  the  कुंजीपटल   of  the earliest  commercially  successful typewriters , but  थी  on  at  least one  1889  model  और  the  बहुत  successful  underwood   मॉडल   इससे  the `` Underwood  no   .  5 '' in 1900  onward   .
it   is  now universally included on computer  keyboards  .
In recent years ,  इसके   अर्थ   रै  grown to include the sense  of  being `` located at , '' `` and ,  ''  or ``  निर्देशित   at  '' ,  विशेषकर  in email  पता   और  social media ,  विशेषकर   ट्विटर   .
the   चिह्नित   is   एनकोडेड   at  .
The Catcher  in   the   rye  is a 1951 novel  by  J.  D.  Salinger .
Originally  प्रकाशित  for adults  ,  it  रै   चूंकि  become popular with  adolescent   पाठक   लिये   इसके  themes  of  teenage  angst  and alienation .
It  रै  been translated into almost all of  the   संसार  's  प्रमुख  languages .
around  250,000  नक़ल  are  बेची   प्रत्येक  year with total  बिक्री  of  अधिक   than   65  million  किताबे  .
The  अनोखा  's protagonist and antihero , Holden  caulfield  , has become an icon  लिये  teenage rebellion .
The novel  थी  included  on   टाइम्स   2005   सूची   of  the  100   बेहतरीन  English-language novels written since  1923  ,  और  it was named by Modern Library and its  पाठक  as one of the  100  best  english-language  novels of  the  20th  सदी  .
It  रै   महरूम  frequently  challenged  in the United  राज्य   और  other countries for  इसके  liberal use of profanity  और  portrayal  of  sexuality .
It also deals  साथ   जटिल   मुद्दे  of identity , belonging , connection  ,   और  alienation  .
skeletal  muscles  होमो  sapiens
इस  is a  तालिका  of muscles  of   the  human anatomy  .
वहीँ  are approximately  642  skeletal muscles within  the  typical  इंसान   ,   और   लगभग  every muscle  constitutes  one  भाग  of a pair  of   एकसमान  bilateral muscles , found  on   दोनो  sides  ,  resulting in  लगभग  320 pairs of muscles , as presented in this article .
Nevertheless ,  the   सटीक  number is  मुश्किल  to define because  अलग  sources group  मांसपेशियां  differently  ,  e.g .  regarding  what  is   पारिभाषित   as  different  भाग   of   a  single  मांसपेशी  or  as  several muscles .
Examples  दायरा  from  640  to 850 .
The muscles of  the  human  देह  can be categorized  into  a number  of  groups  जिससे   शामिल  muscles relating to  the  head and neck , muscles  of  the  धड़   or   ट्रंक   ,  muscles  of   the  upper limbs  ,   और  muscles  of   the   निम्नतर  limbs  .
The action  refers  to the action of  प्रत्येक  muscle  इससे   the  standard anatomical position .
in  other positions ,  अन्य  actions may be performed  .
ख़राब   लड़कियों  Club  (   bgc   )  is  an  American reality television  श्रेणी   निर्मित  by Jonathan Murray  लिये   the  Oxygen  टेलीविज़न  station  .
the  show centers on  सात  feisty  और  mischievous  महिलाओं   साथ   अलग   पृष्ठभूमि  and personalities ,  जो  have a  क्रमांक  of psychological and  behavioral   समस्याएं  .
They are introduced  to   the  show off their  घातक  behavior and  accomplish  specific goals .
The  डाल  , deemed `` bad girls '' ,  आनंद   a  luxurious lifestyle  in   a  fine mansion for  तीन  months , during which they must obey  निर्दिष्ट   नियम  .
उनके   जीवनदान   अंदर  –  और  outside – of the  हाउस   हैं  chronicled  और  recorded  by  the production  टोली  .
the  Bad  लड़कियों   क्लबों   is  broadcast in five  देशों  ( United States ,  नीदरलैंड्स  ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   ,  Hungary  ,   और  Sweden )  .
It  रै  received  ऋणात्मक   समीक्षाएँ   इससे   आलोचकों  ,  जो  believe the  दिखाएँ  promotes  हिंसा  by  adolescent   दर्शक   .
Furthermore , several cast  सदस्यों  made controversial  remarks  which outraged  अनेक   दर्शक   .
the  format of  the  show has changed  इससे  early seasons .
if   a  ``  ख़राब  girl ''  ब्रेक  a rule , she is evicted  इससे  the show and , if  it  is early in  the   ऋतु  , replaced  by  a  नई   ``  bad  लड़की  ''  .
There have been nine complete  सीज़न  of  the  Bad Girls Club , with  the   दसवाँ   ऋतु  currently airing .
the   चौथी  season  था  the highest ratings  in  the  दिखाएँ  's history , becoming  इसके  ``  भेदन   ऋतु  '' .
वहीँ   have  been three spin-offs of The Bad Girls Club  .
एक  of them ,  प्रेम  Games  :  Bad  लड़कियों  Need  प्रेम  Too , where  पास्ट  cast members seek true  प्रेम  , has  gained  high  दरजा   .
ऑक्सीजन  has  भी   released  a  मोबाईल   खेल   ,   कॉमिक   स्ट्रिप   और   merchandise   to   प्रचार  the  दिखाएँ  .
Of the 92  प्रतियोगी  , Kerry Harvick ( of season one )  थी  a  कामयाब  country singer before the  दिखाएँ   .
Tanisha Thomas (  of  season two )  बाद  hosted  ऑक्सीजन   's  OxygenLive !
और   the  subsequent seasons  of   प्रेम   खेल  :  ख़राब  Girls Need Love Too .
थामस   ,   जो  has been dubbed  the  `` godmother '' to all  प्रतियोगी   ,  has her own television documentary  हकदार  Tanisha Gets Married .
As of Season  8   वो  's  महरूम  the host of  the  reunion specials  .
the  Iowa Senate is  the   अपर   हाउस  of  the   आयोवा   सामान्य  Assembly .
There are 50  सीटे   in  the Iowa Senate  ,  representing 50  single-member  districts across  the   राज्य  with populations of approximately 60,927 per  constituency   ,   .
Each  सीनेट   ज़िला  is  रचित   of  two House  जिले   .
The  सीनेट  meets  at   the   आयोवा   राज्य  Capitol  in  Des Moines .
Unlike the  निम्नतर  house , the Iowa  हाउस   of  Representatives  ,  Senators serve  four-year  terms  ,  with  हाफ  of the Senate  लड़खड़ाते  for  re-election   प्रत्येक   दो  years .
वहीँ  are  no   पद   हद  for the Senate  .
Mechanical  मरम्मत
Maintenance  ,  repair  ,   और   परिचालन  (  mro   )  or maintenance , repair  ,  and overhaul involves fixing any sort of mechanical  ,  plumbing  or   विद्युत   यंत्र  should  it  become out of order or broken ( known as  मरम्मत  ,  unscheduled   or   casualty   मेंटेनेंस  )  .
it   भी  includes performing  दिनचर्या  actions  जिससे   रखना   the   यंत्र  in  working  order  (  known as scheduled  मेंटेनेंस   )   or   prevent   ट्रबल  from  arising   (   निवारक   मेंटेनेंस   )  .
mro  may be defined as  ,  ``  सब  actions  जिससे  have the objective  of   retaining   or   restoring  an  मद   in   or   to  a state in which it  can  perform its  जरूरी   फलन   .
the  actions include  the  combination of all technical  और  corresponding administrative , managerial  ,   और  supervision actions . ''
mro   परिचालन  can be categorised  by   whether   the   उत्पाद  remains the  प्रॉपर्टी  of the customer , i.e .  a   सेवा  is being offered ,  or   whether  the product is  खरीदा  by  the  reprocessing  संगठन   और  sold to any  ग्राहक   wishing  to  मेक  the purchase (  guadette   ,  2002 ) .
in  the  पूर्व   मामला  it may  be  a  backshop  operation  भीतर   a  larger organisation or smaller operation  .
the   पूर्व  of these represents a  बंद  loop supply chain and usually  रै  the  पैमाना  of maintenance  ,   मरम्मत  or of the  उत्पाद  .
the  latter of  the   categorisations   is  an open loop  सप्लाई   कड़ी   और   is   typified   by   refurbishment   और  remanufacture  .
The main characteristic  of  the closed loop system is that  the   माँग   लिये   a  product is matched with  the   सप्लाई   of  a  प्रयुक्त  product .
Neglecting  एसेट  write-offs and  असाधारण   क्रियाएँ   the  total  जनसांख्यिकी  of the  उत्पाद   between  the customer  और  the  सेवा   प्रदाता  remains constant  .
प्रिंस   विलियम  ,  ड्यूक  of  कैम्ब्रिज   (  William  आर्थर   फिलिप  Louis ;  born  21  जून  1982 ) , is  the  elder  बेटे   of  Charles ,  प्रिंस   of   वेल्स   ,  and  डायना   ,   राजकुमारी  of Wales , and third-eldest grandchild of  महारानी  Elizabeth  ii   और   प्रिंस  Philip , Duke of Edinburgh .
He is  दूसरी  in  the   लकीर  of  उत्तराधिकार   ,   पीछे   उसके   पिता  ,  to  the thrones of  सोलह  independent sovereign  राज्य  known  as  the Commonwealth realms  :  the  संयुक्त   किंगडम  ,  कनाडा   ,  Australia ,  नई  Zealand ,  जमैका   ,  Barbados , The Bahamas  ,  Grenada , Papua New Guinea  ,  the  सुलेमान  Islands  ,   तुवालू  ,  संत  Lucia , Saint Vincent and  the  Grenadines , Belize ,  अण्टीगुआ  and  बारबूडा  ,  और   संत   किट्स  and  नेविस   .
Prince William was  शिक्षित   at  four schools in the  संयुक्त  Kingdom and  प्राप्त  a degree from  the   विश्वविद्यालयों   of   st  Andrews .
He spent parts  of  a  गैप   साल  in Chile , Belize , Tanzania , and Kenya where he has  जिया   और  holidayed  अनेक   टाइम्स  .
प्रिंस  William has also taken Kiswahili studies at  विश्वविद्यालयों   in  Kenya  और   तंजानिया  .
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in  the   ब्लूज़  and Royals Regiment of the  household  Cavalry —serving with his brother Prince  हैरी   —and  ,  दो   सालो  later , earned his  विंग्स  by completing  पायलट  training  at  Royal Air Force College  cranwell  .
In 2009  ,   he  transferred to  the   royal   एयर   फ़ोर्स  , was promoted  to  Flight Lieutenant  और  underwent helicopter  उड़ती   प्रशिक्षण   in   अनुक्रम   to   become   a  full-time pilot with the Search and Rescue  फ़ोर्स  .
In  2010  ,  he  completed his  सामान्य   और  special-to-type  हेलीकाप्टर  training and  गई   on  to RAF  घाटी  on  no   .  22  स्क्वाड्रन  performing co-pilot  कर्तव्य   on   फलक   a   समुद्र  King  ढूंढें  and rescue helicopter .
Prince William  शादीशुदा  his longtime  गर्लफ्रेंड   ,  Catherine Middleton , on  29  April 2011 at  वेस्टमिंस्टर  Abbey .
Hours  prior   to   उसके   विवाह   ,   प्रिंस  William  थी   निर्मित  Duke of Cambridge , Earl  of  Strathearn ,  और  Baron  carrickfergus   .
DeAndre  cortez  Way ( born July  28  , 1990  )  , better  ज्ञात  by  उसके  stage name Soulja Boy Tell 'Em , or simply  soulja  Boy  ,  is an American rapper  ,   रिकार्ड   निर्माता  ,  कर्ता  , and entrepreneur .
In September 2007 ,  उसके  single `` Crank That ( Soulja Boy )  ``  reached  क्रमांक   एक   on  the Billboard  hot   100  .
The single was initially self-published on the internet  ,   और   it  later  became  a number-one hit  in  the  संयुक्त  States for  सात  non-consecutive weeks  starting  in September 2007  .
On August  17   रास्ता  was  सूचीबद्ध   at   #  18  on   the   फोर्ब्स   सूची   of   hip-hop  Cash Kings of 2010  कमाई   $   7  million for  कि   साल   .
रास्ता   रै  currently released  तीन   स्टुडियो   एल्बम  and  एक  independent album :  उसके  debut studio album Souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 )  थी   certified  platinum  by  the  riaa   .
However ,  उसके  next two  एल्बम   ,  iSouljaBoyTellem (  2008   )  and The DeAndre Way (  2010   )   किया  not  मैच  the commercial success of his  डेब्यू   ,  the latter only  selling   100,000   नक़ल  , despite the success of several singles across  दोनो   एल्बम  ,  ऐसे  as `` Kiss  me   thru   the   फोन  `` and  ``  Turn My  swag   on  `` ( iSouljaBoyTellem )  और  ``  pretty  Boy Swag `` ( The DeAndre Way ) .
इस  was mainly due  to   negotiation   समस्याएं   साथ  Interscope  रिकॉर्ड   जिससे  meant a limited amount  of  records were made available  to   the  public  .
As of 2011 , Way has  पुष्टि  he  is   working  on  उसके   चौथी   स्टुडियो  album  ,  entitled  यूएसए  DRE , which will  be  released in  2013  .
The electron transport chain  in  the mitochondrion  is  the  साईट  of oxidative phosphorylation  in   eukaryotes   .
The  nadh   और   succinate  generated in  the  citric acid cycle  हैं   oxidized  , providing energy  to   शक्ति   एटीपी   synthase   .
photosynthetic   इलेक्ट्रॉन   हस्तांतरण  chain of the thylakoid  झिल्ली  .
An  इलेक्ट्रॉन   हस्तांतरण  chain  (   इत्यादि  ) couples electron  ट्रांसफ़र   between   an   इलेक्ट्रॉन   दाता  ( such as  nadh  )  और  an  इलेक्ट्रॉन   acceptor  ( such as  o2  ) with the  ट्रांसफ़र   of  H+  ions  (  protons  )  आरपार   a  membrane  .
The resulting  electrochemical  proton gradient is  प्रयुक्त   to  generate chemical energy  in   the  form of  एडीनोसिन   ट्राइफॉस्फेट  (  एटीपी  ) .
इलेक्ट्रॉन  transport  जंजीरों  are the cellular  mechanisms  used for extracting energy from  धूप   in  photosynthesis and  भी  from  रेडॉक्स   प्रतिक्रियाएँ  ,  ऐसे  as  the  oxidation  of  sugars (  श्वसन   )  .
in  chloroplasts  ,  light  ड्राइव  the conversion of water to oxygen  और   nadP+  to NADPH with  ट्रांसफ़र  of  H+   ions  across chloroplast membranes .
In  mitochondria   ,  it is the  परिवर्तन   of   ऑक्सीजन   to  water ,  nadh  to  naD+  and  succinate   to   fumarate  that are  जरूरी  to generate the  प्रोटॉन   अनुपात   .
Electron  हस्तांतरण  chains are  प्रमुख   साइट  of premature electron leakage  to  oxygen , generating  superoxide  and  potentially  resulting  in  increased  oxidative  stress .
tramadol  hydrochloride  (  trademarked  as  Conzip  ,   ryzolt  , Ultracet ,  ultram  in the USA ,  ralivia  , Zytram  xl  Durella { CR-100/200 mg } in Canada or  adolonta   in  Spain ) is a centrally acting  सिंथेटिक  analgesic used to treat  मॉडरेट  to moderately  कठोर   पीड़ा   .
the  drug  रै  a wide  दायरा   of  applications , including treatment of  आमवातीय   गठिया   ,  restless legs syndrome ,  मोटर  neurone disease and  लुपस  .
it   थी  launched and marketed as Tramal by the German pharmaceutical company  grünenthal  GmbH in 1977 .
tramadol  is a weak μ-opioid receptor agonist that also induces serotonin  रिलीज  and  inhibits   the   reuptake   of   norepinephrine  .
Tramadol  is  metabolized  to   o-desmethyltramadol   ,   a  significantly more potent  μ-opioid   agonist   .
tramadol   और   इसके  major metabolite  (  s ) are  विशिष्ट   इससे  other  अधिक  potent  opioid  agonists by relative selectivity for μ-opioid  receptors  .
बर्नार्ड   लॉरेंस   ``   बर्नी  '' Madoff ( ;  born  April 29 , 1938 ) is  an   अमरीकी   पूर्व  stockbroker ,  निवेश   सलाहकार  , financier , and  श्वेत   कॉलर  criminal  .
He  is  the former non-executive Chairman  of  the  नैस्डैक  stock  मार्केट  , and the  admitted   ऑपरेटर  of  a   पेन्शन  scheme that is  माना  to  be  the  largest  financial fraud in U.S.  इतिहास  .
madoff   संस्थापित  the Wall Street firm Bernard L.  madoff  Investment Securities  llc  in  1960  , and was its chairman  जबतक  his arrest on December 11 , 2008  .
The firm was  एक  of  the  top  मार्केट   मेकर   व्यवसायों  on Wall Street , which bypassed  ``  specialist ''  firms  by directly  निष्पादित  orders over the counter from  खुदरा   brokers   .
He employed at  the   कड़  his brother Peter  as   वरिष्ठ  Managing Director  और  Chief Compliance  अधिकारी  ;  पीटर  has since been  sentenced   to   10   सालो  in prison .
Peter  's  daughter Shana Madoff as the  कड़   's  rules and compliance officer  और   attorney  ,  और   उसके   बेटे  Andrew and Mark ( Mark  वचनबद्ध   आत्महत्या   by  hanging  exactly   दो   सालो  after  उसके   पिता  's  गिरफ़्तार  ) .
On  दिसम्बर  10  ,  2008 , Madoff 's  बेटे   बताई   अधिकारियों   कि  their father  था  confessed  to  them that the  एसेट  management unit of  उसके   कड़   थी   a  massive Ponzi  योजना  , and  कोटेड  him as  describing   it   as  `` one  बिग   झूठ   .  ''
the   following  day  ,  FBI agents arrested Madoff and charged  उसे   साथ  one count  of   प्रतिभूति   धोखाधड़ी  .
the  U.S. Securities  और   एक्सचेंज  Commission ( SEC )  था  previously conducted  investigations  into Madoff  's  business  practices  , but  किया   नहीं   ख़ोज   the  massive  धोखाधड़ी   .
in   कूच   2009  ,  madoff   pleaded  guilty to 11  संघीय  felonies and admitted to  turning  his  माल   प्रबन्धन  business into  a   विशाल  Ponzi scheme  कि  defrauded  हज़ारों  of investors  of  billions of dollars .
Madoff said  he   began  the  पेन्शन  scheme  in  the early 1990s  .
however   ,  federal  जांचकर्ताओं  believe the fraud  began   as  early as  the  1970s  ,  and those charged  साथ  recovering the missing money believe the  निवेश   आपरेशन  may never  have  been legitimate  .
the  amount  लापता   इससे  client  खाते   ,  including  fabricated   gains  , was  लगभग  $ 65  अरब   .
The court-appointed trustee estimated actual  नुकसान  to  निवेशकों   of   $  18 billion .
On June 29 , 2009  ,  he  थी   sentenced   to  150 years  in  prison ,  the  maximum allowed .
Administrative Professionals Day ( also  ज्ञात  as  secretaries  Day or  एडमिन   दिन  )  is   an  unofficial secular  अवकाश  observed in  अनेक   देशों  to  recognize  the work  of  secretaries , administrative assistants , receptionists , and  अन्य  administrative  support  professionals  .
In  उत्तर   अमेरिका   ,   it   is  celebrated  on  the Wednesday of  the  last full week  of   अप्रैल  (  अप्रैल  24 in  2013  ) .
In  फ़्रांस   it  is  मनाये   on  the third  गुरुवार   in  April ( April  18  in  2013  ) .
In  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   it  is celebrated  on  the first  शुक्रवार  in May
A quasi-judicial  देह  is  an  entity such  as  an  arbitrator   or   ट्रिब्यूनल   फलक  , generally  of  a public  प्रशासनिक  agency  ,   जिससे   रै   शक्तियां   और  procedures resembling  those  of a  अदालत   of   विधि  or  न्यायधीश   ,  and  जिससे   is  obligated to objectively determine  तथ्य  and  चित्रण  conclusions from  उन्हें  so  as  to provide the basis of  an   आधिकारिक  action .
Such  क्रियाएँ   हैं  able  to   उपाय  a  हालात  or impose legal  दंड  , and may affect the  विधिक  rights ,  कर्तव्य   or   privileges  of specific  पार्टियों   .
Monument of  tycho  Brahe and Johannes Kepler  in   प्राग
Tycho Brahe  (  14 December 154624  अक्तूबर  1601  )   ,  born Tyge Ottesen Brahe , was a  डैनिश  nobleman  ज्ञात   लिये  his accurate and comprehensive astronomical and planetary observations .
He was  born   in  Scania , then part of Denmark , now  भाग  of  modern-day   स्वीडन  .
tycho  was well known  in   उसके  lifetime  as  an astronomer  और  alchemist  .
In his De nova stella  (  On the new  स्टार  ) of  1573   ,  he  refuted  the Aristotelian belief in  an  unchanging celestial realm .
His  precise  measurements indicated that `` new  सितारों  , '' (  stellae  novae ,  अभी  known  as  supernovae ) in particular  कि  of  1572   ,  lacked  the  parallax expected  in   sub-lunar   phenomena   ,  and were therefore not `` atmospheric '' tailless  धूमकेतुओं  as  previously   believed   ,  but  यहूद  above the atmosphere  और  moon .
using   समान   माप  he  दिखाया  that comets were also not atmospheric phenomena ,  as   previously  thought  ,   और  must pass  through   the  supposedly ``  अपरिवर्तनीय   ''  celestial spheres .
As an astronomer  ,  Tycho  worked  to combine what he  देखी  as  the  geometrical benefits  of  the Copernican  प्रणाली  with the  philosophical  benefits  of  the Ptolemaic system into  उसके  own model  of  the  ब्रह्मांड   ,   the   tychonic  system .
Furthermore , he was  the   पिछला  of the major  नग्न  eye astronomers  ,  working without telescopes for his observations .
tycho  Brahe  थी  granted an  एस्टेट  on the island of  hven  and the funding  to   निर्माण   the  Uraniborg , an early research institute  ,  where he built large  खगोलीय   यंत्र   और  took many  careful   माप  , and later Stjerneborg , underground , when  he   खोजा  that  उसके  instruments in the former  यहूद   नहीं  sufficiently steady  .
On the island (  on   जिससे   he   demonstrated   निरंकुश   अक्षर   और   बर्ताव   toward   the   निवासियों   )  he founded manufactories such as  paper-making   to  provide  सामग्री   लिये  printing  उसके   परिणाम  .
बाद  disagreements with the  नई  Danish king  ईसाई  IV  in  1597  ,  he was invited  by  the  bohemian   किंग   और  Holy Roman emperor Rudolph  ii   to  Prague , where  he  became  the   आधिकारिक   इम्पीरियल  astronomer  .
He  निर्मित  the new  वेधशाला  at Benátky  nad  Jizerou  .
Here  ,  from 1600  जबतक  his death in  1601  ,  he  was  assisted   by  Johannes  कॅप्लर  who  बाद   प्रयुक्त  Tycho 's  खगोलीय  data to develop  कॅप्लर  's laws of  ग्रहीय   गति   .
Guro  ज़िला  (  guro-gu   )  is  a  district of  सियोल   ,   दक्षिण  Korea  ,  which was separated from  yeongdeungpo  District  on  April 1 ,  1980   .
Located  in  the  southwestern  part of the city  ,  where  besides   yangcheon  District and  geumcheon  District  guro   ज़िला  has an  महत्वपूर्ण   स्थिति   as  a transport  कड़ी   जिससे  contains railroads , land  रूट  from  the  rest  of  Seoul  to  the south of  the  country .
The Gyeongbu and Gyeongin  रेल  lines  कनेक्ट   सियोल   to   बुसान   और   इंचियोन  .
In addition  ,  Seoul  महानगर  Subway lines  1   ,  2  ,   और  7  ,  and major  राजमार्गों  intersect in  guro   ज़िला  .
the  name Guro originates from the legend  कि   नौ   (  )  बूढ़ा   मेन   (  Korean  :  ro ) enjoyed  आयु   in   the   ज़िला   .
A  डिजिटल  industrial complex is  स्तिथ  in Guro  ज़िला  .
the  Guro Digital Industrial  जटिल   ,   जिससे  played  a  leading industrial  भूमिका  mainly with textile manufacturing , dressmaking and other  labour-intensive   उद्योग  in  1967   ,   रै  been  rapidly   बदला  into an  it  industrial complex .
This complex played a  pivotal  role  in   the  economic  विकास  of the  दक्षिण  Korea 's development  era  ,  referred  to  as  the  ``   चमत्कार   on   the  Han  नदी  ``  ,   और  also contributed  10  percent of national export in  the  1970s .
Twenty-one percent of the total area  of  Guro District  is  a restricted zone to  be  used  as  a greenbelt  साथ  the only  arboretum   in   सियोल  .
the   मण्डल   is  changing into  a  lively  ज़िला   as  large  labour-intensive  factories  हैं  moving  इससे  the area and  the   परिषद   is  developing what it  शर्तें  its  चार   zones  .
An  ``   e-government   ``  system based  on  this  hosted  the international e-participation  फ़ोरम   on  February 7–9 , 2007  ,   साथ  the participation  of   अधिक   than   thirty-seven  countries .
The forum was  शुभारम्भ  with the  थीम  ``  promoting  Democracy and Regional  विकास   ''  and twenty-five mayors including André  santini   (  Issy-les-Moulineaux ,  फ़्रांस   )   ,   केविन   foy  ( Chapel Hill  ,  US  )  ,  apirak  Kosayothin  (   बैंकॉक  , Thailand ) , Uvais Mohamed  emthiyas  (  कोलोन  , Sri  लंका   )   ,   और  world experts such  as   dr  William H.  dutton   (  Director of Oxford Internet Institute at the University of Oxford  ,  UK ) and  dr   ari-veiko   anttiroiko  (  प्राध्यापक  at the University of Tampere , Finland ) participated  in  the forum .
The Guro Declaration , adopted  दौरान  the forum  ,  aims  to  set up  a  portal  साईट   लिये  e-government  विकास   और  to establish a concrete project in order  to  bridge the  डिजिटल   divide   among   the  world  's  cities .
This  अभ्यास  has been recognised for providing  a  new important step in the  विकास   of  e-democracy  .
the   e-participation   फ़ोरम   थी   a  key factor  लिये   guro   to   खेल  the leading role  in   bridging  the digital divide among cities ,  to   provide  I.T  .   उद्यमों  located in  guro   डिजिटल  Industrial  जटिल  the opportunity to launch  into   the  international market ,  to   improve  its image  और  become  a   वैश्विक  leader  to   कंक्रीट   e-democracy  .
the  international  e-participation   फ़ोरम   on  February 7–9 , 2007
A  wonton  ( also  spelled  wantan , wanton  ,   or   wuntun  in transcription  इससे   cantonese  ; Mandarin  :  húndùn )  is  a  प्रकार   of   पकौड़ी   commonly  found in a number  of   चाइनीज  cuisines  .
Many people were involved  in  the invention of radio  as  we  अभी  know it  .
अनेक   संभावित   विधि   of   बेतार  communication  यहूद  considered  ,  including inductive and  capacitive  induction and  हस्तांतरण   through  the  मैदान  ,  however  the method used for  रेडियो  today exclusively involves the transmission and  रिसेप्शन  of electromagnetic waves .
After  जल्दी   अटकलें  on the subject , experimental work  on  the connection between electricity and magnetism began around  1820  with the  कार्य   of   hans   ईसाई  Ørsted and continued  साथ   the  work of André-Marie Ampère  ,   जोसेफ  Henry  ,   और   माइकल   फैराडे  .
ये  investigations culminated in the  पूरा   सिद्धान्त   of  electromagnetism  विकसित  by James  क्लर्क  Maxwell  .
इस   सिद्धान्त   वर्णित   the  theoretical  आधार   of   the   propagation  of electromagnetic waves .
After Maxwell 's  सिद्धान्त  was published  अनेक  people  experimented   साथ  wireless  संचार  ,  कुछ   intentionally  using Maxwell  's  theory some not  .
It is  माना  likely that the  पहला  intentional transmission of a  सिग्नल   by  means  of   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक   लहरें   थी   performed   by   दाउद  Edward Hughes around 1880 , although  इस   थी  considered to  be  induction at the time .
the  first systematic and unequivocal transmission of EM  लहरें  was performed by  heinrich  Rudolf Hertz and described  in  papers published  in  1887 and 1890 .
Hertz famously considered these  परिणाम   as  being  of   छोटी  practical  मान   .
बाद   हर्ट्ज़   's  work many people were involved  in  the development  of  components and theory involved with  the  transmission and reception of  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  waves  .
Others  ,   notably   guglielmo   मार्कोनी  , were  चिंतित  with practical improvements  और   the  commercial application of radio  to   बेतार  telegraphy .
बाद  on Reginald A. Fessenden became the  पहला  to  भेजें  an audio  सिग्नल   by   अर्थात्  of electromagnetic  लहरें   .
Scurvy  is  a  बीमारी  resulting  इससे  a deficiency  of  vitamin C , which is  जरूरी  for the synthesis of  कोलेजन  in  इंसानो  .
the  chemical name for  विटामिन   c  ,  एस्कॉर्बिक  acid , is derived  इससे  the Latin name  of  scurvy  ,   scorbutus  ,  जिससे   भी  provides the  क्रियाशील  scorbutic ( `` of  ,  characterized by  or   having   to   do   साथ   स्कर्वी   ''  ) .
Scurvy often  presents  itself  initially   as   लक्षण   of  malaise and  lethargy  , followed by formation of  धब्बे  on  the   स्किन  , spongy gums  ,  and  bleeding  from the mucous membranes .
Spots are  सबसे  abundant on the thighs and  टाँगे  , and a person  साथ   the  ailment looks  पाले   ,   feels  depressed  ,  and  is  partially  immobilized  .
As scurvy advances  ,  there can  be  open ,  suppurating   wounds  , loss of teeth , jaundice , fever , neuropathy and death .
Scurvy was at one time  आम   among  sailors  ,   pirates  and  अन्य  aboard ships at  समुद्र   longer   than   perishable   फल   और  vegetables could be stored ( subsisting instead only  on   cured  and  salted  meats and dried  दाने  ) and by soldiers similarly  वंचित   of  these foods for  विस्तारित   अवधि  .
it   थी   वर्णित   by  Hippocrates  (  c.  460   bc–c   .  380 BC )  ,  and herbal cures  लिये  scurvy have  महरूम  known in many  देशी  cultures since  प्रागितिहास  .
Scurvy was one of the limiting  कारकों  of marine travel  ,  often killing  विशाल  numbers  of  the passengers  और   क्रू  on long-distance voyages  .
This became a  significant  issue in  यूरोपीय  from  the  beginning of the modern  era   in  the  आयु   of   डिस्कवरी  in  the   15th   सदी   ,   continuing  to  खेल   a   significant   भूमिका   through  World  युद्ध  I  in   the  20th  सदी  .
While  आज   स्कर्वी  is  ज्ञात  to be  caused  by a nutritional  कमियां  ,  जबतक   the  isolation of vitamin C  और  direct evidence of its  कड़ी   to   स्कर्वी   in   1932  , numerous  theories  and  उपचार   यहूद   प्रस्तावित  ,  प्रायः   on  little or no  प्रायोगिक  data .
This inconsistency  is  attributed  to  the  कमी  of vitamin C  as  a distinct  अवधारणा  , an inability  to   reliably  link different foods ( notably  उपस्थित   in  fresh  citrus  ,  watercress  , and  अंग  meat )  to  scurvy .
An additional concept required  to   समझे  scurvy  थी   the   degradation  of vitamin C by exposure to air  और   तांबे  and other transition  मेटल   लवण  such  as  those of  आयरन   ,  thus changing  the  links of  भोजन  to scurvy over  समय  .
उपचार   by  fresh food ,  विशेषकर   citrus   फल  ,  थी  periodically implemented , as it had  महरूम  since antiquity  .
however  until  the  1930s , treatment was inconsistent  ,  with many ineffective treatments used  into  the  20th  century .
It  थी  a Scottish surgeon in the Royal Navy , James Lind  जो  first  proved  it  could   be  treated with  citrus   फल   in  experiments  he   वर्णित   in   उसके   1753  book  ,   a  Treatise of the Scurvy , though  उसके  advice was  नहीं   implemented   by   the  Royal Navy  लिये  several decades .
In infants  ,   स्कर्वी  is sometimes  referred  to as Barlow 's disease , named  बाद   सर   थामस  Barlow , a British physician who  वर्णित  it .
However , Barlow 's disease may  भी   refer  to  mitral  valve  prolapse  .
अन्य  eponyms for  स्कर्वी  include Moeller 's disease and Cheadle 's disease  .
Scurvy  करता   नहीं  occur in  सबसे   पशु  because  वे  can synthesize  उनके  own vitamin C  .
However , humans and other higher primates (  the  simians  -  monkeys  और   apes   -   और  tarsiers ) ,  गिनी  pigs  ,   सबसे   or   सब   bats  ,  और   कुछ  species  of  birds  और  fish lack  an  enzyme  (  L-gulonolactone  oxidase   )  necessary  लिये  such  संश्लेषण  and  जरूर  obtain vitamin C through  उनके   आहार  .
विटामिन   c  is  फैली   in  plant tissues , with particularly  ऊँची  concentrations  occurring  in citrus  फल  ( oranges , lemons , limes  ,  grapefruits )  ,   टमाटर  ,  आलू   ,   पत्तागोभी   ,   और  green  मिर्च  .
Iron is a  रासायनिक   तत्व  with the  प्रतीक  Fe  (   इससे  ) and  परमाणु  number 26  .
It is  a   मेटल   in   the  first transition  श्रेणी  .
It is the most common  तत्व  (  by  mass  )   forming   the  planet Earth  as   a  whole , forming much of Earth  's   बाहरी  and  भीतरी   कोर  .
it   is   the   चौथी  most common element  in   the  Earth  's  crust  .
आयरन  's very common presence in rocky planets like  धरती   is   due  to  इसके  abundant production as a result  of  fusion in high-mass  सितारों   ,  where  the  production  of  nickel-56 (  जिससे   decays  to the most common  समस्थानिक  of  आयरन  ) is the  पिछला   नाभिकीय   संलयन  reaction that  is  exothermic  .
This  कल्याणकारी  radioactive  निकल   to  become the  पिछला  element to be produced before collapse of a supernova leads to the  विस्फोटक   कार्यक्रम  that scatter  इस  precursor  radionuclide  of  आयरन  abundantly  into   स्पेस   .
जैसे   अन्य   समूह  8 elements , iron exists in  a   चौड़ी   दायरा  of  ऑक्सीकरण  states  ,  −2 to  +6   ,  although +2  और  +3 are the most common  .
Elemental iron  occurs  in  meteoroids  and other  कम   ऑक्सीजन  environments  ,  but is reactive  to   ऑक्सीजन  and  जल  .
Fresh  आयरन   सतहों   appear  lustrous silvery-gray , but  oxidize  in  सामान्य   एयर  to give  hydrated  iron oxides , commonly  ज्ञात  as rust .
नापसंद   अनेक  other metals  जिससे  form  passivating   ऑक्साइड  layers , iron  आक्साइड   occupy   अधिक  volume than iron metal , and thus  आयरन  oxides  फ्लेक   बंद   और  expose fresh  सतहों  for corrosion  .
आयरन  metal has  महरूम  used since ancient  टाइम्स  , though copper alloys ,  जिससे   have   निम्नतर  melting temperatures  ,  were  प्रयुक्त   पहला  in  इतिहास  .
pure   आयरन  is soft ( softer than aluminium )  ,  but  is   unobtainable  by smelting  .
The material is significantly  hardened   और   strengthened  by  impurities  from the smelting  प्रक्रम  , such as carbon .
a  certain  proportion  of  कार्बन   (  between 0.002 % and 2.1 % )  produces  steel ,  जिससे  may be  up  to 1000 times harder than  pure   आयरन   .
Crude  आयरन  metal is produced in  धमाका  furnaces ,  जहाँ  ore is reduced  by  coke to  सुअर   आयरन   ,  which  रै   a  high  कार्बन  content .
further  refinement with oxygen  reduces  the carbon content to the correct  proportion   to   मेक  steel .
steels   और   कम   कार्बन  iron alloys with other metals (  मिश्रधातु  steels ) are  by  far  the   सबसे   आम   धातुओं  in industrial use  ,  due  to  their great  दायरा   of  desirable  गुण  and the abundance of iron  .
आयरन  chemical compounds  ,  which include ferrous and  ferric  compounds , have  अनेक  uses  .
आयरन   ऑक्साइड   मिश्रित   साथ  aluminium  चूर्ण  can  be  ignited  to  create a thermite  प्रतिक्रिया   ,  used in welding  और  purifying  ores  .
It  फ़ॉर्म   शब्दकोष  compounds with the halogens  और  the chalcogens .
among  its  कार्बधातुक  compounds is ferrocene , the first sandwich compound  खोजा   .
Iron  plays   an   महत्वपूर्ण  role in biology ,  forming   देवालय  with molecular oxygen  in  hemoglobin  और   myoglobin  ;  ये  two compounds are  आम  oxygen transport proteins in vertebrates .
Iron is  भी  the metal used at  the  active  साईट   of   अनेक   महत्वपूर्ण   रेडॉक्स  enzymes  dealing   साथ  cellular respiration  और  oxidation  और  reduction  in  plants and animals .
the   ब्लू  Cross Blue Shield Association ( BCBSA  )   is   a   संघ  of 38 separate health  बीमे  organizations and companies in  the   संयुक्त  States  .
Combined ,  वे  directly  or  indirectly provide health  बीमे  to over 99 million Americans .
the  history of  ब्लू  Cross  तिथियाँ  back  to  1929 , while the  इतिहास  of Blue Shield dates to 1939  .
The  ब्लू  Cross Association  तिथियाँ   वापस  to  1960  ,  जबकि   इसके   ब्लू  Shield counterpart  थी  created in  1948   .
the  two  संगठन  merged  in  1982 , forming the current association  .
A potato  चिप  ( known as  a   चिप  in American  ,  Australian , New Zealand ,  कनाडाई  ,  singaporean  ,  हांग  Kong  ,   दक्षिण   अफ़्रीकी  and  jamaican  English ; as  a  crisp  in  British English and  hiberno-english  , and  as   either  a  चिप  or wafer  in  Indian English ) is a thin slice of potato that  is  deep  fried   or   baked  until crunchy .
आलू  chips  हैं  commonly served as an  क्षुधावर्धक  ,  पक्ष  dish  ,   or  snack .
The  मौलिक   चिप्स   हैं  cooked and  salted  ; additional  किस्में  are  manufactured   using  various  flavorings   और   संघटक  including seasonings , herbs ,  मसाले   ,   cheeses  ,  और   कृत्रिम   एडिटिव   .
``   crisps  ''  ,   however   ,   may   भी  refer to many  अलग  types  of  savory snack  उत्पाद   बेची   in  the United  किंगडम   और   आयरलैंड   ,  some  बना   इससे   आलू  ,  लकिन  may also be made from  मक्का  , tapioca  or  other cereals .
an  example of these kinds of  savory  snacks  is   दानव   चबाना  .
Potato chips  हैं  a  predominant  part of the snack food market in English-speaking  देशों   और  numerous other  पश्चिमी   राष्ट्र  .
the  global potato  चिप   मार्केट  generated  कुल   revenues  of US $  16.4  billion  in  2005 .
इस  accounted for 35.5 %  of  the  कुल  savory snacks market in  कि  year  (   us   $   46.1  billion ) .
हेनरी  Clay ,  sr.  ( April  12   ,  1777 – June 29 ,  1852  )  थी   a  lawyer ,  राजनेता   और   skilled  orator  जो   represented  Kentucky in both  the   सीनेट   और  in the House  of  Representatives .
he   परोसा   तीन  different  शर्तें   as  Speaker of  the   संयुक्त  States House of  प्रतिनिधि   और   थी   भी  Secretary  of   राज्य  from 1825  to   1829  .
He  खोया   उसके  campaigns for president in  1824  , 1832 and 1844 .
Clay  थी  a dominant  फिगर   in   दोनो   the  First  और  Second Party  प्रणालियों  .
as   a   अग्रणी  war hawk  in   1812   ,  he favored war with Britain  और   निभाई   a   significant  role in  अग्रणी  the nation  to   युद्ध  in the War of 1812 .
in  1824 he  भागा  for president and lost , but  फेंका   उसके  electoral  मत  to  जॉन   क्विंसी   एडम्स   ,   जो  made  उसे   सचिव  of state  as   the  Jacksonians  denounced  what they  माना  a ``  भ्रष्ट  bargain  .  ''
He ran and  खोया   again  in 1832 and 1844 as the candidate  of  the Whig Party  ,   जिससे   he   संस्थापित  and  प्रायः  dominated  .
Clay was the foremost proponent of the American System ,  लड़  for  an  increase  in   tariffs  to  फोस्टर  industry in the  संयुक्त  States ,  the   उपयोग   of  federal funding to build  और   maintain   अवसंरचना   ,   और   a  strong  नेशनल  bank .
He opposed  the  annexation of  टेक्सास   ,  fearing  it  would  इंजेक्ट   the   गुलामी   समस्या  into  राजनीती  .
मिट्टी  also opposed the Mexican-American War and  the   ``   manifest  Destiny  ``   नीति  of  डेमोक्रेट   ,   जिससे  cost him  मत   in   the  close 1844  चुनाव   .
उतावले   the  `` Great Pacificator  ,  ''  मिट्टी  brokered important  compromises  during the  nullification  Crisis  और  on  the   गुलामी   समस्या  .
as   भाग   of  the `` Great Triumvirate  ``  or `` Immortal Trio , ''  साथ  with  उसके   सहयोगियों   डेनियल  Webster and John  C.   calhoun  , he was instrumental in formulating  the  Missouri  सुलह  of 1820 and  the  Compromise  of   1850  .
he   थी  viewed  as  the primary representative  of   पश्चिमी   रूचि  in  इस   समूह  ,  और   थी  given the  names  `` Henry of  the   वेस्ट  ''  और  `` The  पश्चिमी  Star . ''
A plantation  मालिक  , Clay  आयोजित   स्लेव   दौरान   उसके  lifetime but freed them in his Will .
Abraham Lincoln  ,  the Whig  नेता  in  इलिनोइस   ,  was a great admirer of Clay  ,  saying he  थी  ``  my   आदर्श  of  a  great  man  . ''
lincoln   wholeheartedly  supported Clay  's  economic programs .
in  1957  ,  a Senate Committee  चयनित   मिट्टी   as   एक  of the  पाँच  greatest U.S . Senators ,  साथ  with Daniel Webster  ,  John  C.   calhoun   ,   रॉबर्ट   la   follette   ,   और   रॉबर्ट  Taft  .
bj  's Wholesale Club , Inc. ,  commonly   referred  to simply as  bj   's  , is  a   membership-only   गोदाम  club chain operating  on   the  United  राज्य  East Coast  ,  as  खूब  as  in  the  राज्य  of Ohio .
The  कम्पनी  is ranked  #   232   on  Fortune  पत्रिका   's  2010  लिस्टिंग   of  America 's  500   largest   पब्लिक   corporations  .
the  Wizard  of   oz  , known during  उसके   शासनकाल  as The Great and Powerful Oz  ,   is  the epithet of  ऑस्कर  Zoroaster Phadrig Isaac Norman Henkel  emmannuel   ambroise  Diggs  ,   a   fictional   अक्षर   in  the  जमीन  of Oz ,  निर्मित  by  अमरीकी  author  L.   फ़्रैंक  Baum .
The character was  further   popularized   by   the  classic 1939 movie , wherein his full name  is  not  उल्लेखित   .
kristinia   जेमी  DeBarge (  ;  born March  8  , 1990  )  is  an   अमरीकी   सिंगर   ,  songwriter ,  नर्तकी  and  अभिनेत्री   .
She first  appeared   on  national television in 2003 as a  प्रतियोगी   on  the  अमरीकी  Idol  spin-off  , American Juniors  .
In  2009   ,  DeBarge signed a contract with the  द्वीप   रिकॉर्ड  department  sodapop  ,  releasing  her  डेब्यू  album Exposed  in  July of  the  same  साल   .
the   पहला   सिंगल  , ``  अलविदा   ``  ,  पहुँचे  the top 20 in the  us   और   कनाडा   .
the  lead  सिंगल   (  `` Cry  भेड़िया   ''   )  from  उसके   बेनाम   sophomore  album  थी  released on  सितंबर   27   ,   2012  .
the   हवाई   योद्धाओं  football  टोली  represents  the  University  of   hawaiʻi   at   mānoa  in NCAA  प्रभाग  I  fbs  college  फ़ुटबॉल  .

Marvin Gaye ( April 2 ,  1939april   1  , 1984  )   ,  born Marvin  pentz   gay  ,  jr.  , was an American singer-songwriter and musician .
Gaye  helped   to  shape  the  sound of Motown Records in  the  1960s  साथ   a  string of hits  सहित  ``  कैसा  Sweet It  is  ( To Be Loved By You  )  `` and ``  i   सुना  It Through the  grapevine   ``   और   duet  recordings  साथ  Mary  कुएं   और  Tammi Terrell  ,   बाद  earning the  शीर्षक  `` Prince of Motown '' and `` Prince  of   आत्मा  '' .
दौरान  the 1970s  ,  Gaye recorded  the  concept  एल्बम   कया  's  going  On and Let 's Get It  on   और  became  among  the  पहला   कलाकारों   in   motown  to break away  इससे   the  reins of  इसके   उत्पादन  company .
Gaye 's  बाद  recordings influenced  अनेक  R &  b  subgenres such as  शांत   तूफ़ान  and  neo-soul   .
Following a  काल  in  यूरोपीय  under a  कर  exile in the  जल्दी   1980s  ,  gaye  released the 1982 Grammy  award-winning   hit  ``  यौन  Healing `` and the  मध्यरात्रि   प्रेम   एल्बम  .
Since his death  in   1984  , Gaye has  महरूम  posthumously  सम्मानित  by many institutions  ,   सहित   the  Grammy  आजीवन   उपलब्धि  Award and  the  Rock and Roll  हॉल  of Fame .

The Chernobyl disaster (  ,  Chornobylska  katastrofa  – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was  a   अनर्थकारी  nuclear accident that  occurred  on 26  अप्रैल   1986  at  the   chernobyl   नाभिकीय  Power Plant  in  Ukraine ( then officially  the  Ukrainian  ssr   )   ,  which was  अंतर्गत   the  direct  क्षेत्राधिकार  of  the   सेंट्रल  authorities  of  the  सोवियत  Union  .
An explosion  और  fire  released   विशाल   quantities  of  रेडियोसक्रिय  particles  into   the  atmosphere ,  जिससे  spread over  much  of  the  western USSR and Europe .
the   chernobyl  disaster  is  widely considered  to   have   महरूम  the worst nuclear power plant accident  in   इतिहास  ,  और  is one of only two classified as  a   स्तर   7  event on  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Nuclear Event  स्केल   (   the   अन्य  being the Fukushima  daiichi   नाभिकीय  disaster in 2011 ) .
the  battle to contain the  संदूषण   और   avert   a  greater  प्रलय  ultimately  शामिल   over   500,000  workers  और  cost  an   अनुमानित  18  अरब  rubles  .
The  आधिकारिक  Soviet casualty count of 31 deaths  रै   महरूम  disputed , and  long-term  effects  ऐसे   as  cancers and  deformities  are  स्टिल   होने  accounted  लिये  .

mrs.  Claus  is   the   बीवी   of   सांता   क्लॉस   ,   the  Christmas gift-bringer  in  North American and European  क्रिसमस  tradition .
She  is  known for  बनाना  cookies with  the   elves   और  preparing toys  साथ  her  husband   सांता   क्लॉस   .
उसके  first  नाम   is  a mystery ,  हालांकि   वो   रै  been  referred  to as  मरियम   ,   जेसिका   ,  Layla , Annette  ,   हीदी  , or Martha  .
HijackThis ( also HiJackThis  or  HJT ) is an open source  enumerating   औजार  for Microsoft Windows originally created  by   merijn  Bellekom , and later  बेची  to Trend Micro .
the  program is  notable   लिये   लक्ष्यीकरण   browser-hijacking  methods ,  बल्कि  than relying  on   a   डेटाबेस  of  ज्ञात   स्पाइवेयर  .
It  scans   a  user 's computer  जल्दी   ,   और   प्रदर्शक  browser hijacking locations  ,  showing  कया  entries are there .
HijackThis is  प्रयुक्त  primarily for  निदान  of  ब्राउजर   hijacking   ,   as   uninformed  use  of   इसके  removal  सुविधाएं  can cause  significant  software damage to a computer .
hijackthis   करता  not remove  or  detect spyware ; it lists most common locations  जहाँ  browser  hijacking  activity  can  occur .
Browser hijacking can  कारण  malware  to  be installed on a  कंप्यूटर   .
On  फ़रवरी   16  , 2012  ,  Trend Micro  released   the  HijackThis source code as open  सोर्स   और   it  is  अभी  available  on  the SourceForge  साईट  .
Saddle Creek  रिकॉर्ड  is an  अमरीकी   रिकार्ड   लेबल  based  in  Omaha  ,  Nebraska .
Started  as  a college  क्लास   प्रोजेक्ट   on  entrepreneurship  ,   the  label was founded  by  Mike Mogis and Justin Oberst  in  1993 (  as  Lumberjack Records  )  .
mogis  soon turned  over  his  भूमिका  in the  कम्पनी   to  Robb Nansel  .
The  लेबल  is  नामित  after  काठी  Creek  सड़क  ,  a  street that cuts  through  the  ईस्ट  side  of   midtown   ओमाहा  ,  और  the  beginnings   of  a  झाँकी  whose  सदस्यों   शामिल   conor   oberst   (  then a solo  कलाकार  ,  फिलहाल  of  उज्जवल  Eyes  ,  Conor  oberst  and the  रहस्यवादी  Valley Band ,  desaparecidos   और  Monsters of  लोक   )   ,  Tim Kasher (  तब  of Slowdown Virginia , currently of  कर्सिव   और  The Good  जीवन   )   ,   और  others .
collectively  , they were known  unofficially  as the  ``  Creekers  ''   .
Saddle Creek  पहला   appeared   in  print  on   a   दिखाएँ  flyer , offering to `` Spend an  संध्या  with  काठी   क्रीक   ''  ( later  to  be the title  of  the  लेबल  's DVD  .  )
Saddle  क्रीक  became  an  incorporated entity  as  a result  of  a class project on entrepreneurship .
Distribution is handled by the  वैकल्पिक   वितरण  Alliance ,  जिससे  is  अंतर्गत  the Warner Music Group umbrella .
Saddle  क्रीक  Records continues  to  be  the  flagship label of  a  style of  म्यूज़िक  called  ``   the  Omaha Sound ``  ,  characterized by a slight country  twang  .
This  is   increasingly  inaccurate  ,  though  ,   साथ  the rise  of   अधिक  electronic  ध्वनि  such as  those  favored by  the  Faint and  टूटा  Spindles .
the  eclectic  ध्वनि   of  Saddle  क्रीक  's disparate member bands is  somewhat  explained by  उनके  history ; a  क्रमांक   of   the   असली  members of the label  attended   ग्रेड  school together  .
A  ``   सिस्टर  label '' ,  of  sorts  ,   to  Saddle Creek  is  Team  प्रेम   ,  started by Conor  oberst  in  2004  .
The  लेबल  opened  बाहें  to  उनके  first bands  नहीं  based  in   ओमाहा   in   2001  with releases by  अभी   it   's   ओवरहेड   और  Sorry About  ड्रेसडेन  .
Other  non-nebraskan   कलाकारों  followed ,  सहित   लॉस   एंजिल्स  's Rilo Kiley , Eric Bachmann  (  formerly leader of Archers of  loaf  and  कुटिल   उंगलियाँ  from  उत्तर   कैरोलिना  ) ,  georgie  James ( Washington D.C. ) , Two Gallants  (  San  फ्रांसिस्को   )  , and  सबसे   recently  Tokyo  पुलिस   क्लबों  (  टोरंटो  )  .
in  2005 ,  खर्च   an  Evening with  काठी  Creek  ,  a documentary  detailing   the  first ten years of the  रिकार्ड  label 's history ,  थी   released   .
The DVD features  extensive  interviews  साथ  the  काठी  Creek bands , archival footage , and rare live  प्रदर्शन  .
on  June 8  ,  2007 ,  the  label  खोली   उनके  own  म्यूज़िक   स्थान  named Slowdown  (  after the  समूह  Slowdown  वर्जिनिया   )  , located in downtown  ओमाहा   ,  Nebraska .
The following is a  सूची  of episodes for the television show  पूरा  House  .
In total  ,  there  यहूद  192 episodes filmed for  the  show over  the  course of its eight seasons ,  इससे  1987 to 1995 .
Full House  is  a situation comedy which chronicles a  विधवा  father  's   struggles  of  उठाने  his  तीन   यंग  daughters  और  the  जीवनदान  that they have touched  .
The  patriarch  of  the   परिवार  ,  डैनी  (  bob  Saget )  ,  invites his  brother-in-law  Jesse (  जॉन  Stamos ) and his  बेहतरीन   dost   जॉय   (   डेव  Coulier )  ,  to help  उठाएँ   उसके   children  (  candace  Cameron  ,   jodie  Sweetin , and Mary Kate/Ashley Olsen  )  , after his wife was killed  दौरान   an   ऑटोमोबाइल  accident  involving   a  drunk driver .
बाद  episodes 88  और  89 , Jesse  marries  Becky ( Lori Loughlin  )   ,  and they move into the  अटारी  .
तब  , after episodes 104 and 105 , Becky and  जेसी  have twin boys named Nicky  और  Alex (  डेनियल   और   केविन  Renteria/Blake and Dylan Tuomy-Wilhoit  )   .
The series  ends  with episode  192  , ``  मिशेल  Rides Again Part 2  ''   ,  when Michelle loses her memory and  the  family  कोशिशें  to  restore  it .
सूचना   of   स्टैम्प   अधिनियम   of  1765 in Newspaper
American  अखबारों   reacted   to   the  Stamp  अधिनियम   साथ  anger and predictions of the demise of  पत्रकारिता  .
The Stamp Act 1765 (  छोटी  title Duties in  अमरीकी   colonies   अधिनियम  1765  ;   5   जार्ज   iii  , c.  12  ) imposed  a  direct  कर   by   the   अंग्रेजों   पार्लियामेंट   specifically  on  the  colonies of British  अमेरिका   ,   और   it   जरूरी  that  अनेक  printed  सामग्री   in   the   colonies  be produced  on  stamped  पेपर  produced in London  ,  carrying an  embossed  revenue stamp  .
These printed materials  यहूद   विधिक  documents ,  मैगज़ीन   ,   अखबारों  and many other  प्रकार  of paper used  throughout  the  colonies  .
जैसे  previous taxes , the  स्टैम्प   कर  had  to   be   सशुल्क  in  मान्य  British  करेंसी  , not in colonial paper money .
The  purpose   of   the   कर   थी  to help  अदा  for troops stationed in North America  बाद  the  अंग्रेजों  victory  in  the  सात  Years '  युद्ध   .
the   अंग्रेजों  government felt  कि   the  colonies  यहूद   the  primary  beneficiaries  of  इस  military  उपस्थिति   ,   और  should  अदा  at least a  portion  of the expense .
The Stamp  अधिनियम   मिले  great  प्रतिरोध   in   the  colonies  .
The colonies  भेजा  no representatives to Parliament  ,  and  इसलिए  had no  influence   over  what taxes  यहूद   उठाया   ,  how they were  levied   ,   or  how they  होता  be spent .
Many  colonists  considered it  a  violation  of   उनके  rights as Englishmen to  be  taxed without  उनके  consent  —consent  that only  the  colonial legislatures could  ग्रान्ट   .
औपनिवेशिक   सभाओं   भेजा  petitions and protests .
The Stamp Act Congress held  in  New York City  ,  reflecting the  पहला   significant  joint  औपनिवेशिक   जवाब  to  कोई  British measure , also petitioned Parliament  और   the  King .
लोकल  protest groups ,  led  by colonial merchants  और  landowners  ,  established connections  through  correspondence that created a  ढीला  coalition that extended from New  इंग्लैण्ड   to  Georgia  .
Protests  और   demonstrations   initiated   by   the   बेटे  of Liberty often turned  हिंसक   और  destructive  as  the  masses   became   शामिल  .
Very soon all stamp tax distributors were  सहमे  into resigning  उनके  commissions  ,  and  the  tax was never effectively collected  .
Opposition to  the  Stamp Act was  नहीं   सीमित   to   the  colonies .
British  व्यापारियों  and manufacturers , whose  निर्यात   to   the   colonies  were threatened by colonial economic problems exacerbated  by  the  कर  , also pressured  पार्लियामेंट   .
The Act was repealed  on   कूच  18  ,   1766  as a  पदार्थ   of  expedience , but  पार्लियामेंट  affirmed  इसके  power to legislate for the colonies “in all cases  whatsoever”   by  also  गुजर  the Declaratory  अधिनियम  .
वहीँ   followed   a   श्रेणी  of new  कर   और  regulations  ,  likewise opposed  by   the  colonists .
The  एपीसोड  played a major  भूमिका  in  धमक  the grievances and  enabling  the organized colonial resistance that  led  to  the  American  क्रान्ति  in  1775   .
PT-105  underway  .
PT boats were  a  variety of  torpedo-armed  fast  आक्रमण   शिल्प  used  by   the  United States  नेवी  in  संसार  War  ii  to  आक्रमण  larger surface  जहाजों   .
``  PT  ''  is  the   us   हल  classification symbol for `` Patrol Torpedo ''  .
The  pt   नाव  squadrons  यहूद   nicknamed  `` the  मच्छर  fleet  ''   .
The Japanese called them  ``  Devil Boats '' .
the   असली  pre–  संसार   युद्ध   i   torpedo  boats were designed with ``  विस्थापन   ''  hulls .
They  विस्थापित   up   to  300  टन  and the  शीर्ष  speed was  .
The PT  नौकाएँ  used in World War II were built using the planing -type hull  रूप   विकसित   लिये  racing boats .
They  यहूद   much  smaller ( 30–75 tons ) and  तेज़   (   35–40   knots   )   .
दोनो  types were designed  to   स्ट्राइक   at  larger  warships  with torpedoes ,  using  relatively  ऊँची   गति  to  मिलेंगी   बंद  , and  छोटी  size to  avoid  being spotted and  hit  by gunfire .
They  यहूद   much   कम  expensive  than  large warships  .
PT  नौकाएँ  were  much  faster , smaller  ,   और  cheaper than  conventional  (  विस्थापन   हल  ) vessels  .
दौरान  World War  ii  , American PT boats  सगाई  enemy destroyers  और  numerous  अन्य  surface  शिल्प  , ranging from  छोटी  boats  to   विशाल   सप्लाई  ships .
PT  नौकाएँ   भी  operated  as  gunboats against  दुश्मन   छोटी  craft  ,  such as armored  barges  used by  the   जापानी  forces  लिये  inter-island  हस्तांतरण  .
Good Friday is a  धार्मिक  holiday  observed  primarily by  ईसाइयों   commemorating  the crucifixion  of   यीशु   मसीह   और   उसके  death  at  Calvary .
The  अवकाश  is observed during Holy Week  as  part of the Paschal  triduum  on the  शुक्रवार  preceding Easter Sunday , and  may   coincide   साथ   the  Jewish  observance   of  Passover  .
It  is   भी  known  as   पावन  Friday , Great Friday ,  ब्लैक   शुक्रवार  ,  or   ईस्टर  Friday , though the latter  properly  refers  to   the  Friday in  ईस्टर   सप्ताह   .
आधारित   on  the  विवरण   of  the  canonical  gospels , the  crucifixion   of  Jesus was most  संभावित  to have  महरूम  on  a  Friday  (   the  day before the  sabbath  )  (   )   .
The estimated year of  the  Crucifixion is  ad  33  ,  by two different groups  ,  and  originally   as  AD 34 by Isaac Newton via the  मतभेद  between the  biblical  and  जूलियन   पंचांग  and the crescent of the moon .
A third method , using  a  completely different astronomical approach  आधारित   on  a  चंद्र  Crucifixion  अंधेरा   और   ग्रहण   मॉडल  (  सतत  with  apostle  Peter 's reference  to   a   ``  moon  of   रक्त  ''  in  Acts  2:20   )  , points  to   शुक्रवार   ,  3 April AD 33 .
the   ग्रेट   जलाशय   is  the  largest  area  of   endorheic   watersheds  in North  अमेरिका  .
it  is noted  लिये  both  इसके   arid   शर्तें  and  इसके  Basin and range  स्थलाकृति   कि   varies  from  the   उत्तर  American  कम  point at  badwater  Basin  to  the highest point  of  the contiguous United States , less than away at the summit  of  Mount Whitney .
The region  spans  several physiographic divisions , biomes /  ecoregions  , and deserts .
Raster may refer to:
रास्टर  graphics , graphical techniques using arrays of  पिक्सेल  values
Raster  ग्राफिक्स  editor ,  a   कंप्यूटर  program
रास्टर  scan  ,   the   पैटर्न  of image  readout   ,   हस्तांतरण  , storage ,  और   पुनर्निर्माण  in television  और   कंप्यूटर  images
Rasterisation , or rasterization  ,  conversion  of  a vector image to  a   रास्टर  image
Raster image  प्रोसेसर   ,  or  rip  , a component of a  मुद्रण  system that performs  rasterisation
रास्टर  interrupt  ,  a  कंप्यूटर  interrupt signal
Raster to  वेक्टर  , an image conversion process
रास्टर   बार  ,  an  effect used  in  computer demos
Raster-Noton , a record  लेबल
