Beowulf  (  ;  बूढ़ा  English  :  ) is a  legendary   geatish  hero and later turned king in the epic poem named after him  ,   एक  of the  oldest   surviving   टुकड़े  of literature in  the  English language .
The attack on  पर्ल   हार्बर  ( called Hawaii  आपरेशन   or  Operation  ai   by  the  जापानी  Imperial General Headquarters ( Operation Z  in  planning  )  and  the  Battle of Pearl Harbor ) was  a   आश्चर्य   सैन्य  strike conducted  by   the  Imperial Japanese Navy against the United States naval base at  पर्ल  Harbor , Hawaii , on  the   morning   of   दिसम्बर  7  ,  1941  (   दिसम्बर   8  in Japan  )  .
इससे  the standpoint  of   the  defenders  ,  the  आक्रमण   commenced  at 7:48  a.m.  Hawaiian  समय  .
The attack  थी  intended  as  a preventive action  in  order to keep the U.S.  प्रशांत   बेड़े  from interfering with  सैन्य   क्रियाएँ  the  साम्राज्य   of  Japan  थी  planning  in   southeast  Asia against overseas territories of  the  United Kingdom ,  the  Netherlands  ,  and  the  United States  .
The base was  attacked  by 353 Japanese fighters , bombers and  torpedo  planes in two  लहरें  , launched from six  वायुयान   वाहक   .
सब  eight  u.S.   नेवी   battleships  were damaged ,  साथ  four being sunk .
Two of  ये  were later  उठाया  , and with the remaining four repaired  ,  six  battleships   लौटे  to service later in the war  .
The Japanese  भी   sank  or damaged three  cruisers   ,   तीन  destroyers  ,  an  anti-aircraft  training ship , and one minelayer .
188 U.S.  वायुयान  were  नष्ट  ; 2,402  अमेरिकी  were killed  और  1,282 wounded  .
Important  आधार  installations  ऐसे   as   the  power station  ,   डॉकयार्ड   ,  maintenance  ,  and fuel  और  torpedo storage facilities  ,   as   खूब   as   the  submarine piers and headquarters building (  भी  home of the intelligence section  )   यहूद   नहीं  attacked .
Japanese  नुकसान  were light  :  29  वायुयान  and five  midget  submarines lost , and  65  servicemen killed or wounded  .
One Japanese sailor was  captured  .
The attack  आए  as  a   profound  shock to the American people and led directly to  the   अमरीकी  entry  into   संसार  War II in  दोनो  the Pacific and European theaters .
the  following day (  दिसम्बर   8  )  ,   the   संयुक्त  States  घोषित  war on Japan .
घरेलू  support for non-interventionism  ,  which had been strong  ,  disappeared .
clandestine   support   of  Britain ( for example  the   neutrality  Patrol ) was replaced by  क्रियाशील  alliance  .
Subsequent operations by  the  U.S.  prompted   जर्मनी  and Italy  to  declare  युद्ध  on the  u.S.   on   दिसम्बर  11  ,   जिससे   थी   reciprocated   by  the U.S.  the  same  दिन   .
वहीँ   यहूद  numerous historical  precedents   लिये  unannounced military action  by  Japan .
However , the  कमी  of any  औपचारिक   चेतावनी   ,  particularly  जबकि   negotiations   यहूद  still  जाहिर  ongoing  ,  led President Franklin  D.  Roosevelt  to  proclaim December  7  ,  1941   ,   ``   a   तिथि  which will live in infamy `` .
U.S.  रूट  85 ( US  85   )  is a north–south  संयुक्त   राज्य   राजमार्ग  that runs for in the Mountain - Northern Plains  राज्य  of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  .
The  दक्षिणी  terminus of  the  route  is  at the United States-Mexico border in El Paso  ,  Texas  ,  connecting with Mexican Federal  राजमार्ग  45 .
the   उत्तरी   टर्मिनस   is  at the  संयुक्त  States-Canada border in  fortuna  , North  डकोटा  ,  जहाँ  the  रूट  continues  उत्तर  as Saskatchewan Highway 35 .
in  both  the  United States and Saskatchewan  ,  Canada the route is known as the  canam  Highway .
Sections  of   us  85 are considered part  of  the  थियोडोर  Roosevelt Expressway  .
The  संयुक्त  States  अध्यक्षीय   चुनाव   of  1968 was the  46th  quadrennial presidential election , held on Tuesday , November  5  ,  1968  .
The Republican nominee  ,  former  vice-president  Richard  निक्सन   ,  won the  चुनाव   over   the   लोकतांत्रिक   nominee  , incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey .
Nixon  भागा  on  a   अभियान   कि  promised to restore law  और  order  to  the nation  's  cities , torn by riots  और   अपराधों   .
Analysts have argued  the   चुनाव  of 1968 is a  realigning  election  as  it  permanently   disrupted   the  New Deal Coalition  कि  had  वर्चस्व   अध्यक्षीय   राजनीती   लिये   36  years  .
Coming  चार  years  बाद  Democrat Lyndon B.  जॉनसन  won in a historic landslide , the election saw the incumbent president  मजबूर  out of  the  race and a Republican  निर्वाचित  for the first time  in  twelve years .
it  was  a  wrenching  नेशनल  experience  ,  conducted during a  साल  of  हिंसा  that  शामिल   the  assassination of civil  अधिकारों   नेता  Martin Luther King  ,  Jr.  ,  and subsequent race  दंगे  across the nation , the assasination of  लोकतांत्रिक   अध्यक्षीय  candidate Robert  F.  Kennedy  ,   फैली   विपक्ष   to  the Vietnam War across university  campuses   ,   और  violent confrontations between  पुलिस  and  anti-war  protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the  लोकतांत्रिक  party split again and again  .
The  चुनाव   प्रदर्शित  the strongest third party  प्रयत्न  since 1912 by former Alabama  राज्यपाल  George  वालेस   ,  a  डेमोक्रेट  .
क्युकी  Wallace  's  campaign opposed federal intervention  in  the  दक्षिण  to end school segregation  ,   he   carried   the   गहन  South and ran  खूब   in   जातीय   औद्योगिक   जिले  in the North .
This was the last  चुनाव   in   जिससे  New York had the  सबसे  votes  in   the   चुनावी  college  (  43 votes  )   .
After the  1970   जनसांख्यिकी   ,   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   gained  the  सबसे   चुनावी  votes and  रै  remained  the   सबसे  populous  राज्य  since then .
This is the  नवीनतम   चुनाव  where a presidential ticket won  बगैर  carrying the vice  अध्यक्षीय  candidate 's  घर   राज्य  .
Windows Task  मैनेजर  is a  कार्य  manager or  प्रणाली   मॉनिटर  application included with the Microsoft Windows  nt  family of operating  प्रणालियों  that provides limited information about  कंप्यूटर  performance and running  अनुप्रयोग  ,  प्रक्रियाओं   और  CPU  उपयोग   ,  commit  चार्ज  and memory information  ,  network activity and statistics  ,  logged-in users  ,   और   प्रणाली   सेवाएं   (  and as often  is  the case with  तन्त्र  tools provided by Microsoft for  खिड़कियाँ  ,  3rd  party software is available  जिससे  fills the  आवश्यकताएँ  more  thoroughly  , e.g  ,  ``  प्रक्रम  Explorer  ''  ,  ``  Extended  कार्य   मैनेजर  '' , ``  anvir   कार्य   मैनेजर  '' ,  ``  Process Hacker  ''  , and ``  प्रणाली  Explorer  ''  ) .
The Task Manager  can  also  be   प्रयुक्त  to set process  प्राथमिकताएं  ,  प्रोसेसर  affinity  ,   forcibly  terminate  प्रक्रियाओं  , and shut  bas  ,  restart  , hibernate or  log  off  इससे  Windows  .
खिड़कियाँ  Task Manager was  introduced   साथ   खिड़कियाँ   nt   4.0   .
पिछला   संस्करण   of  Windows NT included  the   कार्य  List application  ,  which had  दूर   कम   सुविधाएँ  .
The  कार्य  list  थी  capable  of   लिस्टिंग  currently running processes and killing  उन्हें   ,   or   बनाना   a  new process .
In  खिड़कियाँ  XP  तभी  , a  shutdown  menu is also  उपस्थित  that allows access to Standby  ,   hibernate   ,   फेरे  off ,  restart   ,  Log Off and  स्विच  User .
पहले   संस्करण  of  microsoft   खिड़कियाँ  ( Microsoft  खिड़कियाँ  3.x ,  खिड़कियाँ  95  ,  Windows 98 )  था  a program known  as  tasks  to   प्रदर्शक   the  programs  फिलहाल   कार्यशील  .
This file was  चलाया   by  running the  taskman.exe  file  इससे  the  c  :  \खिड़कीs  directory .
कांजी   (   ;  )  हैं  the  अपनाया   logographic   चाइनीज   वर्ण  ( hanzi  )  that are  प्रयुक्त   in   the  modern Japanese  लिखने   प्रणाली  along with  hiragana   (   ひらがな  ,  )   ,  katakana (  カタカナ  ,  )  , Hindu-Arabic numerals ,  और  the occasional use  of  the Latin  वर्णमाला  .
The Japanese  पद  kanji ( ) for  the  Chinese  वर्ण  literally  अर्थात्   ``  Han  वर्ण  ''  और  is written using the same characters as the  चाइनीज  hanzi (  )  .
John  r  Williams (  may  4  ,   1782  – October  20  , 1854 ) was an American soldier , merchant ,  और  politician who is most well known  लिये  serving as  the  first mayor of  डेट्रॉयट   ,  Michigan  .
in  total  ,  he served  as   डेट्रॉयट   's  mayor for  पाँच  other  शर्तें  .
He  भी   थी  a brigadier general in the United States Army during  the  Black Hawk  युद्ध   .
A simple  शुष्क  magnetic  पोर्टेबल  compass .
A smartphone that  can  be used as  a  compass because of  the  magnetometer  अंदर   .
an   iphone  that can be used as a  geological  compass  क्युकी  of the 3-axis  teslameter  and 3-axis accelerometer inside it
A  सैन्य  compass  कि  was  प्रयुक्त   दौरान   संसार   युद्ध   i   .
A compass is  a  navigational instrument that shows directions  in  a  फ़्रेम   of  reference that  is  stationary relative to the  सतह   of  the earth .
The frame of  सन्दर्भ  defines  the  four  कार्डिनल  directions  (  or  अंक  ) –  उत्तर   ,  south  ,  east ,  और  west .
Intermediate directions  हैं   भी  defined .
Usually , a diagram called a compass rose , which  shows  the directions ( with their  names  usually  abbreviated  to initials ) , is  चिह्नित  on  the   कम्पास   .
जब  the compass is  in  use , the rose is  लकीर  with  the  real directions in the frame  of   सन्दर्भ  , so ,  लिये  example  ,  the `` N '' mark on the  रोज़  really points to  the   उत्तर   .
अक्सर  , in addition to the rose or sometimes instead  of  it , angle  markings  in  डिग्री   हैं  shown  on  the  कम्पास   .
North  corresponds  to zero degrees ,  और   the  angles  बढ़ाएँ  clockwise  ,   so  east  is   90  degrees , south is 180 , and west is  270  .
ये   संख्याएँ   allow  the compass to show  azimuths  or  बियरिंग  , which are  commonly  stated in  इस  notation  .
The magnetic compass was first invented  as  a device  लिये   भविष्यवाणी   as  early as the Chinese  हान   राजवंश  (  चूंकि  about 206  bc   )  .
The  कम्पास   थी  used in Song  राजवंश  China by the military  लिये   navigational  orienteering  by   1040-1044  , and was  प्रयुक्त  for maritime  नेविगेशन  by 1111 to  1117   .
The use of a compass  is   अंकित  in  पश्चिमी  Europe between 1187  और   1202  ,  और  in Persia in  1232  .
The  शुष्क  compass  थी   invented  in  यूरोपीय  around  1300  .
This  थी  supplanted  in   the   जल्दी   20th  century by the liquid-filled  चुम्बकीय   कम्पास  .
The Inca  साम्राज्य   or   inka  Empire (  quechua  :  tawantinsuyu   )  was the  largest  empire in  pre-columbian  America .
the  administrative  ,  political and military  बीच   of   the  empire was located  in   कुज़्को  in modern-day Peru .
The Inca  सभ्यता   arose   इससे  the  हाइलैंड्स   of   पेरू   sometime  in the early  13th  century  .
इससे  1438  to   1533   ,   the  Incas used  a  variety of methods ,  इससे  conquest to  शांतिपूर्ण   सम्मिलन  ,  to  incorporate  a   विशाल  portion  of  western  दक्षिण   अमेरिका  , centered on  the   andean   पहाड़  ranges  ,   सहित  , besides Peru , large parts of  आधुनिक  Ecuador , western  और  south central  बोलीविया   ,   उत्तरपश्चिम   अर्जेंटीना   ,  north  और   सेंट्रल  Chile  ,   और  southern Colombia into  a  state  comparable   to  the  ऐतिहासिक  empires  of   यूरेशिया   .
The  आधिकारिक  language of the empire was Quechua ,  हालांकि   सैंकड़ों   of  local languages and dialects  of   quechua  were spoken .
The Inca referred  to   उनके   साम्राज्य   as   tawantinsuyu  which can  be  translated as  the  Four  regions  or The  चार   संयुक्त  Provinces .
There were many local forms  of  worship , most  of   उन्हें  concerning local  पवित्र  ``  huacas  `` ,  लकिन  the Inca  नेतृत्व  encouraged  the   इबादत   of  Inti  —the  sun  god—and   imposed  its  प्रभुता   ऊपर  other cults  ऐसे   as  that of  pachamama  .
the  Incas considered their  किंग  ,  the   sapa   इन्का  , to  be  the ``  चाइल्ड  of  the  sun  .   ''
the  kidneys are organs that  serve  several  अनिवार्य  regulatory roles in most animals ,  सहित  vertebrates  और  some  invertebrates  .
वे   हैं   अनिवार्य  in  the   urinary   प्रणाली  and also  serve   homeostatic  functions such  as  the  विनियमन  of  इलेक्ट्रोलाइट्स   ,   मेंटेनेंस   of  acid–base  संतुलन  , and regulation of  रक्त   दबाव  ( via maintaining salt and water balance ) .
They  serve   the  body as  a  natural  फिल्टर   of  the blood  ,  and remove wastes which are  diverted   to   the  urinary bladder .
in   producing  urine  ,  the kidneys excrete wastes such as urea  और   अमोनियम  , and  वे  are  भी  responsible for the reabsorption  of  water ,  ग्लूकोज  , and amino  acids  .
The  गुर्दे  also produce hormones including  calcitriol  ,  erythropoietin  , and the  एंजाइम  renin  .
स्तिथ  at  the  rear  of  the abdominal cavity in  the   retroperitoneum  ,  the   गुर्दे  receive blood from  the  paired  renal   धमनियों  ,  और   नाली   into   the   युग्म  renal veins  .
प्रत्येक  kidney excretes urine  into  a  ureter   ,  itself  a   युग्म  structure  कि   empties  into  the   urinary  bladder .
Renal physiology  is   the  study of  गुर्दा  function ,  जबकि  nephrology is the  चिकित्सा  specialty  चिंतित  with kidney  रोगों  .
Diseases of  the  kidney are  विविध   ,  but individuals with  गुर्दा   बीमारी  frequently display characteristic clinical  सुविधाएँ  .
आम  clinical  शर्तें   involving  the  गुर्दा  include the  nephritic   और   nephrotic  syndromes , renal cysts ,  अधि   गुर्दा   चोट   ,  chronic kidney  बीमारी   ,  urinary tract infection  ,   nephrolithiasis   ,   और   urinary   ट्रैक्ट   रुकावट  .
Various  cancers  of the  गुर्दा   मौजूद  ;  the  most  आम  adult renal  कर्कट  is  renal  cell carcinoma  .
cancers  , cysts ,  और   कुछ   अन्य  renal  शर्तें   can  be  प्रबंधित  with removal of  the  kidney  ,   or  nephrectomy .
When renal function , measured by  glomerular   filtration   रेट   ,  is  persistently   ग़रीब  , dialysis  और  kidney  प्रत्यारोपण  may  be   उपचार   विकल्प  .
Although  वे  are not severely  नुकसानदेह  , kidney stones  can   be   दुखद  and  a   nuisance  .
The removal of kidney  पत्थरों  involves ultrasound  उपचार   to   ब्रेक  up  the   पत्थरों   into  smaller pieces ,  जिससे  are then passed through the  urinary   ट्रैक्ट  .
One common symptom  of   गुर्दा  stones  is  a sharp pain in the medial/lateral segments of  the  lower back .
Lockton Companies  inc.   is   the   संसार  's largest  privately   आयोजित   बीमे   brokerage  firm , providing  बीमे   ,  risk management  और  employee benefits solutions .
In  जोड   to  its Kansas  नगर  , Missouri headquarters , Lockton operates 60 locations  in  17 countries  .
lockton  is  फिलहाल   घर  to  अधिक  than 4,450  शरीक   विश्वव्यापी   .
The  कम्पनी  was founded by  जोकर  Lockton in  1966  and  रै   चूंकि   become   the  world’s 9th largest  बीमे  brokerage  कड़  .
Lockton  serves  a  चौड़ी   सरणी  of  उद्योग  with services that include risk management , casualty , surety , professional  indemnity  and more  .
लिये   46   सालो  , Lockton posted  असाधारण   सशुल्क   विकास  ,  साथ  global revenues reaching  $  915 million  in  fiscal  2012   .
lockton  Benefits Group  :  Lockton’s Employee Benefit’s  टोली  works closely  साथ  insurance carriers  और  administrators to create comprehensive  और   एकीकृत   लाभ   रणनीति  for  क्लाइंट  .
The Lockton  लाभ   समूह  provides services  सहित  compliance  ,  executive benefits  ,  health and welfare  ,   स्वास्थ्य  risk solutions , retirement  और  more .
lockton  Affinity  :  Lockton  अपनापन  ,  an  affiliate of Lockton Companies  ,  meets the insurance needs  of  affinity groups  ,  franchises  ,   पेशेवर  organizations  ,  and associations of  सब   आकार   .
Lockton Affinity  offers  a  किस्में   of   बीमे  product  विकल्प  and programs .
Products  शामिल  : General Liability , Professional  देयता   ,  Property , Workers  मुआवजे  ,  निर्देशकों   &   अधिकारियों  Liability , Commercial  स्वचालित  ,  specialty  Coverage ,  excess   ,   स्वास्थ्य   योजनाएँ  and more .
lockton   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  : Lockton International  operates   कार्यालयों   in   the   uk   और  Ireland , as  खूब  as  कार्यालयों   throughout  Asia  और  Latin America .
In  यूरोपीय   ,   lockton   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  is a  संगी  in  eos  RISQ  ,  Europe’s leading insurance  ब्रोकिंग  and  रिस्क  management  कंसल्टेंसी  .
eos  RISQ is  an   equity-based  European partnership of major  स्वतंत्र  insurance brokers with  over  3,500 employees based in more than 30  देशों  in Europe  .
Lockton  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  provides  specialized  solutions for personal  लाइनों  ,  sme’s  and major multi-national  क्लाइंट  .
White chocolate  is   a  chocolate derivative .
It commonly  consists   of   cocoa  butter  ,  sugar ,  मिल्क   solids  and salt , and is characterized by  a  pale yellow or ivory appearance .
The  melting   पाइंट   of  cocoa  मक्खन  , its primary cocoa bean  घटक   ,  is high  पर्याप्त  to keep white  चॉकलेट  solid  at  room temperature  .
डोनाल्ड  Leon `` Don  ''   blankenship   (   born  March 14  ,   1950   )  was Chairman and CEO  of  Massey Energy  co.  ,  the  sixth  largest   कोयले   कम्पनी  (  by  2008 production  )  in the United States .
He  परोसा   in   those   भूमिकाएँ   इससे  November  30  ,  2000   ,   जबतक  December 31 , 2010  .
Blankenship is an  क्रियाशील  financial  backer  of the  रिपब्लिकन  party  और   भागीदार  in local and state politics  ,  especially in his  घर   राज्य   of  West  वर्जिनिया   .
He has  अक्सर   बोला  out publicly  परिचय   राजनीती  , the  पर्यावरण  , unions , and  कोयले   उत्पादन  .
U.S.  प्रतिभूति  and Exchange Commission  filings  show  blankenship  was  सशुल्क  $ 17.8 million in 2009  ,  the  उच्चतम  in the coal industry .
उसके  2009 pay represents a $  6.8  million raise over 2008 and almost double  उसके  compensation package in 2007 .
blankenship   भी   प्राप्त   a  deferred  मुआवजे   पैकेज  valued at $ 27.2 million in  2009   .
On December 3 ,  2010  ,  blankenship  announced that he was retiring  as  CEO  at  the end  of  the year  ,  and would be succeeded  by  Massey  अध्यक्ष   बैक्सटर   F.   phillips  Jr  .
धनुष  Wow is one of the  transcriptions   प्रयुक्त  in  अंग्रेज़ी   to  describe  a  dog 's bark .
धनुष   wow  may  भी  refer to:
धनुष   wow   (  band  )   ,  a  जापानी   मुश्किल  rock/heavy  मेटल   बैंड
Bow Wow  (  rapper  )  ,  an  American rapper and  कर्ता
धनुष   wow  Sauce ,  a  sauce developed in the  cotswolds  region of  इंग्लैण्ड
Bow  wow   wow   ,   a   uk   नई  wave band
``  धनुष  Wow '' , a song by The Fiery  furnaces   इससे   उनके  2003 album  gallowsbird  's  छाल
``  धनुष   wow  Blues ( My Mama  दावत  Me  जैसे  a Dog  )   ''  ,  a  song composed in the 1920s by Cliff  dost  &  nat   ओसबोर्न
लापरवाही  ( Lat  .  negligentia , from  neglegere  , to  उपेक्षा   ,   वस्तुतः   ``  not to pick up something '' ) is a failure  to  exercise  the  care  कि   a   reasonably   दूरदर्शी   व्यक्ति  would exercise  in  like circumstances  .
The area of  अपकृत्य   विधि  known  as  negligence involves harm caused by carelessness  ,  not  जानबूझकर  harm  .
according  to  jay   M.   feinman  of the Rutgers University School of Law  ;
``  The core idea of negligence is  कि   लोगों  should  कसरत  reasonable care when  वे  act by taking account  of  the potential harm that they  might  foreseeably cause  नुक़सान  to  अन्य   लोगों  .  ''
`` those who go  personally   or   लाओ  property where they  जान  that they or  it  may  आइये  into collision with the  व्यक्तियों  or property of others  have   by  law a  ड्यूटी   डाल  upon them  to  use reasonable care and skill  to  avoid such a  टक्कर  . ''
Fletcher  v  Rylands (  [   1866  ] LR 1 Ex  265   )
Through  सिविल   वाद   ,  if an injured  व्यक्ति  proves that another person acted negligently to cause  उनके   चोट   ,  they can recover damages to  compensate   लिये  their harm  .
Proving  a  case for  लापरवाही  can  potentially   entitle  the injured plaintiff to compensation for harm  to  their body  ,  property ,  दिमागी  well-being  ,   वित्तीय  status ,  or   अंतरंग   संबंध   .
However , because  लापरवाही  cases  हैं  very  fact-specific  , this  सामान्य  definition does not fully explain the concept  of  when the law will require one  व्यक्ति   to   compensate  another for  नुकसान  caused by  आकस्मिक  injury .
Further ,  the   विधि  of negligence  at  common  विधि  is only  एक   पहलू  of the  विधि   of  liability .
Although resulting  क्षतिपूर्ति  must be proven in  अनुक्रम  to recover compensation  in  a negligence  कार्रवाई  , the  प्रकृति   और   extent  of those damages are not  the   प्राथमिक  focus  of   लापरवाही  cases .
a  melanocytic nevus ( also known  as  `` Nevocytic  nevus  ''  )  is a type of lesion that  contains   nevus  cells (  a   प्रकार   of   melanocyte  ) .
कुछ  sources equate  the  term  mole   साथ   ``  melanocytic nevus ''  .
Other sources reserve the  पद  ``  mole  ''  लिये  other  उद्देश्य   .
The majority  of  moles  appear   दौरान   the  first two  दशकों   of  a person’s  जीवन   ,  while about one in every 100 babies is born with moles .
Acquired  औज़ार  are a form  of  benign  फुलाव  , while  जन्मजात   औज़ार   ,  or  जन्मजात   nevi   ,  are considered  a  minor malformation or  hamartoma  and may  be   at  a  उच्चतर   रिस्क   लिये  melanoma .
A mole  can  be  either  subdermal ( under the skin  )  or  a   pigmented   विकास  on the  स्किन   ,   formed  mostly  of   a   प्रकार  of cell  ज्ञात  as a melanocyte .
The high  विशेषज्ञता   of   the  body’s pigmenting agent ,  मेलेनिन   ,   is  responsible for their  अंधेरा   रंग   .
Moles are  a   सदस्य  of  the   परिवार  of skin  lesions  known  as   nevi   .
the  comprehensive  metabolic  panel ,  or  chemical screen , (  cmp   ;  CPT code  80053   )   is   a  panel of 14 blood tests  जिससे  serves  as  an  आरंभिक  broad  चिकित्सा   स्क्रीनिंग  tool .
the  CMP provides a  अशिष्ट  check  of  kidney  फलन  ,  जिगर  function  ,   और   electrolyte  and  द्रव   संतुलन   ,  but  it  is far from perfect .
Abnormal values from  a  CBC  may  be  a   परिणाम   of  false positives and  यूँ  the CBC may need to be repeated  लिये  a patient (  or  replaced with  a  more  विशिष्ट  test  )   .
the   cmp  is  an  expanded version of the basic  metabolic   फलक  ( BMP  )  , which does not include  जिगर  tests .
A CMP (  or  BMP  )  can be ordered  as  part of  a  routine physical examination , or may  be  used to monitor a  रोगी   साथ   a   दीर्घकालिक  disease , such as  मधुमेह  mellitus  or   hypertension  .
Previous names for  the  panel of tests have been Chem 12 , Chemistry  फलक  ,  रसायन  screen  ,   sma   12   ,   sma   20  and SMAC  (   sequential   अनेक  Analysis  -  Computer  )   .
The  परीक्षण   हैं   performed  on  मशीने  based on the  autoanalyzer  invented  in   1957  .
Natural gas extraction by  देशों  in cubic  मीटर  per year  .
प्राकृतिक   गैस  is  a   naturally  occurring  हाइड्रोकार्बन  gas  मिश्रण  consisting primarily  of  methane  ,   लकिन   commonly   सहित   varying   amounts  of other hydrocarbons , carbon dioxide , nitrogen , and  हाइड्रोजन   sulfide  .
Natural  गैस  is an energy  सोर्स  often  प्रयुक्त   लिये  heating , cooking  ,  and electricity generation .
It is  भी   प्रयुक्त  as  ईंधन  for vehicles  और   as  a chemical feedstock  in  the  manufacture  of plastics  और  other commercially  महत्वपूर्ण  organic  रसायन  .
Natural gas  is  found in  गहन   भूमिगत   प्राकृतिक   चट्टान   formations  or  संबद्ध  with other hydrocarbon  टंकी  in coal beds and as methane clathrates .
पेट्रोलियम  is also another resource found  in   निकटता  to and  साथ   प्राकृतिक  gas .
Most natural gas  थी   निर्मित  over time  by  two mechanisms  :   biogenic  and thermogenic .
biogenic   गैस  is created by methanogenic organisms in marshes , bogs ,  landfills   ,  and shallow sediments .
Deeper  in  the  धरती  ,  at  greater temperature and pressure  ,   thermogenic  gas is created  इससे  buried organic material .
पहले   प्राकृतिक  gas  can  be  प्रयुक्त  as  a  fuel  ,  it  जरूर  undergo processing  to   हटाएँ  impurities , including water  ,   to   मिलें  the  विशेषताएँ  of marketable  प्राकृतिक  gas .
the  by-products  of  processing include ethane  ,   प्रोपेन  , butanes , pentanes , and higher molecular  वज़न   hydrocarbons  ,  हाइड्रोजन  sulfide (  जिससे  may be converted into  pure   गंधक  ) , carbon dioxide  ,  water vapor ,  और  sometimes helium and nitrogen  .
Natural  गैस   is  often informally  referred  to  बस   as   गैस   ,  especially  जब   compared   to  other energy sources such as oil  or  coal  .
इस   पेज   is   परिचय   the  Imagination  मूवर्स  band .
For  सूचना  about the TV show  अभिनीत  the  बैंड   ,   देखिए  Imagination  मूवर्स   (  TV  श्रेणी  ) .
Imagination Movers  is   a   बैंड   formed  in  नई   ऑरलियन्स   ,  Louisiana ,  in  2003 .
the  lineup includes  समृद्ध  Collins  ,  Scott Durbin ,  डेव   poche  ,  और   स्कॉट  ``  smitty   ''   स्मिथ  .
सदस्यों   of  the  समूह   यहूद   longtime   मित्रों  and neighbors  .
The group  प्रारंभ  as a  television/music   अवधारणा  which was pitched  to   लोकल  PBS  affiliates  in  नई  Orleans .
wlae-tv  was the  पहला  to take an interest in the group  और   बाद  introduced them to Beth  कोर्टनी  ,  the  President & Chief Executive Officer  at   louisiana  Public  प्रसारण   .
Soon after , LPB began  airing  one-minute  वीडियो  produced  by  the Imagination  मूवर्स  themselves .
The Movers built a sizable  क्षेत्रीय  following by setting  शैक्षणिक  songs for kids  to   melodies   और   लय  that  वयस्कों  appreciate as well .
They  बेची  more  than  100,000  नक़ल   of  their  self-produced   cds  and DVDs .
Their three indie CDs  :  ``  शुभ  Ideas  ,   ''   ``  Calling All  मूवर्स  ,  ''  and `` Eight Feet '' along with  उनके  grass  जड़ें  DVD  ``  Stir It Up '' have ,  संयुक्त   ,  won fourteen national awards  ,  from such groups as  the  National Association of  परवरिश   publications   (   nappa   )   और   अभिभावक  '  चुनाव  .
In early 2005  ,   डिज़्नी  took  सूचना  ,  और   initiated   negotiations  to add  the  Movers to the company 's roster  .
ये  were interrupted in August when the flood  सुरक्षा  designed and  निर्मित  by  the   फौज   corps   of   इंजीनियर्स   to  protect New Orleans  विफल  .
the  resulting  floodwater  claimed  the  band  's  office  ,  as well  as  the homes  of  Collins  ,   durbin   और  Poche –  लकिन  the  सौदे  was  हस्ताक्षरित  in  the   वसन्त  of 2006  .
in  2008  ,  Walt Disney  रिकॉर्ड  introduced  the  Imagination  मूवर्स   '  music to the nation with the release of  the  Movers ' first  nationally-released   cd   ,   ``  Juice Box Heroes . ''
In  सितंबर  2008 , a 30-minute show  featuring  the  समूह   began   airing  on the Disney Channel  's   प्रीस्कूल  programming  ब्लाक  known as  playhouse   डिज़्नी  , and  फिलहाल   airs  on Playhouse Disney 's  बदलना  , Disney Junior .
The  मूवर्स   लिखें  and  perform   सब  the  गीतों  on their show  .
moreover  ,  the  Imagination Movers have received critical  kudos  for their  सजीव  concert performances  .
in  October 2009  ,   the  Imagination  मूवर्स   प्रारंभ   the  `` Live from  the   विचार  Warehouse Concert Tour  2009   ''  .
traveling  from  mid-october   to  mid-December 2009  उनके   सजीव   प्रदर्शन  include lots of their  पसंदीदा  songs and dancing  ,   as  well  as   वीडियो   दिखावे   of  Warehouse Mouse .
Beginning in early-February  2011   और  wrapping  up  in  लेट  May  2011  , the  कल्पना  Movers presented their ``  in  a Big  गोदाम  Concert Tour , '' playing  अधिक  than  100  shows  in  50+  शहरों  across North America .
इससे  March to  अक्तूबर  2012  ,  the Imagination Movers toured North America  on  their  post-disney   ``  Rock-O-Matic  ''  tour .
The show  कायम  several elements of the  असली   tv  concept  ,  such  as  an on-stage ``  विचार   आपात  ''  और  several  सेट  from their  पुरानी   कैटलॉग  ; however ,  साथ   the  departure of Wendy  calio  back to her native  हवाई  , the character `` Nina  ''  , along with her musical numbers , is  नहीं  present .
the   दौरे  promotes  the   कल्पना  Movers  '  new  album/dvd  release , `` Rock-O-Matic  ''  ,  जिससे  features  सब  new music  इससे  the band  .

the   platypus   (  Ornithorhynchus anatinus  )  is  a  semiaquatic mammal endemic  to  eastern  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , including  तस्मानिया  .
Together with  the   चार  species of echidna ,  it   is  one of the  पाँच   extant   प्रजाति   of   monotremes  , the only  स्तनधारियों  that  lay  eggs  बजाय   of   giving  birth .
it   is   the   एकमात्र  living representative  of  its  परिवार  ( Ornithorhynchidae )  और  genus  (   ornithorhynchus  )  ,  though a  क्रमांक  of related  प्रजाति  have been  मिला   in  the fossil record .
the  unusual  रूप  of this  egg-laying   ,  duck -billed ,  बीवर  -tailed  ,   otter  -footed  स्तनधारी  baffled European  naturalists   जब  they  पहला  encountered it ,  साथ   कुछ   considering  it an elaborate  धोखाधड़ी  .
it  is one of  the  few  विषैला  mammals , the  पुरूष  platypus  having  a spur  on  the hind foot that delivers  a   venom   सक्षम  of  causing   कठोर  pain to humans .
the  unique features  of   the  platypus make it an important  विषय   in  the  पढ़ाई   of  evolutionary  जीवविज्ञान  and a recognisable  और   iconic   प्रतीक   of   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  ; it has  appeared  as a mascot  at   नेशनल   कार्यक्रम  and is featured on the reverse  of  its  20-cent   सिक्का   .
The platypus is  the   एनिमल  emblem  of  the  राज्य  of New  दक्षिण   वेल्स   .
जबतक   the   जल्दी  20th  सदी   ,   it  was hunted for its fur , but it is now  सुरक्षित  throughout  इसके  range .
Although captive breeding  programmes  have  था   तभी  limited success and  the   platypus  is vulnerable  to  the effects  of  pollution , it  is  not  अंतर्गत   कोई  immediate threat .
The Chupacabra  or  Chupacabras  (  , from  chupar  `` to  चूस  '' and cabra  ``   बकरी   ''  ,  वस्तुतः  ``  बकरी   चूषक   ''  ) is a  legendary  cryptid rumored to inhabit  भाग   of  the Americas .
It is associated more recently  साथ  sightings  of   an  allegedly unknown animal  in   प्यूर्टो   रीको  (  जहाँ   ये   sightings   यहूद  first reported )  ,  Mexico  ,  and  the   संयुक्त  States , especially in  the   latter  's Latin American communities  .
the  name comes from the animal 's reported habit  of   attacking  and  पीने   the   रक्त  of livestock , especially goats  .
Physical descriptions of  the  creature vary  .
Eyewitness  sightings   have   महरूम   claimed  as  जल्दी  as 1995 in Puerto Rico ,  और  have  चूंकि   महरूम  reported as  दूर  north  as  Maine  ,  and as far south as Chile , and  भी  being spotted  बाहर  the Americas in  देशों  like  रूस  and The Philippines .
It is  माना  a heavy creature  ,   the  size  of  a  छोटी   भालू   ,  with a row of  कांटे   reaching   इससे  the  गर्दन   to   the   आधार  of  the   टेल  .
Sighting reports of  the   chupacabra  have  महरूम   disregarded  as uncorroborated  or   lacking  evidence ,  जबकि   सबसे  reports in northern Mexico and the  दक्षिणी  United States have been  सत्यापित   as   canids  afflicted by mange  .
biologists   और  wildlife management  officials  view the chupacabra  as  a contemporary legend  .
The North  अमरीकी   फ़्री   व्यापार  Agreement (  nafta  )  is  an  अनुबंध   हस्ताक्षरित  by Canada ,  मैक्सिको   ,  and  the   संयुक्त  States  ,  creating a trilateral  व्यापार   bloc   in  North America  .
The agreement came into force on January  1   ,   1994  .
It superseded the Canada–United States Free Trade  अनुबंध  between  the   u.S.   ,  Canada ,  और  Mexico
NAFTA  रै   दो  supplements :  the   उत्तर  American Agreement on  पर्यावरणीय   सहयोग   (   naaec  ) and  the  North American Agreement  on  Labor  सहयोग  ( NAALC ) .
थर्मल  comfort is the condition of  दिमाग  that expresses satisfaction with the thermal environment  और  is assessed by  subjective  evaluation  (   ansi  / ASHRAE Standard 55  )  .
maintaining   इस   मानक   of   थर्मल   सुकून  for occupants  of   इमारतें   or  other  enclosures   is  one  of   the   महत्वपूर्ण  goals of  hvac  ( heating  ,   वेंटिलेशन  ,  और   एयर  conditioning  )   डिज़ाइन   इंजीनियर्स  .
The  पूर्वानुमानित  Mean Vote ( PMV )  मॉडल  stands  among  the  सबसे  recognized thermal comfort models .
It  थी  developed using principles  of  heat  संतुलन  and  प्रायोगिक  data  एकत्रित  in  a  controlled climate  कक्ष  under  स्थिर   राज्य  conditions  .
क्युकी  the PMV model was derived from data collected in  a   नियंत्रित  climate , it  is   नहीं   उपयुक्त  for applications  in  naturally ventilated  स्पेसेस  which often have high  स्तर   of  air movement .
इस  shortcoming  प्रेरित  the  विकास   of  a family  of   अनुभवजन्य   सांख्यिकीय   मॉडल   of   थर्मल  comfort  in  naturally ventilated spaces known  as  adaptive models  .
Adaptive models of  थर्मल  comfort consider  occupants   as   dynamically  interacting with  उनके   पर्यावरण   ,   और  controlling their thermal comfort by  अर्थात्  of clothing or window-opening and closing  .
This is  in  contrast to thermal  सुकून  in  sealed  buildings , in which  occupants  experience the environment  passively  .
Thermal comfort  is   प्रभावित  by  ऊष्मा  conduction ,  संवहन  , radiation  ,   और  evaporative  ऊष्मा   घाटा   .
Thermal comfort is maintained when the heat generated by human metabolism is  अनुमत  to  dissipate   ,   यूँ   maintaining  thermal equilibrium  साथ  the surroundings  .
it  has been long  पहचाना  that the  सनसनी   of  feeling hot  or  cold is  नहीं   बस   निर्भर   on  air temperature  अलोन  .
थर्मल   सुकून   calculations   according  to  ansi/ashrae  Standard 55 can be  freely  performed  साथ   the   cbe  Thermal  सुकून  Tool for ASHRAE-55  .
Durante  degli   एलीगियरी  ,  बस  referred to  as   दांते   (  , ;  ;  c.  1265–1321  ) ,  थी  a major Italian poet  of  the  मध्य  Ages  .
His Divine  कॉमेडी  ,  originally   पुकारा   '   और  later  पुकारा   '   by  Boccaccio  ,  is  widely   माना  the  महानतम  literary work composed in the Italian  भाषा  and a masterpiece  of  world literature .
In Italy he  is  known as ' ( `` the  परम्  Poet '' )  or   बस  '  .
he   ,   petrarch  and Boccaccio  हैं  also known  as  `` the  तीन   स्रोतों   ''  or  ``  the  तीन  crowns  ''   .
Dante  is   भी   पुकारा  the `` Father of  the   इतालवी  language '' .
Headquarters  (  Kobe ,  जापानी   )
(  )   is   a  tire and rubber company based in Japan  .
it  is part  of   the   sumitomo  Group  .
The  कम्पनी  traces its origins  to  1909 , when  the  Sumitomo Group made  an  investment  in  Dunlop Japan ,  the   newly  formed Japanese  subsidiary   of  the British  कम्पनी  Dunlop Rubber .
Over  the  years Sumitomo  और   dunlop  developed a close business relationship  ,  and  in   1963  the  sumitomo   समूह  acquired control of Dunlop  जापानी  and renamed  it  Sumitomo Rubber Industries Ltd .
in  1985 ,  जब   dunlop  Rubber was taken over by BTR plc , the company  acquired  the automobile  टायर  assets  of   dunlop  , including the  सही   to   उपयोग  the Dunlop brand on automobile tires  .
The acquisition  किया  not include the  us  and  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  businesses ,  जिससे  were separately owned  ,  but  in   1986  Sumitomo also acquired the  dunlop   टायर   निगम   of   the  US from  इसके  management  .
in   1997  , Sumitomo  formed   a  joint venture  साथ  Goodyear Tire and  रबर  Company , by which  goodyear   और   sumitomo  agreed  to   manufacture  tires for each other  's  markets , including  dunlop   ब्रांडेड  tires  .
As part of  the  agreement , Goodyear  acquired   75   %  interests in Dunlop Tyres ,  the   uk  company which Sumitomo  था   formed  , and  in   dunlop   टायर   निगम   .
Goodyear and Sumitomo also  बना  investments  in   प्रत्येक  other .
आज   ,   the   कम्पनी  makes  a   चौड़ी  range of rubber  आधारित  products , including automobile  टायर   ,  golf balls and tennis balls  .
microsoft  Visual  स्टुडियो   एक्स्प्रेस   is  a  नियत   of   फ्रीवेयर   एकीकृत   विकास  environments  (   आईडीई   )  developed  by   microsoft  that  हैं  lightweight  संस्करण   of   the   microsoft  Visual Studio  उत्पाद   लकीर  .
Express  संस्करण   यहूद  conceived  शुरूआत   साथ   विज़ुअल  Studio  2005  .
The  विचार  of Express editions is to provide streamlined , easy-to-use  और  easy-to-learn IDEs  लिये  users other than  पेशेवर  software developers , such as  hobbyists   और  students .
the  Alps are  एक   of  the  ग्रेट  mountain range systems  of  Europe stretching approximately  आरपार  eight Alpine countries from  ऑस्ट्रिया  and Slovenia in  the   ईस्ट  ,  स्विट्ज़रलैंड   ,   liechtenstein  ,  जर्मनी  ,  फ़्रांस  to the west  और  Italy and Monaco to the  दक्षिण  .
The mountains were  formed  over hundreds  of   लाखो  of years as  the   अफ़्रीकी  and  यूरेशियाई  tectonic plates collided .
Extreme shortening  caused   by   the  event resulted  in   समुद्री  sedimentary rocks  उठती  by  thrusting  and  फोल्डिंग  into  ऊँची  mountain peaks such  as  Mont  blanc   और  the  matterhorn  .
Mont Blanc spans  the   french–italian  border  ,   और   at  is the highest  पहाड़  in  the  Alps .
The Alpine  प्रदेश   क्षेत्रफल   contains  many  चोटियों  higher than  ,   ज्ञात   as  the `` four-thousanders `` .
the  altitude and  आकार   of   the   दायरा   affects  the climate  in   यूरोपीय  ; in the mountains precipitation levels vary  greatly  and  climatic   शर्तें  consist of  पृथक  zones  .
Wildlife such as ibex live in  the  higher  चोटियों   to  elevations of  ,  and  पौधे   ऐसे  as Edelweiss grow  in   रॉकी   क्षेत्रों   in  lower  elevations  as  खूब  as  in   उच्चतर  elevations .
Evidence of human  habitation  in the  ऐल्प्स  goes  वापस   to   the  Paleolithic  era   .
A mummified man  ,  determined to be 5,000 years old  ,   थी   खोजा  on a  हिमानी   at   the   austrian–italian  border in 1991 .
By the 6th century BC , the  सेल्टिक  La  tène   संस्कृति   थी  well established .
hannibal  may have crossed the  ऐल्प्स  with a  झुंड   of  elephants  ,  and the Romans had  settlements  in  the   प्रदेश  .
In 1800 Napoleon  crossed   एक  of  the   पहाड़   गुजरता   साथ   an   फौज  of  40,000  .
The 18th and  19th  centuries saw an  influx   of  naturalists  ,  writers  ,   और   कलाकारों  , in  particular  the Romantics , followed  by   the  golden age of alpinism  as   mountaineers  began to ascend the peaks .
In World War  ii  the  तीसरा   reich  invaded the  अल्पाइन   देशों  ,  साथ   the   एक्सेप्शन  of  स्विट्ज़रलैंड  and  liechtenstein  ; Adolf  हिटलर  kept a base of operation in  the  Bavarian Alps throughout the war  .
The Alpine region has a  दमदार   सांस्कृतिक   पहचान   .
The  परंपरागत   संस्कृति  of farming , cheesemaking , and woodworking still  exists   in  Alpine villages  ,  although the tourist  उद्योग   began   to  grow early in  the  20th  सदी   और   विस्तारित  greatly  बाद  World War  ii  to become the dominant  उद्योग  by the end of the century  .
The Winter Olympic Games  have   महरूम  hosted in the  स्विस  , French , Italian ,  आस्ट्रिया   और  German Alps  .
At  उपस्थित   the  region is home to  14  million  लोगों   और  has 120  लाख  annual visitors .
लोइस  Patrice Griffin ( née Pewterschmidt ) is  a  character from the animated television series Family Guy  .
She  is   voiced   by  writer  एलेक्स  Borstein and first appeared on  टेलीविज़न  , along  साथ  the  बाकी   of   the   परिवार  in  the   15-minute  short on December 20  ,   1998  .
Lois was created and designed by series creator Seth  macfarlane  .
MacFarlane  थी  asked  to   पिच  a  पायलट  to  the  Fox Broadcasting Company based  on  Larry  और   स्टीव  , a short made by  macfarlane  which featured a  middle-aged  character named Larry  और   an  intellectual dog , Steve .
बाद  the  पायलट  was  दिए  the green light  ,   the  Griffin family  appeared  on the  एपीसोड   ``   मौत  Has a  छाया   ``  .
Lois is the mother of  the   griffin  family  .
साथ  her husband  पीटर  , she has  था  three  children  :  मेग  ,  क्रिस  , and Stewie .
Lois is  प्रायः   portrayed  as  a  stereotypical television mother  ,  despite  उसके  admitting  to  being  a   ड्रग  user  ,  a recovering meth addict kleptomaniac .
Lois  रै  also had several affairs  ,  one of  जिससे   allegedly  resulted in the conception of Meg  .
She  रै  appeared  in  other media  relating   to  Family  guy—including   a   वीडियो  game ,  commercials  and books—and  प्रेरित  an entire  लकीर  of merchandise  .
लोइस   's  distinctive  नई  York accent  originated   इससे  a character in a stage show that  एलेक्स   borstein   था  performed in , which  थी   largely  inspired by  a  relative who grew up on  long   द्वीप   ,  New  यॉर्क   .
परिवार   हस्तांतरण   of   बास्क  language ( Basque as initial  भाषा  )
Percentage  of  students  पंजीकृत  in Basque language schools  (   2000–2005  )  .
Location of the Basque-language  प्रांतों  within Spain  और   फ़्रांस
बास्क  (  endonym  : , ) is the ancestral  भाषा   of  the Basque people  ,  who  inhabit   the   बास्क  Country  ,  a region spanning  an  area in northeastern Spain and  southwestern   फ़्रांस   .
It  is   बोला  by 27  %   of  Basques  in  all territories ( 714,136  आउट  of 2,648,998  )   .
Of these ,  663,035   सजीव  in  the  Spanish  भाग  of the Basque country  और  the remaining 51,100 live  in  the French  भाग  .
In academic discussions  of  the  वितरण   of  Basque  in   स्पेन  and  फ़्रांस  , it is customary  to   refer  to  तीन   प्राचीन  provinces  in  France  और   चार  Spanish provinces .
देशी   अध्यक्षों  are  concentrated  in a contiguous area  सहित   भाग  of the  स्पेनी   autonomous  communities of  the   बास्क  Country  और  Navarre  और   in  the  पश्चिमी  half of  the  French département of Pyrénées-Atlantiques .
The Basque  autonomous   जातियाँ   is   an  administrative  एंटिटी   भीतर  the binational  ethnographic  Basque Country incorporating the  परंपरागत  Spanish provinces  of   biscay  , Gipuzkoa ,  और   álava  ,  जिससे   retain  their  अस्तित्व  as  politico-administrative   विभाजन  .
ये  provinces  और  many areas  of  Navarre are heavily  आबादी  by  जातीय  Basques  ,  but  बास्क  was , at  तनिक  until  the  1990s , not spoken  as  a native language in most  of  Álava , western parts  of  Biscay and central and southern areas  of   नावारा   ,  either because  it  had been replaced by Spanish  साथ  the centuries , in  कुछ  areas  ,  or  क्युकी   it  had  never  been  बोला  there , in other  क्षेत्रों  .
In southwestern France , the  प्राचीन  Basque-populated  प्रांतों  were  labourd  ,  निम्नतर  Navarre , and  soule  .
वे  and other  regions   यहूद   संचित   into  a  सिंगल  département  in  1790 under the name Basses-Pyrénées ,  a  name which persisted  जबतक   1970  .
A standardized form  of  the Basque language  ,  called Euskara Batua  ,   थी   विकसित  by the  बास्क  Language Academy  in  the  लेट   1960s  .
Euskara Batua  थी  created  so  that  बास्क   भाषा   could  be used—and easily understood by  सब   बास्क  speakers—in  औपचारिक   परिस्थितियों  ( education  ,  mass media , literature  )   ,   और   इस  is its  प्रमुख  use today .
the   भूमिका   of   इस  standard Basque  भाषा   depends  on  the  linguistic educational  मॉडल   of   प्रत्येक  region  और   प्रत्येक  school  .
In most areas of the Spanish  बास्क   देश   ,  the  शैक्षणिक   मॉडल   d  , where  सब  subjects are  सिखाया  in  बास्क  , except `` Spanish  भाषा  and  साहित्य   ''  ( which is taught  in  Spanish  )   is  now the  predominant  model  .
In France  ,   the  Basque language school  seaska  and the association for a  दुभाषिया  ( Basque and French ) schooling  ikasbi  meet a wide  दायरा  of Basque language educational  needs  up to the  छठे  Form ,  जबकि   प्रायः  struggling  to  surmount  वित्तीय  and  प्रशासनिक   constraints  .
Apart from  इस  standardized version  ,   वहीँ  are  पाँच  main  बास्क  dialects  :  Bizkaian ,  gipuzkoan  , and Upper Navarrese in Spain , and Navarrese–Lapurdian  और  Zuberoan (  in  France )  .
Although they  लो   उनके  names  इससे  the mentioned historic  प्रांतों   ,  the  dialect   सीमाएँ   हैं   नहीं  congruent  साथ  province boundaries .
The President , Directors and Company  ,   of  the Bank of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  , commonly  ज्ञात  as the First Bank of the United  राज्य  , was  a   सेंट्रल   बैंको  ,  चार्टर्ड   लिये  a  पद  of twenty years  ,  by the  संयुक्त  States  कॉंग्रेस   on  February  25  , 1791 .
Establishment of  the  Bank was  शामिल   in  a three-part  विस्तार  of federal  फिस्कल   और   मौद्रिक   शक्ति  (  साथ  with a federal mint  और  excise  कर   )   championed   by  Alexander Hamilton , first  सचिव  of  the  Treasury  .
Hamilton believed a central  बैंको  was  जरुरी  to stabilize  और  improve  the   स्वदेश  's credit  ,   और   to   improve  handling of the  वित्तीय  business of the  संयुक्त  States  सरकारी  under the newly  enacted   संविधान  .
Officially proposed to the first session  of   the   पहला   कॉंग्रेस  in 1790  ,   हैमिल्टन  's  बैंको   faced  widespread resistance from opponents  of  increased federal  शक्ति   .
Secretary of  राज्य   थामस   जेफरसन  and  जेम्स  Madison led  the  opposition ,  जिससे  claimed  कि   the  bank was  असंवैधानिक   ,   और   कि  it  benefited  merchants and investors  at   the  expense of the majority  of   the   जनसांख्यिकी  .
The First Bank  भवन  is  अभी   a  National Historic Landmark  स्तिथ  in  फिलाडेल्फिया   ,  Pennsylvania  भीतर  Independence  नेशनल  Historical  पार्क  .
James  वेस्ले   marsters   (  born  अगस्त  20 , 1962 ) is an American actor  और  musician .
Marsters first came  to  the  ध्यान   of  the  सामान्य  public playing  the  popular character  स्पाइक   ,  a  platinum-blond  yobbish English  पिशाच   in   the   टेलीविज़न   श्रेणी   buffy   the  Vampire  slayer  and its spin-off  श्रेणी  , Angel  ,   इससे   1997  to  2004   .
Since then , he  रै   गए  on  to   खेल  other science  fiction  roles , such as  the   एलियन   supervillain   brainiac  on the  सुपरमैन  -inspired  श्रेणी  Smallville  ,  the  omnisexual   समय   मुसाफ़िर   कप्तान   जॉन  Hart  in  British science-fiction show Torchwood and terrorist  barnabas  Greeley in Sci fi 's Caprica .
Marsters  appeared   in  a supporting role in the 2007  फिल्म   p.s  .
i  Love You  और  as the main antagonist  ,  Piccolo  ,   in  the 2009  काल्पनिक  adventure film  dragonball  Evolution .
he  appeared  as   a   पुनरावर्ती  character in the first season of the revival of Hawaii  5-0   .
in  molecular biology ,  इंसान  chorionic  gonadotropin  (  hcg   )  is a hormone  उत्पादित  by  the   निषेचित  egg  बाद  conception .
बाद   दौरान  pregnancy  it  is made  by   the  developing  placenta  , and later by  the  placental component syncytiotrophoblast  .
Some cancerous tumors  उपज  this hormone ; therefore  ,  elevated levels  measured   जब  the patient is not pregnant  can   सीसे  to  a  cancer  निदान  .
However , it is  नहीं  known whether  इस  production  is  a  contributing  cause  or   an  effect of tumorigenesis  .
the   pituitary  analogue  of  hCG  ,   ज्ञात   as  luteinizing hormone ( LH )  ,   is   उत्पादित   in  the  pituitary  gland of males and  महिलाओं  of all ages  .
,  the  एफडीए  has  निषिद्ध   the   बिक्री  of `` homeopathic ''  और   over   the  counter hCG diet  उत्पाद  and  घोषित  them fraudulent and  illegal  .
Beyoncé Giselle Knowles-Carter , known by her stage  नाम  Beyoncé  (  ; born September  4  ,  1981   )  , is an American singer  ,  songwriter , dancer , and actress .
Born and raised in Houston  ,  Texas , she performed in singing and dancing  प्रतियोगिताओं  as  a  child  पहले  forming  in  1990  a  group with  केली   rowland  and LaTavia  roberson  that was  आखिरकार  named Destiny  's  Child .
Once signed to Columbia  रिकॉर्ड  ,  the   लड़कियों   subsequently  became one of the world  's  best-selling  लड़की  groups of  सब  time  .
the   समूह  was plagued by internal  विरोध   और  legal  turmoil   और   नॉलेस  suffered  इससे   अवसाद   कि   lasted   लिये   a  number of  सालो  .
During the group 's  अंतराल  ,  नॉलेस   released   उसके   डेब्यू  solo album Dangerously  in  Love ( 2003 ) , which earned her five Grammy Awards and  रै  sold  a  total of 4.9  लाख  copies in the US alone .
it   शाखित   बिलबोर्ड  number  एक  singles `` Crazy  in   प्रेम   ,  '' considered by  vh1   to   be   the   ``  Greatest Song Of the  00   's  ,  ''   और  `` Baby  लड़के  .  ''
Following  the   disbandment  of Destiny  's   चाइल्ड  in  2005  , Knowles 's  दूसरी  solo  एल्बम  B'Day ( 2006 ) contained  the  top  पाँच  singles  ``   déjà  Vu `` ,  ``  Irreplaceable `` ,  और   ``  Beautiful Liar  ``   .
Her performance  in  Dreamgirls ( 2006  )  earned her two Golden  ग्लोब   nominations  .
Knowles  '   कार्य   playing  Etta James in that  फिल्मी   प्रेरित   उसके  subsequent  एल्बम  I Am  ...
Sasha Fierce ( 2008  )  which  शाखित   हिट्स  `` If I Were a  लड़के  ``  ,   ``  Single Ladies ( Put a Ring  on  It ) ``  ,   ``  Halo `` ,  और  `` Sweet  सपनो  `` .
The  एल्बम   भी   helped  Knowles earn six  grammys  in  2010   ,   तोड़कर  the record  लिये   सबसे  Grammy Awards won  by   a  female  कलाकार   in   एक  night .
Her fourth album  4  (  2011   )   deviated  towards traditional R & B and became her fourth consecutive number one  एल्बम  on the  बिलबोर्ड  200  .
In January  2012   ,   नॉलेस  gave birth to daughter Blue Ivy  कार्टर  ,  उसके   पहला  child  साथ  husband Jay-Z .
Knowles has  बेची  over  13  million albums  in   the  US  और  118  लाख   रिकॉर्ड  worldwide ( as well as a further 50 million  रिकॉर्ड   साथ   नियति  's  चाइल्ड  ) ,  और  is  एक   of  the  best-selling  music  कलाकारों  of  सब   समय  .
the   रिकॉर्डिंग   उद्योग   संघ   of  America ( RIAA  )  recognized  नॉलेस  as the Top  certified  Artist of the  2000s   .
In  2009  , Billboard named her the Top Radio Songs Artist of  the  decade and ranked her  the   शीर्ष   मादा   कलाकार  and  the  fourth Artist of the Decade  .
Beyoncé  नॉलेस  is the most nominated  स्त्री   in  Grammy Award history  ,   receiving   17  awards  ;   अन्य   accolades  include 12 MTV Video  म्यूज़िक  Awards , 7 Billboard Awards including a  मिलेनियम   पुरस्कार  , and a  स्टार  on the Hollywood Walk of  कीर्ति   as   भाग   of  Destiny  's   चाइल्ड  .
`` Angry  सब   the  Time '' is  the   शीर्षक   of  a song written by  ब्रूस  Robison  और   पहला  recorded on  उसके  1998  एल्बम  Wrapped .
it  was later covered  by   टिम   mcgraw   साथ   अतिथि   vocalist   आस्था  Hill .
released   in  July  2001   ,   mcgraw   's   संस्करण  was the second  सिंगल  from  mcgraw  's  नियत   इस  Circus Down album  .
The  सोंग   पहुँचे  Number  एक   on  the Billboard  hot   देश  Singles  &   ट्रैक्स   (   अभी  Hot Country Songs ) charts .
डिअर  John  is  a  2010  American romantic  नाटक  -  युद्ध  film starring  अमांडा   seyfried   और   चेनिंग   टैटम  .
it  was released theatrically  in  North  अमेरिका  on  फ़रवरी   5  , 2010 .
the   फिल्मी  was directed by Lasse Hallström ,  और  it  is   an   अनुकूलन   of  Nicholas  स्पार्क्स  's  अनोखा  of the same name  .
it   फ़ॉलो   the  life of a soldier ( Channing  टैटम  ) after he  जलप्रपात  in love with a young woman (  अमांडा  Seyfried  )  .
वे  decide  to  exchange letters to  प्रत्येक   अन्य   बाद  he is deployed to  the  war  .
the  movie was  फिल्माया   in  2009  in  Charleston  ,  South Carolina .

hartsfield–jackson  Atlanta  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   विमानक्षेत्र  is the  व्यस्ततम  single airport  in  the United States  .

Santa Fe (  ;  ( Tewa : Ogha  po'oge   ,  )  )  is the  पूंजी   of   the   u.S.  state of  नई  Mexico .
It  is  the fourth-largest  नगर  in the state and is  the  seat  of   .
Santa Fe ( meaning “holy  faith”   in  Spanish )  था   a   जनसांख्यिकी  of  67,947  in  the  2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
It  is   the  principal  नगर   of  a  महानगर  Statistical Area which encompasses all  of  Santa Fe  काउंटी  and  is  part of the larger Albuquerque-Santa Fe-Las Vegas  संयुक्त   सांख्यिकीय   क्षेत्रफल   .
the  city’s  पूरा   नाम  when  संस्थापित  was La  विला  Real de  la  Santa  fé  de San Francisco de  asís   (  “The Royal Town  of   the  Holy Faith  of  St.  फ्रांसिस  of Assisi”  )  .
Pepsi ( stylized in  लोअरकेस   as  pepsi  ,   formerly  stylized  in   अपरकेस   as  PEPSI  )  is a carbonated soft drink  कि  is  उत्पादित  and manufactured  by  PepsiCo  .
Created  और  developed in 1893 and  introduced  as Brad 's Drink , it was renamed  as  Pepsi-Cola  on  August 28  ,   1898  ,  तब   to   पेप्सी  in  1961  .
1765 Broadside
The  बेटे  of  स्वतंत्रता  was  a   समूह   consisting  of American patriots that  originated   in   the  pre-independence North  अमरीकी   अंग्रेजों  colonies  .
the   समूह  was  formed   to  protect the  अधिकारों  of the  colonists  and  to   लो  to the streets  विरूद्ध  the taxes  by  the British government  .
They  हैं  best  ज्ञात   लिये   undertaking   the  Boston  चाय   पार्टी   in  1773  ,   जिससे   led   to   the  Intolerable  अधिनियमों   (  an intense crackdown  by   the   अंग्रेजों  government  )  , and a counter-mobilization by the Patriots  .
Osaka castle
is a city  in  the Kansai region of  जापानी  's  प्रमुख  island  of  Honshu , a designated city under the Local Autonomy  विधि  , the capital city of  ओसाका   प्रीफ़ेक्चर   और  also the largest part of the  keihanshin   metropolis   ,  which comprises three major cities  of  Japan ,  क्योटो  , Osaka  और  Kobe  .
स्तिथ   at  the  मुँह  of the  yodo   नदी  on Osaka Bay , Osaka is  जापानी  's third  largest  city by population after  टोकियो   (  special  wards  ) and  yokohama   .
Keihanshin is the  दूसरी  largest metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  in Japan by population and  एक   of  the largest metropolitan areas highly  क्रमित  in the world  ,   साथ  nearly  19  million people ,  और  by GDP  the   दूसरी  largest  क्षेत्रफल  in Japan and  the  seventh  largest  area  in   the  world .
Historically  the   वाणिज्यिक  center of Japan , Osaka  कृत्यों  as  एक  of the  कमांड   centers  for the  जापानी   अर्थव्यवस्था  .
the   अनुपात  between daytime  और  night time  जनसांख्यिकी   is  141 % ,  the  highest  in  Japan ,  highlighting  its status as an  आर्थिक   बीच  .
Its nighttime population is 2.6  लाख   ,   the   तीसरा  in the  देश   ,   लकिन   in  daytime the population  surges  to  3.7  million  ,  second only  बाद  Tokyo ( combining the special wards  of   टोकियो   ,  which is not  a   सिंगल  incorporated city ,  लिये  statistical purposes ; see the  टोकियो   आलेख   लिये  more  सूचना   on   the  definition  और  makeup  of  Tokyo )  .
ओसाका  used  to  be referred to  as   the  in  सामंती  Edo  काल   क्युकी   it  was the centre of trading for  राइस  , creating the  पहला   आधुनिक   futures   एक्सचेंज   मार्केट   in   the   संसार   .
the  Little Mermaid  is   a  1989 American  एनिमेटेड   musical  fantasy film produced  by  Walt  डिज़्नी   विशेषता   एनिमेशन   और   वितरित   by  Walt  डिज़्नी   तस्वीरें   .
Based on the Danish  परी  tale by  hans   ईसाई  Andersen , The Little Mermaid tells the story of a beautiful mermaid who dreams of  बनने  human .
Written , directed ,  और  produced by  रॉन  Clements  और  John  musker  , with music  by  Alan Menken  और  Howard Ashman  ,  the  फिल्मी  features the  आवाज़ें  Jodi Benson  ,  Christopher Daniel Barnes  ,   पैट  Carroll ,  सैमुएल  E. Wright ,  जेसन   मारिन  , Kenneth  मंगल  , Buddy  hacket   ,   और  Rene Auberjonois .
The 28th  फिल्मी  in  the   वॉल्ट   डिज़्नी  Animated Classics series  ,  The Little  मरमेड  was  released   to   थिएटर  on November 14  ,   1989  to largely  धनात्मक  reviews , garnering $ 84  लाख  at  the   बक्सा  office during  इसके   आरंभिक  release  ,  and  $  211 million in  कुल  lifetime gross  .
बाद  the success of the  1988  Disney  /  Amblin film Who  framed   रोजर  Rabbit , The Little Mermaid  is   दिए  credit  लिये   श्वास  life back into the  आर्ट   of   डिज़्नी  animated  विशेषता  films after a string of critical  or  commercial  असफलताओं   उत्पादित  by Disney  कि   दिनाँक   वापस   to   the  early  1970s  .
It  भी  marked  the   प्रारंभ  of the era  ज्ञात   as   the   डिज़्नी   पुनर्जागरण   .
A  स्टेज  adaptation of the  फिल्मी  with a  किताब  by Doug  राइट  and additional  गीतों  by Alan Menken  और  new  गीतों   ग्लेन  Slater opened in Denver in  जुलाई  2007 and began performances on Broadway January 10  ,  2008  .

Purple drank  is   a   कठबोली  term for  a   recreational  drug  लोकप्रिय  in the hip  हॉप   जातियाँ   in  the  दक्षिणी   संयुक्त  States , originating in Houston , Texas .
Its main  संघटक  is  नुस्खा  -strength cough  सिरप  containing codeine and promethazine  .
Cough syrup  is   typically   मिश्रित   साथ  ingredients such  as   sprite  soft drink or Mountain Dew and pieces of  प्रसन्न   rancher  candy .
the  purplish  वर्ण  of purple  पिया  comes from  dyes  in the cough syrup .
वहीँ   हैं  numerous  कठबोली  terms for purple drank  ,  including  sizzurp   ,  lean , syrup ,  पिया  , barre  ,  purple  जेली   ,  Texas tea  ,   और  Tsikuni  .
first/given  , middle ,  और  last/family/surname diagram  साथ  J. S. Bach as example  .
J.  S. Bach shared his given  नाम  with six  तात्कालिक   परिवार   सदस्यों   और  many  विस्तारित  family  सदस्यों  .
he  shared his family name with most  परिवार  members .
a  given name  ,   in  Western contexts often referred  to   as  a first name ,  is  a personal name that specifies  और   differentiates  between  सदस्यों   of  a group of  individuals   ,  especially in a  परिवार   ,  all of whose members usually share the same  परिवार   नाम   (   उपनाम  )  .
A  दिए  name  is  purposefully given  ,   प्रायः   by   a  child  's  parents  at  or  निकट  birth  ,   in   कंट्रास्ट  to an  inherited   एक   ऐसे   as  a family  नाम  .
a  given name  is   sometimes   legally  changed through a  नाम  change .
दिए   names  are often used  in  a  परिचित  and  दोस्ताना   manner  in  अनौपचारिक   परिस्थितियों   .
in  more  औपचारिक   परिस्थितियों  the  उपनाम  is  प्रयुक्त  instead  ,   जबतक   it  is necessary to distinguish between people with the  वही  surname  .
The idiom  ``   on  a  first-name   आधार  '' ( or ``  on   first-name   शर्तें   ''   )   alludes  to the  अपनेपन   of   संबोधित   another  by a given name .
the   पश्चिमी   स्टाइल   of   having   दोनो  a family  नाम   (  surname  )   और  a given  नाम  is far  इससे  universal .
In  अनेक  countries it is  आम  for ordinary people to  have  only one  नाम  ( a mononym  )   .
Hydrochloric acid is  a  clear  ,   colourless   समाधान  of hydrogen chloride  (  H  cl  )  in   जल   .
it  is  a  highly corrosive  ,  strong  खनिज  acid with many  औद्योगिक  uses .
हाइड्रोक्लोरिक  acid is found naturally in gastric acid .
Historically  पुकारा   muriatic  acid ,  और   आत्माओं  of salt  ,  hydrochloric  एसिड  was produced from  vitriol  (  sulfuric  acid  )  and  आम   नमक   .
it   पहला  appeared during the  पुनर्जागरण   ,   और  then it was  प्रयुक्त   by   chemists  such as  glauber  , Priestley  और  Davy in  उनके  scientific  शोध   .
साथ   प्रमुख  production starting  in  the Industrial Revolution  ,   हाइड्रोक्लोरिक   एसिड   is   प्रयुक्त   in  the  रासायनिक   उद्योग  as a chemical reagent in the large-scale  उत्पादन   of  vinyl chloride  लिये  PVC plastic  ,  and  mdi  / TDI for polyurethane  .
it  has numerous smaller-scale applications  ,   सहित   household  cleaning , production of gelatin and other food  एडिटिव  , descaling , and leather processing .
About  20  million  टन  of hydrochloric acid  हैं  produced annually .
Wheat  (  Triticum  spp  . )  is   a   खाद्यान्न  grain  ,  originally from the Levant region of the  निकट   ईस्ट  and Ethiopian Highlands , but  अभी  cultivated worldwide .
In  2010  ,  संसार  production of  गेहूं   थी  651  लाख  tons , making  it  the third most-produced cereal  बाद  maize  (   844  million tons ) and rice ( 672 million tons  )   .
गेहूं   थी  the  दूसरी   most-produced   खाद्यान्न  in 2009 ; world production  in  that year  थी   682   लाख  tons ,  बाद   मक्का  ( 817 million tons )  ,  and with  राइस   as  a close third (  679  million  टन  )  .
This grain is  grown   on  more land area than  कोई  other commercial  खाना   .
संसार   व्यापार  in wheat is  वृहद  than for all  अन्य   फसलों  combined .
globally   ,   गेहूं   is   the   अग्रणी  source of  सब्ज़ी  protein  in  human  खाना   ,  having  a   उच्चतर  protein content than soybeans  or  the other  प्रमुख   cereals  ,  मक्का   (  corn ) or  राइस   .
In terms  of  total production  tonnages  used  लिये  food , it is  फिलहाल   दूसरी   to  rice as the main human  खाना   क्रॉप   और   ahead  of maize ,  बाद  allowing for maize 's  अधिक  extensive use in animal feeds .
गेहूं   थी  a  कुंजी   फ़ैक्टर   enabling   the   emergence   of   city-based  societies at the  प्रारंभ  of civilization because  it  was  एक   of  the first crops  कि  could be  easily  cultivated  on  a  विशाल   स्केल  ,  और   था  the additional advantage  of   yielding   a  harvest that provides long-term  भंडार   of  food .
गेहूं   contributed   to  the emergence of city-states  in   the   fertile   crescent   ,  including the  babylonian   और   assyrian  empires .
Wheat grain is  a   स्टेपल  food used  to  make flour for  leavened  , flat  और  steamed  breads   ,  biscuits , cookies  ,  cakes  ,   नाश्ता  cereal ,  पास्ता  , noodles  ,  couscous  और  for  fermentation   to   मेक  beer , other  alcoholic  beverages  ,   or   biofuel  .
गेहूं  is planted to a  सीमित  extent as a  forage  crop for  पशुधन   ,  and  इसके  straw can  be   प्रयुक्त  as  a   निर्माण  material  लिये   roofing  thatch  .
The whole grain can  be   milled  to leave  बस  the  भ्रूणपोष   लिये  white flour .
the   by-products  of this  हैं   चोकर  and germ  .
The whole grain is a  concentrated  source of vitamins  ,   खनिज  , and protein  ,  while the refined  अनाज  is mostly  मंड   .
Printing
To  प्रकाशित   is  to make content available to the general  पब्लिक   .
जबकि  specific  उपयोग  of the  पद  may vary among countries  ,  it is  प्रायः  applied to  टेक्स्ट  , images  ,  or other audio-visual  सामग्री   on  any traditional  मीडियम   ,   सहित  paper ( newspapers ,  मैगज़ीन   ,   कैटलॉग   ,  etc . ) .
The word  प्रकाशन  means the  अधिनियम  of publishing ,  और   भी   refers   to  any printed copies .
मेलिसा  & Joey is an ABC Family original television series  अभिनीत  Melissa  जोन   हार्ट   और  Joey  लॉरेंस  .
it  first aired on  एबीसी  Family on  अगस्त  17 , 2010 .
The series  फ़ॉलो  local  राजनेता   mel   बुर्के  (  मेलिसा   जोन  Hart  )  and Joe Longo ( Joey Lawrence  )   ,  whom Mel hires  to   dekh   बाद   उसके   भांजी   और   भतीजे  after a Ponzi  योजना  leaves him  broke  .
the   श्रेणी  was renewed by  एबीसी  Family for  a  second  ऋतु   of  fifteen episodes , which  began  airing on  may  30  ,   2012  and  ended  on August 29  ,   2012   .
मेलिसा  & Joey  बाँधने   as  cable TV  's   #   1  telecast  at  8  o'clock  across  निशाना  audiences  18–34   ,  18–49  और  12–34  जनसांख्यिकी  .

The Dharma wheel  ,   प्रायः  used to represent the Noble Eightfold Path
the   प्रतिष्ठित   eightfold   पाथ   (  , ) is one of the principal teachings  of   the  Buddha  ,   जो  described  it   as  the way  अग्रणी   to   the  cessation of suffering (  dukkha   )   और   the   उपलब्धि  of  self-awakening  .
It is used to develop insight into the true nature  of  phenomena (  or  reality )  और  to  eradicate   लोभ  , hatred , and  भ्रांति   .
the  Noble  eightfold  Path  is  the  चौथी  of the Buddha 's Four  प्रतिष्ठित  Truths ; the first element  of  the Noble Eightfold  पाथ  is , in turn  ,  an understanding of the Four Noble  सच्चाई   .
It  is   भी  known as the  मध्य  Path or Middle  रास्ता   .
सब   आठ  elements  of  the  पाथ  begin  साथ  the word  ``  right ''  ,  which  translates  the word  samyañc   (  in Sanskrit  )  or sammā  (  in  pāli  ) .
These denote  पूर्णता  , togetherness , and coherence ,  और  can  भी   सुझाएँ  the  होश   of  `` perfect  ''  or `` ideal  ''  .
'samma  ' is also  अनूदित  as `` wholesome '' , `` wise ''  और   ``  skillful '' .
In  बौद्ध  symbolism  ,   the  Noble  eightfold   पाथ  is often represented  by  means of the  धर्मं  wheel (  dharmachakra   )   ,  whose eight  तीलियां  represent  the  eight elements  of   the   पाथ  .
the  Grammy Award for  सोंग  of the Year is an  सम्मान  presented at  the  Grammy Awards  ,  a  रस्म  that was established in 1958 and originally  पुकारा  the  gramophone   पुरस्कार   .
Awards  in   अनेक   श्रेणी  are distributed  annually  by the  नेशनल  Academy of  रिकॉर्डिंग   कला   और  Sciences of the  संयुक्त   राज्य   to   ``   सम्मान  artistic achievement , technical proficiency  और   overall  excellence in  the  recording industry ,  बगैर   लिहाज़  to  एल्बम  sales  or  chart position . ''
अर्थशास्त्र  is the social science  कि   analyzes  the production  ,  distribution ,  और  consumption  of  goods  और  services  .
The term economics  आता  from  the  Ancient Greek (  '   ,  ``  प्रबन्धन  of a  household   ,  administration  ''   )   इससे   (   '  , ``  हाउस  '' ) + ( ' ,  ``  custom '' or  ``  law '' )  ,  hence  ``  rules  of   the  house  (  hold )  ''  .
Political economy was the  पहले   नाम  for the  विषय   ,  but economists in the late  19th   सदी   सुझाया   ``   अर्थशास्त्र   ''  as  a  shorter term for `` economic  विज्ञान   ''   कि  also avoided  a  narrow  political-interest  connotation and as  समान   in   रूप  to ``  गणित  `` , ``  आचार  ''  ,   और   so  forth .
a   फ़ोकस  of the subject is how  आर्थिक   एजेंटों   व्यवहार   or  interact  और  how economies  कार्य   .
सतत  with this ,  a  primary  textbook  distinction is between microeconomics and macroeconomics .
Microeconomics examines the  बर्ताव   of   मौलिक   तत्व  in the economy  ,   सहित  individual agents  (  such as  households   और   firms   or  as  खरीदार   और  sellers  )   और  markets , and  उनके  interactions  .
Macroeconomics  analyzes   the   संपूर्ण   अर्थव्यवस्था  and  मुद्दे   affecting   it   ,   सहित   बेरोजगारी  , inflation  ,  economic  विकास  ,  और  monetary  और   फिस्कल   नीति  .
अन्य   व्यापक   भेद   शामिल  those  between   धनात्मक  economics  (  describing  ``   कया   is   ''   )   और   normative  economics ( advocating ``  कया   ought   to   be  '' )  ;   between  economic theory  और   लागू  economics ; between  तर्कसंगत   और  behavioral economics ; and between mainstream economics  (  more ``  परंपरागत  '' and dealing with the `` rationality-individualism-equilibrium nexus  ''   )  and heterodox  अर्थशास्त्र  (  अधिक   ``  radical '' and dealing with the  ``  institutions-history-social  ढांचा  nexus '' ) .
आर्थिक  analysis  may  be applied throughout society ,  as  in  कारोबार  ,  वित्त  ,  स्वास्थ्य  care  ,   और  government , but also  to   ऐसे   विविध   विषय  as crime , education ,  the  family , law , politics  ,   धर्म  , social  संस्थानों  ,  युद्ध   ,  and  विज्ञान   .
At the turn  of  the 21st  सदी   ,  the  expanding   डोमेन   of  economics in the social  sciences  has been described as economic imperialism  .
an  increasing number of economists  have  called  लिये  increased emphasis on environmental sustainability ; this  क्षेत्रफल  of research is known as Ecological economics .
This  is  a  सूची  of Schedule IV  दवाएँ  under the  नियंत्रित   substances   अधिनियम  for the United  राज्य  .
Required  निष्कर्षों   लिये   दवाएँ  to be  लगाई  in this  schedule:
The drug  or   अन्य  substance  रै  a  कम  potential for abuse relative to the  दवाएँ  or  अन्य  substances in schedule III .
the  drug or other substance has  a   फिलहाल  accepted medical use  in  treatment  in  the United  राज्य  .
Abuse  of   the  drug or other  पदार्थ   may   सीसे  to  सीमित   शारीरिक   dependence   or  psychological  dependence   सापेक्ष   to  the drugs  or  other substances in schedule III  .
the  complete list  of   अनुसूची   iv  drugs  हैं   as   फ़ॉलो   .
The Administrative  नियंत्रित  Substances Code  क्रमांक  for  प्रत्येक   ड्रग  is  शामिल  .
US county  household  median  आय  2009 .
Median US  household   आय   ,  2001-2011
Household  आय  is a  माप  commonly  प्रयुक्त  by the United  राज्य   सरकारी  and private institutions  .
Each household is  measured  by the income of every  निवासी   over  the age of  15   .
आय  includes wages  और   salaries   ,  unemployment  बीमे   ,  disability  भुगतान  ,  चाइल्ड   support  payments  प्राप्त  ,  नियमित   rental   रसीदें   ,  as  खूब  as  कोई  personal business , investment ,  or  other kinds of  आय   प्राप्त   routinely  .
While inflation-adjusted  (   ``   रियल  ''  )   household  income  था   महरूम  increasing  लगभग  every  साल   इससे  1945 to  1999  , it has  चूंकि  been  चपटा  and even decreased recently  .
U.S. median household  आय   गिरी   इससे   $   51,144   in  2010 to  $   50,502   in  2011 .
चरम   गरीबी  in the United States , meaning households living  on   कम  than $  2   प्रति   दिन   पहले   सरकारी   लाभ  ,  doubled  from 1996 to  1.5   लाख  households in 2011  ,  including 2.8 million children .
the  residents of the  household   do  not  have   to   be  related  to  the head of the household for their  आय   to   be   माना   भाग  of the household 's  आय  .
as   households   tend   to  share a similar economic context ,  the  use of household income  remains   among   the  most  widely   स्वीकृत   उपायों   of  income .
That the size of  a  household is not commonly taken  into  account  in  such  उपायों  may distort  कोई   विश्लेषण   of   fluctuations   भीतर   or  among  the   household  income categories  ,  and may  रेंडर  direct comparisons between quintiles difficult  or   भी  impossible  .
the  lapse rate is defined as the rate of  घटी  with height for an atmospheric variable .
The  परिवर्तनीय  involved is  तापमान   जबतक   निर्दिष्ट  otherwise .
the  terminology arises from the  शब्द  lapse  in  the sense of  a   घटी  or  मनाही   .
While  सबसे   प्रायः  applied  to   धरती  's atmosphere the  अवधारणा   can   be  extended to  कोई  gravitationally  समर्थित   बॉल   of   गैस  .
Blue  पहाड़  State is  an  American comedy  श्रेणी  that premiered on  स्पाइक  on January  11   ,  2010 .
the  series  निर्माता   शामिल   क्रिस  Romano  और  Eric Falconer ,  और  it  is  produced  by   lionsgate  Television .
the  series is  परिचय  a  fictional   विश्वविद्यालयों   ,  Blue  पहाड़   राज्य  ,  और  its  फ़ुटबॉल   टोली   ,  `` The Mountain Goats . ''
It portrays certain  पहलुओं  of  अमरीकी  university  जीवन  , including football , sex , binge  पीने  ,  दवाएँ  , wild partying  ,  and hazing .
in  February 2012  ,  it was reported that Blue  पहाड़  State would not  be  renewed  लिये   a  fourth  ऋतु  .
In  कूच  2013  ,  Ed  marinaro  stated  कि  he  is  working  on   a  Blue Mountain State film .
Apple  inc.  , formerly Apple  कंप्यूटर  ,  inc.   ,  is an American multinational corporation  headquartered  in Cupertino ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  that designs  ,  develops , and  बिकता  consumer electronics  ,  computer software and  निजी  computers .
इसके  best-known hardware  उत्पाद   हैं  the Mac  लकीर  of computers , the  ipod   म्यूज़िक  player ,  the  iPhone  स्मार्टफोन   ,  and the  ipad  tablet computer .
Its software  शामिल  the OS  x  and iOS operating systems  ,  the iTunes  मीडिया  browser  ,  the  safari  web  ब्राउजर   ,   और  the iLife and iWork creativity and production suites .
The  कम्पनी  was  संस्थापित   on  April 1 , 1976  ,   और  incorporated  as  Apple Computer ,  inc.   on  January 3  ,   1977  .
The word ``  कंप्यूटर   ''   थी   removed   इससे   इसके   नाम   on  January  9  , 2007 , reflecting its  shifted  focus towards consumer electronics after the introduction of the iPhone .
Apple is  the   संसार   's  second-largest information technology  कम्पनी  by  आय  after  samsung  Electronics ,  और   the   संसार  's third-largest  मोबाईल  phone  मेकर  after Samsung  और  Nokia .
Fortune magazine named Apple  the   सबसे  admired company in the  संयुक्त  States  in  2008 , and  in  the world from  2008  to  2012   .
However , the  कम्पनी   रै  received  आलोचना   लिये   इसके  contractors ' labor practices  ,   और   लिये  Apple 's own  पर्यावरणीय   और   कारोबार  practices .
, Apple maintains 394 retail  स्टोर्स  in  चौदह  countries as well as the online Apple Store  और   itunes   स्टोर  .
it   is   the   second-largest  publicly traded corporation in the world by  मार्केट  capitalization ,  साथ  an  अनुमानित   मान  of  us   $   414   अरब  as of January 2013 .
,   the   कम्पनी   था  72,800  स्थाई   full-time  employees and 3,300 temporary  full-time  employees  विश्वव्यापी  .
Its worldwide annual  आय   in  2012 totalled $ 156 billion .
Section  8   आवास  in the South Bronx
खण्ड  8 of the Housing Act  of   1937   (  ) ,  प्रायः  simply known as Section 8 , as repeatedly amended , authorizes the  भुगतान  of rental  आवास  assistance  to  private landlords on behalf of approximately 3.1 million low-income households .
it  operates through several  कार्यक्रम   ,   the   largest   of  which , the Housing Choice  वाउचर   कार्यक्रम  ,  pays  a  विशाल   portion  of the rents  और  utilities of about  2.1   लाख  households .
The  us   विभाग   of  Housing and Urban Development manages  the  Section  8   कार्यक्रम   .
The Housing Choice  वाउचर   कार्यक्रम  provides `` tenant-based ''  rental  assistance  ,  so a tenant can  मूव  from one  ईकाई  of  at   तनिक   न्यूनतम   आवास   विशेषता   to  another .
It also  allows  individuals to  लागू   उनके  monthly voucher towards the purchase  of   a   घर  , with  over   $   17  billion going towards such purchases each  साल  (  इससे  ncsha.org analysis )  .
The maximum allowed  वाउचर  is $ 2200 a month .
Section 8 also  authorizes   a   किस्में  of `` project-based  ''  rental  सहायता  programs  ,   अंतर्गत  which the  मालिक   reserves   कुछ  or  सब   of  the units  in  a building for  low-income  tenants ,  in   वापसी   लिये  a  संघीय  government guarantee to make  up  the  अंतर   between  the tenant 's contribution  और  the rent  लिये  1 cent in the  मालिक  's contract with the government  .
A tenant  जो   पत्ते  a  subsidized   प्रोजेक्ट   होगा   खोना  access to the project-based  रियायत  .
The United  राज्य  Department of  आवास  and Urban Development  और  United  राज्य   विभाग   of   दिग्गजों   अफेयर्स  have a special Section 8  कार्यक्रम   पुकारा   vash   (   दिग्गजों  Affairs  supportive  Housing ) , or HUD-VASH  ,  which gives  आउट  a certain number of Section 8 vouchers to  योग्य  homeless and otherwise vulnerable US armed forces  दिग्गजों  .
